original: MSS_0001-1 aṃśavastava niśākara nūnaṃ kalpitāstaruṇaketakakhaṇḍaiḥ /
analyzed: aṃśavaḥ tava niśākara nūnam kalpitāḥ taruṇa ketaka khaṇḍaiḥ

original: MSS_0001-2 yena pāṇḍurataradyutayo naḥ kaṇṭakairiva tudanti śarīram //
analyzed: yena pāṇḍuratara dyutayaḥ naḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ iva tudanti śarīram

original: MSS_0002-1 aṃśukaṃ hṛtavatā tanubāhu- svastikāpihitamugdhakucāgrā /
analyzed: aṃśukam hṛtavatā tanu bāhu svastika apihita mugdha kuca agrā

original: MSS_0002-2 bhinnaśaṅkhavalayaṃ pariṇetrā paryarambhi rabhasādaciroḍhā //
analyzed: bhinna śaṅkha valayam pariṇetrā paryarambhi rabhasāt acira ūḍhā

original: MSS_0003-1 aṃśukamiva śītabhayāt saṃstyānatvacchalena himadhavalam /
analyzed: aṃśukam iva śīta bhayāt saṃstyāna tva chalena hima dhavalam

original: MSS_0003-2 ambhobhirapi gṛhītaṃ paśyata śiśirasya māhātmyam //
analyzed: ambhobhiḥ api gṛhītam paśyata śiśirasya māhātmyam

original: MSS_0004-1 aṃśukena jaghanaṃ tirodadhe ka cukena ca kucau mṛgīdṛśām /
analyzed: aṃśukena jaghanam tirodadhe ka cukena ca kucau mṛgī dṛśām

original: MSS_0004-2 pīyamānamaniśaṃ priyekṣaṇaiḥ kṣāmatāmiva jagāma madhyamam //
analyzed: pīyamānam aniśam priya īkṣaṇaiḥ kṣāma tām iva jagāma madhyamam

original: MSS_0005-1 aṃśupāṇibhiratīva pipāsuḥ padmajaṃ madhu bhṛśaṃ rasayitvā /
analyzed: aṃśu pāṇibhiḥ atīva pipāsuḥ padma jam madhu bhṛśam rasayitvā

original: MSS_0005-2 kṣībatāmiva gataḥ kṣitimeṣyaṃl lohitaṃ vapuruvāha pataṅgaḥ //
analyzed: kṣība tām iva gataḥ kṣitim eṣyan lohitam vapuḥ uvāha pataṅgaḥ

original: MSS_0006-1 aṃśumānapi vipākapiśaṅgaṃ rūpamāpa parito divasānte /
analyzed: aṃśumān api vipāka piśaṅgam rūpam āpa paritas divasa ante

original: MSS_0006-2 kaḥ paro'tra na vikāramupeyād dhvāntabhīmaparivellitamūrtiḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ paraḥ utra na vikāram upeyāt dhvānta bhīma parivellita mūrtiḥ

original: MSS_0007-1 aṃśo daṇḍasamaḥ pūrvaḥ prayāsasama uttamaḥ /
analyzed: aṃśaḥ daṇḍa samaḥ pūrvaḥ prayāsa samaḥ uttamaḥ

original: MSS_0007-2 vilopo vā yathālābhaṃ prakṣepasama eva vā //
analyzed: vilopaḥ vā yathālābham prakṣepasamaḥ eva vā

original: MSS_0008-1 aṃśo'pi duṣṭadiṣṭānāṃ pareṣāṃ syād vināśakṛt /
analyzed: aṃśaḥ api duṣṭa diṣṭānām pareṣām syāt vināśa kṛt

original: MSS_0008-2 bālaleśo'pi vyāghrāṇāṃ yat syāj jīvitahānaye //
analyzed: bāla leśaḥ upi vyāghrāṇām yat syāt jīvita hānaye

original: MSS_0009-1 aṃsāvavaṣṭabdhanatā samādhiḥ śirodharāyā rahitaprayāsaḥ /
analyzed: aṃsau avaṣṭabdha natā samādhiḥ śirodharāyāḥ rahita prayāsaḥ

original: MSS_0009-2 dhṛtā vikārāṃstyajatā mukhena prasādalakṣmīḥ śaśalāñchanasya //
analyzed: dhṛtā vikārān tyajatā mukhena prasāda lakṣmīḥ śaśalāñchanasya

original: MSS_0010-1 aṃsālambitavāmakuṇḍaladharaṃ mandonnatabhrūlataṃ kiṃcit kuñcitakomalādharapuṭaṃ sāciprasārīkṣaṇam /
analyzed: aṃsa ālambita vāma kuṇḍala dharam manda unnata bhrū latam kiṃcid kuñcita komala adhara puṭam sāci prasāri īkṣaṇam

original: MSS_0010-2 alolāṅgulipallavairmuralikāmāpūrayantaṃ mudā mūle kalpatarostribhaṅgalalitaṃ dhyāye jaganmohanam //
analyzed: alola aṅguli pallavaiḥ muralikām āpūrayantam mudā mūle kalpataroḥ tri bhaṅga lalitam dhyāye jagat mohanam

original: MSS_0011-1 aṃsāsaktakapolavaṃśavadanavyāsaktabimbādhara-dvandvodīritamandamandapavanprārabdhamugdhadhvaniḥ /
analyzed: aṃsa āsakta kapola vaṃśa vadana vyāsakta bimba adhara dvandva udīrita manda manda pavan prārabdha mugdha dhvaniḥ

original: MSS_0011-2 īṣadvakrimalolahāranikaraḥ pratyekarokānana-nyañcaccañcadudañcadaṅgulicayastvāṃ pātu rādhādhavaḥ //
analyzed: īṣat vakrima lola hāra nikaraḥ pratyeka roka ānana nyañcat cañcat udañcat aṅguli cayaḥ tvām pātu rādhādhavaḥ

original: MSS_0012-1 aṃsena karṇaṃ cibukena vakṣaḥ karadvayenākṣi tirodadhānām /
analyzed: aṃsena karṇam cibukena vakṣaḥ kara dvayena akṣi tirodadhānām

original: MSS_0012-2 saṃtāḍayāmāsa hariḥ sametya cakoranetrāṃ calukodakena //
analyzed: saṃtāḍayāmāsa hariḥ sametya cakora netrām caluka udakena

original: MSS_0013-1 aṃhaḥ saṃharadakhilaṃ sakṛdudayādeva sakalalokasya /
analyzed: aṃhaḥ saṃharat akhilam sakṛt udayāt eva sakala lokasya

original: MSS_0013-2 taraṇiriva timirajaladhiṃ jayati jaganmaṅgalaṃ harernāma //
analyzed: taraṇiḥ iva timira jaladhim jayati jagat maṅgalam hareḥ nāma

original: MSS_0014-1 akaṇṭakā puṣpamahī veśayoṣidamātṛkā /
MSS_0014-2 mantrihīnā ca rājyaśrīr bhujyate viṭaceṭakaiḥ //
analyzed: mantri hīnā ca rājya śrīḥ bhujyate viṭa ceṭakaiḥ

original: MSS_0015-1 akaṇṭhasya kaṇṭhe kathaṃ puṣpamālā vinā nāsikāyāḥ kathaṃ dhūpagandhaḥ /
analyzed: a kaṇṭhasya kaṇṭhe katham puṣpa mālā vinā nāsikāyāḥ katham dhūpa gandhaḥ

original: MSS_0015-2 akarṇasya karṇe kathaṃ gītanṛtyam apādasya pāde kathaṃ me praṇāmaḥ //
analyzed: a karṇasya karṇe katham gīta nṛtyam a pādasya pāde katham me praṇāmaḥ

original: MSS_0016-1 akaparddakasya viphalaṃ januriti jānīmahe maheśo'pi /
analyzed: a kaparddakasya viphalam januḥ iti jānīmahe

original: MSS_0016-2 śirasi kṛtena kaparddī bhavati jaṭājūṭakenāpi //
analyzed: śirasi kṛtena kaparddī bhavati jaṭā jūṭakena api

original: MSS_0017-1 akaravamadhimauli pādapadmāv apanaya mānini mānitāmakāṇḍe /
analyzed: akaravam adhimauli pāda padmau apanaya mānini māni tām akāṇḍe

original: MSS_0017-2 yadi pararamaṇīṃ gatastadātha stanayugaliṅgayugaṃ sprśāmi tanvi //
analyzed: yadi para ramaṇīm gataḥ tadā atha stana yuga liṅga yugam sprśāmi tanvi

original: MSS_0018-1 akaruṇa kātaramanasā darśitanīrā nirantarāleyam /
analyzed: akaruṇa kātara manasā darśita nīrā nirantarālā iyam

original: MSS_0018-2 tvāmanudhāvati vimukhaṃ gaṅgeva bhagīrathaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: tvām anudhāvati vimukham gaṅgā iva bhagīratham dṛṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_0019-1 akaruṇatvamakāraṇavigrahaḥ paradhanāpahṛtiḥ parayoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: akaruṇa tvam akāraṇa vigrahaḥ para dhana apahṛtiḥ para yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_0019-2 svajanabandhujaneṣvasahiṣṇutā prakṛtisidhamidaṃ hi durātmanām //
analyzed: sva jana bandhu janeṣu a sahiṣṇu tā prakṛti sidham idam hi durātmanām

original: MSS_0020-1 akaruṇa mṛṣābhāśāsindho vimuñca mamāñcalaṃ tava paricitaḥ snehaḥ samyaṅmayetyabhidhāyinīm /
analyzed: akaruṇa mṛṣā bhās āśā sindho vimuñca mama añcalam tava paricitaḥ snehaḥ samyak mayā iti abhidhāyinīm

original: MSS_0020-2 aviralagaladvāṣpāṃ tanvīṃ nirastavibhūṣaṇāṃ ka iha bhavatīṃ bhadre nidre vinā vinivedayet //
analyzed: avirala galat vāṣpām tanvīm nirasta vibhūṣaṇām kaḥ iha bhavatīm bhadre nidre vinā vinivedayet

original: MSS_0021-1 akaroḥ kimu netraśoṇimānaṃ kimakārṣīḥ karapallavāvarodham /
analyzed: akaroḥ kimu netra śoṇimānam kim akārṣīḥ karapallava avarodham

original: MSS_0021-2 kalahaṃ kimadhāḥ krudhā rasajñe hitamarthaṃ na vidanti daivadaṣṭāḥ //
analyzed: kalaham kim adhāḥ krudhā rasajñe hitam artham na vidanti daiva daṣṭāḥ

original: MSS_0022-1 akarṇamakaroccheṣaṃ vidhirbrahmāṇḍabhaṅgadhīḥ /
analyzed: a karṇam akarot śeṣam vidhiḥ brahmāṇḍa bhaṅga dhīḥ

original: MSS_0022-2 śrutvā rāmakathāṃ ramyāṃ śiraḥ kasya na kampate //
analyzed: śrutvā rāma kathām ramyām śiraḥ kasya na kampate

original: MSS_0023-1 akarṇadhārāśugasaṃbhṛtāṅgatāṃ gatairaritreṇa vināsya vairibhiḥ /
analyzed: a karṇadhāra āśuga saṃbhṛta aṅga tām gataiḥ aritreṇa vinā asya vairibhiḥ

original: MSS_0023-2 vidhāya yāvattaraṇerbhidāmaho nimajjya tīrṇaḥ samare bhavārṇavaḥ //
analyzed: vidhāya yāvat taraṇeḥ bhidām ahar nimajjya tīrṇaḥ samare bhava arṇavaḥ

original: MSS_0024-1 akartavyaṃ na kartavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi /
analyzed: akartavyam na kartavyam prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ api

original: MSS_0024-2 kartavyameva kartavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi //
analyzed: kartavyam eva kartavyam prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ api

original: MSS_0025-1 akartavyeṣvasādhvīva tṛṣṇā prerayate janam /
analyzed: akartavyeṣu asādhvī iva tṛṣṇā prerayate janam

original: MSS_0025-2 tameva sarvapāpebhyo lajjā māteva rakṣati //
analyzed: tam eva sarva pāpebhyaḥ lajjā mātā iva rakṣati

original: MSS_0026-1 akarmaṇāṃ vai bhūtānāṃ vṛttiḥ syān na hi kācana /
analyzed: akarmaṇām vai bhūtānām vṛttiḥ syāt na hi kācana

original: MSS_0026-2 tadevābhriprapadyeta na vihanyāt kathaṃcana //
analyzed: tat eva abhri prapadyeta na vihanyāt kathaṃcana

original: MSS_0027-1 akarmaśīlaṃ ca mahāśanaṃ ca lokadviṣṭaṃ bahumāyaṃ nṛśaṃsam /
analyzed: a karma śīlam ca mahā aśanam ca loka dviṣṭam bahu māyam nṛśaṃsam

original: MSS_0027-2 adeśakālajñamaniṣṭaveṣam etān gṛhe na prativāsayīta //
analyzed: a deśa kāla jñam aniṣṭa veṣam etān gṛhe na prativāsayīta

original: MSS_0028-1 akalaṅkacandrakalayā kalitā sā bhāti vāruṇī taruṇī /
analyzed: akalaṅka candra kalayā kalitā sā bhāti vāruṇī taruṇī

original: MSS_0028-2 bhālasthalīva śambhoḥ saṃdhyādhyānopaviṣṭasya //
analyzed: bhāla sthalī iva śambhoḥ saṃdhyā dhyāna upaviṣṭasya

original: MSS_0029-1 akalaṅkāntike kāntiḥ keti kālaṅkalaṅkinaḥ /
analyzed: akalaṅka antike kāntiḥ kā iti kālaṅkalaṅkinaḥ

original: MSS_0029-2 aruṇe taruṇe masyā dhāvaṃ kāmayate śaśī //
analyzed: aruṇe taruṇe masyā dhāvam kāmayate śaśī

original: MSS_0030-1 akalaṅkā pulakavatī sasnehā muktakañcukī śyāmā /
analyzed: akalaṅkā pulakavatī sa snehā mukta kañcukī śyāmā

original: MSS_0030-2 patatu tavorasi dayitā khaṅgalatā vairiṇaḥ śirasi //
analyzed: patatu tava urasi dayitā khaṅga latā vairiṇaḥ śirasi

original: MSS_0031-1 akalaṅko dṛḍhaḥ śuddhaḥ parivārī guṇānvitaḥ /
analyzed: akalaṅkaḥ dṛḍhaḥ śuddhaḥ parivārī guṇa anvitaḥ

original: MSS_0031-2 sadvaṃśo hṛdayagrāhī khaṅgaḥ susadṛśastava //
analyzed: sat vaṃśaḥ hṛdaya grāhī khaṅgaḥ su sadṛśaḥ tava

original: MSS_0032-1 akalitanijapararūpaḥ svakamapi doṣaṃ parasthitaṃ vetti /
analyzed: a kalita nija para rūpaḥ svakam api doṣam para sthitam vetti

original: MSS_0032-2 nāvāsthitastaṭasthān acalānapi vicalitān manute //
analyzed: na avāsthitaḥ taṭa sthān acalān api vicalitān manute

original: MSS_0033-1 akaliyugamakharvamatra hṛdyaṃ vyacaradapāpaghano yataḥ kuṭumbī /
analyzed: a kali yugam akharvam atra hṛdyam vyacarat apāpa ghanaḥ yatas kuṭumbī

original: MSS_0033-2 mama ruciriha lakṣmaṇāgrajena prabhavati śarmadaśāsyamardena //
analyzed: mama ruciḥ iha lakṣmaṇa agrajena prabhavati śarma daśā āsya mardena

original: MSS_0034-1 akalilatapastejovīryaprathimni yaśonidhā- vavitathamadadhmāte roṣānmunāvabhidhāvati /
analyzed: a kalila tapaḥ tejaḥ vīrya prathimni yaśaḥ nidhau roṣāt munau abhidhāvati

original: MSS_0034-2 abhinavadhanurvidyādarpakṣamāya ca karmaṇe sphurati rabhasāt pāṇiḥ pādopasaṃgrahaṇāya ca //
analyzed: abhinava dhanuḥ vidyā darpa kṣamāya ca karmaṇe sphurati rabhasāt pāṇiḥ pāda upasaṃgrahaṇāya ca

original: MSS_0035-1 akalpaḥ svāṅgaceṣṭāyāṃ śakunta iva pañjare /
analyzed: akalpaḥ sva aṅga ceṣṭāyām śakuntaḥ iva pañjare

original: MSS_0035-2 anucchvasansmaran pūrvaṃ garbhe kiṃ nāma vindate //
analyzed: an ucchvasan smaran pūrvam garbhe kim nāma vindate

original: MSS_0036-1 akasmāt prakriyā nṝṇāṃ akasmāccāpakarṣaṇam /
analyzed: akasmāt prakriyā nṝṇām akasmāt ca apakarṣaṇam

original: MSS_0036-2 śubhāśubhe mahattvaṃ ca prakartuṃ buddhilāghavāt //
analyzed: śubha aśubhe mahat tvam ca prakartum buddhi lāghavāt

original: MSS_0037-1 akasmādapi yaḥ kaścid arthaṃ prāpnoti pūruṣaḥ /
analyzed: akasmāt api yaḥ kaścid artham prāpnoti pūruṣaḥ

original: MSS_0037-2 taṃ haṭheneti manyante sa hi yatno na kasyacit //
analyzed: tam haṭhena iti manyante sa hi yatnaḥ na kasyacid

original: MSS_0038-1 akasmādunmatta praharasi kimadhvakṣitiruhaṃ hradaṃ hastāghātairvidalasi kimutphullanalinam /
analyzed: akasmāt unmatta praharasi kim adhva kṣitiruham hradam hasta āghātaiḥ vidalasi kim utphulla nalinam

original: MSS_0038-2 tadā jānīmaste karivara balodgāramasamaṃ saṭāṃ suptasyāpi spṛśasi yadi pañcānanaśiśoḥ //
analyzed: tadā jānīmaḥ te kari vara bala udgāram asamam saṭām suptasya api spṛśasi yadi pañcānana śiśoḥ

original: MSS_0039-1 akasmādekasmin pathi sakhi mayā yāmunataṭaṃ vrajantyā dṛṣṭo'yaṃ navajaladharaśyāmalatanuḥ /
analyzed: akasmāt ekasmin pathi sakhi mayā yāmuna taṭam vrajantyā dṛṣṭaḥ yam nava jaladhara śyāmala tanuḥ

original: MSS_0039-2 sa dṛgbhaṅgyā kiṃ vākuruta na hi jāne tata idaṃ mano me vyālolaṃ kvacana gṛhakṛtye na lagate //
analyzed: sa dṛś bhaṅgyā kim vā akuruta na hi jāne tatas idam manaḥ me vyālolam kvacana gṛha kṛtye na lagate

original: MSS_0040-1 akasmādeva kupyanti prasīdantyanimittataḥ /
analyzed: akasmāt eva kupyanti prasīdanti animittataḥ

original: MSS_0040-2 śīlametadasādhūnām abhraṃ pāriplavaṃ yathā //
analyzed: śīlam etat asādhūnām abhram pāriplavam yathā

original: MSS_0041-1 akasmādeva tanvaṅgī jahāsa yadiyaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: akasmāt eva tanvaṅgī jahāsa yat iyam punar

original: MSS_0041-2 nūnaṃ prasūnabāṇo'syāṃ svārājyamadhitiṣṭhati //
analyzed: nūnam prasūna bāṇā usyām svārājyam adhitiṣṭhati

original: MSS_0042-1 akasmādeva te caṇḍi sphuritādharapallavam /
analyzed: akasmāt eva te caṇḍi sphurita adhara pallavam

original: MSS_0042-2 mukhaṃ muktāruco dhatte gharmāmbhaḥkaṇamañjarīḥ //
analyzed: mukham muktā rucaḥ dhatte gharmāmbhaḥ kaṇa mañjarīḥ

original: MSS_0043-1 akasmādeva yaḥ kopād abhīkṣṇaṃ bahu bhāṣate /
analyzed: akasmāt eva yaḥ kopāt abhīkṣṇam bahu bhāṣate

original: MSS_0043-2 tasmādudvijate lokaḥ sasphuliṅgādivānalāt //
analyzed: tasmāt udvijate lokaḥ sa sphuliṅgāt iva analāt

original: MSS_0044-1 akasmāddveṣṭi yo bhaktam ājanmaparisevitam /
analyzed: akasmāt dveṣṭi yaḥ bhaktam ājanma parisevitam

original: MSS_0044-2 na vyañjane ruciryasya tyājyo nṛpa ivāturaḥ //
analyzed: na vyañjane ruciḥ yasya tyājyaḥ nṛpaḥ iva āturaḥ

original: MSS_0045-1 akāṇḍakopino bhartur anyāsakteśca yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: akāṇḍa kopinaḥ bhartuḥ anya āsakteḥ ca yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_0045-2 praśāntiścetasaḥ kartuṃ brahmaṇāpi na śakyate //
analyzed: praśāntiḥ cetasaḥ kartum brahmaṇā api na śakyate

original: MSS_0046-1 akāṇḍadhrtamānasavyavasitotsavaiḥ sārasair akāṇdapaṭutāṇḍavairapi śikhaṇḍināṃ maṇḍalaiḥ /
analyzed: akāṇḍa dhrta mānasa vyavasita utsavaiḥ sārasaiḥ akāṇda paṭu tāṇḍavaiḥ api śikhaṇḍinām maṇḍalaiḥ

original: MSS_0046-2 diśaḥ samavalokitāḥ sarasanirbharaprollasad- bhavatpṛthuvarūthinīrajanibhūrajaḥśyāmalāḥ //
analyzed: diśaḥ samavalokitāḥ sarasa nirbhara prollasat bhavat pṛthu varūthinī rajani bhūrajaḥ śyāmalāḥ

original: MSS_0047-1 akāṇḍapātajātānām astrāṇāṃ marmabhedinām /
analyzed: akāṇḍa pāta jātānām astrāṇām marma bhedinām

original: MSS_0047-2 gāḍhaśokaprahārāṇām acintaiva mahauṣadham //
analyzed: gāḍha śoka prahārāṇām acintā eva mahā auṣadham

original: MSS_0048-1 akāṇḍe vakṣojaskhalitavasanavyāpṛtakaraṃ mṛṣā jṛmbhārambhonnamitabhujabandhonnatakucam /
analyzed: akāṇḍe vakṣoja skhalita vasana vyāpṛta karam mṛṣā jṛmbhā ārambha unnamita bhuja bandha unnata kucam

original: MSS_0048-2 vṛthā yātāyātaiḥ kapaṭakalitānyonyahasitaṃ harantyetāścittānyahaha jagatāṃ vāravanitāḥ //
analyzed: vṛthā yātāyātaiḥ kapaṭa kalita anyonya hasitam haranti etāḥ cittāni ahaha jagatām vāravanitāḥ

original: MSS_0049-1 akāmasya kriyā kācid dṛśyate neha kaṛhicit /
analyzed: akāmasya kriyā kācid dṛśyate na iha kaṛhicit

original: MSS_0049-2 yadyaddhi kurute kiṃcit tattat kāmasya ceṣṭitam //
analyzed: yat yat hi kurute kiṃcid tat tat kāmasya ceṣṭitam

original: MSS_0050-1 akāmāṃ kāmayānasya śarīramupatapyate /
analyzed: akāmām kāmayānasya śarīram upatapyate

original: MSS_0050-2 icchantīṃ kāmayānasya prītirbhavati śobhanā //
analyzed: icchantīm kāmayānasya prītiḥ bhavati śobhanā

original: MSS_0051-1 akāmān kāmayati yaḥ kāmayānān paridviṣan /
analyzed: akāmān kāmayati yaḥ kāmayānān paridviṣan

original: MSS_0051-2 balavantaṃ ca yo dveṣṭi tamāhurmūḍhacetasam //
analyzed: balavantam ca yaḥ dveṣṭi tam āhuḥ mūḍha cetasam

original: MSS_0052-1 akāraṇaṃ rūpamakāraṇaṃ kulaṃ mahatsu nīceṣu ca karma śobhate /
analyzed: akāraṇam rūpam akāraṇam kulam mahatsu nīceṣu ca karma śobhate

original: MSS_0052-2 idaṃ hi rūpaṃ paribhutapūrvakaṃ tadeva bhūyo bahumānamāgataṃ //
analyzed: idam hi rūpam paribhuta pūrvakam tat eva bhūyas bahu mānam āgatam

original: MSS_0053-1 akāraṇaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tantrīśabdo'pyakāraṇam /
analyzed: akāraṇam vyākaraṇam tantrī śabdaḥ upyakāraṇam

original: MSS_0053-2 akāraṇaṃ trayo vedās taṇḍulāstatra kāraṇam //
analyzed: akāraṇam trayaḥ vedāḥ taṇḍulāḥ tatra kāraṇam

original: MSS_0054-1 akāraṇāviṣkṛtakopadāruṇāt khalādbhayaṃ kasya na nāma jāyate /
analyzed: akāraṇa āviṣkṛta kopa dāruṇāt khalāt bhayam kasya na nāma jāyate

original: MSS_0054-2 viṣaṃ mahāheriva yasya durvacaḥ suduḥsahaṃ saṃnihitaṃ sadā mukhe //
analyzed: viṣam mahā aheḥ iva yasya durvacaḥ su duḥsaham saṃnihitam sadā mukhe

original: MSS_0055-1 akāraṇena viprebhyo yaḥ kupyati narādhipaḥ /
analyzed: akāraṇena viprebhyaḥ yaḥ kupyati narādhipaḥ

original: MSS_0055-2 krṣṇasarpaṃ sa gṛhṇāti śirasā baladaṛpitaḥ //
analyzed: krṣṇa sarpam sa gṛhṇāti śirasā

original: MSS_0056-1 akāryakaraṇādbhītaḥ kāryāṇāṃ ca vivarjanāt /
analyzed: akārya karaṇāt bhītaḥ kāryāṇām ca vivarjanāt

original: MSS_0056-2 akāle mantrabhedācca yena mādyenna tat pibet //
analyzed: akāle mantra bhedāt ca yena mādyet na tat pibet

original: MSS_0057-1 akāryapratiṣedhaśca kāryāṇāṃ ca pravartanam /
analyzed: akārya pratiṣedhaḥ ca kāryāṇām ca pravartanam

original: MSS_0057-2 pradānaṃ ca pradeyānām adeyānāmasaṃgrahaḥ //
analyzed: pradānam ca pradeyānām adeyānām asaṃgrahaḥ

original: MSS_0058-1 akāryamasakṛt kṛtvā dṛśyante hyadhanā narāḥ /
analyzed: akāryam asakṛt kṛtvā dṛśyante hi adhanāḥ narāḥ

original: MSS_0058-2 dhanayuktāstvadharmasthā dṛśyante cāpare janāḥ //
analyzed: dhana yuktāḥ tu adharma sthāḥ dṛśyante ca apare janāḥ

original: MSS_0059-1 akāryāṇyapi paryāpya kṛtvāpiṃ vṛjinārjanaṃ /
analyzed: akāryāṇi api paryāpya kṛtvā āpim vṛjina arjanam

original: MSS_0059-2 vidhīyate hitaṃ yasya sa dehaḥ kasya susthiraḥ //
analyzed: vidhīyate hitam yasya sa dehaḥ kasya su sthiraḥ

original: MSS_0060-1 akārye tathyo vā bhavati vitathaḥ kāmamathavā tathāpyuccairdhāmnāṃ harati mahimānaṃ janaravaḥ /
analyzed: akārye tathyaḥ vā bhavati vitathaḥ kāmam athavā tathā api uccais dhāmnām harati mahimānam jana ravaḥ

original: MSS_0060-2 tulottīrṇasyāpi prakaṭanihatāśeṣatamaso ravestādṛktejo na hi bhavati kanyāṃ gata iti //
analyzed: tulā uttīrṇasya api prakaṭa nihata aśeṣa tamasaḥ raveḥ tādṛś tejaḥ na hi bhavati kanyām gataḥ iti

original: MSS_0061-1 akālacaryā viṣamā ca goṣṭhī kumitrasevā na kadāpi kāryā /
analyzed: akāla caryā viṣamā ca goṣṭhī ku mitra sevā na kadāpi kāryā

original: MSS_0061-2 paśyāṇḍajaṃ padmavane prasuptaṃ dhanurvimuktena śareṇa bhinnam //
analyzed: paśya aṇḍajam padma vane prasuptam dhanuḥ vimuktena śareṇa bhinnam

original: MSS_0062-1 akālajaladendoḥ sā hṛdyā vadanacandrikā /
analyzed: akāla jalada indoḥ sā hṛdyā vadana candrikā

original: MSS_0062-2 nityaṃ kavicakorairyā pīyate na ca hīyate //
analyzed: nityam kavi cakoraiḥ yā pīyate na ca hīyate

original: MSS_0063-1 akālajaladaślokaiś citramātmakṛtairiva /
analyzed: akāla jalada ślokaiḥ citram ātma kṛtaiḥ iva

original: MSS_0063-2 jātaḥ kādambarīrāmo nāṭake pravaraḥ kaviḥ //
analyzed: jātaḥ kādambarī rāmaḥ nāṭake pravaraḥ kaviḥ

original: MSS_0064-1 akālajaladacchannam ālokya ravimaṇḍalam /
analyzed: akāla jalada channam ālokya ravi maṇḍalam

original: MSS_0064-2 cakravākayugaṃ rauti rajanībhayaśaṅkayā //
analyzed: cakravāka yugam rauti rajanī bhaya śaṅkayā

original: MSS_0065-1 akālamṛtyuṃ parihṛtya jīvitaṃ dadāti yo dehasukhaṃ ca dehinām /
analyzed: akāla mṛtyum parihṛtya jīvitam dadāti yaḥ deha sukham ca dehinām

original: MSS_0065-2 natena dhātrāsti samaḥ kuto'dhiko na jīvitāddānamihātiricyate //
analyzed: na tena dhātrā asti samaḥ kutas adhikaḥ na jīvitāt dānam iha atiricyate

original: MSS_0066-1 akālamṛtyurviśvāso viśvasan hi vipadyate /
analyzed: akāla mṛtyuḥ viśvāsaḥ viśvasan hi vipadyate

original: MSS_0066-2 yasmin karoti viśvāsaṃ sa jīvatyaparo mṛtaḥ //
analyzed: yasmin karoti viśvāsam sa jīvati aparaḥ mṛtaḥ

original: MSS_0067-1 akālasahamatyalpaṃ mūrkhavyasanināyakam /
analyzed: akāla saham ati alpam mūrkha vyasani nāyakam

original: MSS_0067-2 aguptaṃ bhīruyodhaṃ ca durgavyasanamucyate //
analyzed: aguptam bhīru yodham ca durga vyasanam ucyate

original: MSS_0068-1 akālasainyayuktastu hanyate kālayodhinā /
analyzed: akāla sainya yuktaḥ tu hanyate kāla yodhinā

original: MSS_0068-2 kauśikena hatajyotir niśītha iva vāyasaḥ //
analyzed: kauśikena hata jyotiḥ niśīthe iva vāyasaḥ

original: MSS_0069-1 akāle kṛtyamārabdhaṃ kaṛtuṃ nārthāya kalpate /
analyzed: akāle kṛtyam ārabdham na arthāya kalpate

original: MSS_0069-2 tadeva kāla ārabdhaṃ mahate'rthāya kalpate //
analyzed: tat eva kāle ārabdham mahatā irthāya kalpate

original: MSS_0070-1 akāle garjite deve durdinaṃ vāthavā bhavet /
analyzed: akāle garjite deve durdinam vā athavā bhavet

original: MSS_0070-2 pūrvakāṇḍahataṃ lakṣyam anadhyāyaṃ pracakṣate //
analyzed: pūrva kāṇḍa hatam lakṣyam anadhyāyam pracakṣate

original: MSS_0071-1 akiṃcanaḥ paripatan sukhamāsvādayiṣyasi /
analyzed: akiṃcanaḥ paripatan sukham āsvādayiṣyasi

original: MSS_0071-2 akiṃcanaḥ sukhaṃ śete samuttiṣṭhati caiva hi //
analyzed: akiṃcanaḥ sukham śete samuttiṣṭhati ca eva hi

original: MSS_0072-1 akiṃcanatvaṃ rājyaṃ ca tulayā samatolayat /
analyzed: akiṃcana tvam rājyam ca tulayā samatolayat

original: MSS_0072-2 akiṃcanatvamadhikaṃ rājyādapi jitātmanaḥ //
analyzed: akiṃcanatvam adhikam rājyāt api jita ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_0073-1 akiṃcanasya dāntasya śāntasya samacetasaḥ /
analyzed: akiṃcanasya dāntasya śāntasya sama cetasaḥ

original: MSS_0073-2 mayā saṃtuṣṭamanasaḥ sarvāḥ sukhamayā diśaḥ //
analyzed: mayā saṃtuṣṭa manasaḥ sarvāḥ sukha mayāḥ diśaḥ

original: MSS_0074-1 akiṃcanasya śuddhasya upapannasya sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: akiṃcanasya śuddhasya upapannasya sarvaśas

original: MSS_0074-2 avekṣamāṇastrīṃllokān na tulyamupalakṣaye //
analyzed: avekṣamāṇaḥ trīn lokān na tulyam upalakṣaye

original: MSS_0075-1 akiṃcanāśca dṛśyante puruṣāścirajīvinaḥ /
analyzed: akiṃcanāḥ ca dṛśyante puruṣāḥ cira jīvinaḥ

original: MSS_0075-2 samṛddhe ca kule jātā vinaśyanti pataṃgavat //
analyzed: samṛddhe ca kule jātāḥ vinaśyanti pataṃga vat

original: MSS_0076-1 akiṃcitkāriṇāṃ dīnair ākṛṣṭaguṇakarmaṇām /
analyzed: a kiṃcid kāriṇām dīnaiḥ ākṛṣṭa guṇa karmaṇām

original: MSS_0076-2 aghāya gatasattvānāṃ darśanasparśanādikam //
analyzed: aghāya gata sattvānām darśana sparśana ādikam

original: MSS_0077-1 akīrtiṃ cāpi bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti te'vyayām /
analyzed: akīrtim ca api bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti tevyayām

original: MSS_0077-2 saṃbhāvitasya cākīrtir maraṇādatiricyate //
analyzed: saṃbhāvitasya ca akīrtiḥ maraṇāt atiricyate

original: MSS_0078-1 akīrtiryasya gīyeta loke bhūtasya kasyacit /
analyzed: akīrtiḥ yasya gīyeta loke bhūtasya kasyacid

original: MSS_0078-2 patatyevādhamāṃllokān yāvacchabdaḥ prakīrtyate //
analyzed: patati eva adhamān lokān yāvat śabdaḥ prakīrtyate

original: MSS_0079-1 akīrtirnindyate devaiḥ kīrtirlokeṣu pūjyate /
analyzed: akīrtiḥ nindyate devaiḥ kīrtiḥ lokeṣu pūjyate

original: MSS_0079-2 kīrtyarthaṃ tu samārambhaḥ sarveṣāṃ sumahātmanām //
analyzed: kīrti artham tu samārambhaḥ sarveṣām su mahātmanām

original: MSS_0080-1 akīrteḥ kāraṇaṃ yoṣid yoṣidvairasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: akīrteḥ kāraṇam yoṣit yoṣit vairasya kāraṇam

original: MSS_0080-2 saṃsārakāraṇaṃ yoṣid yoṣitaṃ varjayettataḥ //
analyzed: saṃsāra kāraṇam yoṣit yoṣitam varjayet tatas

original: MSS_0081-1 akuṇṭhotkaṇṭhayā pūrṇam akaṇṭhaṃ kalakaṇṭhi mām /
analyzed: akuṇṭha utkaṇṭhayā pūrṇam a kaṇṭham kalakaṇṭhi mām

original: MSS_0081-2 kambukaṇṭhyāḥ kṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhe kuru kaṇṭhārtimuddhara //
analyzed: kuru

original: MSS_0082-1 akuberapurīvilokanaṃ na dharāsūnukaraṃ kadācana /
analyzed: akubera purī vilokanam na dharā sūnu karam kadācana

original: MSS_0082-2 atha tatpratikārahetave- 'damayantīpatilocanaṃ bhaja //
analyzed: atha tad pratikāra hetave damayantī pati locanam bhaja

original: MSS_0083-1 akurvanto'pi pāpāni śucayaḥ pāpasaṃśrayāt /
analyzed: a kurvantaḥ api pāpāni śucayaḥ pāpa saṃśrayāt

original: MSS_0083-2 parapāpairvinaśyanti matsyā nāgahrade yathā //
analyzed: para pāpaiḥ vinaśyanti matsyāḥ nāga hrade yathā

original: MSS_0084-1 akulānāṃ kule bhāvaṃ kulīnānāṃ kulakṣayam /
analyzed: a kulānām kule bhāvam kulīnānām kula kṣayam

original: MSS_0084-2 saṃyogaṃ viprayogaṃ ca paśyanti cirajīvinaḥ //
analyzed: saṃyogam viprayogam ca paśyanti cira jīvinaḥ

original: MSS_0085-1 akulīnaḥ kulīnaśca maryādāṃ yo na laṅghayet /
analyzed: akulīnaḥ kulīnaḥ ca maryādām yaḥ na laṅghayet

original: MSS_0085-2 dharmāpekṣī mṛdurdāntaḥ sa kulīnaśatairvaraḥ //
analyzed: dharma apekṣī mṛduḥ dāntaḥ sa kulīna śataiḥ varaḥ

original: MSS_0086-1 akulīnastu puruṣaḥ prakṛtaḥ sādhusaṃkṣayāt /
analyzed: akulīnaḥ tu puruṣaḥ prakṛtaḥ sādhu saṃkṣayāt

original: MSS_0086-2 durlabhaiśvaryasaṃprāpto garvitaḥ śatrutāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: durlabha aiśvarya saṃprāptaḥ garvitaḥ śatru tām vrajet

original: MSS_0087-1 akulīno'pi mūrkho'pi bhūpālaṃ yo'tra sevate /
analyzed: akulīnaḥ api mūrkhaḥ api bhūpālam yaḥ atra sevate

original: MSS_0087-2 api saṃmānahīno'pi sa sarvatra prapūjyate //
analyzed: api saṃmāna hīnaḥ api sa sarvatra prapūjyate

original: MSS_0088-1 akule patito rājā mūrkhaputro hi paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: a kule patitaḥ rājā mūrkha putraḥ hi paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_0088-2 nirdhanasya dhanaprāptis tṛṇavanmanyate jagat //
analyzed: nirdhanasya dhana prāptiḥ tṛṇa vat manyate jagat

original: MSS_0089-1 akūpārād vāri pracurataramādāya jaladaḥ sa dānādhyakṣo'pi prakirati jalaṃ nādbhutamidam /
analyzed: akūpārāt vāri pracurataram ādāya jaladaḥ sa dānādhyakṣaḥ api prakirati jalam na adbhutam idam

original: MSS_0089-2 sa megho dhanyo yat parikirati muktāphalatayā yadīyāsau kīrtirnaṭati nṛpanārīkucataṭe //
analyzed: sa meghaḥ dhanyaḥ yat parikirati muktāphala tayā yadīyā asau kīrtiḥ naṭati nṛpa nārī kuca taṭe

original: MSS_0090-1 akūrcārambho'pi praticubukadeśaṃ karatalaṃ pratijñāyāṃ kurvan yuvatiṣu dṛśaṃ snigdhataralāṃ /
analyzed: a kūrca ārambhaḥ upi prati cubuka deśam kara talam pratijñāyām kurvan yuvatiṣu dṛśam snigdha taralām

original: MSS_0090-2 kumāro'haṃ kārāt pariṣadi samānānagaṇayan bhujau vakṣaḥ paśyannavavayasi kāntiṃ vitanute //
analyzed: kumāraḥ ham kārāt pariṣadi samānān a gaṇayan bhujau vakṣaḥ paśyan nava vayasi kāntim vitanute

original: MSS_0091-1 akṛtakavalārambhairvaktrairbhayasthagitekṣaṇāḥ kimapi valitagrīvaṃ sthitvā muhurmṛgapaṅktayaḥ /
analyzed: akṛta kavala ārambhaiḥ vaktraiḥ bhaya sthagita īkṣaṇāḥ kim api valita grīvam sthitvā muhur mṛga paṅktayaḥ

original: MSS_0091-2 gaganamasakṛtpaśyantyetāstathāśrughanairmukhair nipatati yathā śṛṅgāgrebhyo'kramaṃ nayanodakam //
analyzed: gaganam asakṛt paśyanti etāḥ tathā aśru ghanaiḥ mukhaiḥ nipatati yathā nayana udakam

original: MSS_0092-1 akṛtajñamanāryaṃ ca dīrgharoṣamanārjavam /
analyzed: akṛtajñam anāryam ca dīrgha roṣam anārjavam

original: MSS_0092-2 caturo viddhi cāṇḍālāñ jātyā jāyeta pañcamaḥ //
analyzed: caturaḥ viddhi cāṇḍālām jātyāḥ jāyeta pañcamaḥ

original: MSS_0093-1 akṛtatyāgamahimnāṃ mithyā kiṃ rājarājaśabdena /
analyzed: akṛta tyāga mahimnām mithyā kim rājarāja śabdena

original: MSS_0093-2 goptāraṃ na nidhīnāṃ mahayanti maheśvaraṃ vibudhāḥ //
analyzed: goptāram na nidhīnām mahayanti maheśvaram vibudhāḥ

original: MSS_0094-1 akṛtadviṣadunnaticchidaḥ śritasaṃrakṣaṇavandhyakarmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: a kṛta dviṣat unnati chidaḥ śrita saṃrakṣaṇa vandhya karmaṇaḥ

original: MSS_0094-2 puruṣasya nirarthakaḥ karaḥ kila kaṇḍūyanamātrasārthakaḥ //
analyzed: puruṣasya nirarthakaḥ karaḥ kila kaṇḍūyana mātra sārthakaḥ

original: MSS_0095-1 akṛtapremaiva varaṃ na punaḥ saṃjātavighaṭitapremā /
analyzed: a kṛta premā eva varam na punar saṃjāta vighaṭita premā

original: MSS_0095-2 uddhṛtanayanastāmyati yathā hi na tatheha jātāndhaḥ //
analyzed: uddhṛta nayanaḥ tāmyati yathā hi na tathā iha jāta andhaḥ

original: MSS_0096-1 akṛta viśadadhāmno bimbasāraṃ gṛhītvā dayita yuvativaktraṃ lokadhātreti vidmaḥ /
analyzed: akṛta viśada dhāmnaḥ bimba sāram gṛhītvā dayita yuvati vaktram loka dhātrā iti vidmaḥ

original: MSS_0096-2 na hi na hi bhavadīyo moha evaiṣa mitra sitagaralanidhānaṃ tattvato niścinu tvam //
analyzed: na hi na hi bhavadīyaḥ mohaḥ eva eṣa mitra sita garala nidhānam tattvataḥ niścinu tvam

original: MSS_0097-1 akṛtasyāgamo nāsti kṛte nāśo na vidyate /
analyzed: akṛtasya āgamaḥ na asti kṛte nāśaḥ na vidyate

original: MSS_0097-2 akasmādeva loko'yaṃ tṛṣṇe dāsīkṛtastvayā //
analyzed: akasmāt eva lokaḥ ayam tṛṣṇe dāsīkṛtaḥ tvayā

original: MSS_0098-1 akṛtātmānamāsādya rājānamanaye ratam /
analyzed: akṛtātmānam āsādya rājānam anaye ratam

original: MSS_0098-2 samṛddhāni vinaśyanti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca //
analyzed: samṛddhāni vinaśyanti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca

original: MSS_0099-1 akṛte'pyudyame puṃsām anyajanmakṛtaṃ phalam /
analyzed: akṛte api udyame puṃsām anya janma kṛtam phalam

original: MSS_0099-2 śubhāśubhaṃ samabhyeti vidhinā saṃniyojitam //
analyzed: śubha aśubham samabhyeti vidhinā saṃniyojitam

original: MSS_0100-1 akṛteṣvevakāryeṣu mṛtyurvai saṃprakarṣati /
analyzed: a kṛteṣu eva kāryeṣu mṛtyuḥ vai saṃprakarṣati

original: MSS_0100-2 yuvaiva dharmaśīlaḥ syād animittaṃ hi jīvitam //
analyzed: yuvā eva dharma śīlaḥ syāt animittam hi jīvitam

original: MSS_0101-1 akṛtopadravaḥ kaścin mahānapi na pūjyate /
analyzed: a kṛta upadravaḥ kaścid mahān api na pūjyate

original: MSS_0101-2 pūjayanti narā nāgān na tārkṣyaṃ nāgaghātinam //
analyzed: pūjayanti narāḥ nāgān na tārkṣyam nāga ghātinam

original: MSS_0102-1 akṛtayaṃ naiva kṛtyaṃ syāt prāṇatyāge'pyupasthite /
analyzed: na eva kṛtyam syāt prāṇatyāge pi upasthite

original: MSS_0102-2 na ca kṛtyaṃ parityājyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //
analyzed: na ca kṛtyam parityājyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: MSS_0103-1 akṛtayaṃ manyate kṛtayaṃ agamyaṃ manyate sugam /
analyzed: akṛtayam manyate kṛtayam agamyam manyate sugam

original: MSS_0103-2 abhakṣyaṃ manyate bhakṣyaṃ strīvākyaprerito naraḥ //
analyzed: abhakṣyam manyate bhakṣyam strī vākya preritaḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_0104-1 akṛtrimapremarasā vilāsālasagāminī /
MSS_0104-2 asāre dagdhasaṃsāre sāraṃ sāraṅgalocanā //
analyzed: asāre dagdha saṃsāre sāram sāraṅga locanā

original: MSS_0105-1 akṛtrimavilāsāṅkam aśikṣitakalākramam /
MSS_0105-2 avibhāgāṅgasubhagaṃ babhūva surataṃ tayoḥ //
analyzed: avibhāga aṅga subhagam babhūva suratam tayoḥ

original: MSS_0106-1 akṛtvā karma yo loke phalaṃ vindati viṣṭitaḥ /
analyzed: a kṛtvā karma yaḥ loke phalam vindati viṣṭitaḥ

original: MSS_0106-2 sa tu vaktavyatāṃ yāti dveṣyo bhavati prāyaśaḥ //
analyzed: sa tu vaktavya tām yāti dveṣyaḥ bhavati prāyaśas

original: MSS_0107-1 akṛtvā nijadeśasya rakṣāṃ yo vijigīṣate /
analyzed: a kṛtvā nija deśasya rakṣām yaḥ vijigīṣate

original: MSS_0107-2 sa nṛpaḥ paridhānena vṛtamauliḥ pumāniva //
analyzed: sa nṛpaḥ paridhānena vṛta mauliḥ pumān iva

original: MSS_0108-1 akṛtvā parasaṃtāpam agatvā khalanamratām /
analyzed: a kṛtvā para saṃtāpam a gatvā khala namra tām

original: MSS_0108-2 anutsṛjya satāṃ vartma yat svalpamapi tad bahu //
analyzed: an utsṛjya satām vartma yat su alpam api tat bahu

original: MSS_0109-1 akṛtvā pauruṣaṃ yā śrīḥ kiṃ tayālasabhāgyayā /
analyzed: a kṛtvā pauruṣam yā śrīḥ kim tayā alasa bhāgyayā

original: MSS_0109-2 kuraṅgo'pi samaśnāti daivādupanataṃ tṛṇam //
analyzed: kuraṅgā upi samaśnāti daivāt upanatam tṛṇam

original: MSS_0110-1 akṛtvā mānuṣaṃ karma yo daivamanuvartate /
analyzed: a kṛtvā mānuṣam karma yaḥ daivam anuvartate

original: MSS_0110-2 vṛthā śrāmyati saṃprāpya patiṃ klībamivāṅganā //
analyzed: vṛthā śrāmyati saṃprāpya patim klībam iva aṅganā

original: MSS_0111-1 akṛtvā helayā pādam uccairmūrdhasu vidviṣām /
analyzed: a kṛtvā helayā pādam uccais mūrdhasu vidviṣām

original: MSS_0111-2 kathaṃkāramanālambā kīrtirdyāmadhirohati //
analyzed: kathaṃkāram anālambā kīrtiḥ dyām adhirohati

original: MSS_0112-1 akṛpaṇamaśaṭhamacapalaṃ yoginamaviṣādinaṃ budhaṃ śūram /
analyzed: a kṛpaṇam a śaṭham a capalam yoginam a viṣādinam budham śūram

original: MSS_0112-2 yadi nāśrayati naraṃ śrīḥ śrīreva hi vañcitā bhavati //
analyzed: yadi nā āśrayati naram śrīḥ śrīḥ eva hi vañcitā bhavati

original: MSS_0113-1 akṛśaṃ kucayoḥ kṛśaṃ valagne vitataṃ cakṣuṣi vistṛtaṃ nitambe /
analyzed: akṛśam kucayoḥ kṛśam valagne vitatam cakṣuṣi vistṛtam nitambe

original: MSS_0113-2 aruṇādharamāvirastu citte karuṇāśāli kapālibhāgadheyam //
analyzed: aruṇa adharam āvirastu citte karuṇā śāli kapāli bhāgadheyam

original: MSS_0114-1 akṛśaṃ nitambabhāge kṣāmaṃ madhye samunnataṃ kucayoḥ /
analyzed: akṛśam nitamba bhāge kṣāmam madhye samunnatam kucayoḥ

original: MSS_0114-2 atyāyataṃ nayanayor mama jīvitametadāyāti //
analyzed: atyāyatam nayanayoḥ mama jīvitam etat āyāti

original: MSS_0115-1 akṛṣṭaphalamūlena vanavāsarataḥ sadā /
analyzed: a kṛṣṭa phala mūlena vana vāsa rataḥ sadā

original: MSS_0115-2 kurute'harahaḥ śrāddham ṛṣirvipraḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: kuruta iharahar śrāddham ṛṣiḥ vipraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: MSS_0116-1 akekī kiṃ kekī vacasi caturaḥ kinna kuraraḥ śukaḥ kiṃvā mūkaḥ sa ca kalaravaḥ kiṃ kṣataravaḥ /
analyzed: akekī kim kekī vacasi caturaḥ kim na kuraraḥ śukaḥ kiṃvā mūkaḥ sa ca kalaravaḥ kim kṣata ravaḥ

original: MSS_0116-2 tvayāgaṇyaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pikamadhurimā dhīragarimā yato labdhaḥ stabdhaḥ kimasi ruciraṃ neha suciram //
analyzed: tvayā agaṇyaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pika madhurimā dhīra garimā yatas labdhaḥ stabdhaḥ kim asi ruciram na iha su ciram

original: MSS_0117-1 akausumī manmathacāpayaśṭi- ranaṃśukā vibhramavaijayantī /
MSS_0117-2 lalāṭaraṅgāṅgaṇanartakīyam anañjanā bhrūranuyāti dṛṣṭam //
analyzed: lalāṭa raṅga aṅgaṇa nartakī iyam anañjanā bhrūḥ anuyāti dṛṣṭam

original: MSS_0118-1 akratvaṅgamatastakraṃ na śatakratunā hutam /
analyzed: a kratu aṅgam atas takram na śatakratunā hutam

original: MSS_0118-2 nādattamiti vākyārthāt takraṃ śakrasya durlabham //
analyzed: na adattam iti vākya arthāt takram śakrasya durlabham

original: MSS_0119-1 akratvarthamiti jñātvā śakre na hutavān purā /
analyzed: a kratu artham iti jñātvā śakre na hutavān purā

original: MSS_0119-2 nādattamiti śāstrārthāt takraṃ śakrasya durlabham //
analyzed: na a dattam iti śāstra arthāt takram śakrasya durlabham

original: MSS_0120-1 akrameṇānupāyena karmārambho na sidhyati /
analyzed: akrameṇa anupāyena karma ārambhaḥ na sidhyati

original: MSS_0120-2 dadhisarpiḥpayāṃsīva śabarasya yathā hi goḥ //
analyzed: dadhi sarpiḥ payāṃsi iva śabarasya yathā hi goḥ

original: MSS_0121-1 akrodhaṃ śikṣayantyanyaiḥ krodhanā ye tapodhanāḥ /
analyzed: akrodham śikṣayanti anyaiḥ krodhanāḥ ye tapodhanāḥ

original: MSS_0121-2 nirdhanāste dhanāyaiva dhātuvādopadeśinaḥ //
analyzed: nirdhanāḥ te dhanāya eva dhātuvāda upadeśinaḥ

original: MSS_0122-1 akrodhanaḥ krodhanebhyo viśiṣṭas tathā titikṣuratitikṣorviśiṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: akrodhanaḥ krodhanebhyaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ tathā titikṣuḥ atitikṣoḥ viśiṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_0122-2 amānuṣebhyomānuṣāśca pradhānā vidvāṃstathaivāviduṣaḥ pradhānaḥ //
analyzed: amānuṣebhyaḥ mānuṣāḥ ca pradhānāḥ vidvān tathā eva a viduṣaḥ pradhānaḥ

original: MSS_0123-1 akrodhanaḥ satyavādī bhūtānāmavihiṃsakaḥ /
analyzed: akrodhanaḥ satya vādī bhūtānām avihiṃsakaḥ

original: MSS_0123-2 anasūyaḥ sadācāro dīrghamāyuravāpnuyāt //
analyzed: anasūyaḥ sat ācāraḥ dīrgham āyuḥ avāpnuyāt

original: MSS_0124-1 akrodhanaśca rājendra satyaśīlo dṛḍhavrataḥ /
analyzed: akrodhanaḥ ca rāja indra satya śīlaḥ dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: MSS_0124-2 ātmopamaśca bhūteṣu sa tīrthaphalamaśnute //
analyzed: ātma upamaḥ ca bhūteṣu sa tīrtha phalam aśnute

original: MSS_0125-1 akrodhavairāgyajitendriyatvaṃ kṣamādayāśāntijanapriyatvam /
analyzed: akrodha vairāgya jita indriya tvam kṣamā dayā śānti jana priya tvam

original: MSS_0125-2 nirlobhadātā bhayaśokahārī jñānasya cihnaṃ bhayalakṣaṇāni //
analyzed: nirlobha dātā bhaya śoka hārī jñānasya cihnam bhaya lakṣaṇāni

original: MSS_0126-1 akrodhasya yadā krodhaḥ sarvanāśāya kalpate /
analyzed: akrodhasya yadā krodhaḥ sarva nāśāya kalpate

original: MSS_0126-2 rāghavasya prakopena baddho nadanadīpatiḥ //
analyzed: rāghavasya prakopena baddhaḥ nadanadīpatiḥ

original: MSS_0127-1 akrodhena jayet krodham asādhuṃ sādhunā jayet /
analyzed: akrodhena jayet krodham asādhum sādhunā jayet

original: MSS_0127-2 jayet kadaryaṃ dānena jayet satyena cānṛtam //
analyzed: jayet kadaryam dānena jayet satyena ca anṛtam

original: MSS_0128-1 aklāntadyutibhirvasantakusumairuttaṃsayan kuntalān antaḥ khelati khañjarīṭanayane kuñjeṣu kañjekṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: a klānta dyutibhiḥ vasanta kusumaiḥ uttaṃsayan kuntalān antar khelati khañjarīṭa nayane kuñjeṣu kañja īkṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_0128-2 asmanmandirakarmatastava karau nādyāpi viśrāmyataḥ kiṃ brūmo rasikāgraṇīrasi ghaṭī neyaṃ vilambakṣamā //
analyzed: asmad mandira karmataḥ tava karau na adya api viśrāmyataḥ kim brūmaḥ ghaṭī nā iyam vilamba kṣamā

original: MSS_0129-1 akliṣṭabālatarupallavalobhanīyaṃ pītaṃ mayā sadayameva ratotsaveṣu /
analyzed: akliṣṭa bāla taru pallava lobhanīyam pītam mayā sa dayam eva rata utsaveṣu

original: MSS_0129-2 bimbādharaṃ daśasi ced bhramara priyāyās tvāṃ kārayāmi kamalodarabandhanastham //
analyzed: bimba adharam daśasi ced bhramara priyāyāḥ tvām kārayāmi kamala udara bandhana stham

original: MSS_0130-1 akleśādiva cintitam upatiṣṭhati siddhameva puṇyavatām /
analyzed: akleśāt iva cintitam upatiṣṭhati siddham eva puṇyavatām

original: MSS_0130-2 uḍḍīyāpuṇyavatāṃ gacchanti kapotakāḥ paśya //
analyzed: uḍḍīya apuṇyavatām gacchanti kapotakāḥ paśya

original: MSS_0131-1 akṣatrārikṛtābhimanyunidhanaprodbhūtatīvrabhruvaḥ pārthasyākṛta śātravapratikṛterantaḥ śucā muhyataḥ /
analyzed: akṣatrāri kṛta abhimanyu nidhana prodbhūta tīvra bhruvaḥ pārthasya a kṛta śātrava pratikṛteḥ antar śucā muhyataḥ

original: MSS_0131-2 kīrṇā bāṣpakaṇaiḥ patanti dhanuṣi vrīḍājaḍā dṛṣṭayo hā vatseti giraḥ sphuranti na punarniryānti vaktrādbahiḥ //
analyzed: kīrṇāḥ bāṣpa kaṇaiḥ patanti dhanuṣi vrīḍā jaḍāḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ hā vatsa iti giraḥ sphuranti na punar niryānti vaktrāt bahis

original: MSS_0132-1 akṣadevanapaṇīkṛtedhare kāntayorjayaparājaye sati /
analyzed: akṣa devana paṇīkṛtedhare kāntayoḥ jaya parājaye sati

original: MSS_0132-2 atra vaktu yadi vetti manmathaḥ kastayorjayati jīyate'pi vā //
analyzed: atra vetti manmathaḥ kaḥ tayoḥ jayati jīyate api vā

original: MSS_0133-1 akṣadyūtajitādharagrahavidhāvīśo'si tatkhaṇḍanā- dādhikye vada ko bhavāniti mṛṣā kopāñcitabhrū latam /
analyzed: akṣa dyūta jita adhara graha vidhau īśaḥ usi tad khaṇḍanā dādhikye vada kaḥ bhavān iti mṛṣā kopa āñcita bhrū latam

original: MSS_0133-2 svidyatkhinnakarā /
analyzed: svidyat khinna karā

original: grakuḍma/
analyzed: gra kuḍma

original: laparāyattīkṛtāsyasya me mugdhākṣīpratikṛtya tat kṛtavatī dyūte'pi yannārjitam //
analyzed: lapa rāyattīkṛta āsyasya me mugdhākṣī pratikṛtya tat kṛtavatī dyūte pi yat nā arjitam

original: MSS_0134-1 akṣamaḥ kṣamatāmāno kriyāyāṃ yaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: akṣamaḥ kriyāyām yaḥ pravartate

original: MSS_0134-2 sa hi hāsyāspadatvaṃ ca labhate prāṇasaṃśayam //
analyzed: sa hi hāsya āspada tvam ca labhate prāṇa saṃśayam

original: MSS_0135-1 akṣamālāpavṛttijñā kuśāsanaparigrahā /
analyzed: akṣamālāpa vṛtti jñā kuśa āsana parigrahā

original: MSS_0135-2 brāhmīva daurjanī saṃsad vandanīyā samekhalā //
analyzed: brāhmī iva daurjanī saṃsad vandanīyā sa mekhalā

original: MSS_0136-1 akṣamā hrīparityāgaḥ śrīnāśo dharmasaṃkṣayaḥ /
analyzed: akṣamā hrī parityāgaḥ śrī nāśaḥ dharma saṃkṣayaḥ

original: MSS_0136-2 abhidhyāprājñatā caiva sarvaṃ lobhāt pravartate //
analyzed: abhidhyā prājña tā ca eva sarvam lobhāt pravartate

original: MSS_0137-1 akṣamo'satyasaṃdhaśca paradārī nṛśaṃsakṛt /
analyzed: akṣamaḥ u satya saṃdhaḥ ca para dārī nṛśaṃsa kṛt

original: MSS_0137-2 pacyate narakeṣveva dahyamānaḥ svakarmaṇā //
analyzed: pacyate narakeṣu eva dahyamānaḥ sva karmaṇā

original: MSS_0138-1 akṣaradvayamabhyastaṃ nāsti nāstīti yat purā /
analyzed: akṣara dvayam abhyastam na asti na asti iti yat purā

original: MSS_0138-2 tadidaṃ dehi dehīti viparītamupasthitam //
analyzed: tat idam dehi dehi iti viparītam upasthitam

original: MSS_0139-1 akṣaramaitrībhājaḥ sālaṃkārasya cāruvṛttasya /
analyzed: akṣara maitrī bhājaḥ sa alaṃkārasya cāru vṛttasya

original: MSS_0139-2 kiṃ brūmo sakhi yūno na hi na hi sakhi padyabandhasya //
analyzed: kim sakhi yūnaḥ na hi na hi sakhi padyabandhasya

original: MSS_0140-1 akṣarāṇāmakāro'ham iti viṣṇuḥ svayaṃ bruvan /
analyzed: iti viṣṇuḥ svayam bruvan

original: MSS_0140-2 bhavatā so'pi yat satyam ākāreṇa laghūkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: bhavatā saḥ upi yat satyam ākāreṇa laghūkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_0141-1 akṣarāṇi parīkṣyantām ambarāḍambareṇa kim /
analyzed: akṣarāṇi parīkṣyantām ambara āḍambareṇa kim

original: MSS_0141-2 śaṃbhurambarahīno'pi sarvajñaḥ kiṃ na jāyate //
analyzed: śaṃbhuḥ ambara hīnaḥ api sarvajñaḥ kim na jāyate

original: MSS_0142-1 akṣarāṇi vicitrāṇi yena jānanti mānavāḥ /
analyzed: akṣarāṇi vicitrāṇi yena jānanti mānavāḥ

original: MSS_0142-2 balīvardasamāste tu khuraśṛṅgavivarjitāḥ //
analyzed: balīvarda samāḥ te tu khura śṛṅga vivarjitāḥ

original: MSS_0143-1 akṣarāṇi samānāni vartulāni ghanāni ca /
analyzed: akṣarāṇi samānāni vartulāni ghanāni ca

original: MSS_0143-2 parasparavilagnāni taruṇīkucakumbhavat //
analyzed: paraspara vilagnāni taruṇī kuca kumbha vat

original: MSS_0144-1 akṣipakṣma kadā luptaṃ chidyante hi śiroruhāḥ /
analyzed: akṣi pakṣma kadā luptam chidyante hi śiroruhāḥ

original: MSS_0144-2 vardhamānātmanāmeva bhavanti hi vipattayaḥ //
analyzed: vardhamāna ātmanām eva bhavanti hi vipattayaḥ

original: MSS_0145-1 akṣibhyāṃ kṛṣṇaśārābhyām asyāḥ karṇau na bādhitau /
analyzed: akṣibhyām kṛṣṇa śārābhyām asyāḥ karṇau na bādhitau

original: MSS_0145-2 śaṅke kanakatāḍaṅkapāśatrāsavaśādiva //
analyzed: śaṅke kanaka tāḍaṅka pāśa trāsa vaśāt iva

original: MSS_0146-1 akṣīṇakarmabandhastu jñātvā mṛtyumupasthitam /
analyzed: akṣīṇa karma bandhaḥ tu jñātvā mṛtyum upasthitam

original: MSS_0146-2 uktvāntikāle saṃsmṛtya punaryogitvamṛcchati //
analyzed: uktvā anti kāle saṃsmṛtya punar yogi tvam ṛcchati

original: MSS_0147-1 akṣīṇabhogādviṣamād iṣṭāniṣṭabhayojjhitāt /
analyzed: akṣīṇa bhogāt viṣamāt iṣṭa aniṣṭa bhaya ujjhitāt

original: MSS_0147-2 durjanādvata devā apy aśaktā iva bibhyati //
analyzed: durjanāt vata devāḥ api aśaktāḥ iva bibhyati

original: MSS_0148-1 akṣetre bījamutsṛṣṭam antareva vinaśyati /
analyzed: akṣetre bījam utsṛṣṭam antar eva vinaśyati

original: MSS_0148-2 abījakamapi kṣetraṃ kevalaṃ sthaṇḍilaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: abījakam api kṣetram kevalam sthaṇḍilam bhavet

original: MSS_0149-1 akṣeṣu mṛgayāyāṃ ca strīṣu pāne vṛthāṭane /
analyzed: akṣeṣu mṛgayāyām ca strīṣu pāne vṛthak aṭane

original: MSS_0149-2 nidrāyāṃ ca nibandhena kṣipraṃ naśyati bhūpatiḥ //
analyzed: nidrāyām ca nibandhena kṣipram naśyati bhūpatiḥ

original: MSS_0150-1 akṣeṣviyaṃ vyasanitā hṛdaye yadete rāgo ghano madhumadotkaṭamānanaṃ ca /
analyzed: akṣeṣu iyam vyasani tā hṛdaye yat ete rāgaḥ ghanaḥ madhu mada utkaṭam ānanam ca

original: MSS_0150-2 padmastathāpi paramāspadameva lakṣmyās taddainyameva kila durbhagatā yadebhiḥ //
analyzed: padmaḥ tathā api parama āspadam eva lakṣmyāḥ tat dainyam eva kila durbhaga tā yat ebhiḥ

original: MSS_0151-1 akṣoṭhaśuṇṭhimaricārdrakadāḍimatvak kustumburūlavaṇatailasusaṃskṛtān yaḥ /
analyzed: akṣoṭha śuṇṭhi marica ārdraka dāḍima tvac kustumburū lavaṇa taila susaṃskṛtān yaḥ

original: MSS_0151-2 matsyān suśītasitabhaktatale dadhāti sa brahmalokamadhigacchati puṇyakarmā //
analyzed: matsyān su śīta sita bhakta tale dadhāti sa brahma lokam adhigacchati puṇya karmā

original: MSS_0152-1 akṣaure'pi ca nakṣatre kurvīta budhasomayoḥ /
analyzed: a kṣaure api ca nakṣatre kurvīta budha somayoḥ

original: MSS_0152-2 yukte'pi tithinakṣatre na kuryācchanibhaumayoḥ //
analyzed: yukte api tithi nakṣatre na kuryāt śani bhaumayoḥ

original: MSS_0153-1 akṣauhiṇī ripuṃ hanyāt svayaṃ vā tena hanyate /
analyzed: akṣauhiṇī ripum hanyāt svayam vā tena hanyate

original: MSS_0153-2 brāhmaṇo mantraviddhanyāt sarvāneva ripūn kṣaṇāt //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ mantra vid hanyāt sarvān eva ripūn kṣaṇāt

original: MSS_0154-1 akṣṇornikṣipadañjanaṃ śravaṇayostāpiñchagucchāvalīṃ mūrdhni śyāmasarojadāma kucayoḥ kastūrikāpatrakam /
analyzed: akṣṇoḥ nikṣipat añjanam śravaṇayoḥ tāpiñcha guccha āvalīm mūrdhni śyāma saroja dāma kucayoḥ kastūrikā patrakam

original: MSS_0154-2 dhūrtānāmabhisārasaṃbhramajuṣāṃ viṣvaṅnikuñje sakhi dhvāntaṃ nīlanicolacāru sudṛśāṃ pratyaṅgamāliṅgati //
analyzed: dhūrtānām abhisāra saṃbhrama juṣām viṣvak nikuñje sakhi dhvāntam nīla nicola cāru su dṛśām prati aṅgam āliṅgati

original: MSS_0155-1 akṣṇormañjulamañjanaṃ caraṇayornīlāśmajau nūpurā- vaṅge nīlapaṭaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛgamadanyāsaḥ kapolasthale /
analyzed: akṣṇoḥ mañjulam añjanam caraṇayoḥ nīla aśma jau nūpurāḥ vaṅge nīla paṭaḥ sphuṭam mṛgamada nyāsaḥ kapola sthale

original: MSS_0155-2 yatprītyā pariśīlitaṃ paradṛśāṃ rodhāya tatsāṃprataṃ nepathyasya vidhāvapīdamasatījātasya jātaṃ tamaḥ //
analyzed: yad prītyā pariśīlitam para dṛśām rodhāya tat sāṃpratam nepathyasya vidhau api idam asatī jātasya jātam tamaḥ

original: MSS_0156-1 akṣṇoryugmaṃ vilokānmṛdutanuguṇatastarpayantī śarīraṃ divyāmodena vaktrādapagatamarutā nāsikāṃ cāruvācā /
analyzed: akṣṇoḥ yugmam vilokāt mṛdu tanu guṇataḥ tarpayantī śarīram divya āmodena vaktrāt apagata marutā nāsikām cāru vācā

original: MSS_0156-2 śrotradvaṃdvaṃ manojñādrasanamapi rasādarpayantī mukhābjaṃ yadvatpañcākṣasaukhyaṃ vitarati yuvatiḥ kāmināṃ nānyadevaṃ //
analyzed: śrotra dvaṃdvam manojñāt rasanam api rasāt arpayantī mukha abjam yadvat pañcākṣa saukhyam vitarati yuvatiḥ kāminām na anyat evam

original: MSS_0157-1 akṣṇorvipakṣa iti sānuśayaṃ lulāva nīlotpalaṃ yadabalā kalamasya goptrī /
analyzed: akṣṇoḥ vipakṣaḥ iti sa anuśayam lulāva nīlotpalam yat abalā kalamasya goptrī

original: MSS_0157-2 bhūyastadeva śirasāvahadunnatānāṃ vairaṃ virodhiṣu dṛḍhaṃ na parājiteṣu //
analyzed: bhūyas tat eva śirasā avahat unnatānām vairam virodhiṣu dṛḍham na parājiteṣu

original: MSS_0158-1 akhaṇḍamaṇḍalaḥ śrīmān paśyaiṣa pṛthivīpatiḥ /
analyzed: akhaṇḍa maṇḍalaḥ śrīmān paśya eṣa pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: MSS_0158-2 na niśākaravajjātu kalāvaikalyamāgataḥ //
analyzed: na niśākara vat jātu kalā vaikalyam āgataḥ

original: MSS_0159-1 akhaṇḍitaṃ ca kramukaṃ cūrṇam tu rasavarjitam /
MSS_0159-2 bhūmau nipatitaṃ patraṃ śakrasyāpi śriayaṃ haret //
analyzed: bhūmau nipatitam patram śakrasya api haret

original: MSS_0160-1 akhaṇḍitā śaktirathopamānaṃ na svīkṛtaṃ na cchalarītirasti /
analyzed: akhaṇḍitā śaktiḥ atha upamānam na svīkṛtam na chala rītiḥ asti

original: MSS_0160-2 aspṛṣṭasaṃdehaviparyayasya ko'yaṃ tava nyāyanaye niveśaḥ //
analyzed: a spṛṣṭa saṃdeha viparyayasya kaḥ yam tava nyāya naye niveśaḥ

original: MSS_0161-1 akharvaparvagarteṣu vicchinno yasya vāridhiḥ /
analyzed: akharva parva garteṣu vicchinnaḥ yasya vāridhiḥ

original: MSS_0161-2 sa eva hi muneḥ pāṇir adhastādvindhyabhūbhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eva hi muneḥ pāṇiḥ adhastāt vindhya bhūbhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_0162-1 akhilaṃ viduṣāmanāvilaṃ suhṛdā ca svahṛdā ca paśyatām /
analyzed: akhilam viduṣām anāvilam suhṛdā ca sva hṛdā ca paśyatām

original: MSS_0162-2 savidhe'pi nasūkṣmasākṣiṇī vadanālaṃkṛtimātramakṣiṇī //
analyzed: savidhe api na sūkṣma sākṣiṇī vadana alaṃkṛti mātra makṣiṇī

original: MSS_0163-1 akhileṣu vihaṃgeṣu hanta svacchandacāriṣu /
analyzed: akhileṣu vihaṃgeṣu hanta svacchanda cāriṣu

original: MSS_0163-2 śuka pañjarabandhaste madhurāṇāṃ girāṃ phalam //
analyzed: śuka pañjara bandhaḥ te madhurāṇām girām phalam

original: MSS_0164-1 agajānanapadmārkaṃ gajānanamaharniśam /
MSS_0164-2 anekadaṃ taṃ bhaktānām ekadantamupāsmahe //
analyzed: aneka dam tam bhaktānām ekadantam upāsmahe

original: MSS_0165-1 agaṇitaguṇena sundara kṛtvā cāritramapyudāsīnam /
analyzed: agaṇita guṇena sundara kṛtvā cāritram api udāsīnam

original: MSS_0165-2 bhavatānanyagatiḥ sā vihitāvartena taraṇiriva //
analyzed: bhavatā ananyagatiḥ sā vihitā āvartena taraṇiḥ iva

original: MSS_0166-1 agaṇitagururyācñālolaṃ padāntasadātithiḥ samayamavidan mugdhaḥ kālāsaho ratilampaṭaḥ /
analyzed: agaṇita guruḥ yācñā lolam padānta sadā atithiḥ samayam avidat mugdhaḥ kāla asahaḥ rati lampaṭaḥ

original: MSS_0166-2 kṛtakakupitaṃ hastāghātaṃ trapāruditaṃ haṭhā- daparigaṇayan lajjāyāṃ māṃ nimajjayati priyaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtaka kupitam hasta āghātam trapā ruditam haṭhāḥ lajjāyām mām nimajjayati priyaḥ

original: MSS_0167-1 agaṇitanijaśramāṇāṃ parakṛtye'bhyetya vartamānānām /
analyzed: a gaṇita nija śramāṇām para kṛtyebhyaḥ etya vartamānānām

original: MSS_0167-2 sujanaghanadinamaṇīnāṃ paropakārārthamajani janiḥ //
analyzed: su jana ghana dinamaṇīnām para upakāra artham ajani janiḥ

original: MSS_0168-1 agaṇitayaśasā tyakta- sthitinā kriyate'tha yākṛtajñena /
analyzed: a gaṇita yaśasā sthitinā

original: MSS_0168-2 snigdhe suhṛdi sarāge mitre tava vañcanā na yuktā sā //
analyzed: snigdhe suhṛdi sa rāge mitre tava vañcanā na yuktā sā

original: MSS_0169-1 agatitvamatiśraddhā jñānābhāsena tṛptatā /
analyzed: agati tvam ati śraddhā jñāna ābhāsena tṛpta tā

original: MSS_0169-2 trayaḥ śiṣyaguṇā hyete mūrkhācāryasya bhāgyajāḥ //
analyzed: trayaḥ śiṣya guṇāḥ hi ete mūrkha ācāryasya bhāgya jāḥ

original: MSS_0170-1 agatīnāṃ khalīkārād duḥkhaṃ naivopajāyate /
analyzed: agatīnām khalīkārāt duḥkham na eva upajāyate

original: MSS_0170-2 bhavantyaśokāḥ prāyeṇa sāṃkurāḥ pādatāḍitāḥ //
analyzed: bhavanti aśokāḥ prāyeṇa sa aṃkurāḥ pāda tāḍitāḥ

original: MSS_0171-1 agadaiḥ sarvasāmānyair vyantarāṇāṃ viṣaṃ haret /
analyzed: agadaiḥ sarva sāmānyaiḥ vyantarāṇām viṣam haret

original: MSS_0171-2 dhūpo devīsahāpicchakhaṇḍanaistadviṣāpahaḥ //
MSS_0172-1 agamyagamanāt prāyaḥ prāyaścittīyate janaḥ /
analyzed: agamya gamanāt prāyas prāyaścittīyate janaḥ

original: MSS_0172-2 agamyaṃ tvadyaśo yāti sarvatraiva ca pāvanam //
analyzed: agamyam tvad yaśaḥ yāti sarvatra eva ca pāvanam

original: MSS_0173-1 agamyāni pumān yāti yo'sevyāṃśca niṣevate /
analyzed: agamyāni pumān yāti yaḥ sevyān ca niṣevate

original: MSS_0173-2 sa mṛtyumupagṛhṇāti garbhamaśvatarī yathā //
analyzed: sa mṛtyum upagṛhṇāti garbham aśvatarī yathā

original: MSS_0174-1 agamyārthaṃ tṛṇaprāṇāḥ pṛṣṭhasthīkṛtabhīhriyaḥ /
analyzed: agamyā artham tṛṇa prāṇāḥ pṛṣṭha sthīkṛta bhī hriyaḥ

original: MSS_0174-2 śambhalībhuktasarvasvā janā yatpāripārśvikāḥ //
analyzed: śambhalī bhukta sarva svāḥ janāḥ yad pāripārśvikāḥ

original: MSS_0175-1 agamyo mantrāṇāṃ prakṛtibhiṣajāmapyaviṣayaḥ sudhāsārāsādhyo visadṛśatarārambhagahanaḥ /
analyzed: agamyaḥ mantrāṇām prakṛti bhiṣajām api aviṣayaḥ sudhā sāra asādhyaḥ visadṛśatara ārambha gahanaḥ

original: MSS_0175-2 jagadbhrāmīkartuṃ pariṇatadhiyānena vidhinā sphuṭaṃ sṛṣṭo vyādhiḥ prakṛtiviṣamo durjanajanaḥ //
analyzed: jagat bhrāmīkartum pariṇata dhiyā anena vidhinā sphuṭam sṛṣṭaḥ vyādhiḥ prakṛti viṣamaḥ durjana janaḥ

original: MSS_0176-1 agastitulyāśca ghṛtābdhiśoṣaṇe dambholitulyā vaṭakādribhedane /
analyzed: agasti tulyāḥ ca ghṛta abdhi śoṣaṇe dambholi tulyāḥ vaṭaka adri bhedane

original: MSS_0176-2 śākāvalīkānanavahnirūpās ta eva bhaṭṭā itare bhaṭāśca //
analyzed: śāka āvalī kānana vahni rūpāḥ te eva bhaṭṭāḥ itare bhaṭāḥ ca

original: MSS_0177-1 agastihastaculukamite'bdhau vāhanākṛtau /
analyzed: agasti hasta culuka mita ibdhau vāhana ākṛtau

original: MSS_0177-2 magnaḥ samudro velāyām iti devāstadā jaguḥ //
analyzed: magnaḥ samudraḥ velāyām iti devāḥ tadā jaguḥ

original: MSS_0178-1 agastya iva yasyāsir nyañcitakṣitibhṛdbabhau /
analyzed: agastyaḥ iva yasya asiḥ nyañcita kṣitibhṛt babhau

original: MSS_0178-2 citraṃ so'pyakaronnṛtyat kabandhaṃ samarārṇavam //
analyzed: citram saḥ api akarot nṛtyat kabandham samara arṇavam

original: MSS_0179-1 agastyasya muneḥ śāpād brahmasyandanamāsthitaḥ /
analyzed: agastyasya muneḥ śāpāt brahmasyandanam āsthitaḥ

original: MSS_0179-2 mahāsukhāt paribhraṣṭo nahuṣaḥ sarpatāṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: mahā sukhāt paribhraṣṭaḥ nahuṣaḥ sarpa tām gataḥ

original: MSS_0180-1 agastyena payorāśeḥ kiyat kiṃ pītamujjhitam /
analyzed: agastyena payorāśeḥ kiyat kim pītam ujjhitam

original: MSS_0180-2 tvayā vairikulaṃ vīra samare kīdṛśaṃ kṛtam //
analyzed: tvayā vairi kulam vīra samare kīdṛśam kṛtam

original: MSS_0181-1 agā gāṅgāṅgakākākagāhakāghakakākahā /
analyzed: agā

original: MSS_0181-2 ahāhāṅka khagāṅkāgakaṅkāgakhagakākaka //
analyzed: aha aha aṅka khaga aṅka aga kaṅka aga khaga kākaka

original: MSS_0182-1 agādhajalasaṃcārī vikārī na ca rohitaḥ /
analyzed: agādha jala saṃcārī vikārī na ca rohitaḥ

original: MSS_0182-2 gaṇḍūṣajalamātre tu śapharī pharpharāyate //
analyzed: gaṇḍūṣa jala mātre tu śapharī pharpharāyate

original: MSS_0183-1 agādhahṛdayā bhūpāḥ kūpā iva durāsadāḥ /
analyzed: agādha hṛdayāḥ bhūpāḥ kūpāḥ iva durāsadāḥ

original: MSS_0183-2 ghaṭakā guṇino no cet kathaṃ labhyeta jīvanam //
analyzed: ghaṭakāḥ guṇinaḥ no ced katham labhyeta jīvanam

original: MSS_0184-1 agādhenāpi kiṃ tena toyena lavaṇāmbudheḥ /
analyzed: agādhena api kim tena toyena lavaṇa ambudheḥ

original: MSS_0184-2 janumātraṃ varaṃ vāri tṛṣṇācchedakaraṃ nṛṇām //
analyzed: janu mātram varam vāri tṛṣṇā cheda karam nṛṇām

original: MSS_0185-1 agāre'smin kānte giriśamaniśānāthaśakalaṃ bhujaṃgānuttuṅgān sakalamapi vātāyanapathe /
analyzed: agāre ismin kānte giriśam aniśānātha śakalam bhujaṃgān uttuṅgān sakalam api vātāyana pathe

original: MSS_0185-2 nikuñjeṣu śyenānadhigṛhaśiro rāhuvalayaṃ likhantyā nīyante śiva śiva tayā hanta divasāḥ //
analyzed: nikuñjeṣu śyena an adhi gṛha śiraḥ rāhu valayam likhantyā nīyante śiva śiva tayā hanta divasāḥ

original: MSS_0186-1 aguṇakaṇo guṇarāśir dvayamapi daivena khalamukhe patitam /
analyzed: aguṇa kaṇaḥ guṇa rāśiḥ dvayam api daivena khala mukhe patitam

original: MSS_0186-2 prasarati tailamivaikaḥ salile ghṛtavajjaḍatvametyanyaḥ //
analyzed: prasarati tailam iva ekaḥ salile ghṛta vat jaḍa tvam eti anyaḥ

original: MSS_0187-1 agururiti vadatu loko gauravamatraiva punarahaṃ manye /
analyzed: aguruḥ iti vadatu lokaḥ gauravam atra eva punar aham manye

original: MSS_0187-2 darśitaguṇaikavṛttir yasya jane janitadāhe'pi //
analyzed: darśita guṇa eka vṛttiḥ yasya jane janita dāha ipi

original: MSS_0188-1 agurusurabhidhūpāśobhitaṃ keśapāśaṃ galitakusumamālaṃ dhunvatī kuñcitāgram /
analyzed: aguru surabhi dhūpa āśobhitam keśapāśam galita kusuma mālam dhunvatī kuñcita agram

original: MSS_0188-2 tyajati gurunitambā nimnanābhiḥ sumadhyāpy uṣasi śayanavāsaḥ kāminī kāmaśobhā //
analyzed: tyajati guru nitambā nimna nābhiḥ sumadhyā api uṣasi śayana vāsaḥ kāminī kāma śobhā

original: MSS_0189-1 agurorapi sata uccaiḥ praśaṃsanaṃ tadguṇā vitanvanti /
analyzed: a guroḥ api sataḥ uccais praśaṃsanam tad guṇāḥ vitanvanti

original: MSS_0189-2 agururjvalane'pyastaḥ saurabhamiṣato guṇān vamati //
analyzed: aguruḥ jvalana īpyaḥ taḥ saurabha miṣataḥ guṇān vamati

original: MSS_0190-1 agūḍhavibhavā yasya paurā rāṣṭravāsinaḥ /
analyzed: agūḍha vibhavāḥ yasya paurāḥ rāṣṭra vāsinaḥ

original: MSS_0190-2 nayāpanayavettāyaḥ sa rājā rājasattamaḥ //
analyzed: naya apanaya vettā ayaḥ sa rājā rāja sattamaḥ

original: MSS_0191-1 agūḍhahāsasphuṭadantakesaraṃ mukhaṃ svidetadvikasannu paṅkajam /
analyzed: agūḍha hāsa sphuṭa danta kesaram mukham svid etat vikasat nu paṅkajam

original: MSS_0191-2 iti pralīnāṃ nalinīvane sakhīṃ vidāmbabhūvuḥ sucireṇa yoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: iti pralīnām nalinī vane sakhīm su cireṇa yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_0192-1 agniṃ prāpya yathā sadyas tūlarāśirvinaśyati /
analyzed: agnim prāpya yathā sadyas tūla rāśiḥ vinaśyati

original: MSS_0192-2 tathā gaṅgājalenaiva sarvapāpaṃ vinaśyati //
analyzed: tathā gaṅgā jalena eva sarva pāpam vinaśyati

original: MSS_0193-1 agniṃ stokamivātmānaṃ saṃdhukṣayati yo naraḥ /
analyzed: agnim stokam iva ātmānam saṃdhukṣayati yaḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_0193-2 sa vardhamāno grasate mahāntamapi saṃcayam //
analyzed: sa vardhamānaḥ grasate mahāntam api saṃcayam

original: MSS_0194-1 agniḥ stoko vardhate cājyasikto bījaṃ caikaṃ bahusāhasrameti /
analyzed: agniḥ stokaḥ vardhate ca ājya siktaḥ bījam ca ekam bahu sāhasram eti

original: MSS_0194-2 kṣayodayau vipulau saṃniyamya tasmādalpaṃ nāvamanyeta vittam //
analyzed: kṣaya udayau vipulau saṃniyamya tasmāt alpam na avamanyeta vittam

original: MSS_0195-1 agnikuṇḍasamā nārī ghṛtakumbhasamo naraḥ /
analyzed: agnikuṇḍa samā nārī ghṛta kumbha samaḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_0195-2 saṃgamena parastrīṇāṃ kasya no calate manaḥ //
analyzed: saṃgamena para strīṇām kasya no calate manaḥ

original: MSS_0196-1 agnikumbhasamā nārī ghṛtakumbhasamo naraḥ /
analyzed: agni kumbha samā nārī ghṛta kumbha samaḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_0196-2 ubhayorapi saṃyogaḥ kasya viśvāsakārakaḥ //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ api saṃyogaḥ kasya viśvāsa kārakaḥ

original: MSS_0197-1 agnidāhe na me duḥkhaṃ chede na nikaṣe na vā /
analyzed: agni dāhe na me duḥkham chede na nikaṣe na vā

original: MSS_0197-2 yattadeva mahadduḥkhaṃ guñjayā saha tolanam //
analyzed: yat tat eva mahat duḥkham guñjayā saha tolanam

original: MSS_0198-1 agnido garadaścaiva śastrapāṇirdhanāpahaḥ /
analyzed: agnidaḥ garadaḥ ca eva śastra pāṇiḥ dhana apahaḥ

original: MSS_0198-2 kṣetradārāpahārī ca ṣaḍete hyātatāyinaḥ //
analyzed: kṣetra dāra apahārī ca ṣaṭ ete hi ātatāyinaḥ

original: MSS_0199-1 agninā bhasmanā caiva stambhena ca janena ca /
analyzed: agninā bhasmanā ca eva stambhena ca janena ca

original: MSS_0199-2 advāreṇaiva mārgeṇa paṅktitadoṣo na vidyate //
analyzed: advāreṇa eva mārgeṇa paṅktita doṣaḥ na vidyate

original: MSS_0200-1 agnirāpaḥ striyo mūrkhāḥ sarpā rājakulāni ca /
analyzed: agniḥ apaḥ striyaḥ mūrkhāḥ sarpāḥ rāja kulāni ca

original: MSS_0200-2 nityaṃ yatnena sevyāni sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ //
analyzed: nityam yatnena sevyāni sadyas prāṇa harāṇi ṣaḍ

original: MSS_0201-1 agnirgururdvijātīnāṃ varṇānāṃ pārthivo guruḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ guruḥ dvijātīnām varṇānām pārthivaḥ guruḥ

original: MSS_0201-2 kulastrīṇāṃ gururbhartā sarvasyābhyāgato guruḥ //
analyzed: kula strīṇām guruḥ bhartā sarvasya abhyāgataḥ guruḥ

original: MSS_0202-1 agnirdahati tāpena sūryo dahati raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ dahati tāpena sūryaḥ dahati raśmibhiḥ

original: MSS_0202-2 rājā dahati daṇḍena tapasā brāhmaṇo dahet //
analyzed: rājā dahati daṇḍena tapasā brāhmaṇaḥ dahet

original: MSS_0203-1 agnirdevo dvijātīnāṃ munīnāṃ hṛdi daivatam /
analyzed: agniḥ devaḥ dvijātīnām munīnām hṛdi daivatam

original: MSS_0203-2 pratimāsvalpabuddhīnāṃ sarvatra samadarśinaḥ //
analyzed: pratimāsu alpabuddhīnām sarvatra sama darśinaḥ

original: MSS_0204-1 agnirhi devatāḥ sarvāḥ sarvaṇaṃ ca tadātmakam /
analyzed: agniḥ hi devatāḥ sarvāḥ sarvaṇam ca tad ātmakam

original: MSS_0204-2 tasmāt suvarṇaṃ dadatā dattāḥ sarvāḥ sma devatāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt suvarṇam dadatā dattāḥ sarvāḥ sma devatāḥ

original: MSS_0205-1 agniṣṭomādibhiryajñair vividhairāptadakṣiṇaiḥ /
analyzed: agniṣṭoma ādibhiḥ yajñaiḥ vividhaiḥ āpta dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: MSS_0205-2 na tat phalamavāpnoti tīrthārthe gamanena yat //
analyzed: na tat phalam avāpnoti tīrtha arthe gamanena yat

original: MSS_0206-1 agniśtejo mahalloke gūḍhastiṣṭhati dāruṣu /
analyzed: agniḥ tejaḥ mahat loke gūḍhaḥ tiṣṭhati dāruṣu

original: MSS_0206-2 na copayuṅkte taddāru yāvanno dīpyate paraiḥ //
analyzed: na ca upayuṅkte tat dāru yāvat no dīpyate paraiḥ

original: MSS_0207-1 sa eva khalu dārubhyo yadā nirmathya dīpyate /
analyzed: saḥ eva khalu dārubhyaḥ yadā nirmathya dīpyate

original: MSS_0207-2 tadā tacca vanaṃ cānyan nirdahatyāśu tejasā //
analyzed: tadā tat ca vanam ca anyat nirdahati āśu tejasā

original: MSS_0208-1 evameva kule jātāḥ pāvakopamatejasaḥ /
analyzed: evam eva kule jātāḥ pāvaka upama tejasaḥ

original: MSS_0208-2 kṣamāvanto nirākārāḥ kāṣṭhe'gniriva śerate //
analyzed: kṣamāvantaḥ nirākārāḥ kāṣṭha igniḥ iva śerate

original: MSS_0209-1 agnihotraṃ gṛhaṃ kṣetraṃ garbhirṇīṃ vṛddhabālakau /
analyzed: agnihotram gṛham kṣetram garbhirṇīm vṛddha bālakau

original: MSS_0209-2 riktahastena nopeyād rājānaṃ devatāṃ gurum //
analyzed: rikta hastena na upeyāt rājānam devatām gurum

original: MSS_0210-1 agnihotraṃ trayo vedās tridaṇḍaṃ bhasmaguṇṭhanam /
analyzed: agnihotram trayaḥ vedāḥ tri daṇḍam bhasma guṇṭhanam

original: MSS_0210-2 buddhipauruṣahīnānāṃ jīviketi bṛhaspatiḥ //
analyzed: buddhi pauruṣa hīnānām jīvikā iti bṛhaspatiḥ

original: MSS_0211-1 agnihotraphalā vedāḥ śīlavṛttaphalaṃ śrutam /
analyzed: agnihotra phalāḥ vedāḥ śīla vṛtta phalam śrutam

original: MSS_0211-2 ratiputraphalā dārā dattabhuktaphalaṃ dhanam //
analyzed: rati putra phalāḥ dārāḥ datta bhukta phalam dhanam

original: MSS_0212-1 agnihotramadhītaṃ vā dānādyāścākhilāḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: agnihotram adhītam vā dāna ādyāḥ ca akhilāḥ kriyāḥ

original: MSS_0212-2 bhajante tasya vaiphalyaṃ yasya vākyamakāraṇam //
analyzed: bhajante tasya vaiphalyam yasya vākyam akāraṇam

original: MSS_0213-1 agnihotreṣu viprāṇāṃ hṛdi devo manīṣiṇām /
analyzed: agnihotreṣu viprāṇām hṛdi devaḥ manīṣiṇām

original: MSS_0213-2 pratimāsvalpabuddhīnāṃ sarvatra viditātmanām //
analyzed: pratimāsu alpabuddhīnām sarvatra vidita ātmanām

original: MSS_0214-1 agneryathā dāruviyogayogayor adṛṣṭato'nyatra nimittamasti /
analyzed: agneḥ yathā dāru viyoga yogayoḥ adṛṣṭataḥ nyatra nimittam asti

original: MSS_0214-2 evaṃ hi jantorapi durvibhāvyaḥ śarīrasaṃyogaviyogahetuḥ //
analyzed: evam hi jantoḥ api durvibhāvyaḥ śarīra saṃyoga viyoga hetuḥ

original: MSS_0215-1 agnau kriyāvatāṃ devo divi devo manīṣiṇām /
analyzed: agnau kriyāvatām devaḥ divi devaḥ manīṣiṇām

original: MSS_0215-2 pratimāsvalpabuddhīnāṃ yogināṃ hṛdaye hariḥ //
analyzed: pratimāsu alpabuddhīnām yoginām hṛdaye hariḥ

original: MSS_0216-1 agnau dagdhaṃ jale magnaṃ hṛtaṃ taskarapārthivaiḥ /
analyzed: agnau dagdham jale magnam hṛtam taskara pārthivaiḥ

original: MSS_0216-2 tatsarvaṃ dānamityāhur yadi klaibyaṃ na bhāṣate //
analyzed: tat sarvam dānam iti āhuḥ yadi klaibyam na bhāṣate

original: MSS_0217-1 agnau prāptaṃ pradhūyeta yathā tūlaṃ dvijottama /
analyzed: agnau prāptam pradhūyeta yathā tūlam dvijottama

original: MSS_0217-2 tathā gaṅgāvagāḍhasya sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pradhūyate //
analyzed: tathā gaṅgā avagāḍhasya sarvam pāpam pradhūyate

original: MSS_0218-1 agnau prāstaṃ tu puruṣaṃ karmānveti svayaṃkṛtam /
analyzed: agnau prāstam tu puruṣam karma anveti svayaṃkṛtam

original: MSS_0218-2 tasmāttu puruṣo yatnād dharmaṃ saṃcinuyācchanaiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt tu puruṣaḥ yatnāt dharmam saṃcinuyāt śanais

original: MSS_0219-1 agnau prāstāhutiḥ samyag ādityamupatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: agnau prāsta āhutiḥ samyak ādityam upatiṣṭhate

original: MSS_0219-2 ādityājjāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣr̥erannaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ //
analyzed: ādityāt jāyate vṛṣṭiḥ vṛṣreḥ annam tatas prajāḥ

original: MSS_0220-1 agnyākāraṃ kalayasi puraścakravākīva candraṃ baddhotkampaṃ śiśiramarutā dahyate padminīva /
analyzed: agni ākāram kalayasi puras cakravākī iva candram baddha utkampam śiśira marutā dahyate padminī iva

original: MSS_0220-2 prāṇān dhatse kathamapi balādgacchataḥ śalyatulyāṃs tat kenāsau sutanu janito māmmathaste vikāraḥ //
analyzed: prāṇān dhatse katham api balāt gacchataḥ śalya tulyān tat kena asau su tanu janitaḥ māmmathaḥ te vikāraḥ

original: MSS_0221-1 agnyādhānena yajñena kāṣāyeṇa jaṭājinaiḥ /
analyzed: agnyādhānena yajñena kāṣāyeṇa jaṭā ajinaiḥ

original: MSS_0221-2 lokān viśvāsayitvaiva tato lumpedyathā vṛkaḥ //
analyzed: lokān viśvāsayitvā eva tatas lumpet yathā vṛkaḥ

original: MSS_0222-1 agracchāyā tṛṇāgniśca nīcasevā paṭe jalam /
analyzed: agra chāyā tṛṇa agniḥ ca nīca sevā paṭe jalam

original: MSS_0222-2 veśyārāgaḥ khalaprema sarvaṃ budbudasannibham //
analyzed: veśyā rāgaḥ khala prema sarvam budbuda sannibham

original: MSS_0223-1 agrataḥ pṛṣṭhato madhye pārśvato'tha samantataḥ /
analyzed: agratas pṛṣṭhatas madhye pārśvatas utha samantataḥ

original: MSS_0223-2 vidyuccakitavadbhāti sūryakoṭisamaprabhaḥ //
analyzed: vidyut cakita vat bhāti sūrya koṭi sama prabhaḥ

original: MSS_0224-1 agrataścaturo vedān pṛṣṭhataḥ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ /
analyzed: agratas caturaḥ vedān pṛṣṭhatas sa śaram dhanuḥ

original: MSS_0224-2 ubhābhyāṃ ca samartho'haṃ śāpādapi śarādapi //
analyzed: ubhābhyām ca samarthaḥ ūham śāpāt api śarāt api

original: MSS_0225-1 agrato vāmapādaṃ ca dakṣiṇaṃ jātu kuñcitam /
analyzed: agratas vāma pādam ca dakṣiṇam jātu kuñcitam

original: MSS_0225-2 ālīḍhaṃ tu prakartavyaṃ hastadvayasavistaram //
analyzed: ālīḍham tu prakartavyam hasta dvaya sa vistaram

original: MSS_0226-1 agrasānuṣu nitāntapiśaṅgair bhūruhānmṛdukarairavalambya /
analyzed: agra sānuṣu nitānta piśaṅgaiḥ bhūruhān mṛdu karaiḥ avalambya

original: MSS_0226-2 astaśailagahanaṃ nu vivasvān āviveśa jaladhiṃ nu mahīṃ nu //
analyzed: asta śaila gahanam nu vivasvān āviveśa jaladhim nu mahīm nu

original: MSS_0227-1 agrāhyaṃ śravaṇasya bhūṣaṇamalaṃkāro na bhāvocitaḥ kaṇṭhasyāñjanamujjvalaṃ nayanayoḥ sūkṣmatvamāvekṣitum /
analyzed: agrāhyam śravaṇasya bhūṣaṇam alaṃkāraḥ na bhāva ucitaḥ kaṇṭhasya añjanam ujjvalam nayanayoḥ sūkṣma tvam āvekṣitum

original: MSS_0227-2 vaktrasya kṣaṇiko'dhivāsanavidhiḥ kānte priye nābhavas saubhāgyapratikarmanirmitamahāvidyaiva yenātmanaḥ //
analyzed: vaktrasya kṣaṇika ūdhivāsana vidhiḥ kānte priye nā abhavaḥ saubhāgya pratikarma nirmita mahā vidyā eva yena ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_0228-1 agrāhyā mūrdhajeṣvetāḥ striyo guṇasamanvitāḥ /
analyzed: agrāhyāḥ mūrdhajeṣu etāḥ striyaḥ guṇa samanvitāḥ

original: MSS_0228-2 na latāḥ pallavacchedam arhantyupavanodbhavāḥ //
analyzed: na latāḥ pallava chedam arhanti upavana udbhavāḥ

original: MSS_0229-1 agre kasyacidasti kaṃcidabhitaḥ kenāpi pṛṣṭe kṛtaḥ saṃsāraḥ śiśubhāvayauvanajarābhārāvatārādayam /
analyzed: agre kasyacid asti kaṃcid abhitas kena api pṛṣṭe kṛtaḥ saṃsāraḥ śiśu bhāva yauvana jarā bhāra avatārāt ayam

original: MSS_0229-2 bālastaṃ bahu manyatāmasulabhaṃ prāptaṃ yuvā sevatāṃ vṛddhastadviṣyādbahiṣkṛta iva vyāvṛtya kiṃ paśyati //
analyzed: bālaḥ tam bahu manyatām a sulabham prāptam yuvā sevatām vṛddhaḥ tat viṣyāt bahiṣkṛtaḥ iva vyāvṛtya kim paśyati

original: MSS_0230-1 agre kugrāmavargaḥ piśitarasalasaccaṇḍacaṇḍāyamānaḥ paścādvyādho vadhārtho niśitaśarakaraḥ pādamudrānapāyī /
analyzed: agre ku grāma vargaḥ piśita rasa lasat caṇḍacaṇḍāyamānaḥ paścāt vyādhaḥ vadha arthaḥ niśita śara karaḥ pāda mudrā anapāyī

original: MSS_0230-2 viṣvagdīpto vanāgnirvanamatigahanaṃ dhūmavātyā ca dṛṣṭeḥ saroddhī kāndiśīko hari hari hariṇaḥkaṃ śaraṇyaṃ prayātu //
analyzed: viṣvak dīptaḥ vana agniḥ vanam ati gahanam dhūma vātyā ca dṛṣṭeḥ hari hari śaraṇyam prayātu

original: MSS_0231-1 agre gacchata dhenudugdhakalaśānādāya gopyo gṛhaṃ dugdhe vaskayaṇīkule punariyaṃ rādhā śanairyāsyati /
analyzed: agre gacchata dhenu dugdha kalaśān ādāya gopyaḥ gṛham dugdhe vaskayaṇī kule punar iyam rādhā śanais yāsyati

original: MSS_0231-2 ityanyavyapadeśaguptahṛdayaḥ kurvan viviktaṃ vrajaṃ devaḥ kāraṇanandasūnuraśivaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa muṣṇātu vaḥ //
analyzed: iti anya vyapadeśa gupta hṛdayaḥ kurvan viviktam vrajam devaḥ kāraṇa nanda sūnuḥ aśivam kṛṣṇaḥ sa muṣṇātu vaḥ

original: MSS_0232-1 agre gītaṃ sarasakavayaḥ pārśvato dākṣiṇātyāḥ pṛṣṭhe līlāvalayaraṇitaṃ cāmaragrāhiṇīnām /
analyzed: agre gītam sarasa kavayaḥ pārśvatas dākṣiṇātyāḥ pṛṣṭhe līlā valaya raṇitam cāmara grāhiṇīnām

original: MSS_0232-2 yadyastyevaṃ kuru bhavarasāsvādane lampaṭatvaṃ no ceccetaḥ praviśa sahasā nirvikalpe samādhau //
analyzed: yadi asti evam kuru bhava rasa āsvādane lampaṭa tvam no ced cetaḥ praviśa sahasā nirvikalpe samādhau

original: MSS_0233-1 agre taptajalā nitāntaśiśirā mūle muhurbāhubhir vyāmathyoparataprapeṣu pathikairmārgeṣu madhyaṃdine /
analyzed: agre tapta jalāḥ nitānta śiśirāḥ mūle muhur bāhubhiḥ vyāmathya uparata prapeṣu pathikaiḥ mārgeṣu madhyaṃdine

original: MSS_0233-2 ādhārāḥ plutabālaśaivaladalacchedāvakīrṇormayaḥ pīyante halamuktamagnamahiṣaprakṣobhaparyāvilāḥ //
analyzed: ādhārāḥ pluta bāla śaivala dala cheda avakīrṇa ūrmayaḥ pīyante hala mukta magna mahiṣa prakṣobha paryāvilāḥ

original: MSS_0234-1 agre tiṣṭhati dāruṇākṛtirasau krodhoddhataḥ kesarī paścādudbhaṭadāvadūṣitadharāsaṃkrāntacaṇḍānilaḥ /
analyzed: agre tiṣṭhati dāruṇa ākṛtiḥ asau krodha uddhataḥ kesarī paścāt udbhaṭa dāva dūṣita dharā saṃkrānta caṇḍa anilaḥ

original: MSS_0234-2 kiṃ kurmaḥ sahasā vihāya kalabhānetān brajāmaḥ kathaṃ haṃho kūṇitalocaneti kariṇī cintākulā tābhyati //
analyzed: kim kurmaḥ sahasā vihāya kalabhān etān brajāmaḥ katham haṃho kūṇita locanā iti kariṇī cintā ākulā tābhyaḥ ati

original: MSS_0235-1 agre dhanuḥ śarakaraḥ svayamasti kāmaḥ paścāttvarā śaśadharodayasaṃśayotthā /
analyzed: agre dhanuḥ śara karaḥ svayam asti kāmaḥ paścāt tvarā śaśadhara udaya saṃśaya utthā

original: MSS_0235-2 dhvāntaṃ dināntavikasadvibhavaṃ samantāt kiṃ kevalā pathi vadhūrdayitābhisāre //
analyzed: dhvāntam dina anta vikasat vibhavam samantāt kim kevalā pathi vadhūḥ dayitā abhisāre

original: MSS_0236-1 agre prastutanāśānāṃ mūkatā paramo guṇaḥ /
analyzed: agre prastuta nāśānām mūka tā paramaḥ guṇaḥ

original: MSS_0236-2 tathāpi prabhubhaktānāṃ saudharmyādevamucyate //
analyzed: tathā api prabhu bhaktānām saudharmyāt evam ucyate

original: MSS_0237-1 yaireva stutibhiḥ svāmī prāpyate vyasanāvaṭam /
analyzed: yaiḥ eva stutibhiḥ svāmī prāpyate vyasana avaṭam

original: MSS_0237-2 paścānmūkatvamāpannair ḍaddharttuṃ naiva śakyate //
analyzed: paścāt mūka tvam āpannaiḥ ḍaddharttum nā eva śakyate

original: MSS_0238-1 agre māhiṣikaṃ dṛṣṭvā madhye tu vṛṣalīpatim /
analyzed: agre māhiṣikam dṛṣṭvā madhye tu vṛṣalī patim

original: MSS_0238-2 ante vārdhuṣikaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirāśāḥ pitaro gatāḥ //
analyzed: ante vārdhuṣikam dṛṣṭvā nirāśāḥ pitaraḥ gatāḥ

original: MSS_0239-1 agre yānti rathasya reṇuvadamī cūrṇībhavanto ghanāś cakrabhrāntirarāntareṣu janayatyanyāmivārāvalim /
analyzed: agre yānti rathasya reṇu vat amī cūrṇībhavantaḥ ghanāḥ cakra bhrāntiḥ ara antareṣu janayati anyām iva ārā āvalim

original: MSS_0239-2 citranyastamivācalaṃ hayaśirasyāyāmavaccāmaraṃ yaṣṭyagre ca samaṃ sthito dhvajapaṭaḥ prānte ca vegānilāt //
analyzed: citra nyastam iva acalam haya śirasi āyāmavat cāmaram yaṣṭi agre ca samam sthitaḥ dhvaja paṭaḥ prānte ca vega anilāt

original: MSS_0240-1 agre laghimā paścān mahatāpi pidhīyate na hi mahimnā /
analyzed: agre laghimā paścāt mahatā api pidhīyate na hi mahimnā

original: MSS_0240-2 vāmana iti trivikramam abhidadhati daśāvatāravidaḥ //
analyzed: vāmanaḥ iti trivikramam abhidadhati daśa avatāra vidaḥ

original: MSS_0241-1 agre vikīrṇakurabaka- phalajālakahīyamānasahakāram /
analyzed: agre vikīrṇa kurabaka phala jālaka hīyamāna sahakāram

original: MSS_0241-2 pariṇāmābhimukhamṛtor utsukayati yauvanaṃ cetaḥ //
analyzed: pariṇāma abhimukham ṛtoḥ utsukayati yauvanam cetaḥ

original: MSS_0242-1 agre vyādhaḥ karadhṛtaśaraḥ pārśvato jālamālā pṛṣṭe vahnirdahati nitarāṃ saṃnidhau sārameyāḥ /
analyzed: agre vyādhaḥ kara dhṛta śaraḥ pārśvatas jāla mālā pṛṣṭe vahniḥ dahati nitarām saṃnidhau sārameyāḥ

original: MSS_0242-2 eṇī garbhādalasagamanā bālakai ruddhapādā cintāviṣṭā vadati hi mṛgaṃ kiṃ karomi kva yāmiḥ //
analyzed: eṇī garbhāt alasa gamanā bālakaiḥ ruddha pādā cintā āviṣṭā vadati hi mṛgam kim karomi kva yāmiḥ

original: MSS_0243-1 agre śyāmalabindubaddhatilakairmadhye'pi pākānvaya- prauḍhībhūtapaṭolapāṭalatarairmūle manāgbabhrubhiḥ /
analyzed: agre śyāmala bindu baddha tilakaiḥ madhye api pāka anvaya prauḍhībhūta paṭola pāṭalataraiḥ mūle manāk babhrubhiḥ

original: MSS_0243-2 vṛnte karkaśakīrapiccaharibhiḥ sthūlaiḥ phalairbandhurāḥ saṃpratyutsukayanti kasya na manaḥ pūgadrumāṇāṃ chaṭāḥ //
analyzed: vṛnte karkaśa kīra picca haribhiḥ sthūlaiḥ phalaiḥ bandhurāḥ saṃpratyutsukayanti kasya na manaḥ pūga drumāṇām chaṭāḥ

original: MSS_0244-1 agresarī kumārī tatpṛṣṭe puṅkhago yadā tāraḥ /
analyzed: agresarī kumārī tad pṛṣṭe puṅkha gaḥ yadā tāraḥ

original: MSS_0244-2 siddhistadottamā syād dṛṣṭāpyādau varā durgā //
analyzed: siddhiḥ tadā uttamā syāt dṛṣṭā api ādau varā durgā

original: MSS_0245-1 agre strīnakhapāṭalaṃ kuravakaṃ śyāmaṃ dvayorbhāgayor bālāśokamupoḍharāgasubhagaṃ bhedonmukhaṃ tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: agre strī nakha pāṭalam kuravakam śyāmam dvayoḥ bhāgayoḥ bāla aśokam upoḍha rāga subhagam bheda unmukham tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_0245-2 īṣadbaddharajaḥkaṇāṃgrakapiśā cūte navā mañjarī mugdhatvasya ca yauvanasya ca sakhe madhye madhuśrīḥ sthitā //
analyzed: īṣat baddha rajaḥ kaṇā aṃgra kapiśā cūte navā mañjarī mugdha tvasya ca yauvanasya ca sakhe madhye madhu śrīḥ sthitā

original: MSS_0246-1 agryo muktimatāṃ prayogasamaye mantreṣu pṛṣṭhaṃ gataḥ pākāgāragatastu pācakamanastoṣāya vācaspatiḥ /
analyzed: agryaḥ muktimatām prayoga samaye mantreṣu pṛṣṭham gataḥ pākāgāra gataḥ tu pācaka manaḥ toṣāya vācaspatiḥ

original: MSS_0246-2 uccāyāṃ nirato rato'rthakagaṇe piṇḍeṣu dattādaro nānāśrāddhagaṇaikacālitamanā bhaddoṭṭamo rājate //
analyzed: uccāyām nirataḥ rata ūrthaka gaṇe piṇḍeṣu datta ādaraḥ nānā śrāddha gaṇa eka cālita manāḥ bhaddoṭṭamaḥ rājate

original: MSS_0247-1 aghaṃ sa kevalaṃ bhuṅkte yaḥ pacatyātmakāraṇāt /
analyzed: agham sa kevalam bhuṅkte yaḥ pacati ātma kāraṇāt

original: MSS_0247-2 yajñaśiṣṭāśanaṃ hyetat satāmannaṃ vidhīyate //
analyzed: yajña śiṣṭa aśanam hi etat satām annam vidhīyate

original: MSS_0248-1 aghaṭitaṃ ghaṭanāṃ nayati dhruvaṃ sughaṭitaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅguratācalam /
analyzed: aghaṭitam ghaṭanām nayati dhruvam su ghaṭitam kṣaṇa bhaṅgura tā acalam

original: MSS_0248-2 jagadidaṃ kurute sacarācaraṃ vidhiraho balavāniti me matiḥ //
analyzed: jagat idam kurute sacarācaram vidhiḥ aho balavān iti me matiḥ

original: MSS_0249-1 aghaṭitaghaṭitaṃ ghaṭayati sughaṭitaghaṭitāni jarjarīkurute /
analyzed: aghaṭita ghaṭitam ghaṭayati su ghaṭita ghaṭitāni jarjarīkurute

original: MSS_0249-2 vidhireva tāni ghaṭayati yāni pumānnaiva cintayati //
analyzed: vidhiḥ eva tāni ghaṭayati yāni pumān na eva cintayati

original: MSS_0250-1 aghṛṣṭamiva māṇikyam amattamiva ca dvipam /
analyzed: a ghṛṣṭam iva māṇikyam a mattam iva ca dvipam

original: MSS_0250-2 aśūraṃ pārthivaṃ loko jātyamapyavamanyate //
analyzed: a śūram pārthivam lokaḥ jātyam api avamanyate

original: MSS_0251-1 aṅkaṃ ke'pi śaśaṅkirejalanidheḥ paṅkaṃ pare menire sāraṅgaṃ katicicca saṃjagadire bhūmeśca bimbaṃ pare /
analyzed: aṅkam ke pi śaśaṅkire jalanidheḥ paṅkam pare menire sāraṅgam katicid ca saṃjagadire bhūmeḥ ca bimbam pare

original: MSS_0251-2 indau yaddalitendranīlaśakalaśyāmaṃ darīdṛśyate tanmanye ravibhītamandhatamasaṃ kukṣisthamālakṣyate //
analyzed: indau yat dalita indranīla śakala śyāmam darīdṛśyate tat manye ravi bhītam andhatamasam kukṣi stham ālakṣyate

original: MSS_0252-1 aṅkanilīnagajānana- śaṅkākulabāhuleyahṛtavasanau /
analyzed: aṅka nilīna gajānana śaṅkā ākula bāhuleya hṛta vasanau

original: MSS_0252-2 sasmitaharakarakalitau himagiritanayāstanau jayataḥ //
analyzed: sa smita hara kara kalitau himagiri tanayā stanau jayataḥ

original: MSS_0253-1 aṅkanyāsairviṣamair māyāvanitālakāvalīkuṭilaiḥ /
analyzed: aṅka nyāsaiḥ viṣamaiḥ māyā vanitā alaka āvalī kuṭilaiḥ

original: MSS_0253-2 ko nāma kāmacāraiḥ kāyasthairmohito na janaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ nāma kāmacāraiḥ kāyasthaiḥ mohitaḥ na janaḥ

original: MSS_0254-1 aṅkamallavinodeṣu tathānyeṣūtsavādiṣu /
analyzed: aṅka malla vinodeṣu tathā anyeṣu utsava ādiṣu

original: MSS_0254-2 antaḥpurapracāreṣu devapūjāpareṣu ca //
analyzed: antaḥpura pracāreṣu deva pūjā pareṣu ca

original: MSS_0255-1 aṅkādhiropitamṛgaś candramā mṛgalāñchanaḥ /
analyzed: aṅka adhiropita mṛgaḥ candramāḥ mṛga lāñchanaḥ

original: MSS_0255-2 kesarī niṣṭhurakṣiptamṛgayūtho mṛgādhipaḥ //
MSS_0256-1 aṅkurite pallavite korakite vikasite ca sahakāre /
analyzed: aṅkurite pallavite korakite vikasite ca sahakāre

original: MSS_0256-2 aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakito vikasitaśca madanaḥ //
analyzed: aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ vikasitaḥ ca madanaḥ

original: MSS_0257-1 aṅkekṛtvottamāṅgaṃ plavagabalapateḥ pādamakṣasya hantur datvotsaṅge salīlaṃ tvaci kanakamṛgasyāṅgaśeṣaṃ nidhāya /
analyzed: aṅke kṛtvā uttamāṅgam plavaga bala pateḥ pādam akṣasya hantuḥ da tvā utsaṅge sa līlam tvaci kanakamṛgasya aṅga śeṣam nidhāya

original: MSS_0257-2 bāṇaṃ rakṣaḥ kulaghanaṃ praguṇitamanujenādarāttīkṣṇamakṣṇaḥ koṇenāvekṣamāṇastvadanujavacane dattakarṇo'yamāste //
analyzed: bāṇam rakṣaḥ kula ghanam praguṇita manujena ādarāt tīkṣṇam akṣṇaḥ koṇena avekṣamāṇaḥ tvad anuja vacane datta karṇaḥ yam āste

original: MSS_0258-1 aṅke vṛddhimupāgataṃ śiśutayā sarvāṅgamāliṅgitaṃ matsyaḥ śrīparirambhanirbharataravyākośakoṣonmukhaiḥ /
analyzed: aṅke vṛddhim upāgatam śiśu tayā sarva aṅgam āliṅgitam matsyaḥ śrī parirambha nirbhara taravya ākośa koṣa unmukhaiḥ

original: MSS_0258-2 āśāptaiḥ paripīyamānamaniśaṃ niḥspandamindindirair dūrādeva nimeṣaśūnyanayanaḥ padmaṃ samudvīkṣate //
analyzed: āśā āptaiḥ paripīyamānam aniśam niḥspandam indindiraiḥ dūrāt eva nimeṣa śūnya nayanaḥ padmam samudvīkṣate

original: MSS_0259-1 aṅkeṣu śūnyavinyāsād vṛddhiḥ syāttu daśādhikā /
analyzed: aṅkeṣu śūnya vinyāsāt vṛddhiḥ syāt tu daśa adhikā

original: MSS_0259-2 tasmājjñeyā viśeṣeṇa aṅkānāṃ vāmato gatiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt jñeyā viśeṣeṇa aṅkānām vāmatas gatiḥ

original: MSS_0260-1 aṅkollakvāthatoyena miśritaṃ ghṛtamākṣikam /
MSS_0260-2 vasā kiṭikuṅgāṇām etaiḥ siktā mahīruhāḥ //
analyzed: vasā kiṭikuṅgāṇām etaiḥ siktāḥ mahīruhāḥ

original: MSS_0261-1 aṅkollakvathitaṃ svinnaṃ nṛmāṃsaṃ chāgadugdhayuk /
MSS_0261-2 piṇyākasahitaṃ mūle sahakārasya nikṣipet //
analyzed: piṇyāka sahitam mūle sahakārasya nikṣipet

original: MSS_0262-1 aṅkollatailabhāvitam uṣitaṃ gośakṛti kumudakandamalam /
analyzed: aṅkolla taila bhāvitam uṣitam go śakṛti kumuda kanda malam

original: MSS_0262-2 karakāmbukardamabhṛte kalaśe kusumaṃ samudvahati //
analyzed: karaka ambu kardama bhṛte kalaśe kusumam samudvahati

original: MSS_0263-1 aṅkollatailasūkara- śiśumāravasāsu bhāvitaṃ bījam /
analyzed: aṅkolla taila sūkara śiśumāra vasāsu bhāvitam bījam

original: MSS_0263-2 sadyo rohati nihitaṃ bhūmau karakāmbhasā siktam //
analyzed: sadyas rohati nihitam bhūmau karaka ambhasā siktam

original: MSS_0264-1 aṅkollapatradhapena yadvā keśasamanvitaiḥ /
analyzed: yat vā keśa samanvitaiḥ

original: MSS_0264-2 saktubhiḥ kaṭutailāktair yāti matsyaviṣaṃ kṣayam //
MSS_0265-1 aṅkollabījamajjānāṃ sūkṣmacūrṇaṃ vidhīyate /
MSS_0265-2 tilatailena taccūrṇaṃ samyakkṛtvā ca bhāvayet //
analyzed: tila tailena tat cūrṇam samyak kṛtvā ca bhāvayet

original: MSS_0266-1 aṅgaṃ galitaṃ palitaṃ muṇḍaṃ dantavihīnaṃ jātaṃ tuṇḍam /
analyzed: aṅgam galitam palitam muṇḍam danta vihīnam jātam tuṇḍam

original: MSS_0266-2 karadhṛtakampitaśobhitadaṇḍaṃ tadapi na muñcatyāśā piṇḍam //
analyzed: kara dhṛta kampita śobhita daṇḍam tat api na muñcati āśā piṇḍam

original: MSS_0267-1 aṅgaṃ candanapaṅkapaṅkajabisacchedāvalīnaṃ muhus tāpaḥ śāpa ivaiṣa śoṣaṇapaṭuḥ kampaḥ sakhīkampanaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgam candana paṅka paṅkaja bisa cheda avalīnam muhur tāpaḥ śāpaḥ iva eṣa śoṣaṇa paṭuḥ kampaḥ sakhī kampanaḥ

original: MSS_0267-2 śvāsāḥ saṃvṛtatārahārarucayaḥ saṃbhinnacīnāṃśukā jātaḥ prāgatidāhavedanamahārambhaḥ sa tasyā jvaraḥ //
analyzed: śvāsāḥ saṃvṛta tāra hāra rucayaḥ saṃbhinna cīna aṃśukāḥ jātaḥ prāc ati dāha vedana mahā ārambhaḥ sa tasyāḥ jvaraḥ

original: MSS_0268-1 aṅgaṃ candanapāṇḍu pallavamṛdustāmbūlatāmro'varo dhārāyantrajalābhiṣekakaluṣe dhautāñjane locane /
analyzed: aṅgam candana pāṇḍu pallava mṛduḥ tāmbūla tāmraḥ varaḥ dhārāyantra jala abhiṣeka kaluṣe dhauta añjane locane

original: MSS_0268-2 antaḥpuṣpasugandhirārdrakabarī svacchaṃ tanīyo'mbaraṃ kāntānāṃ kamanīyatāṃ bidadhate grīṣme'parāhṇagame //
analyzed: antar puṣpa sugandhiḥ ārdra kavarī svaccham tanīya umbaram kāntānām kamanīya tām vidadhate grīṣma iparāhṇa game

original: MSS_0269-1 aṅgaṃ dakṣiṇamāruhya vāmenottarati sphuṭam /
analyzed: aṅgam dakṣiṇam āruhya vāmena uttarati sphuṭam

original: MSS_0269-2 tadā hānikarī jñeyā vyatyayena tu lābhadā //
analyzed: tadā hāni karī jñeyā vyatyayena tu lābha dā

original: MSS_0270-1 aṅgaṃ damanapattrābhamaṅge yasmin pratīyate /
analyzed: aṅgam damana pattra ābham aṅge yasmin pratīyate

original: MSS_0270-2 vidyāddamanavajraṃ tu tīkṣṇadhāraṃ mahāguṇam //
analyzed: vidyāt damanavajram tu tīkṣṇa dhāram mahā guṇam

original: MSS_0271-1 aṅgaṃ pratīyate yatra bahugranthisamanvitam /
analyzed: aṅgam pratīyate yatra bahu granthi samanvitam

original: MSS_0271-2 durlabhaṃ tanmahāmūlyaṃ granthivajrakamucyate //
analyzed: durlabham tat mahā mūlyam granthivajrakam ucyate

original: MSS_0272-1 aṅgaṃ bhūṣaṇanikaro bhūṣayatītyeṣa laukiko vādaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgam bhūṣaṇa nikaraḥ bhūṣayati iti eṣa laukikaḥ vādaḥ

original: MSS_0272-2 aṅgāni bhūṣaṇānāṃ kāmapi suṣamāmajījanaṃstasyāḥ //
analyzed: aṅgāni bhūṣaṇānām kām api suṣamām ajījanan tasyāḥ

original: MSS_0273-1 aṅgaṃ yena rathīkṛtaṃ nayanayoryugmaṃ rathāṅgīkṛtaṃ patraṃ svaṃ rathakarmasāratthikṛtaṃ śvāsasturaṃgīkṛtāḥ /
