analyzed: aṅgam yena rathīkṛtam nayanayoḥ yugmam rathāṅgīkṛtam patram svam ratha karma sāratthi kṛtam śvāsaḥ turaṃgīkṛtāḥ

original: MSS_0273-2 koda'ḍīkṛtamātmavīryamacirānmaurvīkṛtaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vāmāṅgaṃ viśikhīkṛtaṃ diśatu naḥ kṣemaṃ sa dhanvī pumān //
analyzed: kodaḍīkṛtam ātma vīryam acirāt maurvīkṛtam bhūṣaṇam vāma aṅgam viśikhīkṛtam diśatu naḥ kṣemam sa dhanvī pumān

original: MSS_0274-1 aṅgaṇaṃ tadidamunmadadvipa- śreṇiśoṇitavihāriṇo hareḥ /
analyzed: aṅgaṇam tat idam unmada dvipa śreṇi śoṇita vihāriṇaḥ hareḥ

original: MSS_0274-2 ullasattaruṇakelipallavāṃ sallakīṃ tyajati kiṃ mataṅgajaḥ //
analyzed: ullasat taruṇa keli pallavām sallakīm tyajati kim mataṅga jaḥ

original: MSS_0275-1 aṅgaṇavedirvasudhā kulyā jaladhiḥ sthalī ca pātālam /
analyzed: aṅgaṇavediḥ vasudhā kulyā jaladhiḥ sthalī ca pātālam

original: MSS_0275-2 valmīkaśca sumeruḥ kṛtapratijñasya dhīrasya //
analyzed: valmīkaḥ ca sumeruḥ kṛta pratijñasya dhīrasya

original: MSS_0276-1 aṅgadoṣaparityaktaś caturmārgakṛtaśramaḥ /
analyzed: aṅga doṣa parityaktaḥ catur mārga kṛta śramaḥ

original: MSS_0276-2 jñātā kulakavādyasya rañjako vādakaḥ smṛtaḥ //
MSS_0277-1 aṅganānāmivāṅgāni gopyante svaguṇā yadā /
analyzed: aṅganānām iva aṅgāni gopyante sva guṇāḥ yadā

original: MSS_0277-2 tadā te spṛhaṇīyāḥ syur ime hyatyantadurlabhāḥ //
analyzed: tadā te spṛhaṇīyāḥ syuḥ ime hi atyanta durlabhāḥ

original: MSS_0278-1 aṅganāmaṅganāmantare mādhavo mādhavaṃ mādhavaṃ cāntareṇāṅganā /
analyzed: aṅganām aṅganām antare mādhavaḥ mādhavam mādhavam ca antareṇa aṅganā

original: MSS_0278-2 itthamākalpite maṇḍale madhyagaḥ saṃjagau veṇunā devakīnandanaḥ //
analyzed: ittham ākalpite maṇḍale madhya gaḥ saṃjagau veṇunā devakīnandanaḥ

original: MSS_0279-1 aṅganyāsastataḥ kāryaḥ śivoktaḥ siddhimicchatā /
analyzed: aṅganyāsaḥ tatas kāryaḥ śiva uktaḥ siddhim icchatā

original: MSS_0279-2 ācāryeṇa ca śiṣyasya pāpaghno vighnanāśanaḥ //
analyzed: ācāryeṇa ca śiṣyasya pāpa ghnaḥ vighna nāśanaḥ

original: MSS_0280-1 aṅgapratyaṅgajaḥ putro hṛdayāccāpi jāyate /
analyzed: aṅga pratyaṅga jaḥ putraḥ hṛdayāt ca api jāyate

original: MSS_0280-2 tasmāt priyataro mātuḥ priyatvānna tu bāndhavaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt priyataraḥ mātuḥ priya tvāt na tu bāndhavaḥ

original: MSS_0281-1 aṅgapratyaṅgabhāgena tataḥ piṇḍaḥ prajāyate /
analyzed: aṅga pratyaṅga bhāgena tatas piṇḍaḥ prajāyate

original: MSS_0281-2 carmaṇācchāditaḥ sapta dhātavaḥ suyranukramāt //
analyzed: carmaṇā ācchāditaḥ sapta dhātavaḥ

original: MSS_0282-1 aṅgamaṅgena saṃpīḍya māṃsaṃ māṃsena tu striyaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgam aṅgena saṃpīḍya māṃsam māṃsena tu striyaḥ

original: MSS_0282-2 purāhamabhavaṃ prīto yattanmohavijṛmbhitam //
analyzed: purā aham abhavam prītaḥ yat tat moha vijṛmbhitam

original: MSS_0283-1 aṅgamanaṅgakliṣṭaṃ sukhayedanyā na me karasparśāt /
analyzed: aṅgam anaṅga kliṣṭam sukhayet anyā na me kara sparśāt

original: MSS_0283-2 nocchvasiti tapanakiraṇaiś candrasyevāṃśubhiḥ kumudam //
analyzed: na ucchvasiti tapana kiraṇaiḥ candrasya iva aṃśubhiḥ kumudam

original: MSS_0284-1 aṅgayuktaḥ kṛtāsraśca kurvan samyakpurovidhim /
analyzed: aṅga yuktaḥ kṛta asraḥ ca kurvan samyak puras vidhim

original: MSS_0284-2 vijānan siddhasādhyādīn vairiṇo'strairna pīḍyate //
analyzed: vijānan siddha sādhya ādīn vairiṇaḥ ustraiḥ na pīḍyate

original: MSS_0285-1 aṅgasaṅgāt tathā jīvo bhajate prākṛtān guṇān /
analyzed: aṅgasaṅgāt tathā jīvaḥ bhajate prākṛtān guṇān

original: MSS_0285-2 ahaṃkārābhibhūtaḥ san bhinnastebhyo'pi so'vyayaḥ //
analyzed: ahaṃkāra abhibhūtaḥ san bhinnaḥ tebhyaḥ api saḥ vyayaḥ

original: MSS_0286-1 aṅgāḥ saṃjātabhaṅgādyanavanavasatiprāptaraṅgāḥ kaliṅgās tailaṅgāḥsvargagaṅgābhiṣavaṇamatayaḥ śīryadaṅgāśca vaṅgāḥ /
analyzed: aṅgāḥ saṃjāta bhaṅga ādi anavana vasati prāpta raṅgāḥ kaliṅgāḥ śīryat aṅgāḥ ca vaṅgāḥ

original: MSS_0286-2 lāṭāḥsvidyallalāṭāḥ padagamanadṛḍhāśvāsalolāśca colā jāyante śrīnijāma pṛthuraṇa bhavataḥ prauḍhaniḥsāṇanādāt //
analyzed: lāṭāḥ svid yat lalāṭāḥ pada gamana dṛḍha āśvāsa lolāḥ ca colāḥ jāyante bhavataḥ prauḍha niḥsāṇa nādāt

original: MSS_0287-1 aṅgākṛṣṭadukūlayā sarabhasaṃ gūḍhau bhujābhyāṃ stanāv ākṛṣṭe jaghanāṃśuke kṛtamadhaḥ saṃsaktamūrudvayam /
analyzed: aṅga ākṛṣṭa dukūlayā sarabhasam gūḍhau bhujābhyām stanau ākṛṣṭe jaghana aṃśuke kṛtam adhas saṃsaktam ūru dvayam

original: MSS_0287-2 nābhīmūlanibaddhacakṣuṣi mayi vrīḍānatāṅgyā tayā dīpaḥ sphūtkṛtavātavepitaśikhaḥ karṇotpalenāhataḥ //
analyzed: nābhī mūla nibaddha cakṣuṣi mayi vrīḍā nata aṅgyā tayā dīpaḥ sphūtkṛta vāta vepita śikhaḥ karṇa utpalena āhataḥ

original: MSS_0288-1 aṅgākṛṣṭirvyathayati nakhāṅkeṣu vakṣojakumbhā- vāsyaṃ jṛmbhā daśanavasane dantadaṣṭaṃ dunoti /
analyzed: aṅga ākṛṣṭiḥ vyathayati nakha aṅkeṣu vakṣoja kumbhāḥ vāsyam jṛmbhā daśana vasane danta daṣṭam dunoti

original: MSS_0288-2 yāntyāḥ khedaṃ vrajati karajaśreṇiṣu śroṇibhāgaḥ prātaryāti praguṇataratāṃ vaiśasaṃ naiśamasyāḥ //
analyzed: yāntyāḥ khedam vrajati karaja śreṇiṣu śroṇi bhāgaḥ prātar yāti praguṇatara tām vaiśasam naiśam asyāḥ

original: MSS_0289-1 aṅgāṅgamāgate śatrau kiṃ karoti paricchadaḥ /
analyzed: aṅga aṅgam āgate śatrau kim karoti paricchadaḥ

original: MSS_0289-2 rāhuṇā grasite candre kiṃ kiṃ bhavati tārakaiḥ //
analyzed: rāhuṇā grasite candre kim kim bhavati tārakaiḥ

original: MSS_0290-1 aṅgāṅgibhāvamajñātvā kathaṃ sāmarthyanirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: aṅga aṅgi bhāvam a jñātvā katham sāmarthya nirṇayaḥ

original: MSS_0290-2 paśya ṭiṭṭibhamātreṇa samudro vyākulīkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: paśya ṭiṭṭibha mātreṇa samudraḥ vyākulīkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_0291-1 aṅgānāmatitānavaṃ kuta idaṃ kampaśca kasmāt kuto mugdhe pāṇḍukapolamānanamiti prāṇeśvarepṛcchati /
analyzed: aṅgānām atitānavam kutas idam kampaḥ ca kasmāt kutas mugdhe pāṇḍu kapolam ānanam iti

original: MSS_0291-2 tanvyā sarvamidaṃ svabhāvata iti vyāhṛtya pakṣmāntara- vyāpī bāṣpabharastayā valitayā niḥśvasya mukto'nyataḥ //
analyzed: tanvyā sarvam idam svabhāvataḥ iti vyāhṛtya pakṣma antara vyāpī bāṣpa bharaḥ tayā valitayā niḥśvasya muktaḥ anyatas

original: MSS_0292-1 aṅgāni khedayasi kiṃ śirīṣakusumaparipelavāni mudhā /
analyzed: aṅgāni khedayasi kim śirīṣa kusuma paripelavāni mudhā

original: MSS_0292-2 ayamīhitakusumānāṃ saṃpādayitā tavāsti dāsajanaḥ //
analyzed: ayam īhita kusumānām saṃpādayitā tava asti dāsa janaḥ

original: MSS_0293-1 aṅgāni candanarajaḥparidhūsarāṇi tāmbūlarāgasubhago'dharapallavaśca /
analyzed: aṅgāni candana rajaḥ paridhūsarāṇi tāmbūla rāga subhaga udhara pallavaḥ ca

original: MSS_0293-2 svacchāñjane ca nayane vasanaṃ tanīyaḥ kāntāsu bhūṣaṇamidaṃ vibahvaśca śeṣaḥ //
analyzed: su accha añjane ca nayane vasanam tanīyaḥ kāntāsu bhūṣaṇam idam vibahvaḥ ca śeṣaḥ

original: MSS_0294-1 aṅgāni dattvā hemāṅgi prāṇān krīṇāsi cen nṛṇām /
analyzed: aṅgāni dattvā hema aṅgi prāṇān krīṇāsi ced nṛṇām

original: MSS_0294-2 yuktametan na tu punaḥ koṇaṃ nayanapadmayoḥ //
analyzed: yuktam etat na tu punar koṇam nayana padmayoḥ

original: MSS_0295-1 aṅgāni dhīpaṭutvaṃ śaktirdaśanāḥ śanairviśīryante /
analyzed: aṅgāni dhī paṭu tvam śaktiḥ daśanāḥ śanais viśīryante

original: MSS_0295-2 nikhilendriyāṇi yeṣāṃ cirāyuṣaste narā jñeyāḥ //
analyzed: nikhila indriyāṇi yeṣām cira āyuṣaḥ te narāḥ jñeyāḥ

original: MSS_0296-1 aṅgāni nidrālasavibhramāṇi vākyāni kiṃcin madalālasāni /
analyzed: aṅgāni nidrā alasa vibhramāṇi vākyāni kiṃcid mada lālasāni

original: MSS_0296-2 bhrūkṣepajihmāni ca vīkṣitāni cakāra kāmaḥ pramadājanānām //
analyzed: bhrū kṣepa jihmāni ca vīkṣitāni cakāra kāmaḥ pramadā janānām

original: MSS_0297-1 aṅgāni me dahatu kāntaviyogavahniḥ samrakṣatu priyatamaṃ hṛdi vartate'sau /
analyzed: aṅgāni me dahatu kānta viyoga vahniḥ samrakṣatu priyatamam hṛdi vartate asau

original: MSS_0297-2 ityāśayā śaśimukhī jaladaśruvāri- dhārābhiruṣṇamabhiṣiñcati hṛtpradeśam //
analyzed: iti āśayā śaśi mukhī jalada aśru vāri dhārābhiḥ uṣṇam abhiṣiñcati hṛd pradeśam

original: MSS_0298-1 aṅgāni ślathaniḥ sahāni nayate mugdhālase vibhramaś- vāsotkampitakomalastanamuraḥ sāyāsasupte bhruvau /
analyzed: aṅgāni ślatha niḥ sahāni nayate mugdha alase vibhramaḥ vāsa utkampita komala stanam uraḥ sa āyāsa supte bhruvau

original: MSS_0298-2 kiṃ cāndolanakautukavyuparatāvāsyeṣu vāmabhruvāṃ svedāmbhaḥ stapitākulālakalateṣvāvāsito manmathaḥ //
analyzed: kim ca āndolana kautuka vyuparata avāsyeṣu vāma bhruvām sveda ambhaḥ stapita ākula alaka lateṣu āvāsitaḥ manmathaḥ

original: MSS_0299-1 aṅgāmodasamocchaladghṛṇipatadbhṛṅgāvalīmālita- sphūrjallañchanasūtragumphitamilannīlotpalaśrīriva /
analyzed: aṅga āmoda sama ucchalat ghṛṇi patat bhṛṅga āvalī mālita sphūrjat lañchana sūtra gumphita milat nīlotpala śrīḥ iva

original: MSS_0299-2 niryatpādanakhonmukhāṃśuvisarasragdanturaḥ smaryatāṃ mañjuśrīḥ suramuktamañjariśikhāvarṣairivābhyarcitaḥ //
analyzed: niryat pāda nakha unmukha aṃśu visara sraj danturaḥ smaryatām mañjuśrīḥ sura mukta mañjari śikhā varṣaiḥ iva abhyarcitaḥ

original: MSS_0300-1 aṅgārapūrve gamane ca lābhaḥ some śanau dakṣiṇamarthalābham /
analyzed: aṅgāra pūrve gamane ca lābhaḥ some śanau dakṣiṇam artha lābham

original: MSS_0300-2 budhe gurau paścimakāryasiddhī ravau bhṛgau cottaramarthalābhaḥ //
analyzed: budhe gurau paścima kārya siddhiḥ ravau bhṛgau ca uttaram artha lābhaḥ

original: MSS_0301-1 aṅgāraśūlāśmapalālakeśa- vistīrṇaviṭcarmamṛteṣu dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgāra śūla aśma palāla keśa vistīrṇa viṣ carma mṛteṣu dṛṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_0301-2 śvā mūtrayanyacchati kāryanāśaṃ dāridryamṛtyupramukhānanarthān //
analyzed: śvā mūtrayan yacchati kārya nāśam dāridrya mṛtyu pramukhān anarthān

original: MSS_0302-1 aṅgārasadṛśī nārī ghṛtakumbhasamaḥ pumān /
analyzed: aṅgāra sadṛśī nārī ghṛta kumbha samaḥ pumān

original: MSS_0302-2 ye prasaktā vilīnāste ye sthitāste pade sthitāḥ //
analyzed: ye prasaktāḥ vilīnāḥ te ye sthitāḥ te pade sthitāḥ

original: MSS_0303-1 aṅgārasadṛśī yoṣit sarpiḥkumbhasamaḥ pumān /
analyzed: aṅgāra sadṛśī yoṣit sarpiḥ kumbha samaḥ pumān

original: MSS_0303-2 tasyāḥ parisare brahman sthātavyaṃ na kadācana //
analyzed: tasyāḥ parisare brahman sthātavyam na kadācana

original: MSS_0304-1 aṅgārahāsiṣu vilāsagṛhodareṣu talpeṣu tūlapaṭakalpitaveṣṭaneṣu /
analyzed: aṅgāra hāsiṣu vilāsagṛha udareṣu talpeṣu tūla paṭa kalpita veṣṭaneṣu

original: MSS_0304-2 uṣṇeṣu ca praṇayinīkucamaṇḍaleṣu śāntiṃ jagāma śiśirasya tuṣāragarvaḥ //
analyzed: uṣṇeṣu ca praṇayinī kuca maṇḍaleṣu śāntim jagāma śiśirasya tuṣāra garvaḥ

original: MSS_0305-1 aṅgāraiḥ khaciteva bhūrviyadapi jvālākarālaṃ karais tigmāṃśoḥ kiratīva tīvramabhito vāyuḥ kukūlānalam /
analyzed: aṅgāraiḥ khacitā iva bhūḥ viyat api jvālā karālam karaiḥ tigmāṃśoḥ kirati iva tīvram abhitas vāyuḥ kukūla analam

original: MSS_0305-2 apyambhāṃsi nakhaṃpacāni saritāmāśā jvalantīva ca grīṣme'sminnavavahnidīpitamivāśeṣaṃ jagadvartate //
analyzed: api ambhāṃsi nakhaṃpacāni saritām āśāḥ jvalanti iva ca grīṣme smin nava vahni dīpitam iva aśeṣam jagat vartate

original: MSS_0306-1 aṅgāraiḥ śākavṛkṣasya cūrṇitaiḥ saghṛtaistryaham /
analyzed: aṅgāraiḥ śāka vṛkṣasya cūrṇitaiḥ sa ghṛtaiḥ tri aham

original: MSS_0306-2 dattairnaśyatyatīsārastry ahaṃ pānīyavāraṇāt //
analyzed: dattaiḥ naśyati atīsāraḥ trī aham pānīya vāraṇāt

original: MSS_0307-1 aṅgāsaṅgimṛṇālakāṇḍamayate bhṛṅgāvalīnāṃ rucaṃ nāsāmauktikamindranīlasaraṇiṃ śvāsānilād gāhate /
analyzed: aṅga āsaṅgi mṛṇāla kāṇḍamayate bhṛṅga āvalīnām rucam nāsā mauktikam indranīla saraṇim śvāsa anilāt gāhate

original: MSS_0307-2 datteyaṃ himavālukāpi kucayordhatte kṣaṇaṃ dīpatāṃ taptāyaḥpatitāmbuvatkaratale dhārāmbu saṃlīyate //
analyzed: dattā iyam hima vālukā api kucayoḥ dhatte kṣaṇam dīpa tām tapta ayaḥ patita ambu vat kara tale dhārā ambu saṃlīyate

original: MSS_0308-1 aṅgīkuru tvamavadhīraya vā vayaṃ tu dāsāstaveti vacasaiva jayema lokān /
analyzed: aṅgīkuru tvam avadhīraya vā vayam tu dāsāḥ tava iti vacasā eva jayema lokān

original: MSS_0308-2 etāvataiva sukaro nanu viśvamāta- ruddaṇḍadaṇḍadharakiṃkaramaulibhaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: etāvatā eva su karaḥ nanu viśva māta rud daṇḍa daṇḍa dhara kiṃkara mauli bhaṅgaḥ

original: MSS_0309-1 aṅgīkurvanti bhaṅgīmakhilagirigaṇāstaptajāmbūnadīyāṃ dūrīkurvanti pūrīkṛtakanakagirisphāragavaṃ ca yasyāḥ /
analyzed: aṅgīkurvanti bhaṅgīm akhila giri gaṇāḥ tapta jāmbūnadīyām dūrīkurvanti pūrīkṛta kanakagiri sphāra gavam ca yasyāḥ

original: MSS_0309-2 unmattadhvāntadhārāsuravarapaṭalīdāhasañjātakīrtiḥ seyaṃ prācī pradīptirdalayatu duritaṃ sarvadā sarvadā me //
analyzed: unmatta dhvānta dhārā asura vara paṭalī dāha sañjāta kīrtiḥ sā iyam prācī pradīptiḥ dalayatu duritam sarvadā sarvadā me

original: MSS_0310-1 aṅgīkurvannamṛtarucirāmutpatiṣṇossalīlaṃ chāyāmantastava maṇimayo mālyavāneṣa śailaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgīkurvan amṛta rucirām utpatiṣṇoḥ sa līlam chāyām antar tava maṇi mayaḥ mālyavān eṣa śailaḥ

original: MSS_0310-2 śobhāṃ vakṣyatyadhikalalitāṃ śobhamānāmatīndor devasyāderupajanayato mānasādindubimbam //
analyzed: śobhām vakṣyati adhika lalitām śobhamānām ati indoḥ devasya ādeḥ upajanayataḥ mānasāt indu bimbam

original: MSS_0311-1 aṅgīkṛtatitikṣaḥ seḍ guṇī niṣṭhāparo yathā /
MSS_0311-2 mṛṣistathā vijayate śrīrāmo rājasattamaḥ //
analyzed: mṛṣiḥ tathā vijayate śrī rāmaḥ rāja sattamaḥ

original: MSS_0312-1 aṅgīkṛttāḥ kṣatimimāmapi ye viṣahya goptuṃ guṇān kimiti vāñchasi tānmudhaiva /
analyzed: aṅgīkṛttāḥ kṣatim imām api ye viṣahya goptum guṇān kim iti vāñchasi tān mudhā eva

original: MSS_0312-2 muktāmaṇervimalarūpatayā nitāntam ete tava svayamapi prakaṭībhavanti //
analyzed: muktāmaṇeḥ vimala rūpa tayā nitāntam ete tava svayam api prakaṭībhavanti

original: MSS_0313-1 aṅgulibhaṅgavikalpana- vividhavivādapravṛttapāṇḍityaḥ /
MSS_0313-2 japacapaloṣṭhaḥ sajane dhyānaparo nagararathyāsu //
analyzed: japa capala uṣṭhaḥ sa jane dhyāna paraḥ nagara rathyāsu

original: MSS_0314-1 aṅgulīkisalayāgratarjanaṃ bhrūvibhaṅgakuṭilaṃ ca vīkṣitam /
analyzed: aṅgulī kisalaya agra tarjanam bhrū vibhaṅga kuṭilam ca vīkṣitam

original: MSS_0314-2 mekhalābhirasakṛcca bandhanaṃ vañcayan praṇayinīravāpa saḥ //
analyzed: mekhalābhiḥ asakṛt ca bandhanam vañcayan praṇayinīḥ avāpa saḥ

original: MSS_0315-1 aṅgulībhiḥ kuraṅgākṣyāḥ śobhate mudrikāvaliḥ /
analyzed: aṅgulībhiḥ kuraṅga akṣyāḥ śobhate mudrikā āvaliḥ

original: MSS_0315-2 proteva bāṇaiḥ pañceṣoḥ sūkṣmā lakṣyaparamparā //
analyzed: protā iva bāṇaiḥ pañca iṣoḥ sūkṣmā lakṣya paramparā

original: MSS_0316-1 aṅgulībhiriva keśasaṃcayaṃ saṃnigṛhya timiraṃ marīcibhiḥ /
analyzed: aṅgulībhiḥ iva keśa saṃcayam saṃnigṛhya timiram marīcibhiḥ

original: MSS_0316-2 kuḍmalīkṛtasarojalocanaṃ cumbatīva rajanīmukhaṃ śaśī //
analyzed: kuḍmalīkṛta saroja locanam cumbati iva rajanīmukham śaśī

original: MSS_0317-1 aṅgulyaḥ pañcame māse dṛṣṭikukṣau ca ṣaṣṭhame /
analyzed: aṅgulyaḥ pañcame māse dṛṣṭi kukṣau ca ṣaṣṭhame

original: MSS_0317-2 saṃcāraḥ saptame māse aṣṭame nayaneṣu ca //
analyzed: saṃcāraḥ saptame māse aṣṭame nayaneṣu ca

original: MSS_0318-1 aṅgulyaḥ pallavānyāsan kusumāni nakhārciṣaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgulyaḥ pallavāni āsan kusumāni nakha arciṣaḥ

original: MSS_0318-2 bāhū late vasantaśrīs tvaṃ naḥ pratyakṣacāriṇī //
analyzed: bāhū late vasanta śrīḥ tvam naḥ pratyakṣa cāriṇī

original: MSS_0319-1 aṅgulyagranakhena bāṣyasalilaṃ vikṣipya vikṣipya kiṃ tūṣṇīṃ rodiṣi kopane bahutaraṃ phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi /
analyzed: aṅguli agra nakhena bāṣya salilam vikṣipya vikṣipya kim tūṣṇīm rodiṣi kopane bahutaram phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi

original: MSS_0319-2 yasyāste piśunopadeśavacanairmāne'tibhūmiṃ gate nirviṇṇo'nunayaṃ prati priyatamo madhyasthatāmeṣyati //
analyzed: yasyāḥ te piśuna upadeśa vacanaiḥ māna iti bhūmim gate nirviṇṇa ununayam prati priyatamaḥ madhyastha tām eṣyati

original: MSS_0320-1 aṅgulyagranirodhatastanutarāṃ dhārāmiyaṃ tanvatī karkayā na paraṃ payo nipuṇikā dātuṃ prapāpālikā /
analyzed: aṅguli agra nirodhataḥ tanutarām dhārām iyam tanvatī karkayā na param payaḥ nipuṇikā dātum prapā pālikā

original: MSS_0320-2 viśliṣṭāṅgulinā kareṇa daśanāpāḍaṃ śanaiḥ pāntha he niśpandordhvavilocanas tvamapi hā jānāsi pātuṃ payaḥ //
analyzed: viśliṣṭa aṅgulinā kareṇa śanais pāntha he niśpanda ūrdhva vilocanaḥ tvam api hā jānāsi pātum payaḥ

original: MSS_0321-1 aṅgulyagreṇa yajjaptaṃ yajjaptaṃ merulaṅghane /
analyzed: aṅguli agreṇa yat japtam yat japtam meru laṅghane

original: MSS_0321-2 vyagracittena yajjaptaṃ trividhaṃ niṣphalaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: vyagra cittena yat japtam trividham niṣphalam bhavet

original: MSS_0322-1 aṅgulyā kaḥ kavāṭaṃ praharati kuṭile mādhavaḥ kiṃ vasanto no cakrī kiṃ kulālo na hi dharaṇidharaḥ kiṃ dvijihvaḥ phaṇīndraḥ /
analyzed: aṅgulyā kaḥ kavāṭam praharati kuṭile mādhavaḥ kim vasantaḥ no cakrī kim kulālaḥ na hi dharaṇidharaḥ kim dvijihvaḥ phaṇi indraḥ

original: MSS_0322-2 nāhaṃ ghorāhimardī kimasi khagapatirno hariḥ kiṃ kapīndraḥ ityevaṃ gopakanyāprativacanajitaḥ pātu vaścakrapāṇiḥ //
analyzed: na aham ghora ahi mardī kim asi khaga patiḥ naḥ hariḥ kim kapi indraḥ iti evam gopa kanyā prativacana jitaḥ pātu vaḥ cakrapāṇiḥ

original: MSS_0323-1 aṅguṣṭhatarjanībhyāṃ gā ghrāṇe saṃgṛhya nāmayet /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha tarjanībhyām gāḥ ghrāṇe saṃgṛhya nāmayet

original: MSS_0323-2 mantreṇānena vaśyāḥ syuḥ paśavo'śvādayastathā //
analyzed: mantreṇa anena vaśyāḥ syuḥ paśavaḥ uśva ādayaḥ tathā

original: MSS_0324-1 aṅguṣṭhanakhadambhena pādayoḥ patitaḥ kimu /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha nakha dambhena pādayoḥ patitaḥ kimu

original: MSS_0324-2 vibhāti vaktravijitaḥ śaśī vigatakalmaṣaḥ //
analyzed: vibhāti vaktra vijitaḥ śaśī vigata kalmaṣaḥ

original: MSS_0325-1 aṅguṣṭhanakhamūle tu tarjanyagraṃ susaṃsthitaṃ /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha nakha mūle tu tarjanī agram su saṃsthitam

original: MSS_0325-2 matsarī sā ca vijñeyā citralakṣyasya vedhane //
analyzed: matsarī sā ca vijñeyā citralakṣyasya vedhane

original: MSS_0326-1 aṅguṣṭhākramavakritāṅguliradhaḥ pādārdhanīruddhabhūḥ pārśvādvegakṛto nihatya kaphaṇidvandvena daṃśānmuhuḥ /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha ākrama vakrita aṅguliḥ adhas pāda ardha nīruddha bhūḥ pārśvāt vega kṛtaḥ nihatya ka phaṇi dvandvena daṃśān muhur

original: MSS_0326-2 nyagjānudvayayantrayantritaghaṭīvaktrāntarālaskhalad dhārādhvānamanoharaṃ sakhi payo gāṃ dogdhi gopālakaḥ //
analyzed: nyak jānu dvaya yantra yantrita ghaṭī vaktra antarāla skhalat dhārādhvāna manoharam sakhi payaḥ gām dogdhi gopālakaḥ

original: MSS_0327-1 aṅguṣṭhāgre tu tarjanyā mukhaṃ yatra niveśitaṃ /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha agre tu tarjanyāḥ mukham yatra niveśitam

original: MSS_0327-2 kākatuṇḍī ca vijñeyā sūkṣmalakṣyeṣu yojitā //
analyzed: kākatuṇḍī ca vijñeyā sūkṣma lakṣyeṣu yojitā

original: MSS_0328-1 aṅguṣṭhe padagulphajānujaghane nābhau ca vakṣaḥstane kakṣākaṇṭhakapoladantavasane netrālike mūrdhani /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhe pada gulpha jānu jaghane nābhau ca vakṣaḥ stane kakṣa kaṇṭha kapola danta vasane netra alike mūrdhani

original: MSS_0328-2 śuklāśuklavibhāgato mṛgadṛśāmaṅgeṣvanaṅgasthitī- rūrdhvādhogamanena vāmapadagāḥ pakṣadvaye lakṣayet //
analyzed: śukla aśukla vibhāgataḥ mṛga dṛśām aṅgeṣu anaṅga sthitī r ūrdhva adhas gamanena vāma pada gāḥ pakṣa dvaye lakṣayet

original: MSS_0329-1 aṅguṣṭhodaramātraṃ viśeṣavitprāpya padmarāgamaṇim /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha udara mātram viśeṣa vid prāpya padmarāga maṇim

original: MSS_0329-2 sukhasaṃvāhyamanuttaraṃ arthaṃ kiṃ tena nāpnoti //
analyzed: sukha saṃvāhyam anuttaram artham kim tena na āpnoti

original: MSS_0330-1 aṅgena kenāpi vijetumasyā gaveṣyate kiṃ calapatrapatraṃ /
analyzed: aṅgena kena api vijetum asyāḥ gaveṣyate kim cala patra patram

original: MSS_0330-2 na cedviśeṣāditaracchadebhyas tasyāstu kampastu kuto bhayena //
analyzed: na ced viśeṣāt itaracchadebhyaḥ tasyāḥ tu kampaḥ tu kutas bhayena

original: MSS_0331-1 aṅgena gātraṃ nayanena vaktraṃ nyāyena rājyaṃ lavaṇena bhojyaṃ /
analyzed: aṅgena gātram nayanena vaktram nyāyena rājyam lavaṇena bhojyam

original: MSS_0331-2 dharmeṇa hīnaṃ khalu jīvitaṃ ca na rājate candramasā vinā niśā //
analyzed: dharmeṇa hīnam khalu jīvitam ca na rājate candramasā vinā niśā

original: MSS_0332-1 aṅge'naṅgajvarahutavahaścakṣuṣi dhyānamudrā kaṇṭhe jīvaḥ karakisalaye dīrghaśāyī kapolaḥ /
MSS_0332-2 aṃse vīṇā kucaparisare candanaṃ vāci maunaṃ tasyāḥ sarvaṃ sthitamiti na tu tvāṃ vinā kvāpi cetaḥ //
analyzed: aṃse vīṇā kuca parisare candanam vāci maunam tasyāḥ sarvam sthitam iti na tu tvām vinā kvāpi cetaḥ

original: MSS_0333-1 aṅgenāṅgaṃ pratanu tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ sāsrepyāsradrutamaviratotkaṇṭhamutkaṇṭhitena /
analyzed: aṅgena aṅgam pratanu tanunā gāḍha taptena taptam sa asra īpya asra drutam avirata utkaṇṭham utkaṇṭhitena

original: MSS_0333-2 aṣṇocchvāsaṃ samadhikatarocchvāsinā dūravartī saṃkalpaiste viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ //
analyzed: aṣṇa ucchvāsam samadhikatara ucchvāsinā dūra vartī saṃkalpaiḥ te viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddha mārgaḥ

original: MSS_0334-1 aṅgenāṅgamanupraviśya milato hastāvalepādibhiḥ kā vārtā yudhi gandhasindhurapatergandho'pi cetke dvipāḥ /
analyzed: aṅgena aṅgam anupraviśya milataḥ hasta avalepa ādibhiḥ kā vārtā yudhi gandhasindhura pateḥ gandhaḥ api ced ke dvipāḥ

original: MSS_0334-2 jetavyo'sti hareḥ sa lāñchanamato vandāmahe tāmabhūd yadgabha śarabhaḥ svayaṃjaya iti śrutvāpi yo nāṅkitaḥ //
analyzed: jetavyaḥ usti hareḥ sa lāñchanam atas vandāmahe tām abhūt śarabhaḥ svayaṃjayaḥ iti śrutvā api yaḥ na aṅkitaḥ

original: MSS_0335-1 aṅgeṣu caturaśratvaṃ samapādau latākarau /
analyzed: aṅgeṣu caturaśra tvam sama pādau latā karau

original: MSS_0335-2 prārambhe sarvanṛtyānām etatsāmānyamucyate //
analyzed: prārambhe sarva nṛtyānām etat sāmānyam ucyate

original: MSS_0336-1 aṅgeṣu mukhyā dvijamadhyasaṃsthā vāṇānusaṃdhāna parāsi nityaṃ /
analyzed: aṅgeṣu mukhyā dvija madhya saṃsthā vāṇa anusaṃdhāna parāsi nityam

original: MSS_0336-2 adhaṃ sthirapremarasā rasajñe narastutiṃ saṃtyaja karṇavat tvaṃ //
analyzed: sthira prema rasā rasajñe nara stutim saṃtyaja karṇa vat tvam

original: MSS_0337-1 aṅgeṣvābharaṇaṃ karoti bahuśaḥ patre'pi saṃcāriṇi prāptaṃ tvāṃ pariśaṅkate vitanute śayyāṃ ciraṃ dhyāyati /
analyzed: aṅgeṣu ābharaṇam karoti bahuśas patre pi saṃcāriṇi prāptam tvām pariśaṅkate vitanute śayyām ciram dhyāyati

original: MSS_0337-2 ityākalpavikalpatalparacanāsaṅkalpalīlāśata- vyāsaktāpi vinā tvayā varatanurnaiṣā niśāṃ neṣyati //
analyzed: iti ākalpa vikalpa talpa racanā saṅkalpa līlā śata vyāsaktā api vinā tvayā vara tanuḥ nā eṣā niśām neṣyati

original: MSS_0338-1 aṅgaiḥ sukumārataraiḥ sā kusumānāṃ śriyaṃ praharati /
analyzed: aṅgaiḥ sukumārataraiḥ sā kusumānām śriyam praharati

original: MSS_0338-2 vikalayati kusumabāṇo bāṇālībhirmama prāṇān //
analyzed: vikalayati kusuma bāṇaḥ bāṇa ālībhiḥ mama prāṇān

original: MSS_0339-1 aṅgairantarnihitavacanaiḥ sūcitaḥ samyagarthaḥ pādanyāso layamanugatastanmayatvaṃ raseṣu /
analyzed: aṅgaiḥ antar nihita vacanaiḥ sūcitaḥ samyak arthaḥ pāda nyāsaḥ layam anugataḥ tad maya tvam raseṣu

original: MSS_0339-2 śākhāyonirmṛdurabhinayastadvikalpānuvṛttau bhāvo bhāvaṃ nudati viṣayādrāgabandhaḥ sa eva //
analyzed: śākhā yoniḥ mṛduḥ abhinayaḥ tad vikalpa anuvṛttau bhāvaḥ bhāvam nudati viṣayāt rāga bandhaḥ saḥ eva

original: MSS_0340-1 aṅghridaṇḍo harerūrdhvam utkṣipto balinigrahe /
analyzed: aṅghri daṇḍaḥ hareḥ ūrdhvam utkṣiptaḥ bali nigrahe

original: MSS_0340-2 vidhiviṣṭarapadmasya nāladaṇḍo mude'stu vaḥ //
analyzed: vidhi viṣṭara padmasya nāla daṇḍaḥ mudeḥ tu vaḥ

original: MSS_0341-1 acakamata sapallavāṃ dharitrīṃ mṛdusurabhiṃ virahayya puṣpaśayyām /
analyzed: acakamata sa pallavām dharitrīm mṛdu surabhim virahayya puṣpa śayyām

original: MSS_0341-2 bhṛśamaratimavāpya tatra cāsyās tava sukhaśītamupaitumaṅkamicchā //
analyzed: bhṛśam aratim avāpya tatra ca asyāḥ tava sukha śītam upaitum aṅkam icchā

original: MSS_0342-1 acañcalaṃ mugdhamudañcitaṃ dṛśor anunnataṃ śrīmaduro mṛgīdṛśaḥ /
analyzed: acañcalam mugdham udañcitam dṛśoḥ an unnatam śrīmat uraḥ mṛgī dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_0342-2 abhaṅgurākūtavatī gatirbhruvor abaddhalakṣyaṃ kvacidutkamāntaram //
analyzed: abhaṅgurā ākūtavatī gatiḥ bhruvoḥ abaddha lakṣyam kvacid utkama antaram

original: MSS_0343-1 acaturvadano brahmā dvibāhuraparo hariḥ /
MSS_0343-2 abhālalocanaḥ śaṃbhur bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ //
analyzed: śaṃbhuḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ

original: MSS_0344-1 acalaṃ caladiva cakṣuḥ prakṛtamapīdaṃ samudyadiva vakṣaḥ /
analyzed: acalam calat iva cakṣuḥ prakṛtam api idam samudyat iva vakṣaḥ

original: MSS_0344-2 atadiva tadapi śarīraṃ saṃprati vāmabhruvo jayati //
analyzed: a tat iva tat api śarīram saṃprati vāma bhruvaḥ jayati

original: MSS_0345-1 acalā kamalā kasya kasya mitraṃ mahīpatiḥ /
analyzed: acalā kamalā kasya kasya mitram mahīpatiḥ

original: MSS_0345-2 śarīraṃ ca sthiraṃ kasya kasya vaśyā varāṅganā //
analyzed: śarīram ca sthiram kasya kasya vaśyā vara aṅganā

original: MSS_0346-1 acalā kamalā hi kasya kasya kṣitipālaḥ kila mitramasti loke /
analyzed: acalā kamalā hi kasya kasya kṣitipālaḥ kila mitram asti loke

original: MSS_0346-2 iha vaśyatamā ca kasya veśyā sthiramapyasti ca kasya dehamatra //
analyzed: iha vaśyatamā ca kasya veśyā sthiram api asti ca kasya deham atra

original: MSS_0347-1 acintanīyā vidhivañcaneyaṃ yadambujākṣī sthavirasya bhartuḥ /
analyzed: a cintanīyā vidhi vañcanā iyam yat ambuja akṣī sthavirasya bhartuḥ

original: MSS_0347-2 svayaṃ samādāya karaṃ nidhāya vakṣojayugme svapiti śvasantī //
analyzed: svayam samādāya karam nidhāya vakṣoja yugme svapiti śvasantī

original: MSS_0348-1 acintitāni duḥkhāni yathaivāyānti dehinām /
analyzed: a cintitāni duḥkhāni yathā eva āyānti dehinām

original: MSS_0348-2 sukhānyapi tathā manye daivamatrātiricyate //
analyzed: sukhāni api tathā manye daivam atrā atiricyate

original: MSS_0349-1 acintyamatiduḥsahaṃ trividhaduḥkhameno'rjitaṃ caturvidhagatiśritaṃ bhavabhṛtā na kiṃ prāpyate /
analyzed: acintya mati duḥsaham trividha duḥkham enā ūrjitam caturvidha gati śritam bhava bhṛtā na kim prāpyate

original: MSS_0349-2 śarīramasukhākaraṃ jagati gṛhṇatā muñcatā tanoti na tathāpyayaṃ viratimūrjitāṃ pāpataḥ //
analyzed: śarīram asukha ākaram jagati gṛhṇatā muñcatā tanoti na tathā api ayam viratim ūrjitām pāpataḥ

original: MSS_0350-1 acintyāḥ panthānaḥ kimapi mahatāmandhakaripor yadakṣṇo'bhūt tejastadakṛta kathāśeṣamadanam /
analyzed: acintyāḥ panthānaḥ kim api mahatām andhaka ripoḥ tejaḥ tat akṛta kathā śeṣa madanam

original: MSS_0350-2 munernetrādatreryadajani punarjyotirahaha pratene tenedaṃ madanamayameva tribhuvanam //
analyzed: muneḥ netrāt atreḥ yat ajani punar jyotiḥ ahaha pratene tena idam madana mayam eva tribhuvanam

original: MSS_0351-1 acirāt parātmaniṣṭhā bhavati yatastatkriyeta catureṇa kleśen kāmadamanaṃ dhigekadārañjayantamātmānam //
analyzed: acirāt parātma niṣṭhā bhavati yatas tat kriyeta catureṇa kāma damanam dhik ekadā arañjayantam ātmānam

original: MSS_0352-1 acirādupakarturācared atha vātmaupayikīmupakriyām /
analyzed: acirāt upakartuḥ ācaret atha vā ātma aupayikīm upakriyām

original: MSS_0352-2 pṛthuritthamathāṇurastu sā na viśeṣe viduṣāmiha grahaḥ //
analyzed: pṛthuḥ ittham atha aṇuḥ astu sā na viśeṣe viduṣām iha grahaḥ

original: MSS_0353-1 acirādhiṣṭhitarājyaḥ śatruḥ prakṛtiṣvarūḍhamūlatvāt /
analyzed: acira adhiṣṭhita rājyaḥ śatruḥ prakṛtiṣu arūḍha mūla tvāt

original: MSS_0353-2 navasaṃropaṇaśithilas taruriva sukaraḥ samuddhartum //
analyzed: nava saṃropaṇa śithilaḥ taruḥ iva su karaḥ samuddhartum

original: MSS_0354-1 acireṇa parasya bhūyasoṃ viparītāṃ vigaṇayya cātmanaḥ /
analyzed: acireṇa parasya bhūyasā īm viparītām vigaṇayya ca ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_0354-2 kṣayayuktimupekṣate kṛtī kurute tatpratikāramanyathā //
analyzed: kṣaya yuktim upekṣate kṛtī kurute tad pratikāram anyathā

original: MSS_0355-1 acireṇa rocate me divasānevaṃ vṛthātivāhayate /
analyzed: acireṇa rocate me divasān evam vṛthā ativāhayate

original: MSS_0355-2 śritakṛṣṇapakṣagataye vayasya kāmyastanīvirahaḥ //
analyzed: śrita kṛṣṇa pakṣa gataye vayasya kāmya stanī virahaḥ

original: MSS_0356-1 acumbi yā candanabindumaṇḍalī nalīyavaktreṇa sarojatarjinā /
analyzed: acumbi yā candana bindu maṇḍalī nalīya vaktreṇa saroja tarjinā

original: MSS_0356-2 śriyaṃ śritā kācana tārakāsakhī kṛtāśaśāṅkasya tayāṅkavartinī //
analyzed: śriyam śritā kācana tārakā sakhī kṛtā a śaśāṅkasya tayā aṅka vartinī

original: MSS_0357-1 acetanā api prāyo maitrīmevānubadhyate /
analyzed: acetanāḥ api prāyas maitrīm eva anubadhyate

original: MSS_0357-2 svavṛddhāt kṣīyate kṣīrāt kṣīrāt prāgeva vāriṇā //
analyzed: sva vṛddhāt kṣīyate kṣīrāt kṣīrāt prāk eva vāriṇā

original: MSS_0358-1 aceṣṭamānamāsīnaṃ śrīḥ kaṃcidupatiṣṭhati /
analyzed: a ceṣṭamānam āsīnam śrīḥ kaṃcid upatiṣṭhati

original: MSS_0358-2 kaścit karmāṇi kurvan hi na prāpyamadhigacchati //
analyzed: kaścid karmāṇi kurvan hi na prāpyam adhigacchati

original: MSS_0359-1 acodyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
analyzed: a codyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca

original: MSS_0359-2 svakālaṃ nātivartante tathā karma purākṛtam //
analyzed: sva kālam na ativartante tathā karma purā kṛtam

original: MSS_0360-1 acchaprakāśavati candramasi priye'sminn āhlādakāriṇi sudhāvati pūrṇabimbe /
analyzed: accha prakāśavati candramasi priye ismin āhlāda kāriṇi sudhāvati pūrṇa bimbe

original: MSS_0360-2 dhātā vicintya manasākhiladṛṣṭipātaṃ hartuṃ cakāra kimu kajjalabinduyogam //
analyzed: dhātā vicintya manasā akhila dṛṣṭipātam hartum cakāra kimu kajjala bindu yogam

original: MSS_0361-2 acchalaṃ mitrabhāvena satāṃ dārāvalokanam
analyzed: acchalam mitra bhāvena satām dāra avalokanam

original: MSS_0362-1 acchācchacandanarasārdrakarā mṛgākṣyo dhārāgṛhāṇi kusumāni ca kaumudī ca /
analyzed: accha accha candana rasa ārdra karāḥ mṛga akṣyaḥ dhārāgṛhāṇi kusumāni ca kaumudī ca

original: MSS_0362-2 mando marut sumanasaḥ śuci harmyapṛṣṭhaṃ grīṣme madaṃ ca madanaṃ ca vivardhayanti //
analyzed: mandaḥ marut sumanasaḥ śuci harmya pṛṣṭham grīṣme madam ca madanam ca vivardhayanti

original: MSS_0363-1 acchāsu haṃsa iva bālamṛṇālikāsu bhṛṅgo navāsviva madhudrumamañjarīṣu /
analyzed: acchāsu haṃsaḥ iva bāla mṛṇālikāsu bhṛṅgaḥ navāsu iva madhu druma mañjarīṣu

original: MSS_0363-2 ko'vantibharturaparo rasanirbharāsu pṛthvīpatiḥ sukavisūktiṣu baddhabhāvaḥ //
analyzed: kovanti bhartuḥ aparaḥ rasa nirbharāsu pṛthvīpatiḥ su kavi su uktiṣu baddha bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_0364-1 acchidramastu hṛdayaṃ paripūrṇamastu maukharyamastamitamastu gurutvamastu /
analyzed: acchidram astu hṛdayam paripūrṇam astu maukharyam astamitam astu guru tvam astu

original: MSS_0364-2 kṛṣṇapriye sakhi diśāmi sadāśiṣaste yadvāsare murali me karuṇāṃ karoṣi //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa priye sakhi diśāmi sat āśiṣaḥ te yat vāsare murali me karuṇām karoṣi

original: MSS_0365-1 acchinnaṃ nayanāmbu bandhuṣu kṛtaṃ cintā guruṣvarpitā dattaṃ dainyamaśeṣataḥ parijane tāpaḥ sakhīṣvāhitaḥ /
analyzed: acchinnam nayana ambu bandhuṣu kṛtam cintā guruṣu arpitā dattam dainyam aśeṣatas parijane tāpaḥ sakhīṣu āhitaḥ

original: MSS_0365-2 adya śvaḥ paranirvṛtiṃ bhajati sā śvāsaiḥ paraṃ khidyate viśrabdho bhava viprayogajanitaṃ duḥkhaṃ vibhaktaṃ tayā //
analyzed: adya śvas para nirvṛtim bhajati sā śvāsaiḥ param khidyate viśrabdhaḥ bhava viprayoga janitam duḥkham vibhaktam tayā

original: MSS_0366-1 acchinnamekhalamalabdhadṛḍhopagūḍham aprāptacumbanamavīkṣitavaktrakānti /
analyzed: acchinna mekhalam alabdha dṛḍha upagūḍham aprāpta cumbanam avīkṣita vaktra kānti

original: MSS_0366-2 kāntāvimiśravapuṣaḥ kṛtavipralambha- sambhogasakhyamiva pātu vapuḥ smarāreḥ //
analyzed: kāntā vimiśra vapuṣaḥ kṛta vipralambha sambhoga sakhyam iva pātu vapuḥ smarāreḥ

original: MSS_0367-1 acchinnāmṛtabinduvṛṣṭisadṛśīṃ prītiṃ dadatyā dṛśāṃ yātāyā vigalatpayodharabharāddraṣṭavyatāṃ kāmapi /
analyzed: acchinna amṛta bindu vṛṣṭi sadṛśīm prītim dadatyāḥ dṛśām yātāyāḥ vigalat payodhara bharāt draṣṭavya tām kām api

original: MSS_0367-2 asyāścandramasastanoriva karasparśāspadatvaṃ gatā naite yanmukulībhavanti sahasā padmāstadevādbhutam //
analyzed: asyāḥ candramasaḥ tanoḥ iva kara sparśa āspada tvam gatāḥ na ete yat mukulībhavanti sahasā padmāḥ tat eva adbhutam

original: MSS_0368-1 acchedyo'yamadāhyo'yam akledyo'śoṣya eva ca /
analyzed: acchedyaḥ yat adāhyaḥ yat akledya uśoṣyaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_0368-2 nityaḥ sarvagataḥ sthāṇur acalo'yaṃ sanātanaḥ //
analyzed: nityaḥ sarva gataḥ sthāṇuḥ acalaḥ yam sanātanaḥ

original: MSS_0369-1 acyutacaraṇataraṅgiṇi śaśiśekharamaulimālatīmāle /
analyzed: acyuta caraṇa taraṅgiṇi śaśiśekhara mauli mālatī māle

original: MSS_0369-2 tvayi tanuvitaraṇasamaye haratā deyā na me haritā //
analyzed: tvayi tanu vitaraṇa samaye haratā deyā na me haritā

original: MSS_0370-1 acyutabhaktivaśādiha samabhāvastatprasaṅgena /
analyzed: acyuta bhakti vaśāt iha sama bhāvaḥ tad prasaṅgena

original: MSS_0370-2 sā ramaterabhyudayati ratiriti naivādbhutaṃ kiṃcit //
analyzed: sā ratiḥ iti na eva adbhutam kiṃcid

original: MSS_0371-1 acyutānantagovindanāmoccāraṇabheṣajāt /
MSS_0371-2 naśyanti sakalā rogāḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmyaham //
analyzed: naśyanti sakalāḥ rogāḥ satyam satyam vadāmi aham

original: MSS_0372-1 ajani pratidinameṣā kardamaśeṣā madaṅgasaṅgena /
analyzed: ajani pratidinam eṣā kardama śeṣā mad aṅga saṅgena

original: MSS_0372-2 pratiniśamapūri pampā dakṣiṇasaṃpātibhiḥ salilaiḥ //
analyzed: pratiniśam apūri pampā dakṣiṇa saṃpātibhiḥ salilaiḥ

original: MSS_0373-1 ajani bhagavānasmādvedhāḥ śiraḥsu sudhābhujāṃ kṛtapadamidaṃ caitaddevyāḥ śriyo dhṛtimandiram /
analyzed: ajani bhagavān asmāt vedhāḥ śiraḥsu sudhābhujām kṛta padam idam ca etat devyāḥ śriyaḥ dhṛti mandiram

original: MSS_0373-2 tadiha bhuvanābhogaślāghye saroruhi yacciraṃ śaśadhara tava dveṣārambhaḥ sa eṣa jaḍagrahaḥ //
analyzed: tat iha bhuvana ābhoga ślāghye saroruhi yat ciram śaśadhara tava dveṣa ārambhaḥ saḥ eṣa jaḍa grahaḥ

original: MSS_0374-1 ajani rajaniranyā candramaḥ kāntivanyā- vipulacapalavīcivyācitā kācideva /
analyzed: ajani rajaniḥ anyā candramaḥ kāntivanyā vipula capala vīci vyācitā kācid eva

original: MSS_0374-2 satarugirisaridbhiḥ kiṃ haridbhiḥ sametaṃ dhavalimani dharitrīmaṇḍalaṃ magnametat //
analyzed: sa taru giri saridbhiḥ kim haridbhiḥ sametam dhavalimani dharitrī maṇḍalam magnam etat

original: MSS_0375-1 ajani śiśiraśīlaṃ śaivalaṃ sāgare yac cikuramakṛta kāmastanvi te kiṃ na tena /
analyzed: ajani śiśira śīlam śaivalam sāgare yat cikuram akṛta kāmaḥ tanvi te kim na tena

original: MSS_0375-2 vahati kuṭilamenaṃ hetunā kena mūrdhnā vadanavidhurayaṃ cet sodaro nādasīyaḥ //
analyzed: vahati kuṭilam enam hetunā kena mūrdhnā vadana vidhuḥ ayam ced sodaraḥ

original: MSS_0376-1 ajanmā puruṣastāvad gatāsustṛṇameva vā /
analyzed: ajanmā puruṣaḥ tāvat gatāsuḥ tṛṇam eva vā

original: MSS_0376-2 yāvanneṣubhirādatte viluptamaribhiryaśaḥ //
analyzed: yāvat na iṣubhiḥ ādatte viluptam aribhiḥ yaśaḥ

original: MSS_0377-1 ajanyakampāḥ śūrā ye nityamapyaparāṅmukhāḥ /
analyzed: ajanya kampāḥ śūrāḥ ye nityam api a parāṅmukhāḥ

original: MSS_0377-2 darśayantyaparāgeṇa parebhyaścitrarūpavat //
analyzed: darśayanti aparāgeṇa parebhyaḥ citra rūpa vat

original: MSS_0378-1 ajarāmaravat prājño vidyāmarthaṃ ca cintayet /
analyzed: ajara amara vat prājñaḥ vidyām artham ca cintayet

original: MSS_0378-2 gṛhīta iva keśeṣu mṛtyunā dharmamācaret //
analyzed: gṛhītaḥ iva keśeṣu mṛtyunā dharmam ācaret

original: MSS_0379-1 ajavaccarvaṇaṃ kuryād gajavat snānamācaret /
analyzed: aja vat carvaṇam kuryāt gaja vat snānam ācaret

original: MSS_0379-2 rājavat praviśedgrāmaṃ coravadgamanaṃ caret //
analyzed: rāja vat praviśet grāmam cora vat gamanam caret

original: MSS_0380-1 ajasya gṛhṇato janma nirīhasya hatadviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ajasya gṛhṇataḥ janma nirīhasya hata dviṣaḥ

original: MSS_0380-2 svapato jāgarūkasya yāthātmyaṃ veda kastava //
analyzed: svapataḥ jāgarūkasya yāthātmyam veda kaḥ tava

original: MSS_0381-1 ajasraṃ lasatpadminī vṛndasaṅgaṃ madhūni prakāmaṃ pibantaṃ milindam /
analyzed: ajasram lasat padminī vṛnda saṅgam madhūni prakāmam pibantam milindam

original: MSS_0381-2 ravirmocayatyabjakārāgṛhebhyo dayālurhi no duṣṭavad doṣadarśī //
analyzed: raviḥ mocayati abja kārā gṛhebhyaḥ dayāluḥ hi naḥ duṣṭa vat doṣa darśī

original: MSS_0382-1 ajasrabhūmītaṭakuṭṭanotthitair upāsyamānaṃ caraṇeṣu reṇubhiḥ /
analyzed: ajasra bhūmī taṭa kuṭṭana utthitaiḥ upāsyamānam caraṇeṣu reṇubhiḥ

original: MSS_0382-2 rayaprakarṣādhyayanārthamāgatair janasya cetobhirivāṇimāṅkitaiḥ //
analyzed: raya prakarṣa adhyayana artham āgataiḥ janasya cetobhiḥ iva aṇima aṅkitaiḥ

original: MSS_0383-1 ajasramabhyāsamupeyuṣā samaṃ mudaiva devaḥ kavinā budhena ca /
analyzed: ajasram abhyāsam upeyuṣā samam mudā eva devaḥ kavinā budhena ca

original: MSS_0383-2 dadhau paṭīyān samayaṃ nayannayaṃ dineśvaraśrīrudayaṃ dine dine //
analyzed: paṭīyān samayam nayan ayam dineśvara śrīḥ udayam dine dine

original: MSS_0384-1 ajasramārohasi dūradīrghāṃ saṃkalpasopānatatiṃ tadīyām /
analyzed: ajasram ārohasi dūra dīrghām saṃkalpa sopāna tatim tadīyām

original: MSS_0384-2 śvāsān sa varṣatyadhikaṃ punaryad dhyānāttava tvanmayatāṃ tadāpya //
analyzed: śvāsān sa varṣati adhikam punar yat dhyānāt tava tvad maya tām tat āpya

original: MSS_0385-1 ajā iva prajā mohād yo hanyāt pṛthivīpatiḥ /
analyzed: ajāḥ iva prajāḥ mohāt yaḥ hanyāt pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: MSS_0385-2 tasyaikā jāyate tṛptir na dvitīyā kathaṃcana //
analyzed: tasya ekā jāyate tṛptiḥ na dvitīyā kathaṃcana

original: MSS_0386-1 ajāgalasthastana uṣṭrapucchaṃ kakṣāntare keśamathāṇḍayugmam /
analyzed: ajāgala sthastanaḥ uṣṭrapuccham kakṣa antare keśam atha aṇḍa yugmam

original: MSS_0386-2 tvāṃ saṃsṛjan sāyaṇamāyaṇādau brahmāgragaṇyo na babhūva pūjyaḥ //
analyzed: tvām saṃsṛjan sāyaṇa māyaṇa ādau brahmā agragaṇyaḥ na babhūva pūjyaḥ

original: MSS_0387-1 ajāṅghrinirdattarajaścayāpi kapālinā baddharasāpi kāmam /
analyzed: aja aṅghri nirdatta rajaḥ cayā api kapālinā baddha rasā api kāmam

original: MSS_0387-2 tato'pyadhodhaḥ patitāpi nityaṃ gaṅgā kusaṅgāpi punāti lokān //
analyzed: tatas upi adhodhas patitā api nityam gaṅgā kusaṅgā api punāti lokān

original: MSS_0388-1 ajājījambāle rajasi maricānāṃ ca luṭhitāḥ kaṭutvāduṣṇatvājjanitarasanauṣṭhavyatikarāḥ /
analyzed: ajājī jambāle rajasi maricānām ca luṭhitāḥ kaṭu tvāt uṣṇa tvāt janita rasana oṣṭha vyatikarāḥ

original: MSS_0388-2 anirvāṇotthena prabalataratailāktatanavo mayā sadyo bhṛṣṭāḥ katipayakavayyaḥ kavalitāḥ //
analyzed: anirvāṇa utthena prabalatara taila akta tanavaḥ mayā sadyas bhṛṣṭāḥ katipaya kavayyaḥ kavalitāḥ

original: MSS_0389-1 ajātamṛtamūrkhāṇāṃ varamādyau na cāntimaḥ /
analyzed: ajāta mṛta mūrkhāṇām varam ādyau na ca antimaḥ

original: MSS_0389-2 sakṛdduḥkhakarāvādyāv antimas tu pade pade //
analyzed: sakṛt duḥkha karau ādyau antimaḥ tu pade pade

original: MSS_0390-1 ajātamṛtamūrkhebhyo mṛtājātau sutau varam /
analyzed: ajāta mṛta mūrkhebhyaḥ mṛta ajātau sutau varam

original: MSS_0390-2 yatastau svalpaduḥkhāya yāvajjīvaṃ jaḍo dahet //
analyzed: yatas tau su alpa duḥkhāya yāvajjīvam jaḍaḥ dahet

original: MSS_0391-1 ajātaromāmatisundarāṅgīṃ śṛṅgāravallīmiva rājakanyām /
analyzed: ajāta romām ati sundara aṅgīm śṛṅgāra vallīm iva rāja kanyām

original: MSS_0391-2 bhuktvā drutaṃ kvāpi gato na cet syāḥ syātte tadānarthanipāta eva //
analyzed: bhuktvā drutam kvāpi gataḥ na ced syāḥ syāt te tadā anartha nipātaḥ eva

original: MSS_0392-1 ajādhūliriva trastair mārjanīreṇuvajjanaiḥ /
analyzed: ajā dhūliḥ iva trastaiḥ mārjanī reṇu vat janaiḥ

original: MSS_0392-2 dīpakhaṭvotthacchāyeva tyajyate nirdhano janaḥ //
analyzed: dīpa khaṭvā uttha chāyā iva tyajyate nirdhanaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_0393-1 ajānatā bhavetkaścid aparādhaḥ kuto yadi kṣantavyameva tasyāhuḥ suparīkṣya parīkṣayā //
analyzed: a jānatā bhavet kaścid aparādhaḥ kutas yadi kṣantavyam eva tasya āhuḥ su parīkṣya parīkṣayā

original: MSS_0394-1 ajānatī kāpi vilokanotsukā samīradhūtārdhamapi stanāṃśukam /
analyzed: a jānatī kā api vilokana utsukā samīra dhūta ardham api stana aṃśukam

original: MSS_0394-2 kucena tasmai calate'karot puraḥ purāṅganā maṅgalakumbhasaṃbhṛtim //
analyzed: kucena tasmai calatā akarot puras pura aṅganā maṅgala kumbha saṃbhṛtim

original: MSS_0395-1 ajānan māhātmyaṃ patati śalabhas tīvradahane sa mīno'pyajñānād baḍiśayutamaśnātu piśitam /
analyzed: a jānan māhātmyam patati śalabhaḥ tīvra dahane sa mīnaḥ upi ajñānāt baḍiśa yutam aśnātu piśitam

original: MSS_0395-2 vijānanto'pyete vayamiha vipajjālajaṭilān na muñcāmaḥ kāmānahaha gahano mohamahimā //
analyzed: vijānantaḥ api ete vayam iha vipad jāla jaṭilān na muñcāmaḥ kāmān ahaha gahanaḥ moha mahimā

original: MSS_0396-1 ajāmūtraṃ ca tadviṣṭhā sūkarasya tathaiva viṭ /
analyzed: ajā mūtram ca tad viṣṭhā sūkarasya tathā eva viṣ

original: MSS_0396-2 budbudaṃ lepato hanyān maṇḍalikṣveḍasaṃbhavam //
MSS_0397-1 ajāyantaitasmādamṛtaśaśilakṣmīprabhṛtayaḥ paritrātāścendrāt kulaśikhariṇaḥ pūrvayamunā /
analyzed: ajāyanta etasmāt amṛta śaśi lakṣmī prabhṛtayaḥ paritrātāḥ ca indrāt kula śikhariṇaḥ pūrva yamunā

original: MSS_0397-2 upetā ityevaṃ tava jalanidhe tīramadhunā vigarjābhiḥ kiṃ naḥ śrutipuṭamaho jarjarayasi //
analyzed: upetāḥ iti evam tava jalanidhe tīram adhunā vigarjābhiḥ kim naḥ śruti puṭam aho jarjarayasi

original: MSS_0398-1 ajāyuddhamṛṣiśrāddhaṃ prabhāte meghaḍambaraḥ /
analyzed: ajā yuddham ṛṣi śrāddham prabhāte megha ḍambaraḥ

original: MSS_0398-2 dampatyoḥ kalahaścaiva bahvārambhe laghukriyā //
analyzed: dampatyoḥ kalahaḥ ca eva bahu ārambhe laghu kriyā

original: MSS_0399-1 ajārajaḥ khararajas tathā saṃmārjanīrajaḥ /
analyzed: ajā rajaḥ khara rajaḥ tathā saṃmārjanī rajaḥ

original: MSS_0399-2 dīpakhaṭvotthacchāyā ca śakrasyāpi śriyaṃ haret //
analyzed: dīpa khaṭvā uttha chāyā ca śakrasya api śriyam haret

original: MSS_0400-1 ajārajaḥ parvaṇi maithunāni śmaśānadhūmo maṭhabhojanāni /
analyzed: ajāra jaḥ parvaṇi maithunāni śmaśāna dhūmaḥ maṭha bhojanāni

original: MSS_0400-2 rajasvalānetranirīkṣaṇāni haranti puṇyāni divā kṛtāni //
analyzed: rajasvalā netra nirīkṣaṇāni haranti puṇyāni divā kṛtāni

original: MSS_0401-1 ajāvigardabhoṣṭrāṇāṃ mārjāramūṣikasya ca /
analyzed: aja avi gardabha uṣṭrāṇām mārjāra mūṣikasya ca

original: MSS_0401-2 rajāṃsyetāni pāpāni sarvataḥ parivarjayet //
analyzed: rajāṃsi etāni pāpāni sarvatas parivarjayet

original: MSS_0402-1 ajāśvayormukhaṃ medhyaṃ gāvo medhyāstu pṛṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: aja aśvayoḥ mukham medhyam gāvaḥ medhyāḥ tu pṛṣṭhatas

original: MSS_0402-2 brāhmaṇāḥ pādato medhyāḥ striyo medhyāśca sarvataḥ //
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ pādataḥ medhyāḥ striyaḥ medhyāḥ ca sarvatas

original: MSS_0403-1 ajā siṃhaprasādena vane carati nirbhayam /
analyzed: ajā siṃha prasādena vane carati nirbhayam

original: MSS_0403-2 rāmamāsādya laṅkāyāṃ lebhe rājyaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: rāmam āsādya laṅkāyām lebhe rājyam vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_0404-1 ajitendriyavargasya nācāreṇa bhavet phalam /
analyzed: ajita indriya vargasya na ācāreṇa bhavet phalam

original: MSS_0404-2 kevalaṃ dehakhedāya durbhagasya vibhūṣaṇam //
analyzed: kevalam deha khedāya durbhagasya vibhūṣaṇam

original: MSS_0405-1 ajitvā sārṇavāmurvīm aniṣṭvā vividhairmakhaiḥ /
analyzed: a jitvā sa arṇavām urvīm an iṣṭvā vividhaiḥ makhaiḥ

original: MSS_0405-2 adattvā cārthamarthibhyo bhaveyaṃ pārthivaḥ katham //
analyzed: a dattvā ca artham arthibhyaḥ bhaveyam pārthivaḥ katham

original: MSS_0406-1 ajīyatāvartaśubhaṃyunābhyāṃ dorbhyāṃ mṛṇālaṃ kimu komalābhyām /
analyzed: ajīyata āvarta śubhaṃyunābhyām dorbhyām mṛṇālam kimu komalābhyām

original: MSS_0406-2 niḥ sūtramāste ghanapaṅkamṛtsu mūrtāsu nākīrtiṣu tannimagnam //
analyzed: niḥ sūtram āste ghana paṅka mṛtsu mūrtāsu na akīrtiṣu tat nimagnam

original: MSS_0407-1 ajīrṇaṃ tapasaḥ krodho jñānājīrṇamahaṃkṛtiḥ /
analyzed: ajīrṇam tapasaḥ krodhaḥ jñāna ajīrṇam ahaṃkṛtiḥ

original: MSS_0407-2 parinindā kriyāṃjīrṇam annājīrṇaṃ viṣūcikā //
analyzed: parinindā kriyā aṃjīrṇam anna ajīrṇam viṣūcikā

original: MSS_0408-1 ajīrṇe bheṣajaṃ vāri jīrṇe vāri balapradam /
analyzed: ajīrṇe bheṣajam vāri jīrṇe vāri bala pradam

original: MSS_0408-2 bhojane cāmṛtaṃ vāri bhojanānte viṣāpaham //
analyzed: bhojane ca amṛtam vāri bhojana ante viṣa apaham

original: MSS_0409-1 ajeyaḥ subhagaḥ saumyaḥ tyāgī bhogī yaśonidhiḥ /
analyzed: ajeyaḥ subhagaḥ saumyaḥ tyāgī bhogī yaśonidhiḥ

original: MSS_0409-2 bhavatyabhayadānena ciraṃjīvī nirāmayaḥ //
analyzed: bhavati abhaya dānena ciraṃjīvī nirāmayaḥ

original: MSS_0410-1 ajaiḍakāsūkaraviḍviḍaṅga- kiṇvopacāreṇa ca bījapūraḥ /
analyzed: aja eḍakā sūkara viṣ viḍaṅga kiṇva upacāreṇa ca bījapūraḥ

original: MSS_0410-2 bhūyośvamūtrāvilavārisiktaḥ phalāni dhatte subahūni śaśvat //
analyzed: bhūya uśva mūtra āvila vāri siktaḥ phalāni dhatte su bahūni śaśvat

original: MSS_0411-1 arjitaṃ svena vīryeṇa nānyapāśritya kaṃcana /
analyzed: arjitam svena vīryeṇa na anya apāśritya kaṃcana

original: MSS_0411-2 phalaśākamapi śreyo bhoktuṃ hyakṛpaṇaṃ gṛhe //
analyzed: phala śākam api śreyaḥ bhoktum hi akṛpaṇam gṛhe

original: MSS_0412-1 ajñaṃ karmāṇi limpanti tajjñaṃ karma na limpati /
analyzed: ajñam karmāṇi limpanti tad jñam karma na limpati

original: MSS_0412-2 lipyate rasanaivaikā sarpiṣā karavad yathā //
analyzed: lipyate rasanā eva ekā sarpiṣā kara vat yathā

original: MSS_0413-1 ajñaḥ sukhamārādhyaḥ sukhataramārādhyate viśeṣajñaḥ /
analyzed: ajñaḥ sukham ārādhyaḥ sukhataram ārādhyate viśeṣa jñaḥ

original: MSS_0413-2 jñānalavadurvidagdhaṃ brahmāpi naraṃ na rañjayati //
analyzed: jñāna lava durvidagdham brahmā api naram na rañjayati

original: MSS_0414-1 ajñatayā premṇā vā cūḍāmaṇimākalayya kācamaṇim /
analyzed: ajña tayā premṇā vā cūḍāmaṇim ākalayya kācamaṇim

original: MSS_0414-2 nṛpatirvaheta śirasā tenāsau nahyanarghyamaṇiḥ //
analyzed: nṛpatiḥ vaheta śirasā tena asau na hi anarghya maṇiḥ

original: MSS_0415-1 ajñaścāśraddadhānaśca saṃśayātmā vinaśyati /
analyzed: ajñaḥ ca aśraddadhānaḥ ca saṃśaya ātmā vinaśyati

original: MSS_0415-2 nāyaṃ loko'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ //
analyzed: na ayam lokaḥ usti na paraḥ na sukham saṃśaya ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_0416-1 ajñastāvadahaṃ na mandadhiṣaṇaḥ kartuṃ manohāriṇīś cāṭūktīḥ prabhavāmiyāmibhavato yābhiḥ kṛpāpātratām /
analyzed: ajñaḥ tāvat aham na manda dhiṣaṇaḥ kartum manohāriṇīḥ cāṭu uktīḥ prabhavāmi yāmi bhavataḥ yābhiḥ kṛpā pātra tām

original: MSS_0416-2 ārtenāśaraṇena kiṃ tu kṛpaṇenākranditaṃ karṇayoḥ kṛtvā satvarame hi dehi caraṇaṃ mūrdhanyadhanyasya me //
analyzed: ārtena aśaraṇena kim tu kṛpaṇena ākranditam karṇayoḥ kṛtvā sa tvarame hi dehi caraṇam mūrdhani adhanyasya me

original: MSS_0417-1 ajñātakālocitakarmayogā rogā ivāharniśi paśyamānāḥ jagattraye devamanuṣyanāgāḥ /
analyzed: ajñāta kāla ucita karma yogāḥ rogāḥ iva ahar niśi paśyamānāḥ jagattraye deva manuṣya nāgāḥ

original: MSS_0417-2 prajñādaridrāḥ khalu sarva eva //
analyzed: prajñā daridrāḥ khalu sarve eva

original: MSS_0418-1 ajñātakulaśīlasya vāso deyo na kasyacit /
analyzed: ajñāta kula śīlasya vāsaḥ deyaḥ na kasyacid

original: MSS_0418-2 mārjārasya hi doṣeṇa hato gṛdhro jaradgavaḥ //
analyzed: mārjārasya hi doṣeṇa hataḥ gṛdhraḥ jaradgavaḥ

original: MSS_0419-1 ajñātakulaśīle'pi prītiṃ kurvanti vānarāḥ /
analyzed: ajñāta kula śīla ipi prītim kurvanti vānarāḥ

original: MSS_0419-2 ātmārthe ca na rodanti rodanti tvitare janāḥ //
analyzed: ātma arthe ca na rodanti rodanti tu itare janāḥ

original: MSS_0420-1 ajñātadeśakālāś capalamukhā paṅgavo'pisa plutayaḥ /
analyzed: ajñāta deśa kālāḥ plutayaḥ

original: MSS_0420-2 navavihagā iva mugdhā bhakṣyante dhūrtamārjāraiḥ //
analyzed: nava vihagāḥ iva mugdhāḥ bhakṣyante dhūrta mārjāraiḥ

original: MSS_0421-1 ajñātadoṣairdoṣajñair uddūṣyobhayavetanaiḥ /
analyzed: ajñāta doṣaiḥ doṣa jñaiḥ uddūṣya ubhaya vetanaiḥ

original: MSS_0421-2 bhedyāḥ śatrorabhivyaktaśāsanaiḥ sāmavāyikāḥ //
analyzed: bhedyāḥ śatroḥ abhivyakta śāsanaiḥ sāmavāyikāḥ

original: MSS_0422-1 ajñātanāmavarṇeṣv ātmāpi yayārpyate dhanāṃśena /
analyzed: ajñāta nāma varṇeṣu ātmā api yayā arpyate dhana aṃśena

original: MSS_0422-2 tasyā api sadbhāvaṃ mṛgayante moghasaṃkalpāḥ //
analyzed: tasyāḥ api sadbhāvam mṛgayante mogha saṃkalpāḥ

original: MSS_0423-1 ajñātapāṇḍityarahasyamudrā ye kāvyamārge dadhate'bhimānam /
analyzed: ajñāta pāṇḍitya rahasya mudrāḥ ye kāvya mārge dadhata abhimānam

original: MSS_0423-2 te gāruḍīyānanadhītya mantrān hālāhalāsvādanamārabhante //
analyzed: te gāruḍīyān an adhītya mantrān hālāhala āsvādanam ārabhante

original: MSS_0424-1 ajñātabhāvicaurādi doṣairnityavināśinā /
analyzed: ajñāta bhāvi caura ādi doṣaiḥ nitya vināśinā

original: MSS_0424-2 hāsyaikahetunā loke gaṇakasya dhanena kim //
analyzed: hāsya eka hetunā loke gaṇakasya dhanena kim

original: MSS_0425-1 ajñātamahimā vāṇī śivaṃ stautu rasonmadā /
analyzed: stautu

original: MSS_0425-2 rasātirekādaucityabhaṅgaḥ strīṇāṃ kva labhyate //
analyzed: rasa atirekāt aucitya bhaṅgaḥ strīṇām kva labhyate

original: MSS_0426-1 ajñātamātṛla lana- maiṇaśiśuṃ kaścidaṅkamāropya /
analyzed: ajñāta mātṛla maiṇa śiśum kaścid aṅkam āropya

original: MSS_0426-2 adyāpi rakṣasi vidho dharmātmā konu bhavadanyaḥ //
analyzed: adyā api rakṣasi vidho dharma ātmā kaḥ nu bhavat anyaḥ

original: MSS_0427-1 ajñātavīvadhāsāratoyasasyo vrajettu yaḥ pararāṣṭraṃ na bhūyaḥ sa svarāṣṭramadhigacchati //
analyzed: ajñāta vīvadha asāra toya sasyaḥ vrajet tu yaḥ para rāṣṭram na bhūyas sa sva rāṣṭram adhigacchati

original: MSS_0428-1 ajñātaśāstrasadbhāvāñ chāstramātraparāyaṇān /
analyzed: ajñāta śāstra sadbhāvām śāstra mātra parāyaṇān

original: MSS_0428-2 tyajed dūrād bhiṣakpāśān pāśān vaivasvatāniva //
analyzed: tyajet dūrāt bhiṣakpāśān pāśān vaivasvatān iva

original: MSS_0429-1 ajñātāḥ puruṣā yasya praviśanti mahīpateḥ /
analyzed: ajñātāḥ puruṣāḥ yasya praviśanti mahīpateḥ

original: MSS_0429-2 durgaṃ tasya na saṃdehaḥ praviśanti drutaṃ dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: durgam tasya na saṃdehaḥ praviśanti drutam dviṣaḥ

original: MSS_0430-1 ajñātāgamamīlitākṣiyugalaṃ kiṃ tvaṃ mudhā tiṣṭhasi jñātosi prakaṭaprakampapulakairaṅgai sphuṭaṃ mugdhayā /
analyzed: ajñāta āgama mīlita akṣi yugalam kim tvam mudhā tiṣṭhasi jñātaḥ usi prakaṭa prakampa pulakaiḥ aṅgaiḥ sphuṭam mugdhayā

original: MSS_0430-2 muñcaināṃ jaḍa kiṃ na paśyasi galadbāṣpāmbudhau tānanāṃ sakhyaivaṃ gadite vimucya rabhasāt kaṇṭhevalagno yuvā //
analyzed: muñca enām jaḍa kim na paśyasi galat bāṣpa ambudhau ta ānanām sakhyā evam gadite vimucya rabhasāt yuvā

original: MSS_0431-1 ajñātenduparābhavaṃ parilasadvyālolanetrāñjanaṃ bhrāntabhrū latamaiṇanābhitilakaṃ śrīkhaṇḍapatrālakam /
analyzed: ajñāta indu parābhavam parilasat vyālola netrāñjanam bhrānta bhrū latama eṇa nābhi tilakam śrīkhaṇḍa patra alakam

original: MSS_0431-2 bandhūkādharasundaraṃ suramunivyāmohi vākyāmṛtaṃ trailokyādbhutapaṅkajaṃ varatanorāsyaṃ na kasya priyam //
analyzed: bandhūka adhara sundaram sura muni vyāmohi vākya amṛtam trailokya adbhuta paṅkajam vara tanoḥ āsyam na kasya priyam

original: MSS_0432-1 ajñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na syād viyogo yadi kāraṇam /
analyzed: ajñānam kāraṇam na syāt viyogaḥ yadi kāraṇam

original: MSS_0432-2 śoko dineṣu gacchatsu vardhatāmapayāti kim //
analyzed: śokaḥ dineṣu gacchatsu vardhatām apayāti kim

original: MSS_0433-1 ajñānaṃ khalu kaṣṭaṃ krodhādibhyo'pi sarvapāpebhyaḥ /
analyzed: ajñānam khalu kaṣṭam krodha ādibhyaḥ api sarva pāpebhyaḥ

original: MSS_0433-2 arthaṃ hitamahitaṃ vā na vetti yenāvṛto lokaḥ //
analyzed: artham hitam ahitam vā na vetti yena āvṛtaḥ lokaḥ

original: MSS_0434-1 ajñānaṃ yatphalaṃ tasya raso'dharmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: ajñānam yat phalam tasya rasaḥ dharmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: MSS_0434-2 bhāvodakena saṃvṛddhis tasyāśraddhā ṛtuḥ priya //
analyzed: bhāva udakena saṃvṛddhiḥ tasya aśraddhā ṛtuḥ priya

original: MSS_0435-1 ajñānatimirāndhasya jñānañjanaśalākyā /
analyzed: ajñāna timira andhasya jñāna añjana śalākyā

original: MSS_0435-2 cakṣurun mīlitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ud mīlitam yena tasmai śrī gurave namaḥ

original: MSS_0436-1 ajñānaprabhavaṃ hīdaṃ yadduḥkhamupalabhyate /
analyzed: ajñāna prabhavam hi idam yat duḥkham upalabhyate

original: MSS_0436-2 lobhaprabhavamajñānaṃ vṛddhaṃ bhūyaḥ pravardhate //
analyzed: lobha prabhavam ajñānam vṛddham bhūyas pravardhate

original: MSS_0437-1 ajñānamiha nidānaṃ prāgrūpaṃ jananameva bhavaroge /
analyzed: ajñānam iha nidānam prāgrūpam jananam eva bhava roge

original: MSS_0437-2 pāripākaḥ saṃsaraṇaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ naiṣṭhikī śāntiḥ //
analyzed: pāripākaḥ saṃsaraṇam bhaiṣajyam naiṣṭhikī śāntiḥ

original: MSS_0438-1 ajñānavaraṣaṇḍena prasupto naragarddabhaḥ /
analyzed: ajñāna vara ṣaṇḍena prasuptaḥ nara garddabhaḥ

original: MSS_0438-2 kaḥ samarthaḥ prabīddhuṃ taṃ jñānabherīśatairapi //
analyzed: kaḥ samarthaḥ prabīddhum tam jñāna bherī śataiḥ api

original: MSS_0439-1 ajñānavalito bālye madamūḍhaśca yauvane /
analyzed: ajñāna valitaḥ bālye mada mūḍhaḥ ca yauvane

original: MSS_0439-2 vārddhake vihvalāṅgaśca kadā kuśalabhāgjanaḥ //
analyzed: vārddhake vihvala aṅgaḥ ca kadā kuśala bhāj janaḥ

original: MSS_0440-1 ajñānājjñānato vāpi jambūryena praropitā /
analyzed: ajñānāt jñānataḥ vā api jambūḥ yena praropitā

original: MSS_0440-2 gṛhe'pi sa vasannityaṃ yatidharmeṇa yujyate //
analyzed: gṛhe api sa vasan nityam yati dharmeṇa yujyate

original: MSS_0441-1 ajñānāt kurute śrāddhaṃ yo'bhiśravaṇavarjitam /
analyzed: ajñānāt kurute śrāddham

original: MSS_0441-2 śrāddhahantā bhavetkartā nirāśāḥ pitaro gatāḥ //
analyzed: śrāddha hantā bhavet kartā nirāśāḥ pitaraḥ gatāḥ

original: MSS_0442-1 ajñānājjñānato vāpi yadduruktamudāhṛtam /
analyzed: ajñānāt jñānataḥ vā api yat duruktam udāhṛtam

original: MSS_0442-2 tat kṣantavyaṃ yuvābhyāṃ me kṛtvā prītiparaṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: tat kṣantavyam yuvābhyām me kṛtvā prīti param manaḥ

original: MSS_0443-1 ajñānādyadi vā jñānāt kṛtvā karma vigarhitam /
analyzed: ajñānāt yadi vā jñānāt kṛtvā karma vigarhitam

original: MSS_0443-2 tasmād vimuktimanvicchan dvitīyaṃ na samācaret //
analyzed: tasmāt vimuktim anvicchan dvitīyam na samācaret

original: MSS_0444-1 ajñānādyadi vādhipatyarabhasādasmatparokṣaṃ hṛtā sīteyaṃ pravimucyatāṃ śaṭha marutputrasya haste'dhunā /
analyzed: ajñānāt yadi vā ādhipatya rabhasāt asmad parokṣam hṛtā sītā iyam pravimucyatām śaṭha marut putrasya hastā idhunā

original: MSS_0444-2 no cel lakṣmaṇamuktamārgaṇagaṇacchedocchalacchoṇita- cchatracchannadigantamantakapuraṃ putrairvṛto yāsyasi //
analyzed: no ced lakṣmaṇa mukta mārgaṇa gaṇa cheda ucchalat śoṇita chatra channa digantam antaka puram putraiḥ vṛtaḥ yāsyasi

original: MSS_0445-1 ajñānāndhamabāndhavaṃ kavalitaṃ rakṣobhirakṣābhidhaiḥ kṣiptaṃ mohamahāndhakūpakuhare durhṛdbhirābhyntaraiḥ /
analyzed: ajñāna andham abāndhavam kavalitam rakṣobhiḥ akṣa abhidhaiḥ kṣiptam moha mahā andhakūpa kuhare

original: MSS_0445-2 krandantaṃ śaraṇāgataṃ gatadhṛtiṃ sarvāpadāmāspadaṃ mā māṃ muñca maheśa peśaladṛśā satrāsamāśvāsaya //
analyzed: krandantam śaraṇa āgatam gata dhṛtim sarva āpadām āspadam mā mām muñca maheśa peśala dṛśā sa trāsam āśvāsaya

original: MSS_0446-1 ajñānānnirayaṃ yāti tathājñānena durgatim /
analyzed: ajñānāt nirayam yāti tathā ajñānena durgatim

original: MSS_0446-2 ajñānāt kleśamāpnoti tathāpatsu nimajjati //
analyzed: ajñānāt kleśam āpnoti tathā āpatsu nimajjati

original: MSS_0447-1 ajñānāmavanībhujāmaharaḥ svarṇābhiṣekotsavāj jñātuḥ śrīyuvaraṅgabhūparasikaślāghaiva saṃmānanā /
analyzed: ajñānām avanībhujām aharaḥ svarṇa abhiṣeka utsavāt jñātuḥ śrī yuvaraṅga bhūpa rasika ślāghā eva saṃmānanā

original: MSS_0447-2 sārāsāravivekaśūnyaramaṇīsaṃbhogasāmrājyataḥ sārajñendumukhīvilokakapaṭaścāturyayūnāṃ mude //
analyzed: sāra asāra viveka śūnya ramaṇī saṃbhoga sāmrājyataḥ sāra jña indu mukhī viloka kapaṭaḥ cāturya yūnām mude

original: MSS_0448-1 ajñānāmavirāmalaukikavacobhājāmamīṣāṃ punar mantroccāraṇa eva paryavasitaṃ maunavrataṃ karmasu /
analyzed: ajñānām avirāma laukika vacaḥ bhājām amīṣām punar mantra uccāraṇe eva paryavasitam mauna vratam karmasu

original: MSS_0448-2 grāmāyavyayalekhanena nayatāṃ kālānaśeṣānaho pāraṃparyata īdṛśāmiha nṛṇāṃ brāhmaṇyamanyādṛśam //
analyzed: grāma āya vyaya lekhanena nayatām kālān aśeṣān aho pāraṃparyataḥ īdṛśām iha nṛṇām brāhmaṇyam anyādṛśam

original: MSS_0449-1 ajñānena parāṅmukhīṃ paribhavādāśliṣya māṃ duḥkhitāṃ kiṃ labdhaṃ śaṭha durnayena nayatā saubhāgyametāṃ daśām /
analyzed: ajñānena parāṅmukhīm paribhavāt āśliṣya mām duḥkhitām kim labdham śaṭha durnayena nayatā saubhāgyam etām daśām

original: MSS_0449-2 paśyaitaddayitākucavyatikaronmṛṣṭāṅgarāgāruṇaṃ vakṣaste malatailapaṅkaśabalairveṇīpadairaṅkitam //
analyzed: paśya etat dayitā kuca vyatikara unmṛṣṭa aṅgarāga aruṇam vakṣaḥ te mala taila paṅka śabalaiḥ veṇī padaiḥ aṅkitam

original: MSS_0450-1 ajñānenāpihite vijñāne karma kiṃ kurute /
analyzed: ajñānena apihite vijñāne karma kim kurute

original: MSS_0450-2 vikale cakṣuṣi tamasā vyādāya mukhaṃ kimīkṣeta //
analyzed: vikale cakṣuṣi tamasā vyādāya mukham kim īkṣeta

original: MSS_0451-1 ajñānenāvṛto loko mātsaryānna prakāśate /
analyzed: ajñānena āvṛtaḥ lokaḥ mātsaryāt na prakāśate

original: MSS_0451-2 lobhāt tyajati mitrāṇi saṅgāt svargaṃ na gacchati //
analyzed: lobhāt tyajati mitrāṇi saṅgāt svargam na gacchati

original: MSS_0452-1 ajñānenāvṛto loko lobhena ca vaśīkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ajñānena āvṛtaḥ lokaḥ lobhena ca vaśīkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_0452-2 saṅgana bahubhirnaṣṭas tena svargaṃ na gacchati //
analyzed: bahubhiḥ naṣṭaḥ tena svargam na gacchati

original: MSS_0453-1 ajñānaikahato bālye yauvane gṛhatatparaḥ /
analyzed: ajñāna eka hataḥ bālye yauvane gṛha tatparaḥ

original: MSS_0453-2 vārdhake'patyacintārtaḥ karmabhirbadhyate punaḥ //
analyzed: vārddhakepatya cintā ārtaḥ karmabhiḥ badhyate punar

original: MSS_0454-1 ajñānopahato bālye yauvane madanāhataḥ /
analyzed: ajñāna upahataḥ bālye yauvane madana āhataḥ

original: MSS_0454-2 śeṣe kalatracintārtaḥ kiṃ karotu kadā janaḥ //
analyzed: śeṣe kalatra cintā ārtaḥ kim karotu kadā janaḥ

original: MSS_0455-1 ajñaścāśraddadhānaśca saṃśayātmā vinaśyati //
analyzed: ajñaḥ ca aśraddadhānaḥ ca saṃśaya ātmā vinaśyati

original: MSS_0455-2 nāyaṃ loko'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ //
analyzed: na ayam lokaḥ usti na paraḥ na sukham saṃśaya ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_0456-1 ajñāstaranti pāraṃ vijñā vijñāya drāṅnimajjanti /
analyzed: ajñāḥ taranti pāram vijñāḥ vijñāya drāk nimajjanti

original: MSS_0456-2 kathaya kalāvati keyaṃ tava nayanataraṅgiṇīrītiḥ //
analyzed: kathaya kalāvati kā iyam tava nayana taraṅgiṇī rītiḥ

original: MSS_0457-1 ajñebhyo granthinaḥ śreṣṭhā granthibhyo dhāriṇo varāḥ /
analyzed: ajñebhyaḥ granthinaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ granthibhyaḥ dhāriṇaḥ varāḥ

original: MSS_0457-2 dhāribhyo jñāninaḥ śreṣṭhā jñānibhyo vyavasāyinaḥ //
analyzed: dhāribhyaḥ jñāninaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ jñānibhyaḥ vyavasāyinaḥ

original: MSS_0458-1 ajñeṣvajño guṇiṣu guṇavān paṇḍite paṇḍito'sau dīne dīnaḥ sukhini sukhavān bhogino bhogibhāvaḥ /
analyzed: ajñeṣu ajñaḥ guṇiṣu guṇavān paṇḍite paṇḍitaḥ usau dīne dīnaḥ sukhini sukhavān bhoginaḥ bhogi bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_0458-2 jñātā jñāturyuvatiṣu yuvā vāgmināṃ tattvavettā dhanyaḥ so'yaṃ bhavati bhuvana yo'vadhūte'vadhūtaḥ //
analyzed: jñātā jñātuḥ yuvatiṣu yuvā vāgminām tattva vettā dhanyaḥ saḥ ayam bhavati bhuvana

original: MSS_0459-1 ajño jantuśca nīco'yam ātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
analyzed: ajñaḥ jantuḥ ca nīcaḥ yam ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: MSS_0459-2 īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā //
analyzed: īśvara preritaḥ gacchet svargam vā śvabhram eva vā

original: MSS_0460-1 ajño na vitaratyarthān punardāridriyaśaṅkayā /
analyzed: ajñaḥ na vitarati arthān punar dāridriya śaṅkayā

original: MSS_0460-2 prājño'pi vitaratyarthān punardāridriyaśaṅkayā //
analyzed: prājñaḥ api vitarati arthān punar dāridriya śaṅkayā

original: MSS_0461-1 ajño'pi tajjñatāmeti śanaiḥ śailo'pi cūrṇyate /
analyzed: ajñaḥ api tad jña tām eti śanais śailaḥ upi cūrṇyate

original: MSS_0461-2 bāṇo'pyeti mahālakṣyaṃ paśyābhyāsavijṛmbhitam //
analyzed: bāṇaḥ upyeti mahā lakṣyam paśya abhyāsa vijṛmbhitam

original: MSS_0462-1 ajño bhavati vai bālaḥ pitā bhavati mantradaḥ /
analyzed: ajñaḥ bhavati vai bālaḥ pitā bhavati mantra daḥ

original: MSS_0462-2 ajñaṃ hi bāla ityāhuḥ pitetyeva tu mantradam //
analyzed: ajñam hi bālaḥ iti āhuḥ pitā iti eva tu mantra dam

original: MSS_0463-1 ajño vā yadi vā viparyayagate jñāne'tha saṃdehabhṛd dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavirodhi karma kurute yastasya goptā guruḥ /
analyzed: ajñaḥ vā yadi vā viparyaya gate saṃdeha bhṛt dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa virodhi karma kurute yaḥ tasya goptā guruḥ

original: MSS_0463-2 niḥ saṃdehaviparyaye sati punarjñāne viruddhakriyaṃ rājā cet puruṣaṃ na śāsti tadayaṃ prāptaḥ prajāviplavaḥ //
analyzed: niḥ saṃdeha viparyaye sati punar jñāne viruddha kriyam rājā ced puruṣam na śāsti tat ayam prāptaḥ prajā viplavaḥ

original: MSS_0464-1 añcati rajanirudañcati timiramidaṃ cañcati mahobhūḥ /
analyzed: añcati rajaniḥ udañcati timiram idam cañcati mahaḥ bhūḥ

original: MSS_0464-2 uktaṃ na tyaja yuktaṃ viracaya raktaṃ manastasmin//
analyzed: uktam na tyaja yuktam viracaya raktam manaḥ tasmin

original: MSS_0465-1 añcalāntaritagurjarāṅganā- kuṅkmāruṇakucaprabhādharam /
analyzed: añcala antarita gurjara aṅganā kuṅkma aruṇa kuca prabhā adharam

original: MSS_0465-2 kokarāgapaṭalairnu rañjitaṃ bhānumantamudayantamāśraye //
analyzed: koka rāga paṭalaiḥ nu rañjitam bhānumantam udayantam āśraye

original: MSS_0466-1 añjanamustośīraiḥ sanāgakośātakāmalakacūrṇaiḥ /
analyzed: añjana mustā uśīraiḥ sa nāgakośātaka āmalaka cūrṇaiḥ

original: MSS_0466-2 katakaphalasamāyuktaiḥ kūpe yogaḥ pradātavyaḥ //
analyzed: kataka phala samāyuktaiḥ kūpe yogaḥ pradātavyaḥ

original: MSS_0467-1 añjanamiṣataḥ strīṇāṃ dṛśorviṣaṃ śaśvadāvasati /
analyzed: añjana miṣataḥ strīṇām dṛśoḥ viṣam śaśvat āvasati

original: MSS_0467-2 kathamanyathā tadīṣat pāte'pi hatā yuvānaḥ syuḥ //
analyzed: katham anyathā tat īṣat pāte pi hatāḥ yuvānaḥ syuḥ

original: MSS_0468-1 añjanasya kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā valmīkasya ca saṃcayam /
analyzed: añjanasya kṣayam dṛṣṭvā valmīkasya ca saṃcayam

original: MSS_0468-2 avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryād dānādhyayanakarmabhiḥ //
analyzed: avandhyam divasam kuryāt dāna adhyayana karmabhiḥ

original: MSS_0469-1 añjaliṃ śapathaṃ sāntvaṃ praṇamya śirasā vadet /
analyzed: añjalim śapatham sāntvam praṇamya śirasā vadet

original: MSS_0469-2 aśruprapātanaṃ caiva kartavyaṃ bhūtimicchatā //
analyzed: aśru prapātanam ca eva kartavyam bhūtim icchatā

original: MSS_0470-1 añjaliṃ śapathaṃ sāntvaṃ śirasā pādavandanam /
analyzed: añjalim śapatham sāntvam śirasā pāda vandanam

original: MSS_0470-2 āśākaraṇamityekaṃ kartavyaṃ bhūtimicchatā //
analyzed: āśākaraṇam iti ekam kartavyam bhūtim icchatā

original: MSS_0471-1 añjalirakāri lokair mlānimanāptaiva rañjitā jagatī /
analyzed: añjaliḥ akāri lokaiḥ mlānim anāptā eva rañjitā jagatī

original: MSS_0471-2 saṃdhyāyā iva vasatiḥ svalpāpi sakhe sukhāyaiva //
analyzed: saṃdhyāyāḥ iva vasatiḥ su alpā api sakhe sukhāya eva

original: MSS_0472-1 añjalisthāni puṣpāṇi vāsayanti karadvayam /
analyzed: añjali sthāni puṣpāṇi vāsayanti kara dvayam

original: MSS_0472-2 aho sumanasāṃ vṛttir vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ samā //
analyzed: aho sumanasām vṛttiḥ vāma dakṣiṇayoḥ samā

original: MSS_0473-1 añjalau jalamadhīralocanā locanapratiśarīraśāritam /
analyzed: añjalau jalam adhīra locanā locana pratiśarīra śāritam

original: MSS_0473-2 āttamāttamapi kāntamukṣituṃ kātarā śapharaśaṅkinī jahau //
analyzed: āttam āttam api kāntam ukṣitum kātarā śaphara śaṅkinī jahau

original: MSS_0474-1 aṭatā dhātrīmakhilām idamāścaryaṃ mayā dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: aṭatā dhātrīm akhilām idam āścaryam mayā dṛṣṭam

original: MSS_0474-2 dhanado'pi nayananandana pariharasi yadugrasaṃparkam //
analyzed: dhanadaḥ upi nayana nandana pariharasi yat ugra saṃparkam

original: MSS_0475-1 aṭatkaṭakaghoṭakaprakaṭacāpaṭaṅkāravac caṭaccaṭaditi sphuṭaṃ sphuṭati medinī karparam /
analyzed: aṭat kaṭaka ghoṭaka prakaṭa cāpa ṭaṅka āravat caṭat caṭat iti sphuṭam sphuṭati medinī karparam

original: MSS_0475-2 nijāmadharaṇīpatau valati kautukāḍambarād idaṃ bhuvanamaṇḍalaṃ daradarīdarīdaryaho //
analyzed: nijām a dharaṇī patau valati kautuka āḍambarāt idam bhuvana maṇḍalam dara darī darī dari aho

original: MSS_0476-1 aṭanena mahāraṇye supanthā jāyate śanaiḥ /
analyzed: aṭanena mahā araṇye su panthāḥ jāyate śanais

original: MSS_0476-2 vedābhyāsāt tathā jñānaṃ śanaiḥ parvatalaṅghanam //
analyzed: veda abhyāsāt tathā jñānam śanais parvata laṅghanam

original: MSS_0477-1 aṭa vā vikaṭaḥ patatranādaiḥ kaṭuvācaṃ raṭa vāthavā divāndha /
analyzed: aṭa vā vikaṭaḥ patatra nādaiḥ kaṭu vācam raṭa vā athavā divāndha

original: MSS_0477-2 paruṣaṃ paripaśya saṃyataṃ tat paramaṃ naḥ puramāgato na cet tvam //
analyzed: paruṣam paripaśya saṃyatam tat paramam naḥ puram āgataḥ na ced tvam

original: MSS_0478-1 aṭavī kīdṛśī prāyo durgamā bhavati priye /
analyzed: aṭavī kīdṛśī prāyas durgamā bhavati priye

original: MSS_0478-2 priyasya kīdṛśī kāntā tanoti suratotsavam //
analyzed: priyasya kīdṛśī kāntā tanoti surata utsavam

original: MSS_0479-1 aṭavyā drumapuṣpāṇi dūrasthā api bāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: aṭavyāḥ druma puṣpāṇi dūra sthāḥ api bāndhavāḥ

original: MSS_0479-2 kāntā cālekhyarūpā ca te kāle na pratiṣṭhitāḥ //
analyzed: kāntā ca ālekhya rūpā ca te kāle na pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: MSS_0480-1 aṭṭaśūlā janapadāḥ śivaśūlāścatuṣpathāḥ /
analyzed: aṭṭa śūlāḥ janapadāḥ śiva śūlāḥ catuṣpathāḥ

original: MSS_0480-2 keśaśūlāḥ striyo rājan bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye //
analyzed: keśa śūlāḥ striyaḥ rājan bhaviṣyanti yuga kṣaye

original: MSS_0481-1 aṇimā mahimā caiva laghimā garimā tathā /
analyzed: aṇimā mahimā ca eva laghimā garimā tathā

original: MSS_0481-2 prāptiḥ prākāmyamīśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ cāṣṭa siddhayaḥ //
analyzed: prāptiḥ prākāmyam īśitvam vaśitvam ca aṣṭa siddhayaḥ

original: MSS_0482-1 aṇukaṃ surataṃ nāma daṃpatyoḥ pārśvasaṃsthayoḥ /
analyzed: aṇukam suratam nāma daṃpatyoḥ pārśva saṃsthayoḥ

original: MSS_0482-2 jāyante nibiḍāśleṣāḥ samībhūtaśarīrayoḥ //
analyzed: jāyante nibiḍa āśleṣāḥ samībhūta śarīrayoḥ

original: MSS_0483-1 aṇunāpi praviśyāriṃ chidreṇa balavattaram /
analyzed: aṇunā api praviśya arim chidreṇa balavattaram

original: MSS_0483-2 niḥśeṣaṃ majjayedrāṣṭraṃ yānapātramivodakam //
analyzed: niḥśeṣam majjayet rāṣṭram yāna pātram iva udakam

original: MSS_0484-1 aṇu dhanamapi na tyājyaṃ mama bhavatā jñāpite satyam /
analyzed: aṇu dhanam api na tyājyam mama bhavatā jñāpite satyam

original: MSS_0484-2 vittaṃ jīvitamagryaṃ jīvitahānirdhanatyāgaḥ //
analyzed: vittam jīvitam agryam jīvita hāniḥ dhana tyāgaḥ

original: MSS_0485-1 aṇupūrvaṃ bṛhat paścād bhavatyāryeṣu saṃgatam /
analyzed: aṇu pūrvam bṛhat paścāt bhavati āryeṣu saṃgatam

original: MSS_0485-2 viparītamanāryeṣu yathecchasi tathā kuru //
analyzed: viparītam anāryeṣu yathā icchasi tathā kuru

original: MSS_0486-1 aṇubhyaśca mahadbhyaśca śāstrebhyaḥ kuśalo naraḥ /
analyzed: aṇubhyaḥ ca mahadbhyaḥ ca śāstrebhyaḥ kuśalaḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_0486-2 sarvatḥ sāramādadyāt puṣpebhya iva ṣaṭpadaḥ //
analyzed: sarvatas sāram ādadyāt puṣpebhyaḥ iva ṣaṭpadaḥ

original: MSS_0487-1 aṇumātraṃ yathā śalyaṃ śarīre duḥkhadāyakam /
analyzed: aṇu mātram yathā śalyam śarīre duḥkha dāyakam

original: MSS_0487-2 tathātisū . . saṃyuktaṃ manaḥ saṃsāradāyakam //
MSS_0488-1 aṇurapi nanu naiva kroḍabhūṣāsya kācit paribhajasi yadetattadvibhūtistathaiva /
analyzed: aṇuḥ api nanu nā eva kroḍa bhūṣā asya kācid paribhajasi yat etat tad vibhūtiḥ tathā eva

original: MSS_0488-2 iha sarasi manojñe saṃtataṃ pātumambhaḥ śramaparibhavamagnāḥ ke na magnāḥ karīndrāḥ //
analyzed: iha sarasi manojñe saṃtatam pātum ambhaḥ śrama paribhava magnāḥ ke na magnāḥ kari indrāḥ

original: MSS_0489-1 aṇurapi maṇiḥ prāṇatrāṇakṣamo viṣabhakṣiṇāṃ śiśurapi ruṣā siṃhīsūnuḥ samāhvayate gajān /
analyzed: aṇuḥ api maṇiḥ prāṇa trāṇa kṣamaḥ viṣa bhakṣiṇām śiśuḥ api ruṣā siṃhī sūnuḥ samāhvayate gajān

original: MSS_0489-2 tanurapi taruskandhodbhūto dahatyanalo vanaṃ prakṛtimahatāṃ jātyaṃ tejo na mūrtimapekṣate //
analyzed: tanuḥ api taru skandha udbhūtaḥ dahati analaḥ vanam prakṛti mahatām jātyam tejaḥ na mūrtim apekṣate

original: MSS_0490-1 aṇurapyasatāṃ saṅgaḥ sadguṇaṃ hanti vistṛtam /
analyzed: aṇuḥ api asatām saṅgaḥ sat guṇam hanti vistṛtam

original: MSS_0490-2 guṇarupāntaraṃ yāti takrayogādyathā payaḥ //
analyzed: guṇa rupa antaram yāti takra yogāt yathā payaḥ

original: MSS_0491-1 aṇurapyupahanti vigrahaḥ prabhumantaḥ prakṛtiprakopajaḥ /
analyzed: aṇuḥ api upahanti vigrahaḥ prabhumantaḥ prakṛti prakopa jaḥ

original: MSS_0491-2 akhilaṃ hi hinasti bhūdharaṃ taruśākhāntanigharṣajo'nalaḥ //
analyzed: akhilam hi hinasti bhūdharam taru śākhā anta nigharṣa jaḥ unalaḥ

original: MSS_0492-1 aṇoraṇīyān mahato mahīyān ātmāsya jantor nihito guhāyām /
analyzed: aṇoḥ aṇīyān mahataḥ mahīyān ātmā asya jantoḥ nihitaḥ guhāyām

original: MSS_0492-2 tamakratuḥ paśyati vītaśoko dhātuprasādānmahimānamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: tam akratuḥ paśyati vīta śokaḥ dhātu prasādāt mahimānam ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_0493-1 aṇoraṇīyān mahato mahīyān madhyo nitambaśca mama priyāyāḥ /
analyzed: aṇoḥ aṇīyān mahataḥ mahīyān madhyaḥ nitambaḥ ca mama priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_0493-2 yajñopavītaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ kiṃcāṅgarāgāruṇitaṃ priyāyāḥ //
analyzed: yajñopavītam paramam pavitram kiṃca aṅgarāga aruṇitam priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_0494-1 aṇoraṇīyān mahato mahīyān yoge viyoge divaso'ṅganāyāḥ /
analyzed: aṇoḥ aṇīyān mahataḥ mahīyān yoge viyoge divasa uṅganāyāḥ

original: MSS_0494-2 yajñopavītaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ spṛṣṭvā sakhe satyamidaṃ bravīmi //
analyzed: yajñopavītam paramam pavitram spṛṣṭvā sakhe satyam idam bravīmi

original: MSS_0495-1 aṇḍaṃ kaṇḍūyamānena yat sukhaṃ tava bhūpate /
analyzed: aṇḍam kaṇḍūyamānena yat sukham tava bhūpate

original: MSS_0495-2 khurjanānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhūyāttu tava vairiṇām //
analyzed: khurjana anantaram duḥkham bhūyāt tu tava vairiṇām

original: MSS_0496-1 aṇḍajāḥ puṇḍarīkeṣu samudreṣu janārdanāḥ /
analyzed: aṇḍajāḥ puṇḍarīkeṣu samudreṣu jana ardanāḥ

original: MSS_0496-2 nīlakaṇṭhāśca śaileṣu nivasantu na tena te //
analyzed: nīla kaṇṭhāḥ ca śaileṣu nivasantu na tena te

original: MSS_0497-1 aṇḍābhyāṃ lomaśābhyāṃ tu jātāṇḍo na hitaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: aṇḍābhyām lomaśābhyām tu jāta aṇḍaḥ na hitaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_0497-2 bharamābhāvaktrapucchaṃ ca kṛṣṇanīlaṃ parityajet /
MSS_0497-3 nindyaḥ kevalakṛṣṇastu sarvaśvetastu pūjitaḥ //
analyzed: nindyaḥ kevala kṛṣṇaḥ tu sarva śvetaḥ tu pūjitaḥ

original: MSS_0498-1 aṇvapi guṇāya mahatāṃ mahadapi doṣāya doṣiṇāṃ sukṛtam /
analyzed: aṇu api guṇāya mahatām mahat api doṣāya doṣiṇām su kṛtam

original: MSS_0498-2 tṛṇamapi dugdhāya gavāṃ dugdhamapi viṣāya sarpāṇām //
analyzed: tṛṇam api dugdhāya gavām dugdham api viṣāya sarpāṇām

original: MSS_0499-1 ataḥ kavirnāmasu yāvadarthaḥ syādapramatto vyavasāyabuddhiḥ /
analyzed: atas kaviḥ nāmasu yāvat arthaḥ syāt apramattaḥ vyavasāya buddhiḥ

original: MSS_0499-2 siddhe'nyathā'rthe na yateta bhūyaḥ pariśramaṃ tatra samīkṣamāṇaḥ //
analyzed: na yateta bhūyas pariśramam tatra samīkṣamāṇaḥ

original: MSS_0500-1 ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi khaḍgalakṣaṇamuttamam /
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi khaḍga lakṣaṇam uttamam

original: MSS_0500-2 pradhānadehasaṃbhūtair daityāsthibhirariṃdam //
analyzed: pradhāna deha saṃbhūtaiḥ daitya asthibhiḥ ariṃdam

original: MSS_0501-1 ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi śarāṇāṃ lakṣaṇāṃ śubham /
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi śarāṇām lakṣaṇām śubham

original: MSS_0501-2 sthūlaṃ na cātisūkṣmaṃ ca na pakvaṃ na kubhūmijam /
analyzed: sthūlam na ca ati sūkṣmam ca na pakvam na ku bhūmi jam

original: MSS_0501-3 hīnagranthividīrṇaṃ ca varjayedīdṛśaṃ śaram //
analyzed: hīna granthi vidīrṇam ca varjayet īdṛśam śaram

original: MSS_0502-1 ataḥ paramagamyo'yaṃ panthā viśramyatāmiti /
analyzed: atas param agamyā uyam panthāḥ viśramyatām iti

original: MSS_0502-2 pratyakṣiyugalaṃ tasyāḥ karṇau vaktumivāgatau //
analyzed: pratyakṣi yugalam tasyāḥ karṇau vaktum iva āgatau

original: MSS_0503-1 ataḥ praśaste nakṣatre śubhe vāre śuciṣmatā /
analyzed: atas praśaste nakṣatre śubhe vāre śuciṣmatā

original: MSS_0503-2 auṣadhaṃ vidhivadgrāhyaṃ smṛtvā devīṃ ca suprabhām //
analyzed: auṣadham vidhivat grāhyam smṛtvā devīm ca suprabhām

original: MSS_0503-3 mantraḥ -- oṃ suprabhāyai namaḥ //
analyzed: mantraḥ om suprabhāyai namaḥ

original: MSS_0504-1 ataḥ saṃdehadolāyāṃ ropaṇīyaṃ na mānasam /
analyzed: atas saṃdeha dolāyām ropaṇīyam na mānasam

original: MSS_0504-2 granthe'smiṃścāpacaturair cīracintāmaṇau kvacit //
analyzed: granthe asmin cāpa caturaiḥ cīra cintāmaṇau kvacid

original: MSS_0505-1 ataḥ samīkṣya kartavyaṃ viśeṣāt saṃgataṃ rahaḥ /
analyzed: atas samīkṣya kartavyam viśeṣāt saṃgatam rahaḥ

original: MSS_0505-2 ajñātahṛdayeṣvevaṃ vairībhavati sauhṛdam //
analyzed: ajñāta hṛdayeṣu evam vairībhavati sauhṛdam

original: MSS_0506-1 ataḥ susthitacittena prasthātavyaṃ śubhe dine /
analyzed: atas susthita cittena prasthātavyam śubhe dine

original: MSS_0506-2 smṛtvā kṣemaṃkarīṃ devīṃ paśyatā śakunāñśubhān //
analyzed: smṛtvā kṣemaṃkarīm devīm paśyatā śakunān śubhān

original: MSS_0507-1 ata āhartumicchāmi pārvatīmātmajanmane /
analyzed: atas āhartum icchāmi pārvatīm ātmajanmane

original: MSS_0507-2 utpattaye havirbhoṃktur yajamāna ivāraṇim //
analyzed: utpattaye haviḥ bhoṃktuḥ yajamānaḥ iva araṇim

original: MSS_0508-1 ata eva hi necchanti sādhavaḥ satsamāgamam /
analyzed: atas eva hi na icchanti sādhavaḥ sat samāgamam

original: MSS_0508-2 yadviyogāsilūnasya manaso nāsti bheṣajam //
analyzed: yad viyoga asi lūnasya manasaḥ nā asti bheṣajam

original: MSS_0509-1 ataṭasthasvāduphala- grahaṇavyavasāyaniścayo yeṣām /
MSS_0509-2 te śokakleśarujāṃ kevalamupayānti pātratāṃ mandāḥ //
analyzed: te śoka kleśa rujām kevalam upayānti pātra tām mandāḥ

original: MSS_0510-1 atattvajño'si bālaśca dustoṣo'pūraṇo'nalaḥ /
analyzed: a tattva jñaḥ asi bālaḥ ca dustoṣa upūraṇa unalaḥ

original: MSS_0510-2 naiva tvaṃ vettha sulabhaṃ naiva tvaṃ vettha durlabham //
analyzed: na eva tvam vettha sulabham na eva tvam vettha durlabham

original: MSS_0511-1 atathyānyapi tathyāni darśayanti hi peśalāḥ /
analyzed: atathyāni api tathyāni darśayanti hi peśalāḥ

original: MSS_0511-2 same nimnonnatānīva citrakarmavido janāḥ //
analyzed: same nimna unnatāni iva citra karma vidaḥ janāḥ

original: MSS_0512-1 atathyāstathyasaṃkāśās tathyāścātathyadarśanāḥ /
analyzed: atathyāḥ tathya saṃkāśāḥ tathyāḥ ca atathya darśanāḥ

original: MSS_0512-2 dṛśyante vividhā bhāvās tasmādyuktaṃ parīkṣaṇam //
analyzed: dṛśyante vividhāḥ bhāvāḥ tasmāt yuktam parīkṣaṇam

original: MSS_0513-1 atathyenocyamānasya kaḥ kopo yanna tattathā /
analyzed: atathyena ucyamānasya kaḥ kopaḥ yat na tat tathā

original: MSS_0513-2 tathyenāpi hi kaḥ kopo yadanukte'pi mattathā //
analyzed: tathyena api hi kaḥ kopaḥ yat anukta ipi mat tathā

original: MSS_0514-1 atanujvarapīḍitāsi bāle tava saukhyāya mato mamopavāsaḥ /
analyzed: a tanu jvara pīḍitā asi bāle tava saukhyāya mataḥ mama upavāsaḥ

original: MSS_0514-2 rasamarpaya vaidyanātha nāhaṃ bhavadāveditalaṅghane samarthā //
analyzed: rasam arpaya vaidya nātha na aham bhavat āvedita laṅghane samarthā

original: MSS_0515-1 atanunā navamambudamāmbudaṃ sutanurastramudastamavekṣya sā /
analyzed: a tanunā navam ambudam āmbudam su tanuḥ astram udastam avekṣya sā

original: MSS_0515-2 ucitamāyataniḥśvasitacchalāc chvasanaśastramamuñcadamuṃ prati //
analyzed: ucitam āyata niḥśvasita chalāt śvasana śastram amuñcat amum prati

original: MSS_0516-1 atantrī vāgvīṇā stanayugalamagrīvakalasā- vanabjaṃ dṛṅnīlotpaladalamapatrorukadalī /
analyzed: a tantrī vāc vīṇā stana yugalam a grīva kalasā vana abjam dṛś nīlotpala dalam a pattra ūru kadalī

original: MSS_0516-2 akāṇḍā dorvallī vadanamalakalaṅkaḥ śaśadharas tadasyāstāruṇyaṃ bhuvanaviparītaṃ ghaṭayati //
analyzed: akāṇḍā dos vallī vadanam ala kalaṅkaḥ śaśadharaḥ tat asyāḥ tāruṇyam bhuvana viparītam ghaṭayati

original: MSS_0517-1 atandracandrābharaṇā samuddīpitamanmathā /
analyzed: atandra candra ābharaṇā samuddīpita manmathā

original: MSS_0517-2 tārakātaralā śyāmā sānandaṃ na karoti kam //
analyzed: tārakā taralā śyāmā sa ānandam na karoti kam

original: MSS_0518-1 atandritacamūpatiprahitahastamasvīkṛta- praṇītamaṇipādukaṃ kimiti vismitāntaḥpuram /
analyzed: atandrita camūpati prahita hastam asvīkṛta praṇīta maṇi pādukam kim iti vismita antaḥpuram

original: MSS_0518-2 avāhanapariṣkriyaṃ patagarājamārohataḥ karipravarabṛṃhite bhagavatastvarāyai namaḥ //
analyzed: a vāhana pariṣkriyam pataga rājam ārohataḥ kari pravara bṛṃhite bhagavataḥ tvarāyai namaḥ

original: MSS_0519-1 atasīkusumopameyakāntir yamunālakukadambamūlavartī /
MSS_0519-2 navagopavadhūvinodaśālī vanamālī vitanotu maṅgalāni //
analyzed: nava gopa vadhū vinoda śālī vanamālī vitanotu maṅgalāni

original: MSS_0520-1 atasīpuṣpasaṃkāśaṃ khaṃ vīkṣya jaladāgame /
analyzed: atasī puṣpa saṃkāśam kham vīkṣya jaladāgame

original: MSS_0520-2 ye viyoge'pi jīvanti na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayam //
analyzed: ye viyoge api jīvanti na teṣām vidyate bhayam

original: MSS_0521-1 ataskarakaragrāhyam arājājñāvaśaṃvadam /
analyzed: a taskara kara grāhyam a rāja ājñā vaśaṃvadam

original: MSS_0521-2 adāyādavibhāgārhaṃ dhanamārjayatasthiram //
analyzed: a dāyāda vibhāga arham dhanam ārjayata sthiram

original: MSS_0522-1 atastu viparītasya nṛpaterajitātmanaḥ /
analyzed: atas tu viparītasya nṛpateḥ ajita ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_0522-2 saṃkṣipyate yaśo loke ghṛtabindurivāmbhasi //
analyzed: saṃkṣipyate yaśaḥ loke ghṛta binduḥ iva ambhasi

original: MSS_0523-1 atastvaṣṭāṅgayā buddhyā nṛpatirnītiśāstravit /
analyzed: atas tu aṣṭa aṅgayā buddhyā nṛpatiḥ nīti śāstra vid

original: MSS_0523-2 samarthaḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnām api jetuṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: samarthaḥ pṛthivīm kṛtsnām api jetum vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_0524-1 atāḍayat pallavapāṇinaikāṃ puṣpoccaye rājavadhūmaśokaḥ /
analyzed: atāḍayat pallava pāṇinā ekām puṣpa uccaye rāja vadhūm aśokaḥ

original: MSS_0524-2 tacchedahetoralipaṅki bhaṅgyā vyākṛṣyate vāsilatā smareṇa //
analyzed: tad cheda hetoḥ ali paṅki bhaṅgyā vyākṛṣyate vā asi latā smareṇa

original: MSS_0525-1 atikaluṣamāśunaśvaram āpātasphuraṇamanabhilāṣakaram /
analyzed: ati kaluṣam āśu naśvaram āpāta sphuraṇam anabhilāṣa karam

original: MSS_0525-2 api hṛṣyanti janāḥ katham avalambya jñānakhadyotam //
analyzed: api hṛṣyanti janāḥ katham avalambya jñāna khadyotam

original: MSS_0526-1 atikupitamanaske kopaniṣpattihetuṃ vidadhati sati śatrau vikriyāṃ citrarūpām /
analyzed: ati kupita manaske kopa niṣpatti hetum vidadhati sati śatrau vikriyām citra rūpām

original: MSS_0526-2 vadati vacanamuccairduḥśravaṃ karkaśādi kaluṣavikalatā yā tāṃ kṣamāṃ varṇayanti //
analyzed: vadati vacanam uccais duḥśravam karkaśa ādi kaluṣa vikala tā yā tām kṣamām varṇayanti

original: MSS_0527-1 atikupitā api sujanā yogena mṛdūbhavanti na tu nīcāḥ /
analyzed: ati kupitāḥ api su janāḥ yogena mṛdūbhavanti na tu nīcāḥ

original: MSS_0527-2 hemnaḥ kaṭhinasyāpi dravaṇopāyo'sti na tṛṇānām //
analyzed: hemnaḥ kaṭhinasya api dravaṇa upāyaḥ asti na tṛṇānām

original: MSS_0528-1 atikṛṣṇeṣvatigaureṣv atipīneṣvatikṛśeṣu manujeṣu /
analyzed: ati kṛṣṇeṣu ati gaureṣu ati pīneṣu ati kṛśeṣu manujeṣu

original: MSS_0528-2 atidīrgheṣvatilaghuṣu prāyeṇa na vidyate'patyam //
analyzed: ati dīrgheṣu ati laghuṣu prāyeṇa na vidyatepatyam

original: MSS_0529-1 atikramyāpāṅgaṃ śravaṇapathaparyantagamana- prayāsenevākṣṇostaralataratāraṃ gamitayoḥ /
analyzed: atikramya apāṅgam śravaṇapatha paryanta gamana prayāsena iva akṣṇoḥ taralatara tāram gamitayoḥ

original: MSS_0529-2 idānīṃ rādhāyāḥ priyatamasamāyātasamaye papātasve dāmbuprasara iva harṣāśrunikaraḥ //
analyzed: idānīm rādhāyāḥ priyatama samāyāta samaye papāta sve da ambu prasare iva harṣa aśru nikaraḥ

original: MSS_0530-1 atikrāntaṃ tu yaḥ kāryaṃ paścāccintayate naraḥ /
analyzed: atikrāntam tu yaḥ kāryam paścāt cintayate naraḥ

original: MSS_0530-2 taccāsya na bhavet kāryaṃ cintayā tu vinaśyati //
analyzed: tat ca asya na bhavet kāryam cintayā tu vinaśyati

original: MSS_0531-1 atikrāntaḥ kālaḥ sucaritaśatāmodasubhago gatāḥ śuklā dharmā navanalinasūtrāṃśutanutām /
analyzed: atikrāntaḥ kālaḥ su carita śata āmoda subhagaḥ gatāḥ śuklāḥ dharmāḥ nava nalina sūtra aṃśu tanu tām

original: MSS_0531-2 parimlānaḥ prāyo budhajanakathāsāranipuṇo nirānandaṃ jātaṃ jagadidamatītotsavamiva //
analyzed: parimlānaḥ prāyas budha jana kathā sāra nipuṇaḥ nirānandam jātam jagat idam atīta utsavam iva

original: MSS_0532-1 atikrāntaḥ kālo laṭabhalalanābhogasubhago bhramantaḥ śrāntāḥ smaḥ suciramiha saṃ sārasaraṇau /
analyzed: atikrāntaḥ kālaḥ laṭabha lalanā bhoga subhagaḥ bhramantaḥ śrāntāḥ smaḥ su ciram iha sam sāra saraṇau

original: MSS_0532-2 idānīṃ svaḥ sindhostaṭabhuvi samākrandanagiraḥ sutāraiḥ phūtkāraiḥ śiva śiva śiveti pratanumaḥ //
analyzed: idānīm svar sindhoḥ taṭa bhuvi samākrandana giraḥ su tāraiḥ phūtkāraiḥ śiva śiva śiva iti pratanumaḥ
