original: MSS_0533-1 atikrāntamatikrāntam anāgatamanāgatam /
analyzed: atikrāntam atikrāntam anāgatam anāgatam

original: MSS_0533-2 vartamānasukhabhrāntir navā bhogidaridrayoḥ //
MSS_0534-1 atikleśena yad dravyam atilobhena yatsukham /
analyzed: ati kleśena yat dravyam ati lobhena yat sukham

original: MSS_0534-2 parapīḍā ca yā vṛttir naiva sādhuṣu vidyate //
analyzed: para pīḍā ca yā vṛttiḥ nā eva sādhuṣu vidyate

original: MSS_0535-1 atikleśena ye'rthāḥ syur dharmasyātikrameṇa ca /
analyzed: ati kleśena syuḥ dharmasya atikrameṇa ca

original: MSS_0535-2 arervā praṇipātena mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ //
analyzed: areḥ vā praṇipātena mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ

original: MSS_0536-1 atikleśe manaḥsthairyaṃ krameṇa sahanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ati kleśe manaḥ sthairyam krameṇa sahanam tathā

original: MSS_0536-2 jayalābhāya hetū dvau sainyānāmadhikau viduḥ //
analyzed: jaya lābhāya hetū dvau sainyānām adhikau viduḥ

original: MSS_0537-1 atigambhīramanāvilam akṣobhyamadṛṣṭapāramavilaṅghyam /
analyzed: ati gambhīram anāvilam akṣobhyam adṛṣṭa pāram avilaṅghyam

original: MSS_0537-2 aviralataraṅgasaṃkulam ekṣiṣi vijñānasāgaraṃ mahatām //
analyzed: avirala taraṅga saṃkulam ekṣiṣi vijñāna sāgaram mahatām

original: MSS_0538-1 atigambhīre bhūpe kūpa iva janasya duḥkhatārasya /
analyzed: ati gambhīre bhūpe kūpe iva janasya duḥkha tārasya

original: MSS_0538-2 dadhati samīhitasiddhiṃ guṇavantaḥ pārthivā ghaṭakāḥ //
analyzed: dadhati samīhita siddhim guṇavantaḥ pārthivāḥ ghaṭakāḥ

original: MSS_0539-1 aticapalakalatraṃ prātiveśmāticaura- stanayagatimāṃdhaṃ (?)
analyzed: ati capala kalatram prātiveśmā ati cauraḥ stanaya gatimān andham

original: bālaraṇḍā tanūjā /
analyzed: bāla raṇḍā tanūjā

original: MSS_0539-2 atiśaṭhamatha maitrī (?)
analyzed: ati śaṭham atha maitrī

original: vaśyatā sarvajanto ripubhayatanurogau cāṣṭaduḥkhaṃ narāṇām //
analyzed: vaśya tā sarva jantoḥ ripu bhaya tanu rogau ca aṣṭa duḥkham narāṇām

original: MSS_0540-1 aticārucandrarociḥ kurvan kusumeṣukeliketanatām /
analyzed: ati cāru candra rociḥ kurvan kusumeṣu keli ketana tām

original: MSS_0540-2 surabhiḥ kadānuyāsyati samukularucirastanīhāraḥ //
analyzed: surabhiḥ kadā anuyāsyati sa mukula rucira stanīhāraḥ

original: MSS_0541-1 aticirādanuṣaṅgavataḥ kaṇā- navanijān yadi hema jihāsasi /
analyzed: ati cirāt anuṣaṅgavataḥ kaṇāḥ nava nijān yadi hema jihāsasi

original: MSS_0541-2 paṭupuṭajvalanajvaravedanā tava bhavatyapayāti ca gauravam //
analyzed: paṭu puṭa jvalana jvara vedanā tava bhavati apayāti ca gauravam

original: MSS_0542-1 atijīrṇamapakvaṃ ca jñātidhṛṣṭaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: ati jīrṇam apakvam ca jñāti dhṛṣṭam tathā eva ca

original: MSS_0542-2 dagdhaṃ chidraṃ na kartavyaṃ bāhyābhyantarahastakam //
analyzed: dagdham chidram na kartavyam bāhya ābhyantara hastakam

original: MSS_0543-1 atijīvati vittena sukhaṃ jīvati vidyayā /
analyzed: atijīvati vittena sukham jīvati vidyayā

original: MSS_0543-2 kiṃcijjīvati śilpena ṛte karma na jīvati //
analyzed: kiṃcid jīvati śilpena ṛte karma na jīvati

original: MSS_0544-1 atitāmaso'jagandhiḥ kākaravo hrasvakūrcakaḥ pāpaḥ /
MSS_0544-2 bhīruḥ kudhīḥ piśāco rāsabhaliṅgastu vijñeyaḥ //
analyzed: bhīruḥ kudhīḥ piśācaḥ rāsabhaliṅgaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ

original: MSS_0545-1 atitṛṣṇā na kartavyā tṛṣṇāṃ naiva parityajet /
analyzed: atitṛṣṇā na kartavyā tṛṣṇām na eva parityajet

original: MSS_0545-2 atitṛṣṇābhibhūtasya śikhā bhavati mastake /
analyzed: ati tṛṣṇā abhibhūtasya śikhā bhavati mastake

original: MSS_0546-1 atitejasvyapi rājā pānāsakto na sādhayatyarthān /
analyzed: ati tejasvī api rājā pāna āsaktaḥ na sādhayati arthān

original: MSS_0546-2 tṛṇamapi dagdhuṃ śakto na vāḍavāgniḥ pibannaniśam //
analyzed: tṛṇam api dagdhum śaktaḥ na vāḍaba agniḥ piban aniśam

original: MSS_0547-1 atithiṃ nāma kākutsthāt putraṃ prāpa kumudvatī /
analyzed: atithim nāma kākutsthāt putram prāpa kumudvatī

original: MSS_0547-2 paścimādyāminīyāmāt prasādamiva cetanā //
analyzed: paścimāt yāminī yāmāt prasādam iva cetanā

original: MSS_0548-2 atithiḥ kila pūjārhaḥ prākṛto'pi vijānatā //
analyzed: atithiḥ kila pūjā arhaḥ prākṛtaḥ api vijānatā

original: MSS_0549-1 atithiḥ dvāri tiṣṭheta āpo gṛhṇāti yo naraḥ /
analyzed: atithiḥ dvāri tiṣṭheta āpaḥ gṛhṇāti yaḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_0549-2 āpośanaṃ surāpānam annaṃ gomāṃsabhakṣaṇam //
analyzed: surā pānam annam go māṃsa bhakṣaṇam

original: MSS_0550-1 atithiḥ pūjito yasya gṛhasthasya tu gacchati /
analyzed: atithiḥ pūjitaḥ yasya gṛhasthasya tu gacchati

original: MSS_0550-2 nānyastasmāt paro dharma iti prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: na anyaḥ tasmāt paraḥ dharmaḥ iti prāhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_0551-1 atithiḥ pūjito yasya dhyāyate manasā śabham /
analyzed: atithiḥ pūjitaḥ yasya dhyāyate manasā śabham

original: MSS_0551-2 na tat kratuśatenāpi tulyamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: na tat kratu śatena api tulyam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_0552-1 atithitvena varṇānāṃ deyaṃ śakyānupūrvaśaḥ /
analyzed: atithi tvena varṇānām deyam śakya anupūrvaśas

original: MSS_0552-2 apraṇodyo'tithiḥ sāyam api vāgbhūtṛṇodakaiḥ //
analyzed: a praṇodya utithiḥ sāyam api vāc bhūtṛṇa udakaiḥ

original: MSS_0553-1 atithirbālakaḥ patnī jananī janakastathā /
analyzed: atithiḥ bālakaḥ patnī jananī janakaḥ tathā

original: MSS_0553-2 pañcaite gṛhiṇaḥ poṣyā itare ca svaśaktitaḥ //
analyzed: pañca ete gṛhiṇaḥ poṣyāḥ itare ca sva śaktitaḥ

original: MSS_0554-1 atithirbālakaścaiva rājā bhāryā tathaiva ca /
analyzed: atithiḥ bālakaḥ ca eva rājā bhāryā tathā eva ca

original: MSS_0554-2 asti nāsti na jānanti dehi dehi punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: asti na asti na jānanti dehi dehi punar punar

original: MSS_0555-1 atithirbālakaścaīva strījano nṛpatistathā /
analyzed: atithiḥ bālakaḥ strī janaḥ nṛpatiḥ tathā

original: MSS_0555-2 ete vittaṃ na jānanti jāmātā caiva pañcamaḥ //
analyzed: ete vittam na jānanti jāmātā ca eva pañcamaḥ

original: MSS_0556-1 atithiryasya bhagnāśo gṛhātpratinivartate /
analyzed: atithiḥ yasya bhagna āśaḥ gṛhāt pratinivartate

original: MSS_0556-2 sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyamādāya gacchati //
analyzed: sa dattvā duṣkṛtam tasmai puṇyam ādāya gacchati

original: MSS_0557-1 atithiścāpavādī ca dvāvetau mama bāndhavau /
analyzed: atithiḥ ca apavādī ca dvau etau mama bāndhavau

original: MSS_0557-2 apavādī haret pāpam atithiḥ svargasaṃkramaḥ //
analyzed: apavādī haret pāpam atithiḥ svarga saṃkramaḥ

original: MSS_0558-1 atithīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ preṣyāṇāṃ svajanasya ca /
analyzed: atithīnām ca sarveṣām preṣyāṇām sva janasya ca

original: MSS_0558-2 sāmānyaṃ bhojanaṃ sadbhir gṛhasthasya praśasyate //
analyzed: sāmānyam bhojanam sadbhiḥ gṛhasthasya praśasyate

original: MSS_0559-1 atithīnāṃ na satkāro na ca sajjanasaṃgamaḥ /
analyzed: atithīnām na satkāraḥ na ca sat jana saṃgamaḥ

original: MSS_0559-2 na yatra svātmavarṇāsthā sā gṛhāśramavañcanā //
analyzed: na yatra sva ātma varṇa āsthā sā gṛha āśrama vañcanā

original: MSS_0560-1 atidarpe hatā laṅkā atimāne ca kauravāḥ /
analyzed: ati darpe hatā laṅkā ati māne ca kauravāḥ

original: MSS_0560-2 atidāne balirbaddhaḥ sarvamatyantagarhitam //
analyzed: atidāne baliḥ baddhaḥ sarvam atyanta garhitam

original: MSS_0561-1 atidākṣiṇyayuktānāṃ śaṅkitānāṃ pade pade /
analyzed: ati dākṣiṇya yuktānām śaṅkitānām pade pade

original: MSS_0561-2 parāpavādibhīrūṇāṃ na bhavanti vibhūtayaḥ //
analyzed: para apavādi bhīrūṇām na bhavanti vibhūtayaḥ

original: MSS_0562-1 atidānāddhataḥ karṇastv atilobhāt suyodhanaḥ /
analyzed: atidānāt hataḥ karṇaḥ tu ati lobhāt suyodhanaḥ

original: MSS_0562-2 atikāmāddaśagrīvastv ati sarvatra varjayet //
analyzed: atikāmāt daśagrīvaḥ tu ati sarvatra varjayet

original: MSS_0563-1 atidānādbalirbaddho naṣṭo mānāt suyodhanaḥ /
analyzed: atidānāt baliḥ baddhaḥ naṣṭaḥ mānāt suyodhanaḥ

original: MSS_0563-2 vinaṣṭo rāvaṇo lau lyād ati sarvatra varjayet //
analyzed: vinaṣṭaḥ rāvaṇaḥ lau lyāt ati sarvatra varjayet

original: MSS_0564-1 atidānādbalirbaddho hyatimānāt suyodhanaḥ /
analyzed: atidānāt baliḥ baddhaḥ hi ati mānāt suyodhanaḥ

original: MSS_0564-2 atikāmāddaśagrīvo hyati sarvatra garhitaḥ //
analyzed: atikāmāt daśagrīvaḥ hi ati sarvatra garhitaḥ

original: MSS_0565-1 atidāne balirbaddho atimāne ca kauravāḥ /
analyzed: atidāne baliḥ baddhaḥ atimāne ca kauravāḥ

original: MSS_0565-2 atirūpe hṛtā sītā sarvamatyantagarhitam //
analyzed: atirūpe hṛtā sītā sarvam atyanta garhitam

original: MSS_0566-1 atidīrghajīvidoṣād vyāsena yaśo'pahāritaṃ hanta /
analyzed: ati dīrgha jīvi doṣāt vyāsena yaśaḥ upahāritam hanta

original: MSS_0566-2 kairnocyeta guṇāḍhyaḥ sa eva janmāntarāpannaḥ //
analyzed: kaiḥ nā ucyeta guṇa āḍhyaḥ saḥ eva janmāntara āpannaḥ

original: MSS_0567-1 atidūrapathaśrāntāś chāyāṃ yānti ca śītalām /
analyzed: ati dūra patha śrāntāḥ chāyām yānti ca śītalām

original: MSS_0567-2 śitalāśca punaryānti kā kasya paridevanā //
analyzed: śitalāḥ ca punar yānti kā kasya paridevanā

original: MSS_0568-1 ati dharmād balaṃ manye balād dharmaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: ati dharmāt balam manye balāt dharmaḥ pravartate

original: MSS_0568-2 bale pratiṣṭhito dharmo dharṇyāmiva jaṅgamam //
analyzed: bale pratiṣṭhitaḥ dharmaḥ dharṇyām iva jaṅgamam

original: MSS_0569-1 atinīcāni vākyāni dṛṣṭimātrātinindakaḥ /
analyzed: ati nīcāni vākyāni dṛṣṭi mātra ati nindakaḥ

original: MSS_0569-2 kṣudrasaṃvādabhāṣī yo hyevaṃ duṣṭaḥ śaṭho janaḥ //
analyzed: kṣudra saṃvāda bhāṣī yaḥ hi evam duṣṭaḥ śaṭhaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_0570-1 atipakvakapitthena liptapātre suyāmitam /
MSS_0570-2 dugdhamastuvihīnaṃ syāc candrabimbopamaṃ dadhi //
analyzed: dugdha mastu vihīnam syāt candra bimba upamam dadhi

original: MSS_0571-1 atipaṭalairanuyātāṃ sahṛdayahṛdayajvaraṃ vilumpantīm /
analyzed: ati paṭalaiḥ anuyātām sahṛdaya hṛdaya jvaram vilumpantīm

original: MSS_0571-2 mṛgamadaparimalalaharīṃ samīra pāmarapure kirasi //
analyzed: mṛgamada parimala laharīm samīra pāmara pure kirasi

original: MSS_0572-1 atiparamādbhutaveṣā kāpyeṣā jayati sṛṣṭirātmabhuvaḥ /
analyzed: ati parama adbhuta veṣā kā api eṣā jayati sṛṣṭiḥ ātmabhuvaḥ

original: MSS_0572-2 tat kiṃ na vāñchitaṃ syād asyā yadi vidhuravīkṣaṇaḥ pātā //
analyzed: tat kim na vāñchitam syāt asyāḥ yadi vidhura vīkṣaṇaḥ pātā

original: MSS_0573-1 atiparigṛhītamaunā varjitamālyānulepanasnānā /
analyzed: ati parigṛhīta maunā varjita mālya anulepana snānā

original: MSS_0573-2 dūrotsāritalajjā nirgranthagrantharacaneva //
analyzed: dūra utsārita lajjā nirgrantha grantha racanā iva

original: MSS_0574-1 atiparicayādavajñā bhavati viśiṣṭe'pi vastuni prāyaḥ /
analyzed: ati paricayāt avajñā bhavati viśiṣṭe api vastuni prāyas

original: MSS_0574-2 lokaḥ prayāgavāsī kūpe snānaṃ samācarati //
analyzed: lokaḥ prayāga vāsī kūpe snānam samācarati

original: MSS_0575-1 atiparicayādavajñā saṃtatagamanādanādaro bhavati /
analyzed: ati paricayāt avajñā saṃtata gamanāt anādaraḥ bhavati

original: MSS_0575-2 malaye bhillapurandhrī candanatarumindhanaṃ kurute //
analyzed: malaye bhillapurandhrī candana tarum indhanam kurute

original: MSS_0576-1 atiparicayādavajñety etad vākyaṃ mṛṣaiva tadbhāti /
analyzed: ati paricayāt avajñā iti etat vākyam mṛṣā eva tat bhāti

original: MSS_0576-2 atiparicite'pyanādau saṃsāre'smin na jāyate'vajñā //
analyzed: ati paricite pi anādau saṃsāre smin na jāyate ivajñā

original: MSS_0577-1 atipātitakālasādhanā svaśarīrendriyavargatāpanī /
MSS_0577-2 janavanna bhavantamakṣamā nayasiddherapanetumarhati //
analyzed: jana vat na bhavantam akṣamā naya siddheḥ apanetum arhati

original: MSS_0578-1 atipītāṃ tamorājīṃ tanīyān soḍhumakṣamaḥ /
analyzed: ati pītām tamaḥ rājīm tanīyān soḍhum akṣamaḥ

original: MSS_0578-2 vamatīva śanaireṣa pradīpaḥ kajjalacchalāt //
analyzed: vamati iva śanais eṣa pradīpaḥ kajjala chalāt

original: MSS_0579-1 atipūjitatāreyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ śrutilaṅghanakṣamā sutanu /
analyzed: ati pūjita tārā iyam dṛṣṭiḥ śruti laṅghana kṣamā su tanu

original: MSS_0579-2 jinasiddhāntasthitiriva savāsanā kaṃ na mohayati //
analyzed: jina siddhānta sthitiḥ iva sa vāsanā kam na mohayati

original: MSS_0580-1 atipelavamatiparimita- varṇaṃ laghutaramudāharati śaṭhaḥ /
analyzed: ati pelavam atiparimita varṇam laghutaram udāharati śaṭhaḥ

original: MSS_0580-2 paramārthataḥ sa hṛdayaṃ vahati punaḥ kālakūṭaghaṭitamiva //
analyzed: paramārthataḥ sa hṛdayam vahati punar kālakūṭa ghaṭitam iva

original: MSS_0581-1 atipracaṇḍāṃ bahupākapākinīṃ vivādaśīlāṃ svayameva taskarīm /
analyzed: ati pracaṇḍām bahu pāka pākinīm vivāda śīlām svayam eva taskarīm

original: MSS_0581-2 akrośabījāṃ paraveśmagāminīṃ tyajeta bhāryāṃ daśaputrasūrapi //
analyzed: a krośa bījām para veśma gāminīm tyajeta bhāryām daśa putra sūḥ api

original: MSS_0582-1 atipracaṇḍā bahuduḥkhabhāginī vivādaśīlā paragehagāminī /
analyzed: ati pracaṇḍā bahu duḥkha bhāginī vivāda śīlā para geha gāminī

original: MSS_0582-2 bhartuḥ svayaṃ nindati yā ca taskarī tyajet svabhāryāṃ daśaputraputriṇīm //
analyzed: bhartuḥ svayam nindati yā ca taskarī tyajet sva bhāryām daśa putra putriṇīm

original: MSS_0583-1 atiprauḍhā rātrirbahalaśikhadīpaḥ prabhavati priyaḥ premārabdhasmaravidhirasajñaḥ paramasau /
analyzed: ati prauḍhā rātriḥ bahala śikha dīpaḥ prabhavati priyaḥ prema ārabdha smara vidhi rasa jñaḥ param asau

original: MSS_0583-2 sakhi svairaṃ svairaṃ suratamakarodvrīḍitavapur yataḥ paryaṅko'yaṃ ripuriva kaḍatkāramukharaḥ //
analyzed: sakhi svairam svairam suratam akarot vrīḍita vapuḥ yatas paryaṅkaḥ yam ripuḥ iva kaḍatkāra mukharaḥ

original: MSS_0584-1 atibalināmapi malinā- śayena balikarṇaputrāṇām /
analyzed: ati balinām api malinā śayena balikarṇa putrāṇām

original: MSS_0584-2 viśvāsopanatānāṃ vāsoputreṇa jīvitaṃ jahre //
analyzed: viśvāsa upanatānām vāsas putreṇa jīvitam jahre

original: MSS_0585-1 atibahutaralajjāśṛṅkhalābaddhapādo madananṛpativāho yauvanonmattahastī /
analyzed: ati bahutara lajjā śṛṅkhalā baddha pādaḥ madana nṛpati vāhaḥ yauvana unmatta hastī

original: MSS_0585-2 prakaṭitakucakumbho lomarājīkareṇa pibati sarasi nābhīmaṇḍalākhye payāṃsi //
analyzed: prakaṭita kuca kumbhaḥ lomarājī kareṇa pibati sarasi nābhī maṇḍala ākhye payāṃsi

original: MSS_0586-1 atibhīrumatiklībaṃ dīrghasūtraṃ pramādinam /
analyzed: atibhīrum atiklībam dīrghasūtram pramādinam

original: MSS_0586-2 vyasanād viṣayākrāntaṃ na bhajanti nṛpaṃ prajāḥ //
analyzed: vyasanāt viṣaya ākrāntam na bhajanti nṛpam prajāḥ

original: MSS_0587-1 atimandacandanamahīdharavātaṃ stabakābhirāmalatikātarujātam /
analyzed: ati manda candana mahīdhara vātam stabaka abhirāma latikā taru jātam

original: MSS_0587-2 api tāpasānupavanaṃ madanārtān madamañjuguñjadalipuñjamakārṣīt //
analyzed: api tāpasa anupavanam madana ārtān mada mañju guñjat ali puñjam akārṣīt

original: MSS_0588-1 atimaline kartavye bhavati khalānāmatīva nipuṇā dhīḥ /
analyzed: ati maline kartavye bhavati khalānām atīva nipuṇā dhīḥ

original: MSS_0588-2 timire hi kauśikānāṃ rūpaṃ pratipadyate dṛṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: timire hi kauśikānām rūpam pratipadyate dṛṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_0589-1 atimātrabhāsuratvaṃ puṣyati bhānuḥ parigrahādahnaḥ /
analyzed: atimātra bhāsura tvam puṣyati bhānuḥ parigrahāt ahnaḥ

original: MSS_0589-2 adhigacchati mahimānaṃ candro'pi niśāparigṛhītaḥ //
analyzed: adhigacchati mahimānam candraḥ api niśā parigṛhītaḥ

original: MSS_0590-1 atimānaḥ śriyaṃ hanti puruṣasyālpamedhasaḥ /
analyzed: atimānaḥ śriyam hanti puruṣasya alpa medhasaḥ

original: MSS_0590-2 garbheṇa duṣyate kanyā gṛhavāsena ca dvijaḥ //
analyzed: garbheṇa duṣyate kanyā gṛha vāsena ca dvijaḥ

original: MSS_0591-1 atimāninamagrāhyam ātmasaṃbhāvitaṃ naram /
analyzed: atimāninam agrāhyam ātma saṃbhāvitam naram

original: MSS_0591-2 krodhanaṃ vyasane hanti svajano'pi narādhipam //
analyzed: krodhanam vyasane hanti sva janaḥ upi narādhipam

original: MSS_0592-1 atimṛdu navanītāccandrakāccātiramyaṃ bahulalitasudhāyāḥ svādataḥ sadrasāḍhyam /
analyzed: ati mṛdu navanītāt candrakāt ca ati ramyam bahu lalita sudhāyāḥ svādataḥ sat rasa āḍhyam

original: MSS_0592-2 sakalalalitabhogāgārabhāgyaikayogyaṃ parilasati haviṣyaṃ kasya gallacchalena //
analyzed: sakala lalita bhogāgāra bhāgya eka yogyam parilasati haviṣyam kasya galla chalena

original: MSS_0593-1 atiyatnagṛhīto'pi khalaḥ khalakhalāyate /
analyzed: ati yatna gṛhītaḥ api khalaḥ khalakhalāyate

original: MSS_0593-2 śirasā dhāryamāṇo'pi toyasyārdhaghaṭo yathā //
analyzed: śirasā dhāryamāṇaḥ api toyasya ardha ghaṭaḥ yathā

original: MSS_0594-1 atiramaṇīye kāvye piśuno'nveṣayati dūśaṇānyeva /
analyzed: ati ramaṇīye kāvye

original: MSS_0594-2 atiramaṇīye vapuṣi vraṇameva hi makṣikānikaraḥ //
analyzed: ati ramaṇīye vapuṣi vraṇam eva hi makṣikā nikaraḥ

original: MSS_0595-1 atirāgād daśagrīvo hyatilobhāt suyodhanaḥ /
analyzed: ati rāgāt daśagrīvaḥ hi ati lobhāt suyodhanaḥ

original: MSS_0595-2 atidānād dhataḥ karṇo hyatiḥ sarvatra garhitaḥ //
analyzed: atidānāt hataḥ karṇaḥ hi atiḥ sarvatra garhitaḥ

original: MSS_0596-1 atiricyate sujanmā kaścijjanakānnijena caritena /
analyzed: atiricyate sujanmā kaścid janakāt nijena caritena

original: MSS_0596-2 kumbhaḥ parimitamambhaḥ pibati papau kumbhasaṃbhavo'mbhodhim //
analyzed: kumbhaḥ parimitam ambhaḥ pibati papau kumbha saṃbhava umbhodhim

original: MSS_0597-1 atiruciraṅgajakṛttyā kṣobhitadakṣaṃ bhavantameva bhaje /
analyzed: ati ruciḥ aṅgaja kṛttyā kṣobhita dakṣam bhavantam eva bhaje

original: MSS_0597-2 yasmin prasādasumukhe sadyo vāmāpi bhavati mama tuṣṭyai //
analyzed: yasmin prasāda su mukhe sadyas vāmā api bhavati mama tuṣṭyai

original: MSS_0598-1 atirupavatī sītā atigarvī ca rāvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ati rupavatī sītā ati garvī ca rāvaṇaḥ

original: MSS_0598-2 atīva balavān rāmo laṅkāyena kṣayaṃ gatā //
analyzed: atīva balavān rāmaḥ laṅkāyena kṣayam gatā

original: MSS_0599-1 atirūpād dhṛtā sītā atigarveṇa rāvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ati rūpāt dhṛtā sītā ati garveṇa rāvaṇaḥ

original: MSS_0599-2 atidānād balirbaddho hyati sarvatra garhitam //
analyzed: atidānāt baliḥ baddhaḥ hi ati sarvatra garhitam

original: MSS_0600-1 atirūpeṇa vai sītā atigarveṇa rāvanaḥ /
analyzed: ati rūpeṇa vai sītā ati garveṇa rāvanaḥ

original: MSS_0600-2 atidānaṃ balirdattvā ati sarvatra varjayet //
analyzed: atidānam baliḥ dattvā ati sarvatra varjayet

original: MSS_0601-1 atilobho na kartavyaḥ kartavyastu pramāṇataḥ /
analyzed: ati lobhaḥ na kartavyaḥ kartavyaḥ tu pramāṇataḥ

original: MSS_0601-2 atilobhajadoṣeṇa jambuko nidhanaṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: ati lobha ja doṣeṇa jambukaḥ nidhanam gataḥ

original: MSS_0602-1 atilobho na kartavyo lobhaṃ naiva parityajet /
analyzed: ati lobhaḥ na kartavyaḥ lobham na eva parityajet

original: MSS_0602-2 atilobhābhibhūtasya cakraṃ bhramati mastake //
analyzed: ati lobha abhibhūtasya cakram bhramati mastake

original: MSS_0603-1 atilohitakaracaraṇaṃ mañjulagorocanātilakam /
analyzed: ati lohita kara caraṇam mañjula gorocanā tilakam

original: MSS_0603-2 haṭhaparivartitaśakaṭaṃ muraripumuttānaśāyinaṃ vande //
analyzed: haṭha parivartita śakaṭam muraripum uttāna śāyinam vande

original: MSS_0604-1 atilaulyaprasaktānāṃ vipattinairva dūrataḥ /
analyzed: ati laulya prasaktānām dūratas

original: MSS_0604-2 jīvaṃ naśyati lobhena mīnasyāmiṣadarśane //
analyzed: jīvam naśyati lobhena mīnasya āmiṣa darśane

original: MSS_0605-1 ativādāṃstitikṣeta nābhimanyetkathaṃcana /
analyzed: ativādān titikṣeta na abhimanyet kathaṃcana

original: MSS_0605-2 krodhyamānaḥ priyaṃ brūyād ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ vadet //
analyzed: krodhyamānaḥ priyam brūyāt ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalam vadet

original: MSS_0606-1 ativādāṃstitikṣeta nāvamanyeta kaṃcana /
analyzed: ativādān titikṣeta na avamanyeta kaṃcana

original: MSS_0606-2 na cemaṃ dehamāśritya vairaṃ kurvīta kenacit //
analyzed: na ca imam deham āśritya vairam kurvīta kenacid

original: MSS_0607-1 ativādo'timānaśca tathātyāgo narādhipa /
analyzed: ativāda ūti mānaḥ ca tathā a tyāgaḥ narādhipa

original: MSS_0607-2 krodhaścātivivitsā ca mitradrohaśca tānī ṣaṭ //
analyzed: krodhaḥ ca ati vivitsā ca mitra drohaḥ ca tānī ṣaḍ

original: MSS_0608-1 eta evāsayastīkṣṇāḥ kṛntantyāyūṃṣi dehinām /
analyzed: ete eva asayaḥ tīkṣṇāḥ kṛntanti āyūṃṣi dehinām

original: MSS_0608-2 etāni mānavān ghnanti na mṛtyurbhadramastu te //
analyzed: etāni mānavān ghnanti na mṛtyuḥ bhadram astu te

original: MSS_0609-1 ativāhitamatigahanaṃ vināpavādena yauvanaṃ yena /
analyzed: ativāhitam ati gahanam vinā apavādena yauvanam yena

original: MSS_0609-2 doṣanidhāne janmani kiṃ na prāptaṃ phalaṃ tena //
analyzed: doṣa nidhāne janmani kim na prāptam phalam tena

original: MSS_0610-1 ativitatagaganasaraṇi- prasaraṇaparimuktaviśramānandaḥ /
analyzed: ati vitata gagana saraṇi prasaraṇa parimukta viśrama ānandaḥ

original: MSS_0610-2 marudullāsitasaurabha- kamalākarahāsakṛdravirjayati //
analyzed: marut ullāsita saurabha kamala ākara hāsa kṛt raviḥ jayati

original: MSS_0611-1 ativipulaṃ kucayugalaṃ rahasi karairāmṛśan muhurlakṣmyāḥ /
analyzed: ati vipulam kuca yugalam rahasi karaiḥ āmṛśan muhur lakṣmyāḥ

original: MSS_0611-2 tadapahṛtaṃ nijahṛdayaṃ jayati hararmṛgayamāṇa iva //
analyzed: tad apahṛtam nija hṛdayam jayati haraḥ mṛgayamāṇaḥ iva

original: MSS_0612-1 ativiśadānantapada- pravṛttadṛṣṭirna madhuravīkṣaṇataḥ /
analyzed: ati viśada ananta pada pravṛtta dṛṣṭiḥ na madhura vīkṣaṇataḥ

original: MSS_0612-2 tṛpyatyañcitakāmaḥ prātastanakamalamukulavīkṣaṇataḥ //
analyzed: tṛpyati añcita kāmaḥ prātar stana kamala mukula vīkṣaṇataḥ

original: MSS_0613-1 ativṛṣṭiranāvṛṣṭiḥ śalabhāḥ mūṣaKāḥ śukāḥ /
analyzed: ativṛṣṭiḥ anāvṛṣṭiḥ śalabhāḥ mūṣakāḥ śukāḥ

original: MSS_0613-2 asatkaraśca daṇḍaśca paracakrāṇi taskarāḥ //
analyzed: asat karaḥ ca daṇḍaḥ ca para cakrāṇi taskarāḥ

original: MSS_0614-1 rājānīkapriyotsargo marakavyādhipīḍanam /
analyzed: rāja anīka priya utsargaḥ maraka vyādhi pīḍanam

original: MSS_0614-2 paśūnāṃ maraṇaṃ rogo rāṣṭravyasanamucyate //
analyzed: paśūnām maraṇam rogaḥ rāṣṭra vyasanam ucyate

original: MSS_0615-1 ativyayo'napekṣā ca tathārjanamadharmataḥ /
analyzed: ati vyayaḥ napekṣā ca tathā arjanam adharmataḥ

original: MSS_0615-2 moṣaṇaṃ dūrasaṃsthānāṃ koṣavyasanamucyate //
analyzed: moṣaṇam dūra saṃsthānām koṣa vyasanam ucyate

original: MSS_0616-1 atiśayitakadambo'yaṃ modakadambānilo vahati /
analyzed: atiśayita kadamba uyam moda kadamba anilaḥ vahati

original: MSS_0616-2 viyadambudameduritaṃ me duritaṃ paśya nāgato dayitaḥ //
analyzed: viyat ambu da meduritam me duritam paśya na āgataḥ dayitaḥ

original: MSS_0617-1 atiśaravyayatā madanena tāṃ nikhilapuṣpamayasvaśaravyayāt /
analyzed: ati śara vyayatā madanena tām nikhila puṣpa maya sva śara vyayāt

original: MSS_0617-2 sphuṭamakāri phalānyapi muñcatā tadurasi stanatālayugārpaṇam //
analyzed: sphuṭam akāri phalāni api muñcatā tad urasi stana tāla yuga arpaṇam

original: MSS_0618-1 atiśaucamaśaucaṃ vā atinindā atistutiḥ /
analyzed: ati śaucam aśaucam vā ati nindā ati stutiḥ

original: MSS_0618-2 atyācāramanācāraṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ mūrkhalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: atyācāram anācāram ṣaḍvidham mūrkha lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_0619-1 atiślathālambipayodhareyaṃ śubhrībhavatkāśavikāsikeśā /
analyzed: ati ślathā ālambi payodharā iyam śubhrībhavat kāśa vikāsi keśā

original: MSS_0619-2 atītalāvaṇyajalapravāhā prāvṛṭ jarāṃ prāpa śaracchalena //
analyzed: atīta lāvaṇya jala pravāhā prāvṛṣ jarām prāpa śara chalena

original: MSS_0620-1 atisaṃcayalubdhānāṃ vittamanyasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: ati saṃcaya lubdhānām vittam anyasya kāraṇam

original: MSS_0620-2 anyaiḥ saṃcīyate yatnād anyaiśca madhu pīyate //
analyzed: anyaiḥ saṃcīyate yatnāt anyaiḥ ca madhu pīyate

original: MSS_0621-1 atisaṃpadamāpannair bhetavyaṃ patanādbhūyaḥ /
analyzed: ati saṃpadam āpannaiḥ bhetavyam patanāt bhūyas

original: MSS_0621-2 atyuccaśikharā meroḥ śakravajreṇa pātitāḥ //
analyzed: ati ucca śikharāḥ meroḥ śakra vajreṇa pātitāḥ

original: MSS_0622-1 atisajjanadurgatiḥ khalapaṅktisamunnatiḥ /
MSS_0622-2 yuvatistanavicyutiriti kiṃ vidhinirmitiḥ //
analyzed: yuvati stana vicyutiḥ iti kim vidhi nirmitiḥ

original: MSS_0623-1 atisatkṛtā api śaṭhāḥ sahabhuvamujjhanti jātu na prakṛtim /
analyzed: ati satkṛtāḥ api śaṭhāḥ saha bhuvam ujjhanti jātu na prakṛtim

original: MSS_0623-2 śirasā maheśvareṇā- 'pi nanu dhṛto vakra eva śaśī //
analyzed: śirasā maheśvareṇa pi nanu dhṛtaḥ vakraḥ eva śaśī

original: MSS_0624-1 atisāhasamatiduṣkaram atyāścaryaṃ ca dānamarthānām /
analyzed: ati sāhasam ati duṣkaram ati āścaryam ca dānam arthānām

original: MSS_0624-2 yo'pi dadāti śarīraṃ na dadāti sa vittaleśamapi //
analyzed: yaḥ api dadāti śarīram na dadāti sa vitta leśam api

original: MSS_0625-1 atisāhasikaṃ śūrā mantriṇastaṃ nirūpakam /
analyzed: ati sāhasikam śūrāḥ mantriṇaḥ tam nirūpakam

original: MSS_0625-2 vinītaṃ guravo jajñur dhūrtamantaḥpurāṅganāḥ //
analyzed: vinītam guravaḥ jajñuḥ dhūrtam antaḥpura aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_0626-1 atiharitapatraparikara- saṃpannaspandanaikaviṭapasya /
analyzed: ati harita patra parikara saṃpanna spandana eka viṭapasya

original: MSS_0626-2 ghanavāsanairmayūkhaiḥ kusumbhakusumāyate taraṇiḥ //
analyzed: ghana vāsanaiḥ mayūkhaiḥ kusumbhakusumāyate taraṇiḥ

original: MSS_0627-1 atītalābhasya surakṣaṇārthaṃ bhaviṣyalābhasya ca saṃgamārtham /
analyzed: atīta lābhasya su rakṣaṇa artham bhaviṣya lābhasya ca saṃgama artham

original: MSS_0627-2 āpatprapannasya ca mokṣaṇārthaṃ yanmantryate'sau paramo hi mantraḥ //
analyzed: āpad prapannasya ca mokṣaṇa artham yat mantryate asau paramaḥ hi mantraḥ

original: MSS_0628-1 atītānāgatānarthān viprakṛṣṭatirohitān /
analyzed: atīta an āgatān arthān viprakṛṣṭa tirohitān

original: MSS_0628-2 vijānāti yadā yogī tadā saṃviditi smṛtā //
analyzed: vijānāti yadā yogī tadā saṃvid iti smṛtā

original: MSS_0629-1 atītānāgatā bhāvā ye ca vartanti sāṃpratam /
analyzed: atīta anāgatāḥ bhāvāḥ ye ca vartanti sāṃpratam

original: MSS_0629-2 tān kālanirmitān buddhvā na saṃjñāṃ hātumarhasi //
analyzed: tān kāla nirmitān buddhvā na saṃjñām hātum arhasi

original: MSS_0630-1 atītā śītārtiḥ prasarati śanairuṣmakaṇikā dināni sphāyante ravirapi rathaṃ mantharayati /
analyzed: atītā śīta ārtiḥ prasarati śanais uṣma kaṇikāḥ dināni sphāyante raviḥ api ratham mantharayati

original: MSS_0630-2 himānīnirmuktaḥ sphurati nitarāṃ śītakiraṇaḥ śarāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ kusumadhanuṣo na vyavahitaḥ //
analyzed: himānī nirmuktaḥ sphurati nitarām śītakiraṇaḥ śarāṇām vyāpāraḥ kusumadhanuṣaḥ na vyavahitaḥ

original: MSS_0631-1 atītya bandhūnavalaṅghya mitrāṇy ācāryamāgacchati śiṣyadoṣaḥ /
analyzed: atītya bandhūn avalaṅghya mitrāṇi ācāryam āgacchati śiṣya doṣaḥ

original: MSS_0631-2 bālaṃ hyapatyaṃ gurave pradātur naivāparādho'sti piturna mātuḥ //
analyzed: bālam hi apatyam gurave pradātuḥ na eva aparādhaḥ asti pituḥ na mātuḥ

original: MSS_0632-1 atīndriyāyāṃ paralokavṛttāv ihaiva tīvrāśubhapākaśaṃsī /
analyzed: atīndriyāyām para loka vṛttau iha eva tīvra aśubha pāka śaṃsī

original: MSS_0632-2 dṛṣyeta nāśo yadi nāma nāśu na kaḥ kukṛtyena yateta bhūtyai //
analyzed: dṛṣyeta nāśaḥ yadi nāma na āśu na kaḥ kukṛtyena yateta bhūtyai

original: MSS_0633-1 atīva karkaśāḥ stabdhā hiṃsrajantubhirāvṛtāḥ /
analyzed: atīva karkaśāḥ stabdhāḥ hiṃsra jantubhiḥ āvṛtāḥ

original: MSS_0633-2 durāsadāśca viṣamā īśvarāḥ parvatā iva //
analyzed: durāsadāḥ ca viṣamāḥ īśvarāḥ parvatāḥ iva

original: MSS_0634-1 atīva khalu te kāntā vasudhā vasudhādhipa /
analyzed: atīva khalu te kāntā vasudhā vasudhādhipa

original: MSS_0634-2 gatāsurapi yāṃ gātrair māṃ vihāya niṣevase //
analyzed: gatāsuḥ api yām gātraiḥ mām vihāya niṣevase

original: MSS_0635-1 atīva balahīnaṃ hi laṅghanaṃ naiva kārayet /
analyzed: atīva bala hīnam hi laṅghanam na eva kārayet

original: MSS_0635-2 ye guṇā laṅghane proktās te guṇā laghubhojane //
analyzed: ye guṇāḥ laṅghane proktāḥ te guṇāḥ laghu bhojane

original: MSS_0636-1 atīva saukhyaśubhadā yāmyā niśi bhavecchivā /
analyzed: atīva saukhya śubha dā yāmyā niśi bhavet śivā

original: MSS_0636-2 pūrvasyāṃ tatpurādhyakṣam anyaṃ kuryādaharmukhe //
analyzed: pūrvasyām tad pura adhyakṣam anyam kuryāt ahar mukhe

original: MSS_0637-1 atulitabaladhāmaṃ svarṇaśailābhadehaṃ danujavanakṛśānuṃ jñānināmagragaṇyam /
analyzed: atulita bala dhāmam svarṇa śaila ābha deham danu ja vana kṛśānum jñāninām agragaṇyam

original: MSS_0637-2 sakalaguṇanidhānaṃ vānarāṇāmadhīśaṃ raghupativaradūtaṃ vātajātaṃ namāmi //
analyzed: sakala guṇa nidhānam vānarāṇām adhīśam raghu pati vara dūtam vāta jātam namāmi

original: MSS_0638-1 atuṣṭaṃ sveṣu dāreṣu capalaṃ capalendriyam /
analyzed: atuṣṭam sveṣu dāreṣu capalam capala indriyam

original: MSS_0638-2 nayanti nikṛtiprajñaṃ paradārāḥ parābhavam //
analyzed: nayanti nikṛti prajñam para dārāḥ parābhavam

original: MSS_0639-1 atuṣṭidānaṃ kṛtapūrvanāśanam amānanaṃ duścaritānukīrtanam /
analyzed: atuṣṭi dānam kṛta pūrva nāśanam a mānanam duścarita anukīrtanam

original: MSS_0639-2 kathāprasaṅgena ca nāmavismṛtir viraktabhāvasya janasya lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: kathā prasaṅgena ca nāma vismṛtiḥ virakta bhāvasya janasya lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_0640-1 atuhinarucināsau kevalaṃ nodayādriḥ kṣaṇamuparigatena kṣmābhṛtaḥ sarva eva /
analyzed: a tuhina rucinā asau kevalam na udayādriḥ kṣaṇam upari gatena kṣmābhṛtaḥ sarve eva

original: MSS_0640-2 navakaranikareṇa spaṣṭabandhūkasūna- stabakaracitamete śekharaṃ bibhratīva //
analyzed: nava kara nikareṇa spaṣṭa bandhūka sūna stabaka racitam ete śekharam bibhratī iva

original: MSS_0641-1 atṛṇe patito vahniḥ svayamevopaśāmyati /
analyzed: atṛṇe patitaḥ vahniḥ svayam eva upaśāmyati

original: MSS_0641-2 akṣamāvān paraṃ doṣair ātmānaṃ caiva yojayet //
analyzed: akṣamāvān param doṣaiḥ ātmānam ca eva yojayet

original: MSS_0642-1 atṛṇe satṛṇā yasmin satṛṇe tṛṇavarjitā mahī yatra /
analyzed: a tṛṇe sa tṛṇā yasmin sa tṛṇe tṛṇa varjitā mahī yatra

original: MSS_0642-2 tasmiñśirā pradiṣṭā vaktavyaṃ vā dhanaṃ tatra //
analyzed: tasmin śirā pradiṣṭā vaktavyam vā dhanam tatra

original: MSS_0643-1 atogarīyaḥ kiṃ nusyād aśarma narakeṣvapi /
analyzed: atas garīyaḥ kim nu syāt a śarma narakeṣu api

original: MSS_0643-2 yat priyasya priyaṃ kartum adhamena na śakyate //
analyzed: yat priyasya priyam kartum adhamena na śakyate

original: MSS_0644-1 ato nijabalonmānaṃ cāpaṃ syācchubhakārakam /
analyzed: atas nija bala unmānam cāpam syāt śubha kārakam

original: MSS_0644-2 devānāmuttamaṃ cāpaṃ tato nyūnaṃ ca mānavam //
analyzed: devānām uttamam cāpam tatas nyūnam ca mānavam

original: MSS_0645-1 ato'rthaṃ paṭhyate śāstraṃ kīrtirlokeṣu jāyate /
analyzed: atortham paṭhyate śāstram kīrtiḥ lokeṣu jāyate

original: MSS_0645-2 kīrtimān pūjyate loke paratreha ca mānavaḥ //
analyzed: kīrtimān pūjyate loke paratra iha ca mānavaḥ

original: MSS_0646-1 ato hāsyataraṃ loke kiṃcidanyanna vidyate /
analyzed: atas hāsyataram loke kiṃcid anyat na vidyate

original: MSS_0646-2 yatra durjana ityāha durjanaḥ sajjanaṃ svayam //
analyzed: yatra durjanaḥ iti āha durjanaḥ sat janam svayam

original: MSS_0647-1 attuṃ vāñchati śāṃbhavo gaṇapaterākhuṃ kṣudhārttaḥ phaṇī taṃ ca krauñcaripoḥ śikhī girisutāsiṃho'pi nāgānanam /
analyzed: attum vāñchati śāṃbhavaḥ gaṇapateḥ ākhum kṣudhā ārttaḥ phaṇī tam ca krauñcaripoḥ śikhī girisutā siṃhaḥ api nāgānanam

original: MSS_0647-2 itthaṃ yatra parigrahasya ghaṭanā śaṃbhorapi syādgṛhe tatrānyasya kathaṃ na bhāvi jagatastasmāt svarūpaṃ hi tat //
analyzed: ittham yatra parigrahasya ghaṭanā śaṃbhoḥ api syāt gṛhe tatra anyasya katham na bhāvi jagataḥ tasmāt svarūpam hi tat

original: MSS_0648-1 atyacchaṃ sitamaṃśukaṃ śuci madhu svāmodamacchaṃ rajaḥ kārpuraṃ vidhṛtārdracandanakucadvandvāḥ kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ /
analyzed: ati accham sitam aṃśukam śuci madhu sva āmodam accham rajaḥ kārpuram vidhṛta ārdra candana kuca dvandvāḥ kuraṅgī dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_0648-2 dhārāveśma sapāṭalaṃ vicakilasragdāma candratviṣo dhātaḥ sṛṣṭiriyaṃ vṛthaiva tava na grīṣmo'bhaviṣyadyadi //
analyzed: dhārā veśma sa pāṭalam vicakila sraj dāma candra tviṣaḥ dhātar sṛṣṭiḥ iyam vṛthā eva tava na grīṣmaḥ bhaviṣyat yadi

original: MSS_0649-1 atyadbhutamimaṃ manye svabhāvamamanasvinaḥ /
analyzed: ati adbhutam imam manye svabhāvam amanasvinaḥ

original: MSS_0649-2 yadupakriyamāṇo'pi prīyate na vilīyate //
analyzed: yat upakriyamāṇaḥ api prīyate na vilīyate

original: MSS_0650-1 atyantaṃ kurutāṃ rasāyanavidhiṃ vākyaṃ priyaṃ jalpatu vārdheḥ pāramiyartu gacchatu nabho devādrimārohatu /
analyzed: atyantam kurutām rasāyana vidhim vākyam priyam jalpatu vārdheḥ pāram iyartu gacchatu nabhaḥ deva adrim ārohatu

original: MSS_0650-2 pātālaṃ viśatu prasarpatu diśaṃ deśāntaraṃ bhrāmyatu na prāṇī tadapi prahartumanasā saṃtyajyate mṛtyunā //
analyzed: pātālam viśatu prasarpatu diśam deśa antaram bhrāmyatu na prāṇī tat api prahartu manasā saṃtyajyate mṛtyunā

original: MSS_0651-1 atyantakaṇḍūtiparo narāṇām virodhakārī śunakaḥ sadaiva /
analyzed: atyanta kaṇḍūti paraḥ narāṇām virodha kārī śunakaḥ sadā eva

original: MSS_0651-2 syādūrdhvapādaḥ śunakaḥ śayānaḥ siddhipradaḥ kāryavidhau viduṣṭe //
analyzed: syāt ūrdhva pādaḥ śunakaḥ śayānaḥ siddhipradaḥ kārya vidhau viduṣṭe

original: MSS_0652-1 atyantakṛṣṇaḥ sa vinirmalastvaṃ sa vāmanaḥ sarvata unnato'si /
analyzed: atyanta kṛṣṇaḥ sa vinirmalaḥ tvam sa vāmanaḥ sarvatas unnatā asi

original: MSS_0652-2 janārdano yat sa dayāparastvaṃ viṣṇuḥ kathaṃ vīra tavopamānam //
analyzed: janārdanaḥ yat sa dayā paraḥ tvam viṣṇuḥ katham vīra tava upamānam

original: MSS_0653-1 atyantakopaḥ kaṭukā ca vāṇī daridratā ca svajaneṣu vairam /
analyzed: atyanta kopaḥ kaṭukā ca vāṇī daridra tā ca sva janeṣu vairam

original: MSS_0653-2 nīcaprasaṅgaḥ kulahīnasevā cihnāni dehe narakasthitānām //
analyzed: nīca prasaṅgaḥ kula hīna sevā cihnāni dehe naraka sthitānām

original: MSS_0654-1 atyantacañcalasyeha pāradasya nibandhane /
analyzed: atyanta cañcalasya iha pāradasya nibandhane

original: MSS_0654-2 kāmaṃ vijñāyate yuktir na strīcittasya kācana //
analyzed: kāmam vijñāyate yuktiḥ na strī cittasya kācana

original: MSS_0655-1 atyantanirgate caiva subaddhe naiva cāvile /
analyzed: atyanta nirgate ca eva su baddhe na eva ca āvile

original: MSS_0655-2 praśaste vājināṃ netre madhvābhe kālatārake //
analyzed: praśaste vājinām netre madhu ābhe kāla tārake

original: MSS_0656-1 atyantapariṇāhitvād atīva ślakṣṇatāvaśāt /
analyzed: atyanta pariṇāhi tvāt atīva ślakṣṇa tā vaśāt

original: MSS_0656-2 na kāṃcidupamāṃ roḍhum ūrū śaknoti subhruvaḥ //
analyzed: na kāṃcid upamām roḍhum ūrū śaknoti su bhruvaḥ

original: MSS_0657-1 atyantabhīmavanajīvagaṇena pūrṇaṃ durgaṃ vanaṃ bhavabhṛtāṃ manasāpyagamyam /
analyzed: atyanta bhīma vana jīva gaṇena pūrṇam durgam vanam bhava bhṛtām manasā api agamyam

original: MSS_0657-2 caurākulaṃ viśati lobhavaśena martyo no dharmakarma vidadhāti kadācidajñaḥ //
analyzed: caura ākulam viśati lobha vaśena martyaḥ naḥ dharma karma vidadhāti kadācid ajñaḥ

original: MSS_0658-1 atyantamatimedhāvī trayāṇāmekamaśnute /
analyzed: atyantam ati medhāvī trayāṇām ekam aśnute

original: MSS_0658-2 alpāyuṣo daridro vā hyanapatyo na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: alpa āyuṣaḥ daridraḥ vā hi anapatyaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_0659-1 atyantamanthanakadarthanamutsahante maryādayā niyamitāḥ kimu sādhavo'pi /
analyzed: atyanta manthana kadarthanam utsahante maryādayā niyamitāḥ kimu sādhavaḥ api

original: MSS_0659-2 lakṣmīsudhākarasudhādyupanīya śeṣe ratnākaro'pi garalaṃ kimu nojjagāra //
analyzed: lakṣmī sudhākara sudhā ādi upanīya śeṣe ratnākaraḥ api garalam kimu nā ujjagāra

original: MSS_0660-1 atyantamasadāryāṇām anālocitaceṣṭitam /
analyzed: atyantam asat āryāṇām anālocita ceṣṭitam

original: MSS_0660-2 atasteṣāṃ vivardhante satataṃ sarvasaṃpadaḥ //
analyzed: atas teṣām vivardhante satatam sarva saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_0661-1 atyantavimukhe daive vyarthayatne ca pauruṣe /
analyzed: atyanta vimukhe daive vyartha yatne ca pauruṣe

original: MSS_0661-2 manasvino daridrasya vanādanyat kutaḥ sukham //
analyzed: manasvinaḥ daridrasya vanāt anyat kutas sukham

original: MSS_0662-1 atyantavyavadhānalabdhajanuṣo jātyāpi bhinnakramāḥ sāṃnidhyaṃ vidhinā kutūhalavatā kutrāpi saṃprāpitāḥ /
analyzed: atyanta vyavadhāna labdha januṣaḥ jātyā api bhinna kramāḥ sāṃnidhyam vidhinā kutūhalavatā kutra api saṃprāpitāḥ

original: MSS_0662-2 gacchantyāmaraṇaṃ guṇavyatikṛtā bhedaṃ na bhūmīruhas te kāṣṭhādapi niṣṭhurā guṇagaṇairye naikatāṃ prāpitāḥ //
analyzed: gacchanti āmaraṇam guṇa vyatikṛtāḥ bhedam na bhūmīruhaḥ te kāṣṭhāt api niṣṭhurāḥ guṇa gaṇaiḥ ye na eka tām prāpitāḥ

original: MSS_0663-1 atyantaśītalatayā subhagasvabhāva satyaṃ na kaścidapi te tarurasti tulyaḥ /
analyzed: atyanta śītala tayā subhaga svabhāva satyam na kaścid api te taruḥ asti tulyaḥ

original: MSS_0663-2 chāyārthināmapi punarvikaṭadvijihva- saṅgena candana viṣadrumanirviśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: chāyā arthinām api punar vikaṭa dvijihva saṅgena candana viṣa druma nirviśeṣaḥ

original: MSS_0664-1 atyantaśuddhacinmātre pariṇāmaścirāya yaḥ /
MSS_0664-2 turyātītaṃ padaṃ tat syāt tatstho bhūyo na śocati //
analyzed: turyātītam padam tat syāt tad sthaḥ bhūyas na śocati

original: MSS_0665-1 atyantasukhasaṃcārā madhyāhne sparśataḥ sukhāḥ /
analyzed: atyanta sukha saṃcārāḥ madhyāhne sparśataḥ sukhāḥ

original: MSS_0665-2 divasāḥ subhagādityāś chāyāsaliladurbhagāḥ //
analyzed: divasāḥ subhaga ādityāḥ chāyā salila durbhagāḥ

original: MSS_0666-1 atyantastimitāṅgānāṃ vyāyāmena sukhaiṣiṇām /
analyzed: atyanta stimita aṅgānām vyāyāmena sukha eṣiṇām

original: MSS_0666-2 bhrāntijñānāvṛtākṣāṇāṃ prahāro'pi sukhāyate //
analyzed: bhrānti jñāna āvṛta akṣāṇām prahāraḥ upi sukhāyate

original: MSS_0667-1 atyantonnatapūrvaparvatamahāpīṭhe haraspardhayā dūrodañcitadhūmasaṃnibhatamastārāsphuliṇgākulam /
analyzed: atyanta unnata pūrva parvata mahā pīṭhe hara spardhayā dūra udañcita dhūma saṃnibha tamaḥ tārā sphuliṇga ākulam

original: MSS_0667-2 nūnaṃ pañcaśaro'karocchaśimiṣāt svaṃ jvālaliṅgaṃ yato garvāccharvaparān dahenmunivarān sarvānakharvā śubhiḥ //
analyzed: nūnam svam jvāla liṅgam yatas garvāt śarva parān dahet muni varān sarvān akharvā śubhiḥ

original: MSS_0668-1 atyapūrvasya rāgasya pūrvapakṣāya pallavāḥ /
analyzed: ati apūrvasya rāgasya pūrva pakṣāya pallavāḥ

original: MSS_0668-2 padmāni pādayugmasya pratyudāharaṇāni ca //
analyzed: padmāni pāda yugmasya pratyudāharaṇāni ca

original: MSS_0669-1 atyambupānaṃ kaṭhināsanaṃ ca dhātukṣayo vegavidhāraṇaṃ ca /
analyzed: ati ambu pānam kaṭhina āsanam ca dhātu kṣayaḥ vega vidhāraṇam ca

original: MSS_0669-2 divāśayo jāgaraṇaṃ ca rātrau ṣaḍbhirnarāṇāṃ nivasanti rogāḥ //
analyzed: divā āśayaḥ jāgaraṇam ca rātrau ṣaḍbhiḥ narāṇām nivasanti rogāḥ

original: MSS_0670-1 atyambupānāt prabhavanti rogāḥ alpāmbupāne ca tathaiva doṣāḥ /
analyzed: ati ambu pānāt prabhavanti rogāḥ alpa ambu pāne ca tathā eva doṣāḥ

original: MSS_0670-2 tasmānnaro vahnivivardhanāya muhurmuhurvāri pibedabhuri //
analyzed: tasmāt naraḥ vahni vivardhanāya muhur muhur vāri pibet abhuri

original: MSS_0671-1 atyambupānād viṣamāśanācca divāśayājjāgaraṇacca rātrau /
analyzed: ati ambu pānāt viṣama aśanāt ca divāśayāt jāgaraṇat ca rātrau

original: MSS_0671-2 samrodhanān mūtrapurīṣayośca ṣaḍbhiḥ prakāraiḥ prabhavanti rogāḥ //
analyzed: samrodhanāt mūtra purīṣayoḥ ca ṣaḍbhiḥ prakāraiḥ prabhavanti rogāḥ

original: MSS_0672-1 atyambupānānna vipacyate'nnam anambupānācca sa eva doṣaḥ /
analyzed: ati ambu pānāt na vipacyate id nam an ambu pānāt ca saḥ eva doṣaḥ

original: MSS_0672-2 tasmānnaro vahnivivardhanārthaṃ mahurmuhurvāri pibedabhūri //
analyzed: tasmāt naraḥ vahni vivardhana artham mahur muhur vāri pibet abhūri

original: MSS_0673-1 atyarthavakratvamanarthakaṃ yā śūnyāpi sarvānyaguṇairvyanakti /
analyzed: atyartha vakra tvam anarthakam yā śūnyā api sarva anya guṇaiḥ vyanakti

original: MSS_0673-2 aspṛśyatādūṣitayā tayā kiṃ tucchaśvapucchacchaṭayeva vācā //
analyzed: aspṛśyata a dūṣitayā tayā kim tuccha śva puccha chaṭayā iva vācā

original: MSS_0674-1 atyalpaṃ jīvitaṃ pāpāny āpātamadhurāṇyalam /
analyzed: ati alpam jīvitam pāpāni āpāta madhurāṇi alam

original: MSS_0674-2 tadācara cirastheyaparalokāvalokanam //
analyzed: tat ācara cira stheya para loka avalokanam

original: MSS_0675-1 atyalpasaṃpadaḥ santaḥ pumāniṣṭaśca duṣkule /
analyzed: ati alpa saṃpadaḥ santaḥ pumān iṣṭaḥ ca duṣkule

original: MSS_0675-2 lakṣmīranabhijātasya vedhasaḥ skhalitatrayam //
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ anabhijātasya vedhasaḥ skhalita trayam

original: MSS_0676-1 atyāgraho na kartavyo haṭhātkaścinna bhāṣate /
analyzed: ati āgrahaḥ na kartavyaḥ haṭhāt kaścid na bhāṣate

original: MSS_0676-2 yathāyathondati tathā bhāro bhavati kambalaḥ //
analyzed: yathā yathā undati tathā bhāraḥ bhavati kambalaḥ

original: MSS_0677-1 atyājilabdhavijayaprasarastvayā kiṃ vijñāyate rucipadaṃ na mahīmahendraḥ /
analyzed: a ti āji labdha vijaya prasaraḥ tvayā kim vijñāyate ruci padam na mahī mahā indraḥ

original: MSS_0677-2 pratyarthidānavaśatāhitaceṣṭayāsau jīmūtavāhanadhiyaṃ na karoti kasya //
analyzed: pratyarthi dānava śata āhita ceṣṭayā asau jīmūtavāhana dhiyam na karoti kasya

original: MSS_0678-1 atyādarādadhyayanaṃ dvijānām arthopalabdhyā phalavadvidhāya /
analyzed: ati ādarāt adhyayanam dvijānām artha upalabdhyā phalavat vidhāya

original: MSS_0678-2 kratūnatucchānavituṃ tavaiṣā mīmāṃsakādyādhikṛtiḥ prasiddhā //
analyzed: tava eṣā mīmāṃsaka ādya adhikṛtiḥ prasiddhā

original: MSS_0679-1 atyādareṇa nihitaṃ mayi yadbhavatyā tatpremahema kimabhūditi naiva jāne /
analyzed: ati ādareṇa nihitam mayi yat bhavatyā tat prema hema kim abhūt iti nā eva jāne

original: MSS_0679-2 utsṛjya kiṃ tadiha pātakamuttarāṇi prāṇā api priyatame katame bhaveyuḥ //
analyzed: utsṛjya kim tat iha pātakam uttarāṇi prāṇāḥ api priyatame katame bhaveyuḥ

original: MSS_0680-1 atyādaro dārasahodareṣu na mātṛpitrorna ca sodareṣu /
analyzed: atyādaraḥ dāra sahodareṣu na mātṛ pitroḥ na ca sodareṣu

original: MSS_0680-2 mūrkhe niyogastanaye viyogaḥ paśyanti lokāḥ kalikautukāni //
analyzed: mūrkhe niyogaḥ tanaye viyogaḥ paśyanti lokāḥ kali kautukāni

original: MSS_0681-1 atyādaro bhaved yatra kāryakāraṇavarjitaḥ /
analyzed: atyādaraḥ bhavet yatra kārya kāraṇa varjitaḥ

original: MSS_0681-2 tatra śaṅkā prakartavyā pariṇāme'sukhāvahā //
analyzed: tatra śaṅkā prakartavyā

original: MSS_0682-1 atyāyatairniyamakāribhiruddhatānāṃ divyaiḥ prabhābhiranapāyamayairupāyaiḥ /
analyzed: atyāyataiḥ niyama kāribhiḥ uddhatānām divyaiḥ prabhābhiḥ anapāya mayaiḥ upāyaiḥ

original: MSS_0682-2 śaurirbhujairiva caturbhiradaḥ sadā yo lakṣmīvilāsabhavanairbhuvanaṃ babhāra //
analyzed: śauriḥ bhujaiḥ iva caturbhiḥ adaḥ sadā yaḥ lakṣmī vilāsa bhavanaiḥ bhuvanam babhāra

original: MSS_0683-1 atyāyāsena nātmānaṃ kuryādatisamucchrayam /
analyzed: ati āyāsena na ātmānam kuryāt ati samucchrayam

original: MSS_0683-2 pāto yathā hi duḥkhāya nocchrāyaḥ sukhakṛt tathā //
analyzed: pātaḥ yathā hi duḥkhāya na ucchrāyaḥ sukha kṛt tathā

original: MSS_0684-1 atyāryamatidātāram atiśūramativratam /
analyzed: ati āryam ati dātāram ati śūram ati vratam

original: MSS_0684-2 prajñābhimāninaṃ caiva śrīrbhayānnopasarpati //
analyzed: prajñā abhimāninam ca eva śrīḥ bhayāt na upasarpati

original: MSS_0685-1 na cātiguṇavatsveṣā nātyantaṃ nirguṇeṣu ca /
analyzed: na ca ati guṇavatsu eṣā na atyantam nirguṇeṣu ca

original: MSS_0685-2 naiṣā guṇānkāmayate nairguṇyāṃ nānurajyate /
analyzed: na eṣā guṇān kāmayate nairguṇyām na anurajyate

original: MSS_0685-3 unmattā gaurivāndhā śrīḥ kvacidevāvatiṣṭhate //
analyzed: unmattā gauḥ iva andhā śrīḥ kvacid eva avatiṣṭhate

original: MSS_0686-1 atyāśīviṣaśastraṃ hi vijitapralayānalam /
analyzed: ati āśīviṣa śastram hi vijita pralaya analam

original: MSS_0686-2 tejo laṅghayituṃ śaktaḥ ko nu nāma dvijanmanām //
analyzed: tejaḥ laṅghayitum śaktaḥ kaḥ nu nāma dvijanmanām

original: MSS_0687-1 atyāsannā vināśāya dūrasthā na phalapradā /
analyzed: ati āsannā vināśāya dūra sthā na phala pradā

original: MSS_0687-2 tasmādāhṛtya dātavyā bhūmiḥ pārthivasattama //
analyzed: tasmāt āhṛtya dātavyā bhūmiḥ pārthiva sattama

original: MSS_0688-1 atyāsannā vināśāya dūrasthā na phalapradāḥ /
analyzed: ati āsannāḥ vināśāya dūra sthāḥ na phala pradāḥ

original: MSS_0688-2 sevyā madhyamabhāvena rājāvahnirguruḥ striyaḥ //
analyzed: sevyāḥ madhyama bhāvena rājā vahniḥ guruḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_0689-1 atyuktau yadi na prakupyasi mṛṣāvādaṃ na cenmanyase tadbrūmo'dbhutakīrtanāya rasanā keṣāṃ na kaṇḍūyate /
analyzed: atyuktau yadi na prakupyasi mṛṣāvādam na ced manyase tat brūma udbhuta kīrtanāya rasanā keṣām na kaṇḍūyate

original: MSS_0689-2 deva tvattaruṇapratāpadahanajvālāvalīśoṣitāḥ sarve vāridhayastato ripuvadhūnetrāmbubhiḥ pūritāḥ //
analyzed: deva tvad taruṇa pratāpa dahana jvālā āvalī śoṣitāḥ sarve vāridhayaḥ tatas ripu vadhū netra ambubhiḥ pūritāḥ

original: MSS_0690-1 atyuccastanaśailadurgamamuro nābhirgabhīrāntarā bhīmaṃ dehavanaṃ sphuradbhujalataṃ romālijālākulam /
analyzed: ati ucca stana śaila durgamam uraḥ nābhiḥ gabhīra antarā bhīmam deha vanam sphurat bhuja latam romāli jāla ākulam

original: MSS_0690-2 vyādhaḥ pañcaśaraḥ kiratyatitarāṃ tīkṣṇān kaṭākṣāśugāṃs- tanme brūhi manaḥkuraṅga śaraṇaṃ kiṃ sāṃprataṃ yāsyasi //
analyzed: vyādhaḥ pañcaśaraḥ kirati atitarām tīkṣṇān kaṭākṣa āśugān tat me brūhi manaḥ kuraṅga śaraṇam kim sāṃpratam yāsyasi

original: MSS_0691-1 atyuccāḥ paritaḥsphuranti girayaḥ sphārāstathāmbhodhayas tānetānapi bibhratī kimapi na klāntāsi tubhyaṃ namaḥ /
analyzed: atyuccāḥ paritas sphuranti girayaḥ sphārāḥ tathā ambhodhayaḥ tān etān api bibhratī kim api na klāntā asi tubhyam namaḥ

original: MSS_0691-2 āścaryeṇa muhurmuhuḥ stutimimāṃ prastaumi yāvadbhuvas tāvadbibhrādimāṃ smṛtastava bhujo vācastato mudritāḥ //
analyzed: āścaryeṇa muhur muhur stutim imām prastaumi yāvat bhuvaḥ tāvat bibhrāt imām smṛtaḥ tava bhujaḥ vācaḥ tatas mudritāḥ

original: MSS_0692-1 atyuccairatinīcair aślīlamayuktamanupayuktaṃ ca /
analyzed: atyuccaiḥ ati nīcaiḥ aślīlam ayuktam anupayuktam ca

original: MSS_0692-2 na vadati nṛpatisabhāyā- mādaramīpsurmahāmanasām //
analyzed: na vadati nṛpati sabhāyāḥ mā ādaram īpsuḥ mahā manasām

original: MSS_0693-1 atyucchrite mantriṇi pārthive ca viṣṭabhya pādāvupatiṣṭhate śrīḥ /
analyzed: ati ucchrite mantriṇi pārthive ca viṣṭabhya pādau upatiṣṭhate śrīḥ

original: MSS_0693-2 sā strīsvabhāvādasahā bharasya tayordvayorekataraṃ jahāti //
analyzed: sā strī svabhāvāt asahā bharasya tayoḥ dvayoḥ ekataram jahāti

original: MSS_0694-1 atyucchritonnatasitadhvajapaṅkticitrair nāgāśvapattirathasaṃkṣubhitairbalaughaiḥ /
analyzed: ati ucchrita unnata sita dhvaja paṅkti citraiḥ nāga aśva patti ratha saṃkṣubhitaiḥ bala oghaiḥ

original: MSS_0694-2 uddhūtacāmaravirājitagātraśobhāḥ puṇyena bhūmipatayo bhuvi saṃcaranti //
analyzed: uddhūta cāmara virājita gātra śobhāḥ puṇyena bhūmipatayaḥ bhuvi saṃcaranti

original: MSS_0695-1 atyujjvalairavayavairmṛdutāṃ dadhānā muktā balaṃ vitarati smaradānadakṣā /
analyzed: ati ujjvalaiḥ avayavaiḥ mṛdu tām dadhānā muktā balam vitarati smara dāna dakṣā

original: MSS_0695-2 snigdhāśāyā guruguṇagrathitā manojñā phīṇī navīnalalaneva mudaṃ dadāti //
analyzed: snigdha āśāyāḥ guru guṇa grathitā manojñā phīṇī navīna lalanā iva mudam dadāti

original: MSS_0696-1 atyutsārya bahirviṭaṅkavaḍabhīgaṇḍasthalaśyāmikāṃ bhinnābhinnagavākṣajālaviralacchidraiḥ pradīpāṃśavaḥ /
analyzed: atyutsārya bahis viṭaṅka vaḍabhī gaṇḍa sthala śyāmikām bhinna abhinna gavākṣa jāla virala chidraiḥ pradīpa aṃśavaḥ

original: MSS_0696-2 ārūḍhasya bhareṇa yauvanamiva dhvāntasya naktaṃ mukhe niryātāḥ kapilāḥ karālaviralaśmaśrūprarohā iva //
analyzed: ārūḍhasya bhareṇa yauvanam iva dhvāntasya naktam mukhe niryātāḥ kapilāḥ karāla virala śmaśrū prarohāḥ iva

original: MSS_0697-1 atyutsekena mahasā sāhasādhyavasāyinām /
analyzed: ati utsekena mahasā sāhasa adhyavasāyinām

original: MSS_0697-2 śrīrārohati saṃdehaṃ mahatāmapi bhūbhṛtām //
analyzed: śrīḥ ārohati saṃdeham mahatām api bhūbhṛtām

original: MSS_0698-1 atyudāttagaṇeṣveṣā kṛtapuṇyaiḥ praropitā /
analyzed: atyudātta gaṇeṣu eṣā kṛta puṇyaiḥ praropitā

original: MSS_0698-2 śataśākhī bhavatyeva yāvanmātrāpi satkriyā //
analyzed: śata śākhī bhavati eva yāvanmātrā api satkriyā

original: MSS_0699-1 atyudgāḍharayasthirākṛtighanadhvānabhramanmandara- kṣubdhakṣīradhivīcisaṃcayagataprāleyapādopamaḥ /
analyzed: ati udgāḍha raya sthira ākṛti ghana dhvāna bhramat mandara kṣubdha kṣīradhi vīci saṃcaya gata prāleya pāda upamaḥ

original: MSS_0699-2 śrīmatpotalake gabhīravivṛtidhvānapratidhvānite sāndrasvāṃśucayaśriyā valayito lokeśvaraḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: śrīmat potalake gabhīra vivṛti dhvāna pratidhvānite sāndra sva aṃśu caya śriyā valayitaḥ lokeśvaraḥ pātu vaḥ

original: MSS_0700-1 atyuddhṛtā vasumatī dalito'rivargaḥ kroḍīkṛtā balavatā balirājalakṣmīḥ /
analyzed: atyuddhṛtā vasumatī dalita ūri vargaḥ kroḍīkṛtā balavatā bali rāja lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_0700-2 ekatra janmani kṛtaṃ yadanena yūnā janmatraye tadakarot puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ //
analyzed: ekatra janmani kṛtam yat anena yūnā janma traye tat akarot puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: MSS_0701-1 atyunnatapadaṃ prāptaḥ pūjyān naivāvamānayet /
analyzed: ati unnata padam prāptaḥ pūjyān na eva avamānayet

original: MSS_0701-2 nahuṣaḥ śakratāṃ prāptaś cyuto'gastyāvamānanāt //
analyzed: nahuṣaḥ śakra tām prāptaḥ cyuta ugastya avamānanāt

original: MSS_0702-1 atyunnatastanamuro nayane sudīrghe vakre bhruvāvatitarāṃ vacanaṃ tato'pi /
analyzed: ati unnata stanam uraḥ nayane su dīrghe vakre bhruvau atitarām vacanam

original: MSS_0702-2 madhyo'dhikaṃ tanuranūnagururnitambo mandā gatiḥ kimapi cādbhutayauvanāyāḥ //
analyzed: madhyaḥ adhikam tanuḥ anūna guruḥ nitambaḥ mandā gatiḥ kim api ca adbhuta yauvanāyāḥ

original: MSS_0703-1 atyunnatastanayugā taralāyatākṣī dvāri sthitā tadupayānamahotsavāya /
analyzed: ati unnata stana yugā tarala āyata akṣī dvāri sthitā tad upayāna mahā utsavāya

original: MSS_0703-2 sā pūrṇakumbhanavanīrajatoraṇasrak- saṃbhāramaṅgalamayatnakṛtaṃ vidhatte //
analyzed: sā pūrṇa kumbha nava nīraja toraṇa sraj saṃbhāra maṅgalam ayatna kṛtam vidhatte

original: MSS_0704-1 atyunnatiṃ prāpya naraḥ prāvāraḥ kīṭako yathā /
analyzed: ati unnatim prāpya naraḥ prāvāraḥ kīṭakaḥ yathā

original: MSS_0704-2 sa vinaśyatyasaṃdeham āhaivamuśanā nṛpaḥ //
analyzed: sa vinaśyati asaṃdeham āha evam uśanāḥ nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_0705-1 atyunnativyasaninaḥ śiraso'dhunaiṣa svasyaiva cātakaśiśuḥ praṇayaṃ vidhattām /
analyzed: ati unnati vyasaninaḥ śirasā adhunā eṣa svasya eva cātaka śiśuḥ praṇayam vidhattām

original: MSS_0705-2 asyaitadicchati yadi pratatāsu dikṣu tāḥ svacchaśītamadhurāḥ kva nu nāma nāpaḥ //
analyzed: asya etat icchati yadi pratatāsu dikṣu tāḥ su accha śīta madhurāḥ kva nu nāma na apaḥ

original: MSS_0706-1 atyunnato'mbubhirmeghaś cātakān na dhinoti cet /
analyzed: ati unnata umbubhiḥ meghaḥ cātakān na dhinoti ced

original: MSS_0706-2 marutā hṛtasarvasvaḥ sa paścāt kiṃ kariśyati //
analyzed: marutā hṛta sarvasvaḥ sa paścāt kim kariśyati

original: MSS_0707-1 atyupacittairupāyaiś cakrabhṛdeko bhujairiva caturbhiḥ /
analyzed: ati upacittaiḥ upāyaiḥ cakrabhṛt ekaḥ bhujaiḥ iva caturbhiḥ

original: MSS_0707-2 nṛpatiḥ śriyamapi suciraṃ haririva parirabhya nirbharaṃ ramate //
analyzed: nṛpatiḥ śriyam api su ciram hariḥ iva parirabhya nirbharam ramate

original: MSS_0708-1 atyullasadbisarahasyayujā bhujena vaktreṇa śāradasudhāṃśusahodareṇa /
analyzed: ati ullasat bisa rahasya yujā bhujena vaktreṇa śārada sudhāṃśu sahodareṇa

original: MSS_0708-2 pīyuṣapoṣasubhagena ca bhāṣitena tvaṃ cet prasīdasi mṛgākṣi kuto nidāghaḥ //
analyzed: pīyuṣa poṣa subhagena ca bhāṣitena tvam ced prasīdasi mṛga akṣi kutas nidāghaḥ

original: MSS_0709-1 atyuṣṇā jvariteva bhāskarakarairāpītasārā mahī yakṣmārtā iva pādapāḥ pramuṣitacchāyā davāgnyāśrayāt /
analyzed: ati uṣṇā jvaritā iva bhāskara karaiḥ āpīta sārā mahī yakṣma ārtāḥ iva pādapāḥ pramuṣita chāyāḥ dava agni āśrayāt

original: MSS_0709-2 vikrośantyavaśādivocchritaguhāvyāttānanāḥ parvatā loko'yaṃ ravipākanaṣṭahṛdayaḥ saṃyāti mūrchāmiva //
analyzed: vikrośanti avaśāt iva ucchrita guhā vyātta ānanāḥ parvatāḥ lokaḥ yam ravi pāka naṣṭa hṛdayaḥ saṃyāti mūrchām iva

original: MSS_0710-1 atyuṣṇāt saghṛtādannād acchidrāccaiva vāsasaḥ /
analyzed: ati uṣṇāt sa ghṛtāt annāt acchidrāt ca eva vāsasaḥ

original: MSS_0710-2 aparapreṣyabhāvācca bhūya icchan patatyadhaḥ //
analyzed: apara preṣya bhāvāt ca bhūyas icchan patati adhas

original: MSS_0711-1 atyeti rajanī yā tu sā na pratinivartate /
analyzed: atyeti rajanī yā tu sā na pratinivartate

original: MSS_0711-2 yātyeva yamunā pūrṇā samudramudakārṇavam //
analyzed: yāti eva yamunā pūrṇā samudram udakārṇavam

original: MSS_0712-1 atra caitrasamaye nirantarāḥ proṣitāhṛdayakīrṇapāvakāḥ /
analyzed: atra caitra samaye nirantarāḥ proṣitāḥ a hṛdaya kīrṇa pāvakāḥ

original: MSS_0712-2 vānti kāmukamanovimohanā vyālalolamalayācalānilāḥ //
analyzed: vānti kāmuka manaḥ vimohanāḥ vyāla lola malaya acala anilāḥ

original: MSS_0713-1 atra manmathamivātisundaraṃ dānavārimiva divyatejasam /
analyzed: atra manmatham iva ati sundaram dānava arim iva divya tejasam

original: MSS_0713-2 śailarājamiva dhairyaśālinaṃ vedmi veṅkaṭapatiṃ mahīpatim //
analyzed: śailarājam iva dhairya śālinam vedmi veṅkaṭa patim mahīpatim

original: MSS_0714-1 atra yat patitaṃ varṇabindumātrāvisargakam /
analyzed: atra yat patitam varṇa bindu mātrā visargakam

original: MSS_0714-2 bhramapramādadoṣāddhi kṣantavyaṃ tat subuddhibhiḥ //
analyzed: bhrama pramāda doṣāt hi kṣantavyam tat su buddhibhiḥ

original: MSS_0715-1 atrasto nijapakṣais tuṇḍavighātairjanānabhibhavantaḥ /
analyzed: atrastaḥ nija pakṣaiḥ tuṇḍa vighātaiḥ janān abhibhavantaḥ

original: MSS_0715-2 kurvanti śatruvṛddhiṃ niśi virutavanto janavināśam //
analyzed: kurvanti śatru vṛddhim niśi virutavantaḥ jana vināśam

original: MSS_0716-1 atrasthaḥ sakhi lakṣayojanagatasyāpi priyasyāgamaṃ vettyākhyāti ca dhikchukādaya ime sarve pathantaḥ sthitāḥ /
analyzed: atrasthaḥ sakhi lakṣa yojana gatasya api priyasya āgamam vetti ākhyāti ca dhik śuka ādayaḥ ime sarve pathantaḥ sthitāḥ

original: MSS_0716-2 matkāntasya viyogatāpadahanajvālāvalīcandanaḥ kākastena guṇena kāñcanamaye vyāpāritaḥ pañjare //
analyzed: mad kāntasya viyoga tāpa dahana jvālā āvalī candanaḥ kākaḥ tena guṇena kāñcana maye vyāpāritaḥ pañjare

original: MSS_0717-1 atrakaṇṭhaṃ viluṭha salile nirjalā bhūḥ purastāj jahyāḥ śoṣaṃ vadanavihitenāmalakyāḥ /
analyzed: atra kaṇṭham viluṭha salile nirjalā bhūḥ purastāt jahyāḥ śoṣam vadana vihitena āmalakyāḥ

original: MSS_0717-2 phalena sthāne sthāne taditi pathikastrījana(ḥ)
analyzed: phalena sthāne sthāne tat iti pathika strī janaḥ

original: klāntagātrīṃ paśyan sītāṃ kimu na kṛpayā vardhito roditaśca //
analyzed: klānta gātrīm paśyan sītām kimu na kṛpayā vardhitaḥ roditaḥ ca

original: MSS_0718-1 atranugodaṃ mṛgayānivṛttas taraṅgavātena vinītakhedaḥ /
analyzed: mṛgayā nivṛttaḥ taraṅga vātena vinīta khedaḥ

original: MSS_0718-2 rahastvadutsaṅganiṣaṇṇamūrdhā smarāmi vānīragṛheṣu suptaḥ //
analyzed: rahaḥ tvad utsaṅga niṣaṇṇa mūrdhā smarāmi vānīra gṛheṣu suptaḥ

original: MSS_0719-1 atrāntare kimapi vāgvibhavātivṛtta- vaicitryamullasitavibhramamāyatākṣyāḥ /
analyzed: atrā antare kim api vāc vibhava ativṛtta vaicitryam ullasita vibhramam āyata akṣyāḥ

original: MSS_0719-2 tadbhūrisāttvikavikāramapāstadhairyam ācāryakaṃ vijayi mānmathamāvirāsīt //
analyzed: tat bhūri sāttvika vikāram apāsta dhairyam ācāryakam vijayi mānmatham āvirāsīt

original: MSS_0720-1 atrāntare ca kulaṭākulavartmaghāta- saṃjātapātaka iva sphuṭalāñchanaśrīḥ /
analyzed: atrā antare ca kulaṭā kula vartma ghāta saṃjāta pātakaḥ iva sphuṭa lāñchana śrīḥ

original: MSS_0720-2 vṛndāvanāntaramadīpayadṃśujālair diksundarīvadanacandanabindurinduḥ //
analyzed: vṛndāvana antaram adīpayat ṛśu jālaiḥ diś sundarī vadana candana binduḥ induḥ

original: MSS_0721-1 atrāpi bhārataṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jambudvīpe mahāmune /
analyzed: atrā api bhāratam śreṣṭham jambudvīpe mahā mune

original: MSS_0721-2 yato hi karmabhūreṣā ato'nyā bhogabhūmayaḥ //
analyzed: yatas hi karma bhūḥ eṣā atas nyāḥ bhogabhūmayaḥ

original: MSS_0722-1 atrāyātaṃ pathika bhavatā karmaṇākāri pathyaṃ tathyaṃ brūmaḥ punarapi sakhe sāhasaṃ mā vidhāsīḥ /
analyzed: atra āyātam pathika bhavatā karmaṇā akāri pathyam tathyam brūmaḥ punar api sakhe sāhasam mā vidhāsīḥ

original: MSS_0722-2 vāmākṣīṇāṃ nayananalinaprāntanirdhūtadhairyāḥ svāṃ maryādāmiha hi nagare yogino'pi tyajanti //
analyzed: vāma akṣīṇām nayana nalina prānta nirdhūta dhairyāḥ svām maryādām iha hi nagare yoginaḥ api tyajanti

original: MSS_0723-1 atrardracandanakucārpitasūtrahāra- sīmantacumbisicayasphuṭabāhumūlaḥ /
analyzed: atra ārdra candana kuca arpita sūtra hāra sīmanta cumbi sicaya sphuṭa bāhu mūlaḥ

original: MSS_0723-2 dūrvāprakāṇḍarucirāsu gurūpabhogo gauḍāṅganāsu cirameṣa cakāsti veṣaḥ //
analyzed: dūrvā prakāṇḍa rucirāsu guru upabhogaḥ gauḍa aṅganāsu ciram eṣa cakāsti veṣaḥ

original: MSS_0724-1 atrāryaḥ kharadūṣaṇatriśirasāṃ nādānubandhodyame rundhāne bhuvanaṃ tvayā cakitayā yoddhā niruddhaḥ kṣaṇam /
analyzed: atra āryaḥ khara dūṣaṇa triśirasām nāda anubandha udyame rundhāne bhuvanam tvayā cakitayā yoddhā niruddhaḥ kṣaṇam

original: MSS_0724-2 sasnehāḥ sarasāḥ sahāsarabhasāḥ sabhrū bhramāḥ saspṛhāḥ sotsāhāstvayi tadbale ca nidadhe dolāyamānā dṛśaḥ //
analyzed: sa snehāḥ sa rasāḥ sa hāsa rabhasāḥ sa bhrūḥ bhramāḥ sa spṛhāḥ sa utsāhāḥ tvayi tad bale ca nidadhe dolāyamānāḥ dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_0725-1 atrāvāsaparigrahaṃ gṛhapaterācakṣva caṇḍodyamaiḥ caṇḍālairupasevitāḥ sakhi dhanurhastaiḥ purastādimāḥ /
analyzed: atra āvāsa parigraham gṛhapateḥ ācakṣva caṇḍa udyamaiḥ caṇḍālaiḥ upasevitāḥ sakhi dhanuḥ hastaiḥ purastāt imāḥ

original: MSS_0725-2 utkālākulasārameyarasanālelihyamānonnata- dvārāgratvagavāsthisāsraśakalasragvallayaḥ pallayaḥ //
analyzed: dvāra agra tvac ava asthi sa asra śakala sraj vallayaḥ pallayaḥ

original: MSS_0726-1 atrāśitaṃ śayitamatra nipītamatra sāyaṃ tayā saha mayā vidhivañcitena /
analyzed: atra aśitam śayitam atra nipītam atra sāyam tayā saha mayā vidhi vañcitena

original: MSS_0726-2 ityādi hanta paricintayato vanānte rāmasya locanapayobhirabhūt payodhiḥ //
analyzed: ityādi hanta paricintayataḥ vanānte rāmasya locana payobhiḥ abhūt payodhiḥ

original: MSS_0727-1 atrāsīt kila nandasadma śakaṭasyātrābhavad bhañjanaṃ bandhacchedakaro'pidāmabhirabhūd baddho'tra dāmodaraḥ /
analyzed: atrā āsīt kila nanda sadma śakaṭasya atrā bhavat bhañjanam bandha chedaka ropi dāmabhiḥ abhūt baddhaḥ utra dāmodaraḥ

original: MSS_0727-2 itthaṃ māthuravṛddhavaktravigalatpīyūṣadhārāṃ pibann ānandāśrudharaḥ kadā madhupurīṃ dhanyaścariṣyāmyaham //
analyzed: ittham māthura vṛddha vaktra vigalat pīyūṣa dhārām piban ānanda aśru dharaḥ kadā madhupurīm dhanyaḥ cariṣyāmi aham

original: MSS_0728-1 atrāsīt phaṇipāśabandhanavidhiḥ śaktyā bhavad devare gāḍhaṃ vakṣasi tāḍite hanumatā droṇādriratrāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: atrā āsīt phaṇi pāśa bandhana vidhiḥ śaktyā bhavat devare gāḍham vakṣasi tāḍite hanumatā droṇa adriḥ atrā āhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_0728-2 divyairindrajidatra lakṣmaṇaśarairlokāntaraṃ prāpitaḥ kenāpyatra mṛgākṣi rākṣasapateḥ kṛttā ca kaṇṭhṭavī //
analyzed: divyaiḥ indrajit atra lakṣmaṇa śaraiḥ loka antaram prāpitaḥ kena api atra mṛga akṣi rākṣasa pateḥ kṛttā ca kaṇṭhṭavī

original: MSS_0729-1 atrāsthaḥ piśitaṃ śavasya kaṭhinairutkṛtya kṛtsnaṃ nakhair nagnasnāyukarālaghorakuharairmastiṣkadigdhāṅgaliḥ /
analyzed: atra āsthaḥ piśitam śavasya kaṭhinaiḥ utkṛtya kṛtsnam nakhaiḥ nagna snāyu karāla ghora kuharaiḥ mastiṣka digdha aṅgaliḥ

original: MSS_0729-2 saṃdaśyauṣṭhapuṭena bhugnavadanaḥ pretaścitāgnidrutaṃ sūtkārairnalakāsthikoṭaragataṃ majjānamākarṣati //
analyzed: saṃdaśya oṣṭha puṭena bhugna vadanaḥ pretaḥ citā agni drutam sūtkāraiḥ nalaka asthi koṭara gatam majjānam ākarṣati

original: MSS_0730-1 atrāsmin sutanu latāgṛhe'sti ramyaṃ mālatyāḥ kusumamanuccitaṃ pareṇa /
analyzed: atrā asmin su tanu ramyam mālatyāḥ kusumam anuccitam pareṇa

original: MSS_0730-2 ityuktvā mṛdukarapallavaṃ gṛhītvā mugdhākṣī rahasi nināya ko'pi dhanyaḥ //
analyzed: iti uktvā mṛdu kara pallavam gṛhītvā mugdha akṣī rahasi nināya kaḥ api dhanyaḥ

original: MSS_0731-1 atrilocanasaṃbhūtajyotirudgamabhāsibhiḥ /
analyzed: atri locana saṃbhūta jyotiḥ udgama bhāsibhiḥ

original: MSS_0731-2 sadṛśaṇ śobhate'tyarthaṃ bhūpāla tava ceṣṭitam //
analyzed: śobhata iti artham bhūpāla tava ceṣṭitam

original: MSS_0732-1 atraiva dāsyasi vimuktimathāpi yāce mātaḥ śarīrapatanaṃ maṇikarṇikāyām /
analyzed: atrā eva dāsyasi vimuktim atha api yāce mātar śarīra patanam maṇikarṇikāyām

original: MSS_0732-2 astu svakṛtyamanukampanamīśvarāṇāṃ dāsasya karmakarataiva tathā svakṛtyam //
analyzed: astu sva kṛtyam anukampanam īśvarāṇām dāsasya karmakara tā eva tathā sva kṛtyam

original: MSS_0733-1 atraiva sarasi jātaṃ vikasitamatraiva nirbharaṃ nalinaiḥ /
analyzed: atrā eva sarasi jātam vikasitam atrā eva nirbharam nalinaiḥ

original: MSS_0733-2 kālavaśāgatatuhinair vilīnamatraiva hā kaṣṭam //
analyzed: kāla vaśa āgata tuhinaiḥ vilīnam atra eva hā kaṣṭam

original: MSS_0734-1 atraiṣa svayameva citraphalake kampaskhalallekhayā saṃtāpārtivinodanāya kathamapyālikhya sakhyā bhavān /
analyzed: atrā eṣa svayam eva citra phalake kampa skhalat lekhayā saṃtāpa ārti vinodanāya katham api ālikhya sakhyā bhavān

original: MSS_0734-2 bāṣpavyākulamīkṣitaḥ sarabhasaṃ cūtāṅkurairarcito mūrdhnā ca praṇataḥ sakhīṣu madanavyājena cāpahnutaḥ //
analyzed: bāṣpa vyākulam īkṣitaḥ sarabhasam cūta aṅkuraiḥ arcitaḥ mūrdhnā ca praṇataḥ sakhīṣu madana vyājena ca apahnutaḥ

original: MSS_0735-1 atrotpātaghanena mantrivikale śūnyāmbaravyāpinā dhṛṣṭasvaprakṛtikriyāsamucite grame tathā jṛmbhitam /

analyzed: rathyā kardama vāhinām ati śuci su accha ātmanām antaram nā api ajñāyi janaiḥ yathā ogha payasām srotaḥ jalānām api

original: MSS_0736-1 atrodyāne mayā dṛṣṭā vallarī pañcapallavā /

original: MSS_0736-2 pallave pallave tāmrā yasyāṃ kusumamañjarī //
analyzed: pallave pallave tāmrā yasyām kusuma mañjarī

analyzed: atvarā sarva kāryeṣu tvarā kārya vināśinī

analyzed: tvaramāṇena mūrkheṇa mayūraḥ vāyasīkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_0738-1 atha kālāgnirudrasya tṛtīyanayanotthitā /
analyzed: atha kālāgni rudrasya tṛtīya nayana utthitā

analyzed: jvālā dahati tat sarvam nirvāṇam brahmaṇaḥ yatas

original: MSS_0739-1 atha kṛtakavihaṅgaiḥ pārthivoddūlayantais tumulamuparipātādambuvarṣāt trasantyaḥ avigalitasapatnīgātrasaṃmardaduḥkhāḥ praṇayinamabhipeturhāninādena  #
analyzed: atha kṛtaka vihaṅgaiḥ pārthiva uddūlayantaiḥ tumulam upari pātāt ambu varṣāt trasantyaḥ a vigalita sapatnī gātra saṃmarda duḥkhāḥ praṇayinam abhipetuḥ hāni nādena  /

original: devyaḥ //
analyzed: devyaḥ

original: MSS_0740-1 (arjuna uvāca)
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

analyzed: an icchan api vārṣṇeya balāt iva niyojitaḥ

original: MSS_0741-1 (śrībhagavānuvāca)
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: kāma eṣa krodha eṣa rajoguṇasamudbhavaḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ eṣa krodhaḥ eṣa rajaḥ guṇa samudbhavaḥ

analyzed: mahā aśanaḥ mahā pāpmā viddhi enam iha vairiṇam

original: MSS_0742-2 yatholbenāvṛto garbhas tathā tenedamāvṛtam //
analyzed: yathā ulbena āvṛtaḥ garbhaḥ tathā tena idam āvṛtam

original: MSS_0743-1 atha kokila kuru maunaṃ jaladharasamaye'pi picchilā bhūmiḥ /
analyzed: atha kokila kuru maunam jaladhara samaye pi picchilā bhūmiḥ

original: MSS_0743-2 vikasati kuṭajakadambe vaktari bheke kutastavāvasaraḥ //
analyzed: vikasati kuṭaja kadambe vaktari bheke kutas tava avasaraḥ

original: MSS_0744-1 atha dhūkasvaro vāme yātrāyāṃ gacchataḥ śubhaḥ /
analyzed: atha dhūka svaraḥ vāme yātrāyām gacchataḥ śubhaḥ

original: MSS_0744-2 dakṣiṇe mṛtaye kiṃcid duṣṭaṃ darśanamasya hi //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe mṛtaye kiṃcid duṣṭam darśanam asya hi

original: MSS_0745-1 atha jagadavagāḍhaṃ vāsarāntāpacārāt timirapaṭalavṛddhāvapratīkārasattvam /

original: MSS_0745-2 śaśibhiṣaganupūrvaṃ śītahasto bhiṣajyann adhikaviśadavaktraḥ svairabhāvaṃ cakāra //
analyzed: śaśi bhiṣaj anupūrvam śīta hastaḥ bhiṣajyan adhika viśada vaktraḥ svaira bhāvam cakāra

original: MSS_0746-1 atha dīrghatamaṃ tamaḥ pravekṣyan sahasā rugṇarayaḥ sa saṃbhrameṇa /

original: MSS_0746-2 nipatantamivoṣṇaraśmimurvyāṃ valayībhūtataruṃ dharāṃ ca mene //

original: MSS_0747-1 atha dehaṃ sthirīrktuṃ yogināṃ siddhimicchatām /
analyzed: atha deham sthirīrktum yoginām siddhim icchatām

original: MSS_0747-2 kathyante śuddhakarmāṇi yaiḥ siddhiṃ prāpuruttamāḥ //
analyzed: kathyante śuddha karmāṇi yaiḥ siddhim prāpuḥ uttamāḥ

original: MSS_0748-1 atha nagaradhṛtairamātyaratnaiḥ pathi samiyāya sa jāyayābhirāmaḥ /
analyzed: atha nagara dhṛtaiḥ amātya ratnaiḥ pathi samiyāya sa jāyayā abhirāmaḥ

original: MSS_0748-2 madhuriva kusumaśriyā sanāthaḥ kramamilitairalibhiḥ kutūhalotkaiḥ //
analyzed: madhuḥ iva kusuma śriyā sa nāthaḥ krama militaiḥ alibhiḥ kutūhala utkaiḥ

original: MSS_0749-1 atha nabhasi nirīkṣya vyāptadikcakravālaṃ sajalajaladajālaṃ prāptahaṛṣaprakarṣaḥ /
analyzed: atha nabhasi nirīkṣya vyāpta diś cakravālam sa jala jalada jālam prāpta haṛṣa prakarṣaḥ

original: MSS_0749-2 vihitavipulabarhāḍambaro nīlakaṇṭho madamṛdukalakaṇṭho nāṭyamaṅgīcakāra //
analyzed: vihita vipula barha āḍambaraḥ nīlakaṇṭhaḥ mada mṛdu kala kaṇṭhaḥ nāṭyam aṅgīcakāra

original: MSS_0750-1 atha nayanasamutthaṃ jyotiratreriva dyauḥ surasaridiva tejo vahniniṣṭhyūtamaiśam /
analyzed: atha nayana samuttham jyotiḥ atreḥ iva dyauḥ surasarit iva tejaḥ vahni niṣṭhyūtam aiśam

original: MSS_0750-2 narapatikulabhūtyai garbhamādhatta rājñī gurubhirabhiniviṣṭaṃ lokapālānubhāvaiḥ //
analyzed: narapati kula bhūtyai garbham ādhatta rājñī gurubhiḥ abhiniviṣṭam lokapāla anubhāvaiḥ

original: MSS_0751-1 atha nityamanityaṃ vā neha śocanti tadvidaḥ /
analyzed: atha nityam anityam vā na iha śocanti tad vidaḥ

original: MSS_0751-2 nānyathā śakyate kartuṃ svabhāvaḥ śocatāmiti //
analyzed: na anyathā śakyate kartum svabhāvaḥ śocatām iti

original: MSS_0752-1 atha paṅktimatāmupeyivadbhiḥ sarasairvakrapathaśritairvacobhiḥ /
analyzed: atha paṅktimatām upeyivadbhiḥ sarasaiḥ vakra patha śritaiḥ vacobhiḥ

analyzed: kṣitibhartuḥ upāyanam cakāra prathamam tat paratas turaṅgama ādyaiḥ

original: MSS_0753-1 atha pathikavadhūdahanaḥ śanakairudabhūnniśākarālokaḥ /
analyzed: atha pathika vadhū dahanaḥ śanakais udabhūt niśākara ālokaḥ

original: MSS_0753-2 kumudaprabodhadūto vyasanaguruścakravākīṇām //
analyzed: kumudaprabodha dūtaḥ vyasana guruḥ cakravākīṇām

original: MSS_0754-1 atha prasannendumukhīn sitāmbarā samāyayāvutpalapatralocanā /
analyzed: atha prasanna indu mukhīn sita ambarā samāyayau utpala patra locanā

original: MSS_0754-2 sapaṅkajā śrīriva gāṃ niṣevituṃ sahaṃsabālavyajanā śaradvadhūḥ //

original: MSS_0755-1 athabaddhajeṭe rāme sumantre gṛhamāgate /
analyzed: atha baddha jeṭe rāme sumantre gṛham āgate

original: MSS_0755-2 tyakto rājā sutatyāgād aviśvastairivāsubhiḥ //
analyzed: tyaktaḥ rājā suta tyāgāt aviśvastaiḥ iva asubhiḥ

original: MSS_0756-1 atha bhadrāṇi bhūtāṇi hīnaśaktirahaṃ param /
analyzed: atha bhadrāṇi bhūtāṇi hīna śaktiḥ aham param

original: MSS_0756-2 mudaṃ tadāpi kurvīta hānirdveṣaphalaṃ yataḥ //
analyzed: mudam tadā api kurvīta hāniḥ dveṣa phalam yatas

original: MSS_0757-1 atha manasijadigjyābhiśaṃsī jaladharadugdubhirātatāna śabdam /

original: MSS_0758-2 ekaviṃśativāraṃ ca vṛścikakṣveḍaśāntaye //
analyzed: ekaviṃśati vāram ca vṛścika kṣveḍa śāntaye

original: MSS_0759-1 atha manmathavāhinīparāgaḥ kimapi jyotirudasphurat purastāt /

original: MSS_0759-2 timirasya jarā cakorakūraṃ kulaḍākelibanīdavānalārciḥ //

original: MSS_0760-1 atha ratirabhasādalīkanidrā- madhuravighūrṇitalocanotpalābhiḥ /

original: MSS_0761-1 atha rājñā daraḥ kāryo na tu kasyāṃ cidāpadi /

original: MSS_0761-2 api cetasi dīrṇaḥ syān naiva varteta dīrṇavat //
analyzed: api cetasi dīrṇaḥ syāt na eva varteta dīrṇa vat

original: MSS_0762-1 arthatupakvāt kalato'vaśoṣitād vikṛṣya bījaṃ payasā niṣicya /
analyzed: vikṛṣya bījam payasā niṣicya

original: MSS_0762-2 viśoṣitaṃ pañcadināni sarpiṣā viḍaṅgamiśreṇa ca dhūpayet tataḥ //
MSS_0763-1 atharvavidhitattvajñair brāhmaṇairvijitendriyaiḥ /
analyzed: atharva vidhi tattva jñaiḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ vijita indriyaiḥ

original: MSS_0763-2 mantratantravidhānajñair dūrādunmūlayed ripūn //
MSS_0764-1 atharvāmnāyatattvajñas tantrajñaḥ kratukarmaṭhaḥ dhanurvedasya vettā ca purodhā rājasaṃmataḥ //

original: MSS_0765-1 atha lakṣmaṇānugatakāntavapur jaladhiṃ vilaṅghya śaśidāśarathiḥ /

analyzed: parivāritaḥ paritas timira ogha rākṣasa kulam bibhide

original: MSS_0766-1 athavā naśyati prajñā prājñasyāpi narasya hi /
analyzed: athavā naśyati prajñā prājñasya api narasya hi

original: MSS_0766-2 pratikūle gate daive vināśe samupasthite //
analyzed: pratikūle gate daive vināśe samupasthite

original: MSS_0767-1 athavā procyate dhyānam anyadevātra yoginām /

analyzed: svatas eva satām parārtha tā grahaṇānām hi yathā yathārtha tā

original: MSS_0769-1 athavābhiniviṣṭabuddhiṣu vrajati vyarthakatāṃ subhāṣitam /

analyzed: ravi rāgiṣu śītarociṣaḥ kara jālam kamala ākaroṣu iva

original: MSS_0770-2 yadanena tarurna pātitaḥ kṣipatā tadviḍapāśrayā latā //

original: MSS_0771-1 athavā mūlasaṃsthānām udghātaistu prabodhayet /
analyzed: athavā mūla saṃsthānām udghātaiḥ tu prabodhayet

original: MSS_0771-2 suptāṃ kuṇḍalinīṃ śaktiṃ bisatantunibhākṛtim //
analyzed: suptām kuṇḍalinīm śaktim bisa tantu nibha ākṛtim

original: MSS_0772-1 athavā mṛdu vastu hiṃsituṃ mṛdunaivārabhate prajāntakaḥ /
analyzed: athavā mṛdu vastu hiṃsitum mṛdunā eva ārabhate prajā antakaḥ

original: MSS_0772-2 himasekavipattiratra me nalīnī pūrvanidarśanaṃ matā //
analyzed: hima seka vipattiḥ atra me nalīnī pūrva nidarśanam matā

original: MSS_0773-1 atha vāsavasya vacanena ruciravadanastrilocanam /
analyzed: atha vāsavasya vacanena rucira vadanaḥ trilocanam

original: MSS_0773-2 klāntirahitamabhirādhayituṃ vidhivat tapāṃsi vidadhe dhanaṃjayaḥ //
analyzed: klānti rahitam abhirādhayitum vidhivat tapāṃsi vidadhe dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: MSS_0774-1 atha saṃsārasaṃhāravāmanābandhavāsitaḥ /
analyzed: atha saṃsāra saṃhāra vāmanā bandha vāsitaḥ

analyzed: ajāyata vṛṣārūḍhaḥ bhairavaḥ mahasām nidhiḥ

original: MSS_0775-1 atha sa lalitayoṣidbhrūlatācāruśṛṅgaṃ rativalayapadāṅke cāpamāsajya kaṇṭhe /
analyzed: atha sa lalita yoṣit bhrū latā cāru śṛṅgam rati valaya pada aṅke cāpam āsajya kaṇṭhe

original: MSS_0775-2 sahacaramadhuhastanyastucūtāṅkurāstraś śatamakhamupatasthe prāñjaliḥ puṣpadhanvā //
analyzed: sahacara madhu hasta nyastu cūta aṅkura astraḥ śatamakham upatasthe prāñjaliḥ puṣpadhanvā

original: MSS_0776-1 atha sa viṣayavyāvṛttātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpatikakudaṃ dattvā yūne sitātapavāraṇam /
analyzed: atha sa viṣaya vyāvṛtta ātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpati kakudam dattvā yūne sita ātapa vāraṇam

original: MSS_0776-2 munivanatarucchāyāṃ devyā tayā saha śiśriye galitavayasāmikṣvākūṇāmidaṃ hi kulavratam //
analyzed: muni vana taru chāyām devyā tayā saha śiśriye galita vayasām ikṣvākūṇām idam hi kula vratam

original: MSS_0777-1 atha sāndrasāṃdhyakiraṇāruṇitaṃ harihetihūti mithunaṃ patatoḥ /
analyzed: atha sāndra sāṃdhya kiraṇa aruṇitam hari heti hūti mithunam patatoḥ

original: MSS_0777-2 pṛthagutpapāta virahārtidalad- dhṛdayasrutāsṛganuliptamiva //
analyzed: pṛthak utpapāta viraha ārti dalat hṛdaya sruta asṛj anuliptam iva

original: MSS_0778-1 atha sāmānyaśṛṅgāre yuvatīnāṃ praśaṃsanam /
analyzed: atha sāmānya śṛṅgāre yuvatīnām praśaṃsanam

original: MSS_0778-2 strīpuṃsajātikathanaṃ tayoḥ saṃyogavarṇanam //
analyzed: strīpuṃsa jāti kathanam tayoḥ saṃyoga varṇanam

original: MSS_0779-1 atha sphuranmīnavidhūtapaṅkajā vikaṅkatīraskhalitormisaṃhatiḥ /
analyzed: atha sphurat mīna vidhūta paṅkajā vikaṅkatīra skhalita ūrmi saṃhatiḥ

original: MSS_0779-2 payo'vagāḍhuṃ kalahaṃsanādinī samājuhāveva vadhūḥ surāpagā //
analyzed: payaḥ vagāḍhum kalahaṃsa nādinī samājuhāva iva vadhūḥ surāpagā

original: MSS_0780-1 atha svamādāya bhayena manthanāc ciratnaratnādhikamuccitaṃ cirāt /
analyzed: atha svam ādāya bhayena manthanāt ciratna ratna adhikam uccitam cirāt

original: MSS_0780-2 nilīya tasmin nivasannapāṃnidhir vane taḍāko dadṛśo'vanībhujā //
analyzed: nilīya tasmin nivasan apāṃnidhiḥ vane taḍākaḥ dadṛśa uvanībhujā

original: MSS_0781-1 atha svasthāya devāya nityāya hatapāpmane /
analyzed: atha svasthāya devāya nityāya hata pāpmane

original: MSS_0781-2 tyaktakramavibhāgāya caitanyajyotiṣe namaḥ //
analyzed: tyakta krama vibhāgāya caitanya jyotiṣe namaḥ

original: MSS_0782-1 athāgatya bhuvaṃ rājñāṃ gatā vāhanatāṃ hayāḥ /
analyzed: athā āgatya bhuvam rājñām gatāḥ vāhana tām hayāḥ

original: MSS_0782-2 teṣāṃ dharmārthakāmāṃśca sādhayantyupakāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām dharma artha kāmān ca sādhayanti upakāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_0783-1 athāṅgarājādavatārya cakṣur yāhīti janyāmavadat kumārī /
analyzed: atha aṅga rājāt avatārya cakṣuḥ yāhi iti janyām avadat kumārī

original: MSS_0783-2 nāsau na kāmyo na ca veda samyag dṛṣṭuṃ na sā bhinnarucirhi lokaḥ //
analyzed: na asau na kāmyaḥ na ca veda samyak dṛṣṭum na sā bhinna ruciḥ hi lokaḥ

original: MSS_0784-1 athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni hi vājinām /
analyzed: atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni hi vājinām

original: MSS_0784-2 śubhāni varṇairāvartais tāni vidyādvicārataḥ //
analyzed: śubhāni varṇaiḥ āvartaiḥ tāni vidyāt vicārataḥ

original: MSS_0785-1 athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi hayārohaṇamuttamam /
analyzed: atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi haya ārohaṇam uttamam

original: MSS_0785-2 yena vijñātamātreṇa revantaḥ priyatāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: yena vijñāta mātreṇa revantaḥ priya tām vrajet

original: MSS_0786-1 athātmanaḥ śabdaguṇaṃ guṇajñaḥ padaṃ vimānena vigāhamānaḥ /
analyzed: atha ātmanaḥ śabda guṇam guṇa jñaḥ padam vimānena vigāhamānaḥ

original: MSS_0786-2 ratnākaraṃ vīkṣya mithaḥ sa jāyāṃ rāmābhidhāno harirityuvāca //
analyzed: ratnākaram vīkṣya mithas sa jāyām rāma abhidhānaḥ hariḥ iti uvāca

original: MSS_0787-1 athānandakaraṃ vakṣye ṣaḍartūnāṃ ca varṇanam /
analyzed: atha ānanda karam vakṣye ṣaṣ artūnām ca varṇanam

original: MSS_0787-2 yadrasāsvādamuditā vibhānti vibudhālayaḥ //
analyzed: yad rasa āsvāda muditāḥ vibhānti vibudha ālayaḥ

original: MSS_0788-1 athānukramadvārāṇi viracyante'tra vāṅmaye /

original: MSS_0788-2 anyoktisūktamuktālīṃ samuddhṛtya śrutāmbudheḥ //
MSS_0789-1 athāpi nāpasajjeta strīṣu straiṇeṣu cārthavit /
analyzed: atha api na apasajjeta strīṣu straiṇeṣu ca artha vid

original: MSS_0789-2 viṣayendriyasaṃyogān manaḥ kṣubhyati nānyathā //
analyzed: viṣaya indriya saṃyogāt manaḥ kṣubhyati na anyathā

original: MSS_0790-1 athāpraśastāḥ kharatulyanādāḥ pradīptapucchāḥ kūnakhā vivarṇāḥ /
analyzed: atha apraśastāḥ khara tulya nādāḥ pradīpta pucchāḥ kūnakhāḥ vivarṇāḥ

original: MSS_0790-2 nikṛttakarṇā dvipamastakāśca bhavanti ye vā sitatālujihvāḥ //
analyzed: nikṛtta karṇāḥ dvipa mastakāḥ ca bhavanti ye vā sita tālu jihvāḥ

original: MSS_0791-1 athāyatanasaṃnidhau bhagavato bhavānīpater manoharamacīkhanad bhuvanabhūṣaṇaṃ bhūpatiḥ /
analyzed: atha āyatana saṃnidhau bhagavataḥ bhavānī pateḥ manoharam acīkhanat bhuvana bhūṣaṇam bhūpatiḥ

analyzed: kaitava sneham āpannaḥ bhavaḥ saṃkīrṇaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_0793-1 athāśvānāṃ janmadeśān pravakṣyāmyanupūrvaśaḥ /

original: MSS_0794-1 athāsasādāstamanindyatejā janasya dūrojjhitamṛtyubhīteḥ /

original: MSS_0794-2 utpattimadvastu vināśyavaśyaṃ yathāhamityevamivopadeṣṭum //

original: MSS_0795-1 athetare sapta raghupravīrā jyeṣṭhaṃ purojanmatayā guṇaiśca cakruḥ kuśaṃ ratnaviśoṣabhājaṃ saubhrātrameṣāṃ hi kulānusāri //
analyzed: athā itare sapta raghu pravīrāḥ jyeṣṭham purojanma tayā guṇaiḥ ca cakruḥ kuśam ratna viśoṣa bhājam saubhrātram eṣām hi kula anusāri

analyzed: athā iha kathyate smābhiḥ karmanā yena bandhanam

original: MSS_0797-2 chidyate sadupāyena śrutvā tatra pravartyatām //

original: MSS_0800-1 athoccakairjaraṭhakapotakaṃdharā- tanūruhaprakaravipāṇḍuradyuti /
analyzed: atha uccakais jaraṭha kapota kaṃdharā tanūruha prakara vipāṇḍura dyuti

analyzed: balaiḥ calat caraṇa vidhūtam uccarat dhana āvalīḥ udacarata kṣamā rajaḥ

original: MSS_0801-1 athocyate śvānarutasya sāraṃ sāraṃ samasteṣvapi śākuneṣu /

original: MSS_0801-2 vispaṣṭaceṣṭaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ ca śubhāśubhaṃ prāktanakarmapākam //

original: MSS_0802-1 athottarasyāṃ diśi khañjarīṭam ālokya ko'pi smitamādadhānaḥ /

original: MSS_0803-1 athodyayau bālasuhṛt smarasya śayāmādhavaḥ śyāmalalakṣmabhaṅgyā /

original: MSS_0804-1 athopagūḍhe śaradā śaśāṅke prāvṛḍ yayau śāntataḍitkaṭākṣā /
analyzed: athā upagūḍhe śaradā śaśāṅke prāvṛṣ yayau śānta taḍit kaṭākṣā

original: MSS_0804-2 kāsāṃ na saubhāgyaguṇo'ṅganānāṃ naṣṭaḥ paribhraṣṭpayodharāṇām //

analyzed: dviṣat gaṇaḥ traiṇa dṛś ambu nirjhare yaśaḥ marāla āvaliḥ asya khelati

original: MSS_0806-1 adaṇḍanamadaṇḍyānāṃ daṇḍyānāṃ cāpi daṇḍanam /

original: MSS_0806-2 agrāhyāgrahaṇaṃ caiva grāhyāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ tathā //

original: MSS_0807-1 adaṇḍyān daṇḍayan rājā daṇḍyāṃścaivāpyadaṇḍayan /
analyzed: a daṇḍyān daṇḍayan rājā daṇḍyān ca eva api a daṇḍayan

analyzed: ayaśaḥ mahat āpnoti narakam ca eva gacchati

original: MSS_0810-1 adattabhuktamutsṛjya dhanaṃ sucirarakṣitam /
analyzed: adatta bhuktam utsṛjya dhanam su cira rakṣitam

analyzed: mūṣakāḥ iva gacchanti kadaryāḥ sva kṣaye kṣayam

original: MSS_0819-2 na te tava na teṣāṃ tvaṃ tatra kā paridevanā //
analyzed: na te tava na teṣām tvam tatra kā paridevanā

original: MSS_0821-1 adākṣiṇyādatīvogrāḥ pavanā iva durjanāḥ /

original: MSS_0822-1 adātā puruṣastyāgī dātā tyāgī ca nityaśaḥ /

original: MSS_0823-1 adātā puruṣas dhanaṃ saṃtyajya gacchati /

original: MSS_0826-1 adātṛmānasaṃ kvāpi na spṛśanti kavergiraḥ /

original: MSS_0827-1 adānamīṣad dānaṃ ca kiṃcit kopāya dardhiyām /

original: MSS_0828-1 adāntasyāvinītasya vṛthāpaṇḍitamāninaḥ /

original: MSS_0833-1 ratacūtaphalotpākarasaiḥ kāntaṃ na dhinvatī /
MSS_0833-2 bālā nidāghalakṣmīva tāpayatyeva kevalam //

analyzed: a dīrgha darśibhiḥ krūraiḥ mūḍhaiḥ indriya sāyakaiḥ

analyzed: hamadbhiḥ kriyate karma rudadbhiḥ anubhūyate

original: MSS_0835-1 adīrghasūtraḥ smṛtimān kutajño nītiśāstravit /

original: MSS_0835-2 dhīmānāyatidarśī ca mantrī rājñaḥ susaṃnidhiḥ //

original: MSS_0836-1 adurgaviṣayaḥ kasya nāreḥ paribhavāspadam /

original: MSS_0836-2 adurgo'nāśrayo rājā potacyutamanuṣyavat //

original: MSS_0837-1 adṛṣṭāpatitāṃ bhāryāṃ mūḍho yastu parityajet /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa apatitām bhāryām mūḍhaḥ yaḥ tu parityajet

original: MSS_0837-2 saptajanmani sa strītvaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: sapta janmani sa strī tvam labhate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_0838-1 aduṣṭāpatitāṃ bhāryāṃ yauvane yaḥ parityajet /
analyzed: aduṣṭa apatitām bhāryām yauvane yaḥ parityajet

original: MSS_0838-2 sa jīvanānte strītvaṃ ca vandhyatvaṃ ca samāpnuyāt //
analyzed: sa jīvana ante strī tvam ca vandhya tvam ca samāpnuyāt

original: MSS_0839-1 adūragamanaṃ tīrtham adehadamanaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: adūra gamanam tīrtham a deha damanam tapaḥ

original: MSS_0839-2 anambhaḥsaṃbhavaṃ snānaṃ mātuścaraṇapaṅkajam //
analyzed: an ambhaḥ saṃbhavam snānam mātuḥ caraṇa paṅkajam

original: MSS_0840-1 adṛṣyanti purastena khelāḥ khañjanapaṅktayaḥ /
analyzed: adṛṣyanti puras tena khelāḥ khañjana paṅktayaḥ

original: MSS_0840-2 asmayranta viniḥśvasya priyānayanavibhramāḥ //
analyzed: asmayranta viniḥśvasya priyā nayana vibhramāḥ

original: MSS_0841-1 adṛṣṭaguṇadoṣāṇām adhṛtānāṃ ca karmaṇām /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa guṇa doṣāṇām adhṛtānām ca karmaṇām

original: MSS_0841-2 nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalmiṣṭaṃ pravartate //
analyzed: na antareṇa kriyām teṣām phalm iṣṭam pravartate

original: MSS_0842-1 adṛṣṭapūrvaḥ kaṇṭho'yaṃ kāntāyā bhuvantraye /
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ yam kāntāyāḥ bhuvantraye

original: MSS_0842-2 yasmādviṇāninādasya samudbhūtirvibhāvyate //
analyzed: yasmāt viṇā ninādasya samudbhūtiḥ vibhāvyate

original: MSS_0843-1 adṛṣṭapūrvamasmābhir yadetaddṛśyate'dhunā /
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvam asmābhiḥ yat etat dṛśyate idhunā

original: MSS_0843-2 viṣaṃ viṣadharaiḥ pītaṃ mūrchitāḥ pathikāṅganāḥ //
analyzed: viṣam viṣadharaiḥ pītam mūrchitāḥ pathika aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_0844-1 adṛṣṭapūrvānādāya bhāvānapariśaṅkitān /
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvān ādāya bhāvān a pariśaṅkitān

original: MSS_0844-2 iṣṭāniṣṭān manuṣyāṇām astaṃ gacchanti rātrayaḥ //
analyzed: iṣṭa aniṣṭān manuṣyāṇām astam gacchanti rātrayaḥ

original: MSS_0845-1 adṛṣṭapūrvā bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve padasthasya bhavanti vaśyāḥ /
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvāḥ bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve pada sthasya bhavanti vaśyāḥ

original: MSS_0845-2 arthādvihīnasya padacyutasya bhavanti kāle svajano'pi śatruḥ //
analyzed: arthāt vihīnasya pada cyutasya bhavanti kāle sva janaḥ api śatruḥ

original: MSS_0846-1 adṛṣṭamukhabhaṅgasya yuktamandhasya yācitum /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa mukha bhaṅgasya yuktam andhasya yācitum

original: MSS_0846-2 aho bata mahat kaṣṭaṃ cakṣuṣmānapi yācate //
analyzed: aho bata mahat kaṣṭam cakṣuṣmān api yācate

original: MSS_0847-1 adṛṣṭavyāpāraṃ gatavati dinānāmadhipatau yaśaḥ śeṣībhūte śaśini gatadhāmni grahagaṇe /
