analyzed: adṛṣṭa vyāpāram gatavati dinānām adhipatau yaśaḥ śeṣībhūte śaśini gata dhāmni graha gaṇe

original: MSS_0847-2 tathāndhaṃ saṃjātaṃ jagadupanate meghasamaye yathāmī gaṇyante tamasi paṭavaḥ kīṭamaṇayaḥ //
analyzed: tathā andham saṃjātam jagat upanate megha samaye yathā amī gaṇyante tamasi paṭavaḥ kīṭa maṇayaḥ

original: MSS_0848-1 adṛṣṭe darśanotkaṇṭhā dṛṣṭe vicchedabhīrutā /
analyzed: adṛṣṭe darśana utkaṇṭhā dṛṣṭe viccheda bhīru tā

original: MSS_0848-2 tadṛṣṭena na dṛṣṭena bhatratā labhyate mukham //
analyzed: tad dṛṣṭena na dṛṣṭena bhatratā labhyate mukham

original: MSS_0849-1 adeśakālārthamanāyatikṣamaṃ yadapriyaṃ lāghavakāri cātmanaḥ /
analyzed: a deśa kāla artham anāyati kṣamam yat apriyam lāghava kāri ca ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_0849-2 vicintya buddhyā muhurapyavaimyahaṃ na tadvaco hālahalaṃ hi tadviṣam //
analyzed: vicintya buddhyā muhur api avaimi aham na tat vacaḥ hālahalam hi tat viṣam

original: MSS_0850-1 adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaśca dīyate /
analyzed: a deśa kāle yat dānam apātrebhyaḥ ca dīyate

original: MSS_0850-2 asatkṛtamavajñātaṃ tattāmasamudāhṛdam //
analyzed: asatkṛtam avajñātam tat tāmasam udāhṛdam

original: MSS_0851-1 adeśastho hi ripuṇā svalpakenāpi hanyate /
analyzed: adeśa sthaḥ hi ripuṇā su alpakena api hanyate

original: MSS_0851-2 grāho'lpīyānapi jale jalendramapāi karṣati //
analyzed: grāha ulpīyān api jale jalendram apāi karṣati

original: MSS_0852-1 adaivaṃ daivataṃ kuryur daivataṃ cāpyadaivatam /
analyzed: a daivam daivatam kuryuḥ daivatam ca api a daivatam

original: MSS_0852-2 lokapālān sṛjeyuśca lokānanyāṃstathā dvijaḥ //
analyzed: lokapālān sṛjeyuḥ ca lokān anyān tathā dvijaḥ

original: MSS_0853-1 adoṣāddoṣādvā tyajti vipine tāṃ yadi bhavān abhradraṃ bhadraṃ vā tribhuvanapate tvāṃ vadatu kaḥ /
analyzed: adoṣāt doṣāt vā tyajti vipine tām yadi bhavān abhradram bhadram vā tribhuvana pate tvām vadatu kaḥ

original: MSS_0853-2 idaṃ krūraṃ me smarati hṛdayaṃ yat kila tayā tvadartha kāntāre kulatilaka nātmāpi gaṇitaḥ //
analyzed: idam krūram me smarati hṛdayam yat kila tayā tvad artha kāntāre kula tilaka na ātmā api gaṇitaḥ

original: MSS_0854-1 adbhiḥ śudhyanti vastrāṇi manaḥ satyena śudhyati /
analyzed: adbhiḥ śudhyanti vastrāṇi manaḥ satyena śudhyati

original: MSS_0854-2 ahiṃsayā ca bhūtātmā buddhirjñānena śudhyati //
analyzed: ahiṃsayā ca bhūtātmā buddhiḥ jñānena śudhyati

original: MSS_0855-1 adbhirgātrāṇi śudhyanti manaḥ satyena śudhyati /
analyzed: adbhiḥ gātrāṇi śudhyanti manaḥ satyena śudhyati

original: MSS_0855-2 vidyātapobhyāṃ bhūtātmā buddhirjñānena śudhyati //
analyzed: vidyā tapobhyām bhūta ātmā buddhiḥ jñānena śudhyati

original: MSS_0856-1 adbhutastakrpāthodhir agādhī yasya vardhakaḥ /
analyzed: adbhutaḥ takrpa athodhiḥ agādhī yasya vardhakaḥ

original: MSS_0856-2 akṣapādo'tamaḥspṛṣṭas tvakalaṅkaḥ kalānidhiḥ //
MSS_0857-1 adbhyo 'gnirbrahmataḥkṣatram aśmano lohamutthitam /
analyzed: adbhyaḥ gniḥ brahmataḥ kṣatram aśmanaḥ loham utthitam

original: MSS_0857-2 teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu sāmyati //
analyzed: teṣām sarvatragam tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu sāmyati

original: MSS_0858-1 adyatano yoddhavye śakuno vihayāya yākrikavirudvaḥ /
analyzed: adyatanaḥ yoddhavye śakunaḥ vihayāya yākrika virudvaḥ

original: MSS_0858-2 divasāntarite yuddhe kṣemaḥ prāsthānikaḥ śakunaḥ //
analyzed: divasa antarite yuddhe kṣemaḥ prāsthānikaḥ śakunaḥ

original: MSS_0859-1 adya dhārā sadādhārā sadālambā sarasvatī /
analyzed: adya dhārā sat ādhārā sat ālambā sarasvatī

original: MSS_0859-2 paṇḍitā maṇḍitāḥ sarve bhojarāje bhuvaṃ gate //
analyzed: paṇḍitāḥ maṇḍitāḥ sarve bhojarāje bhuvam gate

original: MSS_0860-1 adya prabhṛtyavanatāṅgi tavāsmi dāsaḥ krītastapobhiriti vādini candramaulau /
analyzed: adya prabhṛti avanata aṅgi tava asmi dāsaḥ krītaḥ tapobhiḥ iti vādini candramaulau

original: MSS_0860-2 ahnāya sā niyamajaṃ klamamutsasarja kleśaḥ phalena hi punarnavatāṃ vidhatte //
analyzed: sā niyama jam klamam utsasarja kleśaḥ phalena hi punarnava tām vidhatte

original: MSS_0861-1 adya bhomidinaṃ satyaṃ satyamaprastutaṃ tava /
analyzed: adya bhomi dinam satyam satyam aprastutam tava

original: MSS_0861-2 tathāpi dūti gantavyaṃ nārtaḥ kālamapekṣate //
analyzed: tathā api dūti gantavyam na ārtaḥ kālam apekṣate

original: MSS_0862-1 adya me saphalamāyatanetre jīvitaṃ madanasaṃśrayabhāvam /
analyzed: adya me saphalam āyata netre jīvitam madana saṃśraya bhāvam

original: MSS_0862-2 āgatāsi bhavanaṃ mama yasmāt svāgataṃ tava varoru niṣīda //
analyzed: āgatā asi bhavanam mama yasmāt svāgatam tava vara ūru niṣīda

original: MSS_0863-1 adya yāvadapi yena nibaddhau na prabhū vicalituṃ balivindhyau /
analyzed: adya yāvat api yena nibaddhau na prabhū vicalitum bali vindhyau

original: MSS_0863-2 āsthitāvitathatāguṇapāśas tvādṛśā sa viduṣā durapāsaḥ //
analyzed: āsthita a vitatha tā guṇa pāśaḥ tvādṛśā sa viduṣā durapāsaḥ

original: MSS_0864-1 adya śītaṃ varivarti sarīsarti samīraṇaḥ /
analyzed: adya śītam varivarti sarīsarti samīraṇaḥ

original: MSS_0864-2 apatnīko marīmarti narīnarti kucoṣṇavān //
analyzed: apatnīkaḥ marīmarti narīnarti kuca uṣṇavān

original: MSS_0865-1 adya sa pravasatīti subhruvaḥ śrotrasīmani vijṛmbhite dhvanau /
analyzed: adya sa pravasati iti subhruvaḥ śrotra sīmani vijṛmbhite dhvanau

original: MSS_0865-2 sadya eva nijapāṇigumphite puṣpadāmani mahoragabhramaḥ //
analyzed: sadyas eva nija pāṇi gumphite puṣpa dāmani mahā uraga bhramaḥ

original: MSS_0866-1 adya sundari kalindanandinī- tīrakuñjabhuvi kelilampaṭaḥ /
analyzed: adya sundari kalindanandinī tīra kuñja bhuvi keli lampaṭaḥ

original: MSS_0866-2 vādayan muralikāṃ muhurmuhur mādhavo harati māmakaṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: vādayan muralikām muhur muhur mādhavaḥ harati māmakam manaḥ

original: MSS_0867-1 adya svargavadhūgaṇe guṇamaya tvatkīrtimindūjjavalām uccairgāyati niṣkalaṅkimadaśāmādāsyate candramāḥ /
analyzed: adya svarga vadhū gaṇe guṇa maya tvad kīrtim indu ujjavalām uccais gāyati niṣkalaṅkima daśām ādāsyate candramāḥ

original: MSS_0867-2 gītākarṇanamodamuktayavasagrāsābhilāṣo vada svāminnaṅkamṛgaḥ kiyanti hi dinānyetasya vartiṣyate //
analyzed: gīta ākarṇana moda mukta yavasa grāsa abhilāṣaḥ vada svāmin aṅka mṛgaḥ kiyanti hi dināni etasya vartiṣyate

original: MSS_0868-1 adya svāṃ jananīmakāraṇaruṣā prātaḥ sudūraṃ gatāṃ pratyānetumito gato gṛhapatiḥ kṣutvaiva madhyaṃdine /
analyzed: adya svām jananīm akāraṇa ruṣā prātar su dūram gatām pratyānetum itas gataḥ gṛhapatiḥ kṣutvā eva madhyaṃdine

original: MSS_0868-2 paṅgutvena śarīrajarjaratayā prāyaḥ sa lakṣyākṛtir dṛṣṭo'sau bhavatā na kiṃ pathika he sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ kathyatām //
analyzed: paṅgu tvena śarīra jarjara tayā prāyas sa lakṣya ākṛtiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ asau bhavatā na kim pathika he sthitvā kṣaṇam kathyatām

original: MSS_0869-1 adyāpi kokanadacārusarekhahastāṃ tāṃ śātakumbhakalaśastanacārugātrīm /
analyzed: adyā api kokanada cāru sa rekha hastām tām śātakumbha kalaśa stana cāru gātrīm

original: MSS_0869-2 bimbādharīṃ viṣamabāṇanipīḍitāṅgīṃ saṃcintaye dvyaṇukamadhyatanuprakāśām //
analyzed: bimba adharīm viṣama bāṇa nipīḍita aṅgīm saṃcintaye dvyaṇuka madhya tanu prakāśām

original: MSS_0870-1 adyāpi kopavimukhīkṛtagantukāmā noktaṃ vacaḥ pratidadāti yadaiva vaktram /
analyzed: adyā api kopa vimukhīkṛta gantu kāmā na uktam vacaḥ pratidadāti yadā eva vaktram

original: MSS_0870-2 cumbāmi rodati bhṛśaṃ patito'smi pāde dāsastava priyatame bhaja māṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: cumbāmi rodati bhṛśam patitaḥ asmi pāde dāsaḥ tava priyatame bhaja mām smarāmi

original: MSS_0871-1 adyāpi cāṭuśatadurlalitocitārthaṃ tasyāḥ smarāmi surataklamavihvalāyāḥ /
analyzed: adyā api cāṭu śata durlalita ucita artham tasyāḥ smarāmi surata klama vihvalāyāḥ

original: MSS_0871-2 avyaktaniḥsvanitakātarakthyamāna- saṃkīrṇavarṇarucitaṃ vacanaṃ priyāyāḥ //
analyzed: avyakta niḥsvanita kāta rakthyamāna saṃkīrṇa varṇa rucitam vacanam priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_0872-1 adyāpi tatkanakakuṇḍalaghṛṣṭagaṇḍam āsyaṃ smarāmi viparītaratābhiyoge /
analyzed: adyā api tad kanaka kuṇḍala ghṛṣṭa gaṇḍam āsyam smarāmi viparīta rata abhiyoge

original: MSS_0872-2 āndolanaśramajalasphuṭasāndrabindu- muktāphalaprakaravicchuritaṃ priyāyāḥ //
analyzed: āndolana śramajala sphuṭa sāndra bindu muktāphala prakara vicchuritam priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_0873-1 adyāpi tatkanakagaurakṛtāṅgarāgaṃ prasvedabinduvitataṃ vadnaṃ priyāyāḥ /
analyzed: adyā api tad kanakagaura kṛta aṅgarāgam prasveda bindu vitatam vadnam priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_0873-2 ante smarāmi ratikhedavilolanetraṃ rāhūparāgaparimuktamivendubimbam //
analyzed: ante smarāmi rati kheda vilola netram rāhu uparāga parimuktam iva indu bimbam

original: MSS_0874-1 adyāpi tatkanakareṇughanorudeśe nyastaṃ smarāmi nakharakṣatalakṣma tasyāḥ /
analyzed: adyā api tat kanaka reṇu ghana ūru deśe nyastam smarāmi nakhara kṣata lakṣma tasyāḥ

original: MSS_0874-2 ākṛṣṭahemarucirāmbarmutthitāyā lajjāvaśāt karadhṛtaṃ ca tato vrajantyāḥ //
analyzed: ākṛṣṭa hema rucira ambarmutthitāyāḥ lajjā vaśāt kara dhṛtam ca tatas vrajantyāḥ

original: MSS_0875-1 adyāpi tatkamalareṇusugandhagandhi tatpremavāri makaradhvajapātakāri /
analyzed: adyā api tad kamala reṇu sugandha gandhi tat prema vāri makaradhvaja pāta kāri

original: MSS_0875-2 prāpnomyahaṃ yadi punaḥ surataikatīrthaṃ prāṇāṃstyajāmi niyataṃ tadavāptihetoḥ //
analyzed: prāpnomi aham yadi punar surata eka tīrtham prāṇān tyajāmi niyatam tad avāpti hetoḥ

original: MSS_0876-1 adyāpi tatkṛtakacagrahamāgraheṇa dantairmayā daśanavāsasi khaṇḍyamāne /
analyzed: adyā api tad kṛta kaca graham āgraheṇa dantaiḥ mayā daśana vāsasi khaṇḍyamāne

original: MSS_0876-2 tasyā manāṅmukulitākṣamalakṣyamāṇa- sītkāragarbhamasakṛdvadanaṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: tasyāḥ manāk mukulita akṣam alakṣyamāṇa sītkāra garbham asakṛt vadanam smarāmi

original: MSS_0877-1 adyāpi tattaralatārakitākṣamāsyam ālipracandanarasāhitaśobhamasyāḥ /
analyzed: adyā api tad tarala tārakita akṣam āsyam āli pracandana rasa āhita śobham asyāḥ

original: MSS_0877-2 kastūrikātilakatārakitābhirāma- gaṇḍasthaladyuti muhurmanasā smarāmi //
analyzed: kastūrikā tilaka tārakita abhirāma gaṇḍa sthala dyuti muhur manasā smarāmi

original: MSS_0878-1 adyāpi tatpraṇayabhaṅguradṛṣṭipātaṃ tasyāḥ smarāmi rativibhramagātrabhaṅgam /
analyzed: adyā api tad praṇaya bhaṅgura dṛṣṭipātam tasyāḥ smarāmi rati vibhrama gātra bhaṅgam

original: MSS_0878-2 vastrāñcalaskhalanacārupayodharāntaṃ dantacchadaṃ daśanakhaṇḍanamaṇḍanaṃ ca //
analyzed: vastra añcala skhalana cāru payodhara antam dantacchadam daśana khaṇḍana maṇḍanam ca

original: MSS_0879-1 adyāpi tatsapariveṣaśaśiprakāśam āsyaṃ smarāmi jaḍgātravivartaneṣu /
analyzed: adyā api tad sa pariveṣa śaśi prakāśam āsyam smarāmi jaḍgātra vivartaneṣu

original: MSS_0879-2 tadveladujjvalakarāṅgulijālagumpha- doḥ kandalīyugalakaṃ dayitaṃ priyāyāḥ //
analyzed: tad velat ujjvala kara aṅguli jāla gumpha dos kandalī yugalakam dayitam priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_0880-1 adyāpi tatsuratakelinirastrayuddhaṃ bandhopabandhapatanotthitaśūnyahastam /
analyzed: adyā api tad surata keli nirastra yuddham bandha upabandha patana utthita śūnya hastam

original: MSS_0879-2 dantauṣṭhapīḍananakhakṣataraktasiktaṃ tasyāḥ smarāmi ratibandhuraniṣṭhuratvam //
analyzed: danta oṣṭha pīḍana nakha kṣata rakta siktam tasyāḥ smarāmi rati bandhura niṣṭhura tvam

original: MSS_0881-1 adyāpi tatsuratakelivimardakheda- saṃjātagharmakaṇavisphuritaṃ priyāyāḥ /
analyzed: adyā api tad surata keli vimarda kheda saṃjāta gharma kaṇa visphuritam priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_0881-2 āpāṇḍuraṃ taralatāranimīlitākṣaṃ vaktraṃ smarāmi paripūrṇaniśākarābham //
analyzed: āpāṇḍuram tarala tāra nimīlita akṣam vaktram smarāmi paripūrṇa niśākara ābham

original: MSS_0882-1 adyāpi tadvadanapaṅkajagandhalubdha- bhrāmyaddvirephacayacumbitagaṇḍayugmam /
analyzed: adyā api tad vadana paṅkaja gandha lubdha bhrāmyat dvirepha caya cumbita gaṇḍa yugmam

original: MSS_0882-2 līlāvadhūtakarapallavakaṅkanānāṃ kvāṇo vimūrcchati manaḥ stutarāṃ madīyam //
analyzed: līlā avadhūta karapallava kaṅkanānām kvāṇaḥ vimūrcchati manaḥ stutarām madīyam

original: MSS_0883-1 adyāpi tadvikasitāmbujamadhyagauraṃ gorocanātilakabhāsuraphālarekham /
analyzed: adyā api tad vikasita ambuja madhya gauram gorocanā tilaka bhāsura phāla rekham

original: MSS_0883-2 īṣanmadālasavighūrṇitadṛṣṭipātaṃ tasyā mukhaṃ prati mano mama gacchatīdam //
analyzed: īṣat mada alasa vighūrṇita dṛṣṭi pātam tasyāḥ mukham prati manaḥ mama gacchati idam

original: MSS_0884-1 adyāpi tannayanakajjalamujjvalāsyaṃ viśrāntakarṇayugalaṃ parihāsahetoḥ /
analyzed: adyā api tad nayana kajjalam ujjvala āsyam viśrānta karṇa yugalam parihāsa hetoḥ

original: MSS_0884-2 paśye tavātmani navīnapayodharābhyāṃ kṣīṇaṃ vapuryadi vinaśyati no na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: paśye tava ātmani navīna payodharābhyām kṣīṇam vapuḥ yadi vinaśyati naḥ na doṣaḥ

original: MSS_0885-1 adyāpi tanmadanakārmukabhaṅgurabhru- dantadyutiprakarakarburitādharoṣṭham /
analyzed: adyā api tat madana kārmuka bhaṅgura bhru danta dyuti prakara karburita adhara uṣṭham

original: MSS_0885-2 karṇāvasaktapulakojjvaladantapatraṃ tasyāḥ punaḥ punarapīha mukhaṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: karṇa avasakta pulaka ujjvala danta patram tasyāḥ punar punar api iha mukham smarāmi

original: MSS_0886-1 adyāpi tanmanasi saṃparivartate me rātrau mayi kṣutavati kṣitipālaputryā /
analyzed: adyā api tat manasi saṃparivartate me rātrau mayi kṣutavati kṣitipāla putryā

original: MSS_0886-2 jīveti maṅgalavacaḥ parihṛtya kopāt karṇe kṛtaṃ kanakapatramanālapantyā //
analyzed: jīva iti maṅgala vacaḥ parihṛtya kopāt karṇe kṛtam kanaka patram an ālapantyā

original: MSS_0887-1 adyāpi tāṃ kanakakaṅkaṇabhūṣitāgra- hastāṃ ca vaktrakamalena sunirjitendum /
analyzed: adyā api tām kanaka kaṅkaṇa bhūṣita agra hastām ca vaktra kamalena su nirjita indum

original: MSS_0887-2 līlāvartīṃ suratakhedanimīlitākṣīṃ dhyāyāmi cetasi madākulalālasāṅgīm //
analyzed: līlā vartīm surata kheda nimīlita akṣīm dhyāyāmi cetasi mada ākula lālasa aṅgīm

original: MSS_0888-1 adyāpi tāṃ kanakakāntimadālasāṅgīṃ vrīḍotsukāṃ nipatitāmiva ceṣṭamānām /
analyzed: adyā api tām kanaka kānti mada alasa aṅgīm vrīḍā utsukām nipatitām iva ceṣṭamānām

original: MSS_0888-2 aṅgāṅgasaṅgaparicumbanajātamohāṃ tāṃ jīvanauṣadhimiva pramadhāṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: aṅga aṅga saṅga paricumbana jāta mohām tām jīvana oṣadhim iva pramadhām smarāmi

original: MSS_0889-1 adyāpi tāṃ kanakacampakadāmagaurīṃ phullāravindavadanāṃ tanuromarājīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām kanaka campaka dāma gaurīm phulla aravinda vadanām tanu romarājīm

original: MSS_0889-2 suptotthitāṃ madanavihvalasālasāṅgīṃ vidyāṃ pramādagalitāmiva cintayāmi //
analyzed: supta utthitām madana vihvala sa alasa aṅgīm vidyām pramāda galitām iva cintayāmi

original: MSS_0890-1 adyāpi tāṃ kanakapatrasanāthakarṇām uttuṅgakarkaśakucārpitatārahārām /
analyzed: adyā api tām kanaka patra sanātha karṇām uttuṅga karkaśa kuca arpita tāra hārām

original: MSS_0890-2 kāñcīnipuñjitaviśālanitambabimbām uddānanūpuraraṇaccaraṇāṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: kāñcī nipuñjita viśāla nitamba bimbām uddāna nūpura raṇat caraṇām smarāmi

original: MSS_0891-1 adyāpi tāṃ kaṭisamārpitavāmapāṇim ākuñcitaikacaraṇāgraniruddhabhūmim /
analyzed: adyā api tām kaṭi samārpita vāma pāṇim ākuñcita eka caraṇa agra niruddha bhūmim

original: MSS_0891-2 stambhāvalambitabhujāṃ pathi māṃ vrajantaṃ paśyāmi bandhuritakaṃdharamīkṣamāṇām //
analyzed: stambha avalambita bhujām pathi mām vrajantam paśyāmi bandhurita kaṃdharam īkṣamāṇām

original: MSS_0892-1 adyāpi tāṃ kuṭilakuntalakeśapāśām untidratāmarasapatraviśālanetrām /
analyzed: adyā api tām kuṭila kuntala keśapāśām untidra tāmarasa patra viśāla netrām

original: MSS_0892-2 uttuṅgapīvarapayodharakuṅmalāḍhyāṃ dhyāyāmi cetasi yathaiva gurūpadeśam //
analyzed: uttuṅga pīvara payodhara kuṅmala āḍhyām dhyāyāmi cetasi yathā eva guru upadeśam

original: MSS_0893-1 adyāpi tāṃ kṣaṇaviyogaviṣopame yāṃ saṅge punarbahutarāmamṛtābhiṣekām /
analyzed: adyā api tām kṣaṇa viyoga viṣa upame yām saṅge punar bahutarām amṛta abhiṣekām

original: MSS_0893-2 tāṃ jīvadhāraṇakarīṃ madanātapatrām uddhṛttakeśanivahāṃ sudatīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: tām jīva dhāraṇa karīm madana ātapatrām uddhṛtta keśa nivahām sudatīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0894-1 adyāpi tāṃ kṣititale varakāminīnāṃ sarvāṅgasundaratayā prathamaikarekhām /
analyzed: adyā api tām kṣiti tale vara kāminīnām sarva aṅga sundara tayā prathama eka rekhām

original: MSS_0894-2 śṛṅgāranāṭakarasottamapānapātrīṃ kāntāṃ smarāmi kusumāyudhabāṇakhinnām //
analyzed: śṛṅgāra nāṭaka rasa uttama pāna pātrīm kāntām smarāmi kusumāyudha bāṇa khinnām

original: MSS_0895-1 adyāpi tāṃ gatinirākṛtarājahaṃsīṃ dhammillanirjitakalāpamayūkhabhāsām /
analyzed: adyā api tām gati nirākṛta rājahaṃsīm dhammilla nirjita kalāpa mayūkha bhāsām

original: MSS_0895-2 mattaśriyā madacakoravilolanetrāṃ saṃcintayāmi kalakaṇṭjasamānakaṇṭhām //
analyzed: matta śriyā mada cakora vilola netrām saṃcintayāmi kalakaṇṭja samāna kaṇṭhām

original: MSS_0896-1 adyāpi tāṃ gamanamityuditaṃ madīyaṃ śrutvaiva bhīruhariṇīmiva cañcalākṣīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām gamanam iti uditam madīyam śrutvā eva bhīru hariṇīm iva cañcala akṣīm

original: MSS_0896-2 vācaḥ skhaladvigaladaśruhalākulākṣīṃ saṃcintayāmi guruśokavinamravaktrām //
analyzed: vācaḥ skhalat vigalat aśru hala ākula akṣīm saṃcintayāmi guru śoka vinamra vaktrām

original: MSS_0897-1 adyāpi tāṃ galitabandhanakeśapāśāṃ srastasrajaṃ smitasudhāmadhurādharauṣṭhīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām galita bandhana keśapāśām srasta srajam smita sudhā madhura adhara oṣṭhīm

original: MSS_0897-2 pīnonnatastanayugoparicārucumban- muktāvalīṃ rahasi loladṛśaṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: pīna unnata stana yuga upari cāru cumban muktā āvalīm rahasi lola dṛśam smarāmi

original: MSS_0898-1 adyāpi tāṃ cirayite mayi tannivāsaṃ rātrau samāgatavatīṃ parivartamānām /
analyzed: adyā api tām cirayite mayi tad nivāsam rātrau samāgatavatīm parivartamānām

original: MSS_0898-2 gatvā smitaṃ kimapi caṇcalitāṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ sakhyā samāgatavatīmadhikaṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: gatvā smitam kim api caṇcalitām niṣaṇṇām sakhyā samāgatavatīm adhikam smarāmi

original: MSS_0899-1 adyāpi tāṃ jagati varṇayituṃ na kaścic chaknotyadṛṣṭasadṛśīṃ ca parigrahaṃ me /
analyzed: adyā api tām jagati varṇayitum na kaścid śaknoti adṛṣṭa sadṛśīm ca parigraham me

original: MSS_0899-2 dṛṣṭaṃ dvayoḥ sadṛśayoḥ khalu yena rūpaṃ śakto bhavedyadi sa eva naro na cānyaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam dvayoḥ sadṛśayoḥ khalu yena rūpam śaktaḥ bhavet yadi saḥ eva naraḥ na ca anyaḥ

original: MSS_0900-1 adyāpi tāṃ jaghanadarśanalālasena kṛṣṭaṃ mayā nivasanāṃcalamekapārśvāt /
analyzed: adyā api tām jaghana darśana lālasena kṛṣṭam mayā nivasana aṃcalam eka pārśvāt

original: MSS_0900-2 pūjya sthitāmapi tato muhurākṛṣantīṃ mandākṣasaṃkucitanūtnamukhīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: pūjya sthitām api tatas muhur ākṛṣantīm manda akṣa saṃkucita nūtna mukhīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0901-1 adyāpi tāṃ jhaṭiti vakritakandharāgrāṃ nikṣiptapāṇikamalāṃ ca nitambamimbe /
analyzed: adyā api tām jhaṭiti vakrita kandhara agrām nikṣipta pāṇi kamalām ca nitamba mimbe

original: MSS_0901-2 vāsāṃsapārśvalasadulbaṇakeśapāśāṃ paśyāmi māṃ prati dṛśaṃ bahuśaḥ kṣipantīm //
analyzed: vāsa aṃsa pārśva lasat ulbaṇa keśapāśām paśyāmi mām prati dṛśam bahuśas kṣipantīm

original: MSS_0902-1 adyāpi tāṃ dhavalaveśmani ratnadīpa- mālāmayūkhapaṭalairdalitāndhakāre /
analyzed: adyā api tām dhavala veśmani ratna dīpa mālā mayūkha paṭalaiḥ dalita andhakāre

original: MSS_0902-2 prāptodyame rahasi saṃmukhadarśanārthaṃ lajjābhayārtanayanāmanucintayāmi //
analyzed: prāpta udyame rahasi saṃmukha darśana artham lajjā bhaya ārta nayanām anucintayāmi

original: MSS_0903-1 adyāpi tāṃ nakhapadaṃ stanamaṇḍale yad dattaṃ mayāsyamadhupānavimohitena /
analyzed: adyā api tām nakha padam stana maṇḍale yat dattam mayā āsya madhu pāna vimohitena

original: MSS_0903-2 udbhinnaromapulakairbahubhiḥ samantāj jāgarti rakṣati vilokayati smarāmi //
analyzed: udbhinna roma pulakaiḥ bahubhiḥ samantāt jāgarti rakṣati vilokayati smarāmi

original: MSS_0904-1 adyāpi tāṃ na khalu vedmi kimīśapatnī śāpaṃ gatā surapateratha kṛṣṇalakṣmīḥ /
analyzed: adyā api tām na khalu vedmi kim īśa patnī śāpam gatā surapateḥ atha kṛṣṇa lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_0904-2 dhatraiva kiṃ nu jagataḥ parimohanāya sā nirmitā yuvatiratnadidṛkṣayā vā //
analyzed: dhatrā eva kim nu jagataḥ parimohanāya sā nirmitā yuvati ratna didṛkṣayā vā

original: MSS_0905-1 adyāpi tāṃ navavayaḥśriyaminduvaktrāṃ uttuṅgapīvarapayodharabhārakhinnām /
analyzed: adyā api tām nava vayaḥ śriyam indu vaktrām uttuṅga pīvara payodhara bhāra khinnām

original: MSS_0905-2 saṃpīḍya bāhuyugalena pibāmi vaktrāṃ pronmattavanmadhukaraḥ kamalaṃ yatheṣṭam //
analyzed: saṃpīḍya bāhu yugalena pibāmi pronmatta vat madhukaraḥ kamalam yathā iṣṭam

original: MSS_0906-1 adyāpi tāṃ nijavapuḥkṛśavedimadhyām uttuṅgasaṃbhṛtasudhāstanakumbhayugmām /
analyzed: adyā api tām nija vapuḥ kṛśa vedi madhyām uttuṅga saṃbhṛta sudhā stana kumbha yugmām

original: MSS_0906-2 nānāvicitrakṛtamaṇḍanamṇḍitāṅgīṃ suptotthitāṃ niśi divā na hi vismarāmi //
analyzed: nānā vicitra kṛta maṇḍana mṇḍita aṅgīm supta utthitām niśi divā na hi vismarāmi

original: MSS_0907-1 adyāpi tāṃ nidhuvanaklamaniḥsahāṅgīm āpāṇḍugaṇḍapatitālakakuntalālīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām nidhuvana klama niḥsaha aṅgīm āpāṇḍu gaṇḍapati tālaka kuntala ālīm

original: MSS_0907-2 pracchannapāpakṛtamantarivāvahantīṃ kaṇṭhāvasaktamṛdubāhulatāṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: pracchanna pāpa kṛtam antar iva āvahantīm kaṇṭha avasakta mṛdu bāhu latām smarāmi

original: MSS_0908-1 adyāpi tāṃ nidhuvane madhupānaraktāṃ līlādharāṃ kṛśatanuṃ capalāyatākṣīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām nidhuvane madhu pāna raktām līlā dharām kṛśa tanum capala āyata akṣīm

original: MSS_0908-2 kāśmīrapaṅkamṛganābhikṛtāṅgarāgāṃ karpūrapūgaparipūrṇamukhīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: kāśmīra paṅka mṛganābhi kṛta aṅgarāgām karpūra pūga paripūrṇa mukhīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0909-1 adyāpi tāṃ nibhṛtavaktrakamāpatantaṃ māṃ dvāri vīkṣya sahasaiva miṣeṇa suptām /
analyzed: adyā api tām nibhṛta vaktrakam āpatantam mām dvāri vīkṣya sahasā eva miṣeṇa suptām

original: MSS_0909-2 mandaṃ mayi spṛśati kaṇṭakitāṅgayaṣṭim utphullagallaphalakāṃ bahuśaḥ smarāmi //
analyzed: mandam mayi spṛśati kaṇṭakita aṅga yaṣṭim utphulla galla phalakām bahuśas smarāmi

original: MSS_0910-1 adyāpi tāṃ nṛpatiśekhararājaputrīṃ saṃpūrṇayauvanamadālasaghūrṇanetrīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām nṛpatiśekhara rāja putrīm saṃpūrṇa yauvana mada alasa ghūrṇa netrīm

original: MSS_0910-2 gandharvayakṣasurakinnarnāgakanyāṃ svargādaho nipatitāmiva cintayāmi //
analyzed: gandharva yakṣa sura kinnar nāga kanyām svargāt aho nipatitām iva cintayāmi

original: MSS_0911-1 adyāpi tāṃpraṇayinīṃ mṛgaśāvakākṣīṃ pīyūṣapūrṇakucakumbhayugaṃ vahantīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām praṇayinīm mṛga śāvaka akṣīm pīyūṣa pūrṇa kuca kumbha yugam vahantīm

original: MSS_0911-2 paśyāmyahaṃ yadi purnadivasāvasāne svargāpavarganararājasukhaṃ tyajāmi //
analyzed: paśyāmi aham yadi svarga apavarga nara rāja sukham tyajāmi

original: MSS_0912-1 adyāpi tāṃ prathamato varasundarīṇāṃ snehaikapātraghaṭitāmavanīśaputrīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām prathamatas vara sundarīṇām sneha eka pātra ghaṭitām avanīśa putrīm

original: MSS_0912-2 haṃho janā mama viyogahutāśano'yaṃ soḍhuṃ na śakyata iti praticintayāmi //
analyzed: haṃho janāḥ mama viyoga hutāśanaḥ yam soḍhum na śakyate iti praticintayāmi

original: MSS_0913-1 adyāpi tāṃ prathamameva gataṃ virāgaṃ nirbhartsya roṣaparuṣairvacanairmuhurmām /
analyzed: adyā api tām prathamam eva gatam virāgam nirbhartsya roṣa paruṣaiḥ vacanaiḥ muhur mām

original: MSS_0913-2 āndolanena ca nitambasahāyavṛttyā samcintayāmi ratye sudatīmabhīkṣṇam //
analyzed: āndolanena ca nitamba sahāya vṛttyā samcintayāmi ratye sudatīm abhīkṣṇam

original: MSS_0914-1 adyāpi tāṃ prathamasaṃgamajātalajjāṃ bālāṃ rasena patite mayi mandapīṭhe /
analyzed: adyā api tām prathama saṃgama jāta lajjām bālām rasena patite mayi manda pīṭhe

original: MSS_0914-2 phūrkārakampitaśikhātaralapradīpaṃ karṇotpalena vinivārayatīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: phūrkāra kampita śikhā tarala pradīpam karṇa utpalena vinivārayatīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0915-1 adyāpi tāṃ bhujalatārpitakaṇṭhapāśāṃ vakṣaḥsthalaṃ mama pidhāya payodharābhyām /
analyzed: adyā api tām bhuja latā arpita kaṇṭha pāśām vakṣaḥ sthalam mama pidhāya payodharābhyām

original: MSS_0915-2 īṣannimīlitasalīlavilocanāntāṃ paśyāmi mṛgdhavadanāṃ vadanaṃ pibantīm //
analyzed: īṣat nimīlita sa līla vilocana antām paśyāmi mṛgdha vadanām vadanam pibantīm

original: MSS_0916-1 adyāpi tāṃ madanamandiravaijayantīm antargṛhe vivasanāṃ dadhatīṃ niśānte /
analyzed: adyā api tām madana mandira vaijayantīm antargṛhe vivasanām dadhatīm niśā ante

original: MSS_0916-2 aṅgairanaṅgavisarairmama gāḍhmaṅgam āliṅgya keliśayane śayitāṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: aṅgaiḥ anaṅga visaraiḥ mama gāḍham aṅgam āliṅgya keli śayane śayitām smarāmi

original: MSS_0917-1 adyāpi tāṃ mama manaḥparitāpaśāntyai cakṣurviśuddhataṭinīmalasālasāṅgīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām mama manaḥ paritāpa śāntyai cakṣuḥ viśuddha taṭinīm alasa alasa aṅgīm

original: MSS_0917-2 śrīkhaṇḍakhaṇḍakhacitācitagātrayiṣṭaṃ tanvīṃ sadā hṛdayaharṣanidhiṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: śrīkhaṇḍa khaṇḍa khacita ācita gātrayiṣṭam tanvīm sadā hṛdaya harṣa nidhim smarāmi

original: MSS_0918-1 adyāpi tāṃ mayi kapāṭasamīpalīne manmārgadattadṛśamānanadattahastām madgotracihnitapadaṃ mṛdukākalībhiḥ kiṃcittaraṅgamanasaṃ manasā  #
analyzed: adya api tām mayi kapāṭa samīpa līne mad mārga datta dṛśam ānana datta hastām mad gotra cihnita padam mṛdu kākalībhiḥ kiṃcid taraṅga manasam manasā  /

original: smarāmi //
analyzed: smarāmi

original: MSS_0919-1 adyāpi tāṃ mayi kṛtāgasi dṛṣṭabhāvāṃ bhāṣāṃ lapatyapi muhurnigṛhītavācam /
analyzed: adyā api tām mayi kṛta āgasi dṛṣṭa bhāvām bhāṣām lapati api muhur nigṛhīta vācam

original: MSS_0919-2 rāmāṃ viruddhaghanamanyusabāṣpakaṇṭhāṃ niḥśvāsaśuṣyadadharāṃ rudatīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: rāmām viruddha ghana manyu sa bāṣpa kaṇṭhām niḥśvāsa śuṣyat adharām rudatīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0920-1 adyāpi tāṃ mayi gate cirakopayantīṃ yāntīṃ samāgatavatīṃ parivartamānām /
analyzed: adya api tām mayi gate cira kopayantīm yāntīm samāgatavatīm parivartamānām

original: MSS_0920-2 ūrdhvasthitāṃ kimapi mañcatalaṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ śayyāṃ samāśratavatīmadhikaṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: ūrdhva sthitām kim api mañca talam niṣaṇṇām śayyām samāśratavatīm adhikam smarāmi

original: MSS_0921-1 adyāpi tāṃ mayi dṛśaṃ tudatīṃ smarāmi smerāṃ smaradvarakarāṃ madhurāṃ sutārām /
analyzed: adyā api tām mayi dṛśam tudatīm smarāmi smerām smarat vara karām madhurām sutārām

original: MSS_0921-2 atyudbalāṃ suratalāṃ kuṭilāṃ suśīlāṃ niṣpandamandasamadapramadaprasādām //
analyzed: ati udbalām sura talām kuṭilām su śīlām niṣpanda manda sa mada pramada prasādām

original: MSS_0922-1 adyāpi tāṃ mayi nimīlitacārunetre ko'yaṃ vadetyabhihitāṃ vadatīṃ sakhībhiḥ /
analyzed: adya api tām mayi nimīlita cāru netre koyam vada iti abhihitām vadatīm sakhībhiḥ

original: MSS_0922-2 mātarna vidya iti sasmitamullasantīm utphullagaṇḍaphalakāṃ nitarāṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: mātar na vidye iti sa smitam ullasantīm utphulla gaṇḍa phalakām nitarām smarāmi

original: MSS_0923-1 adyāpi tāṃ masṛṇacandanapaṅkamiśra- kastūrikāparimalotthavisarpigandām /
analyzed: adyā api tām masṛṇa candana paṅka miśra kastūrikā parimala uttha visarpi gandām

original: MSS_0923-2 anyonyacañcupuṭacumbanalagnapakṣma - yugmābhirāmanayanāṃ śayane smarāmi //
analyzed: anyonya cañcu puṭa cumbana lagna pakṣma yugma abhirāma nayanām śayane smarāmi

original: MSS_0924-1 adyāpi tāṃ mukhagatairaruṇaiḥ karāgrair āpṛcchyamānamapi māṃ na vibhāṣayantīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām mukha gataiḥ aruṇaiḥ kara agraiḥ āpṛcchyamānam api mām na vibhāṣayantīm

original: MSS_0924-2 tadvāṣpapūritadṛśaṃ bahu niḥśvasantīṃ cintākulāṃ kimapi namramukhīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: tad vāṣpa pūrita dṛśam bahu niḥśvasantīm cintā ākulām kim api namra mukhīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0925-1 adyāpi tāṃ punaḥ kamalāyatākṣīṃ paśyāmi pīvarapayodharabhārakhinnām /
analyzed: adyā api tām punar kamala āyata akṣīm paśyāmi pīvara payodhara bhāra khinnām

original: MSS_0925-2 saṃpīḍya bāhuyugalena pibāmi vaktram unmattavanmadhukaraḥ kamalaṃ yatheṣṭam //
analyzed: saṃpīḍya bāhu yugalena pibāmi vaktram unmatta vat madhukaraḥ kamalam yathā iṣṭam

original: MSS_0926-1 adyāpi tāṃ yadi punaḥ śravaṇāyatākṣīṃ paśyāmi dīrghavirahajvaritāṅgayaṣṭim /
analyzed: adyā api tām yadi punar śravaṇa āyata akṣīm paśyāmi dīrgha viraha jvarita aṅga yaṣṭim

original: MSS_0926-2 aṅgairahaṃ samupagūhma tato'tigāḍhaṃ nonmīlayāmi nayane na ca tāṃ tyajāmi //
analyzed: aṅgaiḥ aham samupagūhma na unmīlayāmi nayane na ca tām tyajāmi

original: MSS_0927-1 adyāpi tāṃ rahasi darpaṇamīkṣamāṇām dṛṣṭvā sphuṭaṃ pratinidhiṃ mayi pṛṣṭhalīne /
analyzed: adyā api tām rahasi darpaṇam īkṣamāṇām dṛṣṭvā sphuṭam pratinidhim mayi pṛṣṭha līne

original: MSS_0927-2 paśyāmi vepathumatīṃ ca suvibhramāṃ ca lajjākulāṃ ca samudaṃ jitamanmathāṃ ca //
analyzed: paśyāmi vepathumatīm ca su vibhramām ca lajjā ākulām ca sa mudam jita manmathām ca

original: MSS_0928-1 adyāpi tāṃ vidhṛtakajjalalolanetrāṃ pṛthvīṃ prabhūtakusumākulakeśapāśām /
analyzed: adyā api tām vidhṛta kajjala lola netrām pṛthvīm prabhūta kusuma ākula keśapāśām

original: MSS_0928-2 sindūrasaṃlulitamauktikadantakāntim ābaddhahemakaṭakāṃ rahasi smarāmi //
analyzed: sindūra saṃlulita mauktika danta kāntim ābaddha hema kaṭakām rahasi smarāmi

original: MSS_0929-1 adyāpi tāṃ vidhṛtakakajjalalolanetrāṃ pṛthvīṃ prabhūtakusumākulakeśapāśām /
analyzed: adyā api tām vidhṛtaka kajjala lola netrām pṛthvīm prabhūta kusuma ākula keśapāśām

original: MSS_0929-2 sindūrasaṃlulitamauktikadantakāntim ābaddhahemakaṭakāṃ rahasi smarāmi //
analyzed: sindūra saṃlulita mauktika danta kāntim ābaddha hema kaṭakām rahasi smarāmi

original: MSS_0930-1 adyāpi tāṃ virahavahri nipoḍitāṅgīṃ tanvīṃ kuraṅganayanāṃ surataikapātrīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām viraha vahri nipoḍita aṅgīm tanvīm kuraṅga nayanām surata eka pātrīm

original: MSS_0930-2 nānāvicitrakutamaṇḍanamāvahantīṃ tāṃ rājahaṃsagamanāṃ sudatīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: nānā vicitra kuta maṇḍanam āvahantīm tām rājahaṃsa gamanām sudatīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0931-1 adyāpi tāṃ vihasītāṃ kācabhāranamrāṃ muktākalāpadhavalīkṛtakaṇṭhadeśām /
analyzed: adyā api tām vihasītām kāca bhāra namrām muktā kalāpa dhavalīkṛta kaṇṭha deśām

original: MSS_0931-2 tatkelimandaragirau kusumāyudhasya kāntāṃ smarāmi rucirojjvalapuṣpaketum //
analyzed: tad keli mandara girau kusumāyudhasya kāntām smarāmi rucira ujjvala puṣpaketum

original: MSS_0932-1 adyāpi tāṃ śaśimukhīṃ navayauvanāḍhyāṃ pīnastanīṃ punarahaṃ yadi gaurakāntim /
analyzed: adyā api tām śaśi mukhīm nava yauvana āḍhyām pīna stanīm punar aham yadi gaura kāntim

original: MSS_0932-2 paśyāmi manmathaśarānalapīḍitāṅgīṃ gātrāṇi saṃprati karomi suśītalāni //
analyzed: paśyāmi manmatha śara anala pīḍita aṅgīm gātrāṇi saṃprati karomi su śītalāni

original: MSS_0933-1 adyāpi tāṃ śikharacāruvalakṣadantair mukhyāni kundamukulāni jitāṃ ca sādhvīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām śikhara cāru valakṣa dantaiḥ mukhyāni kunda mukulāni jitām ca sādhvīm

original: MSS_0933-2 saṃcintayāmi satataṃ pravilolicittāṃ kāmeṣunīrajadṛśaṃ vanajāvataṃsām //
analyzed: saṃcintayāmi satatam praviloli cittām kāma iṣu nīraja dṛśam vanaja avataṃsām

original: MSS_0934-1 adyāpi tāṃ samapanītanitambavastrāṃ śyāmāṃ ca sādhvasarasākulavihvalāṅgīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām samapanīta nitamba vastrām śyāmām ca sādhvasa rasa ākula vihvala aṅgīm

original: MSS_0934-2 ekena pāṇikamalena pidhāya gṛhyam anyena nābhikuharaṃ dadhatīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: ekena pāṇi kamalena pidhāya gṛhyam anyena nābhi kuharam dadhatīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0935-1 adyāpi tāṃ salalitaślathakeśapāśām īṣatsamunmiṣitaghūrṇitavakranetrām /
analyzed: adyā api tām sa lalita ślatha keśapāśām īṣat samunmiṣita ghūrṇita vakra netrām

original: MSS_0935-2 suptotthitāṃ vidadhatīṃ muhuraṅgabhaṅga paśyāmi daṣṭamadharaṃ bahuśaḥ spṛśantīm //
analyzed: supta utthitām vidadhatīm muhur aṅga bhaṅga paśyāmi daṣṭam adharam bahuśas spṛśantīm

original: MSS_0936-1 adyāpi tāṃ sunipuṇaṃ yatatā mayāpi dṛṣṭaṃ na yatsadṛśato vadanaṃ kadācit /
analyzed: adyā api tām su nipuṇam yatatā mayā api dṛṣṭam na yat sadṛśataḥ vadanam kadācid

original: MSS_0936-2 saundaryanirjitarati dvijarājakānti kāntāmihātivimalatvamahāguṇena //
analyzed: saundarya nirjita rati dvijarāja kānti kāntām iha ati vimala tva mahā guṇena

original: MSS_0937-1 adyāpi tāṃ surataghūrṇanimīlitākṣīṃ srastāṅgayaṣṭagalitāṃśukakeśapāśām /
analyzed: adyā api tām surata ghūrṇa nimīlita akṣīm srasta aṅga yaṣṭa galita aṃśuka keśapāśām

original: MSS_0937-2 śṛṅgāravāriruhakānanarāhahaṃsīṃ janmāntare'pi nidhane'pyanucintayāmi //
analyzed: śṛṅgāra vāriruha kānana rāha haṃsīm janmāntare api nidhane api anucintayāmi

original: MSS_0938-1 adyāpi tāṃ suratajāgaraghūrṇamāna- tiryagvalattaralatārakdīrghanetrām /
analyzed: adyā api tām surata jāgara ghūrṇamāna tiryak valat tarala tārak dīrgha netrām

original: MSS_0938-2 śṛṅgārasārakamalākararājahaṃsīṃ vrīḍāvinamravadanāmuṣasi smarāmi //
analyzed: śṛṅgāra sāra kamala ākara rājahaṃsīm vrīḍā vinamra vadanām uṣasi smarāmi

original: MSS_0939-1 adyāpi tāṃ suratatāṇḍavasūtradhāraṃ durvāradarpajaghanaglapitāṅgayaṣṭim /
analyzed: adyā api tām surata tāṇḍava sūtradhāram durvāra darpa jaghana glapita aṅgayaṣṭim

original: MSS_0939-2 aṅgaṃ rasaiḥ samupaguhya kaṭiṃ dadhānāṃ kiṃcinnimīlanayanāṃ manasā smarāmi //
analyzed: aṅgam rasaiḥ samupaguhya kaṭim dadhānām kiṃcid nimīla nayanām manasā smarāmi

original: MSS_0940-1 adyāpi tāṃ suratatāṇḍavasūtradhārīṃ pūrṇendusundaramukhīṃ madavihvalāṅgīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām surata tāṇḍava sūtradhārīm pūrṇa indu sundara mukhīm mada vihvala aṅgīm

original: MSS_0940-2 tanvīṃ viśālajaghanastanabhāranamrāṃ vyālolakuntalakalāpavatīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: tanvīm viśāla jaghana stana bhāra namrām vyālola kuntala kalāpavatīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0941-1 adyāpi tāṃ suratalabdhayaśaḥpatākāṃ lambālakāṃ virahapāṇḍuragaṇḍabhittim /
analyzed: adyā api tām surata labdha yaśaḥ patākām lamba alakām viraha pāṇḍura gaṇḍa bhittim

original: MSS_0941-2 svapne'pi lolanayanāṃ kṣaṇadṛṣṭanaṣṭāṃ vidyāṃ pramādaguṇitāmiva saṃsmarāmi //
analyzed: svapne pi lola nayanām kṣaṇa dṛṣṭa naṣṭām vidyām pramāda guṇitām iva saṃsmarāmi

original: MSS_0942-1 adyāpi tāṃ surabhinirbharadantabhājaṃ dhāvantamāsyakamalaṃ calacañcarīkam /
analyzed: adyā api tām surabhi nirbhara danta bhājam dhāvantam āsya kamalam cala cañcarīkam

original: MSS_0942-2 kiṃciccalallalitakuñcitavāmanetrāṃ paśyāmi kelikamalena nivārayantīm //
analyzed: kiṃcid calat lalita kuñcita vāma netrām paśyāmi keli kamalena nivārayantīm

original: MSS_0943-1 adyāpi tāṃ suvadanāṃ valabhau niṣaṇṇāṃ tadgehasaṃnidhipade mayi dṛṣṭamātre /
analyzed: adyā api tām suvadanām valabhau niṣaṇṇām tad geha saṃnidhi pade mayi dṛṣṭa mātre

original: MSS_0943-2 vītottarāṃ priyasakhīṣu kutasmarāsu lajjāvilāsahasitāṃ hṛdi cintayāmi //
analyzed: vīta uttarām priya sakhīṣu kutasmarāsu lajjā vilāsa hasitām hṛdi cintayāmi

original: MSS_0944-1 adyāpi tāṃ suvadanāṃ stanabhāranabhrāṃ śyāmāṃ ca vāmanayanāṃ ramaṇīyagātrīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām su vadanām stana bhāra nabhrām śyāmām ca vāma nayanām ramaṇīya gātrīm

original: MSS_0944-2 nidrālasāmalakanirjitaṣaṭpadāliṃ saṃcintayāmi satataṃ smaravaijayantīm //
analyzed: nidrā alasa āmalaka nirjita ṣaṭpada ālim saṃcintayāmi satatam smara vaijayantīm

original: MSS_0945-1 adyāpi tāṃ suśayitāṃ kṣaṇaviprabuddhāṃ nidrālasāṃ hṛdi vahāmi kṛtāṅgabhaṅgām /
analyzed: adyā api tām su śayitām kṣaṇa viprabuddhām nidrā alasām hṛdi vahāmi kṛta aṅga bhaṅgām

original: MSS_0945-2 jṛmbhāvatīrṇamukhamārutagandhalabdha- mughabhramadbhramaravibhramalolanetrām //
analyzed: jṛmbhā avatīrṇa mukha māruta gandha labdha mugha bhramat bhramara vibhrama lola netrām

original: MSS_0946-1 adyāpi tāṃ stimitavastramivāṅgalagnāṃ prauḍhapratāpamadanānalataptadehām /
analyzed: adyā api tām stimita vastram iva aṅga lagnām prauḍha pratāpa madana anala tapta dehām

original: MSS_0946-2 bālāmanāthaśaraṇāmanukampanīyāṃ prāṇādhikāṃ kṣaṇamahaṃ na hi vismarāmi //
analyzed: bālām anātha śaraṇām anukampanīyām prāṇa adhikām kṣaṇam aham na hi vismarāmi

original: MSS_0947-1 adyāpi tāni smitamukhīṃ puruṣāyiteṣu lambālakākulakapolalatāṃ smarāmi /
analyzed: adyā api tāni smita mukhīm puruṣāyiteṣu lamba alaka ākula kapola latām smarāmi

original: MSS_0947-2 āndolanaśramajalākulavihvalāṅgīṃ śvāsottaraṃ ca nibhṛtaṃ ca muhurvadantīm //
analyzed: āndolana śramajala ākula vihvala aṅgīm śvāsa uttaram ca nibhṛtam ca muhur vadantīm

original: MSS_0948-1 adyāpi tāni parivartitakaṃdharāṇi kiṃcitkṣutatruṭitakañcukajālakāni /
analyzed: adyā api tāni parivartita kaṃdharāṇi kiṃcid kṣuta truṭita kañcuka jālakāni

original: MSS_0948-2 tasyā bhujāgraluladudvalakuntalāni citte sphuranti mama vakravilocanāni //
analyzed: tasyāḥ bhuja agra lulat udvala kuntalāni citte sphuranti mama vakra vilocanāni

original: MSS_0949-1 adyāpi tāni mama cetasi saṃsphuranti karṇāntasaṃgatakaṭākṣanirīkṣitāni /
analyzed: adyā api tāni mama cetasi saṃsphuranti karṇa anta saṃgata kaṭākṣa nirīkṣitāni

original: MSS_0949-2 tasyāḥ smarajvarakarāṇi madālasāni līlāvilāsabahulāni vilocanāni //
analyzed: tasyāḥ smara jvara karāṇi mada alasāni līlā vilāsa bahulāni vilocanāni

original: MSS_0950-1 adyāpi tāni mama cetasi saṃsphuranti bimboṣṭhadeśaparikīrṇaśucismatāni /
analyzed: adyā api tāni mama cetasi saṃsphuranti bimba uṣṭha deśa parikīrṇa śuci smatāni

original: MSS_0951-1 adyāpi tāni mṛduvākyasubhāṣitāni tirthagvivarttinayanāntanirīkṣaṇāni līlālasāñcitagatāni śucismitāni tasyāḥ smarāmi madavibhramaceṣṭitāni
analyzed: adyā api tāni mṛdu vākya su bhāṣitāni tirthagvi vartti nayana anta nirīkṣaṇāni līlā alasa āñcita gatāni śuci smitāni tasyāḥ smarāmi mada vibhrama ceṣṭitāni

original: MSS_0952-1 adyāpi tāmanibhṛtakramamāgataṃ ca māṃ dvāri vīkṣya śayane nimiṣeṇa suptām /
analyzed: adyā api tām a nibhṛta kramam āgatam ca mām dvāri vīkṣya śayane nimiṣeṇa suptām

original: MSS_0952-2 mandaṃ mayi spṛśati kaṇḍakitāṅgayaṣṭim utphullagaṇḍaphalakāṃ bahuśaḥ smarāmi //
analyzed: mandam mayi spṛśati kaṇḍakita aṅga yaṣṭim utphulla gaṇḍa phalakām bahuśas smarāmi

original: MSS_0953-1 adyāpi tāmanunayatyapi cāṭupūrvaṃ kopāt prākṛtamukhīṃ mayi sāparādhe /
analyzed: adyā api tām anunayati api cāṭu pūrvam kopāt prākṛta mukhīm mayi sa aparādhe

original: MSS_0953-2 āliṅgati prasabhamutpulakāṅgayaṣṭiṃ māmete duḥsahamivoktavatīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: āliṅgati prasabham utpulaka aṅga yaṣṭim mām ete duḥsaham iva uktavatīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0954-1 adyāpi tāmanunayatyapi mayyasaktāṃ vyāvṛttya keliśayane śayitāṃ parācīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām anunayati api mayi asaktām vyāvṛttya keli śayane śayitām parācīm

original: MSS_0954-2 nidrākulāmiva mamābhimukhībhavantīṃ prātarmadaṅganihitaikabhujāṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: nidrā ākulām iva mama abhimukhībhavantīm prātar mad aṅga nihita eka bhujām smarāmi

original: MSS_0955-1 adyāpi tāmabhiviśālanitambabimbāṃ gambhīranābhikuharāṃ tanumadhyabhāgām /
analyzed: adyā api tām abhiviśāla nitamba bimbām gambhīra nābhi kuharām tanu madhya bhāgām

original: MSS_0955-2 amlānakomalamṛṇālasamānabāhuṃ līlālasāñcitagatiṃ manasā smarāmi //
analyzed: a mlāna komala mṛṇāla samāna bāhum līlā alasa āñcita gatim manasā smarāmi

original: MSS_0956-1 adyāpi tāmaruṇayatyaruṇentarikṣam āpṛcchamānamapi nāma vidhārayantīm /
analyzed: adya api tām aruṇayati aruṇentarikṣam āpṛcchamānam api nāma vidhārayantīm

original: MSS_0956-2 utthāpya niścaladṛśau mama niḥśvasantīṃ cintākulāṃ kimapi namramukhīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: utthāpya niścala dṛśau mama niḥśvasantīm cintā ākulām kim api namra mukhīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0957-1 adyāpi tāmalamasīlitacārunetrāṃ loladbhujāvalayajhaṃkṛtimāvahantīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām alam asīlita cāru netrām lolat bhujā valaya jhaṃkṛtim āvahantīm

original: MSS_0957-2 vellatkarorukucamunnamitasvakarṇe kaṇḍūyanaṃ vidadhatīṃ hṛdi cintayāmi //
analyzed: vellat kara ūru kucam unnamita sva karṇe kaṇḍūyanam vidadhatīm hṛdi cintayāmi

original: MSS_0958-1 adyāpi tāmavahitāṃ manasācalena saṃcintayāmi yuvatīṃ mama jīvitāśām /
analyzed: adyā api tām avahitām manasā acalena saṃcintayāmi yuvatīm mama jīvita āśām

original: MSS_0958-2 nānyopabhuktanavayauvanabhārasārāṃ janmāntare'pi mama saiva gatiryathā syāt //
analyzed: na anya upabhukta nava yauvana bhāra sārām janmāntare pi mama sā eva gatiḥ yathā syāt

original: MSS_0959-1 adyāpi tāmavigaṇayya kṛtāparādham āpādamūlapatitaṃ sahasā calantīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām a vigaṇayya kṛta aparādham ā pāda mūla patitam sahasā calantīm

original: MSS_0959-2 vastrāñcalaṃ mama karānnijamākṣipantīṃ mā meti roṣaparuṣaṃ vadatīṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: vastra añcalam mama karāt nijam ākṣipantīm mā mā iti roṣa paruṣam vadatīm smarāmi

original: MSS_0960-1 adyāpi tāmahamalajjitapūrvaghṛṣṭe śayyātale suśayitāṃ madanotsavāya /
analyzed: adyā api tām aham alajjita pūrva ghṛṣṭe śayyā tale su śayitām madana utsavāya

original: MSS_0960-2 vīrṇāvatīṃ vikacacampakapuṣpanāsāṃ dhyāyāmi cetasi sadā nadatīṃ śubhāṅgīm //
analyzed: vīrṇāvatīm vikaca campaka puṣpa nāsām dhyāyāmi cetasi sadā nadatīm śubha aṅgīm

original: MSS_0961-1 adyāpi tāmita itaśca puraśca paścād antarbahiḥ parita eva paribhramantīm /
analyzed: adya api tām itas itas ca puras ca paścāt antar bahis paritas eva paribhramantīm

original: MSS_0961-2 paśyāmi phullakanakāmbujasaṃnibhen vaktreṇa tiryagapavartitalocanena //
analyzed: paśyāmi phulla kanaka ambuja saṃnibhena vaktreṇa tiryak apavartita locanena

original: MSS_0962-1 adyāpi tāmupavane paricārayuktāṃ saṃcintayāmyupagatāṃ madanotsavāya /
analyzed: adyā api tām upavane paricāra yuktām saṃcintayāmi upagatām madana utsavāya

original: MSS_0962-2 māṃ pārśvasaṃnihitalokabhayāt saśaṅkaṃ vyāvartitekṣaṇamanukṣaṇamīkṣamāṇām //
analyzed: mām pārśva saṃnihita loka bhayāt sa śaṅkam vyāvartita īkṣaṇam anukṣaṇam īkṣamāṇām

original: MSS_0963-1 adyāpi tāmubhayapārśvagahāraramyāṃ vāsantikākusumabhāsittakañcukāṃ ca /
analyzed: adyā api tām ubhaya pārśva gahāra ramyām vāsantikā kusuma bhāsitta kañcukām ca

original: MSS_0963-2 rākābhirāmavidhumaṇḍalavalguvavatrāṃ lāvaṇyanirjjitarayāṃ satataṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: rākā abhirāma vidhu maṇḍala valgu vavatrām lāvaṇya nirjita rayām satatam smarāmi

original: MSS_0964-1 adyāpi tāmurasijadvayamunnamayya madhye valitritayalakṣitaromarājim /
analyzed: adyā api tām urasija dvayam unnamayya madhye vali tritaya lakṣita romarājim

original: MSS_0964-2 dhyāyāmi vellitabhujāṃ vihitāṅgabhaṅgaṃ vyājena nābhikuharaṃ mama darśayantīm //
analyzed: dhyāyāmi vellita bhujām vihita aṅga bhaṅgam vyājena nābhi kuharam mama darśayantīm

original: MSS_0965-1 adyāpi tiṣṭhati dṛśoridamuttarīyaṃ dhartuṃ punaḥ stanataṭe galitaṃ pravṛttā /
analyzed: adyā api tiṣṭhati dṛśoḥ idam uttarīyam dhartum punar stana taṭe galitam pravṛttā

original: MSS_0965-2 vācaṃ niśamya nayanaṃ nayanaṃ mameti kiṃcittadā yadkarot smitamāyatākṣī //
analyzed: vācam niśamya nayanam nayanam mama iti kiṃcid tadā yat karot smitam āyata akṣī

original: MSS_0966-1 adyāpi durnivāraṃ stutikanyā bhajati kaumāram /
analyzed: adyā api durnivāram stutikanyā bhajati kaumāram

original: MSS_0966-2 madbhyo na rocate sā- 'santo'pyasyai na rocante //
analyzed: madbhyaḥ na rocate sā santaḥ upi asyai na rocante

original: MSS_0967-1 adyāpi dhāvati manaḥ kimahaṃ karomi sārdhaṃ sakhībhirapi vāsagṛhe sukānte /
analyzed: adyā api dhāvati manaḥ kim aham karomi sārdham sakhībhiḥ api vāsagṛhe su kānte

original: MSS_0967-2 kāntāṅgasaṃgaparihāsavicitranṛtye krīḍābhirāma iti yātu madīyakālaḥ //
analyzed: kānta aṅga saṃga parihāsa vicitra nṛtye krīḍā abhirāmaḥ iti yātu madīya kālaḥ

original: MSS_0968-1 adyāpi na sphurati kesarabhāralakṣmīr na preṅkhati dhvanitamadraguhāntareṣu /
analyzed: adyā api na sphurati kesara bhāra lakṣmīḥ na preṅkhati dhvanita madra guhā antareṣu

original: MSS_0968-2 mattāstathāpi kariṇo hariṇādhipasya paśyanti bhītamanasaḥ padavīṃ vaneṣu //
analyzed: mattāḥ tathā api kariṇaḥ hariṇādhipasya paśyanti bhīta manasaḥ padavīm vaneṣu

original: MSS_0969-1 adyāpi nirmalaśaracchaśigaurakānti ceto munerapi haret kimutāsmadīyam /
analyzed: adyā api nirmala śarad śaśi gaura kānti cetaḥ muneḥ api haret kim uta asmadīyam

original: MSS_0969-2 vaktraṃ sudhāmayamahaṃ yadi tat prapadye cumban pibāmyavirataṃ vyathate mano me //
analyzed: vaktram sudhā mayam aham yadi tat prapadye cumban pibāmi aviratam vyathate manaḥ me

original: MSS_0970-1 adyāpi nānaṃ harakopavahnis tvayi jvalatyaurva ivāmburāśau /
analyzed: adyā api nānam hara kopa vahniḥ tvayi jvalati aurve iva amburāśau

original: MSS_0970-2 tvamanyathā manmatha madvidhānāṃ bhasmāvaśeṣaḥ kathamevamuṣṇaḥ //
analyzed: tvam anyathā manmatha madvidhānām bhasma avaśeṣaḥ katham evam uṣṇaḥ

original: MSS_0971-1 adyāpi rojjhati haraḥ kila kālakūṭaṃ kūrmo bibharti dharaṇīṃ puṣṭhabhāge /
analyzed: adyā api rojjhati haraḥ kila kālakūṭam kūrmaḥ bibharti dharaṇīm puṣṭha bhāge

original: MSS_0971-2 ambhonidhirvahati duḥsahavāḍavāgniṃ aṅgīkṛtaṃ sukṛtinaḥ paripālayanti //
analyzed: ambhonidhiḥ vahati duḥsaha vāḍaba agnim aṅgīkṛtam su kṛtinaḥ paripālayanti

original: MSS_0972-1 adyāpi mārutavidhūtalatāvitānāṃ vīṇāvinodaracanāṃ mama jīviteśām /
analyzed: adyā api māruta vidhūta latā vitānām vīṇā vinoda racanām mama jīvita īśām

original: MSS_0972-2 pañceṣurāṣṭrakamalāṃ śubhavedimadhyāṃ dhyāyāmi cetasi sartīṃ madanābhirāmām //
analyzed: pañca iṣu rāṣṭra kamalām śubha vedi madhyām dhyāyāmi cetasi sartīm madana abhirāmām

original: MSS_0973-1 adyāpi me niśi divā hṛdayaṃ dunoti pūrṇendusundarasukhaṃ mama vallabhāyāḥ /
analyzed: adyā api me niśi divā hṛdayam dunoti pūrṇa indu sundara sukham mama vallabhāyāḥ

original: MSS_0973-2 lāvaṇyanirjitaratikṣatakāmadarpaṃ bhūyaḥ puraḥ pratipadaṃ na vilokyate yat //
analyzed: lāvaṇya nirjita rati kṣata kāma darpam bhūyas puras pratipadam na vilokyate yat

original: MSS_0974-1 adyāpi me varatanormadhurāṇi tasyā yānyarthavanti na ca yāni nirarthakāni /
analyzed: adyā api me vara tanoḥ madhurāṇi tasyāḥ yāni arthavanti na ca yāni nirarthakāni

original: MSS_0974-2 nidrānimīlitadṛśo madamantharāyās tānyakṣarāṇi hṛdaye kimapi dhvananti //
analyzed: nidrā nimīlita dṛśaḥ madamantharāyāḥ tāni akṣarāṇi hṛdaye kim api dhvananti

original: MSS_0975-1 adyāpi ye na vihitā vipulāḥ prabandhā vidyotamānavibhavāḥ sukhayanti viśvam /
analyzed: adyā api ye na vihitāḥ vipulāḥ prabandhāḥ vidyotamāna vibhavāḥ sukhayanti viśvam

original: MSS_0975-2 so'yaṃ dviśuddhaguruvaṃśabhavaḥ prasiddho gopāladatta upameyapadaṃ kathaṃ syāt //
analyzed: saḥ uyam dvi śuddha guru vaṃśa bhavaḥ prasiddhaḥ gopāladattaḥ upameya padam katham syāt

original: MSS_0976-1 adyāpi vāsagṛhato mayi nīyamāne durvārabhīṣaṇakarairyamadūtakalpaiḥ /
analyzed: adyā api vāsagṛhataḥ mayi nīyamāne durvāra bhīṣaṇa karaiḥ yama dūta kalpaiḥ

original: MSS_0976-2 kiṃ kiṃ tayā bahuvidhaṃ na kṛtaṃ madarthe vaktuṃ na pāryata iti vyathate mano me //
analyzed: kim kim tayā bahuvidham na kṛtam mad arthe vaktum na pāryate iti vyathate manaḥ me

original: MSS_0977-1 adyāpi vismayakarī tridaśān vihāya buddhirbalāccalati me kimahaṃ karomi /
analyzed: adyā api vismaya karī tridaśān vihāya buddhiḥ balāt calati me kim aham karomi

original: MSS_0977-2 jānannapi pratimuhūrtamihāntakāle kānteti vallabhatareti mameti dhīrā //
analyzed: jānan api pratimuhūrtam iha antakāle kāntā iti vallabhatarā iti mama iti dhīrā

original: MSS_0978-1 adyāpi śītadyutirātmabimbaṃ nirmāya nirmāya punarbhunakti /
analyzed: adyā api śītadyutiḥ ātma bimbam nirmāya nirmāya punar bhunakti

original: MSS_0978-2 tasyā mukhenāyatalocanāyāḥ kartuṃ na śaktiḥ sadṛśaṃ priyāyāḥ //
analyzed: tasyāḥ mukhena āyata locanāyāḥ kartum na śaktiḥ sadṛśam priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_0979-1 adyāpi śravasī na kuṇḍalacale kelikvaṇatkaṅkaṇau bāhū nāpi na hārihāravalayāluṇṭhā ca kaṇṭhāvaniḥ /
analyzed: adyā api śravasī na kuṇḍala cale keli kvaṇat kaṅkaṇau bāhū nā api na hāri hāra valaya āluṇṭhā ca kaṇṭha avaniḥ

original: MSS_0979-2 asyāḥ paśya tathāpi paṅkajadṛśo viśvaṃ priyaṃ bhāvukaṃ paśyāmaḥ sphuṭatāvibhūṣaṇakarābhogaṃ vapurvaibhavam //
analyzed: asyāḥ paśya tathā api paṅkaja dṛśaḥ viśvam priyam bhāvukam paśyāmaḥ sphuṭatā a vibhūṣaṇa kara ābhogam vapuḥ vaibhavam

original: MSS_0980-1 adyāpi sā mama manastaṭinī sadāste romāñcavīcivilasadvipulasvabhāvā /
analyzed: adyā api sā mama manaḥ taṭinī sadā āste romāñca vīci vilasat vipula svabhāvā

original: MSS_0980-2 kādambakeśararuciḥ kṣatavīkṣaṇaṃ māṃ gātraklamaṃ kathayatī priyarājahaṃsī //
analyzed: kādamba kesara ruciḥ kṣata vīkṣaṇam mām gātra klamam kathayatī priya rājahaṃsī

original: MSS_0981-1 adyāpi sundari tavānanacandrabimbaṃ bandīkṛtāmbujayugaṃ paricumbya cetaḥ /
analyzed: adyā api sundari tava ānana candra bimbam bandīkṛta ambuja yugam paricumbya cetaḥ

original: MSS_0981-2 tvatsaṃgamodbhavasukhaṃ tanute tathāpi vairaṃ karoti karuṇāvikalo vivekaḥ //
analyzed: tvad saṃgama udbhava sukham tanute tathā api vairam karoti karuṇā vikalaḥ vivekaḥ

original: MSS_0982-1 adyāpi stanaśailadurgaviṣame sīmantinīnāṃ hṛdi sthātuṃ vāñchati māna eṣa dhigiti krodhādivālohitaḥ /
analyzed: adyā api stana śaila durga viṣame sīmantinīnām hṛdi sthātum vāñchati mānaḥ eṣa dhik iti krodhāt iva ālohitaḥ

original: MSS_0982-2 udyaddūrataraprasāritakaraḥ karṣatyasau tatkṣaṇāt phullatkairavakośaniḥsaradaliśreṇīkṛpāṇaṃ śaśī //
analyzed: udyat dūratara prasārita karaḥ karṣati asau tad kṣaṇāt phullat kairava kośa niḥsarat ali śreṇī kṛpāṇam śaśī

original: MSS_0983-1 adyāpi hariharādibhir amarairapi tattvato na vijñātāḥ /
analyzed: adya api hari hara ādibhiḥ amaraiḥ api tattvataḥ na vijñātāḥ

original: MSS_0983-2 bhramavibhramabahumohā veśyāḥ saṃsāramāyāśca //
analyzed: bhrama vibhrama bahu mohāḥ veśyāḥ saṃsāra māyāḥ ca

original: MSS_0984-1 adyāpi hi nṛśaṃsasya pituste divaso gataḥ /
analyzed: adyā api hi nṛśaṃsasya pituḥ te divasaḥ gataḥ

original: MSS_0984-2 tamasā pihitaḥ panthā ehi putraka śevahe //
analyzed: tamasā pihitaḥ panthāḥ ehi putraka śevahe

original: MSS_0985-1 adyāpyaśokanavapallavaraktahastāṃ muktāphalapracayacumbitacūcukāgrām /
analyzed: adya api aśoka nava pallava rakta hastām muktāphala pracaya cumbita cūcuka agrām

original: MSS_0985-2 antaḥsmitocchvasitapāṇḍuragaṇḍabhittiṃ tāṃ vallabhāmalasahaṃsagatiṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: antar smita ucchvasita pāṇḍura gaṇḍa bhittim tām vallabhām alasa haṃsa gatim smarāmi

original: MSS_0986-1 adyāpyahaṃ calitacārunimīlitākṣam āsyaṃ smarāmi satataṃ suratāvasāne /
analyzed: adya api aham calita cāru nimīlita akṣam āsyam smarāmi satatam surata avasāne

original: MSS_0986-2 tatkālaniśvasitaniḥsṛtakāntikāntaṃ svedodabinduparidanturitaṃ priyāyāḥ //
analyzed: tad kāla niśvasita niḥsṛta kānti kāntam sveda uda bindu paridanturitam priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_0987-1 adyāpyahaṃ varavadhūsuratopabhogaṃ jīvāmi nānyavidhinā kṣaṇamantareṇa /
analyzed: adyā api aham vara vadhū surata upabhogam jīvāmi na anya vidhinā kṣaṇam antareṇa

original: MSS_0987-2 tadbhrātaro maraṇameva hi duḥkhaśāntyai vijñāpayāmi bhavatastvaritaṃ lunīdhvam //
analyzed: tat bhrātaraḥ maraṇam eva hi duḥkha śāntyai vijñāpayāmi bhavataḥ tvaritam lunīdhvam

original: MSS_0988-1 adyāpyahaṃ vikacakundasamānadantaṃ tiryagvivartitaviśālavilocanāntam /
analyzed: adyā api aham vikaca kunda samāna dantam tiryak vivartita viśāla vilocana antam

original: MSS_0988-2 tasyā mukhaṃ suvijitendu na vismarāmi codyaṃ kṛtajña iva sādhukṛtopakāram //
analyzed: tasyāḥ mukham su vijita indu na vismarāmi codyam kṛtajñaḥ iva sādhu kṛta upakāram

original: MSS_0989-1 adyāpyahaṃ sarasamañjulabhṛṅganādam īṣatsmarollasitarāgasupāṇḍugaṇḍam /
analyzed: adyā api aham sarasa mañjula bhṛṅga nādam īṣat smara ullasita rāga su pāṇḍu gaṇḍam

original: MSS_0989-2 paśyāmi pūrṇaśaradindusamānakānti tasyā mukhaṃ vikacapaṅkajapātranetram //
analyzed: paśyāmi pūrṇa śarad indu samāna kānti tasyāḥ mukham vikaca paṅkaja pātra netram

original: MSS_0990-1 adyāpyaho jagati sundaralakṣapūrṇe anyānyamuttamaguṇādhikasaṃprapanne /
analyzed: adya api aho jagati sundara lakṣa pūrṇe

original: MSS_0990-2 anyābhirapyupamituṃ na mayā ca śakyaṃ rūpaṃ tadīyamiti me hṛdaye vitarkaḥ //
analyzed: anyābhiḥ api upamitum na mayā ca śakyam rūpam tadīyam iti me hṛdaye vitarkaḥ

original: MSS_0991-1 adyāpyunmadayātudhānataruṇīcañ catkarāsphālana- vyāvalgannṛkapālatālaraṇitairnṛtyatpiśācāṅganāḥ /
analyzed: adya api unmada yātudhāna taruṇī cam catkara āsphālana vyāvalgat nṛ kapāla tāla raṇitaiḥ nṛtyat piśāca aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_0991-2 udgāyanti yaśāṃsi yasya vitatairnādaiḥ pracaṇḍānila- prakṣubhyatkarikumbhakūṭakuharavyaktai raṇakṣoṇayaḥ //
analyzed: udgāyanti yaśāṃsi yasya vitataiḥ nādaiḥ pracaṇḍa anila prakṣubhyat kari kumbha kūṭa kuhara vyaktaiḥ raṇa kṣoṇayaḥ

original: MSS_0992-1 adyābhogini gāḍhamarmanivahe harmyāgravedījuṣāṃ sadyaścandanaśoṣiṇi stanataṭe saṅge kuraṅgīdṛśām /
analyzed: adya ābhogini gāḍha marma nivahe harmya agra vedī juṣām sadyas candana śoṣiṇi stana taṭe saṅge kuraṅgī dṛśām

original: MSS_0992-2 prāyaḥ praślathayanti puṣpadhanuṣaḥ puṣpākare niṣṭhite nirvedaṃ navamallikāsurabhayaḥ sāyaṃtanā vāyavaḥ //
analyzed: prāyas praślathayanti puṣpadhanuṣaḥ puṣpa ākare niṣṭhite nirvedam nava mallikā surabhayaḥ sāyaṃtanāḥ vāyavaḥ

original: MSS_0993-1 adyāmbhaḥ paritaḥ patiṣyati bhuvastāpo'dya nirvāsyati kṣetreṣvadya yatiṣyate janapadaḥ sasyeṣu paryutsukaḥ /
analyzed: adya ambhaḥ paritas patiṣyati bhuvaḥ tāpa udya nirvāsyati kṣetreṣu adya yatiṣyate janapadaḥ sasyeṣu paryutsukaḥ

original: MSS_0993-2 nartiṣyanti tavodaye'dya jalada vyālolapucchacchada- cchatracchāditamaulayo diśi diśi krīḍālasāḥ kekinaḥ //
analyzed: nartiṣyanti tava udaya idya jalada vyālola puccha chada chatra chādita maulayaḥ diśi diśi krīḍā alasāḥ kekinaḥ

original: MSS_0994-1 adyārabhya kaṭhorakārmukalatāvinyastahastāmbujas tāvanna prakaṭīkaromi nayane śoṇe nimeṣodayān /
analyzed: adyā ārabhya kaṭhora kārmuka latā vinyasta hasta ambujaḥ tāvat na prakaṭīkaromi nayane śoṇe nimeṣa udayān

original: MSS_0994-2 yāvat sāyakakotipāṭitaripukṣmāpālamauliskhalan mallīmālyapatatparāgapaṭalairāmodinī medinī //
analyzed: yāvat sāyaka koti pāṭita ripu kṣmāpāla mauli skhalat mallī mālya patat parāga paṭalaiḥ āmodinī medinī

original: MSS_0995-1 adyārabhya na hi priye punarahaṃ mānasya vā bhājanaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ viṣarūpiṇaḥ śaṭhamaternāmāpi saṃkṣepataḥ /
analyzed: adyā ārabhya na hi priye punar aham mānasya vā bhājanam gṛhṇīyām viṣa rūpiṇaḥ śaṭha mateḥ nāma api saṃkṣepataḥ

original: MSS_0995-2 kiṃ tenaiva vinā śaśāṅkakiraṇaspaṣṭāṭṭahāsā niśā naiko vā divasaḥ payodamalino yāyān mama prāvṛṣi //
analyzed: kim tena eva vinā śaśāṅka kiraṇa spaṣṭa aṭṭahāsā niśā nā ekaḥ vā divasaḥ payoda malinaḥ yāyāt mama prāvṛṣi

original: MSS_0996-1 adyāśanaṃ śiśujanasya balena jātaṃ śvo vā kathaṃ nu bhaviteti vicintayantī /
analyzed: adyā aśanam śiśu janasya balena jātam śvas vā katham nu bhavitā iti vicintayantī

original: MSS_0996-2 ityaśrupātamalinīkṛtagaṇḍadeśā neccheddaridragṛhiṇī rajanīvirāmam //
analyzed: iti aśru pāta malinīkṛta gaṇḍa deśā na icchet daridra gṛhiṇī rajanī virāmam

original: MSS_0997-1 adyedaṃ śva idaṃ tathā parudidaṃ kṛtyaṃ parāri tvadaś cetaścintayasītthameva satataṃ nirvyākulaṃ re kutaḥ /
analyzed: adyā idam śvas idam tathā parut idam kṛtyam parāri cetaḥ cintayasi ittham eva satatam nirvyākulam re kutas

original: MSS_0997-2 tatkālaṃ vilasanmanorathalatākāntāradāvānalo yasmin daṇḍadharaṃ smariṣyasi sakhe so'pyasti kaścit kṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: tad kālam vilasat manoratha latā kāntāra dāva analaḥ yasmin daṇḍadharam smariṣyasi sakhe saḥ upi asti kaścid kṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_0998-1 adyeśvarāścāraṇagāyanānāṃ sadaiva kalpadrumavat phalanti /
analyzed: adyā īśvarāḥ cāraṇa gāyanānām sadā eva kalpadruma vat phalanti

original: MSS_0998-2 sadbhyastu kiṃcid vacasaiva sāyaṃ dīpāya karpūramivārpayanti //
analyzed: sadbhyaḥ tu kiṃcid vacasā eva sāyam dīpāya karpūram iva arpayanti

original: MSS_0999-1 adyaike prātarapare vitate'hni tathā pare /
analyzed: adya eke prātar apare vitata ihni tathā pare

original: MSS_0999-2 yānti niḥsīmni saṃsāre kaḥ sthātā nanu śocati //
analyzed: yānti niḥsīmni saṃsāre kaḥ sthātā nanu śocati

original: MSS_1000-1 adyaiva kuru yacchreyo mā tvā kālo'tyagādayam /
analyzed: adyā eva kuru yat śreyaḥ mā tvā kāla utyagāt ayam

original: MSS_1000-2 akṛteṣveva kāryeṣu mṛtyurvai saṃprakarṣati //
analyzed: akṛteṣu eva kāryeṣu mṛtyuḥ vai saṃprakarṣati

original: MSS_1001-1 adyaiva kuru yacchreyo vṛddhaḥsan kiṃ kariṣyasi /
analyzed: adyā eva kuru yat śreyaḥ vṛddhaḥ san kim kariṣyasi

original: MSS_1001-2 svagātrāṇyapi bhārāya bhavanti hi viparyaye //
analyzed: sva gātrāṇi api bhārāya bhavanti hi viparyaye

original: MSS_1002-1 adyaiva yat pratipadudgatacandralekhā- sakhyaṃ tvayā tanuriyaṃ gamitā varākyāḥ /
analyzed: adyā eva yat pratipad udgata candra lekhā sakhyam tvayā tanuḥ iyam gamitā varākyāḥ

original: MSS_1002-2 kānte gate kusumasāyaka tat prabhāte bāṇāvalīṃ kathaya kutra vimokṣyasi tvam //
analyzed: kānte gate kusumasāyaka tat prabhāte bāṇa āvalīm kathaya kutra vimokṣyasi tvam

original: MSS_1003-1 adyaiva śvaḥ paraśvastricaturadivasānantaraṃ sāyamahni prātaḥ prāhṇe parāhṇe kṣaṇamiha nivasa prasthito'bhyehi bhūyaḥ /
analyzed: adya eva śvas paraśvas tri catura divasa anantaram sāyam ahni prātar prāhṇe parāhṇe kṣaṇam iha nivasa prasthitaḥ abhyehi bhūyas

original: MSS_1003-2 itthaṃ rekātirekānaviditakapaṭaprakriyānarthisārthān atyarthaṃ vyarthayanti pratidivasamaho rājadhānyāṃ vadānyāḥ //
analyzed: ittham reka atirekān avidita kapaṭa prakriyān arthi sārthān atyartham vyarthayanti pratidivasam ahar rājadhānyām vadānyāḥ

original: MSS_1004-1 adyaiva hasitaṃ gītaṃ krīḍitaṃ yaiḥ śarīribhiḥ /
analyzed: adyā eva hasitam gītam krīḍitam yaiḥ śarīribhiḥ

original: MSS_1004-2 adyaiva te na dṛśyante paśya kālasya ceṣṭitam //
analyzed: adyā eva te na dṛśyante paśya kālasya ceṣṭitam

original: MSS_1005-1 adyotsaṅgavasadbhujaṃgakavalakleśādiveśācala- prāleyaplavanecchayānusarati śrīkhaṇḍaśailānilaḥ /
analyzed: adya utsaṅga vasat bhujaṃga kavala kleśa ādi veśa acala prāleya plavana icchayā anusarati śrīkhaṇḍa śaila anilaḥ

original: MSS_1005-2 kiṃ ca snigdharasālamaulimukulānyālokya harṣodayād unmīlanti kuhūḥkuhūriti kalottālāḥ pikānāṃ giraḥ //
analyzed: kim ca snigdha rasāla mauli mukulāni ālokya harṣa udayāt unmīlanti kuhūḥ kuhūḥ iti kala uttālāḥ pikānām giraḥ

original: MSS_1006-1 adyodyānagṛhāṅgaṇe sakhi mayā svapnena lākṣāruṇaḥ protkṣipto'yamaśokadohadavidhau pādaḥ kvaṇannūpuraḥ /
analyzed: adya udyāna gṛha aṅgaṇe sakhi mayā svapnena lākṣā aruṇaḥ protkṣiptaḥ yama śoka dohada vidhau pādaḥ kvaṇat nūpuraḥ

original: MSS_1006-2 tāvat kiṃ kathayāmi kelipaṭunā nirgatya kuñjodarād ajñātopanatena tena sahasā mūrdhnaiva saṃbhāvitaḥ //
analyzed: tāvat kim kathayāmi keli paṭunā nirgatya kuñja udarāt ajñāta upanatena tena sahasā mūrdhnā eva saṃbhāvitaḥ

original: MSS_1007-1 adyonmīlanmalayapavanoddhūtacūtāṃkurāgra- grāsāsvādādadhikamadhurairuccaradbhirninādaiḥ /
analyzed: adya unmīlat malaya pavana uddhūta cūta aṃkura agra grāsa āsvādāt adhika madhuraiḥ uccaradbhiḥ ninādaiḥ

original: MSS_1007-2 kvāpi kvāpi smarahutavahoddīpanāyādhvagānāṃ hotuṃ prāṇānṛcamiva pikaḥ sāmidhenīmadhīte //
analyzed: kvāpi kvāpi smara hutavaha uddīpanāya adhvagānām hotum prāṇa anṛcam iva pikaḥ sāmidhenīm adhīte

original: MSS_1008-1 adrākṣīdapanidrakorakabharavyānamravallīskhalad- dhūlīdurdinasūditāmbaramasāvudyānamurvīpatiḥ /
analyzed: adrākṣīt apanidra koraka bhara vyānamra vallī skhalat dhūlī durdina sūdita ambaram asau udyānam urvīpatiḥ

original: MSS_1008-2 āsthānībhavanaṃ vasantanṛpaterdevasya cetobhuvaḥ satrāgāramanuttaraṃ madhulihāmekaṃ prapāmaṇḍapam //
analyzed: āsthānībhavanam vasanta nṛpateḥ devasya cetaḥ bhuvaḥ satra āgāram anuttaram madhulihām ekam prapā maṇḍapam

original: MSS_1009-1 adrākṣurye narendrā drupadatanubhuvaḥ keśapāśāvakṛṣṭiṃ cakrurvākārayan vā manasi kimaparaṃ ye'nvamanyanta mohāt /
analyzed: adrākṣuḥ ye narendrāḥ drupada tanubhuvaḥ keśapāśa avakṛṣṭim cakruḥ vā akārayan vā manasi kim aparam yena u amanyanta mohāt

original: MSS_1009-2 sarveṣāmeva teṣāṃ samaramakhabhuvi krodhavahṇau juhoti dvitrairhuṃkāramntrairabhijanasamidho madhyamaḥ pāṇḍaveyaḥ //
analyzed: sarveṣām eva teṣām samara makha bhuvi krodha vahṇau juhoti dvitraiḥ huṃkāra mntraiḥ abhijana samidhaḥ madhyamaḥ pāṇḍaveyaḥ

original: MSS_1010-1 adriṣvañjanapuñjakānti jaladraprāyaṃ ca mūle diśām ūrdhvaṃ nīlavitānakalpabhavanau jambālalepopamam /
analyzed: adriṣu añjana puñja kānti ca mūle diśām ūrdhvam nīla vitāna kalpa bhavanau jambāla lepa upamam

original: MSS_1010-2 tīre nīranidhestamālaviṭapicchāyāṃ ca sāyaṃ śanair udgacchatyabhisārikāpriyatamapremānukūlaṃ tamaḥ //
analyzed: tīre nīranidheḥ tamāla viṭapi chāyām ca sāyam śanais udgacchati abhisārikā priyatama prema anukūlam tamaḥ

original: MSS_1011-1 adreḥ kiṃ svidvahati pavanaḥ śṛṅgamityunmukhībhir dṛṣṭotsāhaścakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ /
analyzed: adreḥ kim svid vahati pavanaḥ śṛṅgam iti unmukhībhiḥ dṛṣṭa utsāhaḥ cakita cakitam mugdha siddha aṅganābhiḥ

original: MSS_1011-2 sthānādasmāt sarasaniculādutpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalepān //
analyzed: sthānāt asmāt sarasa niculāt utpata udak mukhaḥ kham diṅnāgānām pathi pariharan sthūla hasta avalepān

original: MSS_1012-1 adrohaḥ śaucānām acāpalaṃ vrataviśeṣaniyamānām /
analyzed: adrohaḥ śaucānām acāpalam vrata viśeṣa niyamānām

original: MSS_1012-2 paiśunyamapriyāṇāṃ vṛtticchedo nṛśaṃsacaritānām //
analyzed: paiśunyam apriyāṇām vṛtti chedaḥ nṛśaṃsa caritānām

original: MSS_1013-1 adrohaḥ sarvabhūteṣu karmaṇā manasā girā /
analyzed: adrohaḥ sarva bhūteṣu karmaṇā manasā girā

original: MSS_1013-2 anugrahaśca dānaṃ ca satāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //
analyzed: anugrahaḥ ca dānam ca satām dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: MSS_1014-1 adrohasamayaṃ kṛtvā munīnāmagrato hariḥ /
analyzed: adroha samayam kṛtvā munīnām agratas hariḥ

original: MSS_1014-2 jaghāna namuciṃ paścād apāṃ phenena pārthiva //
analyzed: jaghāna namucim paścāt apām phenena pārthiva

original: MSS_1015-1 adrohe samayaṃ kṛtvā ciccheda namuceḥ śiraḥ /
analyzed: adrohe samayam kṛtvā ciccheda namuceḥ śiraḥ

original: MSS_1015-2 śakraḥ sā hi matā tasya ripau vṛttiḥ sanātanī //
analyzed: śakraḥ sā hi matā tasya ripau vṛttiḥ sanātanī

original: MSS_1016-1 adrau jīrṇadarīṣu saṃkaṭasarittīreṣu nimnonnate ūḍhā yena vṛṣeṇa dhūrbalavatā yūnā dvitīyena yā /
analyzed: adrau jīrṇa darīṣu saṃkaṭa sarit tīreṣu nimna unnate ūḍhā yena vṛṣeṇa dhūḥ balavatā yūnā dvitīyena yā

original: MSS_1016-2 tāṃ vṛddho'pi kṛśo'pi durvaha dhuraṃ voḍhuṃ sa eva kṣamo rathyābhaḍḍalakaiḥ sametya bahubhirnākṛṣyate'nyairvṛṣaiḥ //
analyzed: tām vṛddhaḥ api kṛśaḥ api durvaha dhuram voḍhum saḥ eva kṣamaḥ rathyā bhaḍḍalakaiḥ sametya bahubhiḥ na ākṛṣyate inyaiḥ vṛṣaiḥ

original: MSS_1017-1 advitīyaṃ nijaṃ loke vilokya vahato mudam /
analyzed: advitīyam nijam loke vilokya vahataḥ mudam

original: MSS_1017-2 pramadāvadanasyāyaṃ darpodreko na tu smitam //
analyzed: pramadā vadanasya ayam darpa udrekaḥ na tu smitam

original: MSS_1018-1 advisaṃvīkṣaṇaṃ cakṣur advisaṃmīlanaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: a dvi saṃvīkṣaṇam cakṣuḥ a dvi saṃmīlanam manaḥ

original: MSS_1018-2 advisaṃsparśanaḥ pāṇir adya me kiṃ kariṣyati //
analyzed: a dvi saṃsparśanaḥ pāṇiḥ adya me kim kariṣyati

original: MSS_1019-1 adveṣapeśalaṃ kuryān manaḥ kusumakomalam /
analyzed: a dveṣa peśalam kuryāt manaḥ kusuma komalam

original: MSS_1019-2 babhūva dveṣadoṣeṇa devadānavasaṃkṣayaḥ //
analyzed: babhūva dveṣa doṣeṇa deva dānava saṃkṣayaḥ

original: MSS_1020-1 advaitaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoranuguṇaṃ sarvāsvavasthāsu yad viśrāmo hṛdayasya yatra jarasā yasminnahāryo rasaḥ /
analyzed: advaitam sukha duḥkhayoḥ anuguṇam sarvāsu avasthāsu yat viśrāmaḥ hṛdayasya yatra jarasā yasmin a hāryaḥ rasaḥ

original: MSS_1020-2 kālenāvaraṇātyayāt pariṇate yatsnehasāre sthitaṃ bhadraṃ tasya sumānuṣasya kathamapyekaṃ hi tat prāpyate //
analyzed: kālena āvaraṇa atyayāt pariṇate yat sneha sāre sthitam bhadram tasya su mānuṣasya katham api ekam hi tat prāpyate

original: MSS_1021-1 advaitamekaṃ sukhamunnayantī vismārayantī jagadeva tanvi /
analyzed: advaitam ekam sukham unnayantī vismārayantī jagat eva tanvi

original: MSS_1021-2 muktāśritāmātmaruciṃ vadantī vedāntasiddhāntakatheva bhāsi //
analyzed: mukta āśritām ātma rucim vadantī vedānta siddhānta kathā iva bhāsi

original: MSS_1022-1 advaitoktipaṭūn vaṭūnapi vayaṃ bālān namaskurmahe ye tu dvandvavadāstadīyaśirasi nyasyāma vāmaṃ padam /
analyzed: advaita ukti paṭūn vaṭūn api vayam bālān namaskurmahe ye tu dvandva vadāḥ tadīya śirasi nyasyāma vāmam padam

original: MSS_1022-2 siṃhaḥ svīyaśiśūn niveśya hṛdaye sāndrādarādāmṛśaty āveśena bhinatti saṃbhramapadaṃ mattebhakumbhasthalam //
analyzed: siṃhaḥ svīya śiśūn niveśya hṛdaye sāndra ādarāt āmṛśati āveśena bhinatti saṃbhrama padam matta ibha kumbha sthalam

original: MSS_1023-1 advaidhamānasaṃyuktaṃ śūraṃ dhīraṃ vipaścitam /
analyzed: a dvaidha māna saṃyuktam śūram dhīram vipaścitam

original: MSS_1023-2 na śrīḥ saṃtyajate nityam ādityamiva raśmayaḥ //
analyzed: na śrīḥ saṃtyajate nityam ādityam iva raśmayaḥ

original: MSS_1024-1 adhaḥ karoti yadratnaṃ mūrdhnā dhārayate tṛṇam /
analyzed: adhas karoti yat ratnam mūrdhnā dhārayate tṛṇam

original: MSS_1024-2 doṣastasyaiva jaladhe ratnaṃ ratnaṃ tṛṇaṃ tṛṇam //
analyzed: doṣaḥ tasya eva jaladhe ratnam ratnam tṛṇam tṛṇam

original: MSS_1025-1 adhaḥ kurvanprajāḥ sarvā bahudhā mahimolbaṇaḥ /
analyzed: adhas kurvan prajāḥ sarvāḥ bahudhā mahima ulbaṇaḥ

original: MSS_1025-2 rājā parvaṇi kasmiṃścid bhavedahibhayākulaḥ //
analyzed: rājā parvaṇi kasmiṃścid bhavet ahi bhaya ākulaḥ

original: MSS_1026-1 adhaḥ kṣipanti kṛpaṇā vittaṃ tatra yiyāsavaḥ /
analyzed: adhas kṣipanti kṛpaṇāḥ vittam tatra yiyāsavaḥ

original: MSS_1026-2 santastu gurutīrthādau taduccaiḥpadakāṅkṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: santaḥ tu guru tīrtha ādau tad uccais pada kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_1027-1 adhaḥ paśyan pārśvadvayavalitasācīkṛtaśirāḥ śanaiḥ pakṣasthairyāddivi masṛṇacakrākṛtigatiḥ /
analyzed: adhas paśyan pārśva dvaya valita sācīkṛta śirāḥ śanais pakṣa sthairyāt divi masṛṇa cakra ākṛti gatiḥ

original: MSS_1027-2 cirāccillastiryaktvaritataramāhāranipuṇo nipatyaivākasmāccalacaraṇamūrdhaṃ prapatati //
analyzed: cirāt cillaḥ tiryak tvaritataram āhāra nipuṇaḥ nipatya eva akasmāt cala caraṇa mūrdham prapatati

original: MSS_1028-1 adhaḥ paśyasi kiṃ bāle patitaṃ tava kiṃ bhuvi /
analyzed: adhas paśyasi kim bāle patitam tava kim bhuvi

original: MSS_1028-2 re re mūrkha na jānāsi gataṃ tāruṇyamauktikam //
analyzed: re re mūrkha na jānāsi gatam tāruṇya mauktikam

original: MSS_1029-1 adhaḥpuṣpī śaṅkhapuṣpī lajjālurgirikarṇikā /
MSS_1029-2 nīlinī sahadevā ca putramārjārikā tathā //
analyzed: nīlinī sahadevā ca putra mārjārikā tathā

original: MSS_1030-1 viṣṇukrāntā ca sarvāsāṃ jaṭā grāhyā raverdine /
analyzed: viṣṇukrāntā ca sarvāsām jaṭā grāhyā raveḥ dine

original: MSS_1030-2 baddhā bhuje vilepādvā kāye śastraughavārikā //
analyzed: baddhā bhuje vilepāt vā kāye śastra ogha vārikā

original: MSS_1031-1 adhaḥ śete śambhustava caraṇamādhāya hṛdaye bahirdvāre dauvārikapadamupetaḥ kamalajaḥ /
analyzed: adhas śete śambhuḥ tava caraṇam ādhāya hṛdaye bahirdvāre dauvārika padam upetaḥ kamala jaḥ

original: MSS_1031-2 viḍaujā vaiphalyaṃ bhajati nijavijñāpanakṛte tāvahaṃ dāsaḥ syāmiti manasi lajjā bhayamapi //
analyzed: viṣ aujāḥ vaiphalyam bhajati nija vijñāpana kṛte tau aham dāsaḥ syām iti manasi lajjā bhayam api

original: MSS_1032-1 adhaḥsthā ramate nārī uparisthaśca kāmukaḥ /
analyzed: adhas sthā ramate nārī upari sthaḥ ca kāmukaḥ

original: MSS_1032-2 prasiddhaṃ tadrataṃ jñeyaṃ grāmabālajanapriyam //
analyzed: prasiddham tat ratam jñeyam grāma bāla jana priyam

original: MSS_1033-1 adhanaṃ khalu jīvadhanaṃ dhanamardhadhanaṃ mahaddhanaṃ dhānyam /
analyzed: adhanam khalu jīva dhanam dhanam ardha dhanam mahat dhanam dhānyam

original: MSS_1033-2 atidhanametat sundari vidyā ca tapaśca kīrtiśca //
analyzed: ati dhanam etat sundari vidyā ca tapaḥ ca kīrtiḥ ca

original: MSS_1034-1 adhanā api te dhanyāḥ sādhavo gṛhamedhinaḥ /
analyzed: adhanāḥ api te dhanyāḥ sādhavaḥ gṛhamedhinaḥ

original: MSS_1034-2 yadgṛhā hyarhavaryāmbutṛṇabhūmīśvarāvarāḥ //
analyzed: yad gṛhāḥ hi arha varya ambu tṛṇa bhūmi īśvara avarāḥ

original: MSS_1035-1 adhanā dhanamicchanti vācaṃ caiva catuṣpadāḥ /
analyzed: adhanāḥ dhanam icchanti vācam ca eva catuṣpadāḥ

original: MSS_1035-2 mānavāḥ svargamicchanti mokṣamicchanti devatāḥ //
analyzed: mānavāḥ svargam icchanti mokṣam icchanti devatāḥ

original: MSS_1036-1 adhanenārthakāmena nārthaḥ śakyo vivitsatā /
analyzed: a dhanena artha kāmena na arthaḥ śakyaḥ vivitsatā

original: MSS_1036-2 arthairarthā nibadhyante gajairiva mahāgajāḥ //
analyzed: arthaiḥ arthāḥ nibadhyante gajaiḥ iva mahā gajāḥ

original: MSS_1037-1 adhano dātukāmo'pi saṃprāpto dhanināṃ gṛham /
analyzed: adhanaḥ dātu kāmaḥ api saṃprāptaḥ dhaninām gṛham

original: MSS_1037-2 manyate yācako'yaṃ dhig dāridryaṃ khalu dehinām //
analyzed: manyate yācakaḥ uyam dhik dāridryam khalu dehinām

original: MSS_1038-1 adhano'yaṃ dhanaṃ prāpya mādyannuccairna māṃ smaret /
analyzed: adhanaḥ ūyam dhanam prāpya mādyan uccais na mām smaret

original: MSS_1038-2 iti kāruṇiko nūnaṃ dhanaṃ me bhūri nādadat //
analyzed: iti kāruṇikaḥ nūnam dhanam me bhūri na adadat

original: MSS_1039-1 adhamaṃ bādhate bhūyo duḥkhavego na tattamam /
analyzed: adhamam bādhate bhūyas duḥkha vegaḥ na tattamam

original: MSS_1039-2 pādadvayaṃ vrajatyāśu śītasparśo na cakṣuṣī //
analyzed: pāda dvayam vrajati āśu śīta sparśaḥ na cakṣuṣī

original: MSS_1040-1 adhamamitrakumitrasamāgamaḥ priyaviyogabhayāni daridratā /
analyzed: adhama mitra ku mitra samāgamaḥ priya viyoga bhayāni daridra tā

original: MSS_1040-2 apayaśaḥ khalu lokaparābhavo bhavati pāpataroḥ phalamīdṛśam //
analyzed: apayaśaḥ khalu loka parābhavaḥ bhavati pāpa taroḥ phalam īdṛśam

original: MSS_1041-1 adhamarṇaśavājīviśrāddhabhugduṣṭabhūbhujām /
analyzed: adhamarṇa śava ajīvi śrāddhabhuj duṣṭa bhūbhujām

original: MSS_1041-2 abhiprāyā na siddhyanti tenedaṃ dhriyate jagat //
analyzed: abhiprāyāḥ na tena idam dhriyate jagat

original: MSS_1042-1 adhamāḥ kalimicchanti saṃdhimicchanti madhyamāḥ /
analyzed: adhamāḥ kalim icchanti saṃdhim icchanti madhyamāḥ

original: MSS_1042-2 uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam //
analyzed: uttamāḥ mānam icchanti mānaḥ hi mahatām dhanam

original: MSS_1043-1 adhamā dhanamicchanti dhanamānau ca madhyamāḥ /
analyzed: adhamāḥ dhanam icchanti dhana mānau ca madhyamāḥ

original: MSS_1043-2 uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam //
analyzed: uttamāḥ mānam icchanti mānaḥ hi mahatām dhanam

original: MSS_1044-1 adhame saṃgatā lakṣmīr nopabhogāya kasyacit /
analyzed: adhame saṃgatā lakṣmīḥ na upabhogāya kasyacid

original: MSS_1044-2 kardame patitā chāyā sahakārataroriva //
analyzed: kardame patitā chāyā sahakāra taroḥ iva

original: MSS_1045-1 adhamo mātukāraśca dhātukāraśca madhyamaḥ /
analyzed: adhamaḥ mātukāraḥ ca dhātukāraḥ ca madhyamaḥ

original: MSS_1045-2 dhātumātukriyākāra uttamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ //
MSS_1046-1 adhamo lakṣaṇajñaḥ syān madhyamo lakṣyamācaret /
analyzed: adhamaḥ lakṣaṇa jñaḥ syāt madhyamaḥ lakṣyam ācaret

original: MSS_1046-2 lakṣyalakṣaṇasaṃyukta uttamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: lakṣya lakṣaṇa saṃyuktaḥ uttamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: MSS_1047-1 adharaṃ kila bimbanāmakaṃ phalamasmāditi bhavyamanvayam /
analyzed: adharam kila bimba nāmakam phalam asmāt iti bhavyam anvayam

original: MSS_1047-2 labhate'dharabimbamityadaḥ padamasyā radanacchadaṃ vadat //
analyzed: labhate idhara bimbam iti adaḥ padam asyāḥ radanacchadam vadat

original: MSS_1048-1 adharaḥ kisalayarāgaḥ komalaviṭapānukāriṇau bāhū /
analyzed: adharaḥ kisalaya rāgaḥ komala viṭapa anukāriṇau bāhū

original: MSS_1048-2 kusumamiva lobhanīyaṃ yauvanamaṅgeṣu saṃnaddham //
analyzed: kusumam iva lobhanīyam yauvanam aṅgeṣu saṃnaddham

original: MSS_1049-1 adharaḥ padmarāgo'yam anarghaḥ savraṇo'pi te /
analyzed: adharaḥ padmarāgaḥ uyam anarghaḥ sa vraṇaḥ api te

original: MSS_1049-2 mugdhe hastaḥ kimartho'yam apārtha iha dīyate //
analyzed: mugdhe hastaḥ kimarthaḥ uyam apārthaḥ iha dīyate

original: MSS_1050-1 adharadyutirastapallavā mukhaśobhā śaśikāntilaṅghinī /
analyzed: adhara dyutiḥ asta pallavā mukha śobhā śaśi kānti laṅghinī

original: MSS_1050-2 tanurapratimā ca subhruvo na vidherasya kṛtiṃ vivakṣati //
analyzed: tanuḥ apratimā ca subhruvaḥ na vidheḥ asya kṛtim vivakṣati

original: MSS_1051-1 adharamadhare kaṇṭhaṃ kaṇṭhe nidhāya bhujaṃ bhuje hṛdi ca hṛdayaṃ madhye madhyaṃ sarojadṛśo dṛḍham /
analyzed: adharam adhare kaṇṭham kaṇṭhe nidhāya bhujam bhuje hṛdi ca hṛdayam madhye madhyam saroja dṛśaḥ dṛḍham

original: MSS_1051-2 sarabhasamaho corāvūruṃ padaṃ ca pade balād gamayati jano dhanyaḥ kaścit samāṃ śiśire niśām //
analyzed: sarabhasam aho corau ūrum padam ca pade balāt gamayati janaḥ dhanyaḥ kaścid samām śiśire niśām

original: MSS_1052-1 adharamadhare kaṇṭhe kaṇṭhaṃ sacāṭu dṛśordṛśāv alikamalike kṛtvā gopījanena sasaṃbhramam /
analyzed: adharam adhare kaṇṭhe kaṇṭham sa cāṭu dṛśoḥ dṛśau ali kamalike kṛtvā gopī janena sa saṃbhramam

original: MSS_1052-2 śiśuriti rudan kṛṣṇo vakṣaḥsthale nihito'cirān- nibhṛtapulakaḥ smeraḥ pāyāt smarālasavigrahaḥ //
analyzed: śiśuḥ iti rudan kṛṣṇaḥ vakṣaḥ sthale nihita ucirāt nibhṛta pulakaḥ smeraḥ pāyāt smara alasa vigrahaḥ

original: MSS_1053-1 adharamamṛtaṃ kaḥ saṃdeho madhunyapi nānyathā madhuramadhikaṃ drākṣāyāśca prasannarasaṃ phalam /
analyzed: adharam amṛtam kaḥ saṃdehaḥ madhuni api nā anyathā madhuram adhikam drākṣāyāḥ ca prasanna rasam phalam

original: MSS_1053-2 sakṛdapi punarmadhyasthaḥ san rasāntaravijjano vadatu yadihānyat svādu syāt priyādaśanacchadāt //
analyzed: sakṛt api punar madhyasthaḥ san rasa antara vid janaḥ vadatu yat iha anyat svādu syāt priyāt aśanacchadāt

original: MSS_1054-1 adharasya madhurimāṇaṃ kucakāṭhinyaṃ dṛśostathā taikṣṇyam /
analyzed: adharasya madhurimāṇam kuca kāṭhinyam dṛśoḥ tathā taikṣṇyam

original: MSS_1054-2 kavitāyāḥ paripākān anubhavarasiko vijānāti //
analyzed: kavi tāyāḥ paripākān anubhava rasikaḥ vijānāti

original: MSS_1055-1 adharāmṛtapānena mamāsyamaparādhyatu /
analyzed: adhara amṛta pānena mama āsyam aparādhyatu

original: MSS_1055-2 mūrdhno kimaparāddhaṃ yaḥ pādau nāpnoti cumbitum //
analyzed: mūrdhnaḥ kim aparāddham yaḥ pādau na āpnoti cumbitum

original: MSS_1056-1 adharāmṛtamādhurīdhurīṇo harilīlāmuralīnināda eṣaḥ /
MSS_1056-2 pratatāna manaḥpramodamuccair hariṇīnāṃ hariṇīdṛśaṃ munīnām //
analyzed: pratatāna manaḥ pramodam uccais hariṇīnām hariṇīdṛśam munīnām

original: MSS_1057-1 adharāmṛtena pittaṃ naśyati vāyuḥ payodharayugena /
MSS_1057-2 anavarataratena kaphaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ vapurnāryāḥ //
analyzed: anavarata ratena kapham tridoṣa śamanam vapuḥ nāryāḥ

original: MSS_1058-1 adhareṇa samāgamād radānām aruṇimnā pihito'pi śuklabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: adhareṇa samāgamāt radānām aruṇimnā pihitaḥ api śukla bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_1058-2 hasitena sitena pakṣmalākṣyāḥ punarullāsamavāpa jātapakṣaḥ //
analyzed: hasitena sitena pakṣmala akṣyāḥ punar ullāsam avāpa jāta pakṣaḥ

original: MSS_1059-1 adhareṇonnatibhājā bhujaṃgaparipīḍitena te dūti /
analyzed: adhareṇa unnati bhājā bhujaṃga paripīḍitena te dūti

original: MSS_1059-3 saṃkṣobhitaṃ mano me jalanidhiriva mandarāgeṇa //
analyzed: saṃkṣobhitam manaḥ me jalanidhiḥ iva manda rāgeṇa

original: MSS_1060-1 adhare navavīṭikānurāgo nayane kajjalamujjvalaṃ dukūlam /
analyzed: adhare nava vīṭikā anurāgaḥ nayane kajjalam ujjvalam dukūlam

original: MSS_1060-2 idamābharaṇaṃ nitambanīnām itaradbhūṣaṇamaṅgadūṣaṇāya //
analyzed: idam ābharaṇam nitambanīnām itarat bhūṣaṇam aṅga dūṣaṇāya

original: MSS_1061-1 adhare binduḥ kaṇṭhe maṇimālā stanayuge śaśaplutakam /
analyzed: adhare binduḥ kaṇṭhe maṇimālā stana yuge śaśaplutakam

original: MSS_1061-2 tava sūcayanti ketaki kusumāyudhaśāstrapaṇḍitaṃ ramaṇam //
analyzed: tava sūcayanti ketaki kusumāyudha śāstra paṇḍitam ramaṇam

original: MSS_1062-1 adhare madhurā sarasvatīyaṃ nanu karṇe maṇikarṇikāpravāhaḥ /
analyzed: adhare madhurā sarasvatī iyam nanu karṇe maṇi karṇikā pravāhaḥ

original: MSS_1062-2 śirasi pratibhāti cāruveṇī kathameṇīnayanā na tīrtharājaḥ //
analyzed: śirasi pratibhāti cāru veṇī katham eṇī nayanā na tīrtha rājaḥ

original: MSS_1063-1 adhare vinihitavaṃśaṃ campakakusumena kalpitottaṃsam /
analyzed: adhare vinihita vaṃśam campaka kusumena kalpita uttaṃsam

original: MSS_1063-2 vinataṃ dadhānamaṃsaṃ vāmaṃ satataṃ namāmi jitakaṃsam //
analyzed: vinatam dadhānam aṃsam vāmam satatam namāmi jita kaṃsam

original: MSS_1064-1 adharo'yamadhīrākṣyā bandhujīvaprabhāharaḥ /
analyzed: adharaḥ ayam adhīra akṣyāḥ bandhujīva prabhā haraḥ

original: MSS_1064-2 anyajīvaprabhāṃ hanta haratīti kimadbhutam //
analyzed: anya jīva prabhām hanta harati iti kim adbhutam

original: MSS_1065-1 adharoṣṭhe ca ghoṇāyāṃ gaṇḍayościbuke tathā /
analyzed: adhara uṣṭhe ca ghoṇāyām gaṇḍayoḥ cibuke tathā

original: MSS_1065-2 muṣke nābhau trike kukṣāv āvartāstvatininditāḥ //
analyzed: muṣke nābhau trike kukṣau āvartāḥ tu ati ninditāḥ

original: MSS_1066-1 adharo'sau kuraṅgākṣyāḥ śobhate nāsikātale /
analyzed: adharā usau kuraṅga akṣyāḥ śobhate nāsikā tale

original: MSS_1066-2 suvarṇanalikāmadhyān māṇikyamiva vicyutam //
analyzed: suvarṇa nalikā madhyāt māṇikyam iva vicyutam

original: MSS_1067-1 adharmaṃ dharmamiti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā /
analyzed: adharmam dharmam iti yā manyate tamasā āvṛtā

original: MSS_1067-2 sarvārthān viparītāṃśca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī //
analyzed: sarva arthān viparītān ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī

original: MSS_1068-1 adharmaṃ dharmaveṣeṇa yadimaṃ lokasaṃkaram /
analyzed: adharmam dharma veṣeṇa yat imam loka saṃkaram

original: MSS_1068-2 abhipatsye śubhaṃ hitvā kriyāvidhivivarjitam /
analyzed: abhipatsye śubham hitvā kriyā vidhi vivarjitam

original: MSS_1069-1 adharmaḥ kṣatriyasyaitad yad vyādhimaraṇaṃ gṛhe /
analyzed: adharmaḥ kṣatriyasya etat yat vyādhi maraṇam gṛhe

original: MSS_1069-2 yuddhe tu maraṇaṃ yat syāt so'sya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //
analyzed: yuddhe tu maraṇam yat syāt saḥ asya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: MSS_1070-1 adharmaḥ surasastasya cotkaṭairmadhurāyate /
analyzed: adharmaḥ su rasaḥ tasya ca utkaṭaiḥ madhurāyate

original: MSS_1070-2 yādṛśaiśca phalaiścaiva suphalo lobhapādapaḥ //
analyzed: yādṛśaiḥ ca phalaiḥ ca eva su phalaḥ lobha pādapaḥ

original: MSS_1071-1 adharmadaṇḍanaṃ loke yaśoghnaṃ kīrtināśanam /
MSS_1071-2 asvargyaṃ ca paratrāpi tasmāttat parivarjayet //
analyzed: asvargyam ca paratra api tasmāt tat parivarjayet

original: MSS_1072-1 adharmadaṇḍanaṃsvargakīrtilokavināśanam /
MSS_1072-2 samyaktu daṇḍanaṃ rājñaḥ svargakīrtijayāvaham //
analyzed: samyak tu daṇḍanam rājñaḥ svarga kīrti jaya āvaham

original: MSS_1073-1 adharmadrohasaṃyukte mitrajāte'pyupekṣaṇam /
analyzed: adharma droha saṃyukte mitra jāte pi upekṣaṇam

original: MSS_1073-2 ātmavanmitravarge tu prāṇānapi parityajet //
analyzed: ātma vat mitra varge tu prāṇān api parityajet

original: MSS_1074-1 adharmapratiṣedhaśca nyāyamārgeṇa vartanam /
analyzed: adharma pratiṣedhaḥ ca nyāya mārgeṇa vartanam

original: MSS_1074-2 upakāryopakāritvam iti vṛttaṃ mahīpateḥ //
analyzed: upakārya upakāri tvam iti vṛttam mahīpateḥ

original: MSS_1075-1 adharmamanyatra mahītale'smin saṃkṣobhahetuṃ malinaṃ vicārya /
analyzed: adharmam anyatra mahī tale ismin saṃkṣobha hetum malinam vicārya

original: MSS_1075-2 niṣkāsanāyāsya ruṣeva deva sitaṃ yaśaḥ sarvadiśaḥ prayāti //
analyzed: niṣkāsanāya asya ruṣā iva deva sitam yaśaḥ sarva diśaḥ prayāti

original: MSS_1076-1 adharmarucayo mūḍhās tiryaggatiparāyaṇāḥ /
analyzed: adharma rucayaḥ mūḍhāḥ tiryaggati parāyaṇāḥ

original: MSS_1076-2 kṛcchrāṃ yonimanuprāpya na sukhaṃ vindate janāḥ //
analyzed: kṛcchrām yonim anuprāpya na sukham vindate janāḥ

original: MSS_1077-1 adharmasādhanaṃ budhā mudhā na jantuhiṃsanaṃ sṛjantu vedanindayā bhajantu kevalaṃ dayām /
analyzed: adharma sādhanam budhāḥ mudhā na jantu hiṃsanam sṛjantu veda nindayā bhajantu kevalam dayām

original: MSS_1077-2 iti prabodhayan vidhiṃ vidhāya vaidikaṃ vidhiṃ viśuddhabodhabandhurantaredhi buddhadeva naḥ //
analyzed: iti prabodhayan vidhim vidhāya vaidikam vidhim viśuddha bodha bandhuḥ antaredhi buddhadeva naḥ

original: MSS_1078-1 adharmastu mahāṃstāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ /
analyzed: adharmaḥ tu mahān tāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ

original: MSS_1078-2 yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat //
analyzed: yaḥ haret bali ṣaṣ bhāgam na ca rakṣati putra vat

original: MSS_1079-1 adharmādarjitaṃ dravyam alpakālaṃ tu tiṣṭhati /
