analyzed: adharma a darjitam dravyam alpa kālam tu tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_1079-2 tataḥ sapatnamayate samūlaṃ tena naśyati //
analyzed: tatas sapatnam ayate sa mūlam tena naśyati

original: MSS_1080-1 adharmeṇa ca yaḥ prāha yaścādharmeṇa pṛcchati /
analyzed: adharmeṇa ca yaḥ prāha yaḥ ca adharmeṇa pṛcchati

original: MSS_1080-2 tayoranyataraḥ praiti vidveṣaṃ vādhigacchati //
analyzed: tayoḥ anyataraḥ praiti vidveṣam vā adhigacchati

original: MSS_1081-1 adharmeṇaidhate tāvat tato bhadrāṇi paśyati /
analyzed: adharmeṇa edhate tāvat tatas bhadrāṇi paśyati

original: MSS_1081-2 tataḥ sapatnāñ jayati samūlastu vinaśyati //
analyzed: tatas sapatnām jayati samūlaḥ tu vinaśyati

original: MSS_1082-1 adharmeṣu rasastasya utkledairmadhurāyate /
analyzed: adharmeṣu rasaḥ tasya utkledaiḥ madhurāyate

original: MSS_1082-2 tādṛśaiśca phalaiścaiva saphalo lobhapādapaḥ //
analyzed: tādṛśaiḥ ca phalaiḥ ca eva sa phalaḥ lobha pādapaḥ

original: MSS_1083-1 adharmopacitaṃ vittaṃ harantyanye'lpamedhasaḥ /
analyzed: adharma upacitam vittam haranti anye ilpa medhasaḥ

original: MSS_1083-2 saṃbhojanīyāpadeśair jalānīva jalaukasaḥ //
analyzed: saṃbhojanīya apadeśaiḥ jalāni iva jalaukasaḥ

original: MSS_1084-1 adharmopārjitairarthairyaḥ karotyaurdhvadehikam /
analyzed: adharma upārjitaiḥ arthaiḥ yaḥ karoti aurdhvadehikam

original: MSS_1084-2 na sa tasya phalaṃ pretya bhuṅkte'rthasya durāgamāt //
analyzed: na sa tasya phalam pretya bhuṅkta īrthasya durāgamāt

original: MSS_1085-1 adharṣitānāṃ śūrāṇāṃ samareṣvanivartinām /
analyzed: a dharṣitānām śūrāṇām samareṣu anivartinām

original: MSS_1085-2 dharṣaṇāmarṣaṇaṃ bhīru maraṇādatiricyate //
analyzed: dharṣaṇa marṣaṇam bhīru maraṇāt atiricyate

original: MSS_1086-1 adhaśca dūrapātitvaṃ same lakṣyaṃ suniścitam /
analyzed: adhas ca dūra pāti tvam same lakṣyam su niścitam

original: MSS_1086-2 dṛḍhasphoṭaṃ prakurvīta ūrdhvasaṃsthānayogataḥ //
analyzed: dṛḍha sphoṭam prakurvīta ūrdhva saṃsthāna yogataḥ

original: MSS_1087-1 adhastanaśvabhrabhuvo na yāti ṣaṇ- na sarvanārīṣu na sañjito'nyataḥ /
analyzed: adhastana śvabhra bhuvaḥ na yāti ṣaṣ na sarva nārīṣu na sañjitaḥ unyataḥ

original: MSS_1087-2 na jāyate vyantaradevajātiṣu na bhāvanajyotiṣikeṣu sadruciḥ //
analyzed: na jāyate vyantara deva jātiṣu na bhāvana jyotiṣikeṣu sat ruciḥ

original: MSS_1088-1 adhastācchidritaṃ carma durgandhiparipūritam /
analyzed: adhastāt chidritam carma durgandhi paripūritam

original: MSS_1088-2 mūtraklinnaṃ ca tasyārthe mā rājan brāhmaṇān vadhīḥ //
analyzed: mūtra klinnam ca tasya arthe mā rājan brāhmaṇān vadhīḥ

original: MSS_1089-1 adhākṣīnno laṅkāmayamayamudanvantamatarad viśalyāṃ saumitrairayamupanināyauṣadhivarām /
analyzed: adhākṣīt naḥ laṅkām ayam ayam udanvantam atarat viśalyām saumitraiḥ ayam upanināya oṣadhi varām

original: MSS_1089-2 iti smāraṃ smāraṃ tvadarinagarībhittilikhitaṃ hanūmantaṃ dantairdaśati kupito rākṣasagaṇaḥ //
analyzed: iti smāram smāram tvad ari nagarī bhitti likhitam hanūmantam dantaiḥ daśati kupitaḥ rākṣasa gaṇaḥ

original: MSS_1090-1 adhāri padmeṣu tadaṅghriṇā ghṛṇā kva tacchayacchāyalavo'pi pallave /
analyzed: adhāri padmeṣu tad aṅghriṇā ghṛṇā kva tad śaya chāya lavaḥ api pallave

original: MSS_1090-2 tadāsyadāsye'pi gato'dhikāritāṃ na śāradaḥ pārvikaśarvarīśvaraḥ //
analyzed: tad āsya dāsye pi gata udhikāri tām na śāradaḥ pārvika śarvarī īśvaraḥ

original: MSS_1091-1 adhārmikāṃśca krūrāṃśca dṛṣṭadoṣān nirākṛtān /
analyzed: adhārmikān ca krūrān ca dṛṣṭa doṣān nirākṛtān

original: MSS_1091-2 parebhyo'bhyāgatāṃścaiva dūrādetān vivarjayet //
analyzed: parebhyaḥ abhyāgatān ca eva dūrāt etān vivarjayet

original: MSS_1092-1 adhārmiko naro yo hi yasya cāpyanṛtaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: adhārmikaḥ naraḥ yaḥ hi yasya ca api anṛtam dhanam

original: MSS_1092-2 hiṃsāratiśca yo nityaṃ nehāsau sukhamedhate //
analyzed: hiṃsā ratiḥ ca yaḥ nityam na iha asau sukham edhate

original: MSS_1093-1 adhikaḥ syāt pituḥ putro rūpavidyāparākramaiḥ /
analyzed: adhikaḥ syāt pituḥ putraḥ rūpa vidyā parākramaiḥ

original: MSS_1093-2 tiṣṭhan pitrārjitapade subrahmaṇyastu tādṛśaḥ //
analyzed: tiṣṭhan pitrā arjita pade subrahmaṇyaḥ tu tādṛśaḥ

original: MSS_1094-1 adhikaratalatalpaṃ kalpitasvāpalīlā- parimilananimīlatpāṇḍimā gaṇḍapālī /
analyzed: adhi kara tala talpam kalpita svāpa līlā parimilana nimīlat pāṇḍimā gaṇḍa pālī

original: MSS_1094-2 sutanu kathaya kasya vyañjayatyañjasaiva smaranarapatilīlāyauvarājyābhiṣekam //
analyzed: su tanu kathaya kasya vyañjayati añjasā eva smara narapati līlā yauvarājya abhiṣekam

original: MSS_1095-1 adhikāra ṛṇaṃ garbhaś caturthaṃ śvānamaithunam /
analyzed: adhikāraḥ ṛṇam garbhaḥ caturtham śvāna maithunam

original: MSS_1095-2 āgame paramaṃ saukhyaṃ nirgame duḥkhakāraṇam //
analyzed: āgame paramam saukhyam nirgame duḥkha kāraṇam

original: MSS_1096-1 adhikārābhiṣekeṣu mṛdaṅgavacanaṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: adhikāra abhiṣekeṣu mṛdaṅga vacanam śṛṇu

original: MSS_1096-2 baddhā daṇḍahatā riktā bhaviṣyasi yathā vayam //
analyzed: baddhā daṇḍa hatā riktā bhaviṣyasi yathā vayam

original: MSS_1097-1 adhikāreṇa yo yuktaḥ kathaṃ tasyāsti khaṇḍanam /
analyzed: adhikāreṇa yaḥ yuktaḥ katham tasya asti khaṇḍanam

original: MSS_1097-2 nīceṣūpakṛtaṃ rājan bālukāsviva mudritam //
analyzed: nīceṣu upakṛtam rājan vālukāsu iva mudritam

original: MSS_1098-1 adhikonnatairapi sudāruṇānvitair asakṛdbhramatpaśugaṇāṅghripīḍitaiḥ /
analyzed: adhika unnataiḥ api su dāruṇa anvitaiḥ asakṛt bhramat paśu gaṇa aṅghri pīḍitaiḥ

original: MSS_1098-2 vidhisiddhanaikaguṇasasyasampadāṃ virasasvabhāvakaṭhinairalaṃ khalaiḥ //
analyzed: vidhi siddha nā eka guṇa sasya sampadām virasa svabhāva kaṭhinaiḥ alam khalaiḥ

original: MSS_1099-1 adhigaganamanekāstārakā rājyabhājaḥ pratigṛhamiha dīpā darśayanti prabhutvam /
analyzed: adhi gaganam anekāḥ tārakāḥ rājya bhājaḥ pratigṛham iha dīpāḥ darśayanti prabhu tvam

original: MSS_1099-2 diśi diśi vilasantaḥ santi khadyotapotāḥ savitari paribhūte kiṃ na lokairvyaloki //
analyzed: diśi diśi vilasantaḥ santi khadyota potāḥ savitari paribhūte kim na lokaiḥ vyaloki

original: MSS_1100-1 adhigataparamārthān paṇḍitān māvamaṃsthās tṛṇamiva laghu lakṣmīrnaiva tān saṃruṇaddhi /
analyzed: adhigata parama arthān paṇḍitān mā avamaṃsthāḥ tṛṇam iva laghu lakṣmīḥ na eva tān saṃruṇaddhi

original: MSS_1100-2 abhinavamadalekhāśyāmagaṇḍasthalānāṃ na bhavati bisatanturvāraṇaṃ vāraṇānām //
analyzed: abhinava mada lekhā śyāma gaṇḍa sthalānām na bhavati bisa tantuḥ vāraṇam vāraṇānām

original: MSS_1101-1 adhigatamahimā manuṣyaloke bata sutarāmavasīdati pramādī /
analyzed: adhigata mahimā manuṣya loke bata sutarām avasīdati pramādī

original: MSS_1101-2 gajapatiruruśailaśṛṅgavaṛṣmā gururavamajjati paṅkabhāṅna dāru //
analyzed: gaja patiḥ uru śaila śṛṅga vaṛṣmā guruḥ avamajjati paṅka bhāj na dāru

original: MSS_1102-1 adhigatyedṛgetasyā hṛdayaṃ mṛdutāmucoḥ /
analyzed: adhigatya īdṛś etasyāḥ hṛdayam mṛdu tā mucoḥ

original: MSS_1102-2 pratīma eva vaimukhyaṃ kucayoryuktavṛttayoḥ //
analyzed: pratīmaḥ eva vaimukhyam kucayoḥ yukta vṛttayoḥ

original: MSS_1103-1 adhigamanamanekāstārakā rājamānāḥ pratigṛhamapi dīpāḥ prāpnuvanti pratiṣṭhām /
analyzed: adhigamanam anekāḥ tārakāḥ rājamānāḥ pratigṛham api dīpāḥ prāpnuvanti pratiṣṭhām

original: MSS_1103-2 diśi diśi vikasantaḥ santi khadyotapotāḥ savitari udite'smin kiṃ nu lokairaloki //
analyzed: diśi diśi vikasantaḥ santi khadyota potāḥ savitari udite ismin kim nu lokaiḥ aloki

original: MSS_1104-1 adhigamyāśu golakṣyam ekaḥ śāmyati mārgaṇaḥ /
analyzed: adhigamya āśu go lakṣyam ekaḥ śāmyati mārgaṇaḥ

original: MSS_1104-2 anurodhasthiratayā na ca śakyapratāraṇaḥ //
analyzed: anurodha sthira tayā na ca śakya pratāraṇaḥ

original: MSS_1105-1 adhidehali hanta hemavallī śaradinduḥ sarasīruhe śayānaḥ /
analyzed: adhidehali hanta hema vallī śarad induḥ sarasīruhe śayānaḥ

original: MSS_1105-2 adhikhañjanacañcu mauktikālī phalitaṃ kasya sujanmanastapobhiḥ //
analyzed: adhi khañjana cañcu mauktika ālī phalitam kasya su janmanaḥ tapobhiḥ

original: MSS_1106-1 adhipañcavaṭīkuṭīravarti sphuṭitendīvarasundarorumūrti /
analyzed: adhi pañca vaṭī kuṭīra varti sphuṭita indīvara sundara ūru mūrti

original: MSS_1106-2 api lakṣmaṇalocanaikalakṣyaṃ bhajata brahma saroruhāyatākṣam //
analyzed: api lakṣmaṇa locana eka lakṣyam bhajata brahma saroruha āyata akṣam

original: MSS_1107-1 adhibhillapalligallaṃ syādballavapallavo'pi vācālaḥ /
analyzed: adhibhilla palligallam syāt ballavapallavaḥ api vācālaḥ

original: MSS_1107-2 nāgaranaravarapariṣadi kasya mukhādakṣaraṃ kṣarati //
analyzed: nāgara nara vara pariṣadi kasya mukhāt akṣaram kṣarati

original: MSS_1108-1 adhiyāmini gajagāmini kāmini saudāminīva yaṃ vrajasi /
analyzed: adhiyāmini gaja gāmini kāmini saudāminī iva yam vrajasi

original: MSS_1108-2 jaladeneva na jāne kati kati sukṛtāni tena vihitāni //
analyzed: jaladena iva na jāne kati kati su kṛtāni tena vihitāni

original: MSS_1109-1 adhirajani jagāma dhāma tasyāḥ priyatamayeti ruṣā srajāvanaddhaḥ /
analyzed: adhirajani jagāma dhāma tasyāḥ priyatamayā iti ruṣā srajā avanaddhaḥ

original: MSS_1109-2 padamapi calituṃ yuvā na sehe kimiva na śaktiharaṃ sasādhvasānām //
analyzed: padam api calitum yuvā na sehe kim iva na śakti haram sa sādhvasānām

original: MSS_1110-1 adhirajani priayasavidhe kathmapi saṃveśitā balād gurubhiḥ /
analyzed: adhirajani priaya savidhe kathma api saṃveśitā balāt gurubhiḥ

original: MSS_1110-2 kiṃ bhaviteti saśaṅkaṃ paṅkajanayanā parāmṛśati //
analyzed: kim bhavitā iti sa śaṅkam paṅkaja nayanā parāmṛśati

original: MSS_1111-1 adhirajanimukhe yaḥ sāndralākṣānurāgair vyatikarita ivoccaiḥ pāṭalatvaṃ dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: adhi rajani mukhe yaḥ sāndra lākṣā anurāgaiḥ vyatikaritaḥ iva uccais pāṭala tvam dadhānaḥ

original: MSS_1111-2 uṣasi sa khalu dīpaḥ pānanirdhūtarāgaḥ sphuradadhara ivāyaṃ dhasaratvaṃ bibharti //
analyzed: uṣasi sa khalu dīpaḥ pāna nirdhūta rāgaḥ sphurat adharaḥ iva ayam dhasara tvam bibharti

original: MSS_1112-1 adhirajani vyādhagṛhe sukhamananabhūtamanubhūya /
analyzed: adhirajani vyādha gṛhe sukham anana bhūtam anubhūya

original: MSS_1112-2 apaśokakokamithunaṃ jīvanadānesamullasati /
analyzed: apaśoka koka mithunam

original: MSS_1113-1 adhirohārya pādābhyāṃ pāduke hemabhūṣite /
analyzed: adhiroha ārya pādābhyām pāduke hema bhūṣite

original: MSS_1113-2 ete hi sarvalokasya yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyataḥ //
analyzed: ete hi sarva lokasya yogakṣemam vidhāsyataḥ

original: MSS_1114-1 adhilavaṅgamamī rajasādhikaṃ malinitāḥ sumanodalatālinaḥ /
analyzed: adhi lavaṅgam amī rajasā adhikam malinitāḥ sumanaḥ dala tālinaḥ

original: MSS_1114-2 sphuṭamiti prasavena puro'hasat sapadi kundalatā dalatālinaḥ //
analyzed: sphuṭam iti prasavena puras hasat sapadi kunda latā dala tālinaḥ

original: MSS_1115-1 adhiśrīrudyāne tvamasi bhavataḥ pallavacayo dhurīṇaḥ kalyāṇe tava jagati śākhā śramaharā /
analyzed: adhi śrīḥ udyāne tvam asi bhavataḥ pallava cayaḥ dhurīṇaḥ kalyāṇe tava jagati śākhā śrama harā

original: MSS_1115-2 mude puṣpollekhaḥ phalamapi ca tuṣṭyai tanabhṛtāṃ rasāla tvāṃ tasmāc chrayati śataśaḥ kokilakulam //
analyzed: mude puṣpa ullekhaḥ phalam api ca tuṣṭyai tana bhṛtām rasāla tvām tasmāt śrayati śataśas kokila kulam

original: MSS_1116-1 adhiṣṭhānaṃ samicchanti hyacalaṃ nirbale sati /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhānam samicchanti hi acalam nirbale sati

original: MSS_1116-2 saṃsāre sarvabhūtānāṃ tṛṇabinduvadasthire //
analyzed: saṃsāre sarva bhūtānām tṛṇa bindu vat asthire

original: MSS_1117-1 adhītapañcāśugabāṇavañcane sthitā madantarbahireṣi ceduraḥ /
analyzed: adhīta pañca āśuga bāṇa vañcane sthitā mad antar bahis eṣi ced uraḥ

original: MSS_1117-2 smarāśugebhyo hṛdaya bibhetu na praviśya tattvanmayasapuṭe mama //
analyzed: smara āśugebhyaḥ hṛdaya bibhetu na praviśya tat tvad maya sapuṭe mama

original: MSS_1118-1 adhītavidyairvigate śiśutve dhanorjite hāriṇi yauvane ca /
analyzed: adhīta vidyaiḥ vigate śiśu tve dhana ūrjite hāriṇi yauvane ca

original: MSS_1118-2 sevyā nitambāstu vilāsinīnāṃ tatastadarthaṃ dharaṇīdharāṇām //
analyzed: sevyāḥ nitambāḥ tu vilāsinīnām tatas tad artham dharaṇīdharāṇām

original: MSS_1119-1 adhītasya ca taptasya karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasya ca /
analyzed: adhītasya ca taptasya karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasya ca

original: MSS_1119-2 ṣaṣṭhaṃ bhajati bhāgaṃ tu prajā dharmeṇa pālayan //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham bhajati bhāgam tu prajāḥ dharmeṇa pālayan

original: MSS_1119-3 ṣaḍbhāgasya na bhoktāsau rakṣate na prajāḥ katham //
analyzed: ṣaṣ bhāgasya na bhoktā asau rakṣate na prajāḥ katham

original: MSS_1120-1 adhītibodhācaraṇapracāraṇair daśāścatasraḥ praṇayannupādhibhiḥ /
analyzed: adhīti bodha ācaraṇa pracāraṇaiḥ daśāḥ catasraḥ praṇayan upādhibhiḥ

original: MSS_1120-2 caturdaśatvaṃ kṛtavān kutaḥ svayaṃ na vedmi vidyāsu caturdaśasvayam //
analyzed: caturdaśa tvam kṛtavān kutas svayam na vedmi vidyāsu caturdaśasu ayam

original: MSS_1121-1 adhīte tu mahābhāṣye vyarthā sā padamañjarī /
analyzed: adhīte tu mahābhāṣye vyarthā sā padamañjarī

original: MSS_1121-2 nādhīte tu mahābhāṣye vyarthā sā padamañjarī //
analyzed: na adhīte tu mahābhāṣye vyarthā sā padamañjarī

original: MSS_1122-1 adhītya caturo vedān dharmaśāstrāṇyanekaśaḥ /
analyzed: adhītya caturaḥ vedān dharma śāstrāṇi anekaśas

original: MSS_1122-2 paraṃ tattvaṃ na jānāti darvī pākarasāniva //
analyzed: param tattvam na jānāti darvī pāka rasān iva

original: MSS_1123-1 adhītya caturo vedān vyākṛtyāṣṭādaśa smṛtīḥ /
analyzed: adhītya caturaḥ vedān vyākṛtya aṣṭādaśa smṛtīḥ

original: MSS_1123-2 aho śramasya vaiphalyam ātmāpi kalito na cet //
analyzed: aho śramasya vaiphalyam ātmā api kalitaḥ na ced

original: MSS_1124-1 adhītya nītiṃ yasmācca nītiyukto na dṛśyate /
analyzed: adhītya nītim yasmāt ca nīti yuktaḥ na dṛśyate

original: MSS_1124-2 anabhijñaśca sācivyaṃ gamitaḥ kena hetunā //
analyzed: anabhijñaḥ ca sācivyam gamitaḥ kena hetunā

original: MSS_1125-1 adhītya vedān parisaṃstīrya cāgnīn iṣṭvā yajñaiḥ pālayitvā prajāśca /
analyzed: adhītya vedān parisaṃstīrya ca agnīn iṣṭvā yajñaiḥ pālayitvā prajāḥ ca

original: MSS_1125-2 gobrāhmaṇārthe śastrapūtāntarātmā hataḥ saṃgrame kṣatriyaḥ svargameti //
analyzed: go brāhmaṇa arthe śastra pūta antarātmā hataḥ saṃgrame kṣatriyaḥ svargam eti

original: MSS_1126-1 adhītya sakalaṃ śrutaṃ ceramupāsya ghoraṃ tapo yadicchasi phalaṃ tayoraha hi lābhapūjādikam /
analyzed: adhītya sakalam śrutam ceram upāsya ghoram tapaḥ yat icchasi phalam tayoḥ aha hi lābha pūjā ādikam

original: MSS_1126-2 chinatsi tarupallavaprasarameva śūnyāśayaḥ kathaṃ samupalipsate surasamasya pakvaṃ phalam /
analyzed: chinatsi taru pallava prasaram eva śūnya āśayaḥ katham samupalipsate surasam asya pakvam phalam

original: MSS_1127-1 adhītyedaṃ yathāśāstraṃ naro jānāti sattamaḥ /
analyzed: adhītya idam yathāśāstram naraḥ jānāti sattamaḥ

original: MSS_1127-2 dharmopadeśavikhyātaṃ kāryākāryaṃ śubhāśubham //
analyzed: dharma upadeśa vikhyātam kārya akāryam śubha aśubham

original: MSS_1128-1 adhīyate vijānanti virajyanti muhurmuhuḥ /
analyzed: adhīyate vijānanti virajyanti muhur muhur

original: MSS_1128-2 nātyantāya nivartante narā vaṣamyato vidheḥ //
analyzed: na atyantāya nivartante narāḥ vaṣamyataḥ vidheḥ

original: MSS_1129-1 adhīyīta brāhmaṇo'tho yajeta dadyādiyāt tīrthamukhyāni caiva /
analyzed: adhīyīta brāhmaṇā utho yajeta dadyāt iyāt tīrtha mukhyāni ca eva

original: MSS_1129-2 adhyāpayedyājayeccāpi yājyān pratigrahān vā viditān pratīcchet //
analyzed: adhyāpayet yājayet ca api yājyān pratigrahān vā viditān pratīcchet

original: MSS_1130-1 tathā rājanyo rakṣaṇaṃ vai prajānāṃ kṛtvā dharmeṇāprayatto'tha dattvā /
analyzed: tathā rājanyaḥ rakṣaṇam vai prajānām kṛtvā dharmeṇa aprayattaḥ utha dattvā

original: MSS_1130-2 yajñairiṣṭvā sarvavedānadhītya dārān kṛtvā puṇyakṛdāvased gṛhān //
analyzed: yajñaiḥ iṣṭvā sarva vedān adhītya dārān kṛtvā puṇya kṛt āvaset gṛhān

original: MSS_1131-1 vaiśyo'dhītya kṛṣigorakṣapaṇyair vittaṃ cinvan pālayannapramattaḥ /
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ adhītya kṛṣi gorakṣa paṇyaiḥ vittam cinvan pālayan apramattaḥ

original: MSS_1131-2 priyaṃ kurvan brāhmaṇakṣatriyāṇāṃ dharmaśīlaḥ puṇyakṛdāvased gṛhān //
analyzed: priyam kurvan brāhmaṇa kṣatriyāṇām dharma śīlaḥ puṇya kṛt āvaset gṛhān

original: MSS_1132-1 paricaryāṃ vandanaṃ brāhmāṇānāṃ nādhīyīta pratiṣiddho'sya yajñaḥ /
analyzed: paricaryām vandanam brāhmāṇānām na adhīyīta pratiṣiddhaḥ usya yajñaḥ

original: MSS_1132-2 nityotthito bhūtaye'tandritahaḥ syād eṣa smṛtaḥ śūdradharmaḥ purāṇaḥ //
analyzed: nitya utthitaḥ syāt eṣa smṛtaḥ śūdra dharmaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: MSS_1133-1 adhīraḥ karkaśaḥ stabdhaḥ kucelaḥ svayamāgataḥ /
analyzed: adhīraḥ karkaśaḥ stabdhaḥ ku celaḥ svayam āgataḥ

original: MSS_1133-2 ete pañca na pūjyante bṛhaspatisamā yadi //
analyzed: ete pañca na pūjyante bṛhaspati samāḥ yadi

original: MSS_1134-1 adhīrākṣyāḥ pīnastanakalaśamāskandasi muhuḥ kramādūrudvandvaṃ kalayasi ca lāvaṇyalalitam /
analyzed: adhīra akṣyāḥ pīna stana kalaśam āskandasi muhur kramāt ūru dvandvam kalayasi ca lāvaṇya lalitam

original: MSS_1134-2 bhujāśliṣṭo harṣādanubhavasi hastāhatikalām idaṃ vīṇādaṇḍaṃ prakaṭaya phalaṃ kasya tapasaḥ //
analyzed: bhuja āśliṣṭaḥ harṣāt anubhavasi hasta āhati kalām idam vīṇā daṇḍam prakaṭaya phalam kasya tapasaḥ

original: MSS_1135-1 adhunā dadhimanthanānubandhaṃ kuruṣe kiṃ guruvibhramālasāṅgi /
analyzed: adhunā dadhi manthana anubandham kuruṣe kim guru vibhrama alasa aṅgi

original: MSS_1135-2 kalaśastani lālasīti kuñje muralīkomalakākalī murāreḥ //
analyzed: kalaśa stani lālasī iti kuñje muralī komala kākalī murāreḥ

original: MSS_1136-1 adhunā madhukarapatinā gilito'pyapakāradaṃpatī yena /
analyzed: adhunā madhukara patinā gilitaḥ upi apakāra daṃpatī yena

original: MSS_1136-2 trātaḥ sa pālayettvāṃ vikārarahito vināyako lakṣmyāḥ //
analyzed: trātaḥ sa pālayet tvām vikāra rahitaḥ vināyakaḥ lakṣmyāḥ

original: MSS_1137-1 adhṛtaparipatannicolabandhaṃ muṣitanakāramavakradṛṣṭipātaṃ /
analyzed: a dhṛta paripatat nicola bandham muṣita nakāram avakra dṛṣṭi pātam

original: MSS_1137-2 prakaṭahasitamunnatāsyabimbaṃ purasudṛśaḥsmaraceṣṭitaṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: prakaṭa hasitam unnata āsya bimbam pura sudṛśaḥ smara ceṣṭitam smarāmi

original: MSS_1138-1 adhṛta yadvirahoṣmaṇi sajjitaṃ manasijena tadūruyugaṃ tadā /
analyzed: adhṛta yat viraha ūṣmaṇi sajjitam manasijena tad ūru yugam tadā

original: MSS_1138-2 spṛśati tatkadanaṃ kadalītarur yadi marujvaladūṣaradūṣitaḥ //
analyzed: spṛśati tad kadanam kadalī taruḥ yadi maru jvalat ūṣara dūṣitaḥ

original: MSS_1139-1 adhogatiṃ ca samprāpya bisāḥ paṅkakalaṅkitāḥ /
analyzed: adhogatim ca samprāpya bisāḥ paṅka kalaṅkitāḥ

original: MSS_1139-2 guṇino nirguṇairdāśaiḥ kṛṣṭāḥ svāṅkuradarśitāḥ //
analyzed: guṇinaḥ nirguṇaiḥ dāśaiḥ kṛṣṭāḥ sva aṅkura darśitāḥ

original: MSS_1140-1 adhodṛṣṭinairkṛtikaḥ svārthasādhanatatparaḥ /
MSS_1140-2 śaṭho mithyāvinītaśca bakavratacaro dvijaḥ //
analyzed: śaṭhaḥ mithyā vinītaḥ ca bakavrata caraḥ dvijaḥ

original: MSS_1141-1 adho'dhaḥ paśyataḥ kasya mahimā nopacīyate /
analyzed: adhodhas paśyataḥ kasya mahimā na upacīyate

original: MSS_1141-2 uparyupari paśyantaḥ sarva eva daridrati //
analyzed: upari upari paśyantaḥ sarve eva daridrati

original: MSS_1142-1 adhomukhī strīstanatulyatāptaye pratapya tīvraṃ sumahattaraṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: adhomukhī strī stana tulya tā āptaye pratapya tīvram su mahattaram tapaḥ

original: MSS_1142-2 yadā na tāmāpa tadā hṛdi sphuṭaṃ vidīryate pakvamiṣeṇa dāḍimaḥ //
analyzed: yadā na tām āpa tadā hṛdi sphuṭam vidīryate pakva miṣeṇa dāḍimaḥ

original: MSS_1143-1 adhomukhaikadaṃṣṭreṇa viṣaśukrapravāhiṇā /
analyzed: adhomukha eka daṃṣṭreṇa viṣa śukra pravāhiṇā

original: MSS_1143-2 anena duścikitsyena jagaddaṣṭaṃ bhagāhinā //
analyzed: anena duścikitsyena jagat daṣṭam bhaga ahinā

original: MSS_1144-1 adho'rdhe lakṣaṇaṃ yasya parārdhe naiva dṛśyate /
analyzed: adhordhe lakṣaṇam yasya parārdhe nā eva dṛśyate

original: MSS_1144-2 adhamaḥ sa bhavet khaṅgaḥ kṣitīśānāṃ bhayāvahaḥ //
analyzed: adhamaḥ sa bhavet khaṅgaḥ kṣitīśānām bhaya āvahaḥ

original: MSS_1145-1 adho'rdhe varṇa ekaḥ syād ūrdhvārdhe bhinnavarṇakaḥ /
MSS_1145-2 varṇasaṃkaravān khaḍgo nṛpāṇāṃ bhayavardhanaḥ //
analyzed: varṇa saṃkaravān khaḍgaḥ nṛpāṇām bhaya vardhanaḥ

original: MSS_1146-1 adhovidhānāt kamalapravālayoḥ śiraḥsu dānādakhilakṣamābhujām /
analyzed: adhas vidhānāt kamala pravālayoḥ śiraḥsu dānāt akhila kṣamā bhujām

original: MSS_1146-2 puredamūrdhvaṃ bhavatīti vedhasā padaṃ kimasyāṅkitamūrdhvarekhayā //
analyzed: purā idam ūrdhvam bhavati iti vedhasā padam kim asya aṅkitam ūrdhva rekhayā

original: MSS_1147-1 adhyayanamitrasaṅga- praveśayātrāvivāhadāneṣu /
analyzed: adhyayana mitra saṅga praveśa yātrā vivāha dāneṣu

original: MSS_1147-2 śubhakāryeṣvakhileṣvapi śastaḥ somādhvagaḥ pavanaḥ //
analyzed: śubha kāryeṣu akhileṣu api śastaḥ soma adhva gaḥ pavanaḥ

original: MSS_1148-1 adhyastāndhyamapūrvamarthadhiṣaṇairgrāhyaṃ pumarthāspadaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇabhedataḥ śrutigataṃ nirdhūtasādhyārthakam /
analyzed: adhyasta āndhyam apūrvam artha dhiṣaṇaiḥ grāhyam pumartha āspadam lakṣyam lakṣaṇa bhedataḥ śruti gatam nirdhūta sādhya arthakam

original: MSS_1148-2 āmnāyāntavibhātaviśvavibhavaṃ sarvāviruddhaṃ paraṃ satyaṃ jñānamanarthasārthavidhuraṃ brahma prapadye sadom //
analyzed: āmnāya anta vibhāta viśva vibhavam sarva a viruddham param satyam jñānam anartha sārtha vidhuram brahma prapadye sadā om

original: MSS_1149-1 adhyākrāntā vasatiramunāpyāśramaṃ sarvabhogye rakṣāyogādayamapi tapaḥ pratyahaṃ saṃcinoti /
analyzed: adhyākrāntā vasatiḥ amunā api āśramam sarva bhogye rakṣā yogāt ayam api tapaḥ pratyaham saṃcinoti

original: MSS_1149-2 asyāpi dyāṃ spṛśati vaśinaścāraṇadvandvagītaḥ puṇyaḥ śabdo muniriti muhuḥ kevalaṃ rājapūrvaḥ //
analyzed: asya api dyām spṛśati vaśinaḥ cāraṇa dvandva gītaḥ puṇyaḥ śabdaḥ muniḥ iti muhur kevalam rājapūrvaḥ

original: MSS_1150-1 adhyāpayanti śāstrāṇi tṛṇīkurvanti paṇḍitān /
analyzed: adhyāpayanti śāstrāṇi tṛṇīkurvanti paṇḍitān

original: MSS_1150-2 vismārayanti jātiṃ svāṃ varāṭāḥ pañcaṣāḥ kare //
analyzed: vismārayanti jātim svām varāṭāḥ pañcaṣāḥ kare

original: MSS_1151-1 adhyāpitasyośanasāpi nītiṃ prayuktarāgapraṇidhirdviṣaste /
analyzed: adhyāpitasya uśanasā api nītim prayukta rāga praṇidhiḥ dviṣaḥ te

original: MSS_1151-2 kasyārthadharmau vada pīḍayāmi sindhostaṭāvogha iva pravṛddhaḥ //
analyzed: kasya artha dharmau vada pīḍayāmi sindhoḥ taṭau oghaḥ iva pravṛddhaḥ

original: MSS_1152-1 adhyāpito'si kenaitāṃ maśaka kṣudratāmiha /
analyzed: adhyāpitaḥ asi kena etām maśaka kṣudra tām iha

original: MSS_1152-2 yasyaiva karṇe lagasi pīḍāṃ tasya karoṣi yat //
analyzed: yasya eva karṇe lagasi pīḍām tasya karoṣi yat

original: MSS_1153-1 adhyāyodhanavedi mārgaṇakuśānāstīrya khaḍgasrucā hutvāreḥ palalaṃ caruṃ havirasṛk tanmastakasvastikaiḥ /
analyzed: adhi āyodhana vedi mārgaṇa kuśān āstīrya khaḍga srucā hutvā areḥ palalam carum haviḥ asṛj tad mastaka svastikaiḥ

original: MSS_1153-2 saṃveṣṭyāhavanīyamānasadasi khyo'sau pratāpānalo- 'sthāpi drāgudakāñjalīkṛtacatuḥpāthodhinā śrīmatā //
analyzed: saṃveṣṭya āhavanīya māna sadasi sthāpi drāk udaka añjalīkṛta catur pāthodhinā śrīmatā

original: MSS_1154-1 adhyāsāmāsuruttuṅgahemapīṭhāni yānyamī /
analyzed: adhyāsāmāsuḥ uttuṅga hema pīṭhāni yāni amī

original: MSS_1154-2 tairūhe kesarikrāntatrikūṭaśikharopamā //
analyzed: taiḥ ūhe kesari krānta trikūṭa śikhara upamā

original: MSS_1155-1 adhyāsite vayasyāyā bhavatā mahatā hṛdi /
analyzed: adhyāsite vayasyāyāḥ bhavatā mahatā hṛdi

original: MSS_1155-2 stanāvantarasaṃmāntau niṣkrāntau brūmahe bahiḥ //
analyzed: stanau antara saṃmāntau niṣkrāntau brūmahe bahis

original: MSS_1156-1 adhyāsīnāśvavārairupajanitabhaye heṣamāṇaisturaṅgair garjatsphūrjanmahaujotkaṭakaraṭighaṭākoṭibhirduṣpraveśe/
analyzed: adhyāsīna aśvavāraiḥ upajanita bhaye heṣamāṇaiḥ turaṅgaiḥ garjat sphūrjat mahā ojaḥ utkaṭa karaṭi ghaṭā koṭibhiḥ duṣpraveśe

original: MSS_1156-2 saṃgrāme kalpakalpe'pyarijanavisarairmārgaṇaśreṇibaddhe badhye'vadhye nṛpe'pi prabhavati yavasaṃ prāṇaviśrāṇanāya //
analyzed: saṃgrāme kalpa kalpe api ari jana visaraiḥ mārgaṇa śreṇi baddhe badhye vadhye nṛpe api prabhavati yavasam prāṇa viśrāṇanāya

original: MSS_1157-1 adhyāsya śāntāṃ kukubhaṃ śrgālī narasya vāmā yadi rāraṭīti /
analyzed: adhyāsya śāntām kukubham śrgālī narasya vāmā yadi rāraṭīti

original: MSS_1157-2 tadarthalābhaṃ vitaratyavaśyam arthakṣayaṃ dakṣiṇato raṭantī //
analyzed: tad artha lābham vitarati avaśyam artha kṣayam dakṣiṇatas raṭantī

original: MSS_1158-1 adhyāsya saurabheyaṃ mauktikaruciraṅgaṇeṣu vihitagatiḥ mānyaḥ sa eva hṛdi me gaurī vāmāṅgamāśritā yasya //
analyzed: adhyāsya saurabheyam mauktika ruciḥ aṅgaṇeṣu vihita gatiḥ mānyaḥ saḥ eva hṛdi me gaurī vāma aṅgam āśritā yasya

original: MSS_1159-1 adhyāhāraḥ smaraharaśiraścandraśeṣasya śeṣa- syāherbhūyaḥ phaṇasamucitaḥ kāyayaṣṭīnikāyaḥ /
analyzed: adhyāhāraḥ smarahara śiraḥ candra śeṣasya śeṣa sya aheḥ bhūyas phaṇa samucitaḥ kāya yaṣṭī nikāyaḥ

original: MSS_1159-2 dugdhāmbhodhermuniculukanatrāsanāśābhyupāyaḥ kāyavyūhaḥ kva jagati na jāgartyadaḥ kīrtipūraḥ //
analyzed: dugdha ambhodheḥ muni culukana trāsa nāśa abhyupāyaḥ kāya vyūhaḥ kva jagati na jāgarti adaḥ kīrti pūraḥ

original: MSS_1160-1 adhyeti nṛtyati lunāti minoti nauti krīṇāti hanti vapate cinute bibheti /
analyzed: adhyeti nṛtyati lunāti minoti nauti krīṇāti hanti vapate cinute bibheti

original: MSS_1160-2 muṣṇāti gāyati dhinoti bibharti bhinte lobhena sīvyati paṇāyati yācate ca //
analyzed: muṣṇāti gāyati dhinoti bibharti bhinte lobhena sīvyati paṇāyati yācate ca

original: MSS_1161-1 adhruveṇa śarīreṇa pratikṣaṇavināśinā /
analyzed: adhruveṇa śarīreṇa pratikṣaṇa vināśinā

original: MSS_1161-2 dhruvaṃ yo nārjayeddharmaṃ sa śocyo mūḍhacetanaḥ //
analyzed: dhruvam yaḥ na arjayet dharmam sa śocyaḥ mūḍha cetanaḥ

original: MSS_1162-1 adhruve hi śarīre yo na karoti tapo'rjanam /
analyzed: adhruve hi śarīre yaḥ na karoti tapoḥ janam

original: MSS_1162-2 sa paścāttapyate mūḍho mṛto gatvātmano gatim //
analyzed: sa paścāt tapyate mūḍhaḥ mṛtaḥ gatvā ātmanaḥ gatim

original: MSS_1163-1 adhvaklāntatanurnavajvaravatī nṛtyaślathāṅgī tathā māsaikaprasavā dadāti surate ṣaṇmāsagarbhā sukham /
analyzed: adhva klānta tanuḥ nava jvaravatī nṛtya ślatha aṅgī tathā māsa eka prasavā dadāti surate ṣaṣ māsa garbhā sukham

original: MSS_1163-2 vikhyātā virahasya saṃgamavidhau kruddhaprasanne ṛtu- sthāne nūtanasaṃgame madhumade rāgāspadaṃ yoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: vikhyātāḥ virahasya saṃgama vidhau kruddha prasanne ṛtu sthāne nūtana saṃgame madhu made rāga āspadam yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_1164-1 adhvani padagrahaparaṃ madayati hṛdayaṃ na vā na vā śravaṇam /
analyzed: adhvani pada graha param madayati hṛdayam na vā na vā śravaṇam

original: MSS_1164-2 kāvyamabhijñasabhāyāṃ mañjīraṃ kelivelāyām //
analyzed: kāvyam abhijña sabhāyām mañjīram keli velāyām

original: MSS_1165-1 adhvanīno'tithirjñeyaḥ śrotriyo vedapāragaḥ /
analyzed: adhvanīna utithiḥ jñeyaḥ śrotriyaḥ vedapāragaḥ

original: MSS_1165-2 mānyāvetau gṛhasthasya brahmalokamabhīpsataḥ //
analyzed: mānyau etau gṛhasthasya brahma lokam abhīpsataḥ

original: MSS_1166-1 adhvanyadhvani taravaḥ pathi pathi pathikairupāsyate chāyā /
analyzed: adhvani adhvani taravaḥ pathi pathi pathikaiḥ upāsyate chāyā

original: MSS_1166-2 viralaḥ sa ko'pi viṭapī yamadhvago gṛhagataḥ smarati //
analyzed: viralaḥ sa kopi viṭapī yam adhvagaḥ gṛha gataḥ smarati

original: MSS_1167-1 adhvanyadhvani bhūruhaḥ phalabṛto namrānupekṣyādarād dūrādunnatisaṃśrayavyasaninaḥ pānthasya mugdhātmanaḥ /
analyzed: adhvani adhvani bhūruhaḥ phala bṛtaḥ namrān upekṣya ādarāt dūrāt unnati saṃśraya vyasaninaḥ pānthasya mugdha ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_1167-2 yanmūlaṃ samupāgatasya madhuracchāyāphalaiḥ kā kathā śīrṇenāpi hi nopayogamagamat parṇena tāladrumaḥ //
analyzed: yat mūlam samupāgatasya madhura chāyā phalaiḥ kā kathā śīrṇena api hi nā upayogam agamat parṇena tāla drumaḥ

original: MSS_1168-1 adhvanyasya vadhūrviyogavidhurā bhartuḥ smarantī yadi prāṇānujjhati kasya tanmahadaho saṃjāyate kilbiṣam /
analyzed: adhvani asya vadhūḥ viyoga vidhurā bhartuḥ smarantī yadi prāṇān ujjhati kasya tat mahat aho saṃjāyate kilbiṣam

original: MSS_1168-2 ityevaṃ pathikaḥ karoti hṛdaye yāvat tarormūrdhani prodghuṣṭaṃ parapuṣṭayā tava tavetyuccairvaco'nekaśaḥ //
analyzed: iti evam pathikaḥ karoti hṛdaye yāvat taroḥ mūrdhani prodghuṣṭam parapuṣṭayā tava tava iti uccais vacaḥ anekaśas

original: MSS_1169-1 adhvanyāḥ kila mūlagartamadhunāpyāpūrayantyaśrubhir vyākrośantyadhunā sabāndhavakulāḥ sāyaṃ muhūrtaṃ dvijāḥ /
analyzed: adhvanyāḥ kila mūla gartam adhunā api āpūrayanti aśrubhiḥ vyākrośanti adhunā sa bāndhava kulāḥ sāyam muhūrtam dvijāḥ

original: MSS_1169-2 itthaṃ yāvadimāni bibhrati śucaṃ bhūtānyapi tvatkṛte tāvattvaṃ na gato'si pādapa ciraṃ kīrtyātmanā vartase //
analyzed: ittham yāvat imāni bibhrati śucam bhūtāni api tvad kṛte tāvat tvam na gataḥ asi pādapa ciram kīrti ātmanā vartase

original: MSS_1170-1 adhvanyānāṃ śiśirasamaye caṇḍacāṇḍālakāṇḍa- prāyāḥ kāyānahaha pavanāḥ kleśayanto viśanti /
analyzed: adhvanyānām śiśira samaye caṇḍa cāṇḍāla kāṇḍa prāyāḥ kāyān ahaha pavanāḥ kleśayantaḥ viśanti

original: MSS_1170-2 badhnantyete sapadi sudṛśāṃ durbhagānāmapīha prauḍhāśleṣāślathitadayitaṃ mūrdhni saubhāgyapaṭṭam //
analyzed: badhnanti ete sapadi sudṛśām durbhagānām api iha prauḍha āśleṣa āślathita dayitam mūrdhni saubhāgya paṭṭam

original: MSS_1171-1 adhvanyān kati rundhate kati dṛdhān bhindanti toyākarān kedārān kati yajjayanti kati ca vyāpāṭayanti drumān /
analyzed: adhvanyān kati rundhate kati dṛdhān bhindanti toyākarān kedārān kati yajjayanti kati ca vyāpāṭayanti drumān

original: MSS_1171-2 vāhinyaḥ kṣaṇaluptavārivibhavā vanyā avanyāmimā yaḥ sindhuḥ sakalāśrayaḥ sa tu punaḥ kutreti na jñāyate //
analyzed: vāhinyaḥ kṣaṇa lupta vāri vibhavāḥ vanyāḥ avanyām imāḥ yaḥ sindhuḥ sakala āśrayaḥ sa tu punar kutra iti na jñāyate

original: MSS_1172-1 adhvanyairmakarandaśīkarasurāmattakvaṇatkokile mārge mārganirodhinī parihṛtā śaṅke'śubhāśaṅkayā /
analyzed: adhvanyaiḥ makaranda śīkara surā matta kvaṇat kokile mārge mārga nirodhinī parihṛtā śaṅkeśubha āśaṅkayā

original: MSS_1172-2 pānthastrīvadhapātakādupagataṃ caṇḍālacihnaṃ madhor eṣā kiṅkiṇikeva ṣaṭpadamayī jhaṃkāriṇī saṃhatiḥ //
analyzed: pāntha strī vadha pātakāt upagatam caṇḍāla cihnam madhoḥ eṣā kiṅkiṇikā iva ṣaṭpada mayī jhaṃkāriṇī saṃhatiḥ

original: MSS_1173-1 adhvaśramāya caraṇau virahāya dārā abhyarthanāya vacanaṃ ca vapurjarāyai /
analyzed: adhva śramāya caraṇau virahāya dārāḥ abhyarthanāya vacanam ca vapuḥ jarāyai

original: MSS_1173-2 etāni me vidadhatastava sarvadaiva dhātastrapā yadi na kiṃ na pariśramo'pi //
analyzed: etāni me vidadhataḥ tava sarvadā eva dhātar trapā yadi na kim na pariśramaḥ api

original: MSS_1174-1 adhvaśrāntamavijñātam atithiṃ kṣutpipāsitam /
analyzed: adhva śrāntam avijñātam atithim kṣudh pipāsitam

original: MSS_1174-2 yastaṃ na pūjayed bhaktyā tamāhurbrahmaghātinam //
analyzed: yaḥ tam na pūjayet bhaktyā tam āhuḥ brahma ghātinam

original: MSS_1175-1 adhvāgrajāgrannibhṛtāpadandhur bandhuryadi syāt pratibandhumarhaḥ /
analyzed: bandhuḥ yadi syāt pratibandhum arhaḥ

original: MSS_1175-2 joṣaṃ janaḥ kāryavidastu vastu pracchyā nijecchā padavīṃ mudastu //
analyzed: joṣam janaḥ kārya vid astu vastu pracchyā nija icchā padavīm mud astu

original: MSS_1176-1 adhvā jarā dehavatāṃ parvatānāṃ jalaṃ jarā /
analyzed: adhvā jarā dehavatām parvatānām jalam jarā

original: MSS_1176-2 asaṃbhogo jarā strīṇāṃ vākśalyaṃ manaso jarā //
analyzed: asaṃbhogaḥ jarā strīṇām vāc śalyam manasaḥ jarā

original: MSS_1177-1 adhvā jarā manuṣyāṇām anadhvā vājināṃ jarā /
analyzed: adhvā jarā manuṣyāṇām an adhvā vājinām jarā

original: MSS_1177-2 amaithunaṃ jarā strīṇām aśvānāṃ maithunaṃ jarā //
analyzed: a maithunam jarā strīṇām aśvānām maithunam jarā

original: MSS_1178-1 adhvānaṃ naikacakraḥ prabhavati bhuvanabhrāntidīrghaṃ vilaṅghya prātaḥ prāptuṃratho me punariti manasi nyastacintātibhāraḥ /
analyzed: adhvānam nā eka cakraḥ prabhavati bhuvana bhrānti dīrgham vilaṅghya prātar prāptum rathaḥ me punar iti manasi nyasta cintā atibhāraḥ

original: MSS_1178-2 saṃdhyākṛṣṭāvaśiṣṭasvakaraparikaraiḥ spaṣṭahemārapaṅkti vyākṛṣyāvasthito'stakṣitibhṛti nayatīvaiṣa dikcakramarkaḥ //
analyzed: saṃdhyā ākṛṣṭa avaśiṣṭa sva kara parikaraiḥ spaṣṭa hema āra paṅkti vyākṛṣya avasthita usta kṣitibhṛti nayati iva eṣa diś cakram arkaḥ

original: MSS_1179-1 adhvā na yadi nisaṅgapaṅkasaṃkulito bhavet /
analyzed: adhvā na yadi nisaṅga paṅka saṃkulitaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_1179-2 tataḥ kutaste dhaureya dhuryatā vyajyatāmiyam //
analyzed: tatas kutas te dhaureya dhurya tā vyajyatām iyam

original: MSS_1180-1 advāreṇa viśantyeva buddhimanto riporgṛham /
analyzed: advāreṇa viśanti eva buddhimantaḥ ripoḥ gṛham

original: MSS_1180-2 akṛtvā dharṣaṇāṃ pūrvaṃ kathaṃ yuddhaṃ pravartate //
analyzed: a kṛtvā dharṣaṇām pūrvam katham yuddham pravartate

original: MSS_1181-1 anakṣaraṃ rūpamiha kṣarantī pañcāśadarṇairamṛtāmbupūrṇaiḥ /
analyzed: anakṣaram rūpam iha kṣarantī pañcāśat arṇaiḥ amṛta ambu pūrṇaiḥ

original: MSS_1181-2 vyākīrṇavidhyamaṇḍamadantarālā (?)
analyzed: vyākīrṇa vidhya maṇḍamat antarālā

original: śabdātmikā māmavatāt samantāt //
analyzed: śabda ātmikā mām avatāt samantāt

original: MSS_1182-1 anakṣarajñena janena sakhyaṃ saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ duṣprabhusevanaṃ ca /
analyzed: an akṣara jñena janena sakhyam saṃbhāṣaṇam duṣprabhu sevanam ca

original: MSS_1182-2 āliṅganaṃ lambapayodharāṇāṃ pratyakṣaduḥkhaṃ trayameva bhūmau //
analyzed: āliṅganam lamba payodharāṇām pratyakṣa duḥkham trayam eva bhūmau

original: MSS_1183-1 anaṅkuritakūrcakaḥ sa tu sitopalāḍhyaṃ payaḥ sa eva dhṛtakūcakaḥ salavaṇāmbutakropamaḥ /
analyzed: an aṅkurita kūrcakaḥ sa tu sitopala āḍhyam payaḥ saḥ eva dhṛta kūcakaḥ sa lavaṇa ambu takra upamaḥ

original: MSS_1183-2 sa eva sitakūrcakaḥ kvathitaguggulodvegakṛd bhavanti hariṇīdṛśāṃ priyatameṣu bhāvāstrayaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eva sitakūrcakaḥ kvathita guggula udvega kṛt bhavanti hariṇī dṛśām priyatameṣu bhāvāḥ trayaḥ

original: MSS_1184-1 anaṅgaḥ pañcabhiḥ puṣpair viśvaṃ vyajayateṣubhiḥ /
analyzed: anaṅgaḥ pañcabhiḥ puṣpaiḥ viśvam vyajayata iṣubhiḥ

original: MSS_1184-2 ityasaṃbhāvyamathavā vicitrā vastuśaktayaḥ //
analyzed: iti asaṃbhāvyam athavā vicitrāḥ vastu śaktayaḥ

original: MSS_1185-1 anaṅgatāpapraśamāya tasya kadarthyamānā muhurāmṛṇālam /
analyzed: anaṅga tāpa praśamāya tasya kadarthyamānā muhur āmṛṇālam

original: MSS_1185-2 madhau madhau nākanadīnalinyo varaṃ vahantāṃ śiśire'nurāgam //
analyzed: madhau madhau nāka nadī nalinyaḥ varam vahantām śiśirenu rāgam

original: MSS_1186-1 anaṅga palitaṃ mūrdhni paśyaitad vijayadhvajam /
analyzed: anaṅga palitam mūrdhni paśya etat vijaya dhvajam

original: MSS_1186-2 idānīṃ jitamasmābhis tavākiṃcitkarāḥ śarāḥ //
analyzed: idānīm jitam asmābhiḥ tava akiṃcitkarāḥ śarāḥ

original: MSS_1187-1 anaṅgabāṇākulitasya śaṃbhoḥ śiro bhavānīcaraṇe'tinamram /
analyzed: anaṅga bāṇa ākulitasya śaṃbhoḥ śiraḥ bhavānī caraṇa iti namram

original: MSS_1187-2 vilokya kāciccaraṇe carantī pipīlikā cumbati candrabimbam //
analyzed: vilokya kācid caraṇe carantī pipīlikā cumbati candra bimbam

original: MSS_1188-1 anaṅgamaṅgalagṛhāpāṅgabhaṅgitaraṅgitaiḥ /
analyzed: anaṅga maṅgala gṛha apāṅga bhaṅgi taraṅgitaiḥ

original: MSS_1188-2 āliṅgitaḥ sa tanvaṅgyā kārtārthyaṃ labhate kadā //
analyzed: āliṅgitaḥ sa tanvaṅgyā kārtārthyam labhate kadā

original: MSS_1189-1 anaṅgamaṅgalabhuvas tadapāṅgasya bhaṅgayaḥ /
MSS_1189-2 janayanti muhuryūnām antaḥsaṃtāpasaṃtatim //
analyzed: janayanti muhur yūnām antar saṃtāpa saṃtatim

original: MSS_1190-1 anaṅgamaṅgalārambhakumbhāviva payodharau /
analyzed: anaṅga maṅgala ārambha kumbhau iva payodharau

original: MSS_1190-2 kasya nārtiharau tasyāḥ karapallavasaṃvṛtau //
analyzed: kasya nā ārti harau tasyāḥ kara pallava saṃvṛtau

original: MSS_1191-1 anaṅgaraṅgapīṭho'syāḥ śṛṅgārasvarṇaviṣṭaraḥ /
MSS_1191-2 lāvaṇyasārasaṃghātaḥ sā ghanā jaghanasthalī //
analyzed: lāvaṇya sāra saṃghātaḥ sā ghanā jaghana sthalī

original: MSS_1192-1 anaṅgaraṅgapratimaṃ tadaṅgaṃ bhaṅgībhiraṅgīkṛtamānatāṅgyāḥ /
analyzed: anaṅga raṅga pratimam tad aṅgam bhaṅgībhiḥ aṅgīkṛta mānata aṅgyāḥ

original: MSS_1192-2 kurvanti yūnāṃ sahasā yathaitāḥ svāntāni śāntāparacintanāni //
analyzed: kurvanti yūnām sahasā yathā etāḥ svāntāni śānta apara cintanāni

original: MSS_1193-1 anaṅgarasacāturīcapalacārucelāñcalaś calanmakarakuṇḍalasphuritakāntigaṇḍasthalaḥ /
analyzed: anaṅga rasa cāturī capala cāru cela añcalaḥ calat makara kuṇḍala sphurita kānti gaṇḍa sthalaḥ

original: MSS_1193-2 vrajollasitanāgarīnikararāsalāsyotsukaḥ sa me sapadi mānase sphuratu ko'pi gopālakaḥ //
analyzed: vraja ullasita nāgarī nikara rāsa lāsya utsukaḥ sa me sapadi mānase sphuratu kaḥ pi gopālakaḥ

original: MSS_1194-1 anaṅgalaṅghanālagnanānātaṅkā sadaṅganā /
MSS_1194-2 sadānagha sadānanda natāṅgāsaṅgasaṃgata //
analyzed: sadā anagha sadā ānanda nata aṅga asaṅga saṃgata

original: MSS_1195-1 anaṅgaśastrāṇi natāṅgi tīkṣṇatāṃ nayatyayaskāra ivāmbudāgamaḥ /
analyzed: anaṅga śastrāṇi nata aṅgi tīkṣṇa tām nayati ayaskāraḥ iva ambuda āgamaḥ

original: MSS_1195-2 malīmasāṅgārarucāṃ payomucāṃ tathāhi madhye jvalitastaḍicchikhī //
analyzed: malīmasa aṅgāra rucām payomucām tathā hi madhye jvalitaḥ taḍit śikhī

original: MSS_1196-1 anaṅgīkṛtakāmānām anumānārhavarṣmaṇām /
analyzed: an aṅgīkṛta kāmānām anumāna arha varṣmaṇām

original: MSS_1196-2 dhrtanirmalatīrthānāṃ bhūtilepo vibhūṣaṇam //
MSS_1197-1 anaṅgenābalāsaṅgāj jitā yena jagattrayī /
analyzed: anaṅgena abala āsaṅgāt jitā yena jagat trayī

original: MSS_1197-2 sa citracaritaḥ kāmaḥ sarvakāmaprado'stu vaḥ //
analyzed: sa citra caritaḥ kāmaḥ sarva kāma pradoḥ tu vaḥ

original: MSS_1198-1 anaṅgo'yamanaṅgatvam adya nindiṣyati dhruvam /
analyzed: anaṅga uyam anaṅga tvam adya nindiṣyati dhruvam

original: MSS_1198-2 yadanena na saṃprāptaḥ pāṇisparśotsavastava //
analyzed: yat anena na saṃprāptaḥ pāṇi sparśa utsavaḥ tava

original: MSS_1199-1 anañjitāsitā dṛṣṭir bhrūranāvarjitā natā /
analyzed: an añjitā asitā dṛṣṭiḥ bhrūḥ an āvarjitā natā

original: MSS_1199-2 arañjito'ruṇaścāyam adharastava sundari //
analyzed: a rañjita ūruṇaḥ ca ayam adharaḥ tava sundari

original: MSS_1200-1 anaṇuraṇanmaṇimekhala- mavirataśiñjānamañjumañjīram /
analyzed: an aṇu raṇat maṇi mekhala m avirata śiñjāna mañju mañjīram

original: MSS_1200-2 parisaraṇamaruṇacaraṇe raṇaraṇakamakāraṇaṃ kurute //
analyzed: parisaraṇam aruṇa caraṇe raṇaraṇakam akāraṇam kurute

original: MSS_1201-1 anaticirojjhitasya jaladena cira- sthitabahubudbudasya payaso'nukṛtim /
analyzed: an ati cira ujjhitasya jaladena sthita bahu budbudasya

original: MSS_1201-2 viralavikīrṇavajraśakalā sakalām iha vidadhāti dhautakaladhautamahī //
analyzed: virala vikīrṇa vajra śakalā sakalām iha vidadhāti dhauta kaladhauta mahī

original: MSS_1202-1 anatiśayaṃ svarṇacayaṃ nivahan nitarāṃ pramodaye svānte /
analyzed: anatiśayam svarṇa cayam nivahan nitarām pramodaye svānte

original: MSS_1202-2 kiṃtu tavaiṣā saṃpat kasyopakṛte pratibrūhi //
analyzed: kiṃtu tava eṣā saṃpad kasya upakṛte pratibrūhi

original: MSS_1203-1 anatiśithile puṃbhāvena pragalbhabalāḥ khalu prasabhamalayaḥ pāthojāsye niviśya niritvarāḥ /
analyzed: an ati śithile puṃbhāvena pragalbha balāḥ khalu prasabham alayaḥ pāthoja āsye niviśya niritvarāḥ

original: MSS_1203-2 kimapi mukhataḥ kṛtvānītaṃ vitīrya sarojinī- madhurasamuṣoyoge jāyāṃ navānnamacīkaran //
analyzed: kim api mukhatas kṛtvā ānītam vitīrya sarojinī madhu rasa muṣaḥ yoge jāyām nava annam acīkaran

original: MSS_1204-1 anadhigatamanorathasya pūrvaṃ śataguṇiteva gatā mama triyāmā /
analyzed: an adhigata manorathasya pūrvam śata guṇitā iva gatā mama triyāmā

original: MSS_1204-2 yadi tu tava samāgame tathaiva prasarati subhrutataḥ kṛtī bhaveyam //
analyzed: yadi tu tava samāgame tathā eva prasarati subhrutataḥ kṛtī bhaveyam

original: MSS_1205-1 anadhītya yathā vedān na vipraḥ śrāddhamarhati /
analyzed: an adhītya yathā vedān na vipraḥ śrāddham arhati

original: MSS_1205-2 evamaśrutaṣāḍguṇyo na mantraṃ śrotumarhati //
analyzed: evam aśruta ṣāḍguṇyaḥ na mantram śrotum arhati

original: MSS_1206-1 anadhītya svajaśāstraṃ yo'nyaśāstraṃ samīhate vaktum /
analyzed: an adhītya svaja śāstram yonya śāstram samīhate vaktum

original: MSS_1206-2 so'heḥ padāni gaṇayati niśi tamasi jale ciragatasya //
analyzed: padāni gaṇayati niśi tamasi jale cira gatasya

original: MSS_1207-1 anadhītyārthaśāstraṇi bahavaḥ paśubuddhayaḥ /
analyzed: an adhītya arthaśāstraṇi bahavaḥ paśu buddhayaḥ

original: MSS_1207-2 prāgalbhyādvaktumicchanti mantreṣvabhyantarīkṛtāḥ //
analyzed: prāgalbhyāt vaktum icchanti mantreṣu abhyantarīkṛtāḥ

original: MSS_1208-1 anadhyavasitāvagāhanamanalpadhīśaktināpy adṛṣṭaparmārthatattvamadhikābhiyogairapi /
analyzed: anadhyavasita avagāhanam analpa dhī śaktinā api adṛṣṭa parma artha tattvam adhika abhiyogaiḥ api

original: MSS_1208-2 mataṃ mama jagatyalabdhasadṛśapratigrāhakaṃ prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva svadehe jarām //
analyzed: matam mama jagati alabdha sadṛśa pratigrāhakam prayāsyati payonidheḥ payaḥ iva sva dehe jarām

original: MSS_1209-1 anadhvanyāḥ kāvyeṣvalasagatayaḥ śāstragahaneṣv aduḥkhajñā vācāṃ pariṇatiṣu mūkāḥ paraguṇe /
analyzed: anadhvanyāḥ kāvyeṣu alasa gatayaḥ śāstra gahaneṣu aduḥkha jñāḥ vācām pariṇatiṣu mūkāḥ para guṇe

original: MSS_1209-2 vidagdhānāṃ goṣṭhīṣvakṛtaparicaryāśca khalu ye bhaveyuste kiṃ vā parabhaṇitikaṇḍūtinikaṣāḥ //
analyzed: vidagdhānām goṣṭhīṣu akṛta paricaryāḥ ca khalu ye bhaveyuḥ te kim vā para bhaṇiti kaṇḍūti nikaṣāḥ

original: MSS_1210-1 anantaṃ bata me vittaṃ yasya me nāsti kiṃcana /
analyzed: anantam bata me vittam yasya me nā asti kiṃcana

original: MSS_1210-2 mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiṃcana //
analyzed: mithilāyām pradīptāyām na me dahyati kiṃcana

original: MSS_1211-1 anantakopādicatuṣṭayodaye tribhedamithyātvamalodaye tathā /
analyzed: ananta kopa ādi catuṣṭaya udaye tri bheda mithyātva mala udaye tathā

original: MSS_1211-2 durantamithyātvaviṣaṃ śarīriṇām anantasaṃsārakaraṃ prarohati //
analyzed: duranta mithyātva viṣam śarīriṇām ananta saṃsāra karam prarohati

original: MSS_1212-1 anantakhyātisaṃpannaḥ śuddhasattvaḥ sadhībalaḥ /
MSS_1212-2 dhatte bahumukhaṃ bhogaṃ śrutidṛṣṭisthirāśayaḥ //
analyzed: dhatte bahu mukham bhogam śruti dṛṣṭi sthira āśayaḥ

original: MSS_1213-1 anantatattvaṃ parigṛhya dhātrā vinirmito'syāḥ kila madhyabhāgaḥ /
analyzed: ananta tattvam parigṛhya dhātrā vinirmitaḥ asyāḥ kila madhya bhāgaḥ

original: MSS_1213-2 aṇuḥ paraṃ yogidṛśānulakṣyaḥ saccitkalāsthairyabalāvanaddhaḥ //
analyzed: aṇuḥ param yogi dṛśā anulakṣyaḥ sat cit kalā sthairya bala avanaddhaḥ

original: MSS_1214-1 anantanāmadheyāya sarvākāravidhāyine /
analyzed: ananta nāmadheyāya sarva ākāra vidhāyine

original: MSS_1214-2 samastamantravācyāya viśvaikapataye namaḥ //
analyzed: samasta mantra vācyāya viśva eka pataye namaḥ

original: MSS_1215-1 anantapadavinyāsaracanā sarasā kaveḥ /
MSS_1215-2 budho yadi samīpastho na kujanyaḥ puro yadi //
analyzed: budhaḥ yadi samīpa sthaḥ na kujanyaḥ puras yadi

original: MSS_1216-1 anantapāraṃ kila śabdaśāstraṃ svalpaṃ tathāyurbahavaśca vighnāḥ /
analyzed: ananta pāram kila śabda śāstram su alpam tathā āyuḥ bahavaḥ ca vighnāḥ

original: MSS_1216-2 yat sārabhūtaṃ tadupāsanīyaṃ haṃsairyathā kṣīramivāmbumadhyāt //
analyzed: yat sāra bhūtam tat upāsanīyam haṃsaiḥ yathā kṣīram iva ambu madhyāt

original: MSS_1217-1 anantaratnaprabhavasya yasya himaṃ na saubhāgyavilopi jātam /
analyzed: ananta ratna prabhavasya yasya himam na saubhāgya vilopi jātam

original: MSS_1217-2 eko hi doṣo guṇasaṃnipāte nimajjatīndoḥ kiraṇeṣvivāṅkaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ hi doṣaḥ guṇa saṃnipāte nimajjati indoḥ kiraṇeṣu iva aṅkaḥ

original: MSS_1218-1 anantaramariṃ vadyād arisevinameva ca areranantaraṃ mitram udāsīnaṃ tayoḥ param //
analyzed: anantaram arim vadyāt ari sevinam eva ca areḥ anantaram mitram udāsīnam tayoḥ param

original: MSS_1219-1 anantavibhavabhraṣṭā daurbbhāgyaparitāpinī /
analyzed: ananta vibhava bhraṣṭā daurbhāgya paritāpinī

original: MSS_1219-2 śocyati prāpya jīvatvaṃ bhartṛhīneva nāyikā //
analyzed: śocyati prāpya jīva tvam bhartṛ hīnā iva nāyikā

original: MSS_1220-1 anantaśāstraṃ bahulāśca vidyāḥ svalpaśca kālo bahuvidhnatā ca /
analyzed: ananta śāstram bahulāḥ ca vidyāḥ su alpaḥ ca kālaḥ bahu vidhna tā ca

original: MSS_1220-2 yat sārabhūtaṃ tadupāsanīyaṃ haṃso yathā kṣīramivāmbumadhyāt //
analyzed: yat sāra bhūtam tat upāsanīyam haṃsaḥ yathā kṣīram iva ambu madhyāt

original: MSS_1221-1 anantāsau kīrtiḥ kavikumudabandhoḥ kṣitipates trilokīyaṃ kṣudrā tadiha kathamasyāḥ sthitiriti /
analyzed: anantā asau kīrtiḥ kavi kumudabandhoḥ kṣitipateḥ trilokī iyam kṣudrā tat iha katham asyāḥ sthitiḥ iti

original: MSS_1221-2 mudheyaṃ vaḥ śaṅkā kalayata kiyaddarpaṇatalaṃ viśālā kiṃ tatra sphurati na kavīndrapratikṛtiḥ //
analyzed: mudhā iyam vaḥ śaṅkā kalayata kiyat darpaṇa talam viśālā kim tatra sphurati na kavi indra pratikṛtiḥ

original: MSS_1222-1 anantodbhūtabhūtaughasaṃkule bhūtale'khile /
MSS_1222-2 śastre śāstre tricaturāś caturā yadi mādṛśāḥ //
analyzed: śastre śāstre tricaturāḥ caturāḥ yadi mādṛśāḥ

original: MSS_1223-1 ananyakṣuṇṇaśrīrmalayavanajanmāyamanilo nipīya svedāmbu smaramakarasaṃbhukttavibhavam /
analyzed: an anya kṣuṇṇa śrīḥ malaya vana janmā ayam anilaḥ nipīya sveda ambu smara makara saṃbhuktta vibhavam

original: MSS_1223-2 vidarbhāṇāṃ bhūri priyatamaparīrambharabhasa- prasaṅgādeṅgāni dviguṇapulakāsañji tanute //
analyzed: vidarbhāṇām bhūri priyatama parīrambha rabhasa prasaṅgāt ā iṅgāni dviguṇa pulaka āsañji tanute

original: MSS_1224-1 ananyaśobhābhibhaveyamākṛtir vimānanā subhru kutaḥ piturgṛhe /
analyzed: an anya śobhā abhibhavā iyam ākṛtiḥ vimānanā subhru kutas pituḥ gṛhe

original: MSS_1224-2 parābhimarśo na tavāsti kaḥ karaṃ prasārayet pannagaratnasūcaye //
analyzed: para abhimarśaḥ na tava asti kaḥ karam prasārayet pannaga ratna sūcaye

original: MSS_1225-1 ananyasādhāraṇakāntikānta- tanoramuṣyāḥ kimu madhYadeśaḥ /
analyzed: an anya sādhāraṇa kānti kānta tanoḥ amuṣyāḥ kimu madhyadeśaḥ

original: MSS_1225-2 jagattrayījanmabhṛtāṃ niṣaṇṇā cittāvalīyaṃ trivalīmiṣeṇa //
analyzed: jagat trayī janma bhṛtām niṣaṇṇā cittāvalī iyam trivalī miṣeṇa

original: MSS_1226-1 ananyasādhāraṇasaurabhānvitaṃ dadhānamatyujjvalapuṣpasaṃpadaḥ /
analyzed: an anya sādhāraṇa saurabha anvitam dadhānam ati ujjvala puṣpa saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_1226-2 na campakaṃ bhṛṅgagaṇaḥ siṣeve kathaṃ sugandhermalinātmanāṃ ratiḥ //
analyzed: na campakam bhṛṅga gaṇaḥ siṣeve katham sugandheḥ malina ātmanām ratiḥ

original: MSS_1227-1 ananyasāmānyatayā prasiddhas tyāgīti gīto jagatītale yaḥ /
analyzed: an anya sāmānya tayā prasiddhaḥ tyāgī iti gītaḥ jagatī tale yaḥ

original: MSS_1227-2 abhūdahaṃpūrvikayā gatānām atīva bhūmiḥ smaramārgaṇānām //
analyzed: abhūt ahaṃpūrvikayā gatānām atīva bhūmiḥ smara mārgaṇānām

original: MSS_1228-1 ananyālambanatvena prema bhāgavataṃ bhaja /
MSS_1228-2 nṛṇāṃ premeti kā mātrā prāptaṃ prema prabhoryadi //
analyzed: nṛṇām prema iti kā mātrā prāptam prema prabhoḥ yadi

original: MSS_1229-1 ananyāścintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryuṃpāsate /
analyzed: an anyāḥ cintayantaḥ mām ye janāḥ paryuṃpāsate

original: MSS_1229-2 teṣāṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ yogakṣemaṃ vahāmyaham //
analyzed: teṣām nitya abhiyuktānām yogakṣemam vahāmi aham

original: MSS_1230-1 ananyāśritacittena sevito'pi ca vāridaḥ /
analyzed: an anya āśrita cittena sevitaḥ api ca vāridaḥ

original: MSS_1230-2 siṃñcenna cet tadā manye cātakasyaiva pātakam //
analyzed: siṃñcet na ced tadā manye cātakasya eva pātakam

original: MSS_1231-1 anapekṣitaguruvacanā sarvān granthīn vibhedayati samyak /
analyzed: an apekṣita guru vacanā sarvān granthīn vibhedayati samyak

original: MSS_1231-2 prakaṭayati pararahasyaṃ vimarśaśakttirnijā jayati //
analyzed: prakaṭayati para rahasyam vimarśa śakttiḥ nijā jayati

original: MSS_1232-1 anabhijñāya śāstrārthān puruṣāḥ paśubuddhayaḥ /
analyzed: an abhijñāya śāstra arthān puruṣāḥ paśu buddhayaḥ

original: MSS_1232-2 prāgalbhyādvaktumicchanti mantreṣvabhyantarīkṛtāḥ //
analyzed: prāgalbhyāt vaktum icchanti mantreṣu abhyantarīkṛtāḥ

original: MSS_1233-1 anabhijño guṇānāṃ yo na bhṛtyaiḥ so'nugamyate /
analyzed: anabhijñaḥ guṇānām yaḥ na bhṛtyaiḥ saḥ anugamyate

original: MSS_1233-2 dhanāḍhyo'pi kulīno'pi kramāyāto'pi bhūpatiḥ //
analyzed: dhana āḍhyaḥ api kulīnaḥ api kramāyātaḥ api bhūpatiḥ

original: MSS_1234-1 anabhidhyā parasveṣu sarvasattveṣu sauhṛdam /
analyzed: anabhidhyā para sveṣu sarva sattveṣu sauhṛdam

original: MSS_1234-2 karmaṇāṃ phalamastīti trividhaṃ manasā caret //
analyzed: karmaṇām phalam asti iti trividham manasā caret

original: MSS_1235-1 anabhilaṣataḥ śrīlīlābje parāgavilepanaṃ tridaśakariṇaḥ pātuṃ dānapravāhamavāñchataḥ /
analyzed: an abhilaṣataḥ śrī līlā abje parāga vilepanam tridaśa kariṇaḥ pātum dāna pravāham avāñchataḥ

original: MSS_1235-2 tridaśasumanogandhāsaktiṃ vimuktavataḥ sakhe bata khalu śivā saṃtuṣṭasya dvirepha tava sthitiḥ //
analyzed: tridaśa sumanaḥ gandha āsaktim vimuktavataḥ sakhe bata khalu śivā saṃtuṣṭasya dvirepha tava sthitiḥ

original: MSS_1236-1 anabhyāsahatotsāhā pareṇa paribhūyate /
analyzed: an abhyāsa hata utsāhā pareṇa paribhūyate

original: MSS_1236-2 yā lajjājananī jāḍyāt kiṃ tayā mandavidyayā //
analyzed: yā lajjā jananī jāḍyāt kim tayā manda vidyayā

original: MSS_1237-1 anabhyāsahatā vidyā hato rājavirodhakṛt /
analyzed: anabhyāsa hatā vidyā hataḥ rāja virodha kṛt

original: MSS_1237-2 jīvanārthaṃ hataṃ tīrthaṃ jīvanārthaṃ hataṃ vratam //
analyzed: jīvana artham hatam tīrtham jīvana artham hatam vratam

original: MSS_1238-1 anabhyāsena vidyānām asaṃsargeṇa dhīmatām /
analyzed: anabhyāsena vidyānām a saṃsargeṇa dhīmatām

original: MSS_1238-2 anigraheṇa cākṣāṇāṃ jāyate vyasanaṃ nṛṇām //
analyzed: anigraheṇa ca akṣāṇām jāyate vyasanam nṛṇām

original: MSS_1239-1 anabhyāsena vedānām ācārasya ca varjanāt /
analyzed: anabhyāsena vedānām ācārasya ca varjanāt

original: MSS_1239-2 ālasyādannadoṣācca mṛtyurviprān jighāṃsati //
analyzed: ālasyāt anna doṣāt ca mṛtyuḥ viprān jighāṃsati

original: MSS_1240-1 anamyāsairhatā vidyā nityahāsairhatāḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: an amyāsaiḥ hatā vidyā nitya hāsaiḥ hatāḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_1240-2 kubījena hataṃ kṣetraṃ bhṛtyadoṣairhatā nṛpāḥ //
analyzed: ku bījena hatam kṣetram bhṛtya doṣaiḥ hatāḥ nṛpāḥ

original: MSS_1241-1 anabhravṛṣṭiḥ śravaṇāmṛtasya sarasvatī vibhramajanmabhūmiḥ /
analyzed: anabhra vṛṣṭiḥ śravaṇa amṛtasya sarasvatī vibhrama janma bhūmiḥ

original: MSS_1241-2 vaidarbharītiḥ kṛtināmudeti saubhāgyalābhapratibhūḥ padānām //
analyzed: vaidarbha rītiḥ kṛtinām udeti saubhāgya lābha pratibhūḥ padānām

original: MSS_1242-1 anabhrevidyutaṃ dṛṣṭvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśamāśritām /
analyzed: anabhrevidyutam dṛṣṭvā dakṣiṇām diśam āśritām

original: MSS_1242-2 rātrāvindradhanuścāpi jīvitaṃ dvitrimāsikam //
analyzed: rātrau indradhanuḥ ca api jīvitam dvi tri māsikam

original: MSS_1243-1 anamrākramaṇaṃ śauryaṃ dhanaṃ nijabhujārjitam bhāryā rūpānurūpā ca puruṣasyeha yujyate //
analyzed: anamra ākramaṇam śauryam dhanam nija bhuja arjitam bhāryā rūpa anurūpā ca puruṣasya iha yujyate

original: MSS_1243-2 anyathā tu kimetena rūpeṇāpi . . .
analyzed: anyathā tu kim etena rūpeṇa api

original: MSS_1244-1 anayanapathe priye na vyathā yathā dṛśya eva duṣprāpe /
analyzed: a nayana pathe priye na vyathā yathā dṛśye eva duṣprāpe

original: MSS_1244-2 mlānaiva kevalaṃ niśi tapanaśilā vāsare jvalati //
analyzed: mlānā eva kevalam niśi tapana śilā vāsare jvalati

original: MSS_1245-1 anayaśca nayaścāpi daivāt saṃpadyate naraiḥ /
analyzed: anayaḥ ca nayaḥ ca api daivāt saṃpadyate naraiḥ

original: MSS_1245-2 tadvaśāt kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalaṃ pumān //
analyzed: tad vaśāt kurute karma śubha aśubha phalam pumān

original: MSS_1246-1 anayā kṛtamanyabhuktayā vasudhāgocarayā viraktayā /
analyzed: anayā kṛta manya bhuktayā vasudhā gocarayā viraktayā

original: MSS_1246-2 atiśāyi mahendrayoṣitāṃ vapuṣā kiṃ na tavāvarodhanam //
analyzed: atiśāyi mahā indra yoṣitām vapuṣā kim na tava avarodhanam

original: MSS_1247-1 anayā jaghanābhogabharamantharayānayā /
analyzed: anayā jaghana ābhoga bhara mantharayā anayā

original: MSS_1247-2 anyato'pi vrajantyā me hṛdaye nihitaṃ padam //
analyzed: anyatas api vrajantyāḥ me hṛdaye nihitam padam

original: MSS_1248-1 anayā tava rūpasīmayā kṛtasaṃskāravibodhanasya me /
analyzed: anayā tava rūpa sīmayā kṛta saṃskāra vibodhanasya me

original: MSS_1248-2 ciramapyavalokitādya sā smṛtimārūḍhavatī śucismitā //
analyzed: ciram api avalokitā adya sā smṛtim ārūḍhavatī śuci smitā

original: MSS_1249-1 anayānukramaṇikayā muktāmaṇayo mayābhihitāḥ /
analyzed: anayā anukramaṇikayā muktā maṇayaḥ mayā abhihitāḥ

original: MSS_1249-2 ekaiko'pi hi bhāsvān kiṃ punareṣāṃ nigadyate nikaraḥ //
analyzed: ekaikaḥ api hi bhāsvān kim punar eṣām nigadyate nikaraḥ

original: MSS_1250-1 anayā ratnasamṛddhyā sāgara lahalahasi kimiha laharībhiḥ /
analyzed: anayā ratna samṛddhyā sāgara laha lahasi kim iha laharībhiḥ

original: MSS_1250-2 tvadvallabhā varākyo vahanti varṣāsu vārīṇi //
analyzed: tvad vallabhāḥ varākyaḥ vahanti varṣāsu vārīṇi

original: MSS_1251-1 anayā surakāmyamānayā saha yogaḥ sulabhastu na tvayā /
analyzed: anayā sura kāmyamānayā saha yogaḥ sulabhaḥ tu na tvayā

original: MSS_1251-2 ghanasaṃvṛtayāmbudāgame kumudeneva niśākaratviṣā //
analyzed: ghana saṃvṛtayā ambuda āgame kumudena iva niśākara tviṣā

original: MSS_1252-1 anayeneva rājyaśrīr dainyeneva manasvitā /
analyzed: anayena iva rājya śrīḥ dainyena iva manasvi tā

original: MSS_1252-2 mamlau sātha viṣādena padminīva himāmbhasā //
analyzed: mamlau sā atha viṣādena padminī iva hima ambhasā

original: MSS_1253-1 anayoranavadyāṅgi stanayorjṛmbhamāṇayoḥ /
analyzed: anayoḥ anavadya aṅgi stanayoḥ jṛmbhamāṇayoḥ

original: MSS_1253-2 avakāśo na paryāptas tava bāhulatāntare //
analyzed: avakāśaḥ na paryāptaḥ tava bāhu latā antare

original: MSS_1254-1 anayo vinayastasya vidhiryasyānuvartate /
analyzed: anayaḥ vinayaḥ tasya vidhiḥ yasya anuvartate

original: MSS_1254-2 nayaḥ samyakprayukto'pi bhāgyahīnasya durnayaḥ //
analyzed: nayaḥ samyak prayuktaḥ api bhāgya hīnasya durnayaḥ

original: MSS_1255-1 anarghyaṃ saundaryaṃ jagadupari mādhuryalaharī- parītaṃ saurabhyaṃ diśi diśi rasaikavyasanitā /
analyzed: anarghyam saundaryam jagat upari mādhurya laharī parītam saurabhyam diśi diśi rasa eka vyasani tā

original: MSS_1255-2 iti prītyāsmābhistvayi khalu rasāle vyavasitaṃ ka evaṃ jānīte yadasi kaṭukīṭairupahataḥ //
analyzed: iti prītyā asmābhiḥ tvayi khalu rasāle vyavasitam kaḥ evam jānīte yat asi kaṭu kīṭaiḥ upahataḥ

original: MSS_1256-1 anarghyamapi māṇikyaṃ hemāśrayamapekṣate /
analyzed: anarghyam api māṇikyam hema āśrayam apekṣate

original: MSS_1256-2 anāśrayā na śobhante paṇḍitā vanitā latāḥ //
analyzed: anāśrayāḥ na śobhante paṇḍitāḥ vanitāḥ latāḥ

original: MSS_1257-1 anarghyalāvaṇyanidhānabhūmir na kasya lobhaṃ laṭabhā tanoti /
analyzed: anarghya lāvaṇya nidhāna bhūmiḥ na kasya lobham laṭabhā tanoti

original: MSS_1257-2 avaimi puṣpāyudhayāmiko'syām aviśvasan na kṣaṇameti nidrām //
analyzed: avaimi puṣpāyudha yāmikā usyām a viśvasan na kṣaṇam eti nidrām

original: MSS_1258-1 anarghyāṇyapi ratnāni labhyante vibhavaiḥ sukham /
analyzed: anarghyāṇi api ratnāni labhyante vibhavaiḥ sukham

original: MSS_1258-2 durlabho ratnakoṭyāpi kṣaṇo'pi hi gatāyuṣaḥ //
analyzed: durlabhaḥ ratna koṭyā api kṣaṇaḥ api hi gata āyuṣaḥ

original: MSS_1259-1 anarthakaṃ vipravāsaṃ gṛhebhyaḥ pāpaiḥ saṃdhiṃ paradārābhimarśam /
analyzed: anarthakam vipravāsam gṛhebhyaḥ pāpaiḥ saṃdhim para dāra abhimarśam

original: MSS_1259-2 dambhaṃ stainyaṃ paiśunaṃ madyapānaṃ na sevate yaḥ sa sukhī sadaiva //
analyzed: dambham stainyam paiśunam madya pānam na sevate yaḥ sa sukhī sadā eva

original: MSS_1260-1 anarthamakarāgārād asmāt saṃsārasāgarāt /
analyzed: anartha makara āgārāt asmāt saṃsāra sāgarāt

original: MSS_1260-2 uḍḍīyate nirudvegaṃ sarvatyāgena putraka //
analyzed: uḍḍīyate nirudvegam sarva tyāgena putraka

original: MSS_1261-1 anarthamarthataḥ paśyann arthaṃ caivāpyanarthataḥ /
analyzed: anartham arthataḥ paśyan artham ca eva api anarthataḥ

original: MSS_1261-2 indriyaiḥ prasṛto bālaḥ suduḥkhaṃ manyate sukham //
analyzed: indriyaiḥ prasṛtaḥ bālaḥ su duḥkham manyate sukham

original: MSS_1262-1 anarthāṃ ścārtharūpeṇa arthāṃścānartharūpataḥ /
analyzed: anarthān śca artha rūpeṇa arthān ca anartha rūpataḥ

original: MSS_1262-2 arthāyaiva hi keṣāṃcid dhananāśo bhavatyuta //
analyzed: arthāya eva hi keṣāṃcid dhana nāśaḥ bhavati uta

original: MSS_1263-1 anarthā hyartharūpāśca arthāścānartharūpiṇaḥ /
analyzed: anarthāḥ hi artha rūpāḥ ca arthāḥ ca anartha rūpiṇaḥ

original: MSS_1263-2 bhavanti te vināśāya daivāyattasya rocate //
analyzed: bhavanti te vināśāya daiva āyattasya rocate

original: MSS_1264-1 anarthitarpaṇaṃ vittaṃ cittamadhyānadarpaṇam /
analyzed: an arthi tarpaṇam vittam cittam a dhyāna darpaṇam

original: MSS_1264-2 atīrthasarpaṇaṃ dehaṃ paryante śocyatāṃ vrajet //
MSS_1265-1 anarthitvānmanuṣyāṇāṃ bhayāt parijanasya ca /
analyzed: an arthi tvāt manuṣyāṇām bhayāt parijanasya ca

original: MSS_1265-2 maryādāyāmamaryādāḥ striyastiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu //
analyzed: maryādāyām amaryādāḥ striyaḥ tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu

original: MSS_1266-1 anarthe caiva niratam arthe caiva parāṅmukham /
analyzed: anarthe ca eva niratam arthe ca eva parāṅmukham

original: MSS_1266-2 na taṃ bhartāramicchanti ṣaṇḍhaṃ patimiva striyaḥ //
analyzed: na tam bhartāram icchanti ṣaṇḍham patim iva striyaḥ

original: MSS_1267-1 anartho'pyartharūpeṇa tathārtho'nartharūpabhāk /
analyzed: anarthaḥ upi artha rūpeṇa tathā arthaḥ na artha rūpa bhāj

original: MSS_1267-2 utpadyate vināśāya tasmāduktaṃ parīkṣayet //
analyzed: utpadyate vināśāya tasmāt uktam parīkṣayet

original: MSS_1268-1 analaṃkṛto'pi mādhava harasi mano me sadā prasabham /
analyzed: an alaṃkṛtaḥ upi mādhava harasi manaḥ me sadā prasabham

original: MSS_1268-2 kiṃ punaralaṃkṛtastvaṃ saṃprati nakharakṣataistasyāḥ //
analyzed: kim punar alaṃkṛtaḥ tvam saṃprati nakhara kṣataiḥ tasyāḥ

original: MSS_1269-1 analaḥ śītanāśāya viṣanāśāya gāruḍam /
analyzed: analaḥ śīta nāśāya viṣa nāśāya gāruḍam

original: MSS_1269-2 viveko duḥkhanāśāya sarvanāśāya durmatiḥ //
analyzed: vivekaḥ duḥkha nāśāya sarva nāśāya durmatiḥ

original: MSS_1270-1 analaḥ salilājjātaḥ kārttikeyo'pi vahnitaḥ /
analyzed: analaḥ salilāt jātaḥ kārttikeyaḥ api vahnitaḥ

original: MSS_1270-2 gūḍhaṃ hi mahatāṃ janma paricchettuṃ ka īśvaraḥ //
analyzed: gūḍham hi mahatām janma paricchettum kaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: MSS_1271-1 analasajavāpuṣpotpīḍacchavi prathamaṃ tataḥ samadayavanīgaṇḍacchāyaṃ punarmadhupiṅgalam /
analyzed: anala sa javā puṣpa utpīḍa chavi prathamam tatas sa mada yavanī gaṇḍa chāyam punar madhu piṅgalam

original: MSS_1271-2 tadanu ca navasvarṇādarśaprabhaṃ śaśinastatas taruṇatagarākāraṃ bimbaṃ vibhāti nabhastale //
analyzed: tadanu ca nava svarṇa ādarśa prabham śaśinaḥ tatas taruṇa tagara ākāram bimbam vibhāti nabhastale

original: MSS_1272-1 analastambhanavidyāṃ subhaga bhavān niyatameva jānāti /
analyzed: anala stambhana vidyām subhaga bhavān niyatam eva jānāti

original: MSS_1272-2 manmathaśarāgnitapte hṛdi me kathamanyathā vasasi //
analyzed: manmatha śara agni tapte hṛdi me katham anyathā vasasi

original: MSS_1273-1 analpaṃ jalpantaḥ kati bata gatā no yamapuraṃ purastādasmākaṃ vidhṛtanayanā vyāttavadanāḥ /
analyzed: analpam jalpantaḥ kati bata gatāḥ naḥ yama puram purastāt asmākam vidhṛta nayanāḥ vyātta vadanāḥ

original: MSS_1273-2 atītā yadyevaṃ na hi nijahitaṃ cetasi vayaṃ vahāmo hā mohād viṣayaviṣajātādavasitāḥ //
analyzed: atītāḥ yadi evam na hi nija hitam cetasi vayam vahāmaḥ hā mohāt viṣaya viṣa jātāt avasitāḥ

original: MSS_1274-1 analpaṃ saṃtāpaṃ śamayati manojanmajanitaṃ tathā śītaṃ sphītaṃ himavati niśīthe glapayati /
analyzed: analpam saṃtāpam śamayati manaḥ janma janitam tathā śītam sphītam himavati niśīthe glapayati

original: MSS_1274-2 tadevaṃ ko'pyūṣmā ramaṇaparirambhotsavamilat- purandhrīnīrandhrastanakalaśajanmā vijayate //
analyzed: tat evam kopī ūṣmā ramaṇa parirambha utsava milat purandhrī nīrandhra stana kalaśa janmā vijayate

original: MSS_1275-1 analpacintābharamohaniścalā vilokyamānaiva karoti sādhvasam /
analyzed: analpa cintā bhara moha niścalā vilokyamānā eva karoti sādhvasam

original: MSS_1275-2 svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari //
analyzed: svabhāva śobhā anatimātra bhūṣaṇā tanuḥ tava iyam bata kim nu sundari

original: MSS_1276-1 analpatvāt pradhānatvād vaṃśasyevetare svarāḥ /
analyzed: an alpa tvāt pradhāna tvāt vaṃśasya iva itare svarāḥ

original: MSS_1276-2 vijigīṣornṛpatayaḥ prayānti parivāratām //
analyzed: vijigīṣoḥ nṛpatayaḥ prayānti parivāra tām

original: MSS_1277-1 anavadyamavadyaṃ syād vāruṇīleśamātrataḥ /
analyzed: anavadyam avadyam syāt vāruṇī leśa mātrataḥ

original: MSS_1277-2 tadvacchiṣyo viruddhārthād viguroreva naśyati //
analyzed: tadvat śiṣyaḥ viruddha arthāt viguroḥ eva naśyati

original: MSS_1278-1 anavaratakanakavitaraṇa- jalalavabhṛtakarataraṅgitārthitateḥ /
analyzed: anavarata kanaka vitaraṇa jala lava bhṛta kara taraṅgita arthi tateḥ

original: MSS_1278-2 bhaṇitiriva matirmatiriva ceṣṭā ceṣṭeva kīrtirativimalā //
analyzed: bhaṇitiḥ iva matiḥ matiḥ iva ceṣṭā ceṣṭā iva kīrtiḥ ati vimalā

original: MSS_1279-1 anavaratadhanurjyāsphālanakrūrapūrvaṃ ravikiraṇasahiṣṇu svedaleśairabhinnam /
analyzed: anavarata dhanuḥ jyā āsphālana krūra pūrvam ravi kiraṇa sahiṣṇu sveda leśaiḥ abhinnam

original: MSS_1279-2 apacitamapi gātraṃ vyāyatatvādalakṣyaṃ giricara iva nāgaḥ prāṇasāraṃ bibharti //
analyzed: apacitam api gātram vyāyata tvāt alakṣyam giri caraḥ iva nāgaḥ prāṇa sāram bibharti

original: MSS_1280-1 anavaratanayanavigalita- jalalavaghaṭitākṣasūtravalayena /

original: MSS_1280-2 mṛtyuṃjayamiva japati tvadgotraṃ virahiṇī bālā //
analyzed: mṛtyuṃjayam iva japati tvad gotram virahiṇī bālā

original: MSS_1281-1 anavaratanayanavigalita- jalalavaparimuṣitapattralekhāntam /
analyzed: anavarata nayana vigalita jala lava parimuṣita pattra lekhā antam

original: MSS_1281-2 karatalaniṣaṇṇamabale vadanamidaṃ kaṃ na tāpayati //
analyzed: kara tala niṣaṇṇam abale vadanam idam kam na tāpayati

original: MSS_1282-1 anavarataparopakaraṇa- vyagrībhavadamalacetasāṃ mahatām /
