original: MSS_1282-2 āpātakāṭavāni sphuranti vacanāni bheṣajānīva //
analyzed: āpātaka āṭavāni sphuranti vacanāni bheṣajāni iva

original: MSS_1283-1 anavaratarasena rāgabhājā karajaparikṣatilabdhasaṃstavena /
analyzed: anavarata rasena rāga bhājā karaja parikṣati labdha saṃstavena

original: MSS_1283-2 sapadi taruṇapallavena vadhvā vigatadayaṃ khalu khaṇḍitena mamle //
analyzed: sapadi taruṇa pallavena vadhvā vigata dayam khalu khaṇḍitena mamle

original: MSS_1284-1 anavasare ca yadukttaṃ subhāṣitaṃ tacca bhavati hāsyāya /
analyzed: anavasare ca yat ukttam su bhāṣitam tat ca bhavati hāsyāya

original: MSS_1284-2 rahasi prauḍhavadhūnāṃ ratisamaye vedapāṭha iva //
analyzed: rahasi prauḍha vadhūnām rati samaye veda pāṭhe iva

original: MSS_1285-1 anavasthitacittasya na jane na vane sukham /
analyzed: anavasthita cittasya na jane na vane sukham

original: MSS_1285-2 jane dahati saṃsargo vane saṅgavivarjanam //
analyzed: jane dahati saṃsargaḥ vane saṅga vivarjanam

original: MSS_1286-1 anavasthitacittānāṃ prasādo'pi bhayaṃkaraḥ /
analyzed: anavasthita cittānām prasādaḥ api bhayaṃkaraḥ

original: MSS_1286-2 sarpī hanti kila snehād apatyāni na vairataḥ //
analyzed: sarpī hanti kila snehāt apatyāni na vairataḥ

original: MSS_1287-1 anavahitaḥ kimaśaktto vibudhairabhyarthitaḥ kimatirasikaḥ /
analyzed: anavahitaḥ kim aśakttaḥ vibudhaiḥ abhyarthitaḥ kim ati rasikaḥ

original: MSS_1287-2 sarvaṃkaṣo'pi kālas tirayati sūktāni na kavīnām //
analyzed: sarvaṃkaṣaḥ api kālaḥ tirayati sūktāni na kavīnām

original: MSS_1288-1 anavāpyaṃ ca śokena śarīraṃ copatapyate /
analyzed: an avāpyam ca śokena śarīram ca upatapyate

original: MSS_1288-2 amitrāśca prahṛṣyanti mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ //
analyzed: amitrāḥ ca prahṛṣyanti mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ

original: MSS_1289-1 anavekṣitamaryādaṃ nāstikaṃ vipralumpakam /
analyzed: an avekṣita maryādam nāstikam vipralumpakam

original: MSS_1289-2 arakṣitāramattāraṃ nṛpaṃ vidyādadhogatim //
analyzed: arakṣitāram attāram nṛpam vidyāt adhogatim

original: MSS_1290-1 anavyaye vyayaṃ yāti vyaye yāti suvistṛtim /
analyzed: an avyaye vyayam yāti vyaye yāti su vistṛtim

original: MSS_1290-2 apūrvastava kośo'yaṃ vidyākośeṣu bhārati //
analyzed: apūrvaḥ tava kośaḥ yam vidyā kośeṣu bhārati

original: MSS_1291-1 anasi sīdati saikatavartmani pracurabhārabharakṣapitaukṣake /
analyzed: anasi sīdati saikata vartmani pracura bhāra bhara kṣapita okṣake

original: MSS_1291-2 gurubharoddharaṇoddhurakaṃdharaṃ smarati sārathireṣa dhuraṃdharam //
analyzed: guru bhara uddharaṇa uddhura kaṃdharam smarati sārathiḥ eṣa dhuraṃdharam

original: MSS_1292-1 anasūyaḥ kṛtaprajñaḥ śobhanānyācaran sadā /
analyzed: anasūyaḥ kṛta prajñaḥ śobhanāni ācaran sadā

original: MSS_1292-2 akṛcchrāt sukhamāpnoti sarvatra ca virājate //
analyzed: akṛcchrāt sukham āpnoti sarvatra ca virājate

original: MSS_1293-1 anasūyā kṣamā śāntiḥ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditā /
MSS_1293-2 kāmakrodhaparityāgaḥ śiṣṭācāranidarśanam //
analyzed: kāma krodha parityāgaḥ śiṣṭa ācāra nidarśanam

original: MSS_1294-1 anasūyārjavaṃ śaucaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditā /
analyzed: anasūyā ārjavam śaucam saṃtoṣaḥ priya vādi tā

original: MSS_1294-2 damaḥ satyamanāyāso na bhavanti durātmanām //
analyzed: damaḥ satyam anāyāsaḥ na bhavanti durātmanām

original: MSS_1295-1 anastamitasārasya tejasastadvijṛmbhitam /
analyzed: an astamita sārasya tejasaḥ tat vijṛmbhitam

original: MSS_1295-2 yena pāṣāṇakhaṇḍasya mūlyamalpaṃ vasuṃdharā //
analyzed: yena pāṣāṇa khaṇḍasya mūlyam alpam vasuṃdharā

original: MSS_1297-1 anākalitamānuṣyāḥ kṣamāsaṃsparśavarjitāḥ /
analyzed: an ākalita mānuṣyāḥ kṣamā saṃsparśa varjitāḥ

original: MSS_1297-2 pratibuddhairna sevyante pūrvadevavirodhinaḥ //
analyzed: pratibuddhaiḥ na sevyante pūrvadeva virodhinaḥ

original: MSS_1298-1 anākāśe candraḥ sarasijadaladvandvasahito gṛhītaḥ paścārdhe kuṭilakuṭilaiḥ so'pi timiraiḥ /
analyzed: an ākāśe candraḥ sarasija dala dvandva sahitaḥ gṛhītaḥ paśca ardhe kuṭila kuṭilaiḥ saḥ upi timiraiḥ

original: MSS_1298-2 sudhāṃ muñcatyuccairaniśamatha saṃmohajananīṃ kimutpātālīyaṃ vadata jagataḥ kartumuditā //
analyzed: sudhām muñcati uccais aniśam atha saṃmoha jananīm kim utpātālī iyam vadata jagataḥ kartum uditā

original: MSS_1299-1 anākūtaireva priyasahacarīṇāṃ śiśutayā vacobhiḥ pāñcālīmithunamadhunā saṃgamayitum /
analyzed: an ākūtaiḥ eva priya sahacarīṇām śiśu tayā vacobhiḥ pāñcālī mithunam adhunā saṃgamayitum

original: MSS_1299-2 upādatte no vā viramati na vā kevalamiyaṃ kapolau kalyāṇī pulakamukulairdanturayati //
analyzed: upādatte no vā viramati na vā kevalam iyam kapolau kalyāṇī pulaka mukulaiḥ danturayati

original: MSS_1300-1 anākṛṣṭasya viṣayair vidyānāṃ pāradṛśvanaḥ /
analyzed: an ākṛṣṭasya viṣayaiḥ vidyānām pāra dṛśvanaḥ

original: MSS_1300-2 tasya dharmaraterāsīd vṛddhatvaṃ jarasā vinā //
analyzed: tasya dharma rateḥ āsīt vṛddha tvam jarasā vinā

original: MSS_1301-1 anāgataṃ bhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā nītiśāstraviśāradaḥ /
analyzed: anāgatam bhayam dṛṣṭvā nīti śāstra viśāradaḥ

original: MSS_1301-2 avasanmūṣakastatra kṛtvā śatamukhaṃ bilam //
analyzed: avasat mūṣakaḥ tatra kṛtvā śata mukham bilam

original: MSS_1302-1 anāgataṃ yaḥ kurute sa śobhate sa śocate yo na karotyanāgatam /
analyzed: anāgatam yaḥ kurute sa śobhate sa śocate yaḥ na karoti anāgatam

original: MSS_1302-2 vane vasanneva jarāmupāgato bilasya vācā na kadāpi hi śrutā //
analyzed: vane vasan eva jarām upāgataḥ bilasya vācā na kadāpi hi śrutā

original: MSS_1303-1 anāgataṃ hi budhyeta yacca kāryaṃ puraḥ sthitam /
analyzed: anāgatam hi budhyeta yat ca kāryam puras sthitam

original: MSS_1303-2 na tu buddhikṣayāt kiṃcid atikrāmet prayojanam //
analyzed: na tu buddhi kṣayāt kiṃcid atikrāmet prayojanam

original: MSS_1304-1 anāgatavartīṃ cintāṃ kṛtvā yastu prahṛṣyati /
analyzed: anāgata vartīm cintām kṛtvā yaḥ tu prahṛṣyati

original: MSS_1304-2 sa tiraskāramāpnoti bhagnabhāṇḍo dvijo yathā //
analyzed: sa tiraskāram āpnoti bhagna bhāṇḍaḥ dvijaḥ yathā

original: MSS_1305-1 anāgatavatīṃ cintāṃ yo naraḥ kartumicchati /
analyzed: anāgatavatīm cintām yaḥ naraḥ kartum icchati

original: MSS_1305-2 sa bhūmau pāṇḍuraḥ śete somaśarmapitā yathā //
analyzed: sa bhūmau pāṇḍuraḥ śete somaśarma pitā yathā

original: MSS_1306-1 anāgatavidhātā ca pratyutpannamatiśca yaḥ /
analyzed: anāgatavidhātā ca pratyutpannamatiḥ ca yaḥ

original: MSS_1306-2 dvaveva sukhamedhete dīrghasūtrī vinaśyati //
analyzed: dvau eva sukham edhete dīrghasūtrī vinaśyati

original: MSS_1307-1 anāgatavidhātāram apramattamakopanam /
analyzed: anāgata vidhātāram apramattam akopanam

original: MSS_1307-2 sthirārambhamadīnaṃ ca naraṃ śrīrupatiṣṭhati //
analyzed: sthira ārambham adīnam ca naram śrīḥ upatiṣṭhati

original: MSS_1308-1 anāgatavidhānaṃ ca kartavyaṃ viṣaye nṛpaiḥ //
analyzed: anāgata vidhānam ca kartavyam viṣaye nṛpaiḥ

original: MSS_1308-2 āgamaścāpi kartavyas tathā doṣo na jāyate //
analyzed: āgamaḥ ca api kartavyaḥ tathā doṣaḥ na jāyate

original: MSS_1309-1 anāgatavidhānaṃ tu kartavyaṃ śubhamicchatā /
analyzed: anāgata vidhānam tu kartavyam śubham icchatā

original: MSS_1309-2 āpadaṃ śaṅkamānena puruṣeṇa vipaścitā //
analyzed: āpadam śaṅkamānena puruṣeṇa vipaścitā

original: MSS_1310-1 anāgatopadhaṃ hiṃsraṃ durbuddhimabahuśrutam /
analyzed: anāgata upadham hiṃsram durbuddhim abahu śrutam

original: MSS_1310-2 tyakttopāttaṃ madyapānadyūtastrīmṛgayāpriyam //
analyzed: tyakta upāttam madya pāna dyūta strī mṛgayā priyam

original: MSS_1310-3 kārye mahati yuñjāno hīyate'rthapatiḥ śriyā //
analyzed: kārye mahati yuñjānaḥ hīyate irthapatiḥ śriyā

original: MSS_1311-1 anāghrātaṃ puṣpaṃ kisalayamalūnaṃ kararuhair anāviddhaṃ ratnaṃ madhu navamanāsvāditarasam /
analyzed: an āghrātam puṣpam kisalayam a lūnam kararuhaiḥ an āviddham ratnam madhu navam an āsvādita rasam

original: MSS_1311-2 akhaṇḍaṃ puṇyānāṃ phalamiva ca tadrūpamanaghaṃ na jāne bhokttāraṃ kamiha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ //
analyzed: akhaṇḍam puṇyānām phalam iva ca tad rūpam anagham na jāne bhokttāram kam iha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ

original: MSS_1312-1 anātapatro'pyayamatra lakṣyate sitātapatrairiva sarvato vṛtaḥ /
analyzed: an ātapatraḥ upi ayam atra lakṣyate sita ātapatraiḥ iva sarvatas vṛtaḥ

original: MSS_1312-2 acāmaro'pyeṣa sadaiva vījyate vilāsabālavyajanena ko'pyayam //
analyzed: a cāmaraḥ upi eṣa sadā eva vījyate vilāsa bāla vyajanena kaḥ pi ayam

original: MSS_1313-1 anāturotkaṇṭhitayoḥ prasidhyatā samāgamenāpi ratirna māṃ prati /
analyzed: anātura utkaṇṭhitayoḥ prasidhyatā samāgamena api ratiḥ na mām prati

original: MSS_1313-2 parasparaprāptinirāśayorvaraṃ śarīranāśo'pi samānurāgayoḥ //
analyzed: paraspara prāpti nirāśayoḥ varam śarīra nāśaḥ upi sama anurāgayoḥ

original: MSS_1314-1 anātmavān nayadveṣī vardhayannarisaṃpadaḥ /
analyzed: anātmavān naya dveṣī vardhayan ari saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_1314-2 prāpyāpi mahadaiśvaryaṃ saha tena vinaśyati //
analyzed: prāpya api mahat aiśvaryam saha tena vinaśyati

original: MSS_1315-1 anāthānāṃ daridrāṇāṃ bālavṛddhatapasvinām /
analyzed: anāthānām daridrāṇām bāla vṛddha tapasvinām

original: MSS_1315-2 anyāyaparibhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ pārthivo gatiḥ //
analyzed: anyāya paribhūtānām sarveṣām pārthivaḥ gatiḥ

original: MSS_1316-1 anāthānāṃ nātho gatiragatikānāṃ vyasanināṃ vinetā bhītānāmabhayamadhṛtīnāṃ bharavaśaḥ /
analyzed: anāthānām nāthaḥ gatiḥ agatikānām vyasaninām vinetā bhītānām abhayam adhṛtīnām bhara vaśaḥ

original: MSS_1316-2 suhṛdbandhuḥ svāmī śaraṇamupakārī varaguruḥ pitā mātā bhrātā jagati puruṣo yaḥ sa nṛpatiḥ //
analyzed: suhṛd bandhuḥ svāmī śaraṇam upakārī vara guruḥ pitā mātā bhrātā jagati puruṣaḥ yaḥ sa nṛpatiḥ

original: MSS_1317-1 anāthān rogiṇo yaśca putravat paripālayet /
analyzed: anāthān rogiṇaḥ yaḥ ca putra vat paripālayet

original: MSS_1317-2 guruṇā samanujñātaḥ sa bhiṣakcchabdamaśnute //
analyzed: guruṇā samanujñātaḥ sa bhiṣaj śabdam aśnute

original: MSS_1318-1 anādaraparo vidvān īhamānaḥ sthirāṃ śriyam /
analyzed: anādara paraḥ vidvān īhamānaḥ sthirām śriyam

original: MSS_1318-2 agneḥ śeṣamṛṇāccheṣaṃ śatroḥ śeṣaṃ na śeṣayet //
analyzed: agneḥ śeṣam ṛṇāt śeṣam śatroḥ śeṣam na śeṣayet

original: MSS_1319-1 anādarahatāṃ sevāṃ dāmpatyaṃ premavarjitam /
analyzed: anādara hatām sevām dāmpatyam prema varjitam

original: MSS_1319-2 maitrīṃ ca hetusāpekṣāṃ ce tanā nādhikurvate //
analyzed: maitrīm ca hetu sāpekṣām ce tanā na adhikurvate

original: MSS_1320-1 anādarālokavivṛddhaśokaḥ pituḥ priyāvākyavaśaṃgatasya /
analyzed: anādara āloka vivṛddha śokaḥ pituḥ priyā vākya vaśaṃgatasya

original: MSS_1320-2 auttānapādirjagatāṃ śaraṇyam ārādhya viṣṇuṃ padamagryamāyāt //
analyzed: auttānapādiḥ jagatām śaraṇyam ārādhya viṣṇum padam agryam āyāt

original: MSS_1321-1 anādāyī vyayaṃ kuryād asahāyī raṇapriyaḥ /
analyzed: an ādāyī vyayam kuryāt asahāyī raṇa priyaḥ

original: MSS_1321-2 āturaḥ sarvabhakṣī ca naraḥ śīghraṃvinaśyati //
analyzed: āturaḥ sarva bhakṣī ca naraḥ śīghram vinaśyati

original: MSS_1322-1 anādidhāvisvaparaṃparāyā hetusrajaḥ srotasi veśvare vā /
analyzed: an ādi dhāvi sva paraṃparāyāḥ hetu srajaḥ srotasi vā īśvare vā

original: MSS_1322-2 āyattadhīreṣa janastadāryāḥ kimīdṛśaḥ paryanuyogayogyaḥ //
analyzed: āyatta dhīḥ eṣa janaḥ tadā āryāḥ kim īdṛśaḥ paryanuyoga yogyaḥ

original: MSS_1323-1 anādiṣṭopi bhūpasya dṛṣṭvā hānikaraṃ ca yaḥ /
analyzed: an ādiṣṭaḥ api bhūpasya dṛṣṭvā hāni karam ca yaḥ

original: MSS_1323-2 yatate tasya nāśāya sa bhṛtyo'rho mahībhujām //
analyzed: yatate tasya nāśāya sa bhṛtyoḥ haḥ mahībhujām

original: MSS_1324-1 anādṛtyaucityaṃ hriyamavigaṇayyātimahatīṃ yadetasyāpyarthe dhanalavadurāśātaralitāḥ /
analyzed: an ādṛtya aucityam hriyam a vigaṇayya ati mahatīm yat etasya api arthe dhana lava durāśā taralitāḥ

original: MSS_1324-2 alīkāhaṃkārajvarakuṭilitabhrūṇi dhanināṃ mukhāni prekṣyante dhigidamatiduṣpūramudaram //
analyzed: alīka ahaṃkāra jvara kuṭilita bhrūṇi dhaninām mukhāni prekṣyante dhik idam ati duṣpūram udaram

original: MSS_1325-1 anādeyaṃ nādadīta parikṣīṇo'pi pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: anādeyam na ādadīta parikṣīṇaḥ api pārthivaḥ

original: MSS_1325-2 na cādeyaṃ samṛddho'pi sūkṣmamapyarthamutsṛjet //
analyzed: na ca ādeyam samṛddhaḥ api sūkṣmam api artham utsṛjet

original: MSS_1326-1 anādeyasya cādānād ādeyasya ca varjanāt /
analyzed: an ādeyasya ca ādānāt ādeyasya ca varjanāt

original: MSS_1326-2 daurbalyaṃ khyāpyate rājñaḥ sa pretyeha ca naśyati //
analyzed: daurbalyam khyāpyate rājñaḥ sa pretya iha ca naśyati

original: MSS_1327-1 anādyantā tu sā tṛṣṇā antardehagatā nṛṇām /
analyzed: anādyantā tu sā tṛṣṇā antar deha gatā nṛṇām

original: MSS_1327-2 vināśayati saṃbhūtā ayonija ivānalaḥ //
analyzed: vināśayati saṃbhūtāḥ ayonijaḥ iva analaḥ

original: MSS_1328-1 anāptapuṇyopacayairdurāpā phalasya nirdhūtarajāḥ savitrī /
analyzed: an āpta puṇya upacayaiḥ durāpā phalasya nirdhūta rajāḥ savitrī

original: MSS_1328-2 tulyā bhavaddarśanasaṃpadeṣā vṛṣṭerdivo vītabalāhakāyāḥ //
analyzed: tulyā bhavat darśana saṃpad eṣā vṛṣṭeḥ divaḥ vīta balāhakāyāḥ

original: MSS_1329-1 anāmnāyamalā vedā brāhmaṇasyāvrataṃ malam /
analyzed: an āmnāya malāḥ vedāḥ brāhmaṇasya a vratam malam

original: MSS_1329-2 malaṃ pṛthivyā vāhīkāḥ puruṣasyānṛtaṃ malam //
analyzed: malam pṛthivyāḥ vāhīkāḥ puruṣasya anṛtam malam

original: MSS_1330-1 anāyakā vinaśyanti naśyanti bahunāyakāḥ /
analyzed: anāyakāḥ vinaśyanti naśyanti bahu nāyakāḥ

original: MSS_1330-2 strīnāyakā vinaśyanti naśyanti śiśunāyakāḥ //
analyzed: strī nāyakāḥ vinaśyanti naśyanti śiśu nāyakāḥ

original: MSS_1331-1 anāyake na vastavyaṃ na vased bahunāyake /
analyzed: anāyake na vastavyam na vaset bahu nāyake

original: MSS_1331-2 strīnāyake na vastavyaṃ na vased bālanāyake //
analyzed: strī nāyake na vastavyam na vaset bāla nāyake

original: MSS_1332-1 anāyavyayakartā ca anāthaḥ kalahapriyaḥ /
analyzed: anāya vyaya kartā ca anāthaḥ kalahapriyaḥ

original: MSS_1332-2 āturaḥ sarvabhakṣī ca naraḥ śīghraṃ vinaśyati //
analyzed: āturaḥ sarva bhakṣī ca naraḥ śīghram vinaśyati

original: MSS_1333-1 anāyāsakṛśaṃ madhyam aśaṅkatarale dṛśau /
analyzed: anāyāsa kṛśam madhyam aśaṅka tarale dṛśau

original: MSS_1333-2 abhūṣaṇamanohāri vapurvayasi subhruvaḥ //
analyzed: abhūṣaṇa manohāri vapuḥ vayasi subhruvaḥ

original: MSS_1334-1 anāyi deśaḥ katamastvayādya vasantamuktasya daśāṃ vanasya /
analyzed: anāyi deśaḥ katamaḥ tvayā adya vasanta muktasya daśām vanasya

original: MSS_1334-2 tvadāptasaṃketatayā kṛtārthā śravyāpi nānena janena saṃjñā //
analyzed: tvad āpta saṃketa tayā kṛtārthā śravyā api nā anena janena saṃjñā

original: MSS_1335-1 anārataṃ tena padeṣu lambhitā vibhajya samyagviniyogasatkriyāḥ /
analyzed: anāratam tena padeṣu lambhitāḥ vibhajya samyak viniyoga satkriyāḥ

original: MSS_1335-2 phalantyupāyāḥ paribṛṃhitāyatīr upetya saṃgharṣamivārthasaṃpadaḥ //
analyzed: phalanti upāyāḥ paribṛṃhita āyatīḥ upetya saṃgharṣam iva artha saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_1336-1 anārataṃ pratidiśaṃ pratideśaṃ jale sthale /
analyzed: anāratam pratidiśam pratideśam jale sthale

original: MSS_1336-2 jāyante ca mriyante ca budbudā iva vāriṇi //
analyzed: jāyante ca mriyante ca budbudāḥ iva vāriṇi

original: MSS_1337-1 anāratapariskhalannayanavāridhārāśata- pravṛddhapathanimnagāsalilaruddhayānodyamā /
analyzed: anārata pariskhalat nayana vāri dhārā śata pravṛddha patha nimnagā salila ruddha yāna udyamā

original: MSS_1337-2 tvadīyaripukāminī bahuvideśayānaiṣiṇī vinindati valaddṛśā gururuṣāśrupaṃ prāvṛṣam //
analyzed: tvadīya ripu kāminī bahu videśa yāna eṣiṇī vinindati valat dṛśā guru ruṣā aśrupam prāvṛṣam

original: MSS_1338-1 anārabdhākṣepaṃ paramakṛtavāṣpavyatikaraṃ nigūḍhāntastāpaṃ hṛdayavinipītaṃ vyavasitam /
analyzed: anārabdha ākṣepam parama kṛta vāṣpa vyatikaram nigūḍha antar tāpam hṛdaya vinipītam vyavasitam

original: MSS_1338-2 kṛśāṅgyā yatpāpe vrajati mayi nairāśyapiśunaṃ ślathairaṅgairuktaṃ hṛdayamidamunmūlayati tat //
analyzed: kṛśa aṅgyāḥ yat pāpe vrajati mayi nairāśya piśunam ślathaiḥ aṅgaiḥ uktam hṛdayam idam unmūlayati tat

original: MSS_1339-1 anārabhyā bhavantyarthāḥ kecin nityaṃ tathāgatāḥ /
analyzed: an ārabhyāḥ bhavanti arthāḥ kecid nityam tathāgatāḥ

original: MSS_1339-2 kṛtaḥ puruṣakāro'pi bhavedyeṣu nirarthakaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtaḥ puruṣakāraḥ api bhavet yeṣu nirarthakaḥ

original: MSS_1340-1 anārambhastu kāryāṇāṃ prathamaṃ buddhilakṣaṇam /
analyzed: anārambhaḥ tu kāryāṇām prathamam buddhi lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_1340-2 ārabdhasyāntagamanaṃ dvitīyaṃ buddhilakṣaṇam //
analyzed: ārabdhasya anta gamanam dvitīyam buddhi lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_1341-1 anārādhya kālīmanāsvādya gauḍī- mṛte mantratantrādvinā śabdacauryāt /
analyzed: an ārādhya kālīm an āsvādya gauḍī mṛte mantra tantrāt vinā śabda cauryāt

original: MSS_1341-2 prabandhaṃ pragalbhaṃ prakartuṃ pravaktuṃ viriñciprapañce madanyaḥ kaviḥ kaḥ //
analyzed: prabandham pragalbham prakartum pravaktum viriñci prapañce madanyaḥ kaviḥ kaḥ

original: MSS_1342-1 anārogyamanāyuṣyam asvargyaṃ cātibhojanam /
analyzed: anārogyam anāyuṣyam asvargyam ca ati bhojanam

original: MSS_1342-2 apuṇyaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ tasmāt tat parivarjayet //
analyzed: apuṇyam loka vidviṣṭam tasmāt tat parivarjayet

original: MSS_1343-1 anāryatā niṣṭhuratā krūratā niṣkriyātmatā /
analyzed: anārya tā niṣṭhura tā krūra tā niṣkriya ātma tā

original: MSS_1343-2 puruṣaṃ vyañjayantīha loke kaluṣayonijam //
analyzed: puruṣam vyañjayanti iha loke kaluṣa yoni jam

original: MSS_1344-1 anāryaprajñānāmiha janavadhūnāṃ hi manaso mahāśalyaṃ karṇe tava kanakajambūkisalayaḥ /
analyzed: anārya prajñānām iha jana vadhūnām hi manasaḥ mahā śalyam karṇe tava kanaka jambū kisalayaḥ

original: MSS_1344-2 bhraman bhikṣāhetoradhinagari buddho'si na mayā ?
analyzed: bhraman bhikṣā hetoḥ adhi nagari buddhaḥ asi na mayā

original: tvayaitāvadveṣaḥ pathika na vidheyaḥ punarapi //
analyzed: tvayā etāvat veṣaḥ pathika na vidheyaḥ punar api

original: MSS_1345-1 anāryamapyācaritaṃ kumāryā bhavān mama kṣāmyatu saumya tāvat /
analyzed: anāryam api ācaritam kumāryāḥ bhavān mama kṣāmyatu saumya tāvat

original: MSS_1345-2 haṃso'pi devāṃśatayāsi vandyaḥ śrīvatsalakṣmeva hi matsyamūrtiḥ //
analyzed: haṃsaḥ api deva aṃśa tayā asi vandyaḥ śrīvatsa lakṣmā iva hi matsya mūrtiḥ

original: MSS_1346-1 anāryavṛttamaprājñam asūyakamadhārmikam /
analyzed: anārya vṛttam aprājñam asūyakam adhārmikam

original: MSS_1346-2 anarthāḥ kṣipramāyānti vāgduṣṭaṃ krodhanaṃ tathā //
analyzed: anarthāḥ kṣipram āyānti vāgduṣṭam krodhanam tathā

original: MSS_1347-1 anāryeṇa kṛtaghnena saṃgatirme na yujyate /
analyzed: anāryeṇa kṛtaghnena saṃgatiḥ me na yujyate

original: MSS_1347-2 vināśamapi kāṅkṣanti jñātīnāṃ jñātayaḥ sadā //
analyzed: vināśam api kāṅkṣanti jñātīnām jñātayaḥ sadā

original: MSS_1348-1 anālokya vyayaṃ karttā anāthaḥ kalahapriyaḥ /
analyzed: an ālokya vyayam karttā anāthaḥ kalaha priyaḥ

original: MSS_1348-2 āturaḥ sarvakṣetreṣu naraḥ śīghraṃ vinaśyati //
analyzed: āturaḥ sarva kṣetreṣu naraḥ śīghram vinaśyati

original: MSS_1349-1 anālocya premṇaḥ pariṇatimanādṛtya suhṛdas tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale saṃprati kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: an ālocya premṇaḥ pariṇatim an ādṛtya suhṛdaḥ tvayā akāṇḍe mānaḥ kim iti sarale saṃprati kṛtaḥ

original: MSS_1349-2 samākṛṣṭā hyete pralayadahanodbhāsuraśikhāḥ svahastenāṅgārāstadalamadhunāraṇyaruditaiḥ //
analyzed: samākṛṣṭāḥ hi ete pralaya dahana udbhāsura śikhāḥ sva hastena aṅgārāḥ tat alam adhunā araṇyaruditaiḥ

original: MSS_1350-1 anāvartī kālo vrajati sa vṛthā tanna gaṇitaṃ daśāstāstāḥ soḍhā vyasanaśatasaṃpātavidhurāḥ /
analyzed: anāvartī kālaḥ vrajati sa vṛthā tat na gaṇitam daśāḥ tāḥ tāḥ soḍhāḥ vyasana śata saṃpāta vidhurāḥ

original: MSS_1350-2 kiyadvā vakṣyāmaḥ kimiva bata nātmanyupakṛtaṃ vayaṃ yāvattāvat punarapi tadeva vyavasitam //
analyzed: kiyat vā vakṣyāmaḥ kim iva bata na ātmani upakṛtam vayam yāvat tāvat punar api tat eva vyavasitam

original: MSS_1351-1 anāvarjitacittāpi dhruvaṃ sarvān pradhāvati /
analyzed: an āvarjita cittā api dhruvam sarvān pradhāvati

original: MSS_1351-2 phalaṃ na labhate kiṃcit tṛṣṇā jīrṇeva kāminī //
analyzed: phalam na labhate kiṃcid tṛṣṇā jīrṇā iva kāminī

original: MSS_1352-1 anāvilaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkte viṣayāṇāmanutsukaḥ /
analyzed: anāvilam phalam bhuṅkte viṣayāṇām anutsukaḥ

original: MSS_1352-2 utsuko labdharokeṇa tatra śokena śīryate //
analyzed: utsukaḥ labdha rokeṇa tatra śokena śīryate

original: MSS_1353-1 anāvṛtanavadvārapañjare vihagānilaḥ /
analyzed: anāvṛta nava dvāra pañjare vihaga anilaḥ

original: MSS_1353-2 yattiṣṭhati tadāścaryaṃ viyoge tasya kā kathā //
analyzed: yat tiṣṭhati tat āścaryam viyoge tasya kā kathā

original: MSS_1354-1 anāvṛtāḥ svavarṇeṣu sarvasādhāraṇāḥ purā /
analyzed: anāvṛtāḥ sva varṇeṣu sarva sādhāraṇāḥ purā

original: MSS_1354-2 nāryo babhūvurnirvairo yataḥ sarvo'bhavajjanaḥ //
analyzed: nāryaḥ babhūvuḥ nirvairaḥ yatas sarvaḥ bhavat janaḥ

original: MSS_1355-1 anāvṛṣṭihate deśe sasye ca pralayaṃ gate /
analyzed: anāvṛṣṭi hate deśe sasye ca pralayam gate

original: MSS_1355-2 dhanyāstāta na paśyanti deśabhaṅgaṃ kulakṣayam //
analyzed: dhanyāḥ tāta na paśyanti deśa bhaṅgam kula kṣayam

original: MSS_1356-1 anāśritā dānapuṇyaṃ vedapuṇyamanāśritāḥ /
analyzed: anāśritāḥ dāna puṇyam veda puṇyam anāśritāḥ

original: MSS_1356-2 rāgadveṣavinirmuktā vicarantīha mokṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: rāga dveṣa vinirmuktāḥ vicaranti iha mokṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_1357-1 anāśrite dṛptagurau avajñāṃ kalayen nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: anāśrite dṛpta gurau avajñām kalayet nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_1357-2 saṃvartena maruttastu nirastamakarodgurum //
analyzed: saṃvartena maruttaḥ tu nirastam akarot gurum

original: MSS_1358-1 anāsthā vastūnāmabhimataguṇānāmupahṛtau ghano garvastanvyā ruṣi ca vihitāḍambaravidhiḥ /
analyzed: anāsthā vastūnām abhimata guṇānām upahṛtau ghanaḥ garvaḥ tanvyāḥ ruṣi ca vihita āḍambara vidhiḥ

original: MSS_1358-2 prahāraḥ pādābhyāṃ yamanamapi kāñcyā caraṇayoḥ priyāyā vibbokaṃ tadidamiti dhanyo'nubhavati //
analyzed: prahāraḥ pādābhyām yamanam api kāñcyā caraṇayoḥ priyāyāḥ vibbokam tat idam iti dhanyaḥ anubhavati

original: MSS_1359-1 anāsvāditasaṃbhogāḥ patantu tava śatravaḥ /
analyzed: an āsvādita saṃbhogāḥ patantu tava śatravaḥ

original: MSS_1359-2 bālavaidhavyadagdhānāṃ kulastrīṇāṃ stanā iva //
analyzed: bāla vaidhavya dagdhānām kula strīṇām stanāḥ iva

original: MSS_1360-1 anāsvādyamavikreyam anādeyamanīpsitam /
analyzed: an āsvādyam a vikreyam an ādeyam anīpsitam

original: MSS_1360-2 dattaṃ nirupakāraṃ yad vandhyadānena tena kim //
analyzed: dattam nirupakāram yat vandhya dānena tena kim

original: MSS_1361-1 anāhitāgniḥ śatagur ayajvā ca sahsraguḥ /
analyzed: anāhitāgniḥ śataguḥ ayajvā ca sahsraguḥ

original: MSS_1361-2 surāpo vṛṣalībhartā braḥmahā gurutalpagaḥ //
MSS_1362-1 asatpratigrahe yukttaḥ stenaḥ kutsitayājakaḥ /
analyzed: asat pratigrahe yukttaḥ stenaḥ kutsita yājakaḥ

original: MSS_1362-2 adoṣastyaktumanyonyaṃ karmasaṃkaraniścayāt //
analyzed: adoṣaḥ tyaktum anyonyam karma saṃkara niścayāt

original: MSS_1363-1 anāhūtaḥ praviśati apṛṣṭo bahu bhāṣate /
analyzed: anāhūtaḥ praviśati apṛṣṭaḥ bahu bhāṣate

original: MSS_1363-2 viśvasityapramatteṣu mūḍhacetā narādhamaḥ //
analyzed: viśvasiti apramatteṣu mūḍha cetāḥ nara adhamaḥ

original: MSS_1363A-1 anāhūtaḥ samāyātaḥ anāpṛṣṭastu bhāṣate /
analyzed: anāhūtaḥ samāyātaḥ an āpṛṣṭaḥ tu bhāṣate

original: MSS_1363A-2 paranindātmanaḥ stutiś catvāri laghulakṣaṇam //
analyzed: para nindā ātmanaḥ stutiḥ catvāri laghu lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_1364-1 anāhūtapraviṣṭasya dṛṣṭasya kruddhacakṣuṣā /
analyzed: an āhūta praviṣṭasya dṛṣṭasya kruddha cakṣuṣā

original: MSS_1364-2 svayamevopaviṣṭasya varaṃ mṛtyurna bhojanam //
analyzed: svayam eva upaviṣṭasya varam mṛtyuḥ na bhojanam

original: MSS_1365-1 anahūtāḥ svayaṃ yānti rasāsvādavilolupāḥ /
analyzed: anahūtāḥ svayam yānti rasa āsvāda vilolupāḥ

original: MSS_1365-2 nivāritā na gacchanti makṣikā iva bhikṣukāḥ //
analyzed: nivāritāḥ na gacchanti makṣikāḥ iva bhikṣukāḥ

original: MSS_1366-1 anāhūto viśedyastu apṛṣṭo bahu bhāṣate /

original: MSS_1366-2 ātmānaṃ manyate prītaṃ bhūpālasya sa durmatiḥ //
analyzed: ātmānam manyate prītam bhūpālasya sa durmatiḥ

original: MSS_1367-1 anāhvāne praveśaśca apṛṣṭe paribhāṣaṇam /
analyzed: an āhvāne praveśaḥ ca a pṛṣṭe paribhāṣaṇam

original: MSS_1367-2 ātmastutiḥ pare nindā catvāri laghulakṣaṇam //
analyzed: ātma stutiḥ pare nindā catvāri laghu lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_1368-1 anicchato'pi duḥkhāni yathehāyānti dehinaḥ /
analyzed: an icchataḥ api duḥkhāni yathā iha āyānti dehinaḥ

original: MSS_1368-2 sukhānyapi tathā manye cintādainyena ko guṇaḥ //
analyzed: sukhāni api tathā manye cintā dainyena kaḥ guṇaḥ

original: MSS_1369-1 aniḥsarantīmapi gehagarbhāt kīrtiṃ pareṣāmasatīṃ vadanti /

original: MSS_1369-2 svairaṃ bhramantīmapi ca trilokyāṃ tvatkīrtimāhuḥ kavayaḥ satīṃ tu //

original: MSS_1370-1 anicchanto'pi vinayaṃ vidyābhyāsena bālakāḥ /
analyzed: an icchantaḥ api vinayam vidyā abhyāsena bālakāḥ

original: MSS_1370-2 bheṣajeneva nairujyaṃ prāpaṇīyāḥ prayatnataḥ //
analyzed: bheṣajena iva nairujyam prāpaṇīyāḥ prayatnataḥ

original: MSS_1371-1 anicchannapi cittena videśastho'pi mānavaḥ /
analyzed: an icchan api cittena videśa sthaḥ pi mānavaḥ

original: MSS_1371-2 svakarmotpātavātena nīyate yatra tatphalam //
analyzed: sva karma utpāta vātena nīyate yatra tat phalam

original: MSS_1372-1 anijyayā vivāhaiśca vedasyotsādanena ca /

original: MSS_1372-2 kulānyakulatāṃ yānti dharmasyātikrameṇa ca //
analyzed: kulāni akula tām yānti dharmasya atikrameṇa ca

original: MSS_1373-1 anityaṃ nisrāṇaṃ jananamaraṇavyādhikalitaṃ jaganmithyātvārthairahamahamikāliṅgitamidam /
analyzed: anityam nisrāṇam janana maraṇa vyādhi kalitam jagat mithyātva arthaiḥ ahamahamikā āliṅgitam idam

original: MSS_1373-2 vicintyaivaṃ santo vimalamanaso dharmamatayas tapaḥ kartuṃ vṛttāstadapasṛtaye jainamanagham //

original: MSS_1374-1 anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitaṃ dravyasaṃcayaḥ /

original: MSS_1374-2 aiśvaryaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyedeṣu na paṇḍitaḥ //

original: MSS_1375-1 anityatāsamākhyānaṃ viṣayādiviḍambanam /
MSS_1375-2 paścāttāpasya kathanaṃ kālasya caritaṃ tathā //
analyzed: paścāttāpasya kathanam kālasya caritam tathā

original: MSS_1376-1 anityate jagannindye vandanīyāsi saṃprati /
MSS_1376-2 yā karoṣi prasaṅgena duḥkhānāmapyanityatām //
analyzed: yā karoṣi prasaṅgena duḥkhānām api anitya tām

original: MSS_1377-1 anityatve kṛtamatir mlānamālyena śocati /

original: MSS_1377-2 nityatve kṛtabuddhistu bhinnabhāṇḍe'nuśocati //
analyzed: nitya tve kṛtabuddhiḥ tu

original: MSS_1379-1 anityasya śarīrasya sarvadoṣamayasya ca /

original: MSS_1380-1 anityāni śarīrāṇi vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ /

original: MSS_1380-2 nityaṃ saṃnihito mṛtyuḥ kartavyo dharmasaṃgrahaḥ //

original: MSS_1382-1 anityo vijayo yasmād dṛśyate yudhyamānayoḥ /

original: MSS_1384-2 saptajanmadaridratvam ante viṣṇusthitiśca na //

original: MSS_1386-1 prāṇairapyupakāritvaṃ mitrāyāvyabhicāriṇe /

original: MSS_1386-2 gṛhāgate pariṣvaṅgaḥ śaktyā dānaṃ sahiṣṇutā //

original: MSS_1388-1 anindyamapi nindanti stuvantyastutyamuccakaiḥ /

original: MSS_1389-1 anibandhanakacabandhanam anidānaṃ dānamuttarīyasya /

original: MSS_1390-1 anibhālita eva kevalaṃ khanigarbhe nidhireṣa jīryatu /

original: MSS_1391-1 animiṣamavirāmā rāgiṇāṃ sarvarātraṃ navanidhuvanalīlāḥ kautukenātivīkṣya /

original: MSS_1392-1 aniyataruditasmitaṃ virājat- katipayakomaladantakuḍmalāgram /

original: MSS_1392-2 vadanakamalakaṃ śiśoḥ smarāmi skhaladasamañjasamugdhajalpitaṃ te //
analyzed: vadana kamalakam śiśoḥ smarāmi skhalat asamañjasa mugdha jalpitam te

original: MSS_1393-1 aniyuktā hi sācivye yadvadanti manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: a niyuktāḥ hi sācivye yat vadanti manīṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_1393-2 anurāgadravasyaitāḥ praṇayasyātibhūmayaḥ //

original: MSS_1394-1 anirākṛtatāpasaṃpadaṃ phalahīnāṃ sumanobhirujjhitām /

original: MSS_1394-2 khalatāṃ khalanāmivāsatīṃ pratipadyeta kathaṃ budho janaḥ //
analyzed: khala tām khala nām iva asatīm pratipadyeta katham budhaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_1395-1 anirīkṣaṇameva dṛṣṭirārdrā parihāsālapanāni maunameva /

original: MSS_1395-2 avadhīraṇameva cābhiyogo vinigūḍho'pi hi lakṣyate'nurāgaḥ //
analyzed: avadhīraṇam eva ca abhiyogaḥ vinigūḍhaḥ api hi lakṣya tenu rāgaḥ

original: MSS_1396-1 anirghātaṃ dhārādharamaśamanīyaṃ nidhirapām akāṭhinyaṃ cintāmaṇimajaḍabhūtaṃ suratarum /

original: MSS_1396-2 abhittvopādāya prabhurapaśuvṛttiṃ ca surabhiṃ parārthaikasvārthānakṛta puruṣānādipuruṣaḥ //

original: MSS_1397-1 anirjayena dviṣatāṃ yasyāmarṣaḥ praśāmyati /

original: MSS_1397-2 puruṣoktiḥ kathaṃ tasmin brūhi tvaṃ hi tapodhana //
analyzed: puruṣa uktiḥ katham tasmin brūhi tvam hi tapodhana

original: MSS_1398-1 kṛtaṃ puruṣaśabdena jātimātrāvalambinā /
analyzed: kṛtam puruṣa śabdena jāti mātra avalambinā

original: MSS_1398-2 yo'ṅgīkṛtaguṇaiḥ ślādhyaḥ savismayamudāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ ṅgīkṛta guṇaiḥ ślādhyaḥ sa vismayam udāhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_1399-1 grasamānamivaujāṃsi sadasā gauraveritam /
analyzed: grasamānam iva ojāṃsi sadasā gaurava īritam

original: MSS_1399-2 nāma yasyābhinanadanti dviṣo'pi sa pumānpumān //
analyzed: nāma yasya abhinanadanti dviṣaḥ upi sa pumān pumān

original: MSS_1400-1 anirdayopabhogasya rūpasya mṛdunaḥ katham /
analyzed: anirdaya upabhogasya rūpasya mṛdunaḥ katham

original: MSS_1400-2 kaṭhinaṃ khalu te cetaḥ śirīṣasyeva bandhanam //
analyzed: kaṭhinam khalu te cetaḥ śirīṣasya iva bandhanam

original: MSS_1401-1 anirloḍitakāryasya vāgjālaṃ vāgmino vṛthā /
analyzed: a nirloḍita kāryasya vāc jālam vāgminaḥ vṛthā

original: MSS_1401-2 nimittādaparāddheṣor dhānuṣkasyeva valgitam //
analyzed: nimittāt aparāddha iṣoḥ dhānuṣkasya iva valgitam

original: MSS_1402-1 anirvācyamanirbhinnam aparicchinnamavyayam /
analyzed: anirvācyam anirbhinnam aparicchinnam avyayam

original: MSS_1402-2 brahmeva sujanaprema duḥkhamūlanikṛntanam //
analyzed: brahmā iva su jana prema duḥkha mūla nikṛntanam

original: MSS_1403-1 anirvṛtaṃ tathā mandaṃ paralokaparāṅmukham /
analyzed: anirvṛtam tathā mandam para loka parāṅmukham

original: MSS_1403-2 narakāya na sadgatyaṃ kuputrālambijanma vai //
analyzed: narakāya na sat gatyam ku putra ālambi janma vai

original: MSS_1404-1 anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlaṃ cañcurme lohasaṃnibhā /
analyzed: anirvedaḥ śriyaḥ mūlam cañcuḥ me loha saṃnibhā

original: MSS_1404-2 ahorātrāṇi dīrghāṇi samudraḥ kiṃ na śuṣyati //
analyzed: ahorātrāṇi dīrghāṇi samudraḥ kim na śuṣyati

original: MSS_1405-1 anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlaṃ duḥkhanāśe sukhasya ca /
analyzed: anirvedaḥ śriyaḥ mūlam duḥkha nāśe sukhasya ca

original: MSS_1405-2 mahān bhavatyanirviṇṇaḥ sukhaṃ cātyantamaśnute //
analyzed: mahān bhavati anirviṇṇaḥ sukham ca atyantam aśnute

original: MSS_1406-1 anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlam anirvedaḥ paraṃ sukham /
analyzed: anirvedaḥ śriyaḥ mūlam anirvedaḥ param sukham

original: MSS_1406-2 anirvedo hi satataṃ sarvārtheṣu pravartakaḥ //
analyzed: anirvedaḥ hi satatam sarva artheṣu pravartakaḥ

original: MSS_1407-1 anirvedo hi satataṃ sarvārtheṣu pravartakaḥ /
analyzed: anirvedaḥ hi satatam sarva artheṣu pravartakaḥ

original: MSS_1407-2 karoti saphalaṃ jantoḥ karma yacca karoti saḥ //
analyzed: karoti saphalam jantoḥ karma yat ca karoti saḥ

original: MSS_1408-1 anila nikhilaviśvaṃ prāṇiti tvatprayuktaṃ sapadi ca vinimīlatyākulaṃ tvadviyogāt /
analyzed: anila nikhila viśvam prāṇiti tvad prayuktam sapadi ca vinimīlati ākulam tvad viyogāt

original: MSS_1408-2 vapurasi parameśasyācitaṃ nocitaṃ te surabhimasurabhiṃ vā yatsamaṃ svīkaroṣi //
analyzed: vapuḥ asi parameśasya ācitam na ucitam te surabhim a surabhim vā yat samam svīkaroṣi

original: MSS_1409-1 aniśaṃ nayanābhirāmayā ramayā saṃmadino mukhasya te /
analyzed: aniśam nayana abhirāmayā ramayā saṃmadinaḥ mukhasya te

original: MSS_1409-2 niśi niḥsaradindiraṃ kathaṃ tulayāmaḥ kalayāpi paṅkajam //
analyzed: niśi niḥsarat indiram katham tulayāmaḥ kalayā api paṅkajam

original: MSS_1410-1 aniśaṃ mataṅgajānāṃ bṛṃhitamākarṇyate yathā vipine /
analyzed: aniśam mataṅga jānām bṛṃhitam ākarṇyate yathā vipine

original: MSS_1410-2 manye tathā na jīvati gajendrapalakavalanaḥ siṃhaḥ //
analyzed: manye tathā na jīvati gaja indra pala ka valanaḥ siṃhaḥ

original: MSS_1411-1 aniśamapi makaraketur manaso rujamāvahannabhimato me /
analyzed: aniśam api makaraketuḥ manasaḥ rujam āvahan abhimataḥ me

original: MSS_1411-2 yadi madirāyatanayanāṃ tāmadhikṛtya praharatīti //
analyzed: yadi madirā āyata nayanām tām adhikṛtya praharati iti

original: MSS_1412-1 aniścitairadhyavasāyabhīrubhir yatheṣṭasaṃlāparatiprayojanaiḥ /
analyzed: aniścitaiḥ adhyavasāya bhīrubhiḥ yatheṣṭa saṃlāpa rati prayojanaiḥ

original: MSS_1412-2 phale visaṃvādamupāgatā giraḥ prayānti loke parihāsavastutām //
analyzed: phale visaṃvādam upāgatāḥ giraḥ prayānti loke parihāsa vastu tām

original: MSS_1413-1 aniṣṭaḥ kanyakāyā yo varo rūpānvito'pi yaḥ /
analyzed: aniṣṭaḥ kanyakāyāḥ yaḥ varaḥ rūpa anvitaḥ api yaḥ

original: MSS_1413-2 yadi syāttasya no deyā kanyā śreyo'bhivāñchatā //
analyzed: yadi syāt tasya naḥ deyā kanyā śreyaḥ abhivāñchatā

original: MSS_1414-1 aniṣṭadaḥ kṣitīśānāṃ bhūkampaḥ saṃdhyayordvayoḥ /
analyzed: aniṣṭa daḥ kṣitīśānām bhūkampaḥ saṃdhyayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: MSS_1414-2 digdāhaḥ pītavarṇatvād rājñāṃ cāniṣṭadaḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: digdāhaḥ pīta varṇa tvāt rājñām ca aniṣṭa daḥ paraḥ

original: MSS_1415-1 aniṣṭayogāt priyaviprayogataḥ parāpamānāddhanahīnajīvitāt /
analyzed: aniṣṭa yogāt priya viprayogataḥ para apamānāt dhana hīna jīvitāt

original: MSS_1415-2 anekajanmavyasanaprabandhato bibheti no yastapaso bibheti saḥ //
analyzed: aneka janma vyasana prabandhataḥ bibheti no yaḥ tapasaḥ bibheti saḥ

original: MSS_1416-1 aniṣṭasamprayogācca viprayogātpriyasya ca /
analyzed: aniṣṭa samprayogāt ca viprayogāt priyasya ca

original: MSS_1416-2 mānuṣā mānasairduḥkhair yujyante alpabuddhayaḥ //
analyzed: mānuṣāḥ mānasaiḥ duḥkhaiḥ yujyante alpabuddhayaḥ

original: MSS_1417-1 aniṣṭādiṣṭalābhe'pi na gatirjāyate śubhā /
analyzed: aniṣṭa ādiṣṭa lābhe pi na gatiḥ jāyate śubhā

original: MSS_1417-2 yatrāste viṣasaṃsargo'mṛtaṃ tadapi mṛtyave //
analyzed: yatra āste viṣa saṃsargaḥ umṛtam tat api mṛtyave

original: MSS_1418-1 aniṣpannāmapi kriyāṃ nayopetāṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: aniṣpannām api kriyām naya upetām vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: MSS_1418-2 phaladāṃ hi prakurvanti mahāsenāpatiryathā //
analyzed: phala dām hi prakurvanti mahā senāpatiḥ yathā

original: MSS_1419-1 anīrṣyāḥ śrotāro mama vacasi cedvacmi tadahaṃ svapakṣādbhetavyaṃ bahu na tu viprapakṣāt prabhavataḥ /
analyzed: anīrṣyāḥ śrotāraḥ mama vacasi ced vacmi tat aham sva pakṣāt bhetavyam bahu na tu vipra pakṣāt prabhavataḥ

original: MSS_1419-2 tamasyākrāntaśe kiyadapi hi tejovayavinaḥ svaśaktyā bhāsante divasakṛti satyeva na punaḥ //
analyzed: kiyat api hi tejaḥ vayavinaḥ sva śaktyā bhāsante divasakṛti sati eva na punar

original: MSS_1420-1 anīrṣyurguptadāraḥ syāc cokṣaḥ syādaghṛṇī nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: anīrṣyuḥ gupta dāraḥ syāt cokṣaḥ syāt aghṛṇī nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_1420-2 striyaṃ seveta nātyarthaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ muñjīta nāhitam //
analyzed: striyam seveta na atyartham mṛṣṭam muñjīta na ahitam

original: MSS_1421-1 anīrṣyurguptadāraḥ syāt saṃvibhāgī priyaṃvadaḥ /
analyzed: anīrṣyuḥ gupta dāraḥ syāt saṃvibhāgī priyaṃvadaḥ

original: MSS_1421-2 ślakṣṇo madhuravākstrīṇāṃ na cāsāṃ vaśago bhavet //
analyzed: ślakṣṇaḥ madhura vāc strīṇām na ca āsām vaśagaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_1422-1 anīśāya śarīrasya hṛdayaṃ svavaśaṃ mayi /
analyzed: anīśāya śarīrasya hṛdayam sva vaśam mayi

original: MSS_1422-2 stanakampakriyālakṣyair nyastaṃ niḥśvasitairiva //
analyzed: stana kampa kriyā lakṣyaiḥ nyastam niḥśvasitaiḥ iva

original: MSS_1423-1 anīśvaro'yaṃ puruṣo bhavābhave sūtraprotā dārumayīva yoṣā /
analyzed: anīśvaraḥ yam puruṣaḥ bhava abhave sūtra protāḥ dāru mayī iva yoṣā

original: MSS_1423-2 dhātrā tu diṣṭasya vaśe kilāyaṃ tasmādvada tvaṃ śravaṇe dhrto'ham //
analyzed: dhātrā tu diṣṭasya vaśe kila ayam tasmāt vada tvam śravaṇe

original: MSS_1424-1 anukartumapahnotum ativartitumīkṣitum /
analyzed: anukartum apahnotum ativartitum īkṣitum

original: MSS_1424-2 aśakye tejasāṃ patyau mitratānumatikṣamā //
analyzed: aśakye tejasām patyau mitra tā anumati kṣamā

original: MSS_1425-1 anukurutaḥ khalasujanāv agrimapāścātyabhāgayoḥ sūcyāḥ /
analyzed: anukurutaḥ khala su janau agrima pāścātya bhāgayoḥ sūcyāḥ

original: MSS_1425-2 vidadhāti randhrameko guṇavānanyastvapidadhāti //
analyzed: vidadhāti randhram ekaḥ guṇavān anyaḥ tu apidadhāti

original: MSS_1426-1 anukūlakalatro yas tasya svarga ihaiva hi /
analyzed: anukūla kalatraḥ yaḥ tasya svargaḥ iha eva hi

original: MSS_1426-2 pratikūlakalatrasya narako nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: pratikūla kalatrasya narakaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_1427-1 anukūlamarthyamavirodhi hitaṃ śravaṇīyamāgamarahasyayutam /
analyzed: anukūlam arthyam avirodhi hitam śravaṇīyam āgama rahasya yutam

original: MSS_1427-2 vacanaṃ madīyamapakarṇayati kva manobhavaḥ kva guṇasaṃgrahaṇam //
analyzed: vacanam madīyam apakarṇayati kva manobhavaḥ kva guṇa saṃgrahaṇam

original: MSS_1428-1 anukūlavarapuraṃdhriṣu puruṣāṇāṃ baddhamūlarāgāṇām /
analyzed: anukūla vara puraṃdhriṣu puruṣāṇām baddha mūla rāgāṇām

original: MSS_1428-2 nayati mano duḥśīlaḥ kusumāstro hīnapātreṣu //
analyzed: nayati manaḥ duḥśīlaḥ kusuma astraḥ hīna pātreṣu

original: MSS_1429-1 anukūlavidhāyidaivato vijayī syān nanu kīdṛśo nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: anukūla vidhāyi daivataḥ vijayī syāt nanu kīdṛśaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_1429-2 virahiṇyapi jānakī vane nivasantī mudamādadhau kutaḥ //
analyzed: virahiṇī api jānakī vane nivasantī mudam ādadhau kutas

original: MSS_1430-1 anukūlāṃ vimalāṅgīṃ kulajāṃ kuśalāṃ suśīlasaṃpannām /
analyzed: anukūlām vimala aṅgīm kula jām kuśalām su śīla saṃpannām

original: MSS_1430-2 pañcalakārāṃ bhāryāṃ puruṣaḥ puṇyodayāllabhate //
analyzed: pañca lakārām bhāryām puruṣaḥ puṇya udayāt labhate

original: MSS_1431-1 anukūlā sadā tuṣṭā dakṣā sādhvī vicakṣaṇā /
analyzed: anukūlā sadā tuṣṭā dakṣā sādhvī vicakṣaṇā

original: MSS_1431-2 ebhireva guṇairyuktā śrīriva strī na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: ebhiḥ eva guṇaiḥ yuktā śrīḥ iva strī na saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_1432-1 anukūle vidhau deyaṃ yataḥ pūrayitā hariḥ /
analyzed: anukūle vidhau deyam yatas pūrayitā hariḥ

original: MSS_1432-2 pratikūle vidhau deyaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ hariṣyati //
analyzed: pratikūle vidhau deyam yatas sarvam hariṣyati

original: MSS_1433-1 anukūle sati dhātari bhavatyaniṣṭādapīṣṭamavilambam /
analyzed: anukūle sati dhātari bhavati aniṣṭāt api iṣṭam avilambam

original: MSS_1433-2 pītvā viṣamapi śaṃbhur mṛtyuṃjayatāmavāpa tatkālam //
analyzed: pītvā viṣam api śaṃbhuḥ mṛtyuṃjaya tām avāpa tad kālam

original: MSS_1434-1 anukṛtagaṇḍaśailamadamaṇḍitagaṇḍataṭa- bhramadalimaṇḍalīniviḍaguṅgumaghoṣajuṣaḥ /
analyzed: anukṛta gaṇḍa śaila mada maṇḍita gaṇḍa taṭa bhramat ali maṇḍala nibiḍa guṅguma ghoṣa juṣaḥ

original: MSS_1434-2 dalayati helayaiva harirugrakarānkariṇa- strijagati teja eva guru no vikṛtākṛtitā //
analyzed: dalayati helayā eva hariḥ ugra karān kariṇaḥ trijagati tejaḥ eva guru naḥ vikṛta ākṛti tā

original: MSS_1435-1 anukṣaṇamanukṣaṇaṃ kṣitipa rakṣyamāṇā tvayā prayāti vidiśo daśa prabalakīrtirekākinī /
analyzed: anukṣaṇam anukṣaṇam kṣitipa rakṣyamāṇā tvayā prayāti vidiśaḥ daśa prabala kīrtiḥ ekākinī

original: MSS_1435-2 iyaṃ niyatamarthiṣu pratidinaṃ vitīrṇā ramā jahāti na tavāntikaṃ dvitayametadatyadbhutam //
analyzed: iyam niyatam arthiṣu pratidinam vitīrṇā ramā jahāti na tava antikam dvitayam etat ati adbhutam

original: MSS_1436-1 anugataparitoṣitānujīvī madhuravacāścaritānuraktalokaḥ /
analyzed: anugata paritoṣita anujīvī madhura vacāḥ carita anurakta lokaḥ

original: MSS_1436-2 sunipuṇaparamāptasaktatantro bhavati ciraṃ nṛpatiḥ pradīptaraśmiḥ //
analyzed: su nipuṇa parama āpta sakta tantraḥ bhavati ciram nṛpatiḥ pradīpta raśmiḥ

original: MSS_1437-1 anugantuṃ satāṃ vartma kṛtsnaṃ yadi na śakyate /
analyzed: anugantum satām vartma kṛtsnam yadi na śakyate

original: MSS_1437-2 svalpamapyanugantavyaṃ mārgastho nāvasīdati //
analyzed: su alpam api anugantavyam mārga sthaḥ na avasīdati

original: MSS_1438-1 anugamya śmaśānāntaṃ nivartantīha bāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: anugamya śmaśāna antam nivartanti iha bāndhavāḥ

original: MSS_1438-2 agnau prakṣipya puruṣaṃ jñātayaḥ suhṛdastathā //
analyzed: agnau prakṣipya puruṣam jñātayaḥ suhṛdaḥ tathā

original: MSS_1439-1 anugṛhāṇa śiśūnabhilaṅghitā śabaravārivihāravanasthalī /
analyzed: anugṛhāṇa śiśūn abhilaṅghitā śabara vāri vihāra vana sthalī

original: MSS_1439-2 visṛja kātaratāmidamagrato harini kāruṇikasya tapovanam //
analyzed: visṛja kātara tām idam agratas harini kāruṇikasya tapaḥ vanam

original: MSS_1440-1 anugrahavidhau devyā mātuśca mahdantaram /
analyzed: anugraha vidhau devyāḥ mātuḥ ca mahā antaram

original: MSS_1440-2 mātā gāḍhaṃ nibadhnāti bandhaṃ devī nikṛntati //
analyzed: mātā gāḍham nibadhnāti bandham devī nikṛntati

original: MSS_1441-1 anugrahādeva divaukasāṃ naro nirasya mānuṣyakameti divyatām /
analyzed: anugrahāt eva divaukasām naraḥ nirasya mānuṣyakam eti divya tām

original: MSS_1441-2 ayovikāre svaritatvamiṣyate kuto'yasāṃ siddharasaspṛśāmapi //
analyzed: ayaḥ vikāre svarita tvam iṣyate kutas oyasām siddha rasa spṛśām api

original: MSS_1442-1 anucarati śaśāṅkaṃ rāhudoṣe'pi tārā patati na vanavṛkṣe yāti bhūmiṃ latā ca /
analyzed: anucarati śaśāṅkam rāhu doṣa ipi tārā patati na vana vṛkṣe yāti bhūmim latā ca

original: MSS_1442-2 tyjati na ca kareṇuḥ paṅkalagnaṃ gajendraṃ vrajatu caratu dharmaṃ bhartṛnāthā hi nāryaḥ //
analyzed: na ca kareṇuḥ paṅka lagnam gaja indram vrajatu caratu dharmam bhartṛ nāthāḥ hi nāryaḥ

original: MSS_1443-1 anucitakarmārambhaḥ svajanavirodho balīyasā spardhā /
analyzed: anucita karma ārambhaḥ sva jana virodhaḥ balīyasā spardhā

original: MSS_1443-2 pramadājanaviśvāso mṛtyordvārāṇi catvāri //
analyzed: pramadā jana viśvāsaḥ mṛtyoḥ dvārāṇi catvāri

original: MSS_1444-1 anucitaphalābhilāṣī nityaṃ vidhinā nivāryate puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: anucita phala abhilāṣī nityam vidhinā nivāryate puruṣaḥ

original: MSS_1444-2 drākṣāvipākasamaye mukhapāko bhavati kākānām //
analyzed: drākṣā vipāka samaye mukhapākaḥ bhavati kākānām

original: MSS_1445-1 anucitamucitaṃ vā karma ko'yaṃ vibhāgo bhagavati paramāstāṃ bhaktiyogo draḍhīyān /
analyzed: anucitam ucitam vā karma kaḥ ayam vibhāgaḥ bhagavati paramā āstām bhakti yogaḥ draḍhīyān

original: MSS_1445-2 kirati viṣamahīndraḥ sāndrapīyūṣamindur dvayamapi sa maheśo nirviśeṣaṃ bibharti //
analyzed: kirati viṣa mahīndraḥ sāndra pīyūṣam induḥ dvayam api sa maheśaḥ nirviśeṣam bibharti

original: MSS_1446-1 anucitamevācaritaṃ paśupatinā yadvidheḥ śiraśchinnam /
analyzed: anucitam evā ācaritam paśupatinā yat vidheḥ śiraḥ chinnam

original: MSS_1446-2 chinno na cāsya hasto yenāyaṃ durlipiṃ likhati //
analyzed: chinnaḥ na ca asya hastaḥ yena ayam durlipim likhati

original: MSS_1447-1 anucite yadi karmaṇi yujyate śaṭhadhiyā prabhuṇā saguṇo janaḥ /
analyzed: anucite yadi karmaṇi yujyate śaṭha dhiyā prabhuṇā sa guṇaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_1447-2 bhavati nāsya guṇāpacayastataḥ padagatasya kirīṭamaṇeriva //
analyzed: bhavati na asya guṇa apacayaḥ tatas pada gatasya kirīṭamaṇeḥ iva

original: MSS_1448-1 anuccanīcacalatām aṅgānāṃ calapādatām /
analyzed: an ucca nīca cala tām aṅgānām cala pāda tām

original: MSS_1448-2 kaṭikūrparaśīrṣāṃśakarṇānāṃ samarūpatām //
analyzed: kaṭi kūrpara śīrṣa aṃśa karṇānām sama rūpa tām

original: MSS_1449-1 ramyāṃ pratīkaviśrāntim urasaśca samunnatim /
analyzed: ramyām pratīka viśrāntim urasaḥ ca samunnatim

original: MSS_1449-2 abhyāsābhyarhitaṃ prāhuḥ sauṣṭhavaṃ nṛtyavedinaḥ //
analyzed: abhyāsa abhyarhitam prāhuḥ sauṣṭhavam nṛtya vedinaḥ

original: MSS_1450-1 anucchiṣṭo devairaparidalito rāhudaśanaiḥ kalaṅkenāspṛṣṭo na khalu paribhūto dinakṛtā /
analyzed: an ucchiṣṭaḥ devaiḥ a paridalitaḥ rāhu daśanaiḥ kalaṅkena a spṛṣṭaḥ na khalu paribhūtaḥ dinakṛtā

original: MSS_1450-2 kuhūbhirno lupto na ca yuvativaktreṇa vijitaḥ kalānāthaḥ ko'yaṃ kanakalatikāyāmudayate //
analyzed: kuhūbhiḥ naḥ luptaḥ na ca yuvati vaktreṇa vijitaḥ kalā nāthaḥ koyam kanaka latikāyām udayate

original: MSS_1451-1 anujaguratha divyaṃ dundubhidhvānamāśāḥ surakusumanipātairvyomni lakṣmīrvitene /
analyzed: anujaguḥ atha divyam dundubhi dhvānam āśāḥ sura kusuma nipātaiḥ vyomni lakṣmīḥ vitene

original: MSS_1451-2 priyamiva kathayiṣyannāliliṅga sphurantīṃ bhuvamanibhṛtavelāvīcibāhuḥ payodhiḥ //
analyzed: priyam iva kathayiṣyan āliliṅga sphurantīm bhuvam a nibhṛta velā vīci bāhuḥ payodhiḥ

original: MSS_1452-1 anujjhitasuhṛdbhāvaḥ suhṛdāṃ durhṛdāmapi /
analyzed: anujjhita suhṛd bhāvaḥ suhṛdām durhṛdām api

original: MSS_1452-2 sama ityeva bhāvyo'pi nama ityabhibhāṣyate //
analyzed: samaḥ iti eva namaḥ iti abhibhāṣyate

original: MSS_1453-1 anutkīrṇā yathā paṅke putrikā vātha dāruṇi /
analyzed: an utkīrṇā yathā paṅke putrikā vā atha dāruṇi

original: MSS_1453-2 varṇā yathā maṣīkalke tathā sarge sthitāḥ pare //
analyzed: varṇāḥ yathā maṣī kalke tathā sarge sthitāḥ pare

original: MSS_1454-1 anuttamānubhāvasya parairapihitaujasaḥ /
analyzed: anuttama anubhāvasya paraiḥ apihita ojasaḥ

original: MSS_1454-2 akāryasuhṛdo'smākam apūrvāstava kīrtayaḥ //
analyzed: akārya suhṛdaḥ asmākam apūrvāḥ tava kīrtayaḥ

original: MSS_1455-1 anutthāne dhruvo nāśaḥ prāptasyānāgatasya ca /
analyzed: anutthāne dhruvaḥ nāśaḥ prāptasya anāgatasya ca

original: MSS_1455-2 prāpyate phalamutthānāl labhate cārthasaṃpadam //
analyzed: prāpyate phalam utthānāt labhate ca artha saṃpadam

original: MSS_1456-1 anu tvā tāta jīvantu suhṛdaḥ sādhubhiḥ saha /
analyzed: anu tvā tāta jīvantu suhṛdaḥ sādhubhiḥ saha

original: MSS_1456-2 parjanyamiva bhūtāni svādudrumamivāṇḍajāḥ //
analyzed: parjanyam iva bhūtāni svādu drumam iva aṇḍajāḥ

original: MSS_1457-1 anutsūtrapadanyāsā sadvṛttiḥ sannibandhanā /
MSS_1457-2 śabdavidyeva no bhāti rājanītirapaspaśā //
analyzed: śabda vidyā iva naḥ bhāti rāja nītiḥ apaspaśā

original: MSS_1458-1 anuditasaṭāvaṃsau nātisphuṭāḥ karajāṅkurā daśanamukulodbhedaḥ stoko mukhe mṛdu garjitam /
analyzed: an udita saṭā vaṃsau na ati sphuṭāḥ karaja aṅkurāḥ daśana mukula udbhedaḥ stokaḥ mukhe mṛdu garjitam

original: MSS_1458-2 mṛgapatiśiśornāstyadyāpi kriyā svakulocitā madakṛtamahāgandhasyāndhyaṃ vyapohati dantinām //
analyzed: mṛgapati śiśoḥ nā asti adya api kriyā sva kula ucitā mada kṛta mahā gandhasya āndhyam vyapohati dantinām

original: MSS_1459-1 anudinamatitīvraṃ rodiṣīti tvamuccaiḥ sakhi kila kuruṣe tvaṃ vācyatāṃ me mudhaiva /
analyzed: anudinam ati tīvram rodiṣi iti tvam uccais sakhi kila kuruṣe tvam vācyatām me mudhā eva

original: MSS_1459-2 hṛdayamidamanaṅgāṅgārasaṅgādvilīya prasarati bahirambhaḥ susthite naitadaśru //
analyzed: hṛdayam idam anaṅga aṅgāra saṅgāt vilīya prasarati bahis ambhaḥ susthite na etat aśru

original: MSS_1460-1 anudinamadhikaṃ te kampate kāyavallī śiva śiva nayanāntaṃ nāśrudhārā jahāti /
analyzed: anudinam adhikam te kampate kāya vallī śiva śiva nayana antam na aśru dhārāḥ jahāti

original: MSS_1460-2 kathaya kathaya ko'yaṃ yatkṛte komalāṅgi tyajati na pariṇaddhaṃ pāṇḍimānaṃ kapolaḥ //
analyzed: kathaya kathaya koyam yad kṛte komala aṅgi tyajati na pariṇaddham pāṇḍimānam kapolaḥ

original: MSS_1461-1 anudinamanukūlamācarantaṃ vihitamatiḥ pratikūlamācaret kaḥ /
analyzed: anudinam anukūlam ācarantam vihita matiḥ pratikūlam ācaret kaḥ

original: MSS_1461-2 śamitagaralajātakaṇṭhadāhaṃ śitikaṇṭhaḥ śaśinaṃ śirahsu dhatte //
analyzed: śamita garala jāta kaṇṭha dāham śitikaṇṭhaḥ śaśinam śirahsu dhatte

original: MSS_1462-1 anudunamanuraktaḥ padminīcakravāle navaparimalamādyaccañcarīkānukarṣī /
analyzed: padminī cakravāle nava parimalam ādyat cañcarīka anukarṣī

original: MSS_1462-2 kalitamadhurapadmaḥ ko'pi gambhīravedī jayati mihirakanyākūlavanyākarīndraḥ //
analyzed: kalita madhura padmaḥ kopi gambhīra vedī jayati mihira kanyā kūla vanya ākarī indraḥ

original: MSS_1463-1 anudinamabhyāsadṛḍhaiḥ soḍhuṃ dīrgho'pi śakyate virahaḥ /
analyzed: anudinam abhyāsa dṛḍhaiḥ soḍhum dīrghaḥ api śakyate virahaḥ

original: MSS_1463-2 pratyāsannasamāga ma- muhūrtavighno'pi durviṣaḥ //
analyzed: pratyāsanna samāga ma muhūrta vighnaḥ api durviṣaḥ

original: MSS_1464-1 anudehamāgatavataḥ pratimāṃ pariṇāyakasya gurumudvahatā /
analyzed: anudeham āgatavataḥ pratimām pariṇāyakasya gurum udvahatā

original: MSS_1464-2 mukureṇa vepathubhṛto'tibharāt kathamapyapāti na vadhūkarataḥ //
analyzed: mukureṇa vepathu bhṛtā uti bharāt katham api apāti na vadhū karataḥ

original: MSS_1465-1 anudghuṣṭaḥ śabdairatha ca ghaṭanātaḥ sphuṭarasaḥ padānāmarthātmā ramayati na tūttānitarasaḥ /
analyzed: an udghuṣṭaḥ śabdaiḥ atha ca ghaṭanātaḥ sphuṭa rasaḥ padānām artha ātmā ramayati na tu uttānita rasaḥ

original: MSS_1465-2 yathā dṛśyaḥ kiṃcitpavanacalacīnāṃśukatayā stanābhogaḥ strīṇāṃ harati na tathonmudritatanuḥ //
analyzed: yathā dṛśyaḥ kiṃcid pavana cala cīna aṃśuka tayā stana ābhogaḥ strīṇām harati na tathā unmudrita tanuḥ

original: MSS_1466-1 anunayagurorgoṣṭhībandho mukhāsavasaṃpadāṃ śapathavivaraṃ visrabdhānāṃ dhiyāṃ prathamātithiḥ /
analyzed: anunaya guroḥ goṣṭhī bandhaḥ mukha āsava saṃpadām śapatha vivaram visrabdhānām dhiyām prathama atithiḥ

original: MSS_1466-2 avinayavacovādasthānaṃ puraṃdhriṣu paprathe madavilasitasyaikācāryaściraṃ rativibhramaḥ //
analyzed: a vinaya vacaḥ vāda sthānam puraṃdhriṣu paprathe mada vilasitasya eka ācāryaḥ ciram rati vibhramaḥ

original: MSS_1467-1 anunayati patiṃ na lajjamānā kathayati nāpi sakhījanāya kiṃcit /
analyzed: anunayati patim na lajjamānā kathayati nā api sakhī janāya kiṃcid

original: MSS_1467-2 prasarati malayānile navoḍhā vahati paraṃtu cirāya śūnyamantaḥ //
analyzed: prasarati malaya anile na voḍhā vahati paraṃtu cirāya śūnyam antar

original: MSS_1468-1 anunayamagṛhītvā vyājasuptā parācī rutamatha kṛkavākostāramākarṇya kalye /
analyzed: anunayam a gṛhītvā vyāja suptā parācī rutam atha kṛkavākoḥ tāram ākarṇya kalye

original: MSS_1468-2 kathamapi parivṛttā nidrayāndhā kila strī mukulitanayanaivāśliṣyati prāṇanātham //
analyzed: katham api parivṛttā nidrayā andhā kila strī mukulita nayanā eva āśliṣyati prāṇanātham

original: MSS_1469-1 anunetuṃ māninyā dayitaścaraṇe sarāgacaraṇāyāḥ /
analyzed: anunetum māninyāḥ dayitaḥ caraṇe sa rāga caraṇāyāḥ

original: MSS_1469-2 yāvat patitaḥ sa tayā tatkṣaṇamavadhīritaḥ kasmāt //
analyzed: yāvat patitaḥ sa tayā tad kṣaṇam avadhīritaḥ kasmāt

original: MSS_1470-1 anupāyena karmāṇi viparītāni yāni ca kriyamāṇāni duṣyanti havīṃṣyaprayateṣviva //
analyzed: anupāyena karmāṇi viparītāni yāni ca kriyamāṇāni duṣyanti havīṃṣi aprayateṣu iva

original: MSS_1471-1 anupālayatāmudeṣyatīṃ prabhuśaktiṃ dviṣatāmanīhayā /
analyzed: anupālayatām udeṣyatīm prabhu śaktim dviṣatām anīhayā

original: MSS_1471-2 apayāntyacirānmahībhujāṃ jananirvādabhayādiva śriyaḥ //
analyzed: apayānti acirāt mahībhujām jana nirvāda bhayāt iva śriyaḥ

original: MSS_1472-1 anupoṣya trirātrāṇi tirthānyanabhigamya ca /
analyzed: an upoṣya tri rātrāṇi tirthāni an abhigamya ca

original: MSS_1472-2 adattvā kāñcanaṃ gāśca daridro nāma jāyate //
analyzed: a dattvā kāñcanam gāḥ ca daridraḥ nāma jāyate

original: MSS_1473-1 anuprāsini sandarbhe gonandanasamaḥ kutaḥ /
analyzed: anuprāsini sandarbhe gonandana samaḥ kutas

original: MSS_1473-2 yathārthanāmataivāsya yadvā vadati cārutām //
analyzed: yathārtha nāma tā eva asya yat vā vadati cāru tām

original: MSS_1474-1 anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anapekṣya ca pauruṣam /
analyzed: anubandham kṣayam hiṃsām an apekṣya ca pauruṣam

original: MSS_1474-2 mohādārabhyate karma yattattāmasamucyate //
analyzed: mohāt ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate

original: MSS_1475-1 anubandhaṃ ca saṃprekṣya vipākāṃścaiva karmaṇām /
analyzed: anubandham ca saṃprekṣya vipākān ca eva karmaṇām

original: MSS_1475-2 utthānamātmanaścaiva dhīraḥ kurvīta vā na vā //
analyzed: utthānam ātmanaḥ ca eva dhīraḥ kurvīta vā na vā

original: MSS_1476-1 anubandhānavekṣeta sānubandheṣu karmasu /
analyzed: anubandhān avekṣeta sa anubandheṣu karmasu

original: MSS_1476-2 saṃpradhārya ca kurvīta na vegena samācaret //
analyzed: saṃpradhārya ca kurvīta na vegena samācaret

original: MSS_1477-1 anubhavaṃ vadanendurupāgaman niyatameṣa yadasya mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: anubhavam vadana induḥ upāgamat niyatam eṣa yat asya mahātmanaḥ

original: MSS_1477-2 kṣubhitamutkalikātaralaṃ manaḥ paya iva stimitasya mahodadheḥ //
analyzed: kṣubhitam utkalikā taralam manaḥ payaḥ iva stimitasya mahodadheḥ

original: MSS_1478-1 anubhavata dadata vittaṃ mānyān mānayata sajjanān bhajata /
analyzed: anubhavata dadata vittam mānyān mānayata sat janān bhajata

original: MSS_1478-2 atiparuṣapavanavilulita- dīpaśikhācañcalā lakṣmīḥ //
analyzed: ati paruṣa pavana vilulita dīpa śikhā cañcalā lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_1479-1 anubhavata yuvatyo bhāgyavatyo nitāntaṃ kusumavalayavelāsaṅgakhelāsukhāni /
analyzed: anubhavata yuvatyaḥ bhāgyavatyaḥ nitāntam kusuma valaya velā saṅga khelā sukhāni

original: MSS_1479-2 mama tu madhukarāṇāṃ vāṭapāṭaccarāṇāṃ sapadi patati dhāṭī puṣpavāṭīniveśe //
analyzed: mama tu madhukarāṇām vāṭa pāṭaccarāṇām sapadi patati dhāṭī puṣpa vāṭī niveśe

original: MSS_1480-1 anubhavannavadolamṛtūtsavaṃ paṭurapi priyakaṇṭhajighṛkṣayā /
analyzed: anubhavan nava dolam ṛtu utsavam paṭuḥ api priya kaṇṭha jighṛkṣayā

original: MSS_1480-2 anyadāsanarajjuparigrahe bhujalatāṃ jalatāmabalājanaḥ //
analyzed: anya āsana rajju parigrahe bhuja latām jala tām abalā janaḥ

original: MSS_1481-1 anubhāvavatā guru sthiratvād avisaṃvādi dhanurdhanaṃjayena /
analyzed: anubhāvavatā guru sthira tvāt avisaṃvādi dhanuḥ dhanaṃjayena

original: MSS_1481-2 svabalavyasane'pi pīḍyamānaṃ guṇavanmitramivānatiṃ prapede //
analyzed: sva bala vyasane api pīḍyamānam guṇavat mitram iva ānatim prapede

original: MSS_1482-1 anubhūtacareṣu dīrghikāṇām upakaṇtheṣu gatāgataikatānāḥ /
analyzed: anubhūta careṣu dīrghikāṇām upakaṇtheṣu gata āgata ekatānāḥ

original: MSS_1482-2 madhupāḥ kathayanti padminīnāṃ salilairantaritāni korakāṇi //
analyzed: madhupāḥ kathayanti padminīnām salilaiḥ antaritāni korakāṇi

original: MSS_1483-1 anubhūtabhavavyavasthitir janatākānaratābhilāṣiṇī /
analyzed: anubhūta bhava vyavasthitiḥ janatā kāna rata abhilāṣiṇī

original: MSS_1483-2 tadavaimi sukhena saṃsṛtau kalitānaṅgatayaiva nisṛtiḥ //
analyzed: tat avaimi sukhena saṃsṛtau kalita anaṅga tayā eva nisṛtiḥ

original: MSS_1484-1 anubhūtamidaṃ loke yadbadhvā balavattaraiḥ /
analyzed: anubhūtam idam loke yat badhvā balavattaraiḥ

original: MSS_1484-2 īśvarairdurbalaḥ kṛṣyaḥ kratau paśurivābalaḥ //
analyzed: īśvaraiḥ durbalaḥ kṛṣyaḥ kratau paśuḥ iva abalaḥ

original: MSS_1485-1 anumatamivānetuṃ joṣaṃ tamītamasāṃ kulaṃ diśi diśi dṛśo vinyasyantyaḥ śriyāṅkuritāñjanāḥ /
analyzed: anumatam iva ānetum joṣam tamī tamasām kulam diśi diśi dṛśaḥ vinyasyantyaḥ śriyā aṅkurita añjanāḥ

original: MSS_1485-2 madanahutabhugdhūmacchāyaiḥ paṭairasitairvṛtāḥ prayayurarasadbhūṣairaṅgaiḥ priyānabhisārikāḥ //
analyzed: madana hutabhuj dhūma chāyaiḥ paṭaiḥ asitaiḥ vṛtāḥ prayayuḥ arasat bhūṣaiḥ aṅgaiḥ priyān abhisārikāḥ

original: MSS_1486-1 anumatisarasaṃ vimucya cūtaṃ navanavamañjulamañjarīparītam /
analyzed: anumati sarasam vimucya cūtam nava nava mañjula mañjarī parītam

original: MSS_1486-2 api pikadayite kathaṃ matiste ghaṭayati niśphalapippale'valepam //
analyzed: api pika dayite katham matiḥ te ghaṭayati niśphala pippa leva lepam

original: MSS_1487-1 anumamāra na māra kathaṃ nu sā ratiratiprathitāpi pativratā /
analyzed: anumamāra na māra katham nu sā rati rati prathitā api pativratā

original: MSS_1487-2 iyadanāthavadhūvadhapātakī dayitayāpi tayāsi kimujjñitaḥ //
analyzed: iyat anātha vadhū vadha pātakī dayitayā api tayā asi kim ujjñitaḥ

original: MSS_1488-1 anumaraṇe vyavasāyaṃ strīdharme kaḥ karoti savivekaḥ /
analyzed: anumaraṇe vyavasāyam strī dharme kaḥ karoti sa vivekaḥ

original: MSS_1488-2 saṃsāramuktyupāyaṃ daṇḍagrahaṇaṃ vrataṃ hitvā //
analyzed: saṃsāra mukti upāyam daṇḍa grahaṇam vratam hitvā

original: MSS_1489-1 anuyayau vividhopalakuṇḍala- dyutivitānakasaṃvalitāṃśukam /
analyzed: anuyayau dyuti vitānaka saṃvalita aṃśukam

original: MSS_1489-2 dhṛtadhanuvalayasya payomucaḥ śabalimā balimānamuṣo vapuḥ //
analyzed: dhṛta dhanu valayasya payomucaḥ śabalimā balimāna muṣaḥ vapuḥ

original: MSS_1490-1 anuyātāne kajanaḥ parapuruṣairuhyate'sya nijadehaḥ /
analyzed: anuyātāne ka janaḥ para puruṣaiḥ uhyate isya nija dehaḥ

original: MSS_1490-2 adhikārasthaḥ puruṣaḥ śava iva na śṛṇoti vīkṣate kumatiḥ //
analyzed: adhikāra sthaḥ puruṣaḥ śavaḥ iva na śṛṇoti vīkṣate kumatiḥ

original: MSS_1491-1 anuyāti na bhartāraṃ yadi daivāt kathaṃcana /
analyzed: anuyāti na bhartāram yadi daivāt kathaṃcana

original: MSS_1491-2 tathāpi śīlaṃ saṃrakṣyaṃ śīlabhaṅgāt patatyadhaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api śīlam saṃrakṣyam śīla bhaṅgāt patati adhas

original: MSS_1492-1 anuyāsyan munitanayāṃ sahasā vinayena vāritaprasaraḥ /
analyzed: anuyāsyan muni tanayām sahasā vinayena vārita prasaraḥ

original: MSS_1492-2 sthānādanuccalannapi gatveva punaḥ pratinivṛttaḥ //
analyzed: sthānāt an uccalan api gatvā iva punar pratinivṛttaḥ

original: MSS_1493-1 anuyukto dasyuvadhe raṇe kuryāt parākramam /
analyzed: anuyuktaḥ dasyu vadhe raṇe kuryāt parākramam

original: MSS_1493-2 nāsya kṛtyamataḥ kiṃcid anyad dasyunibarhaṇāt //
analyzed: na asya kṛtyam atas kiṃcid anyat dasyu nibarhaṇāt

original: MSS_1494-1 anuraktajanaviraktā namrotsiktā viraktarāgiṇyaḥ /
analyzed: anurakta jana viraktāḥ namra utsiktāḥ virakta rāgiṇyaḥ

original: MSS_1494-2 vañcakavacanāsaktā nāryaḥ sadbhāvaśaṅkinyaḥ //
analyzed: vañcaka vacana āsaktāḥ nāryaḥ sadbhāva śaṅkinyaḥ

original: MSS_1495-1 anuraktena hrṣṭena tuṣṭena jagatīpatiḥ /
analyzed: anuraktena hrṣṭena tuṣṭena jagatīpatiḥ

original: MSS_1495-2 alpenāpi svasainyena bhūmiṃ jayati bhūmipaḥ //
analyzed: alpena api sva sainyena bhūmim jayati bhūmipaḥ

original: MSS_1496-1 anurañjitā api guṇair na namanti prakṛtayo vinā daṇḍāt /
analyzed: anurañjitāḥ api guṇaiḥ na namanti prakṛtayaḥ vinā daṇḍāt

original: MSS_1496-2 aṅkagatāpi na vīṇā kalamadhuramatāḍitā kvaṇati //
analyzed: aṅka gatā api na vīṇā kala madhuram a tāḍitā kvaṇati

original: MSS_1497-1 anurañjaya rājānaṃ mā jānan jātu kopayeḥ prakṛtīḥ /
analyzed: anurañjaya rājānam mā jānan jātu kopayeḥ prakṛtīḥ

original: MSS_1497-2 etaddvayānurāga- sthirayā tiṣṭha pratiṣṭhayāśliṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: etad dvaya anurāga sthirayā tiṣṭha pratiṣṭhayā āśliṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_1498-1 anurāgaṃ jano yāti parokṣe guṇakīrtanam /
analyzed: anurāgam janaḥ yāti parokṣe guṇa kīrtanam

original: MSS_1498-2 na bibhyati ca sattvāni siddherlakṣaṇamuttamam //
analyzed: na bibhyati ca sattvāni siddheḥ lakṣaṇam uttamam

original: MSS_1499-1 anurāgavatī saṃdhyā divasastatpuraḥsaraḥ /
analyzed: anurāgavatī saṃdhyā divasaḥ tad puraḥsaraḥ

original: MSS_1499-2 aho daivagatiścitrā tathāpi na samāgamaḥ //
analyzed: aho daiva gatiḥ citrā tathā api na samāgamaḥ

original: MSS_1500-1 anurāgavantamapi locanayor dadhataṃ vapuḥ sukhamatāpakaram /
analyzed: anurāgavantam api locanayoḥ dadhatam vapuḥ sukham atāpa karam

original: MSS_1500-2 nirakāsayadravimapetavasuṃ viyadālayādaparadiggaṇikā //
analyzed: nirakāsayat ravim apeta vasum viyat ālayāt apara diś gaṇikā

original: MSS_1501-1 anurāgavartinā tava viraheṇogreṇa sā gṛhītāṅgī /
analyzed: anurāga vartinā tava viraheṇa ugreṇa sā gṛhīta aṅgī

original: MSS_1501-2 tripuraripuṇeva gaurī varatanurardhāvaśiṣṭeva //
analyzed: tripura ripuṇā iva gaurī vara tanuḥ ardha avaśiṣṭā iva

original: MSS_1502-1 anurāgādabhisarato laṅghitajaladheḥ kalādhināthasya /
analyzed: anurāgāt abhisarataḥ laṅghita jaladheḥ kalā adhināthasya

original: MSS_1502-2 rajanīmukhacumbanataḥ śithilitamalakaṃ kalaṅkamākalaye //
analyzed: rajanī mukha cumbanataḥ śithilitam alakam kalaṅkam ākalaye

original: MSS_1503-1 anurāgo vṛthā strīṣu strīṣu garvo vṛthā tathā /
analyzed: anurāgaḥ vṛthā strīṣu strīṣu garvaḥ vṛthā tathā

original: MSS_1503-2 pṛiyo'ham sarvadā hyasyā mamaiṣā sarvadāpriyā //
analyzed: pṛiyā uham sarvadā hi asyāḥ mama eṣā sarvadā apriyā

original: MSS_1504-1 anurūpamidaṃ kūpa chadmacchannasya kiṃ na te /
analyzed: anurūpam idam kūpa chadma channasya kim na te

original: MSS_1504-2 sanmārgavibhramānmārgapāto'yaṃ yannipātitaḥ //
analyzed: sat mārga vibhramāt mārga pātaḥ yat nipātitaḥ

original: MSS_1505-1 anurūpeṇa saṃsargaṃ prāpya sarvo'pi modate /
analyzed: anurūpeṇa saṃsargam prāpya sarvaḥ api modate

original: MSS_1505-2 dinaṃ tejonidhiryadvad ratriṃ doṣākaras tathā //
analyzed: dinam tejaḥ nidhiḥ yadvat ratrim doṣa ākaraḥ tathā

original: MSS_1506-1 anulepanāni kusumānyabalāḥ kṛtamanyavaḥ patiṣu dīpaśikhāḥ /
analyzed: anulepanāni kusumāni abalāḥ kṛta manyavaḥ patiṣu dīpa śikhāḥ

original: MSS_1506-2 samayena tena cirasuptamano- bhavabodhanaṃ samamabodhiṣata //
analyzed: samayena tena cira supta manaḥ bhava bodhanam samamabodhiṣata

original: MSS_1507-1 anulomena balinaṃ pratilomena durjanam /
analyzed: anulomena balinam pratilomena durjanam

original: MSS_1507-2 ātmatulyabalaṃ śatruṃ vinayena balena vā //
analyzed: ātma tulya balam śatrum vinayena balena vā

original: MSS_1508-1 anuvanaṃ vanarājivadhūmukhe bahalarāgajavādharacāruṇi /
analyzed: anuvanam vana rāji vadhū mukhe bahala rāga java adhara cāruṇi

original: MSS_1508-2 vikacabāṇadalāvalayo'dhikaṃ rurucire rucirekṣaṇavibhramāḥ //
analyzed: rurucire rucira īkṣaṇa vibhramāḥ

original: MSS_1509-1 anuvanamanuyāntaṃ bāṣpavāri tyajantaṃ muditakamaladāmakṣāmamālokya rāmam /
analyzed: anuvanam anuyāntam bāṣpa vāri tyajantam mudita kamala dāma kṣāmam ālokya rāmam

original: MSS_1509-2 dinamapi ravirocistāpamantaḥ prapede rajanirapi ca tārābāṣpabindūn babhāra //
analyzed: dinam api ravi rociḥ tāpam antar prapede rajaniḥ api ca tārā bāṣpa bindūn babhāra

original: MSS_1510-1 anuvanamanuśailaṃ tāmanālokya sītāṃ pratidinamatidīnaṃ vīkṣya rāmaṃ virāmam /
analyzed: anuvanam anuśailam tām an ālokya sītām pratidinam ati dīnam vīkṣya rāmam virāmam

original: MSS_1510-2 giriraśanimayo'yaṃ yastadā na dvidhābhūt kṣitirapi na vidīrṇā sāpi sarvaṃsahaiva /
analyzed: giri raśani mayaḥ yaḥ tadā na dvidhā abhūt kṣitiḥ api na vidīrṇā sā api sarvaṃsahā eva

original: MSS_1511-1 anuvādayitā vādyaṃ nṛtyasi yattvayi sureśvaraḥ sākṣāt /
analyzed: anuvādayitā vādyam nṛtyasi yat tvayi sureśvaraḥ sākṣāt

original: MSS_1511-2 pakṣaśca te'javandyas tadasi kalāpin paraṃ dhanyaḥ //
analyzed: pakṣaḥ ca teja vandyaḥ tat asi kalāpin param dhanyaḥ

original: MSS_1512-1 anuvelaṃ nihanyante yasya sindhorivodyamāḥ /
analyzed: anuvelam nihanyante yasya sindhoḥ iva udyamāḥ

original: MSS_1512-2 taṃ pramathya śriyaṃ ko'pi vipakṣo bhūbhṛduddharet //
analyzed: tam pramathya śriyam kaḥ api vipakṣaḥ bhūbhṛt uddharet

original: MSS_1513-1 anuśayavatyevoktā proṣyatpatikā na bhedato bahubhiḥ /
analyzed: anuśayavatī evā uktā proṣyat patikā na bhedataḥ bahubhiḥ

original: MSS_1513-2 paradeśādāgacchat- patikāpi yathā pramuditaiva //
analyzed: para deśāt āgacchat patikā api yathā pramuditā eva

original: MSS_1514-1 anuśāsaddhi dharmeṇa vyavahāreṇa saṃsthayā /
analyzed: anuśāsat hi dharmeṇa vyavahāreṇa saṃsthayā

original: MSS_1514-2 nyāyena ca caturthena caturantāṃ mahīṃ jayet //
analyzed: nyāyena ca caturthena catur antām mahīm jayet

original: MSS_1515-1 anuśīlitakuñjavāṭikāyāṃ jaghanālaṃkṛtapītaśāṭikāyām /
analyzed: anuśīlita kuñja vāṭikāyām jaghana alaṃkṛta pīta śāṭikāyām

original: MSS_1515-2 muralīkalakūjite ratāyāṃ mama ceto'stu kadambadevatāyām //
analyzed: muralī kala kūjite ratāyām mama cetoḥ tu kadamba devatāyām

original: MSS_1516-1 anuśocanamastavicāramanā vigatasya mṛtasya ca yaḥ kurute /
analyzed: anuśocana masta vicāra manāḥ vigatasya mṛtasya ca yaḥ kurute

original: MSS_1516-2 sa gate salile tanute varaṇaṃ bhujagasya gatasya gatiṃ kṣipati //
analyzed: sa gate salile tanute varaṇam bhujagasya gatasya gatim kṣipati

original: MSS_1517-1 anuṣṭhānena rahitāṃ pāṭhamātreṇa kevalam /
analyzed: anuṣṭhānena rahitām pāṭha mātreṇa kevalam

original: MSS_1517-2 rañjayatyeva yā lokaṃ kiṃ tayā śukavidyayā //
analyzed: rañjayati eva yā lokam kim tayā śuka vidyayā

original: MSS_1518-1 anuṣṭhitaṃ tu yad devair ṛṣibhiryadanuṣṭhitam /
analyzed: anuṣṭhitam tu yat devaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ yat anuṣṭhitam

original: MSS_1518-2 nānuṣṭheyaṃ manuṣyaistu taduktaṃ karma ācaret //
analyzed: na anuṣṭheyam manuṣyaiḥ tu tad uktam karma ācaret

original: MSS_1519-1 anuṣṭhiteṣu kāryeṣu yo guhyaṃ na prakāśayet /
analyzed: anuṣṭhiteṣu kāryeṣu yaḥ guhyam na prakāśayet

original: MSS_1519-2 sa tatra labhate siddhiṃ jalamadhye kapiryathā //
analyzed: sa tatra labhate siddhim jala madhye kapiḥ yathā

original: MSS_1520-1 anusarati karikapolaṃ bhramaraḥ śravaṇena tāḍyamāno'pi /
analyzed: anusarati kari kapolam bhramaraḥ śravaṇena tāḍyamānaḥ api

original: MSS_1520-2 gaṇayati na tiraskāraṃ dānāndhavilocano nīcaḥ //
analyzed: gaṇayati na tiraskāram dāna andha vilocanaḥ nīcaḥ

original: MSS_1521-1 anusara sarastīraṃ vairaṃ kimatra sahātmanā katipayapayaḥpāṇam mānin samācara cātaka /
analyzed: anusara saraḥ tīram vairam kim atra saha ātmanā katipaya payaḥ pāṇam mānin samācara cātaka

original: MSS_1521-2 pralayapavanairastaṃ nītaḥ purātanavārido yadayamadayaṃ kīlājālaṃ vimuñcati nūtanaḥ //
analyzed: pralaya pavanaiḥ astam nītaḥ purātana vāridaḥ yat ayam adayam kīlā jālam vimuñcati nūtanaḥ

original: MSS_1522-1 anūḍhā mandire yasya rajaḥ prāpnoti kanyakā /
analyzed: anūḍhā mandire yasya rajaḥ prāpnoti kanyakā

original: MSS_1522-2 patanti pitaras tasya svargasthā api tairguṇaiḥ //
analyzed: patanti pitaraḥ tasya svarga sthāḥ api taiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: MSS_1523-1 anūnavegādayamadvitīyaś cchāyāturaṅgādiva lajjamānaḥ /
analyzed: anūna vegāt ayam advitīyaḥ chāyā turaṅgāt iva lajjamānaḥ

original: MSS_1523-2 khuroddhutairvīra turaṅgamaste rajobhirahṇanāṃ patimāvṛṇoti //
analyzed: khura uddhutaiḥ vīra turaṅgamaḥ te rajobhiḥ ahṇanām patim āvṛṇoti

original: MSS_1523A-1 anrjutvamasadbhāvaṃ kārpaṇyaṃ calacittatā /
MSS_1523A-2 puṃsāṃ mitreṣu ye doṣās te veśyāsu guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: puṃsām mitreṣu ye doṣāḥ te veśyāsu guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: MSS_1524-1 anṛtaṃ ca samutkarṣe rājagāmi ca paiśunam /
analyzed: anṛtam ca samutkarṣe rāja gāmi ca paiśunam

original: MSS_1524-2 guroścālīkanirbandhaḥ samāni brahmahatyayā //
analyzed: guroḥ ca alīka nirbandhaḥ samāni brahmahatyayā

original: MSS_1525-1 anṛtaṃ cāṭuvādaśca dhanayogo mahānayam /
analyzed: anṛtam cāṭu vādaḥ ca dhana yogaḥ mahān ayam

original: MSS_1525-2 satyaṃ vaiduṣyamityeṣa yogo dāridryakārakaḥ //
analyzed: satyam vaiduṣyam iti eṣa yogaḥ dāridrya kārakaḥ

original: MSS_1526-1 anṛtaṃ satyamityāhuḥ satyaṃ cāpi tathānṛtam /
analyzed: anṛtam satyam iti āhuḥ satyam ca api tathā anṛtam

original: MSS_1526-2 iti yāstāḥ kathaṃ vīra saṃrakṣyāḥ puruṣairiha //
analyzed: iti yāḥ tāḥ katham vīra saṃrakṣyāḥ puruṣaiḥ iha

original: MSS_1527-1 anṛtaṃ sāhasaṃ māyā mūrkhatvamatilubdhatā /
analyzed: anṛtam sāhasam māyā mūrkha tvam ati lubdha tā

original: MSS_1527-2 aśaucatvaṃ nirdayatvaṃ strīṇāṃ doṣāḥ svabhāvajāḥ //
analyzed: aśauca tvam nirdaya tvam strīṇām doṣāḥ svabhāva jāḥ

original: MSS_1528-1 anṛtapaṭutā kraurye cittaṃ satāmavamānitā matiravinaye dharme śāṭhyaṃ guruṣvapi vañcanam /
analyzed: anṛta paṭu tā kraurye cittam satām avamāni tā matiḥ avinaye dharme śāṭhyam guruṣu api vañcanam

original: MSS_1528-2 lalitamadhurā vākpratyakṣe parokṣavibhāṣiṇī kaliyugamahārājasyaitāḥ sphuranti vibhūtayaḥ //
analyzed: lalita madhurā vāc pratyakṣe parokṣa vibhāṣiṇī kali yuga mahā rājasya etāḥ sphuranti vibhūtayaḥ

original: MSS_1529-1 anrtamanṛtametadyastudhāsūtirindur niyatamayamanāryo nirgataḥ kālakūṭāt /
analyzed: anrtam anṛtam etat yaḥ tudhā sūtiḥ induḥ niyatam ayam anāryaḥ nirgataḥ kālakūṭāt

original: MSS_1529-2 hṛdayadahanadakṣā dāruṇā cānyatheyaṃ vada sakhi madhuratve mohaśaktiḥ kuto'sya //
analyzed: hṛdaya dahana dakṣā dāruṇā ca anyathā iyam vada sakhi madhura tve moha śaktiḥ kutas asya

original: MSS_1530-1 anṛte dharmabhagne ca na śuśrūṣati cāpriye /
analyzed: anṛte dharma bhagne ca na śuśrūṣati ca apriye

original: MSS_1530-2 na priyaṃ na hitaṃ vācyaṃ sadbhireveti ninditāḥ //
analyzed: na priyam na hitam vācyam sadbhiḥ eva iti ninditāḥ

original: MSS_1531-1 anekagaticitritaṃ vividhajātibhedākulaṃ sametya tanumadgaṇaḥ pracuracitraceṣṭodyataḥ /
analyzed: aneka gati citritam vividha jāti bheda ākulam sametya tanumat gaṇaḥ pracura citra ceṣṭā udyataḥ

original: MSS_1531-2 purārjitavicitrakarmaphalabhugvicitrāṃ tanuṃ pragṛhya naṭavat sadā bhramati janmaraṅgāṅgaṇe //
analyzed: purā arjita vicitra karma phala bhuj vicitrām tanum pragṛhya naṭa vat sadā bhramati janma raṅga aṅgaṇe

original: MSS_1532-1 anekacittamantraśca dveṣyo bhavati mantriṇām /
analyzed: aneka citta mantraḥ ca dveṣyaḥ bhavati mantriṇām

original: MSS_1532-2 anavasthitacittatvāt karye taiḥ samupekṣyate //
analyzed: anavasthita citta tvāt karye taiḥ samupekṣyate

original: MSS_1533-1 anekajanmasaṃbhūtaṃ pāpaṃ puṃsāṃ praṇaśyati /
analyzed: aneka janma saṃbhūtam pāpam puṃsām praṇaśyati

original: MSS_1533-2 snānamātreṇa gaṅgāyāṃ sadyaḥ puṇyasya bhājanam //
analyzed: snāna mātreṇa gaṅgāyām sadyas puṇyasya bhājanam

original: MSS_1534-1 anekajīvaghātotthaṃ mlecchocchiṣṭaṃ malāvilam /
analyzed: aneka jīva ghāta uttham mleccha ucchiṣṭam mala āvilam

original: MSS_1534-2 malāktapātranikṣiptaṃ kiṃ śaucaṃ lihato madhu //
analyzed: mala akta pātra nikṣiptam kim śaucam lihataḥ madhu

original: MSS_1535-1 anekadoṣaduṣṭasya kāyasyaiko mahān guṇaḥ /
analyzed: aneka doṣa duṣṭasya kāyasya ekaḥ mahān guṇaḥ

original: MSS_1535-2 yo yathā vartayatyenaṃ taṃ tathaivānuvartate //
analyzed: yaḥ yathā vartayati enam tam tathā eva anuvartate

original: MSS_1536-1 anekadoṣaduṣṭasya madhuno'pāstadoṣatām /
analyzed: aneka doṣa duṣṭasya madhunā upāsta doṣa tām

original: MSS_1536-2 yo brūte tadrasāsaktaḥ so'satyāmbudhirastadhīḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ brūte tad rasa āsaktaḥ saḥ satya ambudhiḥ asta dhīḥ

original: MSS_1537-1 anekadheti praguṇena cetasā vivicya mithyātvamalaṃ sadūṣaṇam /
analyzed: anekadhā iti praguṇena cetasā vivicya mithyātvam alam sa dūṣaṇam

original: MSS_1537-2 vimucya jainendramataṃ sukhāvahaṃ bhajanti bhavyā bhavaduḥkhabhīravaḥ //
analyzed: vimucya jaina indra matam sukha āvaham bhajanti bhavyāḥ bhava duḥkha bhīravaḥ

original: MSS_1538-1 anekaparyāyaguṇairupetaṃ vilokyate yena samastatattvam /
analyzed: aneka paryāya guṇaiḥ upetam vilokyate yena samasta tattvam

original: MSS_1538-2 tadindriyānindriyabhedabhinnaṃ jñānaṃ jinendrairgaditaṃ hitāya //
analyzed: tad indriya anindriya bheda bhinnam jñānam jinendraiḥ gaditam hitāya

original: MSS_1539-1 anekabhavasaṃcitā iha hi karmaṇā nirmitāḥ priyāpriyaviyogasaṃgamavipattisaṃpattayaḥ /
analyzed: aneka bhava saṃcitāḥ iha hi karmaṇā nirmitāḥ priya apriya viyoga saṃgama vipatti saṃpattayaḥ

original: MSS_1539-2 bhavanti sakalāsvimā gatiṣu sarvadā dehināṃ jarāmaraṇavīcike jananasāgare majjatām //
analyzed: bhavanti sakalāsu imāḥ gatiṣu sarvadā dehinām jarā maraṇa vīcike janana sāgare majjatām

original: MSS_1540-1 anekamalasaṃbhave kṛmikulaiḥ sadā saṃkule vicitrabahuvedane budhavinindite duḥsahe /
analyzed: aneka mala saṃbhave kṛmi kulaiḥ sadā saṃkule vicitra bahu vedane budha vinindite duḥsahe

original: MSS_1540-2 bhramannayamanārataṃ vyasanasaṃkaṭe dehavān purārjitavaśo bhave bhavati bhāminīgarbhake //
analyzed: bhraman ayam anāratam vyasana saṃkaṭe dehavān purā arjita vaśaḥ bhave bhavati bhāminī garbhake

original: MSS_1541-1 anekamukhapāpātmā chadmasaṃdarśitāśramaḥ /
analyzed: aneka mukha pāpa ātmā chadma saṃdarśita āśramaḥ

original: MSS_1541-2 karburaprakṛtiḥ kaścit kāpeyakalahocitaḥ //
analyzed: karbura prakṛtiḥ kaścid kāpeya kalaha ucitaḥ

original: MSS_1541A-1 anekayuddhavijayī saṃdhānaṃyasya gacchati /
analyzed: aneka yuddha vijayī saṃdhānam yasya gacchati

original: MSS_1541A-2 tatpratāpena tasyāśu vaśaṃ gacchanti vidviṣaḥ //
analyzed: tad pratāpena tasya āśu vaśam gacchanti vidviṣaḥ

original: MSS_1542-1 anekarājyāntaritam atikṣiptaṃ na yudhyate /
analyzed: aneka rājya antaritam atikṣiptam na yudhyate

original: MSS_1542-2 antargatāmitraśalyam antaḥśalyaṃ hi na kṣamam //
analyzed: antargata amitra śalyam antar śalyam hi na kṣamam

original: MSS_1544-1 anekavarṇapadatāṃ vāgvidyudiva bibhratī /
analyzed: aneka varṇa pada tām vāc vidyut iva bibhratī

original: MSS_1544-2 abhrānteṣu sadā sārasaṅgiṣu syāt sphuradguṇā //
MSS_1545-1 anekavidvajjanaratnapūrṇaṃ ve dodakanyāyataraṅgaramyam /
analyzed: aneka vidvas jana ratna pūrṇam ve dodaka nyāya taraṅga ramyam

original: MSS_1545-2 alaṅghanīyaṃ gurutīrthamekaṃ sabhāsamudraṃ śirasā namāmi //
analyzed: a laṅghanīyam guru tīrtham ekam sabhā samudram śirasā namāmi

original: MSS_1546-1 anekaśāstraṃ bahu veditavyam alpaśca kālo bahavaśca vighnāḥ /
analyzed: aneka śāstram bahu veditavyam alpaḥ ca kālaḥ bahavaḥ ca vighnāḥ

original: MSS_1546-2 yat sārabhūtaṃ tadupāsitavyaṃ haṃso yathā kṣīramivāmbumadhyāt //
analyzed: yat sāra bhūtam tat upāsitavyam haṃsaḥ yathā kṣīram iva ambu madhyāt

original: MSS_1547-1 anekasaṃśayocchedi parokṣārthasya darśakam /
analyzed: aneka saṃśaya ucchedi parokṣa arthasya darśakam

original: MSS_1547-2 sarvasya locanaṃ śāstraṃ yasya nāstyandha eva saḥ //
analyzed: sarvasya locanam śāstram yasya na asti andhaḥ eva saḥ

original: MSS_1548-1 anekasuṣiraṃ kāntaṃ vādi strīmukhapaṅkajam /
MSS_1548-2 paśya kānte vanasyānte netraśrutimanoramam //
analyzed: paśya kānte vanasya ante netra śruti manoramam

original: MSS_1549-1 anekasuṣiraṃ vādyaṃ kāntaṃ ca ṛṣisaṃjñitam /
analyzed: aneka suṣiram vādyam kāntam ca ṛṣi saṃjñitam

original: MSS_1549-2 cakriṇā ca sadārādhyaṃ yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: cakriṇā ca sat ārādhyam yaḥ jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_1550-1 aneke phaṇinaḥ santi bhekahbakṣaṇatatparāḥ /
analyzed: aneke phaṇinaḥ santi

original: MSS_1550-2 eka eva hi śeṣo'yaṃ dharaṇīdharaṇakṣamaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva hi śeṣaḥ yam dharaṇī dharaṇa kṣamaḥ

original: MSS_1551-1 anekairnāyakaguṇaiḥ sahitaḥ sakhi me patiḥ /
analyzed: anekaiḥ nāyaka guṇaiḥ sahitaḥ sakhi me patiḥ

original: MSS_1551-2 sa eva yadi jāraḥ syāt saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: saḥ eva yadi jāraḥ syāt saphalam jīvitam bhavet

original: MSS_1552-1 anena kalyāṇi mṛṇālakomalaṃ vratena gātraṃ glapayasyakāraṇam /
analyzed: anena kalyāṇi mṛṇāla komalam vratena gātram glapayasi akāraṇam

original: MSS_1552-2 prasādamākāṅkṣati yastavotsukaḥ sa kiṃ tvayā dāsajanaḥ prasādyate //
analyzed: prasādam ākāṅkṣati yaḥ tava utsukaḥ sa kim tvayā dāsa janaḥ prasādyate

original: MSS_1553-1 anena kasyāpi kulāṅkureṇa spṛṣṭasya gātreṣu sukhaṃ mamaivam /
analyzed: anena kasya api kula aṅkureṇa spṛṣṭasya gātreṣu sukham mama evam

original: MSS_1553-2 kāṃ nirvṛtiṃ cetasi tasya kuryād yasyāyamaṅgāt kṛtinaḥ prarūḍhaḥ //
analyzed: kām nirvṛtim cetasi tasya kuryāt yasya ayam aṅgāt kṛtinaḥ prarūḍhaḥ

original: MSS_1554-1 anena kiṃ na paryāptaṃ māṃsasya parivarjanam /
analyzed: anena kim na paryāptam māṃsasya parivarjanam

original: MSS_1554-2 yatpāṭitaṃ tṛṇenāpi svamaṅgaṃ paridūyate //
analyzed: yat pāṭitam tṛṇena api svam aṅgam paridūyate

original: MSS_1555-1 anena kumbhadvayasaṃniveśa- saṃlakṣyamāṇena kucadvayena unmajjatā yauvanavāraṇena vāpīva tanvaṅgi taraṅgitāsi //
analyzed: anena kumbha dvaya saṃniveśa saṃlakṣyamāṇena kuca dvayena unmajjatā yauvana vāraṇena vāpī iva tanu aṅgi taraṅgitā asi

original: MSS_1556-1 anena tanumadyayā mukharanūpurārāviṇā navāmburuhakomalena caraṇena saṃbhāvitaḥ /
analyzed: anena tanu madyayā mukhara nūpura ārāviṇā nava amburuha komalena caraṇena saṃbhāvitaḥ

original: MSS_1556-2 aśoka yadi sadya eva kusumairna saṃpatsyase vṛthā vahasi dohadaṃ lalitakāmisādhāraṇam //
analyzed: aśoka yadi sadyas eva kusumaiḥ na saṃpatsyase vṛthā vahasi dohadam lalita kāmi sādhāraṇam

original: MSS_1557-1 anena tava putrasya prasuptasya vanāntare /
analyzed: anena tava putrasya prasuptasya vana antare

original: MSS_1557-2 śikhāmāruhya hastena khaḍgena nihataṃ śiraḥ //
analyzed: śikhām āruhya hastena khaḍgena nihatam śiraḥ

original: MSS_1558-1 anena tvaṃ svarūpeṇa puṣpabāṇaiśca pañcabhiḥ /
analyzed: anena tvam sva rūpeṇa puṣpa bāṇaiḥ ca pañcabhiḥ

original: MSS_1558-2 mohayan puruṣān strīśca kuru sṛṣṭiṃ sanātanīm //
analyzed: mohayan puruṣān strīḥ ca kuru sṛṣṭim sanātanīm

original: MSS_1559-1 anena dharmaḥ saviśeṣamadya me trivargasāraḥ pratibhāti bhāvini /
analyzed: anena dharmaḥ sa viśeṣam adya me trivarga sāraḥ pratibhāti bhāvini

original: MSS_1559-2 tvayā manonirviṣayārthakāmayā yadeka eva pratigṛhya sevyate //
analyzed: tvayā manaḥ nirviṣayā artha kāmayā yat ekaḥ eva pratigṛhya sevyate

original: MSS_1560-1 anena puruṣo dehān upādatte vimuñcati /
analyzed: anena puruṣaḥ dehān upādatte vimuñcati

original: MSS_1560-2 harṣaṃ śokaṃ bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ cānena vindati //
analyzed: harṣam śokam bhayam duḥkham sukham ca anena vindati

original: MSS_1561-1 anena bhavati śreṣṭho mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ /
analyzed: anena bhavati śreṣṭhaḥ mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ

original: MSS_1561-2 kartārameno gacchecca nindyo yatra hi nindyate //
analyzed: kartāram enaḥ gacchet ca nindyaḥ yatra hi nindyate

original: MSS_1562-1 anena martyadehena yallokadvayaśarmadam /
analyzed: anena martya dehena yat loka dvaya śarma dam

original: MSS_1562-2 vicintya tadanuṣṭheyaṃ heyaṃ karma tato'nyathā //
analyzed: vicintya tat anuṣṭheyam heyam karma tatas nyathā

original: MSS_1563-1 anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhoru kaccin manaso ruciste /
analyzed: anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhā ūru kaccit manasaḥ ruciḥ te

original: MSS_1563-2 siprātaraṅgānilakampitāsu vihartumudyānaparaṃparāsu //
analyzed: siprā taraṃga anila kampitāsu vihartum udyāna paraṃparāsu

original: MSS_1564-1 anena yogarājena dhūpitāmbarabhūṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: anena yoga rājena dhūpita ambara bhūṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_1564-2 dhūpitāṅgastribhuvanaṃ manujaḥ kurute vaśam //
analyzed: dhūpita aṅgaḥ tribhuvanam manujaḥ kurute vaśam

original: MSS_1565-1 anena yogena vivṛddhatejā nijāṃ parasmai padavīmayacchan /
analyzed: anena yogena vivṛddha tejāḥ nijām parasmai padavīm ayacchan

original: MSS_1565-2 samācarācāramupāttaśastro japopavāsābhiṣavairmunīnām //
analyzed: samācara ācāram upātta śastraḥ japa upavāsa abhiṣavaiḥ munīnām

original: MSS_1566-1 anena rambhoru bhavanmukhena tuṣārabhānostulayā jitasya /
analyzed: anena rambhā ūru bhavat mukhena tuṣārabhānoḥ tulayā jitasya

original: MSS_1566-2 ūnasya nūnaṃ paripūraṇāya tārāḥ sphuranti pratimānakhaṇḍāḥ //
analyzed: ūnasya nūnam paripūraṇāya tārāḥ sphuranti pratimāna khaṇḍāḥ

original: MSS_1567-1 anena vītarāgeṇa buddhenevādhareṇa te /
analyzed: anena vīta rāgeṇa buddhena iva adhareṇa te

original: MSS_1567-2 dūti nirvyājamākhyātā sarvavastuṣu śūnyatā //
analyzed: dūti nirvyājam ākhyātā sarva vastuṣu śūnyatā

original: MSS_1568-1 anena sarvārthikṛtārthitā kṛtā hṛtārthinau kāmagavīsuradrumau /
analyzed: anena sarva arthi kṛta arthi tā kṛtā hṛta arthinau kāma gavī suradrumau

original: MSS_1568-2 mithaḥpayaḥsecanapallavāśanaiḥ pradāya dānavyasanaṃ samāpnutam //
analyzed: mithas payaḥ secana pallava aśanaiḥ pradāya dāna vyasanam samāpnutam

original: MSS_1569-1 anena sārdhaṃ tava yauvanena koṭiṃ parāmacchiduro'dhyarohat /
analyzed: anena sārdham tava yauvanena koṭim parām acchiduraḥ udhyarohat

original: MSS_1569-2 premāpi tanvi tvayi vāsavasya guṇo'pi cāpe sumanaḥśarasya //
analyzed: prema api tanvi tvayi vāsavasya guṇaḥ api cāpe sumanaḥśarasya

original: MSS_1570-1 anena sārdhaṃ viharāmburāśes tīreṣu tālīvanamarmareṣu /
analyzed: anena sārdham vihara amburāśeḥ tīreṣu tālī vana marmareṣu

original: MSS_1570-2 dvīpāntarānītalavaṅgapuṣpair apākṛtasvedalavā marudbhiḥ //
analyzed: dvīpa antara ānīta lavaṅga puṣpaiḥ apākṛta sveda lavāḥ marudbhiḥ

original: MSS_1571-1 anena sidhyati hyetanmamāpyeṣa parākramaḥ /
analyzed: anena sidhyati hi etat mama api eṣa parākramaḥ

original: MSS_1571-2 evaṃ jñātvā caredyastu saphalāstasya buddhayaḥ //
analyzed: evam jñātvā caret yaḥ tu saphalāḥ tasya buddhayaḥ

original: MSS_1572-1 anenaiva prakāreṇa trayo grīvāśritāḥ śubhāḥ /
analyzed: anena eva prakāreṇa trayaḥ grīvā āśritāḥ śubhāḥ

original: MSS_1572-2 lalāṭe yugalāvartau candrārkau śubhakārakau //
MSS_1573-1 anaiśvarye tṛṣā bhāryā pathi kṣetre tridhā kṛṣiḥ /
analyzed: anaiśvarye tṛṣā bhāryā pathi kṣetre tridhā kṛṣiḥ

original: MSS_1573-2 lambakaḥ sākṣiṇaścaiva pañcānarthā asaṃkṛtāḥ //
analyzed: lambakaḥ sākṣiṇaḥ ca eva pañca anarthāḥ asaṃkṛtāḥ

original: MSS_1574-1 anaucityādṛte nānyad rasabhaṅgasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: anaucityāt ṛte na anyat rasa bhaṅgasya kāraṇam

original: MSS_1574-2 prasiddhaucityabandhastu rasasyopaniṣat parā //
analyzed: prasiddha aucitya bandhaḥ tu rasasya upaniṣad parā

original: MSS_1575-1 anaucityena kanyāsu purastrīṣu ca yā ratiḥ /
