analyzed: anaucityena kanyāsu pura strīṣu ca yā ratiḥ

original: MSS_1575-2 sa kāmo hi kṣitīndrāṇām ariṣaḍvargapūrvajaḥ //
analyzed: sa kāmaḥ hi kṣitīndrāṇām ari ṣaḍvarga pūrvajaḥ

original: MSS_1576-1 antaḥkaṭurapi laghurapi sadvṛttaṃ yaḥ pumān na saṃtyajati /
analyzed: antar kaṭuḥ api laghuḥ api sat vṛttam yaḥ pumān na saṃtyajati

original: MSS_1576-2 sa bhavati sadyo vandyaḥ sarṣapa iva sarvalokasya //
analyzed: sa bhavati sadyas vandyaḥ sarṣapaḥ iva sarva lokasya

original: MSS_1577-1 antaḥkaṭu sadā prema mānuṣaṃ parilakṣyate /
analyzed: antar kaṭu sadā prema mānuṣam parilakṣyate

original: MSS_1577-2 hatāśān na karotyasmān daivapremaiva kevalam //
analyzed: hata āśān na karoti asmān daiva premā eva kevalam

original: MSS_1578-1 antaḥkapālavivare jihvāmākuñcya cārpayet /
analyzed: antar kapāla vivare jihvām ākuñcya ca arpayet

original: MSS_1578-2 bhrūmadhyadṛṣṭiramṛtaṃ pibet khecaramudrayā //
MSS_1579-1 antaḥkaraṇatattvasya dampatyoḥ snehasaṃśrayāt /
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa tattvasya dampatyoḥ sneha saṃśrayāt

original: MSS_1579-2 ānandagranthireko'yam apatyamiti kathyate //
analyzed: ānandagranthiḥ ekaḥ iyam apatyam iti kathyate

original: MSS_1580-1 antaḥkaraṇavikāraṃ guruparijanasaṃkaṭe'pi kulaṭānām /
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa vikāram guru parijana saṃkaṭe api kulaṭānām

original: MSS_1580-2 jānanti tadabhiyuktā bhrūbhaṅgāpāṅgamadhuradṛṣṭena //
analyzed: jānanti tat abhiyuktāḥ bhrū bhaṅga apāṅga madhura dṛṣṭena

original: MSS_1581-1 antaḥkaraṇaśūnyo'pi tṛṇapūlakapūruṣaḥ satkṛtaḥ kṣetrapatinā samartho mṛgavārane //
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa śūnyaḥ api tṛṇa pūlaka pūruṣaḥ satkṛtaḥ kṣetrapatinā samarthaḥ mṛga vārane

original: MSS_1582-1 antaḥ kiṃcit kiṃcin muktānāmahaha vibhramaṃ vahasi /
analyzed: antar kiṃcid kiṃcid muktānām ahaha vibhramam vahasi

original: MSS_1582-2 dūrāddarśayasi punaḥ kṣārodgāraṃ jaḍādhīśaḥ //
analyzed: dūrāt darśayasi punar kṣāra udgāram jaḍa adhīśaḥ

original: MSS_1583-1 antaḥ kuṭilatāṃ bibhrac chaṅkhaḥ sa khalu niṣṭhuraḥ /
analyzed: antar kuṭila tām bibhrat śaṅkhaḥ sa khalu niṣṭhuraḥ

original: MSS_1583-2 huṃkaroti yadā dhmātas tadaiva bahu gaṇyatām //
analyzed: huṃkaroti yadā dhmātaḥ tadā eva bahu gaṇyatām

original: MSS_1584-1 antaḥkūjadudārakaṇṭhamasakṛnmuñceti lolekṣaṇaṃ prāyaḥ smerakapolamūlamamṛtaprasyandi bimbādharam /
analyzed: antar kūjat udāra kaṇṭham asakṛt muñca iti lola īkṣaṇam prāyas smera kapola mūlam amṛta prasyandi bimba adharam

original: MSS_1584-2 ādhūtāṅgulipallavāgramalamityānartitabhrūlataṃ pītaṃ yena mukhaṃ tvadīyamabale so'haṃ hi dhanyo yuvā //
analyzed: ādhūta aṅguli pallava agram alam iti ānartita bhrū latam pītam yena mukham tvadīyam abale hi dhanyaḥ yuvā

original: MSS_1584A-1 antaḥ kecana kecanāpi hi dale kecit tathā pallave mūle kecana kecana tvaci phale puṣpe ca ke'pi drumāḥ /
analyzed: antar kecana kecana api hi dale kecid tathā pallave mūle kecana kecana tvaci phale puṣpe ca kepi drumāḥ

original: MSS_1584A-2 saurabhyaṃ nitarāṃ bibhartyavikalaḥ śrīkhaṇḍaṣaṇḍīkṛtaḥ sarvāṅge surabhirna ko'pi dadṛśe muktvā bhavantaṃ kvacit //
analyzed: saurabhyam nitarām bibharti avikalaḥ śrīkhaṇḍa ṣaṇḍīkṛtaḥ sarva aṅge surabhiḥ na kaḥ api dadṛśe muktvā bhavantam kvacid

original: MSS_1585-1 antaḥkopakaṣāyite'pi hṛdaye sādhorasacceṣṭitair bhadrāṇyeva bahiḥ kriyāsu vacanānyāvirbhavantyarthataḥ /
analyzed: antar kopa kaṣāyite api hṛdaye sādhoḥ asat ceṣṭitaiḥ bhadrāṇi eva bahis kriyāsu vacanāni āvirbhavanti arthataḥ

original: MSS_1585-2 madhye'tyantakarālavāḍavaśikhāśoṣe'pi vārāṃnidheḥ kallolāḥ prakaṭībhavanti satataṃ muktāphalodgāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: madhya ityanta karāla vāḍaba śikhā śoṣe pi vārāṃnidheḥ kallolāḥ prakaṭībhavanti satatam muktāphala udgāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_1587-1 antaḥkrūrāḥ saumyamukhā agādhahṛdayāḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: antar krūrāḥ saumya mukhāḥ agādha hṛdayāḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_1587-2 antarviṣā bahiḥsaumyā bhakṣyā viṣakṛtā iva //
analyzed: antar viṣāḥ bahis saumyāḥ bhakṣyāḥ viṣa kṛtāḥ iva

original: MSS_1588-1 antaḥ krodhojjihānajvalanabhavaśikhākārajihvāvalīḍha- prauḍhabrahmāṇḍabhāṇḍaḥ pṛthubhuvanaguhāgarbhagambhīranādaḥ /
analyzed: antar krodha ujjihāna jvalana bhava śikhā ākāra jihvā avalīḍha prauḍha brahmāṇḍa bhāṇḍaḥ pṛthu bhuvana guhā garbha gambhīra nādaḥ

original: MSS_1588-2 dṛpyatpārīndramūrtirmurajidavatu vaḥ suprabhāmaṇḍalībhiḥ kurvannirdhūmadhūmadhvajanicitamiva vyoma romacchaṭānām //
analyzed: dṛpyat pāri indra mūrtiḥ murajit avatu vaḥ su prabhā maṇḍalībhiḥ kurvat nirdhūma dhūmadhvaja nicitam iva vyoma romacchaṭānām

original: MSS_1589-1 antaḥkhedamivodvahan yadaniśaṃ ratnākaro ghūrṇate yacca dhyānamivāsthito na kanakakṣoṇīdharaḥ syandate /
analyzed: antar khedam iva udvahan yat aniśam ratnākaraḥ ghūrṇate yat ca dhyānam iva āsthitaḥ na kanaka kṣoṇīdharaḥ syandate

original: MSS_1589-2 jāne dānavilāsadānarabhasaṃ śauryaṃ ca te śuśruvān eko manthavighaṭṭanāstadaparaṣṭaṅkāhatīḥ śaṅkate //
analyzed: jāne dāna vilāsa dāna rabhasam śauryam ca te śuśruvān ekaḥ mantha vighaṭṭanāḥ tad aparaḥ ṭaṅka āhatīḥ śaṅkate

original: MSS_1590-1 antaḥpuracaraiḥ sārdhaṃ yo na mantraṃ samācaret /
analyzed: antaḥpuracaraiḥ sārdham yaḥ na mantram samācaret

original: MSS_1590-2 na kalatrairnarendrasya sa bhaved rājavallabhaḥ //
analyzed: na kalatraiḥ narendrasya sa bhavet rāja vallabhaḥ

original: MSS_1591-1 antaḥpuradhanādhyakṣair vairidūtairnirākṛtaiḥ /
analyzed: antaḥpura dhanādhyakṣaiḥ vairi dūtaiḥ nirākṛtaiḥ

original: MSS_1591-2 saṃsargaṃ na vrajed rājam vinā pārthivaśāsanāt //
analyzed: saṃsargam na vrajet rājam vinā pārthiva śāsanāt

original: MSS_1592-1 antaḥpurāṇāṃ vihitavyavasthaḥ pade pade'haṃ skhalitāni rakṣan /
analyzed: antaḥpurāṇām vihita vyavasthaḥ pade pada īham skhalitāni rakṣan

original: MSS_1592-2 jarāturaḥ saṃprati daṇḍanītyā sarvaṃ nṛpasyānukaromi vṛttam //
analyzed: jarā āturaḥ saṃprati daṇḍanītyā sarvam nṛpasya anukaromi vṛttam

original: MSS_1593-1 antaḥpurīyasi raṇeṣu sutīyasi tvaṃ pauraṃ janaṃ tava sadā ramaṇīyate śrīḥ /
analyzed: antaḥpurīyasi raṇeṣu sutīyasi tvam pauram janam tava sadā ramaṇīyate śrīḥ

original: MSS_1593-2 dṛṣṭaḥ priyābhiramṛtadyutidarśamindra- saṃcāramatra bhuvi saṃcarasi kṣitīśa //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ priyābhiḥ amṛta dyuti darśam indra saṃcāram atra bhuvi saṃcarasi kṣitīśa

original: MSS_1594-1 antaḥpure pitṛtulyaṃ mātṛtulyaṃ mahānase /
analyzed: antaḥpure pitṛ tulyam mātṛ tulyam mahānase

original: MSS_1594-2 goṣu cātmasamaṃ dadyāt svayameva kṛṣiṃ vrajet //
analyzed: goṣu ca ātma samam dadyāt svayam eva kṛṣim vrajet

original: MSS_1595-1 antaḥprakāśamicchantaḥ sadasacca vivecitum /
analyzed: antar prakāśam icchantaḥ sat asat ca vivecitum

original: MSS_1595-2 snehaṃ sūktipradīpe'smin vardhayantu subuddhayaḥ //
analyzed: sneham su ukti pradīpe ismin vardhayantu su buddhayaḥ

original: MSS_1596-1 antaḥprataptamarusaikatadahyamāna- mūlasya campakataroḥ kva vikāsacintā /
analyzed: antar pratapta maru saikata dahyamāna mūlasya campaka taroḥ kva vikāsa cintā

original: MSS_1596-2 prāyo bhavatyanucitasthitideśabhājāṃ śreyaḥ svajīvaparipālanamātrameva //
analyzed: prāyas bhavati anucita sthiti deśa bhājām śreyaḥ sva jīva paripālana mātram eva

original: MSS_1597-1 antaḥ praviśya yuvacihnamuro'balānāṃ yena krameṇa bata loḍayate manīṣin /
analyzed: antar praviśya yuva cihnam uraḥ balānām yena krameṇa bata loḍayate manīṣin

original: MSS_1597-2 āśritya taṃ hi niyamaṃ tata unnayete etau kucau sapadi hanti vidīrṇamadhyāt //
analyzed: āśritya tam hi niyamam tatas unnayete etau kucau sapadi hanti vidīrṇa madhyāt

original: MSS_1598-1 antaḥśarīrapariśoṣamudagrayantaḥ kīṭakṣatasrutibhirasramivodvamantaḥ /
analyzed: antar śarīra pariśoṣam udagrayantaḥ kīṭa kṣata srutibhiḥ asram iva udvamantaḥ

original: MSS_1598-2 chāyāviyogamalinā vyasane nimagnā vṛkṣāḥ śmaśānamupagantumiva pravṛttāḥ //
analyzed: chāyā viyoga malināḥ vyasane nimagnāḥ vṛkṣāḥ śmaśānam upagantum iva pravṛttāḥ

original: MSS_1599-1 antaḥsaṃtoṣacittānāṃ saṃpadasti pade pade /
analyzed: antar saṃtoṣa cittānām saṃpad asti pade pade

original: MSS_1599-2 antarmalinacittānāṃ sukhaṃ svapne'pi durlabham //
analyzed: antar malina cittānām sukham svapne pi durlabham

original: MSS_1600-1 antaḥsaṃtoṣavāṣpaiḥ sthagayati na dṛśastābhirākarṇayiṣyann aṅgenānastiromā racayati pulakaśreṇimānandakandām /
analyzed: antar saṃtoṣa vāṣpaiḥ sthagayati na dṛśaḥ tābhiḥ ākarṇayiṣyan racayati pulaka śreṇim ānanda kandām

original: MSS_1600-2 na kṣoṇībhaṅgabhīruḥ kalayati ca śiraḥkampanaṃ tanna vidmaḥ śṛṇvannetasya kīrtīḥ kathamuragapatiḥ prītimāviṣkaroti //
analyzed: na kṣoṇī bhaṅga bhīruḥ kalayati ca śiraḥ kampanam tat na vidmaḥ śṛṇvan etasya kīrtīḥ katham uraga patiḥ prītim āviṣkaroti

original: MSS_1601-1 antaḥsamutthavirahānalatīvratāpa- saṃtāpitāṅga karipuṅgava muñca śokam /
analyzed: antar samuttha viraha anala tīvra tāpa saṃtāpita aṅga kari puṅgava muñca śokam

original: MSS_1601-2 dhātrā svahastalikhitāni lalāṭapaṭṭe ko vākṣarāṇi parimārjayituṃ samarthaḥ //
analyzed: dhātrā sva hasta likhitāni lalāṭa paṭṭe kaḥ vā akṣarāṇi parimārjayitum samarthaḥ

original: MSS_1602-1 antaḥ sametyāpi bahiḥ prayāti spṛṣṭā vidhatte tvavagūhanāni /
analyzed: antar sametya api bahis prayāti spṛṣṭā vidhatte tu avagūhanāni

original: MSS_1602-2 dattvādharaṃ roditi śuṣkameva saivaṃ vilāsaistapasāpyalabhyā //
analyzed: dattvā adharam roditi śuṣkam eva sā evam vilāsaiḥ tapasā api alabhyā

original: MSS_1603-1 antaḥsāravihīnānāṃ sahāyaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati /
analyzed: antar sāra vihīnānām sahāyaḥ kim kariṣyati

original: MSS_1603-2 malaye'pi sthito veṇur veṇureva na candanaḥ //
analyzed: malaye api sthitaḥ veṇuḥ veṇuḥ eva na candanaḥ

original: MSS_1604-1 antaḥsāravihīnānām upadeśo na jāyate /
analyzed: antar sāra vihīnānām upadeśaḥ na jāyate

original: MSS_1604-2 malayācalasaṃsargān na veṇuścandanāyate //
analyzed: malaya acala saṃsargāt na veṇuḥ candanāyate

original: MSS_1605-1 antaḥsārairakuṭilais susnigdhaiḥ suparīkṣitaiḥ /
analyzed: antaḥsāraiḥ akuṭilaiḥ su snigdhaiḥ su parīkṣitaiḥ

original: MSS_1605-2 mantribhirdhāryate rājyaṃ sustambhairiva mandiram //
analyzed: mantribhiḥ dhāryate rājyam su stambhaiḥ iva mandiram

original: MSS_1606-1 antaḥsāro'pi niryāti nūnamarthitayā saha /
analyzed: antar sāraḥ upi niryāti nūnam arthi tayā saha

original: MSS_1606-2 anyathā tadavasthasya mahimā kena dehinām //
analyzed: anyathā tad avasthasya mahimā kena dehinām

original: MSS_1607-1 antaḥsthasuratārambhā bhilāṣamapi gopayat /
analyzed: antar stha surata ārambhā abhilāṣam api gopayat

original: MSS_1607-2 anyonyaṃ mithunaṃ vetti netre dṛṣṭvaiva cañcale //
analyzed: anyonyam mithunam vetti netre dṛṣṭvā eva cañcale

original: MSS_1608-1 antaḥsthenāviruddhena suvṛttenāticāruṇā /
analyzed: antaḥsthena aviruddhena su vṛttena ati cāruṇā

original: MSS_1608-2 antarbhinnena saṃprāptaṃ mauktikenāpi bandhanam //
analyzed: antar bhinnena saṃprāptam mauktikena api bandhanam

original: MSS_1609-1 antaḥsvīkṛtajāhnavījalamatisvacchandaratnāṃkura- śreṇīśoṇabhujaṅganāyakaphaṇācakrollasatpallavam /
analyzed: antar svīkṛta jāhnavī jalam ati svacchanda ratna aṃkura śreṇī śoṇa bhujaṅga nāyaka phaṇā cakra ullasat pallavam

original: MSS_1609-2 bhūyādabhyudayāya mokṣanagaraprasthānabhājāmitaḥ pratyūhapraśamaikapūrṇakalaśaprāyaṃ śiro dhūrjaṭeḥ //
analyzed: bhūyāt abhyudayāya mokṣa nagara prasthāna bhājām itas pratyūha praśama eka pūrṇa kalaśa prāyam śiraḥ dhūrjaṭeḥ

original: MSS_1610-1 antakaḥ paryavasthātā janminaḥ saṃtatāpadaḥ /
analyzed: antakaḥ paryavasthātā janminaḥ saṃtata āpadaḥ

original: MSS_1610-2 iti tyājye bhave bhavyo muktāvruttiṣṭhate janaḥ //
analyzed: iti tyājye bhave bhavyaḥ muktāvrut tiṣṭhate janaḥ

original: MSS_1611-1 antakaḥ śamano mṛtyuḥ pātālaṃ vaḍavāmukham /
analyzed: antakaḥ śamanaḥ mṛtyuḥ pātālam vaḍavāmukham

original: MSS_1611-2 kṣuradhārā viṣaṃ sarpo vahnirityekataḥ striyaḥ //
analyzed: kṣura dhārā viṣam sarpaḥ vahniḥ iti ekatas striyaḥ

original: MSS_1612-1 antakāya dadatā tvayā priyā- kāyakāncanalatāpratigraham /
analyzed: antakāya dadatā tvayā priyā

original: MSS_1612-2 dīyate bata madīyajīvanaṃ dakṣiṇānila kuto na dakṣiṇā //
analyzed: dīyate bata madīya jīvanam dakṣiṇā anila kutas na dakṣiṇā

original: MSS_1613-1 antakāle ca māmeva smaranmuktvā kalevaram /
analyzed: antakāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram

original: MSS_1613-2 yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ prayāti sa mad bhāvam yāti na asti atra saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_1614-1 antakāle hi bhūtāni muhyantīti purāśrutiḥ /
analyzed: antakāle hi bhūtāni muhyanti iti purā śrutiḥ

original: MSS_1614-2 [rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā] //
analyzed: rājñā evam kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā

original: MSS_1615-1 antako'pi hi jantūnām antakālamapekṣate /
analyzed: antakaḥ upi hi jantūnām anta kālam apekṣate

original: MSS_1615-2 na kālaniyamaḥ kaścid uttamarṇasya vidyate //
analyzed: na kāla niyamaḥ kaścid uttamarṇasya vidyate

original: MSS_1616-1 antaraṃ kiyadākhyānti santo raghukirātayoḥ /
analyzed: antaram kiyat ākhyānti santaḥ raghu kirātayoḥ

original: MSS_1616-2 antaraṃ tāvadākhyānti santo raghukirātayoḥ //
analyzed: antaram tāvat ākhyānti santaḥ raghu kirātayoḥ

original: MSS_1617-1 antaraṅgamanaṅgasya śṛṅgārakuladaivatam /
analyzed: antaraṅgam anaṅgasya śṛṅgāra kula daivatam

original: MSS_1617-2 aṅgīkaroti tanvaṅgī sā vilāsamayaṃ vayaḥ //
analyzed: aṅgīkaroti tanvaṅgī sā vilāsa mayam vayaḥ

original: MSS_1618-1 antaraṅgā hi ye rājñaḥ parasvādāyinaḥ śaṭhāḥ /
analyzed: antaraṅgāḥ hi ye rājñaḥ para sva ādāyinaḥ śaṭhāḥ

original: MSS_1618-2 bhṛtyā bhavanti prāyeṇa tebhyo rakṣedimāḥ prajāḥ //
analyzed: bhṛtyāḥ bhavanti prāyeṇa tebhyaḥ rakṣet imāḥ prajāḥ

original: MSS_1619-1 antarāyatimiropaśāntaye śāntapāvanamacintyavaibhavam /
analyzed: antarāya timira upaśāntaye śānta pāvanam acintya vaibhavam

original: MSS_1619-2 taṃ naraṃ vapuṣi kuñjaraṃ mukhe manmahe kimapi tundilaṃ mahaḥ //
analyzed: tam naram vapuṣi kuñjaram mukhe manmahe kim api tundilam mahaḥ

original: MSS_1620-1 antargatamalo duṣṭas tīrthasnānaśatairapi /
analyzed: antargata malaḥ duṣṭaḥ tīrtha snāna śataiḥ api

original: MSS_1620-2 na śudhyati yathā bhāṇḍaṃ surāyā dāhitaṃ ca sat //
analyzed: na śudhyati yathā bhāṇḍam surāyāḥ dāhitam ca sat

original: MSS_1621-1 antargatā madanavahniśikhāvalī yā sā bāghyate kimiha candanapaṅkalepaiḥ /
analyzed: antargatā madana vahni śikhā āvalī yā sā bāghyate kim iha candana paṅka lepaiḥ

original: MSS_1621-2 yatkumbhakārapacanopari paṅkalepas tāpāya kevalamasau na ca tāpaśāntyai //
analyzed: yat kumbhakāra pacana upari paṅka lepaḥ tāpāya kevalam asau na ca tāpa śāntyai

original: MSS_1622-1 antargatairguṇaiḥ kiṃ dvitrā api yatra sākṣiṇo viralāḥ /
analyzed: antargataiḥ guṇaiḥ kim dvitrāḥ api yatra sākṣiṇaḥ viralāḥ

original: MSS_1622-2 sa guṇo gīteryadasau vanecaraṃ hariṇamapi harati //
analyzed: sa guṇaḥ gīteḥ yat asau vanecaram hariṇam api harati

original: MSS_1623-1 antargato yadi haristapasā tataḥ kiṃ nāntargato yadi haristapasā tataḥ kim /
analyzed: antargataḥ yadi hariḥ tapasā tatas kim na antargataḥ yadi hariḥ tapasā tatas kim

original: MSS_1623-2 antarbahiryadi haristapasā tataḥ kiṃ nāntarbahiryadi haristapasā tataḥ kim //
analyzed: antar bahis yadi hariḥ tapasā tatas kim na antar bahis yadi hariḥ tapasā tatas kim

original: MSS_1624-1 antargāḍhaṃ cihnahīnaṃ viśālaṃ madhye sthūlaṃ sthūladhārātitīkṣṇam /
analyzed: antar gāḍham cihna hīnam viśālam madhye sthūlam sthūla dhārā ati tīkṣṇam

original: MSS_1624-2 rakṣovakṣaśchedanārthaṃ mahāntaṃ kṛtvā khaṅgaṃ devarājotihṛṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ vakṣaḥ chedana artham mahāntam kṛtvā khaṅgam devarājā uti hṛṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_1625-1 antargūḍhānarthān avyañjayataḥ prasādarahitasya /
analyzed: antar gūḍhān arthān a vyañjayataḥ prasāda rahitasya

original: MSS_1625-2 saṃdarbhasya nadasya ca na rasaḥ prītyai rasajñānām //
analyzed: saṃdarbhasya nadasya ca na rasaḥ prītyai rasajñānām

original: MSS_1626-1 antargṛhaṃ nayati vardhitaromaharṣaṃ sparśena sītkaraṇagarbhamukhīḥ karoti /
analyzed: antargṛham nayati vardhita romaharṣam sparśena sītkaraṇa garbha mukhīḥ karoti

original: MSS_1626-2 kiṃcādharavraṇavatīḥ kurute puranghrīḥ kiṃ vallabhaḥ kimuta haimana eṣa vātaḥ //
analyzed: kiṃca adhara vraṇavatīḥ kurute puran ghrīḥ kim vallabhaḥ kim uta haimanaḥ eṣa vātaḥ

original: MSS_1627-1 antargṛhe kṛṣṇamavekṣya cauraṃ baddhvā kavāṭaṃ jananīṃ gataikā /
analyzed: antargṛhe kṛṣṇam avekṣya cauram baddhvā kavāṭam jananīm gatā ekā

original: MSS_1627-2 ulūkhale dāmanibaddhamenaṃ tatrāpi dṛṣṭvā stimitā babhūva //
analyzed: ulūkhale dāma nibaddham enam tatra api dṛṣṭvā stimitā babhūva

original: MSS_1628-1 antarjalāvāritamūrti yāto bālāpariṣvaṅgasukhāya patyuḥ /
analyzed: antar jala āvārita mūrti yātaḥ bālā pariṣvaṅga sukhāya patyuḥ

original: MSS_1628-2 vighnāya vaimalyamapāṃ babhūva vyarthaḥ prasādo hi jalāśayānām //
analyzed: vighnāya vaimalyam apām babhūva vyarthaḥ prasādaḥ hi jalāśayānām

original: MSS_1629-1 antardadhānāpi kaṭhorabhāvaṃ svacchadyutiḥ sā nijamādhurībhiḥ /
analyzed: antardadhānā api kaṭhora bhāvam svaccha dyutiḥ sā nija mādhurībhiḥ

original: MSS_1629-2 bhuktā rasaṃ svāduvidāṃ tanoti guṇopagūḍhā sitaśarkareva //
analyzed: bhuktā rasam svādu vidām tanoti guṇa upagūḍhā sita śarkarā iva

original: MSS_1630-1 antarduṣṭaḥ kṣamāyuktaḥ sarvānarthakaraḥ kila /
analyzed: antar duṣṭaḥ kṣamā yuktaḥ sarva anartha karaḥ kila

original: MSS_1630-2 śakuniḥ śakaṭāraśca dṛṣṭāntāvatra bhūpate //
analyzed: śakuniḥ śakaṭāraḥ ca dṛṣṭāntau atra bhūpate

original: MSS_1631-1 antardhṛtaguṇaireva pareṣāṃ sthīyate hṛdi /
analyzed: antar dhṛta guṇaiḥ eva pareṣām sthīyate hṛdi

original: MSS_1631-2 arthaṃ samarthayantyenaṃ samagraṃ kusumasrajaḥ //
analyzed: artham samarthayanti enam samagram kusuma srajaḥ

original: MSS_1632-1 antarnāḍīniyamitamarullaṅghitabrahmarandhraṃ svānte śāntipraṇayini samunmīladānandasāndram /
analyzed: antar nāḍī niyamita marut laṅghita brahmarandhram svānte śānti praṇayini samunmīlat ānanda sāndram

original: MSS_1632-2 pratyagjyotirjayti yaminaḥ spaṣṭalālāṭanetra- vyājavyaktīkṛtamiva jagadvāpi candrārdhamauleḥ //
analyzed: pratyagjyotiḥ jayti yaminaḥ spaṣṭa lālāṭa netra vyāja vyaktīkṛtam iva jagat vā api candra ardha mauleḥ

original: MSS_1633-1 antarnidahyamānena śaktihīnena śatruṣu /
analyzed: antar nidahyamānena śakti hīnena śatruṣu

original: MSS_1633-2 saṃtatiḥ kriyate yena nindyaṃ dhiktasya jīvitam //
analyzed: saṃtatiḥ kriyate yena nindyam dhik tasya jīvitam

original: MSS_1634-1 antarnibaddhagurumanyuparaṃparābhir iccocitaṃ kimapi vaktumaśaknuvatyāḥ /
analyzed: antar nibaddha guru manyu paraṃparābhiḥ icca ucitam kim api vaktum aśaknuvatyāḥ

original: MSS_1634-2 avyktahūṃkuticalatkucamaṇḍalāyās tasyāḥ smarāmi muhurardhavilokitāni //
analyzed: a vykta hūṃkuti calat kuca maṇḍalāyāḥ tasyāḥ smarāmi muhur ardha vilokitāni

original: MSS_1635-1 antarbalānyahamamuṣya mṛgādhipasya vācā nigadya kathamadya laghūkaromi /
analyzed: antar balāni aham amuṣya mṛgādhipasya vācā nigadya katham adya laghūkaromi

original: MSS_1635-2 jānanti kiṃ na karajakṣatakumbhikumbhā- dāmuktamauktikamayāni digantarāṇi //
analyzed: jānanti kim na karaja kṣata kumbhi kumbhāḥ dāmukta mauktika mayāni digantarāṇi

original: MSS_1636-1 antarbhāvanigūdheyaṃ vākte prakṛtipeśalā /
analyzed: antarbhāva nigūdhā iyam vāc te prakṛti peśalā

original: MSS_1636-2 vikārādyanabhijñeyā viṣadigdheva vāruṇī //
analyzed: vikāra ādi an abhijñeyā viṣa digdhā iva vāruṇī

original: MSS_1637-1 antarbhūto nivasati jaḍe jaḍaḥ śiśiramahasi hariṇa iva /
analyzed: antarbhūtaḥ nivasati jaḍe jaḍaḥ śiśira mahasi hariṇaḥ iva

original: MSS_1637-2 ajaḍe śaśīva tapane sa tu praviṣṭo'pi niḥsarati //
analyzed: ajaḍe śaśī iva tapane sa tu praviṣṭaḥ api niḥsarati

original: MSS_1638-1 antarbhūya prabhoḥ prāpyo viśeṣaḥ sarvathā budhaiḥ /
analyzed: antarbhūya prabhoḥ prāpyaḥ viśeṣaḥ sarvathā budhaiḥ

original: MSS_1638-2 ko hi nāma na kurvīta kevalodarapūraṇam //
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma na kurvīta kevala udara pūraṇam

original: MSS_1639-1 antarmagnakareṇavaḥ kalabhakavyārugṇakandāṅkuraiḥ sāmodāḥ paritaḥ pramattamahiṣaśvāsollasadvīcayaḥ /
analyzed: antar magna kareṇavaḥ kalabhaka vyārugṇa kanda aṅkuraiḥ sa āmodāḥ paritas pramatta mahiṣa śvāsa ullasat vīcayaḥ

original: MSS_1639-2 saṃmodaṃ janayanti śailasaritaḥ succhāyakacchasthalī- sīmāno jalasekaśītalaśilānidrāṇarohidgaṇāḥ //
analyzed: saṃmodam janayanti śaila saritaḥ su chāyā kaccha sthalī sīmānaḥ jala seka śītala śilā nidrāṇa rohit gaṇāḥ

original: MSS_1640-1 antarmanyuvibhinnadīrgharasitaprodbhūtakaṇṭhavyathair ākruṣṭāstaṭinīṣu kokamithunairyāvanniśīthaṃ mithaḥ /
analyzed: antar manyu vibhinna dīrgha rasita prodbhūta kaṇṭha vyathaiḥ ākruṣṭāḥ taṭinīṣu koka mithunaiḥ yāvat niśītham mithas

original: MSS_1640-2 śītojjāgarajambukaughamukharagrāmopakaṇṭhasthalāḥ kṛcchreṇoparamanti pānthagṛhiṇīcintāyatā rātrayaḥ //
analyzed: śīta ujjāgara jambuka ogha mukhara grāma upakaṇṭha sthalāḥ kṛcchreṇa uparamanti pāntha gṛhiṇī cintā āyatāḥ rātrayaḥ

original: MSS_1641-1 antarmalinadehena bahirāhlādakāriṇā /
analyzed: antar malina dehena bahis āhlāda kāriṇā

original: MSS_1641-2 mahākālaphaleneva kaḥ khalena na vañcitaḥ //
analyzed: mahākāla phalena iva kaḥ khalena na vañcitaḥ

original: MSS_1642-1 antarmalinasaṃsargāc chrutavānapi duṣyati /
analyzed: antar malina saṃsargāt śrutavān api duṣyati

original: MSS_1642-2 yaccakṣuḥsaṃnikarṣeṇa karṇo'bhūt kuṭilāśrayaḥ //
analyzed: yat cakṣuḥ saṃnikarṣeṇa kuṭila āśrayaḥ

original: MSS_1643-1 antarmalīmase vakre cale karṇāntasarpiṇi tasyā netrayuge dṛṣṭe durjane ca kutaḥ sukham //
analyzed: antar malīmase vakre cale karṇa anta sarpiṇi tasyāḥ netra yuge dṛṣṭe durjane ca kutas sukham

original: MSS_1644-1 antarmārarasārdrā guruguṇabaddhānukūlatāṃ dhatte /
MSS_1644-2 niṣṭhurabāhyākārā dṛtiriva patisaṃnidhau navyā //
analyzed: niṣṭhura bāhya ākārā dṛtiḥ iva pati saṃnidhau navyā

original: MSS_1645-1 antarmohanamaulighūrṇanacalanmandāravibhraṃśanaḥ stambhākarṣaṇadṛptiharṣaṇamahāmantraḥ kuraṅgīdṛśām /
MSS_1645-2 dṛpyaddānavadūyamānadiviṣaddurvāraduḥkhāpadāṃ bhraṃśaḥ kaṃsariporvilopayatu vo'śreyāṃsi vaṃśīravaḥ //
analyzed: dṛpyat dānava dūyamāna diviṣat durvāra duḥkha āpadām bhraṃśaḥ kaṃsa ripoḥ vilopayatu vaḥ śreyāṃsi vaṃśīravaḥ

original: MSS_1646-1 antarye satataṃ luthantyagaṇitāstāneva pāthodharair āttānāpatatastaraṅgavalayairāliṅgya gṛhṇannasau /
analyzed: antar ye satatam luthanti agaṇitāḥ tān eva pāthodharaiḥ āttān āpatataḥ taraṅga valayaiḥ āliṅgya gṛhṇan asau

original: MSS_1646-2 vyaktaṃ mauktikaratnatāṃ jalakaṇānsaṃprāpayatyambudhiḥ prāyo'nyena kṛtādaro laghurapi prāpto'rcyate svāmibhiḥ //
analyzed: vyaktam mauktika ratna tām jala kaṇān saṃprāpayati ambudhiḥ prāyas nyena kṛta ādaraḥ laghuḥ api prāptā ūrcyate svāmibhiḥ

original: MSS_1647-1 antarlīnabhujaṃgamaṃ gṛhamivāntaḥsthograsiṃhaṃ vanaṃ grāhākīrṇamivābhirāmakamalacchāyāsanāthaṃ saraḥ /
analyzed: antar līna bhujaṃgamam gṛham iva antaḥstha ugra siṃham vanam grāha ākīrṇam iva abhirāma kamala chāyā sanātham saraḥ

original: MSS_1647-2 kālenāryajanāpavādapiśunaiḥ kṣudrairanāryaiḥ śritaṃ duḥkhena pravigāhyate sacakitaṃ rājñāṃ manaḥ sāmayam //
analyzed: kālena ārya jana apavāda piśunaiḥ kṣudraiḥ anāryaiḥ śritam duḥkhena pravigāhyate sa cakitam rājñām manaḥ sa āmayam

original: MSS_1648-1 antarlīnasya duḥkhāgner adyoddāmaṃ jvaliṣyataḥ /
analyzed: antar līnasya duḥkha agneḥ adya uddāmam jvaliṣyataḥ

original: MSS_1648-2 utpīḍa iva dhūmasya mohaḥ prāgāvṛṇoti mām //
analyzed: utpīḍaḥ iva dhūmasya mohaḥ prāk āvṛṇoti mām

original: MSS_1649-1 antarvasati mārjārī śunī vā rājaveśmani /
analyzed: antar vasati mārjārī śunī vā rāja veśmani

original: MSS_1649-2 bahirbaddho'pi mātaṅgas tataḥ kiṃ laghutāṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: bahis baddhaḥ api mātaṅgaḥ tatas kim laghu tām gataḥ

original: MSS_1650-1 antarvahasi kaṣāyaṃ bāhyākāreṇa madhuratāṃ yāsi /
analyzed: antar vahasi kaṣāyam bāhya ākāreṇa madhura tām yāsi

original: MSS_1650-2 sahakāra māyiviṭapin yuktaṃ lokairbahirnītaḥ //
analyzed: sahakāra māyi viṭapin yuktam lokaiḥ bahis nītaḥ

original: MSS_1651-1 antarbahistrijagatīrasabhāvavidvān yo nartayatyakhiladehabhṛtāṃ kulāni /
analyzed: antar bahis trijagatī rasa bhāva vidvān yaḥ nartayati akhila dehabhṛtām kulāni

original: MSS_1651-2 kṣemaṃ dadātu bhagavān paramādidevaḥ śṛṅgāranāṭakamahākavirātmajanmā //
analyzed: kṣemam dadātu bhagavān parama ādidevaḥ śṛṅgāra nāṭaka mahā kaviḥ ātmajanmā

original: MSS_1652-1 antarvāṇiṃ manyamānaḥ khalo'yaṃ paurobhāgyaṃ sūktimuktāsu dhatte /
analyzed: antar vāṇim manyamānaḥ khalaḥ uyam paurobhāgyam su ukti muktāsu dhatte

original: MSS_1652-2 sarvānandinyaṅgake kāminīnām īrma mārgatyeṣa vai bambharāliḥ //
analyzed: sarva ānandini aṅgake kāminīnām īrma mārgati eṣa vai bambharāliḥ

original: MSS_1653-1 antarviśati mārjārī śunī vā rājaveśmani /
analyzed: antar viśati mārjārī śunī vā rāja veśmani

original: MSS_1653-2 bahiḥsthasya gajendrasya kimarthaḥ parihīyate //
analyzed: bahis sthasya gaja indrasya kimarthaḥ parihīyate

original: MSS_1654-1 antarviṣamayā hyetā bahiścaiva manoramāḥ /
analyzed: antar viṣamayā hi etāḥ bahis ca eva manoramāḥ

original: MSS_1654-2 guñjāphalasamākārā yoṣitaḥ kena nirmitāḥ //
analyzed: guñjā phala sama ākārāḥ yoṣitaḥ kena nirmitāḥ

original: MSS_1655-1 antarviṣṇostrilokī nivasati phaṇināmīśvare so'pi śete sindhoḥ so'pyekadeśe tamapi culukayāṃ kumbhayoniścakāra /
analyzed: antar viṣṇoḥ trilokī nivasati phaṇinām īśvare saḥ upi śete sindhoḥ saḥ upi eka deśe tam api culukayām kumbhayoniḥ cakāra

original: MSS_1655-2 dhatte khadyotalīlāmayamapi nabhasi śrīnṛsiṃhakṣitīndra tvatkīrteḥ karṇanīlotpalamidamapi ca prekṣaṇīyaṃ vibhāti //
analyzed: dhatte khadyota līlā mayam api nabhasi śrī nṛsiṃha kṣiti indra tvad kīrteḥ karṇa nīlotpalam idam api ca prekṣaṇīyam vibhāti

original: MSS_1656-1 antarhite śaśini saiva kumudvatī me dṛṣṭiṃ na nandayati saṃsmaraṇīyaśobhā /
analyzed: antarhite śaśini sā eva kumudvatī me dṛṣṭim na nandayati saṃsmaraṇīya śobhā

original: MSS_1656-2 iṣṭapravāsajanitānyabalājanena duḥkhāni nūnamatimātradurudvahāni //
analyzed: iṣṭa pravāsa janitāni abalā janena duḥkhāni nūnam atimātra durudvahāni

original: MSS_1657-1 antaśchidrāṇi bhūyaṃsi kaṇṭakā bahavo bahiḥ /
analyzed: antar chidrāṇi bhūyaṃsi kaṇṭakāḥ bahavaḥ bahis

original: MSS_1657-2 kathaṃ kamalanālasya mā bhūvan bhaṅgurā guṇāḥ //
analyzed: katham kamala nālasya mā bhūvan bhaṅgurāḥ guṇāḥ

original: MSS_1658-1 antaśchidrairiyamadhigatā dustyajā duṣṭavaṃśair atyāsaktirnijakulaśubhodarkalābhāya na syāt /
analyzed: antar chidraiḥ iyam adhigatā dustyajā duṣṭa vaṃśaiḥ ati āsaktiḥ nija kula śubha udarka lābhāya na syāt

original: MSS_1658-2 kiṃ tu grīṣmaśvasanajanitānyonyasaṃgharṣavahni- jvālāmālājaṭilavapuṣāmātmanāṃ nāśanāya //
analyzed: kim tu grīṣma śvasana janita anyonya saṃgharṣa vahni jvālā mālā jaṭila vapuṣām ātmanām nāśanāya

original: MSS_1659-1 antastava sa jvalano bhīmā makarāśca sarvato vikaṭāḥ /
analyzed: antar tava sa jvalanaḥ bhīmāḥ makarāḥ ca sarvatas vikaṭāḥ

original: MSS_1659-2 atha bata viṣamayamaṅgam taditi niṣevyaḥ kathaṃ bhaverjaladhe //
analyzed: atha bata viṣam ayam aṅgam tat iti niṣevyaḥ katham bhaveḥ jaladhe

original: MSS_1660-1 antastāraṃ taralitatalāḥ stokamutpīḍabhājaḥ pakṣmāgreṣu grathitapṛṣataḥ kīrṇadhārāḥ krameṇa /
analyzed: antar tāram taralita talāḥ stokam utpīḍa bhājaḥ pakṣma agreṣu grathita pṛṣataḥ kīrṇa dhārāḥ krameṇa

original: MSS_1660-2 cittātaṅkaṃ nijagarimataḥ samyagāsūtrayanto niryāntyasyāḥ kuvalayadṛśo bāṣpavārāṃ pravāhāḥ //
analyzed: citta ātaṅkam nija garimataḥ samyak āsūtrayantaḥ niryānti asyāḥ kuvalaya dṛśaḥ bāṣpa vārām pravāhāḥ

original: MSS_1661-1 antastimiranāśāya śābdabodho nirarthakaḥ /
analyzed: antar timira nāśāya śābda bodhaḥ nirarthakaḥ

original: MSS_1661-2 na naśyati tamo nāma kṛtayā dīpavārtayā //
analyzed: na naśyati tamaḥ nāma kṛtayā dīpa vārtayā

original: MSS_1662-1 antastṛṣṇopataptānāṃ dāvadāhamayaṃ jagat /
analyzed: antar tṛṣṇā upataptānām dāva dāha mayam jagat

original: MSS_1662-2 bhavatyakhilajantūnāṃ yadantastadbahiḥ sthitam //
analyzed: bhavati akhila jantūnām yat antar tat bahis sthitam

original: MSS_1663-1 antikāntikagatenduvisṛṣṭe jihmatāṃ jahati dīdhitijāle /
analyzed: antika antika gata indu visṛṣṭe jihma tām jahati dīdhiti jāle

original: MSS_1663-2 niḥsṛtastimirabhāranirodhād ucchvasanniva rarāja digantaḥ //
analyzed: niḥsṛtaḥ timira bhāra nirodhāt ucchvasan iva rarāja diś antaḥ

original: MSS_1664-1 antenārjunatāṃ dadhāti nayanaṃ madhye tathā kṛṣṇatāṃ dvairūpyaṃ dadhatāmunā viracitaḥ karṇena te vigrahaḥ /
analyzed: antena arjuna tām dadhāti nayanam madhye tathā kṛṣṇa tām dvairūpyam dadhatā amunā viracitaḥ karṇena te vigrahaḥ

original: MSS_1664-2 tatkarṇārjunakṛṣṇavigrahavatī sākṣāt kurukṣetratāṃ yātāsi tvadavāptireva taruṇi śreyaḥ paraṃ gaṇyate //
analyzed: tat karṇa arjuna kṛṣṇa vigrahavatī sākṣāt kurukṣetra tām yātā asi tvad avāptiḥ eva taruṇi śreyaḥ param gaṇyate

original: MSS_1665-1 anteṣu remire dhīrā nate madhyeṣu remire /
analyzed: anteṣu remire dhīrāḥ nate madhyeṣu remire

original: MSS_1665-2 antaprāptiṃ sukhāmāhur duḥkhamantaramantayoḥ //
analyzed: anta prāptim sukhām āhuḥ duḥkham antaram antayoḥ

original: MSS_1666-1 ante santoṣadaṃ viṣṇuṃ smaret hantāramāpadām /
analyzed: ante santoṣa dam viṣṇum smaret hantāram āpadām

original: MSS_1666-2 śaratalpagato bhīṣmaḥ sasmāra garuḍadhvajam //
analyzed: śara talpa gataḥ bhīṣmaḥ sasmāra garuḍadhvajam

original: MSS_1667-1 anto nāścaryajātasya jatato dṛśyate kvacit /
analyzed: antaḥ nā āścarya jātasya jatataḥ dṛśyate kvacid

original: MSS_1667-2 kṣudrāhaṃbhāvasīmāyā yāvatīṃ muktimāpnumaḥ /
analyzed: kṣudra ahaṃbhāva sīmāyāḥ yāvatīm muktim āpnumaḥ

original: MSS_1667-3 āścaryāṇi hi tāvanti prakāśāni bhavanti naḥ //
analyzed: āścaryāṇi hi tāvanti prakāśāni bhavanti naḥ

original: MSS_1668-1 anto nāsti pipāsāyāḥ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham /
analyzed: antaḥ na asti pipāsāyāḥ saṃtoṣaḥ paramam sukham

original: MSS_1668-2 tasmāt saṃtoṣameveha dhanaṃ paśyanti paṇḍitāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt saṃtoṣam eva iha dhanam paśyanti paṇḍitāḥ

original: MSS_1669-1 antyajo'pi naraḥ pūjyo yasyāsti vipulaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: antyajaḥ api naraḥ pūjyaḥ yasya asti vipulam dhanam

original: MSS_1669-2 api brahmakule jāto nirdhanaḥ paribhūyate //
analyzed: api brahma kule jātaḥ nirdhanaḥ paribhūyate

original: MSS_1670-1 antyajo'pi yadā sākṣī vivāde saṃprajāyate /
analyzed: antyajaḥ api yadā sākṣī vivāde saṃprajāyate

original: MSS_1670-2 na tatra yujyate divyaṃ kiṃ punarvanadevatāḥ //
analyzed: na tatra yujyate divyam kim punar vana devatāḥ

original: MSS_1671-1 antyāvasthāgato'pi mahān svaguṇāñjahāti na śuddhatayā /
analyzed: antya avasthā gataḥ api mahān sva guṇān jahāti na śuddha tayā

original: MSS_1671-2 na śvetabhāvamujjhati śaṅkhaḥ śikhibhuktamukto'pi //
analyzed: na śveta bhāvam ujjhati śaṅkhaḥ śikhi bhukta muktaḥ api

original: MSS_1672-1 antraprotabṛhatkapālanalakakrūrakvaṇatkaṅkaṇa- prāyapreṅkhitabhūribhūṣaṇaravairādhoṣayantyambaram /
analyzed: antra prota bṛhat kapāla nalaka krūra kvaṇat kaṅkaṇa prāya preṅkhita bhūri bhūṣaṇa ravaiḥ ādhoṣayanti ambaram

original: MSS_1672-2 pītaccharditaraktakardamaghanaprāgbhāraghorollasad vyālolastanabhārabhairavavapurdarpoddhataṃ dhāvati //
analyzed: pīta chardita rakta kardama ghana prāgbhāra ghora ullasat vyālola stana bhāra bhairava vapuḥ darpa uddhatam dhāvati

original: MSS_1673-1 antrākalpacalatpayodharabharavyāviddhameghacchaṭā- sṛkvasthāmiṣagṛdhnugṛdhragarudāsphāloccalanmūrdhajā /
analyzed: antra ākalpa calat payodhara bhara vyāviddha megha chaṭā sṛkva stha āmiṣa gṛdhnu gṛdhra garut āsphāla uccalat mūrdhajā

original: MSS_1673-2 vyādāyānanamaṭṭahāsavikaṭaṃ dūreṇa tārāpathāt trasyatsiddhapuraṃdhrivṛndarabhasonmuktādupakrāmati //
analyzed: vyādāya ānanam aṭṭahāsa vikaṭam dūreṇa tārāpathāt trasyat siddha puraṃdhri vṛnda rabhasa unmuktāt upakrāmati

original: MSS_1674-1 antraiḥ kalpitamaṅgalapratisarāḥ strīhastaraktotpala- vyaktottaṃsabhṛtaḥ pinahya sahasā hṛtpuṇḍarīkasrajaḥ /
analyzed: antraiḥ kalpita maṅgala pratisarāḥ strī hasta rakta utpala vyakta uttaṃsa bhṛtaḥ pinahya sahasā hṛd puṇḍarīka srajaḥ

original: MSS_1674-2 etāḥ śoṇitapaṅkakuṅkumajuṣaḥ saṃbhūya kāntaiḥ pibanty asthisnehasurāḥ kapālacaṣakaiḥ prītāḥ piśācāṅganāḥ //
analyzed: etāḥ śoṇita paṅka kuṅkuma juṣaḥ saṃbhūya kāntaiḥ pibanti asthi sneha surāḥ kapāla caṣakaiḥ prītāḥ piśāca aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_1675-1 antraiḥ svairapi saṃyatāgracaraṇo mūrcchāvirāmakṣaṇe svādhīnavraṇitāṅgaśastranicito romodgamaṃ varmayan /
analyzed: antraiḥ svaiḥ api saṃyata agra caraṇaḥ mūrcchā virāma kṣaṇe svādhīna vraṇita aṅga śastra nicitaḥ roma udgamam varmayan

original: MSS_1675-2 bhagnānudvalayannijān parabhaṭān saṃtarjayan niṣṭhuraṃ dhanyo dhāma jayaśriyaḥ pṛthuraṇastambhe patākāyate //
analyzed: bhagnān udvalayan nijān parabhaṭān saṃtarjayan niṣṭhuram dhanyaḥ dhāma jaya śriyaḥ pṛthu raṇa stambhe patākāyate

original: MSS_1676-1 andūmuddhūya baddhāṃ nijamapi sahasā sūtamunmathya sadyo niryātastrastavājivrajakṛtaninadākarṇanakruddhacetāḥ /
analyzed: andūm uddhūya baddhām nijam api sahasā sūtam unmathya sadyas niryātaḥ trasta vāji vraja kṛta ninada ākarṇana kruddha cetāḥ

original: MSS_1676-2 saṃrambhārambhabhagnadrumaviṭapaśataiḥ prothayannāpanasthān āyāti vyālanāgastvaritamiha janāḥ sāvadhānā bhavantu //
analyzed: saṃrambha ārambha bhagna druma viṭapa śataiḥ prothayan āpana sthān āyāti vyāla nāgaḥ tvaritam iha janāḥ sa avadhānāḥ bhavantu

original: MSS_1677-1 andhaṃ tamaścedayi bādhate tvāṃ sarojanetraṃ jagadekasūtram /
analyzed: andham tamaḥ ced ayi bādhate tvām saroja netram jagat eka sūtram

original: MSS_1677-2 sudhācaritram paramaṃ pavitraṃ kuruṣva mitraṃ vasudevaputram //
analyzed: sudhā caritram paramam pavitram kuruṣva mitram vasudeva putram

original: MSS_1678-1 andhaṃ daridritamapi priyayā vihīnaṃ vīkṣyeśvare vadati yā ca varaṃ tvamekam /
analyzed: andham daridritam api priyayā vihīnam vīkṣya īśvare vadati yā ca varam tvam ekam

original: MSS_1678-2 netre na nāpi vasu no vanitāṃ sa vavre chatrābhirāmasutadarśanamityuvāca //
analyzed: netre na nā api vasu no vanitām sa vavre chatra abhirāma suta darśanam iti uvāca

original: MSS_1679-1 andhaṃ patiṃ prāpya vilāsinīnāṃ kaṭākṣabāṇā viphalā bhavanti /
analyzed: andham patim prāpya vilāsinīnām kaṭākṣa bāṇāḥ viphalāḥ bhavanti

original: MSS_1679-2 tadvat kujādityaśanaiścarāṇāṃ na vāradoṣāḥ prabhavanti rātrau //
analyzed: tadvat kuja āditya śanaiścarāṇām na vāra doṣāḥ prabhavanti rātrau

original: MSS_1680-1 andhaḥ sa eva śrutavarjito yaḥ śaṭhaḥ sa evārthinirarthako yaḥ /
analyzed: andhaḥ saḥ eva śruta varjitaḥ yaḥ śaṭhaḥ saḥ eva arthi nirarthakaḥ yaḥ

original: MSS_1680-2 mṛtaḥ sa evāsti yaśo na yasya dharme na dhīryasya sa eva śocyaḥ //
analyzed: mṛtaḥ saḥ eva asti yaśaḥ na yasya dharme na dhīḥ yasya saḥ eva śocyaḥ

original: MSS_1681-1 andhaḥ syādandhavelāyāṃ bādhiryamapi cāśrayet /
analyzed: andhaḥ syāt andha velāyām bādhiryam api ca āśrayet

original: MSS_1681-2 kuryāt tṛṇamayaṃ cāpaṃ śayīta mṛgaśāyikām //
analyzed: kuryāt tṛṇa mayam cāpam śayīta mṛgaśāyikām

original: MSS_1682-1 sāntvādibhirupāyaistu hanyācchatruṃ vaśe sthitam /
analyzed: sāntva ādibhiḥ upāyaiḥ tu hanyāt śatrum vaśe sthitam

original: MSS_1682-2 dayā tasmin na karttavyā śaraṇāgata ityuta //
analyzed: dayā tasmin na karttavyā śaraṇa āgataḥ iti uta

original: MSS_1683-1 andhakaṃ kubjakaṃ caiva kuṣṭhāṅgaṃ vyādhipīḍitam /
analyzed: andhakam kubjakam ca eva kuṣṭhāṅgam vyādhipīḍitam

original: MSS_1683-2 āpadgataṃ ca bhartāraṃ na tyajet sā mahāsatī //
analyzed: āpad gatam ca bhartāram na tyajet sā mahā satī

original: MSS_1684-1 andhakaḥ kubjakaścaiva tristanī rājakanyakā /
analyzed: andhakaḥ kubjakaḥ ca eva tristanī rāja kanyakā

original: MSS_1684-2 trayo'pyanyāyataḥ siddhāḥ saṃmukhe karmaṇi sthite //
analyzed: trayaḥ api anyāyataḥ siddhāḥ saṃmukhe karmaṇi sthite

original: MSS_1685-1 andhakaḥ kubjakaścaiva rājakanyā ca tristanī /
analyzed: andhakaḥ kubjakaḥ ca eva rāja kanyā ca tri stanī

original: MSS_1685-2 anayo'pi nayaṃ yāti yāvacchrīrbhajate naram //
analyzed: anayaḥ api nayam yāti yāvat śrīḥ bhajate naram

original: MSS_1686-1 andhakaḥ kubjakaścaiva rājakanyā ca tristanī /
analyzed: andhakaḥ kubjakaḥ ca eva rāja kanyā ca tri stanī

original: MSS_1686-2 sānukūle jagannāthe viparītaḥ suyugbhavet //
analyzed: sa anukūle jagannāthe viparītaḥ su yuj bhavet

original: MSS_1687-1 andhakāragaralaṃ yato jagan- mohakāri bhṛśamatti nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: andhakāra garalam yatas jagat moha kāri bhṛśam atti nityaśas

original: MSS_1687-2 ujjvalaṃ jaṭharamoṣadhīpater añjanābhamabhavat tataḥ priye //
analyzed: ujjvalam jaṭharam oṣadhīpateḥ añjana ābham abhavat tatas priye

original: MSS_1688-1 andhakārāṅkuro jajñe vavṛdhe cāvilambitam /
analyzed: andhakāra aṅkuraḥ jajñe vavṛdhe ca avilambitam

original: MSS_1688-2 bhīmena ramamāṇāyā hiḍimbāyā ivātmajaḥ //
analyzed: bhīmena ramamāṇāyāḥ hiḍimbāyāḥ iva ātmajaḥ

original: MSS_1689-1 andhatvamandhasamaye badhiratvaṃ bahdirakāla ālambya /
analyzed: andha tvam andha samaye badhira tvam bahdira kāle ālambya

original: MSS_1689-2 śrīkeśavayoḥ praṇayī parameṣṭhī nābhivāstavyaḥ //
MSS_1690-1 andhadvaye mahānandho viṣayāndhīkṛtekṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: andha dvaye mahān andhaḥ viṣaya andhīkṛta īkṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_1690-2 cakṣuṣāndho na jānāti viṣayāndho na kenacit //
analyzed: cakṣuṣā andhaḥ na jānāti viṣaya andhaḥ na kenacid

original: MSS_1691-1 andhasya darpaṇeneva hiteneva hataśruteḥ /
analyzed: andhasya darpaṇena iva hitena iva hata śruteḥ

original: MSS_1691-2 duḥkhābhitaptaḥ śokena nekṣate na śṛṇoti ca //
analyzed: duḥkha abhitaptaḥ śokena na īkṣate na śṛṇoti ca

original: MSS_1692-1 andhasya panthā badhirasya panthāḥ striyaḥ panthā vaivadhikasya panthāḥ /
analyzed: andhasya panthāḥ badhirasya panthāḥ striyaḥ panthāḥ vaivadhikasya panthāḥ

original: MSS_1692-2 rājñaḥ panthā brāhmaṇenāsametya sametya tu brāhmaṇasyaiva panthāḥ //
analyzed: rājñaḥ panthāḥ brāhmaṇena a sametya sametya tu brāhmaṇasya eva panthāḥ

original: MSS_1693-1 andhasya me hṛtavivekamahādhanasya caurairvibho balibhirindriyanāmadheyaiḥ /
analyzed: andhasya me hṛta viveka mahādhanasya cauraiḥ vibho balibhiḥ indriya nāmadheyaiḥ

original: MSS_1693-2 mohāndhakūpakuhare vinipātitasya deveśa dehi kṛpaṇasya karāvalambam //
analyzed: moha andhakūpa kuhare vinipātitasya deveśa dehi kṛpaṇasya kara avalambam

original: MSS_1694-1 andhā iva na paśyanti yogyāyogyaṃ hitāhitam /
analyzed: andhāḥ iva na paśyanti yogya ayogyam hita ahitam

original: MSS_1694-2 pathā tenaiva gacchanti nīyante yena pārthivāḥ //
analyzed: pathā tena eva gacchanti nīyante yena pārthivāḥ

original: MSS_1695-1 andhā iva badhirā iva mūkā iva mohabhāja iva /
analyzed: andhāḥ iva badhirāḥ iva mūkāḥ iva moha bhājaḥ iva

original: MSS_1695-2 paṅgava ivānabhimate nṛpaternivasanti sādhavaḥ sadasi //
analyzed: paṅgavaḥ iva anabhimate nṛpateḥ nivasanti sādhavaḥ sadasi

original: MSS_1696-1 andhā vidvajjanairhīnā mūkā kavibhirujjhitā /
analyzed: andhā vidvas janaiḥ hīnā mūkā kavibhiḥ ujjhitā

original: MSS_1696-2 badhirā gāyanairhīnā sabhā bhavati bhūbhṛtām //
analyzed: badhirā gāyanaiḥ hīnā sabhā bhavati bhūbhṛtām

original: MSS_1697-1 andhīkaromi bhuvanaṃ badhirīkaromi dhīraṃ sacetanamacetanatāṃ nayāmi /
analyzed: andhīkaromi bhuvanam badhirīkaromi dhīram sa cetanam acetana tām nayāmi

original: MSS_1697-2 kṛtyaṃ na paśyati na yena hitaṃ śṛṇoti dhīmānadhītamapi na pratisaṃdadhāti //
analyzed: kṛtyam na paśyati na yena hitam śṛṇoti dhīmān adhītam api na pratisaṃdadhāti

original: MSS_1697A-1 andhe tamasi majjāmaḥ paśubhirye yajāmahe /
analyzed: andhe tamasi majjāmaḥ paśubhiḥ ye yajāmahe

original: MSS_1697A-2 ahiṃsāyāḥ paro dharmo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: ahiṃsāyāḥ paraḥ dharmaḥ na bhūtaḥ na bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_1698-1 ando'pyanyoktapatho daṇḍadhṛganyopacaraṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: andaḥ upi anya ukta pathaḥ daṇḍa dhṛk anya upacaraṇīyaḥ

original: MSS_1698-2 rājatvapratihatair janānurāgairbharati bhūpaḥ //
analyzed: rāja tva pratihataiḥ jana anurāgaiḥ bharati bhūpaḥ

original: MSS_1699-1 andho matsyānivāśnāti sa naraḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ saha /
analyzed: andhaḥ matsyān iva aśnāti sa naraḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ saha

original: MSS_1699-2 yo bhāṣate'rthavaikalyam apratyakṣaṃ sabhāṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ bhāṣata irtha vaikalyam apratyakṣam sabhām gataḥ

original: MSS_1700-1 andho vā vadhiro vātha kuṣṭī vāpyantyajo'pi vā /
analyzed: andhaḥ vā vadhiraḥ vā atha kuṣṭī vā api antyajaḥ api vā

original: MSS_1700-2 parigṛhṇātu tāṃ kanyāṃ salakṣāṃ syād videśagaḥ //
analyzed: parigṛhṇātu tām kanyām salakṣām syāt videśa gaḥ

original: MSS_1701-1 andho hi rājā bhavati yastu śāstravivarjitaḥ /
analyzed: andhaḥ hi rājā bhavati yaḥ tu śāstra vivarjitaḥ

original: MSS_1701-2 andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstrahīno na paśyati //
analyzed: andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstra hīnaḥ na paśyati

original: MSS_1702-1 anghrīnīranghrapīnastanataṭaluṭhanāyāsamandapracārāś cārūnullāsayanto draviḍanaravadhūhāridhammillabhārān /
analyzed: anghrī nīranghra pīna stana taṭa luṭhana āyāsa manda pracārāḥ cārūn ullāsayantaḥ draviḍa nara vadhū hāri dhammilla bhārān

original: MSS_1702-2 jighrantaḥ siṃhalīnāṃ mukhakamalamalaṃ keralīnāṃ kapolaṃ cumbanto vānti mandaṃ malayaparimalā vāyavo dākṣiṇātyāḥ //
analyzed: jighrantaḥ siṃhalīnām mukha kamala malam keralīnām kapolam cumbantaḥ vānti mandam malaya parimalāḥ vāyavaḥ dākṣiṇātyāḥ

original: MSS_1703-1 annaṃ kiṃśukapuṣpapuñjasadṛśaṃ pāṣāṇajālairyutaṃ dhūmyaṃ gandhayutaṃ ca jālamakhilaṃ bhagnāśca dantālayaḥ /
analyzed: annam kiṃśuka puṣpa puñja sadṛśam pāṣāṇa jālaiḥ yutam dhūmyam gandha yutam ca jālam akhilam bhagnāḥ ca danta ālayaḥ

original: MSS_1703-2 ājyaṃ dūrataraṃ na cāpi lavaṇaṃ na śrūyate tintriṇī bhakṣyāṇāṃ vacanaṃ ca nāsti hi sakhe tadbhojanaṃ varṇaye //
analyzed: ājyam dūrataram na ca api lavaṇam na śrūyate tintriṇī bhakṣyāṇām vacanam ca nā asti hi sakhe tat bhojanam varṇaye

original: MSS_1704-1 annaṃ dadyādatithaye śraddhayā svargadaṃ hi tat /
analyzed: annam dadyāt atithaye śraddhayā svarga dam hi tat

original: MSS_1704-2 sakuṭumbo diśannannaṃ saktuprastho divaṃgataḥ //
analyzed: sa kuṭumbaḥ diśan annam saktu prasthaḥ divaṃgataḥ

original: MSS_1705-1 annaṃ dhānyaṃ vasu vasumatītyuttareṇottareṇa vyākṛṣyante paramakṛpaṇāḥ pāmarā yadvadityam /
analyzed: annam dhānyam vasu vasumatī iti uttareṇa uttareṇa vyākṛṣyante parama kṛpaṇāḥ pāmarāḥ

original: MSS_1705-2 bhūmiḥ khaṃ dyaurdruhiṇagṛhamityuttareṇottareṇa vyāmohyante vimalamatayo'pyasthireṇaiva dhāmnā //
analyzed: bhūmiḥ kham dyauḥ druhiṇa gṛham iti uttareṇa uttareṇa vyāmohyante vimala matayā upi asthireṇa eva dhāmnā

original: MSS_1706-1 annaṃ nāstyudakaṃ nāsti nāsti tāmbūlacarvaṇam /
analyzed: annam na asti udakam na asti na asti tāmbūla carvaṇam

original: MSS_1706-2 mandireṣumahotsāhaḥ śuṣkacarmasya (?) tāḍanam //
analyzed: mandira iṣu mahā utsāhaḥ śuṣka carmasya tāḍanam

original: MSS_1707-1 annaṃ muktāsuvarṇaṃ dravaguṇarahitāḥ svarṇarūpāśca sūpāḥ sāmodāḥ śākabhedāḥ phalaguḍamilitāḥ pāyasam ... /
analyzed: annam muktā suvarṇam drava guṇa rahitāḥ svarṇa rūpāḥ ca sūpāḥ sa āmodāḥ śāka bhedāḥ phala guḍa militāḥ pāyasam

original: MSS_1707-2 yāvadbhojyaṃ tadājyaṃ dadhi kathinataraṃ naikarūpāstvapūpāḥ bhujyante bhūsuraudhairmahati tava gṛhe rāmacandrasya tṛptyai //
analyzed: yāvat bhojyam tat ājyam dadhi kathinataram na ekarūpāḥ tu apūpāḥ bhujyante bhūsura odhaiḥ mahati tava gṛhe rāmacandrasya tṛptyai

original: MSS_1708-1 annaṃ vidhātrā vihitaṃ martyānāṃ jīvadhāraṇam /
analyzed: annam vidhātrā vihitam martyānām jīva dhāraṇam

original: MSS_1708-2 tadanādṛtya matimān prārthayenna tu kiṃcana //
analyzed: tat an ādṛtya matimān prārthayet na tu kiṃcana

original: MSS_1709-1 annaṃ saṃprokṣya gāyatryā satyaṃ tvarteti mantrataḥ /
analyzed: annam saṃprokṣya gāyatryā satyam tvā ṛta iti mantrataḥ

original: MSS_1709-2 ṛtaṃ tveti ca sāyaṃ tu pariṣiñcet pradakṣiṇam //
analyzed: ṛtam tvā iti ca sāyam tu pariṣiñcet pradakṣiṇam

original: MSS_1710-1 annaṃ hi prāṇināṃ prāṇā ārtānāṃ śaraṇaṃ tvaham /
analyzed: annam hi prāṇinām prāṇāḥ ārtānām śaraṇam tu aham

original: MSS_1710-2 dharmo vittaṃ nṛṇāṃ pretya santo'rvāg bibhyato'raṇam //
analyzed: dharmaḥ vittam nṛṇām pretya santoḥ vāc bibhyatoḥ aṇam

original: MSS_1711-1 annajā bhuvi martyānāṃ śramajā vā kathaṃcana /
analyzed: anna jāḥ bhuvi martyānām śrama jāḥ vā kathaṃcana

original: MSS_1711-2 saiṣā bhavati lokasya nidrā sarvasya laukikī //
analyzed: sā eṣā bhavati lokasya nidrā sarvasya laukikī

original: MSS_1712-1 annadātā bhayatrātā kanyādātā tathaiva ca /
analyzed: anna dātā bhaya trātā kanyā dātā tathā eva ca

original: MSS_1712-2 janitā copanetā ca pañcaite pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: janitā ca upanetā ca pañca ete pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ

original: MSS_1713-1 annadānaṃ mahādānaṃ vidyādānaṃ mahattaram /
analyzed: anna dānam mahā dānam vidyā dānam mahattaram

original: MSS_1713-2 annena kṣaṇikā tṛptir yāvajjīvaṃ tu vidyayā //
analyzed: annena kṣaṇikā tṛptiḥ yāvajjīvam tu vidyayā

original: MSS_1714-1 annadānāt paraṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: anna dānāt param dānam na bhūtam na bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_1714-2 annena dhāryate sarvaṃ jagadetaccarācaram //
analyzed: annena dhāryate sarvam jagat etat carācaram

original: MSS_1715-1 annadāhe harenmāṃsam ambudāhe ca śoṇitam /
analyzed: anna dāhe haret māṃsam ambu dāhe ca śoṇitam

original: MSS_1715-2 kāmadāhe harennetram anidrā rogakāriṇī //
analyzed: kāma dāhe haret netram anidrā roga kāriṇī

original: MSS_1716-1 annado jaladaścaiva āturasya cikitsakaḥ /
analyzed: annadaḥ jaladaḥ ca eva āturasya cikitsakaḥ

original: MSS_1716-2 trayaste svargamāyānti vinā yajñena bhārata //
analyzed: trayaḥ te svargam āyānti vinā yajñena bhārata

original: MSS_1717-1 annapānaṃ viṣādrakṣed viśeṣeṇa mahīpateḥ /
analyzed: anna pānam viṣāt rakṣet viśeṣeṇa mahīpateḥ

original: MSS_1717-2 yogakṣemau tadāyattau dharmādyā yannibandhanāḥ //
analyzed: yogakṣemau tad āyattau dharma ādyāḥ yad nibandhanāḥ

original: MSS_1718-1 annapānādibhiścaiva vastrālaṃkārabhūṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: anna pāna ādibhiḥ ca eva vastra alaṃkāra bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_1718-2 gandhamālyairvicitraiśca guruṃ tatra prapūjayet //
analyzed: gandha mālyaiḥ vicitraiḥ ca gurum tatra prapūjayet

original: MSS_1719-1 annapānāni jīryante yatra bhakṣāśca bhakṣitāḥ /
analyzed: anna pānāni jīryante yatra bhakṣāḥ ca bhakṣitāḥ

original: MSS_1719-2 tasminnevodare garbhaḥ kiṃ nāma na vijīryate //
analyzed: tasmin eva udare garbhaḥ kim nāma na vijīryate

original: MSS_1720-1 annapraṇāśe sīdanti śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ /
analyzed: anna praṇāśe sīdanti śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ

original: MSS_1720-2 āhārāt sarvabhūtāni saṃbhavanti mahītale //
analyzed: āhārāt sarva bhūtāni saṃbhavanti mahī tale

original: MSS_1721-1 annamūlaṃ balaṃ puṃsāṃ balamūlaṃ hi jīvanam /
analyzed: anna mūlam balam puṃsām bala mūlam hi jīvanam

original: MSS_1721-2 tasmād yatnena saṃrakṣed balaṃ ca kuśalo bhiṣak //
analyzed: tasmāt yatnena saṃrakṣet balam ca kuśalaḥ bhiṣak

original: MSS_1722-1 annavastrasuvarṇāni ratnāni vividhāni ca /
analyzed: anna vastra suvarṇāni ratnāni vividhāni ca

original: MSS_1722-2 brāhmaṇebhyo nadītīre dadāti vraja satvaram //
analyzed: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ nadī tīre dadāti vraja satvaram

original: MSS_1723-1 annahīno dahedrāṣṭraṃ mantrahīnaśca ṛtvijaḥ /
analyzed: anna hīnaḥ dahet rāṣṭram mantra hīnaḥ ca ṛtvijaḥ

original: MSS_1723-2 yajamānaṃ dānahīno nāsti yajñasamo ripuḥ //
analyzed: yajamānam dāna hīnaḥ na asti yajña samaḥ ripuḥ

original: MSS_1724-1 annādaṣṭaguṇaṃ piṣṭaṃ piṣṭādaṣtaguṇaṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: annāt aṣṭaguṇam piṣṭam piṣṭāt aṣṭaguṇam payaḥ

original: MSS_1724-2 payaso'ṣṭaguṇaṃ māṃsaṃ māṃsādaṣṭaguṇaṃ ghṛtam //
analyzed: payasā uṣṭaguṇam māṃsam māṃsāt aṣṭaguṇam ghṛtam

original: MSS_1725-1 annādivargaṃ phalapuṣpamāṃsa- matsyādibhiḥ pūrṇamukhaḥ sadaiva /
analyzed: anna ādi vargam phala puṣpa māṃsa matsya ādibhiḥ pūrṇa mukhaḥ sadā eva

original: MSS_1725-2 syāddṛṣṭamātro'bhimatārthasiddhyai mṛṣṭānnabhojyāya mude ca kākaḥ //
analyzed: syāt dṛṣṭa mātra ubhimata artha siddhyai mṛṣṭa anna bhojyāya mude ca kākaḥ

original: MSS_1726-1 annādiviṣṭhānavagomayāni na vā vidhunvan vadane sadaiva /
analyzed: anna ādi viṣṭhānava gomayāni na vā vidhunvan vadane sadā eva

original: MSS_1726-2 vāmopasavyo'pyavalokyamāno manorathaṃ pūrayate dhruvaśca //
analyzed: vāma upasavya upi avalokyamānaḥ manoratham pūrayate dhruvaḥ ca

original: MSS_1727-1 annādiviṣṭhāpiśitādibhiryaḥ pūrṇānano'bhīṣṭaphalaprado'sau /
analyzed: anna ādi viṣṭhā piśita ādibhiḥ yaḥ pūrṇa ānana ubhīṣṭa phala pradosau

original: MSS_1727-2 mantrādisiddhyai vaṇigādilābhe śasto vivāhādividhau ca kākaḥ //
analyzed: mantra ādi siddhyai vaṇij ādi lābhe śastaḥ vivāha ādi vidhau ca kākaḥ

original: MSS_1728-1 annāde bhrūṇahā mārṣṭi annena abhiśaṃsati /
analyzed: annāde bhrūṇahā mārṣṭi annena abhiśaṃsati

original: MSS_1728-2 stenaḥ pramukto rājani yācannanṛtasaṃkare //
analyzed: stenaḥ pramuktaḥ rājani yācan anṛta saṃkare

original: MSS_1729-1 annāde bhrūṇahā mārṣṭi patyau bhāryāpacāriṇī /
analyzed: anna āde bhrūṇa hā mārṣṭi patyau bhāryā apacāriṇī

original: MSS_1729-2 gurau śiṣyaśca yājyaśca steno rājani kilbiṣam //
analyzed: gurau śiṣyaḥ ca yājyaḥ ca stenaḥ rājani kilbiṣam

original: MSS_1730-1 annādbhavanti bhūtāni parjanyādannasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: annāt bhavanti bhūtāni parjanyāt anna saṃbhavaḥ

original: MSS_1730-2 yajñād bhavati parjanyo yajñaḥ karmasamudbhavaḥ //
analyzed: yajñāt bhavati parjanyaḥ yajñaḥ karma samudbhavaḥ

original: MSS_1731-1 annādraktaṃ ca śuklaṃ cāpy ato jīvaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: annāt raktam ca śuklam ca api atas jīvaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: MSS_1731-2 indriyāṇi ca buddhiśca tṛpyantyannena nityaśaḥ //
analyzed: indriyāṇi ca buddhiḥ ca tṛpyanti annena nityaśas

original: MSS_1732-1 annābhāve mṛtyuḥ śālibhirannāni śālayo vṛṣṭyā /
analyzed: anna abhāve mṛtyuḥ śālibhiḥ annāni śālayaḥ vṛṣṭyā

original: MSS_1732-2 vṛṣṭistapaseti vadann amṛtyave tattapaścaratu //
analyzed: vṛṣṭiḥ tapasā iti vadan amṛtyave tat tapaḥ caratu

original: MSS_1733-1 annāśane syāt paramāṇumātraḥ praśakyate śodhayituṃ tapobhiḥ /
analyzed: anna aśane syāt paramāṇu mātraḥ praśakyate śodhayitum tapobhiḥ

original: MSS_1733-2 māṃsāśane parvatarājamātro no śakyate śodhayituṃ mahattvāt //
analyzed: māṃsa aśane parvata rājamātraḥ no śakyate śodhayitum mahā tvāt

original: MSS_1734-1 annena dhāryate sarvaṃ jagadetaccarācaram /
analyzed: annena dhāryate sarvam jagat etat carācaram

original: MSS_1734-2 annāt prabhavati prāṇaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nāsti saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: annāt prabhavati prāṇaḥ pratyakṣam na asti saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_1735-1 anne pāne ca tāmbūle phale puṣpe vibhūṣaṇe /
analyzed: anne pāne ca tāmbūle phale puṣpe vibhūṣaṇe

original: MSS_1735-2 vastre vilepane dhūpe śayyāyāmāsaneṣu ca //
analyzed: vastre vilepane dhūpe śayyāyām āsaneṣu ca

original: MSS_1736-1 anyaṃ kānanamāśu gaccha tarasā vanyaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkṣva re dhanyaṃ dhāma vibhāti te na hi tathā puṇyaṃ jaghanyaṃ kuru /
analyzed: anyam kānanam āśu gaccha tarasā vanyam phalam bhuṅkṣva re dhanyam dhāma vibhāti te na hi tathā puṇyam jaghanyam kuru

original: MSS_1736-2 etasminkariśāva mā vraja vane jalpāmi tathyaṃ vaco jānāsyeva karīndradarpadalano nidrāti pañcānanaḥ //
analyzed: etasmin kari śāva mā vraja vane jalpāmi tathyam vacaḥ jānāsi eva karīndra darpa dalanaḥ pañcānanaḥ

original: MSS_1737-1 anyaṃ manuṣyaṃ hṛdayena kṛtvā anyaṃ tato dṛṣṭibhirāhvayanti /
analyzed: anyam manuṣyam hṛdayena kṛtvā anyam tatas dṛṣṭibhiḥ āhvayanti

original: MSS_1737-2 anyatra muñcanti madaprasekam anyaṃ śarīreṇa ca kāmayante //
analyzed: anyatra muñcanti mada prasekam anyam śarīreṇa ca kāmayante

original: MSS_1738-1 anyaḥ kaḥ kṣāravārdhe tvamiva niyamito vānarairvā narairvā vipreṇaikena ko'nyaḥ karakuharapuṭīpātramātre nipītaḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ kaḥ kṣārava ardhe tvam iva niyamitaḥ vānaraiḥ vā naraiḥ vā vipreṇa ekena kaḥ nyaḥ kara kuhara puṭī pātra mātre nipītaḥ

original: MSS_1738-2 jalpannitthaṃ pṛthūrmighvanibhiravataratphenakūṭāṭṭahāsaiḥ spardhāṃ dhatte payodheradhikamadhipuraṃ nirmito yattaṭākaḥ //
analyzed: jalpan ittham pṛthu ūrmi ghvanibhiḥ avatarat phena kūṭa aṭṭahāsaiḥ spardhām dhatte payodheḥ adhikam adhi puram nirmitaḥ yat taṭākaḥ

original: MSS_1739-1 anyaḥ karoti vyāpāraṃ lipto bhavati lekhakaḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ karoti vyāpāram liptaḥ bhavati lekhakaḥ

original: MSS_1739-2 bhagaliṅgaprasaṅgena chinnā bhavati nāsikā //
analyzed: bhaga liṅga prasaṅgena chinnā bhavati nāsikā

original: MSS_1740-1 anyaḥ ko'pi sa kumbhasaṃbhavamunerāstāṃ śikhī jāṭharo yaṃ saṃcintya dukūlavahnisadṛśaḥ saṃlakṣyate vāḍavaḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ kaḥ api sa kumbhasaṃbhava muneḥ āstām śikhī jāṭharaḥ yam saṃcintya dukūla vahni sadṛśaḥ saṃlakṣyate vāḍavaḥ

original: MSS_1740-2 vandyaṃ tajjaṭharaṃ sa mīnamakaragrāhāvalistoyadhiḥ paścātpārśvamapūritāntaraviyadyatra svanan bhrāmyati //
analyzed: vandyam tat jaṭharam sa mīna makara grāha āvaliḥ toyadhiḥ paścāt pārśvam a pūrita antara viyat yatra svanan bhrāmyati

original: MSS_1741-1 anya ityanupajātayantraṇaṃ drāgudañcitavatī vilocanam /
analyzed: anyaḥ iti anupajāta yantraṇam drāk udañcitavatī vilocanam

original: MSS_1741-2 māmavetya cakitā vṛtānanā dantadaṣṭarasanā manāgabhūt //
analyzed: mām avetya cakitā vṛta ānanā danta daṣṭa rasanā manāk abhūt

original: MSS_1742-1 anyakarmavimūḍho ya ātmakarmaviśāradaḥ /
analyzed: anya karma vimūḍhaḥ yaḥ ātma karma viśāradaḥ

original: MSS_1742-2 yathā paśya na jānāti stanapānetaracchiśuḥ //
analyzed: yathā paśya na jānāti stana pāna itarat śiśuḥ

original: MSS_1743-1 anyakālaparihāryamajasraṃ taddvayena vidadhe dvayameva /
analyzed: anya kāla parihāryam ajasram tad dvayena vidadhe dvayam eva

original: MSS_1743-2 dhṛṣṭatā rahasi bhartṛṣu tābhir nirdayatvamitarairabalāsu //
analyzed: dhṛṣṭa tā rahasi bhartṛṣu tābhiḥ nirdaya tvam itaraiḥ abalāsu

original: MSS_1744-1 anyakṣetre kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ puṇyakṣetre vinaśyati /
analyzed: anya kṣetre kṛtam pāpam puṇya kṣetre vinaśyati

original: MSS_1744-2 puṇyakṣetre kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ vajralepo bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: puṇya kṣetre kṛtam pāpam vajra lepaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_1745-1 anyato naya muhūrtamānanaṃ candra eṣa sarale kalāmayaḥ //
analyzed: anyatas naya muhūrtam ānanam candraḥ eṣa sarale kalā mayaḥ

original: MSS_1745-2 mā kadācana kapolayormalaṃ saṃkramayya samatāṃ sa neṣyati //
analyzed: mā kadācana kapolayoḥ malam saṃkramayya sama tām sa neṣyati

original: MSS_1476-1 anyato yadi nijopacikīrṣā mānahāniriti bhītiranītiḥ /
analyzed: anyatas yadi nija upacikīrṣā māna hāniḥ iti bhītiḥ anītiḥ

original: MSS_1476-2 śrīdharo'pi hi bale śriyamicchan mānamātanuta vāmanameva //
analyzed: śrīdharaḥ api hi bale śriyam icchan mānam ātanuta vāmanam eva

original: MSS_1477-1 anyatkṛtyaṃ manujaś cintayati divāniśaṃ viśuddhadhiyā /
analyzed: anyat kṛtyam manujaḥ cintayati divāniśam viśuddha dhiyā

original: MSS_1477-2 vedhā vidadhātyanyat svāmīva na śakyate dhartum //
analyzed: vedhāḥ vidadhāti anyat svāmī iva na śakyate dhartum

original: MSS_1748-1 anyatra deśe ghaṭitā jaganti grasiṣyate viśvasṛjeti matvā /
analyzed: anyatra deśe ghaṭitā jaganti grasiṣyate viśvasṛjā iti matvā

original: MSS_1748-2 saṃkocayitvā kimu pādamūla- dvayāntarāle nihitāsti yoniḥ //
analyzed: saṃkocayitvā kimu pāda mūla dvaya antarāle nihitā asti yoniḥ

original: MSS_1749-1 anyatra bhīṣmād gāṅgeyād anyatra ca hanūmataḥ /
analyzed: anyatra bhīṣmāt gāṅgeyāt anyatra ca hanūmataḥ

original: MSS_1749-2 hariṇīkhuramātreṇa carmaṇā mohitaṃ jagat //
analyzed: hariṇī khura mātreṇa carmaṇā mohitam jagat

original: MSS_1750-1 anyatra yāpitaniśaṃ parilohitāṅgam anyāṅganāgatamivāgatamuṣṇaraśmim /
analyzed: anyatra yāpita niśam parilohita aṅgam anya aṅganā gatam iva āgatam uṣṇaraśmim

original: MSS_1750-2 prātarnirīkṣya kupiteva hi padminīyam utphullahallakasulohitalocanābhūt //
analyzed: prātar nirīkṣya kupitā iva hi padminī iyam utphulla hallaka su lohita locanā bhūt

original: MSS_1751-1 anyatra yūyaṃ kusumāvacāyaṃ kurudhvamatrāsmi karomi sakhyaḥ /
analyzed: anyatra yūyam kusuma avacāyam kurudhvam atra asmi karomi sakhyaḥ

original: MSS_1751-2 nāhaṃ hi dūraṃ bhramituṃ samarthā prasīdatāyaṃ racito'ñjalirvaḥ //
analyzed: na aham hi dūram bhramitum samarthā prasīdata ayam racita uñjaliḥ vaḥ

original: MSS_1752-1 anyatra vrajatīti kā khalu kathā nāpyasya tādṛk suhṛd yo māṃ necchati nāgataśca hahahā ko'yaṃ vidheḥ prakramaḥ /
analyzed: anyatra vrajati iti kā khalu kathā na api asya tādṛś suhṛd yaḥ mām nā icchati na āgataḥ ca hahahā kaḥ ayam vidheḥ prakramaḥ

original: MSS_1752-2 ityalpetarakalpanākavalitasvāntā niśāntāntare bālā vṛttavivartanavyatikarā nāpnoti nidrāṃ niśi //
analyzed: iti alpa itara kalpanā kavalita svāntā niśā anta antare bālā vṛtta vivartana vyatikarā nā āpnoti nidrām niśi

original: MSS_1753-1 anyathā cintitā hyarthā naraistāta manasvibhiḥ /
analyzed: anyathā cintitāḥ hi arthāḥ naraiḥ tāta manasvibhiḥ

original: MSS_1753-2 anyathaiva hi gacchanti daivāditi matirmama //
analyzed: anyathā eva hi gacchanti daivāt iti matiḥ mama

original: MSS_1754-1 anyathā paridṛṣṭāni munibhirvedadarśibhiḥ /
analyzed: anyathā paridṛṣṭāni munibhiḥ veda darśibhiḥ

original: MSS_1754-2 anyathā parivartante vegā iva nabhasvataḥ //
analyzed: anyathā parivartante vegāḥ iva nabhasvataḥ

original: MSS_1755-1 anyathāliṅgyate kāntā bhāvena duhitānyathā /
analyzed: anyathā āliṅgyate kāntā bhāvena duhitā anyathā

original: MSS_1755-2 manaso bhidyate vṛttir abhinneṣvapi vastuṣu //
analyzed: manasaḥ bhidyate vṛttiḥ abhinneṣu api vastuṣu

original: MSS_1756-1 anyathā varttamānānām arthī bhūto'yamanyathā /
analyzed: anyathā varttamānānām arthī bhūtaḥ iyam anyathā

original: MSS_1756-2 asmābhiryadanuṣṭheyaṃ gandharvaistadanuṣṭhitam //
analyzed: asmābhiḥ yat anuṣṭheyam gandharvaiḥ tat anuṣṭhitam

original: MSS_1757-1 anyathā vedaśāstrāṇi jñānapāṇḍityamanyathā /
analyzed: anyathā veda śāstrāṇi jñāna pāṇḍityam anyathā

original: MSS_1757-2 anyathā tatpadaṃ śāntaṃ lokāḥ kliśyanti cānyathā //
analyzed: anyathā tat padam śāntam lokāḥ kliśyanti ca anyathā

original: MSS_1758-1 anyathā śāstragarbhiṇyā dhiyā dhīro'rthamīhate /
analyzed: anyathā śāstra garbhiṇyā dhiyā dhīraḥ artham īhate

original: MSS_1758-2 svāmīva prāktanaṃ karma vidadhāti tadanyathā //
analyzed: svāmī iva prāktanam karma vidadhāti tat anyathā

original: MSS_1759-1 anyathaiva vicintyante puruṣeṇa manorathāḥ /
analyzed: anyathā eva vicintyante puruṣeṇa manorathāḥ

original: MSS_1759-2 daivenāhitasadbhāvāḥ karmaṇāṃ gatayo'nyathā //
analyzed: daivena āhita sadbhāvāḥ karmaṇām gatayaḥ nyathā

original: MSS_1760-1 anyathaivasatī putraṃ cintayedanyathā patim /
analyzed: anyathā eva satī putram cintayet anyathā patim

original: MSS_1760-2 yathā yathā svabhāvasya mahābhāga udāhṛtam //
analyzed: yathā yathā svabhāvasya mahābhāga udāhṛtam

original: MSS_1761-1 anyathaiva hi manyante puruṣāstāni tāni ca /
analyzed: anyathā eva hi manyante puruṣāḥ tāni tāni ca

original: MSS_1761-2 anyathaiva prabhustāni karoti vikaroti ca //
analyzed: anyathā eva prabhuḥ tāni karoti vikaroti ca

original: MSS_1762-1 anyathaiva hi sauhārdaṃ bhavetsvacchāntarātmanaḥ /
analyzed: anyathā eva hi sauhārdam bhavet svaccha antarātmanaḥ

original: MSS_1762-2 pravartate'nyathā vāṇī śāṭhyopahatacetasaḥ //
analyzed: pravartate nyathā vāṇī śāṭhya upahata cetasaḥ

original: MSS_1763-1 anyadasmi bhavatīṃ na yācitā vāramekamadharaṃ dhayāmi te /
analyzed: anyat asmi bhavatīm na yācitā vāram ekam adharam dhayāmi te

original: MSS_1763-2 ityasisvadadupāṃśukākuvāk sopamardahaṭhavṛttireva tam //
analyzed: iti asisvadat upāṃśu kāku vāc sa upamarda haṭha vṛttiḥ eva tam

original: MSS_1764-1 anyadābhāṣitaṃ pūrvaṃ dattamanyattato'lpakam /
analyzed: anyat ābhāṣitam pūrvam dattam anyat tatas ulpakam

original: MSS_1764-2 yatsadoṣamayogyaṃ vā kūṭadānena tena kim //
analyzed: yat sa doṣam ayogyam vā kūṭa dānena tena kim

original: MSS_1765-1 anyadā bhūṣaṇaṃ puṃsaḥ kṣamā lajjeva yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: anyadā bhūṣaṇam puṃsaḥ kṣamā lajjā iva yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_1765-2 parākramaḥ paribhave vaiyātyaṃ surateṣviva //
analyzed: parākramaḥ paribhave vaiyātyam surateṣu iva

original: MSS_1766-1 anyadīyamavicintya pātaka nirghṛṇo harati jīvitopamam /
analyzed: anyadīyam a vicintya pātaka nirghṛṇaḥ harati jīvita upamam

original: MSS_1766-2 dravymatra kitavo vicetanas tena gacchati kadarthanāṃ ciram //
analyzed: dravyam atra kitavaḥ vicetanaḥ tena gacchati kadarthanām ciram

original: MSS_1767-1 anyaduḥkhena yo duḥkhī yo'nyaharṣeṇa harṣataḥ /
analyzed: anya duḥkhena yaḥ duḥkhī yoni aharṣeṇa harṣataḥ

original: MSS_1767-2 sa eva jagatāmīśo nararūpadharo hariḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eva jagatām īśaḥ nara rūpa dharaḥ hariḥ

original: MSS_1768-1 anyaducchṛṅkhalaṃ sattvam anyacchāstraniyantritam /
analyzed: anya ducchṛṅkhalam sattvam anyat śāstra niyantritam

original: MSS_1768-2 sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ hi tejastimirayoḥ kutaḥ //
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyam hi tejaḥ timirayoḥ kutas

original: MSS_1769-1 anyaduptaṃ jātamanyad ityetannopapadyate /
analyzed: anyat uptam jātam anyat iti etat na upapadyate

original: MSS_1769-2 upyate yaddhi yadbījaṃ tattadeva prarohati //
analyzed: upyate yat hi yat bījam tat tat eva prarohati

original: MSS_1770-1 anyadoṣamiva sa svakaṃ guṇaṃ khyāpayet kathamadhṛṣṭatājaḍaḥ /
analyzed: anya doṣam iva sa svakam guṇam khyāpayet katham adhṛṣṭa tā jaḍaḥ

original: MSS_1770-2 ucyate sa khalu kāryavattayā dhigvabhinnabudhasetumarthitām //
analyzed: ucyate sa khalu kāryavat tayā dhik vabhinna budha setum arthi tām

original: MSS_1771-1 anyadgopucchakaṃ jñeyaṃ śuddhakāṣṭhavinirmitam /
analyzed: anyat gopucchakam jñeyam śuddha kāṣṭha vinirmitam

original: MSS_1771-2 mukhe ca lohakaṇṭhena vedhyaṃ tryaṅgulasaṃmitam //
analyzed: mukhe ca loha kaṇṭhena vedhyam tri aṅgula saṃmitam

original: MSS_1772-1 anyapūrvāṃ striyaṃ sādhvīṃ kāmayeta na garvataḥ /
analyzed: anya pūrvām striyam sādhvīm kāmayeta na garvataḥ

original: MSS_1772-2 sādhvīricchan mahādevaḥ ṣaṇḍo'bhūddārukāvane //
analyzed: sādhvīḥ icchan mahādevaḥ

original: MSS_1773-1 anyapratāpamāsādya yo dṛḍhatvaṃ na gacchati /
analyzed: anya pratāpam āsādya yaḥ dṛḍha tvam na gacchati

original: MSS_1773-2 jātuṣābharaṇasyeva rūpeṇāpi hi tasya kim //
analyzed: jātuṣa ābharaṇasya iva rūpeṇa api hi tasya kim

original: MSS_1774-1 anyamāśrayate lakṣmīs tvanyamanyaṃ ca medinī /
analyzed: anyam āśrayate lakṣmīḥ tu anyam anyam ca medinī

original: MSS_1774-2 ananyagāminī puṃsāṃ kīrtirekā pativratā //
analyzed: an anya gāminī puṃsām kīrtiḥ ekā pativratā

original: MSS_1775-1 anyayānyavanitāgatacittaṃ cittanāthamabhiśaṅkitavatyā /
analyzed: anyayā anya vanitā gata cittam citta nātham abhiśaṅkitavatyā

original: MSS_1775-2 pītabhūrisurayāpi na mede nirvṛtirhi manaso madahetuḥ //
analyzed: pīta bhūri surayā api na mede nirvṛtiḥ hi manasaḥ mada hetuḥ

original: MSS_1776-1 anyayā yauvane martyo buddhyā bhavati mohitaḥ /
analyzed: anyayā yauvane martyaḥ buddhyā bhavati mohitaḥ

original: MSS_1776-2 madhye'nyayā jarāyāṃtu so'nyāṃ rocayate matim //
analyzed: madhyenyayā jarāyām tu sā ūnyām rocayate matim

original: MSS_1777-1 anyavarṇaṃ śiro yasya pucchaṃ vā yasya vājinaḥ /
analyzed: anya varṇam śiraḥ yasya puccham vā yasya vājinaḥ

original: MSS_1777-2 pucchena śirasā vāpi nānāvarṇaḥ sa ninditaḥ //
analyzed: pucchena śirasā vā api nānā varṇaḥ sa ninditaḥ

original: MSS_1778-1 anyavarṇaparāvṛttyā bandhacihnanigūhanaiḥ /
analyzed: anya varṇa parāvṛttyā bandha cihna nigūhanaiḥ

original: MSS_1778-2 anākhyātaḥ satāṃ madhye kaviścoro vibhāvyate //
analyzed: an ākhyātaḥ satām madhye kaviḥ coraḥ vibhāvyate

original: MSS_1779-1 anyastrīspṛhayālavo jagati ke padbhyāmagamyā ca kā ko dhāturdaśane samastamanujaiḥ kā prārthyate'harniśam /
analyzed: anya strī spṛhayālavaḥ jagati ke padbhyām agamyā ca kā kaḥ dhātuḥ daśane samasta manujaiḥ kā prārthyate iharniśam

original: MSS_1779-2 dṛṣṭvaikāṃ yavaneśvaro nijapure padmānanāṃ kāminīṃ mitraṃ prāha kimādareṇa sahasā yārānadīdaṃśamā //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ekām yavana īśvaraḥ nija pure padma ānanām kāminīm mitram prāha kim ādareṇa sahasā yārā nadī daṃśamā

original: MSS_1780-1 anyasmāllabdhoṣmā kśudraḥ prāyeṇa duḥsaho bhavati /
analyzed: anyasmāt labdha ūṣmā kśudraḥ prāyeṇa duḥsahaḥ bhavati

original: MSS_1780-2 ravirapi na dahati tādṛg yādṛghyuttaptavālukānikaraḥ //
analyzed: raviḥ api na dahati tādṛś yādṛś hi uttapta vālukā nikaraḥ

original: MSS_1781-1 anyasminnapi kāle dayitāvirahaḥ karoti saṃtāpam /
analyzed: anyasmin api kāle dayitā virahaḥ karoti saṃtāpam

original: MSS_1781-2 kiṃ punaraviralajaladhara- gurutararasiteṣu divaseṣu //
analyzed: kim punar avirala jaladhara gurutara rasiteṣu divaseṣu

original: MSS_1782-1 anyasmin preṣyamāṇe tu purastādyaḥ samutpatet /
analyzed: anyasmin preṣyamāṇe tu purastāt yaḥ samutpatet

original: MSS_1782-2 ahaṃ kiṃ karavāṇīti sa rājavasatiṃ vaset //
analyzed: aham kim karavāṇi iti sa rāja vasatim vaset

original: MSS_1783-1 anyasya lagati karṇe jīvitamanyasya harati bāṇa iva /
analyzed: anyasya lagati karṇe jīvitam anyasya harati bāṇaḥ iva

original: MSS_1783-2 hṛdayaṃ dunoti piśunaḥ kaṇṭaka iva pādalagno'pi //
analyzed: hṛdayam dunoti piśunaḥ kaṇṭakaḥ iva pāda lagnaḥ api

original: MSS_1784-1 anyasyai saṃpratīyaṃ kuru madanaripo svāṅgadānaprasādaṃ nāhaṃ soḍhuṃ samarthā śirasi suranadīṃ nāpi saṃdhyāṃ praṇantum /
analyzed: anyasyai saṃprati iyam kuru madana ripo sva aṅga dāna prasādam na aham soḍhum samarthā śirasi sura nadīm nā api saṃdhyām praṇantum

original: MSS_1784-2 ityuktvā kopaviddhāṃ vighaṭayitumumāmātmadehaṃ pravṛttāṃ rundhānaḥ pātu śambhoḥ kucakalasahaṭhasparśakṛṣṭo bhujo vaḥ //
analyzed: iti uktvā kopa viddhām vighaṭayitum umām ātma deham pravṛttām rundhānaḥ pātu śambhoḥ kuca kalasa haṭha sparśa kṛṣṭaḥ bhujaḥ vaḥ

original: MSS_1785-1 anyāṅganābhiradhikaṃ sa karoti keliṃ tvaṃ tena mā kuru viṣādamadabhrarūpe /
analyzed: anya aṅganābhiḥ adhikam sa karoti kelim tvam tena mā kuru viṣādam adabhra rūpe

original: MSS_1785-2 pepīyate madhukaraḥ kva na taṃ marandaṃ no jātu vismarati paṅkajinīṃ tathāpi //
analyzed: pepīyate madhukaraḥ kva na tam marandam no jātu vismarati paṅkajinīm tathā api

original: MSS_1786-1 anyā jagaddhitamayī manasaḥ pravṛttir anyaiva kāpi racanā vacanāvalīnām /
analyzed: anyā jagat hita mayī manasaḥ pravṛttiḥ anyā eva kā api racanā vacana āvalīnām

original: MSS_1786-2 lokottarā ca kṛṭirākṛtirārtahṛdyā vidyāvatāṃ sakalameva girāṃ davīyaḥ //
analyzed: lokottarā ca kṛṭiḥ ākṛtiḥ ārta hṛdyā vidyāvatām sakalam eva girām davīyaḥ

original: MSS_1787-1 anyādānākulāntaḥkaraṇavaśavipadbādhitapretaraṅkaṃ grāsabhraśyatkarālaślathapiśitaśavāgragrahe muktanādam /
analyzed: anya ādāna ākula antaḥkaraṇa vaśa vipad bādhita preta raṅkam grāsa bhraśyat karāla ślatha piśita śava agra grahe mukta nādam

original: MSS_1787-2 sarvaiḥ krāmadbhirulkānanakavalarasavyāttavaktraprabhābhir vyaktaistaiḥ saṃvaladbhiḥ kṣaṇamaparamiva vyomni vṛttaṃ śmaśānam //
analyzed: sarvaiḥ krāmadbhiḥ ulkā ānana kavala rasa vyātta vaktra prabhābhiḥ vyaktaiḥ taiḥ saṃvaladbhiḥ kṣaṇam aparam iva vyomni vṛttam śmaśānam

original: MSS_1788-1 anyānapi tarūn ropya phalapuṣpopayoginaḥ /
analyzed: anyān api tarūn ropya phala puṣpa upayoginaḥ

original: MSS_1788-2 ratnadhenusahasrasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ //
analyzed: ratna dhenu sahasrasya phalam prāpnoti mānavaḥ

original: MSS_1789-1 anyā nirarthikā cintā balatejaḥpraṇāśinī /
analyzed: anyā nirarthikā cintā bala tejaḥ praṇāśinī

original: MSS_1789-2 nāśayet sarvasaukhyaṃ tu rūpahāniṃ nidarśayet //
analyzed: nāśayet sarva saukhyam tu rūpa hānim nidarśayet

original: MSS_1790-1 anyāni śāstrāṇi vinodamātraṃ prāpteṣu vā teṣu na taiśca kiṃcit /
analyzed: anyāni śāstrāṇi vinoda mātram prāpteṣu vā teṣu na taiḥ ca kiṃcid

original: MSS_1790-2 cikitsitajyotiṣamantravādāḥ pade pade pratyayamāvahanti //
analyzed: cikitsita jyotiṣa mantra vādāḥ pade pade pratyayam āvahanti

original: MSS_1791-1 anyāni śāstrāṇi vinodamātraṃ prāpteṣu kāleṣu na taiśca kiṃcit /
analyzed: anyāni śāstrāṇi vinoda mātram prāpteṣu kāleṣu na taiḥ ca kiṃcid

original: MSS_1791-2 cikitsitajyotiṣamantravādāḥ pade pade pratyayamāvahanti //
analyzed: cikitsita jyotiṣa mantra vādāḥ pade pade pratyayam āvahanti

original: MSS_1792-1 anyānparivadan sādhur yathā hi paritapyate /
analyzed: anyān parivadan sādhuḥ yathā hi paritapyate

original: MSS_1792-2 tathā parivadannanyāṃs tuṣṭo bhavati durjanaḥ //
analyzed: tathā parivadan anyān tuṣṭaḥ bhavati durjanaḥ

original: MSS_1793-1 anyānyopamitaṃ yugaṃ nirupamaṃ te'yugmamaṅgeṣu yat so'yaṃ sikthakamāsyakāntimadhunastanvaṅgi candrastava /
analyzed: anya anya upamitam yugam nirupamam teyugmam aṅgeṣu yat saḥ ayam sikthakam āsya kānti madhunaḥ tanu aṅgi candraḥ tava

original: MSS_1793-2 tvadvācāṃ svaramātrikāṃ madakalaḥ puṃskokilo ghoṣayaty abhyāsasya kimastyagocaramiti pratyāśayā mohitaḥ //
analyzed: tvad vācām svara mātrikām mada kalaḥ puṃskokilaḥ ghoṣayati abhyāsasya kim asti agocaram iti pratyāśayā mohitaḥ

original: MSS_1794-1 anyā prakāmasurataśramakhinnadehā rātriprajāgaravipāṭalanetrapadmā /
analyzed: anyā prakāma surata śrama khinna dehā rātri prajāgara vipāṭala netra padmā

original: MSS_1794-2 śayyāntadeśalulitākulakeśapāśā nidrāṃ prayāti mṛdusūryakarābhitaptā //
analyzed: śayyā anta deśa lulita ākula keśapāśā nidrām prayāti mṛdu sūrya kara abhitaptā

original: MSS_1795-1 anyā priyeṇa paribhuktamavekṣya gātraṃ harṣānvitā viracitādharacāruśobhā /
analyzed: anyā priyeṇa paribhuktam avekṣya gātram harṣa anvitā viracita adhara cāru śobhā

original: MSS_1795-2 kūrpāsakaṃ paridadhāti nakhakṣatāṅgī vyālambinīlalalitālakakuñcitākṣī //
analyzed: kūrpāsakam paridadhāti nakha kṣata aṅgī vyālambi nīla lalita alaka kuñcita akṣī

original: MSS_1796-1 anyābhyo vanyābhyo mālati dhanyāsi vallarībhyastvam /
analyzed: anyābhyaḥ vanyābhyaḥ mālati dhanyā asi vallarībhyaḥ tvam

original: MSS_1796-2 yat kila tavaiva savidhe krīḍati madhupaḥ sadaiva mudito'yam //
analyzed: yat kila tava eva savidhe krīḍati madhupaḥ sadā eva muditaḥ iyam

original: MSS_1797-1 anyāmanyāṃ dhanāvasthāṃ prāpya vaiśeṣikīṃ narāḥ /
analyzed: anyām anyām dhana avasthām prāpya vaiśeṣikīm narāḥ

original: MSS_1797-2 asaṃtuṣṭāḥ pramuhyanti saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ //
analyzed: asaṃtuṣṭāḥ pramuhyanti saṃtoṣam yānti paṇḍitāḥ

original: MSS_1798-1 anyāyaḥ prauḍhavādena nīyate nyāyatāṃ yayā /
analyzed: anyāyaḥ prauḍha vādena nīyate nyāya tām yayā

original: MSS_1798-2 nyāyaścānyāyatāṃ lobhāt kiṃ tayā kṣudravidyayā //
analyzed: nyāyaḥ ca anyāya tām lobhāt kim tayā kṣudra vidyayā

original: MSS_1799-1 anyāyakarabhogaiśca yo hi jīvati nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: anyāya kara bhogaiḥ ca yaḥ hi jīvati nityaśas

original: MSS_1799-2 virāgādeva lokānāṃ bhraṃśate sa hi pārthivaḥ //
analyzed: virāgāt eva lokānām bhraṃśate sa hi pārthivaḥ

original: MSS_1800-1 anyāyadraviṇādāneṣv udyamaḥ kriyate vṛthā /
analyzed: anyāya draviṇa ādāneṣu udyamaḥ kriyate vṛthā

original: MSS_1800-2 lubdhānāṃ satyasaṃkocāt saṃkucantyeva saṃpadaḥ //
analyzed: lubdhānām satya saṃkocāt saṃkucanti eva saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_1801-1 anyāyavittena kṛto'pi dharmaḥ savyāja ityāhuraśeṣalokāḥ /
analyzed: anyāya vittena kṛtaḥ api dharmaḥ sa vyājaḥ iti āhuḥ aśeṣa lokāḥ

original: MSS_1801-2 nyāyārjitārthena sa eva dharmo nirvyāja ityāryajanā vadanti //
analyzed: nyāya arjita arthena saḥ eva dharmaḥ nirvyājaḥ iti ārya janāḥ vadanti

original: MSS_1802-1 anyāyasamupāttena dānadharmo dhanena yaḥ /
analyzed: anyāya samupāttena dāna dharmaḥ dhanena yaḥ

original: MSS_1802-2 kriyate na sa kartāraṃ trāyate mahato bhayāt //
analyzed: kriyate na sa kartāram trāyate mahataḥ bhayāt

original: MSS_1803-1 anyā yā vasanottamaṃ tadadhunā saṃgṛhya mānyaṃ punar yanmāṃ darśayasi priyaṃ priyatamaṃ toṣāya roṣāya no /
analyzed: anyā yā vasana uttamam tat adhunā saṃgṛhya mānyam punar yat mām darśayasi priyam priyatamam toṣāya roṣāya no

original: MSS_1803-2 sarvasaiva sataśca rītiriyatī pūrvaṃ śrutā vṛddhataḥ prāyaḥ prāpya nijaprakarṣamakhilaṃ mitraṃ mudādarśayat //
analyzed: sarvasā eva sataḥ ca rītiḥ iyatī pūrvam śrutā vṛddhataḥ prāyas prāpya nija prakarṣam akhilam mitram mudā adarśayat

original: MSS_1804-1 anyāyopārjitaṃ dravyaṃ daśavarṣāṇi tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: anyāya upārjitam dravyam daśa varṣāṇi tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_1804-2 prāpte caikādaśe varṣe samūlaṃ ca vinaśyati //
analyzed: prāpte ca ekādaśe varṣe sa mūlam ca vinaśyati

original: MSS_1805-1 anyāyopārjitaṃ dravyam arthadūṣaṇamucyate /
analyzed: anyāya upārjitam dravyam artha dūṣaṇam ucyate

original: MSS_1805-2 apātradānaṃ pātrārtha haraṇaṃ tasya lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: apātra dānam pātra artha haraṇam tasya lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_1806-1 anyārthamaṅgīkṛtavāripāṇau viśaṅkamānāstava dānanīram /
analyzed: anya artham aṅgīkṛta vāri pāṇau viśaṅkamānāḥ tava dāna nīram

original: MSS_1806-2 parasparaṃ dīnamukhā na ke vā devāḥ sumeruṃ śuśucuḥ svabhūmim //
analyzed: parasparam dīna mukhāḥ na ke vā devāḥ sumerum śuśucuḥ sva bhūmim

original: MSS_1807-1 anyā vihāya patigṛha- mavicintitakulakalaṅkajanagarhāḥ /
analyzed: anyāḥ vihāya pati gṛha ma vicintita kula kalaṅka jana garhāḥ

original: MSS_1807-2 rāgoparaktahṛdayā yānti digantaṃ manuṣyā āsajya //
analyzed: rāga uparakta hṛdayāḥ yānti diś antam manuṣyāḥ āsajya

original: MSS_1808-1 anyāściraṃ suratakelipariśrameṇa khedaṃ gatāḥ praśithilīkṛtagātrayaṣṭyaḥ /
analyzed: anyāḥ ciram surata keli pariśrameṇa khedam gatāḥ praśithilīkṛta gātra yaṣṭyaḥ

original: MSS_1808-2 saṃhṛṣyamāṇavipulorupayodharārtā abhyañjanaṃ vidadhati pramadāḥ suśobhāḥ //
analyzed: saṃhṛṣyamāṇa vipula uru payodhara ārtāḥ abhyañjanam vidadhati pramadāḥ su śobhāḥ

original: MSS_1809-1 anyāsāṃ na kimasti veśmani vadhūḥ kaivaṃ niśi prāvṛṣi praiti prāntataḍāgamamba gṛhiṇi svasthāsi me'vasthayā /
analyzed: anyāsām na kim asti veśmani vadhūḥ kā evam niśi prāvṛṣi praiti prānta taḍāgam amba gṛhiṇi svasthā asi mevasthayā

original: MSS_1809-2 bhagno'yaṃ valayo ghaṭo vighaṭitaḥ kṣaṇṇā tanuḥ kaṇṭakair ākrāntaḥ sa tathā bhujaṅgahatakaḥ kaṣṭaṃ na yaddaṣṭavān //
analyzed: bhagnā uyam valayaḥ ghaṭaḥ vighaṭitaḥ kṣaṇṇā tanuḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ ākrāntaḥ sa tathā bhujaṅga hatakaḥ kaṣṭam na yat daṣṭavān

original: MSS_1810-1 anyā sādhigatā tvayā kva yuvatī yasyāḥ sa mānagraho yāte locanagocaraṃ priyatame saṃpratyapakrāmati /
analyzed: anyā sā adhigatā tvayā kva yuvatī yasyāḥ sa māna grahaḥ yāte locana gocaram priyatame saṃprati apakrāmati

original: MSS_1810-2 asmākaṃ punarugrapūruṣaśatāśleṣapragalbhātmanām etādṛśyanabhijñapūruṣapariṣvaṅge kutaḥ sādhvasam //
analyzed: asmākam punar ugra pūruṣa śata āśleṣa pragalbha ātmanām etādṛśī anabhijña pūruṣa pariṣvaṅge kutas sādhvasam

original: MSS_1811-1 anyā sā sarasī marāla munibhiryattīrasopānikā- vinyastān balitaṇḍulān kavalayan dṛṣṭo'si hṛdyairmukhaiḥ /
analyzed: anyā sā sarasī marāla munibhiḥ yat tīra sopānikā vinyastān bali taṇḍulān kavalayan dṛṣṭaḥ asi hṛdyaiḥ mukhaiḥ

original: MSS_1811-2 eṣā pakkaṇavāpikā kamalinīkhaṇḍe'tra guptātmabhir vyādhaistvadvidhamugdhabandhanavidhau kiṃ nāma nāsūtryate //
analyzed: eṣā pakkaṇa vāpikā gupta ātmabhiḥ vyādhaiḥ tvadvidha mugdha bandhana vidhau kim nāma nā āsūtryate

original: MSS_1812-1 anyāsu tāvadupamardasahāsu bhṛṅga lolaṃ vinodaya manaḥ sumanolatāsu /
analyzed: anyāsu tāvat upamarda sahāsu bhṛṅga lolam vinodaya manaḥ sumanaḥ latāsu

original: MSS_1812-2 mughdāmajātarajasaṃ kalikāmakāle vyarthaṃ kadarthayasi kiṃ navamallikāyāḥ //
analyzed: mughdām ajāta rajasam kalikām akāle vyartham kadarthayasi kim nava mallikāyāḥ

original: MSS_1813-1 anyāstā guṇaratnarohaṇabhuvo dhanyā mṛdanyaiva sā saṃbhārāḥ khalu te'nya eva vidhinā yaireṣa sṛṣṭo yuvā /
analyzed: anyāḥ tāḥ guṇa ratna rohaṇa bhuvaḥ dhanyā mṛdanyā eva sā saṃbhārāḥ khalu eva vidhinā yaiḥ eṣa sṛṣṭaḥ yuvā

original: MSS_1813-2 śrīmatkāntijuṣāṃ dviṣāṃ karatalāt strīṇāṃ nitambasthalād dṛṣṭe yatra patanti mūḍhamanasāmastrāṇi vastrāṇi ca //
analyzed: śrīmat kānti juṣām dviṣām kara talāt strīṇām nitamba sthalāt dṛṣṭe yatra patanti mūḍha manasām astrāṇi vastrāṇi ca

original: MSS_1814-1 anyāstā malayādrikānanabhuvaḥ svacchasravannirjjharās tṛṣṇā yāsu nivartate tanubhṛtāmālokamātrādapi /
analyzed: anyāḥ tāḥ malaya adri kānana bhuvaḥ svaccha sravat nirjjharāḥ tṛṣṇā yāsu nivartate tanubhṛtām āloka mātrāt api

original: MSS_1814-2 rūkṣadhvāṅkṣaparigraho marurayaṃ sphārībhavadbhrāntayaḥ tā etā mṛgatṛṣṇikā hariṇa he nedaṃ payo gamyatām //
analyzed: rūkṣa dhvāṅkṣa parigrahaḥ maruḥ ayam sphārībhavat bhrāntayaḥ tāḥ etāḥ mṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ hariṇa he nā idam payaḥ gamyatām

original: MSS_1815-1 anyūnaṃ guṇamamṛtasya dhārayantī saṃphullasphuritasaroruhāvataṃsā /
analyzed: anyūnam guṇam amṛtasya dhārayantī saṃphulla sphurita saroruha avataṃsā

original: MSS_1815-2 preyobhiḥ saha sarasī niṣevyamāṇā raktatvaṃ vyadhita vadhūdṛśaṃ surā ca //
analyzed: preyobhiḥ saha sarasī niṣevyamāṇā rakta tvam vyadhita vadhū dṛśam surā ca

original: MSS_1816-1 anyūnonnatayo'timātrapṛthavaḥ pṛthvīdharaśrībhṛtas tanvantaḥ kanakāvalībhirupamāṃ saudāmanīdāmabhiḥ /
analyzed: pṛthvīdhara śrībhṛtaḥ tanvantaḥ kanaka āvalībhiḥ upamām saudāmanī dāmabhiḥ

original: MSS_1816-2 varṣantaḥ śamamānayannupalasacchṛṅgāralekhāyudhāḥ kāle kāliyakāyakālavapuṣaḥ pāṃsūn gajāmbhomucaḥ //
analyzed: varṣantaḥ śamam ānayan upalasat śṛṅgāra lekhā āyudhāḥ kāle kāliya kāya kāla vapuṣaḥ pāṃsūn gaja ambhomucaḥ

original: MSS_1817-1 anye ca bahavo rāgā jātā deśaviśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: anye ca bahavaḥ rāgāḥ jātāḥ deśa viśeṣataḥ

original: MSS_1817-2 mārūprabhṛtayo loke te ca tad deśikāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: mārū prabhṛtayaḥ loke te ca tat deśikāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: MSS_1818-1 anye cet prākṛtā lokā bahupāpāni kurvate /
analyzed: anye ced prākṛtāḥ lokāḥ bahu pāpāni kurvate

original: MSS_1818-2 pradhānapuruṣeṇāpi kāryaṃ tatpṛṣṭhato nu kim //
analyzed: pradhāna puruṣeṇa api kāryam tat pṛṣṭhatas nu kim

original: MSS_1819-1 anye te jaladāyino jaladharāstṛṣṇāṃ vinighnanti ye bhrātaścātaka kiṃ vṛthātiraṭitaiḥ khinno'si viśrāmyatām /
analyzed: anye te jala dāyinaḥ jaladharāḥ tṛṣṇām vinighnanti ye bhrātar cātaka kim vṛthak ati raṭitaiḥ khinnaḥ usi viśrāmyatām

original: MSS_1819-2 meghaḥ śārada eṣa kāśadhavalaḥ pānīyariktodaro garjatyeva hi kevalaṃ bhṛśataraṃ no bindumapyujjhati //
analyzed: meghaḥ śāradaḥ eṣa kāśa dhavalaḥ pānīya rikta udaraḥ garjati eva hi kevalam bhṛśataram no bindum api ujjhati

original: MSS_1820-1 anye te vihagāḥ payoda parito dhāvanti tṛṣṇāturā vāpīkūpataḍāgasāgarajale majjanti dattādarāḥ /
analyzed: anye te vihagāḥ payoda paritas dhāvanti tṛṣṇā āturāḥ vāpī kūpa taḍāga sāgara jale majjanti datta ādarāḥ

original: MSS_1820-2 māmadyāpi na vetsi cātakaśiśuṃ yacchuṣkakaṇṭho'pi san nānyaṃ vāñchati nopasarpati na ca prastauti na dhyāyati //
analyzed: mām adya api na vetsi cātaka śiśum yat śuṣka kaṇṭhaḥ api san nā anyam vāñchati nā upasarpati na ca prastauti na dhyāyati

original: MSS_1821-1 anye te sumanolihaḥ prahasadapyambhojamujjhanti ye vātāndolanakelicañcaladalaprāntairapi trāsitāḥ /
analyzed: anye te sumanaḥ lihaḥ prahasat api ambhojam ujjhanti ye vāta āndolana keli cañcala dala prāntaiḥ api trāsitāḥ

original: MSS_1821-2 anyaḥ ko'pi sa eṣa ṣaṭpadabhaṭaḥ saṃsahya karṇāhatīr yenānekapagaṇḍagaṇḍalamiladdānāmbuni krīḍitam //
analyzed: anyaḥ kaḥ api saḥ eṣa ṣaṭpada bhaṭaḥ saṃsahya karṇa āhatīḥ yena aneka pagaṇḍa gaṇḍala milat dāna ambuni krīḍitam

original: MSS_1822-1 anyenāpi svamāṃsena chidyamānena dūyate /
analyzed: anyena api sva māṃsena chidyamānena dūyate

original: MSS_1822-2 tathāpi paramāṃsāni svādūnīti samaśnute //
analyzed: tathā api para māṃsāni svādūni iti samaśnute

original: MSS_1823-1 anye'pi santi guṇinaḥ kati no jagatyāṃ hāra tvameva guṇināmuparisthito'si /
analyzed: anye api santi guṇinaḥ kati naḥ jagatyām hāra tvam eva guṇinām upari sthitaḥ asi

original: MSS_1823-2 eṇīdṛśāmurasi nityamavasthito'si sadvṛttatā ca śucitā ca na khaṇḍitā te //
analyzed: eṇī dṛśām urasi nityam avasthitaḥ asi sat vṛtta tā ca śuci tā ca na khaṇḍitā te

original: MSS_1824-1 anye'pi santi bata tāmarasāvataṃsā haṃsāvalīvalayino jalasaṃniveśāḥ /
analyzed: anye api santi bata tāmarasa avataṃsāḥ haṃsa āvalī valayinaḥ jala saṃniveśāḥ

original: MSS_1824-2 ko'pyāgraho gururayaṃ bata cātakasya pauraṃdarīṃ yadabhivāñchati vāridhārām //
analyzed: kopya āgrahaḥ guruḥ ayam bata cātakasya pauraṃdarīm yat abhivāñchati vāri dhārām

original: MSS_1825-1 anyeyaṃ rūpasaṃpattir anyā vaidagdhyadhoraṇī /
analyzed: anyā iyam rūpa saṃpattiḥ anyā vaidagdhya dhoraṇī

original: MSS_1825-2 naiṣā nalinapatrākṣī sṛṣṭiḥ sādhāraṇī vidheḥ //
analyzed: nā eṣā nalina patra akṣī sṛṣṭiḥ sādhāraṇī vidheḥ

original: MSS_1826-1 anyeṣāṃ yo na pāpāni cintayatyātmano yathā /
analyzed: anyeṣām yaḥ na pāpāni cintayati ātmanaḥ yathā

original: MSS_1826-2 tasya pāpāgamastāta hetvabhāvānna vidyate //
analyzed: tasya pāpa āgamaḥ tāta hetu abhāvāt na vidyate
