original: MSS_1827-1 karmaṇā manasā vācā parapīḍāṃ karoti yaḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā para pīḍām karoti yaḥ

original: MSS_1827-2 tadbījaṃ janma phalati prabhūtaṃ tasya cāśubham //
analyzed: tad bījam janma phalati prabhūtam tasya ca aśubham

original: MSS_1828-1 anyeṣāmapi naśyanti suhṛdaśca dhanāni ca /
analyzed: anyeṣām api naśyanti suhṛdaḥ ca dhanāni ca

original: MSS_1828-2 paśya buddhyā manuṣyāṇāṃ rājannāpadamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: paśya buddhyā manuṣyāṇām rājan na āpadam ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_1829-1 anyeṣvarthakṛtā maitrī yāvadarthaviḍambanam /
analyzed: anyeṣu artha kṛtā maitrī yāvat artha viḍambanam

original: MSS_1829-2 puṃbhiḥ strīṣu kṛtā yadvat sumanaḥsviva ṣaṭpadaiḥ //
analyzed: puṃbhiḥ strīṣu kṛtā yadvat sumanaḥsu iva ṣaṭpadaiḥ

original: MSS_1830-1 anye hi duḥkhamṛtavaḥ prathayantyahobhiḥ sūryāṃśuluptatimirairabhisārikāṇām /
analyzed: anye hi duḥkham ṛtavaḥ prathayanti ahobhiḥ sūrya aṃśu lupta timiraiḥ abhisārikāṇām

original: MSS_1830-2 hemanta eṣa himaruddhasahasradhāmā kāmaṃ karoti divaseṣvapi śarma tāsām //
analyzed: hemantaḥ eṣa hima ruddha sahasra dhāmā kāmam karoti divaseṣu api śarma tāsām

original: MSS_1831-1 anyaiḥ sākaṃ virodhena vayaṃ pañcottaraṃ śatam /
analyzed: anyaiḥ sākam virodhena vayam pañca uttaram śatam

original: MSS_1831-2 parasparavirodhena vayaṃ pañca ca te śatam //
analyzed: paraspara virodhena vayam pañca ca te śatam

original: MSS_1832-1 anyocchiṣṭeṣu pātreṣu bhuktvaiteṣu mahībhujaḥ /
analyzed: anya ucchiṣṭeṣu pātreṣu bhuktvā eteṣu mahībhujaḥ

original: MSS_1832-2 kasmānna lajjāmavahañ śaucacintāṃ na vā dadhuḥ //
analyzed: kasmāt na lajjām avaham śauca cintām na vā

original: MSS_1833-1 anyo dhanaṃ pretagatasya bhuṅkte vayāṃsi cāgniśca śarīradhātūn /
analyzed: anyaḥ dhanam preta gatasya bhuṅkte vayāṃsi ca agniḥ ca śarīra dhātūn

original: MSS_1833-2 dvābhyāmayaṃ saha gacchatyamutra puṇyena pāpena ca veṣṭyamānaḥ //
analyzed: dvābhyām ayam saha gacchati amutra puṇyena pāpena ca veṣṭyamānaḥ

original: MSS_1834-1 anyonyaṃ kṛtavairāṇāṃ putrapautraṃ nigacchati /
analyzed: anyonyam kṛta vairāṇām putra pautram nigacchati

original: MSS_1834-2 putrapautre vinaṣṭe tu paralokaṃ nigacchati //
analyzed: putra pautre vinaṣṭe tu para lokam nigacchati

original: MSS_1835-1 anyonyaṃ daśanacchadeṣu daśatoranyonyamāliṅgator anyonyaṃ nakharaiḥ kharairvilikhatoranyonyamācumbatoḥ /
analyzed: anyonyam daśanacchadeṣu daśatoḥ anyonyam āliṅgatoḥ anyonyam nakharaiḥ kharaiḥ vilikhatoḥ anyonyam ācumbatoḥ

original: MSS_1835-2 autsukyena navaṃ navaṃ nidhuvanaprāgalbhyamabhyasyatoḥ śrānte pañcaśare'pi na praṇayinoḥ prāpto'pakarṣaṃ rasaḥ //
analyzed: autsukyena navam navam nidhuvana prāgalbhyam abhyasyatoḥ śrānte pañcaśare api na praṇayinoḥ prāpta upakarṣam rasaḥ

original: MSS_1836-1 anyonyaṃ matimāsthāya yatra sampratibhāṣyate /
analyzed: anyonyam matim āsthāya yatra sampratibhāṣyate

original: MSS_1836-2 na caikamatye śreyosti mantraḥ so'dhama ucyate //
analyzed: na ca ekamatye śreyaḥ asti mantraḥ saḥ dhamaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_1837-1 anyonyakṛtavairāṇāṃ saṃvāsānmṛdutāṃ gatam /
analyzed: anyonya kṛta vairāṇām saṃvāsāt mṛdu tām gatam

original: MSS_1837-2 nava tiṣṭhati tadvaraṃ puṣkarasthamivodakam //
analyzed: nava tiṣṭhati tat varam puṣkara stham iva udakam

original: MSS_1838-1 anyonyagūḍhaceṣṭita- sadbhāvasnehapāśabaddhasya /
analyzed: anyonya gūḍha ceṣṭita sadbhāva sneha pāśa baddhasya

original: MSS_1838-2 vicchedakaro mṛtyur dhīrāṇāṃ vā paricchedaḥ //
analyzed: viccheda karaḥ mṛtyuḥ dhīrāṇām vā paricchedaḥ

original: MSS_1839-1 anyonyagopyaṃ viduṣāṃ tu lakṣaṃ yadasya tulyāḥ prabhavo bhavanti /
analyzed: anyonya gopyam viduṣām tu lakṣam yat asya tulyāḥ prabhavaḥ bhavanti

original: MSS_1839-2 parasparāliṅganatatparāṇāṃ na kānta saukhyaṃ yuvatījanānām //
analyzed: paraspara āliṅgana tatparāṇām na kānta saukhyam yuvatī janānām

original: MSS_1840-1 anyonyagrathitāruṇāṅgulinamatpāṇidvayasyopari nyasyocchavāsavikampitādharadalaṃ nirvedaśūnyaṃ mukham /
analyzed: anyonya grathita aruṇa aṅguli namat pāṇi dvayasya upari nyasya ucchavāsa vikampita adhara dalam nirveda śūnyam mukham

original: MSS_1840-2 āmīlannayanāntavāntasalilaṃ ślādhyasya nindyasya vā kasyedaṃ dṛḍhasauhṛdaṃ pratidinaṃ dīnaṃ tvayā smaryate //
analyzed: āmīlat nayana anta vānta salilam ślādhyasya nindyasya vā kasya idam dṛḍha sauhṛdam pratidinam dīnam tvayā smaryate

original: MSS_1841-1 anyonyadarśanakṛtaḥ samānarūpānurāgakulavayasām /
analyzed: anyonya darśana kṛtaḥ samāna rūpa anurāga kula vayasām

original: MSS_1841-2 keṣāṃcideva manye samāgamo bhavati puṇyavatām //
analyzed: keṣāṃcid eva manye samāgamaḥ bhavati puṇyavatām

original: MSS_1842-1 anyonyaprakaṭānurāgarabhasādudbhūtaromāñcayor utkaṇṭhāparikhedaduḥsahatayā kṣāmībhavadgātrayoḥ /
analyzed: anyonya prakaṭa anurāga rabhasāt udbhūta romāñcayoḥ utkaṇṭhā parikheda duḥsaha tayā kṣāmībhavat gātrayoḥ

original: MSS_1842-2 naktaṃ daivavaśāt kṣaṇaṃ gurujanātsvāyattatāṃ prāptayor yāto durlabhasaṃgamotsavavidhiryūnorjanākhyeyatām //
analyzed: naktam daiva vaśāt kṣaṇam guru janāt sva āyatta tām prāptayoḥ yātaḥ durlabha saṃgama utsava vidhiḥ yūnoḥ jana ākhyeya tām

original: MSS_1843-1 anyonyabhedo bhrātṝṇāṃ suhṛdāṃ vā balāntaka /
analyzed: anyonya bhedaḥ bhrātṝṇām suhṛdām vā bala antaka

original: MSS_1843-2 bhavatyānandakṛddeva dviṣatāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: bhavati ānanda kṛt deva dviṣatām na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_1844-1 anyonyamutpīḍayadutpalākṣyāḥ stanadvayaṃ pāṇḍu tathā pravṛddham /
analyzed: anyonyam utpīḍayat utpala akṣyāḥ stana dvayam pāṇḍu tathā pravṛddham

original: MSS_1844-2 madhye yathā śyāmamukhasya tasya mṛṇālasūtrāntaramapyalabhyam //
analyzed: madhye yathā śyāma mukhasya tasya mṛṇāla sūtra antaram api alabhyam

original: MSS_1845-1 anyonyarāgavaśayoryuvayorvilāsa- svacchandatācchidapayātu tadālivargaḥ /
analyzed: anyonya rāga vaśayoḥ yuvayoḥ vilāsa svacchanda tā chid apayātu tadā āli vargaḥ

original: MSS_1845-2 atyājayan sicayamājimakārayanvā dantairnakhaiśca madano madanaḥ kathaṃ syāt //
analyzed: atyājayan sicayam ājim akārayan vā dantaiḥ nakhaiḥ ca madanaḥ madanaḥ katham syāt

original: MSS_1846-1 anyonyalakṣaṇairyuktāṃ nārīṃ saṃkīrṇakāṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: anyonya lakṣaṇaiḥ yuktām nārīm saṃkīrṇakām viduḥ

original: MSS_1846-2 yā nijaireva saṃyuktā cihnaistāṃ kevalāṃ jaguḥ //
analyzed: yā nijaiḥ eva saṃyuktā cihnaiḥ tām kevalām jaguḥ

original: MSS_1847-1 anyonyalāvaṇyavilokanāntaṃ netradvayaṃ syātsatataṃ kilāsyāḥ /
analyzed: anyonya lāvaṇya vilokana antam netra dvayam syāt satatam kila asyāḥ

original: MSS_1847-2 ityeva nāsā vihitā vidhātrā madhye tayordarśanavighnakartrī //
analyzed: iti eva nāsā vihitā vidhātrā madhye tayoḥ darśana vighna kartrī

original: MSS_1848-1 anyonyavārighaṭitau dhanavāripātād bhītau bhṛśaṃ mṛgavadhūrmṛgayūthapaśca /
analyzed: anyonya vāri ghaṭitau dhana vāri pātāt bhītau bhṛśam mṛga vadhūḥ mṛga yūthapaḥ ca

original: MSS_1848-2 vittastayā ghaṭanayā kṛtasaukhyamohau naivāmbuvāhajalaśīkarapātapīḍām //
analyzed: vittaḥ tayā ghaṭanayā kṛta saukhya mohau na eva ambuvāha jala śīkara pāta pīḍām

original: MSS_1849-1 anyonyaviparītāni matāni manasaḥ sadā /
analyzed: anyonya viparītāni matāni manasaḥ sadā

original: MSS_1849-2 avidyāyāṃ punaḥ satye jñānasyoccatarasya hi /
analyzed: avidyāyām punar satye jñānasya uccatarasya hi

original: MSS_1849-3 aṅgāni nikhilāni syuḥ pūrayanti parasparam //
analyzed: aṅgāni nikhilāni syuḥ pūrayanti parasparam

original: MSS_1850-1 anyonyaśvasitāśanaiḥ phaṇadharairāviśya sattvānbahir bhuñjānaiḥ paricārakaistṛṇagaṇairānandinā nandinā /
analyzed: anyonya śvasita aśanaiḥ phaṇa dharaiḥ āviśya sattvān bahis bhuñjānaiḥ paricārakaiḥ tṛṇa gaṇaiḥ ānandinā nandinā

original: MSS_1850-2 bhikṣānnopacitaiśca dāratanayaiḥ puṣṇāti viśvāni yaḥ sa svāmī mama daivataṃ taditaro nāmnāpi nāmnāyate //
analyzed: bhikṣā anna upacitaiḥ ca dāra tanayaiḥ puṣṇāti viśvāni yaḥ sa svāmī mama daivatam tad itaraḥ nāmnā api nāmnā āyate

original: MSS_1851-1 anyonyasaṃgamavaśādadhunā vibhātāṃ tasyāpi te'pi manasī vikasadvilāse /
analyzed: anyonya saṃgama vaśāt adhunā vibhātām tasya api te api manasī vikasat vilāse

original: MSS_1851-2 sraṣṭuṃ punarmanasijasya tanuṃ pravṛttam ādāviva dvyaṇukakṛtparamāṇuyugmam //
analyzed: sraṣṭum punar manasijasya tanum pravṛttam ādau iva dvyaṇuka kṛt paramāṇu yugmam

original: MSS_1852-1 anyonyasaṃbhinnadṛśāṃ sakhīnāṃ tasyāstvayi prāganurāgacihnam /
analyzed: anyonya saṃbhinna dṛśām sakhīnām tasyāḥ tvayi prāk anurāga cihnam

original: MSS_1852-2 kasyāpi ko'pīti niveditaṃ ca dhātreyikāyāścaturaṃ vacaśca //
analyzed: kasya api kopī iti niveditam ca dhātreyikāyāḥ caturam vacaḥ ca

original: MSS_1853-1 anyonyasaṃvalitamāṃsaladantakānti sollāsamāviralasaṃ valitārdhatāram /
analyzed: anyonya saṃvalita māṃsala danta kānti sa ullāsam āviralasam valita ardha tāram

original: MSS_1853-2 līlāgṛhe pratikalaṃ kilakiñciteṣu vyāvartamānavinayaṃ mithunaṃ cakāsti //
analyzed: līlā gṛhe pratikalam kilakiñciteṣu vyāvartamāna vinayam mithunam cakāsti

original: MSS_1854-1 anyonyasamupaṣṭambhād anyonyāpāśrayeṇa ca /
analyzed: anyonya samupaṣṭambhāt anyonya apāśrayeṇa ca

original: MSS_1854-2 jñātayaḥ saṃpravardhante sarasīvotpalānyuta //
analyzed: jñātayaḥ saṃpravardhante sarasi iva utpalāni uta

original: MSS_1855-1 anyonyasmādvinirbhinnaṃ bhinnagarbhaṃ na yudhyate /
analyzed: anyonyasmāt vinirbhinnam bhinna garbham na yudhyate

original: MSS_1855-2 tathaivāpasṛtaṃ śaktaṃ naikarājyāntarīkṛtam //
analyzed: tathā eva apasṛtam śaktam na eka rājya antarīkṛtam

original: MSS_1856-1 anyonyasya niyantraṇāparibhavādaprauḍhaśītātapāḥ puṣpyatkiṃśukacūtanūtanadalāvirbhūtaśoṇaśriyaḥ /
analyzed: anyonyasya niyantraṇa a paribhavāt aprauḍha śīta ātapāḥ puṣpyat kiṃśuka cūta nūtana dala āvirbhūta śoṇa śriyaḥ

original: MSS_1856-2 padmollāsitagandhavāsitavahadvātāvadātatviṣo modonmādajuṣo haranti hṛdayaṃ vāsantikā vāsarāḥ //
MSS_1857-1 anyonyasya layaṃ bhayādiva mahābhūteṣu yāteṣvalaṃ kalpānte parameka eva sa taruḥ skandhoccayairjṛmbhate /
analyzed: anyonyasya layam bhayāt iva mahābhūteṣu yāteṣu alam kalpa ante param ekaḥ eva sa taruḥ skandha uccayaiḥ jṛmbhate

original: MSS_1857-2 vinyasya trijaganti kukṣikurhare devena yasyāsyate śākhāgre śiśuneva sevitajalakrīḍāvilāsālasam //
analyzed: vinyasya tri jaganti kukṣi kurhare devena yasya āsyate śākhā agre śiśunā iva sevita jala krīḍā vilāsa alasam

original: MSS_1858-1 anyonyasyāvyabhīcāro bhavedāmaraṇāntikaḥ /
analyzed: anyonyasya avyabhīcāraḥ bhavet āmaraṇāntikaḥ

original: MSS_1858-2 eṣa dharmaḥ samāsena jñeyaḥ matrīpuṃsayoḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: eṣa dharmaḥ samāsena jñeyaḥ matrīpuṃsayoḥ paraḥ

original: MSS_1859-1 anyonyākṣinipātajātamadayoranyonyaceṣṭāśata- spṛṣṭāntaḥpadayormanobhavaśaravyāghātasaṃbhrāntayoḥ /
analyzed: anyonya akṣi nipāta jāta madayoḥ anyonya ceṣṭā śata spṛṣṭa antar padayoḥ manobhava śara vyāghāta saṃbhrāntayoḥ

original: MSS_1859-2 syādeva dviradendrayoriva tayorāliṅganaṃ prāṅgaṇe dhairyastambhaviḍambinī balavatī lajjā na cedargalā //
analyzed: syāt eva dvirada indrayoḥ iva tayoḥ āliṅganam prāṅgaṇe dhairya stambha viḍambinī balavatī lajjā na ced argalā

original: MSS_1860-1 anyonyāntaranirgatāṅgulidalaśreṇībhavanniścala- granthipragrathitaṃ karadvayamuparyuttānamābibhratā /
analyzed: anyonya antara nirgata aṅguli dala śreṇībhavat niścala granthi pragrathitam kara dvayam upari uttānam ābibhratā

original: MSS_1860-2 seyaṃ vibhramatoraṇapraṇayinā jṛmbhābharottabhite- noccairbāhuyugena śaṃsati manojanmapraveśotsavam //
analyzed: sā iyam vibhrama toraṇa praṇayinā jṛmbhā bhara uttabhite na uccais bāhu yugena śaṃsati manaḥ janma praveśa utsavam

original: MSS_1861-1 anyonyāsphālabhinnadviparudhiravasāmāṃsamastiṣkapaṅke magnānāṃ syandanānāmupari kṛtapadanyāsavikrāntapattau /
analyzed: anyonya āsphāla bhinna dvipa rudhira vasā māṃsa mastiṣka paṅke magnānām syandanānām upari kṛta padanyāsa vikrānta pattau

original: MSS_1861-2 sphītāsṛkpānagoṣṭhīrasadaśivaśivātūṛyanṛtyatkabandhe saṃgrāmaikārṇavāntaḥpayasi vicarituṃ paṇḍitāḥ pāṇḍuputrāḥ //
analyzed: sphīta asṛj pāna goṣṭhī rasada śiva śivā tūṛya nṛtyat kabandhe saṃgrāma ekārṇava antar payasi vicaritum paṇḍitāḥ pāṇḍu putrāḥ

original: MSS_1862-1 anyonyāhatadantanādamukharaṃ prahvaṃ mukhaṃ kurvatā netre sāśrukaṇe nimīlya pulakavyāsaṅgi kaṇḍūyatā /
analyzed: anyonya āhata danta nāda mukharam prahvam mukham kurvatā netre sa aśru kaṇe nimīlya pulaka vyāsaṅgi kaṇḍūyatā

original: MSS_1862-2 hā hā heti suniṣṭhuraṃ vivadatā bāhū prasārya kṣaṇaṃ puṇyāgniḥ pathikena pīyata iva jvālāhataśmaśruṇā //
analyzed: hā hā hā iti su niṣṭhuram vivadatā bāhū prasārya kṣaṇam puṇya agniḥ pathikena pīyate iva jvālā hata śmaśruṇā

original: MSS_1863-1 anyonyeṣāṃ puṣkarairāmṛśanto dānodbhedānuccakairbhugnavālāḥ /
analyzed: anyonyeṣām puṣkaraiḥ āmṛśantaḥ dāna udbhedān uccakais bhugna vālāḥ

original: MSS_1863-2 unmūrdhānaḥ saṃnipatyāparāntaiḥ prāyudhyanta spaṣṭadantadhvanībhāḥ //
analyzed: unmūrdhānaḥ saṃnipatya aparāntaiḥ prāyudhyanta spaṣṭa danta dhvanībhāḥ

original: MSS_1864-1 anyopabhogakaluṣā mānavatī premagarvitā muditā /
analyzed: anya upabhoga kaluṣā mānavatī prema garvitā muditā

original: MSS_1864-2 saundaryagarvitā ca premaparādhīnamānasānūḍhā //
analyzed: saundarya garvitā ca prema para adhīna mānasa anūḍhā

original: MSS_1865-1 anyo'pi candanatarormahanīyamūrteḥ sekārthamutsahati tadguṇabaddhatṛṣṇaḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ api candana taroḥ mahanīya mūrteḥ seka artham utsahati tad guṇa baddha tṛṣṇaḥ

original: MSS_1865-2 śākhoṭakasya punarasya mahāśayoyam ambhoda eva śaraṇaṃ yadi nirguṇasya //
analyzed: śākhoṭakasya punar asya mahā āśayaḥ yam ambhodaḥ eva śaraṇam yadi nirguṇasya

original: MSS_1866-1 anyo hi nāśnāti kṛtaṃ hi karma sa eva kartā sukhaduḥkhabhāgī /
analyzed: anyaḥ hi na aśnāti kṛtam hi karma saḥ eva kartā sukha duḥkha bhāgī

original: MSS_1866-2 yattena kiṃciddhi kṛtaṃ hi karma tadaśnute nāsti kṛtasya nāśaḥ //
analyzed: yat tena kiṃcid hi kṛtam hi karma tat aśnute na asti kṛtasya nāśaḥ

original: MSS_1867-1 anvagrāhi mayā preyān niśi svopanayāditi /
analyzed: anvagrāhi mayā preyāt niśi sva upanayāt iti

original: MSS_1867-2 na vipralabhate tāvad ālīriyamalīkavāk //
analyzed: na vipralabhate tāvat ālīḥ iyam alīka vāc

original: MSS_1868-1 anvayāgatavidyānām anvayāgatasaṃpadām /
analyzed: anvaya āgata vidyānām anvaya āgata saṃpadām

original: MSS_1868-2 viduṣāṃ ca prabhūṇāṃ ca hṛdayaṃ nāvalipyate //
analyzed: viduṣām ca prabhūṇām ca hṛdayam na avalipyate

original: MSS_1869-1 anvarthavedī śūraśca kṣamāvānna ca karkaśaḥ /
analyzed: anvartha vedī śūraḥ ca kṣamāvān na ca karkaśaḥ

original: MSS_1869-2 kalyāṇamedhāstejasvī sa bhadraḥ parikīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: kalyāṇa medhāḥ tejasvī sa bhadraḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: MSS_1870-1 anviṣyadbhirayaṃ cirāt kathamapi prārthyeta yadyarthibhir nātha tvaṃ punararthinaḥ pratidinaṃ yatnāt samanviṣyasi /
analyzed: anviṣyadbhiḥ ayam cirāt katham api prārthyeta yadi arthibhiḥ nātha tvam punar arthinaḥ pratidinam yatnāt samanviṣyasi

original: MSS_1870-2 prāptau cintitamātrakaṃ dadadasau cintātiriktapradaṃ tvāmālokya vidīryate yadi na tadgrāvaiva cintāmaṇiḥ //
analyzed: prāptau cintita mātrakam dadat asau cintā atirikta pradam tvām ālokya vidīryate yadi na tad grāvā eva cintāmaṇiḥ

original: MSS_1871-1 anvīkṣaṇaṃ ca vidyānāṃ sadvarṇāśramarakṣaṇam /
analyzed: anvīkṣaṇam ca vidyānām sat varṇa āśrama rakṣaṇam

original: MSS_1871-2 grahaṇaṃ śastraśāstrāṇāṃ yuddhamārgopaśikṣaṇam //
analyzed: grahaṇam śastra śāstrāṇām yuddha mārga upaśikṣaṇam

original: MSS_1872-1 anvetaṃ vāyavo yānti pṛṣṭhe bhānurvayāṃsi ca /
analyzed: anu etam vāyavaḥ yānti pṛṣṭhe bhānuḥ vayāṃsi ca

original: MSS_1872-2 anuplavante meghāśca yasya tasya raṇe jayaḥ //
analyzed: anuplavante meghāḥ ca yasya tasya raṇe jayaḥ

original: MSS_1873-1 anveṣayati madāndha- dviradamadāmbusiktamavanitalam /
analyzed: anveṣayati mada andha dvirada mada ambu siktam avani talam

original: MSS_1873-2 pariṇatagarbhabharārtā siṃhavadhūḥ śallakīvipine //
analyzed: pariṇata garbha bhara ārtā siṃha vadhūḥ śallakī vipine

original: MSS_1874-1 apaḥ piban prapāpālīm anurakto vilokayan /
analyzed: apaḥ piban prapā pālīm anuraktaḥ vilokayan

original: MSS_1874-2 agastyaṃ cintayāmāsa caturaḥ sāpi sāgarān //
analyzed: agastyam cintayāmāsa caturaḥ sā api sāgarān

original: MSS_1875-1 apakartāhamasmīti hṛdi te mā sma bhūdbhayam /
analyzed: apakartā aham asmi iti hṛdi te mā sma bhūt bhayam

original: MSS_1875-2 vimukheṣu na me khaḍgaḥ prahartuṃ jātu vāñchati //
analyzed: vimukheṣu na me khaḍgaḥ prahartum jātu vāñchati

original: MSS_1876-1 apakāradaśāyāmapy upakurvanti sādhavaḥ /
analyzed: apakāra daśāyām api upakurvanti sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_1876-2 chindantamapi vṛkṣaḥ svac chāyayā kiṃ na rakṣati //
analyzed: chindantam api vṛkṣaḥ chāyayā kim na rakṣati

original: MSS_1877-1 apakāramasaṃprāpya tuṣyet sādhurasādhutaḥ /
analyzed: apakāram a saṃprāpya tuṣyet sādhuḥ a sādhutaḥ

original: MSS_1877-2 naiṣo'lābho bhujaṅgena veṣṭito yo na daśyate //
analyzed: naiṣaḥ lābhaḥ bhujaṅgena veṣṭitaḥ yaḥ na daśyate

original: MSS_1878-1 apakāriṇi kopaścet kope kopaḥ kathaṃ na jāyeta /
analyzed: apakāriṇi kopaḥ ced kope kopaḥ katham na jāyeta

original: MSS_1878-2 dharmārthakāmamokṣa- prāṇayaśohāriṇi krūre //
analyzed: prāṇa yaśaḥ hāriṇi krūre

original: MSS_1879-1 apakāriṇi cet kopaḥ kope kāpaḥ kathaṃ na te /
analyzed: apakāriṇi ced kopaḥ kope kāpaḥ katham na te

original: MSS_1879-2 dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ prasahya paripanthini //
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām prasahya paripanthini

original: MSS_1880-1 apakāriṇi visrambhaṃ yaḥ karoti narādhamaḥ /
analyzed: apakāriṇi visrambham yaḥ karoti nara adhamaḥ

original: MSS_1880-2 anātho durbalo yadvan na ciraṃ sa tu jīvati //
analyzed: anāthaḥ durbalaḥ yadvat na ciram sa tu jīvati

original: MSS_1881-1 apakāriṣu mā pāpaṃ cintaya tvaṃ kadācana /
analyzed: apakāriṣu mā pāpam cintaya tvam kadācana

original: MSS_1881-2 svayameva patiṣyanti kūlajātā iva drumāḥ //
analyzed: svayam eva patiṣyanti kūla jātāḥ iva drumāḥ

original: MSS_1882-1 apakuryāt samarthaṃ vā nopakuryādyadāpadi /
analyzed: apakuryāt samartham vā na upakuryāt yat āpadi

original: MSS_1882-2 ucchindyādeva tanmitraṃ viśvasyāṅkamupasthitam //
analyzed: ucchindyāt eva tat mitram viśvasya aṅkam upasthitam

original: MSS_1883-1 apakurvannapi prāyaḥ prāpnoti mahataḥ phalam /
analyzed: apakurvan api prāyas prāpnoti mahataḥ phalam

original: MSS_1883-2 aurvaṃ dahantamevāgniṃ saṃtarpayati sāgaraḥ //
analyzed: aurvam dahantam eva agnim saṃtarpayati sāgaraḥ

original: MSS_1884-1 apakṛtya balasthasya dūrastho'smīti nāśvaset /
analyzed: apakṛtya balasthasya dūra sthaḥ asmi iti na āśvaset

original: MSS_1884-2 śyenānucaritairhyete nipatanti pramādyataḥ //
analyzed: śyena anucaritaiḥ hi ete nipatanti pramādyataḥ

original: MSS_1885-1 apakṛtvā buddhimato dūrastho'smīti nāśvaset /
analyzed: apakṛtvā buddhimataḥ dūra sthaḥ asmi iti na āśvaset

original: MSS_1885-2 dīrghau buddhimato bāhū yābhyāṃ hiṃsati hiṃsitaḥ //
analyzed: dīrghau buddhimataḥ bāhū yābhyām hiṃsati hiṃsitaḥ

original: MSS_1886-1 apakrānte bālye taruṇimani cāgantumanasi prayāte mugdhatve caturimaṇi cāśleṣarasike /
analyzed: apakrānte bālye taruṇimani ca āgantu manasi prayāte mugdha tve caturimaṇi ca āśleṣa rasike

original: MSS_1886-2 na kenāpi spṛṣṭaṃ yadiha vayasā marma paramaṃ yadetat pañceṣorjayati vapurindīvaradṛśaḥ //
analyzed: na kena api spṛṣṭam yat iha vayasā marma paramam yat etat pañca iṣoḥ jayati vapuḥ indīvara dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_1887-1 apakvaṃ bhaṅgamāyāti atijīrṇaṃ tu karkaśam /
analyzed: apakvam bhaṅgam āyāti ati jīrṇam tu karkaśam

original: MSS_1887-2 jñātighṛṣṭaṃ tu sodvegaṃ kalaho bāndhavaiḥ saha //
analyzed: jñāti ghṛṣṭam tu sa udvegam kalahaḥ bāndhavaiḥ saha

original: MSS_1888-1 apakvamapi cūtasya phalaṃ dravati vegataḥ /
analyzed: apakvam api cūtasya phalam dravati vegataḥ

original: MSS_1888-2 guḍaśuṇṭīpralepena vidhṛtaṃ śaśvadātape //
analyzed: guḍa śuṇṭī pralepena vidhṛtam śaśvat ātape

original: MSS_1889-1 apakve tu ghaṭe nīraṃ cālanyāṃ sūkṣmapiṣṭakam /
MSS_1889-2 strīṇāṃ ca hṛdaye vārtā na tiṣṭhati kadāpi hi //
analyzed: strīṇām ca hṛdaye vārtā na tiṣṭhati kadāpi hi

original: MSS_1890-1 apagatamadarāgā yoṣidekā prabhāte kṛtanibiḍakucāgrā patyurāliṅganena /
analyzed: apagata mada rāgā yoṣit ekā prabhāte kṛta nibiḍa kuca agrā patyuḥ āliṅganena

original: MSS_1890-2 priyatamaparibhuktaṃ vīkṣamānā svadehaṃ vrajati śayanavāsād vāsamanyaddhasantī //
analyzed: priyatama paribhuktam vīkṣamānā sva deham vrajati śayana vāsāt vāsam anyat hasantī

original: MSS_1891-1 apagatarajovikārā ghanapaṭalākrāntatārakālokā /
analyzed: apagata rajaḥ vikārā ghana paṭala ākrānta tārakā lokā

original: MSS_1891-2 lambapayodharabhārā prāvṛḍiyaṃ vṛddhavaniteva //
analyzed: lamba payodhara bhārā prāvṛṣ iyam vṛddha vanitā iva

original: MSS_1892-1 apaṅkiladhiyaḥ śuddhāḥ sādhumānasavṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: a paṅkila dhiyaḥ śuddhāḥ sādhu mānasa vṛttayaḥ

original: MSS_1892-2 vamanti śrutijīvātuṃ dhvaniṃ navarasāspadam //
analyzed: vamanti śruti jīvātum dhvanim nava rasa āspadam

original: MSS_1893-1 apacikramiṣuḥ pūrvaṃ senāṃ svāṃ parisāntvayan /
analyzed: apacikramiṣuḥ pūrvam senām svām parisāntvayan

original: MSS_1893-2 vilaṅghayitvā satreṇa tataḥ svayamupakramet //
analyzed: vilaṅghayitvā satreṇa tatas svayam upakramet

original: MSS_1894-1 apaṭaḥ kapaṭī himahīnaruciḥ prathitaḥ paśuranyakalatrarataḥ /
analyzed: apaṭaḥ kapaṭī hima hīna ruciḥ prathitaḥ paśuḥ anya kalatra rataḥ

original: MSS_1894-2 tava rāya(?)vasantasamo na haro na harirnna harirnna harirnna hariḥ //
analyzed: tava rāya vasanta samaḥ na haraḥ na hariḥ na hariḥ na hariḥ

original: MSS_1895-1 apaṇḍitāste puruṣā matā me ye strīṣu ca śrīṣu ca viśvasanti /
analyzed: apaṇḍitāḥ te puruṣāḥ matāḥ me ye strīṣu ca śrīṣu ca viśvasanti

original: MSS_1895-2 śriyo hi kurvanti tathaiva nāryo bhujaṅgakanyāparisarpaṇāni //
analyzed: śriyaḥ hi kurvanti tathā eva nāryaḥ bhujaṅga kanyā parisarpaṇāni

original: MSS_1896-1 apaṇḍito vāpi suhṛt paṇḍito vāpyanātmavān /
analyzed: apaṇḍitaḥ vā api suhṛd paṇḍitaḥ vā api anātmavān

original: MSS_1896-2 mantramūlaṃ yato rājyam ato mantraṃ surakṣitam //
analyzed: mantra mūlam yatas rājyam atas mantram su rakṣitam

original: MSS_1897-1 apatuṣāratayā viśadaprabhaiḥ suratasaṅgapariśramanodibhiḥ /
analyzed: apatuṣāra tayā viśada prabhaiḥ surata saṅga pariśrama nodibhiḥ

original: MSS_1897-2 kusumacāpamatejayadaṃśubhir himakaro makarorjitaketanam //
analyzed: kusuma cāpam atejayat aṃśubhiḥ himakaraḥ makara ūrjita ketanam

original: MSS_1898-1 apatyaṃ dharmakāryāṇi śuśrūṣā ratiruttamā /
analyzed: apatyam dharma kāryāṇi śuśrūṣā ratiḥ uttamā

original: MSS_1898-2 dārādhīnastathā svargaḥ pitṛṇāmātmanaśca ha //
analyzed: dāra adhīnaḥ tathā svargaḥ pitṛṇām ātmanaḥ ca ha

original: MSS_1899-1 apatyadarśanasyārthe prāṇānapi ca yā tyajet /
analyzed: apatya darśanasya arthe prāṇān api ca yā tyajet

original: MSS_1899-2 tyajanti tāmapi krūrā mātaraṃ dārahetave //
analyzed: tyajanti tām api krūrāḥ mātaram dāra hetave

original: MSS_1900-1 apatyāni prāyo daśa daśa varāhī janayati kṣamābhāre dhuryaḥ sa punariha nāsīnna bhavitā /
analyzed: apatyāni prāyas daśa daśa varāhī janayati kṣamā bhāre dhuryaḥ sa punar iha na āsīt na bhavitā

original: MSS_1900-2 padaṃ kṛtvā yaḥ svaṃ phaṇipatiphaṇācakravalaye nimajjantīmantarjaladhi vasudhāmuttulayati //
analyzed: padam kṛtvā yaḥ svam phaṇipati phaṇā cakra valaye nimajjantīm antar jaladhi vasudhām uttulayati

original: MSS_1901-1 apatye yat tādṛgduritamabhavat tena mahatā viṣaktastīvreṇa vraṇitahṛdayena vyathayatā /
analyzed: apatye yat tādṛś duritam abhavat tena mahatā viṣaktaḥ tīvreṇa vraṇita hṛdayena vyathayatā

original: MSS_1901-2 paṭurdhārāvāhī nava iva cireṇāpi hi na me nikṛntanmarmāṇi krakaca iva manyurviramati //
analyzed: paṭuḥ dhārā vāhī navaḥ iva cireṇa api hi na me nikṛntat marmāṇi krakacaḥ iva manyuḥ viramati

original: MSS_1902-1 apathena pravavṛte na jātūpacito'pi saḥ /
analyzed: apathena pravavṛte na jātu upacitaḥ upi saḥ

original: MSS_1902-2 vṛddhau nadīmukhenaiva prasthānaṃ lavaṇāmbhasaḥ //
analyzed: vṛddhau nadī mukhena eva prasthānam lavaṇāmbhasaḥ

original: MSS_1903-1 apathenaiva yo yogād adhaḥ sārāyate svayam /
analyzed: apathena eva yaḥ yogāt adhas sārāyate svayam

original: MSS_1903-2 nīcopasarpaṇavaśāt sa pated vaṃśavānapi //
analyzed: nīca upasarpaṇa vaśāt sa patet vaṃśavān api

original: MSS_1904-1 apathyabhogeṣu yathāturāṇāṃ spṛhā yathārtheṣvatidurgatānām /
analyzed: apathya bhogeṣu yathā āturāṇām spṛhā yathā artheṣu ati durgatānām

original: MSS_1904-2 paropatāpeṣu yathā khalānāṃ strīṇāṃ tathā cauryaratotsaveṣu //
analyzed: para upatāpeṣu yathā khalānām strīṇām tathā caurya rata utsaveṣu

original: MSS_1905-1 apathyamāyatau lobhād āmanantyanujīvinaḥ /
analyzed: apathyam āyatau lobhāt āmananti anujīvinaḥ

original: MSS_1905-2 priyaṃ śrṇoti yastebhyas tamṛcchanti na saṃpadaḥ //
analyzed: priyam śrṇoti yaḥ tebhyaḥ tam ṛcchanti na saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_1906-1 apathyasya ca bhuktasya dantasya calitasya ca /
analyzed: apathyasya ca bhuktasya dantasya calitasya ca

original: MSS_1906-2 amātyasya ca duṣṭasya samūloddharaṇaṃ sukham //
analyzed: amātyasya ca duṣṭasya sa mūla uddharaṇam sukham

original: MSS_1907-1 apadāntaraṃ ca paritaḥ kṣitikṣitām apatan drutabhramitahemanemayaḥ /
analyzed: a pada antaram ca paritas kṣitikṣitām apatan druta bhramita hema nemayaḥ

original: MSS_1907-2 javimārutāñcitaparasparopama- kṣitireṇuketuvasanāḥ patākinaḥ //
analyzed: javi māruta āñcita paraspara upama kṣiti reṇu ketu vasanāḥ patākinaḥ

original: MSS_1908-1 apado dūragāmo ca sākṣaro na ca paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: a padaḥ ca sa akṣaraḥ na ca paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_1908-2 amukhaḥ sphuṭavaktā ca yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: amukhaḥ sphuṭa vaktā ca yaḥ jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_1909-1 apadhvasto hyavamato duḥkhaṃ jīvati jīvitam /
analyzed: apadhvastaḥ hi avamataḥ duḥkham jīvati jīvitam

original: MSS_1909-2 jīvitaṃ yadavakṣiptaṃ yathaiva maraṇaṃ tathā //
analyzed: jīvitam yat avakṣiptam yathā eva maraṇam tathā

original: MSS_1910-1 apanaya mahāmohaṃ rājannanena tavāsinā kathaya kuhakakrīḍāścaryaṃ kathaṃ kva ca śikṣitam /
analyzed: apanaya mahā moham rājan anena tava asinā kathaya kuhaka krīḍā āścaryam katham kva ca śikṣitam

original: MSS_1910-2 yadarirudhiraṃ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ kusumbharasāruṇaṃ jhagiti vamati kṣīrāmbhodhipravāhasitaṃ yaśaḥ //
analyzed: yat ari rudhiram pāyam pāyam kusumbha rasa aruṇam vamati kṣīra ambhodhi pravāha sitam yaśaḥ

original: MSS_1911-1 apanidramadhūkapāṇḍurā sudṛśo'dṛśyata gaṇḍamaṇḍalī /
analyzed: apanidra madhūka pāṇḍurā su dṛśā udṛśyata gaṇḍa maṇḍalī

original: MSS_1911-2 gamitāśrujalaplavairiva kraśimākīrṇatayāpi nimnatām //
analyzed: gamita aśru jala plavaiḥ iva kraśim ākīrṇa tayā api nimna tām

original: MSS_1912-1 apanītaṃ sunītena yo'rthaṃ pratyāninīṣate /
analyzed: apanītam su nītena yaḥ ṛtham pratyāninīṣate

original: MSS_1912-2 matimāsthāya sudṛḍhāṃ tadakāpuruṣavratam //
analyzed: matim āsthāya su dṛḍhām tat a kāpuruṣa vratam

original: MSS_1913-1 apanītaparimalāntara- kathe padaṃ nyasya devatarukusume /
analyzed: apanīta parimala antara kathe padam nyasya deva taru kusume

original: MSS_1913-2 puṣpāntare'pi gantuṃ vāñchasi ced bhramara dhanyo'si //
analyzed: puṣpa antare api gantum vāñchasi ced bhramara dhanyaḥ asi

original: MSS_1914-1 apaneyamudetumicchatā timiraṃ roṣamayaṃ dhiyā puraḥ /
analyzed: apaneyam udetum icchatā timiram roṣa mayam dhiyā puras

original: MSS_1914-2 avibhidya niśākṛtaṃ tamaḥ prabhayā nāṃśumatāpyudīyate //
analyzed: a vibhidya niśākṛtam tamaḥ prabhayā na aṃśumatā api udīyate

original: MSS_1915-1 apamānaṃ puraskṛtya mānaṃ kṛtvā tu pṛṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: apamānam puraskṛtya mānam kṛtvā tu pṛṣṭhatas

original: MSS_1915-2 svārthamabhyuddharet prājñaḥ kāryadhvaṃso hi mūrkhatā //
analyzed: sva artham abhyuddharet prājñaḥ kārya dhvaṃsaḥ hi mūrkha tā

original: MSS_1916-1 apamānaḥ pativihito guruparikaratīvratā gṛhe dauḥsthyam /
analyzed: apamānaḥ pati vihitaḥ guru parikara tīvra tā gṛhe dauḥsthyam

original: MSS_1916-2 śīlakṣataye yāsāṃ tāsāmatirāgato'nyanararaktiḥ //
analyzed: śīla kṣataye yāsām tāsām ati rāgataḥ nya nara raktiḥ

original: MSS_1917-1 apamānāt tapovṛddhiḥ saṃmānācca tapaḥkṣayaḥ /
analyzed: apamānāt tapaḥ vṛddhiḥ saṃmānāt ca tapaḥ kṣayaḥ

original: MSS_1917-2 arcitaḥ pūjito vipro dugdhā gauriva gacchati //
analyzed: arcitaḥ pūjitaḥ vipraḥ dugdhā gauḥ iva gacchati

original: MSS_1918-1 apamānāt tu saṃbhūtaṃ mānena praśamaṃ nayet /
analyzed: apamānāt tu saṃbhūtam mānena praśamam nayet

original: MSS_1918-2 sāmapūrva upāyo vā praṇāmo vābhimānaje //
analyzed: sāma pūrvaḥ upāyaḥ vā praṇāmaḥ vā abhimāna je

original: MSS_1919-1 apamānito'pi kulajo na vadati puruṣaṃ svabhāvadākṣiṇyāt /
analyzed: apamānitaḥ upi kula jaḥ na vadati puruṣam svabhāva dākṣiṇyāt

original: MSS_1919-2 nahi malayacandanataruḥ paraśuprahataḥ sravet pūyam //
analyzed: nahi malaya candana taruḥ paraśu prahataḥ sravet pūyam

original: MSS_1920-1 apameghodayaṃ varṣam adṛṣṭakusumaṃ phalam /
analyzed: apamegha udayam varṣam adṛṣṭa kusumam phalam

original: MSS_1920-2 atarkitopapannaṃ vo darśanaṃ pratibhāti me //
analyzed: atarkita upapannam vaḥ darśanam pratibhāti me

original: MSS_1921-1 apayāti saroṣayā niraste kṛtakaṃ kāmini cukṣuve mṛgākṣyā /
analyzed: apayāti sa roṣayā niraste kṛtakam kāmini cukṣuve mṛga akṣyā

original: MSS_1921-2 kalayannapi savyatho'vatasthe- 'śakunena skhalitaḥ kiletaro'pi //
analyzed: kalayan api sa vyathāḥ uvatasthe śakunena skhalitaḥ kila itaraḥ api

original: MSS_1922-1 apayāntīnāmadhunā saṃketaniketanānmṛgākṣīṇām /
analyzed: apayāntīnām adhunā saṃketa niketanāt mṛgākṣīṇām

original: MSS_1922-2 vāsasa eva na kevalam abhavanmanaso'pi parivartaḥ //
analyzed: vāsasaḥ eva na kevalam abhavat manasaḥ api parivartaḥ

original: MSS_1923-1 apayāyini svato'rthe kathamiva sauhārdadhīḥ kadaryāṇām /
analyzed: apayāyini sva torthe katham iva sauhārda dhīḥ kadaryāṇām

original: MSS_1923-2 yasyāpayānasamaye prāṇatyāgo'pi hā sukaraḥ //
analyzed: yasya apayāna samaye prāṇatyāgaḥ upi hā sukaraḥ

original: MSS_1924-1 aparajaladherlakṣmīṃ yasmin purīṃ purabhitprabhe madagajaghaṭākārairnāvāṃ śatairavamṛdnati /
analyzed: apara jaladheḥ lakṣmīm yasmin purīm pura bhid prabhe mada gaja ghaṭa ākāraiḥ nāvām śataiḥ avamṛdnati

original: MSS_1924-2 jaladapaṭalānīkākīrṇaṃ navotpalamecakaṃ jalanidhiriva vyoma vyomnaḥ samo'bhavadambudhiḥ //
analyzed: jalada paṭala anīka ākīrṇam nava utpala mecakam jalanidhiḥ iva vyoma vyomnaḥ samobhavat ambudhiḥ

original: MSS_1925-1 aparatarunikaramuktaṃ marumaṇḍalamāvasatyasāvekaḥ /
analyzed: apara taru nikara muktam maru maṇḍalam āvasati asau ekaḥ

original: MSS_1925-2 phalakusumairupakurvann arare karīra kathaṃ dhīraḥ //
analyzed: phala kusumaiḥ upakurvan arare karīra katham dhīraḥ

original: MSS_1926-1 aparāgasamīraṇeritaḥ kramaśīrṇākulamūlasaṃtatiḥ /
MSS_1926-2 sukarastaruvat sahiṣṇunā ripurunmūlayituṃ mahānapi //
analyzed: sukaraḥ taru vat sahiṣṇunā ripuḥ unmūlayitum mahān api

original: MSS_1927-1 aparāddhaṃ bhavadvāṇīśrāviṇā pṛccha kiṃ mayā /
analyzed: aparāddham bhavat vāṇī śrāviṇā pṛccha kim mayā

original: MSS_1927-2 vīṇāha paruṣaṃ yanmāṃ kalakaṇṭhī ca niṣṭhuram //
analyzed: vīṇā āha paruṣam yat mām kalakaṇṭhī ca niṣṭhuram

original: MSS_1928-1 aparāddhāṃstu susnigdhān snohoktyā mānadānataḥ /
analyzed: aparāddhān tu su snigdhān snoha uktyā māna dānataḥ

original: MSS_1928-2 sādhayed bhedadaṇḍābhyāṃ yathāyogena cāparān //
analyzed: sādhayet bheda daṇḍābhyām yathāyogena ca aparān

original: MSS_1929-1 aparādhaṃ na śṛṇumo na cāsatyaṃ tvayoditam /
analyzed: aparādham na śṛṇumaḥ na ca asatyam tvayā uditam

original: MSS_1929-2 gopyeti gaditaḥ kṛṣṇas tūṣṇīṃ tiṣṭhan punātu vaḥ //
analyzed: gopyā iti gaditaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tūṣṇīm tiṣṭhan punātu vaḥ

original: MSS_1930-1 aparādhaḥ sa daivasya na punarmantriṇāmayam /
analyzed: aparādhaḥ sa daivasya na punar mantriṇām ayam

original: MSS_1930-2 kāryaṃ sughaṭitaṃ yatnād daivayogād vinaśyati //
analyzed: kāryam su ghaṭitam yatnāt daiva yogāt vinaśyati

original: MSS_1931-1 aparādhasahasrabhājanaṃ patitaṃ bhīmabhavārṇavodare /
analyzed: aparādha sahasra bhājanam patitam bhīma bhava arṇava udare

original: MSS_1931-2 agatiṃ śaraṇāgataṃ hare kṛpayā kevalamātmasātkuru //
analyzed: agatim śaraṇa āgatam hare kṛpayā kevalam ātmasāt kuru

original: MSS_1932-1 aparādhānurūpaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ pāpeṣu pātayet /
analyzed: aparādha anurūpam ca daṇḍam pāpeṣu pātayet

original: MSS_1932-2 udvejayeddhanairṛddhān daridrān vadhabandhanaiḥ //
analyzed: udvejayet dhanaiḥ ṛddhān daridrān vadha bandhanaiḥ

original: MSS_1933-1 aparādhini mayi daṇḍaṃ saṃharasi kimudyataṃ kuṭilakeśi /
analyzed: aparādhini mayi daṇḍam saṃharasi kim udyatam kuṭila keśi

original: MSS_1933-2 vardhayasi vilasitaṃ tvaṃ dāsajanāyātra kupyasi ca //
analyzed: vardhayasi vilasitam tvam dāsa janāya atra kupyasi ca

original: MSS_1934-1 aparādhī nāmāhaṃ prasīda rambhoru virama saṃrambhāt /
analyzed: aparādhī nāma aham prasīda rambhā ūru virama saṃrambhāt

original: MSS_1934-2 sevyo janaśca kupitaḥ kathaṃ nu dāso niraparādhaḥ //
analyzed: sevyaḥ janaḥ ca kupitaḥ katham nu dāsaḥ niraparādhaḥ

original: MSS_1935-1 aparādhīnāśokaḥ sahate caraṇāhatiṃ sarojadṛśām /
analyzed: apara adhīna aśokaḥ sahate caraṇa āhatim saroja dṛśām

original: MSS_1935-2 vilasitabakulo vanitā- mukhavāsī madyapāta iva //
analyzed: vilasita bakulaḥ vanitā mukha vāsī madya pātaḥ iva

original: MSS_1936-1 aparādhe'pi niḥśaṅko niyogī cirasevakaḥ /
analyzed: aparādhe pi niḥśaṅkaḥ niyogī cira sevakaḥ

original: MSS_1936-2 sa svāminamavajñāya carecca niravagrahaḥ //
analyzed: sa svāminam avajñāya caret ca niravagrahaḥ

original: MSS_1937-1 aparādho na me'stīti naitad viśvāsakāraṇam /
analyzed: aparādhaḥ na mā isti iti na etat viśvāsa kāraṇam

original: MSS_1937-2 vidyate hi nṛśaṃsebhyo bhayaṃ guṇavatāmapi //
analyzed: vidyate hi nṛśaṃsebhyaḥ bhayam guṇavatām api

original: MSS_1938-1 aparādho mayā kānte kṛto yadi tvayā mataḥ /
analyzed: aparādhaḥ mayā kānte kṛtaḥ yadi tvayā mataḥ

original: MSS_1938-2 nipātya giriśṛṅgoccau kucau kiṃ na nipīḍyate //
analyzed: nipātya giri śṛṅga uccau kucau kim na nipīḍyate

original: MSS_1939-1 aparāhṇaśītalatareṇa śanair anilena lolitalatāṅgulaye /
analyzed: aparāhṇa śītalatareṇa śanais anilena lolita latā aṅgulaye

original: MSS_1939-2 nilayāya śākhina ivāhvayate dadurākulāḥ khagakulāni giraḥ //
analyzed: nilayāya śākhinaḥ iva āhvayate daduḥ ākulāḥ khaga kulāni giraḥ

original: MSS_1939A-1 aparityaktamātmānam icchatā paṇyayoṣitām /
analyzed: a parityaktam ātmānam icchatā paṇya yoṣitām

original: MSS_1939A-2 nityaupayogikaṃ dravyam ātmasāraṃ pradarśayet //
analyzed: nitya aupayogikam dravyam ātma sāram pradarśayet

original: MSS_1940-1 aparīkṣitaparavañcanam añcati lobhādapekṣitaprekṣī /
analyzed: a parīkṣita para vañcanam añcati lobhāt apekṣita prekṣī

original: MSS_1940-2 vyādhūtapakṣamavaśo vihanyate pakṣivat kṣitipaḥ //
analyzed: vyādhūta pakṣam avaśaḥ vihanyate pakṣi vat kṣitipaḥ

original: MSS_1941-1 aparīkṣitalakṣaṇapramāṇair aparāmṛṣṭapadārthasārthatattvaiḥ /
analyzed: aparīkṣita lakṣaṇa pramāṇaiḥ aparāmṛṣṭa padārtha sārtha tattvaiḥ

original: MSS_1941-2 avaśīkṛtajaitrayuktijālair alametairanadhītatarkavidyaiḥ //
analyzed: a vaśīkṛta jaitra yukti jālaiḥ alam etaiḥ anadhīta tarka vidyaiḥ

original: MSS_1942-1 aparīkṣya na kartavyaṃ kartavyaṃ suparīkṣitam /
analyzed: a parīkṣya na kartavyam kartavyam su parīkṣitam

original: MSS_1942-2 paścādbhavati saṃtāpo brāhmaṇī nakulaṃ yathā //
analyzed: paścāt bhavati saṃtāpaḥ brāhmaṇī nakulam yathā

original: MSS_1943-1 aparokṣadhano gamyaḥ śrīmānapi nānyatheti nirdiṣṭam /
analyzed: a parokṣa dhanaḥ gamyaḥ śrīmān api na anyathā iti nirdiṣṭam

original: MSS_1943-2 kandarpaśāstrakāraiḥ kutaḥ kathā luptavibhavasya //
analyzed: kandarpa śāstra kāraiḥ kutas kathā lupta vibhavasya

original: MSS_1944-1 aparṇeyaṃ bhūbhṛdvanamaṭati valkāmbaradharā jaṭālo digvāsāḥ śikhariṇi śivo'yaṃ nivasati /
analyzed: aparṇā iyam bhūbhṛt vanam aṭati valka ambara dharā jaṭālaḥ digvāsāḥ śikhariṇi śivaḥ yam nivasati

original: MSS_1944-2 iti bhrāntyānyo'nyaṃ kṣaṇamilitayoḥ kṣoṇitilaka dviṣaddampatyoste śiva śiva bhavanti praṇatayaḥ //
analyzed: iti bhrāntyā anyonyam kṣaṇa militayoḥ kṣoṇi tilaka dviṣat dampatyoḥ te śiva śiva bhavanti praṇatayaḥ

original: MSS_1945-1 aparṇaiva latā sevyā vidvadbhiriti me matiḥ /
analyzed: aparṇā eva latā sevyā vidvadbhiḥ iti me matiḥ

original: MSS_1945-2 yayā vṛtaḥ purāṇo'pi sthāṇuḥ sūte'mṛtaṃ phalam //
analyzed: yayā vṛtaḥ purāṇaḥ api sthāṇuḥ sūta imṛtam phalam

original: MSS_1946-1 aparyantasya kālasya kiyānaṃśaḥ śaracchatam /
analyzed: aparyantasya kālasya kiyān aṃśaḥ śarad śatam

original: MSS_1946-2 tanmātraparamāyuryaḥ sa kathaṃ svaptumarhati //
analyzed: tad mātra parama āyuḥ yaḥ sa katham svaptum arhati

original: MSS_1947-1 aparyāptabhujāyāmaḥ sakhedo'syāḥ sakhījanaḥ /
analyzed: a paryāpta bhuja āyāmaḥ sakheda usyāḥ sakhī janaḥ

original: MSS_1947-2 śroṇyāṃ kathaṃcit kurute raśanādāmabandhanam //
analyzed: śroṇyām kathaṃcid kurute raśanā dāma bandhanam

original: MSS_1948-1 apavarjitaviplave śucau hṛdayagrāhiṇi maṅgalāspade /
analyzed: apavarjita viplave śucau hṛdaya grāhiṇi maṅgala āspade

original: MSS_1948-2 vimalā tava vistare girāṃ matirādarśa ivābhidṛśyate //
analyzed: vimalā tava vistare girām matiḥ ādarśe iva abhidṛśyate

original: MSS_1949-1 apavādādabhītasya samasya guṇadoṣayoḥ /
analyzed: apavādāt abhītasya samasya guṇa doṣayoḥ

original: MSS_1949-2 asadvṛtteraho vṛttaṃ durvibhāvaṃ vidheriva //
analyzed: asat vṛtteḥ aho vṛttam durvibhāvam vidheḥ iva

original: MSS_1950-1 apavādo bhaved yena yena vipratyayo bhavet /
analyzed: apavādaḥ bhavet yena yena vipratyayaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_1950-2 narake gamyate yena tad budhaḥ kathamācaret //
analyzed: narake gamyate yena tat budhaḥ katham ācaret

original: MSS_1951-1 apaśaṅkamaṅkaparivartanocitāś calitāḥ puraḥ patimupaitumātmajāḥ /
analyzed: apaśaṅkam aṅka parivartana ucitāḥ calitāḥ puras patim upaitum ātmajāḥ

original: MSS_1951-2 anuroditīva karuṇena patriṇāṃ virutena vatsalatayaiṣa nimnagāḥ //
analyzed: anuroditi iva karuṇena patriṇām virutena vatsala tayā eṣa nimnagāḥ

original: MSS_1952-1 apaśāstradhano rājā saṃcayaṃ nādhigacchati /
analyzed: apaśāstra dhanaḥ rājā saṃcayam na adhigacchati

original: MSS_1952-2 asthāne cāsya tadvittaṃ sarvameva vinaśyati //
analyzed: asthāne ca asya tat vittam sarvam eva vinaśyati

original: MSS_1953-1 apaśūlaṃ tamāsādya lavaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇānujaḥ /
analyzed: apaśūlam tam āsādya lavaṇam lakṣmaṇa anujaḥ

original: MSS_1953-2 rurodha saṃmukhīno hi jayo randhraprahāriṇām //
analyzed: rurodha saṃmukhīnaḥ hi jayaḥ randhra prahāriṇām

original: MSS_1954-1 apaśokamanāḥ kuṭumbinīm anugṛhṇīṣva nivāpadattibhiḥ /
analyzed: apaśoka manāḥ kuṭumbinīm anugṛhṇīṣva nivāpa dattibhiḥ

original: MSS_1954-2 svajanāśru kilātisaṃtataṃ dahati pretamiti pracakṣate //
analyzed: sva jana aśru kila ati saṃtatam dahati pretam iti pracakṣate

original: MSS_1955-1 apaścāttāpakṛt samyag anubandhiphalapradaḥ /
MSS_1955-2 adīrghakālo'bhīṣṭaśca praśasto mantra ucyate //
analyzed: a dīrgha kāla ubhīṣṭaḥ ca praśastaḥ mantraḥ ucyate

original: MSS_1956-1 apaśyadbhiriveśānaṃ raṇānnivavṛte gaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: a paśyadbhiḥ iva īśānam raṇāt nivavṛte gaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_1956-2 muhyatyeva hi kṛcchreṣu saṃbhramajvalitaṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: muhyati eva hi kṛcchreṣu saṃbhrama jvalitam manaḥ

original: MSS_1957-1 apaśyadbhirmahāsvādān bhāvān svādvavivekibhiḥ /
analyzed: a paśyadbhiḥ mahā āsvādān bhāvān svādu a vivekibhiḥ

original: MSS_1957-2 kiṃ jñeyamaśanādanyat kṣmāpairandhairivokṣabhiḥ //
analyzed: kim jñeyam aśanāt anyat kṣmāpaiḥ andhaiḥ iva ukṣabhiḥ

original: MSS_1958-1 apasaraṇameva yuktaṃ maunaṃ vā tatra rājahaṃsasya /
analyzed: apasaraṇam eva yuktam maunam vā tatra rājahaṃsasya

original: MSS_1958-2 kaṭu raṭati nikaṭavartī vācāṭaṣṭiṭṭibho yatra //
analyzed: kaṭu raṭati nikaṭa vartī vācāṭa ṭiṭṭibhaḥ yatra

original: MSS_1959-1 apasarati na cakṣuṣo mṛgākṣī rajaniriyaṃ ca na yāti naiti nidrā /
analyzed: apasarati na cakṣuṣaḥ mṛga akṣī rajaniḥ iyam ca na yāti nā eti nidrā

original: MSS_1959-2 praharati madano'pi duḥkhitānāṃ bata bahuśo'bhimukhībhavantyapāyāḥ //
analyzed: praharati madanaḥ upi duḥkhitānām bata bahuśas bhimukhībhavanti apāyāḥ

original: MSS_1960-1 apasara pṛthivi samudrāḥ saṃvṛṇutāmbūni bhūdharā namata /
analyzed: apasara pṛthivi samudrāḥ saṃvṛṇuta ambūni bhūdharāḥ namata

original: MSS_1960-2 vāmanaharilaghutunde jagatāṃ kalahaḥ sa vaḥ pāyāt //
analyzed: vāmana hari laghu tunde jagatām kalahaḥ sa vaḥ pāyāt

original: MSS_1961-1 apasara madhukara dūraṃ parimalabahule'pi ketakīkusume /
analyzed: apasara madhukara dūram parimala bahule ipi ketakī kusume

original: MSS_1961-2 iha nahi madhulavalābho bhavati paraṃ dhūlidhūsaraṃ vadanam //
analyzed: iha nahi madhu lava lābhaḥ bhavati param dhūli dhūsaram vadanam

original: MSS_1962-1 apasara sakhe dūrādasmāt kaṭākṣaviṣānalāt prakṛtiviṣamād yoṣitsarpād vilāsaphaṇābhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: apasara sakhe dūrāt asmāt kaṭākṣa viṣa analāt prakṛti viṣamāt yoṣit sarpāt vilāsa phaṇā bhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_1962-2 itaraphaṇinā daṣṭaḥ śakyaścikitsitumauṣadhaiś caṭulavanitābhogigrastaṃ tyajanti hi mantriṇaḥ //
analyzed: itara phaṇinā daṣṭaḥ śakyaḥ cikitsitum auṣadhaiḥ caṭula vanitā bhogi grastam tyajanti hi mantriṇaḥ

original: MSS_1963-1 apasāraya ghanasāraṃ kuru hāraṃ dūra eva kiṃ kamalaiḥ /
analyzed: apasāraya ghanasāram kuru hāram dūre eva kim kamalaiḥ

original: MSS_1963-2 alamalamāli mṛṇālair iti vadati divāniśaṃ bālā //
analyzed: alam alam āli mṛṇālaiḥ iti vadati divāniśam bālā

original: MSS_1964-1 apasārasamāyuktaṃ nayajñairdurgamucyate /
analyzed: apasāra samāyuktam naya jñaiḥ durgam ucyate

original: MSS_1964-2 apasāraparityaktaṃ durgavyājena bandhanam //
analyzed: apasāra parityaktam durga vyājena bandhanam

original: MSS_1965-1 apastaranti pāṣāṇā hyanughnanti hi rākṣasān /
analyzed: apastaranti pāṣāṇāḥ hi anughnanti hi rākṣasān

original: MSS_1965-2 kapayaḥ karma kurvanti kālasya kuṭilā gatiḥ //
analyzed: kapayaḥ karma kurvanti kālasya kuṭilā gatiḥ

original: MSS_1966-1 apahatya tamastīvraṃ yathā bhātyudare raviḥ /
analyzed: apahatya tamaḥ tīvram yathā bhāti udare raviḥ

original: MSS_1966-2 tathāpahatya pāpmānaṃ bhāti gaṅgājalokṣitaḥ //
analyzed: tathā apahatya pāpmānam bhāti gaṅgā jala ukṣitaḥ

original: MSS_1967-1 apaharati mano me ko'pyayaṃ kṛṣṇacauraḥ praṇataduritacauraḥ pūtanāprāṇacauraḥ /
analyzed: apaharati manaḥ me kaḥ api ayam kṛṣṇa cauraḥ praṇata durita cauraḥ pūtanā prāṇa cauraḥ

original: MSS_1967-2 valayavasanacauro bālagopījanānāṃ nayanahṛdayacauraḥ paśyatāṃ sajjanānām //
analyzed: valaya vasana cauraḥ bāla gopī janānām nayana hṛdaya cauraḥ paśyatām sat janānām

original: MSS_1968-1 apaharati mahattvaṃ prārthanā kiṃ na jāne janayati gurulajjāmityahaṃ kiṃ na vedmi /
analyzed: apaharati mahat tvam prārthanā kim na jāne janayati guru lajjām iti aham kim na vedmi

original: MSS_1968-2 tadapi vada vadānyaṃ taṃ sadā pratyahaṃ māṃ jaṭharapiṭharavartī vahnirarthīkaroti //
analyzed: tat api vada vadānyam tam sadā pratyaham mām jaṭhara piṭhara vartī vahniḥ arthīkaroti

original: MSS_1969-1 apaharasi sadā manāṃsi puṃsām atimahatā guṇasaṃparigraheṇa /
analyzed: apaharasi sadā manāṃsi puṃsām ati mahatā guṇa saṃparigraheṇa

original: MSS_1969-2 na ca bhavasi tathāpyanekacitto hṛtamathavā vivṛṇoti kaḥ parasvam //
analyzed: na ca bhavasi tathā api aneka cittaḥ hṛtam athavā vivṛṇoti kaḥ para svam

original: MSS_1970-1 apahastitabāndhave tvayā vihitaṃ sāhasamasya tṛṣṇayā /
analyzed: apahastita bāndhave tvayā vihitam sāhasam asya tṛṣṇayā

original: MSS_1970-2 tadihānaparādhini priye sakhi ko'yaṃ karuṇojjhitakramaḥ //
analyzed: tat iha anaparādhini priye sakhi kaḥ yam karuṇā ujjhita kramaḥ

original: MSS_1971-1 apahāya śanaiḥ paṭīravāṭīr iha lāṭījanamānaluṇṭhanāya /
analyzed: apahāya śanais paṭīra vāṭīḥ iha lāṭī jana māna luṇṭhanāya

original: MSS_1971-2 samudeti manojarājadhāṭī- paripāṭīpaṭureṣa gandhavāhaḥ //
analyzed: samudeti manoja rāja dhāṭī paripāṭī paṭuḥ eṣa gandhavāhaḥ

original: MSS_1972-1 apahṛtya parasyārthaṃ tena dharmaṃ karoti yaḥ /
analyzed: apahṛtya parasya artham tena dharmam karoti yaḥ

original: MSS_1972-2 sa dātā narakaṃ yāti yasyārthastasya tatphalam //
analyzed: sa dātā narakam yāti yasya arthaḥ tasya tat phalam

original: MSS_1973-1 apahnuvānasya janāya yannijām adhīratāmasya kṛtaṃ manobhuvā /
analyzed: apahnuvānasya janāya yat nijām adhīra tām asya kṛtam manobhuvā

original: MSS_1973-2 abodhi tajjāgaraduḥkhasākṣiṇī niśā ca śayyā ca śaśāṅkakomalā //
analyzed: abodhi tad jāgara duḥkha sākṣiṇī niśā ca śayyā ca śaśāṅka komalā

original: MSS_1974-1 apāṃ nidhiṃ vāribhirarcayanti dīpena sūryaṃ pratibodhayanti /
analyzed: apām nidhim vāribhiḥ arcayanti dīpena sūryam pratibodhayanti

original: MSS_1974-2 tābhyāṃ tayoḥ kiṃ paripūrṇatā syād bhaktyā hi tuṣyanti mahānubhāvāḥ //
analyzed: tābhyām tayoḥ kim paripūrṇa tā syāt bhaktyā hi tuṣyanti mahā anubhāvāḥ

original: MSS_1975-1 apāṃ pravāho gāṅgo'pi samudraṃ prāpya tadrasaḥ /
analyzed: apām pravāhaḥ samudram prāpya tad rasaḥ

original: MSS_1975-2 bhavatyavaśyaṃ tad vidvān nāśrayedaśubhātmakam //
analyzed: bhavati avaśyam tat vidvān na āśrayet aśubha ātmakam

original: MSS_1976-1 apāṃ mūle līnaṃ kṣaṇaparicitaṃ candanarase muṇālīhārādau kṛtalaghupadaṃ candramasi ca /
analyzed: apām mūle līnam kṣaṇa paricitam candana rase muṇālī hāra ādau kṛta laghu padam candramasi ca

original: MSS_1976-2 muhūrtaṃ viśrāntaṃ sarasakadalīkānanatale priyākaṇṭhāśleṣe nivasati paraṃ śaityamadhunā //
analyzed: muhūrtam viśrāntam sarasa kadala kānana tale priyā kaṇṭha āśleṣe nivasati param śaityam adhunā

original: MSS_1977-1 apāṃ vihāre tava hāravibhramaṃ karotu nīre pṛṣadutkarastaran /
analyzed: apām vihāre tava hāra vibhramam karotu nīre pṛṣadutkaraḥ taran

original: MSS_1977-2 kaṭhorapīnoccakucadvayītaṭa- truṭattaraḥ sāravasāravormijaḥ //
MSS_1978-1 apākuru kapolataḥ sakhi bhujaṅgavallīrasaṃ parityaja kucasthalāt truṭitabandhanaṃ kañcukam /
analyzed: apākuru kapolataḥ sakhi bhujaṅga vallī rasam parityaja kuca sthalāt truṭita bandhanam kañcukam

original: MSS_1978-2 pidhehi daśanacchade daśanajakṣataṃ lākṣayā vadetthamabalāgaṇe gurujane kathaṃ yāsyasi //
analyzed: pidhehi daśanacchade daśanaja kṣatam lākṣayā vada ittham abalā gaṇe guru jane katham yāsyasi

original: MSS_1979-1 apākṛtyāśeṣāṇyapi ca ghanajālāni paritas tamodhūmastomodbhavamalinimānaṃ ca tadanu /
analyzed: apākṛtya aśeṣāṇi api ca ghana jālāni paritas tamaḥ dhūma stoma udbhava malinimānam ca tadanu

original: MSS_1979-2 śaraccandraḥ śilpī ratipatimude'sau nijakaraiḥ sudhāsaṃdohārdrairbhuvanabhavanaṃ pāṇḍurayati //
analyzed: śarad candraḥ śilpī nija karaiḥ sudhā saṃdoha ārdraiḥ bhuvana bhavanam pāṇḍurayati

original: MSS_1980-1 apāṅgatarale dṛśau madhuravakravarṇā giro vilāsabharamantharā gatiratīva kāntaṃ mukham /
analyzed: apāṅga tarale dṛśau madhura vakra varṇāḥ giraḥ vilāsa bhara mantharā gatiḥ atīva kāntam mukham

original: MSS_1980-2 iti sphuritamaṅgake mṛgadṛśaḥ svato līlayā tadatra na madodayaḥ kṛtapado'pi saṃlakṣyate //
analyzed: iti sphuritam aṅgake mṛga dṛśaḥ svatas līlayā tat atra na mada udayaḥ kṛta padaḥ upi saṃlakṣyate

original: MSS_1981-1 apāṅgapātairapadeśapūrvair eṇīdṛśāmekaśilānagaryāt /
analyzed: apāṅga pātaiḥ apadeśa pūrvaiḥ eṇī dṛśām ekaśilā nagaryāt

original: MSS_1981-2 vīthīṣu vīthīṣu vināparādhaṃ pade pade śṛṅkhalitā yuvānaḥ //
analyzed: vīthīṣu vīthīṣu vinā aparādham pade pade śṛṅkhalitāḥ yuvānaḥ

original: MSS_1982-1 apāṅgasaṃsargi taraṅgitaṃ dṛśor bhruvorarālāntavilāsi vellitam /
analyzed: apāṅga saṃsargi taraṅgitam dṛśoḥ bhruvoḥ arāla anta vilāsi vellitam

original: MSS_1982-2 visāri romāñcanakañcukaṃ tanos tanoti yo'sau subhage tavāgataḥ //
analyzed: visāri romāñcana kañcukam tanoḥ tanoti yaḥ asau subhage tava āgataḥ

original: MSS_1983-1 apāṅgastava tanvaṅgi vicitro'yaṃ bhujaṅgamaḥ /
analyzed: apāṅgaḥ tava tanvaṅgi vicitraḥ yam bhujaṅgamaḥ

original: MSS_1983-2 dṛṣṭamātraḥ sumanasām api mūrchāvidhāyakaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa mātraḥ su manasām api mūrchā vidhāyakaḥ

original: MSS_1984-1 apāṅgāt pucchamūlaṃ tu tiryagaśvaṃ pramāṇayet /
analyzed: apāṅgāt puccha mūlam tu tiryak aśvam pramāṇayet

original: MSS_1984-2 khurāntāt kakudaṃ yāvad ūrdhvamānena buddhimān //
analyzed: khura antāt kakudam yāvat ūrdhva mānena buddhimān

original: MSS_1985-1 apātraṃ pātratā yāti yatra pātraṃ na vidyate /
analyzed: apātram pātra tā yāti yatra pātram na vidyate

original: MSS_1985-2 asmin deśe drumo nāsti eraṇḍo'pi drumāyate //
analyzed: asmin deśe drumaḥ na asti eraṇḍaḥ api drumāyate

original: MSS_1986-1 apātravarṣaṇaṃ jātu na kuryāt sadvigarhitam /
analyzed: apātra varṣaṇam jātu na kuryāt sat vigarhitam

original: MSS_1986-2 apātravarṣaṇāt kiṃ syād anyat kośakṣayādṛte //
analyzed: apātra varṣaṇāt kim syāt anyat kośa kṣayāt ṛte

original: MSS_1987-1 apātre pātratābuddhiḥ pātre buddhirapātratā /
analyzed: apātre pātra tā buddhiḥ pātre buddhiḥ apātra tā

original: MSS_1987-2 ṛṇānubandharūpeṇa dāturutpadyate matiḥ //
analyzed: ṛṇa anubandha rūpeṇa dātuḥ utpadyate matiḥ

original: MSS_1988-1 apātre ramate nārī girau varṣati vāsavaḥ /
analyzed: apātre ramate nārī girau varṣati vāsavaḥ

original: MSS_1988-2 khalamāśrayate lakṣmīḥ prājñaḥ prāyeṇa nirdhanaḥ //
analyzed: khalam āśrayate lakṣmīḥ prājñaḥ prāyeṇa nirdhanaḥ

original: MSS_1989-1 apānaprāṇayoraikyaṃ kṣayo mūtrapurīṣayoḥ /
analyzed: apāna prāṇayoḥ aikyam kṣayaḥ mūtra purīṣayoḥ

original: MSS_1989-2 yuvā bhavati vṛddho'pi satataṃ mūlabandhanāt //
analyzed: yuvā bhavati vṛddhaḥ api satatam mūlabandhanāt

original: MSS_1990-1 apānena punaḥ kaścit preritaḥ kālarūpiṇā /
analyzed: apānena punar kaścid preritaḥ kālarūpiṇā

original: MSS_1990-2 niḥśvāsocchvāsakṛdvāti japan haṃsetyaharniśam //
analyzed: niḥśvāsa ucchvāsa kṛt vāti japan haṃsa iti aharniśam

original: MSS_1991-1 apāpaghanasaṃvṛteraviśadasmitātyunnamat samastanarasādaragrahaṇataḥ kṛtārthapriyā /
analyzed: apāpa ghana saṃvṛteḥ aviśada smitā ati unnamat samasta nara sādara grahaṇataḥ kṛtārtha priyā

original: MSS_1991-2 ratirmanasi jāyate yadi kadāpi śauryāśrayā tadaiva sakalaṃ januḥ saphalamevamāhātmabhūḥ //
analyzed: ratiḥ manasi jāyate yadi kadāpi śaurya āśrayā tadā eva sakalam januḥ saphalam evam āha ātmabhūḥ

original: MSS_1992-1 apāpāstatkulīnāśca mānayanti svakān hitān /
analyzed: apāpāḥ tad kulīnāḥ ca mānayanti svakān hitān

original: MSS_1992-2 eṣa prāyo narendrāṇāṃ śaṅkanīyastu śobhanaḥ //
analyzed: eṣa prāyas narendrāṇām śaṅkanīyaḥ tu śobhanaḥ

original: MSS_1993-1 apāmudvṛttānāṃ nijamupadiśantyā sthitipadaṃ dadhatyā śālīnāmavanatimudāre sati phale /
analyzed: apām udvṛttānām nijam upadiśantyā sthiti padam dadhatyā śālīnām avanatim udāre sati phale

original: MSS_1993-2 mayūrāṇāmugraṃ viṣamiva harantyā madamaho kṛtaḥ kṛtsnasyāyaṃ vinaya iva lokasya śaradā //
analyzed: mayūrāṇām ugram viṣam iva harantyāḥ mada maho kṛtaḥ kṛtsnasya ayam vinayaḥ iva lokasya śaradā

original: MSS_1994-1 apāyakalitā manurjagati sāpadaḥ sampado vinaśvaramidaṃ sukhaṃ viṣayajaṃ śriyaścañcalāḥ /
analyzed: apāya kalitāḥ manuḥ jagati sa āpadaḥ sampadaḥ vinaśvaram idam sukham viṣaya jam śriyaḥ cañcalāḥ

original: MSS_1994-2 bhavanti jarasārasāstaralalocanā yoṣitas tadapyayamaho janastapasi no pare rajyati //
analyzed: bhavanti jarasā arasāḥ tarala locanāḥ yoṣitaḥ tat api ayam aho janaḥ tapasi no pare rajyati

original: MSS_1995-1 apāyasaṃdarśanajāṃ vipattim upāyasaṃdarśanajāṃ ca siddhim /
analyzed: apāya saṃdarśana jām vipattim upāya saṃdarśana jām ca siddhim

original: MSS_1995-2 medhāvino nītividhiprayuktāṃ puraḥ sphurantīmiva darśayanti //
analyzed: medhāvinaḥ nīti vidhi prayuktām puras sphurantīm iva darśayanti

original: MSS_1996-1 apāyi muninā purā punaramāyi maryādayā atāri kapinā purā punaradāhi laṅkāriṇā /
analyzed: apāyi muninā purā punar amāyi maryādayā atāri kapinā purā punar adāhi laṅkāriṇā

original: MSS_1996-2 amanthi muravairiṇā punarabandhi laṅkāriṇā kva nāma vasudhāpate tava yaśo'mbudhiḥ kvāmbudhiḥ //
analyzed: amanthi muravairiṇā punar abandhi laṅkāriṇā kva nāma vasudhā pate tava yaśaḥ ambudhiḥ kva ambudhiḥ

original: MSS_1997-1 apāraḥ pāthodhiḥ pulinapadavī yojanaśataṃ nirālambo mārgo viyati kila śūnyā daśa diśaḥ /
analyzed: apāraḥ pāthodhiḥ pulina padavī yojana śatam nirālambaḥ mārgaḥ viyati kila śūnyāḥ daśa diśaḥ

original: MSS_1997-2 itīvāyaṃ kīraḥ katipayapadānyeva gagane muhurbhrāmyan bhrāmyan patati guṇavṛkṣe punarapi //
analyzed: iti iva ayam kīraḥ katipaya padāni eva gagane muhur bhrāmyan bhrāmyan patati guṇa vṛkṣe punar api

original: MSS_1998-1 apārapulinasthalībhuvi himālaye mālaye nikāmavikaṭonnate duradhirohaṇe rohaṇe /
analyzed: apāra pulina sthalī bhuvi himālaye mālaye nikāma vikaṭa unnate duradhirohaṇe rohaṇe

original: MSS_1998-2 mahatyamarabhūdhare gahanakandare mandare bhramanti na patantyaho pariṇatā bhavatkīrtayaḥ //
analyzed: mahati amara bhūdhare gahana kandare mandare bhramanti na patanti aho pariṇatāḥ bhavat kīrtayaḥ

original: MSS_1999-1 apārasaṃsārasamudramadhye saṃmajjato me śaraṇaṃ kimasti /
analyzed: apāra saṃsāra samudra madhye saṃmajjataḥ me śaraṇam kim asti

original: MSS_1999-2 guro dayālo kṛpayā vadaitad viśveśapādāmbujadīrghanaukā //
analyzed: guro dayālo kṛpayā vada etat viśveśa pāda ambuja dīrgha naukā

original: MSS_2000-1 apāre kāvyasaṃsāre kavireva prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: apāre kāvya saṃsāre kaviḥ eva prajāpatiḥ

original: MSS_2000-2 yathā vai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate //
analyzed: yathā vai rocate viśvam tathā idam parivartate

original: MSS_2001-1 apāre pāthodhau kimiti satimigrāhagahane nilīya śrīnāthaḥ svapiti bhujage śaṅkita iva /
analyzed: apāre pāthodhau kim iti sa timi grāha gahane nilīya śrīnāthaḥ svapiti bhujage śaṅkitaḥ iva

original: MSS_2001-2 kimetāvadbhirvā bhavatu kila sarvātiśayitaḥ śriyā saṃśliṣṭāṅko vyapagatabhayaṃ ko nivasatu //
analyzed: kim etāvadbhiḥ vā bhavatu kila sarva atiśayitaḥ śriyā saṃśliṣṭa aṅkaḥ vyapagata bhayam kaḥ nivasatu

original: MSS_2002-1 apārairvyāpārairahariha nayanto'śanadaśā- svatha snātāḥ saṃdhyāṃ vidadhati na jātu svasamaye /
analyzed: apāraiḥ vyāpāraiḥ ahar iha nayanta uśana daśā su atha snātāḥ saṃdhyām vidadhati na jātu sva samaye

original: MSS_2002-2 tyajantaḥ svāṃ vṛttiṃ dvijakulabhavā grāmagaṇakī- bhavanto hantāmī kathamapi ca jīvanti bahavaḥ //
analyzed: tyajantaḥ svām vṛttim dvija kula bhavāḥ grāma gaṇakī bhavantaḥ hanta amī katham api ca jīvanti bahavaḥ

original: MSS_2003-1 apārthakamanāyuṣyaṃ goviṣāṇasya bhakṣaṇam /
analyzed: apārthakam anāyuṣyam go viṣāṇasya bhakṣaṇam

original: MSS_2003-2 dantāśca parighṛṣyante rasaścāpi na labhyate //
analyzed: dantāḥ ca parighṛṣyante rasaḥ ca api na labhyate

original: MSS_2004-1 apārthetarayuktānāṃ vyāsasaṃgrahaśālinām /
analyzed: apārtha itara yuktānām vyāsa saṃgraha śālinām

original: MSS_2004-2 api gopālagītānāṃ niveśo nigamādiṣu //
analyzed: api gopāla gītānām niveśaḥ nigama ādiṣu

original: MSS_2005-1 apāstapātheyasudhopayogais tvaccumbinaiva svamanorathena /
analyzed: apāsta pātheya sudhā upayogaiḥ tvad cumbinā eva sva manorathena

original: MSS_2005-2 kṣudhaṃ ca nirvāpayatā tṛṣaṃ ca svādīyasādhvā gamitaḥ sukhaṃ taiḥ //
analyzed: kṣudham ca nirvāpayatā tṛṣam ca svādīyasā adhvā gamitaḥ sukham taiḥ

original: MSS_2006-1 apāstapāthoruhi śāyitaṃ kare karoti līlākamalaṃ kimānanam /
analyzed: apāsta pāthoruhi śāyitam kare karoti līlā kamalam kim ānanam

original: MSS_2006-2 tanoṣi hāraṃ kiyadasruṇaḥ sravair adoṣanirvāsitabhūṣaṇe hṛdi //
analyzed: tanoṣi hāram kiyat asruṇaḥ sravaiḥ adoṣa nirvāsita bhūṣaṇe hṛdi

original: MSS_2007-1 apāstastārābhirvidhana iva kāmī yuvatibhir madhucchatracchāyāṃ spṛśati śaśalakṣmā pariṇataḥ /
analyzed: apāstaḥ tārābhiḥ vidhanaḥ iva kāmī yuvatibhiḥ madhu chatra chāyām spṛśati śaśalakṣmā pariṇataḥ

original: MSS_2007-2 ayaṃ prācīkarṇābharaṇaracanāśokakusuma- cchaṭālakṣmīcauraḥ kalayati raviḥ pūrvamacalam //
analyzed: ayam prācīkarṇa ābharaṇa racanā aśoka kusuma chaṭā alakṣmī cauraḥ kalayati raviḥ pūrvam acalam

original: MSS_2008-1 apāsya lakṣmīharaṇotthavairitām acintayitvā ca tadadrimanthanam /
analyzed: apāsya lakṣmī haraṇa uttha vairi tām a cintayitvā ca tad adri manthanam

original: MSS_2008-2 dadau nivāsaṃ haraye mahodadhir vimatsarā dhīradhiyāṃ hi vṛttayaḥ //
analyzed: dadau nivāsam haraye mahā udadhiḥ vimatsarāḥ dhīra dhiyām hi vṛttayaḥ

original: MSS_2009-1 api kalpānilasyaiva taraṅgasya mahodadheḥ /
analyzed: api kalpa anilasya eva taraṅgasya mahā udadheḥ

original: MSS_2009-2 śakyate prasaro roddhuṃ nānuraktasya cetasaḥ //
analyzed: śakyate prasaraḥ roddhum na anuraktasya cetasaḥ

original: MSS_2010-1 api kāpuruṣo bhīruḥ syāccennṛpatisevakaḥ /
analyzed: api kāpuruṣaḥ bhīruḥ syāt ced nṛpati sevakaḥ

original: MSS_2010-2 tathāpi na parābhūtiṃ janādāpnoti mānavaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api na parābhūtim janāt āpnoti mānavaḥ

original: MSS_2011-1 api kāpuruṣo bhīruḥ syāccennṛpatisevakaḥ /
analyzed: api kāpuruṣaḥ bhīruḥ syāt ced nṛpati sevakaḥ

original: MSS_2011-2 yadāpnoti phalaṃ lokāt tasyāṃśamapi no guṇī //
analyzed: yat āpnoti phalam lokāt tasya aṃśam api no guṇī

original: MSS_2012-1 api kāpuruṣo mārge dvitīyaḥ kṣemakārakaḥ /
analyzed: api kāpuruṣaḥ mārge dvitīyaḥ kṣema kārakaḥ

original: MSS_2012-2 karkaṭena dvitīyena jīvitaṃ parirakṣitam //
analyzed: karkaṭena dvitīyena jīvitam parirakṣitam

original: MSS_2013-1 api kālasya yaḥ kālaḥ so'pi kālamapekṣate /
analyzed: api kālasya yaḥ kālaḥ saḥ api kālam apekṣate

original: MSS_2013-2 kartuṃ jaganti hantuṃ vā kālastena jagatprabhuḥ //
analyzed: kartum jaganti hantum vā kālaḥ tena jagat prabhuḥ

original: MSS_2014-1 api kīrtyarthamāyānti nāśaṃ sadyo'timāninaḥ /
analyzed: api kīrti artham āyānti nāśam sadyoti māninaḥ

original: MSS_2014-2 na cecchantyayaśomiśram apyevānantyamāyuṣaḥ //
analyzed: na ca icchanti ayaśaḥ miśram api eva ānantyam āyuṣaḥ

original: MSS_2015-1 api kuñjarakarṇāgrād api pippalapallavāt /
analyzed: api kuñjara karṇa agrāt api pippala pallavāt

original: MSS_2015-2 api vidyudvilasitād vilolaṃ lalanāmanaḥ //
analyzed: api vidyut vilasitāt vilolam lalanā manaḥ

original: MSS_2016-1 api kriyārthaṃ sulabhaṃ samitkuśaṃ jalānyapi snānavidhikṣamāṇi te /
analyzed: api kriyā artham sulabham samidh kuśam jalāni api snāna vidhi kṣamāṇi te

original: MSS_2016-2 api svaśaktyā tapasi pravartase śarīramādyaṃ khalu dharmasādhanam //
analyzed: api sva śaktyā tapasi pravartase śarīram ādyam khalu dharma sādhanam

original: MSS_2017-1 api ghorāparādhasya dharmamāśritya tiṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: api ghora aparādhasya dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhataḥ

original: MSS_2017-2 sa hi pracchādyate doṣaḥ śailo meghairivāsitaiḥ //
analyzed: sa hi pracchādyate doṣaḥ śailaḥ meghaiḥ iva asitaiḥ

original: MSS_2018-1 api cāpyaphalaṃ karma paśyāmaḥ kurvato janān /
analyzed: api ca api aphalam karma paśyāmaḥ kurvataḥ janān

original: MSS_2018-2 nānyathā hyabhijānanti vṛttiṃ loke kathaṃcana //
analyzed: na anyathā hi abhijānanti vṛttim loke kathaṃcana

original: MSS_2019-1 api cintāmaṇiścintāpariśramamapekṣate /
analyzed: api cintāmaṇiḥ cintā pariśramam apekṣate

original: MSS_2019-2 idaṃ tvacintitaṃ manye kṛtamāścaryamāryayā //
analyzed: idam tu a cintitam manye kṛtam āścaryam āryayā

original: MSS_2020-1 api cet sudurācāro bhajate māmananyabhāk /
analyzed: api ced su durācāraḥ bhajate mām an anya bhāj

original: MSS_2020-2 sādhureva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ //
analyzed: sādhuḥ eva sa mantavyaḥ samyak vyavasitaḥ hi saḥ

original: MSS_2021-1 api cedasi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ /
analyzed: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpa kṛttamaḥ

original: MSS_2021-2 sarvaṃ jñānaplavenaiva vṛjinaṃ saṃtariṣyasi //
analyzed: sarvam jñāna plavena eva vṛjinam saṃtariṣyasi

original: MSS_2022-1 api janakasutāyāstacca taccānurūpaṃ sphuṭamiha śiśuyugme naipuṇonneyamasti /
analyzed: api janakasutāyāḥ tat ca tat ca anurūpam sphuṭam iha śiśu yugme naipuṇa unneyam asti

original: MSS_2022-2 nanu punariva tanme gocarībhūtamakṣṇor abhinavaśatapatraśrīmadāsyaṃ priyāyāḥ //
analyzed: nanu punar iva tat me gocarībhūtam akṣṇoḥ abhinava śatapatra śrīmat āsyam priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_2023-1 api jalakaṇān payodher dūrādāhṛtya jāyate jaladaḥ /
analyzed: api jala kaṇān payodheḥ dūrāt āhṛtya jāyate jaladaḥ

original: MSS_2023-2 nikaṭād ghaṭānapi śataṃ samīharan vārihāryeva //
analyzed: nikaṭāt ghaṭān api śatam samīharan vāri hārī eva

original: MSS_2024-1 api tadvapuṣi prasarpator gamite kāntijharairagādhatām /
analyzed: api tad vapuṣi prasarpatoḥ gamite kānti jharaiḥ agādha tām

original: MSS_2024-2 smarayauvanayoḥ khalu dvayoḥ plavakumbhau bhavataḥ kucāvubhau //
analyzed: smara yauvanayoḥ khalu dvayoḥ plava kumbhau bhavataḥ kucau ubhau

original: MSS_2025-1 api taruvanānyūṣmāyante tapatyapi yāminī dahati sarasīvāto'pyeṣa jvalanti jalānyapi /
analyzed: api taru vanāni ūṣmāyante tapati api yāminī dahati sarasī vātaḥ upi eṣa jvalanti jalāni api

original: MSS_2025-2 iti samadhikaṃ grīṣme bhīṣme na puṇyavatāṃ bhayaṃ malayajarasairdigdhaṃ labdhvā vadhūstanamaṇḍalam //
analyzed: iti samadhikam grīṣme bhīṣme na puṇyavatām bhayam malayaja rasaiḥ digdham labdhvā vadhū stana maṇḍalam

original: MSS_2026-1 api turagasamīpādutpatantaṃ mayūraṃ na sa rucirakalāpaṃ bāṇalakṣyīcakāra /
analyzed: api turaga samīpāt utpatantam mayūram na sa rucira kalāpam bāṇa lakṣyīcakāra

original: MSS_2026-2 sapadi gatamanaskaścitramālyānukīrṇe rativigalitabandhe keśapāśe priyāyāḥ //
analyzed: sapadi gata manaskaḥ citra mālya anukīrṇe rati vigalita bandhe keśapāśe priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_2027-1 api tejo nidhirhanta patito yadi jāyate /
analyzed: api tejaḥ nidhiḥ hanta patitaḥ yadi jāyate

original: MSS_2027-2 surataṃ kimivāsmākam iti kokairviyujyate //
analyzed: suratam kim iva asmākam iti kokaiḥ viyujyate

original: MSS_2028-1 api tvayā kairaviṇi vyadhāyi mudhā sudhābandhuni bandhubhāvaḥ /
analyzed: api tvayā kairaviṇi vyadhāyi mudhā sudhā bandhuni bandhu bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_2028-2 janāpavādaḥ paritaḥ prayātaḥ samāgamo hanta na jātu jātaḥ //
analyzed: jana apavādaḥ paritas prayātaḥ samāgamaḥ hanta na jātu jātaḥ

original: MSS_2029-1 api dalanmukule bakule yayā padamadhāyi kadāpi na tṛṣṇayā /
analyzed: api dalat mukule bakule yayā padam adhāyi kadāpi na tṛṣṇayā

original: MSS_2029-2 ahaha sā sahasā vidhure vidhau madhukarī badarīmanuvartate //
analyzed: ahaha sā sahasā vidhure vidhau madhukarī badarīm anuvartate

original: MSS_2030-1 api dinamaṇireṣa kleśitaḥ śītasaṃghair atha niśi nijabhāryāṃ gāḍhamāliṅgya dorbhyām /
analyzed: api dinamaṇiḥ eṣa kleśitaḥ śīta saṃghaiḥ atha niśi nija bhāryām gāḍham āliṅgya dorbhyām

original: MSS_2030-2 svapiti punarudetuṃ sālasāṅgastu tasmāt kimu na bhavatu dīrghā yāminī kāminīyam //
analyzed: svapiti punar udetum sa alasa aṅgaḥ tu tasmāt kimu na bhavatu dīrghā yāminī kāminī iyam

original: MSS_2031-1 api dorbhyāṃ paribaddhā baddhāpi guṇairanekadhā nipuṇaiḥ /
analyzed: api dorbhyām paribaddhā baddhā api guṇaiḥ anekadhā nipuṇaiḥ

original: MSS_2031-2 nirgacchati kṣaṇādiva jaladhijalotpattipicchilā lakṣmīḥ //
analyzed: nirgacchati kṣaṇāt iva jaladhi jala utpatti picchilā lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_2032-1 api nadatha nikāmaṃ dardurāḥ kiṃ suvarṇa- dyutibharamupanītā nūtanairvāripūraiḥ /
analyzed: api nadatha nikāmam dardurāḥ kim suvarṇa dyuti bharam upanītāḥ nūtanaiḥ vāripūraiḥ

original: MSS_2032-2 ayamaciravināśī śocanīyastu bhāvī sa ciramavaṭasīmni prācya eva krayo vaḥ //
analyzed: ayam acira vināśī śocanīyaḥ tu bhāvī sa ciram avaṭa sīmni prācyaḥ eva krayaḥ vaḥ

original: MSS_2033-1 api nāma sa dṛśyeta puruṣātiśayo bhuvi /
analyzed: api nāma sa dṛśyeta puruṣa atiśayaḥ bhuvi

original: MSS_2033-2 garvocchūnamukhā yena dhanino nāvalokitāḥ //
analyzed: garva ucchūna mukhāḥ yena dhaninaḥ na avalokitāḥ

original: MSS_2034-1 api nityānandamayaṃ sahaḥ śriyaṃ vahati saṃtataṃ hṛdaye /
analyzed: api nitya ānanda mayam sahaḥ śriyam vahati saṃtatam hṛdaye

original: MSS_2034-2 kaḥ sādhāraṇapuruṣaḥ prabhavatvenāmanādarttum //
analyzed: kaḥ sādhāraṇa puruṣaḥ prabhava tvena ām an ādarttum

original: MSS_2035-1 api nipuṇataramadhītaṃ durvinayārūḍhacetasaḥ puṃsaḥ /
analyzed: api nipuṇataram adhītam durvinaya ārūḍha cetasaḥ puṃsaḥ

original: MSS_2035-2 maṇiriva phaṇiphaṇavartī prabhavati śokāya lokānām //
analyzed: maṇiḥ iva phaṇi phaṇa vartī prabhavati śokāya lokānām

original: MSS_2036-1 api nirmuktabhogena svāntaḥsthaviṣayekṣayā /
analyzed: api nirmukta bhogena sva antaḥstha viṣaya īkṣayā

original: MSS_2036-2 asadbhāvāya jāyeta jihmagena sahāsikā //
analyzed: asadbhāvāya jāyeta jihmagena sa hāsikā

original: MSS_2037-1 api pañcaśataṃ daṇḍyān daṇḍayet pṛthivīpatiḥ /
analyzed: api pañcaśatam daṇḍyān daṇḍayet pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: MSS_2037-2 abhāve pañca kāyasthān ekaṃ vā svarṇakārakam //
analyzed: abhāve pañca kāyasthān ekam vā svarṇakārakam

original: MSS_2038-1 api pañcaśataṃ śūrā mṛdnanti mahatīṃ camūm /
analyzed: api pañcaśatam śūrāḥ mṛdnanti mahatīm camūm

original: MSS_2038-2 athavā pañca ṣaṭ sapta vijayante'nivartinaḥ //
analyzed: athavā pañca ṣaṭ sapta

original: MSS_2039-1 api putraiḥ kalatrairvā prāṇān rakṣeta paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: api putraiḥ kalatraiḥ vā prāṇān rakṣeta paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_2039-2 vidyamānairyatastaiḥ syāt sarvaṃ bhūyo'pi dehinām //
analyzed: vidyamānaiḥ yatas taiḥ syāt sarvam bhūyas api dehinām

original: MSS_2040-1 api pauruṣamādeyaṃ śāstraṃ cedyuktibodhakam /
analyzed: api pauruṣam ādeyam śāstram ced yukti bodhakam

original: MSS_2040-2 anyattvārṣamapi tyājyaṃ bhāvyaṃ nyāyyaikasevinā //
analyzed: anyat tu ārṣam api tyājyam bhāvyam nyāyya eka sevinā

original: MSS_2041-1 api pragalbhalalanākaṭākṣacapalāḥ śriyaḥ /
analyzed: api pragalbha lalanā kaṭākṣa capalāḥ śriyaḥ

original: MSS_2041-2 sanmantripraṇidhānena ciraṃ tiṣṭhanti bhūbhujām //
analyzed: sat mantri praṇidhānena ciram tiṣṭhanti bhūbhujām

original: MSS_2042-1 api prājyaṃ rājyaṃ tṛṇamiva parityajya sahasā viloladvānīraṃ tava janani tīraṃ śritavatām /
analyzed: api prājyam rājyam tṛṇam iva parityajya sahasā vilolat vānīram tava janani tīram śritavatām

original: MSS_2042-2 sudhātaḥ svādīyaḥ salilamidamātṛpti pibatāṃ janānāmānandaḥ parihasati nirvāṇapadavīm //
analyzed: sudhātaḥ svādīyaḥ salilam idam ātṛpti pibatām janānām ānandaḥ parihasati nirvāṇa padavīm

original: MSS_2043-1 api prāṇasamāniṣṭān pālitāṃllālitānapi /
analyzed: api prāṇa samān iṣṭān pālitān lālitān api

original: MSS_2043-2 bhṛtyān yuddhe samutpanne paśyecchuṣkamivendhanam //
analyzed: bhṛtyān yuddhe samutpanne paśyet śuṣkam iva indhanam

original: MSS_2044-1 api bandhutayā nārī bahuputrā guṇairyutā /
analyzed: api bandhu tayā nārī bahu putrā guṇaiḥ yutā

original: MSS_2044-2 śocyā bhavatisā nārī patihīnā tapasvinī //
analyzed: śocyā bhavati sā nārī pati hīnā tapasvinī

original: MSS_2045-1 api brahmaparānandādidamapyadhikaṃ dhruvam /
analyzed: api brahma para ānandāt idam api adhikam dhruvam

original: MSS_2045-2 jahāra nāradādīnāṃ cittāni kathamanyathā //
analyzed: jahāra nārada ādīnām cittāni katham anyathā

original: MSS_2046-1 api brahmavadhaṃ kṛtvā prāyaścittena śudhyati /
analyzed: api brahma vadham kṛtvā prāyaścittena śudhyati

original: MSS_2046-2 tadarthena vicīrṇena na kathaṃcitsuhṛddruhaḥ //
analyzed: tad arthena vicīrṇena na kathaṃcid suhṛd druhaḥ

original: MSS_2047-1 api bhujalatotkṣepādasyāḥ kṛtaṃ parirambhaṇaṃ priyasahacarīkrīḍālāpe śrutā api sūktayaḥ /
analyzed: api bhuja latā utkṣepāt asyāḥ kṛtam parirambhaṇam priya sahacarī krīḍā ālāpe śrutāḥ api su uktayaḥ

original: MSS_2047-2 navapariṇayavrīḍāvatyā mukhonnatiyatnato- 'pyalasavalitā tiryagdṛṣṭiḥ karoti mahotsavam //
analyzed: nava pariṇaya vrīḍāvatyāḥ mukha unnati yatnataḥ pi alasa valitā tiryak dṛṣṭiḥ karoti mahā utsavam

original: MSS_2048-1 api bhogiṣu maṇidhāriṇa eva nihaṃsi natu yaddviṣo'pi parān /
analyzed: api bhogiṣu maṇi dhāriṇaḥ eva nihaṃsi na tu yad dviṣaḥ api parān

original: MSS_2048-2 tattava garuḍa sthāne dānavasaṃhārivāhasya //
analyzed: tat tava garuḍa sthāne dānava saṃhāri vāhasya

original: MSS_2049-1 api bhrātā suto'rghyo vā śvaśuro mātulo'pi vā /
analyzed: api bhrātā suta ūrghyaḥ vā śvaśuraḥ mātulaḥ upi vā

original: MSS_2049-2 nādaṇḍyo nāma rājño'sti dharmādvicalitaḥ svakāt //
analyzed: na a daṇḍyaḥ nāma rājñoḥ ti dharmāt vicalitaḥ svakāt

original: MSS_2050-1 api mandatvamāpanno naṣṭo vāpīṣṭadarśanāt /
analyzed: api manda tvam āpannaḥ naṣṭaḥ vā api iṣṭa darśanāt

original: MSS_2050-2 prāyeṇa prāṇināṃ bhūyo duḥkhavego'dhiko bhavet //
analyzed: prāyeṇa prāṇinām bhūyas duḥkha vega udhikaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_2051-1 api maraṇamupaiti sā mṛgāṅke vilasati kaiva kathā rasāntarasya /
analyzed: api maraṇam upaiti sā mṛgāṅke vilasati kā eva kathā rasa antarasya

original: MSS_2051-2 ayi kathamadhunā dadhāti śāntiṃ viṣamaśarajvaratīvradehadāhaḥ //
analyzed: ayi katham adhunā dadhāti śāntim viṣama śara jvara tīvra deha dāhaḥ

original: MSS_2052-1 api mānuṣyakaṃ labdhvā bhavanti jñānino na ye /
analyzed: api mānuṣyakam labdhvā bhavanti jñāninaḥ na ye

original: MSS_2052-2 paśutaiva varā teṣāṃ pratyavāyāpravartanāt //
analyzed: paśu tā eva varā teṣām pratyavāya apravartanāt

original: MSS_2053-1 api mārdavabhāvena gātraṃ saṃlīya buddhimān /
analyzed: api mārdava bhāvena gātram saṃlīya buddhimān

original: MSS_2053-2 ariṃ nāśayate nityaṃ yathā vallī mahādrumam //
analyzed: arim nāśayate nityam yathā vallī mahā drumam

original: MSS_2054-1 api mudamupayānto vāgvilāsaiḥ svakīyaiḥ parabhaṇitiṣu toṣaṃ yānti santaḥ kiyantaḥ /
analyzed: api mudam upayāntaḥ vāc vilāsaiḥ svakīyaiḥ para bhaṇitiṣu toṣam yānti santaḥ kiyantaḥ

original: MSS_2054-2 nijaghanamakarandasyandapūrṇālavālaḥ kalaśasalilasekaṃ nehate kiṃ rasālaḥ //
analyzed: nija ghana makaranda syanda pūrṇa ālavālaḥ kalaśa salila sekam na īhate kim rasālaḥ

original: MSS_2055-1 api mṛgapatinā karīndrakumbha- sthaladalanodgatapauruṣeṇa yasya /
analyzed: api mṛgapatinā karīndra kumbha sthala dalana udgata pauruṣeṇa yasya

original: MSS_2055-2 bhayacakitadṛśā pranaṣṭamuccaiḥ sa hi śarabhīkularājacakravartī //
analyzed: bhaya cakita dṛśā pranaṣṭam uccais sa hi śarabhī kula rāja cakravartī

original: MSS_2056-1 api mṛdvyā girā labhyaḥ sadā jāgartyatandritaḥ /
analyzed: api mṛdvyā girā labhyaḥ sadā jāgarti atandritaḥ

original: MSS_2056-2 nāsti dharmasamo bhṛtyaḥ kiṃciduktastu dhāvati //
analyzed: na asti dharma samaḥ bhṛtyaḥ kiṃcid uktaḥ tu dhāvati

original: MSS_2057-1 api merūpamaṃ prājñam api śūramapi sthiram /
analyzed: api meru upamam prājñam api śūram api sthiram

original: MSS_2057-2 tṛṇīkaroti tṛṣṇaikā nimeṣeṇa narottamam //
analyzed: tṛṇīkaroti tṛṣṇā ekā nimeṣeṇa nara uttamam

original: MSS_2058-1 api yatsukaraṃ karma tadapyekena duṣkaram /
analyzed: api yat sukaram karma tat api ekena duṣkaram

original: MSS_2058-2 biśeṣato'sahāyena kimu rājyaṃ mahodayam //
analyzed: kimu rājyam mahā udayam

original: MSS_2059-1 api rājyādapi svargād apīndorapi mādhavāt /
analyzed: api rājyāt api svargāt api indoḥ api mādhavāt

original: MSS_2059-2 api kāntākucasparśāt saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham //
analyzed: api kāntā kuca sparśāt saṃtoṣaḥ paramam sukham

original: MSS_2060-1 api lapitumahaṃ na hanta śaktas tava purataḥ paritāpamāyatākṣyāḥ /
analyzed: api lapitum aham na hanta śaktaḥ tava puratas paritāpam āyata akṣyāḥ

original: MSS_2060-2 śiva śiva rasanā yato na yatnād api yatate nijadāhaśaṅkayeva //
analyzed: śiva śiva rasanā yatas na yatnāt api yatate nija dāha śaṅkayā iva

original: MSS_2061-1 api lalitasuguṇaveṇiḥ sālaṃkārāpi yā suvarṇāpi /
analyzed: api lalita suguṇa veṇiḥ sa alaṃkārā api yā suvarṇā api

original: MSS_2061-2 raghutilaka vihīnā ced vāṇī ramaṇīva naiva kalyāṇī //
analyzed: raghu tilaka vihīnā ced vāṇī ramaṇī iva nā eva kalyāṇī

original: MSS_2062-1 api vajreṇa saṃgharṣam api padbhyāṃ parābhavam /
analyzed: api vajreṇa saṃgharṣam api padbhyām parābhavam

original: MSS_2062-2 sahante guṇalobhena ta eva maṇayo yadi //
analyzed: sahante guṇa lobhena te eva maṇayaḥ yadi

original: MSS_2063-1 api vaṭataroḥ spardhāṃ bījena sarṣapa sāṃprataṃ pariṇamasi yo muṣṭiḥ śākaṃ sati sthalasauṣṭhave /
analyzed: api vaṭa taroḥ spardhām bījena sarṣapa sāṃpratam pariṇamasi yaḥ muṣṭiḥ śākam sati sthala sauṣṭhave

original: MSS_2063-2 jaṭharakuharakrīḍadviśvo yadekadalodare pralayaśiśuko devaḥ śiśye pureti ha śuśrumaḥ //
analyzed: jaṭhara kuhara krīḍat viśvaḥ yat eka dala udare pralaya śiśukaḥ devaḥ śiśye purā iti ha śuśrumaḥ

original: MSS_2064-1 api varṣaśataṃ sthitvā sadā kṛtrimarāgiṇī /
analyzed: api varṣa śatam sthitvā sadā kṛtrima rāgiṇī

original: MSS_2064-2 veśyā śukīva niḥśvāsā niḥsaṅgebhyaḥ palāyate //
analyzed: veśyā śukī iva niḥśvāsā niḥsaṅgebhyaḥ palāyate

original: MSS_2065-1 api vidhiḥ kusumāni tavāśugān smara vidhāya na nirvṛtimāptavān /
analyzed: api vidhiḥ kusumāni tava āśu gān smara vidhāya na nirvṛtim āptavān

original: MSS_2065-2 adita pañca hi te sa niyamya tāṃs tadapi tairbata jarjaritaṃ jagat //
analyzed: adita pañca hi te sa niyamya tān tat api taiḥ bata jarjaritam jagat

original: MSS_2066-1 api vīryotkaṭaḥ śatrur yato bhedena sidhyati /
analyzed: api vīrya utkaṭaḥ śatruḥ yatas bhedena sidhyati

original: MSS_2066-2 tasmād bhedaḥ prayoktavyaḥ śatrūṇāṃ vijigīṣuṇā //
analyzed: tasmāt bhedaḥ prayoktavyaḥ śatrūṇām vijigīṣuṇā

original: MSS_2067-1 api vetti ṣaḍakṣarāṇi ced upadeṣṭuṃ śitikaṇṭhamicchati /
analyzed: api vetti ṣaṣ akṣarāṇi ced upadeṣṭum śitikaṇṭham icchati

original: MSS_2067-2 vasanāśanamātramasti ced dhanadādapyatiricyate khalaḥ //
analyzed: vasana aśana mātram asti ced dhanadāt api atiricyate khalaḥ

original: MSS_2068-1 api śāradacandrikā yadīyāṃ tulanāṃ gacchati duṣkaraistapobhiḥ /
analyzed: api śāradacandrikā yadi iyām tulanām gacchati duṣkaraiḥ tapobhiḥ

original: MSS_2068-2 na taṭuñjhati mānasaṃ madīyaṃ hasitaṃ khañjanamañjulocanāyāḥ //
analyzed: na tat uñjhati mānasam madīyam hasitam khañjana mañju locanāyāḥ

original: MSS_2069-1 api śāstreṣu kuśalā lokācāravivarjitāḥ /
analyzed: api śāstreṣu kuśalāḥ loka ācāra vivarjitāḥ

original: MSS_2069-2 sarve te hāsyatāṃ yānti yathā te mūrkhapaṇḍitāḥ //
analyzed: sarve te hāsya tām yānti yathā te mūrkha paṇḍitāḥ

original: MSS_2070-1 api śiśirataropacārayogyaṃ dvitayamidaṃ yugapanna sahyameva /
analyzed: api śiśiratara upacāra yogyam dvitayam idam yugapad na sahyam eva

original: MSS_2070-2 jaraṭhitaravidīdhitiśca kālo dayitajanena samaṃ ca viprayogaḥ //
analyzed: jaraṭhita ravi dīdhitiḥ ca kālaḥ dayita janena samam ca viprayogaḥ

original: MSS_2071-1 api śroṇibharasvairāṃ dhartuṃ tāmaśakanna saḥ /
analyzed: api śroṇi bhara svairām dhartum tām aśakat na saḥ

original: MSS_2071-2 tadaṅgasaṅgajastambho gajastambhorudorapi //
analyzed: tad aṅga saṅga ja stambhaḥ gajastambha ūrudoḥ api

original: MSS_2072-1 api saṃtāpaśamanāḥ śuddhāḥ surabhiśītalāḥ /
analyzed: api saṃtāpa śamanāḥ śuddhāḥ surabhi śītalāḥ

original: MSS_2072-2 bhujaṅgasaṅgājjāyante bhīṣaṇāścandanadrumāḥ //
analyzed: bhujaṅga saṅgāt jāyante bhīṣaṇāḥ candana drumāḥ

original: MSS_2073-1 api saṃpūrṇatāyuktaiḥ kartavyāḥ suhṛdo budhaiḥ /
analyzed: api saṃpūrṇa tā yuktaiḥ kartavyāḥ suhṛdaḥ budhaiḥ

original: MSS_2073-2 nadīśaḥ paripūrṇo'pi candrodayamapekṣate //
analyzed: nadīśaḥ paripūrṇaḥ api candra udayam apekṣate

original: MSS_2074-1 api saṃbhṛtasya satataṃ riktatvaṃ bibhrato visarjanataḥ /
analyzed: api saṃbhṛtasya satatam rikta tvam bibhrataḥ visarjanataḥ

original: MSS_2074-2 udarasyodārasya ca kevalamākārato bhedaḥ //
analyzed: udarasya udārasya ca kevalam ākārataḥ bhedaḥ

original: MSS_2075-1 api satpathaniṣṭhānām āśāḥ pūrayatāmapi /
analyzed: api sat patha niṣṭhānām āśāḥ pūrayatām api

original: MSS_2075-2 agastyavṛttirmeghānāṃ hanta mālinyakāraṇam //
analyzed: agastya vṛttiḥ meghānām hanta mālinya kāraṇam

original: MSS_2076-1 api sa divasaḥ kiṃ syādyatra priyāmukhapaṅkaje madhu madhukarīvāsmaddṛṣṭirvikāsini pāsyati /
analyzed: api sa divasaḥ kim syāt yatra priyā mukha paṅkaje madhu madhukarī iva asmad dṛṣṭiḥ vikāsini pāsyati

original: MSS_2076-2 tadanu ca mṛdusnigdhālāpakramāhitanarmaṇaḥ suratasacivairaṅgaiḥ saṅgo mamāpi bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: tadanu ca mṛdu snigdha ālāpa krama āhita narmaṇaḥ surata sacivaiḥ aṅgaiḥ saṅgaḥ mama api bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_2077-1 api sarvavido na rājate vacanaṃ śrotari bodhavarjite /
analyzed: api sarva vidaḥ na rājate vacanam śrotari bodha varjite

original: MSS_2077-2 api bhartari naṣṭalocane viphalaḥ kiṃ na kalatravibhramaḥ //
analyzed: api bhartari naṣṭa locane viphalaḥ kim na kalatra vibhramaḥ

original: MSS_2078-1 api sahavasatāmasatāṃ jalaruhajalavadbhavatyasaṃśleṣaḥ /
analyzed: api saha vasatām asatām jalaruha jala vat bhavati asaṃśleṣaḥ

original: MSS_2078-2 dūre'pi satāṃ vasatāṃ prītiḥ kumudenduvad bhavati //
analyzed: dūre api satām vasatām prītiḥ kumuda indu vat bhavati

original: MSS_2079-1 api sāgaraparyantā vicetavyā vasundharā /
analyzed: api sāgara paryantā vicetavyā vasundharā

original: MSS_2079-2 deśo hyaratnimātro'pi nāsti daivajñavarjitaḥ //
analyzed: deśaḥ hi aratni mātraḥ api na asti daivajña varjitaḥ

original: MSS_2080-1 api subhagaṃ tava vadanaṃ paśyati subhage yadā yadā candraḥ /
analyzed: api subhagam tava vadanam paśyati subhage yadā yadā candraḥ

original: MSS_2080-2 glāyati hanta pidhatte sapadi mukhaṃ svaṃ payodāntaḥ //
analyzed: glāyati hanta pidhatte sapadi mukham svam payoda antar

original: MSS_2081-1 api sthānuvadāsīta śuṣyan parigataḥ kṣudhā /
analyzed: api sthānu vat āsīta śuṣyan parigataḥ kṣudhā

original: MSS_2081-2 na tvevānātmasaṃpannād vṛttimīheta paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: na tu eva anātma saṃpannāt vṛttim īheta paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_2082-1 api syāt pitṛhā vairī so'pi dānavilobhitaḥ /
analyzed: api syāt pitṛ hā vairī saḥ api dāna vilobhitaḥ

original: MSS_2082-2 gatvā viśvāsabhāvaṃ sa śatrorātmānamarpayet //
analyzed: gatvā viśvāsa bhāvam sa śatroḥ ātmānam arpayet

original: MSS_2083-1 api svamasvapnamasūṣupannamī parasya dārānanavaitumeva mām /
analyzed: api svam a svapnam asūṣupan amī parasya dārān an avaitum eva mām

original: MSS_2083-2 svayaṃ duradhvārṇavanāvikāḥ kathaṃ spṛśantu vijñāya hṛdāpi tādṛśīm //
analyzed: svayam duradhva arṇava nāvikāḥ katham spṛśantu vijñāya hṛdā api tādṛśīm

original: MSS_2084-1 api svalpataraṃ kāryaṃ yadbhavet pṛthivīpateḥ /
analyzed: api svalpataram kāryam yat bhavet pṛthivīpateḥ

original: MSS_2084-2 tanna vācyaṃ sabhāmadhye provācedaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ //
analyzed: tat na vācyam sabhā madhye provāca idam bṛhaspatiḥ

original: MSS_2085-1 api svalpamasatyaṃ yaḥ puro vadati bhūbhujām /
analyzed: api su alpam asatyam yaḥ puras vadati bhūbhujām

original: MSS_2085-2 devānāṃ ca vināśaḥ syād dhruvaṃ tasya gurorapi //
analyzed: devānām ca vināśaḥ syāt dhruvam tasya guroḥ api

original: MSS_2086-1 api svaiḥ sarvasvaiḥ punarapadhanaiḥ kairapi dhanaiḥ paritrāṇaiḥ prāṇairyadapi ca vidheyaṃ parahitam /
analyzed: api svaiḥ sarva svaiḥ punar apadhanaiḥ kaiḥ api dhanaiḥ paritrāṇaiḥ prāṇaiḥ yat api ca vidheyam para hitam

original: MSS_2086-2 tadadyaitacchabdāt parabhṛta bhavatyeva bhavatas tataḥ śabdālasyaṃ kathamapi nirasyaṃ kṣaṇamapi //
analyzed: tat adya etad śabdāt parabhṛta bhavati eva bhavataḥ tatas śabda ālasyam katham api nirasyam kṣaṇam api

original: MSS_2087-1 apīḍayan balaṃ śatrūñ jigīṣurabhiṣeṇayet /
analyzed: a pīḍayan balam śatrūm jigīṣuḥ abhiṣeṇayet

original: MSS_2087-2 sukhasādhyaṃ dviṣāṃ sainyaṃ dīrghaprayāṇapīḍitam //
analyzed: sukha sādhyam dviṣām sainyam dīrgha prayāṇa pīḍitam

original: MSS_2088-1 apītakṣībakādambam asaṃmṛṣṭāmalāmbaram /
analyzed: a pīta kṣība kādambam a saṃmṛṣṭa amala ambaram

original: MSS_2088-2 aprasāditaśuddhāmbu jagadāsīnmanoharam //
analyzed: a prasādita śuddha ambu jagat āsīt manoharam

original: MSS_2089-1 aputratvaṃ bhavacchreyo na tu syādviguṇaḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: aputra tvam bhavat śreyaḥ na tu syāt viguṇaḥ sutaḥ

original: MSS_2089-2 jīvannapyavinīto'sau mṛta eva na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: jīvan api avinīta usau mṛtaḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_2090-1 aputrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
analyzed: aputrasya gatiḥ nā asti svargaḥ nā eva ca nā eva ca

original: MSS_2090-2 tasmāt putramukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavet paścāddhi tāpasaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt putra mukham dṛṣṭvā bhavet paścāt hi tāpasaḥ

original: MSS_2091-1 aputrasya gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ diśaḥ śūnyāstvabāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: aputrasya gṛham śūnyam diśaḥ śūnyāḥ tu abāndhavāḥ

original: MSS_2091-2 mūrkhasya hṛdayaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaśūnyā daridratā //
analyzed: mūrkhasya hṛdayam śūnyam sarva śūnyā daridra tā

original: MSS_2092-1 aputrasya gṛhaṃ śocyaṃ śocyaṃ rājyamarājakam /
analyzed: aputrasya gṛham śocyam śocyam rājyam arājakam

original: MSS_2092-2 nirāhārāḥ prajāḥ śocyā śocyaṃ maithunamaprajam //
