analyzed: nirāhārāḥ prajāḥ śocyā śocyam maithunam aprajam

original: MSS_2093-1 apunardehiśabdārtham apratyupakṛtikṣamam /
analyzed: apunardehi śabda artham a pratyupakṛti kṣamam

original: MSS_2093-2 arthinaṃ kurute kaścit punarāvṛttivarjitam //
analyzed: arthinam kurute kaścid punarāvṛtti varjitam

original: MSS_2094-1 apuṣyata ghanāvalī bhuvanajīvanairyatkarair avardhyata sudhārucirbahubudhālisaṃtarpaṇaḥ /
analyzed: apuṣyata ghanāvalī bhuvana jīvanaiḥ yad karaiḥ avardhyata sudhā ruciḥ bahu budha ali saṃtarpaṇaḥ

original: MSS_2094-2 tamandhatamasacchidaṃ ravimavekṣya jājvalyase tvameva ravikāntatāmayasi hanta kiṃ kurmahe //
analyzed: tam andha tamasa chidam ravim avekṣya jājvalyase tvam eva ravi kānta tāmayasi hanta kim kurmahe

original: MSS_2095-1 apūjitaivāstu girīndrakanyā kiṃ pakṣapātena manobhavasya /
analyzed: a pūjitā evā astu girīndra kanyā kim pakṣapātena manobhavasya

original: MSS_2095-2 yadyasti dūtī sarasoktidakṣā dāsaḥ patiḥ pādatale vadhūnām //
analyzed: yadi asti dūtī sarasa ukti dakṣā dāsaḥ patiḥ pāda tale vadhūnām

original: MSS_2096-1 apūjito'tithiryasya gṛhādyāti viniḥśvasan /
analyzed: a pūjita utithiḥ yasya gṛhāt yāti viniḥśvasan

original: MSS_2096-2 gacchanti pitarastasya vimukhāḥ saha daivataiḥ //
analyzed: gacchanti pitaraḥ tasya vimukhāḥ saha daivataiḥ

original: MSS_2097-1 apūjyā yatra pūjyante pūjyānāṃ tu vimānanā /
analyzed: apūjyāḥ yatra pūjyante pūjyānām tu vimānanā

original: MSS_2097-2 trīṇi tatra pravartante durbhikṣaṃ maraṇaṃ bhayam //
analyzed: trīṇi tatra pravartante durbhikṣam maraṇam bhayam

original: MSS_2098-1 apūjyā yatra pūjyante pūjyānāmapyamānanā /
analyzed: apūjyāḥ yatra pūjyante pūjyānām api a mānanā

original: MSS_2098-2 tava daivakṛto daṇḍaḥ sadyaḥ patati dāruṇaḥ //
analyzed: tava daiva kṛtaḥ daṇḍaḥ sadyas patati dāruṇaḥ

original: MSS_2099-1 apūrṇe naiva martavyaṃ saṃpūrṇe naiva jīvati /
analyzed: a pūrṇe na eva martavyam saṃpūrṇe na eva jīvati

original: MSS_2099-2 tasmāddhairyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ hantavyā paravāhinī //
analyzed: tasmāt dhairyam vidhātavyam hantavyā para vāhinī

original: MSS_2100-1 apūrvaṃ cauryamabhyastaṃ tvayā cañcalalocane /
analyzed: apūrvam cauryam abhyastam tvayā cañcala locane

original: MSS_2100-2 divāpi jāgratāṃ puṃsāṃ ceto harasi dūrataḥ //
analyzed: divā api jāgratām puṃsām cetaḥ harasi dūratas

original: MSS_2101-1 apūrvaṃ yadvastu prathayati vinā kāraṇakalāṃ jagad grāvaprakhyaṃ nijarasabharāt sārayati ca /
analyzed: apūrvam yat vastu prathayati vinā kāraṇa kalām jagat grāva prakhyam nija rasa bharāt sārayati ca

original: MSS_2101-2 kramāt prakhyopākhyāprasarasubhagaṃ bhāsayati tat sarasvatyāstattvaṃ kavisahṛdayākhyaṃ vijayate //
analyzed: kramāt prakhyā upākhyā prasara subhagam bhāsayati tat sarasvatyāḥ tattvam kavi sahṛdaya ākhyam vijayate

original: MSS_2102-1 apūrvaḥ ko'pi kopāgniḥ sajjanasya khalasya ca /
analyzed: apūrvaḥ kopi kopa agniḥ sat janasya khalasya ca

original: MSS_2102-2 ekasya śāmyati snehād vardhate'nyasya vāritaḥ //
analyzed: ekasya śāmyati snehāt vardhatenyasya vāritaḥ

original: MSS_2103-1 apūrvaḥ ko'pi kośo'yaṃ vidyate tava bhārati /
analyzed: apūrvaḥ kaḥ api kośaḥ ayam vidyate tava bhārati

original: MSS_2103-2 vyayato vṛddhimāyāti kṣayamāyāti saṃcayāt //
analyzed: vyayataḥ vṛddhim āyāti kṣayam āyāti saṃcayāt

original: MSS_2104-1 apūrvaḥ ko'pi tanvaṅgyā mama mārgaḥ pradarśitaḥ /
analyzed: apūrvaḥ kaḥ api tanu aṅgyā mama mārgaḥ pradarśitaḥ

original: MSS_2104-2 yogaṃ cintayato yena rāga eva vivardhate //
analyzed: yogam cintayataḥ yena rāgaḥ eva vivardhate

original: MSS_2105-1 apūrvakarmacaṇḍālam api mugdhe vimuñca mām /
analyzed: apūrva karma caṇḍālam api mugdhe vimuñca mām

original: MSS_2105-2 śritāsi candanabhrāntyā durvipākaṃ viṣadrumam //
analyzed: śritā asi candana bhrāntyā durvipākam viṣa drumam

original: MSS_2106-1 apūrvadeśādhigame yuvarājābhiṣecane /
analyzed: apūrva deśa adhigame yuvarāja abhiṣecane

original: MSS_2106-2 putrajanmani vā mokṣo bandhanasya vidhīyate //
analyzed: putra janmani vā mokṣaḥ bandhanasya vidhīyate

original: MSS_2107-1 apūrvamadhurāmodapramoditadiśastataḥ /
analyzed: apūrva madhura āmoda pramodita diśaḥ tatas

original: MSS_2107-2 āyayurbhṛṅgamukharāḥ śiraḥ śekharaśālinaḥ //
analyzed: āyayuḥ bhṛṅga mukharāḥ śiraḥ śekhara śālinaḥ

original: MSS_2108-1 apūrvayeva tatkālasamāgamasakāmayā /
analyzed: apūrvayā iva tad kāla samāgama sa kāmayā

original: MSS_2108-2 dṛṣṭena rājan vapuṣā kaṭākṣairvijayaśriyā //
analyzed: dṛṣṭena rājan vapuṣā kaṭākṣaiḥ vijaya śriyā

original: MSS_2109-1 apūrvā rasanāvyālī khalānanabileśayā /
MSS_2109-2 karṇamūle daśatyanyaṃ haratyanyasya jīvitam //
analyzed: karṇa mūle daśati anyam harati anyasya jīvitam

original: MSS_2110-1 apūrvāhlādadāyinya uccaistarapadāśrayāḥ /
analyzed: apūrva āhlāda dāyinyaḥ uccaistara pada āśrayāḥ

original: MSS_2110-2 atimohāpahāriṇyaḥ sūktayo hi mahīyasām //
analyzed: ati moha apahāriṇyaḥ su uktayaḥ hi mahīyasām

original: MSS_2111-1 apūrviṇā na kartavyaṃ karma loke vigarhitam /
analyzed: apūrviṇā na kartavyam karma loke vigarhitam

original: MSS_2111-2 kṛtapūrviṇastu tyajato mahān dharma iti śrutiḥ //
analyzed: kṛta pūrviṇaḥ tu tyajataḥ mahān dharmaḥ iti śrutiḥ

original: MSS_2112-1 apūrveyaṃ dhanurvidyā bhavatā śikṣitā kutaḥ /
analyzed: apūrvā iyam dhanuḥ vidyā bhavatā śikṣitā kutas

original: MSS_2112-2 mārgaṇaughaḥ samāyāti guṇo jāti digantaram //
analyzed: mārgaṇa oghaḥ samāyāti guṇaḥ digantaram

original: MSS_2113-1 apūrvo dṛśyate vahniḥ kāminyāḥ stanamaṇḍale /
analyzed: apūrvaḥ dṛśyate vahniḥ kāminyāḥ stana maṇḍale

original: MSS_2113-2 dūrato dahate gātraṃ gātralagnaḥ suśītalaḥ //
analyzed: dūratas dahate gātram gātra lagnaḥ su śītalaḥ

original: MSS_2114-1 apūrvo bhāti bhāratyāḥ kāvyāmṛtaphale rasaḥ /
analyzed: apūrvaḥ bhāti bhāratyāḥ kāvya amṛta phale rasaḥ

original: MSS_2114-2 carvaṇe sarvasāmānye svāduvit kevalaṃ kaviḥ //
analyzed: carvaṇe sarva sāmānye svādu vid kevalam kaviḥ

original: MSS_2115-1 apūrvo'yaṃ kānte jvalati mukhadīpastava ciraṃ tamo draṣṭ ṇāṃ yo janayatitarāṃ yāti sutano /
analyzed: apūrvaḥ yam kānte jvalati mukha dīpaḥ tava ciram tamaḥ yaḥ janayatitarām yāti su tano

original: MSS_2115-2 adhastādyatreyaṃ bata surabhidhūmālakatatir yadīyā vārtaiva jvalayati pataṃgāniva janān //
analyzed: adhastāt yatrā iyam bata surabhi dhūma alaka tatiḥ yadīyā vārtā eva jvalayati pataṃgān iva janān

original: MSS_2116-1 apūrvo'yaṃ dhanurvedo manmathasya mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: apūrvaḥ yam dhanurvedaḥ manmathasya mahātmanaḥ

original: MSS_2116-2 śarīramakṣataṃ kṛtvā bhinattyantargataṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: śarīram akṣatam kṛtvā bhinatti antargatam manaḥ

original: MSS_2117-1 apūrvo'yaṃ panthāḥ śiva tava vibhutvasya katamo jagadbandho yatte padayugamakāmaṃ praṇamatām /
analyzed: apūrvaḥ yam panthāḥ śiva tava vibhu tvasya katamaḥ jagat bandho yat te pada yugam akāmam praṇamatām

original: MSS_2117-2 prayāti pradhvaṃsaṃ na khalu duritaṃ kevalamidaṃ ciropāttaṃ sadyaḥ sukṛtamapi sarvaṃ vigalati //
analyzed: prayāti pradhvaṃsam na khalu duritam kevalam idam cira upāttam sadyas sukṛtam api sarvam vigalati

original: MSS_2118-1 apūrvo'yaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaḥ kāntaḥ kamalalocane /
analyzed: apūrvaḥ yam mayā dṛṣṭaḥ kāntaḥ kamala locane

original: MSS_2118-2 śo'ntaraṃ yo vijānāti sa vidvannātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ vijānāti sa vidvan na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_2119-1 apṛcchaṃ putradārādīṃs tairukto'haṃ raghattama /
analyzed: apṛccham putra dāra ādīn taiḥ uktā uham raghattama

original: MSS_2119-2 pāpaṃ tavaiva tatsarvaṃ vayaṃ tu phalabhāginaḥ //
analyzed: pāpam tava eva tat sarvam vayam tu phala bhāginaḥ

original: MSS_2120-1 apṛṣṭastasya na brūyād yaśca necchet parābhavam /
analyzed: a pṛṣṭaḥ tasya na brūyāt yaḥ ca na icchet parābhavam

original: MSS_2120-2 eṣa eva satāṃ dharmo viparīto'satāṃ mataḥ //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva satām dharmaḥ viparīta usatām mataḥ

original: MSS_2121-1 apṛṣṭastu naraḥ kiṃcid yo brūte rājasaṃsadi /
analyzed: apṛṣṭaḥ tu naraḥ kiṃcid yaḥ brūte rāja saṃsadi

original: MSS_2121-2 na kevalamasaṃmānaṃ labhate ca viḍambanām //
analyzed: na kevalam asaṃmānam labhate ca viḍambanām

original: MSS_2122-1 apṛṣṭena na vaktavyaḥ sacivena vipaścitā /
analyzed: a pṛṣṭena na vaktavyaḥ sacivena vipaścitā

original: MSS_2122-2 nānuśiṣyādapṛcchantaṃ mahadetaddhi sāhasam //
analyzed: na anuśiṣyāt apṛcchantam mahat etat hi sāhasam

original: MSS_2123-1 apṛṣṭenāpi vaktavyaṃ sacivenātra kiṃcana /
analyzed: apṛṣṭena api vaktavyam sacivena atra kiṃcana

original: MSS_2123-2 pṛṣṭena tu viśeṣeṇa vācyaṃ pathyaṃ mahīpateḥ //
analyzed: pṛṣṭena tu viśeṣeṇa vācyam pathyam mahīpateḥ

original: MSS_2124-1 apṛṣṭo'trāpradhāno yo brūte rājñaḥ puraḥ kudhīḥ /
analyzed: a pṛṣṭa utra a pradhānaḥ yaḥ brūte rājñaḥ puras kudhīḥ

original: MSS_2124-2 na kevalamasaṃmānaṃ labhate ca viḍambanam //
analyzed: na kevalam asaṃmānam labhate ca viḍambanam

original: MSS_2125-1 apṛṣṭvaiva bhavenmūḍhajñānaṃ manasi cintanāt /
analyzed: a pṛṣṭvā eva bhavet mūḍha jñānam manasi cintanāt

original: MSS_2125-2 apūrṇaḥ kurute śabdaṃ na pūrṇaḥ kurute ghaṭaḥ //
analyzed: a pūrṇaḥ kurute śabdam na pūrṇaḥ kurute ghaṭaḥ

original: MSS_2126-1 apekṣante na ca snehaṃ na pātraṃ na daśāntaram /
analyzed: apekṣante na ca sneham na pātram na daśā antaram

original: MSS_2126-2 sadā lokahitāsaktā ratnadīpā ivottamāḥ //
analyzed: sadā loka hita āsaktāḥ ratna dīpāḥ iva uttamāḥ

original: MSS_2127-1 apetāḥ śatrubhyo vayamiti viṣādo'yamaphalaḥ pratīkārastveṣāmaniśamanusaṃdhātumucitaḥ /
analyzed: apetāḥ śatrubhyaḥ vayam iti viṣādaḥ yam aphalaḥ pratīkāraḥ tu eṣām aniśam anusaṃdhātum ucitaḥ

original: MSS_2127-2 jarāsaṃdhādbhagnaḥ saha halabhṛtā dānavaripur jaghānainaṃ paścānna kimanilasūnuḥ priyasakhaḥ //
analyzed: jarāsaṃdhāt bhagnaḥ saha halabhṛtā dānava ripuḥ jaghāna enam paścāt na kim anilasūnuḥ priya sakhaḥ

original: MSS_2128-1 apehi hṛdayādvā me vāme darśanamehi vā /
analyzed: apehi hṛdayāt vā me vāme darśanam ehi vā

original: MSS_2128-2 adūravirahotkaṇṭhāduḥkhaṃ duḥkena sahyate //
analyzed: adūra viraha utkaṇṭhā duḥkham duḥkena sahyate

original: MSS_2129-1 apyakhilālaṃkārā- nākalayanto'pi rasavidaścitram /
analyzed: api akhila alaṃkārāḥ na a kalayantaḥ api rasa vidaḥ citram

original: MSS_2129-2 kalayanti sarasakāvye nālaṃkāraṃ kadācidapi //
analyzed: kalayanti sarasa kāvye na alaṃkāram kadācid api

original: MSS_2130-1 apyagraṇīrmantrakṛtāmṛṣīṇāṃ kuśāgrabuddhe kuśalī guruste /
analyzed: api agraṇīḥ mantra kṛtām ṛṣīṇām kuśa agra buddhe kuśalī guruḥ te

original: MSS_2130-2 yatastvayā jñānamaśeṣamāptaṃ lokena caitanyamivoṣṇaraśmeḥ //
analyzed: yatas tvayā jñānam aśeṣam āptam lokena caitanyam iva uṣṇaraśmeḥ

original: MSS_2131-1 apyatiśayitamanarthaṃ śamayatyarthaṃ samarpayan nṛpatiḥ /
analyzed: api atiśayitam anartham śamayati artham samarpayan nṛpatiḥ

original: MSS_2131-2 tamanarpayan nirarthaṃ prāṇena samaṃ parityajatyartham //
analyzed: tam anarpayān nirartham prāṇena samam parityajati artham

original: MSS_2132-1 apyatyucco bhūmisamaḥ pārthivo'pi na pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: api atyuccaḥ bhūmi samaḥ pārthivaḥ api na pārthivaḥ

original: MSS_2132-2 mānārthaṃ jīvitaṃ tasya kṛte māne na jīvati //
analyzed: māna artham jīvitam tasya kṛte māne na jīvati

original: MSS_2133-1 apyanārabhamāṇasya vibhorutpāditāḥ paraiḥ /
analyzed: api an ārabhamāṇasya vibhoḥ utpāditāḥ paraiḥ

original: MSS_2133-2 vrajanti guṇatāmarthāḥ śabdā iva vihāyasaḥ //
analyzed: vrajanti guṇa tām arthāḥ śabdāḥ iva vihāyasaḥ

original: MSS_2134-1 apyanāvarjitāḥ svena phalarāgeṇa saṃnatāḥ /
analyzed: api an āvarjitāḥ svena phala rāgeṇa saṃnatāḥ

original: MSS_2134-2 arbhakairapi gṛhyante sādhusaṃtānaśākhinaḥ //
analyzed: arbhakaiḥ api gṛhyante sādhu saṃtāna śākhinaḥ

original: MSS_2135-1 apyanekairupacitair durvinītaiḥ sutairalam /
analyzed: api anekaiḥ upacitaiḥ durvinītaiḥ sutaiḥ alam

original: MSS_2135-2 nidarśanaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ śataṃ duryodhanādayaḥ //
analyzed: nidarśanam dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ śatam duryodhana ādayaḥ

original: MSS_2136-1 apyabhīṣṭā na labhyante saṃtyaktā na tyajanti ca /
analyzed: api abhīṣṭāḥ na labhyante saṃtyaktāḥ na tyajanti ca

original: MSS_2136-2 vāsanā iva saṃsāre mohanaikaparāḥ striyaḥ //
analyzed: vāsanāḥ iva saṃsāre mohana eka parāḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_2137-1 apyaśakyaṃ tvayā dattaṃ duḥkhaṃ śakyantarātmani /
analyzed: api aśakyam tvayā dattam duḥkham śaki antarātmani

original: MSS_2137-2 bāṣpo vāhīkanārīṇāṃ vegavāhī kapolayoḥ //
analyzed: bāṣpaḥ vāhīka nārīṇām vega vāhī kapolayoḥ

original: MSS_2138-1 apyākarasamutpannamaṇijātirasaṃskṛtā /
analyzed: api ākara samutpanna maṇi jātiḥ asaṃskṛtā

original: MSS_2138-2 jātarūpeṇa kalyāṇi na hi saṃyogamarhati //
analyzed: jātarūpeṇa kalyāṇi na hi saṃyogam arhati

original: MSS_2139-1 apyātmano vināśaṃ gaṇayati na khalaḥ paravyasanahṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: api ātmanaḥ vināśam gaṇayati na khalaḥ para vyasana hṛṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_2139-2 prāyo mastakanāśe samaramukhe nṛtyati kabandhaḥ //
analyzed: prāyas mastaka nāśe samara mukhe nṛtyati kabandhaḥ

original: MSS_2140-1 apyāpatsamayaḥ sādhoḥ prayāti ślāghanīyatām /
analyzed: api āpad samayaḥ sādhoḥ prayāti ślāghanīya tām

original: MSS_2140-2 vidhorvidhuṃtudāskandavipatkālo'pi sundaraḥ //
analyzed: sundaraḥ

original: MSS_2141-1 apyāmīlitapaṅkajāṃ kamalinīmapyullasatpallavāṃ vāsantīmapi saudhabhittipatitāmātmapraticchāyikām /
analyzed: api āmīlita paṅkajām kamalinīm api ullasat pallavām vāsantīm api saudha bhitti patitām ātma praticchāyikām

original: MSS_2141-2 manvānaḥ prathamaṃ priyeti pulakasvedaprakampākulaṃ prītyāliṅgati nāsti seti na punaḥ khedottaraṃ mūrcchati //
analyzed: manvānaḥ prathamam priyā iti pulaka sveda prakampa ākulam prītyā āliṅgati na asti sā iti na punar kheda uttaram mūrcchati

original: MSS_2142-1 apyutkaṭe ca raudre ca śatrau yasya na hīyate /
analyzed: api utkaṭe ca raudre ca śatrau yasya na hīyate

original: MSS_2142-2 dhairyaṃ prāpte mahīpasya na sa yāti parābhavam //
analyzed: dhairyam prāpte mahīpasya na sa yāti parābhavam

original: MSS_2143-1 apyunnatapadārūḍhaḥ pūjyān naivāpamānayet /
analyzed: api unnata pada ārūḍhaḥ pūjyān na eva apamānayet

original: MSS_2143-2 nahuṣaḥ śakratāṃ prāpya cyuto'gastyāvamānanāt //
analyzed: nahuṣaḥ śakra tām prāpya cyuta ugastya avamānanāt

original: MSS_2144-1 apyunmattāt pralapato bālācca parisarpataḥ /
analyzed: api unmattāt pralapataḥ bālāt ca parisarpataḥ

original: MSS_2144-2 sarvataḥ sāramādadyād aśmabhya iva kāñcanam //
analyzed: sarvatas sāram ādadyāt aśmabhyaḥ iva kāñcanam

original: MSS_2145-1 apyupāyaistribhistāta yo'rthaḥ prāptuṃ na śakyate /
analyzed: api upāyaiḥ tribhiḥ tāta yaḥ ṛthaḥ prāptum na śakyate

original: MSS_2145-2 tasya vikramakālāṃstān yuktānāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: tasya vikrama kālān tān yuktān āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_2146-1 apyuddāmavyasanasaraṇeḥ saṃgame kāmukānāṃ bhadraṃ bhadre bhuvanajayinastvatkalākaulaśasya /
analyzed: api uddāma vyasana saraṇeḥ saṃgame kāmukānām bhadram bhadre bhuvana jayinaḥ tvad kalā kaulaśasya

original: MSS_2146-2 apyutsāhapracurasuhṛdaḥ kāmakelīnivāsāḥ prauḍhotsāhāstava suvadane svastimanto vilāsāḥ //
analyzed: api utsāha pracura suhṛdaḥ kāma kelī nivāsāḥ prauḍha utsāhāḥ tava su vadane svastimantaḥ vilāsāḥ

original: MSS_2147-1 apyekavaṃśajanuṣoḥ paśyata pūrṇatvatucchatābhājoḥ /
analyzed: api eka vaṃśa januṣoḥ paśyata pūrṇa tva tuccha tā bhājoḥ

original: MSS_2147-2 jyākārmukayoḥ kaścid guṇabhūtaḥ kaścidapi bhartā //
analyzed: jyā kārmukayoḥ kaścid guṇa bhūtaḥ kaścid api bhartā

original: MSS_2148-1 apyetadrajanīmayaṃ jagadatho nidrāmayī sā niśā nidrā svapnamayī bhavedatha ca sa svapno mṛgākṣīmayaḥ /
analyzed: api etat rajanī mayam jagat atho nidrā mayī sā niśā nidrā svapna mayī bhavet atha ca sa svapnaḥ mṛgākṣī mayaḥ

original: MSS_2148-2 seyaṃ mānamayī mama priyatamā taccāṭuceṣṭāmayo mādṛk kveti samīhitaikavidhaye saṃkalpa tubhyaṃ namaḥ //
analyzed: sā iyam māna mayī mama priyatamā tad cāṭu ceṣṭā mayaḥ mādṛś kva iti samīhita eka vidhaye saṃkalpa tubhyam namaḥ

original: MSS_2149-1 apyeva dahanaṃ spṛṣṭvā vane tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ /
analyzed: api eva dahanam spṛṣṭvā vane tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ

original: MSS_2149-2 rājadoṣaparāmṛṣṭās tiṣṭhante nāparādhinaḥ //
analyzed: rāja doṣa parāmṛṣṭāḥ tiṣṭhante na aparādhinaḥ

original: MSS_2150-1 apyautsukye mahati dayitaprārthanāsu pratīpāḥ kāṅkṣantyo'pi vyatikarasukhaṃ kātarāḥ svāṅgadāne /
analyzed: api autsukye mahati dayita prārthanāsu pratīpāḥ kāṅkṣantyaḥ api vyatikara sukham kātarāḥ sva aṅga dāne

original: MSS_2150-2 ābādhyante na khalu madanenaiva labdhāntaratvād ābādhante manasijamapi kṣiptakālāḥ kumāryaḥ //
analyzed: ābādhyante na khalu madanena eva labdha antara tvāt ābādhante manasijam api kṣipta kālāḥ kumāryaḥ

original: MSS_2151-1 aprakaṭavartitastana- maṇḍalikānibhṛtacakradarśinyaḥ /
analyzed: aprakaṭa vartita stana maṇḍalikā nibhṛta cakra darśinyaḥ

original: MSS_2151-2 āveśayanti hṛdayaṃ smaracaryāguptayoginyaḥ //
analyzed: āveśayanti hṛdayam smara caryā gupta yoginyaḥ

original: MSS_2152-1 aprakaṭīkṛtaśaktiḥ śakto'pi janāt tiraskriyāṃ labhate /
analyzed: a prakaṭīkṛta śaktiḥ śaktaḥ api janāt tiraskriyām labhate

original: MSS_2152-2 nivasannantardāruṇi laṅghyo vahnirna tu jvalitaḥ //
analyzed: nivasan antar dāruṇi laṅghyaḥ vahniḥ na tu jvalitaḥ

original: MSS_2153-1 apragalbhasya yā vidyā kṛpaṇasya ca yaddhanam /
analyzed: a pragalbhasya yā vidyā kṛpaṇasya ca yat dhanam

original: MSS_2153-2 yacca bāhubalaṃ bhīror vyarthametat trayaṃ bhuvi //
analyzed: yat ca bāhu balam bhīroḥ vyartham etat trayam bhuvi

original: MSS_2154-1 apragalbhāḥ padanyāse jananīrāgahetavaḥ /
analyzed: a pragalbhāḥ padanyāse jananī rāga hetavaḥ

original: MSS_2154-2 santyeke bahulālāpāḥ kavayo bālakā iva //
analyzed: santi eke bahula ālāpāḥ kavayaḥ bālakāḥ iva

original: MSS_2155-1 apraṇodyo'tithiḥ sāyaṃ sūryoḍho gṛhamedhinā /
analyzed: a praṇodya utithiḥ sāyam sūrya ūḍhaḥ gṛhamedhinā

original: MSS_2155-2 kāle prāptastvakāle vā nāsyānaśnan gṛhe vaset //
analyzed: kāle prāptaḥ tu akāle vā na asya an aśnan gṛhe vaset

original: MSS_2156-1 apraṇādyo'tithiḥ sāyaṃ sūryoḍho gṛhamedhinām /
analyzed: a praṇādya utithiḥ sāyam sūrya ūḍhaḥ gṛhamedhinām

original: MSS_2156-2 pūjayā tasya devatvaṃ prayānti gṛhamedhinaḥ //
analyzed: pūjayā tasya deva tvam prayānti gṛhamedhinaḥ

original: MSS_2157-1 apratikṛtyātmānaṃ sahasānartheṣu na pravarteta /
analyzed: a pratikṛtya ātmānam sahasā anartheṣu na pravarteta

original: MSS_2157-2 śirasi dhṛte'mṛtakiraṇe viṣamaghasadviṣamanetro'pi //
analyzed: śirasi dhṛta imṛta kiraṇe

original: MSS_2158-1 apratibuddhe śrotari vakturvākyaṃ prayāti vaiphalyam /
analyzed: apratibuddhe śrotari vaktuḥ vākyam prayāti vaiphalyam

original: MSS_2158-2 nayanavihīne bhartari lāvaṇyamiveha khañjanākṣīṇām //
analyzed: nayana vihīne bhartari lāvaṇyam iva iha khañjana akṣīṇām

original: MSS_2159-1 apratiṣṭhāśca ye kecid adharmaśaraṇāśca ye /
analyzed: apratiṣṭhāḥ ca ye kecid adharma śaraṇāḥ ca ye

original: MSS_2159-2 teṣāṃ pratiṣṭhā gaṅgeha śaraṇaṃ śarma varma ca //
analyzed: teṣām pratiṣṭhā gaṅgā iha śaraṇam śarma varma ca

original: MSS_2160-1 apratyakṣāṇi śāstrāṇi vivādastatra kevalam /
analyzed: apratyakṣāṇi śāstrāṇi vivādaḥ tatra kevalam

original: MSS_2160-2 pratyakṣaṃ jyautiṣaṃ śāstraṃ candrārkau yatra sākṣiṇau //
analyzed: pratyakṣam jyautiṣam śāstram candra arkau yatra sākṣiṇau

original: MSS_2161-1 apratyākalitaprabhāvavibhave sarvāśrayāmbhonidhau vāso nālpatapaḥphalaṃ yadaparaṃ doṣo'yameko mahān /
analyzed: a pratyākalita prabhāva vibhave sarva āśraya ambhonidhau vāsaḥ na alpa tapaḥ phalam yat aparam doṣaḥ yam ekaḥ mahān

original: MSS_2161-2 śambūko'pi yadatra durlabhatarai ratnairanarghaiḥ saha spardhāmekanivāsakāraṇavaśādekāntato vāñchati //
analyzed: śambūkaḥ api yat atra durlabhataraiḥ ratnaiḥ anarghaiḥ saha spardhām eka nivāsa kāraṇa vaśāt ekāntataḥ vāñchati

original: MSS_2162-1 apradātā samṛddho'sau daridraśca mahāmanāḥ /
analyzed: apradātā samṛddhaḥ asau daridraḥ ca mahā manāḥ

original: MSS_2162-2 aśrutaśca samunnaddhas tamāhurmūḍhacetasam //
analyzed: aśrutaḥ ca samunnaddhaḥ tam āhuḥ mūḍha cetasam

original: MSS_2163-1 apradīpā yathā rātrir anādityaṃ yathā nabhaḥ /
analyzed: a pradīpā yathā rātriḥ an ādityam yathā nabhaḥ

original: MSS_2163-2 tathāsāṃvatsaro rājā bhramatyandha ivādhvani //
analyzed: tathā asāṃvatsaraḥ rājā bhramati andhaḥ iva adhvani

original: MSS_2164-1 apradhānaḥ pradhānaḥ syāt pārthivaṃ yadi sevate /
analyzed: apradhānaḥ pradhānaḥ syāt pārthivam yadi sevate

original: MSS_2164-2 pradhāno'pyapradhānaḥ syād yadi sevāvivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: pradhānaḥ upi apradhānaḥ syāt yadi sevā vivarjitaḥ

original: MSS_2165-1 aprabhūtamatanīyasi tanvī kāñcidhāmni pihitaikataroru /
analyzed: a prabhūta matanīyasi tanvī kāñci dhāmni pihita eka tara ūru

original: MSS_2165-2 kṣaumamākulakarā vicakarṣa krāntapallavamabhīṣṭatamena //
analyzed: kṣaumam ākula karā vicakarṣa krānta pallavam abhīṣṭatamena

original: MSS_2166-1 apramattaśca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ /
analyzed: apramattaḥ ca yaḥ rājā sarva jñaḥ vijita indriyaḥ

original: MSS_2166-2 kṛtajño dharmaśīlaśca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram //
analyzed: kṛtajñaḥ dharma śīlaḥ ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram

original: MSS_2167-1 apramatte'pi puruṣe hitakāryāvalambini /
analyzed: apramatte pi puruṣe hita kārya avalambini

original: MSS_2167-2 daivamunmārgarasikam anyathaiva pramadyate //
analyzed: daivam unmārga rasikam anyathā eva pramadyate

original: MSS_2168-1 apramādaśca kartavyas tvayā rājñaḥ samāśraye /
analyzed: apramādaḥ ca kartavyaḥ tvayā rājñaḥ samāśraye

original: MSS_2168-2 tvadīyasya śarīrasya vayaṃ bhāgyopajīvinaḥ //
analyzed: tvadīyasya śarīrasya vayam bhāgya upajīvinaḥ

original: MSS_2169-1 aprasannamaparāddhari patyau kopadīptamurarīkṛtadhairyam /
analyzed: aprasannam aparādh hari patyau kopa dīptam urarīkṛta dhairyam

original: MSS_2169-2 kṣālitaṃ nu śamitaṃ nu vadhūnāṃ drāvitaṃ nu hṛdayaṃ madhuvāraiḥ //
analyzed: kṣālitam nu śamitam nu vadhūnām drāvitam nu hṛdayam madhuvāraiḥ

original: MSS_2170-1 aprasādo'nadhiṣṭhānaṃ deyāṃśaharaṇaṃ ca yat /
MSS_2170-2 kālayāpo'pratīkāras tad vairāgyasya kāraṇam //
MSS_2171-1 aprastāvastutibhiraniśaṃ karṇaśūlaṃ karoti svaṃ dāridryaṃ vadati vasanaṃ darśayatyeva jīrṇam /
analyzed: aprastāva stutibhiḥ aniśam karṇa śūlam karoti svam dāridryam vadati vasanam darśayati eva jīrṇam

original: MSS_2171-2 chāyābhūtaścalati na puraḥ pārśvayornaiva paścān niḥsvaḥ khedaṃ diśati dhanināṃ vyādhivadduścikitsyaḥ //
analyzed: chāyā bhūtaḥ calati na puras pārśvayoḥ nā eva paścāt niḥsvaḥ khedam diśati dhaninām vyādhi vat duścikitsyaḥ

original: MSS_2172-1 aprākṛtaḥ sa kathamastu na vismayāya yasminnuvāsa karuṇā ca kṛtajñatā ca /
analyzed: aprākṛtaḥ sa katham astu na vismayāya yasmin uvāsa karuṇā ca kṛtajña tā ca

original: MSS_2172-2 lakṣmīśca sāttvikaguṇajvalitaṃ ca tejo dharmaśca mānavinayau ca parākramaśca //
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ ca sāttvika guṇa jvalitam ca tejaḥ dharmaḥ ca māna vinayau ca parākramaḥ ca

original: MSS_2173-1 aprākṛtasya cāritātiśayasya bhāvair atyadbhutairmama hṛtasya tathāpyanāsthā /
analyzed: aprākṛtasya cāritā atiśayasya bhāvaiḥ ati adbhutaiḥ mama hṛtasya tathā api anāsthā

original: MSS_2173-2 ko'pyeṣa vīraśiśukākṛtiraprameya- sāmarthyasārasamudāyamayaḥ padārthaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ pi eṣa vīra śiśuka ākṛtiḥ aprameya sāmarthya sāra samudāya mayaḥ padārthaḥ

original: MSS_2174-1 aprākṛtasyāhavadurmadasya nivāryamasyāstrabalena vīryam /
analyzed: aprākṛtasya āhava durmadasya nivāryam asya astra balena vīryam

original: MSS_2174-2 alpīyaso'pyāmayatulyavṛtter mahāpakārāya riporvivṛddhiḥ //
analyzed: alpīyasaḥ upi āmaya tulya vṛtteḥ mahā apakārāya ripoḥ vivṛddhiḥ

original: MSS_2175-1 aprājñena ca kātareṇa ca guṇaḥ syād bhaktiyuktena kaḥ prajñāvikramaśālino'pi hi bhavet kiṃ bhaktihīnāt phalam /
analyzed: aprājñena ca kātareṇa ca guṇaḥ syāt bhakti yuktena kaḥ prajñā vikrama śālinaḥ upi hi bhavet kim bhakti hīnāt phalam

original: MSS_2175-2 prajñāvikramabhaktayaḥ samuditā yeṣāṃ guṇā bhūtaye te bhṛtyā nṛpateḥ kalatramitare saṃpatsu cāpatsu ca //
analyzed: prajñā vikrama bhaktayaḥ samuditāḥ yeṣām guṇāḥ bhūtaye te bhṛtyāḥ nṛpateḥ kalatram itare saṃpatsu ca āpatsu ca

original: MSS_2176-1 aprāptakālaṃ vacanaṃ bṛhaspatirapi bruvan /
analyzed: aprāpta kālam vacanam bṛhaspatiḥ api bruvan

original: MSS_2176-2 labhate buddhyavajñānam avamānaṃ ca bhārata //
analyzed: labhate buddhi avajñānam avamānam ca bhārata

original: MSS_2177-1 aprāptakālavacanaṃ bṛhaspatirapi bruvan /
analyzed: aprāpta kāla vacanam bṛhaspatiḥ api bruvan

original: MSS_2177-2 prāpnuyād buddhiśaithilyam apamānaṃ ca śāśvatam //
analyzed: prāpnuyāt buddhi śaithilyam apamānam ca śāśvatam

original: MSS_2178-1 aprāptakālo yo mūrkho haset svecchānusārataḥ /
analyzed: aprāpta kālaḥ yaḥ mūrkhaḥ haset sva icchā anusārataḥ

original: MSS_2178-2 prāpnuyād buddhyavajñānaṃ sabhāyāṃ caiva śāśvatam //
analyzed: prāpnuyāt buddhi avajñānam sabhāyām ca eva śāśvatam

original: MSS_2179-1 aprāptakelisukhayoratimānaruddha- saṃdhānayo rahasi jātaruṣorakasmāt /
analyzed: a prāpta keli sukhayoḥ ati māna ruddha saṃdhānayoḥ rahasi jāta   akasmāt

original: MSS_2179-2 yūnormitho'bhilaṣatoḥ prathamānunītiṃ bhāvāḥ prasādapiśunāḥ kṣapayanti nidrām //
analyzed: yūnoḥ mithas abhilaṣatoḥ prathama anunītim bhāvāḥ prasāda piśunāḥ kṣapayanti nidrām

original: MSS_2180-1 aprāptapuṣpodgamavibhramaiva ruddhā bhujaṅgena tathā yatheyam /
analyzed: a prāpta puṣpa udgama vibhramā eva ruddhā bhujaṅgena tathā yathā iyam

original: MSS_2180-2 na śakyate spraṣṭumapīhamānair āmodinī candanaśākhikeva //
analyzed: na śakyate spraṣṭum api īhamānaiḥ āmodinī candana śākhikā iva

original: MSS_2181-1 aprāptaprathamāvakartanaruṣā vyānamramūkībhavad- vakreṣvanyaśiraḥsu yasya dahane chinnaṃ śiro juhvataḥ /
analyzed: a prāpta prathama avakartana ruṣā vyānamra mūkībhavat vakreṣu anya śiraḥsu yasya dahane chinnam śiraḥ juhvataḥ

original: MSS_2181-2 uccārya svayameva mantramakaronnāsyāhamityātmanas tyāgaṃ paṅktimukhaḥ sa vikramasuhṛdvīraḥ kathaṃ varṇyate //
analyzed: uccārya svayam eva mantram akarot na asya aham iti ātmanaḥ tyāgam paṅkti mukhaḥ sa vikrama suhṛd vīraḥ katham varṇyate

original: MSS_2182-1 aprāptayauvanā nārī na kāmāya na śāntaye /
analyzed: aprāpta yauvanā nārī na kāmāya na śāntaye

original: MSS_2182-2 saṃprāpte ṣoḍaśe varṣe gardabhī cāpsarāyate //
analyzed: saṃprāpte ṣoḍaśe varṣe gardabhī ca apsarāyate

original: MSS_2183-1 aprāptavallabhasamāgamanādhikāyāḥ sakhyāḥ puro'tra nijacittavinodabuddhyā /
analyzed: aprāpta vallabha samāgamana adhikāyāḥ sakhyāḥ puras tra nija citta vinoda buddhyā

original: MSS_2183-2 ālāpaveṣagatihāsyavikatthanādyaiḥ prāṇeśvarānukṛtimākalayanti līlām //
analyzed: ālāpa veṣa gati hāsya vikatthana ādyaiḥ prāṇeśvara anukṛtim ākalayanti līlām

original: MSS_2184-1 aprāpye'pi yathā kāme dharme cintā na kiṃ tathā /
analyzed: a prāpye ipi yathā kāme dharme cintā na kim tathā

original: MSS_2184-2 alābhe'pi dvayorekā bhayadā śivadāparā //
analyzed: alābhe api dvayoḥ ekā bhaya dā śiva dā aparā

original: MSS_2185-1 aprāpyeṣurudāsitāsiraśanerārāt kutaḥ śaṅkutaś cakravyutkramakṛt parokṣaparaśuḥ śūlena śūnyā yayā /
analyzed: a prāpya iṣuḥ udāsita asiḥ aśaneḥ ārāt kutas śaṅkutaḥ cakra vyutkrama kṛt parokṣa paraśuḥ śūlena śūnyā yayā

original: MSS_2185-2 mṛtyurdaityapateḥ kṛtaḥ sa sadṛśaḥ pādāṅgulīparvataḥ pārvatyā pratipālyatāṃ tribhuvanaṃ niḥśalyakalyaṃ tayā //
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ daitya pateḥ kṛtaḥ sa sadṛśaḥ pāda aṅgulī parvataḥ pārvatyā pratipālyatām tribhuvanam niḥśalya kalyam tayā

original: MSS_2186-1 aprāmāṇyaṃ ca vedānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ cātilaṅghanam /
analyzed: a prāmāṇyam ca vedānām śāstrāṇām ca atilaṅghanam

original: MSS_2186-2 sarvatra cānavasthānam etannāśanamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: sarvatra ca anavasthānam etat nāśanam ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_2187-1 aprārthanamasaṃsparśam asaṃdarśanameva ca /
analyzed: a prārthanam a saṃsparśam a saṃdarśanam eva ca

original: MSS_2187-2 puruṣasyeha niyamo bhavedrāgaprahāṇaye //
analyzed: puruṣasya iha niyamaḥ bhavet rāga prahāṇaye

original: MSS_2188-1 aprārthitaṃ yathā duḥkhaṃ tathā sukhamapi svayam /
analyzed: a prārthitam yathā duḥkham tathā sukham api svayam

original: MSS_2188-2 prāṇinaṃ pratipadyeta sarvaṃ niyatiyantritam //
analyzed: prāṇinam pratipadyeta sarvam niyati yantritam

original: MSS_2189-1 apriyaṃ na hi bhāṣeta na virudhyeta kenacit /
analyzed: apriyam na hi bhāṣeta na virudhyeta kenacid

original: MSS_2189-2 kāryasiddhiṃ samīheta kāryabhraṃśo hi mūrkhatā //
analyzed: kārya siddhim samīheta kārya bhraṃśaḥ hi mūrkha tā

original: MSS_2190-1 apriyaṃ puruṣa cāpi paradrohaṃ parastriyam /
analyzed: apriyam ca api para droham para striyam

original: MSS_2190-2 adharmamanṛtaṃ caiva dūrāt prājño vivarjayet //
analyzed: adharmam anṛtam ca eva dūrāt prājñaḥ vivarjayet

original: MSS_2191-1 apriyaṃ yasya kurvīta bhūyas tasya priyaṃ caret /
analyzed: apriyam yasya kurvīta bhūyas tasya priyam caret

original: MSS_2191-2 acireṇa priyaḥ sa syād yo'priyaḥ priyamācaret //
analyzed: acireṇa priyaḥ sa syāt yaḥ priyaḥ priyam ācaret

original: MSS_2192-1 apriyamuktāḥ puruṣāḥ prayatante dviguṇamapriyaṃ vaktum /
analyzed: apriya muktāḥ puruṣāḥ prayatante dviguṇam apriyam vaktum

original: MSS_2192-2 tasmādavācyamapriyam apriyamaśrotukāmena //
analyzed: tasmāt avācyam apriyam apriyam aśrotu kāmena

original: MSS_2193-1 apriyavacanadaridraiḥ priyavacanāḍhyaiḥ svadāraparituṣṭaiḥ /
analyzed: apriya vacana daridraiḥ priya vacana āḍhyaiḥ sva dāra parituṣṭaiḥ

original: MSS_2193-2 paraparivādanivṛttaiḥ kvacit kvacin maṇḍitā vasudhā //
analyzed: para parivāda nivṛttaiḥ kvacid kvacid maṇḍitā vasudhā

original: MSS_2194-1 apriyavacanāṅgārair dagdho'pi na vipriyaṃ vadatyāryaḥ /
analyzed: apriya vacana aṅgāraiḥ dagdhaḥ api na vipriyam vadati āryaḥ

original: MSS_2194-2 kiṃ dahyamānamagaru svabhāvasurabhiṃ parityajati //
analyzed: kim dahyamānam agaru svabhāva surabhim parityajati

original: MSS_2195-1 apriyasyāpi vacasaḥ pariṇāmāvirodhinaḥ /
analyzed: apriyasya api vacasaḥ pariṇāma avirodhinaḥ

original: MSS_2195-2 vaktā śrotā ca yatrāsti ramante tatra saṃpadaḥ //
analyzed: vaktā śrotā ca yatra asti ramante tatra saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_2196-1 apriyāṇyapi kurvantaḥ svārthāyodyata ceṣṭitāḥ /
analyzed: apriyāṇi api kurvantaḥ sva arthāya udyata ceṣṭitāḥ

original: MSS_2196-2 paṇḍitā nopalabhyante vāyasairiva kokilāḥ //
analyzed: paṇḍitāḥ na upalabhyante vāyasaiḥ iva kokilāḥ

original: MSS_2197-1 apriyāṇyapi kurvāṇo niṣṭhurāṇyapi ca bruvan /
analyzed: apriyāṇi api kurvāṇaḥ niṣṭhurāṇi api ca bruvan

original: MSS_2197-2 cetaḥ prahlādayatyeva sarvāvasthāsu vallabhaḥ //
analyzed: cetaḥ prahlādayati eva sarva avasthāsu vallabhaḥ

original: MSS_2198-1 apriyāṇyapi kurvāṇo yaḥ priyaḥ priya eva saḥ /
analyzed: apriyāṇi api kurvāṇaḥ yaḥ priyaḥ priyaḥ eva saḥ

original: MSS_2198-2 dagdhamandirasāre'pi kasya vahnāvanādaraḥ //
analyzed: dagdha mandira sāre pi kasya vahnau anādaraḥ

original: MSS_2199-1 apriyāṇyapi pathyāni ye vadanti nṛṇāmiha /
analyzed: apriyāṇi api pathyāni ye vadanti nṛṇām iha

original: MSS_2199-2 ta eva suhṛdaḥ proktā anye syurnāmadhārakāḥ //
analyzed: te eva suhṛdaḥ proktāḥ anye syuḥ nāma dhārakāḥ

original: MSS_2200-1 apriyā na bhaviṣyanti priyo me na bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: apriyāḥ na bhaviṣyanti priyaḥ me na bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_2200-2 ahaṃ ca na bhaviṣyāmi sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: aham ca na bhaviṣyāmi sarvam ca na bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_2201-1 apriyaiḥ saha saṃvāsaḥ priyaiścāpi vinābhavaḥ /
analyzed: apriyaiḥ saha saṃvāsaḥ priyaiḥ ca api vinābhavaḥ

original: MSS_2201-2 asadbhiḥ saṃprayogaśca tadduḥkhaṃ cirajīvinām //
analyzed: asadbhiḥ saṃprayogaḥ ca tad duḥkham cira jīvinām

original: MSS_2202-1 apriyairapi niṣpiṣṭaiḥ kiṃ syāt kleśāsahiṣṇubhiḥ /
analyzed: apriyaiḥ api niṣpiṣṭaiḥ kim syāt kleśa a sahiṣṇubhiḥ

original: MSS_2202-2 ye tadunmūlane śaktā jigīṣā teṣu śobhate //
analyzed: ye tad unmūlane śaktāḥ jigīṣā teṣu śobhate

original: MSS_2203-1 apriyo'pi hi pathyaḥ syād iti vṛddhānuśāsanam /
analyzed: apriyaḥ api hi pathyaḥ syāt iti vṛddha anuśāsanam

original: MSS_2203-2 vṛddhānuśāsane tiṣṭhan priyatāmupagacchati //
analyzed: vṛddha anuśāsane tiṣṭhan priya tām upagacchati

original: MSS_2204-1 aprītāṃ rogiṇīṃ nārīm antarvatnīṃ dhṛtavratām /
analyzed: a prītām rogiṇīm nārīm antarvatnīm dhṛta vratām

original: MSS_2204-2 rajasvalāmakāmāṃ ca na kāmeta balāt pumān //
analyzed: rajasvalām akāmām ca na kāmeta balāt pumān

original: MSS_2205-1 apsu plavante pāṣāṇā mānuṣā ghnanti rākṣasān /
analyzed: apsu plavante pāṣāṇāḥ mānuṣāḥ ghnanti rākṣasān

original: MSS_2205-2 kapayaḥ karma kurvanti kālasya kuṭilā gatiḥ //
analyzed: kapayaḥ karma kurvanti kālasya kuṭilā gatiḥ

original: MSS_2206-1 apsvātmānaṃ na vīkṣeta nāvagāhet payorayam /
analyzed: apsu ātmānam na vīkṣeta na avagāhet payoḥ ayam

original: MSS_2206-2 saṃdigdhanāvaṃ nārohen na bāhubhyāṃ nadīṃ taret //
analyzed: saṃdigdha nāvam na ārohet na bāhubhyām nadīm taret

original: MSS_2206A-1 aphalaṃ śrāddham apātre dhanam aphalaṃ yat na dattamarthibhyaḥ /
analyzed: aphalam śrāddham apātre dhanam aphalam yat na dattam arthibhyaḥ

original: MSS_2206A-2 yauvanamaphalaṃ yaminaś śrutamaphalaṃ durvinītasya //
analyzed: yauvanam aphalam yaminaḥ śrutam aphalam durvinītasya

original: MSS_2207-1 aphalasyāpi vṛkṣasya chāyā bhavati śītalā /
analyzed: aphalasya api vṛkṣasya chāyā bhavati śītalā

original: MSS_2207-2 nirguṇo'pi varaṃ bandhur yaḥ paraḥ para eva saḥ //
analyzed: nirguṇaḥ api varam bandhuḥ yaḥ paraḥ paraḥ eva saḥ

original: MSS_2208-1 aphalāni durantāni samavyayaphalāni ca /
analyzed: aphalāni durantāni sama vyaya phalāni ca

original: MSS_2208-2 aśakyāni ca kāryāṇi nārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: aśakyāni ca kāryāṇi na ārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_2209-1 abandhuṣvapi bandhutvaṃ snehāt samupajāyate /
analyzed: abandhuṣu api bandhu tvam snehāt samupajāyate

original: MSS_2209-2 bandhuṣvapi ca bandhutvam alokajñeṣu hīyate //
analyzed: bandhuṣu api ca bandhu tvam aloka jñeṣu hīyate

original: MSS_2210-1 abalaḥ pronnataṃ śatruṃ yo yāti madamohitaḥ /
analyzed: abalaḥ pronnatam śatrum yaḥ yāti mada mohitaḥ

original: MSS_2210-2 yuddhārthaṃ sa nivarteta śīrṇadanto yathā gajaḥ //
analyzed: yuddha artham sa nivarteta śīrṇa dantaḥ yathā gajaḥ

original: MSS_2211-1 abalasvakulāśino jhaṣān nijanīḍadrumapīḍinaḥ khagān /
analyzed: abala sva kula āśinaḥ jhaṣān nija nīḍa druma pīḍinaḥ khagān

original: MSS_2211-2 anavadyatṛṇārdino mṛgān mṛgayāghāya na bhūbhujāṃ ghnatām //
analyzed: anavadya tṛṇa ardinaḥ mṛgān mṛgayā aghāya na bhūbhujām ghnatām

original: MSS_2212-1 abalāṃ balinā nītāṃ daśāmimāṃ makaraketunā rakṣa /
analyzed: abalām balinā nītām daśām imām makaraketunā rakṣa

original: MSS_2212-2 āpatpatitoddhṛtaye bhavati hi śubhajanmanāṃ janma //
analyzed: āpad patita uddhṛtaye bhavati hi śubha janmanām janma

original: MSS_2213-1 abalā api vīreśān yatsāhāyyamupāśritāḥ /
analyzed: abalāḥ api vīra īśān yad sāhāyyam upāśritāḥ

original: MSS_2213-2 parābhavanti dṛkkoṇapātenaiva sa manmathaḥ //
analyzed: parābhavanti dṛś koṇa pātena eva sa manmathaḥ

original: MSS_2214-1 abalāḍhyavigrahaśrīr amartyanatirakṣamālayopetaḥ /
MSS_2214-2 pañcakramoditamukhaḥ pāyāt parameśvaro muhuranādiḥ //
MSS_2215-1 abalābuddhihīnāyā doṣaṃ kṣantuṃ sadārhasi /
analyzed: abala abuddhi hīnāyāḥ doṣam kṣantum sadā arhasi

original: MSS_2215-2 mūḍhasya satataṃ doṣaṃ kṣamāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ //
analyzed: mūḍhasya satatam doṣam kṣamām kurvanti sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_2216-1 abalā yatra prabalā śiśuravanīśo nirakṣaro mantrī /
analyzed: abalā yatra prabalā śiśuḥ avanīśaḥ nirakṣaraḥ mantrī

original: MSS_2216-2 nahi nahi tatra dhanāśā jīvita āśāpi durlabhā bhavati //
analyzed: nahi nahi tatra dhana āśā jīvite āśā api durlabhā bhavati

original: MSS_2217-1 abalāvanapara eko bhuvanatritaye'pi cettadā bharttā /
analyzed: abalā vana paraḥ ekaḥ bhuvana tritaye pi ced tadā bharttā

original: MSS_2217-2 kathamanyathā sudhākara- candanamukhyāpriyatvaṃ syāt //
analyzed: katham anyathā sudhākara candana mukhya apriya tvam syāt

original: MSS_2218-1 abalā viṣaheta kathaṃ dṛḍhaśaktimamuṣya ratirasaprasaram /
analyzed: abalā viṣaheta katham dṛḍha śaktim amuṣya rati rasa prasaram

original: MSS_2218-2 madanatulitānurāgo na vidadhyādyadi balādhānam //
analyzed: madana tulita anurāgaḥ na vidadhyāt yadi bala ādhānam

original: MSS_2219-1 abalāsu vilāsino'nvabhūvan nayanaireva navopagūhanāni /
analyzed: abalāsu vilāsinaḥ nvabhūvan nayanaiḥ eva nava upagūhanāni

original: MSS_2219-2 marudāgamavārtayāpi śūnye samaye jāgrati saṃpravṛddha eva //
analyzed: marut āgama vārtayā api śūnye samaye jāgrati saṃpravṛddhe eva

original: MSS_2220-1 abaleti parīvādo vṛthā hi hariṇīdṛśām /
analyzed: abalā iti parīvādaḥ vṛthā hi

original: MSS_2220-2 yāsāṃ netranipātena naṭavad ghūrṇyate jagat //
analyzed: yāsām netra nipātena naṭa vat ghūrṇyate jagat

original: MSS_2221-1 abale salile vyavasyatā te mukhabhāvo gamito na paṅkajena /
analyzed: abale salile vyavasyatā te mukha bhāvaḥ gamitaḥ na paṅkajena

original: MSS_2221-2 kathamādimavarṇatāntyajasya dvijarājena kṛtorunigrahasya //
analyzed: katham ādima varṇa tā antyajasya dvijarājena kṛta ūru nigrahasya

original: MSS_2222-1 abalo'si na jitakāśī- pratibhaṭarāśīn parāpata kṣitipa /
analyzed: abalaḥ asi na jita kāśī pratibhaṭa rāśīn parāpata kṣitipa

original: MSS_2222-2 jātāmbhaḥkaṇapātaḥ kva vinaśyatyanalasaṃghātaḥ //
analyzed: jāta ambhaḥ kaṇa pātaḥ kva vinaśyati anala saṃghātaḥ

original: MSS_2223-1 abālarucire bhruvau na ca marālamandā gatir dṛgañcalamacañcalaṃ hṛdayabhūdabhūto dayā(?) /
analyzed: abāla rucire bhruvau na ca marāla mandā gatiḥ dṛś añcalam acañcalam hṛdaya bhūt abhūtaḥ dayā

original: MSS_2223-2 sudhā na khalu vākpathātithirathāpi yūnāṃ mano manojaśarajarjjarannayati mohamasyāstanuḥ //
analyzed: sudhā na khalu vākpatha atithiḥ atha api yūnām manaḥ manoja śara jarjjarat nayati moham asyāḥ tanuḥ

original: MSS_2224-1 abudhā ajaṃgamā api kayāpi gatyā paraṃ padamavāptāḥ /
analyzed: abudhāḥ ajaṃgamāḥ api kayā api gatyā param padam avāptāḥ

original: MSS_2224-2 mantriṇa iti kīrtyante nayabalaguṭikā iva janena //
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ iti kīrtyante naya bala guṭikāḥ iva janena

original: MSS_2225-1 abudhaiḥ kṛtamānasaṃvidas tava pārthaiḥ kuta eva yogyatā /
analyzed: abudhaiḥ kṛta māna saṃvidaḥ tava pārthaiḥ kutas eva yogyatā

original: MSS_2225-2 sahasi plavagairupāsitaṃ na hi guñjāphalameti soṣmatām //
analyzed: sahasi plavagaiḥ upāsitam na hi guñjā phalam eti sa ūṣma tām

original: MSS_2226-1 abudhairarthalābhāya paṇyastrībhiriva svayam /
analyzed: abudhaiḥ artha lābhāya paṇya strībhiḥ iva svayam

original: MSS_2226-2 ātmā saṃskṛtya saṃskṛtya paropakaraṇīkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: ātmā saṃskṛtya saṃskṛtya para upakaraṇīkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_2227-1 abuddhimāśritānāṃ ca kṣantavyamaparādhinām /
analyzed: abuddhim āśritānām ca kṣantavyam aparādhinām

original: MSS_2227-2 na hi sarvatra pāṇḍityaṃ sulabhaṃ puruṣeṇa vai //
analyzed: na hi sarvatra pāṇḍityam sulabham puruṣeṇa vai

original: MSS_2228-1 atha ced buddhijaṃ kṛtvā brūyuste tadabuddhijam /
analyzed: atha ced buddhi jam kṛtvā brūyuḥ te tat abuddhi jam

original: MSS_2228-2 pāpān svalpe'pi tān hanyād aparādhe tathānṛjūn //
analyzed: pāpān su alpe pi tān hanyāt aparādhe tathā anṛjūn

original: MSS_2229-1 abuddhvā cittamaprāpya viśrambhaṃ prabhaviṣṇuṣu /
analyzed: a buddhvā cittam a prāpya viśrambham prabhaviṣṇuṣu

original: MSS_2229-2 na svecchaṃ vyavahartavyam ātmano bhūtimicchatā //
analyzed: na sveccham vyavahartavyam ātmanaḥ bhūtim icchatā

original: MSS_2230-1 abodhi no hrīnibhṛtaṃ madiṅgitaṃ pratītya vā nādṛtavatyasāviti /
analyzed: abodhi naḥ hrī nibhṛtam mad iṅgitam pratītya vā na ādṛtavatī asau iti

original: MSS_2230-2 lunāti yūnaḥ sma dhiyaṃ kiyadgatā nivṛtya bālādaradarśaneṣuṇā //
analyzed: lunāti yūnaḥ sma dhiyam kiyat gatā nivṛtya bāla ādara darśana iṣuṇā

original: MSS_2231-1 abjaṃ tvajjamathābjabhūstata idaṃ brahmāṇḍamaṇḍāt punar viśvaṃ sthāvarajaṃgamaṃ taditarat tvanmūlamitthaṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: abjam tvad jam atha abja bhūḥ tatas idam brahmāṇḍam aṇḍāt punar viśvam sthāvara jaṃgamam tat itarat tvad mūlam ittham payaḥ

original: MSS_2231-2 dhik tvāṃ caura iva prayāsi nibhṛtaṃ nirgatya jālāntarair badhyante vivaśāstvadekaśaraṇāstvāmāśritā jantavaḥ //
analyzed: dhik tvām cauraḥ iva prayāsi nibhṛtam nirgatya jāla antaraiḥ badhyante vivaśāḥ tvad eka śaraṇāḥ tvām āśritāḥ jantavaḥ

original: MSS_2232-1 abdāyanartuṣvatha māsapakṣa- dināni kārye'pyavadhau vidadhyāt /
analyzed: abda ayana ṛtuṣu atha māsa pakṣa dināni vidadhyāt

original: MSS_2232-2 hīnāvadhiryena bhavatyasatyaḥ sarvo'pi loke śakuno gṛhītaḥ //
analyzed: hīna avadhiḥ yena bhavati asatyaḥ sarvaḥ api loke śakunaḥ gṛhītaḥ

original: MSS_2233-1 abdebhakumbhe nirbinne vidyutkhaḍgalatāhate /
analyzed: abda ibha kumbhe nirbinne vidyut khaḍga latā hate

original: MSS_2233-2 svacchamuktāphalasthūlā nipetustoyabindavaḥ //
analyzed: svaccha muktāphala sthūlāḥ nipetuḥ toya bindavaḥ

original: MSS_2234-1 abdairvārijighṛkṣayārṇavagataiḥ sākaṃ vrajantī muhuḥ saṃsargādvaḍavānalasya samabhūdāpannasattvā taḍit /
analyzed: abdaiḥ vāri jighṛkṣayā arṇava gataiḥ sākam vrajantī muhur saṃsargāt vaḍavānalasya samabhūt āpannasattvā taḍit

original: MSS_2234-2 manye deva tayā krameṇa janito yuṣmatpratāpānalo yenārātivadhūvilocanajalaiḥ sikto'pi saṃvardhate //
analyzed: manye deva tayā krameṇa janitaḥ yuṣmad pratāpa analaḥ yena arāti vadhū vilocana jalaiḥ siktaḥ api saṃvardhate

original: MSS_2235-1 abdhinā saha mitratve dāridryaṃ yadi jāyate /
analyzed: abdhinā saha mitra tve dāridryam yadi jāyate

original: MSS_2235-2 lāñchanaṃ sāgarasyaiva maitrīkarturna lāñchanam //
analyzed: lāñchanam sāgarasya eva maitrī kartuḥ na lāñchanam

original: MSS_2236-1 abdhirna tṛpyati yathā saritāṃ sahasrair no cendhanairiva śikhī bahudhopanītaiḥ /
analyzed: abdhiḥ na tṛpyati yathā saritām sahasraiḥ na u ca indhanaiḥ iva śikhī bahudhā upanītaiḥ

original: MSS_2236-2 jīvaḥ samastaviṣayairapi tadvadevaṃ saṃcintya cārudhiṣaṇastyajatīndriyārthān //
analyzed: jīvaḥ samasta viṣayaiḥ api tadvat evam saṃcintya cāru dhiṣaṇaḥ tyajati indriyārthān

original: MSS_2237-1 abdhiryadyavadhīrito na tu tadā tasmānnipīyāmbudair vāntān yācasi kākubhirjalalavānuttānacañcūpuṭaḥ /
analyzed: abdhiḥ yadi avadhīritaḥ na tu tadā tasmāt nipīya ambudaiḥ vāntān yācasi kākubhiḥ jala lavān uttāna cañcū puṭaḥ

original: MSS_2237-2 tatte nistrapanīcataivamucitā nirvaktumetat kathaṃ vidmaḥ kena guṇena māniṣu punaḥ sāraṅga saṃgīyate //
analyzed: tat te nistrapa nīca tā evam ucitā nirvaktum etat katham vidmaḥ kena guṇena māniṣu punar sāraṅga saṃgīyate

original: MSS_2238-1 abdhī ratnamadho dhatte dhatte vā śirasā tṛṇam /
analyzed: abdhiḥ ratnam adhas dhatte dhatte vā śirasā tṛṇam

original: MSS_2238-2 abdhereva hi doṣo'yaṃ ratnaṃ ratnaṃ tṛṇaṃ tṛṇam //
analyzed: abdheḥ eva hi doṣaḥ yam ratnam ratnam tṛṇam tṛṇam

original: MSS_2239-1 abdherambhaḥ sthagitabhuvanābhogapātālakukṣeḥ /
analyzed: abdheḥ ambhaḥ sthagita bhuvana ābhoga pātāla kukṣeḥ

original: potopāyā iha hi bahavo laṅghane'pi kṣamante /
analyzed: pota upāyāḥ iha hi bahavaḥ laṅghane api kṣamante

original: MSS_2239-2 āho riktaḥ kathamapi bhavedeṣa daivāt tadānīṃ ko nāma syādavaṭakuharālokane'pyasya kalpaḥ //
analyzed: āho riktaḥ katham api bhavet eṣa daivāt tadānīm kaḥ nāma syāt avaṭa kuhara ālokana ipi asya kalpaḥ

original: MSS_2240-1 abdhau majjanti mīnā iva phaṇina iva kṣauṇirandhraṃ viśanti krāmantyadrīn vihaṅgā iva kapaya iva kvāpyaraṇye caranti /
analyzed: abdhau majjanti mīnāḥ iva phaṇinaḥ iva kṣauṇi randhram viśanti krāmanti adrīn vihaṅgāḥ iva kapayaḥ iva kvāpi araṇye caranti

original: MSS_2240-2 deva kṣmāpālaśakra prasaradanupamatvaccamūcakravāha- vyūhavyādhūtadhūlīpaṭalahatadṛśaḥ kāndiśīkāḥ kṣitīśāḥ //
analyzed: deva kṣmāpāla śakra prasarat anupama tvad camū cakravāha vyūha vyādhūta dhūlī paṭala hata dṛśaḥ kāndiśīkāḥ kṣitīśāḥ

original: MSS_2241-1 abravīcca bhagavan mataṅgajair yadbṛhadbhirapi karma duṣkaram /
analyzed: abravīt ca bhagavat mataṅga jaiḥ yat bṛhadbhiḥ api karma duṣkaram

original: MSS_2241-2 tatra nāhamanumantumutsahe moghavṛtti kalabhasya ceṣṭitam //
analyzed: tatra na aham anumantum utsahe mogha vṛtti kalabhasya ceṣṭitam

original: MSS_2242-1 abhakṣyaṃ bhakṣayennityaṃ suvāsomadyapā gṛhe /
analyzed: abhakṣyam bhakṣayet nityam su vāsaḥ madyapāḥ gṛhe

original: MSS_2242-2 kuṣṭhī bhavati vitteśo veśyādoṣāḥ svabhāvajāḥ //
analyzed: kuṣṭhī bhavati vitta īśaḥ veśyā doṣāḥ svabhāva jāḥ

original: MSS_2243-1 abhagnavṛttāḥ prasabhād ākṛṣṭā yauvanoddhataiḥ /
analyzed: a bhagna vṛttāḥ prasabhāt ākṛṣṭāḥ yauvana uddhataiḥ

original: MSS_2243-2 cakranduruccakairmuṣṭigrāhyamadhyā dhanurlatā //
analyzed: cakranduḥ uccakais muṣṭi grāhya madhyā dhanuḥ latā

original: MSS_2244-1 abhayaṃ sattvasaṃśuddhir jñānayogavyavasthitiḥ /
MSS_2244-2 dānaṃ damaśca yajñaśca svādhyāyastapa ārjavam //
analyzed: dānam damaḥ ca yajñaḥ ca svādhyāyaḥ tapaḥ ārjavam

original: MSS_2245-1 ahiṃsā satyamakrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntirapaiśunam /
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhaḥ tyāgaḥ śāntiḥ apaiśunam

original: MSS_2245-2 dayā bhūteṣvaloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīracāpalam //
analyzed: dayā bhūteṣu a loluptvam mārdavam hrīḥ acāpalam

original: MSS_2246-1 tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā /
analyzed: tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adrohaḥ na atimāni tā

original: MSS_2246-2 bhavanti saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijātasya bhārata //
analyzed: bhavanti saṃpadam daivīm abhijātasya bhārata

original: MSS_2247-1 dambho darpo'timānaśca krodhaḥ pāruṣyameva ca /
analyzed: dambhaḥ darpaḥ ūti mānaḥ ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca

original: MSS_2247-2 ajñānaṃ cābhijātasya pārtha saṃpadamāsurīm //
analyzed: ajñānam ca abhijātasya pārtha saṃpadam āsurīm

original: MSS_2248-1 daivī saṃpadvimokṣāya nibandhāyāsurī matā //
analyzed: daivī saṃpad vimokṣāya nibandhāya āsurī matā

original: MSS_2249-1 abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dattvā yaścarate muniḥ /
analyzed: abhayam sarva bhūtebhyaḥ dattvā yaḥ carate muniḥ

original: MSS_2249-2 tasyāpi sarvabhūtebhyo na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit //
analyzed: tasya api sarva bhūtebhyaḥ na bhayam vidyate kvacid

original: MSS_2250-1 abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dadāti dayāparaḥ /
analyzed: abhayam sarva bhūtebhyaḥ yaḥ dadāti dayā paraḥ

original: MSS_2250-2 abhayaṃ tasya bhūtāni dadatītyanuśuśrumaḥ //
analyzed: abhayam tasya bhūtāni dadati iti anuśuśrumaḥ

original: MSS_2251-1 abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dadāti dayāparaḥ /
analyzed: abhayam sarva bhūtebhyaḥ yaḥ dadāti dayā paraḥ

original: MSS_2251-2 tasya dehavimuktasya kṣaya eva na vidyate //
analyzed: tasya deha vimuktasya kṣayaḥ eva na vidyate

original: MSS_2252-1 abhayamabhayaṃ deva brūmastavāsilatāvadhūḥ kuvalayadalaśyatmā śatroruraḥsthalaśāyinī /
analyzed: abhayam abhayam deva brūmaḥ tava asi latā vadhūḥ kuvalaya dala śyatmā śatroḥ uraḥsthala śāyinī

original: MSS_2252-2 samayasulabhāṃ kīrtiṃ bhavyāmasūta sutāmasāv api ramayituṃ rāgāndheva bhramatyakhilaṃ jagat //
analyzed: samaya sulabhām kīrtim bhavyām asūta sutām asau api ramayitum rāga andhā iva bhramati akhilam jagat

original: MSS_2253-1 abhayasya hi yo dātā sa pūjyaḥ satataṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: abhayasya hi yaḥ dātā sa pūjyaḥ satatam nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_2253-2 satraṃ hi vardhate tasya sadaivābhayadakṣiṇam //
analyzed: satram hi vardhate tasya sadā eva abhaya dakṣiṇam

original: MSS_2254-1 abhayasyaiva yo dātā tasyaiva sumahatphalam /
analyzed: abhayasya eva yaḥ dātā tasya eva su mahat phalam

original: MSS_2254-2 na hi prāṇasamaṃ dānaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vidyate //
analyzed: na hi prāṇa samam dānam triṣu lokeṣu vidyate

original: MSS_2255-1 abhavadabhinavaprarohabhājāṃ chaviparipāṭiṣu yaḥ purāṅgakānām /
analyzed: abhavat abhinava praroha bhājām chavi paripāṭiṣu yaḥ purā aṅgakānām

original: MSS_2255-2 ahaha virahavaikṛte sa tasyāḥ kraśimani saṃprati dūrvayā vivādaḥ //
analyzed: ahaha viraha vaikṛte sa tasyāḥ kraśimani saṃprati dūrvayā vivādaḥ

original: MSS_2256-1 abhavyajīvo vacanaṃ paṭhannapi jinasya mithyātvaviṣaṃ na muñcati /
analyzed: abhavya jīvaḥ vacanam paṭhan api jinasya mithyātva viṣam na muñcati

original: MSS_2256-2 yathā viṣaṃ raudraviṣo'ti pannagaḥ saśarkaraṃ cāru payaḥ pibannapi //
analyzed: yathā viṣam pannagaḥ sa śarkaram cāru payaḥ piban api

original: MSS_2257-1 abhāvi sindhvā saṃdhyābhrasadṛgrudhiratoyayā /
analyzed: abhāvi sindhvā saṃdhyā abhra sadṛś rudhira toyayā

original: MSS_2257-2 hṛte yoddhuṃ janaḥ pāṃśau sa dṛgrudhi rato yayā //
analyzed: hṛte yoddhum janaḥ pāṃśau sa dṛś rudhi rataḥ yayā

original: MSS_2258-1 abhāve na narastasmād bhāvaḥ sarvatra kāraṇam /
analyzed: abhāve na naraḥ tasmāt bhāvaḥ sarvatra kāraṇam

original: MSS_2258-2 cittaṃ śodhaya yatnena kimanyairbāhyaśodhanaiḥ //
analyzed: cittam śodhaya yatnena kim anyaiḥ bāhya śodhanaiḥ

original: MSS_2259-1 abhāve paṭṭasūtrasya hāriṇī snāyuriṣyate /
analyzed: abhāve paṭṭasūtrasya hāriṇī snāyuḥ iṣyate

original: MSS_2259-2 guṇārthamathavā grāhyāḥ snāyavo mahiṣīgavām //
analyzed: guṇa artham athavā grāhyāḥ snāyavaḥ mahiṣī gavām

original: MSS_2259A-1 abhigamyāste sadbhir vyapagatamānāvamānadoṣāśca /
analyzed: abhigamyāḥ te sadbhiḥ vyapagata māna avamāna doṣāḥ ca

original: MSS_2259A-2 ye svagṛhamupagatānāṃ śramamupacārairvyapanayanti //
analyzed: ye sva gṛham upagatānām śramam upacāraiḥ vyapanayanti

original: MSS_2260-1 abhijanavato bhartuḥ ślāghye sthitā gṛhiṇīpade vibhavagarubhiḥ kṛtyairasya pratikṣaṇamākulā /
analyzed: abhijanavataḥ bhartuḥ ślāghye sthitā gṛhiṇī pade vibhava garubhiḥ kṛtyaiḥ asya pratikṣaṇam ākulā

original: MSS_2260-2 tanayamacirāt prācīvārkaṃ prasūya ca pāvanaṃ mama virahajāṃ na tvaṃ vatse śucaṃ gaṇayiṣyasi //
analyzed: tanayam acirāt prācī iva arkam prasūya ca pāvanam mama viraha jām na tvam vatse śucam gaṇayiṣyasi

original: MSS_2261-1 abhijātajanavyathāvahā bahaloṣmaprasarā vidāhinaḥ /
analyzed: abhijāta jana vyathā vahāḥ bahala ūṣma prasarāḥ vidāhinaḥ

original: MSS_2261-2 prakhalā iva dṛṣṭimāgatā bhuvi tāpāya nidāghavāsarāḥ //
analyzed: prakhalāḥ iva dṛṣṭim āgatāḥ bhuvi tāpāya nidāgha vāsarāḥ

original: MSS_2262-1 abhitāpasaṃpadamathoṣṇarucir nijatejasāmasahamāna iva /
analyzed: abhitāpa saṃpadam atha uṣṇa ruciḥ nija tejasām a sahamānaḥ iva

original: MSS_2262-2 payasi prapitsuraparāmbunidher adhiroḍhumastagirimabhyapatat //
analyzed: payasi prapitsuḥ apara ambunidheḥ adhiroḍhum asta girim abhyapatat

original: MSS_2263-1 abhitigmaraśmi ciramāviramā- davadhānakhinnamanimeṣatayā /
analyzed: abhitigmaraśmi ciram āviramā dava dhāna khinnam animeṣa tayā

original: MSS_2263-2 vigalanmadhuvratakulāśrujalaṃ nyamimīladabjanayanaṃ nalinī //
analyzed: vigalat madhuvrata kula aśru jalam nyamimīlat abja nayanam nalinī

original: MSS_2264-1 abhito nitarāṃ salilaṃ jalade dātuṃ samudyate bhavati /
analyzed: abhitas nitarām salilam jalade dātum samudyate bhavati

original: MSS_2264-2 tadapi bahulamalpaṃ vā pātrādhīnaṃ mataṃ patanam //
analyzed: tat api bahulam alpam vā pātra adhīnam matam patanam

original: MSS_2265-1 abhittāvutthite citre dṛśyate bhittirātatā /
analyzed: abhittau utthite citre dṛśyate bhittiḥ ātatā

original: MSS_2265-2 aho vicitrā māyeyaṃ bhagnaṃ tuṇḍaṃ śilāplutā //
analyzed: aho vicitrā māyā iyam bhagnam tuṇḍam śilā plutā

original: MSS_2266-1 abhidroheṇa bhūtānām arjayan gatvarīḥ śriyaḥ /
analyzed: abhidroheṇa bhūtānām arjayan gatvarīḥ śriyaḥ

original: MSS_2266-2 udanvāniva sindhūnām āpadāmeti pātratām //
analyzed: udanvān iva sindhūnām āpadāma iti pātra tām

original: MSS_2267-1 abhidhāya tadā tadapriyaṃ śiśupālo'nuśayaṃ paraṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: abhidhāya tadā tat apriyam śiśupālaḥ anuśayam param gataḥ

original: MSS_2267-2 bhavato'bhimanāḥ samīhate saruṣaḥ kartumupetya mānanām //
analyzed: bhavataḥ abhimanāḥ samīhate sa ruṣaḥ kartum upetya mānanām

original: MSS_2268-1 abhidhāvati māṃ mṛtyur ayamudgūrṇamudgaraḥ /
analyzed: abhidhāvati mām mṛtyuḥ ayam udgūrṇa mudgaraḥ

original: MSS_2268-2 kṛpaṇaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa māṃ śaraṇāgatam //
analyzed: kṛpaṇam puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa mām śaraṇa āgatam

original: MSS_2269-1 abhidhyālu parasveṣu neha nāmutra nandati /
analyzed: abhidhyālu para sveṣu na iha na amutra nandati

original: MSS_2269-2 tasmādabhidhyā saṃtyājyā sarvadābhīpsatā sukham //
analyzed: tasmāt abhidhyā saṃtyājyā sarvadā abhīpsatā sukham

original: MSS_2270-1 abhinayaśastau hastau pādau paribhūtakisalayau salayau /
analyzed: abhinaya śastau hastau pādau paribhūta kisalayau salayau

original: MSS_2270-2 aṅgaṃ rañjitaraṅgaṃ nṛttaṃ puṃbhāvaśāli samavṛttam //
analyzed: aṅgam rañjita raṅgam nṛttam puṃbhāva śāli sama vṛttam

original: MSS_2271-1 abhinayān paricetumivodyatā malayamārutakampitapallavā /
analyzed: abhinayān paricetum iva udyatā malaya māruta kampita pallavā

original: MSS_2271-2 amadayat sahakāralatā manaḥ sakalikā kalikāmajitāmapi //
analyzed: amadayat sahakāra latā manaḥ sa kalikā kalikām ajitām api

original: MSS_2272-1 abhinavaṃ galitāṃśukadarśitaṃ dadhati yatstanayoruparisthitam /
analyzed: abhinavam galita aṃśuka darśitam dadhati yat stanayoḥ upari sthitam

original: MSS_2272-2 vasanamaṇḍalamaṇḍanamaṅganās tadadhikaṃ pratipakṣamanojvaram //
analyzed: vasana maṇḍala maṇḍanam aṅganāḥ tad adhikam pratipakṣa manaḥ jvaram

original: MSS_2273-1 abhinavakuśasūtraspardhi karṇe śirīṣaṃ kuravakaparidhānaṃ pāṭalādāma kaṇṭhe /
analyzed: abhinava kuśa sūtra spardhi karṇe śirīṣam kuravaka paridhānam pāṭalā dāma kaṇṭhe

original: MSS_2273-2 tanusarasajalārdronmīlitaḥ sundarīṇāṃ dinapariṇatijanmā ko'pi veśaścakāsti //
analyzed: tanu sarasa jala ārdra unmīlitaḥ sundarīṇām dina pariṇati janmā kaḥ api veśaḥ cakāsti

original: MSS_2274-1 abhinavajavāpuṣpaspardhī tavādharapallavo hasitakusumonmeṣacchāyādaracchuritāntaraḥ /
analyzed: abhinava javā puṣpa spardhī tava adhara pallavaḥ hasita kusuma unmeṣa chāyā ādara churita antaraḥ

original: MSS_2274-2 nayanamadhupaśreṇīṃ yūnāmanāratamāharaṃs taruṇi tanute tāruṇyaśrīrvilāsavataṃsatām //
analyzed: nayana madhupa śreṇīm yūnām anāratam āharan taruṇi tanute tāruṇya śrīḥ vilāsa vataṃsa tām

original: MSS_2275-1 abhinavanalinīkisalaya- mṛṇālavalayādi davadahanarāśiḥ /
analyzed: abhinava nalinī kisalaya mṛṇāla valaya ādi dava dahana rāśiḥ

original: MSS_2275-2 subhaga kuraṅgadṛśo'syā vidhivaśatastvadviyogapavipāte //
analyzed: subhaga kuraṅga dṛśaḥ asyāḥ vidhi vaśataḥ tvad viyoga pavipāte

original: MSS_2276-1 abhinavanalinīvinodalubdho mukulitakairaviṇīviyogabhīruḥ /
analyzed: abhinava nalinī vinoda lubdhaḥ mukulita kairaviṇī viyoga bhīruḥ

original: MSS_2276-2 bhramati madhukaro'yamantarāle śrayati na paṅkajinīṃ kumudvatīṃ vā //
analyzed: bhramati madhukarā uyam antarāle śrayati na paṅkajinīm kumudvatīm vā

original: MSS_2277-1 abhinavanavanītaprītamātāmranetraṃ vikacanalinalakṣmīspardhi sānandavaktram /
analyzed: abhinava navanīta prītam ātāmra netram vikaca nalina lakṣmī spardhi sa ānanda vaktram

original: MSS_2277-2 hṛdayabhavanamadhye yogibhirdhyānagamyaṃ navagaganatamālaśyāmalaṃ kaṃcidīḍe //
analyzed: hṛdaya bhavana madhye yogibhiḥ dhyāna gamyam nava gagana tamāla śyāmalam kaṃcid īḍe

original: MSS_2278-1 abhinavanavanītasnigdhamāpītadugdhaṃ dadhikaṇaparidigdhaṃ mugdhamaṅgaṃ murāreḥ /
analyzed: abhinava navanīta snigdham āpīta dugdham dadhi kaṇa paridigdham mugdham aṅgam murāreḥ

original: MSS_2278-2 diśatu bhuvanakṛcchraccheditāpicchagucchac chavi navaśikhipicchālāñchitaṃ vāñchitaṃ vaḥ //
analyzed: diśatu bhuvana kṛcchra chedita apiccha gucchat chavi nava śikhi picchā lāñchitam vāñchitam vaḥ

original: MSS_2279-1 abhinavapallavaraśanā śiśirataratuṣārajalamaṅgalasnātā /
analyzed: abhinava pallava raśanā śiśiratara tuṣāra jala maṅgala snātā

original: MSS_2279-2 puṣpavatī cūtalatā priyeva dadṛśe phalābhimukhī //
analyzed: puṣpavatī cūta latā priyā iva dadṛśe phala abhimukhī

original: MSS_2280-1 abhinavapulakālīmaṇḍitā gaṇḍapālī nigadati vinigūḍhānandahindolicetaḥ /
analyzed: abhinava pula kālī maṇḍitā gaṇḍa pālī nigadati vinigūḍha ānanda hindoli cetaḥ

original: MSS_2280-2 sudati vadati puṇyaiḥ kasya dhanyairmanoja- prasaramasakṛdetaccāpalaṃ locanasya //
analyzed: sudati vadati puṇyaiḥ kasya dhanyaiḥ manoja prasaram asakṛt etat cāpalam locanasya

original: MSS_2281-1 abhinavamukhamudraṃ kṣudrakūpopavītaṃ praśithilavipulatvaṃ jvālakocchavāsipālam /
analyzed: abhinava mukha mudram kṣudra kūpopavītam praśithila vipula tvam jvālaka ucchava asi pālam

original: MSS_2281-2 pariṇatiparipāṭivyākṛtenāruṇimnā hataharitimaśeṣaṃ nāgaraṅgaṃ cakāsti //
analyzed: pariṇati paripāṭi vyākṛtena aruṇimnā hata haritima śeṣam nāga raṅgam cakāsti

original: MSS_2282-1 abhinavayavasaśrīśālini kṣmātale'smin atiśayaparabhāgaṃ bhejire jiṣṇugopāḥ /
analyzed: abhinava yavasa śrī śālini kṣmā tale asmin atiśaya para bhāgam bhejire jiṣṇu gopāḥ

original: MSS_2282-2 kuvalayaśayanīye mugdhamugdhekṣaṇāyā maṇaya iva vimuktāḥ kāmakeliprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: kuvalaya śayanīye mugdha mugdha īkṣaṇāyāḥ maṇayaḥ iva vimuktāḥ kāma keli prasaṅgāt

original: MSS_2283-1 abhinavavadhūroṣasvādaḥ karīṣatanūnapād asaralajanāśleṣakrūrastuṣārasamīraṇaḥ /
analyzed: abhinava vadhū roṣa svādaḥ karīṣa tanūnapāt asarala jana āśleṣa krūraḥ tuṣāra samīraṇaḥ

original: MSS_2283-2 galitavibhavasyājñevādya dyutirmasṛṇā raver virahivanitāvaktraupamyaṃ bibharti niśākaraḥ //
analyzed: galita vibhavasya ājñā iva adya dyutiḥ masṛṇā raveḥ virahi vanitā vaktra aupamyam bibharti niśākaraḥ

original: MSS_2284-1 abhinavaviṣavallīpādapadmasya viṣṇor madanamathanamaulermālatīpuṣpamālā /
analyzed: abhinava viṣa vallī pāda padmasya viṣṇoḥ madana mathana mauleḥ mālatī puṣpa mālā

original: MSS_2284-2 jayati jayapatākā kāpyasau mokṣalakṣmyāḥ kṣapitakalikalaṅkā jāhnavī naḥ punātu //
analyzed: jayati jayapatākā kā api asau mokṣa lakṣmyāḥ kṣapita kali kalaṅkā jāhnavī naḥ punātu

original: MSS_2285-1 abhinavasevakavinayaiḥ prāghuṇakoktairvilāsinīruditaiḥ /
analyzed: abhinava sevaka vinayaiḥ prāghuṇaka uktaiḥ vilāsinī ruditaiḥ

original: MSS_2285-2 dhūrtajanavacananikarair iha kaścidavañcito nāsti //
analyzed: dhūrta jana vacana nikaraiḥ iha kaścid avañcitaḥ na asti

original: MSS_2286-1 abhinaṣati vainateyaṃ cāmarasahitaḥ sasatyabhāmo yaḥ /
analyzed: abhinaṣati vainateyam cāmara sahitaḥ sa satyabhāmaḥ yaḥ

original: MSS_2286-2 nārāyaṇaḥ sa sākṣād vibudhasamarcyaḥ sadā jayatu //
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ sa sākṣāt vibudha samarcyaḥ sadā jayatu

original: MSS_2287-1 abhinnavelau gambhīrāv amburāśirbhavānapi /
analyzed: abhinna velau gambhīrau amburāśiḥ bhavān api

original: MSS_2287-2 asāvañjanasaṃkāśas tvaṃ tu cāmīkaradyutiḥ //
analyzed: asau añjana saṃkāśaḥ tvam tu cāmīkara dyutiḥ

original: MSS_2288-1 abhinneṣvapi kāryeṣu bhidyate manasaḥ kriyā /
analyzed: abhinneṣu api kāryeṣu bhidyate manasaḥ kriyā

original: MSS_2288-2 anyathaiva stanaṃ putraś cintayatyanyathā patiḥ //
analyzed: anyathā eva stanam putraḥ cintayati anyathā patiḥ

original: MSS_2289-1 abhipatati ghanaṃ śṛṇoti garjāḥ sahati śilāḥ sahate taḍittaraṅgān /
analyzed: abhipatati ghanam śṛṇoti garjāḥ sahati śilāḥ sahate taḍit taraṅgān

original: MSS_2289-2 vidhuvati garutaṃ rutaṃ vidhatte jalapṛṣate kiyate'pi cātako'yam //
analyzed: vidhuvati garutam rutam vidhatte jala pṛṣate kiyate api cātakoyam

original: MSS_2290-1 abhiprāyaṃ yo viditvā tu bhartuḥ sarvāṇi kāryāṇi karotyatandrīḥ /
analyzed: abhiprāyam yaḥ viditvā tu bhartuḥ sarvāṇi kāryāṇi

original: MSS_2290-2 vaktā hitānāmanurakta āryaḥ śaktijña ātmeva hi so'nukampyaḥ //
analyzed: vaktā hitānām anuraktaḥ āryaḥ śakti jñaḥ ātmā iva hi saḥ unukampyaḥ

original: MSS_2291-1 vākyaṃ tu yo nādriyate'nuśiṣṭaḥ pratyāha yaścāpi niyujyamānaḥ /
analyzed: vākyam tu yaḥ na ādriyate nuśiṣṭaḥ pratyāha yaḥ ca api niyujyamānaḥ

original: MSS_2291-2 prajñābhimānī pratikūlavādī tyājyaḥ sa tādṛktvarayaiva bhṛtyaḥ //
analyzed: prajñā abhimānī pratikūla vādī tyājyaḥ sa tādṛś tvarayā eva bhṛtyaḥ

original: MSS_2292-1 abhiprāyānusāreṇa prakaṭīkurute priyam /
analyzed: abhiprāya anusāreṇa prakaṭīkurute priyam

original: MSS_2292-2 aho mahāprabhāvānāṃ bhūpatīnāṃ vasuṃdharā //
analyzed: aho mahā prabhāvānām bhūpatīnām vasuṃdharā

original: MSS_2293-1 abhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ pūjito yaḥ surairapi /
analyzed: abhipreta artha siddhi artham pūjitaḥ yaḥ suraiḥ api

original: MSS_2293-2 sarvavighnacchide tasmai gaṇādhipataye namaḥ //
analyzed: sarva vighna chide tasmai gaṇādhipataye namaḥ

original: MSS_2294-1 abhibhavati manaḥ kadambavāyau madamadhure ca śikhaṇḍināṃ nināde /
analyzed: abhibhavati manaḥ kadamba vāyau mada madhure ca śikhaṇḍinām nināde

original: MSS_2294-2 jana iva na dhṛteścacāla jiṣṇur na hi mahatāṃ sukaraḥ samādhibhaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: janaḥ iva na dhṛteḥ cacāla jiṣṇuḥ na hi mahatām su karaḥ samādhi bhaṅgaḥ

original: MSS_2295-1 abhibhūto'pi notsāhaṃ jahyājjātu svasiddhaye /
analyzed: abhibhūtaḥ api nā utsāham jahyāt jātu sva siddhaye

original: MSS_2295-2 naṣṭāṅgo'pi grasatyeva saiṃhikeyo muhurdviṣau //
analyzed: naṣṭa aṅgā upi grasati eva saiṃhikeyaḥ muhur dviṣau

original: MSS_2296-1 abhibhūto'pyavajñāto yo rājñāṃ dvāri tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: abhibhūtaḥ api avajñātaḥ yaḥ rājñām dvāri tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_2296-2 sa tu rājñāṃ śriyaṃ bhuṅkte nābhimānī kadācana //
analyzed: sa tu rājñām śriyam bhuṅkte na abhimānī kadācana

original: MSS_2297-1 abhibhūya vibhūtimārtavīṃ madhugandhātiśayena vīrudhām /
analyzed: abhibhūya vibhūti mārtavīm madhu gandha atiśayena vīrudhām

original: MSS_2297-2 nṛpateramarasragāpa sā dayitorustanakoṭisusthitam //
analyzed: nṛpateḥ amara sraj āpa sā dayitā ūru stana koṭi susthitam

original: MSS_2298-1 abhibhūya satāmavasthitiṃ jaḍajeṣu pratipādya ca śriyam /
analyzed: abhibhūya satām avasthitim jaḍa jeṣu pratipādya ca śriyam

original: MSS_2298-2 jagatīparitāpakṛt kathaṃ jaladhau nāvapatedasau raviḥ //
analyzed: jagatī paritāpa kṛt katham jaladhau na avapatet asau raviḥ

original: MSS_2299-1 abhimataphaladātā tvaṃ ca kalpadrumaśca prakaṭamiha viśeṣaṃ kaṃcanodāharāmaḥ /
analyzed: abhimata phala dātā tvam ca kalpadrumaḥ ca prakaṭam iha viśeṣam kaṃcana udāharāmaḥ

original: MSS_2299-2 kathamiha madhuroktipremasaṃmānamiśraṃ tulayati suraśākhī deva dānaṃ tvadīyam //
analyzed: katham iha madhura ukti prema saṃmāna miśram tulayati suraśākhī deva dānam tvadīyam

original: MSS_2300-1 abhimataphalasiddhisiddhamantrā- vali balijitparameṣṭhinorupāsye /
analyzed: abhimata phala siddhi siddha mantrā bali jit parameṣṭhinoḥ upāsye

original: MSS_2300-2 bhagavati madanārināri vande nikhilanagādhipabhartṛdārike tvām //
analyzed: bhagavati mada nārī nāri vande nikhila naga adhipa bhartṛ dārike tvām

original: MSS_2301-1 abhimatamabhitaḥ kṛtāṅgabhaṅgā kucayugamunnativittamunnamayya /
analyzed: abhimatam abhitas kṛta aṅga bhaṅgā kuca yugam unnati vittam unnamayya

original: MSS_2301-2 tanurabhilaṣitaṃ klamacchalena vyavṛṇuta vellitabāhuvallarīkā //
analyzed: tanuḥ abhilaṣitam klama chalena vyavṛṇuta vellita bāhu vallarīkā

original: MSS_2302-1 abhimatamahāmānagranthiprabhedapaṭīyasī gurutaraguṇagrāmāmbhojasphuṭojjvalacandrikā /
MSS_2302-2 vipulavilasallajjāvallīvidārakuṭhārikā jaṭharapiṭharī duḥpūreyaṃ karoti viḍambanām //
analyzed: vipula vilasat lajjā vallī vidāra kuṭhārikā jaṭhara piṭharī duḥpūrā iyam karoti viḍambanām

original: MSS_2303-1 abhimatavastūpahṛtā- vapi gurugarvādanādarastanvyāḥ /
analyzed: abhimata vastu upahṛtāḥ guru garvāt anādaraḥ tanvyāḥ

original: MSS_2303-2 skhalite'pi priyasya saṃ- yamatāḍanamityeva bibbokaḥ //
analyzed: skhalite pi priyasya sam yama tāḍanam iti eva bibbokaḥ

original: MSS_2304-1 abhimatasiddhiraśeṣā bhavati hi puruṣasya puruṣakāreṇa /
analyzed: abhimata siddhiḥ aśeṣā bhavati hi puruṣasya puruṣakāreṇa

original: MSS_2304-2 daivamiti yadapi kathayasi puruṣaguṇaḥ so'pyadṛṣṭākhyaḥ //
analyzed: daivam iti yat api kathayasi puruṣa guṇaḥ saḥ api adṛṣṭa ākhyaḥ

original: MSS_2305-1 abhimantrya śucividhānād ājyāḍhyaṃ hastikarṇajaṃ cūrṇam /
analyzed: abhimantrya śuci vidhānāt ājya āḍhyam hastikarṇa jam cūrṇam

original: MSS_2305-2 yo'śnāti sa hi naraḥ syād yatheṣṭaceṣṭo'pi dīrghāyuḥ //
analyzed: yā uśnāti sa hi naraḥ syāt yathā iṣṭa ceṣṭaḥ api dīrgha āyuḥ

original: MSS_2306-1 abhimānadhanaṃ yeṣāṃ ciraṃ jīvanti te narāḥ /
analyzed: abhimāna dhanam yeṣām ciram jīvanti te narāḥ

original: MSS_2306-2 abhimānavihīnānāṃ kiṃ dhanena kimāyuṣā //
analyzed: abhimāna vihīnānām kim dhanena kim āyuṣā

original: MSS_2307-1 abhimānadhanasya gatvarair asubhiḥ sthāsnu yaśaścicīṣataḥ /
analyzed: abhimāna dhanasya gatvaraiḥ asubhiḥ sthāsnu yaśaḥ cicīṣataḥ

original: MSS_2307-2 acirāṃśuvilāsacañcalā nanu lakṣmīḥ phalamānuṣaṅgikam //
analyzed: acira aṃśu vilāsa cañcalā nanu lakṣmīḥ phalam ānuṣaṅgikam

original: MSS_2308-1 abhimānavatāṃ puṃsām ātmasāramajānatām /
analyzed: abhimānavatām puṃsām ātma sāram a jānatām

original: MSS_2308-2 andhānāmiva dṛśyante patanāntāḥ pravṛttayaḥ //
analyzed: andhānām iva dṛśyante patana antāḥ pravṛttayaḥ

original: MSS_2309-1 abhimānavatāṃ brahman yuktāyuktavivekinām /
analyzed: abhimānavatām brahman yukta ayukta vivekinām

original: MSS_2309-2 yujyate'vaśyabhogyānāṃ duḥkhānāmaprakāśanam //
analyzed: yujyate ivaśya bhogyānām duḥkhānām aprakāśanam

original: MSS_2310-1 abhimānavato manasvinaḥ priyamuccaiḥ padamārurukṣataḥ /
analyzed: abhimānavataḥ manasvinaḥ priyam uccais padam ārurukṣataḥ

original: MSS_2310-2 vinipātanivartanakṣamaṃ matamālambanamātmapauruṣam //
analyzed: vinipāta nivartana kṣamam matam ālambanam ātma pauruṣam

original: MSS_2311-1 abhimānitabhūtena sānubandharasena tu /
analyzed: abhimānita bhūtena sa anubandha rasena tu

original: MSS_2311-2 yataḥ sarvendriyaprītiḥ sa kāmaḥ procyate budhaiḥ //
analyzed: yatas sarva indriya prītiḥ sa kāmaḥ procyate budhaiḥ

original: MSS_2312-1 abhimāninamudbhrāntam ātmasaṃbhāvitaṃ śaṭham /
analyzed: abhimāninam udbhrāntam ātma saṃbhāvitam śaṭham

original: MSS_2312-2 krodhanaṃ caiva nṛpatiṃ vyasane ghnanti vairiṇaḥ //
analyzed: krodhanam ca eva nṛpatim vyasane ghnanti vairiṇaḥ

original: MSS_2313-1 abhimukhagate yasminneva priye bahuśo vadaty avanatamukhaṃ tūṣṇīmeva sthitaṃ mṛganetrayā /
analyzed: abhimukha gate yasmin eva priye bahuśas vadati avanata mukham tūṣṇīm eva sthitam mṛganetrayā

original: MSS_2313-2 atha kila balāllīlālolaṃ sa eṣa tathekṣitaḥ kathamapi yathā dṛṣṭyā manye kṛtaṃ śrutilaṅghanam //
analyzed: atha kila balāt līlā lolam saḥ eṣa tathā īkṣitaḥ katham api yathā dṛṣṭyā manye kṛtam śruti laṅghanam

original: MSS_2313A-1 abhimukhamadhuratarebhyaḥ parāṅmukhākrośanāt kuśīlebhyaḥ /
analyzed: abhimukha madhuratarebhyaḥ parāṅmukha ākrośanāt kuśīlebhyaḥ

original: MSS_2313A-2 abhyantarakaluṣebhyo bhetavyaṃ mitraśatrubhyaḥ //
analyzed: abhyantara kaluṣebhyaḥ bhetavyam mitra śatrubhyaḥ

original: MSS_2314-1 abhimukhanihatasya satas tiṣṭhatu tāvajjayo'tha vā svargaḥ /
analyzed: abhimukha nihatasya sataḥ tiṣṭhatu tāvat jaya utha vā svargaḥ

original: MSS_2314-2 ubhayabalasādhuvādaḥ śravaṇamukho'styeva cātyartham //
analyzed: ubhaya bala sādhuvādaḥ śravaṇa mukhaḥ usti eva ca atyartham

original: MSS_2315-1 abhimukhapatayālubhirlalāṭa- śramasalilairavidhautapatralekhaḥ /
analyzed: abhimukha patayālubhiḥ lalāṭa śrama salilaiḥ a vidhauta patra lekhaḥ

original: MSS_2315-2 kathayati puruṣāyitaṃ vadhūnāṃ mṛditahimadyutidurmanāḥ kapolaḥ //
analyzed: kathayati puruṣāyitam vadhūnām mṛdita hima dyuti durmanāḥ kapolaḥ

original: MSS_2316-1 abhimukhapatitairguṇaprakarṣād avajitamuddhatimujjvalāṃ dadhānaiḥ /
analyzed: abhimukha patitaiḥ guṇa prakarṣāt avajitam uddhatim ujjvalām dadhānaiḥ

original: MSS_2316-2 tarukisalayajālamagrahastaiḥ prasabhamanīyata bhaṅgamaṅganānām //
analyzed: taru kisalaya jālam agra hastaiḥ prasabham anīyata bhaṅgam aṅganānām

original: MSS_2317-1 abhimukhamupayāti māṃ sma kiṃcit tvamabhidadhāḥ paṭale madhuvratānām /
analyzed: abhimukham upayāti mām sma kiṃcid tvam abhidadhāḥ paṭale madhu vratānām

original: MSS_2317-2 madhusurabhimukhābjagandhalabdher adhikamadhi tvadanena mā nipāti //
analyzed: madhu surabhi mukha abja gandha labdheḥ adhikam adhi tvat anena mā nipāti

original: MSS_2318-1 abhimukhāgatamārgaṇadhoraṇi- dhvanitapallavitāmbaragahvare /
analyzed: abhimukha āgata mārgaṇa dhoraṇi dhvanita pallavita ambara gahvare

original: MSS_2318-2 vitaraṇe ca raṇe ca samudyate bhavati ko'pi paraṃ viralaḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: vitaraṇe ca raṇe ca samudyate bhavati kopi param viralaḥ paraḥ

original: MSS_2319-1 abhimukhe mayi saṃhṛtamīkṣitaṃ hasitamanyanimittakṛtodayam /
analyzed: abhimukhe mayi saṃhṛtam īkṣitam hasitam anya nimitta kṛta udayam

original: MSS_2319-2 vinayavāritavṛttiratastayā na vivṛto madano na ca saṃvṛtaḥ //
analyzed: vinaya vārita vṛttiḥ atas tayā na vivṛtaḥ madanaḥ na ca saṃvṛtaḥ

original: MSS_2320-1 abhimuni sahasā hṛte parasyā ghanamarutā jaghanāṃśukaikadeśe /
analyzed: abhimuni sahasā hṛte parasyāḥ ghana marutā jaghana aṃśuka eka deśe

original: MSS_2320-2 cakitamavasanoru satrapāyāḥ pratiyuvatīrapi vismayaṃ nināya //
analyzed: cakitam a vasana ūru sa trapāyāḥ pratiyuvatīḥ api vismayam nināya

original: MSS_2321-1 abhiyāti naḥ satṛṣa eṣa cakṣuṣo harirityakhidyata nitambinījanaḥ /
analyzed: abhiyāti naḥ sa tṛṣaḥ eṣa cakṣuṣaḥ hariḥ iti akhidyata nitambinī janaḥ

original: MSS_2321-2 na viveda yaḥ satatamenamīkṣate na vitṛṣṇatāṃ vrajati khalvasāvapi //
analyzed: na viveda yaḥ satatam enam īkṣate na vitṛṣṇa tām vrajati khalu asau api

original: MSS_2322-1 abhiyuktaṃ balavatā durlabhaṃ hīnasādhanam /
analyzed: abhiyuktam balavatā durlabham hīna sādhanam

original: MSS_2322-2 hṛtasvaṃ kāminaṃ coram āviśanti prajāgarāḥ //
analyzed: hṛta svam kāminam coram āviśanti prajāgarāḥ

original: MSS_2323-1 abhiyukto balavatā tiṣṭhan durge prayatnavān /
analyzed: abhiyuktaḥ balavatā tiṣṭhan durge prayatnavān

original: MSS_2323-2 tadbalīyastarāhvānaṃ kurvītātmavimuktaye //
analyzed: tad balīyastara āhvānam kurvīta ātma vimuktaye

original: MSS_2324-1 abhiyukto yadā paśyen na kāṃcid gatimātmanaḥ /
analyzed: abhiyuktaḥ yadā paśyet na kāṃcid gatim ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_2324-2 yudhyamānastadā prājño mriyate ripuṇā saha //
analyzed: yudhyamānaḥ tadā prājñaḥ mriyate ripuṇā saha

original: MSS_2325-1 abhiyoktā balī yasmād alabdhvā na nivartate /
analyzed: abhiyoktā balī yasmāt a labdhvā na nivartate

original: MSS_2325-2 upahārādṛte tasmāt saṃdhiranyo na vidyate //
analyzed: upahārāt ṛte tasmāt saṃdhiḥ anyaḥ na vidyate

original: MSS_2326-1 abhirāme'bhiniveśaṃ vidadhānā vividhalābhanirapekṣā /
analyzed: abhirāma ibhiniveśam vidadhānā vividha lābha nirapekṣā

original: MSS_2326-2 upahasyase sumadhye vidagdhavārāṅganāvāraiḥ //
analyzed: upahasyase sumadhye vidagdha vāra aṅganā vāraiḥ

original: MSS_2327-1 abhilakṣyaṃ sthiraṃ puṇyaṃ khyātaṃ sadbhirniṣevitam /
analyzed: abhilakṣyam sthiram puṇyam khyātam sadbhiḥ niṣevitam

original: MSS_2327-2 seveta siddhimanvicchañ ślāghyaṃ vindhyamiveśvaram //
analyzed: seveta siddhim anviccham ślāghyam vindhyam iva īśvaram

original: MSS_2328-1 abhilaṣata upāyaṃ vikramaṃ kīrtilakṣmyor asugamamarisainyairaṅkamabhyāgatasya /
analyzed: abhilaṣataḥ upāyam vikramam kīrti lakṣmyoḥ asugamam ari sainyaiḥ aṅkam abhyāgatasya

original: MSS_2328-2 janaka iva śiśutve supriyasyaikasūnor avinayamapi sehe pāṇḍavasya smarāriḥ //
analyzed: janakaḥ iva śiśu tve su priyasya eka sūnoḥ avinayam api sehe pāṇḍavasya smarāriḥ

original: MSS_2329-1 abhilaṣati na khalu puruṣaḥ śriyamapi kīrtyā vinākṛtāṃ kuśalaḥ /
analyzed: abhilaṣati na khalu puruṣaḥ śriyam api kīrtyā vinākṛtām kuśalaḥ

original: MSS_2329-2 kṣaṇikāya vastune kas tyajatīha cirasthiraṃ śreyaḥ //
analyzed: kṣaṇikāya vastune kaḥ tyajati iha cira sthiram śreyaḥ

original: MSS_2330-1 abhilaṣati padmayonau niḥsvavadhūnāṃ sutān sraṣṭum /
analyzed: abhilaṣati padmayonau niḥsva vadhūnām sutān sraṣṭum

original: MSS_2330-2 svaṃ svaṃ viśaṅkamānā vepante krakacavarttino lokāḥ //
analyzed: svam svam viśaṅkamānāḥ vepante krakaca varttinaḥ lokāḥ

original: MSS_2331-1 abhilaṣatoranubhāvān tilottamāyāḥ kilottamānubhayoḥ /
analyzed: abhilaṣatoḥ anubhāvān tilottamāyāḥ kila uttama anubhayoḥ

original: MSS_2331-2 sundopasundayorapi nāśo bhedādudāhriyate //
analyzed: sunda upasundayoḥ api nāśaḥ bhedāt udāhriyate

original: MSS_2332-1 abhilaṣanti tavādharamādhurīṃ tadiha kiṃ hariṇākṣi mudhā budhāḥ /
analyzed: abhilaṣanti tava adhara mādhurīm tat iha kim hariṇa akṣi mudhā budhāḥ

original: MSS_2332-2 surasudhāmadharīkurute yatas tvadadharo'dharatāmagamat tataḥ //
analyzed: sura sudhām adharīkurute yatas tvad adhara udhara tām agamat tatas

original: MSS_2333-1 abhilaṣasi yadīndo vaktralakṣmīṃ mṛgākṣyāḥ punarapi sakṛdabdhau majja saṃkṣālayāṅkam /
analyzed: abhilaṣasi yadi indo vaktra lakṣmīm mṛgākṣyāḥ punar api sakṛt abdhau majja saṃkṣālaya aṅkam

original: MSS_2333-2 suvimalamatha bimbaṃ pārijātaprasūnaiḥ surabhaya vada no cet tvaṃ kva tasyā mukhaṃ kva //
analyzed: su vimalam atha bimbam pārijāta prasūnaiḥ surabhaya vada no ced tvam kva tasyāḥ mukham kva

original: MSS_2334-1 abhilaṣitādhikavarade praṇipatitajanārtihāriṇi śaraṇye /
analyzed: abhilaṣita adhika vara de praṇipatita jana ārti hāriṇi śaraṇye

original: MSS_2334-2 caraṇau namāmyahaṃ te vidyādharadevate gauri //
analyzed: caraṇau namāmi aham te vidyādhara devate gauri

original: MSS_2335-1 abhivarṣati yo'nupālayan vidhibījāni vivekavāriṇā /
analyzed: abhivarṣati yonupālayan vidhi bījāni viveka vāriṇā

original: MSS_2335-2 sa sadā phalaśālinīṃ kriyāṃ śaradaṃ loka ivādhitiṣṭhati //
analyzed: sa sadā phala śālinīm kriyām śaradam loke iva adhitiṣṭhati

original: MSS_2336-1 abhivādanaśīlasya nityaṃ vṛddhopasevinaḥ /
analyzed: abhivādana śīlasya nityam vṛddha upasevinaḥ

original: MSS_2336-2 catvāri tasya vardhanta āyuḥ prajñā yaśo balam //
analyzed: catvāri tasya vardhante āyuḥ prajñā yaśaḥ balam

original: MSS_2337-1 abhivādayeta vṛddham āsanaṃ cāsya darśayet /
analyzed: abhivādayeta vṛddham āsanam ca asya darśayet

original: MSS_2337-2 kṛtāñjalirupāsīta gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhato'nviyāt //
analyzed: kṛtāñjaliḥ upāsīta gacchantam pṛṣṭhatas nviyāt

original: MSS_2338-1 abhivādya yathā vṛddhān santo gacchanti nirvṛtim /
analyzed: abhivādya yathā vṛddhān santaḥ gacchanti nirvṛtim

original: MSS_2338-2 evaṃ sajjanamākruśya mūrkho bhavati nirvṛtaḥ //
analyzed: evam sat janam ākruśya mūrkhaḥ bhavati nirvṛtaḥ

original: MSS_2339-1 abhivīkṣya sāmikṛtamaṇḍanaṃ yatīḥ kararuddhanīvigaladaṃśukāḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: abhivīkṣya sāmi kṛta maṇḍanam yatīḥ kara ruddha nīvi galat aṃśukāḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_2339-2 dadhire'dhibhitti paṭahapratisvanaiḥ sphuṭamaṭṭahāsamiva saudhapaṅktayaḥ //
analyzed: dadhi redhi bhitti paṭaha pratisvanaiḥ sphuṭam aṭṭahāsam iva saudha paṅktayaḥ

original: MSS_2340-1 abhiśaptaḥ puṇyakārye pravṛtto'pi na siddhibhāk /
analyzed: abhiśaptaḥ puṇya kārye pravṛttaḥ api na siddhi bhāj

original: MSS_2340-2 bhartrānugamanodyuktā reṇukā janamārikā //
analyzed: bhartrā anugamana udyuktā reṇukā jana mārikā

original: MSS_2341-1 abhiśastavat prapaśyanti daridraṃ pārśvataḥ sthitam /
analyzed: abhiśasta vat prapaśyanti daridram pārśvatas sthitam

original: MSS_2341-2 dāridryaṃ pātikaṃ loke kastacchaṃsitumarhati //
analyzed: dāridryam pātikam loke kaḥ tat śaṃsitum arhati

original: MSS_2342-1 abhiṣiṣeṇayiṣuṃ bhuvanāni yaḥ smaramivākhyata lodhrarajaścayaḥ /
analyzed: abhiṣiṣeṇayiṣum bhuvanāni yaḥ smaram iva ākhyata lodhra rajaḥ cayaḥ

original: MSS_2342-2 kṣubhitasainyaparāgavipāṇḍura- dyutirayaṃ tirayannudabhūddiśaḥ //
analyzed: kṣubhita sainya parāga vipāṇḍura dyutiḥ ayam tirayan udabhūt diśaḥ

original: MSS_2343-1 abhiṣekārdraśirasā rājā rājyāvalokinā /
analyzed: abhiṣeka ārdra śirasā rājā rājya avalokinā

original: MSS_2343-2 sahāyavaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ tatra rājyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam //
analyzed: sahāya varaṇam kāryam tatra rājyam pratiṣṭhitam

original: MSS_2344-1 yadapyalpataraṃ karma tadapyekena duṣkaram /
analyzed: yat api alpataram karma tat api ekena duṣkaram

original: MSS_2344-2 puruṣeṇāsahāyena kimu rājyaṃ mahodayam //
analyzed: puruṣeṇa asahāyena kimu rājyam mahā udayam

original: MSS_2345-1 abhisaraṇaparā sadā varākī samaramahādhvasu raktapaṅkileṣu /
analyzed: abhisaraṇa parā sadā varākī samara mahā dhvasu rakta paṅkileṣu

original: MSS_2345-2 hṛdi dharaṇibhujāmiyaṃ nṛpaśrīr nihitapadaiva kalaṅkamātanoti //
analyzed: hṛdi dharaṇi bhujām iyam nṛpa śrīḥ nihita padā eva kalaṅkam ātanoti

original: MSS_2346-1 abhisaraṇamayuktamaṅganānām iti tava sundari mā sma bhūdvitarkaḥ /
analyzed: abhisaraṇam ayuktam aṅganānām iti tava sundari mā sma bhūt vitarkaḥ

original: MSS_2346-2 nanu patimagamat svayaṃ nadīnāṃ saridapi śaṃbhujaṭāmuhūrtamālā //
analyzed: nanu patim agamat svayam nadīnām sarit api śaṃbhu jaṭā muhūrta mālā

original: MSS_2347-1 abhisaraṇarasaḥ kṛśāṅgayaṣṭer ayamaparatra na vīkṣitaḥ śruto vā /
analyzed: abhisaraṇa rasaḥ kṛśa aṅgayaṣṭeḥ ayam aparatra na vīkṣitaḥ śrutaḥ vā

original: MSS_2347-2 ahimapi yadiyaṃ nirāsa nāṅghrer nibiḍatanūpuramātmanīnabuddhyā //
analyzed: ahim api yat iyam nirāsa nā aṅghreḥ nibiḍa ta nūpuram ātmanīna buddhyā

original: MSS_2348-1 abhisāre sarojākṣi yadi gantuṃ samīhase /
analyzed: abhisāre saroja akṣi yadi gantum samīhase

original: MSS_2348-2 samācchādya mukhaṃ yāhi prayatnena priyaṃ prati //
analyzed: samācchādya mukham yāhi prayatnena priyam prati

original: MSS_2349-1 abhihanti hanta kathameṣa mādhavaṃ sukumārakāyamanavagrahaḥ smaraḥ /
analyzed: abhihanti hanta katham eṣa mādhavam su kumāra kāyam anavagrahaḥ smaraḥ

original: MSS_2349-2 acireṇa vaikṛtavivartadāruṇaḥ kalabhaṃ kaṭhora iva kūṭapākalaḥ //
analyzed: acireṇa vaikṛta vivarta dāruṇaḥ kalabham kaṭhoraḥ iva kūṭapākalaḥ

original: MSS_2350-1 abhihitāpyabhiyogaparāṅmukhī prakaṭamaṅgavilāsamakurvatī /
analyzed: abhihitā api abhiyoga parāṅmukhī prakaṭam aṅga vilāsam akurvatī

original: MSS_2350-2 upari te puruṣāyitumakṣamā navavadhūriva śatrupatākinī //
analyzed: upari te puruṣāyitum akṣamā nava vadhūḥ iva śatru patākinī

original: MSS_2351-1 abhīkṣṇamuccairdhvanatā payomucā ghanāndhakārīkṛtaśarvarīṣvapi /
analyzed: abhīkṣṇam uccais dhvanatā payomucā ghana andhakārī kṛta śarvarīṣu api

original: MSS_2351-2 taḍitprabhādarśitamārgabhūmayaḥ prayānti rāgādabhisārikāḥ striyaḥ //
analyzed: taḍit prabhā darśita mārga bhūmayaḥ prayānti rāgāt abhisārikāḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_2352-1 abhīkṣṇamuṣṇairapi tasya soṣmaṇaḥ surendrabandīśvasitānilairyathā /
analyzed: abhīkṣṇam uṣṇaiḥ api tasya sa ūṣmaṇaḥ surendra bandī śvasita anilaiḥ yathā

original: MSS_2352-2 sacandanāmbhaḥkaṇakomalaistathā vapurjalārdrāpavanairna nirvavau //
analyzed: sa candana ambhaḥ kaṇa komalaiḥ tathā vapuḥ jala ārdrā pavanaiḥ na nirvavau

original: MSS_2353-1 abhīpsāṃ svātmano rakṣā'virataṃ susthiraṃ tathā /
analyzed: abhīpsām sva ātmanaḥ rakṣā viratam susthiram tathā

original: MSS_2353-2 yatnamātiṣṭha dhairyeṇa tataḥ siddhirbhaved dhruvam //
analyzed: yatnam ātiṣṭha dhairyeṇa tatas siddhiḥ bhavet dhruvam

original: MSS_2354-1 abhīṣṭaphalasaṃsiddhis tuṣṭiḥ kāmyā susaṃpadaḥ /
MSS_2354-2 dvitribhirbahubhi sārdhaṃ bhojanena prajāyate //
analyzed: dvi tribhiḥ bahubhiḥ sārdham bhojanena prajāyate

original: MSS_2355-1 abhīṣṭamāsādya cirāya kāle samuddhṛtāśaṃ kamanī cakāśe /
analyzed: abhīṣṭam āsādya cirāya kāle samuddhṛta āśam kamanī cakāśe

original: MSS_2355-2 yoṣinmanojanmasukhodayeṣu samuddhṛtāśaṅkamanīcakāśe //
analyzed: yoṣit manaḥ janma sukha udayeṣu samuddhṛta āśaṅkam anī cakāśe

original: MSS_2356-1 abhuktāyāṃ yasyāṃ kṣaṇamapi na yātaṃ nṛpaśatair bhuvas tasyā lābhe ka iva bahumānaḥ kṣitibhujām /
analyzed: abhuktāyām yasyām kṣaṇam api na yātam nṛpa śataiḥ bhuvaḥ tasyāḥ lābhe kaḥ iva bahu mānaḥ kṣitibhujām

original: MSS_2356-2 tadaṃśasyāpyaṃśe tadavayavaleśe'pi patayo viṣāde kartavye vidadhati jaḍāḥ pratyuta mudam //
analyzed: tad aṃśasya api aṃśe tad avayava leśe pi patayaḥ viṣāde kartavye vidadhati jaḍāḥ pratyuta mudam

original: MSS_2357-1 abhuktvāmalakaṃ pathyaṃ bhuktvā tu badarīphalam /
MSS_2357-2 kapitthaṃ sarvadā pathyaṃ kadalī na kadācana //
analyzed: kapittham sarvadā pathyam kadalī na kadācana

original: MSS_2358-1 abhuñjatāṃścādadatāṃ dhanaṃ caurā haranti hi /
analyzed: abhuñjatān ca adadatām dhanam caurāḥ haranti hi

original: MSS_2358-2 saraghāṇāṃ yathā sarvaṃ mākṣikaṃ vanacāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: saraghāṇām yathā sarvam mākṣikam vana cāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_2359-1 abhūtapūrvaṃ mama bhāvi kiṃ vā sarvaṃ sahe me sahajaṃ ca duḥkham /
analyzed: abhūta pūrvam mama bhāvi kim vā sarvam sahe me sahajam ca duḥkham

original: MSS_2359-2 kiṃ tu tvadagre śaraṇāgatānāṃ parābhavo nātha na te'nurūpam //
analyzed: kim tu tvad agre śaraṇa āgatānām parābhavaḥ nātha na te nurūpam

original: MSS_2360-1 abhūtamāsajya viruddhamīhitaṃ balādalabhyaṃ tava lipsate nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: abhūtam āsajya viruddham īhitam balāt alabhyam tava lipsate nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_2360-2 vijānato'pi hyanayasya raudratāṃ bhavatyapāye parimohinī matiḥ //
analyzed: vijānataḥ api hi anayasya raudra tām bhavati apāye parimohinī matiḥ
