original: MSS_2361-1 abhūt prācī piṅgā rasapatiriva prāśya kanakaṃ gatacchāyaścandro budhajana iva grāmyasadasi /
analyzed: abhūt prācī piṅgā rasapatiḥ iva prāśya kanakam gata chāyaḥ candraḥ budha janaḥ iva grāmya sadasi

original: MSS_2361-2 kṣaṇāt kṣīṇāstārā nṛpataya ivānudyamaparā na dīpā rājante draviṇarahitānāmiva guṇāḥ //
analyzed: kṣaṇāt kṣīṇāḥ tārāḥ nṛpatayaḥ iva anudyama parāḥ na dīpāḥ rājante draviṇa rahitānām iva guṇāḥ

original: MSS_2362-1 abhūdambhorāśeḥ saha vasatirāsīt kamalayā guṇānāmādhāro nayanaphalaminduḥ prathayati /
analyzed: abhūt ambhorāśeḥ saha vasatiḥ āsīt kamalayā guṇānām ādhāraḥ nayana phalam induḥ prathayati

original: MSS_2362-2 kathaṃ siṃhīsūnustamapi tudati prauḍhadaśanair guṇānāmāsvādaṃ piśunarasanā kiṃ rasayati //
analyzed: katham siṃhī sūnuḥ tam api tudati prauḍha daśanaiḥ guṇānām āsvādam piśuna rasanā kim rasayati

original: MSS_2363-1 abhūvannadbhutoṣmāṇaḥ śītavyāpte jagattraye /
analyzed: abhūvan adbhuta ūṣmāṇaḥ śīta vyāpte jagattraye

original: MSS_2363-2 kucotsaṅgāḥ kṛśāṅgīṇāṃ sthānaṃ manmathatejasaḥ //
analyzed: kuca utsaṅgāḥ kṛśa aṅgīṇām sthānam manmatha tejasaḥ

original: MSS_2364-1 abhedenaiva yudhyeran rakṣeyuśca parasparam /
analyzed: abhedena eva yudhyeran rakṣeyuḥ ca parasparam

original: MSS_2364-2 phalgu sainyasya yat kiṃcin madhye vyūhasya tadbhavet //
analyzed: phalgu sainyasya yat kiṃcid madhye vyūhasya tat bhavet

original: MSS_2365-1 abhedenopāste kumudamudare vā sthitavato vipakṣādambhojādupagatavato vā madhulihaḥ /
analyzed: abhedena upāste kumudam udare vā sthitavataḥ vipakṣāt ambhojāt upagatavataḥ vā madhulihaḥ

original: MSS_2365-2 aparyāptaḥ ko'pi svaparaparicaryāparicaya- prabandhaḥ sādhūnāmayamanabhisaṃdhānamadhuraḥ //
analyzed: a paryāptaḥ kaḥ api sva para paricaryā paricaya prabandhaḥ sādhūnām ayam an abhisaṃdhāna madhuraḥ

original: MSS_2366-1 abhedyo'nuddhataḥ stabdhaḥ sūnṛtaḥ priyadarśanaḥ /
analyzed: abhedyaḥ unuddhataḥ stabdhaḥ sūnṛtaḥ priya darśanaḥ

original: MSS_2366-2 bahuśrutaḥ kālavedī jitagrantho'rthakarmavit //
MSS_2367-1 abhogasubhagā bhūtir adainyadhavalaṃ kulam /
analyzed: a bhoga subhagā bhūtiḥ a dainya dhavalam kulam

original: MSS_2367-2 adarpaviśadā vidyā bhavatyunnatacetasām //
analyzed: a darpa viśadā vidyā bhavati unnata cetasām

original: MSS_2368-1 abhoginau maṇḍalinau tatkṣaṇānmuktakañcukau /
analyzed: abhoginau maṇḍalinau tad kṣaṇāt mukta kañcukau

original: MSS_2368-2 varamāśīviṣau spṛṣṭau na tu patnyāḥ payodharau //
analyzed: varam āśīviṣau spṛṣṭau na tu patnyāḥ payodharau

original: MSS_2369-1 abhyaktaṃ rahasi gataṃ vicittamanyena mantrayantaṃ vā /
analyzed: abhyaktam rahasi gatam vicittam anyena mantrayantam vā

original: MSS_2369-2 ucitapraṇayamapi nṛpaṃ sahasāryā nopasarpanti //
analyzed: ucita praṇayam api nṛpam sahasā āryāḥ na upasarpanti

original: MSS_2370-1 abhyaktamiva snātaḥ śuciraśucimiva prabuddha iva suptam /
analyzed: abhyaktam iva snātaḥ śuciḥ aśucim iva prabuddhaḥ iva suptam

original: MSS_2370-2 baddhamiva strairagatir janamiha sukhasaṅginamavaimi //
analyzed: baddham iva straiḥ agatiḥ janam iha sukha saṅginam avaimi

original: MSS_2371-1 abhyaghāni municāpalāt tvayā yanmṛgaḥ kṣitipateḥ parigrahaḥ /
analyzed: abhyaghāni muni cāpalāt tvayā yat mṛgaḥ kṣitipateḥ parigrahaḥ

original: MSS_2371-2 akṣamiṣṭa tadayaṃ pramādyatāṃ saṃvṛṇoti khalu doṣamajñatā //
analyzed: akṣamiṣṭa tat ayam pramādyatām saṃvṛṇoti khalu doṣam ajña tā

original: MSS_2371A-1 abhyantaragatā bāhyā bāhyāścābhyataraṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: abhyantara gatāḥ bāhyāḥ bāhyāḥ ca abhyataram gatāḥ

original: MSS_2371A-2 yairnarā nidhanaṃ yānti yathā rājā kacadrumaḥ //
analyzed: yaiḥ narāḥ nidhanam yānti yathā rājā kaca drumaḥ

original: MSS_2372-1 abhyarthaye kimapi jīvitajanmatastvām utkaṇṭhatodgati niḥsara tāvadeva /
analyzed: abhyarthaye kim api jīvita janmataḥ tvām utkaṇṭhatā udgati niḥsara tāvat eva

original: MSS_2372-2 kānte dṛgantapathalambini jīvatīti yāvanna karṇapathameti janāpavādaḥ //
analyzed: kānte dṛś anta patha lambini jīvati iti yāvat na karṇa patham eti jana apavādaḥ

original: MSS_2373-1 abhyarthya sapraṇati mandiramabhyupetā devī svayaṃ bhagavatī pṛthageva tāsām /
analyzed: abhyarthya sa praṇati mandiram abhyupetā devī svayam bhagavatī pṛthak eva tāsām

original: MSS_2373-2 āsannavallabhasamāgamasūcanāni saṃjīvanāni vacanānyapi vācitāni //
analyzed: āsanna vallabha samāgama sūcanāni saṃjīvanāni vacanāni api vācitāni

original: MSS_2374-1 abhyastāḥ sphuṭameva śāstragatayaḥ samyakkavitvodadheḥ pāraṃ cādhigataṃ satāṃ pariṣadi prāptaḥ pratiṣṭhodayaḥ /
analyzed: abhyastāḥ sphuṭam eva śāstra gatayaḥ samyak kavi tva udadheḥ pāram ca adhigatam satām pariṣadi prāptaḥ pratiṣṭhā udayaḥ

original: MSS_2374-2 nirviṇṇasya mamādhunā nanu paraḥ panthā na dainyaṃ vinā netuṃ vāñchati vāsanā suradhunītīre'nurūpaṃ vayaḥ //
analyzed: nirviṇṇasya mama adhunā nanu paraḥ panthāḥ na dainyam vinā netum vāñchati vāsanā suradhunī tīre nurūpam vayaḥ

original: MSS_2375-1 abhyaste'pi nitambabhāraphalake khedālaseyaṃ gatiḥ kiṃcit saṃvalitārdhapakṣmaviralālokā dṛśo'ntargatāḥ /
analyzed: abhyaste api nitamba bhāra phalake kheda alasā iyam gatiḥ kiṃcid saṃvalita ardha pakṣma virala ālokāḥ dṛśaḥ antargatāḥ

original: MSS_2375-2 tanmanye nibhṛtaṃ tvayādya hṛdaye kaściddhṛto vallabho niśvāsāḥ kathamanyathā dviguṇatāmete tavaivaṃ gatāḥ //
analyzed: tat manye nibhṛtam tvayā adya hṛdaye kaścid hṛtaḥ vallabhaḥ niśvāsāḥ katham anyathā dviguṇa tām ete tava evam gatāḥ

original: MSS_2376-1 abhyaste'pi hi nāma vastuni cirādajñānasaṃbhāvanaṃ śaucāśaucāvivāditā viśakalasmṛtyakṣarāvartanam /
analyzed: abhyaste api hi nāma vastuni cirāt ajñāna saṃbhāvanam śauca aśauca avivādi tā viśakala smṛti akṣara āvartanam

original: MSS_2376-2 vāraṃ vāramṛṇopaghātakathanaṃ ko'pyeṣa ḍambhātmanāṃ prāyo dagdhadurīśavañcanavidhau jāgartyapūrvaḥ kramaḥ //
analyzed: vāram vāram ṛṇa upaghāta kathanam kopī eṣa ḍambha ātmanām prāyas dagdha durīśa vañcana vidhau jāgarti apūrvaḥ kramaḥ

original: MSS_2377-1 abhyasya pavanavijayaṃ vyākhyāya ca śaivasaṃhitāḥ sakalāḥ /
analyzed: abhyasya pavanavijayam vyākhyāya ca śaiva saṃhitāḥ sakalāḥ

original: MSS_2377-2 maraṇasamaye gurūṇāṃ pardavadasavo viniṣkrāntāḥ //
analyzed: maraṇa samaye gurūṇām pardavat asavaḥ viniṣkrāntāḥ

original: MSS_2378-1 abhyasya vedamavadhāya ca pūrvatantram ālakṣya śiṣṭacaritāni pṛthagvidhāni /
analyzed: abhyasya vedam avadhāya ca pūrva tantram ālakṣya śiṣṭa caritāni pṛthagvidhāni

original: MSS_2378-2 adhyāpanādibhiravāpya dhanaṃ ca bhūri karmāṇi mātaralasāḥ kathamācareyuḥ //
analyzed: adhyāpana ādibhiḥ avāpya dhanam ca bhūri karmāṇi mātar alasāḥ katham ācareyuḥ

original: MSS_2379-1 abhyasya smaradaṃśakauśalamupādhyāyīrupāsyāvayoḥ krīḍāmnāyarahasyavastuni mitho'pyāsījjigīṣā sakhi /
analyzed: abhyasya smarat aṃśa kauśalam upādhyāyīḥ upāsya āvayoḥ krīḍā āmnāya rahasya vastuni mithas upi āsīt jigīṣā sakhi

original: MSS_2379-2 utkampotpulakāṅgasaṃbhṛtaghanasvedāvilastanmayā sadyo niṣpratibhaḥ sa manmathakathāvaitaṇḍikaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: utkampa utpulaka aṅga saṃbhṛta ghana sveda āvilaḥ tad mayā sadyas niṣpratibhaḥ sa manmatha kathā vaitaṇḍikaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_2380-1 abhyasyādau śrutimatha gṛhaṃ prāpya labdhvā mahārthān iṣṭvā yajñairjanitatanayaḥ pravrajedāyuṣo'nte /
analyzed: abhyasya ādau śrutim atha gṛham prāpya labdhvā mahārthān iṣṭvā yajñaiḥ janita tanayaḥ pravrajet āyuṣā ūnte

original: MSS_2380-2 ityācaṣṭe ya iha sa manuryājñavalkyo'pi vā me tāvat kālaṃ pratibhavati cedāyuṣastatpramāṇam //
analyzed: iti ācaṣṭe yaḥ iha sa manuḥ yājñavalkyaḥ api vā me tāvat kālam pratibhavati ced āyuṣaḥ tat pramāṇam

original: MSS_2381-1 abhyāyāntaṃ jhaṭiti gilituṃ vāyumapyāyatāsye bhīmākāre prakṛtikuṭile baddhanirvyājavaire /
analyzed: abhyāyāntam jhaṭiti gilitum vāyum api āyata āsye bhīma ākāre prakṛti kuṭile baddha nirvyāja vaire

original: MSS_2381-2 prāyeṇetthaṃ kṛtaparicaye pāpini krūrasarpe bhadraśrībhiḥ paricitikathā kīdṛśī mādṛśānām //
analyzed: prāyeṇa ittham kṛta paricaye pāpini krūra sarpe bhadra śrībhiḥ pariciti kathā kīdṛśī mādṛśānām

original: MSS_2382-1 abhyāvahati kalyāṇaṃ vividhā vāksubhāṣitā /
analyzed: abhyāvahati kalyāṇam vividhā vāc su bhāṣitā

original: MSS_2382-2 saiva durbhāṣitā rājann anarthāyopapadyate //
analyzed: sā eva durbhāṣitā rājan anarthāya upapadyate

original: MSS_2383-1 abhyāsaḥ karmaṇāṃ samyag utpādayati kauśalam /
analyzed: abhyāsaḥ karmaṇām samyak utpādayati kauśalam

original: MSS_2383-2 vidhinā tāvadabhyastaṃ yāvat sṛṣṭā mṛgekṣaṇā //
analyzed: vidhinā tāvat abhyastam yāvat sṛṣṭā mṛga īkṣaṇā

original: MSS_2384-1 abhyāsakāraṇā vidyā lakṣmīḥ puṇyānusāriṇī /
analyzed: abhyāsa kāraṇā vidyā lakṣmīḥ puṇya anusāriṇī

original: MSS_2384-2 dānānusāriṇī kīrtir buddhiḥ karmānusāriṇī //
analyzed: dāna anusāriṇī kīrtiḥ buddhiḥ karma anusāriṇī

original: MSS_2385-1 abhyāsarahitā vidyā nirudyogā nṛpaśriyaḥ /
analyzed: abhyāsa rahitāḥ vidyāḥ nirudyogāḥ nṛpa śriyaḥ

original: MSS_2385-2 veṣayoṣāśca rāgiṇyo hāsyāyatanamaṅgane //
analyzed: veṣa yoṣāḥ ca rāgiṇyaḥ hāsya āyatanam aṅgane

original: MSS_2386-1 abhyāsaśchandasāṃ daṇḍo jvaradaṇḍaśca laṅghanam /
analyzed: abhyāsaḥ chandasām daṇḍaḥ jvara daṇḍaḥ ca laṅghanam

original: MSS_2386-2 yamadaṇḍo viṣṇubhaktiḥ śatrudaṇḍaḥ śubhā gatiḥ //
MSS_2387-1 abhyāsasthitacūtaṣaṇḍagahanasthānādito gehinī grāmaṃ kaṃcidavṛkṣakaṃ virahiṇī tūrṇaṃ vadhūrnīyatām /
analyzed: abhyāsa sthita cūta ṣaṇḍa gahana sthānāt itas gehinī grāmam kaṃcid avṛkṣakam virahiṇī tūrṇam vadhūḥ nīyatām

original: MSS_2387-2 atrāyāntyacireṇa kokilakulavyāhārajhaṃkāriṇaḥ panthastrījanajīvitaikaharaṇaprauḍhāḥ puro vāsarāḥ //
analyzed: atra āyānti acireṇa kokila kula vyāhāra jhaṃkāriṇaḥ pantha strī jana jīvita eka haraṇa prauḍhāḥ puras vāsarāḥ

original: MSS_2388-1 abhyāsāttu sthirasvānta ūrdhvaretāśca jāyate /
analyzed: abhyāsāt tu sthira svāntaḥ ūrdhvaretāḥ ca jāyate

original: MSS_2388-2 parānandamayo yogī jarāmaraṇavarjitaḥ //
MSS_2389-1 abhyāsāddhāryate vidyā kulaṃ śīlena dhāryate /
analyzed: abhyāsāt dhāryate vidyā kulam śīlena dhāryate

original: MSS_2389-2 guṇena jñāyate tvāryaḥ kopo netreṇa gamyate //
analyzed: guṇena jñāyate tu āryaḥ kopaḥ netreṇa gamyate

original: MSS_2390-1 abhyāsāddhāryate vidyā kulaṃ śīlena dhāryate /
analyzed: abhyāsāt dhāryate vidyā kulam śīlena dhāryate

original: MSS_2390-2 guṇairmitrāṇi dhāryante akṣṇā krodhaśca dhāryate //
analyzed: guṇaiḥ mitrāṇi dhāryante akṣṇā krodhaḥ ca dhāryate

original: MSS_2391-1 abhyāsānusarī vidyā buddhiḥ karmānusāriṇī /
MSS_2391-2 udyogānusarī lakṣmīḥ phalaṃ bhāgyānusāri ca //
analyzed: udyoga anusarī lakṣmīḥ phalam bhāgya anusāri ca

original: MSS_2392-1 abhyāsena sthiraṃ cittam abhyāsenānilacyutiḥ /
analyzed: abhyāsena sthiram cittam abhyāsena anila cyutiḥ

original: MSS_2392-2 abhyāsena parānando hyabhyāsenātmadarśanam //
analyzed: abhyāsena para ānandaḥ hi abhyāsena ātma darśanam

original: MSS_2393-1 abhyāsenānyasaṃcāro hyabhyāsenānyarūpatā /
analyzed: abhyāsena anya saṃcāraḥ hi abhyāsena anya rūpa tā

original: MSS_2393-2 abhyāsena samutkrāntir abhyāsenāṇimādayaḥ //
analyzed: abhyāsena samutkrāntiḥ abhyāsena aṇima ādayaḥ

original: MSS_2394-1 abhyāso ratihetor bhavati narāṇāṃ na vastusadguṇataḥ /
analyzed: abhyāsaḥ rati hetoḥ bhavati narāṇām na vastu sat guṇataḥ

original: MSS_2394-2 satyapi māṃsopacaye rāgāya kucau sphijau na punaḥ //
analyzed: sati api māṃsa upacaye rāgāya kucau sphijau na punar

original: MSS_2395-1 abhyāso hi karmaṇāṃ kauśalamāvahati /
analyzed: abhyāsaḥ hi karmaṇām kauśalam āvahati

original: MSS_2395-2 na hi sakṛnnipātamātreṇoda- bindurapi grāvaṇi nimnatāmādadhāti //
analyzed: na hi sakṛt nipāta mātreṇa uda binduḥ api grāvaṇi nimna tām ādadhāti

original: MSS_2396-1 abhyukṣito'si salilairna balāhakānāṃ cāṣāgrapakṣasadṛśaṃ bhṛśamantarāle /
analyzed: abhyukṣitaḥ asi salilaiḥ na balāhakānām cāṣa agra pakṣa sadṛśam bhṛśam antarāle

original: MSS_2396-2 mithyaitadānanamidaṃ bhavatastathā hi hemantapadmamiva niṣprabhatāmupaiti //
analyzed: mithyā etat ānanam idam bhavataḥ tathā hi hemanta padmam iva niṣprabha tām upaiti

original: MSS_2397-1 abhyutthānamupāgate gṛhapatau tadbhāṣaṇe namratā tatpādārpitadṛṣṭirāsanavidhistasyopacaryā svayam /
analyzed: abhyutthānam upāgate gṛhapatau tad bhāṣaṇe namra tā tad pāda arpita dṛṣṭiḥ āsana vidhiḥ tasya upacaryā svayam

original: MSS_2397-2 supte tatra śayīta tatprathamato jahyācca śayyāmiti prācyaiḥ putri niveditaḥ kulavadhūsiddhāntadharmāgamaḥ //
analyzed: supte tatra śayīta tad prathamatas jahyāt ca śayyām iti prācyaiḥ putri niveditaḥ kula vadhū siddhānta dharma āgamaḥ

original: MSS_2398-1 abhyuddhṛtā vasumatī dalitaṃ ripūraḥ krīḍīkṛtā balavatā balirājalakṣmīḥ /
analyzed: abhyuddhṛtā vasumatī dalitam ripūraḥ krīḍīkṛtā balavatā bali rāja lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_2398-2 ekatra janmani kṛtaṃ tadanena yūnā janmatraye yadakarot puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ //
analyzed: ekatra janmani kṛtam tat anena yūnā janma traye yat akarot puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: MSS_2399-1 abhyudyatkavalagrahapraṇayinaste śallakīpallavās taccāsphālasahaṃ saraḥ kṣitidhṛtāmityasti ko nihnute /
analyzed: abhyudyat kavalagraha praṇayinaḥ te śallakī pallavāḥ tat ca āsphāla saham saraḥ kṣiti dhṛtām iti asti kaḥ nihnute

original: MSS_2399-2 dantastambhaniṣaṇṇaniḥsahakaraḥ śvāsairatiprāṃśubhir yenāyaṃ virahī tu vāraṇapatiḥ svāmin sa vindhyo bhavān //
analyzed: danta stambha niṣaṇṇa niḥsaha karaḥ śvāsaiḥ ati prāṃśubhiḥ yena ayam virahī tu vāraṇa patiḥ svāmin sa vindhyaḥ bhavān

original: MSS_2400-1 abhyunnatastanayugā taralāyatākṣī dvāri sthitā tadupayānamahotsavāya /
analyzed: abhyunnata stana yugā tarala āyata akṣī dvāri sthitā tad upayāna mahā utsavāya

original: MSS_2400-2 sā pūrṇakumbhanavanīrajatoraṇasrak saṃbhāramaṅgalamayatnakṛtaṃ vidhatte //
analyzed: sā pūrṇa kumbha nava nīraja toraṇa sraj saṃbhāra maṅgalam ayatna kṛtam vidhatte

original: MSS_2401-1 abhyunnatāṅguṣṭhanakhaprabhābhir nikṣepaṇādrāgamivodgirantau /
analyzed: abhyunnata aṅguṣṭha nakha prabhābhiḥ nikṣepaṇāt rāgam iva udgirantau

original: MSS_2401-2 ājahratustaccaraṇau pṛthivyāṃ sthalāravindaśriyamavyavasthām //
analyzed: ājahratuḥ tad caraṇau pṛthivyām sthala aravinda śriyam avyavasthām

original: MSS_2402-1 abhyunnatānāmaṇurapyudāraṃ paścāt prakopaṃ janayedarīṇām /
analyzed: abhyunnatānām aṇuḥ api udāram paścāt prakopam janayet arīṇām

original: MSS_2402-2 taṃ cāpramattaḥ prasamīkṣya yāyān- na nāśayed dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭahetoḥ //
analyzed: tam ca apramattaḥ prasamīkṣya yāyāt na nāśayet dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭa hetoḥ

original: MSS_2403-1 abhyunnatā purastād avagāḍhā jaghanagauravāt paścāt /
analyzed: abhyunnatā purastāt avagāḍhā jaghana gauravāt paścāt

original: MSS_2403-2 dvāre'sya pāṇḍusikate padapaṅktirdṛśyate'bhinavā //
analyzed: pāṇḍu sikate pada paṅktiḥ dṛśyate bhinavā

original: MSS_2404-1 abhyunnate'pi jalade jagadekasāra- sādhāraṇapraṇayahāriṇi hā yadete /
analyzed: abhyunnate api jalade jagat eka sāra sādhāraṇa praṇaya hāriṇi hā yat ete

original: MSS_2404-2 ullāsalāsyalalitaṃ taravo na yānti he dāvapāvaka sa tāvaka eva doṣaḥ //
analyzed: ullāsa lāsya lalitam taravaḥ na yānti he dāva pāvaka sa tāvakaḥ eva doṣaḥ

original: MSS_2405-1 abhyunnatevāṅghrinakhāṅkurāṇāṃ dyutirvireje hariṇī dṛśo'syāḥ /
analyzed: abhyunnatā iva aṅghri nakha aṅkurāṇām dyutiḥ vireje hariṇī dṛśaḥ asyāḥ

original: MSS_2405-2 puṅkhāvalī pañcaśarā yudhānāṃ lāvaṇyadarpadviguṇīkṛteva //
analyzed: puṅkha āvalī pañca śarā yudhānām lāvaṇya darpa dvi guṇīkṛtā iva

original: MSS_2406-1 abhyunnato'si salilaiḥ paripūrito'si tvāmarthayanti vihagāstṛṣitāstathaite /
analyzed: abhyunnataḥ asi salilaiḥ paripūritaḥ usi tvām arthayanti vihagāḥ tṛṣitāḥ tathā ete

original: MSS_2406-2 kālaḥ payodhara paropakṛtestavāyaṃ caṇḍānilavyatikare kva bhavān kva te vā //
analyzed: kālaḥ payodhara para upakṛteḥ tava ayam caṇḍa anila vyatikare kva bhavān kva te vā

original: MSS_2407-1 abhyupayuktāḥ sadbhir gatāgatairaharahaḥ prakhindānāḥ /
analyzed: abhyupayuktāḥ sadbhiḥ gata āgataiḥ ahar ahar prakhindānāḥ

original: MSS_2407-2 kṛpaṇajanasaṃnikarṣaṃ prāpyārthāḥ prasvapantīva //
analyzed: kṛpaṇa jana saṃnikarṣam prāpya arthāḥ prasvapanti iva

original: MSS_2408-1 abhyullasanti vinivāritacandanānām eṇīdṛśāṃ vapuṣi kuṅkumapatralekhāḥ /
analyzed: abhyullasanti vinivārita candanānām eṇī dṛśām vapuṣi kuṅkuma patra lekhāḥ

original: MSS_2408-2 abhyāgatāḥ karasarojapadāravinda- saṃrakṣaṇāya kiraṇā iva tigmabhānoḥ //
analyzed: abhyāgatāḥ kara saroja pada aravinda saṃrakṣaṇāya kiraṇāḥ iva tigmabhānoḥ

original: MSS_2409-1 abhyuṣṇāt saghṛtādannād acchidrāccaiva vāsasaḥ /
analyzed: abhyuṣṇāt sa ghṛtāt annāt acchidrāt ca eva vāsasaḥ

original: MSS_2409-2 aparapreṣyabhāvācca bhūya icchan patatyadhaḥ //
analyzed: apara preṣya bhāvāt ca bhūyas icchan patati adhas

original: MSS_2410-1 abhyetya yācito'pi tyaktvā lajjāṃ mayā vigatalajjaḥ /
analyzed: abhyetya yācitaḥ api tyaktvā lajjām mayā vigata lajjaḥ

original: MSS_2410-2 cicchedaiṣa mamāśāṃ sahasā pratiṣedhaśastreṇa //
analyzed: ciccheda eṣa mama āśām sahasā pratiṣedha śastreṇa

original: MSS_2411-1 abhracchāyā khalaprītiḥ samudrānte ca medinī /
analyzed: abhra chāyā khala prītiḥ samudra ante ca medinī

original: MSS_2411-2 alpenaiva vinaśyanti yauvanāni dhanāni ca //
analyzed: alpena eva vinaśyanti yauvanāni dhanāni ca

original: MSS_2412-1 abhracchāyā khalaprītir navasasyāni yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: abhra chāyā khala prītiḥ nava sasyāni yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_2412-2 kiṃcitkālopabhogyāni yauvanāni dhanāni ca //
analyzed: kiṃcid kāla upabhogyāni yauvanāni dhanāni ca

original: MSS_2413-1 abhracchāyā khalaprītir veśyārāgo vibhūtayaḥ /
MSS_2413-2 mahībhujāṃ prasādaśca pañcaite cañcalāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: mahībhujām prasādaḥ ca pañcā ete cañcalāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: MSS_2414-1 abhracchāyā tṛṇādagniḥ khalaprītiḥ sthale jalam /
analyzed: abhra chāyā tṛṇāt agniḥ khala prītiḥ sthale jalam

original: MSS_2414-2 veśyārāgaḥ kumitraṃ ca ṣaḍete budbudopamāḥ //
analyzed: veśyā rāgaḥ kumitram ca ṣaṭ ete budbuda upamāḥ

original: MSS_2415-1 abhracchāyā tṛṇādagniḥ parādhīnaṃ ca yat sukham /
analyzed: abhra chāyā tṛṇāt agniḥ para adhīnam ca yat sukham

original: MSS_2415-2 ajñāneṣu ca vairāgyaṃ kṣiprametad vinaśyati //
analyzed: ajñāneṣu ca vairāgyam kṣipram etat vinaśyati

original: MSS_2416-1 abhradhvānairmukharitadiśaḥ śreṇayastoyadānāṃ dhārāsārairdharaṇivalayaṃ sarvataḥ plāvayanti /
analyzed: abhra dhvānaiḥ mukharita diśaḥ śreṇayaḥ toyadānām dhārā sāraiḥ dharaṇi valayam sarvatas plāvayanti

original: MSS_2416-2 tena snehaṃ vahati vipulaṃ matsakhīyuktametat tvam niḥsneho yadasi tadidaṃ nātha me vismayāya //
analyzed: tena sneham vahati vipulam mad sakhī yuktam etat tvam niḥsnehaḥ yat asi tat idam nātha me vismayāya

original: MSS_2417-1 abhrapuṣpamapi ditsati śītaṃ sārthinā vimukhatā yadabhāji /
analyzed: abhra puṣpam api ditsati śītam sārthinā vimukha tā yat abhāji

original: MSS_2417-2 stokakasya khalu cañcupuṭena mlānirullasati tadghanasaṃghe //
analyzed: stokakasya khalu cañcu puṭena mlāniḥ ullasati tad ghana saṃghe

original: MSS_2418-1 abhravṛndaṃ viśākhāntaṃ prasūtyantaṃ ca yauvanam /
analyzed: abhra vṛndam viśākhā antam prasūti antam ca yauvanam

original: MSS_2418-2 rājyāntaṃ narakaṃ tadvad yācanāntaṃ hi gauravam //
analyzed: rājya antam narakam tadvat yācanā antam hi gauravam

original: MSS_2419-1 abhrūvilāsamaspṛṣṭamadarāgaṃ mṛgekṣaṇam /
analyzed: a bhrū vilāsam a spṛṣṭa mada rāgam mṛga īkṣaṇam

original: MSS_2419-2 idaṃ tu nayanadvandvaṃ tava tadguṇabhūṣitam //
analyzed: idam tu nayana dvandvam tava tad guṇa bhūṣitam

original: MSS_2420-1 amajjadākaṇṭhamasau sudhāsu priyaṃ priyāyā vacanaṃ nipīya /
analyzed: amajjat ākaṇṭham asau sudhāsu priyam priyāyāḥ vacanam nipīya

original: MSS_2420-2 dviṣanmukhe'pi svadate stutiryā tanmiṣṭatā neṣṭamukhe tvameyā //
analyzed: dviṣat mukhe api svadate stutiḥ yā tad miṣṭa tā na iṣṭa mukhe tu ameyā

original: MSS_2421-1 amadayanmadhugandhasanāthayā kisalayādharasaṃgatayā manaḥ /
analyzed: amadayat madhu gandha sanāthayā kisalaya adhara saṃgatayā manaḥ

original: MSS_2421-2 kusumasaṃbhṛtayā navamallikā smitarucā tarucāruvilāsinī //
analyzed: kusuma saṃbhṛtayā nava mallikā smita rucā taru cāru vilāsinī

original: MSS_2422-1 amanaskaṃ gate citte jāyate karmaṇāṃ kṣayaḥ /
analyzed: amanaskam gate citte jāyate karmaṇām kṣayaḥ

original: MSS_2422-2 yathā citrapaṭe dagdhe dahyate citrasaṃcayaḥ //
analyzed: yathā citra paṭe dagdhe dahyate citra saṃcayaḥ

original: MSS_2423-1 amantramakṣaraṃ nāsti nāsti mūlamanauṣadham /
analyzed: amantram akṣaram na asti na asti mūlam anauṣadham

original: MSS_2423-2 ayogyaḥ puruṣo nāsti yojakastatra durlabhaḥ //
analyzed: ayogyaḥ puruṣaḥ na asti yojakaḥ tatra durlabhaḥ

original: MSS_2424-1 amantramakṣaraṃ nāsti nāsti mūlamanauṣadham /
analyzed: amantram akṣaram na asti na asti mūlam anauṣadham

original: MSS_2424-2 nirdhanā pṛthivī nāsti hyāmnāyāḥ khalu durlabhāḥ //
analyzed: nirdhanā pṛthivī na asti hi āmnāyāḥ khalu durlabhāḥ

original: MSS_2425-1 amandataravāryagradhārāhatamahībhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: amandatara vāri agra dhārā āhata mahībhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_2425-2 citracāpadharā vīrā vidyotante ghanā iva //
analyzed: citra cāpa dharāḥ vīrāḥ vidyotante ghanāḥ iva

original: MSS_2426-1 amandamaṇinūpurakvaṇanacārucārīkramaṃ jhaṇajjhaṇitamekhalāskhalitatārahāracchaṭam /
analyzed: amanda maṇi nūpura kvaṇana cāru cārī kramam jhaṇajjhaṇita mekhalā skhalita tāra hāra chaṭam

original: MSS_2426-2 idaṃ taralakaṅkaṇāvaliviśeṣavācālitaṃ mano harati subhruvaḥ kimapi kandukakrīḍitam //
analyzed: idam tarala kaṅkaṇa āvali viśeṣa vācālitam manaḥ harati subhruvaḥ kim api kanduka krīḍitam

original: MSS_2427-1 amandamattamātaṅga āsārābhyudayānvitaḥ /
MSS_2427-2 ityādilakṣaṇopetaḥ skandhāvāraḥ praśasyate //
analyzed: ityādi lakṣaṇa upetaḥ skandhāvāraḥ praśasyate

original: MSS_2428-1 amandānandaniṣyandam apāstānyakriyākramam /
MSS_2428-2 jagajjanmotsave tasyāḥ pītāmṛtamivābhavat //
analyzed: jagat janma utsave tasyāḥ pīta amṛtam iva abhavat

original: MSS_2429-1 amandānandānāṃ galadalaghusaṃtāpavipadāṃ padāmbhojadvandvaṃ śirasi dadhatāminduśirasaḥ /
analyzed: amanda ānandānām galat a laghu saṃtāpa vipadām pada ambhoja dvandvam śirasi dadhatām induśirasaḥ

original: MSS_2429-2 kadā naḥ kālindīsalilaśabalairambarasarit taraṅgairaṅgārībhavati bhavabandhendhanacayaḥ //
analyzed: kadā naḥ kālindī salila śabalaiḥ ambara sarit taraṅgaiḥ aṅgārībhavati bhava bandha indhana cayaḥ

original: MSS_2430-1 amanyatāsau kusumeṣu garbhagaṃ parāgamandhaṃkaraṇaṃ viyoginām /
analyzed: amanyata asau kusumeṣu garbha gam parāgam andhaṃkaraṇam viyoginām

original: MSS_2430-2 smareṇa mukteṣu purā purāraye tadaṅgabhasmeva śareṣu saṃgatam //
analyzed: smareṇa mukteṣu purā purāraye tad aṅga bhasma iva śareṣu saṃgatam

original: MSS_2431-1 amaratarukusumasaurabha- sevanasaṃpūrṇasakalakāmasya /
MSS_2431-2 puṣpāntaraseveyaṃ bhramarasya viḍambanā mahatī //
analyzed: puṣpa antara sevā iyam bhramarasya viḍambanā mahatī

original: MSS_2432-1 amarayuvatigītodgrīvasāraṅgaśṛṅgo- llikhitaśaśisudhāmbhaḥśādvalārāmaramyām /
MSS_2432-2 surapatigajagaṇḍasraṃsidānāmbudhārā prasavasurabhimāśāṃ vāsavīyāṃ namāmi //
MSS_2433-1 amarīmukhasīdhumādhurīṇāṃ laharī kācana cāturī kalānām /
analyzed: amarī mukha sīdhu mādhurīṇām laharī kācana cāturī kalānām

original: MSS_2433-2 taralīkurute mano madīyaṃ muralīnādaparaṃparā murāreḥ //
analyzed: taralīkurute manaḥ madīyam muralī nāda paraṃparā murāreḥ

original: MSS_2434-1 amarukakavitvaḍamaruka- nādena vinuhnutā na saṃcarati /
analyzed: amaruka kavi tva ḍamaruka nādena vinuhnutā na saṃcarati

original: MSS_2434-2 śṛṅgārabhaṇitiranyā dhanyānāṃ śravaṇavivareṣu //
analyzed: śṛṅgāra bhaṇitiḥ anyā dhanyānām śravaṇa vivareṣu

original: MSS_2435-1 amarairamṛtaṃ na pītamabdher na ca hālāhalamulbaṇaṃ hareṇa /
analyzed: amaraiḥ amṛtam na pītam abdheḥ na ca hālāhalam ulbaṇam hareṇa

original: MSS_2435-2 vidhinā nihitaṃ khalasya vāci dvayametad bahirekamantaranyat //
analyzed: vidhinā nihitam khalasya vāci dvayam etat bahis ekam antar anyat

original: MSS_2436-1 amarairgataṃ madhukaraiścalitaṃ pravaraiḥ prayātamapi padmadṛśām /
analyzed: amaraiḥ gatam madhukaraiḥ calitam pravaraiḥ prayātam api padma dṛśām

original: MSS_2436-2 vibhave gate sakalameva gataṃ dhruvamekamañcati yaśaḥ sarasaḥ //
analyzed: vibhave gate sakalam eva gatam dhruvam ekam añcati yaśaḥ sarasaḥ

original: MSS_2437-1 amartyāḥ santu martyā vā cetanāḥ santvacetanāḥ /
analyzed: amartyāḥ santu martyāḥ vā cetanāḥ santu acetanāḥ

original: MSS_2437-2 dānameva puraskṛtya stūyante bhuvanaistribhiḥ //
analyzed: dānam eva puraskṛtya stūyante bhuvanaiḥ tribhiḥ

original: MSS_2438-1 amarṣiṇā kṛtyamiva kṣamāśrayaṃ madoddhateneva hitaṃ priyaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: amarṣiṇā kṛtyam iva kṣamā āśrayam mada uddhatena iva hitam priyam vacaḥ

original: MSS_2438-2 balīyasā tadvidhineva pauruṣaṃ balaṃ nirastaṃ na rarāja jiṣṇunā //
analyzed: balīyasā tad vidhinā iva pauruṣam balam nirastam na rarāja jiṣṇunā

original: MSS_2439-1 amarṣopagṛhītānāṃ manyusaṃtaptacetasām /
analyzed: amarṣa upagṛhītānām manyu saṃtapta cetasām

original: MSS_2439-2 parasparāpakāreṇa puṃsāṃ bhavati vigrahaḥ //
analyzed: paraspara apakāreṇa puṃsām bhavati vigrahaḥ

original: MSS_2440-1 amalamṛṇālakāṇḍakamanīyakapolaruces taralasalīlanīlanalinapratiphulladṛśaḥ /
analyzed: amala mṛṇāla kāṇḍa kamanīya kapola ruceḥ tarala sa līlā nīla nalina pratiphulla dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_2440-2 vikasadaśokaśoṇakarakāntibhṛtaḥ sutanor madalulitāni hanta lalitāni haranti manaḥ //
analyzed: vikasat aśoka śoṇa kara kānti bhṛtaḥ su tanoḥ mada lulitāni hanta lalitāni haranti manaḥ

original: MSS_2441-1 amalātmasu pratiphalannabhitas taruṇīkapolaphalakeṣu muhuḥ /
analyzed: amala ātmasu pratiphalan abhitas taruṇī kapola phalakeṣu muhur

original: MSS_2441-2 visasāra sāndrataramindurucām adhikāvabhāsitadiśāṃ nikaraḥ //
analyzed: visasāra sāndrataram indu rucām adhika avabhāsita diśām nikaraḥ

original: MSS_2442-1 amalīmasamacchidram akrauryamatisundaram /
analyzed: a malīmasam a chidram a krauryam ati sundaram

original: MSS_2442-2 adeyamapratigrāhyam aho jñānaṃ mahādhanam //
analyzed: adeyam a pratigrāhyam aho jñānam mahādhanam

original: MSS_2443-1 amātyaḥ śūra eva syād yuddhasaṃpanna eva ca /
analyzed: amātyaḥ śūraḥ eva syāt yuddha saṃpannaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_2443-2 tasmādapi bhayaṃ rājñaḥ paśya rājyasya yojanam //
analyzed: tasmāt api bhayam rājñaḥ paśya rājyasya yojanam

original: MSS_2444-1 amātyarāṣṭradurgāṇi kośo daṇḍaśca pañcamaḥ /
analyzed: amātya rāṣṭra durgāṇi kośaḥ daṇḍaḥ ca pañcamaḥ

original: MSS_2444-2 etāḥ prakṛtayastajjñair vijigīṣorudāhṛtāḥ //
analyzed: etāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tad jñaiḥ vijigīṣoḥ udāhṛtāḥ

original: MSS_2445-1 amātyādyāḥ prakṛtayo mitrāntā rājyamucyate /
analyzed: amātya ādyāḥ prakṛtayaḥ mitra antāḥ rājyam ucyate

original: MSS_2445-2 aśeṣarājyavyasanāt pārthivavyasanaṃ guru //
analyzed: aśeṣa rājya vyasanāt pārthiva vyasanam guru

original: MSS_2446-1 amātye daṇḍa āyatto daṇḍe vainayikī kriyā /
analyzed: amātye daṇḍaḥ āyattaḥ daṇḍe vainayikī kriyā

original: MSS_2446-2 nṛpatau koṣarāṣṭre tu dūte saṃdhiviparyayau //
analyzed: nṛpatau koṣa rāṣṭre tu dūte saṃdhi viparyayau

original: MSS_2447-1 amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpathamāśritaḥ /
analyzed: amātyaiḥ kāma vṛttaḥ hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ

original: MSS_2447-2 nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase //
analyzed: nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhiḥ na nigrāhyaḥ nigṛhyase

original: MSS_2448-1 amātyo yuvarājaśca bhujāvetau mahīpateḥ /
analyzed: amātyaḥ yuvarājaḥ ca bhujau etau mahīpateḥ

original: MSS_2448-2 mantrī netraṃ hi tadbhinna etasminnapi tadvadhaḥ //
analyzed: mantrī netram hi tad bhinnaḥ etasmin api tad vadhaḥ

original: MSS_2449-1 amātsaryaṃ budhāḥ prāhur dānaṃ dharme ca saṃyamam /
analyzed: amātsaryam budhāḥ prāhuḥ dānam dharme ca saṃyamam

original: MSS_2449-2 avasthitena nityaṃ ca satyenāmatsarī bhavet //
analyzed: avasthitena nityam ca satyena amatsarī bhavet

original: MSS_2450-1 amānitaṃ hi yudhyeta kṛtamānārthasaṃgraham /
analyzed: a mānitam hi yudhyeta kṛta māna artha saṃgraham

original: MSS_2450-2 na vimānimatyarthaṃ pradīptakrodhapāvakam //
analyzed: na vimānim atyartham pradīpta krodha pāvakam

original: MSS_2451-1 amānuṣaṃ sattvamantar yoginaṃ praviśedyadi /
analyzed: amānuṣam sattvam antar yoginam praviśet yadi

original: MSS_2451-2 vāyvagnidhāraṇā cainaṃ dehasaṃsthaṃ vinirdahet //
analyzed: vāyu agni dhāraṇā ca enam deha saṃstham vinirdahet

original: MSS_2452-1 amānenāpi bhavatā dānamānādibhirguṇaiḥ /
analyzed: amānena api bhavatā dāna māna ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: MSS_2452-2 āśritaḥ sarva evāyaṃ samānaḥ kriyate janaḥ //
analyzed: āśritaḥ sarvaḥ eva ayam samānaḥ kriyate janaḥ

original: MSS_2453-1 amāyayaiva varteta na kathaṃcana māyayā /
analyzed: amāyayā eva varteta na kathaṃcana māyayā

original: MSS_2453-2 budhyetāriprayuktāṃ ca māyāṃ nityaṃ susaṃvṛtaḥ //
analyzed: budhyeta ari prayuktām ca māyām nityam su saṃvṛtaḥ

original: MSS_2454-1 amāvāsyāmaṣṭamīṃ ca paurṇamāsīṃ caturdaśīm /
analyzed: amāvāsyām aṣṭamīm ca paurṇamāsīm caturdaśīm

original: MSS_2454-2 brahmacārī bhavennityam apyṛtau snātako dvijaḥ //
analyzed: brahmacārī bhavet nityam api ṛtau snātakaḥ dvijaḥ

original: MSS_2455-1 amitaṃ madhu tatkathā mama śravaṇaprāghuṇakīkṛtā janaiḥ /
analyzed: amitam madhu tad kathā mama śravaṇa prāghuṇakīkṛtā janaiḥ

original: MSS_2455-2 madanānalabodhane bhavet khaga dhāyyā dhigadhairyadhāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: madana anala bodhane bhavet khaga dhāyyā dhik a dhairya dhāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_2456-1 amitaḥ samitaḥ prāptair utkarṣairharṣada prabho /
analyzed: amitaḥ samitaḥ prāptaiḥ utkarṣaiḥ harṣa da prabho

original: MSS_2456-2 ahitaḥ sahitaḥ sādhuyaśobhirasatāmasi //
analyzed: ahitaḥ sahitaḥ sādhu yaśobhiḥ asatām asi

original: MSS_2457-1 amitaguṇo'pi padārtho doṣeṇaikena nindito bhavati /
analyzed: amita guṇaḥ api padārthaḥ doṣeṇa ekena ninditaḥ bhavati

original: MSS_2457-2 nikhilarasāyanamahito gandhenogreṇa laśuna iva //
analyzed: nikhila rasāyana mahitaḥ gandhena ugreṇa laśunaḥ iva

original: MSS_2458-1 amitadyutirākarāt prasūtiḥ pariśuddhā ca mahāmaṇerviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: amita dyutiḥ ākarāt prasūtiḥ pariśuddhā ca mahā maṇeḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: MSS_2458-2 makuṭe caraṇāṅgulīyake vā viniveśaḥ punarasya śilpitantram //
analyzed: makuṭe caraṇa aṅgulīyake vā viniveśaḥ punar asya śilpi tantram

original: MSS_2459-1 amitraṃ kurute mitraṃ mitraṃ dveṣṭi hinasti ca /
analyzed: amitram kurute mitram mitram dveṣṭi hinasti ca

original: MSS_2459-2 karma cārabhate duṣṭaṃ tamāhurmūḍhacetasam //
analyzed: karma ca ārabhate duṣṭam tam āhuḥ mūḍha cetasam

original: MSS_2460-1 amitraṃ kurute mitraṃ mitraṃ dveṣṭi hinasti ca /
analyzed: amitram kurute mitram mitram dveṣṭi hinasti ca

original: MSS_2460-2 śubhaṃ vettyaśubhaṃ pāpaṃ bhadraṃ daivahato naraḥ //
analyzed: śubham vetti aśubham pāpam bhadram daiva hataḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_2461-1 amitraṃ kurute mitraṃ mitraṃ dveṣṭi hinasti vaḥ /
analyzed: amitram kurute mitram mitram dveṣṭi hinasti vaḥ

original: MSS_2461-2 mitrāṇi tasya naśyanti amitraṃ naṣṭameva ca //
analyzed: mitrāṇi tasya naśyanti amitram naṣṭam eva ca

original: MSS_2462-1 amitraṃ naiva muñceta bruvantaṃ karuṇānyapi /
analyzed: amitram nā eva muñceta bruvantam karuṇāni api

original: MSS_2462-2 duḥkhaṃ tatra na kurvīta hanyāt pūrvāpakāriṇam //
analyzed: duḥkham tatra na kurvīta hanyāt pūrva apakāriṇam

original: MSS_2463-1 amitramapi ceddīnaṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇamāgatam /
analyzed: amitram api ced dīnam śaraṇa eṣiṇam āgatam

original: MSS_2463-2 vyasane yo'nugṛhṇāti sa vai puruṣasattamaḥ //
analyzed: vyasane yaḥ anugṛhṇāti sa vai puruṣa sattamaḥ

original: MSS_2464-1 amitrapramitā hyetā gataśraddhāḥ sudāruṇaḥ /
analyzed: amitra pramitāḥ hi etāḥ gata śraddhāḥ su dāruṇaḥ

original: MSS_2464-2 mūlapravādena viṣaṃ prayacchanti jighāṃsavaḥ //
analyzed: mūla pravādena viṣam prayacchanti jighāṃsavaḥ

original: MSS_2465-1 amitravyasanānmitram utthitaṃ yadvirajyati /
analyzed: amitra vyasanāt mitram utthitam yat virajyati

original: MSS_2465-2 arivyasanasiddhyā tac chatruṇaiva prasidhyati //
analyzed: ari vyasana siddhyā tat śatruṇā eva prasidhyati

original: MSS_2466-1 amitrāṇāṃ vadhe yukto mitrāṇāṃ saṃgrahe rataḥ /
analyzed: amitrāṇām vadhe yuktaḥ mitrāṇām saṃgrahe rataḥ

original: MSS_2466-2 trivargaphalabhoktā tu rājā dharmeṇa yujyate //
analyzed: trivarga phala bhoktā tu rājā dharmeṇa yujyate

original: MSS_2467-1 amitrādunnatiṃ prāpya nonnato'smīti viśvaset /
analyzed: amitrāt unnatim prāpya na unnataḥ asmi iti viśvaset

original: MSS_2467-2 tasmāt prāpyonnatiṃ naśyet prāvāra iva kīṭakaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt prāpya unnatim naśyet prāvāraḥ iva kīṭakaḥ

original: MSS_2468-1 amitrānapi kurvīta mitrānyupacayāvahān /
analyzed: amitrān api kurvīta mitrāni upacaya āvahān

original: MSS_2468-2 ahite vartamānāni mitrāṇyapi parityajet //
analyzed: ahite vartamānāni mitrāṇi api parityajet

original: MSS_2469-1 amitre viśvāsaḥ śvapacakarake saumikarasaḥ kapāle gaṅgāmbhaḥ khalapariṣadaṅke sujanatā /
analyzed: amitre viśvāsaḥ śvapaca karake saumika rasaḥ kapāle gaṅgā ambhaḥ khala pariṣad aṅke su jana tā

original: MSS_2469-2 parikṣīṇācāre śrutamanupanīte ca nigamaḥ svataḥsiddhāṃ śuddhiṃ tyajati viparītaṃ ca phalati //
analyzed: parikṣīṇa ācāre śrutam anupanīte ca nigamaḥ svatas siddhām śuddhim tyajati viparītam ca phalati

original: MSS_2470-1 amitro na vimoktavyaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ bahvapi bruvan /
analyzed: amitraḥ na vimoktavyaḥ kṛpaṇam bahu api bruvan

original: MSS_2470-2 kṛpā tasmin na kartavyā hanyādevāpakāriṇam //
analyzed: kṛpā tasmin na kartavyā hanyāt eva apakāriṇam

original: MSS_2471-1 amitro mitratāṃ yāti mitraṃ cāpi praduṣyati /
analyzed: amitraḥ mitra tām yāti mitram ca api praduṣyati

original: MSS_2471-2 sāmarthyayogāt kāryāṇāṃ tadgatyā hi sadā gatiḥ //
analyzed: sāmarthya yogāt kāryāṇām tad gatyāḥ hi sadā gatiḥ

original: MSS_2472-1 amī kārāgāre niviḍanalinīnālanigaḍair nibadhyantāṃ haṃsāḥ prathamavisakandāṅkurabhidaḥ /
analyzed: amī kārāgāre nibiḍa nalinī nāla nigaḍaiḥ nibadhyantām haṃsāḥ prathama visa kanda aṅkura bhidaḥ

original: MSS_2472-2 nave vāsantīnāmudayini vane garbhakalikā- cchido nirdhāryantāṃ parabhṛtayuvāno madakalāḥ //
analyzed: nave vāsantīnām udayini vane garbha kalikā chidaḥ nirdhāryantām parabhṛta yuvānaḥ mada kalāḥ

original: MSS_2473-1 amī taṭasamīpanirjharataraṅgariṅgatpayo- jaḍīkṛtapaṭīrabhūruhakuṭīrasaṃcāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: amī taṭa samīpa nirjhara taraṅga riṅgat payaḥ jaḍīkṛta paṭīra bhūruha kuṭīra saṃcāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_2473-2 mano vidhurayanti me malayamekhalāmedurāḥ durāsadavanapriyapriyatamārutā mārutāḥ //
analyzed: manaḥ vidhurayanti me malaya mekhalā medurāḥ durāsada vana priya priyata mārutāḥ mārutāḥ

original: MSS_2474-1 amī tilāḥ tailika nūnametāṃ snehādavasthāṃ bhavatopanītāḥ /
analyzed: amī tilāḥ tailika nūnam etām snehāt avasthām bhavatā upanītāḥ

original: MSS_2474-2 dveṣo'bhaviṣyadyadamīṣu nūnaṃ tadā na jāne kimivākariṣyaḥ //
analyzed: dveṣaḥ bhaviṣyat yat amīṣu nūnam tadā na jāne kim iva akariṣyaḥ

original: MSS_2475-1 amī pānakarambhābhāḥ saptāpi jalarāśayaḥ /
analyzed: amī pāna karambha ābhāḥ sapta api jala rāśayaḥ

original: MSS_2475-2 tvadyaśorāja haṃsasya pañjaraṃ bhuvanatrayam //
analyzed: tvad yaśaḥ rāja haṃsasya pañjaram bhuvana trayam

original: MSS_2476-1 amī purasthāḥ sakalāḥ sunidritā na nūpuraṃ muñca sukhena yāsyasi /
analyzed: amī pura sthāḥ sakalāḥ sunidritāḥ na nūpuram muñca sukhena yāsyasi

original: MSS_2476-2 vrajatyapi śrīpatiraṅghrimāśritaṃ hare tavākhyātiriyaṃ bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: vrajati api śrīpatiḥ aṅghrim āśritam hare tava ākhyātiḥ iyam bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_2477-1 amī pṛthustambabhṛtaḥ piśaṅgatāṃ gatā vipākena phalasya śālayaḥ /
analyzed: amī pṛthu stamba bhṛtaḥ piśaṅga tām gatāḥ vipākena phalasya śālayaḥ

original: MSS_2477-2 vikāsi vaprāmbhasi gandhasūcitaṃ namanti nighrātumivāsyatotpalam //
analyzed: vikāsi vapra ambhasi gandha sūcitam namanti nighrātum iva āsya tā utpalam

original: MSS_2478-1 amībhiḥ saṃsiktestava kimu phalaṃ vāridaghaṭe yadete'pekṣante salilamavaṭebhyo'pi taravaḥ /
analyzed: amībhiḥ saṃsikteḥ tava kimu phalam vārida ghaṭe yat ete ipekṣante salilam avaṭebhyaḥ api taravaḥ

original: MSS_2478-2 ayaṃ yukto vyaktaṃ nanu sukhayituṃ cātakaśiśur yadeṣa grīṣme'pi spṛhayati na pāthastvadaparān //
analyzed: ayam yuktaḥ vyaktam nanu sukhayitum cātaka śiśuḥ yat eṣa grīṣme pi spṛhayati na pāthaḥ tvat aparān

original: MSS_2479-1 amībhirākaṇṭhamabhoji tadgṛhe tuṣāradhārāmṛditeva śakarā /
analyzed: amībhiḥ ākaṇṭham abhoji tad gṛhe tuṣāra dhārā mṛditā iva śakarā

original: MSS_2479-2 hayadviṣadvaṣkayaṇīpayaḥ sutaṃ sudhāhradāt paṅkamivoddhṛtaṃ dadhi //
analyzed: haya dviṣat vaṣkayaṇī payaḥ sutam sudhā hradāt paṅkam iva uddhṛtam dadhi

original: MSS_2480-1 amī vyarthārambhā duradhigamabhūbhṛtparisare viṣaktā lakṣyante vayamiva hatāśā jaladharāḥ /
analyzed: amī vyartha ārambhāḥ duradhigama bhūbhṛt parisare viṣaktāḥ lakṣyante vayam iva hata āśāḥ jaladharāḥ

original: MSS_2480-2 mamevāntaśceṣṭāviphalavipulākāravibhavāḥ svabhūmau yāntīmāḥ pariṇatimasaṃkhyāśca saritaḥ //
analyzed: mama eva antar ceṣṭā viphala vipula ākāra vibhavāḥ sva bhūmau yānti imāḥ pariṇatim asaṃkhyāḥ ca saritaḥ

original: MSS_2481-1 amī śirīṣaprasavāvataṃsāḥ prabhraṃśino vārivihāriṇīnām /
analyzed: amī śirīṣa prasava avataṃsāḥ prabhraṃśinaḥ vāri vihāriṇīnām

original: MSS_2481-2 pāriplavāḥ srotasi nimnagāyāḥ śaivālalolāṃśchalayanti mīnān //
analyzed: pāriplavāḥ srotasi nimnagāyāḥ śaivāla lolān chalayanti mīnān

original: MSS_2482-1 amīṣāṃ jantūnāṃ katipayanimeṣasthitijuṣāṃ viyoge dhīrāṇāṃ ka iha paritāpasya viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: amīṣām jantūnām katipaya nimeṣa sthiti juṣām viyoge dhīrāṇām kaḥ iha paritāpasya viṣayaḥ

original: MSS_2482-2 kṣaṇādutpadyante vilayamapi yānti kṣaṇamamī na ke'pi sthātāraḥ suragiripayodhiprabhṛtayaḥ //
analyzed: kṣaṇāt utpadyante vilayam api yānti kṣaṇam amī na ke pi sthātāraḥ suragiri payodhi prabhṛtayaḥ

original: MSS_2483-1 amīṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ tulitabisinīpatrapayasāṃ kṛte kiṃ nāsmābhirvigalitavivekairvyavasitam /
analyzed: amīṣām prāṇānām tulita bisinī patra payasām kṛte kim nā asmābhiḥ vigalita vivekaiḥ vyavasitam

original: MSS_2483-2 yadāḍhyānāmagre draviṇamadaniḥsaṃjñamanasāṃ kṛtaṃ vītavrīḍairnijaguṇakathāpātakamapi //
analyzed: yat āḍhyānām agre draviṇa mada niḥsaṃjña manasām kṛtam vīta vrīḍaiḥ nija guṇa kathā pātakam api

original: MSS_2484-1 amīṣāṃ mañjuśrīruciravadanaśrīkṛtarucāṃ śrutaṃ no nāmāpi kva nu khalu himāṃśuprakṛtayaḥ /
analyzed: amīṣām mañjuśrī rucira vadana śrī kṛta rucām śrutam naḥ nāma api kva nu khalu himāṃśu prakṛtayaḥ

original: MSS_2484-2 mamābhyarṇe dhārṣṭyāccarati punarindīvaramiti krudhevedaṃ prāntāruṇamavatu vo locanayugam //
analyzed: mama abhyarṇe dhārṣṭyāt carati punar indīvaram iti krudhā iva idam prānta aruṇam avatu vaḥ locana yugam

original: MSS_2485-1 amīṣāṃ maṇḍalābhogaḥ stanānāmeva śobhate /
analyzed: amīṣām maṇḍala ābhogaḥ stanānām eva śobhate

original: MSS_2485-2 yeṣāmupetya sotkampā rājāno'pi karapradāḥ //
analyzed: yeṣām upetya sa utkampāḥ rājānaḥ api kara pradāḥ

original: MSS_2486-1 amīṣāṃ mohādvā dharaṇidharacūḍāñcalabhuvām abhāgyādvā kaiścinmarakatamaṇiścenna gaṇitaḥ /
analyzed: amīṣām mohāt vā dharaṇidhara cūḍā añcala bhuvām abhāgyāt vā kaiścid marakata maṇiḥ ced na gaṇitaḥ

original: MSS_2486-2 tathāsau rathyāyāmapi nipatitaḥ kiṃ na kurute samunmīlannīladyutilahariliptā iva diśaḥ //
analyzed: tathā asau rathyāyām api nipatitaḥ kim na kurute samunmīlat nīla dyuti lahari liptāḥ iva diśaḥ

original: MSS_2487-1 amīṣāmāmodapraṇayasubhagaṃ saṃgatamabhūt prasūnairunnidraiḥ saha bahubhireva prativanam /
analyzed: amīṣām āmoda praṇaya subhagam saṃgatam abhūt prasūnaiḥ unnidraiḥ saha bahubhiḥ eva prativanam

original: MSS_2487-2 udanyā na kvāpi vyaramadaravinde paramamī pibanti svacchandaṃ rasamudarapūraṃ madhulihaḥ //
analyzed: udanyā na kvāpi vyaramat aravinde param amī pibanti svacchandam rasam udara pūram madhulihaḥ

original: MSS_2488-1 amīṣāmārūḍhaprasavavivarāṇāṃ madhulihāṃ dhvaniḥ pānthastrīṇāṃ prasarati viyogajvara iva /
analyzed: amīṣām ārūḍha prasava vivarāṇām madhulihām dhvaniḥ pāntha strīṇām prasarati viyoga jvaraḥ iva

original: MSS_2488-2 drumālīnāṃ yūnormana iva sarāgaṃ kisalayaṃ parāgaḥ puṣpāṇāṃ patati madanasyeva viśikhaḥ //
analyzed: dru mālīnām yūnoḥ manaḥ iva sa rāgam kisalayam parāgaḥ puṣpāṇām patati madanasya iva viśikhaḥ

original: MSS_2489-1 amīṣāmuṣṇāṃśoḥ kiraṇanikarāṇāṃ paricayāt sarastīkṣṇaṃ mābhūstava kila nisargaḥ śiśirimā /
analyzed: amīṣām uṣṇāṃśoḥ kiraṇa nikarāṇām paricayāt saraḥ tīkṣṇam mā abhūḥ tava kila nisargaḥ śiśirimā

original: MSS_2489-2 durātmāno hyete katipayapayobindurasikān nirasyantaḥ pānthāṃstvayi kimapi śoṣaṃ vidadhati //
analyzed: durātmānaḥ hi ete katipaya payaḥ bindu rasikān nirasyantaḥ pānthān tvayi kim api śoṣam vidadhati

original: MSS_2490-1 amī samuddhūtasarojareṇunā hṛtā hṛtāsārakaṇena vāyunā /
analyzed: amī samuddhūta saroja reṇunā hṛtāḥ hṛta āsāra kaṇena vāyunā

original: MSS_2490-2 upāgame duścaritā ivāpadāṃ gatiṃ na niścetumalaṃ śilīmukhāḥ //
analyzed: upāgame duścaritāḥ iva āpadām gatim na niścetum alam śilīmukhāḥ

original: MSS_2491-1 amī hi vastrāntaniruddhavaktrāḥ prayānti me dūrataraṃ vayasyāḥ /
analyzed: amī hi vastra anta niruddha vaktrāḥ prayānti me dūrataram vayasyāḥ

original: MSS_2491-2 paro'pi bandhuḥ sukhasaṃsthitasya mitraṃ na kaścid viṣamasthitasya //
analyzed: paraḥ api bandhuḥ sukha saṃsthitasya mitram na kaścid viṣama sthitasya

original: MSS_2492-1 amī hi vṛkṣāḥ phalapuṣpaśobhitāḥ kaṭhoraniṣpandalatopaveṣṭitāḥ /
analyzed: amī hi vṛkṣāḥ phala puṣpa śobhitāḥ kaṭhora niṣpanda latā upaveṣṭitāḥ

original: MSS_2492-2 nṛpājñayā rakṣijanena pālitā narāḥ sadārā iva yānti nirvṛtim //
analyzed: nṛpa ājñayā rakṣi janena pālitāḥ narāḥ sa dārāḥ iva yānti nirvṛtim

original: MSS_2493-1 amī helonmeṣavyasaniṣu palāśeṣu paritaḥ pibanti svacchandaṃ madhu madhuliho mādyati janaḥ /
analyzed: amī helā unmeṣa vyasaniṣu palāśeṣu paritas pibanti svacchandam madhu madhulihaḥ mādyati janaḥ

original: MSS_2493-2 ayaṃ ca pratyagraṃ daśati sahakāraṃ parabhṛto yadīdaṃ marmāntarvidalati ka eṣa vyatikaraḥ //
analyzed: ayam ca pratyagram daśati sahakāram parabhṛtaḥ yadi idam marma antar vidalati kaḥ eṣa vyatikaraḥ

original: MSS_2494-1 amuṃ kālakṣepaṃ tyaja jalada gambhīramadhuraiḥ kimebhirnirghoṣaiḥ sṛja jhaṭiti jhātkāri salilam /
analyzed: amum kālakṣepam tyaja jalada gambhīra madhuraiḥ kim ebhiḥ nirghoṣaiḥ sṛja jhaṭiti jhātkāri salilam

original: MSS_2494-2 aye paśyāvasthāmakaruṇasamīravyatikara- sphuraddāvajvālāvalijaṭilamūrterviṭapinaḥ //
analyzed: aye paśya avasthām akaruṇa samīra vyatikara sphurat dāva jvālā vali jaṭila mūrteḥ viṭapinaḥ

original: MSS_2495-1 amuṃ puraḥ paśyasi devadāruṃ putrīkṛto'sau vṛṣabhadhvajena /
analyzed: amum puras paśyasi devadārum putrīkṛtaḥ usau vṛṣabhadhvajena

original: MSS_2495-2 yo hemakumbhastananiḥsṛtānāṃ skandasya mātuḥ payasāṃ rasajñaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ hema kumbha stana niḥsṛtānām skandasya mātuḥ payasām rasajñaḥ

original: MSS_2496-1 amuṃ sahāsaprahitekṣaṇāni vyājārdhasaṃdarśitamekhalāni /
analyzed: amum sa hāsa prahita īkṣaṇāni vyāja ardha saṃdarśita mekhalāni

original: MSS_2496-2 nālaṃ vikartuṃ janitendraśaṅkaṃ surāṅganāvibhramaceṣṭitāni //
analyzed: na alam vikartum janita indra śaṅkam sura aṅganā vibhrama ceṣṭitāni

original: MSS_2497-1 amuktāṃ bhūṣayantu svāṃ tanuṃ saṃsārasindhugaiḥ /
analyzed: amuktām bhūṣayantu svām tanum saṃsāra sindhu gaiḥ

original: MSS_2497-2 maṇikarṇī tāmraparṇī muktimuktāphalairjanāḥ //
MSS_2498-1 amudrakumudatviṣaḥ sphuritaphenalakṣmīspṛśo marālakulavibhramāḥ śapharaphālalīlābhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: amudra kumuda tviṣaḥ sphurita phena lakṣmī spṛśaḥ marāla kula vibhramāḥ śaphara phāla līlā bhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_2498-2 jayanti girijāpatestaralamaulimandākinī- taraṅgacayacumbinastuhinadīdhiteraṃśavaḥ //
analyzed: jayanti girijāpateḥ tarala mauli mandākinī taraṅga caya cumbinaḥ tuhina dīdhiteḥ aṃśavaḥ

original: MSS_2499-1 amudro'pi varaṃ kūpaḥ samudreṇāpi tena kim /
analyzed: amudrā api varam kūpaḥ samudreṇa api tena kim

original: MSS_2499-2 susvādu salilaṃ yatra pīyate pathikaiḥ pathi //
analyzed: su svādu salilam yatra pīyate pathikaiḥ pathi

original: MSS_2500-1 amunā marukūpena ke ke nāma na vañcitāḥ /
analyzed: amunā maru kūpena ke ke nāma na vañcitāḥ

original: MSS_2500-2 rudatpathikanetrāmbupicchilaprāntabhūminā //
analyzed: rudat pathika netrāmbu picchila prānta bhūminā

original: MSS_2501-1 amunā yamunājalakelikṛtā sahasā tarasā parirabhya bhṛtā /
analyzed: amunā yamunā jala keli kṛtā sahasā tarasā parirabhya bhṛtā

original: MSS_2501-2 hariṇā hariṇī mṛganetravatī navayauvanayauvanabhāravatī //
MSS_2502-1 amunaiva kaṣāyitastanī subhagena priyagātrabhasmanā /
analyzed: amunā eva kaṣāyita stanī subhagena priya gātra bhasmanā

original: MSS_2502-2 navapallavasaṃstare yathā racayiṣyāmi tanuṃ vibhāvasau //
analyzed: nava pallava saṃstare yathā racayiṣyāmi tanum vibhāvasau

original: MSS_2503-1 amunaiva pathāgatāgataṃ kṛtavānadya manoharo hariḥ /
analyzed: amunā eva pathā āgata āgatam kṛtavān adya manoharaḥ hariḥ

original: MSS_2503-2 sakhi durjanabhītayā mayā hatayā hanta ciraṃ na vīkṣitaḥ //
analyzed: sakhi durjana bhītayā mayā hatayā hanta ciram na vīkṣitaḥ

original: MSS_2504-1 amuṣminnārāme tarubhirabhirāme viṭapinaḥ sphuṭaṃ nṛtyadbhṛṅgī vividhanavasaṃgītakalanāt /
analyzed: amuṣmin ārāme tarubhiḥ abhirāme viṭapinaḥ sphuṭam nṛtyat bhṛṅgī vividha nava saṃgīta kalanāt

original: MSS_2504-2 parānandaiḥ pūrṇāḥ ka iva tava varṇāvalipada- kramaśrotā vettā dvijavara śuka śrāmyasi kutaḥ //
analyzed: para ānandaiḥ pūrṇāḥ kaḥ iva tava varṇa āvali pada krama śrotā vettā dvijavara śuka śrāmyasi kutas

original: MSS_2505-1 amuṣminnudyānadrumakuharanīrandhrabharite tamaḥkhaṇḍe piṇḍīkṛtabahalakālāyasaghane /
analyzed: amuṣmin udyāna druma kuhara nīrandhra bharite tamaḥ khaṇḍe piṇḍīkṛta bahala kālāyasa ghane

original: MSS_2505-2 yatāmadyāsmākaṃ kathamapi puronyastacaraṇaṃ nimeṣe'pyunmeṣe nahi nahi viśeṣo nayanayoḥ //
analyzed: yatām adya asmākam katham api puras nyasta caraṇam nimeṣe pi unmeṣe nahi nahi viśeṣaḥ nayanayoḥ

original: MSS_2506-1 amuṣminnudyāne vihagakhala eṣa pratikalaṃ vilolaḥ kākolaḥ kvaṇati khalu yāvat kaṭutaram /
analyzed: amuṣmin udyāne vihaga khalaḥ eṣa pratikalam vilolaḥ kākolaḥ kvaṇati khalu yāvat kaṭutaram

original: MSS_2506-2 sakhe tāvat kīra draḍhaya hṛdi vācaṃ ca sakalāṃ na maunena nyūno bhavati guṇabhājāṃ guṇagaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sakhe tāvat kīra draḍhaya hṛdi vācam ca sakalām na maunena nyūnaḥ bhavati guṇa bhājām guṇa gaṇaḥ

original: MSS_2507-1 amuṣmin pañceṣostribhuvanajigīṣoḥ sahacare mukhaṃ rātreratrestanubhuvi rahaścumbati sati /
analyzed: amuṣmin pañca iṣoḥ tribhuvana jigīṣoḥ sahacare mukham rātreḥ atreḥ tanu bhuvi rahaḥ cumbati sati

original: MSS_2507-2 jvalantīrṣyāroṣodayamayatayevoṣadhilatāḥ patadbhṛṅgībhaṅgyā dadhati kumudinyaḥ kaluṣatām //
analyzed: jvalanti īrṣyā roṣa udaya maya tayā iva oṣadhi latāḥ patat bhṛṅgī bhaṅgyā dadhati kumudinyaḥ kaluṣa tām

original: MSS_2508-1 amuṣmin saṃnaddhe jalamuci samabhyasya katicit kakārān paryantadviguṇamatarephaprasavinaḥ /
analyzed: amuṣmin saṃnaddhe jalamuci samabhyasya katicid kakārān paryanta dviguṇa mata repha prasavinaḥ

original: MSS_2508-2 sa mādyandātyūhaścalavipulakaṇṭhaḥ prasarati kramodañcattāraḥ kramavaśanamanmandamadhuraḥ //
analyzed: sa mādyanda atyūhaḥ cala vipula kaṇṭhaḥ prasarati krama udañcat tāraḥ krama vaśa namat manda madhuraḥ

original: MSS_2509-1 amuṣmin saṃsāre parikalitasāretaratayā tadā vidyotkarṣaḥ pariṇatimupaiti śrutividām /
analyzed: amuṣmin saṃsāre parikalita sāra itara tayā tadā vidyā utkarṣaḥ pariṇatim upaiti śruti vidām

original: MSS_2509-2 yadā mandākinyā madhuravamarālīkalakala- praṇālīvācāle parisarataṭe yānti divasāḥ //
analyzed: yadā mandākinyāḥ praṇālī vācāle parisara taṭe yānti divasāḥ

original: MSS_2510-1 amuṣmiṃllāvāṇyāmṛtasarasi nūnaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ smaraḥ śarvapluṣṭaḥ pṛthujaghanabhāge nipatitaḥ /
analyzed: amuṣmin lāvāṇyā amṛta sarasi nūnam mṛga dṛśaḥ smaraḥ śarva pluṣṭaḥ pṛthu jaghana bhāge nipatitaḥ

original: MSS_2510-2 yadaṅgāṅgārāṇāṃ prathamapiśunā nābhikuhare śikhā dhūmasyeyaṃ pariṇamati romāvalivapuḥ //
analyzed: yat aṅga aṅgārāṇām prathama piśunā nābhi kuhare śikhā dhūmasya iyam pariṇamati roma āvali vapuḥ

original: MSS_2511-1 amuṣmai caurāya pratinihatamṛtyupratibhiye prabhuḥ prītaḥ prādāduparitanapādadvayakṛte /
analyzed: amuṣmai caurāya pratinihata mṛtyu pratibhiye prabhuḥ prītaḥ prādāt uparitana pāda dvaya kṛte

original: MSS_2511-2 suvarṇānāṃ koṭīrdaśa daśanakoṭikṣatagirīn gajendrānapyaṣṭau madamuditakūjanmadhulihaḥ //
analyzed: suvarṇānām koṭīḥ daśa daśana koṭi kṣata girīn gaja indrān api aṣṭau mada mudita kūjat madhulihaḥ

original: MSS_2512-1 amuṣya dorbhyāmaridurgaluṇṭhane dhruvaṃ gṛhītārgaladīrghapīnatā /
analyzed: amuṣya dorbhyām ari durga luṇṭhane dhruvam gṛhīta argala dīrgha pīna tā

original: MSS_2512-2 uraḥśriyā tatra ca gopurasphurat- kapāṭadurdharṣatiraḥprasāritā //
analyzed: uraḥ śriyā tatra ca gopura sphurat kapāṭa durdharṣa tiras prasāritā

original: MSS_2513-1 amuṣya dhīrasya jayāya sāhasī tadā khalu jyāṃ viśikhaiḥ sanāthayan /
analyzed: amuṣya dhīrasya jayāya sāhasī tadā khalu jyām viśikhaiḥ sanāthayan

original: MSS_2513-2 nimajjayāmāsa yaśāṃsi saṃśaye smarastrilokīvijayārjitānyapi //
analyzed: nimajjayāmāsa yaśāṃsi saṃśaye smaraḥ trilokī vijaya arjitāni api

original: MSS_2514-1 amuṣya muṣitā lakṣmīś cakṣuṣeti na nūtanam /
analyzed: amuṣya muṣitā lakṣmīḥ cakṣuṣā iti na nūtanam

original: MSS_2514-2 na vedmi kathayatyasyāḥ karṇe lagnaṃ kimutpalam //
analyzed: na vedmi kathayati asyāḥ karṇe lagnam kim utpalam

original: MSS_2515-1 amuṣya vidyā rasanāgranartakī trayīva nītāṅgaguṇena vistaram /
analyzed: amuṣya vidyā rasanā agra nartakī trayī iva nītā aṅga guṇena vistaram

original: MSS_2515-2 agāhatāṣṭādaśatāṃ jigīṣayā navadvayadvīpapṛthagjayaśriyām //
analyzed: agāhata aṣṭādaśa tām jigīṣayā nava dvaya dvīpa pṛthak jaya śriyām

original: MSS_2516-1 amuṣyāṃ saṃkrāntau tava taruṇi tāruṇyataraṇe smaro dātā devastrivalitaṭinītīranikaṭe /
analyzed: amuṣyām saṃkrāntau tava taruṇi tāruṇya taraṇe smaraḥ dātā devaḥ trivali taṭinī tīra nikaṭe

original: MSS_2516-2 amū te vakṣojau sakhi sughaṭitau hāṭakaghaṭau mahādānaṃ kasmai vada bhavatu sāraṅganayane //
analyzed: amū te vakṣojau sakhi su ghaṭitau hāṭaka ghaṭau mahā dānam kasmai vada bhavatu sāraṅga nayane

original: MSS_2517-1 amuṣyā lāvaṇyaṃ mṛdulamṛdulānapyavayavān manolaulyaṃ dhātuḥ karakaṭhinatāṃ me vimṛśati /
analyzed: amuṣyāḥ lāvaṇyam mṛdula mṛdulān api avayavān manaḥ laulyam dhātuḥ kara kaṭhina tām me vimṛśati

original: MSS_2517-2 padaṃ citte dhatte matiriti purā paṅkajabhuvā dhruvaṃ kalyāṇīyaṃ kalitasukṛtaireva racitā //
analyzed: padam citte dhatte matiḥ iti purā paṅkaja bhuvā dhruvam kalyāṇīyam kalita sukṛtaiḥ eva racitā

original: MSS_2518-1 amuṣyorvībharttuḥ prasṛmaracamūsindhurabhavair avaimi prārabdhe vamathubhiravaśyāyasamaye /
analyzed: amuṣya urvī bharttuḥ prasṛmara camū sindhura bhavaiḥ avaimi prārabdhe vamathubhiḥ avaśyāya samaye

original: MSS_2518-2 na kampantāmantaḥ pratinṛpabhaṭā mlāyatu na tad vadhūvaktrāmbhojaṃ bhavatu na sa teṣāṃ kudivasaḥ //
analyzed: na kampantām antar prati nṛpa bhaṭāḥ mlāyatu na tat vadhū vaktra ambhojam bhavatu na sa teṣām ku divasaḥ

original: MSS_2519-1 amūni gacchanti yugāni na kṣaṇaḥ kiyat sahiṣye na hi mṛtyurasti me /
analyzed: amūni gacchanti yugāni na kṣaṇaḥ kiyat sahiṣye na hi mṛtyuḥ asti me

original: MSS_2519-2 sa māṃ na kāntaḥ sphuṭamantarujjhitā na taṃ manastacca na kāyavāyavaḥ //
analyzed: sa mām na kāntaḥ sphuṭam antar ujjhitāḥ na tam manaḥ tat ca na kāya vāyavaḥ

original: MSS_2520-1 amūrkho yo manuṣyāṇāṃ manyusaṃtaptacetasām /
analyzed: a mūrkhaḥ yaḥ manuṣyāṇām manyu saṃtapta cetasām

original: MSS_2520-2 parasparopakāreṇa puṃsāṃ bhavati vigrahaḥ //
analyzed: paraspara upakāreṇa puṃsām bhavati vigrahaḥ

original: MSS_2521-1 amūrhi bhittvā jaladāntarāṇi paṅkāntarāṇīva mṛṇālasūcyaḥ /
analyzed: amūḥ hi bhittvā jalada antarāṇi paṅka antarāṇi iva mṛṇāla sūcyaḥ

original: MSS_2521-2 patanti candravyasanādvimuktā divo'śrudhārā iva vāridhārāḥ //
analyzed: patanti candra vyasanāt vimuktāḥ divā ūśru dhārāḥ iva vāri dhārāḥ

original: MSS_2522-1 amūlyasya mama svarṇatulākoṭidvayaṃ kiyat /
analyzed: amūlyasya mama svarṇa tulā koṭi dvayam kiyat

original: MSS_2522-2 iti kopādivātāmraṃ pādayugmaṃ mṛgīdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: iti kopāt iva ātāmram pāda yugmam mṛgī dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_2523-1 amṛtaṃ kirati himāṃśur viṣameva phaṇī samudgirati /
analyzed: amṛtam kirati himāṃśuḥ viṣam eva phaṇī samudgirati

original: MSS_2523-2 guṇameva vakti sādhur doṣamasādhuḥ prakāśayati //
analyzed: guṇam eva vakti sādhuḥ doṣam asādhuḥ prakāśayati

original: MSS_2524-1 amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuśca dvayaṃ dehe pratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: amṛtam ca eva mṛtyuḥ ca dvayam dehe pratiṣṭhitam

original: MSS_2524-2 mṛtyumāpadyate mohāt satyenāpadyate'mṛtam //
analyzed: mṛtyum āpadyate mohāt satyena āpadyate amṛtam

original: MSS_2525-1 amṛtaṃ tadadharabimbe vacaneṣvamṛtaṃ vilokane'pyamṛtam /
analyzed: amṛtam tad adhara bimbe vacaneṣu amṛtam vilokane api amṛtam

original: MSS_2525-2 amṛtabhṛtau kucakumbhau satyaṃ sā sṛṣṭiraparaiva //
analyzed: amṛta bhṛtau kuca kumbhau satyam sā sṛṣṭiḥ aparā eva

original: MSS_2526-1 amṛtaṃ durlabhaṃ n ṇāṃ devānāmudakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: amṛtam durlabham devānām udakam tathā

original: MSS_2526-2 pit ṇāṃ durlabhaḥ putras takraṃ śakrasya durlabham //
analyzed: pit ṇām durlabhaḥ putraḥ takram śakrasya durlabham

original: MSS_2527-1 amṛtaṃ nāma yat santo mantrajihveṣu juhvati /
analyzed: amṛtam nāma yat santaḥ mantra jihveṣu juhvati

original: MSS_2527-2 śobhaiva mandarakṣubdhakṣubhitāmbhodhivarṇanā //
analyzed: śobhā eva mandara kṣubdha kṣubhita ambhodhi varṇanā

original: MSS_2528-1 amṛtaṃ bhujyate vidye bhavatīmāśritaiḥ param /
analyzed: amṛtam bhujyate vidye bhavatīm āśritaiḥ param

original: MSS_2528-2 anye tu bata dūyante saṃsaranta itastataḥ //
analyzed: anye tu bata dūyante saṃsarantaḥ itas tatas

original: MSS_2529-1 amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ kṣīrabhojanam /
analyzed: amṛtam śiśire vahniḥ amṛtam kṣīra bhojanam

original: MSS_2529-2 amṛtaṃ guṇavadbhāryā amṛtaṃ bālabhāṣitam //
analyzed: amṛtam guṇavat bhāryā amṛtam bāla bhāṣitam

original: MSS_2530-1 amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ priyadarśanam /
analyzed: amṛtam śiśire vahniḥ amṛtam priya darśanam

original: MSS_2530-2 amṛtaṃ rājasaṃmānam amṛtaṃ kṣīrabhojanam //
analyzed: amṛtam rāja saṃmānam amṛtam kṣīra bhojanam

original: MSS_2531-1 amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ bālabhāṣaṇam /
analyzed: amṛtam śiśire vahniḥ amṛtam bāla bhāṣaṇam

original: MSS_2531-2 amṛtaṃ svapriyā bhāryā hyamṛtaṃ svāmigauravam //
analyzed: amṛtam sva priyā bhāryā hi amṛtam svāmi gauravam

original: MSS_2532-1 amṛtaṃ śiśire vahnir amṛtaṃ svāmigauram /
analyzed: amṛtam śiśire vahniḥ amṛtam svāmigauram

original: MSS_2532-2 bhāryāmṛtaṃ guṇavatī dhāroṣṇamamṛtaṃ payaḥ //
analyzed: bhāryā amṛtam guṇavatī dhārā uṣṇam amṛtam payaḥ

original: MSS_2533-1 amṛtaṃ sadguṇā bhāryā amṛtaṃ bālabhāṣitam /
analyzed: amṛtam sat guṇā bhāryā amṛtam bāla bhāṣitam

original: MSS_2533-2 amṛtaṃ rājasaṃmānam amṛtaṃ mānabhojanam //
analyzed: amṛtam rāja saṃmānam amṛtam māna bhojanam

original: MSS_2534-1 amṛtajaladheḥ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ payāṃsi payodharaḥ kirati karakāstārākārā yadi sphaṭikāvanau /
analyzed: amṛta jaladheḥ pāyam pāyam payāṃsi payodharaḥ kirati karakāḥ tārā ākārāḥ yadi sphaṭika avanau

original: MSS_2534-2 tadiha tulanāmānīyante kṣaṇaṃ kaṭhināḥ punaḥ satatamamṛtasyandodgārā giraḥ pratibhāvatām //
analyzed: tat iha tulanām ānīyante kṣaṇam kaṭhināḥ punar satatam amṛta syanda udgārāḥ giraḥ pratibhāvatām

original: MSS_2535-1 amṛtadravamādhurīdhurīṇāṃ giramākarṇya kuraṅgalocanāyāḥ /
analyzed: amṛta drava mādhurī dhurīṇām giram ākarṇya kuraṅga locanāyāḥ

original: MSS_2535-2 muhurabhyasanaṃ kaṣāyakaṇṭhī kalakaṇṭhī kurute kuhūrutena //
analyzed: muhur abhyasanam kaṣāya kaṇṭhī kalakaṇṭhī kurute kuhū rutena

original: MSS_2536-1 amṛtadravairvidadhadabjadṛśām apamārgamoṣadhipatiḥ sma karaiḥ /
analyzed: amṛta dravaiḥ vidadhat abja dṛśām apamārgam oṣadhipatiḥ sma karaiḥ

original: MSS_2536-2 parito visarpi paritāpi bhṛśaṃ vapuṣo'vatārayati mānaviṣam //
analyzed: paritas visarpi paritāpi bhṛśam māna viṣam

original: MSS_2537-1 amṛtanidhānaṃ ruciraṃ saṃtāpanivartate sadā niratam /
analyzed: amṛta nidhānam ruciram saṃtāpa nivartate sadā niratam

original: MSS_2537-2 candramukhaṃ tava sundari susmitabhāsā vikāsate paritaḥ //
analyzed: candra mukham tava sundari su smita bhāsā vikāsate paritas

original: MSS_2538-1 amṛtamadhuraiḥ kāñcīnādaiḥ kṛtābhayaḍiṇḍime trivalilaharīlāvaṇyāmbhaḥkaṇotkarakarbure /
analyzed: amṛta madhuraiḥ kāñcī nādaiḥ kṛta abhaya ḍiṇḍime trivali laharī lāvaṇya ambhaḥ kaṇā utkara karbure

original: MSS_2538-2 viṣamanayanajvālājālāvalīḍhaparākramo luṭhati madanastanvaṅgīnāṃ nitambaśilātale //
analyzed: viṣama nayana jvālā jāla avalīḍha parākramaḥ luṭhati madanaḥ tanvaṅgīnām nitamba śilā tale

original: MSS_2539-1 amṛtamamṛtaṃ kaḥ saṃdeho madhūnyapi nānyathā madhuramadhikaṃ cūtasyāpi prasannarasaṃ phalam /
analyzed: amṛtam amṛtam kaḥ saṃdehaḥ madhūni api nā anyathā madhuram adhikam cūtasya api prasanna rasam phalam

original: MSS_2539-2 sakṛdapi punarmadhyasthaḥ san rasāntaravijjano vadatu yadihānyatsvādu syāt priyādaśanacchadāt //
analyzed: sakṛt api punar madhyasthaḥ san rasa antara vid janaḥ vadatu yat iha anyat svādu syāt priyāt aśanacchadāt

original: MSS_2540-1 amṛtamamṛtaṃ candraṃ candraṃ ratiṃ ca ratiṃ tathā prathitamatayaḥ kāmaṃ brūyurmadhūni madhūnyapi /
analyzed: amṛtam amṛtam candram candram ratim ca ratim tathā prathita matayaḥ kāmam brūyuḥ madhūni madhūni api

original: MSS_2540-2 yadi na subhagāsparśāmodaṃ vinā pramude tataḥ sakalamakalaṃ teṣāṃ vyūhaṃ bravīmi punaḥ priye //
analyzed: yadi na subhagā sparśa āmodam vinā pramude tatas sakalam akalam teṣām vyūham bravīmi punar priye

original: MSS_2541-1 amṛtamamṛtaṃ candraścandrastathāmbujamambujaṃ ratirapi ratiḥ kāmaḥ kāmo madhūni madhūnyapi /
analyzed: amṛtam amṛtam candraḥ candraḥ tathā ambujam ambujam ratiḥ api ratiḥ kāmaḥ kāmaḥ madhūni madhūni api

original: MSS_2541-2 iti na bhajate vastu prāyaḥ parasparasaṃkaraṃ tadiyamabalā dhatte lakṣmīṃ kathaṃ sakalātmikām //
analyzed: iti na bhajate vastu prāyas paraspara saṃkaram tat iyam abalā dhatte lakṣmīm katham sakala ātmikām

original: MSS_2542-1 amṛtamayamanaṅgakṣmāruhasyālavālaṃ mṛtadivasakapālaṃ kālakāpālikasya /
analyzed: amṛta mayam anaṅga kṣmāruhasya ālavālam mṛta divasa kapālam kāla kāpālikasya

original: MSS_2542-2 jayati makaraketoḥ śāṇacakraṃ śarāṇām amarapurapurandhrīdarpaṇaḥ śvetabhānuḥ //
analyzed: jayati makaraketoḥ śāṇa cakram śarāṇām amara pura purandhrī darpaṇaḥ śvetabhānuḥ

original: MSS_2543-1 amṛtarasavisaravitaraṇa- maraṇottāritasure sati payodhau /
analyzed: amṛta rasa visara vitaraṇa maraṇa uttārita sure sati payodhau

original: MSS_2543-2 kasya sphuranti hṛdaye grīṣmataḍākā bhuvi varākāḥ //
analyzed: kasya sphuranti hṛdaye grīṣma taḍākāḥ bhuvi varākāḥ

original: MSS_2544-1 amṛtarasasārabhūtaḥ sakalakalo makaraketusarvasvam /
MSS_2544-2 akhilajananayanasukhakṛt kathamindurvāsare'bhyuditaḥ //
analyzed: akhila jana nayana sukha kṛt katham induḥ vāsarebhiḥ uditaḥ

original: MSS_2545-1 amṛtavacanalīlāvibhramairannapānaṃ racaya catura kīra bhrāntacitteṣu teṣu /
analyzed: amṛta vacana līlā vibhramaiḥ anna pānam racaya catura kīra bhrānta citteṣu teṣu

original: MSS_2545-2 akalitaparasevātāpapāpaḥ piko'sau bhajatu vipinavāṭīmeṣa pīyūṣakaṇṭhaḥ //
analyzed: a kalita para sevā tāpa pāpaḥ pikaḥ usau bhajatu vipina vāṭīm eṣa pīyūṣa kaṇṭhaḥ

original: MSS_2546-1 amṛtasiktamivāṅgamidaṃ yadi bhavati tanvi tavādbhutavīkṣitaiḥ /
analyzed: amṛta siktam iva aṅgam idam yadi bhavati tanvi tava adbhuta vīkṣitaiḥ

original: MSS_2546-2 adharamindukarādapi śubhrayanty aruṇayantyaruṇādapi kiṃ dṛśam //
analyzed: adharam indu karāt api śubhrayantī aruṇayantī aruṇāt api kim dṛśam

original: MSS_2547-1 amṛtasyandikiraṇaś candramā nāmato mataḥ /
MSS_2547-2 anya evāyamarthātmā viṣaniṣyandidīdhitiḥ //
analyzed: anyaḥ eva ayam artha ātmā viṣa nisyandi dīdhitiḥ

original: MSS_2548-1 amṛtasyandinaṃ kaścit kṛṣṇameghaṃ dvijaḥ smaran /
analyzed: amṛta syandinam kaścid kṛṣṇa megham dvijaḥ smaran

original: MSS_2548-2 udanyayā na veśantam udanvantaṃ ca vīkṣate //
analyzed: udanyayā na veśantam udanvantam ca vīkṣate

original: MSS_2549-1 amṛtasya pravāhaiḥ kiṃ kāyakṣālanasaṃbhavaiḥ /
analyzed: amṛtasya pravāhaiḥ kim kāya kṣālana saṃbhavaiḥ

original: MSS_2549-2 cirānmitrapariṣvaṅgo yo'sau mūlyavivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: cirāt mitra pariṣvaṅgaḥ yaḥ asau mūlya vivarjitaḥ

original: MSS_2550-1 amṛtasyeva kuṇḍāni sukhānāmiva rāśayaḥ /
analyzed: amṛtasya iva kuṇḍāni sukhānām iva rāśayaḥ

original: MSS_2550-2 rateriva nidhānāni yoṣitaḥ kena nirmitāḥ //
analyzed: rateḥ iva nidhānāni yoṣitaḥ kena nirmitāḥ

original: MSS_2551-1 amṛtasyeva tṛpyeta apamānasya yogavit /
analyzed: amṛtasya iva tṛpyeta apamānasya yoga vid

original: MSS_2551-2 viṣavacca jugupseta saṃmānasya sadā dvijaḥ //
analyzed: viṣa vat ca jugupseta saṃmānasya sadā dvijaḥ

original: MSS_2552-1 amṛtasyeva saṃtṛpyed avamānasya vai dvijaḥ /
analyzed: amṛtasya iva saṃtṛpyet avamānasya vai dvijaḥ

original: MSS_2552-2 sukhaṃ hyavamataḥ śete yo'vamantā sa naśyati //
analyzed: sukham hi avamataḥ śete yaḥ u vamantā sa naśyati

original: MSS_2553-1 amṛtāṃśoḥ kiraṇebhyo- 'jāyata vṛddhirmahodadherudare /
analyzed: amṛtāṃśoḥ kiraṇebhyaḥ jāyata vṛddhiḥ mahodadheḥ udare

original: MSS_2553-2 kathayanti hāramaṇayo hṛdi tāpamuṣaḥ spṛśanto'pi //
analyzed: kathayanti hāra maṇayaḥ hṛdi tāpa muṣaḥ spṛśantaḥ api

original: MSS_2554-1 amṛtātmani padmānāṃ dveṣṭari snigdhatārake /
analyzed: amṛta ātmani padmānām dveṣṭari snigdha tārake

original: MSS_2554-2 mukhendau tava satyasmin apareṇa kimindunā //
analyzed: mukha indau tava sati asmin apareṇa kim indunā

original: MSS_2555-1 amṛtādamṛtaṃ na tāvakād aparaṃ yat tripurārirādarāt /
analyzed: amṛtāt amṛtam na tāvakāt aparam yat tripurāriḥ ādarāt

original: MSS_2555-2 avalambya śiraḥsthalena tad dhṛtahālāhāla eṣa jīvati //
analyzed: avalambya śiraḥ sthalena tat dhṛta hālāhālaḥ eṣa jīvati

original: MSS_2556-1 amṛtādhmātajīmūtasnigdhasaṃhananasya te /
analyzed: amṛta ādhmāta jīmūta snigdha saṃhananasya te

original: MSS_2556-2 pariṣvaṅgīya vātsalyād ayamutkaṇṭhate janaḥ //
analyzed: vātsalyāt ayam utkaṇṭhate janaḥ

original: MSS_2557-1 amṛtāpyāyināṃ n ṇāṃ saṃtoṣo naiva jāyate /
analyzed: amṛta āpyāyinām saṃtoṣaḥ na eva jāyate

original: MSS_2557-2 gāvastṛṇamivāraṇye prārthayanti navaṃ navam //
analyzed: gāvaḥ tṛṇam iva araṇye prārthayanti navam navam

original: MSS_2558-1 amṛtāyatāmiti vadet pīte bhukte kṣute ca śataṃ jīva /
analyzed: amṛtāyatām iti vadet pīte bhukte kṣute ca śatam jīva

original: MSS_2558-2 choṭikayā saha jṛmbhā- samaye syātāṃ cirāyurānandau //
analyzed: choṭikayā saha jṛmbhā samaye syātām cira āyuḥ ānandau

original: MSS_2559-1 amṛtā vigataprāṇā sāntaḥ śalyākṛtavraṇā /
analyzed: amṛtā vigata prāṇā sā antar śalyā kṛta vraṇā

original: MSS_2559-2 abaddhā niścalevāste kūṭasaṃsthe mṛge mṛgī //
analyzed: abaddhā niścalā iva āste kūṭa saṃsthe mṛge mṛgī

original: MSS_2560-1 amṛtotprekṣaṇe cārur aśeṣajanasajjanaḥ /
MSS_2560-2 kavirgaruḍavanmānya indravajrādivṛttakṛt //
MSS_2561-1 amṛtonmathitaiḥ suvarṇacūrṇair mṛdamutpādya nidhāya nābhicakre /
analyzed: amṛta unmathitaiḥ suvarṇa cūrṇaiḥ mṛdam utpādya nidhāya nābhi cakre

original: MSS_2561-2 akaronnavaromarājiyaṣṭyā kucakumbhau kusumeṣukumbhakāraḥ //
analyzed: akarot nava romarāji yaṣṭyā kuca kumbhau kusumeṣu kumbhakāraḥ

original: MSS_2562-1 amedhyapūrṇe kṛmijālasaṃkule svabhāvadurgandhini śaucavarjite /
analyzed: amedhya pūrṇe kṛmi jāla saṃkule svabhāva durgandhini śauca varjite

original: MSS_2562-2 kalevare mūtrapurīṣabhājane ramanti mūḍhā viramanti paṇḍitāḥ //
analyzed: kalevare mūtra purīṣa bhājane ramanti mūḍhāḥ viramanti paṇḍitāḥ

original: MSS_2563-1 ameyo mitalokastvam anarthī prārthanāvahaḥ /
analyzed: ameyaḥ mita lokaḥ tvam anarthī prārthanā vahaḥ

original: MSS_2563-2 ajito jiṣṇuratyantam avyakto vyaktakāraṇam //
analyzed: ajitaḥ jiṣṇuḥ atyantam avyaktaḥ vyakta kāraṇam

original: MSS_2564-1 amoghakrodhaharṣasya svayaṃ kṛtyānvavekṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: amogha krodha harṣasya svayam kṛtyā anvavekṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_2564-2 ātmapratyayakośasya vasudheyaṃ vasuṃdharā //
analyzed: ātma pratyaya kośasya vasudhā iyam vasuṃdharā

original: MSS_2565-1 amoghā vāsare vidyud amoghaṃ niśi garjitam /
analyzed: amoghā vāsare vidyut amogham niśi garjitam

original: MSS_2565-2 amoghā munīnāṃ vāṇī amoghaṃ devadarśanam //
analyzed: amoghā munīnām vāṇī amogham deva darśanam

original: MSS_2566-1 amauktikamasauvarṇaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vibhūṣaṇam /
analyzed: a mauktikam a sauvarṇam brāhmaṇānām vibhūṣaṇam

original: MSS_2566-2 devatānāṃ pit ṇāṃ ca bhāgo yena pradīyate //
analyzed: devatānām ca bhāgaḥ yena pradīyate

original: MSS_2567-1 ambaraṃ vinayataḥ priyapāṇer yoṣitaśca karayoḥ kalahasya /
analyzed: ambaram vinayataḥ priya pāṇeḥ yoṣitaḥ ca karayoḥ kalahasya

original: MSS_2567-2 vāraṇāmiva vidhātumabhīkṣṇaṃ kakṣyayā ca valayaiśca śiśiñje //
analyzed: vāraṇām iva vidhātum abhīkṣṇam kakṣyayā ca valayaiḥ ca śiśiñje

original: MSS_2568-1 ambaraṃ stimitamambudhārayā vyakta eṣa paritaḥ payodharaḥ /
analyzed: ambaram stimitam ambu dhārayā vyaktaḥ eṣa paritas payodharaḥ

original: MSS_2568-2 prāvṛṣā kimapi lajjamānayā mīlite ravividhūvilocane //
analyzed: prāvṛṣā kim api lajjamānayā mīlite ravi vidhū vilocane

original: MSS_2569-1 ambaramanūrulaṅghyaṃ vasuṃdharā sāpi vāmanaikapadā /
analyzed: ambaram anūru laṅghyam vasuṃdharā sā api vāmana eka padā

original: MSS_2569-2 abdhirapi potalaṅghyaḥ satāṃ manaḥ kena tulyaṃ syāt //
analyzed: abdhiḥ api pota laṅghyaḥ satām manaḥ kena tulyam syāt

original: MSS_2570-1 ambaramapanaya mugdhe vrajatu vikāśaṃ digambaratā /
analyzed: ambaram apanaya mugdhe vrajatu vikāśam digambara tā

original: MSS_2570-2 hārāvalisurataṭinī nakhaśaśimaṇḍalasya kucaśambhoḥ //
analyzed: hāra āvali sura taṭinī nakha śaśi maṇḍalasya kuca śambhoḥ

original: MSS_2571-1 ambaramambuni patramarātiḥ pītamahīnagaṇasya dadāha /
analyzed: ambaram ambuni patram arātiḥ pītam ahīna gaṇasya dadāha

original: MSS_2571-2 yasya vadhūstanayaṃ gṛhamabjā pātu sa vo haralocanavahniḥ //
analyzed: yasya vadhūḥ tanayam gṛham abjā pātu sa vaḥ hara locana vahniḥ

original: MSS_2572-1 ambarameṣa ramaṇyai yāminyai vāsaraḥ preyān /
analyzed: ambaram eṣa ramaṇyai yāminyai vāsaraḥ preyān

original: MSS_2572-2 adhikaṃ dadau nijāṅkād atha saṃkucitaḥ svayaṃ tasthau //
analyzed: adhikam dadau nija aṅkāt atha saṃkucitaḥ svayam tasthau

original: MSS_2573-1 ambaravipinamidānīṃ timiravarāho'vagāhate jaladheḥ /
analyzed: ambara vipinam idānīm timira varāhaḥ uvagāhate jaladheḥ

original: MSS_2573-2 romasu yadasya lagnās tārakajalabindavo bhānti //
analyzed: romasu yat asya lagnāḥ tāraka jala bindavaḥ bhānti

original: MSS_2574-1 ambarāntamavalambitukāmam andhyayā samabhivīkṣya tu kāmam /
analyzed: ambara antam avalambitu kāmam andhyayā samabhivīkṣya tu kāmam

original: MSS_2574-2 andhakāramatha gamya tanūnaṃ lajjayeva niragamyata nūnam //
analyzed: andhakāram atha gamya lajjayā iva niragamyata nūnam

original: MSS_2575-1 ambare'mbubharalambipayode mattabarhirucire'drinitambe /
analyzed: ambara imbu bhara lambi payode matta barhi rucira idri nitambe

original: MSS_2575-2 puṣpadhāmani kadambakadambe kā gatiḥ pathika kālavilambe //
analyzed: puṣpa dhāmani kadamba kadambe kā gatiḥ pathika kāla vilambe

original: MSS_2576-1 amba śrāmyasi tiṣṭha gorasamahaṃ mathnāmi manthānakaṃ prālambya sthitamīśvaraṃ sarabhasaṃ dīnānano vāsukiḥ /
analyzed: amba śrāmyasi tiṣṭha gorasam aham mathnāmi manthānakam prālambya sthitam īśvaram sarabhasam dīna ānanaḥ vāsukiḥ

original: MSS_2576-2 sāsūyaṃ kamalālayā suragaṇaḥ sānandamudyadbhayaṃ rāhuḥ praikṣata yaṃ sa vo'stu śivado gopālabālo hariḥ //
analyzed: sa asūyam kamala ālayā sura gaṇaḥ sa ānandam udyat bhayam rāhuḥ praikṣata yam sa voḥ tu śiva daḥ gopāla bālaḥ hariḥ

original: MSS_2577-1 ambā kupyati tāta mūrdhni vidhṛtā gaṅgeyamutsṛjyatāṃ vidvan ṣaṇmukha kā gatirmama ciraṃ mūrdhni sthitāyā vada /
analyzed: ambā kupyati tāta mūrdhni vidhṛtā gaṅgā iyam utsṛjyatām vidvan ṣaṇmukha kā gatiḥ mama ciram mūrdhni sthitāyāḥ vada

original: MSS_2577-2 kopāveśavaśādaśeṣavadanaiḥ pratyuttaraṃ dattavān ambhodhirjaladhiḥ payodhirudadhirvārāṃ nidhirvāridhiḥ //
analyzed: kopa āveśa vaśāt aśeṣa vadanaiḥ pratyuttaram dattavān ambhodhiḥ jaladhiḥ payodhiḥ udadhiḥ vārām nidhiḥ vāridhiḥ

original: MSS_2578-1 ambā tuṣyati na mayā na snuṣayā sāpi nāmbayā na mayā /
analyzed: ambā tuṣyati na mayā na snuṣayā sā api na ambayā na mayā

original: MSS_2578-2 ahamapi na tayā na tayā vada rājan kasya doṣo'yam //
analyzed: aham api na tayā na tayā vada rājan kasya doṣaḥ yam

original: MSS_2579-1 ambāmathārghajalapātrabhṛtaṃ nirīkṣya dūrādapāsaradasau janatā vihastā /
analyzed: ambām atha argha jala pātra bhṛtam nirīkṣya dūrāt apāsarat asau janatā vihastā

original: MSS_2579-2 pūrṇādivāndhatamasāni tuṣārakānter āryāt pṛthagjanaśatāni hi saṃbhramanti //
analyzed: pūrṇāt iva andha tamasāni tuṣāra kānteḥ āryāt pṛthagjana śatāni hi saṃbhramanti

original: MSS_2580-1 ambāyāśca pituśca sadguṇagaṇo yasminnabhivyajyate tasmin svapratibimbiteva nikhilā saivākṛtiḥ sā dyutiḥ /
analyzed: ambāyāḥ ca pituḥ ca sat guṇa gaṇaḥ yasmin abhivyajyate tasmin sva pratibimbitā iva nikhilā sā eva ākṛtiḥ sā dyutiḥ

original: MSS_2580-2 sā vāṇi vinayaḥ sa eva sahajaḥ puṇyānubhāvaḥ sa ca ślāghāyāḥ sadanaṃ sukhasya vasatistenaiva putrī pitā //
analyzed: sā vāṇi vinayaḥ saḥ eva sahajaḥ puṇya anubhāvaḥ sa ca ślāghāyāḥ sadanam sukhasya vasatiḥ tena eva putrī pitā

original: MSS_2581-1 ambā yena sarasvatī sutavatī tasyārpayantī rasān nānācāṭumukhī sa durlaḍitavān khelābhirucchṛṅkhalaḥ /
analyzed: ambā yena sarasvatī sutavatī tasya arpayantī rasān nānā cāṭu mukhī sa durlaḍitavān khelābhiḥ ucchṛṅkhalaḥ

original: MSS_2581-2 jihvādurvyasanairupadravarujaḥ kurvanti ye duḥsutām tān dṛṣṭvārthamitastato nikhanati svaṃ niḥsvamātanvatī //
analyzed: jihvā durvyasanaiḥ upadrava rujaḥ kurvanti ye duḥsutām tān dṛṣṭvā artham itas tatas nikhanati svam niḥsvam ātanvatī

original: MSS_2582-1 ambā śete'tra vṛddhā pariṇatavayasāmagraṇīratra tāto niḥśeṣāgārakarmaśramaśithilatanuḥ kumbhadāsī tatheha /
analyzed: ambā śeta itra vṛddhā pariṇata vayasām agraṇīḥ atra tātaḥ niḥśeṣa āgāra karma śrama śithila tanuḥ kumbhadāsī tathā iha

original: MSS_2582-2 asmin pāpāhamekā katipayadivasaproṣitaprāṇanāthā pānthāyetthaṃ yuvatyā kathitamabhimataṃ vyāhṛtivyājapūrvam //
analyzed: asmin pāpa aham ekā katipaya divasa proṣita prāṇanāthā pānthāya ittham yuvatyā kathitam abhimatam vyāhṛti vyāja pūrvam

original: MSS_2583-1 ambujamambuni jātaṃ nahi dṛṣṭaṃ jātamambujādambu /
analyzed: ambujam ambuni jātam nahi dṛṣṭam jātam ambujāt ambu

original: MSS_2583-2 adhunā tadviparītaṃ caraṇasarojādvinirgatā gaṅgā //
analyzed: adhunā tad viparītam caraṇa sarojāt vinirgatā gaṅgā

original: MSS_2584-1 ambujamambuni magnaṃ trāsādākāśamāśritaścandraḥ /
analyzed: ambujam ambuni magnam trāsāt ākāśam āśritaḥ candraḥ

original: MSS_2584-2 samprati kaḥ paripanthī yaṃ prati kopāruṇaṃ vadanam //
analyzed: samprati kaḥ paripanthī yam prati kopa aruṇam vadanam

original: MSS_2585-1 ambudaḥ kṛtapado nabhastale toyapūraparipūritodadhiḥ /
analyzed: ambudaḥ kṛta padaḥ nabhastale toyapūra paripūrita udadhiḥ

original: MSS_2585-2 goṣpadasya bharaṇe'pmaśaktimān ityasatyamabhidhīyate katham //
analyzed: goṣpadasya bharaṇa īpma śaktimān iti asatyam abhidhīyate katham

original: MSS_2586-1 ambudherudagamadvidhubhaṅgyā nūnamaurvaśikhibhāsmanapiṇḍaḥ /
analyzed: ambudheḥ udagamat vidhu bhaṅgyā nūnam aurva śikhi bhāsmana piṇḍaḥ

original: MSS_2586-2 yatkilāsya ghaṭate nahi tṛptiḥ khaṇḍitājanadṛgambusaridbhiḥ //
analyzed: yat kila asya ghaṭate nahi tṛptiḥ khaṇḍita ajana dṛś ambu saridbhiḥ

original: MSS_2587-1 ambeyaṃ neyamambā nahi kharakapiśaṃ śmaśru tasyā mukhārdhe tāto'yaṃ naiṣa tātaḥ stanamurasi piturdṛṣṭavānnāhamatra /
analyzed: ambā iyam na iyam ambā nahi khara kapiśam śmaśru tasyāḥ mukha ardhe tātaḥ yam nā eṣa tātaḥ stanam urasi pituḥ dṛṣṭavān na aham atra

original: MSS_2587-2 keyaṃ ko'yaṃ kimetadyuvatiratha pumān vastu kiṃ syāt tṛtīyaṃ śaṃbhoḥ saṃvīkṣya rūpādapasarati guhaḥ śaṅkitaḥ pātu yuṣmān //
analyzed: kā iyam kā iyam kim etat yuvatiḥ atha pumān vastu kim syāt tṛtīyam śaṃbhoḥ saṃvīkṣya rūpāt apasarati guhaḥ śaṅkitaḥ pātu yuṣmān

original: MSS_2588-1 ambhaḥ kardamatāmupaiti sahasā paṅkadravaḥ pāṃśutāṃ pāṃśurvāraṇakarṇatālapavanair dikprāntanīhāratām /
analyzed: ambhaḥ kardama tām upaiti sahasā paṅka dravaḥ pāṃśu tām pāṃśuḥ vāraṇakarṇa tāla pavanaiḥ diś prānta nīhāra tām

original: MSS_2588-2 nimnatvaṃ girayaḥ samaṃ viṣamatāṃ śūnyaṃ janasthānakaṃ niryāte tvayi rājyapāla bhavati tyaktasvabhāvaṃ jagat //
analyzed: nimna tvam girayaḥ samam viṣama tām śūnyam janasthānakam niryāte tvayi rājyapāla bhavati tyakta svabhāvam jagat

original: MSS_2589-1 ambhaḥ kumbhāmbhoruha- cāmarabhṛṅgārahemarūpyāṇi /
analyzed: ambhaḥ kumbha ambhoruha cāmara bhṛṅgāra hema rūpyāṇi

original: MSS_2589-2 phalatāmbūlavarāmbara- madirāmīnājyabhojyāni //
analyzed: phala tāmbūla vara ambara madirā mīna ājya bhojyāni

original: MSS_2590-1 ambhaḥsaṃbhṛtimantharāmbudaravaiḥ śālūragarjābhara- prārabdhapriyaviprayuktayuvatījīvagrahe bhīṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: ambhaḥ saṃbhṛti manthara ambuda ravaiḥ śālūra garja ābhara prārabdha priya viprayukta yuvatī jīva grahe bhīṣaṇāḥ

original: MSS_2590-2 vidyuddanturitāndhakārapaṭalā gāmbhīryabaddhārava- sthairyonmūlanaśaktayaḥ kathamamī niryānti varṣāniśāḥ //
analyzed: vidyut danturita andhakāra paṭalāḥ gāmbhīrya baddha ārava sthairya unmūlana śaktayaḥ katham amī niryānti varṣā niśāḥ

original: MSS_2591-1 ambhasaḥ parimāṇena unnataṃ kamalaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: ambhasaḥ parimāṇena unnatam kamalam bhavet

original: MSS_2591-2 svasvāminā balavatā bhṛtyo bhavati garvitaḥ //
analyzed: sva svāminā balavatā bhṛtyaḥ bhavati garvitaḥ

original: MSS_2592-1 ambhasaḥ prasṛtīraṣṭau ravāvanudite pibet /
analyzed: ambhasaḥ prasṛtīḥ aṣṭau ravau anudite pibet

original: MSS_2592-2 vātapittakaphān hatvā jīvedvarṣaśataṃ sukhī //
analyzed: vāta pitta kaphān hatvā jīvet varṣa śatam sukhī

original: MSS_2593-1 ambhasā bhidyate setus tathā mantro'pyarakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: ambhasā bhidyate setuḥ tathā mantraḥ upi arakṣitaḥ

original: MSS_2593-2 paiśunyād bhidyate sneho vāgbhirbhidyeta kātaraḥ //
analyzed: paiśunyāt bhidyate snehaḥ vāgbhiḥ bhidyeta kātaraḥ

original: MSS_2594-1 ambhasā śamamāyāti muṣṭimeyaśikhaḥ śikhī /
analyzed: ambhasā śamam āyāti muṣṭi meya śikhaḥ śikhī

original: MSS_2594-2 pravṛddho'dhaḥsthitaiḥ paścāt saṃtaptaireva dṛśyate //
analyzed: pravṛddha udhas sthitaiḥ paścāt saṃtaptaiḥ eva dṛśyate

original: MSS_2595-1 ambhasi taraṇisutāyāḥ stambhitataraṇiḥ sa devakīsūnuḥ /
analyzed: ambhasi taraṇi sutāyāḥ stambhita taraṇiḥ sa devakī sūnuḥ

original: MSS_2595-2 ātaravirahitagopyāḥ kātaramukhamīkṣate smeraḥ //
analyzed: ātara virahita gopyāḥ kātara mukham īkṣate smeraḥ

original: MSS_2596-1 ambhastattvaṃ bhūmitattvaṃ ca vāyos tattvaṃ tejastattvamākāśatattvam /
analyzed: ambhaḥ tattvam bhūmi tattvam ca vāyoḥ tattvam tejaḥ tattvam ākāśa tattvam

original: MSS_2596-2 pañcaitāni prāṇavāyuṃ militvā nāḍīyugme prāṇināṃ saṃcaranti //
analyzed: pañca etāni prāṇa vāyum militvā nāḍī yugme prāṇinām saṃcaranti

original: MSS_2597-1 ambhāṃsi jalajantūnāṃ durgaṃ durganivāsinām /
analyzed: ambhāṃsi jalajantūnām durgam durga nivāsinām

original: MSS_2597-2 svabhūmiḥ śvāpadādīnāṃ rājñāṃ sainyaṃ paraṃ balam //
analyzed: sva bhūmiḥ śvāpada ādīnām rājñām sainyam param balam

original: MSS_2598-1 ambhojagarbhasukumāratanustadāsau kaṇṭhagrahe prathamarāgaghane vilīya /
analyzed: ambhoja garbha sukumāra tanuḥ tadā asau kaṇṭhagrahe prathama rāga ghane vilīya

original: MSS_2598-2 sadyaḥ patanmadanamārgaṇarandhramārgair manye mama priyatamā hṛdayaṃ praviṣṭā //
analyzed: sadyas patat madana mārgaṇa randhra mārgaiḥ manye mama priyatamā hṛdayam praviṣṭā

original: MSS_2599-1 ambhojapatrāyatalocanānām ambhodhidīrghāsviha dīrghikāsu /
analyzed: ambhoja patra āyata locanānām ambhodhi dīrghāsu iha dīrghikāsu

original: MSS_2599-2 samāgatānāṃ kuṭilairapāṅgair anaṅgabāṇaiḥ prahatā yuvānaḥ //
analyzed: samāgatānām kuṭilaiḥ apāṅgaiḥ anaṅga bāṇaiḥ prahatāḥ yuvānaḥ

original: MSS_2600-1 ambhojaprakaro'tha ketakakulaṃ kundotkaraḥ kairava- vrāto malligaṇo'tha campakacayo jātīgaṇo vāthavā /
analyzed: ambhoja prakaraḥ utha ketaka kulam kunda utkaraḥ kairava vrātaḥ malli gaṇaḥ utha campaka cayaḥ jātī gaṇaḥ vā athavā

original: MSS_2600-2 no cedādaramātanoti pika tatkhedaṃ vṛthā mā kṛthā yasmāt kvāpi kadāpi ko'pi bhavitā yastvadguṇaṃ jñāsyati //
analyzed: no ced ādaram ātanoti pika tad khedam vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ yasmāt kvāpi kadāpi kaḥ api bhavitā yaḥ tvad guṇam jñāsyati

original: MSS_2601-1 ambhojākṣyāḥ puravanalatā dhāmni saṃketabhājaś cetonāthe cirayati bhṛśaṃ mohanidrāṃ gatāyāḥ /
analyzed: ambhoja akṣyāḥ pura vana latāḥ dhāmni saṃketa bhājaḥ cetaḥ nāthe cirayati bhṛśam moha nidrām gatāyāḥ

original: MSS_2601-2 svacchaṃ nābhihradavalayitaṃ kāntaratnāṃśujālaṃ toyabhrāntyā pibati hariṇī vismayaṃ ca prayāti /
analyzed: svaccham nābhi hrada valayitam kānta ratna aṃśu jālam toya bhrāntyā pibati hariṇī vismayam ca prayāti

original: MSS_2602-1 ambhojāni ghanāghanavyavahito'pyullāghayatyaṃśumān dūrastho'pi payodharo'tiśiśirasparśaṃ karotyātapam /
analyzed: ambhojāni ghanāghana vyavahitaḥ api ullāghayati aṃśumān dūra sthaḥ api payodhara uti śiśira sparśam karoti ātapam

original: MSS_2602-2 śaktiḥ kāpyaparikṣatāsti mahatāṃ svairaṃ daviṣṭhānyaho yanmāhātmyavaśena yānti ghaṭanāṃ kāryāṇi niryantraṇām //
analyzed: śaktiḥ kā api a parikṣatā asti mahatām svairam daviṣṭhāni aho yat māhātmya vaśena yānti ghaṭanām kāryāṇi niryantraṇām

original: MSS_2603-1 ambhojinīvanavilāsanivāsameva haṃsasya hanti nitarāṃ kupito vidhātā /
analyzed: ambhojinī vana vilāsa nivāsam eva haṃsasya hanti nitarām kupitaḥ vidhātā

original: MSS_2603-2 na tvasya dugdhajalabhedavidhau prasiddhāṃ vaidagghyakīrtimapahartumasau samarthaḥ //
analyzed: na tu asya dugdha jala bheda vidhau prasiddhām vaidagghya kīrtim apahartum asau samarthaḥ

original: MSS_2604-1 ambhodastanitaṃ niśamya kariṇāṃ bṛṃheti raṃhoyutas sadyastyaktamahīdhrakandaragṛhaḥ kautūhalī nirgataḥ /
analyzed: ambhoda stanitam niśamya kariṇām bṛṃha iti raṃhaḥ yutaḥ sadyas tyakta mahīdhra kandara gṛhaḥ kautūhalī nirgataḥ

original: MSS_2604-2 etasmin kṣaṇa eva caṇḍamaśanerākarṇya śabdaṃ krudhā taṃ pratyutpatati svagarjitajitaṃ dhīro mṛgāṇāṃ patiḥ //
analyzed: etasmin kṣaṇe eva caṇḍam aśaneḥ ākarṇya śabdam krudhā tam pratyutpatati sva garjita jitam dhīraḥ mṛgāṇām patiḥ

original: MSS_2605-1 ambhodhiḥ sthalatāṃ sthalaṃ jaladhitāṃ dhūlīvalaḥ śailatāṃ merurmṛtkaṇatāṃ tṛṇaṃ kuliśatāṃ vajraṃ tṛṇaklībatām /
analyzed: ambhodhiḥ sthala tām sthalam jaladhi tām dhūlīvalaḥ śaila tām meruḥ mṛd kaṇa tām tṛṇam kuliśa tām vajram tṛṇa klība tām

original: MSS_2605-2 vahniḥ śītalatāṃ himaṃ dahanatāmāyāti yasyecchayā līlādurlalitādbhutavyasanine daivāya tasmai namaḥ //
analyzed: vahniḥ śītala tām himam dahana tām āyāti yasya icchayā līlā durlalita adbhuta vyasanine daivāya tasmai namaḥ

original: MSS_2606-1 ambhodhikṣiptamuktāruciharicaraṇodgīrṇagaṅgāmbutulyaṃ kālindīphenakāntisphuritaphaṇadharonmuktanirmokarociḥ /
MSS_2606-2 karṇāṭīkuntalāntarvigalitasumanodāmaramyaṃ samantāc chrīkhaṇḍālepalakṣmīmupanayati yaśo yasya khaḍgaprasūtam //
analyzed: karṇāṭī kuntala antar vigalita sumanaḥ dāma ramyam samantāt śrīkhaṇḍa ālepa lakṣmīm upanayati yaśaḥ yasya khaḍga prasūtam

original: MSS_2607-1 ambhodhīnāṃ tamālaprabhavakisalayaśyāmavelāvanānām ā pārebhyaścaturṇāṃ caṭulatimikulakṣobhitāntarjalānām /
analyzed: ambhodhīnām tamāla prabhava kisalaya śyāma velā vanānām ā pārebhyaḥ caturṇām caṭula timi kula kṣobhita antar jalānām

original: MSS_2607-2 mālevāmlānapuṣpā tava nṛpatiśatairuhyate yā śirobhiḥ sā mayyeva skhalantī kathayati vinayālaṃkṛtaṃ te prabhutvam //
analyzed: mālā iva a mlāna puṣpā tava nṛpati śataiḥ uhyate yā śirobhiḥ sā mayi eva skhalantī kathayati vinaya alaṃkṛtam te prabhu tvam

original: MSS_2608-1 ambhodhereva jātāḥ kati jagati na te hanta santīha śaṅkhā yān saṃgṛhya bhramanti pratibhavanamamī bhikṣavo jīvanāya /
analyzed: ambhodheḥ eva jātāḥ kati jagati na te hanta santi iha śaṅkhāḥ yān saṃgṛhya bhramanti pratibhavanam amī bhikṣavaḥ jīvanāya

original: MSS_2608-2 ekaḥ śrīpāñcajanyo hariharakamalakroḍahaṃsāyamāno yasyādhvānairamānairasuravaravadhūvargagarbhā galanti //
