analyzed: ekaḥ śrī pāñcajanyaḥ hari hara kamala kroḍahaṃsāyamānaḥ yasya adhvānaiḥ amānaiḥ asura vara vadhū varga garbhāḥ galanti

original: MSS_2609-1 ambhodherjalayantramandiraparispande'pi nidrāṇayoḥ śrīnārāyaṇayorghanaṃ vighaṭayatyūṣmā samāliṅganam /
analyzed: ambhodheḥ jalayantra mandira parispande api nidrāṇayoḥ śrī nārāyaṇayoḥ ghanam vighaṭayati ūṣmā samāliṅganam

original: MSS_2609-2 kiṃ cottaptaviyatkapālaphalake kaṅkālaśeṣaśriyaṃ candraṃ marmarayanti parpaṭamiva krūrā raveraṃśavaḥ //
analyzed: kim ca uttapta viyat kapāla phalake kaṅkāla śeṣa śriyam candram marmarayanti parpaṭam iva krūrāḥ raveḥ aṃśavaḥ

original: MSS_2610-1 ambhodhervaḍavāmukhānalajhalājvālopagūḍhāntarā vyāmohādapibannapaḥ sphuṭamamī tarṣeṇa paryāvilāḥ /
analyzed: ambhodheḥ vaḍavāmukha anala jhalā jvālā upagūḍha antarāḥ vyāmohāt apiban apaḥ sphuṭam amī tarṣeṇa paryāvilāḥ

original: MSS_2610-2 uddeśasphuradindracāpavalayajvālāpadeśādaho dahyante kathamanyathārdhamalināṅgāradyutastoyadāḥ //
analyzed: uddeśa sphurat indracāpa valaya jvālāpa deśāt aho dahyante katham anyathā ardha malina aṅgāra dyutaḥ toyadāḥ

original: MSS_2611-1 ambhodhau viharantamantarahitaiḥ kīrtiṃ vahantaṃ guṇais taṃ mainākamavajragarvaviṣayau pakṣau dadhānaṃ numaḥ /
analyzed: ambhodhau viharantam anta rahitaiḥ kīrtim vahantam guṇaiḥ tam mainākam avajra garva viṣayau pakṣau dadhānam numaḥ

original: MSS_2611-2 āsanne suralokamānuṣajagatpātālapārātyaye yaḥ pāthonidhilaṅghinaḥ pathi marutsūnorvyanaiṣīt klamam //
analyzed: āsanne sura loka mānuṣa jagat pātāla pāra atyaye yaḥ pāthonidhi laṅghinaḥ pathi marut sūnoḥ vyanaiṣīt klamam

original: MSS_2612-1 ambhonidheranavagītaguṇaikarāśer uccaiḥśravaprabhṛtiṣu prasabhaṃ hṛteṣu /
analyzed: ambhonidheḥ anavagīta guṇa eka rāśeḥ uccaiḥśrava prabhṛtiṣu prasabham hṛteṣu

original: MSS_2612-2 āśvāsanaṃ yadavakṛṣṭamabhūnmaharṣe toyaṃ tvayā tadapi niṣkaruṇena pītam //
analyzed: āśvāsanam yat avakṛṣṭam abhūt mahā ṛṣe toyam tvayā tat api niṣkaruṇena pītam

original: MSS_2613-1 ambho'pi pravahatsvabhāvamaśanairāśyānamaśmāyate grāvāmbhaḥ sravati dravatvamuditodrekeṣu cāveyuṣaḥ /
analyzed: ambhaḥ api pravahat svabhāvam aśanais āśyānam aśmāyate grāvā ambhaḥ sravati drava tvam udita udrekeṣu ca aveyuṣaḥ

original: MSS_2613-2 kālasyāskhalitaprabhāvarabhasaṃ bhāti prabhutve'dbhute kasyāmutra vidhātṛśaktighaṭite mārge nisargaḥ sthiraḥ //
analyzed: kālasya askhalita prabhāva rabhasam bhāti prabhu tva idbhute kasya amutra vidhātṛ śakti ghaṭite mārge nisargaḥ sthiraḥ

original: MSS_2614-1 ambhobindugrahaṇarabhasāṃścātakān vīkṣamāṇāḥ śreṇībhūtāḥ parigaṇanayā nirdiśanto valākāḥ /
analyzed: ambhaḥ bindu grahaṇa rabhasān cātakān vīkṣamāṇāḥ śreṇī bhūtāḥ parigaṇanayā nirdiśantaḥ valākāḥ

original: MSS_2614-2 tvāmāsādya stanitasamaye mānayiṣyanti siddhāḥ sotkampāni priyasahacarīsaṃbhramāliṅgitāni //
analyzed: tvām āsādya stanita samaye mānayiṣyanti siddhāḥ sa utkampāni priya sahacarī saṃbhrama āliṅgitāni

original: MSS_2615-1 ambho bhajasva ciramasya yathābhilāṣam etanna tāṇḍavaya sairibha kānanaṃ ca /
analyzed: ambhaḥ bhajasva ciram asya yathābhilāṣam etat na sairibha kānanam ca

original: MSS_2615-2 duśceṣṭitena yadanena bhṛśaṃ tavaiṣa dhvastāśayo bhavati niṣkaluṣastaḍāgaḥ //
analyzed: duśceṣṭitena yat anena bhṛśam tava eṣa dhvasta āśayaḥ bhavati niṣkaluṣaḥ taḍāgaḥ

original: MSS_2616-1 ambhobhistanakumbhayostava ghanaśleṣāt samutkīrṇatāṃ yātāyā śukavakrimapraṇayinī seyaṃ na luptā lipiḥ /
analyzed: ambhobhiḥ stana kumbhayoḥ tava ghana śleṣāt samutkīrṇa tām yātāyāḥ śuka vakrima praṇayinī sā iyam na luptā lipiḥ

original: MSS_2616-2 kiṃ caitāṃ kusumeṣu kuñjaraśironakṣatramālāṃ tiro- dhitsurniṣphalameva majjasi nabhaḥ svacche sarovāriṇi //
analyzed: kim ca etām kusumeṣu kuñjara śiraḥ nakṣatra mālām tiras dhitsuḥ niṣphalam eva majjasi nabhaḥ svacche saraḥ vāriṇi

original: MSS_2617-1 ambhomucāṃ salilamudgiratāṃ niśīthe tāḍīvaneṣu nibhṛtasthitakarṇatālāḥ /
analyzed: ambhomucām salilam udgiratām niśīthe tāḍīvaneṣu nibhṛta sthita karṇa tālāḥ

original: MSS_2617-2 ākarṇayanti kariṇo'rdhanimīlitākṣā dhārāravaṃ daśanakoṭiniṣaṇṇahastāḥ //
analyzed: ākarṇayanti kariṇā ūrdhani mīlita akṣāḥ dhārā ravam daśana koṭi niṣaṇṇa hastāḥ

original: MSS_2618-1 ambhorāśirivāsi sattvanilayo no mandarakṣo bhavān kalyāṇaprakṛtiḥ sumeruriva kiṃ devaḥ surāpāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: ambhaḥ rāśiḥ iva asi sattva nilayaḥ naḥ mandarakṣaḥ bhavān kalyāṇa prakṛtiḥ sumeruḥ iva kim devaḥ sura apāśrayaḥ

original: MSS_2618-2 sacchāyo na tu rūḍhadustaralatastvaṃ kalpavṛkṣo yathā taiḥ kurvanti tulāṃ tathāpi bhavato mūḍhāḥ kavīnāṃ dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: sat chāyaḥ na tu rūḍha dustara lataḥ tvam kalpavṛkṣaḥ yathā taiḥ kurvanti tulām tathā api bhavataḥ mūḍhāḥ kavīnām dhiyaḥ

original: MSS_2619-1 ambhoruhaṃ vadanamambakamindukāntaḥ pāthonidhiḥ kusumacāpabhṛto vikāraḥ /
analyzed: ambhoruham vadanam ambakam indukāntaḥ pāthonidhiḥ kusuma cāpa bhṛtaḥ vikāraḥ

original: MSS_2619-2 prādurbabhūva subhaga tvayi dūrasaṃsthe caṇḍālacandradhavalāsu niśāsu tasyāḥ //
analyzed: prādurbabhūva subhaga tvayi dūra saṃsthe caṇḍāla candra dhavalāsu niśāsu tasyāḥ

original: MSS_2620-1 ambhoruhamaye snātvā vāpīpayasi kāminī /
MSS_2620-2 dadāti bhaktisaṃpannā puṣpasaubhāgyakāmyayā //
analyzed: dadāti bhakti saṃpannā puṣpa saubhāgya kāmyayā

original: MSS_2621-1 ambhoruhākṣi śaṃbhoś caraṇāvārādhitau kena /
analyzed: ambhoruha akṣi śaṃbhoḥ caraṇau ārādhitau kena

original: MSS_2621-2 yasmai vicalitavadanā madanākūtaṃ vibhāvayasi //
analyzed: yasmai vicalita vadanā madana ākūtam vibhāvayasi

original: MSS_2622-1 ambhovāhamuradviṣo nivasanaṃ dhvāntādridivyauṣadhī kandarpasya vilāsacampakadhanurvarṣālatāmañjarī /
analyzed: ambhaḥ vāha muradviṣaḥ nivasanam dhvānta adri divya oṣadhī kandarpasya vilāsa campaka dhanuḥ varṣā latā mañjarī

original: MSS_2622-2 lekhā vyomakaśopale viracitā cāmīkarasya sphurad dhāmnaḥ pānthivilāsinījanamanaḥ kampāya śampābhavat //
analyzed: lekhā vyoma kaśā upale viracitā cāmīkarasya sphurat dhāmnaḥ pānthi vilāsinī jana manaḥ kampāya śampā abhavat

original: MSS_2623-1 amlānapaṅkajā mālā kaṇṭhe rāmasya sītayā /
analyzed: a mlāna paṅkajā mālā kaṇṭhe rāmasya sītayā

original: MSS_2623-2 mudhā budhā bhramantyatra pratyakṣe'pi kriyāpade //
analyzed: mudhā budhāḥ bhramanti atra pratyakṣe api kriyā pade

original: MSS_2624-1 amlānamālyābharaṇāmbarasya varāṅganānandanamandirasya /
analyzed: amlāna mālya ābharaṇa ambarasya vara aṅganā ānandana mandirasya

original: MSS_2624-2 nityaprakāśotsavasevitasya svargasya vittasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: nitya prakāśa utsava sevitasya svargasya vittasya ca kaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: MSS_2625-1 amlānastabakanti kuntalabhare sīmantasīmāsvimāḥ sindūranti kapolabhittiṣu milanmaireyarāganti ca /
analyzed: kuntala bhare sīmanta sīmāsu imāḥ sindūranti kapola bhittiṣu milat maireya rāganti ca

original: MSS_2625-2 prauḍherṣyādyutiviśramanti nayanopānte kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ bimboṣṭhe kṣitipāla bālataraṇerlākṣārasanti tviṣaḥ //
analyzed: prauḍha īrṣyā dyuti viśramanti nayana upānte kuraṅgī dṛśaḥ bimba uṣṭhe kṣitipāla bāla taraṇeḥ lākṣā rasanti tviṣaḥ

original: MSS_2626-1 amlānirāmodabharaśca divyaḥ puṣpeṣu bhūyādbhavadaṅgasaṅgāt /
analyzed: amlāniḥ āmoda bharaḥ ca divyaḥ puṣpeṣu bhūyāt bhavat aṅga saṅgāt

original: MSS_2626-2 dṛṣṭaṃ prasūnopamayā mayānyan na dharmaśarmobhayakarmaṭhaṃ yat //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam prasūna upamayā mayā anyat na dharma śarma ubhaya karmaṭham yat

original: MSS_2627-1 amlāno balavāñśūraś chāyevānugataḥ sadā /
analyzed: a mlānaḥ balavān śūraḥ chāyā iva anugataḥ sadā

original: MSS_2627-2 satyavādī mṛdurdāntaḥ sa rājavasatiṃ vaset //
analyzed: satya vādī mṛduḥ dāntaḥ sa rāja vasatim vaset

original: MSS_2628-1 ayaṃ kanakanirmitaḥ sakalabhūdharādunnataḥ sahasranayanāśrayaḥ sapadi labdhabhāgyodayaḥ /
analyzed: ayam kanaka nirmitaḥ sakala bhūdharāt unnataḥ sahasranayana āśrayaḥ sapadi labdha bhāgya udayaḥ

original: MSS_2628-2 kucopari parisphurattaruṇicārucelāñcalaṃ manāgapi nivāraya tyajatu garvamurvīdharaḥ //
analyzed: kuca upari parisphurat taruṇi cāru cela añcalam manāk api nivāraya tyajatu garvam urvīdharaḥ

original: MSS_2629-1 ayaṃ kāṇaḥ śukro viṣamacaraṇaḥ sūryatanayaḥ kṣatāṅgo'yaṃ rāhurvikalamahimā śītakiraṇaḥ /
analyzed: ayam kāṇaḥ śukraḥ viṣama caraṇaḥ sūrya tanayaḥ kṣata aṅgaḥ yam rāhuḥ vikala mahimā śītakiraṇaḥ

original: MSS_2629-2 ajānānasteṣāmapi niyatakarmasvakaphalaṃ grahagrāmagrastā vayamiti jano'yaṃ pralapati //
analyzed: a jānānaḥ teṣām api niyata karma svaka phalam graha grāma grastāḥ vayam iti janaḥ yam pralapati

original: MSS_2630-1 ayaṃ kāmo nijāmo vā tvayā kimavadhāritam /
analyzed: ayam kāmaḥ nijāmaḥ vā tvayā kim avadhāritam

original: MSS_2630-2 iti dṛṣṭiriva praṣṭuṃ śrutiṃ śrayati subhruvām //
analyzed: iti dṛṣṭiḥ iva praṣṭum śrutim śrayati subhruvām

original: MSS_2631-1 ayaṃ khalu mṛṇālinīnavavilāsavaihāsikas tviṣāṃ vitapate patiḥ sapadi dṛśyamānā nijāḥ /
analyzed: ayam khalu mṛṇālinī nava vilāsa vaihāsikaḥ tviṣām vitapate patiḥ sapadi dṛśyamānāḥ nijāḥ

original: MSS_2631-2 stanau pulakayanti cotpaladṛśāṃ priyoraḥsthale viparyasitavṛttayo ghusṛṇapaṅkapatrāṅkurāḥ //
analyzed: stanau pulakayanti ca utpala dṛśām priya uraḥsthale viparyasita vṛttayaḥ ghusṛṇa paṅka patra aṅkurāḥ

original: MSS_2632-1 ayaṃ ca suratajvālaḥ kāmāgniḥ praṇayendhanaḥ /
analyzed: ayam ca surata jvālaḥ kāma agniḥ praṇaya indhanaḥ

original: MSS_2632-2 narāṇāṃ yatra hūyante yauvanāni dhanāni ca //
analyzed: narāṇām yatra hūyante yauvanāni dhanāni ca

original: MSS_2633-1 ayaṃ jyotsnājānistava vadanadūno'mbaraguhāṃ praviṣṭastatrāpi prasṛtamidamenaṃ dṛḍhatamaḥ /
analyzed: ayam jyotsnā jāniḥ tava vadana dūna umbara guhām praviṣṭaḥ tatra api prasṛtam idam enam dṛḍhatamaḥ

original: MSS_2633-2 iti trāsodrekakramagalitasattvaḥ kṣayagadī vidhirdagdho dīnaṃ vyathayati nidānaṃ hi mṛdutā //
analyzed: iti trāsa udreka krama galita sattvaḥ kṣaya gadī vidhiḥ dagdhaḥ dīnam vyathayati nidānam hi mṛdu tā

original: MSS_2634-1 ayaṃ tasyā rathakṣobhād aṃsenāṃso nipīḍitaḥ /
analyzed: ayam tasyāḥ ratha kṣobhāt aṃsena aṃsaḥ nipīḍitaḥ

original: MSS_2634-2 ekaḥ kṛtī śarīre'smiñ śeṣamaṅgaṃ bhuvo bharaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ kṛtī śarīresmin śeṣam aṅgam bhuvaḥ bharaḥ

original: MSS_2635-1 ayaṃ tāvad bāṣpastruṭita iva muktāmaṇisaro visarpan dhārābhirluṭhati dharaṇīṃ jarjarakaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ayam tāvat bāṣpaḥ truṭitaḥ iva muktāmaṇi saraḥ visarpan dhārābhiḥ luṭhati dharaṇīm jarjara kaṇaḥ

original: MSS_2635-2 niruddho'pyāvegaḥ sphuradadharanāsāpuṭatayā pareṣāmunneyo bhavati ca bharādhmātahṛdayaḥ //
analyzed: niruddhaḥ upi āvegaḥ sphurat adhara nāsā puṭa tayā pareṣām unneyaḥ bhavati ca bhara ādhmāta hṛdayaḥ

original: MSS_2636-1 ayaṃ te vidrumacchāyo marumārga ivādharaḥ /
analyzed: ayam te vidruma chāyaḥ maru mārgaḥ iva adharaḥ

original: MSS_2636-2 karoti kasya no bāle pipāsākulitaṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: karoti kasya naḥ bāle pipāsā ākulitam manaḥ

original: MSS_2637-1 ayaṃ trayāṇāṃ grāmāṇāṃ nidhānaṃ madhuradhvaniḥ /
analyzed: ayam trayāṇām grāmāṇām nidhānam madhura dhvaniḥ

original: MSS_2637-2 rekhātrayamitīvāsyāḥ sūtritaṃ kaṇṭhakandale //
analyzed: rekhā trayam iti iva asyāḥ sūtritam kaṇṭha kandale

original: MSS_2638-1 ayaṃ daridro bhaviteti vaidhasīṃ lipiṃ lalāṭe'rthijanasya jāgratīm /
analyzed: ayam daridraḥ bhavitā iti vaidhasīm lipim lalāṭa īrthi janasya jāgratīm

original: MSS_2638-2 mṛṣā na cakre'lpitakalpapādapaḥ praṇīya dāridryadaridratāṃ nalaḥ //
analyzed: mṛṣā na cakra ilpita kalpapādapaḥ praṇīya dāridrya daridra tām nalaḥ

original: MSS_2639-1 ayaṃ dūtārthasaṃkṣepaḥ pratyarthaniyatā giraḥ /
analyzed: ayam dūta artha saṃkṣepaḥ prati artha niyatāḥ giraḥ

original: MSS_2639-2 prayojanaṃ kriyotpādi kiyacchakyeta bhāṣitum //
analyzed: prayojanam kriyā utpādi kiyat śakyeta bhāṣitum

original: MSS_2640-1 ayaṃ dūrabhrāntaḥ paṭutarapipāsākulamanāḥ kapole te mattadvipa nipatitaḥ ṣaṭpadayuvā /
analyzed: ayam dūra bhrāntaḥ paṭutara pipāsā ākula manāḥ kapole te matta dvipa nipatitaḥ ṣaṭpada yuvā

original: MSS_2640-2 tvamapyetāṃ pīnaśravaṇadaradolāvyasanitāṃ vimuñca svācchandyādapanayatu tāvat tṛṣamimām //
analyzed: tvam api etām pīna śravaṇa dara dolā vyasani tām vimuñca svācchandyāt apanayatu tāvat tṛṣam imām

original: MSS_2641-1 ayaṃ dvīpī priyāṃ leḍhi jihvāgreṇa punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: ayam dvīpī priyām leḍhi jihvā agreṇa punar punar

original: MSS_2641-2 prītimāyāti ca tayā lihyamānaḥ svakāntayā //
analyzed: prītim āyāti ca tayā lihyamānaḥ sva kāntayā

original: MSS_2642-1 ayaṃ dhārāvāhastaḍidiyamiyaṃ dagdhakarakā sa cāyaṃ nirghoṣaḥ sa ca ravavaśo bhekanicayaḥ /
analyzed: ayam dhārāvāhaḥ taḍit iyam iyam dagdha karakā sa ca ayam nirghoṣaḥ sa ca rava vaśaḥ bheka nicayaḥ

original: MSS_2642-2 itīva pratyaṅgaprathitamadanāgniṃ kṛśatanur ghanaśvāsotkṣepairjvalayati muhurmṛtyuvaśinī //
analyzed: iti iva pratyaṅga prathita madana agnim kṛśa tanuḥ ghana śvāsa utkṣepaiḥ jvalayati muhur mṛtyu vaśinī

original: MSS_2643-1 ayaṃ dhūrto māyāvinayamadhurādasya caritāt sakhi pratyūṣi tvaṃ prakṛtisarale paśyasi na kim /
analyzed: ayam dhūrtaḥ māyā vinaya madhurāt asya caritāt sakhi pratyūṣi tvam prakṛti sarale paśyasi na kim

original: MSS_2643-2 kapole yallākṣārasabahalarāgapraṇayinīm imāṃ dhatte mudrāmanaticiravṛttāntapiśunām //
analyzed: kapole yat lākṣā rasa bahala rāga praṇayinīm imām dhatte mudrām anaticira vṛttānta piśunām

original: MSS_2644-1 ayaṃ nijaḥ paro veti gaṇanā laghucetasām /
analyzed: ayam nijaḥ paraḥ vā iti gaṇanā laghu cetasām

original: MSS_2644-2 udāracaritānāṃ tu vasudhaiva kuṭumbakam //
analyzed: udāra caritānām tu vasudhā eva kuṭumbakam

original: MSS_2645-1 ayaṃ netrādatrerajani rajanīvallabha iti bhramaḥ ko'yaṃ prajñāparicayaparādhīnamanasām /
analyzed: ayam netrāt atreḥ rajani rajanīvallabhaḥ iti bhramaḥ kaḥ yam prajñā paricaya para adhīna manasām

original: MSS_2645-2 sudhānāmādhāraḥ sa khalu ratibimbādharasudhā- rasāsekasnigdhādajani nayanāt puṣpadhanuṣaḥ //
analyzed: sudhānām ādhāraḥ sa khalu rati bimba adhara sudhā rasa āseka snigdhāt ajani nayanāt puṣpadhanuṣaḥ

original: MSS_2646-1 ayaṃ paṭaḥ sūtradaridratāṃ gato hyayaṃ paṭaśchidraśatairalaṃkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ayam paṭaḥ sūtra daridra tām gataḥ hi ayam paṭaḥ chidra śataiḥ alaṃkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_2646-2 ayaṃ paṭaḥ prāvarituṃ na śakyate hyayaṃ paṭaḥ saṃvṛta eva śobhate //
analyzed: ayam paṭaḥ prāvaritum na śakyate hi ayam paṭaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ eva śobhate

original: MSS_2647-1 ayaṃ paṭo me pituraṅgabhūṣaṇaṃ pitāmahādyairupabhuktayauvanaḥ /
analyzed: ayam paṭaḥ me pituḥ aṅga bhūṣaṇam pitāmaha ādyaiḥ upabhukta yauvanaḥ

original: MSS_2647-2 alaṃkariṣyatyatha putrapautrakān mayādhunā puṣpavadeva dhāryate //
analyzed: alaṃkariṣyati atha putra pautrakān mayā adhunā puṣpa vat eva dhāryate

original: MSS_2648-1 ayaṃ padmāsanāsīnaś cakravāko virājate /
analyzed: ayam padmāsana āsīnaḥ cakravākaḥ virājate

original: MSS_2648-2 yugādau bhagavān vedhā vinirmitsuriva prajāḥ //
analyzed: yuga ādau bhagavān vedhāḥ vinirmitsuḥ iva prajāḥ

original: MSS_2649-1 ayaṃ pīnastanābhogasaubhāgyavibhavocitaḥ /
analyzed: ayam pīna stana ābhoga saubhāgya vibhava ucitaḥ

original: MSS_2649-2 draviṇopārjanasyaiva kālaḥ kuvalayekṣaṇe //
analyzed: draviṇa upārjanasya eva kālaḥ kuvalaya īkṣaṇe

original: MSS_2650-1 ayaṃ puraḥ pārvaṇaśarvarīśaḥ kiṃ darpaṇo'yaṃ rajanīramaṇyāḥ /
analyzed: ayam puras pārvaṇa śarvarī īśaḥ kim darpaṇaḥ uyam rajanīramaṇyāḥ

original: MSS_2650-2 yatastadīyaṃ pratibimbamasmin saṃlakṣyate lāñchanakaitavena //
analyzed: yatas tadīyam pratibimbam asmin saṃlakṣyate lāñchana kaitavena

original: MSS_2651-1 ayaṃ prabhurayaṃ bhṛtya iti yā jagataḥ sthitiḥ /
analyzed: ayam prabhuḥ ayam bhṛtyaḥ iti yā jagataḥ sthitiḥ

original: MSS_2651-2 phalaṃ vijayate tatra śrīprasādāprasādayoḥ //
analyzed: phalam vijayate tatra śrī prasāda aprasādayoḥ

original: MSS_2652-1 ayaṃ bandhuḥ paraścāyaṃ mamāyamayamanyataḥ /
analyzed: ayam bandhuḥ paraḥ ca ayam mama ayam ayam anyatas

original: MSS_2652-2 iti brahmanna jānāmi tena jīvāmyanāmayaḥ //
analyzed: iti brahman na jānāmi tena jīvāmi anāmayaḥ

original: MSS_2653-1 ayaṃ mandadyutirbhāsvān astaṃ prati yiyāsati /
analyzed: ayam manda dyutiḥ bhāsvān astam prati yiyāsati

original: MSS_2653-2 udayaḥ patanāyeti śrīmato bodhayan narān //
analyzed: udayaḥ patanāya iti śrīmataḥ bodhayan narān

original: MSS_2654-1 ayaṃ mama dahatyaṅgam ambhojadalasaṃstaraḥ /
analyzed: ayam mama dahati aṅgam ambhoja dala saṃstaraḥ

original: MSS_2654-2 hutāśanapratinidhir dāhātmā nanu yujyate //
analyzed: hutāśana pratinidhiḥ dāha ātmā nanu yujyate

original: MSS_2655-1 ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ saptabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sarvāḥ prasarati diśo naiṣa niyatam /
analyzed: ayam mārtaṇḍaḥ kim sa khalu turagaiḥ saptabhiḥ itas kṛśānuḥ kim sarvāḥ prasarati diśaḥ na eṣa niyatam

original: MSS_2655-2 kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano'sāviti ciraṃ samālokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ //
analyzed: kṛtāntaḥ kim sākṣāt mahiṣa vahana usau iti ciram samālokya ājau tvām vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ

original: MSS_2656-1 ayaṃ mukhasaroruhabhramaravibhramaḥ subhruvāṃ kucasthalakuraṅgakaḥ pṛthunitambalīlāśikhī /
analyzed: ayam mukha saroruha bhramara vibhramaḥ su bhruvām kuca sthala kuraṅgakaḥ pṛthu nitamba līlā śikhī

original: MSS_2656-2 na yauvanamadodayaścarati cārukānticchaṭā- kulatrivalikūlinīpulinarājahaṃsaściram //
analyzed: na yauvana mada udayaḥ carati cāru kānti chaṭā kula trivali kūlinī pulina rājahaṃsaḥ ciram

original: MSS_2657-1 ayaṃ mṛgaḥ samāyāti mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyate /
analyzed: ayam mṛgaḥ samāyāti mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyate

original: MSS_2657-2 tato vegāt palāyasva tvaritaistvaritaiḥ padaiḥ //
analyzed: tatas vegāt palāyasva tvaritaiḥ tvaritaiḥ padaiḥ

original: MSS_2658-1 ayaṃ meghavyūhe balini paripanthinyapasṛte śarajjanyāḥ svairaṃ hasitamiva harṣādaviratam /
analyzed: ayam megha vyūhe balini paripanthini apasṛte śarajjanyāḥ svairam hasitam iva harṣāt aviratam

original: MSS_2658-2 payaḥpūrabhraṃśakramajanitasopānasikate nadītīre dhīraṃ carati viśadaḥ khañjanagaṇaḥ //
analyzed: payaḥpūra bhraṃśa krama janita sopāna sikate nadī tīre dhīram carati viśadaḥ khañjana gaṇaḥ

original: MSS_2659-1 ayaṃ me vāggumpho viśadapadavaidagdhyamadhuraḥ sphuradbandho vandhyaḥ parahṛdi kṛtārthaḥ kavihṛdi /
analyzed: ayam me vāc gumphaḥ viśada pada vaidagdhya madhuraḥ sphurat bandhaḥ vandhyaḥ para hṛdi kṛtārthaḥ kavi hṛdi

original: MSS_2659-2 kaṭākṣo vāmākṣyā daradalitanetrāntagalitaḥ kumāre niḥsāraḥ sa tu kimapi yūnaḥ sukhayati //
analyzed: kaṭākṣaḥ vāma akṣyāḥ dara dalita netra anta galitaḥ kumāre niḥsāraḥ sa tu kim api yūnaḥ sukhayati

original: MSS_2660-1 ayaṃ ratnākaro'mbhodhir ityasevi dhanāśayā /
analyzed: ayam ratna ākara umbhodhiḥ iti asevi dhana āśayā

original: MSS_2660-2 dhanaṃ dūre'stu vadanam apūri kṣāravāribhiḥ //
analyzed: dhanam dūreḥ tu vadanam apūri kṣāra vāribhiḥ

original: MSS_2661-1 ayaṃ rasālaḥ sukṛtaikasālaḥ pravālamālollasadālavālaḥ /
analyzed: ayam rasālaḥ su kṛta eka sālaḥ pravāla mālā ullasat ālavālaḥ

original: MSS_2661-2 mudaḥ pradātā bhavitā kathaṃ me varāṅganetyaśrumukhī śuśoca //
analyzed: mudaḥ pradātā bhavitā katham me vara aṅganā iti aśru mukhī śuśoca

original: MSS_2662-1 ayaṃ revākuñjaḥ kusumaśarasevāsamucitaḥ samīro'yaṃ velāvanavidaladelāparimalaḥ /
analyzed: ayam revā kuñjaḥ kusuma śara sevā samucitaḥ samīraḥ ayam velā vana vidala delā parimalaḥ

original: MSS_2662-2 iyaṃ prāvṛḍ dhanyā navajaladavinyāsacaturā smarādhīnaṃ cetaḥ sakhi kimapi kartuṃ mṛgayate //
analyzed: iyam prāvṛṣ dhanyā nava jalada vinyāsa caturā smara adhīnam cetaḥ sakhi kim api kartum mṛgayate

original: MSS_2663-1 ayaṃ lolanmuktāvalikiraṇamālāparikaraḥ sphuṭasyendorlakṣmīṃ kṣapayitumalaṃ manmathasuhṛt /
analyzed: ayam lolat muktā āvali kiraṇa mālā parikaraḥ sphuṭasya indoḥ lakṣmīm kṣapayitum alam manmatha suhṛd

original: MSS_2663-2 viśālaḥ śyāmāyāḥ skhalitaghananīlāṃśukavṛtiḥ stanābhogaḥ snihyanmasṛṇaghusṛṇālepasubhagaḥ //
analyzed: viśālaḥ śyāmāyāḥ skhalita ghana nīla aṃśuka vṛtiḥ stana ābhogaḥ snihyat masṛṇa ghusṛṇa ālepa subhagaḥ

original: MSS_2664-1 ayaṃ vahati dhātāraṃ yadvā devīṃ sarasvatīm /
analyzed: ayam vahati dhātāram yat vā devīm sarasvatīm

original: MSS_2664-2 pakṣadvayamapi sthāne rājahaṃsasya nirmalam //
analyzed: pakṣa dvayam api sthāne rājahaṃsasya nirmalam

original: MSS_2665-1 ayaṃ vārāmeko nilaya iti ratnākara iti śrito'smābhistṛṣṇātaralitamanobhirjalanidhiḥ /
analyzed: ayam vārām ekaḥ nilayaḥ iti ratnākaraḥ iti śritaḥ usmābhiḥ tṛṣṇā taralita manobhiḥ jalanidhiḥ

original: MSS_2665-2 ka evaṃ jānīte nijakarapuṭīkoṭaragataṃ kṣaṇādenaṃ tāmyattimimakaramāpāsyati muniḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ evam jānīte nija kara puṭī koṭara gatam kṣaṇāt enam tāmyat timi makaram āpāsyati muniḥ

original: MSS_2666-1 ayaṃ vipāko vada kasya yūnaḥ kalyāṇi kalyāṇaparaṃparāṇām /
analyzed: ayam vipākaḥ vada kasya yūnaḥ kalyāṇi kalyāṇa paraṃparāṇām

original: MSS_2666-2 yadakṣikoṇasravadacchadhārā hārāvatāro guṇamantareṇa //
analyzed: yat akṣi koṇa sravat accha dhārā hārāvatāraḥ guṇam antareṇa

original: MSS_2667-1 ayaṃ śūnyo grāmaḥ surasadanametannu patitaṃ puraḥ śuṣkā vāpī tarurayamitaḥ śīrṇaviṭapaḥ /
analyzed: ayam śūnyaḥ grāmaḥ sura sadanam etat nu patitam puras śuṣkā vāpī taruḥ ayam itas śīrṇa viṭapaḥ

original: MSS_2667-2 vayaṃ caite pānthāḥ parikṛśadaśābhāgyagatayaḥ samānaḥ saṃyogaḥ kaṭurapi mano me ramayati //
analyzed: vayam ca ete pānthāḥ parikṛśa daśā abhāgya gatayaḥ samānaḥ saṃyogaḥ kaṭuḥ api manaḥ me ramayati

original: MSS_2668-1 ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāpto dhārttarāṣṭropajīvinām /
analyzed: ayam sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ dhārttarāṣṭra upajīvinām

original: MSS_2668-2 niveṣṭavyaṃ mayā tatra prāṇānaparirakṣatā //
analyzed: niveṣṭavyam mayā tatra prāṇān a parirakṣatā

original: MSS_2669-1 ayaṃ sa te tiṣṭhati saṃgamotsuko viśaṅkase bhīru yato'vadhīraṇām /
analyzed: ayam sa te tiṣṭhati saṃgama utsukaḥ viśaṅkase bhīru yatas vadhīraṇām

original: MSS_2669-2 labheta vā prārthayitā na vā śriyaṃ śriyo durāpaḥ kathamīpsito bhavet //
analyzed: labheta vā prārthayitā na vā śriyam śriyaḥ durāpaḥ katham īpsitaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_2670-1 ayaṃ sa bhuvanatrayaprathitasaṃyamaḥ śaṃkaro bibharti vapuṣādhunā virahakātaraḥ kāminīm /
analyzed: ayam sa bhuvana traya prathita saṃyamaḥ śaṃkaraḥ bibharti vapuṣā adhunā viraha kātaraḥ kāminīm

original: MSS_2670-2 anena kila nirjitā vayamiti priyāyāḥ karaṃ kareṇa paritāḍayan jayati jātahāsaḥ smaraḥ //
analyzed: anena kila nirjitāḥ vayam iti priyāyāḥ karam kareṇa paritāḍayan jayati jāta hāsaḥ smaraḥ

original: MSS_2671-1 ayaṃ sa raśanotkarṣī pīnastanavimardanaḥ /
analyzed: ayam sa raśanā utkarṣī pīna stana vimardanaḥ

original: MSS_2671-2 nābhyūrujaghanasparśī nīvīvisraṃsanaḥ karaḥ //
MSS_2672-1 ayaṃ sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi hṛdi jñeṣu ca vakṣyati /
analyzed: ayam sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi hṛdi jñeṣu ca vakṣyati

original: MSS_2672-2 sāmarthyakṛdamitrāṇāṃ mitrāṇāṃ ca nṛpātmajaḥ //
analyzed: sāmarthya kṛt amitrāṇām mitrāṇām ca nṛpa ātmajaḥ

original: MSS_2673-1 ayaṃ senottaṃsaḥ karakṛtakṛpāṇo raṇabhuvi dviṣadbhūmīpālāḥ kimapasarata prāṇakṛpaṇāḥ /
analyzed: ayam senā uttaṃsaḥ kara kṛta kṛpāṇaḥ raṇa bhuvi dviṣat bhūmīpālāḥ kim apasarata prāṇa kṛpaṇāḥ

original: MSS_2673-2 kimabhyarthyaḥ pṛthvīdharakuharavāso'dya bhavatāṃ na kiṃ hṛdyā vidyādharanagaranīlotpaladṛśaḥ //
analyzed: kim abhyarthyaḥ pṛthvīdhara kuhara vāsaḥ udya bhavatām na kim hṛdyāḥ vidyādhara nagara nīlotpala dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_2674-1 ayaṃ snigdhaśyāmo ya iha viharatyambujavane vinidre vyāguñjanmadhupa iti taṃ jalpatu janaḥ /
analyzed: ayam snigdha śyāmaḥ yaḥ iha viharati ambuja vane vinidre vyāguñjat madhupaḥ iti tam jalpatu janaḥ

original: MSS_2674-2 ahaṃ śaṅke paṅkeruhakuharavāsavyasaninīṃ śriyaṃ bhṛṅgacchadmā muraripurupeto ramayitum //
analyzed: aham śaṅke paṅkeruha kuhara vāsa vyasaninīm śriyam bhṛṅga chadmā muraripuḥ upetaḥ ramayitum

original: MSS_2675-1 ayaṃ svabhāvaḥ svata eva yat para- śramāpanodapravaṇaṃ mahātmanām /
analyzed: ayam svabhāvaḥ svatas eva yat para śrama apanoda pravaṇam mahātmanām

original: MSS_2675-2 sudhāṃśureṣa svayamarkakarkaśa- prabhābhitaptāmavati kṣitiṃ kila //
analyzed: sudhāṃśuḥ eṣa svayam arka karkaśa prabhā abhitaptām avati kṣitim kila

original: MSS_2676-1 ayaṃ svārthaḥ parārtho'yam ityevaṃ vā na kalpayet /
analyzed: ayam sva arthaḥ para arthaḥ ayam iti evam vā na kalpayet

original: vibudhā naiva manyante svaṃ paraṃ vā pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: vibudhāḥ nā eva manyante svam param vā pṛthak pṛthak

original: niyuñjīta parasyārthe protsaheta svakarmaṇi //
analyzed: niyuñjīta parasya arthe protsaheta sva karmaṇi

original: ayaṃ hi tīvreṇa jaganti tejasā
analyzed: ayam hi tīvreṇa jaganti tejasā

original: MSS_2677-2 pratāpya bhāsāṃ patirastamāgataḥ /
analyzed: pratāpya bhāsām patiḥ astam āgataḥ

original: MSS_2677-2 pratāpamātropanatā vibhūtayaś ciraṃ na tiṣṭhanti paropatāpinām //
analyzed: pratāpa mātra upanatāḥ vibhūtayaḥ ciram na tiṣṭhanti para upatāpinām

original: MSS_2678-1 ayaṃ hi dehino deho dravyajñānakriyātmakaḥ /
analyzed: ayam hi dehinaḥ dehaḥ dravya jñāna kriyā ātmakaḥ

original: MSS_2678-2 dehino vividhakleśasaṃtāpakṛdudāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: dehinaḥ vividha kleśa saṃtāpa kṛt udāhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_2679-1 ayaṃ hi prathamo rāgaḥ samastajanarañjane /
analyzed: ayam hi prathamaḥ rāgaḥ samasta jana rañjane

original: MSS_2679-2 yasya nāsti dvitīyo'pi sa kathaṃ pañcamo bhavet //
analyzed: yasya na asti dvitīyaḥ api sa katham pañcamaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_2680-1 ayaḥpiṇḍa ivottapte khalānāṃ hṛdaye kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: ayaḥ piṇḍe iva uttapte khalānām hṛdaye kṣaṇāt

original: MSS_2680-2 patitā api nekṣyante guṇāstoyakanā iva //
analyzed: patitāḥ api nā īkṣyante guṇāḥ toyakanāḥ iva

original: MSS_2681-1 ayathāvihitānāṃ yan manojñatāsaṃpādau na staḥ /
analyzed: ayathā vihitānām yat manojña tā saṃpādau na staḥ

original: MSS_2681-2 kathayāmyatastarūṇāṃ ropavidhānaṃ yathoddiṣṭam //
analyzed: kathayāmi atas tarūṇām ropa vidhānam yathā uddiṣṭam

original: MSS_2682-1 ayane viṣuve caiva ṣaḍaśītimukheṣu ca /
analyzed: ayane viṣuve ca eva ṣaḍaśīti mukheṣu ca

original: MSS_2682-2 candrasūryoparāge ca dattamakṣayamaśnute //
analyzed: candra sūrya uparāge ca dattam akṣayam aśnute

original: MSS_2683-1 ayamakṣuṇṇakāntaśrīr adharo hariṇīdṛśaḥ /
analyzed: ayam akṣuṇṇa kānta śrīḥ adharaḥ hariṇīdṛśaḥ

original: MSS_2683-2 pravālapadmarāgāder upari pratigarjati //
analyzed: pravāla padmarāga ādeḥ upari pratigarjati

original: MSS_2684-1 ayamaṅkurabhāva eva tāvat kucayoḥ karṣati lokalocanāni /
analyzed: ayam aṅkura bhāvaḥ eva tāvat kucayoḥ karṣati loka locanāni

original: MSS_2684-2 itaretarapīḍanīmavasthāṃ gatayoḥ śrīranayoḥ kathaṃ bhavitrī //
analyzed: itaretara pīḍanīm avasthām gatayoḥ śrīḥ anayoḥ katham bhavitrī

original: MSS_2685-1 ayamatijaraṭhāḥ prakāmagurvīr alaghuvilambipayodharoparuddhāḥ /
analyzed: ayam atija raṭhāḥ prakāma gurvīḥ a laghu vilambi payodhara uparuddhāḥ

original: MSS_2685-2 satatamasumatāmagamyarūpāḥ pariṇatadikkarikāstaṭīrbibharti //
analyzed: satatam asumatām agamya rūpāḥ pariṇata dikkarikāḥ taṭīḥ bibharti

original: MSS_2686-1 ayamaparalatāyāḥ sādaraṃ hanta pītvā madhu mama makarandaṃ pātumāyāti bhṛṅgaḥ /
analyzed: ayam apara latāyāḥ sa ādaram hanta pītvā madhu mama makarandam pātum āyāti bhṛṅgaḥ

original: MSS_2686-2 iti manasi viṣādaṃ mallike mā kuru tvaṃ bata vada madhupānāṃ mānase ko vivekaḥ //
analyzed: iti manasi viṣādam mallike mā kuru tvam bata vada madhupānām mānase kaḥ vivekaḥ

original: MSS_2687-1 ayamapi kharayoṣitkarṇakāṣāyamīṣad visṛmaratimirorṇājarjaropāntamarciḥ /
analyzed: ayam api khara yoṣit karṇa kāṣāyam īṣat visṛmara timira ūrṇā jarjara upāntam arciḥ

original: MSS_2687-2 madakalakalaviṅkīkākunāndīkarebhyaḥ kṣitiruhaśikharebhyo bhānumānuccinoti //
analyzed: mada kalakala viṅkīkāku nāndī karebhyaḥ kṣitiruha śikharebhyaḥ bhānumān uccinoti

original: MSS_2688-1 ayamapi puruhūtapreyasīmūrdhni pūrṇaḥ kalaśa iva sudhāṃśuḥ sādhurullālasīti /
analyzed: ayam api puruhūta preyasī mūrdhni pūrṇaḥ kalaśaḥ iva sudhāṃśuḥ sādhuḥ ullālasi iti

original: MSS_2688-2 madanavijayayātrākālavijñāpānāya sphurati jaladhimadhye tāmrapātrīva bhānuḥ //
analyzed: madanavijaya yātrā kāla vijñāpānāya sphurati jaladhi madhye tāmra pātrī iva bhānuḥ

original: MSS_2689-1 ayamabhinavameghaśyāmalottuṅgasānur madamukharamayūrīmuktasaṃsaktakekaḥ /
analyzed: ayam abhinava megha śyāmala uttuṅga sānuḥ mada mukhara mayūrī mukta saṃsakta kekaḥ

original: MSS_2689-2 śakuniśabalanīḍānokahasnigdhavarṣmā vitarati bṛhadaśmā parvataḥ prītimakṣṇoḥ //
analyzed: śakuni śabala nīḍa nokaha snigdha varṣmā vitarati bṛhat aśmā parvataḥ prītim akṣṇoḥ

original: MSS_2690-1 ayamamṛtanidhānaṃ nāyako'pyoṣadhīnām amṛtamayaśarīraḥ kāntiyukto'pi candraḥ /
analyzed: ayam amṛta nidhānam nāyakaḥ upi oṣadhīnām amṛta maya śarīraḥ kānti yuktaḥ api candraḥ

original: MSS_2690-2 bhavati vigataraśmirmaṇḍalaṃ prāpya bhānoḥ parasadananiviṣṭaḥ ko laghutvaṃ na yāti //
analyzed: bhavati vigata raśmiḥ maṇḍalam prāpya bhānoḥ para sadana niviṣṭaḥ kaḥ laghu tvam na yāti

original: MSS_2691-1 ayamamṛtanidhānaṃ nāyako'pyoṣadhīnāṃ śatabhiṣaganuyātaḥ śaṃbhumūrdhāvataṃsaḥ /
analyzed: ayam amṛta nidhānam nāyakaḥ upi oṣadhīnām śatabhiṣaj anuyātaḥ śaṃbhu mūrdha avataṃsaḥ

original: MSS_2691-2 virahayati na cainaṃ rājayakṣmā śaśāṅkaṃ hatavidhiparipākaḥ kena vā laṅghanīyaḥ //
analyzed: virahayati na ca enam rājayakṣmā śaśāṅkam hata vidhi paripākaḥ kena vā laṅghanīyaḥ

original: MSS_2692-1 ayamayamasāvākarṇyārāt pratidvipaḍiṇḍimaṃ madakaluṣite netre mārjannudastakarārgalaḥ /
analyzed: ayam ayam asau ākarṇya ārāt prati dvipa ḍiṇḍimam mada kaluṣite netre mārjan udasta kara argalaḥ

original: MSS_2692-2 agaṇitasṛṇiḥ krodhastabdhāyataśrutipallavaḥ praviśati nṛpasyāntaḥkakṣāṃ javādarimudgaraḥ //
analyzed: agaṇita sṛṇiḥ krodha stabdha āyata śruti pallavaḥ praviśati nṛpasya antar kakṣām javāt ari mudgaraḥ

original: MSS_2693-1 ayamayogivadhūvadhapātakair mramimavāpya divaḥ khalu pātyate /
analyzed: ayam ayogi vadhū vadha pātakaiḥ mramim avāpya divaḥ khalu pātyate

original: MSS_2693-2 śitiniśādṛṣadi sphuṭadutpatat- kaṇagaṇādhikatārakitāmbaraḥ //
analyzed: śiti niśā dṛṣadi sphuṭat utpatat kaṇa gaṇa adhika tārakita ambaraḥ

original: MSS_2694-1 ayamaravivarebhyaścātakairniṣpatadbhir haribhiracirabhāsāṃ tejasā cānuliptaiḥ /
analyzed: ayam ara vivarebhyaḥ cātakaiḥ niṣpatadbhiḥ haribhiḥ acira bhāsām tejasā ca anuliptaiḥ

original: MSS_2694-2 gatamupari ghanānāṃ vārigarbhodarāṇāṃ piśunayati rathastaṃ śīkaraklinnanemiḥ //
analyzed: gatam upari ghanānām vāri garbha udarāṇām piśunayati rathaḥ tam śīkara klinna nemiḥ

original: MSS_2695-1 ayamalaghuvisārisphārijihvākalāpo jvalati yadi na madhye vāḍavo havyavāhaḥ /
analyzed: ayam alaghu visāri sphāri jihvā kalāpaḥ jvalati yadi na madhye vāḍavaḥ havyavāhaḥ

original: MSS_2695-2 muhurupacitasāro vāribhirnimnagānāṃ tribhuvanamapi kiṃ na plāvayatyamburāśiḥ //
analyzed: muhur upacita sāraḥ vāribhiḥ nimnagānām tribhuvanam api kim na plāvayati amburāśiḥ

original: MSS_2696-1 ayamavasaraḥ saraste salilairupakartumarthināmaniśam /
analyzed: ayam avasaraḥ saraḥ te salilaiḥ upakartum arthinām aniśam

original: MSS_2696-2 idamapi ca sulabhamambho bhavati purā jaladharābhyudaye //
analyzed: idam api ca sulabham ambhaḥ bhavati purā jaladhara abhyudaye

original: MSS_2697-1 ayamavasara upakṛtaye prakṛticalā yāvadasti saṃpadiyam /
analyzed: ayam avasaraḥ upakṛtaye prakṛti calā yāvat asti saṃpad iyam

original: MSS_2697-2 vipadi sadābhyudayinyāṃ punarupakartuṃ kuto'vasaraḥ //
analyzed: vipadi sadā abhyudayinyām punar upakartum kutovasaraḥ

original: MSS_2698-1 ayamavicāritacārutayā saṃsāro bhāti ramaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam avicārita cāru tayā saṃsāraḥ bhāti ramaṇīyaḥ

original: MSS_2698-2 atra punaḥ paramārthadṛśāṃ na kimapi sāramaṇīyaḥ //
analyzed: atra punar parama artha dṛśām na kim api sa āramaṇīyaḥ

original: MSS_2699-1 ayamasau gaganāṅgaṇadīpakas taralakālabhujaṃgaśikhāmaṇiḥ /
analyzed: ayam asau gagana aṅgaṇa dīpakaḥ tarala kāla bhujaṃga śikhāmaṇiḥ

original: MSS_2699-2 kṣaṇaviḍambitavāḍavavigrahaḥ patati vārinidhau vidhuro raviḥ //
analyzed: kṣaṇa viḍambita vāḍaba vigrahaḥ patati vārinidhau vidhuraḥ raviḥ

original: MSS_2700-1 ayamasau bhagavānuta pāṇḍavaḥ sthitamavāṅmuninā śaśimaulinā /
analyzed: ayam asau bhagavān uta pāṇḍavaḥ sthitam avāk muninā śaśimaulinā

original: MSS_2700-2 samadhirūḍhamajena nu jiṣṇunā sviditi vegavaśānmumuhe gaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: samadhirūḍham ajena nu jiṣṇunā svid iti vega vaśāt mumuhe gaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_2701-1 ayamaho rajanīcarakesarī giridarīśayanāt sahasotthitaḥ /
analyzed: ayam aho rajanīcara kesarī giri darī śayanāt sahasā utthitaḥ

original: MSS_2701-2 timiravāraṇakumbhavidāraṇoc- chvalitaraktabharairiva lohitaḥ //
analyzed: timira vāraṇa kumbha vidāraṇa ud śvalita rakta bharaiḥ iva lohitaḥ

original: MSS_2702-1 ayamātmā svayaṃ sākṣād guṇaratnamahārṇavaḥ /
analyzed: ayam ātmā svayam sākṣāt guṇa ratna mahā arṇavaḥ

original: MSS_2702-2 sarvajñaḥ sarvadṛk sārvaḥ parameṣṭhī nirañjanaḥ //
MSS_2703-1 ayamāndolitaprauḍhacandanadrumapallavaḥ /
analyzed: ayam āndolita prauḍha candana druma pallavaḥ

original: MSS_2703-2 utpādayati sarvasya prītiṃ malayamārutaḥ //
analyzed: utpādayati sarvasya prītim malaya mārutaḥ

original: MSS_2704-1 ayamālohitacchāyo madena mukhacandramāḥ /
analyzed: ayam ālohita chāyaḥ madena mukha candramāḥ

original: MSS_2704-2 saṃnaddhodayarāgasya candrasya pratigarjati //
analyzed: saṃnaddha udaya rāgasya candrasya pratigarjati

original: MSS_2705-1 ayamiha mugdho madhupaḥ parihṛtasahakāramañjarīpuñjaḥ /
analyzed: ayam iha mugdhaḥ madhupaḥ parihṛta sahakāra mañjarī puñjaḥ

original: MSS_2705-2 asaralamarasamasāraṃ śākhoṭakaviṭapamanusarati //
analyzed: asaralam arasam asāram śākhoṭaka viṭapam anusarati

original: MSS_2706-1 ayamudayati kokīśokaśalyairmayūkhaiḥ śatamakhapuranārīnetragaṇḍūṣapeyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam udayati kokī śoka śalyaiḥ mayūkhaiḥ śatamakha pura nārī netra gaṇḍūṣa peyaḥ

original: MSS_2706-2 udayagirimṛgendrodgārabhinnāṅkaraṅku- śravaṇarudhiradhārāpāṭalaḥ pārvaṇenduḥ //
MSS_2707-1 ayamudayati candraścandrikādhautaviśvaḥ pariṇatavimalimni vyomni karpūragauraḥ /
analyzed: ayam udayati candraḥ candrikā dhauta viśvaḥ pariṇata vimalimni vyomni karpūra gauraḥ

original: MSS_2707-2 ṛjurajataśalākāspardhibhiryasya pādair jagadamalamṛṇālīpañjarasthaṃ vibhāti //
analyzed: ṛju rajata śalākā spardhibhiḥ yasya pādaiḥ jagat amala mṛṇālī pañjara stham vibhāti

original: MSS_2708-1 ayamudayati candro vāridherambugarbhād amṛtakaṇakarālairaṃśubhirdīpyamānaḥ /
analyzed: ayam udayati candraḥ vāridheḥ ambu garbhāt amṛta kaṇa karālaiḥ aṃśubhiḥ dīpyamānaḥ

original: MSS_2708-2 bhujagaśayanavakṣoharmyadeśe lalantyā vadanamiva yadṛcchottānitaṃ viśvamātuḥ //
analyzed: bhujaga śayana vakṣaḥ harmya deśe lalantyāḥ vadanam iva yadṛcchā uttānitam viśvamātuḥ

original: MSS_2709-1 ayamudayati mudrābhañjanaḥ padminīnām udayagirivanālībālamandārapuṣpam /
analyzed: ayam udayati mudrā bhañjanaḥ padminīnām udayagiri vanālī bāla mandāra puṣpam

original: MSS_2709-2 virahavidhurakokadvandvabandhurvibhindan kupitakapikapolakroḍatāmrastamāṃsi //
analyzed: viraha vidhura koka dvandva bandhuḥ vibhindan kupita kapi kapola kroḍa tāmraḥ tamāṃsi

original: MSS_2710-1 ayamudayamahīdhradhāturāgair aruṇakarāruṇitāmbarābhirāmaḥ /
analyzed: ayam udaya mahīdhra dhātu rāgaiḥ aruṇa kara aruṇita ambara abhirāmaḥ

original: MSS_2710-2 vitarasi na dṛśau kṛśāṅgi tārām iva divi vanditumindurabhyupaiti //
analyzed: vitarasi na dṛśau kṛśa aṅgi tārām iva divi vanditum induḥ abhyupaiti

original: MSS_2711-1 ayamudayamahībhṛnmūrdhni pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā divasapatirahauṣīdindupādān havīṃṣi /
analyzed: ayam udaya mahībhṛt mūrdhni pāṇim gṛhītvā divasapatiḥ ahauṣīt indu pādān havīṃṣi

original: MSS_2711-2 aruṇakiraṇavahnau kanyakā pauruhūtī haridapi kimakārṣīt tārakālājahomam //
analyzed: aruṇakiraṇa vahnau kanyakā pauruhūtī harit api kim akārṣīt tārakālāja homam

original: MSS_2712-1 ayamudito himaraśmir vanitāvadanasya kīdṛśaḥ sadṛśaḥ /
analyzed: ayam uditaḥ himaraśmiḥ vanitā vadanasya kīdṛśaḥ sadṛśaḥ

original: MSS_2712-2 nīlādikopalambhaḥ sphurati pratyakṣataḥ kasya //
analyzed: nīla ādika upalambhaḥ sphurati pratyakṣataḥ kasya

original: MSS_2713-1 ayamupagatakṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇasārākṣipātair yamakṛ(vikasi?)
analyzed: ayam upagata kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇasāra akṣi pātaiḥ

original: tanavanīlāmbhojavaktraścakāsti /
analyzed: tanava nīla ambhoja vaktraḥ cakāsti

original: MSS_2713-2 jalayuvatikucānuprāsitottuṅgakumbha- sthalamadakalagarjannīranāgastaṭākaḥ //
analyzed: jala yuvati kuca anuprāsita uttuṅga kumbha sthala mada kala garjat nīra nāgaḥ taṭākaḥ

original: MSS_2714-1 ayamuṣasi vinidradrāviḍītuṅgapīna- stanaparisarasāndrasvedabindūpamardī /
analyzed: ayam uṣasi vinidra drāviḍī tuṅga pīna stana parisara sāndra sveda bindu upamardī

original: MSS_2714-2 srutamalayajavṛkṣakṣīrasaurabhyasabhyo vahati sakhi bhujaṅgībhuktaśeṣaḥ samīraḥ //
analyzed: sruta malayaja vṛkṣa kṣīra saurabhya sabhyaḥ vahati sakhi bhujaṅgī bhukta śeṣaḥ samīraḥ

original: MSS_2715-1 ayamekapade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā copanataḥ suduḥsaho me /
analyzed: ayam eka pade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā ca upanataḥ su duḥsahaḥ me

original: MSS_2715-2 nava vāridharodayādahobhir bhavitavyaṃ ca nirātapatvaramyaiḥ //
analyzed: nava vāridhara udayāt ahobhiḥ bhavitavyam ca nirātapa tva ramyaiḥ

original: MSS_2716-1 ayameko'hameketi jñānaṃ tatsaṃgame na me /
analyzed: ayam ekaḥ uham ekā iti jñānam tad saṃgame na me

original: MSS_2716-2 rāga evādhikastatra haridrācūrṇayoriva //
analyzed: rāgaḥ eva adhikaḥ tatra haridrā cūrṇayoḥ iva

original: MSS_2717-1 ayameva paro dharmo hyayameva paraṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: ayam eva paraḥ dharmaḥ hi ayam eva param tapaḥ

original: MSS_2717-2 patiśuśrūṣaṇaṃ yatra tat strīṇāṃ svargahetukam //
analyzed: pati śuśrūṣaṇam yatra tat strīṇām svarga hetukam

original: MSS_2718-1 ayaśaḥ prāpyate yena yena cādhogatirbhavet /
analyzed: ayaśaḥ prāpyate yena yena ca adhogatiḥ bhavet

original: MSS_2718-2 svārthācca bhraśyate yena tat karma na samācaret //
analyzed: sva arthāt ca bhraśyate yena tat karma na samācaret

original: MSS_2719-1 ayaśasyam anāyuṣyaṃ paradārābhimarśanam /
analyzed: ayaśasyam anāyuṣyam para dāra abhimarśanam

original: MSS_2719-2 arthakṣayakaraṃ ghoraṃ pāpasya ca punarbhavam //
analyzed: artha kṣaya karam ghoram pāpasya ca punarbhavam

original: MSS_2720-1 ayaśobhidurāloke kopadhāmaraṇādṛte /
analyzed: ayaśobhi durāloke kopadhā maraṇāt ṛte

original: MSS_2720-2 ayaśobhidurā loke kopadhā maraṇādṛte //
analyzed: ayaśaḥ bhidurāḥ loke kopadhāḥ maraṇāt ṛte

original: MSS_2721-1 ayaścaṇakacarvaṇaṃ phaṇiphaṇāmaṇeḥ karṣaṇaṃ kareṇa giritolanaṃ jalanidheḥ padā laṅghanam /
analyzed: ayaḥ caṇaka carvaṇam phaṇi phaṇāmaṇeḥ karṣaṇam kareṇa giri tolanam jalanidheḥ padā laṅghanam

original: MSS_2721-2 prasuptaharibodhanaṃ niśitakhaṅgasaṃsparśanaṃ kadācidakhilaṃ bhavenna ca śaṭhāddhanasyārjanam //
analyzed: prasupta hari bodhanam niśita khaṅga saṃsparśanam kadācid akhilam bhavet na ca śaṭhāt dhanasya arjanam

original: MSS_2722-1 ayastu kākatuṇḍena carma ārāmukhena hi /
analyzed: ayaḥ tu kākatuṇḍena carma ārāmukhena hi

original: MSS_2722-2 mṛtpiṇḍaṃ ca ghaṭaṃ caiva vidhyet sūcīmukhena hi //
analyzed: mṛd piṇḍam ca ghaṭam ca eva vidhyet sūcīmukhena hi

original: MSS_2723-1 ayācataḥ sīdataśca sarvopāyairnimantraya /
analyzed: a yācataḥ sīdataḥ ca sarva upāyaiḥ nimantraya

original: MSS_2723-2 ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmo'yācate yat pradīyate //
analyzed: ānṛśaṃsyam paraḥ dharmaḥ yācate yat pradīyate

original: MSS_2724-1 ayācitaḥ sukhaṃ datte yācitaśca na yacchati /
analyzed: a yācitaḥ sukham datte yācitaḥ ca na yacchati

original: MSS_2724-2 sarvasvaṃ cāpi harate vidhiruccṛṅkhalo nṛṇām //
analyzed: sarva svam ca api harate vidhiḥ uccṛṅkhalaḥ nṛṇām

original: MSS_2725-1 ayācitāraṃ nahi devadevam adriḥ sutāṃ grāhayituṃ śaśāka /
analyzed: a yācitāram nahi devadevam adriḥ sutām grāhayitum śaśāka

original: MSS_2725-2 abhyarthanābhaṅgabhayena sādhur mādhyasthamiṣṭe'pyavalambate'rthe //
analyzed: abhyarthanā bhaṅga bhayena sādhuḥ mādhyastham iṣṭe pi avalambata īrthe

original: MSS_2726-1 ayācito mayā labdho matpreṣitaḥ punargataḥ /
analyzed: a yācitaḥ mayā labdhaḥ mad preṣitaḥ punar gataḥ

original: MSS_2726-2 yatrāgatastatra gatas tatra kā parivedanā //
analyzed: yatra āgataḥ tatra gataḥ tatra kā parivedanā

original: MSS_2727-1 ayācyaṃ caiva yācante'bhojyān vyāhārayanti ca /
analyzed: a yācyam ca eva vyāhārayanti ca

original: MSS_2727-2 utkocairvañcanābhiśca kāryāṇi ghnanti cāsyati //
analyzed: utkocaiḥ vañcanābhiḥ ca kāryāṇi ghnanti ca asyati

original: MSS_2728-1 ayājyayājanaiścaiva nāstikyena ca karmaṇām /
analyzed: a yājya yājanaiḥ ca eva nāstikyena ca karmaṇām

original: MSS_2728-2 kulānyāśu vinaśyanti yāni hīnāni mantrataḥ //
analyzed: kulāni āśu vinaśyanti yāni hīnāni mantrataḥ

original: MSS_2729-1 ayi kaṭhora yaśaḥ kila te priyaṃ kimayaśo nanu ghoramataḥparam /
analyzed: ayi kaṭhora yaśaḥ kila te priyam kim ayaśaḥ nanu ghoram atas param

original: MSS_2729-2 kimabhavadvipine hariṇīdṛśaḥ kathaya nātha kathaṃ bata manyase //
analyzed: kim abhavat vipine hariṇī dṛśaḥ kathaya nātha katham bata manyase

original: MSS_2730-1 ayi kānta paśya meghaṃ nahi nahi pāpaṃ tavātipuṇyāyāḥ /
analyzed: ayi kānta paśya megham nahi nahi pāpam tava ati puṇyāyāḥ

original: MSS_2730-2 nahi nahi paśya payodharam apasāraya kañcukīmurasaḥ //
analyzed: nahi nahi paśya payodharam apasāraya kañcukīm urasaḥ

original: MSS_2731-1 ayi kiṃ guṇavati mālati jīvati bhavatīṃ vinā madhupāḥ /
analyzed: ayi kim guṇavati mālati jīvati bhavatīm vinā madhupāḥ

original: MSS_2731-2 atha yadi jīvati jīvatu jīvanamapi jīvanābhāsaḥ //
analyzed: atha yadi jīvati jīvatu jīvanam api jīvana ābhāsaḥ

original: MSS_2732-1 ayi kuraṅgi tapovanavibhramād upagatāsi kirātapurīmimām /
analyzed: ayi kuraṅgi tapaḥ vana vibhramāt upagatā asi kirāta purīm imām

original: MSS_2732-2 iha na paśyasi dāraya māraya grasa pibeti śukānapi jalpataḥ //
analyzed: iha na paśyasi dāraya māraya grasa piba iti śukān api jalpataḥ

original: MSS_2733-1 ayi kuraṅgi turaṅgamavikrame tyaja vanaṃ javanaṃ gamanaṃ kuru /
analyzed: ayi kuraṅgi turaṅgama vikrame tyaja vanam javanam gamanam kuru

original: MSS_2733-2 iha vane vicaranti hi nāyakāḥ surabhilohitalohitasāyakāḥ //
analyzed: iha vane vicaranti hi nāyakāḥ surabhi lohita lohita sāyakāḥ

original: MSS_2734-1 ayi kulanicūlamūloc- chedanaduḥśīlavīcivācāle /
analyzed: ayi kula nicūla mūla ud chedana duḥśīla vīci vācāle

original: MSS_2734-2 bakavighasapaṅkasārā na cirāt kāveri bhavitāsi //
analyzed: baka vighasa paṅka sārā na cirāt kāveri bhavitāsi

original: MSS_2735-1 ayi kṣudro mābhūn matimahimagarvo manasi vaḥ karī yāto bandhaṃ yadiha vinayastatra vijayī /
analyzed: ayi kṣudraḥ mā abhūt mati mahima garvaḥ manasi vaḥ karī yātaḥ bandham yat iha vinayaḥ tatra vijayī

original: MSS_2735-2 ayaṃ krodhādhmātastyajati vinayaṃ cen madavaśāt tataḥ skandhāvāraṃ na kimakhilamevākulayati //
analyzed: ayam krodha ādhmātaḥ tyajati vinayam ced mada vaśāt tatas skandhāvāram na kim akhilam eva ākulayati

original: MSS_2736-1 ayi khalu badhirādhirāja kīraṃ tudasi śalākanipātanena mohāt /
analyzed: ayi khalu badhira adhirāja kīram tudasi śalāka nipātanena mohāt

original: MSS_2736-2 aniśamapi sudhānidhānavāṇīṃ racayatu maunamukho'stu vā samaste //
analyzed: aniśam api sudhā nidhāna vāṇīm racayatu mauna mukhoḥ tu vā samaste

original: MSS_2737-1 ayi khalu viṣamaḥ purākṛtānāṃ bhavati hi jantuṣu karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ /
analyzed: ayi khalu viṣamaḥ purākṛtānām bhavati hi jantuṣu karmaṇām vipākaḥ

original: MSS_2737-2 haraśirasi śirāṃsi yāni rejuḥ śiva śiva tāni luṭhanti gṛdhrapādāḥ //
analyzed: hara śirasi śirāṃsi yāni rejuḥ śiva śiva tāni luṭhanti gṛdhra pādāḥ

original: MSS_2738-1 ayi cakitamugdhacātaka marubhuvi dhāvasi mudhā kimudgrīvam /
analyzed: ayi cakita mugdha cātaka maru bhuvi dhāvasi mudhā kim udgrīvam

original: MSS_2738-2 grīṣme davāgnivalitas tāpiccho'yaṃ na vidyutvān //
analyzed: grīṣme dava agni valitaḥ tāpicchaḥ ūyam na vidyutvān

original: MSS_2739-1 ayi cakorakuṭumbini kātare tiraya pakṣapuṭena kuṭumbakam /
analyzed: ayi cakora kuṭumbini kātare tiraya pakṣa puṭena kuṭumbakam

original: MSS_2739-2 bahu gataṃ kiyadapyavaśiṣyate vyapagataṃ timirairuditaḥ śaśī //
analyzed: bahu gatam kiyat api avaśiṣyate vyapagatam timiraiḥ uditaḥ śaśī

original: MSS_2740-1 ayi cātaka cañcupuṭāt skhalayati jaladodabindumanilaścet /
analyzed: ayi cātaka cañcu puṭāt skhalayati jalada uda bindum anilaḥ ced

original: MSS_2740-2 dvija eva bhāgyahīno jīvanadātā kṛtī jaladaḥ //
analyzed: dvijaḥ eva bhāgya hīnaḥ jīvana dātā kṛtī jaladaḥ

original: MSS_2741-1 ayi citta vittaleśe sahajapremṇā kiyannu lubdhamasi /
analyzed: ayi citta vitta leśe sahaja premṇā kiyat nu lubdham asi

original: MSS_2741-2 na tathāpi tadviyogaḥ kevalamāste śivenāpi //
analyzed: na tathā api tad viyogaḥ kevalam āste śivena api

original: MSS_2742-1 ayi cetovihaga tvaṃ viṣayāraṇye bhramannasi śrāntaḥ /
analyzed: ayi cetaḥ vihaga tvam viṣaya araṇye bhraman asi śrāntaḥ

original: MSS_2742-2 viśrāmakāmanā cec chivakalparuhe ciraṃ tiṣṭha //
MSS_2743-1 ayi jalada yadi na dāsyasi katicit tvaṃ cātakāya jalakaṇikāḥ /
analyzed: ayi jalada yadi na dāsyasi katicid tvam cātakāya jala kaṇikāḥ

original: MSS_2743-2 tadayamacireṇa bhavitā salilāñjalidānayogyaste //
analyzed: tat ayam acireṇa bhavitā salila añjali dāna yogyaḥ te

original: MSS_2744-1 ayi tyaktāsi kastūri pāmaraiḥ paṅkaśaṅkayā /
analyzed: ayi tyaktā asi kastūri pāmaraiḥ paṅka śaṅkayā

original: MSS_2744-2 alaṃ khedena bhūpālāḥ kiṃ na santi mahītale //
analyzed: alam khedena bhūpālāḥ kim na santi mahī tale

original: MSS_2745-1 ayi dayite tava vadanaṃ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ manobhavo garjan /
analyzed: ayi dayite tava vadanam pāyam pāyam manobhavaḥ garjan

original: MSS_2745-2 smitamavalambya tamisrāsv api hatakān hanta no hanti //
analyzed: smitam avalambya tamisrāsu api hatakān hanta naḥ hanti

original: MSS_2746-1 ayi daladaravinda syandamānaṃ marandaṃ tava kimapi lihanto mañju guñjantu bhṛṅgāḥ /
analyzed: ayi dalat aravinda syandamānam marandam tava kim api lihantaḥ mañju guñjantu bhṛṅgāḥ

original: MSS_2746-2 diśi diśi nirapekṣastāvakīnaṃ vivṛṇvan parimalamayamanyo bāndhavo gandhavāhaḥ //
analyzed: diśi diśi nirapekṣaḥ tāvakīnam vivṛṇvan parimalam ayam anyaḥ bāndhavaḥ gandhavāhaḥ

original: MSS_2747-1 ayi dīnadayārdranātha he mathurānātha kadāvalokyase /
analyzed: ayi dīna dayā ārdra nātha he mathurā nātha kadā avalokyase

original: MSS_2747-2 hṛdayaṃ tvadalokakātaraṃ dayita bhrāmyati kiṃ karomyaham //
analyzed: hṛdayam tvad aloka kātaram dayita bhrāmyati kim karomi aham

original: MSS_2748-1 ayi durjanagarjitena kiṃ sarale namramukhī viṣīdasi tvam /
analyzed: ayi durjana garjitena kim sarale namra mukhī viṣīdasi tvam

original: MSS_2748-2 paripanthini devakīsute parivādo'pi tapobhirunnataiḥ //
analyzed: paripanthini devakī sute parivādaḥ api tapobhiḥ unnataiḥ

original: MSS_2749-1 ayi duṣkṛtakena kena vatse halikadvāri lavaṅgi puṣpitāsi /
analyzed: ayi duṣkṛtakena kena vatse halika dvāri lavaṅgi puṣpitā asi

original: MSS_2749-2 stabakāstava pāṃsubhiḥ parītāḥ paritaḥ prāṅgaṇasīmni yal luṭhanti //
analyzed: stabakāḥ tava pāṃsubhiḥ parītāḥ paritas prāṅgaṇa sīmni yat luṭhanti

original: MSS_2750-1 ayi dūti sakhī tvameva me madano hanti śitaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ /
analyzed: ayi dūti sakhī tvam eva me madanaḥ hanti śitaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ

original: MSS_2750-2 dayitaṃ tamupānayāśu tat suśako jīvitanirgamo'nyathā //
analyzed: dayitam tam upānaya āśu tat su śakaḥ jīvita nirgamaḥ anyathā

original: MSS_2751-1 ayi nandatanūja kiṃkaraṃ patitaṃ māṃ viṣame bhavāmbudhau /
analyzed: ayi nanda tanūja kiṃkaram patitam mām viṣame bhava ambudhau

original: MSS_2751-2 kṛpayā tava pādapaṅkaja- sthitadhūlīsadṛśaṃ vibhāvaya //
analyzed: kṛpayā tava pāda paṅkaja sthita dhūlī sadṛśam vibhāvaya

original: MSS_2752-1 ayi pataṅgi lavaṅgalatāvane piba madhūni vidhūya madhuvratān /
analyzed: ayi pataṅgi lavaṅga latā vane piba madhūni vidhūya madhu vratān

original: MSS_2752-2 iha vane ca vanecarasaṃkule na ca satāmasātāṃ ca nirūpaṇam //
analyzed: iha vane ca vanecara saṃkule na ca satām asātām ca nirūpaṇam

original: MSS_2753-1 ayi parāri parunmalayānilā vavuramī jagureva ca kokilāḥ /
analyzed: ayi parāri parut malayā anilāḥ vavuḥ amī jaguḥ eva ca kokilāḥ

original: MSS_2753-2 kalamalotkalitaṃ tu na me manaḥ sakhi babhūva vṛthaiva yathaiṣamaḥ //
analyzed: kalamala utkalitam tu na me manaḥ sakhi babhūva vṛthā eva yathā eṣamaḥ

original: MSS_2754-1 ayi pibata cakorāḥ kṛtsnamunnāmikaṇṭha- kramasaralitacañcaccañcavaścandrikāmbhaḥ /
analyzed: ayi pibata cakorāḥ kṛtsnam unnāmi kaṇṭha krama saralita cañcat cañcavaḥ candrikā ambhaḥ

original: MSS_2754-2 virahavidhuritānāṃ jīvitatrāṇahetor bhavati hariṇalakṣmā ye na tejodaridraḥ //
analyzed: viraha vidhuritānām jīvita trāṇa hetoḥ bhavati hariṇa lakṣmā ye na tejaḥ daridraḥ

original: MSS_2755-1 ayi bata guru garvaṃ mā sma kastūri yāsīr akhilaparimalānāṃ maulinā saurabheṇa /
analyzed: ayi bata guru garvam mā sma kastūri yāsīḥ akhila parimalānām maulinā saurabheṇa

original: MSS_2755-2 girigahanaguhāyāṃ līnamatyantadīnaṃ svajanakamamunaiva prāṇahīnaṃ karoṣi //
analyzed: giri gahana guhāyām līnam atyanta dīnam sva janakam amunā eva prāṇa hīnam karoṣi

original: MSS_2756-1 ayi makarandasyandini padmini manye tavaiva subhagatvam /
analyzed: ayi makaranda syandini padmini manye tava eva subhaga tvam

original: MSS_2756-2 puṣpavatīmapi bhavatīṃ tyajati na vṛddhaḥ śucirhaṃsaḥ //
analyzed: puṣpavatīm api bhavatīm tyajati na vṛddhaḥ śuciḥ haṃsaḥ

original: MSS_2757-1 ayi madana na dagdhastvaṃ kimīśena kopāt kimuta rativiyoge nānvabhūrmūrkha duḥkham /
analyzed: ayi madana na dagdhaḥ tvam kim īśena kopāt kim uta rati viyoge na anvabhūḥ mūrkha duḥkham

original: MSS_2757-2 aviditaparapīḍo yena māmutpalākṣī- rahitamahitapātraiḥ patrivarṣairdunoṣi //
analyzed: a vidita para pīḍaḥ yena mām utpala akṣī rahita mahita pātraiḥ patri varṣaiḥ dunoṣi

original: MSS_2758-1 ayi manmathacūtamañjari śravaṇāyatalocane priye /
analyzed: ayi manmatha cūta mañjari śravaṇa āyata locane priye

original: MSS_2758-2 apahṛtya manaḥ kva yāsi me kimarājakamatra vartate //
analyzed: apahṛtya manaḥ kva yāsi me kim arājakam atra vartate

original: MSS_2759-1 ayi mamaiṣa cakoraśiśurmuner vrajati sindhupibasya na śiṣyatām /
analyzed: ayi mama eṣa cakora śiśuḥ muneḥ vrajati sindhupibasya na śiṣya tām

original: MSS_2759-2 aśitumabdhimadhītavato'sya ca śaśikarāḥ pibataḥ kati śīkarāḥ //
analyzed: aśitum abdhim adhītavataḥ asya ca śaśi karāḥ pibataḥ kati śīkarāḥ

original: MSS_2760-1 ayi malayaja mahimāyaṃ kasya girāmastu viṣayaste /
analyzed: ayi malayaja mahimā ayam kasya girām astu viṣayaḥ te

original: MSS_2760-2 udgirato yadgaralaṃ phaṇinaḥ puṣṇāsi parimalodgāraiḥ //
analyzed: udgirataḥ yat garalam phaṇinaḥ puṣṇāsi parimala udgāraiḥ

original: MSS_2761-1 ayi mālati saurabhasāravinir- jitasaṃvikasatkamalānilaye /
analyzed: ayi mālati saurabha sāraviniḥ jita saṃvikasat kamala anilaye

original: MSS_2761-2 madhupānavidhau madhupasya punar bhuvane bhavatīmahamākalaye //
analyzed: madhu pāna vidhau madhupasya punar bhuvane bhavatīm aham ākalaye

original: MSS_2762-1 ayi mṛgākṣi tavādharapallave dayitadantapadaṃ na bhavatyadaḥ /
analyzed: ayi mṛga akṣi tava adhara pallave dayita danta padam na bhavati adaḥ

original: MSS_2762-2 bhuvanamohanamantrapadāṅkitaṃ kimuta yantramidaṃ smarayoginaḥ //
analyzed: bhuvana mohana mantra pada aṅkitam kim uta yantram idam smara yoginaḥ

original: MSS_2763-1 ayi roṣamurīkaroṣi no cet kimapi tvāṃ prati vāridhe vadāmaḥ /
analyzed: ayi roṣamurīkaroṣi no ced kim api tvām prati vāridhe vadāmaḥ

original: MSS_2763-2 jaladena tavārthinā vimuktāny api toyāni mahān na hā jahāsi //
analyzed: jaladena tava arthinā vimuktāni api toyāni mahān na hā jahāsi

original: MSS_2764-1 ayi laṅghitamaryāda smara smara harānalam /
analyzed: ayi laṅghita maryāda smara smara hara analam

original: MSS_2764-2 dagdhaṃ dagdhumayuktaṃ te janaṃ virahakātaram //
analyzed: dagdham dagdhum ayuktam te janam viraha kātaram

original: MSS_2765-1 ayi varoru hatasmaradīpike yadi gatāsi madīkṣaṇagocarāt /
analyzed: ayi vara ūru hatasmara dīpike yadi gatā asi mad īkṣaṇa gocarāt

original: MSS_2765-2 asamasāyakasāyakakīlitā vada gamiṣyasi me hṛdayāt katham //
analyzed: asamasāyaka sāyaka kīlitā vada gamiṣyasi me hṛdayāt katham

original: MSS_2766-1 ayi vijahīhi dṛḍhopagūhanaṃ tyaja navasaṃgamabhīru vallabham /
analyzed: ayi vijahīhi dṛḍha upagūhanam tyaja nava saṃgama bhīru vallabham

original: MSS_2766-2 aruṇakarodgama eṣa vartate varatanu saṃpravadanti kukkuṭāḥ //
analyzed: aruṇa kara udgamaḥ eṣa vartate vara tanu saṃpravadanti kukkuṭāḥ

original: MSS_2767-1 ayi vidhuṃ paripṛccha guroḥ kutaḥ sphuṭamaśikṣyata dāhavadānyatā /
analyzed: ayi vidhum paripṛccha guroḥ kutas sphuṭam aśikṣyata dāha vadānya tā

original: MSS_2767-2 glapitaśaṃbhugalād garalāt tvayā kimudadhau jaḍa vā vaḍavānalāt //
analyzed: glapita śaṃbhu galāt garalāt tvayā kim udadhau jaḍa vā vaḍavānalāt

original: MSS_2768-1 ayi śākunika kṛto'ñjalir itare na katīha jīvanopāyāḥ /
analyzed: ayi śākunika kṛta uñjaliḥ itare na kati iha jīvana upāyāḥ

original: MSS_2768-2 hatvā śukān kimetad vipinamasārasvataṃ kuruṣe //
analyzed: hatvā śukān kim etat vipinam a sārasvatam kuruṣe

original: MSS_2769-1 ayi saṃprati dehi darśanaṃ smara paryutsuka eṣa mādhavaḥ /
analyzed: ayi saṃprati dehi darśanam smara paryutsukaḥ eṣa mādhavaḥ

original: MSS_2769-2 dayitāsvanavasthitaṃ nṛṇāṃ na khalu prema calaṃ suhṛjjane //
analyzed: dayitāsu anavasthitam nṛṇām na khalu prema calam suhṛd jane

original: MSS_2770-1 ayi saṃprasīda pārvati śivo'pi tava pādayornipatito'ham /
analyzed: ayi saṃprasīda pārvati śivaḥ api tava pādayoḥ nipatitaḥ uham

original: MSS_2770-2 śiva iti kathaṃ hi jalpasi sarudhiragajacarmasaṃvītaḥ //
analyzed: śivaḥ iti katham hi jalpasi sa rudhira gaja carma saṃvītaḥ

original: MSS_2771-1 āyi sakhi kuru kṣipraṃ rambhādalaiḥ śiśirānilaṃ sahacari tanau satkarpūraṃ drutaṃ parilepaya /
analyzed: āyi sakhi kuru kṣipram rambhā dalaiḥ śiśira anilam sahacari tanau sat karpūram drutam parilepaya

original: MSS_2771-2 sarasabisinīpatraistalpaṃ priye parikalpaya sphuṭamiti vibho tasyā gehe bhavanti kiloktayaḥ //
analyzed: sa rasa bisinī patraiḥ talpam priye parikalpaya sphuṭam iti vibho tasyāḥ gehe bhavanti kila uktayaḥ

original: MSS_2772-1 ayi sakhi niśā kiṃ vā ghasraḥ śaśī kimu bhāskaraḥ sphurati purataḥ kāmaḥ kiṃ vā mamāsti sa vallabhaḥ /
analyzed: ayi sakhi niśā kim vā ghasraḥ śaśī kimu bhāskaraḥ sphurati puratas kāmaḥ kim vā mama asti sa vallabhaḥ

original: MSS_2772-2 pratipalamiti prāṇādhīśa priyā virahāturā kathayati muhurmandaṃ mandaṃ sakhīṃ savidhasthitām //
analyzed: pratipalam iti prāṇādhīśa priyā viraha āturā kathayati muhur mandam mandam sakhīm savidha sthitām

original: MSS_2773-1 ayi sakhi paridoṣo jāyate cumbane kiṃ kimu kucaparirambhe kiṃ rate brūhi tathyam /
analyzed: ayi sakhi paridoṣaḥ jāyate cumbane kim kimu kuca parirambhe kim rate brūhi tathyam

original: MSS_2773-2 itinigadati nāthe dīpamālokayantī hari hari hariṇākṣī hrīsamudre nimagnā //
analyzed: iti nigadati nāthe dīpam ālokayantī hari hari hariṇa akṣī hrī samudre nimagnā

original: MSS_2774-1 ayi sakhi mama prāṇādhīśo gato viṣayāntaraṃ kusumaviśikhastasmāduccairdunoti tanuṃ śaraiḥ /
analyzed: ayi sakhi mama prāṇādhīśaḥ gataḥ viṣaya antaram kusuma viśikhaḥ tasmāt uccais dunoti tanum śaraiḥ

original: MSS_2774-2 laghu kuru tathā yatnaṃ yena smarādhinivāraṇe paṭutaramatestasyāśu syādihāgamanaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: laghu kuru tathā yatnam yena smara ādhi nivāraṇe paṭutara mateḥ tasya āśu syāt iha āgamanam tatas

original: MSS_2775-1 ayi sakhi śastaḥ sakhivat patiriti kiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi /
analyzed: ayi sakhi śastaḥ sakhi vat patiḥ iti kim tvam na jānāsi

original: MSS_2775-2 śasto'tisakhivadupapatir ityāli kathaṃ tvayāpi nābodhi //
analyzed: śasta ūti sakhi vat upapatiḥ iti āli katham tvayā api nā abodhi

original: MSS_2776-1 ayi sarasija sāyaṃ saṃnidhānaṃ tvadīyaṃ bhramara upagato'yaṃ cūtamālāṃ vihāya /
analyzed: ayi sarasija sāyam saṃnidhānam tvadīyam bhramaraḥ upagataḥ uyam cūta mālām vihāya

original: MSS_2776-2 anupamamadhulobhād dūrataḥ sāṃprataṃ tad idamanucitametan mudraṇaṃ yanmukhasya //
analyzed: anupama madhu lobhāt dūratas sāṃpratam tat idam anucitam etat mudraṇam yat mukhasya

original: MSS_2777-1 ayi sarale tāvadimā upadeśagiro viśanti karṇāntaḥ /
analyzed: ayi sarale tāvat imāḥ upadeśa giraḥ viśanti karṇa antar

original: MSS_2777-2 yāvannāntarbhūtaṃ taccetasi māmakaṃ cetaḥ //
analyzed: yāvat na antarbhūtam tat cetasi māmakam cetaḥ

original: MSS_2778-1 ayi sutanuśarīre talpamāruhya tūrṇaṃ viracaya mama kaṇṭhe bandhanaṃ bāhuvallyā /
analyzed: ayi su tanu śarīre talpam āruhya tūrṇam viracaya mama kaṇṭhe bandhanam bāhuvallyā

original: MSS_2778-2 itinigadati nāthe dīpamālokayantī hari hari hariṇākṣī hrīsamudre nimagnā //
analyzed: iti nigadati nāthe dīpam ālokayantī hari hari hariṇa akṣī hrī samudre nimagnā

original: MSS_2779-1 ayi sundari tava vadanaṃ nityaṃ pūrṇaṃ sudhānidhirmatvā /
analyzed: ayi sundari tava vadanam nityam pūrṇam sudhā nidhiḥ matvā

original: MSS_2779-2 hanta patatyupariṣṭān madhye'mbudhi nityamevāsau //
analyzed: hanta patati upariṣṭāt madhya imbudhi nityam eva asau

original: MSS_2780-1 ayi sundari saṃprati paśya puraś caramācalamastakameti raviḥ /
analyzed: ayi sundari saṃprati paśya puras caramācala mastakam eti raviḥ

original: MSS_2780-2 samupaiti tamaḥpaṭalījaṭilā rajanī kuru kāmakalāḥ sakalāḥ //
analyzed: samupaiti tamaḥ paṭalī jaṭilā rajanī kuru kāma kalāḥ sakalāḥ

original: MSS_2781-1 ayi svayūthyairaśanikṣatopamaṃ mamādya vṛttāntamimaṃ batoditā /
analyzed: ayi sva yūthyaiḥ aśani kṣata upamam mama adya vṛttāntam imam bata uditā

original: MSS_2781-2 mukhāni lolākṣi diśāmasaṃśayaṃ daśāpi śūnyāni vilokayiṣyasi //
analyzed: mukhāni lola akṣi diśām asaṃśayam daśa api śūnyāni vilokayiṣyasi

original: MSS_2782-1 ayi hastagataiḥ prāṇair amībhiḥ kandukairiva /
analyzed: ayi hasta gataiḥ prāṇaiḥ amībhiḥ kandukaiḥ iva

original: MSS_2782-2 aparyantarasaṃ mugdhe kiyat krīḍitumicchasi //
analyzed: aparyanta rasam mugdhe kiyat krīḍitum icchasi

original: MSS_2783-1 ayi hāralate saṃhara harahuṃkṛtidagdhadehasaṃkṣobham /
analyzed: ayi hāralate saṃhara hara huṃkṛti dagdha deha saṃkṣobham

original: MSS_2783-2 sadbhāvajānuraktir nahi ramyā paṇyanārīṇām //
analyzed: sadbhāva ja anuraktiḥ nahi ramyā paṇya nārīṇām

original: MSS_2784-1 ayi hṛdaya dayāṃ mayi kuru kuraṅganayanāṃ vinā badhāna dhṛtim /
analyzed: ayi hṛdaya dayām mayi kuru kuraṅga nayanām vinā badhāna dhṛtim

original: MSS_2784-2 ṭasaditi jhaṭiti sphuṭa vā sphuṭamidamuktaṃ gatirnānyā //
analyzed: ṭasad iti jhaṭiti sphuṭa vā sphuṭam idam uktam gatiḥ na anyā

original: MSS_2785-1 ayuktaṃ bahu bhāṣante yatra kutrāpi śerate /
analyzed: ayuktam bahu bhāṣante yatra kutra api śerate

original: MSS_2785-2 nagnā vikṣipya gātrāṇi sajjarā iva madyapāḥ //
analyzed: nagnāḥ vikṣipya gātrāṇi sajjarāḥ iva madyapāḥ

original: MSS_2786-1 ayuktaṃ yuktaṃ vā yadabhihitamajñena vibhunā stuyādetannityaṃ jaḍamapi guruṃ tasya vinuyāt /
analyzed: ayuktam yuktam vā yat abhihitam ajñena vibhunā stuyāt etat nityam jaḍam api gurum tasya vinuyāt

original: MSS_2786-2 vivatsurnaiḥspṛhyaṃ kathamapi sabhāyāmabhinayet svakāryaṃ saṃtuṣṭe kṣitibhṛti rahasyeva kathayet //
analyzed: vivatsuḥ naiḥspṛhyam katham api sabhāyām abhinayet sva kāryam saṃtuṣṭe kṣitibhṛti rahasi eva kathayet

original: MSS_2787-1 ayuktaṃ svāmino yuktaṃ yuktaṃ nīcasya dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: ayuktam svāminaḥ yuktam yuktam nīcasya dūṣaṇam

original: MSS_2787-2 amṛtaṃ rāhave mṛtyur viṣaṃ śaṃkarabhūṣaṇam //
analyzed: amṛtam rāhave mṛtyuḥ viṣam śaṃkara bhūṣaṇam

original: MSS_2788-1 ayuktaḥ prākṛtaḥ stabdhaḥ śaṭho naikṛtiko'lasaḥ /
analyzed: ayuktaḥ prākṛtaḥ stabdhaḥ śaṭhaḥ naikṛtika ulasaḥ

original: MSS_2788-2 viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate //
analyzed: viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_2789-1 ayuktacāraṃ durdarśam asvādhīnaṃ narādhipam /
analyzed: ayukta cāram durdarśam asvādhīnam narādhipam

original: MSS_2789-2 varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkamiva dvipāḥ //
analyzed: varjayanti narāḥ dūrāt nadī paṅkam iva dvipāḥ

original: MSS_2790-1 ayuktarūpaṃ kimataḥparaṃ bhavet trinetravakṣaḥ sulabhaṃ tavāpi yat /
analyzed: ayukta rūpam kim atas param bhavet trinetra vakṣaḥ sulabham tava api yat

original: MSS_2790-2 stanadvaye'smin haricandanāspade padaṃ citābhasmarajaḥ kariṣyati //
analyzed: stana dvaye ismin haricandana āspade padam citā bhasma rajaḥ kariṣyati

original: MSS_2791-1 ayutaṃ niyutaṃ vāpi pradiśantu prākṛtāya bhogāya /
analyzed: ayutam niyutam vā api pradiśantu prākṛtāya bhogāya

original: MSS_2791-2 krīṇanti na bilvadalaiḥ kaivalyaṃ paccaṣairmūḍhāḥ //
analyzed: krīṇanti na bilva dalaiḥ kaivalyam paccaṣaiḥ mūḍhāḥ

original: MSS_2792-1 ayudhyamānasyotpādya brāhmaṇasyāsṛgaṅgataḥ /
analyzed: a yudhyamānasya utpādya brāhmaṇasya asṛj aṅgataḥ

original: MSS_2792-2 duḥkhaṃ sumahadāpnoti pretyāprājñatayā naraḥ //
analyzed: duḥkham su mahat āpnoti pretya aprājña tayā naraḥ

original: MSS_2793-1 aye kīraśreṇīparivṛḍha vṛthā vāsaraśataṃ tarorasya skandhe gamayati phalāśārabhasataḥ /
analyzed: aye kīra śreṇī parivṛḍha vṛthā vāsara śatam taroḥ asya skandhe gamayati phala āśā rabhasataḥ

original: MSS_2793-2 yadā puṣpārambhe mukhamalinimā kiṃśukataros tadaivābhijñātaṃ phaliparicayo durlabha itaḥ //
analyzed: yadā puṣpa ārambhe kiṃśuka taroḥ tadā eva abhijñātam phali paricayaḥ durlabhaḥ itas

original: MSS_2794-1 aye keyaṃ dhanyā dhavalagṛhavātāyanagatā tulākoṭikvāṇairviṣamaviśikhaṃ jāgarayati /
analyzed: aye kā iyam dhanyā dhavala gṛha vātāyana gatā tulā koṭi kvāṇaiḥ viṣama viśikham jāgarayati

original: MSS_2794-2 purā yā prāṇeśe gatavati kṛtā puṣpadhanuṣā śarāsārai rātriṃdivamakṛpamujjāgarakṛśā //
analyzed: purā yā prāṇeśe gatavati kṛtā puṣpadhanuṣā śara āsāraiḥ rātriṃdivam akṛpam ujjāgara kṛśā

original: MSS_2795-1 aye keyaṃ līlādhavalagṛhavātāyanatale tulākoṭikvāṇaiḥ kusumadhanuṣaṃ jāgarayati /
analyzed: aye kā iyam līlā dhavala gṛha vātāyana tale tulā koṭi kvāṇaiḥ jāgarayati

original: MSS_2795-2 aho netradvandvaṃ vilasati vilaṅghya śrutipathaṃ kathaṃ na trailokyaṃ jayati madanaḥ smeravadanaḥ //
analyzed: aho netra dvandvam vilasati vilaṅghya śrutipatham katham na trailokyam jayati madanaḥ smera vadanaḥ

original: MSS_2796-1 aye kelīgṛhastambha kiṃ kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: aye kelī gṛha stambha kim kṛtam su kṛtam tvayā

original: MSS_2796-2 paryaṅke vallabhaṃ tyaktvā tvāmāliṅgati māninī //
analyzed: paryaṅke vallabham tyaktvā tvām āliṅgati māninī

original: MSS_2797-1 aye ko jānīte nijapuruṣasaṅgo hi na tathā yathā cetaḥ strīṇāṃ parapuruṣasaṅgo ramayate /
analyzed: aye kaḥ jānīte nija puruṣa saṅgaḥ hi na tathā yathā cetaḥ strīṇām para puruṣa saṅgaḥ ramayate

original: MSS_2797-2 api svairaṃ bhuktā divasamakhilaṃ vāsarakṛtā karasparśādindormukulayati netrāṇi nalinī //
analyzed: api svairam bhuktā divasam akhilam vāsara kṛtā kara sparśāt indoḥ mukulayati netrāṇi nalinī

original: MSS_2798-1 aye ko'yaṃ vṛddho gṛhaparivṛḍhaḥ kiṃ tava pitā na me bhartā kiṃtu vyapagatadṛganyacca badhiraḥ /
analyzed: aye kaḥ yam vṛddhaḥ gṛha parivṛḍhaḥ kim tava pitā na me bhartā kiṃtu vyapagata dṛś anyat ca badhiraḥ

original: MSS_2798-2 huhuṃ śrānto'dyāhaṃ śiśayiṣurihaivāpavarake kva yāminyāṃ yāmi svapimi nanu nirdaṃśamaśake //
analyzed: huhum śrāntā udya aham śiśayiṣuḥ iha eva apavarake kva yāminyām yāmi svapimi nanu nirdaṃśa maśake

original: MSS_2799-1 aye jaladhinandinīnayananīrajālambana- jvalajjvalanajitvarajvarabharatvarābhaṅguram /
analyzed: aye jaladhi nandinī nayana nīraja ālambana jvalat jvalana jitvara jvara bhara tvarā bhaṅguram

original: MSS_2799-2 prabhātajalajonnamadgarimagarvasarvaṃkaṣair jagattritayarocanaiḥ śiśirayāśu māṃ locanaiḥ //
analyzed: prabhāta jalaja unnamat garima garva sarvaṃkaṣaiḥ jagat tritaya rocanaiḥ śiśiraya āśu mām locanaiḥ

original: MSS_2800-1 aye tāla vrīḍāṃ vraja gurutayā bhāti na bhavān phale na cchāyā no kaṭhinaparivāro hi bhavataḥ /
analyzed: aye tāla vrīḍām vraja guru tayā bhāti na bhavān phale na chāyā no kaṭhina parivāraḥ hi bhavataḥ

original: MSS_2800-2 iyaṃ dhanyā dhanyā saralakadalī sundaradalā parātmānaṃ manye sukhayati phalenāmṛtavatā //
analyzed: iyam dhanyā dhanyā sarala kadalī sundara dalā parātmānam manye sukhayati phalena amṛtavatā

original: MSS_2801-1 aye diṣṭyā naṣṭo mama gṛhapiśācīparicayaḥ parāvṛttaṃ mohāt sphurati ca manāg brahmaṇi manaḥ /
analyzed: aye diṣṭyā naṣṭaḥ mama gṛha piśācī paricayaḥ parāvṛttam mohāt sphurati ca manāk brahmaṇi manaḥ

original: MSS_2801-2 vikāro'pyakṣāṇāṃ galita iva nirbhāti viṣayāt tathāpi kṣetrajñaḥ spṛhayati vanāya prati muhuḥ //
analyzed: vikāraḥ upi akṣāṇām galitaḥ iva nirbhāti viṣayāt tathā api kṣetrajñaḥ spṛhayati vanāya prati muhur

original: MSS_2802-1 aye dūrabhrāntaṃ viṣayaviṣamāraṇyavipathe paribhrāntaṃ ceto mama vidhuritaṃ svairamadhunā /
analyzed: aye dūra bhrāntam viṣaya viṣama araṇya vipathe paribhrāntam cetaḥ mama vidhuritam svairam adhunā

original: MSS_2802-2 nirāvarte nitye sthiraniravadhānabhramamaye vivekaprabhraśyadvikṛtiparamānandajaladhau //
analyzed: nirāvarte nitye sthira niravadhāna bhrama maye viveka prabhraśyat vikṛti paramānanda jaladhau

original: MSS_2803-1 aye nīlagrīva kva kathaya sakhe te'dya munayaḥ paraṃ toṣaṃ yeṣāṃ tava varavilāso vitanute /
analyzed: aye nīlagrīva kva kathaya sakhe tedya munayaḥ param toṣam yeṣām tava vara vilāsaḥ vitanute

original: MSS_2803-2 amī dūrāt krūrāḥ kvaṇitamidamākarṇya sahasā tvarante hantuṃ tvāmahaha śabarāḥ puṅkhitaśarāḥ //
analyzed: amī dūrāt krūrāḥ kvaṇitam idam ākarṇya sahasā tvarante hantum tvām ahaha śabarāḥ puṅkhita śarāḥ

original: MSS_2804-1 aye nṛpatimaṇḍalīmukuṭaratna yuṣmadbhujā- mahoṣmatatisaṃjuṣā bata bhavatpratāpārciṣā /
analyzed: aye nṛpati maṇḍalī mukuṭa ratna yuṣmad bhujā mahā ūṣma tati saṃjuṣā bata bhavat pratāpa arciṣā

original: MSS_2804-2 dviṣāmatibhṛśaṃ yaśaḥ prakaṭapārado dhmāpanād udusphuṭata tārakāḥ kapaṭato vihāyastaṭe //
analyzed: dviṣām ati bhṛśam yaśaḥ prakaṭa pāradaḥ dhmāpanāt udusphuṭata tārakāḥ kapaṭataḥ vihāyaḥ taṭe

original: MSS_2805-1 aye pāthovāha sthagaya kakubho'nyāstata itas tyajaitāṃ sīmānaṃ vasati munirasyāṃ kalaśabhūḥ /
analyzed: aye pāthaḥ vāha sthagaya kakubhaḥ nyāḥ tatas itas tyaja etām sīmānam vasati muniḥ asyām kalaśa bhūḥ

original: MSS_2805-2 udañcatkope'smin sa jaladhirapi sthāsyati na te yataḥ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ salilamiha śauryaṃ prathayasi //
analyzed: udañcat kope ismin sa jaladhiḥ api sthāsyati na te yatas pāyam pāyam salilam iha śauryam prathayasi

original: MSS_2806-1 aye madhupa mā kṛthā bata vṛthā manodīnatāṃ tuṣārasamaye latāśataniṣevaṇavyākulaḥ /
analyzed: aye madhupa mā kṛthāḥ bata vṛthā manaḥ dīna tām tuṣāra samaye latā śata niṣevaṇa vyākulaḥ

original: MSS_2806-2 iyaṃ purata eva te sarasapuṣpamāsodaye rasālanavamañjarī madhujharī jarījṛmbhate //
analyzed: iyam puratas eva te sarasa puṣpa māsa udaye rasāla nava mañjarī madhu jharī jarījṛmbhate

original: MSS_2807-1 aye mamodāsitameva jihvayā dvaye'pi tasminnanatiprayojane /
analyzed: aye mama udāsitam eva jihvayā dvaye pi tasmin an ati prayojane

original: MSS_2807-2 garau giraḥ pallavanārthalāghave mitaṃ ca sāraṃ ca vaco hi vāgmitā //
analyzed: garau giraḥ pallavana artha lāghave mitam ca sāram ca vacaḥ hi vāgmi tā

original: MSS_2808-1 aye mātardṛṣṭvā mukhamamṛtabhānubhramavaśāt kacacchadmā rāhurvasati kimu tṛṣṇātaralitaḥ /
analyzed: aye mātar dṛṣṭvā mukham amṛta bhānu bhrama vaśāt kaca chadmā rāhuḥ vasati kimu tṛṣṇā taralitaḥ

original: MSS_2808-2 kimevaṃ kandarpāntakataruṇi sindūrasaraṇic- chalādbhoktuṃ bhūyo bahiriva rasajñāṃ kalayati //
analyzed: kim evam kandarpa antaka taruṇi sindūra saraṇit chalāt bhoktum bhūyas bahis iva rasajñām kalayati

original: MSS_2809-1 aye mātastātaḥ kva gata iti yadvairiśiśunā darīgehe līnā nibhṛtamiha pṛṣṭā svajananī /
analyzed: aye mātar tātaḥ kva gataḥ iti yat vairi śiśunā darī gehe līnā nibhṛtam iha pṛṣṭā sva jananī

original: MSS_2809-2 kareṇāsyaṃ tasya drutamatha niruddhyāśrubhṛtayā viniḥśvasya sphāraṃ śiva śiva dṛśaivottarayati //
analyzed: kareṇa āsyam tasya drutam atha niruddhya aśru bhṛtayā viniḥśvasya sphāram śiva śiva dṛśā evā uttarayati

original: MSS_2810-1 aye muktāratna prasara bahiruddyotaya gṛhān api kṣoṇīndrāṇāṃ kuru phalavataḥ svānapi guṇān /
analyzed: aye muktāratna prasara bahis uddyotaya gṛhān api kṣoṇi indrāṇām kuru phalavataḥ svān api guṇān

original: MSS_2810-2 kimatraivātmānaṃ jarayasi mudhā śuktikuhare mahāgambhīro'yaṃ jaladhiriha kastvāṃ gaṇayati //
analyzed: kim atra eva ātmānam jarayasi mudhā śukti kuhare mahā gambhīraḥ yam jaladhiḥ iha kaḥ tvām gaṇayati

original: MSS_2811-1 aye yadi samīhase parapurāvarodhaṃ prabho tadākalaya madvacaḥ kimapi darpanārāyaṇa /
analyzed: aye yadi samīhase para pura avarodham prabho tadā ākalaya mad vacaḥ kim api darpa nārāyaṇa

original: MSS_2811-2 pratīpanṛpanāgarīnayananīrakallolinī- samuttaraṇacāturīṃ turagarājimadhyāpaya //
analyzed: pratīpa nṛpa nāgarī nayana nīra kallolinī samuttaraṇa cāturīm turaga rājim adhyāpaya

original: MSS_2812-1 aye lājā uccaiḥ pathi vacanamākarṇya gṛhiṇī śiśoḥ karṇau yatnāt supihitavatī dīnavadanā /
analyzed: aye lājāḥ uccais pathi vacanam ākarṇya gṛhiṇī śiśoḥ karṇau yatnāt su pihitavatī dīna vadanā

original: MSS_2812-2 mayi kṣīṇopāye yadakṛta dṛśāvaśrubahule tadantaḥśalyaṃ me tvamasi punaruddhartumucitaḥ //
analyzed: mayi kṣīṇa upāye yat akṛta dṛśau aśru bahule tat antar śalyam me tvam asi punar uddhartum ucitaḥ

original: MSS_2813-1 aye vāpīhaṃsā nijavasatisaṃkocapiśunaṃ kurudhvaṃ mā ceto viyati calato vīkṣya vihagān /
analyzed: aye vāpī haṃsāḥ nija vasati saṃkoca piśunam kurudhvam mā cetaḥ viyati calataḥ vīkṣya vihagān

original: MSS_2813-2 amī te sāraṅgā bhuvanamahanīyavratabhṛtāṃ nirīhāṇāṃyeṣāṃ tṛṇamiva bhavantyambunidhayaḥ //
analyzed: amī te sāraṅgāḥ bhuvana mahanīya vrata bhṛtām nirīhāṇām yeṣām tṛṇam iva bhavanti ambunidhayaḥ

original: MSS_2814-1 aye vārāṃ rāśe katipayapayobinduvibhavair amībhirmā garvaṃ vaha niravalepā hi kṛtinaḥ /
analyzed: aye vārām rāśe katipaya payaḥ bindu vibhavaiḥ amībhiḥ mā garvam vaha niravalepāḥ hi kṛtinaḥ

original: MSS_2814-2 na kiṃ lopāmudrāsahacarakarakroḍakuhare bhavān dṛṣṭaḥ kaṣṭaṃ pracalajalajantuvyatikaraḥ //
analyzed: na kim lopāmudrā sahacara kara kroḍa kuhare bhavān dṛṣṭaḥ kaṣṭam pracala jala jantu vyatikaraḥ

original: MSS_2815-1 aye vārāṃ rāśe kuliśakarakopapratibhayād ayaṃ pakṣapremṇā giripatisutastvāmupagataḥ /
analyzed: aye rāśe kuliśa kara kopa pratibhayāt ayam pakṣa premṇā giripati sutaḥ tvām upagataḥ

original: MSS_2815-2 tvadantarvāstavyo yadi punarayaṃ vāḍavaśikhī pradīptaḥ pratyaṅgaṃ glapayati tataḥ ko'sya śaraṇam //
analyzed: tvad antarvāstavyaḥ yadi punar ayam vāḍaba śikhī pradīptaḥ pratyaṅgam glapayati tatas kaḥ asya śaraṇam

original: MSS_2816-1 aye sudhākairaviṇi vyadhāyi mudhā sudhādhāmani bandhubhāvaḥ /
analyzed: aye sudhā kairaviṇi vyadhāyi mudhā sudhā dhāmani bandhu bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_2816-2 janāpavādaḥ paritaḥ prayātaḥ samāgamo hanta na jātu jātaḥ //
analyzed: jana apavādaḥ paritas prayātaḥ samāgamaḥ hanta na jātu jātaḥ

original: MSS_2817-1 aye'stamayate śaśī nahi kṛśībhavatyāgraho vinaśyati tamo haṭhaṃ kimaṇumapyapāste manaḥ /
analyzed: śaśī nahi kṛśībhavati āgrahaḥ vinaśyati tamaḥ haṭham kim aṇum api apāste manaḥ

original: MSS_2817-2 sakhi prakaṭito'ruṇo na karuṇodayaste manāk prayāti khalu yāminī na vimanīkṛthā nāyakam //
analyzed: sakhi prakaṭita ūruṇaḥ na karuṇā udayaḥ te manāk prayāti khalu yāminī na vimanīkṛthāḥ nāyakam

original: MSS_2818-1 aye svargaḥ svargaḥ katidivasamārgaḥ pravasatāṃ purastuṅgau syātāṃ yadi na kucakumbhau mṛgadṛśaḥ /
analyzed: aye svargaḥ svargaḥ kati divasa mārgaḥ pravasatām puras tuṅgau syātām yadi na kuca kumbhau mṛga dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_2818-2 ayācaṃ pātheyaṃ sulabha[mubhayaṃ] mūlaphalayoḥ payaḥ sthāne sthāne pathi pathi ca viśrāmataravaḥ //
analyzed: ayācam pātheyam sulabham ubhayam mūla phalayoḥ payaḥ sthāne sthāne pathi pathi ca viśrāma taravaḥ

original: MSS_2819-1 aye helāvelātulitakulaśaile jalanidhau kuto vārāmoghaṃ bata jalada moghaṃ vitarasi /
analyzed: aye helā velā tulita kula śaile jalanidhau kutas vārā amogham bata jalada mogham vitarasi

original: MSS_2819-2 samantāduttālajvaladanalakīlākavalana- klamopetānetānupacara payobhirviṭapinaḥ //
analyzed: samantāt uttāla jvalat anala kīlā kavalana klama upetān etān upacara payobhiḥ viṭapinaḥ

original: MSS_2820-1 ayogajāmanvabhavaṃ na vedanāṃ hitāya me'bhūdiyamunmadiṣṇutā /
analyzed: a yoga jām anvabhavam na vedanām hitāya me bhūt iyam unmadiṣṇu tā

original: MSS_2820-2 udeti doṣādapi doṣalāghavaṃ kṛśatvamajñānavaśādivainasaḥ //
analyzed: udeti doṣāt api doṣa lāghavam kṛśa tvam ajñāna vaśāt iva enasaḥ

original: MSS_2821-1 ayogyavastubharaṇāt bhajedyogyo'pi duṣṭatām /
analyzed: ayogya vastu bharaṇāt bhajet yogyaḥ api duṣṭa tām

original: MSS_2821-2 rakṣaṇāyendradattāsiṃ vahan vyādho'bhavanmuniḥ //
analyzed: rakṣaṇāya indra datta asim vahan vyādhaḥ bhavat muniḥ

original: MSS_2822-1 ayodhyāmaṭavībhūtāṃ pitrā bhrātrā ca varjitām /
analyzed: ayodhyām aṭavī bhūtām pitrā bhrātrā ca varjitām

original: MSS_2822-2 pipāsārto'nudhāvāmi kṣīṇatoyāṃ nadīmiva //
analyzed: pipāsā ārtaḥ anudhāvāmi kṣīṇa toyām nadīm iva

original: MSS_2823-1 ayyayi sāhasakāriṇi kiṃ tava caṅkramaṇena /
analyzed: ayi ayi sāhasa kāriṇi kim tava caṅkramaṇena

original: MSS_2823-2 ṭasaditi bhaṅgamavāpsyasi kucayugabhārabhareṇa //
analyzed: bhaṅgam avāpsyasi kuca yuga bhāra bhareṇa

original: MSS_2823A-1 arakte na sukhaṃ vetti nārakto duḥkhamaśnute /
analyzed: a rakte na sukham vetti na a raktaḥ duḥkham aśnute

original: MSS_2823A-2 duḥkhānāṃ ca sukhānāṃ ca rakta evāspadaṃ sadā //
analyzed: duḥkhānām ca sukhānām ca raktaḥ eva āspadam sadā

original: MSS_2824-1 arakṣitaṃ tiṣṭhati daivarakṣitaṃ surakṣitaṃ daivahataṃ vinaśyati /
analyzed: arakṣitam tiṣṭhati daiva rakṣitam su rakṣitam daiva hatam vinaśyati

original: MSS_2824-2 jīvatyanātho'pi vane visarjitaḥ kṛtaprayatno'pi gṛhe na jīvati //
analyzed: jīvati anāthaḥ api vane visarjitaḥ kṛta prayatnaḥ api gṛhe na jīvati

original: MSS_2825-1 arakṣitaṃ bhavet satyaṃ daivaṃ tameva rakṣati /
analyzed: arakṣitam bhavet satyam daivam tam eva rakṣati

original: MSS_2825-2 daivena nāśitaṃ yattu tasya rakṣā na dṛśyate //
analyzed: daivena nāśitam yat tu tasya rakṣā na dṛśyate

original: MSS_2826-1 arakṣitā gṛhe ruddhāḥ puruṣairāptakāribhiḥ /
analyzed: arakṣitāḥ gṛhe ruddhāḥ puruṣaiḥ āpta kāribhiḥ

original: MSS_2826-2 ātmānamātmanā yāstu rakṣeyustāḥ surakṣitāḥ //
analyzed: ātmānam ātmanā yāḥ tu rakṣeyuḥ tāḥ su rakṣitāḥ

original: MSS_2827-1 arakṣitāraṃ rājānaṃ baliṣaḍbhāgahāriṇam /
analyzed: arakṣitāram rājānam bali ṣaḍbhāga hāriṇam

original: MSS_2827-2 tamāhuḥ sarvalokasya samagramalahārakam //
analyzed: tam āhuḥ sarva lokasya samagra mala hārakam

original: MSS_2828-1 arakṣyamānāḥ kurvanti yatkiṃcit kilviṣaṃ prajāḥ /
analyzed: arakṣyamānāḥ kurvanti yat kiṃcid kilviṣam prajāḥ

original: MSS_2828-2 tasmāttu nṛpaterardhaṃ yasmād gṛhṇātyasau karān //
analyzed: tasmāt tu nṛpateḥ ardham yasmāt gṛhṇāti asau karān

original: MSS_2829-1 araṇyaṃ rakṣitaṃ siṃhāt tasmāt siṃhaḥ surakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: araṇyam rakṣitam siṃhāt tasmāt siṃhaḥ su rakṣitaḥ

original: MSS_2829-2 ityanyonyasyopakāre mitratvaṃ tannibandhanam //
analyzed: iti anyonyasya upakāre mitra tvam tad nibandhanam

original: MSS_2830-1 araṇyaṃ sāraṅgairgirikuharagarbhāśca haribhir diśo diṅmātaṅgaiḥ salilamuṣitaṃ paṅkajavanaiḥ /
analyzed: araṇyam sāraṅgaiḥ giri kuhara garbhāḥ ca haribhiḥ diśaḥ diś mātaṅgaiḥ salila muṣitam paṅkaja vanaiḥ

original: MSS_2830-2 priyācakṣurmadhyastanavadanasaundaryavijitaiḥ satāṃ māne mlāne maraṇamathavā dūragamanam //
analyzed: priyā cakṣuḥ madhya stana vadana saundarya vijitaiḥ satām māne mlāne maraṇam athavā dūra gamanam

original: MSS_2831-1 araṇyabījāñjalidānalālitās tathā ca tasyāṃ hariṇā viśaśvasuḥ /
analyzed: araṇya bīja añjali dāna lālitāḥ tathā ca tasyām hariṇāḥ viśaśvasuḥ

original: MSS_2831-2 yathā tadīyairnayanaiḥ kutūhalāt puraḥ sakhīnāmamimīta locane //
analyzed: yathā tadīyaiḥ nayanaiḥ kutūhalāt puras sakhīnām amimīta locane

original: MSS_2832-1 araṇyaruditaṃ kṛtaṃ śavaśarīramudvartitaṃ sthale'bjamavaropitaṃ suciramūṣare varṣitam /
analyzed: araṇya ruditam kṛtam śava śarīram udvartitam sthala ibjam avaropitam su ciram ūṣare varṣitam

original: MSS_2832-2 śvapucchamavanāmitaṃ badhirakarṇajāpaḥ kṛtaḥ kṛtāndhamukhamaṇḍanā yadabudho janaḥ sevitaḥ //
analyzed: śva puccham avanāmitam badhira karṇa jāpaḥ kṛtaḥ kṛta andha mukha maṇḍanā yat abudhaḥ janaḥ sevitaḥ

original: MSS_2833-1 araṇyahariṇagrāmam ācakrāma hutāśanaḥ /
analyzed: araṇya hariṇa grāmam ācakrāma hutāśanaḥ

original: MSS_2833-2 indoḥ kroḍamṛgaṃ dhartum iva dhūmo nabho yayau //
analyzed: indoḥ kroḍa mṛgam dhartum iva dhūmaḥ nabhaḥ yayau

original: MSS_2834-1 araṇyānī kveyaṃ dhṛtakanakasūtraḥ kva ca mṛgaḥ kva muktāhāro'yaṃ kva ca sa patagaḥ kveyamabalā /
analyzed: araṇyānī kva iyam dhṛta kanaka sūtraḥ kva ca mṛgaḥ kva muktā hāraḥ yam kva ca sa patagaḥ kva iyam abalā

original: MSS_2834-2 kva tatkanyāratnaṃ lalitamahibhartuḥ kva ca vayaṃ svamākūtaṃ dhātā kimapi nibhṛtaṃ pallavayati //
analyzed: kva tat kanyā ratnam lalita mahi bhartuḥ kva ca vayam svam ākūtam dhātā kim api nibhṛtam pallavayati

original: MSS_2835-1 araṇye puṣpitā vṛkṣā dūrasthāne ca bāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: araṇye puṣpitāḥ vṛkṣāḥ dūra sthāne ca bāndhavāḥ

original: MSS_2835-2 samṛddhenāpi kiṃ tena yaḥ kāle nopatiṣṭhati //
analyzed: samṛddhena api kim tena yaḥ kāle na upatiṣṭhati

original: MSS_2836-1 aratiriyamupaiti māṃ na nidrā gaṇayati tasya guṇān mano na doṣān /
analyzed: aratiḥ iyam upaiti mām na nidrā gaṇayati tasya guṇān manaḥ na doṣān

original: MSS_2836-2 vigalati rajanī na saṃgamāśā vrajati tanustanutāṃ na cānurāgaḥ //
analyzed: vigalati rajanī na saṃgama āśāḥ vrajati tanuḥ tanu tām na ca anurāgaḥ

original: MSS_2837-1 aratnālokasaṃhāryam avāryaṃ sūryaraśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: a ratna āloka saṃhāryam a vāryam sūrya raśmibhiḥ

original: MSS_2837-2 dṛṣṭirodhakaraṃ yūnāṃ yauvanaprabhavaṃ tamaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭi rodha karam yūnām yauvana prabhavam tamaḥ

original: MSS_2838-1 arayo'pi hi mitratvaṃ yānti daṇḍavato dhruvam /
analyzed: arayaḥ api hi mitra tvam yānti daṇḍavataḥ dhruvam

original: MSS_2838-2 daṇḍaprāyo hi nṛpatir bhunaktyākramya medinīm //
analyzed: daṇḍa prāyaḥ hi nṛpatiḥ bhunakti ākramya medinīm

original: MSS_2839-1 arayo'pi hi saṃdheyāḥ sati kāryārthagaurave /
analyzed: arayā api hi saṃdheyāḥ sati kārya artha gaurave

original: MSS_2839-2 ahimūṣakavad devā hyarthasya padavīṃ gataiḥ //
analyzed: ahi mūṣaka vat devāḥ hi arthasya padavīm gataiḥ

original: MSS_2840-1 aralūvṛkṣapatrāṇāṃ lepo gomukharogahṛt /
MSS_2840-2 gonāsasaṃbhavaḥ kṣāro hanti puṣpaṃ cirodbhavam //
MSS_2841-1 aravindamidaṃ vīkṣya khelatkhañjanamañjulam /
analyzed: aravindam idam vīkṣya khelat khañjana mañjulam

original: MSS_2841-2 smarāmi vadanaṃ tasyāś cāru cañcalalocanam //
analyzed: smarāmi vadanam tasyāḥ cāru cañcala locanam

original: MSS_2842-1 aravindavṛndamakarandatundilo marudeti mandamiha mandarācalāt /
analyzed: aravinda vṛnda makaranda tundilaḥ marut eti mandam iha mandara acalāt

original: MSS_2842-2 suratāntatāntasudatīmatallikā- kabarīparīmalajharī parīvṛtaḥ //
MSS_2843-1 aravindeṣu kundeṣu ramitaṃ kālayogataḥ /
analyzed: aravindeṣu kundeṣu ramitam kāla yogataḥ

original: MSS_2843-2 aye mākanda jānīhi tavaivāyaṃ madhuvrataḥ //
analyzed: aye mākanda jānīhi tava eva ayam madhu vrataḥ

original: MSS_2844-1 araśmi bimbaṃ sūryasya vahniṃ caivāṃśumālinam /
analyzed: araśmi bimbam sūryasya vahnim ca eva aṃśumālinam

original: MSS_2844-2 dṛṣṭvaikādaśamāsāttu naro norddhvaṃ tu jīvati //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ekādaśa māsāt tu naraḥ na ūrddhvam tu jīvati

original: MSS_2845-1 arasāpi hi vāg bhāti proktāvasara eva hi /
analyzed: arasā api hi vāc bhāti proktā avasaraḥ eva hi

original: MSS_2845-2 sarvacittapramodāya gālidānaṃ karagrahe //
MSS_2846-1 arasikajanabhāṣaṇato rasikajanaiḥ saha varaṃ kalahaḥ /
analyzed: arasika jana bhāṣaṇataḥ rasika janaiḥ saha varam kalahaḥ

original: MSS_2846-2 lambakucāliṅganato likucakucāpādatāḍanaṃ śreyaḥ //
MSS_2847-1 arājake jīvaloke durbalā balavattaraiḥ /
analyzed: arājake jīva loke durbalāḥ balavattaraiḥ

original: MSS_2847-2 bādhyante na ca vitteṣu prabhutvamiha kasyacit //
analyzed: bādhyante na ca vitteṣu prabhu tvam iha kasyacid

original: MSS_2848-1 arājake tu loke'smiṃs tasmād rājā vidhīyatām /
analyzed: arājake tu loke ismin tasmāt rājā vidhīyatām

original: MSS_2848-2 rājā rājye ciraṃ rakṣāṃ kṛtvā svargamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: rājā rājye ciram rakṣām kṛtvā svargam avāpnuyāt
