original: MSS_2849-1 arājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu dharmo na hyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: arājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu dharmaḥ na hi avatiṣṭhate

original: MSS_2849-2 parasparaṃ ca bādhante sarvathā dhigarājakam //
analyzed: parasparam ca bādhante sarvathā dhik arājakam

original: MSS_2850-1 arājake hi loke'smin sarvato vidrute bhayāt /
analyzed: arājake hi loke ismin sarvatas vidrute bhayāt

original: MSS_2850-2 rakṣārthamasya sarvasya rājānamasṛjat prabhuḥ //
analyzed: rakṣā artham asya sarvasya rājānam asṛjat prabhuḥ

original: MSS_2851-1 arātibhiryudhi sahayudhvano hatāñ jighūkṣavaḥ śrutaraṇatūryaniḥsvanāḥ /
analyzed: arātibhiḥ yudhi sahayudhvanaḥ hatām śruta raṇa tūrya niḥsvanāḥ

original: MSS_2851-2 akurvata prathamasamāgamocitaṃ cirojjhitaṃ suragaṇikāḥ prasādhanam //
analyzed: akurvata prathama samāgama ucitam cira ujjhitam sura gaṇikāḥ prasādhanam

original: MSS_2852-1 arātivikramālokavikasvaravilocanaḥ /
MSS_2852-2 kṛpāṇodagradordaṇḍaḥ sa sahasrāyudhīyati //
analyzed: kṛpāṇa udagra dos daṇḍaḥ sa sahasra āyudhīyati

original: MSS_2853-1 arālakeśyā alake vidhātrā vidhīyamāne calatūlikāgrāt /
analyzed: arāla keśyāḥ alake vidhātrā vidhīyamāne cala tūlikā agrāt

original: MSS_2853-2 cyutasya bindorasitasya mārga- rekheva reje navaromarājī //
analyzed: cyutasya bindoḥ asitasya mārga rekhā iva reje nava romarājī

original: MSS_2854-1 arāvapyucitaṃ kāryam ātithyaṃ gṛhamāgate /
analyzed: arau api ucitam kāryam ātithyam gṛham āgate

original: MSS_2854-2 chettumapyāgate chāyāṃ nopasaṃharate drumaḥ //
analyzed: chettum api āgate chāyām na upasaṃharate drumaḥ

original: MSS_2855-1 ariṃ mitramudāsīnaṃ madhyasthaṃ sthaviraṃ gurum /
analyzed: arim mitram udāsīnam madhyastham sthaviram gurum

original: MSS_2855-2 yo na budhyati mandātmā sa ca sarvatra naśyati //
analyzed: yaḥ na budhyati manda ātmā sa ca sarvatra naśyati

original: MSS_2856-1 ariṇā saha saṃvāsād viṣeṇa saha bhojanāt /
analyzed: ariṇā saha saṃvāsāt viṣeṇa saha bhojanāt

original: MSS_2856-2 pāpmanā saha sauhārdān maraṇaṃ pratipadyate //
analyzed: pāpmanā saha sauhārdāt maraṇam pratipadyate

original: MSS_2857-1 arito'bhyāgato doṣaḥ śatrusaṃvāsakāritaḥ /
analyzed: doṣaḥ śatru saṃvāsa kāritaḥ

original: MSS_2857-2 sarpasaṃvāsadharmitvān nityodvegena dūṣitaḥ //
analyzed: sarpa saṃvāsa dharmi tvāt nitya udvegena dūṣitaḥ

original: MSS_2858-1 jāyate plakṣabījāśāt kapotādiva śālmaleḥ /
analyzed: jāyate plakṣa bīja āśāt kapotāt iva śālmaleḥ

original: MSS_2858-2 udvegajanano nityaṃ paścādapi bhayāvahaḥ //
analyzed: udvega jananaḥ nityam paścāt api bhaya āvahaḥ

original: MSS_2859-1 aripakṣāśrite mitre marmavedipriyaṃvade /
analyzed: ari pakṣa āśrite mitre marma vedi priyaṃvade

original: MSS_2859-2 viśvāso naiva kartavyaḥ yadi sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ //
analyzed: viśvāsaḥ na eva kartavyaḥ yadi sākṣāt bṛhaspatiḥ

original: MSS_2860-1 aribhirjitairaśaktair vijñāpyaṃ sevakaiḥ prabhornītiḥ /
analyzed: aribhiḥ jitaiḥ aśaktaiḥ vijñāpyam sevakaiḥ prabhoḥ nītiḥ

original: MSS_2860-2 viṣayairjito'smi śaṃbho tava yacchlāghyaṃ tadāracaya //
analyzed: viṣayaiḥ jitaḥ asmi śaṃbho tava yat ślāghyam tat āracaya

original: MSS_2861-1 arivadhadehaśarīraḥ sahasā rathisūtaturagapādātaḥ /
analyzed: ari vadha deha śarīraḥ sahasā rathi sūta turaga pādātaḥ

original: MSS_2861-2 bhāti sadānatyāgaḥ sthiratāyāmavanitalatilakaḥ //
analyzed: bhāti sa dāna tyāgaḥ sthira tāyām avani tala tilakaḥ

original: MSS_2862-1 ariśca mitraṃ bhavati mitraṃ cāpi praduṣyati /
analyzed: ariḥ ca mitram bhavati mitram ca api praduṣyati

original: MSS_2862-2 anityacittaḥ puruṣas tasmin ko nāma viśvaset //
analyzed: anitya cittaḥ puruṣaḥ tasmin kaḥ nāma viśvaset

original: MSS_2863-1 ariṣaṅvarga evāyam asyāstāta padāni ṣaṭ /
analyzed: ariṣaṅ vargaḥ eva ayam asyāḥ tāta padāni ṣaḍ

original: MSS_2863-2 teṣāmekamapi cchindan khañjaya bhramarīṃ śriyam //
analyzed: teṣām ekam api chindan khañjaya bhramarīm śriyam

original: MSS_2864-1 ariṣṭāni mahārāja śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tāni te /
analyzed: ariṣṭāni mahā rāja śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tāni te

original: MSS_2864-2 yeṣāmālokanān mṛtyuḥ nijaṃ jānāti yogavit //
analyzed: yeṣām ālokanāt mṛtyuḥ nijam jānāti yoga vid

original: MSS_2865-1 aruṃtudaṃ paruṣaṃ rūkṣavācaṃ vākkaṇṭakairvitudantaṃ manuṣyān /
analyzed: aruntudam paruṣam rūkṣa vācam vāc kaṇṭakaiḥ vitudantam manuṣyān

original: MSS_2865-2 vidyādalakṣmīkatamaṃ janānāṃ mukhe nibaddhāṃ nirṛtiṃ vahantam //
analyzed: vidyāt alakṣmīkatamam janānām mukhe nibaddhām nirṛtim vahantam

original: MSS_2866-1 arucirniśayā vinā śaśī śaśinā sāpi vinā mahattamaḥ /
analyzed: aruciḥ niśayā vinā śaśī śaśinā sā api vinā mahattamaḥ

original: MSS_2866-2 ubheyena vinā manobhava- sphuritaṃ naiva cakāsti kāminoḥ //
analyzed: ubheyena vinā manobhava sphuritam nā eva cakāsti kāminoḥ

original: MSS_2867-1 aruṇakiraṇajālairantarikṣe gatarkṣe calati śiśiravāte mandamandaṃ prabhāte /
analyzed: aruṇakiraṇa jālaiḥ antarikṣe gata ṛkṣe calati śiśira vāte mandamandam prabhāte

original: MSS_2867-2 yuvatijanakadambe nāthamuktauṣṭhabimbe caramagirinitambe candrabimbaṃ lalambe //
analyzed: yuvati jana kadambe nātha mukta oṣṭha bimbe carama giri nitambe candra bimbam lalambe

original: MSS_2868-1 aruṇakiraṇe vahnau lājānuḍūni juhoti yā pariṇayati tāṃ saṃdhyāmetāmavaimi maṇirdivaḥ /
analyzed: aruṇakiraṇe vahnau lāja anuḍūni juhoti yā pariṇayati tām saṃdhyām etām avaimi maṇiḥ divaḥ

original: MSS_2868-2 iyamiva sa evāgnibhrāntiṃ karoti purāyataḥ karamapi na kastasyaivotkaḥ sakautukamīkṣitum //
analyzed: iyam iva saḥ eva agni bhrāntim karoti purā āyatas karam api na kaḥ tasya eva utkaḥ sa kautukam īkṣitum

original: MSS_2869-1 aruṇajalajarājīmugdhahastāgrapādā bahulamadhupamālākajjalendīvarākṣī /
MSS_2869-2 anupatati virāvaiḥ patriṇāṃ vyāharantī rajanimacirajātā pūrvasaṃdhyā suteva //
analyzed: anupatati virāvaiḥ patriṇām vyāharantī rajanim acira jātā pūrva saṃdhyā sutā iva

original: MSS_2870-1 aruṇadalanalinyā snigdhapādāravindā kaṭhinatanudharaṇyāṃ yātyakasmāt skhalantī /
analyzed: aruṇa dala nalinyā snigdha pāda aravindā kaṭhina tanu dharaṇyām yāti akasmāt skhalantī

original: MSS_2870-2 avani tava suteyaṃpādavinyāsadeśe tyaja nija kaṭhinatvaṃ jānakī yātyaraṇyam //
analyzed: avani tava sutā iyam pāda vinyāsa deśe tyaja nija kaṭhina tvam jānakī yāti araṇyam

original: MSS_2871-1 aruṇanayanaṃ sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ darasphuritādharaṃ sutanu śaśinaḥ kliṣṭāṃ kāntiṃ karotu tavānanam /
analyzed: aruṇa nayanam sa bhrū bhaṅgam dara sphurita adharam su tanu śaśinaḥ kliṣṭām kāntim karotu tava ānanam

original: MSS_2871-2 kṛtamanunayaiḥ kopo'yaṃ te manasvini vardhatām iti gaditayāśliṣṭo devyā śivāya śivo'stu vaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtam anunayaiḥ kopaḥ yam te manasvini vardhatām iti gaditayā āśliṣṭaḥ devyā śivāya śivoḥ tu vaḥ

original: MSS_2872-1 aruṇamapi vidrumadruṃ mṛdulataraṃ cāpi kisalayaṃ bāle /
analyzed: aruṇam api vidruma drum mṛdulataram ca api kisalayam bāle

original: MSS_2872-2 adharīkaroti nitarāṃ tavādharo madhurimātiśayāt //
analyzed: adharīkaroti nitarām tava adharaḥ madhurima atiśayāt

original: MSS_2873-1 aruṇarāganiṣedhibhiraṃśukaiḥ śravaṇalabdhapadaiśca yavāṅkuraiḥ /
analyzed: aruṇa rāga niṣedhibhiḥ aṃśukaiḥ śravaṇa labdha padaiḥ ca yava aṅkuraiḥ

original: MSS_2873-2 parabhṛtāvirutaiśca vilāsinaḥ smarabalairabalaikarasāḥ kṛtāḥ //
analyzed: parabhṛta a virutaiḥ ca vilāsinaḥ smara balaiḥ abala eka rasāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: MSS_2874-1 aruṇitākhilaśailavanā muhur vidadhatī pathikān paritāpinaḥ /
analyzed: aruṇita akhila śaila vanā muhur vidadhatī pathikān paritāpinaḥ

original: MSS_2874-2 vikacakiṃśukasaṃhatiruccakair udavahaddavahavyavahaśriyam //
analyzed: vikaca kiṃśuka saṃhatiḥ uccakais udavahat davaha vyavaha śriyam

original: MSS_2875-1 aruṇe ca taruṇi nayane tava malinaṃ ca priyasya mukham /
analyzed: aruṇe ca taruṇi nayane tava malinam ca priyasya mukham

original: MSS_2875-2 mukhamānataṃ ca sakhite jvalitaścāsyāntare smarajvalanaḥ //
analyzed: mukham ānatam ca sakhite jvalitaḥ ca asya antare smara jvalanaḥ

original: MSS_2876-1 aruṇodayavelāyāṃ daśāhena phalaṃ labhet /
analyzed: aruṇa udaya velāyām daśa ahena phalam labhet

original: MSS_2876-2 govisarjanavelāyāṃ sadyaḥ phalada iṣyate //
analyzed: go visarjana velāyām sadyas phala daḥ iṣyate

original: MSS_2877-1 arundhatīkāmapuraṃdhrilakṣmī- jambhadviṣaddāranavāmbikānām /
MSS_2877-2 caturdaśīyaṃ tadihocitaiva gulphadvayāptā yadadṛśyasiddhiḥ //
analyzed: caturdaśī iyam tat iha ucitā eva gulpha dvaya āptā yat adṛśya siddhiḥ

original: MSS_2878-1 aruṣyan kruśyamānasya sukṛtaṃ nāma vindati /
analyzed: aruṣyan kruśyamānasya sukṛtam nāma vindati

original: MSS_2878-2 duṣkṛtaṃ cātmano marṣī ruṣyatyevāpamārṣṭi vai //
analyzed: duṣkṛtam ca ātmanaḥ marṣī ruṣyati eva apamārṣṭi vai

original: MSS_2879-1 arūpo'pi surūpo'pi āḍhyo'pi dravyavarjitaḥ /
analyzed: arūpaḥ api surūpaḥ api āḍhyaḥ api dravya varjitaḥ

original: MSS_2879-2 duḥśīlaḥ śīlayukto vā strīṇāṃ bhartādhidevatā //
analyzed: duḥśīlaḥ śīla yuktaḥ vā strīṇām bhartā adhidevatā

original: MSS_2880-1 are cetomatsya bhramaṇamadhunā yauvanajale tyaja tvaṃ svacchandaṃ yuvatijaladhau paśyasi na kim /
analyzed: are cetaḥ matsya bhramaṇam adhunā yauvana jale tyaja tvam svacchandam yuvati jaladhau paśyasi na kim

original: MSS_2880-2 tanūjālījālaṃ stanayugalatumbīphalayutaṃ manobhūḥ kaivartaḥ kṣipati ratitantu pratimuhuḥ //
analyzed: tanū jālī jālam stana yugala tumbī phala yutam manobhūḥ kaivartaḥ kṣipati rati tantu pratimuhur

original: MSS_2881-1 are daiva tvadāyattaṃ kāmaṃ vittādi gacchatu /
analyzed: are daiva tvad āyattam kāmam vitta ādi gacchatu

original: MSS_2881-2 mamāyattaṃ punarvṛttaṃ hartuṃ kasyeha yogyatā //
analyzed: mama āyattam punar vṛttam hartum kasya iha yogyatā

original: MSS_2882-1 are yamabhaṭāḥ śaṭhāḥ kapaṭavigrahe tūdbhaṭā nivedayata vo yamaṃ na ca tavādhikāro mayi /
analyzed: are yama bhaṭāḥ śaṭhāḥ kapaṭa vigrahe tu udbhaṭāḥ nivedayata vaḥ yamam na ca tava adhikāraḥ mayi

original: MSS_2882-2 ahaṃ ca śivasundarīcaraṇayugmapaṅkeruha- skhalanmadhusudhārasaṃ samapibaṃ na jānītha re //
analyzed: aham ca śivasundarī caraṇa yugma paṅkeruha skhalat madhu sudhā rasam samapibam na jānītha re

original: MSS_2883-1 are rāmāhastābharaṇa bhasalaśreṇiśaraṇa smarakrīḍāvrīḍāśamana virahiprāṇadamana /
analyzed: are rāmā hasta ābharaṇa bhasala śreṇi śaraṇa smara krīḍā vrīḍā śamana virahi prāṇa damana

original: MSS_2883-2 sarohaṃsottaṃsa pracaladala nīlotpala sakhe sakhedo'haṃ mohaṃ ślathaya kathaya kvenduvadana //
analyzed: saraḥ haṃsa uttaṃsa pracala dala nīlotpala sakhe moham ślathaya kathaya kva indu vadana

original: MSS_2884-1 are vada harernāma kṣemadhāma kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
analyzed: are vada hareḥ nāma kṣema dhāma kṣaṇe kṣaṇe

original: MSS_2884-2 bahiḥ sarati niḥśvāse viśvāsaḥ kaḥ pravartate //
analyzed: bahis sarati niḥśvāse viśvāsaḥ kaḥ pravartate

original: MSS_2885-1 araiḥ saṃdhāryate nābhir nābhau cārāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
analyzed: araiḥ saṃdhāryate nābhiḥ nābhau ca arāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: MSS_2885-2 svāmisevakayorevaṃ vṛtticakraṃ pravartate //
analyzed: svāmi sevakayoḥ evam vṛtti cakram pravartate

original: MSS_2886-1 arodi madhupairbhṛśaṃ kamalamālayā mīlitaṃ vyakampi jalavīcibhirvidalitaṃ mukhaṃ kairavaiḥ /
analyzed: arodi madhupaiḥ bhṛśam kamala mālayā mīlitam vyakampi jala vīcibhiḥ vidalitam mukham kairavaiḥ

original: MSS_2886-2 vilokya rajanau hrade virahikokaśokaṃ ghanaṃ paravyasanakātarāḥ kimiva kurvate sādhavaḥ //
analyzed: vilokya rajanau hrade virahi koka śokam ghanam para vyasana kātarāḥ kim iva kurvate sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_2887-1 arkakarpāsayormūlaṃ jalapītaṃ jayedviṣam /
MSS_2887-2 paṭolamūlanasyena kāladaṣṭo'pi jīvati //
analyzed: paṭola mūla nasyena kāla daṣṭaḥ api jīvati

original: MSS_2888-1 arkacchāyaṃ tirayati sudhāliptavidyunmatallī cakraprakhyaṃ mahati suṣamāmaṇḍale dūramagnam /
analyzed: arka chāyam tirayati sudhā lipta vidyunmatallī cakra prakhyam mahati suṣamā maṇḍale dūra magnam

original: MSS_2888-2 raktādarśapratiphalamiva śrīsadaṅgaṃ vahantī dṛṣṭā kācit taralanayanā devateva smarasya //
analyzed: rakta ādarśa pratiphalam iva śrī sat aṅgam vahantī dṛṣṭā kācid tarala nayanā devatā iva smarasya

original: MSS_2889-1 arkāḥ kiṃ phalasaṃcayena bhavatāṃ kiṃ vaḥ prasūnairnavaiḥ kiṃ vā bhūrilatācayena mahatā gotreṇa kiṃ bhūyasā /
analyzed: arkāḥ kim phala saṃcayena bhavatām kim vaḥ prasūnaiḥ navaiḥ kim vā bhūri latā cayena mahatā gotreṇa kim bhūyasā

original: MSS_2889-2 yeṣāmekatamo babhūva sa punarnaivāsti kaścit kule chāyāyāmupaviśya yasya pathikāstṛptiṃ phalaiḥ kurvate //
analyzed: yeṣām ekatamaḥ babhūva sa punar na eva asti kaścid kule chāyāyām upaviśya yasya pathikāḥ tṛptim phalaiḥ kurvate

original: MSS_2890-1 arkāḥ kecana kecidakṣataravaḥ keciddalakṣmāruhāḥ nimbāḥ kecana kecidatra vipine krūrāḥ karīradrumāḥ /
analyzed: arkāḥ kecana kecid akṣa taravaḥ kecid dala kṣmāruhāḥ nimbāḥ kecana kecid atra vipine krūrāḥ karīra drumāḥ

original: MSS_2890-2 mākando makarandatundilamiladbhṛṅgāliśṛṅgāritaḥ ko'pyatrāsti na mitra yatra tanute karṇāmṛtaṃ kokilaḥ //
analyzed: mākandaḥ makaranda tundila milat bhṛṅga ali śṛṅgāritaḥ kopī atra asti na mitra yatra tanute karṇa amṛtam kokilaḥ

original: MSS_2891-1 arkābhimukhyasalilasthitisādhanāni raktāmbujasya phalitānyadhunā tapāṃsi /
analyzed: arka ābhimukhya salila sthiti sādhanāni rakta ambujasya phalitāni adhunā tapāṃsi

original: MSS_2891-2 yadbhīru tasya paribhūtikaraṃ padaṃ tvaṃ lākṣārasāntaritarāgamidaṃ karoṣi //
analyzed: yat bhīru tasya paribhūti karam padam tvam lākṣā rasa antarita rāgam idam karoṣi

original: MSS_2892-1 arghāyāmbudhirindumaṇḍalamapi śrīcandanaṃ taṇḍulās tārā bilvadalaṃ nabhaḥsuradhunī dhūpaḥ pradīpo raviḥ /
analyzed: arghāya ambudhiḥ indu maṇḍalam api śrī candanam taṇḍulāḥ tārā bilva dalam nabhaḥ suradhunī dhūpaḥ pradīpaḥ raviḥ

original: MSS_2892-2 kheṭāḥ pañcaphalāni kiṃ ca kakubhastāmbūlamārātrikaṃ meruḥ śrījagatīpate tava yaśoyogeśvarasyārcane //
analyzed: kheṭāḥ pañcaphalāni kim ca kakubhaḥ tāmbūlam ārātrikam meruḥ śrī jagatīpate tava yaśaḥ yogeśvarasya arcane

original: MSS_2893-1 arghyaṃ dattvātha devāya bhāskarāya samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: arghyam dattvā atha devāya bhāskarāya samāhitaḥ

original: MSS_2893-2 tato'laṃkṛtagātraḥ san vṛttamālokya mantravat //
analyzed: tatas ulaṃkṛta gātraḥ san vṛttam ālokya mantravat

original: MSS_2894-1 arghyamarghyamiti vādinaṃ nṛpaṃ so'navekṣya bharatāgrajo yataḥ /
analyzed: arghyam arghyam iti vādinam nṛpam bharatāgrajaḥ yatas

original: MSS_2894-2 kṣatrakopadahanārciṣaṃ tataḥ saṃdadhe dṛśamudagratārakām //
analyzed: kṣatra kopa dahana   tatas saṃdadhe dṛśam udagra tārakām

original: MSS_2895-1 arcakasya tapoyogād arcanasyātiśāyanāt /
analyzed: arcakasya tapaḥ yogāt arcanasya atiśāyanāt

original: MSS_2895-2 ābhirūpyācca mūrtīnāṃ devaḥ sāṃnidhyamṛcchati //
analyzed: ābhirūpyāt ca mūrtīnām devaḥ sāṃnidhyam ṛcchati

original: MSS_2896-1 arcāmaḥ satataṃ gaṇādhipamathāpyākhūn nihanmaḥ śataṃ dhyāyāmo hṛdi bhairavaṃ tadapi tu protsārayāmaḥ śunaḥ /
analyzed: arcāmaḥ satatam gaṇādhipam atha api ākhūn nihanmaḥ śatam dhyāyāmaḥ hṛdi bhairavam tat api tu protsārayāmaḥ śunaḥ

original: MSS_2896-2 bhūteśaṃ praṇumastathāpi śataśo bhūtān nigṛhṇīmahe nahyekasya guṇaḥ parasya mahato doṣānapi prorṇute //
analyzed: bhūteśam praṇumaḥ tathā api śataśas bhūtān nigṛhṇīmahe na hi ekasya guṇaḥ parasya mahataḥ doṣān api prorṇute

original: MSS_2897-1 arcāmīti dhiyā yadeva kusumaṃ kṣiptvā jano mucyate vidhyāmīti dhiyā tadeva vikiran bhasmīkṛto manmathaḥ /
analyzed: arcāmi iti dhiyā yat eva kusumam kṣiptvā janaḥ mucyate vidhyāmi iti dhiyā tat eva vikiran bhasmīkṛtaḥ manmathaḥ

original: MSS_2897-2 ityābhyantaravṛttimātrarasiko bāhyānapekṣaśca yaḥ sa svāmī mama daivataṃ taditaro nāmnāpi nāmnāyate //
analyzed: iti ābhyantara vṛtti mātra rasikaḥ bāhya anapekṣaḥ ca yaḥ sa svāmī mama daivatam tad itaraḥ nāmnā api nāmnā āyate

original: MSS_2898-1 arcirmālākarālāddivamabhilihato dāvavahneradūrād uḍḍīyoḍḍīya kiṃcicchalabhakavalanānandamandapracārāḥ /
analyzed: arciḥ mālā karālāt divam abhilihataḥ dāva vahneḥ adūrāt uḍḍīya uḍḍīya kiṃcid śalabha kavalana ānanda manda pracārāḥ

original: MSS_2898-2 agre'gre saṃraṭantaḥ pracurataramasīpātadurlakṣadhūmrā dhūmyāṭāḥ paryaṭanti prativiṭapamamī niṣṭhurāḥ svasthalīṣu //
analyzed: agra agre saṃraṭantaḥ pracuratara masī pāta durlakṣa dhūmrāḥ dhūmyāṭāḥ paryaṭanti prati viṭapam amī niṣṭhurāḥ sva sthalīṣu

original: MSS_2899-1 arciṣmanti vidārya vaktrakuharāṇyāsṛkkaṇo vāsukes tarjanyā viṣakarburān gaṇayataḥ saṃspṛśya dantāṅkurān /
analyzed: arciṣmanti vidārya vaktra kuharāṇyā asṛkkaṇaḥ vāsukeḥ tarjanyāḥ viṣa karburān gaṇayataḥ saṃspṛśya danta aṅkurān

original: MSS_2899-2 ekaṃ trīṇi navāṣṭa sapta ṣaḍiti vyastāstasaṃkhyākramā vācaḥ śaktidharasya śaiśavakalāḥ kurvantu vo maṅgalam //
analyzed: ekam trīṇi nava aṣṭa sapta ṣaṣ iti vyastāḥ tad saṃkhyā kramāḥ vācaḥ śaktidharasya śaiśava kalāḥ kurvantu vaḥ maṅgalam

original: MSS_2900-1 arcye viṣṇau śilādhīrguruṣu naramatirvaiṣṇave jātibuddhir viṣṇorvā vaiṣṇavānāṃ kalimalamathane pādatīrthe'mbubuddhiḥ /
analyzed: arcye viṣṇau śilā dhīḥ guruṣu nara matiḥ vaiṣṇave jāti buddhiḥ viṣṇoḥ vā vaiṣṇavānām kali mala mathane pāda tīrtha imbu buddhiḥ

original: MSS_2900-2 śrīviṣṇornāmni mantre sakalakaluṣahe śabdasāmānyabuddhir viṣṇau sarveśvareśe taditarasamadhīryasya vā nārakī saḥ //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇoḥ nāmni mantre sakala kaluṣa he śabda sāmānya buddhiḥ viṣṇau sarva īśvara īśe tad itara samadhīḥ yasya vā nārakī saḥ

original: MSS_2901-1 arjayejjñānamarthāṃśca pumānamaravat sadā /
analyzed: arjayet jñānam arthān ca pumān amara vat sadā

original: MSS_2901-2 keśeṣviva gṛhītaḥ san mṛtyunā dharmamācaret //
analyzed: keśeṣu iva gṛhītaḥ san mṛtyunā dharmam ācaret

original: MSS_2902-1 arjitaṃ svena vīryeṇa nānyamāśritya kaṃcana /
analyzed: arjitam svena vīryeṇa na anyam āśritya kaṃcana

original: MSS_2902-2 phalaśākamapi śreyo bhoktuṃ hyakṛpaṇaṃ gṛhe //
analyzed: phala śākam api śreyaḥ bhoktum hi akṛpaṇam gṛhe

original: MSS_2903-1 parasya nu gṛhe bhoktuḥ paribhūtasya nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: parasya nu gṛhe bhoktuḥ paribhūtasya nityaśas

original: MSS_2903-2 sumṛṣṭamapi na śreyo vikalpo'yamataḥ satām //
analyzed: su mṛṣṭam api na śreyaḥ vikalpaḥ yam atas satām

original: MSS_2904-1 arjunaḥ kṛṣṇasaṃyuktaḥ karṇaṃ yatrānudhāvati /
analyzed: arjunaḥ kṛṣṇa saṃyuktaḥ karṇam yatra anudhāvati

original: MSS_2904-2 tannetraṃ tu kurukṣetram iti mugdhe mṛśāmahe //
analyzed: tad netram tu kurukṣetram iti mugdhe mṛśāmahe

original: MSS_2905-1 arjunaḥ phalgunaḥ pārthaḥ kirīṭī śvetavāhanaḥ /
MSS_2905-2 bībhatsurvijayī kṛṣṇaḥ savyasācī dhanaṃjayaḥ //
analyzed: bībhatsuḥ vijayī kṛṣṇaḥ savyasācī dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: MSS_2906-1 arjunasya ime bāṇā neme bāṇāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ /
analyzed: arjunasya ime bāṇāḥ na ime bāṇāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ

original: MSS_2906-2 sīdanti mama gātrāṇi māghamā segavā iva //
analyzed: sīdanti mama gātrāṇi māghamā segavāḥ iva

original: MSS_2907-1 arjunasya pratijñe dve na dainyaṃ na palāyanam /
analyzed: arjunasya pratijñe dve na dainyam na palāyanam

original: MSS_2907-2 āyū rakṣati marmāṇi āyurannaṃ prayacchati //
analyzed: āyuḥ rakṣati marmāṇi āyuḥ annam prayacchati

original: MSS_2908-1 arjunānte varārohe bhīmānte ca varānane /
analyzed: arjuna ante varārohe bhīma ante ca varānane

original: MSS_2908-2 pāṇḍavaiḥ saha yoddhavyaṃ rakṣaṇīyo dhanaṃjayaḥ //
analyzed: pāṇḍavaiḥ saha yoddhavyam rakṣaṇīyaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: MSS_2909-1 arjunīyati yadarjane jano varjanīyajanatarjanādibhiḥ /
analyzed: arjunīyati yat arjane janaḥ varjanīya jana tarjana ādibhiḥ

original: MSS_2909-2 maṅkṣu naśyati cirāya saṃcitā vañcitā jagati ke na saṃpadā //
analyzed: naśyati cirāya saṃcitā vañcitāḥ jagati ke na saṃpadā

original: MSS_2910-1 arthaṃ dhigastu bahuvairikaraṃ narāṇāṃ rājyaṃ dhigastu bhayadaṃ bahu cintanīyam /
analyzed: artham dhik astu bahu vairi karam narāṇām rājyam dhik astu bhaya dam bahu cintanīyam

original: MSS_2910-2 svargaṃ dhigastu punarāgamanapravṛttiṃ dhig dhik śarīramapi rogasamāśrayaṃ ca //
analyzed: svargam dhik astu punarāgamana pravṛttim dhik dhik śarīram api roga samāśrayam ca

original: MSS_2911-1 arthaṃ mahāntamāsādya vidyāmaiśvaryameva vā /
analyzed: artham mahāntam āsādya vidyām aiśvaryam eva vā

original: MSS_2911-2 vicaratyasamunnaddho yaḥ sa paṇḍita ucyate //
analyzed: vicarati asamunnaddhaḥ yaḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_2912-1 arthaṃ sapratibandhaṃ prabhuradhigantuṃ sahāyavāneva /
analyzed: artham sa pratibandham prabhuḥ adhigantum sahāyavān eva

original: MSS_2912-2 dṛśyaṃ tamasi na paśyati dīpena vinā sacakṣurapi //
analyzed: dṛśyam tamasi na paśyati dīpena vinā sa cakṣuḥ api

original: MSS_2913-1 arthaḥ kāmo dharmo mokṣaḥ sarve bhavanti puruṣasya /
analyzed: arthaḥ kāmaḥ dharmaḥ mokṣaḥ sarve bhavanti puruṣasya

original: MSS_2913-2 tāvadyāvat pīḍāṃ jāṭharavahnirna vidadhāti //
analyzed: tāvat yāvat pīḍām jāṭhara vahniḥ na vidadhāti

original: MSS_2914-1 arthaḥ sukhaṃ kīrtirapīha mā bhūd anartha evāstu tathāpi dhīrāḥ /
analyzed: arthaḥ sukham kīrtiḥ api iha mā bhūt anarthaḥ evā astu tathā api dhīrāḥ

original: MSS_2914-2 nijapratijñāmanurudhyamānā mahodyamāḥ karmasamārabhante //
analyzed: nija pratijñām anurudhyamānāḥ mahā udyamāḥ karma samārabhante

original: MSS_2915-1 artha eva hi keṣāṃcid anartho bhavitā nṛṇām /
analyzed: arthaḥ eva hi keṣāṃcid anarthaḥ bhavitā nṛṇām

original: MSS_2915-2 arthaśreyasi cāsakto na śreyo vindate naraḥ //
analyzed: artha śreyasi ca āsaktaḥ na śreyaḥ vindate naraḥ

original: MSS_2916-1 arthagrahaṇe na tathā dunoti kaṭukūjitairyathā piśunaḥ /
analyzed: artha grahaṇe na tathā dunoti kaṭu kūjitaiḥ yathā piśunaḥ

original: MSS_2916-2 rudhirādānādadhikaṃ dunoti karṇe kvaṇan maśakaḥ //
analyzed: rudhira ādānāt adhikam dunoti karṇe kvaṇan maśakaḥ

original: MSS_2917-1 arthajñāt saṃśayacchettā tataḥ śreyān svakarmakṛt /
analyzed: artha jñāt saṃśaya chettā tatas śreyān sva karma kṛt

original: MSS_2917-2 muktasaṅgastato bhūyān adogdhā dharmamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: mukta saṅgaḥ tatas bhūyān adogdhā dharmam ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_2918-1 arthatyāgo hi kāryaḥ syād arthaṃ śreyāṃsamicchatā /
analyzed: artha tyāgaḥ hi kāryaḥ syāt artham śreyāṃsam icchatā

original: MSS_2918-2 bījaupamyena kaunteya mā te bhūdatra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: bīja aupamyena kaunteya mā te bhūt atra saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_2919-1 arthadharmau parityajya yaḥ kāmamanuvartate /
analyzed: artha dharmau parityajya yaḥ kāmam anuvartate

original: MSS_2919-2 evamāpadyate kṣipraṃ rājā daśaratho yathā //
analyzed: evam āpadyate kṣipram rājā daśarathaḥ yathā

original: MSS_2920-1 arthanāśaṃ manastāpaṃ gṛhe duścaritāni ca /
analyzed: artha nāśam manaḥ tāpam gṛhe duścaritāni ca

original: MSS_2920-2 vañcanaṃ cāpamānaṃ ca matimān na prakāśayet //
analyzed: vañcanam ca apamānam ca matimān na prakāśayet

original: MSS_2921-1 arthapatau bhūmipatau bāle vṛddhe tapo'dhike viduṣi /
analyzed: arthapatau bhūmipatau bāle vṛddhe tapodhike viduṣi

original: MSS_2921-2 yoṣiti mūrkhe guruṣu ca viduṣā naivottaraṃ deyam //
analyzed: yoṣiti mūrkhe guruṣu ca viduṣā nā evā uttaram deyam

original: MSS_2922-1 arthapraśnakṛtau loke sulabhau tau gṛhe gṛhe /
analyzed: artha praśna kṛtau loke sulabhau tau gṛhe gṛhe

original: MSS_2922-2 dātā cottaradaścaiva durlabhau puruṣau bhuvi //
analyzed: dātā ca uttara daḥ ca eva durlabhau puruṣau bhuvi

original: MSS_2923-1 arthaprāṇavināśasaṃśayakarīṃ prāpyāpadaṃ dustarāṃ pratyāsannabhayo na vetti vibhavaṃ svaṃ jīvitaṃ kāṅkṣati /
analyzed: artha prāṇa vināśa saṃśaya karīm prāpya āpadam dustarām pratyāsanna bhayaḥ na vetti vibhavam svam jīvitam kāṅkṣati

original: MSS_2923-2 uttīrṇastu tato dhanārthamaparāṃ bhūyo viśatyāpadaṃ prāṇānāṃ ca dhanasya cādhamadhiyāmanyonyahetuḥ paṇaḥ //
analyzed: uttīrṇaḥ tu tatas dhana artham aparām bhūyas viśati āpadam prāṇānām ca dhanasya ca adhama dhiyām anyonya hetuḥ paṇaḥ

original: MSS_2924-1 arthapriyatayātmānam apriyāya dadāti yā /
analyzed: artha priya tayā ātmānam apriyāya dadāti yā

original: MSS_2924-2 kāmātmanyapi niḥsnehāṃ ko'nurakteti manyate //
analyzed: kām ātmani api niḥsnehām kaḥ nuraktā iti manyate

original: MSS_2925-1 arthamanarthaṃ bhāvaya nityaṃ nāsti tataḥ sukhaleśaḥ satyam /
analyzed: artham anartham bhāvaya nityam na asti tatas sukha leśaḥ satyam

original: MSS_2925-2 putrādapi dhanabhājāṃ bhītiḥ sarvatraiṣā vihitā rītiḥ //
analyzed: putrāt api dhana bhājām bhītiḥ sarvatra eṣā vihitā rītiḥ

original: MSS_2926-1 arthayuktasya karaṇam anarthasya ca varjanam /
analyzed: artha yuktasya karaṇam anarthasya ca varjanam

original: MSS_2926-2 nyāyataśca karādānaṃ svayaṃ ca pratimokṣaṇam //
analyzed: nyāyataḥ ca kara ādānam svayam ca pratimokṣaṇam

original: MSS_2927-1 arthayuktimavijñāya yaḥ śubhe kurute matim /
analyzed: artha yuktim a vijñāya yaḥ śubhe kurute matim

original: MSS_2927-2 mitre vā yadi vā śatrau tasyāpi calitā matiḥ //
analyzed: mitre vā yadi vā śatrau tasya api calitā matiḥ

original: MSS_2928-1 arthayedeva mitrāṇi sati vāsati vā dhane /
analyzed: arthayet eva mitrāṇi sati vā asati vā dhane

original: MSS_2928-2 nānarthayan vijānāti mitrāṇāṃ sāraphalgutām //
analyzed: na anarthayan vijānāti mitrāṇām sāra phalgu tām

original: MSS_2929-1 artharakṣāparo bhṛtyaḥ kṛtyākṛtyavivekavit /
MSS_2929-2 sāndhivigrahikaḥ kāryo rājñā nayaviśāradaḥ //
analyzed: sāndhivigrahikaḥ kāryaḥ rājñā naya viśāradaḥ

original: MSS_2930-1 arthavantaḥ praśasyante nindyante tadvinākṛtāḥ /
analyzed: arthavantaḥ praśasyante nindyante tad vinākṛtāḥ

original: MSS_2930-2 āgemeṣvapi cedevam adbhutaṃ kiṃ śarīriṣu //
analyzed: āgemeṣu api ced evam adbhutam kim śarīriṣu

original: MSS_2931-1 arthavānarthamarthibhyo na dadātyatra ko guṇaḥ /
analyzed: arthavān artham arthibhyaḥ na dadāti atra kaḥ guṇaḥ

original: MSS_2931-2 ekaiva gatirarthasya dānamanyā vipattayaḥ //
analyzed: ekā eva gatiḥ arthasya dānam anyāḥ vipattayaḥ

original: MSS_2932-1 arthavāneva loke'smin pūjyate mitrabāndhavaiḥ /
analyzed: arthavān eva loke ismin pūjyate mitra bāndhavaiḥ

original: MSS_2932-2 arthahīnastu puruṣo jīvannapi mṛtopamaḥ //
analyzed: artha hīnaḥ tu puruṣaḥ jīvan api mṛta upamaḥ

original: MSS_2933-1 arthavān duṣkulīno'pi loke pūjyatamo naraḥ /
analyzed: arthavān duṣkulīnaḥ api loke pūjyatamaḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_2933-2 śaśinastulyavaṃśo'pi nirdhanaḥ paribhūyate //
analyzed: śaśinaḥ tulya vaṃśaḥ api nirdhanaḥ paribhūyate

original: MSS_2934-1 arthaścet sarvathā rakṣya iti kaiścidudāhṛtam /
analyzed: arthaḥ ced sarvathā rakṣyaḥ iti kaiścid udāhṛtam

original: MSS_2934-2 tatkathaṃ na hariścandro'rakṣat kuśikanandane //
analyzed: tat katham na kuśika nandane

original: MSS_2935-1 dharmastu rakṣitaḥ sarvair api dehavyayena ca /
analyzed: dharmaḥ tu rakṣitaḥ sarvaiḥ api deha vyayena ca

original: MSS_2935-2 śibiprabhṛtibhūpālair dadhīcipramukhairdvijaiḥ //
analyzed: śibi prabhṛti bhūpālaiḥ dadhīci pramukhaiḥ dvijaiḥ

original: MSS_2936-1 arthasaṃpadvimohāya bahuśokāya caiva hi /
analyzed: artha saṃpad vimohāya bahu śokāya ca eva hi

original: MSS_2936-2 tasmādarthamanarthakyaṃ śreyo'rthī dūratastyajet //
analyzed: tasmāt artham anarthakyam śreyaḥ arthī dūratas tyajet

original: MSS_2937-1 arthasaṃpādanārthaṃ ca pīḍyamānasya śatrubhiḥ /
analyzed: artha saṃpādana artham ca pīḍyamānasya śatrubhiḥ

original: MSS_2937-2 sādhuṣu vyapadeśārthaṃ dvividhaḥ saṃśrayaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: sādhuṣu vyapadeśa artham dvividhaḥ saṃśrayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_2938-1 arthasiddhiṃ parāmicchan dharmamevāditaścaret /
analyzed: artha siddhim parām icchan dharmam eva āditas caret

original: MSS_2938-2 nahi dharmādapaityarthaḥ svargalokādivāmṛtam //
analyzed: nahi dharmāt apaiti arthaḥ svarga lokāt iva amṛtam

original: MSS_2939-1 arthasya niścayo dṛṣṭo vicāreṇa hitoktitaḥ /
analyzed: arthasya niścayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ vicāreṇa hita uktitaḥ

original: MSS_2939-2 na snānena na dānena prāṇāyāmaśatena vā //
analyzed: na snānena na dānena prāṇāyāma śatena vā

original: MSS_2940-1 arthasya puruṣo dāsaḥ sa ca jātu na kasyacit /
analyzed: arthasya puruṣaḥ dāsaḥ sa ca jātu na kasyacid

original: MSS_2940-2 yadarjanaparā loke sarve'pi bhuvanatraye //
analyzed: yad arjana parāḥ loke sarve api bhuvanatraye

original: MSS_2941-1 arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsastvartho na kasyacit /
analyzed: arthasya puruṣaḥ dāsaḥ dāsaḥ tu arthaḥ na kasyacid

original: MSS_2941-2 iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho'smyarthena kauravaiḥ //
analyzed: iti satyam mahā rāja baddhaḥ asmi arthena kauravaiḥ

original: MSS_2942-1 arthasya mūlaṃ prakṛtirnayaśca dharmasya kāruṇyamakaitavaṃ ca /
analyzed: arthasya mūlam prakṛtiḥ nayaḥ ca dharmasya kāruṇyam akaitavam ca

original: MSS_2942-2 kāmasya vittaṃ ca vapurvayaśca mokṣasya sarvārthanivṛttireva //
analyzed: kāmasya vittam ca vapuḥ vayaḥ ca mokṣasya sarva artha nivṛttiḥ eva

original: MSS_2943-1 arthasya saṃgrahe caināṃ vyaye caiva niyojayet /
analyzed: arthasya saṃgrahe ca enām vyaye ca eva niyojayet

original: MSS_2943-2 śauce dharme'nnapaktyāṃ ca pāriṇāhyasya cekṣaṇe //
analyzed: śauce ca pāriṇāhyasya ca īkṣaṇe

original: MSS_2944-1 arthasya sadotthānaṃ niyamaparīpālanaṃ kriyājñānam /
analyzed: arthasya sadā utthānam niyama parīpālanam kriyā jñānam

original: MSS_2944-2 sthānatyāgaḥ paṭutā- 'nudvegaḥ strīṣvaviśvāsaḥ //
analyzed: sthāna tyāgaḥ paṭu tā na udvegaḥ strīṣu aviśvāsaḥ

original: MSS_2945-1 arthasya sādhane siddha utkarṣe rakṣaṇe vyaye /
analyzed: arthasya sādhane siddhe utkarṣe rakṣaṇe vyaye

original: MSS_2945-2 nāśopabhoga āyāsas trāsaścintā bhramo nṛṇām //
analyzed: nāśa upabhogaḥ āyāsaḥ trāsaḥ cintā bhramaḥ nṛṇām

original: MSS_2946-1 arthasyānarthapūrṇasya ko'vasīdatu saṃgrahe /
analyzed: arthasya anartha pūrṇasya saṃgrahe

original: MSS_2946-2 tatsaṃtuṣṭairnnacediṣṭair duṣṭaiḥ syānnayanotsavaḥ //
analyzed: tad saṃtuṣṭaiḥ na ced iṣṭaiḥ duṣṭaiḥ syāt nayana utsavaḥ

original: MSS_2947-1 arthasyopārjanaṃ kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭamasya gṛhāgamaḥ /
analyzed: arthasya upārjanam kaṣṭam kaṣṭam asya gṛha āgamaḥ

original: MSS_2947-2 tasyāgatasya bandhubhyo viniyogaḥ sukhāvahaḥ //
analyzed: tasya āgatasya bandhubhyaḥ viniyogaḥ sukha āvahaḥ

original: MSS_2948-1 arthasyopārjanaṃ kṛtvā naivābhāgyaḥ samaśnute /
analyzed: arthasya upārjanam kṛtvā na eva abhāgyaḥ samaśnute

original: MSS_2948-2 araṇyaṃ mahadāsādya mūḍhaḥ somilako yathā //
analyzed: araṇyam mahat āsādya mūḍhaḥ somilakaḥ yathā

original: MSS_2949-1 arthasyopārjane duḥkhaṃ pālane ca kṣaye tathā /
analyzed: arthasya upārjane duḥkham pālane ca kṣaye tathā

original: MSS_2949-2 nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ ghnanti caivārthakāraṇāt //
analyzed: nāśe duḥkham vyaye duḥkham ghnanti ca eva artha kāraṇāt

original: MSS_2950-1 arthahīno'pi madhuraḥ śabdo lokapriyaṃkaraḥ /
analyzed: artha hīnaḥ api madhuraḥ śabdaḥ loka priyaṃkaraḥ

original: MSS_2950-2 vīṇāveṇumṛdaṅgādīny atrodāharaṇāni naḥ //
analyzed: vīṇā veṇu mṛdaṅga ādīni atra udāharaṇāni naḥ

original: MSS_2951-1 arthāṃśca durlabhāṃlloke kleśāṃśca sulabhāṃstathā /
analyzed: arthān ca durlabhān loke kleśān ca sulabhān tathā

original: MSS_2951-2 duḥkhaṃ caiva kuṭumbārthe yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate //
analyzed: duḥkham ca eva kuṭumba arthe yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate

original: MSS_2952-1 arthāṃstyajata pātrebhyaḥ sutān prāpnuta kāmajān /
analyzed: arthān tyajata pātrebhyaḥ sutān prāpnuta kāma jān

original: MSS_2952-2 priyaṃ priyebhyaścarata rājā hi tvarate jaye //
analyzed: priyam priyebhyaḥ carata rājā hi tvarate jaye

original: MSS_2953-1 arthāḥ khalu samṛddhā hi bāḍhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānatām /
analyzed: arthāḥ khalu samṛddhāḥ hi bāḍham duḥkham vijānatām

original: MSS_2953-2 asamṛddhāstvapi sadā mohayantyavicakṣaṇān //
analyzed: asamṛddhāḥ tu api sadā mohayanti avicakṣaṇān

original: MSS_2954-1 arthāḥ pādarajopamā girinadīvegopamaṃ yauvanaṃ mānuṣyaṃ jalabindulolacapalaṃ phenopamaṃ jīvanam /
analyzed: arthāḥ pāda raja upamāḥ giri nadī vega upamam yauvanam mānuṣyam jala bindu lola capalam phena upamam jīvanam

original: MSS_2954-2 dharmaṃ yo na karoti niścalamatiḥ svargārgalodghāṭanaṃ paścāttāpahato jarāpariṇataḥ śokāgninā dahyate //
analyzed: dharmam yaḥ na karoti niścala matiḥ svarga argala udghāṭanam paścāt tāpa hataḥ jarā pariṇataḥ śoka agninā dahyate

original: MSS_2955-1 arthāḥ sādhāraṇā eva viyujyante svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: arthāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ eva viyujyante svabhāvataḥ

original: MSS_2955-2 mamatāṃ tyajatāṃ teṣu mahadutpadyate yaśaḥ //
analyzed: mamatām tyajatām teṣu mahat utpadyate yaśaḥ

original: MSS_2956-1 arthākṛṣṭadhiyaḥ padaṃ racayataḥ śabdāvadhānātmanaḥ saṃdhicchedavidhānanirgamavidhivyāpāramātanvataḥ /
analyzed: artha ākṛṣṭa dhiyaḥ padam racayataḥ śabda avadhāna ātmanaḥ saṃdhi cheda vidhāna nirgama vidhi vyāpāram ātanvataḥ

original: MSS_2956-2 mā māṃ kaścidiha grahīditi muhuḥ sāśaṅkamāpaśyataś caurasyeva kaverbhayaṃ bhavati yattadvidviṣāmastu vaḥ //
analyzed: mā mām kaścid iha grahīt iti muhur sa āśaṅkam āpaśyataḥ caurasya iva kaveḥ bhayam bhavati yat tat vidviṣām astu vaḥ

original: MSS_2957-1 arthāgamo nityamarogitā ca priyā ca bhāryā priyavādinī ca /
analyzed: artha āgamaḥ nityam arogi tā ca priyā ca bhāryā priya vādinī ca

original: MSS_2957-2 vaśyaśca putro'rthakarī ca vidyā ṣaḍ jīvalokasya sukhāni rājan //
analyzed: vaśyaḥ ca putraḥ ūrtha karī ca vidyā ṣaḍ jīva lokasya sukhāni rājan

original: MSS_2958-1 arthā gṛhe nivartante śmaśāne caiva bāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: arthāḥ gṛhe nivartante śmaśāne ca eva bāndhavāḥ

original: MSS_2958-2 sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi gacchantamanugacchati //
analyzed: sukṛtam duṣkṛtam ca api gacchantam anugacchati

original: MSS_2959-1 arthāturāṇāṃ na suhṛn na bandhuḥ kāmāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na lajjā /
analyzed: artha āturāṇām na suhṛd na bandhuḥ kāma āturāṇām na bhayam na lajjā

original: MSS_2959-2 vidyāturāṇāṃ na sukhaṃ na nidrā kṣudhāturāṇāṃ na vapurna tejaḥ //
analyzed: vidyā āturāṇām na sukham na nidrā kṣudhā āturāṇām na vapuḥ na tejaḥ

original: MSS_2960-1 arthāt palāyate jñānaṃ mārjārānmūṣiko yathā /
analyzed: arthāt palāyate jñānam mārjārāt mūṣikaḥ yathā

original: MSS_2960-2 vakavat jñāyatāmarthaḥ siṃhavacca jayedripum //
analyzed: vaka vat jñāyatām arthaḥ siṃha vat ca jayet ripum

original: MSS_2961-1 arthā duḥkhaṃ parityaktuṃ pālitāścāpi te'sukhāḥ /
analyzed: arthāḥ duḥkham parityaktum pālitāḥ ca api

original: MSS_2961-2 duḥkhena cādhigamyante teṣāṃ nāśaṃ na cintayet //
analyzed: duḥkhena ca adhigamyante teṣām nāśam na cintayet

original: MSS_2962-1 arthāddharmaśca kāmaśca svargaścaiva narādhipa /
analyzed: arthāt dharmaḥ ca kāmaḥ ca svargaḥ ca eva narādhipa

original: MSS_2962-2 prāṇayātrā hi lokasya vinārthaṃ na prasidhyati //
analyzed: prāṇayātrā hi lokasya vinā artham na prasidhyati

original: MSS_2963-1 arthād bhraṣṭastīrthayātrāṃ tu gacchet satyād mraṣṭo rauravaṃ vai vrajecca /
analyzed: arthāt bhraṣṭaḥ tīrthayātrām tu gacchet satyāt mraṣṭaḥ rauravam vai vrajet ca

original: MSS_2963-2 yogād bhraṣṭaḥ satyadhṛtiṃ ca gacched rājyād bhraṣṭo mṛgayāyāṃ vrajecca //
analyzed: yogāt bhraṣṭaḥ satya dhṛtim ca gacchet rājyāt bhraṣṭaḥ mṛgayāyām vrajet ca

original: MSS_2964-1 arthānarthāntare buddhir niścitāpi na śobhate /
analyzed: artha anartha antare buddhiḥ niścitā api na śobhate

original: MSS_2964-2 ghātayanti hi karyāṇi dūtāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ //
analyzed: ghātayanti hi karyāṇi dūtāḥ paṇḍita māninaḥ

original: MSS_2965-1 arthānarthau viniścitya vyavasāyaṃ bhajeta ha /
analyzed: artha anarthau viniścitya vyavasāyam bhajeta ha

original: MSS_2965-2 guṇataḥ saṃgrahaṃ kuryād doṣatastu visarjayet //
analyzed: guṇataḥ saṃgraham kuryāt doṣataḥ tu visarjayet

original: MSS_2966-1 arthā na santi na ca muñcati māṃ durāśā tyāge ratiṃ vahati durlalitaṃ mano me /
analyzed: arthāḥ na santi na ca muñcati mām durāśā tyāge ratim vahati durlalitam manaḥ me

original: MSS_2966-2 yācñā ca lāghavakarī svavadhe ca pāpaṃ prāṇāḥ svayaṃ vrajata kiṃ paridevanena //
analyzed: yācñā ca lāghava karī sva vadhe ca pāpam prāṇāḥ svayam vrajata kim paridevanena

original: MSS_2967-1 arthā na syuryadi vijahimo dharmamarthaikasādhyaṃ kāyakleśaiḥ katikatividhaḥ sādhanīyo na dharmaḥ /
analyzed: arthāḥ na syuḥ yadi vijahimaḥ dharmam artha eka sādhyam kāya kleśaiḥ kati katividhaḥ sādhanīyaḥ na dharmaḥ

original: MSS_2967-2 kāyaḥ śrānto yadi bhavati kastāvatā dharmalopaś cittaṃ dattvā sakṛdiva śive cintitaṃ sādhayāmaḥ //
analyzed: kāyaḥ śrāntaḥ yadi bhavati kaḥ tāvatā dharma lopaḥ cittam dattvā sakṛt iva śive cintitam sādhayāmaḥ

original: MSS_2968-1 arthānāmadhikānāṃ rājñā caureṇa vā nāśaḥ /
analyzed: arthānām adhikānām rājñā caureṇa vā nāśaḥ

original: MSS_2968-2 anne khalvatibhukte vamanaṃ vā syādvireko vā //
analyzed: anne khalu ati bhukte vamanam vā syāt virekaḥ vā

original: MSS_2969-1 arthānāmananuṣṭhātā kāmacārī vikatthanaḥ /
analyzed: arthānām ananuṣṭhātā kāma cārī vikatthanaḥ

original: MSS_2969-2 api sarvāṃ mahīṃ labdhvā kṣiprameva vinaśyati //
analyzed: api sarvām mahīm labdhvā kṣipram eva vinaśyati

original: MSS_2970-1 arthānāmarjanaṃ kāryaṃ vardhanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: arthānām arjanam kāryam vardhanam rakṣaṇam tathā

original: MSS_2970-2 bhakṣyamāṇo nirādāyaḥ sumerurapi hīyate //
analyzed: bhakṣyamāṇaḥ nirādāyaḥ sumeruḥ api hīyate

original: MSS_2971-1 arthānāmarjane duḥkham arjitānāṃ ca rakṣaṇe /
analyzed: arthānām arjane duḥkham arjitānām ca rakṣaṇe

original: MSS_2971-2 nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ dhigarthāḥ kaṣṭasaṃśrayāḥ //
analyzed: nāśe duḥkham vyaye duḥkham dhik arthāḥ kaṣṭa saṃśrayāḥ

original: MSS_2972-1 arthānāmārjanaṃ kāryaṃ vardhanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: arthānām āmārjanam kāryam vardhanam rakṣaṇam tathā

original: MSS_2972-2 bhakṣyamāṇo nirādāyaḥ kṣīyate himavānapi //
analyzed: bhakṣyamāṇaḥ nirādāyaḥ kṣīyate himavān api

original: MSS_2973-1 arthānāmīśiṣe tvaṃ vayamapi ca girāmīśmahe yāvaditthaṃ śūras tvaṃ vāgmidarpajvaraśamanavidhāvakṣayaṃ pāṭavaṃ naḥ /
analyzed: arthānām īśiṣe tvam vayam api ca girām īśmahe yāvat ittham śūraḥ tvam vāgmi darpa jvara śamana vidhau akṣayam pāṭavam naḥ

original: MSS_2973-2 sevante tvāṃ dhanāndhā matimalahataye māmapi śrotukāmā mayyapyāsthā na te cet tvayi mama sutarāmeṣa rājan gato'smi //
analyzed: sevante tvām dhana andhāḥ mati mala hataye mām api śrotu kāmāḥ mayi api āsthā na te ced tvayi mama sutarām eṣa rājan gataḥ asmi

original: MSS_2974-1 arthānāmīśvaro yaḥ syād indriyāṇāmanīśvaraḥ /
analyzed: arthānām īśvaraḥ yaḥ syāt indriyāṇām anīśvaraḥ

original: MSS_2974-2 indriyāṇāmanaiśvaryād aiśvaryād bhraśyate hi saḥ //
analyzed: indriyāṇām anaiśvaryāt aiśvaryāt bhraśyate hi saḥ

original: MSS_2975-1 arthānāharato'narthāḥ samāyānti pramādinaḥ /
analyzed: arthān āharataḥ narthāḥ samāyānti pramādinaḥ

original: MSS_2975-2 apramattastato mārge nityamevāstu vittavān //
analyzed: apramattaḥ tatas mārge nityam eva astu vittavān

original: MSS_2976-1 arthānulāpān vrajasundarīṇām akṛtrimāṇāṃ ca sarasvatīnām /
analyzed: artha anulāpān vrajasundarīṇām akṛtrimāṇām ca sarasvatīnām

original: MSS_2976-2 ārdrāśayena śravaṇāñcalena saṃbhāvayantaṃ taruṇaṃ gṛṇīmaḥ //
analyzed: ārdra āśayena śravaṇa añcalena saṃbhāvayantam taruṇam gṛṇīmaḥ

original: MSS_2977-1 arthān kecidupāsate kṛpaṇavat kecit tvalaṃkurvate veśyāvat khalu dhātuvādina ivodbadhnanti kecid rasān /
analyzed: arthān kecid upāsate kṛpaṇa vat kecid tu alaṃkurvate veśyā vat khalu dhātuvādinaḥ iva udbadhnanti kecid rasān

original: MSS_2977-2 arthālaṃkṛtisadrasadravamucāṃ vācāṃ praśastispṛśāṃ kartāraḥ kavayo bhavanti katicit puṇyairagaṇyairiha //
analyzed: artha alaṃkṛti sat rasa drava mucām vācām praśasti spṛśām kartāraḥ kavayaḥ bhavanti katicid puṇyaiḥ agaṇyaiḥ iha

original: MSS_2978-1 arthān brūyān na cāsatsu guṇān brūyān na cātmanaḥ /
analyzed: arthān brūyāt na ca asatsu guṇān brūyāt na ca ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_2978-2 ādadyān na ca sādhubhyo nāsatpuruṣamāśrayet //
analyzed: ādadyāt na ca sādhubhyaḥ na asat puruṣam āśrayet

original: MSS_2979-1 arthā bhāgyodaye jantuṃ viśanti śataśaḥ svayam /
analyzed: arthāḥ bhāgya udaye jantum viśanti śataśas svayam

original: MSS_2979-2 digbhyo'bhyupetya sarvābhyaḥ sāyaṃ tarumivāṇḍajāḥ //
analyzed: digbhyaḥ abhyupetya sarvābhyaḥ sāyam tarum iva aṇḍajāḥ

original: MSS_2980-1 arthābhāve tu yajjñānaṃ pratyakṣamiva dṛśyate /
analyzed: artha abhāve tu yat jñānam pratyakṣam iva dṛśyate

original: MSS_2980-2 gandharvanagarākāraṃ svapnaṃ tadupalakṣayet //
analyzed: gandharvanagara ākāram svapnam tat upalakṣayet

original: MSS_2981-1 arthābhāve mṛdutā kāṭhinyaṃ bhavati cārthabāhulye /
analyzed: artha abhāve mṛdu tā kāṭhinyam bhavati ca artha bāhulye

original: MSS_2981-2 naikatrārthamṛdutve prāyaḥ śloke ca loke ca //
analyzed: na ekatra artha mṛdu tve prāyas śloke ca loke ca

original: MSS_2982-1 arthārthinā priyā eva śrīharṣodīritā giraḥ /
analyzed: artha arthinā priyāḥ eva śrī harṣa udīritāḥ giraḥ

original: MSS_2982-2 sārasvate tu saubhāgye prasiddhā tadviruddhatā //
analyzed: sārasvate tu saubhāgye prasiddhā tad viruddha tā

original: MSS_2983-1 arthārthinī devapūjāspapnopaśrutitatparā /
MSS_2983-2 sadā gaṇakagehaṃ sā praṣṭuṃ yāti grahasthitim //
analyzed: sadā gaṇaka geham sā praṣṭum yāti graha sthitim

original: MSS_2984-1 arthārthī jīvaloko'yaṃ jvalantamupasarpati /
analyzed: artha arthī jīva lokaḥ yam jvalantam upasarpati

original: MSS_2984-2 kṣīṇakṣīrāṃ nirājīvyāṃ vatsastyajati mātaram //
analyzed: kṣīṇa kṣīrām nirājīvyām vatsaḥ tyajati mātaram

original: MSS_2985-1 arthārthī jīvaloko'yaṃ śmaśānamapi sevate /
analyzed: artha arthī jīva lokaḥ uyam śmaśānam api sevate

original: MSS_2985-2 janitāramapi tyaktvā niḥsvaṃ gacchati dūrataḥ //
analyzed: janitāram api tyaktvā niḥsvam gacchati dūratas

original: MSS_2986-1 arthārthī yāni kaṣṭāni mūḍho'yaṃ sahate janaḥ /
analyzed: artha arthī yāni kaṣṭāni mūḍhaḥ ayam sahate janaḥ

original: MSS_2986-2 śatāṃśenāpi mokṣārthī tāni cen mokṣamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: śata aṃśena api mokṣa arthī tāni ced mokṣam āpnuyāt

original: MSS_2987-1 arthārthī yāni kaṣṭāni sahate kṛpaṇo janaḥ /
analyzed: artha arthī yāni kaṣṭāni sahate kṛpaṇaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_2987-2 tānyeva yadi dharmārthī na bhūyaḥ kleśabhājanam //
analyzed: tāni eva yadi dharma arthī na bhūyas kleśa bhājanam

original: MSS_2988-1 arthālābhe'pi mahati svādhyāyaṃ na samutsṛjet /
analyzed: artha alābhe api mahati svādhyāyam na samutsṛjet

original: MSS_2988-2 kulānyakulatāṃ yānti svādhyāyasya vivarjanāt //
analyzed: kulāni akula tām yānti svādhyāyasya vivarjanāt

original: MSS_2989-1 arthāharaṇakauśalyaṃ kiṃ stumaḥ śāstravādinām /
analyzed: artha āharaṇa kauśalyam kim stumaḥ śāstra vādinām

original: MSS_2989-2 avyayebhyo'pi ye cārthān niṣkarṣanti sahasraśaḥ //
analyzed: avyayebhyaḥ api ye ca arthān niṣkarṣanti sahasraśas

original: MSS_2990-1 arthā hasantyucitadānavihīnacittaṃ bhūmirnaraṃ ca mama bhūmiriti bruvāṇam /
analyzed: arthāḥ hasanti ucita dāna vihīna cittam bhūmiḥ naram ca mama bhūmiḥ iti bruvāṇam

original: MSS_2990-2 jārā hasanti tanayānupalālayantaṃ mṛtyurhasatyavanipaṃ raṇaraṅgabhīrum //
analyzed: jārāḥ hasanti tanayān upalālayantam mṛtyuḥ hasati avanipam raṇa raṅga bhīrum

original: MSS_2991-1 arthiko vyādhito mūrkhaḥ pravāsī parasevakaḥ /
analyzed: arthikaḥ vyādhitaḥ mūrkhaḥ pravāsī para sevakaḥ

original: MSS_2991-2 jīvanto'pi mṛtāḥ pañca pañcaite dukhabhāginaḥ //
analyzed: jīvantaḥ api mṛtāḥ pañca pañca ete dukha bhāginaḥ

original: MSS_2992-1 arthitā vibhavastyāgaḥ svātantryamucitajñatā /
analyzed: arthi tā vibhavaḥ tyāgaḥ svātantryam ucita jña tā

original: MSS_2992-2 iti pañcaguṇopatem āśrayedāśrayaṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: iti āśrayet āśrayam naraḥ

original: MSS_2993-1 arthitve prakaṭīkṛte'pi na phalaprāptiḥ prabhoḥ pratyuta druhyan dāśarathirviruddhacarito yuktastayā kanyayā /
analyzed: arthi tve prakaṭīkṛte api na phala prāptiḥ prabhoḥ pratyuta druhyan dāśarathiḥ viruddha caritaḥ yuktaḥ tayā kanyayā

original: MSS_2993-2 utkarṣaṃ ca parasya mānayaśasorvisraṃsanaṃ cātmanaḥ strīratnaṃ ca jagatpatirdaśamukho dṛptaḥ kathaṃ mṛṣyate //
analyzed: utkarṣam ca parasya māna yaśasoḥ visraṃsanam ca ātmanaḥ strī ratnam ca jagatpatiḥ daśamukhaḥ dṛptaḥ katham mṛṣyate

original: MSS_2994-1 arthinastvaritadānena tṛptirbhavati yādṛśī /
analyzed: arthinaḥ tvarita dānena tṛptiḥ bhavati yādṛśī

original: MSS_2994-2 bahudānaṃ vilambena na tādṛk tṛptikārakam //
analyzed: bahu dānam vilambena na tādṛś tṛpti kārakam

original: MSS_2995-1 arthināṃ kṛpaṇā dṛṣṭis tvanmukhe patitā sakṛt /
analyzed: arthinām kṛpaṇā dṛṣṭiḥ tvad mukhe patitā sakṛt

original: MSS_2995-2 tadavasthā punardeva nānyasya mukhamīkṣate //
analyzed: tad avasthā punar deva na anyasya mukham īkṣate

original: MSS_2996-1 arthināṃ mitravargasya vidviṣāṃ ca parāṅmukhaḥ /
analyzed: arthinām mitra vargasya vidviṣām ca parāṅmukhaḥ

original: MSS_2996-2 yo na yāti pitā tena putrī mātā ca vīrasūḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ na yāti pitā tena putrī mātā ca vīrasūḥ

original: MSS_2997-1 arthināmupapannānāṃ pūrvaṃ cāpyupakāriṇām /
analyzed: arthinām upapannānām pūrvam ca api upakāriṇām

original: MSS_2997-2 āśāṃ saṃśrutya yo hanti sa loke puruṣādhamaḥ //
analyzed: āśām saṃśrutya yaḥ hanti sa loke puruṣa adhamaḥ

original: MSS_2998-1 arthini kavayati kavayati paṭhati ca paṭhati stavonmukhe stauti /
analyzed: arthini kavayati kavayati paṭhati ca paṭhati stava unmukhe stauti

original: MSS_2998-2 paścādyāmītyukte maunī dṛṣṭiṃ nimīlayati //
analyzed: paścāt yāmi iti ukte maunī dṛṣṭim nimīlayati

original: MSS_2999-1 arthine na tṛṇavaddhanamātraṃ kiṃ tu jīvanamapi pratipādyam /
analyzed: arthine na tṛṇa vat dhana mātram kim tu jīvanam api pratipādyam

original: MSS_2999-2 evamāha kuśavajjaladāpī dravyadānavidhiruktividagdhaḥ //
analyzed: evam āha kuśa vat jala dāpī dravya dāna vidhiḥ ukti vidagdhaḥ

original: MSS_3000-1 arthino jaṭharajvālādagdhā vāk kaṃcidañcati /
analyzed: arthinaḥ jaṭhara jvālā dagdhā vāc kaṃcid añcati

original: MSS_3000-2 tāṃ cāśamayato vittaṃ kinnimittaṃ na vidmahe //
analyzed: tām ca aśamayataḥ vittam kinnimittam na vidmahe

original: MSS_3001-1 arthipratyarthilakṣairapy aparāṅmukhacetasam /
analyzed: arthi pratyarthi lakṣaiḥ api a parāṅmukha cetasam

original: MSS_3001-2 tvāṃ parāṅmukhatāṃ ninyuḥ kevalaṃ parayoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: tvām parāṅmukha tām ninyuḥ kevalam para yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_3002-1 arthibhuktāvaśiṣṭaṃ yat tadaśnīyān mahāśayaḥ /
analyzed: arthi bhukta avaśiṣṭam yat tat aśnīyāt mahā āśayaḥ

original: MSS_3002-2 śveto'rthirahitaṃ bhuktvā nijamāṃsāśano'bhavat //
analyzed: bhuktvā nija māṃsa aśanaḥ bhavat

original: MSS_3003-1 arthibhyaḥ kanakasya dīpakapiśā viśrāṇitā rāśayo vāde vādiviṣāṇināṃ pratihatāḥ śāstroktigarvā giraḥ /
analyzed: arthibhyaḥ kanakasya dīpa kapiśāḥ viśrāṇitāḥ rāśayaḥ vāde vādi viṣāṇinām pratihatāḥ śāstra ukti garvāḥ giraḥ

original: MSS_3003-2 utkhātapratiropitairnṛpatibhiḥ śārairiva krīḍitaṃ kartavyaṃ kṛtamarthitā yadi vidhestatrāpi sajjā vayam //
analyzed: utkhāta pratiropitaiḥ nṛpatibhiḥ śāraiḥ iva krīḍitam kartavyam kṛtam arthi tā yadi vidheḥ tatra api sajjāḥ vayam

original: MSS_3004-1 arthibhyaśca dviṣadbhyaśca vaimukhyaṃ yasya nāstyasau /
analyzed: arthibhyaḥ ca dviṣadbhyaḥ ca vaimukhyam yasya na asti asau

original: MSS_3004-2 mahodāraḥ sadā śāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ ko'pi durlabhaḥ //
analyzed: mahā udāraḥ sadā śāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ kaḥ api durlabhaḥ

original: MSS_3005-1 arthibhraṃśabahūbhavatphalabharavyājena kubjāyitaḥ satyasminnatidānabhāji kathamapyāstāṃ sa kalpadrumaḥ /
analyzed: arthi bhraṃśa bahu bhavat phala bhara vyājena kubjāyitaḥ sati asmin atidāna bhāji katham api āstām sa kalpadrumaḥ

original: MSS_3005-2 āste nirvyayaratnasaṃpadudayodagraḥ kathaṃ yācaka- śreṇīvarjanaduryaśonibiḍitavrīḍastu ratnācalaḥ //
analyzed: āste nirvyaya ratna saṃpad udaya udagraḥ katham yācaka śreṇī varjana duryaśaḥ nibiḍita vrīḍaḥ tu ratnācalaḥ

original: MSS_3006-1 arthī karoti dainyaṃ labdhārtho garvamaparitoṣaṃ ca /
analyzed: arthī karoti dainyam labdha arthaḥ garvam aparitoṣam ca

original: MSS_3006-2 naṣṭadhanaśca saśokaḥ sukhamāste niḥspṛhaḥ puruṣaḥ //
analyzed: naṣṭa dhanaḥ ca sa śokaḥ sukham āste niḥspṛhaḥ puruṣaḥ

original: MSS_3007-1 arthī yenārthakṛtyena saṃvrajatyavicārayan /
analyzed: arthī yena artha kṛtyena saṃvrajati avicārayān

original: MSS_3007-2 tamarthamarthaśāstrajñāḥ prāhurarthyāśca lakṣmaṇa //
analyzed: tam artham artha śāstra jñāḥ prāhuḥ arthyāḥ ca lakṣmaṇa

original: MSS_3008-1 arthī lāghavamucchrito nipatanaṃ kāmāturo lāñchanaṃ lubdho'kīrtimasaṃgaraḥ paribhavaṃ duṣṭo'nyadoṣe ratim /
analyzed: arthī lāghavam ucchritaḥ nipatanam kāma āturaḥ lāñchanam lubdhaḥ kīrtim asaṃgaraḥ paribhavam duṣṭaḥ anya doṣe ratim

original: MSS_3008-2 niḥsvo vañcanamunmanā vikalatāṃ śokākulaḥ saṃśayaṃ durvāgapriyatāṃ durodaravaśaḥ prāpnoti kaṣṭaṃ muhuḥ //
analyzed: niḥsvaḥ vañcanam unmanāḥ vikala tām śoka ākulaḥ saṃśayam durvāc apriya tām durodara vaśaḥ prāpnoti kaṣṭam muhur

original: MSS_3009-1 arthena kiṃ kṛpaṇahastagatena tena rūpeṇa kiṃ guṇaparākramavarjitena /
analyzed: arthena kim kṛpaṇa hasta gatena tena rūpeṇa kim guṇa parākrama varjitena

original: MSS_3009-2 mitreṇa kiṃ vyasanakālaparāṅmukhena jñānena kiṃ bahuśaṭhādhikamatsareṇa //
analyzed: mitreṇa kim vyasana kāla parāṅmukhena jñānena kim bahu śaṭha adhika matsareṇa

original: MSS_3010-1 arthena parihīṇaṃ tu naramaspṛśyatāṃ gatam /
analyzed: arthena parihīṇam tu naram aspṛśya tām gatam

original: MSS_3010-2 tyajanti bāndhavāḥ sarve mṛtaṃ sattvamivāsavaḥ //
analyzed: tyajanti bāndhavāḥ sarve mṛtam sattvam iva asavaḥ

original: MSS_3011-1 arthena rakṣitamidaṃ rājyaṃ punararthamarpayati /
analyzed: arthena rakṣitam idam rājyam punar artham arpayati

original: MSS_3011-2 arthaikaparo nṛpatiḥ pariharati punaḥ kṣaṇādubhayam //
analyzed: artha eka paraḥ nṛpatiḥ pariharati punar kṣaṇāt ubhayam

original: MSS_3012-1 arthena hi vihīnasya puruṣasyālpamedhasaḥ /
analyzed: arthena hi vihīnasya puruṣasya alpa medhasaḥ

original: MSS_3012-2 vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvā grīṣme kusarito yathā //
analyzed: vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvāḥ grīṣme kusaritaḥ yathā

original: MSS_3013-1 arthena hīnaḥ puruṣas tyajyate mitrabāndhavaiḥ /
analyzed: arthena hīnaḥ puruṣaḥ tyajyate mitra bāndhavaiḥ

original: MSS_3013-2 tyaktalokakriyāhāraḥ parāsuriva niṣprabhaḥ //
analyzed: tyakta loka kriyā āhāraḥ parāsuḥ iva niṣprabhaḥ

original: MSS_3014-1 arthenāpi hi kiṃ tena yasyānarthe tu saṃgatiḥ /
analyzed: arthena api hi kim tena yasya anarthe tu saṃgatiḥ

original: MSS_3014-2 ko hi nāma śikhājātaṃ pannagasya maṇiṃ haret //
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma śikhā jātam pannagasya maṇim haret

original: MSS_3015-1 arthenopārjyate dharmo dharmeṇārtha upārjyate /
analyzed: arthena upārjyate dharmaḥ dharmeṇa arthaḥ upārjyate

original: MSS_3015-2 anyonyāśrayaṇaṃ hyetad ubhayotpattisādhanam //
analyzed: anyonya āśrayaṇam hi etat ubhaya utpatti sādhanam

original: MSS_3016-1 arthendriyārthābhidhyānaṃ sarvārthāpahnavo nṛṇām /
analyzed: artha indriya artha abhidhyānam sarva artha apahnavaḥ nṛṇām

original: MSS_3016-2 bhraṃśito jñānavijñānād yenāviśati mukhyatām //
analyzed: bhraṃśitaḥ jñāna vijñānāt yena āviśati mukhya tām

original: MSS_3017-1 arthe pratyupalabdhe ca paradoṣe ca kīrtite /
analyzed: arthe pratyupalabdhe ca para doṣe ca kīrtite

original: MSS_3017-2 ātmānaṃ sādhu kartavyaṃ śīlavṛttamabhīpsitam //
analyzed: ātmānam sādhu kartavyam śīla vṛttam abhīpsitam

original: MSS_3018-1 arthebhyo hi vivṛttebhyaḥ saṃbhṛtebhyastatastataḥ /
analyzed: arthebhyaḥ hi vivṛttebhyaḥ saṃbhṛtebhyaḥ tatas tatas

original: MSS_3018-2 kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ //
analyzed: kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhyaḥ iva āpagāḥ

original: MSS_3019-1 artheṣu kāmamupalabhya manoratho me strīṇāṃ dhaneṣvanucitaṃ praṇayaṃ karoti /
analyzed: artheṣu kāmam upalabhya manorathaḥ me strīṇām dhaneṣu anucitam praṇayam karoti

original: MSS_3019-2 māne ca kāryakaraṇe ca vilambamāno dhig bhoḥ kulaṃ ca puruṣasya daridratāṃ ca //
analyzed: māne ca kārya karaṇe ca vilambamānaḥ dhik bhoḥ kulam ca puruṣasya daridra tām ca

original: MSS_3020-1 artheṣvalabhyeṣvakṛtaprayatnaṃ kṛtādaraṃ nityamupāyavatsu /
analyzed: artheṣu alabhyeṣu akṛta prayatnam kṛta ādaram nityam upāyavatsu

original: MSS_3020-2 jitendriyaṃ nānutapanti rogās tatkālayuktaṃ yadi nāsti daivam //
analyzed: jita indriyam na anutapanti rogāḥ tad kāla yuktam yadi nā asti daivam

original: MSS_3021-1 arthe hyavidyamāne'pi saṃsṛtirna nivartate /
analyzed: arthe hi a vidyamāne pi saṃsṛtiḥ na nivartate

original: MSS_3021-2 dhyāyato viṣayānasya svapne'narthāgamo yathā //
analyzed: dhyāyataḥ svapnena artha āgamaḥ yathā

original: MSS_3022-1 arthairanekairjananīmamuṣyāś cittaṃ ca dattvā cirakālacintyam /
analyzed: arthaiḥ anekaiḥ jananīm amuṣyāḥ cittam ca dattvā cira kāla cintyam

original: MSS_3022-2 saṃtoṣayeyaṃ sahasaiva bhadre na cet kathaṃ syād iha naḥ praveśaḥ //
analyzed: saṃtoṣayeyam sahasā eva bhadre na ced katham syāt iha naḥ praveśaḥ

original: MSS_3023-1 arthairarthā nibaghyante gajairiva mahāgajāḥ /
analyzed: arthaiḥ arthāḥ nibaghyante gajaiḥ iva mahā gajāḥ

original: MSS_3023-2 na hyanarthavatā śakyaṃ vāṇijyaṃ kartumīhayā //
analyzed: na hi anarthavatā śakyam vāṇijyam kartum īhayā

original: MSS_3024-1 arthairvihīnaḥ puruṣo jīvannapi mṛtopamaḥ /
analyzed: arthaiḥ vihīnaḥ puruṣaḥ jīvan api mṛta upamaḥ

original: MSS_3024-2 dharmārthavidyārjanato matiryasya nivartate //
analyzed: dharma artha vidyā arjanataḥ matiḥ yasya nivartate

original: MSS_3025-1 artho girāmapihitaḥ pihitaśca kaścit saubhāgyameti marahaṭṭavadhūkucābhaḥ /
analyzed: arthaḥ girām apihitaḥ pihitaḥ ca kaścid saubhāgyam eti mara haṭṭa vadhū kuca ābhaḥ

original: MSS_3025-2 nāndhrīpayodhara ivātitarāṃ prakāśo no gurjarīstana ivātitarāṃ nigūḍhaḥ //
analyzed: na āndhrī payodharaḥ iva atitarām prakāśaḥ no gurjarī stanaḥ iva atitarām nigūḍhaḥ

original: MSS_3026-1 arthotkaṇṭhāvakuṇṭhapramuṣitavinayairluṭhyatāṃ nākiśuṇṭhaiḥ pratno ratnoccayaḥ kiṃ tvativiṣamadaśāṃ tāmanudhyāya khidye /
analyzed: artha utkaṇṭhā avakuṇṭha pramuṣita vinayaiḥ luṭhyatām nāki śuṇṭhaiḥ pratnaḥ ratnoccayaḥ kim tu ati viṣama daśām tām anudhyāya khidye

original: MSS_3026-2 sindho manthādrimanthāt taralatarabṛhadbhaṅgasaṃghātaghāta- prabhraśyanmūlavelāgirigaṇapatanoddāmadhāmandhamīkā //
analyzed: sindho mantha adri manthāt taralatara bṛhat bhaṅga saṃghāta ghāta prabhraśyat mūla velā giri gaṇa patana uddāma dhāma ndhamīkā

original: MSS_3027-1 artho narāṇāṃ patiraṅganānāṃ varṣā nadīnāmṛturāṭ tarūṇām /
analyzed: arthaḥ narāṇām patiḥ aṅganānām varṣā nadīnām ṛturāj tarūṇām

original: MSS_3027-2 svadharmacārī nṛpatiḥ prajānāṃ gataṃ gataṃ yauvanamānayanti //
analyzed: svadharma cārī nṛpatiḥ prajānām gatam gatam yauvanam ānayanti

original: MSS_3028-1 artho na saṃbhṛtaḥ kaścin na vidyā kācidarjitā /
analyzed: arthaḥ na saṃbhṛtaḥ kaścid na vidyā kācid arjitā

original: MSS_3028-2 na tapaḥ saṃcitaṃ kiṃcid gataṃ ca sakalaṃ vayaḥ //
analyzed: na tapaḥ saṃcitam kiṃcid gatam ca sakalam vayaḥ

original: MSS_3029-1 artho nāma janānāṃ jīvitamakhilakriyākalāpaśca /
analyzed: arthaḥ nāma janānām jīvitam akhila kriyā kalāpaḥ ca

original: MSS_3029-2 tamapi harantyatidhūrtāḥ chagalagalā gāyanā loke //
analyzed: tam api haranti ati dhūrtāḥ chagala galāḥ gāyanāḥ loke

original: MSS_3030-1 arthopacayavijñānam asti yasya sa paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: artha upacaya vijñānam asti yasya sa paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_3030-2 saraḥ salilasaṃpūrṇam āśrayanti vihaṅgamāḥ //
analyzed: saraḥ salila saṃpūrṇam āśrayanti vihaṅgamāḥ

original: MSS_3031-1 arthopārjanadakṣaśca kṣāntiśīlaḥ sadā bhavet /
analyzed: artha upārjana dakṣaḥ ca kṣānti śīlaḥ sadā bhavet

original: MSS_3031-2 na tatra parakāryāṇi vidvānāpi viśeṣayet //
analyzed: na tatra para kāryāṇi vidvān ā api viśeṣayet

original: MSS_3032-1 artho'pyarthena cet sādhyaḥ kā vārtā dharmakāmayoḥ /
analyzed: arthaḥ upi arthena ced sādhyaḥ kā vārtā dharma kāmayoḥ

original: MSS_3032-2 arthaḥ sarvajaganmūlam anartho'rthaviparyayaḥ //
analyzed: arthaḥ sarva jagat mūlam anarthaḥ ūrtha viparyayaḥ

original: MSS_3033-1 artho vinaivārthanayopasīdan nālpo'pi dhīrairavadhīraṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: arthaḥ vinā eva arthanayā upasīdan na alpaḥ api dhīraiḥ avadhīraṇīyaḥ

original: MSS_3033-2 mānyena manye vidhinā vitīrṇaḥ sa prītidāyo bahu mantumarhaḥ //
analyzed: mānyena manye vidhinā vitīrṇaḥ sa prīti dāyaḥ bahu mantum arhaḥ

original: MSS_3034-1 arthoṣmā pitṛlālanaṃ viṭaghaṭāmelaḥ priyaṃmanyatā tāruṇyaṃ nagare sthitistaralatā dhīḥ kāmaśāstraṃ prati /
analyzed: artha ūṣmā pitṛ lālanam viṭa ghaṭā melaḥ priyaṃmanya tā tāruṇyam nagare sthitiḥ tarala tā dhīḥ kāmaśāstram prati

original: MSS_3034-2 saṃgītaṃ rajanī vidhurmadhumadaḥ spardhā sapatnaistathā veśyānāmanuraktavittaharaṇe kurvanti sāhāyakam //
analyzed: saṃgītam rajanī vidhuḥ madhu madaḥ spardhā sapatnaiḥ tathā veśyānām anurakta vitta haraṇe kurvanti sāhāyakam

original: MSS_3035-1 artho'sti cenna padaśuddhirathāsti sāpi no rītirasti yadi sā ghaṭanā kutastyā /
analyzed: arthaḥ usti ced na pada śuddhiḥ atha asti sā api no rītiḥ asti yadi sā ghaṭanā kutastyā

original: MSS_3035-2 sāpyasti cenna navavakragatistadetad vyarthaṃ vinā rasamaho gahanaṃ kavitvam //
analyzed: sā api asti ced na nava vakra gatiḥ tat etat vyartham vinā rasam aho gahanam kavi tvam

original: MSS_3036-1 artho hi kanyā parakīya eva tāmadya saṃpreṣya parigrahītuḥ /
analyzed: arthaḥ hi kanyā parakīyaḥ eva tām adya saṃpreṣya parigrahītuḥ

original: MSS_3036-2 jāto mamāyaṃ viśadaḥ prakāmaṃ pratyarpitanyāsa ivāntarātmā //
analyzed: jātaḥ mama ayam viśadaḥ prakāmam pratyarpita nyāsaḥ iva antarātmā

original: MSS_3037-1 artho hi naṣṭakāryārthair ayatnenādhigamyate /
analyzed: arthaḥ hi naṣṭa kārya arthaiḥ ayatnena adhigamyate

original: MSS_3037-2 utsāho balavānārya nāstyutsāhāt paraṃ balam //
analyzed: utsāhaḥ balavān ārya na asti utsāhāt param balam

original: MSS_3038-1 arthaucityavatā sūktir alaṃkāreṇa śobhate /
analyzed: artha aucityavatā su uktiḥ alaṃkāreṇa śobhate

original: MSS_3038-2 pīnastanasthiteneva hāreṇa hariṇekṣaṇā //
analyzed: pīna stana sthitena iva hāreṇa hariṇa īkṣaṇā

original: MSS_3039-1 ardhaṃ kalaṅkarahitā karuṇaiva śaṃbhor ardhaṃ guṇāstaditare sakalāḥ sametāḥ /
analyzed: ardham kalaṅka rahitā karuṇā eva śaṃbhoḥ ardham guṇāḥ tad itare sakalāḥ sametāḥ

original: MSS_3039-2 ityamba saṃprati kila sphuritaṃ rahasyaṃ saṃpaśyato mama bhavanmayamaiśamardham //
analyzed: iti amba saṃprati kila sphuritam rahasyam saṃpaśyataḥ mama bhavat mayam aiśam ardham

original: MSS_3040-1 ardhaṃ jitaṃ tripuramamba tava smitaṃ ced ardhāntareṇa ca tathā bhavitavyameva /
analyzed: ardham jitam tripuram amba tava smitam ced ardha antareṇa ca tathā bhavitavyam eva

original: MSS_3040-2 taccintaye janani kāraṇasūkṣmarūpa- sthūlātmakatripuraśāntikṛte smitaṃ te //
analyzed: tat cintaye janani kāraṇa sūkṣma rūpa sthūla ātmaka tripura śānti kṛte smitam te

original: MSS_3041-1 ardhaṃ dantacchadasya sphurati japavaśādardhamapyutprakopād ekaḥ pāṇiḥ praṇantuṃ śirasi kṛtapadaḥ kṣeptumanyastameva /
analyzed: ardham dantacchadasya sphurati japa vaśāt ardham api utprakopāt ekaḥ pāṇiḥ praṇantum śirasi kṛta padaḥ kṣeptum anyaḥ tam eva

original: MSS_3041-2 ekaṃ dhyānānnimīlatyaparamavikasadvīkṣate netramitthaṃ tulyānicchāvidhitsā tanuravatu sa vo yasya saṃdhyāvidhāne //
analyzed: ekam dhyānāt nimīlati aparam a vikasat vīkṣate netram ittham tulya an icchā vidhitsā tanuḥ avatu sa vaḥ yasya saṃdhyā vidhāne

original: MSS_3042-1 ardhaṃ dānavavairiṇā girijayāpyardhaṃ śivasyāhṛtaṃ devetthaṃ jagatītale puraharābhāve samunmīlati /
analyzed: ardham dānavavairiṇā girijayā api ardham śivasya āhṛtam deva ittham jagatī tale purahara abhāve samunmīlati

original: MSS_3042-2 gaṅgā sāgaramambaraṃ śaśikalā nāgādhipaḥ kṣmātalaṃ sarvajñatvamadhīśvaratvamagamat tvāṃ māṃ tu bhikṣāṭanam //
analyzed: gaṅgā sāgaram ambaram śaśi kalā nāga adhipaḥ kṣmā talam sarvajña tvam adhīśvara tvam agamat tvām mām tu bhikṣāṭanam

original: MSS_3043-1 ardhaṃ nītvā niśāyāḥ sarabhasasuratāyāsasaṃśleṣayogaiḥ prodbhūtāsahyatṛṣṇo madhumadanirato harmyapṛṣṭhe vivikte /
analyzed: ardham nītvā niśāyāḥ sarabhasa surata āyāsa saṃśleṣa yogaiḥ prodbhūta asahya tṛṣṇaḥ madhu mada nirataḥ harmya pṛṣṭhe vivikte

original: MSS_3043-2 saṃbhogaklāntakāntāśithilabhujalatāvarjitaṃ karkarīto jyotsnābhinnācchadhāraṃ na pibati salilaṃ śāradaṃ mandabhāgyaḥ //
analyzed: saṃbhoga klānta kāntā śithila bhuja latā varjitam karkarītaḥ jyotsnā bhinna accha dhāram na pibati salilam śāradam mandabhāgyaḥ

original: MSS_3044-1 ardhaṃ premanibaddhamardhamaparaṃ lajjāśritaṃ mānasaṃ evaṃ netrasaroruhaṃ priyamukhe cānyad gavākṣe'rpitam /
analyzed: ardham prema nibaddham ardham aparam lajjā āśritam mānasam evam netra saroruham priya mukhe ca anyat gavākṣa īrpitam

original: MSS_3044-2 paryaṅke padamekameva dharaṇau pṛṣṭhe ca kṛtvāparaṃ sthātuṃ gantumapi prabhātasamaye śaknoti naivābalā //
analyzed: paryaṅke padam ekam eva dharaṇau pṛṣṭhe ca kṛtvā aparam sthātum gantum api prabhāta samaye śaknoti nā eva abalā

original: MSS_3045-1 ardhaṃ bhāryā manuṣyasya bhāryā śreṣṭhatamaḥ sakhā /
analyzed: ardham bhāryā manuṣyasya bhāryā śreṣṭhatamaḥ sakhā

original: MSS_3045-2 bhāryā mūlaṃ trivargasya bhāryā mitraṃ mariṣyataḥ //
analyzed: bhāryā mūlam trivargasya bhāryā mitram mariṣyataḥ

original: MSS_3046-1 ardhaṃ sajjanasaṃparkād avidyāyā vinaśyati /
analyzed: ardham sat jana saṃparkāt avidyāyāḥ vinaśyati

original: MSS_3046-2 caturbhāgastu śāstrārthaiś caturbhāgaṃ svayatnataḥ //
analyzed: catur bhāgaḥ tu śāstra arthaiḥ catur bhāgam sva yatnataḥ

original: MSS_3047-1 ardhaṃ striyastribhuvane sacarācare'sminn ardhaṃ pumāṃsa iti darśayituṃ bhavatyā /
analyzed: ardham striyaḥ tribhuvane sa carācare ismin ardham pumāṃsaḥ iti darśayitum bhavatyā

original: MSS_3047-2 strīpuṃsalakṣaṇamidaṃ vapurādṛtaṃ yat tenāsi devi viditā trijagaccharīrā //
analyzed: strīpuṃsa lakṣaṇam idam vapuḥ ādṛtam yat tena asi devi viditā trijagat śarīrā

original: MSS_3048-1 ardhacandraṃ ca cakraṃ ca śakaṭaṃ makaraṃ tathā /
analyzed: ardhacandram ca cakram ca śakaṭam makaram tathā

original: MSS_3048-2 kamalaṃ śreṇikāṃ gulmaṃ vyūhānevaṃ prakalpayet //
analyzed: kamalam śreṇikām gulmam vyūhān evam prakalpayet

original: MSS_3049-1 ardhacandravadākāraṃ strīnāmārthaṃ ca tryakṣaram /
analyzed: ardhacandra vat ākāram strī nāma artham ca tri akṣaram

original: MSS_3049-2 nakārādi rikārāntaṃ yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: nakāra ādi rikāra antam yaḥ jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_3050-1 ardhacandrasamāyuktaṃ puṃnāma caturakṣaram /
analyzed: ardhacandra samāyuktam puṃnāma catur akṣaram

original: MSS_3050-2 kakārādi lakārāntam iha jānāti paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: kakāra ādi lakāra antam iha jānāti paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_3051-1 ardhacandrākṛtiryasmin khaṅge svābhāvikī bhavet /
analyzed: ardhacandra ākṛtiḥ yasmin khaṅge svābhāvikī bhavet

original: MSS_3051-2 api doṣasahasrāṇi hanti candrastamo yathā //
analyzed: api doṣa sahasrāṇi hanti candraḥ tamaḥ yathā

original: MSS_3052-1 ardhapañcamahastaṃ tu śreṣṭhaṃ cāpaṃ prakīrtitam /
analyzed: ardha pañcama hastam tu śreṣṭham cāpam prakīrtitam

original: MSS_3052-2 tadvijñeyaṃ dhanurdivyaṃ śaṃkareṇa dhṛtaṃ purā //
analyzed: tat vijñeyam dhanuḥ divyam śaṃkareṇa dhṛtam purā

original: MSS_3053-1 ardhapītamadirā maṇipārī śobhatāṃ kathamatīva taruṇyāḥ /
analyzed: ardha pīta madirā maṇi pārī śobhatām katham atīva taruṇyāḥ

original: MSS_3053-2 cumbitairadhikapāṭalabhāsā pūritādharamayūkhabhareṇa //
analyzed: cumbitaiḥ adhika pāṭala bhāsā pūrita adhara mayūkha bhareṇa

original: MSS_3054-1 ardhapītastanaṃ mātur āmardākliṣṭakesaram /
analyzed: ardha pīta stanam mātuḥ āmarda akliṣṭa kesaram

original: MSS_3054-2 prakrīḍituṃ siṃhaśiśuṃ balātkāreṇa karṣati //
analyzed: prakrīḍitum siṃha śiśum balātkāreṇa karṣati

original: MSS_3055-1 ardhapuruṣe ca matsyaḥ pārāvatasaṃnibhaśca pāṣāṇaḥ /
analyzed: ardha puruṣe ca matsyaḥ pārāvata saṃnibhaḥ ca pāṣāṇaḥ

original: MSS_3055-2 mṛdbhavati tatra nīlā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ ca bahutoyam //
analyzed: mṛd bhavati tatra nīlā dīrgham kālam ca bahu toyam

original: MSS_3056-1 ardhaprothasthitā rekhā dṛśyante yasya vājinaḥ /
analyzed: ardha protha sthitāḥ rekhāḥ dṛśyante yasya vājinaḥ

original: MSS_3056-2 tasya mṛtyuḥ samuddiṣṭo daśamaṃ prāpya vatsaram //
analyzed: tasya mṛtyuḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ daśamam prāpya vatsaram

original: MSS_3057-1 ardhapluṣṭaṃ bahubhyaḥ śavapiśitamupāhṛtya hṛṣṭaścitābhyo jātagrāsātirekaḥ sphuṭataradhamanīnaddhaśuṣkārdrakāyaḥ /
analyzed: ardha pluṣṭam bahubhyaḥ śava piśitam upāhṛtya hṛṣṭaḥ citābhyaḥ jāta grāsa atirekaḥ sphuṭatara dhamanī naddha śuṣka ārdra kāyaḥ

original: MSS_3057-2 pretaḥ saṃtarjya dṛṣṭyā kuṭilaparuṣayā majjaniṣkarṣaśuṣkair āhantyāhāralubdhānmuhurabhipatato jambukānasthikhaṇḍaiḥ //
analyzed: pretaḥ saṃtarjya dṛṣṭyā kuṭila paruṣayā majja niṣkarṣa śuṣkaiḥ āhanti āhāra lubdhān muhur abhipatataḥ jambukān asthi khaṇḍaiḥ

original: MSS_3058-1 ardhamīlitavilolatārake sā dṛśau nidhuvanaklamālasā /
analyzed: ardha mīlita vilola tārake sā dṛśau nidhuvana klama alasā

original: MSS_3058-2 yanmuhūrtamavahanna tatpunas tṛptirāsta dayitasya paśyataḥ //
analyzed: yat muhūrtam avahat na tat punar tṛptiḥ āsta dayitasya paśyataḥ

original: MSS_3059-1 tatklamastamadidīkṣata kṣaṇaṃ tālavṛntacalanāya nāyakam /
analyzed: tad klamaḥ tam adidīkṣata kṣaṇam tālavṛnta calanāya nāyakam

original: MSS_3059-2 tadvidhā hi bhavadaivataṃ priyā vedhaso'pi vidadhāti cāpalam //
analyzed: tadvidhā hi bhava daivatam priyā vedhasaḥ upi vidadhāti cāpalam

original: MSS_3060-1 ardharātre dinasyārdhe tvardhacandre'rdhabhāskare /
analyzed: ardharātre dinasya ardhe tu ardhacandra ūrdhva bhāskare

original: MSS_3060-2 rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā kṛṣṇapakṣe sitāṣṭamī //
analyzed: rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā kṛṣṇa pakṣe sita aṣṭamī

original: MSS_3061-1 ardhasiddheṣu kāryeṣu ātmaguhyaṃ prakāśayet /
analyzed: ardha siddheṣu kāryeṣu ātma guhyam prakāśayet

original: MSS_3061-2 sa eva nidhanaṃ yāti bakaḥ karkaṭakādyathā //
analyzed: saḥ eva nidhanam yāti bakaḥ karkaṭakāt yathā

original: MSS_3062-1 ardhasmitena vinimantrya daśārdhabāṇam ardhaṃ vidhūya vasanāñcalamardhamārge /
analyzed: ardhasmitena vinimantrya daśārdha bāṇam ardham vidhūya vasana añcalam ardha mārge

original: MSS_3062-2 ardhena netraviśikhena nivṛtya sārdham ardhārdhameva taruṇī taruṇaṃ cakāra //
analyzed: ardhena netra viśikhena nivṛtya sārdham ardha ardham eva taruṇī taruṇam cakāra

original: MSS_3063-1 ardhahastena hīnastu bhavenmadhyasturaṅgamaḥ /
analyzed: ardha hastena hīnaḥ tu bhavet madhyaḥ turaṅgamaḥ

original: MSS_3063-2 tato hastena hīnaśca hīna eva smṛto hayaḥ //
analyzed: tatas hastena hīnaḥ ca hīnaḥ eva smṛtaḥ hayaḥ

original: MSS_3064-1 ardhāṅganāpuṃvapuṣaḥ purārer mūrttiḥ śriyaṃ nauriva vastanotu /
analyzed: ardha aṅganā pum vapuṣaḥ purāreḥ mūrttiḥ śriyam nauḥ iva vaḥ stanotu

original: MSS_3064-2 premātibhārādaparaṃ yadardhaṃ mamajja śṛṅgārarasāmburāśau //
analyzed: prema atibhārāt aparam yat ardham mamajja śṛṅgāra rasa amburāśau

original: MSS_3065-1 ardhāṅgāhitapaurvakīrtivanitādīvyatsitāṃśuprabhaṃ kailāsīkṛtadikkarīndraśirasi nyastasvapādāmbujam /
analyzed: ardha aṅga āhita paurva kīrti vanitā dīvyat sitāṃśu prabham kailāsīkṛta dikkarī indra śirasi nyasta sva pāda ambujam

original: MSS_3065-2 viśvavyāpyavināśi śaṃkarapadaṃ yāyāttvadīyaṃ yaśo na syādasya yadi kṣitīśa bhavato dānādikebhyo janiḥ //
analyzed: viśva vyāpya vināśi śaṃkara padam yāyāt tvadīyam yaśaḥ na syāt asya yadi kṣitīśa bhavataḥ dāna ādikebhyaḥ janiḥ

original: MSS_3066-1 ardhāṅgulaparīṇāhajihvāgrāyāsabhīravaḥ /
analyzed: ardha aṅgula parīṇāha jihvā agra āyāsa bhīravaḥ

original: MSS_3066-2 sarvāṅgakleśajananam abudhāḥ karma kurvate //
analyzed: sarva aṅga kleśa jananam abudhāḥ karma kurvate

original: MSS_3067-1 ardhācitā satvaramutthitāyāḥ pade pade durnimite galantī /
analyzed: ardha ācitā satvaram utthitāyāḥ pade pade durnimite galantī

original: MSS_3067-2 kasyāścidāsīd raśanā tadānīm aṅguṣṭhamūlārpitasūtraśeṣā //
analyzed: kasyāścid āsīt raśanā tadānīm aṅguṣṭha mūla arpita sūtra śeṣā

original: MSS_3068-1 ardhādhītāśca yairvedās tathā śūdrānnabhojanāḥ /
analyzed: ardha adhītāḥ ca yaiḥ vedāḥ tathā śūdra anna bhojanāḥ

original: MSS_3068-2 te dvijāḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti nirviṣā iva pannagāḥ //
analyzed: te dvijāḥ kim kariṣyanti nirviṣāḥ iva pannagāḥ

original: MSS_3069-1 ardhāsane samadhiropya suradvipasya śakro'pi yadyudhi śacīṃ kavacīkaroti /
analyzed: ardhāsane samadhiropya sura dvipasya yat yudhi śacīm kavacīkaroti

original: MSS_3069-2 dhīrasya tasya sahate daśakandharasya kaḥ sāhasaikarasikaḥ karavāladhārām //
analyzed: dhīrasya tasya sahate daśa kandharasya kaḥ sāhasa eka rasikaḥ karavāla dhārām

original: MSS_3070-1 ardhena jaladaśyāmam ardhenātapapiṅgalam /
analyzed: ardhena jalada śyāmam ardhena ātapa piṅgalam

original: MSS_3070-2 ardhanārīśvarākāraṃ na ko manyeta vāsaram //
analyzed: ardhanārīśvara ākāram na kaḥ manyeta vāsaram

original: MSS_3071-1 ardhokte bhayamāgato'si kimidaṃ kaṇṭhaśca kiṃ gadgadaś cāṭorasya na ca kṣaṇo'yamanupakṣipteyamāstāṃ kathā /
analyzed: ardha ukte bhayam āgataḥ asi kim idam kaṇṭhaḥ ca kim gadgadaḥ na ca kṣaṇaḥ yam anupakṣiptā iyam āstām kathā

original: MSS_3071-2 brūhi prastutamastu saṃprati mahat karṇe sakhīnāṃ mukhais tṛptirnirbharamebhirakṣarapadaiḥ prāgeva me saṃbhṛtā //
analyzed: brūhi prastutam astu saṃprati mahat karṇe sakhīnām mukhaiḥ tṛptiḥ nirbharam ebhiḥ akṣara padaiḥ prāk eva me saṃbhṛtā

original: MSS_3072-1 ardhodgatena kadalī mṛdutāmratalena garbhakoṣeṇa /
analyzed: ardha udgatena kadalī mṛdu tāmra talena garbha koṣeṇa

original: MSS_3072-2 pibati nidāghajvaritā ghanadhārāṃ karapuṭenaiva //
analyzed: pibati nidāgha jvaritā ghana dhārām kara puṭena eva

original: MSS_3073-1 ardhonmīlitalocanasya pibataḥ paryāptamekaṃ stanaṃ sadyaḥ prasnutadugdhadigdhamaparaṃ hastena saṃmārjataḥ /
analyzed: ardha unmīlita locanasya pibataḥ paryāptam ekam stanam sadyas prasnuta dugdha digdham aparam hastena saṃmārjataḥ

original: MSS_3073-2 mātrā cāṅgulilālitasya vadane smerāyamāne muhur viṣṇoḥ kṣīrakaṇorudhāmadhavalā dantadyutiḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: mātrā ca aṅguli lālitasya vadane smerāyamāne muhur viṣṇoḥ kṣīra kaṇā uru dhāma dhavalā danta dyutiḥ pātu vaḥ

original: MSS_3074-1 arpayati pratidivasaṃ priyasya pathi locane bālā /
analyzed: arpayati pratidivasam priyasya pathi locane bālā

original: MSS_3074-2 nikṣipati kamalamālāḥ komalamiva kartumadhvānam //
analyzed: nikṣipati kamala mālāḥ komalam iva kartum adhvānam

original: MSS_3075-1 arpayantyarthine prāṇān na praṇāmamarātaye /
analyzed: arpayanti arthine prāṇān na praṇāmam arātaye

original: MSS_3075-2 na nāstītyuttaraṃ jātu suhṛde sumanojanāḥ //
analyzed: na na asti iti uttaram jātu suhṛde su manaḥ janāḥ

original: MSS_3076-1 arpitaṃ rasitavatyapi nāma- grāhamanyayuvaterdayitena /
analyzed: arpitam rasitavatī api nāma grāham anya yuvateḥ dayitena

original: MSS_3076-2 ujjhati sma madamapyapibantī vīkṣya madyamitarā tu mamāda //
analyzed: ujjhati sma madam api a pibantī vīkṣya madyam itarā tu mamāda

original: MSS_3077-1 arpitāḥ prathamatastvayi gāvo gopaśāvaka iti praṇayena /
analyzed: arpitāḥ prathamatas tvayi gāvaḥ gopa śāvake iti praṇayena

original: MSS_3077-2 dīyate punaridaṃ dhanahīnair vetanaṃ garuḍaketana cetaḥ //
analyzed: dīyate punar idam dhana hīnaiḥ vetanam garuḍaketana cetaḥ

original: MSS_3078-1 arvāgabhyetya garvādiva saridavarā seyamityuddidhīrṣāḥ kālindīṃ kopavegākalitahalahaṭhotkṣepiṇaḥ kṣemahetuḥ /
analyzed: arvāk abhyetya garvāt iva sarit avarā sā iyam iti uddidhīrṣāḥ kālindīm kopa vega ākalita halahaṭha utkṣepiṇaḥ kṣema hetuḥ

original: MSS_3078-2 tālāṅkasyāśu dālārasavivaśahṛdaḥ sraṃsadaṃsottarīyaṃ tiryagvyastāḍghri bhūyaḥ suvalanamatha laghūtthānamādhāvanaṃ tat //
analyzed: tāla aṅkasya āśu dālā rasa vivaśa hṛdaḥ sraṃsa daṃsa uttarīyam tiryak vyasta aḍghri bhūyas suvalanam atha laghu utthānam ādhāvanam tat

original: MSS_3079-1 arvācīnavacaḥ prapañcasukhināṃ duḥśikṣitānāṃ puro gambhīraṃ kavipuṅgavasya kimaho sarvasvamuddhāṭyate /
analyzed: arvācīna vacaḥ prapañca sukhinām duḥśikṣitānām puras gambhīram kavi puṅgavasya kim aho sarva svam uddhāṭyate

original: MSS_3079-2 vyarthaṃ kardamagandhagauravahṛtagrāmīṇagoṣṭhīmukhe ko'yaṃ nāma sacetano'sti ya iha prastauti kastūrikām //
analyzed: vyartham kardama gandha gaurava hṛta grāmīṇa goṣṭhī mukhe koyam nāma sa cetanā usti yaḥ iha prastauti kastūrikām

original: MSS_3080-1 arvāñcatpañcaśākhaḥ sphuraduparijaṭāmaṇḍalaḥ saṃśritānāṃ nityāparṇo'pi tāpatritayamapanayan sthāṇuravyādapūrvaḥ /
analyzed: arvāñcat pañca śākhaḥ sphurat upari jaṭā maṇḍalaḥ saṃśritānām nitya aparṇaḥ api tāpa tritayam apanayan sthāṇuḥ avyāda pūrvaḥ

original: MSS_3080-2 yaḥ pronmīlatkapardaiḥ śirasi viracitābālabandhe dyusindhoḥ pāthobhirlabdhasekaḥ phalati phalaśataṃ vāñchitaṃ bhaktibhājām //
analyzed: yaḥ pronmīlat kapardaiḥ śirasi dyusindhoḥ pāthobhiḥ labdha sekaḥ phalati phala śatam vāñchitam bhakti bhājām

original: MSS_3081-1 alaṃkaroti yaḥ ślokaṃ śuka eva na madhyamaḥ /
analyzed: alaṃkaroti yaḥ ślokam śukaḥ eva na madhyamaḥ

original: MSS_3081-2 alaṃ karoti yaḥ ślokaṃ śuka eva namadhyamaḥ //
analyzed: alam karoti yaḥ ślokam śukaḥ eva namadhyamaḥ

original: MSS_3082-1 alaṃkaroti hi jarā rājāmātyabhiṣagyatīn /
analyzed: alaṃkaroti hi jarā rāja amātya bhiṣaj yatīn

original: MSS_3082-2 viḍambayati paṇyastrīmallagāyanasevakān //
analyzed: viḍambayati paṇya strī malla gāyana sevakān

original: MSS_3083-1 alaṃkartuṃ karṇau bhṛśamanubhavantyā navarujaṃ sasītkāraṃ tiryagvalitavadanāyā mṛgadṛśaḥ /
analyzed: alaṃkartum karṇau bhṛśam anubhavantyāḥ nava rujam sa sītkāram tiryak valita vadanāyāḥ mṛga dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_3083-2 karābjavyāpārānatisukṛtasārān rasayato januḥ sarvaślāghyaṃ jayati lalitottaṃsa bhavataḥ //
analyzed: kara abja vyāpārān ati su kṛta sārān rasayataḥ januḥ sarva ślāghyam jayati lalita uttaṃsa bhavataḥ

original: MSS_3084-1 alaṃkāraḥ śaṅkākaranarakapālaṃ parijano viśīrṇāṅgo bhṛṅgī vasu ca vṛṣa eko bahuvayāḥ /
analyzed: alaṃkāraḥ śaṅkā kara nara kapālam parijanaḥ viśīrṇa aṅgaḥ bhṛṅgī vasu ca vṛṣaḥ ekaḥ bahu vayāḥ

original: MSS_3084-2 avastheyaṃ sthāṇorapi bhavati sarvāmaraguror vidhau vakre mūrdhni sthitavati vayaṃ ke punaramī //
analyzed: avastheyam sthāṇoḥ api bhavati sarva amara guroḥ vidhau vakre mūrdhni sthitavati vayam ke punar amī

original: MSS_3085-1 alaṃkārapriyo viṣṇur jaladhārāpriyaḥ śivaḥ /
MSS_3085-2 namaskārapriyo bhānur brāhmaṇo bhojanapriyaḥ //
analyzed: namaskāra priyaḥ bhānuḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhojana priyaḥ

original: MSS_3086-1 alaṃkārabhṛto rītimantaḥ siddhā rasonnatau /
analyzed: alaṃkāra bhṛtaḥ rītimantaḥ siddhāḥ rasa unnatau

original: MSS_3086-2 lakṣaṇairlakṣitātmānaḥ kṛtino nanu kecana //
analyzed: lakṣaṇaiḥ lakṣita ātmānaḥ kṛtinaḥ nanu kecana

original: MSS_3087-1 alaṃkāro hi nārīṇāṃ kṣamā tu puruṣasya vā /
analyzed: alaṃkāraḥ hi nārīṇām kṣamā tu puruṣasya vā

original: MSS_3087-2 duṣkaraṃ tacca vaḥ kṣāntaṃ tridaśeṣu viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: duṣkaram tat ca vaḥ kṣāntam tridaśeṣu viśeṣataḥ

original: MSS_3088-1 yādṛśī vaḥ kṣamā putryaḥ sarvāsāmaviśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: yādṛśī vaḥ kṣamā putryaḥ sarvāsām aviśeṣatas

original: MSS_3088-2 kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ ca putrikāḥ //
analyzed: kṣamā dānam kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā satyam ca putrikāḥ

original: MSS_3089-1 kṣamā yaśaḥ kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamāyāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat //
analyzed: kṣamā yaśaḥ kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamāyām viṣṭhitam jagat

original: MSS_3090-1 alaṃkṛtaḥ kāñcanakoṭimūlyair mahārharatnairgajavājivāhaiḥ /
analyzed: alaṃkṛtaḥ kāñcana koṭi mūlyaiḥ mahārha ratnaiḥ gaja vāji vāhaiḥ

original: MSS_3090-2 nimeṣamātraṃ labhate na jīvaṃ kālena kāle śikhayā gṛhītaḥ //
analyzed: nimeṣa mātram labhate na jīvam kālena kāle śikhayā gṛhītaḥ

original: MSS_3091-1 alaṃkriyante śikhinaḥ kekayā madaraktayā /
analyzed: alaṃkriyante śikhinaḥ kekayāḥ mada raktayā

original: MSS_3091-2 vācā vipaścito'tyarthaṃ mādhuryaguṇayuktayā //
analyzed: vācā vipaścitā utyartham mādhurya guṇa yuktayā

original: MSS_3092-1 alaṃkriyā śaktisamanvitānāṃ tapodhanānāṃ balaśaktiragryā /
analyzed: alaṃkriyā śakti samanvitānām tapodhanānām bala śaktiḥ agryā

original: MSS_3092-2 vyāpādadāvānalavāridhārā pratyeha ca kṣāntiranarthaśāntiḥ //
analyzed: vyāpāda dāva anala vāri dhārā ca kṣāntiḥ anartha śāntiḥ

original: MSS_3093-1 alaṃ tridivavārtayā kimiti sārvabhaumaśriyā vidūrataravartinī bhavatu mokṣalakṣmīrapi /
analyzed: alam tridiva vārtayā kim iti sārvabhauma śriyā vidūratara vartinī bhavatu mokṣa lakṣmīḥ api

original: MSS_3093-2 kalindagirinandinītaṭanikuñjapuñjodare mano harati kevalaṃ navatamālanīlaṃ mahaḥ //
analyzed: kalinda giri nandinī taṭa nikuñja puñja udare manaḥ harati kevalam nava tamāla nīlam mahaḥ

original: MSS_3094-1 alaṃ nalaṃ roddhumamī kilābhavan guṇā vivekapramukhā na cāpalam /
analyzed: alam nalam roddhum amī kila abhavan guṇāḥ viveka pramukhāḥ na cāpalam

original: MSS_3094-2 smaraḥ sa ratyāmaniruddhameva yat sṛjatyayaṃ sarganisarga īdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: smaraḥ sa ratyām aniruddham eva yat sṛjati ayam sarga nisargaḥ īdṛśaḥ

original: MSS_3095-1 alaṃ parigraheṇeha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥ /
analyzed: alam parigraheṇa iha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥ

original: MSS_3095-2 kṛmirhi kośakārastu badhyate svaparigrahāt //
analyzed: kṛmiḥ hi kośakāraḥ tu badhyate sva parigrahāt

original: MSS_3096-1 alaṃ vā bahu yo brūte hitavākyāvamāninaḥ /
analyzed: alam vā bahu yaḥ brūte hita vākya avamāninaḥ

original: MSS_3096-2 sa tasmāllabhate doṣaṃ kapeḥ sūcīmukho yathā //
analyzed: sa tasmāt labhate doṣam kapeḥ sūcīmukhaḥ yathā

original: MSS_3097-1 alaṃ vā bahuvādena yatra yatrānurajyase /
analyzed: alam vā bahu vādena yatra yatra anurajyase

original: MSS_3097-2 tatra tatraiva te duḥkhadāvapāvakapaṅktayaḥ //
analyzed: tatra tatra eva te duḥkha dāva pāvaka paṅktayaḥ

original: MSS_3098-1 alaṃ vilaṅghya priyavijña yācñāṃ kṛtvāpi vāmyaṃ vividhaṃ vidheye /
analyzed: alam vilaṅghya priya vijña yācñām kṛtvā api vāmyam vividham vidheye

original: MSS_3098-2 yaśaḥpathādāśravatāpadotthāt khalu skhalitvāstakhaloktikhelāt //
analyzed: yaśaḥ pathāt āśrava tā pada utthāt khalu skhalitvā asta khala ukti khelāt

original: MSS_3099-1 alaṃ vilambya tvarituṃ hi velā kārye kila sthairyasahe vicāraḥ /
analyzed: alam vilambya tvaritum hi velā kārye kila sthairya sahe vicāraḥ

original: MSS_3099-2 gurūpadeśaṃ pratibheva tīkṣṇā pratīkṣate jātu na kālamartiḥ //
analyzed: guru upadeśam pratibhā iva tīkṣṇā pratīkṣate jātu na kālam artiḥ

original: MSS_3100-1 alaṃ vivādena yathā śrutaṃ tvayā tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḥ /
analyzed: alam vivādena yathā śrutam tvayā tathāvidhaḥ tāvat aśeṣam astu saḥ

original: MSS_3100-2 mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate //
analyzed: mama atra bhāva eka rasam manaḥ sthitam na kāma vṛttiḥ vacanīyam īkṣate

original: MSS_3101-1 alaṃ sthitvā śmaśāne'smin gṛdhragomāyusaṃkule /
analyzed: alam sthitvā śmaśāne ismin gṛdhra gomāyu saṃkule

original: MSS_3101-2 kaṅkālabahule ghore sarvaprāṇibhayaṃkare //
analyzed: kaṅkāla bahule ghore sarva prāṇi bhayaṃkare

original: MSS_3102-1 na punarjīvitaḥ kaścit kāladharmamupāgataḥ /
analyzed: na punar jīvitaḥ kaścid kāladharmam upāgataḥ

original: MSS_3102-2 priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyaḥ prāṇināṃ gatirīdṛśī //
analyzed: priyaḥ vā yadi vā dveṣyaḥ prāṇinām gatiḥ īdṛśī

original: MSS_3103-1 alaṃ himānīparidīrṇagātraḥ samāpitaḥ phālgunasaṃgamena /
analyzed: alam himānī paridīrṇa gātraḥ samāpitaḥ phālguna saṃgamena

original: MSS_3103-2 atyantamākāṅkṣitakṛṣṇavartmā bhīṣmo mahātmājani māghatulyaḥ //
analyzed: atyantam ākāṅkṣita kṛṣṇa vartmā bhīṣmaḥ mahātmā ajani māgha tulyaḥ

original: MSS_3104-1 alakatamaḥ paripītaṃ susmitasuṣamāpuraskṛtaṃ madhuram /
analyzed: alakatamaḥ paripītam su smita suṣamā puraskṛtam madhuram

original: MSS_3104-2 ko na sudhānidhisahajaṃ sumukhi mukhaṃ hanta saṃmanutām //
analyzed: kaḥ na sudhānidhi sahajam su mukhi mukham hanta saṃmanutām

original: MSS_3105-1 alakāśca khalāścaiva mūrdhni bhīrujanairdhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: alakāḥ ca khalāḥ ca eva mūrdhni bhīru janaiḥ dhṛtāḥ

original: MSS_3105-2 uparyupari satkāre'pyāviṣkurvanti vakratām //
analyzed: upari upari satkāre api āviṣkurvanti vakra tām

original: MSS_3106-1 alakeṣu cūrṇabhāsaḥ svedalavābhān kapolaphalakeṣu /
analyzed: alakeṣu cūrṇa bhāsaḥ sveda lava ābhān kapola phalakeṣu

original: MSS_3106-2 navaghanakautukinīnāṃ vārikaṇān paśyati kṛtārthaḥ //
analyzed: nava ghana kautukinīnām vāri kaṇān paśyati kṛtārthaḥ

original: MSS_3107-1 alaktako yathā rakto naraḥ kāmī tathaiva ca /
analyzed: alaktakaḥ yathā raktaḥ naraḥ kāmī tathā eva ca

original: MSS_3107-2 hṛtasārastathā so'pi pādamūle nipātyate //
analyzed: hṛta sāraḥ tathā saḥ api pāda mūle nipātyate

original: MSS_3108-1 alaktako yathā rakto niṣpīḍya puruṣas tathā /
analyzed: alaktakaḥ yathā raktaḥ niṣpīḍya puruṣaḥ tathā

original: MSS_3108-2 abalābhirbalād raktaḥ pādamūle nipātyate //
analyzed: abalābhiḥ balāt raktaḥ pāda mūle nipātyate

original: MSS_3109-1 alakṣitakucābhogaṃ bhramantī nṛtyabhūmiṣu /
analyzed: alakṣita kuca ābhogam bhramantī nṛtya bhūmiṣu

original: MSS_3109-2 smareṇāpi sarojākṣī na lakṣyīkriyate śaraiḥ //
