analyzed: smareṇa api saroja akṣī na lakṣyīkriyate śaraiḥ

original: MSS_3110-1 alakṣitagatāgataiḥ kulavadhūkaṭākṣairiva kṣaṇānunayaśītalaiḥ praṇayakelikopairiva /
analyzed: alakṣita gata āgataiḥ kula vadhū kaṭākṣaiḥ iva kṣaṇa anunaya śītalaiḥ praṇaya keli kopaiḥ iva

original: MSS_3110-2 suvṛttamasṛṇonnatairmṛgadṛśāmurojairiva tvadīyaturagairidaṃ dharaṇicakramākramyate //
analyzed: su vṛtta masṛṇa unnataiḥ mṛga dṛśām urojaiḥ iva tvadīya turagaiḥ idam dharaṇi cakram ākramyate

original: MSS_3111-1 alakṣmīrāviśatyenaṃ śayānamalasaṃ naram /
analyzed: alakṣmīḥ āviśati enam śayānam alasam naram

original: MSS_3111-2 niḥsaṃśayaṃ phalaṃ labdhvā dakṣo bhūtimupāśnute //
analyzed: niḥsaṃśayam phalam labdhvā dakṣaḥ bhūtim upāśnute

original: MSS_3112-1 alaghutā jaṭharasya kucau gatā caraṇacañcalatā nayane gatā /
analyzed: a laghu tā jaṭharasya kucau gatā caraṇa cañcala tā nayane gatā

original: MSS_3112-2 sakhi vilokaya me tanuceṣṭitaṃ vinimayapragataṃ navayauvanam //
analyzed: sakhi vilokaya me tanu ceṣṭitam vinimaya pragatam nava yauvanam

original: MSS_3113-1 alaghūpalapaṅktiśālinīḥ parito ruddhanirantarāmbarāḥ /
analyzed: a laghu upala paṅkti śālinīḥ paritas ruddha nirantara ambarāḥ

original: MSS_3113-2 adhirūḍhanitambabhūmayo na vimuñcanti cirāya mekhalāḥ //
analyzed: adhirūḍha nitamba bhūmayaḥ na vimuñcanti cirāya mekhalāḥ

original: MSS_3114-1 alaṅghyaṃ tattadudvīkṣya yadyaduccairmahībhṛtām /
analyzed: a laṅghyam tat tat udvīkṣya yat yat uccais mahībhṛtām

original: MSS_3114-2 priyatāṃ jyāyasīṃ mā gān mahatāṃ kena tuṅgatā //
analyzed: priya tām jyāyasīm mā gāt mahatām kena tuṅga tā

original: MSS_3115-1 alaṅghyaṃ sarveṣāmiha khalu phalaṃ karmajanitaṃ vipat karmapraiṣyā vyathayati na jātāsi hṛdayam /
analyzed: a laṅghyam sarveṣām iha khalu phalam karma janitam vipad karma praiṣyā vyathayati na jātā asi hṛdayam

original: MSS_3115-2 yadajñāḥ kurvanti prasabhamupahāsaṃ dhanamadād idaṃ tvantargāḍhaṃ paramaparitāpaṃ janayati //
analyzed: yat ajñāḥ kurvanti prasabham upahāsam dhana madāt idam tu antar gāḍham parama paritāpam janayati

original: MSS_3116-1 alabdhaṃ caiva lipseta labdhaṃ rakṣet prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: alabdham ca eva lipseta labdham rakṣet prayatnataḥ

original: MSS_3116-2 rakṣitaṃ vardhayeccaiva vṛddhaṃ pātreṣu nikṣipet //
analyzed: rakṣitam vardhayet ca eva vṛddham pātreṣu nikṣipet

original: MSS_3117-1 alabdhadugdhādiraso rasāvahaṃ tadudbhavo nimbarasaṃ kṛmiryathā /
analyzed: alabdha dugdha ādi rasaḥ rasa āvaham tad udbhavaḥ nimba rasam kṛmiḥ yathā

original: MSS_3117-2 adṛṣṭajainendravacorasāyanas tathā kutattvaṃ manute rasāyanam //
analyzed: adṛṣṭa jaina indra vacaḥ rasāyanaḥ tathā ku tattvam manute rasāyanam

original: MSS_3118-1 alabdhamiccheddaṇḍena labdhaṃ rakṣedavekṣayā /
analyzed: alabdham icchet daṇḍena labdham rakṣet avekṣayā

original: MSS_3118-2 rakṣitaṃ vardhayed vṛddhyā vṛddhaṃ pātreṣu nikṣipet //
analyzed: rakṣitam vardhayet vṛddhyā vṛddham pātreṣu nikṣipet

original: MSS_3119-1 alabdhamīheddharmeṇa labdhaṃ yatnena pālayet /
analyzed: alabdham īhet dharmeṇa labdham yatnena pālayet

original: MSS_3119-2 pālitaṃ vardhayennītyā vṛddhaṃ pātreṣu nikṣipet //
analyzed: pālitam vardhayet nītyā vṛddham pātreṣu nikṣipet

original: MSS_3120-1 alabdhalipsā nyāyena labdhasya ca vivardhanam /
analyzed: alabdha lipsā nyāyena labdhasya ca vivardhanam

original: MSS_3120-2 parivṛddhasya vidhivat pātre saṃpratipādanam //
analyzed: parivṛddhasya vidhivat pātre saṃpratipādanam

original: MSS_3121-1 alabdhavetano lubdho mānī cāpyavamānitaḥ /
analyzed: a labdha vetanaḥ lubdhaḥ mānī ca api avamānitaḥ

original: MSS_3121-2 kruddhaśca kopito'kasmāt tathā bhītaśca bhīṣitaḥ //
analyzed: kruddhaḥ ca kopita ukasmāt tathā bhītaḥ ca bhīṣitaḥ

original: MSS_3122-1 yathābhilaṣitaiḥ kāmair bhindyādetāṃścaturvidhān /
analyzed: yathā abhilaṣitaiḥ kāmaiḥ bhindyāt etān caturvidhān

original: MSS_3122-2 parapakṣe svapakṣe ca yathāvat praśamaṃ nayet //
analyzed: para pakṣe sva pakṣe ca yathāvat praśamam nayet

original: MSS_3123-1 alabdhāntaḥ praveśasya tāramākrandato bahiḥ /
analyzed: alabdha antar praveśasya tāram ākrandataḥ bahis

original: MSS_3123-2 prabho karuṇayā karṇe kriyantāṃ kṛpaṇoktayaḥ //
analyzed: prabho karuṇayā karṇe kriyantām kṛpaṇa uktayaḥ

original: MSS_3124-1 alabdhe rāgiṇo lokā aho labdhe virāgiṇaḥ /
analyzed: a labdhe rāgiṇaḥ lokāḥ aho labdhe virāgiṇaḥ

original: MSS_3124-2 hemante tāpamīhante hanta grīṣme himaṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: hemante tāpam īhante hanta grīṣme himam punar

original: MSS_3125-1 alabdhvāpi dhanaṃ rājñaḥ saṃśritā yānti saṃpadam /
analyzed: a labdhvā api dhanam rājñaḥ saṃśritāḥ yānti saṃpadam

original: MSS_3125-2 mahāhradasamīpasthaṃ paśya nīlaṃ vanaspatim //
analyzed: mahā hrada samīpa stham paśya nīlam vanaspatim

original: MSS_3126-1 alabdhvā yadi vā labdhvā nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ /
analyzed: a labdhvā yadi vā labdhvā na anuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ

original: MSS_3126-2 ānantaryaṃ cārabhate na prāṇānāṃ dhanāyate //
analyzed: ānantaryam ca ārabhate na prāṇānām dhanāyate

original: MSS_3127-1 alabhanta nabhaḥkṣetre tārāstaralakāntayaḥ /
analyzed: alabhanta nabhaḥ kṣetre tārāḥ tarala kāntayaḥ

original: MSS_3127-2 tviṣaṃ tuṣārabījānāṃ nūtanāṅkuraśālinām //
analyzed: tviṣam tuṣāra bījānām nūtana aṅkura śālinām

original: MSS_3128-1 alabhyaṃ lapsyamānena tattvaṃ jijñāsunā ciram /
analyzed: alabhyam lapsyamānena tattvam jijñāsunā ciram

original: MSS_3128-2 jigīṣuṇā hriyaṃ tyaktvā kāryaṃ kolāhalo mahān //
analyzed: jigīṣuṇā hriyam tyaktvā kāryam kolāhalaḥ mahān

original: MSS_3129-1 alabhyaṃ labdhukāmasya janasya gatirīdṛśī /
analyzed: alabhyam labdhu kāmasya janasya gatiḥ īdṛśī

original: MSS_3129-2 alabdheṣu manastāpaḥ saṃcitārtho vinaśyati //
analyzed: alabdheṣu manaḥ tāpaḥ saṃcita arthaḥ vinaśyati

original: MSS_3130-1 alabhyalābhāya ca labdhavṛddhaye yathārhatīrthapratipādanāya ca /
analyzed: alabhya lābhāya ca labdha vṛddhaye yathārha tīrtha pratipādanāya ca

original: MSS_3130-2 yaśasvinaṃ vedavidaṃ vipaścitaṃ bahuśrutaṃ brāhmaṇameva vāsaya //
analyzed: yaśasvinam veda vidam vipaścitam bahu śrutam brāhmaṇam eva vāsaya

original: MSS_3131-1 alamaticapalatvāt svapnamāyopamatvāt pariṇativirasatvāt saṃgamenāṅganāyāḥ /
analyzed: alam ati capala tvāt svapna māyā upama tvāt pariṇati virasa tvāt saṃgamena aṅganāyāḥ

original: MSS_3131-2 iti yadi śatakṛtvas tattvamālocayāmas tadapi na hariṇākṣīṃ vismaratyantarātmā //
analyzed: iti yadi śata kṛtvas tattvam ālocayāmaḥ tat api na hariṇa akṣīm vismarati antarātmā

original: MSS_3132-1 alamathavā bahuvādair viracaya lokānurāganirbandham /
analyzed: alam athavā bahu vādaiḥ viracaya loka anurāga nirbandham

original: MSS_3132-2 tatraikatra samagraṃ tannihitaṃ yanna jātu saṃnihitam //
analyzed: tatra ekatra samagram tat nihitam yat na jātu saṃnihitam

original: MSS_3133-1 alamandha bhujāyaṣṭibhrāntyā bhrātarjaḍasya te /
analyzed: alam andha bhujāyaṣṭi bhrāntyā bhrātar jaḍasya te

original: MSS_3133-2 daṃśāya daṃdaśūko'yaṃ daṃśamudrāṃ na muñcati //
analyzed: daṃśāya daṃdaśūkaḥ iyam daṃśa mudrām na muñcati

original: MSS_3134-1 alamanyathā gṛhītvā na khalu manasvini mayā prayuktamidam /
analyzed: alam anyathā gṛhītvā na khalu manasvini mayā prayuktam idam

original: MSS_3134-2 prāyaḥ samānavidyāḥ parasparayaśaḥpurobhāgāḥ //
analyzed: prāyas samāna vidyāḥ paraspara yaśaḥ purobhāgāḥ

original: MSS_3135-1 alamanyairupālambhaiḥ kīrtitaiśca vyatikramaiḥ /
analyzed: alam anyaiḥ upālambhaiḥ kīrtitaiḥ ca vyatikramaiḥ

original: MSS_3135-2 peśalaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kartavyaṃ hitamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: peśalam ca anurūpam ca kartavyam hitam ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_3136-1 alamapriyāṇyuditvā rucirārthāḥ kimiha na sthitā vācaḥ /
analyzed: alam apriyāṇi uditvā rucira arthāḥ kim iha na sthitāḥ vācaḥ

original: MSS_3136-2 amṛtamiti vacasi satyapi viṣamiti hi kimucyate vāri //
analyzed: amṛtam iti vacasi sati api viṣam iti hi kim ucyate vāri

original: MSS_3137-1 alamabhimukhairbaddhairbhogairalaṃ bhramibhirdṛśor alamaviralairgarjodgārairalaṃ viṣavṛṣṭibhiḥ /
analyzed: alam abhimukhaiḥ baddhaiḥ bhogaiḥ alam bhramibhiḥ dṛśoḥ alam aviralaiḥ garja udgāraiḥ alam viṣa vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: MSS_3137-2 kimiha bhujagāḥ kopāvegairamībhiramudritair nanu bhagavatastārkṣyasyaite vayaṃ stutipāṭhakāḥ //
analyzed: kim iha bhujagāḥ kopa āvegaiḥ amībhiḥ a mudritaiḥ nanu bhagavataḥ tārkṣyasya ete vayam stuti pāṭhakāḥ

original: MSS_3138-1 alamalamaghṛṇasya tasya nāmnā punarapi saiva kathā gataḥ sa kālaḥ /
analyzed: alam alam aghṛṇasya tasya nāmnā punar api sā eva kathā gataḥ sa kālaḥ

original: MSS_3138-2 kathaya kathaya vā tathāpi dūti prativacanaṃ dviṣato'pi mānanīyam //
analyzed: kathaya kathaya vā tathā api dūti prativacanam dviṣataḥ api mānanīyam

original: MSS_3139-1 alamalamatimātraṃ sāhasenāmunā te tvaritamayi vimuñca tvaṃ latāpāśamenam /
analyzed: alam alam atimātram sāhasena amunā te tvarita mayi vimuñca tvam latā pāśam enam

original: MSS_3139-2 calitamapi niroddhuṃ jīvitaṃ jīviteśe kṣaṇamiha mama kaṇṭhe bāhupāśaṃ nidhehi //
analyzed: calitam api niroddhum jīvitam jīviteśe kṣaṇam iha mama kaṇṭhe bāhu pāśam nidhehi

original: MSS_3140-1 alamalamativṛddhyā sthīyatāṃ tasya paśyasy akaruṇa karabhororbhajyate madhyametat /
analyzed: alam alam ati vṛddhyā sthīyatām tasya paśyasi akaruṇa karabha ūroḥ bhajyate madhyam etat

original: MSS_3140-2 iti gurujaghanājñācoditā romarājiḥ stanayugamasitākṣyā vaktumārohatīva //
analyzed: iti guru jaghana ājñā coditā romarājiḥ stana yugam asita akṣyāḥ vaktum ārohati iva

original: MSS_3141-1 alamalamanugamya prasthitaṃ prāṇanāthaṃ prathamavirahaśoke na pratīkāra eṣaḥ /
analyzed: alam alam anugamya prasthitam prāṇanātham prathama viraha śoke na pratīkāraḥ eṣaḥ

original: MSS_3141-2 sapadi ramaṇayātrā śreya ityāraṭantyā caraṇapatanapūrvaṃ sā niruddheva kāñcyā //
analyzed: sapadi ramaṇa yātrā śreyaḥ iti āraṭantyā caraṇa patana pūrvam sā niruddhā iva kāñcyā

original: MSS_3142-1 alamalamiyameva prāṇināṃ pātakānāṃ nirasanaviṣaye yā kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti vāṇī /
analyzed: alam alam iyam eva prāṇinām pātakānām nirasana viṣaye yā kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa iti vāṇī

original: MSS_3142-2 yadi bhavati mukunde bhaktirānandasāndrā viluṭhati caraṇābje mokṣasāmrājyalakṣmīḥ //
analyzed: yadi bhavati mukunde bhaktiḥ ānanda sāndrā viluṭhati caraṇa abje mokṣa sāmrājya lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_3143-1 alamātmīyaṃ viditaṃ viditaṃ dhanikasya yācako'vahitaḥ /
analyzed: alam ātmīyam viditam viditam dhanikasya

original: MSS_3143-2 candraṃ bravīti caṭakaṃ caṭakaṃ candraṃ ca lobhalolamanā //
analyzed: candram bravīti caṭakam caṭakam candram ca lobha lola manāḥ

original: MSS_3144-1 alamādivarāheṇa vaṭudāsaṃ paraṃ stumaḥ /
analyzed: alam ādivarāheṇa vaṭu dāsam param stumaḥ

original: MSS_3144-2 jagaduddharatā yena na vakrīkṛtamānanam //
analyzed: jagat uddharatā yena na vakrīkṛtam ānanam

original: MSS_3145-1 alamudakena tṛṇairvā manasvinā prāṇadhāraṇā kāryā /
analyzed: alam udakena tṛṇaiḥ vā manasvinā prāṇa dhāraṇā kāryā

original: MSS_3145-2 nāsaṃskṛtaśca puruṣaḥ prākṛtasattvaḥ praṇayitavyaḥ //
analyzed: na asaṃskṛtaḥ ca puruṣaḥ prākṛta sattvaḥ praṇayitavyaḥ

original: MSS_3146-1 alalitagatiruccaiḥ sthūlavakrāṅgulīkaṃ vahati caraṇa yugmaṃ kandharāṃ hrasvapīnām /
analyzed: a lalita gatiḥ uccais sthūla vakra aṅgulīkam vahati caraṇa yugmam kandharām hrasva pīnām

original: MSS_3146-2 kapilakacakalāpā krūraceṣṭātipīnā dviradamadavigandhiḥ svāṅkake'naṅkake ca //
analyzed: kapila kaca kalāpā krūra ceṣṭā ati pīnā dvirada mada vigandhiḥ sva aṅkakena aṅkake ca

original: MSS_3147-1 dviguṇakaṭukaṣāyaprāyabhug vītalajjā luladativipuloṣṭhī duḥkhasādhyā prayoge /
analyzed: dviguṇa kaṭu kaṣāya prāya bhuj vīta lajjā lulat ati vipula uṣṭhī duḥkha sādhyā prayoge

original: MSS_3147-2 bahirapi bahuromātyantamantarviśālaṃ vahati jaghanarandhraṃ hastinī gadgadoktiḥ //
analyzed: bahis api bahu roma atyantam antar viśālam vahati jaghana randhram hastinī gadgada uktiḥ

original: MSS_3148-1 alasaṃ mukharaṃ stabdhaṃ krūraṃ vyasaninaṃ śaṭham /
analyzed: alasam mukharam stabdham krūram vyasaninam śaṭham

original: MSS_3148-2 asaṃtuṣṭamabhaktaṃ ca tyajed bhṛtyaṃ narādhipaḥ //
analyzed: asaṃtuṣṭam abhaktam ca tyajet bhṛtyam narādhipaḥ

original: MSS_3149-1 alasaṃ vapuṣi ślathaṃ dukūle capalaṃ cetasi dhūsaraṃ kapole /
analyzed: alasam vapuṣi ślatham dukūle capalam cetasi dhūsaram kapole

original: MSS_3149-2 cakitaṃ nayane stane vilolaṃ tava nāmaśravaṇaṃ tanūdarīṇām //
analyzed: cakitam nayane stane vilolam tava nāma śravaṇam tanu udarīṇām

original: MSS_3150-1 alasaṃ vikramaśrāntaṃ vihatopāyaceṣṭitam /
analyzed: alasam vikrama śrāntam vihata upāya ceṣṭitam

original: MSS_3150-2 kṣayavyayapravāsaiśca śrameṇa viparidrutam //
analyzed: kṣaya vyaya pravāsaiḥ ca śrameṇa viparidrutam

original: MSS_3151-1 bhīruṃ mūrkhaṃ striyaṃ bālaṃ dhārmikaṃ durjanaṃ paśum /
analyzed: bhīrum mūrkham striyam bālam dhārmikam durjanam paśum

original: MSS_3151-2 maitrīpradhānaṃ kalyāṇabuddhiṃ sāntvena sādhayet //
analyzed: maitrī pradhānam kalyāṇa buddhim sāntvena sādhayet

original: MSS_3152-1 alasabhujalatābhirnādṛto nāgarībhir bhavanadamanakānāṃ nātithirvā babhūva /
analyzed: alasa bhuja latābhiḥ na ādṛtaḥ nāgarībhiḥ bhavana damanakānām na atithiḥ vā babhūva

original: MSS_3152-2 tvadarinagaramadhye saṃcaraṃścaitrajanmā jaradajagarapītaḥ kṣīyate gandhavāhaḥ //
analyzed: tvad ari nagara madhye saṃcaran caitra janmā jarat ajagara pītaḥ kṣīyate gandhavāhaḥ

original: MSS_3153-1 alasamadhurā snigdhā dṛṣṭirghanatvamupāgatā kisalayarucirnistāmbūlasvabhāvadharodharaḥ /
analyzed: alasa madhurā snigdhā dṛṣṭiḥ ghana tvam upāgatā kisalaya ruciḥ nistāmbūla svabhāva dharodharaḥ

original: MSS_3153-2 trivalivalayā lekhonneyā ghaṭanta ivaikataḥ prakṛtisubhagā garbheṇāsau kimapyupapāditā //
analyzed: trivali valayāḥ lekha unneyāḥ ghaṭantaḥ iva ekatas prakṛti subhagā garbheṇa asau kim api upapāditā

original: MSS_3154-1 alasamukulitākṣaṃ vaktramālokya tasyā mayi vilulitacitte mūkabhāvaṃ prapanne /
analyzed: alasa mukulita akṣam vaktram ālokya tasyāḥ mayi vilulita citte mūka bhāvam prapanne

original: MSS_3154-2 śravaṇakuvalayāntaścāriṇā ṣaṭpadena kṣaṇamanugatanādaṃ gītamantaḥ smarāmi //
analyzed: śravaṇa kuvalaya antar cāriṇā ṣaṭpadena kṣaṇam anugata nādam gītam antar smarāmi

original: MSS_3155-1 alasayati gātramadhikaṃ bhramayati cetastanoti saṃtāpam /
analyzed: alasayati gātram adhikam bhramayati cetaḥ tanoti saṃtāpam

original: MSS_3155-2 mohaṃ ca muhuḥ kurute viṣamaviṣaṃ vīkṣitaṃ tasyāḥ //
analyzed: moham ca muhur kurute viṣama viṣam vīkṣitam tasyāḥ

original: MSS_3156-1 alasalulitamugdhānyadhvasaṃpātakhedād aśithilaparirambhairdattasaṃvāhanāni /
analyzed: alasa lulita mugdhāni adhva saṃpāta khedāt a śithila parirambhaiḥ datta saṃvāhanāni

original: MSS_3156-2 parimṛditamṛṇālīdurbalānyaṅgakāni tvamurasi mama kṛtvā yatra nidrāmavāptā //
analyzed: parimṛdita mṛṇālī durbalāni aṅgakāni tvam urasi mama kṛtvā yatra nidrām avāptā

original: MSS_3157-1 alasavalitaiḥ premārdrārdrairmuhurmukulīkṛtaiḥ kṣaṇamabhimukhairlajjālolairnimeṣaparāṅmukhaiḥ /
analyzed: alasa valitaiḥ prema ārdra ārdraiḥ muhur mukulīkṛtaiḥ kṣaṇam abhimukhaiḥ lajjā lolaiḥ nimeṣa parāṅmukhaiḥ

original: MSS_3157-2 hṛdayanihitaṃ bhāvākūtaṃ vamadbhirivekṣaṇaiḥ kathaya sukṛtī ko'yaṃ mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate //
analyzed: hṛdaya nihitam bhāvākūtam vamadbhiḥ iva īkṣaṇaiḥ kathaya su kṛtī kaḥ yam mugdhe tvayā adya vilokyate

original: MSS_3158-1 alasavilasanmugdhasnigdhasmitaṃ vrajasundarīm adanakadanasvinnaṃ dhanyaṃ mahadvadanāmbujam /
analyzed: alasa vilasat mugdha snigdha smitam vrajasundarīm adana kadana svinnam dhanyam mahat vadana ambujam

original: MSS_3158-2 taruṇamaruṇajyotsnākārtsnyasmitasnapitādharaṃ jayati vijayaśreṇīmeṇīdṛśāṃ madayanmahaḥ //
analyzed: taruṇam aruṇa jyotsnā kārtsnya smita snapita adharam jayati vijaya śreṇī meṇī dṛśām madayat mahaḥ

original: MSS_3159-1 alasavilasitānāmullasadbhrūlatānāṃ masṛṇamukulitānāṃ prāntavistāritānām /
analyzed: alasa vilasitānām ullasat bhrū latānām masṛṇa mukulitānām prānta vistāritānām

original: MSS_3159-2 pratinayananipāte kiṃcidākuñcitānāṃ vividhamahamabhūvaṃ pātramālokitānām //
analyzed: pratinayana nipāte kiṃcid ākuñcitānām vividham aham abhūvam pātram ālokitānām

original: MSS_3160-1 alasasya kuto vidyā avidyasya kuto dhanam /
analyzed: alasasya kutas vidyā avidyasya kutas dhanam

original: MSS_3160-2 adhanasya kuto mitram amitrasya kutaḥ sukham //
analyzed: adhanasya kutas mitram amitrasya kutas sukham

original: MSS_3161-1 alasasyālpadoṣasya nirvidyasyākṛtātmanaḥ /
analyzed: alasasya alpa doṣasya nirvidyasya akṛtātmanaḥ

original: MSS_3161-2 pradānakāle bhavati mātāpi hi parāṅmukhī //
analyzed: pradāna kāle bhavati mātā api hi parāṅmukhī

original: MSS_3162-1 alasānapi n n rakṣen na kṛtaghnān kadācana /
analyzed: alasān api n rakṣet na kṛtaghnān kadācana

original: MSS_3162-2 dviṣato'pi guṇāḥ kāmyāḥ suhṛdo'pi na durguṇāḥ //
analyzed: dviṣataḥ api guṇāḥ kāmyāḥ suhṛdaḥ api na durguṇāḥ

original: MSS_3163-1 alasāruṇalocanāravindāṃ paribhogocitadhūsaraikacelām /
analyzed: alasa aruṇa locana aravindām paribhoga ucita dhūsara eka celām

original: MSS_3163-2 śithilākulaveṇibandharamyām abalāmantikaśāyinīṃ didṛkṣe //
analyzed: śithila ākula veṇi bandha ramyām abalām antika śāyinīm didṛkṣe

original: MSS_3164-1 alasairmadena sudṛśaḥ śarīrakaiḥ svagṛhān prati pratiyayuḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
analyzed: alasaiḥ madena sudṛśaḥ śarīrakaiḥ sva gṛhān prati pratiyayuḥ śanais śanais

original: MSS_3164-2 alaghuprasāritavilocanāñjali- drutapītamādhavarasaughanirbharaiḥ //
analyzed: a laghu prasārita vilocana añjali druta pīta mādhava rasa ogha nirbharaiḥ

original: MSS_3165-1 alaso mandabuddhiśca sukhī ca vyādhipīḍitaḥ /
analyzed: alasaḥ manda buddhiḥ ca sukhī ca vyādhi pīḍitaḥ

original: MSS_3165-2 nidrāluḥ kāmukaścaiva ṣaḍete śāstravarjitāḥ //
analyzed: nidrāluḥ kāmukaḥ ca eva ṣaṭ ete śāstra varjitāḥ

original: MSS_3166-1 alābuṃ vartulākāraṃ vārtākaṃ kundasaṃnibham /
analyzed: alābum vartula ākāram vārtākam kunda saṃnibham

original: MSS_3166-2 prāṇānte'pi na cāśnīyān masūrānnaṃ savalkalam //
analyzed: prāṇānte api na ca aśnīyāt masūrī annam sa valkalam

original: MSS_3167-1 alābubījaṃ trapusasya bījaṃ tasyaiva toyena ca tanniṣiktam /
analyzed: alābu bījam trapusasya bījam tasya eva toyena ca tat niṣiktam

original: MSS_3167-2 ālepanādyairvidhivat prayuktaṃ hanyādviṣaṃ takṣakasaṃbhavaṃ ca //
analyzed: ālepana ādyaiḥ vidhivat prayuktam hanyāt viṣam takṣaka saṃbhavam ca

original: MSS_3168-1 alābhāt puruṣāṇāṃ hi bhayāt parijanasya ca /
analyzed: alābhāt puruṣāṇām hi bhayāt parijanasya ca

original: MSS_3168-2 vadhabandhabhayāccāpi svayaṃ guptā bhavanti tāḥ //
analyzed: vadha bandha bhayāt ca api svayam guptāḥ bhavanti tāḥ

original: MSS_3169-1 alikulamañjulakeśī parimalabahulā rasāvahā tanvī /
analyzed: ali kula mañjula keśī parimala bahulā rasa āvahā tanvī

original: MSS_3169-2 kiśalayapeśalapāṇiḥ kokilakalabhāṣiṇī priyatamā me //
analyzed: kiśalaya peśala pāṇiḥ kokila kala bhāṣiṇī priyatamā me

original: MSS_3170-1 alinīlālakalataṃ kaṃ na hanti ghanastani /
analyzed: ali nīla alaka latam kam na hanti ghana stani

original: MSS_3170-2 ānanaṃ nalinacchāyanayanaṃ śaśikānti te //
analyzed: ānanam nalina chāya nayanam śaśi kānti te

original: MSS_3171-1 alipaṭalairanuyātāṃ sahṛdayahṛdayajvaraṃ vilumpantīm /
analyzed: ali paṭalaiḥ anuyātām sahṛdaya hṛdaya jvaram vilumpantīm

original: MSS_3171-2 mṛgamadaparimalalaharīṃ samīra pāmarapure kirasi //
analyzed: mṛgamada parimala laharīm samīra pāmara pure kirasi

original: MSS_3172-1 alibhirañjanabindumanoharaiḥ kusumapaṅktinipātibhiraṅkitaḥ /
analyzed: alibhiḥ añjana bindu manoharaiḥ kusuma paṅkti nipātibhiḥ aṅkitaḥ

original: MSS_3172-2 na khalu śobhayati sma vanasthalīṃ na tilakastilakaḥ pramadāmiva //
analyzed: na khalu śobhayati sma vana sthalīm na tilakaḥ tilakaḥ pramadām iva

original: MSS_3173-1 aliyuvā vilalāsa cirāya yas tridaśaśaivalinīkamalodare /
analyzed: ali yuvā vilalāsa cirāya yaḥ tridaśa śaivalinī kamala udare

original: MSS_3173-2 vidhiviyoganiyogavaśīkṛto gatatarau sa marau ramate katham //
analyzed: vidhi viyoga niyoga vaśīkṛtaḥ gatatarau sa marau ramate katham

original: MSS_3174-1 aliranusarati parimalaṃ lakṣmīranusarati nayaguṇasamṛddhim /
analyzed: aliḥ anusarati parimalam lakṣmīḥ anusarati naya guṇa samṛddhim

original: MSS_3174-2 nimnamanusarati salilaṃ vidhilikhitaṃ buddhiranusarati //
analyzed: nimnam anusarati salilam vidhi likhitam buddhiḥ anusarati

original: MSS_3175-1 alirayaṃ nalinīdalamadhyagaḥ kamalinīmakarandamadālasaḥ /
analyzed: aliḥ ayam nalinī dala madhya gaḥ kamalinī makaranda mada alasaḥ

original: MSS_3175-2 vidhivaśāt paradeśamupāgataḥ kuṭajapuṣparasaṃ bahu manyate //
analyzed: vidhi vaśāt para deśam upāgataḥ kuṭaja puṣpa rasam bahu manyate

original: MSS_3176-1 alirmṛgo vā netraṃ vā yatra kiṃcid vibhāsate /
analyzed: aliḥ mṛgaḥ vā netram vā yatra kiṃcid vibhāsate

original: MSS_3176-2 aravindaṃ mṛgāṅko vā mukhaṃ vedaṃ mṛgīdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: aravindam mṛgāṅkaḥ vā mukham vā idam mṛgī dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_3177-1 alivalayairalakairiva kusumastabakaiḥ stanairiva vasante /
analyzed: ali valayaiḥ alakaiḥ iva kusuma stabakaiḥ stanaiḥ iva vasante

original: MSS_3177-2 bhānti latā lalanā iva pāṇibhiriva kisalayaiḥ sapadi //
analyzed: bhānti latāḥ lalanāḥ iva pāṇibhiḥ iva kisalayaiḥ sapadi

original: MSS_3178-1 alīka eva tvadbhāvo madbhāvo'līka eva ca /
analyzed: alīkaḥ eva tvad bhāvaḥ mad bhāva ulīkaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_3178-2 anubhūto'pyasadrūpaḥ svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā //
analyzed: anubhūtaḥ api asat rūpaḥ svapne sva maraṇam yathā

original: MSS_3179-1 alīkarūpo yadi madhyabhāgaḥ payodharākārabhṛtaśca keśāḥ /
analyzed: alīka rūpaḥ yadi madhya bhāgaḥ payodhara ākāra bhṛtaḥ ca keśāḥ

original: MSS_3179-2 utsaṅgaśobhāpi saroruhākṣyāḥ karasya śobhāṃ kalayenna kasmāt //
analyzed: utsaṅga śobhā api saroruha akṣyāḥ karasya śobhām kalayet na kasmāt

original: MSS_3180-1 alīkavyāmuktapracurakabarībandhanamiṣād udañcaddorvallīdvayadhṛtaparīveśanihitaḥ /
analyzed: alīka vyāmukta pracura kabarī bandhana miṣāt udañcat dos vallī dvaya dhṛta parīveśa nihitaḥ

original: MSS_3180-2 ayaṃ jṛmbhārambhasphaṭikaśucidantāṃśunicayo mukhendurgaurāṅgyā galitamṛgajñakṣmā vijayate //
analyzed: ayam jṛmbhā ārambha sphaṭika śuci danta aṃśu nicayaḥ mukha induḥ gaura aṅgyāḥ galita mṛga jña kṣmā vijayate

original: MSS_3181-1 alīnāṃ mālābhirviracitajaṭābhāramahimā parāgaiḥ puṣpāṇāmuparacitabhasmavyatikaraḥ /
analyzed: alīnām mālābhiḥ viracita jaṭā bhāra mahimā parāgaiḥ puṣpāṇām uparacita bhasma vyatikaraḥ

original: MSS_3181-2 vanānāmābhoge kusumavati puṣpoccayaparo marun mandaṃ mandaṃ vicarati parivrājaka iva //
analyzed: vanānām ābhoge kusumavati puṣpa uccaya paraḥ marut mandam mandam vicarati parivrājakaḥ iva

original: MSS_3182-1 aluptasattvakośānāṃ mahattvaṃ mahatāṃ hi kim /
analyzed: a lupta sattva kośānām mahā tvam mahatām hi kim

original: MSS_3182-2 ākarṇitāṃ parasyārtiṃ na cecchindanti tatkṣaṇam //
analyzed: ākarṇitām parasya ārtim na ced chindanti tad kṣaṇam

original: MSS_3183-1 alubdhaiḥ saha sauhārdaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha saṃkathā /
analyzed: alubdhaiḥ saha sauhārdam paṇḍitaiḥ saha saṃkathā

original: MSS_3183-2 uttamaiḥ saha saṅgaśca vidheyāḥ sukhamicchatā //
analyzed: uttamaiḥ saha saṅgaḥ ca vidheyāḥ sukham icchatā

original: MSS_3184-1 alobhaḥ paramaṃ vittam ahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: alobhaḥ paramam vittam ahiṃsā paramam tapaḥ

original: MSS_3184-2 amāyā paramā vidyā niravadyā manīṣiṇām //
analyzed: amāyā paramā vidyā niravadyā manīṣiṇām

original: MSS_3185-1 alomaśaṃ pūrṇaśaśāṅkaśobhaṃ mukhaṃ tu yūnāṃ katicid dināni /
analyzed: alomaśam pūrṇa śaśāṅka śobham mukham tu yūnām katicid dināni

original: MSS_3185-2 jāte tataḥ śmaśruviśālajāle śevālalīnābjatulāṃ bibharti //
analyzed: jāte tatas śmaśru viśāla jāle śevāla līna abja tulām bibharti

original: MSS_3186-1 alaukikamahālokaprakāśitajagattrayaḥ /
MSS_3186-2 stūyate deva sadvaṃśamuktāratnaṃ na kairbhavān //
analyzed: stūyate deva sat vaṃśa muktā ratnam na kaiḥ bhavān

original: MSS_3187-1 alaulyamārogyamaniṣṭhuratvaṃ gandhaḥ śubho mūtrapurīṣamalpam /
analyzed: a laulyam ārogyam aniṣṭhura tvam gandhaḥ śubhaḥ mūtra purīṣam alpam

original: MSS_3187-2 kāntiḥ prasādaḥ svarasaumyatā ca yogapravṛtteḥ prathamaṃ hi cihnam //
analyzed: kāntiḥ prasādaḥ svara saumya tā ca yoga pravṛtteḥ prathamam hi cihnam

original: MSS_3188-1 alpaṃ kiṃcicchriyaṃ prāpya nīco garvāyate laghu /
analyzed: alpam kiṃcid śriyam prāpya nīcaḥ garvāyate laghu

original: MSS_3188-2 padmapatratale bheko manyate daṇḍadhāriṇam //
analyzed: padma patra tale bhekaḥ manyate daṇḍadhāriṇam

original: MSS_3189-1 alpaṃ darpabalaṃ daitya sthiramakrodhaja balam /
analyzed: alpam darpa balam daitya sthiram akrodha ja balam

original: MSS_3189-2 hatastvaṃ darpajairdoṣair hitvā yo bhāṣase kṣamām //
analyzed: hataḥ tvam darpa jaiḥ doṣaiḥ hitvā yaḥ bhāṣase kṣamām

original: MSS_3190-1 alpaṃ nirmitamākāśam anālocyaiva vedhasā /
analyzed: alpam nirmitam ākāśam an ālocya eva vedhasā

original: MSS_3190-2 idamevaṃvidhaṃ bhāvi bhavatyāḥ stanajṛmbhanam //
analyzed: idam evaṃvidham bhāvi bhavatyāḥ stana jṛmbhanam

original: MSS_3191-1 alpato'dhikataḥ sādhyaṃ laghunaiva prasādhayet /
analyzed: sādhyam laghunā eva prasādhayet

original: MSS_3191-2 bhūpradakṣiṇato'halyāṃ gautamaḥ kapilāṃ bhraman //
analyzed: gautamaḥ kapilām bhraman

original: MSS_3192-1 alpatoyaścalatkumbho hyalpadugdhāśca dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: alpa toyaḥ calat kumbhaḥ hi alpa dugdhāḥ ca dhenavaḥ

original: MSS_3192-2 alpavidyo mahāgarvī kurūpī bahuceṣṭitaḥ //
MSS_3193-1 alpaprabhostu sevāyāṃ bhuktimātraṃ prayojanam /
analyzed: alpa prabhoḥ tu sevāyām bhukti mātram prayojanam

original: MSS_3193-2 anugrahamajāmūlyaṃ nigrahaṃ prāṇasaṃkaṭam //
analyzed: anugraham ajāmūlyam nigraham prāṇa saṃkaṭam

original: MSS_3194-1 alpamapyavamanyeta na śatrurbaladarpitaḥ /
analyzed: alpam api avamanyeta na śatruḥ bala darpitaḥ

original: MSS_3194-2 rāmeṇa rāmaḥ śiśunā brāhmaṇyadayayojjhitaḥ //
analyzed: rāmeṇa rāmaḥ śiśunā brāhmaṇya dayayā ujjhitaḥ

original: MSS_3195-1 alpaśrutalava eva prāyaḥ prakaṭayati vāgvibhavamuccaiḥ /
analyzed: alpa śruta lavaḥ eva prāyas prakaṭayati vāc vibhavam uccais

original: MSS_3195-2 sarvatra kunaṭa eva hi nāṭakamadhikaṃ viḍambayati //
analyzed: sarvatra kunaṭaḥ eva hi nāṭakam adhikam viḍambayati

original: MSS_3196-1 alpasāro'pi yo mohād vistāraṃ kartumicchati /
analyzed: alpa sāraḥ api yaḥ mohāt vistāram kartum icchati

original: MSS_3196-2 paścācchocati durbuddhir nālikerabako yathā //
analyzed: paścāt śocati durbuddhiḥ nālikera bakaḥ yathā

original: MSS_3197-1 alpākṣararamaṇīyaṃ yaḥ kathayati niścitaṃ sa khalu vāgmī /
analyzed: alpa akṣara ramaṇīyam yaḥ kathayati niścitam sa khalu vāgmī

original: MSS_3197-2 bahuvacanamalpasāraṃ yaḥ kathayati vipralāpī saḥ //
analyzed: bahuvacanam alpa sāram yaḥ kathayati vipralāpī saḥ

original: MSS_3198-1 alpānāmapi vastūnāṃ saṃhatiḥ kāryasādhikā /
analyzed: alpānām api vastūnām saṃhatiḥ kārya sādhikā

original: MSS_3198-2 tṛṇairguṇatvamāpannair badhyante mattadantinaḥ //
analyzed: tṛṇaiḥ guṇa tvam āpannaiḥ badhyante matta dantinaḥ

original: MSS_3199-1 alpāpakāramapi pārśvagataṃ nihanti nīco na dūramasamāgasamapyarātim /
analyzed: alpa apakāram api pārśva gatam nihanti nīcaḥ na dūram asamāgasam api arātim

original: MSS_3199-2 śvā nirdaśatyupalamantikamāpatantaṃ tattyāginaṃ na tu vidūragamugraroṣaḥ //
analyzed: śvā nirdaśati upalam antikam āpatantam tad tyāginam na tu vidūra gam ugra roṣaḥ

original: MSS_3200-1 alpāyāṃ vā mahatyāṃ vā senāyāmiti niścayaḥ /
analyzed: alpāyām vā mahatyām vā senāyām iti niścayaḥ

original: MSS_3200-2 harṣo yodhagaṇasyaiko jayalakṣaṇamucyate //
analyzed: harṣaḥ yodha gaṇasya ekaḥ jaya lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: MSS_3201-1 alpāśca guṇāḥ sphītā bhavanti guṇasamuditeṣu puruṣeṣu /
analyzed: alpāḥ ca guṇāḥ sphītāḥ bhavanti guṇa samuditeṣu puruṣeṣu

original: MSS_3201-2 śvetagiriśikharakeṣviva niśāsu candrāṃśavaḥ patitāḥ //
analyzed: śveta giri śikharakeṣu iva niśāsu candra aṃśavaḥ patitāḥ

original: MSS_3202-1 alpāśrayaṃ samāsādya mahānapyalpako bhavet /
analyzed: alpa āśrayam samāsādya mahān api alpakaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_3202-2 gajendraḥ parvatākāro yathā darpaṇamāśritaḥ //
analyzed: gaja indraḥ parvata ākāraḥ yathā darpaṇam āśritaḥ

original: MSS_3203-1 alpīyaḥskhalanena yatra patanaṃ kṛcchreṇa yatronnatir dvāre vetralatāvitānagahane kaṣṭaḥ praveśakramaḥ /
analyzed: alpīyaḥ skhalanena yatra patanam kṛcchreṇa yatra unnatiḥ dvāre vetra latā vitāna gahane kaṣṭaḥ praveśa kramaḥ

original: MSS_3203-2 he sāraṅga manoramā vanabhuvastyaktvā viśeṣārthinā kiṃ bhūbhṛtkaṭakasthitivyasaninā vyarthaṃ khurāḥ śātitāḥ //
analyzed: he sāraṅga manoramāḥ vana bhuvaḥ tyaktvā viśeṣa arthinā kim bhūbhṛt kaṭaka sthiti vyasaninā vyartham khurāḥ śātitāḥ

original: MSS_3204-1 alpīyasāmeva nivāsabhūmi- tyāgādvipattirmahatāṃ na jātu /
analyzed: alpīyasām eva nivāsa bhūmi tyāgāt vipattiḥ mahatām na jātu

original: MSS_3204-2 ratnākarāt sanmaṇayo'bhiyānti rājñāṃ śiraḥ kākamukhāni bhekāḥ //
analyzed: ratnākarāt sat maṇayaḥ abhiyānti rājñām śiraḥ kāka mukhāni bhekāḥ

original: MSS_3205-1 alpīyasaiva payasā yatkumbhaḥ pūryate prasiddhaṃ tat /
analyzed: alpīyasā eva payasā yat kumbhaḥ pūryate prasiddham tat

original: MSS_3205-2 brāhmaṃ tejaḥ paśyata kumbhodbhūtaḥ papau vārdhim //
analyzed: brāhmam tejaḥ paśyata kumbha udbhūtaḥ papau vārdhim

original: MSS_3206-1 alpecchurdhṛtimān prājñaś chāyevānugataḥ sadā /
analyzed: alpa icchuḥ dhṛtimān prājñaḥ chāyā iva anugataḥ sadā

original: MSS_3206-2 ādiṣṭo na vikalpeta sa rājavasatiṃ vaset //
analyzed: ādiṣṭaḥ na vikalpeta sa rāja vasatim vaset

original: MSS_3207-1 alpena vibhavenaiva vyayādhikyaṃ na yuktitaḥ /
analyzed: alpena vibhavena eva vyaya ādhikyam na yuktitaḥ

original: MSS_3207-2 kṣīṇena vāsasācchanne pādavistāraṇaṃ yathā //
analyzed: kṣīṇena vāsasā ācchanne pāda vistāraṇam yathā

original: MSS_3208-1 alpenāpi suraktena sādhanena prayojanam /
analyzed: alpena api su raktena sādhanena prayojanam

original: MSS_3208-2 oṣṭhadvayasahāyena kāntāsyena jagajjitam //
analyzed: oṣṭha dvaya sahāyena kāntāsyena jagat jitam

original: MSS_3209-1 alpenaiva guṇena hi kaścilloke prasiddhimupayāti /
analyzed: alpena eva guṇena hi kaścid loke prasiddhim upayāti

original: MSS_3209-2 ekena kareṇa gajaḥ karī na sūryaḥ sahasreṇa //
analyzed: ekena kareṇa gajaḥ karī na sūryaḥ sahasreṇa

original: MSS_3210-1 alpe'pi nṛpatidatte pratiśrute vāpi dātumetena /
analyzed: alpe api nṛpati datte pratiśrute vā api dātum etena

original: MSS_3210-2 utthāyāśīrdeyā kvacidupaviśyāpi pariṣadaucityāt //
analyzed: utthāya āśīḥ deyā kvacid upaviśya api pariṣad aucityāt

original: MSS_3211-1 alpe'pyapakṛte mohān na śāntimupagacchati /
analyzed: alpā ipi apakṛte mohāt na śāntim upagacchati

original: MSS_3211-2 tādṛśaiḥ saṃgataṃ nīcair nṛśaṃsairakṛtātmabhiḥ /
analyzed: tādṛśaiḥ saṃgatam nīcaiḥ nṛśaṃsaiḥ akṛtātmabhiḥ

original: MSS_3211-3 niśāmya nipuṇaṃ buddhyā vidvān dūrād vivarjayet //
analyzed: niśāmya nipuṇam buddhyā vidvān dūrāt vivarjayet

original: MSS_3212-1 alpe vayasi he bāle kucayoḥ patanaḥ kutaḥ /
analyzed: alpe vayasi he bāle kucayoḥ patanaḥ kutas

original: MSS_3212-2 adhastāt khanane mūḍha girayo na patanti kim //
analyzed: adhastāt khanane mūḍha girayaḥ na patanti kim

original: MSS_3213-1 alpo'pi hyariratyantaṃ vardhamānaparākramaḥ /
analyzed: alpaḥ api hi ariḥ atyantam vardhamāna parākramaḥ

original: MSS_3213-2 valmīko mūlaja iva grasate vṛkṣamantikāt //
analyzed: valmīkaḥ mūla jaḥ iva grasate vṛkṣam antikāt

original: MSS_3214-1 avaṃśapatito rājā mūrkhaputraśca paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: a vaṃśa patitaḥ rājā mūrkha putraḥ ca paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_3214-2 adhanī hi dhanaṃ prāpya tṛṇavanmanyate jagat //
analyzed: adhanī hi dhanam prāpya tṛṇa vat manyate jagat

original: MSS_3215-1 avakāśaḥ suvṛttānāṃ hṛdayāntarna yoṣitām /
analyzed: avakāśaḥ su vṛttānām hṛdaya antar na yoṣitām

original: MSS_3215-2 itīva vihitau dhātrā suvṛttau tadbahiḥ kucau //
analyzed: iti iva vihitau dhātrā su vṛttau tad bahis kucau

original: MSS_3216-1 avakeśino'sya yuktaṃ jānāmi taroraśoka iti nāma /
analyzed: avakeśinā usya yuktam jānāmi taroḥ aśokaḥ iti nāma

original: MSS_3216-2 phalapākavidhuritātmā yato'nyathāsau saśokaḥ syāt //
analyzed: phala pāka vidhurita ātmā yatas nyathā asau sa śokaḥ syāt

original: MSS_3217-1 avakrastārakādhīśaḥ paripūrṇapriyodayaḥ /
MSS_3217-2 prācīṃ diśamatikramya patanaṃ pratipadyate //
analyzed: prācīm diśam atikramya patanam pratipadyate

original: MSS_3218-1 avakre māṃsahīne ca vājijaṅghe suśobhane /
analyzed: avakre māṃsa hīne ca vāji jaṅghe su śobhane

original: MSS_3218-2 kūrcaṃ samaṃ susaṃdhi syād granthivraṇavivārjitam //
analyzed: kūrcam samam su saṃdhi syāt granthi vraṇa vivārjitam

original: MSS_3219-1 avagacchati mūḍhacetanaḥ priyanāśaṃ hṛdi śalyamarpitam /
analyzed: avagacchati mūḍha cetanaḥ priya nāśam hṛdi śalyam arpitam

original: MSS_3219-2 sthiradhīstu tadeva manyate kuśaladvāratayā samuddhṛtam //
analyzed: sthira dhīḥ tu tat eva manyate kuśala dvāra tayā samuddhṛtam

original: MSS_3220-1 avagamya kathīkṛtaṃ vapuḥ priyabandhostava niṣphalodayaḥ /
analyzed: avagamya kathīkṛtam vapuḥ priya bandhoḥ tava niṣphala udayaḥ

original: MSS_3220-2 bahule'pi gate niśākaras tanutāṃ duḥkhamanaṅga mokṣyati //
analyzed: bahule api gate niśākaraḥ tanu tām duḥkham anaṅga mokṣyati

original: MSS_3221-1 avacanaṃ vacanaṃ priyasaṃnidhāv anavalokanameva vilokanam /
analyzed: avacanam vacanam priya saṃnidhau anavalokanam eva vilokanam

original: MSS_3221-2 avayavāvaraṇaṃ ca yadañcala- vyatikareṇa tadaṅgasamarpaṇam //
analyzed: avayava āvaraṇam ca yat añcala vyatikareṇa tat aṅga samarpaṇam

original: MSS_3222-1 avacayaparibhogavanti hiṃsraiḥ sahacaritānyamṛgāṇi kānanāni /
analyzed: avacaya paribhogavanti hiṃsraiḥ sahacaritāni a mṛgāṇi kānanāni

original: MSS_3222-2 abhidadhurabhito muniṃ vadhūbhyaḥ samuditasādhvasaviklavaṃ ca cetaḥ //
analyzed: abhidadhuḥ abhitas munim vadhūbhyaḥ samudita sādhvasa viklavam ca cetaḥ

original: MSS_3223-1 avacitakusumā vihāya vallīr yuvatiṣu komalamālyamālinīṣu /
analyzed: avacita kusumāḥ vihāya vallīḥ yuvatiṣu komala mālya mālinīṣu

original: MSS_3223-2 padamupadadhire kulānyalīnāṃ naparicayo malinātmanāṃ pradhānam //
analyzed: padam upadadhire kulāni alīnām na paricayaḥ malina ātmanām pradhānam

original: MSS_3224-1 avacitabalipuṣpā vedisaṃmārgadakṣā niyamavidhijalānāṃ barhiṣāṃ copanetrī /
analyzed: avacita bali puṣpā vedi saṃmārga dakṣā niyama vidhi jalānām barhiṣām ca upanetrī

original: MSS_3224-2 giriśamupacacāra pratyahaṃ sā sukeśī niyamitaparikhedā tacchiraścandrapādaiḥ //
analyzed: giriśam upacacāra pratyaham sā su keśī niyamita parikhedā tad śiraḥ candra pādaiḥ

original: MSS_3225-1 avajitamadhunā tavāhamakṣṇo ruciratayetyavanamya lajjayeva /
analyzed: avajitam adhunā tava aham akṣṇaḥ rucira tayā iti avanamya lajjayā iva

original: MSS_3225-2 śravaṇakuvalayaṃ vilāsavatyā bhramararutairupakarṇamācacakṣe //
analyzed: śravaṇa kuvalayam vilāsavatyāḥ bhramara rutaiḥ upakarṇam ācacakṣe

original: MSS_3226-1 avajñayā dīyate yat tathaivāśraddhayāpi ca /
analyzed: avajñayā dīyate yat tathā eva aśraddhayā api ca

original: MSS_3226-2 tadāhuradhamaṃ dānaṃ munayaḥ satyavādinaḥ //
analyzed: tat āhuḥ adhamam dānam munayaḥ satya vādinaḥ

original: MSS_3227-1 avajñayā na dātavyaṃ kasya cillīlayāpi vā /
analyzed: avajñayā na dātavyam kasya cit līlayā api vā

original: MSS_3227-2 avajñayā kṛtaṃ hanyād dātāraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: avajñayā kṛtam hanyāt dātāram na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_3228-1 avajñayā yadahasaduccakairbalaḥ samullasaddaśanamayūkhamaṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: avajñayā yat ahasat uccakais balaḥ samullasat daśana mayūkha maṇḍalaḥ

original: MSS_3228-2 ruṣāruṇīkṛtamapi tena tatkṣaṇaṃ nijaṃ vapuḥ punaranayannijāṃ rucim //
analyzed: ruṣā aruṇīkṛtam api tena tad kṣaṇam nijam vapuḥ punar anayat nijām rucim

original: MSS_3229-1 avajñāto'pi duṣṭena guṇo doṣo na manyate /
analyzed: avajñātaḥ api duṣṭena guṇaḥ doṣaḥ na manyate

original: MSS_3229-2 nahi campakasaugandhyaṃ pūtirbhṛṅgāvahelayā //
analyzed: na hi campaka saugandhyam pūtiḥ bhṛṅga avahelayā

original: MSS_3230-1 avajñānasahasraistu doṣāḥ kaṣṭatarā dhane /
analyzed: avajñāna sahasraiḥ tu doṣāḥ kaṣṭatarāḥ dhane

original: MSS_3230-2 dhane sukhakalā yā ca sāpi duḥkhairvidhīyate //
analyzed: dhane sukha kalā yā ca sā api duḥkhaiḥ vidhīyate

original: MSS_3231-1 avajñāsphuṭitaṃ prema samīkartuṃ ka īśvaraḥ /
analyzed: avajñā sphuṭitam prema samīkartum kaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: MSS_3231-2 saṃdhiṃ na yāti sphuṭitaṃ lākṣālepena mauktikam //
analyzed: saṃdhim na yāti sphuṭitam lākṣā lepena mauktikam

original: MSS_3232-1 avatārā hyasaṃkheyā hareḥ sattvanidherdvijāḥ /
analyzed: avatārāḥ hi asaṃkheyāḥ hareḥ sattva nidheḥ dvijāḥ

original: MSS_3232-2 yathā vidāsinaḥ kulyāḥ sarasaḥ syuḥ sahasraśaḥ //
analyzed: yathā vidāsinaḥ kulyāḥ sarasaḥ syuḥ sahasraśas

original: MSS_3233-1 avati nikhilalokaṃ yaḥ pitevādṛtātmā dahati duritarāśiṃ pāvako vendhanaukam /
analyzed: avati nikhila lokam yaḥ pitā iva ādṛta ātmā dahati durita rāśim pāvakaḥ vā indhanaukam

original: MSS_3233-2 vitarati śivasaukhyaṃ hanti saṃsāraśatruṃ vidadhatu śubhabuddhyā taṃ budhā dharmamatra //
analyzed: vitarati śiva saukhyam hanti saṃsāra śatrum vidadhatu śubha buddhyā tam budhāḥ dharmam atra

original: MSS_3234-1 avatu vaḥ savitusturagāvalī sphurati madhyagatāruṇanāyakā /
analyzed: avatu vaḥ savituḥ turaga āvalī sphurati madhya gata aruṇa nāyakā

original: MSS_3234-2 samabhilambhitatuṅgapayodharā marakataikalateva nabhaḥśriyaḥ //
analyzed: samabhilambhita tuṅga payodharā marakata eka latā iva nabhaḥ śriyaḥ

original: MSS_3235-1 avadyajambālagaveṣaṇāya kṛtodyamānāṃ khalasairibhāṇām /
analyzed: avadya jambāla gaveṣaṇāya kṛta udyamānām khala sairibhāṇām

original: MSS_3235-2 kavīndravāṅnirjaranirjhariṇyāṃ saṃjāyate vyarthamanorathatvam //
analyzed: kavi indra vāc nirjara nirjhariṇyām saṃjāyate vyartha manoratha tvam

original: MSS_3236-1 avadyamukte pathi yaḥ pravartate pravartayatyanyajanaṃ ca niḥspṛhaḥ /
analyzed: avadya mukte pathi yaḥ pravartate pravartayati anya janam ca niḥspṛhaḥ

original: MSS_3236-2 sa sevitavyaḥ svahitaiṣiṇā guruḥ svayaṃ taraṃstārayituṃ kṣamaḥ param //
analyzed: sa sevitavyaḥ sva hita eṣiṇā guruḥ svayam taran tārayitum kṣamaḥ param

original: MSS_3237-1 avadhānena maunena kāṣāyeṇa jaṭājinaiḥ /
analyzed: avadhānena maunena kāṣāyeṇa jaṭā ajinaiḥ

original: MSS_3237-2 viśvāsayitvā dveṣṭāram avalumped yathā vṛkaḥ //
analyzed: viśvāsayitvā dveṣṭāram avalumpet yathā vṛkaḥ

original: MSS_3238-1 avadhāraya dharmeṣu pradhānamavadhānataḥ /
analyzed: avadhāraya dharmeṣu pradhānam avadhānataḥ

original: MSS_3238-2 nirbharānandakandāya govindāya mano'rpaya //
analyzed: nirbhara ānanda kandāya govindāya

original: MSS_3239-1 avadhārya kāryagurutāmabhavan na bhayāya sāndratamasaṃtamasam /
analyzed: avadhārya kārya guru tām abhavat na bhayāya sāndra tama saṃtamasam

original: MSS_3239-2 sutanoḥ stanau ca dayitopagame tanuromarājipathavepathave //
analyzed: su tanoḥ stanau ca dayitā upagame tanu romarāji patha vepathave

original: MSS_3240-1 avadhidināvadhijīvāḥ prasīda jīvantu pathikajanajāyāḥ /
analyzed: avadhi dina avadhi jīvāḥ prasīda jīvantu pathika jana jāyāḥ

original: MSS_3240-2 durlaṅghyavartmaśailau stanau pidhehi prapāpāli //
analyzed: durlaṅghya vartma śailau stanau pidhehi prapā pāli

original: MSS_3241-1 avadhidivasaḥ prāptaścāyaṃ tanorvirahasya vā ravirayamupaityastaṃ sakhyo mamāpi ca jīvitam /
analyzed: avadhi divasaḥ prāptaḥ ca ayam tanoḥ virahasya vā raviḥ ayam upaiti astam sakhyaḥ mama api ca jīvitam

original: MSS_3241-2 tadalamaphalairāśābandhaiḥ prasīda namo'stu te hṛdaya sahasā pākotpīḍaṃ viḍambaya dāḍimam //
analyzed: tat alam aphalaiḥ āśā bandhaiḥ prasīda namaḥ astu te hṛdaya sahasā pāka utpīḍam viḍambaya dāḍimam

original: MSS_3242-1 avadhidivasaḥ so'yaṃ nātrāgataḥ kimiyat kṣaṇaṃ vitara nayane paśyaitanme puraḥ sakhi sāhasam /
analyzed: avadhi divasaḥ saḥ yam na atra āgataḥ kim iyat kṣaṇam vitara nayane paśya etat me puras sakhi sāhasam

original: MSS_3242-2 iyamiyamahaṃ rūḍhajvālākarālitarodasīṃ malayajarasābhyaktairaṅgaiḥ patāmyabhi kaumudīm //
analyzed: iyam iyam aham rūḍha jvālā karālita rodasīm malayaja rasa abhyaktaiḥ aṅgaiḥ patāmi abhi kaumudīm

original: MSS_3243-1 avadhīraṇāṃ kṛtavatī bhavatī mayi yatkukarmamahimā sa hi me /
analyzed: avadhīraṇām kṛtavatī bhavatī mayi yat ku karma mahimā sa hi me

original: MSS_3243-2 yadi cātako na labhate'mbu ghanād vacanīyatā bhavati kāmbumucaḥ //
analyzed: yadi cātakaḥ na labhata imbu ghanāt vacanīya tā bhavati kā ambumucaḥ

original: MSS_3244-1 avadhīraya dhanavikalaṃ kuru gauravamakṛśasaṃpadaḥ puṃsaḥ /
analyzed: avadhīraya dhana vikalam kuru gauravam akṛśa saṃpadaḥ puṃsaḥ

original: MSS_3244-2 asmādṛśaṃ hi mugdhe dhanasiddhyai rūpanirmāṇam //
analyzed: asmādṛśam hi mugdhe dhana siddhyai rūpa nirmāṇam

original: MSS_3245-1 avadhūtapraṇipātāḥ paścāt saṃtapyamānamanaso'pi /
analyzed: avadhūta praṇipātāḥ paścāt saṃtapyamāna manasaḥ api

original: MSS_3245-2 nibhṛtairvyapatrapante dayitānunayairmanasvinyaḥ //
analyzed: nibhṛtaiḥ vyapatrapante dayita anunayaiḥ manasvinyaḥ

original: MSS_3246-1 avadhūyāribhirnītā hariṇaistulyavṛttitām /
analyzed: avadhūya aribhiḥ nītāḥ hariṇaiḥ tulya vṛtti tām

original: MSS_3246-2 anyonyasyāpi jihrīmaḥ kiṃ punaḥ sahavāsinām //
analyzed: anyonyasya api jihrīmaḥ kim punar sahavāsinām

original: MSS_3247-1 avadhehi kṣaṇamehi bhrātarbhāvajña bhāvaya giraṃ naḥ /
analyzed: avadhehi kṣaṇam ehi bhrātar bhāva jña bhāvaya giram naḥ

original: MSS_3247-2 carame cakāsti cetasi mūkasvapnopamo bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: carame cakāsti cetasi mūka svapna upamaḥ bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_3248-1 avadhau divasāvasānakāle bhavanadvāri vilocane dadhānā /
analyzed: avadhau divasa avasāna kāle bhavana dvāri vilocane dadhānā

original: MSS_3248-2 avalokya samāgataṃ tadā mām atha rāmā vikasanmukhī babhūva //
analyzed: avalokya samāgatam tadā mām atha rāmā vikasat mukhī babhūva

original: MSS_3249-1 avadhyaṃ vāthavāgamyam akṛtyaṃ nāsti kiṃcana /
analyzed: avadhyam vā athavā agamyam akṛtyam na asti kiṃcana

original: MSS_3249-2 loke buddhimatāmatra tasmāttāṃ yojayāmyaham //
analyzed: loke buddhimatām atra tasmāt tām yojayāmi aham

original: MSS_3250-1 avadhyā brāhmaṇā gāvo striyo bālāśca jñātayaḥ /
analyzed: avadhyāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ gāvaḥ striyaḥ bālāḥ ca jñātayaḥ

original: MSS_3250-2 yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuñjīta ye ca syuḥ śaraṇāgatāḥ //
analyzed: yeṣām ca annāni bhuñjīta ye ca syuḥ śaraṇa āgatāḥ

original: MSS_3251-1 avadhyairindupādānām asādhyaiścandanāmbhasām /
analyzed: avadhyaiḥ indu pādānām asādhyaiḥ candana ambhasām

original: MSS_3251-2 dehoṣmabhiḥ subodhaṃ te sakhi kāmāturaṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: deha ūṣmabhiḥ su bodham te sakhi kāma āturam manaḥ

original: MSS_3252-1 avadhyo brāhmaṇo bālaḥ strī tapasvī ca rogabhāk /
analyzed: avadhyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bālaḥ strī tapasvī ca roga bhāj

original: MSS_3252-2 yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuktāni ye ca syuḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ //
analyzed: yeṣām ca annāni bhuktāni ye ca syuḥ śaraṇam gatāḥ

original: MSS_3253-1 avadhyo brāhmaṇo bālaḥ strī tapasvī ca rogabhāk /
analyzed: avadhyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bālaḥ strī tapasvī ca roga bhāj

original: MSS_3253-2 vihitā vyaṅgitā teṣām aparādhe garīyasi //
analyzed: vihitā vyaṅgi tā teṣām aparādhe garīyasi

original: MSS_3254-1 avanatavadanenduricchatīva vyavadhimadhīratayā yadasthitāsmai /
analyzed: avanata vadana induḥ icchati iva vyavadhim adhīra tayā yat asthitā asmai

original: MSS_3254-2 aharata sutarāmato'sya cetaḥ sphuṭamabhibhūṣayati striyastrapaiva //
analyzed: aharata sutarām atas asya cetaḥ sphuṭam abhibhūṣayati striyaḥ trapā eva

original: MSS_3255-1 avanataśirasaḥ prayāma śīghraṃ pathi vṛṣabhā iva varṣatāḍitākṣāḥ /
analyzed: avanata śirasaḥ prayāma śīghram pathi vṛṣabhāḥ iva varṣa tāḍita akṣāḥ

original: MSS_3255-2 mama hi sadasi gauravapriyasya kulajanadarśanakātaraṃ hi cakṣuḥ //
analyzed: mama hi sadasi gaurava priyasya kula jana darśana kātaram hi cakṣuḥ

original: MSS_3256-1 avanamya vakṣasi nimagnakuca- dvitayena gāḍhamupagūḍhavatā /
analyzed: avanamya vakṣasi nimagna kuca dvitayena gāḍham upagūḍhavatā

original: MSS_3256-2 dayitena tatkṣaṇacaladraśanā- kalakiṃkiṇīravamudāsi vadhūḥ //
analyzed: dayitena tad kṣaṇa calat raśanā kala kiṃkiṇī ravam udāsi vadhūḥ

original: MSS_3257-1 avanau śanaiḥ śanaistvaṃ nidadhāsi padadvayaṃ svasya /
analyzed: avanau śanais śanais tvam nidadhāsi pada dvayam svasya

original: MSS_3257-2 lakṣyaṃ paśyasi na vadasi bhajasi jalaṃ baka tato'si sitaḥ //
analyzed: lakṣyam paśyasi na vadasi bhajasi jalam baka tatas usi sitaḥ

original: MSS_3258-1 avantiḥ kāvyamānarca bharcormaukhariśekharaḥ (?) /
MSS_3258-2 śiṣyo bāṇaśca saṃkrāntakāntavedyavacāḥ kaviḥ //
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ bāṇaḥ ca saṃkrānta kānta vedya vacāḥ kaviḥ

original: MSS_3259-1 avantinātho'yamudagrabāhur viśālavakṣāstanuvṛttamadhyaḥ /
analyzed: avantināthaḥ yam udagra bāhuḥ viśāla vakṣāḥ tanu vṛtta madhyaḥ

original: MSS_3259-2 āropya cakrabhramamuṣṇatejās tvaṣṭreva yatnollikhito vibhāti //
analyzed: āropya cakra bhramam uṣṇa tejāḥ tvaṣṭrā iva yatna ullikhitaḥ vibhāti

original: MSS_3260-1 avanti ye janakasamā munīśvarāś caturvidhaṃ gaṇamanavadyavṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: avanti ye janaka samāḥ muni īśvarāḥ caturvidham gaṇam anavadya vṛttayaḥ

original: MSS_3260-2 svadehavaddalitamadāṣṭakārayo bhavantu te mama guravo bhavāntakāḥ //
analyzed: sva deha vat dalita mada aṣṭaka arayaḥ bhavantu te mama guravaḥ bhava antakāḥ

original: MSS_3261-1 avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryād dharmataḥ kāmato'rthataḥ /
analyzed: avandhyam divasam kuryāt dharmataḥ kāma torthataḥ

original: MSS_3261-2 gate hi divase tasmiṃs tadūnaṃ tasya jīvitam //
analyzed: gate hi divase tasmin tad ūnam tasya jīvitam

original: MSS_3262-1 avandhyakopasya vihanturāpadāṃ bhavanti vaśyāḥ svayameva dehinaḥ /
analyzed: avandhya kopasya vihantuḥ āpadām bhavanti vaśyāḥ svayam eva dehinaḥ

original: MSS_3262-2 amarṣaśūnyena janasya jantunā na jātahārdena na vidviṣādaraḥ //
analyzed: amarṣa śūnyena janasya jantunā na jāta hārdena na vidviṣā ādaraḥ

original: MSS_3263-1 avamānahataṃ yacca dattamaśraddhayā dhanam /
analyzed: avamāna hatam yat ca dattam aśraddhayā dhanam

original: MSS_3263-2 ūṣare niṣphalaṃ bījaṃ kṣiptamakṣiptameva tat //
analyzed: ūṣare niṣphalam bījam kṣiptam akṣiptam eva tat

original: MSS_3264-1 avamānāraṇimathitaṃ durvāgindhanavivardhitajvālam /
analyzed: avamāna araṇi mathitam durvāc indhana vivardhita jvālam

original: MSS_3264-2 satpuruṣāḥ kopāgniṃ jñānāmbughaṭaiḥ praśamayanti //
analyzed: sat puruṣāḥ kopa agnim jñāna ambu ghaṭaiḥ praśamayanti

original: MSS_3265-1 avamānena mahatāṃ praharṣakrodhavismayaiḥ /
analyzed: avamānena mahatām praharṣa krodha vismayaiḥ

original: MSS_3265-2 tapāṃsi kṣayamāyānti yaśāṃsīva sudurnayaiḥ //
analyzed: tapāṃsi kṣayam āyānti yaśāṃsi iva su durnayaiḥ

original: MSS_3266-1 avamuktamapakrāntamukhyaṃ tanna kṣamaṃ yudhi /
analyzed: avamuktam apakrānta mukhyam tat na kṣamam yudhi

original: MSS_3266-2 pitṛpaitāmahaṃ maulaṃ tat kruddhaṃ sāntvitaṃ kṣamam //
analyzed: pitṛpaitāmaham maulam tat kruddham sāntvitam kṣamam

original: MSS_3267-1 avayaḥ kevalakavayaḥ kīrāḥ syuḥ kevalaṃ dhīrāḥ /
analyzed: avayaḥ kevala kavayaḥ kīrāḥ syuḥ kevalam dhīrāḥ

original: MSS_3267-2 vīrāḥ paṇḍitakavayas tānavamantā tu kevalaṃ gavayaḥ //
analyzed: vīrāḥ paṇḍita kavayaḥ tān avamantā tu kevalam gavayaḥ

original: MSS_3268-1 avayaveṣu parasparabiṃbiteṣv atulanirmalakāntiṣu tattanoḥ /
analyzed: avayaveṣu paraspara biṃbiteṣu atula nirmala kāntiṣu tad tanoḥ

original: MSS_3268-2 ayamayaṃ pravibhāga iti sphuṭaṃ jagati niścinute caturo'pi kaḥ //
analyzed: ayam ayam pravibhāgaḥ iti sphuṭam jagati niścinute caturaḥ api kaḥ

original: MSS_3269-1 avalambitaviṣṇupadaḥ karṣitajanacakṣuratulagatiḥ /
analyzed: avalambita viṣṇu padaḥ karṣita jana cakṣuḥ atula gatiḥ

original: MSS_3269-2 patramayo'pi padārthaḥ pataṅgatāmeti guṇayogāt //
analyzed: patra mayaḥ api padārthaḥ pataṅga tām eti guṇa yogāt

original: MSS_3270-1 avalipteṣu mūrkheṣu raudrasāhasikeṣu ca /
analyzed: avalipteṣu mūrkheṣu raudra sāhasikeṣu ca

original: MSS_3270-2 tathaivāpetadharmeṣu na maitrīmācared budhaḥ //
analyzed: tathā eva apeta dharmeṣu na maitrīm ācaret budhaḥ

original: MSS_3271-1 avalepamanaṅgasya vardhayanti balāhakāḥ /
analyzed: avalepam anaṅgasya vardhayanti balāhakāḥ

original: MSS_3271-2 karśayanti tu dharmasya mārutoddhūtaśīkarāḥ //
analyzed: karśayanti tu dharmasya māruta uddhūta śīkarāḥ

original: MSS_3272-1 avalokanamapi sukhayati kuvalayadalacārucapalanayanāyāḥ /
analyzed: avalokanam api sukhayati kuvalaya dala cāru capala nayanāyāḥ

original: MSS_3272-2 kiṃ punaralakacaladdyuti- sarabhasamāliṅganaṃ tanvyāḥ //
analyzed: kim punar alaka calat dyuti sarabhasa āliṅganam tanvyāḥ

original: MSS_3273-1 avalokitamanumodita- māliṅgitamaṅganābhiranurāgaiḥ /
analyzed: avalokitam anumodita māliṅgitam aṅganābhiḥ anurāgaiḥ

original: MSS_3273-2 adhivṛndāvanakuñjaṃ marakatapuñjaṃ namasyāmaḥ //
analyzed: adhi vṛndāvana kuñjam marakata puñjam namasyāmaḥ

original: MSS_3274-1 avalokya nartitaśikhaṇḍimaṇḍalair navanīradairniculitaṃ nabhastalam /
analyzed: avalokya nartita śikhaṇḍi maṇḍalaiḥ nava nīradaiḥ niculitam nabhastalam

original: MSS_3274-2 divase'pi vañjulanikuñjamitvarī viśati sma vallabhavataṃsitaṃ rasāt //
analyzed: divase api vañjula nikuñjam itvarī viśati sma vallabha vataṃsitam rasāt

original: MSS_3275-1 avalokya stanau vadhvā guñjāphalavibhūṣitau /
analyzed: avalokya stanau vadhvāḥ guñjā phala vibhūṣitau

original: MSS_3275-2 niḥśvasya roditi kliṣṭā kuto vyādhakaṭumbinī //
analyzed: niḥśvasya roditi kliṣṭā kutas vyādha kaṭumbinī

original: MSS_3276-1 avaśendriyacittānāṃ hastisnānamiva kriyā /
analyzed: avaśa indriya cittānām hasti snānam iva kriyā

original: MSS_3276-2 durbhagābharaṇaprāyo jñānaṃ bhāraḥ kriyāṃ vinā //
analyzed: durbhaga ābharaṇa prāyaḥ jñānam bhāraḥ kriyām vinā

original: MSS_3277-1 avaśyaṃ kopāgnistava sutanu nirvāsyati cirāt svaśobhāmārūḍhaṃ mukhamapi ca te hāsyati śucam /
analyzed: avaśyam kopa agniḥ tava su tanu nirvāsyati cirāt sva śobhām ārūḍham mukham api ca te hāsyati śucam

original: MSS_3277-2 bhavadgoṣṭhīśūnyā mama tu divasā yānti ya ime na teṣāmāvṛttiḥ punarapi mano dūyata iti //
analyzed: bhavat goṣṭhī śūnyāḥ mama tu divasāḥ yānti ye ime na teṣām āvṛttiḥ punar api manaḥ dūyate iti

original: MSS_3278-1 avaśyaṃ nidhanaṃ sarvair gantavyamiha mānavaiḥ /
analyzed: avaśyam nidhanam sarvaiḥ gantavyam iha mānavaiḥ

original: MSS_3278-2 avaśyabhāvinyarthe vai saṃtāpo neha vidyate //
analyzed: avaśya bhāvini arthe vai saṃtāpaḥ na iha vidyate

original: MSS_3279-1 avaśyaṃ piturācāraṃ putraḥ samanuvartate /
analyzed: avaśyam pituḥ ācāram putraḥ samanuvartate

original: MSS_3279-2 nahi ketakavṛkṣasya bhavatyāmalakīphalam //
analyzed: nahi ketaka vṛkṣasya bhavati āmalaka phalam

original: MSS_3280-2 avaśyaṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇā rakṣitavyā yathābalam //
analyzed: avaśyam prāṇinām prāṇāḥ rakṣitavyāḥ yathābalam

original: MSS_3281-1 avaśyaṃ bhāvinaṃ nāśaṃ bhāvitvād vidhyupasthitam /
analyzed: avaśyam bhāvinam nāśam bhāvi tvāt vidhi upasthitam

original: MSS_3281-2 ayameva hi te kālaḥ pūrvamāsīdanāgataḥ //
analyzed: ayam eva hi te kālaḥ pūrvam āsīt anāgataḥ

original: MSS_3282-1 avaśyaṃ bhāvino bhāvā bhavanti mahātamapi /
analyzed: avaśyam bhāvinaḥ bhāvāḥ bhavanti

original: MSS_3282-2 nagnatvaṃ nīlakaṇṭhasya mahāhiśayanaṃ hareḥ //
analyzed: nagna tvam nīlakaṇṭhasya mahā ahi śayanam hareḥ

original: MSS_3283-1 avaśyaṃbhāvibhāvānāṃ pratīkāro bhaved yada /
analyzed: avaśyaṃbhāvi bhāvānām pratīkāraḥ bhavet

original: MSS_3283-2 tadā duḥkhairna bādhyante nalarāmayudhiṣṭhirāḥ //
analyzed: tadā duḥkhaiḥ na bādhyante nala rāma yudhiṣṭhirāḥ

original: MSS_3284-1 avaśyaṃ yātāraścirataramuṣitvāpi viṣayā viyoge ko bhedastyajati na jano yat svamamūn /
analyzed: avaśyam yātāraḥ cirataram uṣitvā api viṣayāḥ viyoge kaḥ bhedaḥ tyajati na janaḥ yat svam amūn

original: MSS_3284-2 vrajantaḥ svātantryādatulaparitāpāya manasaḥ svayaṃ tyaktā hyete śamasukhamanantaṃ vidadhati //
analyzed: vrajantaḥ svātantryāt atula paritāpāya manasaḥ svayam tyaktāḥ hi ete śama sukham anantam vidadhati

original: MSS_3285-1 avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: avaśyam labhate kartā phalam pāpasya karmaṇaḥ

original: MSS_3285-2 ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpamivārtavam //
analyzed: ghoram paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam iva ārtavam

original: MSS_3286-1 avaśyakāraṇaiḥ prāṇān dhārayatyeva cātakaḥ /
analyzed: avaśya kāraṇaiḥ prāṇān dhārayati eva cātakaḥ

original: MSS_3286-2 prārthanābhaṅgabhīto'pi śakrādapi na yācate //
analyzed: prārthanā bhaṅga bhītaḥ upi śakrāt api na yācate

original: MSS_3287-1 avaśyagatvaraiḥ prāṇair mṛtyukāle mahātmanām /
analyzed: avaśya gatvaraiḥ prāṇaiḥ mṛtyu kāle mahātmanām

original: MSS_3287-2 paropakāraścet kaścit sidhyet tadamṛtaṃ mṛtam //
analyzed: para upakāraḥ ced kaścid sidhyet tat amṛtam mṛtam

original: MSS_3288-1 avaśyaniṣpattimahāphalāḍhyām adīrghasūtrāṃ pariṇāmakalyām /
analyzed: avaśya niṣpatti mahā phala āḍhyām adīrghasūtrām pariṇāma kalyām

original: MSS_3288-2 kāmaṃ vyayāyāsakarīmupeyān na tveva jātu kṣayadoṣayuktām //
analyzed: kāmam vyaya āyāsa karīm upeyāt na tu eva jātu kṣaya doṣa yuktām

original: MSS_3289-1 avaśyabhavyeṣvanavagrahagrahā yayā diśā dhāvati vedhasaḥ spṛhā /
analyzed: avaśya bhavyeṣu anavagraha grahā yayā diśā dhāvati vedhasaḥ spṛhā

original: MSS_3289-2 tṛṇena vātyeva tayānugamyate janasya cittena bhṛśāvaśātmanā //
analyzed: tṛṇena vā ati eva tayā anugamyate janasya cittena bhṛśa avaśa ātmanā

original: MSS_3290-1 avaśyamāyānti vaśaṃ vipaścitām upāyasaṃdaṃśabalena saṃpadaḥ /
analyzed: avaśyam āyānti vaśam vipaścitām upāya saṃdaṃśa balena saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_3290-2 bhavatyudāraṃ vidhivat prayojite phalaṃ hi rājñāṃ kvacidarthasiddhaye //
analyzed: bhavati udāram vidhivat prayojite phalam hi rājñām kvacid artha siddhaye

original: MSS_3291-1 avaśyamindriyaistāta vartitavyaṃ svagocare /
analyzed: avaśyam indriyaiḥ tāta vartitavyam sva gocare

original: MSS_3291-2 caṇḍarāgastu yastatra taṃ budhaḥ parivarjayet //
analyzed: caṇḍarāgaḥ tu yaḥ tatra tam budhaḥ parivarjayet

original: MSS_3292-1 avaśyameva bhoktavyaṃ karmaṇāṃ tvakṣayaṃ phalam /
analyzed: avaśyam eva bhoktavyam karmaṇām tu akṣayam phalam

original: MSS_3292-2 nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karma kalpakoṭiśatairapi //
analyzed: na abhuktam kṣīyate karma kalpa koṭi śataiḥ api

original: MSS_3293-1 avaśyameva bhoktavyaṃ kṛtaṃ karma śubhāśubham /
analyzed: avaśyam eva bhoktavyam kṛtam karma śubha aśubham

original: MSS_3293-2 kṛtakarmakṣayo nāsti kalpakoṭiśatairapi //
analyzed: kṛta karma kṣayaḥ na asti kalpa koṭi śataiḥ api

original: MSS_3294-1 avaśyāyakaṇaiḥ prāṇān saṃdhārayati tittiriḥ /
analyzed: avaśyāya kaṇaiḥ prāṇān saṃdhārayati tittiriḥ

original: MSS_3294-2 yācñābhaṅgabhayād bhīto na daivamapi yācate //
analyzed: yācñā bhaṅga bhayāt bhītaḥ na daivam api yācate

original: MSS_3295-1 avasarapaṭhitaṃ sarvaṃ subhāṣitatvaṃ prayāti yat kiṃcit /
analyzed: avasara paṭhitam sarvam subhāṣita tvam prayāti yat kiṃcid

original: MSS_3295-2 cāṣaḥ prayāṇasamaye kharaninado maṅgalo bhavati //
analyzed: cāṣaḥ prayāṇa samaye khara ninadaḥ maṅgalaḥ bhavati

original: MSS_3296-1 avasarapaṭhitaṃ sarvaṃ subhāṣitatvaṃ prayātyasūktamapi /
analyzed: avasara paṭhitam sarvam subhāṣita tvam prayāti a su uktam api

original: MSS_3296-2 kṣudhi kadaśanamapi nitarāṃ bhoktuḥ saṃpadyate svādu //
analyzed: kṣudhi kadaśanam api nitarām bhoktuḥ saṃpadyate svādu

original: MSS_3297-1 avasarapaṭhitā vāṇī guṇagaṇarahitāpi śobhate puṃsām /
analyzed: avasara paṭhitā vāṇī guṇa gaṇa rahitā api śobhate puṃsām

original: MSS_3297-2 ratisamaye ramaṇīnāṃ bhūṣaṇahānistu bhūṣaṇaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: rati samaye ramaṇīnām bhūṣaṇa hāniḥ tu bhūṣaṇam bhavati

original: MSS_3298-1 avasaramadhigamya taṃ harantyo hṛdayamayatnakṛtojjvalasvarūpāḥ /
analyzed: avasaram adhigamya tam harantyaḥ hṛdayam ayatna kṛta ujjvala svarūpāḥ

original: MSS_3298-2 avaniṣu padamaṅganāstadānīṃ nyadadhata vibhramasaṃpado'ṅganāsu //
analyzed: avaniṣu padam aṅganāḥ tadānīm nyadadhata vibhrama saṃpadā uṅganāsu

original: MSS_3299-1 avasitaṃ hasitaṃ prasitaṃ mudā vilasitaṃ hrasitaṃ smarabhāsitam /
analyzed: avasitam hasitam prasitam mudā vilasitam hrasitam smara bhāsitam

original: MSS_3299-2 na samadāḥ pramadā hatasaṃmadāḥ purahitaṃ vihitaṃ na samīhitam //
analyzed: na samadāḥ pramadāḥ hata saṃmadāḥ pura hitam vihitam na samīhitam

original: MSS_3300-1 avaskandapradānasya sarve kālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: avaskanda pradānasya sarve kālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: MSS_3300-2 vyasane vartamānasya śatrocchidrānvitasya ca //
analyzed: vyasane vartamānasya śatru chidra anvitasya ca

original: MSS_3301-1 avaskandabhayād rājā prajāgarakṛtaśramam /
analyzed: avaskanda bhayāt rājā prajāgara kṛta śramam

original: MSS_3301-2 divāsuptaṃ sadā hanyān nidrāvyākulasainikam //
MSS_3302-1 avasthā pūjyate rājan na śarīraṃ śarīriṇām /
analyzed: avasthā pūjyate rājan na śarīram śarīriṇām

original: MSS_3302-2 tadā vanacaro rāma idānīṃ nṛpatāṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: tadā vana caraḥ rāmaḥ idānīm nṛpa tām gataḥ

original: MSS_3303-1 avākiran vayovṛddhās taṃ lājaiḥ paurayoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: avākiran vayaḥ vṛddhāḥ tam lājaiḥ paura yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_3303-2 pṛṣatairmandaroddhūtaiḥ kṣīrormaya ivācyutam //
analyzed: pṛṣataiḥ mandara uddhūtaiḥ kṣīra ūrmayaḥ iva acyutam

original: MSS_3304-1 avākṣirāstamasyandhe kilbiṣī narakaṃ patet /
analyzed: kilbiṣī narakam patet

original: MSS_3304-2 yaḥ praśnaṃ vitathaṃ brūyāt pṛṣṭaḥ san dharmaniścaye //
analyzed: yaḥ praśnam vitatham brūyāt pṛṣṭaḥ san dharma niścaye

original: MSS_3305-1 avācyavādāṃśca bahūn vadiṣyanti tavāhitāḥ /
analyzed: avācya vādān ca bahūn vadiṣyanti tava ahitāḥ

original: MSS_3305-2 nindantastava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim //
analyzed: nindantaḥ tava sāmarthyam tatas duḥkhataram nu kim

original: MSS_3306-1 avāpa sāpatrapatāṃ sa bhūpatir jitendriyāṇāṃ dhuri kīrtitasthitiḥ /
analyzed: avāpa sa apatrapa tām sa bhūpatiḥ jita indriyāṇām dhuri kīrtita sthitiḥ

original: MSS_3306-2 asaṃvare śambaravairivikrame krameṇa tatra sphuṭatāmupeyuṣi //
analyzed: asaṃvare śambara vairi vikrame krameṇa tatra sphuṭa tām upeyuṣi

original: MSS_3307-1 avāpustāpamatyarthaṃ śapharyaḥ palvalodake /
analyzed: avāpuḥ tāpam atyartham śapharyaḥ palvala udake

original: MSS_3307-2 putrakṣetrādisaktena mamatvena yathā gṛhī //
analyzed: putra kṣetra ādi saktena mamatvena yathā gṛhī

original: MSS_3308-1 avāptaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ pariṇatarucaḥ śailatanaye kalaṅko naivāyaṃ vilasati śaśāṅkasya vapuṣi /
analyzed: avāptaḥ prāgalbhyam pariṇata rucaḥ śailatanaye kalaṅkaḥ nā eva ayam vilasati śaśāṅkasya vapuṣi

original: MSS_3308-2 amuṣyeyaṃ manye vigaladamṛtasyandaśiśire ratiśrāntā śete rajaniramaṇī gāḍhamurasi //
analyzed: amuṣya iyam manye vigalat amṛta syanda śiśire rati śrāntā śete rajaniramaṇī gāḍham urasi

original: MSS_3309-1 avāptairdrāghimṇā paricayamudanvattaṭabhuvām asau bhāti śyāmadyutibhirudakairmekhalabhuvaḥ /
analyzed: avāptaiḥ drāghimṇā paricayam udanvat taṭa bhuvām asau bhāti śyāma dyutibhiḥ udakaiḥ mekhala bhuvaḥ

original: MSS_3309-2 agastyasyākārṣīd vacanamiti kopādudadhinā gṛhītaḥ keśeṣu prasabhamiva vindhyakṣitidharaḥ //
analyzed: agastyasya akārṣīt vacanam iti kopāt udadhinā gṛhītaḥ keśeṣu prasabham iva vindhya kṣitidharaḥ

original: MSS_3310-1 avāpyate vā kimiyadbhavatyā cittaikapadyāmapi vidyate yaḥ /
analyzed: avāpyate vā kim iyat bhavatyā citta ekapadyām api vidyate yaḥ

original: MSS_3310-2 yatrāndhakāraḥ kila cetaso'pi jihmetarairbrahma tadapyavāpyam //
analyzed: yatra andhakāraḥ kila cetasaḥ api jihma itaraiḥ brahma tat api avāpyam

original: MSS_3311-1 avāpyān kāmayasvārthān nānavāpyān kadācana /
analyzed: avāpyān kāmayasva arthān na an avāpyān kadācana

original: MSS_3311-2 pratyutpannānanubhavan mā śucastvamanāgatān //
analyzed: pratyutpannān anubhavan mā śucaḥ tvam anāgatān

original: MSS_3312-1 avāmabhāgena yadā valitvā śvā pṛṣṭhakaṇḍūtimapākaroti /
analyzed: a vāma bhāgena yadā valitvā śvā pṛṣṭha kaṇḍūtim apākaroti

original: MSS_3312-2 tadahni tatraiva kṛtāntagehe rogābhibhūto niyataṃ prayāti //
analyzed: tad ahni tatra eva kṛtānta gehe roga abhibhūtaḥ niyatam prayāti

original: MSS_3313-1 avālukāślakṣṇamṛdā pūrite gartaśodhanam /
MSS_3313-2 kodaṇḍārdhamite khāte jalasikte vapettarum /
analyzed: kodaṇḍa ardha mite khāte jala sikte vapet tarum

original: MSS_3313-3 kadalīkṣīriṇau ropyau mūle dattvā tu gomayam //
analyzed: kadalī kṣīriṇau ropyau mūle dattvā tu gomayam

original: MSS_3314-1 avāhitā vinaśyanti sarvakarmakṣamā api /
analyzed: avāhitāḥ vinaśyanti sarva karma kṣamāḥ api

original: MSS_3314-2 kṛśā vyādhiparītāṅgā jāyante'tyantavāhanāt //
analyzed: kṛśāḥ vyādhi parīta aṅgāḥ jāyanta iti antavāhanāt

original: MSS_3315-1 avikāriṇamapi sajjanam aniśamanāryaḥ prabādhate'tyartham /
analyzed: avikāriṇam api sat janam aniśam anāryaḥ prabādhata iti artham

original: MSS_3315-2 kamalinyā kimiha kṛtaṃ himasya yattāṃ sadā dahati //
analyzed: kamalinyā kim iha kṛtam himasya yat tām sadā dahati

original: MSS_3316-1 avikṛtakṛtabhaumaravā susthānasthā suceṣṭitā vāme /
analyzed: avikṛta kṛta bhauma ravā su sthāna sthā su ceṣṭitā vāme

original: MSS_3316-2 yātrāsu dṛṣṭamātrā durgā durgāṇi tārayati //
analyzed: yātrāsu dṛṣṭa mātrāḥ durgāḥ durgāṇi tārayati

original: MSS_3317-1 avikriyāṃ caiva samāśritāḥ samaṃ haranti jālaṃ mama pakṣiṇo hyamī /
analyzed: avikriyām ca eva samāśritāḥ samam haranti jālam mama pakṣiṇaḥ hi amī

original: MSS_3317-2 vivādameṣyanti parasparaṃ yadā samāgamiṣyanti ca madvaśaṃ tadā //
analyzed: vivādam eṣyanti parasparam yadā samāgamiṣyanti ca mad vaśam tadā

original: MSS_3318-1 avikreyaṃ lavaṇaṃ pakvamannaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ madhu tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca /
analyzed: avikreyam lavaṇam pakvam annam dadhi kṣīram madhu tailam ghṛtam ca

original: MSS_3318-2 tilā māṃsaṃ mūlaphalāni śākaṃ raktaṃ vāsaḥ sarvagandhā guḍaśca //
analyzed: tilāḥ māṃsam mūla phalāni śākam raktam vāsaḥ sarva gandhāḥ guḍaḥ ca

original: MSS_3319-1 avigrahasyāpyatulena hetunā sametabhinnadvayamūrti tiṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: avigrahasya api atulena hetunā sameta bhinna dvaya mūrti tiṣṭhataḥ

original: MSS_3319-2 tavaiva nānyasya jagatsu dṛśyate viruddhaveṣābharaṇasya kāntatā //
analyzed: tava eva nā anyasya jagatsu dṛśyate viruddha veṣa ābharaṇasya kānta tā

original: MSS_3320-1 avicārayato yuktikathanaṃ tuṣakhaṇḍanam /
analyzed: a vicārayataḥ yukti kathanam tuṣa khaṇḍanam

original: MSS_3320-2 nīceṣūpakṛtaṃ rājan bālukāsviva mūtritam //
analyzed: nīceṣu upakṛtam rājan vālukāsu iva mūtritam

original: MSS_3321-1 avicāreṇa yat karma kṛtaṃ tanmarmakṛntanam /
analyzed: avicāreṇa yat karma kṛtam tat marma kṛntanam

original: MSS_3321-2 prasahya sītāharaṇād atītā rāvaṇaśriyaḥ //
analyzed: prasahya sītā haraṇāt atītāḥ rāvaṇa śriyaḥ

original: MSS_3322-1 avijitya ya ātmānam amātyān vijigīṣate /
analyzed: a vijitya yaḥ ātmānam amātyān vijigīṣate

original: MSS_3322-2 amitrān vājitāmātyaḥ so'vaśaḥ parihīyate //
analyzed: amitrān vā ajita amātyaḥ saḥ uvaśaḥ parihīyate

original: MSS_3323-1 avijñātaprabandhasya vaco vācaspaterapi /
analyzed: a vijñāta prabandhasya vacaḥ vācaspateḥ api

original: MSS_3323-2 vrajatyaphalatāmeva nayadruha ivehitam //
analyzed: vrajati aphala tām eva naya druhaḥ iva īhitam

original: MSS_3324-1 avijñātaprayuktena dharṣitā mama vāsasā /

original: MSS_3324-2 saṃvṛtā śaradabhreṇa candralekheva śobhate //
analyzed: saṃvṛtā śarad abhreṇa candra lekhā iva śobhate

original: MSS_3325-1 avijñātaviśeṣasya sarvatejo'pahāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: avijñāta viśeṣasya sarva teja upahāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_3325-2 svāmino nirvivekasya tamasaśca kimantaram //
analyzed: svāminaḥ nirvivekasya tamasaḥ ca kim antaram

original: MSS_3326-1 avijñātasya vijñānaṃ vijñātasya ca niścayaḥ /
analyzed: a vijñātasya vijñānam vijñātasya ca niścayaḥ

original: MSS_3326-2 ārambhaḥ karmaṇāṃ śaśvad ārabdhasyāntadarśanam //
analyzed: ārambhaḥ karmaṇām śaśvat ārabdhasya anta darśanam

original: MSS_3327-1 avijñātasya vijñānaṃ vijñātasya viniścayaḥ /
analyzed: a vijñātasya vijñānam vijñātasya viniścayaḥ

original: MSS_3327-2 arthadvaidhasya saṃdehac chedanaṃ śeṣadarśanam //
analyzed: artha dvaidhasya chedanam śeṣa darśanam

original: MSS_3328-1 avijñātāvasaktena dūṣitā mama vāsasā /
analyzed: a vijñāta avasaktena dūṣitā mama vāsasā

original: MSS_3328-2 chāditā śaradabhreṇa candralekheva dṛśyate //
analyzed: chāditā śarad abhreṇa candra lekhā iva dṛśyate

original: MSS_3329-1 avijñāte pare tattve śāstrādhītistu niṣphalā /
analyzed: a vijñāte pare tattve śāstra adhītiḥ tu niṣphalā

analyzed: vijñāte api pare tattve śāstra adhītiḥ tu niṣphalā

original: MSS_3330-1 avijñāto dhṛtaḥ khaṅgaḥ śubhasaṃpattināśakaḥ /
analyzed: a vijñātaḥ dhṛtaḥ khaṅgaḥ śubha saṃpatti nāśakaḥ

original: MSS_3330-2 vijñātaḥ sakalaiśvaryadāyako bhavati prabhoḥ /
analyzed: vijñātaḥ sakala aiśvarya dāyakaḥ bhavati prabhoḥ

original: MSS_3330-3 tasmāt teṣāṃ guṇān vakṣye yathoktaṃ munipuṃgavaiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt teṣām guṇān vakṣye yathoktam muni puṃgavaiḥ

original: MSS_3331-1 avijñānād rājño bhavati matihīnaḥ parijanas tatastatprādhānyād bhavati na samīpe budhajanaḥ /
analyzed: avijñānāt rājñaḥ bhavati mati hīnaḥ parijanaḥ tatas tad prādhānyāt bhavati na samīpe budha janaḥ

analyzed: budhaiḥ tyakte rājye bhavati hi na nītiḥ guṇavatī pranaṣṭāyām nītau sa nṛpam avaśam naśyati kulam

original: MSS_3332-1 avijñāya phalaṃ yo hi karma tvevānudhāvati /
analyzed: a vijñāya phalam yaḥ hi karma tu eva anudhāvati

original: MSS_3332-2 sa śocet phalavelāyāṃ yathā kiṃśukasecakaḥ //
analyzed: sa śocet phala velāyām yathā kiṃśuka secakaḥ

original: MSS_3333-1 avijñāyānyasāmarthyaṃ svasāmarthyaṃ pradarśayet /
analyzed: a vijñāya anya sāmarthyam sva sāmarthyam pradarśayet

original: MSS_3333-2 upahāsamavāpnoti tathaivāyamihācalaḥ //
analyzed: upahāsam avāpnoti tathā eva ayam iha acalaḥ

original: MSS_3334-1 avitathamanorathapatha- prathaneṣu praguṇagarimagītaśrīḥ /
analyzed: avitatha manoratha patha prathaneṣu praguṇa garima gīta śrīḥ

original: MSS_3334-2 suratarusadṛśaḥ sa bhavān abhilaṣaṇīyaḥ kṣitīśvara na kasya //
analyzed: sura taru sadṛśaḥ sa bhavān abhilaṣaṇīyaḥ kṣitīśvara na kasya

original: MSS_3335-1 avitṛptatayā tathāpi me hṛdayaṃ nirṇayameva dhāvati /
analyzed: a vitṛpta tayā tathā api me hṛdayam nirṇayam eva dhāvati

original: MSS_3335-2 avasāyayituṃ kṣamāḥ sukhaṃ na vidheyeṣu viśeṣasaṃpadaḥ //
analyzed: avasāyayitum kṣamāḥ sukham na vidheyeṣu viśeṣa saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_3336-1 avidagdhaḥ patiḥ strīṇāṃ prauḍhāṇāṃ nāyako guṇī /
analyzed: avidagdhaḥ patiḥ strīṇām prauḍhāṇām nāyakaḥ guṇī

original: MSS_3336-2 guṇināṃ tyāgināṃ stoko vibhavaśceti duḥkhakṛt //
analyzed: guṇinām tyāginām stokaḥ vibhavaḥ ca iti duḥkha kṛt

original: MSS_3337-1 avidagdhaḥ śramakaṭhino durlabhayoṣidyuvā jaḍo vipraḥ /
analyzed: avidagdhaḥ śrama kaṭhinaḥ durlabha yoṣit yuvā jaḍaḥ vipraḥ

original: MSS_3337-2 apamṛtyurupakrāntaḥ kāmivyājena me rātrau //
analyzed: apamṛtyuḥ upakrāntaḥ kāmi vyājena me rātrau

original: MSS_3338-1 aviditaguṇāntarāṇāṃ no doṣaḥ prāptadeśavāsānām /
analyzed: a vidita guṇa antarāṇām no doṣaḥ prāpta deśa vāsānām

original: MSS_3338-2 svādhīnakuṅkumā api yadvidadhati bahumatiṃ nīle //
analyzed: svādhīna kuṅkumāḥ api yat vidadhati bahu matim nīle

original: MSS_3339-1 aviditaguṇāpi satkavi- bhaṇitiḥ karṇeṣu vamati madhudhārām /
analyzed: a vidita guṇā api sat kavi bhaṇitiḥ karṇeṣu vamati madhu dhārām

original: MSS_3339-2 anadhigataparimalāpi hi harati dṛśaṃ mālatīmālā //
analyzed: an adhigata parimalā api hi harati dṛśam mālatī mālā

original: MSS_3340-1 aviditaparamānando vadati jano viṣayameva ramaṇīyam /
analyzed: a vidita parama ānandaḥ vadati janaḥ viṣayam eva ramaṇīyam

original: MSS_3340-2 tilatailameva miṣṭaṃ yena na dṛṣṭaṃ ghṛtaṃ kvāpi //
analyzed: tila tailam eva miṣṭam yena na dṛṣṭam ghṛtam kvāpi

original: MSS_3341-1 aviditaparavedano manobhūr dhruvamayamevamanaṅga eva nityam /
analyzed: avidita para vedanaḥ manobhūḥ dhruvam ayam evam anaṅgaḥ eva nityam

original: MSS_3341-2 yadi punarabhaviṣyadasya cāṅgaṃ na khalu tadā vyathayiṣyadanyadeham //
analyzed: yadi punar abhaviṣyat asya ca aṅgam na khalu tadā vyathayiṣyat anya deham

original: MSS_3342-1 aviditaśaṣasaviśeṣā vāṇī niḥsarati vaktrato yeṣām /
analyzed: a vidita śaṣa saviśeṣā vāṇī niḥsarati vaktrataḥ yeṣām

original: MSS_3342-2 gudavadanavivarabhedo radanairanumīyate teṣām //
analyzed: guda vadana vivara bhedaḥ radanaiḥ anumīyate teṣām

original: MSS_3343-1 aviditasukhaduḥkhaṃ nirguṇaṃ vastu kiṃcij jaḍamatiriha kaścin mokṣa ityācacakṣe /
analyzed: avidita sukha duḥkham nirguṇam vastu kiṃcid jaḍa matiḥ iha kaścid mokṣaḥ iti ācacakṣe

original: MSS_3343-2 mama tu matamanaṅgasmeratāruṇyaghūrṇan madakalamadirākṣīnīvimokṣo hi mokṣaḥ //
analyzed: mama tu matam anaṅga smera tāruṇya ghūrṇan mada kala madirā akṣī nī vimokṣaḥ hi mokṣaḥ

original: MSS_3344-1 aviditvātmanaḥ śaktiṃ parasya na samutsukaḥ /
analyzed: a viditvā ātmanaḥ śaktim parasya na samutsukaḥ

original: MSS_3344-2 gacchannabhimukho vahnau nāśaṃ yāti pataṅgavat //
analyzed: gacchan abhimukhaḥ vahnau nāśam yāti pataṅga vat

original: MSS_3345-1 avidyaṃ jīvanaṃ śūnyaṃ dikśūnyā cedabāndhavā /
analyzed: avidyam jīvanam śūnyam diś śūnyā ced abāndhavā

original: MSS_3345-2 putrahīnaṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaśūnyā daridratā //
analyzed: putra hīnam gṛham śūnyam sarva śūnyā daridra tā

original: MSS_3346-1 avidyaḥ puruṣaḥ śocyaḥ śocyaṃ mithunamaprajam /
analyzed: avidyaḥ puruṣaḥ śocyaḥ śocyam mithunam aprajam

original: MSS_3346-2 nirāhārāḥ prajāḥ śocyāḥ śocyaṃ rāṣṭramarājakam //
analyzed: nirāhārāḥ prajāḥ śocyāḥ śocyam rāṣṭram arājakam

original: MSS_3347-1 avidyākāmakarmādipāśabandhaṃ vimocitum /
analyzed: avidyā kāma karma ādi pāśa bandham vimocitum

original: MSS_3347-2 kaḥ śaknuyād vinātmānaṃ kalpakoṭiśatairapi //
analyzed: kaḥ śaknuyāt vinā ātmānam kalpa koṭi śataiḥ api

original: MSS_3348-1 avidyānāśinī vidyā bhāvanā bhavanāśinī /
analyzed: avidyā nāśinī vidyā bhāvanā bhava nāśinī

original: MSS_3348-2 dāridryanāśanaṃ dānaṃ śīlaṃ durgatināśanam //
analyzed: dāridrya nāśanam dānam śīlam durgati nāśanam

original: MSS_3349-1 avidyābījavidhvaṃsād ayamārṣeṇa cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: avidyā bīja vidhvaṃsāt ayam ārṣeṇa cakṣuṣā

original: MSS_3349-2 kālau bhūtabhaviṣyantau vartamānamavīviśat //
analyzed: kālau bhūta bhaviṣyantau vartamānam avīviśat

original: MSS_3350-1 avidvāṃścaiva vidvāṃśca brāhmaṇo daivataṃ mahat /
analyzed: a vidvān ca eva vidvān ca brāhmaṇaḥ daivatam mahat

original: MSS_3350-2 praṇītaścāpraṇītaśca yathāgnirdaivataṃ mahat //
analyzed: praṇītaḥ ca apraṇītaḥ ca yathā agniḥ daivatam mahat

original: MSS_3351-1 avidvāṃsamalaṃ loke vidvāṃsamapi vā punaḥ /
analyzed: a vidvāṃsam alam loke vidvāṃsam api vā punar

original: MSS_3351-2 pramadā hyutpathaṃ netuṃ kāmakrodhavaśānugam //
analyzed: pramadā hi utpatham netum kāma krodha vaśa anugam

original: MSS_3352-1 avidvānapi bhūpālo vidyāvṛddhopasevayā /
analyzed: a vidvān api bhūpālaḥ vidyā vṛddha upasevayā

original: MSS_3352-2 parāṃ śriyamavāpnotijalāsannataruryathā //
analyzed: parām śriyam avāpnoti jala āsanna taruḥ yathā

original: MSS_3353-1 avidheye jane puṃsāṃ kopaḥ kimupajāyate /
analyzed: avidheye jane puṃsām kopaḥ kim upajāyate

original: MSS_3353-2 vidheye'pi ca kaḥ kopas tanniveśitajīvite //
analyzed: vidheye api ca kaḥ kopaḥ tad niveśita jīvite

original: MSS_3354-1 avidheyo bhṛtyajanaḥ śaṭhāni mitrāṇyadāyakaḥ svāmī /
analyzed: avidheyaḥ bhṛtya janaḥ śaṭhāni mitrāṇi a dāyakaḥ svāmī

original: MSS_3354-2 vinayarahitā ca bhāryā mastakaśūlāni catvāri //
analyzed: vinaya rahitā ca bhāryā mastaka śūlāni catvāri

original: MSS_3355-1 avinayabhuvāmajñānānāṃ śamāya bhavannapi prakṛtikuṭilādvidyābhyāsaḥ khalatvavivṛddhaye /
analyzed: avinaya bhuvām ajñānānām śamāya bhavan api prakṛti kuṭilāt vidyā abhyāsaḥ khala tva vivṛddhaye

original: MSS_3355-2 phaṇibhayabhṛtāmastūcchedakṣamastamasāmasau viṣadharaphaṇāratnāloko bhayaṃ tu bhṛśāyate //
analyzed: phaṇi bhaya bhṛtām astu uccheda kṣamaḥ tamasām asau viṣadhara phaṇā ratna ālokaḥ bhayam tu bhṛśāyate

original: MSS_3356-1 avinayaratamādarādṛte vaśamavaśaṃ hi nayanti vidviṣaḥ /
analyzed: a vinaya ratam ādarāt ṛte vaśam avaśam hi nayanti vidviṣaḥ

original: MSS_3356-2 śrutavinayanidhiṃ samāśritas tanurapi naiti parābhavaṃ kvacit //
analyzed: śruta vinaya nidhim samāśritaḥ tanuḥ api nā eti parābhavam kvacid

original: MSS_3357-1 avināśi tu tadviddhi yena sarvamidaṃ tatam /
analyzed: avināśi tu tat viddhi yena sarvam idam tatam

original: MSS_3357-2 vināśamavyayasyāsya na kaścit kartumarhati //
analyzed: vināśam avyayasya asya na kaścid kartum arhati

original: MSS_3358-1 avināśinamagrāmyam akarot sātavāhanaḥ /
analyzed: avināśinam agrāmyam akarot sātavāhanaḥ

original: MSS_3358-2 viśuddhajātibhiḥ kośaṃ ratnairiva subhāṣitaiḥ //
analyzed: viśuddha jātibhiḥ kośam ratnaiḥ iva su bhāṣitaiḥ

original: MSS_3359-1 avinītaḥ suto jātaḥ kathaṃ na dahanātmakaḥ /
analyzed: avinītaḥ sutaḥ jātaḥ katham na dahana ātmakaḥ

original: MSS_3359-2 vinītastu suto jātaḥ kathaṃ na puruṣottamaḥ //
analyzed: vinītaḥ tu sutaḥ jātaḥ katham na puruṣottamaḥ

original: MSS_3360-1 avinītasya yā vidyā sā ciraṃ naiva tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: avinītasya yā vidyā sā ciram na eva tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_3360-2 markaṭasya gale baddhā maṇīnāṃ mālikā yathā //
analyzed: markaṭasya gale baddhā maṇīnām mālikā yathā

original: MSS_3361-1 avinīto bhṛtyajano nṛpatiradātā śaṭhāni mitrāṇi /
analyzed: avinītaḥ bhṛtya janaḥ nṛpatiḥ adātā śaṭhāni mitrāṇi

original: MSS_3361-2 avinayavatī ca bhāryā mastakaśūlāni catvāri //
analyzed: avinayavatī ca bhāryā mastaka śūlāni catvāri

original: MSS_3362-1 avibhāviteṣuviṣayaḥ prathamaṃ madano'pi nūnamabhavat tamasā /
analyzed: avibhāvita iṣu viṣayaḥ prathamam madanaḥ api nūnam abhavat tamasā

original: MSS_3362-2 udite diśaḥ prakaṭayatyamunā yadadharmadhāmni dhanurācakṛṣe //
analyzed: udite diśaḥ prakaṭayati amunā yat adharma dhāmni dhanuḥ ācakṛṣe

original: MSS_3363-1 avibhāvyatārakamadṛṣṭahima- dyutibimbamastamitabhānu nabhaḥ /
analyzed: avibhāvya tārakam adṛṣṭa hima dyuti bimbam astamita bhānu nabhaḥ

original: MSS_3363-2 avasannatāpamatamisramabhād apadoṣataiva viguṇasya guṇaḥ //
analyzed: avasanna tāpama tamisram abhāt apadoṣa tā eva viguṇasya guṇaḥ

original: MSS_3364-1 avibhramālokanadurbhagāṇi pravyaktavaktrastanamaṇḍalāni /
analyzed: a vibhrama ālokana durbhagāṇi pravyakta vaktra stana maṇḍalāni

original: MSS_3364-2 aṅgāni re pāmarakāminīnām apuṇyatāruṇya kimāśritāni //
analyzed: aṅgāni re pāmara kāminīnām apuṇya tā aruṇya kimāśritāni

original: MSS_3365-1 avimṛṣyametadabhilaṣyati sa dviṣatāṃ vadhena viṣayābhiratim /
analyzed: a vimṛṣyam etat abhilaṣyati sa dviṣatām vadhena viṣaya abhiratim

original: MSS_3365-2 bhavavītaye nahi tathā sa vidhiḥ kva śarāsanaṃ kva ca vimuktipathaḥ //
analyzed: bhava vītaye nahi tathā sa vidhiḥ kva śarāsanam kva ca vimukti pathaḥ

original: MSS_3366-1 avirataṃ parakāryakṛtāṃ satāṃ madhurimātiśayena vaco'mṛtam /
analyzed: aviratam para kārya kṛtām satām madhurima atiśayena vacaḥ mṛtam

original: MSS_3366-2 api ca mānasamambunidhiryaśo vimalaśāradacandiracandrikā //
analyzed: api ca mānasam ambunidhiḥ yaśaḥ vimala śārada candira candrikā

original: MSS_3367-1 aviratakusumāvacāyakhedān nihitabhujālatayaikayopakaṇṭham /
analyzed: avirata kusuma avacāya khedāt nihita bhuja alatayā ekayā upakaṇṭham

original: MSS_3367-2 vipulataranirantarāvalagna- stanapihitapriyavakṣasā lalambe //
analyzed: vipulatara nirantara avalagna stana pihita priya vakṣasā lalambe

original: MSS_3368-1 aviratataruṇīsahasramadhya- sthitivigalatpuruṣavratā ivaite /
analyzed: avirata taruṇī sahasra madhya sthiti vigalat puruṣa vratāḥ iva ete

original: MSS_3368-2 pratipadamatikātarāḥ kṣitīśāḥ parikalayanti bhayaṃ samantato'pi //
analyzed: pratipadam ati kātarāḥ kṣitīśāḥ parikalayanti bhayam samantataḥ api

original: MSS_3369-1 aviratamaklamamuddhṛta- dharātalaṃ susmitollasadvadanam /
analyzed: aviratam aklamam uddhṛta dharā talam su smita ullasat vadanam

original: MSS_3369-2 jagadānandavidhāyinam upaimi śaraṇaṃ prabhuṃ śeṣam //
analyzed: jagat ānanda vidhāyinam upaimi śaraṇam prabhum śeṣam

original: MSS_3370-1 aviratamadhupānāgāramindindirāṇām abhisaraṇanikuñjaṃ rājahaṃsīkulasya /
analyzed: avirata madhu pāna āgāram indindirāṇām abhisaraṇa nikuñjam rājahaṃsī kulasya

original: MSS_3370-2 pravitatabahuśālaṃ sadma padmālayāyā vitarati ratimakṣṇoreṣa līlātaḍāgaḥ //
analyzed: pravitata bahu śālam sadma padmālayāyāḥ vitarati ratim akṣṇoḥ eṣa līlā taḍāgaḥ

original: MSS_3371-1 aviratamidamambhaḥ svecchayoccālayantyā vikacakamalakāntottānapāṇidvayena /
analyzed: aviratam idam ambhaḥ sva icchayā uccālayantyā vikaca kamala kānta uttāna pāṇi dvayena

original: MSS_3371-2 parikalita ivārghyaḥ kāmabāṇātithibhyaḥ salilamiva vitīrṇaṃ bālalīlāsukhānām //
analyzed: parikalitaḥ iva arghyaḥ kāma bāṇa atithibhyaḥ salilam iva vitīrṇam bāla līlā sukhānām

original: MSS_3372-1 avirataratalīlāyāsajātaśramāṇām upaśamamupayāntaṃ niḥsahe'ṅge'ṅganānām /
analyzed: avirata rata līlā āyāsa jāta śramāṇām upaśamam upayāntam niḥsaha iṅga iṅganānām

analyzed: punar uṣasi viviktaiḥ mātariśvā avacūrṇya jvalayati madana agnim mālatīnām rajobhiḥ

original: MSS_3373-1 aviratavirutakapotīm arpitarasamāvṛṇoti ghanavalanaḥ /
analyzed: avirata viruta kapotīm arpita rasam āvṛṇoti ghana valanaḥ

original: MSS_3373-2 navalatikāmatikātara- taralitamadiradvayīṃ mudiraḥ //
analyzed: nava latikām ati kātara taralita madira dvayīm mudiraḥ

original: MSS_3374-1 aviratāmbujasaṃgatisaṃgalad- bahalakesarasaṃvaliteva yā /

original: MSS_3374-2 lalitavastuvidhānasukhollasat- tanuruhā tanurātmabhuvo'vatāt //
analyzed: lalita vastu vidhāna sukha ullasat tanuruhā tanuḥ ātmabhuvā uvatāt

original: MSS_3375-1 aviralakamalavikāsaḥ sakalālimadaśca kokilānandaḥ /
analyzed: avirala kamala vikāsaḥ sakala ali madaḥ ca kokila ānandaḥ

original: MSS_3375-2 ramyo'yameti saṃprati lokotkaṇṭhākaraḥ kālaḥ //
analyzed: ramyaḥ yamā iti saṃprati loka utkaṇṭhā karaḥ kālaḥ

original: MSS_3376-1 aviralakaravālakampanair bhrukuṭītarjanagarjanairmuhuḥ /
analyzed: avirala karavāla kampanaiḥ bhrukuṭī tarjana garjanaiḥ muhur

original: MSS_3376-2 dadṛśe tava vairiṇāṃ madaḥ sa gataḥ kvāpi tavekṣaṇe kṣaṇāt //
analyzed: dadṛśe tava vairiṇām madaḥ sa gataḥ kvāpi tava īkṣaṇe kṣaṇāt

original: MSS_3377-1 aviraladhārānikaraṃ jaladairjalamutsṛjadbhiratimātram /
analyzed: avirala dhārā nikaram jaladaiḥ jalam utsṛjadbhiḥ atimātram

analyzed: māni vadhū hṛdayebhyaḥ kāluṣyam aśeṣatas mṛṣṭam

original: MSS_3378-1 aviralapatadbāṣpotpīḍaprasiktakapolayā vacanaviṣayaḥ saṃdeśo'nyastayā vihito na te /

original: MSS_3378-2 manasi kimapi dhyāyantyā tu kṣaṇaṃ tava kāntayā pathika nihitā dṛṣṭiḥ kaṣṭaṃ nave karuṇāṅkure //
analyzed: manasi kim api dhyāyantyā tu kṣaṇam tava kāntayā pathika nihitā dṛṣṭiḥ kaṣṭam nave karuṇā aṅkure

original: MSS_3379-1 aviralaparāgasaikata- makarandataraṅgiṇīmanuvanāntam /
analyzed: avirala parāga saikata makaranda taraṅgiṇīm anu vanāntam

original: MSS_3379-2 pikayuvatijānudaghnīṃ gāhante madhupayoṣitastṛṣitāḥ //
analyzed: pika yuvati jānu daghnīm gāhante madhupa yoṣitaḥ tṛṣitāḥ

analyzed: avirala parivāhaiḥ aśruṇaḥ sāraṇīnām smara dahana śikhā uṣṇa śvāsa pūraiḥ ca tasyāḥ

original: MSS_3382-1 aviralaphalinīvanaprasūnaḥ kusumitakundasugandhigandhavāhaḥ /
MSS_3382-2 guṇamasamayajaṃ cirāya lebhe viralatuṣārakaṇastuṣārakālaḥ //
analyzed: guṇam asamaya jam cirāya lebhe virala tuṣāra kaṇaḥ tuṣāra kālaḥ

original: MSS_3383-1 aviralamadajalanivahaṃ bhramarakulānīkasevitakapolam /
