original: MSS_3383-2 abhimataphaladātāraṃ kāmeśaṃ gaṇapatiṃ vande //
analyzed: abhimata phala dātāram kāmeśam gaṇapatim vande

original: MSS_3384-1 aviralamadadhārādhautakumbhaḥ śaraṇyaḥ phaṇivaravṛtagātraḥ siddhasādhyādivandyaḥ /
MSS_3384-2 tribhuvanajanavighnadhvāntavidhvaṃsadakṣo vitaratu gajavaktraḥ saṃtataṃ maṅgalaṃ vaḥ //
analyzed: tribhuvana jana vighna dhvānta vidhvaṃsa dakṣaḥ vitaratu gajavaktraḥ saṃtatam maṅgalam vaḥ

original: MSS_3385-1 aviralamiva dāmnā pauṇḍarīkeṇa naddhaḥ snapita iva ca dugdhasrotasā nirbhareṇa /
analyzed: aviralam iva dāmnā pauṇḍarīkeṇa naddhaḥ snapitaḥ iva ca dugdha srotasā nirbhareṇa

original: MSS_3385-2 kavalita iva kṛtsnaścakṣuṣā sphāritena prasabhamamṛtamegheneva sāndreṇa siktaḥ //
analyzed: kavalitaḥ iva kṛtsnaḥ cakṣuṣā sphāritena prasabham amṛta meghena iva sāndreṇa siktaḥ

original: MSS_3386-1 aviralavigalanmadajala- kapolapālīnilīnamadhupakulaḥ /
analyzed: avirala vigalat mada jala kapola pālī nilīna madhupa kulaḥ

original: MSS_3386-2 udbhinnanavaśmaśru- śreṇiriva dvipamukho jayati //
analyzed: udbhinna nava śmaśru śreṇiḥ iva dvipa mukhaḥ jayati

original: MSS_3387-1 aviralavilolajaladaḥ kuṭajārjunanīpasurabhivanavātaḥ /
analyzed: avirala vilola jaladaḥ kuṭaja arjuna nīpa surabhi vana vātaḥ

original: MSS_3387-2 ayamāyātaḥ kālo hanta mṛtāḥ pathikagehinyaḥ //
analyzed: ayam āyātaḥ kālaḥ hanta mṛtāḥ pathika gehinyaḥ

original: MSS_3388-1 aviruddhaṃ sukhasthaṃ yo duḥkhamārge niyojayet /

original: MSS_3388-2 janmajanmāntare duḥkhī sa naraḥ syādasaṃśayam //
analyzed: janma janma antare duḥkhī sa naraḥ syāt asaṃśayam

original: MSS_3389-1 avilambi suvṛttaṃ ca udaraṃ cātipūjitam /
analyzed: avilambi su vṛttam ca udaram ca ati pūjitam

original: MSS_3389-2 nātidīrghaṃ samaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ kiṃcicca vinataṃ śubham //
analyzed: na ati dīrgham samam pṛṣṭham kiṃcid ca vinatam śubham

original: MSS_3390-1 avilambe kṛtyasiddhau māntrikairāpyate yaśaḥ /
analyzed: avilambe kṛtya siddhau māntrikaiḥ āpyate yaśaḥ

original: MSS_3390-2 vilambe karmabāhulyaṃ vikhyāpyāvāpyate dhanam //

original: MSS_3391-1 aviviktāvatistabdhau stanāvāḍhyāvivādṛtau /
analyzed: a viviktau ati stabdhau stanau āḍhyau iva ādṛtau

original: MSS_3391-2 viviktāvānatāveva daridrāviva garhitau //
analyzed: viviktau ānatau eva daridrau iva garhitau

original: MSS_3392-1 avivekamatirnṛpatir mantrī guṇavatsu vakritagrīvaḥ /

original: MSS_3392-2 yatra khalāśca prabalās tatra kathaṃ sajjanāvasaraḥ //
analyzed: yatra khalāḥ ca prabalāḥ tatra katham sat jana avasaraḥ

original: MSS_3393-1 avivekavṛthāśramāvivārthaṃ kṣayalobhāviva saṃśritānurāgam /
analyzed: a viveka vṛthak śramau iva artham kṣaya lobhau iva saṃśrita anurāgam

original: MSS_3393-2 vijigīṣumivānayapramādāv avasādaṃ viśikhau vininyatustam //
analyzed: vijigīṣum iva anaya pramādau avasādam viśikhau vininyatuḥ tam

original: MSS_3394-1 aviveki kucadvaṃdvaṃ hantu nāma jagattrayam /
analyzed: aviveki kuca dvaṃdvam hantu nāma jagattrayam

original: MSS_3394-2 śrutipraṇayinorakṣṇor ayuktaṃ janamāraṇam //
analyzed: śruti praṇayinoḥ akṣṇoḥ ayuktam jana māraṇam

original: MSS_3395-1 avivekini bhūpāle naśyanti guṇināṃ guṇāḥ /
analyzed: avivekini bhūpāle naśyanti guṇinām guṇāḥ

original: MSS_3395-2 pravāsarasike kānte yathā sādhvyāḥ stanonnatiḥ //
analyzed: pravāsa rasike kānte yathā sādhvyāḥ stana unnatiḥ

original: MSS_3396-1 avivekini bhūpe yaḥ karotyāśāṃ samṛddhaye /
analyzed: avivekini bhūpe yaḥ karoti āśām samṛddhaye

original: MSS_3396-2 yāsyāmyahamaneneti karotyāśāṃ sa mṛddhaye //
analyzed: yāsyāmi aham anena iti karoti āśām sa mṛddhaye

original: MSS_3397-1 aviveko hi sarveṣām āpadāṃ paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: avivekaḥ hi sarveṣām āpadām paramam padam

original: MSS_3397-2 vivekarahito loke paśureva na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: viveka rahitaḥ loke paśuḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_3398-1 aviśadacalaṃ netraprāntāvalokanamasphuṭaṃ cakitacakitā vācaḥ sparśaḥ kvacijjanasaṃkule /
analyzed: a viśat acalam netra prānta avalokanam a sphuṭam cakita cakitāḥ vācaḥ sparśaḥ kvacid jana saṃkule

original: MSS_3398-2 iti tava mayā premārambhe ya eva nirīkṣitāḥ kaṭhinamanaso dṛṣṭā bhāvāsta eva virajyataḥ //
analyzed: iti tava mayā prema ārambhe ye eva nirīkṣitāḥ kaṭhina manasaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ bhāvāḥ te eva virajyataḥ

original: MSS_3399-1 aviśīrṇakāntapātre navyadaśe sumukhi saṃbhṛtasnehe /
analyzed: a viśīrṇa kānta pātre navya daśe su mukhi saṃbhṛta snehe

original: MSS_3399-2 madgehadīpakalike kathamupayātāsi nirvāṇam //
analyzed: mad geha dīpa kalike katham upayātāsi nirvāṇam

original: MSS_3400-1 aviśuddhakulotpannā dehārpaṇajīvikā śaṭhācaraṇā /
analyzed: aviśuddha kula utpannā deha arpaṇa jīvikā śaṭha ācaraṇā

original: MSS_3400-2 kvāhaṃ rūpājīvā kva bhavantaḥ ślāghanīyajanmaguṇāḥ //
analyzed: kva aham rūpājīvā kva bhavantaḥ ślāghanīya janma guṇāḥ

original: MSS_3401-1 aviśrānto vāto dahana iva soyaṃ janayati prasaktaṃ sātatyād dalayati kulādrīnapi jalam /
analyzed: aviśrāntaḥ vātaḥ dahanaḥ iva saḥ uyam janayati prasaktam sātatyāt dalayati kula adrīn api jalam

original: MSS_3401-2 prasūte kṛtyeṣu vyavasitiranirvyūḍhasudṛḍhā phalāvāptiṃ loke pratikalamasaṃbhāvyavibhavām //
analyzed: prasūte kṛtyeṣu vyavasitiḥ anirvyūḍha su dṛḍhā phala avāptim loke pratikalam asaṃbhāvya vibhavām

original: MSS_3402-1 aviśrāmaṃ vahed bhāraṃ śītoṣṇaṃ ca na vindati /
analyzed: aviśrāmam vahet bhāram śīta uṣṇam ca na vindati

original: MSS_3402-2 sasaṃtoṣastathā nityaṃ trīṇi śikṣeta gardabhāt //
analyzed: sa saṃtoṣaḥ tathā nityam trīṇi śikṣeta gardabhāt

original: MSS_3403-1 aviśrāmamapātheyam anālambhamadeśakam /
analyzed: a viśrāmam a pātheyam an ālambham a deśakam

original: MSS_3403-2 tamaḥkāntāramadhvānaṃ kathameko gamiṣyasi //
analyzed: tamaḥ kāntāram adhvānam katham ekaḥ gamiṣyasi

original: MSS_3404-1 aviśvasan dhūrtadhuraṃdharo'pi naraḥ puraṃdhrīpurato'ndha eva /
analyzed: a viśvasan dhūrta dhuraṃdharaḥ api naraḥ puraṃdhrī puratas undhaḥ eva

original: MSS_3404-2 aśeṣaśikṣākuśalo'pi kākaḥ pratāryate kiṃ na pikāṅganābhiḥ //
analyzed: aśeṣa śikṣā kuśalaḥ api kākaḥ pratāryate kim na pika aṅganābhiḥ

original: MSS_3405-1 aviśvastā striyaḥ sarvā adhamottamamadhyamāḥ /
analyzed: aviśvastāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ adhama uttama madhyamāḥ

original: MSS_3405-2 yaḥ kaścid viśvaset tāsāṃ paścāttāpaiḥ sa dahyate //
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid viśvaset tāsām paścāttāpaiḥ sa dahyate

original: MSS_3406-1 aviśvāsaṃ sadā tiṣṭhet saṃdhinā vigraheṇa ca /
analyzed: aviśvāsam sadā tiṣṭhet saṃdhinā vigraheṇa ca

original: MSS_3406-2 dvaidhībhāvaṃ samāśritya pāpe śatrau balīyasi //
analyzed: dvaidhībhāvam samāśritya pāpe śatrau balīyasi

original: MSS_3407-1 aviśvāsavidhānāya mahāpātakahetave /
analyzed: aviśvāsa vidhānāya mahāpātaka hetave

original: MSS_3407-2 pitāputravirodhāya hiraṇyāya namo'stu te //
analyzed: pitāputra virodhāya hiraṇyāya namaḥ astu te

original: MSS_3408-1 aviṣaṃ viṣamityāhur brahmasvaṃ viṣamucyate /
analyzed: aviṣam viṣam iti āhuḥ brahma svam viṣam ucyate

original: MSS_3408-2 viṣaṃ hanti kilaikaṃ ca brahmasvaṃ putrapautrakam //
analyzed: viṣam hanti kila ekam ca brahma svam putra pautrakam

original: MSS_3409-1 avisaṃvādako dakṣaḥ kṛtajño matimānṛjuḥ /
analyzed: avisaṃvādakaḥ dakṣaḥ kṛtajñaḥ matimān ṛjuḥ

original: MSS_3409-2 api saṃkṣīṇakośo'pi labhate parivāraṇam //
analyzed: api saṃkṣīṇa kośaḥ api labhate parivāraṇam

original: MSS_3410-1 avisaṃvādanaṃ dānaṃ samayasyāvyatikramaḥ /
analyzed: a visaṃvādanam dānam samayasya a vyatikramaḥ

original: MSS_3410-2 āvartayanti bhūtāni samyakpraṇihitā ca vāk //
analyzed: āvartayanti bhūtāni samyak praṇihitā ca vāc

original: MSS_3411-1 avisṛṣṭo'pi san prājñaḥ sarveṇa ca samaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: a visṛṣṭaḥ api san prājñaḥ sarveṇa ca samam vrajet

original: MSS_3411-2 praviśedapyanāhūtas tvanyadā bhartturājñayā //
analyzed: praviśet api anāhūtaḥ tu anyadā bharttuḥ ājñayā

original: MSS_3412-1 avismṛtopakāraḥ syān na kurvīta kṛtaghnatām /
analyzed: a vismṛta upakāraḥ syāt na kurvīta kṛtaghna tām

original: MSS_3412-2 hatvopakāriṇaṃ vipro nāḍījaṅghamadhaścyutaḥ //
analyzed: hatvā upakāriṇam vipraḥ nāḍījaṅgham adhas cyutaḥ

original: MSS_3413-1 avīro'pi camūvīrasāhāyyena dviṣo jayet /
analyzed: avīraḥ api camū vīra sāhāyyena dviṣaḥ jayet

original: MSS_3413-2 camūsāhāyyaśūnyānāṃ jayaśrīrvyākulāyate //
analyzed: camū sāhāyya śūnyānām jaya śrīḥ vyākulāyate

original: MSS_3414-1 avṛttiṃ vinayo hanti hantyanarthaṃ parākramaḥ /
analyzed: avṛttim vinayaḥ hanti hanti anartham parākramaḥ

original: MSS_3414-2 hanti nitayṃ kṣamā krodham ācāro hantyalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: hanti nitaym kṣamā krodham ācāraḥ hanti alakṣaṇam

original: MSS_3415-1 avṛttikaṃ tyajed deśaṃ vṛttiṃ sopadravāṃ tyajet /
analyzed: a vṛttikam tyajet deśam vṛttim sa upadravām tyajet

original: MSS_3415-2 tyajen māyāvinaṃ mitraṃ dhanaṃ prāṇaharaṃ tyajet //
analyzed: tyajet māyāvinam mitram dhanam prāṇa haram tyajet

original: MSS_3416-1 avṛttikaṃ prabhuṃ bhṛtyā apuṣpaṃ bhramarāstarum /
analyzed: avṛttikam prabhum bhṛtyāḥ apuṣpam bhramarāḥ tarum

original: MSS_3416-2 ajalaṃ ca saro haṃsā muñcantyapi ciroṣitam //
analyzed: ajalam ca saraḥ haṃsāḥ muñcanti api cira uṣitam

original: MSS_3417-1 avṛttirbhayamantyānāṃ madhyānāṃ maraṇād bhayam /
analyzed: avṛttiḥ bhayam antyānām madhyānām maraṇāt bhayam

original: MSS_3417-2 uttamānāṃ tu martyānām avamānāt paraṃ bhayam //
analyzed: uttamānām tu martyānām avamānāt param bhayam

original: MSS_3418-1 avṛttivyādhiśokārtān anuvarteta śaktitaḥ /
analyzed: avṛtti vyādhi śoka ārtān anuvarteta śaktitaḥ

original: MSS_3418-2 ātmavatsatataṃ paśyed api kīṭapipīlakāḥ //
analyzed: ātma vat satatam paśyet api kīṭa pipīlakāḥ

original: MSS_3419-1 avekśya svātmānaṃ viguṇamaparānicchati tathā phalatyetanno ced vilapati na santīha guṇinaḥ /
analyzed: avekśya sva ātmānam viguṇam aparān icchati tathā phalati etat no ced vilapati na santi iha guṇinaḥ

original: MSS_3419-2 nimārṣṭuṃ śaptuṃ vā paribhavitumudyacchati tato'py aho nīce ramyā saguṇavijigīṣā vidhikṛtā //
analyzed: nimārṣṭum śaptum vā paribhavitum udyacchati tatas api aho nīce ramyā sa guṇa vijigīṣā vidhi kṛtā

original: MSS_3420-1 avemavyāpārākalanamaturīsparśamacirād anunmīlattantuprakaraghaṭanāyāsamasakṛt /
analyzed: a vema vyāpāra a kalanam a turī sparśam acirāt an unmīlat tantu prakara ghaṭana āyāsam asakṛt

original: MSS_3420-2 viṣīdatpāñcālīvipadapanayaikapraṇayinaḥ paṭānāṃ nirmāṇaṃ patagapatiketoravatu naḥ //
analyzed: viṣīdat pāñcālī vipad apanaya eka praṇayinaḥ paṭānām nirmāṇam pataga pati ketoḥ avatu naḥ

original: MSS_3421-1 avaiti tattvaṃ sadasattvalakṣaṇaṃ vinā viśeṣaṃ viparītarocanaḥ /
analyzed: avaiti tattvam sat asat tva lakṣaṇam vinā viśeṣam viparīta rocanaḥ

original: MSS_3421-2 yadṛcchayā mattavadastacetano jano jinānāṃ vacanāt parāṅmukhaḥ //
analyzed: yadṛcchayā matta vat asta cetanaḥ janaḥ jinānām vacanāt parāṅmukhaḥ

original: MSS_3422-1 avaitu śāstrāṇi naro viśeṣataḥ karotu citrāṇi tapāṃsi bhāvataḥ /
analyzed: avaitu śāstrāṇi naraḥ viśeṣataḥ karotu citrāṇi tapāṃsi bhāvataḥ

original: MSS_3422-2 atattvasaṃsaktamanāstathāpi no vimuktisaukhyaṃ gatabādhamaśnute //
analyzed: atattva saṃsakta manāḥ tathā api no vimukti saukhyam gata bādham aśnute

original: MSS_3423-1 avaimi caināmanagheti kiṃ tu lokāpavādo balavān mato me /
analyzed: avaimi ca enām anaghā iti kim tu loka apavādaḥ balavān mataḥ me

original: MSS_3423-2 chāyā hi bhūmeḥ śaśino malatve- nāropitā śuddhimataḥ prajābhiḥ //
analyzed: chāyā hi bhūmeḥ śaśinaḥ mala tve nā āropitā śuddhimataḥ prajābhiḥ

original: MSS_3424-1 avaimi te sāramataḥ khalu tvāṃ kārye guruṇyātmasamaṃ niyokṣye /
analyzed: avaimi te sāram atas khalu tvām kārye guruṇi ātma samam niyokṣye

original: MSS_3424-2 vyādiśyate bhūdharatāmavekṣya kṛṣṇena dehodvahanāya śeṣaḥ //
analyzed: vyādiśyate bhūdhara tām avekṣya kṛṣṇena deha udvahanāya śeṣaḥ

original: MSS_3425-1 avaimi pūtamātmānaṃ dvayenaiva dvijottamāḥ /
analyzed: avaimi pūtam ātmānam dvayena eva dvijottamāḥ

original: MSS_3425-2 mūrdhni gaṅgāprapātena dhautapādāmbhasā ca vaḥ //
analyzed: mūrdhni gaṅgā prapātena dhauta pāda ambhasā ca vaḥ

original: MSS_3426-1 avaimi saubhāgyamadena vañcitaṃ tava priyaṃ yaścaturāvalokinaḥ /
analyzed: avaimi saubhāgya madena vañcitam tava priyam yaḥ catura avalokinaḥ

original: MSS_3426-2 karoti lakṣyaṃ ciramasya cakṣuṣo na vaktramātmīyamarālapakṣmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: karoti lakṣyam ciram asya cakṣuṣaḥ na vaktram ātmīya marāla pakṣmaṇaḥ

original: MSS_3427-1 avaimi haṃsāvalayo valakṣās tvatkāntikīrteścapalāḥ pulākāḥ /
analyzed: avaimi haṃsa āvalayaḥ valakṣāḥ tvad kānti kīrteḥ capalāḥ pulākāḥ

original: MSS_3427-2 uḍḍīya yuktaṃ patitāḥ sravantī- veśantapūraṃ paritaḥ plavante //
analyzed: uḍḍīya yuktam patitāḥ sravantī veśanta pūram paritas plavante

original: MSS_3428-1 avaiṣṇavo hato vipro hataṃ śrāddhamadakṣiṇam /
analyzed: avaiṣṇavaḥ hataḥ vipraḥ hatam śrāddham adakṣiṇam

original: MSS_3428-2 abrahmaṇyaṃ hataṃ kṣetram anācāraṃ kulaṃ hatam //
analyzed: a brahmaṇyam hatam kṣetram anācāram kulam hatam

original: MSS_3429-1 avyaktamakṣaramupāsya babhūva kaścit svaṃ labdhavarṇamavagatya kṛtārthamānī /
analyzed: avyaktam akṣaram upāsya babhūva kaścid svam labdha varṇam avagatya kṛtārtha mānī

original: MSS_3429-2 sadyastribhaṅgalalitasphuraṇādamanda- nandotthayā jaḍatayaiva vayaṃ kṛtārthāḥ //
analyzed: sadyas tri bhaṅga lalita sphuraṇāt amanda nanda utthayā jaḍa tayā eva vayam kṛtārthāḥ

original: MSS_3430-1 avyaktādīni bhūtāni vyaktamadhyāni bhārata /
analyzed: avyakta ādīni bhūtāni vyakta madhyāni bhārata

original: MSS_3430-2 avyaktanidhanānyeva tatra kā paridevanā //
analyzed: avyakta nidhanāni eva tatra kā paridevanā

original: MSS_3431-1 avyayavato'pi dhaninaḥ svajanasahasraṃ bhavet padasthasya /
analyzed: avyayavataḥ api dhaninaḥ sva jana sahasram bhavet pada sthasya

original: MSS_3431-2 bhraṣṭadhanasya hi satataṃ bandhurapi mukhaṃ na darśayati //
analyzed: bhraṣṭa dhanasya hi satatam bandhuḥ api mukham na darśayati

original: MSS_3432-1 avyaye vyayamāyāti vyaye yāti suvistaram /
analyzed: avyaye vyayam āyāti vyaye yāti su vistaram

original: MSS_3432-2 apurvaḥ ko'pi bhāṇḍāras tava bhārati dṛśyate //
analyzed: apurvaḥ kaḥ api bhāṇḍāraḥ tava bhārati dṛśyate

original: MSS_3433-1 avyavasāyinamalasaṃ daivaparaṃ sahasācca parihīṇam /
analyzed: avyavasāyinam alasam daiva param sahasāt ca parihīṇam

original: MSS_3433-2 pramadeva hi vṛddhapatiṃ necchatyavagūhituṃ lakṣmīḥ //
analyzed: pramadā iva hi vṛddha patim na icchati avagūhitum lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_3434-1 avyavasthitacittasya prasādo'pi bhayaṃkaraḥ /
analyzed: avyavasthita cittasya prasādaḥ api bhayaṃkaraḥ

original: MSS_3434-2 vyavasthitaprasannātmā kupito'pyabhayaṃkaraḥ //
analyzed: vyavasthita prasanna ātmā kupitaḥ upi abhayaṃkaraḥ

original: MSS_3435-1 avyavasthitavṛttānām abhinnaśruticakṣuṣām /
analyzed: avyavasthita vṛttānām abhinna śruti cakṣuṣām

original: MSS_3435-2 adharmārjitabhogānām āśīrapyahitocitā //
analyzed: adharma arjita bhogānām āśīḥ api ahita ucitā

original: MSS_3436-2 avyavasthau hi dṛśyete yuddhe jayaparājayau //
analyzed: avyavasthau hi dṛśyete yuddhe jaya parājayau

original: MSS_3437-1 avyākaraṇamadhītaṃ bhinnadroṇyā taraṅgiṇītaraṇam /
analyzed: a vyākaraṇam adhītam bhinna droṇyā taraṅgiṇī taraṇam

original: MSS_3437-2 bheṣajamapathyasahitaṃ trayamidamakṛtaṃ varaṃ na kṛtam //
analyzed: bheṣajam apathya sahitam trayam idam akṛtam varam na kṛtam

original: MSS_3438-2 anyākṣepo bhaviṣyantyāḥ kāryasiddherhi lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: anya ākṣepaḥ bhaviṣyantyāḥ kārya siddheḥ hi lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_3439-1 avyākhyeyāṃ vitarati parāṃ prītimantarnimagnā kaṇṭhe lagnā harati nitarāṃ yāntaradhvāntajālam /
analyzed: avyākhyeyām vitarati parām prītim antar nimagnā kaṇṭhe lagnā harati nitarām yā antara dhvānta jālam

original: MSS_3439-2 tāṃ drākṣādyairapi bahumatāṃ mādhurīmudgirantīṃ kṛṣṇetyākhyāṃ kathaya rasane yadyasi tvaṃ rasajñā //
analyzed: tām drākṣā ādyaiḥ api bahu matām mādhurīm udgirantīm kṛṣṇā iti ākhyām kathaya rasane yadi asi tvam rasajñā

original: MSS_3440-1 avyājasundaramanuttaramaprameyam aprākṛtaṃ paramamaṅgalamaṅghripadmam /
analyzed: avyāja sundaram anuttaram aprameyam aprākṛtam parama maṅgalam aṅghri padmam

original: MSS_3440-2 saṃdarśayedapi sakṛdbhavatī dayārdrā draṣṭāsmi kena tadahaṃ tu vilocanena //
analyzed: saṃdarśayet api sakṛt bhavatī dayā ārdrā draṣṭāsmi kena tat aham tu vilocanena

original: MSS_3441-1 avyājasundarīṃ tāṃ vijñānena lalitena yojayatā /
analyzed: avyājasundarīm tām vijñānena lalitena yojayatā

original: MSS_3441-2 parikalpito vidhātrā bāṇaḥ kāmasya viṣadigdhaḥ //
analyzed: parikalpitaḥ vidhātrā bāṇaḥ kāmasya viṣa digdhaḥ

original: MSS_3442-1 avyāt sa vo yasya nisargavakraḥ spṛśatyadhijyasmaracāpalīlām /
analyzed: avyāt sa vaḥ yasya nisarga vakraḥ spṛśati adhijya smara cāpa līlām

original: MSS_3442-2 jaṭāpinaddhoragarājaratna- marīcilīḍhobhayakoṭirinduḥ //
analyzed: jaṭā pinaddha uraga rāja ratna marīci līḍha ubhaya koṭiḥ induḥ

original: MSS_3443-1 avyāt svarlokacūḍāmaṇipaṭalaśikhāśreṇiśoṇīkṛtāṅghriḥ kṣoṇībhāraṃ vinetuṃ jaṭharajuṣi jagadbāndhave devakī vaḥ /
analyzed: avyāt svar loka cūḍāmaṇi paṭala śikhā śreṇi śoṇīkṛta aṅghriḥ kṣoṇī bhāram vinetum jaṭhara juṣi jagat bāndhave devakī vaḥ

original: MSS_3443-2 rājñāmuddāmadoṣṇāṃ raṇaśirasi raṇatkīkasacchedabhīmāḥ śastrāṇāṃ khaṇṇakārāḥ pratihatiguravo yacchruterdohado'bhūt //
analyzed: rājñām uddāma doṣṇām raṇa śirasi raṇat kīkasa cheda bhīmāḥ śastrāṇām khaṇṇakārāḥ pratihati guravaḥ yat śruteḥ dohadaḥ bhūt

original: MSS_3444-1 avyād vo vajrasārasphuradurunakharakrūracakrakramāgra- prodbhinnendrārivakṣaḥsthalagaladasṛgāsārakāśmīragauraḥ /
analyzed: avyāt vaḥ vajra sāra sphurat uru nakhara krūra cakra krama agra prodbhinna indrāri vakṣaḥ sthala galat asṛj āsāra kāśmīra gauraḥ

original: MSS_3444-2 prasphūrjatkeśarāgragrathitajaladharaśreṇinīlābjamālyaḥ sūryācandrāvataṃso naraharirasamābaddhaśṛṅgāralīlaḥ //
analyzed: prasphūrjat keśara agra grathita jaladhara śreṇi nīla abja mālyaḥ sūryā candra avataṃsaḥ narahariḥ asamābaddha śṛṅgāra līlaḥ

original: MSS_3445-1 avyād vo valitāṅghripātavicaladbhūgolahelonmukha- bhrāmyaddikkarikalpitānukaraṇo nṛtyan gaṇagrāmaṇīḥ /
analyzed: avyāt vaḥ valita aṅghri pāta vicalat bhū gola helā unmukha bhrāmyat dikkari kalpita anukaraṇaḥ nṛtyan gaṇa grāmaṇīḥ

original: MSS_3445-2 yasyoddaṇḍitaśuṇḍapuṣkaramarudvyākṛṣṭasṛṣṭaṃ muhus tārācakramudaktaśīkarapṛṣallīlāmivābhyasyati //
analyzed: yasya uddaṇḍita śuṇḍa puṣkara marut vyākṛṣṭa sṛṣṭam muhur tārā cakram udakta śīkara pṛṣat līlām iva abhyasyati

original: MSS_3446-1 avyād vo vāmano yasya kaustubhapratibimbitā /
analyzed: avyāt vaḥ vāmanaḥ yasya kaustubha pratibimbitā

original: MSS_3446-2 kautukālokinī jātā jāṭharīva jagattrayī //
analyzed: kautuka ālokinī jātā jāṭharī iva jagat trayī

original: MSS_3447-1 avyādhigātramanukūlataraṃ kalatraṃ veśma prasiddhavibhavaṃ niśitā ca vidyā /
analyzed: avyādhi gātram anukūlataram kalatram veśma prasiddha vibhavam niśitā ca vidyā

original: MSS_3447-2 ślāghyaṃ kulaṃ caramakālagatiḥ samartho mātuḥ kaṭākṣapariṇāmavibhūtayas te //
analyzed: ślāghyam kulam carama kāla gatiḥ samarthaḥ mātuḥ kaṭākṣa pariṇāma vibhūtayaḥ te

original: MSS_3448-1 avyādhijaṃ kaṭukaṃ śīrṣarogaṃ pāpānubandhaṃ paruṣaṃ tīkṣṇamugram /
analyzed: avyādhi jam kaṭukam śīrṣa rogam pāpa anubandham paruṣam tīkṣṇam ugram

original: MSS_3448-2 satāṃ peyaṃ yanna pibantyasanto manyuṃ mahārāja piba praśāmya //
analyzed: satām peyam yat na pibanti asantaḥ manyum mahā rāja piba praśāmya

original: MSS_3449-1 avyādhinā śarīreṇa manasā ca nirādhinā /
analyzed: avyādhinā śarīreṇa manasā ca nirādhinā

original: MSS_3449-2 pūrayannarthināmāśāṃ tvaṃ jīva śaradāṃ śatam //
analyzed: pūrayan arthinām āśām tvam jīva śaradām śatam

original: MSS_3450-1 avyāpareṣu vyāpāraṃ yo naraḥ kartumicchati /
analyzed: a vyāpareṣu vyāpāram yaḥ naraḥ kartum icchati

original: MSS_3450-2 sa eva nidhanaṃ yāti kīlotpaṭīva vānaraḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eva nidhanam yāti kīla utpaṭī iva vānaraḥ

original: MSS_3451-1 avyāpāraratā vasantasamaye grīṣme vyavāyapriyāḥ saktāḥ pramṛṣi palvalāmbhasi nave kūpodakadveṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: a vyāpāra ratāḥ vasanta samaye grīṣme vyavāya priyāḥ saktāḥ pramṛṣi palvala ambhasi nave kūpa udaka dveṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_3451-2 kaṭvamloṣṇaratāḥ śaradyadhibhujo hemantanidrālasāḥ svairdoṣairapacīyamānavapuṣo naśyantu te śatravaḥ //
analyzed: kaṭu amla uṣṇa ratāḥ śaradi adhi bhujaḥ hemanta nidrā alasāḥ svaiḥ doṣaiḥ apacīyamāna vapuṣaḥ naśyantu te śatravaḥ

original: MSS_3452-1 avyāhati na śakyā gaur vinā daṇḍena rakṣitum /
analyzed: avyāhati na śakyā gauḥ vinā daṇḍena rakṣitum

original: MSS_3452-2 iti pratyeti mugdho'pi vallavaḥ kimu rājakam //
analyzed: iti pratyeti mugdhaḥ api vallavaḥ kimu rājakam

original: MSS_3453-1 avyāhṛtaṃ vyāhṛtācchreya āhuḥ satyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ taddvitīyam /
analyzed: a vyāhṛtam vyāhṛtāt śreyaḥ āhuḥ satyam vadet vyāhṛtam tat dvitīyam

original: MSS_3453-2 priyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tattṛtīyaṃ dharmyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ taccaturtham //
analyzed: priyam vadet vyāhṛtam tat tṛtīyam dharmyam vadet vyāhṛtam tat caturtham

original: MSS_3454-1 avyutpannasvabhāvānāṃ nārīṇamiva sāṃpratam /
analyzed: avyutpanna svabhāvānām nārīṇam iva sāṃpratam

original: MSS_3454-2 sītkārācāryakaṃ kartum ayaṃ prāpto himāgamaḥ //
analyzed: sītkāra ācāryakam kartum ayam prāptaḥ hima āgamaḥ

original: MSS_3455-1 avyutpanne śrotari vaktṛtvamanarthakaṃ puṃsām /
analyzed: avyutpanne śrotari vaktṛ tvam anarthakam puṃsām

original: MSS_3455-2 netravihīne bhartari lāvaṇyamanarthakaṃ strīṇām //
analyzed: netra vihīne bhartari lāvaṇyam anarthakam strīṇām

original: MSS_3456-1 avratasyāpi te dharmaḥ kārya evāntarāntarā /
analyzed: avratasya api te dharmaḥ kāryaḥ eva antarā antarā

original: MSS_3456-2 medhībhūto'pi hi bhrāmyan ghāsagrāsaṃ karoti gauḥ //
analyzed: medhībhūtaḥ api hi bhrāmyan ghāsa grāsam karoti gauḥ

original: MSS_3457-1 aśaktaḥ satataṃ sādhuḥ kurūpā ca pativratā /
analyzed: aśaktaḥ satatam sādhuḥ kurūpā ca pativratā

original: MSS_3457-2 vyādhito devabhaktaśca nirdhanā brahmacāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: vyādhitaḥ deva bhaktaḥ ca nirdhanāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_3458-1 aśaktastaskaraḥ sādhuḥ kurūpā cet pativratā /
analyzed: aśaktaḥ taskaraḥ sādhuḥ kurūpā ced pativratā

original: MSS_3458-2 rogī ca devatābhakto vṛddhā veśyā tapasvinī //
analyzed: rogī ca devatā bhaktaḥ vṛddhā veśyā tapasvinī

original: MSS_3459-1 aśaktastu bhavet sādhur brahmacārī va nirdhanaḥ /
analyzed: aśaktaḥ tu bhavet sādhuḥ brahmacārī nirdhanaḥ

original: MSS_3459-2 vyādhito devabhaktaśca vṛddhā nārī pativratā //
analyzed: vyādhitaḥ deva bhaktaḥ ca vṛddhā nārī pativratā

original: MSS_3460-1 aśaktāḥ śaktimātmīyāṃ ślāghante ye ca durjanāḥ /
analyzed: aśaktāḥ śaktim ātmīyām ślāghante ye ca durjanāḥ

original: MSS_3460-2 te bhavantyupahāsāya mahatāmeva saṃnidhau //
analyzed: te bhavanti upahāsāya mahatām eva saṃnidhau

original: MSS_3461-1 aśakte raudratātaikṣṇyaṃ tīvrapāpeṣu dhīratā /
analyzed: aśakteḥ raudra tā ataikṣṇyam tīvra pāpeṣu dhīra tā

original: MSS_3461-2 chadmadhīrvāci pāruṣyaṃ nīcānāṃ śauryamīdṛśam //
analyzed: chadma dhīḥ vāci pāruṣyam nīcānām śauryam īdṛśam

original: MSS_3462-1 aśaktairbalinaḥ śatroḥ kartavyaṃ prapalāyanam /
analyzed: aśaktaiḥ balinaḥ śatroḥ kartavyam prapalāyanam

original: MSS_3462-2 saṃśritavyo'thavā durgo nānyā teṣāṃ gatirbhavet //
analyzed: durgaḥ nā anyā teṣām gatiḥ bhavet

original: MSS_3463-1 aśakto yaḥ kṣāntiṃ satatamapakāriṇyapi jane vidhatte so'vaśyaṃ bhujaga iva daṃṣṭrāvirahitaḥ /
analyzed: aśaktaḥ yaḥ kṣāntim satatam apakāriṇi api jane vidhatte saḥ uvaśyam bhujagaḥ iva daṃṣṭrā virahitaḥ

original: MSS_3463-2 prabhuḥ satyāṃ śaktau kṣamata iha yasmāt sucaritaḥ sa tejasvī lokadvitayavijigīṣurvijayate //
analyzed: prabhuḥ satyām śaktau kṣamate iha yasmāt su caritaḥ sa tejasvī loka dvitaya vijigīṣuḥ vijayate

original: MSS_3464-1 aśaknuvan soḍhumadhīralocanaḥ sahasraraśmeriva yasya darśanam /
analyzed: aśaknuvan soḍhum adhīra locanaḥ sahasraraśmeḥ iva yasya darśanam

original: MSS_3464-2 praviśya hemādriguhāgṛhāntaraṃ nināya bibhyad divasāni kauśikaḥ //
analyzed: praviśya hemādri guhā gṛha antaram nināya bibhyat divasāni kauśikaḥ

original: MSS_3465-1 aśakyaṃ nārabhet prājñaḥ akāryaṃ naiva kārayet /
analyzed: aśakyam na ārabhet prājñaḥ akāryam na eva kārayet

original: MSS_3465-2 asatyaṃ naiva vaktavyam ālasyaṃ naiva kārayet //
analyzed: asatyam na eva vaktavyam ālasyam na eva kārayet

original: MSS_3466-1 aśakyaṃ nārabhet prājño akāryaṃ naiva kārayet /
analyzed: aśakyam na ārabhet prājñaḥ akāryam na eva kārayet

original: MSS_3466-2 yathādeśagataṃ dharmaṃ yathākālaṃ ca jīvayet //
analyzed: yathā deśa gatam dharmam yathākālam ca jīvayet

original: MSS_3467-1 aśakyaḥ sahasā rājan bhāvo vettuṃ parasya vai /
analyzed: aśakyaḥ sahasā rājan bhāvaḥ vettum parasya vai

original: MSS_3467-2 antaḥsvabhāvairgītaistair naipuṇyaṃ paśyatā bhṛśam //
analyzed: antar svabhāvaiḥ gītaiḥ taiḥ naipuṇyam paśyatā bhṛśam

original: MSS_3468-1 aśakyārambhavṛttīnāṃ kutaḥ kleśādṛte phalam /
analyzed: aśakya ārambha vṛttīnām kutas kleśāt ṛte phalam

original: MSS_3468-2 ākāśamāsvādayataḥ kutastu kavalagrahaḥ //
analyzed: ākāśam āsvādayataḥ kutas tu kavalagrahaḥ

original: MSS_3469-1 aśaṅkitamatiḥ svastho na śaṭhaḥ parisarpati /
analyzed: a śaṅkita matiḥ svasthaḥ na śaṭhaḥ parisarpati

original: MSS_3469-2 na cāsya duṣṭā vāk cāpi tasmān nāstīha saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: na ca asya duṣṭā vāc ca api tasmāt na asti iha saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_3470-1 aśaṅkitebhyaḥ śaṅketa śaṅkitebhyaśca sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: a śaṅkitebhyaḥ śaṅketa śaṅkitebhyaḥ ca sarvaśas

original: MSS_3470-2 aśaṅkyādbhayamutpannam api mūlaṃ nikṛntati //
analyzed: aśaṅkyāt bhayam utpannam api mūlam nikṛntati

original: MSS_3471-1 aśaṅkyamapi śaṅketa nityaṃ śaṅketa śaṅkitāt /
analyzed: aśaṅkyam api śaṅketa nityam śaṅketa śaṅkitāt

original: MSS_3471-2 bhayaṃ hi śaṅkitājjātaṃ samūlamapi kṛntati //
analyzed: bhayam hi śaṅkitāt jātam sa mūlam api kṛntati

original: MSS_3472-1 aśaṭhamalolamajihmaṃ tyāginamanurāgiṇaṃ viśeṣajñam /
analyzed: a śaṭham a lolam a jihmam tyāginam anurāgiṇam viśeṣa jñam

original: MSS_3472-2 yadi nāśrayati naraṃ śrīḥ śrīreva hi vañcitā tatra //
analyzed: yadi nā āśrayati naram śrīḥ śrīḥ eva hi vañcitā tatra

original: MSS_3473-1 aśaṭhahṛdayaḥ kṛtajñaḥ sānukrośaḥ sthitaḥ satāṃ mārge /
analyzed: a śaṭha hṛdayaḥ kṛtajñaḥ sa anukrośaḥ sthitaḥ satām mārge

original: MSS_3473-2 aparāpavādakarmā śucikarmarataḥ sa khalvāryaḥ //
analyzed: apara apavāda karmā śuci karma rataḥ sa khalu āryaḥ

original: MSS_3474-1 aśanaṃ me vasanaṃ me jāyā me bandhuvargo me /
analyzed: aśanam me vasanam me jāyā me bandhu vargaḥ me

original: MSS_3474-2 iti me me kurvāṇaṃ kālavṛko hanti puruṣājam //
analyzed: iti me me kurvāṇam kālavṛkaḥ hanti puruṣa ajam

original: MSS_3475-1 aśanaṃ vasanaṃ vāso yasya kāśyāmamārgataḥ /
analyzed: aśanam vasanam vāsaḥ yasya kāśyāma mārgataḥ

original: MSS_3475-2 kīkaṭena samā kāśī gaṅgāpyaṅgāravāhinī //
analyzed: kīkaṭena samā kāśī gaṅgā api aṅgāra vāhinī

original: MSS_3476-1 aśanamātrakṛtajñatayā guror na piśuno'pi śuno labhate tulām /
analyzed: aśana mātra kṛtajña tayā guroḥ na piśunaḥ api śunaḥ labhate tulām

original: MSS_3476-2 api bahūpakṛte sakhitā khale na khalu khelati khe latikā yathā //
analyzed: api bahu upakṛte sakhitā khale na khalu khelati khe latikā yathā

original: MSS_3477-1 aśanādindriyāṇīva syuḥ kāryāṇyakhilānyapi /
analyzed: aśanāt indriyāṇi iva syuḥ kāryāṇi akhilāni api

original: MSS_3477-2 etasmāt kāraṇād vittaṃ sarvasādhanamucyate //
analyzed: etasmāt kāraṇāt vittam sarva sādhanam ucyate

original: MSS_3478-1 aśanairaśanairbālye yauvane ghasmarāt smarāt /
analyzed: aśanais aśanais bālye yauvane ghasmarāt smarāt

original: MSS_3478-2 kalyavaikalyataḥ śeṣe sphuṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ vayo nṛṇām //
analyzed: kalya vaikalyataḥ śeṣe sphuṭam naṣṭam vayaḥ nṛṇām

original: MSS_3479-1 aśaraṇaśaraṇapramodabhūtair vanatarubhiḥ kriyamāṇacārukarma /
analyzed: aśaraṇa śaraṇa pramoda bhūtaiḥ vana tarubhiḥ kriyamāṇa cāru karma

original: MSS_3479-2 hṛdayamiva durātmanāmaguptaṃ navamiva rājyamanirjitopabhogyam //
analyzed: hṛdayam iva durātmanām aguptam navam iva rājyam anirjita upabhogyam

original: MSS_3480-1 aśarmadahanajvalatkaṭukaṭākṣarūkṣekṣaṇa- kṣaṇakṣapitaśātrave jayati sindhurādhīśvare /
analyzed: a śarma dahana jvalat kaṭu kaṭākṣa rūkṣa īkṣaṇa kṣaṇa kṣapita śātrave jayati sindhura adhīśvare

original: MSS_3480-2 vayaṃ na bahu manmahe nijabhujānamadgāṇḍiva- cyutāstraśikhitāṇḍavajvalitakhāṇḍavaṃ pāṇḍavam //
analyzed: vayam na bahu manmahe cyuta astra śikhi tāṇḍava jvalita khāṇḍavam pāṇḍavam

original: MSS_3481-1 aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hatvā naraḥ saṃjāyate kharaḥ /
analyzed: aśastram puruṣam hatvā naraḥ saṃjāyate kharaḥ

original: MSS_3481-2 kṛmiḥ strīvadhakarttā ca bālahantā ca jāyate //
analyzed: kṛmiḥ strī vadha karttā ca bāla hantā ca jāyate

original: MSS_3482-1 aśastrapūtamavyājaṃ puruṣāṅgopakalpitam /
analyzed: a śastra pūtam avyājam puruṣa aṅga upakalpitam

original: MSS_3482-2 vikrīyate mahāmāṃsaṃ gṛhyatāṃ gṛhyatāmidam //
analyzed: vikrīyate mahāmāṃsam gṛhyatām gṛhyatām idam

original: MSS_3483-1 aśāntahutabhukśikhākavalitaṃ jaganmandiraṃ sukhaṃ viṣamavātabhugnasanavaccalaṃ kāmajam /
analyzed: aśānta hutabhuj śikhā kavalitam jagat mandiram sukham viṣama vāta bhugna sana vat calam kāma jam

original: MSS_3483-2 jalasthaśaśicañcalā bhuvi vilokya lokasthitiṃ vimuñcata janāḥ sadā viṣayamūrchanāṃ tattvataḥ //
analyzed: jala stha śaśi cañcalāḥ bhuvi vilokya loka sthitim vimuñcata janāḥ sadā viṣaya mūrchanām tattvataḥ

original: MSS_3484-1 aśāntāntastṛṣṇā dhanalavaṇavārivyatikarair gatacchāyaḥ kāyaściravirasarūkṣāśanatayā /
analyzed: aśānta antaḥ tṛṣṇā dhana lavaṇa vāri vyatikaraiḥ gata chāyaḥ kāyaḥ cira virasa rūkṣa aśana tayā

original: MSS_3484-2 anidrā mando'gnirnṛpasalilacaurānalabhayāt kadaryāṇāṃ kaṣṭaṃ sphuṭamadhanakaṣṭādapi param //
analyzed: anidrā manda ugniḥ nṛpa salila caura anala bhayāt kadaryāṇām kaṣṭam sphuṭam adhana kaṣṭāt api param

original: MSS_3485-1 aśāśvatamidaṃ sarvaṃ cintyamānaṃ hi bhārata /
analyzed: aśāśvatam idam sarvam cintyamānam hi bhārata

original: MSS_3485-2 kadalīsaṃnibho lokaḥ samo hyasya na vidyate //
analyzed: kadalī saṃnibhaḥ lokaḥ samaḥ hi asya na vidyate

original: MSS_3486-1 aśāsaṃstaskarān yastu baliṃ gṛhṇāti pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: aśāsān taskarān yaḥ tu balim gṛhṇāti pārthivaḥ

original: MSS_3486-2 tasya prakṣubhyate rāṣṭraṃ svargācca parihīyate //
analyzed: tasya prakṣubhyate rāṣṭram svargāt ca parihīyate

original: MSS_3487-1 aśāstracakṣunṛpatir andha ityabhidhīyate /
MSS_3487-2 varamandho na cakṣuṣmān madādākṣiptasatpathaḥ //
analyzed: varam andhaḥ na cakṣuṣmān madāt ākṣipta sat pathaḥ

original: MSS_3488-1 aśāstraviduṣāṃ teṣāṃ na kāryamahitaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: a śāstra viduṣām teṣām na kāryam ahitam vacaḥ

original: MSS_3488-2 arthaśāstrānabhijñānāṃ vipulāṃ śriyamicchatām //
analyzed: arthaśāstra anabhijñānām vipulām śriyam icchatām

original: MSS_3489-1 aśikṣitānāṃ kāvyeṣu śāstrābhyāso nirarthakaḥ /
analyzed: a śikṣitānām kāvyeṣu śāstra abhyāsaḥ nirarthakaḥ

original: MSS_3489-2 kimastyanupanītasya vājapeyādibhirmakhaiḥ //
analyzed: kim asti anupanītasya vājapeya ādibhiḥ makhaiḥ

original: MSS_3490-1 aśithilaparispandaḥ kunde tathaiva madhuvrato nayanasuhṛdo vṛkṣāścaite na kuḍmalaśālinaḥ /
analyzed: aśithila parispandaḥ kunde tathā eva madhuvrataḥ nayana suhṛdaḥ vṛkṣāḥ ca ete na kuḍmala śālinaḥ

original: MSS_3490-2 dalati kalikā cautī nāsmiṃstathā mṛgacakṣuṣām atha ca hṛdaye mānagranthiḥ svayaṃ śithilāyate //
analyzed: dalati kalikā cautī nā asmin tathā mṛga cakṣuṣām atha ca hṛdaye māna granthiḥ svayam śithilāyate

original: MSS_3491-1 aśithilamaparāvasajya kaṇṭhe dṛḍhaparirabdhabṛhadbahiḥ stanena /
analyzed: a śithilam a parāvasajya kaṇṭhe dṛḍha parirabdha bṛhat bahis stanena

original: MSS_3491-2 hṛṣitatanuruhā bhujena bhartur mṛdumamṛdu vyatividdhamekabāhum //
analyzed: hṛṣita tanuruhā bhujena bhartuḥ mṛdum amṛdu vyatividdham eka bāhum

original: MSS_3492-1 aśirāḥ puruṣaḥ kāryo lalāṭe brahmaghātinaḥ /
analyzed: aśirāḥ puruṣaḥ kāryaḥ lalāṭe brahma ghātinaḥ

original: MSS_3492-2 asambhāṣyaśca kartavyas tan manoranuśāsanam //
analyzed: a sambhāṣyaḥ ca kartavyaḥ tat manoḥ anuśāsanam

original: MSS_3493-1 rājā stenena gantavyo muktakeśena dhāvatā /
analyzed: rājā stenena gantavyaḥ muktakeśena dhāvatā

original: MSS_3493-2 ācakṣāṇena tat steyam evaṃkarmāsmi śādhi mām //
analyzed: ācakṣāṇena tat steyam evaṃkarmā asmi śādhi mām

original: MSS_3494-1 aśiṣyaṃ śāsti yo rājan yaśca śūnyamupāsate /
analyzed: a śiṣyam śāsti yaḥ rājan yaḥ ca śūnyam upāsate

original: MSS_3494-2 kadaryaṃ bhajate yaśca tamāhurmūḍhacetasam //
analyzed: kadaryam bhajate yaḥ ca tam āhuḥ mūḍha cetasam

original: MSS_3495-1 aśītāstaraṇo māghe phālgune paśupakṣiṇau /
analyzed: a śīta āstaraṇaḥ māghe phālgune paśu pakṣiṇau

original: MSS_3495-2 caitre jalacarāḥ sarve vaiśākhe naravānarau //
analyzed: caitre jalacarāḥ sarve vaiśākhe nara vānarau

original: MSS_3496-1 aśītenāmbhasā snānaṃ payaḥpānaṃ varāḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: aśītena ambhasā snānam payaḥ pānam varāḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_3496-2 etadvo mānuṣāḥ pathyaṃ snigdhamuṣṇaṃ ca bhojanam //
analyzed: etat vaḥ mānuṣāḥ pathyam snigdham uṣṇam ca bhojanam

original: MSS_3497-1 aśīmahi vayaṃ bhikṣām āśāvāso vasīmahi /
analyzed: aśīmahi vayam bhikṣām āśā vāsaḥ vasīmahi

original: MSS_3497-2 śayīmahi mahīpṛṣṭhe kurvīmahi kimīśvaraiḥ //
analyzed: śayīmahi mahī pṛṣṭhe kurvīmahi kim īśvaraiḥ

original: MSS_3498-1 aśīlā bhinnamaryādā nityasaṃkīrṇamaithunāḥ /
analyzed: aśīlāḥ bhinna maryādāḥ nitya saṃkīrṇa maithunāḥ

original: MSS_3498-2 alpāyuṣo bhavantīha tathā nirayagāminaḥ //
analyzed: alpa āyuṣaḥ bhavanti iha tathā niraya gāminaḥ

original: MSS_3499-1 aśucitānilayaṃ pralayaṃ śriyām ayaśasāṃ vibhavaṃ prabhavaṃ rujām /
analyzed: aśucitā anilayam pralayam śriyām ayaśasām vibhavam prabhavam rujām

original: MSS_3499-2 sukṛtanirdalanaṃ calanaṃ dhṛteḥ pariharet paravallabhayā ratam //
analyzed: su kṛta nirdalanam calanam dhṛteḥ pariharet para vallabhayā ratam

original: MSS_3500-1 aśucirvacanād yasyaśucirbhavati pūruṣaḥ /
analyzed: aśuciḥ vacanāt yasya aśuciḥ bhavati pūruṣaḥ

original: MSS_3500-2 śuciścaivāśuciḥ sadyaḥ kathaṃ rājā na daivatam //
analyzed: śuciḥ ca eva aśuciḥ sadyas katham rājā na daivatam

original: MSS_3501-1 aśucīkṣaṇe'śrupāte kalahe śvāsakāsayoḥ /
analyzed: aśuci īkṣaṇa aśru pāte kalahe śvāsa kāsayoḥ

original: MSS_3501-2 rathyāprasarpaṇe'bhyaṅge kṣute narmaṇyupaspṛśet //
analyzed: rathyā prasarpaṇa ibhyaṅge kṣute narmaṇi upaspṛśet

original: MSS_3502-1 aśuddhaprakṛtau rājñi janatā nānurajyate /
analyzed: aśuddha prakṛtau rājñi janatā na anurajyate

original: MSS_3502-2 yathā gṛdhrasamāsannaḥ kalahaṃsaḥ samācaret //
analyzed: yathā gṛdhra samāsannaḥ kalahaṃsaḥ samācaret

original: MSS_3503-1 aśuddhā tu bhaven nārī yāvacchalyaṃ na muñcati /
analyzed: aśuddhā tu bhavet nārī yāvat śalyam na muñcati

original: MSS_3503-2 niḥsṛte tu tataḥ śalye rajasā śudhyate tataḥ //
analyzed: niḥsṛte tu tatas śalye rajasā śudhyate tatas

original: MSS_3504-1 aśuddhīnāṃ tu sarvāsām ālayāḥ kutsitāḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: aśuddhīnām tu sarvāsām ālayāḥ kutsitāḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_3504-2 sadā śaucaṃ na kurvanti bhuñjate'nnaṃ tathāvidhāḥ //
analyzed: sadā śaucam na kurvanti tathāvidhāḥ

original: MSS_3505-1 aśubhapuṣi kalāvapyapramattāḥ svadharmād anudinamupakārānācarante budhānām /
analyzed: aśubha puṣi kalau api apramattāḥ svadharmāt anudinam upakārān ācarante budhānām

original: MSS_3505-2 bahujanaparipuṣṭā baddhadīkṣāsta ete tanusukhamapi hitvā tanvate rājasevām //
analyzed: bahu jana paripuṣṭāḥ baddha dīkṣāḥ te ete tanu sukham api hitvā tanvate rāja sevām

original: MSS_3506-1 aśubhodaye janānāṃ naśyati buddhirna vidyate rakṣā /
analyzed: aśubha udaye janānām naśyati buddhiḥ na vidyate rakṣā

original: MSS_3506-2 suhṛdo'pi santi ripavo viṣamaviṣaṃ jāyate'pyamṛtam //
analyzed: suhṛdaḥ api santi ripavaḥ viṣam aviṣam jāyate ipi amṛtam

original: MSS_3507-1 aśṛṇvannapi boddhavyo mantribhiḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ /
analyzed: a śṛṇvan api boddhavyaḥ mantribhiḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: MSS_3507-2 yathā svadoṣanāśāya vidureṇāmbikāsutaḥ //
analyzed: yathā sva doṣa nāśāya vidureṇa ambikāsutaḥ

original: MSS_3508-1 aśeṣacakṣuḥśravaṇaṃ pratikūlo bhavannapi /
analyzed: aśeṣa cakṣuḥ śravaṇam pratikūlaḥ bhavan api

original: MSS_3508-2 vinatānandaheturyaḥ sa pumānāptanandanaḥ //
analyzed: vinatā ānanda hetuḥ yaḥ sa pumān āpta nandanaḥ

original: MSS_3509-1 aśeṣadoṣāpagamaprakāśa- mitrāgamotsāhamahotsavārham /
analyzed: aśeṣa doṣa apagama prakāśa mitra āgama utsāha mahā utsava arham

original: MSS_3509-2 vikāsaśobhāṃ janayatyajasraṃ dhanaṃ janānāṃ dinamambujānām //
analyzed: vikāsa śobhām janayati ajasram dhanam janānām dinam ambujānām

original: MSS_3510-1 aśeṣalaṅkāpatisainyahantā śrīrāmasevācaraṇaikakartā /
MSS_3510-2 anekaduḥkhāhatalokagoptā tvasau hanūmāṃstava saukhyakartā //
analyzed: aneka duḥkha āhata loka goptā tu asau hanūmān tava saukhya kartā

original: MSS_3511-1 aśeṣavighnapratiṣedhadakṣa- mantrākṣatānāmiva diṅmukheṣu /
analyzed: aśeṣa vighna pratiṣedha dakṣa mantra akṣatānām iva diṅmukheṣu

original: MSS_3511-2 vikṣepalīlā karaśīkarāṇāṃ karotu vaḥ prītimibhānanasya //
analyzed: vikṣepa līlā kara śīkarāṇām karotu vaḥ prītim ibha ānanasya

original: MSS_3512-1 aśokanirbhartsitapadmarāgam ākṛṣṭahemadyutikarṇikāram /
analyzed: aśoka nirbhartsita padmarāgam ākṛṣṭa hema dyuti karṇikāram

original: MSS_3512-2 muktākalāpīkṛtasinduvāraṃ vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantī //
analyzed: muktā kalāpīkṛta sinduvāram vasanta puṣpa ābharaṇam vahantī

original: MSS_3513-1 aśoke śokārtaḥ kimasi bakule'pyākulamanā nirānandaḥ kunde saha ca sahakārairna ramase /
analyzed: aśoke śoka ārtaḥ kim asi baku lepī ākula manāḥ nirānandaḥ kunde saha ca sahakāraiḥ na ramase

original: MSS_3513-2 kusumbhe viśrambhaṃ yadiha bhajase kaṇṭakaśatair asaṃdigdhaṃ dagdhabhramara bhavitāsi kṣatavapuḥ //
analyzed: kusumbhe viśrambham yat iha bhajase kaṇṭaka śataiḥ asaṃdigdham dagdha bhramara bhavitāsi kṣata vapuḥ

original: MSS_3514-1 aśocyaḥ śocate śocyaṃ kiṃ vā śocyo na śocyate /
analyzed: a śocyaḥ śocate śocyam kim vā śocyaḥ na śocyate

original: MSS_3514-2 kaśca kasyeha śocyo'sti dehe'smin budbudopame //
analyzed: kaḥ ca kasya iha śocyaḥ asti dehe ismin budbuda upame

original: MSS_3515-1 aśocyānanvaśocastvaṃ prajñāvādāṃśca bhāṣase /
analyzed: a śocyān anvaśocaḥ tvam prajñā vādān ca bhāṣase

original: MSS_3515-2 gatāsūnagatāsūṃśca nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ //
analyzed: gatāsūn agatāsūn ca na anuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ

original: MSS_3516-1 aśocyānīha bhūtāni yo mūḍhastāni śocati /
analyzed: a śocyāni iha bhūtāni yaḥ mūḍhaḥ tāni śocati

original: MSS_3516-2 tadduḥkhāllabhate duḥkhaṃ dvāvanarthau niṣevate //
analyzed: tad duḥkhāt labhate duḥkham dvau anarthau niṣevate

original: MSS_3517-1 aśocyo nirdhanaḥ prājño'śocyaḥ paṇḍitabāndhavaḥ /
analyzed: aśocyaḥ nirdhanaḥ prājña uśocyaḥ paṇḍita bāndhavaḥ

original: MSS_3517-2 aśocyā vidhavā nārī putrapautrapratiṣṭhitā //
analyzed: aśocyā vidhavā nārī putra pautra pratiṣṭhitā

original: MSS_3518-1 aśnāti yaḥ saṃskurute nihanti dadāti gṛhṇātyanumanyate ca /
analyzed: aśnāti yaḥ saṃskurute nihanti dadāti gṛhṇāti anumanyate ca

original: MSS_3518-2 ete ṣaḍapyatra vinindanīyā bhramanti saṃsāravane nirantam //
analyzed: ete ṣaṭ api atra vinindanīyāḥ bhramanti saṃsāra vane nirantam

original: MSS_3519-1 aśnāti yo māṃsamasau vidhatte vadhānumodaṃ trasadehabhājām /
analyzed: aśnāti yaḥ māṃsam asau vidhatte vadha anumodam trasa dehabhājām

original: MSS_3519-2 gṛhṇāti repāṃsi tatastapasvī tebhyo durantaṃ bhavameti jantuḥ //
analyzed: gṛhṇāti repāṃsi tatas tapasvī tebhyaḥ durantam bhavam eti jantuḥ

original: MSS_3520-1 aśnābhyācchādayāmīti prāpaśyan pāpapūruṣaḥ /
analyzed: aśnā abhyācchādayāmi iti prāpaśyan pāpa pūruṣaḥ

original: MSS_3520-2 nāmarṣaṃ kurute yastu puruṣaḥ so'dhamaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: na amarṣam kurute yaḥ tu puruṣaḥ saḥ adhamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_3521-1 aśnīta pibata khādata jāgrata saṃviśata tiṣṭhata vā /
analyzed: aśnīta pibata khādata jāgrata saṃviśata tiṣṭhata vā

original: MSS_3521-2 sakṛdapi cintayatāhnaḥ sāvadhiko dehabandha iti //
analyzed: sakṛt api cintayata ahnaḥ saḥ avadhikaḥ deha bandhaḥ iti

original: MSS_3522-1 aśmanā sādhayellohaṃ lohenāśmānameva ca /
analyzed: aśmanā sādhayet loham lohena aśmānam eva ca

original: MSS_3522-2 bilbāniva kare bilvair mlecchān mlecchaiḥ prasādhayet //
analyzed: bilbān iva kare bilvaiḥ mlecchān mlecchaiḥ prasādhayet

original: MSS_3523-1 aśmātakasya vāme badarī vā dṛśyate'hinilayo vā /
analyzed: aśmātakasya vāme badarī vā dṛśyate ihi nilayaḥ vā

original: MSS_3523-2 ṣaḍbhirudagvāsya karaiḥ sārdhe puruṣatraye toyam //
analyzed: ṣaḍbhiḥ udak vā asya karaiḥ sārdhe puruṣa traye toyam

original: MSS_3524-1 aśmānamapyupāyena lohaṃ vā jarayen naraḥ /
analyzed: aśmānam api upāyena loham vā jarayet naraḥ

original: MSS_3524-2 na tu kaścid upāyo'sti brahmasvaṃ yena jīryate //
analyzed: na tu kaścid upāyaḥ usti brahma svam yena jīryate

original: MSS_3525-1 aśmāpyahṛdayo yasya guṇasāraṃ parīkṣate /
analyzed: aśmā api ahṛdayaḥ yasya guṇa sāram parīkṣate

original: MSS_3525-2 ucitaiva suvarṇasya tasyāgnipatane ruciḥ //
analyzed: ucitā eva suvarṇasya tasya agni patane ruciḥ

original: MSS_3526-1 aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapastaptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: aśraddhayā hutam dattam tapaḥ taptam kṛtam ca yat

original: MSS_3526-2 asadityucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha //
analyzed: asat iti ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha

original: MSS_3527-1 aśraddhādarśanaṃ bhāntir duḥkhaṃ ca trividhaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: aśraddhā darśanam bhāntiḥ duḥkham ca trividham tatas

original: MSS_3527-2 daurmanasyamayogyeṣu viṣayeṣu ca yogatā //
analyzed: daurmanasyam ayogyeṣu viṣayeṣu ca yoga tā

original: MSS_3528-1 aśraddheyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣamapi yad bhavet /
analyzed: aśraddheyam na vaktavyam pratyakṣam api yat bhavet

original: MSS_3528-2 yathā vānarasaṃgītaṃ tathaiva plavate śilā //
analyzed: yathā vānara saṃgītam tathā eva plavate śilā

original: MSS_3529-1 aśrāntaṃ dṛḍhayantraṇena kucayoratyaktakāṭhinyayor ābaddhasphuṭamaṇḍalonnatimilaccolaṃ vimucyorasaḥ /
analyzed: a śrāntam dṛḍha yantraṇena kucayoḥ atyakta kāṭhinyayoḥ ābaddha sphuṭa maṇḍala unnati milat colam vimucya urasaḥ

original: MSS_3529-2 nīvīvicchuritaṃ vidhāya tamamuṃ vāmastanālambinīṃ veṇīṃ pāṇinakhāñcalaiḥ śithilayatyākramya pīṭhaṃ padā //
analyzed: nīvī vicchuritam vidhāya tam amum vāma stana ālambinīm veṇīm pāṇi nakha añcalaiḥ śithilayati ākramya pīṭham padā

original: MSS_3530-1 aśrāntaviśrāṇitayajñayūpa- stambhāvalīrdrāgavalambamānaḥ /
analyzed: a śrānta viśrāṇita yajña yūpa stambha āvalīḥ drāk avalambamānaḥ

original: MSS_3530-2 yasya svabhāvād bhuvi saṃcacāra kālakramādekapado'pi dharmaḥ //
analyzed: yasya svabhāvāt bhuvi saṃcacāra kāla kramāt eka padā upi dharmaḥ

original: MSS_3531-1 aśrāntaśrutipāṭhapūtarasanāvirbhūtabhūristavā- jihmabrahmamukhaughavighnitanavasvargakriyākelinā /
MSS_3531-2 pūrvaṃ gādhisutena sāmighaṭitā muktā nu mandākinī yatprāsādadukūlavalliranilāndolairakheladdivi //
analyzed: pūrvam gādhi sutena sāmi ghaṭitā muktā nu mandākinī yat prāsāda dukūla valliḥ anila andolaiḥ akhelat divi

original: MSS_3532-1 aśrāntirbandhutāṃ dhatte kaṣṭaṃ naṣṭasya naśvaraḥ /
analyzed: aśrāntiḥ bandhu tām dhatte kaṣṭam naṣṭasya naśvaraḥ

original: MSS_3532-2 skandhena paṅgunā paṅgur nahi vartmani nīyate //
analyzed: skandhena paṅgunā paṅguḥ nahi vartmani nīyate

original: MSS_3533-1 aśrāvi bhūmipatibhiḥ kṣaṇavītanidrair aśnan puro haritakaṃ mudamādadhānaḥ /
analyzed: aśrāvi bhūmipatibhiḥ kṣaṇa vīta nidraiḥ aśnan puras haritakam mudam ādadhānaḥ

original: MSS_3533-2 grīvāgralolakalakiṅkiṇikānināda- miśraṃ dadhaddaśanacarcuraśabdamaśvaḥ //
analyzed: grīvā agra lola kala kiṅkiṇikā nināda miśram dadhat daśana carcura śabdam aśvaḥ

original: MSS_3534-1 aśrucchalena sudṛśo hutapāvakadhūmakaluṣākṣyāḥ /
analyzed: aśru chalena su dṛśaḥ huta pāvaka dhūma kaluṣa akṣyāḥ

original: MSS_3534-2 aprāpya mānamaṅge vigalati lāvaṇyavāripūra iva //
analyzed: a prāpya mānam aṅge vigalati lāvaṇya vāri pūraḥ iva

original: MSS_3535-1 aśrutamiva khalajalpitam adṛṣṭamiva gurumukhendumālinyam /
analyzed: a śrutam iva khala jalpitam a dṛṣṭam iva guru mukha indu mālinyam

original: MSS_3535-2 agaṇitanijāpamānaṃ bhāmini bhavadarthamacyutaḥ sahate //
analyzed: agaṇita nija apamānam bhāmini bhavat artham acyutaḥ sahate

original: MSS_3536-1 aśrutaśca samunnaddho daridraśca mahāmanāḥ /
analyzed: a śrutaḥ ca samunnaddhaḥ daridraḥ ca mahā manāḥ

original: MSS_3536-2 arthāścākarmaṇā prepsur mūḍha ityucyate budhaiḥ //
analyzed: arthāḥ ca akarmaṇā prepsuḥ mūḍhaḥ iti ucyate budhaiḥ

original: MSS_3537-1 aśrubhiḥ pādyamākalpya praṇīya hṛdayāsanam /
analyzed: aśrubhiḥ pādyam ākalpya praṇīya hṛdayāsanam

original: MSS_3537-2 upete dayite kāntā pariṣvaṅgamupānayat //
analyzed: upete dayite kāntā pariṣvaṅgam upānayat

original: MSS_3538-1 aśvaṃ naiva gajaṃ naiva vyāghraṃ naiva ca naiva ca /
analyzed: aśvam na eva gajam na eva vyāghram na eva ca na eva ca

original: MSS_3538-2 ajāputraṃ baliṃ dadyād devo durbalaghātakaḥ //
MSS_3539-1 aśvaṃ snātaṃ gajaṃ mattaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kāmamohitam /
analyzed: aśvam snātam gajam mattam vṛṣabham kāma mohitam

original: MSS_3539-2 śūdramakṣarasaṃyuktaṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet //
analyzed: śūdram akṣara saṃyuktam dūratas parivarjayet

original: MSS_3540-1 aśvaḥ śastraṃ śāstraṃ vīṇā vāṇī naraśca nārī ca /
analyzed: aśvaḥ śastram śāstram vīṇā vāṇī naraḥ ca nārī ca

original: MSS_3540-2 puruṣaviśeṣaṃ prāptā bhavantyayogyāśca yogyāśca //
analyzed: puruṣa viśeṣam prāptāḥ bhavanti ayogyāḥ ca yogyāḥ ca

original: MSS_3541-1 aśvaḥ supto gajo matto gāvaḥ prathamasūtikāḥ /
analyzed: aśvaḥ suptaḥ gajaḥ mattaḥ gāvaḥ prathama sūtikāḥ

original: MSS_3541-2 antaḥpuragato rājā dūrataḥ parivarjayet //
analyzed: antaḥpura gataḥ rājā dūratas parivarjayet

original: MSS_3542-1 aśvagandhāpalaṃ triṃśac cūrṇayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: aśvagandhā palam triṃśat cūrṇayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_3542-2 vṛddhadārukacūrṇena samabhāgaṃ ca kārayet //
analyzed: ca kārayet

original: MSS_3543-1 aśvatthacalapatrāgralīnatoyakaṇopame /
analyzed: aśvattha cala patra agra līna toya kaṇā upame

original: MSS_3543-2 sthirāśā jīvite yasya tatsamo nāstyacetanaḥ //
analyzed: sthira āśāḥ jīvite yasya tad samaḥ na asti acetanaḥ

original: MSS_3544-1 aśvatthamekaṃ picumandamekaṃ nyagrodhamekaṃ daśa ciñciṇīkāḥ /
analyzed: aśvattham ekam picumandam ekam nyagrodham ekam daśa ciñciṇīkāḥ

original: MSS_3544-2 kapitthabilvāmalakatrayaṃ ca pañcāmravāpī narakaṃ na paśyet //
analyzed: kapittha bilva āmalaka trayam ca pañca āmra vāpī narakam na paśyet

original: MSS_3545-1 aśvatthasya mahattvaṃ ko nanu vaktuṃ naraḥ prabhavet /
analyzed: aśvatthasya mahat tvam kaḥ nanu vaktum naraḥ prabhavet

original: MSS_3545-2 savitari yatrālakṣmīr mande lakṣmīramandāste //
analyzed: savitari yatra alakṣmīḥ mande lakṣmīḥ amandāḥ te

original: MSS_3546-1 aśvatthāmā balirvyāso hanūmāṃśca vibhīṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: aśvatthāmā baliḥ vyāsaḥ hanūmān ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_3546-2 kṛpaḥ paraśurāmaśca saptaite cirajīvinaḥ //
analyzed: kṛpaḥ paraśurāmaḥ ca saptā ete cira jīvinaḥ

original: MSS_3547-1 aśvatthāmā hata iti yudhi giramanṛtāṃ yudhiṣṭhiro'vādīt /
analyzed: aśvatthāmā hataḥ iti yudhi giram anṛtām yudhiṣṭhirā uvādīt

original: MSS_3547-2 punaranutāpamavāpat pāpaṃ kṛtvānutapyeta //
analyzed: punar anutāpam avāpat pāpam kṛtvā anutapyeta

original: MSS_3548-1 aśvapṛṣṭhaṃ gajaskandho nārīṇāṃ ca payodharaḥ /
analyzed: aśva pṛṣṭham gaja skandhaḥ nārīṇām ca payodharaḥ

original: MSS_3548-2 dantadhāvanaśastraṃ ca yathā sthūlaṃ tathā sukham //
analyzed: dantadhāvana śastram ca yathā sthūlam tathā sukham

original: MSS_3549-1 aśvapraśaṃsā vikhyātā dhanurvedastataḥparam /
analyzed: aśva praśaṃsā vikhyātā dhanurvedaḥ tatas param

original: MSS_3549-2 gāndharvaśāstramaparaṃ vṛkṣāyurveda eva ca //
analyzed: gāndharva śāstram aparam vṛkṣāyurvedaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_3550-1 aśvaplutaṃ vāsavagarjitaṃ ca strīṇāṃ ca cittaṃ puruṣasya bhāgyam /
analyzed: aśva plutam vāsava garjitam ca strīṇām ca cittam puruṣasya bhāgyam

original: MSS_3550-2 avarṣaṇaṃ cāpyativarṣaṇaṃ ca devo na jānāti kṛto manuṣyaḥ //
analyzed: avarṣaṇam ca api ativarṣaṇam ca devaḥ na jānāti kṛtaḥ manuṣyaḥ

original: MSS_3551-1 aśvamadhye kṛtaravā śivā yuddhaprapañcakṛt /
analyzed: aśva madhye kṛta ravā śivā yuddha prapañca kṛt

original: MSS_3551-2 śivā saptasvarā grāhyā bahuśabdāśca niṣphalāḥ //
analyzed: śivā sapta svarā grāhyā bahu śabdāḥ ca niṣphalāḥ

original: MSS_3552-1 aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam /
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasram ca satyam ca tulayā dhṛtam

original: MSS_3552-2 atyaricyata satyaṃ ca iti vedavido viduḥ //
analyzed: atyaricyata satyam ca iti veda vidaḥ viduḥ

original: MSS_3553-1 aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam /
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasram ca satyam ca tulayā dhṛtam

original: MSS_3553-2 aśvamedhasahasrāddhi satyameva viśiṣyate //
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasrāt hi satyam eva viśiṣyate

original: MSS_3554-1 aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam /
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasram ca satyam ca tulayā dhṛtam

original: MSS_3554-2 tulayitvā tu paśyāmi satyamevātiricyate //
analyzed: tulayitvā tu paśyāmi satyam eva atiricyate

original: MSS_3555-1 aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam /
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasram ca satyam ca tulayā dhṛtam

original: MSS_3555-2 nābhijānāmi yadyasya satyasyārdhamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: na abhijānāmi yadi asya satyasya ardham avāpnuyāt

original: MSS_3556-1 aśvamedhasahasrasya phalaṃ satyaṃ tulāntare /
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasrasya phalam satyam tulā antare

original: MSS_3556-2 dhṛtvā saṃloḍyate rājan satye bhavati gauravam //
analyzed: dhṛtvā saṃloḍyate rājan satye bhavati gauravam

original: MSS_3557-1 aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ yaḥ samācaret /
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasrāṇām sahasram yaḥ samācaret

original: MSS_3557-2 nāsau padamavāpnoti madbhaktair yadavāpyate //
analyzed: na asau padam avāpnoti mad bhaktaiḥ yat avāpyate

original: MSS_3558-1 aśvayānaṃ gajaṃ mattaṃ gāvaścaiva prasūtikāḥ /
analyzed: aśva yānam gajam mattam gāvaḥ ca eva prasūtikāḥ

original: MSS_3558-2 tathā cāntaḥpure dāsīṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet //
analyzed: tathā ca antaḥpure dāsīm dūratas parivarjayet

original: MSS_3559-1 aśvaśālāṃ samāsādya yadāntarmadhumakṣikāḥ /
analyzed: aśva śālām samāsādya yadā antar madhumakṣikāḥ

original: MSS_3559-2 madhujālaṃ prabadhnanti mriyante'śvāstadā dhruvam //
analyzed: madhu jālam prabadhnanti mriyante īśvāḥ tadā dhruvam

original: MSS_3560-1 aśvasya lakṣaṇaṃ vego mado mātaṅgalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: aśvasya lakṣaṇam vegaḥ madaḥ mātaṅga lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_3560-2 cāturyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāryā udyogaḥ puruṣalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: cāturyam lakṣaṇam nāryāḥ udyogaḥ puruṣa lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_3561-1 aśvānāṃ ca patākānāṃ bālānāṃ paṇyayoṣitām /
analyzed: aśvānām ca patākānām bālānām paṇya yoṣitām

original: MSS_3561-2 vidūṣakapaṭānāṃ ca cāpalyamatimaṇḍanam //
analyzed: vidūṣaka paṭānām ca cāpalyam ati maṇḍanam

original: MSS_3562-1 aśvā nāgāḥ syandanānāṃ ca saṅghā mantrāḥ siddhā daivataṃ cānukūlam /
analyzed: aśvāḥ nāgāḥ syandanānām ca saṅghāḥ mantrāḥ siddhāḥ daivatam ca anukūlam

original: MSS_3562-2 etānyāhuḥ sādhanāni sma rājñāṃ yebhyaśceyaṃ buddhirutkṛṣyate me //
analyzed: etāni āhuḥ sādhanāni sma rājñām yebhyaḥ ca iyam buddhiḥ utkṛṣyate me

original: MSS_3563-1 aśvā yasya jayastasya yasyāśvāstasya medinī /
analyzed: aśvāḥ yasya jayaḥ tasya yasya aśvāḥ tasya medinī

original: MSS_3563-2 aśvā yasya yaśas tasya yasyāśvās tasya kāñcanam //
analyzed: aśvāḥ yasya yaśaḥ tasya yasya aśvāḥ tasya kāñcanam

original: MSS_3564-1 aśvārūḍhaṃ payaḥpānaṃ gajārūḍhaṃ tu maithunam /
analyzed: aśva ārūḍham payaḥ pānam gaja ārūḍham tu maithunam

original: MSS_3564-2 śibikīmardanaṃ caiva pādacārī tu bhojanam //
analyzed: śibikī mardanam ca eva pāda cārī tu bhojanam

original: MSS_3565-1 aśvārūḍhaṃ yatiṃ dṛṣṭvā khaṭvārūḍhāṃ rajasvalām /
analyzed: aśva ārūḍham yatim dṛṣṭvā khaṭvā ārūḍhām rajasvalām

original: MSS_3565-2 sakeśāṃ vidhavāṃ dṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snānamācaret //
analyzed: sa keśām vidhavām dṛṣṭvā sa cailam snānam ācaret

original: MSS_3566-1 aśvāścatuṣkoṭimitā lakṣāṇyekādaśaiva ca /
analyzed: aśvāḥ catuṣkoṭi mitāḥ lakṣāṇi ekādaśa eva ca

original: MSS_3566-2 saptatriṃśatsahasrāṇi tathā śatacatuṣṭayam //
analyzed: saptatriṃśat sahasrāṇi tathā śata catuṣṭayam

original: MSS_3567-1 saptatiścaiva saṃkhyātāḥ procyante pattayastataḥ /
analyzed: saptatiḥ ca eva saṃkhyātāḥ procyante pattayaḥ tatas

original: MSS_3567-2 ṣaṭkoṭyo'śītilakṣāṇi pañcādhikamitāni ca //
analyzed: ṣaṣ koṭyā uśīti lakṣāṇi pañca adhika mitāni ca

original: MSS_3568-1 dviṣaṣṭi ca sahasrāṇi tathā śatacatuṣṭayam /
analyzed: dviṣaṣṭi ca sahasrāṇi tathā śata catuṣṭayam

original: MSS_3568-2 pañcāśaditi saṃkhyātā mahākṣauhinikā budhaiḥ //
analyzed: pañcāśat iti saṃkhyātā mahā kṣauhinikā budhaiḥ

original: MSS_3569-1 aśvinīmaitrarevatyo mṛgo mūlaṃ punarvasuḥ /
analyzed: aśvinī maitrarevatyaḥ mṛgaḥ mūlam punarvasuḥ

original: MSS_3569-2 puṣyo jyeṣṭhā tathā hastaḥ prasthāne śreṣṭha ucyate //
analyzed: puṣyaḥ jyeṣṭhā tathā hastaḥ prasthāne śreṣṭhaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_3570-1 aśvinī sūyate vatsaṃ kāmadhenusturaṃgamam /
analyzed: aśvinī sūyate vatsam kāmadhenuḥ turaṃgamam

original: MSS_3570-2 tathaiva sāgaro vahniṃ yathā rājā tathā prajā //
analyzed: tathā eva sāgaraḥ vahnim yathā rājā tathā prajā

original: MSS_3571-1 aśvīye yamavāhanasya nakulasyāśīviṣāṇāṃ kule mārjārasya ca mūṣakeṣu ghaṭate yā prītirātyantikī /
analyzed: aśvīye yamavāhanasya nakulasya āśīviṣāṇām kule mārjārasya ca mūṣakeṣu ghaṭate yā prītiḥ ātyantikī

original: MSS_3571-2 kṣīṇe'rthe vidhureṣu bandhuṣu dṛḍhe lokāpavāde śanair jñeyā kāmijaneṣu saiva gaṇikāvargasya naisargikī //
analyzed: kṣīṇa īrthe vidhureṣu bandhuṣu dṛḍhe loka apavāde śanais jñeyā kāmi janeṣu sā eva gaṇikā vargasya naisargikī

original: MSS_3572-1 aśve javo vṛṣe dhauryaṃ maṇau kāntiḥ kṣamā nṛpe /
analyzed: aśve javaḥ vṛṣe dhauryam maṇau kāntiḥ kṣamā nṛpe

original: MSS_3572-2 hāvabhāvau ca veśyāyāṃ gāyake madhurasvaraḥ //
analyzed: hāva bhāvau ca veśyāyām gāyake madhura svaraḥ

original: MSS_3573-1 dātṛtvaṃ dhanike śauryaṃ sainike bahudugdhatā /
analyzed: dātṛ tvam dhanike śauryam sainike bahu dugdha tā

original: MSS_3573-2 goṣu damastapasviṣu vidvatsu vāvadūkatā //
analyzed: goṣu damaḥ tapasviṣu vidvatsu vāvadūka tā

original: MSS_3574-1 sabhyeṣvapakṣapātastu tathā sākṣiṣu satyavāk /
analyzed: sabhyeṣu apakṣapātaḥ tu tathā sākṣiṣu satya vāc

original: MSS_3574-2 ananyabhaktirbhṛtyeṣu suhitoktiśca mantriṣu //
analyzed: an anya bhaktiḥ bhṛtyeṣu su hita uktiḥ ca mantriṣu

original: MSS_3575-1 maunaṃ mūrkheṣu ca strīṣu pātivratyaṃ subhūṣaṇam /
analyzed: maunam mūrkheṣu ca strīṣu pātivratyam subhūṣaṇam

original: MSS_3575-2 mahādurbhūṣaṇaṃ caitad viparītamamīṣu ca //
analyzed: mahā durbhūṣaṇam ca etat viparītam amīṣu ca

original: MSS_3576-1 aśvairyānaṃ yānaṃ strībhir līlaiva procyate līlā /
analyzed: aśvaiḥ yānam yānam strībhiḥ līlā eva procyate līlā

original: MSS_3576-2 māṃsāṃ bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ cānyad ayānamalīlābhuktam //
analyzed: māṃsām bhuktam bhuktam ca anyat a yānam alīlā bhuktam

original: MSS_3577-1 aṣṭakulācalasaptasamudrā brahmapuraṃdaradinakararudrāḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭa kula acala sapta samudrāḥ brahma puraṃdara dinakara rudrāḥ

original: MSS_3577-2 na tvaṃ nāhaṃ nāyaṃ lokas tadapi kimarthaṃ kriyate śokaḥ //
analyzed: na tvam na aham na ayam lokaḥ tat api kimartham kriyate śokaḥ

original: MSS_3578-1 aṣṭadhā devatāyonis tiryagyoniśca pañcadhā /
analyzed: aṣṭadhā devatā yoniḥ tiryagyoniḥ ca pañcadhā

original: MSS_3578-2 ekadhā mānuṣī yonir ime bhūtāścaturdaśa //
analyzed: ekadhā mānuṣī yoniḥ ime bhūtāḥ caturdaśa

original: MSS_3579-1 aṣṭapādaścatuṣkarṇo dvimukhī dvimukhastathā /
analyzed: aṣṭapādaḥ catuṣkarṇaḥ dvimukhī dvimukhaḥ tathā

original: MSS_3579-2 rājadvāre paṭhed ghoro na ca devo na rākṣasaḥ //
analyzed: rājadvāre paṭhet ghoraḥ na ca devaḥ na rākṣasaḥ

original: MSS_3580-1 aṣṭamaṃ brahmarandhraṃ syāt paraṃ nirvāṇasūcakam /
taddhyātvā sūcikāgrābhaṃ dhūmākāraṃ vimucyate /
analyzed: tat dhyātvā sūcikā agra ābham dhūma ākāram vimucyate

original: MSS_3580-2 tacca jālaṃdharaṃ jñeyaṃ mokṣadaṃ līnacetasām //
analyzed: tat ca jālaṃdharam jñeyam mokṣa dam līna cetasām

original: aṣṭamī ca amāvāsyā varjanīyā caturdaśī /
analyzed: aṣṭamī ca amāvāsyā varjanīyā caturdaśī

original: MSS_3581-2 pūrṇimārdhadinaṃ yāvan niṣiddhā sarvakarmasu //
analyzed: pūrṇimā ardha dinam yāvat niṣiddhā sarva karmasu

original: MSS_3582-1 aṣṭamī hantyupādhyāyaṃ śiṣyaṃ hanti caturdaśī /
analyzed: aṣṭamī hanti upādhyāyam śiṣyam hanti caturdaśī

original: MSS_3582-2 āmāvāsyo'bhayaṃ hanti pratipat pāṭhanāśinī //
analyzed: āmāvāsyā ubhayam hanti pratipad pāṭha nāśinī

original: MSS_3583-1 aṣṭame dvādaśe vāpi śākaṃ yaḥ pacate gṛhe /
analyzed: aṣṭame dvādaśe vā api śākam yaḥ pacate gṛhe

original: MSS_3583-2 kumitrāṇyanapāśritya kiṃ vai sukhataraṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: ku mitrāṇi an apāśritya kim vai sukhataram tatas

original: MSS_3584-1 aṣṭāṅgayogapariśīlanakīlanena duḥsādhasiddhisavidhaṃ vidadhad vidūre /
analyzed: aṣṭāṅga yoga pariśīlana kīlanena duḥsādha siddhi savidham vidadhat vidūre

original: MSS_3584-2 āsādayannabhimatāmadhunā viveka- khyātiṃ samādhidhanamaulimaṇirvimuktaḥ //
analyzed: āsādayan abhimatām adhunā viveka khyātim samādhi dhana mauli maṇiḥ vimuktaḥ

original: MSS_3585-1 aṣṭāṅgulasya kathito vāyormāno vicakṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭa aṅgulasya kathitaḥ vāyoḥ mānaḥ vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_3585-2 caturaṅgulamānaṃ ca tejastattvaṃ nigadyate //
analyzed: catur aṅgula mānam ca tejaḥ tattvam nigadyate

original: MSS_3586-1 aṣṭādaśa tathā madhye hīne caiva caturdaśa /
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa tathā madhye hīne ca eva caturdaśa

original: MSS_3586-2 saptāṅgulaḥ khuraḥ prokta uttamāśvasya paṇḍitaiḥ //
analyzed: sapta aṅgulaḥ khuraḥ proktaḥ uttama aśvasya paṇḍitaiḥ

original: MSS_3587-1 aṣṭādaśapurāṇeṣu vyāsasya vacanadvayam /
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa purāṇeṣu vyāsasya vacana dvayam

original: MSS_3587-2 paropakāraḥ puṇyāya pāpāya parapīḍanam //
analyzed: para upakāraḥ puṇyāya pāpāya para pīḍanam

original: MSS_3588-1 aṣṭādaśāpi smṛtayo vadanti yasyāparādhaḥ khalu tasya daṇḍaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭādaśā api smṛtayaḥ vadanti yasya aparādhaḥ khalu tasya daṇḍaḥ

original: MSS_3588-2 svasyāparādhaḥ khalu nābhimūle śiraḥ kuto muṇḍayate mṛgākṣi //
analyzed: svasya aparādhaḥ khalu nābhimūle śiraḥ kutas muṇḍayate mṛga akṣi

original: MSS_3589-1 aṣṭānāṃ lokapālānāṃ saṃbhavatyaṃśato nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭānām lokapālānām saṃbhavati aṃśataḥ nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_3589-2 tasmādabhibhavatyeṣa sarvabhūtāni tejasā //
analyzed: tasmāt abhibhavati eṣa sarva bhūtāni tejasā

original: MSS_3590-1 aṣṭābhiḥ kila daṇḍanītinipuṇaiḥ satprāḍvivākaiḥ samaṃ madhyesaudhamanuttamāsanagataḥ kāryāṇi kurvan nṛṇām /
analyzed: aṣṭābhiḥ kila daṇḍanīti nipuṇaiḥ sat prāḍvivākaiḥ samam madhyesaudham anuttama āsana gataḥ kāryāṇi kurvan nṛṇām

original: MSS_3590-2 viṣṇurbhūpavapurvidhāya kimasau dikpālayuk pālayaty evaṃ bhrāntimato manāṅ na kurute kāskānayaṃ mādhavaḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ bhūpa vapuḥ vidhāya kim asau dikpāla yuj pālayati evam bhrāntimataḥ manāk na kurute mādhavaḥ

original: MSS_3591-1 aṣṭāvaṅgāni yogasya yamo niyama āsanam /
analyzed: aṣṭāvaṅgāni yogasya yamaḥ niyamaḥ āsanam

original: MSS_3591-2 prāṇāyāmaḥ pratyāhāro dhāraṇā dhyānatanmayaḥ //
MSS_3592-1 aṣṭāvimāni harṣasya navanītāni bhārata /
analyzed: aṣṭāv imāni harṣasya navanītāni bhārata

original: MSS_3592-2 vartamānāni dṛśyante tānyeva susukhānyapi //
analyzed: vartamānāni dṛśyante tāni eva su sukhāni api

original: MSS_3593-1 samāgamaśca sakhibhir mahāṃścaiva dhanāgamaḥ /
analyzed: samāgamaḥ ca sakhibhiḥ mahān ca eva dhana āgamaḥ

original: MSS_3593-2 putreṇa ca pariṣvaṅgaḥ saṃnipātaśca maithune //
analyzed: putreṇa ca pariṣvaṅgaḥ saṃnipātaḥ ca maithune

original: MSS_3594-1 samaye ca priyālāpaḥ svayūtheṣu ca saṃnatiḥ /
analyzed: samaye ca priya ālāpaḥ sva yūtheṣu ca saṃnatiḥ

original: MSS_3594-2 abhipretasya lābhaśca pūjā ca janasaṃsadi //
analyzed: abhipretasya lābhaḥ ca pūjā ca jana saṃsadi

original: MSS_3595-1 aṣṭottaraśataṃ ślokaṃ cāṇakyena yathoditam /
analyzed: aṣṭottaraśatam ślokam cāṇakyena yathā uditam

original: MSS_3595-2 yasya vijñānamātreṇa n ṇāṃ prajñā pravardhate //
analyzed: yasya vijñāna mātreṇa n ṇām prajñā pravardhate

original: MSS_3596-1 aṣṭau guṇāḥ puruṣaṃ dīpayanti prajñā ca kaulyaṃ ca damaḥ śrutaṃ ca /
analyzed: aṣṭau guṇāḥ puruṣam dīpayanti prajñā ca kaulyam ca damaḥ śrutam ca

original: MSS_3596-2 parākramaścābahubhāṣitā ca dānaṃ yathāśakti kṛtajñatā ca //
analyzed: parākramaḥ ca a bahu bhāṣi tā ca dānam yathāśakti kṛtajña tā ca

original: MSS_3597-1 aṣṭau tānyavrataghnāni āpo mūlaṃ phalaṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭau tāni a vrata ghnāni āpaḥ mūlam phalam payaḥ

original: MSS_3597-2 havirbhrāhmaṇakāmyā ca gurorvacanamauṣadham //
analyzed: haviḥ bhrāhmaṇa kāmyā ca guroḥ vacanam auṣadham

original: MSS_3598-1 aṣṭau nṛpemāni manuṣyaloke svargasya lokasya nidarśanāni /
analyzed: aṣṭau nṛpa imāni manuṣya loke svargasya lokasya nidarśanāni

original: MSS_3598-2 catvāryeṣāmanvavetāni sadbhiś catvāryeṣāmanvavayanti santaḥ //
analyzed: catvāri eṣām anvavetāni sadbhiḥ catvāri eṣām anvavayanti santaḥ

original: MSS_3599-1 yajño dānamadhyayanaṃ tapaśca catvāryetānyanvavetāni sadbhiḥ /
analyzed: yajñaḥ dānam adhyayanam tapaḥ ca catvāri etāni anvavetāni sadbhiḥ

original: MSS_3599-2 damaḥ satyamārjavamānṛśaṃsyaṃ catvāryetānyanvavayanti santaḥ //
analyzed: damaḥ satyam ārjavam ānṛśaṃsyam catvāri etāni anvavayanti santaḥ

original: MSS_3600-1 aṣṭau pūrvanimittāni narasya vinaśiṣyataḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭau pūrva nimittāni narasya vinaśiṣyataḥ

original: MSS_3600-2 brāhmaṇān prathamaṃ dveṣṭi brāhmaṇaiśca virudhyate //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān prathamam dveṣṭi brāhmaṇaiḥ ca virudhyate

original: MSS_3601-1 brāhmaṇasvāni cādatte brāhmaṇāṃśca jighāṃsati /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa svāni ca ādatte brāhmaṇān ca jighāṃsati

original: MSS_3601-2 ramate nindayā caiṣāṃ praśaṃsāṃ nābhinandati //
analyzed: ramate nindayā ca eṣām praśaṃsām na abhinandati

original: MSS_3602-1 naitān smarati kṛtyeṣu yācitaś cābhyasūyati /
analyzed: na etān smarati kṛtyeṣu yācitaḥ ca abhyasūyati

original: MSS_3602-2 etān doṣān naraḥ prājño buddhyā buddhvā vivarjayet //
analyzed: etān doṣān naraḥ prājñaḥ buddhyā buddhvā vivarjayet

original: MSS_3603-1 aṣṭau māsān yathādityas toyaṃ harati raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭau māsān yathā ādityaḥ toyam harati raśmibhiḥ

original: MSS_3603-2 tathā haret karaṃ rāṣṭrān nityamarkavrataṃ hi tat //
analyzed: tathā haret karam rāṣṭrāt nityam arkavratam hi tat

original: MSS_3604-1 aṣṭau yadā tu dṛśyante samantād devayonayaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭau yadā tu dṛśyante samantāt devayonayaḥ

original: MSS_3604-2 upasargaṃ tamityāhur daivamunmattavad budhāḥ //
analyzed: upasargam tam iti āhuḥ daivam unmatta vat budhāḥ

original: MSS_3605-1 aṣṭau yasya diśo dalāni vipulaḥ kośaḥ suvarṇācalaḥ kāntaṃ kesarajālamarkakiraṇā bhṛṅgāḥ payodāvalī /
analyzed: aṣṭau yasya diśaḥ dalāni vipulaḥ kośaḥ suvarṇa acalaḥ kāntam kesara jālam arka kiraṇāḥ bhṛṅgāḥ payoda āvalī

original: MSS_3605-2 nālaṃ śeṣamahoragaḥ pravitataṃ vārāṃnidherlīlayā tadvaḥ pātu samuddharan kuvalayaṃ kroḍākṛtiḥ keśavaḥ //
analyzed: nālam śeṣa mahā uragaḥ pravitatam vārāṃnidheḥ līlayā tat vaḥ pātu samuddharan kuvalayam kroḍa ākṛtiḥ keśavaḥ

original: MSS_3606-1 aṣṭau hāṭakakoṭayastrinavatirmuktāphalānāṃ tulāḥ pañcāśanmadhugandhamattamadhupāḥ krodhoddhatāḥ sindhurāḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭau hāṭaka koṭayaḥ trinavatiḥ muktāphalānām tulāḥ pañcāśat madhu gandha matta madhupāḥ krodha uddhatāḥ sindhurāḥ

original: MSS_3606-2 aśvānāmayutaṃ prapañcacaturaṃ vārāṅganānāṃ śataṃ dattaṃ pāṇḍyanṛpeṇa yautakamidaṃ vaitālikāyārpyatām //
analyzed: aśvānām ayutam prapañca caturam vārāṅganānām śatam dattam pāṇḍya nṛpeṇa yautakam idam vaitālikāya arpyatām

original: MSS_3607-1 asaṃkalpājjayet kāmaṃ krodhaṃ kāmavivarjanāt /
analyzed: asaṃkalpāt jayet kāmam krodham kāma vivarjanāt

original: MSS_3607-2 arthānarthekṣayā lobhaṃ bhayaṃ tattvāvamarśanāt //
analyzed: artha anartha īkṣayā lobham bhayam tattva avamarśanāt

original: MSS_3608-1 asaṃkalpitameveha yadakasmāt pravartate /
analyzed: asaṃkalpitam evā iha yat akasmāt pravartate

original: MSS_3608-2 nivartyārambhamārabdhaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat //
analyzed: nivartya ārambham ārabdham nanu daivasya karma tat

original: MSS_3609-1 asaṃkhyapuṣpo'pi manobhavasya pañcaiva bāṇārthamayaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: asaṃkhya puṣpaḥ api manobhavasya pañca eva bāṇa artham ayam dadāti

original: MSS_3609-2 evaṃ kadaryatvamivāvadhārya sarvasvamagrāhi madhorvadhūbhiḥ //
analyzed: evam kadarya tvam iva avadhārya sarva svam agrāhi madhoḥ vadhūbhiḥ

original: MSS_3610-1 asaṃkhyāḥ paradoṣajñā guṇajñā api kecana /
analyzed: asaṃkhyāḥ para doṣa jñāḥ guṇa jñāḥ api kecana

original: MSS_3610-2 svayameva svadoṣajñā vidyante yadi pañcaṣāḥ //
analyzed: svayam eva sva doṣa jñāḥ vidyante yadi pañcaṣāḥ

original: MSS_3611-1 asaṃgatenonnatimāgatena calena vakreṇa malīmasena /
analyzed: asaṃgatena unnatim āgatena calena vakreṇa malīmasena

original: MSS_3611-2 sā durjaneneva samastametaṃ prabādhate bhrūyugalena lokam //
analyzed: sā durjanena iva samastam etam prabādhate bhrū yugalena lokam

original: MSS_3612-1 asaṃgṛhītasya punar mantrasya śṛṇu yatphalam /
analyzed: asaṃgṛhītasya punar mantrasya śṛṇu yat phalam

original: MSS_3612-2 ahīnaṃ dharmakāmābhyām arthaṃ prāpnoti kevalam //
analyzed: ahīnam dharma kāmābhyām artham prāpnoti kevalam

original: MSS_3613-1 asaṃcayādapūrvasya kṣayāt pūrvārjitasya ca /
analyzed: a saṃcayāt apūrvasya kṣayāt pūrva arjitasya ca

original: MSS_3613-2 karmaṇo bandhamāpnoti śārīraṃ na punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ bandham āpnoti śārīram na punar punar

original: MSS_3614-1 asaṃtuṣṭasya viprasya tejo vidyā tapo yaśaḥ /
analyzed: asaṃtuṣṭasya viprasya tejaḥ vidyā tapaḥ yaśaḥ

original: MSS_3614-2 sravantīndriyalaulyena jñānaṃ caivāvakīryate //
analyzed: sravanti indriya laulyena jñānam ca eva avakīryate

original: MSS_3615-1 asaṃtuṣṭā dvijā naṣṭāḥ saṃtuṣṭāśca mahībhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: asaṃtuṣṭāḥ dvijāḥ naṣṭāḥ saṃtuṣṭāḥ ca mahībhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_3615-2 salajjā gaṇikā naṣṭā nirlajjāśca kulāṅganā //
analyzed: sa lajjā gaṇikā naṣṭā nirlajjāḥ ca kula aṅganā

original: MSS_3616-1 asaṃtuṣṭāścyutāḥ sthānān mānāt pratyavaropitāḥ /
analyzed: asaṃtuṣṭāḥ cyutāḥ sthānāt mānāt pratyavaropitāḥ

original: MSS_3616-2 svayaṃ copahṛtā bhṛtyā ye cāpyupahatāḥ paraiḥ //
analyzed: svayam ca upahṛtāḥ bhṛtyāḥ ye ca api upahatāḥ paraiḥ

original: MSS_3617-1 asaṃtuṣṭo'sakṛllokān āpnotyapi sureśvaraḥ /
analyzed: asaṃtuṣṭaḥ usakṛt lokān āpnoti api sureśvaraḥ

original: MSS_3617-2 akiṃcano'pi saṃtuṣṭaḥ śete sarvāṅgavijvaraḥ //
analyzed: saṃtuṣṭaḥ śete sarva aṅga vijvaraḥ

original: MSS_3618-1 asaṃtoṣaḥ paraṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham /
analyzed: asaṃtoṣaḥ param duḥkham saṃtoṣaḥ paramam sukham

original: MSS_3618-2 sukhārthī puruṣas tasmāt saṃtuṣṭaḥ satataḥ bhavet //
analyzed: sukha arthī puruṣaḥ tasmāt saṃtuṣṭaḥ satataḥ bhavet

original: MSS_3619-1 asaṃtoṣaḥ paraṃ pāpam ityāha bhagavān hariḥ /
analyzed: asaṃtoṣaḥ param pāpam iti āha bhagavān hariḥ

original: MSS_3619-2 lobhaḥ pāpasya bījo'yaṃ moho mūlaṃ ca tasya vai /
analyzed: lobhaḥ pāpasya bīja uyam mohaḥ mūlam ca tasya vai

original: MSS_3619-3 asatyaṃ tasya hi skandho mahāśākhā suvistarā //
analyzed: asatyam tasya hi skandhaḥ mahā śākhā su vistarā

original: MSS_3620-1 asaṃtoṣaparā mūḍhāḥ saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ /
analyzed: a saṃtoṣa parāḥ mūḍhāḥ saṃtoṣam yānti paṇḍitāḥ

original: MSS_3620-2 asantoṣasya nāstyantas tuṣṭistu paramaṃ sukham //
analyzed: a santoṣasya na asti antaḥ tuṣṭiḥ tu paramam sukham

original: MSS_3621-1 asaṃtoṣo'sukhāyaiva lobhādindriyavibhramaḥ /
analyzed: asaṃtoṣaḥ sukhāya eva lobhāt indriya vibhramaḥ

original: MSS_3621-2 tato'sya naśyati prajñā vidyevābhyāsavarjitā //
analyzed: tatas asya naśyati prajñā vidyā iva abhyāsa varjitā

original: MSS_3622-1 asaṃtyāgāt pāpakṛtāmapāpāṃs tulyo daṇḍaḥ spṛśate miśrabhāvāt /
analyzed: asaṃtyāgāt pāpa kṛtām apāpān tulyaḥ daṇḍaḥ spṛśate miśra bhāvāt

original: MSS_3622-2 śuṣkeṇārdraṃ dahyate miśrabhāvāt tasmāt pāpaiḥ saha saṃdhiṃ na kuryāt //
analyzed: śuṣkeṇa ārdram dahyate miśra bhāvāt tasmāt pāpaiḥ saha saṃdhim na kuryāt

original: MSS_3623-1 asaṃdadhāno mānāndhaḥ samenāpi hato bhṛśam /
analyzed: asaṃdadhānaḥ māna andhaḥ samena api hataḥ bhṛśam

original: MSS_3623-2 āmakumbhamivābhittvā nāvatiṣṭheta śaktimān //
analyzed: āma kumbham iva a bhittvā na avatiṣṭheta śaktimān

original: MSS_3624-1 asaṃdigdhamanā bhūtvā vadedikṣuraso yathā /
analyzed: asaṃdigdha manāḥ bhūtvā vadet ikṣu rasaḥ yathā

original: MSS_3624-2 vikṣubdho vacasā yo hi vākyaśalyena hanyate //
analyzed: vikṣubdhaḥ vacasā yaḥ hi vākya śalyena hanyate

original: MSS_3625-1 asaṃpattau paro lābho guhyasya kathanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: asaṃpattau paraḥ lābhaḥ guhyasya kathanam tathā

original: MSS_3625-2 āpadvimokṣaṇaṃ caiva mitrasyaitat phalatrayam //
analyzed: āpad vimokṣaṇam ca eva mitrasya etat phala trayam

original: MSS_3626-1 asaṃpannaḥ kathaṃ bandhur asahiṣṇuḥ kathaṃ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: asaṃpannaḥ katham bandhuḥ asahiṣṇuḥ katham prabhuḥ

original: MSS_3626-2 anātmavit kathaṃ vidvān asaṃtuṣṭaḥ kathaṃ sukhī //
analyzed: anātma vid katham vidvān asaṃtuṣṭaḥ katham sukhī

original: MSS_3627-1 asaṃpādayataḥ kaṃcidarthaṃ jātikriyāguṇaiḥ /
analyzed: a saṃpādayataḥ kaṃcid artham jāti kriyā guṇaiḥ

original: MSS_3627-2 yadṛcchāśabdavatpuṃsaḥ saṃjñāyai janma kevalam //
analyzed: yadṛcchā śabdavat puṃsaḥ saṃjñāyai janma kevalam

original: MSS_3628-1 asaṃprāptarajā gaurī prāpte rajasi rohiṇī /
analyzed: asaṃprāpta rajāḥ gaurī prāpte rajasi rohiṇī

original: MSS_3628-2 avyañjanā bhavet kanyā kucahīnā ca nagnikā //
analyzed: avyañjanā bhavet kanyā kuca hīnā ca nagnikā

original: MSS_3629-1 asaṃbhavaṃ hemamṛgasya janma tathāpi rāmo lulubhe mṛgāya /
analyzed: asaṃbhavam hema mṛgasya janma tathā api rāmaḥ lulubhe mṛgāya

original: MSS_3629-2 prāyaḥ samāpannavipattikāle dhiyo'pi puṃsāṃ malinā bhavanti //
analyzed: prāyas samāpanna vipatti kāle dhiyaḥ api puṃsām malināḥ bhavanti

original: MSS_3630-1 asaṃbhavaguṇastutyā jāyate svātmanastrapā /
analyzed: asaṃbhava guṇa stutyā jāyate svātmanaḥ trapā

original: MSS_3630-2 karṇikāraṃ sugandhīti vadan ko nopahasyate //
analyzed: karṇikāram sugandhi iti vadan kaḥ nā upahasyate

original: MSS_3631-1 asaṃbhāvyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣamapi dṛśyate /
analyzed: asaṃbhāvyam na vaktavyam pratyakṣam api dṛśyate

original: MSS_3631-2 śilā tarati pānīyaṃ gītaṃ gāyati vānaraḥ //
analyzed: śilā tarati pānīyam gītam gāyati vānaraḥ

original: MSS_3632-1 asaṃbhāṣyaṃ na bhāṣeta bhāṣase yadi tattathā /
analyzed: a saṃbhāṣyam na bhāṣeta bhāṣase yadi tat tathā

original: MSS_3632-2 pareṣāṃ hi samudvege nātmanaśca śubhaṃ phalam //
analyzed: pareṣām hi samudvege na ātmanaḥ ca śubham phalam

original: MSS_3633-1 asaṃbhṛtaṃ maṇḍanamaṅgayaṣṭer anāsavākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ madasya /
analyzed: asaṃbhṛtam maṇḍanam aṅga yaṣṭeḥ anāsava ākhyam karaṇam madasya

original: MSS_3633-2 kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyāt paraṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede //
analyzed: kāmasya puṣpa vyatiriktam astram bālyāt param sā atha vayaḥ prapede

original: MSS_3634-1 asaṃbhedyaḥ śucirdakṣaḥ kṛtānnasya parīkṣakaḥ /
analyzed: asaṃbhedyaḥ śuciḥ dakṣaḥ kṛtānnasya parīkṣakaḥ

original: MSS_3634-2 sūdānāṃ ca viśeṣajñaḥ sūdādhyakṣo vidhīyate //
analyzed: sūdānām ca viśeṣa jñaḥ sūda adhyakṣaḥ vidhīyate

original: MSS_3635-1 asaṃbhogena sāmānyaṃ kṛpaṇasya dhanaṃ paraiḥ /
analyzed: asaṃbhogena sāmānyam kṛpaṇasya dhanam paraiḥ

original: MSS_3635-2 asyedamiti saṃbandho hānau duḥkhena gamyate //
analyzed: asya idam iti saṃbandhaḥ hānau duḥkhena gamyate

original: MSS_3636-1 asaṃbhramo vilajjatvam avajñā prativādini /
analyzed: asaṃbhramaḥ vilajja tvam avajñā prativādini

original: MSS_3636-2 hāso rājñaḥ stavaśceti pañcaite jayahetavaḥ //
analyzed: hāsaḥ rājñaḥ stavaḥ ca iti pañca ete jaya hetavaḥ

original: MSS_3637-1 asaṃmataḥ kastava muktimārgaṃ punarbhavakleśabhayāt prapannaḥ /
analyzed: a saṃmataḥ kaḥ tava mukti mārgam punarbhava kleśa bhayāt prapannaḥ

original: MSS_3637-2 baddhaściraṃ tiṣṭhatu sundarīṇām ārecitabhrūcaturaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ //
analyzed: baddhaḥ ciram tiṣṭhatu sundarīṇām ārecita bhrū caturaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ

original: MSS_3638-1 asaṃmāne tapovṛddhiḥ saṃmmānācca tapaḥkṣayaḥ /
analyzed: a saṃmāne tapaḥ vṛddhiḥ saṃmmānāt ca tapaḥ kṣayaḥ

original: MSS_3638-2 pūjayā puṇyahāniḥ syān nindayā sadgatirbhavet //
analyzed: pūjayā puṇya hāniḥ syāt nindayā sat gatiḥ bhavet

original: MSS_3639-1 asaṃmukhālokanamābhimukhyaṃ niṣedha evānumatiprakāraḥ /
analyzed: asaṃmukha ālokanam ābhimukhyam niṣedhaḥ eva anumati prakāraḥ

original: MSS_3639-2 pratyuttaraṃ mudraṇameva vācāṃ navāṅganānāṃ nava eva panthāḥ //
analyzed: pratyuttaram mudraṇam eva vācām nava aṅganānām navaḥ eva panthāḥ

original: MSS_3640-1 asaṃvibhāgī duṣṭātmā kṛtaghno nirapatrapaḥ /
analyzed: asaṃvibhāgī duṣṭa ātmā kṛtaghnaḥ nirapatrapaḥ

original: MSS_3640-2 tādṛṅnarādhamo loke varjanīyo narādhipa //
analyzed: tādṛś nara adhamaḥ loke varjanīyaḥ narādhipa

original: MSS_3641-1 asaṃvṛtasya kāryāṇi prāptānyapi viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: asaṃvṛtasya kāryāṇi prāptāni api viśeṣataḥ

original: MSS_3641-2 niḥsaṃśayaṃ vipadyante bhinnaplava ivodadhau //
analyzed: niḥsaṃśayam vipadyante bhinna plave iva udadhau

original: MSS_3642-1 asaṃvṛtākāratayā bhinnamantrasya bhūpateḥ /
analyzed: asaṃvṛta ākāra tayā bhinna mantrasya bhūpateḥ

original: MSS_3642-2 sakṛcchidraghaṭasyeva na tiṣṭhatyudayodakam //
analyzed: sakṛt chidra ghaṭasya iva na tiṣṭhati udaya udakam

original: MSS_3643-1 asaṃśayaṃ kṣatraparigrahakṣamā yadāryamasyāmabhilāṣi me manaḥ /
analyzed: asaṃśayam kṣatra parigraha kṣamā yadā āryam asyām abhilāṣi me manaḥ

original: MSS_3643-2 satāṃ hi saṃdehapadeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇamantaḥkaraṇapravṛttayaḥ //
analyzed: satām hi saṃdeha padeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇam antaḥkaraṇa pravṛttayaḥ

original: MSS_3644-1 asaṃśayaṃ nyastamupāntaraktatāṃ yadeva roddhuṃ rāmaṇībhirañjanam /
analyzed: asaṃśayam nyastam upānta rakta tām yat eva roddhum rāmaṇībhiḥ añjanam

original: MSS_3644-2 hṛte'pi tasmin salilena śuklatāṃ nirāsa rāgo nayaneṣu na śriyam //
analyzed: hṛte api tasmin salilena śukla tām nirāsa rāgaḥ nayaneṣu na śriyam

original: MSS_3645-1 asaṃśayaṃ mahābāho mano durnigrahaṃ calam /
analyzed: asaṃśayam mahā bāho manaḥ durnigraham calam

original: MSS_3645-2 abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate //
analyzed: abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate

original: MSS_3646-1 asaṃśayaṃ vijānīhi kāle sarvaṃ phaliṣyati /
analyzed: asaṃśayam vijānīhi kāle sarvam phaliṣyati

original: MSS_3646-2 dhṛtiṃ dhāraya visrabdhaṃ bhavet sarvaṃ samañjasam //
analyzed: dhṛtim dhāraya visrabdham bhavet sarvam samañjasam

original: MSS_3647-1 asakalakalikākulīkṛtāli- skhalanavikīrṇavikāsikeśarāṇām /
analyzed: skhalana vikīrṇa vikāsi kesarāṇām

original: MSS_3647-2 marudavaniruhāṃ rajo vadhūbhyaḥ samupaharan vicakāra korakāṇi //
analyzed: marut avaniruhām rajaḥ vadhūbhyaḥ samupaharan vicakāra korakāṇi

original: MSS_3648-1 asakalanayanāvalokanena smitaparihāsamanoharairvacobhiḥ /
analyzed: a sakala nayana avalokanena smita parihāsa manoharaiḥ vacobhiḥ

original: MSS_3648-2 kamalamukhi murārirevamevaṃ kathaya kiyanti dināni vañcanīyaḥ //
analyzed: kamala mukhi murāriḥ evam evam kathaya kiyanti dināni vañcanīyaḥ

original: MSS_3649-1 asakalanayanekṣitāni lajjā gatamalasaṃ paripāṇḍutā viṣādaḥ /
analyzed: a sakala nayana īkṣitāni lajjā gatam alasam paripāṇḍu tā viṣādaḥ

original: MSS_3649-2 iti vividhamiyāya tāsu bhūṣāṃ prabhavati maṇḍayituṃ vadhūranaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: iti vividham iyāya tāsu bhūṣām prabhavati maṇḍayitum vadhūḥ anaṅgaḥ

original: MSS_3650-1 asakṛdasakṛnnaṣṭāṃ naṣṭāṃ mṛgo mṛgatṛṣṇikāṃ śramaparigato'pyutpakṣmākṣaḥ paraiti punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: asakṛt asakṛt naṣṭām naṣṭām mṛgaḥ mṛgatṛṣṇikām śrama parigataḥ upi utpakṣma akṣaḥ paraiti punar punar

original: MSS_3650-2 gaṇayati na tanmāyātoyaṃ hataḥ salilāśayā bhavati hi matistṛṣṇāndhānāṃ vivekaparāṅmukhī //
analyzed: gaṇayati na tat māyā toyam hataḥ salila āśayāḥ bhavati hi matiḥ tṛṣṇā andhānām viveka parāṅmukhī

original: MSS_3651-1 asakṛn na ne'ti sāvadhi- niṣedhabodhiśrutirmayā kalitā /
analyzed: asakṛt na na iti sa avadhi niṣedha bodhi śrutiḥ mayā kalitā

original: MSS_3651-2 gamayati paramanavarataṃ yā tamakhaṇḍārtharūpamānandam //
analyzed: gamayati param anavaratam yā tam akhaṇḍa artha rūpam ānandam

original: MSS_3652-1 asakṛdekarathena tarasvinā harihayāgrasareṇa dhanurbhṛtā /
analyzed: asakṛt eka rathena tarasvinā hari haya agrasareṇa dhanuḥ bhṛtā

original: MSS_3652-2 dinakarābhimukhā raṇareṇavo rurudhire rudhireṇa suradviṣām //
analyzed: dinakara abhimukhāḥ raṇa reṇavaḥ rurudhire rudhireṇa suradviṣām

original: MSS_3653-1 asakṛd yudhi vijitādapi bhīto bārhadrathājjale durgam /
analyzed: asakṛt yudhi vijitāt api bhītaḥ bārhadrathāt jale durgam

original: MSS_3653-2 kṛtvā harirnyavātsīd vijito'pyāśaṅkanīyo'riḥ //
analyzed: kṛtvā hariḥ nyavātsīt vijitaḥ upi āśaṅkanīya ūriḥ

original: MSS_3654-1 asakṛn na vadedāśāṃ prārthayed devatāṃ sakṛt /
analyzed: asakṛt na vadet āśām prārthayet devatām sakṛt

original: MSS_3654-2 nālāyanī pañca patīn prāpoccārya punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: nālāyanī pañca patīn prāpa uccārya punar punar

original: MSS_3655-1 asaktamārādhayato yathāyathaṃ vibhajya bhaktyā samapakṣapātayā /
analyzed: asaktam ārādhayataḥ yathāyatham vibhajya bhaktyā sama pakṣapātayā

original: MSS_3655-2 guṇānurāgādiva sakhyamīyivān na bādhate'sya trigaṇaḥ parasparam //
analyzed: guṇa anurāgāt iva sakhyam īyivān na bādhate isya trigaṇaḥ parasparam

original: MSS_3656-1 asaṅgasaṃgadoṣeṇa satyāśca mativibhramaḥ /
analyzed: asaṅga saṃga doṣeṇa satyāḥ ca mati vibhramaḥ

original: MSS_3656-2 ekarātraprasaṅgena kāṣṭhaghaṇṭāviḍambanā //
analyzed: eka rātra prasaṅgena kāṣṭha ghaṇṭā viḍambanā

original: MSS_3657-1 asajjanaḥ sajjanasaṅgisaṅgāt karoti duḥsādhyamapīha sādhyam /
analyzed: asat janaḥ sat jana saṅgi saṅgāt karoti duḥsādhyam api iha sādhyam

original: MSS_3657-2 puṣpāśrayācchaṃbhuśiro'dhirūḍhā pipīlikā cumbati candrabimbam //
analyzed: puṣpa āśrayāt śaṃbhu śiraḥ adhirūḍhā pipīlikā cumbati candra bimbam

original: MSS_3658-1 asajjanāyāśu varaṃ na dadyāt prītito nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: asat janāya āśu varam na dadyāt prītitaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_3658-2 varaṃ bhasmāsurāyeśaḥ dattvā nīliphalaṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: varam bhasma asurāya īśaḥ dattvā nīli phalam gataḥ

original: MSS_3659-1 asajjanāścen madhurairvacobhiḥ śakyanta eva pratikartumāryaiḥ /
analyzed: asat janāḥ ced madhuraiḥ vacobhiḥ śakyante eva pratikartum āryaiḥ

original: MSS_3659-2 tatketakīreṇubhiramburāśer bandhakriyāyāmapi kaḥ prayāsaḥ //
analyzed: tat ketakī reṇubhiḥ amburāśeḥ bandha kriyāyām api kaḥ prayāsaḥ

original: MSS_3660-1 asajjanena saṃparkād anayaṃ yānti sādhavaḥ /
analyzed: asat janena saṃparkāt anayam yānti sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_3660-2 madhuraṃ śītalaṃ toyaṃ pāvakaṃ prāpya tapyate //
analyzed: madhuram śītalam toyam pāvakam prāpya tapyate

original: MSS_3661-1 asataḥ śrīmadāndhasya dāridryaṃ paramāñjanam /
analyzed: asataḥ śrī mada andhasya dāridryam parama añjanam

original: MSS_3661-2 ātmaupamyena bhūtāni daridraḥ paramīkṣate //
analyzed: ātma aupamyena bhūtāni daridraḥ param īkṣate

original: MSS_3662-1 asatāṃ ca parikṣepaḥ satāṃ ca parigūhanam /
analyzed: asatām ca parikṣepaḥ satām ca parigūhanam

original: MSS_3662-2 abhūtānāṃ ca hiṃsānām adharmāṇāṃ ca varjanam //
analyzed: abhūtānām ca hiṃsānām adharmāṇām ca varjanam

original: MSS_3663-1 asatāṃ dharmabuddhiścet satāṃ saṃtāpakāraṇam /
analyzed: asatām dharma buddhiḥ ced satām saṃtāpa kāraṇam

original: MSS_3663-2 upoṣitasya vyāghrasya pāraṇaṃ paśumāraṇam //
analyzed: upoṣitasya vyāghrasya pāraṇam paśu māraṇam

original: MSS_3664-1 asatāṃ pragrahaḥ kāmaḥ kopaścāvagrahaḥ satām /
analyzed: asatām pragrahaḥ kāmaḥ kopaḥ ca avagrahaḥ satām

original: MSS_3664-2 vyasanaṃ doṣabāhulyād atyantamubhayaṃ matam //
analyzed: vyasanam doṣa bāhulyāt atyantam ubhayam matam

original: MSS_3665-1 asatāṃ bata sattāpi na nyāyānugatā yadā /
analyzed: asatām bata sattā api na nyāya anugatā yadā

original: MSS_3665-2 tatastebhyorthapūrttyāśā sudhālipseva bhoginaḥ //
analyzed: tatas tebhyaḥ ṛtha pūrtti āśā sudhā lipsā iva bhoginaḥ

original: MSS_3666-1 asatāṃ saṅgadoṣeṇa satī yāti matirbhramam /
analyzed: asatām saṅga doṣeṇa satī yāti matiḥ bhramam

original: MSS_3666-2 ekarātripravāsena kāṣṭhaṃ muñje pralambitam //
