analyzed: eka rātri pravāsena kāṣṭham muñje pralambitam

original: MSS_3667-1 asatāṃ saṅgadoṣeṇa sādhavo yānti vikriyām /
analyzed: asatām saṅga doṣeṇa sādhavaḥ yānti vikriyām

original: MSS_3667-2 duryodhanaprasaṅgena bhīṣmo goharaṇe gataḥ //
analyzed: duryodhana prasaṅgena bhīṣmaḥ go haraṇe gataḥ

original: MSS_3668-1 asatāṃ saṅgamutsṛjya satsu saṅgaṃ samācaret /
analyzed: asatām saṅgam utsṛjya satsu saṅgam samācaret

original: MSS_3668-2 asatāṃ saṅgadoṣeṇa māṇḍavyaḥ śūlamāptavān //
analyzed: asatām saṅga doṣeṇa māṇḍavyaḥ śūlam āptavān

original: MSS_3669-1 asatāṃ sahajo bhāvaś channaḥ kenāpi hetunā /
analyzed: asatām sahajaḥ bhāvaḥ channaḥ kena api hetunā

original: MSS_3669-2 saṃskāra iva bījānāṃ phalena saha jāyate //
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ iva bījānām phalena saha jāyate

original: MSS_3670-1 asatāmupabhogāya durjanānāṃ vibhūtayaḥ /
analyzed: asatām upabhogāya durjanānām vibhūtayaḥ

original: MSS_3670-2 picumandaḥ phalāḍhyo'pi kākairevopabhujyate //
analyzed: picumandaḥ phala āḍhyaḥ api kākaiḥ eva upabhujyate

original: MSS_3671-1 asatā saha saṅgena ko na yātyadhamāṃ gatim /
analyzed: asatā saha saṅgena kaḥ na yāti adhamām gatim

original: MSS_3671-2 payo'pi śauṇḍanīhaste madyamityabhidhīyate //
analyzed: payaḥ pi śauṇḍanī haste madyam iti abhidhīyate

original: MSS_3672-1 asatīcaritaṃ tadvad vasantādeścavarṇanam /
analyzed: asatī caritam tadvat vasanta ādeḥ ca varṇanam

original: MSS_3672-2 grīṣmādervarṇanaṃ tadvad varṣāderapi varṇanam //
analyzed: grīṣma ādeḥ varṇanam tadvat varṣa ādeḥ api varṇanam

original: MSS_3673-1 asatī bhavati salajjā kṣāraṃ nīraṃ ca śītalaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: asatī bhavati sa lajjā kṣāram nīram ca śītalam bhavati

original: MSS_3673-2 dambhī bhavati vivekī priyavaktā bhavati dhūrtajanaḥ //
analyzed: dambhī bhavati vivekī priya vaktā bhavati dhūrta janaḥ

original: MSS_3674-1 asato'pi bhavati guṇavān sadbhyo'pi paraṃ bhavantyasadvṛttāḥ /
analyzed: asataḥ api bhavati guṇavān sadbhyaḥ api param bhavanti asat vṛttāḥ

original: MSS_3674-2 paṅkādudeti kamalaṃ krimayaḥ kamalādapi bhavanti //
analyzed: paṅkāt udeti kamalam krimayaḥ kamalāt api bhavanti

original: MSS_3675-1 asato vā sato vāpi svayaṃ svān varṇayan guṇān /
analyzed: asataḥ vā sataḥ vā api svayam svān varṇayan guṇān

original: MSS_3675-2 hāsyatāṃ yāti śakro'pi kiṃ punaḥ prākṛto janaḥ //
analyzed: hāsyatām yāti śakraḥ upi kim punar prākṛtaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_3676-1 asatkāryarato'dhīra ārambhī viṣayī ca yaḥ /
analyzed: asatkārya rataḥ dhīraḥ ārambhī viṣayī ca yaḥ

original: MSS_3676-2 sa rājaso manuṣyeṣu mṛto janmādhigacchati //
analyzed: sa rājasaḥ manuṣyeṣu mṛtaḥ janma adhigacchati

original: MSS_3677-1 asatpratigrahītā ca narake yātyadhomukhe /
analyzed: asat pratigrahītā ca narake yāti adhomukhe

original: MSS_3677-2 eko miṣṭānnabhug yaḥ sa yāti pūyavahaṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ miṣṭānna bhuj yaḥ sa yāti pūya vaham naraḥ

original: MSS_3678-1 asatpralāpaṃ pāruṣyaṃ paiśunyamanṛtaṃ tathā /
analyzed: asat pralāpam pāruṣyam paiśunyam anṛtam tathā

original: MSS_3678-2 catvāri vācā rājendra na jalpen nānucintayet //
analyzed: catvāri vācā rāja indra na jalpet na anucintayet

original: MSS_3679-1 asatyaḥ sarvaloke'smin satataṃ satkṛtāḥ priyaiḥ /
analyzed: asatyaḥ sarva loke ismin satatam satkṛtāḥ priyaiḥ

original: MSS_3679-2 bhartāraṃ nānumanyaṃte vinipātagataṃ striyaḥ //
analyzed: bhartāram na anumanyaṃte vinipāta gatam striyaḥ

original: MSS_3680-1 asatyatā niṣṭhuratākṛtajñatā bhayaṃ pramādo'lasatā viṣāditā /
analyzed: asatya tā niṣṭhura tā a kṛtajña tā bhayam pramāda ulasa tā viṣādi tā

original: MSS_3680-2 vṛthābhimāno'pi ca dīrghasūtratā tathāṅganākṣādi vināśanaṃ śriyaḥ //
analyzed: vṛthā abhimānaḥ upi ca dīrghasūtra tā tathā aṅganā akṣa ādi vināśanam śriyaḥ

original: MSS_3681-1 asatyamapratyayamūlakāraṇaṃ kuvāsanāsadmasamṛddhivāraṇam /
analyzed: asatyam apratyaya mūla kāraṇam ku vāsanā sadma samṛddhi vāraṇam

original: MSS_3681-2 vipannidānaṃ paravañcanorjitaṃ kṛtāparādhaṃ kṛtibhirvivarjitam //
analyzed: vipad nidānam para vañcana ūrjitam kṛta aparādham kṛtibhiḥ vivarjitam

original: MSS_3682-1 asatyametad viditaṃ samastam akāryakārīti mṛṣā prapañcaḥ /
analyzed: asatyam etat viditam samastam akārya kāri iti mṛṣā prapañcaḥ

original: MSS_3682-2 kucāpalāpakramameva kartum ācchādanaṃ te hṛdayasya śaśvat //
analyzed: kuca apalāpa kramam eva kartum ācchādanam te hṛdayasya śaśvat

original: MSS_3683-1 asatyaśīlā vikṛtā durgrāhyahṛdayāḥ sadā /
analyzed: asatya śīlāḥ vikṛtāḥ durgrāhya hṛdayāḥ sadā

original: MSS_3683-2 yuvatyaḥ pāpasaṃkalpāḥ kṣaṇamātrād virāgiṇaḥ //
analyzed: yuvatyaḥ pāpa saṃkalpāḥ kṣaṇa mātrāt virāgiṇaḥ

original: MSS_3684-1 asatyasaṃdhasya sataś calasyāsthiracetasaḥ /
analyzed: asatya saṃdhasya sataḥ calasya asthira cetasaḥ

original: MSS_3684-2 naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam //
analyzed: na eva devāḥ na pitaraḥ pratīcchanti iti naḥ śrutam

original: MSS_3685-1 asatyasya vaṇigmūlaṃ śākhāstasya varāṅganāḥ /
analyzed: asatyasya vaṇij mūlam śākhāḥ tasya vara aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_3685-2 kāyasthāḥ patrapuṣpāṇi phalāni dyūtakāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: kāyasthāḥ patra puṣpāṇi phalāni dyūta kāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_3686-1 asatyāḥ satyasaṃkāśāḥ satyāścāsatyarūpiṇaḥ /
analyzed: asatyāḥ satya saṃkāśāḥ satyāḥ ca asatya rūpiṇaḥ

original: MSS_3686-2 dṛśyante vividhā bhāvās tasmād yuktaṃ parīkṣaṇam //
analyzed: dṛśyante vividhāḥ bhāvāḥ tasmāt yuktam parīkṣaṇam

original: MSS_3687-1 asatyā ca hatā vāṇī tathā paiśunyavādinī /
analyzed: asatyā ca hatā vāṇī tathā paiśunya vādinī

original: MSS_3687-2 saṃdigdho'pi hato mantro vyagracitto hato japaḥ //
analyzed: saṃdigdhaḥ api hataḥ mantraḥ vyagra cittaḥ hataḥ japaḥ

original: MSS_3688-1 asatyātmaguṇe śastraṃ hastābhyāṃ vinivāryate /
analyzed: asati ātma guṇe śastram hastābhyām vinivāryate

original: MSS_3688-2 eṣāpi na gatiḥ kṣemyā na cānyā vidyate kvacit //
analyzed: eṣā api na gatiḥ kṣemyā na ca anyā vidyate kvacid

original: MSS_3689-1 asatyenaiva jīvanti veśyāḥ satyavivarjitāḥ /
analyzed: asatyena eva jīvanti veśyāḥ satya vivarjitāḥ

original: MSS_3689-2 etāḥ satyena naśyanti madyeneva kulāṅganāḥ //
analyzed: etāḥ satyena naśyanti madyena iva kula aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_3690-1 asatsaṃparkadoṣeṇa adhastād yānti sādhavaḥ /
analyzed: asat saṃparka doṣeṇa adhastāt yānti sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_3690-2 mārgastimiradoṣeṇa samo'pi viṣamāyate //
analyzed: mārgaḥ timira doṣeṇa viṣamāyate

original: MSS_3691-1 asatsaṅgād guṇajño'pi viṣayāsaktamānasaḥ /
analyzed: asat saṅgāt guṇa jñaḥ api viṣaya āsakta mānasaḥ

original: MSS_3691-2 akasmāt pralayaṃ yāti gītarakto yathā mṛgaḥ //
analyzed: akasmāt pralayam yāti gīta raktaḥ yathā mṛgaḥ

original: MSS_3692-1 asadṛśajaneṣu yācñā mahatāṃ nahi lāghavāya suhṛdarthe /
analyzed: a sadṛśa janeṣu yācñā mahatām nahi lāghavāya suhṛd arthe

original: MSS_3692-2 harirapi pāṇḍusutebhyaḥ svayamarthī dhārtarāṣṭreṣu //
analyzed: hariḥ api pāṇḍu sutebhyaḥ svayam arthī dhārtarāṣṭreṣu

original: MSS_3693-1 asaddharmastvayaṃ strīṇām asmākaṃ bhavati prabho /
analyzed: asat dharmaḥ tu ayam strīṇām asmākam bhavati prabho

original: MSS_3693-2 pāpīyaso narān yadvai lajjāṃ tyaktvā bhajāmahe //
analyzed: pāpīyasaḥ narān yat vai lajjām tyaktvā bhajāmahe

original: MSS_3694-1 asadbhiḥ sevito rājā svayaṃ sannapi dūṣyate /
analyzed: asadbhiḥ sevitaḥ rājā svayam san api dūṣyate

original: MSS_3694-2 kiṃ sevyo bhogisaṃvīto gandhavānapi candanaḥ //
analyzed: kim sevyaḥ bhogi saṃvītaḥ gandhavān api candanaḥ

original: MSS_3695-1 asadbhirasatāmeva bhujyante dhanasaṃpadaḥ /
analyzed: asadbhiḥ asatām eva bhujyante dhana saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_3695-2 phalaṃ kimpākavṛkṣasya dhvāṅkṣā bhakṣanti netare //
analyzed: phalam kimpāka vṛkṣasya dhvāṅkṣāḥ bhakṣanti na itare

original: MSS_3696-1 asadvṛtto nāyaṃ na ca sakhi guṇaireṣa rahitaḥ priyo muktāhārastava caraṇamūle nipatitaḥ /
analyzed: asat vṛttaḥ na ayam na ca sakhi guṇaiḥ eṣa rahitaḥ priyaḥ muktā hāraḥ tava caraṇa mūle nipatitaḥ

original: MSS_3696-2 gṛhāṇainaṃ mugdhe vrajatu tava kaṇṭhapraṇayitām upāyo nāstyanyo hṛdayaparitāpopaśamane //
analyzed: gṛhāṇa enam mugdhe vrajatu tava kaṇṭha praṇayi tām upāyaḥ na asti anyaḥ hṛdaya paritāpa upaśamane

original: MSS_3697-1 asanto'bhyarthitāḥ sadbhiḥ kiṃcitkāryaṃ kadācana /
analyzed: asantaḥ abhyarthitāḥ sadbhiḥ kiṃcid kāryam kadācana

original: MSS_3697-2 manyante santamātmānam asantamapi vitaśrum //
analyzed: manyante santam ātmānam asantam api vitaśrum

original: MSS_3698-1 asanto ye nivartante vedebhya iva nāstikāḥ /
analyzed: asantaḥ ye nivartante vedebhyaḥ iva nāstikāḥ

original: MSS_3698-2 narakaṃ bhajamānāste pratipadyanti kilbiṣam //
analyzed: narakam bhajamānāḥ te pratipadyanti kilbiṣam

original: MSS_3699-1 asanthitapadā suvihvalāṅgī madaskhalitaceṣṭitairmanojñā /
analyzed: a santhita padā su vihvala aṅgī mada skhalita ceṣṭitaiḥ manojñā

original: MSS_3699-2 kva yāsyasi varoru suratakāle viṣamā kiṃ vānavāsikā tvam //
analyzed: kva yāsyasi vara ūru surata kāle viṣamā kim vānavāsikā tvam

original: MSS_3700-1 asabhyaḥ piśunaścaiva kṛtaghno dīrghavairiṇaḥ /
analyzed: asabhyaḥ piśunaḥ ca eva kṛtaghnaḥ dīrgha vairiṇaḥ

original: MSS_3700-2 catvāraḥ karmacaṇḍālāḥ jāticaṇḍālapañcamāḥ //
analyzed: catvāraḥ karma caṇḍālāḥ jāti caṇḍāla pañcamāḥ

original: MSS_3701-1 asamagravilokitena kiṃ te dayitaṃ paśya varoru nirviśaṅkam /
analyzed: asamagra vilokitena kim te dayitam paśya vara ūru nirviśaṅkam

original: MSS_3701-2 nahi jātu kuśāgrapītamambhaḥ sucireṇāpi karotyapetatṛṣṇam //
analyzed: nahi jātu kuśa agra pītam ambhaḥ su cireṇa api karoti apeta tṛṣṇam

original: MSS_3702-1 asamañjasamasamañjasa- masañjasametadāpatitam /
analyzed: asamañjasam asamañjasa masañjasam etat āpatitam

original: MSS_3702-2 vallavakumārabuddhyā hari hari harirīkṣataḥ kutukāt //
analyzed: vallava kumāra buddhyā hari hari hariḥ īkṣataḥ kutukāt

original: MSS_3703-1 asamarthaṃ parityajya samarthāḥ paribhuñjate /
analyzed: asamartham parityajya samarthāḥ paribhuñjate

original: MSS_3703-2 nṛpāṇāṃ nāsti dāyādyaṃ vīrabhogyā vasundharā //
analyzed: nṛpāṇām nā asti dāyādyam vīra bhogyā vasundharā

original: MSS_3704-1 asamaye matirunmiṣati dhruvaṃ karagataiva gatā yadiyaṃ kuhūḥ /
analyzed: asamaye matiḥ unmiṣati dhruvam kara gatā eva gatā yat iyam kuhūḥ

original: MSS_3704-2 punarupaiti nirudhya nivāsyate sakhi mukhaṃ na vidhoḥ punarīkṣyate //
analyzed: punar upaiti nirudhya nivāsyate sakhi mukham na vidhoḥ punar īkṣyate

original: MSS_3705-1 asamarthāḥ prakurvanti munayo'pyarthasaṃcayam /
analyzed: asamarthāḥ prakurvanti munayaḥ api artha saṃcayam

original: MSS_3705-2 kiṃ na kurvanti bhūpālā yeṣāṃ kośavaśāḥ prajāḥ //
analyzed: kim na kurvanti bhūpālāḥ yeṣām kośa vaśāḥ prajāḥ

original: MSS_3706-1 asamartho bhavet sādhur nirdhano brahmacāryapi /
analyzed: asamarthaḥ bhavet sādhuḥ nirdhanaḥ brahmacārī api

original: MSS_3706-2 vyādhimān devapūjī ca kurūpā ca pativratā //
analyzed: vyādhimān deva pūjī ca kurūpā ca pativratā

original: MSS_3707-1 asamasamarasampallampaṭānāṃ bhaṭānām avadhiravadhi yuddhe yena hampīravīraḥ /
analyzed: asama samara sampad lampaṭānām bhaṭānām avadhiḥ avadhi yuddhe yena hampīra vīraḥ

original: MSS_3707-2 sa kila sakaladṛptakṣatranakṣatralakṣmī- haraṇakiraṇamālī kasya na syān namasyaḥ //
analyzed: sa kila sakala dṛpta kṣatra nakṣatra lakṣmī haraṇa kiraṇa mālī kasya na syāt namasyaḥ

original: MSS_3708-1 asamasāhasasuvyavasāyinaḥ sakalalokacamatkṛtikāriṇaḥ /
MSS_3708-2 yadi bhavanti na vāñchitasiddhayo hatavidherayaśo na manasvinaḥ //
analyzed: yadi bhavanti na vāñchita siddhayaḥ hata vidheḥ ayaśaḥ na manasvinaḥ

original: MSS_3709-1 asamāne samānatvaṃ bhavitā kalahe mama /
analyzed: asamāne samāna tvam bhavitā kalahe mama

original: MSS_3709-2 iti matvā dhruvaṃ mānī mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyate //
analyzed: iti matvā dhruvam mānī mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyate

original: MSS_3710-1 asamāpitakṛtyasaṃpadāṃ hatavegaṃ vinayena tāvatā /
analyzed: a samāpita kṛtya saṃpadām hata vegam vinayena tāvatā

original: MSS_3710-2 prabhavantyabhimānaśālināṃ madamuttambhayituṃ vibhūtayaḥ //
analyzed: prabhavanti abhimāna śālinām madam uttambhayitum vibhūtayaḥ

original: MSS_3711-1 asamāptajigīṣasya strīcintā kā manasvinaḥ /
analyzed: asamāpta jigīṣasya strī cintā kā manasvinaḥ

original: MSS_3711-2 anākramya jagat kṛtsnaṃ no saṃdhyāṃ bhajate raviḥ //
analyzed: an ākramya jagat kṛtsnam no saṃdhyām bhajate raviḥ

original: MSS_3712-1 asamaiḥ samīyamānaḥ samaiśca parihīyamāṇasatkāraḥ /
analyzed: asamaiḥ samīyamānaḥ samaiḥ ca parihīyamāṇa satkāraḥ

original: MSS_3712-2 adhuri viniyujyamānas tribhirarthapatiṃ tyajati bhṛtyaḥ //
analyzed: adhuri viniyujyamānaḥ tribhiḥ arthapatim tyajati bhṛtyaḥ

original: MSS_3713-1 asamyagupayuktaṃ hi jñānaṃ sukuśalairapi /
analyzed: asamyak upayuktam hi jñānam su kuśalaiḥ api

original: MSS_3713-2 upalabhyāpyaviditaṃ viditaṃ cāpyanuṣṭhitam //
analyzed: upalabhya api aviditam viditam ca api anuṣṭhitam

original: MSS_3714-1 asahāyaḥ pumānekaḥ kāryāntaṃ nādhigacchati /
analyzed: asahāyaḥ pumān ekaḥ kārya antam na adhigacchati

original: MSS_3714-2 tuṣeṇāpi vinirmuktas taṇḍulo na prarohati //
analyzed: tuṣeṇa api vinirmuktaḥ taṇḍulaḥ na prarohati

original: MSS_3715-1 asahāyaḥ samartho'pi tejasvī kiṃ kariṣyati /
analyzed: asahāyaḥ samarthaḥ api tejasvī kim kariṣyati

original: MSS_3715-2 rāmaḥ sugrīvasāhāyyāt laṅkāṃ nirdagdhavān purā //
analyzed: rāmaḥ sugrīva sāhāyyāt laṅkām nirdagdhavān purā

original: MSS_3716-1 asahāyaḥ samartho'pi tejasvyapi karoti kim /
analyzed: asahāyaḥ samarthaḥ upi tejasvī api karoti kim

original: MSS_3716-2 nivāte patito vahniḥ svayamevopaśāmyati //
analyzed: nivāte patitaḥ vahniḥ svayam eva upaśāmyati

original: MSS_3717-1 asahāyaḥ samartho'pi na kāryaṃ kartumarhati /
analyzed: asahāyaḥ samarthaḥ api na kāryam kartum arhati

original: MSS_3717-2 tuṣeṇāpi parityaktā na prarohanti taṇḍulāḥ //
analyzed: tuṣeṇa api parityaktāḥ na prarohanti taṇḍulāḥ

original: MSS_3718-1 asahāyaḥ sahāyārthī māmanudhyātavān dhruvam /
analyzed: asahāyaḥ sahāya arthī mām anudhyātavān dhruvam

original: MSS_3718-2 pīḍyamānaḥ śaraistīkṣṇair droṇadrauṇikṛpādibhiḥ //
analyzed: pīḍyamānaḥ śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ droṇa drauṇi kṛpa ādibhiḥ

original: MSS_3719-1 asahāyasya kāryāṇi siddhiṃ nāyānti kānicit /
analyzed: asahāyasya kāryāṇi siddhim na āyānti kānicid

original: MSS_3719-2 tasmāt samastakāryeṣu sahāyo bhūpatergatiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt samasta kāryeṣu sahāyaḥ bhūpateḥ gatiḥ

original: MSS_3720-1 asahāyo'samartho vā tejasvī kiṃ kariṣyati /
analyzed: asahāya usamarthaḥ vā tejasvī kim kariṣyati

original: MSS_3720-2 atṛṇe patito vahniḥ svayamevopaśāmyate //
analyzed: atṛṇe patitaḥ vahniḥ svayam eva upaśāmyate

original: MSS_3721-1 asahāścaiva vijñeyāḥ prabhāvanto videhajāḥ /
analyzed: asahāḥ ca eva vijñeyāḥ prabhāvantaḥ videha jāḥ

original: MSS_3721-2 aṅgadeśodbhavāstīkṣṇāḥ suhastāḥ sudṛḍhāstathā //
analyzed: aṅga deśa udbhavāḥ tīkṣṇāḥ su hastāḥ su dṛḍhāḥ tathā

original: MSS_3722-1 asahyavātoddhatareṇumaṇḍalā pracaṇḍasūryātapatāpitā mahī /
analyzed: asahya vāta uddhata reṇu maṇḍalā pracaṇḍa sūrya ātapa tāpitā mahī

original: MSS_3722-2 na śakyate draṣṭumapi pravāsibhiḥ priyāviyogānaladagdhamānasaiḥ //
analyzed: na śakyate draṣṭum api pravāsibhiḥ priyā viyoga anala dagdha mānasaiḥ

original: MSS_3723-1 asahyānyapi soḍhāni gaditānyapriyāṇyapi /
analyzed: asahyāni api soḍhāni gaditāni apriyāṇi api

original: MSS_3723-2 sthitaḥ paragṛhadvāri tṛṣṇe nivṛttimāpnuhi //
analyzed: sthitaḥ para gṛha dvāri tṛṣṇe nivṛttim āpnuhi

original: MSS_3724-1 asādhanā vittahīnā buddhimantaḥ suhṛnmatāḥ /
analyzed: asādhanāḥ vitta hīnāḥ buddhimantaḥ suhṛd matāḥ

original: MSS_3724-2 sādhayantyāśu kāryāṇi kākakūrmamṛgākhuvat //
analyzed: sādhayanti āśu kāryāṇi kāka kūrma mṛga ākhu vat

original: MSS_3725-1 asādhuḥ sādhurvā bhavati khalu jātyaiva puruṣo na saṅgād daurjanyaṃ na hi sujanatā kasyacidapi /
analyzed: asādhuḥ sādhuḥ vā bhavati khalu jātyā eva puruṣaḥ na saṅgāt daurjanyam na hi su jana tā kasyacid api

original: MSS_3725-2 prarūḍhe saṃsarge maṇibhujagayorjanmajanite maṇirnāherdoṣān spṛśati na tu sarpo maṇiguṇān //
analyzed: prarūḍhe saṃsarge maṇi bhujagayoḥ janma janite maṇiḥ na aheḥ doṣān spṛśati na tu sarpaḥ maṇi guṇān

original: MSS_3726-1 asādhu parigantavyaṃ na ca sādhu ca saṃvalam /
analyzed: asādhu parigantavyam na ca sādhu ca

original: MSS_3726-2 saṃvalaṃ kuru yatnena maraṇaṃ dhruvaniścayam //
analyzed: saṃvalam kuru yatnena maraṇam dhruva niścayam

original: MSS_3727-1 asādhyaṃ nārabhet prājñaḥ akāryaṃ naiva kārayet /
analyzed: asādhyam na ārabhet prājñaḥ akāryam na eva kārayet

original: MSS_3727-2 anṛtaṃ naiva jalpeta abhakṣyaṃ naiva bhakṣayet //
analyzed: anṛtam na eva jalpeta abhakṣyam na eva bhakṣayet

original: MSS_3728-1 asādhyaṃ śatrumālokya dāyādaṃ tasya bhedayet /
analyzed: asādhyam śatrum ālokya dāyādam tasya bhedayet

original: MSS_3728-2 rājyakāmaṃ samarthaṃ ca yathā rāmo vibhīṣaṇam //
analyzed: rājya kāmam samartham ca yathā rāmaḥ vibhīṣaṇam

original: MSS_3729-1 asādhyaṃ sādhumantrāṇāṃ tīvraṃ vāgviṣamutsṛjat /
analyzed: asādhyam sādhu mantrāṇām tīvram vāc viṣam utsṛjat

original: MSS_3729-2 dvijihvaṃ vadanaṃ dhatte duṣṭo durjanapannagaḥ //
analyzed: dvi jihvam vadanam dhatte duṣṭaḥ durjana pannagaḥ

original: MSS_3730-1 asādhyamanyathā doṣaṃ paricchidya śarīriṇām /
analyzed: asādhyam anyathā doṣam paricchidya śarīriṇām

original: MSS_3730-2 yathā vaidyastathā rājā śastrapāṇirviṣahyati //
analyzed: yathā vaidyaḥ tathā rājā śastra pāṇiḥ viṣahyati

original: MSS_3731-1 asādhyāyāḥ sukhaṃ siddhiḥ siddhāyāścānurañjanam /
analyzed: asādhyāyāḥ sukham siddhiḥ siddhāyāḥ ca anurañjanam

original: MSS_3731-2 raktāyāśca ratiḥ samyak kāmaśāstraprayojanam //
analyzed: raktāyāḥ ca ratiḥ samyak kāmaśāstra prayojanam

original: MSS_3732-1 asāmānyollekhaṃ virasahatahevākinamalaṃ vidhiṃ vande nindāmyuta bata na jāne kimucitam /
analyzed: asāmānya ullekham virasa hata hevākinam alam vidhim vande nindāmi uta bata na jāne kim ucitam

original: MSS_3732-2 anarghaṃ nirmāṇaṃ lalitatanu yasyeha bhavatī na yaḥ kṛtvāpi tvāṃ pariharati sargavyasanitām //
analyzed: anargham nirmāṇam lalita tanu yasya iha bhavatī na yaḥ kṛtvā api tvām pariharati sarga vyasani tām

original: MSS_3733-1 asāraṃ saṃsāraṃ parimuṣitaratnaṃ tribhuvanaṃ nirālokaṃ lokaṃ maraṇaśaraṇaṃ bāndhavajanam /
analyzed: asāram saṃsāram parimuṣita ratnam tribhuvanam nirālokam lokam maraṇa śaraṇam bāndhava janam

original: MSS_3733-2 adarpaṃ kandarpaṃ jananayananirmāṇamaphalaṃ jagajjīrṇāraṇyaṃ kathamasi vidhātuṃ vyavasitaḥ //
analyzed: a darpam kandarpam jana nayana nirmāṇam aphalam jagat jīrṇa araṇyam katham asi vidhātum vyavasitaḥ

original: MSS_3734-1 asāraḥ saṃsāraḥ sarasakadalīsārasadṛśo lasadvidyullekhācakitacapalaṃ jīvitamidam /
analyzed: asāraḥ saṃsāraḥ sarasa kadalī sāra sadṛśaḥ lasat vidyut lekhā cakita capalam jīvitam idam

original: MSS_3734-2 yadetat tāruṇyaṃ nagagatanadīvegasadṛśam aho dhārṣṭyaṃ puṃsāṃ tadapi viṣayān dhāvati manaḥ //
analyzed: yat etat tāruṇyam naga gata nadī vega sadṛśam aho dhārṣṭyam puṃsām tat api viṣayān dhāvati manaḥ

original: MSS_3735-1 asāraḥ sarvataḥ sāro vācā sārasamuccayaḥ /
analyzed: asāraḥ sarvatas sāraḥ vācā sāra samuccayaḥ

original: MSS_3735-2 vācā sā calitā yena sukṛtaṃ tena hāritam //
analyzed: vācā sā calitā yena sukṛtam tena hāritam

original: MSS_3736-1 asārabhūte saṃsāre sāraṃ sāraṅgalocanā /
analyzed: asāra bhūte saṃsāre sāram sāraṅga locanā

original: MSS_3736-2 tadarthaṃ dhanamicchanti tattyāge ca dhanena kim //
analyzed: tad artham dhanam icchanti tad tyāge ca dhanena kim

original: MSS_3737-1 asārabhūte saṃsāre sārabhūtā nitambinī /
analyzed: asāra bhūte saṃsāre sāra bhūtā nitambinī

original: MSS_3737-2 iti saṃcintya vai śaṃbhur ardhāṅge kāminīṃ dadhau //
analyzed: iti saṃcintya vai śaṃbhuḥ ardha aṅge kāminīm

original: MSS_3738-1 asārāḥ santyete virativirasā vātha viṣayā jugupsantāṃ yad vā nanu sakaladoṣāspadamiti /
analyzed: asārāḥ santi ete virati virasāḥ vā atha viṣayāḥ jugupsantām yat vā nanu sakala doṣa āspadam iti

original: MSS_3738-2 tathāpyantastattvapraṇihitadhiyāmapyatibalas tadīyo'nākhyeyaḥ sphurati hṛdaye ko'pi mahimā //
analyzed: tathā api antar tattva praṇihita dhiyām api atibalaḥ tadīyaḥ na ākhyeyaḥ sphurati hṛdaye kaḥ api mahimā

original: MSS_3739-1 asāre khalu saṃsāre sāraṃ śvaśuramandiram /
analyzed: asāre khalu saṃsāre sāram śvaśura mandiram

original: MSS_3739-2 kṣīrābdhau ca hariḥ śete śivaḥ śete himālaye //
analyzed: kṣīrābdhau ca hariḥ śete śivaḥ śete himālaye

original: MSS_3740-1 asāre khalu saṃsāre sāraṃ śvaśuramandiram /
analyzed: asāre khalu saṃsāre sāram śvaśura mandiram

original: MSS_3740-2 haro himālaye śete viṣṇuḥ śete mahodadhau //
analyzed: haraḥ himālaye śete viṣṇuḥ śete mahodadhau

original: MSS_3741-1 asāre khalu saṃsāre sārametaccatuṣṭayam /
analyzed: asāre khalu saṃsāre sāram etat catuṣṭayam

original: MSS_3741-2 kāśyāṃ vāsaḥ satāṃ saṅgo gaṅgāmbhaḥ śaṃbhusevanam //
MSS_3742-1 asāre khalu saṃsāre sukhabhrāntiḥ śarīriṇām /
analyzed: asāre khalu saṃsāre sukha bhrāntiḥ śarīriṇām

original: MSS_3742-2 lālāpānamivāṅguṣṭhe bālānāṃ stanyavibhramaḥ //
analyzed: lālā pānam iva aṅguṣṭhe bālānām stanya vibhramaḥ

original: MSS_3743-1 asāre bata saṃsāre karmatantraḥ śarīriṇām /
analyzed: asāre bata saṃsāre karma tantraḥ śarīriṇām

original: MSS_3743-2 jāyante priyasaṃyogā viyoge hṛdayacchidaḥ //
analyzed: jāyante priya saṃyogāḥ viyoge hṛdaya chidaḥ

original: MSS_3744-1 asāre saṃsāre viṣamaviṣapāke nṛpasukhe kṛtāntenācānte prakṛticapale jīvitabale /
analyzed: asāre saṃsāre viṣama viṣa pāke nṛpa sukhe kṛtāntena ācānte prakṛti capale jīvita bale

original: MSS_3744-2 dhruvāpāye kāye viṣayamṛgatṛṣṇāhatahṛdaḥ kṣaraprāṇaiḥ prāṇānahaha parimuṣṇanti kudhiyaḥ //
analyzed: dhruva apāye kāye viṣaya mṛgatṛṣṇā hata hṛdaḥ kṣara prāṇaiḥ prāṇān ahaha parimuṣṇanti kudhiyaḥ

original: MSS_3745-1 asāre saṃsāre sumatiśaraṇe kāvyakaraṇe yatheṣṭaṃ ceṣṭante kati na kavayaḥ svasvarucayaḥ /
analyzed: asāre saṃsāre sumati śaraṇe kāvya karaṇe yatheṣṭam ceṣṭante kati na kavayaḥ sva sva rucayaḥ

original: MSS_3745-2 paraṃ dugdhasnigdhaṃ madhuraracanaṃ yastu vacanaṃ prasūte brūte vā bhavati viralaḥ ko'pi saralaḥ //
analyzed: param dugdha snigdham madhura racanam yaḥ tu vacanam prasūte brūte vā bhavati viralaḥ kopi saralaḥ

original: MSS_3746-1 asāro nirguṇo vakraś citrarūpatayānvitaḥ /
analyzed: asāraḥ nirguṇaḥ vakraḥ citra rūpa tayā anvitaḥ

original: MSS_3746-2 avāpa na cirād bhraṃśaṃ śakracāpaḥ khalo yathā //
analyzed: avāpa na cirāt bhraṃśam śakra cāpaḥ khalaḥ yathā

original: MSS_3747-1 asāvadhāne pāṇḍityaṃ krayakrītaṃ ca maithunam /
analyzed: asāvadhāne pāṇḍityam kraya krītam ca maithunam

original: MSS_3747-2 bhojanaṃ ca parādhīnaṃ tisraḥ puṃsāṃ viḍambanāḥ //
analyzed: bhojanam ca para adhīnam tisraḥ puṃsām viḍambanāḥ

original: MSS_3748-1 asāvanāsthāparayāvadhīritaḥ saroruhiṇyā śirasā namannapi /
analyzed: asau anāsthā parayā avadhīritaḥ saroruhiṇyā śirasā naman api

original: MSS_3748-2 upaiti śuṣyan kalamaḥ sahāmbhasā manobhuvā tapta ivābhipāṇḍutām //
analyzed: upaiti śuṣyan kalamaḥ saha ambhasā manobhuvā taptaḥ iva abhipāṇḍu tām

original: MSS_3749-1 asāvanupanīto'pi vedānadhijage guroḥ /
analyzed: asau anupanītaḥ api vedān adhijage guroḥ

original: MSS_3749-2 svabhāvaśuddhaḥ sphaṭiko na saṃskāramapekṣate //
analyzed: svabhāva śuddhaḥ sphaṭikaḥ na saṃskāram apekṣate

original: MSS_3750-1 asāvantaścañcadvikacanavalīlābjayugala- stalasphūrjatkamburvilasadalisaṃghāta upari /
analyzed: asau antar cañcat vikaca nava līlā abja yugalaḥ tala sphūrjat kambuḥ vilasat ali saṃghātaḥ upari

original: MSS_3750-2 vinā doṣāsaṅgaṃ satataparipūrṇākhilakalaḥ kutaḥ prāptaścandro vigalitakalaṅkaḥ sumukhi te //
analyzed: vinā doṣa āsaṅgam satata paripūrṇa akhila kalaḥ kutas prāptaḥ candraḥ vigalita kalaṅkaḥ su mukhi te

original: MSS_3751-1 asāvahaṃ lohamayī sa yasyāḥ krūraḥ sakhi prastara eṣa kāntaḥ /
analyzed: asau aham loha mayī sa yasyāḥ krūraḥ sakhi prastaraḥ eṣa kāntaḥ

original: MSS_3751-2 ākarṣakadrāvakacumbakeṣu naiko'pyasau bhrāmaka ityavaihi //
analyzed: ākarṣaka drāvaka cumbakeṣu na ekaḥ upi asau bhrāmakaḥ iti avaihi

original: MSS_3752-1 asāvudayamārūḍhaḥ kāntimān raktamaṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: asau udayam ārūḍhaḥ kāntimān rakta maṇḍalaḥ

original: MSS_3752-2 rājā harati lokasya hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ //
analyzed: rājā harati lokasya hṛdayam mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ

original: MSS_3753-1 asāvudvelalāvaṇyaratnākarasamudbhavaḥ /
MSS_3753-2 jagadvijayamāṅgalyaśaṅkhaḥ kusumadhanvanaḥ //
MSS_3754-1 asāvekadvitriprabhṛtiparipāṭyā prakaṭayan kalāḥ svairaṃ svairaṃ navakamalakandāṅkurarucaḥ /
analyzed: asau eka dvi tri prabhṛti paripāṭyā prakaṭayan kalāḥ svairam svairam nava kamala kanda aṅkura rucaḥ

original: MSS_3754-2 purandhrīṇāṃ preyovirahadahanoddīpitadṛśāṃ kaṭākṣebhyo bibhyannibhṛtamiva candro'bhyudayate //
analyzed: purandhrīṇām preyaḥ viraha dahana uddīpita dṛśām kaṭākṣebhyaḥ bibhyat nibhṛtam iva candraḥ abhyudayate

original: MSS_3755-1 asiḥ śarā varma dhanuśca noccakair vivicya kiṃ prārthitamīśvareṇa te /
analyzed: asiḥ śarāḥ varma dhanuḥ ca na uccakais vivicya kim prārthitam īśvareṇa te

original: MSS_3755-2 athāsti śaktiḥ kṛtameva yācñayā na dūṣitaḥ śaktimatāṃ svayaṃgrahaḥ //
analyzed: athā asti śaktiḥ kṛtam eva yācñayā na dūṣitaḥ śaktimatām svayaṃgrahaḥ

original: MSS_3756-1 asijīvī maṣījīvī devalo grāmayājakaḥ /
analyzed: asi jīvī maṣī jīvī devalaḥ grāmayājakaḥ

original: MSS_3756-2 dhāvakaḥ pācakaścaiva ṣaḍ viprāḥ śūdrajātayaḥ //
analyzed: dhāvakaḥ pācakaḥ ca eva ṣaṭ viprāḥ śūdra jātayaḥ

original: MSS_3757-1 asitakhuracatuṣkaḥ śyāmalagranthipādaḥ sravati karasamīpe mūtradhārāṃ savegām /
analyzed: asita khura catuṣkaḥ śyāmala granthi pādaḥ sravati kara samīpe mūtra dhārām sa vegām

original: MSS_3757-2 daśanacalakhalīnaḥ kukkuṭaskandhabandhaḥ kiṭivarakaṭhinorurdūragaḥ syāt turuṅgaḥ //
analyzed: daśana cala kha līnaḥ kukkuṭa skandha bandhaḥ kiṭi vara kaṭhina ūruḥ dūra gaḥ syāt turuṅgaḥ

original: MSS_3758-1 asitagirisamaṃ syāt kajjalaṃ sindhupātre surataruvaraśākhā lekhanī patramurvī /
analyzed: asita giri samam syāt kajjalam sindhu pātre sura taru vara śākhā lekhanī patram urvī

original: MSS_3758-2 likhati yadi gṛhītvā śāradā sarvakālaṃ tadapi tava guṇānāmīśa pāraṃ na yāti //
analyzed: likhati yadi gṛhītvā śāradā sarvakālam tat api tava guṇānām īśa pāram na yāti

original: MSS_3759-1 asitanayanalakṣmīṃ lakṣayitvotpaleṣu kvaṇitakanakakāñcīṃ mattahaṃsasvaneṣu /
analyzed: asita nayana lakṣmīm lakṣayitvā utpaleṣu kvaṇita kanaka kāñcīm matta haṃsa svaneṣu

original: MSS_3759-2 adhararuciraśobhāṃ bandhujīve priyāṇāṃ pathikajana idānīṃ roditi bhrāntacittaḥ //
analyzed: adhara rucira śobhām bandhujīve priyāṇām pathika janaḥ idānīm roditi bhrānta cittaḥ

original: MSS_3760-1 asitabhujagabhīṣaṇāsipatro ruharuhikāhitacittatūrṇacāraḥ /
MSS_3760-2 pulakitatanurutkapolakāntiḥ pratibhaṭavikramadarśane'yamāsīt //
analyzed: pulakita tanuḥ utkapola kāntiḥ pratibhaṭa vikrama darśanā iyam āsīt

original: MSS_3761-1 asitabhujagaśiśuveṣṭitam abhinavamābhāti ketakīkusumam /
analyzed: asita bhujaga śiśu veṣṭitam abhinavam ābhāti ketakī kusumam

original: MSS_3761-2 āyasavalayālaṃkṛta- viṣāṇamiva dantinaḥ patitam //
analyzed: āyasa valaya alaṃkṛta viṣāṇam iva dantinaḥ patitam

original: MSS_3762-1 asitamekasurāśitamapyamūn na punareṣa vidhurviśadaṃ viṣam /
analyzed: asitam eka surā śitam api amūn na punar eṣa vidhuḥ viśadam viṣam

original: MSS_3762-2 api nipīya surairjanitakṣayaṃ svayamudeti punarnavamārṇavam //
analyzed: api nipīya suraiḥ janita kṣayam svayam udeti punar navam ārṇavam

original: MSS_3763-1 asitavasanasragsaṃvītā ghanāgurusāravan mṛgamadamaṣīsnātā jātāṃ tvameva tamasvinī /
analyzed: asita vasana sraj saṃvītā ghana aguru sāra vat mṛgamada maṣī snātā jātām tvam eva tamasvinī

original: MSS_3763-2 abhisara sukhaṃ dantoddyotaṃ na tanvi vikāsayeḥ śvasitamathavā muñceścañcaddvirephaghanodgamam //
analyzed: abhisara sukham danta uddyotam na tanvi vikāsayeḥ śvasitam athavā muñceḥ cañcat dvirepha ghana udgamam

original: MSS_3764-1 asitātmā susaṃnaddhaḥ samāviṣkṛtacāpalaḥ /
analyzed: asita ātmā su saṃnaddhaḥ samāviṣkṛta cāpalaḥ

original: MSS_3764-2 bhujaṃgakuṭilas tasyā bhrūvikṣepaḥ khalāyate //
analyzed: bhujaṃga kuṭilaḥ tasyāḥ bhrū vikṣepaḥ khalāyate

original: MSS_3765-1 asiddhasādhanaṃ sadbhiḥ śāsanaṃ daṇḍa ucyate /
analyzed: asiddha sādhanam sadbhiḥ śāsanam daṇḍaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_3765-2 taṃ yuktyaiva nayed daṇḍaṃ yuktadaṇḍaḥ praśasyate //
analyzed: tam yuktyā eva nayet daṇḍam yukta daṇḍaḥ praśasyate

original: MSS_3766-1 asidhārāṃ viṣaṃ vahniṃ samatve yaḥ prapaśyati /
analyzed: asi dhārām viṣam vahnim samatve yaḥ prapaśyati

original: MSS_3766-2 mālāsudhātuṣārāṇāṃ sa yogī kathyate budhaiḥ //
analyzed: mālā sudhā tuṣārāṇām sa yogī kathyate budhaiḥ

original: MSS_3767-1 asidhārākramakrītā varamekāpi kākiṇī /
analyzed: asi dhārā krama krītā varam ekā api kākiṇī

original: MSS_3767-2 na parabhrūvinirdiṣṭā sāgarāntāpi medinī //
analyzed: na para bhrū vinirdiṣṭā sāgara antā api medinī

original: MSS_3768-1 asidhārāpathe nātha śatruśoṇitapicchile /
analyzed: asi dhārā pathe nātha śatru śoṇita picchile

original: MSS_3768-2 ājagāma kathaṃ lakṣmīr nirjagāma kathaṃ yaśaḥ //
analyzed: ājagāma katham lakṣmīḥ nirjagāma katham yaśaḥ

original: MSS_3769-1 asidhenuriyaṃ vibhāti te jitasarvakṣitipālamaṇḍalā /
analyzed: asi dhenuḥ iyam vibhāti te jita sarva kṣitipāla maṇḍalā

original: MSS_3769-2 pralaye jagatīmivāśituṃ sphuratī kālakarālajihvakā //
analyzed: pralaye jagatīm iva aśitum sphuratī kāla karāla jihvakā

original: MSS_3770-1 asindūreṇa sīmanto mā bhūnno yoṣitāmiti /
analyzed: a sindūreṇa sīmantaḥ mā bhūt naḥ yoṣitām iti

original: MSS_3770-2 ataḥ pariharantyājāv asiṃ dūreṇa te'rayaḥ //
analyzed: atas pariharanti ājau asim dūreṇa terayaḥ

original: MSS_3771-1 asimātrasahāyasya prabhūtāriparābhave /
analyzed: asi mātra sahāyasya prabhūta ari parābhave

original: MSS_3771-2 anyatucchajanasyeva na smayo'sya mahādhṛteḥ //
analyzed: anya tuccha janasya iva na sma yaḥ usya mahādhṛteḥ

original: MSS_3772-1 asīvyad dehe sve paśupatirumāṅkaṃ samaghano vigupto gopībhirduhitaramayāt sā kamalabhūḥ /
analyzed: asīvyat dehe sve paśupatiḥ umā aṅkam sama ghanaḥ viguptaḥ gopībhiḥ duhitaram ayāt sā kamalabhūḥ

original: MSS_3772-2 yadādeśādetaj jagadapi mṛgīdṛkparavaśaṃ sa vaśyaḥ kasya syādahaha viṣamo manmathabharaḥ //
analyzed: yad ādeśāt etat jagat api mṛgī dṛś paravaśam sa vaśyaḥ kasya syāt ahaha viṣamaḥ manmatha bharaḥ

original: MSS_3773-1 asukhamatha sukhaṃ vā karmaṇāṃ paktivelāsv ahaha niyatamete bhuñjate dehabhājaḥ /
analyzed: asukham atha sukham vā karmaṇām pakti velāsu ahaha niyatam ete bhuñjate dehabhājaḥ

original: MSS_3773-2 tadiha purata eva prāha mauhurtikaścet kathaya phalamamīṣāmantataḥ kiṃ tataḥ syāt //
analyzed: tat iha puratas eva prāha mauhurtikaḥ ced kathaya phalam amīṣām antatas kim tatas syāt

original: MSS_3774-1 asukhaiśca vinālāpo guhyasya kathanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: asukhaiḥ ca vinā ālāpaḥ guhyasya kathanam tathā

original: MSS_3774-2 vipadvimokṣaṇaṃ caiva mitratāyāḥ phalatrayam //
analyzed: vipad vimokṣaṇam ca eva mitra tāyāḥ phala trayam

original: MSS_3775-1 asubhiraśubhaṃ tyaktvā dehaṃ nijaṃ kila yogavid viśati viśadaṃ jñānālokāt parasya kalevaram /
analyzed: asubhiḥ aśubham tyaktvā deham nijam kila yoga vid viśati viśadam jñāna ālokāt parasya kalevaram

original: MSS_3775-2 nayanavivaraiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ sākṣādaho tava naipuṇaṃ viśasi hṛdayaṃ draṣṭuṃ spaṣṭaṃ bahiśca viceṣṭase //
analyzed: nayana vivaraiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ sākṣāt aho tava naipuṇam viśasi hṛdayam draṣṭum spaṣṭam bahis ca viceṣṭase

original: MSS_3776-1 asubhṛtāṃ vadhamācarati kṣamād vadati vākyamasahyamasūnṛtam /
analyzed: asu bhṛtām vadham ācarati kṣamāt vadati vākyam asahyam asūnṛtam

original: MSS_3776-2 parakalatradhanānyapi vāñchati na kurute kimu madyamadākulaḥ //
analyzed: para kalatra dhanāni api vāñchati na kurute kimu madya mada ākulaḥ

original: MSS_3777-1 asuraracitaprayatnād vijñātā diviravañcanā yena /
analyzed: asura racita prayatnāt vijñātā divira vañcanā yena

original: MSS_3777-2 saṃrakṣitā matimatā ratnavatī vasumatī tena //
analyzed: saṃrakṣitā matimatā ratnavatī vasumatī tena

original: MSS_3778-1 asurasamaradakṣairvajrasaṃdhṛṣṭacāpair anupamabalavīryaiḥ svaiḥ kulaistulyavīryaḥ /
analyzed: asura samara dakṣaiḥ vajra saṃdhṛṣṭa cāpaiḥ anupama bala vīryaiḥ svaiḥ kulaiḥ tulya vīryaḥ

original: MSS_3778-2 raghuriva sa narendro yajñaviśrāntakośo bhava jagati guṇānāṃ bhājanaṃ bhrājitānām //
analyzed: raghuḥ iva sa narendraḥ yajña viśrānta kośaḥ bhava jagati guṇānām bhājanam bhrājitānām

original: MSS_3779-1 asurasuranareśāṃ yo na bhogeṣu tṛptaḥ kathamiha manujānāṃ tasya bhogeṣu tṛptiḥ /
analyzed: asura sura nara īśām yaḥ na bhogeṣu tṛptaḥ katham iha manujānām tasya bhogeṣu tṛptiḥ

original: MSS_3779-2 jalanidhijalapāne yo na jāto vitṛṣṇas tṛṇaśikharagatāmbhambhaḥpānataḥ kiṃ sa tṛpyet //
analyzed: jalanidhi jala pāne yaḥ na jātaḥ vitṛṣṇaḥ tṛṇa śikhara gata ambhaḥ pānataḥ kim sa tṛpyet

original: MSS_3780-1 asurahitamapyādityotthaṃ vipattimupāgataṃ ditisutaguruḥ prāṇairyoktuṃ na kiṃ kacavat tamaḥ /
analyzed: asu rahitam api āditya uttham vipattim upāgatam ditisuta guruḥ prāṇaiḥ yoktum na kim kaca vat tamaḥ

original: MSS_3780-2 paṭhati luṭhatīṃ kaṇṭhe vidyāmayaṃ mṛtajīvanīṃ yadi na vahate saṃdhyāmaunavratavyayabhīrutām //
analyzed: paṭhati luṭhatīm kaṇṭhe vidyā mayam mṛta jīvanīm yadi na vahate saṃdhyā mauna vrata vyaya bhīru tām

original: MSS_3781-1 asuro hitamupadiṣṭaḥ prahlādo nāradena garbhasthaḥ /
analyzed: asuraḥ hitam upadiṣṭaḥ prahlādaḥ nāradena garbha sthaḥ

original: MSS_3781-2 tattvaviduṣāṃ varo'bhūd- dhitopadeśaṃ sadā śṛṇuyāt //
analyzed: tattva viduṣām hita upadeśam sadā śṛṇuyāt

original: MSS_3782-1 asulabhā sakalendumukhī ca sā kimapi cedamanaṅgaviceṣṭitam /
analyzed: a sulabhā sakala indu mukhī ca sā kim api ca idam anaṅga viceṣṭitam

original: MSS_3782-2 abhimukhīṣviva vāñchitasiddhiṣu vrajati nirvṛtimekapade manaḥ //
analyzed: abhimukhīṣu iva vāñchita siddhiṣu vrajati nirvṛtim eka pade manaḥ

original: MSS_3783-1 asuhṛtsasuhṛccāpi saśatrur mitravānapi /
analyzed: asuhṛd sa suhṛd ca api sa śatruḥ mitravān api

original: MSS_3783-2 saprajñaḥ prajñayā hīno daivena labhate sukham //
analyzed: sa prajñaḥ prajñayā hīnaḥ daivena labhate sukham

original: MSS_3784-1 asūcibhedyāmāsādya bālāṃ prauḍhābhilāpiṇīm /
analyzed: a sūcibhedyām āsādya bālām prauḍha abhilāpiṇīm

original: MSS_3784-2 hā kaṣṭaṃ muṣito'smīti prabhāte vakti kāmukaḥ //
analyzed: hā kaṣṭam muṣitaḥ asmi iti prabhāte vakti kāmukaḥ

original: MSS_3785-1 asūcīsaṃcāre tamasi nabhasi prauḍhajalada- dhvaniprājñaṃmanye patati pṛṣatānāṃ nicaye /
analyzed: a sūcī saṃcāre tamasi nabhasi prauḍha jalada dhvani prājñaṃmanye patati pṛṣatānām nicaye

original: MSS_3785-2 idaṃ saudāminyāḥ kanakakamanīyaṃ vilasitaṃ mudaṃ ca mlāniṃ ca prathayati pathi svairasudṛśām //
analyzed: idam saudāminyāḥ kanaka kamanīyam vilasitam mudam ca mlānim ca prathayati pathi svaira sudṛśām

original: MSS_3786-1 asūta sadyaḥ kusumānyaśokaḥ skandhāt prabhṛtyeva sapallavāni /
analyzed: asūta sadyas kusumāni aśokaḥ skandhāt prabhṛti eva sa pallavāni

original: MSS_3786-2 pādena nāpaikṣata sundarīṇāṃ saṃparkamāśiñjitanūpureṇa //
analyzed: pādena nā apaikṣata sundarīṇām saṃparkam āśiñjita nūpureṇa

original: MSS_3787-1 asūta sā nāgavadhūpabhogyaṃ mainākamambhonidhibaddhasakhyam /
analyzed: asūta sā nāga vadhū upabhogyam mainākam ambhonidhi baddha sakhyam

original: MSS_3787-2 kruddhe'pi pakṣacchidi vṛtraśatrāv avedanājñaṃ kuliśakṣatānām //
analyzed: kruddhe ipi pakṣacchidi vṛtraśatrau avedan ājñam kuliśa kṣatānām

original: MSS_3788-1 asūyako dandaśūko niṣṭhuro vairakṛnnaraḥ /
analyzed: asūyakaḥ dandaśūkaḥ niṣṭhuraḥ vaira kṛt naraḥ

original: MSS_3788-2 sa kṛcchraṃ mahadāpnoti nacirāt pāpamācaran //
analyzed: sa kṛcchram mahat āpnoti nacirāt pāpam ācaran

original: MSS_3789-1 asūyayā hatenaiva pūrvopāyodyamairapi /
analyzed: asūyayā hatena eva pūrva upāya udyamaiḥ api

original: MSS_3789-2 kart ṇāṃ gṛhyate saṃpat suhṛdbhirmantribhistathā //
analyzed: gṛhyate saṃpad suhṛdbhiḥ mantribhiḥ tathā

original: MSS_3790-1 asūyāviṣṭe manasi yadi saṃpat pravartate /
analyzed: asūyā āviṣṭe manasi yadi saṃpad pravartate

original: MSS_3790-2 tuṣāgniṃ vāyusamyogam iva jānīhi suvrata //
analyzed: tuṣa agnim vāyu samyogam iva jānīhi suvrata

original: MSS_3791-1 asūyaikapadaṃ mṛtyur ativādaḥ śriyo vadhaḥ /
analyzed: asūyā eka padam mṛtyuḥ ativādaḥ śriyaḥ vadhaḥ

original: MSS_3791-2 aśuśrūṣā tvarā ślāghā vidyāyāḥ śatravastrayaḥ //
analyzed: a śuśrūṣā tvarā ślāghā vidyāyāḥ śatravaḥ trayaḥ

original: MSS_3792-1 asekato'tyantaniṣekataśca śākhāviśoṣaṃ phalino nirūpya /
analyzed: a sekatā utyanta niṣekataḥ ca śākhā viśoṣam phalinaḥ nirūpya

original: MSS_3792-2 saptāhamātraṃ śṛtameva sarpir viḍaṅgadugdhāmbu niṣecanīyam //
analyzed: sapta aha mātram śṛtam eva sarpiḥ viḍaṅga dugdha ambu niṣecanīyam

original: MSS_3793-1 asevake cānuraktir dānaṃ sapriyabhāṣaṇam /
analyzed: asevake ca anuraktiḥ dānam sa priya bhāṣaṇam

original: MSS_3793-2 anuraktasya cihnāni doṣe'pi guṇasaṃgrahaḥ //
analyzed: anuraktasya cihnāni doṣe api guṇa saṃgrahaḥ

original: MSS_3794-1 aseviteśvaradvāram adṛṣṭavirahavyatham /
analyzed: asevita īśvara dvāram adṛṣṭa viraha vyatham

original: MSS_3794-2 anuktaklībavacanaṃ dhanyaṃ kasyāpi jīvitam //
analyzed: anukta klība vacanam dhanyam kasya api jīvitam

original: MSS_3795-1 asoḍhā tatkālollasadasahabhāvasya tapasaḥ kathānāṃ viśrambheṣvatha ca rasikaḥ śailaduhituḥ /
analyzed: asoḍhā tad kāla ullasat asahabhāvasya tapasaḥ kathānām viśrambheṣu atha ca rasikaḥ śailaduhituḥ

original: MSS_3795-2 pramodaṃ vo diśyāt kapaṭabaṭuveṣāpanayane tvarāśathilyābhyāṃ yugapadabhiyuktaḥ smaraharaḥ //
analyzed: pramodam vaḥ diśyāt kapaṭa baṭu veṣa apanayane tvarā śathilyābhyām yugapad abhiyuktaḥ smaraharaḥ

original: MSS_3796-1 asau gataḥ saugata eva yasmāt kuryān nirālambanatāṃ mamaiva /
analyzed: asau gataḥ saugataḥ eva yasmāt kuryāt nirālambana tām mama eva

original: MSS_3796-2 sakhi priyaste kṣaṇikaḥ kimanyan nirātmakaḥ śūnyatamaḥ sa vandyaḥ //
analyzed: sakhi priyaḥ te kṣaṇikaḥ kim anyat nirātmakaḥ śūnyatamaḥ sa vandyaḥ

original: MSS_3797-1 asau gireḥ śītalakandarasthaḥ pārāvato manmathacāṭudakṣaḥ /
analyzed: asau gireḥ śītala kandara sthaḥ pārāvataḥ manmatha cāṭu dakṣaḥ

original: MSS_3797-2 dharmālasāṅgīṃ madhurāṇi kūjan saṃvījate pakṣapuṭena kāntām //
analyzed: dharma alasa aṅgīm madhurāṇi kūjan saṃvījate pakṣa puṭena kāntām

original: MSS_3798-1 asaujanyañcetobhavasamucitaṃ bhāvayati tad vṛthā saṃsāre'sminnahaha samayaṃ kiṃ gamayasi /
analyzed: bhāvayati tat vṛthā saṃsāre smin ahaha samayam kim gamayasi

original: MSS_3798-2 cirād bhūyo bhūyaḥ kalayasi sakhedo bhavasukhaṃ tato manye tyāgāt prabhavati parā nirvṛtiriti //
analyzed: cirāt bhūyas bhūyas kalayasi sa khedaḥ bhava sukham tatas manye tyāgāt prabhavati parā nirvṛtiḥ iti

original: MSS_3799-1 asau nāstīvenduḥ kvacidapi raviḥ proṣita iva grahoḍūnāṃ cakraṃ nabhasi likhitaproñchitamiva /
analyzed: asau na asti iva induḥ kvacid api raviḥ proṣitaḥ iva graha uḍūnām cakram nabhasi likhita proñchitam iva

original: MSS_3799-2 aharvā rātrirvā dvayamapi praluptapravicayaṃ ghanairbaddhavyūhaiḥ kimidamatighoraṃ vyavasitam //
analyzed: ahar vā rātriḥ vā dvayam api pralupta pravicayam ghanaiḥ baddha vyūhaiḥ kim idam ati ghoram vyavasitam

original: MSS_3800-1 asau bibhrattāmratviṣamudayaśailasya śirasi skhalan prāleyāṃśuryadi bhavati matto haladharaḥ /
analyzed: asau bibhrat tāmra tviṣam udayaśailasya śirasi skhalan prāleya aṃśuḥ yadi bhavati mattaḥ haladharaḥ

original: MSS_3800-2 tadānīmetat tu pratinavatamāladyutiharaṃ tamo'pi vyālolaṃ vigalati tadīyaṃ nivasanam //
analyzed: tadānīm etat tu pratinava tamāla dyuti haram tamaḥ api vyālolam vigalati tadīyam nivasanam

original: MSS_3801-1 asaubhāgyaṃ dhatte paramasukhabhogāspadamayaṃ vicitraṃ tadgehaṃ bhavati pṛthukārtasvaramayam /
analyzed: asaubhāgyam dhatte parama sukha bhoga āspada mayam vicitram tat geham bhavati pṛthu kārtasvara mayam

original: MSS_3801-2 niviṣṭaḥ palyaṅke kalayati sa kāntārataraṇaṃ prasādaṃ kopaṃ vā janani bhavatī yatra tanute //
analyzed: niviṣṭaḥ palyaṅke kalayati sa kāntāra taraṇam prasādam kopam vā janani bhavatī yatra tanute

original: MSS_3802-1 asau maruccumbitacārukesaraḥ prasannatārādhipamaṇḍalāgraṇīḥ /
analyzed: asau marut cumbita cāru kesaraḥ prasanna tārādhipa maṇḍala agraṇīḥ

original: MSS_3802-2 viyuktarāmāturadṛṣṭivīkṣito vasantakālo hanumānivāgataḥ //
analyzed: viyukta rāma ātura dṛṣṭi vīkṣitaḥ vasanta kālaḥ hanumān iva āgataḥ

original: MSS_3803-1 asau mahākālaniketanasya vasannadūre kila candramauleḥ /
analyzed: asau mahākāla niketanasya vasan adūre kila candramauleḥ

original: MSS_3803-2 tamisrapakṣe'pi saha priyābhir jotsnāvato nirviśati pradoṣān //
analyzed: tamisra pakṣe api saha priyābhiḥ jotsnāvataḥ nirviśati pradoṣān

original: MSS_3804-1 asau mahendradvipadānagandhis trimārgagāvīcivimardaśītaḥ /
analyzed: asau mahā indra dvipa dāna gandhiḥ tri mārga ga avīci vimarda śītaḥ

original: MSS_3804-2 ākāśavāyurdinayauvanotthān ācāmati svedalavān mukhe te //
analyzed: ākāśa vāyuḥ dina yauvana utthān ācāmati sveda lavān mukhe te

original: MSS_3805-1 asau mahendrādrisamānasāraḥ patirmahendrasya mahodadheśca /
analyzed: asau mahendra adri samāna sāraḥ patiḥ mahendrasya mahodadheḥ ca

original: MSS_3805-2 yasya kṣaratsainyagajacchalena yātrāsu yātīva puro mahendraḥ //
analyzed: yasya kṣarat sainya gaja chalena yātrāsu yāti iva puras mahā indraḥ

original: MSS_3806-1 asau rasaucityaguṇojjvalo'pi gumpho na kāvyavyapadeśayogyaḥ /
analyzed: asau rasa aucitya guṇa ujjvalaḥ api gumphaḥ na kāvya vyapadeśa yogyaḥ

original: MSS_3806-2 dhatte khalasyāpi na durviṣahya- dveṣagrahotsāraṇamantratāṃ yaḥ //
analyzed: dhatte khalasya api na durviṣahya dveṣa graha utsāraṇa mantra tām yaḥ

original: MSS_3807-1 asau vidyāśālī śiśurapi vinirgatya bhavanād ihāyātaḥ saṃpratyavikalaśaraccandravadanaḥ /
analyzed: asau vidyā śālī śiśuḥ api vinirgatya bhavanāt iha āyātaḥ saṃprati avikala śarad candra vadanaḥ

original: MSS_3807-2 yadālokasthāne bhavati puramunmādataralaiḥ kaṭākṣairnārīṇāṃ kuvalayitavātāyanamiva //
analyzed: yat āloka sthāne bhavati puram unmāda taralaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ nārīṇām kuvalayita vātāyanam iva

original: MSS_3808-1 asau samarasāhasaṃ vitanute'grimaśreyase mukundamamumātmani sthirayituṃ na kiṃ vāñchati /
analyzed: asau samara sāhasam vitanute agrima śreyase mukundam amum ātmani sthirayitum na kim vāñchati

original: MSS_3808-2 ataḥ parataraṃ kutaḥ prataraṇāya vārāṃnidher nidānamiha saṃsṛteḥ sukhasṛteśca kiṃ kāraṇam //
analyzed: atas parataram kutas prataraṇāya vārāṃnidheḥ nidānam iha saṃsṛteḥ sukha sṛteḥ ca kim kāraṇam

original: MSS_3809-1 asau samālokitakānanāntare vikīrṇavispaṣṭamarīcikesaraḥ /
analyzed: asau samālokita kānana antare vikīrṇa vispaṣṭa marīci kesaraḥ

original: MSS_3809-2 vinirgataḥ siṃha ivodayācalād gṛhītaniṣpandamṛgo niśākaraḥ //
analyzed: vinirgataḥ siṃhaḥ iva udayācalāt gṛhīta niṣpanda mṛgaḥ niśākaraḥ

original: MSS_3810-1 asau hi dattvā timirāvakāśam astaṃ vrajatyunnatakoṭirinduḥ /
analyzed: asau hi dattvā timira avakāśam astam vrajati unnata koṭiḥ induḥ

original: MSS_3810-2 jalāvagāḍhasya vanadvipasya tīkṣṇaṃ viṣāṇāgramivāvaśiṣṭam //
analyzed: jala avagāḍhasya vana dvipasya tīkṣṇam viṣāṇa agram iva avaśiṣṭam

original: MSS_3811-1 asau hi rāmā rativigrahapriyā rahaḥpragalbhā ramaṇaṃ rahogatam /
analyzed: asau hi rāmā rati vigraha priyā rahaḥ pragalbhā ramaṇam rahaḥ gatam

original: MSS_3811-2 ratena śatrau ramayet parena vā no cedudeṣyatyaruṇaḥ puro ripuḥ //
analyzed: ratena śatrau ramayet parena vā no ced udeṣyati aruṇaḥ puras ripuḥ

original: MSS_3812-1 asau hi saṃketasamutsukābhir vilāsinībhirmadanāturābhiḥ /
analyzed: asau hi saṃketa samutsukābhiḥ vilāsinībhiḥ madana āturābhiḥ

original: MSS_3812-2 saroṣadṛṣṭaḥ sphuritādharābhir drutaṃ ravirbhīta ivāstameti //
analyzed: sa roṣa dṛṣṭaḥ sphurita adharābhiḥ drutam raviḥ bhītaḥ iva astam eti

original: MSS_3813-1 astaṃgatabhāraviravi kālavaśāt kālidāsavidhuvidhuram /
MSS_3813-2 nirvāṇabāṇadīpaṃ jagadidamadyoti ratnena //
analyzed: nirvāṇa bāṇa dīpam jagat idam adyoti ratnena

original: MSS_3814-1 astaṃ gatavati savitari pāyasapiṇḍaṃ sudhākaraṃ prācī /
analyzed: astam gatavati savitari pāyasa piṇḍam sudhā karam prācī

original: MSS_3814-2 vyaracayadambarakuśabhuvi carati kalaṅkastadantare kākaḥ //
analyzed: vyaracayat ambara kuśa bhuvi carati kalaṅkaḥ tad antare kākaḥ

original: MSS_3815-1 astaṃ gatavati savitari bhartari madhupaṃ niveśya kośānte /
analyzed: astam gatavati savitari bhartari madhupam niveśya kośa ante

original: MSS_3815-2 kamalinyo'pi ramante kimatra citraṃ mṛgākṣīṇām //
analyzed: kamalinyaḥ api ramante kim atra citram mṛga akṣīṇām

original: MSS_3816-1 astaṃgate divānāthe nalinī madhupacchalāt /
analyzed: astaṃgate divānāthe nalinī madhupa chalāt

original: MSS_3816-2 gilanti svavināśāya guṭikāṃ kālakūṭajām //
analyzed: gilanti sva vināśāya guṭikām kālakūṭa jām

original: MSS_3817-1 astaṃgate nijaripāvapi kumbhayonau saṃkocamāpa jaladhirna tu mādyati sma /
analyzed: nija ripau api kumbhayonau saṃkocam āpa jaladhiḥ na tu mādyati sma

original: MSS_3817-2 gambhīratāguṇacamatkṛtaviṣṭapānāṃ śatrukṣaye'pi mahatāmucitaṃ hyadaḥ syāt //
analyzed: gambhīra tā guṇa camatkṛta viṣṭapānām śatru kṣaye pi mahatām ucitam hi adaḥ syāt

original: MSS_3818-1 astaṃgate bhāsvati nāndhakārān śanaiścaro hanti vidhau budhaśca /
analyzed: bhāsvati na andhakārān śanaiścaraḥ hanti vidhau budhaḥ ca

original: MSS_3818-2 piturguṇairna pratibhāti putro guṇānvito yaḥ sa guṇena bhāti //
analyzed: pituḥ guṇaiḥ na pratibhāti putraḥ guṇa anvitaḥ yaḥ sa guṇena bhāti

original: MSS_3819-1 astaṃgato'yamaravindavanaikabandhur bhāsvānna laṅghayati ko'pi vidhipraṇītam /
analyzed: astaṃga toyam aravinda vana eka bandhuḥ bhāsvān na laṅghayati kaḥ api vidhi praṇītam

original: MSS_3819-2 he cakra dhairyamavalambya vimuñca śokaṃ dhīrāstaranti vipadaṃ na tu dīnacittāḥ //
analyzed: he cakra dhairyam avalambya vimuñca śokam dhīrāḥ taranti vipadam na tu dīna cittāḥ

original: MSS_3820-1 astaṃ bhāsvati lokalocanakalāloke gate bhartari strīlokocitamācaranti sukṛtaṃ vahnau vilīya tviṣaḥ /
analyzed: astam bhāsvati loka locana kalā loke gate bhartari strī loka ucitam ācaranti sukṛtam vahnau vilīya tviṣaḥ

original: MSS_3820-2 apyetāstu cikīrṣayeva tapasāṃ tārākṣamālā diśo manye khañjanakaṇṭhakomalatamaḥkṛṣṇājinaṃ bibhrati //
analyzed: api etāḥ tu cikīrṣayā iva tapasām tārā akṣa mālāḥ diśaḥ manye khañjana kaṇṭha komala tamaḥ kṛṣṇājinam bibhrati

original: MSS_3821-1 astaṃ muktirupaitu yatra na tanūsādhyā harerbhaktayas tannaḥ saṃsṛtiredhatāṃ niravadhiryasyāḥ prasādodayāt /
analyzed: astam muktiḥ upaitu yatra na tanū sādhyāḥ hareḥ bhaktayaḥ tat naḥ saṃsṛtiḥ edhatām niravadhiḥ yasyāḥ prasāda udayāt

original: MSS_3821-2 mūrdhni śrīpuruṣottamapraṇatayaḥ śrīrāmanāmānane hṛddeśe yadunandanasya jaladaśyāmābhirāmākṛtiḥ //
analyzed: mūrdhni śrī puruṣottama praṇatayaḥ śrī rāma nāma ānane hṛd deśe yadunandanasya jalada śyāma abhirāma ākṛtiḥ

original: MSS_3822-1 astaṃ yatāpi kila mastakavartināsāv astācalo'himarucā rucimapyalambhi /
analyzed: astam yatā api kila mastaka vartinā asau astācala hima rucā rucim api alambhi

original: MSS_3822-2 prāyaḥ paropakṛtaye kṛtino'nepekṣya svārthaṃ vipatkavalitā api bhāvayanti //
analyzed: prāyas para upakṛtaye kṛtinaḥ na ipekṣya sva artham vipad kavalitāḥ api bhāvayanti

original: MSS_3823-1 astaṃ yātastimirapaṭalīdattabhaṅgaḥ pataṃgaḥ prāpto naivodayagiriśiromūlameṇāvacūlaḥ /
analyzed: astam yātaḥ timira paṭalī datta bhaṅgaḥ pataṃgaḥ prāptaḥ nā eva udayagiri śiraḥ mūla meṇā avacūlaḥ

original: MSS_3823-2 tatte kālaṃ katipalamayaṃ bhāti khadyotapota dyotaṃ dyotaṃ punarapi punardyotatāṃ ko vilambaḥ //
analyzed: tat te kālam kati pala mayam bhāti khadyota pota dyotam dyotam punar api punar dyotatām kaḥ vilambaḥ

original: MSS_3824-1 astaṃ śaśī yāti śaśāṅkavadane mānaṃ vimuñcādhunā kiṃ mānena mudhā natabhru gaganād bhraśyantyamūstārakāḥ /
analyzed: astam śaśī yāti śaśāṅka vadane mānam vimuñca adhunā kim mānena mudhā nata bhru gaganāt bhraśyanti amūḥ tārakāḥ

original: MSS_3824-2 itthaṃ tvāmanuśikṣayan kṣititalādunnamya pādaṃ śanaiḥ kṣīṇāṃ vīkṣya niśāṃ nisargasubhagaṃ gāyatyasau kukkuṭaḥ //
analyzed: ittham tvām anuśikṣayan kṣiti talāt unnamya pādam śanais kṣīṇām vīkṣya niśām nisarga subhagam gāyati asau kukkuṭaḥ

original: MSS_3825-1 astagrastagabhastimatkaratatinyaṅnītacañcūpuṭī pāṭīrādrimatho himācalamadhaḥ prakṣipya pakṣadvayam /
analyzed: asta grasta gabhastimat kara tati nyak nīta cañcū puṭī pāṭīra adrim atho himācalam adhas prakṣipya pakṣa dvayam

original: MSS_3825-2 paścādunnatapucchapuñjamudayatprācīprakāśacchalād aṇḍaṃ maṇḍalamaindavaṃ janayati vyaktaṃ bakoṭīviyat //
analyzed: paścāt unnata puccha puñjam udayat prācī prakāśa chalāt aṇḍam maṇḍalam aindavam janayati vyaktam bakoṭī viyat

original: MSS_3826-1 astapratyupakāragandhamakṛtasvaprārthanāpekṣama- pyambhobhirbhuvamārdrayanti jaladā jīvantyamī jantavaḥ /
analyzed: asta pratyupakāra gandham akṛta sva prārthanā apekṣam a pi ambhobhiḥ bhuvam ārdrayanti jaladāḥ jīvanti amī jantavaḥ

original: MSS_3826-2 daivajñaḥ punarasti vṛṣṭiriti vāgekā mayokteti yad viśvaṃ krītamivādhigacchati tadevāghūrṇate marmaṇi //
analyzed: daiva jñaḥ punar asti vṛṣṭiḥ iti vāc ekā mayā uktā iti yat viśvam krītam iva adhigacchati tat eva āghūrṇate marmaṇi

original: MSS_3827-1 astabdhaḥ pūjayen mānyān gurūn sevedamāyayā /
analyzed: astabdhaḥ pūjayet mānyān gurūn seva idam māyayā

original: MSS_3827-2 arced devānnadambhena śriyamicchedakutsitām //
analyzed: arcet devān na dambhena śriyam icchet akutsitām

original: MSS_3828-1 astabdhatāmacāpalyaṃ vairāṇāṃ cāpyakartṛtām /
analyzed: astabdha tām acāpalyam vairāṇām ca api akartṛ tām

original: MSS_3828-2 pratyakṣato vijānīyād bhadratāṃ kṣudratāmapi //
analyzed: pratyakṣataḥ vijānīyāt bhadra tām kṣudra tām api

original: MSS_3829-1 astabdhamaklībamadīrghasūtraṃ sānukrośaṃ ślakṣṇamahāryamanyaiḥ /
analyzed: astabdham aklībam adīrghasūtram sa anukrośam ślakṣṇam ahāryam anyaiḥ

original: MSS_3829-2 arogajātīyamudāravākyaṃ dūtaṃ vadantyaṣṭaguṇopapannam //
analyzed: aroga jātīyam udāra vākyam dūtam vadanti aṣṭaguṇa upapannam

original: MSS_3830-1 astamastakaparyastasamastārkāṃśusaṃstarā /
analyzed: asta mastaka paryasta samasta arka aṃśu saṃstarā

original: MSS_3830-2 pīnastanasthitātāmrakamravastreva vāruṇī //
analyzed: pīna stana sthita ātāmra kamra vastrā iva vāruṇī

original: MSS_3831-1 astamitaviṣayasaṅgā mukulitanayanotpalā mṛduśvasitā /
analyzed: astamita viṣaya saṅgā mukulita nayana utpalā mṛdu śvasitā

original: MSS_3831-2 dhyāyati kimapyalakṣyaṃ nityaṃ yogābhiyukteva //
analyzed: dhyāyati kim api alakṣyam nityam yoga abhiyuktā iva

original: MSS_3832-1 astamīyuṣi niśākare satī rāgato'tividhurā kumudvatī /
analyzed: astam īyuṣi niśākare satī rāga tā ūti vidhurā kumudvatī

original: MSS_3832-2 ṣaṭpadaṃ garalamagrahīn mukhe saṃmukhe'pi khagaśabdavāritā //
analyzed: ṣaṭpadam garalam agrahīt mukhe saṃmukhe api khaga śabda vāritā

original: MSS_3833-1 astavyastamitastataḥ pathi patan madyaṃ mahādudvaman hastābhyāṃ mukhamakṣikāḥ pariṇudan gālīrgadan gadgadan /
analyzed: asta vyastam itas tatas pathi patan madyam mahāt udvaman hastābhyām mukha makṣikāḥ pariṇudan gālīḥ gadan gadgadan

original: MSS_3833-2 uttālaiḥ śiśubhirbhṛśaṃ valayito bībhatsamūrtirmahān matto dakṣiṇataḥ kṣaṇaṃ kṣipa dṛśaṃ matto'yamāgacchati //
analyzed: uttālaiḥ śiśubhiḥ bhṛśam valayitaḥ bībhatsa mūrtiḥ mahān mattaḥ dakṣiṇatas kṣaṇam kṣipa dṛśam mat toyam āgacchati

original: MSS_3834-1 astavyastasamīrakampitatayā dṛṣṭestiraskāriṇīṃ hastenālakavallarīmakuṭilāmānīya karṇāntikam /
analyzed: asta vyasta samīra kampita tayā dṛṣṭeḥ tiraskāriṇīm hastena alaka vallarīm akuṭilām ānīya karṇa antikam

original: MSS_3834-2 udvīkṣya priyamārgamadhvagavadhūrastaṃ gate bhāsvati chinnāśā svaniveśameti śanakaiḥ svapnekṣaṇāśaṃsinī //
analyzed: udvīkṣya priya mārgam adhvaga vadhūḥ astam gate bhāsvati chinna āśā sva niveśam eti śanakais svapna īkṣaṇa āśaṃsinī

original: MSS_3835-1 astavyastān kramatatagatīn patrimālātaraṅgān veṇīdaṇḍāniva dhṛtavatī muktasaṃdhyāṅgarāgā /
analyzed: asta vyastān krama tata gatīn patri mālā taraṅgān veṇī daṇḍān iva dhṛtavatī mukta saṃdhyā aṅgarāgā

original: MSS_3835-2 dhvāntamlānāṃśukaparicayacchannalāvaṇyaśocyā dyauḥ pratyagradyumaṇivirahādvāntamakṣṇorna yāti //
analyzed: dhvānta mlāna aṃśuka paricaya channa lāvaṇya śocyā dyauḥ pratyagra dyumaṇi virahāt vāntam akṣṇoḥ na yāti

original: MSS_3836-1 astādripārśvamupajagmuṣi tigmabhāsi jānīta śītakiraṇo'bhyudito na veti /
analyzed: asta adri pārśvam upajagmuṣi tigma bhāsi jānīta śītakiraṇa ubhyuditaḥ na vā iti

original: MSS_3836-2 cārā ivātha rajanītimiraprayuktāś ceruściraṃ caraṇabhūmiṣu cañcarīkāḥ //
analyzed: cārāḥ iva atha rajanī timira prayuktāḥ ceruḥ ciram caraṇa bhūmiṣu cañcarīkāḥ

original: MSS_3837-1 astādriśirovinihita- ravimaṇḍalasarasayāvaghaṭṭāṅkam /
analyzed: asta adri śiraḥ vinihita ravi maṇḍala sarasayā avaghaṭṭa aṅkam

original: MSS_3837-2 nayatīva kālakaulaḥ kvāpi nabhaḥsairibhaṃ siddhyai //
analyzed: nayati iva kāla kaulaḥ kvāpi nabhaḥ sairibham siddhyai

original: MSS_3838-1 astābhimukhe sūrye udite saṃpūrṇamaṇḍale candre /
analyzed: asta abhimukhe sūrye udite saṃpūrṇa maṇḍale candre

original: MSS_3838-2 gamanaṃ budhasya lagne uditāstamite ca ketau //
analyzed: gamanam budhasya lagne udita astamite ca ketau

original: MSS_3839-1 astāvalambiravibimbatayodayādri- cūḍonmiṣatsakalacandratayā ca sāyam /
analyzed: asta avalambi ravi bimba tayā udayādri cūḍā unmiṣat sakala candra tayā ca sāyam

original: MSS_3839-2 saṃdhyāpranṛttaharahastagṛhītakāṃsya- tāladvayeva samalakṣyata nākalakṣmīḥ //
analyzed: saṃdhyā pranṛtta hara hasta gṛhīta kāṃsya tāla dvayā iva samalakṣyata nāka lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_3840-1 astāvilarūkṣākṣyo mūṣakanayanāśca na śubhadā gāvaḥ /
analyzed: asta āvila rūkṣa akṣyaḥ mūṣaka nayanāḥ ca na śubha dāḥ gāvaḥ

original: MSS_3840-2 pracalaccipiṭaviṣāṇā karaṭāḥ kharasadṛśavarṇāśca //
analyzed: pracalat cipiṭa viṣāṇā karaṭāḥ khara sadṛśa varṇāḥ ca

original: MSS_3841-1 asti kāraṇamavyaktaṃ sarvavyāpi parāparam /
analyzed: asti kāraṇam avyaktam sarva vyāpi parāparam

original: MSS_3841-2 sāṃnidhyādapi durgrāhyaṃ viśvamūrtyopalakṣitam //
analyzed: sāṃnidhyāt api durgrāhyam viśvamūrtyā upalakṣitam

original: MSS_3842-1 asti ko'pi timirastanaṃdhayaḥ kiṃcidañcitapadaṃ sa gāyati /
analyzed: asti kaḥ api timira stanaṃdhayaḥ kiṃcid añcita padam sa gāyati

original: MSS_3842-2 yanmanāgapi niśamya kā vadhūr nāvadhūtahṛdayopajāyate //
analyzed: yat manāk api niśamya kā vadhūḥ na avadhūta hṛdayā upajāyate

original: MSS_3843-1 asti grīvā śiro nāsti dvau bhujau karavarjitau /
analyzed: asti grīvā śiraḥ na asti dvau bhujau kara varjitau

original: MSS_3843-2 sītāharaṇasāmarthyo na rāmo na ca rāvaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sītā haraṇa sāmarthyaḥ na rāmaḥ na ca rāvaṇaḥ

original: MSS_3844-1 asti jalaṃ jalarāśau kṣāraṃ tat kiṃ vidhīyate tena /
analyzed: asti jalam jala rāśau kṣāram tat kim vidhīyate tena

original: MSS_3844-2 laghurapi varaṃ sa kūpo yatrākaṇṭhaṃ janaḥ pibati //
analyzed: laghuḥ api varam sa kūpaḥ yatra ākaṇṭham janaḥ pibati

original: MSS_3845-1 asti putro vaśe yasya bhṛtyo bhāryā tathaiva ca /
analyzed: asti putraḥ vaśe yasya bhṛtyaḥ bhāryā tathā eva ca

original: MSS_3845-2 abhāve sati saṃtoṣaḥ svargastho'sau mahītale //
analyzed: abhāve sati saṃtoṣaḥ svarga sthaḥ usau mahī tale

original: MSS_3846-1 asti bhayamasti kautukam asti ca mandākṣamasti cotkaṇṭhā /
analyzed: asti bhayam asti kautukam asti ca mandākṣam asti ca utkaṇṭhā

original: MSS_3846-2 bālānāṃ praṇayijane bhāvaḥ ko'pyeṣa naikarasaḥ //
analyzed: bālānām praṇayi jane bhāvaḥ kaḥ pi eṣa na eka rasaḥ

original: MSS_3847-1 asti yadyapi sarvatra nīraṃ nīrajarājitam /
analyzed: asti yadi api sarvatra nīram nīraja rājitam

original: MSS_3847-2 modate na tu haṃsasya mānasaṃ mānasaṃ vinā //
analyzed: modate na tu haṃsasya mānasam mānasam vinā

original: MSS_3848-1 asti śrīstanapatrabhaṅgamakarīmudrāṅkitoraḥsthalo devaḥ sarvajagatpatirmadhuvadhūvaktrābjacandrodayaḥ /
analyzed: asti śrī stana patra bhaṅga makarī mudrā aṅkita uraḥsthalaḥ devaḥ sarva jagat patiḥ madhu vadhū vaktra abja candra udayaḥ

original: MSS_3848-2 krīḍākroḍatanornavenduviśade daṃṣṭrāṅkure yasya bhūr bhāti sma pralayābdhipalvalatalotkhātaikamustākṛtiḥ //
analyzed: krīḍā kroḍa tanoḥ nava indu viśade daṃṣṭra aṅkure yasya bhūḥ bhāti sma pralaya abdhi palvala tala utkhāta eka mustā ākṛtiḥ

original: MSS_3849-1 asti svarṇamayo'drirasti viṣayaḥ kṣuttṛḍbharāvarjitaḥ santi kṣīraghṛtākarā jaladhayaḥ santi drumāḥ kāmadāḥ /
analyzed: asti svarṇa maya udriḥ asti viṣayaḥ kṣudh tṛṣ bharā varjitaḥ santi kṣīra ghṛta ākarāḥ jaladhayaḥ santi drumāḥ kāma dāḥ

original: MSS_3849-2 kiṃ nastaccaritādbhutaśravaṇataḥ sādhyaṃ kṣudhā tāmyatāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yatsavidhe vidhehi sumate tatraiva sarvaṃ śramam //
analyzed: kim naḥ tad carita adbhuta śravaṇataḥ sādhyam kṣudhā tāmyatām dṛṣṭam yat savidhe vidhehi sumate tatra eva sarvam śramam

original: MSS_3850-1 asti svāduphalaṃ kimasti kimathāghrātuṃ kṣamaḥ korakas tadviśrāmyatu nāma bhoktumucitaṃ patraṃ kimastyantataḥ /
analyzed: asti svādu phalam kim asti kim atha āghrātum kṣamaḥ korakaḥ tat viśrāmyatu nāma bhoktum ucitam patram kim asti antatas

original: MSS_3850-2 sevyo hanta yadīdṛśo'pi manujairvṛkṣādhamaḥ pippalo duḥsvātantryamidaṃ vidheḥ kathaya tat kasyāgrato rudyatām //
analyzed: sevyaḥ hanta yadi īdṛśaḥ api manujaiḥ vṛkṣa adhamaḥ pippalaḥ duḥsvātantryam idam vidheḥ kathaya tat kasya agratas rudyatām

original: MSS_3851-1 astītyeva kṛṣiṃ kuryāt asti nāstīti vāṇijam /
analyzed: asti iti eva kṛṣim kuryāt asti na asti iti vāṇijam

original: MSS_3851-2 nāstītyeva ṛṇaṃ dadyāt nāhamasmīti sāhasam //
analyzed: na asti iti eva ṛṇam dadyāt na aham asmi iti sāhasam

original: MSS_3852-1 astu tāvadagastyena jahnormahimanihnavaḥ /
analyzed: astu tāvat agastyena jahnoḥ mahima nihnavaḥ

original: MSS_3852-2 kā kathā tasya bālasya viśvagrāse'pyatṛpyataḥ //
analyzed: kā kathā tasya bālasya viśva grāsa ipya tṛpyataḥ

original: MSS_3853-1 astu svastyayanāya digdhanapate kailāsaśailāśraya- śrīkaṇṭhābharaṇenduvibhramadivānaktaṃbhramatkaumudī /
analyzed: astu svastyayanāya digdhanapate kailāsa śaila āśraya śrīkaṇṭha ābharaṇa indu vibhrama divā naktaṃbhramat kaumudī

original: MSS_3853-2 yatrālaṃ nalakūbarābhisaraṇārambhāya rambhāsphurat pāṇḍimnaiva tanostanoti virahavyagrāpi veśagraham //
analyzed: yatra alam nalakūbara abhisaraṇa ārambhāya rambhā a sphurat pāṇḍimnā eva tanoḥ tanoti viraha vyagrā api veśa graham

original: MSS_3854-1 aste śivā paścimāyāṃ paracakrabhayāya sā /
analyzed: aste śivā paścimāyām para cakra bhayāya sā

original: MSS_3854-2 śubhā kuberadiśyaste grāmāntaḥ śūnyakāriṇī //
analyzed: śubhā kubera diśyaste grāma antar śūnya kāriṇī

original: MSS_3855-1 astokavismayamapasmṛtapūrvavṛttam udbhūtanūtanabhayajvarajarjaraṃ naḥ /
analyzed: a stoka vismayam apasmṛta pūrva vṛttam udbhūta nūtana bhaya jvara jarjaram naḥ

original: MSS_3855-2 ekakṣaṇatruṭitasaṃghaṭitapramoham ānandaśokaśabalatvamupaiti cetaḥ //
analyzed: eka kṣaṇa truṭita saṃghaṭita pramoham ānanda śoka śabala tvam upaiti cetaḥ

original: MSS_3856-1 astodayācalavilambiravīndubimba- vyājāt kṣaṇaṃ śravaṇayornihitāravindā /
analyzed: asta udaya acala vilambi ravi indu bimba vyājāt kṣaṇam śravaṇayoḥ nihita aravindā

original: MSS_3856-2 tārācchalena kusumāni samutkṣipantī saṃdhyeyamāgatavatī pramadeva kācit //
analyzed: tārā chalena kusumāni samutkṣipantī saṃdhyā iyam āgatavatī pramadā iva kācid

original: MSS_3857-1 astodayādrigatamarkaśaśāṅkabimbam ahno'tivārdhakadaśāmavalambitasya /
analyzed: asta udaya adri gatam arka śaśāṅka bimbam ahnā uti vārddhaka daśām avalambitasya

original: MSS_3857-2 tārākṣarāṇi paṭhituṃ tapanīyaśaila- nāsāvasaktamupanetramivābabhāse //
analyzed: tāra akṣarāṇi paṭhitum tapanīya śaila nāsā avasaktam upa netram iva ābabhāse

original: MSS_3858-1 astopadhānavinihita- ravibimbaśironikuñcitadigaṅgaḥ /
MSS_3858-2 vaste'ndhakārakambalam ambaraśayane dinādhvanyaḥ //
MSS_3859-1 astyatraiva kilārṇave tadamṛtaṃ tatraiva hālāhalaḥ santyasmin malaye paṭīrataravastatraiva vātāśanāḥ /
analyzed: asti atra eva kila arṇave tat amṛtam tatra eva hālāhalaḥ santi asmin malaye paṭīra taravaḥ tatra eva vātāśanāḥ

original: MSS_3859-2 yadyadvastvabhijātamasti savidhe tattad durāpaṃ nṛṇāṃ prāptavyaṃ rasanāñcale karatale bhāle ca vedhā nyadhāt //
analyzed: yat yat vastu abhijātam asti savidhe tat tat durāpam nṛṇām prāptavyam rasana añcale kara tale bhāle ca vedhāḥ nyadhāt

original: MSS_3860-1 astyadyāpi catuḥsamudraparikhāparyantamurvītalaṃ vartante'pi ca tatra tatra rasikā goṣṭhīṣu saktā nṛpāḥ /
analyzed: asti adya api catur samudra parikhā paryantam urvī talam cartante api ca tatra tatra rasikāḥ goṣṭhīṣu saktāḥ nṛpāḥ

original: MSS_3860-2 ekastatra nirādaro bhavati cedanyo bhavet sādaro vāgdevī vadanāmbuje vasati cet ko nāma dīno janaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ tatra nirādaraḥ bhavati ced anyaḥ bhavet sādaraḥ vāgdevī vadana ambuje vasati ced kaḥ nāma dīnaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_3861-1 astyapratisamādheyaṃ stanadvandvasya dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: asti apratisamādheyam stana dvandvasya dūṣaṇam

original: MSS_3861-2 sphuṭatāṃ kañcukānāṃ yan nāyātyāvaraṇīyatām //
analyzed: sphuṭatām kañcukānām yat na āyāti āvaraṇīya tām

original: MSS_3862-1 astyuttarasyāṃ diśi devatātmā himālayo nāma nagādhirājaḥ /
analyzed: asti uttarasyām diśi devatā ātmā himālayaḥ nāma naga adhirājaḥ

original: MSS_3862-2 pūrvāparau toyanidhī vagāhya sthitaḥ pṛthivyā iva mānadaṇḍaḥ //
analyzed: pūrva aparau toyanidhī vagāhya sthitaḥ pṛthivyāḥ iva māna daṇḍaḥ

original: MSS_3863-1 astyekaṃ bhuvanaṃ sūkṣmaṃ kṣamadhve yatra vīkṣitum /
analyzed: asti ekam bhuvanam sūkṣmam kṣamadhve yatra vīkṣitum

original: MSS_3863-2 viṣayāṃścitravidyāyāś citrāṇāṃ calatāṃ tathā //
analyzed: viṣayān citra vidyāyāḥ citrāṇām calatām tathā

original: MSS_3864-1 nāṭakākhyāyikānāṃ ca śakyān sarvavidhānapi /
analyzed: nāṭaka ākhyāyikānām ca śakyān sarvavidhān api

original: MSS_3864-2 sphuraṇā jāyate prāyas tata eva kalākṛtām //
analyzed: sphuraṇā jāyate prāyas tatas eva kalā kṛtām

original: MSS_3865-1 astyeva bhūbhṛtāṃ mūrdhni divi vā dyotate'mbudaḥ /
analyzed: asti eva bhūbhṛtām mūrdhni divi vā dyotatā imbudaḥ

original: MSS_3865-2 marudbhirbhajyamāno'pi sa kimeti rasātalam //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ bhajyamānaḥ api sa kim eti rasātalam

original: MSS_3866-1 astyevoddāmadāvānalavikalataraṃ kānanaṃ yatra tatra prauḍhottāpābhibhūtaṃ jagadapi sakalaṃ nirjalā eva nadyaḥ /
analyzed: asti eva uddāma dāva anala vikalataram kānanam yatra tatra prauḍha uttāpa abhibhūtam jagat api sakalam nirjalāḥ eva nadyaḥ

original: MSS_3866-2 kiṃ re nirlajja garjaṃ kalayasi bahuśastarjayan pānthabālāḥ parjanya tvāmamī kiṃ kvacidapi gaṇayantyambudatvena lokāḥ //
analyzed: kim re nirlajja garjam kalayasi bahuśas tarjayan pāntha bālāḥ parjanya tvām amī kim kvacid api gaṇayanti ambuda tvena lokāḥ

original: MSS_3867-1 astraṃ vimucya sakalaṃ prathamaprayoge bhūyo'pi hantumabalāṃ vihitodyamasya /
analyzed: astram vimucya sakalam prathama prayoge bhūyas api hantum abalām vihita udyamasya

original: MSS_3867-2 puṣpāyudhasya vapureva tadīyamekaṃ lakṣyaṃ ca hanta śaradhiśca tadā babhūva //
analyzed: puṣpāyudhasya vapuḥ eva tadīyam ekam lakṣyam ca hanta śaradhiḥ ca tadā babhūva

original: MSS_3868-1 astraṃ strī vāmano martyaḥ paśurebhyo'thavetaraḥ /
analyzed: astram strī vāmanaḥ martyaḥ paśuḥ ebhyaḥ thavā itaraḥ

original: MSS_3868-2 vidhiyogād bhavet kāmaṃ pauruṣaṃ na parityajet //
analyzed: vidhi yogāt bhavet kāmam pauruṣam na parityajet

original: MSS_3869-1 astrajvālāvalīḍhapratibalajaladherantaraurvāyamāṇe senānāthe sthite'smin mama pitari gurau sarvadhanvīśvarāṇām /
analyzed: astra jvālā avalīḍha pratibala jaladheḥ antar aurvāyamāṇe senānāthe sthite smin mama pitari gurau sarva dhanvi īśvarāṇām

original: MSS_3869-2 karṇālaṃ saṃbhrameṇa vraja kṛpa samaraṃ muñca hārdikyaśaṅkāṃ tāte cāpadvitīye vahati raṇadhuraṃ ko bhayasyāvakāśaḥ //
analyzed: karṇa alam saṃbhrameṇa vraja kṛpa samaram muñca hārdikya śaṅkām tāte cāpa dvitīye vahati raṇa dhuram kaḥ bhayasya avakāśaḥ

original: MSS_3870-1 astraprayogakhuralīkalahe gaṇānāṃ sainyairvṛto'pi jita eva mayā kumāraḥ /
analyzed: astra prayoga khuralī kalahe gaṇānām sainyaiḥ vṛtaḥ api jitaḥ eva mayā kumāraḥ

original: MSS_3870-2 etāvatāpi parirabhya kṛtaprasādaḥ prādādimaṃ priyaguṇo bhagavān gururme //
analyzed: etāvatā api parirabhya kṛta prasādaḥ prādāt imam priya guṇaḥ bhagavān guruḥ me

original: MSS_3871-1 astravyastaśirastraśastrakaṣaṇaiḥ kṛttottamāṅge kṣaṇaṃ vyūḍhāsṛksariti svanatpraharaṇe varmodvamadvāhnini /
analyzed: astra vyasta śirastra śastra kaṣaṇaiḥ kṛtta uttamāṅge kṣaṇam vyūḍha asṛj sariti svanat praharaṇe varma udvamat vāhnini

original: MSS_3871-2 āhūyājimukhe sa kosalapatirbhagne pradhāne bale ekenaiva rumaṇvatā śaraśatairmattadvipastho hataḥ //
analyzed: āhūya āji mukhe sa kosala patiḥ bhagne pradhāne bale ekena eva rumaṇvatā śara śataiḥ matta dvipa sthaḥ hataḥ

original: MSS_3872-1 astrāṇi plavagādhipena vihitāḥ paulastyavakṣaḥsthalī- saṃghaṭṭānaladattadāvavipadaḥ sīdanti bhūmīruhāḥ /
analyzed: astrāṇi plavaga adhipena vihitāḥ paulastya vakṣaḥ sthalī saṃghaṭṭa anala datta dāva vipadaḥ sīdanti bhūmīruhāḥ

original: MSS_3872-2 utpāṭya prahitaśca śailaśikharo laṅkendrahastāvalī- niṣpiṣṭo nijakuñjanirjharajalairjambālapiṇḍāyate //
analyzed: utpāṭya prahitaḥ ca śaila śikharaḥ laṅkā indra hasta āvalī niṣpiṣṭaḥ nija kuñja nirjhara jalaiḥ jambālapiṇḍāyate

original: MSS_3873-1 astrāmāsa tṛṇaṃ priyādruhi tṛṇāmāsa smarārerdhanur dārāmāsa muneḥ śilāpi nṛvarāmāsa svayaṃ pādukā /
analyzed: astrām āsa tṛṇam priyā druhi tṛṇām āsa smarāreḥ dhanuḥ dārām āsa muneḥ śilā api nṛvarām āsa svayam pādukā

original: MSS_3873-2 kulyāmāsa mahārṇavo'pi kapayo yodhāṃbabhūvustadā paulastyo maśakībabhūva bhagavaṃstvaṃ mānuṣāmāsithāḥ //
analyzed: kulyā āsa mahā arṇavaḥ pi kapayaḥ yodhāṃbabhūvuḥ tadā paulastyaḥ maśakībabhūva bhagavan tvam mānuṣām āsithāḥ

original: MSS_3874-1 astraughaprasareṇa rāvaṇirasau yaṃ duryaśobhāginaṃ cakre gautamaśāpayantritabhujasthemānamākhaṇḍalam /
analyzed: astra ogha prasareṇa rāvaṇiḥ asau yam duryaśaḥ bhāginam cakre gautama śāpa yantrita bhuja sthemānam ākhaṇḍalam

original: MSS_3874-2 kacchāvartakulīratāṃ gamayatā vīra tvayā rāvaṇaṃ tatsaṃmṛṣṭamaho viśalyakaraṇī jāgarti satputratā //
analyzed: kaccha āvarta kulīra tām gamayatā vīra tvayā rāvaṇam tad saṃmṛṣṭa maho viśalya karaṇī jāgarti sat putra tā

original: MSS_3875-1 astvakṣaragrahavidhirjanuṣāṃ sahasrair āpātato bhavatu vāpi tato'rthabodhaḥ /
analyzed: astu akṣara graha vidhiḥ januṣām sahasraiḥ āpātataḥ bhavatu vā api

original: MSS_3875-2 durvādikalpitavikalpataraṅgasāndrān duṣpūrvapakṣajaladhīn kathamuttareyuḥ //
analyzed: durvā ādi kalpita vikalpa taraṅga sāndrān duṣpūrva pakṣa jaladhīn katham uttareyuḥ

original: MSS_3876-1 asthānagāmibhiralaṃkaraṇairupetā bhūyaḥ padaskhalananihnutiraprasannā /
analyzed: asthāna gāmibhiḥ alaṃkaraṇaiḥ upetā bhūyas pada skhalana nihnutiḥ aprasannā

original: MSS_3876-2 vāṇīva kāpi kukaverjanahasyamānā drāṅnirgatā nijagṛhād vanitā madāndhā //
analyzed: vāṇī iva kā api ku kaveḥ jana hasyamānā drāk nirgatā nija gṛhāt vanitā mada andhā

original: MSS_3877-1 asthānābhiniveśitā ratipateraucityabhaṅgo rater vaiyarthyaṃ navayauvanasya kimapi premṇaḥ kalaṅkāṅkuraḥ /
analyzed: asthāna abhiniveśi tā ratipateḥ aucitya bhaṅgaḥ rateḥ vaiyarthyam nava yauvanasya kim api premṇaḥ kalaṅka aṅkuraḥ

original: MSS_3877-2 saubhāgyasya vimānanā viguṇatā saundaryasāraśriyaḥ śṛṅgārasya viḍambanā kimaparaṃ veśyāratāḍambaraḥ //
analyzed: saubhāgyasya vimānanā viguṇa tā saundarya sāra śriyaḥ śṛṅgārasya viḍambanā kim aparam veśyā rata āḍambaraḥ

original: MSS_3878-1 asthānābhiniveśī prāyo jaḍa eva bhavati no vidvān /
analyzed: a sthāna abhiniveśī prāyas jaḍaḥ eva bhavati no vidvān

original: MSS_3878-2 bālādanyaḥ ko'mbhasi jighṛkṣatīndoḥ sphuradbimbam //
analyzed: bālāt anyaḥ jighṛkṣati indoḥ sphurat bimbam

original: MSS_3879-1 asthāne gamitā layaṃ hatadhiyāṃ vāgdevatā kalpate dhikkārāya parābhavāya mahate tāpāya pāpāya vā /
analyzed: asthāne gamitā layam hata dhiyām vāgdevatā kalpate dhikkārāya parābhavāya mahate tāpāya pāpāya vā

original: MSS_3879-2 sthāne tu vyayitā satāṃ prabhavati prakhyātaye bhūtaye cetonirvṛtaye paropakṛtaye prānte śivāvāptaye //
analyzed: sthāne tu vyayitā satām prabhavati prakhyātaye bhūtaye cetaḥ nirvṛtaye para upakṛtaye prānte śiva avāptaye

original: MSS_3880-1 asthāne janasaṃkaṭe mayi manāk kāñcīṃ samāskandati vyālole raśanāṃśuke vigalite nīte ca nābheradhaḥ /
analyzed: asthāne jana saṃkaṭe mayi manāk kāñcīm samāskandati vyālole raśanā aṃśuke vigalite nīte ca nābheḥ adhas

original: MSS_3880-2 dhanyo'yaṃ sa karaḥ kuraṅgakadṛśā tasminnavasthāntare kampātaṅkakaraṃbitāṅgalatayā yasyāvakāśaḥ kṛtaḥ //
analyzed: dhanyaḥ yam sa karaḥ kuraṅgaka dṛśā tasmin avasthā antare kampa ātaṅka karaṃbita aṅga latayā yasya avakāśaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: MSS_3881-1 asthāne tāḍito vājī bahūn doṣānavāpnuyāt /
analyzed: asthāne tāḍitaḥ vājī bahūn doṣān avāpnuyāt

original: MSS_3881-2 tāvadbhavanti te doṣā yāvajjīvatyasau hayaḥ //
analyzed: tāvat bhavanti te doṣāḥ yāvat jīvati asau hayaḥ

original: MSS_3882-1 asthāne'bhiniviṣṭān mūrkhānasthāna eva saṃtuṣṭān /
analyzed: asthāna abhiniviṣṭān mūrkhān asthāne eva saṃtuṣṭān

original: MSS_3882-2 anuvartante dhīrāḥ pitara iva krīḍato bālān //
analyzed: anuvartante dhīrāḥ pitaraḥ iva krīḍataḥ bālān

original: MSS_3883-1 asthāne hyapi ca sthāne satataṃ cānugāmini /
analyzed: asthāne hi api ca sthāne satatam ca anugāmini

original: MSS_3883-2 kruddho daṇḍān praṇayati vividhāṃstejasā vṛtaḥ //
analyzed: kruddhaḥ daṇḍān praṇayati vividhān tejasā vṛtaḥ

original: MSS_3884-1 asthikṣodavatīva kundamukulaiḥ phullaiḥ palāśadrumaiḥ sāṅgāraprakareva dhūmakaluṣevotpātibhiḥ ṣaṭpadaiḥ /
analyzed: asthi kṣodavatī iva kunda mukulaiḥ phullaiḥ palāśa drumaiḥ sa aṅgāra prakarā iva dhūma kaluṣā iva utpātibhiḥ ṣaṭpadaiḥ

original: MSS_3884-2 raktākṣadyutibhiḥ saśeṣadahanālāteva puṃskokilair dṛṣṭā prāṇasamāciteva pathikairārād vanāntasthalī //
analyzed: rakta akṣa dyutibhiḥ sa śeṣa dahana alātā iva puṃskokilaiḥ dṛṣṭā prāṇa samācitā iva pathikaiḥ ārāt vanānta sthalī

original: MSS_3885-1 asthi nāsti śiro nāsti bāhurasti niraṅguliḥ /
analyzed: asthi na asti śiraḥ na asti bāhuḥ asti niraṅguliḥ

original: MSS_3885-2 nāsti pādadvayaṃ gāḍham aṅgamāliṅgati svayam //
analyzed: na asti pāda dvayam gāḍham aṅgam āliṅgati svayam

original: MSS_3886-1 asthiraṃ jīvitaṃ loke yauvanaṃ dhanamasthiram /
analyzed: asthiram jīvitam loke yauvanam dhanam asthiram

original: MSS_3886-2 asthiraṃ putradārādi dharmaḥ kīrtirdvayaṃ sthiram //
analyzed: asthiram putra dāra ādi dharmaḥ kīrtiḥ dvayam sthiram

original: MSS_3887-1 asthiraḥ kulasaṃbandhaḥ sadā vidyā vivādinī /
analyzed: asthiraḥ kula saṃbandhaḥ sadā vidyā vivādinī

original: MSS_3887-2 mado mohāya mithyaiva muhūrtanidhanaṃ dhanam //
analyzed: madaḥ mohāya mithyā eva muhūrta nidhanam dhanam

original: MSS_3888-1 asthiramanekarāgaṃ guṇarahitaṃ nityavakraduṣprāpam /
analyzed: asthiram aneka rāgam guṇa rahitam nitya vakra duṣprāpam

original: MSS_3888-2 prāvṛṣi surendracāpaṃ vibhāvyate yuvaticittamiva //
analyzed: prāvṛṣi sura indra cāpam vibhāvyate yuvati cittam iva

original: MSS_3889-1 asthireṇa śarīreṇa sthiraṃ karma samācaret /
analyzed: asthireṇa śarīreṇa sthiram karma samācaret

original: MSS_3889-2 avaśyameva yāsyanti prāṇāḥ prāghūrṇakā iva //
analyzed: avaśyam eva yāsyanti prāṇāḥ prāghūrṇakāḥ iva

original: MSS_3890-1 asthivad dadhivaccaiva śaṅkhavad bakavat tathā /
analyzed: asthi vat dadhi vat ca eva śaṅkha vat baka vat tathā

original: MSS_3890-2 rājaṃstava yaśo bhāti punaḥ saṃnyāsidantavat //
analyzed: rājan tava yaśaḥ bhāti punar saṃnyāsi danta vat

original: MSS_3891-1 asthiṣvarthāḥ sukhaṃ māṃse tvaci bhogāḥ striyo'kṣiṣu /
analyzed: asthiṣu arthāḥ sukham māṃse tvaci bhogāḥ striyā ukṣiṣu

original: MSS_3891-2 gatau yānaṃ svare cājñā sarvaṃ sattve pratiṣṭhitam //
analyzed: gatau yānam svare ca ājñā sarvam sattve pratiṣṭhitam

original: MSS_3892-1 asthisthūṇaṃ snāyuyutaṃ māṃsaśoṇitalepanam /
analyzed: asthi sthūṇam snāyu yutam māṃsa śoṇita lepanam

original: MSS_3892-2 carmāvanaddhaṃ durgandhi pūrṇaṃ mūtrapurīṣayoḥ //
analyzed: carma avanaddham durgandhi pūrṇam mūtra purīṣayoḥ

original: MSS_3893-1 jarāśokasamāviṣṭaṃ rogāyatanamāturam /
analyzed: jarā śoka samāviṣṭam roga āyatanam āturam

original: MSS_3893-2 rajasvalamanityaṃ ca bhūtāvāsamimaṃ tyajet //
analyzed: rajasvalam anityam ca bhūtāvāsam imam tyajet

original: MSS_3894-1 nadīkūlaṃ yathā vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ vā śakuniryathā /
analyzed: nadī kūlam yathā vṛkṣam vṛkṣam vā śakuniḥ yathā

original: MSS_3894-2 tathā tyajannimaṃ dehaṃ kṛcchrād grāhād vimucyate //
analyzed: tathā tyajan imam deham kṛcchrāt grāhāt vimucyate

original: MSS_3895-1 asthīni majjā śuklaṃ ca pituraṃśāstrayo matāḥ /
analyzed: asthīni majjā śuklam ca pituḥ aṃśāḥ trayaḥ matāḥ

original: MSS_3895-2 raktaṃ romāṇi palalam aṃśā māturamī matā //
analyzed: raktam romāṇi palalam aṃśāḥ mātuḥ amī matā

original: MSS_3896-1 asthīnyasthīnyajinamajinaṃ bhasma bhasmendurindur gaṅgā gaṅgoraga uraga ityākulāḥ saṃbhrameṇa /
analyzed: asthīni asthīni ajinam ajinam bhasma bhasma induḥ induḥ gaṅgā gaṅgā uragaḥ uragaḥ iti ākulāḥ saṃbhrameṇa

original: MSS_3896-2 bhūṣāveṣopakaraṇagaṇaprāpaṇavyāpṛtānāṃ nṛttārambhapraṇayini śive pāntu vāco gaṇānām //
analyzed: bhūṣā veṣa upakaraṇa gaṇa prāpaṇa vyāpṛtānām nṛtta ārambha praṇayini śive pāntu vācaḥ gaṇānām

original: MSS_3897-1 asnātāśī malaṃ bhuṅkte ajapī pūyabhakṣaṇam /
analyzed: asnāta āśī malam bhuṅkte ajapī pūya bhakṣaṇam

original: MSS_3897-2 ahutāśī viṣaṃ bhuṅkte adātā viṣamaśnute //
analyzed: a huta āśī viṣam bhuṅkte a dātā viṣam aśnute

original: MSS_3898-1 aspṛśyasaṃgatimiha pravidhāya soḍhā daṇḍāhatīḥ paṭaha bandhamapi prapadya /
analyzed: aspṛśya saṃgatim iha pravidhāya soḍhāḥ daṇḍa āhatīḥ paṭaha bandham api prapadya

original: MSS_3898-2 doṣaṃ prakāśayasi yatpratirathyameva lokasya tadvimukhatāṃ prakaṭīkaroṣi //
analyzed: doṣam prakāśayasi yat pratirathyam eva lokasya tad vimukha tām prakaṭīkaroṣi

original: MSS_3899-1 aspṛśyo'stu malīmaso'stvaniyatāhāro'stvato'pyudbhaṭair doṣairastu paraḥśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ kākastataḥ kā kṣatiḥ /
analyzed: aspṛśyoḥ tu malīmasoḥ tu aniyata āhāroḥ tu atas upi udbhaṭaiḥ doṣaiḥ astu paraḥśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ kākaḥ tatas kā kṣatiḥ

original: MSS_3899-2 bhuṅkte bhojyamupasthitaṃ samupahūyaiva svayaṃ bāndhavān yaḥ sīdan kṣudhayā vicintaya tato dhanyaśca puṇyaśca kaḥ //
analyzed: bhuṅkte bhojyam upasthitam samupahūya eva svayam bāndhavān yaḥ sīdan kṣudhayā vicintaya tatas dhanyaḥ ca puṇyaḥ ca kaḥ

original: MSS_3900-1 aspṛṣṭe rāhubhītyāhani niśi ca same kalmaṣacchāyayone hāsatrāsād vidūre samupacitavibhāvaibhave hṛdyagandhe /
analyzed: a spṛṣṭe rāhu bhītyā ahani niśi ca same kalmaṣa chāya yone hāsa trāsāt vidūre samupacita vibhā vaibhave hṛdya gandhe

original: MSS_3900-2 pāthodācchādahīne dharaṇitalagatādurlabhe sarvalokā- hlādaṃ cāpyādadhāne sumukhi tava mukhaupamyaleśaḥ sudhāṃśau //
analyzed: pāthoda ācchāda hīne dharaṇi tala gata a durlabhe sarva lokāḥ hlādam ca api ādadhāne su mukhi tava mukha aupamya leśaḥ sudhāṃśau

original: MSS_3901-1 asmatpūrvaiḥ surapatihṛtaṃ draṣṭukāmaisturaṅgaṃ bhittvā kṣoṇīmagaṇitabalaiḥ sāgaro vardhitātmā /
analyzed: asmad pūrvaiḥ surapati hṛtam draṣṭu kāmaiḥ turaṅgam bhittvā kṣoṇīm agaṇita balaiḥ sāgaraḥ vardhita ātmā

original: MSS_3901-2 satkārārthaṃ tava yadi girīnādiśed guptapakṣā na śrānto'pi praṇayamucitaṃ naiva bandhorvihanyāḥ //
analyzed: satkāra artham tava yadi girīn ādiśet gupta pakṣā na śrāntaḥ api praṇayam ucitam nā eva bandhoḥ vihanyāḥ

original: MSS_3902-1 asmatprayāṇasamaye kuru maṅgalāni kiṃ rodiṣi priyatame vada kāraṇaṃ me /
analyzed: asmad prayāṇa samaye kuru maṅgalāni kim rodiṣi priyatame vada kāraṇam me

original: MSS_3902-2 bhoḥ prāṇanātha virahānalatīvratāpa- dhūmena vāri galitaṃ mama locanānām //
analyzed: bhoḥ prāṇanātha viraha anala tīvra tāpa dhūmena vāri galitam mama locanānām

original: MSS_3903-1 asmadīśvaraviśvāsapramāṇena prabhoḥ kṛpā /
analyzed: asmad īśvara viśvāsa pramāṇena prabhoḥ kṛpā

original: MSS_3903-2 vidhātuṃ prabhavet kāryaṃ sāhāyyaṃ ca tathaiva naḥ //
analyzed: vidhātum prabhavet kāryam sāhāyyam ca tathā eva naḥ

original: MSS_3904-1 asmadripūṇāmanilāśanānāṃ datto nivāsaḥ khalu candanena /
analyzed: asmad ripūṇām anilāśanānām dattaḥ nivāsaḥ khalu candanena

original: MSS_3904-2 itīva roṣād vyajanasya vāyur vyaśoṣayaccandanamaṅgasaṃstham //
analyzed: iti iva roṣāt vyajanasya vāyuḥ vyaśoṣayat candanam aṅga saṃstham

original: MSS_3905-1 asmadvairī śaśabhṛdamunā jīyate hyandhakāraḥ sāraṅgākṣyā mukhamanugataḥ keśapāśacchalena /
analyzed: asmad vairī śaśabhṛt amunā jīyate hi andhakāraḥ sāraṅga akṣyāḥ mukham anugataḥ keśa pāśa chalena

original: MSS_3905-2 taṃ saṃśrutya pragalitamahāḥ śītaraśmistadaiva prāptaḥ sevāghaṭanavidhaye mālatīdāmabhaṅgyā //
analyzed: tam saṃśrutya pragalita mahāḥ śītaraśmiḥ tadā eva prāptaḥ sevā ghaṭana vidhaye mālatī dāma bhaṅgyā

original: MSS_3906-1 asmākaṃ jalajīvināṃ jalamidaṃ sadvājirājivrajaiḥ pātavyaṃ pararaktaraktamanasāṃ tṛptiḥ patīnāṃ kṣayaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam jala jīvinām jalam idam sat vāji rāji vrajaiḥ pātavyam para rakta rakta manasām tṛptiḥ patīnām kṣayaḥ

original: MSS_3906-2 matvaivaṃ kila rājarāja nṛpate tvajjaitrayātrotsave matsī roditi makṣikā ca hasati dhyāyanti vairistriyaḥ //
analyzed: matvā evam kila rāja rāja nṛpate tvad jaitra yātrā utsave matsī roditi makṣikā ca hasati dhyāyanti vairi striyaḥ

original: MSS_3907-1 asmākaṃ paramandirasya caritaṃ yadyapyavācyaṃ bhavet svāmī tvaṃ kathayāmi tena bhavataḥ kiṃcit priyādūṣaṇam /
analyzed: asmākam para mandirasya caritam yadi api avācyam bhavet svāmī tvam kathayāmi tena bhavataḥ kiṃcid priyā dūṣaṇam

original: MSS_3907-2 śrīmad rāma nṛpa tvayā raṇamukhe pāṇigrahaḥ sādaraṃ yasyāḥ sāsilatā parasya hṛdaye dṛṣṭā luṭhantī mayā //
analyzed: śrīmat rāma nṛpa tvayā raṇa mukhe pāṇigrahaḥ sa ādaram yasyāḥ sā asi latā parasya hṛdaye dṛṣṭā luṭhantī mayā

original: MSS_3908-1 asmākaṃ bata maṇḍale prathamataḥ patyā karaḥ pātyate kāñcīkuntalamadhyadeśaviṣayān saṃtyajya bhūriśriyaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam bata maṇḍale prathamatas patyā karaḥ pātyate kāñcī kuntala madhyadeśa viṣayān saṃtyajya bhūri śriyaḥ

original: MSS_3908-2 ityālokya kucau payoruhadṛśāṃ jātau sunīlānanau no nīco'pi parābhavaṃ viṣahate kiṃ tādṛśāvunnatau //
analyzed: iti ālokya kucau payoruha dṛśām jātau su nīla ānanau no nīcaḥ api parābhavam viṣahate kim tādṛśau unnatau

original: MSS_3909-1 asmākaṃ vadarīcakraṃ badarī ca tavāṅgaṇe /
analyzed: asmākam vadarī cakram badarī ca tava aṅgaṇe

original: MSS_3909-2 vādarāyaṇasambandhād yūyaṃ yūyaṃ vayaṃ vayam //
analyzed: vādarāyaṇa sambandhāt yūyam yūyam vayam vayam

original: MSS_3910-1 asmākaṃ vratametadeva yadayaṃ kuñjodare jāgaraḥ śuśrūṣā madanasya vaktramadhubhiḥ saṃtarpaṇīyo'tithiḥ /
analyzed: asmākam vratam etat eva yat ayam kuñja udare jāgaraḥ śuśrūṣā madanasya vaktra madhubhiḥ saṃtarpaṇīyā utithiḥ

original: MSS_3910-2 nistriṃśāḥ śataśaḥ patantu śirasaśchedo'thavā jāyatām ātmīyaṃ kulavartma putri na manāgullaṅghanīyaṃ tvayā //
analyzed: nistriṃśāḥ śataśas patantu jāyatām ātmīyam kula vartma putri na manāk ullaṅghanīyam tvayā

original: MSS_3911-1 asmākaṃ sakhi vāsasī na rucire graiveyakaṃ nojjvalaṃ no vakrā gatiruddhataṃ na hasitaṃ naivāsti kaścinmadaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam sakhi vāsasī na rucire graiveyakam nā ujjvalam no vakrā gatiḥ uddhatam na hasitam nā eva asti kaścid madaḥ

original: MSS_3911-2 kintvanye'pi janā vadanti subhago'pyasyāḥ priyo nānyato dṛṣṭiṃ nikṣipatīti viśvamiyatā manyāmahe duḥsthitam //
analyzed: kintu anye api janāḥ vadanti subhagā upi asyāḥ priyaḥ na anyatas dṛṣṭim nikṣipati iti viśvam iyatā manyāmahe duḥsthitam

original: MSS_3912-1 asmākamaṅgamaṅgaṃ paṇyopanataṃ mahādhananidhānam /
analyzed: asmākam aṅgam aṅgam paṇya upanatam mahādhana nidhānam

original: MSS_3912-2 dāsīsutāḥ kimete svādanti viṭāḥ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: dāsī sutāḥ kim ete svādanti viṭāḥ prasaṅgena

original: MSS_3913-1 asmākamadhyāsitametadantas tāvadbhavatyā hṛdayaṃ cirāya /
analyzed: asmākam adhyāsitam etat antar tāvat bhavatyā hṛdayam cirāya

original: MSS_3913-2 bahistvayālaṃkriyātamidānī- muro muraṃ vidviṣataḥ śriyeva //
analyzed: bahis tvayā alaṃkriyātam idānī muraḥ muram vidviṣataḥ śriyā iva

original: MSS_3914-1 asmākamātmabhūrbhūtvā hantāsmāneva haṃsi yat /
