analyzed: asmākam ātmabhūḥ bhūtvā hantā asmān eva haṃsi yat

original: MSS_3914-2 re re kandarpa tannityam anaṅgatvaṃ sadāstu te //
analyzed: re re kandarpa tat nityam anaṅga tvam sadā astu te

original: MSS_3915-1 asmākamekapada eva marudvikīrṇa- jīmūtajālarasitānukṛtirninādaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam eka pade eva marut vikīrṇa jīmūta jāla rasita anukṛtiḥ ninādaḥ

original: MSS_3915-2 gambhīramaṅgalamṛdaṅgasahasrajanmā śabdāntaragrahaṇaśaktimapākaroti //
analyzed: gambhīra maṅgala mṛdaṅga sahasra janmā śabda antara grahaṇa śaktim apākaroti

original: MSS_3916-1 asmāt paraṃ bata yathāśruti saṃbhṛtāni ko naḥ kule nivapanāni niyacchatīti /
analyzed: asmāt param bata yathāśruti saṃbhṛtāni kaḥ naḥ kule nivapanāni niyacchati iti

original: MSS_3916-2 nūnaṃ prasūtivikalena mayā prasiktaṃ dhautāśruśeṣamudakaṃ pitaraḥ pibanti //
analyzed: nūnam prasūti vikalena mayā prasiktam dhauta aśru śeṣam udakam pitaraḥ pibanti

original: MSS_3917-1 asmādṛśāṃ nūnamapuṇyabhājāṃ na svopayogī na paropayogī /
analyzed: asmādṛśām nūnam apuṇya bhājām na sva upayogī na para upayogī

original: MSS_3917-2 sannapyasadrūpatayaiva vedyo dāridryamudro guṇaratnakoṣaḥ //
analyzed: san api asat rūpa tayā eva vedyaḥ dāridrya mudraḥ guṇa ratna koṣaḥ

original: MSS_3918-1 asmānavehi kalamānalamāhatānāṃ yeṣāṃ pracaṇḍamusalairavadātataiva /
analyzed: asmān avehi kalama analam āhatānām yeṣām pracaṇḍa musalaiḥ avadāta tā eva

original: MSS_3918-2 snehaṃ vimucya sahasā khalatāṃ prayānti ye svalpapīḍanavaśānna vayaṃ tilāste //
analyzed: sneham vimucya sahasā khala tām prayānti ye su alpa pīḍana vaśāt na vayam tilāḥ te

original: MSS_3919-1 asmān mā bhaja kālakūṭabhagini svapne'pi padmālaye vyādhībhūya kadarthayanti bahuśo mātarvikārā ime /
analyzed: asmān mā bhaja kālakūṭa bhagini svapne pi padmālaye vyādhībhūya kadarthayanti bahuśas mātar vikārāḥ ime

original: MSS_3919-2 yaccakṣurna nirīkṣatecchaviṣayaṃ naivaṃ śṛṇoti śrutiḥ prāṇā eva varaṃ prayānti na punarniryānti vāco bahiḥ //
analyzed: yat cakṣuḥ na nirīkṣata icchā viṣayam na evam śṛṇoti śrutiḥ prāṇāḥ eva varam prayānti na punar niryānti vācaḥ bahis

original: MSS_3920-1 asmān vicitravapuṣaścirapṛṣṭhalagnān ko vā vimuñcati sakhe yadi vā vimuñca /
analyzed: asmān vicitra vapuṣaḥ cira pṛṣṭha lagnān kaḥ vā vimuñcati sakhe yadi vā vimuñca

original: MSS_3920-2 hā hanta kekivara hāniriyaṃ tavaiva bhūpālamūrdhani punarbhavitā sthitirnaḥ //
analyzed: hā hanta keki vara hāniḥ iyam tava eva bhūpāla mūrdhani punar bhavitā sthitiḥ naḥ

original: MSS_3921-1 asmān sādhu vicintya saṃyamadhanānuccaiḥ kulaṃ cātmanas tvayyasyāḥ kathamapyabāndhavakṛtāṃ snehapravṛttiṃ ca tām /
analyzed: asmān sādhu vicintya saṃyama dhanān uccais kulam ca ātmanaḥ tvayi asyāḥ katham api abāndhava kṛtām sneha pravṛttim ca tām

original: MSS_3921-2 sāmānyapratipattipūrvakamiyaṃ dāreṣu dṛśyā tvayā bhāgyāyattamataḥparaṃ na khalu tadvācyaṃ vadhūbandhubhiḥ //
analyzed: sāmānya pratipatti pūrvakam iyam dāreṣu dṛśyā tvayā bhāgya āyattam atas param na khalu tat vācyam vadhū bandhubhiḥ

original: MSS_3922-1 asmābhiḥ kalitaṃ purā na bhavatī bhuktā nṛbhiḥ kairapi prauḍhā mānavaśālinīti calitaṃ cetaḥ sakāmaṃ tvayi /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ kalitam purā na bhavatī bhuktā nṛbhiḥ kaiḥ api prauḍhā mānava śālinī iti calitam cetaḥ sa kāmam tvayi

original: MSS_3922-2 dhik tvāṃ saṃprati sadbhujaṅgajanatāsaṃśleṣamātanvatī gamyā sarvajanasya vāravanitevotkṣepaṇīyāsi naḥ //
analyzed: dhik tvām saṃprati sat bhujaṅga jana tā saṃśleṣam ātanvatī gamyā sarva janasya vāravanitā iva utkṣepaṇīyā asi naḥ

original: MSS_3923-1 asmābhiḥ smayalolamauliphalakairmuktāvisārādhipaṃ vedoddhāraparaḥ karastava paraṃ dānāmbupūtaḥ stutaḥ /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ smaya lola mauli phalakaiḥ muktā visāra adhipam veda uddhāra paraḥ karaḥ tava param dāna ambu pūtaḥ stutaḥ

original: MSS_3923-2 kintu kṣmātilaka kṣamasva kavibhiḥ kiṃ nāma nālokyate dṛṣṭaḥ spaṣṭataraṃ tavāpi nibhṛtaḥ pāṇau sa vaisāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: kintu kṣmātilaka kṣamasva kavibhiḥ kim nāma nā ālokyate dṛṣṭaḥ spaṣṭataram tava api nibhṛtaḥ pāṇau sa vaisāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_3924-1 asmābhiścaturamburāśiraśanāvacchedinīṃ medinīṃ bhrāmyadbhirna sa ko'pi nistuṣaguṇo dṛṣṭo viśiṣṭo janaḥ /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ catur amburāśi raśanā avacchedinīm medinīm bhrāmyadbhiḥ na sa kaḥ api nistuṣa guṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_3924-2 yasyāgre cirasaṃcitāni hṛdaye duḥkhāni saukhyāni vā saṃjalpya kṣaṇamekamardhamathavā niḥśvasya viśrāmyate //
analyzed: yasya agre cira saṃcitāni hṛdaye duḥkhāni saukhyāni vā saṃjalpya kṣaṇam ekam ardham athavā niḥśvasya viśrāmyate

original: MSS_3925-1 asmāllokādūrdhvamamuṣya cādho mahattamastiṣṭhati hyandhakāram /
analyzed: asmāt lokāt ūrdhvam amuṣya ca adhas mahattamaḥ tiṣṭhati hi andhakāram

original: MSS_3925-2 tadvai mahāmohanamindriyāṇāṃ budhyasva mā tvāṃ pralabheta rājan //
analyzed: tat vai mahā mohanam indriyāṇām budhyasva mā tvām pralabheta rājan

original: MSS_3926-1 asmiṃścandramasi prasannamahasi vyākoṣakundatviṣi prācīnaṃ khamupeyuṣi tvayi manāgdūraṃ gate preyasi /
analyzed: asmin candramasi prasanna mahasi vyākoṣa kunda tviṣi prācīnam kham upeyuṣi tvayi manāk dūram gate preyasi

original: MSS_3926-2 śvāsaḥ kairavakorakīyati mukhaṃ tasyāḥ sarojīyati kṣīrodīyati manmatho dṛgapi ca drāk candrakāntīyati //
analyzed: śvāsaḥ kairavakorakīyati mukham tasyāḥ sarojīyati kṣīrodīyati manmathaḥ   api ca drāk candrakāntīyati

original: MSS_3927-1 asmiṃste śirasi tadā kānte vaidūryasphaṭikasuvarṇāḍhye /
analyzed: asmin te śirasi tadā kānte vaidūrya sphaṭika suvarṇa āḍhye

original: MSS_3927-2 śobhāṃ svāṃ na vahati tāṃ baddhā suśliṣṭā kuvalayamāleyam //
analyzed: śobhām svām na vahati tām baddhā su śliṣṭā kuvalaya mālā iyam

original: MSS_3928-1 asmiñ jagati mahatyapi kimapi na tadvastu vedhasā vihitam /
analyzed: asmin jagati mahati api kim api na tat vastu vedhasā vihitam

original: MSS_3928-2 animittavatsalāyā bhavati yato māturupakāraḥ //
analyzed: animitta vatsalāyāḥ bhavati yatas mātuḥ upakāraḥ

original: MSS_3929-1 asmiñ jaḍe jagati ko nu bṛhatpramāṇa- karṇaḥ karī nanu bhaved duritasya pātram /
analyzed: asmin jaḍe jagati kaḥ nu bṛhat pramāṇa karṇaḥ karī nanu bhavet duritasya pātram

original: MSS_3929-2 ityāgataṃ tamapi yo'linamunmamātha mātaṅga eva kimataḥparamucyate'sau //
analyzed: iti āgatam tam api yolinam unmamātha mātaṅgaḥ eva kim atas param ucyate asau

original: MSS_3930-1 asmiñ jarāmaraṇamṛtyumahātaraṅga- miśrodadhau mahati saṃparivartamānaḥ /
analyzed: asmin jarā maraṇa mṛtyu mahā taraṅga miśra udadhau mahati saṃparivartamānaḥ

original: MSS_3930-2 puṇyaplavena sukṛtena narāstarantaḥ saṃprāpya tīramabhayaṃ sukhamāpnuvanti //
analyzed: puṇya plavena sukṛtena narāḥ tarantaḥ saṃprāpya tīram abhayam sukham āpnuvanti

original: MSS_3931-1 asmin kaḥ prabhavedyogo hyasaṃdhārye'mitātmani /
analyzed: asmin kaḥ prabhavet yogaḥ hi a saṃdhārya īmita ātmani

original: MSS_3931-2 laṅghane kaḥ samarthaḥ syād ṛte devaṃ maheśvaram //
analyzed: laṅghane kaḥ samarthaḥ syāt ṛte devam maheśvaram

original: MSS_3932-1 asmin karīndrakaranirgalitāravinda- kandānukāriṇi ciraṃ rucicakravāle /
analyzed: asmin karīndra kara nirgalita aravinda kanda anukāriṇi ciram ruci cakravāle

original: MSS_3932-2 kasmai phalāya kulaṭākulakoṭihomaṃ haṃho mṛgāṅka kuruṣe karuṇāmapāsya //
analyzed: kasmai phalāya kulaṭā kula koṭi homam haṃho mṛgāṅka kuruṣe karuṇām apāsya

original: MSS_3933-1 asmin kāle tu yadyuktaṃ tadidānīṃ vidhīyatām /
analyzed: asmin kāle tu yat yuktam tat idānīm vidhīyatām

original: MSS_3933-2 gataṃ tu nānuśocanti gataṃ tu gatameva hi //
analyzed: gatam tu na anuśocanti gatam tu gatam eva hi

original: MSS_3934-1 asmin kuñje vināpi pracalati pavanaṃ vartate ko'pi nūnaṃ paśyāmaḥ kiṃ na gatvetyanusarati gaṇe bhītabhīte'rbhakāṇām /
analyzed: asmin kuñje vinā api pracalati pavanam vartate kaḥ api nūnam paśyāmaḥ kim na gatvā iti anusarati gaṇe bhīta bhīteḥ bhakāṇām

original: MSS_3934-2 tasmin rādhāsakho vaḥ sukhayatu vilasan krīḍayā kaiṭabhārir vyātanvāno mṛgāriprabalavuraghurārāvaraudroccanādān //
analyzed: tasmin rādhā sakhaḥ vaḥ sukhayatu vilasan krīḍayā kaiṭabhāriḥ vyātanvānaḥ mṛgāri prabala vura ghurā rāva raudra ucca nādān

original: MSS_3935-1 asmin kuṭilakalloladolāvikṣobhite'mbhasi /
analyzed: asmin kuṭila kallola dolā vikṣobhita imbhasi

original: MSS_3935-2 hāsyahetuḥ kathaṃ setuḥ sikatāmuṣṭibhirbhavet //
analyzed: hāsya hetuḥ katham setuḥ sikatā muṣṭibhiḥ bhavet

original: MSS_3936-1 asmin kelivane sugandhapavane krīḍatpuraṃdhrījane guñjadbhṛṅgakule viśālabakule kūjatpikīsaṃkule /
analyzed: asmin keli vane sugandha pavane krīḍat puraṃdhrī jane guñjat bhṛṅga kule viśāla bakule kūjat pikī saṃkule

original: MSS_3936-2 unmīlannavapāṭalāparimale mallīprasūnākule yadyekāpi na mālatī vikasitā tatkiṃ na ramyo madhuḥ //
analyzed: unmīlat nava pāṭalā parimale mallī prasūna ākule yadi ekā api na mālatī vikasitā tat kim na ramyaḥ madhuḥ

original: MSS_3937-1 asmin digvijayodyate patirayaṃ me stāditi dhyāyati kampaṃ sāttvikabhāvañcati ripukṣoṇīndradārā dharā /
analyzed: asmin digvijaya udyate patiḥ ayam me stād iti dhyāyati kampam sāttvika bhāvam cati ripu kṣoṇī indra dārā dharā

original: MSS_3937-2 asyaivābhimukhaṃ nipatya samare yāsyadbhirūrdhvaṃ nijaḥ panthā bhāsvati dṛśyate bilamayaḥ pratyarthibhiḥ pārthivaiḥ //
analyzed: asya eva abhimukham nipatya samare yāsyadbhiḥ ūrdhvam nijaḥ panthāḥ bhāsvati dṛśyate bila mayaḥ pratyarthibhiḥ pārthivaiḥ

original: MSS_3938-1 asmin naktamaharvivekavikale kālādhame nīradaiḥ saṃnaddhairabhito niruddhagaganābhogāsu digbhittiṣu /
analyzed: asmin naktam ahar viveka vikale kāla adhame nīradaiḥ saṃnaddhaiḥ abhitas niruddha gagana ābhogāsu diś bhittiṣu

original: MSS_3938-2 bhānorna prasarantu nāma kiraṇāḥ kiṃ tvasya tejasvinaḥ sattāmātraparigraheṇa vikasantyadyāpi padmākarāḥ //
analyzed: bhānoḥ na prasarantu nāma kiraṇāḥ kim tu asya tejasvinaḥ sattā mātra parigraheṇa vikasanti adya api padma ākarāḥ

original: MSS_3939-1 asminnagṛhyata pinākabhṛtā salīlam ābaddhavepathuradhīravilocanāyāḥ /
analyzed: asmin agṛhyata pinākabhṛtā sa līlam ābaddha vepathuḥ adhīra vilocanāyāḥ

original: MSS_3939-2 vinyastamaṅgalamahauṣadhirīśvarāyāḥ srastoragapratisareṇa kareṇa pāṇiḥ //
analyzed: vinyasta maṅgala mahā oṣadhiḥ īśvarāyāḥ srasta uraga pratisareṇa kareṇa pāṇiḥ

original: MSS_3940-1 asminnabhyudite jagattrayadiśāmullāsahetau diśām āsyamlānihare sudhārasanidhau deve niśāsvāmini /
analyzed: asmin abhyudite jagattraya diśām ullāsa hetau diśām āsya mlāni hare sudhā rasa nidhau deve niśāsvāmini

original: MSS_3940-2 vaktraṃ mudritamambujanma bhavatā cet kiṃ tataḥ śāśvataṃ naitasyeśvaramaulimaṇḍanamaṇergāyanti viśve yaśaḥ //
analyzed: vaktram mudritam ambujanma bhavatā ced kim tatas śāśvatam na etasya īśvara mauli maṇḍana maṇeḥ gāyanti viśve yaśaḥ

original: MSS_3941-1 asmin na nirguṇaṃ gotre apatyamupajāyate /
analyzed: asmin na nirguṇam gotre apatyam upajāyate

original: MSS_3941-2 ākare padmarāgāṇāṃ janma kācamaṇeḥ kutaḥ //
analyzed: ākare padmarāgāṇām janma kācamaṇeḥ kutas

original: MSS_3942-1 asminnambhodavṛndadhvanijanitaruṣi prekṣamāṇe'ntarikṣaṃ mā kāka vyākulo bhūstaruśirasi śavakravyaleśānaśāna /
analyzed: asmin ambhoda vṛnda dhvani janita ruṣi prekṣamāṇe ntarikṣam mā kāka vyākulaḥ bhūḥ taru śirasi śava kra vyaleśān aśāna

original: MSS_3942-2 dhatte mattebhakumbhavyatikarakarajagrāmavajrāgrajāgrad grāsavyāsaktamuktādhavalitakavalo na spṛhāmatra siṃhaḥ //
analyzed: dhatte matta ibha kumbha vyatikara karaja grāma vajra agra jāgrat grāsa vyāsakta muktā dhavalita kavalaḥ na spṛhām atra siṃhaḥ

original: MSS_3943-1 asminnīṣadvalitavitatastokavicchinnabhugnaḥ kiṃcillīlopacitavibhavaḥ puñjitaścotthitaśca /
analyzed: asmin īṣat valita vitata stoka vicchinna bhugnaḥ kiṃcid līlā upacita vibhavaḥ puñjitaḥ ca utthitaḥ ca

original: MSS_3943-2 dhūmodgārastaruṇamahiṣaskandhanīlo davāgneḥ svairaṃ sarpan sṛjati gagane gatvarān patrabhaṅgān //
analyzed: dhūma udgāraḥ taruṇa mahiṣa skandha nīlaḥ dava agneḥ svairam sarpan sṛjati gagane gatvarān patrabhaṅgān

original: MSS_3944-1 asmin parasparadveṣaparuṣe puruṣāyuṣe /
analyzed: asmin paraspara dveṣa paruṣe puruṣa āyuṣe

original: MSS_3944-2 kevalaṃ madhurā vāṇī dadātyānīya sauhṛdam //
analyzed: kevalam madhurā vāṇī dadāti ānīya sauhṛdam

original: MSS_3945-1 asmin prakīrṇapaṭavāsakṛtāndhakāre dṛṣṭo manāṅmaṇivibhūṣaṇaraśmijālaiḥ /
analyzed: asmin prakīrṇa paṭa vāsa kṛta andhakāre dṛṣṭaḥ manāk maṇi vibhūṣaṇa raśmi jālaiḥ

original: MSS_3945-2 pātālamudyataphaṇākṛtiśṛṅgako'yaṃ māmadya saṃsmarayatīva bhujaṅgalokaḥ //
analyzed: pātālam udyata phaṇa ākṛti śṛṅga koyam mām adya saṃsmarayati iva bhujaṅga lokaḥ

original: MSS_3946-1 asmin prakṛtimanojñe lagnā prāyeṇa mānmathī dṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: asmin prakṛti manojñe lagnā prāyeṇa mānmathī dṛṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_3946-2 sundari yato bhavatyāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣīyate madhyaḥ //
analyzed: sundari yatas bhavatyāḥ pratikṣaṇam kṣīyate madhyaḥ

original: MSS_3947-1 asmin bhūvalaye janasya mahimā bhāgyena saṃjāyate no tatrāsti hi kāraṇaṃ prayatatā naivātha kaścid guṇaḥ /
analyzed: asmin bhū valaye janasya mahimā bhāgyena saṃjāyate no tatra asti hi kāraṇam prayatatā nā evā atha kaścid guṇaḥ

original: MSS_3947-2 kākāyāśucibhojine hi vitaratyuccaistu loko baliṃ muktāhāraparāyaṇāya śucaye no hanta haṃsāya yat //
analyzed: kākāya aśuci bhojine hi vitarati uccais tu lokaḥ balim muktā hāra parāyaṇāya śucaye naḥ hanta haṃsāya yat

original: MSS_3948-1 asmin marau kimaparaṃ vacasāmavācyaṃ mā muñca pāntha muhurāśritavatsalo bhūḥ /
analyzed: asmin marau kim aparam vacasām avācyam mā muñca pāntha muhur āśrita vatsalaḥ bhūḥ

original: MSS_3948-2 etat tvayā jalalavāmiṣalālasena dṛṣṭaṃ jvalatparikaraṃ sikatāvitānam //
analyzed: etat tvayā jala lava āmiṣa lālasena dṛṣṭam jvalat parikaram sikatā vitānam

original: MSS_3949-1 asmin mahatyanavadhau kila kālacakre dhanyāstu ye katipaye śukayogimukhyāḥ /
analyzed: asmin mahati anavadhau kila kālacakre dhanyāḥ tu ye katipaye śuka yogi mukhyāḥ

original: MSS_3949-2 līnāstvadaṅghriyugale pariśuddhasattvās tānātmanastava nakhānavadhārayāmaḥ //
analyzed: līnāḥ tvad aṅghri yugale pariśuddha sattvāḥ tān ātmanaḥ tava nakhān avadhārayāmaḥ

original: MSS_3950-1 asmin mahāmohamaye kaṭāhe sūryāgninā rātridinendhanena /
analyzed: asmin mahā moha maye kaṭāhe sūrya agninā rātri dina indhanena

original: MSS_3950-2 māsartudarvīparighaṭṭanena bhūtāni kālaḥ pacatīti vārtā //
analyzed: māsa ṛtu darvī parighaṭṭanena bhūtāni kālaḥ pacati iti vārtā

original: MSS_3951-1 asmin varṣamahe na vartata idaṃ yatkāmadevotsave stheyaṃ putri nirannayā tadadhunā kiṃcin mukhe dīyatām /
analyzed: asmin varṣa mahe na vartate idam yat kāmadeva utsave stheyam putri nirannayā tat adhunā kiṃcid mukhe dīyatām

original: MSS_3951-2 ityukte jaratījanena kathamapyadhvanyavadhvā tataḥ paryaste'hani kalpitaśca kavalo dhautaśca dhārāśrubhiḥ //
analyzed: iti ukte jaratī janena katham api adhvanya vadhvā tatas paryasta ihani kalpitaḥ ca kavalaḥ dhautaḥ ca dhārā aśrubhiḥ

original: MSS_3952-1 asmin vasante na narāḥ sahante vadhūviyogaṃ ca balāsarogam /
analyzed: asmin vasante na narāḥ sahante vadhū viyogam ca balāsa rogam

original: MSS_3952-2 kuraṅganābhidravalepabhābhir bhajantu dṛptāḥ pramadāḥ praliptāḥ //
analyzed: kuraṅga nābhi drava lepa bhābhiḥ bhajantu dṛptāḥ pramadāḥ praliptāḥ

original: MSS_3953-1 asmin sakhe nanu maṇitvamahāsubhikṣe cintāmaṇe tvamupalo bhava mā maṇirbhūḥ /
analyzed: asmin sakhe nanu maṇi tva mahā subhikṣe cintāmaṇe tvam upalaḥ bhava mā maṇiḥ bhūḥ

original: MSS_3953-2 adyedṛśā hi maṇayaḥ prabhavanti loke yeṣāṃ tṛṇagrahaṇakauśalameva bhūṣā //
analyzed: adyā īdṛśāḥ hi maṇayaḥ prabhavanti loke yeṣām tṛṇa grahaṇa kauśalam eva bhūṣā

original: MSS_3954-1 asmin sthite vipadabhūd iti saṃcintya varjyate /
analyzed: asmin sthite vipad abhūt iti saṃcintya varjyate

original: MSS_3954-2 mūḍhaiḥ parivṛḍhairāpatsevako maṅgalecchubhiḥ //
analyzed: mūḍhaiḥ parivṛḍhaiḥ āpad sevakaḥ maṅgala icchubhiḥ

original: MSS_3955-1 asmi vīrajananīti jananyām asmi vīraramaṇīti ramaṇyām /
analyzed: asmi vīra jananī iti jananyām asmi vīra ramaṇī iti ramaṇyām

original: MSS_3955-2 saṃmadaṃ vyadadhadutsukacetās tāratūryataralaścalito'nyaḥ //
analyzed: saṃmadam vyadadhat utsuka cetāḥ tāra tūrya taralaḥ calitaḥ nyaḥ

original: MSS_3956-1 asmi vīratanayā varavīra- preyasī ca kuru vīrasavitrīm /
analyzed: asmi vīra tanayā vara vīra preyasī ca kuru vīra savitrīm

original: MSS_3956-2 adya hṛdyasamarairiti mātā kācidāha tilakākṣatapūrvam //
analyzed: adya hṛdi a samaraiḥ iti mātā kācid āha tilaka akṣata pūrvam

original: MSS_3957-1 asmai karaṃ pravitarantu nṛpā na kasmād asyaiva tatra yadabhūt pratibhūḥ kṛpāṇaḥ /
analyzed: asmai karam pravitarantu nṛpāḥ na kasmāt asya eva tatra yat abhūt pratibhūḥ kṛpāṇaḥ

original: MSS_3957-2 daivād yadā pravitaranti na te tadaiva nedaṃkṛpā nijakṛpāṇakaragrahāya //
analyzed: daivāt yadā pravitaranti na te tadā eva na idam kṛpā nija kṛpāṇa kara grahāya

original: MSS_3958-1 asya kṣoṇipateḥ parārdhaparayā lakṣīkṛtāḥ saṃkhyayā prajñācakṣuravekṣyamāṇatimiraprakhyāḥ kilākīrttayaḥ /
analyzed: asya kṣoṇipateḥ parārdha parayā lakṣīkṛtāḥ saṃkhyayā prajñācakṣuḥ avekṣyamāṇa timira prakhyāḥ kilā kīrttayaḥ

original: MSS_3958-2 gīyante svaramaṣṭamaṃ kalayatā jātena vandhyodarān mūkānāṃ prakareṇa kūrmaramaṇīdugdhodadheḥ rodhasi //
analyzed: gīyante svaram aṣṭamam kalayatā jātena vandhyā udarāt mūkānām prakareṇa kūrma ramaṇī dugdha udadheḥ rodhasi

original: MSS_3959-1 asyatyuccaiḥ śakalitavapuścandano nātmagandhaṃ nekṣuryantrairapi madhuratāṃ pīḍyamāno jahāti /
analyzed: asyati uccais śakalita vapuḥ candanaḥ na ātma gandham na ikṣuḥ yantraiḥ api madhura tām pīḍyamānaḥ jahāti

original: MSS_3959-2 yadvat svarṇaṃ na calati hitaṃ chinnaghṛṣṭopataptaṃ tadvat sādhuḥ kujananihato'pyanyathātvaṃ na yāti //
analyzed: yadvat svarṇam na calati hitam chinna ghṛṣṭa upataptam tadvat sādhuḥ ku jana nihataḥ api anyathātvam na yāti

original: MSS_3960-1 asya dagdhodarasyārthe kiṃ na kurvanti paṇḍitāḥ /
analyzed: asya dagdhodarasya arthe kim na kurvanti paṇḍitāḥ

original: MSS_3960-2 vānarīmiva vāgdevīṃ nartayanti gṛhe gṛhe //
analyzed: vānarīm iva vāgdevīm nartayanti gṛhe gṛhe

original: MSS_3961-1 asya pracaṇḍabhujadaṇḍabhavaḥ kṛśānuś caṇḍāṃśucaṇḍakarajit sumahāpratāpaḥ /
analyzed: asya pracaṇḍa bhuja daṇḍa bhavaḥ kṛśānuḥ caṇḍa aṃśu caṇḍa kara jit su mahā pratāpaḥ

original: MSS_3961-2 pratyarthibhūpatipalāśavanaṃ vidahya prauḍhāsu dikṣu bahudāhamurīkaroti //
analyzed: pratyarthi bhūpati palāśa vanam vidahya prauḍhāsu dikṣu bahu dāham urīkaroti

original: MSS_3962-1 asya prayāṇeṣu samagraśakter agresarairvājibhirutthitāni /
analyzed: asya prayāṇeṣu samagra śakteḥ agresaraiḥ vājibhiḥ utthitāni

original: MSS_3962-2 kurvanti sāmantaśikhāmaṇīnāṃ prabhāprarohāstamayaṃ rajāṃsi //
analyzed: kurvanti sāmanta śikhāmaṇīnām prabhā praroha astamayam rajāṃsi

original: MSS_3963-1 asya śrībhojarājasya dvayameva sudurlabham /
analyzed: asya śrī bhojarājasya dvayam eva su durlabham

original: MSS_3963-2 śatrūṇāṃ śṛṅkhalairlohaṃ tāmraṃ śāsanapatrakaiḥ //
analyzed: śatrūṇām śṛṅkhalaiḥ loham tāmram śāsana patrakaiḥ

original: MSS_3964-1 asya snigdhasya varṇasya vipattirdāruṇā katham /
analyzed: asya snigdhasya varṇasya vipattiḥ dāruṇā katham

original: MSS_3964-2 idaṃ ca mukhamādhuryaṃ kathaṃ dūṣitamagninā //
analyzed: idam ca mukha mādhuryam katham dūṣitam agninā

original: MSS_3965-1 asyāṃ netrapathaṃ manye gatāyāṃ lolacakṣuṣi /
analyzed: asyām netra patham manye gatāyām lola cakṣuṣi

original: MSS_3965-2 bhavanti pañcabāṇasya svabāṇā eva vairiṇaḥ //
analyzed: bhavanti pañcabāṇasya sva bāṇāḥ eva vairiṇaḥ

original: MSS_3966-1 asyāṃ prāvṛṣi cātakairjalakaṇā labdhā na cet kiṃ tato bhāviprāvṛṣi dāsyate dviguṇamityabhra tvayā gamyate /
analyzed: asyām prāvṛṣi cātakaiḥ jala kaṇā labdhā na ced kim tatas bhāvi prāvṛṣi dāsyate dviguṇam iti abhra tvayā gamyate

original: MSS_3966-2 ete'dyaiva layaṃ vrajanti pṛthukairetat kulīno na ced ekaḥ prāṇiti tāvataiva kṛtamastyatraiva naḥ saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: etā idyā eva layam vrajanti pṛthukaiḥ etat kulīnaḥ na ced ekaḥ prāṇiti tāvatā eva kṛtam asti atra eva naḥ saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_3967-1 asyāṃ munīnāmapi mohamūhe bhṛgurmahān yatkucaśailaśīlī /
analyzed: asyām munīnām api moham ūhe bhṛguḥ mahān yat kuca śaila śīlī

original: MSS_3967-2 nānāradāhlādi mukhaṃ śritorur vyāso mahābhāratasargayogyaḥ //
analyzed: nā nārada āhlādi mukham śrita ūruḥ vyāsaḥ mahābhārata sarga yogyaḥ

original: MSS_3968-1 asyāṃ vapurvyūhavidhānavidyāṃ kiṃ dyotayāmāsa navāṃ sa kāmaḥ /
analyzed: asyām vapuḥ vyūha vidhāna vidyām kim dyotayāmāsa navām sa kāmaḥ

original: MSS_3968-2 pratyaṅgasaṅgasphuṭalabdhabhūmā lāvaṇyasīmā yadimāmupāste //
analyzed: pratyaṅga saṅga sphuṭa labdha bhūmā lāvaṇya sīmā yat imām upāste

original: MSS_3969-1 asyāṃ sakhe badhiralokanivāsabhūmau kiṃ kūjitena khalu kokila komalena /
analyzed: asyām sakhe badhira loka nivāsa bhūmau kim kūjitena khalu kokila komalena

original: MSS_3969-2 ete hi daivahatakāstadabhinnavarṇaṃ tvāṃ kākameva kalayanti kalānabhijñāḥ //
analyzed: ete hi daivahatakāḥ tad abhinna varṇam tvām kākam eva kalayanti kalā anabhijñāḥ

original: MSS_3970-1 asyāḥ kacānāṃ śikhinaśca kiṃnu vidhiṃ kalāpau vimateragātām /
analyzed: asyāḥ kacānām śikhinaḥ ca kiṃnu vidhim kalāpau vimateḥ agātām

original: MSS_3970-2 tenāyamebhiḥ kimapūji puṣpair abhartsi dattvā sa kimardhacandram //
analyzed: tena ayam ebhiḥ kim apūji puṣpaiḥ abhartsi dattvā sa kim ardhacandram

original: MSS_3971-1 asyāḥ kararuhakhaṇḍita- kāṇḍapaṭaprakaṭanirgatā dṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ kararuha khaṇḍita kāṇḍa paṭa prakaṭa nirgatā dṛṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_3971-2 paṭavigalitaniṣkaluṣā svadate pīyūṣadhāreva //
analyzed: paṭa vigalita niṣkaluṣā svadate pīyūṣa dhārā iva

original: MSS_3972-1 asyāḥ karaspardhanagardhanarddhir bālatvamāpat khalu pallavo yaḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ kara spardhana gardhana ṛddhiḥ bāla tvam āpad khalu pallavaḥ yaḥ

original: MSS_3972-2 bhūyo'pi nāmādharasāmyagarvaṃ kurvan kathaṃ vāstu na sa pravālaḥ //
analyzed: bhūyas api nāma adhara sāmya garvam kurvan katham vā astu na sa pravālaḥ

original: MSS_3973-1 asyāḥ karṇāvataṃsena jitaṃ sarvaṃ vibhūṣaṇam /
analyzed: asyāḥ karṇa avataṃsena jitam sarvam vibhūṣaṇam

original: MSS_3973-2 tathaiva śobhate'tyartham asyāḥ śravaṇakuṇḍalam //
analyzed: tathā eva śobhata ityartham asyāḥ śravaṇa kuṇḍalam

original: MSS_3974-1 asyāḥ kāntasya rūpasya savaupamyātiśāyinaḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ kāntasya rūpasya sa vaupamya atiśāyinaḥ

original: MSS_3974-2 ekaiva gacchet sādṛśyaṃ svacchāyā darpaṇāśritā //
analyzed: ekā eva gacchet sādṛśyam svacchāyāḥ darpaṇa āśritā

original: MSS_3975-1 asyāḥ kāmanivāsaramyabhavanaṃ vaktraṃ vilokyādarān niścityeva sudhākaraṃ priyatamaṃ bhūmīgataṃ śobhanam /
analyzed: asyāḥ kāma nivāsa ramya bhavanam vaktram vilokya ādarāt niścitya iva sudhākaram priyatamam bhūmī gatam śobhanam

original: MSS_3975-2 nāsāmauktikakaitavena rucirā tārāpi sā rohiṇī manye tadvirahāsahiṣṇuhṛdayā tatsaṃnidhiṃ sevate //
analyzed: nāsā mauktika kaitavena rucirā tārā api sā rohiṇī manye tad viraha asahiṣṇu hṛdayā tad saṃnidhim sevate

original: MSS_3976-1 asyāḥ kuśeśayadṛśaḥ śaśiśubhraśubhraṃ nāsāgravarti navamauktikamācakāsti /
analyzed: asyāḥ kuśeśaya dṛśaḥ śaśi śubhra śubhram nāsā agra varti nava mauktikam ācakāsti

original: MSS_3976-2 kailāsamānasasarovararājahaṃsyā niḥkṣiptamaṇḍamiva jāgrati puṇḍarīke //
analyzed: kailāsa mānasa sarovara rājahaṃsyāḥ niḥkṣipta maṇḍam iva jāgrati puṇḍarīke

original: MSS_3977-1 asyāḥ khalu granthinibaddhakeśa- mallīkadambapratibimbaveṣāt /
analyzed: asyāḥ khalu granthi nibaddha keśa mallī kadamba pratibimba veṣāt

original: MSS_3977-2 smarapraśastī rajatākṣareyaṃ pṛṣṭhasthalīhāṭakapaṭṭikāyām //
analyzed: smara praśastī rajata akṣarā iyam pṛṣṭha sthalī hāṭaka paṭṭikāyām

original: MSS_3978-1 asyāḥ padau cārutayā mahantāv apekṣya saukṣmyāllavabhāvabhājaḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ padau cāru tayā mahantau apekṣya saukṣmyāt lava bhāva bhājaḥ

original: MSS_3978-2 jātā pravālasya mahīruhāṇāṃ jānīmahe pallavaśabdalabdhiḥ //
analyzed: jātā pravālasya mahīruhāṇām jānīmahe pallava śabda labdhiḥ

original: MSS_3979-1 asyāḥ pāṭalapāṇijāṅkitamuro nidrākaṣāye dṛśau nirdhauto'dharaśoṇimā vilulitasrastasrajo mūrdhajāḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ pāṭala pāṇija aṅkitam uraḥ nidrā kaṣāye dṛśau nirdhauta udhara śoṇimā vilulita srasta srajaḥ mūrdhajāḥ

original: MSS_3979-2 kāñcīdāma daraślathāñcalamiti prātarnikhātairdṛśor ebhiḥ kāmaśaraistadadbhutamabhūd yanme manaḥ kīlitam //
analyzed: kāñcī dāma dara ślatha añcalam iti prātar nikhātaiḥ dṛśoḥ ebhiḥ kāma śaraiḥ tat adbhutam abhūt yat me manaḥ kīlitam

original: MSS_3980-1 asyāḥ pīṭhopaviṣṭāyā abhyaṅgaṃ vitanotyasau /
analyzed: asyāḥ pīṭha upaviṣṭāyāḥ abhyaṅgam vitanoti asau

original: MSS_3980-2 lasacchroṇi caladveṇi naṭadgurupayodharam //
analyzed: lasat śroṇi calat veṇi naṭat guru payodharam

original: MSS_3981-1 asyāḥ pīnastanavyāpte hṛdaye'smāsu nirdaye /
analyzed: asyāḥ pīna stana vyāpte hṛdaye smāsu nirdaye

original: MSS_3981-2 avakāśalavo'pyasti nātra kutra bibhartu naḥ //
analyzed: avakāśa lavaḥ api asti na atra kutra bibhartu naḥ

original: MSS_3982-1 asyāḥ saṃyamavān kaco madhukarairabhyarthyamāno muhur bhṛṅgīgopanajābhiśāpamacirādunmārṣṭukāmo nijam /
analyzed: asyāḥ saṃyamavān kacaḥ madhukaraiḥ abhyarthyamānaḥ muhur bhṛṅgī gopana ja abhiśāpam acirāt unmārṣṭu kāmaḥ nijam

original: MSS_3982-2 sīmantena kareṇa komalarucā sindūrabinducchalād ātaptāyasapiṇḍamaṇḍalamasāvādātumākāṅkṣati //
analyzed: sīmantena kareṇa komala rucā sindūra bindu chalāt ātapta āyasa piṇḍa maṇḍalam asau ādātum ākāṅkṣati

original: MSS_3983-1 asyāḥ sa cārurmadhureva kāruḥ śvāsaṃ vitene malayānilena /
analyzed: asyāḥ sa cāruḥ madhurā iva kāruḥ śvāsam vitene malaya anilena

original: MSS_3983-2 amūni sūnairvidadhe'ṅgakāni cakāra vācaṃ pikapañcamena //
analyzed: amūni sūnaiḥ vidadheṅgakāni cakāra vācam pika pañcamena

original: MSS_3984-1 asyāḥ sapakṣaikavidhoḥ kacaughaḥ sthāne mukhasyopari vāsamāpa /
analyzed: asyāḥ sapakṣa eka vidhoḥ kaca oghaḥ sthāne mukhasya upari vāsam āpa

original: MSS_3984-2 pakṣasthatāvadbahucandrako'pi kalāpināṃ yena jitaḥ kalāpaḥ //
analyzed: pakṣa stha tāvat bahu candra kopi kalāpinām yena jitaḥ kalāpaḥ

original: MSS_3985-1 asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntaprabhaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ sarga vidhau prajāpatiḥ abhūt candraḥ nu kānta prabhaḥ śṛṅgāra eka rasaḥ svayam nu madanaḥ māsaḥ nu puṣpa ākaraḥ

original: MSS_3985-2 vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhaven manoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ //
analyzed: veda abhyāsa jaḍaḥ katham nu viṣaya vyāvṛtta kautūhalaḥ nirmātum prabhavet manoharam idam rūpam purāṇaḥ muniḥ

original: MSS_3986-1 asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatiraho candro na saṃbhāvyate no devaḥ kusumāyudho na ca madhurdūre viriñcaḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ sarga vidhau prajāpatiḥ aho candraḥ na saṃbhāvyate no devaḥ kusumāyudhaḥ na ca madhuḥ dūre viriñcaḥ prabhuḥ

original: MSS_3986-2 etanme matamutthiteyamamṛtāt kācit svayaṃ sindhunā yā manthācalaloḍitena haraye dattvā śriyaṃ rakṣitā //
analyzed: etat me matam utthitā iyam amṛtāt kācid svayam sindhunā yā mantha acala loḍitena haraye dattvā śriyam rakṣitā

original: MSS_3987-1 asyāḥ sugandhinavakuṅkumapaṅkadatto mugdhaścakāsti tilako madirekṣaṇāyāḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ sugandhi nava kuṅkuma paṅka dattaḥ mugdhaḥ cakāsti tilakaḥ madirā īkṣaṇāyāḥ

original: MSS_3987-2 āviṣṭarāgamabhirāmamukhāravinda- niṣyandalagnamiva me hṛdayaṃ dvitīyam //
analyzed: āviṣṭa rāgam abhirāma mukha aravinda nisyanda lagnam iva me hṛdayam dvitīyam

original: MSS_3988-1 asyāḥ svedāmbubinducyutatilakatayā vyaktavaktrendukānter vāraṃvāreṇa vegaprahaṇanagaṇanākelivācālitāyāḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ sveda ambu bindu cyuta tilaka tayā vyakta vaktra indu kānteḥ vāram vāreṇa vega prahaṇana gaṇanā keli vā ācālitāyāḥ

original: MSS_3988-2 tatpātotpātatālakramanamitadṛśastāṇḍavottālatālī- lālityāllobhitāḥ smaḥ pratipadamamunā kandukakrīḍitena //
analyzed: tad pāta utpāta tāla krama namita dṛśaḥ tāṇḍava uttāla tālī lālityāt lobhitāḥ smaḥ pratipadam amunā kanduka krīḍitena

original: MSS_3989-1 asyāṅke kaṣapaṭṭabhāsicapalā śrīḥ svarṇarekhāyate dhārāsāraghanaṃ sudarśanamadaścakraṃ jagatpaśyati /
analyzed: asya aṅke kaṣa paṭṭa bhāsi capalā śrīḥ svarṇarekhāyate dhārā sāra ghanam sudarśana madaḥ cakram jagat paśyati

original: MSS_3989-2 prodañcadvanamālamañjanarucā dehena pītāmbaraṃ dūronnītaśikhaṇḍamaṇḍalamidaṃ rūpaṃ harerambudaḥ //
analyzed: prodañcat vanamālam añjana rucā dehena pīta ambaram dūra unnīta śikhaṇḍa maṇḍalam idam rūpam hareḥ ambudaḥ

original: MSS_3990-1 asyā dhāmasarovare bhujabise vaktrāravinde bhraman netrabhrūbhramare suyauvanajale kastūrikāpaṅkile /
analyzed: asyāḥ dhāma sarovare bhuja bise vaktra aravinde bhraman netra bhrū bhramare su yauvana jale kastūrikā paṅkile

original: MSS_3990-2 vakṣojapratikumbhikumbhadalanakrodhādupetya drutaṃ magnaścittamataṃgajaḥ kathamasāvutthāya niryāsyati //
analyzed: vakṣoja pratikumbhi kumbha dalana krodhāt upetya drutam magnaḥ citta mataṃgajaḥ katham asau utthāya niryāsyati

original: MSS_3991-1 asyānanasya bhavataḥ khalu koṭireṣā kaṇṭārikā yadi bhavedaviśīrṇaparṇā /
analyzed: asya ānanasya bhavataḥ khalu koṭiḥ eṣā kaṇṭārikā yadi bhavet a viśīrṇa parṇā

original: MSS_3991-2 yogyā kva te karabha kalpatarorlatāyās te pallavā vimalavidrumabhaṅgabhājaḥ //
analyzed: yogyā kva te karabha kalpataroḥ latāyāḥ te pallavāḥ vimala vidruma bhaṅga bhājaḥ

original: MSS_3992-1 asyābhyāsād granthavaryasya śiṣyaḥ sarvajñaḥ syād visphuraccārubuddhiḥ /
analyzed: asya abhyāsāt grantha varyasya śiṣyaḥ sarvajñaḥ syāt visphurat cāru buddhiḥ

original: MSS_3992-2 arthaṃ kāmaṃ vetti dharmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ niḥsaṃdehaṃ śīlituṃ paṇḍito'pi //
analyzed: artham kāmam vetti dharmam ca mokṣam niḥsaṃdeham śīlitum paṇḍitaḥ api

original: MSS_3993-1 asyā manoharākārakabarībhāratarjitāḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ manohara ākāra kabarī bhāra tarjitāḥ

original: MSS_3993-2 lajjayeva vane vāsaṃ cakruścamarabarhiṇaḥ //
analyzed: lajjayā iva vane vāsam cakruḥ camara barhiṇaḥ

original: MSS_3994-1 asyāmapūrva iva ko'pi kalaṅkariktaś candro'paraḥ kimuta tanmakaradhvajena /
analyzed: asyām apūrvaḥ iva kopi kalaṅka riktaḥ candra uparaḥ kim uta tad makaradhvajena

original: MSS_3994-2 romāvalīguṇamilatkucamandareṇa nirmathya nābhijaladhiṃ dhruvamuddhṛtaḥ syāt //
analyzed: roma āvalī guṇa milat kuca mandareṇa nirmathya nābhi jaladhim dhruvam uddhṛtaḥ syāt

original: MSS_3995-1 asyā mukhaṃ himarucirnanu yadvidhātrā saṃpūrya sarvamavaśeṣatayātra muktaḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ mukham himaruciḥ nanu yat vidhātrā saṃpūrya sarvam avaśeṣa tayā atra muktaḥ

original: MSS_3995-2 āśyānatāmupagato'sya rucā cakāsti nāsāgramauktikamiṣādamṛtasya binduḥ //
analyzed: āśyāna tām upagataḥ asya rucā cakāsti nāsā agra mauktika miṣāt amṛtasya binduḥ

original: MSS_3996-1 asyā mukhaśrīpratibimbameva jalācca tātānmukurācca mitrāt /
analyzed: asyāḥ mukha śrī pratibimbam eva jalāt ca tātāt mukurāt ca mitrāt

original: MSS_3996-2 abhyarthya dhattaḥ khalu padmacandrau vibhūṣaṇaṃ yācitakaṃ kadācit //
analyzed: abhyarthya dhattaḥ khalu padma candrau vibhūṣaṇam yācitakam kadācid

original: MSS_3997-1 asyā mukhasyāstu na pūrṇamāsyaṃ pūrṇasya jitvā mahimā himāṃśum /
analyzed: asyāḥ mukhasya astu na pūrṇamāsyam pūrṇasya jitvā mahimā himāṃśum

original: MSS_3997-2 bhrūlakṣmakhaṇḍaṃ dadhadardhamindur bhālastṛtīyaḥ khalu yasya bhāgaḥ //
analyzed: bhrū lakṣma khaṇḍam dadhat ardham induḥ bhālaḥ tṛtīyaḥ khalu yasya bhāgaḥ

original: MSS_3998-1 asyā mukhena lokānāṃ hṛtapaṅkajakāntinā /
analyzed: asyāḥ mukhena lokānām hṛta paṅkaja kāntinā

original: MSS_3998-2 niśāsu nāśitā nidrā kumudānāmivendunā //
analyzed: niśāsu nāśitā nidrā kumudānām iva indunā

original: MSS_3999-1 asyā mukhenaiva vijitya nitya- spardhī milatkuṅkumaroṣabhāsā /
analyzed: asyāḥ mukhena eva vijitya nitya spardhī milat kuṅkuma roṣa bhāsā

original: MSS_3999-2 prasahya candraḥ khalu nahyamānaḥ syādeva tiṣṭhatpariveṣapāśaḥ //
analyzed: prasahya candraḥ khalu nahyamānaḥ syāt eva tiṣṭhat pariveṣa pāśaḥ

original: MSS_4000-1 asyā mukhendāvadharaḥ sudhābhūr bimbasya yuktaḥ pratibimba eṣaḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ mukha indau adharaḥ sudhā bhūḥ bimbasya yuktaḥ pratibimbaḥ eṣaḥ

original: MSS_4000-2 tasyāthavā śrīrdrumabhāji deśe saṃbhāvyamānāsya tu vidrume sā //
analyzed: tasya athavā śrīḥ druma bhāji deśe saṃbhāvyamānā asya tu vidrume sā

original: MSS_4001-1 asyāmoṣadhayo jvalantu dadhatu jyotīṃṣi kīṭā api pronmīlantu bhujaṅgamaulimaṇayaḥ krīḍantu dīpāṅkurāḥ /
analyzed: asyām oṣadhayaḥ jvalantu dadhatu jyotīṃṣi kīṭāḥ api pronmīlantu bhujaṅga mauli maṇayaḥ krīḍantu dīpa aṅkurāḥ

original: MSS_4001-2 praṣṭavyāḥ khalu yūyameva yadi ko'pyastaṃ gate bhāsvati prauḍḥadhvāntapayodhimagnajagatīhastāvalambakṣamaḥ //
analyzed: praṣṭavyāḥ khalu yūyam eva yadi kopyaḥ tam gate bhāsvati prauḍḥa dhvānta payodhi magna jagatī hasta avalamba kṣamaḥ

original: MSS_4002-1 asyā yadaṣṭādaśa saṃvibhajya vidyāḥ śrutī dadhraturardhamardham /
analyzed: asyāḥ yat aṣṭādaśa saṃvibhajya vidyāḥ śrutī dadhratuḥ ardham ardham

original: MSS_4002-2 karṇāntarutkīrṇagabhīrarekhaḥ kiṃ tasya saṃkhyaiva navā navāṅkaḥ //
analyzed: karṇa antar utkīrṇa gabhīra rekhaḥ kim tasya saṃkhyā eva navā nava aṅkaḥ

original: MSS_4003-1 asyā yadāsyena purastiraśca tiraskṛtaṃ śītarucāndhakāram /
analyzed: asyāḥ yat āsyena puras tiras ca tiraskṛtam śīta rucā andhakāram

original: MSS_4003-2 sphuṭasphuradbhaṅgikacacchalena tadeva paścādidamasti baddham //
analyzed: sphuṭa sphurat bhaṅgi kaca chalena tat eva paścāt idam asti baddham

original: MSS_4004-1 asyāriprakaraḥ śaraśca nṛpateḥ saṃkhye patantāvubhau sītkāraṃ ca na saṃmukhau racayataḥ kampaṃ ca na prāpnutaḥ /
analyzed: asya ari prakaraḥ śaraḥ ca nṛpateḥ saṃkhye patantau ubhau sītkāram ca na saṃmukhau racayataḥ kampam ca na prāpnutaḥ

original: MSS_4004-2 tadyuktaṃ na punarnivṛttirubhayorjāgarti yanmuktayor ekastatra bhinatti mitramaparaścāmitramityadbhutam //
analyzed: tat yuktam na punarnivṛttiḥ ubhayoḥ jāgarti yat muktayoḥ ekaḥ tatra bhinatti mitram aparaḥ ca amitram iti adbhutam

original: MSS_4005-1 asyā lalāṭe racitā sakhībhir vibhāvyate candanapatralekhā /
analyzed: asyāḥ lalāṭe racitā sakhībhiḥ vibhāvyate candana patra lekhā

original: MSS_4005-2 āpāṇḍurakṣāmakapolabhittāv anaṅgabāṇavraṇapaṭṭikeva //
analyzed: āpāṇḍura kṣāma kapolabhittau anaṅga bāṇa vraṇa paṭṭikā iva

original: MSS_4006-1 asyā vapuṣi tāruṇyaṃ śaiśavaṃ vā kṛtāspadam /
analyzed: asyāḥ vapuṣi tāruṇyam śaiśavam vā kṛta āspadam

original: MSS_4006-2 jātiḥ kāpālikasyeva na kenāpyavadhāryate //
analyzed: jātiḥ kāpālikasya iva na kena api avadhāryate

original: MSS_4007-1 asyā vapuṣi tulāyāṃ śaiśavaguñjāṃ ca yauvanaṃ hema /
analyzed: asyāḥ vapuṣi tulāyām śaiśava guñjām ca yauvanam hema

original: MSS_4007-2 tulayati kutukini kāme na namati madhyānmanaḥsūcī //
analyzed: tulayati kutukini kāme na namati madhyāt manaḥ sūcī

original: MSS_4008-1 asyāścedalakāvalī kṛtamaliśreṇībhireṇīdṛśaḥ saundaryaṃ yadi cakṣuṣostaralayoḥ kiṃ manmathasyāyudhaiḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ ced alaka āvalī kṛta mali śreṇībhiḥ eṇī dṛśaḥ saundaryam yadi cakṣuṣoḥ taralayoḥ kim manmathasya āyudhaiḥ

original: MSS_4008-2 kā prītiḥ kanakāravindamukule pīnau stanau cedato manye kācidiyaṃ manobhavakṛtā māyā jaganmohinī //
analyzed: kā prītiḥ kanaka aravinda mukule pīnau stanau ced atas manye kācid iyam manobhava kṛtā māyā jagat mohinī

original: MSS_4009-1 asyāśced gatisaukumāryamadhunā haṃsasya garvairalaṃ saṃlāpo yadi dhāryatāṃ parabhṛtairvācaṃyamatvavratam /
analyzed: asyāḥ ced gati saukumāryam adhunā haṃsasya garvaiḥ alam saṃlāpaḥ yadi dhāryatām parabhṛtaiḥ vācaṃyama tva vratam

original: MSS_4009-2 aṅgānāmakaṭhoratā yadi dṛṣatprāyaiva sā mālatī kāntiścet kamalā kimatra bahunā kāṣāyamālambatām //
analyzed: aṅgānām a kaṭhora tā yadi dṛṣad prāyā eva sā mālatī kāntiḥ ced kamalā kim atra bahunā kāṣāyam ālambatām

original: MSS_4010-1 asyāsirbhujagaḥ svakośasuṣirākṛṣṭaḥ sphuratkṛṣṇimā kamponmīladarālalīlavalanasteṣāṃ bhiye bhūbhujām /
analyzed: asya asiḥ bhujagaḥ sva kośa suṣira ākṛṣṭaḥ sphurat kṛṣṇimā kampa unmīlat arāla līla valanaḥ teṣām bhiye bhūbhujām

original: MSS_4010-2 saṃgrāmeṣu nijāṅgulīmayamahāsiddhauṣadhīvīrudhaḥ parvāsye viniveśya jāṅgulikatā yairnāma nālambitā //
analyzed: saṃgrāmeṣu nija aṅgulī maya mahā siddha oṣadhī vīrudhaḥ parva āsye viniveśya jāṅgulika tā yaiḥ nāma na ālambitā

original: MSS_4011-1 asyāstanimā madhye prathimā kucayordṛśośca cāñcalyam /
analyzed: asyāḥ tanimā madhye prathimā kucayoḥ dṛśoḥ ca cāñcalyam

original: MSS_4011-2 ūrvoḥ krameṇa vṛtto- nnāhaśca tulyatāṃ dadhati //
analyzed: ūrvoḥ krameṇa vṛttaḥ annāhaḥ ca tulya tām dadhati

original: MSS_4012-1 asyāstanusyandanasaṃsmito vai sa mīnaketurjagatīṃ vijetum /
analyzed: asyāḥ tanu syandana saṃsmitaḥ vai sa mīnaketuḥ jagatīm vijetum

original: MSS_4012-2 sakuṅkumālekhamiṣeṇa vīro vyamocayaccārutarāṃ patākām //
analyzed: sa kuṅkuma ālekha miṣeṇa vīraḥ vyamocayat cārutarām patākām

original: MSS_4013-1 asyāstanau virahatāṇḍavaraṅgabhūmau svedodabindukusumāñjalimāvikīrya /
analyzed: asyāḥ tanau viraha tāṇḍava raṅga bhūmau sveda uda bindu kusuma añjalim āvikīrya

original: MSS_4013-2 nāndīṃ papāṭha pṛthuvepathuvepamāna- kāñcīlatākalaravaiḥ smarasūtradhāraḥ //
analyzed: nāndīm papāṭha pṛthu vepathu vepamāna kāñcī latā kalaravaiḥ smara sūtradhāraḥ

original: MSS_4014-1 asyāstuṅgamiva stanadvayamidaṃ nimneva nābhiḥ sthitā dṛśyante viṣamonnatāśca valayo bhittau samāyāmapi /
analyzed: asyāḥ tuṅgam iva stana dvayam idam nimnā iva nābhiḥ sthitā dṛśyante viṣama unnatāḥ ca valayaḥ bhittau samāyām api

original: MSS_4014-2 aṅge ca pratibhāti mārdavamidaṃ snigdhasvabhāvaściraṃ premṇā manmukhacandramīkṣata iva smereva vaktīti ca //
analyzed: aṅge ca pratibhāti mārdavam idam snigdha svabhāvaḥ ciram premṇā mad mukha candram īkṣate iva smerā iva vakti iti ca

original: MSS_4015-1 asyāstrāṇamaho viyogaduritādasmāsu kṛtvā kṛtī svairaṃ gacchasi tattu kiṃ vimṛśasi trāsāvahaṃ hanta naḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ trāṇam aho viyoga duritāt asmāsu kṛtvā kṛtī svairam gacchasi tat tu kim vimṛśasi trāsa āvaham hanta naḥ

original: MSS_4015-2 vācāleṣu dineṣu kokilarutairutpañcamaprakramaiḥ sajyotsnāsu ca yāminīṣvaśaraṇāḥ kiṃ nāma kurmo vayam //
analyzed: vācāleṣu dineṣu kokila rutaiḥ utpañcama prakramaiḥ sa jyotsnāsu ca yāminīṣu aśaraṇāḥ kim nāma kurmaḥ vayam

original: MSS_4016-1 asyaikasyāpi kāyasya sahajā asthikhaṇḍakāḥ /
analyzed: asya ekasya api kāyasya sahajāḥ asthi khaṇḍakāḥ

original: MSS_4016-2 pṛthak pṛthag gamiṣyanti kimutānyaḥ priyo janaḥ //
analyzed: pṛthak pṛthak gamiṣyanti kim uta anyaḥ priyaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_4017-1 asyaiva rambhoru tāvananasya dṛśaiva saṃjīvitamanmathasya /
analyzed: asya eva rambhā ūro tau ananasya dṛśā eva saṃjīvita manmathasya

original: MSS_4017-2 vanaṃ vidhātā nanu nīrajānāṃ nīrājanārthaṃ kimu nirmimīte //
analyzed: vanam vidhātā nanu nīrajānām nīrājana artham kimu nirmimīte

original: MSS_4018-1 asyaiva sargāya bhavatkarasya sarojasṛṣṭirmama hastalekhaḥ /
analyzed: asya eva sargāya bhavat karasya saroja sṛṣṭiḥ mama hasta lekhaḥ

original: MSS_4018-2 ityāha dhātā hariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ kiṃ hastalekhīkṛtayā tayāsyām //
analyzed: iti āha dhātā hariṇa īkṣaṇāyām kim hasta lekhīkṛtayā tayā asyām

original: MSS_4019-1 asyodarasya pratitulyaśobhaṃ nāstīti dhātrā bhuvanatraye'pi /
analyzed: asya udarasya pratitulya śobham na asti iti dhātrā bhuvanatraye pi

original: MSS_4019-2 saṃkhyānarekhā iva saṃprayuktās tisro virejurvalayaḥ sudatyāḥ //
analyzed: saṃkhyāna rekhāḥ iva saṃprayuktāḥ tisraḥ virejuḥ valayaḥ sudatyāḥ

original: MSS_4020-1 asyorvīramaṇasya pārvaṇavidhudvairājyasajjaṃ yaśaḥ sarvāṅgojjvalaśarvaparvatasitaśrīgarvanirvāsi yat /
analyzed: asya urvī ramaṇasya pārvaṇa vidhu dvairājya sajjam yaśaḥ sarva aṅga ujjvala śarva parvata sita śrī garva nirvāsi yat

original: MSS_4020-2 tatkambupratibimbitaṃ kimu śaratparjanyarājiśriyaḥ paryāyaḥ kimu dugdhasindhupayasāṃ sarvānuvādaḥ kimu //
analyzed: tat kambu pratibimbitam kimu śarad parjanya rāji śriyaḥ paryāyaḥ kimu dugdha sindhu payasām sarva anuvādaḥ kimu

original: MSS_4021-1 asraṃ locanakoṇa eva kṛpaṇadravyāyate sarvadā kaṇṭhe kākuvacaḥ prasuptakamalakroḍasthabhṛṅgāyate /
analyzed: asram locana koṇe eva kṛpaṇadravyāyate sarvadā kaṇṭhe kāku vacaḥ prasupta kamala kroḍa sthabhṛṅgāyate

original: MSS_4021-2 hā rāvo hṛdaye viyogikulajākāmābhilāṣāyate vaidehīvirahajvaro raghupaterāpākatāpāyate //
analyzed: hā rāvaḥ hṛdaye viyogi kula jā kāma abhilāṣāyate vaidehī viraha jvaraḥ raghu pateḥ āpākatāpāyate

original: MSS_4022-1 asramajasraṃ moktuṃ dhiṅ naḥ karṇāyate nayane /
analyzed: asram ajasram moktum dhik naḥ karṇāyate nayane

original: MSS_4022-2 draṣṭavyaṃ paridṛṣṭaṃ tatkaiśoraṃ vrajastrībhiḥ //
analyzed: draṣṭavyam paridṛṣṭam tat kaiśoram vraja strībhiḥ

original: MSS_4023-1 asrasrotastaraṅgabhramiṣu taralitā māṃsapaṅke luṭhantaḥ sthūlāsthigranthibhaṅgairdhavalabisalatāgrāsamākalpayantaḥ /
analyzed: asra srotaḥ taraṅga bhramiṣu taralitāḥ māṃsa paṅke luṭhantaḥ sthūla asthi granthi bhaṅgaiḥ dhavala bisa latā grāsam ākalpayantaḥ

original: MSS_4023-2 māyāsiṃhasya śaureḥ sphuradaruṇahṛdambhojasaṃśleṣabhājaḥ pāyāsurdaityavakṣaḥsthalakuharasarorājahaṃsā nakhā vaḥ //
analyzed: māyā siṃhasya śaureḥ sphurat aruṇa hṛd ambhoja saṃśleṣa bhājaḥ pāyāsuḥ daitya vakṣaḥ sthala kuhara saraḥ rājahaṃsāḥ nakhāḥ vaḥ

original: MSS_4024-1 asrākṣīnnavanīlanīrajadalopāntātisūkṣmāyata- tvaṅmātrāntaritāmiṣaṃ yadi vapurnaitat prajānāṃ patiḥ /
analyzed: asrākṣīt nava nīla nīraja dala upānta ati sūkṣmāyata tvac mātra antarita āmiṣam yadi vapuḥ na etat prajānām patiḥ

original: MSS_4024-2 pratyagrakṣaradasravisrapiśitagrāsagrahaṃ gṛhṇato gṛdhradhvāṅkṣavṛkāṃstanau nipatataḥ ko vā kathaṃ vārayet //
analyzed: pratyagra kṣarat asra visra piśita grāsa graham gṛhṇataḥ gṛdhra dhvāṅkṣa vṛkān tanau nipatataḥ kaḥ vā katham vārayet

original: MSS_4025-1 asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ kāryāḥ puruṣaiḥ svairdivāniśam /
analyzed: asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ kāryāḥ puruṣaiḥ svaiḥ divāniśam

original: MSS_4025-2 viṣayeṣu ca sajjantyaḥ saṃsthāpya hyātmano vaśe //
analyzed: viṣayeṣu ca sajjantyaḥ saṃsthāpya hi ātmanaḥ vaśe

original: MSS_4026-1 asvādhyāyaḥ pikānāṃ madanamakhasamārambhaṇasyādhimāso nidrāyā janmalagnaṃ kimapi madhulihāṃ ko'pi durbhikṣakālaḥ /
analyzed: asvādhyāyaḥ pikānām madana makha samārambhaṇasya adhimāsaḥ nidrāyāḥ janma lagnam kim api madhulihām kaḥ api durbhikṣa kālaḥ

original: MSS_4026-2 ṛṣṭiryātrotsukānāṃ malayajamarutāṃ pānthakāntākṛtāntaḥ prāleyonmūlamūlaṃ samajani samayaḥ kaścidautpātiko'yam //
analyzed: ṛṣṭiḥ yātrā utsukānām malayaja marutām pāntha kāntā kṛtāntaḥ prāleya unmūla mūlam samajani samayaḥ kaścid autpātikaḥ yam

original: MSS_4027-1 ahaṃkāra kvāpi vraja vṛjina he mā tvamiha bhūr abhūmirdarpāṇāmahamapasara tvaṃ piśuna he /
analyzed: ahaṃkāra kvāpi vraja vṛjina he mā tvam iha bhūḥ abhūmiḥ darpāṇām aham apasara tvam piśuna he

original: MSS_4027-2 are krodha sthānāntaramanusarānanyamanasāṃ trilokīnātho naḥ sphurati hṛdi devo harirasau //
analyzed: are krodha sthāna antaram anusara an anya manasām trilokī nāthaḥ naḥ sphurati hṛdi devaḥ hariḥ asau

original: MSS_4028-1 ahaṃkāro dhiyaṃ brūte mainaṃ suptaṃ prabodhaya /
analyzed: ahaṃkāraḥ dhiyam brūte mā enam suptam prabodhaya

original: MSS_4028-2 utthite paramānande na tvaṃ nāhaṃ na vai jagat //
analyzed: utthite paramānande na tvam na aham na vai jagat

original: MSS_4029-1 ahaṃ kimambā kimabhīṣṭatāpade taveti māturdhuri tātapṛcchayā /
analyzed: aham kim ambā kim abhīṣṭa tā pade tava iti mātuḥ dhuri tāta pṛcchayā

original: MSS_4029-2 pralobhyatulyaṃ pravadantamarbhakaṃ mudā hasañ jighrati mūrdhni puṇyabhāk //
analyzed: pralobhya tulyam pravadantam arbhakam mudā hasam jighrati mūrdhni puṇya bhāj

original: MSS_4030-1 ahaṃkṛteḥ paricchedān avidyāmacitiṃ tathā /
analyzed: ahaṃkṛteḥ paricchedān avidyām acitim tathā

original: MSS_4030-2 jahi yenopalabdhiste kāpi syānnistulādbhutā //
analyzed: jahi yena upalabdhiḥ te kā api syāt nistula adbhutā

original: MSS_4031-1 ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca rājendra lokanāthāvubhāvapi /
analyzed: aham ca tvam ca rāja indra loka nāthau ubhau api

original: MSS_4031-2 bahuvrīhirahaṃ rājan ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣo bhavān //
analyzed: bahuvrīhiḥ aham rājan ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣaḥ bhavān

original: MSS_4032-1 ahaṃ ca devanandī ca kuśāgrīyadhiyāvubhau /
analyzed: aham ca devanandī ca kuśāgrīya dhiyau ubhau

original: MSS_4032-2 naiva śabdāmbudheḥ pāraṃ kimanye jaḍabuddhayaḥ //
analyzed: na eva śabda ambudheḥ pāram kim anye jaḍa buddhayaḥ

original: MSS_4033-1 ahaṃ tanīyānatikomalaśca stanadvayaṃ voḍhumalaṃ na tāvat /
analyzed: aham tanīyān ati komalaḥ ca stana dvayam voḍhum alam na tāvat

original: MSS_4033-2 itīva tatsaṃvahanārthamasyā valitrayaṃ puṣyati madhyabhāgaḥ //
analyzed: iti iva tad saṃvahana artham asyāḥ vali trayam puṣyati madhya bhāgaḥ

original: MSS_4034-1 ahaṃ tāvan mahārāje pitṛtvaṃ nopalakṣaye /
analyzed: aham tāvat mahā rāje pitṛ tvam na upalakṣaye

original: MSS_4034-2 bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuśca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ //
analyzed: bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuḥ ca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ

original: MSS_4035-1 ahaṃ tenāhūtā kimapi kathayāmīti vijane samīpe cāsīnā saralahṛdayatvādavahitā /
analyzed: aham tena āhūtā kim api kathayāmi iti vijane samīpe ca āsīnā sarala hṛdaya tvāt avahitā

original: MSS_4035-2 tataḥ karṇopānte kimapi vadatāghrāya vadanaṃ gṛhītvā dhammillaṃ mama sakhi nipīto'dhararasaḥ //
analyzed: tatas karṇa upānte kim api vadatā āghrāya vadanam gṛhītvā dhammillam mama sakhi nipītaḥ udhara rasaḥ

original: MSS_4036-1 ahaṃ na cet syāṃ mayi duṣṭabhāvanām ime vrajeyurna nirāśrayā janāḥ /
analyzed: aham na ced syām mayi duṣṭa bhāvanām ime vrajeyuḥ na nirāśrayāḥ janāḥ

original: MSS_4036-2 tadenasā yojayataḥ parān svayaṃ mamaiva yuktā khalu nanvapatrapā //
analyzed: tad enasā yojayataḥ parān svayam mama eva yuktā khalu nanu apatrapā

original: MSS_4037-1 ahaṃ nayanajaṃ vāri niroḍhumapi na kṣamaḥ /
analyzed: aham nayana jam vāri niroḍhum api na kṣamaḥ

original: MSS_4037-2 rāmaḥ sītāviyogārto babandha saritāṃ patim //
analyzed: rāmaḥ sītā viyoga ārtaḥ babandha saritām patim

original: MSS_4038-1 ahaṃ naśyāmi mānena mānena kalahaṃ kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: aham naśyāmi mānena mānena kalaham kṛthāḥ

original: MSS_4038-2 virodhametya kāntena kānte na paritapyate //
analyzed: virodham etya kāntena kānte na paritapyate

original: MSS_4039-1 ahaṃbhāvātyayo jātu sukaro na kathaṃcana /
analyzed: ahaṃbhāva atyayaḥ jātu sukaraḥ na kathaṃcana

original: MSS_4039-2 cetanāyāmahambhāvo bhautikyāṃ vijitaḥ sakṛt /
analyzed: cetanāyām ahambhāvaḥ bhautikyām vijitaḥ sakṛt

original: MSS_4039-3 ādhyātmikyāṃ punaścaiṣa sphītaḥ sphurati no'grataḥ //
analyzed: ādhyātmikyām punar ca eṣa sphītaḥ sphurati na ugrataḥ

original: MSS_4040-1 ahaṃ mametyeva bhavasya bījaṃ na me na cāhaṃ bhavabījaśāntiḥ /
analyzed: aham mama iti eva bhavasya bījam na me na ca aham bhava bīja śāntiḥ

original: MSS_4040-2 bīje pranaṣṭe kuta eva janma nirindhano vahnirupaiti śāntim //
analyzed: bīje pranaṣṭe kutas eva janma nirindhanaḥ vahniḥ upaiti śāntim

original: MSS_4041-1 ahaṃ mahānasāyātaḥ kalpito narakastava /
analyzed: aham mahānasa āyātaḥ kalpitaḥ narakaḥ tava

original: MSS_4041-2 mayā māṃsādikaṃ bhuktaṃ bhīmaṃ jānīhi māṃ baka //
analyzed: mayā māṃsa ādikam bhuktam bhīmam jānīhi mām baka

original: MSS_4042-1 ahaṃyuvaravarṇinījanamadāyatodavrata- sphuraccaturapañcamasvarajitānyapakṣivrajaḥ /
MSS_4042-2 rasālataruṇā kṛtāmasamatulyatāmātmano vihantumiha kokilaḥ phalinamanyamudvīkṣate //
analyzed: rasāla taruṇā kṛtā āma sama tulya tām ātmanaḥ vihantum iha kokilaḥ phalinam anyam udvīkṣate

original: MSS_4043-1 ahaṃ rathāṅganāmeva priyā sahacarīva me /
analyzed: aham rathāṅga nāmā iva priyā sahacarī iva me

original: MSS_4043-2 ananujñātasaṃparkā dhāriṇī rajanīva nau //
analyzed: an anujñāta saṃparkā dhāriṇī rajanī iva nau

original: MSS_4044-1 ahaṃ vo rakṣitetyuktvā yo na rakṣati bhūmipaḥ /
analyzed: aham vaḥ rakṣitā iti uktvā yaḥ na rakṣati bhūmipaḥ

original: MSS_4044-2 sa saṃhatya nihantavyaḥ śveva sonmāda āturaḥ //
analyzed: sa saṃhatya nihantavyaḥ śvā iva sa unmādaḥ āturaḥ

original: MSS_4045-1 ahaṃ sadā prāṇasamaṃ mahībhujām ayaṃ tu māṃ vetti nṛpastṛṇopamam /
analyzed: aham sadā prāṇa samam mahībhujām ayam tu mām vetti nṛpaḥ tṛṇa upamam

original: MSS_4045-2 itīva karṇeṣu suvarṇamarthināṃ svakhedamākhyātumabhūt kṛtāspadam //
analyzed: iti iva karṇeṣu suvarṇam arthinām sva khedam ākhyātum abhūt kṛta āspadam

original: MSS_4046-1 ahaṃ hi saṃmato rājño ya evaṃ manyate kudhīḥ /
analyzed: aham hi saṃmataḥ rājñaḥ yaḥ evam manyate kudhīḥ

original: MSS_4046-2 balīvardaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣāṇaparivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: balīvardaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ viṣāṇa parivarjitaḥ

original: MSS_4047-1 ahanyahani boddhavyaṃ kimadya sukṛtaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: ahani ahani boddhavyam kim adya sukṛtam kṛtam

original: MSS_4047-2 dattaṃ vā dāpitaṃ vāpi vāksāhyamapi vākkṛtam //
analyzed: dattam vā dāpitam vā api vāc sāhyam api vāc kṛtam

original: MSS_4048-1 ahanyahani bhūtāni gacchanti caramālayam /
analyzed: ahani ahani bhūtāni gacchanti carama ālayam

original: MSS_4048-2 śeṣāḥ sthāvaramicchanti kimāścaryamataḥparam //
analyzed: śeṣāḥ sthāvaram icchanti kim āścaryam atas param

original: MSS_4049-1 ahanyahani bhūtāni sṛjatyeva prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: ahani ahani bhūtāni sṛjati eva prajāpatiḥ

original: MSS_4049-2 adyāpi na sṛjatyekaṃ yo'rthinaṃ nāvamanyate //
analyzed: adyā api na sṛjati ekam yaḥ ūrthinam na avamanyate

original: MSS_4050-1 ahanyahani yācantaṃ ko'vamanyed guruṃ yathā /
analyzed: ahani ahani yācantam gurum yathā

original: MSS_4050-2 mārjanaṃ darpaṇasyeva yaḥ karoti dine dine //
analyzed: mārjanam darpaṇasya iva yaḥ karoti dine dine

original: MSS_4051-1 ahanyahanyātmana eva tāvaj jñātuṃ pramādaskhalitaṃ na śakyam /
analyzed: ahani ahani ātmanaḥ eva tāvat jñātum pramāda skhalitam na śakyam

original: MSS_4051-2 prajāsu kaḥ kena pathā prayātīty aśeṣato veditumasti śaktiḥ //
analyzed: prajāsu kaḥ kena pathā prayāti iti aśeṣatas veditum asti śaktiḥ

original: MSS_4052-1 ahamapi pare'pi kavayas tathāpi mahadantaraṃ parijñeyam /
analyzed: aham api kavayaḥ tathā api mahat antaram parijñeyam

original: MSS_4052-2 aikyaṃ ralayoryadyapi tat kiṃ karabhāyate kalabhaḥ //
analyzed: aikyam ralayoḥ yadi api tat kim karabhāyate kalabhaḥ

original: MSS_4053-1 ahamasmi nīlakaṇṭhas tava khalu tuṣyāmi śabdamātreṇa /
analyzed: aham asmi nīlakaṇṭhaḥ tava khalu tuṣyāmi śabda mātreṇa

original: MSS_4053-2 nāhaṃ jaladhara bhavataś cātaka iva jīvanaṃ yāce //
analyzed: na aham jaladhara bhavataḥ cātake iva jīvanam yāce

original: MSS_4054-1 ahamahamikābaddhotsāhaṃ ratotsavaśaṃsini prasarati muhuḥ prauḍhastrīṇāṃ kathāmṛtadurdine /
analyzed: ahamahamikā baddha utsāham rata utsava śaṃsini prasarati muhur prauḍha strīṇām kathā amṛta durdine

original: MSS_4054-2 kalitapulakā sadyaḥ stokodgatastanakorake valayati śanairbālā vakṣaḥsthale taralāṃ dṛśam //
analyzed: kalita pulakā sadyas stoka udgata stana korake valayati śanais bālā vakṣaḥ sthale taralām dṛśam

original: MSS_4055-1 ahamiva dinalakṣmīḥ proṣitaprāṇanāthā tvamiva pathika panthā muktapānthānubandhaḥ /
analyzed: aham iva dina lakṣmīḥ proṣita prāṇanāthā tvam iva pathika panthāḥ mukta pāntha anubandhaḥ

original: MSS_4055-2 ayamapi paradeśaḥ so'pi yatrāsi gantā madanamadhuramūrte kiṃ vṛthā satvaro'si //
analyzed: ayam api para deśaḥ saḥ upi yatra asi gantā madana madhura mūrte kim vṛthā satvaraḥ usi

original: MSS_4056-1 ahamiva śūnyamaraṇyaṃ vayamiva tanutāṃ gatāni toyāni /
analyzed: aham iva śūnyam araṇyam vayam iva tanu tām gatāni toyāni

original: MSS_4056-2 asmākamivocchvāsā divasā dīrghāśca taptāśca //
analyzed: asmākam iva ucchvāsāḥ divasāḥ dīrghāḥ ca taptāḥ ca

original: MSS_4057-1 ahamiha kṛtavidyo veditā satkalānāṃ dhanapatirahameko rūpalāvaṇyayuktaḥ /
analyzed: aham iha kṛtavidyaḥ veditā sat kalānām dhanapatiḥ aham ekaḥ rūpa lāvaṇya yuktaḥ

original: MSS_4057-2 iti kṛtagurugarvaḥ khidyate kiṃ jano'yaṃ katipayadinamadhye sarvametanna kiṃcit //
analyzed: iti kṛta guru garvaḥ khidyate kim janaḥ yam katipaya dina madhye sarvam etat na kiṃcid

original: MSS_4058-1 ahamiha sthitavatyapi tāvakī tvamapi tatra vasannapi māmakaḥ /
analyzed: aham iha sthitavatī api tāvakī tvam api tatra vasan api māmakaḥ

original: MSS_4058-2 na tanusaṃgatamārya susaṃgataṃ hṛdayasaṃgatameva susaṃgatam //
analyzed: na tanu saṃgatam ārya su saṃgatam hṛdaya saṃgatam eva su saṃgatam

original: MSS_4059-1 ahameko na me kaścin nāhamanyasya kasyacit /
analyzed: aham ekaḥ na me kaścid na aham anyasya kasyacid

original: MSS_4059-2 na taṃ paśyāmi yasyāhaṃ na hi so'sti na yo mama //
analyzed: na tam paśyāmi yasya aham na hi saḥ asti na yaḥ mama

original: MSS_4060-1 ahametya pataṅgavartmanā punaraṅkāśrayaṇī bhavāmi te /
analyzed: aham etya pataṅga vartmanā punar aṅka āśrayaṇī bhavāmi te

original: MSS_4060-2 caturaiḥ surakāminījanaiḥ priya yāvanna vilobhyase divi //
analyzed: caturaiḥ sura kāminī janaiḥ priya yāvat na vilobhyase divi

original: MSS_4061-1 ahameva guruḥ sudāruṇānām iti hālāhala tāta mā sma dṛpyaḥ /
analyzed: aham eva guruḥ su dāruṇānām iti hālāhala tāta mā sma dṛpyaḥ

original: MSS_4061-2 nanu santi bhavādṛśāni bhūyo bhuvane'smin vacanāni durjanānām //
analyzed: nanu santi bhavādṛśāni bhūyas bhuvane ismin vacanāni durjanānām

original: MSS_4062-1 ahameva balī na cāpara iti buddhiḥ pralayaṃkarī nṛṇām /
analyzed: aham eva balī na ca aparaḥ iti buddhiḥ pralayaṃkarī nṛṇām

original: MSS_4062-2 nahi santi mahītale kati prabalairye vijitā baloddhatāḥ //
analyzed: nahi santi mahī tale kati prabalaiḥ ye vijitāḥ bala uddhatāḥ

original: MSS_4063-1 ahameva mato mahīpater iti sarvaḥ prakṛtiṣvacintayat /
analyzed: aham eva mataḥ mahīpateḥ iti sarvaḥ prakṛtiṣu acintayat

original: MSS_4063-2 udadheriva nimnagāśateṣv abhavannāsya vimānanā kvacit //
analyzed: udadheḥ iva nimnagā śateṣu abhavat na asya vimānanā kvacid

original: MSS_4064-1 aharan kasyacid dravyaṃ yo naraḥ sukhamāvaset /
analyzed: a haran kasyacid dravyam yaḥ naraḥ sukham āvaset

original: MSS_4064-2 sarvataḥ śaṅkitaḥ steno mṛgogrāmamivāgataḥ //
analyzed: sarvatas śaṅkitaḥ stenaḥ mṛga grāmam iva āgataḥ

original: MSS_4065-1 aharniśaṃ jāgaraṇodyato janaḥ śramaṃ vidhatte viṣayecchayā yathā /
analyzed: aharniśam jāgaraṇa udyataḥ janaḥ śramam vidhatte viṣaya icchayā yathā

original: MSS_4065-2 tapaḥśramaṃ cet kurute tathā kṣaṇaṃ kimaśnute'nantasukhaṃ na pāvanam //
analyzed: tapaḥ śramam ced kurute tathā kṣaṇam kim aśnuta ananta sukham na pāvanam

original: MSS_4066-1 aharniśā veti ratāya pṛcchati kramoṣṇaśītānnakarārpaṇād viṭe /
analyzed: ahar niśāḥ vā iti ratāya pṛcchati krama uṣṇa śīta anna kara arpaṇāt viṭe

original: MSS_4066-2 hriyā vidagdhā kila tanniṣedhinī nyadhatta saṃdhyāmadhure'dhare'ṅgulim //
analyzed: hriyā vidagdhā kila tad niṣedhinī nyadhatta saṃdhyā madhuredhara iṅgulim

original: MSS_4067-1 ahalyākelikāle'bhūt kandarpāṇāṃ śatadvayam /
analyzed: kandarpāṇām śata dvayam

original: MSS_4067-2 tatpañcabāṇabhinnākṣaḥ sahasrākṣo'ndhatāṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: tad pañcabāṇa bhinna akṣaḥ sahasrākṣa undha tām gataḥ

original: MSS_4068-1 ahastāni sahastānām apadāni catuṣpadām /
analyzed: a hastāni sa hastānām a padāni catuṣpadām

original: MSS_4068-2 phalgūni tatra mahatāṃ jīvo jīvasya jīvanam //
analyzed: phalgūni tatra mahatām jīvaḥ jīvasya jīvanam

original: MSS_4069-1 ahaha karmakarīyati bhūpatiṃ narapatīyati karmakaraṃ naraḥ /
analyzed: ahaha karmakarīyati bhūpatim narapatīyati karmakaram naraḥ

original: MSS_4069-2 jalanidhīyati kūpamapāṃ nidhiṃ gatajalīyati madyamadākulaḥ //
analyzed: kūpam apām nidhim madya mada ākulaḥ

original: MSS_4070-1 ahaha kimadhunā mudhaiva badhnāsy anucitakāriṇi karṇadantapatram /
analyzed: ahaha kim adhunā mudhā eva badhnāsi anucita kāriṇi karṇa danta patram

original: MSS_4070-2 nanu tava caṭulabhru karṇapālir bhuvanavilocanakālasārapāśaḥ //
analyzed: nanu tava caṭula bhru karṇa pāliḥ bhuvana vilocana kāla sāra pāśaḥ

original: MSS_4071-1 ahaha gṛhī kva nu kuśalī baddhaḥ saṃsārasāgare kṣiptaḥ /
analyzed: ahaha gṛhī kva nu kuśalī baddhaḥ saṃsāra sāgare kṣiptaḥ

original: MSS_4071-2 kathamapi labhate potaṃ tenāpi nimajjati nitāntam //
analyzed: katham api labhate potam tena api nimajjati nitāntam

original: MSS_4072-1 ahaha caṇḍa samīraṇa dāruṇaṃ kimidamācaritaṃ caritaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: ahaha caṇḍa samīraṇa dāruṇam kim idam ācaritam caritam tvayā

original: MSS_4072-2 yadiha cātakacañcupuṭodare patati vāri tadeva nivāritam //
analyzed: yat iha cātaka cañcu puṭa udare patati vāri tat eva nivāritam

original: MSS_4073-1 ahaha nayane mithyādṛgvat sadīkṣaṇavarjite śravaṇayugalaṃ duṣputro vā śrṇoti na bhāṣitam /
analyzed: ahaha nayane mithyā dṛś vat sa dīkṣaṇa varjite śravaṇa yugalam duṣputraḥ vā śrṇoti na bhāṣitam

original: MSS_4073-2 skhalati caraṇadvandvaṃ mārge madākulalokavad vapuṣi jarasā jīrṇe varṇo vyapaiti kalatravat //
analyzed: skhalati caraṇa dvandvam mārge mada ākula loka vat vapuṣi jarasā jīrṇe varṇaḥ vyapaiti kalatra vat

original: MSS_4074-1 ahaha sahajamohā dehagehaprapañce navaratamatimagnā kāminīvigrahāptiḥ /
analyzed: ahaha sahaja mohā deha geha prapañce nava rata mati magnā kāminī vigraha āptiḥ

original: MSS_4074-2 tadahamiha vihartuṃ saṃtatāmodamugdhā svahitamahitakṛtyaṃ hanta nāntaḥ smarāmi //
analyzed: tat aham iha vihartum saṃtata āmoda mugdhā sva hitam ahita kṛtyam hanta na antar smarāmi

original: MSS_4075-1 ahānyastamayāntāni udayāntā ca śarvarī /
analyzed: ahāni astamaya antāni udaya antā ca śarvarī

original: MSS_4075-2 sukhasyāntaḥ sadā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasyāntaḥ sadā sukham //
analyzed: sukhasya antar sadā duḥkham duḥkhasya antar sadā sukham

original: MSS_4076-1 ahāpayan nṛpaḥ kālaṃ bhṛtyānāmanuvartinām /
analyzed: ahāpayat nṛpaḥ kālam bhṛtyānām anuvartinām

original: MSS_4076-2 karmaṇāmānurūpyeṇa vṛttiṃ samanukalpayet //
analyzed: karmaṇām ānurūpyeṇa vṛttim samanukalpayet

original: MSS_4077-1 ahāryaḥ sarvamadhyasthaḥ kāñcanadyutimudvahan /
analyzed: ahāryaḥ sarva madhya sthaḥ kāñcana dyutim udvahan

original: MSS_4077-2 satpradakṣiṇayogyatvam upayāti mahonnataḥ //
analyzed: sat pradakṣiṇa yogya tvam upayāti mahā unnataḥ

original: MSS_4078-1 ahāryeṇa kadāpyanyair asaṃhāryeṇa kenacit /
analyzed: a hāryeṇa kadāpi anyaiḥ a saṃhāryeṇa kenacid

original: MSS_4078-2 titikṣākavacenaiva sarvaṃ jayati saṃvṛtaḥ //
analyzed: titikṣā kavacena eva sarvam jayati saṃvṛtaḥ

original: MSS_4079-1 ahiṃ nṛpaṃ ca śārdūlaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca bālakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ahim nṛpam ca śārdūlam vṛddham ca bālakam tathā

original: MSS_4079-2 paraśvānaṃ ca mūrkhaṃ ca sapta suptān na bodhayet //
analyzed: paraśvānam ca mūrkham ca sapta suptān na bodhayet

original: MSS_4080-1 ahiṃsayaiva bhūtānāṃ kāryaṃ śreyo'muśāsanam /
analyzed: ahiṃsayā eva bhūtānām kāryam śreyaḥ mu śāsanam

original: MSS_4080-2 vāk caiva madhurā ślakṣṇā prayojyā dharmamicchatā //
analyzed: vāc ca eva madhurā ślakṣṇā prayojyā dharmam icchatā

original: MSS_4081-1 ahiṃsā dhāma dharmasya duḥkhasyāyatanaṃ spṛhā /
analyzed: ahiṃsā dhāma dharmasya duḥkhasya āyatanam spṛhā

original: MSS_4081-2 saṅgatyāgaḥ padaṃ mukter yogābhyāsaḥ padaṃ śucaḥ //
analyzed: saṅga tyāgaḥ padam mukteḥ yoga abhyāsaḥ padam śucaḥ

original: MSS_4082-1 ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ ahiṃsā paramā gatiḥ /
analyzed: ahiṃsā paramaḥ dharmaḥ ahiṃsā paramā gatiḥ

original: MSS_4082-2 ahiṃsā paramā prītis tvahiṃsā paramaṃ padam //
analyzed: ahiṃsā paramā prītiḥ tu ahiṃsā paramam padam

original: MSS_4083-1 ahiṃsā paramo dharmas tathāhiṃsā paro damaḥ /
analyzed: ahiṃsā paramaḥ dharmaḥ tathā ahiṃsā paraḥ damaḥ

original: MSS_4083-2 ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānam ahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ //
analyzed: ahiṃsā paramam dānam ahiṃsā paramam tapaḥ

original: MSS_4084-1 ahiṃsā paramo yajñas tathāhiṃsā paraṃ balam /
analyzed: ahiṃsā paramaḥ yajñaḥ tathā ahiṃsā param balam

original: MSS_4084-2 ahiṃsā paramaṃ mitram ahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham /
analyzed: ahiṃsā paramam mitram ahiṃsā paramam sukham

original: MSS_4084-3 ahiṃsā paramaṃ satyam ahiṃsā paramaṃ śrutam //
analyzed: ahiṃsā paramam satyam ahiṃsā paramam śrutam

original: MSS_4085-1 ahiṃsā paramo dharmo hyahiṃsaiva paraṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: ahiṃsā paramaḥ dharmaḥ hi ahiṃsā eva param tapaḥ

original: MSS_4085-2 ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānam ityāhurmunayaḥ sadā //
analyzed: ahiṃsā paramam dānam iti āhuḥ munayaḥ sadā

original: MSS_4086-1 ahiṃsāpūrvako dharmo yasmāt sarvahite rataḥ /
analyzed: ahiṃsā pūrvakaḥ dharmaḥ yasmāt sarva hite rataḥ

original: MSS_4086-2 yūkāmatkuṇadaṃśādīṃs tasmāt tānapi rakṣayet //
analyzed: yūkā matkuṇa daṃśa ādīn tasmāt tān api rakṣayet

original: MSS_4087-1 ahiṃsā prathamaṃ puṣpaṃ dvitīyendriyanigraham /
analyzed: ahiṃsā prathamam puṣpam dvitīya indriya nigraham

original: MSS_4087-2 tṛtīyaṃ tu dayā puṣpaṃ turīyaṃ dānapuṣpakam //
analyzed: tṛtīyam tu dayā puṣpam turīyam dāna puṣpakam

original: MSS_4088-1 ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ tyāgo maithunavarjanam /
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam asteyam tyāgaḥ maithuna varjanam

original: MSS_4088-2 pañcasveteṣu vākyeṣu sarve dharmāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ //
analyzed: pañcasu eteṣu vākyeṣu sarve dharmāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: MSS_4089-1 ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryaparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam asteyam brahmacarya parigrahaḥ

original: MSS_4089-2 iṣṭāniṣṭaparā cintā yama eṣa prakīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: iṣṭa aniṣṭa parā cintā yamaḥ eṣa prakīrtitaḥ

original: MSS_4090-1 ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ /
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam asteyam śaucam indriya nigrahaḥ

original: MSS_4090-2 etaṃ sāmāsikaṃ dharmaṃ cāturvarṇye'bravīnmanuḥ //
analyzed: etam sāmāsikam dharmam cāturvarṇye bravīt manuḥ

original: MSS_4091-1 ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ /
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam asteyam śaucam indriya nigrahaḥ

original: MSS_4091-2 dānaṃ damo dayā kṣāntiḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmasādhanam //
analyzed: dānam damaḥ dayā kṣāntiḥ sarveṣām dharma sādhanam

original: MSS_4092-1 ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ sarvabhūtānukampanam /
analyzed: ahiṃsā satya vacanam sarva bhūta anukampanam

original: MSS_4092-2 śamo dānaṃ yathāśakti gārhasthyo dharma uttamaḥ //
analyzed: śamaḥ dānam yathāśakti gārhasthyaḥ dharmaḥ uttamaḥ

original: MSS_4093-1 ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ sarvabhūteṣu cārjavam /
analyzed: ahiṃsā satya vacanam sarva bhūteṣu ca ārjavam

original: MSS_4093-2 kṣamā caivāpramādaśca yasyaite sa sukhī bhavet //
analyzed: kṣamā ca eva apramādaḥ ca yasya ete sa sukhī bhavet

original: MSS_4094-1 ahiṃsā satyavacanam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damo ghṛṇā /
analyzed: ahiṃsā satya vacanam ānṛśaṃsyam damaḥ ghṛṇā

original: MSS_4094-2 etat tapo vidurdhīrā na śarīrasya śoṣaṇam //
analyzed: etat tapaḥ viduḥ dhīrāḥ na śarīrasya śoṣaṇam

original: MSS_4095-1 ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā kṣamā /
analyzed: ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyam śaucam dayā kṣamā

original: MSS_4095-2 varṇināṃ liṅgināṃ caiva sāmānyo dharma ucyate //
analyzed: varṇinām liṅginām ca eva sāmānyaḥ dharmaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_4096-1 ahiṃsāsūnṛtāsteyabrahmākiṃcanatāratam /
analyzed: ahiṃsā sūnṛta asteya brahma akiṃcana tā ratam

original: MSS_4096-2 supātraṃ munibhiḥ proktaṃ rājadveṣavivarjitam //
analyzed: su pātram munibhiḥ proktam rāja dveṣa vivarjitam

original: MSS_4097-1 ahiṃsrasya tapo'kṣayyam ahiṃsro yajate sadā /
analyzed: ahiṃsrasya tapaḥ kṣayyam ahiṃsraḥ yajate sadā

original: MSS_4097-2 ahiṃsraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yathā mātā yathā pitā //
analyzed: ahiṃsraḥ sarva bhūtānām yathā mātā yathā pitā

original: MSS_4098-1 ahitaṃ ca hitākāraṃ dhārṣṭyājjalpanti ye narāḥ /
analyzed: ahitam ca hita ākāram dhārṣṭyāt jalpanti ye narāḥ

original: MSS_4098-2 avekṣya mantrabāhyāste kartavyāḥ kṛtyadūṣaṇāḥ //
analyzed: avekṣya mantra bāhyāḥ te kartavyāḥ kṛtya dūṣaṇāḥ

original: MSS_4099-1 ahitahitavicāraśūnyabuddheḥ śrutisamayairbahubhirbahiṣkṛtasya /
analyzed: ahita hita vicāra śūnya buddheḥ śruti samayaiḥ bahubhiḥ bahiṣkṛtasya

original: MSS_4099-2 udarabharaṇamātrakevalecchoḥ puruṣapaśośca paśośca ko viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: udara bharaṇa mātra kevala icchoḥ puruṣa paśoḥ ca paśoḥ ca kaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: MSS_4100-1 ahitāt pratiṣedhaśca hite cānupravartanam /
analyzed: ahitāt pratiṣedhaḥ ca hite ca anupravartanam

original: MSS_4100-2 vyasane cāparityāgas trividhaṃ mitralakṣaṇam //
analyzed: vyasane ca aparityāgaḥ trividham mitra lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_4101-1 ahitādanapatrapastrasann atimātrojjhitabhīranāstikaḥ /
analyzed: ahita adana patrapaḥ trasan atimātra ujjhita bhīra nāstikaḥ

original: MSS_4101-2 vinayopahitastvayā kutaḥ sadṛśo'nyo guṇavānavismayaḥ //
analyzed: vinaya upahitaḥ tvayā kutas sadṛśaḥ anyaḥ guṇavān avismayaḥ

original: MSS_4102-1 ahituṇḍikadṛṣṭīnām aśeṣā bhoginaḥ padam /
analyzed: ahituṇḍika dṛṣṭīnām aśeṣāḥ bhoginaḥ padam

original: MSS_4102-2 na saṃvartāgnisārathye sthātā yanmukhamārutaḥ //
analyzed: na saṃvarta agni sārathye sthātā yat mukha mārutaḥ

original: MSS_4103-1 ahite pratiṣedhaśca hite cānupravartanam /
analyzed: ahite pratiṣedhaḥ ca hite ca anupravartanam

original: MSS_4103-2 vyasane cāparityāgas trividhaṃ mitralakṣaṇam //
analyzed: vyasane ca aparityāgaḥ trividham mitra lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_4104-1 ahite hitabuddhiralpadhīr avamanyeta matāni mantriṇām /
analyzed: ahite hita buddhiḥ alpa dhīḥ avamanyeta matāni mantriṇām

original: MSS_4104-2 capalaḥ sahasaiva saṃpatann arikhaṅgābhihataḥ prabudhyate //
analyzed: capalaḥ sahasā eva saṃpatan ari khaṅga abhihataḥ prabudhyate

original: MSS_4105-1 ahite hitamicchanti nisargāt sarasāstu ye /
analyzed: ahite hitam icchanti nisargāt sarasāḥ tu ye

original: MSS_4105-2 pīḍito'pīkṣudaṇḍo hi rasameva dadātyaram //
analyzed: pīḍitaḥ upīkṣu daṇḍaḥ hi rasam eva dadāti aram

original: MSS_4106-1 ahibhavanavidhānānyāyudhīkṛtya śailān amarajayini sainye rakṣasāmāttakakṣye /
analyzed: ahi bhavana vidhānāni āyudhīkṛtya śailān amara jayini sainye rakṣasām ātta kakṣye

original: MSS_4106-2 kathamiva raṇabhūmau vartate vānarāṇām upavanataruvallīpallavonmāthi yūtham //
analyzed: katham iva raṇa bhūmau vartate vānarāṇām upavana taru vallī pallava unmāthi yūtham

original: MSS_4107-1 ahibhūṣaṇo'pyabhayadaḥ sukalitahālāhalo'pi yo nityaḥ /
analyzed: ahi bhūṣaṇa upi abhaya daḥ su kalita hālāhala upi yaḥ nityaḥ

original: MSS_4107-2 digvasano'pyakhileśas taṃ śaśadharaśekharaṃ vande //
analyzed: digvasanaḥ upi akhila īśaḥ tam śaśadhara śekharam vande

original: MSS_4108-1 ahiraṇyamadāsīkaṃ gṛhaṃ gorasavarjitam /
analyzed: a hiraṇyam a dāsīkam gṛham go rasa varjitam

original: MSS_4108-2 pratikūlakalatraṃ ca narakasyāparo vidhiḥ //
analyzed: pratikūla kalatram ca narakasya aparaḥ vidhiḥ

original: MSS_4109-1 ahirahiriti saṃbhramapadam itarajanaḥ kimapi kātaro bhavatu /
analyzed: ahiḥ ahiḥ iti saṃbhrama padam itara janaḥ kim api kātaraḥ bhavatu

original: MSS_4109-2 vihagapaterāhāraḥ sa tu saralamṛṇāladalaruciraḥ //
analyzed: vihaga pateḥ āhāraḥ sa tu sarala mṛṇāla dala ruciraḥ

original: MSS_4110-1 ahirājaḥ puruṣe'smin dhūmrā dhātrī kulatthavarṇo'śmā /
analyzed: ahi rājaḥ puruṣe ismin dhūmrā dhātrī kulattha varṇā uśmā

original: MSS_4110-2 māhendrī vahati śirā bhavati saphenaṃ sadā toyam //
analyzed: māhendrī vahati sirā bhavati sa phenam sadā toyam

original: MSS_4111-1 ahiripupatikāntātātasaṃbaddhakāntā- haratanayanihantṛprāṇadātṛdhvajasya /
MSS_4111-2 sakhisutasutakāntātātasampūjyakāntā- pitṛśirasi patantī jāhnavī naḥ punātu //
analyzed: sakhi suta suta kāntā tāta sampūjya kāntā pitṛ śirasi patantī jāhnavī naḥ punātu

original: MSS_4112-1 ahiriva janayogaṃ sarvadā varjayed yaḥ kuṇamiva vasu nārīṃ tyaktakāmo virāgī /
analyzed: ahiḥ iva jana yogam sarvadā varjayet yaḥ kuṇam iva vasu nārīm tyakta kāmaḥ virāgī

original: MSS_4112-2 viṣamiva viṣayārthān manyamāno durantāñ jayati paramahaṃso muktibhāvaṃ sameti //
analyzed: viṣam iva viṣaya arthān manyamānaḥ durantām jayati paramahaṃsaḥ mukti bhāvam sameti

original: MSS_4113-1 ahirbiḍālo jāmātā eḍakā ca saputriṇī /
analyzed: ahiḥ biḍālaḥ jāmātā eḍakā ca sa putriṇī

original: MSS_4113-2 ātmabhāgyaṃ na paśyanti bhāgineyastu pañcamaḥ //
analyzed: ātma bhāgyam na paśyanti bhāgineyaḥ tu pañcamaḥ

original: MSS_4114-1 ahīnakālaṃ rājārthaṃ svārthaṃ priyahitaiḥ saha /
analyzed: ahīna kālam rāja artham sva artham priya hitaiḥ saha

original: MSS_4114-2 parārthaṃ deśakāle ca brūyād dharmārthasaṃhitam //
analyzed: para artham deśa kāle ca brūyāt dharma artha saṃhitam

original: MSS_4115-1 ahīnabhujagādhīśavapurvalayakaṅkaṇam /
MSS_4115-2 śailādinandicaritaṃ kṣatakandarpadarpakam //
MSS_4116-1 vṛṣapuṃgavalakṣmāṇaṃ śikhipāvakalocanam /
analyzed: vṛṣa puṃgava lakṣmāṇam śikhi pāvaka locanam

original: MSS_4116-2 sasarvamaṅgalaṃ naumi pārvatīsakhamīśvaram //
analyzed: sa sarva maṅgalam naumi pārvatī sakham īśvaram

original: MSS_4117-1 ahīndrān pātālād viṣamiva nimajjyoddharati yaḥ ya āruhya svargaṃ kavalayati sendrān suragaṇān /
analyzed: ahi indrān pātālāt viṣam iva nimajjya uddharati yaḥ yaḥ āruhya svargam kavalayati sa indrān sura gaṇān

original: MSS_4117-2 mahīṃ bhrāntvā bhrāntvā raghunalanṛpā yena vijitāḥ sa mṛtyuḥ kālaṃ na kṣamata iti mā kārṣṭa manasi //
analyzed: mahīm bhrāntvā bhrāntvā raghu nala nṛpāḥ yena vijitāḥ sa mṛtyuḥ kālam na kṣamate iti mā kārṣṭa manasi

original: MSS_4118-1 ahṛtahṛdayāḥ santaḥ satyaṃ bravīmi niśamyatāṃ vipinamadhunā gatvā vāso mṛgaiḥ saha kalpyatām /
analyzed: ahṛta hṛdayāḥ santaḥ satyam bravīmi niśamyatām vipinam adhunā gatvā vāsaḥ mṛgaiḥ saha kalpyatām

original: MSS_4118-2 sujanacaritadhvaṃsinyasmin khalodayaśālini prabhavati kalau nāyaṃ kālo gṛheṣu bhavādṛśām //
analyzed: su jana carita dhvaṃsini asmin khala udaya śālini prabhavati kalau na ayam kālaḥ gṛheṣu bhavādṛśām

original: MSS_4119-1 ahetuḥ pakṣapāto yas tasya nāsti pratikriyā /
analyzed: ahetuḥ pakṣapātaḥ yaḥ tasya na asti pratikriyā

original: MSS_4119-2 sa hi snehātmakastantur antarbhūtāni sīvyati //
analyzed: sa hi sneha ātmakaḥ tantuḥ antarbhūtāni sīvyati

original: MSS_4120-1 ahetu bhrūkuṭiṃ naiva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: ahetu bhrūkuṭim nā eva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ

original: MSS_4120-2 vinā doṣeṇa yo bhṛtyān rājā dharmeṇa pālayet //
analyzed: vinā doṣeṇa yaḥ bhṛtyān rājā dharmeṇa pālayet

original: MSS_4121-1 aheriva guṇādbhīto miṣṭānnādyā viṣādiva /
analyzed: aheḥ iva guṇāt bhītaḥ miṣṭānna ādyā viṣāt iva

original: MSS_4121-2 rākṣasībhya iva strībhyaḥ sa vidyāmadhigacchati //
analyzed: rākṣasībhyaḥ iva strībhyaḥ sa vidyām adhigacchati

original: MSS_4122-1 aho anaucitīyaṃ te hṛdi śuddhe'pyaśuddhavat /
analyzed: aho anaucitīyam te hṛdi śuddhā ipi aśuddha vat

original: MSS_4122-2 aṅkaḥ khalairivākalpi nakhaistīkṣṇamukhairmama //
analyzed: aṅkaḥ khalaiḥ iva akalpi nakhaiḥ tīkṣṇa mukhaiḥ mama

original: MSS_4123-1 aho ahaṃ namo mahyaṃ yadahaṃ vīkṣito'nayā /
analyzed: aho aham namaḥ mahyam yat aham vīkṣitā ūnayā

original: MSS_4123-2 bālayā trastasāraṅgacapalāyatanetrayā //
analyzed: bālayā trasta sāraṅga capala āyata netrayā

original: MSS_4124-1 aho ahīnāmapi lehanaṃ syād duḥkhāni nūnaṃ nṛpasevanāni /
analyzed: aho ahīnām api lehanam syāt duḥkhāni nūnam nṛpa sevanāni

original: MSS_4124-2 eko'hinā daṣṭamupaiti mṛtyuṃ kṣmāpena daṣṭastu sagotramitraḥ //
analyzed: eka ohinā daṣṭam upaiti mṛtyum kṣmāpena daṣṭaḥ tu sagotra mitraḥ

original: MSS_4125-1 aho ahobhirna kalervidūyate sudhāsudhārāmadhuraṃ pade pade /
analyzed: aho ahobhiḥ na kaleḥ vidūyate sudhā su dhārā madhuram pade pade

original: MSS_4125-2 dine dine candanacandraśītalaṃ yaśo yaśo dātanayasya gīyate //
analyzed: dine dine candana candra śītalam yaśaḥ yaśaḥ dā tanayasya gīyate

original: MSS_4126-1 aho ahobhirmahimā himāgame- 'pyabhiprapede prati tāṃ smarārditām /
analyzed: aho ahobhiḥ mahimā hima āgame pi abhiprapede prati tām smara arditām

original: MSS_4126-2 tapartupūrtāvapi medasāṃ bharā vibhāvarībhirvibharāṃbabhūvire //
analyzed: tapa ṛtu pūrtau api medasām bharāḥ vibhāvarībhiḥ vibharāṃbabhūvire

original: MSS_4127-1 aho aiśvaryamattānāṃ mattānāmiva māninām /
analyzed: aho aiśvarya mattānām mattānām iva māninām

original: MSS_4127-2 asaṃbaddhā giro rūkṣāḥ kaḥ sahetānuśāsitā //
analyzed: asaṃbaddhāḥ giraḥ rūkṣāḥ kaḥ saheta anuśāsitā

original: MSS_4128-1 aho kathamasīmedaṃ himanāma vijṛmbhate /
analyzed: aho katham asīmā idam hima nāma vijṛmbhate

original: MSS_4128-2 caratyeva sahasrāṃśau dhavalaṃ timirāntaram //
analyzed: carati eva sahasrāṃśau dhavalam timira antaram

original: MSS_4129-1 aho kanakamāhātmyaṃ vaktuṃ kenāpi śakyate /
analyzed: aho kanaka māhātmyam vaktum kena api śakyate

original: MSS_4129-2 nāmasāmyādaho citraṃ dhattūro'pi madapradaḥ //
analyzed: nāma sāmyāt aho citram dhattūraḥ upi mada pradaḥ

original: MSS_4130-1 aho kālasya sūkṣmo'yaṃ ko'pyalakṣyakramaḥ kramaḥ /
analyzed: aho kālasya sūkṣmā uyam kopya lakṣya kramaḥ kramaḥ

original: MSS_4130-2 yatpākapariṇāmena sarvaṃ yātyanyarūpatām //
analyzed: yad pāka pariṇāmena sarvam yāti anya rūpa tām

original: MSS_4131-1 aho kimapi te śuddhaṃ yaśaḥkusumamudgatam /
analyzed: aho kim api te śuddham yaśaḥ kusumam udgatam

original: MSS_4131-2 yasyāyamamṛtasyandī bālendurbāhyapallavaḥ //
analyzed: yasya ayam amṛta syandī bāla induḥ bāhya pallavaḥ

original: MSS_4132-1 aho kuṭilabuddhīnāṃ durgrāhyamasatāṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: aho kuṭila buddhīnām durgrāhyam asatām manaḥ

original: MSS_4132-2 anyadvacasi kaṇṭhe'nyad anyadoṣṭhapuṭe sthitam //
analyzed: anyat vacasi kaṇṭhenyat anyat oṣṭha puṭe sthitam

original: MSS_4133-1 aho kenedṛśī buddhir dāruṇā tava nirmitā /
analyzed: aho kena īdṛśī buddhiḥ dāruṇā tava nirmitā

original: MSS_4133-2 triguṇā śrūyate buddhir na tu dārumayī kvacit //
analyzed: triguṇā śrūyate buddhiḥ na tu dāru mayī kvacid

original: MSS_4134-1 aho khalabhujaṃgasya vicitro'yaṃ vadhakramaḥ /
analyzed: aho khala bhujaṃgasya vicitraḥ yam vadha kramaḥ

original: MSS_4134-2 anyasya daśati śrotram anyaḥ prāṇairviyujyate //
analyzed: anyasya daśati śrotram anyaḥ prāṇaiḥ viyujyate

original: MSS_4135-1 aho khalabhujaṃgasya viparīto vadhakramaḥ /
analyzed: aho khala bhujaṃgasya viparītaḥ vadha kramaḥ

original: MSS_4135-2 karṇe lagati cānyasya prāṇairanyo viyujyate //
analyzed: karṇe lagati ca anyasya prāṇaiḥ anyaḥ viyujyate

original: MSS_4136-1 aho guṇāḥ saumyatā ca vidvattā janma satkule /
analyzed: aho guṇāḥ saumya tā ca vidvas tā janma sat kule

original: MSS_4136-2 dāridryāmbudhimagnasya sarvametanna śobhate //
analyzed: dāridrya ambudhi magnasya sarvam etat na śobhate

original: MSS_4137-1 aho guṇānāṃ prāptyarthaṃ yatante bahudhā naraḥ /
analyzed: aho guṇānām prāpti artham yatante bahudhā naraḥ

original: MSS_4137-2 muktā yadarthaṃ bhagnāsyā itareṣāṃ ca kā kathā //
analyzed: muktāḥ yad artham bhagna āsyāḥ itareṣām ca kā kathā

original: MSS_4138-1 aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃcana /
analyzed: aho tamaḥ iva idam syāt na prajñāyeta kiṃcana

original: MSS_4138-2 rājā cenna bhavelloke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī //
analyzed: rājā ced na bhavet loke vibhajan sādhu asādhunī

original: MSS_4139-1 aho'tinirmohi janasya citraṃ paraṃ caritraṃ gadituṃ na yogyam /
analyzed: aho ti nirmohi janasya citram param caritram gaditum na yogyam

original: MSS_4139-2 mukhe hi cānyaddhṛdi bhāvamanyat devo na jānāti kuto manuṣyaḥ //
analyzed: mukhe hi ca anyat hṛdi bhāvam anyat devaḥ na jānāti kutas manuṣyaḥ

original: MSS_4140-1 aho'tibalavaddaivaṃ vinā tena mahātmanā /
analyzed: aho iti balavat daivam vinā tena mahātmanā

original: MSS_4140-2 yadasāmarthyayukte'pi nīcavarge jayapradam //
analyzed: yat asāmarthya yukta ipi nīca varge jaya pradam

original: MSS_4141-1 aho tṛṣṇāveśyā sakalajanatāmohanakarī vidagdhā mugdhānāṃ harati vivaśānāṃ śamadhanam /
analyzed: aho tṛṣṇā veśyā sakala jana tā mohana karī vidagdhā mugdhānām harati vivaśānām śama dhanam

original: MSS_4141-2 vipaddīkṣādakṣāsahataralatāraiḥ praṇayinī- kaṭākṣaiḥ kūṭākṣaiḥ kapaṭakuṭilaiḥ kāmakitavaḥ //
analyzed: vipad dīkṣā dakṣā saha tarala tāraiḥ praṇayinī kaṭākṣaiḥ kūṭa akṣaiḥ kapaṭa kuṭilaiḥ kāma kitavaḥ

original: MSS_4142-1 aho dānamaho vīryam aho dhairyamakhaṇḍitam /
analyzed: aho dānam aho vīryam aho dhairyam akhaṇḍitam

original: MSS_4142-2 udāravīradhīrāṇāṃ hariścandro nidarśanam //
analyzed: udāra vīra dhīrāṇām hariścandraḥ nidarśanam

original: MSS_4143-1 aho divyaṃ cakṣurvahasi tava sāpi praṇayinī parākṣṇāmagrāhyaṃ yuvatiṣu vapuḥ saṃkramayati /
analyzed: aho divyam cakṣuḥ vahasi tava sā api praṇayinī para akṣṇām agrāhyam yuvatiṣu vapuḥ saṃkramayati

original: MSS_4143-2 samānābhijñānaṃ kathamitarathā paśyati puro bhavānekastasyāḥ pratikṛtimayīreva ramaṇīḥ //
analyzed: samāna abhijñānam katham itarathā paśyati puras bhavān ekaḥ tasyāḥ pratikṛti mayīḥ eva ramaṇīḥ

original: MSS_4144-1 aho duḥkhamahoduḥkhamaho duḥkhaṃ daridratā /
analyzed: aho duḥkham aho duḥkham aho duḥkham daridra tā

original: MSS_4144-2 tatrāpi putrabhāryāṇāṃ bāhulyamatiduḥkhadam //
analyzed: tatra api putra bhāryāṇām bāhulyam ati duḥkha dam

original: MSS_4145-1 aho durantā jagato vimūḍhatā vilokyatāṃ saṃsṛtiduḥkhadāyinī /
analyzed: aho durantā jagataḥ vimūḍha tā vilokyatām saṃsṛti duḥkha dāyinī

original: MSS_4145-2 susādhyamapyannavidhānatastapo yato jano duḥkhakaro'vamanyate //
analyzed: susādhyam api anna vidhānataḥ tapaḥ yatas janaḥ duḥkha karaḥ uvamanyate

original: MSS_4146-1 aho durantā saṃsāre bhogatṛṣṇā yayā hṛtāḥ /
analyzed: aho durantā saṃsāre bhoga tṛṣṇā yayā hṛtāḥ

original: MSS_4146-2 anaucityādakīrteśca devā api na bibhyati //
analyzed: anaucityāt akīrteḥ ca devāḥ api na bibhyati

original: MSS_4147-1 aho durjasaṃsargān mānahāniḥ pade pade /
analyzed: aho durja saṃsargāt māna hāniḥ pade pade

original: MSS_4147-2 pāvako lohasaṅgena mudgarairabhihanyate //
analyzed: pāvakaḥ loha saṅgena mudgaraiḥ abhihanyate

original: MSS_4148-1 aho durjanasarpasya sarpasya mahadantaram /
analyzed: aho durjana sarpasya sarpasya mahat antaram

original: MSS_4148-2 karṇamanyasya daśati anyaḥ prāṇairviyujyate //
analyzed: karṇam anyasya daśati anyaḥ prāṇaiḥ viyujyate

original: MSS_4149-1 aho dainyamaho kaṣṭaṃ pārakyaiḥ kṣaṇabhaṅguraiḥ /
analyzed: aho dainyam aho kaṣṭam pārakyaiḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅguraiḥ

original: MSS_4149-2 yannopakuryādasvārthair martyaḥ svajñātivigrahaiḥ //
analyzed: yat na upakuryāt asvārthaiḥ martyaḥ sva jñāti vigrahaiḥ

original: MSS_4150-1 aho dhanamadāndhastu paśyannapi na paśyati /
analyzed: aho dhana mada andhaḥ tu paśyan api na paśyati

original: MSS_4150-2 yadi paśyatyātmahitaṃ sa paśyati na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: yadi paśyati ātma hitam sa paśyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_4151-1 aho dhanānāṃ mahatī vidagdhatā sukhoṣitānāṃ kṛpaṇasya veśmani /
analyzed: aho dhanānām mahatī vidagdha tā sukha uṣitānām kṛpaṇasya veśmani

original: MSS_4151-2 vrajanti na tyāgadaśāṃ na bhogyatāṃ parāṃ ca kāṃcit prathayanti nirvṛtim //
analyzed: vrajanti na tyāga daśām na bhogya tām parām ca kāṃcid prathayanti nirvṛtim

original: MSS_4152-1 aho dhanuṣi naipuṇyaṃ manmathasya mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: aho dhanuṣi naipuṇyam manmathasya mahātmanaḥ

original: MSS_4152-2 śarīramakṣataṃ kṛtvā bhinattyantargataṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: śarīram akṣatam kṛtvā bhinatti antargatam manaḥ

original: MSS_4153-1 aho dhātrā puraḥ sṛṣṭaṃ sāhasaṃ tadanu striyaḥ /
analyzed: aho dhātrā puras sṛṣṭam sāhasam tadanu striyaḥ

original: MSS_4153-2 naitāsāṃ duṣkaraṃ kiṃcin nisargādiha vidyate //
analyzed: na etāsām duṣkaram kiṃcid nisargāt iha vidyate

original: MSS_4154-1 aho dhārṣṭyamasādhūnāṃ nindatāmanaghāḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: aho dhārṣṭyam asādhūnām nindatām anaghāḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_4154-2 muṣṇatāmiva caurāṇāṃ tiṣṭha caureti jalpatām //
analyzed: muṣṇatām iva caurāṇām tiṣṭha caura iti jalpatām

original: MSS_4155-1 aho nakṣatrarājasya sābhimānaṃ viceṣṭitam /
analyzed: aho nakṣatrarājasya sa abhimānam viceṣṭitam

original: MSS_4155-2 parikṣīṇasya vakratvaṃ saṃpūrṇasya suvṛttatā //
analyzed: parikṣīṇasya vakra tvam saṃpūrṇasya su vṛtta tā

original: MSS_4156-1 aho nu kaṣṭaṃ satataṃ pravāsam tato'tikaṣṭaḥ paragehavāsaḥ /
analyzed: aho nu kaṣṭam satatam pravāsam tata uti kaṣṭaḥ para geha vāsaḥ

original: MSS_4156-2 kaṣṭādhikā nīcajanasya sevā tato'tikaṣṭā dhanahīnatā ca //
analyzed: kaṣṭa adhikā nīca janasya sevā dhana hīna tā ca

original: MSS_4157-1 aho nu citraṃ padmotthair baddhāstantubhiradrayaḥ /
analyzed: aho nu citram padma utthaiḥ baddhāḥ tantubhiḥ adrayaḥ

original: MSS_4157-2 avidyamānā yāvidyā tayā sarve vaśīkṛtāḥ //
analyzed: a vidyamānā yā avidyā tayā sarve vaśīkṛtāḥ

original: MSS_4158-1 aho pūrṇaṃ saraḥ spaṣṭam asi nātra vicāraṇā /
analyzed: aho pūrṇam saraḥ spaṣṭam asi na atra vicāraṇā

original: MSS_4158-2 luṭhantastvayi yat sarve snānti jātu kathaṃcana //
analyzed: luṭhantaḥ tvayi yat sarve snānti jātu kathaṃcana

original: MSS_4159-1 aho prakṛtisādṛśyaṃ śleṣmaṇo durjanasya ca /
analyzed: aho prakṛti sādṛśyam śleṣmaṇaḥ durjanasya ca

original: MSS_4159-2 madhuraiḥ kopamāyāti kaṭukair upaśāmyati //
