analyzed: madhuraiḥ kopam āyāti kaṭukaiḥ upaśāmyati

original: MSS_4160-1 aho pracchāditākāryanaipuṇyaṃ paramaṃ khale /
analyzed: aho pracchādita akārya naipuṇyam paramam khale

original: MSS_4160-2 yattuṣāgnirivānarcir dahannapi na lakṣyate //
analyzed: yat tuṣa agniḥ iva anarcīḥ dahan api na lakṣyate

original: MSS_4161-1 aho prabhāvo vāgdevyā yanmātaṃgadivākaraḥ /
analyzed: aho prabhāvaḥ vāgdevyāḥ yat mātaṃga divākaraḥ

original: MSS_4161-2 śrīharṣasyābhavat sabhyaḥ samo bāṇamayūrayoḥ //
analyzed: śrīharṣasya abhavat sabhyaḥ samaḥ bāṇa mayūrayoḥ

original: MSS_4162-1 aho pramādī bhagavān prajāpatiḥ kṛśātimadhyā ghaṭitā mṛgekṣaṇā /
analyzed: aho pramādī bhagavān prajāpatiḥ kṛśa ati madhyā ghaṭitā mṛga īkṣaṇā

original: MSS_4162-2 yadi pramādādanilena bhajyate kathaṃ punaḥ śakṣyati kartumīdṛśam //
analyzed: yadi pramādāt anilena bhajyate katham punar śakṣyati kartum īdṛśam

original: MSS_4163-1 aho bata khalaḥ puṇyair mūrkho'pyaśrutapaṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: aho bata khalaḥ puṇyaiḥ mūrkhaḥ api aśruta paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_4163-2 svaguṇodīraṇe śeṣaḥ paranindāsu vākpatiḥ //
analyzed: sva guṇa udīraṇe śeṣaḥ para nindāsu vākpatiḥ

original: MSS_4164-1 aho bata mahat kaṣṭaṃ viparītamidaṃ jagat /
analyzed: aho bata mahat kaṣṭam viparītam idam jagat

original: MSS_4164-2 yenāpatrapate sādhur asādhustena tuṣyati //
analyzed: yena apatrapate sādhuḥ asādhuḥ tena tuṣyati

original: MSS_4165-1 aho bata vicitrāṇi caritāni mahātmanām /
analyzed: aho bata vicitrāṇi caritāni mahātmanām

original: MSS_4165-2 lakṣmīṃ tṛṇāya manyante tadbhāreṇa namanti ca //
analyzed: lakṣmīm tṛṇāya manyante tad bhāreṇa namanti ca

original: MSS_4166-1 aho bata sabhā sabhyair iyaṃ maunādadhaḥ kṛtā /
analyzed: aho bata sabhā sabhyaiḥ iyam maunāt adhas kṛtā

original: MSS_4166-2 santo vadanti yatsatyaṃ sabhāṃ na praviśanti vā //
analyzed: santaḥ vadanti yat satyam sabhām na praviśanti vā

original: MSS_4167-1 aho bata saritpateridamanāryarūpaṃ paraṃ yadujjvalarucīn maṇīn suciracarcitāsthāguṇān /
analyzed: aho bata saritpateḥ idam anārya rūpam param yat ujjvala rucīn maṇīn su cira carcita āsthā guṇān

original: MSS_4167-2 jaḍairanupayogibhiḥ parata etya labdhāspadaiḥ kṣapatyaniśamūrjitairjhagiti tanmayatvaṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: jaḍaiḥ anupayogibhiḥ paratas etya labdha āspadaiḥ kṣapati aniśam ūrjitaiḥ jhagiti tad maya tvam gataḥ

original: MSS_4168-1 aho bāṇasya saṃdhānaṃ śaradi smarabhūpateḥ /
analyzed: aho bāṇasya saṃdhānam śaradi smara bhūpateḥ

original: MSS_4168-2 api so'yaṃ tviṣāmīśaḥ kanyārāśimupāgataḥ //
analyzed: api saḥ uyam tviṣām īśaḥ kanyā rāśim upāgataḥ

original: MSS_4169-1 aho brahmaṇyadevasya dṛṣṭā brahmaṇyatā mayā /
analyzed: aho brahmaṇyadevasya dṛṣṭā brahmaṇya tā mayā

original: MSS_4169-2 yaddaridratamo lakṣmīm āśliṣṭo bibhratorasi //
analyzed: yat daridratamaḥ lakṣmīm āśliṣṭaḥ bibhratā urasi

original: MSS_4170-1 aho bhavati sādṛśyaṃ mṛdaṅgasya ca khalasya ca /
analyzed: aho bhavati sādṛśyam mṛdaṅgasya ca khalasya ca

original: MSS_4170-2 yāvanmukhagatau tau hi tāvanmadhurabhāṣiṇau //
analyzed: yāvat mukha gatau tau hi tāvat madhura bhāṣiṇau

original: MSS_4171-1 aho bhāryā aho putraḥ aho ātmā aho sukham /
analyzed: aho bhāryā aho putraḥ aho ātmā aho sukham

original: MSS_4171-2 aho mātā aho bhrātā paśya māyāvimohitam //
analyzed: aho mātā aho bhrātā paśya māyā vimohitam

original: MSS_4172-1 aho bhuvaḥ saptasamudravatyā dvīpeṣu varṣeṣvadhipuṇyametat /
analyzed: aho bhuvaḥ sapta samudravatyāḥ dvīpeṣu varṣeṣu adhipuṇyam etat

original: MSS_4172-2 gāyanti yatratyajanā murāreḥ karmāṇi bhadrāṇyavatāravanti //
analyzed: gāyanti yatratya janāḥ murāreḥ karmāṇi bhadrāṇi avatāravanti

original: MSS_4173-1 aho madāvalepo'yam asārāṇāṃ durātmanām /
analyzed: aho mada avalepaḥ yam asārāṇām durātmanām

original: MSS_4173-2 kauravāṇāṃ mahīpatvam asmākaṃ kila kālajam //
analyzed: kauravāṇām mahīpa tvam asmākam kila kāla jam

original: MSS_4174-1 aho mahaccitramidaṃ kālagatyā duratyayā /
analyzed: aho mahat citram idam kālagatyā duratyayā

original: MSS_4174-2 ārurukṣatyupānadvai śiro mukuṭasevitam //
analyzed: ārurukṣati upānat vai śiraḥ mukuṭa sevitam

original: MSS_4175-1 aho mahattvaṃ mahatāmapūrvaṃ vipattikāle'pi paropakāraḥ /
analyzed: aho mahā tvam mahatām apūrvam vipatti kāle pi para upakāraḥ

original: MSS_4175-2 yathāsyamadhye patito'pi rāhoḥ kalānidhiḥ puṇyacayaṃ dadāti //
analyzed: yathā āsya madhye patitaḥ api rāhoḥ kalā nidhiḥ puṇya cayam dadāti

original: MSS_4176-1 aho mahīyasāṃ puṃsām uparyupari pauruṣam /
analyzed: aho mahīyasām puṃsām upari upari pauruṣam

original: MSS_4176-2 rāmeṇājagavaṃ śaṃbhor bhagnamambhojanālavat //
analyzed: rāmeṇa ājagavam śaṃbhoḥ bhagnam ambhoja nāla vat

original: MSS_4177-1 aho māyājālaṃ hṛdayahariṇo yatra patitaḥ samutthātuṃ bhūyaḥ prabhavati na kiṃcit kathamapi /
analyzed: aho māyā jālam hṛdaya hariṇaḥ yatra patitaḥ samutthātum bhūyas prabhavati na kiṃcid katham api

original: MSS_4177-2 na cet tasya cchettā paramaguruvākyopanamito nijātmajñānākhurvividhadṛḍhasadyuktidaśanaiḥ //
analyzed: na ced tasya chettā parama guru vākya upanamitaḥ nija ātma jñāna ākhuḥ vividha dṛḍha sat yukti daśanaiḥ

original: MSS_4178-1 aho māyābalaṃ viṣṇoḥ snehabaddhamidaṃ jagat //
analyzed: aho māyā balam viṣṇoḥ sneha baddham idam jagat

original: MSS_4179-1 kva deho bhautiko'nātmā kva cātmā prakṛteḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: kva dehaḥ bhautika ūna ātmā kva ca ātmā prakṛteḥ paraḥ

original: MSS_4179-2 kasya ke patiputrādyā moha eva hi kāraṇam //
analyzed: kasya ke pati putra ādyāḥ mohaḥ eva hi kāraṇam

original: MSS_4180-1 aho me saubhāgyaṃ mama ca bhavabhūteśca bhaṇitaṃ ghaṭāyāmāropya pratiphalati tasyāṃ laghimani /
analyzed: aho me saubhāgyam mama ca bhavabhūteḥ ca bhaṇitam ghaṭāyām āropya pratiphalati tasyām laghimani

original: MSS_4180-2 girāṃ devī sadyaḥ śrutikalitakalhārakalikā- madhūlīmādhuryaṃ kṣipati paripūrtyai bhagavatī //
analyzed: girām devī sadyas śruti kalita kalhāra kalikā madhūlī mādhuryam kṣipati paripūrtyai bhagavatī

original: MSS_4181-1 aho mohaḥ puṃsāmiha jagati jātiḥ kila śubhā jarāmṛtyuvyādhīnapi jayati yā niṣprabhatayā /
analyzed: aho mohaḥ puṃsām iha jagati jātiḥ kila śubhā jarā mṛtyu vyādhīn api jayati yā niṣprabha tayā

original: MSS_4181-2 parasmājjātānāṃ vyasanaśatamete'pi dadhati svayaṃ sutvā tebhyo vidiśati sutān sā viśasitum //
analyzed: parasmāt jātānām vyasana śatam ete api dadhati svayam sutvā tebhyaḥ vidiśati sutān sā viśasitum

original: MSS_4182-1 aho moho varākasya kākasya yadasau puraḥ /
analyzed: aho mohaḥ varākasya kākasya yat asau puras

original: MSS_4182-2 sarīsarti narīnarti yadayaṃ śikhihaṃsayoḥ //
analyzed: sarīsarti narīnarti yat ayam śikhi haṃsayoḥ

original: MSS_4183-1 aho yeṣāṃ varaṃ janma sarvaprāṇyupajīvanam /
analyzed: aho yeṣām varam janma sarva prāṇi upajīvanam

original: MSS_4183-2 sujanasyeva yeṣāṃ vai vimukhā yānti nārthinaḥ //
analyzed: su janasya iva yeṣām vai vimukhāḥ yānti na arthinaḥ

original: MSS_4184-1 aho raghuśiromaṇerabhinavapratāpāvali- pracaṇḍakiraṇaprathāprasarasādhvasādāśvayam /
analyzed: aho raghu śiromaṇeḥ abhinava pratāpa āvali pracaṇḍa kiraṇa prathā prasara sādhvasāt āśvayam

original: MSS_4184-2 surādhipatirambudān kamalamindirā sevate himāṃśurapi candramāḥ satatamambhudhau majjati //
analyzed: surādhipatiḥ ambudān kamalam indirā sevate himāṃśuḥ api candramāḥ satatam ambhudhau majjati

original: MSS_4185-1 ahorātramaye loke jarārūpeṇa saṃcaran /
analyzed: ahorātra maye loke jarā rūpeṇa saṃcaran

original: MSS_4185-2 mṛtyurgrasati bhūtāni pavanaṃ pannago yathā //
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ grasati bhūtāni pavanam pannagaḥ yathā

original: MSS_4186-1 ahorātrāṇi gacchanti sarveṣāṃ prāṇināmiha /
analyzed: ahar rātrāṇi gacchanti sarveṣām prāṇinām iha

original: MSS_4186-2 āyūṃṣi kṣapayantyāśu grīṣme jalamivāṃśavaḥ //
analyzed: āyūṃṣi kṣapayanti āśu grīṣme jalam iva aṃśavaḥ

original: MSS_4187-1 ahorātre vibhajate sūryo mānuṣadaivike /
analyzed: ahorātre vibhajate sūryaḥ mānuṣa daivike

original: MSS_4187-2 rātriḥ svapnāya bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭāyai karmaṇāmahaḥ //
analyzed: rātriḥ svapnāya bhūtānām ceṣṭāyai karmaṇām ahar

original: MSS_4188-1 aho rūpamaho rūpam aho mukhamaho mukham /
analyzed: aho rūpam aho rūpam aho mukham aho mukham

original: MSS_4188-2 aho madhyamaho madhyam asyāḥ sāraṅgacakṣuṣaḥ //
analyzed: aho madhyam aho madhyam asyāḥ sāraṅga cakṣuṣaḥ

original: MSS_4189-1 aho vidhātastvamatīva bāliśo yastvātmasṛṣṭyapratirūpamīhase /
analyzed: aho vidhātar tvam atīva bāliśaḥ yaḥ tu ātma sṛṣṭi apratirūpam īhase

original: MSS_4189-2 pare'nujīvatyaparasya yā mṛtir viparyayaścettvamasi dhruvaḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: parā inu jīvati aparasya yā mṛtiḥ viparyayaḥ ced tvam asi dhruvaḥ paraḥ

original: MSS_4190-1 na hi kramaścediha mṛtyujanmanoḥ śarīriṇāmastu tadātmakarmabhiḥ /
analyzed: na hi kramaḥ ced iha mṛtyu janmanoḥ śarīriṇām astu tad ātma karmabhiḥ

original: MSS_4190-2 yaḥ snehapāśo nijasargavṛddhaye svayaṃ kṛtaste tamimaṃ vivṛścasi //
analyzed: yaḥ sneha pāśaḥ nija sarga vṛddhaye svayam kṛtaḥ te tam imam vivṛścasi

original: MSS_4191-1 aho vidhātrā hatakena nārthāt kṛto viyogo'pi viyogināṃ naḥ /
analyzed: aho vidhātrā hatakena na arthāt kṛtaḥ viyogaḥ api viyoginām naḥ

original: MSS_4191-2 rathāṅganāmnāmiva yena sīmā na vidyate nāpi sapakṣavattvam //
analyzed: rathāṅga nāmnām iva yena sīmā na vidyate na api sapakṣavat tvam

original: MSS_4192-1 aho viśālaṃ bhūpāla bhuvanatritayodaram /
analyzed: aho viśālam bhūpāla bhuvana tritaya udaram

original: MSS_4192-2 māti mātumaśakyo'pi yaśorāśiryadatra te //
analyzed: māti mātum aśakyaḥ api yaśaḥ rāśiḥ yat atra te

original: MSS_4193-1 aho viṣādapyadhikāḥ striyo raktavimānitāḥ /
analyzed: aho viṣāt api adhikāḥ striyaḥ rakta vimānitāḥ

original: MSS_4193-2 aho asevyāḥ sādhūnāṃ rājāno'tattvadarśinaḥ //
analyzed: aho asevyāḥ sādhūnām

original: MSS_4194-1 aho vaicitryametasya saṃsārasya kimucyate /
analyzed: aho vaicitryam etasya saṃsārasya kim ucyate

original: MSS_4194-2 guṇo'pi kleśahetuḥ syād viśrāntaḥ kaṇṭhakandale //
analyzed: guṇaḥ api kleśa hetuḥ syāt viśrāntaḥ kaṇṭha kandale

original: MSS_4195-1 aho saṃsāravairasyaṃ vairasyakāraṇaṃ striyaḥ /
analyzed: aho saṃsāra vairasyam vairasya kāraṇam striyaḥ

original: MSS_4195-2 dolālolā ca kamalā rogābhogagehaṃ deham //
analyzed: dolālolā ca kamalā roga ābhoga geham deham

original: MSS_4196-1 aho saṃsṛtiveśyeyaṃ rāgādyuddīpanodyatā /
analyzed: aho saṃsṛti veśyā iyam rāga ādi uddīpana udyatā

original: MSS_4196-2 rasamutpādya sarveṣām ante vairasyakāriṇī //
analyzed: rasam utpādya sarveṣām ante vairasya kāriṇī

original: MSS_4197-1 aho satsaṃgatirloke kiṃ pāpaṃ na vināśayet /
analyzed: aho sat saṃgatiḥ loke kim pāpam na vināśayet

original: MSS_4197-2 na dadāti sukhaṃ kiṃ vā narāṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām //
analyzed: na dadāti sukham kim vā narāṇām puṇya karmaṇām

original: MSS_4198-1 aho samudragambhīradhīracittamanasvinaḥ /
analyzed: aho samudra gambhīra dhīra citta manasvinaḥ

original: MSS_4198-2 kṛtvāpyananyasāmānyam ullekhaṃ nodgiranti ye //
analyzed: kṛtvā api an anya sāmānyam ullekham na udgiranti ye

original: MSS_4199-1 aho sāhajikaṃ prema dūrādapi virājate /
analyzed: aho sāhajikam prema dūrāt api virājate

original: MSS_4199-2 cakoranayanadvandvam āhlādayati candramāḥ //
analyzed: cakora nayana dvandvam āhlādayati candramāḥ

original: MSS_4200-1 aho susadṛśī vṛttis tulākoṭeḥ khalasya ca /
analyzed: aho su sadṛśī vṛttiḥ tulā koṭeḥ khalasya ca

original: MSS_4200-2 stokenonnatimāyāti stokenāyātyadhogatim //
analyzed: stokena unnatim āyāti stokena āyāti adhogatim

original: MSS_4201-1 aho strīpreraṇā nāma rajasālaṅghitātmanām /
analyzed: aho strī preraṇā nāma rajasā ālaṅghita ātmanām

original: MSS_4201-2 puṃsāṃ vātyeva sarasāmāśayakṣobhakāriṇī //
analyzed: puṃsām vāti eva sarasām āśaya kṣobha kāriṇī

original: MSS_4202-1 aho sthiraḥ ko'pi tavepsito yuvā cirāya karṇotpalaśūnyatāṃ gate /
analyzed: aho sthiraḥ kaḥ api tava īpsitaḥ yuvā cirāya karṇa utpala śūnya tām gate

original: MSS_4202-2 upekṣate yaḥ ślathabandhalambinīr jaṭāḥ kapole kalamāgrapiṅgalāḥ //
analyzed: upekṣate yaḥ ślatha bandha lambinīḥ jaṭāḥ kapole kalama agra piṅgalāḥ

original: MSS_4203-1 aho sthairyaṃ teṣāṃ prakṛtiniyamebhyaḥ sukṛtināṃ pratijñātatyāgo nahi bhavati kṛcchre'pi mahati /
analyzed: aho sthairyam teṣām prakṛti niyamebhyaḥ su kṛtinām pratijñāta tyāgaḥ nahi bhavati kṛcchre pi mahati

original: MSS_4203-2 tathā hi tvatsenābharanamitadhātrībharadalat- kaṭāho'pi svāṅgaṃ kimu kamaṭhanāthaścalayati //
analyzed: tathā hi tvad senā bhara namita dhātrī bhara dalat kaṭāhaḥ api sva aṅgam kimu kamaṭha nāthaḥ calayati

original: MSS_4204-1 aho hi me bahvaparāddhamāyuṣā yadapriyaṃ vācyamidaṃ mayedṛśam /
analyzed: aho hi me bahu aparāddham āyuṣā yat apriyam vācyam idam mayā īdṛśam

original: MSS_4204-2 ta eva dhanyāḥ suhṛdaḥ parābhavaṃ jagatyadṛṣṭvaiva hi ye kṣayaṃ gatāḥ //
analyzed: te eva dhanyāḥ suhṛdaḥ parābhavam jagati a dṛṣṭvā eva hi ye kṣayam gatāḥ

original: MSS_4205-1 ahau vā hāre vā balavati ripau vā suhṛdi vā maṇau vā loṣṭe vā kusumaśayane vā dṛṣadi vā /
analyzed: ahau vā hāre vā balavati ripau vā suhṛdi vā maṇau vā loṣṭe vā kusuma śayane vā dṛṣadi vā

original: MSS_4205-2 tṛṇe vā straiṇe vā mama samadṛśo yāntu divasāḥ kvacit puṇye'raṇye śiva śiva śiveti pralapataḥ //
analyzed: tṛṇe vā straiṇe vā mama samadṛśaḥ yāntu divasāḥ kvacid puṇya iraṇye śiva śiva śiva iti pralapataḥ

original: MSS_4206-1 ahnastriścaturambubhiḥ snapayasi svaṃ puṣkarāvarjitair bhuṅkṣe medhyatarāṇi bhadra taruṇānyaśvatthapatrāṇi ca /
analyzed: ahnaḥ tris catuḥ ambuṣu snapayasi svam puṣkara āvarjitaiḥ bhuṅkṣe medhyatarāṇi bhadra taruṇāni aśvattha patrāṇi ca

original: MSS_4206-2 puṇyāraṇyacaro'si na praviśasi grāmaṃ sakṛtkuñjara jñānaṃ cet kiyadapyudeti na samā brahmarṣayo'pi tvayā //
analyzed: puṇya araṇya caraḥ asi na praviśasi grāmam sakṛt kuñjara jñānam ced kiyat api udeti na samāḥ brahmarṣayaḥ api tvayā

original: MSS_4207-1 ahni bhāskaramicchanti rātrāvamṛtatejasam /
analyzed: ahni bhāskaram icchanti rātrau amṛta tejasam

original: MSS_4207-2 ahni rātrau ca rājānam icchanti guṇinaṃ prajāḥ //
analyzed: ahni rātrau ca rājānam icchanti guṇinam prajāḥ

original: MSS_4208-1 ahni ravirdahati tvaci vṛddhaḥ puṣpadhanurdahati prabaloḍham /
analyzed: ahni raviḥ dahati tvaci vṛddhaḥ puṣpadhanuḥ dahati prabala ūḍham

original: MSS_4208-2 rātridinaṃ punarantaramantaḥ saṃvṛtirasti raverna tu kantoḥ //
analyzed: rātri dinam punar antaram antar saṃvṛtiḥ asti raveḥ na tu kantoḥ

original: MSS_4209-1 āṃ jñātaṃ nṛpate tvameva nikhilāṃ nityaṃ bibharṣi kṣitiṃ śailendrāḥ svayameva durbharabharāstaiḥ pratyutādho vrajet /
analyzed: ām jñātam nṛpate tvam eva nikhilām nityam bibharṣi kṣitim śaila indrāḥ svayam eva durbhara bharāḥ taiḥ pratyuta adhas vrajet

original: MSS_4209-2 asyāścoddharaṇe kṣamo'pi na parastvatto varāhādikaḥ paśvāderbharaṇakriyānipuṇatā naiva prabhāgocaraḥ //
analyzed: asyāḥ ca uddharaṇe kṣamaḥ api na paraḥ tvattaḥ varāha ādikaḥ paśu ādeḥ bharaṇa kriyā nipuṇa tā nā eva prabhā gocaraḥ

original: MSS_4210-1 āḥ kaṣṭaṃ vanavāsisāmyakṛtayā siddhāśramaśraddhayā pallīṃ bālakuraṅga saṃprati kutaḥ prāpto'si mṛtyormukham /
analyzed: āḥ kaṣṭam vana vāsi sāmya kṛtayā siddha āśrama śraddhayā pallīm bāla kuraṅga saṃprati kutas prāptaḥ asi mṛtyoḥ mukham

original: MSS_4210-2 yatrānekakuraṅgakoṭikadanakrīḍollasallohita- srotobhiḥ paripūrayanti parikhāmuḍḍāmarāḥ pāmarāḥ //
analyzed: yatra aneka kuraṅga koṭi kadana krīḍā ullasat lohita srotobhiḥ paripūrayanti parikhām uḍḍāmarāḥ pāmarāḥ

original: MSS_4211-1 āḥ kaṣṭaṃ suvivekaśūnyahṛdayaiḥ saṃsargamāptaṃ ca tair vikrītaṃ badaraiḥ samaṃ kṣititale kugrāmasīmni sphuṭam /
analyzed: āḥ kaṣṭam su viveka śūnya hṛdayaiḥ saṃsargam āptam ca taiḥ vikrītam badaraiḥ samam kṣiti tale ku grāma sīmni sphuṭam

original: MSS_4211-2 saṃviṣṭaṃśaṭhagāḍhamūḍhavadane dhūtkāradūrīkṛtaṃ kiṃ jānātyaguṇo jano guṇamato muktāphalaṃ roditi //
analyzed: saṃviṣṭam śaṭha gāḍha mūḍha vadane dhūtkāra dūrīkṛtam kim jānāti aguṇaḥ janaḥ guṇam atas muktāphalam roditi

original: MSS_4212-1 āḥ kaṣṭamapraḥṛṣṭāḥ śiṣṭā api vittacāpalāviṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: āḥ kaṣṭam a praḥṛṣṭāḥ śiṣṭāḥ api vitta cāpala āviṣṭāḥ

original: MSS_4212-2 adhyāpayanti vedān ādāya cirāya māsi māsi bhṛtim //
analyzed: adhyāpayanti vedān ādāya cirāya māsi māsi bhṛtim

original: MSS_4213-1 āḥ kimarthamidaṃ cetaḥ satāmambhodhidurbharam /
analyzed: āḥ kimartham idam cetaḥ satām ambhodhi durbharam

original: MSS_4213-2 iti krudheva durvedhāḥ paraduḥkhairapūrayat //
analyzed: iti krudhā iva durvedhāḥ para duḥkhaiḥ apūrayat

original: MSS_4214-1 āḥ pākaṃ na karoṣi pāpini kathaṃ pāpī tvadīyaḥ pitā raṇḍe jalpasi kiṃ tavaiva jananī raṇḍā tvadīyā svasā /
analyzed: āḥ pākam na karoṣi pāpini katham pāpī tvadīyaḥ pitā raṇḍe jalpasi kim tava eva jananī raṇḍā tvadīyā svasā

original: MSS_4214-2 nirgaccha tvaritaṃ gṛhād bahirito nedaṃ tvadīyaṃ gṛhaṃ hā hā nātha mamādya dehi maraṇaṃ jārasya bhāgyodayaḥ //
analyzed: nirgaccha tvaritam gṛhāt bahis itas na idam tvadīyam gṛham hā hā nātha mama adya dehi maraṇam jārasya bhāgya udayaḥ

original: MSS_4215-1 āḥ pātrī syāmakṛtakaghanapremavisphāritānāṃ savrīḍānāṃ sakalakaraṇānandanāḍiṃdhamānām /
analyzed: āḥ pātrī syām akṛtaka ghana prema visphāritānām sa vrīḍānām sakala karaṇa ānandana aḍiṃdhamānām

original: MSS_4215-2 teṣāṃ teṣāṃ hṛdayanihitākūtaniṣyandinetra- vyāpārāṇāṃ punarapi tathā subhruvo vibhramāṇām //
analyzed: teṣām teṣām hṛdaya nihita ākūta nisyandi netra vyāpārāṇām punar api tathā subhruvaḥ vibhramāṇām

original: MSS_4216-1 āḥ sarvataḥ sphuratu kairavamāpibantu jyotsnākarambhamudaraṃbharayaścakorāḥ /
analyzed: āḥ sarvatas sphuratu kairavam āpibantu jyotsnā karambham udaraṃbharayaḥ cakorāḥ

original: MSS_4216-2 yāto yadeṣa caramācalamūlacumbī paṅkeruhaprakarajāgaraṇapradīpaḥ //
analyzed: yātaḥ yat eṣa carama acala mūla cumbī paṅkeruha prakara jāgaraṇa pradīpaḥ

original: MSS_4217-1 āḥ sīte patigarvavibhramabharabhrāntabhramadbāndhava- pradhvaṃsasmitakāntimat tava tadā jātaṃ yadetanmukham /
analyzed: āḥ sīte pati garva vibhrama bhara bhrānta bhramat bāndhava pradhvaṃsa smita kāntimat tava tadā jātam yat etat mukham

original: MSS_4217-2 saṃpratyeva haṭhāt tadeṣa kurute keśoccayākarṣaṇa- trāsottānitalolalocanapatadbāṣpaplutaṃ rāvaṇaḥ //
analyzed: saṃprati eva haṭhāt tat eṣa kurute keśa uccaya ākarṣaṇa trāsa uttānita lola locana patat bāṣpa plutam rāvaṇaḥ

original: MSS_4218-1 ākaṇṭhadṛṣṭaśirasāpyavibhāvyapārśva- pṛṣṭhodareṇa ciramṛgbhirupāsyamānaḥ /
analyzed: ā kaṇṭha dṛṣṭa śirasā api a vibhāvya pārśva pṛṣṭha udareṇa ciram ṛgbhiḥ upāsyamānaḥ

original: MSS_4218-2 nābhīsaroruhajuṣā caturānanena śete kilātra bhagavānaravindanābhaḥ //
analyzed: nābhī saroruha juṣā caturānanena śete kila atra bhagavān aravindanābhaḥ

original: MSS_4219-1 ākaṇṭhārpitakañcukāñcalamuro hastāṅgulīmudraṇā- mātrāsūtritahāsyamāsyamalasāḥ pañcālikākelayaḥ /
analyzed: ā kaṇṭha arpita kañcuka añcalam uraḥ hasta aṅgulī mudraṇāḥ mātrā sūtrita hāsyam āsyam alasāḥ pañcālikā kelayaḥ

original: MSS_4219-2 tiryaglocanaceṣṭitāni vacasāṃ cchekoktisaṃkrāntayas tasyāḥsīdati śaiśave pratikalaṃ ko'pyeṣa kelikramaḥ //
analyzed: tiryak locana ceṣṭitāni vacasām cheka ukti saṃkrāntayaḥ tasyāḥ sīdati śaiśave pratikalam kopī eṣa keli kramaḥ

original: MSS_4220-1 ākampayan phalabharānataśālijālam ānartayaṃs taruvarān kusumāvanamrān /
analyzed: ākampayan phala bhara ānata śāli jālam ānartayan taruvarān kusuma avanamrān

original: MSS_4220-2 utphullapaṅkajavanāṃ nalinīṃ vidhunvan yūnāṃ manaścalayati prasabhaṃ nabhasvān //
analyzed: utphulla paṅkaja vanām nalinīm vidhunvan yūnām manaḥ calayati prasabham nabhasvān

original: MSS_4221-1 ākampitakṣitibhṛtā mahatā nikāmaṃ helābhibhūtajaladhitritayena yasya /
analyzed: ākampita kṣitibhṛtā mahatā nikāmam helā abhibhūta jaladhi tritayena yasya

original: MSS_4221-2 vīryeṇa saṃhatibhidā vihatonnatena kalpāntakālavisṛtaḥ pavano'nucakre //
analyzed: vīryeṇa saṃhati bhidā vihata unnatena kalpa anta kāla visṛtaḥ

original: MSS_4222-1 ākampitāni hṛdayāni manasvinīnāṃ vātaiḥ praphullasahakārakṛtādhivāsaiḥ /
analyzed: ākampitāni hṛdayāni manasvinīnām vātaiḥ praphulla sahakāra kṛta adhivāsaiḥ

original: MSS_4222-2 saṃbādhitaṃ parabhṛtasya madākulasya śrotrapriyairmadhukarasya ca gītanādaiḥ //
analyzed: saṃbādhitam parabhṛtasya mada ākulasya śrotra priyaiḥ madhukarasya ca gīta nādaiḥ

original: MSS_4223-1 ākaraḥ kāraṇaṃ jantor daurjanyasya na jāyate /
analyzed: ākaraḥ kāraṇam jantoḥ daurjanyasya na jāyate

original: MSS_4223-2 kālakūṭaḥ sudhāsindhoḥ prāṇināṃ prāṇahārakaḥ //
MSS_4224-1 ākaraḥ sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ ratnānāmiva sāgaraḥ /
analyzed: ākaraḥ sarva śāstrāṇām ratnānām iva sāgaraḥ

original: MSS_4224-2 guṇairna parituṣyāmo yasya matsariṇo vayam //
analyzed: guṇaiḥ na parituṣyāmaḥ yasya matsariṇaḥ vayam

original: MSS_4225-1 ākaraprabhavaḥ kośaḥ kośāddaṇḍaḥ prajāyate /
analyzed: ākara prabhavaḥ kośaḥ kośāt daṇḍaḥ prajāyate

original: MSS_4225-2 pṛthivī kośadaṇḍābhyāṃ prāpyate kośabhūṣaṇā //
analyzed: pṛthivī kośa daṇḍābhyām prāpyate kośa bhūṣaṇā

original: MSS_4226-1 ākarṇapalitaḥ śyāmo vayasāśītipañcakaḥ /
analyzed: ākarṇa palitaḥ śyāmaḥ vayasā aśīti pañcakaḥ

original: MSS_4226-2 raṇe paryacarad droṇo vṛddhaḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣavat //
analyzed: raṇe paryacarat droṇaḥ vṛddhaḥ ṣoḍaśa varṣa vat

original: MSS_4227-1 ākarṇamullasati mātarapāṅgadeśe kālāñjanena ghaṭitā tava bhāti rekhā /
analyzed: ākarṇam ullasati mātar apāṅga deśe kālāñjanena ghaṭitā tava bhāti rekhā

original: MSS_4227-2 śaivālapaṅktiriva saṃtatanirjihāna- kāruṇyapūrapadavī kalitānubandhā //
analyzed: śaivāla paṅktiḥ iva saṃtata nirjihāna kāruṇya pūra padavī kalita anubandhā

original: MSS_4228-1 ā karṇamūlamapakṛtya dhanuḥ sabāṇaṃ mayyeva kiṃ praharasi smara baddhakopaḥ /
analyzed: ā karṇa mūlam apakṛtya dhanuḥ sa bāṇam mayi eva kim praharasi smara baddha kopaḥ

original: MSS_4228-2 tasyāṃ muhuḥ kṣipa śarān hariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ tanmanmatho'pi bhava manmatha eva mā bhūḥ //
analyzed: tasyām muhur kṣipa śarān hariṇa īkṣaṇāyām tat manmathaḥ upi bhava manmathaḥ eva mā bhūḥ

original: MSS_4229-1 ākarṇaya tvamimamabhyupagamya vādaṃ jānātu ko'pi yadi vā hṛdayaṃ śrutīnām /
analyzed: ākarṇaya tvam imam abhyupagamya vādam jānātu kaḥ api yadi vā hṛdayam śrutīnām

original: MSS_4229-2 tasyāpyasaṃkhyabhavabandhaśatārjito'yaṃ dvaitabhramo galatu janmaśataiḥ kiyadbhiḥ //
analyzed: tasya api asaṃkhya bhava bandha śata arjitaḥ yam dvaita bhramaḥ galatu janma śataiḥ kiyadbhiḥ

original: MSS_4230-1 ākarṇaya sarojākṣi vacanīyamidaṃ bhuvi /
analyzed: ākarṇaya saroja akṣi vacanīyam idam bhuvi

original: MSS_4230-2 śaśāṅkastava vaktreṇa pāmarairupamīyate //
analyzed: śaśāṅkaḥ tava vaktreṇa pāmaraiḥ upamīyate

original: MSS_4231-1 ākarṇāntavisarpiṇaḥ kuvalayacchāyāmuṣaścakṣuṣaḥ kṣepā eva tavāharanti hṛdayaṃ kiṃ saṃbhrameṇāmunā /
analyzed: ā karṇa anta visarpiṇaḥ kuvalaya chāyā muṣaḥ cakṣuṣaḥ kṣepāḥ eva tava āharanti hṛdayam kim saṃbhrameṇa amunā

original: MSS_4231-2 mugdhe kevalametadāhitanakhotkhātāṅkamutpāṃśulam bāhvormūlamalīkamuktakabarībandhacchalād darśitam //
analyzed: mugdhe kevalam etat āhita nakha utkhāta aṅkam utpāṃśulam bāhvoḥ mūlam alīka mukta kabarī bandha chalāt darśitam

original: MSS_4232-1 ākarṇitāni rasitāni yayā prasarpat pradyumnarājarathaniḥsvanasodarāṇi /
analyzed: ākarṇitāni rasitāni yayā prasarpat pradyumna rāja ratha niḥsvana sodarāṇi

original: MSS_4232-2 uccai raṇaccaraṇanūpurayā purandhryā kṣipraṃ priyaṃ kupitayāpi tayābhisasre //
analyzed: uccais raṇat caraṇa nūpurayā purandhryā kṣipram priyam kupitayā api tayā abhisasre

original: MSS_4233-1 ākarṇya garjitaṃ ghoraṃ jaladānāṃ samāgame /
analyzed: ākarṇya garjitam ghoram jaladānām samāgame

original: MSS_4233-2 bālā vidhūtalajjeva satrāsaṃ śliṣyati priyam //
analyzed: bālā vidhūta lajjā iva sa trāsam śliṣyati priyam

original: MSS_4234-1 ākarṇya garjitaravaṃ ghanagarjitulyaṃ siṃhasya yānti vanamanyadibhā bhayārtāḥ /
analyzed: ākarṇya garjita ravam ghana garji tulyam siṃhasya yānti vanam anya dibhāḥ bhaya ārtāḥ

original: MSS_4234-2 tatraiva pauruṣanidhiḥ svakulena sārdhaṃ darpoddhuro vasati vītabhayo varāhaḥ //
analyzed: tatra eva pauruṣa nidhiḥ sva kulena sārdham darpa uddhuraḥ vasati vīta bhayaḥ varāhaḥ

original: MSS_4235-1 ākarṇya jayadevasya govindānandinīrgiraḥ /
analyzed: ākarṇya jayadevasya govinda ānandinīḥ giraḥ

original: MSS_4235-2 bāliśāḥ kālidāsāya spṛhayantu vayaṃ tu na //
analyzed: bāliśāḥ kālidāsāya spṛhayantu vayam tu na

original: MSS_4236-1 ākarṇyante tapanatanayagrāmasaṃlāpaghoṣā mandaṃ mandaṃ grasati niyataḥ kālapāśo'pi kaṇṭhe /
analyzed: ākarṇyante tapana tanaya grāma saṃlāpa ghoṣāḥ mandam mandam grasati niyataḥ kāla pāśaḥ api kaṇṭhe

original: MSS_4236-2 āpṛcchyante kṛtajigamiṣāsaṃbhramāḥ prāṇavātā naivedānīmapi viṣayavaimukhyamabhyeti cetaḥ //
analyzed: āpṛcchyante kṛta jigamiṣā saṃbhramāḥ prāṇa vātāḥ na evā idānīm api viṣaya vaimukhyam abhyeti cetaḥ

original: MSS_4237-1 ākarṇya bhūpāla yaśastvadīyaṃ vidhūnayantīha na ke śirāṃsi /
analyzed: ākarṇya bhūpāla yaśaḥ tvadīyam vidhūnayanti iha na ke śirāṃsi

original: MSS_4237-2 viśvaṃbharābhaṅgabhayena dhātrā nākāri karṇau bhujageśvarasya //
analyzed: viśvaṃbharā bhaṅga bhayena dhātrā nā akāri karṇau bhujaga īśvarasya

original: MSS_4238-1 ākarṇya māmavādīd dhanyāstā yuvatayaḥ sakhi kaṭhorāḥ /
analyzed: ākarṇya mām avādīt dhanyāḥ tāḥ yuvatayaḥ sakhi kaṭhorāḥ

original: MSS_4238-2 yā viṣahante dīrgha- priyatamavirahānalāsāram //
analyzed: yāḥ viṣahante dīrgha priyatama viraha anala āsāram

original: MSS_4239-1 ākarṇya vāṇīḥ paurāṇīr mayaitadavadhāritam /
analyzed: ākarṇya vāṇīḥ paurāṇīḥ mayā etat avadhāritam

original: MSS_4239-2 tiṣṭhantu devā devyo'pi sevyo nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: tiṣṭhantu devāḥ sevyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ

original: MSS_4240-1 ākarṇya vāravanitāpaṭhitaṃ sabhāyāṃ saṃpūraṇaṃ sapadi pādamudārabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: ākarṇya vāravanitā paṭhitam sabhāyām saṃpūraṇam sapadi pādam udāra bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_4240-2 yaḥ kālidāsamaraṇaṃ hṛdi niścikāya bhojaḥ sa eva paramaṃ bhuvi bhāvaboddhā //
analyzed: yaḥ kālidāsa maraṇam hṛdi niścikāya bhojaḥ saḥ eva paramam bhuvi bhāva boddhā

original: MSS_4241-1 ākarṇya saṃgaramahārṇavaceṣṭitāni goṣṭhīrasāhṛtajanasya manovikāraḥ /
analyzed: ākarṇya saṃgara mahā arṇava ceṣṭitāni goṣṭhī rasa āhṛta janasya manaḥ vikāraḥ

original: MSS_4241-2 aṅge karoti pulakaṃ nayane vikāśaṃ kāntiṃ ca kāmapi mukhe sphuraṇaṃ ca bāhvoḥ //
analyzed: aṅge karoti pulakam nayane vikāśam kāntim ca kām api mukhe sphuraṇam ca bāhvoḥ

original: MSS_4242-1 ākarṇya smarayauvarājyapaṭahaṃ jīmūtanūtnadhvaniṃ nṛtyatkekikuṭumbakasya dadhataṃ mandrāṃ mṛdaṅgakriyām /
analyzed: ākarṇya smara yauvarājya paṭaham jīmūta nūtna dhvanim nṛtyat keki kuṭumbakasya dadhatam mandrām mṛdaṅga kriyām

original: MSS_4242-2 unmīlannavanīlakandaladalavyājena romāñcitā harṣeṇeva samucchritān vasumatī dadhre śilīndhradhvajān //
analyzed: unmīlat nava nīla kandala dala vyājena romāñcitā harṣeṇa iva samucchritān vasumatī dadhre śilīndhra dhvajān

original: MSS_4243-1 ākarṇyāmraphalastutiṃ jalamabhūt tannārikelāntaraṃ prāyaḥ kaṇṭakitaṃ tathaiva panasaṃ jātaṃ dvidhorvārukam /
analyzed: ākarṇya āmra phala stutim jalam abhūt tat nārikela antaram prāyas kaṇṭakitam tathā eva panasam jātam dvidhā urvārukam

original: MSS_4243-2 āste'dhomukhameva kādalaphalaṃ drākṣāphalaṃ kṣudratāṃ śyāmatvaṃ bata jāmbavaṃ gatamaho mātsaryadoṣādiha //
analyzed: āste adhomukham eva kādala phalam drākṣā phalam kṣudra tām śyāma tvam bata jāmbavam gatam aho mātsarya doṣāt iha

original: MSS_4244-1 ākarṣatevordhvamatikraśīyān atyunnatatvāt kucamaṇḍalena /
analyzed: ākarṣatā iva ūrdhvam atikraśīyān ati unnata tvāt kuca maṇḍalena

original: MSS_4244-2 nanāma madhyo'tigurutvabhājā nitāntamākrānta ivāṅganānām //
analyzed: nanāma madhyā ūti guru tva bhājā nitāntam ākrāntaḥ iva aṅganānām

original: MSS_4245-1 ākarṣanti na keṣām antaḥkaraṇaṃ pravālaśālinyaḥ /
analyzed: ākarṣanti na keṣām antaḥkaraṇam pravāla śālinyaḥ

original: MSS_4245-2 lalanā ivātra latikāḥ kusumeṣu śilīmukhairnicitāḥ //
analyzed: lalanāḥ iva atra latikāḥ kusumeṣu śilīmukhaiḥ nicitāḥ

original: MSS_4246-1 ākarṣanniva gāṃ vamanniva khurān paścārdhamujjhanniva svīkurvanniva khaṃ pibanniva diśaśchāyāmamarṣanniva /
analyzed: ākarṣan iva gām vaman iva khurān paśca ardham ujjhan iva svīkurvan iva kham piban iva diśaḥ chāyām amarṣan iva

original: MSS_4246-2 sāṅgāraprakarāṃ spṛśanniva dharāṃ vātaṃ samaśnanniva śrīmannātha sa vājirāṭ tava kathaṃ mādṛggirāṃ gocaraḥ //
analyzed: sa aṅgāra prakarām spṛśan iva dharām vātam samaśnan iva śrīmat nātha sa vāji rāj tava katham mādṛś girām gocaraḥ

original: MSS_4247-1 ākarṣet kaiśikavyāye na śikhāṃ cālayet tataḥ /
analyzed: ākarṣet kaiśika vyāye na śikhām cālayet tatas

original: MSS_4247-2 pūrvāparau samau kāryau samāṃsau niścalau karau //
analyzed: pūrva aparau samau kāryau sama aṃsau niścalau karau

original: MSS_4248-1 ākalitorukramapada- padmālaṃkṛtyanalpapuṇyabhavam /
analyzed: ākalita uru krama pada padma alaṃkṛti analpa puṇya bhavam

original: MSS_4248-2 nijaguṇagurusvarūpaṃ kāvyañjayati prasannamatimadhuram //
analyzed: nija guṇa guru svarūpam kā vyañjayati prasanna mati madhuram

original: MSS_4249-1 ākalpaṃ murajinmukhendumadhuronmīlanmarunmādhurī- dhīrodāttamanoharaḥ sukhayatu tvāṃ pāñcajanyadhvaniḥ /
analyzed: ākalpam murajit mukha indu madhura unmīlat marut mādhurī dhīra udātta manoharaḥ sukhayatu tvām pāñcajanya dhvaniḥ

original: MSS_4249-2 līlālaṅghitameghanādavibhavo yaḥ kumbhakarṇavyathā- dāyī dānavadantināṃ daśamukhaṃ dikcakramākrāmati //
analyzed: līlā laṅghita meghanāda vibhavaḥ yaḥ kumbhakarṇa vyathāḥ dāyī dānava dantinām daśa mukham diś cakram ākrāmati

original: MSS_4250-1 ākalpaṃ yadi varṣasi pratidinaṃ dhārāsahasraistathāpy- ambhodhau kalayatyagādhajaṭhare kastāvakīnaṃ śramam /
analyzed: ākalpam yadi varṣasi pratidinam dhārā sahasraiḥ tathā api ambhodhau kalayati agādha jaṭhare kaḥ tāvakīnam śramam

original: MSS_4250-2 ambhoda kṣaṇamātramujjhasi payaḥ pṛṣṭhe yadi kṣmābhṛtāṃ tat kiṃ na prasaranti nirjharasaridvyājena te kīrtayaḥ //
analyzed: ambhoda kṣaṇa mātram ujjhasi payaḥ pṛṣṭhe yadi kṣmābhṛtām tat kim na prasaranti nirjhara sarit vyājena te kīrtayaḥ

original: MSS_4251-1 ākālpya talpaṃ śaśikāntikalpam udgrathya vīṭīḥ surapuṣpagarbhāḥ /
analyzed: ākālpya talpam śaśi kānti kalpam udgrathya vīṭīḥ sura puṣpa garbhāḥ

original: MSS_4251-2 dvāre dṛgantān parikalpayantī mano manojasya camaccakāra //
analyzed: dvāre dṛś antān parikalpayantī manaḥ manojasya camat cakāra

original: MSS_4252-1 ā kalyād ā niśīthācca kukṣyarthaṃ vyāpriyāmahe /
analyzed: ā kalyāt ā niśīthāt ca kukṣi artham

original: MSS_4252-2 na ca nirvṛṇumo jātu śāntāstu sukhamāsate //
analyzed: na ca nirvṛṇumaḥ jātu śāntāḥ tu sukham āsate

original: MSS_4253-1 ākasmikasmitamukhīṣu sakhīṣu vijñā vijñāsvapi praṇayanihnavamācarantī /
analyzed: ākasmika smita mukhīṣu sakhīṣu vijñā vijñāsu api praṇaya nihnavam ācarantī

original: MSS_4253-2 tatraiva raṅkunayanā nayanāravindam aspandamāhitavatī dayite gate'pi //
analyzed: tatra eva raṅku nayanā nayana aravindam a spandam āhitavatī dayite gate api

original: MSS_4254-1 ākāṅkṣiṇaṃ kṣmāpatimandirāṇi praviśya pātālasahodarāṇi /
analyzed: ākāṅkṣiṇam kṣmāpati mandirāṇi praviśya pātāla sahodarāṇi

original: MSS_4254-2 adhogaternānyadupārjayanti phalaṃ bhujaṅgā iva vāyubhakṣyāḥ //
analyzed: adhogateḥ na anyat upārjayanti phalam bhujaṅgāḥ iva vāyubhakṣyāḥ

original: MSS_4255-1 ākāṅkṣoccapade'hamātmakamatiḥ kārye manodhāraṇā ityevaṃvidhabhāvajātamucitaṃ dhartuṃ na cittāntare /
analyzed: ākāṅkṣā uccapadeham ātmaka matiḥ kārye manaḥ dhāraṇā iti evaṃvidha bhāva jātam ucitam dhartum na citta antare

original: MSS_4255-2 vaiṣamyasya nivāraṇāya mṛgayestatkāraṇaṃ nāpare svātmanyeva gaveṣayetyatitarāṃ śreyaskaraṃ te sadā //
analyzed: vaiṣamyasya nivāraṇāya mṛgayeḥ tat kāraṇam na apare sva ātmani eva gaveṣaya iti atitarām śreyaskaram te sadā

original: MSS_4256-1 ākāraṃ vinigūhatāṃ ripubalaṃ jetuṃ samuttiṣṭhatāṃ tantraṃ cintayatāṃ kṛtākṛtaśatavyāpāraśākhākulam /
analyzed: ākāram vinigūhatām ripu balam jetum samuttiṣṭhatām tantram cintayatām kṛtākṛta śata vyāpāra śākhā ākulam

original: MSS_4256-2 mantriproktaniṣeviṇāṃ kṣitibhujāmāśaṅkināṃ sarvato duḥkhāmbhonidhivartināṃ sukhalavaḥ kāntāsamāliṅganam //
analyzed: mantri prokta niṣeviṇām kṣitibhujām āśaṅkinām sarvatas duḥkha ambhonidhi vartinām sukha lavaḥ kāntā samāliṅganam

original: MSS_4257-1 ākāraḥ kamanīyatākulagṛhaṃ līlālasā sā gatiḥ saṃparkaḥ kamalākaraiḥ kalatayā lokottaraṃ kūjitam /
analyzed: ākāraḥ kamanīya tā ākula gṛham līlā alasā sā gatiḥ saṃparkaḥ kamala ākaraiḥ kala tayā lokottaram kūjitam

original: MSS_4257-2 yasyeyaṃ guṇasaṃpadasti mahatī tasyāpi bhavyasya te saṃrabdhatvamasadgumadgukalahe nāhaṃ sahe haṃsa he //
analyzed: yasya iyam guṇa saṃpad asti mahatī tasya api bhavyasya te saṃrabdha tvam asadgu madgu kalahe na aham sahe haṃsa he

original: MSS_4258-1 ākāraḥ sa manoharaḥ sa mahimā tadvaibhavaṃ tadvayaḥ sā kāntiḥ sa ca viśvavismayakaraḥ saubhāgyabhāgyodayaḥ /
analyzed: ākāraḥ sa manoharaḥ sa mahimā tat vaibhavam tat vayaḥ sā kāntiḥ sa ca viśva vismaya karaḥ saubhāgya bhāgya udayaḥ

original: MSS_4258-2 ekaikasya viśeṣavarṇanavidhau tasyāḥ sa eva kṣamo yasyāsminnuragaprabhoriva bhavejjihvāsahasradvayam //
analyzed: ekaikasya viśeṣa varṇana vidhau tasyāḥ saḥ eva kṣamaḥ yasya asmin uraga prabhoḥ iva bhavet jihvā sahasra dvayam

original: MSS_4259-1 ākāraṇāya māntrikam āgatadūtasya vacanamādāya /
analyzed: ākāraṇāya māntrikam āgata dūtasya vacanam ādāya

original: MSS_4259-2 kṛtvā pramāṇamādāv abhimantrya ca tatra mantraṇa //
analyzed: kṛtvā pramāṇam ādau ca tatra

original: MSS_4260-1 ākāradāruṇo'yaṃ bhayamasmādityaniścayo'yamapi /
analyzed: ākāra dāruṇaḥ uyam bhayam asmāt iti aniścayaḥ uyam api

original: MSS_4260-2 bhavati mahābhairavamapi śivasya rūpaṃ śivāyaiva //
analyzed: bhavati mahā bhairavam api śivasya rūpam śivāya eva

original: MSS_4261-1 ākāraparivṛttistu buddheḥ paribhavaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: ākāra parivṛttiḥ tu buddheḥ paribhavaḥ punar

original: MSS_4261-2 āśāhānirivārthitvaṃ parāsutvamivāparam //
analyzed: āśā hāniḥ iva arthi tvam parāsu tvam iva aparam

original: MSS_4262-1 ākāramātravijñānasaṃpāditamanorathāḥ /
analyzed: ākāra mātra vijñāna saṃpādita manorathāḥ

original: MSS_4262-2 dhanyāste ye na śṛṇvanti dīnāḥ kvāpyarthināṃ giraḥ //
analyzed: dhanyāḥ te ye na śṛṇvanti dīnāḥ kvāpi arthinām giraḥ

original: MSS_4263-1 ākāraveṣasaubhāgyaiḥ kandarpapratimo'pi san /
analyzed: ākāra veṣa saubhāgyaiḥ kandarpa pratimaḥ api san

original: MSS_4263-2 yāsāṃ saṃgamamāsādya prāptaḥ ko vā na vañcanām //
analyzed: yāsām saṃgamam āsādya prāptaḥ kaḥ vā na vañcanām

original: MSS_4264-1 ākāraśchādyamāno'pi na śakyo vinigūhitum /
analyzed: ākāraḥ chādyamānaḥ api na śakyaḥ vinigūhitum

original: MSS_4264-2 balāddhi vivṛṇotyeva bhāvamantargataṃ nṛṇām //
analyzed: balāt hi vivṛṇoti eva bhāvam antargatam nṛṇām

original: MSS_4265-1 ākārasaṃvṛtiḥ kāryā suraktenāpi kāminā /
analyzed: ākāra saṃvṛtiḥ kāryā su raktena api kāminā

original: MSS_4265-2 raktaḥ paribhavaṃ yāti paribhūtaḥ kathaṃ priyaḥ //
analyzed: raktaḥ paribhavam yāti paribhūtaḥ katham priyaḥ

original: MSS_4266-1 ākārasadṛśaprajñaḥ prajñayā sadṛśāgamaḥ /
analyzed: ākāra sadṛśa prajñaḥ prajñayā sadṛśa āgamaḥ

original: MSS_4266-2 āgamaiḥ sadṛśārambha ārambhasadṛśo'dayaḥ //
analyzed: āgamaiḥ sadṛśa ārambhaḥ ārambha sadṛśa udayaḥ

original: MSS_4267-1 ākārālāpasaṃbhogair yadīyairlajjate janaḥ /
analyzed: ākāra ālāpa saṃbhogaiḥ yadīyaiḥ lajjate janaḥ

original: MSS_4267-2 aho vakroddhuragrīvas taireva karabho'dhamaḥ //
analyzed: aho vakra uddhura grīvaḥ taiḥ eva karabha udhamaḥ

original: MSS_4268-1 ākārāhīnakāntirnidhanavirahito yogadollāsabhāgī vikrānto viśvatulyaḥ kamalakalitadṛgvibhramotkṛṣṭamūrtiḥ /
analyzed: ākāra ahīna kāntiḥ nidhana virahitaḥ yoga da ullāsa bhāgī vikrāntaḥ viśva tulyaḥ kamala kalita dṛś vibhrama utkṛṣṭa mūrtiḥ

original: MSS_4268-2 nānāśāpūrṇakīrtiḥ sukharasamayito vāraṇākrāntadeho yādṛgdeva tvamevaṃ bhavatu ripugaṇo'pyādivarṇapralopāt //
analyzed: nānā āśā pūrṇa kīrtiḥ vāraṇa ākrānta dehaḥ yādṛś deva tvam evam bhavatu ripu gaṇa upya ādi varṇa pralopāt

original: MSS_4269-1 ākāreṇa tathā gatyā ceṣṭayā bhāṣitairapi /
analyzed: ākāreṇa tathā gatyā ceṣṭayā bhāṣitaiḥ api

original: MSS_4269-2 netravaktravikārābhyāṃ jñāyate'ntarhitaṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: netra vaktra vikārābhyām jñāyate intarhitam manaḥ

original: MSS_4270-1 ākāreṇa nareṇa vānarayuvā vāhena vāleyako vyāghreṇaivaratho (?)
analyzed: ākāreṇa nareṇa vānara yuvā vāhena vāleyakaḥ vyāghreṇa eva rathaḥ

original: gavāpi gavayaḥ siṃhena kauleyakaḥ /
analyzed: gavā api gavayaḥ siṃhena kauleyakaḥ

original: MSS_4270-2 śyāmāṅgena pikena kāka iti [ca] spardhānubaddhādarā yadyapyatra tathāpi tadguṇagaṇasyāṃśaṃ labhante na te //
analyzed: śyāma aṅgena pikena kākaḥ iti ca spardhā anubaddha ādarāḥ yadi api atra tathā api tad guṇa gaṇasya aṃśam labhante na te

original: MSS_4271-1 ākāreṇa śaśī girā parabhṛtaḥ pārāvataścumbane haṃsaścaṅkramaṇe samaṃ dayitayā ratyā vimarde gajaḥ /
analyzed: ākāreṇa śaśī girā parabhṛtaḥ pārāvataḥ cumbane haṃsaḥ caṅkramaṇe samam dayitayā ratyā vimarde gajaḥ

original: MSS_4271-2 itthaṃ bhartari me samastayuvatiślāghyairguṇaiḥ sevite kṣuṇṇaṃ nāsti vivāhitaḥ patiriti syānnaiṣa doṣo yadi //
analyzed: ittham bhartari me samasta yuvati ślāghyaiḥ guṇaiḥ sevite kṣuṇṇam nā asti vivāhitaḥ patiḥ iti syāt na eṣa doṣaḥ yadi

original: MSS_4272-1 ākāreṇaiva caturās tarkayanti pareṅgitam /
analyzed: ākāreṇa eva caturāḥ tarkayanti para iṅgitam

original: MSS_4272-2 garbhasthaṃ ketakīpuṣpam āmodeneva ṣaṭpadāḥ //
analyzed: garbha stham ketakī puṣpam āmodena iva ṣaṭpadāḥ

original: MSS_4273-1 ākāre madanaḥ sukāvyaracanācāturyayuktau guruḥ ṣaḍbhāṣāsvapi dṛśyate vyasanitā taṃ dṛṣṭavatyaḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: ākāre madanaḥ su kāvya racanā cāturya yuktau guruḥ ṣaṣ bhāṣāsu api dṛśyate vyasani tā tam dṛṣṭavatyaḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_4273-2 svaprāṇeśvarasaṅgamaṃ sukhakaraṃ hitvā na jīvantyaho tasyānte kriyate'nayā tanayayābhyāsaḥ kalānāṃ katham //
analyzed: sva prāṇeśvara saṅgamam sukha karam hitvā na jīvanti aho tasya ante kriyate enayā tanayayā abhyāsaḥ kalānām katham

original: MSS_4274-1 ākārairiṅgitairgatyā ceṣṭayā bhāṣitena ca /
analyzed: ākāraiḥ iṅgitaiḥ gatyā ceṣṭayā bhāṣitena ca

original: MSS_4274-2 netravaktravikāraiśca gṛhyate'ntargataṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: netra vaktra vikāraiḥ ca gṛhyate ntargatam manaḥ

original: MSS_4275-1 ākārairna vidanti vakraphaṇitīrboddhuṃ na medhāvinaḥ śabdākhyeyanijāśayaṃ kulavadhūvargasya naitad vratam /
analyzed: ākāraiḥ na vidanti vakra phaṇitīḥ boddhum na medhāvinaḥ śabda ākhyeya nija āśayam kula vadhū vargasya nā etat vratam

original: MSS_4275-2 grāme'smin ṛjuvācyavācakahatātmāno yuvāno jaḍās tattvajñopagatādhvagāvadhirayaṃ kāmajvaraḥ sahyatām //
analyzed: grāme ismin ṛju vācya vācaka hata ātmānaḥ yuvānaḥ jaḍāḥ tattva jña upagata adhva ga avadhiḥ ayam kāma jvaraḥ sahyatām

original: MSS_4276-1 ākāro na manoharaḥ śravaṇayoḥ śalyopamaṃ kūjitaṃ vaktraṃ viḍvikṛtaṃ kṛtāntasamayālambīdamālokitam /
analyzed: ākāraḥ na manoharaḥ śravaṇayoḥ śalya upamam kūjitam vaktram viṣ vikṛtam kṛtānta samaya ālambi idam ālokitam

original: MSS_4276-2 krīḍāsaṃvanane pṛthagjanacite vāsastarau kutsite tat kenāstu varāka kāka kanakāgāre tavāveśanam //
analyzed: krīḍā saṃvanane pṛthagjana cite vāsas tarau kutsite tat kena astu varāka kāka kanakāgāre tava āveśanam

original: MSS_4277-1 ākāśakuṇḍe sataḍiddhutāśe karoti homaṃ jhaṣaketudevaḥ /
analyzed: ākāśakuṇḍe sa taḍit hutāśe karoti homam jhaṣaketu devaḥ

original: MSS_4277-2 uccāṭanāyeva viyoginīnāṃ yadgarjitaṃ saiṣa hi mantrapāṭhaḥ //
analyzed: uccāṭanāya iva viyoginīnām yat garjitam sa eṣa hi mantra pāṭhaḥ

original: MSS_4278-1 ākāśataḥ patitametya nadādimadhyaṃ tatrāpi dhāvanasamutthamalāvaliptam /
analyzed: ākāśataḥ patitam etya nada ādi madhyam tatra api dhāvana samuttha mala avaliptam

original: MSS_4278-2 nānāvidhāvanigatāśucipūrṇamarṇo yattena śuddhimupayāti kathaṃ śarīram //
analyzed: nānāvidha avanigata aśuci pūrṇam arṇaḥ yat tena śuddhim upayāti katham śarīram

original: MSS_4279-1 ākāśadeśāt paripātukāni laṅkeśaśīrṣāṇi sakuntalāni /
analyzed: ākāśa deśāt paripātukāni laṅkeśa śīrṣāṇi sa kuntalāni

original: MSS_4279-2 kṣaṇaṃ nabhaḥ prāṃśumahīruhasya śikyāśritānīva phalāni rejuḥ //
analyzed: kṣaṇam nabhaḥ prāṃśu mahīruhasya śikya āśritāni iva phalāni rejuḥ

original: MSS_4280-1 ākāśadhāraṇāṃ kurvan mṛtyuṃ jayati niścitam /
analyzed: ākāśa dhāraṇām kurvan mṛtyum jayati niścitam

original: MSS_4280-2 yatra tatra sthito vāpi sukhamatyantamaśnute //
analyzed: yatra tatra sthitaḥ vā api sukham atyantam aśnute

original: MSS_4281-1 ākāśa prasara prasarpata diśastvaṃ pṛthvi pṛthvī bhava pratyakṣīkṛtamādirājayaśasāṃ yuṣmābhirujjṛmbhitam /
analyzed: ākāśa prasara prasarpata diśaḥ tvam pṛthvi pṛthvī bhava pratyakṣīkṛtam ādirāja yaśasām yuṣmābhiḥ ujjṛmbhitam

original: MSS_4281-2 śrīmuddāpharaśāhapārthivayaśorāśeḥ samujjṛmbhaṇād bījocchvāsavidīrṇadāḍimadaśāṃ brahmāṇḍamārokṣyati //
analyzed: śrī muddāphara śāha pārthiva yaśaḥ rāśeḥ samujjṛmbhaṇāt bīja ucchvāsa vidīrṇa dāḍima daśām brahmāṇḍam ārokṣyati

original: MSS_4282-1 ākāśamānasavigāhanarājahaṃsaṃ nārījanagrahilatānalinīmahebham /
analyzed: ākāśa mānasa vigāhana rājahaṃsam nārī jana grahi latā analinī mahā ibham

original: MSS_4282-2 āghrāyamānaratināyakasaṃpradāya- dīkṣāguruṃ dṛśi niveśaya sundarīndum //
analyzed: āghrāyamāna rati nāyaka saṃpradāya dīkṣā gurum dṛśi niveśaya sundarī indum

original: MSS_4283-1 ākāśamutpatatu gacchatu vā digantam ambhonidhiṃ viśatu tiṣṭhatu vā yatheccham /
analyzed: ākāśam utpatatu gacchatu vā diś antam ambhonidhim viśatu tiṣṭhatu vā yatheccham

original: MSS_4283-2 janmāntarārjitaśubhāśubhakṛnnarāṇām chāyeva na tyajati karmaphalānubandhaḥ //
analyzed: janma antara arjita śubha aśubha kṛt narāṇām chāyā iva na tyajati karma phala anubandhaḥ

original: MSS_4284-1 ākāśayānataṭakoṭikṛtaikapādās taddhemadaṇḍayugalānyavalambya hastaiḥ /
analyzed: ākāśa yāna taṭa koṭi kṛta eka pādāḥ tad hema daṇḍa yugalāni avalambya hastaiḥ

original: MSS_4284-2 kautūhalāt tava taraṅgavighaṭṭitāni paśyanti devi manujāḥ svakalevarāṇi //
analyzed: kautūhalāt tava taraṅga vighaṭṭitāni paśyanti devi manujāḥ sva kalevarāṇi

original: MSS_4285-1 ākāśavāpīsitapuṇḍarīkaṃ śāṇopalaṃ manmathasāyakānām /
analyzed: ākāśa vāpī sita puṇḍarīkam śāṇa upalam manmatha sāyakānām

original: MSS_4285-2 paśyoditaṃ śāradamutpalākṣi saṃdhyāṅganākandukamindubiṃbam //
analyzed: paśya uditam śāradam utpala akṣi saṃdhyā aṅganā kandukam indu biṃbam

original: MSS_4286-1 ākāśaśyāmimānaṃ jaladharaghaṭanāṃ vā dadhānaṃ sudhāṃśuṃ nūnaṃ manye priyāsyaṃ śirasi śirasijairāhitāpūrvaśobham /
analyzed: ākāśa śyāmimānam jaladhara ghaṭanām vā dadhānam sudhāṃśum nūnam manye priya āsyam śirasi śirasijaiḥ āhita apūrva śobham

original: MSS_4286-2 yaddṛṣṭvā hanta harṣaṃ manasi kalayase jñānaśāntyādibhavyā- rāmorvījacchidāyai niśitataramasiṃ taṃ mahānto bruvanti //
analyzed: yat dṛṣṭvā hanta harṣam manasi kalayase jñāna śānti ādi bhavyā niśitataram asim tam mahāntaḥ bruvanti

original: MSS_4287-1 ākāśasaudhamadhiruhya digaṅganānām aṅgeṣu nikṣipati kāmyamivāṅgarāgam /
analyzed: ākāśa saudham adhiruhya diś aṅganānām aṅgeṣu nikṣipati kāmyam iva aṅgarāgam

original: MSS_4287-2 tārāvarodhavalito lalitātmajaśrīr jyotsnācchalena muditākhilaloka induḥ //
analyzed: tārā avarodha valitaḥ lalitā ātmaja śrīḥ jyotsnā chalena mudita akhila lokaḥ induḥ

original: MSS_4288-1 ākāśasaudhe śaśisaṃpaṭasthaṃ tamālanīlaṃ śivaliṅgamuccaiḥ /
analyzed: ākāśa saudhe śaśi saṃpaṭa stham tamāla nīlam śiva liṅgam uccais

original: MSS_4288-2 siddhāṅganeyaṃ rajanī sakāmā nakṣatraratnaiḥ paripūjatīva //
analyzed: siddha aṅganā iyam rajanī sa kāmā nakṣatra ratnaiḥ paripūjati iva

original: MSS_4289-1 ākāśāt patitaṃ toyaṃ yathā gacchati sāgaram /
analyzed: ākāśāt patitam toyam yathā gacchati sāgaram

original: MSS_4289-2 sarvadevanamaskāraḥ keśavaṃ prati gacchati //
analyzed: sarva deva namaskāraḥ keśavam prati gacchati

original: MSS_4290-1 ākāśāt patitaṃ punarjalanidhau madhye ciraṃ saṃsthitaṃ paścād duḥsahadeharandhrajanitakleśānvitaṃ mauktikam /
analyzed: ākāśāt patitam punar jalanidhau madhye ciram saṃsthitam paścāt duḥsaha deha randhra janita kleśa anvitam mauktikam

original: MSS_4290-2 bāle bālakuraṅgalocanayuge ghoraṃ tapaḥ saṃcaran nāsābhūṣaṇatāmupaiti sakhi te bimbādharāpekṣayā //
analyzed: bāle bāla kuraṅga locana yuge ghoram tapaḥ saṃcaran nāsā bhūṣaṇa tām upaiti sakhi te bimba adhara apekṣayā

original: MSS_4291-1 ākāśe naṭanaṃ saroruhayuge mañjīramañjudhvaniḥ śītāṃśau kalakūjitaṃ kisalaye pīyūṣapānotsavaḥ /
analyzed: ākāśe naṭanam saroruha yuge mañjīra mañju dhvaniḥ śītāṃśau kala kūjitam kisalaye pīyūṣa pāna utsavaḥ

original: MSS_4291-2 svargakṣoṇidhare nakhāt paribhavo dhvānte karākarṣaṇaṃ rambhāyāṃ rasanāravastaruṇayoḥ puṇyāni manyāmahe //
analyzed: svarga kṣoṇidhare nakhāt paribhavaḥ dhvānte kara ākarṣaṇam rambhāyām rasanā ravaḥ taruṇayoḥ puṇyāni manyāmahe

original: MSS_4292-1 ākāśe paśya nemā nibiḍaghanaghaṭāḥ saṃbhṛtāgneyacūrṇā mañjūṣā bhānti tāsāmupari suradhanuḥ kaitavāt ketavo'mī /
analyzed: ākāśe paśya na imāḥ nibiḍa ghana ghaṭāḥ saṃbhṛta āgneya cūrṇāḥ mañjūṣāḥ bhānti tāsām upari suradhanuḥ kaitavāt ketavaḥ ūmī

original: MSS_4292-2 vidyunno nālayantraśrutimukhanipataddīptavarttiprakāśaḥ sainyaṃ mārasya manye sphurati vimathituṃ māninī mānadurgam //
analyzed: vidyunnaḥ nāla yantra śruti mukha nipatat dīpta vartti prakāśaḥ sainyam mārasya manye sphurati vimathitum māninī māna durgam

original: MSS_4293-1 ākiṃcanyaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca tulayā samatolayam /
analyzed: ākiṃcanyam ca rājyam ca tulayā samatolayam

original: MSS_4293-2 atyaricyata dāridryaṃ rājyādapi guṇādhikam //
analyzed: atyaricyata dāridryam rājyāt api guṇa adhikam

original: MSS_4294-1 ākiṃcanyaṃ sukhaṃ loke pathyaṃ śivamanāmayam /
analyzed: ākiṃcanyam sukham loke pathyam śivam anāmayam

original: MSS_4294-2 anamitramatho hyetad durlabhaṃ sulabhaṃ satām //
analyzed: anamitram atho hi etat durlabham sulabham satām

original: MSS_4295-1 ākiṃcanyaṃ susaṃtoṣo nirāśīṣṭvamacāpalam /
analyzed: ākiṃcanyam su saṃtoṣaḥ nirāśīṣṭvam acāpalam

original: MSS_4295-2 etadāhuḥ paraṃ śreya ātmajñasya jitātmanaḥ //
analyzed: etat āhuḥ param śreyaḥ ātma jñasya jita ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_4296-1 ākiṃcanyādatiparicayājjāyayopekṣyamāṇo bhūpālānāmananusaraṇād bibhyadevākhilebhyaḥ /
analyzed: ākiṃcanyāt ati paricayāt jāyayā upekṣyamāṇaḥ bhūpālānām ananusaraṇāt bibhyat eva akhilebhyaḥ

original: MSS_4296-2 gehe tiṣṭhan kumatiralasaḥ kūpakūrmaiḥ sadharmā kiṃ jānīte bhuvanacaritaṃ kiṃ sukhaṃ copabhuṅkte //
analyzed: gehe tiṣṭhan kumatiḥ alasaḥ kūpa kūrmaiḥ sadharmā kim jānīte bhuvana caritam kim sukham ca upabhuṅkte

original: MSS_4297-1 ākiṃcanye ca rājye ca viśeṣaḥ sumahānayam /
analyzed: ākiṃcanye ca rājye ca viśeṣaḥ su mahān ayam

original: MSS_4297-2 nityodvigno hi dhanavān mṛtyorāsyagato yathā //
analyzed: nitya udvignaḥ hi dhanavān mṛtyoḥ āsya gataḥ yathā

original: MSS_4298-1 ākīrṇaḥ śobhate rājā na viviktaḥ kadācana /
analyzed: ākīrṇaḥ śobhate rājā na viviktaḥ kadācana

original: MSS_4298-2 ye taṃ viviktamicchanti te tasya ripavaḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: ye tam viviktam icchanti te tasya ripavaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: MSS_4299-1 ākuñcitāgrāṅgulinā tato'nyaḥ kiṃcitsamāvarjitanetraśobhaḥ /
analyzed: ākuñcita agra aṅgulinā tatonyaḥ kiṃcid samāvarjita netra śobhaḥ

original: MSS_4299-2 tiryagvisaṃsarpinakhaprabheṇa pādena haimaṃ vililekha pīṭham //
analyzed: tiryak visaṃsarpi nakha prabheṇa pādena haimam vililekha pīṭham

original: MSS_4300-1 ākuñcitaikajaṅghaṃ darāvṛtordhvoru gopitārdhoru /
analyzed: ākuñcita eka jaṅgham dara āvṛta ūrdhva ūru gopitā ardha ūru

original: MSS_4300-2 sutanoḥ śvasitakramanamadṛ- udarasphuṭanābhi śayanamidam //
analyzed: su tanoḥ śvasita krama nama dṛ udara sphuṭa nābhi śayanam idam

original: MSS_4301-1 ākuñcitorū dvau yatra jānubhyāṃ dharaṇiṃ gatau /
analyzed: ākuñcita ūrū dvau yatra jānubhyām dharaṇim gatau

original: MSS_4301-2 dardurakramamityāhuḥ sthānakaṃ dṛḍhabhedane //
analyzed: dardura kramam iti āhuḥ sthānakam dṛḍha bhedane

original: MSS_4302-1 ākuñcya pāṇimaśuciṃ mama mūrdhni veśyā mantrāmbhasāṃ pratipadaṃ pṛṣataiḥ pavitre /
analyzed: ākuñcya pāṇim aśucim mama mūrdhni veśyā mantra ambhasām pratipadam pṛṣataiḥ pavitre

original: MSS_4302-2 tārasvanaṃ prathitathūtkamadāt prahāraṃ hāhā hato'hamiti roditi viṣṇuśarmā //
analyzed: tāra svanam prathita thūtka madāt prahāram hāhā hata uham iti roditi viṣṇuśarmā

original: MSS_4303-1 ākuñcyāgraṃ nakhavilikhane paśyati bhrūvibhaṅgyā gāḍhāśleṣe vadati ca ha hā muñca muñceti vācam /
analyzed: ākuñcya agram nakha vilikhane paśyati bhrū vibhaṅgyā gāḍha āśleṣe vadati ca ha hā muñca muñca iti vācam

original: MSS_4303-2 keśākṛṣṭāvaruṇanayanā tāḍane sāśrunetrā nānābhāvaṃ śrayati taruṇī nāṭake manmathasya //
analyzed: keśa ākṛṣṭau aruṇa nayanā tāḍane sa aśru netrā nānābhāvam śrayati taruṇī nāṭake manmathasya

original: MSS_4304-1 ākubjīkṛtapṛṣṭhamunnatavaladvaktrāgrapucchaṃ bhayād antarveśmaniveśitaikanayanaṃ niṣkampakarṇadvayam /
analyzed: ākubjīkṛta pṛṣṭham unnata valat vaktra agra puccham bhayāt antarveśma niveśita eka nayanam niṣkampa karṇa dvayam

original: MSS_4304-2 lālākīrṇavidīrṇasṛkkavikacaddaṃṣṭrākarālānanaḥ śvā niḥśvāsanirodhapīvaragalo mārjāramāskandati //
analyzed: lālā ākīrṇa vidīrṇa sṛkka vikacat daṃṣṭrā karāla ānanaḥ śvā niḥśvāsa nirodha pīvara galaḥ mārjāram āskandati

original: MSS_4305-1 ākumāramupadeṣṭumicchavaḥ saṃnivṛttimapathānmahāpadaḥ /
analyzed: ākumāram upadeṣṭum icchavaḥ saṃnivṛttim apathāt mahā padaḥ

original: MSS_4305-2 yogaśaktijitajanmamṛtyavaḥ śīlayanti yatayaḥ suśīlatām //
analyzed: yoga śakti jita janma mṛtyavaḥ śīlayanti yatayaḥ su śīla tām

original: MSS_4306-1 ākulaścalapatatrikulānām āravairanuditauṣasarāgaḥ /
analyzed: ākulaḥ cala patatri kulānām āravaiḥ anudita auṣasa rāgaḥ

original: MSS_4306-2 āyayāvaharidaśvavipāṇḍus tulyatāṃ dinamukhena dināntaḥ //
analyzed: āyayau a harit aśva vipāṇḍuḥ tulya tām dina mukhena dina antaḥ

original: MSS_4307-1 ākṛtipremasarasā vilāsālasagāminī /
MSS_4307-2 visāre hanta saṃsāre sāraṃ sāraṅgalocanā //
analyzed: visāre hanta saṃsāre sāram sāraṅga locanā

original: MSS_4308-1 ākṛteḥ kiṃcidullekho vibhāvayati lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: ākṛteḥ kiṃcid ullekhaḥ vibhāvayati lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_4308-2 mahatopaplaveneva pīḍitaṃ candramaṇḍalam //
analyzed: mahatā upaplavena iva pīḍitam candra maṇḍalam

original: MSS_4309-1 ākṛṣṭaḥ śikhayā nakhairvilikhitaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ kapolasthale maulau dāmabhirāhataḥ pratidiśaṃ krāman salīlaṃ pathi /
analyzed: ākṛṣṭaḥ śikhayā nakhaiḥ vilikhitaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ kapola sthale maulau dāmabhiḥ āhataḥ pratidiśam krāman sa līlam pathi

original: MSS_4309-2 itthaṃ vāravilāsinīkṛtaparīhāsasya daityādhvare viṣṇorvāmanaveṣavibhramabhṛto hāsormayaḥ pāntu vaḥ //
analyzed: ittham vāravilāsinī kṛta parīhāsasya daitya adhvare viṣṇoḥ vāmana veṣa vibhrama bhṛtaḥ hāsa ūrmayaḥ pāntu vaḥ

original: MSS_4310-1 ākṛṣṭakaravālo'sau saṃparāye paribhraman /
analyzed: ākṛṣṭa karavālaḥ usau saṃparāye paribhraman

original: MSS_4310-2 pratyarthisenayā dṛṣṭaḥ kṛtāntena samaḥ prabhuḥ //
analyzed: pratyarthi senayā dṛṣṭaḥ kṛtāntena samaḥ prabhuḥ

original: MSS_4311-1 ākṛṣṭapratanuvapurlataistaradbhis tasyāmbhas tadatha saromahārṇavasya /
analyzed: ākṛṣṭa pratanu vapuḥ lataiḥ taradbhiḥ tasya ambhaḥ tat atha saraḥ mahā arṇavasya

original: MSS_4311-2 akṣobhi prasṛtavilolabāhupakṣair yoṣāṇāmurubhirurojagaṇḍaśailaiḥ //
analyzed: akṣobhi prasṛta vilola bāhu pakṣaiḥ yoṣāṇām urubhiḥ uroja gaṇḍa śailaiḥ

original: MSS_4312-1 ākṛṣṭaścakravākairnayanakalanayā bandhakībhirnirasto nāstaṃ drāgeti bhānurnivasati nalinībodhanidrāntarāle /
analyzed: ākṛṣṭaḥ cakravākaiḥ nayana kalanayā bandhakībhiḥ nirastaḥ na astam drāk iti bhānuḥ nivasati nalinī bodha nidrā antarāle

original: MSS_4312-2 sandhyādīpaprarohaṃ bahulatilarasavyāptapatrāntarālaṃ vāsāgāre diśantī hasati navavadhūkrodhadṛṣṭā bhujiṣyā //
analyzed: sandhyā dīpa praroham bahula tila rasa vyāpta patra antarālam vāsāgāre diśantī hasati nava vadhū krodha dṛṣṭā bhujiṣyā

original: MSS_4313-1 ākṛṣṭiḥ kṛtacetasāṃ sumahatāmuccāṭanaṃ cāṃhasām ācaṇḍālamamūkalokasulabho vaśyaśca mokṣaśriyaḥ /
analyzed: ākṛṣṭiḥ kṛta cetasām su mahatām uccāṭanam ca aṃhasām ācaṇḍālam amūka loka sulabhaḥ vaśyaḥ ca mokṣa śriyaḥ

original: MSS_4313-2 no dīkṣāṃ na ca dakṣiṇāṃ na ca puraścaryāṃ manāgīkṣate mantro'yaṃ rasānāspṛgeva phalati śrīkṛṣṇanāmātmakaḥ //
analyzed: no dīkṣām na ca dakṣiṇām na ca puraścaryām manāk īkṣate mantraḥ yam phalati śrī kṛṣṇa nāma ātmakaḥ

original: MSS_4314-1 ākṛṣṭibhagnakaṭakaṃ kena tava prakṛtikomalaṃ subhage /
analyzed: ākṛṣṭi bhagna kaṭakam kena tava prakṛti komalam subhage

original: MSS_4314-2 dhanyena bhujamṛṇālaṃ grāhyaṃ madanasya rājyamiva //
analyzed: dhanyena bhuja mṛṇālam grāhyam madanasya rājyam iva

original: MSS_4315-1 ākṛṣṭe kavacādahīndrarasanākalpe kṛpāṇe tvayā śrīmannāyaka rāmacandra bhavataḥ pratyarthināṃ veśmasu /
analyzed: ākṛṣṭe kavacāt ahi indra rasanā kalpe kṛpāṇe tvayā śrīmat nāyaka rāmacandra bhavataḥ pratyarthinām veśmasu

original: MSS_4315-2 gāhante sahasā lulāyacamarīśārdūlaśākhācarī- yakṣorakṣaśṛgālakolaśalabhṛdbhallūkabhillādayaḥ //
analyzed: gāhante sahasā lulāya camarī śārdūla śākhācarī yakṣa urakṣa śṛgāla kola śalabhṛt bhallūka bhilla ādayaḥ

original: MSS_4316-1 ākṛṣṭe yudhi kārmuke raghupatervāmo'bravīd dakṣiṇaṃ dānādānasubhojaneṣu purato yuktaṃ kimitthaṃ tava /
analyzed: ākṛṣṭe yudhi kārmuke raghu pateḥ vāmaḥ bravīt dakṣiṇam dāna ādāna su bhojaneṣu puratas yuktam kim ittham tava

original: MSS_4316-2 kāmānyaḥ punarabravīnmama na bhīḥ praṣṭuṃ jagatsvāminaṃ chettuṃ rāvaṇavaktrapaṃktimiti yo dadyāt sa vo maṃgalam //
analyzed: kāmān yaḥ punar abravīt mama na bhīḥ praṣṭum jagatsvāminam chettum rāvaṇa vaktra paṃktim iti yaḥ dadyāt sa vaḥ maṃgalam

original: MSS_4317-1 ākṛṣṭe yudhi kārmuke samavadad vāmaḥ karo dakṣiṇaṃ re re dakṣiṇahasta bhojanamahādānādi te kurvataḥ /
analyzed: ākṛṣṭe yudhi kārmuke samavadat vāmaḥ karaḥ dakṣiṇam re re dakṣiṇa hasta bhojana mahā dāna ādi te kurvataḥ

original: MSS_4317-2 paścād gaṃntumayuktamityatha punaḥ so'pyabravīdadravaṃ praṣṭuṃ rāghavamāśurāvaṇaśirovṛndāni bhindāni kim //
analyzed: paścāt gaṃntum ayuktam iti atha punar saḥ api abravīt adravam praṣṭum rāghavam āśu rāvaṇa śiraḥ vṛndāni bhindāni kim

original: MSS_4318-1 ākṛṣṭe vasanāñcale kuvalayaśyāmā trapādhaḥkṛtā dṛṣṭiḥ saṃvalitā rucā kucayuge svarṇaprabhe śrīmati /
analyzed: ākṛṣṭe vasana añcale kuvalaya śyāmā trapā adhas kṛtā dṛṣṭiḥ saṃvalitā rucā kuca yuge svarṇa prabhe śrīmati

original: MSS_4318-2 bālaḥ kaścana cūtapallava iti prāntasmitāsyaśriyaṃ śliṣyaṃstāmatha rukmiṇīṃ natamukhīṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa puṣṇātu naḥ //
analyzed: bālaḥ kaścana cūta pallavaḥ iti prānta smita āsya śriyam śliṣyan tām atha rukmiṇīm nata mukhīm kṛṣṇaḥ sa puṣṇātu naḥ

original: MSS_4319-1 ākṛṣyante kariṇaḥ paṅkanimagnā mahadvipaireva /
analyzed: ākṛṣyante kariṇaḥ paṅka nimagnāḥ mahā dvipaiḥ eva

original: MSS_4319-2 prāptāpado mahānta uddharaṇīyā mahāpuṃbhiḥ //
analyzed: prāpta āpadaḥ mahāntaḥ uddharaṇīyāḥ mahā puṃbhiḥ

original: MSS_4320-1 ākṛṣyādāvamandagrahamalakacayaṃ vaktramāsajya vaktre kaṇṭhe lagnaḥ sukaṇṭhaḥ punarapi kucayordattagāḍhāṅgasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: ākṛṣya ādau amanda graham alaka cayam vaktram āsajya vaktre kaṇṭhe lagnaḥ su kaṇṭhaḥ punar api kucayoḥ datta gāḍha aṅga saṅgaḥ

original: MSS_4320-2 baddhāsaktirnitambe patati caraṇayoryaḥ sa tādṛk priyo me bāle lajjā praṇaṣṭā nahi nahi kuṭile colakaḥ kiṃ trapākṛt //
analyzed: baddha āsaktiḥ nitambe patati caraṇayoḥ yaḥ sa tādṛś priyaḥ me bāle lajjā praṇaṣṭā nahi nahi kuṭile colakaḥ kim trapā kṛt

original: MSS_4321-1 ā keśagrahaṇānmitram akāryāt saṃnivartayan /
analyzed: ā keśa grahaṇāt mitram akāryāt saṃnivartayan

original: MSS_4321-2 avācyaḥ kasyacid bhavati kṛtayatno yathābalam //
analyzed: avācyaḥ kasyacid bhavati kṛta yatnaḥ yathābalam

original: MSS_4322-1 ākopito'pi kulajo na vadatyavācyaṃ niṣpīḍito madhurameva vamet kilekṣuḥ /
analyzed: ākopitaḥ api kula jaḥ na vadati avācyam niṣpīḍitaḥ madhuram eva vamet kila ikṣuḥ

original: MSS_4322-2 nīco jano guṇaśatairapi sevyamāno hāsyeṣu yad vadati tat kalaheṣvavācyam //
analyzed: nīcaḥ janaḥ guṇa śataiḥ api sevyamānaḥ hāsyeṣu yat vadati tat kalaheṣu avācyam

original: MSS_4323-1 ākaumāraṃ samarajayinā kurvatorvīmavīrām etenāmī kathamiva diśāmīśitāro vimuktāḥ /
analyzed: ākaumāram samara jayinā kurvatā urvīm avīrām etena amī katham iva diśām īśitāraḥ vimuktāḥ

original: MSS_4323-2 antarjñātaṃ vapuṣi kalayā tasya te'ṣṭau praviṣṭāḥ prahvībhūte prabhavati nahi kṣatriyāṇāṃ kṛpāṇaḥ //
analyzed: antar jñātam vapuṣi kalayā tasya teṣṭau praviṣṭāḥ prahvī bhūte prabhavati nahi kṣatriyāṇām kṛpāṇaḥ

original: MSS_4324-1 ā kaumārād gurucaraṇaśuśrūṣayā brahmavidyā- svāsthāyāsthāmahaha,
analyzed: ā kaumārāt guru caraṇa śuśrūṣayā brahma vidyā

original: mahatīmarjitaṃ kauśalaṃ yat /
analyzed: mahatīm arjitam kauśalam yat

original: MSS_4324-2 nidrāhetorniśi niśi kathāḥ śṛṇvatāṃ pārthivānāṃ kālakṣepaupayikamidamapyāḥ kathaṃ paryaṇaṃsīt //
analyzed: nidrā hetoḥ niśi niśi kathāḥ śṛṇvatām pārthivānām kālakṣepa aupayikam idam api āḥ katham paryaṇaṃsīt

original: MSS_4325-1 ākrandāḥ stanitairvilocanajalānyaśrāntadhārāmbubhis tadvicchedabhuvaśca śokaśikhinastulyāstaḍidvibhramaiḥ /
analyzed: ākrandāḥ stanitaiḥ vilocana jalāni a śrānta dhārā ambubhiḥ tad viccheda bhuvaḥ ca śoka śikhinaḥ tulyāḥ taḍit vibhramaiḥ

original: MSS_4325-2 antarme dayitāmukhaṃ tava śaśī vṛttiḥ samaivāvayos tatkiṃ māmaniśaṃ sakhe jaladhara tvaṃ dagdhumevodyataḥ //
analyzed: antar me dayitā mukham tava śaśī vṛttiḥ samā eva āvayoḥ tat kim mām aniśam sakhe jaladhara tvam dagdhum eva udyataḥ

original: MSS_4326-1 ākranditaṃ ruditamāhatamānane vā kasyārdramastu hṛdayaṃ kimataḥ phalaṃ vā /
analyzed: ākranditam ruditam āhatam ānane vā kasya ārdram astu hṛdayam kim atas phalam vā

original: MSS_4326-2 yasyā mano dravati yā jagatāṃ svatantrā tasyāstavāmba purataḥ kathayāmi khedam //
analyzed: yasyāḥ manaḥ dravati yā jagatām svatantrā tasyāḥ tava amba puratas kathayāmi khedam

original: MSS_4327-1 ākramya yad dvijairbhuktaṃ parikṣīṇaiśca bāndhavaiḥ /
analyzed: ākramya yat dvijaiḥ bhuktam parikṣīṇaiḥ ca bāndhavaiḥ

original: MSS_4327-2 gobhiśca nṛpaśārdūla rājasūyād viśiṣyate //
analyzed: gobhiḥ ca nṛpa śārdūla rājasūyāt viśiṣyate

original: MSS_4328-1 ākramya yasya dordaṇḍam aricakraṃ prakāśate /
analyzed: ākramya yasya dos daṇḍam ari cakram prakāśate

original: MSS_4328-2 prāpnoti puruṣo loke sa vaikuṇṭha iti prathām //
analyzed: prāpnoti puruṣaḥ loke sa vaikuṇṭhaḥ iti prathām

original: MSS_4329-1 ākramya sarvaḥ kālena paralokaṃ ca nīyate /
analyzed: ākramya sarvaḥ kālena para lokam ca nīyate

original: MSS_4329-2 karmapāśavaśo jantus tatra kā paridevanā //
analyzed: karma pāśa vaśaḥ jantuḥ tatra kā paridevanā

original: MSS_4330-1 ākramyākramya sādhūnāṃ dārāṃścaiva dhanāni ca /
analyzed: ākramya ākramya sādhūnām dārān ca eva dhanāni ca

original: MSS_4330-2 bhokṣyanti niranukrośā rudatāmapi bhārata //
analyzed: bhokṣyanti niranukrośāḥ rudatām api bhārata

original: MSS_4331-1 ākramyājeragrimaskandhamuccair āsthāyātho vītaśaṅkaṃ śiraśca /
analyzed: ākramya ājeḥ agrima skandham uccais āsthāya atho vīta śaṅkam śiraḥ ca

original: MSS_4331-2 helālolā vartma gatvātimartyaṃ dyāmārohan mānabhājaḥ sukhena //
analyzed: helā lolāḥ vartma gatvā atimartyam dyām ārohat māna bhājaḥ sukhena

original: MSS_4332-1 ākramyaikāmagrapādena jaṅghām anyāmuccairādadānaḥ kareṇa /
analyzed: ākramya ekām agra pādena jaṅghām anyām uccais ādadānaḥ kareṇa

original: MSS_4332-2 sāsthisvānaṃ dāruvaddāruṇātmā kaṃcinmadhyāt pāṭayāmāsa dantī //
analyzed: sa asthi svānam dāru vat dāruṇa ātmā kaṃcid madhyāt pāṭayāmāsa dantī

original: MSS_4333-1 ākramyoccaiḥ śirasi vasatirbhūbhṛtāmunnatānāṃ toyādānaṃ tadapi jaladherlokasaṃtāpaśāntyai /
analyzed: ākramya uccais śirasi vasatiḥ bhūbhṛtām unnatānām toya ādānam tat api jaladheḥ loka saṃtāpa śāntyai

original: MSS_4333-2 dīrghā chāyā prakṛtimahati vyomni cābhogabandho he he megha spṛhayati na te kaḥ kiletthaṃ vratāya //
analyzed: dīrghā chāyā prakṛti mahati vyomni ca ābhoga bandhaḥ he he megha spṛhayati na te kaḥ kila ittham vratāya

original: MSS_4334-1 ākrāntaṃ valibhiḥ prasahya palitairatyantamāskanditaṃ vārdhakyaṃ ślathasaṃdhibandhanatayā niḥsthāma nirdhāma ca /
analyzed: ākrāntam valibhiḥ prasahya palitaiḥ atyantam āskanditam vārdhakyam ślatha saṃdhibandhana tayā niḥsthāma nirdhāma ca

original: MSS_4334-2 etanme vapurasthikevalajaratkaṅkālamālokaya - - sthūlaśirākarālaparuṣatvaṅmātrapātrīkṛtam //
analyzed: etat me vapuḥ asthi kevala jarat kaṅkālam ālokaya sthūla sirā karāla paruṣa tvac mātra pātrīkṛtam

original: MSS_4335-1 ākrāntapūrvā rabhasena sainikair digaṅganāvyomarajo'bhidūṣitā /
analyzed: ākrānta pūrvā rabhasena sainikaiḥ diś aṅganā vyoma rajobhiḥ dūṣitā

original: MSS_4335-2 bherīravāṇāṃ pratiśabditairghanair jagarja gāḍhaṃ gurumatsarādiva //
analyzed: bherī ravāṇām pratiśabditaiḥ ghanaiḥ jagarja gāḍham guru matsarāt iva

original: MSS_4336-1 ākrāntamantararibhirmadamatsarādyair gātraṃ valīpalitarogaśatānuviddham /
analyzed: ākrāntam antar aribhiḥ mada matsara ādyaiḥ gātram valī palita roga śata anuviddham

original: MSS_4336-2 dāraiḥ sutaiśca gṛhamāvṛtamuttamarṇair mātaḥ kathaṃ bhavatu me manasaḥ prasādaḥ //
analyzed: dāraiḥ sutaiḥ ca gṛham āvṛtam uttamarṇaiḥ mātar katham bhavatu me manasaḥ prasādaḥ

original: MSS_4337-1 ākrāntāsu vasundharāsu yavanairāsetuhemācalaṃ vidrāṇe kṣitibhṛdgaṇe vikaruṇe nidrāti nārāyaṇe /
analyzed: ākrāntāsu vasundharāsu yavanaiḥ āsetu hemācalam kṣitibhṛt gaṇe vikaruṇe nārāyaṇe

original: MSS_4337-2 nirvighnaprasare kalāvapi balānniṣkaṇṭakaṃ vaidikaṃ panthānaṃ kila tatra tatra paripātyeko hi lokottaraḥ //
analyzed: nirvighna prasare kalau api balāt niṣkaṇṭakam vaidikam panthānam kila tatra tatra paripāti ekaḥ hi loka uttaraḥ

original: MSS_4338-1 ākrānteva mahopalena muninā śapteva durvāsasā sātatyaṃ bata mudriteva jatunā nīteva mūrcchāṃ viṣaiḥ /
analyzed: ākrāntā iva mahopalena muninā śaptā iva durvāsasā sātatyam bata mudritā iva jatunā nītā iva mūrcchām viṣaiḥ

original: MSS_4338-2 baddhevātanurajjubhiḥ paraguṇān vaktuṃ na śaktā satī jihvā lohaśalākayā khalamukhe viddheva saṃlakṣyate //
analyzed: baddhā iva a tanu rajjubhiḥ para guṇān vaktum na śaktā satī jihvā loha śalākayā khala mukhe viddhā iva saṃlakṣyate

original: MSS_4339-1 ākrānte śaiśave'sminnabhinavavayasā śāsanānmīnaketor bālāyā netrayugmaṃ śrutiyugamaviśad bhrūyugenāpi sārdham /
analyzed: ākrānte śaiśave smin abhinava vayasā śāsanāt mīnaketoḥ bālāyāḥ netra yugmam śruti yugam aviśat bhrū yugena api sārdham

original: MSS_4339-2 vakṣojadvandvamuccairbahiriha niragācchroṇabimbena sākaṃ madhyaḥ saṃgṛhya baddhastrivalibhirabhitaḥ kārśyamaṅgīkaroti //
analyzed: vakṣoja dvandvam uccais bahis iha niragāt śroṇa bimbena sākam madhyaḥ saṃgṛhya baddhaḥ trivalibhiḥ abhitas kārśyam aṅgīkaroti

original: MSS_4340-1 ākrāmantu tameva cūtamapi ca krośantu rephottaraṃ ḍimbho'smākamapīti vābhidadhatāṃ kākā varākāḥ svayam /
analyzed: ākrāmantu tam eva cūtam api ca krośantu repha uttaram ḍimbha usmākam api iti vā abhidadhatām kākāḥ varākāḥ svayam

original: MSS_4340-2 gantavyaṃ kva tato'nyataḥ parabhṛta kṣantavyametāvadapy agre kasya nivedyatāmidamatikrānto vasanto'dhunā //
analyzed: gantavyam kva tatonyatas parabhṛta kṣantavyam etāvat api agre kasya nivedyatām idam atikrāntaḥ

original: MSS_4341-1 ākruśyamāno nākrośen manyureva titikṣataḥ /
analyzed: ākruśyamānaḥ na ākrośet manyuḥ eva titikṣataḥ

original: MSS_4341-2 ākroṣṭāraṃ nirdahati sukṛtaṃ cāsya vindati //
analyzed: ākroṣṭāram nirdahati sukṛtam ca asya vindati

original: MSS_4342-1 ākruṣṭo'pi vrajati na ruṣaṃ bhāṣate nāpabhāṣyaṃ notkṛṣṭo'pi pravahati madaṃ śauryadhairyādidharmaiḥ /
analyzed: ākruṣṭaḥ api vrajati na ruṣam bhāṣate na apabhāṣyam na utkṛṣṭaḥ api pravahati madam śaurya dhairya ādi dharmaiḥ

original: MSS_4342-2 yo yāto'pi vyasanamaniśaṃ kātaratvaṃ na yāti santaḥ prāhustamiha sujanaṃ tattvabuddhyā vivecya //
analyzed: yaḥ yātaḥ api vyasanam aniśam kātara tvam na yāti santaḥ prāhuḥ tam iha su janam tattva buddhyā vivecya

original: MSS_4343-1 ākrośakasamo loke suhṛdanyo na vidyate /
analyzed: ākrośaka samaḥ loke suhṛd anyaḥ na vidyate

original: MSS_4343-2 yastu duṣkṛtamādāya sukṛtaṃ svaṃ prayacchati //
analyzed: yaḥ tu duṣkṛtam ādāya sukṛtam svam prayacchati

original: MSS_4344-1 ākrośannāhvayannanyān ādhāvan maṇḍalaṃ rudan /
analyzed: ākrośan āhvayan anyān ādhāvan maṇḍalam rudan

original: MSS_4344-2 gāḥ kālayati daṇḍena ḍimbhaḥ sasyāvatāriṇīḥ //
analyzed: gāḥ kālayati daṇḍena ḍimbhaḥ sasya avatāriṇīḥ

original: MSS_4345-1 ākrośaparivādābhyāṃ vihiṃsantyabudhā budhān /
analyzed: ākrośa parivādābhyām vihiṃsanti abudhāḥ budhān

original: MSS_4345-2 vaktā pāpamupādatte kṣamamāṇo vimucyate //
analyzed: vaktā pāpam upādatte kṣamamāṇaḥ vimucyate

original: MSS_4346-1 ākrośena na dūyate na ca paṭuḥ proktaḥ samānandyate durgandhena na bādhyate na ca samaṃ modena saṃjīyate /
analyzed: ākrośena na dūyate na ca paṭuḥ proktaḥ samānandyate durgandhena na bādhyate na ca samam modena saṃjīyate

original: MSS_4346-2 strīratnena na rajyate na ca mṛtasnānena vidveṣyate mādhyasthena virājito vijayate ko'pyeṣa yogīśvaraḥ //
analyzed: strī ratnena na rajyate na ca mṛta snānena vidveṣyate mādhyasthena virājitaḥ vijayate kaḥ api eṣa yogi īśvaraḥ

original: MSS_4347-1 ākṣipantyaravindāni mugdhe tava mukhaśriyam /
analyzed: ākṣipanti aravindāni mugdhe tava mukha śriyam

original: MSS_4347-2 koṣadaṇḍasamagrāṇāṃ kimeṣāmasti duṣkaram //
analyzed: koṣa daṇḍa samagrāṇām kim eṣām asti duṣkaram

original: MSS_4348-1 ākṣipasi karṇamakṣṇā balirapi baddhastvayā tridhā madhye /
analyzed: ākṣipasi karṇam akṣṇā baliḥ api baddhaḥ tvayā tridhā madhye

original: MSS_4348-2 iti jitasakalavadānye tanudāne lajjase sutanu //
analyzed: iti jita sakala vadānye tanu dāne lajjase su tano

original: MSS_4349-1 ākṣiptasaṃpātamapetaśobham udvahni dhūmākuladigvibhāgam /
analyzed: ākṣipta saṃpātam apeta śobham udvahni dhūma ākula diś vibhāgam

original: MSS_4349-2 vṛtaṃ nabho bhogikulairavasthāṃ paroparuddhasya purasya bheje //
analyzed: vṛtam nabhaḥ bhogi kulaiḥ avasthām para uparuddhasya purasya bheje

original: MSS_4350-1 ākṣiptā cāmaraśrīḥ prasabhamapahṛtaḥ pauṇḍarīko vilāsaḥ pracchanno vīrakambuḥ samajani vihitaḥ kaṇṭhabhārāya hāraḥ /
analyzed: ākṣiptā cāmara śrīḥ prasabham apahṛtaḥ pauṇḍarīkaḥ vilāsaḥ pracchannaḥ vīra kambuḥ samajani vihitaḥ kaṇṭha bhārāya hāraḥ

original: MSS_4350-2 lupto hāsaprakāśaḥ kamapi paribhavaṃ prāpitaḥ puṣparāśiś candrābhairyadyaśobhiḥ pratidharaṇibhujāṃ nihnutā kiṃ ca kīrtiḥ //
analyzed: luptaḥ hāsa prakāśaḥ kam api paribhavam prāpitaḥ puṣparāśiḥ candra ābhaiḥ yad yaśobhiḥ prati dharaṇi bhujām nihnutā kim ca kīrtiḥ

original: MSS_4351-1 ākṣiptaiḥ pratipakṣabhūmipatibhiḥ kruddhena deva tvayā vitrastairna mahāyudhāni vividhānyāviṣkriyante yudhi /
analyzed: ākṣiptaiḥ pratipakṣa bhūmipatibhiḥ kruddhena deva tvayā vitrastaiḥ na mahā āyudhāni vividhāni āviṣkriyante yudhi

original: MSS_4351-2 dūrāvarjitamaulayastava purastanvanti te kevalaṃ nānākārakirīṭaratnanikarairindrāyudhāni kṣitau //
analyzed: dūra āvarjita maulayaḥ tava puras tanvanti te kevalam nānā ākāra kirīṭa ratna nikaraiḥ indrāyudhāni kṣitau

original: MSS_4352-1 ākṣepacaraṇalaṅghana- keśagrahakelikutukataralena /
analyzed: ākṣepa caraṇa laṅghana keśa graha keli kutuka taralena

original: MSS_4352-2 strīṇāṃ patirapi gururiti dharmaṃ na śrāvitā sutanuḥ //
analyzed: strīṇām patiḥ api guruḥ iti dharmam na śrāvitā su tanuḥ

original: MSS_4353-1 ākṣepavacanaṃ tasya na vaktavyaṃ kadācana /
analyzed: ākṣepa vacanam tasya na vaktavyam kadācana

original: MSS_4353-2 anukūlaṃ priyaṃ cāsya vaktavyaṃ janasaṃsadi //
analyzed: anukūlam priyam ca asya vaktavyam jana saṃsadi

original: MSS_4354-1 ākhuḥ kailāsaśailaṃ tulayati karaṭastārkṣyamāṃsābhilāṣī babhrurlāṅgūlamūlaṃ calayati capalastakṣakāhiṃ jighāṃsuḥ /
analyzed: ākhuḥ kailāsa śailam tulayati karaṭaḥ tārkṣya māṃsa abhilāṣī babhruḥ lāṅgūla mūlam calayati capalaḥ takṣaka ahim jighāṃsuḥ

original: MSS_4354-2 bhekaḥ pāraṃ yiyāsurbhujagamapi mahāghasmarasyāmburāśeḥ prāyeṇāsannapātaḥ smarati samucitaṃ karma na kṣudrakarmā //
analyzed: bhekaḥ pāram yiyāsuḥ bhujagam api mahā aghasmarasya amburāśeḥ prāyeṇa āsanna pātaḥ smarati samucitam karma na kṣudra karmā

original: MSS_4355-1 ākhunā bhakṣitasyātha nāmoccārya samuddharet /
analyzed: ākhunā bhakṣitasya atha nāma uccārya samuddharet

original: MSS_4355-2 mārgadhūliṃ kṣiped dūraṃ tasya śīghraṃ sukhaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: mārga dhūlim kṣipet dūram tasya śīghram sukham bhavet

original: MSS_4356-1 ākhubhyaḥ kiṃ khalairjñātaṃ khalebhyaśca kimākhubhiḥ /
analyzed: ākhubhyaḥ kim khalaiḥ jñātam khalebhyaḥ ca kim ākhubhiḥ

original: MSS_4356-2 anyat paragṛhotkhātāt karma yeṣāṃ na vidyate //
analyzed: anyat para gṛha utkhātāt karma yeṣām na vidyate

original: MSS_4357-1 ākhurvāñchati bhasmasūtraharaṇaṃ vyālastathā mūṣakaṃ vyālaṃ barhirayaṃ hariśca vṛṣabhaṃ gaṅgā tathā candrakam /
analyzed: ākhuḥ vāñchati bhasma sūtra haraṇam vyālaḥ tathā mūṣakam vyālam barhiḥ ayam hariḥ ca vṛṣabham gaṅgā tathā candrakam

original: MSS_4357-2 itthaṃ duḥkhamaharniśaṃ śṛṇu vibho soḍhavyametat kathaṃ śaṃbhorātmadaśānibodhanaparaṃ tvāṃ pātu dīnaṃ vacaḥ //
analyzed: ittham duḥkham aharniśam śṛṇu vibho soḍhavyam etat katham śaṃbhoḥ ātma daśā nibodhana param tvām pātu dīnam vacaḥ

original: MSS_4358-1 ākheṭakaṃ vṛthākleśaṃ mūrkhaṃ vyasanasaṃsthitam /
analyzed: ākheṭakam vṛthak kleśam mūrkham vyasana saṃsthitam

original: MSS_4358-2 samālāpena yo yuṅkte sa gacchati parābhavam //
analyzed: samālāpena yaḥ yuṅkte sa gacchati parābhavam

original: MSS_4359-1 ākheṭakasya dharmeṇa vibhavāḥ syurvaśe nṛṇām /
analyzed: ākheṭakasya dharmeṇa vibhavāḥ syuḥ vaśe nṛṇām

original: MSS_4359-2 nṛprajāḥ prerayatyeko hantyanyo'tra mṛgāniva //
analyzed: nṛ prajāḥ prerayati ekaḥ hanti anyaḥ utra mṛgān iva

original: MSS_4360-1 ākhyātanāmaracanācaturasrasaṃdhi- saddhātvalaṃkṛtiguṇaṃ sarasaṃ suvṛttam /
analyzed: ākhyāta nāma racanā catur asra saṃdhi sat dhātu alaṃkṛti guṇam sa rasam su vṛttam

original: MSS_4360-2 āseduṣāmapi divaṃ kavipuṃgavānāṃ tiṣṭhatyakhaṇḍamiha kāvyamayaṃ śarīram //
analyzed: āseduṣām api divam kavi puṃgavānām tiṣṭhati akhaṇḍam iha kāvya mayam śarīram

original: MSS_4361-1 ākhyāte hasitaṃ pitāmaha iti trastaṃ kapālīti ca vyāvṛttaṃ gururityasau dahana ityāviṣkṛtā bhīrutā /
analyzed: ākhyāte hasitam pitāmahaḥ iti trastam kapālī iti ca vyāvṛttam guruḥ iti asau dahanaḥ iti āviṣkṛtā bhīru tā

original: MSS_4361-2 paulomīpatirityasūyitamatha vrīḍāvanamraṃ śriyā pāyād vaḥ puruṣottamo'yamiti ca nyastaḥ sa puṣpāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: paulomī patiḥ iti asūyitam atha vrīḍā avanamram śriyā pāyāt vaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ūyam iti ca nyastaḥ sa puṣpa añjaliḥ

original: MSS_4362-1 ākhyāyikānurāgī vrajati sadā puṇyapustakaṃ śrotum /
analyzed: ākhyāyikā anurāgī vrajati sadā puṇya pustakam śrotum

original: MSS_4362-2 daṣṭa iva kṛṣṇasarpaiḥ palāyate dānadharmebhyaḥ //
analyzed: daṣṭaḥ iva kṛṣṇa sarpaiḥ palāyate dāna dharmebhyaḥ

original: MSS_4363-1 ākhyāstadīyā rucirārthapoṣā gāyanti kośādhikṛtāḥ satoṣāḥ /
analyzed: ākhyāḥ tadīyāḥ rucira artha poṣāḥ gāyanti kośa adhikṛtāḥ sa toṣāḥ

original: MSS_4363-2 paraṃtu puṇyairiha harṣadhāma prāptaṃ tvayā saṃprati cūtanāma //
analyzed: paraṃtu puṇyaiḥ iha harṣa dhāma prāptam tvayā saṃprati cūta nāma

original: MSS_4364-1 āgacchatāṃ ca tucchānām atucchānāṃ ca gacchatām /
analyzed: āgacchatām ca tucchānām a tucchānām ca gacchatām

original: MSS_4364-2 yadadhvani na saṃghaṭṭo ghaṭānāṃ tad vṛthā saraḥ //
analyzed: yat adhvani na saṃghaṭṭaḥ ghaṭānām tat vṛthā saraḥ

original: MSS_4365-1 āgacchatānavekṣita- pṛṣṭhenārthī varāṭakeneva /
analyzed: āgacchatā anavekṣita pṛṣṭhena arthī varāṭakena iva

original: MSS_4365-2 muṣitāsmi tena jaghanāṃ- śukamapi voḍhuṃ naśaktena //
analyzed: muṣitā asmi tena jaghanām śukam api voḍhum na śaktena

original: MSS_4366-1 āgacchadutsavo bhāti yathaiva na tathā gataḥ /
analyzed: āgacchat utsavaḥ bhāti yathā eva na tathā gataḥ

original: MSS_4366-2 himāṃśorudayaḥ sāyaṃ cakāsti na tathoṣasi //
analyzed: himāṃśoḥ udayaḥ sāyam cakāsti na tathā uṣasi

original: MSS_4367-1 āgacchadurvīndracamūsamutthair bhūreṇubhiḥ pāṇḍuritā mukhaśrīḥ /
analyzed: āgacchat urvī indra camū samutthaiḥ bhū reṇubhiḥ pāṇḍuritā mukha śrīḥ

original: MSS_4367-2 vispaṣṭamācaṣṭa haridvadhūnāṃ rūpaṃ patityāgadaśānurūpam //
analyzed: vispaṣṭam ācaṣṭa harit vadhūnām rūpam pati tyāga daśā anurūpam

original: MSS_4368-1 āgacchantyavaguṇṭhayantyatha punaḥ paśyanti jighranti ca svārabdhaṃ madhumakṣikāṃ na kaṇamapyasya svayaṃ bhuñjate /
analyzed: āgacchanti avaguṇṭhayanti atha punar paśyanti jighranti ca sva ārabdham madhumakṣikām na kaṇam api asya svayam bhuñjate

original: MSS_4368-2 dhanyastvanya upetya nirbhayamamūrutsārayan dūrataḥ svādaṃsvādamidaṃ svasaṃbhṛtamiva svacchandamānandati //
analyzed: dhanyaḥ tu anyaḥ upetya nirbhayam amūḥ utsārayan dūratas svādam svādam idam sva saṃbhṛtam iva svacchandam ānandati

original: MSS_4369-1 āgacchan sūcito yena yenānīto gṛhaṃ prati /
analyzed: āgacchan sūcitaḥ yena yena ānītaḥ gṛham prati

original: MSS_4369-2 prathamaṃ sakhi kaḥ pūjyaḥ kiṃ kākaḥ kiṃ kramelakaḥ //
analyzed: prathamam sakhi kaḥ pūjyaḥ kim kākaḥ kim kramelakaḥ

original: MSS_4370-1 āgacchāgaccha sajjaṃ kuru varaturagaṃ saṃnidhehi drutaṃ me khaṅgaḥ kvāsau kṛpāṇīmupanaya dhanuṣā kiṃ kimaṅga praviṣṭam /
analyzed: āgaccha āgaccha sajjam kuru vara turagam saṃnidhehi drutam me khaṅgaḥ kva asau kṛpāṇīm upanaya dhanuṣā kim kim aṅga praviṣṭam

original: MSS_4370-2 saṃrambhonnidritānāṃ kṣitibhṛti gahane'nyo'nyamevaṃ pratīcchan vādaḥ svapnābhidṛṣṭe tvayi cakitadṛśāṃ vidviṣāmāvirāsīt //
analyzed: saṃrambha unnidritānām kṣitibhṛti gahanenyonyam evam pratīcchan vādaḥ svapna abhidṛṣṭe tvayi cakita dṛśām vidviṣām āvirāsīt

original: MSS_4371-1 āgacchāmi jhaṭityahaṃ priyatame kāryaṃ vidhāyālpakaṃ gatvetastvamihaiva tiṣṭha vijane tāvadgṛhe sundare /
analyzed: āgacchāmi jhaṭiti aham priyatame kāryam vidhāya alpakam gatvā itas tvam iha eva tiṣṭha vijane tāvat gṛhe sundare

original: MSS_4371-2 ityuktvā sakhi vañcakaḥ sa tu gatastatra sthitā yā niśā sarvā sā hi gatā mamātikuṭilo no vai tathāpyāgataḥ //
analyzed: iti uktvā sakhi vañcakaḥ sa tu gataḥ tatra sthitā yā niśā sarvā sā hi gatā mama ati kuṭilaḥ no vai tathā api āgataḥ

original: MSS_4372-1 āgataṃ vigrahaṃ vidvān upāyaiḥ praśamaṃ nayet /
analyzed: āgatam vigraham vidvān upāyaiḥ praśamam nayet

original: MSS_4372-2 vijayasya hyanityatvād rabhasena na saṃpatet //
analyzed: vijayasya hi anitya tvāt rabhasena na saṃpatet

original: MSS_4373-1 āgataḥ patiritīritaṃ janaiḥ śṛṇvatī cakitametya dehalīm /
analyzed: āgataḥ patiḥ iti īritam janaiḥ śṛṇvatī cakitam etya dehalīm

original: MSS_4373-2 kaumudīva śiśirīkariṣyate locane mama kadā mṛgekṣaṇā //
analyzed: kaumudī iva śiśirīkariṣyate locane mama kadā mṛga īkṣaṇā

original: MSS_4374-1 āgataḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve duryodhanasamīhayā /
analyzed: āgataḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve duryodhana samīhayā

original: MSS_4374-2 tasmai gāṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca ratnāni vividhāni ca //
analyzed: tasmai gām ca suvarṇam ca ratnāni vividhāni ca

original: MSS_4375-1 āgatavyayaśīlasya kṛśatvamatiśobhate /
analyzed: āgata vyaya śīlasya kṛśa tvam atiśobhate

original: MSS_4375-2 dvitīyaścandramā vandyo na vandyaḥ pūrṇacandramāḥ //
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ candramāḥ vandyaḥ na vandyaḥ pūrṇa candramāḥ

original: MSS_4376-1 āgataśca gataścaiva gatvā yaḥ punarāgataḥ /
analyzed: āgataḥ ca gataḥ ca eva gatvā yaḥ punar āgataḥ

original: MSS_4376-2 akarṇahṛdayo mūrkhas tatraiva nidhanaṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: a karṇa hṛdayaḥ mūrkhaḥ tatra eva nidhanam gataḥ

original: MSS_4377-1 āgatānagaṇitapratiyātān vallabhānabhisisārayiṣūṇām /
analyzed: āgatān a gaṇita pratiyātān vallabhān abhisisārayiṣūṇām

original: MSS_4377-2 prāpi cetasi savipratisāre subhruvāmavasaraḥ sarakeṇa //
analyzed: prāpi cetasi sa vipratisāre subhruvām avasaraḥ sarakeṇa

original: MSS_4378-1 āgatānāmapūrṇānāṃ pūrṇānāmapi gacchatām /
analyzed: āgatānām apūrṇānām pūrṇānām api gacchatām

original: MSS_4378-2 yadadhvani na saṃghaṭṭo ghaṭānāṃ tat saro'varam //
analyzed: yat adhvani na saṃghaṭṭaḥ ghaṭānām tat sarovaram

original: MSS_4379-1 āgate kusumadhanvini tanvyā mānasād bahirabhūt kucakokaḥ /
analyzed: āgate kusumadhanvini tanvyāḥ mānasāt bahis abhūt kuca kokaḥ

original: MSS_4379-2 tiṣṭhatāsya sarasīruhacakṣuḥ khañjanena cakitaṃ sahasaiva //
analyzed: tiṣṭhata asya sarasīruha cakṣuḥ khañjanena cakitam sahasā eva

original: MSS_4380-1 āgatya praṇipātasāntvitasakhīdattāntare sāgasi svairaṃ kurvati talpapārśvanibhṛte dhūrte'ṅgasaṃvāhanam /
analyzed: āgatya praṇipāta sāntvita sakhī datta antare sāgasi svairam kurvati talpa pārśva nibhṛte dhūrta iṅga saṃvāhanam

original: MSS_4380-2 jñātvā sparśavaśāt tayā kila sakhībhrāntyā svavakṣaḥ śanaiḥ khinnāsītyabhidhāya mīlitadṛśā sānandamāropitaḥ //
analyzed: jñātvā sparśa vaśāt tayā kila sakhī bhrāntyā sva vakṣaḥ śanais khinnā asi iti abhidhāya mīlita dṛśā sa ānandam āropitaḥ

original: MSS_4381-1 āgatya saṃprati viyogavisaṃṣṭhulāṅgīm ambhojinīṃ kvacidapi kṣapitatriyāmaḥ /
analyzed: āgatya saṃprati viyoga visaṃṣṭhula aṅgīm ambhojinīm kvacid api kṣapita triyāmaḥ

original: MSS_4381-2 etāṃ prasādayati paśya śanaiḥ prabhāte tanvaṅgi pādapatanena sahasraraśmiḥ //
analyzed: etām prasādayati paśya śanais prabhāte tanu aṅgi pāda patanena sahasraraśmiḥ

original: MSS_4382-1 āgatya samprati śaratsamayaḥ prasādād īṣadvihasya vikasatkumudacchalena /
analyzed: āgatya samprati śarad samayaḥ prasādāt īṣat vihasya vikasat kumuda chalena

original: MSS_4382-2 utsārya roṣamiva vāridharoparodham eṣa prasādayati digvanitāmukhāni //
analyzed: utsārya roṣam iva vāridhara uparodham eṣa prasādayati diś vanitā mukhāni

original: MSS_4383-1 āgatya satvaramasī ravirambarāntam ullāsya pādapatanaiḥ sphuṭasāṃdhyarāgaḥ /
analyzed: āgatya sa tvara masī raviḥ ambara antam ullāsya pāda patanaiḥ sphuṭa sāṃdhya rāgaḥ

original: MSS_4383-2 paśya prasādayati rāgavatīṃ pratīcī- dikkāminīṃ prakupitāmiva manyamānaḥ //
analyzed: paśya prasādayati rāgavatīm pratīcī diś kāminīm prakupitām iva manyamānaḥ

original: MSS_4384-1 āgatyaiva kutaścideva gaganābhogaṃ ca kṛtvātmasāt bhāvābhāvavilokanāspadamamūn nītvendumukhyānapi /
analyzed: āgatya eva kutaścid eva gagana ābhogam ca kṛtvā ātmasāt bhāva abhāva vilokana āspadam amūn nītvā indu mukhyān api

original: MSS_4384-2 jājvalyaṃ jagato vidhāya kimapi prāptaḥ priyo'hnāṃ patir yātvastaṃ praviśatvathābdhimathavā merau paribhrāmyatu //
analyzed: jājvalyam jagataḥ vidhāya kim api prāptaḥ priyaḥ ūhnām patiḥ yātu astam praviśatu atha abdhim athavā merau paribhrāmyatu

original: MSS_4385-1 āgantau jāṅghike caiva sarve kākāḥ samāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: āgantau jāṅghike ca eva sarve kākāḥ samāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: MSS_4385-2 kṣetraje śakune grāhyaḥ kākolasteṣu sarvadā //
analyzed: kṣetra je śakune grāhyaḥ kākolaḥ teṣu sarvadā

original: MSS_4386-1 āgamaṃ nirgamaṃ sthānaṃ tathā vṛddhikṣayāvubhau /
analyzed: āgamam nirgamam sthānam tathā vṛddhi kṣayau ubhau

original: MSS_4386-2 vicārya sarvapaṇyānāṃ kārayet krayavikrayau //
analyzed: vicārya sarva paṇyānām kārayet kraya vikrayau

original: MSS_4387-1 āgamarūpavicāriṇy adhikaraṇasahasraśikṣitavipakṣe /
analyzed: āgama rūpa vicāriṇi adhikaraṇa sahasra śikṣita vipakṣe

original: MSS_4387-2 svāminijaiminiyoginy uparajyati hṛdayamasmadīyamidam //
analyzed: svāmini jaimini yogini uparajyati hṛdayam asmadīyam idam

original: MSS_4388-1 āgamādeva narakāḥ śrūyante rauravādayaḥ /
analyzed: āgamāt eva narakāḥ śrūyante raurava ādayaḥ

original: MSS_4388-2 viṣayitvaṃ daridrāṇāṃ pratyakṣaṃ narakaṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: viṣayi tvam daridrāṇām pratyakṣam narakam viduḥ

original: MSS_4389-1 āgamārthaṃ hi yatate rakṣaṇārthaṃ hi sarvadā /
analyzed: āgama artham hi yatate rakṣaṇa artham hi sarvadā

original: MSS_4389-2 kuṭumbapoṣaṇe svāmī tadanye taskarā iva //
analyzed: kuṭumba poṣaṇe svāmī tad anye taskarāḥ iva

original: MSS_4390-1 āgamiṣyanti te bhāvā ye bhāvā mayi bhāvinaḥ /
analyzed: āgamiṣyanti te bhāvāḥ ye bhāvāḥ mayi bhāvinaḥ

original: MSS_4390-2 ahaṃ tairanusartavyo na teṣāmanyato gatiḥ //
analyzed: aham taiḥ anusartavyaḥ na teṣām anyatas gatiḥ

original: MSS_4391-1 āgamena ca yuktyā ca yo'rthaḥ samabhigamyate /
analyzed: āgamena ca yuktyā ca yaḥ ṛthaḥ samabhigamyate

original: MSS_4391-2 parīkṣya hemavad grāhyaḥ pakṣapātagraheṇa kim //
analyzed: parīkṣya hema vat grāhyaḥ pakṣapāta graheṇa kim

original: MSS_4392-1 āgame yasya catvāri nirgame sārdhapañca ca /
analyzed: āgame yasya catvāri nirgame sārdha pañca ca
