original: MSS_4392-2 ativistāravistīrṇāś ciraṃ tiṣṭhanti no śriyaḥ //
analyzed: ati vistāra vistīrṇāḥ ciram tiṣṭhanti na u śriyaḥ

original: MSS_4393-1 āgamo'bhyadhiko bhogād vinā pūrvakramāgatāt /
analyzed: āgamaḥ abhyadhikaḥ bhogāt vinā pūrva krama āgatāt

original: MSS_4393-2 āgame'pi balaṃ naiva bhuktiḥ stokāpi yatra no //
analyzed: āgame pi balam nā eva bhuktiḥ stokā api yatra no

original: MSS_4394-1 āgarjadgirikuñjakuñjaraghaṭānistīrṇakarṇajvaraṃ jyānirghoṣamamandadundubhiravairādhmātamuttambhayan /
analyzed: āgarjat giri kuñja kuñjara ghaṭā a nistīrṇa karṇa jvaram jyā nirghoṣam amanda dundubhi ravaiḥ ādhmātam uttambhayan

original: MSS_4394-2 velladbhairavaruṇḍamuṇḍanikarairvīro vidhatte bhuvaṃ tṛpyatkālakarālavaktravighasavyākīryamāṇāmiva //
analyzed: vellat bhairava ruṇḍa muṇḍa nikaraiḥ vīraḥ vidhatte bhuvam tṛpyat kāla karāla vaktra vighasa vyākīryamāṇām iva

original: MSS_4395-1 āgarbhamābaddhamamarṣaśīlaḥ pituḥ smaran kṣatrakṛtāparādham /
analyzed: āgarbham ābaddham amarṣa śīlaḥ pituḥ smaran kṣatra kṛta aparādham

original: MSS_4395-2 paraśvadhenaiva bhṛgupravīraḥ prāṇairviyojyāpi ripūṃśchinatti //
analyzed: paraśvadhena eva bhṛgu pravīraḥ prāṇaiḥ viyojya api ripūn chinatti

original: MSS_4396-1 ā garbhād ā kulaparivṛḍhād ā caturvaktrato'pi tvatpādābjaprapadanaparān vetsi naścandramaule /
analyzed: ā garbhāt ā kula parivṛḍhāt ā caturvaktra taḥ api tvad pāda abja prapadana parān vetsi naḥ candramaule

original: MSS_4396-2 māyāyāśca prapadanapareṣvapravṛttiṃ tvamāttha svāminnevaṃ sati yaducitaṃ tatra devaḥ pramāṇam //
analyzed: māyāyāḥ ca prapadana pareṣu apravṛttim tvam āttha svāmin evam sati yat ucitam tatra devaḥ pramāṇam

original: MSS_4397-1 āgaskāriṇi kaiṭabhapramathane tattāḍanārthaṃ ruṣā nābhīpaṅkajamastratāṃ gamayituṃ jāte prayatne śriyaḥ /
analyzed: āgaskāriṇi kaiṭabha pramathane tad tāḍana artham ruṣā nābhī paṅkajam astra tām gamayitum jāte prayatne śriyaḥ

original: MSS_4397-2 svāvāsonmathanopapāditabhayabhrāntātmanastatkṣaṇ āda abrahmaṇyaparāḥ purātanamunervāgvṛttayaḥ pāntu vaḥ //
analyzed: sva āvāsa unmathana upapādita bhaya bhrānta ātmanaḥ tad kṣaṇ adaḥ abrahmaṇya parāḥ purātana muneḥ vāc vṛttayaḥ pāntu vaḥ

original: MSS_4398-1 āgāradāhī mitraghnaḥ śākunirgrāmayājakaḥ /
analyzed: āgāra dāhī mitra ghnaḥ śākuniḥ grāmayājakaḥ

original: MSS_4398-2 rudhirāndhe patantyete somaṃ vikrīṇate ca ye //
analyzed: rudhirāndhe patanti ete somam vikrīṇate ca ye

original: MSS_4399-1 āgulphamālambitavalguveṇī vibhāti bālā kanakāṅgayaṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: āgulpham ālambita valgu veṇī vibhāti bālā kanaka aṅgayaṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_4399-2 uttīrṇamaurvīva vaśīkṛtorvī manobhuvaścampakacāpavallī //
analyzed: uttīrṇa maurvī iva vaśīkṛta urvī manobhuvaḥ campaka cāpa vallī

original: MSS_4400-1 āgneyāstrapravīṇaprabalamṛgabhaṭāḥ śatrusaṃkṣobhadakṣā yasya prauḍhapratāpānalabahalaśikhāsvindhanatvaṃ prayānti /
analyzed: āgneya astra pravīṇa prabala mṛga bhaṭāḥ śatru saṃkṣobha dakṣāḥ yasya prauḍha pratāpa anala bahala śikhāsu indhana tvam prayānti

original: MSS_4400-2 so'yaṃ prācīpayodhiprahitakaratatītūrṇasaṃpūrṇakopo bāṅgālakṣoṇipālastribhuvanajanatāgītakīrti prarohaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam prācī payodhi prahita kara tatī tūrṇa saṃpūrṇa kopaḥ bāṅgāla kṣoṇi pālaḥ tribhuvana jana tā gīta kīrti prarohaḥ

original: MSS_4401-1 āgneyīmeti śītādiva diśamaruṇo vāsarāḥ saṃkucantī- vāsaṃstarṣe'pi toyād vahati tanuśikhī śītapīḍāṃ pramārṣṭi (?) /
analyzed: āgneyīm eti śītāt iva diśam aruṇaḥ vāsarāḥ saṃkucantī toyāt vahati tanu śikhī śīta pīḍām pramārṣṭi

original: MSS_4401-2 talpe'nalpaprakopapravidalitadṛḍhāliṅganagranthibandhe labdhvā saṃdhānarandhraṃ nibiḍayati jaḍo dampatī mātariśvā //
analyzed: talpena alpa prakopa pravidalita dṛḍha āliṅgana granthi bandhe labdhvā saṃdhāna randhram nibiḍayati jaḍaḥ dampatī mātariśvā

original: MSS_4402-1 āgneye yadi koṇe grāmasya purasya vā bhavati kūpaḥ /
analyzed: āgneye yadi koṇe grāmasya purasya vā bhavati kūpaḥ

original: MSS_4402-2 nityaṃ sa karoti bhayaṃ dāhaṃ ca samānuṣaṃ prāyaḥ //
analyzed: nityam sa karoti bhayam dāham ca sa mānuṣam prāyas

original: MSS_4403-1 āgneyyāmanalājī- vikayuvatipravaradhātulābhaśca /
analyzed: āgneyyām analājī vika yuvati pravara dhātu lābhaḥ ca

original: MSS_4403-2 yāmye māṣakulatthaṃ bhojyaṃ gāndharvikairyogaḥ //
analyzed: yāmye māṣa kulattham bhojyam gāndharvikaiḥ yogaḥ

original: MSS_4404-1 āghaṭṭayati mantrāṇi bruvan hāsyaṃ prapadyate /
analyzed: āghaṭṭayati mantrāṇi bruvan hāsyam prapadyate

original: MSS_4404-2 saṃbhāvayati doṣeṇa vṛtticchedaṃ karoti ca //
analyzed: saṃbhāvayati doṣeṇa vṛtti chedam karoti ca

original: MSS_4405-1 āghātaṃ nīyamānasya vadhyasyeva pade pade /
analyzed: āghātam nīyamānasya vadhyasya iva pade pade

original: MSS_4405-2 āsannataratāṃ yāti mṛtyurjantordine dine //
analyzed: āsannatara tām yāti mṛtyuḥ jantoḥ dine dine

original: MSS_4406-1 āghūrṇadvapuṣaḥ skhalanmṛdugiraḥ kiñcillasadvāsaso revatyāṃ saniṣaṇṇaniḥsahabhujasyātāmranetradyuteḥ /
analyzed: āghūrṇat vapuṣaḥ skhalat mṛdu giraḥ kiñcid lasat vāsasaḥ revatyām sa niṣaṇṇa niḥsaha bhujasya ātāmra netra dyuteḥ

original: MSS_4406-2 śvāsāmodamadāndhaṣaṭpadakulavyādaṣṭak aṇṭhasrajaḥ pāyāsuḥ parimantharāṇi halino mattasya yātāni vaḥ //
analyzed: śvāsa āmoda mada andha ṣaṭpada kula vyādaṣṭaś aṇṭha srajaḥ pāyāsuḥ parimantharāṇi halinaḥ mattasya yātāni vaḥ

original: MSS_4407-1 āghūrṇitaṃ pakṣmalamakṣipadmaṃ prāntadyutiśvaityajitāmṛtāṃśu /
analyzed: āghūrṇitam pakṣmalam akṣi padmam prānta dyuti śvaitya jita amṛta aṃśu

original: MSS_4407-2 asyā ivāsyāścaladindranīla- golāmalaśyāmalatāratāram //
analyzed: asyāḥ iva asyāḥ calat indranīla gola amala śyāmala tāra tāram

original: MSS_4408-1 āghrāṇaśravaṇāvalokanarasāsvādādayaścumbana- śraddhā vāgviṣavarṣaṇaṃ ca śiraso doṣā ime yairjanaḥ /
analyzed: āghrāṇa śravaṇa avalokana rasa āsvāda ādayaḥ cumbana śraddhā vāc viṣa varṣaṇam ca śirasaḥ doṣāḥ ime yaiḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_4408-2 mūḍho laṅghitasatpatho'yamiti saṃkruddhaḥ śaṭhānāṃ haṭhād yaḥ śīrṣāṇi kṛpāṇapāṇiralunāt tasmai namaḥ kalkine //
analyzed: mūḍhaḥ laṅghita sat pathaḥ yam iti saṃkruddhaḥ śaṭhānām haṭhāt yaḥ śīrṣāṇi kṛpāṇa pāṇiḥ alunāt tasmai namaḥ kalkine

original: MSS_4409-1 āghrātaṃ kamalaṃ priyeṇa sudṛśā smitvāpanītaṃ mukhaṃ dattaṃ vibhramakanduke nakhapadaṃ sītkṛtya gūḍhau stanau /
analyzed: āghrātam kamalam priyeṇa sudṛśā smitvā apanītam mukham dattam vibhrama kanduke nakha padam sītkṛtya gūḍhau stanau

original: MSS_4409-2 dattā campakamālikorasi bhujānirbhinnaromāñcayā mīlallocanayā sthitaṃ praṇayinordūre'pi pūrṇo rasaḥ //
analyzed: dattā campaka mālikā urasi bhuja a nirbhinna romāñcayā mīlat locanayā sthitam praṇayinoḥ dūre pi pūrṇaḥ rasaḥ

original: MSS_4410-1 āghrātaṃ parilīḍhamugranakharaiḥ kṣuṇṇaṃ ca yaccarvitaṃ kṣiptaṃ yad bhuvi nīrasatvakupiteneti vyathāṃ mā kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: āghrātam parilīḍham ugra nakharaiḥ kṣuṇṇam ca yat carvitam kṣiptam yat bhuvi nīrasa tva kupitena iti vyathām mā kṛthāḥ

original: MSS_4410-2 he māṇikya tavaitadeva kuśalaṃ yadvānareṇāgrahād antaḥsattvanirūpaṇāya sahasā cūrṇīkṛtaṃ nāśmanā //
analyzed: he māṇikya tava etat eva kuśalam yat vānareṇa āgrahāt antar sattva nirūpaṇāya sahasā cūrṇīkṛtam na aśmanā

original: MSS_4411-1 āghrātaṃ maraṇena janma jarayā yātyujjvalaṃ yauvanaṃ saṃtoṣo dhanalipsayā śamasukhaṃ prauḍhāṅganāvibhramaiḥ /
analyzed: āghrātam maraṇena janma jarayā yāti ujjvalam yauvanam saṃtoṣaḥ dhana lipsayā śama sukham prauḍha aṅganā vibhramaiḥ

original: MSS_4411-2 lokairmatsaribhirguṇā vanabhuvo vyālairnṛpā durjanair asthairyeṇa vibhūtirapyapahṛtā grastaṃ na kiṃ kena vā //
analyzed: lokaiḥ matsaribhiḥ guṇāḥ vana bhuvaḥ vyālaiḥ nṛpāḥ durjanaiḥ asthairyeṇa vibhūtiḥ api apahṛtā grastam na kim kena vā

original: MSS_4412-1 āghrātakṣoṇipīṭhaḥ khuraśikharasamākṛṣṭareṇusturaṅgaḥ puñjīkṛtyākhilāṅghrīn kramavaśavinamajjānurunmuktakāyaḥ /
analyzed: āghrāta kṣoṇi pīṭhaḥ khura śikhara samākṛṣṭa reṇuḥ turaṅgaḥ puñjīkṛtya akhila aṅghrīn krama vaśa vinamat jānuḥ unmukta kāyaḥ

original: MSS_4412-2 pṛṣṭhāntaḥpārśvakaṇḍūvyapanayanara sād dvistrirudvartitāṅgaḥ protthāya drāṅ nirīhaḥ kṣaṇamatha vapurāsyānupūrvyāṃ dhunoti //
analyzed: pṛṣṭha antar pārśva kaṇḍū vyapanayana ra sāt dvis tris udvartita aṅgaḥ protthāya drāk nirīhaḥ kṣaṇam atha vapuḥ āsya ānupūrvyām dhunoti

original: MSS_4413-1 āghrāya pustakaṃ dhanyāḥ sarvaṃ vidma iti sthitāḥ /
analyzed: āghrāya pustakam dhanyāḥ sarvam vidmaḥ iti sthitāḥ

original: MSS_4413-2 śatakṛtvo'pi śṛṇvanto hā na vidmo jaḍā vayam //
analyzed: śata kṛtvas api śṛṇvantaḥ hā na vidmaḥ jaḍāḥ vayam

original: MSS_4414-1 āghrāya śramajamanindyagandhabandhuṃ niśvāsaśvasanamasaktamaṅganānām /
analyzed: āghrāya śrama jam anindya gandha bandhum niśvāsa śvasanam asaktam aṅganānām

original: MSS_4414-2 āraṇyāḥ sumanasa īṣire na bhṛṅgair aucityaṃ gaṇayati ko viśeṣakāmaḥ //
analyzed: āraṇyāḥ sumanasaḥ īṣire na bhṛṅgaiḥ aucityam gaṇayati kaḥ viśeṣa kāmaḥ

original: MSS_4415-1 āghrāyāghrāya gandhaṃ vikṛtamukhapuṭo darśayan dantapaṅktiṃ dhāvannunmuktanādo muhurapi rabhasākṛṣṭayā pṛṣṭhalagnaḥ /
analyzed: āghrāya āghrāya gandham vikṛta mukha puṭaḥ darśayan danta paṅktim dhāvan unmukta nādaḥ muhur api rabhasa ākṛṣṭayā pṛṣṭha lagnaḥ

original: MSS_4415-2 gardabhyāḥ pādaghātadviguṇitasurataprītirākṛṣṭaśiśno vegādāruhyamuhyannavatarati kharaḥ khaṇḍitecchaścirāya //
analyzed: gardabhyāḥ pāda ghāta dvi guṇita surata prītiḥ ākṛṣṭa śiśnaḥ vegāt āruhya muhyan avatarati kharaḥ khaṇḍita icchaḥ cirāya

original: MSS_4416-1 ācakṣmahe bata kimadyatanīmavasthāṃ tasyādya vindhyaśikharasya mahonnatasya /
analyzed: ācakṣmahe bata kim adyatanīm avasthām tasya adya vindhya śikharasya mahā unnatasya

original: MSS_4416-2 yatraiva sapta munayastapasā niṣeduḥ so'yaṃ kilādya vasatih piśitāśanānām //
analyzed: yatra eva sapta munayaḥ tapasā niṣeduḥ sā uyam kila adya piśita aśanānām

original: MSS_4417-1 ācamyādharasindhuvāri kabarīsaṃbhārasaṃmārjite svedāmbhaḥsnapite kapolavigalatkāśmīrapaṅkojjvale /
analyzed: ācamya adhara sindhu vāri kabarī saṃbhāra saṃmārjite sveda ambhaḥ snapite kapola vigalat kāśmīra paṅka ujjvale

original: MSS_4417-2 kāñcīmantrarutena nirbharagalanmuktākalāpasrajā dhanyasyorasi ghūrṇamānanayanā pañceṣumabhyarcati //
analyzed: kāñcī mantra rutena nirbhara galat muktā kalāpa srajā dhanyasya urasi ghūrṇamāna nayanā pañceṣum abhyarcati

original: MSS_4418-1 ācarati durjano yat sahasā manaso'pyagocarānarthān /
analyzed: ācarati durjanaḥ yat sahasā manasā upi agocarān arthān

original: MSS_4418-2 tanna na jāne jāne spṛśati manaḥ kiṃ tu naiva niṣṭhuratām //
analyzed: tat na na jāne jāne spṛśati manaḥ kim tu nā eva niṣṭhura tām

original: MSS_4419-1 ācaran bahubhirvairam alpakairapi naśyati /
analyzed: ācaran bahubhiḥ vairam alpakaiḥ api naśyati

original: MSS_4419-2 janaiḥ pratyāyito'mātyaṃ pretamityatyajannṛpaḥ //
analyzed: janaiḥ pratyāyita umātyam pretam iti atyajat nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_4419A-1 ācarecca sakalāṃ raticaryāṃ kāmasūtravihitāmanavadyām /
analyzed: ācaret ca sakalām rati caryām kāmasūtra vihitām anavadyām

original: MSS_4419A-2 deśakālabalaśaktyanurodhād vaidyatantrasamayoktyaviruddhām //
analyzed: deśa kāla bala śakti anurodhāt vaidya tantra samaya ukti aviruddhām

original: MSS_4420-1 ācāntakāntirunnidrair mayūkhairahimatviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ācānta kāntiḥ unnidraiḥ mayūkhaiḥ ahima tviṣaḥ

original: MSS_4420-2 dhūsarāpi kalā cāndrī kiṃ na badhnāti locanam //
analyzed: dhūsarā api kalā cāndrī kim na badhnāti locanam

original: MSS_4421-1 ācāraṃ bhajate tyajatyapi madaṃ vairāgyamālambate kartuṃ vāñchati saṅgabhaṅgagalitottuṅgābhimānaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: ācāram bhajate tyajati api madam vairāgyam ālambate kartum vāñchati saṅga bhaṅga galita uttuṅga abhimānam tapaḥ

original: MSS_4421-2 daivanyastaviparyayaiḥ sukhaśikhābhraṣṭaḥ praṇaṣṭo janaḥ prāyastāpavilīnalohasadṛśīmāyāti karmaṇyatām //
analyzed: daiva nyasta viparyayaiḥ sukha śikhā bhraṣṭaḥ praṇaṣṭaḥ janaḥ prāyas tāpa vilīna loha sadṛśīm āyāti karmaṇya tām

original: MSS_4422-1 ācāraḥ kulamākhyāti deśamākhyāti bhāṣaṇam /
analyzed: ācāraḥ kulam ākhyāti deśam ākhyāti bhāṣaṇam

original: MSS_4422-2 saṃbhramaḥ snehamākhyāti vapurākhyāti bhojanam //
analyzed: saṃbhramaḥ sneham ākhyāti vapuḥ ākhyāti bhojanam

original: MSS_4423-1 ācāraḥ kulamākhyāti vapurākhyāti bhojanam /
analyzed: ācāraḥ kulam ākhyāti vapuḥ ākhyāti bhojanam

original: MSS_4423-2 vacanaṃ śrutamākhyāti snehamākhyāti locanam //
analyzed: vacanam śrutam ākhyāti sneham ākhyāti locanam

original: MSS_4424-1 ācāraḥ khalu kartavyaḥ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi /
analyzed: ācāraḥ khalu kartavyaḥ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ api

original: MSS_4424-2 ācāraiḥ śudhyate deho vastraṃ kṣārodakairiva //
analyzed: ācāraiḥ śudhyate dehaḥ vastram kṣāra udakaiḥ iva

original: MSS_4425-1 ācāraḥ paramo dharma ācāraḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: ācāraḥ paramaḥ dharmaḥ ācāraḥ paramam tapaḥ

original: MSS_4425-2 ācāraḥ paramaṃ jñānam ācārāt kiṃ na sādhyate //
analyzed: ācāraḥ paramam jñānam ācārāt kim na sādhyate

original: MSS_4426-1 ācāraḥ paramo dharmaḥ śrutyuktaḥ smārta eva ca /
analyzed: ācāraḥ paramaḥ dharmaḥ śruti uktaḥ smārtaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_4426-2 tasmādasmin sadā yukto nityaṃ syādātmavān dvijaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt asmin sadā yuktaḥ nityam syāt ātmavān dvijaḥ

original: MSS_4427-1 ācāraḥ paramo dharmaḥ sarveṣāmiti niścayaḥ /
analyzed: ācāraḥ paramaḥ dharmaḥ sarveṣām iti niścayaḥ

original: MSS_4427-2 hīnācāraparītātmā pretya ceha ca naśyati //
analyzed: hīna ācāra parīta ātmā pretya ca iha ca naśyati

original: MSS_4428-1 ācāraḥ prathamo dharmo nṛṇāṃ śreyaskaro mahān /
analyzed: ācāraḥ prathamaḥ dharmaḥ nṛṇām śreyaskaraḥ mahān

original: MSS_4428-2 ihaloke parā kīrtiḥ paratra paramaṃ sukham //
analyzed: ihaloke parā kīrtiḥ paratra paramam sukham

original: MSS_4429-1 ācāra ityavahitena mayā gṛhītā yā vetrayaṣṭiravarodhagṛheṣu rājñaḥ /
analyzed: ācāraḥ iti avahitena mayā gṛhītā yā vetra yaṣṭiḥ avarodha gṛheṣu rājñaḥ

original: MSS_4429-2 kāle gate bahutithe mama saiva jātā prasthānaviklavagateravalambanāya //
analyzed: kāle gate bahutithe mama sā eva jātā prasthāna viklava gateḥ avalambanāya

original: MSS_4430-1 ācāradhārādhavalīkṛtānāṃ rādhādhavārādhanamānasānām /
analyzed: ācāra dhārā dhavalīkṛtānām rādhā dhava ārādhana mānasānām

original: MSS_4430-2 vidyāvivekonnatibhūṣitānāṃ bhavādṛśānāmiha kā praśaṃsā //
analyzed: vidyā viveka unnati bhūṣitānām bhavādṛśānām iha kā praśaṃsā

original: MSS_4431-1 ācāraprabhavo dharmo nṛṇāṃ śreyaskaro mahān /
analyzed: ācāra prabhavaḥ dharmaḥ nṛṇām śreyaskaraḥ mahān

original: MSS_4431-2 ihaloke parā kīrtiḥ paratra paramaṃ sukham //
analyzed: ihaloke parā kīrtiḥ paratra paramam sukham

original: MSS_4432-1 ācāraprerako rājā hyetat kālasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: ācāra prerakaḥ rājā hi etat kālasya kāraṇam

original: MSS_4432-2 yadi kālah pramāṇaṃ hi kasmād dharmo'sti kartṛṣu //
analyzed: yadi kālaḥ pramāṇam hi kasmāt dharmaḥ usti kartṛṣu

original: MSS_4433-1 ācāramācara cirād ālasyamapāsya jātyucitam /
analyzed: ācāram ācara cirāt ālasyam apāsya jāti ucitam

original: MSS_4433-2 lokānurāgasādhanam ārādhanametadeva hareḥ //
analyzed: loka anurāga sādhanam ārādhanam etat eva hareḥ

original: MSS_4334-1 ācārasaṃbhavo dharmo dharmād vedāḥ samutthitāḥ /
analyzed: ācāra saṃbhavaḥ dharmaḥ dharmāt vedāḥ samutthitāḥ

original: MSS_4334-2 vedairyajñāḥ samutpannā yajñairdevāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ //
analyzed: vedaiḥ yajñāḥ samutpannāḥ yajñaiḥ devāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: MSS_4435-1 ācārahīnaṃ na punanti vedā yadyapyadhītā saha ṣaḍbhiraṅgaiḥ /
analyzed: ācāra hīnam na punanti vedāḥ yadi api adhītā saha ṣaḍbhiḥ aṅgaiḥ

original: MSS_4435-2 chandāṃsyenaṃ mṛtyukāle tyajanti nīḍaṃ śakuntā iva jātapakṣāḥ //
analyzed: chandāṃsi enam mṛtyu kāle tyajanti nīḍam śakuntāḥ iva jāta pakṣāḥ

original: MSS_4436-1 ācārahīnasya tu brāhmaṇasya vedāḥ ṣaḍaṅgāstvakhilāḥ sayajñāḥ /
analyzed: ācāra hīnasya tu brāhmaṇasya vedāḥ ṣaṣ aṅgāḥ tu akhilāḥ sa yajñāḥ

original: MSS_4436-2 kāṃ prītimutpādayituṃ samarthā andhasya dārā iva darśanīyāḥ //
analyzed: kām prītim utpādayitum samarthāḥ andhasya dārāḥ iva darśanīyāḥ

original: MSS_4437-1 ācārāt phalate dharma ācārāt phalate dhanam /
analyzed: ācārāt phalate dharmaḥ ācārāt phalate dhanam

original: MSS_4437-2 ācārācchriyamāpnoti ācāro hantyalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: ācārāt śriyam āpnoti ācāraḥ hanti alakṣaṇam

original: MSS_4438-1 ācārād vicyuto vipro na vedaphalamaśnute /
analyzed: ācārāt vicyutaḥ vipraḥ na veda phalam aśnute

original: MSS_4438-2 ācāreṇa tu saṃyuktaḥ saṃpūrṇaphalabhāk smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: ācāreṇa tu saṃyuktaḥ saṃpūrṇa phala bhāj smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_4439-1 ācārāllabhate dharmam ācārāllabhate dhanam /
analyzed: ācārāt labhate dharmam ācārāt labhate dhanam

original: MSS_4439-2 ācārācchriyamāpnoti ācāro hantyalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: ācārāt śriyam āpnoti ācāraḥ hanti alakṣaṇam

original: MSS_4440-1 ācārāllabhate hyāyur ācārādīpsitāṃ prajām /
analyzed: ācārāt labhate hi āyuḥ ācārāt īpsitām prajām

original: MSS_4440-2 ācārād dhanamakṣayyam ācāro hantyalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: ācārāt dhanam akṣayyam ācāraḥ hanti alakṣaṇam

original: MSS_4441-1 ācārāllabhate hyāyur ācārāllabhate śriyam /
analyzed: ācārāt labhate hi āyuḥ ācārāt labhate śriyam

original: MSS_4441-2 ācārāt kīrtimāpnoti puruṣaḥ pretya ceha ca //
analyzed: ācārāt kīrtim āpnoti puruṣaḥ pretya ca iha ca

original: MSS_4443-1 ācāro grāmavāsānto gṛhāntā prabhutā striyaḥ /
analyzed: ācāraḥ grāma vāsa antaḥ gṛha antā prabhu tā striyaḥ

original: MSS_4443-2 nṛpaśrīrbrahmaśāpāntā phalāntaṃ brahmavarcasam //
analyzed: nṛpa śrīḥ brahma śāpa antā phala antam brahmavarcasam

original: MSS_4444-1 ācāryaḥ saptayuddhaḥ syāc caturyuddhastu bhārgavaḥ /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ sapta yuddhaḥ syāt catur yuddhaḥ tu bhārgavaḥ

original: MSS_4444-2 dvābhyāṃ caiva bhaved yodha ekena gaṇako bhavet //
analyzed: dvābhyām ca eva bhavet yodhaḥ ekena gaṇakaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_4445-1 ācāryaḥ sarvaceṣṭāsu loka eva hi dhīmataḥ /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ sarva ceṣṭāsu loke eva hi dhīmataḥ

original: MSS_4445-2 anukuryāt tamevāto laukikārthe parīkṣakaḥ //
analyzed: anukuryāt tam eva atas laukika arthe parīkṣakaḥ

original: MSS_4446-1 ācāryamānīya śubhe'hni kāryaṃ paiṣṭaṃ śvayugmaṃ śucirarcayitvā /
analyzed: ācāryam ānīya śubhehni kāryam paiṣṭam śva yugmam śuciḥ arcayitvā

original: MSS_4446-2 kṣīreṇa bhojyaṃ bhaṣaṇasya tuṣṭyai dadyāt kumārīśiśubāndhavebhyaḥ //
analyzed: kṣīreṇa bhojyam bhaṣaṇasya tuṣṭyai dadyāt kumārī śiśu bāndhavebhyaḥ

original: MSS_4447-1 ācāryaśca pitā caiva mātā bhrātā ca pūrvajaḥ /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ ca pitā ca eva mātā bhrātā ca pūrvajaḥ

original: MSS_4447-2 nārtenāpyavamantavyā brāhmaṇena viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: na ārtena api avamantavyāḥ brāhmaṇena viśeṣataḥ

original: MSS_4448-1 ācāryā narapatayaśca tulyaśīlā na hyeṣāṃ paricitirasti sauhṛdaṃ vā /
analyzed: ācāryāḥ narapatayaḥ ca tulya śīlāḥ na hi eṣām paricitiḥ asti sauhṛdam vā

original: MSS_4448-2 śuśrūṣāṃ ciramapi samcitāṃ prayatnāt saṃkruddhā raja iva nāśayanti meghāḥ //
analyzed: śuśrūṣām ciram api samcitām prayatnāt saṃkruddhāḥ rajaḥ iva nāśayanti meghāḥ

original: MSS_4449-1 ācāryeṇa dhanurdeyaṃ brāhmaṇe suparīkṣite /
analyzed: ācāryeṇa dhanuḥ deyam brāhmaṇe su parīkṣite

original: MSS_4449-2 lubdhe dhūrte kṛtaghne ca mandabuddhau na dīyate //
analyzed: lubdhe dhūrte kṛtaghne ca manda buddhau na dīyate

original: MSS_4450-1 ācāryopāsanaṃ vedaśāstrārtheṣu vivekitā /
analyzed: ācārya upāsanam veda śāstra artheṣu viveki tā

original: MSS_4450-2 tatkarmaṇāmanuṣṭhānaṃ saṅgaḥ sadbhirgiraḥ śubhāḥ //
analyzed: tad karmaṇām anuṣṭhānam saṅgaḥ sadbhiḥ giraḥ śubhāḥ

original: MSS_4451-1 stryālokālambhavigamaḥ sarvabhūtātmadarśanam /
MSS_4451-2 tyāgaḥ parigrahāṇāṃ ca jīrṇakāṣāyadhāraṇam //
analyzed: tyāgaḥ parigrahāṇām ca jīrṇa kāṣāya dhāraṇam

original: MSS_4452-1 viṣayendriyasaṃrodhas tandrālasyavivarjanam /
MSS_4452-2 śarīraparisaṃkhyānaṃ pravṛttiṣvaghadarśanam //
analyzed: śarīra parisaṃkhyānam pravṛttiṣu agha darśanam

original: MSS_4453-1 nīrajastamasā sattvaśuddhirniḥspṛhatā śamaḥ /
MSS_4453-2 etairupāyaiḥ saṃśuddhaḥ sa hi yogyamṛtībhavet //
analyzed: etaiḥ upāyaiḥ saṃśuddhaḥ sa hi yogī amṛtībhavet

original: MSS_4454-1 ācāryo brahmaṇo mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ brahmaṇaḥ mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ

original: MSS_4454-2 bhrātā marutpatemūrtir mātā sākṣāt kṣitestanuḥ //
analyzed: bhrātā marutpate mūrtiḥ mātā sākṣāt kṣiteḥ tanuḥ

original: MSS_4455-1 dayāyā bhaginī mūrtir dharmasyātmātithiḥ svayam /
analyzed: dayāyāḥ bhaginī mūrtiḥ dharmasya ātmā atithiḥ svayam

original: MSS_4455-2 agnerabhyāgato mūrtiḥ sarvabhūtāni cātmanaḥ //
analyzed: agneḥ abhyāgataḥ mūrtiḥ sarva bhūtāni ca ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_4456-1 ācāryo brahmaṇo mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ brahmaṇaḥ mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ

original: MSS_4456-2 mātā pṛthivyā mūrtiśca bhrātā svo mūrtirātmanaḥ //
analyzed: mātā pṛthivyāḥ mūrtiḥ ca bhrātā svaḥ mūrtiḥ ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_4457-1 ācāryo brahmalokeśaḥ prājāpatye pitā prabhuḥ /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ brahma loka īśaḥ prājāpatye pitā prabhuḥ

original: MSS_4457-2 atithistvindralokeśo devalokasya cartvijaḥ //
analyzed: atithiḥ tu indra loka īśaḥ deva lokasya ca ṛtvijaḥ

original: MSS_4458-1 ācāryau dvārihetau (?)
analyzed: ācāryau dvāri hetau

original: śarakalaśabharau (?)
analyzed: śara kalaśa bharau

original: droṇabhūstatsamāno bhīṣmastātasya tāto dhanuṣi na sadṛśāḥ karṇaduryodhanādyāḥ /
analyzed: droṇa bhūḥ tad samānaḥ bhīṣmaḥ tātasya tātaḥ dhanuṣi na sadṛśāḥ karṇa duryodhana ādyāḥ

original: MSS_4458-2 itthaṃ hantavyacintākulahṛdayatalā kauravāṇāṃ purastād dīvyaddoḥstambhaśālī samiti vijayate pāṇḍavah khāṇḍavāriḥ //
analyzed: ittham hantavya cintā ākula hṛdaya talā kauravāṇām purastāt dīvyat dos stambha śālī samiti vijayate khāṇḍava ariḥ

original: MSS_4459-1 ācinvānamahanyahanyahani sākārān vihārakramān ārundhānamarundhatīhṛdayamapyārdrasmitārdraśriyā /
analyzed: ācinvānam ahani ahani ahani sa ākārān vihāra kramān ārundhānam arundhatī hṛdayam api ārdra smita ārdra śriyā

original: MSS_4459-2 ātanvānamananyajanmanayanaślāghyāmanarghyāṃ daśām ānandaṃ vrajasundarīstanataṭīsāmrājyamujjṛmbhate //
analyzed: ātanvānam ananya janma nayana ślāghyām anarghyām daśām ānandam vrajasundarī stana taṭī sāmrājyam ujjṛmbhate

original: MSS_4460-1 ācīrṇamaśubhaṃ karma dvijā bhogāya kalpate /
analyzed: ācīrṇam aśubham karma dvijāḥ bhogāya kalpate

original: MSS_4460-2 aveṣṭitagalo nāgaḥ kimadaṣṭvā hi gacchati //
analyzed: a veṣṭita galaḥ nāgaḥ kim a daṣṭvā hi gacchati

original: MSS_4461-1 ācumbitaṃ kāmivareṇa harṣāt sakāmavāmācibukaṃ manojñam /
analyzed: ācumbitam kāmi vareṇa harṣāt sa kāma vāmā cibukam manojñam

original: MSS_4461-2 śṛṅgārasatsaṃpuṭapadmamadhye bhṛṅgābhidhaḥ (?)
korakavad vibhāti //
analyzed: koraka vat vibhāti

original: MSS_4462-1 ācumbya bimbādharamaṅgavallīm āliṅgya saṃspṛśya kapolapālim /
analyzed: ācumbya bimba adharam aṅga vallīm āliṅgya saṃspṛśya kapola pālim

original: MSS_4462-2 śrīkhaṇḍamādāya kareṇa kāntaḥ saṃtrāsayāmāsa saroruhākṣīm //
analyzed: śrīkhaṇḍam ādāya kareṇa kāntaḥ saṃtrāsayāmāsa saroruha akṣīm

original: MSS_4463-1 ācūḍamācaraṇamamba tavānuvāram antaḥsmaran bhuvanamaṅgalamaṅgamaṅgam /
analyzed: ācūḍam ācaraṇam amba tava anuvāram antar smaran bhuvana maṅgalam aṅgam aṅgam

original: MSS_4463-2 ānandasāgarataraṅgaparamparābhir āndolito na gaṇayāmi gatānyahāni //
analyzed: ānanda sāgara taraṅga paramparābhiḥ āndolitaḥ na gaṇayāmi gatāni ahāni

original: MSS_4464-1 ācchanne kṣititejasī manasijavyāpārameyaṃ manaḥ svātmā ca dvayametadasti daśamaṃ dravyaṃ pareṣāṃ tamaḥ /
analyzed: ācchanne kṣiti tejasī manasija vyāpāram eyam manaḥ sva ātmā ca dvayam etat asti daśamam dravyam pareṣām tamaḥ

original: MSS_4464-2 kālākāśadiśāṃ nirastamadhunā nāmāpi varṣāgame dravyaṃ vāri guṇaśca vāridaravaḥ karmāpi vārikriyā //
analyzed: kāla ākāśa diśām nirastam adhunā nāma api varṣa āgame dravyam vāri guṇaḥ ca vārida ravaḥ karma api vāri kriyā

original: MSS_4465-1 ācchādayasi kiṃ mugdhe vastreṇādharapallavam /
analyzed: ācchādayasi kim mugdhe vastreṇa adhara pallavam

original: MSS_4465-2 khaṇḍitā eva śobhante vīrādharapayodharāḥ //
analyzed: khaṇḍitāḥ eva śobhante vīra adhara payodharāḥ

original: MSS_4466-1 ācchāditāyatadigambaramuccakairgām ākramya saṃsthitamudagraviśālaśṛṅgam /
analyzed: ācchādita āyata digambaram uccakais gām ākramya saṃsthitam udagra viśāla śṛṅgam

original: MSS_4466-2 mūrdhniskhalattuhinadīdhitikoṭimenam udvīkṣya ko bhuvi na vismayate nageśam //
analyzed: mūrdhni skhalat tuhina dīdhiti koṭim enam udvīkṣya kaḥ bhuvi na vismayate nageśam

original: MSS_4467-1 ācchādya puṣpapaṭameṣa mahāntamanta- rāvartibhirgṛhakapotaśirodharābhaiḥ /
analyzed: ācchādya puṣpa paṭam eṣa mahāntam anta rāvartibhiḥ gṛha kapota śirodharā ābhaiḥ

original: MSS_4467-2 svāṅgāni dhūmarucimāguravīṃ dadhānair dhūpāyatīva paṭalairnavanīradānām //
analyzed: sva aṅgāni dhūma rucim āguravīm dadhānaiḥ dhūpāyati iva paṭalaiḥ nava nīradānām

original: MSS_4468-1 ācchidya priyataḥ kadambakusumaṃ yasyāridārairnavaṃ yātrābhaṅgavidhāyino jalamucāṃ kālasya cihnaṃ mahat /
analyzed: ācchidya priyataḥ kadamba kusumam yasya ari dāraiḥ navam yātrā bhaṅga vidhāyinaḥ jalamucām kālasya cihnam mahat

original: MSS_4468-2 hṛṣyadbhiḥ paricumbitaṃ nayanayornyastaṃ hṛdi sthāpitaṃ sīmante nihitaṃ kathaṃcana tataḥ karṇāvataṃsīkṛtam //
analyzed: hṛṣyadbhiḥ paricumbitam nayanayoḥ nyastam hṛdi sthāpitam sīmante nihitam kathaṃcana tatas karṇa avataṃsīkṛtam

original: MSS_4469-1 ācchidya lakṣmīmita eva pūrvam atraiva visrambhasukhaprasuptaḥ /
analyzed: ācchidya lakṣmī mitaḥ eva pūrvam atrā eva visrambha sukha prasuptaḥ

original: MSS_4469-2 ekaḥ paraṃ veda sa kaiṭabhārir mahāśayatvaṃ makarālayasya //
analyzed: ekaḥ param veda sa kaiṭabhāriḥ mahā āśaya tvam makara ālayasya

original: MSS_4470-1 ācchidyoragamaṇḍalīkabalanākāṅkṣārasaṃ patriṇāṃ bharturyena śarīradānavidhinā manye jagadrakṣitam /
analyzed: ācchidya uraga maṇḍalīka balana ākāṅkṣā rasam patriṇām bhartuḥ yena śarīra dāna vidhinā manye jagat rakṣitam

original: MSS_4470-2 no cet tena garutmatā kabalite śeṣe nirālambanā kva kṣoṇī kva payodharāḥ kva girayaḥ kvaite diśāṃ nāyakāḥ //
analyzed: no ced tena garutmatā kabalite śeṣe nirālambanā kva kṣoṇī kva payodharāḥ kva girayaḥ kva ete diśām nāyakāḥ

original: MSS_4471-1 ājagāma yadā lakṣmīr nārikelaphalāmbuvat /
analyzed: ājagāma yadā lakṣmīḥ nārikela phala ambu vat

original: MSS_4471-2 nirjagāma yadā lakṣmīr gajabhuktakapitthavat //
analyzed: nirjagāma yadā lakṣmīḥ gaja bhukta kapittha vat

original: MSS_4472-1 ājananādāmaraṇā- dabhyasyatu vāyasastapasyatu vā /
analyzed: ājananāt āmaraṇāḥ dabhyasyatu vāyasaḥ tapasyatu vā

original: MSS_4472-2 ekāmapi kākalikāṃ kokilakānteva nākalayet //
analyzed: ekām api kākalikām kokila kāntā iva na ākalayet

original: MSS_4473-1 ājananādāmaraṇā- dabhyasyatu vāyasastapasyatu vā /
analyzed: ājananāt āmaraṇāḥ dabhyasyatu vāyasaḥ tapasyatu vā

original: MSS_4473-2 kekivadekāṃ kekāṃ kokilavat pañcamaṃ ca kiṃ kurute //
analyzed: keki vat ekām kekām kokila vat pañcamam ca kim kurute

original: MSS_4474-1 ājanmakalpatarukānanakāmacārī yatkautukādupagataḥ kuṭajaṃ milindaḥ /
analyzed: ājanma kalpataru kānana kāma cārī yad kautukāt upagataḥ kuṭajam milindaḥ

original: MSS_4474-2 tatkarmaṇaḥ susadṛśaṃ phalametadeva yatprāpya sāmyamadhunā madhumakṣikābhiḥ //
analyzed: tad karmaṇaḥ su sadṛśam phalam etat eva yat prāpya sāmyam adhunā madhumakṣikābhiḥ

original: MSS_4475-1 ā janmanaḥ kuśalamaṇvapi re kujanman pāṃso tvayā yadi kṛtaṃ vada tattvametat /
analyzed: ā janmanaḥ kuśalam aṇu api re ku janman pāṃso tvayā yadi kṛtam vada tattvam etat

original: MSS_4475-2 utthāpito'syanalasārathinā yadarthaṃ duṣṭena tatkuru kalaṅkaya viśvametat //
analyzed: utthāpitaḥ asi anala sārathinā yad artham duṣṭena tat kuru viśvam etat

original: MSS_4476-1 ā janmanaḥ pratimuhūrtaviśeṣaramyāṇy āceṣṭitāni tava saṃprati tāni tāni /
analyzed: ā janmanaḥ prati muhūrta viśeṣa ramyāṇi āceṣṭitāni tava saṃprati tāni tāni

original: MSS_4476-2 cāṭūni cārumadhurāṇi ca saṃsmṛtāni dehaṃ dahanti hṛdayaṃ ca vidārayanti //
analyzed: cāṭūni cāru madhurāṇi ca saṃsmṛtāni deham dahanti hṛdayam ca vidārayanti

original: MSS_4477-1 ā janmanaḥ śāṭhyamaśikṣito yas tasyāpramāṇaṃ vacanaṃ janasya /
analyzed: ā janmanaḥ śāṭhyam a śikṣitaḥ yaḥ tasya apramāṇam vacanam janasya

original: MSS_4477-2 parātisamdhānamadhīyate yair vidyeti te santu kilāptavācaḥ //
analyzed: para atisamdhānam adhīyate yaiḥ vidyā iti te santu kila āpta vācaḥ

original: MSS_4478-1 ā janmanaḥ sahajatulyarvivartamāna- daurgatyato'sti paramo na suhṛnmamānyaḥ /
analyzed: ā janmanaḥ paramaḥ na suhṛd mama anyaḥ

original: MSS_4478-2 yenātmano'parigaṇayya vināśamāśu deva tvadāśrayaṇapuṇyadhanaḥ kṛto'smi //
analyzed: yena ātmanā upari gaṇayya vināśam āśu deva tvad āśrayaṇa puṇya dhanaḥ kṛtaḥ asmi

original: MSS_4479-1 ā janmanaḥ saha nivāsitayā mayaiva mātuḥ payodharapayo'pi samaṃ nipīya /
analyzed: ā janmanaḥ saha nivāsitayā mayā eva mātuḥ payodhara payaḥ pi samam nipīya

original: MSS_4479-2 tvaṃ puṇḍarīkamukha bandhutayā nirastam eko nivāpasalilaṃ pibasītyayuktam //
analyzed: tvam puṇḍarīkamukha bandhu tayā nirastam ekaḥ nivāpa salilam pibasi iti ayuktam

original: MSS_4480-1 ā janmano vihitabhaktirananyanāthaḥ sārathyakarmaṇi ca dakṣatayā niyuktaḥ /
analyzed: ā janmanaḥ vihita bhaktiḥ an anya nāthaḥ sārathya karmaṇi ca dakṣa tayā niyuktaḥ

original: MSS_4480-2 nādyāpyavāpa caraṇāvaruṇo'pi sūryāt puṇyairvinā nahi bhavanti manīṣitāni //
analyzed: na adya api avāpa caraṇau aruṇaḥ api sūryāt puṇyaiḥ vinā nahi bhavanti manīṣitāni

original: MSS_4481-1 ājanmabrahmacārī pṛthulabhujaśilāstambhavibhrājamāna- jyāghātaśreṇisamjñāntaritavasumatī cakrajaitrapraśastiḥ /
analyzed: ājanma brahmacārī pṛthula bhuja śilā stambha vibhrājamāna jyā ghāta śreṇi samjñā antarita vasumatī cakra jaitra praśastiḥ

original: MSS_4481-2 vakṣaḥ pīṭhe ghanāstravraṇakiṇakaṭhine saṃkṣṇuvānaḥ pṛṣatkān prāpto rājanyagoṣṭhīvanagajamṛgayā kautukī jāmadagnyaḥ //
analyzed: vakṣaḥ pīṭhe ghana astra vraṇa kiṇa kaṭhine saṃkṣṇuvānaḥ pṛṣatkān prāptaḥ rājanya goṣṭhī vana gaja mṛgayā kautukī jāmadagnyaḥ

original: MSS_4482-1 ājanmabrahmacārī sakalaripukulānalpakālāgnikalpaḥ kalpāntaḥ kalpakartā kapiśatanuruciḥ kāmagaḥ kāmadātā /
analyzed: ājanma brahmacārī sakala ripu kula analpa kālāgni kalpaḥ kalpāntaḥ kalpa kartā kapiśa tanu ruciḥ kāmagaḥ kāma dātā

original: MSS_4482-2 kāntaḥ kāmāribandhuḥ kapikulatilakaḥ kopanaḥ komalāṅgaḥ kauśalyāsūnudūtaḥ kalayatu kuśalaṃ vāyuputraściraṃ vaḥ //
analyzed: kāntaḥ kāmāri bandhuḥ kapi kula tilakaḥ kopanaḥ komala aṅgaḥ kauśalyā sūnu dūtaḥ kalayatu kuśalam vāyuputraḥ ciram vaḥ

original: MSS_4483-1 ājanmaviṣasaṃbhogāt kanyā viṣamayī kṛtā /
analyzed: ājanma viṣa saṃbhogāt kanyā viṣa mayī kṛtā

original: MSS_4483-2 sparśocchvāsādibhirhanti tasyāstvetat parīkṣaṇam //
analyzed: sparśa ucchvāsa ādibhiḥ hanti tasyāḥ tu etat parīkṣaṇam

original: MSS_4484-1 ājanmavyavasāyinā kratuśatairārādhya puṣpāyudhaṃ kenākāri purā tanūdari tanutyāgaḥ prayāgabhrame /
analyzed: ājanma vyavasāyinā kratu śataiḥ ārādhya puṣpāyudham kena akāri purā tanu udari tanutyāgaḥ prayāga bhrame

original: MSS_4484-2 yasyārthe sakhi lolanetranalinīnālāyamānaskhalad- baṣpāmbhaḥpatanāntarālavalitagrīvaṃ pathaḥ paśyasi //
analyzed: yasya arthe sakhi lola netra nalinī nālāyamāna skhalat baṣpa ambhaḥ patana antarāla valita grīvam pathaḥ paśyasi

original: MSS_4485-1 ājanmasiddhaṃ kauṭilyaṃ khalasya ca halasya ca /
analyzed: ājanma siddham kauṭilyam khalasya ca halasya ca

original: MSS_4485-2 soḍhuṃ tayormūkhākṣepam alamekaiva sā kṣamā //
analyzed: soḍhum tayoḥ mūkha ākṣepam alam ekā eva sā kṣamā

original: MSS_4486-1 ājanmasevitaṃ dānair mānaiśca paripoṣitam /
analyzed: ājanma sevitam dānaiḥ mānaiḥ ca paripoṣitam

original: MSS_4486-2 tīkṣṇavākyānmitramapi tatkālaṃ yāti śatrutām /
analyzed: tīkṣṇa vākyāt mitram api tad kālam yāti śatru tām

original: MSS_4486-3 vakroktiśalyamuddhartuṃ na śakyaṃ mānasaṃ yataḥ //
analyzed: vakrokti śalyam uddhartum na śakyam mānasam yatas

original: MSS_4487-1 ājanmasthitayo mahīruha ime kūle samunmūlitāḥ kallolāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgurāḥ punaramī nītāḥ parāmunnatim /
analyzed: ājanma sthitayaḥ mahīruhe ime kūle samunmūlitāḥ kallolāḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅgurāḥ punar amī nītāḥ parām unnatim

original: MSS_4487-2 antaḥ prastarasaṃgraho bahirapi bhraśyanti gandhadrumā bhrātaḥ śoṇa na so'stiyo na hasati tvatsaṃpadāṃ viplave //
analyzed: antar prastara saṃgrahaḥ bahis api bhraśyanti gandha drumāḥ bhrātar śoṇa na sa ustiyaḥ na hasati tvad saṃpadām viplave

original: MSS_4488-1 ājanmānugate'pyasmin nāle vimukhamambujam /
analyzed: ājanma anugate pi asmin nāle vimukham ambujam

original: MSS_4488-2 prāyeṇa guṇapūrṇeṣu rītirlakṣmīvatāmiyam //
analyzed: prāyeṇa guṇa pūrṇeṣu rītiḥ lakṣmīvatām iyam

original: MSS_4489-1 ājanmaiva tamaḥ suhṛtkuṭilatā vaktre girāṃ nirgamo grāmotsādakaraḥ śmaśānaviṭapī prāyeṇa yasyāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: ājanma eva tamaḥ suhṛd kuṭila tā vaktre girām nirgamaḥ grāma utsāda karaḥ śmaśāna viṭapī prāyeṇa yasya āśrayaḥ

original: MSS_4489-2 dhig dhātaḥ sasṛje sa eva malinaḥ krūraḥ kathaṃ kauśikaḥ sṛṣṭo vā kimakalpyatāsya bhavatā kalpāntamāyuḥ sthiram //
analyzed: dhik dhātar sasṛje saḥ eva malinaḥ krūraḥ katham kauśikaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ vā kim akalpyata asya bhavatā kalpa antam āyuḥ sthiram

original: MSS_4490-1 ājānulambibāhuḥ kambugrīvo balī caturdaṃṣṭraḥ /
analyzed: ājānu lambi bāhuḥ kambu grīvaḥ balī catur daṃṣṭraḥ

original: MSS_4490-2 bhāgyanidhiḥ pṛthuvakṣā laghumadhurāśī ca padmākṣaḥ //
analyzed: bhāgya nidhiḥ pṛthu vakṣāḥ laghu madhura āśī ca padma akṣaḥ

original: MSS_4491-1 ājāvasau coḍanṛpasya senā mahāvanasyāśvamṛgākulasya /
analyzed: ājāvasau coḍa nṛpasya senā mahā vanasya aśva mṛga ākulasya

original: MSS_4491-2 mattebhasāradrumapūrṇitasya dāvānalo'bhūccalamūrticaṇḍaḥ //
analyzed: matta ibha sāra druma pūrṇitasya dāva analaḥ ubhūt cala mūrti caṇḍaḥ

original: MSS_4492-1 ājīvaḥ kapaṭānurāgakalayā doṣo na duḥśīlatā vaidhavyaṃ na ca bādhate sadasatoḥ saṃbhāvanāvyatyayāt /
analyzed: ājīvaḥ kapaṭa anurāga kalayā doṣaḥ na duḥśīla tā vaidhavyam na ca bādhate sat asatoḥ saṃbhāvanā vyatyayāt

original: MSS_4492-2 yatkiṃcitkaraṇe parasvaharaṇa vrīḍā na pīḍākarī no vā rājabhayaṃ ca hī bata sukhaṃ jīvanti vārastriyaḥ //
analyzed: yat kiṃcid karaṇe para sva haraṇa vrīḍā na pīḍā karī no vā rāja bhayam ca hī bata sukham jīvanti vārastriyaḥ

original: MSS_4493-1 ā jīvanāstāt praṇayāḥ kopāstatkṣaṇabhaṅgurāḥ /
analyzed: ā praṇayāḥ kopāḥ tad kṣaṇa bhaṅgurāḥ

original: MSS_4493-2 parityāgāśca niḥsaṅgā bhavanti hi mahātmanām //
analyzed: parityāgāḥ ca niḥsaṅgāḥ bhavanti hi mahātmanām

original: MSS_4494-1 ājīvitāntāḥ praṇayāḥ kopāśca kṣaṇabhaṅgurāḥ /
analyzed: ājīvita antāḥ praṇayāḥ kopāḥ ca kṣaṇa bhaṅgurāḥ

original: MSS_4494-2 parityāgāśca niḥsaṅgā na bhavanti mahātmanām //
analyzed: parityāgāḥ ca niḥsaṅgāḥ na bhavanti mahātmanām

original: MSS_4495-1 ājīvocchittaye yāsāṃ prītidveṣāvubhau hi tau /
analyzed: ājīva ucchittaye yāsām prīti dveṣau ubhau hi tau

original: MSS_4495-2 kathaṃ nu khalu tau tāsāṃ syātāmupari kasyacit //
analyzed: katham nu khalu tau tāsām syātām upari kasyacid

original: MSS_4496-1 ājīvyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ rājā parjanyavad bhavet /
analyzed: ājīvyaḥ sarva bhūtānām rājā parjanya vat bhavet

original: MSS_4496-2 nirājīvyaṃ tyajantyenaṃ śuṣkaṃ sara ivāṇḍajāḥ //
analyzed: nirājīvyam tyajanti enam śuṣkam saraḥ iva aṇḍajāḥ

original: MSS_4497-1 ājīvyaikataraṃ bhāvaṃ yastvanyamupajīvati /
analyzed: ājīvya ekataram bhāvam yaḥ tu anyam upajīvati

original: MSS_4497-2 na tasmād vindate kṣemaṃ jārānnāryasatī yathā //
analyzed: na tasmāt vindate kṣemam jārān nārī asatī yathā

original: MSS_4498-1 ājau tvadvājirājiprakharakhurataranyāsalīlābhirurvyāṃ dīrṇāyāṃ deva niryannaviralamavanīpāla pātālavahniḥ /
analyzed: ājau tvad vāji rāji prakhara khuratara nyāsa līlābhiḥ urvyām dīrṇāyām deva niryan aviralam avanīpāla pātāla vahniḥ

original: MSS_4498-2 aśnīyād viśvameva pratinṛpativadhūnetradhārāmbudhārā- vārā yadyenamārādarikuladamana drāṅ na nirvāpayeyuḥ //
analyzed: aśnīyāt viśvam eva prati nṛpati vadhū netra dhārā ambu dhārāḥ vārāḥ yadi enam ārāt ari kula damana drāk na nirvāpayeyuḥ

original: MSS_4499-1 ājñāṃ manmathacakravartinṛpaterādāya niḥśaṅkadhīr bhrāmyadbhṛṅgamahājanān pikagirā sākūtamākārayan /
analyzed: ājñām manmatha cakravarti nṛpateḥ ādāya niḥśaṅka dhīḥ bhrāmyat bhṛṅga mahājanān pika girā sa ākūtam ākārayan

original: MSS_4499-2 kuñjāṭe cyutapatrasaṃstaravati śrīmān vasantābhidho vyāpārī sumanomarandavasubhir vāṇijyamālambate //
analyzed: kuñjāṭe cyuta patra saṃstaravati śrīmān vasanta abhidhaḥ vyāpārī sumanaḥ maranda vasubhiḥ vāṇijyam ālambate

original: MSS_4500-1 ājñākaraśca tāḍana- paribhavasahanaśca satyamahamasyāḥ /
analyzed: ājñākaraḥ ca tāḍana paribhava sahanaḥ ca satyam aham asyāḥ

original: MSS_4500-2 na tu śīlaśītaleyaṃ priyetaradvaktumapi veda //
analyzed: na tu śīla śītalā iyam priya itarat vaktum api veda

original: MSS_4501-1 ājñā kākuryācñā- kṣepo hasitaṃ ca śuṣkaruditaṃ ca /
analyzed: ājñā kākuḥ yācñā kṣepaḥ hasitam ca śuṣka ruditam ca

original: MSS_4501-2 iti nidhuvanapāṇḍityaṃ dhyāyaṃstasyā na tṛpyāmi //
analyzed: iti nidhuvana pāṇḍityam dhyāyan tasyāḥ na tṛpyāmi

original: MSS_4502-1 ājñā kīrtiḥ pālanaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ dānaṃ bhogo mitrasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ ca /
analyzed: ājñā kīrtiḥ pālanam brāhmaṇānām dānam bhogaḥ mitra saṃrakṣaṇam ca

original: MSS_4502-2 yeṣāmete ṣaḍguṇā na pravṛttāḥ ko'rthas teṣāṃ pārthivopāśrayeṇa //
analyzed: yeṣām ete ṣaṭ guṇāḥ na pravṛttāḥ kaḥ ūrthaḥ teṣām pārthiva upāśrayeṇa

original: MSS_4503-1 ājñā tejaḥ pārthivānāṃ sā ca vāci pratiṣṭhitā /
analyzed: ājñā tejaḥ pārthivānām sā ca vāci pratiṣṭhitā

original: MSS_4503-2 yatte brūyurasat sadvā sa dharmo vyavahāriṇām //
analyzed: yat te brūyuḥ asat sat vā sa dharmaḥ vyavahāriṇām

original: MSS_4504-1 ājñāpayiṣyasi padaṃ dāsyasi dayitasya śirasi kiṃ tvarase /
analyzed: ājñāpayiṣyasi padam dāsyasi dayitasya śirasi kim tvarase

original: MSS_4504-2 asamayamānini mugdhe mā kuru bhagnāṅkuraṃ prema //
analyzed: asamaya mānini mugdhe mā kuru bhagna aṅkuram prema

original: MSS_4505-1 ājñābhaṅgakarān rājā na kṣameta sutānapi /
analyzed: ājñā bhaṅga karān rājā na kṣameta sutān api

original: MSS_4505-2 viśeṣaḥ ko nu rājñaśca rājñaścitragatasya ca //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ kaḥ nu rājñaḥ ca rājñaḥ citragatasya ca

original: MSS_4506-1 ājñābhaṅgo narendrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāmanādaraḥ /
analyzed: ājñā bhaṅgaḥ narendrāṇām brāhmaṇānām anādaraḥ

original: MSS_4506-2 pṛthak śayyā ca nārīṇām aśastravihito vadhaḥ //
analyzed: pṛthak śayyā ca nārīṇām a śastra vihitaḥ vadhaḥ

original: MSS_4507-1 ājñāmavāpya mahatīṃ dviṣatāṃ nikhātān- nirvartya tāṃ sapadi labdhamukhaprasādaḥ /
analyzed: ājñām avāpya mahatīm dviṣatām nikhātān nirvartya tām sapadi labdha mukha prasādaḥ

original: MSS_4507-2 uccaiḥ pramodamanumoditadarśanaḥ san dhanyo namasyati padāmburuhaṃ prabhūṇām //
analyzed: uccais pramodam anumodita darśanaḥ san dhanyaḥ namasyati pada amburuham prabhūṇām

original: MSS_4508-1 ājñāmātraphalaṃ rājyaṃ brahmacaryaphalaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: ājñā mātra phalam rājyam brahmacarya phalam tapaḥ

original: MSS_4508-2 jñānamātraphalā vidyā dattabhuktaphalaṃ dhanam //
analyzed: jñāna mātra phalā vidyā datta bhukta phalam dhanam

original: MSS_4509-1 ājñāmeva muner nidhāya śirasā vindhyācala sthīyatām atyuccaiḥ padamicchatā punariyaṃ no laṅghanīyā tvayā /
analyzed: ājñām eva muneḥ nidhāya śirasā vindhya acala sthīyatām atyuccais padam icchatā punar iyam naḥ laṅghanīyā tvayā

original: MSS_4509-2 mainākādimahīdhralabdhavasatiṃ yaḥ pītavānambudhiṃ tasya tvāṃ gilataḥ kapolamilanakleśo'pi kiṃ jāyate //
analyzed: maināka ādi mahīdhra labdha vasatim yaḥ pītavān ambudhim tasya tvām gilataḥ kapola milana kleśaḥ api kim jāyate

original: MSS_4510-1 ājñā mauliṣu bhūbhujāṃ bhayarujā citteṣu durmedhasāṃ prītiḥ satsu diśāsu kīrtiratulā yenārpitā sarvataḥ /
analyzed: ājñā mauliṣu bhūbhujām bhaya rujā citteṣu durmedhasām prītiḥ satsu diśāsu kīrtiḥ atulā yena arpitā sarvatas

original: MSS_4510-2 sarvaṃ rājyamakaṇṭakaṃ ca vihitaṃ dhvastā dviṣāṃ saṃpadaḥ so'sau saṃmatavaibhavo vijayate śrīrājanārāyaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sarvam rājyam akaṇṭakam ca vihitam dhvastāḥ dviṣām saṃpadaḥ saḥ asau saṃmata vaibhavaḥ vijayate śrī rāja nārāyaṇaḥ

original: MSS_4511-1 ājñārūpeṇa yā śaktiḥ sarveṣāṃ mūrdhani sthitā /
analyzed: ājñā rūpeṇa yā śaktiḥ sarveṣām mūrdhani sthitā

original: MSS_4511-2 prabhuśaktir hi sā jñeyā prabhāvamahitodayā //
analyzed: prabhu śaktiḥ hi sā jñeyā prabhāva mahita udayā

original: MSS_4512-1 ājñā śakraśikhāmaṇipraṇayinī śāstrāṇi cakṣurnavaṃ bhaktirbhūtapatau pinākini padaṃ laṅketi divyā purī /
analyzed: ājñā śakra śikhāmaṇi praṇayinī śāstrāṇi cakṣuḥ navam bhaktiḥ bhūtapatau pinākini padam laṅkā iti divyā purī

original: MSS_4512-2 utpattirdruhiṇānvaye ca tadaho nedṛg varo labhyate syāccedeṣa na rāvaṇaḥ kva nu punaḥ sarvatra sarve guṇāḥ //
analyzed: utpattiḥ druhiṇa anvaye ca tat aho na īdṛś varaḥ labhyate syāt ced eṣa na rāvaṇaḥ kva nu punar sarvatra sarve guṇāḥ

original: MSS_4513-1 ājñāsaṃpādinīṃ dakṣāṃ vīrasūṃ priyavādinīm /
analyzed: ājñā saṃpādinīm dakṣām vīrasūm priya vādinīm

original: MSS_4513-2 yo'dṛṣṭadoṣāṃ tyajati so'kṣayaṃ narakaṃ vrajet //
analyzed: yaḥ dṛṣṭa doṣām tyajati saḥ ukṣayam narakam vrajet

original: MSS_4514-1 ājñeva śambarariporavalaṅghanīyā vāñcheva vigrahavatī vaśagā dṛśor me /
analyzed: ājñā iva śambara ripoḥ avalaṅghanīyā vāñchā iva vigrahavatī vaśagā dṛśoḥ me

original: MSS_4514-2 anyārthameva kimutāpaṇamabhyupaiti saṃdeśamānayati sā kimu sārasākṣyāḥ //
analyzed: anya artham eva kim uta āpaṇam abhyupaiti saṃdeśam ānayati sā kimu sāra sākṣyāḥ

original: MSS_4515-1 āñjasyaṃ vyavahārāṇām ārjavaṃ paramaṃ dhiyām /
analyzed: āñjasyam vyavahārāṇām ārjavam paramam dhiyām

original: MSS_4515-2 svātantryamapi tantreṣu sūte kāvyapariśramaḥ //
analyzed: svātantryam api tantreṣu sūte kāvya pariśramaḥ

original: MSS_4516-1 āṭīkase'ṅgakarighoṭīpadātijuṣi vāṭībhuvi kṣitibhujāṃ ceṭī bhavaṃstadapi śāṭīnate vapuṣi vīṭīnavādhivadanaṃ /
analyzed: āṭī kaseṅga kari ghoṭī padāti juṣi vāṭī bhuvi kṣitibhujām ceṭī bhavan tat api śāṭī nate vapuṣi vīṭī nava adhivadanam

original: MSS_4516-2 koṭīraratnaparipāṭī bhṛśāruṇitajūṭīvidhuntanulasan pāṭīraliptimibhadhāṭījuṣaṃ suravadhūṭīnutāṃ bhaja śivam //
MSS_4517-1 āṭopena paṭīyasā yadapi sā vāṇī kaverāmukhe khelantī prathate tathāpi kurute no sanmanorañjanam /
analyzed: āṭopena paṭīyasā yat api sā vāṇī khelantī prathate tathā api kurute no sat manaḥ rañjanam

original: MSS_4517-2 na syād yāvadamandasundaraguṇālaṃkārajhaṃkāritaḥ saprasyandilasadrasāyanarasāsārānusārī rasaḥ //
analyzed: na syāt yāvat amanda sundara guṇa alaṃkāra jhaṃkāritaḥ sa prasyandi lasat rasāyana rasa āsāra anusārī rasaḥ

original: MSS_4518-1 āḍhyarājakṛtotsāhair hṛdayasthaiḥ smṛtairapi /
analyzed: āḍhya rāja kṛta utsāhaiḥ hṛdaya sthaiḥ smṛtaiḥ api

original: MSS_4518-2 jihvāntaḥkṛṣyamāṇeva na kavitve pravartate //
analyzed: jihvā antar kṛṣyamāṇā iva na kavi tve pravartate

original: MSS_4519-1 āḍhyasya kiṃ ca dānena suhitasyāśanena kim /
analyzed: āḍhyasya kim ca dānena su hitasya aśanena kim

original: MSS_4519-2 kiṃ śaśāṅkena śītāloḥ kiṃ ghanena himāgame //
analyzed: kim śaśāṅkena śītāloḥ kim ghanena hima āgame

original: MSS_4520-1 āḍhyānāṃ māṃsaparamaṃ madhyānāṃ gorasottaram /
analyzed: āḍhyānām māṃsa paramam madhyānām gorasa uttaram

original: MSS_4520-2 tailaprāyaṃ daridrāṇāṃ bhojanaṃ bharatarṣabha //
analyzed: taila prāyam daridrāṇām bhojanam bharata ṛṣabha

original: MSS_4521-1 āḍhyānnivāpalambho niketagāmī ca picchilaḥ panthāḥ /
analyzed: āḍhyāt nivā apalambhaḥ niketa gāmī ca picchilaḥ panthāḥ

original: MSS_4521-2 dvayamākulayati cetaḥ skandhāvāradvijātīnām //
analyzed: dvayam ākulayati cetaḥ skandhāvāra dvijātīnām

original: MSS_4522-1 āḍhyo vāpi daridro vā duḥkhitaḥ sukhito'pi vā /
analyzed: āḍhyaḥ vā api daridraḥ vā duḥkhitaḥ sukhitaḥ api vā

original: MSS_4522-2 nirdoṣo vā sadoṣo vā vayasyaḥ paramā gatiḥ //
analyzed: nirdoṣaḥ vā sa doṣaḥ vā vayasyaḥ paramā gatiḥ

original: MSS_4523-1 ātatāyinamāyāntaṃ hanyādevāvicārayan /
analyzed: ātatāyinam āyāntam hanyāt eva avicārayān

original: MSS_4523-2 hananādeva nistāro narakāt tasya duṣkṛteḥ //
analyzed: hananāt eva nistāraḥ narakāt tasya duṣkṛteḥ

original: MSS_4524-1 ātatāyinamāyāntam api vedāntapāragam /
analyzed: ātatāyinam āyāntam api vedānta pāragam

original: MSS_4524-2 jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena brahmahā bhavet //
analyzed: jighāṃsantam jighāṃsīyān na tena brahma hā bhavet

original: MSS_4525-1 ātanvadbhirdikṣu patrāgranādaṃ prāptairdūrādāśu tīkṣṇairmukhāgraiḥ /
analyzed: ātanvadbhiḥ dikṣu patra agra nādam prāptaiḥ dūrāt āśu tīkṣṇaiḥ mukha agraiḥ

original: MSS_4525-2 ādau raktaṃ sainikānāmajīvair jīvaiḥ paścāt patripūgairapāyi //
analyzed: ādau raktam sainikānām ajīvaiḥ jīvaiḥ paścāt patri pūgaiḥ apāyi

original: MSS_4526-1 ātapatyaviduṣāmamṛtāṃśum aṃśumantamapi raśmisahasre /
analyzed: ātapati aviduṣām amṛtāṃśum aṃśumantam api raśmi sahasre

original: MSS_4526-2 rāgiṇāṃ bhavati lakṣaṇamindor indranīlaśakalacchavilakṣma //
analyzed: rāgiṇām bhavati lakṣaṇam indoḥ indranīla śakala chavi lakṣma

original: MSS_4527-1 ātapāsahanaḥ pāṇḍuḥ śākhāhīno muhur yadi /
analyzed: ātapa asahanaḥ pāṇḍuḥ śākhā hīnaḥ muhur yadi

original: MSS_4527-2 akālaphalapākī syāc chākhī pittātmakaḥ kṛśaḥ //
analyzed: akāla phala pākī syāt śākhī pitta ātmakaḥ kṛśaḥ

original: MSS_4528-1 ātape dhṛtimatā saha vadhvā yāminīvirahiṇā vihagena /
analyzed: ātape dhṛtimatā saha vadhvā yāminīvirahiṇā vihagena

original: MSS_4528-2 sehire na kiraṇā himaraśmer duḥkhite manasi sarvamasahyam //
analyzed: sehire na kiraṇāḥ himaraśmeḥ duḥkhite manasi sarvam asahyam

original: MSS_4529-1 ātaralāghavahetor murahara tariṃ tavāvalambe /
analyzed: ātara lāghava hetoḥ mura hara tarim tava avalambe

original: MSS_4529-2 apaṇaṃ paṇamiha kuruṣe nāvikapuruṣe na viśvāsaḥ //
analyzed: a paṇam paṇam iha kuruṣe nāvika puruṣe na viśvāsaḥ

original: MSS_4530-1 ātāmratāmapanayāmi vivarṇa eṣa lākṣākṛtāṃ caraṇayostava devi mūrdhnā /
analyzed: ātāmra tām apanayāmi vivarṇaḥ eṣa lākṣā kṛtām caraṇayoḥ tava devi mūrdhnā

original: MSS_4530-2 kopoparāgajanitāṃ tu mukhendubimbe hartuṃ kṣamo yadi paraṃ karuṇāmayi syāt //
analyzed: kopa uparāga janitām tu mukha indu bimbe hartum kṣamaḥ yadi param karuṇā mayi syāt

original: MSS_4531-1 ātāmrāḥ kiraṇā ravernavadalatvakpallavāḥ pādapāḥ vallyastārakatulyakāntisumanaḥsaurabhyasaṃbhāvitāḥ /
analyzed: ātāmrāḥ kiraṇāḥ raveḥ nava dala tvac pallavāḥ pādapāḥ vallyaḥ tāraka tulya kānti sumanaḥ saurabhya saṃbhāvitāḥ

original: MSS_4531-2 vātyasmin madhumattaṣaṭpadapadavyādhūtacūtadruma- prāgbhāraprapatatparāgapaṭalāmodī marud dākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: vāti asmin madhu matta ṣaṭpada pada vyādhūta cūta druma prāgbhāra prapatat parāga paṭala āmodī marut dākṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_4532-1 ātāmrābhā roṣabhājaḥ kaṭāntād āśūtkhāte mārgaṇe dhūrgatena /
analyzed: ātāmra ābhāḥ roṣa bhājaḥ kaṭā antāt āśu utkhāte mārgaṇe dhūrgatena

original: MSS_4532-2 niścyotantī nāgarājasya jajñe dānasyāho lohitasyeva dhārā //
analyzed: niścyotantī nāga rājasya jajñe dānasya ahar lohitasya iva dhārā

original: MSS_4533-1 ātāmrāyatalocanāṃśulaharīlīlāsudhāp yāyitaiḥ gītāmreḍitadivyakelibharitaiḥ sphītaṃ vrajastrījanaiḥ /
analyzed: ātāmra āyata locana aṃśu laharī līlā sudhā yāyitaiḥ gīta āmreḍita divya keli bharitaiḥ sphītam vraja strī janaiḥ

original: MSS_4533-2 svedāmbhaḥkaṇabhūṣitena kimapi smereṇa vaktrendunā pādāmbhojamṛdupracārasubhagaṃ paśyāmi dṛśyaṃ mahaḥ //
analyzed: sveda ambhaḥ kaṇa bhūṣitena kim api smereṇa vaktra indunā pāda ambhoja mṛdu pracāra subhagam paśyāmi dṛśyam mahaḥ

original: MSS_4534-1 ātāmre nayane sphuran kucabharaḥ śvāso na viśrāmyati svedāmbhaḥkaṇadanturaṃ tava mukhaṃ hetustu no lakṣyate /
analyzed: ātāmre nayane sphuran kuca bharaḥ śvāsaḥ na viśrāmyati sveda ambhaḥ kaṇa danturam tava mukham hetuḥ tu no lakṣyate

original: MSS_4534-2 dhik ko veda manaḥ striyā iti girā ruṣṭāṃ priyāṃ bhīṣayaṃs tasyāstatkṣaṇakātarekṣaṇaparispṛṣṭo hariḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: dhik kaḥ veda manaḥ striyāḥ iti girā ruṣṭām priyām bhīṣayan tasyāḥ tad kṣaṇa kātara īkṣaṇa parispṛṣṭaḥ hariḥ pātu vaḥ

original: MSS_4535-1 ātāmrau pūjitāvoṣṭhau lelihānau mṛdutvacau /
analyzed: ātāmrau pūjitau oṣṭhau lelihānau mṛdu tvacau

original: MSS_4535-2 jihvā raktā ca tanvī ca tālu raktaṃ praśasyate //
analyzed: jihvā raktā ca tanvī ca tālu raktam praśasyate

original: MSS_4536-1 ātāruṇyodbhedāt kānte dṛṣṭiryathā nyastā /
analyzed: ā tāruṇya udbhedāt kānte dṛṣṭiḥ yathā nyastā

original: MSS_4536-2 sāmājikamadhyasthā kathamanyā samupayāti parabhāgam //
analyzed: sāmājika madhyasthā katham anyā samupayāti parabhāgam

original: MSS_4537-1 ātithyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ tu kuryāt pratidinaṃ gṛhe /
analyzed: ātithyam brāhmaṇānām tu kuryāt pratidinam gṛhe

original: MSS_4537-2 ātithye rantidevasya madhuparkaṃ gavāṃ śatam //
analyzed: ātithye rantidevasya madhuparkam gavām śatam

original: MSS_4538-1 ātithye śrāddhayajñeṣu devayātrotsaveṣu ca /
analyzed: ātithye śrāddha yajñeṣu deva yātrā utsaveṣu ca

original: MSS_4538-2 mahājane ca siddhārtho na gacched yogavit kvacit //
analyzed: mahājane ca siddhārthaḥ na gacchet yoga vid kvacid

original: MSS_4539-1 āturasya kuto nidrā trastasyāmarṣitasya ca /
analyzed: āturasya kutas nidrā trastasya amarṣitasya ca

original: MSS_4539-2 arthaṃ cintayato vāpi kāmayānasya vā punaḥ //
analyzed: artham cintayataḥ vā api kāmayānasya vā punar

original: MSS_4540-1 āturād vittaharaṇaṃ mṛtācca prapalāyanam /
analyzed: āturāt vitta haraṇam mṛtāt ca prapalāyanam

original: MSS_4540-2 etad vaidyasya vaidyatvaṃ na vaidyaḥ prabhurāyuṣaḥ //
analyzed: etat vaidyasya vaidya tvam na vaidyaḥ prabhuḥ āyuṣaḥ

original: MSS_4541-1 āture ca pitā vaidyaḥ svasthībhūte ca bāndhavaḥ /
analyzed: āture ca pitā vaidyaḥ svasthībhūte ca bāndhavaḥ

original: MSS_4541-2 gate roge kṛte svāsthye vaidyo bhavati pālakaḥ //
analyzed: gate roge kṛte svāsthye vaidyaḥ bhavati pālakaḥ

original: MSS_4542-1 āture niyamo nāsti bāle vṛddhe tathaiva ca /
analyzed: āture niyamaḥ na asti bāle vṛddhe tathā eva ca

original: MSS_4542-2 parācārarate caiva eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //
analyzed: para ācāra rate ca eva eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: MSS_4543-1 āttamāttamadhikāntamukṣituṃ kātarā śapharaśaṅkinī jahau /
analyzed: āttam āttam adhika antam ukṣitum kātarā śaphara śaṅkinī jahau

original: MSS_4543-2 añjalau jalamadhīralocanā locanapratiśarīralāñchitam //
analyzed: añjalau jalam adhīra locanā locana pratiśarīra lāñchitam

original: MSS_4544-1 ātte vāsasi roddhumakṣamatayā doḥkandalībhyāṃ stanau tasyoraḥsthalamuttarīyaviṣaye sadyo mayā sañjitam /
analyzed: ātte vāsasi roddhum akṣama tayā dos kandalībhyām stanau tasya uraḥ sthalam uttarīya viṣaye sadyas mayā sañjitam

original: MSS_4544-2 śroṇīṃ tasya kare'dhirohati punarvrīḍāmbudhau māmatho majjantīmudatārayanmanasijo devaḥ sa mūrcchāguruḥ //
analyzed: śroṇīm tasya karedhi rohati punar vrīḍā ambudhau mām atho majjantīm udatārayat manasijaḥ devaḥ sa mūrcchā guruḥ

original: MSS_4545-1 ātte sīmantaratne marakatini hṛte hematāṭaṅkapatre luptāyāṃ mekhalāyāṃ jhaṭiti maṇitulākoṭiyugme gṛhīte /
analyzed: ātte sīmanta ratne marakatini hṛte hema tāṭaṅka patre luptāyām mekhalāyām jhaṭiti maṇi tulā koṭi yugme gṛhīte

original: MSS_4545-2 śoṇaṃ bimboṣṭhakāntyā tvadarimṛgadṛśāmitvarīṇāmaraṇye rājan guñjāphalānāṃ sraja iti śabarā naiva hāraṃ haranti //
analyzed: śoṇam bimboṣṭha kāntyā tvad ari mṛga dṛśām iti arīṇām araṇye rājan guñjā phalānām srajaḥ iti śabarāḥ na eva hāram haranti

original: MSS_4546-1 ātmakāryaṃ mahākāryaṃ parakāryaṃ na kevalam /
analyzed: ātma kāryam mahā kāryam para kāryam na kevalam

original: MSS_4546-2 ātmakāryasya doṣeṇa kūpe patati mānavaḥ //
analyzed: ātma kāryasya doṣeṇa kūpe patati mānavaḥ

original: MSS_4547-1 ātmacchandena vartante nāryo manmathacoditāḥ /
analyzed: ātma chandena vartante nāryaḥ manmatha coditāḥ

original: MSS_4547-2 na ca dahyanti gacchantyaḥ sutaptairapi pāṃsubhiḥ //
analyzed: na ca dahyanti gacchantyaḥ su taptaiḥ api pāṃsubhiḥ

original: MSS_4548-1 ātmacchidraṃ na jānāti paracchidrāṇi paśyati /
analyzed: ātma chidram na jānāti para chidrāṇi paśyati

original: MSS_4548-2 śvacchidraṃ yadi jānāti paracchidraṃ na paśyati //
analyzed: śva chidram yadi jānāti para chidram na paśyati

original: MSS_4549-1 ātmajanmāspadaṃ vaṃśaṃ kāmaṃ dahana vāryase /
analyzed: ātma janma āspadam vaṃśam kāmam dahana vāryase

original: MSS_4549-2 kiṃ tu saṃnihitānetāṇ apyagne kiṃ dahasyaho //
analyzed: kim tu api agne kim dahasi aho

original: MSS_4550-1 ātmajādiparikleśam ātmanyāropya mūḍhadhīḥ /
analyzed: ātmaja ādi parikleśam ātmani āropya mūḍha dhīḥ

original: MSS_4550-2 pratikartumaśakto'pi vārddhakye śocate param //
analyzed: pratikartum aśaktaḥ api vārddhakye śocate param

original: MSS_4551-1 ātmajñaḥ śaucavān dāntas tapasvī vijitendriyaḥ /
analyzed: ātma jñaḥ śaucavān dāntaḥ tapasvī vijita indriyaḥ

original: MSS_4551-2 dharmakṛd vedavidyāvit sāttviko devayonitām //
analyzed: dharma kṛt veda vidyā vid sāttvikaḥ deva yoni tām

original: MSS_4552-1 ātmajñānaṃ samārambhas titikṣā dharmanityatā /
analyzed: ātma jñānam samārambhaḥ titikṣā dharma nityatā

original: MSS_4552-2 yamarthānnāpakarṣanti sa vai paṇḍita ucyate //
analyzed: yam arthān na apakarṣanti sa vai paṇḍitaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_4553-1 ātmajñānamanāyāsas titikṣā dharmanityatā /
analyzed: ātma jñānam anāyāsaḥ titikṣā dharma nitya tā

original: MSS_4553-2 vāk caiva guptā dānaṃ ca naitānyantyeṣu bhārata //
analyzed: vāc ca eva guptā dānam ca na etāni antyeṣu bhārata

original: MSS_4554-1 ātmajñānī yato dhanyo madhyaḥ pitṛpitāmahaiḥ /
analyzed: ātma jñānī yatas dhanyaḥ madhyaḥ pitṛ pitāmahaiḥ

original: MSS_4554-2 mātṛpakṣeṇa mātrā ca khyātiṃ yāti narādhamaḥ //
analyzed: mātṛ pakṣeṇa mātrā ca khyātim yāti nara adhamaḥ

original: MSS_4555-1 ātmatattvaṃ na jānāti karoti bahuvistaram /
analyzed: ātma tattvam na jānāti karoti bahu vistaram

original: MSS_4555-2 sa eva nidhanaṃ yāti nālikerodakaṃ yathā //
analyzed: saḥ eva nidhanam yāti nālikera udakam yathā

original: MSS_4556-1 ātmadehasya māṃsāni bhoktuṃ brahmanna śakyate /
analyzed: ātma dehasya māṃsāni bhoktum brahman na śakyate

original: MSS_4556-2 dehināṃ vada yadyogyaṃ saṃtuṣṭirjāyate yataḥ //
analyzed: dehinām vada yat yogyam saṃtuṣṭiḥ jāyate yatas

original: MSS_4557-1 ātmadoṣairniyacchanti sarve duḥkhamukhe janāḥ /
analyzed: ātma doṣaiḥ niyacchanti sarve duḥkha mukhe janāḥ

original: MSS_4557-2 manye duścaritaṃ te'sti tasyeyaṃ niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā //
analyzed: manye duścaritam te asti tasya iyam niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā

original: MSS_4558-1 ātmadveṣād bhaven mṛtyuḥ paradveṣād dhanakṣayaḥ /
analyzed: ātma dveṣāt bhavet mṛtyuḥ para dveṣāt dhana kṣayaḥ

original: MSS_4558-2 rājadveṣād bhaven nāśo brahmadveṣāt kulakṣayaḥ //
analyzed: rāja dveṣāt bhavet nāśaḥ brahma dveṣāt kula kṣayaḥ

original: MSS_4559-1 ātmanaḥ pratikūlāni parebhyo yadi necchasi /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ pratikūlāni parebhyaḥ yadi na icchasi

original: MSS_4559-2 pareṣāṃ pratikūlebhyo nivartaya tato manaḥ //
analyzed: pareṣām pratikūlebhyaḥ nivartaya tatas manaḥ

original: MSS_4560-1 ātmanaḥ prīyate nātmā parataḥ svata eva vā /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ prīyate na ātmā paratas svatas eva vā

original: MSS_4560-2 lakṣaye'labdhakāmaṃ tvāṃ cintayā śabalaṃ mukham //
analyzed: lakṣaye labdha kāmam tvām cintayā śabalam mukham

original: MSS_4561-1 ātmanaḥ śaktimudvīkṣya mānotsāhau tu yo vrajet /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ śaktim udvīkṣya māna utsāhau tu yaḥ vrajet

original: MSS_4561-2 śatrūneko'pi hanyācca kṣatriyān bhārgavo yathā //
analyzed: śatrūn ekaḥ api hanyāt ca kṣatriyān bhārgavaḥ yathā

original: MSS_4562-1 ātmanaśca paritrāṇe dakṣiṇānāṃ ca saṃgare /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca paritrāṇe dakṣiṇānām ca saṃgare

original: MSS_4562-2 strīviprābhyupapattau ca ghnan dharmeṇa na duṣyati //
analyzed: strī vipra abhyupapattau ca ghnan dharmeṇa na duṣyati

original: MSS_4563-1 ātmanaśca pareṣāṃ ca pratāpastava kīrtinut /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca pareṣām ca pratāpaḥ tava kīrti nud

original: MSS_4563-2 bhayakṛd bhūpaterbāhur dviṣāṃ ca suhṛdāṃ ca te //
analyzed: bhaya kṛt bhūpateḥ bāhuḥ dviṣām ca suhṛdām ca te

original: MSS_4564-1 ātmanaśca pareṣāṃ ca yaḥ samīkṣya balābalam /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca pareṣām ca yaḥ samīkṣya balābalam

original: MSS_4564-2 antaraṃ naiva jānāti sa tiraskriyate'ribhiḥ //
analyzed: antaram nā eva jānāti sa tiraskriyate īribhiḥ

original: MSS_4565-1 ātmanaścapalo nāsti kuto'nyeṣāṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ capalaḥ nā asti kutas nyeṣām bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_4565-2 tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi capalo hantyasaṃśayam //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi capalaḥ hanti asaṃśayam

original: MSS_4566-1 ātmanaśca prajāyāśca doṣadarśyuttamo nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca prajāyāḥ ca doṣa darśī uttamaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_4566-2 viniyacchati cātmānam ādau bhṛtyāṃstataḥ prajāḥ //
analyzed: viniyacchati ca ātmānam ādau bhṛtyān tatas prajāḥ

original: MSS_4567-1 ātmanātmānamanvicchen manobuddhīndriyairyataiḥ /
analyzed: ātmanā ātmānam anvicchet manaḥ buddhi indriyaiḥ yataiḥ

original: MSS_4567-2 ātmaiva hyātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripurātmanaḥ //
analyzed: ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ bandhuḥ ātmā eva ripuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_4568-1 ātmanānarthayuktena pāpe niviśate manaḥ /
analyzed: ātmanā anartha yuktena pāpe niviśate manaḥ

original: MSS_4568-2 sa karma kaluṣaṃ kṛtvā kleśe mahati dhīyate //
analyzed: sa karma kaluṣam kṛtvā kleśe mahati dhīyate

original: MSS_4569-1 ātmanāma gurornāma nāmātikṛpaṇasya ca /
analyzed: ātma nāma guroḥ nāma nāma ati kṛpaṇasya ca

original: MSS_4569-2 āyuṣkāmo na gṛhṇīyāt jyeṣṭhāpatyakalatrayoḥ //
analyzed: āyuṣkāmaḥ na gṛhṇīyāt jyeṣṭha apatya kalatrayoḥ

original: MSS_4570-1 ātmanā vihitaṃ duḥkham ātmanā vihitaṃ sukham /
analyzed: ātmanā vihitam duḥkham ātmanā vihitam sukham

original: MSS_4570-2 garbhaśayyāmupādāya bhujyate paurvadehikam //
analyzed: garbhaśayyām upādāya bhujyate paurvadehikam

original: MSS_4571-1 ātmanāśāya nonnatyai chidreṇa paripūrṇatā /
analyzed: ātma nāśāya na unnatyai chidreṇa paripūrṇa tā

original: MSS_4571-2 bhūyo bhūyo ghaṭīpātraṃ nimajjat kiṃ na paśyasi //
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas ghaṭī pātram nimajjat kim na paśyasi

original: MSS_4572-1 ātmanā saṃgṛhītena śatruṇā śatrumuddharet /
analyzed: ātmanā saṃgṛhītena śatruṇā śatrum uddharet

original: MSS_4572-2 padalagnaṃ karasthena kaṇṭakenaiva kaṇṭakam //
analyzed: pada lagnam kara sthena kaṇṭakena eva kaṇṭakam

original: MSS_4573-1 ātmanindātmapūjā ca paranindā parastavaḥ /
analyzed: ātma nindā ātma pūjā ca para nindā para stavaḥ

original: MSS_4573-2 anācaritamāryāṇāṃ vṛttametaccaturvidham //
analyzed: an ācarita māryāṇām vṛttam etat caturvidham

original: MSS_4574-1 ātmanīnamupatiṣṭhate guṇāḥ saṃbhavanti viramanti cāpadaḥ /
analyzed: ātmanīnam upatiṣṭhate guṇāḥ saṃbhavanti viramanti ca āpadaḥ

original: MSS_4574-2 ityanekaphalabhāji mā sma bhūd arthitā kathamivāryasaṃgame //
analyzed: iti aneka phala bhāji mā sma bhūt arthi tā katham iva ārya saṃgame

original: MSS_4575-1 ātmanaiva guṇadoṣakovidaḥ kiṃ na vetsi karaṇīyavastuṣu /
analyzed: ātmanā eva guṇa doṣa kovidaḥ kim na vetsi karaṇīya vastuṣu

original: MSS_4575-2 yattathāpi na gurūn na pṛcchasi tvaṃ kramo'yamiti tatra kāraṇam //
analyzed: yat tathā api na gurūn na pṛcchasi tvam kramaḥ yam iti tatra kāraṇam

original: MSS_4576-1 ātmano gururātmaiva puruṣasya viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ guruḥ ātmā eva puruṣasya viśeṣataḥ

original: MSS_4576-2 yat pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ śreyo'sāvanuvindate //
analyzed: yat pratyakṣa anumānābhyām śreyaḥ asau anuvindate

original: MSS_4577-1 ātmano na sahāyārthaṃ pitā mātā ca tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ na sahāya artham pitā mātā ca tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_4577-2 na putradārā na jñātir dharmastiṣṭhati kevalam //
analyzed: na putra dārāḥ na jñātiḥ dharmaḥ tiṣṭhati kevalam

original: MSS_4578-1 ātmano balamajñātvā dharmārthaparivarjitam /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ balam a jñātvā dharma artha parivarjitam

original: MSS_4578-2 alabhyamicchan naiṣkarmyān mūḍhabuddhirihocyate //
analyzed: alabhyam icchan naiṣkarmyāt mūḍha buddhiḥ iha ucyate

original: MSS_4579-1 ātmano'bhyudayākāṅkṣī pīḍyamānaḥ pareṇa vā /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ abhyudaya ākāṅkṣī pīḍyamānaḥ pareṇa vā

original: MSS_4579-2 deśakālabalopetaḥ prārabhetaiva vigraham //
analyzed: deśa kāla bala upetaḥ prārabheta eva vigraham

original: MSS_4580-1 ātmano mukhadoṣeṇa badhyante śukasārikāḥ /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ mukha doṣeṇa badhyante śuka sārikāḥ

original: MSS_4580-2 bakās tatra na badhyante maunaṃ sarvārthasādhanam //
analyzed: bakāḥ tatra na badhyante maunam sarva artha sādhanam

original: MSS_4581-1 ātmano'rdhamiti śrautaṃ sā rakṣati dhanaṃ prajā /
analyzed: ātmanoḥ dham iti śrautam sā rakṣati dhanam prajā

original: MSS_4581-2 śarīraṃ lokayātrāṃ vai dharmaṃ svargamṛṣīn pit n //
analyzed: śarīram lokayātrām vai dharmam svargam ṛṣīn

original: MSS_4582-1 ātmano vadhamāhartā kvāsau vihagataskaraḥ /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ vadham āhartā kva asau vihaga taskaraḥ

original: MSS_4582-2 yena tat prathamaṃ steyaṃ goptureva gṛhe kṛtam //
analyzed: yena tat prathamam steyam goptuḥ eva gṛhe kṛtam

original: MSS_4583-1 ātmano vikriyamiva kurvan dadyāt samīhitam /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ vikriyam iva kurvan dadyāt samīhitam

original: MSS_4583-2 jalavat parvatāñchatrūn bhindyādanupalakṣitaḥ //
analyzed: jala vat parvatān śatrūn bhindyāt anupalakṣitaḥ

original: MSS_4584-1 ātmannicchasi hanta śāśvatapurīmārge vihartuṃ yadi bhrātaḥ saṃyamavarmaṇā kuru tadā rakṣāvidhiṃ sarvataḥ /
analyzed: ātman icchasi hanta śāśvata purī mārge vihartum yadi bhrātar saṃyamavarmaṇā kuru tadā rakṣā vidhim sarvatas

original: MSS_4584-2 no cedindriyataskaraistava haṭhāt tīkṣṇāgrabhūrisphurac- cintābhallaśatairvibhidya manaso grāhyo viveko maṇiḥ //
analyzed: no ced indriya taskaraiḥ tava haṭhāt tīkṣṇa agra bhūri sphurat cintā bhalla śataiḥ vibhidya manasaḥ grāhyaḥ vivekaḥ maṇiḥ

original: MSS_4585-1 ātmanyapi na viśvāsas tāvān bhavati satsu yaḥ /
analyzed: ātmani api na viśvāsaḥ tāvān bhavati satsu yaḥ

original: MSS_4585-2 tasmāt satsu viśeṣeṇa sarvaḥ praṇayamicchati //
analyzed: tasmāt satsu viśeṣeṇa sarvaḥ praṇayam icchati

original: MSS_4586-1 ātmanyasya samucchritīkṛtaguṇasyāhotarāmaucitī yadgātrāntaravarjanādajanayad bhūjānireṣa dviṣām /
analyzed: ātmani asya samucchritīkṛta guṇasya ahotṛām aucitī yat gātra antara varjanāt ajanayat bhū jāniḥ eṣa dviṣām

original: MSS_4586-2 bhūyo'haṃkriyate sma yena ca hṛdā skandho na yaścānamat tanmarmāṇi dalaṃ dalaṃ samidalaṃkarmīṇabāṇavrajaḥ //
analyzed: bhūya uhaṃkriyate sma yena ca hṛdā skandhaḥ na yaḥ ca anamat tad marmāṇi dalam dalam samidh alaṃkarmīṇa bāṇa vrajaḥ

original: MSS_4587-1 ātmapakṣakṣayāyaiva parapakṣodayāya ca /
analyzed: ātma pakṣa kṣayāya eva para pakṣa udayāya ca

original: MSS_4587-2 mantradvaidhamamātyānāṃ tanna syādiha bhūtaye //
analyzed: mantra dvaidham amātyānām tat na syāt iha bhūtaye

original: MSS_4588-1 ātmapakṣaparityāgāt parapakṣeṣu yo rataḥ /
analyzed: ātma pakṣa parityāgāt para pakṣeṣu yaḥ rataḥ

original: MSS_4588-2 sa parairhanyate mūḍho nīlavarṇaśṛgālavat //
analyzed: sa paraiḥ hanyate mūḍhaḥ nīla varṇa śṛgāla vat

original: MSS_4589-1 ātmapitṛbhrātaraśca tat strīputrāśca śatravaḥ /
analyzed: ātma pitṛ bhrātaraḥ ca tat strī putrāḥ ca śatravaḥ

original: MSS_4589-2 snuṣā śvaśrūḥ sapatnī ca nanāndā yātaras tathā //
analyzed: snuṣā śvaśrūḥ sapatnī ca nanāndā yātaraḥ tathā

original: MSS_4590-1 ātmapitṛmātṛguṇaiḥ prakhyātaścottamottamaḥ /
analyzed: ātma pitṛ mātṛ guṇaiḥ prakhyātaḥ ca uttama uttamaḥ

original: MSS_4590-2 guṇairātmabhavaiḥ khyātaḥ paitṛkairmātṛkaiḥ pṛthak //
analyzed: guṇaiḥ ātma bhavaiḥ khyātaḥ paitṛkaiḥ mātṛkaiḥ pṛthak

original: MSS_4591-1 ātmapratītirdṛḍhatā viraktir iti trayaṃ svātmani yo dadhāti /
analyzed: ātma pratītiḥ dṛḍha tā viraktiḥ iti trayam sva ātmani yaḥ dadhāti

original: MSS_4591-2 netā sa evāsti samastaśiṣṭa- guṇāśrayatvānnikhilaprajānām //
analyzed: netā saḥ eva asti samasta śiṣṭa guṇa āśraya tvāt nikhila prajānām

original: MSS_4592-1 ātmapraśaṃsā maraṇaṃ paranindā ca tādṛśī /
analyzed: ātma praśaṃsā maraṇam para nindā ca tādṛśī

original: MSS_4592-2 tathāpi vakṣye kākutstha nāsti matsadṛśaḥ kapiḥ //
analyzed: tathā api vakṣye kākutstha nā asti mad sadṛśaḥ kapiḥ

original: MSS_4593-1 ātmapraśaṃsinaṃ duṣṭaṃ dhṛṣṭaṃ viparidhāvakam /
analyzed: ātma praśaṃsinam duṣṭam dhṛṣṭam viparidhāvakam

original: MSS_4593-2 sarvatrotsṛṣṭadaṇḍaṃ ca lokaḥ satkurute naram //
analyzed: sarvatra utsṛṣṭa daṇḍam ca lokaḥ satkurute naram

original: MSS_4594-1 ātmabuddhiḥ sukhaṃ caiva gurubuddhirviśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: ātma buddhiḥ sukham ca eva guru buddhiḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: MSS_4594-2 parabuddhirarvināśāya strībuddhiḥ pralayaṃkarī //
analyzed: para buddhiḥ arvi nāśāya strī buddhiḥ pralayaṃkarī

original: MSS_4595-1 ātmabuddhyā sukhī bhūyāt gurubuddhyā viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: ātma buddhyā sukhī bhūyāt guru buddhyā viśeṣataḥ

original: MSS_4595-2 bahubuddhyā vināśaḥ syāt strībuddhyā pralayo bhavet //
analyzed: bahu buddhyā vināśaḥ syāt strī buddhyā pralayaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_4596-1 ātmabhāgyakṣatadravyaḥ strīdravyeṇānukampitaḥ /
analyzed: ātma bhāgya kṣata dravyaḥ strī dravyeṇa anukampitaḥ

original: MSS_4596-2 arthataḥ puruṣo nārī yā nārī sārthataḥ pumān //
analyzed: arthataḥ puruṣaḥ nārī yā nārī sā arthataḥ pumān

original: MSS_4597-1 ātmarakṣā hi satataṃ pūrvaṃ kāryā vijānatā /
analyzed: ātma rakṣā hi satatam pūrvam kāryā vijānatā

original: MSS_4597-2 agnāviva hi saṃproktā vṛttī rājopajīvinām //
analyzed: agnau iva hi saṃproktā vṛttī rāja upajīvinām

original: MSS_4598-1 ekadeśaṃdahed agniḥ śarīraṃ vā paraṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: eka deśam dahet agniḥ śarīram vā param gataḥ

original: MSS_4598-2 saputradāraṃ rājā tu ghātayed ardhayeta vā //
analyzed: sa putra dāram rājā tu ghātayet ardhayeta vā

original: MSS_4599-1 ātmarakṣitatantrāṇāṃ suparīkṣitakāriṇām /
analyzed: ātma rakṣita tantrāṇām su parīkṣita kāriṇām

original: MSS_4599-2 āpado nopapadyante puruṣāṇāṃ svadoṣajāḥ //
analyzed: āpadaḥ na upapadyante puruṣāṇām sva doṣa jāḥ

original: MSS_4600-1 ātmaratiḥ paraśāṭhyaṃ sajjanabandhuvarjanam /
analyzed: ātma ratiḥ para śāṭhyam sat jana bandhu varjanam

original: MSS_4600-2 ripau śraddhā striyāṃ bhaktiḥ tasya nindā bhaved dhruvam //
analyzed: ripau śraddhā striyām bhaktiḥ tasya nindā bhavet dhruvam

original: MSS_4601-1 ātmarutādapi virutaṃ kurvāṇāḥ spardhayā saha mayūraiḥ /
analyzed: ātma rutāt api virutam kurvāṇāḥ spardhayā saha mayūraiḥ

original: MSS_4601-2 kiṃ jānanti varākāḥ kākāḥ kekāravān kartum //
analyzed: kim jānanti varākāḥ kākāḥ kekāravān kartum

original: MSS_4602-1 ātmavat satataṃ paśyed api kīṭapipīlikam /
analyzed: ātma vat satatam paśyet api kīṭa pipīlikam

original: MSS_4602-2 ātmanaḥ pratikūlāni pareṣāṃ na samācaret //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ pratikūlāni pareṣām na samācaret

original: MSS_4603-1 ātmavat sarvabhūtāni paradravyāṇi loṣṭavat /
analyzed: ātma vat sarva bhūtāni para dravyāṇi loṣṭa vat

original: MSS_4603-2 mātṛvat paradārāṃśca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //
analyzed: mātṛ vat para dārān ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: MSS_4604-1 ātmavat sarvabhūtāni paśyatāṃ śāntacetasām /
analyzed: ātma vat sarva bhūtāni paśyatām śānta cetasām

original: MSS_4604-2 abhinnamātmanaḥ sarvaṃ ko dātā dīyate ca kim //
analyzed: abhinnam ātmanaḥ sarvam kaḥ dātā dīyate ca kim

original: MSS_4605-1 ātmavargaṃ parityajya paravargaṃ samāśrayet /
analyzed: ātma vargam parityajya para vargam samāśrayet

original: MSS_4605-2 svayameva layaṃ yāti yathā rājānyadharmataḥ //
analyzed: svayam eva layam yāti yathā rājā anya dharmataḥ

original: MSS_4606-1 ātmavargaṃ parityajya paravargeṣu ye ratāḥ /
analyzed: ātma vargam parityajya para vargeṣu ye ratāḥ

original: MSS_4606-2 vānavannahaṃ rodimi ātmānaṃ naiva rodyate //
analyzed: vāna vat aham rodimi ātmānam na eva rodyate

original: MSS_4607-1 ātmavargaṃ parityajya paravargeṣu ye ratāḥ /
analyzed: ātma vargam parityajya para vargeṣu ye ratāḥ

original: MSS_4607-2 sarve te'pi vinaśyanti yathā rājā kukardamaḥ //
analyzed: sarve te api vinaśyanti yathā rājā kukardamaḥ

original: MSS_4608-1 ātmavāṃstvalpadeśo'pi yuktaḥ prakṛtisaṃpadā /
analyzed: ātmavān tu alpa deśaḥ api yuktaḥ prakṛti saṃpadā

original: MSS_4608-2 nayajñaḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jayatyeva na hīyate //
analyzed: na yajñaḥ pṛthivīm kṛtsnām jayati eva na hīyate

original: MSS_4609-1 ātmavikrayiṇi klībe sadā śaṅkitacetasi /
analyzed: ātma vikrayiṇi klībe sadā śaṅkita cetasi

original: MSS_4609-2 nityamiṣṭaviyogārte kiṃ sevakapaśau sukham //
analyzed: nityam iṣṭa viyoga ārte kim sevaka paśau sukham

original: MSS_4610-1 ātmavit saha tayā divāniśaṃ bhogabhāgapi na pāpamāpa saḥ /
analyzed: ātma vid saha tayā divāniśam bhoga bhāj api na pāpam āpa saḥ

original: MSS_4610-2 āhṛtā hi viṣayaikatānatā jñānadhautamanasaṃ na limpati //
analyzed: āhṛtā hi viṣaya eka tāna tā jñāna dhauta manasam na limpati

original: MSS_4611-1 ātmasaṃpadguṇaiḥ samyak saṃyuktaṃ yuktakāriṇam /
analyzed: ātma saṃpad guṇaiḥ samyak saṃyuktam yukta kāriṇam

original: MSS_4611-2 mahendramiva rājānaṃ prāpya loko vivardhate //
analyzed: mahā indram iva rājānam prāpya lokaḥ vivardhate

original: MSS_4612-1 ātmasaṃbhāvitāḥ stabdhā dhanamānamadānvitāḥ /
analyzed: ātma saṃbhāvitāḥ stabdhāḥ dhana māna mada anvitāḥ

original: MSS_4612-2 yajante nāmayajñaiste dambhenāvidhipūrvakam //
analyzed: yajante nāma yajñaiḥ te dambhena a vidhi pūrvakam

original: MSS_4613-1 ātmastrīdhanaguhyānāṃ goptā bandhus tu mitravat /
analyzed: ātma strīdhana guhyānām goptā bandhuḥ tu mitra vat

original: MSS_4613-2 dhanadas tu kuberaḥ syād yamaḥ syāc ca sudaṇḍakṛt //
analyzed: dhanadaḥ tu kuberaḥ syāt yamaḥ syāt ca sudaṇḍakṛt

original: MSS_4614-1 ātmastrīdhanaguhyānāṃ śaraṇaṃ samaye suhṛt /
analyzed: ātma strīdhana guhyānām śaraṇam samaye suhṛd

original: MSS_4614-2 proktottamo'yamanyaśca tridvyekapadamitrakaḥ //
MSS_4615-1 ātmahetoḥ parārthe vā narmahāsyāśrayāt tathā /
analyzed: ātma hetoḥ para arthe vā narma hāsya āśrayāt tathā

original: MSS_4615-2 ye mṛṣā na vadantīha te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
analyzed: ye mṛṣā na vadanti iha te narāḥ svarga gāminaḥ

original: MSS_4616-1 ātmā kāyaśca dvāvetau mitrarūpāvubhāvapi /
analyzed: ātmā kāyaḥ ca dvau etau mitra rūpau ubhau api

original: MSS_4616-2 kāyaṃ mitraṃ parityajya ātmā yāti suniścitam //
analyzed: kāyam mitram parityajya ātmā yāti su niścitam

original: MSS_4617-1 ātmā janmaśatairdhanārjanadhiyā mithyā kimāyāsyate paṅgoḥ śrīrgṛhameti laṅghitabhuvo daivecchayā nirdhanāḥ /
analyzed: ātmā janma śataiḥ dhana arjana dhiyā mithyā kim āyāsyate paṅgoḥ śrīḥ gṛham eti laṅghita bhuvaḥ daiva icchayā nirdhanāḥ

original: MSS_4617-2 ityetāḥ puruṣārthamūlahatayaḥ kaiścit samutsāritā mugdhānāmalasotkaṭāḥ pratipadaṃ kurvanti cittabhramam //
analyzed: iti etāḥ puruṣa artha mūla hatayaḥ kaiścid samutsāritāḥ mugdhānām alasa utkaṭāḥ pratipadam kurvanti citta bhramam

original: MSS_4618-1 ātmā jeyaḥ sadā rājñā tato jeyāśca śatravaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā jeyaḥ sadā rājñā tatas jeyāḥ ca śatravaḥ

original: MSS_4618-2 ajitātmā narapatir vijayeta kathaṃ ripūn //
analyzed: ajita ātmā narapatiḥ vijayeta katham ripūn

original: MSS_4619-1 ātmātmanaiva janitaḥ putra ityucyate budhaiḥ /
analyzed: ātma ātmanā eva janitaḥ putraḥ iti ucyate budhaiḥ

original: MSS_4619-2 tasmād bhāryāṃ naraḥ paśyen mātṛvat putramātaram //
analyzed: tasmāt bhāryām naraḥ paśyet mātṛ vat putra mātaram

original: MSS_4620-1 ātmādhīnaśarīrāṇāṃ svapatāṃ nidrayā svayā /
analyzed: ātma adhīna śarīrāṇām svapatām nidrayā svayā

original: MSS_4620-2 kadannamapi martyānām amṛtatvāya kalpate //
analyzed: kadannam api martyānām amṛta tvāya kalpate

original: MSS_4621-1 ātmānaṃ kupathena nirgamayituṃ yaḥ sūkalāśvāyate kṛtyākṛtyavivekajīvitahatau yaḥ kṛṣṇasarpāyate /
analyzed: ātmānam kupathena nirgamayitum yaḥ sūkalāśvāyate kṛtya akṛtya viveka jīvita hatau yaḥ kṛṣṇasarpāyate

original: MSS_4621-2 yaḥ puṇyadrumakhaṇḍakhaṇḍanavidhau sphūrjatkuṭhārāyate taṃ luptavratamudramindriyagaṇaṃ jitvā śubhaṃyurbhava //
analyzed: yaḥ puṇya druma khaṇḍa khaṇḍana vidhau sphūrjat kuṭhārāyate tam lupta vrata mudram indriya gaṇam jitvā śubhaṃyuḥ bhava

original: MSS_4622-1 ātmānaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ dṛśā nityāvibhinnayā /
analyzed: ātmānam ca jagat sarvam dṛśā nitya avibhinnayā

original: MSS_4622-2 cidākāśamayaṃ dhyāyan yogī yāti parāṃ gatim //
analyzed: cit ākāśa mayam dhyāyan yogī yāti parām gatim

original: MSS_4623-1 ātmānaṃ ca paraṃ caiva trāyate mahato bhayāt /
analyzed: ātmānam ca param ca eva trāyate mahataḥ bhayāt

original: MSS_4623-2 krudhyantamapratikrudhyan dvayoreṣa cikitsakaḥ //
analyzed: krudhyantam apratikrudhyān dvayoḥ eṣa cikitsakaḥ

original: MSS_4624-1 ātmānaṃ ca paraṃ caiva palāyan hanti saṃyuge /
analyzed: ātmānam ca param ca eva palāyan hanti saṃyuge

original: MSS_4624-2 dravyanāśo vyayo'kīrtir ayaśaśca palāyane //
analyzed: dravya nāśaḥ vyayaḥ kīrtiḥ ayaśaḥ ca palāyane

original: MSS_4625-1 ātmānaṃ ca paraṃ caiva vīkṣya dhīraḥ samutpatet /
analyzed: ātmānam ca param ca eva vīkṣya dhīraḥ samutpatet

original: MSS_4625-2 etadeva hi vijñānaṃ yadātmaparavedanam //
analyzed: etat eva hi vijñānam yat ātma para vedanam

original: MSS_4626-1 ātmānaṃ dharmakṛtyaṃ ca putradārāṃśca pīḍayan /
analyzed: ātmānam dharma kṛtyam ca putra dārān ca pīḍayan

original: MSS_4626-2 devatātithibhṛtyāṃśca sa kadarya iti smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: devatā atithi bhṛtyān ca sa kadaryaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_4627-1 ātmānaṃ nāvamanyeta pūrvābhirasamṛddhibhiḥ /
analyzed: ātmānam na avamanyeta pūrvābhiḥ asamṛddhibhiḥ

original: MSS_4627-2 āmṛtyoḥ śriyamanvicchen naināṃ manyeta durlabhām //
analyzed: ā mṛtyoḥ śriyam anvicchet na enām manyeta durlabhām

original: MSS_4628-1 ātmānaṃ niyamaistaistaiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: ātmānam niyamaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ

original: MSS_4628-2 prāpyate nipuṇairdharmo na sukhāllabhyate sukham //
analyzed: prāpyate nipuṇaiḥ dharmaḥ na sukhāt labhyate sukham

original: MSS_4629-1 ātmānaṃ paramaṃ pramāṇanikarairaprāpyamavyāhataṃ jñeyaṃ yad guruvīkṣaṇādapi janā mūḍhāstu muktvaiva tat /
analyzed: ātmānam paramam pramāṇa nikaraiḥ a prāpyam avyāhatam jñeyam yat guru vīkṣaṇāt api janāḥ mūḍhāḥ tu muktvā eva tat

original: MSS_4629-2 kośeṣu pramiteṣu pañcasu parijñātuṃ samudyuñjate naṣṭebhāḥ kalaśāntareṣvapi karaṃ kṛtvā vicinvanti hi //
analyzed: kośeṣu pramiteṣu pañcasu parijñātum samudyuñjate naṣṭa ibhāḥ kalaśa antareṣu api karam kṛtvā vicinvanti hi

original: MSS_4630-1 ātmānaṃ prathamaṃ rājā vinayenopapādayet /
analyzed: ātmānam prathamam rājā vinayena upapādayet

original: MSS_4630-2 tataḥ putrāṃs tato'mātyāṃs tato bhṛtyāṃs tataḥ prajām //
analyzed: tatas putrān tatas amātyān tatas bhṛtyān tatas prajām

original: MSS_4631-1 ātmānaṃ prathamaṃ rājā vinayenopapādayet /
analyzed: ātmānam prathamam rājā vinayena upapādayet

original: MSS_4631-2 tato'mātyāṃs tato bhṛtyāṃs tataḥ putrāṃs tataḥ prajāḥ //
analyzed: tatas amātyān tatas bhṛtyān tatas putrān tatas prajāḥ

original: MSS_4632-1 ātmānaṃ bhāvayennityaṃ jñānena vinayena ca /
analyzed: ātmānam bhāvayet nityam jñānena vinayena ca

original: MSS_4632-2 na punarmriyamāṇasya paścāttāpo bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: na punar mriyamāṇasya paścāttāpaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_4633-1 ātmānaṃ mantriṇaṃ dūtam amātyavacanaṃ kramam /
analyzed: ātmānam mantriṇam dūtam amātya vacanam kramam

original: MSS_4633-2 ākāraṃ bruvate ṣaṣṭham etāvān mantraniścayaḥ //
analyzed: ākāram bruvate ṣaṣṭham etāvān mantra niścayaḥ

original: MSS_4634-1 ātmānaṃ mantridūtaṃ ca cchannaṃ triṣavaṇakramam /
analyzed: ātmānam mantri dūtam ca channam triṣavaṇa kramam

original: MSS_4634-2 ākāraṃ bruvate ṣaṣṭham etāvān mantraniścayaḥ //
analyzed: ākāram bruvate ṣaṣṭham etāvān mantra niścayaḥ

original: MSS_4635-1 ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣed dārairapi dhanairapi /
analyzed: ātmānam satatam rakṣet dāraiḥ api dhanaiḥ api

original: MSS_4635-2 punardārāḥ punarvittaṃ na śarīraṃ punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: punar dārāḥ punar vittam na śarīram punar punar

original: MSS_4636-1 ātmānaṃ sarvathā rakṣed rājā rakṣecca medinīm /
analyzed: ātmānam sarvathā rakṣet rājā rakṣet ca medinīm

original: MSS_4636-2 ātmamūlamidaṃ sarvam āhurhividuṣo janāḥ //
analyzed: ātma mūlam idam sarvam āhuḥ hi viduṣaḥ janāḥ

original: MSS_4637-1 ātmānaṃ susthiraṃ lakṣyaṃ caiva sthiraṃ budhaḥ /
analyzed: ātmānam su sthiram lakṣyam ca eva sthiram budhaḥ

original: MSS_4637-2 vedhayet triprakāraṃ tu sthiravedhī sa ucyate //
analyzed: vedhayet tri prakāram tu sthira vedhī saḥ ucyate

original: MSS_4638-1 ātmā nadī bhārata puṇyatīrthā satyodakā dhṛtikūlā damormiḥ /
analyzed: ātmā nadī bhārata puṇya tīrthā satya udakā dhṛti kūlā dama ūrmiḥ

original: MSS_4638-2 tasyāṃ snātaḥ pūyate puṇyakarmā puṇyo hyātmā nityamambho'mbha eva //
analyzed: tasyām snātaḥ pūyate puṇya karmā puṇyaḥ hi ātmā nityam ambhaḥ ombhaḥ eva

original: MSS_4639-1 ātmā nadī saṃyamapuṇyatīrthā satyodakā śīlasamādhiyuktā /
analyzed: ātmā nadī saṃyama puṇya tīrthā satya udakā śīla samādhi yuktā

original: MSS_4639-2 tasyāṃ snātaḥ puṇyakarmā punāti na vāriṇā śuddhyati cāntarātmā //
analyzed: tasyām snātaḥ puṇya karmā punāti na vāriṇā śuddhi ati ca antarātmā

original: MSS_4640-1 ātmānandarasajñānām alaṃ śāstrāvalokanam /
analyzed: ātma ānanda rasa jñānām alam śāstra avalokanam

original: MSS_4640-2 bhakṣitavyā hyapūpāḥ kiṃ gaṇyāni suṣirāṇi kim //
analyzed: bhakṣitavyāḥ hi apūpāḥ kim gaṇyāni suṣirāṇi kim

original: MSS_4641-1 ātmānamanuśoca tvaṃ kimanyamanuśocasi /
analyzed: ātmānam anuśoca tvam kim anyam anuśocasi

original: MSS_4641-2 āyuste hīyate yasya sthitasya ca gatasya ca //
analyzed: āyuḥ te hīyate yasya sthitasya ca gatasya ca

original: MSS_4642-1 ātmānamanyamatha hanti jahāti dharmaṃ pāpaṃ samācarati yuktamapākaroti /
analyzed: ātmānam anyam atha hanti jahāti dharmam pāpam samācarati yuktam apākaroti

original: MSS_4642-2 pūjyaṃ na pūjayati vakti vinindyavākyaṃ kiṃ kiṃ karoti na naraḥ khalu kopayuktaḥ //
analyzed: pūjyam na pūjayati vakti vinindya vākyam kim kim karoti na naraḥ khalu kopa yuktaḥ

original: MSS_4643-1 ātmānamambhonidhiretu śoṣaṃ brahmāṇḍamāsiñcatu vā taraṅgaiḥ /
analyzed: ātmānam ambhonidhiḥ etu śoṣam brahmāṇḍam āsiñcatu vā taraṅgaiḥ

original: MSS_4643-2 nāsti kṣatirnopacitaḥ kadāpi payodavṛtteḥ khalu cātakasya //
analyzed: nā asti kṣatiḥ nā upacitaḥ kadāpi payoda vṛtteḥ khalu cātakasya

original: MSS_4643A-1 ātmānamākhyāti hi karmabhirnaraḥ svaśīlacāritrakṛtaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ /
analyzed: ātmānam ākhyāti hi karmabhiḥ naraḥ sva śīla cāritra kṛtaiḥ śubha aśubhaiḥ

original: MSS_4643A-2 pranaṣṭamapyātmakulaṃ tathā naraḥ punaḥ prakāśaṃ kurute svakarmabhiḥ //
analyzed: pranaṣṭam api ātma kulam tathā naraḥ punar prakāśam kurute sva karmabhiḥ

original: MSS_4644-1 ātmānamātmanā vetsi sṛjasyātmānamātmanā /
analyzed: ātmānam ātmanā vetsi sṛjasi ātmānam ātmanā

original: MSS_4644-2 ātmanā kṛtinā ca tvam ātmanyeva pralīyase //
analyzed: ātmanā kṛtinā ca tvam ātmani eva pralīyase

original: MSS_4645-1 ātmānamālokya ca śobhamānam ādarśabimbe stimitāyatākṣī /
analyzed: ātmānam ālokya ca śobhamānam ādarśa bimbe stimita āyata akṣī

original: MSS_4645-2 haropayāne tvaritā babhūva strīṇāṃ priyālokaphalo hi veṣaḥ //
analyzed: hara upayāne tvaritā babhūva strīṇām priya āloka phalaḥ hi veṣaḥ

original: MSS_4646-1 ātmānameva prathamaṃ deśarūpeṇa yo jayet /
analyzed: ātmānam eva prathamam deśa rūpeṇa yaḥ jayet

original: MSS_4646-2 tato'mātyānamitrāṃśca na moghaṃ vijigīṣate //
analyzed: tatas umātyān amitrān ca na mogham vijigīṣate

original: MSS_4647-1 ātmānameva prathamam icched guṇasamanvitam /
analyzed: ātmānam eva prathamam icchet guṇa samanvitam

original: MSS_4647-2 kurvīta guṇasaṃpannas tataḥ śeṣaparīkṣaṇam //
analyzed: kurvīta guṇa saṃpannaḥ tatas śeṣa parīkṣaṇam

original: MSS_4649-1 ātmāpi cāyaṃ na mama sarvā vā pṛthivī mama /
analyzed: ātmā api ca ayam na mama sarvā vā pṛthivī mama

original: MSS_4649-2 yathā mama tathānyeṣām iti buddhyā na me vyathā //
analyzed: yathā mama tathā anyeṣām iti buddhyā na me vyathā

original: MSS_4650-1 ātmā prayatnādarthebhyo manaḥ samadhitiṣṭhati /
analyzed: ātmā prayatnāt arthebhyaḥ manaḥ samadhitiṣṭhati

original: MSS_4650-2 saṃyogādātmamanasoḥ pravṛttirupajāyate //
analyzed: saṃyogāt ātma manasoḥ pravṛttiḥ upajāyate

original: MSS_4651-1 ātmābhidhaṃ sukhamanantamakhaṇḍamekaṃ yajñādikarmajanitena sukhena tulyam /
analyzed: ātma abhidham sukham anantam akhaṇḍam ekam yajña ādi karma janitena sukhena tulyam

original: MSS_4651-2 mā brūhi karma sukhadaṃ tadapīti buddhyā ratnākarasya sadṛśaṃ nu kulālakuṇḍam //
analyzed: mā brūhi karma sukha dam tat api iti buddhyā ratnākarasya sadṛśam nu kulāla kuṇḍam

original: MSS_4652-1 ātmā manaśca tadvidyair antaḥkaraṇamucyate /
