analyzed: ātmā manaḥ ca tad vidyaiḥ antaḥkaraṇam ucyate

original: MSS_4652-2 tābhyāṃ tu saprayatnābhyāṃ saṃkalpa upajāyate //
analyzed: tābhyām tu sa prayatnābhyām saṃkalpaḥ upajāyate

original: MSS_4653-1 ātmā buddhīndriyāṇyarthā bahiṣkaraṇamucyate /
analyzed: ātmā buddhīndriyāṇi arthāḥ bahiṣkaraṇam ucyate

original: MSS_4653-2 saṃkalpādhyavasāyābhyāṃ siddhirasya prakīrttitā //
analyzed: saṃkalpa adhyavasāyābhyām siddhiḥ asya prakīrttitā

original: MSS_4654-1 ubhe ete hi karaṇe yatnānantaryake smṛte /
analyzed: ubhe ete hi karaṇe yatna ānantaryake smṛte

original: MSS_4654-2 tasmāt prayatnasaṃrodhād bhāvayennirmanaskatām //
analyzed: tasmāt prayatna saṃrodhāt bhāvayet nirmanaska tām

original: MSS_4655-1 ātmāyatte guṇagrāme nairguṇyaṃ vacanīyatā /
analyzed: ātma āyatte guṇa grāme nairguṇyam vacanīya tā

original: MSS_4655-2 daivāyatteṣu vitteṣu puṃsāṃ kā nāma vācyatā //
analyzed: daiva āyatteṣu vitteṣu puṃsām kā nāma vācya tā

original: MSS_4656-1 ātmāyamātmani gato hṛdaye'tisūkṣmo grāhyo'calena manasā satatābhiyogāt /
analyzed: ātmā ayam ātmani gataḥ hṛdaya iti sūkṣmaḥ grāhya ucalena manasā satata abhiyogāt

original: MSS_4656-2 yo yaṃ vicintayati yāti sa tanmayatvaṃ yasmādataḥ subhagameva gatā yuvatyaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ yam vicintayati yāti sa tad maya tvam yasmāt atas subhagam eva gatāḥ yuvatyaḥ

original: MSS_4657-1 ātmā yasya vaśe nāsti kutas tasya pare janāḥ /
analyzed: ātmā yasya vaśe nā asti kutas tasya pare janāḥ

original: MSS_4657-2 ātmānaṃ vaśamānīya trailokyaṃ vartate vaśe //
analyzed: ātmānam vaśam ānīya trailokyam vartate vaśe

original: MSS_4658-1 ātmā rakṣyaḥ prayatnena yuddhasiddhirhi cañcalā /
analyzed: ātmā rakṣyaḥ prayatnena yuddha siddhiḥ hi cañcalā

original: MSS_4658-2 te svāmivacanaṃ sarve pratigṛhya mahaujasaḥ //
analyzed: te svāmi vacanam sarve pratigṛhya mahā ojasaḥ

original: MSS_4659-1 ātmārāmā vihitaratayo nirvikalpe samādhau jñānodrekād vighaṭitatamogranthayaḥ sattvaniṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: ātma ārāmāḥ vihita ratayaḥ nirvikalpe samādhau jñāna udrekāt vighaṭita tamaḥ granthayaḥ sattva niṣṭhāḥ

original: MSS_4659-2 yaṃ vīkṣante kamapi tamasāṃ jyotiṣāṃ vā parastāt taṃ mohāndhaḥ kathamayamamuṃ vettu devaṃ purāṇam //
analyzed: yam vīkṣante kam api tamasām jyotiṣām vā parastāt tam moha andhaḥ katham ayam amum vettu devam purāṇam

original: MSS_4660-1 ātmārthaṃ jīvaloke'smin ko na jīvati mānavaḥ /
analyzed: ātma artham jīva loke ismin kaḥ na jīvati mānavaḥ

original: MSS_4660-2 paraṃ paropakārārthaṃ yo jīvati sa jīvati //
analyzed: param para upakāra artham yaḥ jīvati sa jīvati

original: MSS_4661-1 ātmārthaṃ yaḥ paśūn hanyāt so'vaśyaṃ narakaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: ātma artham yaḥ paśūn hanyāt saḥ uvaśyam narakam vrajet

original: MSS_4661-2 devān pit n samabhyarcya khādan māṃsaṃ na doṣabhāk //
analyzed: devān pit samabhyarcya khādan māṃsam na doṣa bhāj

original: MSS_4662-1 ātmārthaṃ yuktavittānāṃ mitramaṇḍalabhedinām /
analyzed: ātma artham yukta vittānām mitra maṇḍala bhedinām

original: MSS_4662-2 atilaṅghitalokānāṃ na bandhaḥ kenacit kvacit //
analyzed: atilaṅghita lokānām na bandhaḥ kenacid kvacid

original: MSS_4663-1 ātmārthatvena hi preyān viṣayo na svataḥ priyaḥ /
analyzed: ātma artha tvena hi preyān viṣayaḥ na svatas priyaḥ

original: MSS_4663-2 svata eva hi sarveṣām ātmā priyatamo yataḥ /
analyzed: svatas eva hi sarveṣām ātmā priyatamaḥ yatas

original: MSS_4663-3 tata ātmā sadānando nāsya duḥkhaṃ kadācana //
analyzed: tatas ātmā sat ānandaḥ na asya duḥkham kadācana

original: MSS_4664-1 ātmārthe saṃtatistyājyā rājyaṃ ratnaṃ dhanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ātma arthe saṃtatiḥ tyājyā rājyam ratnam dhanam tathā

original: MSS_4664-2 api sarvasvamutsṛjya rakṣedātmānamātmanā //
analyzed: api sarva svam utsṛjya rakṣet ātmānam ātmanā

original: MSS_4665-2 ātmā vai yamito yena sa yamastu viśiṣyate //
analyzed: ātmā vai yamitaḥ yena sa yamaḥ tu viśiṣyate

original: MSS_4666-1 ātmā samastajagatāṃ bhavatīti samyag vijñāya yad vitanute tvayi bhāvabandham /
analyzed: ātmā samasta jagatām bhavati iti samyak vijñāya yat vitanute tvayi bhāva bandham

original: MSS_4666-2 sā bhaktirityabhimataṃ yadi siddhamiṣṭaṃ vyarthaṃ viśeṣyamalamastu viśeṣaṇaṃ naḥ //
analyzed: sā bhaktiḥ iti abhimatam yadi siddham iṣṭam vyartham viśeṣyam alam astu viśeṣaṇam naḥ

original: MSS_4667-1 ātmā sahaiti manasā mana indriyeṇa svārthena cendriyamiti krama eṣa śīghraḥ /
analyzed: ātmā saha eti manasā manaḥ indriyeṇa svārthena ca indriyam iti kramaḥ eṣa śīghraḥ

original: MSS_4667-2 yogo'yameva manasaḥ kimagamyamasti yasmin mano vrajati tatra gato'yamātmā //
analyzed: yogaḥ uyam eva manasaḥ kim agamyam asti yasmin manaḥ vrajati tatra gataḥ yam ātmā

original: MSS_4668-1 ātmāsti sarvajagatām ādhāraḥ pūrvamiti vicintyaiva /
analyzed: ātmā asti sarva jagatām ādhāraḥ pūrvam iti vicintya eva

original: MSS_4668-2 paścāt tattvavicāraḥ kuḍye satyeva citrakarma syāt //
analyzed: paścāt tattva vicāraḥ kuḍye sati eva citrakarma syāt

original: MSS_4669-1 ātmā hi dārāḥ sarveṣāṃ dārasaṃgrahavartinām /
analyzed: ātmā hi dārāḥ sarveṣām dāra saṃgraha vartinām

original: MSS_4670-1 ātmīyaṃ caraṇaṃ dadhāti purato nimnonnatāyāṃ bhuvi svīyenaiva kareṇa karṣati taroḥ puṣpaṃ śramāśaṅkayā /
analyzed: ātmīyam caraṇam dadhāti puratas nimna unnatāyām bhuvi svīyena eva kareṇa karṣati taroḥ puṣpam śrama āśaṅkayā

original: MSS_4670-2 talpe kiṃ ca mṛgatvacā viracite nidrāti bhāgairnijair antaḥpremabharālasāṃ priyatamāmaṅge dadhāno haraḥ //
analyzed: talpe kim ca mṛga tvacā viracite nidrāti bhāgaiḥ nijaiḥ antar prema bhara alasām priyatamām aṅge dadhānaḥ haraḥ

original: MSS_4671-1 ātmaiva tātasya caturbhujasya jātaścaturdorucitaḥ smaro'pi /
analyzed: ātmā eva tātasya catur bhujasya jātaḥ catur dos ucitaḥ smaraḥ upi

original: MSS_4671-2 taccāpayoḥ karṇalate bhruvorjye vaṃśatvagaṃśau cipiṭe kimasyāḥ //
analyzed: tad cāpayoḥ karṇa late bhruvoḥ jye vaṃśa tvac aṃśau cipiṭe kim asyāḥ

original: MSS_4672-1 ātmaiva devatāḥ sarvāḥ sarvamātmanyavasthitam /
analyzed: ātmā eva devatāḥ sarvāḥ sarvam ātmani avasthitam

original: MSS_4672-2 ātmā hi janayatyeṣāṃ karmayogaṃ śarīriṇām //
analyzed: ātmā hi janayati eṣām karma yogam śarīriṇām

original: MSS_4673-1 ātmaiva bhāra iti taṃ tvayi yo nidhatte so'ṅgāni kāni kalayatvalasaḥ prapatteḥ /
analyzed: ātmā eva bhāraḥ iti tam tvayi yaḥ nidhatte sa uṅgāni kāni kalayatu alasaḥ prapatteḥ

original: MSS_4673-2 viśvatra sātra savilakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyā visrambhasaṃpadiyameva samastamaṅgi //
analyzed: viśvatra sā atra sa vilakṣaṇa lakṣaṇāyāḥ visrambha saṃpad iyam eva samastam aṅgi

original: MSS_4674-1 ātmaiva yadi nātmānam ahitebhyo nivārayet /
analyzed: ātmā eva yadi na ātmānam ahitebhyaḥ nivārayet

original: MSS_4674-2 ko'nyo hitakarastasmād ātmānaṃ vārayiṣyati //
analyzed: kaḥ anyaḥ hita karaḥ tasmāt ātmānam vārayiṣyati

original: MSS_4675-1 ātmaiva hyātmanaḥ sākṣī gatirātmā tathātmanaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ sākṣī gatiḥ ātmā tathā ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_4675-2 māvamaṃsthāḥ svamātmānaṃ nṛṇāṃ sākṣiṇamuttamam //
analyzed: mā avamaṃsthāḥ svam ātmānam nṛṇām sākṣiṇam uttamam

original: MSS_4676-1 ātmaiva hyātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripurātmanaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ bandhuḥ ātmā eva ripuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_4676-2 ātmaiva cātmanaḥ sākṣī kṛtasyāpyakṛtasya ca //
analyzed: ātmā eva ca ātmanaḥ sākṣī kṛtasya api akṛtasya ca

original: MSS_4677-1 atmodayaḥ parajyānir dvayaṃ nītiritīyatī /
analyzed: atma udayaḥ para jyāniḥ dvayam nītiḥ iti iyatī

original: MSS_4677-2 tadūrīkṛtya kṛtibhir vācaspatyaṃ pratīyate //
analyzed: tat ūrīkṛtya kṛtibhiḥ vācaspatyam pratīyate

original: MSS_4678-1 ātmopakāracaturā narā na gaṇayanti gurukulakleśam /
analyzed: ātma upakāra caturāḥ narāḥ na gaṇayanti guru kula kleśam

original: MSS_4678-2 vedhavyathaiva kiyatī śravaso hyavataṃsabhūṣaṇīyasya //
analyzed: vedha vyathā eva kiyatī śravasaḥ hi avataṃsa bhūṣaṇīyasya

original: MSS_4679-1 ātmopamaśca bhūteṣu yo vai bhavati pūruṣaḥ /
analyzed: ātma upamaḥ ca bhūteṣu yaḥ vai bhavati pūruṣaḥ

original: MSS_4679-2 nyastadaṇḍo jitakrodhaḥ sa pretya sukhamedhate //
analyzed: nyasta daṇḍaḥ jita krodhaḥ sa pretya sukham edhate

original: MSS_4680-1 ātmaupamyena yo vetti durjanaṃ satyavādinam /
analyzed: ātma aupamyena yaḥ vetti durjanam satya vādinam

original: MSS_4680-2 sa eva vañcyate tena brāhmaṇāśchāgato yathā //
analyzed: saḥ eva vañcyate tena brāhmaṇāḥ chāgataḥ yathā

original: MSS_4681-1 ātmyaupamyena sarvatra samaṃ paśyati yo'rjuna /
analyzed: ātmya aupamyena sarvatra samam paśyati yaḥ urjuna

original: MSS_4681-2 sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ //
analyzed: sukham vā yadi vā duḥkham sa yogī paramaḥ mataḥ

original: MSS_4682-1 ādadānaḥ pratidinaṃ kalāḥ samyaṅ mahīpatiḥ /
analyzed: ādadānaḥ pratidinam kalāḥ samyak mahīpatiḥ

original: MSS_4682-2 śuklapakṣe pravicaran śaśāṅka iva varddhate //
analyzed: śukla pakṣe pravicaran śaśāṅkaḥ iva varddhate

original: MSS_4683-1 ādaraṃ rājasadasi dhanena labhate naraḥ /
analyzed: ādaram rāja sadasi dhanena labhate naraḥ

original: MSS_4683-2 subhaṭaḥ śatrusaṃgrāme vikrameṇa yathā jayam //
analyzed: su bhaṭaḥ śatru saṃgrāme vikrameṇa yathā jayam

original: MSS_4684-1 ādaraṇīyaguṇā sakhi mahatā nihitāsi tena śirasi tvam /
analyzed: ādaraṇīya guṇā sakhi mahatā nihitā asi tena śirasi tvam

original: MSS_4684-2 tava lāghavadoṣo'yaṃ saudhapatākeva yaccalasi //
analyzed: tava lāghava doṣaḥ yam saudha patākā iva yat calasi

original: MSS_4685-1 ādareṇa yathā stauti dhanavantaṃ dhanecchayā /
analyzed: ādareṇa yathā stauti dhanavantam dhana icchayā

original: MSS_4685-2 tathā ced viśvakartāraṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt //
analyzed: tathā ced viśvakartāram kaḥ na mucyeta bandhanāt

original: MSS_4686-1 ādareṇārjavenaiva śauryād dānena vidyayā /
analyzed: ādareṇa ārjavena eva śauryāt dānena vidyayā

original: MSS_4686-2 pratyutthānābhigamanair ānandasmitabhāṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: pratyutthāna abhigamanaiḥ ānanda smita bhāṣaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_4686-3 upakāraiḥ svāśayena vaśīkuryājjagat sadā //
analyzed: upakāraiḥ sva āśayena vaśīkuryāt jagat sadā

original: MSS_4687-1 ā darśanāt praviṣṭā sā me suralokasundarī hṛdayam /
analyzed: ā darśanāt praviṣṭā sā me sura loka sundarī hṛdayam

original: MSS_4687-2 bāṇena makaraketoḥ kṛtamārgamavandhyapātena //
analyzed: bāṇena makaraketoḥ kṛta mārgam avandhya pātena

original: MSS_4688-1 ādarśāya śaśāṅkamaṇḍalamidaṃ harmyāya hemācalaṃ dīpāya dyumaṇiṃ mahīmiva kathaṃ no bhikṣave dattavān /
analyzed: ādarśāya śaśāṅka maṇḍalam idam harmyāya hemācalam dīpāya dyumaṇim mahīm iva katham naḥ bhikṣave dattavān

original: MSS_4688-2 ditsāpallavitapramodasalilavyākīrṇanetrāmbujo jānīmo bhṛgunandanastadakhilaṃ na prāyaśo dṛṣṭavān //
analyzed: ditsā pallavita pramoda salila vyākīrṇa netra ambujaḥ jānīmaḥ bhṛgunandanaḥ tat akhilam na prāyaśas dṛṣṭavān

original: MSS_4689-1 ādātavyaṃ na dātavyaṃ priyaṃ brūyan nirarthakam /
analyzed: ādātavyam na dātavyam priyam brūyat nirarthakam

original: MSS_4689-2 āśāṃ kālavatīṃ kuryāt kālaṃ vighnena yojayet //
analyzed: āśām kālavatīm kuryāt kālam vighnena yojayet

original: MSS_4690-1 ādātuṃ sakṛdīkṣite'pi kusume hastāgramālohitaṃ lākṣārañjanavārtayāpi sahasā raktaṃ talaṃ pādayoḥ /
analyzed: ādātum sakṛt īkṣite api kusume hasta agram ālohitam lākṣā rañjana vārtayā api sahasā raktam talam pādayoḥ

original: MSS_4690-2 aṅgānāmanulepanasmaraṇamapyatyantakhedāvahaṃ hantādhīradṛśaḥ kimanyadalakāmodo'pi bhārāyate //
analyzed: aṅgānām anulepana smaraṇam api atyanta kheda āvaham hanta adhīra dṛśaḥ kim anyat ala kāmodaḥ upi bhārāyate

original: MSS_4691-1 ādānaṃ caiva tūṇīrāt saṃdhānaṃ karṣaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ādānam ca eva tūṇīrāt saṃdhānam karṣaṇam tathā

original: MSS_4691-2 kṣepaṇaṃ ca tvarāyukto bāṇasya kurute tu yaḥ /
analyzed: kṣepaṇam ca tvarā yuktaḥ bāṇasya kurute tu yaḥ

original: MSS_4691-3 nityābhyāsavaśāt tasya śīghrasaṃdhānatā bhavet //
analyzed: nitya abhyāsa vaśāt tasya śīghra saṃdhāna tā bhavet

original: MSS_4692-1 ādānapānalepaiḥ kāścid garalopatāpahāriṇyaḥ /
analyzed: ādāna pāna lepaiḥ kāścid garala upatāpa hāriṇyaḥ

original: MSS_4692-2 sadasi sthitaiva siddhau- ṣadhivallī kāpi jīvayati //
analyzed: sadasi sthitā eva siddhau ṣadhi vallī kā api jīvayati

original: MSS_4693-1 ādānamapriyakaraṃ dānaṃ ca priyakārakam /
analyzed: ādānam apriya karam dānam ca priya kārakam

original: MSS_4693-2 abhīpsitānāmarthānāṃ kāle yuktaṃ praśasyate //
analyzed: abhīpsitānām arthānām kāle yuktam praśasyate

original: MSS_4694-1 ādāya karamāḍhyebhyaḥ kīkaṭeṣvapi varṣasi /
analyzed: ādāya karama āḍhyebhyaḥ kīkaṭeṣu api varṣasi

original: MSS_4694-2 prapīya vāri sindhubhyaḥ sthaleṣviva ghanāghanaḥ //
analyzed: prapīya vāri sindhubhyaḥ sthaleṣu iva ghanāghanaḥ

original: MSS_4695-1 ādāya cāpamacalaṃ kṛtvāhīnaṃ guṇaṃ viṣamadṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: ādāya cāpam acalam kṛtvā ahīnam guṇam viṣama dṛṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_4695-2 yaścitramacyutaśaro lakṣyamabhāṅkṣīnnamastasmai //
analyzed: yaḥ citram acyuta śaraḥ lakṣyam abhāṅkṣīt namaḥ tasmai

original: MSS_4696-1 ādāya daṇḍaṃ sakalāsu dikṣu yo'yaṃ paribhrāmyati bhānubhikṣuḥ /
analyzed: ādāya daṇḍam sakalāsu dikṣu yaḥ yam paribhrāmyati bhānu bhikṣuḥ

original: MSS_4696-2 abdhau nimajjanniva tāpaso'yaṃ saṃdhyābhrakāṣāyamadhatta sāyam //
analyzed: abdhau nimajjan iva tāpasaḥ uyam saṃdhyā abhra kāṣāyam adhatta sāyam

original: MSS_4697-1 ādāya dhanamanalpaṃ dadānayā subhaga tāvakaṃ vāsaḥ /
analyzed: ādāya dhanam analpam dadānayā subhaga tāvakam vāsaḥ

original: MSS_4697-2 mugdhā rajakagṛhiṇyā kṛtā dinaiḥ katipayairniḥsvā //
analyzed: mugdhā rajaka gṛhiṇyā kṛtā dinaiḥ katipayaiḥ niḥsvā

original: MSS_4698-1 ādāya patraṃ tvaritaṃ yadi śvā dūrvāṃ navāṃ vā navagomayaṃ vā /
analyzed: ādāya patram tvaritam yadi śvā dūrvām navām vā nava gomayam vā

original: MSS_4698-2 prayāti yātuḥ paratas tadānīṃ rājaprasādaṃ niyataṃ bravīti //
analyzed: prayāti yātuḥ paratas tadānīm rāja prasādam niyatam bravīti

original: MSS_4699-1 ādāya pratipakṣakīrtinivahān brahmāṇḍamūṣāntare nirvighnaṃ dhamatā nitāntamuditaiḥ svaireva tejo'gnibhiḥ /
analyzed: ādāya pratipakṣa kīrti nivahān brahmāṇḍamūṣā antare nirvighnam dhamatā nitānta muditaiḥ svaiḥ eva teja agnibhiḥ

original: MSS_4699-2 tattādṛkpuṭapākaśodhitamiva prāptaṃ guṇotkarṣiṇāṃ piṇḍasthaṃ ca mahattaraṃ ca bhavatā niḥkṣāratāraṃ yaśaḥ //
analyzed: tat tādṛś puṭapāka śodhitam iva prāptam guṇa utkarṣiṇām piṇḍa stham ca mahattaram ca bhavatā niḥkṣāra tāram yaśaḥ

original: MSS_4700-1 ādāya māṃsamakhilaṃ stanavarjamaṅgān māṃ muñca vāgurika yāmi kuru prasādam /
analyzed: ādāya māṃsam akhilam stana varjam aṅgāt mām muñca vāgurika yāmi kuru prasādam

original: MSS_4700-2 sīdanti śaṣpakavalagrahaṇānabhijñā manmārgavīkṣaṇaparāḥ śiśavo madīyāḥ //
analyzed: sīdanti śaṣpa kavala grahaṇa anabhijñāḥ mad mārga vīkṣaṇa parāḥ śiśavaḥ madīyāḥ

original: MSS_4701-1 ādāya vakulagandhān andhīkurvan pade pade bhramarān /
analyzed: ādāya vakula gandhān andhīkurvan pade pade bhramarān

original: MSS_4701-2 ayameti mandamandaṃ kāverīvāripāvanaḥ pavanaḥ //
analyzed: ayam eti manda mandam kāverī vāri pāvanaḥ pavanaḥ

original: MSS_4702-1 ādāya vāri paritaḥ saritāṃ mukhebhyaḥ kiṃ tāvadarjitamanena durarṇavena /
analyzed: ādāya vāri paritas saritām mukhebhyaḥ kim tāvat arjitam anena durarṇavena

original: MSS_4702-2 kṣārīkṛtaṃ ca vaḍavādahane hutaṃ ca pātālakukṣikuhare viniveśitaṃ ca //
analyzed: kṣārīkṛtam ca vaḍavā dahane hutam ca pātāla kukṣi kuhare viniveśitam ca

original: MSS_4703-1 ādāya vāri yata eva jahāti bhūyas tatraiva yaḥ sa jaladaḥ prathamo jaḍānām /
analyzed: ādāya vāri yatas eva jahāti bhūyas tatra eva yaḥ sa jaladaḥ prathamaḥ jaḍānām

original: MSS_4703-2 vāntaṃ pratīpsati tadeva tadeva yastu srotaḥpatiḥ sa nirapatrapasārthavāhaḥ //
analyzed: vāntam pratīpsati tat eva tat eva yaḥ tu srotaḥpatiḥ sa nirapatrapa sārthavāhaḥ

original: MSS_4704-1 ādāya viprasvamapi nāśayed rājyaghātinaḥ /
analyzed: ādāya vipra svam api nāśayet rājya ghātinaḥ

original: MSS_4704-2 ādāyāsthi dadhīcestu śakro daityān jaghāna hi //
analyzed: ādāya asthi dadhīceḥ tu śakraḥ daityān jaghāna hi

original: MSS_4705-1 ādāyādāya muktāstadanu śikhidhiyādāya māṇikyavargaṃ dhūmabhrāntiṃ vahantyaḥ svavadanakamalāmodalubdhālivṛnde /
analyzed: ādāya ādāya muktāḥ tadanu śikhi dhiyā ādāya māṇikya vargam dhūma bhrāntim vahantyaḥ sva vadana kamala āmoda lubdha ali vṛnde

original: MSS_4705-2 paktuṃ bhillyaḥ pravṛttāḥ sarabhasamasakṛd yaddviṣatpattaneṣu brūmaḥ kiṃ kīrtipūraṃ dhavalitavasudhaṃ mallaśāhasya tasya //
analyzed: paktum bhillyaḥ pravṛttāḥ sarabhasam asakṛt yat dviṣat pattaneṣu brūmaḥ kim kīrti pūram dhavalita vasudham malla śāhasya tasya

original: MSS_4706-1 ādāyāmṛtapūrṇamarkacaṣakaṃ śoṇāravindaprabhe pāṇāvindravadhūrvilokya ca punas tasmin nabhaḥśyāmikām /
analyzed: ādāya amṛta pūrṇam arka caṣakam śoṇa aravinda prabhe pāṇau indra vadhūḥ vilokya ca punar tasmin nabhaḥ śyāmikām

original: MSS_4706-2 cikṣepopari kopataḥ parijane'saṃśodhya dattā sudhety enaṃ taṃ śaśinaṃ praśaṃsati janas tatpāṇimuktārjunam //
analyzed: cikṣepa upari kopataḥ parijane saṃśodhya dattā sudhā iti enam tam śaśinam praśaṃsati janaḥ tad pāṇi mukta arjunam

original: MSS_4707-1 ādāvaghaṭitaṃ kāryaṃ madhye sughaṭitaṃ mama /
analyzed: ādau aghaṭitam kāryam madhye su ghaṭitam mama

original: MSS_4707-2 bhūyo vighaṭitaṃ bhūyo bhūyād ghaṭayituṃ prabhuḥ //
analyzed: bhūyas vighaṭitam bhūyas bhūyāt ghaṭayitum prabhuḥ

original: MSS_4708-1 ādāvaṅkuritaṃ punaḥ pratipadaṃ patrāvṛtaṃ tvāṃ mudā saurabhyasphuritaprasūnakalitaṃ dṛṣṭvātha hṛṣṭo'smyaham /
analyzed: ādau aṅkuritam punar pratipadam pattra āvṛtam tvām mudā saurabhya sphurita prasūna kalitam dṛṣṭvā atha hṛṣṭaḥ asmi aham

original: MSS_4708-2 kiṃ brūmaḥ phalite tvayi drutataraṃ hā hanta kimpāka he bhūyo vyākulayanti kaṇṭakabharāḥ sarvatra tat kiṃ bruve //
analyzed: kim brūmaḥ phalite tvayi drutataram hā hanta kimpāka he bhūyas vyākulayanti kaṇṭaka bharāḥ sarvatra tat kim bruve

original: MSS_4709-1 ādāvañjanapuñjaliptavapuṣāṃ śvāsānilollāsita- protsarpadvirahānalena ca tataḥ saṃtāpitānāṃ dṛśām /
analyzed: ādau añjana puñja lipta vapuṣām śvāsa anila ullāsita protsarpat viraha analena ca tatas saṃtāpitānām dṛśām

original: MSS_4709-2 saṃpratyeva niṣekamaśrupayasā devasya cetobhuvo bhallīnāmiva pānakarma kurute kāmaṃ kuraṅgekṣaṇā //
analyzed: saṃprati eva niṣekam aśru payasā devasya cetaḥ bhuvaḥ bhallīnām iva pāna karma kurute kāmam kuraṅga īkṣaṇā

original: MSS_4710-1 ādāvapyupacāracāṭuvinayālaṃkāraśobhānvitaṃ madhye cāpi vicitravākyakusumairabhyarcitaṃ niṣphalaiḥ /
analyzed: ādau api upacāra cāṭu vinaya alaṃkāra śobhā anvitam madhye ca api vicitra vākya kusumaiḥ abhyarcitam niṣphalaiḥ

original: MSS_4710-2 paiśunyāvinayāvamānamalinaṃ bībhatsamante ca yad dūre vo'stvakulīnasaṃgatamasaddharmārthamutpāditam //
analyzed: paiśunya avinaya avamāna malinam bībhatsam ante ca yat dūre voḥ tu akulīna saṃgatam asat dharma artham utpāditam

original: MSS_4711-1 ādāvādipitāmahasya niyamavyāpārapātre jalaṃ paścāt pannagaśāyino bhagavataḥ pādodakaṃ pāvanam /
analyzed: ādau ādi pitāmahasya niyama vyāpāra pātre jalam paścāt pannaga śāyinaḥ bhagavataḥ pāda udakam pāvanam

original: MSS_4711-2 bhūyaḥ śambhujaṭāvibhūṣaṇamaṇir jahnormaharṣeriyaṃ kanyā kalmaṣanāśinī bhagavatī bhāgīrathī dṛśyate //
analyzed: bhūyas śambhu jaṭā vibhūṣaṇa maṇiḥ jahnoḥ mahā ṛṣeḥ iyam kanyā kalmaṣa nāśinī bhagavatī bhāgīrathī dṛśyate

original: MSS_4712-1 ādāvāyuḥ parīkṣeta paścāllakṣaṇamuttamam /
analyzed: ādau āyuḥ parīkṣeta paścāt lakṣaṇam uttamam

original: MSS_4712-2 āyurhīnanarāṇāṃ ca lakṣaṇaiḥ kiṃ prayojanam //
analyzed: āyuḥ hīna narāṇām ca lakṣaṇaiḥ kim prayojanam

original: MSS_4713-1 ādāvutsṛjya kāryāṇi paścācca prārthayanti ye /
analyzed: ādau utsṛjya kāryāṇi paścāt ca prārthayanti ye

original: MSS_4713-2 te loke hāsyatāṃ yānti palāṇḍuharaṇādiva //
analyzed: te loke hāsya tām yānti palāṇḍu haraṇāt iva

original: MSS_4714-1 ādāveva gajendramaulivilasaddaṇḍā patākāvalī paścād vāraṇarājadhoraṇiratiproddāmayodhāśritā /
analyzed: ādau eva gaja indra mauli vilasat daṇḍā patākā āvalī paścāt vāraṇa rāja dhoraṇi rati proddāma yodha āśritā

original: MSS_4714-2 uddaṇḍadhvajalāñchitāpyatha ghanībhūtā rathānāṃ tatis tatpaścāt turagāvalī vijayate yodhaiḥ samaṃ sarvataḥ //
analyzed: uddaṇḍa dhvaja lāñchitā api atha ghanībhūtā rathānām tatiḥ tad paścāt turaga āvalī vijayate yodhaiḥ samam sarvatas

original: MSS_4715-1 ādāveva manuṣyeṇa vartitavyaṃ yathā kṣamam /
analyzed: ādau eva manuṣyeṇa vartitavyam yathā kṣamam

original: MSS_4715-2 yathā nātītamarthaṃ vai paścāttāpena yujyate //
analyzed: yathā na atītam artham vai paścāttāpena yujyate

original: MSS_4716-1 ādikavī caturāsyau kamalajavalmīkajau vande /
analyzed: ādi kavī catur āsyau kamala ja valmīka jau vande

original: MSS_4716-2 lokaślokavidhātror yayorbhidā leśamātreṇa //
MSS_4717-1 āditāmajananāya dehinām antatāṃ ca dadhate'napāyine /
analyzed: ādi tām a jananāya dehinām anta tām ca

original: MSS_4717-2 bibhrate bhuvamadhaḥ sadātha ca brahmaṇo'pyupari tiṣṭhate namaḥ //
analyzed: bibhrate bhuvam adhas sadā atha ca brahmaṇā upi upari tiṣṭhate namaḥ

original: MSS_4718-1 āditālo jayantaḥ syāc chṛṅgārarasasaṃyutaḥ /
MSS_4718-2 rudrasaṃkhyākṣarapadair āyurvṛddhikaraḥ paraḥ /
MSS_4718-3 eka eva laghuryasminn āditālaḥ sa kathyate //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva laghuḥ yasmin ādi tālaḥ sa kathyate

original: MSS_4719-1 ādityacandrahariśaṃkaravāsavādyāḥ śaktā na jetumatiduḥkhakarāṇi yāni /
analyzed: āditya candra hari śaṃkara vāsava ādyāḥ śaktāḥ na jetum ati duḥkha karāṇi yāni

original: MSS_4719-2 tānīndriyāṇi balavanti sudurjayāni ye nirjayanti bhuvane balinasta eke //
analyzed: tāni indriyāṇi balavanti su durjayāni ye nirjayanti bhuvane balinaḥ te eke

original: MSS_4720-1 ādityacandrāvanijajñajīvaḥ śukrārkaputrā api rāhuketū /
analyzed: śukra arka putrāḥ api rāhu ketū

original: MSS_4720-2 kurvantu nityaṃ dhanadhānyasauṣṭhyaṃ dīrghāyurārogyaśubhānyamī vaḥ //
analyzed: kurvantu nityam dhana dhānya sauṣṭhyam dīrgha āyuḥ ārogya śubhāni amī vaḥ

original: MSS_4721-1 ādityacandrāvanilānalau ca dyaurbhūmirāpo hṛdayaṃ yamaśca /
analyzed: āditya candrau anila analau ca dyauḥ bhūmiḥ āpaḥ hṛdayam yamaḥ ca

original: MSS_4721-2 ahaśca rātriśca ubhe ca sandhye dharmaśca jānāti narasya vṛttam //
analyzed: ahar ca rātriḥ ca ubhe ca sandhye dharmaḥ ca jānāti narasya vṛttam

original: MSS_4722-1 ādityasya gatāgatairaharahaḥ saṃkṣīyate jīvitaṃ vyāpārairbahukāryabhāragurubhiḥ kālo na vijñāyate /
analyzed: ādityasya gata āgataiḥ ahar ahar saṃkṣīyate jīvitam vyāpāraiḥ bahu kārya bhāra gurubhiḥ kālaḥ na vijñāyate

original: MSS_4722-2 dṛṣṭvā janmajarāvipattimaraṇaṃ trāsaś ca notpadyate pītvā mohamayīṃ pramādamadirāmunmattabhūtaṃ jagat //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā janma jarā vipatti maraṇam trāsaḥ ca nā utpadyate pītvā moha mayīm pramāda madirām unmatta bhūtam jagat

original: MSS_4723-1 ādityasya namaskāraṃ ye kurvanti dine dine /
analyzed: ādityasya namaskāram ye kurvanti dine dine

original: MSS_4723-2 janmāntarasahasreṣu dāridryaṃ nopajāyate //
analyzed: janma antara sahasreṣu dāridryam nā upajāyate

original: MSS_4724-1 ādityasyodayo gānaṃ tāmbūlaṃ bhāratīkathā /
analyzed: ādityasya udayaḥ gānam tāmbūlam bhāratī kathā

original: MSS_4724-2 iṣṭā bhāryā sumitraṃ ca apūrvāṇi dine dine //
analyzed: iṣṭā bhāryā sumitram ca apūrvāṇi dine dine

original: MSS_4725-1 ādityāḥ kiṃ daśaite pralayabhayakṛtaḥ svīkṛtākāśadeśāḥ kiṃ volkāmaṇḍalāni tribhuvanadahanāyodyatānīti bhītaiḥ /
analyzed: ādityāḥ kim daśa ete pralaya bhaya kṛtaḥ svīkṛta ākāśa deśāḥ kim vā ulkā maṇḍalāni tribhuvana dahanāya udyatāni iti bhītaiḥ

original: MSS_4725-2 pāyāsurnārasiṃhaṃ vapuramaragaṇairbibhrataḥ śārṅgapāṇer dṛṣṭā dṛptāsurorastaladaraṇagaladraktaraktā nakhā vaḥ //
analyzed: pāyāsuḥ nārasiṃham vapuḥ amara gaṇaiḥ bibhrataḥ śārṅgapāṇeḥ dṛṣṭāḥ dṛpta asura uras tala daraṇa galat rakta raktāḥ nakhāḥ vaḥ

original: MSS_4726-1 ādityādapi nityadīptamamṛtaprasyandi candrādapi trailokyābharaṇaṃ maṇerapi tamaḥkāṣaṃ hutāśādapi /
analyzed: ādityāt api nitya dīptam amṛta prasyandi candrāt api trailokya ābharaṇam maṇeḥ api tamaḥ kāṣam hutāśāt api

original: MSS_4726-2 viśvāloki vilocanādapi parabrahmasvarūpādapi svāntānandanamastu dhāma jagatastoṣāya sārasvatam //
analyzed: viśva āloki vilocanāt api para brahma svarūpāt api svānta ānandanam astu dhāma jagataḥ toṣāya sārasvatam

original: MSS_4727-1 ādityādigrahāḥ sarve nakṣatrāṇi ca rāśayaḥ /
analyzed: āditya ādi grahāḥ sarve nakṣatrāṇi ca rāśayaḥ

original: MSS_4727-2 āyuḥ kurvantu te nityaṃ yasyaiṣā janmapatrikā //
analyzed: āyuḥ kurvantu te nityam yasya eṣā janma patrikā

original: MSS_4728-1 ādityādyā grahāḥ sarve yathā tuṣyanti dānataḥ /
analyzed: āditya ādyāḥ grahāḥ sarve yathā tuṣyanti dānataḥ

original: MSS_4728-2 sarvasve'pi na tuṣyeta jāmātā daśamo grahaḥ //
analyzed: sarva sve api na tuṣyeta jāmātā daśamaḥ grahaḥ

original: MSS_4728A-1 ādityāya tamaḥ sṛṣṭaṃ meghāya grīṣmaśoṣaṇam /
analyzed: ādityāya tamaḥ sṛṣṭam meghāya grīṣma śoṣaṇam

original: MSS_4728A-2 mārgaśramas tu vṛkṣāya duḥkhinas tūpakāriṇe //
analyzed: mārga śramaḥ tu vṛkṣāya duḥkhinaḥ tu upakāriṇe

original: MSS_4729-1 ādityo'yaṃ sthito mūḍhāḥ snehaṃ kuruta mā bhayam /
analyzed: ādityaḥ yam sthitaḥ mūḍhāḥ sneham kuruta mā bhayam

original: MSS_4729-2 bahurūpo muhūrtaśca jīvetāpi kadācana //
analyzed: bahu rūpaḥ muhūrtaḥ ca jīveta api kadācana

original: MSS_4730-1 ādimatsyaḥ sa jayatād yaḥ śvāsocchvāsitairjalaiḥ /
analyzed: ādi matsyaḥ sa jayatāt yaḥ śvāsa ucchvāsitaiḥ jalaiḥ

original: MSS_4730-2 gagane vidadhe'mbhodhiṃ gaganaṃ ca mahodadhau //
analyzed: gagane vidadha imbhodhim gaganam ca mahā udadhau

original: MSS_4731-1 ādimadhyanidhaneṣu sauhṛdaṃ sajjane bhavati netare jane /
analyzed: ādi madhya nidhaneṣu sauhṛdam sat jane bhavati na itare jane

original: MSS_4731-2 chedatāpananigharṣatāḍanair nānyabhāvamupayāti kāñcanam //
analyzed: cheda tāpana nigharṣa tāḍanaiḥ na anya bhāvam upayāti kāñcanam

original: MSS_4732-1 ādimadhyāntarahitaṃ daśāhīnaṃ purātanam /
analyzed: ādi madhya anta rahitam daśa ahīnam purātanam

original: MSS_4732-2 advitīyamahaṃ vande madvastrasadṛśaṃ harim //
analyzed: advitīyam aham vande mad vastra sadṛśam harim

original: MSS_4733-1 ādimadhyāvasāne ca naiva gacchati vikriyām /
analyzed: ādi madhya avasāne ca na eva gacchati vikriyām

original: MSS_4733-2 ata eva kulīnānāṃ nṛpāḥ kurvanti saṃgraham //
analyzed: atas eva kulīnānām nṛpāḥ kurvanti saṃgraham

original: MSS_4734-1 ādirājayaśobimbam ādarśaṃ prāpya vāṅmayam /
analyzed: ādirāja yaśaḥ bimbam ādarśam prāpya vāc mayam

original: MSS_4734-2 teṣāmasaṃnidhāne'pi na svayaṃ paśya naśyati //
analyzed: teṣām asaṃnidhāne api na svayam paśya naśyati

original: MSS_4735-1 ādīptavahnisadṛśairmarutāvadhūtaiḥ sarvatra kiṃśukavanaiḥ kusumāvanamraiḥ /
analyzed: ādīpta vahni sadṛśaiḥ marutā avadhūtaiḥ sarvatra kiṃśuka vanaiḥ kusuma avanamraiḥ

original: MSS_4735-2 sadyo vasantasamayena samāgateyaṃ raktāṃśukā navavadhūriva bhāti bhūmiḥ //
analyzed: sadyas vasanta samayena samāgatā iyam rakta aṃśukā nava vadhūḥ iva bhāti bhūmiḥ

original: MSS_4736-1 ādīrgheṇa calena vakragatinā tejasvinā yoginā nīlābjadyutināhinā varamahaṃ dṛśyo na taccakṣuṣā /
analyzed: ādīrgheṇa calena vakra gatinā tejasvinā yoginā nīla abja dyutinā ahinā varam aham dṛśyaḥ na tad cakṣuṣā

original: MSS_4736-2 daṣṭe santi cikitsakā diśi diśi prāyeṇa dharmārthino mugdhākṣīkṣaṇavīkṣitasya nahi me vaidyo na cāpyauṣadham //
analyzed: daṣṭe santi cikitsakāḥ diśi diśi prāyeṇa dharma arthinaḥ mugdha akṣīkṣaṇa vīkṣitasya nahi me vaidyaḥ na ca api auṣadham

original: MSS_4737-1 ādūrāt pratipānthamāhitadṛśaḥ pratyāśayonmīlati dhvānte svāntamaharvyaye'pi na parāvṛttaṃ kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ /
analyzed: ādūrāt prati pāntham āhita dṛśaḥ pratyāśayā unmīlati dhvānte svāntam ahar vyaye pi na parāvṛttam kuraṅgī dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_4737-2 tasyā niḥsahabāhuvallivigaladdhammillavad bhaṅgura- grīvaṃ dīrghamajīvavat priyasakhīvargeṇa nītaṃ vapuḥ //
analyzed: tasyāḥ niḥsaha bāhu valli vigalat dhammilla vat bhaṅgura grīvam dīrgham ajīva vat priya sakhī vargeṇa nītam vapuḥ

original: MSS_4738-1 ādṛtakupitabhavānī- kṛtakaramālādibandhanavyasanaḥ /
analyzed: ādṛta kupita bhavānī kṛta kara mālā ādi bandhana vyasanaḥ

original: MSS_4738-2 kelikalākalahādau devo vaḥ śaṃkaraḥ pāyāt //
MSS_4739-1 ādṛtā nakhapadaiḥ parirambhāś cumbitāni ghanadantanipātaiḥ /
analyzed: ādṛtāḥ nakha padaiḥ parirambhāḥ cumbitāni ghana danta nipātaiḥ

original: MSS_4739-2 saukumāryaguṇasaṃbhṛtakīrtir vāma eva surateṣvapi kāmaḥ //
analyzed: saukumārya guṇa saṃbhṛta kīrtiḥ vāmaḥ eva surateṣu api kāmaḥ

original: MSS_4740-1 ā dṛṣṭiprasarāt priyasya padavīmudvīkṣya nirviṇṇayā viśrānteṣu pathiṣvahaḥpariṇatau dhvānte samutsarpati /
analyzed: ā dṛṣṭi prasarāt priyasya padavīm udvīkṣya nirviṇṇayā viśrānteṣu pathiṣu ahar pariṇatau dhvānte samutsarpati

original: MSS_4740-2 gatvaikaṃ saśucā gṛhaṃ prati padaṃ pānthastriyāsmin kṣaṇe mā bhūdāgata ityamandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvīkṣitam //
analyzed: gatvā ekam sa śucā gṛham prati padam pāntha striyā asmin kṣaṇe mā bhūt āgataḥ iti amanda valita grīvam punar vīkṣitam

original: MSS_4741-1 ādeyasya pradeyasya kartavyasya ca karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ādeyasya pradeyasya kartavyasya ca karmaṇaḥ

original: MSS_4741-2 kṣipramakriyamāṇasya kālaḥ pibati tadrasam //
analyzed: kṣipram akriyamāṇasya kālaḥ pibati tad rasam

original: MSS_4742-1 ādehadāhaṃ kusumāyudhasya vidhāya saundaryakathādaridram /
analyzed: ā deha dāham kusumāyudhasya vidhāya saundarya kathā daridram

original: MSS_4742-2 tvadaṅgaśilpāt punarīśvareṇa cireṇa jāne jagadanvakampi //
analyzed: tvad aṅga śilpāt punar īśvareṇa cireṇa jāne jagat anvakampi

original: MSS_4743-1 ādau kulaṃ parīkṣeta tato vidyāṃ tato vayaḥ /
analyzed: ādau kulam parīkṣeta tatas vidyām tatas vayaḥ

original: MSS_4743-2 śīlaṃ dhanaṃ tato rūpaṃ deśaṃ paścāt vivāhayet //
analyzed: śīlam dhanam tatas rūpam deśam paścāt vivāhayet

original: MSS_4744-1 ādau gṛhītapāṇiḥ paścādārūḍhajaghanakaṭibhāgā /
analyzed: ādau gṛhīta pāṇiḥ paścāt ārūḍha jaghana kaṭi bhāgā

original: MSS_4744-2 nakhamukhalālanasukhadā sā kiṃ rāmāsti naiva bhoḥ pāmā //
analyzed: nakha mukha lālana sukha dā sā kim rāmā asti nā eva bhoḥ pāmā

original: MSS_4745-1 ādau citte tataḥ kāye satāṃ saṃjāyate jarā /
analyzed: ādau citte tatas kāye satām saṃjāyate jarā

original: MSS_4745-2 asatāṃ ca punaḥ kāye naiva citte kadācana //
analyzed: asatām ca punar kāye na eva citte kadācana

original: MSS_4746-1 ādau chāyātidīrghāpi prācyāmalpatarā tataḥ /
analyzed: ādau chāyā ati dīrghā api prācyām alpatarā tatas

original: MSS_4746-2 tathā maitryasatāmādau dīrghāpyalpatarā bhavet //
analyzed: tathā maitrī asatām ādau dīrghā api alpatarā bhavet

original: MSS_4747-1 ādau taddhitakṛt snehaṃ kāryaṃ snehamanantaram /
analyzed: ādau tad hita kṛt sneham kāryam sneham anantaram

original: MSS_4747-2 kṛtvā sadharmavādaṃ ca madhyasthaḥ sādhayeddhitam //
analyzed: kṛtvā sadharma vādam ca madhyasthaḥ sādhayet hitam

original: MSS_4748-1 ādau tanvyo bṛhanmadhyā vistāriṇyaḥ pade pade /
analyzed: ādau tanvyaḥ bṛhat madhyāḥ vistāriṇyaḥ pade pade

original: MSS_4748-2 yāyinyo na nivartante satāṃ maitryaḥ saritsamāḥ //
analyzed: yāyinyaḥ na nivartante satām maitryaḥ sarit samāḥ

original: MSS_4749-1 ādau tāto varaṃ paśyet tato vittaṃ tataḥ kulam /
analyzed: ādau tātaḥ varam paśyet tatas vittam tatas kulam

original: MSS_4749-2 yadi kaścid vare doṣaḥ kiṃ dhanena kulena kim //
analyzed: yadi kaścid vare doṣaḥ kim dhanena kulena kim

original: MSS_4750-1 ādau tāvad vyāpārasthā yamavaruṇadhanadasadṛśā bhavantyatigarvitā mānonmattā darpotsiktāḥ paribhavaharaṇaniratā bhavantyatidāruṇāḥ
analyzed: ādau tāvat vyāpāra sthāḥ yama varuṇa dhanada sadṛśāḥ bhavanti ati garvitāḥ māna unmattāḥ darpa utsiktāḥ paribhava haraṇa niratāḥ bhavanti ati dāruṇāḥ

original: MSS_4750-2 bhraṣṭāstebhyo vyāpārebhyo hatinigaḍaniyatacaraṇās tathā laguḍārditā lambaiḥ kūrcairdīnairvaktrairmunaya iva śamadamaratā bhavantyatibhadrakāḥ
analyzed: bhraṣṭāḥ tebhyaḥ vyāpārebhyaḥ hati nigaḍa niyata caraṇāḥ tathā laguḍa arditāḥ lambaiḥ kūrcaiḥ dīnaiḥ vaktraiḥ munayaḥ iva śama dama ratāḥ bhavanti ati bhadrakāḥ

original: MSS_4751-1 ādau tu mandamandāni madhye samarasāni ca /
analyzed: ādau tu manda mandāni madhye samarasāni ca

original: MSS_4751-2 ante snehāyamānāni saṃgatānyuttamaiḥ saha //
analyzed: ante snehāyamānāni saṃgatāni uttamaiḥ saha

original: MSS_4752-1 ādau tu ramaṇīyāni madhye tu virasāni ca /
analyzed: ādau tu ramaṇīyāni madhye tu virasāni ca

original: MSS_4752-2 ante vairāyamāṇāni saṃgatāni khalaiḥ saha //
analyzed: ante vairāyamāṇāni saṃgatāni khalaiḥ saha

original: MSS_4753-1 ādau darśayati natiṃ yāntī yāntī samunnatiṃ dhatte /
analyzed: ādau darśayati natim yāntī yāntī samunnatim dhatte

original: MSS_4753-2 anukūlāpi varāhī cireṇa tucchaṃ phalaṃ dhatte //
analyzed: anukūlā api varāhī cireṇa tuccham phalam dhatte

original: MSS_4754-1 ādau dharme pramāṇaṃ vividhavidhibhidāśeṣatāṃ ca prayuktiṃ paurvāparyādhikārau tadanu bahuvidhaṃ cātideśaṃ tathoham /
analyzed: ādau dharme pramāṇam vividha vidhi bhidā śeṣa tām ca prayuktim paurvāparya adhikārau tadanu bahuvidham ca atideśam tathā ūham

original: MSS_4754-2 bādhaṃ tantraṃ prasaṅgaṃ nayamanayaśataiḥ samyagālocayadbhyo bhinnā mīmāṃsakebhyo vidadhati bhuvi ke sādaraṃ vedarakṣām //
analyzed: bādham tantram prasaṅgam nayam anaya śataiḥ samyak ālocayadbhyaḥ bhinnāḥ mīmāṃsakebhyaḥ vidadhati bhuvi ke sādaram veda rakṣām

original: MSS_4755-1 ādau namaskṛtiḥ paścād āśaṃsāvacanāni ca /
analyzed: ādau namaskṛtiḥ paścāt āśaṃsā vacanāni ca

original: MSS_4755-2 subhāṣitapraśaṃsā ca kavikāvyastutis tataḥ //
analyzed: subhāṣita praśaṃsā ca kavi kāvya stutiḥ tatas

original: MSS_4756-1 ādau namras tatah stabdhaḥ kāryakāle ca niṣṭhuraḥ /
analyzed: ādau namraḥ stabdhaḥ kārya kāle ca niṣṭhuraḥ

original: MSS_4756-2 kṛte kārye punarnamraḥ śiśnatulyo vaṇigjanaḥ //
analyzed: kṛte kārye punar namraḥ śiśna tulyaḥ vaṇij janaḥ

original: MSS_4757-1 ādau namrāḥ punarvakrāḥ svīyakāryeṣu tatparāḥ /
analyzed: ādau namrāḥ punar vakrāḥ svīya kāryeṣu tatparāḥ

original: MSS_4757-2 kāryānte ca punarvakrāḥ kāṇvāstu prāṇaghātakāḥ //
analyzed: kārya ante ca punar vakrāḥ kāṇvāḥ tu prāṇa ghātakāḥ

original: MSS_4758-1 ādau na vāpraṇayināṃ praṇayo vidheyo datto'thavā pratidinaṃ paripoṣaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: ādau na vā apraṇayinām praṇayaḥ vidheyaḥ dattaḥ uthavā pratidinam paripoṣaṇīyaḥ

original: MSS_4758-2 utkṣipya yat kṣipati tat prakaroti lajjāṃ bhūmau sthitasya patanād bhayameva nāsti //
analyzed: utkṣipya yat kṣipati tat prakaroti lajjām bhūmau sthitasya patanāt bhayam eva nā asti

original: MSS_4759-1 ādau necchati nojjhati smarakathāṃ vrīḍāvimiśrālasā madhye hrīparivarjitābhyuparame lajjāvinamrānanā /
analyzed: ādau na icchati na ujjhati smara kathām vrīḍā vimiśra alasā madhye hrī parivarjita abhyuparame lajjā vinamra ānanā

original: MSS_4759-2 bhāvairnaikavidhaiḥ karotyabhinayaṃ bhūyaśca yā sādarā buddhvā puṃprakṛtiṃ yānucarati glānetaraiśceṣṭitaiḥ //
analyzed: bhāvaiḥ nā ekavidhaiḥ karoti abhinayam bhūyas ca yā sādarā buddhvā puṃs prakṛtim yā anucarati glāna itaraiḥ ceṣṭitaiḥ

original: MSS_4760-1 ādau patravicitritaḥ punarasau mugdhaprasūnāṅkitaḥ paścāt snigdhaphalodgame ghanarasaiḥ sikto mayā sarvataḥ /
analyzed: ādau patra vicitritaḥ punar asau mugdha prasūna aṅkitaḥ paścāt snigdha phala udgame ghana rasaiḥ siktaḥ mayā sarvatas

original: MSS_4760-2 dānonmattadurantavāraṇakaṭīsaṃghaṭṭanaiḥ kevalaṃ so'yaṃ ghūrṇita eva daivavaśato mākandabhūmīruhaḥ //
analyzed: dāna unmatta duranta vāraṇa kaṭī saṃghaṭṭanaiḥ kevalam saḥ yam ghūrṇitaḥ eva daiva vaśataḥ mākanda bhūmīruhaḥ

original: MSS_4761-1 ādau premakaṣāyitā haramukhavyāpāralolā śanair vrīḍābhāravidhūrṇitā mukulitā dhūmodgamavyājataḥ /
analyzed: ādau prema kaṣāyi tā hara mukha vyāpāra lolā śanais vrīḍā bhāra vidhūrṇitā mukulitā dhūma udgama vyājataḥ

original: MSS_4761-2 patyuḥ saṃmilitā dṛśā sarabhasavyāvartanavyākulā pārvatyāḥ pariṇītimaṅgalavidhau dṛṣṭiḥ śivāyāstu vaḥ //
analyzed: patyuḥ saṃmilitā dṛśā sarabhasa vyāvartana vyākulā pārvatyāḥ pariṇīti maṅgala vidhau dṛṣṭiḥ śivāyāḥ tu vaḥ

original: MSS_4762-1 ādau budhyeta paṇitaḥ paṇamānaśca kāraṇam /
analyzed: ādau budhyeta paṇitaḥ paṇamānaḥ ca kāraṇam

original: MSS_4762-2 tato vitarkyobhayato mataḥ śreyas tato vrajet //
analyzed: tatas vitarkya ubhayatas mataḥ śreyaḥ tatas vrajet

original: MSS_4763-1 ādau majjanacīrahāratilakaṃ netrāñjanaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ nāsāmauktikamālatīvikaraṇaṃ jhaṃkārakaṃ nūpuram /
analyzed: ādau majjana cīra hāra tilakam netra añjanam kuṇḍalam nāsā mauktika mālatī vikaraṇam jhaṃkārakam nūpuram

original: MSS_4763-2 aṅge candanacarcitaṃ maṇigaṇaḥ kṣudrāvalirghaṇṭikā tāmbūlaṃ karakaṅkaṇaṃ caturatā śṛṅgārakāḥ ṣoḍaśa //
analyzed: aṅge candana carcitam maṇi gaṇaḥ kṣudra āvaliḥ ghaṇṭikā tāmbūlam kara kaṅkaṇam catura tā śṛṅgārakāḥ ṣoḍaśa

original: MSS_4764-1 ādau mātā guroḥ patnī brahmaṇī rājapatnikā /
analyzed: ādau mātā guroḥ patnī brahmaṇī rāja patnikā

original: MSS_4764-2 dhenurdhātrī tathā pṛthvī saptaitā mātaraḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: dhenuḥ dhātrī tathā pṛthvī saptā etāḥ mātaraḥ smṛtāḥ

original: MSS_4765-1 ādau mānaparigraheṇa guruṇā dūraṃ samāropitā paścāttāpabhareṇa tānavakṛtā nītā paraṃ lāghavam /
analyzed: ādau māna parigraheṇa guruṇā dūram samāropitā paścāttāpa bhareṇa tānava kṛtā nītā param lāghavam

original: MSS_4765-2 utsaṅgāntaravartināmanugamāt saṃpīḍitā gāmimāṃ sarvāṅgapraṇayapriyāmiva tarucchāyā samālambate //
analyzed: utsaṅga antara vartinām anugamāt saṃpīḍitā gām imām sarva aṅga praṇaya priyām iva taru chāyā samālambate

original: MSS_4766-1 ādau yādonivāsoktiḥ pārāvāravaroktayaḥ /
MSS_4766-2 kṣīranīranidheruktir nadyuktirjāhnavyuktayaḥ //
MSS_4767-1 ādau raktaṃ punā raktaṃ madhya ujjvalabhāsvaram /
analyzed: ādau raktam punar raktam madhye ujjvala bhāsvaram

original: MSS_4767-2 durnirīkṣyaprabhāvaṃ taṃ dṛśyaṃ draṣṭāramāśraye //
analyzed: durnirīkṣya prabhāvam tam dṛśyam draṣṭāram āśraye

original: MSS_4768-1 ādau rājetyadhīrākṣi pārthivaḥ ko'pi gīyate /
analyzed: ādau rājā iti adhīra akṣe pārthivaḥ kaḥ api gīyate

original: MSS_4768-2 sanātanaśca naivāsau rājā nāpi sanātanaḥ //
analyzed: sanātanaḥ ca na eva asau rājā na api sanātanaḥ

original: MSS_4769-1 ādau rūpavināśinī kṛśakarī kāmasya vidhvaṃsinī prajñāmāndyakarī tapaḥkṣayakarī dharmasya nirmūlinī /
analyzed: ādau rūpa vināśinī kṛśa karī kāmasya vidhvaṃsinī prajñā māndya karī tapaḥ kṣaya karī dharmasya nirmūlinī

original: MSS_4769-2 putrabhrātṛkalatrabhedanakarī lajjāṅkuracchedinī sā māṃ pīḍati sarvadoṣajananī prāṇāpahantrī kṣudhā //
analyzed: putra bhrātṛ kalatra bhedana karī lajjā aṅkura chedinī sā mām pīḍati sarva doṣa jananī prāṇa apahantrī kṣudhā

original: MSS_4770-1 ādau rūpavināśinī kṛśakarī kāmāṅkuracchedinī putrāmitrakalatrabhedanakarī garvāṅkuracchedinī /
analyzed: ādau rūpa vināśinī kṛśa karī kāma aṅkura chedinī putra amitra kalatra bhedana karī garva aṅkura chedinī

original: MSS_4770-2 kāmaṃ mandakarī tapaḥkṣayakarī dharmasya nirmūlanī sā māṃ saṃprati sarvarogajananī prāṇāpahantrī kṣudhā //
analyzed: kāmam manda karī tapaḥ kṣaya karī dharmasya nirmūlanī sā mām saṃprati sarva roga jananī prāṇa apahantrī kṣudhā

original: MSS_4771-1 ādau lajjayati kṛtaṃ madhye paribhavati riktamavasāne /
analyzed: ādau lajjayati kṛtam madhye paribhavati riktam avasāne

original: MSS_4771-2 khalasaṃgatasya kathayata yadi susthitamasti kiṃcidapi //
analyzed: khala saṃgatasya kathayata yadi susthitam asti kiṃcid api

original: MSS_4772-1 ādau varaṃ nirdhanatvaṃ dhanikatvamanantaram /
analyzed: ādau varam nirdhana tvam dhanika tvam anantaram

original: MSS_4772-2 tathādau pādagamanaṃ yānagatvamanantaram /
analyzed: tathā ādau pāda gamanam yāna ga tvam anantaram

original: MSS_4772-3 sukhāya kalpate nityaṃ duḥkhāya viparītakam //
analyzed: sukhāya kalpate nityam duḥkhāya viparītakam

original: MSS_4773-1 ādau vitatya caraṇau vinamayya kaṇṭham utthāpya vaktramabhihatya muhuśca vatsāḥ /
analyzed: ādau vitatya caraṇau vinamayya kaṇṭham utthāpya vaktram abhihatya muhur ca vatsāḥ

original: MSS_4773-2 mātrā vivartitamukhaṃ mukhalihyamāna- paścārdhasusthamanasaḥ stanamutpibanti //
analyzed: mātrā vivartita mukham mukha lihyamāna paśca ardha sustha manasaḥ stanam utpibanti

original: MSS_4774-1 ādau vismayanistaraṅgamanu ca preṅkholitaṃ sādhvasair vrīḍānamramatha kṣaṇaṃ pravikasattāraṃ didṛkṣārasaiḥ /
analyzed: ādau vismaya nistaraṅgam anu ca preṅkholitam sādhvasaiḥ vrīḍā ānamram atha kṣaṇam pravikasat tāram didṛkṣā rasaiḥ

original: MSS_4774-2 ākṛṣṭaṃ sahajābhijātyakalanāt premṇā purah preritaṃ cakṣurbhūri kathaṃkathaṃcidagamat preyāṃsameṇīdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: ākṛṣṭam sahaja abhijātya kalanāt premṇā purah preritam cakṣuḥ bhūri katham kathaṃcid agamat preyāṃsam eṇī dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_4775-1 ādau veśyā punardāsī paścād bhavati kuṭṭinī /
analyzed: ādau veśyā punar dāsī paścāt bhavati kuṭṭinī

original: MSS_4775-2 sarvopāyaparikṣīṇā vṛddhā nārī pativratā //
analyzed: sarva upāya parikṣīṇā vṛddhā nārī pativratā

original: MSS_4776-1 ādau hālāhalahutabhujā dattahastāvalambo bālye śaṃbhorniṭilamahasā baddhamaitrīnirūḍhaḥ /
analyzed: ādau hālāhala   datta hasta avalambaḥ bālye śaṃbhoḥ niṭila mahasā baddha maitrī nirūḍhaḥ

original: MSS_4776-2 prauḍho rāhorapi mukhaviṣeṇāntaraṅgīkṛto yaḥ so'yaṃ candras tapati kiraṇairmāmiti prāptametam //
analyzed: prauḍhaḥ rāhoḥ api mukha viṣeṇa antar aṅgīkṛtaḥ yaḥ saḥ ayam candraḥ tapati kiraṇaiḥ mām iti prāptam etam

original: MSS_4777-1 ādyaḥ kopastadanu madanastvadviyogas tṛtīyaḥ śāntyai dūtīvacanamaparaḥ pañcamaḥ śītabhānuḥ /
analyzed: ādyaḥ kopaḥ tadanu madanaḥ tvad viyogaḥ tṛtīyaḥ śāntyai dūtī vacanam aparaḥ pañcamaḥ śītabhānuḥ

original: MSS_4777-2 itthaṃ bālā niravadhi paraṃ tvāṃ phalaṃ prārthayantī hā hā pañcajvalanamadhunā sevate yoginīva //
analyzed: ittham bālā niravadhi param tvām phalam prārthayantī hā hā pañcajvalanam adhunā sevate yoginī iva

original: MSS_4778-1 ādyaḥ praveśasamayaḥ sa kaleryugasya prāptastiraskṛtabahūdakahaṃsasārthaḥ /
analyzed: ādyaḥ praveśa samayaḥ sa kaleḥ yugasya prāptaḥ tiraskṛta bahu udaka haṃsa sārthaḥ

original: MSS_4778-2 āhūya sādaratayā tapaso'nti me'hni kāṇo dvijaḥ pratigṛhaṃ bata yatra pūjyaḥ //
analyzed: āhūya sādara tayā kāṇaḥ dvijaḥ pratigṛham bata yatra pūjyaḥ

original: MSS_4779-1 ādyakālikayā buddhyā dūre śva iti nirbhayāḥ /
analyzed: ādya kālikayā buddhyā dūre śvas iti nirbhayāḥ

original: MSS_4779-2 sarvabhakṣā na paśyanti karmabhūmiṃ vicetasaḥ //
analyzed: sarva bhakṣāḥ na paśyanti karma bhūmim vicetasaḥ

original: MSS_4780-1 ādyantau ca tadādyantau tadādyantau ca madhyamau /
analyzed: ādi antau ca tad ādi antau tad ādi antau ca madhyamau

original: MSS_4780-2 vahnīnduvāyuvaruṇaputrau pitṛsamaprabhau //
analyzed: vahni indu vāyu varuṇa putrau pitṛ sama prabhau

original: MSS_4781-1 ādyādyasya guṇaṃ teṣām avāpnoti paraḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: ādya ādyasya guṇam teṣām avāpnoti paraḥ paraḥ

original: MSS_4781-2 yo yo yāvatithaścaiṣāṃ sa sa tāvad guṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ yāvatithaḥ ca eṣām sa sa tāvat guṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_4782-1 ādyūnastamasāṃ cakoraramaṇīrāgābdhimanthācalo jīvāturjalajasya vāsavadiśāśailendracūḍāmaṇiḥ /
analyzed: ādyūnaḥ tamasām cakora ramaṇī rāga abdhi mantha acalaḥ jīvātuḥ jalajasya vāsava diśā śaila indra cūḍāmaṇiḥ

original: MSS_4782-2 ādeṣṭā śrutikarmaṇāṃ kumudinīśokāgnipūrṇāhutir devaḥ somarasāyanaṃ vijayate viśvasya bījaṃ raviḥ //
analyzed: ādeṣṭā śruti karmaṇām kumudinī śoka agni pūrṇa āhutiḥ devaḥ soma rasāyanam vijayate viśvasya bījam raviḥ

original: MSS_4783-1 ādye jagmuṣi tāmracūḍaraṭite śrotraṃ prabuddhā javāt kiṃcid vāsavadiṅmukhaṃ pravikasad dṛṣṭvā gavākṣādhvanā /
analyzed: ādye jagmuṣi tāmracūḍa raṭite śrotram prabuddhāḥ javāt kiṃcid vāsava diṅmukham pravikasat dṛṣṭvā gavākṣa adhvanā

original: MSS_4783-2 saṃtrāsena samīritā priyatamapremṇā ca ruddhā śanair utthānopaniveśanāni kurute talpe muhuḥ pāṃsulā //
analyzed: saṃtrāsena samīritā priyatama premṇā ca ruddhā śanais utthāna upaniveśanāni kurute talpe muhur pāṃsulā

original: MSS_4784-1 ādyena hīnā jaladhāvadṛśyaṃ madhyena hīnaṃ bhuvi varṇanīyam /
analyzed: ādyena hīnā jaladhau adṛśyam madhyena hīnam bhuvi varṇanīyam

original: MSS_4784-2 antena hīnaṃ dhvanate śarīraṃ hemābhidhaḥ sa śriyamātanotu //
analyzed: antena hīnam dhvanate śarīram hema abhidhaḥ sa śriyam ātanotu

original: MSS_4785-1 ādye baddhā virahadivase yā śikhā dāma hitvā śāpasyānte vigalitaśucā yā mayodveṣṭanīyā /
analyzed: ādye baddhā viraha divase yā śikhā dāma hitvā śāpasya ante vigalita śucā yā mayā udveṣṭanīyā

original: MSS_4785-2 sparśakliṣṭāmayamitanakhenāsakṛt sārayantīṃ gaṇḍābhogāt kaṭhinaviṣayāmekaveṇīṃ kareṇa //
analyzed: sparśa kliṣṭām ayam ita nakhena asakṛt sārayantīm gaṇḍa ābhogāt kaṭhina viṣayām eka veṇīm kareṇa

original: MSS_4786-1 ādye yāme tu śaṅkhaḥ syān mahāśaṅkho dvitīyake /
analyzed: ādye yāme tu śaṅkhaḥ syāt mahāśaṅkhaḥ dvitīyake

original: MSS_4786-2 padmastṛtīyake yāme mahāpadmaś caturthake //
analyzed: padmaḥ tṛtīyake yāme mahāpadmaḥ caturthake

original: MSS_4787-1 ādyairmadvihitaiḥ padyaiḥ kiyadbhiraparairapi /
analyzed: ādyaiḥ mad vihitaiḥ padyaiḥ kiyadbhiḥ aparaiḥ api

original: MSS_4787-2 yutā paddhatireṣāstu sajjanānandadāyinī //
analyzed: yutā paddhatiḥ eṣā astu sat jana ānanda dāyinī

original: MSS_4788-1 ādyo'dhruvas tato maṇṭhaḥ pratimaṇṭho nisārukaḥ /
analyzed: ādyaḥ udhruvaḥ tatas maṇṭhaḥ pratimaṇṭhaḥ nisārukaḥ

original: MSS_4788-2 aḍatālas tato rāga ekatālī ca saṃmatā //
analyzed: aḍatālaḥ tatas rāgaḥ ekatālī ca saṃmatā

original: MSS_4789-1 ādyo'ntastho'pyanantaṃ diśati phalamasāvadvitīyaṃ dvitīyas tārtīyīkaḥ pavargaprakṛtirapi balenāpavargaṃ prasūte /
analyzed: ādyaḥ anta sthaḥ upi anantam diśati phalam asau advitīyam dvitīyaḥ tārtīyīkaḥ pavarga prakṛtiḥ api balena apavargam prasūte

original: MSS_4789-2 turyaścāturyabhājāṃ visṛjati caturaḥ śrotrapānthaḥ pumarthān rāma tvannāmavarṇā jagati katipayaṃ kautukaṃ tanvate na //
analyzed: turyaḥ cāturya bhājām visṛjati caturaḥ śrotra pānthaḥ pumarthān rāma tvad nāma varṇāḥ jagati katipayam kautukam tanvate na

original: MSS_4790-1 ā dvīpāt parato'pyamī nṛpatayaḥ sarve samabhyāgatāḥ kanyeyaṃ kaladhautakomalaruciḥ kīrteśca lābhaḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: ā dvīpāt paratas api amī nṛpatayaḥ sarve samabhyāgatāḥ kanyā iyam kaladhauta komala ruciḥ kīrteḥ ca lābhaḥ paraḥ

original: MSS_4790-2 nākṛṣṭaṃ na ca ṭaṅkitaṃ na namitaṃ notthāpitaṃ sthānataḥ kenāpīdamaho mahad dhanuridaṃ nirvīramurvītalam //
analyzed: na ākṛṣṭam na ca ṭaṅkitam na namitam na utthāpitam sthānataḥ kena api idam aho mahat dhanuḥ idam nirvīram urvī talam

original: MSS_4791-1 ādhatte danusūnusūdanabhujākeyūravajrāṅkura- vyūhollekhapadāvalīvalimayairaṅgairmudaṃ mandaraḥ /
analyzed: ādhatte danu sūnu sūdana bhujā keyūra vajra aṅkura vyūha ullekha pada āvalī vali mayaiḥ aṅgaiḥ mudam mandaraḥ

original: MSS_4791-2 ādhārīkṛtakūrmapṛṣṭhakaṣaṇaprakṣīṇamūlo'dhunā jānīmaḥ parataḥ payodhimathanāduccaistaro'yaṃ giriḥ //
analyzed: ādhārīkṛta kūrma pṛṣṭha kaṣaṇa prakṣīṇa mūlā udhunā jānīmaḥ paratas payodhi mathanāt uccaistaraḥ yam giriḥ

original: MSS_4792-1 ādharmikaḥ kadaryo guṇavimukhaḥ paruṣavāganekamatiḥ /
analyzed: ādharmikaḥ kadaryaḥ guṇa vimukhaḥ paruṣa vāc aneka matiḥ

original: MSS_4792-2 bhuṅkte saṃpadamīdṛg brūta nṛkāraḥ kimasti daivaṃ vā //
analyzed: bhuṅkte saṃpadam īdṛś brūta nṛ kāraḥ kim asti daivam vā

original: MSS_4793-1 ādhātuṃ vinayaṃ nirāgasi nare kupyantu nāmeśvarās tena svāśayaśuddhireva sukarā prāyaḥ prabhūṇāṃ puraḥ /
analyzed: ādhātum vinayam nirāgasi nare kupyantu nāma īśvarāḥ tena sva āśaya śuddhiḥ eva sukarā prāyas prabhūṇām puras

original: MSS_4793-2 mithyāmānini manyase yadi tadā nityaṃ manovartinī dhyātā tāmarasākṣi citrapaṭake kā vā tvadanyā mayā //
analyzed: mithyā mānini manyase yadi tadā nityam manaḥ vartinī dhyātā tāmarasa akṣi citrapaṭake kā vā tvad anyā mayā

original: MSS_4794-1 ādhāturbhuvanaṃ tadetadakhilaṃ cakṣuṣmadākīṭakād divyaṃ cakṣurananyalabhyamubhayatrāste paraṃ duḥsaham /
analyzed: ādhātuḥ bhuvanam tat etat akhilam cakṣuṣmat ākīṭakāt divyam cakṣuḥ an anya labhyam ubhayatra āste param duḥsaham

original: MSS_4794-2 phāle bhūtapatermanobhavamukhakṣudrakṣayojjāgaraṃ bāṇe ca pratirājadarpadalanaṃ ballālapṛthvīpateḥ //
analyzed: phāle bhūtapateḥ manobhava mukha kṣudra kṣaya ujjāgaram bāṇe ca pratirāja darpa dalanam ballāla pṛthvīpateḥ

original: MSS_4795-1 ādhāya komalakarāmbujakelinālīm ālīsamājamadhikṛtya samālapantī /
analyzed: ādhāya komala kara ambuja keli nālīm ālī samājam adhikṛtya samālapantī

original: MSS_4795-2 mandasmitena mayi sācivilokitena cetaścakoranayanā culukīcakāra //
analyzed: manda smitena mayi sāci vilokitena cetaḥ cakora nayanā culukīcakāra

original: MSS_4796-1 ādhāya dugdhakalaśe manthānaṃ śrāntadorlatā gopī /
analyzed: ādhāya dugdha kalaśe manthānam śrānta dos latā gopī

original: MSS_4796-2 aprāptapārijātā daive doṣaṃ niveśayati //
analyzed: aprāpta pārijātā daive doṣam niveśayati

original: MSS_4797-1 ādhāya drutamākṛterupaśamād viśvāsanaṃ saṃnidhau ekaikaṃ śapharaṃ bakoṭakapaṭācāryo jighṛkṣan muhuḥ /
analyzed: ādhāya drutam ākṛteḥ upaśamāt viśvāsanam saṃnidhau ekaikam śapharam bakoṭaka paṭa ācāryaḥ jighṛkṣan muhur

original: MSS_4797-2 audāsīnyanivedanāya nidadhad dikṣu kṣaṇaṃ cakṣuṣī cañcvā kiñca parāmṛśan vapurayaṃ gāmbhīryamabhyasyati //
analyzed: audāsīnya nivedanāya nidadhat dikṣu kṣaṇam cakṣuṣī cañcvā kiñca parāmṛśan vapuḥ ayam gāmbhīryam abhyasyati

original: MSS_4798-1 ādhāya mūrdhani vṛthaiva bharaṃ mahāntaṃ mūrkhā nimajjatha kathaṃ bhavasāgare'smin /
analyzed: ādhāya mūrdhani vṛthā eva bharam mahāntam mūrkhāḥ nimajjatha katham bhava sāgaresmin

original: MSS_4798-2 vinyasya bhāramakhilaṃ padayorjananyā visrabdhamuttarata palvalatulyamenam //
analyzed: vinyasya bhāram akhilam padayoḥ jananyāḥ visrabdham uttarata palvala tulyam enam

original: MSS_4799-1 ādhāraḥ kandamityuktaṃ svādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca janmabhūḥ /
analyzed: ādhāraḥ kandam iti uktam svādhiṣṭhānam ca janma bhūḥ

original: MSS_4799-2 nābhistu maṇipūrākhyaṃ hṛdayaṃ viddhyanāhatam //
analyzed: nābhiḥ tu maṇipūra ākhyam hṛdayam viddhi anāhatam

original: MSS_4800-1 ādhārajanmabhūtāni hṛtkaṇṭhastālunāsike /
analyzed: ādhāra janma bhūtāni hṛd kaṇṭhaḥ tālu nāsike

original: MSS_4800-2 bhrūmadhye mastakadvāraṃ daśasthāneṣu dhāraṇā //
MSS_4801-1 ādhārāya dharāvakāśavidhaye'pyākāśamālokane bhāsvānātmamahattvasādhanavidhāvanye guṇāḥ kecana /
analyzed: ādhārāya dharā avakāśa vidhaye pi ākāśam ālokane bhāsvān ātma mahattva sādhana vidhau anye guṇāḥ kecana

original: MSS_4801-2 ityasminnupakārakāriṇi sadā varge paraṃ dustyaje dainyavrīḍakalaṅkamujjhatu kathaṃ ceto mahācetasām //
analyzed: iti asmin upakāra kāriṇi sadā varge param dustyaje dainya vrīḍa kalaṅkam ujjhatu katham cetaḥ mahā cetasām

original: MSS_4802-1 ādhāre hṛdaye śikhāparisare saṃdhāya medhāmayi tredhā bījatanūmanūnakaruṇāpīyūṣakallolinīm /
analyzed: ādhāre hṛdaye śikhā parisare saṃdhāya medhā mayi tredhā bīja tanūm anūna karuṇā pīyūṣa kallolinīm

original: MSS_4802-2 tvāṃ mātarjapato niraṅkuśanijādvaitāmṛtāsvādana- prajñāmbhaśculukaiḥ sphurantu pulakairaṅgāni tuṅgāni me //
analyzed: tvām mātar japataḥ niraṅkuśa nija advaita amṛta āsvādana prajñā ambhaḥ culukaiḥ sphurantu pulakaiḥ aṅgāni tuṅgāni me

original: MSS_4803-1 ādhikyādadharasudhā skhalediti prāptaśaṅkayā vidhinā /
analyzed: ādhikyāt adhara sudhā skhalet iti prāpta śaṅkayā vidhinā

original: MSS_4803-2 racitaṃ tadupaṣṭambhe cibukaṃ pāṭīramādadhatā //
analyzed: racitam tad upaṣṭambhe cibukam pāṭīram ādadhatā

original: MSS_4804-1 ādhikṣāmāṃ virahaśayane saṃnikīrṇaikapārśvāṃ prācīmūle tanumiva kalāmātraśeṣāṃ himāṃśoḥ /
analyzed: ādhi kṣāmām viraha śayane saṃnikīrṇa eka pārśvām prācīmūle tanum iva kalā mātra śeṣām himāṃśoḥ

original: MSS_4804-2 nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇa iva mayā sārdhamicchāratairyā tāmevoṣṇairvirahamahatīmaśrubhiryāpayantīm //
analyzed: nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇaḥ iva mayā sārdham icchā rataiḥ yā tām eva uṣṇaiḥ viraha mahatīm aśrubhiḥ yāpayantīm

original: MSS_4805-1 ādhivyādhiparītāya adya śvo vā vināśine /
analyzed: ādhi vyādhi parītāya adya śvas vā vināśine

original: MSS_4805-2 ko hi nāma śarīrāya dharmāpetaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma śarīrāya dharmāpetam samācaret

original: MSS_4806-1 ādhivyādhiśatairvayasyatitarāmārogyamunmūlyate lakṣmīryatra patatrivac ca vivṛtadvārā iva vyāpadaḥ /
analyzed: ādhi vyādhi śataiḥ vayasi atitarām ārogyam unmūlyate lakṣmīḥ yatra patatri vat ca vivṛta dvārāḥ iva vyāpadaḥ

original: MSS_4806-2 jātaṃ jātamavaśyamāśu vivaśaṃ mṛtyuḥ karotyātmasāt tat kiṃ nāma niraṅkuśena vidhinā yan nirmitaṃ susthiram //
analyzed: jātam jātam avaśyam āśu vivaśam mṛtyuḥ karoti ātmasāt tat kim nāma niraṅkuśena vidhinā yat nirmitam su sthiram

original: MSS_4807-1 ādhūtakesaro hastī tīkṣṇaśṛṅgasturaṅgamaḥ /
analyzed: ādhūta kesaraḥ hastī tīkṣṇa śṛṅgaḥ turaṅgamaḥ

original: MSS_4807-2 gurusāro'yameraṇḍo niḥsāraḥ khadiradrumaḥ //
MSS_4808-1 ādhūtasasvedakarotpalāyāḥ smitāvagūḍhapratikūlavācaḥ /
analyzed: ādhūta sa sveda kara utpalāyāḥ smita avagūḍha pratikūla vācaḥ

original: MSS_4808-2 priyo vihāyādharamāyatākṣyāḥ papau cirāya pratiṣedhameva //
analyzed: priyaḥ vihāya adharam āyata akṣyāḥ papau cirāya pratiṣedham eva

original: MSS_4809-1 ā dhūmād vinivartante suhṛdo bāndhavaiḥ saha /
analyzed: ā dhūmāt vinivartante suhṛdaḥ bāndhavaiḥ saha

original: MSS_4809-2 yena tat saha gantavyaṃ tat karma sukṛtaṃ kuru //
analyzed: yena tat saha gantavyam tat karma su kṛtam kuru

original: MSS_4810-1 ādhoraṇāṅkuśabhayāt karikumbhayugmaṃ jātaṃ payodharayugaṃ hṛdaye'ṅganānām /
analyzed: ādhoraṇa aṅkuśa bhayāt kari kumbha yugmam jātam payodhara yugam hṛdaya iṅganānām

original: MSS_4810-2 tatrāpi vallabhanakhakṣatabhedabhinnaṃ naivānyathā bhavati yallikhitaṃ vidhātrā //
analyzed: tatra api vallabha nakha kṣata bheda bhinnam nā evā anyathā bhavati yat likhitam vidhātrā

original: MSS_4811-1 ādhoraṇānāṃ gajasaṃnipāte śirāṃsi cakrairniśitaiḥ kṣurāgraiḥ /
analyzed: ādhoraṇānām gaja saṃnipāte śirāṃsi cakraiḥ niśitaiḥ kṣura agraiḥ

original: MSS_4811-2 hṛtānyapi śyenanakhāgrakoṭi- vyāsaktakeśāni cireṇa petuḥ //
analyzed: hṛtāni api vyāsakta keśāni cireṇa petuḥ

original: MSS_4812-1 ādhmātoddhatadāvavahnisuhṛdaḥ kīrṇoṣṇareṇūtkarāḥ saṃtaptādhvagamuktakhedaviṣamaśvāsoṣmasaṃvādinaḥ /
analyzed: ādhmāta uddhata dāva vahni suhṛdaḥ kīrṇa uṣṇa reṇu utkarāḥ saṃtapta adhvaga mukta kheda viṣama śvāsa ūṣma saṃvādinaḥ

original: MSS_4812-2 tṛṣṇārtājagarāyatāsyakuharakṣiprapraveśotk aṭāḥ bhrūbhaṅgairiva tarjayanti pavanāḥ pluṣṭasthalīkajjalaiḥ //
analyzed: tṛṣṇā ārta ajagara āyata āsya kuhara kṣipra praveśa utk aṭāḥ bhrū bhaṅgaiḥ iva tarjayanti pavanāḥ pluṣṭa sthalī kajjalaiḥ

original: MSS_4813-1 ānanaṃ mṛgaśāvākṣyā vīkṣya lolālakāvṛtam /
analyzed: ānanam mṛgaśāvākṣyāḥ vīkṣya lola alaka āvṛtam

original: MSS_4813-2 bhramadbhramarasaṃbhāraṃ smarāmi sarasīruham //
analyzed: bhramat bhramara saṃbhāram smarāmi sarasīruham

original: MSS_4814-1 ānanarta purā śaṃbhur govindo rāsakṛttathā /
analyzed: ānanarta purā śaṃbhuḥ govindaḥ rāsakṛt tathā

original: MSS_4814-2 brahmā paśutvamāpannaḥ strībhiḥ ko na viḍambitaḥ //
analyzed: brahmā paśu tvam āpannaḥ strībhiḥ kaḥ na viḍambitaḥ

original: MSS_4815-1 ānanasya mama cedanaucitī nirdayaṃ daśanadaṃśadāyinaḥ /
analyzed: ānanasya mama ced anaucitī nirdayam daśana daṃśa dāyinaḥ

original: MSS_4815-2 śodhyate sudati vairamasya tat kiṃ tvayā vada vidaśya nādharam //
analyzed: śodhyate sudati vairam asya tat kim tvayā vada vidaśya nā adharam

original: MSS_4816-1 ānanāni hariṇīnayanānām adbhutāni ca samīkṣya jagatyām /
analyzed: ānanāni hariṇī nayanānām adbhutāni ca samīkṣya jagatyām

original: MSS_4816-2 lajjayeva ghanamaṇḍalalīno mandamandamahahendurudeti //
analyzed: lajjayā iva ghana maṇḍala līnaḥ manda mandam ahaha induḥ udeti

original: MSS_4817-1 ānanenduśaśalakṣma kapole sādaraṃ viracitaṃ tilakaṃ yat /
analyzed: ānana indu śaśa lakṣma kapole sa ādaram viracitam tilakam yat

original: MSS_4817-2 tatpriye viracitāvadhibhaṅge dhautamīkṣaṇajalaistaralākṣyāḥ //
analyzed: tad priye viracita avadhi bhaṅge dhautam īkṣaṇa jalaiḥ tarala akṣyāḥ

original: MSS_4818-1 ānanairvicakase hṛṣitābhir vallabhānabhi tanūbhirabhāvi /
analyzed: ānanaiḥ vicakase hṛṣitābhiḥ vallabhān abhi tanūbhiḥ abhāvi

original: MSS_4818-2 ārdratāṃ hṛdayamāpa ca roṣo lolati sma vacaneṣu vadhūnām //
analyzed: ārdra tām hṛdayam āpa ca roṣaḥ lolati sma vacaneṣu vadhūnām

original: MSS_4819-1 ānandaṃ kumudādīnām induḥ kandalayannayam /
analyzed: ānandam kumuda ādīnām induḥ kandalayan ayam

original: MSS_4819-2 laṅghayatyambarābhogaṃ hanūmāniva sāgaram //
analyzed: laṅghayati ambara ābhogam hanūmān iva sāgaram

original: MSS_4820-1 ānandaṃ kṛtameva kairavakulaṃ prollāsito vāridhiḥ saṃtāpaṃ tapanopalasya śamitaḥ kāntyā diśo'laṃkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: ānandam kṛtam eva kairava kulam prollāsitaḥ vāridhiḥ saṃtāpam tapana upalasya śamitaḥ kāntyā diśaḥ ulaṃkṛtāḥ

original: MSS_4820-2 etenābhyudayena candra bhavatā trailokyamāpyāyitaṃ kaivalyaṃ kamalasya daivaghaṭitaṃ nātrāpi nindyo bhavān //
analyzed: etena abhyudayena candra bhavatā trailokyam āpyāyitam kaivalyam kamalasya daiva ghaṭitam na atra api nindyaḥ bhavān

original: MSS_4821-1 ānandaṃ dadhati mukhe karodakena śyāmāyā dayitatamena sicyamāne /
analyzed: ānandam dadhati mukhe kara udakena śyāmāyāḥ dayitatamena sicyamāne

original: MSS_4821-2 īrṣyantyā vadanamasiktamapyanalpa- svedāmbusnapitamajāyatetarasyāḥ //
analyzed: īrṣyantyāḥ vadanam asiktam api analpa sveda ambu snapitam ajāyata itarasyāḥ

original: MSS_4822-1 ānandaṃ viduṣāṃ tanoti tanute karṇajvaraṃ vidviṣāṃ śrīmānādivarāhapādasarasījanma praṇāmaṃ muhuḥ /
analyzed: ānandam viduṣām tanoti tanute karṇa jvaram vidviṣām śrīmān ādi varāha pāda sarasī janma praṇāmam muhur

original: MSS_4822-2 sadbandhurguṇasindhurandhalaguḍo dharmasya vartmāvaneḥ śrīmallakṣmaṇasenadakṣiṇabhujādaṇḍo'pi daṇḍe kaṭuḥ //
analyzed: sat bandhuḥ guṇa sindhu randha laguḍaḥ dharmasya vartmā avaneḥ śrīmat lakṣmaṇasena dakṣiṇa bhujā daṇḍaḥ api daṇḍe kaṭuḥ

original: MSS_4823-1 ānandaṃ sadanaṃ sutāśca sudhiyaḥ kāntā na durbhāṣiṇī sanmitraṃ sudhanaṃ svayoṣiti ratiścājñāparāḥ sevakāḥ /
analyzed: ānandam sadanam sutāḥ ca sudhiyaḥ kāntā na durbhāṣiṇī sat mitram su dhanam sva yoṣiti ratiḥ ca ājñā parāḥ sevakāḥ

original: MSS_4823-2 ātithyaṃ śivapūjanaṃ pratidinaṃ miṣṭānnapānaṃ gṛhe sādhoḥ saṅgamupāsate ca satataṃ dhanyo gṛhasthāśramaḥ //
analyzed: ātithyam śiva pūjanam pratidinam miṣṭa anna pānam gṛhe sādhoḥ saṅgam upāsate ca satatam dhanyaḥ gṛhastha āśramaḥ

original: MSS_4824-1 ānandakandamakarandakarambitāni paṅkeruhāṇi parihṛtya samāgatas tvam /
analyzed: ānanda kanda makaranda karambitāni paṅkeruhāṇi parihṛtya samāgataḥ tvam

original: MSS_4824-2 saurabhyasāri sahakāri tathā vidheyaṃ yenopahāsaviṣayo na bhaved dvirephaḥ //
analyzed: saurabhya sāri sahakāri tathā vidheyam yena upahāsa viṣayaḥ na bhavet dvirephaḥ

original: MSS_4825-1 ānandakandamakhilaśrutisāramekam adhyātmadīpamatidustaramañjanābham /
analyzed: ānanda kandam akhila śruti sāram ekam adhyātma dīpam ati dustaram añjana ābham

original: MSS_4825-2 ākṛṣya sāndrakucayoḥ parirabhya kāmaṃ saṃprāpya gopavanitā bata puṇyapuñjāḥ //
analyzed: ākṛṣya sāndra kucayoḥ parirabhya kāmam saṃprāpya gopa vanitāḥ bata puṇya puñjāḥ

original: MSS_4826-1 ānandakāri madanajvaradarpahāri pīyūṣapaṅkaparihāsarasānukāri /
MSS_4826-2 premaprasāri paramābhyudayānukāri vāmabhruvāṃ harati kiṃ na mano vikāri //
analyzed: prema prasāri parama abhyudaya anukāri vāma bhruvām harati kim na manaḥ vikāri

original: MSS_4827-1 ānanda kvacidañca muñca hṛdayaṃ cāturya dhairya tvayā stheyaṃ kveti vicāryatāṃ rasikate niryāhi paryākulā /
analyzed: ānanda kvacid añca muñca hṛdayam cāturya dhairya tvayā stheyam kva iti vicāryatām rasikate niryāhi paryākulā

original: MSS_4827-2 raktāmbhojaparītaṣaṭpadanadatpakṣopamānakṣama- kṣubhyatpakṣmacalācalekṣaṇayugaṃ paśyāmi tasyā mukham //
analyzed: rakta ambhoja parīta ṣaṭpada nadat pakṣa upamāna kṣama kṣubhyat pakṣma cala acala īkṣaṇa yugam paśyāmi tasyāḥ mukham

original: MSS_4828-1 ānandajaḥ śokajamaśru bāṣpas tayoraśītaṃ śiśiro bibheda /
analyzed: ānanda jaḥ śoka jam aśru bāṣpaḥ tayoḥ aśītam śiśiraḥ bibheda

original: MSS_4828-2 gaṅgāsarayvorjalamuṣṇataptaṃ himādrinisyanda ivāvatīrṇaḥ //
analyzed: gaṅgā sarayvoḥ jalam uṣṇa taptam himādri nisyande iva avatīrṇaḥ

original: MSS_4829-1 ānandatāṇḍavapure draviḍasya gehe citraṃ vasiṣṭhavanitāsamamājyapātram /
analyzed: ānanda tāṇḍava pure draviḍasya gehe citram vasiṣṭha vanitā samam ājya pātram

original: MSS_4829-2 vidyullateva parinṛtyati tatra darvī dhārāṃ vilokayati yogabalena siddhaḥ //
analyzed: vidyut latā iva parinṛtyati tatra darvī dhārām vilokayati yoga balena siddhaḥ

original: MSS_4830-1 ānandadhāmani cidekarase'dvitīye tasmin pade'stu mama cittamagocare'pi /
analyzed: ānanda dhāmani cit eka rase dvitīye tasmin mama cittam agocare pi

original: MSS_4830-2 yat sadvrajasthitijuṣāṃ suhṛdāṃ kumārā- dīnāmadhīnamiva gocaratāmupaiti //
analyzed: yat sat vraja sthiti juṣām suhṛdām kumārāḥ dīnām adhīnam iva gocara tām upaiti

original: MSS_4831-1 ānandabāṣparomāñcau yasya svecchāvaśaṃvadau /
analyzed: ānanda bāṣpa romāñcau yasya sva icchā vaśaṃvadau

original: MSS_4831-2 kiṃ tasya sādhanairanyaiḥ kiṃkarāḥ sarvapārthivāḥ //
analyzed: kim tasya sādhanaiḥ anyaiḥ kiṃkarāḥ sarva pārthivāḥ

original: MSS_4832-1 ānandamamandamimaṃ kuvalayadalalocane dadāsi tvam /
analyzed: ānandam amandam imam kuvalaya dala locane dadāsi tvam

original: MSS_4832-2 virahastvayaiva janitas tāpayatitarāṃ śarīraṃ me //
analyzed: virahaḥ tvayā eva janitaḥ tāpayatitarām śarīram me

original: MSS_4833-1 ānandamātramakarandamanantagandhaṃ yogīndrasusthiramilindamapāstabandham /
analyzed: ānanda mātra makarandam ananta gandham yogi indra susthira milindam apāsta bandham

original: MSS_4833-2 vedāntasūryakiraṇaikavikāsaśīlaṃ herambapādaśaradambujamānato'smi //
analyzed: vedānta sūrya kiraṇa eka vikāsa śīlam heramba pāda śarad ambuja mānataḥ asmi

original: MSS_4834-1 ānandamādadhatamāyatalocanānām ānīlamāvalitakandharamāttavaṃśam /
analyzed: ānandam ādadhatam āyata locanānām ānīlam āvalita kandharam ātta vaṃśam

original: MSS_4834-2 āpādamā mukuṭamākalitāmṛtaugham ākāramākalayatāmamumantaraṃ naḥ //
analyzed: ā pādamā mukuṭam ākalita amṛta ogham ākāram ākalayatām amum antaram naḥ

original: MSS_4835-1 ānandamiśramadanajvaradīpanāni gāḍhānurāgarasavanti tadā tadā ca /
analyzed: ānanda miśra madana jvara dīpanāni gāḍha anurāga rasavanti tadā tadā ca

original: MSS_4835-2 snehāṅkanāni mama mugdhadṛśaśca kaṇṭhe kaṣṭaṃ smarāmi tava tāni gatāgatāni //
analyzed: sneha aṅkanāni mama mugdha dṛśaḥ ca kaṇṭhe kaṣṭam smarāmi tava tāni gatāgatāni

original: MSS_4836-1 ānandamugdhanayanāṃ śriyamaṅkabhittau bibhrat punātu bhavato bhagavān nṛsiṃhaḥ /
analyzed: ānanda mugdha nayanām śriyam aṅka bhittau bibhrat punātu bhavataḥ bhagavān nṛsiṃhaḥ

original: MSS_4836-2 yasyāvalokanavilāsavaśādivāsīd utsannalāñchanamṛgaḥ kamalāmukhenduḥ //
analyzed: yasya avalokana vilāsa vaśāt iva āsīt utsanna lāñchana mṛgaḥ kamalā mukha induḥ

original: MSS_4837-1 ānandamṛgadāvāgniḥ śīlaśākhimadadvipaḥ /
MSS_4837-2 jñānadīpamahāvāyur ayaṃ khalasamāgamaḥ //
analyzed: jñāna dīpa mahā vāyuḥ ayam khala samāgamaḥ

original: MSS_4838-1 ānandayati ko'tyarthaṃ sajjanāneva bhūtale /
analyzed: ānandayati kaḥ utyartham sat janān eva bhū tale

original: MSS_4838-2 prabodhayati padmāni tamāṃsi ca nihanti kaḥ //
analyzed: prabodhayati padmāni tamāṃsi ca nihanti kaḥ

original: MSS_4839-1 ānandayati sattvāni yo hi maṅgalamañjuvāk /
analyzed: ānandayati sattvāni yaḥ hi maṅgala mañju vāc

original: MSS_4839-2 nindāmeṣyati loke saḥ paravākyanigūhakaḥ //
analyzed: nindām eṣyati loke saḥ para vākya nigūhakaḥ

original: MSS_4840-1 ānandayantamaravindavanāni dhūpair udvejayantamasakṛnnavakairavāṇi /
analyzed: ānandayantam aravinda vanāni dhūpaiḥ udvejayantam asakṛt nava kairavāṇi

original: MSS_4840-2 prakṣālayantamabhito bhuvanāni dhāmnā bhāsvantamantakamahaṃ vipadāṃ bhajāmi //
analyzed: prakṣālayantam abhitas bhuvanāni dhāmnā bhāsvantam antakam aham vipadām bhajāmi

original: MSS_4841-1 ānandayanti madayanti viṣādayanti yūnāṃ manāṃsi tava yāni vilokanāni /
analyzed: ānandayanti madayanti viṣādayanti yūnām manāṃsi tava yāni vilokanāni

original: MSS_4841-2 kiṃ mantramāvahasi tādṛśamauṣadhaṃ vā kiṃ vā kṛśodari dṛśoriyameva rītiḥ //
analyzed: kim mantram āvahasi tādṛśam auṣadham vā kim vā kṛśa udari dṛśoḥ iyam eva rītiḥ

original: MSS_4842-1 ānandayanti yuktyā tāḥ sevitā ghnanti cānyathā /
analyzed: ānandayanti yuktyā tāḥ sevitāḥ ghnanti ca anyathā

original: MSS_4842-2 durvijñeyāḥ prakṛtyaiva tasmād veśyā viṣopamāḥ //
analyzed: durvijñeyāḥ prakṛtyā eva tasmāt veśyāḥ viṣa upamāḥ

original: MSS_4843-1 ānandasindhuraticāpalaśālicitta- saṃdānanaikasadanaṃ kṣaṇamapyamuktā /
analyzed: ānanda sindhuḥ ati cāpala śāli citta saṃdānana eka sadanam kṣaṇam api amuktā

original: MSS_4843-2 yā sarvadaiva bhavatā tadudantacintā tāntiṃ tanoti tava saṃprati dhigdhigasmān //
analyzed: yā sarvadā eva bhavatā tad udanta cintā tāntim tanoti tava saṃprati dhik dhik asmān

original: MSS_4844-1 ānandasundarapurandaramuktamālyaṃ maulau haṭhena nihitaṃ mahiṣāsurasya /
analyzed: ānanda sundara purandara mukta mālyam maulau haṭhena nihitam mahiṣa asurasya

original: MSS_4844-2 pādāmbujaṃ bhavatu me vijayāya mañju- mañjīraśiñjitamanoharamambikāyāḥ //
analyzed: pāda ambujam bhavatu me vijayāya mañju mañjīra śiñjita manoharam ambikāyāḥ

original: MSS_4845-1 ānandastimitāḥ samādhiṣu mukhe gauryā vilāsālasāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ kṣaṇamadbhutāḥ kṣaṇamatha smerā nije vaikṛte /
analyzed: ānanda stimitāḥ samādhiṣu mukhe gauryāḥ vilāsa alasāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ kṣaṇam adbhutāḥ kṣaṇam atha smerāḥ nije vaikṛte

original: MSS_4845-2 krūrāḥ kṛṣṭaśarāsane manasije dagdhe ghṛṇākūṇitās tatkāntāruditeśrupūrataralāḥ śaṃbhordṛśaḥ pāntu vaḥ //
analyzed: krūrāḥ kṛṣṭa śarāsane manasije dagdhe ghṛṇā kūṇitāḥ tad kāntā rudita aśrupūra taralāḥ śaṃbhoḥ dṛśaḥ pāntu vaḥ

original: MSS_4846-1 ānandasrutirātmano nayanayorantaḥsudhābhyañjanaṃ prastāraḥ praṇayasya manmathataroḥ puṣpaṃ prasādo rateḥ /
analyzed: ānanda srutiḥ ātmanaḥ nayanayoḥ antar sudhā abhyañjanam prastāraḥ praṇayasya manmatha taroḥ puṣpam prasādaḥ rateḥ

original: MSS_4846-2 ālānaṃ hṛdayadvipasya viṣayāraṇyeṣu saṃcāriṇo daṃpatyoriha labhyate sukṛtataḥ saṃsārasāraḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: ālānam hṛdaya dvipasya viṣaya araṇyeṣu saṃcāriṇaḥ daṃpatyoḥ iha labhyate sukṛtataḥ saṃsāra sāraḥ sutaḥ

original: MSS_4847-1 ānandānatamīlitākṣiyugalaṃ kiṃ tvaṃ mudhā tiṣṭhasi jñāto'si prakaṭaprakampapulakairaṅgaiḥ sthitaṃ mugdhayā /
analyzed: ānanda ānata mīlita akṣi yugalam kim tvam mudhā tiṣṭhasi jñātaḥ asi prakaṭa prakampa pulakaiḥ aṅgaiḥ sthitam mugdhayā

original: MSS_4847-2 muñcaināṃ jaḍa kiṃ na paśyasi galadvāṣpāmbudhautānanāṃ sakhyaivaṃ gadite vimucya rabhasāt kaṇṭhe vilagno mayā //
analyzed: muñca enām jaḍa kim na paśyasi galat vāṣpa ambu dhauta ānanām sakhyā evam gadite vimucya rabhasāt kaṇṭhe vilagnaḥ mayā

original: MSS_4848-1 ānandāya ca vismayāya ca mayā dṛṣṭo'si duḥkhāya vā vaitṛṣṇyaṃ tu mamāpi saṃprati kutastvaddarśane cakṣuṣaḥ /
analyzed: ānandāya ca vismayāya ca mayā dṛṣṭaḥ asi duḥkhāya vā vaitṛṣṇyam tu mama api saṃprati kutas tvad darśane cakṣuṣaḥ

original: MSS_4848-2 tvatsāṃgatyasukhasya nāsmi viṣayastatkiṃ vṛthā vyāhṛtair asmin viśrutajāmadagnyadamane pāṇau dhanurjṛmbhatām //
analyzed: tvad sāṃgatya sukhasya nā asmi viṣayaḥ tat kim vṛthā vyāhṛtaiḥ asmin viśruta jāmadagnya damane pāṇau dhanuḥ jṛmbhatām

original: MSS_4849-1 ānandāya satāṃ bhūyāt subhāṣitamidaṃ mama /
analyzed: ānandāya satām bhūyāt subhāṣitam idam mama

original: MSS_4849-2 pṛthakpaddhatisaṃmiśraparicchedairmanoramam //
analyzed: pṛthak paddhati saṃmiśra paricchedaiḥ manoramam

original: MSS_4850-1 ānandāśru pravṛttaṃ me kathaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva kanyakām /
analyzed: ānanda aśru pravṛttam me katham dṛṣṭvā eva kanyakām

original: MSS_4850-2 akṣi me puṣparajasā vātoddhūtena dūṣitam //
analyzed: akṣi me puṣpa rajasā vāta uddhūtena dūṣitam

original: MSS_4851-1 ānandinī roditi vā nikāmaṃ yā duḥkhitā hāsyarasaṃ vidhatte /
analyzed: ānandinī roditi vā nikāmam yā duḥkhitā hāsya rasam vidhatte

original: MSS_4851-2 raktā viraktā viratā ratā ca durlakṣyacittā khalu vāṇinī yā //
analyzed: raktā viraktā viratā ratā ca durlakṣya cittā khalu vāṇinī yā

original: MSS_4852-1 ānandena yaśodayā samadanaṃ gopāṅganābhiściraṃ sāśaṅkaṃ balavidviṣā sakusumaṃ siddhaiḥ pṛthivyākulam /
analyzed: ānandena yaśodayā sa madanam gopa aṅganābhiḥ ciram sa āśaṅkam bala vidviṣā sa kusumam siddhaiḥ pṛthivī ākulam

original: MSS_4852-2 serṣyaṃ gopakumārakaiḥ sakaruṇaṃ pauraiḥ suraiḥ sasmitaṃ yo dṛṣṭaḥ sa punātu vo madhuripuḥ protkṣiptagovardhanaḥ //
analyzed: sa īrṣyam gopa kumārakaiḥ sa karuṇam pauraiḥ suraiḥ sa smitam yaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sa punātu vaḥ madhuripuḥ protkṣipta govardhanaḥ

original: MSS_4853-1 ānandodgatabāṣpapūrapihitaṃ cakṣuḥ kṣamaṃ nekṣituṃ bāhū sveditayaiva kampavidhurau śaktau na kaṇṭhagrahe /
analyzed: ānanda udgata bāṣpa pūra pihitam cakṣuḥ kṣamam nā īkṣitum bāhū sveditayā eva kampa vidhurau śaktau na kaṇṭhagrahe

original: MSS_4853-2 vāṇī sādhvasagadgadākṣarapadā saṃkṣobhalolaṃ manaḥ satyaṃ yat priyasaṃgamo'pi sucirājjāto viyogāyate //
analyzed: vāṇī sādhvasa gadgada akṣara padā saṃkṣobha lolam manaḥ satyam yat priya saṃgamaḥ api su cirāt jātaḥ viyogāyate

original: MSS_4854-1 ānandormivyatikaradarasmerasaṃsaktapakṣma premodgārapravaṇamasṛṇārecitasnigdhatāram /
analyzed: ānanda ūrmi vyatikara dara smera saṃsakta pakṣma prema udgāra pravaṇa masṛṇa ārecita snigdha tāram

original: MSS_4854-2 antaścintābharaparicayākuñcitabhrūlatāntaṃ cakṣuśceto harati hariṇīlocanāyāḥ tadetat //
analyzed: antar cintā bhara paricaya ākuñcita bhrū latā antam cakṣuḥ cetaḥ harati hariṇī locanāyāḥ tat etat

original: MSS_4855-1 ānamrāḥ stabakabhareṇa pallavinyaḥ śobhante kati na latāḥ parāgapūrṇāḥ /
analyzed: ānamrāḥ stabaka bhareṇa pallavinyaḥ śobhante kati na latāḥ parāga pūrṇāḥ

original: MSS_4855-2 āmode madhuni ca mārdave ca tāsāṃ yo bhedaḥ sa khalu madhuvrataikavedyaḥ //
analyzed: āmode madhuni ca mārdave ca tāsām yaḥ bhedaḥ sa khalu madhu vrata eka vedyaḥ

original: MSS_4856-1 ānamrāsyāḥ pihitavadanā cittamadhye nirīkṣye mānārambhaḥ sumukhi saphalo māmakīnaḥ kathaṃ syāt /
analyzed: ānamra āsyāḥ pihita vadanā citta madhye nirīkṣye māna ārambhaḥ su mukhi sa phalaḥ māmakīnaḥ katham syāt

original: MSS_4856-2 yasyāṃ yasyāṃ diśi diśi mukhaṃ mānato'haṃ nayāmi tasyāṃ tasyāṃ sajalajaladaśyāmalo nandasūnuḥ //
analyzed: yasyām yasyām diśi diśi mukham nayāmi tasyām tasyām sa jala jalada śyāmalaḥ nanda sūnuḥ

original: MSS_4857-1 ānayati pathikataruṇaṃ hariṇa iha prāpayannivātmānam /
analyzed: ānayati pathika taruṇam hariṇaḥ iha prāpayan iva ātmānam

original: MSS_4857-2 upakalamago'pi komala- kalamāvalikavalanottaralaḥ //
analyzed: upa kalama gopi komala kalama āvali kavalana uttaralaḥ

original: MSS_4858-1 ā nābheḥ sarasi natabhruvāvagāḍhe cāpalyādatha payasas taraṅgahastaiḥ /
analyzed: ā nābheḥ sarasi nata bhruvā avagāḍhe cāpalyāt atha payasaḥ taraṅga hastaiḥ

original: MSS_4858-2 ucchrāyi stanayugamadhyarohi labdha- sparśānāṃ bhavati kuto'thavā vyavasthā //
analyzed: ucchrāyi stana yuga madhya rohi labdha sparśānām bhavati kutas thavā vyavasthā

original: MSS_4859-1 ānāmya phalinīṃ śākhāṃ pakvaṃ pakvaṃ praśātayet /
analyzed: ānāmya phalinīm śākhām pakvam pakvam praśātayet

original: MSS_4859-2 phalārtho'yaṃ samārambho loke puṃsāṃ vipaścitām //
analyzed: phala arthaḥ yam samārambhaḥ loke puṃsām vipaścitām

original: MSS_4860-1 ānāyamiva matsyānāṃ pañjaraṃ śakuneriva /
analyzed: ānāyam iva matsyānām pañjaram śakuneḥ iva

original: MSS_4860-2 samastapāśaṃ mūḍhasya bandhanaṃ vāmalocanā //
analyzed: samasta pāśam mūḍhasya bandhanam vāma locanā

original: MSS_4861-1 ānītā naṭavanmayā tava puraḥ śrīrāma yā bhūmikā vyomākāśakhakhāṃbarābdhivasavas tvatprītaye'dyāvadhi /
analyzed: ānītāḥ naṭa vat mayā tava puras śrī rāma yāḥ bhūmikāḥ vyoma ākāśa kha kha aṃbara abdhi vasavaḥ tvad prītaye id yā avadhi

original: MSS_4861-2 prīto yarhi nirīkṣaṇāt tvamadhunā yat prārthitaṃ dehi me no ced brūhi kadāpi mānaya punarmāmīdṛśīṃ bhūmikām //
analyzed: prītaḥ yarhi nirīkṣaṇāt tvam adhunā yat prārthitam dehi me no ced brūhi kadāpi mānaya punar mām īdṛśīm bhūmikām

original: MSS_4862-1 ānītā śayanāṅgane priyasakhīvṛndaiḥ kathaṃcicchalāc citrākrāntakuraṅgikeva vigalannetrāmbudhārātatiḥ /
analyzed: ānītā śayana aṅgane priya sakhī vṛndaiḥ kathaṃcid śalāt citra ākrānta kuraṅgikā iva vigalat netrāmbu dhārā tatiḥ

original: MSS_4862-2 bāṣpodvāsamukhī vidhūnitakarā nikṣepitāṅghridvayā viṣvagvellitakuntalā navavadhūrbhāgyena saṃbhujyate //
analyzed: bāṣpa udvāsa mukhī vidhūnita karā nikṣepita aṅghri dvayā viṣvak vellita kuntalā nava vadhūḥ bhāgyena saṃbhujyate

original: MSS_4863-1 ānītairiṣukāra kāraṇamiha ślāghyaiḥ kimebhiḥ śaraiḥ prakhyātāmapi kiṃ na pāmarapurīmetāṃ puraḥ paśyasi /
analyzed: ānītaiḥ iṣukāra kāraṇam iha ślāghyaiḥ kim ebhiḥ śaraiḥ prakhyātām api kim na pāmara purīm etām puras paśyasi

original: MSS_4863-2 dātraṃ pātramiti bravīti kurute stotrāṇi totre rasaṃ dhatte yatra hale kutūhalamapi grāmīṇakagrāmaṇīḥ //
analyzed: dātram pātram iti bravīti kurute stotrāṇi totre rasam dhatte yatra hale kutūhalam api grāmīṇaka grāmaṇīḥ

original: MSS_4864-1 ānīto malayācalānmalayajo ratnasthale ropitaḥ pīyūṣeṇa pariplutaḥ pratidinaṃ yatnena saṃvarddhitaḥ /
analyzed: ānītaḥ malaya acalāt malayajaḥ ratna sthale ropitaḥ pīyūṣeṇa pariplutaḥ pratidinam yatnena saṃvarddhitaḥ

original: MSS_4864-2 ārabdhaṃ yadi tena saurabhabharairbhūmaṇḍalaṃ vāsituṃ tasminneva dine vidhātṛvaśato vajreṇa cūrṇīkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: ārabdham yadi tena saurabha bharaiḥ bhū maṇḍalam tasmin eva dine vidhātṛ vaśataḥ vajreṇa cūrṇīkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_4865-1 ānīyate śarīreṇa kṣīṇo'pi vibhavaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: ānīyate śarīreṇa kṣīṇaḥ api vibhavaḥ punar

original: MSS_4865-2 vibhavaḥ punarānetuṃ śarīraṃ kṣīṇamakṣamaḥ //
analyzed: vibhavaḥ punar ānetum śarīram kṣīṇam akṣamaḥ

original: MSS_4866-1 ānīlacūcukaśilīmukhamudgataika- romāvalīvipulanālamidaṃ priyāyāḥ /
analyzed: ānīla cūcuka śilīmukha mudgata eka roma āvalī vipula nālam idam priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_4866-2 uttuṅgasaṃgatapayodharapadmayugmaṃ nābheradhaḥ kathayatīva mahānidhānam //
analyzed: uttuṅga saṃgata payodhara padma yugmam nābheḥ adhas kathayati iva mahā nidhānam

original: MSS_4867-1 ānīlāṃ karapallavairapanayannacchāṃ tamaḥkañcukīm āśāṃ saṃprati vāsavīmanusarannakṣīṇarāgaḥ śaśī /
analyzed: ānīlām karapallavaiḥ apanayan acchām tamaḥ kañcukīm āśām saṃprati vāsavīm anusaran akṣīṇa rāgaḥ śaśī

original: MSS_4867-2 asyāśca stanasaṅginīmiva vahannaṅgena kastūrikām āliṅgatyayamādareṇa rajanīmardhonmiṣattārakām //
analyzed: asyāḥ ca stana saṅginīm iva vahan aṅgena kastūrikām āliṅgati ayam ādareṇa rajanīm ardha unmiṣat tārakām

original: MSS_4868-1 ānukūlyena daivasya vartitavyaṃ sukhārthinā /
analyzed: ānukūlyena daivasya vartitavyam sukha arthinā

original: MSS_4868-2 dustaraṃ pratikūlaṃ hi pratisrota ivāmbhasaḥ //
analyzed: dustaram pratikūlam hi pratisrotas iva ambhasaḥ

original: MSS_4869-1 ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kṣamā satyam ahiṃsā dama ārjavam /
analyzed: ānṛśaṃsyam kṣamā satyam ahiṃsā damaḥ ārjavam

original: MSS_4869-2 prītiḥ prasādo mādhuryaṃ mārdavaṃ ca yamā daśa //
analyzed: prītiḥ prasādaḥ mādhuryam mārdavam ca yamāḥ daśa

original: MSS_4870-1 ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṃ balam /
analyzed: ānṛśaṃsyam paraḥ dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramam balam

original: MSS_4870-2 ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ na satyād vidyate param //
analyzed: ātma jñānam param jñānam na satyāt vidyate param

original: MSS_4871-1 ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ mataḥ /
analyzed: ānṛśaṃsyam paraḥ dharmaḥ sarva prāṇabhṛtām mataḥ

original: MSS_4871-2 tasmād rājānṛśaṃsyena pālayet kṛpaṇaṃ janam //
analyzed: tasmāt rājā ānṛśaṃsyena pālayet kṛpaṇam janam

original: MSS_4872-1 ānṛśaṃsyamanukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ /
analyzed: ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ śrutam śīlam damaḥ śamaḥ

original: MSS_4872-2 rāghavaṃ śobhayantyete ṣaḍguṇāḥ puruṣottamam //
analyzed: rāghavam śobhayanti ete ṣaṣ guṇāḥ puruṣa uttamam

original: MSS_4873-1 ānetuṃ na gatā kimu priyasakhī bhīto bhujaṅgāt kimu kruddho vā pratiṣedhavāci kimasau prāṇeśvaro vartate /
analyzed: ānetum na gatā kimu priya sakhī bhītaḥ bhujaṅgāt kimu kruddhaḥ vā pratiṣedha vāci kim asau prāṇa īśvaraḥ vartate

original: MSS_4873-2 itthaṃ karṇasuvarṇaketakarajaḥpātopaghātacchalād akṣṇoḥ kāpi navoḍhanīrajamukhī bāṣpodakaṃ muñcati //
analyzed: ittham karṇa suvarṇa ketaka rajaḥ pāta upaghāta chalāt akṣṇoḥ kā api na voḍha nīraja mukhī bāṣpa udakam muñcati

original: MSS_4874-1 āntaramapi bahiriva hi vyañjayituṃ rasamaśeṣataḥ satatam /
analyzed: āntaram api bahis iva hi vyañjayitum rasam aśeṣatas satatam

original: MSS_4874-2 asatī satkavisūktiḥ kācaghaṭīti trayaṃ veda //
analyzed: asatī sat kavi su uktiḥ kāca ghaṭī iti trayam veda

original: MSS_4875-1 āntare caiva bāhye ca rājā yaścaiva sarvadā /
analyzed: āntare ca eva bāhye ca rājā yaḥ ca eva sarvadā

original: MSS_4875-2 ādiṣṭo naiva kampeta sa rājavasatiṃ vaset //
analyzed: ādiṣṭaḥ nā eva kampeta sa rāja vasatim vaset

original: MSS_4876-1 āntarebhyaḥ parān rakṣet parebhyaḥ punarāntarān /
analyzed: āntarebhyaḥ parān rakṣet parebhyaḥ punar āntarān

original: MSS_4876-2 parān parebhyaḥ svān svebhyaḥ sarvān rakṣeta sarvadā //
analyzed: parān parebhyaḥ svān svebhyaḥ sarvān rakṣeta sarvadā

original: MSS_4877-1 āndolanairmadvapuṣā lagantīṃ smarāmi veṇīṃ puruṣāyitāyāḥ /
analyzed: āndolanaiḥ mad vapuṣā lagantīm smarāmi veṇīm puruṣāyitāyāḥ

original: MSS_4877-2 samācarantyāḥ suratopadeśaṃ tasyāḥ kaśāvallimiva priyāyāḥ //
analyzed: samācarantyāḥ surata upadeśam tasyāḥ kaśā vallim iva priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_4878-1 āndolayan girinikuñjakarañjarājīr nājīgaṇaḥ kalabha kaṃcana pauruṣeṇa /
analyzed: āndolayan giri nikuñja karañja rājīḥ nājī gaṇaḥ kalabha kaṃcana pauruṣeṇa

original: MSS_4878-2 īṣatsamunmiṣitalocanakoṇa eva kaṇṭhīrave kimiti jīvitamujjahāsi //
analyzed: īṣat samunmiṣita locana koṇaḥ eva kaṇṭhīrave kim iti jīvitam ujjahāsi

original: MSS_4879-1 āndolayantī vapurāyatākṣī hindolikāyāṃ kanakāṅgayaṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: āndolayantī vapuḥ āyata akṣī hindolikāyām kanaka aṅgayaṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_4879-2 atarki lokairgaganāntarasthā svardevatevākhilarūparamyā //
analyzed: atarki lokaiḥ gagana antara sthā svar devatā iva akhila rūpa ramyā

original: MSS_4880-1 āndolayasyavirataṃ gaganārkamaṅke tārāgaṇaṃ ca śaśinaṃ ca tathetarāṇi /
analyzed: āndolayasi aviratam gagana arkam aṅke tārā gaṇam ca śaśinam ca tathā itarāṇi

original: MSS_4880-2 tejāṃsi bhāsurataḍitprabhṛtīni sādho citraṃ tathāpi na jahāsi yadāndhyamantaḥ //
analyzed: tejāṃsi bhāsura taḍit prabhṛtīni sādho citram tathā api na jahāsi yat āndhyam antar

original: MSS_4881-1 āndolalolakeśīṃ calakāñcīkiṅkiṇīgaṇakvaṇitām /
analyzed: āndola lola keśīm cala kāñcī kiṅkiṇī gaṇa kvaṇitām

original: MSS_4881-2 smarasi puruṣāyitāṃ tāṃ smaracāmaracihnayaṣṭimiva //
analyzed: smarasi puruṣāyitām tām smara cāmara cihna yaṣṭim iva

original: MSS_4882-1 āndhratvamāndhrabhāṣā ca prābhākarapariśramaḥ /
analyzed: āndhra tvam āndhra bhāṣā ca prābhākara pariśramaḥ

original: MSS_4882-2 tatrāpi yājuṣī śākhā nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam //
analyzed: tatra api yājuṣī śākhā na alpasya tapasaḥ phalam

original: MSS_4883-1 āndhrī prītinibandhanaikanipuṇā lāṭī vidagdhapriyā karṇāṭī suratopacāracaturā nārī śuciścolikā /
analyzed: āndhrī prīti nibandhana eka nipuṇā lāṭī vidagdha priyā karṇāṭī surata upacāra caturā nārī śuciḥ colikā

original: MSS_4883-2 ābhīrī puruṣāyitapriyaratā lajjānvitā gūrjarī kāśmīrī ratilālasā nidhuvane dhṛṣṭā mahārāṣṭrakī //
analyzed: ābhīrī puruṣāyita priya ratā lajjā anvitā gūrjarī kāśmīrī rati lālasā nidhuvane dhṛṣṭā mahārāṣṭrakī

original: MSS_4884-1 ānvīkṣikīṃ trayīṃ vārtāṃ daṇḍanītiṃ ca pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: ānvīkṣikīm trayīm vārtām daṇḍanītim ca pārthivaḥ

original: MSS_4884-2 tadvidyaistatkriyopetaiś cintayed vinayānvitaḥ //
analyzed: tad vidyaiḥ tad kriyā upetaiḥ cintayet vinaya anvitaḥ

original: MSS_4885-1 ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiśca śāśvatī /
analyzed: ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiḥ ca śāśvatī

original: MSS_4885-2 vidyāścatasra evaitā lokasaṃsthitihetavaḥ // ...
analyzed: vidyāḥ catasraḥ eva etāḥ loka saṃsthiti hetavaḥ

original: MSS_4886-1 ānvīkṣikyātmavijñānaṃ dharmādharmau trayīsthitau /
analyzed: ānvīkṣikī ātma vijñānam dharma adharmau trayī sthitau

original: MSS_4886-2 arthānarthau tu vārtāyāṃ daṇḍanītyāṃ nayetarau //
analyzed: artha anarthau tu vārtāyām daṇḍanītyām naya itarau

original: MSS_4887-1 ānvīkṣikītrayīvārtāḥ satīrvidyāḥ pracakṣate /
analyzed: ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtāḥ satīḥ vidyāḥ pracakṣate
