original: MSS_4887-2 satyo'pi hi na satyastā daṇḍanītestu viplave //
analyzed: satyaḥ api hi na satyaḥ tā daṇḍanīteḥ tu viplave

original: MSS_4888-1 daṇḍanītiryadā samyaṅ netāramadhitiṣṭhati /
analyzed: daṇḍanītiḥ yadā samyak netāram adhitiṣṭhati

original: MSS_4888-2 tadā vidyāvidaḥ śeṣā vidyāḥ samyagupāsate // ...
analyzed: tadā vidyā vidaḥ śeṣāḥ vidyāḥ samyak upāsate

original: MSS_4889-1 ānvīkṣikyātmavidyā syād īkṣaṇāt sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
analyzed: ānvīkṣikī ātma vidyā syāt īkṣaṇāt sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: MSS_4889-2 īkṣamāṇas tayā tattvaṃ harṣaśokau vyudasyati //
analyzed: īkṣamāṇaḥ tayā tattvam harṣa śokau vyudasyati

original: MSS_4890-1 ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiśca śāśvatī /
analyzed: ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiḥ ca śāśvatī

original: MSS_4890-2 vidyāścatasra evaitā abhyased nṛpatiḥ sadā //
analyzed: vidyāḥ catasraḥ eva etāḥ abhyaset nṛpatiḥ sadā

original: MSS_4891-1 ānvīkṣikyāṃ tarkaśāstraṃ vedāntādyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: ānvīkṣikyām tarka śāstram vedānta ādyam pratiṣṭhitam

original: MSS_4891-2 trayyāṃ dharmo hyadharmaśca kāmo'kāmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
analyzed: trayyām dharmaḥ hi adharmaḥ ca pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: MSS_4892-1 ānvīkṣikyātmavijñānād harṣaśokau vyudasyati /
analyzed: ānvīkṣikī ātma vijñānāt harṣa śokau vyudasyati

original: MSS_4892-2 ubhau lokāvavāpnoti trayyāṃ tiṣṭhan yathāvidhi //
analyzed: ubhau lokau avāpnoti trayyām tiṣṭhan yathāvidhi

original: MSS_4893-1 āpah pavitraṃ prathamaṃ pṛthivyām apāṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ ca mantrāḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ pavitram prathamam pṛthivyām apām pavitram paramam ca mantrāḥ

original: MSS_4893-2 teṣāṃ ca sāmargyajuṣāṃ pavitraṃ maharṣayo vyākaraṇaṃ nirāhuḥ //
analyzed: teṣām ca sāma ṛc yajuṣām pavitram mahā ṛṣayaḥ vyākaraṇam nirāhuḥ

original: MSS_4894-1 āpajjalanimagnānāṃ hriyatāṃ vyasanormibhiḥ /
analyzed: āpad jala nimagnānām hriyatām vyasana ūrmibhiḥ

original: MSS_4894-2 vṛddhavākyairvinā nūnaṃ naivottāraṃ kathaṃcana //
analyzed: vṛddha vākyaiḥ vinā nūnam na eva uttāram kathaṃcana

original: MSS_4895-1 āpatkāle tu saṃprāpte yan mitraṃ mitrameva tat /
analyzed: āpad kāle tu saṃprāpte yat mitram mitram eva tat

original: MSS_4895-2 vṛddhikāle tu saṃprāpte durjano'pi suhṛd bhavet //
analyzed: vṛddhi kāle tu saṃprāpte durjanaḥ api suhṛd bhavet

original: MSS_4896-1 āpatkāle nṛṇāṃ nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ naiva labhyate /
analyzed: āpad kāle nṛṇām nūnam maraṇam nā eva labhyate

original: MSS_4897-1 āpatkālopayuktāsu kalāsu syāt kṛtaśramaḥ /
analyzed: āpad kāla upayuktāsu kalāsu syāt kṛta śramaḥ

original: MSS_4897-2 nṛtyavṛttirvirāṭasya kirīṭī bhavane'bhavat //
analyzed: nṛtya vṛttiḥ virāṭasya kirīṭī bhavane bhavat

original: MSS_4898-1 āpat tulā sahāyānām ātmanaḥ pauruṣasya ca /
analyzed: āpat tulā sahāyānām ātmanaḥ pauruṣasya ca

original: MSS_4898-2 anāpadi suhṛt sarvaḥ svayaṃ ca puruṣāyate //
analyzed: anāpadi suhṛd sarvaḥ svayam ca puruṣāyate

original: MSS_4899-1 āpattau patitānāṃ yeṣāṃ vṛddhā na santi śāstāraḥ /
analyzed: āpattau patitānām yeṣām vṛddhāḥ na santi śāstāraḥ

original: MSS_4899-2 te śocyā bandhūnāṃ jīvanto'pīha mṛtatulyāḥ //
analyzed: te śocyāḥ bandhūnām jīvantaḥ api iha mṛta tulyāḥ

original: MSS_4900-1 āpatsamuddharaṇadhīradhiyaḥ pareṣāṃ jātā mahatyapi kule na bhavanti sarve /
analyzed: āpad samuddharaṇa dhīra dhiyaḥ pareṣām jātāḥ mahati api kule na bhavanti sarve

original: MSS_4900-2 vindhyāṭavīṣu viralāḥ khalu pādapāste ye dantidantamusalollikhanaṃ sahante //
analyzed: vindhya aṭavīṣu viralāḥ khalu pādapāḥ te ye danti danta musala ullikhanam sahante

original: MSS_4901-1 āpatsu kiṃ viṣādena saṃpattau vismayena kim /
analyzed: āpatsu kim viṣādena saṃpattau vismayena kim

original: MSS_4901-2 bhavitavyaṃ bhavatyeva karmaṇāmeṣa niścayaḥ //
analyzed: bhavitavyam bhavati eva karmaṇām eṣa niścayaḥ

original: MSS_4902-1 āpatsu ca na muhyanti narāḥ paṇditabuddhayaḥ /
analyzed: āpatsu ca na muhyanti narāḥ paṇdita buddhayaḥ

original: MSS_4902-2 manodehasamutthābhyāṃ duḥkhābhyāmarpitaṃ jagat //
analyzed: manaḥ deha samutthābhyām duḥkhābhyām arpitam jagat

original: MSS_4903-1 āpatsu mitraṃ jānīyād raṇe śūraṃ rahaḥ śucim /
analyzed: āpatsu mitram jānīyāt raṇe śūram rahaḥ śucim

original: MSS_4903-2 bhāryāṃ ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priyātithim //
analyzed: bhāryām ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priya atithim

original: MSS_4904-1 āpatsvamūḍho dhṛtimān yah samyak pratipadyate /
analyzed: āpatsu amūḍhaḥ dhṛtimān samyak pratipadyate

original: MSS_4904-2 karmaṇyavaśyakāryāṇi tamāhuḥ paṇḍitaṃ budhāḥ //
analyzed: karmaṇi avaśya kāryāṇi tam āhuḥ paṇḍitam budhāḥ

original: MSS_4905-1 āpatsveva hi mahatāṃ śaktirabhivyajyate na saṃpatsu /
analyzed: āpatsu eva hi mahatām śaktiḥ abhivyajyate na saṃpatsu

original: MSS_4905-2 aguros tathā na gandhaḥ prāgasti yathāgnipatitasya //
analyzed: aguroḥ tathā na gandhaḥ prāk asti yathā agni patitasya

original: MSS_4906-1 āpadaṃ pratariṣyāmo yūyaṃ yuktyā vadiṣyatha /
analyzed: āpadam pratariṣyāmaḥ yūyam yuktyā vadiṣyatha

original: MSS_4906-2 bhavanto mama mitrāṇi bhavatsu nāsti bhṛtyatā //
analyzed: bhavantaḥ mama mitrāṇi bhavatsu na asti bhṛtya tā

original: MSS_4907-1 āpadaṃ prāpnuyāt svāmī yasya bhṛtyasya paśyataḥ /
analyzed: āpadam prāpnuyāt svāmī yasya bhṛtyasya paśyataḥ

original: MSS_4907-2 prāṇeṣu vidyamāneṣu sa bhṛtyo narakaṃ vrajet //
analyzed: prāṇeṣu vidyamāneṣu sa bhṛtyaḥ narakam vrajet

original: MSS_4908-1 āpadaḥ kṣaṇamāyānti saṃpadaḥ kṣaṇameva ca /
analyzed: āpadaḥ kṣaṇam āyānti saṃpadaḥ kṣaṇam eva ca

original: MSS_4908-2 kṣaṇaṃ janmātha maraṇaṃ mune kimiva na kṣaṇam //
analyzed: kṣaṇam janma atha maraṇam mune kim iva na kṣaṇam

original: MSS_4909-1 āpadaḥ santi mahatāṃ mahatāmeva saṃpadaḥ /
analyzed: āpadaḥ santi mahatām mahatām eva saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_4909-2 itareṣāṃ manuṣyāṇaṃ nāpado na ca saṃpadaḥ //
analyzed: itareṣām manuṣyāṇam na āpadaḥ na ca saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_4910-1 āpadarthe dhanaṃ rakṣec śrīmatāṃ kuta āpadaḥ /
analyzed: āpad arthe dhanam rakṣet śrīmatām kutas āpadaḥ

original: MSS_4910-2 kadāciccalate lakṣmīḥ saṃcitaṃ ca vinaśyati //
analyzed: kadācid calate lakṣmīḥ saṃcitam ca vinaśyati

original: MSS_4911-1 āpadarthe dhanaṃ rakṣed dārān rakṣed dhanairapi /
analyzed: āpad arthe dhanam rakṣet dārān rakṣet dhanaiḥ api

original: MSS_4911-2 ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣed dārairapi dhanairapi //
analyzed: ātmānam satatam rakṣet dāraiḥ api dhanaiḥ api

original: MSS_4912-1 āpadāṃ kathitaḥ panthā indriyāṇāmasaṃyamaḥ /
analyzed: āpadām kathitaḥ panthāḥ indriyāṇām asaṃyamaḥ

original: MSS_4912-2 tajjayaḥ saṃpadāṃ mārgo yeneṣṭaṃ tena gamyatām //
analyzed: tad jayaḥ saṃpadām mārgaḥ yena iṣṭam tena gamyatām

original: MSS_4913-1 āpadāmatha kāle tu kurvīta na vicālayet /
analyzed: āpadām atha kāle tu kurvīta na vicālayet

original: MSS_4913-2 aśaknuvaṃśca yuddhāya niṣpatet saha mantribhiḥ //
analyzed: a śaknuvan ca yuddhāya niṣpatet saha mantribhiḥ

original: MSS_4914-1 āpadāmapahartāraṃ dātāraṃ sarvasaṃpadām /
analyzed: āpadām apahartāram dātāram sarva saṃpadām

original: MSS_4914-2 lokābhirāmaṃ śrīrāmaṃ bhūyo bhūyo namāmyaham //
analyzed: loka abhirāmam śrīrāmam bhūyas bhūyas namāmi aham

original: MSS_4915-1 āpadāmāgamaṃ dṛṣṭvā na viṣaṇṇo bhaved vaśī /
analyzed: āpadām āgamam dṛṣṭvā na viṣaṇṇaḥ bhavet vaśī

original: MSS_4915-2 saṃpadaṃ ca suvistīrṇāṃ prāpya no'dhṛtimān bhavet //
analyzed: saṃpadam ca su vistīrṇām prāpya na udhṛtimān bhavet

original: MSS_4916-1 āpadāmāpatantīnāṃ hito'pyāyāti hetutām /
analyzed: āpadām āpatantīnām hitā upya āyāti hetu tām

original: MSS_4916-2 mātṛjaṅghā hi vatsasya stambhībhavati bandhane //
analyzed: mātṛ jaṅghā hi vatsasya stambhībhavati bandhane

original: MSS_4917-1 āpadāsthitapanthānām indriyāṇāmasaṃyamāt /
analyzed: āpadā āsthita panthānām indriyāṇām asaṃyamāt

original: MSS_4917-2 tyajyate saṃpadāṃ mārgo yo neṣṭastena paśyata //
analyzed: tyajyate saṃpadām mārgaḥ yaḥ na iṣṭaḥ tena paśyata

original: MSS_4918-1 āpadi mitraparīkṣā śūraparīkṣā raṇāṅgaṇe bhavati /
analyzed: āpadi mitra parīkṣā śūra parīkṣā raṇa aṅgaṇe bhavati

original: MSS_4918-2 vinaye vaṃśaparīkṣā striyaḥ parīkṣā tu nirdhane puṃsi //
analyzed: vinaye vaṃśa parīkṣā striyaḥ parīkṣā tu nirdhane puṃsi

original: MSS_4919-1 āpadi yenopakṛtaṃ yena ca hasitaṃ daśāsu viṣamāsu /
analyzed: āpadi yena upakṛtam yena ca hasitam daśāsu viṣamāsu

original: MSS_4919-2 upakṛtya tayorubhayoḥ punarapi jātaṃ naraṃ manye //
analyzed: upakṛtya tayoḥ ubhayoḥ punar api jātam naram manye

original: MSS_4920-1 āpado mahatāmeva mahatāmeva saṃpadaḥ /
analyzed: āpadaḥ mahatām eva mahatām eva saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_4920-2 kṣīyate vardhate candraḥ kadācin naiva tārakāḥ //
analyzed: kṣīyate vardhate candraḥ kadācid nā eva tārakāḥ

original: MSS_4921-1 āpadgataṃ hasasi kiṃ draviṇāndha mūḍha lakṣmīḥ sthirā na bhavatīti kimatra citram /
analyzed: āpad gatam hasasi kim draviṇa andha mūḍha lakṣmīḥ sthirā na bhavati iti kim atra citram

original: MSS_4921-2 kiṃ tvaṃ na paśyasi na ghaṭīrjalayantracakre riktā bhavanti bharitāḥ punareva riktāḥ //
analyzed: kim tvam na paśyasi na ghaṭīḥ jalayantra cakre riktāḥ bhavanti bharitāḥ punar eva riktāḥ

original: MSS_4922-1 āpadgataḥ khalu mahāśayacakravartī vistārayatyakṛtapūrvamudārabhāvam /
analyzed: āpad gataḥ khalu mahā āśaya cakravartī vistārayati a kṛta pūrvam udāra bhāvam

original: MSS_4922-2 kālāgururdahanamadhyagataḥ samantāl lokottaraṃ parimalaṃ prakaṭīkaroti //
analyzed: kālāguruḥ dahana madhya gataḥ samantāt lokottaram parimalam prakaṭīkaroti

original: MSS_4923-1 āpadgrāhagṛhītānāṃ vṛddhāḥ santi na paṇḍitāḥ /
analyzed: āpad grāha gṛhītānām vṛddhāḥ santi na paṇḍitāḥ

original: MSS_4923-2 yeṣāṃ mokṣayitāro vai teṣāṃ śāntirna vidyate //
analyzed: yeṣām mokṣayitāraḥ vai teṣām śāntiḥ na vidyate

original: MSS_4924-1 āpadbhujaṅgadaṣṭasya mantrahīnasya sarvadā /
analyzed: āpad bhujaṅga daṣṭasya mantra hīnasya sarvadā

original: MSS_4924-2 vṛddhavākyauṣadhā nūnaṃ kurvanti kila nirviṣam //
analyzed: vṛddha vākya auṣadhāḥ nūnam kurvanti kila nirviṣam

original: MSS_4925-1 āpadyapi durantāyāṃ naiva gantavyamakrame /
analyzed: āpadi api durantāyām nā eva gantavyam akrame

original: MSS_4925-2 rāhurapyakrameṇaiva pibannapyamṛtaṃ mṛtaḥ //
analyzed: rāhuḥ api akrameṇa eva piban api amṛtam mṛtaḥ

original: MSS_4926-1 āpadyunmārgagamane kāryakālātyayeṣu ca /
analyzed: āpadi unmārga gamane kārya kāla atyayeṣu ca

original: MSS_4926-2 apṛṣṭo'pi hitānveṣī brūyāt kalyāṇabhāṣitam //
analyzed: apṛṣṭaḥ api hita anveṣī brūyāt kalyāṇa bhāṣitam

original: MSS_4927-1 āpannamahitaṃ dṛṣṭvā na dūyeta kadācana /
analyzed: āpanna mahitam dṛṣṭvā na dūyeta kadācana

original: MSS_4927-2 tadunmūlanakālo'yaṃ vidhinā nanu sūcitaḥ //
analyzed: tad unmūlana kālaḥ yam vidhinā nanu sūcitaḥ

original: MSS_4928-1 āpannayā sannagirā vepamānorumūlayā /
analyzed: āpannayā sanna girā vepamāna ūru mūlayā

original: MSS_4928-2 jāto me jarayā sārdhaṃ navavadhveva saṃgamaḥ //
analyzed: jātaḥ me jarayā sārdham nava vadhvā iva saṃgamaḥ

original: MSS_4929-1 āpannavatsala jagajjanataikabandho vidvanmarālakamalākara rāmacandra /
analyzed: āpanna vatsala jagat janatā eka bandho vidvas marāla kamala ākara rāmacandra

original: MSS_4929-2 janmādikarmavidhuraiḥ sumanaścakorair ācamyatāṃ tava yaśaḥ śaradāṃ sahasram //
analyzed: janma ādi karma vidhuraiḥ sumanaḥ cakoraiḥ ācamyatām tava yaśaḥ śaradām sahasram

original: MSS_4930-1 āpannāśāya vibudhaiḥ kartavyāḥ suhṛdo'malāḥ /
analyzed: āpanna āśāya vibudhaiḥ kartavyāḥ suhṛdaḥ amalāḥ

original: MSS_4930-2 na taratyāpadaṃ kaścid yo'tra mitravivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: na tarati āpadam kaścid mitra vivarjitaḥ

original: MSS_4931-1 āpanno'smi śaraṇyo'smi sarvāvasthāsu sarvadā /
analyzed: āpannaḥ asmi śaraṇyaḥ asmi sarva avasthāsu sarvadā

original: MSS_4931-2 bhagavaṃstvāṃ prapanno'smi rakṣa māṃ śaraṇāgatam //
analyzed: bhagavan tvām prapannaḥ asmi rakṣa mām śaraṇa āgatam

original: MSS_4932-1 āpanmūlaṃ khalu yuvatayas tannimitto'vamānas tāsāṃ yāvat salilalaharībhaṅguraḥ pakṣapātaḥ /
analyzed: āpad mūlam khalu yuvatayaḥ tad nimitta ūvamānaḥ tāsām yāvat salila laharī bhaṅguraḥ pakṣapātaḥ

original: MSS_4932-2 apyevaṃ bho pariṇataśaraccandrabimbābhirāmaṃ dūrīkartuṃ vadanakamalaṃ nālamasmatpriyāyāḥ //
analyzed: api evam bho pariṇata śarad candra bimba abhirāmam dūrīkartum vadana kamalam na alam asmad priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_4933-1 ā paritoṣād viduṣāṃ na sādhu manye prayogavijñānam /
analyzed: ā paritoṣāt viduṣām na sādhu manye prayoga vijñānam

original: MSS_4933-2 balavadapi śikṣitānām ātmanyapratyayaṃ cetaḥ //
analyzed: balavat api śikṣitānām ātmani apratyayam cetaḥ

original: MSS_4934-1 āpaskārāllūnagātrasya bhūmiṃ niḥsādhāraṃ gacchato'vāṅmukhasya /
analyzed: āpaskārāt lūna gātrasya bhūmim niḥsādhāram gacchataḥ vāc mukhasya

original: MSS_4934-2 labdhāyāmaṃ dantayoryugmameva svaṃ nāgasya prāpaduttambhanatvam //
analyzed: labdha āyāmam dantayoḥ yugmam eva svam nāgasya prāpat uttambhana tvam

original: MSS_4935-1 āpāṭalādharamadhīravilolanetram āmodanirbharitamadbhutakāntipūram /
analyzed: āpāṭalā dharam adhīra vilola netram āmoda nirbharitam adbhuta kānti pūram

original: MSS_4935-2 āvismitāmṛtamanusmṛtilobhanīyam āmudritānanamaho madhuraṃ murāreḥ //
analyzed: āvismita amṛta manusmṛti lobhanīyam āmudrita ānanam ahar madhuram murāreḥ

original: MSS_4936-1 āpāṭalaiḥ prathamamaṅkuritairmayūkhair ahnāṃ patiḥ prathamaśailavihāriṇīnām /
analyzed: āpāṭalaiḥ prathamam aṅkuritaiḥ mayūkhaiḥ ahnām patiḥ prathama śaila vihāriṇīnām

original: MSS_4936-2 so'yaṃ karoti surapuṅgavasundarīṇāṃ karṇeṣu kalpatarupallavabhaṅgalakṣmīm //
analyzed: sā uyam karoti sura puṅgava sundarīṇām karṇeṣu kalpataru pallava bhaṅga lakṣmīm

original: MSS_4937-1 āpāṇigrahaṇādatipraṇayinī kaṇṭhasthitāhaṃ vibhoḥ sarvaireva haripriyeti kamalā so'pyucyate mādhavaḥ /
analyzed: ā pāṇigrahaṇāt ati praṇayinī kaṇṭha sthitā aham vibhoḥ sarvaiḥ eva haripriyā iti kamalā saḥ api ucyate mādhavaḥ

original: MSS_4937-2 no tenāpi dunomi matsutagaṇāḥ padmāsutasyānugā vāṇyetyādhinivāraṇāya satataṃ saṃgīyate vīṇayā //
analyzed: no tena api dunomi mad suta gaṇāḥ padmā sutasya anugāḥ vāṇī etya ādhi nivāraṇāya satatam saṃgīyate vīṇayā

original: MSS_4938-1 āpāṇḍu pīnakaṭhinaṃ vartulaṃ sumanoharam /
analyzed: āpāṇḍu pīna kaṭhinam vartulam su manoharam

original: MSS_4938-2 karairākṛṣyate'tyarthaṃ kiṃ vṛddhairapi saspṛham //
analyzed: karaiḥ ākṛṣyata iti artham kim vṛddhaiḥ api sa spṛham

original: MSS_4939-1 āpāṇḍurāḥ śirasijāstrivalī kapole dantāvalī vigalitā na ca me viṣādaḥ /
analyzed: āpāṇḍurāḥ śirasijāḥ trivalī kapole danta āvalī vigalitā na ca me viṣādaḥ

original: MSS_4939-2 eṇīdṛśo yuvatayaḥ pathi māṃ vilokya tāteti bhāṣaṇaparāḥ khalu vajrapātaḥ //
analyzed: eṇī dṛśaḥ yuvatayaḥ pathi mām vilokya tāta iti bhāṣaṇa parāḥ khalu vajrapātaḥ

original: MSS_4940-1 āpāṇḍurā ca mṛtsnā gorasavarṇaśca bhavati pāṣāṇaḥ /
analyzed: āpāṇḍurā ca mṛtsnā gorasa varṇaḥ ca bhavati pāṣāṇaḥ

original: MSS_4940-2 puruṣārdhe kumudanibho dṛṣṭipathaṃ mūṣako yāti //
analyzed: puruṣa ardhe kumuda nibhaḥ dṛṣṭi patham mūṣakaḥ yāti

original: MSS_4941-1 āpātamātraramaṇīyamatṛptihetuṃ kimpākapākaphalatulyamatho vipāke /
analyzed: āpāta mātra ramaṇīyam atṛpti hetum kimpāka pāka phala tulyam atho vipāke

original: MSS_4941-2 no śāśvataṃ pracuradoṣakaraṃ viditvā pañcendriyārthasukhamarthadhiyastyajanti //
analyzed: no śāśvatam pracura doṣa karam viditvā pañca indriya artha sukham artha dhiyaḥ tyajanti

original: MSS_4942-1 āpātamātrarasike sarasīruhasya kiṃ bījamarpayitumicchasi vāpikāyām /
analyzed: āpāta mātra rasike sarasīruhasya kim bījam arpayitum icchasi vāpikāyām

original: MSS_4942-2 kālaḥ kalirjagadidaṃ na kṛtajñamajñe sthitvā haniṣyati tavaiva mukhasya śobhām //
analyzed: kālaḥ kaliḥ jagat idam na kṛtajñam ajñe sthitvā haniṣyati tava eva mukhasya śobhām

original: MSS_4943-1 āpātamātrasaundaryaṃ kutra nāma na vidyate /
analyzed: āpāta mātra saundaryam kutra nāma na vidyate

original: MSS_4943-2 atyantapratipattyā tu durlabho'laṃkṛto janaḥ //
analyzed: atyanta pratipattyā tu durlabha ulaṃkṛtaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_4944-1 āpātaramaṇīyānāṃ saṃyogānāṃ priyaiḥ saha /
analyzed: āpāta ramaṇīyānām saṃyogānām priyaiḥ saha

original: MSS_4944-2 apathyānāmivānnānāṃ pariṇāmo hi dāruṇaḥ //
analyzed: apathyānām iva annānām pariṇāmaḥ hi dāruṇaḥ

original: MSS_4945-1 āpātālagabhīre majjati nīre nidāghasaṃtaptaḥ /
analyzed: āpātāla gabhīre majjati nīre nidāgha saṃtaptaḥ

original: MSS_4945-2 na spṛśati palvalāmbhaḥ pañjaraśeṣo'pi kuñjaraḥ kvāpi //
analyzed: na spṛśati palvala ambhaḥ pañjara śeṣaḥ api kuñjaraḥ kvāpi

original: MSS_4946-1 āpīnapravisāritoruvikaṭaiḥ paścārdhabhāgairgurur vellatpīvarakambalālasarasadgambhīraghaṇṭākulaḥ /
analyzed: āpīna pravisārita ūru vikaṭaiḥ paśca ardha bhāgaiḥ guruḥ vellat pīvara kambala alasa rasat gambhīra ghaṇṭā ākulaḥ

original: MSS_4946-2 grāmānteṣu navīnasasyahariteṣūddāmacandrātapa- smerāsu kṣaṇadāsu dhenudhavalīvargaḥ parikrāmati //
analyzed: grāma anteṣu navīna sasya hariteṣu uddāma candra ātapa smerāsu kṣaṇadāsu dhenu dhavalī vargaḥ parikrāmati

original: MSS_4947-1 āpīnabhārodvahanaprayatnād gṛṣṭirgurutvād vapuṣo narendraḥ /
analyzed: āpīna bhāra udvahana prayatnāt gṛṣṭiḥ guru tvāt vapuṣaḥ narendraḥ

original: MSS_4947-2 ubhāvalaṃcakraturañcitābhyāṃ tapovanāvṛttipathaṃ gatābhyām //
analyzed: ubhau alaṃcakratuḥ añcitābhyām tapaḥ vana āvṛtti patham gatābhyām

original: MSS_4948-1 āpīyamānamasakṛdbhramarāyamāṇair ambhodharaiḥ sphuritavīcisahasrapatram /
analyzed: āpīyamānam asakṛt bhramarāyamāṇaiḥ ambhodharaiḥ sphurita vīci sahasra patram

original: MSS_4948-2 kṣīrāmburāśimavalokaya śeṣanālam ekaṃ jagattrayasaraḥ pṛthupuṇḍarīkam //
analyzed: kṣīra amburāśim avalokaya śeṣa nālam ekam jagattraya saraḥ pṛthu puṇḍarīkam

original: MSS_4949-1 āpuṅkhāgramamī śarā manasi me magnāḥ samaṃ pañca te nirdagdhaṃ virahāgninā vapuridaṃ taireva sārdhaṃ mama /
analyzed: āpuṅkha agram amī śarāḥ manasi me magnāḥ samam pañca te nirdagdham viraha agninā vapuḥ idam taiḥ eva sārdham mama

original: MSS_4949-2 kaṣṭaṃ kāma nirāyudho'si bhavatā jetuṃ na śakyo jano duḥkhī syāmahameka eva sakalo lokaḥ sukhaṃ jīvatu //
analyzed: kaṣṭam kāma nirāyudhaḥ asi bhavatā jetum na śakyaḥ janaḥ duḥkhī syām aham ekaḥ eva sakalaḥ lokaḥ sukham jīvatu

original: MSS_4950-1 ā puṣpaprasavān manoharatayā viśvāsya viśvaṃ janaṃ haṃho dāḍima tāvadeva sahase vṛddhiṃ svakīyāmiha /
analyzed: ā puṣpa prasavāt manohara tayā viśvāsya viśvam janam haṃho dāḍima tāvat eva sahase vṛddhim svakīyām iha

original: MSS_4950-2 yāvannaiti paropabhogasahatāmeṣā tatastāṃ tathā jñātvā te hṛdayaṃ dvidhā dalati yattenaiva vandyo bhavān //
analyzed: yāvat nā eti para upabhoga saha tām eṣā tatas tām tathā jñātvā te hṛdayam dvidhā dalati yat tena eva vandyaḥ bhavān

original: MSS_4951-1 āpūjitaivāstu girīndrakanyā kiṃ pakṣapātena manobhavasya /
analyzed: āpūjitā evā astu girīndra kanyā kim pakṣapātena manobhavasya

original: MSS_4951-2 yadyasti dūtī sarasoktidakṣā nāthaḥ patet pādatale vadhūnām //
analyzed: yadi asti dūtī sarasa ukti dakṣā nāthaḥ patet pāda tale vadhūnām

original: MSS_4952-1 āpūpayugmaṃ madanassya dhātrā vinirmitaṃ valyupahārahetoḥ /
analyzed: ā apūpa yugmam madanassya dhātrā vinirmitam vali upahāra hetoḥ

original: MSS_4952-2 galladvayaṃ kāntarasātiramyaṃ tasyā mahāsnehabhṛtaṃ vibhāti //
analyzed: galla dvayam kānta rasa ati ramyam tasyāḥ mahā sneha bhṛtam vibhāti

original: MSS_4953-1 āpūritamidaṃ śyāmatamasaṃtamasairalam /
analyzed: āpūritam idam śyāma tamasaṃtamasairalam

original: MSS_4953-2 brahmāṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ bhāti sakajjalakaraṇḍavat //
analyzed: brahmāṇḍa maṇḍalam bhāti sa kajjala karaṇḍa vat

original: MSS_4954-1 āpūrṇaśca kalābhirinduramalo yātaśca rāhormukhaṃ saṃjātaśca ghanāghano jaladharaḥ śīrṇaśca vāyorjavāt /
analyzed: āpūrṇaḥ ca kalābhiḥ induḥ amalaḥ yātaḥ ca rāhoḥ mukham saṃjātaḥ ca ghanāghanaḥ jaladharaḥ śīrṇaḥ ca vāyoḥ javāt

original: MSS_4954-2 nirvṛttaśca phalegrahirdrumavaro dagdhaśca dāvāgninā tvaṃ cūḍāmaṇitāṃ gataśca jagataḥ prāptaśca mṛtyorvaśam //
analyzed: nirvṛttaḥ ca phalegrahiḥ druma varaḥ dagdhaḥ ca dāva agninā tvam cūḍāmaṇi tām gataḥ ca jagataḥ prāptaḥ ca mṛtyoḥ vaśam

original: MSS_4955-1 āpūryamāṇapalitaṃ subhagatvakāmaḥ sārdhaṃ prayāti dayitā palitādhikena /
analyzed: āpūryamāṇa palitam subhaga tva kāmaḥ sārdham prayāti dayitā palita adhikena

original: MSS_4955-2 puṣpekṣaṇatvamapi śaśvadapohya pākaṃ yāti priyo nikaṭameva vilocanena (?) //
analyzed: puṣpa īkṣaṇa tvam api śaśvat apohya pākam yāti priyaḥ nikaṭam eva vilocanena

original: MSS_4956-1 āpūryamāṇamacalapratiṣṭhaṃ samudramāpaḥ praviśanti yadvat /
analyzed: āpūryamāṇam acala pratiṣṭham samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat

original: MSS_4956-2 tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve sa śāntimāpnoti na kāmakāmī //
analyzed: tadvat kāmāḥ yam praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāma kāmī

original: MSS_4957-1 āpūryeta punaḥ sphuracchapharikāsārormibhirvāribhir bhūyo'pi pravibhajyamānanalinaṃ paśyema toyāśayam /
analyzed: āpūryeta punar sphurat śaphari kāsāra ūrmibhiḥ vāribhiḥ bhūyas api pravibhajyamāna nalinam paśyema toyāśayam

original: MSS_4957-2 ityāśāśatatantubaddhahṛdayo naktaṃdinaṃ dīnadhīḥ śuṣyatyātapaśoṣitasya sarasastīre jaratsārasaḥ //
analyzed: iti āśā śata tantu baddha hṛdayaḥ naktaṃdinam dīna dhīḥ śuṣyati ātapa śoṣitasya sarasaḥ tīre jarat sārasaḥ

original: MSS_4958-1 ā pūrvasmād viḍaujaḥkarivamathupayaḥsiktasānorgirīndrād ā ca pratyakpayodhervaruṇavaravadhūnābhiniṣpītavāraḥ /
analyzed: ā pūrvasmāt viṣ aujaḥ kari vamathu payaḥ sikta sānoḥ giri indrāt ā ca pratyak payodheḥ varuṇa vara vadhū nābhi niṣpīta vāraḥ

original: MSS_4958-2 ā merorā ca setoravanitalamilanmaulivisraṃsamāna- sragdāmāno yadīyaṃ caraṇamaśaraṇāḥ paryupāsannarendrāḥ //
analyzed: ā meroḥ ā ca setoḥ avani tala milat mauli visraṃsamāna sraj dāmānaḥ yadi iyam caraṇam aśaraṇāḥ paryupāsan narendrāḥ

original: MSS_4959-1 āpṛcchante malayajatarūnāśvasantyetya vallīr ābhāṣante ciraparicitān mālayān nirjharaughān /
analyzed: āpṛcchante malayaja tarūn āśvasanti etya vallīḥ ābhāṣante cira paricitān mālayān nirjhara oghān

original: MSS_4959-2 adya sthitvā draviḍamahilāmandire śvaḥ prabhāte prasthātāro malayamarutaḥ kurvate saṃvidhānam //
analyzed: adya sthitvā draviḍa mahilā mandire śvas prabhāte prasthātāraḥ malaya marutaḥ kurvate saṃvidhānam

original: MSS_4960-1 āpṛcchasva sakhīṃ namaskuru gurūn nandasva bandhustriyaḥ kāverītaṭasaṃniviṣṭanayane mugdhe kimuttāmyasi /
analyzed: āpṛcchasva sakhīm namaskuru gurūn nandasva bandhu striyaḥ kāverī taṭa saṃniviṣṭa nayane mugdhe kim uttāmyasi

original: MSS_4960-2 āste subhru samīpa eva bhavanādelālatāliṅgita- nyañcattīratamāladanturadarī tatrāpi godāvarī //
analyzed: āste subhru samīpe eva bhavanāt elā latā āliṅgita nyañcat tīra tamāla dantura darī tatra api godāvarī

original: MSS_4961-1 āpṛṣṭāsi vinirgato'dhvagajanastanvaṅgi gacchāmyahaṃ svalpaireva dinaiḥ samāgama iti jñātvā śucaṃ mā kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: āpṛṣṭā asi vinirgataḥ adhvaga janaḥ tanvaṅgi gacchāmi aham su alpaiḥ eva dinaiḥ samāgamaḥ iti jñātvā śucam mā kṛthāḥ

original: MSS_4961-2 ityākarṇya vacaḥ priyasya sahasā tanmugdhayā ceṣṭitaṃ yenākāṇḍasamāptatīvravirahakleśaḥ kṛto vallabhaḥ //
analyzed: iti ākarṇya vacaḥ priyasya sahasā tat mugdhayā ceṣṭitam yena akāṇḍa samāpta tīvra viraha kleśaḥ kṛtaḥ vallabhaḥ

original: MSS_4962-1 āpṛṣṭāsi vyathayati mano durbalā vāsaraśrīr ehyāliṅga kṣapaya rajanīmekikā cakravāki /
analyzed: āpṛṣṭā asi vyathayati manaḥ durbalā vāsara śrīḥ ehi āliṅga kṣapaya rajanīmekikā cakravāki

original: MSS_4962-2 nānyāsakto na khalu kupito nānurāgacyuto vā daivāyattastadiha bhavatīmasvatantrastyajāmi //
analyzed: na anya āsaktaḥ na khalu kupitaḥ na anurāga cyutaḥ vā daiva āyattaḥ tat iha bhavatīm asvatantraḥ tyajāmi

original: MSS_4963-1 āpedire'mbarapathaṃ paritaḥ pataṅgā bhṛṅgā rasālamukulāni samāśrayanti /
analyzed: āpedire imbara patham paritas pataṅgāḥ bhṛṅgāḥ rasāla mukulāni samāśrayanti

original: MSS_4963-2 saṃkocamañcati saras tvayi dīnadīno mīno nu hanta katamāṃ gatimabhyupaitu //
analyzed: saṃkocam añcati saraḥ tvayi dīna dīnaḥ mīnaḥ nu hanta katamām gatim abhyupaitu

original: MSS_4964-1 āpo vastraṃ tilāstailaṃ gandho vā sayavā tathā /
analyzed: āpaḥ vastram tilāḥ tailam gandhaḥ vā sa yavā tathā

original: MSS_4964-2 puṣpāṇāmadhivāsena tathā saṃsargajā guṇāḥ //
analyzed: puṣpāṇām adhivāsena tathā saṃsarga jāḥ guṇāḥ

original: MSS_4965-1 āpo vimuktāḥ kvacid āpa eva kvacin na kiṃcid garalaṃ kvacicca /
analyzed: āpaḥ vimuktāḥ kvacid āpaḥ eva kvacid na kiṃcid garalam kvacid ca

original: MSS_4965-2 yasmin vimuktāḥ prabhavanti muktāḥ payoda tasmin vimukhaḥ kutas tvam //
analyzed: yasmin vimuktāḥ prabhavanti muktāḥ payoda tasmin vimukhaḥ kutas tvam

original: MSS_4966-1 āpośanaṃ cāsanaṃ ca tailābhyaṅgaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: ca āsanam ca taila abhyaṅgam tathā eva ca

original: MSS_4966-2 svayaṃ karakṛtaṃ caiva āyuḥśrīputranāśanam //
analyzed: svayam kara kṛtam ca eva āyuḥ śrī putra nāśanam

original: MSS_4967-1 āpośanamakṛtvā tu yaścānnaṃ parimardayet /
analyzed: āpośanam a kṛtvā tu yaḥ ca annam parimardayet

original: MSS_4967-2 marditaṃ cāpi taccānnam amedhyaṃ manurabravīt //
analyzed: marditam ca api tat ca annam amedhyam manuḥ abravīt

original: MSS_4968-1 āptavākyamanādṛtya darpeṇācaritaṃ yadi /
analyzed: āpta vākyam an ādṛtya darpeṇa ācaritam yadi

original: MSS_4968-2 phalitaṃ viparītaṃ tat kā tatra paridevanā //
analyzed: phalitam viparītam tat kā tatra paridevanā

original: MSS_4969-1 āptasya cāptastasyātas tasyāpyāpto'sti kaścana /
analyzed: āptasya ca āptaḥ tasya atas tasya api āptaḥ asti kaścana

original: MSS_4969-2 suguptamapi mantraṃ hi bhinattyāptaparaṃparā //
analyzed: su guptam api mantram hi bhinatti āpta paraṃparā

original: MSS_4970-1 āptāptasaṃtatermantraṃ saṃrakṣet tatparastu saḥ /
analyzed: āpta āpta saṃtateḥ mantram saṃrakṣet tad paraḥ tu saḥ

original: MSS_4970-2 arakṣyamāṇaṃ mantraṃ hi bhinattyāptaparaṃparā //
analyzed: arakṣyamāṇam mantram hi bhinatti āpta paraṃparā

original: MSS_4971-1 āptvāpyātmavināśaṃ gaṇayati na khalaḥ paravyasanakaṣṭam /
analyzed: āptvā api ātma vināśam gaṇayati na khalaḥ para vyasana kaṣṭam

original: MSS_4971-2 prāyaḥ sahasranāśe samaramukhe nṛtyati kabandhaḥ //
analyzed: prāyas sahasra nāśe samara mukhe nṛtyati kabandhaḥ

original: MSS_4972-1 ā prapadamā śiraskaṃ cāntaḥ kalimalamalīmase vapuṣi /
analyzed: ā prapadam ā śiraskam ca antar kali mala malīmase vapuṣi

original: MSS_4972-2 viphalaṃ gaṅgājalamapi madyaghaṭe darbhamuṣṭiriva //
analyzed: viphalam gaṅgā jalam api madya ghaṭe darbha muṣṭiḥ iva

original: MSS_4973-1 ā prātarghanatṛṣṇayā kavalitaṃ proddaṇḍacaṇḍātapair dagdhaṃ jīvanahānitaḥ kaluṣitaṃ cintābharaiḥ kīlitam /
analyzed: ā prātar ghana tṛṣṇayā kavalitam proddaṇḍa caṇḍa ātapaiḥ dagdham jīvana hānitaḥ kaluṣitam cintā bharaiḥ kīlitam

original: MSS_4973-2 prasnigdhāmṛtadhārayā pratidinaṃ saṃplāvayaṃścātakaṃ tvattaḥ ko'pi na vārivāha bhuvane jāgarti jānīmahe //
analyzed: prasnigdha amṛta dhārayā pratidinam saṃplāvayan cātakam tvattaḥ kaḥ api na vārivāha bhuvane jāgarti jānīmahe

original: MSS_4974-1 ābaddhakṛtrimasaṭājaṭilāṃsabhittir āropito yadi padaṃ mṛgavairiṇaḥ śvā /
analyzed: ābaddha kṛtrima saṭā jaṭila aṃsa bhittiḥ āropitaḥ yadi padam mṛga vairiṇaḥ śvā

original: MSS_4974-2 mattebhakumbhataṭapāṭanalampaṭasya nādaṃ kariṣyati kathaṃ hariṇādhipasya //
analyzed: matta ibha kumbha taṭa pāṭana lampaṭasya nādam kariṣyati katham hariṇādhipasya

original: MSS_4975-1 ābaddhapadmamukulāñjali yācito mām utsṛjya saṃprati gataḥ kathamaṃśumālī /
analyzed: ābaddha padma mukula añjali yācitaḥ mām utsṛjya saṃprati gataḥ katham aṃśumālī

original: MSS_4975-2 antarniruddhamadhupakvaṇitairitīva svapnāyate sma nalinī niśi labdhanidrā //
analyzed: antar niruddha madhupa kvaṇitaiḥ iti iva svapnāyate sma nalinī niśi labdha nidrā

original: MSS_4976-1 ābaddhabhīmabhṛkuṭīsthapuṭaṃ lalāṭaṃ bibhratparāṅmukhariporvidhutādharoṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: ābaddha bhīma bhṛkuṭī stha puṭam lalāṭam bibhrat parāṅmukha ripoḥ vidhuta adhara uṣṭhaḥ

original: MSS_4976-2 ātmaiva saṃgaramukhe nijamaṇḍalāgra- cchāyāchalādabhimukhastava deva jātaḥ //
analyzed: ātmā eva saṃgara mukhe nija maṇḍala agra chāyā chalāt abhimukhaḥ tava deva jātaḥ

original: MSS_4977-1 ābaddhātikaṭhorai raśmibharaiḥ pīḍitāśmacayaiḥ /
analyzed: ābaddha ati kaṭhoraiḥ raśmi bharaiḥ pīḍita aśma cayaiḥ

original: MSS_4977-2 āmarditāpi caraṇaiḥ paramiha madhuraiva cūrṇitāpi sitā //
analyzed: āmarditā api caraṇaiḥ param iha madhurā eva cūrṇitā api sitā

original: MSS_4978-1 ābaddhā mānuṣāḥ sarve nirbandhāḥ karmaṇordvayoḥ /
analyzed: ābaddhāḥ mānuṣāḥ sarve nirbandhāḥ karmaṇoḥ dvayoḥ

original: MSS_4978-2 daive paruṣakāre ca paraṃ tābhyāṃ na vidyate //
analyzed: daive paruṣakāre ca param tābhyām na vidyate

original: MSS_4979-1 ābaddhya bāhuyugalaṃ bhavanāntarālād dūrīkṛto'pi parisuptajane niśīthe /
analyzed: ābaddhya bāhu yugalam bhavana antarālāt dūrīkṛtaḥ api parisupta jane niśīthe

original: MSS_4979-2 āgatya mandamanugṛhya padau vyaloki dhṛṣṭo mayāpyatibhayāt surate sahāsaḥ //
analyzed: āgatya mandam anugṛhya padau vyaloki dhṛṣṭaḥ mayā api ati bhayāt surate sa hāsaḥ

original: MSS_4980-1 ābadhnat pariveṣamaṇḍalamalaṃ vaktrendubimbād bahiḥ kurvaccampakajṛmbhamāṇakalikākarṇāvataṃsakriyām /
analyzed: ābadhnat pariveṣa maṇḍala malam vaktra indu bimbāt bahis kurvat campaka jṛmbhamāṇa kalikā karṇa avataṃsa kriyām

original: MSS_4980-2 tanvaṅgyāḥ parinṛtyatīva hasatīvotsarpatīvolbaṇaṃ lāvaṇyaṃ lalatīva kāñcanaśilākānte kapolasthale //
analyzed: tanvaṅgyāḥ parinṛtyatī iva hasatī iva utsarpatī iva ulbaṇam lāvaṇyam lalatī iva kāñcana śilā kānte kapola sthale

original: MSS_4981-1 ābālyaṃ patireṣa me jagadidaṃ jānāti tattvaṃ punar bhūmadhye samupāgatā tadapi te vikhyāyate yaḥ patiḥ /
analyzed: ābālyam patiḥ eṣa me jagat idam jānāti tattvam punar bhū madhye samupāgatā tat api te vikhyāyate yaḥ patiḥ

original: MSS_4981-2 vṛddhā nāsya gṛhe vasāmi suciraṃ tiṣṭhan sthirātreti tan- mātsaryādiva rāma bhūpa bhavataḥ kīrtirdigantaṃ gatā //
analyzed: vṛddhā na asya gṛhe vasāmi su ciram tiṣṭhan sthirā atrā iti tat mātsaryāt iva rāma bhūpa bhavataḥ kīrtiḥ diś antam gatā

original: MSS_4982-1 ā bālyaṃ bhavatā samīra katidhā sārdhaṃ mṛṇālīdalaṃ bhuktaṃ kelikathāmṛtairapi tathā nītaṃ rahaḥ sādaram /
analyzed: ā bālyam bhavatā samīra katidhā sārdham mṛṇālī dalam bhuktam keli kathā amṛtaiḥ api tathā nītam rahaḥ sādaram

original: MSS_4982-2 cittāndolanalālanairmṛgadṛśāṃ vakṣaḥsthalāsphālanair bhūyaḥ saprati māṃ vinā tava mano rantuṃ kathaṃ modate //
analyzed: citta āndolana lālanaiḥ mṛga dṛśām vakṣaḥ sthala āsphālanaiḥ bhūyas saprati mām vinā tava manaḥ rantum katham modate

original: MSS_4983-1 ā bālyādapi yo vidāritamadonmattebhakumbhasthalī- sthālīmadhyakavoṣṇaraktarasavanmuktāpulākapriyaḥ /
analyzed: ā bālyāt api yaḥ vidārita mada unmatta ibha kumbha sthalī

original: MSS_4983-2 hastastasya kathaṃ prasarpatu puraḥ kṛcchre'pyavasthāntare gartāvartavivartamānaśaśakaprāṇāpahāre hareḥ //
analyzed: hastaḥ tasya katham prasarpatu puras kṛcchre pi avasthā antare garta āvarta vivartamāna śaśaka prāṇa apahāre hareḥ

original: MSS_4984-1 ā bālyād devabālāḥ suravarasadane kiṃnarīgīyamānaṃ yannāmākarṇya karṇe'maraguruvacanodgītagāthānibaddham /
analyzed: ā bālyāt deva bālāḥ suravara sadane kiṃnarī gīyamānam yat nāma ākarṇya karṇa imara guru vacana udgīta gāthā nibaddham

original: MSS_4984-2 dānaudāryāḍhyaśauryādvayavimalaguṇaṃ sarvabhogaikasāraṃ bhartāraṃ kāmayantyo hariharagṛhiṇīpādamārādhayanti //
analyzed: dāna audārya āḍhya śaurya advaya vimala guṇam sarva bhoga eka sāram bhartāram kāmayantyaḥ hari hara gṛhiṇī pādam ārādhayanti

original: MSS_4985-1 ābālyādhigamān mayaiva gamitaḥ koṭiṃ parāmunnater asmatsaṃkathayaiva pārthivasutaḥ saṃpratyasau lajjate /
analyzed: ā bālya adhigamāt mayā eva gamitaḥ koṭim parām unnateḥ asmad saṃkathayā eva pārthiva sutaḥ saṃprati asau lajjate

original: MSS_4985-2 itthaṃ khinna ivātmajena yaśasā dattāvalambo'mbudher yātas tīratapovanāni bhavato vṛddho guṇānāṃ gaṇaḥ //
analyzed: ittham khinnaḥ iva ātmajena yaśasā datta avalamba umbudheḥ yātaḥ tīra tapovanāni bhavataḥ vṛddhaḥ guṇānām gaṇaḥ

original: MSS_4986-1 ābāhūdgatamaṇḍalāgrarucayaḥ saṃnaddhavakṣaḥsthalāḥ soṣmāṇo vraṇino vipakṣahṛdayapronmāthinaḥ karkaśāḥ /
analyzed: ā bāhu udgata maṇḍala agra rucayaḥ saṃnaddha vakṣaḥ sthalāḥ sa ūṣmāṇaḥ vraṇinaḥ vipakṣa hṛdaya pronmāthinaḥ karkaśāḥ

original: MSS_4986-2 utsṛṣṭāmbaradṛṣṭavigrahabharā yasya smarāgresarā mārā māravadhūstanāśca na dadhuḥ kṣobhaṃ sa vo'vyājjinaḥ //
analyzed: utsṛṣṭa ambara dṛṣṭa vigraha bharāḥ yasya smara agresarāḥ mārāḥ māra vadhū stanāḥ ca na kṣobham sa vovyāt jinaḥ

original: MSS_4987-1 ābrahmakīṭāntamidaṃ nibaddhaṃ puṃstrīprayogena jagat samastam /
analyzed: ā brahma kīṭa antam idam nibaddham pum strī prayogena jagat samastam

original: MSS_4987-2 vrīḍātra kā yatra caturmukhatvam īśo'pi lobhād gamito yuvatyāḥ //
analyzed: vrīḍā atra kā yatra caturmukha tvam īśaḥ api lobhāt gamitaḥ yuvatyāḥ

original: MSS_4988-1 ābhaṅgurāgrabahuguṇa- dīrghāsvādapradā priyādṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: dīrgha āsvāda pradā

original: MSS_4988-2 karṣati mano madīyaṃ hradamīnaṃ baḍiśarajjuriva //
analyzed: karṣati manaḥ madīyam hrada mīnam baḍiśa rajjuḥ iva

original: MSS_4989-1 ābharaṇasyābharaṇaṃ prasādhanavidheḥ prasādhanaviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: ābharaṇasya ābharaṇam prasādhana vidheḥ prasādhana viśeṣaḥ

original: MSS_4989-2 upamānasyāpi sakhe pratyupamānaṃ vapus tasyāḥ //
analyzed: upamānasya api sakhe pratyupamānam vapuḥ tasyāḥ

original: MSS_4990-1 ābhāti candrarahitā na kadāpi rātriś candro'pi rātrirahito gatakāntireva /
analyzed: ābhāti candra rahitā na kadāpi rātriḥ candraḥ api rātri rahitaḥ gata kāntiḥ eva

original: MSS_4990-2 kiṃ kāraṇaṃ yadanayoḥ pratimāsameko jāto nirantaratayā parirambhayogaḥ //
analyzed: kim kāraṇam yat anayoḥ pratimāsam ekaḥ jātaḥ nirantara tayā parirambha yogaḥ

original: MSS_4991-1 ābhāti dhūsarataraṃ timiraṃ purastād antaḥsphuradviralatārakabhārametat /
analyzed: ābhāti dhūsarataram timiram purastāt antar sphurat virala tāraka bhāram etat

original: MSS_4991-2 dagdhuṃ viyogivipinaṃ sitaraśmivahner dhūmo jvaliṣyata ivānugatasphuliṅgaḥ //
analyzed: dagdhum viyogi vipinam sita raśmi vahneḥ dhūmaḥ jvaliṣyate iva anugata sphuliṅgaḥ

original: MSS_4992-1 ābhāti bālikeyaṃ pāṇisparśena pulakitāvayavā /
analyzed: ābhāti bālikā iyam pāṇi sparśena pulakita avayavā

original: MSS_4992-2 abhinavavasantasaṅgād āvirmukuleva bālacūtalatā //
analyzed: abhinava vasanta saṅgāt āvis mukulā iva bāla cūta latā

original: MSS_4993-1 ābhāti romarājiś caladalikulakomalā viśālākṣyāḥ /
analyzed: ābhāti romarājiḥ calat ali kula komalā viśāla akṣyāḥ

original: MSS_4993-2 nābhīvivarāntargata- madanānaladhūmalekheva //
analyzed: nābhī vivara antargata madana anala dhūma lekhā iva

original: MSS_4994-1 ābhāti śobhātiśayaprapañcād eṇīdṛśo'syā ramaṇīyaśobhā /
analyzed: ābhāti śobhā atiśaya prapañcāt eṇī dṛśā usyāḥ ramaṇīya śobhā

original: MSS_4994-2 veṇī lasatkuntaladhoraṇīnāṃ śreṇīva kiṃ cāruharinmaṇīnām //
analyzed: veṇī lasat kuntala dhoraṇīnām śreṇī iva kim cāru harinmaṇīnām

original: MSS_4995-1 ābhātyetad dvicandraṃ viyadapi nikhilaṃ hantinastu tridantā gaṅgāpūraścaturdhā pravilasati lasatpañcadantaḥ karīndraḥ /
analyzed: ābhāti etat dvi candram viyat api nikhilam hantinaḥ tu tridantāḥ gaṅgā pūraḥ caturdhā pravilasati lasat pañca dantaḥ karīndraḥ

original: MSS_4995-2 ṣaḍvaktraḥ (saptavaktraḥ)
analyzed: ṣaṣ vaktraḥ sapta vaktraḥ

original: pariṇamati tathā ṣaṅguṇāḥ saptasaṃkhyāḥ śaṅke tvatkīrtimūrtyā navamiva jagadālakṣyate kṣoṇipāla //
analyzed: pariṇamati tathā ṣaṅguṇāḥ sapta saṃkhyāḥ śaṅke tvad kīrti mūrtyā navam iva jagat ālakṣyate kṣoṇipāla

original: MSS_4996-1 ābhicārikahomaistu mantraiḥ ṣaṭkarmasādhakaḥ /
analyzed: ābhicārika homaiḥ tu mantraiḥ ṣaṭkarma sādhakaḥ

original: MSS_4996-2 yantralekhanakairugrair upāṃśujapanādibhiḥ //
analyzed: yantra lekhanakaiḥ ugraiḥ upāṃśu japana ādibhiḥ

original: MSS_4997-1 ābhimukhyadaśāmātrād ādarśa iva sajjanaḥ /
analyzed: ābhimukhya daśā mātrāt ādarśaḥ iva sat janaḥ

original: MSS_4997-2 śīghraṃ raktamaraktaṃ vā gṛhṇāti svaprasādataḥ //
analyzed: śīghram raktam a raktam vā gṛhṇāti sva prasādataḥ

original: MSS_4998-1 ābhīradārakamudañcitakiṃkiṇīkam ātāmrapāṇicaraṇaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam /
analyzed: ābhīra dārakam udañcita kiṃkiṇīkam ātāmra pāṇi caraṇam puruṣam purāṇam

original: MSS_4998-2 mañjīramañjumaruṇādharamambujākṣam advaitacinmayamanādimanantamīḍe //
analyzed: mañjīra mañjum aruṇa adharam ambuja akṣam advaita cit mayam anādim anantam īḍe

original: MSS_4999-1 ābhīranāryāḥ karamādadhāno na śaṅkase mādhava kiṃ bravīṣi /
analyzed: ābhīra nāryāḥ karam ādadhānaḥ na śaṅkase mādhava kim bravīṣi

original: MSS_4999-2 pallīpatir ballavavallabhāyāḥ karagrahe kiṃ vidadhīta śaṅkām //
analyzed: pallī patiḥ ballava vallabhāyāḥ karagrahe kim vidadhīta śaṅkām

original: MSS_5000-1 ābhīrādigiraḥ kāvyeṣv aprabhraṃśa iti smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: ābhīra ādi giraḥ kāvyeṣu aprabhraṃśaḥ iti smṛtāḥ

original: MSS_5000-2 śāstreṣu saṃskṛtādanyad apabhraṃśatayoditam //
analyzed: śāstreṣu saṃskṛtāt anyat apabhraṃśa tayā uditam

original: MSS_5001-1 ābhugnāṅgulipallavau kacabhare vyāpārayantī karau bandhotkarṣanibaddhamānasatayā śūnyāṃ dadhānā dṛśam /
analyzed: ābhugna aṅguli pallavau kaca bhare vyāpārayantī karau bandha utkarṣa nibaddha mānasa tayā śūnyām dadhānā dṛśam

original: MSS_5001-2 bāhūtkṣepasamunnate stanataṭeparyastacīnāṃśukā hrīsaṅkocitabāhumūlasubhagaṃ badhnāti jūṭiṃ vadhūḥ //
analyzed: bāhu utkṣepa samunnate stana taṭe paryasta cīna aṃśukā hrī saṅkocita bāhumūla subhagam badhnāti jūṭim vadhūḥ

original: MSS_5002-1 ābhujyendradiśaṃ kuberakakubhaṃ svāśliṣya gāḍhaṃ karair ācumbyāmbujinīṃ samaṃ kumudinīmullāsya tāṃ dakṣiṇām /
analyzed: ābhujya indra diśam kubera kakubham su āśliṣya gāḍham karaiḥ ācumbya ambujinīm samam kumudinīm ullāsya tām dakṣiṇām

original: MSS_5002-2 eṣo'dyāpi parārucirvijayate rātrīśvaro drāgiti krodhādeva layaṃ jagāma caturastārāgaṇaḥ sarvataḥ //
analyzed: eṣā udyā api para aruciḥ vijayate rātrīśvaraḥ drāk iti krodhāt eva layam jagāma caturaḥ tārā gaṇaḥ sarvatas

original: MSS_5003-1 ābhogaḥ stanayormahatyatimahān muktāsrajaṃ bhāsuro māhātmyāvahitaprabhūtasumanobāṇo'pi te'ntaḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: ābhogaḥ stanayoḥ mahatī ati mahān muktā srajam bhāsuraḥ māhātmya avahita prabhūta sumanaḥ bāṇaḥ api sthitaḥ

original: MSS_5003-2 bhālaṃ svacchavirocanaṃ balirasāvapyāsta evodare romṇāṃ vikriyayā yuvatvabhavayā vindhyāvalī vartate //
analyzed: bhālam svaccha virocanam baliḥ asau api āste eva udare romṇām vikriyayā yuvatva bhavayā vindhya āvalī vartate

original: MSS_5004-1 ābhogabhūṣaṇavatī kucakumbhasaṃpad antarvikāramadhurāṇi vilokitāni /
analyzed: ābhoga bhūṣaṇavatī kuca kumbha saṃpad antar vikāra madhurāṇi vilokitāni

original: MSS_5004-2 aṅgānyanaṅgapiśunāni kulāṅganānāṃ dhīrātmanāmapi manaḥ paritāpayanti //
analyzed: aṅgāni anaṅga piśunāni kula aṅganānām dhīra ātmanām api manaḥ paritāpayanti

original: MSS_5005-1 ābhogaścaikakhaṇḍaḥ syād dvitīyaṃ coccakhaṇḍakam /
analyzed: ābhogaḥ ca eka khaṇḍaḥ syāt dvitīyam ca ucca khaṇḍakam

original: MSS_5005-2 tulyanāmāṅkitaṃ caitad iti madhyamalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: tulya nāma aṅkitam ca etat iti madhyama lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_5006-1 ābhoginaḥ kimapi samprati vāsarānte saṃpannaśālikhalapallavitopaśalyāḥ /
analyzed: ābhoginaḥ kim api samprati vāsara ante saṃpanna śāli khala pallavita upaśalyāḥ

original: MSS_5006-2 grāmāstuṣārabharabandhuragomayāgni- dhūmāvalīvalayamekhalino haranti //
analyzed: grāmāḥ tuṣāra bhara bandhura gomaya agni dhūma āvalī valaya mekhalinaḥ haranti

original: MSS_5007-1 ābhoginetraparivartanavibhrameṇa mūrtyā nitambavalanākulatāṃ vahantyā /
analyzed: ābhogi netra parivartana vibhrameṇa mūrtyā nitamba valana ākula tām vahantyā

original: MSS_5007-2 yasyāśanairaviralotkalikākalāpa- paryākulaṃ hṛdayamambunidhirmamantha //
analyzed: yasya aśanaiḥ avirala utkalikā kalāpa paryākulam hṛdayam ambunidhiḥ mamantha

original: MSS_5008-1 ābhoginau maṇḍalinau tatkṣaṇonmuktakañcukau /
analyzed: ābhoginau maṇḍalinau tad kṣaṇa unmukta kañcukau

original: MSS_5008-2 varamāśīviṣau spṛṣṭau na tu tanvyāḥ payodharau //
analyzed: varam āśīviṣau spṛṣṭau na tu tanvyāḥ payodharau

original: MSS_5009-1 ābhoge ca padaikaṃ syāt kiṃciduccaṃ dvitīyakam /
analyzed: ābhoge ca pada ekam syāt kiṃcid uccam dvitīyakam

original: MSS_5009-2 prabhunāmāṅkitaṃ caitat kaniṣṭhasyeti lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: prabhu nāma aṅkitam ca etat kaniṣṭhasya iti lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_5010-1 ābhyantarād bhayaṃ rakṣan surakṣed bāhyato bhayam /
analyzed: ābhyantarāt bhayam rakṣan su rakṣet bāhyatas bhayam

original: MSS_5010-2 ābhyantarād bhayaṃ jātaṃ sadyo mūlaṃ nikṛntati //
analyzed: ābhyantarāt bhayam jātam sadyas mūlam nikṛntati

original: MSS_5011-1 ābhyāṃ kucābhyāmibhakumbhayoḥ śrīr ādīyate'sāvanayorna tābhyām /
analyzed: ābhyām kucābhyām ibha kumbhayoḥ śrīḥ ādīyate saḥ avanayoḥ na tābhyām

original: MSS_5011-2 bhayena gopāyitamauktikau tau pravyaktamuktābharaṇāvimau yat //
analyzed: bhayena gopāyita mauktikau tau pravyakta muktā ābharaṇau imau yat

original: MSS_5012-1 āmaṃ vipacyamānaṃ ca samyak pakvaṃ ca yo bhiṣak /
analyzed: āmam vipacyamānam ca samyak pakvam ca yaḥ bhiṣak

original: MSS_5012-2 jānīyāt sa bhaved vaidyaḥ śeṣas taskaravṛttayaḥ //
analyzed: jānīyāt sa bhavet vaidyaḥ śeṣaḥ taskara vṛttayaḥ

original: MSS_5013-1 āmattabhramarakulākulāni dhunvann uddhūtagrathitarajāṃsi paṅkajāni /
analyzed: āmatta bhramara kula ākulāni dhunvan uddhūta grathita rajāṃsi paṅkajāni

original: MSS_5013-2 kāntānāṃ gagananadītaraṅgaśītaḥ saṃtāpaṃ viramayati sma mātariśvā //
analyzed: kāntānām gagana nadī taraṅga śītaḥ saṃtāpam viramayati sma mātariśvā

original: MSS_5014-1 āmattānāṃ śravaṇasubhagaiḥ kūjitaiḥ kokilānāṃ sānukrośaṃ manasijarujaḥ sahyatāṃ pṛcchateva /
analyzed: āmattānām śravaṇa subhagaiḥ kūjitaiḥ kokilānām sa anukrośam manasija rujaḥ sahyatām pṛcchatā iva

original: MSS_5014-2 aṅge cūtaprasavasurabhirdakṣiṇo māruto me sāndrasparśaḥ karatala iva vyāpṛto mādhavena //
analyzed: aṅge cūta prasava surabhiḥ dakṣiṇaḥ mārutaḥ me sāndra sparśaḥ kara tale iva vyāpṛtaḥ mādhavena

original: MSS_5015-1 ā madhyāhnaṃ nadīvāsaḥ samāje devatārcanam /
analyzed: ā madhyāhnam nadī vāsaḥ samāje devatā arcanam

original: MSS_5015-2 satataṃ śuciveṣaścety etad dambhasya jīvitam //
analyzed: satatam śuci veṣaḥ ca iti etat dambhasya jīvitam

original: MSS_5016-1 āmantraṇajayaśabdaiḥ pratipadahuṃkāraghargharārāvaiḥ /
analyzed: āmantraṇa jaya śabdaiḥ pratipada huṃkāra gharghara ārāvaiḥ

original: MSS_5016-2 svayamuktasādhuvādair antarayati gāyano gītam //
analyzed: svayam ukta sādhuvādaiḥ antarayati gāyanaḥ gītam

original: MSS_5017-1 āmantraṇā surabhiṇā marutā kṛtādau dattaṃ phalaṃ ca purataḥ kaṭukaṇṭakākhyam /
analyzed: āmantraṇā surabhiṇā marutā kṛta ādau dattam phalam ca puratas kaṭukaṇṭaka ākhyam

original: MSS_5017-2 bhagnaṃ mukhaṃ vimukhatā ca tataḥ śukānāṃ rājñāṃ puraḥ panasa kīrtiriyaṃ tavaiva //
analyzed: bhagnam mukham vimukha tā ca tatas śukānām rājñām puras panasa kīrtiḥ iyam tava eva

original: MSS_5018-1 āmantraṇotsavā viprā gāvo navatṛṇotsavāḥ /
analyzed: āmantraṇa utsavāḥ viprāḥ gāvaḥ nava tṛṇa utsavāḥ

original: MSS_5018-2 patyutsāhayutā nāryaḥ ahaṃ kṛṣṇa raṇotsavaḥ //
analyzed: pati utsāha yutāḥ nāryaḥ aham kṛṣṇa raṇa utsavaḥ

original: MSS_5019-1 āmantrya tena deva tvāṃ tadvaiyarthyaṃ samarthaye /
analyzed: āmantrya tena deva tvām tad vaiyarthyam samarthaye

original: MSS_5019-2 śapathaḥ karkaśodarkaḥ satyaṃ satyo'pi daivataḥ //
analyzed: śapathaḥ karkaśa udarkaḥ satyam satyaḥ api daivataḥ

original: MSS_5020-1 āmanthinīkalaśa eṣa sadugdhasindhur vetraṃ ca vāsukirayaṃ girireṣa manthaḥ /
analyzed: āmanthinī kalaśaḥ eṣa sa dugdha sindhuḥ vetram ca vāsukiḥ ayam giriḥ eṣa manthaḥ

original: MSS_5020-2 saṃpratyupoḍhamadamantharabāhudaṇḍa- kaṇḍūyanāvasara eva surāsurāṇām //
analyzed: saṃpratyupoḍha mada manthara bāhu daṇḍa kaṇḍūyana avasare eva sura asurāṇām

original: MSS_5021-1 āmayārtiriputrāsa kṣudādau dṛṣṭavaikṛtān /
analyzed: āmaya ārti ripu trāsa kṣudh ādau dṛṣṭa vaikṛtān

original: MSS_5021-2 labdhodayā hrībhayena kṣmāpā ghnantyanuyāyinaḥ //
analyzed: labdha udayāḥ hrī bhayena kṣmāpāḥ ghnanti anuyāyinaḥ

original: MSS_5022-1 ā maraṇādapi virutaṃ kurvāṇāḥ spardhayā saha mayūraiḥ /
analyzed: ā maraṇāt api virutam kurvāṇāḥ spardhayā saha mayūraiḥ

original: MSS_5022-2 kiṃ jānanti varākāḥ kākāḥ kekāravaṃ kartum //
analyzed: kim jānanti varākāḥ kākāḥ kekā ravam kartum

original: MSS_5023-1 āmardayati pāṇibhyāṃ kānte kamalakorake /
analyzed: āmardayati pāṇibhyām kānte kamala korake

original: MSS_5023-2 sindūratilake bālā kastūrītilakaṃ vyadhāt //
analyzed: sindūra tilake bālā kastūrī tilakam vyadhāt

original: MSS_5024-1 āmardya vakṣojayugaṃ nipīya bimbādharaṃ me kabarīṃ vyudasya /
analyzed: āmardya vakṣoja yugam nipīya bimba adharam me kabarīm vyudasya

original: MSS_5024-2 nīvīsamāsannakaro niruddhaḥ svapne vayasyo'dya rahasyaceṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: nīvī samāsanna karaḥ niruddhaḥ svapne rahasya ceṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_5025-1 āmarṣān madanaḥ sadyo dīptaś cetasi jāyate /
analyzed: āmarṣāt madanaḥ sadyas dīptaḥ cetasi jāyate

original: MSS_5025-2 sa vṛddhiṃ nīyate kāmaṃ tasmin dveṣye'pi yoṣitām //
analyzed: sa vṛddhim nīyate kāmam tasmin dveṣye api yoṣitām

original: MSS_5026-1 āmāśayastho hatvāgniṃ sāmo mārgān pidhāpayan /
analyzed: āmāśaya sthaḥ hatvā agnim sāmaḥ mārgān pidhāpayan

original: MSS_5026-2 vidadhāti jvaraṃ doṣas tasmāl laṅghanamācaret //
analyzed: vidadhāti jvaram doṣaḥ tasmāt laṅghanam ācaret

original: MSS_5027-1 āmīlannavanīlanīrajatulāmālambate locanaṃ śaithilyaṃ navamallikāsahacarairaṅgairapi svīkṛtam /
analyzed: āmīlat nava nīla nīraja tulām ālambate locanam śaithilyam nava mallikā sahacaraiḥ aṅgaiḥ api svīkṛtam

original: MSS_5027-2 ālāpādadharaḥ sphuratkalayati preṅkhatpravālopamām ānandaprabhavāśca bāṣpakaṇikā muktāśriyaṃ bibhrati //
analyzed: ālāpāt adharaḥ sphurat kalayati preṅkhat pravāla upamām ānanda prabhavāḥ ca bāṣpa kaṇikāḥ muktā śriyam bibhrati

original: MSS_5028-1 āmīlitanayanānāṃ yat surataraso'nusaṃvidaṃ kurute /
analyzed: āmīlita nayanānām yat surata rasaḥ nu saṃvidam kurute

original: MSS_5028-2 mithunairmitho'vadhāritam arcitamidameva kāmanirvahaṇam //
analyzed: mithunaiḥ mithas vadhāritam arcitam idam eva kāma nirvahaṇam

original: MSS_5029-1 āmīlitālasavivartitatārakākṣīm utkaṇṭhabandhanadaraślathabāhuvallīm /
analyzed: āmīlita alasa vivartita tāraka akṣīm utkaṇṭha bandhana dara ślatha bāhu vallīm

original: MSS_5029-2 prasvedavārikaṇikācitagaṇḍabimbāṃ saṃsmṛtya tāmaniśameti na śāntimantaḥ //
analyzed: prasveda vāri kaṇikā cita gaṇḍa bimbām saṃsmṛtya tām aniśam eti na śāntimantaḥ

original: MSS_5030-1 āmuktaṃ hṛdi mauktikaṃ mṛgadṛśāṃ bhillai radopyādade luṇṭākaiḥ karaṭe'valuṇṭhi piśitaṃ raktaṃ na naktaṃcaraiḥ /
analyzed: āmuktam hṛdi mauktikam mṛga dṛśām bhillaiḥ radaḥ upi ādade luṇṭākaiḥ piśitam raktam na naktaṃcaraiḥ

original: MSS_5030-2 he pārīndra karīndrakumbhadalane bhūto bhavānagraṇīḥ anyatraiva phalopadhānamakhilaṃ haste yaśaste param //
analyzed: he pārīndra karīndra kumbha dalane bhūtaḥ bhavān agraṇīḥ anyatra eva phala upadhānam akhilam haste yaśaḥ te param

original: MSS_5031-1 āmuktapuṣpasurabhīkṛtakeśapāśā muktālatāprahasitastanabhārakhinnāḥ /
analyzed: āmukta puṣpa surabhīkṛta keśapāśāḥ muktā latā prahasita stana bhāra khinnāḥ

original: MSS_5031-2 puṇyena kāntadhavalāyatapakṣmalākṣyo dāsyo nṛṇāmupanamanti balāttaruṇyaḥ //
analyzed: puṇyena kānta dhavala āyata pakṣmala akṣyaḥ dāsyaḥ nṛṇām upanamanti balāt taruṇyaḥ

original: MSS_5032-1 āmuṣmikaihikasukhecchubhirarcanīyaṃ liṅgadvayaṃ purariporadhinābhitīrtham /
analyzed: āmuṣmika aihika sukha icchubhiḥ arcanīyam liṅga dvayam puraripoḥ adhinābhi tīrtham

original: MSS_5032-2 preyaḥkarāgraruhabhāvitacandrarekhaṃ modāya kasya kṛtino na cirāya loke //
analyzed: preyaḥ kara agraruha bhāvita candra rekham modāya kasya kṛtinaḥ na cirāya loke

original: MSS_5033-1 āmūlaṃ kvaciduddhṛtā kvacidapi cchinnā sthalī barhiṣām ānamrā kusumoccayācca sadayākṛṣṭāgraśākhā latā /
analyzed: āmūlam kvacid uddhṛtā kvacid api chinnā sthalī barhiṣām ānamrā kusuma uccayāt ca sa dayā ākṛṣṭa agra śākhā latā

original: MSS_5033-2 ete pūrvavilūnavalkalatayā rūḍhavraṇāḥ śākhinaḥ sadyacchedamamī vahanti samidhāṃ prasyandinaḥ pādapāḥ //
analyzed: ete pūrva vilūna valkala tayā rūḍha vraṇāḥ śākhinaḥ sat yat chedam amī vahanti samidhām prasyandinaḥ pādapāḥ

original: MSS_5034-1 āmūlakaṇṭakitakomalabāhunālam ārdrāṅgulīdalamanaṅganidāghataptaḥ /
analyzed: ā mūla kaṇṭakita komala bāhu nālam ārdra aṅgulī dalam anaṅga nidāgha taptaḥ

original: MSS_5034-2 asyāḥ kareṇa karamākalayāmi kāntam āraktapaṅkajamiva dviradaḥ sarasyāḥ //
analyzed: asyāḥ kareṇa karam ākalayāmi kāntam ārakta paṅkajam iva dviradaḥ sarasyāḥ

original: MSS_5035-1 ā mūlato valitakuntalacārucūḍa- cūrṇālakaprakaralāñchitabhālabhāgaḥ /
analyzed: ā mūlataḥ valita kuntala cāru cūḍa cūrṇa alaka prakara lāñchita bhāla bhāgaḥ

original: MSS_5035-2 kakṣāniveśaniviḍīkṛtanīvireṣa veṣaściraṃ jayati kuntalakāminīnām //
analyzed: kakṣa niveśa niviḍīkṛta nīviḥ eṣa veṣaḥ ciram jayati kuntala kāminīnām

original: MSS_5036-1 ā mūlato vidrumarāgatāmraṃ sapallavāḥ puṣpacayaṃ dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: ā mūlataḥ vidruma rāga tāmram sa pallavāḥ puṣpa cayam dadhānāḥ

original: MSS_5036-2 kurvantyaśokā hṛdayaṃ saśokaṃ nirīkṣyamāṇā navayauvanānām //
analyzed: kurvanti aśokāḥ hṛdayam sa śokam nirīkṣyamāṇāḥ nava yauvanānām

original: MSS_5037-1 āmūlāgraṃ sakalabhuvanaślāghyasaurabhyalīlā- khelaḥ kālāgarutaruvara kvāsti dhanyastvadanyaḥ /
analyzed: āmūlāgram sakala bhuvana ślāghya saurabhya līlā khelaḥ kālāgaru taru vara kva asti dhanyaḥ tvad anyaḥ

original: MSS_5037-2 dūye'pyevaṃ tvayi viracitaṃ vīkṣya saṅgaṃ bhujaṅgaiḥ pratyāsīdatpathikajanatāprāṇaghātaikatānaiḥ //
analyzed: tvayi viracitam vīkṣya saṅgam bhujaṅgaiḥ pratyāsīdat pathika janatā prāṇa ghāta eka tānaiḥ

original: MSS_5038-1 āmūlāgranibaddhakaṇṭakatanurnirgandhapuṣpodgamaś chāyā na śramahāriṇī na ca phalaṃ kṣutkṣāmasaṃtarpaṇam /
analyzed: ā mūla agra nibaddha kaṇṭaka tanuḥ nirgandha puṣpa udgamaḥ chāyā na śrama hāriṇī na ca phalam kṣudh kṣāma saṃtarpaṇam

original: MSS_5038-2 burbūradruma sādhusaṅgarahitastattāvadāstāmaho anyeṣāmapi śākhināṃ phalavatāṃ guptyai vṛtirjāyase //
analyzed: burbūradruma sādhu saṅga rahitaḥ tat tāvat āstām aho anyeṣām api śākhinām phalavatām guptyai vṛtiḥ jāyase

original: MSS_5038A-1 ā mūlād ratnasānormalayavalayitādā ca kūlāt payodher yāvantaḥ santi kāvyapraṇayanapaṭavaste viśaṅkaṃ vadantu /
analyzed: ā mūlāt ratna sānoḥ malaya valayi tādā ca kūlāt payodheḥ yāvantaḥ santi kāvya praṇayana paṭavaḥ te viśaṅkam vadantu

original: MSS_5038A-2 mṛdvīkāmadhyaniryanmasṛṇarasajharīmādhurībh āgyabhājāṃ vācāmācāryatāyāḥ padamanubhavituṃ ko'sti dhanyo madanyaḥ //
analyzed: mṛdvīkā madhya niryat masṛṇa rasa jharī mādhurībhiḥ āgya bhājām vācām ācārya tāyāḥ padam anubhavitum kaḥ asti dhanyaḥ madanyaḥ

original: MSS_5039-1 āmūlāntāt sāyakenāyatena syūte bāhau maṇḍukaśliṣṭamuṣṭeḥ /
analyzed: ā mūla antāt sāyakena āyatena syūte bāhau maṇḍuka śliṣṭa muṣṭeḥ

original: MSS_5039-2 prāpyāsahyāṃ vedanāmastadhairyād apyabhraśyaccarma nānyasya pāṇeḥ //
analyzed: prāpya asahyām vedanām asta dhairyāt api abhraśyat carma na anyasya pāṇeḥ

original: MSS_5040-1 ā mṛtyuto naiva manorathānāṃ anto'sti vijñātamidaṃ mayādya /
analyzed: ā mṛtyutaḥ nā eva manorathānām antaḥ asti vijñātam idam mayā adya

original: MSS_5040-2 manorathāsaktiparasya cittaṃ na jāyate vai paramārthasaṅgi //
analyzed: manoratha āsakti parasya cittam na jāyate vai paramārtha saṅgi

original: MSS_5041-1 āmṛdgantastama iva saraḥsīmni saṃbhūya paṅkaṃ tārāsārthairiva patiśucā phenakaiḥ śliṣṭapādāḥ /
analyzed: āmṛdgantaḥ tamaḥ iva saraḥ sīmni saṃbhūya paṅkam tārā sārthaiḥ iva pati śucā phenakaiḥ śliṣṭa pādāḥ

original: MSS_5041-2 bhrāntyādaṣṭasphuṭabisalatācuñcubhiścañcu cakraiś cakrā bandīkṛtavirahakṛccandralekhā ivaite //
analyzed: bhrānti ādaṣṭa sphuṭa bisa latā cuñcubhiḥ cañcu cakraiḥ cakrāḥ bandīkṛta viraha kṛt candralekhāḥ iva ete

original: MSS_5042-1 āmṛdyante śvasitamaruto yatkucotsedhakampair antardhyānāt truṭati ca dṛśoryadbahirlakṣyalābhaḥ /
analyzed: āmṛdyante śvasita marutaḥ yat kuca utsedha kampaiḥ antar dhyānāt truṭati ca dṛśoḥ yat bahis lakṣya lābhaḥ

original: MSS_5042-2 pakṣmotkṣepavyatikarahato yacca bāṣpas tadete bhāvāścaṇḍi truṭitahṛdayaṃ manyumāvadeyanti //
analyzed: pakṣma utkṣepa vyatikara hataḥ yat ca bāṣpaḥ tat ete bhāvāḥ caṇḍi truṭita hṛdayam manyum āvadeyanti

original: MSS_5043-1 āmṛśadbhirabhito valivīcīr lolamānavitatāṅgulihastaiḥ
analyzed: āmṛśadbhiḥ abhitas vali vīcīḥ lolamāna vitata aṅguli hastaiḥ

original: MSS_5043-2 subhruvāmanubhavāt pratipede muṣṭimeyamiti madhyamabhīṣṭaiḥ //
analyzed: subhruvām anubhavāt pratipede muṣṭim eyam iti madhyam abhīṣṭaiḥ

original: MSS_5044-1 āmṛśya stanamaṇḍalaṃ pratimuhuḥ saṃcumbya gaṇḍasthalīṃ grīvāṃ pratyavalambya saṃbhramabalairāhanyamānaḥ karaiḥ /
analyzed: āmṛśya stana maṇḍalam pratimuhur saṃcumbya gaṇḍa sthalīm grīvām pratyavalambya saṃbhrama balaiḥ āhanyamānaḥ karaiḥ

original: MSS_5044-2 suptasyādrinadīnikuñjagahane mattaḥ payodānilaiḥ karṇānte maśakaḥ kimapyarivadhūsārthasya te jalpati //
analyzed: suptasya adri nadī nikuñja gahane mattaḥ payoda anilaiḥ karṇa ante maśakaḥ kim api ari vadhū sārthasya te jalpati

original: MSS_5045-1 āmerumalayamurvī- valayamalaṅkṛtya kīrtikarpūraiḥ /
analyzed: ā meru malayam urvī valayam alaṅkṛtya kīrti karpūraiḥ

original: MSS_5045-2 maṅgalamāpnuhi nityaṃ guṇamaya jaya jīva yāvadādityam //
analyzed: maṅgalam āpnuhi nityam guṇa maya jaya jīva yāvadādityam

original: MSS_5045A-1 āmodaṃ kumudākareṣu vipadaṃ padmeṣu kālānalaṃ pañceṣorviśikheṣu sāndraśiśirakṣāraṃ śaśigrāvasu /
analyzed: āmodam kumuda ākareṣu vipadam padmeṣu kāla analam pañca iṣoḥ viśikheṣu sāndra śiśira kṣāram śaśi grāvasu

original: MSS_5045A-2 mlāniṃ mānavatīmukheṣu vinayaṃ cetaḥsu vāmabhruvāṃ vṛddhiṃ vārdhiṣu nikṣipannudayate devastamīkāmukaḥ //
analyzed: mlānim mānavatī mukheṣu vinayam cetaḥsu vāma bhruvām vṛddhim vā ṛdhiṣu nikṣipan udayate devaḥ tamī kāmukaḥ

original: MSS_5046-1 āmodavāsitacalādharapallaveṣu nidrākaṣāyitavipāṭalalocaneṣu /
analyzed: āmoda vāsita cala adhara pallaveṣu nidrā kaṣāyita vipāṭala locaneṣu

original: MSS_5046-2 vyāmṛṣṭapatratilakeṣu vilāsinīnāṃ śobhāṃ babandha vadaneṣu madāvaśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: vyāmṛṣṭa patra tilakeṣu vilāsinīnām śobhām babandha vadaneṣu mada avaśeṣaḥ

original: MSS_5047-1 āmodāhṛtabhṛṅgapakṣapavanapreṅkhadrajaḥpiñjare padma śrīrvasatīti nādbhutamidaṃ ramyaṃ prakṛtyaiva tat /
analyzed: āmoda āhṛta bhṛṅga pakṣa pavana preṅkhat rajaḥ piñjare padma śrīḥ vasati iti na adbhutam idam ramyam prakṛtyā eva tat

original: MSS_5047-2 taccitraṃ yadarātikaṇṭharudhirapraklinnatīkṣṇasphurad- dhāre'sau bhavataściraṃ nivasati strītve'pi hṛṣṭā satī //
analyzed: tat citram yat arāti kaṇṭha rudhira praklinna tīkṣṇa sphurat dhārā isau bhavataḥ ciram nivasati strī tve pi hṛṣṭā satī

original: MSS_5048-1 āmodinā samadhunā paridhūsareṇa savyākulabhramavatā patatā purastāt /
analyzed: āmodinā sa madhunā paridhūsareṇa sa vyākula bhramavatā patatā purastāt

original: MSS_5048-2 āyāsitāsmi sakhi tena divāvasāne mattena kiṃ praṇayinā na hi kesareṇa //
analyzed: āyāsitā asmi sakhi tena divā avasāne mattena kim praṇayinā na hi kesareṇa

original: MSS_5049-1 āmodīni sumedurāṇi ca mṛdusvādūni ca kṣmāruhām udyāneṣu vaneṣu labdhajanuṣāṃ santītareṣāmapi /
analyzed: āmodīni su medurāṇi ca mṛdu svādūni ca kṣmāruhām udyāneṣu vaneṣu labdha januṣām santi itareṣām api

original: MSS_5049-2 kiṃtu śrīphalatā tavaiva jayinī mālūra diṅmaṇḍale yasyaitāni phalāni yauvanavatīvakṣojalakṣmīgṛhāḥ //
analyzed: kiṃtu śrīphala tā tava eva jayinī mālūra diś maṇḍale yasya etāni phalāni yauvanavatī vakṣoja lakṣmī gṛhāḥ

original: MSS_5050-1 āmodena kadambakandalabhuvā limpannaśeṣaṃ nabhaḥ prītisphītamayūravṛndanaṭanaprastāvanāpaṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: āmodena kadamba kandala bhuvā limpan aśeṣam nabhaḥ prīti sphīta mayūra vṛnda naṭana prastāvanā paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_5050-2 ambhodaprathamodabinduracanānirmṛṣṭagharmaḥ śanair vāyurvāti bhayaṃkaraḥ pravasatāṃ meghaṃkarāḍambaraḥ //
analyzed: ambhoda prathama udabindu racanā nirmṛṣṭa gharmaḥ śanais vāyuḥ vāti bhayaṃkaraḥ pravasatām meghaṃkara āḍambaraḥ

original: MSS_5051-1 āmodairmaruto mṛgāḥ kisalayollāsais tvacā tāpasāḥ puṣpaiḥ ṣaṭcaraṇāḥ phalaiḥ śakunayo gharmārditāśchāyayā /
analyzed: āmodaiḥ marutaḥ mṛgāḥ kisalaya ullāsaiḥ tvacā tāpasāḥ puṣpaiḥ ṣaṭcaraṇāḥ phalaiḥ śakunayaḥ gharma arditāḥ chāyayā

original: MSS_5051-2 skandhairgandhagajās tvayaiva vihitāḥ sarve kṛtārthās tatas tvaṃ viśvopakṛtikṣamo'si bhavatā bhagnāpado'nye drumāḥ //
analyzed: skandhaiḥ gandha gajāḥ tvayā eva vihitāḥ sarve kṛtārthāḥ tatas tvam viśva upakṛti kṣamaḥ asi bhavatā bhagna āpadaḥ anye drumāḥ

original: MSS_5052-1 āmodais te diśi diśi gatairdūramākṛṣyamāṇāḥ sākṣāl lakṣmīṃ tava malayaja draṣṭumabhyāgatāḥ smaḥ /
analyzed: āmodaiḥ te diśi diśi gataiḥ dūram ākṛṣyamāṇāḥ sākṣāt lakṣmīm tava malayaja draṣṭum abhyāgatāḥ smaḥ

original: MSS_5052-2 kiṃ paśyāmaḥ subhaga bhavataḥ krīḍati kroḍa eva vyālastubhyaṃ bhavatu kuśalaṃ muñca naḥ sādhayāmaḥ //
analyzed: kim paśyāmaḥ subhaga bhavataḥ krīḍati kroḍe eva vyālaḥ tubhyam bhavatu kuśalam muñca naḥ sādhayāmaḥ

original: MSS_5053-1 āmnāyānāmāhāntyā vāg gītīrītīḥ prītīrbhītīḥ /
analyzed: āmnāyānām āha antyā vāc gītīḥ ītīḥ prītīḥ bhītīḥ

original: MSS_5053-2 bhogo rogo modo moho dhyeye dhyecche deśe kṣeme //
analyzed: bhogaḥ rogaḥ modaḥ mohaḥ dhyeye dhyā icche deśe kṣeme

original: MSS_5054-1 āmnāyābhyasanānyaraṇyaruditaṃ kṛcchravratānyanvahaṃ medaśchedapadāni pūrtavidhayaḥ sarve hutaṃ bhasmani /
analyzed: āmnāya abhyasanāni araṇyaruditam kṛcchra vratāni anvaham medaḥ cheda padāni pūrta vidhayaḥ sarve hutam bhasmani

original: MSS_5054-2 tīrthānāmavagāhanāni ca gajasnānaṃ vinā yatpada- dvandvāmbhoruhasaṃstutiṃ vijayate devaḥ sa nārāyaṇaḥ //
analyzed: tīrthānām avagāhanāni ca gajasnānam vinā yat pada dvandva ambhoruha saṃstutim vijayate devaḥ sa nārāyaṇaḥ

original: MSS_5055-1 amnāye smṛtitantre ca lokācāre ca sūribhiḥ /
analyzed: amnāye smṛti tantre ca loka ācāre ca sūribhiḥ

original: MSS_5055-2 śarīrārdhaṃ smṛtā jāyā puṇyāpuṇyaphale samā //
analyzed: śarīra ardham smṛtā jāyā puṇya apuṇya phale samā

original: MSS_5056-1 āmraṃ chittvā kuṭhāreṇa nimbaṃ paricarettu yaḥ /
analyzed: āmram chittvā kuṭhāreṇa nimbam paricaret tu yaḥ

original: MSS_5056-2 yaścainaṃ payasā siñcen naivāsya madhuro bhavet //
analyzed: yaḥ ca enam payasā siñcet na eva asya madhuraḥ bhavet

original: MSS_5057-1 āmra yadyapi gatā divasāste puṣpasaurabhaphalapracurā ye /
analyzed: āmra yadi api gatāḥ divasāḥ te puṣpa saurabha phala pracurāḥ ye

original: MSS_5057-2 hanta saṃprati tathāpi janānāṃ chāyayaiva dalayasyatitāpam //
analyzed: hanta saṃprati tathā api janānām chāyayā eva dalayasi ati tāpam

original: MSS_5058-1 āmrāḥ kiṃ phalabhāranamraśiraso ramyāḥ kimūṣmacchidaḥ sacchāyāḥ kadalīdrumāḥ surabhayaḥ kiṃ puṣpitāścampakāḥ /
analyzed: āmrāḥ kim phala bhāra namra śirasaḥ ramyāḥ kim ūṣma chidaḥ sat chāyāḥ kadalī drumāḥ surabhayaḥ kim puṣpitāḥ campakāḥ

original: MSS_5058-2 etāstā niravagrahograkarabhollīḍhārdharūḍhāḥ punaḥ śamyo bhrāmyasi mūḍha nirmaruti kiṃ mithyaiva martuṃ marau //
analyzed: etāḥ tāḥ niravagraha ugra karabha ullīḍha ardha rūḍhāḥ punar śamyaḥ bhrāmyasi mūḍha nirmaruti kim mithyā eva martum marau

original: MSS_5059-1 āmrāṅkuro'yamaruṇa- śyāmalarucirasthinirgataḥ sutanu /
analyzed: āmra aṅkuraḥ yam aruṇa śyāmala rucira asthi nirgataḥ su tanu

original: MSS_5059-2 navakamaṭhakarparapuṭān mūrdhevordhvaṃ gataḥ sphurati //
analyzed: nava kamaṭha karpara puṭāt mūrdhā iva ūrdhvam gataḥ sphurati

original: MSS_5060-1 āmrīmañjulamañjarīvaraśaraḥ satkiṃśukaṃ yaddhanur jyā yasyālikulaṃ kalaṅkarahitaṃ chatraṃ sitāṃśuḥ sitam /
analyzed: āmrī mañjula mañjarī vara śaraḥ sat kiṃśukam yat dhanuḥ jyā yasya ali kulam kalaṅka rahitam chatram sitāṃśuḥ sitam

original: MSS_5060-2 mattebho malayānilaḥ parabhṛto yadvandino lokajit so'yaṃ vo vitarītarītu vitanurbhadraṃ vasantānvitaḥ //
analyzed: matta ibhaḥ malaya anilaḥ parabhṛtaḥ yad vandinaḥ loka jit saḥ yam vaḥ vitanuḥ bhadram vasanta anvitaḥ

original: MSS_5061-1 āmre pallavite sthitvā kokilā madhurasvaram /
analyzed: āmre pallavite sthitvā kokilāḥ madhura svaram

original: MSS_5061-2 cukūja kāmināṃ cittam ākarṣantīva dūtikā //
analyzed: cukūja kāminām cittam ākarṣantī iva dūtikā

original: MSS_5062-1 āmraiḥ kṣemaṃ bhallā- takairbhayaṃ pīlubhistathārogyam /
analyzed: āmraiḥ kṣemam bhallā takaiḥ bhayam pīlubhiḥ tathā ārogyam

original: MSS_5062-2 khadiraśamībhyāṃ durbhi- kṣamarjunaiḥ śobhanā vṛṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: khadira śamībhyām kṣam arjunaiḥ śobhanā vṛṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_5063-1 āmlena tāmraśuddhiḥ syāc chuddhiḥ kāṃsyasyabhasmanā /
MSS_5063-2 saṃśuddhī rajasā nāryās taṭinyā vegataḥ śuciḥ //
analyzed: saṃśuddhiḥ rajasā nāryāḥ taṭinyāḥ vegataḥ śuciḥ

original: MSS_5064-1 āyaṃ paśyan vyayaṃ kuryāt āyādalpataraṃ vyayam /
analyzed: āyam paśyan vyayam kuryāt āyāt alpataram vyayam

original: MSS_5064-2 āyābhāve vyayaṃ kurvan kubero'pi vinaśyati //
analyzed: āya abhāve vyayam kurvan vinaśyati

original: MSS_5065-1 āyatāgrasitaraśminibaddhaṃ lāñchanacchavimaṣīrasadigdham /
analyzed: āyata agra sita raśmi nibaddham lāñchana chavi maṣī rasa digdham

original: MSS_5065-2 candrakaitavamarutpaṭacakraṃ krīḍayotsṛjati kiṃ smarabālaḥ //
MSS_5066-1 āyatāṅgulirabhūdatiriktaḥ subhruvāṃ kraśimaśālini madhye /
analyzed: āyata aṅguliḥ abhūt atiriktaḥ su bhruvām kraśima śālini madhye

original: MSS_5066-2 śroṇiṣu priyakaraḥ pṛthulāsu sparśamāpa sakalena talena //
analyzed: śroṇiṣu priya karaḥ pṛthulāsu sparśam āpa sakalena talena

original: MSS_5067-1 āyatiṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ tadātvaṃ ca vicārayet /
analyzed: āyatim sarva kāryāṇām tadātvam ca vicārayet

original: MSS_5067-2 atītānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ guṇadoṣau ca tattvataḥ //
analyzed: atītānām ca sarveṣām guṇa doṣau ca tattvataḥ

original: MSS_5068-1 āyatīmiva vidhvastām ājñāṃ pratihatāmiva /
analyzed: āyatīm iva vidhvastām ājñām pratihatām iva

original: MSS_5068-2 dīptāmiva diśaṃ kāle pūjāmapahatāmiva //
analyzed: dīptām iva diśam kāle pūjām apahatām iva

original: MSS_5069-1 āyatyāṃ guṇadoṣajñas tadātve kṣipraniścayaḥ /
analyzed: āyatyām guṇa doṣa jñaḥ tadātve kṣipra niścayaḥ

original: MSS_5069-2 atīte kāryaśeṣajñaḥ śatrubhirnābhibhūyate //
analyzed: atīte kārya śeṣa jñaḥ śatrubhiḥ na abhibhūyate

original: MSS_5070-1 āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca yat syādāsvādapeśalam /
analyzed: āyatyām ca tadātve ca yat syāt āsvāda peśalam

original: MSS_5070-2 tadeva tasya kurvīta na lokadviṣṭamācaret //
analyzed: tat eva tasya kurvīta na loka dviṣṭam ācaret

original: MSS_5071-1 āyatyāṃ pratikārajñas tadātve dṛḍhaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: āyatyām pratikāra jñaḥ tadātve dṛḍha niścayaḥ

original: MSS_5071-2 atīte kāryaśeṣajño naro'rthairna prahīyate //
analyzed: atīte kārya śeṣa jñaḥ naraḥ arthaiḥ na prahīyate

original: MSS_5072-1 āyatyā ca jayedāśām arthaṃ saṅgavivarjanāt /
analyzed: āyatyā ca jayet āśām artham saṅga vivarjanāt

original: MSS_5072-2 anityatvena ca snehaṃ kṣudhaṃ yogena paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: anitya tvena ca sneham kṣudham yogena paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_5073-1 āyadvāreṣu sarveṣu kuryādāptān parīkṣitān /
analyzed: āya dvāreṣu sarveṣu kuryāt āptān parīkṣitān

original: MSS_5073-2 ādadīta dhanaṃ taistu bhāsvānusrairivodakam //
analyzed: ādadīta dhanam taiḥ tu bhāsvān usraiḥ iva udakam

original: MSS_5074-1 āyavyayaṃ sadānuṣṇaṃ chedanaṃ saṃśayasya ca /
analyzed: āya vyayam sadā anuṣṇam chedanam saṃśayasya ca

original: MSS_5074-2 aniśaṃ tasya ca jñānaṃ mantriṇāṃ trividhaṃ phalam //
analyzed: aniśam tasya ca jñānam mantriṇām trividham phalam

original: MSS_5075-1 āyavyaye'nnasaṃskāre gṛhopaskārarakṣaṇe /
analyzed: āya vyaya id na saṃskāre gṛha upaskāra rakṣaṇe

original: MSS_5075-2 śauce'gnikārye saṃyojyāḥ rakṣā strīṇāmiyaṃ smṛtā //
analyzed: śauca igni kārye saṃyojyāḥ rakṣā strīṇām iyam smṛtā

original: MSS_5075A-1 āyavyayau yasya ca saṃvibhaktau channaśca cāro nibhṛtaśca mantraḥ /
analyzed: āya vyayau yasya ca saṃvibhaktau channaḥ ca cāraḥ nibhṛtaḥ ca mantraḥ

original: MSS_5075A-2 na cāpriyaṃ mantriṣu yo bravīti sā sāgarāntāṃ pṛthivīṃ praśāsti //
analyzed: na ca apriyam mantriṣu yaḥ bravīti sā sāgara antām pṛthivīm praśāsti

original: MSS_5076-1 āyastā kalahaṃ pureva kurute na sraṃsane vāsaso bhugnabhrūratikhaṇḍyamānamadharaṃ dhatte na keśagrahe /
analyzed: āyastā kalaham purā iva kurute na sraṃsane vāsasaḥ bhugna bhrūḥ ati khaṇḍyamānam adharam dhatte na keśa grahe

original: MSS_5076-2 aṅgānyarpayati svayaṃ bhavati no vāmā haṭhāliṅgane tanvyā śikṣita eṣa saṃprati punaḥ kopaprakāro'paraḥ //
analyzed: aṅgāni arpayati svayam bhavati no vāmā haṭha āliṅgane tanvyā śikṣitaḥ eṣa saṃprati punar kopa prakāra uparaḥ

original: MSS_5077-1 āyasya tāvadapi karma karotu kaścit tenāpi mātaradhikaṃ kimihānubhāvyam /
analyzed: āyasya tāvat api karma karotu kaścid tena api mātar adhikam kim iha anubhāvyam

original: MSS_5077-2 āste sukhaṃ ya iha bhāratavarṣasīmany āste sa kiṃcidita uttarato'pasṛtya //
analyzed: āste sukham yaḥ iha bhārata varṣa sīmani āste sa kiṃcid itas uttaratas upasṛtya

original: MSS_5078-1 āyasya turyabhāgena vyayakarma pravartayan /
analyzed: āyasya turya bhāgena vyaya karma pravartayan

original: MSS_5078-2 anyūnatailadīpo'pi ciraṃ bhadrāṇi paśyati //
analyzed: anyūna taila dīpaḥ api ciram bhadrāṇi paśyati

original: MSS_5079-1 āyāccaturthabhāgena vyayakarma pravartayet /
analyzed: āyāt caturtha bhāgena vyaya karma pravartayet

original: MSS_5079-2 prabhūtatailadīpo hi ciraṃ bhadrāṇi paśyati //
analyzed: prabhūta taila dīpaḥ hi ciram bhadrāṇi paśyati

original: MSS_5080-1 āyātaṃ māmaparicitayā velayā mandiraṃ te coro daṇḍyas tvamiti madhuraṃ vyāharantyā bhavatyā /
analyzed: āyātam mām aparicitayā velayā mandiram te coraḥ daṇḍyaḥ tvam iti madhuram vyāharantyā bhavatyā

original: MSS_5080-2 mande dīpe madhulavamucāṃ mālayā mallikānāṃ baddhaṃ ceto dṛḍhataramidaṃ bāhubandhacchalena //
analyzed: mande dīpe madhu lava mucām mālayā mallikānām baddham cetaḥ dṛḍhataram idam bāhu bandha chalena

original: MSS_5081-1 āyātaṃ sakhi dayitaṃ cirāt pravāsāt kṣāmāṅgaṃ tava virahānalena taptam /
analyzed: āyātam sakhi dayitam cirāt pravāsāt kṣāma aṅgam tava viraha analena taptam

original: MSS_5081-2 sadyo'muṃ nijamṛdulāṅgasaṅgadānāt saṃtṛptiṃ naya bhava saṃmukhī kimevam //
analyzed: sadyas mum nija mṛdula aṅga saṅga dānāt saṃtṛptim naya bhava saṃmukhī kim evam

original: MSS_5082-1 āyātaḥ kumudeśvaro vijayate sarveśvaro māruto bhṛṅgaḥ sphūrjati bhairavo na nikaṭaṃ prāṇeśvaro muñcati /
analyzed: āyātaḥ kumudeśvaraḥ vijayate sarveśvaraḥ mārutaḥ bhṛṅgaḥ sphūrjati bhairavaḥ na nikaṭam prāṇeśvaraḥ muñcati

original: MSS_5082-2 ete siddharasāḥ prasūnaviśikho vaidyo'navadyotsavo mānavyādhirayaṃ kṛśodari kathaṃ tvaccetasi sthāsyati //
analyzed: ete siddha rasāḥ prasūna viśikhaḥ vaidyaḥ navadya utsavaḥ māna vyādhiḥ ayam kṛśa udari katham tvad cetasi sthāsyati

original: MSS_5083-1 āyātaste samīpaṃ tava guṇavimalān paṇḍito vādakartā kāvye bhavye hi revābhavavigatarase rugyuge rogahartā /
analyzed: āyātaḥ te samīpam tava guṇa vimalān paṇḍitaḥ vāda kartā kāvye bhavye hi revā bhava vigata rase ruj yuge roga hartā

original: MSS_5083-2 nāhaṃ jāne cikitsāṃ sakalaguṇanidhe durdaridratvaroge śrīmadrājārjunendraprabalamapi yate kalpitā sā cikitsā //
analyzed: na aham jāne cikitsām sakala guṇa nidhe dus daridra tva roge śrīmat rāja arjuna indra prabalam api yate kalpitā sā cikitsā

original: MSS_5084-1 āyātāḥ sakhi varṣā varṣādapi yāsu vāsaro dīrghaḥ /
analyzed: āyātāḥ sakhi varṣāḥ varṣāt api yāsu vāsaraḥ dīrghaḥ

original: MSS_5084-2 diśi diśi nīrataraṅgo nīrataraṅgo mamāpi hṛdayeśaḥ //
analyzed: diśi diśi nīra taraṅgaḥ nīra taraṅgaḥ mama api hṛdaya īśaḥ

original: MSS_5085-1 āyātā jaladāvalī sarabhasaṃ vidyutsamāliṅgitā śailānāṃ paritaḥ saśabdamahibhukśreṇī narīnṛtyati /
analyzed: āyātā jalada āvalī sarabhasam vidyut samāliṅgitā śailānām paritas sa śabda mahibhuj śreṇī narīnṛtyati

original: MSS_5085-2 evaṃ satyapi hanta saṃprati patirdeśāntaraṃ prasthitas tad duḥkhaṃ vinivedyatāṃ sakhi kathaṃ kasyādhunāgre mayā //
analyzed: evam sati api hanta saṃprati patiḥ deśa antaram prasthitaḥ tat duḥkham vinivedyatām sakhi katham kasya adhunā agre mayā

original: MSS_5086-1 āyātā madhuyāminī yadi punarnāyāta eva prabhuḥ prāṇā yāntu vibhāvasau yadi punarjanmagrahaṃ prārthaye /
analyzed: āyātā madhuyāminī yadi punar na āyātaḥ eva prabhuḥ prāṇāḥ yāntu vibhāvasau yadi punar janma graham prārthaye

original: MSS_5086-2 vyādhaḥ kokilabandhane vidhuparidhvaṃse ca rāhugrahaḥ kandarpe haranetradīdhitirahaṃ prāṇeśvare manmathaḥ //
analyzed: vyādhaḥ kokila bandhane vidhu paridhvaṃse ca rāhu grahaḥ kandarpe hara netra dīdhitiḥ aham prāṇeśvare manmathaḥ

original: MSS_5087-1 āyātā madhurajanī madhurajanīgītihṛdyeyam /
analyzed: āyātā madhu rajanī madhu rajanī gīti hṛdyā iyam

original: MSS_5087-2 aṅkuritaḥ smaraviṭapī smara viṭa pīnastanīmabalām //
analyzed: aṅkuritaḥ smara viṭapī smara viṭa pīna stanīm abalām

original: MSS_5088-1 āyātā rajanī bhaviṣyati mahāviśleṣadāvānalo nodvegaḥ sahasā kṛśāṅgi manasā kāryo rathāṅgāhvayaḥ /
analyzed: āyātā rajanī bhaviṣyati mahā viśleṣa dāva analaḥ na udvegaḥ sahasā kṛśa aṅgi manasā kāryaḥ rathāṅga āhvayaḥ

original: MSS_5088-2 itthaṃ bāṣpaniruddhagadgadatayā saṃbhāṣya kokīṃ ciraṃ cintāpūrṇamanā vinodavimukho haṃho vidhiṃ nindati //
analyzed: ittham bāṣpa niruddha gadgada tayā saṃbhāṣya kokīm ciram cintā pūrṇa manāḥ vinoda vimukhaḥ haṃho vidhim nindati

original: MSS_5089-1 āyātā ratināyakasya vipinaṃ śrīrādhikābhyāgato daivādeva hariśca tatra caturaśceṭo'pi tatrāgamat /
analyzed: āyātāḥ ratināyakasya vipinam śrī rādhikā abhyāgataḥ daivāt eva hariḥ ca tatra caturaḥ ceṭaḥ api tatra agamat

original: MSS_5089-2 śīghraṃ parvatakandarodaragataṃ lāsyaṃ śikhīnāṃ puraḥ paṃśyāmīti hariṃ nigadya śanakairgehaṃ samabhyāgamat //
analyzed: śīghram parvata kandara udara gatam lāsyam śikhīnām puras paṃśyāmi iti harim nigadya śanakais geham samabhyāgamat

original: MSS_5090-1 āyātāsi vimuñca vepathubharaṃ dṛṣṭāsi kiṃ kenacin nīlaṃ colamamuṃ vimuñca haratu svedaṃ niśīthānilaḥ /
analyzed: āyātā asi vimuñca vepathu bharam dṛṣṭā asi kim kenacid nīlam colam amum vimuñca haratu svedam niśītha anilaḥ

original: MSS_5090-2 ityantarbhayasannakaṇṭhamasakṛd yāmīti talpātithir trasyantī parirabhyate sukṛtinā svairaṃ navasvairiṇī //
analyzed: iti antar bhaya sanna kaṇṭham asakṛt yāmi iti talpa atithiḥ trasyantī parirabhyate su kṛtinā svairam nava svairiṇī

original: MSS_5091-1 āyāti phullakusumaḥ kusumāgamo'yam eṣā śaśāṅkatilakā śaradāgateti /
analyzed: āyāti phulla kusumaḥ kusuma āgamaḥ yam eṣā śaśāṅka tilakā śarad āgatā iti

original: MSS_5091-2 bāḍhaṃ prahṛṣyati jano na punarmamaitad āyuḥprahīṇamiti yāti manoviṣādam //
analyzed: bāḍham prahṛṣyati janaḥ na punar mama etat āyuḥ prahīṇam iti yāti manaḥ viṣādam

original: MSS_5092-1 āyāti yāti khedaṃ karoti madhu harati madhukarīvānyā /
analyzed: āyāti yāti khedam karoti madhu harati madhukarī iva anyā

original: MSS_5092-2 adhidevatā tvameva śrīriva kamalasya mama manasaḥ //
analyzed: adhidevatā tvam eva śrīḥ iva kamalasya mama manasaḥ

original: MSS_5093-1 āyāti yāti punareva jalaṃ prayāti padmāṅkurāṇi vidhunoti dhunoti pakṣau /
analyzed: āyāti yāti punar eva jalam prayāti padma aṅkurāṇi vidhunoti dhunoti pakṣau

original: MSS_5093-2 unmattavad bhramati kūjati mandamandaṃ kāntāviyogavidhuro niśi cakravākaḥ //
analyzed: unmatta vat bhramati kūjati mandamandam kāntā viyoga vidhuraḥ niśi cakravākaḥ

original: MSS_5094-1 āyāti śriyamañjasā nayanayorambhoruhapreyasī saṃnāhaḥ stanayorayaṃ kalayate saṃbhogayogyāṃ daśām /
analyzed: āyāti śriyam añjasā nayanayoḥ ambhoruha preyasī saṃnāhaḥ stanayoḥ ayam kalayate saṃbhoga yogyām daśām

original: MSS_5094-2 vaidagdhyena sahāsikāṃ vitanute vācāmiyaṃ prakriyā mugdhāyāḥ punaraindavīṃ na sahate mukhyāmabhikhyāṃ mukham //
analyzed: vaidagdhyena sahāsikām vitanute vācām iyam prakriyā mugdhāyāḥ punar aindavīm na sahate mukhyām abhikhyām mukham

original: MSS_5095-1 āyāti skhalitaiḥ pādair mukhavaivarṇyasaṃyutaḥ /
analyzed: āyāti skhalitaiḥ pādaiḥ mukha vaivarṇya saṃyutaḥ

original: MSS_5095-2 lalāṭasvedabhāg bhūrigadgadaṃ bhāṣate vacaḥ //
analyzed: lalāṭa sveda bhāj bhūri gadgadam bhāṣate vacaḥ

original: MSS_5096-1 kampamānamadho'vekṣī pāpaṃ prāptaḥ sadā naraḥ /
analyzed: kampamānam adhas vekṣī pāpam prāptaḥ sadā naraḥ

original: MSS_5096-2 tasmād yatnāt parijñeyaś cihnairetairvicakṣaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt yatnāt parijñeyaḥ cihnaiḥ etaiḥ vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_5097-1 āyāti hṛṣṭo'bhimukho yadi śvā krīḍāṃ prakurvan viluthaṃstathāgre /
analyzed: āyāti hṛṣṭa ubhimukhaḥ yadi śvā krīḍām prakurvan viluthan tathā agre

original: MSS_5097-2 śīghraṃ tadānīṃ dhruvamadhvagānāṃ bhavet prabhūto dhanadhānyalābhaḥ //
analyzed: śīghram tadānīm dhruvam adhvagānām bhavet prabhūtaḥ dhana dhānya lābhaḥ

original: MSS_5098-1 āyātu yātu khedaṃ karotu madhu haratu cāpyanyā /
analyzed: āyātu yātu khedam karotu madhu haratu ca api anyā

original: MSS_5098-2 adhidevatā tvameva śrīriva kamalasya mama manasaḥ //
analyzed: adhidevatā tvam eva śrīḥ iva kamalasya mama manasaḥ

original: MSS_5099-1 āyāte ca tirohito yadi punardṛṣṭo'nyakārye rato vāci smeramukho viṣaṇṇavadanaḥ svakleśavāde muhuḥ /
analyzed: āyāte ca tirohitaḥ yadi punar dṛṣṭaḥ anya kārye rataḥ vāci smera mukhaḥ viṣaṇṇa vadanaḥ sva kleśa vāde muhur

original: MSS_5099-2 antarveśmani vāsamicchati bhṛśaṃ vyādhīti yo bhāṣate bhṛtyānāmaparādhakīrtanaparastanmandiraṃ na vrajet //
analyzed: antarveśmani vāsam icchati bhṛśam vyādhī iti yaḥ bhāṣate bhṛtyānām aparādha kīrtana paraḥ tat mandiram na vrajet

original: MSS_5100-1 āyāte dayite manorathaśatairnītvā kathaṃcid dinaṃ gatvā vāsagṛhaṃ jaḍe parijane dīrghāṃ kathāṃ kurvati /
analyzed: āyāte dayite manoratha śataiḥ nītvā kathaṃcid dinam gatvā vāsagṛham jaḍe parijane dīrghām kathām kurvati

original: MSS_5100-2 daṣṭāsmītyabhidhāya satvarapadaṃ vyādhūya cīnāṃśukaṃ tanvaṅgyā ratikātareṇa manasā nītaḥ pradīpaḥ śamam //
analyzed: daṣṭā asmi iti abhidhāya sa tvara padam vyādhūya cīna aṃśukam tanu aṅgyā rati kātareṇa manasā nītaḥ pradīpaḥ śamam

original: MSS_5101-1 āyāte dayite marusthalabhuvāmullaṅghya durlaṅghyatāṃ gehinyā paritoṣabāṣpataralāmāsajya dṛṣṭiṃ mukhe /
analyzed: āyāte dayite maru sthala bhuvām ullaṅghya durlaṅghya tām gehinyā paritoṣa bāṣpa taralām āsajya dṛṣṭim mukhe

original: MSS_5101-2 datvā pīluśamīkarīrakavalān svenāñcalenādarād āmṛṣṭaṃ karabhasya keśarasaṭābhārābalagnaṃ rajaḥ //
analyzed: da tvā pīlu śamī karīra kavalān svena añcalena ādarāt āmṛṣṭam karabhasya keśara saṭā bhāra abalagnam rajaḥ

original: MSS_5102-1 āyāte rabhasādyadi priyatame pratyudgatā no ciraṃ no vā maṇḍalitonnatastanataṭaṃ gāḍhaṃ samāliṅgitaḥ /
analyzed: āyāte rabhasāt yadi priyatame pratyudgatā no ciram no vā maṇḍalita unnata stana taṭam gāḍham samāliṅgitaḥ

original: MSS_5102-2 āśliṣya svabhujāvalambamathavā premārdrayā no girā saṃbhāvyābhihito hatāsi sarale svaireva duśceṣṭitaiḥ //
analyzed: āśliṣya sva bhuja avalambam athavā prema ārdrayā naḥ girā saṃbhāvya abhihitaḥ hatā asi sarale svaiḥ eva duśceṣṭitaiḥ

original: MSS_5103-1 āyāte'rthini gotrabhidyabhimate karṇo'mucat kuṇḍalaṃ kāmāstraṃ kila bhūrilocanayugaṃ tasmin samāsajjatām /
analyzed: āyāta irthini gotrabhidi abhimate karṇaḥ mucat kuṇḍalam kāma astram kila bhūri locana yugam tasmin samāsajjatām

original: MSS_5103-2 nanvetat kurunāyakasya hṛdayaṃ tasmāt samādhīyatāṃ saṃbhūtas tapaso'tra yo ratiraso māpārthato hīyatām //
analyzed: nanu etat kuru nāyakasya hṛdayam tasmāt samādhīyatām saṃbhūtaḥ tapasā utra yaḥ rati rasaḥ mā apa arthataḥ hīyatām

original: MSS_5104-1 āyāte śrutigocaraṃ priyatamaprasthānakāle puras talpāntaḥsthitayā tadānanamalaṃ dṛṣṭvā ciraṃ mugdhayā /
analyzed: āyāte śruti gocaram priyatama prasthāna kāle puras talpa antar sthitayā tad ānana malam dṛṣṭvā ciram mugdhayā

original: MSS_5104-2 socchvāsaṃ dṛḍhamanyunirbharagaladbāṣpāmbudhautaṃ tayā svaṃ vaktraṃ viniveśya bhartṛhṛdaye niḥśabdakaṃ rudyate //
analyzed: sa ucchvāsam dṛḍha manyu nirbhara galat bāṣpa ambu dhautam tayā svam vaktram viniveśya bhartṛ hṛdaye niḥśabdakam rudyate

original: MSS_5105-1 āyātaiva niśā niśāpatikaraiḥ kīrṇaṃ diśāmantaraṃ bhāminyo bhavaneṣu bhūṣaṇagaṇairaṅgānyalaṃkurvate /
analyzed: āyātā eva niśā niśāpati karaiḥ kīrṇam diśām antaram bhāminyaḥ bhavaneṣu bhūṣaṇa gaṇaiḥ aṅgāni alaṃkurvate

original: MSS_5105-2 mugdhe mānamapākaroṣi na manāgadyāpi roṣeṇa te hā hā bālamṛṇālato'pyatitarāṃ tanvī tanustāmyati //
analyzed: mugdhe mānam apākaroṣi na manāk adya api roṣeṇa te hā hā bāla mṛṇāla tā upi atitarām tanvī tanuḥ tāmyati

original: MSS_5106-1 āyātaiva niśā mano mṛgadṛśāmunnidramātanvatī māno me kathameṣa saṃprati nirātaṅkaṃ hṛdi sthāsyati /
analyzed: āyātā eva niśā manaḥ mṛga dṛśām unnidram ātanvatī mānaḥ me katham eṣa saṃprati nirātaṅkam hṛdi sthāsyati

original: MSS_5106-2 ūhāpohamimaṃ sarojanayanā yāvad vidhattetarāṃ tāvat kāmanṛpātapatrasuṣamaṃ bimbaṃ babhāse vidhoḥ //
analyzed: ūha apoham imam saroja nayanā yāvat vidhattetarām tāvat kāma nṛ pāta patra suṣamam bimbam babhāse vidhoḥ

original: MSS_5107-1 āyāto dayitas taveti sahasā na śraddadhe bhāṣitaṃ sadyaḥ saṃmukhatāṃ gate'pi sumukhī bhrāntiṃ nijāṃ manyate /
analyzed: āyātaḥ dayitaḥ tava iti sahasā na śraddadhe bhāṣitam sadyas saṃmukha tām gatā ipi su mukhī bhrāntim nijām manyate

original: MSS_5107-2 kaṇṭhāśleṣibhuje'pi śūnyahṛdayā svapnāntaraṃ śaṅkate pratyāvṛttimiyaṃ priyasya kiyatā pratyetu śātodarī //
analyzed: kaṇṭha āśleṣi bhuje api śūnya hṛdayā svapna antaram śaṅkate pratyāvṛttim iyam priyasya kiyatā pratyetu śāta udarī

original: MSS_5108-1 āyāto bhavataḥ piteti sahasā māturniśamyoditaṃ dhūlīdhūsarito vihāya śiśubhiḥ krīḍārasān prastutān /
analyzed: āyātaḥ bhavataḥ pitā iti sahasā mātuḥ niśamya uditam dhūlī dhūsaritaḥ vihāya śiśubhiḥ krīḍā rasān prastutān

original: MSS_5108-2 dūrāt smeramukhaḥ prasārya lalitaṃ bāhudvayaṃ bālako nādhanyasya puraḥ sameti parayā prītyā raṭadghargharam //
analyzed: dūrāt smera mukhaḥ prasārya lalitam bāhu dvayam bālakaḥ na adhanyasya puras sameti parayā prītyā raṭat ghargharam

original: MSS_5109-1 āyāto vanamālī gṛhapatirāli samāyātaḥ /
analyzed: āyātaḥ vanamālī gṛhapatiḥ āli samāyātaḥ

original: MSS_5109-2 smara sakhi pāṇinisūtraṃ vipratiṣedhe paraṃ kāryam //
analyzed: smara sakhi pāṇini sūtram vipratiṣedhe param kāryam

original: MSS_5110-1 āyāt tribhāgataḥ kuryād vyayaṃ dharmaparo naraḥ /
analyzed: āyāt tri bhāgataḥ kuryāt vyayam dharma paraḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_5110-2 etadeva hi pāṇḍityaṃ yadāyādalpako vyayaḥ //
analyzed: etat eva hi pāṇḍityam yadā ayāt alpakaḥ vyayaḥ

original: MSS_5111-1 āyāntaṃ guṇinaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣyedādriyeta ca /
analyzed: āyāntam guṇinam dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣyet ādriyeta ca

original: MSS_5111-2 guṇino hyādṛtā bhūyaś ceṣṭante tasya saṃpade //
analyzed: guṇinaḥ hi ādṛtāḥ bhūyas ceṣṭante tasya saṃpade

original: MSS_5112-1 āyāntaṃ svapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā bhakṣayantī sadākhilam /
analyzed: āyāntam sva patim dṛṣṭvā bhakṣayantī sadā akhilam

original: MSS_5112-2 parityaktā nijaiḥ putrair bāndhavaiḥ svajanais tathā //
analyzed: parityaktāḥ nijaiḥ putraiḥ bāndhavaiḥ sva janaiḥ tathā

original: MSS_5113-1 āyāntamālokya hariṃ pratolyām ālyāḥ purastādanurāgamekā /
analyzed: āyāntam ālokya harim pratolyām ālyāḥ purastāt anurāgam ekā

original: MSS_5113-2 romāñcakampādibhirucyamānaṃ bhāmā jugūha praṇamantyathainam //
analyzed: romāñca kampa ādibhiḥ ucyamānam bhāmā jugūha praṇamanti atha enam

original: MSS_5114-1 āyānti tvaritaṃ gabhīrasaritāṃ kūleṣu bhūmīruhāṃ mūleṣu vyathitā nidāghapathikāḥ kṛtyaṃ tadeṣāṃ param /
analyzed: āyānti tvaritam gabhīra saritām kūleṣu bhūmīruhām mūleṣu vyathitāḥ nidāgha pathikāḥ kṛtyam tat eṣām param

original: MSS_5114-2 yatpuṣpairadhivāsanaṃ nibiḍayā yacchāyayā pālanaṃ yanmandairupavījanaṃ ca pavanaiḥ kṛtyaṃ tadurvīruhām //
analyzed: yat puṣpaiḥ adhivāsanam nibiḍayā yat chāyayā pālanam yat mandaiḥ upavījanam ca pavanaiḥ kṛtyam tat urvīruhām

original: MSS_5115-1 āyānti yatra nivasanti cirāya ceṣṭaṃ niryānti caivamamitāḥ sarito yato'mī /
analyzed: āyānti yatra nivasanti cirāya ca iṣṭam niryānti ca evam amitāḥ saritaḥ yatas umī

original: MSS_5115-2 devairhṛteṣu bahuleṣu maṇiṣvapībhyo yaḥ pūrvavat sa jayatādamṛtaikabhūmiḥ //
analyzed: devaiḥ hṛteṣu bahuleṣu maṇiṣu api ībhyaḥ yaḥ pūrvavat sa jayatāt amṛta eka bhūmiḥ

original: MSS_5116-1 āyānti yānti satataṃ nīraṃ śiśiraṃ kharaṃ na gaṇayanti /
analyzed: āyānti yānti satatam nīram śiśiram kharam na gaṇayanti

original: MSS_5116-2 vidmo na hanta divasāḥ kasya kimete kariṣyanti //
