analyzed: vidmaḥ na hanta divasāḥ kasya kim ete kariṣyanti

original: MSS_5117-1 āyāntyagre nanu tanubhavā uttamarṇā iveme śayyālagnāḥ phaṇabhṛta ivābhānti dārā idānīm /
analyzed: āyānti agre nanu tanubhavāḥ uttamarṇāḥ iva ime śayyā lagnāḥ phaṇabhṛtaḥ iva ābhānti dārāḥ idānīm

original: MSS_5117-2 kārāgehapratimamadhunā mandiraṃ dṛśyate me tatra sthātuṃ prasajati mano na kṣaṇaṃ na kṣaṇārdham //
analyzed: kārā geha pratimam adhunā mandiram dṛśyate me tatra sthātum prasajati manaḥ na kṣaṇam na kṣaṇa ardham

original: MSS_5118-1 āyāntyāṃ nijayuvatau vanāt saśaṅkaṃ barhāṇāmaparaśikhaṇḍinīṃ bhareṇa /
analyzed: āyāntyām nija yuvatau vanāt sa śaṅkam barhāṇām apara śikhaṇḍinīm bhareṇa

original: MSS_5118-2 ālokya vyavadadhataṃ puro mayūraṃ kāminyaḥ śradadhuranārjavaṃ nareṣu //
analyzed: ālokya vyavadadhatam puras mayūram kāminyaḥ śradadhuḥ anārjavam nareṣu

original: MSS_5119-1 āyāntyā divasaśriyaḥ padatalasparśānubhāvādiva vyomāśokatarornavīnakalikāgucchaḥ samujjṛmbhate /
analyzed: āyāntyāḥ divasa śriyaḥ pada tala sparśa anubhāvāt iva vyoma aśoka taroḥ navīna kalikā gucchaḥ samujjṛmbhate

original: MSS_5119-2 ātanvannavataṃsavibhramamasāvāśākuraṅgīdṛśām unmīlattaruṇaprabhākarakarastomaḥ samudbhāsate //
analyzed: ātanvan avataṃsa vibhramam asau āśā kuraṅgī dṛśām unmīlat taruṇa prabhākara kara stomaḥ samudbhāsate

original: MSS_5120-1 āyāminostadakṣṇor añjanarekhāvidhiṃ vitanvantyāḥ /
analyzed: āyāminoḥ tad akṣṇoḥ añjana rekhā vidhim vitanvantyāḥ

original: MSS_5120-2 pāṇiḥ prasādhikāyāḥ prāpadapāṅgaṃ cireṇa viśramya //
analyzed: pāṇiḥ prasādhikāyāḥ prāpat apāṅgam cireṇa viśramya

original: MSS_5121-1 āyāsaḥ parahiṃsā vaitaṃsikasārameya tava sāraḥ /
analyzed: āyāsaḥ para hiṃsā vaitaṃsika sārameya tava sāraḥ

original: MSS_5121-2 tvāmapasārya vibhājyaḥ kuraṅga eṣo'dhunaivānyaiḥ //
analyzed: tvām apasārya vibhājyaḥ kuraṅgaḥ eṣa udhunā eva anyaiḥ

original: MSS_5122-1 āyāsaśatalabhyasya prāṇebhyo'pi garīyasaḥ /
analyzed: āyāsa śata labhyasya prāṇebhyaḥ api garīyasaḥ

original: MSS_5122-2 gatirekaiva vittasya dānaṃ śeṣā vipattayaḥ //
analyzed: gatiḥ ekā eva vittasya dānam śeṣāḥ vipattayaḥ

original: MSS_5123-1 āyāsaśokabhayaduḥkhamupaiti martyo mānena sarvajananinditaveṣarūpaḥ /
analyzed: āyāsa śoka bhaya duḥkham upaiti martyaḥ mānena sarva jana nindita veṣa rūpaḥ

original: MSS_5123-2 vidyādayādamayamādiguṇāṃśca hanti jñātveti garvavaśameti na śuddhabuddhiḥ //
analyzed: vidyā dayā damayam ādi guṇān ca hanti jñātvā iti garva vaśam eti na śuddha buddhiḥ

original: MSS_5124-1 āyāsaślathabāhuvalliradhikasmerai .- -.- lolāpāṅgakapolapāliralikastomārdhaluptālakā /
analyzed: āyāsa ślatha bāhu valliḥ adhika smeraiḥ

original: MSS_5124-2 nyasyantī madayatyanāvṛta iva pracchādanāyāñcalaṃ mugdhā svedanipītasūkṣmasicayavyaktastanī vakṣasi //
analyzed: nyasyantī madayati anāvṛte iva pracchādanāya añcalam mugdhā sveda nipīta sūkṣma sicaya vyakta stanī vakṣasi

original: MSS_5125-1 āyāsādalaghutarastanaiḥ svanadbhiḥ śrāntānāmavikacalocanāravindaiḥ /
analyzed: āyāsāt alaghutara stanaiḥ svanadbhiḥ śrāntānām avikaca locana aravindaiḥ

original: MSS_5125-2 abhyambhaḥ kathamapi yoṣitāṃ samūhais tairurvīnihitacalatpadaṃ pracele //
analyzed: abhyambhaḥ katham api yoṣitām samūhaiḥ taiḥ urvī nihita calat padam pracele

original: MSS_5126-1 āyāsānavicintayannagaṇayallābhaṃ tataḥ kiṃcidapy ambho muñcati kīrtimātraśaraṇo dhārādharaḥ sarvataḥ /
analyzed: āyāsān a vicintayan a gaṇayat lābham tatas kiṃcid api ambhaḥ muñcati kīrti mātra śaraṇaḥ dhārādharaḥ sarvatas

original: MSS_5126-2 tadyatnādupayujya vardhayatu vā dāturyaśaḥ śāśvataṃ mauḍhyādetadupekṣya nāśayatu vā lokaḥ pramāṇaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: tat yatnāt upayujya vardhayatu vā dātuḥ yaśaḥ śāśvatam mauḍhyāt etat upekṣya nāśayatu vā lokaḥ pramāṇam tatas

original: MSS_5127-1 āyāsya bahubhirdugdhāṃ pītāṃ vatsena sadgavīm /
analyzed: āyāsya bahubhiḥ dugdhām pītām vatsena sat gavīm

original: MSS_5127-2 suśikṣito'pi gopālaḥ prayatnena duhīta kim //
analyzed: su śikṣitaḥ api gopālaḥ prayatnena duhīta kim

original: MSS_5128-1 āyāsyasi kadā kānte madantakamayi prabhe /
analyzed: āyāsyasi kadā kānte mad antaka mayi prabhe

original: MSS_5128-2 iti prṣṭenduvadanācchādayad vāsasā mukham //
analyzed: iti prṣṭa indu vadanā ācchādayat vāsasā mukham

original: MSS_5129-1 āyāsyasyavadhāvaparyavasite gatveti saṃbhāvyate saṃprāpte tvayi yāni tānyapi sukhānyadyāparokṣāṇi naḥ /
analyzed: āyāsyasi avadhau aparyavasite gatvā iti saṃbhāvyate saṃprāpte tvayi yāni tāni api sukhāni adya aparokṣāṇi naḥ

original: MSS_5129-2 kiṃtvajñātaviyogavedanamidaṃ sadyastvayi prasthite cetaḥ kiṃ nu karīṣyatītyaviditaṃ samyaṅ na niścīyate //
analyzed: kiṃtu ajñāta viyoga vedanam idam sadyas tvayi prasthite cetaḥ kim nu karīṣyati iti aviditam samyak na niścīyate

original: MSS_5130-1 āyāsyāmi punastavāntikamahaṃ yāme vyatīte priyety uktvā paṅkajalocanā sarabhasaṃ kāntā samājaṃ yayau /
analyzed: āyāsyāmi punar tava antikam aham yāme vyatīte priya iti uktvā paṅkaja locanā sarabhasam kāntā samājam yayau

original: MSS_5130-2 jāte kvāpi ca sīñjate kimu samāyāteti mārgaṃ muhur darśaṃ darśamatho mayā niśi manāg labdho na nidrārasaḥ //
analyzed: jāte kvāpi ca sīñjate kimu samāyātā iti mārgam muhur darśam darśam atho mayā niśi manāk labdhaḥ na nidrā rasaḥ

original: MSS_5131-1 āyuḥ karma ca vittaṃ ca vidyā nidhanameva ca /
analyzed: āyuḥ karma ca vittam ca vidyā nidhanam eva ca

original: MSS_5131-2 pañcaitāni hi sṛjyante garbhasthasyaiva dehinaḥ //
analyzed: pañca etāni hi sṛjyante garbha sthasya eva dehinaḥ

original: MSS_5132-1 āyuḥ kallolalolaṃ katipayadivasasthāyinī yauvanaśrīr arthāḥ saṃkalpakalpā ghanasamayataḍidvibhramā bhogapūrāḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥ kallola lolam katipaya divasa sthāyinī yauvana śrīḥ arthāḥ saṃkalpa kalpāḥ ghana samaya taḍit vibhramāḥ bhoga pūrāḥ

original: MSS_5132-2 kaṇṭhāśleṣopagūḍhaṃ tadapi ca na ciraṃ yat priyābhiḥ praṇītaṃ brahmaṇyāsaktacittā bhavata bhavabhayāmbhodhipāraṃ tarītum //
analyzed: kaṇṭha āśleṣa upagūḍham tat api ca na ciram yat priyābhiḥ praṇītam brahmaṇi āsakta cittāḥ bhavata bhava bhaya ambhodhi pāram tarītum

original: MSS_5133-1 āyuḥpraśne dīrghamāyur vācyaṃ mauhūrtikairjanaiḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥ praśne dīrgham āyuḥ vācyam mauhūrtikaiḥ janaiḥ

original: MSS_5133-2 jīvanto bahu manyante mṛtāḥ prakṣyanti kaṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: jīvantaḥ bahu manyante mṛtāḥ prakṣyanti kam punar

original: MSS_5134-1 āyuḥ śriyaṃ yaśo dharmaṃ lokānāśiṣa eva ca /
analyzed: āyuḥ śriyam yaśaḥ dharmam lokān āśiṣaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_5134-2 hanti śreyāṃsi sarvāṇi puṃso mahadatikramaḥ //
analyzed: hanti śreyāṃsi sarvāṇi puṃsaḥ mahat atikramaḥ

original: MSS_5135-1 āyuḥ śrīḥ kīrtiraiśvaryam āśiṣaḥ puruṣasya yāḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ aiśvaryam āśiṣaḥ puruṣasya yāḥ

original: MSS_5135-2 bhavantyeva hi tatkāle yathānicchorviparyayāḥ //
analyzed: bhavanti eva hi tad kāle yathā anicchoḥ viparyayāḥ

original: MSS_5136-1 āyuḥsattvabalārogyasukhaprītivivardhanāḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥ sattva bala ārogya sukha prīti vivardhanāḥ

original: MSS_5136-2 rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvikapriyāḥ //
analyzed: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirāḥ hṛdyāḥ āhārāḥ sāttvika priyāḥ

original: MSS_5137-1 āyuḥsāraṃ yuavanam ṛtusāraḥ kusumasāyakavayasyaḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥsāram yuavanam ṛtusāraḥ kusumasāyakavayasyaḥ

original: MSS_5137-2 sundari jīvitasāro ratibhogarasāmṛtasvādaḥ //
MSS_5138-1 āyuktakebhyaścorebhyaḥ parebhyo rājavallabhāt /
analyzed: āyuktakebhyaḥ corebhyaḥ parebhyaḥ rāja vallabhāt

original: MSS_5138-2 pṛthivīpatilobhācca prajānāṃ pañcadhā bhayam //
analyzed: pṛthivīpati lobhāt ca prajānām pañcadhā bhayam

original: MSS_5139-1 āyudhānāṃ dhanuḥ śreṣṭham āsanānāṃ ca medinī /
analyzed: āyudhānām dhanuḥ śreṣṭham āsanānām ca medinī

original: MSS_5139-2 phalānāṃ cāmravṛkṣasya devānāṃ ca maheśvaraḥ //
analyzed: phalānām ca āmra vṛkṣasya devānām ca maheśvaraḥ

original: MSS_5140-1 āyurghṛte guḍe rogā nityaṃ mṛtyurvidāhiṣu /
analyzed: āyuḥ ghṛte guḍe rogāḥ nityam mṛtyuḥ vidāhiṣu

original: MSS_5140-2 ārogyaṃ kaṭutikteṣu balaṃ māṣe payastu ca //
analyzed: ārogyam kaṭu tikteṣu balam māṣe payaḥ tu ca

original: MSS_5141-1 āyurdānamahotsavasya vinatakṣoṇībhṛtāṃ mūrtimān viśvāso nayanotsavo mṛgadṛśāṃ kīrteḥ prakāśaḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥ dāna mahā utsavasya vinata kṣoṇībhṛtām mūrtimān viśvāsaḥ nayana utsavaḥ mṛga dṛśām kīrteḥ prakāśaḥ paraḥ

original: MSS_5141-2 ānandaḥ kalitākṛtiḥ sumanasāṃ vīraśriyo jīvitaṃ dharmasyaiva niketanaṃ vijayate vīraḥ kaliṅgeśvaraḥ //
analyzed: ānandaḥ kalita ākṛtiḥ sumanasām vīra śriyaḥ jīvitam dharmasya eva niketanam vijayate vīraḥ kaliṅga īśvaraḥ

original: MSS_5142-1 āyurdīrghataraṃ vapurvarataraṃ gotraṃ garīyastaraṃ vittaṃ bhūritaraṃ balaṃ bahutaraṃ svāmitvamuccaistaram /
analyzed: āyuḥ dīrghataram vapuḥ varataram gotram garīyastaram vittam bhūritaram balam bahutaram svāmi tvam uccaistaram

original: MSS_5142-2 ārogyaṃ vigatāntaraṃ trijagati ślāghyatvamalpetaraṃ saṃsārāmbunidhiṃ karoti sutaraṃ cetaḥ kṛpārdrāntaram //
analyzed: ārogyam vigata antaram trijagati ślāghya tvam alpa itaram saṃsāra ambunidhim karoti sutaram cetaḥ kṛpā ārdra antaram

original: MSS_5143-1 āyurnaśyati paśyatāṃ pratidinaṃ yāti kṣayaṃ yauvanaṃ pratyāyānti gatāḥ punarna divasāḥ kālo jagadbhakṣakaḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥ naśyati paśyatām pratidinam yāti kṣayam yauvanam pratyāyānti gatāḥ punar na divasāḥ kālaḥ jagat bhakṣakaḥ

original: MSS_5143-2 lakṣmīs toyataraṅgabhaṅgacapalā vidyuccalaṃ jīvitaṃ yasmānmāṃ śaraṇāgataṃ śaraṇada tvaṃ rakṣa rakṣādhunā //
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ toya taraṅga bhaṅga capalā vidyut calam jīvitam yasmāt mām śaraṇa āgatam śaraṇa da tvam rakṣa rakṣa adhunā

original: MSS_5144-1 āyurnīrataraṅgabhaṅguramiti jñātvā sukhenāsitaṃ lakṣmīḥ svapnavinaśvarīti satataṃ bhogeṣu baddhā ruciḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥ nīra taraṅga bhaṅguram iti jñātvā sukhena asitam lakṣmīḥ svapna vinaśvarī iti satatam bhogeṣu baddhā ruciḥ

original: MSS_5144-2 abhrastambaviḍambi yauvanamiti premṇāvagūḍhāḥ striyo yairevātra vimucyate bhavarasāt taireva baddho janaḥ //
analyzed: abhra stamba viḍambi yauvanam iti premṇā avagūḍhāḥ striyaḥ yaiḥ eva atra vimucyate bhava rasāt taiḥ eva baddhaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_5145-1 āyurbalaṃ vipulamastu sukhitvamastu kalyāṇamastu vipulā tava kīrtirastu /
analyzed: āyuḥ balam vipulam astu sukhi tvam astu kalyāṇam astu vipulā tava kīrtiḥ astu

original: MSS_5145-2 śrīrastu dharmamatirastu ripukṣayo'stu saṃtānavṛddhirabhivāñchitasiddhirastu //
analyzed: śrīḥ astu dharma matiḥ astu ripu kṣayoḥ tu saṃtāna vṛddhiḥ abhivāñchita siddhiḥ astu

original: MSS_5146-1 āyuryaśo balaṃ vittam ākāṅkṣadbhiḥ priyāṇi ca /
analyzed: āyuḥ yaśaḥ balam vittam ākāṅkṣadbhiḥ priyāṇi ca

original: MSS_5146-2 pitaivārādhanīyo'gre daivataṃ hi pitā mahat //
analyzed: pitā eva ārādhanīyā ugre daivatam hi pitā mahat

original: MSS_5147-1 āyurlekhā pavanacalanāśliṣṭadīpopameyā saṃpaccaiṣā madavaśacalatkāminīdṛṣṭilolā /
analyzed: āyuḥ lekhā pavana calana āśliṣṭa dīpa upameyā saṃpad ca eṣā mada vaśa calat kāminī dṛṣṭi lolā

original: MSS_5147-2 tīvraścāntardahati hṛdayaṃ viprayogaḥ priyebhyas tasmādetat satatamamalaṃ brahma śāntaṃ prapannāḥ //
analyzed: tīvraḥ ca antar dahati hṛdayam viprayogaḥ priyebhyaḥ tasmāt etat satatam amalam brahma śāntam prapannāḥ

original: MSS_5148-1 āyurvarṣaśataṃ nṛṇāṃ parimitaṃ rātrau tadardhaṃ gataṃ tasyārdhasya parasya cārdhamaparaṃ bālatvavṛddhatvayoḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥ varṣa śatam nṛṇām parimitam rātrau tad ardham gatam tasya ardhasya parasya ca ardham aparam bāla tva vṛddha tvayoḥ

original: MSS_5148-2 śeṣaṃ vyādhiviyogaduḥkhasahitaṃ sevādibhirnīyate jīve vāritaraṅgacañcalatare saukhyaṃ kutaḥ prāṇinām //
analyzed: śeṣam vyādhi viyoga duḥkha sahitam sevā ādibhiḥ nīyate jīve vāri taraṅga cañcalatare saukhyam kutas prāṇinām

original: MSS_5149-1 āyurvarṣaśataṃ nṛṇāṃ parimitaṃ rātrau tadardhaṃ hṛtaṃ tasyārdhasya ca kiṃcideva jarayā bālyena kiṃcid hṛtam /
analyzed: āyuḥ varṣa śatam nṛṇām parimitam rātrau tad ardham hṛtam tasya ardhasya ca kiṃcid eva jarayā bālyena kiṃcid hṛtam

original: MSS_5149-2 kiṃcid vyādhiviyogaduḥkhamaraṇairbhūpālasevārasair naṣṭaṃ śiṣṭamatastaraṅgataralaṃ puṃsāṃ sukhaṃ kva kṣaṇe //
analyzed: kiṃcid vyādhi viyoga duḥkha maraṇaiḥ bhūpāla sevā rasaiḥ naṣṭam śiṣṭam atas taraṅga taralam puṃsām sukham kva kṣaṇe

original: MSS_5150-1 āyurvāyucalaṃ sureśvaradhanurlolaṃ balaṃ yauvanaṃ vidyudvac capalaṃ dhanaṃ girinadīkallolavac cañcalam /
analyzed: āyuḥ vāyu calam sureśvara dhanuḥ lolam balam yauvanam vidyudvat capalam dhanam giri nadī kallola vat cañcalam

original: MSS_5150-2 tāruṇyaṃ karikarṇatālataralaṃ dehaṃ ca rogākulaṃ jñātvā sarvamidaṃ kurudhvamamalaṃ dharmaṃ sadā niścalam //
analyzed: tāruṇyam karikarṇa tāla taralam deham ca roga ākulam jñātvā sarvam idam kurudhvam amalam dharmam sadā niścalam

original: MSS_5151-1 āyurvāyuvyathitanalinīpatramitraṃ kimanyat saṃpacchampādyutisahacarī svairacārī kṛtāntaḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥ vāyu vyathita nalinī patra mitram kim anyat saṃpad śampā dyuti sahacarī svairacārī kṛtāntaḥ

original: MSS_5151-2 kasmādasmin bhramasi tamasi tvaṃ prayāhi prayāgaṃ paunaḥpunyaṃ bhuvi bhagavatī svardhunī te dhunīte //
analyzed: kasmāt asmin bhramasi tamasi tvam prayāhi prayāgam paunaḥpunyam bhuvi bhagavatī svardhunī te dhunīte

original: MSS_5152-1 āyurvāsaramāsavatsaragaṇe gacchatyadūraṃ pathair ākrāmanti kṛtāntakāsarakhurakṣuṇṇā rajorājayaḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥ vāsara māsa vatsara gaṇe gacchati adūram pathaiḥ ākrāmanti kṛtānta kāsara khura kṣuṇṇāḥ rajaḥ rājayaḥ

original: MSS_5152-2 īṣallaṅghitaśaiśavā iti vayaḥsaṃdhiṃ dadhānā iti vyaktā varjitayauvanā iti tathā nandanti tandrālavaḥ //
analyzed: īṣat laṅghita śaiśavāḥ iti vayaḥ saṃdhim dadhānāḥ iti vyaktāḥ varjita yauvanāḥ iti tathā nandanti tandrālavaḥ

original: MSS_5153-1 āyurvittaṃ gṛhacchidraṃ mantramaithunabheṣajam /
analyzed: āyuḥ vittam gṛha chidram mantra maithuna bheṣajam

original: MSS_5153-2 apamānaṃ tapo dānaṃ nava gopyāni yatnataḥ //
analyzed: apamānam tapaḥ dānam nava gopyāni yatnataḥ

original: MSS_5154-1 āyurvittaṃ gṛhacchidraṃ mantramaithunabheṣajam /
analyzed: āyuḥ vittam gṛha chidram mantra maithuna bheṣajam

original: MSS_5154-2 dānamānāpamānaṃ ca navaitāni sugopayet //
analyzed: dāna māna apamānam ca nava etāni su gopayet

original: MSS_5155-1 āyurvṛddhikṣayotkarṣahetuṃ kālavinirgatam /
analyzed: āyuḥ vṛddhi kṣaya utkarṣa hetum kāla vinirgatam

original: MSS_5155-2 vāñchatāṃ dhanināmiṣṭaṃ jīvitāt paramaṃ dhanam //
analyzed: vāñchatām dhaninām iṣṭam jīvitāt paramam dhanam

original: MSS_5156-1 āyurvedakṛtābhyāsaḥ sarveṣāṃ priyadarśanaḥ /
analyzed: āyurveda kṛta abhyāsaḥ sarveṣām priya darśanaḥ

original: MSS_5156-2 āryaśīlaguṇopeta eṣa vaidyo vidhīyate //
analyzed: ārya śīla guṇa upetaḥ eṣa vaidyaḥ vidhīyate

original: MSS_5157-1 āyurvedamadhīyānāḥ kevalaṃ saparigraham /
analyzed: āyurvedam adhīyānāḥ kevalam sa parigraham

original: MSS_5157-2 dṛśyante bahavo vaidyā vyādhibhiḥ samabhiplutāḥ //
analyzed: dṛśyante bahavaḥ vaidyāḥ vyādhibhiḥ samabhiplutāḥ

original: MSS_5158-1 āyuṣaḥ kṣaṇa eko'pi na labhyaḥ svarṇakoṭibhiḥ /
analyzed: āyuṣaḥ kṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ api na labhyaḥ svarṇa koṭibhiḥ

original: MSS_5158-2 sa cennirarthakaṃ nītaḥ kā nu hānistato'dhikā //
analyzed: sa ced nirarthakam nītaḥ kā nu hāniḥ tatas adhikā

original: MSS_5159-1 āyuṣaḥ kṣaṇa eko'pi na labhyaḥ svarṇakoṭibhiḥ /
analyzed: āyuṣaḥ kṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ api na labhyaḥ svarṇa koṭibhiḥ

original: MSS_5159-2 sa vṛthā nīyate yena tasmai nṛpaśave namaḥ //
analyzed: sa vṛthā nīyate yena tasmai nṛ paśave namaḥ

original: MSS_5160-1 āyuṣaḥ kṣaṇa eko'pi sarvaratnairna labhyate /
analyzed: āyuṣaḥ kṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ api sarva ratnaiḥ na labhyate

original: MSS_5160-2 nīyate yad vṛthā so'pi pramādaḥ sumahānayam //
analyzed: nīyate yat vṛthā saḥ api pramādaḥ su mahān ayam

original: MSS_5161-1 āyuṣmān prāṅmukho bhuñjāt dhanavān dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ /
analyzed: āyuṣmān prāc mukhaḥ bhuñjāt dhanavān dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ

original: MSS_5161-2 paścime tu yaśasvī syān na kadācidudaṅmukhaḥ //
analyzed: paścime tu yaśasvī syāt na kadācid udak mukhaḥ

original: MSS_5162-1 āyuṣyaṃ sarvathā rakṣyaṃ prāṇināmiha dhīmatā /
analyzed: āyuṣyam sarvathā rakṣyam prāṇinām iha dhīmatā

original: MSS_5162-2 apyalpaguṇasaṃpanno jīvan bhadrāṇi paśyati //
analyzed: api alpa guṇa saṃpannaḥ jīvan bhadrāṇi paśyati

original: MSS_5163-1 āyustaḍiccalamapāyi śarīrametan mṛtyurgrasiṣyati kadeti na ko'pi veda /
analyzed: āyuḥ taḍit calam apāyi śarīram etat mṛtyuḥ grasiṣyati kadā iti na kaḥ api veda

original: MSS_5163-2 adyaiva tad bhajata muktipathaṃ dvijendrā jyeṣṭhāgamāvadhi hi tiṣṭhati kiṃ na darśaḥ //
analyzed: adyā eva tat bhajata mukti patham dvijendrāḥ jyeṣṭha āgama avadhi hi tiṣṭhati kim na darśaḥ

original: MSS_5164-1 āyuste kiyadasti tatra ca kiyat tāruṇyamatrāpi vāpy ardhaṃ nirgilitaṃ niśātmakatayā yatrāsti saṅgo na te /
analyzed: āyuḥ te kiyat asti tatra ca kiyat tāruṇyam atra api vā api ardham nirgilitam niśā ātmaka tayā yatra asti saṅgaḥ na te

original: MSS_5164-2 śeṣāḥ santi kati kṣaṇāḥ praṇayajas tatrāpi kopo yadi vyarthaṃ niścinu cakravāki jananaṃ kaste hitaṃ vakṣyati //
analyzed: śeṣāḥ santi kati kṣaṇāḥ praṇaya jaḥ tatra api kopaḥ yadi vyartham niścinu cakravāki jananam kaḥ te hitam vakṣyati

original: MSS_5165-1 āyuste naravīra vardhatu sadā hemantarātriryathā lokānāṃ priyavardhano bhava sadā hemantasūryo yathā /
analyzed: āyuḥ te nara vīra vardhatu sadā hemanta rātriḥ yathā lokānām priya vardhanaḥ bhava sadā hemanta sūryaḥ yathā

original: MSS_5165-2 lokānāṃ bhayavardhano bhava sadā hemantatoyaṃ yathā nāśaṃ yāntu tavārayo'pi satataṃ hemantapadmaṃ yathā //
analyzed: lokānām bhaya vardhanaḥ bhava sadā hemanta toyam yathā nāśam yāntu tava arayaḥ api satatam hemanta padmam yathā

original: MSS_5166-1 āyūṃṣi kṣaṇikāni yauvanamapi prāyo jarādhyāsitaṃ saṃyogā virahāvasānavirasā bhogāḥ kṣaṇadhvaṃsinaḥ /
analyzed: āyūṃṣi kṣaṇikāni yauvanam api prāyas jarā adhyāsitam saṃyogāḥ viraha avasāna virasāḥ bhogāḥ kṣaṇa dhvaṃsinaḥ

original: MSS_5166-2 jānanto'pi yathāvyavasthitamidaṃ lokāḥ samastaṃ jagac citraṃ yad gurugarvabhāvitadhiyaḥ krudhyanti mādyanti ca //
analyzed: jānantaḥ api yathā vyavasthitam idam lokāḥ samastam jagat citram yat guru garva bhāvita dhiyaḥ krudhyanti mādyanti ca

original: MSS_5167-1 āyūrekhāṃ cakārāsyāḥ kare drāghīyasīṃ vidhiḥ /
analyzed: āyūrekhām cakāra asyāḥ kare drāghīyasīm vidhiḥ

original: MSS_5167-2 śauṇḍīryagarvanirvāhapratyāśāṃ ca manobhuvaḥ //
analyzed: śauṇḍīrya garva nirvāha pratyāśām ca manobhuvaḥ

original: MSS_5168-1 āye vyaye tathā nityaṃ tyaktalajjas tu vai bhavet /
analyzed: āye vyaye tathā nityam tyakta lajjaḥ tu vai bhavet

original: MSS_5168-2 na kuñcitena gūḍhena nityaṃ prāvaraṇādibhiḥ //
analyzed: na kuñcitena gūḍhena nityam prāvaraṇa ādibhiḥ

original: MSS_5169-1 āyodhane kṛṣṇagatiṃ sahāyam avāpya yaḥ kṣatriyakālarātrim /
analyzed: āyodhane kṛṣṇa gatim sahāyam avāpya yaḥ kṣatriya kālarātrim

original: MSS_5169-2 dhārāṃ śitāṃ rāmaparaśvadhasya saṃbhāvayatyutpalapatrasārām //
analyzed: dhārām śitām rāma paraśvadhasya saṃbhāvayati utpala patra sārām

original: MSS_5170-1 āraktatāmeti mukhaṃ jihvā vā śyāmatāṃ yadā /
analyzed: ārakta tām eti mukham jihvā vā śyāma tām yadā

original: MSS_5170-2 tadā prājño vijānīyān mṛtyumāsannamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: tadā prājñaḥ vijānīyāt mṛtyum āsannam ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_5171-1 āraktadīrghanayano nayanābhirāmaḥ kandarpakoṭilalitaṃ vapurādadhānaḥ /
analyzed: ārakta dīrgha nayanaḥ nayana abhirāmaḥ kandarpa koṭi lalitam vapuḥ ādadhānaḥ

original: MSS_5171-2 bhūyāt sa me'dya hṛdayāmburuhādhivartī vṛndāṭavīnagaranāgaracakravartī //
analyzed: bhūyāt sa medya hṛdaya amburuha adhivartī vṛnda aṭavī nagara nāgara cakravartī

original: MSS_5172-1 āraktarājibhiriyaṃ kusumairnavakandalī salilagarbhaiḥ /
analyzed: ārakta rājibhiḥ iyam kusumaiḥ nava kandalī salila garbhaiḥ

original: MSS_5172-2 kopād antarbāṣpe smarayati māṃ locane tasyāḥ //
analyzed: kopāt antar bāṣpe smarayati mām locane tasyāḥ

original: MSS_5173-1 āraktāṅkuradanturā kamalinī nāyāminī yāminī stokonmuktatuṣāramambaramaṇerīṣat pragalbhaṃ mahaḥ /
analyzed: ārakta aṅkura danturā kamalinī na āyāminī yāminī stoka unmukta tuṣāram ambaramaṇeḥ īṣat pragalbham mahaḥ

original: MSS_5173-2 apyete sahakārasaurabhamuco vācālitāḥ kokilair āyānti priyaviprayuktayuvatīmarmacchido vāsarāḥ //
analyzed: api ete sahakāra saurabha mucaḥ vā ācālitāḥ kokilaiḥ āyānti priya viprayukta yuvatī marma chidaḥ vāsarāḥ

original: MSS_5174-1 āraktānāṃ navamadhu śanairāpiban padminīnāṃ kālonnidre kuvalayavane ghūrṇamānaḥ salīlam /
analyzed: āraktānām nava madhu śanais āpiban padminīnām kāla unnidre kuvalaya vane ghūrṇamānaḥ sa līlam

original: MSS_5174-2 svinno dānairvipinakariṇāṃ saumya seviṣyate tvām āmodānāmahamahamikāmādiśan gandhavāhaḥ //
analyzed: svinnaḥ dānaiḥ vipina kariṇām saumya seviṣyate tvām āmodānām ahamahamikām ādiśan gandhavāhaḥ

original: MSS_5175-1 āraktāyatapuṣpabāṇanayane snigdhāñjanaśyāmikāṃ kāśmīrāruṇakarṇikārakusumottaṃse mahānīlatām /
analyzed: ārakta āyata puṣpabāṇa nayane snigdha añjana śyāmikām kāśmīra aruṇa karṇikāra kusuma uttaṃse mahānīla tām

original: MSS_5175-2 unmīlattilakāntare mṛgamadakṣodārdrabindūpamāṃ dhatte mugdhatamālakāntimadhupīvṛndaṃ vasantaśriyaḥ //
analyzed: unmīlat tilaka antare mṛgamada kṣoda ārdra bindu upamām dhatte mugdha tamāla kānti madhupī vṛndam vasanta śriyaḥ

original: MSS_5176-1 āraktairnavapallavairviṭapino netrotsavaṃ tanvate tān dhunvannayamabhyupaiti madhurāmodo maruddakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: āraktaiḥ nava pallavaiḥ viṭapinaḥ netra utsavam tanvate tān dhunvan ayam abhyupaiti madhura āmodaḥ marut dakṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_5176-2 tenāliṅgitamātra eva vidhivat prādurbhavannirbhara- krīḍākūtakaṣāyitena manasā loko'yamunmādyate //
analyzed: tena āliṅgita mātraḥ eva vidhivat prādurbhavat nirbhara krīḍā ākūta kaṣāyitena manasā lokaḥ yam unmādyate

original: MSS_5177-1 āraṇyās tu svakaiḥ kuryuḥ sārthikāḥ sārthikaiḥ saha /
analyzed: āraṇyāḥ tu svakaiḥ kuryuḥ sārthikāḥ sārthikaiḥ saha

original: MSS_5177-2 sainikāḥ sainikaireva grāme'pyubhayavāsibhiḥ //
analyzed: sainikāḥ sainikaiḥ eva grāme pi ubhaya vāsibhiḥ

original: MSS_5178-1 ārabdhamabdhimathanaṃ svahastayitvā dvijihvamamarairyat /
analyzed: ārabdham abdhi mathanam svahastayitvā dvijihvam amaraiḥ yat

original: MSS_5178-2 ucitas tatpariṇāmo viṣamaṃ viṣameva yajjātam //
analyzed: ucitaḥ tad pariṇāmaḥ viṣamam viṣam eva yat jātam

original: MSS_5179-1 ārabdhā kimu ketakīkisalayairmālā kimāyāminī karpūrasya paraṃparā malayajakṣodasya lekhāthavā /
analyzed: ārabdhā kimu ketakī kisalayaiḥ mālā kim āyāminī karpūrasya paraṃparā malayaja kṣodasya lekhā athavā

original: MSS_5179-2 dhārā vaibudhasaindhavī nu visayatyāho himānīmayī vṛṣṭiḥ pañcaśarasya tāvakadṛśorbhaṅgī kathaṃ gīyate //
analyzed: dhārā vaibudha saindhavī nu himānī mayī vṛṣṭiḥ pañcaśarasya tāvaka dṛśoḥ bhaṅgī katham gīyate

original: MSS_5180-1 ārabdhā makaradhvajasya dhanuṣaitasyāstanurvedhasā tvadviśleṣaviśeṣadurbalatayā jātā na tāvaddhanuḥ /
analyzed: ārabdhā makaradhvajasya dhanuṣā etasyāḥ tanuḥ vedhasā tvad viśleṣa viśeṣa durbala tayā jātā na tāvat dhanuḥ

original: MSS_5180-2 tat saṃpratyapi re prasīda kimapi premāmṛtasyandinīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ nātha vidhehi sā ratipateḥ śiñjāpi samjāyatām //
analyzed: tat saṃprati api re prasīda kim api prema amṛta syandinīm dṛṣṭim nātha vidhehi sā ratipateḥ śiñjā api samjāyatām

original: MSS_5181-1 ārabdhe dayitāmukhapratisame nirmātumasminnapi vyaktaṃ janmasamānakālamilitāmaṃśucchaṭāṃ varṣati /
analyzed: ārabdhe dayitā mukha pratisame nirmātum asmin api vyaktam janma samāna kāla militām aṃśu chaṭām varṣati

original: MSS_5181-2 ātmadrohiṇi rohiṇīparivṛḍhe paryaṅkapaṅkeruhaḥ saṃkocādatiduḥsthitasya na vidhes tacchilpamunmīlitam //
analyzed: ātma drohiṇi rohiṇī parivṛḍhe paryaṅka paṅkeruhaḥ saṃkocāt ati duḥsthitasya na vidheḥ tat śilpam unmīlitam

original: MSS_5182-1 ārabdhe paṭahe sthite gurujane bhadrāsane laṅghite skandhoccāraṇanamyamānavadanapracyotitoye ghaṭe /
analyzed: ārabdhe paṭahe sthite guru jane bhadrāsane laṅghite skandha uccāraṇa namyamāna vadana pracyoti toye ghaṭe

original: MSS_5182-2 rājñāhūya visarjite mayi jano dhairyeṇa me vismitaḥ svaḥ putraḥ kurute pituryadi vacaḥ kastatra bho vismayaḥ //
analyzed: rājñā āhūya visarjite mayi janaḥ dhairyeṇa me vismitaḥ svaḥ putraḥ kurute pituḥ yadi vacaḥ kaḥ tatra bho vismayaḥ

original: MSS_8183-1 ārabhante'lpamevājñāḥ kāmaṃ vyagrā bhavanti ca /
analyzed: ārabhante ilpam eva ajñāḥ kāmam vyagrāḥ bhavanti ca

original: MSS_8183-2 mahārambhāḥ kṛtadhiyas tiṣṭhanti ca nirākulāḥ //
analyzed: mahā ārambhāḥ kṛta dhiyaḥ tiṣṭhanti ca nirākulāḥ

original: MSS_5184-1 ārabheta naraḥ karma svapauruṣamahāpayan /
analyzed: ārabheta naraḥ karma sva pauruṣam ahāpayan

original: MSS_5184-2 niṣpattiḥ karmaṇo daive pauruṣe ca vyavasthitā //
analyzed: niṣpattiḥ karmaṇaḥ daive pauruṣe ca vyavasthitā

original: MSS_5185-1 ārabhetaiva karmāṇi śrāntaḥ śrāntaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: ārabheta eva karmāṇi śrāntaḥ śrāntaḥ punar punar

original: MSS_5185-2 karmāṇyārabhamāṇaṃ hi puruṣaṃ śrīrniṣevate //
analyzed: karmāṇi ārabhamāṇam hi puruṣam śrīḥ niṣevate

original: MSS_5186-1 ārabhyate mahatkāryaṃ yaiḥ kṣudrairapi pārthivaiḥ /
analyzed: ārabhyate mahat kāryam yaiḥ kṣudraiḥ api pārthivaiḥ

original: MSS_5186-2 te cakravartino bhūtvā jāyante bhadrabhājanam //
analyzed: te cakravartinaḥ bhūtvā jāyante bhadra bhājanam

original: MSS_5187-1 ārambhagurvī kṣayiṇī krameṇa laghvī purā vṛddhimatī ca paścāt /
analyzed: ārambha gurvī kṣayiṇī krameṇa laghvī purā vṛddhimatī ca paścāt

original: MSS_5187-2 dinasya pūrvārdhaparārdhabhinnā chāyeva maitrī khalasajjanānām //
analyzed: dinasya pūrva ardha para ardha bhinnā chāyā iva maitrī khala sat janānām

original: MSS_5188-1 ārambharatitā'dhairyam asatkāryaparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: ārambha rati tā dhairyam asat kārya parigrahaḥ

original: MSS_5188-2 viṣayopasevā cājasraṃ rājasaṃ guṇalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: viṣaya upasevā ca ajasram rājasam guṇa lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_5189-1 ārambharamaṇīyāni vimarde virasāni ca /
analyzed: ārambha ramaṇīyāni vimarde virasāni ca

original: MSS_5189-2 prāyo vairāvasānāni saṃgatāni khalaiḥ saha //
analyzed: prāyas vaira avasānāni saṃgatāni khalaiḥ saha

original: MSS_5190-1 ārāt kārīṣavahneḥ praviracitatṛṇaprastarāntarniṣaṇṇaiḥ saṃśīrṇagranthikanthāvivaravaśaviśacchītavātābhibhūtaiḥ /
analyzed: ārāt kārīṣa vahneḥ praviracita tṛṇa prastara antar niṣaṇṇaiḥ saṃśīrṇa granthi kanthā vivara vaśa viśat śīta vāta abhibhūtaiḥ

original: MSS_5190-2 nītāḥ kṛcchreṇa pānthaiḥ śvabhiriva niviḍaṃ jānusaṃkocakubjair antardurvāraduḥkhadviguṇatarakṛtāyāmayāmāstri yāmāḥ //
analyzed: nītāḥ kṛcchreṇa pānthaiḥ śvabhiḥ iva nibiḍam jānu saṃkoca kubjaiḥ antar durvāra duḥkha dviguṇatara kṛta āyāma yāmāḥ tris yāmāḥ

original: MSS_5191-1 ārādasau taruvarastava kuntalānām ākalpamātmakusumairabhiyācamānaḥ /
analyzed: ārāt asau taruvaraḥ tava kuntalānām ākalpam ātma kusumaiḥ abhiyācamānaḥ

original: MSS_5191-2 bhūyaḥ samāhvayati yā kalakaṇṭhanādair ārohabhāramṛdugāmini tatra yāmaḥ //
analyzed: bhūyas samāhvayati yā kalakaṇṭha nādaiḥ āroha bhāra mṛdu gāmini tatra yāmaḥ

original: MSS_5192-1 ārāddhaṃ kimu daivataṃ kuvalayaistepe tapaścandramāḥ kiṃ nāmāyamidaṃ ca kāñcanarucāṃ kiṃ bhāgyamujjṛmbhate /
analyzed: ārāddham kimu daivatam kuvalayaiḥ tepe tapaḥ candramāḥ kim nāma ayam idam ca kāñcana rucām kim bhāgyam ujjṛmbhate

original: MSS_5192-2 daivaṃ vādya kimānukūlikamabhūd bālapravālaśriyām asyāḥ smeradṛśo dadhatyavayavaupamyaṃ yadetānyapi //
analyzed: daivam vā adya kim ānukūlikam abhūt bāla pravāla śriyām asyāḥ smera dṛśaḥ dadhati avayava aupamyam yat etāni api

original: MSS_5193-1 ārāddho mūrddhabhiryat tuhinakarakalālaṃkṛtirviśatiryad doṣṇāmuṣṇāṃśumitraṃ bhuvanaparibhavī yatpratāpaprarohaḥ /
analyzed: ārāddhaḥ mūrddhabhiḥ yat tuhinakara kalā alaṃkṛtiḥ viśatiḥ yat bhuvana paribhavī yad pratāpa prarohaḥ

original: MSS_5193-2 yat tat kailāsaśailoddharaṇamapi mṛṣā tat samastaṃ tavābhūt bibhralluṇṭākalīlāṃ yadapaharasi naḥ paṅkajākṣīṃ parokṣe //
analyzed: yat tat kailāsa śaila uddharaṇam api mṛṣā tat samastam tava abhūt bibhrat luṇṭāka līlām yat apaharasi naḥ paṅkaja akṣīm parokṣe

original: MSS_5194-1 ārādhayati yaṃ devaṃ tamutkṛṣṭataraṃ vadet /
analyzed: ārādhayati yam devam tam utkṛṣṭataram vadet

original: MSS_5194-2 tannyūnatāṃ naiva kuryāj joṣayet tasya sevanam //
analyzed: tad nyūna tām nā eva kuryāt joṣayet tasya sevanam

original: MSS_5195-1 ārādhayituḥ prema- pratīkṣaṇārthaṃ spṛhā paraṃ yāsām /
analyzed: ārādhayituḥ prema pratīkṣaṇa artham spṛhā param yāsām

original: MSS_5195-2 tā nanu saubhagadevyo gaṇikāḥ kṛtināṃ samārādhyāḥ //
analyzed: tāḥ nanu saubhaga devyaḥ gaṇikāḥ kṛtinām samārādhyāḥ

original: MSS_5196-1 ārādhitā hi rājāno devavac copasevitāḥ /
analyzed: ārādhitāḥ hi rājānaḥ deva vat ca upasevitāḥ

original: MSS_5196-2 anugrahairyojayanti bhaktān ghnanti viparyaye //
analyzed: anugrahaiḥ yojayanti bhaktān ghnanti viparyaye

original: MSS_5197-1 ārādhitā hi śīlena prayatnaiścopasevitāḥ /
analyzed: ārādhitāḥ hi śīlena prayatnaiḥ ca upasevitāḥ

original: MSS_5197-2 rājānaḥ saṃprasīdanti prakupyanti viparyaye //
analyzed: rājānaḥ saṃprasīdanti prakupyanti viparyaye

original: MSS_5198-1 ārādhito vāpyaparādhito vā khalaḥ karotyeva sadāpakāram /
analyzed: ārādhitaḥ vā api aparādhitaḥ vā khalaḥ karoti eva sadā apakāram

original: MSS_5198-2 mūrdhnā dhṛto pādatale sthito vā daśatyavaśyaṃ khalu dandaśūkaḥ //
analyzed: mūrdhnā pāda tale sthitaḥ vā daśati avaśyam khalu dandaśūkaḥ

original: MSS_5199-1 ārādhyaḥ patireva tasya ca padadvandvānuvṛttirvrataṃ kenaitāḥ sakhi śikṣitāsi vipathaprasthānadurvāsanāḥ /
analyzed: ārādhyaḥ patiḥ eva tasya ca pada dvandva anuvṛttiḥ vratam kena etāḥ sakhi śikṣitā asi vipatha prasthāna durvāsanāḥ

original: MSS_5199-2 kiṃ rūpeṇa na yatra majjati mano yūnāṃ kimācāryakair gūḍhānaṅgarahasyayuktiṣu phalaṃ yeṣāṃ na dīrghaṃ yaśaḥ //
analyzed: kim rūpeṇa na yatra majjati manaḥ yūnām kimācāryakaiḥ gūḍha anaṅga rahasya yuktiṣu phalam yeṣām na dīrgham yaśaḥ

original: MSS_5200-1 ārādhya dugdhajaladhiḥ sudhayaiva devān devāya hanta mahate garalaṃ dideśa /
analyzed: ārādhya dugdha jaladhiḥ sudhayā eva devān devāya hanta mahate garalam dideśa

original: MSS_5200-2 yeṣāṃ dhruvaṃ prakṛtireva jalāśayānāṃ nīceṣu sanmatirasanmatiruttameṣu //
analyzed: yeṣām dhruvam prakṛtiḥ eva jalāśayānām nīceṣu sat matiḥ asat matiḥ uttameṣu

original: MSS_5201-1 ārādhya bhūpatimavāpya tato dhanāni bhokṣyāmahe kila vayaṃ satataṃ sukhāni /
analyzed: ārādhya bhūpatim avāpya tatas dhanāni bhokṣyāmahe kila vayam satatam sukhāni

original: MSS_5201-2 ityāśayā kalivimohitamānasānāṃ kālaḥ prayāti maraṇāvadhireva puṃsām //
analyzed: iti āśayā kali vimohita mānasānām kālaḥ prayāti maraṇa avadhiḥ eva puṃsām

original: MSS_5202-1 ārādhyamāno nṛpatiḥ prayatnād ārādhyate nāma kimatra citram /
analyzed: ārādhyamānaḥ nṛpatiḥ prayatnāt ārādhyate nāma kim atra citram

original: MSS_5202-2 ayaṃ tvapūrvaḥ pratimāviśeṣo yaḥ sevyamāno riputāmupaiti //
analyzed: ayam tu apūrvaḥ pratimā viśeṣaḥ yaḥ sevyamānaḥ ripu tām upaiti

original: MSS_5203-1 ārāmādhipatirvivekavikalo nūnaṃ rasā nīrasā vātyābhiḥ paruṣīkṛtā daśa diśaścaṇḍātapo duḥsahaḥ /
analyzed: ārāma adhipatiḥ viveka vikalaḥ nūnam rasāḥ nīrasāḥ vā atyābhiḥ paruṣīkṛtāḥ daśa diśaḥ caṇḍa ātapaḥ duḥsahaḥ

original: MSS_5203-2 evaṃ dhanvani campakasya sakale samhārahetāvapi tvaṃ siñcannamṛtena toyada kuto'pyāviṣkṛto vedhasā //
analyzed: evam dhanvani campakasya sakale samhāra hetau api tvam siñcan amṛtena toyada kutas api āviṣkṛtaḥ vedhasā

original: MSS_5204-1 ārāmābharaṇasya pallavacayairāpītatigmatviṣaḥ pāthoda praśamaṃ nayāgurutaroretasya dāvajvaram /
analyzed: ārāma ābharaṇasya pallava cayaiḥ āpīta tigma tviṣaḥ pāthoda praśamam naya aguru taroḥ etasya dāva jvaram

original: MSS_5204-2 brūmas tvāmupakārakātara gataprāyāḥ payaḥsaṃpado dagdho'pyeṣa tarurdiśaḥ parimalairāpūrya nirvāsyati //
analyzed: brūmaḥ tvām upakāra kātara gata prāyāḥ payaḥ saṃpadaḥ dagdhaḥ upi eṣa taruḥ diśaḥ parimalaiḥ āpūrya nirvāsyati

original: MSS_5205-1 ārāmukhaṃ kṣurapraṃ ca gopucchaṃ cārdhacandrakam /
analyzed: ārāmukham kṣurapram ca gopuccham ca ardhacandrakam

original: MSS_5205-2 sūcīmukhaṃ ca bhallaṃ ca vatsadantaṃ dvibhallakam //
analyzed: sūcīmukham ca bhallam ca vatsadantam dvi bhallakam

original: MSS_5206-1 karṇikaṃ kākatuṇḍaṃ ca tayānyānyapyanekaśaḥ /
analyzed: karṇikam kākatuṇḍam ca tayā anyāni api anekaśas

original: MSS_5206-2 phalāni deśadeśeṣu bhavanti bahurūpataḥ //
analyzed: phalāni deśa deśeṣu bhavanti bahu rūpataḥ

original: MSS_5207-1 ārāmukhena vai carma kṣurapreṇa ca kārmukam /
analyzed: ārāmukhena vai carma kṣurapreṇa ca kārmukam

original: MSS_5207-2 sūcīmukhena kavacam ardhacandreṇa mastakam //
analyzed: sūcīmukhena kavacam ardhacandreṇa mastakam

original: MSS_5208-1 bhallena hṛdayaṃ vedhyaṃ dvibhallena guṇaḥ śaraḥ /
analyzed: bhallena hṛdayam vedhyam dvi bhallena guṇaḥ śaraḥ

original: MSS_5208-2 lohaṃ ca kākatuṇḍena lakṣyaṃ gopucchakena ca //
analyzed: loham ca kākatuṇḍena lakṣyam gopucchakena ca

original: MSS_5209-1 ārāmaiḥ sadanairhayairgajavarairgānaiḥ parikrīḍanair vādyairyauvanagarvamañjulatarairvṛndaiśca vāmabhruvām /
analyzed: ārāmaiḥ sadanaiḥ hayaiḥ gaja varaiḥ gānaiḥ parikrīḍanaiḥ vādyaiḥ yauvana garva mañjulataraiḥ vṛndaiḥ ca vāma bhruvām

original: MSS_5209-2 muktiḥ syād yadi tadvihāya sakalaṃ caitat pravīṇā narāḥ kartuṃ hanta tapastu muktisukhadaṃ kasmādaraṇyaṃ gatāḥ //
analyzed: muktiḥ syāt yadi tat vihāya sakalam ca etat pravīṇāḥ narāḥ kartum hanta tapaḥ tu mukti sukha dam kasmāt araṇyam gatāḥ

original: MSS_5210-1 ārāmo'yamanargalena balinā bhagnaḥ samagro mayety antaḥsaṃbhṛtaharṣavardhitamadodagraḥ kimunmādyasi /
analyzed: ārāmaḥ ayam anargalena balinā bhagnaḥ samagraḥ mayā iti antar saṃbhṛta harṣa vardhita mada udagraḥ kim unmādyasi

original: MSS_5210-2 mātaṅga prativarśameva bhavato bhāvī nidāghajvaras tatrāpi pratikāramarhasi sakhe samyak samālocitum //
analyzed: mātaṅga prativarśam eva bhavataḥ bhāvī nidāgha jvaraḥ tatra api pratikāram arhasi sakhe samyak samālocitum

original: MSS_5211-1 āripsunā mantrabalānvitena prāgeva kāryo nipuṇaṃ vicāraḥ /
analyzed: āripsunā mantra bala anvitena prāk eva kāryaḥ nipuṇam vicāraḥ

original: MSS_5211-2 doṣṇāṃ balān mantrabalaṃ garīyaḥ śakro'surān mantrabalād vijigye //
analyzed: doṣṇām balāt mantra balam garīyaḥ śakra usurān mantra balāt vijigye

original: MSS_5212-1 ārirādhayiṣuḥ samyag anujīvī mahīpatim /
analyzed: ārirādhayiṣuḥ samyak anujīvī mahīpatim

original: MSS_5212-2 vidyāvinayaśilpādyair ātmānamupapādayet //
analyzed: vidyā vinaya śilpa ādyaiḥ ātmānam upapādayet

original: MSS_5213-1 ārurukṣormuneryogaṃ karma kāraṇamucyate /
analyzed: ārurukṣoḥ muneḥ yogam karma kāraṇam ucyate

original: MSS_5213-2 yogārūḍhasya tasyaiva śamaḥ kāraṇamucyate //
analyzed: yoga ārūḍhasya tasya eva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate

original: MSS_5214-1 āruhya dūramagaṇita- raudrakleśā prakāśayantī svam /
analyzed: āruhya dūram agaṇita raudra kleśā prakāśayantī svam

original: MSS_5214-2 vātapratīcchanapaṭī vahitramiva harasi māṃ sutanu //
analyzed: vahitram iva harasi mām su tano

original: MSS_5215-1 āruhya nṛpatiḥ pūrvam indriyāśvān yaśīkṛtān /
analyzed: āruhya nṛpatiḥ pūrvam indriya aśvān yaśīkṛtān

original: MSS_5215-2 kāmakrodhādikāñ jitvā ripūn ābhyantarāṃśca tān /
analyzed: kāma krodha ādikām jitvā ripūn ābhyantarān ca tān

original: MSS_5216-1 jayedātmānamevādau vijayāyānyavidviṣām /
analyzed: jayet ātmānam eva ādau vijayāya anya vidviṣām

original: MSS_5216-2 ajitātmā hi vivaśo vaśīkuryāt kathaṃ parān //
analyzed: ajita ātmā hi vivaśaḥ vaśīkuryāt katham parān

original: MSS_5217-1 āruhya śailaśikharaṃ tvadvadanāpahṛtakāntisarvasvaḥ /
analyzed: āruhya śaila śikharam tvad vadana apahṛta kānti sarva svaḥ

original: MSS_5217-2 pratikartumivordhvakaraḥ sthitaḥ purastān niśānāthaḥ //
analyzed: pratikartum iva ūrdhva karaḥ sthitaḥ purastāt niśānāthaḥ

original: MSS_5218-1 āruhyākrīdaśailasya candrakāntasthalīmimām /
analyzed: āruhya ākrīda śailasya candrakānta sthalīm imām

original: MSS_5218-2 nṛtyatyeṣa lasaccārucandrakāntaḥ śikhāvalaḥ //
analyzed: nṛtyati eṣa lasat cāru candra kāntaḥ śikhāvalaḥ

original: MSS_5219-1 ārūḍhaḥ patita iti svasaṃbhavo'pi svacchānāṃ pariharaṇīyatāmupaiti /
analyzed: ārūḍhaḥ patitaḥ iti sva saṃbhavaḥ api svacchānām pariharaṇīya tām upaiti

original: MSS_5219-2 karṇebhyaścyutamasitotpalaṃ vadhūnāṃ vīcībhistaṭamanu yannirāsurāpaḥ //
analyzed: karṇebhyaḥ cyutam asita utpalam vadhūnām vīcībhiḥ taṭam anu yat nirāsuḥ āpaḥ

original: MSS_5220-1 ārūḍhakṣitipālabhālavigalatsvedāmbusekoddhatā bherījhāṃkṛticāpaṭaṃkṛticamatkārollasanm ānasā /
analyzed: ārūḍha kṣitipāla bhāla vigalat sveda ambu seka uddhatā bherī jhāṃkṛti cāpa ṭaṃkṛti camatkāra ullasan ānasā

original: MSS_5220-2 kṣubhyatkṣoṇitalaṃsphuratkhurapuṭaṃ cañcaccalatkeśaraṃ mandabhrāntavilocana pratidiśaṃ nṛtyanti vājivrajāḥ //
analyzed: kṣubhyat kṣoṇi talam sphurat khura puṭam cañcat calat keśaram manda bhrānta vilocana pratidiśam nṛtyanti vāji vrajāḥ

original: MSS_5221-1 ārūḍhaveṇutaruṇādharavibhrameṇa mādhuryaśālivadanāmbujamudvahantī /
analyzed: ārūḍha veṇu taruṇa adhara vibhrameṇa mādhurya śāli vadana ambujam udvahantī

original: MSS_5221-2 ālokyatāṃ kimanayā vanadevatā vaḥ kaiśorake vayasi kāpi ca kāntiyaṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: ālokyatām kim anayā vana devatā vaḥ kaiśorake vayasi kā api ca kānti yaṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_5222-1 ārūḍhasya citāṃ kṛtānumaraṇodyogapriyāliṅganaṃ puṇḍrekṣudravapānamulbaṇamahāmohapraluptasmṛte ḥ /
analyzed: ārūḍhasya citām kṛta anumaraṇa udyoga priya āliṅganam puṇḍra ikṣu drava pānam ulbaṇa mahā moha pralupta smṛteḥ

original: MSS_5222-2 vītāsoravataṃsamālyavalayāmodaśca yādṛg bhaved bhāvānāṃ subhagaḥ svabhāvamahimā niścetasas tādṛśaḥ //
analyzed: vīta asoḥ avataṃsa mālya valaya āmodaḥ ca yādṛś bhavet bhāvānām subhagaḥ svabhāva mahimā niścetasaḥ tādṛśaḥ

original: MSS_5223-1 ārūḍhasvāmiko'śvaḥ syād vittacintitasiddhaye /
analyzed: ārūḍha svāmi kośvaḥ syāt vitta cintita siddhaye

original: MSS_5223-2 sarveṣāṃ suratakrīḍā dṛṣṭādau bhogalabdhaye //
analyzed: sarveṣām surata krīḍā dṛṣṭa ādau bhoga labdhaye

original: MSS_5224-1 ārūḍhāntarayauvanasya parito goṣṭhīranubhrāmyatas tattat tāsu manogataṃ sunibhṛtaṃ saṃvyācikīrṣorhareḥ /
analyzed: ārūḍha antara yauvanasya paritas goṣṭhīḥ anubhrāmyataḥ tat tat tāsu manogatam su nibhṛtam saṃvyācikīrṣoḥ hareḥ

original: MSS_5224-2 vegāducchalitāsphuṭākṣaradaśāgarbhās trapāgauravāt pratyañco valitā bhavantu bhavatāṃ kṛtyāya vāgūrmayaḥ //
analyzed: vegāt ucchalita asphuṭa akṣara daśā garbhāḥ trapā gauravāt pratyañcaḥ valitāḥ bhavantu bhavatām kṛtyāya vāc ūrmayaḥ

original: MSS_5225-1 ārūḍho malayāniladvipavaraṃ yukto vilāsānugaiḥ pītaḥ puṣpavilocanairnavalatāpaurāṅganānāṃ gaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: ārūḍhaḥ malaya anila dvipa varam yuktaḥ vilāsa anugaiḥ pītaḥ puṣpa vilocanaiḥ nava latā paura aṅganānām gaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_5225-2 abhrāmyad vanapattane madhumahīpālaḥ sphuratkokilā- līlālāpamiladbhramadbhramarikājhāṃkārabherīr avaiḥ //
analyzed: abhrāmyat vana pattane madhu mahīpālaḥ sphurat kokilāḥ līlā ālāpa milat bhramat bhramarikā jhāṃkāra bherīḥ

original: MSS_5226-1 ārūḍho vāsayaṣṭiṃ gṛhavalabhitale duṣṭamārjārakeṇa krūrāsyaṃ grasyamānaḥ sakṛdapi śanakairyad vicukrośa kīraḥ /
analyzed: ārūḍhaḥ vāsa yaṣṭim gṛha valabhi tale duṣṭa mārjārakeṇa krūra āsyam grasyamānaḥ sakṛt api śanakais yat vicukrośa kīraḥ

original: MSS_5226-2 gaṅgeti svāminīṃ svāmayamamarapaterlabdhavānāsanārdhaṃ yastu traisrotasāmbhaḥ spṛśati mṛśati vā tatkathāṃ ke vidantu //
analyzed: gaṅgā iti svāminīm svām ayam amarapateḥ labdhavān āsana ardham yaḥ tu traisrotasa ambhaḥ spṛśati mṛśati vā tad kathām ke vidantu

original: MSS_5227-1 ārogyaṃ ciramaśvinī narapate toṣaṃ śivaḥ keśavaḥ kalyāṇaṃ tava sarvadā śaśiravī proddīpanaṃ devatāḥ /
analyzed: ārogyam ciram aśvinī narapate toṣam śivaḥ keśavaḥ kalyāṇam tava sarvadā śaśi ravī proddīpanam devatāḥ

original: MSS_5227-2 brahmādyāḥ sakalāḥ subhadramavanaṃ gauryādayo mātaraḥ kurvāte kurute karoti kurutaḥ kurvanti kurvantu ca //
analyzed: brahma ādyāḥ sakalāḥ subhadram avanam gaurī ādayaḥ mātaraḥ kurvāte kurute karoti kurutaḥ kurvanti kurvantu ca

original: MSS_5228-1 ārogyaṃ paramānandaḥ sukhamutsāha eva ca /
analyzed: ārogyam parama ānandaḥ sukham utsāhaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_5228-2 aiśvaryaṃ priyasaṃbhogaṃ vinā sarvaṃ nirarthakam //
analyzed: aiśvaryam priya saṃbhogam vinā sarvam nirarthakam

original: MSS_5229-1 ārogyaṃ bhāskarādicchec śriyamicched hutāśanāt /
analyzed: ārogyam bhāskarāt icchet śriyam icchet hutāśanāt

original: MSS_5229-2 jñānaṃ maheśvarādicchen mokṣamicchej janārdanāt //
analyzed: jñānam maheśvarāt icchet mokṣam icchet janārdanāt

original: MSS_5230-1 ārogyaṃ bhāskarādicched dhanamicched hutāśanāt /
analyzed: ārogyam bhāskarāt icchet dhanam icchet hutāśanāt

original: MSS_5230-2 maheśvarāj jñānamicchen muktimicchej janārdanāt //
analyzed: maheśvarāt jñānam icchet muktim icchet janārdanāt

original: MSS_5231-1 ārogyaṃ vidvattā sajjanamaitrī mahākule janma /
analyzed: ārogyam vidvat tā sat jana maitrī mahā kule janma

original: MSS_5231-2 svādhīnatā ca puṃsāṃ mahadaiśvaryaṃ vināpyarthaiḥ //
analyzed: svādhīna tā ca puṃsām mahat aiśvaryam vinā api arthaiḥ

original: MSS_5232-1 ārogyaṃ saubhāgyaṃ dhanāḍhyatā nāyakatvamānandaḥ /
analyzed: ārogyam saubhāgyam dhana āḍhya tā nāyaka tvam ānandaḥ

original: MSS_5232-2 kṛtapuṇyasya syādiha sadā jayo vāñchitāvāptiḥ //
analyzed: kṛta puṇyasya syāt iha sadā jayaḥ vāñchita avāptiḥ

original: MSS_5233-1 ārogyabuddhivinayodyamaśāstrarāgāḥ pañcāntarāḥ paṭhanasiddhiguṇā bhavanti /
analyzed: ārogya buddhi vinaya udyama śāstra rāgāḥ pañca antarāḥ paṭhana siddhi guṇāḥ bhavanti

original: MSS_5233-2 ācāryapustakanivāsasahāyakarṇā bāhyāstu pañca paṭhanaṃ parivardhayanti //
analyzed: ācārya pustaka nivāsa sahāya karṇāḥ bāhyāḥ tu pañca paṭhanam parivardhayanti

original: MSS_5234-1 ārogyamānṛṇyamavipravāsaḥ sadbhirmanuṣyaiḥ saha saṃprayogaḥ /
analyzed: ārogyam ānṛṇyam avipravāsaḥ sadbhiḥ manuṣyaiḥ saha saṃprayogaḥ

original: MSS_5234-2 svapratyayā vṛttirabhītavāsaḥ ṣaḍ jīvalokasya sukhāni rājan //
analyzed: sva pratyayā vṛttiḥ abhīta vāsaḥ ṣaḍ jīva lokasya sukhāni rājan

original: MSS_5235-1 ārogyalakṣmīrupayāti pitta- jvarāturaṃ reṇukaṣāyabhājam /
analyzed: ārogya lakṣmīḥ upayāti pitta jvara āturam reṇu kaṣāya bhājam

original: MSS_5235-2 mā tvaṃ yathā ratnakale smarārtā kṛtaprakopapraśamā sakhībhiḥ //
analyzed: mā tvam yathā ratna kale smara ārtā kṛta prakopa praśamā sakhībhiḥ

original: MSS_5236-1 āroḍhuṃ varamaupavāhyamapahartuṃ sundarī kanyakā bhoktuṃ bhogamupasthitaṃ sukhamalaṃkartuṃ ca ratnaistanum /
analyzed: āroḍhum varam aupavāhyam apahartum sundarī kanyakā bhoktum bhogam upasthitam sukham alaṃkartum ca ratnaiḥ tanum

original: MSS_5236-2 samnahyantyamṛtāndhaso hi śamite yenaiva hālāhale sa svāmī mama daivataṃ taditaro nāmnāpi na mnāyate //
analyzed: samnahyanti amṛta andhasaḥ hi śamite yena eva hālāhale sa svāmī mama daivatam tad itaraḥ nāmnā api na mnāyate

original: MSS_5237-1 āropayasi mudhā kiṃ nāhamabhijñā kila tvadaṅkasya /
analyzed: āropayasi mudhā kim na aham abhijñā kila tvad aṅkasya

original: MSS_5237-2 divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ sthitveti na yuktamabhidhātum //
analyzed: divyam varṣa sahasram sthitvā iti na yuktam abhidhātum

original: MSS_5238-1 āropitaḥ pṛthunitambataṭe taruṇyā kaṇṭhe ca bāhulatayā niviḍaṃ gṛhītaḥ /
analyzed: āropitaḥ pṛthu nitamba taṭe taruṇyā kaṇṭhe ca bāhu latayā nibiḍam gṛhītaḥ

original: MSS_5238-2 uttuṅgapīnakucanirbharapīḍito'yaṃ kumbhaḥ karīṣadahanasya phalāni bhuṅkte //
analyzed: uttuṅga pīna kuca nirbhara pīḍita uyam kumbhaḥ karīṣa dahanasya phalāni bhuṅkte

original: MSS_5239-1 āropitā api prājyā guṇā lokeṣu pūjitaiḥ /
analyzed: āropitāḥ api prājyāḥ guṇāḥ lokeṣu pūjitaiḥ

original: MSS_5239-2 pūjayantīha dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratimā dyuḥsadāṃ nanu //
analyzed: pūjayanti iha dṛṣṭa antaḥ pratimā dyuḥsadām nanu

original: MSS_5240-1 āropitā śilāyām aśmeva tvaṃ bhaveti mantreṇa /
analyzed: āropitā śilāyām aśmā iva tvam bhava iti mantreṇa

original: MSS_5240-2 magnāpi pariṇayāpadi jāramukhaṃ vīkṣya hasitaiva //
analyzed: magnā api pariṇaya āpadi jāra mukham vīkṣya hasitā eva

original: MSS_5241-1 āropyate'śmā śailāgraṃ yathā yatnena bhūyasā /
analyzed: āropyate īśmā śaila agram yathā yatnena bhūyasā

original: MSS_5241-2 nipātyate sukhenādhas tathātmā guṇadoṣayoḥ //
analyzed: nipātyate sukhena adhas tathā ātmā guṇa doṣayoḥ

original: MSS_5242-1 ārohaṇaṃ govṛṣakuñjarāṇāṃ prāsādaśailāgravanaspatīnām /
analyzed: ārohaṇam go vṛṣa kuñjarāṇām prāsāda śaila agra vanaspatīnām

original: MSS_5242-2 viṣṭhānulepo rudhiraṃ mṛtaṃ ca svapneṣvagamyāgamanaṃ ca dhanyam //
analyzed: viṣṭhā anulepaḥ rudhiram mṛtam ca svapneṣu agamyā gamanam ca dhanyam

original: MSS_5243-1 ārohaṇāya tava sajja ivāsti tatra sopānaśobhivapuraśmavalicchaṭābhiḥ /
analyzed: ārohaṇāya tava sajjaḥ iva asti tatra sopāna śobhi vapuḥ aśma vali chaṭābhiḥ

original: MSS_5243-2 bhogīndraveṣṭaśataghṛṣṭikṛtābhirabdhi- kṣubdhācalaḥ kanakaketakagotragātri //
analyzed: bhogi indra veṣṭa śata ghṛṣṭi kṛta abhirabdhi kṣubdha acalaḥ kanakaketaka gotra gātri

original: MSS_5244-1 ārohatu giriśikharaṃ samudramullaṅghya yātu pātālam /
analyzed: ārohatu giri śikharam samudram ullaṅghya yātu pātālam

original: MSS_5244-2 vidhilikhitākṣaramālaṃ phalati kapālaṃ na bhūpālaḥ //
analyzed: vidhi likhita akṣara mālam phalati kapālam na bhūpālaḥ

original: MSS_5245-1 ārohatyavanīruhaḥ praviśati śvabhraṃ nagaiḥ spardhate khaṃ vyāledhi viceṣṭate kṣititale kuñjodare līya /
analyzed: ārohati avanīruhaḥ praviśati śvabhram nagaiḥ spardhate kham vyāledhi viceṣṭate kṣiti tale kuñja udare

original: MSS_5245-2 antarbhrāmyati koṭarasya virasatyālambate vīrudhaḥ kiṃ tad yanna karoti mārutavaśaṃ yātah kṛśānurvane //
analyzed: antar bhrāmyati koṭarasya virasati ālambate vīrudhaḥ kim tat yat na karoti māruta vaśam kṛśānuḥ vane

original: MSS_5246-1 ārohanti sukhāsanānyapaṭavo nāgān hayāṃs tajjuṣas tāmbūlādyupabhuñjate naṭaviṭāḥ khādanti hastyādayaḥ /
analyzed: ārohanti sukha āsanāni apaṭavaḥ nāgān hayān tad juṣaḥ tāmbūla ādi upabhuñjate naṭa viṭāḥ khādanti hasti ādayaḥ

original: MSS_5246-2 prāsāde caṭakādayo'pi nivasantyete na pātraṃ stuteḥ sa stutyo bhuvane prayacchati kṛtī lokāya yah kāmitām //
analyzed: prāsāde caṭaka ādayaḥ api nivasanti ete na pātram stuteḥ sa stutyaḥ bhuvane prayacchati kṛtī lokāya kāmitām

original: MSS_5247-1 ārohavallībhirivāmbudhārā- rājībhirābhūmivilambinībhiḥ /
analyzed: āroha vallībhiḥ iva ambu dhārāḥ rājībhiḥ ābhūmi vilambinībhiḥ

original: MSS_5247-2 saṃlakṣyate vyoma vaṭadrumābham ambhodharaśyāmadalaprakāśam //
analyzed: saṃlakṣyate vyoma vaṭa druma ābham ambhodhara śyāma dala prakāśam

original: MSS_5248-1 ārjavaṃ cānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca damaścendriyanigrahaḥ /
analyzed: ārjavam ca ānṛśaṃsyam ca damaḥ ca indriya nigrahaḥ

original: MSS_5248-2 eṣa sādhāraṇo dharmaś cāturvarṇye'bravīn manuḥ //
analyzed: eṣa sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ cāturvarṇye bravīt manuḥ

original: MSS_5249-1 ārjavaṃ pratipadyasva putreṣu satataṃ vibho /
analyzed: ārjavam pratipadyasva putreṣu satatam vibho

original: MSS_5249-2 iha kīrtiṃ parāṃ prāpya pretya svargamavāpsyasi //
analyzed: iha kīrtim parām prāpya pretya svargam avāpsyasi

original: MSS_5250-1 ārjavatvaṃ caturthaṃ ca pañcamaṃ dharmameva hi /
analyzed: ārjava tvam caturtham ca pañcamam dharmam eva hi

original: MSS_5250-2 madhuratvaṃ tataḥ proktaṃ ṣaṣṭhameva varānane //
analyzed: madhura tvam tatas proktam ṣaṣṭham eva varānane

original: MSS_5251-1 ārjavamamalakarāṇāṃ vinayo vararatnamukuṭānām /
analyzed: ārjavam amala karāṇām vinayaḥ vara ratna mukuṭānām

original: MSS_5251-2 dyūtaṃ durvyasanānāṃ strījitatā marutaṭīpiśācānām //
analyzed: dyūtam durvyasanānām strī jita tā maru taṭī piśācānām

original: MSS_5252-1 ārjavena dhṛtā dīkṣā yā no daivaṃ paraṃ prati /
analyzed: ārjavena dhṛtā dīkṣā yā naḥ daivam param prati

original: MSS_5252-2 atyantamānuṣīyābhyaḥ pīḍābhyas tadvimocanam //
analyzed: atyanta mānuṣīyābhyaḥ pīḍābhyaḥ tad vimocanam

original: MSS_5253-1 ārjavena naraṃ yuktam ārjavāt savypatrapam /
analyzed: ārjavena naram yuktam ārjavāt sa vypatrapam

original: MSS_5253-2 aśaktimantaṃ manyanto dharṣayanti kubuddhayaḥ //
analyzed: aśaktimantam manyantaḥ dharṣayanti ku buddhayaḥ

original: MSS_5254-1 ārtatrāṇaparāyaṇena kariṇā dāhādimūleti yad vākyaṃ cakradhareṇa nakramukhato hākārarorīkṛtam /
analyzed: ārta trāṇa parāyaṇena kariṇā dāha ādi mūla iti yat vākyam cakradhareṇa nakra mukhataḥ hākāra rorīkṛtam

original: MSS_5254-2 yaḥ stambhe karatāḍanadhvanirabhūt karṇe surasyāpyaho hā kṛṣṇeti yadakṣayaṃ sa bhagavān pāyādapāyājjagat //
analyzed: yaḥ stambhe kara tāḍana dhvaniḥ abhūt karṇe surasya api aho hā kṛṣṇa iti yat akṣayam sa bhagavān pāyāt apāyāt jagat

original: MSS_5255-1 ārtaduḥkhyaparitrāṇadurgatādi yathākramam /
analyzed: ārta duḥkhya paritrāṇa durgata ādi yathākramam

original: MSS_5255-2 pātramāhurdayālūnām alābhe guṇavāniti //
analyzed: pātram āhuḥ dayālūnām alābhe guṇavān iti

original: MSS_5256-1 ārtadrutasvarajñā vibhinnadīnaprabhinnalaghuraudrāḥ /
analyzed: ārta druta svara jñāḥ vibhinna dīna prabhinna laghu raudrāḥ

original: MSS_5256-2 nindyāḥ śubhāstu śabdāḥ pramuditaparipūrṇadṛḍhaśāntāḥ //
analyzed: nindyāḥ śubhāḥ tu śabdāḥ pramudita paripūrṇa dṛḍha śāntāḥ

original: MSS_5257-1 ārtasya me praṇamato jagadantarātman paśyan na paśyasi vibho na śṛṇoṣi śṛṇvan /
analyzed: ārtasya me praṇamataḥ jagat antarātman paśyan na paśyasi vibho na śṛṇoṣi śṛṇvan

original: MSS_5257-2 durdaivakumbhajanuṣā nanu sāṃprataṃ me pītastadīyakaruṇāvaruṇālayo'pi //
analyzed: durdaiva kumbha januṣā nanu sāṃpratam me pītaḥ tadīya karuṇā varuṇālayaḥ api

original: MSS_5258-1 ārtā devān namasyanti tapaḥ kurvanti rogiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ārtāḥ devān namasyanti tapaḥ kurvanti rogiṇaḥ

original: MSS_5258-2 nirdhanā dānamicchanti vṛddhā nārī pativratā //
analyzed: nirdhanāḥ dānam icchanti vṛddhā nārī pativratā

original: MSS_5259-1 ārtānāmārtisaṃbandhaṃ prītiviśrāmakāraṇam /
analyzed: ārtānām ārti saṃbandham prīti viśrāma kāraṇam

original: MSS_5259-2 kena ratnamidaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ mitramityakṣaradvayam //
analyzed: kena ratnam idam sṛṣṭam mitram iti akṣara dvayam

original: MSS_5260-1 ārtānāmiha jantūnām ārticchedaṃ karoti yaḥ /
analyzed: ārtānām iha jantūnām ārti chedam karoti yaḥ

original: MSS_5260-2 śaṅkhacakragadāhīno dvibhujaḥ parameśvaraḥ //
MSS_5261-1 ārtārte mudite hṛṣṭā proṣite malinā kṛśā /
analyzed: ārta ārte mudite hṛṣṭā proṣite malinā kṛśā

original: MSS_5261-2 mṛte mriyeta yā patyau sā strī jñeyā pativratā //
analyzed: mṛte mriyeta yā patyau sā strī jñeyā pativratā

original: MSS_5262-1 ārteṣu dīyate dānaṃ śūnyaliṅgasya pūjanam /
analyzed: ārteṣu dīyate dānam śūnya liṅgasya pūjanam

original: MSS_5262-2 anāthapretasaṃskāram aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet //
analyzed: labhet

original: MSS_5263-1 ārteṣu vipreṣu dayānvitaśca yacchraddhayā svalpamupaiti dānam /
analyzed: ārteṣu vipreṣu dayā anvitaḥ ca yad śraddhayā su alpam upaiti dānam

original: MSS_5263-2 anantapāraṃ samupaiti rājan yaddīyate tanna labhed dvijebhyaḥ //
analyzed: ananta pāram samupaiti rājan yat dīyate tat na labhet dvijebhyaḥ

original: MSS_5264-1 ārto matsadṛśo nānyas tvatto nānyaḥ kṛpāparaḥ /
analyzed: ārtaḥ mad sadṛśaḥ na anyaḥ tvattaḥ na anyaḥ kṛpā paraḥ

original: MSS_5264-2 tulya evāvayoryogaḥ kathaṃ nātha na pāsi mām //
analyzed: tulyaḥ eva āvayoḥ yogaḥ katham nātha na pāsi mām

original: MSS_5265-1 ārto vā yadi vā trastaḥ pareṣāṃ śaraṇāgataḥ /
analyzed: ārtaḥ vā yadi vā trastaḥ pareṣām śaraṇa āgataḥ

original: MSS_5265-2 ariḥ prāṇān parityajya rakṣitavyaḥ kṛtātmanā //
analyzed: ariḥ prāṇān parityajya rakṣitavyaḥ kṛtātmanā

original: MSS_5266-1 ārdrakīkasamukhaḥ purataśced dṛśyate bhavati tacchubhadaḥ śvā /
analyzed: ārdrakīka samukhaḥ puratas ced dṛśyate bhavati tat śubha daḥ śvā

original: MSS_5266-2 carma śuṣkamathavāsthi viśuṣkaṃ bibhradeṣa maraṇaṃ vidadhāti //
analyzed: carma śuṣkam athavā asthi viśuṣkam bibhrat eṣa maraṇam vidadhāti

original: MSS_5267-1 ārdramapi stanajaghanān- nirasya sutanu tvayaitadunmuktam /
analyzed: ārdram api stana jaghanāt nirasya su tano tvayā etat unmuktam

original: MSS_5267-2 khasthamavāptumiva tvāṃ tapanāṃśūnaṃśukaṃ pibati //
analyzed: kha stham avāptum iva tvām tapana aṃśūn aṃśukam pibati

original: MSS_5268-1 ārdrāṃ kaṇṭhe mukhābjasrajamavanamayatyambikā jānulambāṃ sthāne kṛtvendulekhāṃ nibiḍayati jaṭāḥ pannagendreṇa nandī /
analyzed: ārdrām kaṇṭhe mukha abja srajam avanamayati ambikā jānu lambām sthāne kṛtvā indu lekhām nibiḍayati jaṭāḥ pannaga indreṇa nandī

original: MSS_5268-2 kālaḥ kṛttiṃ nibadhnātyupanayati kare kālarātriḥ kapālaṃ śaṃbhornṛtyāvatāre pariṣaditi pṛthagvyāpṛtā vaḥ punātu //
analyzed: kālaḥ kṛttim nibadhnāti upanayati kare kālarātriḥ kapālam śaṃbhoḥ nṛtyāvatāre pariṣad iti pṛthak vyāpṛtā vaḥ punātu

original: MSS_5269-1 ārdrālaktakamasyāś caraṇaṃ mukhamārutena vījayitum /
analyzed: ārdra alaktakam asyāḥ caraṇam mukha mārutena vījayitum

original: MSS_5269-2 pratipannaḥ prathamataraḥ saṃprati sevāvakāśo me //
analyzed: pratipannaḥ prathamataraḥ saṃprati sevā avakāśaḥ me

original: MSS_5270-1 āryakarmaṇi rajyante bhūtikarmāṇi kurvate /
analyzed: ārya karmaṇi rajyante bhūti karmāṇi kurvate

original: MSS_5270-2 hitaṃ ca nābhyasūyanti paṇḍitā bharatarṣabha //
analyzed: hitam ca na abhyasūyanti paṇḍitāḥ bharata ṛṣabha

original: MSS_5271-1 āryajananinditānāṃ pāpaikarasaprakāśanārīṇām /
analyzed: ārya jana ninditānām pāpa eka rasa prakāśa nārīṇām

original: MSS_5271-2 etāvāneva guṇo yadabhīṣṭasamāgamo nirāvaraṇaḥ //
analyzed: etāvān eva guṇaḥ yat abhīṣṭa samāgamaḥ nirāvaraṇaḥ

original: MSS_5272-1 āryajuṣṭamidaṃ vṛttam iti vijñāya śāśvatam /
analyzed: ārya juṣṭam idam vṛttam iti vijñāya śāśvatam

original: MSS_5272-2 santaḥ parārthaṃ kurvāṇā nāvekṣante pratikriyām //
analyzed: santaḥ para artham kurvāṇāḥ na avekṣante pratikriyām

original: MSS_5273-1 āryatā puruṣajñānaṃ śauryaṃ karuṇaveditā /
analyzed: ārya tā puruṣa jñānam śauryam karuṇa vedi tā

original: MSS_5273-2 sthaulalakṣyaṃ ca satatam udāsīnaguṇodayaḥ //
analyzed: sthaulalakṣyam ca satatam udāsīna guṇa udayaḥ

original: MSS_5274-1 āryatvaṃ ca caturthaṃ ca pañcamaṃ dharmameva hi /
analyzed: ārya tvam ca caturtham ca pañcamam dharmam eva hi

original: MSS_5274-2 ṣaṣṭhaṃ satītvaṃ dṛḍhatā saptamaṃ sāhaso'ṣṭamam //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham satī tvam dṛḍha tā saptamam sāhasā uṣṭamam

original: MSS_5275-1 āryadeśakularūpabalāyur- buddhibandhuramavāpya naratvam /
analyzed: ārya deśa kula rūpa bala āyuḥ buddhi bandhuram avāpya nara tvam

original: MSS_5275-2 dharmakarma na karoti jaḍo yaḥ potamujjhati payodhigataḥ saḥ //
analyzed: dharma karma na karoti jaḍaḥ yaḥ potam ujjhati payodhi gataḥ saḥ

original: MSS_5276-1 āryaputra pitā mātā bhrātā putras tathā snuṣā /
analyzed: ārya putra pitā mātā bhrātā putraḥ tathā snuṣā

original: MSS_5276-2 svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhāgyamupāsate //
analyzed: svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svam svam bhāgyam upāsate

original: MSS_5276-3 bharturbhāgyaṃ tu bhāryaikā prāpnoti puruṣarṣabha //
analyzed: bhartuḥ bhāgyam tu bhāryā ekā prāpnoti puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: MSS_5277-1 āryānaṅga mahāvrataṃ vidadhatā vindhyānilaiḥ pāraṇāṃ kṛtvā sāṅgamakāri kena muralākūle kaṭhoraṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: ārya anaṅga mahā vratam vidadhatā vindhya anilaiḥ pāraṇām kṛtvā sa aṅgam akāri kena muralā kūle kaṭhoram tapaḥ

original: MSS_5277-2 yenāsyā ratikhedameduramṛduśvāsādhivāsaspṛśaḥ pīyante'dharasīdhavo vihasitajyotsnopadaṃśaṃ rahaḥ //
analyzed: yena asyāḥ rati kheda medura mṛdu śvāsa adhivāsa spṛśaḥ pīyantedhara sīdhavaḥ vihasita jyotsnā upadaṃśam rahaḥ

original: MSS_5278-1 āryā mukhe tu capalā tathāpi caryā na me yataḥ sā tu /
analyzed: āryā mukhe tu capalā tathā api caryā na me yatas sā tu

original: MSS_5278-2 dakṣā gṛhakṛtyeṣu ta- thā duḥkhe bhavati duḥkhārtā //
analyzed: dakṣā gṛhakṛtyeṣu ta thā duḥkhe bhavati duḥkha ārtā

original: MSS_5279-1 ārye karmaṇi yuñjānaḥ pāpe vā punarīśvaraḥ /
analyzed: ārye karmaṇi yuñjānaḥ pāpe vā punar īśvaraḥ

original: MSS_5279-2 vyāpya bhūtāni carate na cāyamiti lakṣyate //
analyzed: vyāpya bhūtāni carate na ca ayam iti lakṣyate

original: MSS_5280-1 āryeṇa sukaraṃ hyāhury āryakarma dhanaṃjaya /
analyzed: āryeṇa sukaram hi āhuḥ ārya karma dhanaṃjaya

original: MSS_5280-2 anāryakarma tvāryeṇa suduṣkarataraṃ bhuvi //
analyzed: anārya karma tu āryeṇa su duṣkarataram bhuvi

original: MSS_5281-1 ālakṣya dantamukulān animittahāsair avyaktavarṇaramaṇīyavacaḥ pravṛttīn /
analyzed: ālakṣya danta mukulān animitta hāsaiḥ avyakta varṇa ramaṇīya vacaḥ pravṛttīn

original: MSS_5281-2 aṅkāśrayapraṇayinas tanayān vahanto dhanyās tadaṅgarajasā malinībhavanti //
analyzed: aṅka āśraya praṇayinaḥ tanayān vahantaḥ dhanyāḥ tad aṅga rajasā malinībhavanti

original: MSS_5282-1 ā laṅkānāthanārīstanataralapayovīcimudrāt samudrād ā svargaṅgātaraṅgāvaliviralaśilādustarāduttarādreḥ /
analyzed: ā laṅkā nātha nārī stana tarala payaḥ vīci mudrāt samudrāt ā svargaṅgā taraṅga āvali virala śilā dustarāt uttara adreḥ

original: MSS_5282-2 ā prākśailāsurastrīsuratagativido magnabhāsvanmṛgāṅkād ā ca prācetasābdherbhavatu mama puraḥ ko'pi yadyasti vīraḥ //
analyzed: ā prāk śaila asura strī surata gati vidaḥ magna bhāsvat mṛgāṅkāt ā ca prācetasa abdheḥ bhavatu mama puras kaḥ api yadi asti vīraḥ

original: MSS_5283-1 ālapati pikavadhūriva paśyati hariṇīva calati haṃsīva /
analyzed: ālapati pika vadhūḥ iva paśyati hariṇī iva calati haṃsī iva

original: MSS_5283-2 sphurati taḍillatikeva svadate tuhināṃśulekheva //
analyzed: sphurati taḍit latikā iva svadate tuhināṃśu lekhā iva

original: MSS_5284-1 ālapa yathā yathecchasi yuktaṃ tava kitava kimapavārayasi /
analyzed: ālapa yathā yathā icchasi yuktam tava kitava kim apavārayasi

original: MSS_5284-2 strījātilāñchanamasau jīvitaraṅkā sakhī subhaga //
analyzed: strī jāti lāñchanam asau jīvita raṅkā sakhī subhaga

original: MSS_5285-1 ālambihemaraśanāh stanasaktahārāḥ kandarpadarpaśithilīkṛtagātrayaṣṭyaḥ /
analyzed: ālambi hema raśanāḥ stana sakta hārāḥ kandarpa darpa śithilīkṛta gātra yaṣṭyaḥ

original: MSS_5285-2 māse madhau madhurakokilabhṛṅganādair nāryo haranti hṛdayaṃ prasabhaṃ narāṇām //
analyzed: māse madhau madhura kokila bhṛṅga nādaiḥ nāryaḥ haranti hṛdayam prasabham narāṇām

original: MSS_5286-1 ālambe jagadālambe herambacaraṇāmbuje /
analyzed: ālambe jagat ālambe heramba caraṇa ambuje

original: MSS_5286-2 śuṣyanti yadrajaḥ sparśāt sadyaḥ pratyūhavārdhayaḥ //
analyzed: śuṣyanti yad rajaḥ sparśāt sadyas pratyūha vārdhayaḥ

original: MSS_5287-1 ālambyāṅgaṇavāṭikāparisare svecchānatāṃ śākhikāṃ keyūrībhavadalpaśeṣavalayā bālā samastaṃ dinam /
analyzed: ālambya aṅgaṇa vāṭikā parisare sva icchā natām śākhikām keyūrībhavat alpa śeṣa valayā bālā samastam dinam

original: MSS_5287-2 sā daivopahṛtasya mūḍhamanaso bhagnāvadheradya me panthānaṃ vivṛtāśruṇā vadanakenālokya kiṃ vakṣyati //
analyzed: sā daiva upahṛtasya mūḍha manasaḥ bhagna avadheḥ adya me panthānam vivṛta aśruṇā vadanakena ālokya kim vakṣyati

original: MSS_5288-1 ālambhyāṅgaṇavāpikāparisare cūtadrume mañjarīṃ sarpatsāndraparāgalampaṭaraṇadbhṛṅgāṅganāśobhinīm /
analyzed: ālambhya aṅgaṇa vāpikā parisare cūta drume mañjarīm sarpat sāndra parāga lampaṭa raṇat bhṛṅga aṅganā śobhinīm

original: MSS_5288-2 manye svāṃ tanumuttarīyaśakalenācchādya bālā sphurat- kaṇṭhadhvānanirodhakampitakucaśvāsodgamā roditi //
analyzed: manye svām tanum uttarīya śakalena ācchādya bālā sphurat kaṇṭha dhvāna nirodha kampita kuca śvāsa udgamā roditi

original: MSS_5289-1 ālavāle sthitaṃ toyaṃ śoṣaṃ na bhajate yadā /
analyzed: ālavāle sthitam toyam śoṣam na bhajate yadā

original: MSS_5289-2 ajīrṇaṃ tad vijānīyān na deyaṃ tādṛśe jalam //
analyzed: ajīrṇam tat vijānīyāt na deyam tādṛśe jalam

original: MSS_5290-1 ālasyaṃ kuru pāpakarmaṇi bhava krūraḥ krudhas tāḍane naiṣṭhuryaṃ bhaja lobhamohaviṣaye nidrāṃ samādhau hareḥ /
analyzed: ālasyam kuru pāpa karmaṇi bhava krūraḥ krudhaḥ tāḍane naiṣṭhuryam bhaja lobha moha viṣaye nidrām samādhau hareḥ

original: MSS_5290-2 jāḍyaṃ gaccha parāpavādakathane drohaṃ vidhehi smare doṣā eva guṇatvamevamakhilā yāsyanti cetas tava //
analyzed: jāḍyam gaccha para apavāda kathane droham vidhehi smare doṣāḥ eva guṇa tvam evam akhilāḥ yāsyanti cetaḥ tava

original: MSS_5291-1 ālasyaṃ prathamaṃ paścād vyādhipīḍā prajāyate /
analyzed: ālasyam prathamam paścāt vyādhi pīḍā prajāyate

original: MSS_5291-2 pramādaḥ saṃśayasthāne cittasyehānavasthitiḥ //
analyzed: pramādaḥ saṃśaya sthāne cittasya iha anavasthitiḥ

original: MSS_5292-1 ālasyaṃ madamohau ca cāpalaṃ goṣṭhireva ca /
analyzed: ālasyam mada mohau ca cāpalam goṣṭhiḥ eva ca

original: MSS_5292-2 stabdhatā cābhimānitvaṃ tathātyāgitvameva ca /
analyzed: stabdha tā ca abhimāni tvam tathā a tyāgi tvam eva ca

original: MSS_5292-3 ete vai sapta doṣāstu sadā vidyārthināṃ matāḥ //
analyzed: ete vai sapta doṣāḥ tu sadā vidyā arthinām matāḥ

original: MSS_5293-1 ālasyaṃ yadi na bhavej jagatyanarthaḥ ko na syād bahudhanako bahuśruto vā /
analyzed: ālasyam yadi na bhavet jagati anarthaḥ kaḥ na syāt bahu dhanakaḥ bahu śrutaḥ vā

original: MSS_5293-2 ālasyādiyamavaniḥ sasāgarāntā saṃpūrṇā narapaśubhiśca nirdhanaiśca //
analyzed: ālasya ādi iyam avaniḥ sa sāgara antā saṃpūrṇā nara paśubhiḥ ca nirdhanaiḥ ca

original: MSS_5294-1 ālasyaṃ strīsevā sarogatā janmabhūmivātsalyam /
analyzed: ālasyam strī sevā sa roga tā janma bhūmi vātsalyam

original: MSS_5294-2 saṃtoṣo bhīrutvaṃ ṣaḍ vyāghātā mahattvasya //
analyzed: saṃtoṣaḥ bhīru tvam ṣaṭ vyāghātāḥ mahat tvasya

original: MSS_5295-1 ālasyaṃ sthiratāmupaiti bhajate cāpalyamudyogitāṃ mūkatvaṃ mitabhāṣitāṃ vitanute maugdhyaṃ bhavedārjavam /
analyzed: ālasyam sthira tām upaiti bhajate cāpalyam udyogi tām mūka tvam mita bhāṣi tām vitanute maugdhyam bhavet ārjavam

original: MSS_5295-2 pātrāpātravicārabhāvaviraho yacchatyudārātmatāṃ mātarlakṣmi tava prasādavaśato doṣā api syurguṇāḥ //
analyzed: pātra apātra vicāra bhāva virahaḥ yacchati udāra ātma tām mātar lakṣmi tava prasāda vaśataḥ doṣāḥ api syuḥ guṇāḥ

original: MSS_5296-1 ālasyaṃ harati prajñāṃ dhanamāyuryaśo balam /
analyzed: ālasyam harati prajñām dhanam āyuḥ yaśaḥ balam

original: MSS_5296-2 yasminnāste tadālasyaṃ sarvadoṣākarastu saḥ //
analyzed: yasmin na āste tad ālasyam sarva doṣa ākaraḥ tu saḥ

original: MSS_5297-1 ālasyaṃ hi manuṣyāṇāṃ śarīrastho mahān ripuḥ /
analyzed: ālasyam hi manuṣyāṇām śarīra sthaḥ mahān ripuḥ

original: MSS_5297-2 nāstyudyamasamo bandhuḥ kṛtvā yaṃ nāvasīdati //
analyzed: na asti udyama samaḥ bandhuḥ kṛtvā yam na avasīdati

original: MSS_5298-1 ālasyamapi pārīndraṃ pratipadya vijṛmbhate /
analyzed: ālasyam api pāri indram pratipadya vijṛmbhate

original: MSS_5298-2 hatabhāgaṃ prayatno'pi pratihanyata eva hā //
analyzed: hata bhāgam prayatnaḥ api pratihanyate eva hā

original: MSS_5299-1 ālasyāt susahāyo'pi na gacchatyudayaṃ janaḥ /
analyzed: ālasyāt su sahāyaḥ api na gacchati udayam janaḥ

original: MSS_5299-2 hastāgrāsphālito bhūmau toyārdra iva kandukaḥ //
analyzed: hasta agra āsphālitaḥ bhūmau toya ārdraḥ iva kandukaḥ

original: MSS_5300-1 ālasyena hatā vidyā parahastagatāḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: ālasyena hatā vidyā para hasta gatāḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_5300-2 alpabījaṃ hataṃ kṣetraṃ hataṃ sainyamanāyakam //
analyzed: alpa bījam hatam kṣetram hatam sainyam anāyakam

original: MSS_5301-1 ālānaṃ jayakuñjarasya dṛṣadāṃ seturvipadvāridheḥ pūrvādriḥ karavālacaṇḍamahaso līlopadhānaṃ śriyaḥ /
analyzed: ālānam jaya kuñjarasya dṛṣadām setuḥ vipad vāridheḥ pūrva adriḥ karavāla caṇḍa mahasaḥ līlā upadhānam śriyaḥ

original: MSS_5301-2 saṃgrāmāmṛtasāgarapramathanakrīḍāvidhau mandaro rājan rājati vīravairivanitāvaidhavyadaste bhujaḥ //
analyzed: saṃgrāma amṛta sāgara pramathana krīḍā vidhau mandaraḥ rājan rājati vīra vairi vanitā vaidhavya daḥ te bhujaḥ

original: MSS_5302-1 ālānatvaruṣevaitā dantibhirvṛkṣapaṅktayaḥ /
analyzed: ālāna tva ruṣā iva etāḥ dantibhiḥ vṛkṣa paṅktayaḥ

original: MSS_5302-2 sphurat kaṭakaṭārāvaṃ pātyante kṛtacitkṛtaiḥ //
analyzed: sphurat kaṭakaṭārāvam pātyante kṛta citkṛtaiḥ

original: MSS_5303-1 ālānamunmūlya sukhābhidhānaṃ tāruṇyanāge gamanodyate'smin /
analyzed: ālānam unmūlya sukha abhidhānam tāruṇya nāge gamana udyate smin

original: MSS_5303-2 palāyite kāmigaṇe'ṅganānāṃ vimardabhītyeva kucāḥ patanti //
analyzed: palāyite kāmi gaṇa iṅganānām vimarda bhītyā iva kucāḥ patanti

original: MSS_5304-1 ālāne gṛhyate hastī vājī valgāsu gṛhyate /
analyzed: ālāne gṛhyate hastī vājī valgāsu gṛhyate

original: MSS_5304-2 hṛdaye gṛhyate nārī yadīdaṃ nāsti gamyatām //
analyzed: hṛdaye gṛhyate nārī yadi idam na asti gamyatām

original: MSS_5305-1 ālāpaṃ kalakaṇṭhikā na kurute kīrā na dhīradhvaniṃ vyāhāraṃ kalayanti komalagiraḥ kūjanti no barhiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ālāpam kalakaṇṭhikā na kurute kīrāḥ na dhīra dhvanim vyāhāram kalayanti komala giraḥ kūjanti no barhiṇaḥ

original: MSS_5305-2 nīrāḍambaradurdināmbaratale dūre dvirephadhvaniḥ kākāḥ kevalameva keṅkṛtaravaiḥ kurvanti karṇajvaram //
analyzed: nīra āḍambara durdina ambara tale dūre dvirepha dhvaniḥ kākāḥ kevalam eva keṅkṛta ravaiḥ kurvanti karṇa jvaram

original: MSS_5306-1 ālāpaḥ smitakaumudīsahacaro dṛṣṭiḥ praharṣojjvalā bhrūrnṛtyādhvaradīkṣitā caraṇayornyāsaḥ same bhaṅguraḥ /
analyzed: ālāpaḥ smita kaumudī sahacaraḥ dṛṣṭiḥ praharṣa ujjvalā bhrūḥ nṛtya adhvara dīkṣitā caraṇayoḥ nyāsaḥ same bhaṅguraḥ

original: MSS_5306-2 veśeṣu kṣaṇikaspṛhā madavidherbandho na vādāśrayas tanvyā naikavikārabhūrmadhumadaprāyo madaḥ sphūrjati //
analyzed: veśeṣu kṣaṇika spṛhā mada vidheḥ bandhaḥ na vāda āśrayaḥ tanvyāḥ na eka vikāra bhūḥ madhu mada prāyaḥ madaḥ sphūrjati

original: MSS_5307-1 ālāpamālinikarasya niśamya bhītā mugdhā vilokya vadanaṃ mukuraṃ jahāti /
analyzed: ālāpa māli nikarasya niśamya bhītā mugdhā vilokya vadanam mukuram jahāti

original: MSS_5307-2 mandaṃ na niśvasiti manmathavedanārtā kīrendu māruta bhayāt kimu manna bhūpa //
analyzed: mandam na niśvasiti manmatha vedanā ārtā kīra indu māruta bhayāt kimu mat na bhūpa

original: MSS_5308-1 ālāpayatyakāryāṇi kiṃcidākhyāti vā svayam /
analyzed: ālāpayati akāryāṇi kiṃcid ākhyāti vā svayam

original: MSS_5308-2 yā na prayāti śayanaṃ sāpyanutpannasaspṛhā //
analyzed: yā na prayāti śayanam sā api anutpanna sa spṛhā

original: MSS_5309-1 ālāpād gātrasaṃsparśāt saṃsargāt sahabhojanāt /
analyzed: ālāpāt gātra saṃsparśāt saṃsargāt sahabhojanāt

original: MSS_5309-2 āsanāc śayanād yānāt pāpaṃ saṃkramate nṛṇām //
analyzed: āsanāt śayanāt yānāt pāpam saṃkramate nṛṇām

original: MSS_5310-1 ālāpān bhrūvilāso viralayati lasadbāhuvikṣiptiyātaṃ nīvigranthiṃ prathimnā pratanayati manāṅmadhyanimno nitambaḥ /
analyzed: ālāpān bhrū vilāsaḥ viralayati lasat bāhu vikṣipti yātam nīvi granthim prathimnā pratanayati manāk madhya nimnaḥ nitambaḥ

original: MSS_5310-2 utpuṣyatpārśvamūrcchatkucaśikharamuro nūnamantaḥsmareṇa spṛṣṭā kodaṇḍakoṭyā hariṇaśiśudṛśo dṛśyateyauvanaśrīḥ //
analyzed: utpuṣyat pārśva mūrcchat kuca śikharam uraḥ nūnam antar smareṇa spṛṣṭā kodaṇḍa koṭyā hariṇa śiśu dṛśaḥ dṛśyate yauvana śrīḥ

original: MSS_5311-1 ālāpairmadhuraiśca kāścidaparānālokitaiḥ sasmitair anyān vibhramakalpanābhiritarānaṅgairanaṅgojjvalaiḥ /
analyzed: ālāpaiḥ madhuraiḥ ca kāścid aparān ālokitaiḥ sa smitaiḥ anyān vibhrama kalpanābhiḥ itarān aṅgaiḥ anaṅga ujjvalaiḥ

original: MSS_5311-2 ācāraiścaturaiḥ parānabhinavairanyān bhruvaḥ kampanair itthaṃ kāścana rañjayanti sudṛśo manye manastvanyathā //
analyzed: ācāraiḥ caturaiḥ parān abhinavaiḥ anyān bhruvaḥ kampanaiḥ ittham kāścana rañjayanti sudṛśaḥ manye manaḥ tu anyathā

original: MSS_5312-1 āli kapālini jaṭile patyāvatyāgrahaistavālamiti /
analyzed: āli kapālini jaṭile patyau atyāgrahaiḥ tava alam iti

original: MSS_5312-2 haragatamiti duḥsahamapi muhurapi mukharānnigādayati gaurī //
analyzed: hara gatam iti duḥsaham api muhur api mukharān nigādayati gaurī

original: MSS_5313-1 āli kalpaya puraḥ karadīpaṃ candramaṇḍalamiti prathitena /
analyzed: āli kalpaya puras kara dīpam candra maṇḍalam iti prathitena

original: MSS_5313-2 nanvanena pihitaṃ mama cakṣur maṅkṣu pāṇduratamogulakena //
analyzed: nanu anena pihitam mama cakṣuḥ pāṇdura tamaḥ gulakena

original: MSS_5314-1 āliṅgatyanyamanyaṃ ramayati vacasā līlayā vīkṣate'nyaṃ rodityanyasya hetoḥ kalayati śapathairanyamanyaṃ vṛṇoti /
analyzed: āliṅgati anyam anyam ramayati vacasā līlayā vīkṣate inyam roditi anyasya hetoḥ kalayati śapathaiḥ anyam anyam vṛṇoti

original: MSS_5314-2 śete cānyena sārdhaṃ śamanamupagatā cintayatyanyamanyaṃ strīmāyā duścaritrā jagadahitakarī kena kaṣṭena sṛṣṭā //
analyzed: śete ca anyena sārdham śamanam upagatā cintayati anyam anyam strī māyā duścaritrā jagat ahita karī kena kaṣṭena sṛṣṭā

original: MSS_5315-1 āliṅgadāpya gopīṃ tadbāhuṃ sahariraṃsayādhāya /
analyzed: āliṅga dāpya gopīm tad bāhum sa hari raṃsayā ādhāya

original: MSS_5315-2 śrutveti niścinomyaham aṅgiṣu durvāratām anaṅgasya //
analyzed: śrutvā iti niścinomi aham aṅgiṣu durvāra tām anaṅgasya

original: MSS_5316-1 āliṅganādharasudhārasapānavakṣo- niṣpīḍanādividhirastu vidūrataste /
analyzed: āliṅgana adhara sudhā rasa pāna vakṣaḥ niṣpīḍana ādi vidhiḥ astu vidūrataḥ te

original: MSS_5316-2 yattvaṃ vilokayasi cañcaladṛṅnipātair etāvataiva hariṇākṣi vayaṃ kṛtārthāḥ //
analyzed: yat tvam vilokayasi cañcala dṛś nipātaiḥ etāvatā eva hariṇa akṣi vayam kṛtārthāḥ

original: MSS_5317-1 āliṅgante malayajatarūnāsvajante vanāntān āpṛcchante ciraparicitān mālayān nirjharaughān /
analyzed: āliṅgante malayaja tarūn āsvajante vanāntān āpṛcchante cira paricitān mālayān nirjhara oghān

original: MSS_5317-2 adya sthitvā draviḍamahilābhyantare śvaḥ prabhāte prasthātāro malayamarutaḥ kurvate saṃnidhānam //
analyzed: adya sthitvā draviḍa mahilā abhyantare śvas prabhāte prasthātāraḥ malaya marutaḥ kurvate saṃnidhānam

original: MSS_5318-1 āliṅganto vasudhāṃ nijakhuradalitāmivānunetumamī /
analyzed: āliṅgantaḥ vasudhām nija khura dalitām iva anunetum amī

original: MSS_5318-2 vadanavigatacaraṇā iva saṃlakṣyante javādaśvāḥ //
analyzed: vadana vigata caraṇāḥ iva saṃlakṣyante javāt aśvāḥ

original: MSS_5319-1 āliṅgannatisaurabhānavayavān bimbādharaṃ pāṭalaṃ cumbannākalayan payodharataṭīṃ śṛṇvan rutaṃ hāṃsakam /
analyzed: āliṅgan ati saurabhān avayavān bimba adharam pāṭalam cumban ākalayan payodhara taṭīm śṛṇvan rutam hāṃsakam

original: MSS_5319-2 paśyan vāniśamāyatāṃ dṛśamupaskurvaṃllavaṅgīrasaṃ bālāyāṃ sakalartusaṃgamasukhaṃ dhanyaḥ paraṃ manyate //
analyzed: paśyan vā aniśam āyatām dṛśam upaskurvan lavaṅgī rasam bālāyām sakala ṛtu saṃgama sukham dhanyaḥ param manyate

original: MSS_5320-1 āliṅgan bhṛśamaṅgakāni sudṛśāmāsyāni cumbaṃ nayan vakṣojorunitambakaṇṭhanakharaśrīcitrabhāvaṃ nayan /
analyzed: āliṅgan bhṛśam aṅgakāni su dṛśām āsyāni cumbam nayan vakṣoja ūru nitamba kaṇṭha nakhara śrī citra bhāvam nayan

original: MSS_5320-2 bimboṣṭhāmṛtamāpibañchithilayan nīvīṃ karakrīḍanā- saṅgenātisahāsakeliparamaḥ svairaṃ vicikrīḍa nā //
analyzed: bimba uṣṭha amṛtam āpiban śithilayan nīvīm kara krīḍanā saṅgena ati sa hāsa keli paramaḥ svairam vicikrīḍa nā

original: MSS_5321-1 āliṅgayatyanunayatyavacumbayatyā- --- lokayatyanumṛjatyavagūhate ca /
analyzed: āliṅgayati anunayati avacumbayati ā lokayati anumṛjati avagūhate ca

original: MSS_5321-2 pārśvaṃ vilokayati manmathabhāvabhinnā śūnyāntarā smarati kelikṛtaṃ samastam //
analyzed: pārśvam vilokayati manmatha bhāva bhinnā śūnya antarā smarati keli kṛtam samastam

original: MSS_5322-1 āliṅgase cārulatāṃ lavaṅgīm ācumbase cāmbujinīṃ krameṇa /
analyzed: āliṅgase cāru latām lavaṅgīm ācumbase ca ambujinīm krameṇa

original: MSS_5322-2 tāṃ cūtavallīṃ madhupa prakāmaṃ saṃtāḍayasyeva padaiḥ kimetat //
analyzed: tām cūta vallīm madhupa prakāmam saṃtāḍayasi eva padaiḥ kim etat

original: MSS_5323-1 āliṅgitas tatra bhavān sāṃparāye jayaśriyā /
analyzed: āliṅgitaḥ tatra bhavān sāṃparāye jaya śriyā

original: MSS_5323-2 āśīḥparaṃparāṃ vandyāṃ karṇe kṛtvā kṛpāṃ kuru //
analyzed: āśīḥ paraṃparām vandyām karṇe kṛtvā kṛpām kuru

original: MSS_5324-1 āliṅgitāḥ parairyānti praskhalanti same pathi /
analyzed: āliṅgitāḥ paraiḥ yānti praskhalanti same pathi

original: MSS_5324-2 avyaktāni ca bhāṣante dhanino madyapā iva //
analyzed: avyaktāni ca bhāṣante dhaninaḥ madyapāḥ iva

original: MSS_5325-1 āliṅgya pūrvāmanugṛhya yāmyāṃ saumyāṃ samālokya sahasrabhānuḥ /
analyzed: āliṅgya pūrvām anugṛhya yāmyām saumyām samālokya sahasrabhānuḥ

original: MSS_5325-2 samdhyāśrito'pyāpa nipātamabdhau tad vāruṇīsaṅgaphalaṃ cakāsti //
analyzed: samdhyā āśritā upi āpa nipātam abdhau tat vāruṇī saṅga phalam cakāsti

original: MSS_5326-1 āliṅgya madhurahuṃkṛtim alasonmiṣadīkṣaṇāṃ rahaḥ kāntām /
analyzed: āliṅgya madhura huṃkṛtim alasa unmiṣat īkṣaṇām rahaḥ kāntām

original: MSS_5326-2 yad bodhayanti suptāṃ janmani yūnāṃ tadeva phalam //
analyzed: yat bodhayanti suptām janmani yūnām tat eva phalam

original: MSS_5327-1 āliṅgya mandire ramye sadānandavidhāyini /
analyzed: āliṅgya mandire ramye sat ānanda vidhāyini

original: MSS_5327-2 kāntā kāntaṃ kuraṅgākṣī kumbhikumbhapayodharā //
MSS_5328-1 āli pālilalitau tava bhātaḥ karṇikārasakhakarṇi kapolau /
analyzed: āli pāli lalitau tava bhātaḥ karṇikāra sakha karṇi kapolau

original: MSS_5328-2 padmajena ratipañcabāṇayor darpaṇāviva suvarṇanirmitau //
analyzed: padmajena rati pañcabāṇayoḥ darpaṇau iva suvarṇa nirmitau

original: MSS_5329-1 āli bāliśatayā balirasmai dīyatāṃ balibhuje na kadāpi /
analyzed: āli bāliśa tayā baliḥ asmai dīyatām   na kadāpi

original: MSS_5329-2 kevalaṃ hi kalakaṇṭhaśiśūnām eṣa eva kuśaleṣu nidānam //
analyzed: kevalam hi kalakaṇṭha śiśūnām eṣaḥ eva kuśaleṣu nidānam

original: MSS_5330-1 ālirdivyauṣadhī proktā sūkṣmakaṇṭakasaṃvṛtā /
analyzed: āliḥ divyauṣadhī proktā sūkṣma kaṇṭaka saṃvṛtā

original: MSS_5330-2 vimucyate viṣaiḥ prāṇī pītvā toyena tajjaṭām //
analyzed: vimucyate viṣaiḥ prāṇī pītvā toyena tad jaṭām

original: MSS_5331-1 ālīcālitapadminīdalacalatsarvāṅgamaṅgīkṛt a- svāṅgāliṅganamarmarīkṛtanavāmbhojāliśay yā cirāt /
analyzed: āli cālita padminī dala calat sarva aṅgam aṅgīkṛt yā cirāt

original: MSS_5331-2 caitanyaṃ kathamapyupetya śanakairunmīlya netrāñcalaṃ bālā kevalameva śūnyahṛdayā śūnyaṃ jagat paśyati //
analyzed: caitanyam katham api upetya śanakais unmīlya netra añcalam bālā kevalam eva śūnya hṛdayā śūnyam jagat paśyati

original: MSS_5332-1 ālībhiḥ śapathairanekakapaṭaiḥ kuñjodaraṃ nītayā śūnyaṃ tac ca nirīkṣya vikṣubhitayā na prasthitaṃ na sthitam /
analyzed: ālībhiḥ śapathaiḥ aneka kapaṭaiḥ kuñja udaram nītayā śūnyam tat ca nirīkṣya vikṣubhitayā na prasthitam na sthitam

original: MSS_5332-2 nyastāḥ kiṃtu navoḍhanīrajadṛśā kuñjopakaṇṭhe ruṣā tādṛgbhṛṅgakadambaḍambaracamatkāraspṛśo dṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: nyastāḥ kiṃtu na voḍha nīraja dṛśā kuñja upakaṇṭhe ruṣā tādṛś bhṛṅga kadamba ḍambara camatkāra spṛśaḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: MSS_5333-1 ālībhiḥ saha bhāṣitaṃ kimapi tadvartmāpi saṃvīkṣitaṃ pañceṣuḥ kusumairapūji kathamapyādhāya citte manāk /
analyzed: ālībhiḥ saha bhāṣitam kim api tad vartma api saṃvīkṣitam pañca iṣuḥ kusumaiḥ apūji katham api ādhāya citte manāk

original: MSS_5333-2 tenāpi priya cet tathā mayi kṛpākārpaṇyamālambase prāṇeśa prabalaṃ tadatra nikhilaṃ tatprātikūlyaṃ vidheḥ //
analyzed: tena api priya ced tathā mayi kṛpā kārpaṇyam ālambase prāṇeśa prabalam tat atra nikhilam tad prātikūlyam vidheḥ

original: MSS_5334-1 ālīṣu kelīrabhasena bālā muhurmamālāpamupālapantī /
analyzed: ālīṣu keli rabhasena bālā muhur mama ālāpam upālapantī

original: MSS_5334-2 ārādupākarṇya giraṃ madīyāṃ saudāminīyāṃ suṣamāmayāsīt //
analyzed: ārāt upākarṇya giram madīyām saudāminī yām suṣamām ayāsīt

original: MSS_5335-1 ālekhyaṃ gagane likhāmi bisinīsūtrairvayāmyambaraṃ svapnālokitamānayāmi kanakaṃ grathnāmi vapraṃ himaiḥ /
analyzed: ālekhyam gagane likhāmi bisinī sūtraiḥ vayāmi ambaram svapna ālokitam ānayāmi kanakam grathnāmi vapram himaiḥ

original: MSS_5335-2 ityādyuktamapi sphuṭaṃ jaḍamatirjānāti satyaṃ nṛpo yastādṛktrapayā na vakti sa gataprauḍhiḥ paraṃ vañcyate //
analyzed: ityādi uktam api sphuṭam jaḍa matiḥ jānāti satyam nṛpaḥ yaḥ tādṛś trapayā na vakti sa gata prauḍhiḥ param vañcyate

original: MSS_5336-1 ālekhyaṃ nijamullilekha vijane sollekhayā rekhayā saṃkalpānakarod vikalpabahulākalpānanalpānapi /
analyzed: ālekhyam nijam ullilekha vijane sa ullekhayā rekhayā saṃkalpān akarot vikalpa bahula akalpān analpān api

original: MSS_5336-2 adrākṣīdaparaprajāpatimataṃ cakre ca tīvraṃ vrataṃ tvannirmāṇavidhau kiyanna vidadhe baddhāvadhāno vidhiḥ //
analyzed: adrākṣīt apara prajāpati matam cakre ca tīvram vratam tvad nirmāṇa vidhau kiyat na vidadhe baddha avadhānaḥ vidhiḥ

original: MSS_5337-1 āloka eva vimukhī kvacidapi divase na dakṣiṇā bhavasi /
analyzed: āloke eva vimukhī kvacid api divase na dakṣiṇā bhavasi

original: MSS_5337-2 chāyeva tadapi tāpaṃ tvameva me harasi mānavati //
analyzed: chāyā iva tat api tāpam tvam eva me harasi mānavati

original: MSS_5338-1 ālokatrastanārīkṛtasabhayamahānādadhāvajjanaugha- vyāptadvārapradeśapracurakalakalākarṇanastabdhacakṣuḥ /
analyzed: āloka trasta nārīkṛta sa bhaya mahā nāda dhāvat jana ogha vyāpta dvāra pradeśa pracura kalakala ākarṇana stabdha cakṣuḥ

original: MSS_5338-2 kāṣṭhaṃ daṇḍaṃ gṛhāṇetyatimukharamukhais tāḍito loṣṭaghātair bhītaḥ sarpo gṛhasyānadhigatavivaraḥ koṇataḥ koṇameti //
analyzed: kāṣṭham daṇḍam gṛhāṇa iti ati mukhara mukhaiḥ tāḍitaḥ loṣṭa ghātaiḥ bhītaḥ sarpaḥ gṛhasya anadhigata vivaraḥ koṇataḥ koṇam eti

original: MSS_5339-1 ālokadānāc cakṣuṣmān prabhāyukto bhaven naraḥ /
analyzed: āloka dānāt cakṣuṣmān prabhā yuktaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: MSS_5339-2 tān dattvā nopahiṃseta na haren nopanāśayet //
analyzed: tān dattvā na upahiṃseta na haret na upanāśayet

original: MSS_5340-1 dīpahartā bhavedandhas tamogatirasuprabhaḥ /
analyzed: dīpa hartā bhavet andhaḥ tamaḥ gatiḥ a su prabhaḥ

original: MSS_5340-2 dīpapradaḥ svargaloke dīpamālī virājate //
MSS_5341-1 ālokamārgaṃ sahasā vrajantyā kayācidudveṣṭanavāntamālyaḥ /
analyzed: āloka mārgam sahasā vrajantyā kayācid udveṣṭana vānta mālyaḥ

original: MSS_5341-2 baddhuṃ na saṃbhāvita eva tāvat kareṇa ruddho'pi ca keśapāśaḥ //
analyzed: baddhum na saṃbhāvitaḥ eva tāvat kareṇa ruddhaḥ api ca keśapāśaḥ

original: MSS_5342-1 ālokayati panthānaṃ dāsyatītyāgataḥ kila /
analyzed: ālokayati panthānam dāsyati iti āgataḥ kila

original: MSS_5342-2 racayatyādarād veṇīṃ yadi nānyairvaśīkṛtā //
analyzed: racayati ādarāt veṇīm yadi na anyaiḥ vaśīkṛtā

original: MSS_5343-1 ālokayati payodharam upamandiramabhinavāmbubharanīlam /
analyzed: ālokayati payodharam upa mandiram abhinava ambu bhara nīlam

original: MSS_5343-2 dayitāracitacitānala- dhūmodgamaśaṅkayā pathikaḥ //
analyzed: dayitā racita citā anala dhūma udgama śaṅkayā pathikaḥ

original: MSS_5344-1 ālokayed buddhiguṇopapannaiś caraiśca dūtaiśca parapracāram /
analyzed: ālokayet buddhi guṇa upapannaiḥ caraiḥ ca dūtaiḥ ca para pracāram

original: MSS_5344-2 etairviyukto bhavati kṣitīndro janairanetraiśca samānadharmā //
analyzed: etaiḥ viyuktaḥ bhavati kṣitīndraḥ janaiḥ anetraiḥ ca samāna dharmā

original: MSS_5345-1 alokavantaḥ santyeva bhūyāṃso bhāskarādayaḥ /
analyzed: alokavantaḥ santi eva bhūyāṃsaḥ bhāskara ādayaḥ

original: MSS_5345-2 kalāvāneva tu grāvadrāvakarmaṇi karmaṭhaḥ //
analyzed: kalāvān eva tu grāvadrāva karmaṇi karmaṭhaḥ

original: MSS_5346-1 ālokaviśālā me sahasā timirapraveśavicchinnā /
analyzed: āloka viśālā me sahasā timira praveśa vicchinnā

original: MSS_5346-2 unmīlitāpi dṛṣṭir nimīlitevāndhakāreṇa //
analyzed: unmīlitā api dṛṣṭiḥ nimīlitā iva andhakāreṇa

original: MSS_5347-1 ā lokāntāt pratihatatamovṛttirāsāṃ prajānāṃ tulyodyogas tava dinakṛtaś cādhikāro mato naḥ /
analyzed: ā loka antāt pratihata tamaḥ vṛttiḥ āsām prajānām tulya udyogaḥ tava dinakṛtaḥ ca adhikāraḥ mataḥ naḥ

original: MSS_5347-2 tiṣṭhatyeṣa kṣaṇamadhipatirjyotiṣāṃ vyomamadhye ṣaṣṭhe bhāge tvamapi divasasyātmanaś chandavartī //
analyzed: tiṣṭhati eṣa kṣaṇam adhipatiḥ jyotiṣām vyoma madhye ṣaṣṭhe bhāge tvam api divasasya ātmanaḥ chanda vartī

original: MSS_5348-1 ālokāvadhi yadvaśena sugatiṃ vindanti bhūtānyasau dṛṣṭisnehavaśena sā vitanute vaṃśe bhujaṅgabhramam /
analyzed: āloka avadhi yad vaśena sugatim vindanti bhūtāni asau dṛṣṭi sneha vaśena sā vitanute vaṃśe bhujaṅga bhramam

original: MSS_5348-2 dakṣā bhogiṣu keṣucid viṣamitāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ nihantuṃ kṣaṇāt tānapyāśu vināśayet kṣaṇaruciḥ kācit kṣaṇasphūrjathuḥ //
analyzed: dakṣā bhogiṣu keṣucid viṣamitām dṛṣṭim nihantum kṣaṇāt tān api āśu vināśayet kṣaṇa ruciḥ kācid kṣaṇa sphūrjathuḥ

original: MSS_5349-1 ālokitaṃ gṛhaśikhaṇḍibhirutkalāpair haṃsairyiyāsubhirapākṛtamunmanaskaiḥ /
analyzed: ālokitam gṛha śikhaṇḍibhiḥ utkalāpaiḥ haṃsaiḥ yiyāsubhiḥ apākṛtam unmanaskaiḥ
