original: MSS_5349-2 ākālikaṃ sapadi durdinamantarikṣam utkaṇṭhitasya hṛdayaṃ ca samaṃ ruṇaddhi //
analyzed: ākālikam sapadi durdinam antarikṣam utkaṇṭhitasya hṛdayam ca samam ruṇaddhi

original: MSS_5350-1 ālokairatipāṭalairacaramāṃ vistārayadbhirdiśaṃ nakṣatradyutimākṣipadbhiracirādāśaṅkya sūryodayam /
analyzed: ālokaiḥ ati pāṭalaiḥ acaramām vistārayadbhiḥ diśam nakṣatra dyutim ākṣipadbhiḥ acirāt āśaṅkya sūrya udayam

original: MSS_5350-2 puñjībhūya bhayādivāndhatamasaṃ manye dvirephacchalān mīlannīlasaroruhodarakuṭīkoṇāntare līyate //
analyzed: puñjībhūya bhayāt iva andha tamasam manye dvirepha chalāt mīlat nīla saroruha udara kuṭī koṇa antare līyate

original: MSS_5351-1 ālokya komalakapolatalābhiṣikta- vyaktānurāgasubhagāmabhirāmamūrtim /
analyzed: ālokya komala kapola tala abhiṣikta vyakta anurāga subhagām abhirāma mūrtim

original: MSS_5351-2 paśyaiṣa bālyamativṛtya vivartamānaḥ śṛṅgārasīmani taraṅgitamātanoti //
analyzed: paśya eṣa bālyam ativṛtya vivartamānaḥ śṛṅgāra sīmani taraṅgitam ātanoti

original: MSS_5352-1 ālokya candramasamabhyuditaṃ samantād udvelladūrmivicalatkalaśāmburāśeḥ /
analyzed: ālokya candramasam abhyuditam samantāt udvellat ūrmi vicalat kalaśa amburāśeḥ

original: MSS_5352-2 viṣvagvisāriparamāṇuparaṃparaiva jyotsnātmanā jagadidaṃ dhavalīkaroti //
analyzed: viṣvak visāri paramāṇu paraṃparā eva jyotsnā ātmanā jagat idam dhavalīkaroti

original: MSS_5353-1 ālokya cikuranikaraṃ satataṃ sumano'dhivāsayogyaṃ te /
analyzed: ālokya cikura nikaram satatam sumanaḥ adhivāsa yogyam te

original: MSS_5353-2 kāmo nijaṃ niṣaṅgaṃ parivṛtyāmṛśati sāśaṅkaḥ //
analyzed: kāmaḥ nijam niṣaṅgam parivṛtya āmṛśati sa āśaṅkaḥ

original: MSS_5354-1 ālokya pāṇī suvimṛjya netre talpāt samutthāya vidhāya bhūṣām /
analyzed: ālokya pāṇī su vimṛjya netre talpāt samutthāya vidhāya bhūṣām

original: MSS_5354-2 ācumbya kāntaṃ paridhāya vāso yāntī salajjā hṛdayaṃ dunoti //
analyzed: ācumbya kāntam paridhāya vāsaḥ yāntī sa lajjā hṛdayam dunoti

original: MSS_5355-1 ālokya priyatamamaṃśuke vinīvau yattasthe namitamukhendu mānavatyā /
analyzed: ālokya priyatamam aṃśuke vinīvau yat tasthe namita mukha indu mānavatyā

original: MSS_5355-2 tannūnaṃ padamavalokayāṃbabhūve mānasya drutamapayānamāsthitasya //
analyzed: tat nūnam padam avalokayāṃbabhūve mānasya drutam apayānam āsthitasya

original: MSS_5356-1 ālokya sundari mukhaṃ tava mandahāsaṃ nandantymandamaravindadhiyā milindāḥ /
analyzed: ālokya sundari mukham tava manda hāsam nandanti mandam aravinda dhiyāḥ milindāḥ

original: MSS_5356-2 kiṃ cāsitākṣi mṛgalāñchanasaṃbhrameṇa cañcūpuṭaṃ caṭulayanti ciraṃ cakorāḥ //
analyzed: kim ca asita akṣi mṛga lāñchana saṃbhrameṇa cañcū puṭam caṭulayanti ciram cakorāḥ

original: MSS_5357-1 ālocanaṃ ca vacanaṃ ca nigūhanaṃ ca yāsāṃ smarannamṛtavat sarasaṃ kṛśas tvam /
analyzed: ālocanam ca vacanam ca nigūhanam ca yāsām smaran amṛta vat sarasam kṛśaḥ tvam

original: MSS_5357-2 tāsāṃ kimaṅga piśitāsrapurīṣapātraṃ gātraṃ smaran mṛgadṛśāṃ na nirākulo'si //
analyzed: tāsām kim aṅga piśita asra purīṣa pātram gātram smaran mṛga dṛśām na nirākulaḥ asi

original: MSS_5358-1 ālocya vākyaṃ svayamantarātmā hṛṣṭaḥ parānandamiva praviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: ālocya vākyam svayam antarātmā hṛṣṭaḥ para ānandam iva praviṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_5358-2 prāyeṇa bhāvīni bhavanti vastūny ālocyamānāni manoharāṇi //
analyzed: prāyeṇa bhāvīni bhavanti vastūni ālocyamānāni manoharāṇi

original: MSS_5359-1 āloḍya sarvaśāstrāṇi purāṇānyuttamottamāḥ /
analyzed: āloḍya sarva śāstrāṇi purāṇāni uttamottamāḥ

original: MSS_5359-2 vicintya sarvabhūteṣu dayāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ //
analyzed: vicintya sarva bhūteṣu dayām kurvanti sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_5360-1 āloḍya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicāryaivaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: āloḍya sarva śāstrāṇi vicārya evam punar punar

original: MSS_5360-2 idamekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā //
analyzed: idam ekam su niṣpannam dhyeyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sadā

original: MSS_5361-1 ālolāmalakāvalīṃ vilulitāṃ bibhraccalatkuṇḍalaṃ kiṃcinmṛṣṭaviśeṣakaṃ tanutaraiḥ svedāmbhasāṃ jālakaiḥ /
analyzed: ālola āmalaka āvalīm vilulitām bibhrat calat kuṇḍalam kiṃcid mṛṣṭa viśeṣakam tanutaraiḥ sveda ambhasām jālakaiḥ

original: MSS_5361-2 tanvyā yat suratāntatāntanayanaṃ vaktraṃ rativyatyaye tat tvāṃ pātu cirāya kiṃ hariharabrahmādibhirdevataiḥ //
analyzed: tanvyāḥ yat surata anta tānta nayanam vaktram rati vyatyaye tat tvām pātu cirāya kim hari hara brahma ādibhiḥ devataiḥ

original: MSS_5362-1 ālolairupagamyate madhukaraiḥ keśeṣu mālyagrahaḥ kāntiḥ kāpi kapolayoḥ prathayate tāmbūlamantargatam /
analyzed: ālolaiḥ upagamyate madhukaraiḥ keśeṣu mālya grahaḥ kāntiḥ kā api kapolayoḥ prathayate tāmbūlam antargatam

original: MSS_5362-2 aṅgānāmanulepanaṃ parimalairālepanaprakriyā veṣaḥ ko'pi sarojasundaradṛśaḥ sūte sukhaṃ cakṣuṣoḥ //
analyzed: aṅgānām anulepanam parimalaiḥ ālepana prakriyā veṣaḥ kaḥ api saroja sundara dṛśaḥ sūte sukham cakṣuṣoḥ

original: MSS_5363-1 ālohitamākalayan kandalamutkampitaṃ madhukareṇa /
analyzed: ālohitam ākalayan kandalam utkampitam madhukareṇa

original: MSS_5363-2 saṃsmarati pathiṣu pathiko dayitāṅgulitarjanālalitam //
analyzed: saṃsmarati pathiṣu pathikaḥ dayitā aṅguli tarjana ālalitam

original: MSS_5364-1 āvaktrendu tadaṅgameva sṛjataḥ sraṣṭuḥ samagrastviṣāṃ koṣaḥ śoṣamagādagādhajagatīśilpe'pi nālpāyitaḥ /
analyzed: ā vaktra indu tat aṅgam eva sṛjataḥ sraṣṭuḥ samagraḥ tviṣām koṣaḥ śoṣam agāt agādha jagatī śilpe pi na alpāyitaḥ

original: MSS_5364-2 niḥśeṣadyutimaṇḍalavyayavaśādīṣallabhaist attanū- śeṣaḥ keśamayaḥ kimandhatamasastomairabhūnnirmitaḥ //
analyzed: niḥśeṣa dyuti maṇḍala vyaya vaśāt īṣat labhaiḥ śeṣaḥ keśa mayaḥ kim andhatamasa stomaiḥ abhūt nirmitaḥ

original: MSS_5365-1 āvatsaramahibhītir na syād asya prabhāveṇa /
analyzed: ā vatsaram ahi bhītiḥ na syāt asya prabhāveṇa

original: MSS_5365-2 śukanāsāṃ ca pibed yo jalapiṣṭāṃ tasya bhīrnāsti //
analyzed: śuka nāsām ca pibet yaḥ jala piṣṭām tasya bhīḥ nā asti

original: MSS_5366-1 āvayoryodhamukhyābhyāṃ madarthaḥ sādhyatāmiti /
analyzed: āvayoḥ yodha mukhyābhyām mad arthaḥ sādhyatām iti

original: MSS_5366-2 yasmin paṇaḥ prakriyate sa saṃdhiḥ puruṣāntaraḥ //
analyzed: yasmin paṇaḥ prakriyate sa saṃdhiḥ puruṣa antaraḥ

original: MSS_5367-1 āvarjita iva vinayād īṣanmadhurasmitānanasarojaḥ /
analyzed: āvarjitaḥ iva vinayāt īṣat madhura smita ānana sarojaḥ

original: MSS_5367-2 aṅkārpitakarayugalaḥ kalayati vijñaptimīkṣito nṛpateḥ //
analyzed: aṅka arpita kara yugalaḥ kalayati vijñaptim īkṣitaḥ nṛpateḥ

original: MSS_5368-1 āvarjitā kiṃcid iva stanābhyāṃ vāso vasānā taruṇārkarāgam /
analyzed: āvarjitā kiṃcid iva stanābhyām vāsaḥ vasānā taruṇa arka rāgam

original: MSS_5368-2 paryāptapuṣpastabakāvanamrā saṃcāriṇī pallavinī lateva //
analyzed: paryāpta puṣpa stabaka avanamrā saṃcāriṇī pallavinī latā iva

original: MSS_5369-1 āvarjitālakāli śvāsotkampastanārpitaikabhujam /
analyzed: āvarjita alaka āli śvāsa utkampa stana arpita eka bhujam

original: MSS_5369-2 śayanaṃ rativivaśatanoḥ smarāmi śithilāṃśukaṃ tasyāḥ //
analyzed: śayanam rati vivaśa tanoḥ smarāmi śithila aṃśukam tasyāḥ

original: MSS_5370-1 āvartaḥ kakude yasya kakudī sa udāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: āvartaḥ kakude yasya kakudī saḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_5370-2 muṣkeṇaikena yuktastu hayas tvekāṇḍasaṃjñitaḥ //
analyzed: muṣkeṇa ekena yuktaḥ tu hayaḥ tu ekāṇḍa saṃjñitaḥ

original: MSS_5371-1 āvartaḥ saṃśayānām avinayabhavanaṃ pattanaṃ sāhasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ saṃnidhānaṃ kapaṭaśatamayaṃ kṣetramapratyayānām /
analyzed: āvartaḥ saṃśayānām avinaya bhavanam pattanam sāhasānām doṣāṇām saṃnidhānam kapaṭa śata mayam kṣetram apratyayānām

original: MSS_5371-2 svargadvārasya vighnaṃ narakapuramukhaṃ sarvamāyākaraṇḍaṃ strīyantraṃ kena sṛṣṭaṃ viṣamamṛtamayaṃ prāṇilokasya pāśaḥ //
analyzed: svarga dvārasya vighnam naraka pura mukham sarva māyā karaṇḍam strī yantram kena sṛṣṭam viṣama mṛta mayam prāṇi lokasya pāśaḥ

original: MSS_5372-1 āvarta iva toyasya jñānāvarto yadākulaḥ /
analyzed: āvartaḥ iva toyasya jñāna āvartaḥ yadā ākulaḥ

original: MSS_5372-2 cittamāsa kṛtāvartam upasargaḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: cittam āsa kṛta āvartam upasargaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: MSS_5373-1 āvarta eva nābhiste netre nīlasaroruhe /
analyzed: āvartaḥ eva nābhiḥ te netre nīla saroruhe

original: MSS_5373-2 taraṅgā valayastena tvaṃ lāvaṇyāmbuvāpikā //
analyzed: taraṅgāḥ valayaḥ tena tvam lāvaṇya ambu vāpikā

original: MSS_5374-1 āvartaśobhā natanābhikānter bhaṅgyo bhruvāṃ dvandvacarāḥ stanānām /
analyzed: āvarta śobhāḥ nata nābhi kānteḥ bhaṅgyaḥ bhruvām dvandva carāḥ stanānām

original: MSS_5374-2 jātāni rūpāvayavopamānāny adūravartīni vilāsinīnām //
analyzed: jātāni rūpa avayava upamānāni adūra vartīni vilāsinīnām

original: MSS_5375-1 āvartinaḥ śubhaphalapradaśuktiyuktāḥ saṃpannadevamaṇayo bhṛtarandhrabhāgāḥ /
analyzed: āvartinaḥ śubha phala prada śukti yuktāḥ saṃpanna deva maṇayaḥ bhṛta randhra bhāgāḥ

original: MSS_5375-2 aśvāḥ pyadhurvasumatīmatirocamānās tūrṇaṃ payodhaya ivormibhirāpatantaḥ //
analyzed: aśvāḥ pyadhuḥ vasumatīm atirocamānāḥ tūrṇam payodhayaḥ iva ūrmibhiḥ āpatantaḥ

original: MSS_5376-1 āvartairātarpaṇa- śobhāṃ ḍiṇḍīrapāṇḍurairdadhatī /
analyzed: āvartaiḥ ātarpaṇa śobhām ḍiṇḍīra pāṇḍuraiḥ dadhatī

original: MSS_5376-2 gāyati mukharitasalilā priyasaṃgamamaṅgalaṃ surasā //
analyzed: gāyati mukharita salilā priya saṃgama maṅgalam surasā

original: MSS_5377-1 āvartya kaṇṭhaṃ sicayena samyag ābaddhya vakṣoruhakumbhayugmam /
analyzed: āvartya kaṇṭham sicayena samyak ābaddhya vakṣoruha kumbha yugmam

original: MSS_5377-2 kāsau karālambitatailapātrā mandaṃ samāsīdati sundarīṃ tām //
analyzed: kā asau kara ālambita taila pātrā mandam samāsīdati sundarīm tām

original: MSS_5378-1 āvartya yo muhurmantraṃ dhārayecca prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: āvartya yaḥ muhur mantram dhārayet ca prayatnataḥ

original: MSS_5378-2 aprayatnadhṛto mantraḥ pracalannagnivad dahet //
analyzed: aprayatna dhṛtaḥ mantraḥ pracalan agni vat dahet

original: MSS_5379-1 āvācāṃ vyaktatāyāḥ kavipadaviṣayeṣvācacaṣṭe samanyo muktāsmābhirna ko'pi smarapadamavanau saṃstutaḥ satyametat /
analyzed: āvācām vyakta tāyāḥ kavi pada viṣayeṣu ācacaṣṭe sam anyaḥ muktā asmābhiḥ na kaḥ api smara padam avanau saṃstutaḥ satyam etat

original: MSS_5379-2 mithyaitad bhoḥ kathaṃ re nanu śatamakṛthāḥ kuntalendrasya tattat kāvyastotrāṇi dhik tvāṃ jaḍamaya na manoreva mūrtiprabhedaḥ //
analyzed: mithyā etat bhoḥ katham re nanu śatam akṛthāḥ kuntala indrasya tat tat kāvya stotrāṇi dhik tvām jaḍa maya na manoḥ eva mūrti prabhedaḥ

original: MSS_5380-1 āvāti sphuṭitapriyaṅgusurabhirnīhāravāricchalāt svacchandaṃ kamalākareṣu vikiran pracchannavahnicchaṭāḥ /
analyzed: āvāti sphuṭita priyaṅgu surabhiḥ nīhāra vāri chalāt svacchandam kamala ākareṣu vikiran pracchanna vahni chaṭāḥ

original: MSS_5380-2 prātaḥ kundasamṛddhidarśanarasaprītiprakarṣollasan mālākāravadhūkapolapulakasthairyakṣamo mārutaḥ //
analyzed: prātar kunda samṛddhi darśana rasa prīti prakarṣa ullasan mālākāra vadhū kapola pulaka sthairya kṣamaḥ mārutaḥ

original: MSS_5381-1 āvāsaḥ kilakiñcitasya dayitāḥ pārśve vilāsālasāḥ karṇe kokilakāminīkalaravaḥ smero latāmaṇḍapaḥ /
analyzed: āvāsaḥ kilakiñcitasya dayitāḥ pārśve vilāsa alasāḥ karṇe kokila kāminī kalaravaḥ smeraḥ latā maṇḍapaḥ

original: MSS_5381-2 goṣṭhī satkavibhiḥ samaṃ katipayairmugdhāḥ sitāṃśoḥ karāḥ keṣāṃcit sukhayanti cātra hṛdayaṃ caitre vicitrāḥ srajaḥ //
analyzed: goṣṭhī sat kavibhiḥ samam katipayaiḥ mugdhāḥ sitāṃśoḥ karāḥ keṣāṃcid sukhayanti ca atra hṛdayam caitre vicitrāḥ srajaḥ

original: MSS_5382-1 āvāsaḥ kriyatāṃ gāṅge pāpavāriṇi vāriṇi /
analyzed: āvāsaḥ kriyatām gāṅge pāpa vāriṇi vāriṇi

original: MSS_5382-2 stanamadhye taruṇyā vā manohāriṇi hāriṇi //
analyzed: stana madhye taruṇyāḥ vā manohāriṇi hāriṇi

original: MSS_5383-1 āvāse'smin vidagdhāḥ kvacidapi na vibho nāpi nidropabhoga- yogyatvaṃ srastarāsthā vilayamupagatā saṃmukhe vidyudeṣā /
analyzed: āvāse ismin vidagdhāḥ kvacid api na vibho nā api nidrā upabhoga yogya tvam srasta rāsthā vilayam upagatā saṃmukhe vidyut eṣā

original: MSS_5383-2 prodyaṃścāyaṃ payobhṛt taditi yadi rucirnaiśavāsetadāssvety uktaḥ pānthaḥ sudatyā hatamadanabhayas tatra mugdho'timugdhaḥ //
analyzed: prodyan ca ayam payobhṛt tat iti yadi ruciḥ naiśa vāsā itad āssva iti uktaḥ pānthaḥ sudatyā hata madana bhayaḥ tatra mugdha uti mugdhaḥ

original: MSS_5384-1 āvāsotsukapakṣiṇaḥ kalarutaṃ krāmanti vṛkṣālayān kāntābhāviviyogabhīruradhikaṃ krandatyayaṃ kātaraḥ /
analyzed: āvāsa utsuka pakṣiṇaḥ kala rutam krāmanti vṛkṣa ālayān kāntā bhāvi viyoga bhīruḥ adhikam krandati ayam kātaraḥ

original: MSS_5384-2 cakrāhvo madhupāḥ sarojagahanaṃ dhāvantyulūko mudaṃ dhatte cāruṇatāṃgato ravirasāvastācalaṃ cumbati //
analyzed: cakrāhvaḥ madhupāḥ saroja gahanam dhāvanti ulūkaḥ mudam dhatte ca aruṇa tāṃgataḥ raviḥ asāvastācalam cumbati

original: MSS_5385-1 āvāso vipināyate priyasakhīmālāpi jālāyate tāpo'pi śvasitena dāvadahanajvālākalāpāyate /
analyzed: āvāsaḥ vipināyate priya sakhī mālā api jālāyate tāpaḥ api śvasitena dāva dahana jvālā kalāpāyate

original: MSS_5385-2 sāpi tvadviraheṇa hanta hariṇīrūpāyate hā kathaṃ kandarpo'pi yamāyate viracayañ śārdūlavikrīḍitam //
analyzed: sā api tvad viraheṇa hanta hariṇī rūpāyate hā katham kandarpaḥ api yamāyate viracayam śārdūla vikrīḍitam

original: MSS_5386-1 ā vindhyādā himādrarviracitavijayastīrthayātrāprasaṅgād udgrīveṣu prahartā nṛpatiṣu vinamatkandhareṣu prasannaḥ /
analyzed: ā vindhyāt himādraḥ viracita vijayaḥ tīrtha yātrā prasaṅgāt udgrīveṣu prahartā nṛpatiṣu vinamat kandhareṣu prasannaḥ

original: MSS_5386-2 āryāvartaṃ yathārthaṃ punarapi kṛtavān mlecchavicchedanābhir devaḥ śākaṃbharīndro jagati vijayate bīsalaḥ kṣoṇipālaḥ //
analyzed: āryāvartam yathārtham punar api kṛtavān mleccha viccheda nābhiḥ devaḥ śākaṃbhari indraḥ jagati vijayate bīsalaḥ kṣoṇipālaḥ

original: MSS_5387-1 āvirbhavati nārīṇāṃ vayaḥ paryastaśaiśavam /
analyzed: āvirbhavati nārīṇām vayaḥ paryasta śaiśavam

original: MSS_5387-2 sahaiva vividhaiḥ puṃsām aṅgajonmādavibhramaiḥ //
analyzed: saha eva vividhaiḥ puṃsām aṅgaja unmāda vibhramaiḥ

original: MSS_5388-1 āvirbhavantī prathamaṃ priyāyāḥ socchvāsamantaḥkaraṇaṃ karoti /
analyzed: āvirbhavantī prathamam priyāyāḥ sa ucchvāsam antaḥkaraṇam karoti

original: MSS_5388-2 saṃtāpadagdhasya śikhaṇḍiyūno vṛṣṭeḥ purastādaciraprabheva //
analyzed: saṃtāpa dagdhasya śikhaṇḍi yūnaḥ vṛṣṭeḥ purastāt acira prabhā iva

original: MSS_5389-1 āvirbhāvadine na yena gaṇito hetustanīyānapi kṣīyetāpi na cāparādhavidhinā natyā na yo vardhate /
analyzed: āvirbhāva dine na yena gaṇitaḥ hetuḥ tanīyān api kṣīyeta api na ca aparādha vidhinā natyā na yaḥ vardhate

original: MSS_5389-2 pīyūṣaprativedinastrijagatīduḥkhadruhaḥ sāṃprataṃ premṇastasya guroḥ kathaṃ nu karavai vāṅniṣṭhatālāghavam //
analyzed: pīyūṣa prativedinaḥ trijagatī duḥkha druhaḥ sāṃpratam premṇaḥ tasya guroḥ katham nu karavai vāc niṣṭha tā lāghavam

original: MSS_5390-1 āvirbhūtaṃ caturdhā yaḥ kapibhiḥ parivāritaḥ /
analyzed: āvirbhūtam caturdhā yaḥ kapibhiḥ parivāritaḥ

original: MSS_5390-2 hatavān rākṣasānīkaṃ rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ bhaje //
analyzed: hatavān rākṣasa anīkam rāmam dāśarathim bhaje

original: MSS_5391-1 āvirbhūtajyotiṣāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ye vyāhārāsteṣu mā saṃśayo bhūt /
analyzed: āvirbhūta jyotiṣām brāhmaṇānām ye vyāhārāḥ teṣu mā saṃśayaḥ bhūt

original: MSS_5391-2 bhadrā hyeṣāṃ vāci lakṣmīrniṣiktā naite vācaṃ viplutārthāṃ vadanti //
analyzed: bhadrā hi eṣām vāci lakṣmīḥ niṣiktā na ete vācam vipluta arthām vadanti

original: MSS_5392-1 āvirbhūtavipāṇḍuracchavi mukhaṃ kṣāmā kapolasthalī savyāpārapariślathe ca nayane'nutsāhamugdhaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: āvirbhūta vipāṇḍura chavi mukham kṣāmā kapola sthalī sa vyāpāra pariślathe ca nayanena utsāha mugdham vapuḥ

original: MSS_5392-2 śyāmībhūtamukhaṃ payodharayugaṃ madhyaḥ svabhāvocchrito jātānyaiva manoharākṛtiraho garbhodaye subhruvaḥ //
analyzed: śyāmībhūta mukham payodhara yugam madhyaḥ svabhāva ucchritaḥ jāta anyā eva manohara ākṛtiḥ aho garbha udaye subhruvaḥ

original: MSS_5393-1 āvirbhūtānurāgāḥ kṣaṇamudayagirerujjihānasya bhānoḥ parṇacchāyaiḥ purastādupavanataravo dūramāśveva gatvā /
analyzed: āvis bhūta anurāgāḥ kṣaṇam udaya gireḥ ujjihānasya bhānoḥ parṇa chāyaiḥ purastāt upavana taravaḥ dūram āśu eva gatvā

original: MSS_5393-2 ete tasmin nivṛttāḥ punaraparagiriprāntaparyastabimbe prāyo bhṛtyāstyajanti pracalitavibhavaṃ svāminaṃ sevamānāḥ //
analyzed: ete tasmin nivṛttāḥ punar apara giri prānta paryasta bimbe prāyas bhṛtyāḥ tyajanti pracalita vibhavam svāminam sevamānāḥ

original: MSS_5394-1 āvirbhūte śaśini tamasā mucyamāneva rātrir naiśasyārcirhutabhuja iva chinnabhūyiṣṭhadhūmā /
analyzed: āvirbhūte śaśini tamasā mucyamānā iva rātriḥ naiśasya arciḥ hutabhujaḥ iva chinna bhūyiṣṭha dhūmā

original: MSS_5394-2 mohenāntarvaratanuriyaṃ lakṣyate muktakalpā gaṅgā rodhaḥpatanakaluṣā gṛhṇatīva prasādam //
analyzed: mohena antar vara tanuḥ iyam lakṣyate mukta kalpā gaṅgā rodhaḥpatana kaluṣā gṛhṇati iva prasādam

original: MSS_5395-1 āvirbhūto jagati suṣamārūpato bhautike'smin jñānātmāsau lasati bhagavān viṣṭape mānasīye /
analyzed: āvirbhūtaḥ jagati suṣamā rūpataḥ bhautike smin jñāna ātmā asau lasati bhagavān viṣṭape mānasīye

original: MSS_5395-2 prāṇānāṃ vā jvalati bhuvane prasphuṭaḥ śaktimūrtyā premadvārā prakaṭitatanurbhāsate caityaloke //
analyzed: prāṇānām vā jvalati bhuvane prasphuṭaḥ śakti mūrtyā prema dvārā prakaṭita tanuḥ bhāsate caitya loke

original: MSS_5396-1 āvilapayodharāgraṃ lavalīdalapāṇḍurānanacchāyam /
analyzed: āvila payodhara agram lavalī dala pāṇḍura ānana chāyam

original: MSS_5396-2 tāni dināni vapurabhūt kevalamalasekṣaṇaṃ tasyāḥ //
analyzed: tāni dināni vapuḥ abhūt kevalam alasa īkṣaṇam tasyāḥ

original: MSS_5397-1 ā vivāhasamayād gṛhe vane śaiśave tadanu yauvane punaḥ /
analyzed: ā vivāha samayāt gṛhe vane śaiśave tadanu yauvane punar

original: MSS_5397-2 svāpaheturanupāśrito'nyayā rāmabāhurupadhānameṣa te //
analyzed: svāpa hetuḥ anupāśritaḥ anyayā rāma bāhuḥ upadhānam eṣa te

original: MSS_5398-1 āviśadbhiruṭajāṅgaṇaṃ mṛgair mūlasekasarasaiśca vṛkṣakaiḥ /
analyzed: āviśadbhiḥ uṭaja aṅgaṇam mṛgaiḥ mūla seka sarasaiḥ ca vṛkṣakaiḥ

original: MSS_5398-2 āśramāḥ praviśadagnidhenavo bibhrati śriyamudīritāgnayaḥ //
analyzed: āśramāḥ praviśat agni dhenavaḥ bibhrati śriyam udīrita agnayaḥ

original: MSS_5399-1 āviṣkaroti na snehaṃ rāgaṃ badhnāti no rate /
analyzed: āviṣkaroti na sneham rāgam badhnāti no rate

original: MSS_5399-2 abhiyuktā tu mandecchā sānyakāmā tu kāminī //
analyzed: abhiyuktā tu manda icchā sā anya kāmā tu kāminī

original: MSS_5400-1 āviṣkurvanniva navanavenādareṇānurāgaṃ sarvāṅgīṇaṃ suciravirahonmūrcchitāyāṃ nalinyām /
analyzed: āviṣkurvan iva nava navena ādareṇa anurāgam sarvāṅgīṇam su cira viraha unmūrcchitāyām nalinyām

original: MSS_5400-2 trailokyāndhīkaraṇatimiradveṣaroṣāruṇatvaṃ vyākurvan vā kimayamudayatyambare tigmarociḥ //
analyzed: trailokya andhīkaraṇa timira dveṣa roṣa aruṇa tvam vyākurvan vā kim ayam udayati ambare tigmarociḥ

original: MSS_5401-1 āviṣkṛtān paraguṇān kalayanti tūṣṇīṃ duścetaso bata vidūṣayituṃ na rāgāt /
analyzed: āviṣkṛtān para guṇān kalayanti tūṣṇīm duścetasaḥ bata vidūṣayitum na rāgāt

original: MSS_5401-2 ākarṇayanti kila kokilakūjitāni saṃdhātumeva kila saptanalīṃ kirātāḥ //
analyzed: ākarṇayanti kila kokila kūjitāni saṃdhātum eva kila sapta nalīm kirātāḥ

original: MSS_5402-1 āviṣṭa iva duḥkhena tadgatena garīyasā /
analyzed: āviṣṭaḥ iva duḥkhena tad gatena garīyasā

original: MSS_5402-2 samanvitaḥ karuṇayā parayā dīnamuddharet //
analyzed: samanvitaḥ karuṇayā parayā dīnam uddharet

original: MSS_5403-1 āvṛṇoti yadi sā mṛgīdṛśī svāñcale kucakāñcanācalam /
analyzed: āvṛṇoti yadi sā mṛgī dṛśī sva añcale kuca kāñcana acalam

original: MSS_5403-2 bhūya eva bahireti gauravād unnato na sahate tiraskriyām //
analyzed: bhūyas eva bahis eti gauravāt unnataḥ na sahate tiraskriyām

original: MSS_5404-1 āvṛṇvato locanamārgamājau rajo'ndhakārasya vijṛmbhitasya /
analyzed: āvṛṇvataḥ locana mārgam ājau rajaḥ ndhakārasya vijṛmbhitasya

original: MSS_5404-2 śastrakṣatāśvadvipavīrajanmā bālāruṇo'bhūd rudhirapravāhaḥ //
analyzed: śastra kṣata aśva dvipa vīra janmā rudhira pravāhaḥ

original: MSS_5405-1 āvṛṇvānā jhagiti jaghanaṃ maddukūlāñcalena preṅkhatkrīḍākulitakabarībandhanavyagrapāṇiḥ /
analyzed: āvṛṇvānā jha giti jaghanam mad dukūla añcalena preṅkhat krīḍā ākulita kabarī bandhana vyagra pāṇiḥ

original: MSS_5405-2 ardhocchvāsasphuṭanakhapadālaṃkṛtābhyāṃ stanābhyāṃ dṛṣṭā dhārṣṭyasmṛtinatamukhī mohanānte mayā sā //
analyzed: ardha ucchvāsa sphuṭa nakha pada alaṃkṛtābhyām stanābhyām dṛṣṭā dhārṣṭya smṛti nata mukhī mohana ante mayā sā

original: MSS_5406-1 āvṛtaṃ jñānametena jñānino nityavairiṇā /
analyzed: āvṛtam jñānam etena jñāninaḥ nitya vairiṇā

original: MSS_5406-2 kāmarūpeṇa kaunteya duṣpūreṇānalena ca //
analyzed: kāmarūpeṇa kaunteya duṣpūreṇa analena ca

original: MSS_5407-1 āvṛtānyapi nirantaramuccair yoṣitāmurasijadvitayena /
analyzed: āvṛtāni api nirantaram uccais yoṣitām urasija dvitayena

original: MSS_5407-2 rāgiṇāmita ito vimṛśadbhiḥ pāṇibhirjagṛhire hṛdayāni //
analyzed: rāgiṇām itas itas vimṛśadbhiḥ pāṇibhiḥ jagṛhire hṛdayāni

original: MSS_5408-1 āvṛtya śrīmadenāndhān anyonyakṛtasaṃvidaḥ /
analyzed: āvṛtya śrī madena andhān anyonya kṛta saṃvidaḥ

original: MSS_5408-2 svairaṃ hasanti pārśvasthā bālonmattapiśācavat //
analyzed: svairam hasanti pārśva sthāḥ bāla unmatta piśāca vat

original: MSS_5409-1 āvedayitumasmākaṃ kṛtajñatvaṃ prabhuṃ prati /
analyzed: āvedayitum asmākam kṛtajña tvam prabhum prati

original: MSS_5409-2 panthāḥ śreyaskaro nānyaḥ tūṣṇīṃ toṣeṇa vartanāt //
analyzed: panthāḥ śreyaskaraḥ na anyaḥ tūṣṇīm toṣeṇa vartanāt

original: MSS_5410-1 āvedyatāmaviditaṃ kimathāpyanuktaṃ vaktavyamāntararujopaśamāya nālam /
analyzed: āvedyatām aviditam kim atha api anuktam vaktavyam āntara rujā upaśamāya na alam

original: MSS_5410-2 ityucyate kimapi tacchravaṇe nidhātuṃ mātaḥ prasīda malayadhvajapāṇḍyakanye //
analyzed: iti ucyate kim api tad śravaṇe nidhātum mātar prasīda malayadhvaja pāṇḍya kanye

original: MSS_5411-1 āvepate bhramati sarpati mohameti kāntaṃ vilokayati kūjati dīnadīnam /
analyzed: āvepate bhramati sarpati moham eti kāntam vilokayati kūjati dīna dīnam

original: MSS_5411-2 astaṃ hi bhānumati gacchati cakravākī hā jīvite'pi maraṇaṃ priyaviprayogaḥ //
analyzed: astam hi bhānumati gacchati cakravākī hā jīvite pi maraṇam priya viprayogaḥ

original: MSS_5412-1 āśaṅkya praṇatiṃ paṭāntapihitau pādau karotyādarād vyājenāgatamāvṛṇoti hasitaṃ na spaṣṭamudvīkṣate /
analyzed: āśaṅkya praṇatim paṭa anta pihitau pādau karoti ādarāt vyājena āgatam āvṛṇoti hasitam na spaṣṭam udvīkṣate

original: MSS_5412-2 mayyālāpavati pratīpavacanā sakhyā samaṃ bhāṣate tanvyās tiṣṭhatu nirbharapraṇayitā māno'pi ramyodayaḥ //
analyzed: mayi ālāpavati pratīpavacanā sakhyā samam bhāṣate tanvyāḥ tiṣṭhatu nirbhara praṇayitā mānaḥ api ramya udayaḥ

original: MSS_5413-1 āśayā kṛtadāso yaḥ sa dāsaḥ sarvadehinām /
analyzed: āśayā kṛta dāsaḥ yaḥ sa dāsaḥ sarva dehinām

original: MSS_5413-2 āśā dāsīkṛtā yena tasya dāsāyate jagat //
analyzed: āśā dāsīkṛtā yena tasya dāsāyate jagat

original: MSS_5415-1 āśāṃ kālavatīṃ kuryāt kālaṃ vighnena yojayet /
analyzed: āśām kālavatīm kuryāt kālam vighnena yojayet

original: MSS_5415-2 vignaṃ nimittato brūyān nimittaṃ cāpi hetutaḥ //
analyzed: vignam nimittataḥ brūyāt nimittam ca api hetutaḥ

original: MSS_5416-1 āśāḥ kāñcanapuṣpakuḍmalakulacchannā na kāḥ kṣmātale saujanyāmṛtavarṣibhis tilakitaṃ sevyairna kiṃ maṇḍalam /
analyzed: āśāḥ kāñcana puṣpa kuḍmala kula channāḥ na kāḥ kṣmā tale saujanya amṛta varṣibhiḥ tilakitam sevyaiḥ na kim maṇḍalam

original: MSS_5416-2 panthānaḥ suciropacārarucirairvyāptā na kaiḥ saṃstutais teṣāmatra vasanti nihnutaguṇāḥ kālena ye mohitāḥ //
analyzed: panthānaḥ su cira upacāra ruciraiḥ vyāptāḥ na kaiḥ saṃstutaiḥ teṣām atra vasanti nihnuta guṇāḥ kālena ye mohitāḥ

original: MSS_5417-1 āśāḥ kharvaya garvayātimukharānunnādino barhiṇaḥ sarvāṃstrāsaya garjitaiḥ kalagiro haṃsān samutsāraya /
analyzed: āśāḥ kharvaya garvaya ati mukharān unnādinaḥ barhiṇaḥ sarvān trāsaya garjitaiḥ kala giraḥ haṃsān samutsāraya

original: MSS_5417-2 drāgāskandaya mitramaṇḍalamalaṃ sadvartma saṃdūṣaya śrīmannabda nayatyayaṃ na pavano yāvad daśāṃ kāmapi //
analyzed: drāk āskandaya mitra maṇḍalam alam sat vartma saṃdūṣaya śrīman abda nayati ayam na pavanaḥ yāvat daśām kām api

original: MSS_5418-1 āśāḥ pūrayati śriyaṃ vitarati trailokyatāpaṃ haraty avyājāmṛtasecanaṃ vidadhati prītiṃ parāṃ tanvati /
analyzed: āśāḥ pūrayati śriyam vitarati trailokya tāpam harati a vyāja amṛta secanam vidadhati prītim parām tanvati

original: MSS_5418-2 etena prasabhaṃ ciraṃ jalamucā kālena dūrīkṛte pūrṇe rājani jātamulbaṇatamastomāvaśeṣaṃ jagat //
analyzed: etena prasabham ciram jalamucā kālena dūrīkṛte pūrṇe rājani jātam ulbaṇatama stoma avaśeṣam jagat

original: MSS_5419-1 āśāḥ prakāśayati yastimirāṇi bhaṅktvā bodhaṃ dṛśāṃ diśati bhūriguṇeṣvabhīṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: āśāḥ prakāśayati yaḥ timirāṇi bhaṅktvā bodham dṛśām diśati bhūri guṇeṣu abhīṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_5419-2 khedāya yasya na paropakṛtiṣvaṭāṭyā dhīmān namasyati na kastaminaṃ praśasyam //
analyzed: khedāya yasya na para upakṛtiṣu aṭāṭyā dhīmān namasyati na kaḥ taminam praśasyam

original: MSS_5420-1 āśāḥ prasādayatu puṣyatu vā cakorān kāmaṃ tanotu kumudeṣu mudaṃ sudhāṃśuḥ /
analyzed: āśāḥ prasādayatu puṣyatu vā cakorān kāmam tanotu kumudeṣu mudam sudhāṃśuḥ

original: MSS_5420-2 ekaḥ sa eva paramutkaṭarāhudanta- patrapraveśasamaduḥkhasukhaḥ kuraṅgaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ saḥ eva param utkaṭa rāhu danta patra praveśa sama duḥkha sukhaḥ kuraṅgaḥ

original: MSS_5421-1 āśāḥ saṃtamasopalepamalināḥ pīyūṣagauraiḥ karair ālimpannayamudgatairdivamimāṃ karpūrapūraṃ sṛjan /
analyzed: āśāḥ saṃtamasa upalepa malināḥ pīyūṣa gauraiḥ karaiḥ ālimpan ayam udgataiḥ divam imām karpūra pūram sṛjan

original: MSS_5421-2 candraścandraśilaikakuṭṭimamayaṃ kṣoṇītalaṃ kalpayan paśyodgacchati pākapāṇḍuraśaracchāyopameyacchaviḥ //
analyzed: candraḥ candraśilā eka kuṭṭima mayam kṣoṇī talam kalpayan paśya udgacchati pāka pāṇḍura śara chāyā upameya chaviḥ

original: MSS_5422-1 āśākhaniragādheyaṃ duṣpūrā kena pūryate /
analyzed: ā śākha niḥ agādhā iyam duṣpūrā kena pūryate

original: MSS_5422-2 yā mahadbhirapi kṣiptaiḥ pūrakaireva khanyate //
analyzed: yā mahadbhiḥ api kṣiptaiḥ pūrakaiḥ eva khanyate

original: MSS_5423-1 āśākhaniragādheyam adhaḥkṛtajagattrayā /
analyzed: āśākha niragādheyam adhas kṛta jagattrayā

original: MSS_5423-2 uddhṛtyoddhṛtya tatrasthān aho sadbhiḥ samīkṛtā //
analyzed: uddhṛtya uddhṛtya tatrasthān aho sadbhiḥ samīkṛtā

original: MSS_5424-1 āśāgartaḥ pratiprāṇi yasmin viśvamaṇūpamam /
analyzed: āśāgartaḥ pratiprāṇi yasmin viśvam aṇu upamam

original: MSS_5424-2 kasya kiṃ kiyadāyāti vṛthā yā viṣayaiṣitā //
analyzed: kasya kim kiyadā āyāti vṛthā yā viṣaya eṣitā

original: MSS_5425-1 āśāgṛhītā vikalā bhavanti hatatrapā nyastaguṇābhimānāḥ /
analyzed: āśā gṛhītāḥ vikalāḥ bhavanti hata trapāḥ nyasta guṇa abhimānāḥ

original: MSS_5425-2 bhrāmyanti mattā iva naṣṭasaṃjñā dehītivācas taralasvabhāvāḥ //
analyzed: bhrāmyanti mattāḥ iva naṣṭa saṃjñāḥ dehi iti vācaḥ tarala svabhāvāḥ

original: MSS_5426-1 āśāturagamāruhya nityaṃ dhāvati yācakaḥ /
analyzed: āśā turagam āruhya nityam dhāvati yācakaḥ

original: MSS_5426-2 na cārtiḥ na śramo hyasya na gatau nāpi mandatā //
analyzed: na ca ārtiḥ na śramaḥ hi asya na gatau na api manda tā

original: MSS_5427-1 āśā dhṛtiṃ hanti samṛddhimantakaḥ krodhaḥ śriyaṃ hanti yaśaḥ kadaryatā /
analyzed: āśāḥ dhṛtim hanti samṛddhim antakaḥ krodhaḥ śriyam hanti yaśaḥ kadarya tā

original: MSS_5427-2 apālanaṃ hanti paśūṃśca rājann ekaḥ kruddho brāhmaṇo hanti rāṣṭram //
analyzed: apālanam hanti paśūn ca rājan ekaḥ kruddhaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ hanti rāṣṭram

original: MSS_5428-1 āśā nāma nadī manorathajalā tṛṣṇātaraṅgākulā rāgagrāhavatī vitarkavihagā dhairyadrumadhvaṃsinī /
analyzed: āśā nāma nadī manoratha jalā tṛṣṇā taraṅga ākulā rāga grāhavatī vitarka vihagā dhairya druma dhvaṃsinī

original: MSS_5428-2 mohāvartasudustarātigahanā prottuṅgacintātaṭī tasyāḥ pāragatā viśuddhamanaso nandantu yogīśvarāḥ //
analyzed: moha āvarta su dustara ati gahanā prottuṅga cintā taṭī tasyāḥ pāra gatāḥ viśuddha manasaḥ nandantu yogi īśvarāḥ

original: MSS_5429-1 āśā nāma manuṣyāṇāṃ kāścidāścaryaśṛṅkhalā /
analyzed: āśāḥ nāma manuṣyāṇām kāścid āścarya śṛṅkhalā

original: MSS_5429-2 yayā baddhāḥpradhāvanti muktās tiṣṭhanti kutracit //
analyzed: yayā baddhāḥ pradhāvanti muktāḥ tiṣṭhanti kutracid

original: MSS_5430-1 āśā niṣṭhā pratiṣṭhā mama kila mahilāstāsu saukhyaṃ kadā syād yā prāntyā sā vidadhyādiha kimapi tathā madhyamā sā paratra /
analyzed: āśā niṣṭhā pratiṣṭhā mama kila mahilāḥ tāsu saukhyam kadā syāt yā prāntyā sā vidadhyāt iha kim api tathā madhyamā sā paratra

original: MSS_5430-2 ādyā sā nobhayatrāpyahaha tadapi kiṃ saktatāṃ yāmi tasyāṃ yā prauḍhyādapragalbhe pratidivasamubhe te kadarthīkaroti //
analyzed: ādyā sā nā ubhayatra api ahaha tat api kim sakta tām yāmi tasyām yā prauḍhyāt a pragalbhe pratidivasam ubhe te kadarthīkaroti

original: MSS_5431-1 āśāpāśanibaddho nṛtyati kiṃ vā naro na dhanikapuraḥ /
analyzed: āśā pāśa nibaddhaḥ nṛtyati kim vā naraḥ na dhanika puras

original: MSS_5431-2 hataśailūṣasya vidheḥ kutra vidheyaḥ sukhamupaiti //
analyzed: hata śailūṣasya vidheḥ kutra vidheyaḥ sukham upaiti

original: MSS_5432-1 āśāpāśavimuktiniścalasukhā svāyattacittasthitiḥ snehadveṣaviṣādalobhaviratiḥ saṃtoṣatṛptaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: āśā pāśa vimukti niścala sukhā sva āyatta citta sthitiḥ sneha dveṣa viṣāda lobha viratiḥ saṃtoṣa tṛptam manaḥ

original: MSS_5432-2 cintā nityamanityatāparicaye saṅge'pi niḥsaṅgatā saṃvitsekavivekapūtamanasāmityeṣa mokṣakramaḥ //
analyzed: cintā nityam anitya tā paricaye saṅge api niḥsaṅga tā saṃvid seka viveka pūta manasām iti eṣa mokṣa kramaḥ

original: MSS_5433-1 āśāpāśaśatairbaddhāḥ kāmakrodhaparāyaṇāḥ /
analyzed: āśā pāśa śataiḥ baddhāḥ kāma krodha parāyaṇāḥ

original: MSS_5433-2 īhante kāmabhogārtham anyāyenārthasaṃcayān //
analyzed: īhante kāma bhoga artham anyāyena artha saṃcayān

original: MSS_5434-1 āśāpāśaśatairbaddhā vāsanābharavāhinaḥ /
analyzed: āśā pāśa śataiḥ baddhāḥ vāsanā bhara vāhinaḥ

original: MSS_5434-2 kāyāt kāyamupāyānti vṛkṣād vṛkṣamivāṇḍajāḥ //
analyzed: kāyāt kāyam upāyānti vṛkṣāt vṛkṣam iva aṇḍajāḥ

original: MSS_5435-1 āśāpāśaiḥ parītāṅgā ye bhavanti naro'rditāḥ /
analyzed: āśā pāśaiḥ parīta aṅgāḥ ye bhavanti nara ūrditāḥ

original: MSS_5435-2 te rātrau śerate naiva tadaprāptivicintayā //
analyzed: te rātrau śerate nā eva tad aprāpti vicintayā

original: MSS_5436-1 āśāpiśācikā māṃ bhramayati parito daśasvapi diśāsu /
analyzed: āśā piśācikā mām bhramayati paritas daśasu api diśāsu

original: MSS_5436-2 svīye piśācavarge sevāyai kiṃ na yojayasi //
analyzed: svīye piśāca varge sevāyai kim na yojayasi

original: MSS_5437-1 āśāpiśācikāviṣṭaḥ purato yasya kasyacit /
analyzed: āśā piśācika āviṣṭaḥ puratas yasya kasyacid

original: MSS_5437-2 vandate nindati stauti roditi prahasatyapi //
analyzed: vandate nindati stauti roditi prahasati api

original: MSS_5438-1 āśā balavatī kaṣṭā nairāśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham /
analyzed: āśā balavatī kaṣṭā nairāśyam paramam sukham

original: MSS_5438-2 āśāṃ nirāśāṃ kṛtvā tu sukhaṃ svapiti piṅgalā //
analyzed: āśām nirāśām kṛtvā tu sukham svapiti piṅgalā

original: MSS_5439-1 āśā balavatī rājan viparītā hi śṛṅkhalā /
analyzed: āśā balavatī rājan viparītā hi śṛṅkhalā

original: MSS_5439-2 yayā baddhāḥ pradhāvanti muktāstiṣṭhanti paṅguvat //
analyzed: yayā baddhāḥ pradhāvanti muktāḥ tiṣṭhanti paṅgu vat

original: MSS_5440-1 āśā bhaṅgakarī puṃsām ajeyārātisaṃnibhā /
analyzed: āśā bhaṅga karī puṃsām ajeyā arāti saṃnibhā

original: MSS_5440-2 tasmādāśāṃ tyajet prājño yadīcchec śāśvataṃ sukham //
analyzed: tasmāt āśām tyajet prājñaḥ yadi icchet śāśvatam sukham

original: MSS_5441-1 āśābhareṇa nikhilāśāsu dhāvanamathāśātakumbhagiri vā kleśāvahaṃ vividhadeśāṭanaṃ draviṇaleśāyanāpi vavṛte /
analyzed: āśā bhareṇa nikhila āśāsu dhāvanam atha a śātakumbha giri vā kleśa āvaham vividha deśa aṭanam vavṛte

original: MSS_5441-2 āśātidāmavitumāśāsva pāṇidhṛtapāśāmanekajagatām īśāmupāsitagirīśāmihāṅgadigadhīśārcitāṅghrinalinām //
analyzed: āśā atidām avitum āśāsva pāṇi dhṛta pāśām aneka jagatām īśām upāsita girīśām iha aṅga diś adhīśa arcita aṅghri nalinām

original: MSS_5442-1 āśābhibhūtā ye martyā mahāmohā mahoddhatāḥ /
analyzed: āśā abhibhūtāḥ ye martyāḥ mahā mohāḥ mahā uddhatāḥ

original: MSS_5442-2 avamānādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na jānanti kadāpyaho //
analyzed: avamāna ādikam duḥkham na jānanti kadāpi aho

original: MSS_5443-1 āśāmutpādya cākṛṣya vañcayed ripumantriṇam /
analyzed: āśām utpādya ca ākṛṣya vañcayet ripu mantriṇam

original: MSS_5443-2 asurebhyo hṛtau datvā śāṇḍāmarkau grahaṃ suraiḥ //
analyzed: asurebhyaḥ hṛtau da tvā śāṇḍāmarkau graham suraiḥ

original: MSS_5444-1 āśāyāḥ khalu ye dāsās te dāsāḥ sarvadehinām /
analyzed: āśāyāḥ khalu ye dāsāḥ te dāsāḥ sarva dehinām

original: MSS_5444-2 āśā dāsīkṛtā yena tasya dāsāyate jagat //
analyzed: āśā dāsīkṛtā yena tasya dāsāyate jagat

original: MSS_5445-1 āśāyā ye dāsās te dāsāḥ sarvalokasya /
analyzed: āśāyāḥ ye dāsāḥ te dāsāḥ sarva lokasya

original: MSS_5445-2 āśā yeṣāṃ dāsī teṣāṃ dāsāyate lokaḥ //
analyzed: āśā yeṣām dāsī teṣām dāsāyate lokaḥ

original: MSS_5446-1 āśāyās tanayā māyā krodho'sūyāsutaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: āśāyāḥ tanayā māyā krodha usūyā sutaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_5446-2 hiṃsāyās tanayaḥ pāpaḥ kṛtaghno nārhati prajām //
analyzed: hiṃsāyāḥ tanayaḥ pāpaḥ kṛtaghnaḥ na arhati prajām

original: MSS_5447-1 āśālatāvalayitaṃ baddhamūlamavidyayā /
analyzed: āśā latā valayitam baddha mūlam avidyayā

original: MSS_5447-2 ko hi tāpayituṃ śaktaḥ mukhena bhavapādapam //
analyzed: kaḥ hi tāpayitum śaktaḥ mukhena bhava pādapam

original: MSS_5448-1 āśāvalambopacitā na kasya tṛṣṇālatānarthaphalaṃ prasūte /
analyzed: āśā avalamba upacitā na kasya tṛṣṇā latā anartha phalam prasūte

original: MSS_5448-2 dine dine labdharucirvivasvān mīnaṃ ca meṣaṃ ca vṛṣaṃ ca bhuṅkte //
analyzed: dine dine labdha ruciḥ vivasvān mīnam ca meṣam ca vṛṣam ca bhuṅkte

original: MSS_5449-1 āśāviplutacetaso'bhilaṣitāllābhādalābho varas tasyālābhanirākṛtā hi tanutāmāpadyate prārthanā /
analyzed: āśā vipluta cetasaḥ abhilaṣitāt lābhāt alābhaḥ varaḥ tasya alābha nirākṛtā hi tanu tām āpadyate prārthanā

original: MSS_5449-2 iṣṭāvāptisamudbhavastu sutarāṃ harṣaḥ pramāthī dhṛteḥ setorbhaṅga ivāmbhasāṃ vivaśatāṃ vegena vistāryate //
analyzed: iṣṭa avāpti samudbhavaḥ tu sutarām harṣaḥ pramāthī dhṛteḥ setoḥ bhaṅgaḥ iva ambhasām vivaśa tām vegena vistāryate

original: MSS_5450-1 āśāsarasīṃ śoṣaya tapasā tanmadhyasthaḥ poṣaya manasā /
analyzed: āśā sarasīm śoṣaya tapasā tad madhya sthaḥ poṣaya manasā

original: MSS_5450-2 kāyakleśaṃ śodhaya paruṣaṃ śithilaya paramabrahmaṇi kaluṣam //
analyzed: kāya kleśam śodhaya paruṣam śithilaya parama brahmaṇi kaluṣam

original: MSS_5451-1 āśāsāno na vai bhṛtyaḥ svāminyāśiṣa ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: āśāsānaḥ na vai bhṛtyaḥ svāmini āśiṣaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_5451-2 na svāmī bhṛtyataḥ svāmyam icchan yo rāti cāśiṣaḥ //
analyzed: na svāmī bhṛtyataḥ svāmyam icchan yaḥ rāti ca āśiṣaḥ

original: MSS_5452-1 āśāsu rāśībhavadaṅgavallī- bhāsaiva dāsīkṛtadugdhasindhum /
analyzed: āśāsu rāśībhavat aṅga vallī bhāsā eva dāsīkṛta dugdha sindhum

original: MSS_5452-2 mandasmitairninditaśāradenduṃ vande'ravindāsanasundari tvām //
analyzed: manda smitaiḥ nindita śārada indum vande ravinda āsana sundari tvām

original: MSS_5452A-1 āśāsyamanyat punaruktabhūtaṃ śreyāṃsi sarvāṇyadhijagmuṣas te /
analyzed: āśāsyam anyat punar ukta bhūtam śreyāṃsi sarvāṇi adhijagmuṣaḥ te

original: MSS_5452A-2 putraṃ labhasvātmaguṇānurūpaṃ bhavantamīḍyaṃ bhavataḥ piteva //
analyzed: putram labhasva ātma guṇa anurūpam bhavantam īḍyam bhavataḥ pitā iva

original: MSS_5453-1 āśā hi paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ nirāśā paramaṃ sukham /
analyzed: āśāḥ hi paramam duḥkham nirāśā paramam sukham

original: MSS_5453-2 āśāpāśaṃ parityajya sukhaṃ svapiti piṅgalā //
analyzed: āśā pāśam parityajya sukham svapiti piṅgalā

original: MSS_5454-1 āśā hi paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ nairāśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham /
analyzed: āśāḥ hi paramam duḥkham nairāśyam paramam sukham

original: MSS_5454-2 yathā sañchidya kāntāśāṃ sukhaṃ suṣvāpa piṅgalā //
analyzed: yathā sañchidya kānta āśām sukham suṣvāpa piṅgalā

original: MSS_5455-1 āśiṣaṃ ca tilakaṃ ca jananyā manyate sma kavacādhikamanyaḥ /
analyzed: āśiṣam ca tilakam ca jananyāḥ manyate sma kavaca adhikam anyaḥ

original: MSS_5455-2 yena saṃyati hi sarvabhaṭānāṃ vikramaikavacatāṃ (?) pratipede //
analyzed: yena saṃyati hi sarva bhaṭānām vikrama eka vaca tām pratipede

original: MSS_5456-1 āśīrvādamukhā strī mantramukho brāhmaṇaḥ priyavāk /
analyzed: āśīrvāda mukhā strī mantra mukhaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ priya vāc

original: MSS_5456-2 kuśalaṃ pṛcchannatithiḥ priyasuhṛdānandaparipūrṇaḥ //
analyzed: kuśalam pṛcchan atithiḥ priya suhṛd ānanda paripūrṇaḥ

original: MSS_5457-1 āśīviṣamiva kruddhaṃ prabhuṃ prāṇadhaneśvaram /
analyzed: āśīviṣam iva kruddham prabhum prāṇa dhana īśvaram

original: MSS_5457-2 yatnenopacaren nityaṃ nāhamasmīti mānavaḥ //
analyzed: yatnena upacaret nityam na aham asmi iti mānavaḥ

original: MSS_5458-1 āśīviṣeṇa radanacchadadaṃśadānam etena te punaranarthatayā na gaṇyam /
analyzed: āśīviṣeṇa radanacchada daṃśa dānam etena te punar anartha tayā na gaṇyam

original: MSS_5458-2 bādhāṃ vidhātumadhare hi na tāvakīne pīyūṣasāraghaṭite ghaṭate'sya śaktiḥ //
analyzed: bādhām vidhātum adhare hi na tāvakīne pīyūṣa sāra ghaṭite ghaṭate isya śaktiḥ

original: MSS_5459-1 āśu kāntamabhisāritavatyā yoṣitaḥ pulakaruddhakapolam /
analyzed: āśu kāntam abhisāritavatyāḥ yoṣitaḥ pulaka ruddha kapolam

original: MSS_5459-2 nirjigāya mukhamindumakhaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍapatratilakākṛti kāntyā //
analyzed: nirjigāya mukham indum akhaṇḍam khaṇḍa patra tilaka ākṛti kāntyā

original: MSS_5460-1 āśu laṅghitavatīṣṭakarāgre nīvimardhamukulīkṛtadṛṣṭyā /
analyzed: āśu laṅghitavatī iṣṭa kara agre nīvim ardha mukulīkṛta dṛṣṭyā

original: MSS_5460-2 raktavaiṇikahatādharatantrī- maṇḍalakvaṇitacāru cukūje //
analyzed: rakta vaiṇika hata adhara tantrī maṇḍala kvaṇita cāru cukūje

original: MSS_5461-1 āśaikatantumavalambya vilambamānā rakṣāmi jīvamavadhirniyato yadi syāt /
analyzed: āśā eka tantum avalambya vilambamānā rakṣāmi jīvam avadhiḥ niyataḥ yadi syāt

original: MSS_5461-2 no ced vidhiḥ sakalalokahitaikakārī yat kālakūṭamasṛjat tadidaṃ kimartham //
analyzed: no ced vidhiḥ sakala loka hita eka kārī yat kālakūṭam asṛjat tat idam kimartham

original: MSS_5462-1 ā śailendrāc śilāntaḥskhalitasuradhunīśīkarāsāraśīt ād ā tīrānnaikarāgasphuritamaṇiruco dakṣiṇasyārṇavasya /
analyzed: ā śaila indrāt ā tīrāt na eka rāga sphurita maṇi rucaḥ dakṣiṇasya arṇavasya

original: MSS_5462-2 āgatyāgatya bhītipraṇatanṛpaśataiḥ śaśvadeva kriyante cūḍāratnāṃśugarbhāstava caraṇayugasyāṅgulīrandhrabhāgāḥ //
analyzed: āgatya āgatya bhīti praṇata nṛpa śataiḥ śaśvat eva kriyante cūḍāratna aṃśu garbhāḥ tava caraṇa yugasya aṅgulī randhra bhāgāḥ

original: MSS_5463-1 āśaiva rākṣasī puṃsām āśaiva viṣamañjarī /
analyzed: āśā eva rākṣasī puṃsām āśā eva viṣa mañjarī

original: MSS_5463-2 āśaiva jīrṇamadirā dhigāśā sarvadoṣabhūḥ //
analyzed: āśā eva jīrṇa madirā dhik āśā sarva doṣa bhūḥ

original: MSS_5464-1 ā śaiśavān mamatayā kalitas tvayāsau ānṛṇyamamba tava labdhumanā mṛgāṅkaḥ /
analyzed: ā śaiśavāt mamatayā kalitaḥ tvayā asau ānṛṇyam amba tava labdhu manāḥ mṛgāṅkaḥ

original: MSS_5464-2 svātmānameva niyataṃ bahudhā vibhajya tvatpādayorvinidadhe nakharāpadeśāt //
analyzed: sva ātmānam eva niyatam bahudhā vibhajya tvad pādayoḥ vinidadhe nakhara apadeśāt

original: MSS_5465-1 āścaryaṃ kathayāmi kasya purataḥ kurve kimemi kva vā kācit kāñcanavallarī gṛhaśirorūḍhā samujjṛmbhate /
analyzed: āścaryam kathayāmi kasya puratas kurve kim emi kva vā kācid kāñcana vallarī gṛha śiraḥ rūḍhā samujjṛmbhate

original: MSS_5465-2 asyāṃ kiṃ ca sakhe dadhanti suṣamāṃ nāraṅgabimbopamāṃ dṛṣṭvā pakvaphalāni memṛdu mano mohaṃ samutpadyate //
analyzed: asyām kim ca sakhe dadhanti suṣamām nāraṅga bimba upamām dṛṣṭvā pakva phalāni me mṛdu manaḥ moham samutpadyate

original: MSS_5466-1 āścaryaṃ pāṇipāśasya girīndratanaye tava /
analyzed: āścaryam pāṇi pāśasya girīndra tanaye tava

original: MSS_5466-2 jagadbandhanahā śaṃbhur yena bandhaṃ samicchati //
analyzed: jagat bandhana hā śaṃbhuḥ yena bandham samicchati

original: MSS_5467-1 āścaryaṃ vaḍavānalaḥ sa bhagavānāścaryamambhonidhir yatkarmātiśayaṃ vicintya hṛdaye kampaḥ samutpadyate /
analyzed: āścaryam vaḍavānalaḥ sa bhagavān āścaryam ambhonidhiḥ yat karma atiśayam vicintya hṛdaye kampaḥ samutpadyate

original: MSS_5467-2 ekasyāśrayaghasmarasya pibatastṛptirna jātā jalair anyasyāpi mahātmano na vapuṣi svalpo'pi toyavyayaḥ //
analyzed: ekasya āśraya ghasmarasya pibataḥ tṛptiḥ na jātā jalaiḥ anyasya api mahātmanaḥ na vapuṣi su alpaḥ api toya vyayaḥ

original: MSS_5468-1 āścaryaṃ samarāmbare ripuyaśaścandrapratāpārkayoḥ sarvagrāsamayaṃ sahaiva tanute tvatkhaṅgarāhuḥ katham /
analyzed: āścaryam samara ambare ripu yaśaḥ candra pratāpa arkayoḥ sarva grāsa mayam saha eva tanute tvad khaṅga rāhuḥ katham

original: MSS_5468-2 kiṃ cānyat paralokanirbhaya bhavāṃstasmin mahatyutsave gṛhṇāti tyajatāmakampahṛdayo rājñāṃ samastā bhuvaḥ //
analyzed: kim ca anyat para loka nirbhaya bhavān tasmin mahati utsave gṛhṇāti tyajatām akampa hṛdayaḥ rājñām samastāḥ bhuvaḥ

original: MSS_5469-1 āścaryadhāmabhiratīva guṇaiḥ kimetaj jālaṃ tvayā viracitaṃ yadapūrvameva /
analyzed: āścarya dhāmabhiḥ atīva guṇaiḥ kim etat jālam tvayā viracitam yat apūrvam eva

original: MSS_5469-2 cetāṃsi mūrtirahitānyapi cañcalāni badhnāti yacchrutigataṃ tadapūrvameva //
analyzed: cetāṃsi mūrti rahitāni api cañcalāni badhnāti yat śruti gatam tat apūrvam eva

original: MSS_5470-1 āścaryamutpaladṛśo vadanāmalendu- sāṃnidhyato mama muhurjadimānametya /
analyzed: āścaryam utpala dṛśaḥ vadana amala indu sāṃnidhyataḥ mama muhur jadimānam etya

original: MSS_5470-2 jātyena candramaṇineva mahīdharasya saṃdhāryate dravamayo manasā vikāraḥ //
analyzed: jātyena candra maṇinā iva mahīdharasya saṃdhāryate drava mayaḥ manasā vikāraḥ

original: MSS_5471-1 āścaryamūrjitamidaṃ kimu kiṃ madīyaś cittabhramo yadayaminduranambare'pi /
analyzed: āścaryam ūrjitam idam kimu kim madīyaḥ citta bhramaḥ yat ayam induḥ anambara ipi

original: MSS_5471-2 tatrāpi kāpi nanu citraparaṃpareyam ujjṛmbhitaṃ kuvalayadvitayaṃ yadatra //
analyzed: tatra api kā api nanu citra paraṃparā iyam ujjṛmbhitam kuvalaya dvitayam yat atra

original: MSS_5472-1 āścaryastimitāḥ kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇamatha prītipramīlatpuṭā vātāndolitapaṅkajātasumanaḥpīyūṣadhārāmucaḥ /
analyzed: āścarya stimitāḥ kṣaṇam kṣaṇam atha prīti pramīlat puṭāḥ vāta āndolita paṅka jāta sumanaḥ pīyūṣa dhārā mucaḥ

original: MSS_5472-2 etāḥ kasya haranti hanta na manaḥ kiṃcittrapāmañjula- premapreraṇamatra mugdhamuracattārottarā (?) dṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: etāḥ kasya haranti hanta na manaḥ kiṃcid trapā mañjula prema preraṇam atra dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: MSS_5473-1 āścaryaikanidhiḥ sa dugdhajaladhirmanye kimanyad yato lebhe janma sa lokalocanasudhāsāras tuṣāradyutiḥ /
analyzed: āścarya eka nidhiḥ sa dugdha jaladhiḥ manye kim anyat yatas lebhe janma sa loka locana sudhā sāraḥ tuṣāra dyutiḥ

original: MSS_5473-2 devīkelikacagraheṇa lalite gaṅgātaraṅgāṅkite niḥśaṅkaṃ niraṭaṅki śaṃkarajaṭājūṭe'pi yena sthitiḥ //
analyzed: devī keli kaca graheṇa lalite gaṅgā taraṅga aṅkite niḥśaṅkam niraṭaṅki śaṃkara jaṭā jūṭe pi yena sthitiḥ

original: MSS_5474-1 ā śmaśānān nivartante jñātayaḥ saha bāndhavaiḥ /
analyzed: ā śmaśānāt nivartante jñātayaḥ saha bāndhavaiḥ

original: MSS_5474-2 tvayaikenaiva gantavyaṃ tat karma sukṛtaṃ kuru //
analyzed: tvayā ekena eva gantavyam tat karma su kṛtam kuru

original: MSS_5475-1 āśyānairgalitaṃ dalairbata kathāśeṣāḥ prasūnaśriyo nodbhedo'pi phalaṃ prati pratidiśaṃ yātā nirāśāḥ khagāḥ /
analyzed: āśyānaiḥ galitam dalaiḥ bata kathā śeṣāḥ prasūna śriyaḥ phalam prati pratidiśam yātāḥ nirāśāḥ khagāḥ

original: MSS_5475-2 āpātālaviśuṣkamūlakuharonmīlajjaṭāsaṃtatis tūṣṇīmasti tathāpyakālajaladaṃ dhyāyan marukṣmāruhaḥ //
analyzed: āpātāla viśuṣka mūla kuhara unmīlat jaṭā saṃtatiḥ tūṣṇīm asti tathā api akāla jaladam dhyāyan maru kṣmāruhaḥ

original: MSS_5476-1 āśramādāśramaṃ gatvā hutahomo jitendriyaḥ /
analyzed: āśramāt āśramam gatvā huta homaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: MSS_5476-2 bhikṣābalipariśrāntaḥ pravrajan pretya vardhate //
analyzed: bhikṣā bali pariśrāntaḥ pravrajan pretya vardhate

original: MSS_5477-1 āśramī yadi vā varṇī pūjyo vātha gururmahān /
analyzed: āśramī yadi vā varṇī pūjyaḥ vā atha guruḥ mahān

original: MSS_5477-2 nādaṇḍyo nāma rājño'sti yaḥ svadharmeṇa tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: na a daṇḍyaḥ nāma rājñoḥ sti yaḥ svadharmeṇa tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_5478-1 āśrameṣu dvijātīnāṃ kārye vivadatāṃ mithaḥ /
analyzed: āśrameṣu dvijātīnām kārye vivadatām mithas

original: MSS_5478-2 na vibrūyān nṛpo dharmaṃ cikīrṣan hitamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: na vibrūyāt nṛpaḥ dharmam cikīrṣan hitam ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_5479-1 āśrayaḥ kiyatāmeṣa taruḥ sanmārgamāśritaḥ /
analyzed: āśrayaḥ kiyatām eṣa taruḥ sat mārgam āśritaḥ

original: MSS_5479-2 pāthoda sicyatāṃ kāle nopekṣyo dūrabhāvataḥ //
analyzed: pāthoda sicyatām kāle na upekṣyaḥ dūra bhāvataḥ

original: MSS_5480-1 āśrayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ nivāsaḥ sarvapakṣiṇām /
analyzed: āśrayaḥ sarva bhūtānām nivāsaḥ sarva pakṣiṇām

original: MSS_5480-2 dadāti sadṛśā bhāgaṃ sajalasya payomucaḥ //
analyzed: dadāti sadṛśā bhāgam sa jalasya payomucaḥ

original: MSS_5481-1 āśrayamāśrayalipsus tuṅgaṃ seveta duradhirohamapi /
analyzed: āśrayam āśraya lipsuḥ tuṅgam seveta duradhiroham api

original: MSS_5481-2 vinipatati yadi sa tasmāt tathāpyuparyeva nīcānām //
analyzed: vinipatati yadi sa tasmāt tathā api upari eva nīcānām

original: MSS_5482-1 āśrayavaśena satataṃ gurutā laghutā ca jāyate jantoḥ /
analyzed: āśraya vaśena satatam guru tā laghu tā ca jāyate jantoḥ

original: MSS_5482-2 vindhye vindhyasamānāḥ kariṇo bata darpaṇe laghavaḥ //
analyzed: vindhye vindhya samānāḥ kariṇaḥ bata darpaṇe laghavaḥ

original: MSS_5483-1 āśrayāśaḥ kṛṣṇavartmā dahanaścaiṣa durjanaḥ /
analyzed: āśraya āśaḥ kṛṣṇavartmā dahanaḥ ca eṣa durjanaḥ

original: MSS_5483-2 agnireva tathāpyasmin syād bhasmani hutaṃ hutam //
analyzed: agniḥ eva tathā api asmin syāt bhasmani hutam hutam

original: MSS_5484-1 āśrayitavyo narapatir arjayitavyāni bhūri vittāni /
analyzed: āśrayitavyaḥ narapatiḥ arjayitavyāni bhūri vittāni

original: MSS_5484-2 ārabdhavyaṃ vitaraṇam ānetavyaṃ yaśo'pi daśadigbhyaḥ //
analyzed: ārabdhavyam vitaraṇam ānetavyam yaśaḥ api daśa digbhyaḥ

original: MSS_5485-1 āśrayeṇaiva śobhante paṇḍitā vanitā latāḥ /
analyzed: āśrayeṇa eva śobhante paṇḍitāḥ vanitāḥ latāḥ

original: MSS_5485-2 bahumūlyaṃ hi māṇikyaṃ jaṭitaṃ hemni rājate //
analyzed: bahu mūlyam hi māṇikyam jaṭitam hemni rājate

original: MSS_5486-1 āśritasyāpradānena dattasya haraṇena ca /
analyzed: āśritasya apradānena dattasya haraṇena ca

original: MSS_5486-2 janmaprabhṛti yad dattaṃ sarvaṃ naśyati bhārata //
analyzed: janma prabhṛti yat dattam sarvam naśyati bhārata

original: MSS_5487-1 āśritānāṃ bhṛtau svāmisevāyāṃ dharmasevane /
analyzed: āśritānām bhṛtau svāmi sevāyām dharma sevane

original: MSS_5487-2 putrasyotpādane caiva na santi pratihastakāḥ //
analyzed: putrasya utpādane ca eva na santi pratihastakāḥ

original: MSS_5488-1 āśritāścaiva lokena samṛddhiṃ yānti vidviṣaḥ /
analyzed: āśritāḥ ca eva lokena samṛddhim yānti vidviṣaḥ

original: MSS_5488-2 samṛddhāśca vināśāya tasmān nodvejayet prajāḥ //
analyzed: samṛddhāḥ ca vināśāya tasmāt na udvejayet prajāḥ

original: MSS_5489-1 āśritya nūnamamṛtadyutayaḥ padaṃ te dehakṣayopanatadivyapadābhimukhyāḥ /
analyzed: āśritya nūnam amṛta dyutayaḥ padam te deha kṣaya upanata divya pada abhimukhyāḥ

original: MSS_5489-2 lāvaṇyapuṇyanicayaṃ suhṛdi tvadāsye vinyasya yānti mihiraṃ pratimāsabhinnāḥ //
analyzed: lāvaṇya puṇya nicayam suhṛdi tvad āsye vinyasya yānti mihiram prati māsa bhinnāḥ

original: MSS_5490-1 āśliṣṭabhūmiṃ rasitāramuccair loladbhujākārabṛhattaraṅgam /
analyzed: āśliṣṭa bhūmim rasitāram uccais lolat bhuja ākāra bṛhat taraṅgam

original: MSS_5490-2 phenāyamānaṃ patimāpagānām asāvapasmāriṇamāśaśaṅke //
analyzed: phenāyamānam patim āpagānām asau apasmāriṇam āśaśaṅke

original: MSS_5491-1 āśliṣṭāpi karoti sā mama tanuṃ kaṇṭhagrahotkaṇṭhitāṃ dṛṣṭāpi priyadarśanā niyamayatyakṣṇordidṛkṣāṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: āśliṣṭā api karoti sā mama tanum kaṇṭhagraha utkaṇṭhitām dṛṣṭā api priyadarśanā niyamayati akṣṇoḥ didṛkṣām punar

original: MSS_5491-2 antaścetasi saṃsthitāpi hṛdayaṃ bhūyo viśatyeva me rūḍhapremasamāgamāpi navatāṃ dhatte priyā pratyaham //
analyzed: antar cetasi saṃsthitā api hṛdayam bhūyas viśati eva me rūḍha prema samāgamā api nava tām dhatte priyā pratyaham

original: MSS_5492-1 āśliṣṭā rabhasād vilīyata ivākrāntāpyanaṅgena yā yasyāḥ kṛtrimacaṇḍavastukaraṇākūteṣu khinnaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: āśliṣṭā rabhasāt vilīyate iva ākrāntā api anaṅgena yā yasyāḥ kṛtrima caṇḍa vastu karaṇa ākūteṣu khinnam manaḥ

original: MSS_5492-2 ko'yaṃ kāhamiti pravṛttasuratā jānāti yā nāntaraṃ rantuḥ sā ramaṇī sa eva ramaṇaḥ śeṣau tu jāyāpatī //
analyzed: kā iyam kā aham iti pravṛtta suratā jānāti yā na antaram rantuḥ sā ramaṇī saḥ eva ramaṇaḥ śeṣau tu jāyā patī

original: MSS_5493-1 āśliṣya vā pādaratāṃ pinaṣṭu mām adarśanān marmahatāṃ karotu vā /
analyzed: āśliṣya vā pāda ratām pinaṣṭu mām adarśanāt marma hatām karotu vā

original: MSS_5493-2 yathā tathā vā vidadhātu nāgaro matprāṇanāthastu sa eva nāparaḥ //
analyzed: yathā tathā vā vidadhātu nāgaraḥ mad prāṇanāthaḥ tu saḥ eva nā aparaḥ

original: MSS_5494-1 āśleṣacumbanaratotsavakautukāni krīḍādurodarapaṇaḥ pratibhūranaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: āśleṣa cumbana rata utsava kautukāni krīḍā durodara paṇaḥ pratibhūḥ anaṅgaḥ

original: MSS_5494-2 bhogaḥ sa yadyapi jaye ca parājaye ca yūnormanastadapi vāñchati jetumeva //
analyzed: bhogaḥ sa yadi api jaye ca parājaye ca yūnoḥ manaḥ tat api vāñchati jetum eva

original: MSS_5495-1 āśleṣaśeṣā ratiraṅganānām āmodaśeṣā kucakuṅkumaśrīḥ /
analyzed: āśleṣa śeṣā ratiḥ aṅganānām āmoda śeṣā kuca kuṅkuma śrīḥ

original: MSS_5495-2 tūṇīraśeṣaḥ kusumāyudho'pi prabhātaśeṣā rajanī babhūva //
analyzed: tūṇīra śeṣaḥ kusumāyudhaḥ api prabhāta śeṣā rajanī babhūva

original: MSS_5496-1 āśleṣādanu cumbanādanu nakhollekhādanu svāntaja- prodbodhādanu saṃbhramādanu ratārambhādanu prītayoḥ /
analyzed: āśleṣāt anu cumbanāt anu nakha ullekhāt anu sva anta ja prodbodhāt anu saṃbhramāt anu rata ārambhāt anu prītayoḥ

original: MSS_5496-2 anyārthaṃ gatayorbhramān militayoḥ saṃbhāṣaṇairjānator dampatyoriha ko na ko na tamasi vrīḍāvimiśro rasaḥ //
analyzed: anya artham gatayoḥ bhramāt militayoḥ saṃbhāṣaṇaiḥ jānatoḥ dampatyoḥ iha kaḥ na kaḥ na tamasi vrīḍā vimiśraḥ rasaḥ

original: MSS_5497-1 āśleṣādharabimbacumbanasukhālāpasmitānyāsat āṃ dūre tāvadidaṃ mitho na sulabhaṃ jātaṃ mukhālokanam /
analyzed: āśleṣa adhara bimba cumbana sukha ālāpa smitāni āsat ām dūre tāvat idam mithas na sulabham jātam mukha ālokanam

original: MSS_5497-2 itthaṃ vyarthakṛtaikadehaghaṭanāvinyāsayorāvayoḥ keyaṃ prītividambanetyavatu vaḥ smero'rdhanārīśvaraḥ //
analyzed: ittham vyartha kṛta eka deha ghaṭanā vinyāsayoḥ āvayoḥ kā iyam prīti vidambanā iti avatu vaḥ smeroḥ dhanārīśvaraḥ

original: MSS_5498-1 āśleṣeṇa payodharapraṇayinīṃ pratyādiśantyā dṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā cādharabaddhatṛṣṇamadharaṃ nirbhartsayantyā mukham /
analyzed: āśleṣeṇa payodhara praṇayinīm pratyādiśantyā dṛśam dṛṣṭvā ca adhara baddha tṛṣṇam adharam nirbhartsayantyā mukham

original: MSS_5498-2 ūrvorgāḍhanipīḍanena jaghane pāṇiṃ ca ruddhvānayā patyuḥ prema na khaṇḍitaṃ nipuṇayā māno'pi naivojjhitaḥ //
analyzed: ūrvoḥ gāḍha nipīḍanena jaghane pāṇim ca ruddhvā anayā patyuḥ prema na khaṇḍitam nipuṇayā mānaḥ api nā eva ujjhitaḥ

original: MSS_5499-1 āśleṣe prathamaṃ kramādapahṛte hṛdye'dharasyārpaṇe kelidyūtavidhau paṇaṃ priyatame kāntāṃ punaḥ pṛcchati /
analyzed: āśleṣe prathamam kramāt apahṛte hṛdyedharasya arpaṇe keli dyūta vidhau paṇam priyatame kāntām punar pṛcchati

original: MSS_5499-2 antargūḍhavigāḍhasaṃbhramarasasphārībhavadgaṇḍayā tūṣṇīṃ śārivisāraṇāya nihitaḥ svedāmbugarbhaḥ karaḥ //
analyzed: antar gūḍha vigāḍha saṃbhrama rasa sphārībhavat gaṇḍayā tūṣṇīm śāri visāraṇāya nihitaḥ sveda ambu garbhaḥ karaḥ

original: MSS_5500-1 āśleṣe sarvadā patyuḥ satṛṣṇevāntarātmanā /
analyzed: āśleṣe sarvadā patyuḥ sa tṛṣṇā iva antarātmanā

original: MSS_5500-2 ardhanārīśvaratanau gaurīvṛttaṃ samīhate //
analyzed: ardhanārīśvara tanau gaurī vṛttam samīhate

original: MSS_5501-1 saṃbhogāyogyakāleṣu sārdhaṃ kāntena kāminī /
analyzed: saṃbhoga ayogya kāleṣu sārdham kāntena kāminī

original: MSS_5501-2 vāpīsaudhe gṛhodyāne yātrāsaṅgena tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: vāpī saudhe gṛha udyāne yātrā saṅgena tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_5502-1 anyacchāyāvaloke'pi parālāpe manāgapi /
analyzed: anya chāyā avaloke pi parālāpe manāk api

original: MSS_5502-2 patye kruddhyatyanarthādau svayaṃ cāpi nimajjati //
analyzed: patye kruddhi ati anartha ādau svayam ca api nimajjati

original: MSS_5503-1 aparopagamārambham unnāṭayati vallabham /
analyzed: apara upagama ārambham unnāṭayati vallabham

original: MSS_5503-2 daridrajaratīvārtā śiśire sāyamātapam //
analyzed: daridra jaratī vārtā śiśire sāyam ātapam

original: MSS_5504-1 patyuḥ śayyāparāvṛttiṃ viyogamiva manyate /
analyzed: patyuḥ śayyā parāvṛttim viyogam iva manyate

original: MSS_5504-2 devāgāraprayāṇaṃ ca pravāsamiva paśyati //
analyzed: devāgāra prayāṇam ca pravāsam iva paśyati

original: MSS_5505-1 atisnehasya nisyandād atipremṇaḥ pravṛttibhiḥ /
analyzed: ati snehasya nisyandāt ati premṇaḥ pravṛttibhiḥ

original: MSS_5505-2 chāyevānucaret kāntaṃ yāntaṃ tiṣṭhantamaṅganā //
analyzed: chāyā iva anucaret kāntam yāntam tiṣṭhantam aṅganā

original: MSS_5506-1 āśleṣe sundarīṇāṃ sthitavati sahasā sarvasaṃtṛptihetau vyarthaḥ pīyūṣamāptuṃ jalanidhimathane yatna ityākalayya /
analyzed: āśleṣe sundarīṇām sthitavati sahasā sarva saṃtṛpti hetau vyarthaḥ pīyūṣam āptum jalanidhi mathane yatnaḥ iti ākalayya

original: MSS_5506-2 tasmādete viraktā jagati sumanaso yat samastāstadaddhā svargasthānāmivaiṣāṃ na kathamitarathā lāghavaṃ syāt pratītam //
analyzed: tasmāt ete viraktāḥ jagati sumanasaḥ yat samastāḥ tat addhā svarga sthānām iva eṣām na katham itarathā lāghavam syāt pratītam

original: MSS_5507-1 āśvapehi mama sīdhubhājanād yāvadagradaśanairna dṛśyase /
analyzed: āśu apehi mama sīdhu bhājanāt yāvat agra daśanaiḥ na dṛśyase

original: MSS_5507-2 candra maddaśanamaṇḍalāṅkitaḥ khaṃ na yāsyasi hi rohiṇībhayāt //
analyzed: candra mad daśana maṇḍala aṅkitaḥ kham na yāsyasi hi rohiṇī bhayāt

original: MSS_5508-1 āśvasihi mahābāho prāṇināṃ sarvamāpadaḥ /
analyzed: āśvasihi mahā bāho prāṇinām sarvam āpadaḥ

original: MSS_5508-2 spṛśantyanilavalloke kṣaṇena pratiyānti ca //
analyzed: spṛśanti anila vat loke kṣaṇena pratiyānti ca

original: MSS_5509-1 āśvāsayati kāko'pi duḥkhitāṃ pathikāṅganām /
analyzed: āśvāsayati kākaḥ api duḥkhitām pathika aṅganām

original: MSS_5509-2 tvaṃ candrāmṛtajanmāpi dahasīti kimucyatām //
analyzed: tvam candra amṛta janmā api dahasi iti kim ucyatām

original: MSS_5510-1 āśvāsayeccāpi paraṃ sāntvadharmārthavṛttibhiḥ /
analyzed: āśvāsayet ca api param sāntva dharma artha vṛttibhiḥ

original: MSS_5510-2 athāsya praharet kāle yadā vicalite pathi //
analyzed: atha asya praharet kāle yadā vicalite pathi

original: MSS_5511-1 āśvāsasnehabhaktīnām ekamāyatanaṃ mahat /
analyzed: āśvāsa sneha bhaktīnām ekam āyatanam mahat

original: MSS_5511-2 prakṛṣṭasyeva dharmasya prasādo mūrtisundaraḥ //
analyzed: prakṛṣṭasya iva dharmasya prasādaḥ mūrti sundaraḥ

original: MSS_5512-1 āśvāsitasya mama nāma sutopalabdhyā sadyas tvayā saha kṛśodari viprayogaḥ /
analyzed: āśvāsitasya mama nāma suta upalabdhyā sadyas tvayā saha kṛśa udari viprayogaḥ

original: MSS_5512-2 vyāvartitātaparujaḥ prathamābhravṛṣṭyā vṛkṣasya vaidyuta ivāgnirupasthito'yam //
analyzed: vyāvartita ātapa rujaḥ prathama abhra vṛṣṭyā vṛkṣasya vaidyutaḥ iva agniḥ upasthitaḥ yam

original: MSS_5513-1 āśvāsya parvatakulaṃ tapanoṣṇataptam uddāmadāvavidhurāṇi ca kānanāni /
analyzed: āśvāsya parvata kulam tapana uṣṇa taptam uddāma dāva vidhurāṇi ca kānanāni

original: MSS_5513-2 nānānadīnadaśatāni ca pūrayitvā rikto'si yajjalada saiva tavottamaśrīḥ //
analyzed: nānā nadīnada śatāni ca pūrayitvā riktaḥ asi yat jalada sā eva tava uttama śrīḥ

original: MSS_5514-1 āśvine kṛṣṇapakṣe ca ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhaumo'tha rohiṇī /
analyzed: āśvine kṛṣṇa pakṣe ca ṣaṣṭhyām bhaumā utha rohiṇī

original: MSS_5514-2 vyatīpātas tadā ṣaṣṭhī kapilānantapuṇyadā //
analyzed: vyatīpātaḥ tadā ṣaṣṭhī kapilā ananta puṇya dā

original: MSS_5515-1 āṣāḍhaśuklapakṣe bhānordivase śirīṣavṛkṣasya /
analyzed: āṣāḍha śukla pakṣe bhānoḥ divase śirīṣa vṛkṣasya

original: MSS_5515-2 mūlaṃ jalena piṣṭvā piben na bhīstasya sarpotthā //
analyzed: mūlam jalena piṣṭvā pibet na bhīḥ tasya sarpa utthā

original: MSS_5516-1 āṣāḍhī kārttikī māghī vacā śuṇṭhī harītakī /
MSS_5516-2 gayāyāṃ piṇḍadānena puṇyā śleṣmaharānṛṇī //
analyzed: gayāyām piṇḍa dānena puṇyā śleṣma harā anṛṇī

original: MSS_5517-1 āṣāḍhe śaśakā dṛṣṭā sthānāsthane subhikṣadāḥ /
analyzed: āṣāḍhe śaśakāḥ dṛṣṭā sthāna āsthane subhikṣa dāḥ

original: MSS_5517-2 catuṣpadādināśāya tallabdhyai śaśadarśanam //
analyzed: catuṣpada ādi nāśāya tad labdhyai śaśa darśanam

original: MSS_5518-1 āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe māsi bījāvapanaropaṇe /
analyzed: āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe māsi bīja āvapana ropaṇe

original: MSS_5518-2 grīṣmādanyatra vallīnāṃ kecidicchanti ropaṇam //
analyzed: grīṣmāt anyatra vallīnām kecid icchanti ropaṇam

original: MSS_5519-1 ā saṃpravṛddherapi vṛddhikāmaḥ samena saṃdhānamihopagacchet /
analyzed: ā saṃpravṛddheḥ api vṛddhi kāmaḥ samena saṃdhānam iha upagacchet

original: MSS_5519-2 apakvayorvā ghaṭayoravaśyam anyo'nyabhedī samasaṃnipātaḥ //
analyzed: apakvayoḥ vā ghaṭayoḥ avaśyam anyonya bhedī sama saṃnipātaḥ

original: MSS_5520-1 āsaṃsāraṃ tribhuvanamidaṃ cinvatāṃ tāta tādṛṅ naivāsmākaṃ nayanapadavīṃ śrotravartmāgato vā /
analyzed: āsaṃsāram tribhuvanam idam cinvatām tāta tādṛś na eva asmākam nayana padavīm śrotra vartma āgataḥ vā

original: MSS_5520-2 yo'yaṃ dhatte viṣayakariṇīgāḍharūḍhābhibhāna- kṣībasyāntaḥkaraṇakariṇaḥ saṃyamālānalīlām //
analyzed: yaḥ u yam dhatte viṣaya kariṇī gāḍha rūḍha abhibhāna kṣībasya antaḥkaraṇa kariṇaḥ saṃyama ālāna līlām

original: MSS_5521-1 āsaktāḥ pratikoṭaraṃ viṣadharā bhānoḥ karā mūrdhani jvālājālakarāladāvadahanaḥ pratyaṅgamāliṅgati /
analyzed: āsaktāḥ prati koṭaram viṣadharāḥ bhānoḥ karāḥ mūrdhani jvālā jāla karāla dāva dahanaḥ pratyaṅgam āliṅgati

original: MSS_5521-2 sarvānandanacārucandanataroretasya jīvātave re jīmūta vimuñca vāri bahuśo yuṣmadyaśo jṛmbhatām //
analyzed: sarva ānandana cāru candana taroḥ etasya jīvātave re jīmūta vimuñca vāri bahuśas yuṣmad yaśaḥ jṛmbhatām

original: MSS_5522-1 āsajya svayameva cumbanavidhiṃ yācñā vināliṅganaṃ talpānte jaghanena vepathumatā paryarpitaṃ jānunoḥ /
analyzed: āsajya svayam eva cumbana vidhim yācñā vinā āliṅganam talpa ante jaghanena vepathumatā paryarpitam jānunoḥ

original: MSS_5522-2 krodhotkampamamarṣayatyanunayatyasyāḥ smarakrīḍayā prauḍhaikābhiratiḥ priyasya hṛdayaṃ helābalāt karṣati //
analyzed: krodha utkampam amarṣayati anunayati asyāḥ smara krīḍayā prauḍhā eka abhiratiḥ priyasya hṛdayam helā balāt karṣati

original: MSS_5523-1 āsate śatamadhikṣiti bhūpās toyarāśirasi te khalu kūpāḥ /
analyzed: āsate śatam adhi kṣiti bhūpāḥ toya rāśiḥ asi te khalu kūpāḥ

original: MSS_5523-2 kiṃ grahā divi na jāgrati te te bhāskarasya katamas tulayāste //
analyzed: kim grahāḥ divi na jāgrati te te bhāskarasya katamaḥ

original: MSS_5524-1 āsatyalokamakhilaṃ bhuvanaṃ jaleṣu nirmajjayet prakupito jaladhirjavena /
analyzed: āsatya lokam akhilam bhuvanam jaleṣu nirmajjayet prakupitaḥ jaladhiḥ javena

original: MSS_5524-2 kiṃtu svamantayitumudyatamaurvamagnim antarvasantamapi hantumasau na śaktaḥ //
analyzed: kiṃtu sva mantayitum udyata maurvam agnim antar vasantam api hantum asau na śaktaḥ

original: MSS_5525-1 ā satyalokādā bhūmeḥ svairacārakṛtaśramāḥ /
analyzed: ā bhūmeḥ svaira cāra kṛta śramāḥ

original: MSS_5525-2 tenurindukarāḥ svedaṃ drutanīhārabhūmikam //
analyzed: tenuḥ indu karāḥ svedam druta nīhāra bhūmikam

original: MSS_5526-1 āsanaṃ caiva yānaṃ ca saṃdhāya ca vigṛhya ca /
analyzed: āsanam ca eva yānam ca saṃdhāya ca vigṛhya ca

original: MSS_5526-2 kāryaṃ vīkṣya prayuñjīta dvaidhaṃ saṃśrayameva ca //
analyzed: kāryam vīkṣya prayuñjīta dvaidham saṃśrayam eva ca

original: MSS_5527-1 āsanaṃ prāṇasaṃrodhaḥ pratyāhāraśca dhāraṇā /
analyzed: āsanam prāṇa saṃrodhaḥ pratyāhāraḥ ca dhāraṇā

original: MSS_5527-2 dhyānaṃ samādhiretāni yogāṅgāni smṛtāni ṣaṭ //
analyzed: dhyānam samādhiḥ etāni yoga aṅgāni smṛtāni ṣaḍ

original: MSS_5528-1 āsanaṃ prāṇasaṃrodho dhyānaṃ caiva samādhikaḥ /
analyzed: āsanam prāṇa saṃrodhaḥ dhyānam ca eva samādhikaḥ

original: MSS_5528-2 etac caṭuṣṭayaṃ viddhi sarvayogeṣu saṃmatam //
analyzed: etat caṭuṣṭayam viddhi sarva yogeṣu saṃmatam

original: MSS_5529-1 āsanāc śayanād yānāt saṃgateś cāpi bhojanāt /
analyzed: āsanāt śayanāt yānāt saṃgateḥ ca api bhojanāt

original: MSS_5529-2 kṛte saṃcarate pāpaṃ tailabindurivāmbhasi //
analyzed: kṛte saṃcarate pāpam taila binduḥ iva ambhasi

original: MSS_5530-1 āsanādekaśayyāyāṃ saṃbhāṣāt sahabhojanāt /
analyzed: āsanāt ekaśayyāyām saṃbhāṣāt sahabhojanāt

original: MSS_5530-2 puṃsāṃ saṃkramate pāpaṃ ghaṭād ghaṭamivodakam //
analyzed: puṃsām saṃkramate pāpam ghaṭāt ghaṭam iva udakam

original: MSS_5531-1 āsanāvasathau śayyām anuvrajyāmupāsanam /
analyzed: āsana āvasathau śayyām anuvrajyām upāsanam

original: MSS_5531-2 uttameṣūttamaṃ kuryād hīne hīnaṃ same samam //
analyzed: uttameṣu uttamam kuryāt hīne hīnam same samam

original: MSS_5532-1 āsanāśanaśayyābhir adbhirmūlaphalena vā /
analyzed: āsana aśana śayyābhiḥ adbhiḥ mūla phalena vā

original: MSS_5532-2 nāsya kaścid vased gehe śaktito'narcito'tithiḥ //
analyzed: na asya kaścid vaset gehe

original: MSS_5533-1 āsane pādamāropya yo bhuṅkte sa dvijādhamaḥ /
analyzed: āsane pādam āropya yaḥ bhuṅkte sa dvija adhamaḥ

original: MSS_5533-2 mukhena dhamate cānnaṃ tulyaṃ gomāṃsabhakṣaṇam //
analyzed: mukhena dhamate ca annam tulyam go māṃsa bhakṣaṇam

original: MSS_5534-1 āsane lālayed bālāṃ taruṇīṃ śayane tathā /
analyzed: āsane lālayet bālām taruṇīm śayane tathā

original: MSS_5534-2 utsaṅge patirūḍhāṃ ca lālanaṃ trividhaṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: utsaṅge pati rūḍhām ca lālanam trividham viduḥ

original: MSS_5535-1 āsane śayane yāne pānabhojanavastuṣu /
analyzed: āsane śayane yāne pāna bhojana vastuṣu

original: MSS_5535-2 dṛṣṭvāntaraṃ pramatteṣu praharantyarayo'riṣu //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā antaram pramatteṣu praharanti arayā ūriṣu

original: MSS_5536-1 āsane śayane yāne bhāvā lakṣyā viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: āsane śayane yāne bhāvāḥ lakṣyāḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: MSS_5536-2 puruṣāṇāṃ praduṣṭānāṃ svabhāvo valavattaraḥ //
analyzed: puruṣāṇām praduṣṭānām svabhāvaḥ valavattaraḥ

original: MSS_5537-1 āsan kṣīṇāni yāvanti cātakāśrūṇi te'mbuda /
analyzed: āsan kṣīṇāni yāvanti cātaka aśrūṇi tembuda

original: MSS_5537-2 tāvanto'pi tvayodāra na muktā jalabindavaḥ //
analyzed: tāvantaḥ api tvayā udāra na muktāḥ jala bindavaḥ

original: MSS_5538-1 āsannataratāmeti mṛtyurjantordine dine /
analyzed: āsannatara tām eti mṛtyuḥ jantoḥ dine dine

original: MSS_5538-2 āghātaṃ nīyamānasya vadhyasyeva pade pade //
analyzed: āghātam nīyamānasya vadhyasya iva pade pade

original: MSS_5539-1 āsannanāśaṃ salilaṃ taṭāke kūpādikānāmatiyatnalabhyam /
analyzed: āsanna nāśam salilam taṭāke kūpa ādikānām ati yatna labhyam

original: MSS_5539-2 nadi tvamagryāsi jalāśrayāṇāṃ yasyāṃ yugasthāyi sulambhamambhaḥ //
analyzed: nadi tvam agryā asi jalāśrayāṇām yasyām yuga sthāyi su lambham ambhaḥ

original: MSS_5540-1 āsannamārgamatilaṅghya natena mūrdhnā paścāt prasaṅgavalitena mukhena yāntyā /
analyzed: āsanna mārgam atilaṅghya natena mūrdhnā paścāt prasaṅga valitena mukhena yāntyā

original: MSS_5540-2 āropitāḥ katipaye mayi paṅkajākṣyā sākūtahāsamanatiprakaṭāḥ kaṭākṣāḥ //
analyzed: āropitāḥ katipaye mayi paṅkaja akṣyā sa ākūta hāsam an ati prakaṭāḥ kaṭākṣāḥ

original: MSS_5541-1 āsannamitrāgamasūcyamāna- samāgame vāsaravallabhasya /
analyzed: āsanna mitra āgama sūcyamāna samāgame vāsaravallabhasya

original: MSS_5541-2 niryānti dīpā iva rātribhogyāḥ paśya prabhāte gaṇikāgṛhebhyaḥ //
analyzed: niryānti dīpāḥ iva rātri bhogyāḥ paśya prabhāte gaṇikā gṛhebhyaḥ

original: MSS_5542-1 āsannameva nṛpatir bhajate manuṣyaṃ vidyāvihīnamakulīnamasaṃstutaṃ vā /
analyzed: āsannam eva nṛpatiḥ bhajate manuṣyam vidyā vihīnam akulīnam asaṃstutam vā

original: MSS_5542-2 prāyeṇa bhūmipatayaḥ pramadā latāśca yaḥ pārśvato vasati taṃ pariveṣṭayanti //
analyzed: prāyeṇa bhūmipatayaḥ pramadāḥ latāḥ ca yaḥ pārśvatas vasati tam pariveṣṭayanti

original: MSS_5543-1 āsannayauvanas tvaṃ duhiturme yauvanaṃ tvayā prāyaḥ /
analyzed: āsanna yauvanaḥ tvam duhituḥ me yauvanam tvayā prāyas

original: MSS_5543-2 kṣapitamalakṣyaṃ strīṇāṃ galati hi sahasaiva tāruṇyam //
analyzed: kṣapitam alakṣyam strīṇām galati hi sahasā eva tāruṇyam

original: MSS_5544-1 āsannasevāṃ nṛpateḥ krīḍāśastrāhipāvakaiḥ /
analyzed: āsanna sevām nṛpateḥ krīḍā śastra ahi pāvakaiḥ

original: MSS_5544-2 kauśalenātimahatā vinītaḥ sānurudhyate (?) //
analyzed: kauśalena ati mahatā vinītaḥ sā anurudhyate

original: MSS_5545-1 āsannāḥ kaṇṭakino ripubhayadāḥ kṣīriṇo'rthanāśāya /
analyzed: āsannāḥ kaṇṭakinaḥ ripu bhaya dāḥ kṣīriṇaḥ artha nāśāya

original: MSS_5545-2 phalinaḥ prajākṣayakarā dārūṇyapi varjayet teṣām //
analyzed: phalinaḥ prajā kṣaya karāḥ dārūṇi api varjayet teṣām

original: MSS_5546-1 āsannān purato bhogān darśayitvā punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: āsannān puratas bhogān darśayitvā punar punar

original: MSS_5546-2 chāgo haritamuṣṭyeva dūraṃ nīto'smi tṛṣṇayā //
analyzed: chāgaḥ harita muṣṭyā iva dūram nītaḥ asmi tṛṣṇayā

original: MSS_5547-1 āsannābhrajalasya dāvavigame vidyudbhayaṃ śākhino nakrāsyād galataśca majjanamayī śaṅkā bhaved vāridhau /
analyzed: āsanna abhra jalasya dāva vigame vidyut bhayam śākhinaḥ nakra āsyāt galataḥ ca majjana mayī śaṅkā bhavet vāridhau

original: MSS_5547-2 bhoktavyasya vidhiḥ śubhasya rabhasāt svādutvaniṣpattaye jantoḥ saṃtanute nirākṛtabhiyo bhītyantarotpādanam //
analyzed: bhoktavyasya vidhiḥ śubhasya rabhasāt svādu tva niṣpattaye jantoḥ saṃtanute nirākṛta bhiyaḥ bhīti antara utpādanam

original: MSS_5548-1 āsannāmavalambya kesaralatāmekena puṣpojjvalāṃ savyaṃ niḥsahayā nitambaphalake kṛtvā karāmbhoruham /
analyzed: āsannām avalambya kesara latām ekena puṣpa ujjvalām savyam niḥsahayā nitamba phalake kṛtvā kara ambhoruham

original: MSS_5548-2 āmīlan nayanāntavāntasalilaṃ ślāghyasya nindyasya vā kasyedaṃ dṛḍhasauhṛdaṃ pratidinaṃ dīnaṃ tvayā smaryate //
analyzed: āmīlan nayana anta vānta salilam ślāghyasya nindyasya vā kasya idam dṛḍha sauhṛdam pratidinam dīnam tvayā smaryate

original: MSS_5549-1 āsannāmavalambya kesaralatāmekena puṣpojjvalāṃ savyaṃ niḥsahayā nitambaphalake kṛtvā karāmbhoruham /
analyzed: āsannām avalambya kesara latām ekena puṣpa ujjvalām savyam niḥsahayā nitamba phalake kṛtvā kara ambhoruham

original: MSS_5549-2 udgrīvaṃ vada durdine'dya caraṇāvunnamya mārgas tvayā bālodbhrāntamṛgekṣaṇe sukṛtinaḥ kasyāyamālokyate //
analyzed: udgrīvam vada durdina idya caraṇau unnamya mārgaḥ tvayā bāla udbhrānta mṛga īkṣaṇe su kṛtinaḥ kasya ayam ālokyate

original: MSS_5550-1 āsannāya sudūrāya suptāya prakaṭātmane /
analyzed: āsannāya su dūrāya suptāya prakaṭa ātmane

original: MSS_5550-2 sulabhāyātidurgāya namaścitrāya śaṃbhave //
analyzed: sulabhāya ati durgāya namaḥ citrāya śaṃbhave

original: MSS_5551-1 āsanne phalamāsannaṃ dūrage dūragaṃ phalam /
analyzed: āsanne phalam āsannam dūra ge dūra gam phalam

original: MSS_5551-2 miśraṃ tu miśre śakune phalamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: miśram tu miśre śakune phalam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_5552-1 āsanno madhurāgataṃ vanabhuvaḥ sāmrājyamityadbhutāḥ śrūyante gira eṣa tattvamiha na jñātuṃ vidhātuḥ kṣamaḥ /
analyzed: āsannaḥ madhura āgatam vana bhuvaḥ sāmrājyam iti adbhutāḥ śrūyante giraḥ eṣa tattvam iha na jñātum vidhātuḥ kṣamaḥ

original: MSS_5552-2 yat parṇais truṭitaṃ tadapyuparataṃ puṣpodgamaiḥ śākhināṃ yad glānaṃ viṭapairidaṃ punariha pratyakṣamālakṣyate //
analyzed: yat parṇaiḥ truṭitam tat api uparatam puṣpa udgamaiḥ śākhinām yat glānam viṭapaiḥ idam punar iha pratyakṣam ālakṣyate

original: MSS_5553-1 āsanno valmīko dakṣiṇapārśve vibhītasya /
analyzed: āsannaḥ valmīkaḥ dakṣiṇa pārśve vibhītasya

original: MSS_5553-2 adhyardhe bhavati śirā puruṣe jñeyā diśi prācyām //
analyzed: adhyardhe bhavati śirā puruṣe jñeyā diśi prācyām

original: MSS_5554-1 āsan yāvanti yācñāsu cātakāśrūṇi cāmbuda /
analyzed: āsan yāvanti yācñāsu cātaka aśrūṇi ca ambuda

original: MSS_5554-2 tāvanto'pi tvayā megha na muktā vāribindavaḥ //
analyzed: tāvantaḥ api tvayā megha na muktāḥ vāri bindavaḥ

original: MSS_5555-1 ā saptateryasya vivāhapaṅktir vicchidyate nūnamapaṇḍito'sau /
analyzed: ā saptateḥ yasya vivāha paṅktiḥ vicchidyate nūnam apaṇḍitā asau

original: MSS_5555-2 jīvanti tāḥ kartanakuṭṭanābhyāṃ gobhyaḥ kimukṣā yavasaṃ dadāti //
analyzed: jīvanti tāḥ kartana kuṭṭanābhyām gobhyaḥ kim ukṣā yavasam dadāti

original: MSS_5556-1 āsaptamaṃ kulaṃ hanti śiro'bhyaṅge caturdaśī /
analyzed: āsaptamam kulam hanti śiraḥ abhyaṅge caturdaśī

original: MSS_5556-2 māṃsāśane pañcadaśī kāmadharme tathāṣṭamī //
analyzed: māṃsa aśane pañcadaśī kāmadharme tathā aṣṭamī

original: MSS_5557-1 ā samantāc caturdikṣu sannikṛṣṭāśca ye nṛpāḥ /
analyzed: ā samantāt catur dikṣu sannikṛṣṭāḥ ca ye nṛpāḥ

original: MSS_5557-2 tatparās tatparā ye'nye kramād hīnabalārayaḥ //
analyzed: tatparāḥ tatparāḥ ye nye kramāt hīna bala arayaḥ

original: MSS_5558-1 āsamastākṣivikṣepasamarpitamanobhuvām /
analyzed: āsamasta akṣi vikṣepa samarpita manobhuvām

original: MSS_5558-2 manmathoddīpanaṃ tāsāṃ viṭavṛttaṃ vidhāsyate //
analyzed: manmatha uddīpanam tāsām viṭa vṛttam vidhāsyate

original: MSS_5559-1 ā sargāt prativāsaraṃ rasaśatairyā bodhitā poṣitā kalpāntāvasare'tha saiva pṛthivī svaireva dagdhā karaiḥ /
analyzed: ā sargāt prativāsaram rasa śataiḥ yā bodhitā poṣitā sā eva pṛthivī svaiḥ eva dagdhā karaiḥ

original: MSS_5559-2 kṛtvetthaṃ kimapi svakarma niyateḥ pūrvāparopaplutaṃ kaṣṭaṃ so'pi dināntavītakiraṇas tigmāṃśurastaṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: kṛtvā ittham kim api sva karma niyateḥ pūrva apara upaplutam kaṣṭam saḥ api dina anta vīta kiraṇaḥ tigmāṃśuḥ astam gataḥ

original: MSS_5560-1 āsavaratiratibahubhuk kaṭvamlāśī ca karmaṭhaḥ piśunaḥ /
analyzed: āsava rati rati bahu bhuj kaṭu amla āśī ca karmaṭhaḥ piśunaḥ

original: MSS_5560-2 sthūlaḥ kṛśo'tidīrghaḥ kharvo vā kṛṣṇapīto vā //
analyzed: sthūlaḥ kṛśa uti dīrghaḥ kharvaḥ vā kṛṣṇa pītaḥ vā

original: MSS_5561-1 āsasāda munirātmanas tataḥ śiṣyavargaparikalpitārhaṇam /
analyzed: āsasāda muniḥ ātmanaḥ tatas śiṣya varga parikalpita arhaṇam

original: MSS_5561-2 baddhapallavapuṭāñjalidrumaṃ darśanonmukhamṛgaṃ tapovanam //
analyzed: baddha pallava puṭa añjali drumam darśana unmukha mṛgam tapaḥ vanam

original: MSS_5562-1 āsāṃ jalāsphālanatatparāṇāṃ muktāphalaspardhiṣu śīkareṣu /
analyzed: āsām jala āsphālana tatparāṇām muktāphala spardhiṣu śīkareṣu

original: MSS_5562-2 payodharotsarpiṣu śīryamāṇaḥ saṃlakṣyate na cchiduro'pi hāraḥ //
analyzed: payodhara utsarpiṣu śīryamāṇaḥ saṃlakṣyate na chiduḥ api hāraḥ

original: MSS_5563-1 āsāṃ vratamatīvākṣṇor yat puraḥ parisarpaṇam /
analyzed: āsām vratam atīva akṣṇoḥ yat puras parisarpaṇam

original: MSS_5563-2 saha yātaṃ manas tatra tyaktvā bhūyo nivartanam //
analyzed: saha yātam manaḥ tatra tyaktvā bhūyas nivartanam

original: MSS_5564-1 āsāditaprakaṭanirmalacandrahāsaḥ prāptaḥ śaratsamaya eṣa viśuddhakāntaḥ /
analyzed: āsādita prakaṭa nirmala candra hāsaḥ prāptaḥ śarad samayaḥ eṣa viśuddha kāntaḥ

original: MSS_5564-2 utkhāya gāḍhatamasaṃ ghanakālamugraṃ rāmo daśāsyamiva saṃbhṛtabandhujīvaḥ //
analyzed: utkhāya gāḍha tamasam ghana kālam ugram rāmaḥ daśa āsyam iva saṃbhṛta bandhujīvaḥ

original: MSS_5565-1 āsāditavyo'sti karālakeśaḥ sakhedayārhaḥ samayo'pakārī /
analyzed: āsāditavya usti karāla keśaḥ sa khedayā arhaḥ samaya upakārī

original: MSS_5565-2 taduttamaślokakathānubandhas tāvad yathā syāt prayate tathāham //
analyzed: tad uttamaśloka kathā anubandhaḥ tāvat yathā syāt prayate tathā aham

original: MSS_5566-1 āsāditasya tamasā niyaterniyogād ākāṅkṣataḥ punarapakramaṇena kālam /
analyzed: āsāditasya tamasā niyateḥ niyogāt ākāṅkṣataḥ punar apakramaṇena kālam

original: MSS_5566-2 patyus tviṣāmiha mahauṣadhayaḥ kalatra- sthānaṃ parairanabhibhūtamamūrvahanti //
analyzed: patyuḥ tviṣām iha mahā oṣadhayaḥ kalatra sthānam paraiḥ anabhibhūtam amūḥ vahanti

original: MSS_5567-1 āsādya kṛṣṇapakṣān atrasataḥ sarvadā'bhīkān /
analyzed: āsādya kṛṣṇa pakṣān atrasataḥ sarvadā abhīkān

original: MSS_5567-2 parayātmani ratacittān vibhāvya tatkarma kurvataḥ kva bhayam //
analyzed: parayā ātmani rata cittān vibhāvya tad karma kurvataḥ kva bhayam

original: MSS_5568-1 āsādyate kathaṃ vā śauryāśrayaṇena gauravadhvaṃsaḥ /
analyzed: āsādyate katham vā śaurya āśrayaṇena gaurava dhvaṃsaḥ

original: MSS_5568-2 tat tatra dattacittaś cittajasaṃtāpabhājanaṃ na janaḥ //
analyzed: tat tatra datta cittaḥ citta ja saṃtāpa bhājanam na janaḥ

original: MSS_5569-1 āsādya dakṣiṇāṃ diśam avilambaṃ tyajati cottarāṃ taraṇiḥ /
analyzed: āsādya dakṣiṇām diśam avilambam tyajati ca uttarām taraṇiḥ

original: MSS_5569-2 puruṣaṃ haranti kāntāḥ prāyeṇa hi dakṣiṇā eva //
analyzed: puruṣam haranti kāntāḥ prāyeṇa hi dakṣiṇāḥ eva

original: MSS_5570-1 āsādya bhaṅgamanayā dyūte vihitābhirucitakelipaṇe /
analyzed: āsādya bhaṅgam anayā dyūte vihita abhirucita keli paṇe

original: MSS_5570-2 niḥsārayatākṣāniti kapaṭaruṣotsāritāḥ sakhyaḥ //
analyzed: niḥsārayatā akṣān iti kapaṭa ruṣā utsāritāḥ sakhyaḥ

original: MSS_5571-1 āsādya mandarāgo'pi bhujaṅgenātisaṃgatim /
analyzed: āsādya mandarā gopī bhujaṅgena ati saṃgatim

original: MSS_5571-2 tadbhogāttu bhraman kaṣṭaṃ prāpnoti viṣamantataḥ //
analyzed: tad bhogāt tu bhraman kaṣṭam prāpnoti viṣam antatas

original: MSS_5572-1 āsādya somabhuvamāsvahi yatra nityaṃ maṅktuṃ pralobhayati saikatamaṃśukābham /
analyzed: āsādya soma bhuvam āsvahi yatra nityam maṅktum pralobhayati saikatam aṃśuka ābham

original: MSS_5572-2 tat tatra nirvahati saṃprati nityakṛtyam etasya vismṛtagṛhasya parānubhūtyā //
analyzed: tat tatra nirvahati saṃprati nitya kṛtyam etasya vismṛta gṛhasya para anubhūtyā

original: MSS_5573-1 āsādyāpi mahodadhiṃ na vitṛṣo jāto jalairvāḍavo meghaṃ prāpya na cātako'pi caraṇau bhānuṃ na lebhe'ruṇaḥ /
analyzed: āsādya api mahā udadhim na vitṛṣaḥ jātaḥ jalaiḥ vāḍavaḥ megham prāpya na cātakaḥ upi caraṇau bhānum na

original: MSS_5573-2 candraḥ śaṃkaraśekhare'pi nivasan pakṣakṣaye kṣīyate prāyaḥ sajjanasaṃgato'pi labhate daivānurūpaṃ phalam //
analyzed: candraḥ śaṃkara śekhare api nivasan pakṣa kṣaye kṣīyate prāyas sat jana saṃgataḥ api labhate daiva anurūpam phalam

original: MSS_5574-1 āsādyāmravanīmimāṃ prati navāmāsvādya tanmañjarīṃ maivaṃ pañcamamañca nandanavanabhrāntyā tayā kokila /
analyzed: āsādya āmra vanīm imām prati navām āsvādya tad mañjarīm mā evam nandana vana bhrāntyā tayā kokila

original: MSS_5574-2 eṣā vāyasamaṇḍalī ghanaśiraḥśūlāhativyākulā kudhvānairbadhirīkariṣyati vṛthā śrotrāṇi satpatriṇām //
analyzed: eṣā vāyasa maṇḍalī ghana śiraḥ śūla āhati vyākulā kudhvānaiḥ badhirīkariṣyati vṛthā śrotrāṇi sat patriṇām

original: MSS_5575-1 āsāmupari dadyāc ca pānīyasya vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: āsām upari dadyāt ca pānīyasya vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_5575-2 evaṃ yāmadvayaṃ kuryāt tatas tvāsāṃ na dāpayet //
analyzed: evam yāma dvayam kuryāt tatas tu āsām na dāpayet

original: MSS_5576-1 āsāyaṃ salilabhare savitāramupāsya sādaraṃ tapasā /
analyzed: āsāyam salilabhare savitāram upāsya sa ādaram tapasā

original: MSS_5576-2 adhunābjena manāk tava mānini tulanā mukhasyāptā //
analyzed: adhunā abjena manāk tava mānini tulanā mukhasya āptā

original: MSS_5577-1 āsārāntamṛdupravṛttamaruto meghopaliptāmbarā vidyutpātamuhūrtadṛṣṭakakubhaḥ suptendutārāgrahāḥ /
analyzed: āsāra anta mṛdu pravṛtta marutaḥ megha upalipta ambarāḥ vidyut pāta muhūrta dṛṣṭa kakubhaḥ supta indu tārā grahāḥ

original: MSS_5577-2 dhārāklinnakadambasaṃbhṛtasurāmododvahāḥ proṣitair niḥsaṃpātavisāridarduraravā nītāḥ kathaṃ rātrayaḥ //
analyzed: dhārā klinna kadamba saṃbhṛta sura āmoda udvahāḥ proṣitaiḥ niḥsaṃpāta visāri dardura ravāḥ nītāḥ katham rātrayaḥ

original: MSS_5578-1 āsāreṇa na harmyataḥ priyatamairyātuṃ bahiḥ śakyate śītotkampanimittamāyatadṛśā gāḍhaṃ samāliṅgyate /
analyzed: āsāreṇa na harmyataḥ priyatamaiḥ yātum bahis śakyate śīta utkampa nimittam āyata dṛśā gāḍham samāliṅgyate

original: MSS_5578-2 jālaiḥ śīkaraśītalāśca maruto ratyantakhedacchido dhanyānāṃ bata durdinaṃ sudinatāṃ yāti priyāsaṃgame //
analyzed: jālaiḥ śīkara śītalāḥ ca marutaḥ rati anta kheda chidaḥ dhanyānām bata durdinam su dina tām yāti priyā saṃgame

original: MSS_5579-1 āsāroparame pragāḍhatimirāḥ kirmīrayantyo niśāḥ pānthastrīmanasāṃ smarānalakaṇāsantānaśaṅkāspṛśaḥ /
analyzed: āsāra uparame pragāḍha timirāḥ kirmīrayantyaḥ niśāḥ pāntha strī manasām smara anala kaṇā santāna śaṅkā spṛśaḥ

original: MSS_5579-2 piṣṭānāṃ prasabhaṃ ghanāghanaghaṭāsaṃghaṭṭato vidyutāṃ cūrṇābhāḥ paritaḥ patanti taralāḥ khadyotakaśreṇayaḥ //
analyzed: piṣṭānām prasabham ghanāghana ghaṭa āsaṃghaṭṭataḥ vidyutām cūrṇa ābhāḥ paritas patanti taralāḥ khadyotaka śreṇayaḥ

original: MSS_5580-1 āsitāni hasitāni kṛtāni prekṣitāni gaditāni gatāni /
analyzed: āsitāni hasitāni kṛtāni prekṣitāni gaditāni gatāni

original: MSS_5580-2 prāyaśo'nukurute lalitāṅgī nartakīva caturaṃ dayitasya //
analyzed: prāyaśas unukurute lalitā aṅgī nartakī iva caturam dayitasya

original: MSS_5581-1 āsitvā vijane vimuktaviṣayāsaṅgaṃ mano niścalaṃ kṛtvā hṛjjalajāntare priyatamārūpaṃ paraṃ daivatam /
analyzed: āsitvā vijane vimukta viṣaya āsaṅgam manaḥ niścalam kṛtvā hṛd jalaja antare priyatamā rūpam param daivatam

original: MSS_5581-2 dhyātvā hāralatāmayākṣavalayaṃ hastena dhṛtvā mayā tatsāyujyaphalāptaye pratidinaṃ tannāma saṃjapyate //
analyzed: dhyātvā hāra latā maya akṣa valayam hastena dhṛtvā mayā tad sāyujya phala āptaye pratidinam tat nāma saṃjapyate

original: MSS_5582-1 āsiṣye sukhito gṛhīti vihito mohena dāragrahas tatsaṅgāt sutadāsabāndhavasuhṛtsaṃbandhināmudbhavaḥ /
analyzed: āsiṣye sukhitaḥ vihitaḥ mohena dāra grahaḥ tad saṅgāt suta dāsa bāndhava suhṛd saṃbandhinām udbhavaḥ

original: MSS_5582-2 tannirvāhakadarthanāparibhavānaucityacintājuṣaḥ kiṃ saukhyaṃ katamā gṛhasthitirato'nartho mayā svīkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tad nirvāha kadarthanā paribhava anaucitya cintā juṣaḥ kim saukhyam katamā gṛha sthitiḥ atas anarthaḥ mayā svīkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_5583-1 āsīj janaḥ kṛtaghnaḥ kriyamāṇaghnaśca sāṃprataṃ jātaḥ /
analyzed: āsīt janaḥ kṛtaghnaḥ kriyamāṇa ghnaḥ ca sāṃpratam jātaḥ

original: MSS_5583-2 iti me manasi vitarko bhavitā lokaḥ kathaṃ bhavitā //
analyzed: iti me manasi vitarkaḥ bhavitā lokaḥ katham bhavitā

original: MSS_5584-1 āsītā maraṇāt kṣāntā niyatā brahmacāriṇī /
analyzed: āsīta ā maraṇāt kṣāntā niyatā brahmacāriṇī

original: MSS_5584-2 yo dharma ekapatnīnāṃ kāṅkṣantī tamanuttamam //
analyzed: yaḥ dharmaḥ ekapatnīnām kāṅkṣantī tam anuttamam

original: MSS_5585-1 āsīt kalpamudanvadambuni ciraṃ bheje ca bhālānalaṃ bhargasya pratimāsakarmahutabhukkuṇḍe'pyahauṣīd vapuḥ /
analyzed: āsīt kalpam udanvat ambuni ciram bheje ca bhāla analam bhargasya prati māsa karma hutabhuj kuṇḍe api ahauṣīt vapuḥ

original: MSS_5585-2 tīvraireva tapobhirindurakaroditthaṃ januryāpanaṃ kiṃ kuryād vidhuro na vāñchati vidhis tallāñchanaproñchanam //
analyzed: tīvraiḥ eva tapobhiḥ induḥ akarot ittham januḥ yāpanam kim kuryāt vidhuraḥ na vāñchati vidhiḥ tat lāñchana proñchanam

original: MSS_5586-1 āsīt tāmramayaṃ śarīramadhunā sauvarṇavarṇaṃ gataṃ muktāhāralatāśrubindunivahairniḥsvasya me kalpitā /
analyzed: āsīt tāmra mayam śarīram adhunā sauvarṇa varṇam gatam muktā hāra latā aśru bindu nivahaiḥ niḥsvasya me kalpitā

original: MSS_5586-2 svalpaṃ svalpamanalpakalpamadhunā dīrghaṃ vayaḥ kalpitaṃ svāmin duḥkha bhavatprasādavaśataḥ kiṃ kiṃ na labdhaṃ mayā //
analyzed: su alpam su alpam analpa kalpam adhunā dīrgham vayaḥ kalpitam svāmin duḥkha bhavat prasāda vaśataḥ kim kim na labdham mayā

original: MSS_5587-1 āsīt pūrvaṃ vimalajaladhau maṇḍanaṃ bhūpatīnāṃ nārīṇāṃ ca prabalamukuṭe kāñcanena prasaṅgāt /
