analyzed: āsīt pūrvam vimala jaladhau maṇḍanam bhūpatīnām nārīṇām ca prabala mukuṭe kāñcanena prasaṅgāt

original: MSS_5587-2 tantrībaddhaḥ kathamidamaho kācakhaṇḍena sārdhaṃ bhillīkaṇṭhe marakatamaṇe kāmavasthāṃ gato'si //
analyzed: tantrī baddhaḥ katham idam aho kāca khaṇḍena sārdham bhillī kaṇṭhe marakata maṇe kām avasthām gataḥ asi

original: MSS_5588-1 āsīt satyayuge balistadanu ca tretāyuge bhārgavo rāmaḥ satyaparākramo'tha bhagavān dharmas tathā dvāpare /
analyzed: āsīt satya yuge baliḥ tadanu ca tretā yuge bhārgavaḥ rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ utha bhagavān dharmaḥ tathā dvāpare

original: MSS_5588-2 dātā ko'pi na cāsti saṃprati kalau jīvanti kenārthinaś cetyevaṃ kṛtaniścayena vidhinā vyāpāriṇo nirmitāḥ //
analyzed: dātā kaḥ api na ca asti saṃprati kalau jīvanti kena arthinaḥ ca iti evam kṛta niścayena vidhinā vyāpāriṇaḥ nirmitāḥ

original: MSS_5589-1 āsīdañjanamatreti paśyāmi tava locane /
analyzed: āsīt añjanam atrā iti paśyāmi tava locane

original: MSS_5589-2 bhāvibhūṣaṇasaṃbhārāṃ sākṣātkurve tavākṛtim //
analyzed: bhāvi bhūṣaṇa saṃbhārām sākṣātkurve tava ākṛtim

original: MSS_5590-1 āsīdadabhraśaradabhramiṣād yaśas te nāke bhraman nṛpa yadabhramukāntaśubhram /
analyzed: yaśaḥ te nāke bhramat nṛpa yad abhramu kānta śubhram

original: MSS_5590-2 tat puṣpavarṣaṇamivāpsarasāṃ dyuloke vyāpnotyamādiva bhuvaṃ tuhinacchalena //
analyzed: tat puṣpa varṣaṇam iva apsarasām dyu loke vyāpnoti amāt iva bhuvam tuhina chalena

original: MSS_5591-1 āsīdāsīmabhūmīvalayamalayajālepanepathyakīrti ḥ saptākūpārapārīsadanajanaghanodgītacāpapratāp aḥ /
analyzed: āsīt āsīma bhūmī valaya malaya jālepa nepathya kīrti sapta akūpāra pārī sadana jana ghana udgīta cāpa pratāp aḥ

original: MSS_5591-2 vīrādasmāt paraḥ kaḥ padayugayugapatpātibhūpātibhūyaś cūḍāratnoḍupatnīkaraparicaraṇāmandanandannakhend uḥ //
analyzed: vīrāt asmāt paraḥ kaḥ pada yuga yugapad pātibhūpātibhūyaḥ cūḍāratna uḍu patnīkara paricaraṇa āmanda nandat nakha ind uḥ

original: MSS_5592-1 āsīduptaṃ yadetad raṇabhuvi bhavatā vairimātaṅgakumbhān muktābījaṃ tadetat trijagati janayāmāsa kīrtidrumaṃ te /
analyzed: āsīt uptam yat etat raṇa bhuvi bhavatā vairi mātaṅga kumbhāt muktā bījam tat etat trijagati janayāmāsa kīrti drumam te

original: MSS_5592-2 śeṣo mūlaṃ prakāṇḍaṃ himagirirudadhirdugdhapūrālavālaṃ jyotsnā śākhāpratānaḥ kusumamuḍucayo yasya candraḥ phalaṃ ca //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ mūlam prakāṇḍam himagiriḥ udadhiḥ dugdhapūra ālavālam jyotsnā śākhā pratānaḥ kusumam uḍucayaḥ yasya candraḥ phalam ca

original: MSS_5593-1 āsīdeva yadārdraḥ kimapi tadā kimayamāhato'pyāha /
analyzed: āsīt eva yadā ārdraḥ kim api tadā kim ayam āhataḥ upi āha

original: MSS_5593-2 niṣṭhurabhāvādadhunā kaṭūni sakhi raṭati paṭaha iva //
analyzed: niṣṭhura bhāvāt adhunā kaṭūni sakhi raṭati paṭahaḥ iva

original: MSS_5594-1 āsīd gaṅgādharas tasya bhrātā gaṅgādharopamaḥ /
analyzed: āsīt gaṅgādharaḥ tasya bhrātā gaṅgādhara upamaḥ

original: MSS_5594-2 ekān babandha yo vyālān mumocaikān yadṛcchayā //
analyzed: ekān babandha yaḥ vyālān mumoca ekān yadṛcchayā

original: MSS_5595-1 āsīd gaṅgānvayāyakṣitipatitilako rājarājakṣitīśaḥ kṣmāpālaprauḍhamauliprakaramaṇiruciprasphuratpādapīṭhaḥ /
analyzed: āsīt gaṅgā anvaya āya kṣitipati tilakaḥ rājarāja kṣitīśaḥ kṣmāpāla prauḍha mauli prakara maṇi ruci prasphurat pāda pīṭhaḥ

original: MSS_5595-2 yo'rātikṣatracakrakrathanakarabhujāpālitāśeṣapṛt hvī- cakraścakrāyudhābho'dadhadurasi ramāṃ vāci vācāmadhīśaḥ //
analyzed: hvī cakraḥ cakra āyudha ābhaḥ dadhat urasi ramām vāci vācām adhīśaḥ

original: MSS_5596-1 āsīd yastava putrakas tricaturaiḥ patrāṅkurairāvṛto meghonmuktajalaikajīvanavidhiḥ sanmārgalabdhāspadaḥ /
analyzed: āsīt yaḥ tava putrakaḥ tricaturaiḥ patra aṅkuraiḥ āvṛtaḥ megha unmukta jala eka jīvana vidhiḥ sat mārga labdha āspadaḥ

original: MSS_5596-2 so'yaṃ saṃprati vāsaraiḥ katipayairadhvanyapuṇyoccayaiḥ saṃpannaḥ phalanamrapallavataticchāyopaliptāvaniḥ //
analyzed: saḥ ayam saṃprati vāsaraiḥ katipayaiḥ adhvanya puṇya uccayaiḥ saṃpannaḥ phala namra pallava tati chāyā upalipta avaniḥ

original: MSS_5597-1 āsīd varaḥ kaṇṭakitaprakoṣṭhaḥ svinnāṅguliḥ saṃvavṛte kumārī /
analyzed: āsīt varaḥ kaṇṭakita prakoṣṭhaḥ svinna aṅguliḥ saṃvavṛte kumārī

original: MSS_5597-2 tasmin dvaye tatkṣaṇamātmavṛttiḥ samaṃ vibhakteva manobhavena //
analyzed: tasmin dvaye tad kṣaṇam ātma vṛttiḥ samam vibhaktā iva manobhavena

original: MSS_5598-1 āsīnaḥ śayitaḥ sthitaḥ pracalitaḥ svapnāyito jāgṛtaḥ paśyan mīlitalocano vyavaharan maunaṃ prapanno'thavā /
analyzed: āsīnaḥ śayitaḥ sthitaḥ pracalitaḥ svapnāyitaḥ jāgṛtaḥ paśyan mīlita locanaḥ vyavaharan maunam prapannaḥ athavā

original: MSS_5598-2 tāṃ premākulavīkṣitāṃ smitamukhīṃ savrīḍamandāgamāṃ śliṣyantīṃ praṇayārdramugdhalapitāṃ paśyāmi naktaṃdivam //
analyzed: tām prema ākula vīkṣitām smita mukhīm sa vrīḍa manda āgamām śliṣyantīm praṇaya ārdra mugdha lapitām paśyāmi naktaṃdivam

original: MSS_5599-1 āsīnaḥ sukhamāpaṇe yadi vaṇik śraddhālubhiḥ prārthitaḥ kiṃcic śaṃsati pañcakaṃ śatakamityetanna tasyādbhutam /
analyzed: āsīnaḥ sukham āpaṇe yadi vaṇij śraddhālubhiḥ prārthitaḥ kiṃcid śaṃsati pañcakam śatakam iti etat na tasya adbhutam

original: MSS_5599-2 āpātālavighūrṇitāmbhasi calatyautpātike mārute majjantyāmapi nāvi muñcati na yastāmeva mūlyasthitim //
analyzed: āpātāla vighūrṇita ambhasi calati autpātike mārute majjantyām api nāvi muñcati na yaḥ tām eva mūlya sthitim

original: MSS_5600-1 asīnaḥ svāminaḥ pārśve tanmukhekṣī kṛtāñjaliḥ /
MSS_5600-2 svabhāvaṃ cāsya vijñāya dakṣaḥ kāryāṇi sādhayet //
analyzed: svabhāvam ca asya vijñāya dakṣaḥ kāryāṇi sādhayet

original: MSS_5601-1 āsīnā taṭabhuvi sasmitena bhartrā rambhorūravatarituṃ sarasyanicchuḥ /
analyzed: āsīnā taṭa bhuvi sa smitena bhartrā rambhā ūrūḥ avataritum sarasya nicchuḥ

original: MSS_5601-2 dhunvānā karayugamīkṣituṃ vilāsāñ śītāluḥ salilagatena sicyate sma //
analyzed: dhunvānā kara yugam īkṣitum vilāsām śītāluḥ salila gatena sicyate sma

original: MSS_5602-1 āsīne pūṣṇi tūṣṇīṃ vyasanini śaśini vyomni kṛṣṇe satṛṣṇe daityendre jātanidre dravati maghavati klāntakāntau kṛtānte /
analyzed: āsīne pūṣṇi tūṣṇīm vyasanini śaśini vyomni kṛṣṇe sa tṛṣṇe daitya indre jāta nidre dravati maghavati klānta kāntau kṛtānte

original: MSS_5602-2 abrahmaṇyaṃ bruvāṇe kamalapuṭakuṭīśrotriye śāntyupāye pāyād vaḥ kālakūṭaṃ jhaṭiti kavalayaṃllīlayā nīlakaṇṭhaḥ //
analyzed: abrahmaṇyam bruvāṇe kamala puṭa kuṭī śrotriye śānti upāye pāyāt vaḥ kālakūṭam jhaṭiti kavalayan līlayā nīlakaṇṭhaḥ

original: MSS_5603-1 āsīne lālayed bālāṃ taruṇīṃ śayane tathā /
analyzed: āsīne lālayet bālām taruṇīm śayane tathā

original: MSS_5603-2 utthite'pyadhirūḍhāṃ ca lālanaṃ trividhaṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: utthite ipi adhirūḍhām ca lālanam trividham viduḥ

original: MSS_5604-1 āsīnaiḥ svaṃ vimānaṃ kṛtaparivṛtibhiḥ sundarīsaṃgatais tair devaiḥ siddhaiśca yakṣairanimiṣanayanairdṛśyamānaḥ satṛṣṇam /
analyzed: āsīnaiḥ svam vimānam kṛta parivṛtibhiḥ sundarī saṃgataiḥ taiḥ devaiḥ siddhaiḥ ca yakṣaiḥ animiṣa nayanaiḥ dṛśyamānaḥ sa tṛṣṇam

original: MSS_5604-2 madhyemaghye payodairmurajasadṛśatāṃ bodhayadbhiḥ sumanda- mambhaḥ saṃpātya puṣpairiva nanu mahitas tāṇḍavaḥ śreyase stāt //
analyzed: madhye maghye payodaiḥ muraja sadṛśa tām bodhayadbhiḥ su manda saṃpātya puṣpaiḥ iva nanu mahitaḥ tāṇḍavaḥ śreyase stāt

original: MSS_5605-1 āsīn nātha pitāmahī tava mahī mātā tato'nantaraṃ saṃpratyeva hi sāmburāśiraśanā jāyā jayodbhūtaye /
analyzed: āsīt nātha pitāmahī tava mahī mātā tatonantaram saṃprati eva hi sa amburāśi raśanā jāyā jaya udbhūtaye

original: MSS_5605-2 pūrṇe varṣaśate bhaviṣyati punaḥ saivānavadyā snuṣā yuktaṃ nāma samastaśāstraviduṣāṃ lokeśvarāṇāmidam //
analyzed: pūrṇe varṣa śate bhaviṣyati punar sā eva anavadyā snuṣā yuktam nāma samasta śāstra viduṣām loka īśvarāṇām idam

original: MSS_5606-1 āsīn me manasi hṛtā na sā mṛtā sā yā dṛṣṭervrajati na gocaraṃ priyā me /
analyzed: āsīt me manasi hṛtā na sā mṛtā sā yā dṛṣṭeḥ vrajati na gocaram priyā me

original: MSS_5606-2 jyotsnā hi sphuṭadhavalāpi kaumudīndor andhānāṃ bahalatamomalīmasaiva //
analyzed: jyotsnā hi sphuṭa dhavalā api kaumudī indoḥ andhānām bahala tamaḥ malīmasā eva

original: MSS_5607-1 āsīmā kālikā yasya kṣudrāṅgaṃ kuṇḍalīkṛtam /
analyzed: kālikā yasya kṣudra aṅgam kuṇḍalīkṛtam

original: MSS_5607-2 kṣudravajrakanāmānaṃ prāha nāgārjuno muniḥ //
analyzed: kṣudra vajraka nāmānam prāha nāgārjunaḥ muniḥ

original: MSS_5608-1 āsīmāntān nivartante suhṛdaḥ saha bandhubhiḥ /
analyzed: āsīmāntāt nivartante suhṛdaḥ saha bandhubhiḥ

original: MSS_5608-2 sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vāpi gacchantamanugacchati //
analyzed: sukṛtam duṣkṛtam vā api gacchantam anugacchati

original: MSS_5609-1 āsīstvaṃ niśirājaraktahṛdayetīrṣyālunā vajriṇā prātaḥ śaṅkitayeva divyapadavīṃ gatvātmanaḥ śuddhaye /
analyzed: āsīḥ tvam niśi rāja rakta hṛdaya iti īrṣyālunā vajriṇā prātar śaṅkitayā iva divya padavīm gatvā ātmanaḥ śuddhaye

original: MSS_5609-2 aurvottāpitavārdhitāpakatalādādāya mukto bahiḥ prācyāsau divi taptamāṣaka iva pradyotano dyotate //
analyzed: aurva uttāpita vārdhi tāpaka talāt ādāya muktaḥ bahis prācyā asau divi tapta māṣakaḥ iva pradyotanaḥ dyotate

original: MSS_5610-1 āsuraṃ kulamanādaraṇīyaṃ cittametadamalīkaraṇīyam /
analyzed: āsuram kulam an ādaraṇīyam cittam etat amalīkaraṇīyam

original: MSS_5610-2 rāmadhāma śaraṇīkaraṇīyaṃ līlayā bhavajalaṃ taraṇīyam //
analyzed: rāma dhāma śaraṇīkaraṇīyam līlayā bhava jalam taraṇīyam

original: MSS_5611-1 āse cet svagṛhe kuṭumbabharaṇaṃ kartuṃ na śakto'smyahaṃ seve cet sukhasādhanaṃ munivanaṃ muṣṇanti māṃ taskarāḥ /
analyzed: āse ced sva gṛhe kuṭumba bharaṇam kartum na śaktaḥ asmi aham seve ced sukha sādhanam muni vanam muṣṇanti mām taskarāḥ

original: MSS_5611-2 śvabhre cet svatanuṃ tyajāmi narakād bhīrātmahatyāvaśān no jāne karavāṇi daiva kimahaṃ martuṃ na vā jīvitum //
analyzed: śvabhre ced sva tanum tyajāmi narakāt bhīrā ātma hatyā vaśāt no jāne karavāṇi daiva kim aham martum na vā jīvitum

original: MSS_5612-1 āsevyate mukhaṃ sarvair vidyānāṃ yoṣitāmapi /
analyzed: āsevyate mukham sarvaiḥ vidyānām yoṣitām api

original: MSS_5612-2 hṛdayagrāhiṇas tāsāṃ dvitrāḥ santi na santi vā //
analyzed: hṛdaya grāhiṇaḥ tāsām dvitrāḥ santi na santi vā

original: MSS_5613-1 āskandan kathamapi yoṣito na yāvad bhīmatyaḥ priyakaradhāryamāṇahastāḥ /
analyzed: āskandan katham api yoṣitaḥ na yāvat bhīmatyaḥ priya kara dhāryamāṇa hastāḥ

original: MSS_5613-2 autsukyāt tvaritamamūstadambu tāvat saṃkrāntapratimatayā dadhāvivāntaḥ //
analyzed: autsukyāt tvaritam amūḥ tat ambu tāvat saṃkrānta pratima tayā dadhau iva antar

original: MSS_5614-1 āskandito bhujalatācalitāgraśākhām āliṅgito yuvatibhiḥ kalikārthinībhiḥ /
analyzed: āskanditaḥ bhuja latā calita agra śākhām āliṅgitaḥ yuvatibhiḥ kalikā arthinībhiḥ

original: MSS_5614-2 dhanyo'si campakataro kusumānurūpair āsāṃ ghanastanaphalaiḥ phalito'si yacca //
analyzed: dhanyaḥ asi campakataro kusuma anurūpaiḥ āsām ghana stana phalaiḥ phalitaḥ asi yat ca

original: MSS_5615-1 āskandhāvadhi kaṇṭhakāṇḍavipine drāk candrahāsāsinā chettuṃ prakramite mayaiva tarasā truṭyacchirāsaṃtatau /
analyzed: ā skandha avadhi kaṇṭha kāṇḍa vipine drāk candrahāsa asinā chettum prakramite mayā eva tarasā truṭyat śirā saṃtatau

original: MSS_5615-2 asmeraṃ galitāśrugadgadapadaṃ bhinnabhruvā yadyabhūd vaktreṣvekamapi svayaṃ sa bhagavāṃstanme pramāṇaṃ śivaḥ //
analyzed: asmeram galita aśru gadgada padam bhinna bhruvā yadi abhūt vaktreṣu ekam api svayam sa bhagavān tat me pramāṇam śivaḥ

original: MSS_5616-1 ā stanyapānāj jananī paśūnām ā dāralābhācca narādhamānām /
analyzed: ā stanya pānāt jananī paśūnām ā dāra lābhāt ca nara adhamānām

original: MSS_5616-2 āgehakarmāvadhi madhyamānām ā jīvitāt tīrthamivottamānām //
analyzed: ā geha karma avadhi madhyamānām ā jīvitāt tīrtham iva uttamānām

original: MSS_5617-1 āsta bhāvamadhigacchatos tayoḥ saṃmadeṣu karajakṣatārpaṇā /
analyzed: āsta bhāvam adhigacchatoḥ tayoḥ saṃmadeṣu karaja kṣata arpaṇā

original: MSS_5617-2 phāṇiteṣu maricāvacūrṇanā sā sphuṭaṃ kaṭurapi spṛhāvahā //
analyzed: phāṇiteṣu marica avacūrṇanā sā sphuṭam kaṭuḥ api spṛhā āvahā

original: MSS_5618-1 āstāṃ kiṃ bahubhiḥ paropakṛtayaḥ saṃsārasāraṃ phalaṃ siddhaṃ tat pratikūlavartini vidhau na stokamapyatra naḥ /
analyzed: āstām kim bahubhiḥ para upakṛtayaḥ saṃsāra sāram phalam siddham tat pratikūla vartini vidhau na stokam api atra naḥ

original: MSS_5618-2 ete smaḥ kila mānuṣā vayamapi vyarthaṃ vyapetāyuṣo yeṣāṃ svodarapūrtireva hi kimapyaṣṭau mahāsiddhayaḥ //
analyzed: ete smaḥ kila mānuṣāḥ vayam api vyartham vyapeta āyuṣaḥ yeṣām sva udara pūrtiḥ eva hi kim api aṣṭau mahā siddhayaḥ

original: MSS_5619-1 āstāṃ klamāpaharaṇaṃ jaladherjalena dūre davāgni paridīpitamānasānām /
analyzed: āstām klama apaharaṇam jaladheḥ jalena dūre dava agni paridīpita mānasānām

original: MSS_5619-2 etāvadastu yadi toyakaṇairna jihvā dandahyate dviguṇatāṃ ca na yāti tṛṣṇā //
analyzed: etāvat astu yadi toya kaṇaiḥ na jihvā dandahyate dviguṇa tām ca na yāti tṛṣṇā

original: MSS_5620-1 āstāṃ gāḍhatarānuśīlanavidhiḥ saṃsparśanaṃ dūrataḥ saṃśleṣe viṣayīkṛto'si na manāgakṣṇoḥ padaṃ prāpitaḥ /
analyzed: āstām gāḍhatara anuśīlana vidhiḥ saṃsparśanam dūratas saṃśleṣe viṣayīkṛtaḥ asi na manāk akṣṇoḥ padam prāpitaḥ

original: MSS_5620-2 kiṃ brūmaḥ sahakāra tāvakaguṇānanyādṛśairdurlabhān saurabhyeṇa yadadhvagānapi muhuḥ prīṇāsi dūrādapi //
analyzed: kim brūmaḥ sahakāra tāvaka guṇān anyādṛśaiḥ durlabhān saurabhyeṇa yat adhva gān api muhur prīṇāsi dūrāt api

original: MSS_5621-1 āstāṃ cakṣuridaṃ tiro'ñcati kiyacceto'pi yadvaibhavair niṣpratyāśamayaṃ mune jalanidhirgaṇḍūṣitaḥ sattapaḥ /
analyzed: āstām cakṣuḥ idam tiroñcati kiyat cetaḥ api yat vaibhavaiḥ niṣpratyāśam ayam mune jalanidhiḥ gaṇḍūṣitaḥ sat tapaḥ

original: MSS_5621-2 etenaiva virantumarhasi na te gaṇḍūṣapānādhikā kācit khyātirataḥparaṃ paramasau parjanyanīvīvyayaḥ //
analyzed: etena eva virantum arhasi na te gaṇḍūṣa pāna adhikā kācid khyātiḥ atas param param asau parjanya nīvī vyayaḥ

original: MSS_5622-1 āstāṃ tat karakānipātakṛtabhīmaṇḍūkanirmajjana- kṣemaikakṣamavāri palvalaśataṃ sindhuṃ tameva stumaḥ /
analyzed: āstām tat karakā nipāta kṛta bhī maṇḍūka nirmajjana kṣema eka kṣama vāri palvala śatam sindhum tam eva stumaḥ

original: MSS_5622-2 kupyacchakrakarasvarupraharaṇakṣuṇṇākhilāṅgakṣarat- kīlālena girivrajena śaraṇaṃ yadgarbhavāsaḥ kṛtaḥ //
analyzed: kupyat śakra kara svaru praharaṇa kṣuṇṇa akhila aṅga kṣarat kīlālena girivrajena śaraṇam yat garbha vāsaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: MSS_5623-1 āstāṃ tāvat kimanyena daurātmyeneha yoṣitām /
analyzed: āstām tāvat kim anyena daurātmyena iha yoṣitām

original: MSS_5623-2 vidhṛtaṃ svodareṇāpi ghnanti putramapi svakam //
analyzed: vidhṛtam sva udareṇa api ghnanti putram api svakam

original: MSS_5624-1 āstāṃ tāvadakīrtirme tvayā tathyaṃ tu kathyatām /
analyzed: āstām tāvat akīrtiḥ me tvayā tathyam tu kathyatām

original: MSS_5624-2 cittaṃ kathamivāsīt te harivaṃśīravaśrutau //
analyzed: cittam katham iva āsīt te hari vaṃśī ravaśrutau

original: MSS_5625-1 āstāṃ tāvadasīmapauruṣajuṣaḥ saṃmānitātyadbhuta- prārambhābhyadhikakriyasya sa khalu prācyaḥ pracāro hareḥ /
analyzed: āstām tāvat asīma pauruṣa juṣaḥ saṃmānita ati adbhuta prārambha abhyadhika kriyasya sa khalu prācyaḥ pracāraḥ hareḥ

original: MSS_5625-2 jīrṇasyāpi ca vindhyakandaradarīdvārāvatārākṣamair aṅgairaṅgabhṛto dalanti darato gandhena gandhadvipāḥ //
analyzed: jīrṇasya api ca vindhya kandara darī dvāra avatāra akṣamaiḥ aṅgaiḥ aṅga bhṛtaḥ dalanti darataḥ gandhena gandha dvipāḥ

original: MSS_5626-1 āstāṃ tāvadaho samudramahimā dūre'pi karṇapriyas tīre yasya pipāsayaiva maraṇaṃ prāpnoti śīghraṃ janaḥ /
analyzed: āstām tāvat aho samudra mahimā dūre pi karṇa priyaḥ tīre yasya pipāsayā eva maraṇam prāpnoti śīghram janaḥ

original: MSS_5626-2 tasmādambunidhervaraṃ laghusaraḥ kūpo'thavā vāpikā yatra svātmakaradvayena salilaṃ pepīyate svecchayā //
analyzed: tasmāt ambunidheḥ varam laghu saraḥ vāpikā yatra sva ātma kara dvayena salilam sva icchayā

original: MSS_5627-1 āstāṃ tāvad digantaprathitasuyaśasāṃ saṃgamaḥ sajjanānāṃ taiḥ sākaṃ vairayogo'pyatiśayamahitāmunnatiṃ saṃnidhatte /
analyzed: āstām tāvat diganta prathita su yaśasām saṃgamaḥ sat janānām taiḥ sākam vaira yoga upi atiśaya mahitām unnatim saṃnidhatte

original: MSS_5627-2 loke kasyāgamiṣyacchrutipathamavapurvaktraśeṣo'pi rāhus trailokyakhyātadhāmnoryadi raviśaśinorvairitāṃ nākariṣyat //
analyzed: loke kasya agamiṣyat śrutipatham a vapuḥ vaktra śeṣaḥ api rāhuḥ trailokya khyāta dhāmnoḥ yadi ravi śaśinoḥ vairi tām nā akariṣyat

original: MSS_5628-1 āstāṃ tāvad vacanaracanābhājanatvaṃ vidūre dūre cāstāṃ tava tanuparīrambhasaṃbhāvanāpi /
analyzed: āstām tāvat vacana racanā bhājana tvam vidūre dūre ca āstām tava tanu parīrambha saṃbhāvanā api

original: MSS_5628-2 bhūyo bhūyaḥ praṇatibhiridaṃ kiṃ tu yāce vidheyā smāraṃ smāraṃ svajanagaṇane kāpi rekhā mamāpi //
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas praṇatibhiḥ idam kim tu yāce vidheyā smāram smāram sva jana gaṇane kā api rekhā mama api

original: MSS_5629-1 āstāṃ te guṇinastāvad bhūṣitāśeṣabhūtalāḥ /
analyzed: āstām te guṇinaḥ tāvat bhūṣita aśeṣa bhū talāḥ

original: MSS_5629-2 yeṣāṃ guṇarucirbhūyaḥ sāṃprataṃ te'pi durlabhāḥ //
analyzed: yeṣām guṇa ruciḥ bhūyas sāṃpratam te api durlabhāḥ

original: MSS_5630-1 āstāṃ dūratayā tadīyavadanāmbhojāmṛtāsvādanaṃ nodetyeva manoratho'pi hṛdaye tatsaṃgamāśāṃ prati /
analyzed: āstām dūra tayā tadīya vadana ambhoja amṛta āsvādanam na udeti iva manorathaḥ api hṛdaye tad saṃgama āśām prati

original: MSS_5630-2 utkaṇṭhāśithilīkṛtāṅgalatikaṃ vīkṣeta māmekadā sasnehaṃ yadi sā sarojavadanā dhanyo'smyahaṃ tāvatā //
analyzed: utkaṇṭhā śithilīkṛta aṅga latikam vīkṣeta mām ekadā sa sneham yadi sā saroja vadanā dhanyaḥ asmi aham tāvatā

original: MSS_5631-1 āstāṃ dūreṇa viśleṣaḥ priyāmāliṅgato mama /
analyzed: āstām dūreṇa viśleṣaḥ priyām āliṅgataḥ mama

original: MSS_5631-2 svedaḥ kiṃ na sarinnātho romāñcaḥ kiṃ na parvataḥ //
analyzed: svedaḥ kim na sarit nātho romāñcaḥ kim na parvataḥ

original: MSS_5632-1 āstāṃ bhavāntaravidhau suviparyayo'yam atraiva janmani nṛṇāmadharoccabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: āstām bhava antara vidhau su viparyayaḥ yam atrā eva janmani nṛṇām adhara ucca bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_5632-2 alpaḥ pṛthuḥ pṛthurapi kṣaṇato'lpa eva svāmī bhavatyanucaraḥ sa ca tatpadārhaḥ //
analyzed: alpaḥ pṛthuḥ pṛthuḥ api kṣaṇatā ulpaḥ eva svāmī bhavati anucaraḥ sa ca tad padārhaḥ

original: MSS_5633-1 āstāṃ maṇḍalamaindavaṃ varatanorvaktraśriyaś cet kathā koṇe kutracidāsatāṃ kuvalayānyakṣṇoḥ prasaṅgo yadi /
analyzed: āstām maṇḍalam aindavam vara tanoḥ vaktra śriyaḥ ced kathā koṇe kutracid āsatām kuvalayāni akṣṇoḥ prasaṅgaḥ yadi

original: MSS_5633-2 dūre tiṣṭhatu vallakīkalaravaḥ prastāvanā ced girāṃ vārttā cedavalagnakasya yaśasāṃ vyomnaḥ prathāyai namaḥ //
analyzed: dūre tiṣṭhatu vallakī kalaravaḥ prastāvanā ced girām vārttā ced avalagnakasya yaśasām vyomnaḥ prathāyai namaḥ

original: MSS_5634-1 āstāṃ mahābodhabalena sādhyo mokṣo vibādhāmalasaukhyayuktaḥ /
analyzed: āstām mahā bodha balena sādhyaḥ mokṣaḥ vibādha amala saukhya yuktaḥ

original: MSS_5634-2 dharmārthakāmā api no bhavanti jñānaṃ vinā tena tadarcanīyam //
analyzed: dharma artha kāmāḥ api naḥ bhavanti jñānam vinā tena tat arcanīyam

original: MSS_5635-1 āstāṃ mādya bhave śubhe sakhi latā nyastā tvayā mādhavī kānte tan mama saṃprayaccha kusumaṃ kiṃ vāmunā me phalam /
analyzed: āstām mā adya bhave śubhe sakhi latā nyastā tvayā mādhavī kānte tat mama saṃprayaccha kusumam kim vā amunā me phalam

original: MSS_5635-2 nālpaṃ nirmalayāmi mauktikamidaṃ nyastaṃ tvayā dahyatām itthaṃ vibhramasaṃbhramo madayati preyāṃsameṇīdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: na alpam nirmalayāmi mauktikam idam nyastam tvayā dahyatām ittham vibhrama saṃbhramaḥ madayati preyāṃsam eṇī dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_5636-1 āstāṃ mānaḥ kathanaṃ sakhīṣu vā mayi nivedyadurvinaye /
analyzed: āstām mānaḥ kathanam sakhīṣu vā mayi nivedya durvinaye

original: MSS_5636-2 śithilitaratiguṇagarvā mamāpi sā lajjitā sutanuḥ //
analyzed: śithilita rati guṇa garvā mama api sā lajjitā su tanuḥ

original: MSS_5637-1 āstāṃ varamavakeśī mā dohadamasya racaya pūgataroḥ /
analyzed: āstām varam avakeśī mā dohadam asya racaya pūga taroḥ

original: MSS_5637-2 etasmāt phalitādapi kevalamudvegamadhigaccha //
analyzed: etasmāt phalitāt api kevalam udvegam adhigaccha

original: MSS_5638-1 āstāṃ viśvasanaṃ sakhīṣu viditābhiprāyasāre jane tatrāpyarpayituṃ dṛśaṃ salilatāṃ śaknomi na vrīḍayā /
analyzed: āstām viśvasanam sakhīṣu vidita abhiprāya sāre jane tatra api arpayitum dṛśam salila tām śaknomi na vrīḍayā

original: MSS_5638-2 loko hyeṣa paropahāsacaturaḥ sūkṣmeṅgitajño'pyalaṃ mātaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇo'nurāgānalaḥ //
analyzed: lokaḥ hi eṣa para upahāsa caturaḥ sūkṣma iṅgita jñaḥ api alam mātar kam śaraṇam vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇa unurāga analaḥ

original: MSS_5639-1 āstāṃ sakaṇṭakamidaṃ vasudhādhipatyaṃ trailokyarājyamapi deva tṛṇāya manye /
analyzed: āstām sa kaṇṭakam idam vasudhā ādhipatyam trailokya rājyam api deva tṛṇāya manye

original: MSS_5639-2 niḥśaṅkasuptahariṇīkulasaṃkulāsu cetaḥ paraṃ valati śailavanasthalīṣu //
analyzed: niḥśaṅka supta hariṇī kula saṃkulāsu cetaḥ param valati śaila vana sthalīṣu

original: MSS_5640-1 āstāmanaṅgīkaraṇād bhavena dṛśyaḥ smaro neti purāṇavāṇī /
analyzed: āstām anaṅgīkaraṇāt bhavena dṛśyaḥ smaraḥ nā iti purāṇa vāṇī

original: MSS_5640-2 tavaiva dehaṃ śritayā śriyeti navastu vastu pratibhāti vādaḥ //
analyzed: tava eva deham śritayā śriyā iti navaḥ tu vastu pratibhāti vādaḥ

original: MSS_5641-1 āstāmanyatsujanāḥ paropakāraikakaraṇadurlalitāḥ /
analyzed: āstām anyat su janāḥ para upakāra eka karaṇa durlalitāḥ

original: MSS_5641-2 saṃtāpitapiśuneṣu svaguṇeṣvapi hanta khidyante //
analyzed: saṃtāpita piśuneṣu sva guṇeṣu api hanta khidyante

original: MSS_5642-1 āstāmaparo lokaḥ krīḍāpekṣāparo yadi prītiḥ /
analyzed: āstām aparaḥ lokaḥ krīḍā apekṣā paraḥ yadi prītiḥ

original: MSS_5642-2 byasanāntare patantī na vāritā parijanenāpi //
analyzed: byasana antare patantī na vāritā parijanena api

original: MSS_5643-1 āstāmeva sarovareṇya bhavato dugdhodalabdhāmṛta- svādaspardhi sarojavṛndakhacitaṃ haṃsāvataṃsaṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: āstām eva sarovareṇya bhavataḥ dugdha uda labdha amṛta svāda spardhi saroja vṛnda khacitam haṃsa avataṃsam payaḥ

original: MSS_5643-2 sphārollolasuśītaśīkaracayāsāraprasiktānila- sparśaireva manoharairapagatāḥ saṃtāpaśoṣaklamāḥ //
analyzed: sphāra ullola suśīta śīkara caya āsāra prasikta anila sparśaiḥ eva manoharaiḥ apagatāḥ saṃtāpa śoṣa klamāḥ

original: MSS_5644-1 āstikyaṃ ced dhanamakhilamapyarthisātkartumarhaṃ nāstikyaṃ cet tadapi sutarāṃ bhogahetorapāsyam /
analyzed: āstikyam ced dhanam akhilam api arthisāt kartum arham nāstikyam ced tat api sutarām bhoga hetoḥ apāsyam

original: MSS_5644-2 aspṛṣṭvāpi svayamatirahaḥsthāpyate yat tadantas tasmin hetuḥ ka iti nibhṛtaṃ tarkayāmo na vidmaḥ //
analyzed: a spṛṣṭvā api svayam ati rahaḥ sthāpyate yat tat antar tasmin hetuḥ kaḥ iti nibhṛtam tarkayāmaḥ na vidmaḥ

original: MSS_5645-1 āstīkavacanaṃ smṛtvā yaḥ sarpo na nivartate /
analyzed: āstīka vacanam smṛtvā yaḥ sarpaḥ na nivartate

original: MSS_5645-2 śatadhā bhidyate mūrdhni śiṃśavṛkṣaphalaṃ yathā //
analyzed: śatadhā bhidyate mūrdhni śiṃśa vṛkṣa phalam yathā

original: MSS_5646-1 āstīryantāmupānte vanavṛtinipuṇairjālikairjālabandhā mucyantāṃ śṛṅkhalābhyaḥ śvagaṇabhiraṭavīgahvare sārameyāḥ /
analyzed: āstīryantām upānte vana vṛti nipuṇaiḥ jālikaiḥ jālabandhāḥ mucyantām śṛṅkhalābhyaḥ śva gaṇabhiḥ aṭavī gahvare sārameyāḥ

original: MSS_5646-2 ākīryantāṃ sthalāni śramaśithilahayaiḥ sādibhiḥ pāśahastair vyādhūyantāṃ kṛtāntairiva mahiṣacarairdaṇḍibhiḥ kānanāni //
analyzed: ākīryantām sthalāni śrama śithila hayaiḥ sādibhiḥ pāśa hastaiḥ vyādhūyantām kṛtāntaiḥ iva mahiṣa caraiḥ daṇḍibhiḥ kānanāni

original: MSS_5647-1 āstṛte'bhinavapallavapuṣpair apyanārataratābhiratābhyaḥ /
analyzed: āstṛta ibhinava pallava puṣpaiḥ api anārata rata abhiratābhyaḥ

original: MSS_5647-2 dīyate sma śayituṃ śayanīye na kṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇadayāpi vadhūbhyaḥ //
analyzed: dīyate sma śayitum śayanīye na kṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇadayā api vadhūbhyaḥ

original: MSS_5648-1 āste kaścana bhikṣuḥ saṃgṛhṇannavyayāni daśa /
analyzed: āste kaścana bhikṣuḥ saṃgṛhṇan avyayāni daśa

original: MSS_5648-2 na mametyavyayayugalaṃ yācāmas taṃ kimastyanyat //
analyzed: na mama iti avyaya yugalam yācāmaḥ tam kim asti anyat

original: MSS_5649-1 āste'traiva sarasyaho bata kiyān saṃtoṣapakṣagraho haṃsasyāsya manāṅ na dhāvati matiḥ śrīdhāmni padme kvacit /
analyzed: āste itra eva sarasi aho bata kiyān saṃtoṣa pakṣa grahaḥ haṃsasya asya manāk na dhāvati matiḥ śrī dhāmni padme kvacid

original: MSS_5649-2 supto'dyāpi vibudhyate na taditastāvat pratīkṣāmahe velāmityuṣasi priyā madhulihaḥ soḍhuṃ ta eva kṣamāḥ //
analyzed: suptā udya api vibudhyate na tat itas tāvat pratīkṣāmahe velām iti uṣasi priyāḥ madhulihaḥ soḍhum te eva kṣamāḥ

original: MSS_5650-1 āste dāmodarīyāmiyamudaradarīṃ yāvalambya trilokī saṃmātuṃ śaknuvanti prathimabharavaśādatra naitadyaśāṃsi /
analyzed: āste dāmodarīyām iyam udara darīm yā avalambya trilokī saṃmātum śaknuvanti prathima bhara vaśāt atra na etad yaśāṃsi

original: MSS_5650-2 tāmetāṃ pūrayitvā niraguriva madhudhvaṃsinaḥ pāṇḍupadma- cchadmāpannāni tāni dvipadaśanasanābhīni nābhīpathena //
analyzed: tām etām pūrayitvā niraguḥ iva madhudhvaṃsinaḥ pāṇḍu padma chadma āpannāni tāni dvipad aśana sanābhīni nābhīpathena

original: MSS_5651-1 āste dvāri vadhūrvidhātṛracanāvaiduṣyavikrāntibhūr bhūretasya balādahāri bhavatā bhītā natārātinā /
analyzed: āste dvāri vadhūḥ vidhātṛ racanā vaiduṣya vikrānti bhūḥ bhūḥ etasya balāt ahāri bhavatā bhītā nata arātinā

original: MSS_5651-2 kiṃ nāmāparamatra kāryamadhunā sādhyaṃ samāśāsyate tatpāṇigrahamaṅgalāya manujādhīśāstu yatno mahān //
analyzed: kim nāma aparam atra kāryam adhunā sādhyam samāśāsyate tad pāṇigraha maṅgalāya manuja adhīśāḥ tu yatnaḥ mahān

original: MSS_5652-1 āste no suṣamā na cāpi kusumāmodo hi no vā manāk cāturyaṃ makarandadānaviṣaye kiṃ cāturīyaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: āste no suṣamā na ca api kusuma āmodaḥ hi naḥ vā manāk cāturyam makaranda dāna viṣaye kim cāturīyam punar

original: MSS_5652-2 yattvaṃ citragataṃ kuśeśayadalaṃ puṣṇāsi guñjāravair māhātmyaṃ ka iva bravīmi tadaho he cañcarīkādhunā //
analyzed: yat tvam citra gatam kuśeśaya dalam puṣṇāsi guñjā ravaiḥ māhātmyam kaḥ iva bravīmi tat aho he cañcarīka adhunā

original: MSS_5653-1 āste rohatkanakakamale kelipātre mṛḍānyāḥ khelan helonmadamadhukarīmānase mānase yaḥ /
analyzed: āste rohat kanaka kamale keli pātre mṛḍa anyāḥ khelan helā unmada madhukarī mānase mānase yaḥ

original: MSS_5653-2 bhekodrekapraṇayini valadbālajambālajāle sa syādutkaḥ parimitajale palvale kiṃ marālaḥ //
analyzed: bheka udreka praṇayini valat bāla jambāla jāle sa syāt utkaḥ parimita jale palvale kim marālaḥ

original: MSS_5654-1 āste vidhuḥ paramanirvṛta eva maulau śaṃbhoriti trijagatījanacittavṛttiḥ /
analyzed: āste vidhuḥ parama nirvṛtaḥ eva maulau śaṃbhoḥ iti trijagatī jana cittavṛttiḥ

original: MSS_5654-2 antarnigūḍhanayanānaladāhaduḥkhaṃ jānāti kaḥ paramṛte bata śītaraśmeḥ //
analyzed: antar nigūḍha nayana anala dāha duḥkham jānāti kaḥ param ṛte bata śītaraśmeḥ

original: MSS_5655-1 āstrīśiśu prathitayaiṣa pipāsitebhyaḥ saṃrakṣyate'mbudhirapeyatayaiva dūrāt /
analyzed: ā strī śiśu prathitayā eṣa pipāsitebhyaḥ saṃrakṣyatā imbudhiḥ a peya tayā eva dūrāt

original: MSS_5655-2 daṃṣṭrākarālamakarālikarālitābhiḥ kiṃ bhāyayatyaparamūrmiparaṃparābhiḥ //
analyzed: daṃṣṭra karāla makara ali karālitābhiḥ kim bhāyayati aparam ūrmi paraṃparābhiḥ

original: MSS_5656-1 āsthāmālambya nīteṣu vaśaṃ kṣudreṣvarātiṣu /
analyzed: āsthām ālambya nīteṣu vaśam kṣudreṣu arātiṣu

original: MSS_5656-2 vyaktimāyāti mahatāṃ māhātmyamanukampayā //
analyzed: vyaktim āyāti mahatām māhātmyam anukampayā

original: MSS_5657-1 āsthāya dāruṇataraṃ kamapi svabhāvam atyantaduṣkṛtakṛtāmapi śikṣaṇāya /
analyzed: āsthāya dāruṇataram kam api svabhāvam atyanta duṣkṛta kṛtām api śikṣaṇāya

original: MSS_5657-2 gṛhṇāsi sāyakapade kusumānyamūni mātaḥ suteṣu mahatī kila rūkṣateyam //
analyzed: gṛhṇāsi sāyaka pade kusumāni amūni mātar suteṣu mahatī kila rūkṣa tā iyam

original: MSS_5658-1 āsthitaḥ sthagitavāridapaṅktyā saṃdhyayā gaganapaścimabhāgaḥ /
analyzed: āsthitaḥ sthagita vārida paṅktyā saṃdhyayā gagana paścima bhāgaḥ

original: MSS_5658-2 sormividrumavitānavibhāsā rañjitasya jaladheḥ śriyamūhe //
analyzed: sa ūrmi vidruma vitāna vibhāsā rañjitasya jaladheḥ śriyam ūhe

original: MSS_5659-1 āsphālitaṃ yat pramadākarāgrair mṛdaṅgadhīradhvanimanvagacchat /
analyzed: āsphālitam yat pramadā kara agraiḥ mṛdaṅga dhīra dhvanim anvagacchat

original: MSS_5659-2 vanyairidānīṃ mahiṣais tadambhaḥ śṛṅgāhataṃ krośati dīrghikāṇām //
analyzed: vanyaiḥ idānīm mahiṣaiḥ tat ambhaḥ śṛṅga āhatam krośati dīrghikāṇām

original: MSS_5660-1 āsphālitairjaladhirūrmiparaṃparāṇāṃ dūrīkaroti yadi ratnamavastubuddhyā /
analyzed: āsphālitaiḥ jaladhiḥ ūrmi paraṃparāṇām dūrīkaroti yadi ratnam avastu buddhyā

original: MSS_5660-2 ratnākaratvamapi tasya bhaved vinaṣṭaṃ ratnaṃ tu hanta bhavitā mahadaṅgadhāryam //
analyzed: ratna ākara tvam api tasya bhavet vinaṣṭam ratnam tu hanta bhavitā mahat aṅga dhāryam

original: MSS_5661-1 āsmākī yuvatidṛśāmasau tanoti cchāyaiva śriyamanapāyinīṃ kimebhiḥ /
analyzed: āsmākī yuvati dṛśām asau tanoti chāyā eva śriyam anapāyinīm kim ebhiḥ

original: MSS_5661-2 matvaivaṃ svaguṇapidhānasābhyasūyaiḥ pānīyairiti vidadhāvire'ñjanāni //
analyzed: matvā evam sva guṇa pidhāna sa abhyasūyaiḥ pānīyaiḥ iti vidadha āvireñjanāni

original: MSS_5662-1 āsyaṃ nirasya rasitaiḥ suciraṃ vihasya gātrāntareṣu ghana varṣasi cātakasya /
analyzed: āsyam nirasya rasitaiḥ su ciram vihasya gātra antareṣu ghana varṣasi cātakasya

original: MSS_5662-2 taccañcukoṭikuṭilāyatakaṃdharasya prāṇātyayo'sya bhavataḥ parihāsamātram //
analyzed: tat cañcu koṭi kuṭila āyata kaṃdharasya prāṇa atyayaḥ usya bhavataḥ parihāsa mātram

original: MSS_5663-1 āsyaṃ pidhāya sakalaṃ viralāṅgulinā kareṇa saghrāṇam /
analyzed: āsyam pidhāya sakalam virala aṅgulinā kareṇa sa ghrāṇam

original: MSS_5663-2 ayamuccaraddakāraṃ manoharaṃ jyotkaroti śiśuḥ //
analyzed: ayam uccarat dakāram manoharam śiśuḥ

original: MSS_5664-1 āsyaṃ yadyapi hāsyavarjitamidaṃ lāsyena vītaṃ vaco netre śoṇasarojakānti tadapi kvāpi kṣaṇaṃ sthīyate /
analyzed: āsyam yadi api hāsya varjitam idam lāsyena vītam vacaḥ netre śoṇa saroja kānti tat api kvāpi kṣaṇam sthīyate

original: MSS_5664-2 mālāyāḥ karaṇodyame makarikārambhaḥ kucāmbhojayor dhūpāḥ kuntaladhoraṇīṣu sudṛśaḥ sāyaṃtano dṛśyate //
analyzed: mālāyāḥ karaṇa udyame makarikā ārambhaḥ kuca ambhojayoḥ dhūpāḥ kuntala dhoraṇīṣu sudṛśaḥ sāyaṃtanaḥ dṛśyate

original: MSS_5665-1 āsyaṃ yasyāḥ sudhāṃśuṃ kalayati nayanābhyāṃ jitaḥ puṃsamūhaḥ kāntyā vidyut kucābhyāṃ jalakanakadhare nirjite hanta mohaḥ /
analyzed: āsyam yasyāḥ sudhāṃśum kalayati nayanābhyām jitaḥ puṃsamūhaḥ kāntyā vidyut kucābhyām jala kanaka dhare nirjite hanta mohaḥ

original: MSS_5665-2 kuṣṭhaṃ durgandhiyuktaṃ laghukṛmivikṛtaṃ pūyamajjāsravāhi- vyāptaṃ tan makṣikābhirgatiriti vapuṣaḥ kutsitā nāsti loke //
analyzed: kuṣṭham durgandhi yuktam laghu kṛmi vikṛtam pūya majja asra vāhi vyāptam tat makṣikābhiḥ gatiḥ iti vapuṣaḥ kutsitā nā asti loke

original: MSS_5666-1 āsyaṃ sahāsyaṃ nayanaṃ salāsyaṃ sindūrabindūdayaśobhi bhālam /
analyzed: āsyam saha āsyam nayanam sa lāsyam sindūra bindu udaya śobhi bhālam

original: MSS_5666-2 navā ca veṇī hariṇīdṛśaśced anyairagaṇyairapi bhūṣaṇaiḥ kim //
analyzed: navā ca veṇī hariṇīdṛśaḥ ced anyaiḥ agaṇyaiḥ api bhūṣaṇaiḥ kim

original: MSS_5667-1 āsyaproñchitapārvaṇenduyaśasaṃ netrāvadhūtotpala- śrīgarvāṃ daśanacchadavyavahitāśokapravāladyutim /
analyzed: āsya proñchita pārvaṇa indu yaśasam netra avadhūta utpala śrī garvām daśanacchada vyavahita aśoka pravāla dyutim

original: MSS_5667-2 etāṃ dṛṣṭisudhāprapāṃ trijagataḥ śilpī vidhāya svayaṃ manye harṣavaśādajāyata nijastotrapracaṇḍaḥ kaviḥ //
analyzed: etām dṛṣṭi sudhā prapām trijagataḥ śilpī vidhāya svayam manye harṣa vaśāt ajāyata nija stotra pracaṇḍaḥ kaviḥ

original: MSS_5668-1 āsyaśrījitajarjarendumalinaṃ kṛtvā kare kandukaṃ krīḍākautukamiśrabhāvamanayā tāmraṃ vahantyānanam /
analyzed: āsya śrī jita jarjara indu malinam kṛtvā kare kandukam krīḍā kautuka miśra bhāvam anayā tāmram vahanti ānanam

original: MSS_5668-2 bhṛṅgāgragrahakṛṣṇaketakadalaspardhāvatīnāṃ dṛśā dīrghāpāṅgataraṅgitaikasuhṛdāmeṣo'smi pātrīkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: bhṛṅga agra graha kṛṣṇa ketaka dala spardhāvatīnām dṛśā dīrgha apāṅga taraṅgita eka suhṛdām eṣaḥ asmi pātrīkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_5669-1 āsyaśrīrdvijarājabādhanakarī dṛṣṭiḥ śruterlaṅghinī mūrdhanyāvaligāminī kuṭilatā baddhāśca muktā guṇaiḥ /
analyzed: āsya śrīḥ dvija rāja bādhana karī dṛṣṭiḥ śruteḥ laṅghinī mūrdhani āvali gāminī kuṭila tāḥ baddhāḥ ca muktāḥ guṇaiḥ

original: MSS_5669-2 yatte sundari durvinītiriyatī dṛṣṭābalāyā mayā tan manye makaradhvajo bhavajayī jātastvadagresaraḥ //
analyzed: yat te sundari durvinītiḥ iyatī dṛṣṭā abalāyāḥ mayā tat manye makaradhvajaḥ bhava jayī jātaḥ tvad agresaraḥ

original: MSS_5670-1 āsyendoḥ pariveṣavadratipateścāmpeyakodaṇḍavad dhammillāmbumucaḥ kṣaṇadyutivadāsajjau kṣipantī bhujau /
analyzed: āsya indoḥ pariveṣa vat ratipateḥ cāmpeya kodaṇḍa vat dhammilla ambumucaḥ kṣaṇadyuti vat āsajjau kṣipantī bhujau

original: MSS_5670-2 viśliṣyadvali lakṣyanābhi vigalannīvyunnamanmadhyamaṃ kiṃcit kiṃcidudañcadañcalamaho kumbhastanī jṛmbhate //
analyzed: viśliṣyat vali lakṣya nābhi vigalat nīvi unnamat madhyamam kiṃcid kiṃcid udañcat añcalam aho kumbha stanī jṛmbhate

original: MSS_5671-1 āsye pūrṇasudhānidhiścaraṇayoḥ kālpadrumaṃ vaibhavaṃ dehe kāñcanakāntatā tvaci punarhaiyaṅgavīnaṃ svayam /
analyzed: āsye pūrṇa sudhā nidhiḥ caraṇayoḥ kālpadrumam vaibhavam dehe kāñcana kānta tā tvaci punar haiyaṅgavīnam svayam

original: MSS_5671-2 yasyā locanayornirūpadhi sadodītānukampātatiḥ sā mātā jagatāṃ prasādapadavī sākṣānmude stādumā //
analyzed: yasyāḥ locanayoḥ nirūpadhi sadā udīta anukampā tatiḥ sā mātā jagatām prasāda padavī sākṣāt mude stād umā

original: MSS_5672-1 āsrāvayeccopacitān viparyasyecca karmasu /
analyzed: āsrāvayet ca upacitān viparyasyet ca karmasu

original: MSS_5672-2 yathā na bhakṣayantyarthaṃ bhakṣitaṃ nirvamanti vā //
analyzed: yathā na bhakṣayanti artham bhakṣitam nirvamanti vā

original: MSS_5673-1 āsrāvayedupacitān sādhu duṣṭavraṇāniva /
analyzed: āsrāvayet upacitān sādhu duṣṭavraṇān iva

original: MSS_5673-2 āyuktāste ca varterann agnāviva mahīpatau //
analyzed: āyuktāḥ te ca varteran agnau iva mahīpatau

original: MSS_5674-1 ā svarlokāduraganagaraṃ nūtanālokalakṣmīm ātanvadbhiḥ kimiva sitatāṃ ceṣṭitais te na nītam /
analyzed: ā svarlokāt uraga nagaram nūtana āloka lakṣmīm ātanvadbhiḥ kim iva sita tām ceṣṭitaiḥ te na nītam

original: MSS_5674-2 apyetāsāṃ ramaṇavirahe vidviṣatkāminīnāṃ yairānītā nakhapadamayī maṇḍanā pāṇḍimānam //
analyzed: api etāsām ramaṇa virahe vidviṣat kāminīnām yaiḥ ānītā nakha pada mayī maṇḍanā pāṇḍimānam

original: MSS_5675-1 āsvāditaṃ svādumarandabindu- svacchandamindīvarasundarībhiḥ /
analyzed: āsvāditam svādum aranda bindu svacchandam indīvara sundarībhiḥ

original: MSS_5675-2 mākandapuṣpaṃ pramadājanasya pramodamāmodabharairakārṣīt //
analyzed: mākanda puṣpam pramadā janasya pramodam āmoda bharaiḥ akārṣīt

original: MSS_5676-1 āsvāditadayitādhara- sudhārasasyeva sūktayo madhurāḥ /
analyzed: āsvādita dayita adhara sudhā rasasya iva su uktayaḥ madhurāḥ

original: MSS_5676-2 akalitarasālamukulo na kokilaḥ kalamudañcayati //
analyzed: a kalita rasāla mukulaḥ na kokilaḥ kalam udañcayati

original: MSS_5677-1 āsvāditadviradaśoṇitaśoṇaśobhāṃ saṃdhyāruṇāmiva kalāṃ śaśalāñchanasya /
analyzed: āsvādita dvirada śoṇita śoṇa śobhām saṃdhyā aruṇām iva kalām śaśalāñchanasya

original: MSS_5677-2 jṛmbhāvidāritamukhasya mukhāt sphurantīṃ ko hartumicchati hareḥ paribhūya daṃṣṭrām //
analyzed: jṛmbhā vidārita mukhasya mukhāt sphurantīm kaḥ hartum icchati hareḥ paribhūya daṃṣṭrām

original: MSS_5678-1 āsvāditonmuktamivārddhabimbaṃ tamomukhād hanta sudhākarasya /
analyzed: āsvādita unmuktam iva arddha bimbam tamaḥ mukhāt hanta sudhākarasya

original: MSS_5678-2 sīmantasīmāntamudārarūpam idaṃ lalāṭaṃ nanu paṅkajākṣyāḥ //
analyzed: sīmanta sīmāntam udāra rūpam idam lalāṭam nanu paṅkaja akṣyāḥ

original: MSS_5679-1 āsvādito'si mohād bata viditā vadanamādhurī bhavataḥ /
analyzed: āsvāditaḥ asi mohāt bata viditā vadana mādhurī bhavataḥ

original: MSS_5679-2 madhuliptakṣura rasanāc chedāya paraṃ vijānāsi //
analyzed: madhu lipta kṣura rasanāt chedāya param vijānāsi

original: MSS_5680-1 āsvādyaṃ pramadāradacchada iva śravyaṃ navaṃ jalpitaṃ bālāyā iva dṛśyamuttamavadhūlāvaṇyalakṣmīriva /
analyzed: āsvādyam pramadā radacchadaḥ iva śravyam navam jalpitam bālāyāḥ iva dṛśyam uttama vadhū lāvaṇya lakṣmīḥ iva

original: MSS_5680-2 prodghoṣyaṃ ciraviprayuktavanitāsandeśavāṇīva me naivedyaṃ caritaṃ ca rūpamaniśaṃ śrīkṛṣṇa nāmāstu te //
analyzed: prodghoṣyam cira viprayukta vanitā sandeśa vāṇī iva me naivedyam caritam ca rūpam aniśam śrī kṛṣṇa nāma astu te

original: MSS_5681-1 āsvādya nirviśeṣaṃ virahivadhūnāṃ mṛdūni māṃsāni /
analyzed: āsvādya nirviśeṣam virahi vadhūnām mṛdūni māṃsāni

original: MSS_5681-2 karakāmiṣeṇa manye niḥṣṭhīvati nīrado'sthīni //
analyzed: karaka āmiṣeṇa manye niḥṣṭhīvati

original: MSS_5682-1 āsvādya svayameva vacmi mahatīrmarmacchido vedanā mā bhūt kasyacidapyayaṃ paribhavo yācñeti saṃsāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: āsvādya svayam eva vacmi mahatīḥ marma chidaḥ vedanāḥ mā bhūt kasyacid api ayam paribhavaḥ yācñā iti saṃsāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_5682-2 paśya bhrātariyaṃ hi gauravajarādhikkārakelisthalī mānamlānimasī guṇavyatikaraprāgalbhyagarbhacyutiḥ //
analyzed: paśya bhrātar iyam hi gaurava jarā dhikkāra keli sthalī māna mlāni masī guṇa vyatikara prāgalbhya garbha cyutiḥ

original: MSS_5683-1 āsvādyātra madhūni ṣaṭpada madaṃ mā gāḥ kaṣāyāṅkurair mākandasya pikān pratāritavato mūrdhānamadhyāsitaḥ /
analyzed: āsvādya atra madhūni ṣaṭpada madam mā gāḥ kaṣāya aṅkuraiḥ mākandasya pikān pratāritavataḥ mūrdhānam adhyāsitaḥ

original: MSS_5683-2 pratyāsannatame pike'pi bhavate yenārpitā tādṛśī mādhvī tasya vivekavicyutiriyaṃ sādguṇyametan na te //
analyzed: pratyāsannatame pike pi bhavate yena arpitā tādṛśī mādhvī tasya viveka vicyutiḥ iyam sādguṇyam etat na te

original: MSS_5684-1 āsvādyaiṣa kaṣāyamaṅkuramurupremānubaddhāśayo mākandasya yaśāṃsi kokilayuvā nirmāti digbhittiṣu /
analyzed: āsvādya eṣa kaṣāyam aṅkuram uru prema anubaddha āśayaḥ mākandasya yaśāṃsi kokila yuvā nirmāti diś bhittiṣu

original: MSS_5684-2 mādhvīkāni nipīya tasya madhupās tatraiva guñjantyamī ko brūtāmasatāṃ satāṃ ca vacasāṃ vartmātigaṃ ceṣṭitam //
analyzed: mādhvīkāni nipīya tasya madhupāḥ tatra eva guñjanti amī kaḥ brūtām asatām satām ca vacasām vartma atigam ceṣṭitam

original: MSS_5685-1 āhataṃ kucataṭena taruṇyāḥ sādhu soḍhamamuneti papāta /
analyzed: āhatam kuca taṭena taruṇyāḥ sādhu soḍham amunā iti papāta

original: MSS_5685-2 truṭyataḥ priyatamorasi hārāt puṣpavṛṣṭiriva mauktikavṛṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: truṭyataḥ priyatama urasi hārāt puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ iva mauktika vṛṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_5686-1 āhate yatra khaḍge syād dhvaniḥ kākasvaropamaḥ /
analyzed: āhate yatra khaḍge syāt dhvaniḥ kāka svara upamaḥ

original: MSS_5686-2 aṃ ākāradhvanirvā syāt sa varjyo narapuṃgavaiḥ //
analyzed: ākāra dhvaniḥ vā syāt sa varjyaḥ nara puṃgavaiḥ

original: MSS_5687-1 āhate yatra madhuro dhvaniḥ samupajāyate /
analyzed: āhate yatra madhuraḥ dhvaniḥ samupajāyate

original: MSS_5687-2 pūjyaḥ sa khaḍgo nṛpateḥ śatrusaṃcayanāśanaḥ //
analyzed: pūjyaḥ sa khaḍgaḥ nṛpateḥ śatru saṃcaya nāśanaḥ

original: MSS_5688-1 āhatya cinumaḥ svargam apavargamanukramāt /
analyzed: āhatya cinumaḥ svargam apavargam anukramāt

original: MSS_5688-2 anukūle hi dāmpatye pratikūlaṃ na kiṃcana //
analyzed: anukūle hi dāmpatye pratikūlam na kiṃcana

original: MSS_5689-1 āhatyāhatya mūrdhnā drutamanupibataḥ prasnutaṃ māturūdhaḥ kiṃcit kubjaikajānoranavaratacalaccārupucchasya dhenuḥ /
analyzed: āhatya āhatya mūrdhnā drutam anupibataḥ prasnutam mātuḥ ūdhar kiṃcid kubja eka jānoḥ anavarata calat cāru pucchasya dhenuḥ

original: MSS_5689-2 utkarṇaṃ tarṇakasya priyatanayatayā dattahuṃkāramudrā visraṃsatkṣīradhārālavaśabalamukhasyāṅgamātṛpti leḍhi //
analyzed: utkarṇam tarṇakasya priya tanaya tayā datta huṃkāra mudrā visraṃsat kṣīra dhārā lava śabala mukhasya aṅgam ātṛpti leḍhi

original: MSS_5690-1 āha nāthavadanasya cumbataḥ sā sma śītakaratāmanakṣaram /
analyzed: āha nātha vadanasya cumbataḥ sā sma śītakara tām anakṣaram

original: MSS_5690-2 sītkṛtāni sudatī vitanvatī sattvadattapṛthuvepathus tadā //
analyzed: sītkṛtāni sudatī vitanvatī sattva datta pṛthu vepathuḥ tadā

original: MSS_5691-1 āharannapi na svastho vinidro na prabudhyati /
analyzed: āharan api na svasthaḥ vinidraḥ na prabudhyati

original: MSS_5691-2 vakti na svecchayā kiṃcit sevako'pīha jīvati //
analyzed: vakti na sva icchayā kiṃcid sevaka ūpī iha jīvati

original: MSS_5692-1 āharej jñānamarthāṃśca pumānamaravat sadā /
analyzed: āharet jñānam arthān ca pumān amara vat sadā

original: MSS_5692-2 gṛhīta iva keśeṣu mṛtyunā dharmamācaret //
analyzed: gṛhītaḥ iva keśeṣu mṛtyunā dharmam ācaret

original: MSS_5693-1 āhave jagaduddaṇḍarājamaṇḍalarāhave /
analyzed: āhave

original: MSS_5693-2 śrīnṛsiṃha mahīpāla svastyastu tava bāhave //
analyzed: śrī nṛsiṃha mahīpāla svasti astu tava bāhave

original: MSS_5694-1 āhaveṣu ca ye śūrāḥ svāmyarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ /
analyzed: āhaveṣu ca ye śūrāḥ svāmi arthe tyakta jīvitāḥ

original: MSS_5694-2 bhartṛbhaktāḥ kṛtajñāśca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
analyzed: bhartṛ bhaktāḥ kṛtajñāḥ ca te narāḥ svarga gāminaḥ

original: MSS_5695-1 āhaveṣu mitho'nyonyaṃ jighāṃsanto mahīkṣitaḥ /
analyzed: āhaveṣu mithas nyonyam jighāṃsantaḥ mahīkṣitaḥ

original: MSS_5695-2 yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yāntyaparāṅmukhāḥ //
analyzed: yudhyamānāḥ param śaktyā svargam yānti a parāṅmukhāḥ

original: MSS_5696-1 āha smaiṣā nalādanyaṃ na juṣe manaseti yat /
analyzed: āha sma eṣā nalāt anyam na juṣe manasā iti yat

original: MSS_5696-2 yauvanānumitenāsyās tanmṛṣābhūn manobhuvā //
analyzed: yauvana anumitena asyāḥ tat mṛṣā abhūt manobhuvā

original: MSS_5697-1 āhāraṃ prati yat kathāpi śamitā yan maunamudrā mukhe yac cakṣurvinimīlanaṃ tanulatā yat tānave vartate /
analyzed: āhāram prati yat kathā api śamitā yat mauna mudrā mukhe yat cakṣuḥ vinimīlanam tanu latā yat tānave vartate

original: MSS_5697-2 ekānte yadavasthitiryadapi ca dhyānaikatānaṃ manas tan manye subhaga tvadarthamanayā tapyeta tīvraṃ tapaḥ //
analyzed: ekānte yat avasthitiḥ yat api ca dhyāna ekatānam manaḥ tat manye subhaga tvad artham anayā tapyeta tīvram tapaḥ

original: MSS_5698-1 āhāraḥ phalamūlamātmarucitaṃ śayyā mahī valkalaṃ saṃvītāya paricchadaḥ kuśasamitpuṣpāṇi putrā mṛgāḥ /
analyzed: āhāraḥ phala mūlam ātma rucitam śayyā mahī valkalam saṃvītāya paricchadaḥ kuśa samidh puṣpāṇi putrāḥ mṛgāḥ

original: MSS_5698-2 vastrānnāśrayadānabhogavibhavā niryantraṇāḥ śākhino mitrāṇītyadhikaṃ gṛheṣu gṛhiṇāṃ kiṃ nāma duḥkhādṛte //
analyzed: vastra anna āśraya dāna bhoga vibhavāḥ niryantraṇāḥ śākhinaḥ mitrāṇi iti adhikam gṛheṣu gṛhiṇām kim nāma duḥkhāt ṛte

original: MSS_5699-1 āhāradoṣāya ca kākadīti syādākuṭāni dhvanitaṃ raṇāya /
analyzed: āhāra doṣāya ca syāt ākuṭāni dhvanitam raṇāya

original: MSS_5699-2 kekedhvaniṣṭhā kuvatī kikī ca trayaṃ tvidaṃ syāt puradūṣaṇāya //
analyzed: kekedhvaniṣṭhā kuvatī kikī ca trayam tu idam syāt pura dūṣaṇāya

original: MSS_5700-1 āhāranidrābhayamaithunāni sāmānyametat paśubhirnarāṇām /
analyzed: āhāra nidrā bhaya maithunāni sāmānyam etat paśubhiḥ narāṇām

original: MSS_5700-2 jñānaṃ narāṇāmadhiko viśeṣo jñānena hīnāḥ paśubhiḥ samānāḥ //
analyzed: jñānam narāṇām adhikaḥ viśeṣaḥ jñānena hīnāḥ paśubhiḥ samānāḥ

original: MSS_5701-1 āhāranirhāravihārayogāḥ susaṃvṛtā dharmavidā tu kāryāḥ /
analyzed: āhāra nirhāra vihāra yogāḥ su saṃvṛtāḥ dharma vidā tu kāryāḥ

original: MSS_5701-2 vāgbuddhikāryāṇi tapas tathaiva dhanāyuṣī guptatame tu kārye //
analyzed: vāc buddhi kāryāṇi tapaḥ tathā eva dhana āyuṣī guptatame tu kārye

original: MSS_5702-1 āhārapānatāmbūlagandhamālyaphalādayaḥ /
analyzed: āhāra pāna tāmbūla gandha mālya phala ādayaḥ

original: MSS_5702-2 bhujyante yat sa bhogaśca tanmataḥ sādhusattamaiḥ //
analyzed: bhujyante yat sa bhogaḥ ca tat mataḥ sādhu sattamaiḥ

original: MSS_5703-1 āhārabhojī kurute'numodaṃ naro vadhe sthāvarajaṅgamānām /
analyzed: āhāra bhojī naraḥ vadhe sthāvara jaṅgamānām

original: MSS_5703-2 tasyāpi tasmād duritānuṣaṅgam ityāha yas taṃ prati vacmi kiṃcit //
analyzed: tasya api tasmāt durita anuṣaṅgam iti āha yaḥ tam prati vacmi kiṃcid

original: MSS_5704-1 āhāravarge sulabhe vicitre vimuktapāpe bhuvi vidyamāne /
analyzed: āhāra varge sulabhe vicitre vimukta pāpe bhuvi vidyamāne

original: MSS_5704-2 prārambhaduḥkhaṃ vividhaṃ prapoṣya cedasti gṛddhirna kimatti māṃsam //
analyzed: prārambha duḥkham vividham prapoṣya ced asti gṛddhiḥ na kim atti māṃsam

original: MSS_5705-1 āhārāj jāyate vyādhir garbhāt krūraśca jāyate /
analyzed: āhārāt jāyate vyādhiḥ garbhāt krūraḥ ca jāyate

original: MSS_5705-2 alakṣmīkaśca śayyāyāṃ svapāṭhādāyuṣaḥ kṣayaḥ //
analyzed: alakṣmīkaḥ ca śayyāyām sva pāṭhāt āyuṣaḥ kṣayaḥ

original: MSS_5706-1 āhārārthaṃ karma kuryādanindyaṃ kuryāt taṃ ca prāṇasaṃdhāraṇārtham /
analyzed: āhāra artham karma kuryāt anindyam kuryāt tam ca prāṇa saṃdhāraṇa artham

original: MSS_5706-2 prāṇā dhāryās tattvavijñānahetos tattvaṃ jñeyaṃ yena bhūyo na janma //
analyzed: prāṇāḥ dhāryāḥ tattva vijñāna hetoḥ tattvam jñeyam yena bhūyas na janma

original: MSS_5707-1 āhāre ca bhaved rogī naṣṭo garbhaśca maithune /
analyzed: āhāre ca bhavet rogī naṣṭaḥ garbhaḥ ca maithune

original: MSS_5707-2 nidrāyāṃ hriyate lakṣmīś cintāyāṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvam //
analyzed: nidrāyām hriyate lakṣmīḥ cintāyām maraṇam dhruvam

original: MSS_5708-1 āhāre baḍavānalaśca śayane yaḥ kumbhakarṇāyate saṃdeśe badhiraḥ palāyanavidhau siṃhaḥ śṛgālo raṇe /
analyzed: āhāre baḍavānalaḥ ca śayane yaḥ kumbhakarṇāyate saṃdeśe badhiraḥ palāyana vidhau siṃhaḥ śṛgālaḥ raṇe

original: MSS_5708-2 andho vastunirīkṣaṇe'tha gamane khañjaḥ paṭuḥ krandane bhāgyenaiva hi labhyate punarasau sarvottamaḥ sevakaḥ //
analyzed: andhaḥ gamane khañjaḥ paṭuḥ krandane bhāgyena eva hi labhyate punar asau sarva uttamaḥ sevakaḥ

original: MSS_5709-1 āhāre viratiḥ samastaviṣayagrāme nivṛttiḥ parā nāsāgre nayanaṃ yadetadaparaṃ yaccaikatānaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: āhāre viratiḥ samasta viṣaya grāme nivṛttiḥ parā nāsā agre nayanam yat etat aparam yat ca ekatānam manaḥ

original: MSS_5709-2 maunaṃ cedamidaṃ ca śūnyamakhilaṃ yadviśvamābhāti te tad brūyāḥ sakhi yoginī kimasi bhoḥ kiṃ vā viyoginyasi //
analyzed: maunam ca idam idam ca śūnyam akhilam yat viśvam ābhāti te tat brūyāḥ sakhi yoginī kim asi bhoḥ kim vā viyoginī asi

original: MSS_5710-1 āhāre vyavahāre ca tyaktalajjaḥ sukhī bhavet /
analyzed: āhāre vyavahāre ca tyakta lajjaḥ sukhī bhavet

original: MSS_5710-2 dhanaṃ maitrīkaraṃ dāne cādāne śatrukāraṇam //
analyzed: dhanam maitrī karam dāne ca adāne śatru kāraṇam

original: MSS_5711-1 āhāre śucitā dhvanau madhuratā nīḍe parādhīnatā bandhau nirmamatā vane rasikatā vācālatā mādhave /
analyzed: āhāre śuci tā dhvanau madhura tā nīḍe para adhīna tā bandhau nirmama tā vane rasika tā vācāla tā mādhave

original: MSS_5711-2 yasaite guṇarāśayaḥ pikavaraṃ tyaktvā kimete janā vandante khalu khañjanaṃ kṛmibhujaṃ citrā gatiḥ karmaṇām //
analyzed: yasā ete guṇa rāśayaḥ pika varam tyaktvā kim ete janāḥ vandante khalu khañjanam kṛmibhujam citrā gatiḥ karmaṇām

original: MSS_5712-1 āhāro garalaṃ tṛtīyamalike cakṣuḥ kapālaṃ kare vāsaḥ kuñjaracarma bhasmani ratirbhūṣā bhujaṅgādhipaḥ /
analyzed: āhāraḥ garalam tṛtīyam alike cakṣuḥ kapālam kare vāsaḥ kuñjara carma bhasmani ratiḥ bhūṣā bhujaṅga adhipaḥ

original: MSS_5712-2 janmālakṣyamasākṣikaṃ kulamavijñātā ca jātiḥ kathaṃ sevyo'smābhirasau piśācapariṣadbhartā hatāḥ smo vayam //
analyzed: janma alakṣyam asākṣikam kulam avijñātā ca jātiḥ katham sevyaḥ usmābhiḥ asau piśāca pariṣad bhartā hatāḥ smaḥ vayam

original: MSS_5713-1 āhāro garalāyate pratidinaṃ hāro'pi bhārāyate candraścaṇḍakarāyate mṛdugatirvāto'pi vajrāyate /
analyzed: āhāraḥ garalāyate pratidinam hāraḥ api bhārāyate candraḥ caṇḍakarāyate mṛdu gatiḥ vātaḥ api vajrāyate

original: MSS_5713-2 āvāso vipināyate malayajālepaḥ sphuliṅgāyate hā hanta priyaviprayogasamayaḥ saṃhārakālāyate //
analyzed: āvāsaḥ vipināyate malaya jālepaḥ sphuliṅgāyate hā hanta priya viprayoga samayaḥ saṃhārakālāyate

original: MSS_5174-1 āhāro dviguṇaḥ strīṇāṃ buddhis tāsāṃ caturguṇā /
analyzed: āhāraḥ dviguṇaḥ strīṇām buddhiḥ tāsām caturguṇā

original: MSS_5174-2 ṣaḍguṇo vyavasāyaśca kāmāś cāṣṭaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: ṣaḍguṇaḥ vyavasāyaḥ ca kāmāḥ ca aṣṭaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_5715-1 āhitamuktāhāryaḥ samyak sakalaprayogasampattyā /
analyzed: āhita muktā hāryaḥ samyak sakala prayoga sampattyā

original: MSS_5715-2 bhāvavihīno'pi naṭaḥ sāmājikacittarañjanaṃ kurute //
analyzed: bhāva vihīnaḥ api naṭaḥ sāmājika citta rañjanam kurute

original: MSS_5716-1 āhite tava niḥśāne sphuṭitaṃ ripuhṛdghaṭaiḥ /
analyzed: āhite tava niḥśāne sphuṭitam ripu hṛd ghaṭaiḥ

original: MSS_5716-2 galite tatpriyānetre rājaṃś citramidaṃ mahat //
analyzed: galite tad priyā netre rājan citram idam mahat

original: MSS_5717-1 āhite nu madhunā madhuratve ceṣṭitasya gamite nu vikāsam /
analyzed: āhite nu madhunā madhura tve ceṣṭitasya gamite nu vikāsam

original: MSS_5717-2 ābabhau nava ivoddhatarāgaḥ kāminīṣvavasaraḥ kusumeṣoḥ //
analyzed: ābabhau navaḥ iva uddhata rāgaḥ kāminīṣu avasaraḥ kusumeṣoḥ

original: MSS_5718-1 āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ /
analyzed: āhuḥ satyam hi paramam dharmam dharma vidaḥ janāḥ

original: MSS_5719-1 āhuḥ sūkṣmataraṃ kiṃcid amātyaparirakṣaṇam /
analyzed: āhuḥ sūkṣmataram kiṃcid amātya parirakṣaṇam

original: MSS_5719-2 sūkṣmāt sūkṣmataraṃ tebhyo yadātmaparirakṣaṇam //
analyzed: sūkṣmāt sūkṣmataram tebhyaḥ yat ātma parirakṣaṇam

original: MSS_5720-1 āhutyāpyāyate sūryaḥ sūryād vṛṣṭirathauṣadhiḥ /
analyzed: āhutyā āpyāyate sūryaḥ sūryāt vṛṣṭiḥ atha auṣadhiḥ

original: MSS_5720-2 tadannaṃ rasarūpeṇa śukratvamadhigacchati //
analyzed: tat annam rasa rūpeṇa śukra tvam adhigacchati

original: MSS_5721-1 āhūtaḥ parito digantagatibhiḥ śākhābharāḍambaraiḥ kiṃ re jālma javena śālmaliphalapratyāśayā dhāvasi /
analyzed: āhūtaḥ paritas diganta gatibhiḥ śākhā bhara āḍambaraiḥ kim re jālma javena śālmali phala pratyāśayā dhāvasi

original: MSS_5721-2 tasminn ekapade bhidelimaphalavyālolatūlotkarair adhvāno'pi nimīlitākṣamaṭatā na prekṣaṇīyāḥ puraḥ //
analyzed: tasmin eka pade bhidā ilima phala vyālola tūla utkaraiḥ adhvānaḥ api nimīlita akṣamaṭatā na prekṣaṇīyāḥ puras

original: MSS_5722-1 āhūtasyābhiṣekāya nisṛṣṭasya vanāya ca /
analyzed: āhūtasya abhiṣekāya nisṛṣṭasya vanāya ca

original: MSS_5722-2 na mayā lakṣitas tasya svalpo'pyākāravibhramaḥ //
analyzed: na mayā lakṣitaḥ tasya su alpaḥ upi ākāra vibhramaḥ

original: MSS_5723-1 āhūtādya mayotsave niśi gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ vimucyāgatā kṣībaḥ preṣyajanaḥ kathaṃ kulabadhūrekākinī yāsyati /
analyzed: āhūtā adya mayā utsave niśi gṛham śūnyam vimucya āgatā kṣībaḥ preṣya janaḥ katham kula badhūḥ ekākinī yāsyati

original: MSS_5723-2 vatsa tvaṃ tadimāṃ nayālayamiti śrutvā yaśodāgiro rādhāmādhavayorjayanti madhurasmerālasā dṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: vatsa tvam tat imām naya ālayam iti śrutvā yaśodā giraḥ rādhā mādhavayoḥ jayanti madhura smera alasāḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: MSS_5724-1 āhūteṣu vihaṃgameṣu maśako nāyān puro vāryate madhyevāridhi vā vasaṃstṛṇamaṇirdhatte maṇīnāṃ rucam /
analyzed: āhūteṣu vihaṃgameṣu maśakaḥ puras vāryate madhyevāridhi vā vasan tṛṇamaṇiḥ dhatte maṇīnām rucam

original: MSS_5724-2 khadyoto'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye'pi tejasvināṃ dhik sāmānyamacetanaṃ prabhumivānāmṛṣṭatattvāntaram //
analyzed: khadyotaḥ api na kampate pracalitum madhye api tejasvinām dhik sāmānyam acetanam prabhum iva an āmṛṣṭa tattva antaram

original: MSS_5725-1 āhūto'pi sahāyair emītyuktvā vimuktanidro'pi /
analyzed: āhūtaḥ api sahāyaiḥ emi iti uktvā vimukta nidraḥ upi

original: MSS_5725-2 āgantuko'pi pathikaḥ śaithilyaṃ naiva vijahāti //
analyzed: āgantukaḥ api pathikaḥ śaithilyam nā eva vijahāti

original: MSS_5726-1 āhūto malayācalāt pracalito mauhurtiko māruto nediṣṭhāḥ pathi santi kokilagaṇā gīte pratiṣṭhābhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: āhūtaḥ malaya acalāt pracalitaḥ mauhurtikaḥ mārutaḥ nediṣṭhāḥ pathi santi kokila gaṇāḥ gīte pratiṣṭhā bhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_5726-2 āptābhiḥ prativeśinībhirabhitaḥ saṃtyajya kundālayaṃ soṣyantī sahakārasaṃtatiraliśreṇībhirāveṣṭyate //
analyzed: āptābhiḥ prativeśinībhiḥ abhitas saṃtyajya kunda ālayam soṣyantī sahakāra saṃtatiḥ ali śreṇībhiḥ āveṣṭyate

original: MSS_5727-1 āhūto vāpyanāhūto yo rājñāṃ dvāri tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: āhūtaḥ vā api an āhūtaḥ yaḥ rājñām dvāri tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_5727-2 sa vai rājyaśriyaṃ bhuṅkte nāvamānī kadācana //
analyzed: sa vai rājya śriyam bhuṅkte na avamānī kadācana

original: MSS_5728-1 āhūto hālikenāśrutamiva vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā kṣaṇaikaṃ tiṣṭhāsustabdharomā kathamapi viṭapaṃ niḥsamīraṃ vihāya /
analyzed: āhūtaḥ hālikena aśrutam iva vacanam tasya kṛtvā kṣaṇa ekam tiṣṭhāsuḥ tabdha romā katham api viṭapam niḥsamīram vihāya

original: MSS_5728-2 dorbhyāmāvṛtya vakṣaḥsthalamalasagatirdīnapādapracāraḥ śītkārotkampabhinnasphuṭadadharapuṭaḥ pāmaraḥ kṣetrameti //
analyzed: dorbhyām āvṛtya vakṣaḥ sthalam alasa gatiḥ dīna pāda pracāraḥ śītkāra utkampa bhinna sphuṭat adhara puṭaḥ pāmaraḥ kṣetram eti

original: MSS_5729-1 āhṛtābhyudyatāṃ bhikṣāṃ purastādapracoditām /
analyzed: āhṛta abhyudyatām bhikṣām purastāt a pracoditām

original: MSS_5729-2 mene prajāpatirgrāhyām api duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: mene prajāpatiḥ grāhyām api duṣkṛta karmaṇaḥ

original: MSS_5730-1 āhṛtya parityaktā janayantyarthāḥ sukhābhāsam /
analyzed: āhṛtya parityaktāḥ janayanti arthāḥ sukha ābhāsam

original: MSS_5730-2 atyantaparityaktāḥ paramānandāya kalpante //
analyzed: atyanta parityaktāḥ paramānandāya kalpante

original: MSS_5731-1 āhṛtya rakṣyamāṇāpi yatnenāntarvirāgiṇī /
analyzed: āhṛtya rakṣyamāṇā api yatnena antar virāgiṇī

original: MSS_5731-2 asanmaitrī ca veśyā ca śrīśca kasya kadā sthirā //
analyzed: asat maitrī ca veśyā ca śrīḥ ca kasya kadā sthirā

original: MSS_5732-1 āhnikottāpadagdhānāṃ trayāṇāṃ jagatāṃ bata /
analyzed: āhnika uttāpa dagdhānām trayāṇām jagatām bata

original: MSS_5732-2 tapanārciṣi śānte tad bhasmedaṃ timiraṃ tu na //
analyzed: tapana arciṣi śānte tat bhasma idam timiram tu na

original: MSS_5733-1 āhlādayatveṣa kharairnakhāgrair daiteyavakṣaḥkhanimutkhanan vaḥ /
analyzed: āhlādayatu eṣa kharaiḥ nakha agraiḥ daiteya vakṣaḥ khanim utkhanan vaḥ

original: MSS_5733-2 prahlādahṛdyaṃ hṛdaye dvitīyam anveṣṭumicchanniva sūnuratnam //
analyzed: prahlāda hṛdyam hṛdaye dvitīyam anveṣṭum icchan iva sūnu ratnam

original: MSS_5734-1 āhlādahetuniravadyaśarīrayaṣṭi- lāvaṇyakāntikaluṣīkaraṇena tāsām /
analyzed: āhlāda hetu niravadya śarīra yaṣṭi lāvaṇya kānti kaluṣīkaraṇena tāsām

original: MSS_5734-2 āsīt kuśeśayadṛśāmayathārthataiva paryastabhāsvararucāmapi bhūṣaṇānām //
analyzed: āsīt kuśeśaya dṛśām ayathārtha tā eva paryasta bhāsvara rucām api bhūṣaṇānām

original: MSS_5735-1 āhvānaṃ kiṃ bhavati hi taroḥ kasyacit praśnavijñāḥ prāyaḥ kāryaṃ kimapi na kalau kurvate ke pareṣām /
analyzed: āhvānam kim bhavati hi taroḥ kasyacid praśna vijñāḥ prāyas kāryam kim api na kalau kurvate ke pareṣām

original: MSS_5735-2 pūrṇaṃ candraṃ vahati nanu kā pṛcchati mlānacakṣuḥ kenodanyājanitamasamaṃ kaṣṭamāpnoti lokaḥ //
analyzed: pūrṇam candram vahati nanu kā pṛcchati mlāna cakṣuḥ kena udanyā janitam asamam kaṣṭam āpnoti lokaḥ

original: MSS_5736-1 ikṣukṣīraguḍādīnāṃ mādhuryasyāntaraṃ mahat /
analyzed: ikṣu kṣīra guḍa ādīnām mādhuryasya antaram mahat

original: MSS_5736-2 tathāpi na tadākhyātuṃ sarasvatyāpi śakyate //
analyzed: tathā api na tat ākhyātum sarasvatyā api śakyate

original: MSS_5737-1 ikṣutvakkṣodasārāḥ śakaṭasaraṇayo dhīradhūlīpatākāḥ pākasvīkāranamre śirasi niviśate śūkaśāleḥ śukālī /
analyzed: ikṣu tvac kṣoda sārāḥ śakaṭa saraṇayaḥ dhīra dhūlī patākāḥ pāka svīkāra namre śirasi niviśate śūkaśāleḥ śuka ālī

original: MSS_5737-2 kedārebhyaḥ praṇālaiḥ praviśati śapharīpaṅktirādhāramārād acchaḥ kaccheṣu paṅkaḥ sukhayati saritāmātapādukṣapālam //
analyzed: kedārebhyaḥ praṇālaiḥ praviśati śapharī paṅktiḥ ādhāram ārāt acchas kaccheṣu paṅkaḥ sukhayati saritām ātapāt ukṣapālam

original: MSS_5738-1 ikṣudaṇdāstilāḥ śūdrāḥ kāntā hema ca medinī /
analyzed: ikṣu daṇdāḥ tilāḥ śūdrāḥ kāntāḥ hema ca medinī

original: MSS_5738-2 candanaṃ dadhi tāmbūlaṃ mardanaṃ guṇavardhanam //
analyzed: candanam dadhi tāmbūlam mardanam guṇa vardhanam

original: MSS_5739-1 ikṣurāpaḥ payo mūlaṃ tāmbūlaṃ phalamauṣadham /
analyzed: ikṣuḥ āpaḥ payaḥ mūlam tāmbūlam phalam auṣadham

original: MSS_5739-2 bhakṣayitvāpi kartavyāḥ snānadānādikāḥ kriyāḥ //
analyzed: bhakṣayitvā api kartavyāḥ snāna dāna ādikāḥ kriyāḥ

original: MSS_5740-1 ikṣurdhanva śarāḥ prasūnavitatirbhṛṅgāvalī siñjinī yasyājñāvaśavartinaḥ pramanaso nirviṣṭarāṣṭrādayaḥ /
analyzed: ikṣuḥ dhanva śarāḥ prasūna vitatiḥ bhṛṅga āvalī siñjinī yasya ājñā vaśa vartinaḥ pramanasaḥ nirviṣṭa rāṣṭra ādayaḥ

original: MSS_5740-2 yadbāṇābhihatā virañcimurajinmṛtyuṃjayendrādayo vyāptāśeṣamukhā iva tribhuvanaṃ pāyādajeyaḥ smaraḥ //
analyzed: yad bāṇa abhihatāḥ virañci murajit mṛtyuṃjaya indra ādayaḥ vyāpta aśeṣa mukhāḥ iva tribhuvanam pāyāt ajeyaḥ smaraḥ

original: MSS_5741-1 ikṣurnadīpravāho dyūtaṃ mānagrahaśca he sutanu /
analyzed: ikṣuḥ nadī pravāhaḥ dyūtam māna grahaḥ ca he su tanu

original: MSS_5741-2 bhrūlatikā ca taveyaṃ bhaṅge rasamadhikamāvahati //
analyzed: bhrū latikā ca tava iyam bhaṅge rasam adhikam āvahati

original: MSS_5742-1 ikṣoragrāt kramaśaḥ parvaṇi parvaṇi yathā rasaviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: ikṣoḥ agrāt kramaśas parvaṇi parvaṇi yathā rasa viśeṣaḥ

original: MSS_5742-2 tadvat sajjanamaitrī viparītānāṃ tu viparītā //
analyzed: tadvat sat jana maitrī viparītānām tu viparītā

original: MSS_5742A-1 ikṣo rasaṃ yathādāya kūrcakas tyajyate janaiḥ /
analyzed: ikṣoḥ rasam yathā ādāya kūrcakaḥ tyajyate janaiḥ

original: MSS_5742A-2 dharmasāraṃ tathādāya dehaṃ tyajati paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: dharma sāram tathā ādāya deham tyajati paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_5743-1 ikṣorvikārā matayaḥ kavīnāṃ gavāṃ raso bālakaceṣṭitāni /
analyzed: ikṣoḥ vikārāḥ matayaḥ kavīnām gavām rasaḥ bālaka ceṣṭitāni

original: MSS_5743-2 tāmbūlamagryaṃ yuvateḥ kaṭākṣā etānyaho śakra na santi nāke //
analyzed: tāmbūlam agryam yuvateḥ kaṭākṣāḥ etāni aho śakra na santi nāke

original: MSS_5744-1 iṅgālasaptārciriva jvalitvā sarvaṃ dinaṃ caṇḍaruciḥ śaśāma /
analyzed: iṅgāla saptārciḥ iva jvalitvā sarvam dinam caṇḍa ruciḥ śaśāma

original: MSS_5744-2 tadīyabhasmeva nabhohasantī vibhrājamānaṃ tuhināṃśubimbam //
analyzed: tadīya bhasma iva nabhaḥ hasantī vibhrājamānam tuhināṃśu bimbam

original: MSS_5745-1 iṅgitajñās tu magadhāḥ prekṣitajñās tu kosalāḥ /
analyzed: iṅgita jñāḥ tu magadhāḥ prekṣita jñāḥ tu kosalāḥ

original: MSS_5745-2 ardhoktāḥ kurupāñcālāḥ sarvoktā dakṣiṇāpathāḥ //
analyzed: ardha uktāḥ kuru pāñcālāḥ sarva uktāḥ dakṣiṇāpathāḥ

original: MSS_5746-1 iṅgitākāraceṣṭābhiḥ paracittapravedinaḥ /
analyzed: iṅgita ākāra ceṣṭābhiḥ para citta pravedinaḥ

original: MSS_5746-2 āptāḥ suśīghragā dūtā vāgmino mitabhāṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: āptāḥ su śīghra gāḥ dūtāḥ vāgminaḥ mita bhāṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_5747-1 iṅgitākāratattvajña ūhāpohaviśāradaḥ /
MSS_5747-2 śūraśca kṛtavidyaśca na ca mānī vimatsaraḥ //
analyzed: śūraḥ ca kṛta vidyaḥ ca na ca mānī vimatsaraḥ

original: MSS_5748-1 iṅgitākāratattvajño balavān priyadarśanaḥ /
analyzed: iṅgita ākāra tattva jñaḥ balavān priya darśanaḥ

original: MSS_5748-2 apramādī sadā dakṣaḥ pratīhāraḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: apramādī sadā dakṣaḥ pratīhāraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: MSS_5749-1 iṅgitena nijarāganīradhiṃ saṃvibhāvya caṭubhirguṇajñatām /
analyzed: iṅgitena nija rāga nīradhim saṃvibhāvya caṭubhiḥ guṇa jña tām

original: MSS_5749-2 bhaktatāṃ ca paricaryayāniśaṃ sādhikādhikavaśaṃ vyadhatta tam //
analyzed: bhakta tām ca paricaryayā aniśam sādhika adhika vaśam vyadhatta tam

original: MSS_5750-1 icchatāṃ saha vadhūbhirabhedaṃ yāminīvirahiṇāṃ vihagānām /
analyzed: icchatām saha vadhūbhiḥ abhedam yāminī virahiṇām vihagānām

original: MSS_5750-2 āpureva mithunāni viyogaṃ laṅghyate na khalu kālaniyogaḥ //
analyzed: āpuḥ eva mithunāni viyogam laṅghyate na khalu kāla niyogaḥ

original: MSS_5751-1 icchati mānī maraṇaṃ na ca gacchati vairiṇaḥ śaraṇam /
analyzed: icchati mānī maraṇam na ca gacchati vairiṇaḥ śaraṇam

original: MSS_5751-2 mānakṣaraṇaṃ maraṇaṃ mānaprāṇasya kevalaṃ kṛtinaḥ //
analyzed: māna kṣaraṇam maraṇam māna prāṇasya kevalam kṛtinaḥ

original: MSS_5752-1 icchati śatī sahasraṃ sasahasraḥ koṭimīhate kartum /
analyzed: icchati śatī sahasram sa sahasraḥ koṭim īhate kartum

original: MSS_5752-2 koṭiyuto'pi nṛpatvaṃ nṛpo'pi bata cakravartitvam //
analyzed: koṭi yutaḥ api nṛpa tvam nṛpaḥ api bata cakravarti tvam

original: MSS_5753-1 icchati śatī sahasraṃ sahasrī lakṣamīhate /
analyzed: icchati śatī sahasram sahasrī lakṣam īhate

original: MSS_5753-2 lakṣādhipas tato rājyaṃ rājyācca svargamīhate //
analyzed: lakṣādhipaḥ tatas rājyam rājyāt ca svargam īhate

original: MSS_5754-1 icchanti kecin narakeṣu vāsaṃ necchanti kecin narakeṣu vāsam /
analyzed: icchanti kecid narakeṣu vāsam na icchanti kecid narakeṣu vāsam

original: MSS_5754-2 śreyo hi tasmān narakaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ na garbhavāsāt paramaṃ hi duḥkham //
analyzed: śreyaḥ hi tasmāt narakam viśiṣṭam na garbha vāsāt paramam hi duḥkham

original: MSS_5755-1 icchantyabhīkṣṇaṃ kṣayamātmano'pi na jñātayas tulyakulasya lakṣmīm /
analyzed: icchanti abhīkṣṇam kṣayam ātmanaḥ api na jñātayaḥ tulya kulasya lakṣmīm

original: MSS_5755-2 namanti śatrūn na ca bandhuvṛddhiṃ saṃtapyamānairhṛdayaiḥ sahante //
analyzed: namanti śatrūn na ca bandhu vṛddhim saṃtapyamānaiḥ hṛdayaiḥ sahante

original: MSS_5756-1 icchāṃ sundarapāṇḍya unnatimatiṃ bibhrat svayā saṃjñayā niṣpādyābhyavahāravārayugalaṃ niṣkampasaṃpattikam /
analyzed: icchām sundara pāṇḍyaḥ unnati matim bibhrat svayā saṃjñayā niṣpādya abhyavahāra vāra yugalam niṣkampa saṃpattikam

original: MSS_5756-2 saṃpūrṇaṃ vidadhe gabhīramudaraṃ raṅgeśituḥ śārṅgiṇo yasyābhūd bhuvanaiś caturdaśabhirapyāpūraṇaṃ durlabham //
analyzed: saṃpūrṇam vidadhe gabhīram udaram raṅga īśituḥ śārṅgiṇaḥ yasya abhūt bhuvanaiḥ caturdaśabhiḥ api āpūraṇam durlabham

original: MSS_5757-1 icchec ced vipulāṃ maitrīṃ trīṇi tatra na kārayet /
analyzed: icchet ced vipulām maitrīm trīṇi tatra na kārayet

original: MSS_5757-2 vāgvādamarthasaṃbandhaṃ tatpatnīparibhāṣaṇam //
analyzed: vāgvādam artha saṃbandham tad patnī paribhāṣaṇam

original: MSS_5758-1 icchet paramanusartuṃ pratimāsaṃdarśanena viśadaruciḥ /
analyzed: icchet param anusartum pratimā saṃdarśanena viśada ruciḥ

original: MSS_5758-2 anavāpya yenayogaṃ bhavato hṛdayeparaṃ nidhīyeta //
analyzed: an avāpya yena yogam bhavataḥ hṛdaye param nidhīyeta

original: MSS_5759-1 icched yas tu sukhaṃ nivastumavanau gacchet sa rājñaḥ sabhāṃ kalyāṇīṃ girameva saṃsadi vadet kāryaṃ vidadhyāt kṛtī /
analyzed: icchet yaḥ tu sukham nivastum avanau gacchet sa rājñaḥ sabhām kalyāṇīm giram eva saṃsadi vadet kāryam vidadhyāt kṛtī

original: MSS_5759-2 akleśād dhanamarjayedadhipaterāvarjayed vallabhān kurvītopakṛtiṃ janasya janayet kasyāpi nāpakriyām //
analyzed: akleśāt dhanam arjayet adhipateḥ āvarjayet vallabhān kurvīta upakṛtim janasya janayet kasya api nā apakriyām

original: MSS_5760-1 ijyācāradamāhiṃsādānasvādhyāyakarmaṇām /
analyzed: ijyā ācāra dama ahiṃsā dāna svādhyāya karmaṇām

original: MSS_5760-2 ayaṃ tu paramo dharmo yad yogenātmadarśanam //
analyzed: ayam tu paramaḥ dharmaḥ yat yogena ātma darśanam

original: MSS_5761-1 ijyādhyayanadānāni tapaḥ satyaṃ dhṛtiḥ kṣamā /
analyzed: ijyā adhyayana dānāni tapaḥ satyam dhṛtiḥ kṣamā

original: MSS_5761-2 alobha iti mārgo'yaṃ dharmasyāṣṭavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: alobhaḥ iti mārgaḥ yam dharmasya aṣṭavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_5762-1 tatra pūrvaś caturvargo dambhārthamapi sevyate /
analyzed: tatra pūrvaḥ caturvargaḥ dambha artham api sevyate

original: MSS_5762-2 uttaras tu caturvargo mahātmanyeva tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: uttaraḥ tu caturvargaḥ mahātmani eva tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_5763-1 iḍayā saṃcaran vāyuḥ saumye kārye śubhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: iḍayā saṃcaran vāyuḥ saumye kārye śubhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_5763-2 piṅgalāyāṃ tathā dīpte dvayoḥ kvāpi na śobhanaḥ //
analyzed: piṅgalāyām tathā dīpte dvayoḥ kvāpi na śobhanaḥ

original: MSS_5764-1 iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca sarasvatī /
analyzed: iḍā ca piṅgalā ca eva suṣumṇā ca sarasvatī

original: MSS_5764-2 gāndhārī hastijihvā ca pūṣā caiva nigadyate //
analyzed: gāndhārī hastijihvā ca pūṣā ca eva nigadyate

original: MSS_5765-1 alambuṣā kuhūścaiva śaṅkhinī daśamī matā /
analyzed: alambuṣā kuhūḥ ca eva śaṅkhinī daśamī matā

original: MSS_5765-2 etāḥ prāṇavahā jñeyāḥ pradhānā daśa nāḍikāḥ //
analyzed: etāḥ prāṇa vahāḥ jñeyāḥ pradhānāḥ daśa nāḍikāḥ

original: MSS_5766-1 iḍā nāsāpuṭe vāme piṅgalā dakṣiṇe bhavet /
analyzed: iḍā nāsāpuṭe vāme piṅgalā dakṣiṇe bhavet

original: MSS_5766-2 suṣumṇā tālu bhittvaiva brahmadvāraṃ pravartitā //
analyzed: suṣumṇā tālu bhittvā eva brahmadvāram pravartitā

original: MSS_5767-1 iḍāyāṃ yadi bhūmyambutattve pravahatas tadā /
MSS_5767-2 sthirasaumyādikāryāṇām ārambhaḥ siddhikṛd bhavet //
analyzed: sthira saumya ādi kāryāṇām ārambhaḥ siddhi kṛt bhavet

original: MSS_5768-1 iḍā somasya nāḍī syāt piṅgalā sūryanāḍikā /
analyzed: iḍā somasya nāḍī syāt piṅgalā sūryanāḍikā

original: MSS_5768-2 iḍā saumyā bhavet vāmā piṅgalogrā ca dakṣiṇā //
analyzed: iḍā saumyā bhavet vāmā piṅgalā ugrā ca dakṣiṇā

original: MSS_5769-1 itaḥ kākānīkaṃ pratibhayamitaḥ kauśikarutād ito gṛdhravyūhaḥ kulamidamitaḥ kaṅkavayasām /
analyzed: itas kāka anīkam pratibhayam itas kauśika rutāt itas gṛdhra vyūhaḥ kulam idam itas kaṅka vayasām

original: MSS_5769-2 śmaśānāvasthe'sminnakhilaguṇavandhye hatamarāv api dvitrāḥ kecin na khalu kalavācaḥ śakunayaḥ //
analyzed: śmaśāna avasthe ismin akhila guṇa vandhye hatamarau api dvitrāḥ kecid na khalu kala vācaḥ śakunayaḥ

original: MSS_5770-1 itaḥ kekī nādais tudati śatakoṭipratibhaṭair itaḥ kāmaḥ kāmaṃ kaṭhinatarabāṇaiḥ praharati /
analyzed: itas kekī nādaiḥ tudati śata koṭi pratibhaṭaiḥ itas kāmaḥ kāmam kaṭhinatara bāṇaiḥ praharati

original: MSS_5770-2 ito garjatyuccairjaladharagaṇo bhīmaninadair vinā nāthaṃ jāne na sakhi bhavitā kiṃ nanu mama //
analyzed: itas garjati uccais jaladhara gaṇaḥ bhīma ninadaiḥ vinā nātham jāne na sakhi bhavitā kim nanu mama

original: MSS_5771-1 itaḥ krodho gṛdhraḥ prakaṭayati pakṣaṃ nijamitaḥ sṛgālī tṛṣṇeyaṃ vivṛtavadanā dhāvati puraḥ /
analyzed: itas krodhaḥ gṛdhraḥ prakaṭayati pakṣam nijam itas sṛgālī tṛṣṇā iyam vivṛta vadanā dhāvati puras

original: MSS_5771-2 itaḥ krūraḥ kāmo vicarati piśācaś ciramaho śmaśānaṃ saṃsāraḥ ka iha patitaḥ sthāsyati sukham //
analyzed: itas krūraḥ kāmaḥ vicarati piśācaḥ ciram aho śmaśānam saṃsāraḥ kaḥ iha patitaḥ sthāsyati sukham

original: MSS_5772-1 itaḥ parānarbhakahāryaśastrān vaidarbhi paśyānumatā mayāsi /
analyzed: itas parān arbhaka hārya śastrān vaidarbhi paśya anumatā mayā asi

original: MSS_5772-2 evaṃvidhenāhavaceṣṭitena tvaṃ prārthyase hastagatā mamaibhiḥ //
analyzed: evaṃvidhena āhava ceṣṭitena tvam prārthyase hasta gatā mama ebhiḥ

original: MSS_5773-1 itaḥ paurastyāyāṃ kakubhi vivṛṇoti kramadalat- tamisrāmarmāṇaṃ kiraṇakaṇikāmambaramaṇiḥ /
analyzed: itas paurastyāyām kakubhi vivṛṇoti kramadalat tamisrā marmāṇam kiraṇa kaṇikām ambaramaṇiḥ

original: MSS_5773-2 ito niṣkrāmantī navaratiguroḥ proñchati vadhūḥ svakastūrīpatrāṅkuramakarikāmudritamuraḥ //
analyzed: itas niṣkrāmantī nava rati guroḥ proñchati vadhūḥ sva kastūrī patra aṅkura makarikā mudritam uraḥ

original: MSS_5774-1 itaḥ pratyādeśāt svajanamanugantuṃ vyavasitā muhus tiṣṭhetyuccairvadati guruśiṣye gurusame /
analyzed: itas pratyādeśāt sva janam anugantum vyavasitā muhur tiṣṭha iti uccais vadati guru śiṣye guru same

original: MSS_5774-2 punardṛṣṭiṃ bāṣpaprasarakaluṣāmarpitavatī mayi krūre yat tat saviṣamiva śalyaṃ dahati mām //
analyzed: punar dṛṣṭim bāṣpa prasara kaluṣām arpitavatī mayi krūre yat tat sa viṣam iva śalyam dahati mām

original: MSS_5775-1 itaḥ prāleyāṃśuḥ pralayamakarot kairavakula- klamacchedotsekaiḥ kiraṇanikaraireṣa tamasām /
analyzed: itas prāleya aṃśuḥ pralayam akarot kairava kula klama cheda utsekaiḥ kiraṇa nikaraiḥ eṣa tamasām

original: MSS_5775-2 ito'pyājñāvajñāṃ sakhi na sahate duḥsahatara- pratāpaḥ pañceṣus tadiha śaraṇaṃ sāhasarasaḥ //
analyzed: itas upi ājñā avajñām sakhi na sahate duḥsahatara pratāpaḥ pañca iṣuḥ tat iha śaraṇam sāhasa rasaḥ

original: MSS_5776-1 itaḥ śuklā candradyutibhiriha raktāruṇakarais tamisrairapyantaḥskhalitagatibhirmecakaruciḥ /
analyzed: itas śuklā candra dyutibhiḥ iha rakta aruṇa karaiḥ tamisraiḥ api antar skhalita gatibhiḥ mecaka ruciḥ

original: MSS_5776-2 prabhātaśrīreṣā vilasati purasthā sukṛtināṃ mimaṅkṣūṇāṃ jahnudyumaṇividhijāsaṃgama iva //
analyzed: prabhāta śrīḥ eṣā vilasati pura sthā su kṛtinām mimaṅkṣūṇām jahnu dyu maṇi vidhi jā saṃgamaḥ iva

original: MSS_5777-1 itaḥ śociḥ prācyāṃ diśi diśati bhānoraruṇatām ito bhṛṅgaḥ kūjannabhikamalinīṃ proccalati ca /
analyzed: itas śociḥ prācyām diśi diśati bhānoḥ aruṇa tām itas bhṛṅgaḥ kūjan abhi kamalinīm proccalati ca

original: MSS_5777-2 ito niryāntyuccairvihitasurataklāntiśithila- skhalatpādanyāsakṣaṇaraṇitamañjīramabalāḥ //
analyzed: itas niryānti uccais vihita surata klānti śithila skhalat pādanyāsa kṣaṇa raṇita mañjīram abalāḥ

original: MSS_5778-1 itaḥ sa daityaḥ prāptaśrīr neta evārhati kṣayam /
analyzed: itas sa daityaḥ prāpta śrīḥ na itas eva arhati kṣayam

original: MSS_5778-2 viṣavṛkṣo'pi saṃvardhya svayaṃ chettumasāṃpratam //
analyzed: viṣa vṛkṣaḥ api saṃvardhya svayam chettum asāṃpratam

original: MSS_5779-1 itaḥ svapiti keśavaḥ kulamitas tadīyadviṣām itaś ca śaraṇārthinaḥ śikharipatriṇaḥ śerate /
analyzed: itas svapiti keśavaḥ kulam itas tadīya dviṣām itas ca śaraṇa arthinaḥ śikhari patriṇaḥ śerate

original: MSS_5779-2 ito'pi vaḍavānalaḥ saha samastasaṃvartakair aho vitatamūrjitaṃ bharasahaṃ ca sindhorvapuḥ //
analyzed: itas api vaḍavānalaḥ saha samasta saṃvartakaiḥ aho vitatam ūrjitam bhara saham ca sindhoḥ vapuḥ

original: MSS_5780-1 itaradeva bahirmukhamucyate hṛdi tu yat sphuratītaradeva tat/
analyzed: itarat eva bahirmukham ucyate hṛdi tu yat sphurati itarat eva tat

original: MSS_5780-2 caritametadadhīravitārakaṃ dhuri payaḥpratibimbamivāsatām //
analyzed: caritam etat adhīra vitārakam dhuri payaḥ pratibimbam iva āsatām

original: MSS_5781-1 itarapāpaphalāni yathecchayā vitara tāni sahe caturānana /
analyzed: itara pāpa phalāni yathā icchayā vitara tāni sahe caturānana

original: MSS_5781-2 arasikeṣu kavitvanivedanaṃ śirasi mā likha mā likha mā likha //
analyzed: arasikeṣu kavi tva nivedanam śirasi mā likha mā likha mā likha

original: MSS_5782-1 itarabhajanaghanarasataḥ phalaniṣpattirnavā bhavediti na /
analyzed: itara bhajana ghana rasataḥ phala niṣpattiḥ navā bhavet iti na

original: MSS_5782-2 muktāḥ paraṃ tu loke svātighanarasaṃ vinā na jāyeran //
analyzed: muktāḥ param tu loke svāti ghana rasam vinā na jāyeran

original: MSS_5783-1 itarāṇyapi rakṣāṃsi peturvānarakoṭiṣu /
analyzed: itarāṇi api rakṣāṃsi petuḥ vānara koṭiṣu

original: MSS_5783-2 rajāṃsi samarotthāni tacchoṇitanadīṣviva //
analyzed: rajāṃsi samara utthāni tad śoṇita nadīṣu iva

original: MSS_5784-1 itarāścārthamicchanti rūpamicchanti dārikāḥ /
analyzed: itarāḥ ca artham icchanti rūpam icchanti dārikāḥ

original: MSS_5784-2 jñātayaḥ kulamicchanti svargamicchanti tāpasāḥ //
analyzed: jñātayaḥ kulam icchanti svargam icchanti tāpasāḥ

original: MSS_5785-1 itaretarayantritoruyugmaṃ kaṭhinorustanapīḍitābhirāmam /
analyzed: itaretara yantrita ūru yugmam kaṭhina ūru stana pīḍita abhirāmam

original: MSS_5785-2 bhujamūlaśayānugaṇḍamūlaṃ mithunaṃ syūtamivābhavan niśāyām //
analyzed: bhujamūla śaya anu gaṇḍa mūlam mithunam syūtam iva abhavat niśāyām

original: MSS_5786-1 itaropāyaduḥsādhye caṇḍadaṇḍo mahīpatiḥ /
analyzed: itara upāya duḥsādhye caṇḍa daṇḍaḥ mahīpatiḥ

original: MSS_5786-2 aduṣṭāyatyasau nīter aśnāti vipulaṃ phalam //
analyzed: aduṣṭa āyati asau nīteḥ aśnāti vipulam phalam

original: MSS_5787-1 itaścañcaccūtacyutamadhucayā vānti caturāḥ samīrāḥ saṃtoṣaṃ diśi diśi diśanto madhulihām /
analyzed: itas cañcat cūta cyuta madhu cayāḥ vānti caturāḥ samīrāḥ saṃtoṣam diśi diśi diśantaḥ madhulihām

original: MSS_5787-2 niśānte kāntānāṃ smarasamarakeliśramamuṣo vijṛmbhante jṛmbhākalitakamalāmodasuhṛdaḥ //
analyzed: niśā ante kāntānām smara samara keli śrama muṣaḥ vijṛmbhante jṛmbhā kalita kamala āmoda suhṛdaḥ

original: MSS_5788-1 itaścandraḥ sāndraḥ smaramayavayaḥsaṃdhimadhuraḥ sphuranmugdhākelismitamiva mayūkhaiḥ sukhayati /
analyzed: itas candraḥ sāndraḥ smara maya vayaḥsaṃdhi madhuraḥ sphurat mugdhā keli smitam iva mayūkhaiḥ sukhayati

original: MSS_5788-2 cakorāṇāṃ cakraṃ kumudasamudāyo'pi ca śaran- niśārambhe'muṣmin samasamayamantarvikasati //
analyzed: cakorāṇām cakram kumuda samudāyaḥ api ca śarad niśā ārambha imuṣmin sama samayam antar vikasati

original: MSS_5789-1 itaścetaścādbhirvighaṭitataṭaḥ seturudare dharitrī durlaṅghyā bahulahimapaṅko girirayam /
analyzed: itas ca itas ca adbhiḥ vighaṭita taṭaḥ setuḥ udare dharitrī durlaṅghyā bahula hima paṅkaḥ giriḥ ayam

original: MSS_5789-2 idānīṃ nirvṛtte karituraganīrājanavidhau na jāne yātāras tava ca ripavaḥ kena ca pathā //
analyzed: idānīm nirvṛtte kari turaga nīrājana vidhau na jāne yātāraḥ tava ca ripavaḥ kena ca pathā

original: MSS_5790-1 itastataś caṅkramaṇo rajobhiḥ krīḍanmanomattamataṅgajo'yam /
analyzed: itas tatas caṅkramaṇaḥ rajobhiḥ krīḍat manaḥ matta mataṅga jaḥ yam

original: MSS_5790-2 yaḥ sarvadā pippalabhogatuṣṭas tacchāntaye tvaṃ harimāśrayasva //
analyzed: yaḥ sarvadā pippala bhoga tuṣṭaḥ tad śāntaye tvam harim āśrayasva

original: MSS_5791-1 itastato bhaṣan bhūri na patet piśunaḥ śunaḥ /
analyzed: itas tatas bhaṣan bhūri na patet piśunaḥ śunaḥ

original: MSS_5791-2 avadātatayā kiṃ ca na bhedo haṃsataḥ sataḥ //
analyzed: avadāta tayā kim ca na bhedaḥ haṃsataḥ sataḥ

original: MSS_5792-1 itastato vātavidhūticañcalair nīrandhritāśāgaganairdhvajāṃśukaiḥ /
analyzed: itas tatas vāta vidhūti cañcalaiḥ nīrandhrita āśā gaganaiḥ dhvaja aṃśukaiḥ

original: MSS_5792-2 lakṣaiḥ kvaṇatkāñcanakiṅkiṇīkulair amajji dhūlījaladhau nabhogate //
analyzed: lakṣaiḥ kvaṇat kāñcana kiṅkiṇī kulaiḥ amajji dhūlī jaladhau nabhaḥ gate

original: MSS_5793-1 itastato vānti viśiṣya yasyāṃ vātāḥ śakṛdveśmavihāravisrāḥ /
analyzed: itas tatas vānti viśiṣya yasyām vātāḥ śakṛt veśma vihāra visrāḥ

original: MSS_5793-2 sā varṇyate rauravarājadhānī kena pratolī manasāpyagamyā //
analyzed: sā varṇyate raurava rājadhānī kena pratolī manasā api agamyā

original: MSS_5794-1 itastato'smin vilasanti meroḥ samānavapre maṇisānurāgāḥ /
analyzed: itas tatas asmin vilasanti meroḥ samāna vapre maṇi sānu rāgāḥ

original: MSS_5794-2 striyaśca patyau surasundarībhiḥ samā navapremaṇi sānurāgāḥ //
analyzed: striyaḥ ca patyau sura sundarībhiḥ samāḥ nava premaṇi sa anurāgāḥ

original: MSS_5795-1 itastāvan netre valaya malayādre nidhirapām apārastvatpādapraṇayaparatantro nivasati /
analyzed: itas tāvat netre valaya malaya adre nidhiḥ apām apāraḥ tvad pāda praṇaya paratantraḥ nivasati

original: MSS_5795-2 athātmānaṃ kiṃ na smarasi kulaśailaṃ kimayaśaḥ- patākā sarpaughaiḥ pratiśikhariśākhāsu vahasi //
analyzed: atha ātmānam kim na smarasi kula śailam kim ayaśaḥ patākā sarpa oghaiḥ prati śikhari śākhāsu vahasi

original: MSS_5796-1 itas trasadvidrutabhūbhṛdujjhitā priyātha dṛṣṭā vanamānavījanaiḥ /
analyzed: itas trasat vidruta bhūbhṛt ujjhitā priyā atha dṛṣṭā vana māna vījanaiḥ

original: MSS_5796-2 śaśaṃsa pṛṣṭādbhutamātmadeśajaṃ śaśitviṣaḥ śītalaśīlatāṃ kila //
analyzed: śaśaṃsa pṛṣṭa adbhutam ātma deśa jam śaśi tviṣaḥ śītala śīla tām kila

original: MSS_5797-1 iti kṛtavacanāyāḥ kaścidabhyetya bibhyad galitanayanavāreryāti pādāvanāmam /
analyzed: iti kṛta vacanāyāḥ kaścid abhyetya bibhyat galita nayana vāreḥ yāti

original: MSS_5797-2 karuṇamapi samarthaṃ mānināṃ mānabhede ruditamuditamastraṃ yoṣitāṃ vigraheṣu //
analyzed: karuṇam api samartham māninām mānabhede ruditam uditam astram yoṣitām vigraheṣu

original: MSS_5798-1 iti kṣitīśo navatiṃ navādhikāṃ mahākratūnāṃ mahanīyaśāsanaḥ /
analyzed: iti kṣitīśaḥ navatim nava adhikām mahā kratūnām mahanīya śāsanaḥ

original: MSS_5798-2 samārurukṣurdivamāyuṣaḥ kṣaye tatāna sopānaparaṃparāmiva //
analyzed: samārurukṣuḥ divam āyuṣaḥ kṣaye tatāna sopāna paraṃparām iva

original: MSS_5799-1 iti gadantamanantaramaṅganā bhujayugonnamanoccatarastanī /
analyzed: iti gadantam anantaram aṅganā bhuja yuga unnamana uccatara stanī

original: MSS_5799-2 praṇayinaṃ rabhasādudaraśriyā valibhayālibhayādiva sasvaje //
analyzed: praṇayinam rabhasāt udara śriyā vali bhaya ali bhayāt iva sasvaje

original: MSS_5800-1 iti gaditavatī ruṣā jaghāna sphuritamanoramapakṣmakeśareṇa /
analyzed: iti gaditavatī ruṣā jaghāna sphurita manorama pakṣma keśareṇa

original: MSS_5800-2 śravaṇaniyamitena kāntamanyā samamasitāmburuheṇa cakṣuṣā ca //
analyzed: śravaṇa niyamitena kānta manyā samam asita amburuheṇa cakṣuṣā ca

original: MSS_5801-1 iti gantumicchumabhidhāya puraḥ kṣaṇadṛṣṭipātavikasadvadanām /
analyzed: iti gantum icchum abhidhāya puras kṣaṇa dṛṣṭi pāta vikasat vadanām

original: MSS_5801-2 svakarāvalambanavimuktagalat- kalakāñci kāṃcidaruṇat taruṇaḥ //
analyzed: sva kara avalambana vimukta galat kala kāñci kāṃcid aruṇat taruṇaḥ

original: MSS_5802-1 iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idamuktaṃ mayānagha /
analyzed: iti guhyatamam śāstram idam uktam mayā anagha

original: MSS_5802-2 etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaśca bhārata //
analyzed: etat buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca bhārata

original: MSS_5803-1 iti jagati na rakṣituṃ samarthaḥ kvacidapi kaścidapi prasahya nārīm /
analyzed: iti jagati na rakṣitum samarthaḥ kvacid api kaścid api prasahya nārīm

original: MSS_5803-2 avati tu satataṃ viśuddha ekaḥ kulayuvatīṃ nijasattvapāśabandhaḥ //
analyzed: avati tu satatam viśuddhaḥ ekaḥ kula yuvatīm nija sattva pāśa bandhaḥ

original: MSS_5804-1 evaṃ cerṣyā nāma duḥkhaikahetur moghaḥ puṃsāṃ dveṣadāyī pareṣām /
analyzed: evam ca īrṣyā nāma duḥkha eka hetuḥ moghaḥ puṃsām dveṣa dāyī pareṣām

original: MSS_5804-2 yo'yaṃ mā bhūd rakṣaṇāyāṅganānām atyautsukyaṃ pratyutāsāṃ tanoti //
analyzed: yaḥ u iyam mā bhūt rakṣaṇāya aṅganānām ati autsukyam pratyuta āsām tanoti

original: MSS_5805-1 iti tattvadhiyaḥ paricintya budhāḥ sakalasya janasya vinaśvaratām /
analyzed: iti tattva dhiyaḥ paricintya budhāḥ sakalasya janasya vinaśvara tām

original: MSS_5805-2 na manāgapi cetasi saṃdadhate śucamaṅgayaśaḥsukhanāśakarām //
analyzed: na manāk api cetasi saṃdadhate śucam aṅga yaśaḥ sukha nāśa karām

original: MSS_5806-1 iti deva bhavatyudārasattvo dṛḍhabhaktaśca vilāsinījano'pi /
analyzed: iti deva bhavati udāra sattvaḥ dṛḍha bhaktaḥ ca vilāsinī janaḥ api

original: MSS_5806-2 avarodhasamo mahīpatīnāṃ kimutānyaḥ kulajaḥ purandhrilokaḥ //
analyzed: avarodha samaḥ mahīpatīnām kim uta anyaḥ kula jaḥ purandhri lokaḥ

original: MSS_5807-1 iti deva sadaiva hāsyabhāvaṃ paribhāve ca janasya nindyatāṃ ca /
analyzed: iti deva sadā eva hāsya bhāvam paribhāve ca janasya nindya tām ca

original: MSS_5807-2 vipadāspadatāṃ ca yānti mūḍhā iha santas tu bhavanti pūjanīyāḥ //
analyzed: vipad āspada tām ca yānti mūḍhāḥ iha santaḥ tu bhavanti pūjanīyāḥ

original: MSS_5808-1 iti dvikṛtvaḥ śucimṛṣṭabhojināṃ dināni teṣāṃ katicin mudā yayuḥ /
analyzed: iti dvi kṛtvas śuci mṛṣṭa bhojinām dināni teṣām katicid mudā yayuḥ

original: MSS_5808-2 dviraṣṭasaṃvatsaravārasundarī- parīṣṭibhis tuṣṭimupeyuṣāṃ niśi //
analyzed: dvis aṣṭa saṃvatsara vāra sundarī parīṣṭibhiḥ tuṣṭim upeyuṣām niśi

original: MSS_5809-1 iti dharmatarormūlam aśuddhaṃ yasya mānasam /
analyzed: iti dharma taroḥ mūlam aśuddham yasya mānasam

original: MSS_5809-2 śuddhaṃ yasya ca tadrūpaṃ phalaṃ tasya na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: śuddham yasya ca tad rūpam phalam tasya na saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_5810-1 iti nikhilamudāramarthasārtha- praṇihitamekamiheva khaḍgaśāstre /
analyzed: iti nikhilam udāram artha sārtha praṇihitam ekam iha iva khaḍga śāstre

original: MSS_5810-2 giriśamatamidaṃ niṣevya cakre kṣitipatimantrisamūhacakravartī //
analyzed: giriśa matam idam niṣevya cakre kṣitipati mantri samūha cakravartī
