original: MSS_5811-1 iti netrādivikārair vaśamupanītaṃ pralīnadhairyāṅgam /
analyzed: iti netra ādi vikāraiḥ vaśam upanītam pralīna dhairya aṅgam

original: MSS_5811-2 māragrahābhibhūtaṃ parimṛṣṭaprāṅnirākṛtismaraṇam //
analyzed: māra graha abhibhūtam parimṛṣṭa prāk nirākṛti smaraṇam

original: MSS_5812-1 prādurbhūtariraṃsaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe jaghanadeśagatadṛṣṭim /
analyzed: prādurbhūta riraṃsam kṣaṇe kṣaṇe jaghana deśa gata dṛṣṭim

original: MSS_5812-2 pakvāmramiva vimokṣyasi pūrvavadācūṣya niḥśeṣam //
analyzed: pakva āmram iva vimokṣyasi pūrvavat ācūṣya niḥśeṣam

original: MSS_5813-1 iti pathi viniveśitātmano ripurapi gacchati sādhu mitratām /
analyzed: iti pathi viniveśita ātmanaḥ ripuḥ api gacchati sādhu mitra tām

original: MSS_5813-2 tadavanipatimatsarādṛte vinayaguṇena jagad vaśaṃ nayet //
analyzed: tad avanipati matsarāt ṛte vinaya guṇena jagat vaśam nayet

original: MSS_5814-1 iti parigaṇitārthaḥ śāstramārgānusārī niyamayati yatātmā yaḥ prajā daṇḍanītyā /
analyzed: iti parigaṇita arthaḥ śāstra mārga anusārī niyamayati yata ātmā yaḥ prajāḥ daṇḍanītyā

original: MSS_5814-2 apunarapagamāya prāptamārgapracārā sarita iva samudraṃ saṃpadastaṃ viśanti //
analyzed: a punar apagamāya prāpta mārga pracārā saritaḥ iva samudram saṃpadaḥ tam viśanti

original: MSS_5815-1 iti pariṇayamitthaṃ yānamekatra yāne daracakitakaṭākṣaprekṣaṇaṃ cānayos tatat /
analyzed: iti pariṇayam ittham yānam ekatra yāne dara cakita kaṭākṣa prekṣaṇam ca anayoḥ tatat

original: MSS_5815-2 divi diviṣadadhīśāḥ kautukenāvalokya praṇidadhuriva gantuṃ nākamānandasāndrāḥ //
analyzed: divi diviṣad adhīśāḥ kautukena avalokya praṇidadhuḥ iva gantum nākam ānanda sāndrāḥ

original: MSS_5816-1 iti pūrvakarmaniyataṃ bhavitavyaṃ jagati yasya jantoryat /
analyzed: iti pūrva karma niyatam bhavitavyam jagati yasya jantoḥ yat

original: MSS_5816-2 tadayatnena sa purataḥ patitaṃ prāpnotyasādhyamapi //
analyzed: tat ayatnena sa puratas patitam prāpnoti asādhyam api

original: MSS_5817-1 iti prakupitoragapramukhabhaṅgurāṃ sarvadā nidhāya nijacetasi prabaladuḥkhadāṃ saṃsṛtim /
analyzed: iti prakupita uraga pramukha bhaṅgurām sarvadā nidhāya nija cetasi prabala duḥkha dām saṃsṛtim

original: MSS_5817-2 vimuñcata parigrahagrahamanārjavaṃ sajjanā yadīcchata sukhāmṛtaṃ rasitumastasarvāśubham //
analyzed: vimuñcata parigraha graham anārjavam sat janāḥ yadi icchata sukha amṛtam rasitum asta sarva aśubham

original: MSS_5818-1 iti pravīre subhage ca satyato vivekinīnāmapi deva yoṣitām /
analyzed: iti pravīre subhage ca satyataḥ vivekinīnām api deva yoṣitām

original: MSS_5818-2 calaṃ mano dhāvati yatra kutracid viśuddhasattvā viralāḥ punaḥ striyaḥ //
analyzed: calam manaḥ dhāvati yatra kutracid viśuddha sattvāḥ viralāḥ punar striyaḥ

original: MSS_5819-1 iti priye pṛcchati mānavihvalā kathaṃcidantardhṛtabāṣpagadgadam /
analyzed: iti priye pṛcchati māna vihvalā kathaṃcid antar dhṛta bāṣpa gadgadam

original: MSS_5819-2 na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yad vadhūḥ kiyan na tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam //
analyzed: na kiṃcid iti eva jagāda yat vadhūḥ kiyat na tena eva tayā asya varṇitam

original: MSS_5820-1 iti bahubhirupāyaiḥ kuṭṭanī kāmukānāṃ kṛtasukṛtavihīnā vañcanāṃ sā kṛtaghnā (?) /
analyzed: iti bahubhiḥ upāyaiḥ kuṭṭanī kāmukānām kṛta sukṛta vihīnā vañcanām sā kṛtaghnā

original: MSS_5820-2 vanabhuvi mṛgabandhaṃ hanta paśyanti nityaṃ tadapi hariṇaśāvāḥ kūṭapāśaṃ viśanti //
analyzed: vana bhuvi mṛga bandham hanta paśyanti nityam tat api hariṇa śāvāḥ kūṭa pāśam viśanti

original: MSS_5821-1 iti madamadanābhyāṃ rāgiṇaḥ spaṣṭarāgān anavaratarataśrīsaṅginas tānavekṣya /
analyzed: iti mada madanābhyām rāgiṇaḥ spaṣṭa rāgān anavarata rata śrī saṅginaḥ tān avekṣya

original: MSS_5821-2 abhajata parivṛttiṃ sātha paryastahastā rajaniravanatendurlajjayādhomukhīva //
analyzed: abhajata parivṛttim sā atha paryasta hastā rajaniḥ avanata induḥ lajjayā adhomukhī iva

original: MSS_5822-1 iti muṣitadhiyaḥ śriyā prayāntyā rabhasavaśādavicintya dagdhabhūpāḥ /
analyzed: iti muṣita dhiyaḥ śriyā prayāntyā rabhasa vaśāt a vicintya dagdha bhūpāḥ

original: MSS_5822-2 balabharabahumānataḥ pataṅga- vratamupayānti parapratāpadīpe //
analyzed: bala bhara bahu mānataḥ pataṅga vratam upayānti para pratāpa dīpe

original: MSS_5823-1 iti yasmādubhau lokau dhārayatyātmavān nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: iti yasmāt ubhau lokau dhārayati ātmavān nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_5823-2 prajānāṃ ca tataḥ samyag daṇḍaṃ daṇḍīva dhārayet //
analyzed: prajānām ca tatas samyak daṇḍam daṇḍī iva dhārayet

original: MSS_5824-1 iti ratisamayopadeśayuktyā ratagurudarśitayā puraṃdhrilokaḥ /
analyzed: iti rati samaya upadeśa yuktyā rata guru darśitayā puraṃdhri lokaḥ

original: MSS_5824-2 nijaparaparabhāgavṛttimaujjhīt smaraparamādvayabhūmikānilīnaḥ //
analyzed: nija para para bhāga vṛttim aujjhīt smara parama advaya bhūmikā nilīnaḥ

original: MSS_5825-1 iti rājaguṇānetān yathoktān yo'nutiṣṭhati /
analyzed: iti rāja guṇān etān yathā uktān yaḥ anutiṣṭhati

original: MSS_5825-2 anubhūyeha bhadrāṇi pretya svarge mahīyate //
analyzed: anubhūya iha bhadrāṇi pretya svarge mahīyate

original: MSS_5826-1 iti rājyakalatramitraputrān gṛhadhāmaṃ ca tṛṇāya manyamānaḥ /
analyzed: iti rājya kalatra mitra putrān gṛha dhāmam ca tṛṇāya manyamānaḥ

original: MSS_5826-2 gurusattvarajastamaḥ kalaṅkāṃ prakṛtiṃ hātumagād vanaṃ narendraḥ //
analyzed: guru sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ kalaṅkām prakṛtim hātum agāt vanam narendraḥ

original: MSS_5827-1 iti vacanaṃ bhūmipateḥ śrutvā mantrī vihasya sāsūyaḥ /
analyzed: iti vacanam bhūmipateḥ śrutvā mantrī vihasya sa asūyaḥ

original: MSS_5827-2 tamuvāca kasya rājan veśyācarite'sti viśvāsaḥ //
analyzed: tam uvāca kasya rājan veśyā cariteḥ sti viśvāsaḥ

original: MSS_5828-1 iti vadati sakhījane nimīlad- dviguṇitasāndratarākṣipakṣmamālā /
analyzed: iti vadati sakhī jane nimīlat dvi guṇita sāndratara akṣi pakṣma mālā

original: MSS_5828-2 apatadalibhayena bharturaṅkaṃ bhavati hi viklavatā guṇo'ṅganānām //
analyzed: apatat ali bhayena bhartuḥ aṅkam bhavati hi viklava tā guṇa uṅganānām

original: MSS_5829-1 iti vadati sakhījane'nurāgād dayitatamāmaparaś ciraṃ pratīkṣya /
analyzed: iti vadati sakhī jana inurāgāt dayitatamām aparaḥ ciram pratīkṣya

original: MSS_5829-2 tadanugamavaśādanāyatāni nyadhita mimāna ivāvanīṃ padāni //
analyzed: tad anugama vaśāt anāyatāni nyadhita mimānaḥ iva avanīm padāni

original: MSS_5830-1 iti viracitabandhā paddhatiryā mayeyaṃ sakalaguṇigaṇānāṃ prītaye sāstu nityam /
analyzed: iti viracita bandhā paddhatiḥ yā mayā iyam sakala guṇi gaṇānām prītaye sā astu nityam

original: MSS_5830-2 vipulavimaladīvyatsatkalānāṃ nidhānaṃ taruṇataraṇiruddhā vidviṣatkauśikānām //
analyzed: vipula vimala dīvyat sat kalānām nidhānam taruṇa taraṇi ruddhāḥ vidviṣat kauśikānām

original: MSS_5831-1 iti vismṛtānyakaraṇīyamātmanaḥ sacivāvalambitadhuraṃ dharādhipam /
analyzed: iti vismṛta anya karaṇīyam ātmanaḥ saciva avalambita dhuram dharādhipam

original: MSS_5831-2 parivṛddharāgamanubandhasevayā mṛgayā jahāra catureva kāminī //
analyzed: parivṛddha rāgam anubandha sevayā mṛgayā jahāra catuḥ eva kāminī

original: MSS_5832-1 iti śāsati senānyāṃ gacchatas tānanekadhā /
analyzed: iti śāsati senānyām gacchataḥ tān anekadhā

original: MSS_5832-2 niṣidhya hasatā kiṃcit tasthe tatrāndhakāriṇā //
analyzed: niṣidhya hasatā kiṃcid tasthe tatra andhakāriṇā

original: MSS_5833-1 iti saṃsāraduḥkhārkatāpatāpitacetasām /
analyzed: iti saṃsāra duḥkha arka tāpa tāpita cetasām

original: MSS_5833-2 vimuktipādapacchāyām ṛte kutra sukham nṛṇām //
analyzed: vimukti pādapa chāyām ṛte kutra sukham nṛṇām

original: MSS_5834-1 iti saśarīrayā kṣaṇamiva kṣaṇadāḥ kṣapayan saha viśarīrayā dayitayā virasān divasān /
analyzed: iti sa śarīrayā kṣaṇam iva kṣaṇadāḥ kṣapayan saha viśarīrayā dayitayā virasān divasān

original: MSS_5834-2 dinarajanīvihāraviparītamahaṃ caritai rathacaraṇāhvayasya caritāni viḍambitavān //
analyzed: dina rajanī vihāra viparītam aham caritaiḥ rathacaraṇa āhvayasya caritāni viḍambitavān

original: MSS_5835-1 iti striyo devi mahākulodgatāḥ viśuddhadhīraiś caritairupāsate /
analyzed: iti striyaḥ devi mahā kula udgatāḥ viśuddha dhīraiḥ caritaiḥ upāsate

original: MSS_5835-2 sadaiva bhartāramananyamānasāḥ patiḥ satīnāṃ paramaṃ hi daivatabh //
analyzed: sadā eva bhartāram ananya mānasāḥ patiḥ satīnām paramam hi

original: MSS_5836-1 iti sphuṭaṃ tadvacasastayādarāt suraspṛhāropaviḍambanādapi /
analyzed: iti sphuṭam tad vacasaḥ tayā ādarāt sura spṛhā āropa viḍambanāt api

original: MSS_5836-2 karāṅkasuptaikakapolakarṇayā śrutaṃ ca tadbhāṣitamaśrutaṃ ca tat //
analyzed: kara aṅka supta eka kapola karṇayā śrutam ca tat bhāṣitam aśrutam ca tat

original: MSS_5837-1 iti smaraḥ śīghramatiś cakāra taṃ vadhūṃ ca romāñcabhareṇa karkaśau /
analyzed: iti smaraḥ śīghra matiḥ cakāra tam vadhūm ca romāñca bhareṇa karkaśau

original: MSS_5837-2 skhaliṣyati snigdhatanuḥ priyādiyaṃ mradīyasī pīḍanabhīrudoryugāt //
analyzed: skhaliṣyati snigdha tanuḥ priyāt iyam mradīyasī pīḍana bhīru dos yugāt

original: MSS_5838-1 iti sma rājā nayavartmanā vrajan samudyamī maṇḍalaśuddhimācaret /
analyzed: iti sma rājā naya vartmanā vrajan samudyamī maṇḍala śuddhim ācaret

original: MSS_5838-2 virājate sādhu viśuddhamaṇḍalaḥ śaracchaśīva pratirañjayan prajāḥ //
analyzed: virājate sādhu viśuddha maṇḍalaḥ śarad śaśī iva pratirañjayan prajāḥ

original: MSS_5839-1 iti sma rājā vinayaṃ nayānvito niṣevamāṇo naradevasevitam /
analyzed: iti sma rājā vinayam naya anvitaḥ niṣevamāṇaḥ naradeva sevitam

original: MSS_5839-2 padaṃ samākrāmati bhāsvaraṃ śriyaḥ śiro mahāratnagirerivonnatam //
analyzed: padam samākrāmati bhāsvaram śriyaḥ śiraḥ mahā ratna gireḥ iva unnatam

original: MSS_5840-1 itihāsapurāṇāni śṛṇuyāt tadanantaram /
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇāni śṛṇuyāt tad anantaram

original: MSS_5840-2 bhuktavān viharec caiva strībhirantaḥpure saha //
analyzed: bhuktavān viharet ca eva strībhiḥ antaḥpure saha

original: MSS_5840A-1 ītihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedaṃ samupabṛṃhayet /
analyzed: ītihāsa purāṇābhyām vedam samupabṛṃhayet

original: MSS_5840A-2 bibhetyalpaśrutād vedo māmayaṃ pracariṣyati //
analyzed: bibheti alpa śrutāt vedaḥ mām ayam pracariṣyati

original: MSS_5841-1 itihāsottamādasmāj jāyante kavibuddhayaḥ /
analyzed: itihāsa uttamāt asmāt jāyante kavi buddhayaḥ

original: MSS_5841-2 pañcabhya iva bhūtebhyo lokasaṃvidhayas trayaḥ //
analyzed: pañcabhyaḥ iva bhūtebhyaḥ loka saṃvidhayaḥ trayaḥ

original: MSS_5842-1 itīrayitvā viratāṃ sa tāṃ punar girānujagrāhatarāṃ narādhipaḥ /
analyzed: iti īrayitvā viratām sa tām punar girā anujagrāhatarām narādhipaḥ

original: MSS_5842-2 virutya viśrāntavatīṃ tapātyaye ghanāghanaś cātakamaṇḍalīmiva //
analyzed: virutya viśrāntavatīm tapātyaye ghanāghanaḥ cātaka maṇḍalīm iva

original: MSS_5843-1 itīṣṭamapyaniṣṭāya jāyate'vidhinā kṛtam /
analyzed: iti iṣṭam api aniṣṭāya jāyate vidhinā kṛtam

original: MSS_5843-2 tasmān na vidhimutsṛjya prājñaḥ kurvīta kiṃcana /
analyzed: tasmāt na vidhim utsṛjya prājñaḥ kurvīta kiṃcana

original: MSS_5843-3 aprekṣāpūrvakārī ca nindyate'vadyakṛt kṣaṇāt //
analyzed: a prekṣā pūrva kārī ca nindya tevadya kṛt kṣaṇāt

original: MSS_5844-1 ito gaṅgābhaṅgā ghaṭitataṭabhaṅgā punarito davajvālā jvālājvalitatarumālā vanabhuvaḥ /
analyzed: itas gaṅgā bhaṅgāḥ ghaṭita taṭa bhaṅgā punar itas dava jvālāḥ jvālā jvalita taru mālāḥ vana bhuvaḥ

original: MSS_5844-2 saraṃhaḥ siṃho'gre dhvanati mama haṃho na hi gatir vinā daivaṃ daivaṃ hariṇaśiśurevaṃ pralapati //
analyzed: sa raṃhaḥ siṃha ugre dhvanati mama haṃho na hi gatiḥ vinā daivam daivam hariṇa śiśuḥ evam pralapati

original: MSS_5845-1 ito dāvajvālaḥ sthalabhuva ito jālajaṭilā ito vyādho dhāvatyayamanupadaṃ vakritadhanuḥ /
analyzed: itas dāva jvālaḥ sthalabhuvaḥ itas jāla jaṭilāḥ itas vyādhaḥ dhāvati ayam anupadam vakrita dhanuḥ

original: MSS_5845-2 ito'pyagre tiṣṭhatyayamajagaro vistṛtamukhaḥ kva yāyāt kiṃ kuryān mṛgaśiśurayaṃ daivavaśagaḥ //
analyzed: itas upi agre tiṣṭhati ayam ajagaraḥ vistṛta mukhaḥ kva yāyāt kim kuryāt mṛga śiśuḥ ayam daiva vaśagaḥ

original: MSS_5846-1 ito na kiṃcit parato na kiṃcid yato yato yāmi tato na kiṃcit /
analyzed: itas na kiṃcid paratas na kiṃcid yatas yatas yāmi tatas na kiṃcid

original: MSS_5846-2 vicāryamāṇaṃ hi jagan na kiṃcit svātmāvabodhādadhikaṃ na kiṃcit //
analyzed: vicāryamāṇam hi jagat na kiṃcid svātma avabodhāt adhikam na kiṃcid

original: MSS_5847-1 ito bhraṣṭas tato bhraṣṭaḥ paramekāntiveṣabhāk /
analyzed: itas bhraṣṭaḥ tatas bhraṣṭaḥ parama ekānti veṣa bhāj

original: MSS_5847-2 na samsārasukhaṃ tasya naiva muktisukhaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: na samsāra sukham tasya nā eva mukti sukham bhavet

original: MSS_5848-1 ito mṛtyurito vyādhir ito vipadito jarā /
analyzed: itas mṛtyuḥ itas vyādhiḥ itas vipad itas jarā

original: MSS_5848-2 caturaṅgā tulyabalā hanti lokamanityatā //
analyzed: catur aṅgā tulya balā hanti lokam anitya tā

original: MSS_5849-1 ito vidyutpuñjasphuritamasakṛd bhāvayatu mām itaḥ kekānekā haratu hṛdayaṃ nirdayamidam /
analyzed: itas vidyut puñja sphuritam asakṛt bhāvayatu mām itas kekā anekā haratu hṛdayam nirdayam idam

original: MSS_5849-2 itaḥ kāmo vāmaḥ praharatu muhuḥ puṅkhitaśaro gatāsi tvaṃ dūre capalanayane preyasi yataḥ //
analyzed: itas kāmaḥ vāmaḥ praharatu muhur puṅkhita śaraḥ gatā asi tvam dūre capala nayane preyasi yatas

original: MSS_5850-1 ito vidyudvallīvilasitamitaḥ ketakataru- sphuradgandhaḥ prodyajjaladaninadasphūrjitamitaḥ /
analyzed: itas vidyut vallī vilasitam itas ketaka taru sphurat gandhaḥ prodyat jalada ninada sphūrjitam itas

original: MSS_5850-2 itaḥ kekikrīḍākalakalaravaḥ pakṣmaladṛśāṃ kathaṃ yāsyantyete virahadivasāḥ saṃbhṛtarasāḥ //
analyzed: itas keki krīḍā kalakala ravaḥ pakṣmala dṛśām katham yāsyanti ete viraha divasāḥ saṃbhṛta rasāḥ

original: MSS_5851-1 ito vipinapaṅktayas tilakitā rasālāṅkurair marunmalayabhūritaḥ kalamitaḥ pikīnāṃ rutam /
analyzed: itas vipina paṅktayaḥ tilakitāḥ rasāla aṅkuraiḥ marut malaya bhūritaḥ kalamitaḥ pikīnām rutam

original: MSS_5851-2 itaśca navacampakaiḥ surabhitāḥ samantād diśas tadadya mayi tāṃ vinā bhajatu ghasmaratvaṃ smaraḥ //
analyzed: itas ca nava campakaiḥ surabhitāḥ samantāt diśaḥ tat adya mayi tām vinā bhajatu ghasmara tvam smaraḥ

original: MSS_5852-1 ito hāsyataraṃ loke kiṃcidanyan na vidyate /
analyzed: itas hāsyataram loke kiṃcid anyat na vidyate

original: MSS_5852-2 yat tu durjana ityāha sajjanaṃ durjanaḥ svayam //
analyzed: yat tu durjanaḥ iti āha sat janam durjanaḥ svayam

original: MSS_5853-1 itthaṃ kavikuṭumbasya vacāṃsi vicinoti yaḥ /
analyzed: ittham kavi kuṭumbasya vacāṃsi vicinoti yaḥ

original: MSS_5853-2 aniddhavacanasyāpi tasya vaśyā sarasvatī //
analyzed: an iddha vacanasya api tasya vaśyā sarasvatī

original: MSS_5854-1 itthaṃ kelitatīrvihṛtya yamunākūle samaṃ rādhayā tadromāvalimauktikāvaliyuge veṇībhramaṃ bibhrati /
analyzed: ittham keli tatīḥ vihṛtya yamunā kūle samam rādhayā tad roma āvali mauktika āvali yuge veṇī bhramam bibhrati

original: MSS_5854-2 tatrāhlādikucaprayāgaphalayorlipsāvatorhastayor vyāpārāḥ puruṣottamasya dadatu sphītaṃ mudāṃ saṃpadam //
analyzed: tatra āhlādi kuca prayāga phalayoḥ lipsāvatoḥ hastayoḥ vyāpārāḥ puruṣottamasya dadatu sphītam mudām saṃpadam

original: MSS_5855-1 itthaṃ kriyāsu nivasantyapi yāsu tāsu puṃsāṃ śriyaḥ prabalasattvabahiṣkṛtāsu /
analyzed: ittham kriyāsu nivasanti api yāsu tāsu puṃsām śriyaḥ prabala sattva bahiṣkṛtāsu

original: MSS_5855-2 evaṃ ca sāhasadhaneṣvatha buddhimatsu saṃtuṣya dānaniratāḥ kṣitipā bhavanti //
analyzed: evam ca sāhasa dhaneṣu atha buddhimatsu saṃtuṣya dāna niratāḥ kṣitipāḥ bhavanti

original: MSS_5856-1 ityaihikena ca purā vihitena cāpi svenaiva karmavibhavena śubhāśubhena /
analyzed: iti aihikena ca purā vihitena ca api svena eva karma vibhavena śubha aśubhena

original: MSS_5856-2 śaśvad bhavet tadanurūpavicitrabhogaḥ sarvo hi nāma sasurāsura eṣa sargaḥ //
analyzed: śaśvat bhavet tad anurūpa vicitra bhogaḥ sarvaḥ hi nāma sa sura asuraḥ eṣa sargaḥ

original: MSS_5857-1 itthaṃ copārjito yatnād guṇo'pi vidhure vidhau /
analyzed: ittham ca upārjitaḥ yatnāt guṇaḥ api vidhure vidhau

original: MSS_5857-2 saṃpattaye na na paraṃ jāyate tu vipattaye //
analyzed: saṃpattaye na na param jāyate tu vipattaye

original: MSS_5858-1 mūle hyavikṛte sadā sikte prajñānavāriṇā /
analyzed: mūle hi avikṛte sadā sikte prajñāna vāriṇā

original: MSS_5858-2 nayālavālaḥ phalati prāyaḥ pauruṣapādapaḥ //
analyzed: naya ālavālaḥ phalati prāyas pauruṣa pādapaḥ

original: MSS_5859-1 itthaṃ talpatalādhirohaṇamiyaṃ parṇārpaṇaprakriyā śayyāyā vacanakramasya dayitasyaivaṃvidhārādhanā /
analyzed: ittham talpa tala adhirohaṇam iyam parṇa arpaṇa prakriyā śayyāyāḥ vacana kramasya dayitasya evaṃvidha ārādhanā

original: MSS_5859-2 evaṃ keligṛhopadehali balādānīyamānā muhuś cāṭūktiprakaraiś ciraṃ navavadhūrālībhiradhyāpyate //
analyzed: evam keli gṛha upadehali balāt ānīyamānā muhur cāṭu ukti prakaraiḥ ciram nava vadhū rālībhiḥ adhyāpyate

original: MSS_5859A-1 itthaṃ tena nirīkṣitaṃ na ca mayāpyevaṃ samālokitas tenoktaṃ subhagena tatra na mayā dattaṃ vaco mandayā /
analyzed: ittham tena nirīkṣitam na ca mayā api evam samālokitaḥ tena uktam subhagena tatra na mayā dattam vacaḥ mandayā

original: MSS_5859A-2 tatsatyaṃ kathayāli kiṃ sa subhagaḥ kupyen na mahyaṃ gata ityuktvā sudṛśā kayāpi valitagrīvaṃ dṛśau sphārite //
analyzed: tat satyam kathaya ali kim sa subhagaḥ kupyet na mahyam gataḥ iti uktvā sudṛśā kayā api valita grīvam dṛśau sphārite

original: MSS_5860-1 itthaṃ duravadhāryaiva strīcittasya gatiḥ kila /
analyzed: ittham duravadhāryā eva strī cittasya gatiḥ kila

original: MSS_5860-2 anyāsaktiṃ ca kurvanti mriyante ca patiṃ vinā //
analyzed: anya āsaktim ca kurvanti mriyante ca patim vinā

original: MSS_5861-1 itthaṃ dharmārjitā lakṣmīr āsaṃtatyanapāyinī /
analyzed: ittham dharma arjitā lakṣmīḥ ā saṃtati anapāyinī

original: MSS_5861-2 itarā tu jalāpātatuṣārakaṇanaśvarī //
analyzed: itarā tu jala āpāta tuṣāra kaṇa naśvarī

original: MSS_5862-1 ato yateta dharmeṇa dhanamarjayituṃ pumān /
analyzed: atas yateta dharmeṇa dhanam arjayitum pumān

original: MSS_5862-2 rājā tu sutarāṃ yena mūlaṃ rājyatarordhanam //
analyzed: rājā tu sutarām yena mūlam rājya taroḥ dhanam

original: MSS_5863-1 itthaṃ vṛḍhataravāmita- manasāṃ puṃsāmasāṃprataṃ purataḥ /
analyzed: ittham vṛḍhatara vāmita manasām puṃsām asāṃpratam puratas

original: MSS_5863-2 veśavilāsavatīnām aśarīraśaravyathākathanam //
analyzed: veśa vilāsavatīnām aśarīra śara vyathā kathanam

original: MSS_5864-1 itthaṃ nārīrghaṭayitumalaṃ kāmibhiḥ kāmamāsan prāleyāṃśoḥ sapadi rucayaḥ śāntamānāntarāyāḥ /
analyzed: ittham nārīḥ ghaṭayitum alam kāmibhiḥ kāmam āsan prāleya aṃśoḥ sapadi rucayaḥ śānta māna antarāyāḥ

original: MSS_5864-2 ācāryatvaṃ ratiṣu vilasanmanmamathaśrīvilāsā hrīpratyūhapraśamakuśalāḥ śīdhavaś cakrurāsām //
analyzed: ācārya tvam ratiṣu vilasat man mamatha śrī vilāsāḥ hrī pratyūha praśama kuśalāḥ śīdhavaḥ cakruḥ āsām

original: MSS_5865-1 itthaṃ paśupatipeśala- pāśakalīlāprayuktavakrokteḥ /
MSS_5865-2 harṣavaśataralatārakam ānanamavyād bhavānyā vaḥ //
analyzed: harṣa vaśa tarala tārakam ānanam avyāt bhavānyāḥ vaḥ

original: MSS_5866-1 itthaṃ prajñaiva nāmeha pradhānaṃ lokavartanam /
analyzed: ittham prajñā eva nāma iha pradhānam loka vartanam

original: MSS_5866-2 jīvatyarthadaridro'pi dhīdaridro na jīvati //
analyzed: jīvati artha daridraḥ api dhī daridraḥ na jīvati

original: MSS_5867-1 itthaṃ phalati śuddhena siktaṃ saṃkalpavāriṇā /
analyzed: ittham phalati śuddhena siktam saṃkalpa vāriṇā

original: MSS_5867-2 puṇyabījamapi svalpaṃ puṃsāṃ kṛṣikṛtāmiva //
analyzed: puṇya bījam api su alpam puṃsām kṛṣi kṛtām iva

original: MSS_5868-1 tadeva dūṣitaṃ devi duṣṭasaṃkalpapāthasā /
analyzed: tat eva dūṣitam devi duṣṭa saṃkalpa pāthasā

original: MSS_5868-2 phalatyaniṣṭam ... ... ... ... //
analyzed: phalati aniṣṭam

original: MSS_5869-1 itthaṃ madhūtthaṃ rasamudgirantī tadoṣṭhabandūkadhanurvisṛṣṭā /
analyzed: ittham madhu uttham rasam udgirantī tad oṣṭha bandūkadhanuḥ visṛṣṭā

original: MSS_5869-2 karṇāt prasūnāśugapañcabāṇī vāṇīmiṣeṇāsya mano viveśa //
analyzed: karṇāt prasūna āśuga pañcabāṇī vāṇī miṣeṇa asya manaḥ viveśa

original: MSS_5870-1 itthaṃ yuktimupāyānāṃ kurvāṇasya catuṣṭayīm /
analyzed: ittham yuktim upāyānām kurvāṇasya catuṣṭayīm

original: MSS_5870-2 vrajatīnduprabhāgauraṃ parairakṣayyatāṃ yaśaḥ //
analyzed: vrajati indu prabhā gauram paraiḥ akṣayya tām yaśaḥ

original: MSS_5871-1 itthaṃ vihṛtya vanitābhirudasyamānaṃ pīnastanorujaghanasthalaśālinībhiḥ /
analyzed: ittham vihṛtya vanitābhiḥ udasyamānam pīna stana ūru jaghana sthala śālinībhiḥ

original: MSS_5871-2 utsarpitormicayalaṅghitatīradeśam autsukyanunnamiva vāri puraḥ pratasthe //
analyzed: utsarpita ūrmi caya laṅghita tīra deśam autsukya nunnam iva vāri puras pratasthe

original: MSS_5872-1 itthaṃ sabhāpatirbhūtvā yaḥ kāvyāni parīkṣate /
analyzed: ittham sabhāpatiḥ bhūtvā yaḥ kāvyāni parīkṣate

original: MSS_5872-2 yaśas tasya jagadvyāpi sa sukhī tatra tatra ca //
analyzed: yaśaḥ tasya jagat vyāpi sa sukhī tatra tatra ca

original: MSS_5873-1 itthaṃ samutthavirahānalatīvratāpa- saṃtāpitāṅga karipuṅgava muñca śokam /
analyzed: ittham samuttha viraha anala tīvra tāpa saṃtāpita aṅga kari puṅgava muñca śokam

original: MSS_5873-2 dhātrā svahastalikhitāni lalāṭapaṭṭe ko vākṣarāṇi parimārjayituṃ samarthaḥ //
analyzed: dhātrā sva hasta likhitāni lalāṭa paṭṭe kaḥ vā akṣarāṇi parimārjayitum samarthaḥ

original: MSS_5874-1 itthaṃ subuddhiralpena deva yatnena bodhyate /
analyzed: ittham su buddhiḥ alpena deva yatnena bodhyate

original: MSS_5874-2 na kṛcchreṇāpi mahatā nirvicāramatiḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: na kṛcchreṇa api mahatā nirvicāra matiḥ punar

original: MSS_5875-1 itthaṃ svadurnayavipākavaśena divyāḥ śāpacyutā hyavataranti manuṣyaloke /
analyzed: ittham sva durnaya vipāka vaśena divyāḥ śāpa cyutāḥ hi avataranti manuṣya loke

original: MSS_5875-2 bhuktvā phalaṃ taducitaṃ ca nijāṃ gatiṃ te pūrvārjitena sukṛtena punaḥ prayānti //
analyzed: bhuktvā phalam tat ucitam ca nijām gatim te pūrva arjitena sukṛtena punar prayānti

original: MSS_5876-1 itthamārādhyamāno'pi kliśnāti bhuvanatrayam /
analyzed: ittham ārādhyamānaḥ api kliśnāti bhuvanatrayam

original: MSS_5876-2 śāmyet pratyapakāreṇa nopakāreṇa durjanaḥ //
analyzed: śāmyet pratyapakāreṇa na upakāreṇa durjanaḥ

original: MSS_5877-1 ityaguhyaṃ nigūhante guhyaṃ prakaṭayanti ca /
analyzed: iti aguhyam nigūhante guhyam prakaṭayanti ca

original: MSS_5877-2 maurkhyābhimānenādātuṃ mūrkhāḥ pratyayamātmani //
analyzed: maurkhya abhimānena ādātum mūrkhāḥ pratyayam ātmani

original: MSS_5878-1 ityaṅgaiḥ saṃyutaḥ sarvair dehino bālakākṛtiḥ /
analyzed: iti aṅgaiḥ saṃyutaḥ sarvaiḥ dehinaḥ bālaka ākṛtiḥ

original: MSS_5878-2 māturāhārarasato dehe garbho'bhivardhate //
analyzed: mātuḥ āhāra rasataḥ dehe garbhaḥ abhivardhate

original: MSS_5879-1 ityajñānatamaśchannāḥ svadoṣonmārgagāminaḥ /
analyzed: iti ajñāna tamaḥ channāḥ sva doṣa unmārga gāminaḥ

original: MSS_5879-2 apuraskṛtasacchāstradīpā bhraśyanti niścitam //
analyzed: a puraskṛta sat śāstra dīpāḥ bhraśyanti niścitam

original: MSS_5880-1 ityanarthāya śabdaikaparo tātparyavij jaḍaḥ /
analyzed: iti anarthāya tātparya vid jaḍaḥ

original: MSS_5881-1 ityanudvegaśīlā ye bhavyā dhairyāvalambanāḥ /
analyzed: iti anudvega śīlāḥ ye bhavyāḥ dhairya avalambanāḥ

original: MSS_5881-2 dūrabhraṣṭāmapi nijāṃ bhūmiṃ saṃprāpnuvanti te //
analyzed: dūra bhraṣṭām api nijām bhūmim saṃprāpnuvanti te

original: MSS_5882-1 ityanyadupacāreṇa mitramanyat tu satyataḥ /
analyzed: iti anyat upacāreṇa mitram anyat tu satyataḥ

original: MSS_5882-2 tulye'pi snigdhatāyoge tailaṃ tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ ghṛtam //
analyzed: tulye api snigdha tā yoge tailam tailam ghṛtam ghṛtam

original: MSS_5883-1 ityanyaraktacittā strībhujaṅgī hantyasaṃśayam /
analyzed: iti anya rakta cittā strī bhujaṅgī hanti asaṃśayam

original: MSS_5884-1 ityabuddhidhanādhānanidhānairvividhodayaiḥ /
analyzed: iti abuddhi dhana ādhāna nidhānaiḥ vividha udayaiḥ

original: MSS_5884-2 kūṭapaṇyairasāmānyais tāruṇyamativāhyate //
analyzed: kūṭa paṇyaiḥ asāmānyaiḥ tāruṇyam ativāhyate

original: MSS_5885-1 ityarthalobhān mithyaiva vijñānakhyāpanecchavaḥ /
analyzed: iti artha lobhāt mithyā eva vijñāna khyāpana icchavaḥ

original: MSS_5885-2 mūrkhāḥ putramapi ghnanti na rajyet teṣu buddhimān //
analyzed: mūrkhāḥ putram api ghnanti na rajyet teṣu buddhimān

original: MSS_5886-1 ityākhyāte pavanatanayaṃ maithilīvonmukhī sā tvāmutkaṇṭhocchvasitahṛdayā vīkṣya saṃbhāvya caiva /
analyzed: iti ākhyāte pavanatanayam maithilī iva unmukhī sā tvām utkaṇṭhā ucchvasita hṛdayā vīkṣya saṃbhāvya ca eva

original: MSS_5886-2 śroṣyatyasmāt paramavahitā saumya sīmantinīnāṃ kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃcidūnaḥ //
analyzed: śroṣyati asmāt param avahitā saumya sīmantinīnām kānta udantaḥ suhṛd upanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃcid ūnaḥ

original: MSS_5887-1 ityādiguṇasaṃpanne lokayātrāvidi sthire /
analyzed: ityādi guṇa saṃpanne lokayātrā vidi sthire

original: MSS_5887-2 nirvṛtaḥ pitarīvāste yatra lokaḥ sa pārthivaḥ //
analyzed: nirvṛtaḥ pitari iva āste yatra lokaḥ sa pārthivaḥ

original: MSS_5888-1 ityādi dūṣyān saṃdūṣya prajānāmabhivṛddhaye /
analyzed: ityādi dūṣyān saṃdūṣya prajānām abhivṛddhaye

original: MSS_5888-2 vinayañ śriyamutkarṣaṃ rājā śalyaṃ samuddharet //
analyzed: vinayam śriyam utkarṣam rājā śalyam samuddharet

original: MSS_5889-1 ityuktavatyā yadalopi lajjā sānaucitī cetasi naś cakāstu /
analyzed: iti uktavatyā yat alopi lajjā sā anaucitī cetasi naḥ cakāstu

original: MSS_5889-2 smaras tu sākṣī tadadoṣatāyām unmādya yas tattadavīvadat tām //
analyzed: smaraḥ tu sākṣī tad adoṣa tāyām unmādya yaḥ tat tat avīvadat tām

original: MSS_5890-1 ityudgate śaśini peśalakāntadūtī- saṃlāpasaṃcalitalocanamānasābhiḥ /
analyzed: iti udgate śaśini peśala kānta dūtī saṃlāpa saṃcalita locana mānasābhiḥ

original: MSS_5890-2 agrāhi maṇḍanavidhirviparītabhūṣā- vinyāsahāsitasakhījanamaṅganābhiḥ //
analyzed: agrāhi maṇḍana vidhiḥ viparīta bhūṣā vinyāsa hāsita sakhī janam aṅganābhiḥ

original: MSS_5891-1 ityetat tapaso devā mahābhāgyaṃ pracakṣate /
analyzed: iti etat tapasaḥ devāḥ mahābhāgyam pracakṣate

original: MSS_5891-2 sarvasyāsya prapaśyantas tapasaḥ puṇyamudbhavam //
analyzed: sarvasya asya prapaśyantaḥ tapasaḥ puṇyam udbhavam

original: MSS_5892-1 ityetāḥ kuṭilatarāḥ krūrācārā gatatrapāś capalāḥ /
analyzed: iti etāḥ kuṭilatarāḥ krūra ācārāḥ gata trapāḥ capalāḥ

original: MSS_5892-2 yo nāma vetti rāmāḥ sa strībhirṇaiva vañcyate matimān //
analyzed: yaḥ nāma vetti rāmāḥ sa vañcyate matimān

original: MSS_5893-1 ityevaṃ bahuhṛdayā bahujihvā bahukarāś ca bahumāyāḥ /
analyzed: iti evam bahu hṛdayāḥ bahu jihvāḥ bahu karāḥ ca bahu māyāḥ

original: MSS_5893-2 tattvena satyarahitāḥ ko jānāti sphuṭaṃ veśyāḥ //
analyzed: tattvena satya rahitāḥ kaḥ jānāti sphuṭam veśyāḥ

original: MSS_5894-1 ityevaṃ yoṣito rājan bhedasya vyasanasya ca /
analyzed: iti evam yoṣitaḥ rājan bhedasya vyasanasya ca

original: MSS_5894-2 parābhavasya ca padaṃ sevetāśaṅkito'tha tāḥ //
analyzed: parābhavasya ca padam seveta āśaṅkitā utha tāḥ

original: MSS_5895-1 idaṃ kavivarairnityam ākhyānamupajīvyate /
analyzed: idam kavi varaiḥ nityam ākhyānam upajīvyate

original: MSS_5895-2 udayaprepsubhirbhṛtyair abhijāta iveśvaraḥ //
analyzed: udaya prepsubhiḥ bhṛtyaiḥ abhijātaḥ iva īśvaraḥ

original: MSS_5896-1 idaṃ kiṃ te nyastaṃ valayini kare vaktrakamalaṃ na yuktaḥ kopo'yaṃ praṇayini nirāgasyapi jane /
analyzed: idam kim te nyastam valayini kare vaktra kamalam na yuktaḥ kopaḥ uyam praṇayini nirāgasi api jane

original: MSS_5896-2 bruvāṇe mayyevaṃ śvasanaviṣamotkampitakucaṃ mṛgākṣyās tatkālaṃ nayanajalamevottaramabhūt //
analyzed: bruvāṇe mayi evam śvasana viṣama utkampita kucam mṛga akṣyāḥ tad kālam nayana jalam eva uttaram abhūt

original: MSS_5897-1 idaṃ kilāvyājamanoharaṃ vapus tapaḥkṣamaṃ sādhayituṃ ya icchati /
analyzed: idam kila avyāja manoharam vapuḥ tapaḥ kṣamam sādhayitum yaḥ icchati

original: MSS_5897-2 dhruvaṃ sa nīlotpalapatradhārayā samillatāṃ chettumṛṣirvyavasyati //
analyzed: dhruvam sa nīlotpala patra dhārayā samidh latām chettum ṛṣiḥ vyavasyati

original: MSS_5898-1 idaṃ kṛtamidaṃ kāryam idamanyat kṛtākṛtam /
analyzed: idam kṛtam idam kāryam idam anyat kṛtākṛtam

original: MSS_5898-2 evamīhāsukhāsaktaṃ kṛtāntaḥ kurute vaśe //
analyzed: evam īhā sukha āsaktam kṛtāntaḥ kurute vaśe

original: MSS_5899-1 idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama nanu śvetamatha kiṃ gamiṣyāmo yāmo bhavatu gamanenātha bhavatu /
analyzed: idam kṛṣṇam kṛṣṇam priyatama nanu śvetam atha kim gamiṣyāmaḥ yāmaḥ bhavatu gamanena atha bhavatu

original: MSS_5899-2 purā yenaivaṃ me ciramanusṛtā cittapadavī sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ //
analyzed: purā yena evam me ciram anusṛtā citta padavī saḥ eva anyaḥ jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ

original: MSS_5900-1 idaṃ ca tvāṃ sarvaparaṃ bravīmi puṇyaṃ padaṃ tāta mahāviśiṣṭam /
analyzed: idam ca tvām sarva param bravīmi puṇyam padam tāta mahā viśiṣṭam

original: MSS_5900-2 na jātu kāmān na bhayān na lobhād dharmaṃ tyajej jīvitasyāpi hetoḥ //
analyzed: na jātu kāmāt na bhayāt na lobhāt dharmam tyajet jīvitasya api hetoḥ

original: MSS_5901-1 idaṃ jñeyamidaṃ jñeyam iti yas tṛṣitaś caret /
analyzed: idam jñeyam idam jñeyam iti yaḥ tṛṣitaḥ caret

original: MSS_5901-2 api kalpasahasreṣu naiva jñeyamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: api kalpa sahasreṣu na eva jñeyam avāpnuyāt

original: MSS_5902-1 idaṃ tat kālindītaṭamiha hi kaṃsāsurabhido yaśaḥ śṛṇvad vaktraṃ skhalitakavalaṃ gokulamabhūt /
analyzed: idam tat kālindī taṭam iha hi kaṃsa asura bhidaḥ yaśaḥ śṛṇvat vaktram skhalita kavalam gokulam abhūt

original: MSS_5902-2 bhramād veṇukvāṇapraṇayamasṛṇottāramadhura- svarābhirgopībhirdiśi diśi samudgīrṇamaniśam //
analyzed: bhramāt veṇu kvāṇa praṇaya masṛṇa uttāra madhura svarābhiḥ gopībhiḥ diśi diśi samudgīrṇam aniśam

original: MSS_5903-1 idaṃ tat snehasarvasvaṃ samamāḍhyadaridrayoḥ /
analyzed: idam tat sneha sarvasvam samam āḍhya daridrayoḥ

original: MSS_5903-2 acandanamanauśīraṃ hṛdayasyānulepanam //
analyzed: a candanam an auśīram hṛdayasya anulepanam

original: MSS_5904-1 idaṃ tāvac citraṃ yadavanitale pārvaṇaśaśī kalaṅkādunmuktaḥ kimapi ca tadantarvilasati /
analyzed: idam tāvat citram yat avani tale pārvaṇa śaśī kalaṅkāt unmuktaḥ kim api ca tad antar vilasati

original: MSS_5904-2 pravālaṃ māṇikyaṃ kuvalayadalaṃ manmathadhanur manovīṇāvādadhvaniriti mahaccitramadharam //
analyzed: pravālam māṇikyam kuvalaya dalam manmatha dhanuḥ manaḥ vīṇā vāda dhvaniḥ iti mahat citram adharam

original: MSS_5905-1 idaṃ te kenoktaṃ kathaya kamalātaṅkavadane yadetasmin hemnaḥ kaṭakamiti dhatse khalu dhiyam /
analyzed: idam te kena uktam kathaya kamala ātaṅka vadane yat etasmin hemnaḥ kaṭakam iti dhatse khalu dhiyam

original: MSS_5905-2 idaṃ tad duḥsādhākramaṇaparamāstraṃ smṛtibhuvā tava prītyā cakraṃ karakamalamūle vinihitam //
analyzed: idam tat duḥsādha ākramaṇa parama astram smṛti bhuvā tava prītyā cakram kara kamala mūle vinihitam

original: MSS_5906-1 idaṃ tvihotpātayugaṃ prthivyāṃ mahābhayaṃ śākunikā vadanti /
analyzed: idam tu iha utpāta yugam prthivyām mahā bhayam śākunikāḥ vadanti

original: MSS_5906-2 yad vāyaso maithunasaṃniviṣṭo dṛśyeta yad vā dhavalaḥ kadācit //
analyzed: yat vāyasaḥ maithuna saṃniviṣṭaḥ dṛśyeta yat vā dhavalaḥ kadācid

original: MSS_5907-1 idaṃ dūrvākāṇḍadyutimuṣi kapole katipayaiḥ śramāmbhobhiḥ kīrṇaṃ sahajabakulāmodasubhagam /
analyzed: idam dūrvā kāṇḍa dyuti   kapole katipayaiḥ śrama ambhobhiḥ kīrṇam sahaja bakula āmoda subhagam

original: MSS_5907-2 samākāṅkṣe tāmrādharamanumanuṣva priyatame manojñaṃ te pātuṃ mukhakamalamāghrātumathavā //
analyzed: samākāṅkṣe tāmra adharam anumanuṣva priyatame manojñam te pātum mukha kamalam āghrātum athavā

original: MSS_5908-1 idaṃ nabhasi bhīṣaṇabhramadulūkakolāhale niśācaravilāsinīnivahadattanetrotsave /
analyzed: idam nabhasi bhīṣaṇa bhramat ulūka kolāhale niśācara vilāsinī nivaha datta netra utsave

original: MSS_5908-2 parisphurati nirbharapracurapaṅkamagnollasad- varāhakulamāṃsalaṃ prabalabandamandhaṃ tamaḥ //
analyzed: parisphurati nirbhara pracura paṅka magna ullasat varāha kula māṃsalam prabala bandam andham tamaḥ

original: MSS_5909-1 idaṃ nāsīn na cotpannaṃ na cāsīn na bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: idam na āsīt na ca utpannam na ca āsīt na bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_5909-2 tat tad brahmaiva sadrūpam idamitthamavasthitam //
analyzed: tat tat brahma eva sat rūpam idam ittham avasthitam

original: MSS_5910-1 idaṃ nṛpaprārthibhirujjhito'rthibhir maṇipraroheṇa vivṛdhya rohaṇaḥ /
analyzed: idam nṛpa prārthibhiḥ ujjhita ūrthibhiḥ maṇi praroheṇa vivṛdhya rohaṇaḥ

original: MSS_5910-2 kiyaddinairambaramāvariṣyate mudhā munirvindhyamarundha bhūdharam //
analyzed: kiyat dinaiḥ ambaram āvariṣyate mudhā muniḥ vindhyam arundha bhūdharam

original: MSS_5911-1 idaṃ paramasundaraṃ tanupuraṃ kuraṅgīdṛśāṃ nivārya khalu śaiśavaṃ svayamanena nītaṃ balāt /
analyzed: idam parama sundaram tanu puram kuraṅgī dṛśām nivārya khalu śaiśavam svayam anena nītam balāt

original: MSS_5911-2 tadāgamanaśaṅkayā makaraketunā kiṃ kṛtaṃ payodharadharādharau trivalivāhinīdustarau //
analyzed: tad āgamana śaṅkayā makaraketunā kim kṛtam payodhara dharādharau trivali vāhinī dustarau

original: MSS_5912-1 idaṃ prakṛtyā viṣayairvaśīkṛtaṃ parasparastrīdhanalolupaṃ jagat /
analyzed: idam prakṛtyā viṣayaiḥ vaśīkṛtam paraspara strīdhana lolupam jagat

original: MSS_5912-2 sanātane vartmani sādhusevite pratiṣṭhate daṇḍabhayopapīḍitam //
analyzed: sanātane vartmani sādhu sevite pratiṣṭhate daṇḍa bhaya upapīḍitam

original: MSS_5913-1 idaṃ prāyo loke na paricitapūrvaṃ nayanayor na yācñā yat puṃsaḥ suguṇaparimāṇaṃ laghayati /
analyzed: idam prāyas loke na paricita pūrvam nayanayoḥ na yācñā yat puṃsaḥ suguṇa parimāṇam laghayati

original: MSS_5913-2 viśadbhirviśvātmā svavapuṣi baliprārthanakṛte trapālīnairaṅgairyadayamabhavad vāmanatanuḥ //
analyzed: viśadbhiḥ viśvātmā sva vapuṣi bali prārthana kṛte trapā līnaiḥ aṅgaiḥ yat ayam abhavat vāmana tanuḥ

original: MSS_5914-1 idaṃ maghonaḥ kuliśaṃ dhārāsaṃnihitānalam /
analyzed: idam maghonaḥ kuliśam dhārā saṃnihita analam

original: MSS_5914-2 smaraṇaṃ yasya daityastrīgarbhapātāya kalpate //
analyzed: smaraṇam yasya daitya strī garbha pātāya kalpate

original: MSS_5915-1 idaṃ madaṃ candramasaḥ samantād asmatsapatnasya hariṣyatīti /
analyzed: idam madam candramasaḥ samantāt asmad sapatnasya hariṣyati iti

original: MSS_5915-2 yasmin purandhrīvadanasyalakṣmīṃ nijāṃ vyadhuḥ prābhṛtamambujāni //
analyzed: yasmin purandhrī vadanasya lakṣmīm nijām vyadhuḥ prābhṛtam ambujāni

original: MSS_5916-1 idaṃ yugasahasreṣu bhaviṣyadabhavad dinam /
analyzed: idam yuga sahasreṣu bhaviṣyat abhavat dinam

original: MSS_5916-2 tadapyadyatvamāpannaṃ kā kathā maraṇāvadheḥ //
analyzed: tat api adya tvam āpannam kā kathā maraṇa avadheḥ

original: MSS_5917-1 idaṃ labdhamidaṃ naṣṭam idaṃ lapsye manoratham /
analyzed: idam labdham idam naṣṭam idam lapsye manoratham

original: MSS_5917-2 idaṃ cintayatāmeva jīrṇamāyuḥ śarīriṇām //
analyzed: idam cintayatām eva jīrṇam āyuḥ śarīriṇām

original: MSS_5918-1 idaṃ vaktraṃ sākṣād virahitakalaṅkaḥ śaśadharaḥ sudhādhārādhāraś cirapariṇataṃ bimbamadharaḥ /
analyzed: idam vaktram sākṣāt virahita kalaṅkaḥ śaśadharaḥ sudhā dhārā ādhāraḥ cira pariṇatam bimbam adharaḥ

original: MSS_5918-2 ime netre rātriṃdivamadhikaśobhe kuvalaye tanurlāvaṇyānāṃ jaladhiravagāhe sukhataraḥ //
analyzed: ime netre rātriṃdivam adhika śobhe kuvalaye tanuḥ lāvaṇyānām jaladhiḥ avagāhe sukhataraḥ

original: MSS_5919-1 idaṃ viśvaṃ kuṭumbo na iti yeṣāṃ suniścayaḥ /
analyzed: idam viśvam kuṭumbaḥ naḥ iti yeṣām su niścayaḥ

original: MSS_5919-2 te śāntāḥ paramodārāḥ keṣāṃ vandyā na sādhavaḥ //
analyzed: te śāntāḥ parama udārāḥ keṣām vandyāḥ na sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_5920-1 idaṃ viśvaṃ pālyaṃ vidhivadabhiyuktena manasā priyāśoko jīvaṃ kusumamiva gharmo glapayati /
analyzed: idam viśvam pālyam vidhivat abhiyuktena manasā priya aśokaḥ jīvam kusumam iva gharmaḥ glapayati

original: MSS_5920-2 svayaṃ kṛtvā tyāgaṃ vilapanavinodo'pyasulabhas tadadyāpyucchvāso bhavati nanu lābho hi ruditam //
analyzed: svayam kṛtvā tyāgam vilapana vinodaḥ upi a sulabhaḥ tat adya api ucchvāsaḥ bhavati nanu lābhaḥ hi ruditam

original: MSS_5921-1 idaṃ vyomasaromadhye bhāti candrasitotpalam /
analyzed: idam vyoma saraḥ madhye bhāti candra sita utpalam

original: MSS_5921-2 malino'ntargato yatra kalaṅko bhramarāyate //
analyzed: malinaḥ untargataḥ yatra kalaṅkaḥ bhramarāyate

original: MSS_5922-1 idaṃ śarīraṃ puruṣasya mohajaṃ yathā pṛthag bhautikamīyate gṛham /
analyzed: idam śarīram puruṣasya moha jam yathā pṛthak bhautikam īyate gṛham

original: MSS_5922-2 yathaudakaiḥ pārthivataijasairjanaḥ kālena jāto vikṛto vinaśyati //
analyzed: yathā audakaiḥ pārthiva taijasaiḥ janaḥ kālena jātaḥ vikṛtaḥ vinaśyati

original: MSS_5923-1 yathānalo dāruṣu bhinna īyate yathānilo dehagataḥ pṛthak sthitaḥ /
analyzed: yathā analaḥ dāruṣu bhinnaḥ īyate yathā anilaḥ deha gataḥ pṛthak sthitaḥ

original: MSS_5923-2 yathā nabhaḥ sarvagataṃ na sajjate tathā pumān sarvaguṇāśrayaḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: yathā nabhaḥ sarva gatam na sajjate tathā pumān sarva guṇa āśrayaḥ paraḥ

original: MSS_5924-1 idaṃ śarīraṃ ślathasaṃdhi jarjaraṃ patatyavaśyaṃ pariṇāmadurvaham /
analyzed: idam śarīram ślatha saṃdhi jarjaram patati avaśyam pariṇāma durvaham

original: MSS_5924-2 kimauṣadhaṃ pṛcchasi mūḍha durmate nirāmayaṃ kṛṣṇarasāyanaṃ piba //
analyzed: kim auṣadham pṛcchasi mūḍha durmate nirāmayam kṛṣṇa rasāyanam piba

original: MSS_5925-1 idaṃ śītaṃ pāthaḥ pibata pathikā muñcata manāk pathaḥ śrāntiṃ kāntāsmṛtijanitacintādviguṇitām /
analyzed: idam śītam pāthaḥ pibata pathikāḥ muñcata manāk pathaḥ śrāntim kāntā smṛti janita cintā dvi guṇitām

original: MSS_5925-2 iti sphītāpāṅgaṃ mṛdumadhuravāgbhaṅgihasitaṃ prapāpālīmālā harati taruṇānāṃ pathi gatim //
analyzed: iti sphīta apāṅgam mṛdu madhura vāc bhaṅgi hasitam prapā pālī mālā harati taruṇānām pathi gatim

original: MSS_5926-1 idaṃ svajanadehajātanayamātṛbhāryāmayaṃ vicitramiha kenacid racitamindrajālaṃ nanu /
analyzed: idam sva jana deha jāta naya mātṛ bhāryā mayam vicitram iha kenacid racitam indrajālam nanu

original: MSS_5926-2 kva kasya kathamatra ko bhavati tattvato dehinaḥ svakarmavaśavartinas tribhuvane nijo vā paraḥ //
analyzed: kva kasya katham atra kaḥ bhavati tattvataḥ dehinaḥ sva karma vaśa vartinaḥ tribhuvane nijaḥ vā paraḥ

original: MSS_5927-1 idaṃ svastyayanaṃ śreṣṭham idaṃ buddhivivardhanam /
analyzed: idam svastyayanam śreṣṭham idam buddhi vivardhanam

original: MSS_5927-2 idaṃ yaśasyaṃ satatam idaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ param //
analyzed: idam yaśasyam satatam idam niḥśreyasam param

original: MSS_5928-1 idaṃ hi puṃsas tapasaḥ śrutasya vā sviṣṭasya sūktasya ca buddhadattayoḥ /
analyzed: idam hi puṃsaḥ tapasaḥ śrutasya vā su iṣṭasya sūktasya ca buddha dattayoḥ

original: MSS_5928-2 avicyuto'rthaḥ kavibhirnirūpito yaduttamaślokaguṇānuvarṇanam //
analyzed: avicyuta ūrthaḥ kavibhiḥ nirūpitaḥ yat uttamaśloka guṇa anuvarṇanam

original: MSS_5929-1 idaṃ hi prāṇayaśasaṃ krayavikrayapattanam /
analyzed: idam hi prāṇa yaśasam kraya vikraya pattanam

original: MSS_5929-2 svāmisatkāraśalyānām atraivoddharaṇī kriyā //
analyzed: svāmi satkāra śalyānām atra eva uddharaṇī kriyā

original: MSS_5930-1 idaṃ hi māhātmyaviśeṣasūcakaṃ vadanti cihnaṃ mahatāṃ manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: idam hi māhātmya viśeṣa sūcakam vadanti cihnam mahatām manīṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_5930-2 mano yadeṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃbhave prayāti no harṣaviṣādavaśyatām //
analyzed: manaḥ yat eṣām sukha duḥkha saṃbhave prayāti no harṣa viṣāda vaśya tām

original: MSS_5931-1 idaṃ hi vaidagdhyarahasyamuttamaṃ paṭhen na sūktiṃ kavimāninaḥ puraḥ /
analyzed: idam hi vaidagdhya rahasyam uttamam paṭhet na sūktim kavi māninaḥ puras

original: MSS_5931-2 na kevalaṃ tāṃ na vibhāvayatyasau svakāvyabandhena vināśayatyapi //
analyzed: na kevalam tām na vibhāvayati asau sva kāvya bandhena vināśayati api

original: MSS_5932-1 idamananyaparāyaṇamanyathā hṛdayasaṃnihite hṛdayaṃ mama /
analyzed: idam ananya parāyaṇam anyathā hṛdaya saṃnihite hṛdayam mama

original: MSS_5932-2 yadi samarthayase madirekṣaṇe madanabāṇahato'smi hataḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: yadi samarthayase madirā īkṣaṇe madana bāṇa hataḥ asmi hataḥ punar

original: MSS_5933-1 idamanucitamakramaś ca puṃsāṃ yadiha jarasyapi mānmatho vikāraḥ /
analyzed: idam anucitam akramaḥ ca puṃsām yat iha jarasi api mānmathaḥ vikāraḥ

original: MSS_5933-2 yadapi ca na kṛtaṃ nitambinīnāṃ stanapatanāvadhi jīvitaṃ rataṃ vā //
analyzed: yat api ca na kṛtam nitambinīnām stana patana avadhi jīvitam ratam vā

original: MSS_5934-1 idamanuditahotuḥ ko'pi homāvasāna- jvaladanalamavādīt kuṇḍamākhaṇḍalasya /
analyzed: idam anudita hotuḥ kaḥ api homa avasāna jvalat analam avādīt kuṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya

original: MSS_5934-2 maṇighaṭamabhiṣeke prātarasyocureke kalitakiraṇatoyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ caṇḍabhāsaḥ //
analyzed: maṇi ghaṭam abhiṣeke prātar asya ūcuḥ eke kalita kiraṇa toyam maṇḍalam caṇḍa bhāsaḥ

original: MSS_5935-1 idamantaramupakṛtaye prakṛticalā yāvadarthisaṃpadiyam /
analyzed: idam antaram upakṛtaye prakṛti calā yāvat arthi saṃpad iyam

original: MSS_5935-2 vipadi niyatodayāyāṃ punarupakartuṃ kuto'vasaraḥ //
analyzed: vipadi niyata udayāyām punar upakartum kutovasaraḥ

original: MSS_5936-1 idamandhaṃ tamaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jāyeta bhuvanatrayam /
analyzed: idam andham tamaḥ kṛtsnam jāyeta bhuvanatrayam

original: MSS_5936-2 yadi śabdāhvayaṃ jyotir ā saṃsārān na dīpyate //
analyzed: yadi śabda āhvayam jyotiḥ ā saṃsārāt na dīpyate

original: MSS_5937-1 idamanyac ca devarṣe rahasyaṃ sarvayoṣitām /
analyzed: idam anyat ca deva ṛṣe rahasyam sarva yoṣitām

original: MSS_5937-2 dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣaṃ hṛdyaṃ yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva puruṣam hṛdyam yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ

original: MSS_5938-1 idamapaṭu kapāṭaṃ jarjaraḥ pañjaro'yaṃ viramati na gṛhe'smin krūramārjārayātrā /
analyzed: idam apaṭu kapāṭam jarjaraḥ pañjaraḥ yam viramati na gṛhe ismin krūra mārjāra yātrā

original: MSS_5938-2 śuka mukulitajihvaṃ sthīyatāṃ kiṃ vacobhis tava vacanavinode nādaraḥ pāmarāṇām //
analyzed: śuka mukulita jihvam sthīyatām kim vacobhiḥ tava vacana vinode na ādaraḥ pāmarāṇām

original: MSS_5939-1 idamaparamadbhutatamaṃ yuvatisahasrairvilupyamānasya /
analyzed: idam aparam adbhutatamam yuvati sahasraiḥ vilupyamānasya

original: MSS_5939-2 vṛddhirbhavati na hānir yat tava saubhāgyakoṣasya //
analyzed: vṛddhiḥ bhavati na hāniḥ yat tava saubhāgya koṣasya

original: MSS_5940-1 idamapāsya virāgi parāgiṇīr alikadambakamamburuhāṃ tatīḥ /
analyzed: idam apāsya virāgi parāgiṇīḥ ali kadambakam amburuhām tatīḥ

original: MSS_5940-2 stanabhareṇa jitastabakānaman- navalate valate'bhimukhaṃ tava //
analyzed: stana bhareṇa jita stabaka ānaman nava late tava

original: MSS_5941-1 idamapratimaṃ paśya saraḥ sarasijairvṛtam /
analyzed: idam apratimam paśya saraḥ sarasijaiḥ vṛtam

original: MSS_5941-2 sakhe mā jalpa nārīṇāṃ nayanāni dahanti mām //
analyzed: sakhe mā jalpa nārīṇām nayanāni dahanti mām

original: MSS_5942-1 idamamṛtamameyaṃ seyamānandasindhur madhumadhuramapīdaṃ kiṃcidantardhunoti /
analyzed: idam amṛtam ameyam sā iyam ānanda sindhuḥ madhu madhuram api idam kiṃcid antardhunoti

original: MSS_5942-2 yadayamudayalīlīlālasānāṃ vadhūnāṃ rativinimayabhājāṃ kelibhiryāti kālaḥ //
analyzed: yat ayam udaya līlī lālasānām vadhūnām rati vinimaya bhājām kelibhiḥ yāti kālaḥ

original: MSS_5943-1 idamamlānamānāyā lagnaṃ stanataṭe tava /
analyzed: idam amlāna mānāyāḥ lagnam stana taṭe tava

original: MSS_5943-2 chādyatāmuttarīyeṇa navaṃ nakhapadaṃ sakhi //
analyzed: chādyatām uttarīyeṇa navam nakha padam sakhi

original: MSS_5944-1 idamayuktamaho mahadeva yad varatanoḥ smarayatyanilo'nyadā /
analyzed: idam ayukta mahaḥ mahat eva yat vara tanoḥ smarayati anilaḥ nyadā

original: MSS_5944-2 smṛtasayauvanasoṣmapayodharān satuhinas tu hinastu viyoginaḥ //
analyzed: smṛta sa yauvana sa ūṣma payodharān sa tuhinaḥ tu hinastu viyoginaḥ

original: MSS_5945-1 idamaśiśirairantastāpād vivarṇamaṇīkṛtaṃ niśi niśi bhujanyastāpāṅgaprasāribhiraśrubhiḥ /
analyzed: idam aśiśiraiḥ antar tāpāt vivarṇa maṇīkṛtam niśi niśi bhuja nyasta apāṅga prasāribhiḥ aśrubhiḥ

original: MSS_5945-2 anabhilulitajyāghātāṅkaṃ muhurmaṇibandhanāt kanakavalayaṃ srastaṃ srastaṃ mayā pratisāryate //
analyzed: an abhilulita jyā ghāta aṅkam muhur maṇibandhanāt kanaka valayam srastam srastam mayā pratisāryate

original: MSS_5946-1 idamasulabhavastuprārthanādurnivāraṃ prathamamapi mano me pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti /
analyzed: idam asulabha vastu prārthanā durnivāram prathamam api manaḥ me pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti

original: MSS_5946-2 kimuta malayavātonmūlitāpāṇḍupatrair upavanasahakārairdarśiteṣvaṅkureṣu //
analyzed: kim uta malaya vāta unmūlita āpāṇḍu patraiḥ upavana sahakāraiḥ darśiteṣu aṅkureṣu

original: MSS_5947-1 idamaskhalitaṃ dhāraya vāraya paruṣākṣarā vācaḥ /
analyzed: idam askhalitam dhāraya vāraya paruṣa akṣarāḥ vācaḥ

original: MSS_5947-2 ekaḥ sakalajanānāṃ jagati ripuḥ paruṣavāk puruṣaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ sakala janānām jagati ripuḥ paruṣa vāc puruṣaḥ

original: MSS_5948-1 idamahaṃ karuṇāmṛtasāgaraṃ śaśikiśoraśiromaṇimarthaye /
analyzed: idam aham karuṇā amṛta sāgaram śaśi kiśora śiromaṇim arthaye

original: MSS_5948-2 vrajatu janmani janmani me vapur bhavadupāsanasādhanatāmiti //
analyzed: vrajatu janmani janmani me vapuḥ bhavat upāsana sādhana tām iti

original: MSS_5949-1 idamābhāti gagane bhindānaṃ saṃtataṃ tamaḥ /
analyzed: idam ābhāti gagane bhindānam saṃtatam tamaḥ

original: MSS_5949-2 amandanayanānandakaraṃ maṇḍalamaindavam //
analyzed: amanda nayana ānanda karam maṇḍalam aindavam

original: MSS_5950-1 idamidamiti bhūruhāṃ prasūnair muhuratilobhayatā puraḥpuro'nyā /
analyzed: idam idam iti bhūruhām prasūnaiḥ muhur atilobhayatā

original: MSS_5950-2 anurahasamanāyi nāyakena tvarayati rantumaho janaṃ manobhūḥ //
analyzed: anurahasam anāyi nāyakena tvarayati rantum aho janam manobhūḥ

original: MSS_5951-1 idamidamiti samyak karmaṇā yojanīyaṃ niyatamiti vicintya prāpayedīhamānaḥ /
analyzed: idam idam iti samyak karmaṇā yojanīyam niyatam iti vicintya prāpayet īhamānaḥ

original: MSS_5951-2 sunayapihitarandhraḥ prākṛto yasya vargaḥ kṣitipatirupabhuṅkte sa trivargaṃ cirāya //
analyzed: su naya pihita randhraḥ prākṛtaḥ yasya vargaḥ kṣitipatiḥ upabhuṅkte sa trivargam cirāya

original: MSS_5952-1 idamucchvasitālakaṃ mukhaṃ tava viśrāntakathaṃ dunoti mām /
analyzed: idam ucchvasita alakam mukham tava viśrānta katham dunoti mām

original: MSS_5952-2 niśi suptamivaikapaṅkajaṃ viratābhyantaraṣaṭpadasvanam //
analyzed: niśi suptam iva eka paṅkajam virata abhyantara ṣaṭpada svanam

original: MSS_5953-1 idamuddiśya vayasyāḥ svasamīhitadaivataṃ namata /
analyzed: idam uddiśya vayasyāḥ sva samīhita daivatam namata

original: MSS_5953-2 yamunaiva jānudaghnī bhavatu na vā nāviko'stvaparaḥ //
analyzed: yamunā eva jānu daghnī bhavatu na vā

original: MSS_5954-1 idamupahitasūkṣmagranthinā skandhadeśe stanayugapariṇāhācchādinā valkalena /
analyzed: idam upahita sūkṣma granthinā skandha deśe stana yuga pariṇāha ācchādinā valkalena

original: MSS_5954-2 vapurabhinavamasyāḥ puṣyati svāṃ na śobhāṃ kusumamiva pinaddhaṃ pāṇdupatrodareṇa //
analyzed: vapuḥ abhinavam asyāḥ puṣyati svām na śobhām kusumam iva pinaddham

original: MSS_5955-1 idamubhayabhittisaṃtata- hāraguṇāntargataikakucamukulam /
analyzed: idam ubhaya bhitti saṃtata hāra guṇa antargata eka kuca mukulam

original: MSS_5955-2 guṭikādhanuriva bālā- vapuḥ smaraḥ śrayati kututena //
analyzed: guṭikā dhanuḥ iva bālā vapuḥ smaraḥ śrayati kututena

original: MSS_5956-1 idametat kariṣyāmi tata etad bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: idam etat kariṣyāmi tatas etat bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_5956-2 saṃkalpaḥ kriyate yo'yaṃ na taṃ mṛtyuḥ pratīkṣate //
analyzed: saṃkalpaḥ kriyate yaḥ yam na tam mṛtyuḥ pratīkṣate

original: MSS_5957-1 idameva kalerasya madavisphūrjitaṃ mahat /
analyzed: idam eva kaleḥ asya mada visphūrjitam mahat

original: MSS_5957-2 yan me manorathāvāptiḥ na rāmabhajanādapi //
analyzed: yat me manoratha avāptiḥ na rāma bhajanāt api

original: MSS_5958-1 idameva narendrāṇāṃ svargadvāramanargalam /
analyzed: idam eva narendrāṇām svarga dvāram anargalam

original: MSS_5958-2 yadātmanaḥ pratijñā ca prajā ca paripālyate //
analyzed: yadā ātmanaḥ pratijñā ca prajā ca paripālyate

original: MSS_5959-1 idameva paraṃ maurkhyam upāyaistribhirujjhitam /
analyzed: idam eva param maurkhyam upāyaiḥ tribhiḥ ujjhitam

original: MSS_5959-2 parākramante yuddheṣu samamevobhaye bhaṭāḥ //
analyzed: parākramante yuddheṣu samam eva ubhaye bhaṭāḥ

original: MSS_5960-1 idameva mahad dhairyaṃ dhīrāṇāṃ sutapasvinām /
analyzed: idam eva mahat dhairyam dhīrāṇām su tapasvinām

original: MSS_5960-2 vighnavantyapi saṃprāpya yad vighnairna vihanyate //
analyzed: vighnavanti api saṃprāpya yat vighnaiḥ na vihanyate

original: MSS_5961-1 idameva hi janmaphalaṃ jīvitaphalametadeva yat puṃsām /
analyzed: idam eva hi janma phalam jīvita phalam etat eva yat puṃsām

original: MSS_5961-2 laṭahanitambavatījana- saṃbhogasukhena yāti tāruṇyam //
analyzed: laṭaha nitambavatī jana saṃbhoga sukhena yāti tāruṇyam

original: MSS_5962-1 idameva hi nirṇītaṃ paiśunyād duḥkhasaṃgamaḥ /
analyzed: idam eva hi nirṇītam paiśunyāt duḥkha saṃgamaḥ

original: MSS_5962-2 anyārthaṃ khanato gartaṃ kūpe pātaḥ suniścitaḥ //
analyzed: anya artham khanataḥ gartam kūpe pātaḥ su niścitaḥ

original: MSS_5963-1 idameva hi pāṇḍityaṃ cāturyamidameva hi /
analyzed: idam eva hi pāṇḍityam cāturyam idam eva hi

original: MSS_5963-2 idameva subuddhitvam āyādalpataro vyayaḥ //
analyzed: idam eva su buddhi tvam āyāt alpataraḥ vyayaḥ

original: MSS_5964-1 idameva hi pāṇḍityam iyameva kulīnatā /
analyzed: idam eva hi pāṇḍityam iyam eva kulīna tā

original: MSS_5964-2 ayameva paro dharma āyādalpataro vyayaḥ //
analyzed: ayam eva paraḥ dharmaḥ āyāt alpataraḥ vyayaḥ

original: MSS_5965-1 idānīṃ tīvrābhirdahana iva bhābhiḥ parigato mamāścaryaṃ sūryaḥ kimu sakhi rajanyāmudayate /
analyzed: idānīm tīvrābhiḥ dahanaḥ iva bhābhiḥ parigataḥ mama āścaryam sūryaḥ kimu sakhi rajanyām udayate

original: MSS_5965-2 ayaṃ mugdhe candraḥ kimiti mayi tāpaṃ prakaṭayaty anāthānāṃ bāle kimiha viparītaṃ na bhavati //
analyzed: ayam mugdhe candraḥ kim iti mayi tāpam prakaṭayati anāthānām bāle kim iha viparītam na bhavati

original: MSS_5966-1 idānīṃ tu mayā jñātaṃ tyāgān nāsti paraṃ sukham /
analyzed: idānīm tu mayā jñātam tyāgāt nā asti param sukham

original: MSS_5966-2 nāsti vidyāsamaṃ cakṣur nāsti cakṣuḥsamaṃ balam //
analyzed: na asti vidyā samam cakṣuḥ na asti cakṣuḥ samam balam

original: MSS_5967-1 idānīṃ plakṣāṇāṃ jaṭharadalaviśleṣacaturaḥ śikhānāmābandhaḥ sphurati śukacañcūpuṭanibhaḥ /
analyzed: idānīm plakṣāṇām jaṭhara dala viśleṣa caturaḥ śikhānām ābandhaḥ sphurati śuka cañcū puṭa nibhaḥ

original: MSS_5967-2 tataḥ strīṇāṃ hanta kṣamamadharakāntiṃ kalayituṃ samantān niryāti sphuṭasubhagarāgaṃ kisalayam //
analyzed: tatas strīṇām hanta kṣamam adhara kāntim kalayitum samantāt niryāti sphuṭa subhaga rāgam kisalayam

original: MSS_5968-1 idānīṃ vaṃśīnāṃ śabaramithunocchṛṅkhalarahaḥ- kriyāsakhyenālaṃ girivanasaridgrāmasuhṛdām /
analyzed: idānīm vaṃśīnām śabara mithuna ucchṛṅkhala rahaḥ kriyā sakhyena alam giri vana sarit grāma suhṛdām

original: MSS_5968-2 sphurallomaśyāmacchagalaśiśukarṇapratisama- cchadāgrābhis tvagbhirvalayitakarīrās taṭabhuvaḥ //
analyzed: sphurat loma śyāma chagala śiśu karṇa pratisama chada agrābhiḥ tvagbhiḥ valayita karīrāḥ taṭa bhuvaḥ

original: MSS_5969-1 idānīṃ santu kāvyāni bahūni jagatītale /
analyzed: idānīm santu kāvyāni bahūni jagatī tale

original: MSS_5969-2 yadādarśamayaṃ kāvyam ādyaṃ tat tu tadeva hā //
analyzed: yat ādarśa mayam kāvyam ādyam tat tu tat eva hā

original: MSS_5970-1 idānīmaṅgamakṣāli racitaṃ cānulepanam /
analyzed: idānīm aṅgam akṣāli racitam ca anulepanam

original: MSS_5970-2 idānīmeva te kṛṣṇa dhūlīdhūsaritaṃ vapuḥ //
analyzed: idānīm eva te kṛṣṇa dhūlī dhūsaritam vapuḥ

original: MSS_5971-1 idānīmarghanti prathamakalamacchedamuditā navāgrānnasthālīparimalamuco hālikagṛhāḥ /
analyzed: idānīm arghanti prathama kalama cheda muditāḥ nava agra anna sthālī parimala mucaḥ hālika gṛhāḥ

original: MSS_5971-2 udañcaddorvallīraṇitavalayābhiryuvatibhir gṛhītaprotkṣiptabhramitamasṛṇodgīrṇamuśalāḥ //
analyzed: udañcat dos vallī raṇita valayābhiḥ yuvatibhiḥ gṛhīta protkṣipta bhramita masṛṇa udgīrṇa muśalāḥ

original: MSS_5972-1 inaḥ sa eva sevyo yaḥ svālokena sudhāmucā /
analyzed: inaḥ saḥ eva sevyaḥ yaḥ sva ālokena sudhā mucā

original: MSS_5972-2 dvijendramaṇḍalaṃ kṣīṇaṃ samagrayati saṃpadā //
analyzed: dvijendra maṇḍalam kṣīṇam samagrayati saṃpadā

original: MSS_5973-1 indindirairnirbharagarbhamīṣad- unmeṣavaccampakapuṣpamāsīt /
analyzed: indindiraiḥ nirbhara garbham īṣat unmeṣa vat campaka puṣpam āsīt

original: MSS_5973-2 hiraṇmayaṃ śāsanalekhahetoḥ sajjaṃ maṣībhāṇḍamiva smarasya //
analyzed: hiraṇmayam śāsana lekha hetoḥ sajjam maṣī bhāṇḍam iva smarasya

original: MSS_5974-1 indindiro marande vimukho yadi kiṃ nu madhuni māhātmyam /
analyzed: indindiraḥ marande vimukhaḥ yadi kim nu madhuni māhātmyam

original: MSS_5974-2 rasiko vāñchati no cet rāgādharabimbamasya ko bhūmā (?) //
analyzed: rasikaḥ vāñchati no ced rāgādhara bimbam asya kaḥ

original: MSS_5975-1 indīvaraṃ locanayos tulāyai nirmāya yatnena vidhiḥ kadācit /
analyzed: indīvaram locanayoḥ tulāyai nirmāya yatnena vidhiḥ kadācid

original: MSS_5975-2 atulyatāṃ vīkṣya tato rajāṃsi nikṣipya cikṣepa sa paṅkamadhye //
analyzed: atulya tām vīkṣya tatas rajāṃsi nikṣipya cikṣepa sa paṅka madhye

original: MSS_5976-1 indīvaradalaśyāmam indirānandakandalam /
MSS_5976-2 vandārujanamandāraṃ vande'haṃ yadunandanam //
MSS_5977-1 indīvaraśyāmatanurnṛpo'sau tvaṃ rocanāgauraśarīrayaṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: indīvara śyāma tanuḥ nṛpā usau tvam rocanā gaura śarīra yaṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_5977-2 anyonyaśobhāparivṛddhaye vāṃ yogas taḍittoyadayorivāstu //
analyzed: anyonya śobhā parivṛddhaye vām yogaḥ taḍit toyadayoḥ iva astu

original: MSS_5978-1 indīvarasyāntarametadasyā netrotpalasyāpi yato himāṃśoḥ /
analyzed: indīvarasya antaram etat asyāḥ netra utpalasya api yatas himāṃśoḥ

original: MSS_5978-2 tviṣo'pi naikaṃ sahate mukhākhyam ākramya tasthāvaparaṃ śaśāṅkam //
analyzed: tviṣā upi nā ekam sahate mukha ākhyam ākramya tasthau aparam śaśāṅkam

original: MSS_5979-1 indīvarākṣi tava tīvrakaṭākṣabāṇa- pātavraṇe dvitayamauṣadhameva manye /
analyzed: indīvara akṣi tava tīvra kaṭākṣa bāṇa pāta vraṇe dvitayam auṣadham eva manye

original: MSS_5979-2 ekaṃ tavādharasudhārasapānamanyad uttuṅgapīnakucakuṅkumapaṅkalepaḥ //
analyzed: ekam tava adhara sudhā rasa pānam anyat uttuṅga pīna kuca kuṅkuma paṅka lepaḥ

original: MSS_5980-1 indīvarākṣyāḥ sphuṭavidrumoṣṭhyāḥ saṃketamuddiśya vane carantyāḥ /
analyzed: indīvara akṣyāḥ sphuṭa vidruma uṣṭhyāḥ saṃketam uddiśya vane carantyāḥ

original: MSS_5980-2 cauraiḥ samastābharaṇāni hṛtvā nāsāmaṇirno'pahṛtaḥ kimetat //
analyzed: cauraiḥ samasta ābharaṇāni hṛtvā nāsāmaṇiḥ na upahṛtaḥ kim etat

original: MSS_5981-1 indīvareṇa nayanaṃ mukhamambujena kundena dantamadharaṃ navapallavena /
analyzed: indīvareṇa nayanam mukham ambujena kundena dantam adharam nava pallavena

original: MSS_5981-2 aṅgāni campakadalaiḥ sa vidhāya vedhāḥ kānte kathaṃ ghaṭitavānupalena cetaḥ //
analyzed: aṅgāni campaka dalaiḥ sa vidhāya vedhāḥ kānte katham ghaṭitavān upalena cetaḥ

original: MSS_5982-1 indīvarodarasahodarameduraśrīr vāso dravatkanakavṛndanibhaṃ dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: indīvara udara sahodara medura śrīḥ vāsaḥ dravat kanaka vṛnda nibham dadhānaḥ

original: MSS_5982-2 āmuktamauktikamanoharahāravakṣāḥ ko'yaṃ yuvā jagadanaṅgamayaṃ karoti //
analyzed: āmukta mauktika manohara hāra vakṣāḥ koyam yuvā jagat anaṅga mayam karoti

original: MSS_5983-1 induṃ kairaviṇīva kokapaṭalīvāmbhojinīvallabhaṃ meghaṃ cātakamaṇḍalīva madhupaśreṇīva puṣpavrajam /
analyzed: indum kairaviṇī iva koka paṭalī iva ambhojinī vallabham megham cātaka maṇḍalī iva madhupa śreṇī iva puṣpa vrajam

original: MSS_5983-2 mākandaṃ pikasundarīva ramaṇīvātmeśvaraṃ proṣitaṃ cetovṛttiriyaṃ sadā nṛpavara tvāṃ draṣṭumutkaṇṭhate //
analyzed: mākandam pika sundarī iva ramaṇī iva ātma īśvaram proṣitam cetaḥ vṛttiḥ iyam sadā nṛpa vara tvām draṣṭum utkaṇṭhate

original: MSS_5984-1 induṃ taṇḍulakhaṇḍamaṇḍalaruciṃ nityoditaṃ jātucid darśe meghagharaṭṭaghaṭṭanagaladdehaṃ vidhatte vidhiḥ /
analyzed: indum taṇḍula khaṇḍa maṇḍala rucim nitya uditam jātucit darśe megha gharaṭṭa ghaṭṭana galat deham vidhatte vidhiḥ

original: MSS_5984-2 nūnaṃ lokahitecchayā kirati yat saṃtarpaṇaṃ sarvataḥ śubhrādabhraviśiṣṭapiṣṭaruciraṃbhūmau tuṣāraṃ divaḥ //
analyzed: nūnam loka hita icchayā kirati yat saṃtarpaṇam sarvatas śubhra adabhra viśiṣṭa piṣṭa ruciram bhūmau tuṣāram divaḥ

original: MSS_5985-1 induṃ nindati cakravākayugalaṃ bhāsāṃ nidhiṃ kauśikaḥ svādukṣīramarocakī sukṛtinaṃ pāpī jaḍaḥ paṇḍitam /
analyzed: indum nindati cakravāka yugalam bhāsām nidhim kauśikaḥ svādu kṣīram arocakī su kṛtinam pāpī jaḍaḥ paṇḍitam

original: MSS_5985-2 tyaktaṃ sarvajanaiḥ khalaḥ kaṭuvacā grāmyaḥ pumān nāgaraṃ kaḥ paitāmahagolake'tra nikhilaiḥ saṃmānito vartate //
analyzed: tyaktam sarva janaiḥ khalaḥ kaṭu vacāḥ grāmyaḥ pumān nāgaram kaḥ paitāmaha gola ketra nikhilaiḥ saṃmānitaḥ vartate

original: MSS_5986-1 induṃ nindati candanaṃ na sahate mallīsrajaṃ nekṣate hāraṃ dveṣṭi sitābjamujjhati bisastomaṃ nigṛhṇāti ca /
analyzed: indum nindati candanam na sahate mallī srajam nā īkṣate hāram dveṣṭi sita abjam ujjhati bisa stomam nigṛhṇāti ca

original: MSS_5986-2 śrībhūpāla mahīdhareṣu vipineṣvambhodhitīreṣu ca tvatkīrtis tvadaripriyā ca vilasatyuccaiḥ sphuratpāṇḍimā //
analyzed: śrī bhūpāla mahīdhareṣu vipineṣu ambhodhi tīreṣu ca tvad kīrtiḥ tvad ari priyā ca vilasati uccais sphurat pāṇḍimā

original: MSS_5987-1 induṃ nindati candanaṃ na sahate vidveṣṭi paṅkeruhaṃ hāraṃ bhāramavaiti naiva kurute karpūrapūre manaḥ /
analyzed: indum nindati candanam na sahate vidveṣṭi paṅkeruham hāram bhāram avaiti nā eva kurute karpūrapūre manaḥ

original: MSS_5987-2 svargaṅgāmavagāhate himagiriṃ gāḍhaṃ samāliṅgate yatkīrtirvirahātureva na manāgekatra viśrāmyati //
analyzed: svar gaṅgām avagāhate himagirim gāḍham samāliṅgate yat kīrtiḥ viraha āturaḥ eva na manāk ekatra viśrāmyati

original: MSS_5988-1 induṃ nindati taskaro gṛhapatiṃ jāro suśīlaṃ khalaḥ sādhvīmapyasatī kulīnamakulo jahyāj jarantaṃ yuvā /
analyzed: indum nindati taskaraḥ gṛhapatim su śīlam khalaḥ sādhvīm api asatī kulīnam akulaḥ jahyāt jarantam yuvā

original: MSS_5988-2 vidyāvantamanakṣaro dhanapatiṃ nīcaś ca rūpojjvalaṃ vairūpyeṇa hataḥ prabuddhamabudhotkṛṣṭaṃ nikṛṣṭo janaḥ //
analyzed: vidyāvantam anakṣaraḥ dhanapatim nīcaḥ ca rūpa ujjvalam vairūpyeṇa hataḥ prabuddham abudha utkṛṣṭam nikṛṣṭaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_5989-1 induṃ nindati padmakhaṇḍakadalītalpaṃ na vā manyate karpūraṃ kirati prayāti na ratiṃ prāleyadhārāgṛhe /
analyzed: indum nindati padma khaṇḍa kadalī talpam na vā manyate karpūram kirati prayāti na ratim prāleya dhārāgṛhe

original: MSS_5989-2 kiṃ vānyat tava viprayogaśikhinā sā dahyamānā muhus tvāmantarhṛdayasthitaṃ davabhayān netrāmbubhiḥ siñcati //
analyzed: kim vā anyat tava viprayoga śikhinā sā dahyamānā muhur tvām antar hṛdaya sthitam dava bhayāt netra ambubhiḥ siñcati

original: MSS_5990-1 induṃ nindatu nāma vātha nalinīṃ nindantu cakrāhvayā naivānena sudhākarasya suṣamāhānirna vā duryaśaḥ /
analyzed: indum nindatu nāma vā atha nalinīm nindantu cakrāhvayāḥ na eva anena sudhākarasya suṣamā hāniḥ na vā duryaśaḥ

original: MSS_5990-2 etenaiva kṛtārthatāsya janatā yanmodamālambate yajjyotsnāsu ciraṃ cakorapariṣac cañcūpuṭaṃ nyasyati //
analyzed: etena eva kṛtārtha tā asya janatā yat modam ālambate yat jyotsnāsu ciram cakora pariṣad cañcū puṭam nyasyati

original: MSS_5991-1 induṃ mukhād bahutṛṇaṃ tava yad gṛṇanti nainaṃ mṛgas tyajati tan mṛgatṛṣṇayaiva /
analyzed: indum mukhāt bahu tṛṇam tava yat gṛṇanti na enam mṛgaḥ tyajati tat mṛgatṛṣṇayā eva

original: MSS_5991-2 atyeti mohamahimā na himāṃśubimba- lakṣmīviḍambimukhi vittiṣu pāśavīṣu //
analyzed: atyeti moha mahimā na himāṃśu bimba lakṣmī viḍambi mukhi vittiṣu pāśavīṣu

original: MSS_5992-1 induṃ vetti divākaraṃ malayajaṃ dāvānalaṃ manyate jānātyambujamulmukaṃ kalayati prāleyatalpaṃ citām /
analyzed: indum vetti divākaram malayajam dāva analam manyate jānāti ambujam ulmukam kalayati prāleya talpam citām

original: MSS_5992-2 hārāṅgārakadarthitena manasā sṛṣṭiṃ samastāmimāṃ saṃpratyagnimayī na vetti subhagā tyaktā varākī tvayā //
analyzed: hāra aṅgāra kadarthitena manasā sṛṣṭim samastām imām saṃprati agni mayī na vetti subhagā tyaktā varākī tvayā

original: MSS_5993-1 induḥ kiṃ kva kalaṅkaḥ sarasijametat kimambu kutra gatam /
analyzed: induḥ kim kva kalaṅkaḥ sarasijam etat kim ambu kutra gatam

original: MSS_5993-2 lalitasavilāsavacanair mukhamiti hariṇākṣi niścitaṃ parataḥ //
analyzed: lalita savilāsa vacanaiḥ mukham iti hariṇa akṣi niścitam paratas

original: MSS_5994-1 induḥ prayāsyati vinaṅkṣyati tārakaśrīḥ sthāsyanti līḍhatimirā na maṇipradīpāḥ /
analyzed: induḥ prayāsyati vinaṅkṣyati tāraka śrīḥ sthāsyanti līḍha timirāḥ na maṇi pradīpāḥ

original: MSS_5994-2 andhaṃ samagramapi kīṭamaṇe bhaviṣyaty unmeṣameṣyati bhavānapi durametat //
analyzed: andham samagram api kīṭamaṇe bhaviṣyati unmeṣam eṣyati bhavān api duram etat

original: MSS_5995-1 induprabhārasavidaṃ vihagaṃ vihāya kīrānane sphurasi bhārati kā ratis te /
analyzed: indu prabhā rasa vidam vihagam vihāya kīra ānane sphurasi bhārati kā ratiḥ te

original: MSS_5995-2 ādyaṃ yadi śrayasi jalpatu kaumudīnāṃ govindarājavacasāṃ ca viśeṣameṣaḥ //
analyzed: ādyam yadi śrayasi jalpatu kaumudīnām govinda rāja vacasām ca viśeṣam eṣaḥ

original: MSS_5996-1 indubimbādivotkīrṇaṃ padmagarbhādivoddhṛtam /
analyzed: indu bimbāt iva utkīrṇam padmagarbhāt iva uddhṛtam

original: MSS_5996-2 vadanaṃ tava tanvaṅgi vimṛśadbhirvibhāvyate //
analyzed: vadanam tava tanu aṅgi vimṛśadbhiḥ vibhāvyate

original: MSS_5996A-1 indubhāskarayoryatra nabhaḥsaṃcārakhinnayoḥ /
analyzed: indu bhāskarayoḥ yatra nabhaḥ saṃcāra khinnayoḥ

original: MSS_5996A-2 patākāḥ pavanādhūtāḥ bhajante tālavṛntatām //
analyzed: patākāḥ pavana ādhūtāḥ bhajante tālavṛnta tām

original: MSS_5997-1 indumindumukhi lokaya lokaṃ bhānubhānubhiramuṃ paritaptam /
analyzed: indum indu mukhi lokaya lokam bhānu bhānubhiḥ amum paritaptam

original: MSS_5997-2 vījituṃ rajanihastagṛhītaṃ tālavṛntamiva nālavihīnam //
analyzed: vījitum rajani hasta gṛhītam tālavṛntam iva nāla vihīnam

original: MSS_5998-1 indumindradigasūta sarasvān uttaraṅgabhujarājiranṛtyat /
analyzed: indum indra diś asūta sarasvān uttaraṅga bhuja rājiḥ anṛtyat

original: MSS_5998-2 ujjaharṣa jhaṣaketuravāpuḥ ṣaṭpadāḥ kumudabandhanamokṣam //
analyzed: ujjaharṣa jhaṣaketuḥ avāpuḥ ṣaṭpadāḥ kumuda bandhana mokṣam

original: MSS_5999-1 indumukhī kumudākṣī rambhorū kamalacārukaracaraṇā /
MSS_5999-2 amṛtadravalāvaṇyā hṛdayagatā devi kiṃ dahasi //
analyzed: amṛta drava lāvaṇyā hṛdaya gatā devi kim dahasi

original: MSS_6000-1 indurinduriti kiṃ durāśayā bindureṣa payaso vilokyate /
analyzed: induḥ induḥ iti kim durāśayā binduḥ eṣa payasaḥ vilokyate

original: MSS_6000-2 nanvidaṃ vijayate mṛgīdṛśaḥ śyāmakomalakapolamānanam //
analyzed: nanu idam vijayate mṛgī dṛśaḥ śyāma komala kapolam ānanam

original: MSS_6001-1 indurmūrdhni śivasya śailaduhiturvakro nakhāṅkaḥ stane deyād vo'bhyudayaṃ dvayaṃ tadupamāmālambamānaṃ mithaḥ /
analyzed: induḥ mūrdhni śivasya śaila duhituḥ vakraḥ nakha aṅkaḥ stane deyāt dvayam tad upamām ālambamānam mithas

original: MSS_6001-2 samvādaḥ praṇavena yasya dalatā kāyaikatāyāṃ tayor ūrdhvadvāravicintitena ca hṛdi dhyātasvarūpeṇa ca //
analyzed: samvādaḥ praṇavena yasya dala tā kāya ekatāyām tayoḥ ūrdhva dvāra vicintitena ca hṛdi dhyāta svarūpeṇa ca

original: MSS_6002-1 induryatra na nindyate na madhuraṃ dūtīvacaḥ śrūyate nālāpā nipatanti bāṣpakaluṣā nopaiti kārśyaṃ tanuḥ /
analyzed: induḥ yatra na nindyate na madhuram dūtī vacaḥ śrūyate na ālāpāḥ nipatanti bāṣpa kaluṣā nā upaiti kārśyam tanuḥ

original: MSS_6002-2 svādhīnāmanukūlinīṃ svagṛhiṇīmāliṅgya yat supyate tat kiṃ prema gṛhāśramavratamidaṃ kaṣṭaṃ samācaryate //
analyzed: sva adhīnām anukūlinīm sva gṛhiṇīm āliṅgya yat supyate tat kim prema gṛha āśrama vratam idam kaṣṭam samācaryate

original: MSS_6003-1 induryadyudayādrimūrdhni na bhavatyadyāpi tan mā sma bhūn nāsīre'pi tamaḥsamuccayamamūrunmūlayanti tviṣaḥ /
analyzed: induḥ yadi udayādri mūrdhni na bhavati adya api tat mā sma bhūt tamaḥ samuccayam amūḥ unmūlayanti tviṣaḥ

original: MSS_6003-2 apyakṣṇormudamudgiranti kumudairāmodayante diśaḥ saṃpratyūrdhvamasau tu lāñchanamabhivyaṅktuṃ prakāśiṣyate //
analyzed: api akṣṇoḥ mudam udgiranti kumudaiḥ āmodayante diśaḥ saṃprati ūrdhvam asau tu lāñchanam abhivyaṅktum prakāśiṣyate

original: MSS_6004-1 indurlipta ivāñjanena jaḍitā dṛṣṭirmṛgīṇāmiva pramlānāruṇimeva vidrumadalaṃ śyāmeva hemaprabhā /
analyzed: induḥ liptaḥ iva añjanena jaḍitā dṛṣṭiḥ mṛgīṇām iva pramlāna aruṇima iva vidruma dalam śyāmā iva hema prabhā

original: MSS_6004-2 kārkaśyaṃ kalayā ca kokilavadhūkaṇṭheṣviva prastutaṃ sundaryāḥ purataśca hanta śikhināṃ barhāḥ sagarhā iva //
analyzed: kārkaśyam kalayā ca kokila vadhū kaṇṭheṣu iva prastutam sundaryāḥ puratas ca hanta śikhinām barhāḥ sa garhāḥ iva

original: MSS_6005-1 induvratasahasraṃ tu cared yaḥ kāyaśodhanam /
analyzed: induvrata sahasram tu caret yaḥ kāya śodhanam

original: MSS_6005-2 pibed yaś cāpi gaṅgāmbhaḥ samau syātāṃ na vā samau //
analyzed: pibet yaḥ ca api gaṅgā ambhaḥ samau syātām na vā samau

original: MSS_6006-1 indus tvadyaśasā jito'vanipate bhāsāṃnidhis tejasā kandarpo vapuṣā sudhājalanidhirvāco vilāsena ca /
analyzed: induḥ tvad yaśasā jitaḥ uvanipate bhāsāṃnidhiḥ tejasā kandarpaḥ vapuṣā sudhā jalanidhiḥ vācaḥ vilāsena ca

original: MSS_6006-2 tathyaṃ te jayaśīlametadadhunā tvaddānamaddainyayor madhye kaṃ nu vijeṣyatīti viṣaye dolāyate me manaḥ //
analyzed: tathyam te jaya śīlam etat adhunā tvad dāna mad dainyayoḥ madhye kam nu vijeṣyati iti viṣaye dolāyate me manaḥ

original: MSS_6007-1 indūdayaś candanaminduvaktraś caitras tathā yasya mahāya saṃpat /
analyzed: indu udayaḥ candanam induvaktraḥ caitraḥ tathā yasya saṃpad

original: MSS_6007-2 vapuś ca śṛṅgāramayaṃ sa manye saṃtāpakas tvaṃ haravahniyogāt //
analyzed: vapuḥ ca śṛṅgāra mayam sa manye saṃtāpakaḥ tvam hara vahni yogāt

original: MSS_6008-1 indoḥ kalākalāpena paṅktikramaniveśinā /
analyzed: indoḥ kalā kalāpena paṅkti krama niveśinā

original: MSS_6008-2 sarvaduḥkhāpanodāya bālakānāṃ kṛtā bhujāḥ //
analyzed: sarva duḥkha apanodāya bālakānām kṛtāḥ bhujāḥ

original: MSS_6009-1 indoḥ kāntiṃ jaḍatarakarān mattanāgād gatiṃ vā trastān netre harasi hariṇāt tatra kiṃ nāma citram /
analyzed: indoḥ kāntim jaḍatara karāt matta nāgāt gatim vā trastāt netre harasi hariṇāt tatra kim nāma citram

original: MSS_6009-2 etac citraṃ punariha jagajjaitrakandarpacāpa- śrīsarvasvaṃ yadapaharasi preyasi bhrūvilāsaiḥ //
analyzed: etat citram punar iha jagat jaitra kandarpa cāpa śrī sarva svam yat apaharasi preyasi bhrū vilāsaiḥ

original: MSS_6010-1 indoḥ kiṃ druhiṇasya vā surapateḥ kiṃ vā kṛtāntasya vā kiṃ bhūteśa diśāsthi bhūṣaṇagaṇeśvākṛṣya deyaṃ mayā /
analyzed: indoḥ kim druhiṇasya vā surapateḥ kim vā kṛtāntasya vā kim bhūteśa diśā asthi bhūṣaṇa gaṇa īśva ākṛṣya deyam mayā

original: MSS_6010-2 itthaṃ maṇḍanamandirodaracaravyāhārato bhīkarāt bhītā yasya surāḥ prasādhanavidhau pāyāt sa vaḥ śaṃkaraḥ //
analyzed: ittham maṇḍana mandira udara cara vyāhārataḥ bhīkarāt bhītāḥ yasya surāḥ prasādhana vidhau pāyāt sa vaḥ śaṃkaraḥ

original: MSS_6011-1 indoḥ saṃkṣayarakṣiṇākṣatasudhā kiṃ vedhasā nirmitā kiṃ dhairyāpaharā harasya vihitā kāmena kāntā tanuḥ /
analyzed: indoḥ saṃkṣaya rakṣiṇā akṣata sudhā kim vedhasā nirmitā kim dhairya apaharā harasya vihitā kāmena kāntā tanuḥ

original: MSS_6011-2 kiṃ tāruṇyavasantakāntilalitā śṛṅgārasiktā latā kiṃ lāvaṇyataraṅgiṇī punariyaṃ janmāntarāptā ratiḥ //
analyzed: kim tāruṇya vasanta kānti lalitā śṛṅgāra siktā latā kim lāvaṇya taraṅgiṇī punar iyam janma antara āptā ratiḥ

original: MSS_6012-1 indoragatayaḥ padme sūryasya kumudeṃ'śavaḥ /
analyzed: indoḥ agatayaḥ padme sūryasya kumuda iṃśavaḥ

original: MSS_6012-2 guṇās tasya vipakṣe'pi guṇino lebhire'ntaram //
analyzed: guṇāḥ tasya vipakṣe pi guṇinaḥ

original: MSS_6013-1 indorasya triyāmāyuvatikucataṭīcandanasthāsakasya vyomaśrīcāmarasya tripuraharajaṭāvallarīkorakasya /
analyzed: indoḥ asya triyāmā yuvati kuca taṭī candana sthāsakasya vyoma śrī cāmarasya tripura hara jaṭā vallarī korakasya

original: MSS_6013-2 kaṃdarpakṣoṇipālasphaṭikamaṇigṛhasyaitadākha ṇḍalāśā- nāsāmuktāphalasya sthagayati jagatīṃ ko'pi bhāsāṃ vilāsaḥ //
analyzed: kandarpa kṣoṇipāla sphaṭika maṇi gṛhasya etat ākha ṇḍala āśā nāsā muktāphalasya sthagayati jagatīm kaḥ api bhāsām vilāsaḥ

original: MSS_6014-1 indorivāsya purato yad vimukhī sāpavāraṇā bhramasi /
analyzed: indoḥ iva asya puratas yat vimukhī sa apavāraṇā bhramasi

original: MSS_6014-2 tat kathaya kiṃ nu duritaṃ sakhi tvayā chāyayeva kṛtam //
analyzed: tat kathaya kim nu duritam sakhi tvayā chāyayā iva kṛtam

original: MSS_6015-1 indorekakalāyā rudreṇoddhṛtya mūrdhani dhṛtāyāḥ /
analyzed: indoḥ eka kalāyāḥ rudreṇa uddhṛtya mūrdhani dhṛtāyāḥ

original: MSS_6015-2 sthānamiva tucchametat kalaṅkarūpeṇa pariṇamati //
analyzed: sthānam iva tuccham etat kalaṅka rūpeṇa pariṇamati

original: MSS_6016-1 indorlakṣma tripurajayinaḥ kaṇṭhamūlaṃ murārir diṅnāgānāṃ madajalamasībhāñji gaṇḍasthalāni /
analyzed: indoḥ lakṣma tripura jayinaḥ kaṇṭha mūlam murāriḥ diṅnāgānām madajala masī bhāñji gaṇḍa sthalāni

original: MSS_6016-2 adyāpyurvīvalayatilaka śyāmalimnāvaliptāny ābhāsante vada dhavalitaṃ kiṃ yaśobhis tvadīyaiḥ //
analyzed: adyā api urvī valaya tilaka śyāma limnā avaliptāni ābhāsante vada dhavalitam kim yaśobhiḥ tvadīyaiḥ

original: MSS_6017-1 indoś candanabindunaiva daśanacchāyaṃ tadīyaṃ mukhaṃ cakraṃ locanabhallamārjanavidhau śāṇasya tat kuṇḍalam /
analyzed: indoḥ candana bindunā eva daśana chāyam tadīyam mukham cakram locana bhalla mārjana vidhau śāṇasya tat kuṇḍalam

original: MSS_6017A-2 bhinnānāṃ kucakandarā smitasudhākulyeva muktāvalī pādābje dhvanadindranīlavalayaṃ rolambamālaiva sā //
analyzed: bhinnānām kuca kandarā smita sudhā ākulyā iva muktā āvalī pāda abje dhvanat indranīla valayam rolamba mālā eva sā

original: MSS_6017A-1 indau nindyā cakorairasamayati niśājāgaraḥ puṇḍarīkaiḥ bhṛṅgaiḥ śīdhunyasaṅgaḥ śaradi samadhikā glānirindīvaraiśca /
analyzed: indau nindyā cakoraiḥ asamayati niśā jāgaraḥ puṇḍarīkaiḥ bhṛṅgaiḥ śīdhunī asaṅgaḥ śaradi samadhikā glāniḥ indīvaraiḥ ca

original: MSS_6017-2 bhrūbhaṅge yasya vairākarayuvatidṛśāmekamevopamānaṃ paśyāmyaśrāntabāṣpaprakaramayajharīgūḍ hacārāś camaryaḥ //
analyzed: bhrū bhaṅge yasya vaira ākara yuvati dṛśām ekam eva upamānam paśyāmi aśrānta bāṣpa prakara maya jharī gūḥ ha cārāḥ camaryaḥ

original: MSS_6018-1 indraṃ dvyakṣadharaṃ tvamanthamudadhiṃ pañcānanaṃ padmajaṃ sindhuṃ svādujalaṃ śivaṃ sitagalaṃ kāmaṃ ca sadvigraham /
analyzed: indram dvi akṣa dharam tu amantham udadhim pañcānanam padmajam sindhum svādu jalam śivam sita galam kāmam ca sat vigraham

original: MSS_6018-2 śailān pakṣadharāṃs tathaiva ca hayāṃl lakṣmīpatiṃ piṅgalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ sarvamidaṃ kvacin na raghurāḍdattaṃ svayaṃ hāritam //
analyzed: śailān pakṣa dharān tathā eva ca hayān lakṣmīpatim piṅgalam dṛṣṭam sarvam idam kvacid na raghu rāj dattam svayam hāritam

original: MSS_6019-1 indraṃ vai ṣaṇḍhamāhurmalinamuḍupatiṃ mādhavaṃ gopasūnuṃ vyāsaṃ matsītanūjaṃ gatarasamudadhiṃ pāvakaṃ sarvabhakṣam /
analyzed: indram vai ṣaṇḍham āhuḥ malinam uḍupatim mādhavam gopa sūnum vyāsam matsī tanūjam gata rasam udadhim pāvakam sarva bhakṣam

original: MSS_6019-2 veśyāputraṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ janapadavacanaiḥ pāṇḍavāś cānyajātā itthaṃ saṃcintya mahyaṃ kathaya narapate kasya doṣā na santi //
analyzed: veśyā putram vasiṣṭham janapada vacanaiḥ pāṇḍavāḥ ca anya jātāḥ ittham saṃcintya mahyam kathaya narapate kasya doṣāḥ na santi

original: MSS_6020-1 indraḥ prakṣubdhacitto diśi diśi sakalān dikpatīn sāvadhānān kurvan vajrāstrapāṇiḥ suravaravalitāṃ devasenāṃ nigṛhya /
analyzed: indraḥ prakṣubdha cittaḥ diśi diśi sakalān dikpatīn sa avadhānān kurvan vajra astra pāṇiḥ suravara valitām devasenām nigṛhya

original: MSS_6020-2 svargadvāre yadīyoddhatabalinihataprauḍhaḍhakkāninādaṃ śrutvātiṣṭhat prakampatkucakalaśataṭīkinnarīgīyamānaḥ //
analyzed: svargadvāre yadīya uddhata bali nihata prauḍha ḍhakkā ninādam śrutvā atiṣṭhat prakampat kuca kalaśa taṭī kinnarī gīyamānaḥ

original: MSS_6021-1 indraḥ pradhānaṃ divi daivateṣu vipro manuṣyeṣu nadīṣu gaṅgā /
analyzed: indraḥ pradhānam divi daivateṣu vipraḥ manuṣyeṣu nadīṣu gaṅgā

original: MSS_6021-2 gāvaḥ paśuṣveṣu dhaneṣu dhānyaṃ sarvatra gātrasya śiraḥ pradhānam //
analyzed: gāvaḥ paśuṣu eṣu dhaneṣu dhānyam sarvatra gātrasya śiraḥ pradhānam

original: MSS_6021A-1 indragopakaparamparā bhṛśaṃ kānaneṣu śuśubhe visarpiṇī /
analyzed: indragopaka paramparā bhṛśam kānaneṣu śuśubhe visarpiṇī

original: MSS_6021A-2 prāvṛṣaḥ sarabhasāgamāc cyutā padmarāgaghaṭiteva karṇikā //
analyzed: prāvṛṣaḥ sa rabhasa āgamāt cyutā padmarāga ghaṭitā iva karṇikā

original: MSS_6022-1 indragopairbabhau bhūmir nicitaiva pravāsinām /
analyzed: indragopaiḥ babhau bhūmiḥ nicitā eva pravāsinām

original: MSS_6022-2 anaṅgabāṇairhṛdbhedasrutalohitabindubhiḥ //
analyzed: anaṅga bāṇaiḥ hṛdbheda sruta lohita bindubhiḥ

original: MSS_6023-1 indrajic caṇḍavīryo'si nāmnaiva balavānasi /
analyzed: indrajit caṇḍa vīryaḥ asi nāmnā eva balavān asi

original: MSS_6023-2 dhik dhik pracchannarūpeṇa yudhyase'smadbhayākulaḥ //
analyzed: dhik dhik pracchanna rūpeṇa yudhyase smat bhaya ākulaḥ

original: MSS_6024-1 indranīlaśukapakṣakomalā śaṅkhakundakumudendusaṃnibhā /
MSS_6024-2 taptakāñcanavikāsicampaka- spardhinī vasumatī praśasyate //
MSS_6025-1 indras tvaṃ nṛpa sundarī tava śacī putro jayantopamo gehaṃ bhāti ca vaijayantasadṛśaṃ nāgo'bhramorvallabhaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ tvam nṛpa sundarī tava śacī putraḥ jayanta upamaḥ geham bhāti ca vaijayanta sadṛśam nāgaḥ bhramoḥ vallabhaḥ

original: MSS_6025-2 itthaṃ bodhakarairasatyavacanaiḥ svairaṃ stutaḥ svaṃ hariṃ vetti prasphuṭavikramaṃ sa mahimā jñeyo harermāyinaḥ //
analyzed: ittham bodha karaiḥ asatya vacanaiḥ svairam stutaḥ svam harim vetti prasphuṭa vikramam sa mahimā jñeyaḥ hareḥ māyinaḥ

original: MSS_6026-1 indrasya vajreṇa hato vṛtrāsuramahāyaśāḥ /
analyzed: indrasya vajreṇa hataḥ vṛtra asura mahā yaśāḥ

original: MSS_6026-2 medasā sarvavicchinnaṃ tadarthamupalepanam //
analyzed: medasā sarva vicchinnam tad artham upalepanam

original: MSS_6027-1 indrasyārkasya vāyoś ca yamasya varuṇasya ca /
analyzed: indrasya arkasya vāyoḥ ca yamasya varuṇasya ca

original: MSS_6027-2 candrasya ca pṛthivyāś ca nṛpaḥ saptaguṇo bhavet //
analyzed: candrasya ca pṛthivyāḥ ca nṛpaḥ saptaguṇaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_6028-1 indrāt prabhutvaṃ jvalanāt pratāpaṃ krodho yamād vaiśravaṇāc ca vittam /
analyzed: indrāt prabhu tvam jvalanāt pratāpam krodhaḥ yamāt vaiśravaṇāt ca vittam

original: MSS_6028-2 parākramaṃ rāmajanārdanābhyām ādāya rājñaḥ kriyate śarīram //
analyzed: parākramam rāma janārdanābhyām ādāya rājñaḥ kriyate śarīram

original: MSS_6029-1 indrādyā lokapālā harividhutapanā nāgavidyādharādyā dveṣyāḥ sarve'pi devāḥ priya tava varadaḥ ko'sti vandyo garīyān /
analyzed: indra ādyāḥ lokapālāḥ hari vidhu tapanāḥ nāga vidyādhara ādyāḥ dveṣyāḥ sarve api devāḥ priya tava vara daḥ kaḥ asti vandyaḥ garīyān

original: MSS_6029-2 śrutvā vācaṃ priyāyā iti daśamukhataḥ prāha vākyaṃ daśāsyaḥ śūlī śaṃbhuḥ pinākī śivabhavapaśupaḥ śarva īśaś ca bhargaḥ //
analyzed: śrutvā vācam priyāyāḥ iti daśa mukhataḥ prāha vākyam daśa āsyaḥ śūlī śaṃbhuḥ pinākī śiva bhava paśupaḥ śarvaḥ īśaḥ ca bhargaḥ

original: MSS_6030-1 indrādyaiḥ kiṃ pradattaṃ pradiśasi dhavalaṃ dhāma dhanyaṃ yadebhyo mahyaṃ yan nāpi dhatse tṛṇaghaṭitakuṭīṃ kiṃ mayā te'parāddham
analyzed: indra ādyaiḥ kim pradattam pradiśasi dhavalam dhāma dhanyam yat ebhyaḥ mahyam yat nā api dhatse tṛṇa ghaṭita kuṭīm kim mayā te aparāddham

original: MSS_6030-2 viśvebhyo viśvamātarvitarasi yadi vā śarma karmānusāri prottuṅgāyāḥ kṛpāyās tava tuhinagireḥ putri kutropayogaḥ //
analyzed: viśvebhyaḥ viśva mātar vitarasi yadi vā śarma karma anusāri prottuṅgāyāḥ kṛpāyāḥ tava tuhinagireḥ putri kutra upayogaḥ

original: MSS_6031-1 indrānilayamārkāṇām agneś ca varuṇasya ca /
analyzed: indra anila yama arkāṇām agneḥ ca varuṇasya ca

original: MSS_6031-2 candravitteśayoś cāpi mātrā nirhṛtya śāśvatīḥ //
analyzed: candra vitteśayoḥ ca api mātrāḥ nirhṛtya śāśvatīḥ

original: MSS_6032-1 indrābhyarthanayā pūrvaṃ bharatāya caturmukhaḥ /
analyzed: indra abhyarthanayā pūrvam bharatāya caturmukhaḥ

original: MSS_6032-2 pramodāya mahendrasya nāṭyaṃ samupadiṣṭavān //
analyzed: pramodāya mahā indrasya nāṭyam samupadiṣṭavān

original: MSS_6033-1 indrāya vīkṣamāṇas tanmukhamāsvādayannanantāya /
analyzed: indrāya vīkṣamāṇaḥ tad mukham āsvādayan anantāya

original: MSS_6033-2 spṛhayāmi cādya dayitām āliṅgan kārtavīryāya //
analyzed: spṛhayāmi ca adya dayitām āliṅgan kārtavīryāya

original: MSS_6034-1 indriyaṃ vijitaṃ yena tenaiva bhuvanaṃ jitam /
analyzed: indriyam vijitam yena tena eva bhuvanam jitam

original: MSS_6034-2 yaś cendriyaiḥ parābhūtaḥ sa sarvatra parājitaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ ca indriyaiḥ parābhūtaḥ sa sarvatra parājitaḥ

original: MSS_6035-1 indriyasyendriyasyārthe rāgadveṣau vyavasthitau /
analyzed: indriyasya indriyasya arthe rāga dveṣau vyavasthitau

original: MSS_6035-2 tayorna vaśamāgacchet tau hyasya paripanthinau //
analyzed: tayoḥ na vaśam āgacchet tau hi asya paripanthinau

original: MSS_6036-1 indriyāṇāṃ jaye yogaṃ samātiṣṭhed divāniśam /
analyzed: indriyāṇām jaye yogam samātiṣṭhet divāniśam

original: MSS_6036-2 jitendriyo hi śaknoti vaśe sthāpayituṃ prajāḥ //
analyzed: jita indriyaḥ hi śaknoti vaśe sthāpayitum prajāḥ

original: MSS_6037-1 indriyāṇāṃ jaye śūro dharmaṃ carati paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: indriyāṇām jaye śūraḥ dharmam carati paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_6037-2 satyavādī bhaved vaktā dātā bhavati vā na vā //
analyzed: satya vādī bhavet vaktā dātā bhavati vā na vā

original: MSS_6038-1 indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ yadyekaṃ kṣaratīndriyam /
analyzed: indriyāṇām tu sarveṣām yadi ekam kṣarati indriyam

original: MSS_6038-2 tato'sya kṣarati prajñā dṛteḥ pādādivodakam //
analyzed: tatas asya kṣarati prajñā dṛteḥ pādāt iva udakam

original: MSS_6039-1 indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena rāgadveṣakṣayeṇa ca /
analyzed: indriyāṇām nirodhena rāga dveṣa kṣayeṇa ca

original: MSS_6039-2 ahiṃsayā ca bhūtānām amṛtatvāya kalpate //
analyzed: ahiṃsayā ca bhūtānām amṛta tvāya kalpate

original: MSS_6040-1 indriyāṇāṃ prasaṅgena doṣamṛcchatyasaṃśayam /
analyzed: indriyāṇām prasaṅgena doṣam ṛcchati asaṃśayam

original: MSS_6040-2 saṃniyamya tu tānyeva tataḥ siddhiṃ niyacchati //
analyzed: saṃniyamya tu tāni eva tatas siddhim niyacchati

original: MSS_6041-1 indriyāṇāṃ prasaṅgena dharmasyāsevanena ca /
analyzed: indriyāṇām prasaṅgena dharmasya asevanena ca

original: MSS_6041-2 pāpān saṃyānti saṃsārān avidvāṃso narādhamāḥ //
analyzed: pāpān saṃyānti saṃsārān a vidvāṃsaḥ nara adhamāḥ

original: MSS_6042-1 indriyāṇāṃ prasṛṣṭānāṃ hayānāmiva vartmasu /
analyzed: indriyāṇām prasṛṣṭānām hayānām iva vartmasu

original: MSS_6042-2 dhṛtiṃ kurvīta sārathye dhṛtyā tāni jayed dhruvam //
analyzed: dhṛtim kurvīta sārathye dhṛtyā tāni jayet dhruvam

original: MSS_6043-1 indriyāṇāṃ vicaratāṃ viṣayeṣvapahāriṣu /
analyzed: indriyāṇām vicaratām viṣayeṣu apahāriṣu

original: MSS_6043-2 saṃyame yatnamātiṣṭhed vidvān yanteva vājinām //
analyzed: saṃyame yatnam ātiṣṭhet vidvān yantā iva vājinām

original: MSS_6044-1 indriyāṇāṃ hi caratāṃ yan mano'nuvidhīyate /
analyzed: indriyāṇām hi caratām yat manaḥ anuvidhīyate

original: MSS_6044-2 tadasya harati prajñāṃ vāyurnāvamivāmbhasi //
analyzed: tat asya harati prajñām vāyuḥ nāvam iva ambhasi

original: MSS_6045-1 indriyāṇāmadhiṣṭhātrī bhūtānāṃ cākhileṣu yā /
analyzed: indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātrī bhūtānām ca akhileṣu yā

original: MSS_6045-2 bhūteṣu satataṃ tasyai vyāptyai devyai namo namaḥ //
analyzed: bhūteṣu satatam tasyai vyāptyai devyai namaḥ namaḥ

original: MSS_6046-1 indriyāṇāmanutsargo mṛtyunā na viśiṣyate /
analyzed: indriyāṇām anutsargaḥ mṛtyunā na viśiṣyate

original: MSS_6046-2 atyarthaṃ punarutsargaḥ sādayed daivatānyapi //
analyzed: atyartham punar utsargaḥ sādayet daivatāni api

original: MSS_6047-1 indriyāṇi ca saṃyamya rāgadveṣavivarjitaḥ /
analyzed: indriyāṇi ca saṃyamya rāga dveṣa vivarjitaḥ

original: MSS_6047-2 samaduḥkhasukhaḥ śāntaḥ tattvajñaḥ sādhurucyate //
