analyzed: sama duḥkha sukhaḥ śāntaḥ tattva jñaḥ sādhuḥ ucyate

original: MSS_6048-1 indriyāṇi parāṇyāhur indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: indriyāṇi parāṇi āhuḥ indriyebhyaḥ param manaḥ

original: MSS_6048-2 manasas tu parā buddhir yo buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ //
analyzed: manasaḥ tu parā buddhiḥ yaḥ buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ

original: MSS_6049-1 indriyāṇi paśūn kṛtvā vedīṃ kṛtvā tapomayīm /
analyzed: indriyāṇi paśūn kṛtvā vedīm kṛtvā tapaḥ mayīm

original: MSS_6049-2 ahiṃsāmāhutiṃ kṛtvā ātmayajñaṃ yajāmyaham //
analyzed: ahiṃsām āhutim kṛtvā ātma yajñam yajāmi aham

original: MSS_6050-1 indriyāṇi purā jitvā jitaṃ tribhuvanaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: indriyāṇi purā jitvā jitam tribhuvanam tvayā

original: MSS_6050-2 smaradbhariva taidvairam indriyaireva nirjitaḥ //
analyzed: smarat bhariva taiḥ dvairam indriyaiḥ eva nirjitaḥ

original: MSS_6051-2 indriyāṇi pramāthīni harantyapi yatermanaḥ //
analyzed: indriyāṇi pramāthīni haranti api yateḥ manaḥ

original: MSS_6052-1 indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇo jñānamāyuḥ sukhaṃ dhṛtiḥ /
analyzed: indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇaḥ jñānam āyuḥ sukham dhṛtiḥ

original: MSS_6052-2 dhāraṇā preraṇaṃ duḥkham icchāhaṅkāra eva ca //
analyzed: dhāraṇā preraṇam duḥkham icchā ahaṅkāraḥ eva ca

original: MSS_6053-1 prayatna ākṛtirvarṇaḥ svaradveṣau bhavābhavau /
analyzed: prayatnaḥ ākṛtiḥ varṇaḥ svara dveṣau bhava abhavau

original: MSS_6053-2 tasyaitadātmajaṃ sarvam anāderādimicchataḥ //
analyzed: tasya etat ātma jam sarvam anādeḥ ādim icchataḥ

original: MSS_6054-1 indriyāṇi mano buddhir asyādhiṣṭhānamucyate /
analyzed: indriyāṇi manaḥ buddhiḥ asya adhiṣṭhānam ucyate

original: MSS_6054-2 etairvimohayatyeṣa jñānamāvṛtya dehinam //
analyzed: etaiḥ vimohayati eṣa jñānam āvṛtya dehinam

original: MSS_6055-1 indriyāṇi mahat prepsur niyacchedarthadharmayoḥ /
analyzed: indriyāṇi mahat prepsuḥ niyacchet artha dharmayoḥ

original: MSS_6055-2 indriyairniyatairbuddhir vardhate'gnirivendhanaiḥ //
analyzed: indriyaiḥ niyataiḥ buddhiḥ vardhate agniḥ iva indhanaiḥ

original: MSS_6056-1 indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ prāṇādīn mana eva ca /
analyzed: indriyāṇi indriya arthebhyaḥ prāṇa ādīn manaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_6056-2 nigṛhya samavāyena pratyāhāramupakramet //
analyzed: nigṛhya samavāyena pratyāhāram upakramet

original: MSS_6057-1 indriyāṇyanupakleśya labhyaṃ śreyo gṛhāśrame /
analyzed: indriyāṇi an upakleśya labhyam śreyaḥ gṛhāśrame

original: MSS_6057-2 atasturyāśramaṃ prāhur abādhanyāyabādhitam //
analyzed: atas turya āśramam prāhuḥ abādha nyāya bādhitam

original: MSS_6058-1 indriyāṇyantaraṅgāṇi pātayanti yathā janān /
analyzed: indriyāṇi antaraṅgāṇi pātayanti yathā janān

original: MSS_6058-2 abhyantarās tathā rāṣṭre bhṛtyāḥ svārthaparāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: abhyantarāḥ tathā rāṣṭre bhṛtyāḥ sva artha parāyaṇāḥ

original: MSS_6059-1 indriyāṇyeva tat sarvaṃ yat svarganarakāvubhau /
analyzed: indriyāṇi eva tat sarvam yat svarga narakau ubhau

original: MSS_6059-2 nigṛhītavisṛṣṭāni svargāya narakāya ca //
analyzed: nigṛhīta visṛṣṭāni svargāya narakāya ca

original: MSS_6060-1 indriyārtheṣu sarveṣu na prasajyeta kāmataḥ /
analyzed: indriya artheṣu sarveṣu na prasajyeta kāmataḥ

original: MSS_6060-2 atiprasaktiṃ caiteṣāṃ manasā saṃnivartayet //
analyzed: ati prasaktim ca eteṣām manasā saṃnivartayet

original: MSS_6061-1 indriyairindracandrādyā hrepitā yaiḥ surā api /
analyzed: indriyaiḥ indra candra ādyāḥ hrepitāḥ yaiḥ surāḥ api

original: MSS_6061-2 aparimlānamānatvaṃ tairmartyasyāthavā katham //
analyzed: a parimlāna māna tvam taiḥ martyasya athavā katham

original: MSS_6062-1 indriyairindriyārtheṣu vartamānairanigrahaiḥ /
analyzed: indriyaiḥ indriya artheṣu vartamānaiḥ anigrahaiḥ

original: MSS_6062-2 tairayaṃ tāpyate loko nakṣatrāṇi grahairiva //
analyzed: taiḥ ayam tāpyate lokaḥ nakṣatrāṇi grahaiḥ iva

original: MSS_6063-1 indro nindati vāhamāha dinakṛttvarvvācamevārvataś cañcūrnyañcati kiṃ na pannagariporantastrapodrekataḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ nindati vā aham āha cañcūḥ nyañcati kim na pannaga ripoḥ antar trapā udrekataḥ

original: MSS_6063-2 vātaḥ khañjati paṅgupuñjati manorājirbbhavadvājiṣu dbeṣādājiṣu vairiṇāmabhimukhaṃ dhāvatsu yāvat sukham //
analyzed: vātaḥ khañjati paṅgupuñjati manaḥ rājiḥ bhavat vājiṣu dbeṣāt ājiṣu vairiṇām abhimukham dhāvatsu yāvat sukham

original: MSS_6064-1 indro yacchatamanyurasti dahano yat pāvako'pyantakaḥ kīnāśo dhanado vimānanirataḥ pāśī jalānāṃ patiḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ yat śatamanyuḥ asti dahanaḥ yat pāvakaḥ upi antakaḥ kīnāśaḥ dhanadaḥ vimāna nirataḥ pāśī jalānām patiḥ

original: MSS_6064-2 īśaḥ kāmaharaś calo yadanilo yannairṛto rākṣasas tan nānyo'vanilokapāla bhavataḥ kaścit samaḥ syād guṇaiḥ //
analyzed: īśaḥ kāma haraḥ calaḥ yat anilaḥ yat nairṛtaḥ rākṣasaḥ tat bhavataḥ kaścid samaḥ syāt guṇaiḥ

original: MSS_6065-1 indro yamo'si varuṇo'si hutāśano'si brahmā haro harirasītyasakṛd yaduktiḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ yamaḥ asi varuṇaḥ asi hutāśanaḥ usi brahmā haraḥ hariḥ asi iti asakṛt yad uktiḥ

original: MSS_6065-2 bhūpālamaulimaṇirañjitapādapīṭha tasyānṛtasya phalamindhanamudvahāmi //
analyzed: bhūpāla mauli maṇi rañjita pāda pīṭha tasya anṛtasya phalam indhanam udvahāmi

original: MSS_6066-1 ibhakumbhatuṅgakaṭhinetaretara- stanabhāradūravinivāritodarāḥ /
analyzed: ibha kumbha tuṅga kaṭhina itaretara stana bhāra dūra vinivārita udarāḥ

original: MSS_6066-2 pariphullagaṇḍaphalakāḥ parasparaṃ parirebhire kukurakauravastriyaḥ //
analyzed: pariphulla gaṇḍa phalakāḥ parasparam parirebhire kukura kaurava striyaḥ

original: MSS_6067-1 ibhyā yadi nṛpadvāre saṃmanyante kimadbhutam /
analyzed: ibhyāḥ yadi nṛpa dvāre saṃmanyante kim adbhutam

original: MSS_6067-2 idānīṃ vibudhadvāre teṣāmeva puraskriyā //
analyzed: idānīm vibudha dvāre teṣām eva puraskriyā

original: MSS_6068-1 imaṃ kanakavarṇābhaṃ bhūṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam /
analyzed: imam kanaka varṇa ābham bhūṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam

original: MSS_6068-2 gṛdhravākyāt kathaṃ putraṃ tyajadhvaṃ pitṛpiṇḍadam //
analyzed: gṛdhra vākyāt katham putram tyajadhvam pitṛ piṇḍa dam

original: MSS_6069-1 imaṃ tilasumāyitaṃ yuvatināsikāsaṃpuṭaṃ vibhāvya sumanojano manasi modamāpadyate /
analyzed: imam tila sumāyitam yuvati nāsikā saṃpuṭam vibhāvya sumanaḥ janaḥ manasi modam āpadyate

original: MSS_6069-2 sakhe bhujagamutphaṇaṃ saviṣaphūtkṛtāhaṃkṛtaṃ vibhāvaya na tatspṛhāṃ kuru jahīhi taddṛśyatām //
analyzed: sakhe bhujagam utphaṇam sa viṣa phūtkṛta ahaṃkṛtam vibhāvaya na tad spṛhām kuru jahīhi tat dṛśyatām

original: MSS_6070-1 imaṃ parityajya paraṃ raṇādariḥ svameva bhagnaḥ śaraṇaṃ budhāviśat /
analyzed: imam parityajya param raṇāt ariḥ svam eva bhagnaḥ śaraṇam budha āviśat

original: MSS_6070-2 na vetti yat trātumitaḥ kṛtasmayo na durgayā śailabhuvāpi śakyate //
analyzed: na vetti yat trātum itas kṛta smayaḥ na durgayā śailabhuvā api śakyate

original: MSS_6071-1 imaṃ lokaṃ mātṛbhaktyā pitṛbhaktyā tu madhyamam /
analyzed: imam lokam mātṛ bhaktyā pitṛ bhaktyā tu madhyamam

original: MSS_6071-2 guruśuśrūṣayā tveva brahmalokaṃ samaśnute //
analyzed: guru śuśrūṣayā tu eva brahma lokam samaśnute

original: MSS_6072-1 imāṃ ca vindyādanuraktaceṣṭāṃ priyāṇi vakti svadhanaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: imām ca vindyāt anurakta ceṣṭām priyāṇi vakti sva dhanam dadāti

original: MSS_6072-2 vilokya saṃhṛṣyati vītaroṣā pramārṣṭi doṣān guṇakīrtanena //
analyzed: vilokya saṃhṛṣyati vīta roṣā pramārṣṭi doṣān guṇa kīrtanena

original: MSS_6073-1 imāṃ parīpsurdurjāte parābhibhavakātarām /
analyzed: imām parīpsuḥ durjāte para abhibhava kātarām

original: MSS_6073-2 bhartṛpriyaḥ priyairbhartur ānṛṇyamasubhirgataḥ //
analyzed: bhartṛ priyaḥ priyaiḥ bhartuḥ ānṛṇyam asubhiḥ gataḥ

original: MSS_6074-1 imāṃ vidhātuṃ bhujavallimujjvalāṃ gṛhītasāraṃ vidhinā natabhruvaḥ /
analyzed: imām vidhātum bhuja vallim ujjvalām gṛhīta sāram vidhinā nata bhruvaḥ

original: MSS_6074-2 kaṭhorabhāvapriyameva kevalaṃ mṛṇālamantastaralaṃ kuto'nyathā //
analyzed: kaṭhora bhāva priyam eva kevalam mṛṇālam antar taralam kutas nyathā

original: MSS_6075-1 imāṃ sāgaraparyantāṃ himavadvindhyakuṇḍalām /
analyzed: imām sāgara paryantām himavat vindhya kuṇḍalām

original: MSS_6075-2 mahīmekātapatrāṅkāṃ rājasiṃhaḥ praśāstu naḥ //
analyzed: mahīm eka atapatra aṅkām rāja siṃhaḥ praśāstu naḥ

original: MSS_6076-1 imāni prāyaśas tāni veśyāsvevaṃ pradāpayet /
analyzed: imāni prāyaśas tāni veśyāsu evam pradāpayet

original: MSS_6076-2 sā muñcatyacirāt sarvam upabhogaṃ tadātmanaḥ //
analyzed: sā muñcati acirāt sarvam upabhogam tad ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_6077-1 imā yadi bhavanti no galitayauvanā nīrucas tadā kamalalocanās taruṇamāninīrmā mucat /
analyzed: imāḥ yadi bhavanti naḥ galita yauvanāḥ nīrucaḥ tadā kamala locanāḥ taruṇa māninīḥ mā mucat

original: MSS_6077-2 vilāsamadavibhramān bhramati luṇṭhayatrī jarā yato bhuvi vadhus tato bhavati niḥspṛhas tanmukhe //
analyzed: vilāsa mada vibhramān bhramati luṇṭhayatrī jarā yatas bhuvi vadhuḥ tatas bhavati niḥspṛhaḥ tad mukhe

original: MSS_6078-1 imā rūpasthānasvajanatanayadravyavanitā- sutālakṣmīkīrtidyutiratimatiprītidhṛtayaḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ rūpa sthāna sva jana tanaya dravya vanitā suta alakṣmī kīrti dyuti rati mati prīti dhṛtayaḥ

original: MSS_6078-2 madāndhastrīnetraprakṛticapalāḥ sarvabhavinām aho kaṣṭaṃ martyas tadapi viṣayān sevitumanāḥ //
analyzed: mada andha strī netra prakṛti capalāḥ sarva bhavinām aho kaṣṭam martyaḥ tat api viṣayān sevitu manāḥ

original: MSS_6079-1 imāstāḥ kastūrīprakharakhuraṭaṅkakṣatataṭās taṭinyo'raṇyānīmanu kamalinīcchannasalilāḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ tāḥ kastūrī prakhara khura ṭaṅka kṣata taṭāḥ taṭinyāḥ uraṇyānīm anu kamalinī channa salilāḥ

original: MSS_6079-2 jale yāsāṃ haṃsā bisakisalayagrāsarasikāḥ salīlaṃ līyante yuvatigatividyaikaguravaḥ //
analyzed: jale yāsām haṃsāḥ bisa kisalaya grāsa rasikāḥ sa līlam līyante yuvati gati vidyā eka guravaḥ

original: MSS_6080-1 imāstā vindhyādreḥ śukaharitavaṃśīvanaghanā bhuvaḥ krīḍāloladviradadaśanābhugnataravaḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ tāḥ vindhya adreḥ śuka harita vaṃśī vana ghanāḥ bhuvaḥ krīḍā lola dvirada daśana ābhugna taravaḥ

original: MSS_6080-2 latākuñje yāsāmupanadi rataklāntaśabarī- kapolasvedāmbhaḥkaṇacayanudo vānti marutaḥ //
analyzed: latā kuñje yāsām upanadi rata klānta śabarī kapola sveda ambhaḥ kaṇa caya nudaḥ vānti marutaḥ

original: MSS_6081-1 imā hindolāsu bhramitamahasaḥ kuṅkumarucā trapārūpākārās taralatarahārāś caladṛśaḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ hindolāsu bhramita mahasaḥ kuṅkuma rucā trapā rūpa ākārāḥ taralatara hārāḥ cala dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_6081-2 udañcatkāñcīnāṃ bahalataraghoṣairmanasija- trilokīsamrājo dadhati jayaghaṇṭālininadam //
analyzed: udañcat kāñcīnām bahalatara ghoṣaiḥ manasija trilokī samrājaḥ dadhati jaya ghaṇṭā ali ninadam

original: MSS_6082-1 ime tāruṇyaśrīnavaparimalāḥ prauḍhasurata- pratāpaprārambhāḥ smaravijayadānapratibhuvaḥ /
analyzed: ime tāruṇya śrī nava parimalāḥ prauḍha surata pratāpa prārambhāḥ smara vijaya dāna pratibhuvaḥ

original: MSS_6082-2 ciraṃ cetaścaurā abhinavavikāraikaguravo vilāsavyāpārāḥ kimapi vijayante mṛgadṛśām //
analyzed: ciram cetaḥ caurāḥ abhinava vikāra eka guravaḥ vilāsa vyāpārāḥ kim api vijayante mṛga dṛśām

original: MSS_6083-1 ime padme nāmbhaḥ pulinataṭametan na taṭinī khametan na vyāptiḥ stabakayugametan na latikā /
analyzed: ime padme nā ambhaḥ pulina taṭam etat na taṭinī kham etat na vyāptiḥ stabaka yugam etat na latikā

original: MSS_6083-2 pravālo'yaṃ nābdhiḥ śiśirakiraṇo'yaṃ na rajanī ghano'yaṃ na prāvṛṭ śiva śiva vidheḥ śilparacanā //
analyzed: pravālaḥ yam nā abdhiḥ śiśirakiraṇaḥ yam na rajanī ghanaḥ yam na prāvṛṣ śiva śiva vidheḥ śilpa racanā

original: MSS_6084-1 ime mama dhanāṅgajasvajanavallabhādehajā- suhṛjjanakamātulaprabhṛtayo bhṛśaṃ vallabhāḥ /
analyzed: ime mama dhana aṅga ja sva jana vallabhā dehajā suhṛd janaka mātula prabhṛtayaḥ bhṛśam vallabhāḥ

original: MSS_6084-2 mudheti hatacetano bhavavane ciraṃ khidyate yato bhavati kasya ko jagati vālukāmuṣṭivat //
analyzed: mudhā iti hata cetanaḥ bhava vane ciram khidyate yatas bhavati kasya kaḥ jagati vālukā muṣṭi vat

original: MSS_6085-1 ime hi dainyena nimīlitekṣaṇā muhuḥ skhalanto vivaśās turaṅgamāḥ /
analyzed: ime hi dainyena nimīlita īkṣaṇāḥ muhur skhalantaḥ vivaśāḥ turaṅgamāḥ

original: MSS_6085-2 gajāś ca saptacchadadānagandhino nivedayantīva raṇe nivartanam //
analyzed: gajāḥ ca saptacchada dāna gandhinaḥ nivedayanti iva raṇe nivartanam

original: MSS_6086-1 imau rambhāstambhau dviradapatikumbhadvayamidaṃ tadetal līlābjaṃ śaradamṛtaraśmiḥ sphuṭamayam /
analyzed: imau rambhā stambhau dvirada pati kumbha dvayam idam tat etat līlā abjam śarad amṛta raśmiḥ sphuṭa mayam

original: MSS_6086-2 kimaṅge tanvaṅgyāḥ kalayati jagat kāntamadhikaṃ yadetasyāṃ śaśvat paravaśamivonmattamiva ca //
analyzed: kim aṅge tanvaṅgyāḥ kalayati jagat kāntam adhikam yat etasyām śaśvat paravaśam iva unmattam iva ca

original: MSS_6087-1 iyaṃ kalāvilāsinī kalāvatī samīpagā dhṛtāravindalocanā manojaśokamocanā /
analyzed: iyam kalā vilāsinī kalāvatī samīpa gā dhṛta aravinda locanā manoja śoka mocanā

original: MSS_6087-2 navīnanīradacchaṭāsamānakeśabhūṣitā na kasyacij janasya cittavṛttitāpakhaṇḍitā //
analyzed: navīna nīrada chaṭā samāna keśa bhūṣitā na kasyacid janasya cittavṛtti tāpa khaṇḍitā

original: MSS_6088-1 iyaṃ kiyaccārukuceti paśyate payaḥpradāyā hṛdayaṃ samāvṛtam /
analyzed: iyam kiyat cāru kucā iti paśyate payaḥ pradāyāḥ hṛdayam samāvṛtam

original: MSS_6088-2 dhruvaṃ manojñā vyataradyaduttaraṃ miṣeṇa bhṛṅgāradhṛteḥ karadvayī //
analyzed: dhruvam manojñā vyatarat yat uttaram miṣeṇa bhṛṅgāra dhṛteḥ kara dvayī

original: MSS_6089-1 iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīriyamamṛtavartirnayanayor asāvasyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi bahulaś candanarasaḥ /
analyzed: iyam gehe lakṣmīḥ iyam amṛta vartiḥ nayanayoḥ asau asyāḥ sparśaḥ vapuṣi bahulaḥ candana rasaḥ

original: MSS_6089-2 ayaṃ bāhuḥ kaṇṭhe śiśiramasṛṇo mauktikasaraḥ kimasyā na preyo yadi paramasahyastu virahaḥ //
analyzed: ayam bāhuḥ kaṇṭhe śiśira masṛṇaḥ mauktika saraḥ kim asyāḥ na preyaḥ yadi param asahyaḥ tu virahaḥ

original: MSS_6090-1 iyaṃ gauruddāmā tava nibiḍabandhāpi hi kathaṃ na vaidarbhādanyat spṛśati sulabhatve'pi hi katham /
analyzed: iyam gauḥ uddāmā tava nibiḍa bandhā api hi katham na vaidarbhāt anyat spṛśati sulabha tve pi hi katham

original: MSS_6090-2 avandhyā ca khyātā bhuvi kathamagamyā kavivṛṣaiḥ kathaṃ vā pīyūṣaṃ sravati bahu dugdhāpi bahubhiḥ //
analyzed: avandhyā ca khyātā bhuvi katham agamyā kavi vṛṣaiḥ katham vā pīyūṣam sravati bahu dugdhā api bahubhiḥ

original: MSS_6091-1 iyaṃ gaurekā naḥ kvacidapi na saṃyojanavidhāv amuṣyāḥ paśyāmo rasabharamucaṃ kāṃcidaparām /
analyzed: iyam gauḥ ekā naḥ kvacid api na saṃyojana vidhau amuṣyāḥ paśyāmaḥ rasa bhara mucam kāṃcid aparām

original: MSS_6091-2 gale baddhā dadhmo yadi na dhṛtiruddāmavidhṛtau bhayaṃ gocorebhyas tadiha ka upāyaḥ prabhavatu //
analyzed: gale baddhāḥ dadhmaḥ yadi na dhṛtiḥ uddāma vidhṛtau bhayam go corebhyaḥ tat iha kaḥ upāyaḥ prabhavatu

original: MSS_6092-1 iyaṃ ghaṭī mattagajendragāminī- vicitrasiṃhāsanasaṃsthitā sadā /
analyzed: iyam ghaṭī matta gaja indra gāminī vicitra siṃhāsana saṃsthitā sadā

original: MSS_6092-2 anekarāmājanalālitā paraṃ vidhervaśāt saiva satī prajārthinī //
analyzed: aneka rāmā jana lālitā param vidheḥ vaśāt sā eva satī prajā arthinī

original: MSS_6093-1 iyaṃ cidrūpāpi prakaṭajaḍarūpā bhagavatī yadīyāmbhobindurvitarati hi śaṃbhorapi padam /
analyzed: iyam cit rūpā api prakaṭa jaḍa rūpā bhagavatī yadīyā ambhaḥ binduḥ vitarati hi śaṃbhoḥ api padam

original: MSS_6093-2 punānā dhunvānā nikhilamapi nānāvidhamaghaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pāyādanudinamapāyāt suradhunī //
analyzed: punānā dhunvānā nikhilam api nānāvidham agham jagat kṛtsnam pāyāt anudinam apāyāt suradhunī

original: MSS_6094-1 iyaṃ tāval līlā yadadhiruruhe vṛddhavṛṣabho yadunnehe ruṇḍaṃ yadiha citibhasmāpi lilipe /
analyzed: iyam tāvat līlā yat adhiruruhe vṛddha vṛṣabhaḥ yat unnehe ruṇḍam yat iha citi bhasma api lilipe

original: MSS_6094-2 ayaṃ ko vyāpāro yadatilaki bhāle hutavaho yadagraivi vyālo yadakavali hālāhalamapi //
analyzed: ayam kaḥ vyāpāraḥ yat a tilaki bhāle hutavahaḥ yat a graivi vyālaḥ yat a kavali hālāhalam api

original: MSS_6095-1 iyaṃ te jananī prāptā tvadālokanatatparā /
analyzed: iyam te jananī prāptā tvad ālokana tatparā

original: MSS_6095-2 snehaprasnavanirbhinnam udvahantī stanadvayam //
analyzed: sneha prasnava nirbhinnam udvahantī stana dvayam

original: MSS_6096-1 iyaṃ triyāmā śatayāmadhāriṇī sudhākarādagnirudeti sarvataḥ /
analyzed: iyam triyāmā śata yāma dhāriṇī sudhākarāt agniḥ udeti sarvatas

original: MSS_6096-2 tanoti tāpaṃ mṛducandanānilo vidhau viruddhe hi vipat pade pade //
analyzed: tanoti tāpam mṛdu candana anilaḥ vidhau viruddhe hi vipad pade pade

original: MSS_6097-1 iyaṃ tvabhinnamaryādaiḥ svanuśiṣṭaiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ /
analyzed: iyam tu abhinna maryādaiḥ su anuśiṣṭaiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ

original: MSS_6097-2 sarvaṃsahairupāyajñair amūḍhaireva dhāryate //
analyzed: sarvaṃsahaiḥ upāya jñaiḥ amūḍhaiḥ eva dhāryate

original: MSS_6098-1 iyaṃ dhatte dhīre malayajasamīre na ca mudaṃ na padmānāṃ vṛnde lalitamakarande'pi ramate /
analyzed: iyam dhatte dhīre malayaja samīre na ca mudam na padmānām vṛnde lalita makarande api ramate

original: MSS_6098-2 na vā sā sānandā bhavati navakundāvalikule tadetasyā bādhāharamapi samādhānamiha kim //
analyzed: na vā sā sa ānandā bhavati nava kunda āvali kule tat etasyāḥ bādhā haram api samādhānam iha kim

original: MSS_6099-1 iyaṃ pallī bhillairanucitasamārambharasikaiḥ samantādākīrṇā viṣaviṣamabāṇapraṇayibhiḥ /
analyzed: iyam pallī bhillaiḥ anucita samārambha rasikaiḥ samantāt ākīrṇā viṣa viṣama bāṇa praṇayibhiḥ

original: MSS_6099-2 tarorasya skandhe gamaya samayaṃ kīra nibhṛtaṃ na vāṇī kalyāṇī tadiha mukhamudraiva śaraṇam //
analyzed: taroḥ asya skandhe gamaya samayam kīra nibhṛtam na vāṇī kalyāṇī tat iha mukha mudrā eva śaraṇam

original: MSS_6100-1 iyaṃ prītirvallīhṛdayabhuvi daivāt samuditā tathā yatnād rakṣyā prakṛtimṛdulāpāyabahulā /
analyzed: iyam prītiḥ vallī hṛdaya bhuvi daivāt samuditā tathā yatnāt rakṣyā prakṛti mṛdu lāpāya bahulā

original: MSS_6100-2 yathā naināṃ sphītāṃ piśunajanadurvākyadahano dahatyantaḥ śoṣaṃ vrajati na punaḥ sauhṛdanidheḥ //
analyzed: yathā nā enām sphītām piśuna jana durvākya dahanaḥ dahati antar śoṣam vrajati na punar sauhṛda nidheḥ

original: MSS_6101-1 iyaṃ bālā navodvāhā satyaṃ śrutvā vyathāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: iyam bālā nava udvāhā satyam śrutvā vyathām vrajet

original: MSS_6101-2 kāmaṃ dhīrasvabhāveyaṃ strīsvabhāvas tu kātaraḥ //
analyzed: kāmam dhīra svabhāvā iyam strī svabhāvaḥ tu kātaraḥ

original: MSS_6102-1 iyaṃ bālā māṃ pratyanavaratamindīvaradala- prabhācauraṃ cakṣuḥ kṣipati kimabhipretamanayā /
analyzed: iyam bālā mām prati anavaratam indīvara dala prabhā cauram cakṣuḥ kṣipati kim abhipretam anayā

original: MSS_6102-2 gato moho'smākaṃ smarasamarabāṇavyatikara- jvarajvālā śāntā tadapi na varākī viramati //
analyzed: gataḥ mohaḥ smākam smara samara bāṇa vyatikara jvara jvālā śāntā tat api na varākī viramati

original: MSS_6103-1 iyaṃ bālā vallī mṛdukisalayaṃ tāpavilayaṃ ghanacchāyaṃ śālaṃ navamativiśālaṃ parigatā /
analyzed: iyam bālā vallī mṛdu kisalayam tāpa vilayam ghana chāyam śālam navam ati viśālam parigatā

original: MSS_6103-2 paraṃtvasyābhyantargaralalavabhasmīkṛtavanaṃ bhujaṃgaṃ prottuṅgaṃ kathamiva varākī kalayatu //
analyzed: paraṃtu asya abhyantar garala lava bhasmīkṛta vanam bhujaṃgam prottuṅgam katham iva varākī kalayatu

original: MSS_6104-1 iyaṃ bhujaginīśritā lasadanekapuṣpānvitā dvirephatatisevitā pramadakhañjanālaṃkṛtā /
analyzed: iyam bhujaginī śritā lasat aneka puṣpa anvitā dvirepha tati sevitā pramada khañjana alaṃkṛtā

original: MSS_6104-2 phaladvayabharānatā vilasitā navaiḥ pallavair vilocanapathaṃ gatā bhavati kāpi haimī latā //
analyzed: phala dvaya bhara ānatā vilasitā navaiḥ pallavaiḥ vilocana patham gatā bhavati kā api haimī latā

original: MSS_6105-1 iyaṃ mayi proṣita eva saṃgatā himatviṣābhūt kṛtamaṇḍanā satī /
analyzed: iyam mayi proṣite eva saṃgatā himatviṣā abhūt kṛta maṇḍanā satī

original: MSS_6105-2 itīrṣyayeva drutamacchinad ruṣā vicitratārābharaṇāni bhāskaraḥ //
analyzed: iti īrṣyayā iva drutam acchinat ruṣā vicitra tārā ābharaṇāni bhāskaraḥ

original: MSS_6106-1 iyaṃ mahendraprabhṛtīnadhiśriyaś caturdigīśānavamatya māninī /
analyzed: iyam mahā indra prabhṛtīn adhiśriyaḥ catur diś īśān avamatya māninī

original: MSS_6106-2 arūpahāryaṃ madanasya nigrahāt pinākapāṇiṃ patimāptumicchati //
analyzed: arūpa hāryam madanasya nigrahāt pinākapāṇim patim āptum icchati

original: MSS_6107-1 iyaṃ mukhāmbhoruhasaṃnidhāne vilambidhammillataticchalena /
analyzed: iyam mukha ambhoruha saṃnidhāne vilambi dhammilla tati chalena

original: MSS_6107-2 samāgatāṃ sādarameva bālā dvirephamālāmuta vā dadhāti //
analyzed: samāgatām sa ādaram eva bālā dvirepha mālām uta vā dadhāti

original: MSS_6108-1 iyaṃ yaśāṃsi dviṣataḥ sudhārucaḥ kimaṅkametad dviṣataḥ kimānanam /
analyzed: iyam yaśāṃsi dviṣataḥ sudhā rucaḥ kim aṅkam etat dviṣataḥ kim ānanam

original: MSS_6108-2 yaśobhirasyākhilalokadhāvibhir vibhīṣitā dhāvati tāmasī masī //
analyzed: yaśobhiḥ asya akhila loka dhāvibhiḥ vibhīṣitā dhāvati tāmasī masī

original: MSS_6109-1 iyaṃ raṅgapraveśena kalānāṃ copaśikṣayā /
analyzed: iyam raṅga praveśena kalānām ca upaśikṣayā

original: MSS_6109-2 vañcanāpaṇḍitatvena svaranaipuṇyamāśritā //
analyzed: vañcanā paṇḍita tvena svara naipuṇyam āśritā

original: MSS_6110-1 iyaṃ vilāsadrumadohadaśrīr iyaṃ sudhā yauvanadugdhasindhoḥ /
analyzed: iyam vilāsa druma dohada śrīḥ iyam sudhā yauvana dugdha sindhoḥ

original: MSS_6110-2 lāvaṇyamāṇikyarucicchaṭeyam iyaṃ manaḥkārmaṇacūrṇamuṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: lāvaṇya māṇikya ruci chaṭā iyam iyam manaḥ kārmaṇa cūrṇa muṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_6111-1 iyaṃ vyādhāyate bālā bhrūrasyāḥ kārmukāyate /
analyzed: iyam vyādhāyate bālā bhrūḥ asyāḥ kārmukāyate

original: MSS_6111-2 kaṭākṣāś ca śarāyante mano me hariṇāyate //
analyzed: kaṭākṣāḥ ca śarāyante manaḥ me hariṇāyate

original: MSS_6112-1 iyaṃ samdhyā dūrādahamupagato hanta malayāt tadekāṃ tvadgehe karuṇavati neṣyāmi rajanīm /
analyzed: iyam samdhyā dūrāt aham upagataḥ hanta malayāt tad ekām tvad gehe karuṇavati neṣyāmi rajanīm

original: MSS_6112-2 samīreṇaivoktā navakusumitā cūtalatikā dhunānā murddhānaṃ nahi nahi nahītyeva kurute //
analyzed: samīreṇa eva uktā nava kusumitā cūta latikā dhunānā murddhānam nahi nahi nahi iti eva kurute

original: MSS_6113-1 iyaṃ sā kālindī kuvalayadalasnigdhamadhurā madāndhavyākūjattaruṇajalaraṃkupraṇayinī /
analyzed: iyam sā kālindī kuvalaya dala snigdha madhurā mada andha vyākūjat taruṇa jala raṃku praṇayinī

original: MSS_6113-2 purā yasyās tīre sarabhasasatṛṣṇaṃ murabhido gatāḥ prāyo gopīnidhuvanavinodena divasāḥ //
analyzed: purā yasyāḥ tīre sarabhasa sa tṛṣṇam murabhidaḥ gatāḥ prāyas gopī nidhuvana vinodena divasāḥ

original: MSS_6114-1 iyaṃ sā lolākṣī tribhuvanalalāmaikavasatiḥ sa cāyaṃ duṣṭātmā svasurapakṛtaṃ yena mama tat /
analyzed: iyam sā lola akṣī tribhuvana lalāma eka vasatiḥ sa ca ayam duṣṭa ātmā svasuḥ apakṛtam yena mama tat

original: MSS_6114-2 itas tīvraḥ kāmo gururayamitaḥ krodhadahanaḥ kṛto veṣaś cāyaṃ kathamidamiti bhrāmyati manaḥ //
analyzed: itas tīvraḥ kāmaḥ guruḥ ayam itas krodha dahanaḥ kṛtaḥ veṣaḥ ca ayam katham idam iti bhrāmyati manaḥ

original: MSS_6115-1 iyaṃ sunayanā dāsīkṛtatāmarasaśriyā /
analyzed: iyam sunayanā dāsīkṛta tāmarasa śriyā

original: MSS_6115-2 ānanenākalaṅkena jayantīnduṃ kalaṅkitam //
analyzed: ānanena akalaṅkena jayantī indum kalaṅkitam

original: MSS_6116-1 iyaṃ surataraṅgiṇī na punaratra nausaṃgamo bhavet taraṇimajjanaṃ pathika naiva pānthāgamaḥ /
analyzed: iyam sura taraṅgiṇī na punar atra nau saṃgamaḥ bhavet taraṇi majjanam pathika nā eva pāntha āgamaḥ

original: MSS_6116-2 nidhāya hṛdaye sadā vipulacārukumbhadvayaṃ sakhe ghanaghanāgame ghanarasasya pāraṃ vraja //
analyzed: nidhāya hṛdaye sadā vipula cāru kumbha dvayam sakhe ghana ghana āgame ghana rasasya pāram vraja

original: MSS_6117-1 iyaṃ sustanī mastakanyastakumbhā kusumbhāruṇaṃ cāru vāso vasānā /
analyzed: iyam su stanī mastaka nyasta kumbhā kusumbha aruṇam cāru vāsaḥ vasānā

original: MSS_6117-2 samastasya lokasya cetaḥpravṛttiṃ gṛhītvā ghaṭe nyasya yātīva bhāti //
analyzed: samastasya lokasya cetaḥ pravṛttim gṛhītvā ghaṭe nyasya yāti iva bhāti

original: MSS_6118-1 iyaṃ sṛṣṭā cañcatkanakalatikā paṅkajabhuvā niṣiktā lāvaṇyāmṛtarasabhareṇānudivasam /
analyzed: iyam sṛṣṭā cañcat kanaka latikā paṅkaja bhuvā niṣiktā lāvaṇya amṛta rasa bhareṇa anudivasam

original: MSS_6118-2 akasmād romālīmadhupapaṭalīha sphurati yat tataḥ śaṅke puṣpodgamasamayamāyātamadhunā //
analyzed: akasmāt romālī madhupa paṭalī iha sphurati yat tatas śaṅke puṣpa udgama samayam āyātam adhunā

original: MSS_6119-1 iyaṃ svargādhināthasya lakṣmīḥ kiṃ yakṣakanyakā /
analyzed: iyam svarga adhināthasya lakṣmīḥ kim yakṣa kanyakā

original: MSS_6119-2 athavā vipinasyaiva devatā kimu pārvati //
analyzed: athavā vipinasya eva devatā kimu pārvati

original: MSS_6120-1 iyaṃ hi nidrā nayanāvalambinī lalāṭadeśādupasarpatīva mām /
analyzed: iyam hi nidrā nayana avalambinī lalāṭa deśāt upasarpati iva mām

original: MSS_6120-2 adṛśyarūpā capalā jareva yā manuṣyasattvaṃ paribhūya vardhate //
analyzed: adṛśya rūpā capalā jarā iva yā manuṣya sattvam paribhūya vardhate

original: MSS_6121-1 iyaṃ hi yoniḥ prathamā yāṃ prāpya jagatīpate /
analyzed: iyam hi yoniḥ prathamā yām prāpya jagatīpate

original: MSS_6121-2 ātmā vai śakyate trātuṃ karmabhiḥ śubhalakṣaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: ātmā vai śakyate trātum karmabhiḥ śubha lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_6122-1 iyaṃ hi lokavyatirekavartinī svabhāvataḥ pārthivatā samuddhatā /
analyzed: iyam hi loka vyatireka vartinī svabhāvataḥ pārthiva tā samuddhatā

original: MSS_6122-2 balāt tadenāṃ vinayena yojayen nayasya siddhau vinayaḥ puraḥsaraḥ //
analyzed: balāt tat enām vinayena yojayet nayasya siddhau vinayaḥ puraḥsaraḥ

original: MSS_6123-1 iyatā vayasā na sādhitaṃ yat parataḥ kiṃ nu kariṣyatīti vedhāḥ /
analyzed: iyatā vayasā na sādhitam yat paratas kim nu kariṣyati iti vedhāḥ

original: MSS_6123-2 tilataṇḍulitāsya romarekhā- cchalataḥ kajjalacūrṇamālilimpa //
analyzed: tila taṇḍulita asya roma rekhā chalataḥ kajjala cūrṇam ālilimpa

original: MSS_6123-1 iyatīṃ subhagāvasthāṃ gato'si yasyāḥ kṛte smarātaṅkāt /
analyzed: iyatīm subhaga avasthām gataḥ asi yasyāḥ kṛte smara ātaṅkāt

original: MSS_6123-2 mūrcchāṃ harāmi sā tava gatapuṇyā nayanasalilena //
analyzed: mūrcchām harāmi sā tava gata puṇyā nayana salilena

original: MSS_6124-1 iyatī jagatī kiyatī bhavitā namitānanatāmiti yāti hayaḥ /
analyzed: iyatī jagatī kiyatī bhavitā namitā ānana tām iti yāti hayaḥ

original: MSS_6124-2 viyadaṅgaṇariṅgaṇaraṅgavidhau parinartitumutkramatīva nabhaḥ //
analyzed: viyat aṅgaṇa riṅgaṇa raṅga vidhau parinartitum utkramati iva nabhaḥ

original: MSS_6125-1 iyat pṛthvīmātraṃ tadanu ca nabhomaṇḍalamiya- diyān pātālānto jalamapi pṛthivyāmiyaditi /
analyzed: iyat pṛthvī mātram tadanu ca nabhaḥ maṇḍalam diyān pātāla antaḥ jalam api pṛthivyām iyat iti

original: MSS_6125-2 iti jñātvā kūpe viditaviṣayo nāyamaparaḥ paraṃ mugdho bhekaḥ prabalatararāvaṃ prakurute //
analyzed: iti jñātvā kūpe vidita viṣayaḥ na ayam aparaḥ param mugdhaḥ bhekaḥ prabalatara rāvam prakurute

original: MSS_6126-1 iyatyapyetasmin niravadhimahatyadhvani guṇās ta evāmī dvitrā jaraṭhajaraṭhā yānti gaṇanām /
analyzed: iyati api etasmin niravadhi mahati adhvani guṇāḥ te eva amī dvitrāḥ jaraṭha jaraṭhāḥ yānti gaṇanām

original: MSS_6126-2 aho grāmyo lokaḥ sa na paramamībhiḥ kṛtadhṛtiḥ smayastabdho yāvat kalayati samagraṃ tṛṇamidam //
analyzed: aho grāmyaḥ lokaḥ sa na param amībhiḥ kṛta dhṛtiḥ smaya stabdhaḥ yāvat kalayati samagram tṛṇam idam

original: MSS_6127-1 iyatyāṃ saṃpattāvapi ca salilānāṃ tvamadhunā na tṛṣṇāmārtānāṃ harasi yadi kāsāra sahasā /
analyzed: iyatyām saṃpattau api ca salilānām tvam adhunā na tṛṣṇām ārtānām harasi yadi kāsāra sahasā

original: MSS_6127-2 nidāghe caṇḍāṃśau kirati parito'ṅgāranikarān kṛśībhūtaḥ keṣāmahaha parihartāsi khalu tām //
analyzed: nidāghe caṇḍāṃśau kirati kṛśībhūtaḥ keṣām ahaha parihartāsi khalu tām

original: MSS_6128-1 iyatyāmapi sāmagryāṃ sukṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: iyatyām api sāmagryām sukṛtam na kṛtam tvayā

original: MSS_6128-2 itīva kupito dantān antakaḥ pātayatyalam //
analyzed: iti iva kupitaḥ dantān antakaḥ pātayati alam

original: MSS_6129-1 iyatyetasmin vā niravadhicamatkṛtyatiśayo varāho vā rāhuḥ prabhavati camatkāraviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: iyati etasmin vā niravadhi camatkṛti atiśayaḥ varāhaḥ vā rāhuḥ prabhavati camatkāra viṣayaḥ

original: MSS_6129-2 mahīmeko magnāṃ yadayamavahad dantaśalalaiḥ śiraḥśeṣaḥ śatruṃ nigilati paraṃ saṃtyajati ca //
analyzed: mahīm ekaḥ magnām yat ayam avahat danta śalalaiḥ śiraḥ śeṣaḥ śatrum nigilati param saṃtyajati ca

original: MSS_6130-1 iyamatra kayāpi diśā nītidṛśāṃ darśitā padavī /
analyzed: iyam atra kayā api diśā nīti dṛśām darśitā padavī

original: MSS_6130-2 cāṇakyādyabhidhānāj jñeyanidhānādathānyadunneyam //
analyzed: cāṇakya ādi abhidhānāt jñeya nidhānāt atha anyat unneyam

original: MSS_3131-1 iyamatra satāmalaukikī mahatī kāpi kaṭhoracittatā /
analyzed: iyam atra satām alaukikī mahatī kā api kaṭhora citta tā

original: MSS_3131-2 upakṛtya bhavanti dūrataḥ parataḥ pratyupakārabhīravaḥ //
analyzed: upakṛtya bhavanti dūratas paratas pratyupakāra bhīravaḥ

original: MSS_6132-1 iyamapratibodhaśāyinīṃ raśanā tvāṃ prathamā rahaḥsakhī /
analyzed: iyam apratibodha śāyinīm raśanā tvām prathamā rahaḥ sakhī

original: MSS_6132-2 gativibhramasādanīravā na śucā nānumṛteva lakṣyate //
analyzed: gati vibhrama sāda nīravā na śucā na anumṛtā iva lakṣyate

original: MSS_6133-1 iyamavayavaiḥ pāṇḍukṣāmairalaṃkṛtamaṇḍanā kalitakusumā bālevāntarlatā pariśoṣiṇī /
analyzed: iyam avayavaiḥ pāṇḍu kṣāmaiḥ alaṃkṛta maṇḍanā kalita kusumā bālā iva antar latā pariśoṣiṇī

original: MSS_6133-2 vahati ca varārohā ramyāṃ vivāhamahotsava- śriyamudayinīmudgāḍhāṃ ca vyanakti manorujam //
analyzed: vahati ca varārohā ramyām vivāha mahā utsava śriyam udayinīm udgāḍhām ca vyanakti manaḥ

original: MSS_6134-1 iyamasau taralāyatalocanā gurusamunnatapīnapayodharā /
analyzed: iyam asau tarala āyata locanā guru samunnata pīna payodharā

original: MSS_6134-2 pṛthunitambabharālasagāminī priyatamā mama jīvitahāriṇī //
analyzed: pṛthu nitamba bhara alasa gāminī priyatamā mama jīvita hāriṇī

original: MSS_6135-1 iyamānandalatikā na grīvā hariṇīdṛśaḥ /
analyzed: iyam ānanda latikā na grīvā hariṇīdṛśaḥ

original: MSS_6135-2 yato'syāṃ viluṭhantyete muktāḥ śuddhaguṇāntarāḥ //
analyzed: yatas asyām viluṭhanti ete muktāḥ śuddha guṇa antarāḥ

original: MSS_6136-1 iyamiyaṃ mayadānavanandinī tridaśanāthajitaḥ prasavasthalī /
analyzed: iyam iyam maya dānava nandinī tridaśa nātha jitaḥ prasava sthalī

original: MSS_6136-2 kimaparaṃ daśakaṃdharagehinī tvayi karoti karadvayayojanam //
analyzed: kim aparam daśa kaṃdhara gehinī tvayi karoti kara dvaya yojanam

original: MSS_6137-1 iyamiṣṭaguṇāya rocatāṃ rucirārthā bhavate'pi bhāratī /
analyzed: iyam iṣṭa guṇāya rocatām rucira arthā bhavate api bhāratī

original: MSS_6137-2 nanu vaktṛviśeṣaniḥspṛhā guṇagṛhyā vacane vipaścitaḥ //
analyzed: nanu vaktṛ viśeṣa niḥspṛhāḥ guṇa gṛhyāḥ vacane vipaścitaḥ

original: MSS_6138-1 iyamudaradarī durantapūrā yadi na bhavedabhimānabhaṅgabhūmiḥ /
analyzed: iyam udara darī duranta pūrā yadi na bhavet abhimāna bhaṅga bhūmiḥ

original: MSS_6138-2 kṣaṇamapi na sahe bhavādṛśānāṃ kuṭilakaṭākṣanirīkṣaṇaṃ nṛpāṇām //
analyzed: kṣaṇam api na sahe bhavādṛśānām kuṭila kaṭākṣa nirīkṣaṇam nṛpāṇām

original: MSS_6139-1 iyamudgatiṃ harantī netranikocaṃ ca vidadhatī purataḥ /
analyzed: iyam udgatim harantī netra nikocam ca vidadhatī puratas

original: MSS_6139-2 na vijānīmaḥ kiṃ tava vadati sapatnīva dinanidrā //
analyzed: na vijānīmaḥ kim tava vadati sapatnī iva dina nidrā

original: MSS_6140-1 iyeṣa sā kartumavandhyarūpatāṃ samādhimāsthāya tapobhirātmanaḥ /
analyzed: iyeṣa sā kartum avandhya rūpa tām samādhim āsthāya tapobhiḥ ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_6140-2 avāpyate vā kathamanyathā dvayaṃ tathāvidhaṃ prema patiś ca tādṛśaḥ //
analyzed: avāpyate vā katham anyathā dvayam tathāvidham prema patiḥ ca tādṛśaḥ

original: MSS_6141-1 ilātalabharākrāntagrīvaṃ mā śeṣa vakraya /
analyzed: ilā tala bhara ākrānta grīvam mā śeṣa

original: MSS_6141-2 tvayi duḥkhini caikasmiñ jīvalokaḥ sadā sukhī //
analyzed: tvayi duḥkhini ca ekasmin jīva lokaḥ sadā sukhī

original: MSS_6142-1 ilikā bhramarīdhyānaṃ dhyāyantī bhramarī bhavet /
MSS_6142-2 vītarāgapadaṃ dhyāyan vītarāgo bhaved dhruvam //
MSS_6143-1 iṣutrayeṇaiva jagattrayasya vinirjayāt puṣpamayāśugena /
analyzed: iṣu trayeṇa eva jagattrayasya vinirjayāt puṣpa maya āśugena

original: MSS_6143-2 śeṣā dvibāṇī saphalīkṛteyaṃ priyādṛgambhojapade'bhiṣicya //
analyzed: śeṣā dvi bāṇī saphalīkṛtā iyam

original: MSS_6144-1 iṣṭaṃ dadāti gṛhṇāti kāryamākhyāti pṛcchati /
analyzed: iṣṭam dadāti gṛhṇāti kāryam ākhyāti pṛcchati

original: MSS_6144-2 bhuṅkte bhojayate caiva ṣaḍvidhaṃ mitralakṣaṇam //
analyzed: bhuṅkte bhojayate ca eva ṣaḍvidham mitra lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_6145-1 iṣṭakacite samantāt puruṣanikhāte'vaṭe tarurjātaḥ /
analyzed: iṣṭaka cite samantāt puruṣa nikhāta ivaṭe taruḥ jātaḥ

original: MSS_6145-2 vāmana eva hi dhatte phalakusumaṃ sarvakālamiti //
analyzed: vāmanaḥ eva hi dhatte phala kusumam sarvakālam iti

original: MSS_6146-1 iṣṭāṃ bhāryāṃ priyaṃ mitraṃ putraṃ cāpi kanīyasam /
analyzed: iṣṭām bhāryām priyam mitram putram ca api kanīyasam

original: MSS_6146-2 riktapāṇirna paśyeta tathā naimittikaṃ prabhum //
analyzed: rikta pāṇiḥ na paśyeta tathā naimittikam prabhum

original: MSS_6147-1 iṣṭāni cāpyapatyāni dravyāṇi suhṛdaḥ priyāḥ /
analyzed: iṣṭāni ca api apatyāni dravyāṇi suhṛdaḥ priyāḥ

original: MSS_6147-2 āpaddharmavimokṣāya bhāryā cāpi satāṃ matam //
analyzed: āpad dharma vimokṣāya bhāryā ca api satām matam

original: MSS_6148-1 iṣṭān bhogān hi vo devā dāsyante yajñabhāvitāḥ /
analyzed: iṣṭān bhogān hi vaḥ devāḥ dāsyante yajña bhāvitāḥ

original: MSS_6148-2 tairdattānapradāyaibhyo yo bhuṅkte stena eva saḥ //
analyzed: taiḥ dattān a pradāya ebhyaḥ yaḥ bhuṅkte stenaḥ eva saḥ

original: MSS_6149-1 iṣṭāpūrtāni kalayet jagatkhyāto vased divi /
MSS_6149-2 akūpāroktavṛtto'gād indradyumno divaṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: akūpāra ukta vṛttā ugāt indradyumnaḥ divam punar

original: MSS_6150-1 iṣṭā bālakaceṣṭā yauvanadarpo'tha vṛddhavairāgyam /
analyzed: iṣṭā bālaka ceṣṭā yauvana darpaḥ utha vṛddha vairāgyam

original: MSS_6150-2 sāpi gatā so'pi gatas tadapi gataṃ svapnamāyeyam //
analyzed: sā api gatā saḥ upi gataḥ tat api gatam svapna māyā iyam

original: MSS_6151-1 iṣṭā makhā dvijavarāś ca mayi prasannāḥ prajñāpitā bhayarasaṃ samadā narendrāḥ /
analyzed: iṣṭāḥ makhāḥ dvijavarāḥ ca mayi prasannāḥ prajñāpitāḥ bhaya rasam sa madāḥ narendrāḥ

original: MSS_6151-2 evaṃvidhasya ca na me'sti manaḥpraharṣaḥ kanyāpiturhi satataṃ bahu cintanīyam //
analyzed: evaṃvidhasya ca na mā isti manaḥ praharṣaḥ kanyā pituḥ hi satatam bahu cintanīyam

original: MSS_6152-1 iṣṭeṣu visṛjatyarthān kubera iva kāmadaḥ /
analyzed: iṣṭeṣu visṛjati arthān kuberaḥ iva kāma daḥ

original: MSS_6152-2 namasyeyuś ca taṃ bhaktyā śiṣyā iva guruṃ sadā //
analyzed: namasyeyuḥ ca tam bhaktyā śiṣyāḥ iva gurum sadā

original: MSS_6153-1 iṣṭo vā bahusukṛtopalālito vā śliṣṭo vā vyasanaśatābhirakṣito vā /
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ vā bahu sukṛta upalālitaḥ vā śliṣṭaḥ vā vyasana śata abhirakṣitaḥ vā

original: MSS_6153-2 dauḥśīlyāj janayati naiva jātvasādhur visrambhaṃ bhujaga ivāṅkamadhyasuptaḥ //
analyzed: dauḥśīlyāt janayati nā eva jātu asādhuḥ visrambham bhujagaḥ iva aṅka madhya suptaḥ

original: MSS_6154-1 iṣṭvā saṃgrāmayajñena nānāpraharaṇāmbhasā /
analyzed: iṣṭvā saṃgrāma yajñena nānā praharaṇa ambhasā

original: MSS_6154-2 asminnavabhṛthe snātaḥ kathaṃ patnyā mayā vinā //
analyzed: asmin avabhṛthe snātaḥ katham patnyā mayā vinā

original: MSS_6155-1 iha kapaṭakutukataralita- dṛśi viśvāsaṃ kuraṅga kiṃ kuruṣe /
analyzed: iha kapaṭa kutuka taralita dṛśi viśvāsam kuraṅga kim kuruṣe

original: MSS_6155-2 tava rabhasataraliteyaṃ vyādhavadhūrvāladhau valate //
analyzed: tava rabhasa taralitā iyam vyādha vadhūḥ vāladhau valate

original: MSS_6156-1 iha kiṃ kuraṅgaśāvaka kedāre kalamamañjarīṃ tyajasi /
analyzed: iha kim kuraṅga śāvaka kedāre kalama mañjarīm tyajasi

original: MSS_6156-2 tṛṇabāṇas tṛṇadhanvā tṛṇaghaṭitaḥ kapaṭapuruṣo'yam //
analyzed: tṛṇa bāṇaḥ tṛṇa dhanvā tṛṇa ghaṭitaḥ kapaṭa puruṣaḥ yam

original: MSS_6157-1 iha kiṃ pratisphurati me tavāgrato nayaśāstranīranidhipāradṛśvanaḥ /
analyzed: iha kim pratisphurati me tava agratas naya śāstra nīranidhi pāra dṛśvanaḥ

original: MSS_6157-2 avalīḍhaviśvatamasaḥ puro raver nahi jātu dīpakaśikhā prakāśate //
analyzed: avalīḍha viśva tamasaḥ puras raveḥ nahi jātu dīpaka śikhā prakāśate

original: MSS_6158-1 iha khalu viṣamaḥ purā kṛtānāṃ vilasati jantuṣu karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ /
analyzed: iha khalu viṣamaḥ purā kṛtānām vilasati jantuṣu karmaṇām vipākaḥ

original: MSS_6158-2 haraśirasi śirāṃsi yāni rejuḥ śiva śiva tāni luṭhanti gṛdhrapādaiḥ //
analyzed: hara śirasi śirāṃsi yāni rejuḥ śiva śiva tāni luṭhanti gṛdhra pādaiḥ

original: MSS_6159-1 iha gamiṣyati vaidyamatiḥ śramaṃ prathamameva purastu mahāsukham /
analyzed: iha gamiṣyati vaidya matiḥ śramam prathamam eva puras tu mahā sukham

original: MSS_6159-2 priyatamasya mṛgākṣi samāgame navakaragrahaṇā gṛhiṇī yathā //
analyzed: priyatamasya mṛga akṣi samāgame nava kara grahaṇā gṛhiṇī yathā

original: MSS_6160-1 iha gurujalabhārapūrṇagarbhāḥ pradaradarībhramabhūribhīmavegāḥ /
analyzed: iha guru jala bhāra pūrṇa garbhāḥ pradara darī bhrama bhūri bhīma vegāḥ

original: MSS_6160-2 taṭakaṭakaniyudhyamānaveṇī- dviguṇamahāravabhairavās taṭinyaḥ //
analyzed: taṭa kaṭaka niyudhyamāna veṇī dviguṇa mahā rava bhairavāḥ taṭinyaḥ

original: MSS_6161-1 iha catvāri dānāni proktāni paramarṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: iha catvāri dānāni proktāni parama ṛṣibhiḥ

original: MSS_6161-2 vicārya nānāśāstrāṇi śarmaṇe'tra paratra ca //
analyzed: vicārya nānā śāstrāṇi śarmaṇā itra paratra ca

original: MSS_6162-1 bhītebhyaś cābhayaṃ deyaṃ vyādhitebhyas tathauṣadham /
analyzed: bhītebhyaḥ ca abhayam deyam vyādhitebhyaḥ tathā auṣadham

original: MSS_6162-2 deyā vidyārthināṃ vidyā deyamannaṃ kṣudhāture //
analyzed: deyā vidyā arthinām vidyā deyam annam kṣudhā āture

original: MSS_6163-1 iha caiva striyo dhanyāḥ śīlasya parirakṣaṇāt /
analyzed: iha ca eva striyaḥ dhanyāḥ śīlasya parirakṣaṇāt

original: MSS_6163-2 śīlabhaṅge ca nārīṇāṃ yamalokaḥ sudāruṇaḥ //
analyzed: śīla bhaṅge ca nārīṇām yama lokaḥ su dāruṇaḥ

original: MSS_6164-1 śīlaṃ rakṣyaṃ sadā strībhir duṣṭasaṃgavivarjanāt /
analyzed: śīlam rakṣyam sadā strībhiḥ duṣṭa saṃga vivarjanāt

original: MSS_6164-2 śīlena hi paraḥ svargaḥ strīṇāṃ vaiśya na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: śīlena hi paraḥ svargaḥ strīṇām vaiśya na saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_6165-1 iha jagati janasya kasya citte na vasati saukhyavidhānamukhyavārtā /
analyzed: iha jagati janasya kasya citte na vasati saukhya vidhāna mukhya vārtā

original: MSS_6165-2 khalu bhavati tadeva tasya sarvaṃ bhuvanapatis tu yadīśvaraḥ karoti //
analyzed: khalu bhavati tat eva tasya sarvam bhuvana patiḥ tu yat īśvaraḥ karoti

original: MSS_6166-1 iha jagati ratīśaprakriyākauśalinyaḥ kati kati na niśīthe subhruvaḥ saṃcaranti /
analyzed: iha jagati ratīśa prakriyā kauśalinyaḥ kati kati na niśīthe subhruvaḥ saṃcaranti

original: MSS_6166-2 mama tu vidhihatāyā jāyamānasmitāyāḥ sahacari paripanthī hanta dantāṃśureva //
analyzed: mama tu vidhi hatāyāḥ jāyamāna smitāyāḥ sahacari paripanthī hanta dantāṃśuḥ eva

original: MSS_6167-1 iha tava deva nipatatā karakamalakuśodakena jāyante /
analyzed: iha tava deva nipatatā kara kamala kuśa udakena jāyante

original: MSS_6167-2 tattaddūradaridra- dvāri dvipadānavāribhiḥ saritaḥ //
analyzed: tat tat dūra daridra dvāri dvipa dāna vāribhiḥ saritaḥ

original: MSS_6168-1 iha turagaśataiḥ prayāntu mūrkhā dhanarahitā vibudhāḥ prayāntu padbhyām /
analyzed: iha turaga śataiḥ prayāntu mūrkhāḥ dhana rahitāḥ vibudhāḥ prayāntu padbhyām

original: MSS_6168-2 giriśikharagatāpi kākapaṅktiḥ pulinagatairna samatvameti haṃsaiḥ //
analyzed: giri śikhara gatā api kāka paṅktiḥ pulina gataiḥ na sama tvam eti haṃsaiḥ

original: MSS_6169-1 iha duḥkhaṃ nṛpādibhyaḥ paratra narakāditaḥ /
analyzed: iha duḥkham nṛpa ādibhyaḥ paratra naraka āditaḥ

original: MSS_6169-2 prāpnoti steyatas tena steyaṃ tyājyaṃ sadā budhaiḥ //
analyzed: prāpnoti steyataḥ tena steyam tyājyam sadā budhaiḥ

original: MSS_6170-1 iha duḥkhaṃ layaḥ prokto duḥkhaṃ hartuṃ layaḥ kṣamaḥ /
analyzed: iha duḥkham layaḥ proktaḥ duḥkham hartum layaḥ kṣamaḥ

original: MSS_6170-2 duḥkhe śubhe layo duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ kiṃ tasya kathyate //
analyzed: duḥkhe śubhe layaḥ duḥkham duḥkham kim tasya kathyate

original: MSS_6172-1 iha dharmārthakāmānām avāptiphalamiṣyate /
analyzed: iha dharma artha kāmānām avāpti phalam iṣyate

original: MSS_6172-2 tatrārthaḥ saha kāmena nirīkṣyo dharmacakṣuṣā //
analyzed: tatra arthaḥ saha kāmena nirīkṣyaḥ dharma cakṣuṣā

original: MSS_6172-3 parityajya hi yo dharmam arthamarthāya paśyati /
analyzed: parityajya hi yaḥ dharmam artham arthāya paśyati

original: MSS_6172-4 kāmaṃ vā kāmalābhāya na sa buddheṣu buddhimān //
analyzed: kāmam vā kāma lābhāya na sa buddheṣu buddhimān

original: MSS_6173-1 iha nagare pratirathyaṃ bhujaṃgasaṃbādharucirasaṃcāre /
analyzed: iha nagare pratirathyam bhujaṃga saṃbādha rucira saṃcāre

original: MSS_6173-2 sundari mama matametan nakulapratipālanaṃ śreyaḥ //
analyzed: sundari mama matam etat nakula pratipālanam śreyaḥ

original: MSS_6174-1 iha niculanikuñje madhyamadhye'sya rantur vijanamajani śayyā kasya bālapravālaiḥ /
analyzed: iha nicula nikuñje madhya madhye sya rantuḥ vijanam ajani śayyā kasya bāla pravālaiḥ

original: MSS_6174-2 iti kathayati vṛnde yoṣitāṃ pāntu yuṣmān smitaśabalitarādhāmādhavālokitāni //
analyzed: iti kathayati vṛnde yoṣitām pāntu yuṣmān smita śabalita rādhā mādhava ālokitāni

original: MSS_6175-1 iha niculanikuñje vaṃśasaṃbhārabhāji svapimi yadi muhūrtaṃ paśyasi kṣetrametat /
analyzed: iha nicula nikuñje vaṃśa saṃbhāra bhāji svapimi yadi muhūrtam paśyasi kṣetram etat

original: MSS_6175-2 iti pathikamakasmān mārga evopaviṣṭaṃ vadati taruṇakāntaṃ gopikā sāṅgabhaṅgam //
analyzed: iti pathikam akasmāt mārge eva upaviṣṭam vadati taruṇa kāntam gopikā sa aṅga bhaṅgam

original: MSS_6176-1 iha nibhṛtanipātamūkapādaṃ valayitakārmukavallayaḥ kirātāḥ /
analyzed: iha nibhṛta nipāta mūka pādam valayita kārmuka vallayaḥ kirātāḥ

original: MSS_6176-2 bhavadalasavilokanānabhijñā mṛgagṛhiṇi praharanti gaccha dūram //
analyzed: bhavat alasa vilokana anabhijñāḥ mṛga gṛhiṇi praharanti gaccha dūram

original: MSS_6177-1 iha nivasati meruḥ śekharo bhūdharāṇām iha hi nihitabhārāḥ sāgarāḥ sapta caiva /
analyzed: iha nivasati meruḥ śekharaḥ bhūdharāṇām iha hi nihita bhārāḥ sāgarāḥ sapta ca eva

original: MSS_6177-2 idamatulamanantaṃ bhūtalaṃ bhūribhūtod- bhavadharaṇasamarthaṃ sthānamasmadvidhānām //
analyzed: idam atulam anantam bhū talam bhūri bhūta ud bhava dharaṇa samartham sthānam asmadvidhānām

original: MSS_6178-1 iha niśi nibiḍanirantara- kucakumbhadvitayadattahṛdayabharā /
analyzed: iha niśi nibiḍa nirantara kuca kumbha dvitaya datta hṛdaya bharā

original: MSS_6178-2 ramaṇaguṇakṛṣyamāṇā saṃtarati tamastaraṅgiṇīṃ kāpi //
analyzed: ramaṇa guṇa kṛṣyamāṇā saṃtarati tamaḥ taraṅgiṇīm kā api

original: MSS_6179-1 iha paricitā jātyandhānāmiyaṃ na tavonnatir guṇaparicaye cakṣuṣmanto tvayātiviḍambitāḥ /
analyzed: iha paricitāḥ jāti andhānām iyam na tava unnatiḥ guṇa paricaye tvayā ati viḍambitāḥ

original: MSS_6179-2 kṛpaṇavaṇijāmalpīkartuṃ guṇāṃs tava kevalaṃ marakata mṛṣā doṣodgāraḥ kariṣyati duryaśaḥ //
analyzed: kṛpaṇa vaṇijām alpīkartum guṇān tava kevalam marakata mṛṣā doṣa udgāraḥ kariṣyati duryaśaḥ

original: MSS_6180-1 iha parimalo yatra vyakto na tatra madhuśriyo madhu samadhikaṃ yasmiṃs tasmin na gandhasamṛddhayaḥ /
analyzed: iha parimalaḥ yatra vyaktaḥ na tatra madhu śriyaḥ madhu samadhikam yasmin tasmin na gandha samṛddhayaḥ

original: MSS_6180-2 iti maruvakaṃ nindan kundādapetakutūhalaḥ kamalamadhikaṃ smāraṃ smāraṃ viṣīdati ṣaṭpadaḥ //
analyzed: iti maruvakam nindan kundāt apeta kutūhalaḥ kamalam adhikam smāram smāram viṣīdati ṣaṭpadaḥ

original: MSS_6181-1 iha puro'nilakampitavigrahā milati kā na vanaspatinā latā /
analyzed: iha puras nila kampita vigrahā milati kā na vanaspatinā latā

original: MSS_6181-2 smarasi kiṃ sakhi kāntaratotsavaṃ na hi ghanāgamarītirudāhṛtā //
analyzed: smarasi kim sakhi kānta rata utsavam na hi ghana āgama rītiḥ udāhṛtā

original: MSS_6182-1 iha bahalitamindordīdhitīnāṃ prabhābhir madavikalacakorīcañcumudrāṅkitābhiḥ /
analyzed: iha bahalitam indoḥ dīdhitīnām prabhābhiḥ mada vikala cakorī cañcu mudrā aṅkitābhiḥ

original: MSS_6182-2 ratibharaparikhedasrastarārthaṃ vadhūnāṃ karakisalayalīlābhañjanavyañjikābhiḥ //
analyzed: rati bhara parikheda srastara artham vadhūnām kara kisalaya līlā bhañjana vyañjikābhiḥ

original: MSS_6183-1 iha bhuvi kalayati laghurapi mahatāṃ saṅgena kamapi mahimānam /
analyzed: iha bhuvi kalayati laghuḥ api mahatām saṅgena kam api mahimānam

original: MSS_6183-2 laṅghayati candralīno nabhastalaṃ helayā hariṇaḥ //
analyzed: laṅghayati candra līnaḥ nabhastalam helayā hariṇaḥ

original: MSS_6184-1 iha bhogaṃ yaśaḥ prītiṃ sabhāsu bahumānyatām /
analyzed: iha bhogam yaśaḥ prītim sabhāsu bahu mānya tām

original: MSS_6184-2 dadyāt paratra sugatiṃ vidyādhanamanuttamam //
analyzed: dadyāt paratra sugatim vidyā dhanam anuttamam

original: MSS_6185-1 iha madhupavadhūnāṃ pītamallīmadhūnāṃ vilasati kamanīyaḥ kākalīsaṃpradāyaḥ /
analyzed: iha madhupa vadhūnām pīta mallī madhūnām vilasati kamanīyaḥ kākalī saṃpradāyaḥ

original: MSS_6185-2 iha naṭati salīlaṃ mañjarī vañjulasya pratipadamupadiṣṭā dakṣiṇenānilena //
analyzed: iha naṭati sa līlam mañjarī vañjulasya pratipadam upadiṣṭā dakṣiṇena anilena

original: MSS_6186-1 iha mahiṣaviṣāṇavyastapāṣāṇapīṭha- skhalanasulabharohidgarbhiṇībhrūṇahatyāḥ /
analyzed: iha mahiṣa viṣāṇa vyasta pāṣāṇa pīṭha skhalana sulabha rohit garbhiṇī bhrūṇa hatyāḥ

original: MSS_6186-2 kuharaviharamāṇaprauḍhabhallūkahikkā- cayacakitakirātasrastaśastrā vanāntāḥ //
analyzed: kuhara viharamāṇa prauḍha bhallūka hikkā caya cakita kirāta srasta śastrāḥ vanāntāḥ

original: MSS_6187-1 iha muhurmuditaiḥ kalabhai ravaḥ pratidiśaṃ kriyate kalabhairavaḥ /
analyzed: iha muhur muditaiḥ kalabhaiḥ ravaḥ pratidiśam kriyate kala bhairavaḥ

original: MSS_6187-2 sphurati cānuvanaṃ camarīcayaḥ kanakaratnabhuvāṃ ca marīcayaḥ //
analyzed: sphurati ca anuvanam camarīcayaḥ kanaka ratna bhuvām ca marīcayaḥ

original: MSS_6188-1 iha yat kriyate karma tat paratropabhujuyate /
analyzed: iha yat kriyate karma tat paratra upabhujuyate

original: MSS_6188-2 siktamūlasya vṛkṣasya phalaṃ śākhāsu dṛśyate //
analyzed: sikta mūlasya vṛkṣasya phalam śākhāsu dṛśyate

original: MSS_6189-1 iha yat kriyate karma phalaṃ tatraiva bhujyate /
analyzed: iha yat kriyate karma phalam tatra eva bhujyate

original: MSS_6189-2 karmabhūmiriyaṃ rājan phalabhūmiś ca sā smṛtā //
analyzed: karma bhūmiḥ iyam rājan phala bhūmiḥ ca sā smṛtā

original: MSS_6190-1 iha yādavavaṃśakṛṣṇavartmā- nugatiḥ sāṅgatayā mayānvabhāvi /
analyzed: iha yādava vaṃśa kṛṣṇavartmā nugatiḥ sa aṅga tayā mayā anvabhāvi

original: MSS_6190-2 adhunā tadavāpticetase me madhurākāmadhurāpi rocate kim //
analyzed: adhunā tad avāpti cetase me madhurākā madhurā api rocate kim

original: MSS_6191-1 iha rūpamātrasāre citrakṛte kamalakahlāre /
analyzed: iha rūpa mātra sāre citra kṛte kamala kahlāre

original: MSS_6191-2 na raso nāpi ca gandho madhukara bandho mudhā bhramasi //
analyzed: na rasaḥ nā api ca gandhaḥ madhukara bandho mudhā bhramasi

original: MSS_6192-1 iha re bahalā lāse bālā rāhumalīmasā /
analyzed: iha re bahalā lāse bālā rāhu malīmasā

original: MSS_6192-2 sālakā rasalīlā sā tuṅgālāli kalārata //
MSS_6193-1 ihaloke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate /
analyzed: ihaloke ca pitṛbhiḥ yā strī yasya mahāmate

original: MSS_6193-2 adbhirdattā svardharmeṇa pretyabhāve'pi tasya sā //
analyzed: adbhiḥ dattā svar dharmeṇa pretyabhāve pi tasya sā

original: MSS_6194-1 iha loke hi dhaninaḥ paro'pi svajanāyate /
analyzed: iha loke hi dhaninaḥ paraḥ upi svajanāyate

original: MSS_6194-2 svajanastu daridrāṇāṃ jīvatāmeva naśyati //
analyzed: sva janaḥ tu daridrāṇām jīvatām eva naśyati

original: MSS_6195-1 iha loke hi dhanināṃ paro'pi svajanāyate /
analyzed: iha loke hi dhaninām paraḥ upi svajanāyate

original: MSS_6195-2 svajano'pi daridrāṇāṃ tatkṣaṇād durjanāyate //
analyzed: sva janaḥ api daridrāṇām tad kṣaṇāt durjanāyate

original: MSS_6196-1 iha loko hato n ṇāṃ dāridryeṇa yathā nṛpa /
analyzed: iha lokaḥ hataḥ n nām dāridryeṇa yathā nṛpa

original: MSS_6196-2 manuṣyāṇāṃ tathā janma māghasnānaṃ vinā hatam //
analyzed: manuṣyāṇām tathā janma māghasnānam vinā hatam

original: MSS_6197-1 iha vaṭavṛkṣe yakṣaḥ prativasati divāpi yatra bhayaśaṅkā /
analyzed: iha vaṭa vṛkṣe yakṣaḥ prativasati divā api yatra bhaya śaṅkā

original: MSS_6197-2 tasminnabhinavavadhvā nītā vītodayāḥ kṣaṇadāḥ //
analyzed: tasmin abhinava vadhvā nītāḥ vīta udayāḥ kṣaṇadāḥ

original: MSS_6198-1 iha vatsān samacārayad iha naḥ svāmī jagau vaṃśīm /
analyzed: iha vatsān samacārayat iha naḥ svāmī jagau vaṃśīm

original: MSS_6198-2 iti sāsraṃ gadato me yamunātīre dinaṃ yāyāt //
analyzed: iti sa asram gadataḥ me yamunā tīre dinam yāyāt

original: MSS_6199-1 iha vahati bahumahodadhi- vibhūṣaṇā mānagarvamiyamurvī /
analyzed: iha vahati bahu mahodadhi vibhūṣaṇā māna garvam iyam urvī

original: MSS_6199-2 devasya kamaṭhamūrter na pṛṣṭhamapi nikhilamāpnoti //
analyzed: devasya kamaṭha mūrteḥ na pṛṣṭham api nikhilam āpnoti

original: MSS_6200-1 iha vā tārayed durgād uta vā pretya tārayet /
analyzed: iha vā tārayet durgāt uta vā pretya tārayet

original: MSS_6200-2 sarvathā tārayet putraḥ putra ityucyate budhaiḥ //
analyzed: sarvathā tārayet putraḥ putraḥ iti ucyate budhaiḥ

original: MSS_6201-1 iha vikasadaśokāstokapuṣpopakārair ayamatiśayaraktaḥ saktasusnigdhabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: iha vikasat aśoka a stoka puṣpa upakāraiḥ ayam atiśaya raktaḥ sakta su snigdha bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_6201-2 tribhuvanajayasajjaḥ prājyasā mrājyabhājaḥ prathayati pṛthumaitrīṃ puṣpacāpasya caitraḥ //
analyzed: tribhuvana jaya sajjaḥ prājya sāḥ mrājya bhājaḥ prathayati pṛthu maitrīm puṣpacāpasya caitraḥ

original: MSS_6202-1 iha vicaranti kirātās tvādṛksvacchandatānihantāraḥ /
analyzed: iha vicaranti kirātāḥ tvādṛś svacchanda tā nihantāraḥ

original: MSS_6202-2 tadamīṣāṃ gānādau mā dhāḥ śravaṇe kuraṅgaśāva tvam //
analyzed: tat amīṣām gāna ādau mā dhāḥ śravaṇe kuraṅga śāva tvam

original: MSS_6203-1 iha vijayini vaṃśe kīrtidhārākalāpa- snapitasakalalokaḥ śrīyaśovigraho'bhūt /
analyzed: iha vijayini vaṃśe kīrti dhārā kalāpa snapita sakala lokaḥ śrī yaśaḥ vigrahaḥ bhūt

original: MSS_6203-2 jalaghaṭa iva yuddhottālabhūpāladarpa- jvalanaśamanalīlākovidaḥ ko'pi vīraḥ //
analyzed: jala ghaṭaḥ iva yuddha uttāla bhūpāla darpa jvalana śamana līlā kovidaḥ kopi vīraḥ

original: MSS_6204-1 iha vidhiviṣamaḥ purākṛtānāṃ bhavati hi jantuṣu karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ /
analyzed: iha vidhi viṣamaḥ purākṛtānām bhavati hi jantuṣu karmaṇām vipākaḥ

original: MSS_6204-2 kva janakatanayā kva rāmarāmā kva ca daśakandharamandire nivāsaḥ //
analyzed: kva janakatanayā kva rāmarāmā kva ca daśa kandhara mandire nivāsaḥ

original: MSS_6205-1 iha viracayan sādhvīṃ śiṣyaḥ kriyāṃ na nivāryate tyajati tu yadā mārgaṃ mohāt tadā gururaṅkuśaḥ /
analyzed: iha viracayan sādhvīm śiṣyaḥ kriyām na nivāryate tyajati tu yadā mārgam mohāt tadā guruḥ aṅkuśaḥ

original: MSS_6205-2 vinayarucayas tasmāt santaḥ sadaiva niraṅkuśāḥ parataramataḥ svātantryebhyo vayaṃ hi parāṅmukhāḥ //
analyzed: vinaya rucayaḥ tasmāt santaḥ sadā eva niraṅkuśāḥ parataram atas svātantryebhyaḥ vayam hi parāṅmukhāḥ

original: MSS_6206-1 iha viśvambharāpīḍe candanaṃ kasya na priyam /
analyzed: iha viśvambharā pīḍe candanam kasya na priyam

original: MSS_6206-2 anusvāraṃ vilipyāpi okārasya prayojanāt //
analyzed: anusvāram vilipya api okārasya prayojanāt

original: MSS_6207-1 iha vaikasya nāmutra amutraikasya no iha /
analyzed: iha vā ekasya na amutra amutra ekasya na u iha

original: MSS_6207-2 iha cāmutra vaikasya nāmutraikasya no iha //
analyzed: iha ca amutra vā ekasya na amutra ekasya na u iha

original: MSS_6208-1 iha vyādhavyūhaḥ paṭughaṭitayantrapraharaṇo mṛgendrāṇāṃ valgat prakharanakharāṇāṃ kulamiha /
analyzed: iha vyādha vyūhaḥ paṭu ghaṭita yantra praharaṇaḥ mṛgendrāṇām valgat prakhara nakharāṇām kulam iha

original: MSS_6208-2 ihālaṅghyaḥ śailo bahalatarapaṅkā saridiha pradīpto'gnirmadhyevanamahaha kaṣṭaṃ karipateḥ //
analyzed: iha ālaṅghyaḥ śailaḥ bahalatara paṅkā sarit iha pradīpta ugniḥ madhye vanam ahaha kaṣṭam kari pateḥ

original: MSS_6209-1 iha śayyāgatenāpi bandhumadhyasthitena vā /
analyzed: iha śayyā gatena api bandhu madhya sthitena vā

original: MSS_6209-2 mayaivaikena soḍhavyā marmacchedādivedanā //
analyzed: mayā eva ekena soḍhavyā marma cheda ādi vedanā

original: MSS_6210-1 iha śikharakarālakṣoṇibhidgaṇḍaśaila- skhalanadalanagarjatphenilo budbudaughaḥ /
analyzed: iha śikhara karāla kṣoṇi bhid gaṇḍaśaila skhalana dalana garjat phenilaḥ budbuda oghaḥ

original: MSS_6210-2 pavanadhṛtaśirīṣaśreṇireṇupraṇālī- surabhisaliladṛptā dvīpavatyo vahanti //
analyzed: pavana dhṛta śirīṣa śreṇi reṇu praṇālī surabhi salila dṛptāḥ dvīpavatyaḥ vahanti

original: MSS_6211-1 iha śiṣṭānuśiṣṭānāṃ śiṣṭānāmapi sarvathā /
analyzed: iha śiṣṭa anuśiṣṭānām śiṣṭānām api sarvathā

original: MSS_6211-2 vācāmeva prasādena lokayātrā pravartate //
analyzed: vācām eva prasādena lokayātrā pravartate

original: MSS_6212-1 iha saṃtamase ghanāgame sukhitaṃ bhānavamaindavaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: iha saṃtamase ghana āgame sukhitam bhānavam aindavam vapuḥ

original: MSS_6212-2 taḍidujjvaladīpalekhayā harito'mūḥ parito vicinvati //
analyzed: taḍit ujjvala dīpa lekhayā haritomūḥ paritas vicinvati

original: MSS_6213-1 iha samadaśakuntākrāntavānīravīrut- prasavasurabhiśītasvacchatoyā vahanti /
analyzed: iha samada śakunta ākrānta vānīra vīrudh prasava surabhi śīta su accha toyāḥ vahanti

original: MSS_6213-2 phalabharapariṇāmaśyāmajambūnikuñja- skhalanamukharabhūrisrotaso nirjhariṇyaḥ //
analyzed: phala bhara pariṇāma śyāma jambu nikuñja skhalana mukhara bhūri srotasaḥ nirjhariṇyaḥ

original: MSS_6214-1 iha sarasi salīlaṃ cārupatre vidhunvan darataralitatiryakcañcukaṇḍūyitāṅgaḥ /
analyzed: iha sarasi sa līlam cāru patre vidhunvan dara taralita tiryak cañcu kaṇḍūyita aṅgaḥ

original: MSS_6214-2 anusarati sarāgaḥ preyasīmagrayātām anupadasamudañcatkaṇṭhanālo marālaḥ //
analyzed: anusarati sa rāgaḥ preyasīm agra yātām anupada samudañcat kaṇṭha nālaḥ marālaḥ

original: MSS_6215-1 iha sarasi saharṣaṃ mañjuguñjābhirāmaṃ madhukara kuru keliṃ sārdhamambhojinībhiḥ /
analyzed: iha sarasi sa harṣam mañju guñjā abhirāmam madhukara kuru kelim sārdham ambhojinībhiḥ

original: MSS_6215-2 anupamamakarandāmodadattapramodā tyajati bata na nidrāṃ mālatī yāvadeṣā //
analyzed: anupama makaranda āmoda datta pramodā tyajati bata na nidrām mālatī yāvat eṣā

original: MSS_6216-1 iha sarvasvaphalinaḥ kulaputramahādrumāḥ /
analyzed: iha sarva sva phalinaḥ kula putra mahā drumāḥ

original: MSS_6216-2 niṣphalatvamalaṃ yānti veśyāvihagabhakṣitāḥ //
analyzed: niṣphala tvam alam yānti veśyā vihaga bhakṣitāḥ

original: MSS_6217-1 iha sāmānyānugamaṃ samupadiśantaḥ sthaleṣvanekeṣu /
analyzed: iha sāmānya anugamam samupadiśantaḥ sthaleṣu anekeṣu

original: MSS_6217-2 liṅgaparāmarśaparā navīnanaiyāyikā yānti //
analyzed: liṅga parāmarśa parāḥ navīna naiyāyikāḥ yānti

original: MSS_6218-1 iha sphuṭaṃ tiṣṭhati nātha kaṇṭakaḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ karṣa nakhāgralīlayā /
analyzed: iha sphuṭam tiṣṭhati nātha kaṇṭakaḥ śanais śanais karṣa nakha agra līlayā

original: MSS_6218-2 iti cchalāt kācidalagnakaṇṭakaṃ padaṃ tadutsaṅgatale nyaveśayat //
analyzed: iti chalāt kācid alagna kaṇṭakam padam tad utsaṅga tale nyaveśayat

original: MSS_6219-1 iha hi navavasante mañjarīpuñjareṇu- cchuraṇadhavaladehā baddhahelaṃ saranti /
analyzed: iha hi nava vasante mañjarī puñja reṇu churaṇa dhavala dehāḥ baddha helam saranti

original: MSS_6219-2 taralamalisamūhā hārihuṃkārakaṇṭhā bahulaparimalālīsundaraṃ sinduvāram //
analyzed: tarala mali samūhā hāri huṃkāra kaṇṭhā bahula parimala alī sundaram sinduvāram

original: MSS_6220-1 iha hi madhuragītaṃ rūpametad raso'yaṃ sphurati parimalo'sau sparśa eṣa stanānām /
analyzed: iha hi madhura gītam rūpam etat rasaḥ uyam sphurati parimalaḥ asau sparśaḥ eṣa stanānām

original: MSS_6220-2 iti hṛtaparamārthairidriyairbhrāmyamāṇaḥ svahitakaraṇadhūrtaiḥ pañcabhirvañcito'smi //
analyzed: iti hṛta parama arthaiḥ idriyaiḥ bhrāmyamāṇaḥ sva hita karaṇa dhūrtaiḥ pañcabhiḥ vañcitaḥ asmi

original: MSS_6221-1 ihāneke satyaṃ vṛṣamahiṣameṣāḥ suturagā gṛhāṇi kṣudrāṇāṃ katipayatṛṇaireva sukhinaḥ /
analyzed: iha aneke satyam vṛṣa mahiṣa meṣāḥ su turagāḥ gṛhāṇi kṣudrāṇām katipaya tṛṇaiḥ eva sukhinaḥ

original: MSS_6221-2 gajānāmāsthānaṃ madasalilajambālitabhuvāṃ tadeko vindhyādrervipinamathavā bhūpasadanam //
analyzed: gajānām āsthānam mada salila jambālita bhuvām tat ekaḥ vindhya adreḥ vipinam athavā bhūpa sadanam

original: MSS_6222-1 ihāneke santaḥ satatamupakāriṇyupakṛtiṃ kṛtajñāḥ kurvanto jagati nivasanto'pi sudhiyaḥ /
analyzed: iha aneke santaḥ satatam upakāriṇī upakṛtim kṛtajñāḥ kurvantaḥ jagati nivasantaḥ api sudhiyaḥ

original: MSS_6222-2 kiyantas te santaḥ sukṛtaparipākapraṇayino vinā svārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati parakṛtyavyasanitā //
analyzed: kiyantaḥ te santaḥ sukṛta paripāka praṇayinaḥ vinā sva artham yeṣām bhavati para kṛtya vyasani tā

original: MSS_6223-1 ihāviśadyena pathātivakraḥ śāstraughaniṣyandasudhāpravāhaḥ /
analyzed: iha a viśadyena pathā ati vakraḥ śāstra ogha nisyanda sudhā pravāhaḥ

original: MSS_6223-2 so'syāḥ śravaḥpatrayuge praṇālī- rekheva dhāvatyabhikarṇakūpam //
analyzed: sā usyāḥ śravaḥ patra yuge praṇālī rekhā iva dhāvati abhi karṇakūpam

original: MSS_6224-1 ihaikaś cūḍālo'bhyajani kalaśād yasya sakalaiḥ pipāsorambhobhiś culukamapi no bhartumaśakaḥ /
analyzed: iha ekaḥ cūḍālobhi ajani kalaśāt yasya sakalaiḥ pipāsoḥ ambhobhiḥ culukam api no bhartum aśakaḥ

original: MSS_6224-2 svamāhātmyaślāghāgurugahanagarjābhiramitaḥ kuṣitvā kliśnāsi śrutikuharamabdhe kimiti naḥ //
analyzed: sva māhātmya ślāghā guru gahana garjābhiḥ amitaḥ kuṣitvā kliśnāsi śruti kuharam abdhe kim iti naḥ

original: MSS_6225-1 ihaiva narakavyādheś cikitsāṃ na karoti yaḥ /
analyzed: iha eva naraka vyādheḥ cikitsām na karoti yaḥ

original: MSS_6225-2 gatvā nirauṣadhasthānaṃ sa rogī kiṃ kariṣyati //
analyzed: gatvā nirauṣadha sthānam sa rogī kim kariṣyati

original: MSS_6226-1 ihaiva bhuvane jātaṃ sattvasaṃsthāpanaṃ kṣamam /
analyzed: iha eva bhuvane jātam sattva saṃsthāpanam kṣamam

original: MSS_6226-2 gṛhyate kimapi svasthair anyat kimapi jihmagaiḥ //
analyzed: gṛhyate kim api svasthaiḥ anyat kim api jihmagaiḥ

original: MSS_6227-1 ihodyāne sampratyahaha pariśiṣṭāḥ kramavaśād amī valmīkās te bhujagakulalīlāvasatayaḥ /
analyzed: iha udyāne samprati ahaha pariśiṣṭāḥ krama vaśāt amī valmīkāḥ te bhujaga kula līlā vasatayaḥ

original: MSS_6227-2 gatās te vistīrṇastabakabharasaurabhyalaharī- parītavyomānaḥ prakṛtiguravaḥ ke'pi taravaḥ //
analyzed: gatāḥ te vistīrṇa stabaka bhara saurabhya laharī parīta vyomānaḥ prakṛti guravaḥ kepi taravaḥ

original: MSS_6228-1 ihopapattirmama kena karmaṇā kva vā prayātavyamito bhavediti /
analyzed: iha upapattiḥ mama kena karmaṇā kva vā prayātavyam itas bhavet iti

original: MSS_6228-2 vicāraṇā yasya na vidyate smṛtau kathaṃ sa dharmapravaṇo bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: vicāraṇā yasya na vidyate smṛtau katham sa dharma pravaṇaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_6229-1 īkṣaṇadhyānasaṃsparśair matsyakūrmavihaṅgamāḥ /
analyzed: īkṣaṇa dhyāna saṃsparśaiḥ matsya kūrma vihaṅgamāḥ

original: MSS_6229-2 poṣayanti svakān putrān tadvat paṇḍitavṛttayaḥ //
analyzed: poṣayanti svakān putrān tadvat paṇḍita vṛttayaḥ

original: MSS_6230-1 īkṣitopadiśatīva nartituṃ tatkṣaṇoditamudaṃ manobhuvam /
analyzed: īkṣitā upadiśati iva nartitum tad kṣaṇa udita mudam manobhuvam

original: MSS_6230-2 kāntadantaparipīḍitādharā pāṇidhūnanamiyaṃ vitanvatī //
analyzed: kānta danta paripīḍita adharā pāṇi dhūnanam iyam vitanvatī

original: MSS_6231-1 īdṛśaṃ kārayen nyāsaṃ yena śreyo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: īdṛśam kārayet nyāsam yena śreyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_6231-2 anye'pi duṣṭamantreṇa na hiṃsanti kadācana //
analyzed: anye api duṣṭa mantreṇa na hiṃsanti kadācana

original: MSS_6232-1 īdṛśaṃ nigadati priye dṛśaṃ saṃmadāt kiyadiyaṃ nyamīlayat /
analyzed: īdṛśam nigadati priye dṛśam saṃmadāt kiyat iyam nyamīlayat

original: MSS_6232-2 prātarālapati kokile kalaṃ jāgarādiva niśaḥ kumudvatī //
analyzed: prātar ālapati kokile kalam jāgarāt iva niśaḥ kumudvatī

original: MSS_6233-1 īdṛśaṃ vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ bhrātaraṃ yaḥ parityajet /
analyzed: īdṛśam vyasanam prāptam bhrātaram yaḥ parityajet

original: MSS_6233-2 ko nāma sa bhavet tasya yameṣa na parityajet //
analyzed: kaḥ nāma sa bhavet tasya yam eṣa na parityajet

original: MSS_6234-1 īdṛśasya bhavataḥ kathametal lāghavaṃ muhuratīva rateṣu /
analyzed: īdṛśasya bhavataḥ katham etat lāghavam muhur atīva rateṣu

original: MSS_6234-2 kṣiptamāyatamadarśayadurvyāṃ kāñcidāma jaghanasya mahattvam //
analyzed: kṣiptam āyatam adarśayat urvyām kāñcid āma jaghanasya mahat tvam

original: MSS_6235-1 īdṛśe vyavahārāgnau mantribhiḥ paripātitāḥ /
analyzed: īdṛśe vyavahāra agnau mantribhiḥ paripātitāḥ

original: MSS_6235-2 sthāne khalu mahīpālā gacchanti kṛpaṇāṃ daśām //
analyzed: sthāne khalu mahīpālāḥ gacchanti kṛpaṇām daśām

original: MSS_6236-1 īdṛśaiḥ śvetakākīyai rājñaḥ śāsanadūṣakaiḥ /
analyzed: īdṛśaiḥ śvetakākīyaiḥ rājñaḥ śāsana dūṣakaiḥ

original: MSS_6236-2 apāpānāṃ sahasrāṇi hanyante ca hatāni ca //
analyzed: apāpānām sahasrāṇi hanyante ca hatāni ca

original: MSS_6237-1 īpsitaṃ manasaḥ sarvaṃ kasya saṃpadyate sukham /
analyzed: īpsitam manasaḥ sarvam kasya saṃpadyate sukham

original: MSS_6237-2 daivāyattaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ tasmāt saṃtoṣamāśrayet //
analyzed: daiva āyattam yatas sarvam tasmāt saṃtoṣam āśrayet

original: MSS_6238-1 īrṣyayā rakṣato nārīr dhik kulasthitidāmbhikān /
analyzed: īrṣyayā rakṣataḥ nārīḥ dhik kula sthiti dāmbhikān

original: MSS_6238-2 smarāndhatvāviśeṣe'pi tathā naramarakṣataḥ //
analyzed: smara andha tva aviśeṣa api tathā naram arakṣataḥ

original: MSS_6239-1 īrṣyayaiva samudvignāḥ puruṣād duṣṭacetasaḥ /
analyzed: īrṣyayā eva samudvignāḥ puruṣāt duṣṭa cetasaḥ

original: MSS_6239-2 atisaktāḥ palāyante śrīdhṛtismṛtikīrtayaḥ //
analyzed: ati saktāḥ palāyante śrī dhṛti smṛti kīrtayaḥ

original: MSS_6240-1 īrṣyā kalahamūlaṃ syāt kṣamā mūlaṃ hi saṃpadām /
analyzed: īrṣyā kalaha mūlam syāt kṣamā mūlam hi saṃpadām

original: MSS_6240-2 īrṣyādoṣād vipraśāpam avāpa janamejayaḥ //
analyzed: īrṣyā doṣāt vipra śāpam avāpa janamejayaḥ

original: MSS_6241-1 īrṣyā kulastrīṣu na nāyakasya niḥśaṅkakelirna parāṅganāsu /
analyzed: īrṣyā kula strīṣu na nāyakasya niḥśaṅka keliḥ na para aṅganāsu

original: MSS_6241-2 veśyāsu caitad dvitayaṃ prarūḍhaṃ sarvasvametās tadaho smarasya //
analyzed: veśyāsu ca etat dvitayam prarūḍham sarva svam etāḥ tat aho smarasya

original: MSS_6242-1 īrṣyād hi kupyate veśyā prasaṅgāc ca virajyate /
analyzed: īrṣyāt hi kupyate veśyā prasaṅgāt ca virajyate

original: MSS_6242-2 stabdhātigamanāc cāpi dānādapi vilupyate //
analyzed: stabdha ati gamanāt ca api dānāt api vilupyate

original: MSS_6243-1 īrṣyāprasphuritādharoṣṭharuciraṃ vaktraṃ na me darśitaṃ sādhikṣepapadā manāgapi giro na śrāvitā mugdhayā /
analyzed: īrṣyā prasphurita adhara uṣṭha ruciram vaktram na me darśitam sa adhikṣepa padāḥ manāk api giraḥ na śrāvitāḥ mugdhayā

original: MSS_6243-2 maddoṣaiḥ sarasaiḥ pratāpitamanovṛttyāpi kopo'nayā kāñcyā gāḍhatarāvabaddhavasanagranthyā samāveditaḥ //
analyzed: mad doṣaiḥ sarasaiḥ pratāpita manaḥ vṛttyā api koponayā kāñcyā gāḍhatara avabaddha vasana granthyā samāveditaḥ

original: MSS_6244-1 īrṣyābhayakrodhasamanvitena lubdhena rugdainyanipīḍitena /
analyzed: īrṣyā bhaya krodha samanvitena lubdhena ruj dainya nipīḍitena

original: MSS_6244-2 vidveṣayuktena ca sevyamānam annaṃ na samyak paripākameti //
analyzed: vidveṣa yuktena ca sevyamānam annam na samyak paripākam eti

original: MSS_6245-2 īrṣyāmalaṃ khaleṣvāste viṣamāśīviṣeṣviva //
analyzed: īrṣyā malam khaleṣu āste viṣam āśīviṣeṣu iva

original: MSS_6246-1 īrṣyāroṣajvalito nijapatisaṅgaṃ vicintayaṃs tasyāḥ /
analyzed: īrṣyā roṣa jvalitaḥ nija pati saṅgam vicintayan tasyāḥ

original: MSS_6246-2 cyutavasanajaghanabhāvana- sāndrānandena nirvāmi //
analyzed: cyuta vasana jaghana bhāvana sāndra ānandena nirvāmi

original: MSS_6247-1 īrṣyā lobho madaḥ prītiḥ krodho bhītiś ca sāhasam /
analyzed: īrṣyā lobhaḥ madaḥ prītiḥ krodhaḥ bhītiḥ ca sāhasam

original: MSS_6247-2 pravṛtticchidrahetūni kārye sapta budhā jaguḥ //
analyzed: pravṛtti chidra hetūni kārye sapta budhāḥ jaguḥ

original: MSS_6248-1 īrṣyī ghṛṇī tvasaṃtuṣṭaḥ krodhano nityaśaṅkitaḥ /
analyzed: īrṣyī ghṛṇī tu asaṃtuṣṭaḥ krodhanaḥ nitya śaṅkitaḥ

original: MSS_6248-2 parabhāgyopajīvī ca ṣaḍete nityaduḥkhitāḥ //
analyzed: para bhāgya upajīvī ca ṣaṭ ete nitya duḥkhitāḥ

original: MSS_6249-1 īśaḥ karasthīkṛtakāñcanādriḥ kuberamitraṃ rajatācalasthaḥ /
analyzed: īśaḥ karasthīkṛta kāñcana adriḥ kubera mitram rajata acala sthaḥ

original: MSS_6249-2 tathāpi bhikṣāṭanamasya jātaṃ vidhau śiraḥsthe kuṭile kutaḥ śrīḥ //
analyzed: tathā api bhikṣāṭanam asya jātam vidhau śiraḥ sthe kuṭile kutas śrīḥ

original: MSS_6250-1 īśānotthaiḥ śakunaiś corā grāmaṃ praviśya na labhante /
analyzed: īśāna utthaiḥ śakunaiḥ corāḥ grāmam praviśya na labhante

original: MSS_6250-2 na ca rogārto jīvati svastho'pyasvāsthyamāpnoti //
analyzed: na ca roga ārtaḥ jīvati svasthaḥ upi asvāsthyam āpnoti

original: MSS_6251-1 īśānotthaiḥ śakunair viśeṣataḥ śūramaṇḍalākrāntaiḥ /
analyzed: īśāna utthaiḥ śakunaiḥ viśeṣataḥ śūra maṇḍala ākrāntaiḥ

original: MSS_6251-2 ripuveṣṭita iva dūraṃ tyaktvā sthānaṃ palāyeta //
analyzed: ripu veṣṭitaḥ iva dūram tyaktvā sthānam palāyeta

original: MSS_6252-1 īśe padapraṇayabhāji muhūrtamātraṃ prāṇapriye'pi kuru mānini mā prasādam /
analyzed: īśe pada praṇaya bhāji muhūrta mātram prāṇa priye api kuru mānini mā prasādam

original: MSS_6252-2 jānātu matpatirasau padayornatānām asmādṛśāmapi manorathabhaṅgaduḥkham //
analyzed: jānātu mad patiḥ asau padayoḥ natānām asmādṛśām api manoratha bhaṅga duḥkham

original: MSS_6253-1 īśo daṇḍasya varuṇo rājñāṃ daṇḍadharo hi saḥ /
analyzed: īśaḥ daṇḍasya varuṇaḥ rājñām daṇḍadharaḥ hi saḥ

original: MSS_6253-2 īśaḥ sarvasya jagato brāhmaṇo vedapāragaḥ //
analyzed: īśaḥ sarvasya jagataḥ brāhmaṇaḥ vedapāragaḥ

original: MSS_6254-1 īśo duratyayaḥ kāla iti satyavatī śrutiḥ /
analyzed: īśaḥ duratyayaḥ kālaḥ iti satyavatī śrutiḥ

original: MSS_6254-2 vṛddhānāmapi yad buddhir bālavākyairvibhidyate //
analyzed: vṛddhānām api yat buddhiḥ bāla vākyaiḥ vibhidyate

original: MSS_6255-1 īśvaraḥ sa jagatpūjyaḥ sa vāgmī caturānanaḥ /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ sa jagat pūjyaḥ sa vāgmī caturānanaḥ

original: MSS_6255-2 yasyāsti draviṇaṃ loke sa eva puruṣottamaḥ //
analyzed: yasya asti draviṇam loke saḥ eva puruṣa uttamaḥ

original: MSS_6256-1 sa evāhṛdayo rāhur alasaḥ sa śanaiścaraḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva ahṛdayaḥ rāhuḥ alasaḥ sa śanaiścaraḥ

original: MSS_6256-2 vakraḥ kujanmā satataṃ vittaṃ yasya na vidyate //
analyzed: vakraḥ ku janmā satatam vittam yasya na vidyate

original: MSS_6257-1 īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśe'rjuna tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ sarva bhūtānām hṛd deśeḥ juna tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_6257-2 bhrāmayan sarvabhūtāni yantrārūḍhāni māyayā //
analyzed: bhrāmayan sarva bhūtāni yantra ārūḍhāni māyayā

original: MSS_6258-1 īśvaragṛhamidamatra hi viṣaṃ ca vṛṣabhaś ca bhasma cādriyate /
analyzed: īśvara gṛham idam atra hi viṣam ca vṛṣabhaḥ ca bhasma ca ādriyate

original: MSS_6258-2 yas tu na viṣaṃ na vṛṣabho na bhasma tasyātra kā gaṇanā //
analyzed: yaḥ tu na viṣam na vṛṣabhaḥ na bhasma tasya atra kā gaṇanā

original: MSS_6259-1 īśvaraparigrahocita- moho'syāṃ madhupa kiṃ mudhā patasi /
analyzed: īśvara parigraha ucita mohaḥ usyām madhupa kim mudhā patasi

original: MSS_6259-2 kanakābhidhānasārā vītarasā kitavakalikeyam //
analyzed: kanaka abhidhāna sārā vīta rasā kitava kalikā iyam

original: MSS_6260-1 īśvaramārādhayato vigalitamānasya labdhamaiśvaryam /
analyzed: īśvaram ārādhayataḥ vigalita mānasya labdham aiśvaryam

original: MSS_6260-2 sphuṭameva bhavati laghimā garimāpi kathaṃ na jānīmaḥ //
analyzed: sphuṭam eva bhavati laghimā garimā api katham na jānīmaḥ

original: MSS_6261-1 īśvarasevā sulabha- nyakkārā durlabhotkarṣā /
analyzed: īśvara sevā durlabha utkarṣā

original: MSS_6261-2 ciraparicaryā viphalā nirmālyā niṣkramo'pi nirayāya //
analyzed: cira paricaryāḥ viphalāḥ nirmālyāḥ niṣkramaḥ api nirayāya

original: MSS_6262-1 īśvarasya jagat kṛtsnaṃ sṛṣṭimākulayannimām /
analyzed: īśvarasya jagat kṛtsnam sṛṣṭim ākulayan imām

original: MSS_6262-2 asti yo'strīkṛtastrīkas tasya vairaṃ smaranniva //
analyzed: asti tasya vairam smaran iva

original: MSS_6263-1 īśvarāḥ piśunāñ śaśvad bibhratīti kimadbhutam /
analyzed: īśvarāḥ piśunām śaśvat bibhrati iti kim adbhutam

original: MSS_6263-2 prāyo nidhaya evāhīn dvijihvān dadhatetarām //
analyzed: prāyas nidhayaḥ eva ahīn dvijihvān dadhatetarām

original: MSS_6264-1 īśvarāṇāṃ vacaḥ satyaṃ tathaivācaritaṃ kvacit /
analyzed: īśvarāṇām vacaḥ satyam tathā eva ācaritam kvacid

original: MSS_6264-2 teṣāṃ yat svavacoyuktaṃ buddhimāṃs tat samācaret //
analyzed: teṣām yat sva vacaḥ yuktam buddhimān tat samācaret

original: MSS_6265-1 īśvarāṇāmidaṃ tantraṃ prāyeṇautsukyamāvahet /
analyzed: īśvarāṇām idam tantram prāyeṇa autsukyam āvahet

original: MSS_6265-2 yatas tiraścāṃ caritair nītimārgaḥ pradarśyate //
analyzed: yatas tiraścām caritaiḥ nīti mārgaḥ pradarśyate

original: MSS_6266-1 īśvarāt samabhūd rudro jyotirmaya umāpatiḥ /
analyzed: īśvarāt samabhūt rudraḥ jyotiḥ mayaḥ umāpatiḥ

original: MSS_6266-2 rudrād viṣṇurabhūdādyas trailokyaparipālakaḥ //
analyzed: rudrāt viṣṇuḥ abhūt ādyaḥ trailokya paripālakaḥ

original: MSS_6267-1 īśvarānugṛhīto hi kaścid bālo'pi śāmyati /
analyzed: īśvara anugṛhītaḥ hi kaścid bālaḥ api śāmyati

original: MSS_6267-2 vṛddho'pi na śamaṃ yāti kaścit kāpuruṣaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: vṛddhaḥ api na śamam yāti kaścid kāpuruṣaḥ punar

original: MSS_6268-1 īśvarā bhūridānena yal labhante phalaṃ kila /
analyzed: īśvarāḥ bhūri dānena yat labhante phalam kila

original: MSS_6268-2 daridras tacca kākiṇyā prāpnuyāditi na śrutiḥ //
analyzed: daridraḥ tat ca kākiṇyā prāpnuyāt iti na śrutiḥ

original: MSS_6269-1 īśvareṇa samaṃ prītir na me lakṣmaṇa rocate /
analyzed: īśvareṇa samam prītiḥ na me lakṣmaṇa rocate

original: MSS_6269-2 gatasya gauravaṃ nāsti āgatasya dhanakṣayaḥ //
analyzed: gatasya gauravam na asti āgatasya dhana kṣayaḥ

original: MSS_6270-1 īśvaroktād dhanurvedād vyāsasyāpi subhāṣitāt /
analyzed: īśvara uktāt dhanurvedāt vyāsasya api subhāṣitāt

original: MSS_6270-2 padānyākṛṣya racito granthaḥ saṃkṣepato mayā //
analyzed: padāni ākṛṣya racitaḥ granthaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ mayā

original: MSS_6271-1 īṣatkampapayodharaṃ gurukaṭīprauḍhaprahārādbhutaṃ svidyadbhālamanekahāsyasarasaṃ saṃkathyapādavyatham /
analyzed: īṣat kampa payodharam guru kaṭī prauḍha prahāra adbhutam svid yad bhālam aneka hāsya sarasam saṃkathya pāda vyatham

original: MSS_6271-2 vāraṃvāramuraḥprapātasubhagaṃ saṃdaśyamānādharaṃ kiṃciddattanitambadeśanakharaṃ dhanyo rataṃ sevate //
analyzed: vāram vāram uraḥ prapāta subhagam saṃdaśyamāna adharam kiṃcid datta nitamba deśa nakharam dhanyaḥ ratam sevate

original: MSS_6272-1 īṣattuṣāraiḥ kṛtaśītaharmyaḥ suvāsitaṃ cāruśiraḥ sacampakaiḥ /
analyzed: īṣat tuṣāraiḥ kṛta śīta harmyaḥ su vāsitam cāru śiraḥ sa campakaiḥ

original: MSS_6272-2 kurvanti nāryo'pi vasantakāle stanaṃ sahāraṃ kusumairmanoharaiḥ //
analyzed: kurvanti nāryaḥ api vasanta kāle stanam sahāram kusumaiḥ manoharaiḥ

original: MSS_6273-1 īṣatprakaṭito mandas tīkṣṇas tu pulakādibhiḥ /
analyzed: īṣat prakaṭitaḥ mandaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ tu pulaka ādibhiḥ

original: MSS_6273-2 sa tu tīkṣṇataraḥ śvāsaśoṣitāvayavo'tra yaḥ //
analyzed: sa tu tīkṣṇataraḥ śvāsa śoṣita avayavaḥ utra yaḥ

original: MSS_6274-1 īṣadavaśiṣṭajaḍimā śiśire gatamātra eva ciramaṅgaiḥ /
analyzed: īṣat avaśiṣṭa jaḍimā śiśire gata mātre eva ciram aṅgaiḥ

original: MSS_6274-2 navayauvaneva tanvī niṣevyate nirbharaṃ vāpī //
analyzed: nava yauvanā iva tanvī niṣevyate nirbharam vāpī

original: MSS_6275-1 īṣadāyacchamāno'pi siṃho mattānapi dvipān /
analyzed: īṣat āyacchamānaḥ api siṃhaḥ mattān api dvipān

original: MSS_6275-2 nihanti balavāṃs tasmāt saṃdheyaḥ śivamicchatā //
analyzed: nihanti balavān tasmāt saṃdheyaḥ śivam icchatā

original: MSS_6276-1 īṣadvakritapakṣmapaṅktibhiranākūtasmitairvīkṣit aiḥ etaireva tavādya sundari karakroḍe jagad vartate /
analyzed: īṣat vakrita pakṣma paṅktibhiḥ anākūta smitaiḥ vīkṣit aiḥ etaiḥ eva tava adya sundari kara kroḍe jagat vartate

original: MSS_6276-2 antaḥ pāṃsulahemaketakidaladroṇīdurāpaśriyo dormūlasya nivedanādiha punaḥ krūre kimākāṅkṣasi //
analyzed: antar pāṃsula hema ketaki dala droṇī durāpa śriyaḥ dos mūlasya nivedanāt iha punar krūre kim ākāṅkṣasi

original: MSS_6277-1 īṣannāsānikocaḥ kharamukharasukhaprekṣaṇaṃ hāsaleśaḥ svābodhādaprasādadhvananamasadavadyoktihelāvahelā /
analyzed: īṣat nāsā nikocaḥ khara mukhara sukha prekṣaṇam hāsa leśaḥ sva ābodhāt aprasāda dhvananam asat avadya ukti helā avahelā

original: MSS_6277-2 maunavyāsaṅgavārtāntarapararuciraślokapāṭhāda yas te soḍhavyāḥ ke kiyantaḥ śiva śiva kavite kucchalā matsarāṇām //
analyzed: yaḥ te soḍhavyāḥ ke kiyantaḥ śiva śiva kavi te kucchalāḥ matsarāṇām

original: MSS_6278-1 īṣanmīlitadṛṣṭi mugdhavilasatsītkāradhārāvaśād avyaktākulakelikākuvikasaddantāṃśudhautādharam /
analyzed: īṣat mīlita dṛṣṭi mugdha vilasat sītkāra dhārā vaśāt avyakta ākula kelikā ku vikasat danta aṃśu dhauta adharam

original: MSS_6278-2 śāntastabdhapayodharaṃ bhṛśapariṣvaṅgāt kuraṅgīdṛśo harṣotkarṣavimuktaniḥsahatanordhanyo dhayatyānanam //
analyzed: śānta stabdha payodharam bhṛśa pariṣvaṅgāt kuraṅgī dṛśaḥ harṣa utkarṣa vimukta niḥsaha tanoḥ dhanyaḥ dhayati ānanam

original: MSS_6279-1 īṣanmīlitalocanā ślathasamastāṅgā śramodvejitā niśvāsaprathamā viratnarasanā saṃtyaktakaṇṭhasvanā /
analyzed: īṣat mīlita locanā ślatha samasta aṅgā śrama udvejitā niśvāsa prathamā viratna rasanā saṃtyakta kaṇṭha svanā

original: MSS_6279-2 prodyatkāmajalā kalāsu kuśalā nirlajjayā kāminī kāntā kālavaśāt priyasya vaśagā jātā ratānte kṣaṇam //
analyzed: prodyat kāma jalā kalāsu kuśalā nirlajjayā kāminī kāntā kāla vaśāt priyasya vaśa gā jātā rata ante kṣaṇam

original: MSS_6280-1 īṣanmīlitalolalocanayugaṃ vyāvartitabhrūyugaṃ saṃdaṣṭādharavedanāpraṇayinaṃ mā meti mandākṣaram /
analyzed: īṣat mīlita lola locana yugam vyāvartita bhrū yugam saṃdaṣṭa adhara vedanā praṇayinam mā mā iti manda akṣaram

original: MSS_6280-2 tanvaṅgyāḥ suratāvasānasamaye dṛṣṭaṃ mayā yanmukhaṃ svedārdrīkṛtapāṇḍugaṇḍayugalaṃ tat kena vismaryate //
analyzed: tanvaṅgyāḥ surata avasāna samaye dṛṣṭam mayā yat mukham sveda ārdrīkṛta pāṇḍu gaṇḍa yugalam tat kena vismaryate

original: MSS_6281-1 īṣallabdhapraveśo'pi snehavicchedakārakaḥ /
analyzed: īṣat labdha praveśaḥ api sneha viccheda kārakaḥ

original: MSS_6281-2 kṛtakṣobho narīnarti khalo manthānadaṇḍavat //
analyzed: kṛta kṣobhaḥ narīnarti khalaḥ manthāna daṇḍa vat

original: MSS_6282-1 īṣallomaśabhāvabhāñji kapiśaśyāmānubandhacchavī- liptatvañci cakorakīraharitonmeṣīṇi māṣīlatāḥ /
analyzed: īṣat lomaśa bhāva bhāñji kapiśa śyāma anubandha chavī cakora kīra harita unmeṣīṇi māṣī latāḥ

original: MSS_6282-2 etās tarkaya bālavānaravadhūhastāṅgulīlabdhrima- spardhāvanti phalāni bibhrati parīṇāmābhirāmaśriyaḥ //
analyzed: etāḥ tarkaya bāla vānara vadhū hasta aṅgulī labdhrima spardhāvanti phalāni bibhrati parīṇāma abhirāma śriyaḥ

original: MSS_6283-1 īhamānaḥ samārambhān yadi nāsādayed dhanam /
analyzed: īhamānaḥ samārambhān yadi na āsādayet dhanam

original: MSS_6283-2 ugraṃ tapaḥ samārohen na hyanuptaṃ prarohati //
analyzed: ugram tapaḥ samārohet na hi an uptam prarohati

original: MSS_6284-1 dānena bhogī bhavati medhāvī vṛddhasevayā /
analyzed: dānena bhogī bhavati medhāvī vṛddha sevayā

original: MSS_6284-2 ahiṃsayā ca dīrghāyur iti prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: ahiṃsayā ca dīrgha āyuḥ iti prāhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_6285-1 īhā dhanasya na sukhā labdhvā cintā ca bhūyasī /
analyzed: īhā dhanasya na sukhā labdhvā cintā ca bhūyasī

original: MSS_6285-2 labhdanāśo yathā mṛtyur labhdaṃ bhavati vā na vā //
analyzed: yathā mṛtyuḥ labhdam bhavati vā na vā

original: MSS_6286-1 uktaṃ ca vakṣyamānaṃ ca bhartsanaṃ tiryagīkṣaṇam /
analyzed: uktam ca vakṣyamānam ca bhartsanam tiryak īkṣaṇam

original: MSS_6286-2 kvacid yathārthakathanaṃ vyākhyā tantrasya ṣaḍvidhāḥ //
analyzed: kvacid yathā artha kathanam vyākhyā tantrasya ṣaḍvidhāḥ

original: MSS_6287-1 uktaṃ durvacanaṃ mayā na subhage hāsye'pi duḥkhapradaṃ tyaktvā tvāmapi bhāṣitairapi mayā nānyā ganā lālitā /
analyzed: uktam durvacanam mayā na subhage hāsye pi duḥkha pradam tyaktvā tvām api bhāṣitaiḥ api mayā nā anyā ganā lālitā

original: MSS_6287-2 tvāmekāmanavadyabhūṣaṇabharaiḥ saṃbhāvayāmi tvayā he niṣkāraṇakopane vada kṛtaḥ kopaḥ kimarthaṃ mayi //
analyzed: tvām ekām anavadya bhūṣaṇa bharaiḥ saṃbhāvayāmi tvayā he niṣkāraṇa kopane vada kṛtaḥ kopaḥ kimartham mayi

original: MSS_6288-1 uktaṃ parasyāmiṣatām anuktaṃ yātyadṛśyatām /
analyzed: uktam parasya āmiṣa tām an uktam yāti adṛśya tām

original: MSS_6288-2 hṛdaye śalyatāṃ dhatte nidhane dhanināṃ dhanam //
analyzed: hṛdaye śalya tām dhatte nidhane dhaninām dhanam

original: MSS_6289-1 uktaṃ yat kṛpaṇaṃ vaco viracito bhūyān vasūnāṃ vyayaḥ soḍhāḥ kiṃ ca viyogavajratatayo dūtī muhuḥ preṣitā /
analyzed: uktam yat kṛpaṇam vacaḥ viracitaḥ bhūyān vasūnām vyayaḥ soḍhāḥ kim ca viyoga vajra tatayaḥ dūtī muhur preṣitā

original: MSS_6289-2 baddho'yaṃ praṇayāñjalirvinihite bāṣpāmbudhaute dṛśau niṣpīyādharapallavaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ sarve sakhe vismṛtam //
analyzed: baddhaḥ ayam praṇaya añjaliḥ vinihite bāṣpa ambu dhaute dṛśau niṣpīya adhara pallavam mṛga dṛśaḥ sarve sakhe vismṛtam

original: MSS_6290-1 uktas (uttas)
analyzed: uktas uttas

original: te rudhireṇāhaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ te mastakaṃ mayā /
analyzed: te rudhireṇa aham spṛṣṭam te mastakam mayā

original: MSS_6290-2 ityetāñ śapathān kṛtvā sā vai gamyā punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: iti etām śapathān kṛtvā sā vai gamyā punar punar

original: MSS_6291-1 uktā gacchati lajjitā viramati premṇā manāgikṣate keśāṃlluñcati jṛmbhaṇaṃ racayati prastauti gāthāṃ muhuḥ /
analyzed: uktā gacchati lajjitā viramati premṇā manāk ikṣate keśān luñcati jṛmbhaṇam racayati prastauti gāthām muhur

original: MSS_6291-2 āli gatyaparāṃ virauti paruṣaṃ cumbatyasau bālakaṃ gātraṃ bhañjati jṛmbhate vihasati pratyuttaraṃ yācate //
analyzed: āli gatya aparām virauti paruṣam cumbati asau bālakam gātram bhañjati jṛmbhate vihasati pratyuttaram yācate

original: MSS_6292-1 dormūlaṃ khalu darśayet stanayuge vastraṃ samālambate a guṣṭhena likhenmahīṃ smitamukhī vrīḍāṃ vidhatte mṛṣā /
analyzed: dormūlam khalu darśayet stana yuge vastram samālambate a guṣṭhena likhet mahīm smita mukhī vrīḍām vidhatte mṛṣā

original: MSS_6292-2 dantenādharapallavaṃ vidaśati vyaktaṃ tathā bhāṣate bhāvairebhiriha sphuṭaṃ mṛgadṛśāṃ jñeyo'bhilāṣaḥ sadā //
analyzed: dantena adhara pallavam vidaśati vyaktam tathā bhāṣate bhāvaiḥ ebhiḥ iha sphuṭam mṛga dṛśām jñeyaḥ abhilāṣaḥ sadā

original: MSS_6293-1 uktā bravīṣi surataṃ na mayā niśāyās tvaṃ dauṣṭavena gajagāmini lajjayā vā /
analyzed: uktā bravīṣi suratam na mayā niśāyāḥ tvam dauṣṭavena gaja gāmini lajjayā vā

original: MSS_6293-2 tāmbūlakajjalakucāmayacihnacitraṃ tat saṃnivedayati māṃ ramaṇottarīyam //
analyzed: tāmbūla kajjala kuca āmaya cihna citram tat saṃnivedayati mām ramaṇa uttarīyam

original: MSS_6294-1 uktirnānyā sphurati niyataṃ dhyānamanyanna cāste paśyatyanyaṃ na khalu nayanaṃ na śravo'pi śṛṇoti /
analyzed: uktiḥ na anyā sphurati niyatam dhyānam anyat na ca āste paśyati anyam na khalu nayanam na śravaḥ api śṛṇoti

original: MSS_6294-2 śyāmaṃ śyāmaṃ pathiṣu cakitaṃ rītiretādṛśī no vṛndāraṇye ciraparicitāḥ ke na jīvanti nāryaḥ //
analyzed: śyāmam śyāmam pathiṣu cakitam rītiḥ etādṛśī naḥ vṛndāraṇye cira paricitāḥ ke na jīvanti nāryaḥ

original: MSS_6295-1 uktena bahunā kiṃ vā kiṃ kṛtaiḥ śapathairghanaiḥ /
analyzed: uktena bahunā kim vā kim kṛtaiḥ śapathaiḥ ghanaiḥ

original: MSS_6295-2 vadāmi satyamevaitat tvameva mama mānase //
