analyzed: vadāmi satyam eva etat tvam eva mama mānase

original: MSS_6296-1 uktvānṛtaṃ bhaved yatra prāṇināṃ prāṇrakṣaṇam /
analyzed: uktvā anṛtam bhavet yatra prāṇinām prāṇ rakṣaṇam

original: MSS_6296-2 anṛtaṃ tatra satyaṃ syāt satyamapyanṛtaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: anṛtam tatra satyam syāt satyam api anṛtam bhavet

original: MSS_6297-1 kāminīṣu vivāheṣu gavāṃ muktau tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kāminīṣu vivāheṣu gavām muktau tathā eva ca

original: MSS_6297-2 brāhmaṇānāṃ vipattau ca śapathairnāsti pātakam //
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām vipattau ca śapathaiḥ na asti pātakam

original: MSS_6298-1 ugragrāhamudanvato jalamatikrāmatyanālambane vyomni bhrāmyati durgamaṃ kṣitibhṛtām prāgbhāramārohati /
analyzed: ugra grāham udanvataḥ jalam atikrāmati anālambane vyomni bhrāmyati durgamam kṣitibhṛtām prāgbhāram ārohati

original: MSS_6298-2 kīrṇaṃ yāti viṣākulairahikulaiḥ pātālamekākinī kīrtiste nayanābhirāma kṛtakaṃ manye bhayaṃ yoṣitām //
analyzed: kīrṇam yāti viṣa ākulaiḥ ahi kulaiḥ pātālam ekākinī kīrtiḥ te nayana abhirāma kṛtakam manye bhayam yoṣitām

original: MSS_6299-1 ugratvaṃ ca mṛdutvaṃ ca samayaṃ vīkṣya saṃśrayet /
analyzed: ugra tvam ca mṛdu tvam ca samayam vīkṣya saṃśrayet

original: MSS_6299-2 andhakāramasaṃhṛtya nogro bhavati bhāskaraḥ //
analyzed: andhakāram a saṃhṛtya na ugraḥ bhavati bhāskaraḥ

original: MSS_6300-1 ugrarūpaṃ kucadvandvaṃ hāraga gādharaṃ tava /
analyzed: ugra rūpam kuca dvandvam hāraga gādharam tava

original: MSS_6300-2 candracūḍaṃ kariṣyāmi kuru tāvad digambaram //
analyzed: candracūḍam kariṣyāmi kuru tāvat digambaram

original: MSS_6301-1 ugrābhiṣa gamanuṣa gi parasya duḥkhaṃ hantāślathaṃ vyathayati prasabhārdrabhāvam /
analyzed: parasya duḥkham hantā aślatham vyathayati prasabhā ārdra bhāvam

original: MSS_6301-2 baddhaḥ sarojakuhare virahārtanādaiś cakrābhidhasya madhupo'dhikameti dainyam //
analyzed: baddhaḥ saroja kuhare viraha ārta nādaiḥ cakra abhidhasya madhupaḥ adhikam eti dainyam

original: MSS_6302-1 ugrāvagrāhamagnā kuśadhuvanadhutādhoraṇāsphālitā gaiḥ pratyagroddaṇḍaśuṇḍoḍḍamaraṇasamaratrastadi nā gacakraiḥ /
analyzed: ugra avagrāha magnā kuśa dhuvana dhuta ādhoraṇa āsphālitā gaiḥ pratyagra uddaṇḍa śuṇḍa uḍḍamaraṇa samara trasta di nā ga cakraiḥ

original: MSS_6302-2 ālokyālokya śailānurucaraṇaraṇacchṛ khalāghaṭṭayadbhir yasyāśābhittijeturmadakalakaribhiḥ kvāpi na prāpi ra gaḥ //
analyzed: ālokya ālokya khalā ghaṭṭayadbhiḥ yasya āśā bhitti jetuḥ mada kala karibhiḥ kvāpi na prāpi ra gaḥ

original: MSS_6303-1 ugraiḥ śāpairupahatibhiyā rakṣasā dūramuktāḥ dagdhuṃ yogyā hutavahamapi tvatpriyāvarṇaśuddhāḥ /
analyzed: ugraiḥ śāpaiḥ upahati bhiyā rakṣasā dūra muktāḥ dagdhum yogyāḥ hutavaham api tvad priyā varṇa śuddhāḥ

original: MSS_6303-2 utpaśyantyo janakatanayātejasaiva svarakṣāṃ rodhaṃ yasyāmanuvidadhate lokapālāvarodhāḥ //
analyzed: utpaśyantyaḥ janakatanayā tejasā eva sva rakṣām rodham yasyām anuvidadhate lokapāla avarodhāḥ

original: MSS_6304-1 ucitaṃ gopanamanayoḥ kucayoḥ kanakādrikāntitaskarayoḥ /
analyzed: ucitam gopanam anayoḥ kucayoḥ kanakādri kānti taskarayoḥ

original: MSS_6304-2 avadhīritavidhumaṇḍala- mukhamaṇḍalagopanaṃ kimiti //
analyzed: avadhīrita vidhu maṇḍala mukha maṇḍala gopanam kim iti

original: MSS_6305-1 ucitaṃ nāma nāra gyāṃ ketakyāmapi kaṇṭakāḥ /
analyzed: ucitam nāma nāra gyām ketakyām api kaṇṭakāḥ

original: MSS_6305-2 rasagandhojjhite kiṃ te kaṇṭakāḥ kaṇṭakārike //
analyzed: rasa gandha ujjhite kim te kaṇṭakāḥ kaṇṭakārike

original: MSS_6306-1 ucitaṃ bandhanamanayoḥ kucayugayoḥ kevalaṃ tanvi /
analyzed: ucitam bandhanam anayoḥ kuca yugayoḥ kevalam tanvi

original: MSS_6306-2 yuvajanamānasahāṭaka- cauravidhau paśyatoharayoḥ //
analyzed: yuva jana mānasa hāṭaka caura vidhau paśyataḥ harayoḥ

original: MSS_6307-1 ucitaḥ praṇayo varaṃ vihantaṃ bahavaḥ khaṇḍanahetavo hi dṛṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: ucitaḥ praṇayaḥ varam vihantam bahavaḥ khaṇḍana hetavaḥ hi dṛṣṭāḥ

original: MSS_6307-2 upacāravidhirmanasvinīnāṃ na tu pūrvābhyadhiko'pi bhāvaśūnyaḥ //
analyzed: upacāra vidhiḥ manasvinīnām na tu pūrva abhyadhikaḥ api bhāva śūnyaḥ

original: MSS_6308-1 ucitakarma tanoti na saṃpadām itaradapyasadeva vivekinām /
analyzed: ucita karma tanoti na saṃpadām itarat api asat eva vivekinām

original: MSS_6308-2 iti nirastasamastasukhānvayaḥ kathamato na viṣīdatu paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: iti nirasta samasta sukha anvayaḥ katham atas na viṣīdatu paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_6309-1 ucitaguṇotkṣiptā api purato'pi niveśite suvarṇalave /
analyzed: ucita guṇa utkṣiptāḥ api puratas api niveśite suvarṇa lave

original: MSS_6309-2 jhagiti patanti mukhena prakaṭapramadā yathā ca tulāḥ //
analyzed: patanti mukhena prakaṭa pramadāḥ yathā ca tulāḥ

original: MSS_6309A-1 ucitavyayaśīlasya kṛśatvamapi śobhate /
analyzed: ucita vyaya śīlasya kṛśa tvam api śobhate

original: MSS_6309A-2 dvitīyaścandramā vandyo na vandyaḥ pūrṇacandramāḥ //
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ candramāḥ vandyaḥ na vandyaḥ pūrṇa candramāḥ

original: MSS_6310-1 ucitāmupāsya rucitām abhidhehi giraṃ nirantarāvahitaḥ /
analyzed: ucitām upāsya rucitām abhidhehi giram nirantara avahitaḥ

original: MSS_6310-2 apyāyatimati puruṣe prabhuṇā kaluṣeṇa bhūyate kathite //
analyzed: api āyatimati puruṣe prabhuṇā kaluṣeṇa bhūyate kathite

original: MSS_6311-1 ucitena vicāreṇa cārutāṃ yānti sūktayaḥ /
analyzed: ucitena vicāreṇa cāru tām yānti su uktayaḥ

original: MSS_6311-2 vedyatattvāvabodhena vidyā iva manīṣiṇām //
analyzed: vedya tattva avabodhena vidyā iva manīṣiṇām

original: MSS_6312-1 uccaṃ pradeśaṃ bhaṣaṇo'dhiruhya bhaṣatyabhīkṣṇaṃ ravimīkṣamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: uccam pradeśam bhaṣaṇa udhiḥ uhya bhaṣati abhīkṣṇam ravim īkṣamāṇaḥ

original: MSS_6312-2 yadā tadānīmacireṇa vṛṣṭir ambhodamuktā bhavati prabhūtā //
analyzed: yadā tadānīm acireṇa vṛṣṭiḥ ambhoda muktā bhavati prabhūtā

original: MSS_6313-1 uccaḥ satphalado yathāyamahamapyetādṛgetāvatā spardhāṃ manda madoddhataḥ svajanakenārkeṇa mā mā kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: uccaḥ sat phala daḥ yathā ayam aham api etādṛś etāvatā spardhām manda mada uddhataḥ sva janakena arkeṇa mā mā kṛthāḥ

original: MSS_6313-2 dūrādeva bhavādṛśo'sya mahasā dhvastāḥ samastāḥ svayaṃ naivecchatyayamatyayaṃ guṇisakhaḥ kasyāpi tejonidhiḥ //
analyzed: dūrāt eva bhavādṛśaḥ usya mahasā dhvastāḥ samastāḥ svayam nā evā icchati ayam atyayam guṇi sakhaḥ kasya api tejaḥ nidhiḥ

original: MSS_6314-1 uccakucakumbhanihito hṛdayaṃ cālayati jaghanalagnāgraḥ /
analyzed: ucca kuca kumbha nihitaḥ hṛdayam cālayati jaghana lagna agraḥ

original: MSS_6314-2 atinimnamadhyasaṃkrama- dārunibhas taruṇi tava hāraḥ //
analyzed: ati nimna madhya saṃkrama dāru nibhaḥ taruṇi tava hāraḥ

original: MSS_6315-1 uccāt pradeśādavatīrya nimnaṃ yo yāti vāmo'tha sukhaprado'sau /
analyzed: uccāt pradeśāt avatīrya nimnam yaḥ yāti sukha pradosau

original: MSS_6315-2 nimnapradeśāt punaruccadeśaṃ yakṣo vrajan dakṣiṇago'pi śastaḥ //
analyzed: nimna pradeśāt punar ucca deśam yakṣaḥ vrajan dakṣiṇa gopi śastaḥ

original: MSS_6316-1 uccāraṇajño'tha girāṃ dadhānam uccā raṇatpakṣigaṇās taṭīs tam /
analyzed: uccāraṇa jñāḥ utha girām dadhānam uccā raṇat pakṣi gaṇāḥ taṭīḥ tam

original: MSS_6316-2 utkaṃ dharaṃ draṣṭumavekṣya śaurim utkaṃ dharaṃ dāruka ityuvāca //
analyzed: utkam dharam draṣṭum avekṣya śaurim utkam dharam dārukaḥ iti uvāca

original: MSS_6316A-1 uccārūḍhairnarairātmā rakṣaṇīyo'tiyatnataḥ /
analyzed: ucca ārūḍhaiḥ naraiḥ ātmā rakṣaṇīyaḥ uti yatnataḥ

original: MSS_6316A-2 dūrārohaparibhraṃśavinipātaḥ suduḥsahaḥ //
analyzed: dūra āroha paribhraṃśa vinipātaḥ su duḥsahaḥ

original: MSS_6317-1 uccāvacaṃ jagaddauḥsthyam eka eva niṣedhati /
analyzed: uccāvacam jagat dauḥsthyam ekaḥ eva niṣedhati

original: MSS_6317-2 praviṣṭamātro nṛpatiḥ prapañcamiva naḥ śrutiḥ //
analyzed: praviṣṭa mātraḥ nṛpatiḥ prapañcam iva naḥ śrutiḥ

original: MSS_6318-1 uccāvacaṃ na kuruta svanitaṃ pata gās tūrṇaṃ mukhāni paśavo mukulīkurudhvam /
analyzed: uccāvacam na kuruta svanitam pata gāḥ tūrṇam mukhāni paśavaḥ mukulīkurudhvam

original: MSS_6318-2 karṇaṃ pradāya rasikāḥ kalayantu harṣaṃ tāraṃ tanoti raṇitaṃ taruṇaḥ piko'yam //
analyzed: karṇam pradāya rasikāḥ kalayantu harṣam tāram tanoti raṇitam taruṇaḥ pikaḥ iyam

original: MSS_6319-1 uccāvacakarānyāyyāḥ pūrvarājñāṃ yudhiṣṭhira /
analyzed: uccāvaca kara anyāyyāḥ pūrva rājñām yudhiṣṭhira

original: MSS_6319-2 yathā yathā na hīyeraṃs tathā kuryān mahīmatiḥ //
analyzed: yathā yathā na hīyeran tathā kuryāt mahīmatiḥ

original: MSS_6320-1 uccāvacāni jananāni bhavanti yāvat karmāṇi tāvadakhilāni layaṃ na yānti /
analyzed: uccāvacāni jananāni bhavanti yāvat karmāṇi tāvat akhilāni layam na yānti

original: MSS_6320-2 tat karmamūlahananāya yatadhvamāryā yāvacchiro na viramej jalabandharogaḥ //
analyzed: tat karma mūla hananāya yatadhvam āryāḥ yāvat śiraḥ na viramet jalabandha rogaḥ

original: MSS_6321-1 uccāsanagato nīcaḥ nīca eva na cottamaḥ /
analyzed: ucca āsana gataḥ nīcaḥ nīcaḥ eva na ca uttamaḥ

original: MSS_6321-2 prasādaśikharastho'pi kākaḥ kiṃ garuḍāyate //
analyzed: prasāda śikhara sthaḥ upi kākaḥ kim garuḍāyate

original: MSS_6322-1 uccityaṃ prathamamadhaḥ sthitaṃ mṛgākṣī puṣpaughaṃ śritaviṭapaṃ grahītukāmā /
analyzed: uccityam prathamam adhas sthitam mṛga akṣī puṣpa ogham śrita viṭapam grahītu kāmā

original: MSS_6322-2 āroḍhuṃ caraṇamadādaśokayaṣṭer āmūlaṃ punarapi tena puṣpito'sau //
analyzed: āroḍhum caraṇa madāt aśoka yaṣṭeḥ āmūlam punar api tena puṣpitā usau

original: MSS_6323-1 uccīkṛtagrīvamaho mudhaiva kiṃ yācase cātakapota megham /
analyzed: uccīkṛta grīvam aho mudhā eva kim yācase cāta kapota megham

original: MSS_6323-2 atyūrjjitaṃ garjjitamātramasminn ambhodhare bindulavas tu dūre //
analyzed: atyūrjitam garjjita mātram asmin ambhodhare bindu lavaḥ tu dūre

original: MSS_6324-1 uccīyante sma veśmanyaśanavirahite yatnataḥ śrotriyāṇāṃ yatra śyāmākabījānyapi caṭakavadhūcañcukoṭicyutāni /
analyzed: uccīyante sma veśmani aśana virahite yatnataḥ śrotriyāṇām yatra śyāmāka bījāni api caṭaka vadhū cañcu koṭi cyutāni

original: MSS_6324-2 yasmin dātaryakasmāc caṭulavaṭukarākṛṣṭamuktāvacūla- bhraṣṭās tatraiva dṛṣṭā yuvatibhiralasaṃ ghūrṇitā muktikaughāḥ //
analyzed: yasmin dātari akasmāt bhraṣṭāḥ tatra eva dṛṣṭāḥ yuvatibhiḥ alasam ghūrṇitāḥ muktika oghāḥ

original: MSS_6325-1 uccaiḥ kalyāṇavāhī karajitavasudhaḥ sarvadā pūrṇakāmo vikhyātaḥ karṇavṛttyā na ca vacasi kaṭuścitrapākānubhāvī /
analyzed: uccais kalyāṇa vāhī karajita vasudhaḥ sarvadā pūrṇa kāmaḥ vikhyātaḥ karṇa vṛttyā na ca vacasi kaṭuḥ citra pāka anubhāvī

original: MSS_6325-2 koṣāpekṣī parasmāducitabahukathas tatparaḥ puṇyaloke citraṃ rājādhirāja tvamiva tava ripus tatra kampaṃ pratīmaḥ //
analyzed: koṣa apekṣī parasmāt ucita bahu kathaḥ tad paraḥ puṇya loke citram rāja adhirāja tvam iva tava ripuḥ tatra kampam pratīmaḥ

original: MSS_6326-1 uccaiḥ kumbhaḥ kapiśadaśano bandhuraskandhasaṃdhiḥ snigdhātāmradyutinakhamaṇirlambavṛttoruhastaḥ /
analyzed: uccais kumbhaḥ kapiśa daśanaḥ bandhuḥ askandha saṃdhiḥ snigdha ātāmra dyuti nakhamaṇiḥ lamba vṛtta ūru hastaḥ

original: MSS_6326-2 śūraḥ saptacchadaparimalaspardhidānodako'yaṃ bhadraḥ sāndradrumagirisarittīracārī karīndraḥ //
analyzed: śūraḥ saptacchada parimala spardhi dāna udaka ūyam bhadraḥ sāndra druma giri sarit tīra cārī kari indraḥ

original: MSS_6327-1 uccaiḥ padamadhitiṣṭhaṃl lokas tattveṣu muhyati prāyaḥ /
analyzed: uccais padam adhitiṣṭhan lokaḥ tattveṣu muhyati prāyas

original: MSS_6327-2 viṣayamapi paśyati samaṃ parvataśikharāgramārūḍhaḥ //
analyzed: viṣayam api paśyati samam parvata śikhara agram ārūḍhaḥ

original: MSS_6328-1 uccaiḥ prakathanaṃ hāsaḥ ṣṭhīvanaṃ kutsanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: uccais prakathanam hāsaḥ ṣṭhīvanam kutsanam tathā

original: MSS_6328-2 jṛmbhaṇaṃ gātrabha gaṃ ca parvasphoṭaṃ ca varjayet //
analyzed: jṛmbhaṇam ca parva sphoṭam ca varjayet

original: MSS_6329-1 uccaiḥ ṣṭhīvanamutkaṭaprahasitaṃ śayyāsanotsarpaṇaṃ gātrāsphoṭanajṛmbhaṇāni sulabhadravyārthasaṃprārthanam /
analyzed: uccais ṣṭhīvanam utkaṭa prahasitam śayyā āsana utsarpaṇam gātra āsphoṭana jṛmbhaṇāni sulabha dravya artha saṃprārthanam

original: MSS_6329-2 bālāli ganacumbanānyabhimukhe sakhyāḥ samālokanaṃ dṛkpātaśca parā mukho guṇakathā karṇasya kaṇḍūyanam //
analyzed: bālāli gana cumbanāni abhimukhe sakhyāḥ samālokanam dṛś pātaḥ ca parā mukhaḥ guṇa kathā karṇasya kaṇḍūyanam

original: MSS_6330-1 uccaiḥ sthānakṛtodayairbahuvidhairjyotirbhirudyatprabhaiḥ śukrādyaiḥ kimamībhiratra vitathāṃ prauḍhiṃ dadhānairapi /
analyzed: uccais sthāna kṛta udayaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ jyotirbhiḥ udyat prabhaiḥ śukra ādyaiḥ kim amībhiḥ atra vitathām prauḍhim dadhānaiḥ api

original: MSS_6330-2 yāvallokatamopahena bhavatā lakṣmīrna vistāryate tāvaccandra kathaṃ prayāti paramāṃ vṛddhiṃ sa ratnākaraḥ //
analyzed: yāvat loka tama upahena bhavatā lakṣmīḥ na vistāryate tāvat candra katham prayāti paramām vṛddhim sa ratnākaraḥ

original: MSS_6331-1 uccaiḥsthitīnāṃ viduṣāṃ padamāroḍhumicchavaḥ /
analyzed: uccais sthitīnām viduṣām padam āroḍhum icchavaḥ

original: MSS_6331-2 satsubhāṣitasopānasevinaḥ santu sādhavaḥ //
analyzed: sat su bhāṣita sopāna sevinaḥ santu sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_6332-1 uccairadhyayanaṃ ciraṃtanakathāḥ strībhiḥ sahālāpanaṃ tāsāmarbhakalālane ratiratho tatpākamithyāstutiḥ /
analyzed: uccais adhyayanam ciraṃtana kathāḥ strībhiḥ saha ālāpanam tāsām arbhaka lālane ratiḥ atho tad pāka mithyā stutiḥ

original: MSS_6332-2 putrabhrātṛjanāśiṣaḥ subhagatāyogyatvasaṃkīrtanaṃ svānuṣṭhānakathābhivādanavidhirbhikṣoguṇā dvādaśa //
analyzed: putra bhrātṛ jana āśiṣaḥ subhaga tā yogya tva saṃkīrtanam sva anuṣṭhāna kathā abhivādana vidhiḥ bhikṣaḥ guṇāḥ dvādaśa

original: MSS_6333-1 uccairadhyayanaṃ purātanakathāḥ strībhiḥ sahālāpanaṃ tāsāmarbhakalālanaṃ patinutis tatpākamithyāstutiḥ /
analyzed: uccais adhyayanam purātana kathāḥ strībhiḥ saha ālāpanam tāsām arbhaka lālanam pati nutiḥ tad pāka mithyā stutiḥ

original: MSS_6333-2 ādeśasya karāvalambanavidhiḥ pāṇḍityalekhakriyā horāgāruḍamantratantrakavidhirbhikṣoguṇā dvādaśa //
analyzed: ādeśasya kara avalambana vidhiḥ pāṇḍitya lekha kriyā horā gāruḍa mantra tantraka vidhiḥ bhikṣaḥ guṇāḥ dvādaśa

original: MSS_6334-1 uccairuccaratu ciraṃ cīrī vartmani taruṃ samāruhya /
analyzed: uccais uccaratu ciram cīrī vartmani tarum samāruhya

original: MSS_6334-2 digvyāpini śabdaguṇe śa khaḥ saṃbhāvanā bhūmiḥ //
analyzed: diś vyāpini śabda guṇe śa khaḥ saṃbhāvanā bhūmiḥ

original: MSS_6334A-1 uccairuccaritavyaṃ yat kiṃcidajānatāpi puruṣeṇa /
analyzed: uccais uccaritavyam yat kiṃcid a jānatā api puruṣeṇa

original: MSS_6334A-2 mūrkhā bahu manyante viduṣāmapi saṃśayo bhavati //
analyzed: mūrkhāḥ bahu manyante viduṣām api saṃśayaḥ bhavati

original: MSS_6335-1 uccairuccaiḥśravās tena hayaratnamahāri ca /
analyzed: uccais uccaiḥśravāḥ tena haya ratnam ahāri ca

original: MSS_6335-2 dehabaddhamivendrasya cirakālārjitaṃ yaśaḥ //
analyzed: deha baddham iva indrasya cira kāla arjitam yaśaḥ

original: MSS_6336-1 uccairuccaistarāmicchan padānyāyacchate mahān /
analyzed: uccais uccaistarām icchan padāni āyacchate mahān

original: MSS_6336-2 nīco nīcaistarāṃ yāti nipātabhayaśa kayā //
analyzed: nīcaḥ nīcaistarām yāti kayā

original: MSS_6337-1 uccairuḍḍīyamānā natimante vahati yā tu gacchantī /
analyzed: uccais uḍḍīyamānā natimante vahati yā tu gacchantī

original: MSS_6337-2 yacciralabhyamathālpaṃ tatsā bahu yacchati tvaritam //
analyzed: yat cira labhyam atha alpam tat sā bahu yacchati tvaritam

original: MSS_6338-1 uccairuttālakheladbhujavanapavanoddhūtaśailaughapāta- sphārodañcatpayodhiprakaṭitamakuṭasvardhunīsaṃgamāni /
analyzed: uccais uttāla khelat bhuja vana pavana uddhūta śaila ogha pāta sphāra udañcat payodhi prakaṭita makuṭa svardhunī saṃgamāni

original: MSS_6338-2 jīyāsus tāṇḍavāni sphuṭavikaṭajaṭākoṭisaṃghaṭṭabhūri- bhraśyannakṣatracakravyavahitasumanovṛṣṭipātāni śaṃbhoḥ //
analyzed: jīyāsuḥ tāṇḍavāni sphuṭa vikaṭa jaṭā koṭi saṃghaṭṭa bhūri bhraśyat nakṣatra cakra vyavahita sumanaḥ vṛṣṭi pātāni śaṃbhoḥ

original: MSS_6339-1 uccairuttālagaṇḍasthalabahulagaladdānapānapramatta- sphītālivrātagītiśrutividhṛtikalonmīlitārdhākṣi pakṣmā /
analyzed: uccais uttāla gaṇḍa sthala bahula galat dāna pāna pramatta sphīta ali vrāta gīti śruti vidhṛti kalā unmīlita ardha akṣi pakṣmā

original: MSS_6339-2 bhaktapratyūhapṛthvīruhanivahasamunmūlanoccairudañcac- chuṇḍādaṇḍāgra ugrārbhaka ibhavadano vaḥ sa pāyādapāyāt //
analyzed: bhakta pratyūha pṛthvīruha nivaha samunmūlana uccais udañcat śuṇḍā daṇḍa agraḥ ugra arbhakaḥ ibha vadanaḥ vaḥ sa pāyāt apāyāt

original: MSS_6340-1 uccairudghoṣya jetavyaṃ madhyasthaścedapaṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: uccais udghoṣya jetavyam madhyasthaḥ ced apaṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_6340-2 paṇḍito yadi tatraiva pakṣapāto'dhiropyatām //
analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ yadi tatra eva pakṣapātaḥ adhiropyatām

original: MSS_6341-1 uccairunmathitasya tena balinā daivena dhikkarmaṇā lakṣmīmasya nirasyato jalanidherjātaṃ kimetāvatā /
analyzed: uccais unmathitasya tena balinā daivena dhik karmaṇā lakṣmīm asya nirasyataḥ jalanidheḥ jātam kim etāvatā

original: MSS_6341-2 gāmbhīryaṃ kimayaṃ jahāti kimayaṃ puṣṇāti nāmbhodharān maryādāṃ kimayaṃ bhinatti kimayaṃ na trāyate vāḍavam //
analyzed: gāmbhīryam kim ayam jahāti kim ayam puṣṇāti na ambhodharān maryādām kim ayam bhinatti kim ayam na trāyate vāḍavam

original: MSS_6342-1 uccaireṣa taruḥ phalaṃ ca pṛthulaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva hṛṣṭaḥ śukaḥ pakvaṃ śālivanaṃ vihāya jaḍadhīs tāṃ nālikerīṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: uccais eṣa taruḥ phalam ca pṛthulam dṛṣṭvā eva hṛṣṭaḥ śukaḥ pakvam śāli vanam vihāya jaḍa dhīḥ tām nālikerīm gataḥ

original: MSS_6342-2 tāmāruhya bubhukṣitena manasā buddhiḥ kṛtā bhedane āśā tasya na kevalaṃ vigalitā cañcūrgatā cūrṇatām //
analyzed: tām āruhya bubhukṣitena manasā buddhiḥ kṛtā bhedane āśā tasya na kevalam vigalitā cañcūḥ gatā cūrṇa tām

original: MSS_6343-1 uccairdaivādiha paśupatau bhūṣaṇībhūya tiṣṭhan kālavyāla prathayasi phaṇāṃ bhīṣaṇāṃ tāvadeva /
analyzed: uccais daivāt iha paśupatau bhūṣaṇībhūya tiṣṭhan kāla vyāla prathayasi phaṇām bhīṣaṇām tāvat eva

original: MSS_6343-2 deve dūrādavinayabhayād yāvadevaṃ garutmān kopāṭopaṃ kathamapi tirobhāvayan maunamāste //
analyzed: deve dūrāt avinaya bhayāt yāvat evam garutmān kopa āṭopam katham api tirobhāvayan maunam āste

original: MSS_6344-1 uccairniṣādagāndhārau nīcairṛṣabhadhaivatau /
analyzed: uccais niṣāda gāndhārau nīcais ṛṣabha dhaivatau

original: MSS_6344-2 śeṣāstu svaritā jñeyāḥ ṣaḍjamadhyamapañcamāḥ //
analyzed: śeṣāḥ tu svaritāḥ jñeyāḥ ṣaḍja madhyama pañcamāḥ

original: MSS_6345-1 uccairbrahmāṇḍakhaṇḍadvitayasahacaraṃ kumbhayugmaṃ dadhānaḥ pre khannāgāripakṣapratibhaṭavikaṭaśrotratālābhirā maḥ /
analyzed: uccais brahmāṇḍa khaṇḍa dvitaya sahacaram kumbha yugmam dadhānaḥ pre maḥ

original: MSS_6345-2 devaḥ śaṃborapatyaṃ bhujagapatitanusparddhivarddhiṣṇuhastas trailokyāścaryamūrtiḥ sa jayati jagatāmīśvaraḥ kuñjarāsyaḥ //
analyzed: devaḥ śaṃboḥ apatyam bhujaga pati tanu sparddhi varddhiṣṇu hastaḥ trailokya āścarya mūrtiḥ sa jayati jagatām īśvaraḥ kuñjara āsyaḥ

original: MSS_6346-1 uccairmahārajatarājivirājitāsau durvarṇabhittiriha sāndrasudhāsavarṇā /
analyzed: uccais mahārajata rāji virājitā asau durvarṇa bhittiḥ iha sāndra sudhā savarṇā

original: MSS_6346-2 abhyeti bhasmaparipāṇḍuritasmarārer udvahnilocanalalāmalalāṭalīlām //
analyzed: abhyeti bhasma paripāṇḍurita smarāreḥ udvahni locana lalāma lalāṭa līlām

original: MSS_6347-1 uccairyadyasti manaḥ kiṃ vipadā saṃpadā gantrī /
analyzed: uccais yadi asti manaḥ kim vipadā saṃpadā gantrī

original: MSS_6347-2 puruṣasya manasi bhagne magnevāpatsu lakṣyate lakṣmīḥ //
analyzed: puruṣasya manasi bhagne magnā iva āpatsu lakṣyate lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_6348-1 uccairyo madhupānalubdhamanasāṃ bhṛ gā ganānāṃ gaṇair udgīto racitālayaḥ khagakulairdeśāntarādāgataiḥ /
analyzed: uccais yaḥ madhu pāna lubdha manasām gaṇaiḥ udgītaḥ racita ālayaḥ khaga kulaiḥ deśa antarāt āgataiḥ

original: MSS_6348-2 āsīd yaśca niṣevito'dhvagaśatairgrīṣmoṣmatānticchide so'yaṃ saṃprati durmadena dalitaś chāyātarurdantinā //
analyzed: āsīt yaḥ ca niṣevitaḥ udhvaga śataiḥ grīṣma ūṣma tānti chide saḥ ayam saṃprati durmadena dalitaḥ chāyā taruḥ dantinā

original: MSS_6349-1 uccaistanantamabhigamya ghanaṃ tavāham abhyāgato'smyatithireṣa payodharārthī /
analyzed: uccais tanantam abhigamya ghanam tava aham abhyāgataḥ asmi atithiḥ eṣa payodhara arthī

original: MSS_6349-2 vaktuṃ trapā tadapi vacmi vidūrabandhoḥ kāṭhinyamasti ca payodharayormamāpi //
analyzed: vaktum trapā tat api vacmi vidūra bandhoḥ kāṭhinyam asti ca payodharayoḥ mama api

original: MSS_6350-1 uccaistarāṃ matsariṇo'pi lokāḥ kurvanti saṃsatsu puraḥ praśaṃsām /
analyzed: uccaistarām matsariṇaḥ api lokāḥ kurvanti saṃsatsu puras praśaṃsām

original: MSS_6350-2 na paṇḍitarviśvasitavyamatra tatsauhṛdaṃ yat kriyate parokṣam //
analyzed: na paṇḍitar viśvasitavyam atra tat sauhṛdam yat kriyate parokṣam

original: MSS_6351-1 uccaistarādambaraśailamauleś cyuto ravirgairikagaṇḍaśailaḥ /
analyzed: uccaistarāt ambara śaila mauleḥ cyutaḥ raviḥ gairika gaṇḍaśailaḥ

original: MSS_6351-2 tasyaiva pātena vicūrṇitasya saṃdhyārajorājirihojjihīte //
analyzed: tasya eva pātena vicūrṇitasya saṃdhyā rajaḥ rājiḥ iha ujjihīte

original: MSS_6352-1 uccau kucau kṛśatarā ca kaṭirgabhīro nābhiḥ samunnatataraṃ ca nitambabimbam /
analyzed: uccau kucau kṛśatarā ca kaṭiḥ gabhīraḥ nābhiḥ samunnatataram ca nitamba bimbam

original: MSS_6352-2 nimnonnateti sudṛśaḥ subhage śarīre magnaṃ mano mama na māṃ punarabhyupaiti //
analyzed: nimna unnata iti su dṛśaḥ subhage śarīre magnam manaḥ mama na mām punar abhyupaiti

original: MSS_6353-1 ucchanneva kalau vṛṣasya caraṇaśreṇī navīnāṃ punas tāṃ nirmāya kṛtas tvayā punarapi nyastaḥ padasyandanaḥ /
analyzed: ucchannā iva kalau vṛṣasya caraṇa śreṇī navīnām punar tām nirmāya kṛtaḥ tvayā punar api nyastaḥ pada syandanaḥ

original: MSS_6353-2 bhindānaistaraṇiṃ tvadastraniyatairetatkilodīritaṃ śrutvānūrurasau vihāya mihiraṃ tvāṃ deva seviṣyate //
analyzed: bhindānaiḥ taraṇim tvad astra niyataiḥ etat kila udīritam śrutvān ūruḥ asau vihāya mihiram tvām deva seviṣyate

original: MSS_6354-1 ucchalan matsyapucchāgradaṇḍapātahatārṇasi /
analyzed: ucchalan matsya puccha agra daṇḍa pāta hata arṇasi

original: MSS_6354-2 jagadudyānamambhodhāv unmamajja mamajja ca //
analyzed: jagat udyānam ambhodhau unmamajja mamajja ca

original: MSS_6355-1 ucchāstrapadavinyāsaḥ sahasaivābhisaṃpataḥ /
analyzed: ucchāstra pada vinyāsaḥ sahasā eva abhisaṃpataḥ

original: MSS_6355-2 śatrukha gamukhagrāsam agatvā na nivartate //
analyzed: a gatvā na nivartate

original: MSS_6356-1 ucchidyate dharmavṛttam adharmo vartate mahān /
analyzed: ucchidyate dharma vṛttam adharmaḥ vartate mahān

original: MSS_6356-2 bhayamāhurdivārātraṃ yadā pāpo na vāryate //
analyzed: bhayam āhuḥ divārātram yadā pāpaḥ na vāryate

original: MSS_6357-1 ucchidrāṇi digambarasya vasanānyardhā ginassvāmino ratnālaṃkṛtibhirviśoṣitavapuḥśobhāśataṃ subhruvaḥ /
analyzed: ucchidrāṇi digambarasya vasanāni ardhāḥ ginaḥ svāminaḥ ratna alaṃkṛtibhiḥ viśoṣita vapuḥ śobhā śatam subhruvaḥ

original: MSS_6357-2 paurāḍhyāśca purīḥ śmaśānavasaterbhikṣābhujo'pyakṣamā lakṣmīṃ na vyatanod daridrabharaṇeṣvajño hi senānvayaḥ //
analyzed: paura āḍhyāḥ ca purīḥ śmaśāna vasateḥ bhikṣā bhujaḥ upi akṣamāḥ lakṣmīm na vyatanot daridra bharaṇeṣu ajñaḥ hi senā anvayaḥ

original: MSS_6358-1 ucchinnāśrayakātareva kulaṭā gotrāntaraṃ śrīrgatā tāmevānugatā gatānugatikāstyaktānurāgāḥ prajāḥ /
analyzed: ucchinna āśraya kātarā iva kulaṭā gotra antaram śrīḥ gatā tām eva anugatāḥ gatānugatikāḥ tyakta anurāgāḥ prajāḥ

original: MSS_6358-2 āptairapyanavāptapauruṣaphalaiḥ kāryasya dhūrujjhitā kiṃ kurvantvathavottamā garahitaira gairiva sthīyate //
analyzed: āptaiḥ api anavāpta pauruṣa phalaiḥ kāryasya dhūḥ ujjhitā kim kurvantu athavā uttamāḥ ga rahitaiḥ sthīyate

original: MSS_6359-1 ucchiṣṭaṃ karakharparaṃ pathi gataṃ mūrkhairjaḍairdhikkṛtaṃ viprais tattvavicintakairmanasi taṃ svātmaprabodhe kṛtam /
analyzed: ucchiṣṭam kara kharparam pathi gatam mūrkhaiḥ jaḍaiḥ dhikkṛtam vipraiḥ tattva vicintakaiḥ manasi tam sva ātma prabodhe kṛtam

original: MSS_6359-2 nṛtyantaṃ ca digambaraṃ ca jaṭilaṃ bālaiśca muktaṃ jaḍaṃ ḍimbhaścopahasanti catvarapathe dattvā muhus tālikāḥ //
analyzed: nṛtyantam ca digambaram ca jaṭilam bālaiḥ ca muktam jaḍam ḍimbhaḥ ca upahasanti catvara pathe dattvā muhur tālikāḥ

original: MSS_6360-1 ucchiṣṭaṃ śivanirmālyaṃ vamanaṃ śavakarpaṭam /
analyzed: ucchiṣṭam śiva nirmālyam vamanam śava karpaṭam

original: MSS_6360-2 kākaviṣṭhāsamutpannāḥ pañcaite'tipavitrakāḥ //
analyzed: kāka viṣṭhā samutpannāḥ pañca ete iti pavitrakāḥ

original: MSS_6361-1 ucchiṣṭo na spṛśet kha gaṃ niśikuryānna śīrṣake /
analyzed: ucchiṣṭaḥ na spṛśet niśi kuryāt na śīrṣake

original: MSS_6361-2 divā ca pūjayedenaṃ gandhamālyādisaṃpadā //
analyzed: divā ca pūjayet enam gandha mālya ādi saṃpadā

original: MSS_6362-1 ucchīrṣe padakaṃ kṛtvā yadi śete śunas tadā /
analyzed: ucchīrṣe padakam kṛtvā yadi śete śunaḥ tadā

original: MSS_6362-2 āgacchadvallabhaṃ vakti tadveśmanyacirādapi //
analyzed: āgacchat vallabham vakti tad veśmani acirāt api

original: MSS_6363-1 ucchūnāruṇamaśruṇirgamavaśāc cakṣurmanā mantharaṃ soṣmaśvāsakadarthitādhararucirvyastālakā bhrūbhuvaḥ /
analyzed: ucchūna aruṇam aśru nirgama vaśāt cakṣuḥ manāḥ mantharam sa ūṣma śvāsa kadarthita adhara ruciḥ vyasta alakāḥ bhrū bhuvaḥ

original: MSS_6363-2 āpāṇḍuḥ karapallave ca nibhṛtam śete kapolasthalī mugdhe kasya tapaḥphalaṃ pariṇataṃ yasmai taveyaṃ daśā //
analyzed: āpāṇḍuḥ karapallave ca nibhṛtam śete kapola sthalī mugdhe kasya tapaḥ phalam pariṇatam yasmai tava iyam daśā

original: MSS_6364-1 ucchṛ kalena nirapekṣatayonmadena yenākulīkṛtamidaṃ kariṇā babhūva /
analyzed: kalena nirapekṣa tayā unmadena yena ākulīkṛtam idam kariṇā babhūva

original: MSS_6364-2 dattvā padaṃ śirasi hastipakārbhakeṇa mandaḥ kathaṃ gamita eṣa vaśaṃ prasahya //
analyzed: dattvā padam śirasi hastipaka arbhakeṇa mandaḥ katham gamitaḥ eṣa vaśam prasahya

original: MSS_6365-1 ucchedanaṃ cāpacayaḥ pīḍanaṃ karśanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ucchedanam ca apacayaḥ pīḍanam karśanam tathā

original: MSS_6365-2 iti vidyāvidaḥ prāhuḥ śatrau vṛttaṃ caturvidham //
analyzed: iti vidyā vidaḥ prāhuḥ śatrau vṛttam caturvidham

original: MSS_6366-1 ucchedyamapi vidvāṃso vardhayantyarimekadā /
analyzed: ucchedyam api vidvāṃsaḥ vardhayanti arim ekadā

original: MSS_6366-2 guḍena vardhitaḥ śleṣmā yato niḥśeṣatāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: guḍena vardhitaḥ śleṣmā yatas niḥśeṣa tām vrajet

original: MSS_6367-1 ucchmaśrurvyāttavaktraḥ pravitatarasanāpallavālīḍhasṛkkā pi gograbhrāntanetraḥ pulakitataralottānalā gūlanālaḥ /
analyzed: ucchmaśruḥ vyātta vaktraḥ pravitata rasanā pallava ālīḍha sṛkkā api go ugra bhrānta netraḥ pulakita tarala uttānalā gūla nālaḥ

original: MSS_6367-2 kutrāpyaklāntigāmī kvacidatipihitaḥ kvāpi tu gāgramātraś citravyāghro'yamāptuṃ pramadavanamṛgītarṇakāṃstūrṇameti //
analyzed: kutra api a klānti gāmī kvacid atipihitaḥ kvāpi tu citra vyāghraḥ yam āptum pramada vana mṛgī tarṇakān tūrṇam eti

original: MSS_6368-1 ucchrāyo janabhīti heturadhikaṃ vaikṛtyamudgrīvatā sarvatra pratiparvavikramabhavaḥ krūro marurjanmabhūḥ /
analyzed: ucchrāyaḥ jana bhīti hetuḥ adhikam vaikṛtyam udgrīva tā sarvatra prati parva vikrama bhavaḥ krūraḥ maruḥ janma bhūḥ

original: MSS_6368-2 yasyoccaiḥ kaṭukaṇṭakapraṇayitā dhik kaṣṭamuṣṭre paśau tasmin rājaparigrahaḥ sa ca mahāśabdadvayībhājanam //
analyzed: yasya uccais kaṭu kaṇṭaka praṇayi tā dhik kaṣṭam uṣṭre paśau tasmin rāja parigrahaḥ sa ca mahā śabda dvayībhājanam

original: MSS_6369-1 ucchvasan maṇdalaprāntarekhamābaddhakuḍmalam /
analyzed: ucchvasan maṇdala prānta rekham ābaddha kuḍmalam

original: MSS_6369-2 aparyāptamuro vṛddheḥ śaṃsatyasyāḥ stanadvayam //
analyzed: a paryāptam uraḥ vṛddheḥ śaṃsati asyāḥ stana dvayam

original: MSS_6370-1 ucchvāsaḥ khaṇḍakhaṇḍastaralitahṛdaye mūkatāṃ bhūṣaṇānām uktipratyuktibandho'pyabhinayavihitaḥ pāṃsulā bhūḥ suśayyā /
analyzed: ucchvāsaḥ khaṇḍa khaṇḍaḥ taralita hṛdaye mūka tām bhūṣaṇānām ukti pratyukti bandhaḥ upi abhinaya vihitaḥ pāṃsulā bhūḥ su śayyā

original: MSS_6370-2 tūṣṇīmeva prasādānunayanakalahāś cumbanaṃ śabdaśūnyaṃ yatraitat svasti tasmai nibhṛtanidhuvanāyeti nāndī namo'stu //
analyzed: tūṣṇīm eva prasāda anunayana kalahāḥ cumbanam śabda śūnyam yatra etat svasti tasmai nibhṛta nidhuvanāya iti nāndī namaḥ astu

original: MSS_6371-1 ucchvāsayantyaḥ ślathabandhanāni gātrāṇi kandarpasamākulāni /
analyzed: ucchvāsayantyaḥ ślatha bandhanāni gātrāṇi kandarpa samākulāni

original: MSS_6371-2 samīpavartiṣvadhunā priyeṣu samutsukā eva bhavanti nāryaḥ //
analyzed: samīpa vartiṣu adhunā priyeṣu samutsukāḥ eva bhavanti nāryaḥ

original: MSS_6372-1 ucchvāsahikkāśayanā gabha ga- viṣṭhāvamiśvāsavijṛmbhaṇāni /
analyzed: ucchvāsa hikkā śayanāḥ viṣṭhā vami śvāsa vijṛmbhaṇāni

original: MSS_6372-2 vaktraṃ śuno'rdhonmiṣitāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ dyute praśaṃsanti ca vāmaceṣṭam //
analyzed: vaktram ca dṛṣṭim dyute praśaṃsanti ca vāma ceṣṭam

original: MSS_6373-1 ucchvāsāvadhayaḥ prāṇāḥ sa cocchvāsaḥ samīraṇaḥ /
analyzed: ucchvāsa avadhayaḥ prāṇāḥ sa ca ucchvāsaḥ samīraṇaḥ

original: MSS_6373-2 samīraṇāccalaṃ nāsti yat prāṇiti tadadbhutam //
analyzed: samīraṇāt calam na asti yat prāṇiti tat adbhutam

original: MSS_6374-1 ucchvāso'pi na niryāti bāṇe hṛdayavartini /
analyzed: ucchvāsaḥ api na niryāti bāṇe hṛdaya vartini

original: MSS_6374-2 kiṃ punarvikaṭāṭopa padabandhā sarasvatī //
analyzed: kim punar vikaṭa āṭopa pada bandhā sarasvatī

original: MSS_6375-1 ucyatāṃ sa vacanīyamaśeṣaṃ neśvare paruṣatā sakhi sādhvī /
analyzed: ucyatām sa vacanīyam aśeṣam na īśvare paruṣa tā sakhi sādhvī

original: MSS_6375-2 ānayainamanunīya,
analyzed: ānaya enam anunīya

original: kathaṃ vā vipriyāṇi janayannanuneyaḥ //
analyzed: katham vā vipriyāṇi janayan anuneyaḥ

original: MSS_6376-1 ucyamāno'valambeta paramarmaṇi mūkatām /
analyzed: ucyamānā uvalambeta para marmaṇi mūka tām

original: MSS_6376-2 svakarmaṇi tu bādhiryasthairyamādhuryasoṣmavān //
analyzed: sva karmaṇi tu bādhirya sthairya mādhurya sa ūṣmavān

original: MSS_6377-1 ujjāgaritabhrāmita- danturadalaruddhamadhukaraprakare /
analyzed: ujjāgarita bhrāmita dantura dala ruddha madhukara prakare

original: MSS_6377-2 kāñcanaketaki mā tava vikasatu saurabhyasaṃbhāraḥ //
analyzed: kāñcana ketaki mā tava vikasatu saurabhya saṃbhāraḥ

original: MSS_6378-1 ujjāḍite yadā grāme gacchatāṃ dakṣiṇasvarāḥ /
analyzed: ujjāḍite yadā grāme gacchatām dakṣiṇa svarāḥ

original: MSS_6378-2 śrgālās taṃ punaḥ sthānaṃ kathayanti karasthitam //
analyzed: śrgālāḥ tam punar sthānam kathayanti kara sthitam

original: MSS_6379-1 ujjṛmbhate kumudinīsukṛtaṃ mṛgā ko viṣvagvikīrṇaparipāṭalaraśmidaṇḍaḥ /
analyzed: ujjṛmbhate kumudinī sukṛtam mṛgā kaḥ viṣvak vikīrṇa paripāṭala raśmi daṇḍaḥ

original: MSS_6379-2 utsūtavidrumakulo jaladhes tara gād utkṣipyamāṇa iva kaścana rājakambuḥ //
analyzed: utsūta vidruma kulaḥ jaladheḥ tara gāt utkṣipyamāṇaḥ iva kaścana rāja kambuḥ

original: MSS_6380-1 ujjṛmbhānanamullasatkucataṭaṃ loladbhramadbhrūlataṃ svedāmbhaḥsnapitā gayaṣṭi vigaladvrīḍaṃ saromāñcayā /
analyzed: ujjṛmbha ānanam ullasat kuca taṭam lolat bhramat bhrū latam sveda ambhaḥ snapitā vigalat vrīḍam sa romāñcayā

original: MSS_6380-2 dhanyaḥ ko'pi yuvā sa yasya vadane vyāpāritāḥ sāṃprataṃ mugdhe dugdhamahābdhiphenapaṭalaprakhyāḥ kaṭākṣacchaṭāḥ //
analyzed: dhanyaḥ kaḥ api yuvā sa yasya vadane vyāpāritāḥ sāṃpratam mugdhe dugdha mahā abdhi phena paṭala prakhyāḥ kaṭākṣa chaṭāḥ

original: MSS_6381-1 ujjvalaṃ saralaṃ caiva vakramāraktameva ca /
analyzed: ujjvalam saralam ca eva vakram āraktam eva ca

original: MSS_6381-2 netraṃ caturvidhaṃ proktaṃ tasya bhāvāḥ pṛthak pṛthak //
analyzed: netram caturvidham proktam tasya bhāvāḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: MSS_6382-1 ujjvalam mitrasaṃyoge saralaṃ putradarśane /
analyzed: ujjvalam mitra saṃyoge saralam putra darśane

original: MSS_6382-2 vakraṃ ca kāminībhoge āraktaṃ śatrudarśane //
analyzed: vakram ca kāminī bhoge āraktam śatru darśane

original: MSS_6383-1 ujjvalaguṇamabhyuditaṃ kṣudro draṣṭuṃ na kathamapi kṣamate /
analyzed: ujjvala guṇam abhyuditam kṣudraḥ draṣṭum na katham api kṣamate

original: MSS_6383-2 dagdhvā tanumapi śalabho dīpraṃ dīpārciṣaṃ harati //
analyzed: dagdhvā tanum api śalabhaḥ dīpram dīpa arciṣam harati

original: MSS_6384-1 ujjvalacampakamukulā- śa kitayā yaḥ pradīpakaṃ spṛśati /
analyzed: ujjvala campaka mukulā kitayā yaḥ pradīpakam spṛśati

original: MSS_6384-2 kajjalakala kadāhaṃ muktvānyat tasya kiṃ ghaṭatām //
analyzed: kajjala kala kadā aham muktvā anyat tasya kim ghaṭatām

original: MSS_6385-1 ujjvalālokayā snigdhā tvayā tyaktā na rājate /
analyzed: ujjvala ālokayā snigdhā tvayā tyaktā na rājate

original: MSS_6385-2 malīmasamukhī vartiḥ pradīpaśikhayā yathā //
analyzed: malīmasa mukhī vartiḥ pradīpa śikhayā yathā

original: MSS_6386-1 ujjhatī śucimivāśu tamisrām antikaṃ vrajati tārakarāje /
analyzed: ujjhatī śucim iva āśu tamisrām antikam vrajati tāraka rāje

original: MSS_6386-2 dikprasādaguṇamaṇḍanamūhe raśmihāsaviśadaṃ mukhamaindrī //
analyzed: diś prasāda guṇa maṇḍanam ūhe raśmi hāsa viśadam mukham aindrī

original: MSS_6387-1 ujjhantyaḥ svarṇakāñcīrjhaṇiti raśanayā campakanyāsamayyā tanvatyastārahārān vicakilakalikāpaṃktimudrāvalībhiḥ /
analyzed: ujjhantyaḥ svarṇa kāñcīḥ jhaṇiti raśanayā campaka nyāsa mayyā tanvatyaḥ tāra hārān vicakila kalikā paṃkti mudrā āvalībhiḥ

original: MSS_6387-2 kiṃ cāśokapravālairaruṇamaṇimayān saṃtyajantyo'vataṃsān utkīrṇāḥ kāmabāṇairiva hṛdi suhṛdo vallabhānāṃ babhūvuḥ //
analyzed: kim ca aśoka pravālaiḥ aruṇa maṇi mayān utkīrṇāḥ kāma bāṇaiḥ iva hṛdi suhṛdaḥ vallabhānām babhūvuḥ

original: MSS_6388-1 ujjhitavṛṣayogā api ratisamaye naraviśeṣanirapekṣāḥ /
analyzed: ujjhita vṛṣa yogāḥ api rati samaye nara viśeṣa nirapekṣāḥ

original: MSS_6388-2 kṛṣṇaukābhiratā api hiraṇyakaśipupriyāḥ satatam //
analyzed: kṛṣṇauka abhiratāḥ api hiraṇyakaśipu priyāḥ satatam

original: MSS_6389-1 ujjhitasaubhāgyamada- sphuṭayācñāna gabhītayoryūnoḥ /
analyzed: ujjhita saubhāgya mada sphuṭa yācñāna gabhītayoḥ yūnoḥ

original: MSS_6389-2 akalitamanasorekā dṛṣṭirdūtī nisṛṣṭārthī //
analyzed: a kalita manasoḥ ekā dṛṣṭiḥ dūtī nisṛṣṭa arthī

original: MSS_6390-1 ujjhitāhamiti vatsa na dūye rāghaveṇa kuladūṣaṇabhītyā /
analyzed: ujjhitā aham iti vatsa na dūye rāghaveṇa kula dūṣaṇa bhītyā

original: MSS_6390-2 kā tvamityabhihite bata vanyān śrāvaye kimiti muhyati cetaḥ //
analyzed: kā tvam iti abhihite bata vanyān śrāvaye kim iti muhyati cetaḥ

original: MSS_6391-1 ujjhitvā diśamambaraṃ varataraṃ vāso vasānaściraṃ hitvā vāsarasaṃ punaḥ pitṛvane kailāsaharmyāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: ujjhitvā diśam ambaram varataram vāsaḥ vasānaḥ ciram hitvā vāsa rasam punar pitṛ vane kailāsa harmya āśrayaḥ

original: MSS_6391-2 tyaktvā bhasma kṛtā garāganicayaḥ śrīkhaṇḍasāradravair devaḥ pātu himādrijāpariṇayaṃ kṛtvā gṛhasthaḥ śivaḥ //
analyzed: tyaktvā bhasma kṛtā garāga nicayaḥ śrīkhaṇḍa sāra dravaiḥ devaḥ pātu himādrijā pariṇayam kṛtvā gṛhasthaḥ śivaḥ

original: MSS_6392-1 uḍugaṇaparivāro nāyako'pyauṣadhīnām ayamamṛtaśarīraḥ kāntiyukto'pi candraḥ /
analyzed: uḍu gaṇa parivāraḥ nāyakaḥ upi auṣadhīnām ayam amṛta śarīraḥ kānti yuktaḥ api candraḥ

original: MSS_6392-2 bhavati vigataraśmirmaṇḍalaṃ prāpya bhānoḥ parasadananiviṣṭaḥ ko laghutvaṃ na yāti //
analyzed: bhavati vigata raśmiḥ maṇḍalam prāpya bhānoḥ para sadana niviṣṭaḥ kaḥ laghu tvam na yāti

original: MSS_6393-1 uḍuparivṛḍhaḥ patyā muktāmayaṃ yadapīḍayad yadapi bisinīṃ bhānorjāyāṃ jahāsa kumudvatī /
analyzed: uḍu parivṛḍhaḥ patyā muktā mayam yat apīḍayat yat api bisinīm bhānoḥ jāyām jahāsa kumudvatī

original: MSS_6393-2 tadubhaya mataḥ śa ke sa kocitaṃ nijaśa kayā prasarati navārke karkandhūphalāruṇarocaṣi //
analyzed: nija śa kayā prasarati nava arke karkandhū phala aruṇa rocaṣi

original: MSS_6394-1 uḍupariṣadaḥ kiṃ nārhatvaṃ niśaḥ kimu naucitī patiriha na yad dṛṣṭas tābhyāṃ gaṇeyarucīgaṇaḥ /
analyzed: uḍu pariṣadaḥ kim nā arha tvam niśaḥ kimu nā aucitī patiḥ iha na yat dṛṣṭaḥ tābhyām gaṇeya rucī gaṇaḥ

original: MSS_6394-2 sphuṭamuḍupaterāśmaṃ vakṣaḥ sphuranmalināśmana- cchavi yadanayorvicchede'pi drutaṃ bata na drutam //
analyzed: sphuṭam uḍupateḥ āśmam vakṣaḥ sphurat malina aśmana chavi yat anayoḥ vicchede api drutam bata na drutam

original: MSS_6395-1 uḍurājamukhī mṛgarājakaṭir gajarājavirājitamandagatiḥ /
MSS_6395-2 yadi sā vanitā hṛdaye nihitā kva japaḥ kva tapaḥ kva samādhiratiḥ //
analyzed: yadi sā vanitā hṛdaye nihitā kva japaḥ kva tapaḥ kva samādhi ratiḥ

original: MSS_6396-1 uḍḍāyitaḥ pūrvadiśā krameṇa prakāśara gaḥ pṛthulaḥ pataṇgaḥ /
analyzed: uḍḍāyitaḥ pūrva diśā krameṇa pṛthulaḥ pataṇgaḥ

original: MSS_6396-2 pāre viyadvicyutaraśmirarvāk patannidānīṃ kṣapito'staśaile //
analyzed: pāre viyat vicyuta raśmiḥ arvāk patan idānīm kṣapita usta śaile

original: MSS_6397-1 uḍḍīnaṃ vihagairmṛtaṃ jalacaraiḥ kṣmāntargataṃ kacchapaiḥ pāṭhīnaiḥ pṛthupa kapīṭhaluṭhanādyasmin muhurmūrcchitam /
analyzed: uḍḍīnam vihagaiḥ mṛtam jalacaraiḥ kṣmā antargatam kacchapaiḥ pāṭhīnaiḥ pṛthupa kapīṭha luṭhanāt yasmin muhur mūrcchitam

original: MSS_6397-2 tasminneva sarasyakālajaladenāgatya tacceṣṭitaṃ yenākumbhanimagnavanyakariṇāṃ yūthaiḥ payaḥ pīyate //
analyzed: tasmin eva sarasya kāla jaladena āgatya tat ceṣṭitam yena a kumbha nimagna vanya kariṇām yūthaiḥ payaḥ pīyate

original: MSS_6398-1 uḍḍīnā guṇapatriṇaḥ sukhaphalānyārād vikīrṇānyadhaḥ paryastāḥ parito yaśastabakitāḥ saṃpallatāpallavāḥ /
analyzed: uḍḍīnāḥ guṇa patriṇaḥ sukha phalāni ārāt vikīrṇāni adhas paryastāḥ paritas yaśaḥ tabakitāḥ saṃpad latā pallavāḥ

original: MSS_6398-2 prāgevāpasṛtaḥ pramodahariṇaścchāyā kathāntaṃ gatā daivāraṇyamata gajena balinā bhagne'bhimānadrume //
analyzed: prāk eva apasṛtaḥ pramoda hariṇaḥ chāyā kathā antam gatā gajena balinā bhagna abhimāna drume

original: MSS_6399-1 uḍḍīnānāmeṣāṃ prāsādāt taruṇi pakṣiṇāṃ pa ktiḥ /
analyzed: uḍḍīnānām eṣām prāsādāt taruṇi pakṣiṇām ktiḥ

original: MSS_6399-2 visphurati vaijayantī pavanacchinnāpaviddheva //
analyzed: visphurati vaijayantī pavana chinna apaviddhā iva

original: MSS_6400-1 uḍḍīyāgatamindumaṇḍalamidaṃ kiṃ khañjarīṭadvayaṃ hitvā korakatāṃ vikasvaratare yāte kimindīvare /
analyzed: uḍḍīya āgatam indu maṇḍalam idam kim khañjarīṭa dvayam hitvā koraka tām vikasvaratare yāte kim indīvare

original: MSS_6400-2 indorbimbamavāpya jātarabhasau kiṃ vā cakorāvimāv āṃ jñātaṃ śapharīvilāsapaṭunī netre kura gīdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: indoḥ bimbam avāpya jāta rabhasau kim vā cakorau imau ām jñātam śapharī vilāsa paṭunī netre kura gī dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_6401-1 uḍḍīyāṇaṃ tu sahajaṃ kathitaṃ guruṇā sadā /
analyzed: uḍḍīyāṇam tu sahajam kathitam guruṇā sadā

original: MSS_6401-2 abhyasedastatandras tu vṛddho'pi taruṇo bhavet //
analyzed: tu vṛddhaḥ api taruṇaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_6402-1 uḍḍīyordhvaṃ gamane nipatyavacanā vadhonmukhī śakuniḥ /
analyzed: uḍḍīya ūrdhvam gamane nipatya vacanā vadha unmukhī śakuniḥ

original: MSS_6402-2 vāme yāturnidhanaṃ diśati vipakṣe vipakṣasya //
analyzed: vāme yātuḥ nidhanam diśati vipakṣe vipakṣasya

original: MSS_6402A-1 uta vā tṛṇavān mārgaḥ samo gamyaḥ praśasyate /
analyzed: uta vā tṛṇavān mārgaḥ samaḥ gamyaḥ praśasyate

original: MSS_6402A-2 suśodhyas trividho mārgaḥ ṣaḍvidhaṃ ca svakaṃ balam //
analyzed: su śodhyaḥ trividhaḥ mārgaḥ ṣaḍvidham ca svakam balam

original: MSS_6403-1 utkaṭakaṇṭakakoṭī- gharṣaṇaghṛṣṭāni hṛdi na cintayati /
analyzed: utkaṭa kaṇṭaka koṭī gharṣaṇa ghṛṣṭāni hṛdi na cintayati

original: MSS_6403-2 asadṛśarasavivaśamatir viśatyaliḥ ketakīkusumam //
analyzed: a sadṛśa rasa vivaśa matiḥ viśati aliḥ ketakī kusumam

original: MSS_6404-1 utkaṇṭhayati meghānāṃ mālā vṛndaṃ kalāpinām /
analyzed: utkaṇṭhayati meghānām mālā vṛndam kalāpinām

original: MSS_6404-2 yūnāṃ cotkaṇṭhayatyeṣa mānasaṃ makaradhvajaḥ //
analyzed: yūnām ca utkaṇṭhayati eṣa mānasam makaradhvajaḥ

original: MSS_6405-1 utkaṇṭhākulacakravākayuvatīniḥśvāsadaṇḍāhataḥ pīyūṣadyutiracchadarpaṇatulāmārohati prasthitaḥ /
analyzed: utkaṇṭhā ākula cakravāka yuvatī niḥśvāsa daṇḍa āhataḥ pīyūṣa dyutiḥ accha darpaṇa tulām ārohati prasthitaḥ

original: MSS_6405-2 kokānāṃ kṛpayeva kukkuṭaravairāhūyamāne ravau dig jātā navadhautavidrumamaṇicchāyā ca sautrāmaṇī //
analyzed: kokānām kṛpayā iva kukkuṭa ravaiḥ āhūyamāne ravau diś jātā nava dhauta vidruma maṇi chāyā ca sautrāmaṇī

original: MSS_6406-1 utkaṇṭhākulamastu kaṇṭakakule saṃjāyatāṃ te manaḥ sānandaṃ picumandakandaladalāsvādeṣu kā vā kṣatiḥ /
analyzed: utkaṇṭhā ākulam astu kaṇṭaka kule saṃjāyatām te manaḥ sa ānandam picumanda kandala dala āsvādeṣu kā vā kṣatiḥ

original: MSS_6406-2 etat kiṃ tu tava kramelaka kathaṃkāraṃ sahe duḥsahaṃ tasmin puṇḍrakakandalīkisalaye yenāsi nindāparaḥ //
analyzed: etat kim tu tava kramelaka kathaṃkāram sahe duḥsaham tasmin puṇḍraka kandalī kisalaye yena asi nindā paraḥ

original: MSS_6407-1 utkaṇṭhita mano bālā sudūrasthā navaṃ vayaḥ /
analyzed: utkaṇṭhita manaḥ bālā su dūra sthā navam vayaḥ

original: MSS_6407-2 vidhirvāmo ripuḥ kāmo hā hā duḥkhaparamparā //
analyzed: vidhiḥ vāmaḥ ripuḥ kāmaḥ hā hā duḥkha paramparā

original: MSS_6408-1 utkaṇṭhitasya hṛdayānuguṇā vayasyā saṃketake cirayati pravaro vinodaḥ /
analyzed: utkaṇṭhitasya hṛdaya anuguṇā vayasyā saṃketake cirayati pravaraḥ vinodaḥ

original: MSS_6408-2 saṃsthāpanā priyatamā virahāturāṇāṃ raktasya rāgaparivṛddhikaraḥ pramodaḥ //
analyzed: saṃsthāpanā priyatamā viraha āturāṇām raktasya rāga parivṛddhi karaḥ pramodaḥ

original: MSS_6409-1 utkaṇṭhitasya hṛdayānugatā sakhīva saṃkīrṇadoṣarahitā viṣayeṣu goṣṭhī /
analyzed: utkaṇṭhitasya hṛdaya anugatā sakhī iva saṃkīrṇa doṣa rahitā viṣayeṣu goṣṭhī

original: MSS_6409-2 krīḍāraseṣu madanavyasaneṣu kāntā strīṇāṃ tu kāntarativighnakarī sapatnī //
analyzed: krīḍā raseṣu madana vyasaneṣu kāntā strīṇām tu kānta rati vighna karī sapatnī

original: MSS_6410-1 utkampagharmapicchila- doḥsādhikahastavicyutaś cauraḥ /
analyzed: utkampa gharma picchila dos sa adhika hasta vicyutaḥ cauraḥ

original: MSS_6410-2 śivamāśāste sutanu stanayostava pañcalāñcalayoḥ //
analyzed: śivam āśāste su tano stanayoḥ tava

original: MSS_6411-1 utkampinī bhayapariskhalitāṃśukāntā te locane pratidiśaṃ vidhure kṣipantī /
analyzed: utkampinī bhaya pariskhalita aṃśuka antā te locane pratidiśam vidhure kṣipantī

original: MSS_6411-2 krūreṇa dāruṇatayā sahasaiva dagdhā dhūmāndhitena dahanena na vīkṣitāsi //
analyzed: krūreṇa dāruṇa tayā sahasā eva dagdhā dhūma andhitena dahanena na vīkṣitā asi

original: MSS_6412-1 utkampo'pi sakampa eva hṛdaye cintāpi cintānvitā niḥśvāsā api niḥśvasantyanibhṛtaṃ bāṣpo'pi bāṣpāyate /
analyzed: utkampaḥ api sa kampaḥ eva hṛdaye cintā api cintā anvitāḥ niḥśvāsāḥ api niḥśvasanti anibhṛtam bāṣpaḥ api bāṣpāyate

original: MSS_6412-2 kāntāṃ saṃsmarato videśavasaternaktaṃ divaṃ kāminaḥ prārohā iva niṣpatanti manaso duḥkhāni duḥkhānvitāt //
analyzed: kāntām saṃsmarataḥ videśa vasateḥ naktam divam kāminaḥ prārohāḥ iva niṣpatanti manasaḥ duḥkhāni duḥkha anvitāt

original: MSS_6413-1 utkampo hṛdaye skhalanti vacanānyāvegalolaṃ mano gātraṃ sīdati cakṣuraśrukaluṣaṃ cintā mukhaṃ śuṣyati /
analyzed: utkampaḥ hṛdaye skhalanti vacanāni āvega lolam manaḥ gātram sīdati cakṣuḥ aśru kaluṣam cintā mukham śuṣyati

original: MSS_6413-2 yasyaiṣā sakhi pūrvara garacanā mānaḥ sa mukto mayā vansyāstā api yoṣitaḥ kṣititale yāsāmayaṃ saṃmataḥ //
analyzed: yasya eṣā sakhi mānaḥ sa muktaḥ mayā vansyāḥ tāḥ api yoṣitaḥ kṣiti tale yāsām ayam saṃmataḥ

original: MSS_6414-1 utkarṇaṃ kariṇāṃ gaṇena vikasanmodaṃ cirād barhibhiḥ krīḍākeśaribhiśca pañjaragataiḥ kopasphurallocanam /
analyzed: utkarṇam kariṇām gaṇena vikasat modam cirāt barhibhiḥ krīḍā kesaribhiḥ ca pañjara gataiḥ kopa sphurat locanam

original: MSS_6414-2 kuñjotsa gabhuvi prakampataralaṃ sīmantinībhiḥ kṣaṇāt pītaḥ śrotrapuṭena deva paritaḥ prātarmṛda gadhvaniḥ //
analyzed: prakampa taralam sīmantinībhiḥ kṣaṇāt pītaḥ śrotra puṭena deva paritas prātar mṛda ga dhvaniḥ

original: MSS_6415-1 utkarṇo'yamakāṇḍacaṇḍimapaṭuḥ sphārasphuratkesaraḥ krūrākārakarālavakravikaṭastabdhordhvalā gūlabhṛt /
analyzed: utkarṇaḥ yama kāṇḍa caṇḍima paṭuḥ sphāra sphurat kesaraḥ krūra ākāra karāla vakra vikaṭa stabdha ūrdhva lāḥ gūla bhṛt

original: MSS_6415-2 citreṇāpi na śakyate'bhilikhituṃ sarvā gasaṃkocanāc cītkurvadgirikuñjakuñjaraśiraḥ kumbhasthalastho hariḥ //
analyzed: citreṇa api na śakyate ibhilikhitum sarvāḥ ga saṃkocanāt cītkurvat giri kuñja kuñjara śiraḥ kumbha sthala sthaḥ hariḥ

original: MSS_6416-1 utkartituṃ samartho'pi gantuṃ caiva sapakṣakaḥ /
analyzed: utkartitum samarthaḥ api gantum ca eva sa pakṣakaḥ

original: MSS_6416-2 dvirepho gandhalobhena kamale yāti bandhanam //
analyzed: dvirephaḥ gandha lobhena kamale yāti bandhanam

original: MSS_6417-1 utkarṣavān nijaguṇo yathā yathā yāti karṇamanyasya /
analyzed: utkarṣavān nija guṇaḥ yathā yathā yāti karṇam anyasya

original: MSS_6417-2 dhanuriva suvaṃśajanmā tathā tathā sajjano namati //
analyzed: dhanuḥ iva su vaṃśa janmā tathā tathā sat janaḥ namati

original: MSS_6418-1 utkarṣo naiva nityaḥ syānnāpakarṣas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: utkarṣaḥ nā eva nityaḥ syāt nā apakarṣaḥ tathā eva ca

original: MSS_6418-2 prāk karmavaśato nityaṃ sadhano nirdhano bhavet //
analyzed: prāk karma vaśataḥ nityam sa dhanaḥ nirdhanaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_6419-1 utkalikābāhulyaṃ tat tat svābhāvikaṃ dravatvaṃ ca /
analyzed: utkalikā bāhulyam tat tat svābhāvikam drava tvam ca

original: MSS_6419-2 sa ca nirupādhisnehas teneśasya priyā ga gā //
analyzed: sa ca nirupādhi snehaḥ tena īśasya priyā

original: MSS_6420-1 utkallolasya lakṣmīṃ lavaṇajalanidhirlambhitaḥ kṣīrasindhoḥ ko vindhyaḥ kaśca gaurīgururiti marutāmabhyudasto vivekaḥ /
analyzed: utkallolasya lakṣmīm lavaṇa jalanidhiḥ lambhitaḥ kṣīrasindhoḥ kaḥ vindhyaḥ kaḥ ca gaurīguruḥ iti marutām abhyudastaḥ vivekaḥ

original: MSS_6420-2 nītāḥ karkatvamarkapravahaṇaharayo hāritotsa galakṣmā rājannuddāmagaurairajani ca rajanīvallabhastvadyaśobhiḥ //
analyzed: nītāḥ karka tvam arka pravahaṇa harayaḥ hārita utsa ga lakṣmāḥ rājan uddāma gauraiḥ ajani ca rajanīvallabhaḥ tvad yaśobhiḥ

original: MSS_6421-1 utkāmunmanayantyete bālāṃ tadalakatviṣaḥ /
analyzed: utkām unmanayanti ete bālām tad alaka tviṣaḥ

original: MSS_6421-2 ambhodharās taḍitvanto gambhīrāḥ stanayitnavaḥ //
analyzed: ambhodharāḥ taḍitvantaḥ gambhīrāḥ stanayitnavaḥ

original: MSS_6422-1 utkīrṇā iva vāsayaṣṭiṣu niśānidrālasā barhiṇo dhūpairjālaviniḥsṛtair valabhayaḥ saṃdigdhapārāvatāḥ /
analyzed: utkīrṇāḥ iva vāsa yaṣṭiṣu niśā nidrā alasāḥ barhiṇaḥ dhūpaiḥ jāla viniḥsṛtaiḥ valabhayaḥ saṃdigdha pārāvatāḥ

original: MSS_6422-2 ācāraprayataḥ sapuṣpabaliṣu sthāneṣu cārciṣmatīḥ saṃdhyāma galadīpikā vibhajate śuddhāntavṛddho janaḥ //
analyzed: ācāra prayataḥ sa puṣpa baliṣu sthāneṣu ca arciṣmatīḥ saṃdhyāma gala dīpikāḥ vibhajate śuddhānta vṛddhaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_6423-1 utkūjati bhramati roditi rāraṭīti padmāni cotkṣipati cañcupuṭena dūram /
analyzed: utkūjati bhramati roditi rāraṭīti padmāni ca utkṣipati cañcu puṭena dūram

original: MSS_6423-2 toye nimajjati śaśā kamudīkṣate ca kaṣṭaṃ priyāvirahito niśi cakravākaḥ //
analyzed: toye nimajjati śaśā kam udīkṣate ca kaṣṭam priyā virahitaḥ niśi cakravākaḥ

original: MSS_6424-1 utkūjati śvasiti muhyati yāti tīraṃ tīrāt taruṃ tarutalāt punareti vāpīm /
analyzed: utkūjati śvasiti muhyati yāti tīram tīrāt tarum taru talāt punar eti vāpīm

original: MSS_6424-2 vāpyāṃ na tiṣṭhati na cāti mṛṇālakhaṇḍaṃ cakraḥ kṣapāsu virahe khalu cakravākyāḥ //
analyzed: vāpyām na tiṣṭhati na ca ati mṛṇāla khaṇḍam cakraḥ kṣapāsu virahe khalu cakravākyāḥ

original: MSS_6425-1 utkūjantu vaṭe vaṭe bata bakāḥ kākā varākā api krāṃkurvantu sadā ninādapaṭavaste pippale pippale /
analyzed: utkūjantu vaṭe vaṭe bata bakāḥ kākāḥ varākāḥ api krāṃkurvantu sadā nināda paṭavaḥ te pippale pippale

original: MSS_6425-2 so'nyaḥ ko'pi rasālapallavalavagrāsollasatpāṭava- krīḍatkokilakaṇṭhakūjanakalālīlāvilāsakramaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ nyaḥ kaḥ api rasāla pallava lava grāsa ullasat pāṭava krīḍat kokila kaṇṭha kūjana kalā līlā vilāsa kramaḥ

original: MSS_6426-1 utkṛtya jvalitāt śavāt kathamapi pretāśanaḥ paiśitīṃ peśīmagnimayīṃ nigīrya sahasā dandahyamānodaraḥ /
analyzed: utkṛtya jvalitāt śavāt katham api preta aśanaḥ paiśitīm peśīm agni mayīm nigīrya sahasā dandahyamāna udaraḥ

original: MSS_6426-2 dhāvatyutplavate muhurnipatati prottiṣṭhati prekṣate viṣvakkrośati saṃpinaṣṭi jaṭharaṃ muṣṭyā hate mastakam //
analyzed: dhāvati utplavate muhur nipatati prottiṣṭhati prekṣate viṣvak krośati saṃpinaṣṭi jaṭharam muṣṭyā hate mastakam

original: MSS_6427-1 utkṛtyotkṛtya kṛttiṃ prathamamatha pṛthūcchophabhūyāṃsi māṃsānya aṃsasphikpṛṣṭhapiṇḍādyavayavasulabhānyugrapūt īni jagdhvā /
analyzed: utkṛtya utkṛtya kṛttim prathamam atha pṛthu ucchopha bhūyāṃsi māṃsāni aṃsa sphic pṛṣṭha piṇḍa ādi avayava sulabhāni ugra pūt īni jagdhvā

original: MSS_6427-2 āttasnāyvantranetraḥ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ pretara kaḥ kara kād a kasthādasthisaṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyamavyagramatti //
analyzed: ātta snāyu antra netraḥ prakaṭita daśanaḥ asthi saṃstham sthapuṭa gatam api kravyam avyagram atti

original: MSS_6428-1 utkṛtyotkṛtya garbhānapi śakalayataḥ kṣatrasaṃtānaroṣād uddāmasyaikaviṃśatyavadhi vidhasataḥ sarvato rājavaṃśyān /
analyzed: utkṛtya utkṛtya garbhān api śakalayataḥ kṣatra saṃtāna roṣāt uddāmasya ekaviṃśati avadhi vidhasataḥ sarvatas rāja vaṃśyān

original: MSS_6428-2 pitryaṃ tadraktapūrṇahradasavanamahānandamandāyamāna- krodhāgneḥ kurvato me na khalu na viditaḥ sarvabhūtaiḥ svabhāvaḥ //
analyzed: pitryam tat rakta pūrṇa hrada savana mahā ānanda mandāyamāna krodha agneḥ kurvataḥ me na khalu na viditaḥ sarva bhūtaiḥ svabhāvaḥ

original: MSS_6429-1 utkṛṣṭabalavīryasya vijigīṣorjayaiṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: utkṛṣṭa bala vīryasya vijigīṣoḥ jaya eṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_6429-2 guṇānuraktaprakṛter yātrā yānamiti smṛtam //
analyzed: guṇa anurakta prakṛteḥ yātrā yānam iti smṛtam

original: MSS_6430-1 utkṛṣṭamadhyamanikṛṣṭajaneṣu maitrī yadvacchilāsu sikatāsu jaleṣu rekhā /
analyzed: utkṛṣṭa madhyama nikṛṣṭa janeṣu maitrī yadvat śilāsu sikatāsu jaleṣu rekhā

original: MSS_6430-2 vairaṃ kramādadhamamadhyamasajjaneṣu yadvacchilāsu sikatāsu jaleṣu rekhā //
analyzed: vairam kramāt adhama madhyama sat janeṣu yadvat śilāsu sikatāsu jaleṣu rekhā

original: MSS_6431-1 utkocaṃ prītidānaṃ ca dyūtadravyaṃ subhāṣitam /
analyzed: utkocam prīti dānam ca dyūta dravyam subhāṣitam

original: MSS_6431-2 kāminīṃ prathamāvasthāṃ sadyo gṛhṇāti buddhimān //
analyzed: kāminīm prathama avasthām sadyas gṛhṇāti buddhimān

original: MSS_6432-1 utkocakāścaupadhikā vañcakāḥ kitavās tathā /
analyzed: utkocakāḥ ca aupadhikāḥ vañcakāḥ kitavāḥ tathā

original: MSS_6432-2 ma galādeśavṛttāśca bhadraprekṣaṇikaiḥ saha //
analyzed: galādeśavṛttāḥ ca bhadraprekṣaṇikaiḥ saha

original: MSS_6433-1 asamyakkāriṇaścaiva mahāmātrāścikitsakāḥ /
analyzed: asamyakkāriṇaḥ ca eva mahāmātrāḥ cikitsakāḥ

original: MSS_6433-2 śilpopacārayuktāśca nipuṇāḥ puṇyayoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: śilpa upacāra yuktāḥ ca nipuṇāḥ puṇya yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_6434-1 evamādyān vijānīyāt prakāśāṃllokakaṇṭakān /
analyzed: evamādyān vijānīyāt prakāśān lokakaṇṭakān

original: MSS_6434-2 vigūḍhacāriṇaścānyān anāryānāryali ginaḥ //
analyzed: vigūḍha cāriṇaḥ ca anyān anārya anārya li ginaḥ

original: MSS_6435-1 utkocapāritoṣaka- bhāṭasubhāṣitatarārthacauryāṃśāḥ /
analyzed: utkoca pāritoṣaka bhāṭa subhāṣitatara artha caurya aṃśāḥ

original: MSS_6435-2 tatkṣaṇameva grāhyāḥ ṣaḍanyakāle na labhyante //
analyzed: tad kṣaṇam eva grāhyāḥ ṣaṭ anya kāle na labhyante

original: MSS_6436-1 utkrāntaṃ girikūṭala ghanasahaṃ te vajrasārā nakhās tattejaśca tadūrjitaṃ sa ca nagonmāthī ninādo mahān /
analyzed: utkrāntam giri kūṭala ghana saham te vajra sārāḥ nakhāḥ tat tejaḥ ca tat ūrjitam sa ca naga unmāthī ninādaḥ mahān

original: MSS_6436-2 ālasyādavimuñcatā giriguhāṃ siṃhena nidrālunā sarvaṃ viśvajayaikasādhanamidaṃ labdhaṃ na kiṃcit kṛtam //
analyzed: ālasyāt avimuñcatā giri guhām siṃhena nidrālunā sarvam viśva jaya eka sādhanam idam labdham na kiṃcid kṛtam

original: MSS_6437-1 utkrāntānāmāmiṣāyopariṣṭād adhyākāśaṃ babhrumuḥ patravāhāḥ /
analyzed: utkrāntānām āmiṣāya upariṣṭāt adhyākāśam babhrumuḥ patra vāhāḥ

original: MSS_6437-2 mūrtāḥ prāṇā nūnamadyāpyavekṣā- māsuḥ kāyaṃ tyājitā dāruṇāstraiḥ //
analyzed: mūrtāḥ prāṇāḥ nūnam adya api avekṣā mā āsuḥ kāyam tyājitāḥ dāruṇa astraiḥ

original: MSS_6438-1 utkrāmadbhiśca yaḥ prāṇaiḥ prayataḥ śiṣṭasaṃmataḥ /
analyzed: utkrāmadbhiḥ ca yaḥ prāṇaiḥ prayataḥ śiṣṭa saṃmataḥ

original: MSS_6438-2 cintayen manasā ga gāṃ sa gatiṃ paramāṃ labhet //
analyzed: cintayet manasā ga gām sa gatim paramām labhet

original: MSS_6439-1 utkṣiptaṃ karaka kaṇadvayamidaṃ baddhā dṛḍhaṃ mekhalā yatnena pratipāditā mukharayormañjīrayormūkatā /
analyzed: utkṣiptam karaka kaṇa dvayam idam baddhā dṛḍham mekhalā yatnena pratipāditā mukharayoḥ mañjīrayoḥ mūka tā

original: MSS_6439-2 ārabdhe rabhasān mayā priyasakhi krīḍābhisārotsave caṇḍālastimirāvaguṇṭhanapaṭakṣepaṃ vidhatte vidhuḥ //
analyzed: ārabdhe rabhasāt mayā priya sakhi krīḍā abhisāra utsave caṇḍālaḥ timira avaguṇṭhana paṭa kṣepam vidhatte vidhuḥ

original: MSS_6440-1 utkṣiptaṃ sakhi vartipūritamukhaṃ mūkīkṛtaṃ nūpuraṃ kāñcīdāma nivṛttagharghararavaṃ kṣiptaṃ dukūlāntare /
analyzed: utkṣiptam sakhi varti pūrita mukham mūkīkṛtam nūpuram kāñcī dāma nivṛtta gharghara ravam kṣiptam dukūla antare

original: MSS_6440-2 suptāḥ pañjarasārikāḥ parijano'pyāghūrṇito nidrayā śūnyo rājapathastamāṃsi niviḍānyehyehi nirgamyatām //
analyzed: suptāḥ pañjara sārikāḥ parijanaḥ upya āghūrṇitaḥ nidrayā śūnyaḥ rāja pathaḥ tamāṃsi nibiḍāni ehi ehi nirgamyatām

original: MSS_6441-1 utkṣiptaṃ saha kauśikasya pulakaiḥ sākaṃ mukhairnāmitaṃ bhūpānāṃ janakasya saṃśayadhiyā sārdhaṃ samāsphālitam /
analyzed: utkṣiptam saha kauśikasya pulakaiḥ sākam mukhaiḥ nāmitam bhūpānām janakasya saṃśaya dhiyā sārdham samāsphālitam

original: MSS_6441-2 vaidehīmanasā samaṃ ca sahasā kṛṣṭaṃ tato bhārgava- prauḍhāhaṃkṛtikandalena ca samaṃ bhagnaṃ tadaiśaṃ dhanuḥ //
analyzed: vaidehī manasā samam ca sahasā kṛṣṭam tatas bhārgava prauḍha ahaṃkṛti kandalena ca samam bhagnam tat aiśam dhanuḥ

original: MSS_6442-1 utkṣiptabāhudarśita- bhujamūlaṃ cūtamukula mama sakhyā /
analyzed: utkṣipta bāhu darśita bhuja mūlam cūta mukula mama sakhyā

original: MSS_6442-2 ākṛṣyamāṇa rājati bhavataḥ paramuccapadalābhaḥ //
analyzed: ākṛṣyamāṇa rājati bhavataḥ param ucca pada lābhaḥ

original: MSS_6443-1 utkṣiptamucchritasitāṃśukarāvalambair uttambhitoḍubhiratīvatarāṃ śirobhiḥ /
analyzed: utkṣiptam ucchrita sitāṃśu kara avalambaiḥ uttambhita uḍubhiḥ atīvatarām śirobhiḥ

original: MSS_6443-2 śraddheyanirjharajalavyapadeśamasya viṣvaktaṭeṣu patati sphuṭamantarīkṣam //
analyzed: śraddheya nirjhara jala vyapadeśam asya viṣvak taṭeṣu patati sphuṭam antarīkṣam

original: MSS_6444-1 utkṣiptā api dantīdraiḥ kopanaiḥ pattayaḥ param /
analyzed: utkṣiptāḥ api dantīdraiḥ kopanaiḥ pattayaḥ param

original: MSS_6444-2 tadasūnaharan khaḍgaghātaiḥ svasya puraḥ prabhoḥ //
analyzed: tad asūn aharan khaḍga ghātaiḥ svasya puras prabhoḥ

original: MSS_6445-1 utkṣipya karibhirdūrān muktānāṃ yodhināṃ divi /
analyzed: utkṣipya karibhiḥ dūrāt muktānām yodhinām divi

original: MSS_6445-2 prāpi jīvātmabhirdivyā gatirvā vigrahairmahī //
analyzed: prāpi jīva ātmabhiḥ divyā gatiḥ vā vigrahaiḥ mahī

original: MSS_6446-1 utkṣipya ṭiṭṭibhaḥ pādāv āste bha gabhayād divaḥ /
analyzed: utkṣipya ṭiṭṭibhaḥ pādau āste gabhayāt divaḥ

original: MSS_6446-2 svacittakalpito garvaḥ kasya nātrāpi vidyate //
analyzed: sva citta kalpitaḥ garvaḥ kasya na atra api vidyate

original: MSS_6447-1 utkṣipyālakamālikāṃ vilulitāmāpāṇḍugaṇḍasthalād viśliṣyadvalayaprapātabhayataḥ prollāsya kiṃcit karau /
analyzed: utkṣipya alaka mālikām vilulitām āpāṇḍu gaṇḍa sthalāt viśliṣyat valaya prapāta bhayataḥ prollāsya kiṃcid karau

original: MSS_6447-2 dvārastambhaniṣaṇṇagātralatikā kenāpi puṇyātmanā mārgālokanadattadṛṣṭirabalā tatkālamāli gyate //
analyzed: dvāra stambha niṣaṇṇa gātra latikā kena api puṇya ātmanā mārga ālokana datta dṛṣṭiḥ abalā tad kāla māli

original: MSS_6448-1 utkṣipyoccaiḥ prasphurantaṃ radābhyām īṣādantaḥ kuñjaraṃ śātravīyam /
analyzed: utkṣipya uccais prasphurantam radābhyām īṣā dantaḥ kuñjaram śātravīyam

original: MSS_6448-2 śṛ gaprotaprāvṛṣeṇyāmbudasya spaṣṭaṃ prāpat sāmyamurvīdharasya //
analyzed: gaprota prāvṛṣeṇya ambudasya spaṣṭam prāpat sāmyam urvīdharasya

original: MSS_6449-1 utkhātaṃ nidhiśa kayā kṣititalaṃ dhmātā girerdhātavo nistīrṇaḥ saritāṃpatirnṛpatayo yatnena saṃsevitāḥ /
analyzed: utkhātam kayā kṣiti talam dhmātāḥ gireḥ dhātavaḥ nistīrṇaḥ saritāṃpatiḥ nṛpatayaḥ yatnena saṃsevitāḥ

original: MSS_6449-2 mantrārādhanatatpareṇa manasā nītāḥ śmaśāne niśāḥ prāptaḥ kāṇavarāṭako'pi na mayā tṛṣṇe'dhunā mā bhava //
analyzed: mantra ārādhana tatpareṇa manasā nītāḥ śmaśāne niśāḥ prāptaḥ kāṇa varāṭakaḥ api na mayā tṛṣṇā idhunā mā bhava

original: MSS_6450-1 utkhātacchinnasaṃdhyāruṇakamalavano vyomakāsāramadhyaṃ manye matto niśīthāhvayavanamahiṣo ma kṣvavikṣanmima kṣuḥ /
analyzed: utkhāta chinna saṃdhyā aruṇa kamala vanaḥ vyoma kāsāra madhyam manye mattaḥ niśītha āhvaya vana mahiṣaḥ kṣuḥ

original: MSS_6450-2 tatkālodbhidyamānaḥ saha tanupṛthubhis tārakābudbudaughais tasmādevojjihīte kaluṣitabhuvanaṃ bhīṣaṇo dhvāntapa kaḥ //
analyzed: tad kāla udbhidyamānaḥ saha tanu pṛthubhiḥ tārakā budbuda oghaiḥ tasmāt evā ujjihīte kaluṣita bhuvanam bhīṣaṇaḥ dhvāntapa kaḥ

original: MSS_6451-1 utkhātadaivatamivāyatanaṃ purārer astācalāntaritasūryamivāntarikṣam /
analyzed: utkhāta daivatam iva āyatanam purāreḥ asta acala antarita sūryam iva antarikṣam

original: MSS_6451-2 hammīrabhūbhuji gate suraveśma viśvaṃ paśyāmi hāramiva nāyakaratnaśūnyam //
analyzed: hammīra bhūbhuji gate sura veśma viśvam paśyāmi hāram iva nāyaka ratna śūnyam

original: MSS_6452-1 utkhātān pratiropayan kusumitāṃścinvaṃllaghūn vardhayan atyuccān namayan pṛthūn vidalayan viśleṣayan saṃhatān /
analyzed: utkhātān pratiropayan kusumitān cinvan laghūn vardhayan atyuccān namayan pṛthūn vidalayan viśleṣayan saṃhatān

original: MSS_6452-2 tīkṣnān kaṇṭakino bahirniyamayan svāropitān pālayan mālākāra iva prayogakuśalo rājye ciraṃ tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: tīkṣnān kaṇṭakinaḥ bahis niyamayan su āropitān pālayan mālākāraḥ iva prayoga kuśalaḥ rājye ciram tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_6453-1 utkhāya cittopavanāt sumedho- mālā kṛtā pustakaniṣkuṭeṣu /
analyzed: utkhāya citta upavanāt sumedhaḥ mālā kṛtā pustaka niṣkuṭeṣu

original: MSS_6453-2 kāvyadrumāṇāmadhiropitānāṃ phalaṃ parāṃ nirvṛtimunnayāmaḥ //
analyzed: kāvya drumāṇām adhiropitānām phalam parām nirvṛtim unnayāmaḥ

original: MSS_6454-1 utkhelattrivalītara gataralā romāvalīśaivala- stragvalliryuvatī dhruvaṃ janamanonirvāṇavārāṇasī /
analyzed: roma āvalī śaivala straj valliḥ yuvatī dhruvam jana manaḥ nirvāṇa vārāṇasī

original: MSS_6454-2 etasyā yadurastaṭīparisare yadbālyacāpalyayoḥ sthāne yauvanaśilpikalpitacitācaityadvayaṃ dṛśyate //
analyzed: etasyāḥ yad uraḥ taṭī parisare yat bālya cāpalyayoḥ sthāne yauvana śilpi kalpita citā caitya dvayam dṛśyate

original: MSS_6455-1 uttaṃsaḥ kekipicchairmarakatavalayaśyāmale doḥprakāṇḍe hāraḥ sāndrendranīlairmṛgamadaracito vaktrapatraprapañcaḥ /
analyzed: uttaṃsaḥ keki picchaiḥ marakata valaya śyāmale dos prakāṇḍe hāraḥ sāndra indranīlaiḥ mṛgamada racitaḥ vaktra patra prapañcaḥ

original: MSS_6455-2 nīlābjaiḥ śekharaśrīrasitavasanatā cetyabhīkābhisāre saṃpratyeṇekṣaṇānāṃ timirabharasakhī vartate veṣalīlā //
analyzed: nīla abjaiḥ śekhara śrīḥ rasita vasana tā ca iti abhīka abhisāre saṃprati eṇa īkṣaṇānām timira bhara sakhī vartate veṣa līlā

original: MSS_6456-1 uttaṃsakautukarasena vilāsinīnāṃ lūnāni yasya na nakhairapi pallavāni /
analyzed: uttaṃsa kautuka rasena vilāsinīnām lūnāni yasya na nakhaiḥ api pallavāni

original: MSS_6456-2 udyānamaṇḍanataro sahakāra sa tvam a gārakārakaragocaratāṃ gato'si //
analyzed: sahakāra sa tvam gārakāra kara gocara tām gataḥ asi

original: MSS_6457-1 uttaṃsitaṃ bhāti mukhaprabhābhir na kiṃcidabjaṃ yadaho tadasyāḥ /
analyzed: uttaṃsitam bhāti mukha prabhābhiḥ na kiṃcid abjam yat aho tat asyāḥ

original: MSS_6457-2 yuktaṃ dṛśāveva vidhirvidhijñaḥ karṇadvayālaṃkaraṇaṃ cakāra //
analyzed: yuktam dṛśau eva vidhiḥ vidhi jñaḥ karṇa dvaya alaṃkaraṇam cakāra

original: MSS_6458-1 uttaṃsīkṛtacandramāḥ sabhujagān vīcīn parāvartayan jyotsnābhasmavilepane niravadhisphīte mahimni sthitaḥ /
analyzed: uttaṃsīkṛta candramāḥ sa bhujagān vīcīn parāvartayan jyotsnā bhasma vilepane niravadhi sphīte mahimni sthitaḥ

original: MSS_6458-2 pre kaccha karoṭikoṭihananaiḥ svaḥsindhumudghoṣayann atyantaṃ pathi garjitāṭṭahasito rudraṃ hasatyarṇavaḥ //
analyzed: pre kaccha karoṭi koṭi hananaiḥ svar sindhum udghoṣayan atyantam pathi garjita aṭṭahasitaḥ rudram hasati arṇavaḥ

original: MSS_6459-1 uttaṃseṣu nanarta na kṣitibhujāṃ na prekṣakairlakṣitaḥ sākā kṣaṃ luṭhito na ca stanataṭe līlāvatīnāṃ kvacit /
analyzed: uttaṃseṣu nanarta na kṣitibhujām na prekṣakaiḥ lakṣitaḥ kṣam luṭhitaḥ na ca stana taṭe līlāvatīnām kvacid

original: MSS_6459-2 kaṣṭaṃ bhościramantareva jaladherdaivād viśīrṇo'bhavat kheladvyālakulā gagharṣaṇaparikṣīṇapramāṇo maṇiḥ //
analyzed: kaṣṭam bhoḥ ciram antar eva jaladheḥ daivāt viśīrṇaḥ bhavat khelat vyāla kulā ga gharṣaṇa parikṣīṇa pramāṇaḥ maṇiḥ

original: MSS_6460-1 uttapto'yamuraṃgamaḥ śikhitalacchāyāṃ samālambate vairaṃ sāhajikaṃ vihāya ca śikhī mūlaṃ tarorgacchati /
analyzed: uttapta uyam uraṃgamaḥ śikhi tala chāyām samālambate vairam sāhajikam vihāya ca śikhī mūlam taroḥ gacchati

original: MSS_6460-2 yācante ca jalaṃ nikuñjabhavane tṛṣṇāturāḥ sārikās tapte vāriṇi pa kajāni madhupāstyaktvā śrayante latāḥ //
analyzed: yācante ca jalam nikuñja bhavane tṛṣṇā āturāḥ sārikāḥ tapte vāriṇi kajāni madhupāḥ tyaktvā śrayante latāḥ

original: MSS_6461-1 uttamaṃ puṣkarakṣetraṃ tārākṣetraṃ na madhyamam /
analyzed: uttamam puṣkara kṣetram tārā kṣetram na madhyamam

original: MSS_6461-2 adhamaṃ ca kurukṣetraṃ prabhāsaṃ tvadhamādhamam //
analyzed: adhamam ca kurukṣetram prabhāsam tu adhama adhamam

original: MSS_6462-1 uttamaṃ praṇipātena śūraṃ bhedena yojayet /
analyzed: uttamam praṇipātena śūram bhedena yojayet

original: nīcamalpapradānena samaśaktiṃ parākramaiḥ //
analyzed: nīcam alpa pradānena sama śaktim parākramaiḥ

original: MSS_6463-1 uttamaṃ suciraṃ naiva vipado'bhibhavantyalam /
analyzed: uttamam su ciram na eva vipadaḥ abhibhavanti alam

original: MSS_6463-2 rāhugrasanasaṃbhūtiḥ kṣaṇaṃ vicchāyayed vidhum //
MSS_6464-1 uttamaṃ svārjitaṃ vittaṃ madhyamaṃ piturarjitam /
analyzed: uttamam sva arjitam vittam madhyamam pituḥ arjitam

original: MSS_6464-2 adhamaṃ bhrātṛvittaṃ ca strīvittamadhamādhamam //
analyzed: adhamam bhrātṛ vittam ca strī vittam adhama adhamam

original: MSS_6465-1 uttamaḥ kleśavikṣobhaṃ kṣamaḥ soḍhuṃ na hītaraḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ kleśa vikṣobham kṣamaḥ soḍhum na hi itaraḥ

original: MSS_6465-2 maṇireva mahāśāṇagharṣaṇaṃ na tu mṛtkaṇaḥ //
analyzed: maṇiḥ eva mahā śāṇa gharṣaṇam na tu mṛd kaṇaḥ

original: MSS_6466-1 uttamaḥ ṣaṭpadaḥ prokto madhyamaḥ pañcabhis tathā /
MSS_6466-2 kaniṣṭhastu caturbhiḥ syād evaṃ syurdhruvakās tridhā //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhaḥ tu caturbhiḥ syāt evam syuḥ dhruvakāḥ tridhā

original: MSS_6467-1 uttamakule'pi jātaḥ sevāṃ vidadhāti nīcalokasya /
analyzed: uttama kule api jātaḥ sevām vidadhāti nīca lokasya

original: MSS_6467-2 vadati ca vācaṃ nīcām udareśvarapīḍito martyaḥ //
analyzed: vadati ca vācam nīcām udareśvara pīḍitaḥ martyaḥ

original: MSS_6468-1 uttamataruṇaprakṛtiḥ pulakādikasūcitānyatanusaktiḥ /
MSS_6468-2 sphuṭasaṃnihitavibhāvo nivāryate kena śṛ gāraḥ //
analyzed: sphuṭa saṃnihita vibhāvaḥ nivāryate kena gāraḥ

original: MSS_6469-1 uttamapadārtharasikāḥ sulabhā loke bhavanti sarve'pi /
analyzed: uttama padārtha rasikāḥ sulabhāḥ loke bhavanti sarve api

original: MSS_6469-2 dūṣitapadārtharasikas tvamiva matas tvaṃ punaḥ karaṭa //
analyzed: dūṣita padārtha rasikaḥ tvam iva mataḥ tvam punar karaṭa

original: MSS_6470-1 uttamabhujaṃgasaṃgama- nispandanitambacāpalastasyāḥ /
analyzed: uttama bhujaṃga saṃgama nispanda nitamba cāpalaḥ tasyāḥ

original: MSS_6470-2 mandaragiririva vibudhair itastataḥ kṛṣyate kāyaḥ //
analyzed: mandara giriḥ iva vibudhaiḥ itas tatas kṛṣyate kāyaḥ

original: MSS_6471-1 uttamarṇadhanadānaśa kayā pāvakotthaśikhayā hṛdisthayā /
analyzed: uttamarṇa dhana dāna śa kayā pāvaka uttha śikhayā hṛdisthayā

original: MSS_6471-2 deva dagdhavasanā sarasvatī nāsyato bahirupaiti lajjayā //
analyzed: deva dagdha vasanā sarasvatī na asyataḥ bahis upaiti lajjayā

original: MSS_6472-1 uttamarṇamukhaṃ paśyann adhamarṇo hriyā naman /
analyzed: uttamarṇa mukham paśyan adhamarṇaḥ hriyā naman

original: MSS_6472-2 mṛtyujīvitayoryuddhasaṃbhramaṃ parilokate //
analyzed: mṛtyu jīvitayoḥ yuddha saṃbhramam

original: MSS_6473-1 uttamavanitaikagatiḥ karīva sarasīpayaḥ sakhīdhairyam /
analyzed: uttama vanitā eka gatiḥ karī iva sarasī payaḥ sakhī dhairyam

original: MSS_6473-2 āskanditoruṇā tvaṃ hastenaiva spṛśan harasi //
analyzed: āskandita ūruṇā tvam hastena eva spṛśan harasi

original: MSS_6474-1 uttamaś cintitaṃ kuryāt proktakārī tu madhyamaḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ cintitam kuryāt prokta kārī tu madhyamaḥ

original: MSS_6474-2 adhamo'śraddhayā kuryād akartoccaritam pituḥ //
analyzed: kuryāt akartā uccaritam pituḥ

original: MSS_6475-1 uttamastoṣamāyāti tada gaṃ poṣyate yadi /
analyzed: uttamaḥ toṣam āyāti poṣyate yadi

original: MSS_6475-2 vṛkṣaḥ prasīdati prāyaḥ pādābhya gena na svayam //
analyzed: vṛkṣaḥ prasīdati prāyas na svayam

original: MSS_6476-1 uttamasya kṣaṇaṃ kopo madhyasya praharadvayam /
analyzed: uttamasya kṣaṇam kopaḥ madhyasya prahara dvayam

original: MSS_6476-2 adhamasya tvahorātraṃ pāpiṣṭho naiva mucyate //
analyzed: adhamasya tu ahorātram pāpiṣṭhaḥ na eva mucyate

original: MSS_6477-1 uttamasyāpi varṇasya nīco'pi gṛhamāgataḥ /
analyzed: uttamasya api varṇasya nīcaḥ api gṛham āgataḥ

original: MSS_6477-2 pūjanīyo yathāyogyaṃ sarvadevamayo'tithiḥ //
analyzed: pūjanīyaḥ yathāyogyam sarva deva maya utithiḥ

original: MSS_6478-1 uttamasyāpi varṇasya nīco'pi gṛhamāgataḥ /
analyzed: uttamasya api varṇasya nīcaḥ api gṛham āgataḥ

original: MSS_6478-2 bālo vā yadi vā vṛddhaḥ sarvasyābhyāgato guruḥ //
analyzed: bālaḥ vā yadi vā vṛddhaḥ sarvasya abhyāgataḥ guruḥ

original: MSS_6479-1 uttamāḥ svaguṇaiḥ khyātā madhyamāśca piturguṇaiḥ /
analyzed: uttamāḥ sva guṇaiḥ khyātāḥ madhyamāḥ ca pituḥ guṇaiḥ

original: MSS_6479-2 adhamā mātulasyāpi śvaśurasyādhamādhamāḥ //
analyzed: adhamāḥ mātulasya api śvaśurasya adhama adhamāḥ

original: MSS_6480-1 uttamāḥ svārjitairdravyaiḥ piturvittena madhyamāḥ /
analyzed: uttamāḥ sva arjitaiḥ dravyaiḥ pituḥ vittena madhyamāḥ

original: MSS_6480-2 adhamā mātṛvittena strīvittenādhamādhamāḥ //
analyzed: adhamāḥ mātṛ vittena strī vittena adhama adhamāḥ

original: MSS_6481-1 uttamā ātmanaḥ khyātāḥ pituḥ khyātāśca madhyamāḥ /
analyzed: uttamāḥ ātmanaḥ khyātāḥ pituḥ khyātāḥ ca madhyamāḥ

original: MSS_6481-2 adhamā mātulāt khyātāḥ śvaśurāc cādhamādhamaḥ //
analyzed: adhamāḥ mātulāt khyātāḥ śvaśurāt ca adhama adhamaḥ

original: MSS_6482-1 uttamā godbhavāj jyaiṣṭhyād brahmaṇaścaiva dhāraṇāt /
analyzed: uttamā go udbhavāt jyaiṣṭhyāt brahmaṇaḥ ca eva dhāraṇāt

original: MSS_6482-2 sarvasyaivāsya sargasya dharmato brāhmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ //
analyzed: sarvasya eva asya sargasya dharmataḥ brāhmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ

original: MSS_6483-1 uttamādhamamadhyānāṃ śrotavyaṃ vacanaṃ budhaiḥ /
analyzed: uttama adhama madhyānām śrotavyam vacanam budhaiḥ

original: MSS_6483-2 tatra cātmahitaṃ grāhyaṃ vastavākyaṃ yathā nṛpaḥ //
analyzed: tatra ca ātma hitam grāhyam vasta vākyam yathā nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_6484-1 uttamādhamamadhyāni buddhvā kāryāṇi pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: uttama adhama madhyāni buddhvā kāryāṇi pārthivaḥ

original: MSS_6484-2 uttamādhamamadhyeṣu puruṣeṣu niyojayet //
analyzed: uttama adhama madhyeṣu puruṣeṣu niyojayet

original: MSS_6485-1 uttamādhamasaṃsaktau jānan sadṛśavṛttitām /
analyzed: uttama adhama saṃsaktau jānan sadṛśa vṛtti tām

original: MSS_6485-2 nārīṇāṃ śucibāhyānām a ganākhyāṃ vyadhād vidhiḥ //
analyzed: nārīṇām śuci bāhyānām vyadhāt vidhiḥ

original: MSS_6486-1 uttamānāṃ svabhāvo'yaṃ paraduḥkhāsahiṣṇutā /
analyzed: uttamānām svabhāvaḥ yam para duḥkha a sahiṣṇu tā

original: MSS_6486-2 svayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca saṃprāptaṃ manyate'nyasya vāryate //
analyzed: svayam duḥkham ca saṃprāptam manyate nyasya vāryate

original: MSS_6487-1 uttamānāmapi strīṇāṃ viśvāso naiva vidyate /
analyzed: uttamānām api strīṇām viśvāsaḥ nā eva vidyate

original: MSS_6487-2 rājapriyāḥ kairaviṇyo ramante madhupaiḥ saha //
analyzed: rāja priyāḥ kairaviṇyaḥ ramante madhupaiḥ saha

original: MSS_6488-1 uttamānuttamāneva gacchan hīnāṃśca varjayan /
analyzed: uttamān uttamān eva gacchan hīnān ca varjayan

original: MSS_6488-2 brāhmaṇaḥ śreṣṭhatāmeti pratyavāyena śūdratām //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ śreṣṭha tām eti pratyavāyena śūdra tām

original: MSS_6489-1 uttamāneva seveta prāpte kāle tu madhyamān /
analyzed: uttamān eva seveta prāpte kāle tu madhyamān

original: MSS_6489-2 adhamāṃstu na seveta ya icchec śreya ātmanaḥ //
analyzed: adhamān tu na seveta yaḥ icchet śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_6490-1 uttamābhijanopetān na nīcaiḥ saha vardhayet /
analyzed: uttama abhijana upetān na nīcaiḥ saha vardhayet

original: MSS_6490-2 kṛśo'pi hi vivekajño yāti saṃśrayaṇīyatām //
analyzed: kṛśaḥ api hi viveka jñaḥ yāti saṃśrayaṇīya tām

original: MSS_6491-1 uttamāścātmanā khyātāḥ pitrā khyātāśca madhyamāḥ /
analyzed: uttamāḥ ca ātmanā khyātāḥ pitrā khyātāḥ ca madhyamāḥ

original: MSS_6491-2 adhamā mātulaiḥ khyātāḥ śvaśuraiścādhamādhamāḥ //
analyzed: adhamāḥ mātulaiḥ khyātāḥ śvaśuraiḥ ca adhama adhamāḥ

original: MSS_6492-1 uttamās tājikāḥ proktāḥ pārasīkāḥ samudrajāḥ /
analyzed: uttamāḥ tājikāḥ proktāḥ pārasīkāḥ samudrajāḥ

original: MSS_6492-2 kokkāṇākhatalāṇāśca tathā saurāṣṭrajā hayāḥ //
analyzed: kokkāṇa ākhatalāṇāḥ ca tathā saurāṣṭra jāḥ hayāḥ

original: MSS_6493-1 uttame tu kṣaṇaṃ kopo madhyame ghaṭikādvayam /
analyzed: uttame tu kṣaṇam kopaḥ madhyame ghaṭikā dvayam

original: MSS_6493-2 adhame syādahorātraṃ cāṇḍāle maraṇāntikaḥ //
analyzed: adhame syāt ahorātram cāṇḍāle maraṇa antikaḥ

original: MSS_6494-1 uttamenottamaṃ sarvaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: uttamena uttamam sarvam manuṣyāṇām prayatnataḥ

original: MSS_6494-2 adṛṣṭamīkṣya sarveṣāṃ vaktavyaṃ suvicakṣaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: adṛṣṭam īkṣya sarveṣām vaktavyam su vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_6495-1 uttame vighnavattāsti adhamo duḥkhabhājanam /
analyzed: uttame vighnavat tā asti adhamaḥ duḥkha bhājanam

original: MSS_6495-2 tasmāt sarvatra yogyatvāc śreṣṭho vai madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvatra yogya tvāt śreṣṭhaḥ vai madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_6496-1 uttamaiḥ saha sa gena ko na yāti samunnatim /
analyzed: uttamaiḥ saha sa gena kaḥ na yāti samunnatim

original: MSS_6496-2 mūrdhnā tṛṇāni dhāryante grathitaiḥ kusumaiḥ saha //
analyzed: mūrdhnā tṛṇāni dhāryante grathitaiḥ kusumaiḥ saha

original: MSS_6497-1 uttamaiḥ saha sāṃgatyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha saṃkathām /
analyzed: uttamaiḥ saha sāṃgatyam paṇḍitaiḥ saha saṃkathām

original: MSS_6497-2 alubdhaiḥ saha mitratvaṃ kurvāṇo nāvasīdati //
analyzed: alubdhaiḥ saha mitra tvam kurvāṇaḥ na avasīdati

original: MSS_6498-1 uttamaiḥ saha sāṃgatyaṃ yat prājñaiḥ satyavādibhiḥ /
analyzed: uttamaiḥ saha sāṃgatyam yat prājñaiḥ satya vādibhiḥ

original: MSS_6498-2 bandhanastho'pi tiṣṭheta na tu rājye narādhamaiḥ //
analyzed: bandhana sthaḥ api tiṣṭheta na tu rājye nara adhamaiḥ

original: MSS_6499-1 uttamaiḥ svīkṛto nīco nīca eva na cottamaḥ /
analyzed: uttamaiḥ svīkṛtaḥ nīcaḥ nīcaḥ eva na ca uttamaḥ

original: MSS_6499-2 bhairavādhiṣṭhitaḥ śvā tu kadācin naiva kesarī //
analyzed: bhairava dhiṣṭhitaḥ śvā tu kadācid nā eva kesarī

original: MSS_6500-1 uttamairananujñātaṃ kāryaṃ necchec ca taiḥ saha /
analyzed: uttamaiḥ ananujñātam kāryam na icchet ca taiḥ saha

original: MSS_6500-2 devaiḥ sākaṃ sudhāpānād rāhoś chinnaṃ śiro yataḥ //
analyzed: devaiḥ sākam sudhā pānāt rāhoḥ chinnam śiraḥ yatas

original: MSS_6501-1 uttamairuttamairnityaṃ saṃbandhānācaret saha /
analyzed: uttamaiḥ uttamaiḥ nityam saṃbandhān ācaret saha

original: MSS_6501-2 ninīṣuḥ kulamutkarṣam adhamānadhamāṃs tyajet //
analyzed: ninīṣuḥ kulam utkarṣam adhamān adhamān tyajet

original: MSS_6502-1 uttamo nātivaktā syād adhamo bahubhāṣakaḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ na ativaktā syāt adhamaḥ bahu bhāṣakaḥ

original: MSS_6502-2 na hi svarṇe dhvanis tādṛg yādṛk kāṃsye prajāyate //
analyzed: na hi svarṇe dhvaniḥ tādṛś yādṛś kāṃsye prajāyate

original: MSS_6503-1 uttamo'pi kulajo'pi manuṣyaḥ sarvalokamahito'pi budho'pi /
analyzed: uttamaḥ api kula jaḥ api manuṣyaḥ sarva loka mahitaḥ api budhaḥ api

original: MSS_6503-2 dāsatāṃ bhajati yāṃ bhajamānas tāṃ bhajanti gaṇikāṃ kimu santaḥ //
analyzed: dāsa tām bhajati yām bhajamānaḥ tām bhajanti gaṇikām kimu santaḥ

original: MSS_6504-1 uttamo'pyadhamasya syād yācñānamrakaraḥ kvacit /
analyzed: uttamaḥ upi adhamasya syāt yācñā ānamra karaḥ kvacid

original: MSS_6504-2 kaustubhādīni ratnāni yayāce harirambudhim //
analyzed: kaustubha ādīni ratnāni yayāce hariḥ ambudhim

original: MSS_6505-1 uttamo'prārthito datte madhyamaḥ prārthitaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: uttama u prārthitaḥ datte madhyamaḥ prārthitaḥ punar

original: MSS_6505-2 yācakairyācyamāno'pi datte na tvadhamādhamaḥ //
analyzed: yācakaiḥ yācyamānaḥ api datte na tu adhama adhamaḥ

original: MSS_6506-1 uttamo madhyamo nīco'dhamo bhrātṛguṇairnaraḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ madhyamaḥ nīcaḥ udhamaḥ bhrātṛ guṇaiḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_6506-2 kanyāstrībhaginībhāgyo naro'dhamatamo mataḥ //
analyzed: kanyā strī bhaginī bhāgyaḥ mataḥ

original: MSS_6507-1 uttamo rasavādaśca dhātuvādaśca madhyamaḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ rasavādaḥ ca dhātuvādaḥ ca madhyamaḥ

original: MSS_6507-2 adhamo mantravādaśca mithyāvādo'dhamādhamaḥ //
analyzed: adhamaḥ mantravādaḥ ca mithyāvādaḥ udhama adhamaḥ

original: MSS_6508-1 uttara gaya kura galocane locane kamalagarvamocane /
analyzed: uttara gaya locane kamala garva mocane

original: MSS_6508-2 astu sundari kalindanandinī- vīciḍambaragabhīramambaram //
analyzed: astu sundari kalinda nandinī vīci ḍambara gabhīram ambaram

original: MSS_6509-1 uttarataśca madhūkād ahinilayaḥ paścimottare toyam /
analyzed: uttaratas ca madhūkāt ahi nilayaḥ paścima uttare toyam

original: MSS_6509-2 parihṛtya pañcahastān ardhāṣṭamapauruṣaṃ vācyam //
analyzed: parihṛtya pañca hastān ardha aṣṭama pauruṣam vācyam

original: MSS_6510-1 uttaranti vinikīrya palvalaṃ gāḍhapa kamativāhitātapāḥ /
analyzed: uttaranti vinikīrya palvalam gāḍhapa kam ativāhita ātapāḥ

original: MSS_6510-2 daṃṣṭriṇo vanavarāhayūthapā daṣṭabha gurabisā kurā iva //
analyzed: daṃṣṭriṇaḥ vana varāha yūthapāḥ kurāḥ iva

original: MSS_6511-1 uttarāduttaraṃ vākyam uttarādeva jāyate /
analyzed: uttarāt uttaram vākyam uttarāt eva jāyate

original: MSS_6511-2 suvṛṣṭiguṇasaṃpannād bījād bījamivāparam //
analyzed: su vṛṣṭi guṇa saṃpannāt bījāt bījam iva aparam

original: MSS_6512-1 uttarāpathakāntānāṃ kiṃ brūmo rāmaṇīyakam /
analyzed: uttarāpatha kāntānām kim brūmaḥ rāmaṇīyakam

original: MSS_6512-2 yāsāṃ tuṣārasaṃbhede na mlāyati mukhāmbujam //
analyzed: yāsām tuṣāra saṃbhede na mlāyati mukha ambujam

original: MSS_6513-1 uttarīyavinayāt trapamāṇā rundhatī kila tadīkṣaṇamārgam /
analyzed: uttarīya vinayāt trapamāṇā rundhatī kila tad īkṣaṇa mārgam

original: MSS_6513-2 āvariṣṭa vikaṭena vivoḍhur vakṣasaiva kucamaṇḍalamanyā //
analyzed: āvariṣṭa vikaṭena vivoḍhuḥ vakṣasā eva kuca maṇḍalam anyā

original: MSS_6514-1 uttareṇa kimātmaiva pañcabāṇāgnisākṣikam /
analyzed: uttareṇa kim ātmā eva pañcabāṇa agni sākṣikam

original: MSS_6514-2 tava sakhyai mayā datto na sevyaḥ sevitā rahaḥ //
analyzed: tava sakhyai mayā dattaḥ na sevyaḥ sevitā rahaḥ

original: MSS_6515-1 uttareṇa sadā kāryaṃ prāṇasya na virodhakam /
analyzed: uttareṇa sadā kāryam prāṇasya na virodhakam

original: MSS_6515-2 saṃgrāmeṇa vinā kāryaṃ na lakṣyaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham //
analyzed: saṃgrāmeṇa vinā kāryam na lakṣyam dakṣiṇāmukham

original: MSS_6516-1 uttānaphalalubdhānāṃ varaṃ rājopajīvinaḥ /
analyzed: uttāna phala lubdhānām varam rāja upajīvinaḥ

original: MSS_6516-2 na tu tatsvāminastīvraparikleśaiḥ phalanti ye //
analyzed: na tu tad svāminaḥ tīvra parikleśaiḥ phalanti ye

original: MSS_6517-1 uttānāḥ kati vellitāḥ kati rayādābhugnamadhyāḥ kati kṣiptotkṣiptavikuñcitāḥ kati bhujāstauryatrikānukramāt /
analyzed: uttānāḥ kati vellitāḥ kati rayāt ābhugna madhyāḥ kati kṣipta utkṣipta vikuñcitāḥ kati bhujāḥ tauryatrika anukramāt

original: MSS_6517-2 kalpānteṣu mahānaṭasya jhaṭiti prakrāntacakrabhrami- bhrāntau kevalamagnihāsagaralairlekhātrayaṃ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: kalpa anteṣu mahā naṭasya jhaṭiti prakrānta cakra bhrami bhrāntau kevalam agni hāsa garalaiḥ lekhā trayam pātu vaḥ

original: MSS_6518-1 uttānāmupadhāya bāhulatikāmekāmapā gaśritām anyāmapyalasāṃ nidhāya vipulābhoge nitambasthale /
analyzed: uttānām upadhāya bāhu latikām ekām apaḥ ga śritām anyām api alasām nidhāya vipula ābhoge nitamba sthale

original: MSS_6518-2 nīvīṃ kiṃcidavaślathāṃ vidadhatī niśvāsalolālakā talpotpīḍanatiryagunnatakucaṃ nidrāti śātodarī //
analyzed: nīvīm kiṃcid avaślathām vidadhatī niśvāsa lola alakā talpa utpīḍana tiryak unnata kucam nidrāti śāta udarī

original: MSS_6519-1 uttānocchūnamaṇḍūkapāṭitodarasaṃnibhe /
analyzed: uttāna ucchūna maṇḍūka pāṭita udara saṃnibhe

original: MSS_6519-2 kledini strīvraṇe saktir akṛmeḥ kasya jāyate //
analyzed: kledini strīvraṇe saktiḥ a kṛmeḥ kasya jāyate

original: MSS_6520-1 uttānollapitapratāritanavaśrotraiḥ kathaṃ bhāvyatāṃ vākpratyaṃśaniveśitākhilajagattattvā kavīnāṃ kalā /
analyzed: uttāna ullapita pratārita nava śrotraiḥ katham bhāvyatām vāc pratyaṃśa niveśita akhila jagat tattvā kavīnām kalā

original: MSS_6520-2 rathyāgartavigāhanādbhutakṛtairgāhyaḥ kva ratnākaro yasyāntaḥśapharādhamānanataṭīmajjadgirīndrāḥ śriyaḥ //
analyzed: rathyā garta vigāhana adbhuta kṛtaiḥ gāhyaḥ kva ratnākaraḥ yasya antar śaphara adhama ānana taṭī majjat giri indrāḥ śriyaḥ

original: MSS_6521-1 uttānau caraṇau kṛtvā ūrusaṃsthau prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: uttānau caraṇau kṛtvā ūru saṃsthau prayatnataḥ

original: MSS_6521-2 ūrumadhye tathottānau pāṇī padmāsanaṃ tvidam //
analyzed: ūru madhye tathā uttānau pāṇī padmāsanam tu idam

original: MSS_6522-1 uttārakamatisnigdhaṃ bhrūkṣepavaśavarti ca /
analyzed: uttārakam ati snigdham bhrū kṣepa vaśa varti ca

original: MSS_6522-2 sadā mukhasthaṃ mitraṃ cen netreṇa capalena kim //
analyzed: sadā mukha stham mitram ced netreṇa capalena kim

original: MSS_6523-1 uttārayati vipattāv iti dhanavattāmapekṣate kṣitipaḥ /
analyzed: uttārayati vipattau iti dhanavat tām apekṣate kṣitipaḥ

original: MSS_6523-2 cenneha tadupayogas taṃ niyataṃ vittasaṃcayo rogaḥ //
analyzed: ced na iha tad upayogaḥ tam niyatam vitta saṃcayaḥ rogaḥ

original: MSS_6524-1 uttālatāṭakotpātadarśane'pyaprakampitaḥ /
analyzed: uttāla tāṭaka utpāta darśane pya prakampitaḥ

original: MSS_6524-2 niyuktastatpramāthāya straiṇena vicikitsati //
analyzed: niyuktaḥ tad pramāthāya straiṇena vicikitsati

original: MSS_6525-1 uttālatālīvanasaṃpravṛtta- samīrasīmantitaketakīkāḥ /
analyzed: uttāla tālī vana saṃpravṛtta samīra sīmantita ketakīkāḥ

original: MSS_6525-2 āsedire lāvaṇasaindhavīnāṃ camūcaraiḥ kacchabhuvāṃ pradeśāḥ //
analyzed: āsedire lāvaṇa saindhavīnām camū caraiḥ kaccha bhuvām pradeśāḥ

original: MSS_6526-1 uttālāpītahālārasavivaśamanovṛttitālā kasīra- protkhātākṛṣṭakālāgururuciraruciḥ strotasonmādaśīlā /
analyzed: uttālā pīta hālā rasa vivaśa manaḥ vṛtti tālā kasīra protkhāta ākṛṣṭa kālāguru rucira ruciḥ strotasā unmāda śīlā

original: MSS_6526-2 acchaṇḍīdvīpavandībhavadakhilacalatkāndiśīkogranakrā kālindī vo'stu saṃdīpitasukṛtacayodrekamndīkṛtaināḥ //
analyzed: kālindī voḥ saṃdīpita sukṛta caya udreka mndīkṛta enāḥ

original: MSS_6527-1 uttālālakabhañjanāni kabarīpāśeṣu śikṣāraso dantānāṃ parikarma nīvinahanaṃ bhrūlāsyayogyāgrahaḥ /
analyzed: uttāla alaka bhañjanāni kabarī pāśeṣu śikṣā rasaḥ dantānām parikarma nīvi nahanam bhrū lāsya yogya āgrahaḥ

original: MSS_6527-2 tiryaglocanaceṣṭitāni vacasāṃ chekoktisaṃkrāntayaḥ strīṇāṃ mlāyati śaiśave pratikalaṃ ko'pyeṣa kelikramaḥ //
analyzed: tiryak locana ceṣṭitāni vacasām cheka ukti saṃkrāntayaḥ strīṇām mlāyati śaiśave pratikalam kopī eṣa keli kramaḥ

original: MSS_6528-1 uttiṣṭha kṣaṇamekamudvaha sakhe dāridryabhāraṃ guruṃ śrāntas tāvadahaṃ cirān maraṇajaṃ seve tvadīyaṃ sukham /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha kṣaṇam ekam udvaha sakhe dāridrya bhāram gurum śrāntaḥ tāvat aham cirāt maraṇa jam seve tvadīyam sukham
