original: MSS_6528-2 ityukto dhanavarjitena viduṣā gatvā śmaśānaṃ śavo dāridryān maraṇaṃ varaṃ sukhamiti jñātvā sa tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ dhana varjitena viduṣā gatvā śmaśānam śavaḥ dāridryāt maraṇam varam sukham iti jñātvā sa tūṣṇīm sthitaḥ

original: MSS_6529-1 uttiṣṭhati namati vaṇik pṛcchati kuśalaṃ dadāti ca sthānam /
analyzed: uttiṣṭhati namati vaṇij pṛcchati kuśalam dadāti ca sthānam

original: MSS_6529-2 nikṣepapāṇimāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kurute //
analyzed: nikṣepa pāṇim āptam dṛṣṭvā dharmyām kathām kurute

original: MSS_6530-1 uttiṣṭha dūti yāmo yāmo yātas tathāpi nāyātaḥ /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha dūti yāmaḥ yāmaḥ yātaḥ tathā api na a yātaḥ

original: MSS_6530-2 yātaḥ paramapi jīvej jīvitanātho bhavet tasyāḥ //
analyzed: yātaḥ param api jīvet jīvita nāthaḥ bhavet tasyāḥ

original: MSS_6531-1 uttiṣṭhantyā ratānte bharamuragapatau pāṇinaikena kṛtvā dhṛtvā cānyena vāso vigalitakabarībhāramaṃse vahantyāḥ /
analyzed: uttiṣṭhantyāḥ rata ante bharam uraga patau pāṇinā ekena kṛtvā dhṛtvā ca anyena vāsaḥ vigalita kabarī bhāram aṃse vahantyāḥ

original: MSS_6531-2 bhūyas tatkālakāntidviguṇitasurataprītinā śauriṇā vaḥ śayyāmāli gya nītaṃ vapuralasalasadbāhu lakṣmyāḥ punātu //
analyzed: bhūyas tad kāla kānti dvi guṇita surata prītinā śauriṇā vaḥ śayyā māli nītam vapuḥ alasa lasat bāhu lakṣmyāḥ punātu

original: MSS_6532-1 uttiṣṭhamānastu paro nopekṣyaḥ pathyamicchatā /
analyzed: uttiṣṭhamānaḥ tu paraḥ na upekṣyaḥ pathyam icchatā

original: MSS_6532-2 samau hi śiṣṭairāmnātau vartsyantāvāmayaḥ sa ca //
analyzed: samau hi śiṣṭaiḥ āmnātau vartsyantau āmayaḥ sa ca

original: MSS_6533-1 uttiṣṭha yadi jīvantīṃ māmicchasi tamānaya /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha yadi jīvantīm mām icchasi tam ānaya

original: MSS_6533-2 ahaṃ netumaśakyāpi sudūramidamantaram //
analyzed: aham netum aśakyā api su dūram idam antaram

original: MSS_6534-1 uttiṣṭha vatsetyamṛtāyamānaṃ vaco niśamyotthitamutthitaḥ san /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha vatsa iti amṛtāyamānam vacaḥ niśamya utthitam utthitaḥ san

original: MSS_6534-2 dadarśa rājā jananīmiva svāṃ gāmagrataḥ prasraviṇīṃ na siṃham //
analyzed: dadarśa rājā jananīm iva svām gām agratas prasraviṇīm na siṃham

original: MSS_6535-1 uttiṣṭhārāt tarau me taruṇimama taroḥ śaktirārohaṇa kā sākṣādākhyāmi mugdhe taraṇimiha raverākhyayā kā ratirme /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha ārāt tarau me taruṇi mama taroḥ śaktiḥ ārohaṇa kā sākṣāt ākhyāmi mugdhe taraṇim iha raveḥ ākhyayā kā ratiḥ me

original: MSS_6535-2 vārteyaṃ nauprasa ge kathamapi bhavitā nāvayoḥ saṃgamārthā vārtāpīti smitāsyaṃ jitagiramajitaṃ rādhayārādhayāmi //
analyzed: vārtā iyam nau prasa ge katham api bhavitā na āvayoḥ saṃgama arthā vārtā api iti smita āsyam jita giram ajitam rādhayā ārādhayāmi

original: MSS_6536-1 uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha kiṃ śeṣe prāpte paribhave nave /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha kim śeṣe prāpte paribhave nave

original: MSS_6536-2 adya vai nirbhayā la kāṃ praviṣṭāḥ sūryaraśmayaḥ //
analyzed: adya vai nirbhayāḥ la kām praviṣṭāḥ sūrya raśmayaḥ

original: MSS_6537-1 uttīrṇabhāralaghunāpyalaghūlapaugha- sauhityaniḥsahatareṇa taroradhastāt /
analyzed: uttīrṇa bhāra laghunā api alaghu ulapa ogha sauhitya niḥsahatareṇa taroḥ adhastāt

original: MSS_6537-2 romanthamantharacaladgurusāsnamāsāṃ cakre nimīladalasekṣaṇamaukṣakeṇa //
analyzed: romantha manthara calat guru sāsnam āsām cakre nimīlat alasa īkṣaṇa maukṣakeṇa

original: MSS_6538-1 uttīrya dakṣiṇe pūrvaṃ paścād vāme'tininditāḥ /
analyzed: uttīrya dakṣiṇe pūrvam paścāt vāma iti ninditāḥ

original: MSS_6538-2 kaiścit kṛṣṇo mṛgaścaikaḥ kaiścit sarve'pi nādṛtāḥ //
analyzed: kaiścid kṛṣṇaḥ mṛgaḥ ca ekaḥ kaiścid sarve api na ādṛtāḥ

original: MSS_6539-1 uttīrya pṛṣṭhato yāti veṣṭanaṃ vākaroti cet /
analyzed: uttīrya pṛṣṭhatas yāti veṣṭanam vā ākaroti ced

original: MSS_6539-2 svasthasya veṣṭanaprāptiḥ sabhayasya bhayaṃ haret //
analyzed: svasthasya veṣṭana prāptiḥ sa bhayasya bhayam haret

original: MSS_6540-1 uttu gapīvarakucadvayapīḍitā gam āli gitaḥ pulakitena bhujena ratyā /
analyzed: ga pīvara kuca dvaya pīḍitā gam pulakitena bhujena ratyā

original: MSS_6540-2 śrīmañ jaganti madayan nayanābhirāmaḥ kāmo'yameti madaghūrṇitanetrapadmaḥ //
analyzed: śrīmam jaganti madayan nayana abhirāmaḥ kāmaḥ yam eti mada ghūrṇita netra padmaḥ

original: MSS_6541-1 uttu gamattamāta gamastakanyastalocanaḥ /
analyzed: ud tu ga mastaka nyasta locanaḥ

original: MSS_6541-2 āsann'epi ca sāra ge na vāñcchāṃ kurute hariḥ //
analyzed: āsanne api ca sāra ge na vāñcchām kurute hariḥ

original: MSS_6542-1 uttu gavātāyanagopurāṇi gṛhāṇi vittāni durarjitāni /
analyzed: gavātāyana gopurāṇi gṛhāṇi vittāni durarjitāni

original: MSS_6542-2 kṣaṇādadhaḥpātakarāṇi hanta citātitherasya nirarthakāni //
analyzed: kṣaṇāt adhaḥpāta karāṇi hanta citā atitheḥ asya nirarthakāni

original: MSS_6543-1 uttu gaśailaśikharasthitapādapasya kākaḥ kṛśo'pi phalamālabhate sapakṣaḥ /
analyzed: kākaḥ kṛśaḥ api phalam ālabhate sapakṣaḥ

original: MSS_6543-2 siṃhaḥ pracaṇḍagajakumbhavidārako'pi ucchiṣṭameva labhate khalu pakṣahīnaḥ //
analyzed: siṃhaḥ pracaṇḍa gaja kumbha vidārakaḥ upi ucchiṣṭam eva labhate khalu pakṣa hīnaḥ

original: MSS_6544-1 uttu gaśailaśikharāśrayaṇena kecid uddāmavīcivalitāḥ sarito bhavanti /
analyzed: kecid uddāma vīci valitāḥ saritaḥ bhavanti

original: MSS_6544-2 anye puṇarjalakanās tṛṇaloṣṭapātād ambhomucāṃ payasi na kṣayamāpnuvanti //
analyzed: anye puṇar jalakanāḥ tṛṇa loṣṭa pātāt ambhomucām payasi na kṣayam āpnuvanti

original: MSS_6545-1 uttu gaśailaśikhare nanu pādapasya kāko'pi pakvaphalamālabhate sapakṣaḥ /
analyzed: nanu pādapasya kākaḥ api pakva phalam ālabhate sapakṣaḥ

original: MSS_6545-2 siṃho balī gajavidāraṇadāruṇo'pi sīdatyaho tarutale nijapakṣahīnaḥ //
analyzed: siṃhaḥ balī gaja vidāraṇa dāruṇaḥ api sīdati aho taru tale nija pakṣa hīnaḥ

original: MSS_6546-1 uttu gastanaparvatādavataradga geva hārāvalī romālī navanīlanīrajaruciḥ seyaṃ kalindātmajā /
analyzed: ud tu gastana parvatāt avatarat ga gā iva hāra āvalī romālī nava nīla nīraja ruciḥ sā iyam kalindā ātmajā

original: MSS_6546-2 jātaṃ tīrthamidaṃ supuṇyajanakaṃ yatrānayoḥ saṃgamaś candro majjati lāñchanāpahṛtaye nūnaṃ nakhāṃkacchalāt //
analyzed: jātam tīrtham idam su puṇya janakam yatra anayoḥ saṃgamaḥ candraḥ majjati lāñchana apahṛtaye nūnam nakha aṃka chalāt

original: MSS_6547-1 uttu gastanaparvataistanuruhai romāvalībhūruhaiḥ kāñcīka kaṇanūpuradhvaniparairhārāvalīvāguraiḥ /
analyzed: roma āvali bhūruhaiḥ kāñcīka kaṇa nūpura dhvani paraiḥ hāra āvalī vāguraiḥ

original: MSS_6547-2 bhrūcāpena kaṭākṣavistaraśaraiḥ kandarpadāvānalair bālā khelati pāradhaṃ nijaguṇaiḥ kāmīmṛgo badhyate //
analyzed: bhrū cāpena kaṭākṣa vistara śaraiḥ kandarpa dāva analaiḥ bālā khelati pāradham nija guṇaiḥ kāmī mṛgaḥ badhyate

original: MSS_6548-1 uttu gastanabharatāntatāntamadhyaṃ viśliṣyadghanakacavāntavāntasūnam /
analyzed: ud tu gastana bhara tānta tānta madhyam viśliṣyat ghana kaca vānta vānta sūnam

original: MSS_6548-2 vakrābjabhramadalibhītabhītanetraṃ mugdhākṣī mama dhuri mandamandameti //
analyzed: vakra abja bhrama dali bhīta bhīta netram mugdha akṣī mama dhuri mandamandam eti

original: MSS_6549-1 uttu gastanabhāra eśa tarale netre cale bhrūlate rāgāndheṣu tadoṣṭhapallavamidaṃ kurvantu nāma vyathām /
analyzed: tarale netre cale bhrū late rāga andheṣu tad oṣṭha pallavam idam kurvantu nāma vyathām

original: MSS_6549-2 saubhāgyākṣarapa ktireva likhitā puṣpāyudhena svayaṃ madhyasthāpi karoti tāpamadhikaṃ romāvalī kena sā //
analyzed: saubhāgya akṣara pa ktiḥ eva likhitā puṣpāyudhena svayam madhyasthā api karoti tāpam adhikam roma āvalī kena sā

original: MSS_6550-1 uttu gastanamaṇḍalādavataradga geva hārāvalī romālī navanālanīradaruciḥ seyaṃ kalindātmajā /
analyzed: hāra āvalī romālī nava nāla nīrada ruciḥ sā iyam kalindā ātmajā

original: MSS_6550-2 jātaṃ tīrthamidaṃ supuṇyajanakaṃ yatrāvayoḥ saṃgamaś candro majjati lāñchanāpahṛdaye nūnaṃ nakhāṃkacchalāt //
analyzed: jātam tīrtham idam su puṇya janakam yatra āvayoḥ saṃgamaḥ candraḥ majjati lāñchanāpa hṛdaye nūnam nakha aṃka chalāt

original: MSS_6551-1 uttu gastanamaṇḍaloparilasatprālambamuktāmaṇer antarbimbitamindranīlanikaracchāyānukāridyuti /
analyzed: antar bimbitam indranīla nikara chāyā anukāri dyuti

original: MSS_6551-2 lajjāvyājamupetya namravadanā spaṣṭaṃ murārervapuḥ paśyantī muditā mude'stu bhavatāṃ lakṣmīrvivāhotsave //
analyzed: lajjā vyājam upetya namra vadanā spaṣṭam murāreḥ vapuḥ paśyantī muditā bhavatām lakṣmīḥ vivāha utsave

original: MSS_6552-1 uttu gastanaśailadustaramuro nimnātinābhisthalī bhīmaṃ dehavanaṃ sphuradbhujalataṃ romālijālākulam /
MSS_6552-2 vyādhaḥ pañcaśaraḥ kiratyatitarāṃstīkṣṇān kaṭākṣāśugāṃs tanme brūhi manaḥkura ga śaraṇaṃ kaṃ sāṃprataṃ yāsyasi //
analyzed: vyādhaḥ pañca śaraḥ kirati atitarān tīkṣṇān kaṭākṣa āśugān tat me brūhi śaraṇam kam sāṃpratam yāsyasi

original: MSS_6553-1 uttu gādanilacalāṃśukāstaṭāntāc cetobhiḥ saha bhayadarśināṃ priyāṇām /
analyzed: ud tu gāt anila cala aṃśukāḥ taṭa antāt cetobhiḥ saha bhaya darśinām priyāṇām

original: MSS_6553-2 śroṇībhirgurubhiratūrṇamutpatantyas toyeṣu drutatarama ganā nipetuḥ //
analyzed: śroṇībhiḥ gurubhiḥ atūrṇam utpatantyaḥ toyeṣu nipetuḥ

original: MSS_6554-1 uttu ge kṛtasaṃśrayasya śikhariṇyuccāvacagrāvaṇi nyagrodhasya kima ga tasya vacasā ślāghāsu paryāpyate /
analyzed: kṛta saṃśrayasya śikhariṇī uccāvaca grāvaṇi nyagrodhasya tasya vacasā ślāghāsu paryāpyate

original: MSS_6554-2 bandurvā sa purākṛtaḥ kimathavā satkarmaṇāṃ saṃcayo mārge rūkṣavipatraśākhini jano yaṃ prāpya viśrāmyati //
analyzed: banduḥ vā sa purā kṛtaḥ kim athavā sat karmaṇām saṃcayaḥ mārge rūkṣa vipatra śākhini janaḥ yam prāpya viśrāmyati

original: MSS_6555-1 uttu ge vibhavadrumasya śikhare bhuktvā phalaṃ svecchayā tasmāt praskhalitaḥ padādvidhivaśād bhraṣṭo nirālambanaḥ /
analyzed: vibhava drumasya śikhare bhuktvā phalam sva icchayā tasmāt praskhalitaḥ padāt vidhi vaśāt bhraṣṭaḥ nirālambanaḥ

original: MSS_6555-2 pātālodarabhīṣaṇe bahuvidhakleśoragādhyāsite daurgatyāvaṭagarbhake nipatitaścitraṃ yadi prāṇiti //
analyzed: pātāla udara bhīṣaṇe bahuvidha kleśa uraga adhyāsite daurgatyāḥ aṭa garbhake nipatitaḥ citram yadi prāṇiti

original: MSS_6556-1 uttu gaistarubhiḥ kimebhiraphalairākāśasaṃsparśibhir dhanyo'sau nitarāmulūpaviṭapo nadyāstaṭe tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: ud tu gaiḥ tarubhiḥ kim ebhiḥ aphalaiḥ ākāśa saṃsparśibhiḥ dhanyaḥ asau nitarām ulūpa viṭapaḥ nadyāḥ taṭe tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_6556-2 evaṃ yaḥ kṛtabuddhirutthitajalavyālolavīcīvaśān majjantaṃ janamuddharāmi yadi vā tenaiva majjāmyaham //
analyzed: evam yaḥ kṛta buddhiḥ utthita jala vyālola vīcī vaśāt majjantam janam uddharāmi yadi vā tena eva majjāmi aham

original: MSS_6558-1 utthātavyaṃ jāgṛtavyaṃ yoktavyaṃ bhūtikarmasu /
analyzed: utthātavyam jāgṛtavyam yoktavyam bhūti karmasu

original: MSS_6558-2 bhaviṣyatītyeva manaḥ kṛtvā satatamavyathaiḥ //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati iti eva manaḥ kṛtvā satatam avyathaiḥ

original: MSS_6559-1 utthānaṃ tu manuṣyāṇāṃ dakṣāṇāṃ daivavarjitam /
analyzed: utthānam tu manuṣyāṇām dakṣāṇām daiva varjitam

original: MSS_6559-2 aphalaṃ dṛśyate loke samyagapyupapāditam //
analyzed: aphalam dṛśyate loke samyak api upapāditam

original: MSS_6560-1 utthānaṃ saṃyamo dākṣyam apramādo dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: utthānam saṃyamaḥ dākṣyam apramādaḥ dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ

original: MSS_6560-2 samīkṣya ca samārambho viddhi mūlaṃ bhavasya tat //
analyzed: samīkṣya ca samārambhaḥ viddhi mūlam bhavasya tat

original: MSS_6561-1 utthānaṃ hi narendrāṇāṃ bṛhaspatirabhāṣata /
analyzed: utthānam hi narendrāṇām bṛhaspatiḥ abhāṣata

original: MSS_6561-2 rājadharmasya yan mūlaṃ ... ... ... //
analyzed: rāja dharmasya yat mūlam

original: MSS_6562-1 utthānadhīraḥ puruṣo vāgdhīrānadhitiṣṭhati /
analyzed: utthāna dhīraḥ puruṣaḥ vāc dhīrān adhitiṣṭhati

original: MSS_6562-2 utthānadhīraṃ vāgdhīrā ramayanta upāsate //
analyzed: utthāna dhīram vāc dhīrāḥ ramayantaḥ upāsate

original: MSS_6563-1 utthānamabhijānanti sarvabhūtāni bhārata /
analyzed: utthānam abhijānanti sarva bhūtāni bhārata

original: MSS_6563-2 pratyakṣaṃ phalamaśnanti karmaṇāṃ lokasākṣikam //
analyzed: pratyakṣam phalam aśnanti karmaṇām loka sākṣikam

original: MSS_6564-1 utthānayuktaḥ satataṃ pareṣāmantaraiṣaṇe /
analyzed: utthāna yuktaḥ satatam pareṣām antara eṣaṇe

original: MSS_6564-2 ānṛṇyamāpnoti naraḥ parasyātmana eva ca //
analyzed: ānṛṇyam āpnoti naraḥ parasya ātmanaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_6565-1 utthānahīno rājā hi buddhimānapi nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: utthāna hīnaḥ rājā hi buddhimān api nityaśas

original: MSS_6565-2 dharṣaṇīyo ripūṇāṃ syād bhujaṃga iva nirviṣaḥ //
analyzed: dharṣaṇīyaḥ ripūṇām syāt bhujaṃgaḥ iva nirviṣaḥ

original: MSS_6566-1 utthānenāmṛtaṃ labdham utthānenāsurā hatāḥ /
analyzed: utthānena amṛtam labdham utthānena asurāḥ hatāḥ

original: MSS_6566-2 utthānena mahendreṇa śraiṣṭhyaṃ prāptaṃ divīha ca //
analyzed: utthānena mahā indreṇa śraiṣṭhyam prāptam divi iha ca

original: MSS_6567-1 utthānenaidhayet sattvam indhaneneva pāvakam /
analyzed: utthānena edhayet sattvam indhanena iva pāvakam

original: MSS_6567-2 śriyo hi satatotthāyī durbalo'pi samaśnute //
analyzed: śriyaḥ hi satata utthāyī durbalaḥ upi samaśnute

original: MSS_6568-1 utthāne sabhyānām uttiṣṭhati yāti teṣu yāteṣu /
analyzed: utthāne sabhyānām uttiṣṭhati yāti teṣu yāteṣu

original: MSS_6568-2 matamantarāpi rājño vijñāyāśīḥprado bahirupaiti //
analyzed: matam antarā api rājñaḥ vijñāya āśīḥ pradaḥ bahis upaiti

original: MSS_6568-1 utthāpitaḥ saṃyati reṇuraśvaiḥ sāndrīkṛtaḥ syandanavaṃśacakraiḥ /
analyzed: utthāpitaḥ saṃyati reṇuḥ aśvaiḥ sāndrīkṛtaḥ syandana vaṃśa cakraiḥ

original: MSS_6568-2 vistāritaḥ kuñjarakarṇatālair netrakrameṇoparurodha sūryam //
analyzed: vistāritaḥ kuñjara karṇa tālaiḥ netra krameṇa uparurodha sūryam

original: MSS_6569-1 utthāpya bhujagīṃ śaktiṃ mūlavātairadhaḥsthitām /
analyzed: utthāpya bhujagīm śaktim mūla vātaiḥ adhas sthitām

original: MSS_6569-2 suṣumnāntargatāṃ pañcacakrāṇāṃ bhedinīṃ śivām //
analyzed: suṣumnā antargatām pañca cakrāṇām bhedinīm śivām

original: MSS_6570-1 utthāya paścime yāme kṛtaśaucaḥ samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: utthāya paścime yāme kṛta śaucaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: MSS_6570-2 hutvāgniṃ brāhmaṇāṃścārya praviśecca śubhāṃ sabhām //
analyzed: hutvā agnim brāhmaṇān cārya praviśet ca śubhām sabhām

original: MSS_6571-1 utthāyotthāya pāpeṣvabhiramati matirmandabuddheryadā te naivedvego na śāntirna ca bhavati ghṛṇā kurvataḥ karma nindyam /
analyzed: utthāya utthāya pāpeṣu abhiramati matiḥ manda buddheḥ yadā te na evā id vegaḥ na śāntiḥ na ca bhavati ghṛṇā kurvataḥ karma nindyam

original: MSS_6571-2 tat kiṃ naiva prabhāte jvaladanalasamā rauravī nāma raudrī tīkṣṇāyaḥkīlacakrakrakacapaṭuravā rājadhānī yamasya //
analyzed: tat kim nā eva prabhāte jvalat anala samā rauravī nāma raudrī tīkṣṇa ayaḥ kīla cakra krakaca paṭu ravā rājadhānī yamasya

original: MSS_6572-1 utthāyotthāya boddhavyaṃ kimadya sukṛtaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: utthāya utthāya boddhavyam kim adya sukṛtam kṛtam

original: MSS_6572-2 āyuṣaḥ khaṇḍamādāya ravirastaṃ gamiṣyati //
analyzed: āyuṣaḥ khaṇḍam ādāya raviḥ astam gamiṣyati

original: MSS_6573-1 utthāyotthāya boddhavyaṃ kimadya sukṛtaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: utthāya utthāya boddhavyam kim adya sukṛtam kṛtam

original: MSS_6573-2 dattaṃ vā dāpitaṃ vāpi vāk satyā vāpi bhāṣitā //
analyzed: dattam vā dāpitam vā api vāc satyā vā api bhāṣitā

original: MSS_6574-1 utthāyotthāya boddhavyaṃ mahadbhayamupasthitam /
analyzed: utthāya utthāya boddhavyam mahat bhayam upasthitam

original: MSS_6574-2 maraṇavyādhiśokānāṃ kimadya nipatiṣyati //
analyzed: maraṇa vyādhi śokānām kim adya nipatiṣyati

original: MSS_6575-1 utthāyotthāya līyante daridrāṇāṃ manorathāḥ /
analyzed: utthāya utthāya līyante daridrāṇām manorathāḥ

original: MSS_6575-2 bālavaidhavyadagdhānāṃ kulastrīṇāṃ kucā iva //
analyzed: bāla vaidhavya dagdhānām kula strīṇām kucāḥ iva

original: MSS_6576-1 utthāyonnatavāsayaṣṭiśikhare vistāritākuñcitaṃ bibhratpādamudastakesarasaṭaḥ kiṃcid vinidrekṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: utthāya unnata vāsayaṣṭi śikhare vistārita ākuñcitam bibhrat pādam udasta kesara saṭaḥ kiṃcid vinidra īkṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_6576-2 dūrādañcitakandharaḥ śamavaśād vyādhūya pakṣadvayaṃ mānamlānikaraḥ kura gakadṛśāṃ kokūyate kukkuṭaḥ //
analyzed: dūrāt añcita kandharaḥ śama vaśāt vyādhūya pakṣa dvayam māna mlā nikaraḥ gaka dṛśām kokūyate kukkuṭaḥ

original: MSS_6577-1 utthitā eva pūjyante janāḥ kāryārthibhirnaraiḥ /
analyzed: utthitāḥ eva pūjyante janāḥ kārya arthibhiḥ naraiḥ

original: MSS_6577-2 śatruvat patitaṃ ko nu vandate mānavaṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: śatru vat patitam kaḥ nu vandate mānavam punar

original: MSS_6577A-1 utthitāgracaraṇā pṛthustanī puṣpajālamapacinvatī tarau /
analyzed: utthita agra caraṇā pṛthu stanī puṣpa jālam apacinvatī tarau

original: MSS_6577A-2 madhyabhañjanabhayāpadeśato nistrapā dayitakaṇṭhamagrahīt //
analyzed: madhya bhañjana bhaya apadeśataḥ nistrapā dayita kaṇṭham agrahīt

original: MSS_6578-1 utthito niśi kalānidhirbhaved etadīyamukhatulyatāptaye /
analyzed: utthitaḥ niśi kalā nidhiḥ bhavet etadīya mukha tulya tā āptaye

original: MSS_6578-2 prāpito malinabhāvametayā lajjayā nabhasi yātyadṛśyatām //
analyzed: prāpitaḥ malina bhāvam etayā lajjayā nabhasi yāti adṛśya tām

original: MSS_6579-1 utpakṣmaṇornayanayoruparuddhavṛttiṃ bāṣpaṃ kuru sthiratayā viratānubandham /
analyzed: utpakṣmaṇoḥ nayanayoḥ uparuddha vṛttim bāṣpam kuru sthira tayā virata anubandham

original: MSS_6579-2 asminnalakṣitanatonnatabhūmibhāge mārge padāni khalu te viṣamībhavanti //
analyzed: asmin alakṣita nata unnata bhūmi bhāge mārge padāni khalu te viṣamībhavanti

original: MSS_6580-1 utpatato'pyantarikṣaṃ gacchato'pi mahītalam /
analyzed: utpatataḥ api antarikṣam gacchataḥ api mahī talam

original: MSS_6580-2 dhāvataḥ pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ nādattamupatiṣṭhati //
analyzed: dhāvataḥ pṛthivīm sarvām na a dattam upatiṣṭhati

original: MSS_6581-1 utpatanti yadākāśe nipatanti mahītale /
analyzed: utpatanti yadā ākāśe nipatanti mahī tale

original: MSS_6581-2 pakṣiṇas tadapi prāptyā nādattamupatiṣṭhate //
analyzed: pakṣiṇaḥ tat api prāptyā na a dattam upatiṣṭhate

original: MSS_6582-1 utpatantī bhramantī sā namantī nalinekṣanā /
analyzed: utpatantī bhramantī sā namantī nalina īkṣanā

original: MSS_6582-2 śampāśataṃ vitanvānā bhramarīva bhramaṃ vyadhāt //
analyzed: śampā śatam vitanvānā bhramarī iva bhramam vyadhāt

original: MSS_6583-1 utpatantvantarikṣaṃ vā pātālaṃ praviśantu vā /
analyzed: utpatantu antarikṣam vā pātālam praviśantu vā

original: MSS_6583-2 carantu vā diśaḥ sarvā hyadattaṃ nopalabhyate //
analyzed: carantu vā diśaḥ sarvāḥ hi adattam na upalabhyate

original: MSS_6585-1 utpatet sarujād deśād vyādhidurbhikṣapīḍitāt /
analyzed: utpatet sa rujāt deśāt vyādhi durbhikṣa pīḍitāt

original: MSS_6585-2 anyatra vastuṃ gacched vā vased vā nityamānitaḥ //
analyzed: anyatra vastum gacchet vā vaset vā nitya mānitaḥ

original: MSS_6586-1 utpattiḥ payasāṃ nidhervapurapi khyātaṃ sudhāmandiraṃ spardhante viśadā latābhasaralā hārāvalīmaṃśavaḥ /
analyzed: utpattiḥ payasām nidheḥ vapuḥ api khyātam sudhā mandiram spardhante viśadāḥ latā ābha saralāḥ hāra āvalīm aṃśavaḥ

original: MSS_6586-2 kāntā kairaviṇī tava priyasakhaḥ śṛ gārasāraḥ smaro haṃ ho candra kimatra tāpajananaṃ tāpāya yan me bhavān //
analyzed: kāntā kairaviṇī tava priya sakhaḥ gārasāraḥ smaraḥ ham ho candra kim atra tāpa jananam tāpāya yat me bhavān

original: MSS_6587-1 utpattiparipūritāyāḥ kimasyāḥ pāvanāntaraiḥ /
analyzed: utpatti paripūritāyāḥ kim asyāḥ pāvana antaraiḥ

original: MSS_6587-2 tīrthodakaṃ ca vahniśca nānyataḥ śuddhimarhataḥ //
analyzed: tīrtha udakam ca vahniḥ ca na anyatas śuddhim arhataḥ

original: MSS_6588-1 utpattireva viprasya mūrtirdharmasya śāśvatī /
analyzed: utpattiḥ eva viprasya mūrtiḥ dharmasya śāśvatī

original: MSS_6588-2 sa hi dharmārthamutpanno brahmabhūyāya kalpate //
analyzed: sa hi dharma artham utpannaḥ brahma bhūyāya kalpate

original: MSS_6588A-1 utpattirjamadagnitaḥ sa bhagavān devaḥ pinākī guruḥ śauryaṃ yattu na tad girāṃ pathi nanu vyaktaṃ hi tatkarmabhiḥ /
analyzed: utpattiḥ jamadagnitaḥ sa bhagavān devaḥ pinākī guruḥ śauryam yat tu na tat girām pathi nanu vyaktam hi tad karmabhiḥ

original: MSS_6588A-2 tyāgaḥ saptasamudramudritamahīnirvyājadānāvadhiḥ kṣattrabrahmataponidherbhagavataḥ kiṃ vā na lokottaram //
analyzed: tyāgaḥ sapta samudra mudrita mahī nirvyāja dāna avadhiḥ kṣattra brahma tapaḥ nidheḥ bhagavataḥ kim vā na lokottaram

original: MSS_6589-1 utpattirdevayajanād brahmavādī nṛpaḥ pitā /
analyzed: utpattiḥ deva yajanāt brahma vādī nṛpaḥ pitā

original: MSS_6589-2 suprasannojjvalā mūrtir asyāṃ snehaṃ karoti me //
analyzed: su prasanna ujjvalā mūrtiḥ asyām sneham karoti me

original: MSS_6590-1 utpattirmarutāṃ prabhoryugadine prakhyāpya viśvotsave pūṇyāhaśrutiṣu prasiddhiradhikā pūrṇaṃ vayaḥ pauruṣam /
analyzed: utpattiḥ marutām prabhoḥ yuga dine prakhyāpya viśva utsave pūṇya aha śrutiṣu prasiddhiḥ adhikā pūrṇam vayaḥ pauruṣam

original: MSS_6590-2 kākutsthena samaṃ sapatnakalaho daivajñatā tādṛśī kākastena guṇena kāñcanamaye vyāpāritaḥ pañjare //
analyzed: kākutsthena samam sapatna kalahaḥ daiva jña tā tādṛśī kākaḥ tena guṇena kāñcana maye vyāpāritaḥ pañjare

original: MSS_6591-1 utpattirmalaye samudranilaye panthā vṛto rākṣasais tatratyānapi hanta candanatarūṃśchindanti sāṃyātrikāḥ /
analyzed: utpattiḥ malaye samudra nilaye panthāḥ vṛtaḥ rākṣasaiḥ tatratyān api hanta candana tarūn chindanti sāṃyātrikāḥ

original: MSS_6591-2 vartante savidhasthitāśca sukhinaḥ śākhoṭamukhyadrumās tanmanye kṛtinastu te tarukule ye nopayogakṣamāḥ //
analyzed: vartante savidha sthitāḥ ca sukhinaḥ śākhoṭa mukhya drumāḥ tat manye kṛtinaḥ tu te taru kule ye na upayoga kṣamāḥ

original: MSS_6592-1 utpattyutpannaśiṣṭā vividhaguṇagaṇā yatra yānti praṭiṣṭhāṃ bādhena prāktanānāṃ na ca niyamavidhirnāpi saṃkhyārthadāne /
analyzed: utpatti utpanna śiṣṭāḥ vividha guṇa gaṇāḥ yatra yānti praṭiṣṭhām bādhena prāktanānām na ca niyama vidhiḥ nā api saṃkhyā artha dāne

original: MSS_6592-2 ūhaḥ sarvatra yasya sphurati ca sakalaḥ satya evārthavādo mīmāṃsābhāvamañcatyabhinavamadhunā mūrtireṣā tvadīyā //
analyzed: ūhaḥ sarvatra yasya sphurati ca sakalaḥ satyaḥ eva arthavādaḥ mīmāṃsā bhāvam añcati abhinavam adhunā mūrtiḥ eṣā tvadīyā

original: MSS_6593-1 utpatreva dṛśo'rciṣā kusumitevendoḥ karairbhogibhiḥ sāroheva jaṭāṭavī phalatu vaḥ śreyo bhavānīpateḥ /
analyzed: utpatrā iva dṛśā ūrciṣā kusumitā iva indoḥ karaiḥ bhogibhiḥ sa ārohā iva jaṭā aṭavī phalatu vaḥ śreyaḥ bhavānī pateḥ

original: MSS_6593-2 yatparyantavivartinaḥ surasaritpūrasya bhūrisphurat- phenoṇḍūkavilāsamañcati vidherjīrṇā kapālāvalī //
analyzed: yad paryanta vivartinaḥ surasarit pūrasya bhūri sphurat phena uṇḍūka vilāsam añcati vidheḥ jīrṇā kapāla āvalī

original: MSS_6594-1 utpathā durnadāḥ kecid bahubha gabhramāvilāḥ /
analyzed: utpathāḥ durnadāḥ kecid gabhrama āvilāḥ

original: MSS_6594-2 taṭasthānapi nighnanti tarasā bhinnasetavaḥ //
analyzed: taṭa sthān api nighnanti tarasā bhinna setavaḥ

original: MSS_6595-1 utpathena kvacid yāti kvacin mārgeṇa gacchati /
analyzed: utpathena kvacid yāti kvacid mārgeṇa gacchati

original: MSS_6595-2 muhuruṣṇo muhuḥ śītaś capalaścapalāyate //
analyzed: muhur uṣṇaḥ muhur śītaḥ capalaḥ capalāyate

original: MSS_6596-1 utpadyante vipadyante madvidhāḥ kṣudrajantavaḥ /
analyzed: utpadyante vipadyante madvidhāḥ kṣudra jantavaḥ

original: MSS_6596-2 parārthabaddhakakṣyāṇāṃ tādṛśāmudbhavaḥ kutaḥ //
analyzed: parārtha baddha kakṣyāṇām tādṛśām udbhavaḥ kutas

original: MSS_6597-1 utpannaṃ sudhiyāṃ kule yadakhilaistyaktaṃ budhairna kṣaṇaṃ yan no vismṛtamekadāpi sujanairyadyanna yuktaṃ khalaiḥ /
analyzed: utpannam sudhiyām kule yat akhilaiḥ tyaktam budhaiḥ na kṣaṇam yat no vismṛtam ekadā api su janaiḥ yat yat na yuktam khalaiḥ

original: MSS_6597-2 daurgatyasya tathāvidhasya mahatastasyāpi kenāpi no yad dānāmbusaritpravāhapatitasyākāri hastārpaṇam //
analyzed: daurgatyasya tathāvidhasya mahataḥ tasya api kena api naḥ yat dāna ambu sarit pravāha patitasya akāri hasta arpaṇam

original: MSS_6598-1 utpannaparitāpasya buddhirbhavati yādṛśī /
analyzed: utpanna paritāpasya buddhiḥ bhavati yādṛśī

original: MSS_6598-2 tādṛśī yadi pūrvaṃ syāt kasya na syānmahodayaḥ //
analyzed: tādṛśī yadi pūrvam syāt kasya na syāt mahā udayaḥ

original: MSS_6599-1 utpannaputramātrasya puṃsaḥ svargo bhaved dhrṛvam /
analyzed: utpanna putra mātrasya puṃsaḥ svargaḥ bhavet dhrṛvam

original: MSS_6599-2 ṭiṭṭibhotpādanādeva mandapālo divaṃ yayau //
analyzed: ṭiṭṭibha utpādanāt eva mandapālaḥ divam yayau

original: MSS_6600-1 utpannamiha loke vai janmaprabhṛti mānavam /
analyzed: utpannam iha loke vai janma prabhṛti mānavam

original: MSS_6600-2 vividhānyupavartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca //
analyzed: vividhāni upavartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca

original: MSS_6601-1 tayorekatare mārge yadyenamabhisaṃnayet /
analyzed: tayoḥ ekatare mārge yadi enam abhisaṃnayet

original: MSS_6601-2 na sukhaṃ prāpya saṃhṛṣyet na duḥkhaṃ prāpya saṃjvaret //
analyzed: na sukham prāpya saṃhṛṣyet na duḥkham prāpya saṃjvaret

original: MSS_6602-1 utpannasya ruroḥ śṛ gaṃ vardhamānasya vardhate /
analyzed: utpannasya ruroḥ śṛ gam vardhamānasya vardhate

original: MSS_6602-2 prārthanā puruṣasyeva tasya mātrā na vidyate //
analyzed: prārthanā puruṣasya iva tasya mātrā na vidyate

original: MSS_6603-1 utpannāḥ saritāṃ hradeṣu suciraṃ tatraiva puṣṭāstataḥ prāptāḥ prāvṛṣi sāgaraṃ jalacarāstāsāṃ mukhādeva ye /
analyzed: utpannāḥ saritām hradeṣu su ciram tatra eva puṣṭāḥ tatas prāptāḥ prāvṛṣi sāgaram jalacarāḥ tāsām mukhāt eva ye

original: MSS_6603-2 dvitraireva dinaistimiṃgilakulasyāsādya kūṭasthatāṃ mṛṣyantyadya na te rahasyapi kṛtāṃ nādeyatāsaṃkathām //
analyzed: dvitraiḥ eva dinaiḥ timiṃgila kulasya āsādya kūṭastha tām mṛṣyanti adya na te rahasi api kṛtām na ādeya tā saṃkathām

original: MSS_6604-1 utpannā bahavastaleṣu sarasāmambhoruhāṇāṃ cayā ye yāminyadhipānukāriramaṇīvaktropamānaṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: utpannāḥ bahavaḥ taleṣu sarasām ambhoruhāṇām cayāḥ ye yāminī adhipa anukāri ramaṇī vaktra upamānam gatāḥ

original: MSS_6604-2 nābhau bhaumariporajāyata mahāpadmaḥ sa ko'pyekako yastrailokyasamudbhavaprabhaviturjanmāvanitvaṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: nābhau bhauma ripoḥ ajāyata mahāpadmaḥ sa kaḥ api ekakaḥ yaḥ trailokya samudbhava prabhavituḥ janmāvani tvam gataḥ

original: MSS_6605-1 utpannāmāpadaṃ yastu samādhatte sa buddhimān /
analyzed: utpannām āpadam yaḥ tu samādhatte sa buddhimān

original: MSS_6605-2 vaṇijo bhāryayā jāraḥ pratyakṣe nihnuto yathā //
analyzed: vaṇijaḥ bhāryayā jāraḥ pratyakṣe nihnutaḥ yathā

original: MSS_6606-1 utpanneṣu ca kāryeṣu matiryasya na hīyate /
analyzed: utpanneṣu ca kāryeṣu matiḥ yasya na hīyate

original: MSS_6606-2 sa nistarati durgāṇi gopī jāradvayaṃ yathā //
analyzed: sa nistarati durgāṇi gopī jāra dvayam yathā

original: MSS_6607-1 utpanno ghaṭa cakravartyasi punarvahniṃ praviśya tvayā prātaḥ snānapariśrameṇa payasāṃ pānena taptaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: utpannaḥ ghaṭa cakravartī asi punar vahnim praviśya tvayā prātar snāna pariśrameṇa payasām pānena taptam tapaḥ

original: MSS_6607-2 ākramyonnatajānu yan mṛgadṛśāṃ tiṣṭhannitambasthale kaṇṭhālambitabāhuvallikucayoḥ sīmānamāskandasi //
analyzed: ākramya unnata jānu yat mṛga dṛśām tiṣṭhat nitamba sthale kaṇṭha ālambita bāhu vallī kucayoḥ sīmānam āskandasi

original: MSS_6608-1 utpalasya ca padmasya matsyasya kumudasya ca /
analyzed: utpalasya ca padmasya matsyasya kumudasya ca

original: MSS_6608-2 ekajātiprasūtānāṃ rūpaṃ gandhaḥ pṛthak pṛthak //
analyzed: eka jāti prasūtānām rūpam gandhaḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: MSS_6609-1 utpalasya hi raktimā sādhoḥ paropakāritā /
analyzed: utpalasya hi raktimā sādhoḥ paropakāri tā

original: MSS_6609-2 asādhoḥ karuṇābhāvaḥ svabhāvāstrividhā yathā //
analyzed: asādhoḥ karuṇā bhāvaḥ svabhāvāḥ trividhāḥ yathā

original: MSS_6610-1 utpallava iva kiraṇaiḥ kusumita iva tārakābhirayaminduḥ /
analyzed: utpallavaḥ iva kiraṇaiḥ kusumitaḥ iva tārakābhiḥ ayam induḥ

original: MSS_6610-2 udayatyudayataṭānte surataruriva śītalacchāyaḥ //
analyzed: udayati udaya taṭa ante surataruḥ iva śītala chāyaḥ

original: MSS_6611-1 utpaśyāmi drutamapi sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvate te /
analyzed: utpaśyāmi drutam api sakhe mad priya artham yiyāsoḥ kāla kṣepam kakubha surabhau parvate parvate te

original: MSS_6611-2 śuklāpāngaiḥ sajalanayanaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ pratyudyātaḥ kathamapi bhavān gantumāśu vyavasyet //
analyzed: śukla apāngaiḥ sa jala nayanaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ pratyudyātaḥ katham api bhavān gantum āśu vyavasyet

original: MSS_6612-1 utpātakaṃ tadiha deva vicāraṇīyaṃ nārāyaṇo yadi patedathavā subhadrā /
analyzed: utpātakam tat iha deva vicāraṇīyam nārāyaṇaḥ yadi patet athavā subhadrā

original: MSS_6612-2 kādambarīmadavighūrṇitalocanasya yuktaṃ hi lā galadhṛtaḥ patanaṃ pṛthivyām //
analyzed: kādambarī mada vighūrṇita locanasya yuktam hi lā galadhṛtaḥ patanam pṛthivyām

original: MSS_6613-1 utpātaketuriva manmathanāyakasya vajraprahāra iva kelilatāvanasya /
analyzed: utpāta ketuḥ iva manmatha nāyakasya vajra prahāraḥ iva keli latā vanasya

original: MSS_6613-2 saṃhārakāla iva pānthavadhūjanasya grīṣmasya bhāti divasaḥ sakhi dūritāśaḥ //
analyzed: saṃhāra kālaḥ iva pāntha vadhū janasya grīṣmasya bhāti divasaḥ sakhi dūrita āśaḥ

original: MSS_6614-1 utpātajaṃ chidramasau vivasvān vyādāya vaktrākṛti lokabhīṣyam /
analyzed: utpāta jam chidram asau vivasvān vyādāya vaktra ākṛti loka bhīṣyam

original: MSS_6614-2 attuṃ janān dhūsararaśmirāśiḥ siṃho yathā kīrṇasaṭo'bhyudeti //
analyzed: attum janān dhūsara raśmi rāśiḥ siṃhaḥ yathā kīrṇa saṭaḥ abhyudeti

original: MSS_6615-1 utpātāya ca kāvye durupaśrutirabhinaye ca nāṭyānām /
analyzed: utpātāya ca kāvye durupaśrutiḥ abhinaye ca nāṭyānām

original: MSS_6615-2 svasthānāmapi yadvad dhvastā dhārā dharitrīti //
analyzed: svasthānām api yadvat dhvastā dhārā dharitrī iti

original: MSS_6616-1 utpādakabrahmadātror garīyān brahmadaḥ pitā /
analyzed: utpādaka brahma dātroḥ garīyān brahma daḥ pitā

original: MSS_6616-2 brahmajanma hi viprasya pretya ceha ca śāśvatam //
analyzed: brahmajanma hi viprasya pretya ca iha ca śāśvatam

original: MSS_6617-1 utpādanamapatyasya jātasya paripālanam /
analyzed: utpādanam apatyasya jātasya paripālanam

original: MSS_6617-2 pratyarthaṃ lokayātrāyāḥ pratyakṣaṃ strīnibandhanam //
analyzed: pratyartham lokayātrāyāḥ pratyakṣam strī nibandhanam

original: MSS_6618-1 utpādayati lokasya prītiṃ malayamārutaḥ /
analyzed: utpādayati lokasya prītim malaya mārutaḥ

original: MSS_6618-2 nanu dākṣiṇyasaṃpannaḥ sarvasya bhavati priyaḥ //
analyzed: nanu dākṣiṇya saṃpannaḥ sarvasya bhavati priyaḥ

original: MSS_6619-1 utpādayatyalamidaṃ manaso viṣādaṃ sīdatsaroruhanibhaṃ vadanaṃ tvadīyam /
analyzed: utpādayati alam idam manasaḥ viṣādam sīdat saroruha nibham vadanam tvadīyam

original: MSS_6619-2 jñātvā nidānamahamatra samānaduḥkhā prāṇairapi priyatame bhavituṃ samīhe //
analyzed: jñātvā nidānam aham atra samāna duḥkhā prāṇaiḥ api priyatame bhavitum samīhe

original: MSS_6620-1 utpādayanto suratasya vighnaṃ parasparālāpasukhaṃ harantī /
analyzed: suratasya vighnam paraspara ālāpa sukham harantī

original: MSS_6620-2 saṃrāgiṇaḥ kāmijanasya gāḍham akṣṇorlalambe sahasaiva nidrā //
analyzed: saṃrāgiṇaḥ kāmi janasya gāḍham akṣṇoḥ lalambe sahasā eva nidrā

original: MSS_6621-1 utpāditā svayamiyaṃ yadi tat tanūjā tātena vā yadi tadā bhaginī khalu śrīḥ /
analyzed: utpāditā svayam iyam yadi tat tanūjā tātena vā yadi tadā bhaginī khalu śrīḥ

original: MSS_6621-2 yadyanyasaṃgamavatī ca tadā parastrī tattyāgabaddhamanasaḥ sudhiyo bhavanti //
analyzed: yadi anya saṃgamavatī ca tadā para strī tad tyāga baddha manasaḥ sudhiyaḥ bhavanti

original: MSS_6622-1 utpādya kṛtrimān doṣān dhanī sarvatra bādhyate /
analyzed: utpādya kṛtrimān doṣān dhanī sarvatra bādhyate

original: MSS_6622-2 kṛtadoṣasahasro'pi nirdhanaḥ parameśvaraḥ //
analyzed: kṛta doṣa sahasra upi nirdhanaḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: MSS_6623-1 utpādya putrānanṛṇāṃśca kṛtvā vṛttiṃ ca tebhyo'nuvidhāya kāṃcit /
analyzed: utpādya putrān anṛṇān ca kṛtvā vṛttim ca tebhyaḥ anuvidhāya kāṃcid

original: MSS_6623-2 sthāne kumārīḥ pratipādya sarvā araṇyasaṃstho munivad bubhūṣet //
analyzed: sthāne kumārīḥ pratipādya sarvāḥ araṇya saṃsthaḥ muni vat bubhūṣet

original: MSS_6624-1 utpādya yat svayamapi prabalānurāga- bhājas tathānusarato'pi divākarasya /
analyzed: utpādya yat svayam api prabala anurāga bhājaḥ tathā anusarataḥ api divākarasya

original: MSS_6624-2 chāyā prasarpati sudūramanena manye klṛptaṃ tayā sadṛśameva kulīnatāyāḥ //
analyzed: chāyā prasarpati su dūram anena manye klṛptam tayā sadṛśam eva kulīna tāyāḥ

original: MSS_6625-1 utpucchaḥ pramadocchvasad vapuradhovisraṃsipakṣadvayaḥ svairotphālagatikrameṇa parito bhrāntvā salīlaṃ muhuḥ /
analyzed: utpucchaḥ pramadā ucchvasat vapuḥ adhas visraṃsi pakṣa dvayaḥ svaira utphāla gati krameṇa paritas bhrāntvā sa līlam muhur

original: MSS_6625-2 utkaṇṭhālasakūjitaḥ kalarutāṃ bhūyo riraṃsārasa- nyagbhūtāṃ caṭakaḥ priyāmabhisaratyudvepamānaḥ kṣaṇam //
analyzed: utkaṇṭhā alasa kūjitaḥ kala rutām bhūyas riraṃsa arasa nyagbhūtām caṭakaḥ priyām abhisarati udvepamānaḥ kṣaṇam

original: MSS_6626-1 utpucchānatadhūtapakṣatatayo jhātkāriṇo vibhramair udvācyāstatacañcavo layavaśādutkṣiptapādā muhuḥ /
analyzed: utpuccha ānata dhūta pakṣa tatayaḥ jhātkāriṇaḥ vibhramaiḥ udvācyāḥ tata cañcavaḥ laya vaśāt utkṣipta pādāḥ muhur

original: MSS_6626-2 paśyanto nijakaṇṭhakāṇḍamalināṃ kādambinīmunnata- grīvābhyarṇamilatkalāpaviṭapā nṛtyanti kekābhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: paśyantaḥ nija kaṇṭha kāṇḍa malinām kādambinīm unnata grīvā abhyarṇa milat kalāpa viṭapāḥ nṛtyanti kekābhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_6627-1 utpravālānyaraṇyāni vāpyaḥ saṃphullapa kajāḥ /
analyzed: utpravālāni araṇyāni vāpyaḥ

original: MSS_6627-2 candraḥ pūrṇaśca kāmena pānthadṛṣṭerviṣaṃ kṛtam //
analyzed: candraḥ pūrṇaḥ ca kāmena pāntha dṛṣṭeḥ viṣam kṛtam

original: MSS_6628-1 utplutya dūraṃ paridhūya pakṣā- vadho nirīkṣya kṣaṇabaddhalakṣyaḥ /
analyzed: utplutya dūram paridhūya pakṣāḥ vadhaḥ nirīkṣya kṣaṇa baddha lakṣyaḥ

original: MSS_6628-2 madhyejalaṃ buḍḍati dattajhampaḥ samatsyamutsarpati matsyara kaḥ //
analyzed: madhyejalam buḍḍati datta jhampaḥ sa matsyam utsarpati kaḥ

original: MSS_6629-1 utplutya yaḥ śikhariṇaṃ madakumbhikumbham udbhidya sānuśatamāyatamullala ghe /
analyzed: utplutya yaḥ śikhariṇam mada kumbhi kumbham udbhidya sānu śatam āyatam ullala ghe

original: MSS_6629-2 pañcānano niyatayā jarayābhibhūtaḥ so'yaṃ karau lihati bṛṃhitalohitākṣaḥ //
analyzed: pañcānanaḥ niyatayā jarayā abhibhūtaḥ saḥ yam karau lihati bṛṃhita lohita akṣaḥ

original: MSS_6630-1 utplutyā gṛhakoṇataḥ pracalitāḥ stokāgraja ghaṃ tato vakrasvairapadakramairupagatāḥ kiṃcic calanto gale /
analyzed: utplutyā gṛha koṇataḥ pracalitāḥ stoka agraja gham tatas vakra svaira padakramaiḥ upagatāḥ kiṃcid calantaḥ gale

original: MSS_6630-2 bhekāḥ pūtinipātino micimicītyunmīlitārdhekṣaṇā nakrākāravidāritānanapuṭairnirmakṣikaṃ kurvate //
analyzed: bhekāḥ pūti nipātinaḥ micimici iti unmīlita ardha īkṣaṇāḥ nakra ākāra vidārita ānana puṭaiḥ nirmakṣikam kurvate

original: MSS_6631-1 utplutyārādardhacandreṇa lūne vaktre'nyasya krodhadaṣṭoṣṭhadante /
analyzed: utplutya ārāt ardhacandreṇa lūne vaktrenyasya krodha daṣṭa uṣṭha dante

original: MSS_6631-2 sainyaiḥ kaṇṭhacchedalīne kabandhād bhūyo bibhye valgataḥ sāsipāṇeḥ //
analyzed: sainyaiḥ kaṇṭha cheda līne kabandhāt bhūyas bibhye valgataḥ sa asi pāṇeḥ

original: MSS_6632-1 utphālaṃ helayaiva drutamabhipatataḥ pūrvapṛthvīdharāgrād uccairarciścapeṭāhatibhiriva harerdhvāntadantī vidīrṇaḥ /
analyzed: utphālam helayā eva drutam abhipatataḥ pūrva pṛthvīdhara agrāt uccais arciḥ capeṭa āhatibhiḥ iva hareḥ dhvānta dantī vidīrṇaḥ

original: MSS_6632-2 raktāḥ kumbhairvimuktā iva sakaladṛśāṃ vismayaṃ saṃdadhānāḥ saṃdhyāśoṇatviṣastāḥ sapadi nipatitāstārakāstāḥ samastāḥ //
analyzed: raktāḥ kumbhaiḥ vimuktāḥ iva sakala dṛśām vismayam saṃdadhānāḥ saṃdhyā śoṇa tviṣaḥ tāḥ sapadi nipatitāḥ tārakāḥ tāḥ samastāḥ

original: MSS_6633-1 utphullakamalakesara- parāgagauradyute mama hi gauri /
analyzed: utphulla kamala kesara parāga gaura dyute mama hi gauri

original: MSS_6633-2 abhivāñchitaṃ prasiddhyatu bhagavati yuṣmatprasādena //
analyzed: abhivāñchitam prasiddhyatu bhagavati yuṣmad prasādena

original: MSS_6634-1 utphullagallapariphullamukhāravinda- saugandhyalubdhamadhupākulayā ratāṃte /
analyzed: utphulla galla pariphulla mukha aravinda saugandhya lubdha madhupa ākulayā rata ante

original: MSS_6634-2 saṃbhugnapīnakucacūcukayātigāḍha- māli gito girijayā giriśaḥ punātu //
analyzed: saṃbhugna pīna kuca cūcukayā ati gāḍha māli gitaḥ girijayā giriśaḥ punātu

original: MSS_6635-1 utphullagallairālāpāḥ kriyante durmukhaiḥ sukham /
analyzed: utphulla gallaiḥ ālāpāḥ kriyante durmukhaiḥ sukham

original: MSS_6635-2 jānāti hi punaḥ samyak kavireva kaveḥ śramam //
analyzed: jānāti hi punar samyak kaviḥ eva kaveḥ śramam

original: MSS_6636-1 utphullatāpicchamanoramaśrīr mātuḥ stananyastamukhāravindaḥ /
analyzed: utphulla tāpiccha manorama śrīḥ mātuḥ stana nyasta mukha aravindaḥ

original: MSS_6636-2 saṃcālayan pādasaroruhāgraṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kadā yāsyati dṛkpathaṃ me //
analyzed: saṃcālayan pāda saroruha agram kṛṣṇaḥ kadā yāsyati dṛkpatham me

original: MSS_6637-1 utphullapa kajaniṣaktalasaddvirephaḥ kiṃcidvinidrakumudotkarasaṃbhṛtaśrīḥ /
analyzed: utphulla pa kaja niṣakta lasat dvirephaḥ kiṃcid vinidra kumuda utkara saṃbhṛta śrīḥ

original: MSS_6637-2 āmūlanaddhavividhādbhutamālyamālaś citraṃ na kasya tanute lalitastamālaḥ //
analyzed: ā mūla naddha vividha adbhuta mālya mālaḥ citram na kasya tanute lalitaḥ tamālaḥ

original: MSS_6637A-1 utphullapa kajavanaṃ dadarśa vimalaṃ saraḥ /
analyzed: dadarśa vimalam saraḥ

original: MSS_6637A-2 sphāṭikaṃ vanadevīnām iva vibhramadarpaṇam //
analyzed: sphāṭikam vana devīnām iva vibhrama darpaṇam

original: MSS_6638-1 utphullapadmavadanāṃ dalatkuvalayekṣaṇām /
analyzed: utphulla padma vadanām dalat kuvalaya īkṣaṇām

original: MSS_6638-2 bandhūkakamanīyauṣṭhāṃ mandārastabakastanīm //
analyzed: bandhūka kamanīya oṣṭhām mandāra stabaka stanīm

original: MSS_6639-1 śirīṣasukumārā gīṃ pañcapuṣpamayīmiva /
analyzed: śirīṣa sukumārā gīm pañca puṣpa mayīm iva

original: MSS_6639-2 ekameva jagajjaitrīṃ smareṇa vihitāmiṣum //
analyzed: ekam eva jagat jaitrīm smareṇa vihitām iṣum

original: MSS_6640-1 utphullamānasarasīruhacārumadhya- niryanmadhuvratabharadyutihāriṇībhiḥ /
analyzed: utphulla māna sarasīruha cāru madhya niryat madhu vrata bhara dyuti hāriṇībhiḥ

original: MSS_6640-2 rādhāvilocanakaṭākṣaparamparābhir dṛṣṭo haristava sukhāni tanotu kāmam //
analyzed: rādhā vilocana kaṭākṣa paramparābhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ hariḥ tava sukhāni tanotu kāmam

original: MSS_6641-1 utphullaramya sahakāra rasālabandho kūjatpikāvalinivāsa tathā vidhehi /
analyzed: utphulla ramya sahakāra rasāla bandho kūjat pikā āvali nivāsa tathā vidhehi

original: MSS_6641-2 guñjadbhramadbhramarakastvayi baddhatṛṣṇo nānyān prayāti picumandakarīravṛkṣān //
analyzed: guñjat bhramat bhramarakaḥ tvayi baddha tṛṣṇaḥ na anyān prayāti picumanda karīra vṛkṣān

original: MSS_6642-1 utphullasthalanalinīvanādamuṣmād uddhūtaḥ sarasijasaṃbhavah parāgaḥ /
analyzed: utphulla sthala nalinī vanāt amuṣmāt uddhūtaḥ parāgaḥ

original: MSS_6642-2 vātyābhirviyati vivartitaḥ samantād ādhatte kanakamayātapatralakṣmīm //
analyzed: vātyābhiḥ viyati vivartitaḥ samantāt ādhatte kanaka mayāta patra lakṣmīm

original: MSS_6643-1 utphullā navamālikā madayati ghrāṇendriyāhlādinī jātaṃ dhūsarameva kiṃśukatarorāśyāmalaṃ jālakam /
analyzed: utphullā nava mālikā madayati ghrāṇa indriya āhlādinī jātam dhūsaram eva kiṃśuka taroḥ rāśyāmalam jālakam

original: MSS_6643-2 ācinvanti kadambakāni madhunaḥ pāṇḍūni mattālayaḥ strīṇāṃ pīnaghanastaneṣu kaṇavān svedaḥ karotyāspadam //
analyzed: ācinvanti kadambakāni madhunaḥ pāṇḍūni matta ālayaḥ strīṇām pīna ghana staneṣu kaṇavān svedaḥ karoti āspadam

original: MSS_6644-1 utphullāmalakomalotpaladalaśyāmāya rāmāmanaḥ- kāmāya prathamānanirmalaguṇagrāmāya rāmātmane /
analyzed: utphulla amala komala utpala dala śyāmāya rāmā manaḥ kāmāya pratha māna nirmala guṇa grāmāya rāmā ātmane

original: MSS_6644-2 yogārūḍhamunīndramānasasarohaṃsāya saṃsāravi- dhvaṃsāya sphuradojase raghukulottaṃsāya puṃse namaḥ //
analyzed: yoga ārūḍha muni indra mānasa saraḥ haṃsāya saṃsāravi dhvaṃsāya sphurat ojase raghu kula uttaṃsāya puṃse namaḥ

original: MSS_6645-1 utphullārjunasarjavāsitavahatpaurastyajhaṃjhāmarut pre kholaskhalitendranīlaśakalasnigdhāmbudaśreṇayaḥ /
analyzed: utphulla arjuna sarja vāsita vahat paurastya jhaṃjhā marut pre khola skhalita indranīla śakala snigdha ambuda śreṇayaḥ

original: MSS_6645-2 dhārāsiktavasuṃdharāsurabhayaḥ prāptāsta evādhunā gharmāmbhovigamāgamavyatikaraśrīvāhino vāsarāḥ //
analyzed: dhārā sikta vasuṃdharā surabhayaḥ prāptāḥ te eva adhunā gharmāmbhaḥ vigama āgama vyatikara śrī vāhinaḥ vāsarāḥ

original: MSS_6646-1 utphullairbakulairlava gamukulaiḥ śephālikākuḍmalair nīlāmbhojakulais tathā vicikilaiḥ krāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: utphullaiḥ bakulaiḥ lava ga mukulaiḥ śephālikā kuḍmalaiḥ nīla ambhoja kulaiḥ tathā vicikilaiḥ krāntam ca kāntam ca yat

original: MSS_6646-2 tasmin saurabhadhāmni dāmni kimidaṃ saugandhavandhyaṃ mudhā madhye mugdha kusumbhamumbhasi bhaven naivaiṣa yuktaḥ kramaḥ //
analyzed: tasmin saurabha dhāmni dāmni kim idam saugandha vandhyam mudhā madhye mugdha kusumbham umbhasi bhavet nā eva eṣa yuktaḥ kramaḥ

original: MSS_6647-1 utsa ge vā malinavasane saumya nikṣipya vīṇāṃ madgotrā kaṃ viracitapadaṃ geyamudgātukāmā /
analyzed: utsa ge vā malina vasane saumya nikṣipya vīṇām mad gotrā kam viracita padam geyam udgātu kāmā

original: MSS_6647-2 tantrīrārdrā nayanasalilaiḥ sārayitvā kathaṃcid bhūyobhūyaḥ svayamapi kṛtāṃ mūrcchanāṃ vismarantī //
analyzed: tantrīḥ ārdrāḥ nayana salilaiḥ sārayitvā kathaṃcid bhūyas bhūyas svayam api kṛtām mūrcchanām vismarantī

original: MSS_6648-1 utsa gaiḥ saikatānāṃ śakuniśatapadanyāsarekhā kitānāṃ jambūṣaṇḍāni nadyo dadhati pariṇamallambilambālakāni /
analyzed: saikatānām śakuni śata pada nyāsa rekhā kitānām jambu ṣaṇḍāni nadyaḥ dadhati pariṇamat lambi lamba alakāni

original: MSS_6648-2 yattoyāndoladolaḥ pulakayati tanuṃ tīrakastūrikaiṇa- prakrāntagranthiparṇagrasanaparimalotkandharo gandhavāhaḥ //
analyzed: yat toya āndola dolaḥ pulakayati tanum tīra kastūrikaiṇa prakrānta granthi parṇa grasana parimala utkandharaḥ gandhavāhaḥ

original: MSS_6649-1 utsannacchadirucchvasadvṛti galadbhitti skhalanmaṇḍali bhrāmyatkuṇḍali hiṇḍadākhu khuraliprakrīḍibhekāvali /
analyzed: utsanna chadiḥ ucchvasat vṛti galat bhitti skhalat maṇḍali bhrāmyat kuṇḍali hiṇḍat ākhu khurali prakrīḍi bheka āvali

original: MSS_6649-2 pañcaccarmacaṭaughapakṣatipuṭaprārabdhabhāṃbhāṃkṛti śrīmatsenakulāvataṃsa bhavataḥ śatrorivāsmadgṛham //
analyzed: pañcat carma caṭā ogha pakṣati puṭa prārabdha bhāṃbhāṃkṛti śrīmat sena kula avataṃsa bhavataḥ śatroḥ iva asmad gṛham

original: MSS_6650-1 utsannamāpaṇamamuṃ drakṣyāmo nirmalaiḥ kadā nayanaiḥ /
analyzed: utsannam āpaṇam amum drakṣyāmaḥ nirmalaiḥ kadā nayanaiḥ

original: MSS_6650-2 cintāmaṇikācakaṇau viparītaguṇāguṇau yatra //
MSS_6651-1 utsanno madhurasti kokilaravairutsannamastyetadapy utsannaṃ malayānilairidamapi prāgeva jānīmahe /
analyzed: utsannaḥ madhuḥ asti kokila ravaiḥ utsannam asti etat api utsannam malaya anilaiḥ idam api prāk eva jānīmahe

original: MSS_6651-2 pānthāstuṣyatha tāvataiva kimiti bhrāntā yadi prāṇiti stokenāpi manobhavo vigalatu prāṇeṣu śuṣko grahaḥ //
analyzed: pānthāḥ tuṣyatha tāvatā eva kim iti bhrāntā yadi prāṇiti stokena api manobhavaḥ vigalatu prāṇeṣu śuṣkaḥ grahaḥ

original: MSS_6652-1 utsara gakalitorukaṭārī- bhājirā uta bhayaṃkarabhālāḥ /
analyzed: utsara uta bhayaṃkara bhālāḥ

original: MSS_6652-2 santu pāyakagaṇā jaya taistvaṃ gāmagoharamilāpa ilāvī //
analyzed: santu pāyaka gaṇāḥ jaya taiḥ tvam gām ago haram ilāpaḥ ilāvī

original: MSS_6653-1 utsarpaddhūmalekhātviṣi tamasi manāgvisphuli gāyamānair udbhedaistārakāṇāṃ viyati parigate paścimāśāmupetā /
analyzed: utsarpat dhūma lekhā tviṣi tamasi manāk visphuli gāyamānaiḥ udbhedaiḥ tārakāṇām viyati parigate paścima āśām upetā

original: MSS_6653-2 khedenevānatāsu skhaladalirasanāsvabjinīpreyasīṣu prāyaḥ saṃdhyātapāgniṃ viśati dinapatau dahyate vāsaraśrīḥ //
analyzed: khedena iva ānatāsu skhalat ali rasanāsu abjinī preyasīṣu prāyas saṃdhyā ātapa agnim viśati dinapatau dahyate vāsara śrīḥ

original: MSS_6654-1 utsavādapi nīcānāṃ kalaho'pi sukhāyate /
analyzed: utsavāt api nīcānām kalahaḥ api sukhāyate

original: MSS_6654-2 kapardakārdhalābhena kuśalo bahu manyate //
analyzed: kapardaka ardha lābhena kuśalaḥ bahu manyate

original: MSS_6655-1 utsavādutsavaṃ yānti svargāt svargaṃ sukhāt sukham /
analyzed: utsavāt utsavam yānti svargāt svargam sukhāt sukham

original: MSS_6655-2 śraddhadhānāśca dāntāśca dhanāḍhyāḥ śubhakāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: śraddha dhānāḥ ca dāntāḥ ca dhana āḍhyāḥ śubha kāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_6656-1 utsave vyasane prāpte durbhikṣe śatrusaṃkaṭe /
analyzed: utsave vyasane prāpte durbhikṣe śatru saṃkaṭe

original: MSS_6656-2 rājadvāre śmaśāne ca yastiṣṭhati sa bāndhavaḥ //
analyzed: rājadvāre śmaśāne ca yaḥ tiṣṭhati sa bāndhavaḥ

original: MSS_6657-1 utsāraṇapriyatayā pariruddhasarva- dvāre gṛhe niranurodhatayā vasantaḥ /
analyzed: utsāraṇa priya tayā dvāre gṛhe niranurodha tayā vasantaḥ

original: MSS_6657-2 saṃpallaghūkṛtadhiyo'pratighapravṛtter dhigjānate na rabhasānniyater nipātam //
analyzed: saṃpad laghūkṛta dhiyaḥ upratigha pravṛtteḥ dhik jānate na rabhasāt niyateḥ nipātam

original: MSS_6658-1 utsārito hasitadīdhitibhiḥ kapolād ekāvalībhiravadhūta iva stanebhyaḥ /
analyzed: utsāritaḥ hasita dīdhitibhiḥ kapolāt eka āvalībhiḥ avadhūtaḥ iva stanebhyaḥ

original: MSS_6658-2 a geṣvalabdhaparibhogasukho'ndhakāro gṛhṇāti keśaracanāsu ruṣeva nārīḥ //
analyzed: gṛhṇāti keśa racanāsu ruṣā iva nārīḥ

original: MSS_6659-1 utsārya kuntalamapāsya dukūlakūlam unnāmya bāhulatikāmalasāstaruṇyaḥ /
analyzed: utsārya kuntalam apāsya dukūla kūlam unnāmya bāhu latikām alasāḥ taruṇyaḥ

original: MSS_6659-2 svedāmbusiktatanavaḥ spṛhayanti yasmai tasmai namaḥ sukṛtine malayānilāya //
analyzed: sveda ambu sikta tanavaḥ spṛhayanti yasmai tasmai namaḥ sukṛtine malaya anilāya

original: MSS_6660-1 utsāhaḥ syādrase hāsye tāle kandukasaṃjñake /
analyzed: utsāhaḥ syāt rase hāsye tāle kanduka saṃjñake

original: MSS_6660-2 vaṃśābhivṛddhikṛtpādas trayodaśamitākṣaraḥ /
analyzed: vaṃśa abhivṛddhi kṛt pādaḥ trayodaśa mita akṣaraḥ

original: MSS_6660-3 laghudvayaṃ virāmāntaṃ tāle kandukasaṃjñake //
MSS_6661-1 utsāhakārakasakhīvacanairvidhāya bhūṣāvidhiṃ kanakagauratarā gakeṣu /
analyzed: utsāha kāraka sakhī vacanaiḥ vidhāya bhūṣā vidhim kanaka gauratarāḥ ga keṣu

original: MSS_6661-2 prāṇeśvarasya sadanāya kṛtaprayāṇā mugdhā tathāpi hṛdi kampabharaṃ bibharti //
analyzed: prāṇeśvarasya sadanāya kṛta prayāṇā mugdhā tathā api hṛdi kampa bharam bibharti

original: MSS_6662-1 utsāhaprabhuśaktibhyāṃ mantraśaktyā ca bhārata /
analyzed: utsāha prabhu śaktibhyām mantra śaktyā ca bhārata

original: MSS_6662-2 upapanno nṛpo yāyād viparītamato'nyathā //
analyzed: upapannaḥ nṛpaḥ yāyāt viparītam atas nyathā

original: MSS_6663-1 utsāhavantaḥ puruṣā durbalā balinaṃ ripum /
analyzed: utsāhavantaḥ puruṣāḥ durbalāḥ balinam ripum

original: MSS_6663-2 haniṣyanti hi saṃyātā tathaite pañca kuñjaram //
analyzed: haniṣyanti hi saṃyātā tathā ete pañca kuñjaram

original: MSS_6664-1 utsāhavanto hi narā na loke
analyzed: utsāhavantaḥ hi narāḥ na loke

original: MSS_6664-2 sīdanti karmasvatiduṣkareṣu //
analyzed: sīdanti karmasu ati duṣkareṣu

original: MSS_6665-1 utsāhaśaktiyutavikramadhairyarāśir yo vetti goṣpadamivālpataraṃ samudram /
analyzed: utsāha śakti yuta vikrama dhairya rāśiḥ yaḥ vetti goṣpadam iva alpataram samudram

original: MSS_6665-2 valmīkaśṛ gasadṛśaṃ ca sadā nagendraṃ lakṣmīḥ svayaṃ tamupayāti na dīnasattvam //
analyzed: ca sadā naga indram lakṣmīḥ svayam tam upayāti na dīna sattvam

original: MSS_6666-1 utsāhaśaktihīnatvād vṛddho dīrghāmayas tathā /
analyzed: utsāha śakti hīna tvāt vṛddhaḥ dīrgha āmayaḥ tathā

original: MSS_6666-2 svaireva paribhūyete dvāvapyetāvasaṃśayam //
analyzed: svaiḥ eva paribhūyete dvau api etau asaṃśayam

original: MSS_6667-1 utsāhasaṃpannamadīrghasūtraṃ kriyāvidhijñaṃ vyasaneṣvasaktam /
analyzed: utsāha saṃpannam adīrghasūtram kriyā vidhi jñam vyasaneṣu asaktam

original: MSS_6667-2 śūraṃ kṛtajñaṃ dṛḍhasauhṛdaṃ ca lakṣmīḥ svayaṃ vāñchati vāsahetoḥ //
analyzed: śūram kṛtajñam dṛḍha sauhṛdam ca lakṣmīḥ svayam vāñchati vāsa hetoḥ

original: MSS_6668-1 utsāhasya prabhormantrasyaivaṃ śaktitrayaṃ jaguḥ /
analyzed: utsāhasya prabhoḥ mantrasya evam śakti trayam jaguḥ

original: MSS_6668-2 ātmanaḥ suhṛdaścaiva tanmitrasyodayās trayaḥ //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ suhṛdaḥ ca eva tad mitrasya udayāḥ trayaḥ

original: MSS_6669-1 utsāhātiśayaṃ vatsa tava bālyaṃ ca paśyataḥ /
analyzed: utsāha atiśayam vatsa tava bālyam ca paśyataḥ

original: MSS_6669-2 mama harṣaviṣādābhyām ākrantaṃ yugapanmanaḥ //
analyzed: mama harṣa viṣādābhyām ākrantam yugapad manaḥ

original: MSS_6670-1 utsāhitā sakalaśīdhumadena vaktum ardhodite navavadhūravalambitahrīḥ /
analyzed: utsāhitā sakala śīdhu madena vaktum ardha udite nava vadhūḥ avalambita hrīḥ

original: MSS_6670-2 ālījaneṣvanupasaṃhṛtavākyaśeṣā bhartuścakāra saviśeṣakutūhalatvam //
analyzed: ālī janeṣu anupasaṃhṛta vākyaśeṣā bhartuḥ cakāra sa viśeṣa kutūhala tvam

original: MSS_6671-1 utsāhoñjhitamanasāṃ rājñāṃ parimoṣiṇāṃ jigīṣūṇām /
analyzed: utsāha uñjhita manasām rājñām parimoṣiṇām jigīṣūṇām

original: MSS_6671-2 nirupāyodvignānāṃ sādhuścarake sadā śakunaḥ //
analyzed: nirupāya udvignānām sādhuḥ carake sadā śakunaḥ

original: MSS_6672-1 utsāhoddhatavibhramabhramarakavyāvṛttahārāntara- truṭyatsūtravimuktamauktikabharaḥ saktaḥ stanotsa gayoḥ /
analyzed: utsāha uddhata vibhrama bhramaraka vyāvṛtta hāra antara truṭyat sūtra vimukta mauktika bharaḥ saktaḥ stana utsa gayoḥ

original: MSS_6672-2 vaktrenducyutasaṃtatāmṛtakaṇākāraścakāra kṣaṇaṃ tasyā nṛttarasaśramoditaghanasvedāmbubimbaśriyam //
analyzed: vaktra indu cyuta saṃtata amṛta kaṇā ākāraḥ cakāra kṣaṇam tasyāḥ nṛtta rasa śrama udita ghana sveda ambu bimba śriyam

original: MSS_6673-1 utsāho balavānārya nāstyutsāhāt paraṃ balam /
analyzed: utsāhaḥ balavān ārya na asti utsāhāt param balam

original: MSS_6673-2 utsāhārambhamātreṇa jāyante sarvasaṃpadaḥ //
analyzed: utsāha ārambha mātreṇa jāyante sarva saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_6674-1 utsāho balavānārya nāstyutsāhāt paraṃ balam /
analyzed: utsāhaḥ balavān ārya na asti utsāhāt param balam

original: MSS_6674-2 sotsāhasya hi lokeṣu na kiṃcidapi durlabham //
analyzed: sa utsāhasya hi lokeṣu na kiṃcid api durlabham

original: MSS_6675-1 utsāho ripuvan mitram ālasyaṃ mitravad ripuḥ /
analyzed: utsāhaḥ ripuvat mitram ālasyam mitravat ripuḥ

original: MSS_6675-2 amṛtaṃ viṣavad vidyā'mṛtavad viṣama ganā //
analyzed: amṛtam viṣavat vidyā amṛtavat viṣama ganā

original: MSS_6676-1 utsiktaḥ kusumāsavaiḥ kumudinīṃ rājapriyāṃ puṣpiṇīm āli gan niśi nirbhayaṃ paricayaṃ kurvan punaḥ pallavaiḥ /
analyzed: utsiktaḥ kusuma āsavaiḥ kumudinīm rāja priyām puṣpiṇīm niśi nirbhayam paricayam kurvan punar pallavaiḥ

original: MSS_6676-2 yāvat pa kajsaurabhasvamakhilaṃ gṛhṇaṃllaghu prasthitas tāvat kalya upasthite marudayaṃ viṣvag bhayād dhāvati //
analyzed: yāvat kajsaurabha svam akhilam gṛhṇan laghu prasthitaḥ tāvat kalye upasthite marut ayam bhayāt dhāvati

original: MSS_6677-1 utsiktasya tapaḥparākramanidherasyāgamādekataḥ satsa gapriyatā ca vīrarabhasonmādaśca māṃ karṣataḥ /
analyzed: utsiktasya tapaḥ parākrama nidheḥ asya āgamāt ekatas sat sa ga priya tā ca vīra rabhasa unmādaḥ ca mām karṣataḥ

original: MSS_6677-2 vaidehīparirambha eṣa ca muhuścaitanyamāmīlayann ānandī haricandanenduśiśirasnigdho ruṇaddhyanyataḥ //
analyzed: vaidehī parirambhaḥ eṣa ca muhur caitanyam āmīlayan ānandī haricandana indu śiśira snigdhaḥ ruṇaddhi anyatas

original: MSS_6678-1 utsīderan prajāḥ sarvā na kuryuḥ karma ced yadi /
analyzed: utsīderan prajāḥ sarvāḥ na kuryuḥ karma ced yadi

original: MSS_6678-2 tathā hyetā na vardheran karma ced aphalaṃ bhaved //
analyzed: tathā hi etāḥ na vardheran karma ced aphalam bhavet

original: MSS_6679-1 utsṛjya kusumaśayanaṃ nalinīdalakalpitastanāvaraṇam /
analyzed: utsṛjya kusuma śayanam nalinī dala kalpita stana āvaraṇam

original: MSS_6679-2 kathamātape gamiṣyasi paribādhāpelavaira gaiḥ //
analyzed: katham ātape gamiṣyasi paribādhā pelavaiḥ

original: MSS_6680-1 utsṛjya gītamasamāpya vilāsalāsyam a kādapāsya sahasā maṇivallakīṃ ca /
analyzed: utsṛjya gītam a samāpya vilāsa lāsyam sahasā maṇi vallakīm ca

original: MSS_6680-2 atyunmanās tadavalokanakautukena vātāyanānyadhiruroha purandhrilokaḥ //
analyzed: ati unmanāḥ tad avalokana kautukena vātāyanāni adhiruroha purandhri lokaḥ

original: MSS_6680A-1 utsṛjya jalasarvasvaṃ vimalāḥ sitamūrtayaḥ /
analyzed: utsṛjya jala sarva svam vimalāḥ sita mūrtayaḥ

original: MSS_6680A-2 tatyajuścāmbaraṃ meghā vigrahaṃ yogino yathā //
analyzed: tatyajuḥ ca ambaram meghāḥ vigraham yoginaḥ yathā

original: MSS_6681-1 utsṛjya vinivartante jñātayaḥ suhṛdaḥ sutāḥ /
analyzed: utsṛjya vinivartante jñātayaḥ suhṛdaḥ sutāḥ

original: MSS_6681-2 apuṣpānaphalān vṛkṣān yathā tāta patatriṇaḥ //
analyzed: apuṣpān aphalān vṛkṣān yathā tāta patatriṇaḥ

original: MSS_6682-1 utsṛjya sādhuvṛttaṃ kuṭiladhiyā vañcitaḥ paro yena /
analyzed: utsṛjya sādhu vṛttam kuṭila dhiyā vañcitaḥ paraḥ yena

original: MSS_6682-2 ātmaiva mūḍhamatinā kṛtasukṛto vañcitastena //
analyzed: ātmā eva mūḍha matinā kṛta sukṛtaḥ vañcitaḥ tena

original: MSS_6683-1 utsṛjyāmbudhijāmukhāmbujasukhālokavrataṃ yaścirād devaḥ sevitavān sarojanayano nidrāṃ samudrāmbhasi /
analyzed: utsṛjya ambudhi jā mukha ambuja sukha āloka vratam yaḥ cirāt devaḥ sevitavān saroja nayanaḥ nidrām samudra ambhasi

original: MSS_6683-2 so'pyuttu gabhuja gabhogaśayanājjāgarti yasyotsave so'yaṃ śāradaśītarociṣi camatkāraḥ kathaṃ kathyatām //
analyzed: saḥ upi ud tu gabhuja gabhoga śayanāt jāgarti yasya utsave saḥ uyam śārada śīta rociṣi camatkāraḥ katham kathyatām

original: MSS_6684-1 utsṛṣṭamambujadṛśāmiva mānaratnam ādāya ṣaṭpadatilān madhuvāripūrān /
analyzed: utsṛṣṭam ambuja dṛśām iva māna ratnam ādāya ṣaṭpada tilān madhu vāri pūrān

original: MSS_6684-2 puṃskokilasya kalakūjitakaitavena saṃkalpavākyamayamātanute rasālaḥ //
analyzed: puṃskokilasya kala kūjita kaitavena saṃkalpa vākyam ayam ātanute rasālaḥ

original: MSS_6685-1 udakaṃ cāgnisaṃsṛṣṭakumbhasa gādyathaiva hi /
analyzed: udakam ca agni saṃsṛṣṭa kumbha sa gāt yathā eva hi

original: MSS_6685-2 udvegodvartanādauṣṇyaṃ bhajate tadvadeva hi //
analyzed: udvega udvartanāt auṣṇyam bhajate tadvat eva hi

original: MSS_6686-1 a gasa gāt tathā jīvo bhajate prākṛtān guṇān /
analyzed: tathā jīvaḥ bhajate prākṛtān guṇān

original: MSS_6686-2 aha kārābhibhūtaḥ san bhinnastebhyo'pi so'vyayaḥ //
analyzed: aha kārā abhibhūtaḥ san bhinnaḥ tebhyaḥ api saḥ vyayaḥ

original: MSS_6687-1 udakānalacaurebhyo mūṣakebhyo viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: udaka anala caurebhyaḥ mūṣakebhyaḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: MSS_6687-2 kaṣṭena likhitaṃ śāstraṃ yatnena paripālayet //
analyzed: kaṣṭena likhitam śāstram yatnena paripālayet

original: MSS_6688-1 udake sarvabījāni sarvadevā nijeśvare /
analyzed: udake sarva bījāni sarva devāḥ nija īśvare

original: MSS_6688-2 kalatre sarvasaukhyāni sarve dharmā dayāmayāḥ //
analyzed: kalatre sarva saukhyāni sarve dharmāḥ dayā mayāḥ

original: MSS_6689-1 udake sarvabījāni sarve devā hutāśane /
analyzed: udake sarva bījāni sarve devāḥ hutāśane

original: MSS_6689-2 kalatre sarvasaukhyāni sarvadānāni brāhmaṇe //
analyzed: kalatre sarva saukhyāni sarva dānāni brāhmaṇe

original: MSS_6690-1 udakyāpatitamlecchacāṇḍālādyabhibhāṣaṇe /
analyzed: udakyā patita mleccha cāṇḍāla ādi abhibhāṣaṇe

original: MSS_6690-2 mārjāramūṣakasparśe viṇmūtrotsargadarśane //
analyzed: mārjāra mūṣaka sparśe viṣ mūtra utsarga darśane

original: MSS_6691-1 udagragotāvatagotragauravo mahārajaḥ pūtabhaṭotkaṭacchaṭaḥ /
MSS_6691-2 svarūpasampattiparāstamanmathaḥ sa lakṣmaṇo lakṣitalakṣaṇojjvalaḥ //
analyzed: sva rūpa sampatti parāsta manmathaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ lakṣita lakṣaṇa ujjvalaḥ

original: MSS_6692-1 uda mukho vakti bhaṣanniśīthe dvijopapīḍāṃ maraṇaṃ gavāṃ ca /
analyzed: mukhaḥ vakti bhaṣan niśīthe dvija upapīḍām maraṇam gavām ca

original: MSS_6692-2 kumārikādūṣaṇagarbhapāta- vahnīn niśānte śivadi mukhaḥ syāt //
analyzed: kumārikā dūṣaṇa garbha pāta vahni niśā ante mukhaḥ syāt

original: MSS_6693-1 udañcatkāverīlahariṣu pariṣva gara ge luṭhantaḥ kuhūkaṇṭhīkaṇṭhīravaravalavatrāsitaproṣitebhāḥ /
analyzed: udañcat kāverī lahariṣu luṭhantaḥ

original: MSS_6693-2 amī caitre maitrāvaruṇi taruṇīkelika kellimallī- caladvallīhallīsakasurabhayaścaṇḍi cañcanti vātāḥ //
analyzed: amī caitre maitrāvaruṇi taruṇī kelika kelli mallī calat vallī hallīsaka surabhayaḥ caṇḍi cañcanti vātāḥ

original: MSS_6694-1 udañcatkvaṇaddhuṃkṛtikvāṇacañcan- maṇīmekhalādāmadṛpyannitambā /
analyzed: udañcat kvaṇat huṃkṛti kvāṇa cañcat maṇī mekhalā dāma dṛpyat nitambā

original: MSS_6694-2 kṛpāpā gamā galyapaṭṭābhiṣekair jaganma galaṃ jvālapā naḥ sahāyaḥ //
analyzed: kṛpā pāḥ galya paṭṭa abhiṣekaiḥ jaganma galam jvāla pāḥ naḥ sahāyaḥ

original: MSS_6695-1 udañcadgharmāṃśudyutiparicayonnidrabisinī- ghanāmodāhūtabhramarabharajha kāramadhurām /
analyzed: udañcat gharmāṃśu dyuti paricaya unnidra bisinī ghana āmoda āhūta bhramara bhara jha kāra madhurām

original: MSS_6695-2 apaśyatkāsāraśriyamamṛtavartipraṇayinīṃ sukhaṃ jīvatyandhūdaravivaravarti plavakulam //
analyzed: apaśyat kāsāra śriyam amṛta varti praṇayinīm sukham jīvati andhu udara vivara varti plava kulam

original: MSS_6696-1 udañcadvakṣojadvayataṭabharakṣobhitakaṭi sphuraddṛgbhyāṃ mandīkṛtavilasadindīvarayugam /
analyzed: udañcat vakṣoja dvaya taṭa bhara kṣobhita kaṭi sphurat dṛgbhyām mandīkṛta vilasat indīvara yugam

original: MSS_6696-2 samudyadbhrūbha gaṃ pravihitadhanurbha gamaniśaṃ vayastat padmākṣyāḥ kathamiva mano na vyathayatu //
analyzed: samudyat bhrū bha gam pravihita dhanuḥ bha gam aniśam vayaḥ tat padma akṣyāḥ katham iva manaḥ na vyathayatu

original: MSS_6697-1 udañcantāṃ vāco madhurimadhurīṇāḥ khalu na me na cāpyujjṛmbhantāṃ navabhaṇitayo bha gisubhagāḥ /
analyzed: udañcantām vācaḥ madhuri madhurīṇāḥ khalu na me na ca api ujjṛmbhantām nava bhaṇitayaḥ bha gi subhagāḥ

original: MSS_6697-2 kṣaṇaṃ stotravyājādapi yadi bhavantaṃ hṛdi naye tadātmā pāvitryaṃ niyatamiyataivāñcati mama //
analyzed: kṣaṇam stotra vyājāt api yadi bhavantam hṛdi naye tadā ātmā pāvitryam niyatam iyatā eva añcati mama

original: MSS_6698-1 udañcanmañjīradhvanimilitakāñcīkalaravaṃ milindālīguñjāravasubhagaśiñjānavalayam /
analyzed: udañcat mañjīra dhvani milita kāñcī kalaravam milinda ālī guñjā rava subhaga śiñjāna valayam

original: MSS_6698-2 galanmuktādāmastanavinihitasvedakaṇikaṃ rataṃ dhanyaṃ manye caladalakamindīvaradṛśaḥ //
analyzed: galat muktā dāma stana vinihita sveda kaṇikam ratam dhanyam manye calat alakam indīvara dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_6699-1 udañcaya dṛgañcalaṃ calatu cañcarīkoccayaḥ prapañcaya vacaḥsudhā śravaṇapālimāli gatu /
analyzed: udañcaya dṛś añcalam calatu cañcarīka uccayaḥ prapañcaya vacaḥ sudhā śravaṇa pāli māli gatu

original: MSS_6699-2 bhruvaṃ naṭaya nāgari tyajatu manmathaḥ kārmukaṃ mukhaṃ ca kuru saṃmukhaṃ vrajatu lāghavaṃ candramāḥ //
analyzed: bhruvam naṭaya nāgari tyajatu manmathaḥ kārmukam mukham ca kuru saṃmukham vrajatu lāghavam candramāḥ

original: MSS_6700-1 udañcaya dṛgañcalaṃ racaya ma galaṃ sarvataś cirāya samupāgataḥ purata eṣa te vallabhaḥ /
analyzed: udañcaya dṛś añcalam racaya ma galam sarvatas cirāya samupāgataḥ puratas eṣa te vallabhaḥ

original: MSS_6700-2 iti priyagirā śrutīpulakadanture kurvatī prakaśayati no dṛśau priyasakhī mṛṣāśa kayā //
analyzed: iti priya girā śrutī pulaka danture kurvatī prakaśayati naḥ dṛśau priya sakhī mṛṣā āśa kayā

original: MSS_6701-1 udadhiravadhirurvyāstaṃ hanūmāṃstatāra niravadhi gaganaṃ cettvāṇḍakośe vilīnam /
analyzed: udadhiḥ avadhiḥ urvyāḥ tam hanūmān tatāra niravadhi gaganam ced tu aṇḍakośe vilīnam

original: MSS_6701-2 iti parimitimanto bhānti sarve'pi bhāvāḥ sa tu niravadhirekaḥ sajjanānāṃ vivekaḥ //
analyzed: iti parimitimantaḥ bhānti sarve api bhāvāḥ sa tu niravadhiḥ ekaḥ sat janānām vivekaḥ

original: MSS_6702-1 udadheriva ratnāni tejāṃsīva vivasvataḥ /
analyzed: udadheḥ iva ratnāni tejāṃsi iva vivasvataḥ

original: MSS_6702-2 stutibhyo vyatiricyante dūrāṇi caritāni te //
analyzed: stutibhyaḥ vyatiricyante dūrāṇi caritāni te

original: MSS_6703-1 udanvacchinnā bhūḥ sa ca nidhirapāṃ yojanaśataṃ sadā pānthaḥ pūṣā gaganaparimāṇaṃ kalayati /
analyzed: udanvat chinnā bhūḥ sa ca nidhiḥ apām yojana śatam sadā pānthaḥ pūṣā gagana parimāṇam kalayati

original: MSS_6703-2 iti prāyo bhāvāḥ sphuradavadhimudrāmukulitāḥ satāṃ prajñonmeṣaḥ punarayamasīmā vijayate //
analyzed: iti prāyas bhāvāḥ sphurat avadhi mudrā mukulitāḥ satām prajñā unmeṣaḥ punar ayam asīmāḥ vijayate

original: MSS_6704-1 udanvāniva yo'kṣobhyo jñāyate saṃśritaiḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: udanvān iva yaḥ ukṣobhyaḥ jñāyate saṃśritaiḥ prabhuḥ

original: MSS_6704-2 kā hrīstato'nyā so'nyairyat teṣāmagre'bhibhūyate //
analyzed: kā hrīḥ tatonyā sā unyaiḥ yat teṣām agre bhūyate

original: MSS_6705-1 udamajji kaiṭabhajitaḥ śayanād apanidrapāṇḍurasarojarucā /
analyzed: udamajji kaiṭabhajitaḥ śayanāt apanidra pāṇḍura saroja rucā

original: MSS_6705-2 prathamaprabuddhanadarājasutā- vadanenduneva tuhinadyutinā //
analyzed: prathama prabuddha nada rāja sutā vadana indunā iva tuhina dyutinā

original: MSS_6706-1 udayaṃ prāpya tīkṣṇatvād duṣprekṣyatvamupeyuṣaḥ /
analyzed: udayam prāpya tīkṣṇa tvāt duṣprekṣya tvam upeyuṣaḥ

original: MSS_6706-2 pādāntike vasumato na hi mānī niṣīdati //
analyzed: pāda antike vasumataḥ na hi mānī niṣīdati

original: MSS_6707-1 udayaṃ saṃhatā eva saṃhatā eva ca kṣayam /
analyzed: udayam saṃhatāḥ eva saṃhatāḥ eva ca kṣayam

original: MSS_6707-2 prayāntaḥ spṛhaṇīyatvaṃ tantriṇaḥ kasya nāgaman //
analyzed: prayāntaḥ spṛhaṇīya tvam tantriṇaḥ kasya nā agaman

original: MSS_6708-1 udayagirigatāyāṃ prākprabhāpāṇḍutāyām anusarati niśīthe śṛ gamastācalasya /
analyzed: udayagiri gatāyām prāc prabhā pāṇḍu tāyām anusarati niśīthe

original: MSS_6708-2 jayati kimapi tejaḥ sāṃprataṃ vyomamadhye salilamiva vibhinnaṃ jāhnavaṃ yāmunaṃ ca //
analyzed: jayati kim api tejaḥ sāṃpratam vyoma madhye salilam iva vibhinnam jāhnavam yāmunam ca

original: MSS_6709-1 udayagiritaṭasthaḥ padminīrbodhayitvā mṛdutarakiraṇāgraistāḥ svayaṃ copabhujya /
analyzed: udayagiri taṭa sthaḥ padminīḥ bodhayitvā mṛdutara kiraṇa agraiḥ tāḥ svayam ca upabhujya

original: MSS_6709-2 malinamadhupasa gāt tāsu saṃjātakopaḥ kṛtarudhiravirocirbhānurastaṃ prayātaḥ //
analyzed: gāt tāsu saṃjāta kopaḥ kṛta rudhira virociḥ bhānuḥ astam prayātaḥ

original: MSS_6710-1 udayagiriśiraḥstho nidrayā mūḍhametaj jagadagadamaśeṣaṃ nirmimīte'niśaṃ yaḥ /
analyzed: udayagiri śiraḥ sthaḥ nidrayā mūḍham etat jagat agadam aśeṣam nirmimīta iniśam yaḥ

original: MSS_6710-2 amitatamitamisroddāmadāridryahāri- prasṛmarakiraṇaughaḥ syānmude vaḥ sa devaḥ //
analyzed: amita tami tamisrā uddāma dāridrya hāri prasṛmara kiraṇa oghaḥ syāt mude vaḥ sa devaḥ

original: MSS_6711-1 udayagūḍhaśaśā kamarīcibhis tamasi dūramitaḥ pratisārite /
analyzed: udaya gūḍha śaśā ka marīcibhiḥ tamasi dūram itas pratisārite

original: MSS_6711-2 alakasaṃyamanādiva locane harati me harivāhanadi mukham //
analyzed: alaka saṃyamanāt iva locane harati me harivāha nadi mukham

original: MSS_6712-1 udayataṭāntaritamiyaṃ prācī sūcayati di niśānātham /
analyzed: udaya taṭa antaritam iyam prācī sūcayati niśānātham

original: MSS_6712-2 paripāṇḍunā mukhena priyamiva hṛdayasthitaṃ ramaṇī //
analyzed: paripāṇḍunā mukhena priyam iva hṛdaya sthitam ramaṇī

original: MSS_6713-1 udayati kalamandraiḥ kaṇṭhatālairalīnāṃ kumudamukulakeṣu vyañjayanna gahārān /
analyzed: udayati kala mandraiḥ kaṇṭha tālaiḥ alīnām kumuda mukulakeṣu vyañjayan na gahārān

original: MSS_6713-2 madamukharacakorītoyakarmāntiko'yaṃ tuhinaruciradhāmā dakṣiṇaṃ lokacakṣuḥ //
analyzed: mada mukhara cakorī toya karmāntika uyam tuhina rucira dhāmā dakṣiṇam loka cakṣuḥ

original: MSS_6714-1 udayati taḍiccitraṃ mitraṃ rateḥ kamaladvayī kusumitanavastambhe rambhe vidhāya tanoradhaḥ /
analyzed: udayati taḍit citram mitram rateḥ kamala dvayī kusumita nava stambhe rambhe vidhāya tanoḥ adhas

original: MSS_6714-2 taḍiti valati vyoma vyomāśrayaṃ ca giridvayaṃ giriparisare kambuḥ kambau kalānidhimaṇḍalam //
analyzed: taḍiti valati vyoma vyoma āśrayam ca giri dvayam giri parisare kambuḥ kambau kalānidhi maṇḍalam

original: MSS_6715-1 udayati tapane'pi cet tamisraṃ vada kuta eva dinakṣapāvivekaḥ /
analyzed: udayati tapane pi ced tamisram vada kutas eva dina kṣapā vivekaḥ

original: MSS_6715-2 bhagavati yadi karma durnivāryaṃ tava caraṇasmaraṇena sādhyate kim //
analyzed: bhagavati yadi karma durnivāryam tava caraṇa smaraṇena sādhyate kim

original: MSS_6716-1 udayati taruṇimataraṇī śaiśavaśaśini praśāntimāyāte /
analyzed: udayati taruṇima taraṇī śaiśava śaśini praśāntim āyāte

original: MSS_6716-2 kucacakravākayugalaṃ taruṇitaṭinyāṃ mitho milati //
analyzed: kuca cakravāka yugalam taruṇi taṭinyām mithas milati

original: MSS_6717-1 udayati navanītapiṇḍapāṇḍuḥ kumudavanānyavaghaṭṭayan karāgraiḥ /
analyzed: udayati navanīta piṇḍa pāṇḍuḥ kumuda vanāni avaghaṭṭayan kara agraiḥ

original: MSS_6717-2 udayagiritaṭasphuṭāṭṭahāso rajanivadhūmukhadarpaṇaḥ śaśā kaḥ //
analyzed: udayagiri taṭa sphuṭa aṭṭahāsaḥ rajani vadhū mukha darpaṇaḥ śaśā kaḥ

original: MSS_6718-1 udayati yadi bhānuḥ paścime digvibhāge pracalati yadi meruḥ śītatām yāti vahniḥ /
analyzed: udayati yadi bhānuḥ paścime digvibhāge pracalati yadi meruḥ śīta tām yāti vahniḥ

original: MSS_6718-2 vikasati yadi padmaṃ parvatāgre śilāyāṃ na bhavati punaruktaṃ bhāṣitaṃ sajjanānām //
analyzed: vikasati yadi padmam parvata agre śilāyām na bhavati punar uktam bhāṣitam sat janānām

original: MSS_6719-1 udayati vitatordhvaraśmirajjā- vahimarucau himadhāmni yāti cāstam /
analyzed: udayati vitata ūrdhva raśmi rajjā vahima rucau hima dhāmni yāti ca astam

original: MSS_6719-2 vahati girirayaṃ vilambighaṇṭā- dvayaparivāritavāraṇendralīlām //
analyzed: vahati giri rayam vilambi ghaṇṭā dvaya parivārita vāraṇa indra līlām

original: MSS_6720-1 udayati hi śaśā kaḥ kāminīgaṇḍapāṇḍur grahagaṇaparivāro rājamārgapradīpaḥ /
analyzed: udayati hi śaśā kaḥ kāminī gaṇḍa pāṇḍuḥ graha gaṇa parivāraḥ rājamārga pradīpaḥ

original: MSS_6720-2 timiranikaramadhye raśmayo yasya gaurāḥ srutajala iva pa ke kṣīradhārāḥ patanti //
analyzed: timira nikara madhye raśmayaḥ yasya gaurāḥ sruta jale iva ke kṣīra dhārāḥ patanti

original: MSS_6721-1 udayati hṛdi yasya naiva lajjā na ca karuṇā na ca ko'pi bhītileśaḥ /
analyzed: udayati hṛdi yasya nā eva lajjā na ca karuṇā na ca kopi bhīti leśaḥ

original: MSS_6721-2 bakulamukulakośakomalāṃ māṃ punarapi tasya kare na pātayethāḥ //
analyzed: bakula mukula kośa komalām mām punar api tasya kare na pātayethāḥ

original: MSS_6722-1 udayadudayadīkṣaṇāya patyuś capaladṛśastrapayā nirudhyamānam /
analyzed: udayat udaya dīkṣaṇāya patyuḥ capala dṛśaḥ trapayā nirudhyamānam

original: MSS_6722-2 mana iva kṛpaṇasya dānakāle kati na tatāna gatāgatāni cakṣuḥ //
analyzed: manaḥ iva kṛpaṇasya dāna kāle kati na tatāna gata āgatāni cakṣuḥ

original: MSS_6723-1 udayantu nāma meghā bhavatu niśā varṣamavirataṃ patatu /
analyzed: udayantu nāma meghāḥ bhavatu niśā varṣam aviratam patatu

original: MSS_6723-2 gaṇayāmi naiva sarvaṃ dayitābhimukhena hṛdayena //
analyzed: gaṇayāmi nā eva sarvam dayitā abhimukhena hṛdayena

original: MSS_6724-1 udayanneṣa savitā padmeṣvarpayati śriyam /
analyzed: udayan eṣa savitā padmeṣu arpayati śriyam

original: MSS_6724-2 vibhāvayitumṛddhīnāṃ phalaṃ suhṛdanugraham //
analyzed: vibhāvayitum ṛddhīnām phalam suhṛd anugraham

original: MSS_6725-1 udayaprabhasūrīndraḥ prathitaḥ pratibhodayaḥ /
MSS_6725-2 nānādivyaprabandhānāṃ nirmātāyaṃ virājate //
analyzed: nānā divya prabandhānām nirmātā ayam virājate

original: MSS_6726-1 udayaprabhasūrīndre prakāśayati bhūtalam /
MSS_6726-2 apare vibudhāḥ sarve niṣprabhā iva sarvataḥ //
analyzed: apare vibudhāḥ sarve niṣprabhāḥ iva sarvatas

original: MSS_6727-1 udayamayate di mālinyaṃ nirākurutetarāṃ nayati nidhanaṃ nidrāmudrāṃ pravartayati kriyāḥ /
analyzed: mālinyam nirākuruta itarām nayati nidhanam nidrāmudrām pravartayati kriyāḥ

original: MSS_6727-2 racayatitarāṃ svairācārapravartanakartanaṃ bata bata lasattejaḥpuñjo vibhāti vibhākaraḥ //
analyzed: racayatitarām svaira ācāra pravartana kartanam bata bata lasat tejaḥ puñjaḥ vibhāti vibhākaraḥ

original: MSS_6728-1 udayamuditadīptiryāti yaḥ saṃgatau me patati na varaminduḥ so'parāmeṣa gatvā /
analyzed: udayam udita dīptiḥ yāti yaḥ saṃgatau me patati na varam induḥ sa uparām eṣa gatvā

original: MSS_6728-2 smitaruciriva sadyaḥ sābhyasūyaṃ prabheti sphurati viśadameṣā pūrvakāṣṭhā ganāyāḥ //
analyzed: smita ruciḥ iva sadyas sa abhyasūyam prabhā iti sphurati viśadam eṣā pūrva kāṣṭhā ganāyāḥ

original: MSS_6729-1 udayaśikhariśṛ gaprā gaṇeṣveṣa ri gan sakamalamukhahāsaṃ vīkṣitaḥ padminībhiḥ /
analyzed: udaya śikhari śṛ ga prā gaṇeṣu eṣa ri gan sa kamala mukha hāsam vīkṣitaḥ padminībhiḥ

original: MSS_6729-2 vitatamṛdukarāgraḥ śabdayantyā vayobhiḥ paripatati divo' ke helayā bālasūryaḥ //
analyzed: vitata mṛdu kara agraḥ śabdayantyā vayobhiḥ paripatati ke helayā bāla sūryaḥ

original: MSS_6730-1 udayasiṃha dharādhipatau tvayi sphurati kiṃ raviṇā vidhunāpi vā /
analyzed: udayasiṃha dharādhipatau tvayi sphurati kim raviṇā vidhunā api vā

original: MSS_6730-2 svamahasā hi vikāśayase jagat svayaśasā ca suśītalayasyapi //
analyzed: sva mahasā hi vikāśayase jagat sva yaśasā ca suśītalayasi api

original: MSS_6731-1 udayasthaḥ sahasrāṃśur dṛṣṭerāyāti gamyatām /
analyzed: udaya sthaḥ sahasrāṃśuḥ dṛṣṭeḥ āyāti gamyatām

original: MSS_6731-2 atiriktaṃ kadā kaṃ vā la ghayanti na yoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: atiriktam kadā kam vā na yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_6732-1 udayādreruḍḍīno dinaṃ bhramitvā pata go'yam /
analyzed: udayādreḥ uḍḍīnaḥ dinam bhramitvā pata goyam

original: MSS_6732-2 adya pradoṣasamaye vaḍavājvalane juhoti dehaṃ svam //
analyzed: adya pradoṣa samaye vaḍavā jvalane juhoti deham svam

original: MSS_6733-1 udayāstau mūlākhyau uttarayāmyau dhruvanivāsanāmānau /
analyzed: udaya astau mūla ākhyau uttara yāmyau dhruva nivāsa nāmānau

original: MSS_6733-2 nairṛtavāyavyau ca prayāṇacarakāhvayau teṣām //
analyzed: nairṛta vāyavyau ca prayāṇa caraka āhvayau teṣām

original: MSS_6734-1 udaye savitārakto raktaścāstamaye tathā /
analyzed: udaye savitā āraktaḥ raktaḥ ca astamaye tathā

original: MSS_6734-2 saṃpattau ca vipattau ca mahatāmekarūpatā //
analyzed: saṃpattau ca vipattau ca mahatām eka rūpa tā

original: MSS_6735-1 udaraṃ natamadhyapṛṣṭhatā- sphuṭada guṣṭhapadena muṣṭinā /
analyzed: udaram nata madhya pṛṣṭha tā guṣṭha padena muṣṭinā

original: MSS_6735-2 catura gulamadhyanirgata- trivalibhrāji kṛtaṃ damasvasuḥ //
analyzed: tri vali bhrāji kṛtam damasvasuḥ

original: MSS_6736-1 udaraṃ parimāti muṣṭinā kutukī ko'pi damasvasuḥ kimu /
analyzed: udaram parimāti muṣṭinā kutukī kopī damasvasuḥ kimu

original: MSS_6736-2 dhṛtataccatura gulīva yad valibhirbhāti sahemakāñcibhiḥ //
analyzed: yat valibhiḥ bhāti sa hema kāñcibhiḥ

original: MSS_6737-1 udara eva dhṛtaḥ kimudanvatā na viṣamo vaḍavānalavad vidhuḥ /
analyzed: udare eva dhṛtaḥ kim udanvatā na viṣamaḥ vaḍavānala vat vidhuḥ

original: MSS_6737-2 viṣavadujjhitamapyamunā na sa smaraharaḥ kimamuṃ bubhuje vibhuḥ //
analyzed: viṣa vat ujjhitam api amunā na sa smaraharaḥ kim amum bubhuje vibhuḥ

original: MSS_6738-1 udaradarīyaṃ gahanā yadgatamakhilaṃ vilīyate kvacana /
analyzed: udaradarī iyam gahanā yat gatam akhilam vilīyate kvacana

original: MSS_6738-2 ekā tatra ca bhujagī vilāpayati kaṃ na sā duṣṭā //
analyzed: ekā tatra ca bhujagī vilāpayati kam na sā duṣṭā

original: MSS_6739-1 udaradvayabharaṇabhayād ardhā gāhitadāraḥ /
analyzed: udara dvaya bharaṇa bhayāt ardhā gāhitadāraḥ

original: MSS_6739-2 yadi naivaṃ tasya sutaḥ kathamadyāpi kumāraḥ //
analyzed: yadi nā evam tasya sutaḥ katham adya api kumāraḥ

original: MSS_6740-1 udarambharitā loke tavaiva nānyasya duḥśakā dṛṣṭā /
analyzed: udarambharitā loke tava eva na anyasya duḥśakā dṛṣṭā

original: MSS_6740-2 utsṛṣṭapurīṣamapi svādūkurvan varāha yad bhu kṣe //
analyzed: utsṛṣṭa purīṣam api svādūkurvan varāha yat bhu

original: MSS_6741-1 udarasyedamaṇutvaṃ sahajagurutvaṃ yadi nedaṃ hṛdayasya /
analyzed: udarasya idam aṇu tvam sahaja guru tvam yadi nā idam hṛdayasya

original: MSS_6741-2 svārthe kathamalasatvaṃ kathamanusatvaṃ hitakaraṇe matirasya //
analyzed: svārthe katham alasa tvam katham anusa tvam hita karaṇe matiḥ asya

original: MSS_6742-1 udarārthaṃ na yatkiṃcin niṣeveta kadācana /
analyzed: udara artham na yat kiṃcid niṣeveta kadācana

original: MSS_6742-2 na haṃso varṇasāmye'pi bakavan matsyabhug yataḥ //
analyzed: na haṃsaḥ varṇa sāmye pi baka vat matsya bhuj yatas

original: MSS_6743-1 udarkabhūtimicchadbhiḥ sadbhiḥ khalu na dṛśyate /
analyzed: udarka bhūtim icchadbhiḥ sadbhiḥ khalu na dṛśyate

original: MSS_6743-2 caturthīcandralekheva parastrībhālapaṭṭikā //
MSS_6744-1 udasya dhairyaṃ dayitena sādaraṃ prasāditāyāḥ karavārivāritam /
analyzed: udasya dhairyam dayitena sa ādaram prasāditāyāḥ kara vāri vāritam

original: MSS_6744-2 mukhaṃ nimīlannayanaṃ natabhruvaḥ śriyaṃ sapatnīvadanādivādade //
analyzed: mukham nimīlat nayanam nata bhruvaḥ śriyam sapatnī vadanāt iva ādade

original: MSS_6745-1 udasyoccaiḥ pucchaṃ śirasi nihitaṃ jīrṇajaṭile yadṛcchāvyāpannadvipapiśitaleśāḥ kavalitāḥ /
analyzed: udasya uccais puccham śirasi nihitam jīrṇa jaṭile yadṛcchā vyāpanna dvipa piśita leśāḥ kavalitāḥ

original: MSS_6745-2 guhāgarbhe śūnye suciramuṣitaṃ jambuka sakhe tadetat kim kurmo yadasi na gataḥ siṃhasamatām //
analyzed: guhā garbhe śūnye su cira muṣitam jambuka sakhe tat etat kim kurmaḥ yat asi na gataḥ siṃha sama tām

original: MSS_6746-1 udāyudho yāvadahaṃ tāvadanyaiḥ kimāyudhaiḥ /
analyzed: udāyudhaḥ yāvat aham tāvat anyaiḥ kim āyudhaiḥ

original: MSS_6746-2 yadvā na siddhamastreṇa mama tat kena setsyati //
analyzed: yat vā na siddham astreṇa mama tat kena setsyati

original: MSS_6747-1 udāracaritāt tyāgī yācitaḥ kṛpaṇo'dhikaḥ /
MSS_6747-2 eko dhanaṃ tataḥ prāṇān anyaḥ prāṇāṃs tato dhanam //
analyzed: ekaḥ dhanam tatas prāṇān anyaḥ prāṇān tatas dhanam

original: MSS_6748-1 udārasya tṛṇaṃ vittaṃ śūrasya maraṇaṃ trṇam /
analyzed: udārasya tṛṇam vittam śūrasya maraṇam trṇam

original: MSS_6748-2 viraktasya tṛṇaṃ bhāryā niḥspṛhasya tṛṇaṃ jagat //
analyzed: viraktasya tṛṇam bhāryā niḥspṛhasya tṛṇam jagat

original: MSS_6749-1 udārāṃs tvadṛte nānyān prapaśyāmyayi pārvati /
analyzed: udārān tvat ṛte na anyān prapaśyāmi ayi pārvati

original: MSS_6749-2 śrīrāmabhaktimāṇikyam adeyamapi dehi me //
analyzed: śrī rāma bhakti māṇikyam adeyam api dehi me

original: MSS_6750-1 udārairmandārai racitaśikharaṃ candraśikharaṃ samabhyarcya premṇā vipulapulakālaṃkṛtatanuḥ /
analyzed: udāraiḥ mandāraiḥ racita śikharam candra śikharam samabhyarcya premṇā vipula pulaka alaṃkṛta tanuḥ

original: MSS_6750-2 kadā gandhābandhapramadamuditoddāmamadhupa- sphuradguñjāgarbhairvibhumabhibhajeyaṃ nutipadaiḥ //
analyzed: kadā gandhābandha pramada mudita uddāma madhupa sphurat guñjā garbhaiḥ vibhum abhibhajeyam nuti padaiḥ

original: MSS_6751-1 udāsīnālīnāmapi vacasi līnātanulasat trapādhīnā dīnālapanapadavīnāyakadhṛtā /
analyzed: udāsīna ālīnām api vacasi līnā a tanu lasat trapā adhīnā dīna lapana padavī nāyaka dhṛtā

original: MSS_6751-2 kavīnāmāsīnā hṛdi kumudinīnāthavadanā navīnā mīnākṣī vyathayati munīnāmapi manaḥ //
analyzed: kavīnām āsīnā hṛdi kumudinī nātha vadanā navīnā mīna akṣī vyathayati munīnām api manaḥ

original: MSS_6752-1 udāsīno devo madanamathanaḥ sajjanakule kalikrīḍāsaktaḥ kṛtaparijanaḥ prākṛtajanaḥ /
analyzed: udāsīnaḥ devaḥ madana mathanaḥ sat jana kule kali krīḍā saktaḥ kṛta parijanaḥ prākṛta janaḥ

original: MSS_6752-2 iyaṃ mlecchākrāntā tridaśataṭinī cobhayataṭe kathaṃ bhrātaḥ sthātā kathaya sukṛtin kutra vibhayaḥ //
analyzed: iyam mleccha ākrāntā tridaśa taṭinī ca ubhaya taṭe katham bhrātar sthātā kathaya su kṛtin kutra vibhayaḥ

original: MSS_6753-1 udāharaṇamāśīḥṣu prathame te manasvinām /
analyzed: udāharaṇam āśīḥṣu prathame te manasvinām

original: MSS_6753-2 śuṣke'śanirivāmarṣo yairarātiṣu pātyate //
analyzed: śuṣka iśaniḥ iva amarṣaḥ yaiḥ arātiṣu pātyate

original: MSS_6754-1 uditaṃ priyāṃ prati sahārdamiti śradadhīyata priyatamena vacaḥ /
analyzed: uditam priyām prati sahārdam iti śradadhīyata priyatamena vacaḥ

original: MSS_6754-2 vidite gite hi pura eva jane sapadīritāḥ khalu laganti giraḥ //
analyzed: vidite gite hi puras eva jane sapadi īritāḥ khalu laganti giraḥ

original: MSS_6755-1 uditaṃ maṇḍalamindo ruditaṃ sadyo viyogivargeṇa /
analyzed: uditam maṇḍalam indoḥ ruditam sadyas viyogi vargeṇa

original: MSS_6755-2 muditaṃ ca sakalalalanā- cūḍāmaṇiśāsanena madanena //
analyzed: muditam ca sakala lalanā cūḍāmaṇi śāsanena madanena

original: MSS_6756-1 uditaḥ samayaḥ śrayate'stamayaṃ kṛtakaṃ sakalaṃ labhate vilayam /
analyzed: uditaḥ samayaḥ śrayate astamayam kṛtakam sakalam labhate vilayam

original: MSS_6756-2 sakalāni phalāni patanti taroḥ sakalā jaladhiṃ samupaiti nadī //
analyzed: sakalāni phalāni patanti taroḥ sakalā jaladhim samupaiti nadī

original: MSS_6757-1 uditamudito hanti dhvāntaṃ sahasrakaraḥ karair nihatanihitaṃ bhūyo bhūyastamaḥ parijṛmbhate /
analyzed: uditam uditaḥ hanti dhvāntam sahasrakaraḥ karaiḥ nihata nihitam bhūyas bhūyas tamaḥ parijṛmbhate

original: MSS_6757-2 viramati tamo nedaṃ nāyaṃ niṣīdati bhānumān na khalu vikasadvairā dhīrāḥ kathaṃcidudāsate //
analyzed: viramati tamaḥ na idam na ayam niṣīdati bhānumān na khalu vikasat vairāḥ dhīrāḥ kathaṃcid udāsate

original: MSS_6758-1 uditavati dvijarāje kasya na hṛdaye mudaḥ padaṃ dadhati /
analyzed: uditavati dvijarāje kasya na hṛdaye mudaḥ padam dadhati

original: MSS_6758-2 saṃkucasi kamala yadayaṃ hara hara vāmo vidhirbhavataḥ //
analyzed: saṃkucasi kamala yat ayam hara hara vāmaḥ vidhiḥ bhavataḥ

original: MSS_6759-1 uditavati parasmin pratyaye śāstrayonau gatavati vilayaṃ ca prākṛte'tiprapañce /
analyzed: uditavati parasmin pratyaye śāstra yonau gatavati vilayam ca prākṛta iti prapañce

original: MSS_6759-2 sapadi padamudītaṃ kevalaḥ pratyayo yas tadiyaditi ca vaktuṃ kaḥ kṣamaḥ paṇḍito'pi //
analyzed: sapadi padam udītam kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ yaḥ tat iyat iti ca vaktum kaḥ kṣamaḥ paṇḍitaḥ api

original: MSS_6760-1 udite dṛṣṭisukhe tvayi śaśinīva bhavanti candrakāntāni /
analyzed: udite dṛṣṭi sukhe tvayi śaśini iva bhavanti candra kāntāni

original: MSS_6760-2 vadanānyarinārīṇām aviralajalabinduvarṣīṇi //
analyzed: vadanāni ari nārīṇām avirala jala bindu varṣīṇi

original: MSS_6761-1 udite'pi tavāvanīndra tejas tapane sphāragabhastibhārabhāji /
analyzed: udite ipi tava avanīndra tejaḥ tapane sphāra gabhasti bhāra bhāji

original: MSS_6761-2 tava vairinṛpāyaśastamāṃsi sphuradujjṛmbhitamācaranti citram //
analyzed: tava vairi nṛpa ayaśaḥ tamāṃsi sphurat ujjṛmbhitam ācaranti citram

original: MSS_6762-1 udite bhāskare lakṣyaṃ paścimāyāṃ niveśayet /
analyzed: udite bhāskare lakṣyam paścimāyām niveśayet

original: MSS_6762-2 aparāhṇe ca kartavyaṃ lakṣyaṃ pūrvadigāśritam //
analyzed: aparāhṇe ca kartavyam lakṣyam pūrva diś āśritam

original: MSS_6763-1 uditairanyapuṣṭānām ārutairme hataṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: uditaiḥ anya puṣṭānām ārutaiḥ me hatam manaḥ

original: MSS_6763-2 uditairapi te dūti mārutairapi dakṣiṇaiḥ //
analyzed: uditaiḥ api te dūti mārutaiḥ api dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: MSS_6764-1 udito'pi tuhinagahane gaganaprānte na dīpyate tapanaḥ /
analyzed: uditaḥ api tuhina gahane gagana prānte na dīpyate tapanaḥ

original: MSS_6764-2 kaṭhinaghṛtapūrapūrṇe śarāvaśirasi pradīpa iva //
analyzed: kaṭhina ghṛta pūra pūrṇe śarāva śirasi pradīpaḥ iva

original: MSS_6765-1 uditorusādamativepathumat sudṛśo'bhibhartṛ vidhuraṃ trapayā /
analyzed: udita ūru sādam ati vepathumat su dṛś ūbhi bhartṛ vidhuram trapayā

original: MSS_6765-2 vapurādarātiśayaśaṃsi punaḥ pratipattimūḍhamapi bāḍhamabhūt //
analyzed: vapuḥ ādara atiśaya śaṃsi punar pratipatti mūḍham api bāḍham abhūt

original: MSS_6766-1 udīcyāṃ sasyaniṣpattir yāmyāṃ niṣpattināśanam /
MSS_6766-2 gṛhānnirgacchatāṃ vame śubhaṃ kṣetre ca dakṣiṇam //
analyzed: gṛhāt nirgacchatām vame śubham kṣetre ca dakṣiṇam
