original: MSS_6767-1 udīrito'rthaḥ paśunāpi gṛhyate hayāśca nāgāśca vahanti coditāḥ /
analyzed: udīrita ūrthaḥ paśunā api gṛhyate hayāḥ ca nāgāḥ ca vahanti coditāḥ

original: MSS_6767-2 anuktamapyūhati paṇḍito janaḥ pare gitajñāna phalā hi buddhayaḥ //
analyzed: anuktam api ūhati paṇḍitaḥ janaḥ pare gita jñāna phalāḥ hi buddhayaḥ

original: MSS_6768-1 udīrṇamanaso yodha vāhanāni ca bhārata /
analyzed: udīrṇa manasaḥ yodha vāhanāni ca bhārata

original: MSS_6768-2 yasyāṃ bhavanti senāyāṃ dhruvaṃ tasyāṃ jayo bhavet //
analyzed: yasyām bhavanti senāyām dhruvam tasyām jayaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_6769-1 udīryamāṇe'pi ca sāntvavāde mānāpanodo nahi rādhikāyāḥ /
analyzed: udīryamāṇe api ca sāntva vāde māna apanodaḥ na hi rādhikāyāḥ

original: MSS_6769-2 māno'stu te yadyaparādhikaḥ syāṃ svapne'pi naivāsmyaparādhiko'ham //
analyzed: mā anoḥ tu te yadi aparādhikaḥ syām svapne pi na eva asmi aparādhikaḥ uham

original: MSS_6770-1 udumbaradrumānaṣṭau ropayet svayameva yaḥ /
analyzed: udumbara drumān aṣṭau ropayet svayam eva yaḥ

original: MSS_6770-2 prerayed ropaṇāyāpi candraloke sa modate //
analyzed: prerayet ropaṇāya api candra loke sa modate

original: MSS_6771-1 udumbaraphalānīva brahmāṇḍānyatti yaḥ sadā /
analyzed: udumbara phalāni iva brahmāṇḍāni atti yaḥ sadā

original: MSS_6771-2 sarvagarvāpahaḥ kālas tasya ke maśakā vayam //
analyzed: sarva garva apahaḥ kālaḥ tasya ke maśakāḥ vayam

original: MSS_6772-1 udeti ghanamaṇḍalī naṭati nīlakaṇṭhāvalī taḍid valati sarvato vahati ketakīmārutaḥ /
analyzed: udeti ghana maṇḍalī naṭati nīlakaṇṭha āvalī taḍit valati sarvatas vahati ketakī mārutaḥ

original: MSS_6772-2 tathāpi yadi nāgataḥ sa sakhi tatra manye'dhunā dadhāti makaradhvajas truṭitaśiñjinīkaṃ dhanuḥ //
analyzed: tathā api yadi nā āgataḥ sa sakhi tatra manye idhunā dadhāti makaradhvajaḥ truṭita śiñjinīkam dhanuḥ

original: MSS_6773-1 udeti pūrvaṃ kusumaṃ tataḥ phalaṃ ghanodayaḥ prāk tadanantaraṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: udeti pūrvam kusumam tatas phalam ghana udayaḥ prāk tad anantaram payaḥ

original: MSS_6773-2 nimittanaimittikayorayaṃ kramas tava prasādasya purastu saṃpadaḥ //
analyzed: nimitta naimittikayoḥ ayam kramaḥ tava prasādasya puras tu saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_6774-1 udeti yasyāṃ na niśākaro ripus tithirnu kā puṇyavatībhirāpyate /
analyzed: udeti yasyām na niśākaraḥ ripuḥ tithiḥ nu kā puṇyavatībhiḥ āpyate

original: MSS_6774-2 itīva duṣṭyā paridevite muhuḥ kuhūkuhūrityalamāha kokilaḥ //
analyzed: iti iva duṣṭyā paridevite muhur kuhū kuhūḥ iti alam āha kokilaḥ

original: MSS_6775-1 udeti savitā tāmras tāmra evāstameti ca /
analyzed: udeti savitā tāmraḥ tāmraḥ eva astam eti ca

original: MSS_6775-2 saṃpattau ca vipattau ca mahatāmekarūpatā //
analyzed: saṃpattau ca vipattau ca mahatām eka rūpa tā

original: MSS_6776-1 udetumatyajannīhāṃ rājasu dvādaśasvapi /
analyzed: udetum atyajan īhām rājasu dvādaśasu api

original: MSS_6776-2 jigīṣureko dinakṛd ādityeṣviva kalpate //
analyzed: jigīṣuḥ ekaḥ dinakṛt ādityeṣu iva kalpate

original: MSS_6777-1 udeṣyatpīyūṣadyutirucikaṇārdrāḥ śaśimaṇi- sthalīnāṃ panthāno ghanacaraṇalākṣālipibhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: udeṣyat pīyūṣa dyuti ruci kaṇā ārdrāḥ śaśimaṇi sthalīnām panthānaḥ ghana caraṇa lākṣā lipi bhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_6777-2 cakorairuḍḍīnairjhaṭiti kṛtaśa kāḥ pratipadaṃ parāñcaḥ saṃcārānavinayavatīnāṃ vivṛṇute //
analyzed: cakoraiḥ uḍḍīnaiḥ jhaṭiti kāḥ pratipadam parāñcaḥ saṃcārān avinayavatīnām vivṛṇute

original: MSS_6778-1 udgacchatyalijha kṛtiḥ smaradhanurjyāmañjuguñjāravair niryātā viṣaliptabhalliviṣamāḥ kaṃkelliphullacchaṭāḥ /
analyzed: udgacchati alijha kṛtiḥ smara dhanuḥ jyā mañju guñjā ravaiḥ niryātāḥ viṣa lipta bhalli viṣamāḥ kaṃkeli liphulla chaṭāḥ

original: MSS_6778-2 re saṃpratyapavitramatra pathikāḥ sārambhamujjṛmbhate cūto dūta ivāntakasya kalikājālasphuratpallavaḥ //
analyzed: re saṃprati apavitram atra pathikāḥ sa ārambham ujjṛmbhate cūtaḥ dūtaḥ iva antakasya kalikā jāla sphurat pallavaḥ

original: MSS_6779-1 udgatā mathanakṣobhāt phenarājiḥ payodadheḥ /
analyzed: udgatā mathana kṣobhāt phena rājiḥ payodadheḥ

original: MSS_6779-2 tārakāvalirityajñair iyaṃ sakhi nivedyate //
analyzed: tārakāvaliḥ iti ajñaiḥ iyam sakhi nivedyate

original: MSS_6780-1 udgatendumavibhinnatamisrāṃ paśyati sma rajanīmavitṛptaḥ /
analyzed: udgata indum avibhinna tamisrām paśyati sma rajanīm avitṛptaḥ

original: MSS_6780-2 vyaṃśukasphuṭamukhīmatijihmāṃ vrīḍayā navavadhūmiva lokaḥ //
analyzed: vyaṃśuka sphuṭa mukhīm ati jihmām vrīḍayā nava vadhūm iva lokaḥ

original: MSS_6781-1 udgamanopaniveśana- śayanaparāvṛttivalanacalaneṣu /
analyzed: udgamana upaniveśana śayana parāvṛtti valana calaneṣu

original: MSS_6781-2 aniśaṃ sa mohayati māṃ hṛllagnaḥ śvāsa iva dayitaḥ //
analyzed: aniśam sa mohayati mām hṛd lagnaḥ śvāsaḥ iva dayitaḥ

original: MSS_6782-1 udgarjajjalakuñjarendrarabhasāsphālānubandhoddhataḥ sarvāḥ parvatakandarodarabhuvaḥ kurvan pratidhvāninīḥ /
analyzed: udgarjat jala kuñjara indra rabhasa āsphāla anubandha uddhataḥ sarvāḥ parvata kandara udara bhuvaḥ kurvan pratidhvāninīḥ

original: MSS_6782-2 uccairuccarati dhvaniḥ śrutipathonmāthī yathāyaṃ tathā prāyaḥ pre khadasaṃkhyaśa khavalayā veleyamāgacchati //
analyzed: uccais uccarati dhvaniḥ śrutipatha unmāthī yathā ayam tathā prāyas pre kha valayā velā iyam āgacchati

original: MSS_6783-1 udgarjan kuṭilas taṭāśrayatarupronmūlanoḍḍāmaro mā garvīḥ saritaḥ pravāha jaladhiṃ prakṣobhayāmīti bhoḥ /
analyzed: udgarjan kuṭilaḥ taṭa āśraya taru pronmūlana uḍḍāmaraḥ mā garvīḥ saritaḥ pravāha jaladhim prakṣobhayāmi iti bhoḥ

original: MSS_6783-2 svāṃ sattāṃ yadi vāñchasi bhrama maruṣvevāssva tatraiva vā dūre vāḍavavahniratra tu mahāsattvairviśan pīyate //
analyzed: svām sattām yadi vāñchasi bhrama maruṣu eva āssva tatra eva vā dūre vāḍaba vahniḥ atra tu mahāsattvaiḥ viśan pīyate

original: MSS_6784-1 udgarbhahūṇataruṇīramaṇopamarda- bhugnonnatistananiveśanibhaṃ himāṃśoḥ /
analyzed: udgarbha hūṇa taruṇī ramaṇa upamarda bhugna unnati stana niveśa nibham himāṃśoḥ

original: MSS_6784-2 bimbaṃ kaṭhorabisakāṇḍakaḍāragaurair viṣṇoḥ padaṃ prathamamagrakarairvyanakti //
analyzed: bimbam kaṭhora bisa kāṇḍa kaḍāra gauraiḥ viṣṇoḥ padam prathamam agra karaiḥ vyanakti

original: MSS_6785-1 udgṛhya vīṭīgrathanaṃ natabhrūr ācchādya vakṣaḥsthalamañcalena /
analyzed: udgṛhya vīṭī grathanam nata bhrūḥ ācchādya vakṣaḥ sthalam añcalena

original: MSS_6785-2 uttārayantī niviḍaṃ nicolaṃ manobhavasyāpi mano minoti //
analyzed: uttārayantī nibiḍam nicolam manobhavasya api manaḥ minoti

original: MSS_6786-1 udgrāhaścānyadhātuḥ syād dhruvakaścānyadhātukaḥ /
analyzed: udgrāhaḥ ca anya dhātuḥ syāt dhruvakaḥ ca anya dhātukaḥ

original: MSS_6786-2 melāpako'nyadhātuḥ syād ābhogaścānyadhātukaḥ /
analyzed: melāpakaḥ anya dhātuḥ syāt ābhogaḥ ca anya dhātukaḥ

original: MSS_6786-3 caturdhātukametaddhi rūpakaṃ kīrtyate budhaiḥ //
analyzed: catur dhātukam etat hi rūpakam kīrtyate budhaiḥ

original: MSS_6787-1 udgrāhasyādyakhaṇḍe ca nyāsaḥ sa dhruvako mataḥ /
analyzed: udgrāhasya ādi akhaṇḍe ca nyāsaḥ sa dhruvakaḥ mataḥ

original: MSS_6787-2 evaṃ hi ṣaṭpadaḥ prokta uttamo dhruvako budhaiḥ //
analyzed: evam hi ṣaṣ padaḥ proktaḥ uttamaḥ dhruvakaḥ budhaiḥ

original: MSS_6788-1 udgrāho dhrupadaśca syād ābhogastadanantaram /
analyzed: udgrāhaḥ dhrupadaḥ ca syāt ābhogaḥ tad anantaram

original: MSS_6788-2 niyamas trividho jñeyo maṇṭhakasya vicakṣaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: niyamaḥ trividhaḥ jñeyaḥ maṇṭhakasya vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_6789-1 udgrīvaṃ khalu vīkṣitaṃ vapuridaṃ lajjālasaṃ yattadā gacchantyāḥ sakhisaṃnidhau kimapi yannirvarṇakaṃ bhāṣitam /
analyzed: udgrīvam khalu vīkṣitam vapuḥ idam lajjā alasam yat tadā gacchantyāḥ sakhī saṃnidhau kim api yat nirvarṇakam bhāṣitam

original: MSS_6789-2 he prāṇā viraheṇa yāta kimidaṃ nairghṛṇyamālambitaṃ tat smṛtvā yadi yuktamāsitumaho yūyaṃ pramāṇaṃ mama //
analyzed: he prāṇāḥ viraheṇa yāta kim idam nairghṛṇyam ālambitam tat smṛtvā yadi yuktam āsitum aho yūyam pramāṇam mama

original: MSS_6790-1 udgrīvastimitekṣanastata itaḥ paśyan nilīya sthitaṃ pādodghṛṣṭiparasparapratibhayabhrāntaṃ calatpakṣatiḥ /
analyzed: udgrīva stimita īkṣanaḥ tatas itas paśyan nilīya sthitam pāda udghṛṣṭi paraspara pratibhaya bhrāntam calat pakṣatiḥ

original: MSS_6790-2 drāktroṭīpurakoṭikuṇṭhitarayaṃ prāktiryagūrdhvīkṛtaṃ garbhāntaḥpraṇayīcakāra śapharaṃ kāsāracārī bakaḥ //
analyzed: drāk troṭīpura koṭi kuṇṭhita rayam prāk tiryak ūrdhvīkṛtam garbha antar praṇayīcakāra śapharam kāsāra cārī bakaḥ

original: MSS_6791-1 udgrīvā vivṛtāruṇāsyakuharāstṛṣṇācalattālavaḥ pakṣāsaṃbhavavepamānatanavaḥ proḍḍīya kiṃcid bhuvaḥ /
analyzed: udgrīvāḥ vivṛta aruṇa āsya kuharāḥ tṛṣṇā calat tālavaḥ pakṣa asaṃbhava vepamāna tanavaḥ proḍḍīya kiṃcid bhuvaḥ

original: MSS_6791-2 anyonyākramiṇaḥ śarāriśiśavaḥ prātarnadīrodhasi prāleyāmbu pibanti vīraṇadaladroṇīpraṇālasrutam //
analyzed: anyonya ākramiṇaḥ śarāri śiśavaḥ prātar nadī rodhasi prāleya ambu pibanti vīraṇa dala droṇī praṇāla srutam

original: MSS_6792-1 udghātayed dakṣiṇamakṣi yakṣo hastena mṛdnātyatha dakṣiṇena /
analyzed: udghātayet dakṣiṇam akṣi yakṣaḥ hastena mṛdnāti atha dakṣiṇena

original: MSS_6792-2 yasyābhiṣeke sa bhavet svaśaktyā kṣitīśalakṣekṣitapādapadmaḥ //
analyzed: yasya abhiṣeke sa bhavet sva śaktyā kṣitīśa lakṣa īkṣita pāda padmaḥ

original: MSS_6793-1 udghāṭitanavadvāre pañjare vihago'nilaḥ /
analyzed: udghāṭita nava dvāre pañjare vihaga unilaḥ

original: MSS_6793-2 yat tiṣṭhati tadāścāryaṃ prayāṇe vismayaḥ kutaḥ //
analyzed: yat tiṣṭhati tadā āścāryam prayāṇe vismayaḥ kutas

original: MSS_6794-1 udghāṭya ced dakṣiṇamakṣi līḍhe nābhiṃ svakīyāmathavādhirūḍhaḥ /
analyzed: udghāṭya ced dakṣiṇam akṣi līḍhe nābhim svakīyām athavā adhirūḍhaḥ

original: MSS_6794-2 śete gṛhasyopari jāgarūkas tadāmbudo'mbu kṣipati prabhūtam //
analyzed: śete gṛhasya upari jāgarūkaḥ tadā ambuda umbu kṣipati prabhūtam

original: MSS_6795-1 udghāṭya yogakalayā hṛdayābjakośaṃ dhanyaiścirādapi yathāruci gṛhyamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: udghāṭya yoga kalayā hṛdaya abja kośam dhanyaiḥ cirāt api yathāruci gṛhyamāṇaḥ

original: MSS_6795-2 yaḥ prasphuratyavirataṃ paripūrṇarūpaḥ śreyaḥ sa me diśatu śāśvatikaṃ mukundaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ prasphurati aviratam paripūrṇa rūpaḥ śreyaḥ sa me diśatu śāśvatikam mukundaḥ

original: MSS_6796-1 uddaṇḍakokanadakomalakośakāntiḥ kāntākacagrahaṇakaṇṭakitaprakoṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: uddaṇḍa kokanada komala kośa kāntiḥ kāntā kaca grahaṇa kaṇṭakita prakoṣṭhaḥ

original: MSS_6796-2 mitradvijātiripuvargavilāsinīnāṃ saṃmānadānabhayabhogakaraḥ karaste //
analyzed: mitra dvijāti ripu varga vilāsinīnām saṃmāna dāna bhaya bhoga karaḥ karaḥ te

original: MSS_6797-1 uddaṇḍe bhujadaṇḍe tava kodaṇḍe parisphurati /
analyzed: uddaṇḍe bhuja daṇḍe tava kodaṇḍe parisphurati

original: MSS_6797-2 arimaṇḍalaravimaṇḍala- rambhākucamaṇḍalāni vepante //
analyzed: ari maṇḍala ravi maṇḍala rambhā kuca maṇḍalāni vepante

original: MSS_6798-1 uddāmajvaladaṃśumālikiraṇavyarthātirekādiva cchāyāḥ saṃprati yānti piṇḍapadavīṃ mūleṣu bhūmīruhām /
analyzed: uddāma jvalat aṃśumāli kiraṇa vyartha atirekāt iva chāyāḥ saṃprati yānti piṇḍa padavīm mūleṣu bhūmīruhām

original: MSS_6798-2 kiṃ caitad danujādhirājayuvatīvargāvagāhotsarat- kṣobhoḍḍīnavihaṃgamaṇḍalakṛtālīkātap atraṃ saraḥ //
analyzed: kim ca etat danuja adhirāja yuvatī varga avagāha utsarat kṣobha uḍḍīna vihaṃga maṇḍala kṛta alīka atap atram saraḥ

original: MSS_6799-1 uddāmadakṣiṇamarudbharacālitābhiḥ śākhābhirākulataraṃ rutavāraṇāya /
analyzed: uddāma dakṣiṇa marut bhara cālitābhiḥ śākhābhiḥ ākulataram ruta vāraṇāya

original: MSS_6799-2 mā meti kokilakulaṃ vadatīva vṛkṣaḥ straiṇaṃ viyogavidhuraṃ kṛpayā vilokya //
analyzed: mā mā iti kokila kulam vadati iva vṛkṣaḥ straiṇam viyoga vidhuram kṛpayā vilokya

original: MSS_6800-1 uddāmadantarucipallavitārdhacandra- jyotsnānipītatimiraprasaroparodhaḥ /
analyzed: uddāma danta ruci pallavita ardhacandra jyotsnā nipīta timira prasara uparodhaḥ

original: MSS_6800-2 śreyāṃsi vo diśatu tāṇḍavitasya śambhor ambhodharāvalighanadhvaniraṭṭahāsaḥ //
analyzed: śreyāṃsi vaḥ diśatu tāṇḍavitasya śambhoḥ ambhodhara āvali ghana dhvaniḥ aṭṭahāsaḥ

original: MSS_6801-1 uddāmadānadvipavṛndabṛṃhitair nitāntamuttu gaturaṃgaheṣitaiḥ /
analyzed: uddāma dāna dvipa vṛnda bṛṃhitaiḥ ga turaṃga heṣitaiḥ

original: MSS_6801-2 caladghanasyandananeminiḥsvanair abhūn nirucchvāsamivākulaṃ jagat //
analyzed: calat ghana syandana nemi niḥsvanaiḥ abhūt nirucchvāsam iva ākulam jagat

original: MSS_6802-1 uddāmadigdviradacañcalakarṇapūra- gaṇḍasthaloccaladalistabakākṛtīni /
analyzed: uddāma diś dvirada cañcala karṇapūra gaṇḍa sthala uccalat ali stabaka ākṛtīni

original: MSS_6802-2 mīlannabhāṃsi mṛganābhisamānabhāṃsi dikkandareṣu vilasantitamāṃ tamāṃsi //
analyzed: mīlat nabhāṃsi mṛganābhi samāna bhāṃsi diś kandareṣu vilasantitamām tamāṃsi

original: MSS_6803-1 uddāmadyumaṇidyutivyatikaraprakrīḍadarkopala- jvālājālajaṭālajā galataṭīniṣkūjakoyaṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: uddāma dyumaṇi dyuti vyatikara prakrīḍat arka upala jvālā jāla jaṭāla jāḥ gala taṭī niṣkūja koyaṣṭayaḥ

original: MSS_6803-2 bhaumoṣmaplavamānasūrakiraṇakrūraprakāśā dṛśor āyuḥkarma samāpayanti dhigamūrmadhye'hni śūnyā diśaḥ //
analyzed: bhauma ūṣma plavamāna sūra kiraṇa krūra prakāśāḥ dṛśoḥ āyuḥ karma samāpayanti dhik amūḥ madhye ihni śūnyāḥ diśaḥ

original: MSS_6804-1 uddāmadrumabha gabhīmadaśano yenābhyaghāni dvipaḥ so'yaṃ vañcakaceṣṭitais tyajati kiṃ pañcānanaḥ kānanam /
analyzed: uddāma druma bha gabhīma daśanaḥ yena abhyaghāni dvipaḥ saḥ yam vañcaka ceṣṭitaiḥ tyajati kim pañcānanaḥ kānanam

original: MSS_6804-2 tat prītirnna kṛtiḥ samaṃ na samaraṃ kṣāntirmanoglānaye śreyānityayamasya mānanidhino yat kānanopakramaḥ //
analyzed: tat prītiḥ na kṛtiḥ samam na samaram kṣāntiḥ manaḥ glānaye śreyān iti ayam asya māna nidhinaḥ yat kānana upakramaḥ

original: MSS_6805-1 uddāmadviradāvalūnabisinīsaurabhyasaṃbhāvita- vyomānaḥ kalahaṃsakampitagarutpālīmarunmāṃsalāḥ /
analyzed: uddāma dvirada avalūna bisinī saurabhya saṃbhāvita vyomānaḥ kalahaṃsa kampita garutpālī marut māṃsalāḥ

original: MSS_6805-2 dūrottānatara gala ghanakalāja ghālagarvaspṛśaḥ karpūradravaśīkarairiva diśo limpanti pampānilāḥ //
analyzed: dūra uttānatara gala ghana kalā ja ghāla garva spṛśaḥ karpūra drava śīkaraiḥ iva diśaḥ limpanti pampā anilāḥ

original: MSS_6806-1 uddāmabhramivegavistṛtajaṭāvallīpraṇālīpatat- svarga gājaladaṇḍikāvalayitaṃ nirmāya tat pañjaram /
analyzed: uddāma bhrami vega vistṛta jaṭā vallī praṇālī patat svarga gā jala daṇḍikā valayitam nirmāya tat pañjaram

original: MSS_6806-2 saṃbhrāmyadbhujadaṇḍapakṣapaṭaladvandvena haṃsāyitas trailokyavyayanāṭikānayanaṭaḥ svāmī jagat trāyatām //
analyzed: saṃbhrāmyat bhuja daṇḍa pakṣa paṭala dvandvena haṃsāyitaḥ trailokya vyaya nāṭikā naya naṭaḥ svāmī jagat trāyatām

original: MSS_6807-1 uddāmāmbudagarhitāndhatamasapradhvastadi maṇḍale kāle yāmikajāgradugrasubhaṭavyākīrṇakolāhale /
analyzed: maṇḍale kāle yāmika jāgrat ugra su bhaṭa vyākīrṇa kolāhale

original: MSS_6807-2 karṇasyāsuhṛdarṇavāmbuvaḍavāvahneryadantaḥpurād āyātāsi tadambujākṣi kṛtakaṃ manye bhayaṃ yoṣitām //
analyzed: karṇasya a suhṛd arṇava ambu vaḍavā vahneḥ yat antaḥpurāt āyātā asi tat ambuja akṣi kṛtakam manye bhayam yoṣitām

original: MSS_6808-1 uddāmāmbudavardha mānaśikhinīkekātirekākule saṃprāpyaṃ salilaṃ sthaleṣvapi sadā nistarṣavarṣāgame /
analyzed: uddāma ambuda vardha māna śikhinī kekā atireka ākule saṃprāpyam salilam sthaleṣu api sadā nistarṣa varṣā āgame

original: MSS_6808-2 bhīṣmagrīṣmabhaṭe parasparabhayādālocyamānaṃ muhur dīnaṃ mīnakulaṃ na pālayasi cet kāsāra kā sāratā //
analyzed: bhīṣma grīṣma bhaṭe paraspara bhayāt ālocyamānam muhur dīnam mīna kulam na pālayasi ced kāsāra kā sāra tā

original: MSS_6809-1 uddāmārkamarīcimūrchitadṛśāṃ yenādhvagānāmayaṃ velālambanajāgarūkamanasāmārambhi karṇajvaraḥ /
analyzed: uddāma arka marīci mūrchita dṛśām yena adhvagānām ayam velā ālambana jāgarūka manasām ārambhi karṇa jvaraḥ

original: MSS_6809-2 kleśocchṛ khalacetasaḥ praviśato gaṇḍūṣagarbhaṃ muner līnaḥ kutra mahārṇavasya sa punaḥ kallolakolāhalaḥ //
analyzed: kleśa ucchṛ khala cetasaḥ praviśataḥ gaṇḍūṣa garbham muneḥ līnaḥ kutra mahā arṇavasya sa punar kallola kolāhalaḥ

original: MSS_6810-1 uddāmārkāṃśudīpyaddinamaṇimaṇibhirbhasmitānt e samantād vāyuvyādhūyamānajvalanakaṇagaṇākīrṇadhūl iprakīrṇe /
analyzed: uddāma arka aṃśu dīpyat dinamaṇi maṇibhiḥ bhasmitān e samantāt vāyu vyādhūyamāna jvalana kaṇa gaṇa ākīrṇa dhūl i prakīrṇe

original: MSS_6810-2 kāntāre'smin nṛpārte pathi pathika bhave kvāpi pāthodasenā- sūcyagre kūpaṣaṭkaṃ tadupari nagarī tatra ga gāpravāhaḥ //
analyzed: kāntāre smin nṛpa ārte pathi pathika bhave kvāpi pāthoda senā sūci agre kūpa ṣaṭkam tad upari nagarī tatra ga gā pravāhaḥ

original: MSS_6811-1 uddāmotkalikāṃ vipāṇḍurarucaṃ prārabdhajṛmbhāṃ kṣaṇād āyāsaṃ śvasanodgamairaviratairātanvatīmātmanaḥ /
analyzed: uddāma utkalikām vipāṇḍura rucam prārabdha jṛmbhām kṣaṇāt āyāsam śvasana udgamaiḥ avirataiḥ ātanvatīm ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_6811-2 adyodyānalatāmimāṃ samadanāṃ nārīmivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ paśyan kopavipāṭaladyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmyaham //
analyzed: adya udyāna latām imām sa madanām nārīm iva anyām dhruvam paśyan kopa vipāṭala dyuti mukham devyāḥ kariṣyāmi aham

original: MSS_6812-1 uddiśya niḥsarantīṃ sakhīmiyaṃ kapaṭakopakuṭilabhrūḥ /
analyzed: uddiśya niḥsarantīm sakhīm iyam kapaṭa kopa kuṭila bhrūḥ

original: MSS_6812-2 evamavataṃsamākṣipad āhatadīpo yathā patati //
analyzed: evam avataṃsam ākṣipat āhata dīpaḥ yathā patati

original: MSS_6813-1 uddiṣṭaṃ vastu rāgādau kiṃcidādhikyacintitam /
analyzed: uddiṣṭam vastu rāga ādau kiṃcid ādhikya cintitam

original: MSS_6813-2 taddhātumātuniṣpannaṃ pratyantaramitīritam //
analyzed: tat dhātu mātu niṣpannam pratyantaram iti īritam

original: MSS_6814-1 uddīpito'pi kanakadyutimañjulo'pi snehānvito'pi sudṛśo'pi suvartito'pi /
analyzed: uddīpitaḥ api kanaka dyuti mañjulaḥ api sneha anvitaḥ api sudṛśaḥ api su vartitaḥ api

original: MSS_6814-2 kāntākarāntarakucacchavimaṇḍito'pi svābhāvikīṃ malinatāṃ na jahāti dīpaḥ //
analyzed: kāntā kara antara kuca chavi maṇḍitaḥ api svābhāvikīm malina tām na jahāti dīpaḥ

original: MSS_6815-1 uddīptāgnirasau munirvijayate yasyodare jīryataḥ pāthodheravaśiṣṭamambu kathamapyudgīrṇamanyārṇavam /
analyzed: uddīpta agniḥ asau muniḥ vijayate yasya udare jīryataḥ pāthodheḥ avaśiṣṭam ambu katham api udgīrṇam anya arṇavam

original: MSS_6815-2 kiṃ cāsmājjaṭharānalādiva navastatkālavāntikramān niryātaḥ sa punaryamāya payasāmantargato vāḍavaḥ //
analyzed: kim ca asmāt jaṭhara analāt iva navaḥ tad kāla vānti kramāt niryātaḥ sa punar yamāya payasām antargataḥ vāḍavaḥ

original: MSS_6816-1 uddeśo'yaṃ kanakasikatākomalaikāntakāntā- līlāvāsīkṛtatarutalaḥ kāmibhirnarmadāyāḥ /
analyzed: uddeśaḥ yam kanaka sikatā komala ekānta kāntā līlā vāsīkṛta taru talaḥ kāmibhiḥ narmadāyāḥ

original: MSS_6816-2 kiṃcaitasmin suratasacivāstanvi te vānti vātā yeṣāmagre sarati kalitākaṇṭhakopo manobhūḥ //
analyzed: kiṃca etasmin surata sacivāḥ tanvi te vānti vātāḥ yeṣām agre sarati kalita a kaṇṭha kopaḥ manobhūḥ

original: MSS_6817-1 uddeśo'yaṃ sarasakadalīśreṇiśobhātiśāyī kuñjotkarṣā kuritaramaṇīvibhramo narmadāyāḥ /
analyzed: uddeśaḥ yam sarasa kadalī śreṇi śobhā atiśāyī kuñja utkarṣā kurita ramaṇī vibhramaḥ narmadāyāḥ

original: MSS_6817-2 kiṃ caitasmin suratasuhṛdastanvi te vānti vātā yeṣāmagre sarati kalitākāṇḍakopo manobhūḥ //
analyzed: kim ca etasmin surata suhṛdaḥ tanvi te vānti vātāḥ yeṣām agre sarati kalita akāṇḍa kopaḥ manobhūḥ

original: MSS_6818-1 uddhatā alamuddhartum auddhatyaṃ duritātmanām /
analyzed: uddhatāḥ alam uddhartum auddhatyam durita ātmanām

original: MSS_6818-2 kṣārāṇāmeva sāmarthyaṃ malanāśāya vāsasām //
analyzed: kṣārāṇām eva sāmarthyam mala nāśāya vāsasām

original: MSS_6819-1 uddhatairiva parasparasa gād īritānyubhayataḥ kucakumbhaiḥ /
analyzed: uddhataiḥ iva gāt īritāni ubhayatas kuca kumbhaiḥ

original: MSS_6819-2 yoṣitāmatimadena jughūrṇur vibhramātiśayapuṃṣi vapūṃṣi //
analyzed: yoṣitām ati madena jughūrṇuḥ vibhrama atiśaya puṃṣi vapūṃṣi

original: MSS_6820-1 uddhatairnibhṛtamekamanekaiś chedavan mṛgadṛśāmavirāmaiḥ /
analyzed: uddhataiḥ nibhṛtam ekam anekaiḥ cheda vat mṛga dṛśām avirāmaiḥ

original: MSS_6820-2 śrūyate sma maṇitaṃ kalakāñcī- nūpuradhvanibhirakṣatameva //
analyzed: śrūyate sma maṇitam kala kāñcī nūpura dhvanibhiḥ akṣatam eva

original: MSS_6821-1 uddharedātmanātmānaṃ nātmānamavasādayet /
analyzed: uddharet ātmanā ātmānam na ātmānam avasādayet

original: MSS_6821-2 ātmaiva hyātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripurātmanaḥ //
analyzed: ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ bandhuḥ ātmā eva ripuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_6822-1 uddhartuṃ kila śailakelirabhasasrastāni pāthonidher antarbhūṣaṇamauktikāni divijastrībhiḥ samutkaṇṭhayā /
analyzed: uddhartum kila śaila keli rabhasa srastāni pāthonidheḥ antar bhūṣaṇa mauktikāni divija strībhiḥ samutkaṇṭhayā

original: MSS_6822-2 gāḍhaṃ tatra nimajjitena raviṇā baddhvā dṛḍhaṃ raśmibhiḥ protkṣiptāni nipatya tāni gagane tārāpadeśaṃ dadhuḥ //
analyzed: gāḍham tatra nimajjitena raviṇā baddhvā dṛḍham raśmibhiḥ protkṣiptāni nipatya tāni gagane tāra apadeśam

original: MSS_6823-1 uddhartuṃ dharaṇīṃ niśākararavī kṣeptuṃ marunmārgato vātaṃ stambhayituṃ payonidhijalaṃ pātuṃ giriṃ cūrṇitum /
analyzed: uddhartum dharaṇīm niśākara ravī kṣeptum marut mārgataḥ vātam stambhayitum payonidhi jalam pātum girim cūrṇitum

original: MSS_6823-2 śaktā yatra viśanti mṛtyuvadane kānyasya tatra sthitir yasmin yāti girirbile saha vanaiḥ kātra vyavasthā hyaṇoḥ //
analyzed: śaktāḥ yatra viśanti mṛtyu vadane kāni asya tatra sthitiḥ yasmin yāti giriḥ bile saha vanaiḥ kā atra vyavasthā hi aṇoḥ

original: MSS_6824-1 uddhava mādhavasavidhe vinivedyaṃ sarvathā bhavatā /
analyzed: uddhava mādhava savidhe vinivedyam sarvathā bhavatā

original: MSS_6824-2 api bahumūlyaṃ bhavanaṃ yamunākuñjopamaṃ na syāt //
analyzed: api bahu mūlyam bhavanam yamunā kuñja upamam na syāt

original: MSS_6825-1 uddhūtakāmānalatāpataptā vihāya doṣādhikajāṃ tu cintām /
analyzed: uddhūta kāma anala tāpa taptāḥ vihāya doṣa adhika jām tu cintām

original: MSS_6825-2 vanādirāgāvayavaprabhedaṃ nareti matvā vanitā ramante //
analyzed: vana ādi rāga avayava prabhedam nara iti matvā vanitāḥ ramante

original: MSS_6825A-1 uddhūtapāṃsupaṭalānumitaprabandha- dhāvatkhurāgracayacumbitabhūmibhāgāḥ /
analyzed: uddhūta pāṃsu paṭala anumita prabandha dhāvat khura agra caya cumbita bhūmi bhāgāḥ

original: MSS_6825A-2 nirmathyamānajaladhidhvanighoraghoṣam ete rathaṃ gaganasīmni vahanti vāhāḥ //
analyzed: nirmathyamāna jaladhi dhvani ghora ghoṣam ete ratham gagana sīmni vahanti vāhāḥ

original: MSS_6826-1 uddhūtā dhūmadhārā virahijanamanomāthino manmathāgneḥ kastūrīpatramālā timiratatiraho dikpurandhrīmukhānām /
analyzed: uddhūtā dhūma dhārā virahi jana manaḥ māthinaḥ manmatha agneḥ kastūrī patra mālā timira tatiḥ aho diś purandhrī mukhānām

original: MSS_6826-2 nirvāṇā gāralekhā divasahutabhujaḥ saṃcaraccañcarīka- śreṇīyaṃ bhāti bhāsvatkaralulitanabhaḥkandarendīvarasya //
analyzed: nirvāṇā gāralekhā divasa hutabhujaḥ saṃcarat cañcarīka śreṇī iyam bhāti bhāsvat kara lulita nabhaḥ kandara indīvarasya

original: MSS_6827-1 uddhūya dhūlīrdhavalā rasātalād vātyā lagantī gagane vyavartata /
analyzed: uddhūya dhūlīḥ dhavalā rasātalāt vātyā lagantī gagane vyavartata

original: MSS_6827-2 phūtkārayantyeva bhuvoddhṛtā bhujā nidāghatāpākulayā tapātyaye //
analyzed: phūtkārayanti eva bhuvā uddhṛtāḥ bhujāḥ nidāgha tāpa ākulayā tapātyaye

original: MSS_6828-1 uddhūyeta tanūlateti nalinīpatreṇa no vījyate sphoṭaḥ syāditi nā gakaṃ malayajakṣodāmbhasā sicyate /
analyzed: uddhūyeta tanū latā iti nalinī patreṇa no vījyate sphoṭaḥ syāt iti nā gakam malayaja kṣoda ambhasā sicyate

original: MSS_6828-2 syādasyātibharāt parābhava iti prāyo na vā pallavā- ropo vakṣasi tat kathaṃ kṛśatanorādhiḥ samādhīyatām //
analyzed: syāt asya ati bharāt parābhavaḥ iti prāyas na vā pallavāḥ ropaḥ vakṣasi tat katham kṛśa tanoḥ ādhiḥ samādhīyatām

original: MSS_6829-1 uddhūyeta natabhrūḥ pakṣmanipātodbhavaiḥ pavanaiḥ /
analyzed: uddhūyeta nata bhrūḥ pakṣma nipāta udbhavaiḥ pavanaiḥ

original: MSS_6829-2 iti nirnimeṣamasyā virahavayasyā vilokate vadanam //
analyzed: iti nirnimeṣam asyāḥ viraha vayasyā vadanam

original: MSS_6830-1 uddhṛteṣvapi śastreṣu dūto vadati nānyathā /
analyzed: uddhṛteṣu api śastreṣu dūtaḥ vadati na anyathā

original: MSS_6830-2 te vai yathoktavaktāro na vadhyāḥ pṛthivībhujā //
analyzed: te vai yathā ukta vaktāraḥ na vadhyāḥ pṛthivībhujā

original: MSS_6831-1 uddhṛteṣvapi śastreṣu bandhuvargavadheṣvapi /
analyzed: uddhṛteṣu api śastreṣu bandhu varga vadheṣu api

original: MSS_6831-2 paruṣāṇyapi jalpanto vadhyā dūtā na bhūbhujā //
analyzed: paruṣāṇi api jalpantaḥ vadhyāḥ dūtāḥ na bhūbhujā

original: MSS_6832-1 uddhriyamānendukarair unmajjatyandhakāravārinidheḥ /
analyzed: uddhriyamāna indu karaiḥ unmajjati andhakāra vārinidheḥ

original: MSS_6832-2 kvāpi kvāpi vilagna- cchāyājambāladhoraṇī dharaṇī //
analyzed: kvāpi kvāpi chāyā jambāla dhoraṇī dharaṇī

original: MSS_6833-1 udbaddhebhyaḥ sudūraṃ ghanarajanitamaḥpūriteṣu drumeṣu prodgrīvaṃ paśya pādadvitayadhṛtabhuvaḥ śreṇayaḥ pheravāṇām /
analyzed: udbaddhebhyaḥ su dūram ghana rajani tamaḥ pūriteṣu drumeṣu prodgrīvam paśya pāda dvitaya dhṛta bhuvaḥ śreṇayaḥ pheravāṇām

original: MSS_6833-2 ulkālokaiḥ sphuradbhirnijavadanaguhotsarpibhirvīkṣitebhyaś cyotatsāndraṃ vasāmbhaḥ kvathitaśavavapurmaṇḍalebhyaḥ pibanti //
analyzed: ulkā lokaiḥ sphuradbhiḥ nija vadana guhā utsarpibhiḥ vīkṣitebhyaḥ cyotat sāndram vasā ambhaḥ kvathita śava vapuḥ maṇḍalebhyaḥ pibanti

original: MSS_6834-1 udbandhanaṃ dṛḍhaṃ gāḍhaṃ siṃho'pi sahate yadi /
analyzed: udbandhanam dṛḍham gāḍham siṃhaḥ api sahate yadi

original: MSS_6834-2 kathaṃ karaṭinastarhi nṛpacihnāni bibhrati //
analyzed: katham karaṭinaḥ tarhi nṛpa cihnāni bibhrati

original: MSS_6835-1 udbhartṛgāminī puruṣa- bhāṣiṇī kāmacihnakṛtaveśā /
analyzed: udbhartṛ gāminī puruṣa bhāṣiṇī kāma cihna kṛta veśā

original: MSS_6835-2 yā nātimāṃsayuktā surāpriyā sarvataścapalā //
analyzed: yā na ati māṃsa yuktā surā priyā sarvatas capalā

original: MSS_6836-1 udbhāvyamāno nalinīpalāśaiḥ samīraṇastaddhṛdayāspadasya /
analyzed: udbhāvyamānaḥ nalinī palāśaiḥ samīraṇaḥ tad hṛdaya āspadasya

original: MSS_6836-2 karoti dāhasya nivāraṇaṃ nu saṃdhukṣaṇaṃ vā smarapāvakasya //
analyzed: karoti dāhasya nivāraṇam nu saṃdhukṣaṇam vā smara pāvakasya

original: MSS_6837-1 udbhāsitākhilakhalasya viśṛ khalasya prāgjātavismṛtanijādhamakarmavṛtteḥ /
analyzed: udbhāsita akhila khalasya khalasya prāc jāta vismṛta nija adhama karma vṛtteḥ

original: MSS_6837-2 daivādavāptavibhavasya guṇadviṣo'sya nīcasya gocaragataiḥ sukhamāsyate kaiḥ //
analyzed: daivāt avāpta vibhavasya guṇa dviṣaḥ usya nīcasya gocara gataiḥ sukham āsyate kaiḥ

original: MSS_6838-1 udbhāsite'ndhatamasavraja eti nāśaṃ sūne prayāntyubhayato'timarandamugdhāḥ /
analyzed: udbhāsita indha tamasa vrajaḥ eti nāśam sūne prayānti ubhayatas ūti maranda mugdhāḥ

original: MSS_6838-2 siṃhā nihatya rudhiraṃ bahu bhakṣitaṃ yad dīpā kure madhukarāḥ kariṇaṃ vamanti //
analyzed: siṃhāḥ nihatya rudhiram bahu bhakṣitam yat kure madhukarāḥ kariṇam vamanti

original: MSS_6839-1 udbhiduraṃ stanavadanaṃ locanamaligarvamocanaṃ sudṛśaḥ /
analyzed: udbhiduram stana vadanam locanam ali garva mocanam su dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_6839-2 dṛṣṭvā vigatavicāraṃ dhātāraṃ nindati sthaviraḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vigata vicāram dhātāram nindati sthaviraḥ

original: MSS_6840-1 udbhinnaṃ kimidaṃ manobhavanṛpakrīḍāravindadvayaṃ sūte tat kathamekataḥ kila lasadromāvalīnālataḥ /
analyzed: udbhinnam kim idam manobhava nṛpa krīḍā aravinda dvayam sūte tat katham ekatas kila lasat roma āvalī nālataḥ

original: MSS_6840-2 cakradvandvamidaṃ kṣamaṃ tadapi na sthātuṃ mukhendoḥ puro lāvaṇyāmbunimagnayauvanagajasyāvaimi kumbhadvayam //
analyzed: cakra dvandvam idam kṣamam tat api na sthātum mukha indoḥ puras lāvaṇya ambu nimagna yauvana gajasya avaimi kumbha dvayam

original: MSS_6841-1 udbhinnayauvanamanohararūpaśobhā- saṃbhāvitābhinavabhogamanobhavānām /
analyzed: udbhinna yauvana manohara rūpa śobhā saṃbhāvita abhinava bhoga manobhavānām

original: MSS_6841-2 eṇīdṛśāṃ tvadupadeśavivarjitānāṃ mātarbhavanti nahi nāma samīhitārthāḥ //
analyzed: eṇī dṛśām tvad upadeśa vivarjitānām mātar bhavanti na hi nāma samīhita arthāḥ

original: MSS_6842-1 udbhinnasāttvikavikārapariplavāni sadyastiraskṛtamanobhavavedanāni /
analyzed: udbhinna sāttvika vikāra pariplavāni sadyas tiraskṛta manobhava vedanāni

original: MSS_6842-2 tanvi tvada gaparirambhasukhāmṛtāni prādurbhavantu punarāgatajīvitāni //
analyzed: tanvi tvad a ga parirambha sukha amṛtāni prādurbhavantu punar āgata jīvitāni

original: MSS_6843-1 udbhinnastanakuḍmaladvayamuraḥ kiṃcit kapolasthalīṃ limpatyeva madhūkakāntiradharaḥ saṃmugdhalakṣmīmayaḥ /
analyzed: udbhinna stana kuḍmala dvayam uraḥ kiṃcid kapola sthalīm limpati eva madhūka kāntiḥ adharaḥ saṃmugdha lakṣmī mayaḥ

original: MSS_6843-2 pratyāsīdati yauvane mṛgadṛśaḥ kiṃ cānyadāvirbhaval lāvaṇyāmṛtapa kalepalaḍahacchāyaṃ vapurvartate //
analyzed: pratyāsīdati yauvane mṛga dṛśaḥ kim ca anyat āvirbhavat lāvaṇya amṛtapa kalepa laḍaha chāyam vapuḥ vartate

original: MSS_6844-1 udbhinnastabakāvataṃsasubhagāḥ pre khanmarunnartitāḥ puṣpodgīrṇaparāgapāṃśulalasatpatraprakāṇḍa tviṣaḥ /
analyzed: udbhinna stabaka avataṃsa subhagāḥ pre khanmarut nartitāḥ puṣpa udgīrṇa parāga pāṃśu lalasat patra prakāṇḍa tviṣaḥ

original: MSS_6844-2 gambhīrakramapañcamonmadapikadhvānocchaladgītayaḥ pratyujjīvitamanmathotsava iva krīḍantyamū bhūruhaḥ //
analyzed: gambhīra krama pañcama unmada pika dhvāna ucchalat gītayaḥ pratyujjīvita manmatha utsave iva krīḍanti amū bhūruhaḥ

original: MSS_6845-1 udbhinnā kalakaṇṭhakaṇṭhakuharāt karṇāmṛtasyandinī hṛdyā yadyapi mārdavaikavasatiḥ sā kākalīhuṃkṛtiḥ /
analyzed: udbhinnā kalakaṇṭha kaṇṭha kuharāt karṇa amṛta syandinī hṛdyā yadi api mārdava eka vasatiḥ sā kākalī huṃkṛtiḥ

original: MSS_6845-2 anyastanvi tathāpi te triṇayanapluṣṭasya jīvārpaṇaḥ pañceṣorucitaprapañcitarasaḥ pākāñcitaḥ pañcamaḥ //
analyzed: anyaḥ tanvi tathā api te triṇayana pluṣṭasya jīva arpaṇaḥ pañca iṣoḥ ucita prapañcita rasaḥ pāka āñcitaḥ pañcamaḥ

original: MSS_6847-1 udbhedaṃ pratipadya pakvabadarībhāvaṃ sametya kramāt puṃnāgākṛtimāpya pūgapadavīmāruhya bilvaśriyam /
analyzed: udbhedam pratipadya pakva badarī bhāvam sametya kramāt puṃnāga ākṛtim āpya pūga padavīm āruhya bilva śriyam

original: MSS_6847-2 labdhvā tālaphalopamāṃ ca lalitāmāsādya bhūyo'dhunā cañcatkāñcanakumbhajṛmbhaṇamibhāvasyāḥ stanau bibhrataḥ //
analyzed: labdhvā tāla phala upamām ca lalitām āsādya bhūyas adhunā cañcat kāñcana kumbha jṛmbhaṇam ibhau asyāḥ stanau bibhrataḥ

original: MSS_6848-1 udbhrāntabhekakulakīrṇajale taḍāge ko'pyasti nāma yadi nānyagatirbakoṭaḥ /
analyzed: udbhrānta bheka kula kīrṇa jale taḍāge kopī asti nāma yadi na anya gatiḥ bakoṭaḥ

original: MSS_6848-2 utphullapadmasurabhīṇi sarāṃsi hitvā na sthātumarhati bhavāniha rājahaṃsa //
analyzed: utphulla padma surabhīṇi sarāṃsi hitvā na sthātum arhati bhavān iha rājahaṃsa

original: MSS_6849-1 udyacchatā dhuramakāpuruṣānurūpāṃ gantavyamājinidhanena pituḥ pathā vā /
analyzed: udyacchatā dhuram a kāpuruṣa anurūpām gantavyam āji nidhanena pituḥ pathā vā

original: MSS_6849-2 ācchidya vā svajananījanalocanebhyo neyo mayā ripuvadhūnayanāni bāṣpaḥ //
analyzed: ācchidya vā sva jananī jana locanebhyaḥ neyaḥ mayā ripu vadhū nayanāni bāṣpaḥ

original: MSS_6850-1 udyajjvālāvalībhirvaramiha bhuvanaploṣake havyavāhe ra gadvīcau praviṣṭaṃ jalanidhipayasi grāhanakrākule vā /
analyzed: udyat jvālā āvalībhiḥ varam iha bhuvana ploṣake havyavāhe gat vīcau praviṣṭam jalanidhi payasi grāha nakra ākule vā

original: MSS_6850-2 saṃgrāme vāriraudre vividhaśarahatānekayodhapradhāne no nārīsaukhyamadhye bhavaśatajanitānantaduḥkhapravīṇe //
analyzed: saṃgrāme vāri raudre vividha śara hata aneka yodha pradhāne naḥ nārī saukhya madhye bhava śata janita ananta duḥkha pravīṇe

original: MSS_6851-1 udyañchaśī taruṇabhāskarakānticauraḥ sparśena śītakaralālitayā pradoṣe /
analyzed: udyan śaśī taruṇa bhāskara kānti cauraḥ sparśena śītakara lālitayā pradoṣe

original: MSS_6851-2 jñāto'rdhasuptanalinīpriyayā salajjaḥ pāṇḍutvamāpa rabhasādiva manmathārtaḥ //
analyzed: jñāta ūrdhva supta nalinī priyayā sa lajjaḥ pāṇḍu tvam āpa rabhasāt iva manmatha ārtaḥ

original: MSS_6852-1 udyataṃ śastramālokya viṣādaṃ yāti vihvalaḥ /
analyzed: udyatam śastram ālokya viṣādam yāti vihvalaḥ

original: MSS_6852-2 jīvanaṃ prati saṃtrāsto nāsti mṛtyusamaṃ bhayam //
analyzed: jīvanam prati saṃtrāstaḥ na asti mṛtyu samam bhayam

original: MSS_6853-1 udyatamekahastacaraṇaṃ dvitīyakararecitaṃ suvinataṃ vaṃśamṛda gavādyamadhuraṃ vicitrakaraṇānvitaṃ bahu vidham /
analyzed: udyatam eka hasta caraṇam dvitīya kara recitam su vinatam go ādya madhuram vicitra karaṇa anvitam bahu vidham

original: MSS_6853-2 madrakametadadya subhagair vidagdhagaticeṣṭitaiḥ sulalitair nṛtyasi vibhramākulapadaṃ viviktarasabhāvitaṃ śaśimukhi //
analyzed: madrakam etat adya subhagaiḥ vidagdha gati ceṣṭitaiḥ su lalitaiḥ nṛtyasi vibhrama ākula padam vivikta rasa bhāvitam śaśi mukhi

original: MSS_6854-1 udyatasya paraṃ hantuṃ stabdhasya vivaraiṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: udyatasya param hantum stabdhasya vivara eṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_6854-2 patanaṃ jāyate'vaśyam kṛcchreṇa punarunnatiḥ //
analyzed: patanam jāyatevaśyam kṛcchreṇa punarunnatiḥ

original: MSS_6855-1 udyatasya hi kāmasya prativādo na śasyate /
analyzed: udyatasya hi kāmasya prativādaḥ na śasyate

original: MSS_6855-2 api nirmuktasa gasya kāmaraktasya kiṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: api kāma raktasya kim punar

original: MSS_6856-1 udyatāsirnṛpo yatra tatraiva dhanarakṣaṇam /
analyzed: udyata asiḥ nṛpaḥ yatra tatra eva dhana rakṣaṇam

original: MSS_6856-2 kaṇṭakākulaśākhyāyāṃ lagnaṃ gṛhṇāti no phalam //
analyzed: kaṇṭaka ākula śākhyāyām lagnam gṛhṇāti no phalam

original: MSS_6857-1 udyateta yathāśakti na prasajyeta jātucit /
analyzed: udyateta yathāśakti na prasajyeta jātucit

original: MSS_6857-2 sādhyānāṃ siddhyasiddhī yan niyatyā niyate kṛte //
analyzed: sādhyānām siddhi asiddhī yat niyatyā niyate kṛte

original: MSS_6858-1 udyateṣvapi śastreṣu dūto vadati nānyathā /
analyzed: udyateṣu api śastreṣu dūtaḥ vadati na anyathā

original: MSS_6858-2 sadaivāvadhyabhāvena yathārthasya hi vācakaḥ //
analyzed: sadā eva avadhya bhāvena yathā arthasya hi vācakaḥ

original: MSS_6859-1 udyateṣvapi śastreṣu yathoktaṃ śāsanaṃ vadet /
analyzed: udyateṣu api śastreṣu yathā uktam śāsanam vadet

original: MSS_6859-2 rāgāparāgau jānīyād dṛṣṭivaktraviceṣṭitaiḥ //
analyzed: rāga aparāgau jānīyāt dṛṣṭi vaktra viceṣṭitaiḥ

original: MSS_6860-1 udyatkarakaravālaḥ śakatimiradhvaṃsane mahānipuṇaḥ /
analyzed: udyat kara karavālaḥ śaka timira dhvaṃsane mahā nipuṇaḥ

original: MSS_6860-2 kalkiharirvaḥ pāyād apāyataḥ kaliniśāntotthaḥ //
MSS_6861-1 udyattārādhināthadyutihṛtipaṭavaḥ sāndrasindūraśoṇāḥ śrīmadvetaṇḍatuṇḍapratibhaṭabaṭavaḥ padmarāgātirāgāḥ /
analyzed: udyat tārā adhinātha dyuti hṛti paṭavaḥ sāndra sindūra śoṇāḥ śrīmat vetaṇḍa tuṇḍa pratibhaṭa baṭavaḥ padmarāga ati rāgāḥ

original: MSS_6861-2 dūrādānamrakamracchaviravikiraṇaśreṇikirmīritāntā guñjāpuñjānurāgadviguṇitamahasaḥ pāntu kṛṣṇā ghribhāsaḥ //
analyzed: dūrāt ānamra kamra chavi ravi kiraṇa śreṇi kirmīrita antāḥ guñjā puñja anurāga dvi guṇita mahasaḥ pāntu kṛṣṇāḥ ghri bhāsaḥ

original: MSS_6862-1 udyattāruṇyavāruṇyatiśayitamadocchvāsacāruṇyatī va prodañcatpañcabāṇapracuraruciradṛkcañcarīkaprapañce /
analyzed: udyat tāruṇya vāruṇī atiśayita mada ucchvāsa cāruṇyatī va prodañcat pañcabāṇa pracura rucira dṛś cañcarīka prapañce

original: MSS_6862-2 mandaśrīścandramāste sati sutanu mukhe procchvasattandramāste hīnaṃ śobhābhirambhoruhamapi rajanau naiti rambhoru hāsam //
analyzed: manda śrīḥ candramāḥ te sati su tanu mukhe procchvasat tandramāḥ te hīnam śobhābhiḥ ambhoruham api rajanau na eti rambhā ūru hāsam

original: MSS_6863-1 udyatsaurabhagarbhanirbharamiladvālā kuraśrīmṛto mākandānavalokya yaḥ pratidiśaṃ sānandamutkūjitaḥ /
analyzed: udyat saurabha garbha nirbhara milat vālā kura śrī mṛtaḥ mākandān avalokya yaḥ pratidiśam sa ānandam utkūjitaḥ

original: MSS_6863-2 tānevādya phalāśayā pariraṭalluṇṭhākakākāvalī- vācālānupalabhya kokilayuvā jātaḥ sa vācaṃyamaḥ //
analyzed: tān eva adya phalāśayā pariraṭat luṇṭhāka kāka āvalī vācālān upalabhya kokila yuvā jātaḥ sa vācaṃyamaḥ

original: MSS_6864-1 udyadgandhaprabandhāṃ paramasukharasāṃ kokilālāpajalpāṃ puṣpasraksaukumāryāṃ kusumaśaravadhūṃ rūpato nirjayantīm /
analyzed: udyat gandha prabandhām parama sukha rasām kokila ālāpa jalpām puṣpa sraj saukumāryām kusuma śara vadhūm rūpataḥ nirjayantīm

original: MSS_6864-2 saukhyaṃ sarvendriyāṇāmabhimatamabhitaḥ kurvatīṃ mānaseṣṭāṃ satsaubhāgyāllabhante kṛtasukṛtavaśāḥ kāminīṃ martyamukhyāḥ //
analyzed: saukhyam sarva indriyāṇām abhimatam abhitas kurvatīm mānasa iṣṭām sat saubhāgyāt labhante kṛta sukṛta vaśāḥ kāminīm martya mukhyāḥ

original: MSS_6865-1 udyadduḥsahavittatānavatayā baddhāvadhāne manasy unmārgabhramaṇe'vaśasya rabhasācchvabhre paribhrāmyataḥ /
analyzed: udyat duḥsaha vitta tānava tayā baddha avadhāne manasi unmārga bhramaṇa vaśasya rabhasāt śvabhre paribhrāmyataḥ

original: MSS_6865-2 anyo'pāhitakośapṛṣṭhaluṭhanāt saṃdarśitā gakṣater jantorhanta tanoti durgatiśamaṃ ramyānulomyo vidhiḥ //
analyzed: anya upāhita kośa pṛṣṭha luṭhanāt saṃdarśitā jantoḥ hanta tanoti durgati śamam ramya ānulomyaḥ vidhiḥ

original: MSS_6866-1 udyadbarhiṣi dardurāravapuṣi prkṣīṇapānthāyuṣi ścyotadvipruṣi candraru muṣi sakhe haṃsadviṣi prāvṛṣi /
analyzed: udyat barhiṣi dardura āra vapuṣi prkṣīṇa pāntha āyuṣi sakhe haṃsa dviṣi prāvṛṣi

original: MSS_6866-2 mā muñcoccakucāgrasantatapatadbāṣpākulāṃ bālikāṃ kāle kālakarālanīlajaladavyāluptabhāsvattviṣi //
analyzed: mā muñca ucca kuca agra santata patat bāṣpa ākulām bālikām kāle kāla karāla nīla jalada vyālupta bhāsvat tviṣi

original: MSS_6867-1 udyadbālā kuraśrīrdiśi diśi daśanairebhirāśāgajānāṃ rohanmūlā sugaurairuragapatiphaṇairatra pātālakukṣau /
analyzed: udyat bālā kura śrīḥ diśi diśi daśanaiḥ ebhiḥ āśā gajānām rohat mūlā su gauraiḥ uraga pati phaṇaiḥ atra pātāla kukṣau

original: MSS_6867-2 asminnākāśadeśe vikasitakusumā rāśibhistārakāṇāṃ nātha tvatkīrtivallī phalati phalamidaṃ bimbamindoḥ sudhārdram //
analyzed: asmin ākāśa deśe vikasita kusumā rāśibhiḥ tārakāṇām nātha tvad kīrti vallī phalati phalam idam bimbam indoḥ sudhā ārdram

original: MSS_6868-1 udyadvidrumakāntibhiḥ kisalayaistāmrāṃ tviṣaṃ bibhrato bhṛ gālīvirutaiḥ kalairaviśadavyāhāralīlābhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: udyat vidruma kāntibhiḥ kisalayaiḥ tāmrām tviṣam bibhrataḥ gālī virutaiḥ kalaiḥ aviśada vyāhāra līlā bhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_6868-2 ghūrṇanto malayānilāhaticalaiḥ śākhāsamūhairmuhur bhrāntiṃ prāpya madhuprasa gamadhunā mattā ivāmī drumāḥ //
analyzed: ghūrṇantaḥ malaya anila āhati calaiḥ śākhā samūhaiḥ muhur bhrāntim prāpya madhuprasa gam adhunā mattāḥ iva amī drumāḥ

original: MSS_6869-1 udyadvilocanahutāśataḍidvikāśa- vyāsaṃginī suradhunīpayasā sagarbhā /
analyzed: udyat vilocana hutāśa taḍit vikāśa vyāsaṃginī suradhunī payasā sagarbhā

original: MSS_6869-2 bhrājatkalānidhibalākaviśobhamānā pāyājjaṭāghanaghaṭā vṛṣabhadhvajasya //
analyzed: bhrājat kalānidhi balāka viśobhamānā pāyāt jaṭā ghana ghaṭā vṛṣabhadhvajasya

original: MSS_6870-1 udyadvivekatapanapraphulle hṛdayāmbuja /
analyzed: udyat viveka tapana praphulle hṛdaya ambuja

original: MSS_6870-2 viśate bhagavadbhaktir aravinda ivendirā //
analyzed: viśate bhagavat bhaktiḥ aravinde iva indirā

original: MSS_6871-1 udyantu nāma subahūni mahāmahāṃsi candro'pyalaṃ bhuvanamaṇḍalamaṇḍanāya /
analyzed: udyantu nāma su bahūni mahā mahāṃsi candraḥ upi alam bhuvana maṇḍala maṇḍanāya

original: MSS_6871-2 sūryādṛte na tadudeti na cāstameti yenoditena dinamastamitena rātriḥ //
analyzed: sūryāt ṛte na tat udeti na ca astam eti yena uditena dinam astamitena rātriḥ

original: MSS_6872-1 udyantu śatamādityā udyantu śatamindavaḥ /
analyzed: udyantu śatam ādityāḥ udyantu śatam indavaḥ

original: MSS_6872-2 na vinā viduṣāṃ vākyair naśyatyābhyantaraṃ tamaḥ //
analyzed: na vinā viduṣām vākyaiḥ naśyati ābhyantaram tamaḥ

original: MSS_6873-1 udyannādaṃ dhanvibhirniṣṭhurāṇi sthūlānyuccairmaṇḍalatvaṃ dadhanti /
analyzed: udyat nādam dhanvibhiḥ niṣṭhurāṇi sthūlāni uccais maṇḍala tvam dadhanti

original: MSS_6873-2 āsphālyante kārmukāṇi sma kāmaṃ hastyārohaiḥ kuñjarāṇāṃ śirāṃsi //
analyzed: āsphālyante kārmukāṇi sma kāmam hasti ārohaiḥ kuñjarāṇām śirāṃsi

original: MSS_6874-1 udyannityaṃ tvaritas tamo'pagamayati karaiḥ samākṛṣya /
analyzed: udyat nityam tvaritaḥ tam upagamayati karaiḥ samākṛṣya

original: MSS_6874-2 mahitas tadasi sthāne mitra pumāṃstvaṃ pare klībāḥ //
analyzed: mahitaḥ tat asi sthāne mitra pumān tvam pare klībāḥ

original: MSS_6875-1 udyanneva jagadvisṛtvaraghanadhvāntaughamadhvaṃsayaḥ pādanyāsamaśeṣabhūdharaśiraḥ pīṭhītaṭeṣu nyadhāḥ /
analyzed: udyan eva jagat visṛtvara ghana dhvānta ogham adhvaṃsayaḥ pāda nyāsam aśeṣa bhūdhara śiraḥ pīṭhī taṭeṣu nyadhāḥ

original: MSS_6875-2 dhikkṛtyendumapi śriyaṃ vyatanuthāḥ padmāptapadmotkare jīved vāsarameva vā tvamiva yastajjīvanaṃ jīvanam //
analyzed: dhikkṛtya indum api śriyam vyatanuthāḥ padma āpta padma utkare jīvet vāsaram eva vā tvam iva yaḥ tat jīvanam jīvanam

original: MSS_6876-1 udyanmahānilavaśotthavicitravīci- vikṣiptanakramakarādinitāntabhītim /
analyzed: udyat mahā anila vaśa uttha vicitra vīci vikṣipta nakra makara ādi nitānta bhītim

original: MSS_6876-2 ambhodhimadhyamupayāti vivṛddhavelaṃ lobhākulo maraṇadoṣamamanyamānaḥ //
analyzed: ambhodhi madhyam upayāti vivṛddha velam lobha ākulaḥ maraṇa doṣam a manyamānaḥ

original: MSS_6877-1 udyanmahīpālamarīcimālī- śilīmukhaśreṇikarāvalībhiḥ /
analyzed: udyat mahīpāla marīcimālī śilīmukha śreṇi kara āvalībhiḥ

original: MSS_6877-2 udārabhūdāraghanāndhakāra- saṃbhāramucchinnataraṃ cakāra //
analyzed: udāra bhūdāra ghana andhakāra saṃbhāram ucchinnataram cakāra

original: MSS_6878-1 udyamaṃ kurute jantur daivaṃ sarvatra kāraṇam /
analyzed: udyamam kurute jantuḥ daivam sarvatra kāraṇam

original: MSS_6878-2 samudramanthanāllebhe harirlakṣmīṃ haro viṣam //
analyzed: samudra manthanāt lebhe hariḥ lakṣmīm haraḥ viṣam

original: MSS_6879-1 udyamaṃ kurvatāṃ puṃsāṃ phalaṃ bhāgyānusārataḥ /
analyzed: udyamam kurvatām puṃsām phalam bhāgya anusārataḥ

original: MSS_6879-2 samudramanthanāllebhe harirlakṣmīṃ haro viṣam //
analyzed: samudra manthanāt lebhe hariḥ lakṣmīm haraḥ viṣam

original: MSS_6880-1 udyamaṃ kurvatāṃ puṃsāṃ phalaṃ mārjārakarmavat /
analyzed: udyamam kurvatām puṃsām phalam mārjāra karma vat

original: MSS_6880-2 janmaprabhṛti gaurnāsti payaḥ pibati nityaśaḥ //
analyzed: janma prabhṛti gauḥ nā asti payaḥ pibati nityaśas

original: MSS_6881-1 udyamaḥ kalahaḥ kaṇḍūr dyūtamadyaparastriyaḥ /
analyzed: udyamaḥ kalahaḥ kaṇḍūḥ dyūta madya para striyaḥ

original: MSS_6881-2 nidrā maithunamālasyaṃ sevanāt tu vivardhate //
analyzed: nidrā maithunam ālasyam sevanāt tu vivardhate

original: MSS_6882-1 udyamaḥ sāhasaṃ dhairyaṃ balaṃ budhiḥ parākramaḥ /
analyzed: udyamaḥ sāhasam dhairyam balam budhiḥ parākramaḥ

original: MSS_6882-2 ṣaḍete yasya tiṣṭhanti tasya devo'pi śa kitaḥ //
analyzed: ṣaṭ ete yasya tiṣṭhanti tasya devaḥ upi śa kitaḥ

original: MSS_6883-1 udyamasya prasādena dṛśyante vividhāḥ kalāḥ /
analyzed: udyamasya prasādena dṛśyante vividhāḥ kalāḥ

original: MSS_6883-2 kātarā eva jalpanti yad bhāvyaṃ tad bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: kātarāḥ eva jalpanti yat bhāvyam tat bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_6884-1 udyamākhyānamaparaṃ prakīrṇākhyānakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: udyama ākhyānam aparam prakīrṇa ākhyānakam tathā

original: MSS_6884-2 samasyākhyānamaparaṃ prahelyādipraśaṃsanam //
analyzed: samasyā ākhyānam aparam praheli ādi praśaṃsanam

original: MSS_6885-1 udyamī labhate siddhim ayogyo'pi suniścitam /
analyzed: udyamī labhate siddhim ayogyaḥ api su niścitam

original: MSS_6885-2 anūrurgaganasyāntaṃ prayātyeva dine dine //
analyzed: anūruḥ gaganasya antam prayāti eva dine dine

original: MSS_6885A-1 udyamī siddhimāpnoti sahāyyavikalo'pi cet /
analyzed: udyamī siddhim āpnoti sahāyya vikalaḥ api ced

original: MSS_6885A-2 ekacakraratho'nūrusūto'rko vyoma gāhate //
analyzed: eka cakra ratha ūnūru sūta urkaḥ vyoma gāhate

original: MSS_6886-1 udyamena vinā rājan na sidhyanti manorathāḥ /
analyzed: udyamena vinā rājan na sidhyanti manorathāḥ

original: MSS_6886-2 kātarā iti jalpanti yad bhāvyaṃ tad bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: kātarāḥ iti jalpanti yat bhāvyam tat bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_6887-1 udyamena vinā rājan na sidhyanti manorathāḥ /
analyzed: udyamena vinā rājan na sidhyanti manorathāḥ

original: MSS_6887-2 nahi suptasya siṃhasya praviśanti mukhe mṛgāḥ //
analyzed: nahi suptasya siṃhasya praviśanti mukhe mṛgāḥ

original: MSS_6888-1 udyamena hi sidhyanti kāryāṇi na manorathaiḥ /
analyzed: udyamena hi sidhyanti kāryāṇi na manorathaiḥ

original: MSS_6888-2 nahi suptasya siṃhasya praviśanti mukhe mṛgāḥ //
analyzed: nahi suptasya siṃhasya praviśanti mukhe mṛgāḥ

original: MSS_6889-1 udyame nāsti dāridryaṃ japyato nāsti pātakam /
analyzed: udyame na asti dāridryam japyataḥ na asti pātakam

original: MSS_6889-2 maunena kalaho nāsti nāsti jāgarato bhayam //
analyzed: maunena kalahaḥ na asti na asti jāgarataḥ bhayam

original: MSS_6890-1 udyamenaiva kāryāṇi sidhyanti na manorathaiḥ /
analyzed: udyamena eva kāryāṇi sidhyanti na manorathaiḥ

original: MSS_6890-2 nahi suptasya siṃhasya viśanti vadane mṛgāḥ //
analyzed: nahi suptasya siṃhasya viśanti vadane mṛgāḥ

original: MSS_6891-1 udyayau dīrghikāgarbhān mukulaṃ mecakotpalam /
analyzed: udyayau dīrghikā garbhāt mukulam mecaka utpalam

original: MSS_6891-2 nārīlocanacāturyaśa kāsaṃkucitaṃ yathā //
analyzed: nārī locana cāturyaśa kā saṃkucitam yathā

original: MSS_6892-1 udyallāvaṇyalakṣmīvalayitavapuṣāṃ svargavārā ganānām āśleṣe yaḥ pramodaḥ sphurati ca garimā yo'mṛte mādhurīṇām /
analyzed: udyat lāvaṇya lakṣmī valayita vapuṣām svarga vārāḥ ganānām āśleṣe yaḥ pramodaḥ sphurati ca garimā yaḥ umṛte mādhurīṇām

original: MSS_6892-2 saurabhyaṃ ku kume yat payasi vimalatā yāpyaho tatsamastaṃ mitraikatrekṣituṃ cedabhilaṣasi tadā paśya kṛṣṇasya kāvyam //
analyzed: saurabhyam ku kume yat payasi vimala tā yā api aho tat samastam mitra ekatra īkṣitum ced abhilaṣasi tadā paśya kṛṣṇasya kāvyam

original: MSS_6893-1 udyātyeva suhṛtkulaṃ pratibalaṃ yātyeva nīcaistarām āyāntyeva yaśaḥśriyaḥ pratidiśaṃ yāntyeva satkīrtayaḥ /
analyzed: udyāti eva suhṛd kulam pratibalam yāti eva nīcaistarām āyānti eva yaśaḥ śriyaḥ pratidiśam yānti eva sat kīrtayaḥ

original: MSS_6893-2 yenaikena mukhāgrapāṭitatanūbhūtārdrakoṭiśriyā sarvāścaryamayaḥ sa eva jayati tvatkhaḍgadhārāpathaḥ //
analyzed: yena ekena mukha agra pāṭita tanūbhūta ārdra koṭi śriyā sarva āścarya mayaḥ saḥ eva jayati tvad khaḍga dhārā pathaḥ

original: MSS_6894-1 udyānaṃ kaumudī gītaṃ kāntā keliḥ suhṛt kathā /
analyzed: udyānam kaumudī gītam kāntā keliḥ suhṛd kathā

original: MSS_6894-2 kṛtināṃ sukṛtakrītaḥ svargabhogo bhuvi sthitaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtinām sukṛta krītaḥ svarga bhogaḥ bhuvi sthitaḥ

original: MSS_6895-1 udyānaṃ vanabhūmayaḥ kusumitairudgandhayaḥ pādapaiḥ śailā nirjharahāsino jaladharaśyāmā giriḥ kṛtrimaḥ /
analyzed: udyānam vana bhūmayaḥ kusumitaiḥ udgandhayaḥ pādapaiḥ śailāḥ nirjhara hāsinaḥ jaladhara śyāmāḥ giriḥ kṛtrimaḥ

original: MSS_6895-2 nadyaḥ sārasamūrcchitormivalayā gharmābhiṣekāspadaṃ śītāḥ śīkarasaṃgamātsurabhayo mitraṃ sarojānilāḥ //
analyzed: nadyaḥ sārasa mūrcchita ūrmi valayāḥ gharma abhiṣeka āspadam śītāḥ śīkara saṃgamāt surabhayaḥ mitram saroja anilāḥ

original: MSS_6896-1 udyānapāla kalaśāmbuniṣecanānām etasya campakatarorayameva kālaḥ /
analyzed: udyāna pāla kalaśa ambu niṣecanānām etasya campaka taroḥ ayam eva kālaḥ

original: MSS_6896-2 tasmin nidāghanihate ghanavāriṇā vā saṃvardhite tava vṛthobhayathopayogaḥ //
analyzed: tasmin nidāgha nihate ghana vāriṇā vā saṃvardhite tava vṛthā ubhayathā upayogaḥ

original: MSS_6897-1 udyānamārutoddhūtāś cūtacampakareṇavaḥ /
analyzed: udyāna māruta uddhūtāḥ cūta campaka reṇavaḥ

original: MSS_6897-2 udaśrayanti pānthānām aspṛśanto'pi locane //
analyzed: udaśrayanti pānthānām a spṛśantaḥ api locane

original: MSS_6898-1 udyānasahakārāṇām anudbhinnā na mañjarī /
analyzed: udyāna sahakārāṇām anudbhinnā na mañjarī

original: MSS_6898-2 deyaḥ pathikanārīṇāṃ satilaḥ salilāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: deyaḥ pathika nārīṇām sa tilaḥ salila añjaliḥ

original: MSS_6899-1 udyānāni na sarvadā paribhavatrāsādivādhyāsate bhūmau nopaviśanti ye khalu rajaḥsaṃparkatarkādiva /
analyzed: udyānāni na sarvadā paribhava trāsāt iva adhyāsate bhūmau na upaviśanti ye khalu rajaḥ saṃparka tarkāt iva

original: MSS_6899-2 teṣāmapyatipūjanīyavapuṣāṃ nūnaṃ pikānāmiyaṃ dhik kaṣṭaṃ parapuṣṭateti kimapi prācāṃ phalaṃ karmaṇām //
analyzed: teṣām api ati pūjanīya vapuṣām nūnam pikānām iyam dhik kaṣṭam parapuṣṭa tā iti kim api prācām phalam karmaṇām

original: MSS_6900-1 udyāneṣu vicitrabhhojanavidhis tīvrātitīvraṃ tapaḥ kaupīnāvaraṇaṃ suvastramabhitaṃ bhikṣāṭanaṃ maṇḍanam /
analyzed: udyāneṣu vicitra bhhojana vidhiḥ tīvra ati tīvram tapaḥ kaupīna āvaraṇam su vastram abhitam bhikṣāṭanam maṇḍanam

original: MSS_6900-2 āsannaṃ maraṇaṃ ca ma galasamaṃ satyaṃ samutpadyate tāṃ kāśīṃ parihṛtya hanta vibudhairanyatra kiṃ sthīyate //
analyzed: āsannam maraṇam ca ma gala samam satyam samutpadyate tām kāśīm parihṛtya hanta vibudhaiḥ anyatra kim sthīyate

original: MSS_6901-1 udyāne sahakārakorakarasapratyāśayā kokilaḥ sthātuṃ vāñchati cittajanmanṛpatermitraṃ ca mantrī yataḥ /
analyzed: udyāne sahakāra koraka rasa pratyāśayā kokilaḥ sthātum vāñchati cittajanma nṛpateḥ mitram ca mantrī yatas

original: MSS_6901-2 kiṃtu dhvā kṣavijṛmbhiteṣu ca pikaprārabdhagāneṣu ca kreṃkāreṣu ca pañcamadhvaniṣu ca śrotā na vettyantaram //
analyzed: kiṃtu dhvā kṣa vijṛmbhiteṣu ca pika prārabdha gāneṣu ca kreṃkāreṣu ca pañcama dhvaniṣu ca śrotā na vetti antaram

original: MSS_6903-1 udyogaḥ kṣayameti hanta sahasā jāḍyaṃ samujjṛmbhate mitrasyāpi ca darśanaṃ bhavati no kiṃ vānyadācakṣmahe /
analyzed: udyogaḥ kṣayam eti hanta sahasā jāḍyam samujjṛmbhate mitrasya api ca darśanam bhavati no kim vā anyat ācakṣmahe

original: MSS_6903-2 yallokaspṛhaṇīyatāṃ gatamabhūt tajjīvanaṃ vyarthatāṃ prāptaṃ yena dunoti tan mama mano durdaivavad durdinam //
analyzed: yat loka spṛhaṇīya tām gatam abhūt tat jīvanam vyartha tām prāptam yena dunoti tat mama manaḥ durdaiva vat durdinam

original: MSS_6904-1 udyogaḥ śatruvan mitram ālasyaṃ mitravad viṣam /
analyzed: udyogaḥ śatru vat mitram ālasyam mitra vat viṣam

original: MSS_6904-2 viṣavac cāmṛtaṃ vidyā sudhāvad viṣama ganā //
analyzed: viṣavat ca amṛtam vidyā sudhā vat

original: MSS_6905-1 udyogaḥ sāhasaṃ dhairyaṃ buddhiḥ śaktiḥ parākramaḥ /
analyzed: udyogaḥ sāhasam dhairyam buddhiḥ śaktiḥ parākramaḥ

original: MSS_6905-2 utsāhaḥ ṣaḍvidho yasya tasya devo'pi śa kate //
analyzed: utsāhaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ yasya tasya devaḥ api śa kate

original: MSS_6906-1 udyogamedhādhṛtisattvasatya- tyāgānurāgasthitigauravāṇi /
analyzed: udyoga medhā dhṛti sattva satya tyāga anurāga sthiti gauravāṇi

original: MSS_6906-2 jitendriyatvaṃ prasahiṣṇutā hrīḥ prāgalbhyamityātmaguṇapravekaḥ //
analyzed: jita indriya tvam prasahiṣṇu tā hrīḥ prāgalbhyam iti ātma guṇa pravekaḥ

original: MSS_6907-1 udyogādanivṛttasya susahāyasya dhīmataḥ /
analyzed: udyogāt anivṛttasya su sahāyasya dhīmataḥ

original: MSS_6907-2 chāyevānugatā tasya nityaṃ śrīḥ sahacāriṇī //
analyzed: chāyā iva anugatā tasya nityam śrīḥ sahacāriṇī

original: MSS_6907A-1 udyogānusārī lakṣmīḥ kīrtis tyāgānusāriṇī /
MSS_6907A-2 abhyāsānusārī vidyā buddhiḥ karmānusāriṇī //
MSS_6908-1 udyoginaṃ puruṣasiṃhamupaiti lakṣmīr daivena deyamiti kāpuruṣā vadanti /
analyzed: udyoginam puruṣa siṃham upaiti lakṣmīḥ daivena deyam iti kāpuruṣāḥ vadanti

original: MSS_6908-2 daivaṃ nihatya kuru pauruṣamātmaśaktyā yatne kṛte yadi na sidhyati ko'tra doṣaḥ //
analyzed: daivam nihatya kuru pauruṣam ātma śaktyā yatne kṛte yadi na sidhyati kaḥ atra doṣaḥ

original: MSS_6909-1 udyoginaḥ karālambaṃ karoti kamalālayā /
analyzed: udyoginaḥ kara ālambam karoti kamalālayā

original: MSS_6909-2 anudyogikarālambaṃ karoti kamalāgrajā //
analyzed: anudyogi kara ālambam karoti kamalāgrajā

original: MSS_6910-1 udyogena kṛte kārye siddhiryasya na vidyate /
analyzed: udyogena kṛte kārye siddhiḥ yasya na vidyate

original: MSS_6910-2 daivaṃ tasya pramāṇaṃ hi kartavyaṃ pauruṣaṃ sadā //
analyzed: daivam tasya pramāṇam hi kartavyam pauruṣam sadā

original: MSS_6911-1 udyogena vinā naiva kāryaṃ kimapi sidhyati /
analyzed: udyogena vinā nā eva kāryam kim api sidhyati

original: MSS_6911-2 nahi suptasya siṃhasya praviśanti mukhe mṛgāḥ //
analyzed: nahi suptasya siṃhasya praviśanti mukhe mṛgāḥ

original: MSS_6913-1 udvartayantyā hṛdaye nipatya nṛpasya dṛṣṭirnyavṛtad drutaiva /
analyzed: udvartayantyāḥ hṛdaye nipatya nṛpasya dṛṣṭiḥ nyavṛtat drutā eva

original: MSS_6913-2 viyogivairāt kucayornakhā kair ardhendulīlairgalahastiteva //
analyzed: viyogi vairāt kucayoḥ nakhā kaiḥ ardha indu līlaiḥ galahasti tā iva

original: MSS_6914-1 udvartitamapi bahudhā- nuliptamapi candanāgururasādyaiḥ /
analyzed: udvartitam api bahudhā nuliptam api candana aguru rasa ādyaiḥ

original: MSS_6914-2 bhajati tathāpi śarīraṃ daurgandhyaṃ tatra ko hetuḥ //
analyzed: bhajati tathā api śarīram daurgandhyam tatra kaḥ hetuḥ

original: MSS_6915-1 udvāsayituṃ veśmani saraghāḥ kurvanti yanmadhucchattram /
analyzed: udvāsayitum veśmani saraghāḥ kurvanti yat madhu chattram

original: MSS_6915-2 durgā karoti nīḍaṃ kuryur valmīkamupadīkāḥ //
analyzed: durgā karoti nīḍam kuryuḥ valmīkamupadīkāḥ

original: MSS_6916-1 udvāhāropitārdrakṣatanijapadayoḥ saṃgatāmindumaulā- vānamre yāṃ sudhāṃśorvyadhita kila kalāṃ tūrṇamevānnapūrṇām /
analyzed: udvāha āropita ārdra kṣata nija padayoḥ saṃgatām indumaulā vā anamre yām sudhāṃśoḥ vyadhita kila kalām tūrṇam eva anna pūrṇām

original: MSS_6916-2 saktānāmakṣatānāmamṛtadṛganalopādhitaḥ pakvabhāvān nānārthairannapūrṇā praṇatajanatateḥ pūrṇatāmātanotu //
analyzed: saktānām akṣatānām amṛta dṛś anala upādhitaḥ pakva bhāvāt nānā arthaiḥ anna pūrṇā praṇata jana tateḥ pūrṇa tām ātanotu

original: MSS_6917-1 udvijante yathā sarpān narādanṛtavādinaḥ /
analyzed: udvijante yathā sarpāt narāt anṛta vādinaḥ

original: MSS_6917-2 dharmaḥ satyaṃ paro loke mūlaṃ svargasya cocyate //
analyzed: dharmaḥ satyam paraḥ loke mūlam svargasya ca ucyate

original: MSS_6918-1 udvīkṣya priyakarakuḍmalāpaviddhair vakṣojadvayamabhiṣiktamanyanāryāḥ /
analyzed: udvīkṣya priya kara kuḍmala apaviddhaiḥ vakṣoja dvayam abhiṣiktam anya nāryāḥ

original: MSS_6918-2 ambhobhirmuhurasicadvadhūramarṣād ātmīyaṃ pṛthutaranetrayugmamuktaiḥ //
analyzed: ambhobhiḥ muhur asicat vadhūḥ amarṣāt ātmīyam pṛthutara netra yugma muktaiḥ

original: MSS_6919-1 udvṛttadaityapṛtanāpatikaṇṭhapīṭha- cchedocchaladbahalaśoṇitaśoṇadhāram /
analyzed: udvṛtta daitya pṛtanā pati kaṇṭha pīṭha cheda ucchalat bahala śoṇita śoṇa dhāram

original: MSS_6919-2 cakraṃ kriyādabhimatāni harerudāra- digdāhadāruṇanabhaḥ śriyamudvahad vaḥ //
analyzed: cakram kriyāt abhimatāni hareḥ udāra digdāha dāruṇa nabhaḥ śriyam udvahat vaḥ

original: MSS_6920-1 udvṛttastanabhāra eṣa tarale netre cale bhrūlate rāgādhikyatamoṣṭhapallavadalaṃ kurvantu nāma vyathām /
analyzed: udvṛtta stana bhāraḥ eṣa tarale netre cale bhrū late rāga ādhikya tamaḥ uṣṭha pallava dalam kurvantu nāma vyathām

original: MSS_6920-2 saubhāgyākṣarapa ktikeva likhitā puṣpāyudhena svayaṃ madhyasthā hi karoti tāpamadhikaṃ romāvalī kena sā //
analyzed: saubhāgya akṣara pa ktikā iva likhitā puṣpāyudhena svayam madhyasthā hi karoti tāpam adhikam roma āvalī kena sā

original: MSS_6921-1 udvṛttastanabhārabha guramuro notkañcukaṃ kāritā saṃyogastu yathā tatheti sakalā nīvī na visraṃsitā /
analyzed: udvṛtta stana bhāra bha guram uraḥ nā utkañcukam kāritā saṃyogaḥ tu yathā tathā iti sakalā nīvī na visraṃsitā

original: MSS_6921-2 bhūyaḥ saṃgama āvayoḥ kva nu bhavedevaṃ ca nollāpitā saṃbhrāntatvaritena bhītasuratenaivaṃ vayaṃ vañcitāḥ //
analyzed: bhūyas saṃgamaḥ āvayoḥ kva nu bhavet evam ca nā ullāpitā saṃbhrānta tvaritena bhīta suratena evam vayam vañcitāḥ

original: MSS_6922-1 udvegaṃ janayanti saṃcitavṛṣavyāptājiropāntakāḥ prātaḥ śīrṇakuṭīrapuñjatalatāśimbītuṣārāvi lāḥ /
analyzed: udvegam janayanti saṃcita vṛṣa vyāpta ajira upāntakāḥ prātar śīrṇa kuṭīra puñja tala tā śimbī tuṣāra avi

original: MSS_6922-2 grāmā gomayadhūmasaṃtatiparikliṣṭāruṇaśmaśrubhir vṛddhaiḥ kuḍyanivātalīnanibhṛtairabhyarthyamānātapāḥ //
analyzed: grāmāḥ gomaya dhūma saṃtati parikliṣṭa aruṇa śmaśrubhiḥ vṛddhaiḥ kuḍya nivāta līna nibhṛtaiḥ abhyarthyamāna ātapāḥ

original: MSS_6922A-1 udvegasya nivāraṇāya duritacchedāya puṇyāptaye pānāya śravaṇāmṛtasya dhṛtaye kasmaicidārticchide /
analyzed: udvegasya nivāraṇāya durita chedāya puṇya āptaye pānāya śravaṇa amṛtasya dhṛtaye kasmaicid ārti chide

original: MSS_6922A-2 ucchvāsaṃ puruṣottamācyuta hare govinda nārāyaṇa śrīvatsā ka mukunda kṛṣṇa kamalākānteti vācyaṃ muhuḥ //
analyzed: ucchvāsam puruṣottama acyuta hare govinda nārāyaṇa śrīvatsā ka mukunda kṛṣṇa kamalā kānta iti vācyam muhur

original: MSS_6923-1 udvejanīyo bhūtānāṃ nṛśaṃsaḥ pāpakarmakṛt /
analyzed: udvejanīyaḥ bhūtānām nṛśaṃsaḥ pāpa karma kṛt

original: MSS_6923-2 trayāṇāmapi lokānām īśvaro'pi na tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaraḥ api na tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_6924-1 udvejayati tīkṣṇena mṛdunā paribhūyate /
analyzed: udvejayati tīkṣṇena mṛdunā paribhūyate

original: MSS_6924-2 tasmād yathārhato daṇḍaṃ nayet pakṣamanāśritaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt yathārhataḥ daṇḍam nayet pakṣam anāśritaḥ

original: MSS_6925-1 udvejayati tīkṣṇena mṛdunā paribhūyate /
analyzed: udvejayati tīkṣṇena mṛdunā paribhūyate

original: MSS_6925-2 daṇḍena nṛpatis tasmād yuktadaṇḍaḥ praśasyate //
analyzed: daṇḍena nṛpatiḥ tasmāt yukta daṇḍaḥ praśasyate

original: MSS_6926-1 udvejayati daridraṃ paramudrāyā jhaṇatkāraḥ /
analyzed: udvejayati daridram para mudrāyāḥ jhaṇatkāraḥ

original: MSS_6926-2 gṛhapatiratimilitāyāḥ ka kaṇarāvo yathā jāram //
analyzed: gṛhapatiḥ ati militāyāḥ ka kaṇarāvaḥ yathā jāram

original: MSS_6927-1 udvejayati bhūtāni daṇḍapāruṣyavān nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: udvejayati bhūtāni daṇḍa pāruṣyavān nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_6927-2 bhūtānyudvejyamānāni dviṣatāṃ yānti saṃśrayam //
analyzed: bhūtāni udvejyamānāni dviṣatām yānti saṃśrayam

original: MSS_6928-1 udvejayati bhūtāni yasya rājñaḥ kuśāsanam /
analyzed: udvejayati bhūtāni yasya rājñaḥ kuśāsanam

original: MSS_6928-2 siṃhāsanaviyuktasya tasya kṣipraṃ kuśāsanam //
analyzed: siṃhāsana viyuktasya tasya kṣipram kuśa āsanam

original: MSS_6929-1 udvejayatya gulipārṣṇibhāgān mārge śilībhūtahime'pi yatra /
analyzed: guli pārṣṇi bhāgān mārge śilībhūta hime pi yatra

original: MSS_6929-2 na durvahaśroṇipayodharārtā bhindanti mandāṃ gatimaśvamukhyaḥ //
analyzed: na durvaha śroṇi payodhara ārtāḥ bhindanti mandām gatim aśvamukhyaḥ

original: MSS_6930-1 udveṣṭya svayameva lekhamuditaprasvedakampā gulis tasmin sekaviluptaśeṣaśithilaṃ dṛṣṭvā lipiprakramam /
analyzed: udveṣṭya svayam eva lekha mudita prasveda kampā guliḥ tasmin seka vilupta śeṣa śithilam dṛṣṭvā lipi prakramam

original: MSS_6930-2 etat kinnu hatāsmi saṃprati daśā tasyaivamāsīdayaṃ bāṣpo hanta karasya kampitamidaṃ hanteti sā roditi //
analyzed: etat kinnu hatā asmi saṃprati daśā tasya evam āsīt ayam bāṣpaḥ hanta karasya kampitam idam hantā iti sā roditi

original: MSS_6931-1 udvoḍhuṃ kanakavibhūṣaṇānyaśaktaḥ sadhrīcā valayitapadmanālasūtraḥ /
analyzed: udvoḍhum kanaka vibhūṣaṇāni aśaktaḥ sadhrīcā valayita padma nāla sūtraḥ

original: MSS_6931-2 ārūḍhaprativanitākaṭākṣabhāraḥ sādhīyo gururabhavad bhujastaruṇyāḥ //
analyzed: ārūḍha prativanitā kaṭākṣa bhāraḥ sādhīyaḥ guruḥ abhavat bhujaḥ taruṇyāḥ

original: MSS_6932-1 unnataṃ padamavāpya yo laghur helayaiva sa patediti bruvan /
analyzed: unnatam padam avāpya yaḥ laghuḥ helayā eva sa patet iti bruvan

original: MSS_6932-2 śailaśekharagato dṛṣatkaṇaś cārumārutadhutaḥ patatyadhaḥ //
analyzed: śaila śekhara gataḥ dṛṣad kaṇaḥ cāru māruta dhutaḥ patati adhas

original: MSS_6933-1 unnataṃ mānasaṃ yasya bhāgyaṃ tasya samunnatam /
analyzed: unnatam mānasam yasya bhāgyam tasya samunnatam

original: MSS_6933-2 nonnataṃ mānasaṃ yasya bhāgyaṃ tasyāsamunnatam //
analyzed: na unnatam mānasam yasya bhāgyam tasya a samunnatam

original: MSS_6934-1 unnataṃ sadanamuccakairhayo mākṣikaṃ dadhi saśarkaraṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: unnatam sadanam uccakais hayaḥ mākṣikam dadhi sa śarkaram payaḥ

original: MSS_6934-2 yāminī śaśikalā sukomalā labhyate kathamanarcite śive //
analyzed: yāminī śaśi kalā su komalā labhyate katham anarcite śive

original: MSS_6935-1 unnataḥ prollasaddhāraḥ kālāgurumalīmasaḥ /
analyzed: unnataḥ prollasat dhāraḥ kālāguru malīmasaḥ

original: MSS_6935-2 payodharabharastanvyāḥ kaṃ na cakre'bhilāṣiṇam //
analyzed: payodhara bharaḥ tanvyāḥ kam na cakra abhilāṣiṇam

original: MSS_6936-1 unnataghanamadhyagataṃ nirguṇamapi suradhanuḥ śobhām /
analyzed: unnata ghana madhya gatam nirguṇam api suradhanuḥ śobhām

original: MSS_6936-2 tena mahadbhiḥ sākaṃ saṃvāsaḥ prārthyate vijñaiḥ //
analyzed: tena mahadbhiḥ sākam saṃvāsaḥ prārthyate vijñaiḥ

original: MSS_6937-1 unnatadakṣiṇapakṣā bhakṣyamukhī vihitapārthivaninādā /
analyzed: unnata dakṣiṇa pakṣā bhakṣya mukhī vihita pārthiva ninādā

original: MSS_6937-2 tārā tarumadhigacchati tadyacchati vāñchitādadhikam //
analyzed: tārā tarum adhigacchati tat yacchati vāñchitāt adhikam

original: MSS_6938-1 unnatānāṃ suvaṃśānāṃ dvaidhaṃ tāvanna jāyate /
analyzed: unnatānām su vaṃśānām dvaidham tāvat na jāyate

original: MSS_6938-2 yāvat kuṭhāradhāreva yoṣid viśati nāntaram //
analyzed: yāvat kuṭhāra dhārā iva yoṣit viśati na antaram

original: MSS_6939-1 unnatāvanatabhāvavattayā candrikā satimirā gireriyam /
analyzed: unnata avanata bhāvavat tayā candrikā sa timirā gireḥ iyam

original: MSS_6939-2 bhaktibhirbahuvidhābhirarpitā bhāti bhūtiriva mattadantinaḥ //
analyzed: bhaktibhiḥ bahuvidhābhiḥ arpitā bhāti bhūtiḥ iva matta dantinaḥ

original: MSS_6940-1 unnateṣu śaśinaḥ prabhā sthitā nimnasaṃśrayaparaṃ niśātamaḥ /
analyzed: unnateṣu śaśinaḥ prabhā sthitā nimna saṃśraya param niśā tamaḥ

original: MSS_6940-2 nūnamātmasadṛśī prakalpitā vedhasaiva guṇadoṣayor gatiḥ //
analyzed: nūnam ātma sadṛśī prakalpitā vedhasā eva guṇa doṣayoḥ gatiḥ

original: MSS_6941-1 unnato'pi viśado'pi komalo'py adya jāḍyaharaṇakṣamo'pi ca /
analyzed: unnataḥ api viśadaḥ api komalaḥ api adya jāḍya haraṇa kṣamaḥ api ca

original: MSS_6941-2 antarujjvalaguṇo'pi nirdhanas tūlarāśiriva yāti lāghavam //
analyzed: antar ujjvala guṇaḥ api nirdhanaḥ tūla rāśiḥ iva yāti lāghavam

original: MSS_6942-1 unnatyai namati prabhuṃ prabhugṛhān draṣṭuṃ bahistiṣṭhati svadravyavyayamātanoti jaḍadhīrāgāmivittāśayā /
analyzed: unnatyai namati prabhum prabhu gṛhān draṣṭum bahis tiṣṭhati sva dravya vyayam ātanoti jaḍa dhīra āgāmi vitta āśayā

original: MSS_6942-2 prāṇān prāṇitumeva muñcati raṇe kliśnāti bhogecchayā sarvaṃ tad viparītameva kurute tṛṣṇāndhadṛk sevakaḥ //
analyzed: prāṇān prāṇitum eva muñcati raṇe kliśnāti bhoga icchayā sarvam tat viparītam eva kurute tṛṣṇā andha dṛś sevakaḥ

original: MSS_6943-1 unnamayya sakacagrahamāsyaṃ cumbati priyatame haṭhavṛttyā /
analyzed: unnamayya sa kaca graham āsyam cumbati priyatame haṭha vṛttyā

original: MSS_6943-2 huṃ hu muñca mama meti ca mandaṃ jalpitaṃ jayati mānadhanāyāḥ //
analyzed: hum hu muñca mama mā iti ca mandam jalpitam jayati māna dhanāyāḥ

original: MSS_6944-1 unnamitaikabhrūlatam ānanamasyāḥ padāni racayantyāḥ /
analyzed: unnamita eka bhrū latam ānanam asyāḥ padāni racayantyāḥ

original: MSS_6944-2 kaṇṭakitena prathayati mayyanurāgaṃ kapolena //
analyzed: kaṇṭakitena prathayati mayi anurāgam kapolena

original: MSS_6945-1 unnamya dūraṃ muhurānamantyaḥ kāntāḥ ślathībhūtanitambajāḍyāḥ /
analyzed: unnamya dūram muhur ānamantyaḥ kāntāḥ ślathībhūta nitamba jāḍyāḥ

original: MSS_6945-2 dolāvilāsena jitaśramatvāt prakarṣamāpuḥ puruṣāyiteṣu //
analyzed: dolā vilāsena jita śrama tvāt prakarṣam āpuḥ puruṣāyiteṣu

original: MSS_6946-1 unnamyonnamya tatraiva daridrāṇāṃ manorathāḥ /
analyzed: unnamya unnamya tatra eva daridrāṇām manorathāḥ

original: MSS_6946-2 patanti hṛdaye vyarthā vidhavāstrīstanā iva //
analyzed: patanti hṛdaye vyarthāḥ vidhavā strī stanāḥ iva

original: MSS_6947-1 unnamrasvapayodharāntarapayodhārābhirānandi saḥ cañcadbālakalāpakān kalagiro mugdhān navā ghrikramān /
analyzed: unnamra sva payodhara antara payaḥ dhārābhiḥ ānandi saḥ cañcat bāla kalāpakān kala giraḥ mugdhān navāḥ ghri kramān

original: MSS_6947-2 tvayyādhāya śikhaṇḍinaḥ śiva śiva prāvṛṭ samāptiṃ gatā teṣu tvaṃ tu śaraccharārucalitā jātāsi dhautāsivat //
analyzed: tvayi ādhāya śikhaṇḍinaḥ śiva śiva prāvṛṣ samāptim gatā teṣu tvam tu śarad śarāru calitā jātā asi dhauta asi vat

original: MSS_6948-1 unnayati nābhinimnān muktāvalipāśi romarājinalam /
analyzed: unnayati nābhi nimnāt muktā āvali pāśi romarāji nalam

original: MSS_6948-2 smaraśabaraḥ stanabhūdhara- nipatattarunākṣipakṣibandhāya //
analyzed: smara śabaraḥ stana bhūdhara nipatat taru nā akṣi pakṣi bandhāya

original: MSS_6949-1 unnidrakandaladalāntaralīyamāna- guñjanmadāndhamadhupe navameghakāle /
analyzed: unnidra kandala dala antara līyamāna guñjat mada andha madhupe nava megha kāle

original: MSS_6949-2 svapne'pi yaḥ pravasati pravihāya kāntāṃ tasmai viṣāṇarahitāya namo vṛṣāya //
analyzed: svapne pi yaḥ pravasati pravihāya kāntām tasmai viṣāṇa rahitāya namaḥ vṛṣāya

original: MSS_6950-1 unnidrakokanadareṇupiśa gitā gā gāyanti mañju madhupā gṛhadīrghikāsu /
analyzed: unnidra kokanada reṇu piśa gitā gāḥ gāyanti mañju madhupāḥ gṛha dīrghikāsu

original: MSS_6950-2 etaccakāsti ca ravernavabandhujīva- puṣpacchadābhamudayācalacumbi bimbam //
analyzed: etat cakāsti ca raveḥ nava bandhujīva puṣpa chada ābham udayācala cumbi bimbam

original: MSS_6951-1 unnidratā matsyasagandhitā ca pravālahāniḥ sapipīlikātvam /
analyzed: unnidra tā matsya sagandhi tā ca pravāla hāniḥ sa pipīlikā tvam

original: MSS_6951-2 tvagbhraṃśanād vārikṛtādajīrṇāt tarorbhavet tatra cikitsanīyam //
analyzed: tvac bhraṃśanāt vāri kṛtāt ajīrṇāt taroḥ bhavet tatra cikitsanīyam

original: MSS_6952-1 unnidrapriyakamanoramaṃ ramaṇyāḥ saṃreje sarasi vapuḥ prakāśameva /
analyzed: unnidra priyaka manoramam ramaṇyāḥ saṃreje sarasi vapuḥ prakāśam eva

original: MSS_6952-2 yuktānāṃ vimalatayā tiraskriyāyai nākrāmannapi hi bhavatyalaṃ jalaughaḥ //
analyzed: yuktānām vimala tayā tiraskriyāyai na ākrāman api hi bhavati alam jala oghaḥ

original: MSS_6953-1 unnidreṇa mayādya cintitamabhūdyatrāvatārā harer ākhyātā daśa kīrtito'si na kathaṃ tatra tvamekādaśaḥ /
analyzed: unnidreṇa mayā adya cintitam abhūt yatra avatārāḥ hareḥ ākhyātāḥ daśa kīrtitaḥ asi na katham tatra tvam ekādaśaḥ

original: MSS_6953-2 tviccāritramagocaraṃ kavigirāṃ jānannapi kṣmāpate na prastaumi bhayena bhāratakaveḥ kastādṛśaṃ vakṣyati //
analyzed: tvid cāritram agocaram kavi girām jānan api kṣmāpate na prastaumi bhayena bhārata kaveḥ kaḥ tādṛśam vakṣyati

original: MSS_6954-1 unnīto bhavabhūtinā pratidinaṃ bāṇe gate yaḥ purā yaścīrṇaḥ kamalāyudhena suciraṃ yenāgamat keśaṭaḥ /
analyzed: unnītaḥ bhavabhūtinā pratidinam bāṇe gate yaḥ purā yaḥ cīrṇaḥ kamalāyudhena su ciram yena agamat keśaṭaḥ

original: MSS_6954-2 yaḥ śrīvākpatirājapādarajasāṃ saṃparkapūtaściraṃ diṣṭyā ślāghyaguṇasya kasyacidasau mārgaḥ samunmīlati //
analyzed: yaḥ śrī vākpati rāja pāda rajasām saṃparka pūtaḥ ciram diṣṭyā ślāghya guṇasya kasyacid asau mārgaḥ samunmīlati

original: MSS_6955-1 unmagnacañcalavanāni vanāpagānām āśyānasaikatatara gaparaṃparāṇi /
analyzed: unmagna cañcala vanāni vana āpagānām

original: MSS_6955-2 nimnāvaśiṣṭasalilāni mano haranti rodhāṃsi haṃsapadamudritakardamāni //
analyzed: nimna avaśiṣṭa salilāni manaḥ haranti rodhāṃsi haṃsa pada mudrita kardamāni

original: MSS_6956-1 unmajjanmakara ivāmarāpagāyā vegena pratimukhametya bāṇanadyāḥ /
analyzed: unmajjan makaraḥ iva amara āpagāyāḥ vegena pratimukham etya bāṇa nadyāḥ

original: MSS_6956-2 gāṇḍīvī kanakaśilānibhaṃ bhujābhyām ājaghne viṣamavilocanasya vakṣaḥ //
analyzed: gāṇḍīvī kanaka śilā nibham bhujābhyām ājaghne viṣama vilocanasya vakṣaḥ

original: MSS_6957-1 unmatta kaṇṭakiphalapratiyogibuddhyā vairaṃ vṛthaiva kuruṣe panasena sārdham /
analyzed: unmatta kaṇṭaki phala pratiyogi buddhyā vairam vṛthā eva kuruṣe panasena sārdham

original: MSS_6957-2 santo hasanti na bhajanti bhajanti cet tvāṃ bhrāntā bhavanti sahasā na punarbhajanti //
analyzed: santaḥ hasanti na bhajanti bhajanti ced tvām bhrāntāḥ bhavanti sahasā na punar bhajanti

original: MSS_6958-1 unmatta dhūrta taruṇendunivāsayogye sthāne piśācapatinā viniveśito'si /
analyzed: unmatta dhūrta taruṇa indu nivāsa yogye sthāne piśāca patinā viniveśitaḥ asi

original: MSS_6958-2 kiṃ kairavāṇi vikasanti tamaḥ prayāti candropalo dravati vārdhirupaiti vṛddhim //
analyzed: kim kairavāṇi vikasanti tamaḥ prayāti candropalaḥ dravati vārdhiḥ upaiti vṛddhim

original: MSS_6959-1 unmattapremasaṃrambhād ārabhante yada ganāḥ /
analyzed: unmatta prema saṃrambhāt ārabhante

original: MSS_6959-2 tatra pratyūhamādhātuṃ brahmāpi khalu kātaraḥ //
analyzed: tatra pratyūham ādhātum brahmā api khalu kātaraḥ

original: MSS_6960-1 unmattamāsādya haraḥ smaraśca dvāvapyasīmāṃ mudamudvahete /
analyzed: unmattam āsādya haraḥ smaraḥ ca dvau api asi imām mudam udvahete

original: MSS_6960-2 pūrvaṃ paraspardhitayā prasūnaṃ nūnaṃ dvitīyo virahādhidūnam //
analyzed: pūrvam para spardhi tayā prasūnam nūnam dvitīyaḥ viraha ādhi dūnam

original: MSS_6961-1 unmattānāṃ ca yā gāthāḥ śiśūnāṃ yacca bhāṣitam /
analyzed: unmattānām ca yāḥ gāthāḥ śiśūnām yat ca bhāṣitam

original: MSS_6961-2 striyo yacca prabhāṣante tasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ //
analyzed: striyaḥ yat ca prabhāṣante tasya na asti vyatikramaḥ

original: MSS_6962-1 unmattānāṃ bhuja gānāṃ madyapānāṃ ca dantinām /
analyzed: unmattānām bhuja gānām madyapānām ca dantinām

original: MSS_6962-2 strīṇāṃ rājakulānāṃ ca viśvasanti gatāyuṣaḥ //
analyzed: strīṇām rāja kulānām ca viśvasanti gata āyuṣaḥ

original: MSS_6963-1 unmattānāṃ bhuja gānāṃ śṛ giṇāṃ śastrapāṇinām /
analyzed: unmattānām bhuja gānām śṛ giṇām śastra pāṇinām

original: MSS_6963-2 viśvāso naiva kartavyaḥ strīṣu rājakuleṣu ca //
analyzed: viśvāsaḥ nā eva kartavyaḥ strīṣu rāja kuleṣu ca

original: MSS_6964-1 unmadatayā kayācit kadācidapathapravṛttamapi puruṣam /
analyzed: unmada tayā kayācid kadācid apatha pravṛttam api puruṣam

original: MSS_6964-2 sadyaḥ suhṛdupadeśaḥ sṛṇiriva kariṇaṃ nivarttayati //
analyzed: sadyas suhṛd upadeśaḥ sṛṇiḥ iva kariṇam nivarttayati

original: MSS_6965-1 unmādagadgadagiro madavihvalākṣā bhraśyannijaprakṛtayaḥ kṛtamasmarantaḥ /
analyzed: unmāda gadgada giraḥ mada vihvala akṣāḥ bhraśyat nija prakṛtayaḥ kṛtam asmarantaḥ

original: MSS_6965-2 aiśvaryasīdhurasapānavighūrṇamānāḥ ke nāma na pratipadaṃ puruṣāḥ skhalanti //
analyzed: aiśvarya sīdhu rasa pāna vighūrṇamānāḥ ke nāma na pratipadam puruṣāḥ skhalanti

original: MSS_6966-1 unmādameke puṣyanti yāntyanye dviṣatāṃ vaśam /
analyzed: unmādam eke puṣyanti yānti anye dviṣatām vaśam

original: MSS_6966-2 dāsyameke ca gacchanti pareṣāmarthahetunā //
analyzed: dāsyam eke ca gacchanti pareṣām artha hetunā

original: MSS_6967-1 unmīlattrivalītara gavalayā prottu gapīnastana- dvandvenodyatacakravākamithunā vaktrāmbujodbhāsinī /
analyzed: unmīlat trivalī tara dvandvena udyata cakravāka mithunā vaktra ambuja udbhāsinī

original: MSS_6967-2 kāntākāradharā nadīyamabhitaḥ krūrāśayā neṣyate saṃsārārṇavamajjanaṃ yadi tato dūreṇa saṃtyajyatām //
analyzed: kānta ākāra dharā nadī iyam abhitas krūra āśayā na iṣyate saṃsāra arṇava majjanam yadi tatas dūreṇa saṃtyajyatām

original: MSS_6968-1 unmīlatpulakaṃ viloladalakaṃ svidyatkapolasthalaṃ bhrāmyatkuṇḍalamākulākulalasatsītkāramudyatkaram /
analyzed: unmīlat pulakam vilolat alakam svidyat kapola sthalam bhrāmyat kuṇḍalam ākula ākula lasat sītkāram udyat karam

original: MSS_6968-2 kiṃcitkuñcadudañcitabhru vilasaccolaṃ galannīvikaṃ syād bhūyo'pi kadā madākuladṛśorbimbādharāsvādanam //
analyzed: kiṃcid kuñcat udañcita bhru vilasat colam galat nīvikam syāt bhūyas api kadā mada ākula dṛśoḥ bimba adhara āsvādanam

original: MSS_6969-1 unmīlatpulakā kureṇa niviḍāśleṣe nimeṣeṇa ca krīḍākūtavilokite'dharasudhāpāne mudhā narmabhiḥ /
analyzed: unmīlat pulakā kureṇa nibiḍa āśleṣe nimeṣeṇa ca krīḍā ākūta vilokita idhara sudhā pāne mudhā narmabhiḥ

original: MSS_6969-2 ānandābhigamena manmathakalāyuddhe'pi yasminnabhūt pratyūho na tayorbabhūva suratārambhaḥ priyaṃbhāvukaḥ //
analyzed: ānanda abhigamena manmatha kalā yuddhe pi yasmin abhūt pratyūhaḥ na tayoḥ babhūva surata ārambhaḥ priyaṃbhāvukaḥ

original: MSS_6970-1 unmīlatyurasā guṇālinicitā nirdūṣaṇā bhūṣaṇā sollāsoṣasi lolayā sumanasā sūktyā manohāriṇī /
analyzed: unmīlati urasā guṇa ali nicitā nirdūṣaṇā bhūṣaṇā sa ullāsa uṣasi lolayā sumanasā su uktyā manohāriṇī

original: MSS_6970-2 śayyāmetya mṛduṃ madīyakavitevāmbhojinīnāyikā kasyāpyunnatapūrvapuṇyatapasaḥ kaṇṭhaṃ samāli gati //
analyzed: śayyām etya mṛdum madīya kavi tā iva ambhojinī nāyikā kasya api unnata pūrva puṇya tapasaḥ kaṇṭham

original: MSS_6971-1 unmīlatguḍapākatantulatayā rajjvā bhramīrarjayan dānāntaḥśrutaśarkarācalamathaḥ svenāmṛtāndhāḥ smaraḥ /
analyzed: unmīlat guḍa pāka tantu latayā rajjvā bhramīḥ arjayan dāna antar śruta śarkarā acala mathar svena amṛta andhāḥ smaraḥ

original: MSS_6971-2 navyāmikṣurasodadheryadi sudhāmutthāpayet sā bhavaj jihvāyāḥ kṛtimāhvayeta paramāṃ matkarṇayoḥ pāraṇām //
analyzed: navyām ikṣu rasa udadheḥ yadi sudhām utthāpayet sā bhavat jihvāyāḥ kṛtim āhvayeta paramām mad karṇayoḥ pāraṇām

original: MSS_6972-1 unmīladyauvanāsi priyasakhi viṣamāḥ śreṇayo nāgarāṇāṃ tasmāt ko'pi tvayādyaprabhṛti na sahasā saṃmukhaṃ vīkṣaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: unmīlat yauvanā asi priya sakhi viṣamāḥ śreṇayaḥ nāgarāṇām tasmāt kaḥ pi tvayā adya prabhṛti na sahasā saṃmukham vīkṣaṇīyaḥ

original: MSS_6972-2 yāvac candrārkamekaḥ patiratiśayitaśraddhayā sevitavyaḥ kartavyā rūparakṣā vacasi na hṛdayaṃ deyamasmadvidhānām //
analyzed: yāvat candra arkam ekaḥ patiḥ atiśayita śraddhayā sevitavyaḥ kartavyā rūpa rakṣā vacasi na hṛdayam deyam asmadvidhānām

original: MSS_6973-1 unmīladrasabindugandhakusumāvallyo vasantodaye kāntāḥ komalapallavāḥ kati kati krīḍāvane santi na /
analyzed: unmīlat rasa bindu gandha kusumā vallyaḥ vasanta udaye kāntāḥ komala pallavāḥ kati kati krīḍā vane santi na

original: MSS_6973-2 saubhāgyaikanidhe rasāla tadapi śrīmañjarīśālinas tvatto'nyatra ca kutracin madhukaraśreṇī na viśrāmyati //
analyzed: saubhāgya eka nidhe rasāla tat api śrī mañjarī śālinaḥ tvattaḥ nyatra ca kutracid madhukara śreṇī na viśrāmyati

original: MSS_6974-1 unmīladvadanendukāntivisarairdūraṃ samutsāritaṃ bhagnaṃ pīnakucasthalasya ca rucā hastaprabhābhirhatam /
analyzed: unmīlat vadana indu kānti visaraiḥ dūram samutsāritam bhagnam pīna kuca sthalasya ca rucā hasta prabhābhiḥ hatam

original: MSS_6974-2 etasyāḥ kalaviṃkakaṇṭhakadalīkalpaṃ milatkautukād aprāptābhimukhaṃ ruṣeva sahasā keśeṣu lagnaṃ tamaḥ //
analyzed: etasyāḥ kalaviṃka kaṇṭha kadalī kalpam milat kautukāt a prāpta abhimukham ruṣā iva sahasā keśeṣu lagnam tamaḥ

original: MSS_6975-1 unmīlanti kiyanti vā na kusumānyuṣṇadyuterudgame tattvetāvati bandhurityatisakhītyādityakānteti ca /
analyzed: unmīlanti kiyanti vā na kusumāni uṣṇadyuteḥ udgame tat tu etāvati bandhuḥ iti ati sakhī iti āditya kāntā iti ca

original: MSS_6975-2 kīrtiṃ dattavatāṃ trilokaviditāmevaṃ kavīnāmṛṇaṃ kiṃ kṛtveyamapākarotu januṣāṃ koṭyāpi nālīkinī //
analyzed: kīrtim dattavatām triloka viditām evam kavīnām ṛṇam kim kṛtvā iyam apākarotu januṣām koṭyā api nālīkinī

original: MSS_6976-1 unmīlanti nakhairlunīhi vahati kṣaumāñcalenāvṛṇu krīḍākānanamāviśanti valayakvāṇaiḥ samuttrāsaya /
analyzed: unmīlanti nakhaiḥ lunīhi vahati kṣauma añcalena āvṛṇu krīḍā kānanam āviśanti valaya kvāṇaiḥ samuttrāsaya

original: MSS_6976-2 itthaṃ vañjuladakṣiṇānilakuhūkaṇṭhīṣu saṃketika- vyāhārāḥ subhaga tvadīyavirahe tasyāḥ sakhīnāṃ mithaḥ //
analyzed: ittham vañjula dakṣiṇa anila kuhū kaṇṭhīṣu saṃketika vyāhārāḥ subhaga tvadīya virahe tasyāḥ sakhīnām mithas

original: MSS_6977-1 unmīlanti niśāniśācaravadhūtproccāṭanāmāntrikāḥ sāyaṃ sālasasuptapa kajavanaprodbodhavaitālikāḥ /
analyzed: unmīlanti niśā niśācara vadhū utproccāṭana māntrikāḥ sāyam sālasa supta pa kaja vana prodbodha vaitālikāḥ

original: MSS_6977-2 phullatpa kajakośagarbhakuharaprodbhūtabhṛ gāvalī- jha kārapraṇavopadeśaguravas tīvradyuteraṃśavaḥ //
analyzed: kaja kośa garbha kuhara prodbhūta bhṛ ga āvalī jha kāra praṇava upadeśa guravaḥ tīvra dyuteḥ aṃśavaḥ

original: MSS_6978-1 unmīlanti mṛṇālakomalaruco rājīvasaṃvartikā- saṃvartavratavṛttayaḥ katipaye pīyūṣabhānoḥ karāḥ /
analyzed: unmīlanti mṛṇāla komala rucaḥ rājīva saṃvartikā saṃvarta vrata vṛttayaḥ katipaye pīyūṣa bhānoḥ karāḥ

original: MSS_6978-2 apyusrairdhavalībhavatsu giriṣu kṣubdho'yamunmajjatā viśveneva tamomayo nidhirapāmahnāya phenāyate //
analyzed: api usraiḥ dhavalībhavatsu giriṣu kṣubdhaḥ ayam unmajjatā viśvena iva tamaḥ mayaḥ nidhiḥ apām ahne phenāyate

original: MSS_6979-1 unmīlannayanāntakāntilaharīniṣpītayoḥ kevalād āmodādavadhāraṇīyavapuṣoḥ kāntāsakhena kṣaṇam /
analyzed: unmīlat nayana anta kānti laharī niṣpītayoḥ kevalāt āmodāt avadhāraṇīya vapuṣoḥ kāntā sakhena kṣaṇam

original: MSS_6979-2 yatkarṇotpalayoḥ sthitena bhavatā kiṃcit samudguñjitaṃ bhrātastiṣṭhati kutra tat kathaya me kāntaṃ priyāyā mukham //
analyzed: yat karṇa utpalayoḥ sthitena bhavatā kiṃcid samudguñjitam bhrātar tiṣṭhati kutra tat kathaya me kāntam priyāyāḥ mukham

original: MSS_6980-1 unmīlanmaṇiraśmijālajaṭilacchāyaṃ raṇatka kaṇaṃ bibhrāṇastava deva vairikadanakrīḍākaṭhoraḥ karaḥ /
analyzed: unmīlat maṇi raśmi jāla jaṭila chāyam raṇatka kaṇam bibhrāṇaḥ tava deva vairi kadana krīḍā kaṭhoraḥ karaḥ

original: MSS_6980-2 tyaktvā saṃyati jīvitāni ripavo ye svargamārge gatās tānākraṣṭumivāviveśa rabhasāc caṇḍadyutermaṇḍalam //
analyzed: tyaktvā saṃyati jīvitāni ripavaḥ ye svarga mārge gatāḥ tān ākraṣṭum iva āviveśa rabhasāt caṇḍadyuteḥ maṇḍalam

original: MSS_6981-1 unmīlanmadhugandhalubdhamadhupavyādhūtacūtā kura- krīḍatkokilakākalīkalaravairudgīrṇakarṇajvarāḥ /
analyzed: unmīlat madhu gandha lubdha madhupa vyādhūta cūtā kura krīḍat kokila kākalī kalaravaiḥ udgīrṇa karṇa jvarāḥ

original: MSS_6981-2 nīyante pathikaiḥ kathaṃ kathamapi dhyānāvadhānakṣaṇa- prāptaprāṇasamāsamāgamarasollāsairamī vāsarāḥ //
analyzed: nīyante pathikaiḥ katham katham api dhyāna avadhāna kṣaṇa prāpta prāṇa samā samāgama rasa ullāsaiḥ amī vāsarāḥ

original: MSS_6982-1 unmīlanmukulakarālakundakośa- praścyotadghanamakarandagandhabandho /
analyzed: unmīlat mukula karāla kunda kośa praścyotat ghana makaranda gandha bandho

original: MSS_6982-2 tāmīṣatpracalavilocanāṃ natā gīm ālin gan pavana mama spṛśā gama gam //
analyzed: tām īṣat pracala vilocanām natā gīm ālin gan pavana mama spṛśā gama gam

original: MSS_6983-1 unmīlayanti kusumāni manoramāṇi ke nāma nātra taravaḥ samayocitāni /
analyzed: unmīlayanti kusumāni manoramāṇi ke nāma na atra taravaḥ samaya ucitāni

original: MSS_6983-2 kasyedṛśaṃ kathaya dohadamasti tasya yādṛkvinirmitamaśokamahīruhasya //
analyzed: kasya īdṛśam kathaya dohadam asti tasya yādṛś vinirmitam aśoka mahīruhasya

original: MSS_6984-1 unmīlallīlanīlotpaladaladalanāmodamedasvipūra- kroḍakrīḍadvijālīgarududitamarutsphālavācālavīci ḥ /
analyzed: unmīlat līla nīlotpala dala dalana āmoda medasvi pūra kroḍa krīḍa dvija ālī garut udita marut sphāla vācāla vīci

original: MSS_6984-2 etenākhāni śākhānivahanavaharitparṇapūrṇadrumālī- vyālīḍhopāntaśāntavyathapathikadṛśāṃ dattarāgastaḍāgaḥ //
analyzed: etena ākhāni śākhā nivaha nava harit parṇa pūrṇa druma ālī vyālīḍha upānta śānta vyatha pathika dṛśām datta rāgaḥ taḍāgaḥ

original: MSS_6985-1 unmīlitaṃ tūlikayeva citraṃ sūryāṃśubhirbhinnamivāravindam /
analyzed: unmīlitam tūlikayā iva citram sūrya aṃśubhiḥ bhinnam iva aravindam

original: MSS_6985-2 babhūva tasyāścaturaśraśobhi vapurvibhaktaṃ navayauvanena //
analyzed: babhūva tasyāḥ caturaśra śobhi vapuḥ vibhaktam nava yauvanena

original: MSS_6986-1 unmīlyākṣi sakhīrna paśyasi na cāpyuktā dadāsyuttaraṃ no vetsīdṛśamatra nedṛśamimāṃ śūnyāmavasthāṃ gatā /
analyzed: unmīlya akṣi sakhīḥ na paśyasi na ca api uktāḥ dadāsi uttaram no vetsi īdṛśam atra na īdṛśam imām śūnyām avasthām gatā

original: MSS_6986-2 talpādṛśyakara kapañjaramidaṃ jīvena liptaṃ manā muñcantī kimu kartumicchasi kuru premānyadeśāgate //
