analyzed: talpa adṛśya kara kapañjaram idam jīvena liptam manāḥ muñcantī kimu kartum icchasi kuru prema anya deśa āgate

original: MSS_6987-1 unmukulitādharapuṭe bhūtikaṇatrāsamīlitārdhākṣi /
analyzed: unmukulita adhara puṭe bhūti kaṇa trāsa mīlita ardha akṣi

original: MSS_6987-2 dhūmo'pi neha virama bhramaro'yaṃ śvasitamanusarati //
analyzed: dhūmaḥ api nā iha virama bhramaraḥ yam śvasitam anusarati

original: MSS_6988-1 unmuktakañcukatayeyamudārakāntiḥ śastrīva śambarariporapanītakośā /
analyzed: unmukta kañcuka tayā iyam udāra kāntiḥ śastrī iva śambara ripoḥ apanīta kośā

original: MSS_6988-2 raktāvakuṇṭhanapaṭīracitāpidhānā saṃdhyāmbuvāhakaliteva śaśā karekhā //
analyzed: rakta avakuṇṭhana paṭī racita apidhānā saṃdhyā ambuvāha kalitā iva śaśā ka rekhā

original: MSS_6989-1 unmuktakramahārimeruśikharāt krāmantamanyo dharaḥ ko'tra tvāṃ śarabhīkiśorapariṣaddhaureya dhartuṃ kṣamaḥ /
analyzed: unmukta krama hāri meru śikharāt krāmantam anyaḥ dharaḥ kaḥ utra tvām śarabhī kiśora pariṣad dhaureya dhartum kṣamaḥ

original: MSS_6989-2 tasmād durgamaśṛ gala ghanakalādurlālitātman vraja tvadvāsāya sa eva kīrṇakanakajyotsno girīṇāṃ patiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt gala ghana kalā durlālita ātman vraja tvad vāsāya saḥ eva kīrṇa kanaka jyotsnaḥ girīṇām patiḥ

original: MSS_6990-1 unmuktamānakalahā ramadhvaṃ dayitānvitāḥ /
analyzed: unmukta māna kalahāḥ ramadhvam dayitā anvitāḥ

original: MSS_6990-2 itīva madhurālāpāḥ kokilā jagadur janān //
analyzed: iti iva madhura ālāpāḥ kokilāḥ jagaduḥ janān

original: MSS_6991-1 unmuktābhirdivasamadhunā sarvatastābhireva svacchāyābhirniculitamiva prekṣyate viśvametat /
analyzed: unmuktābhiḥ divasam adhunā sarvatas tābhiḥ eva sva chāyābhiḥ niculitam iva prekṣyate viśvam etat

original: MSS_6991-2 paryanteṣu jvalati jaladhau ratnasānau ca madhye citrā gīyaṃ ramayati tamaḥstomalīlā dharitrī //
analyzed: paryanteṣu jvalati jaladhau ratna sānau ca madhye citrā gīyam ramayati tamaḥstoma līlā dharitrī

original: MSS_6992-1 unmucya svajanānupekṣya tṛṇavat prāṇānapi preyasas tīrtvā dustaramarṇavaṃ ca vaṇijaḥ prāptāḥ paṭīrāśayā /
analyzed: unmucya sva janān upekṣya tṛṇa vat prāṇān api preyasaḥ tīrtvā dustaram arṇavam ca vaṇijaḥ prāptāḥ paṭī rāśayā

original: MSS_6992-2 śvāsaiste vinivartitāḥ pratibhayaiḥ svastho bhavātaḥparaṃ tvaṃ vā kevalama gama gamuraga vyālimpa gandhadravaiḥ //
analyzed: śvāsaiḥ te vinivartitāḥ pratibhayaiḥ svasthaḥ bhava atas param tvam vā kevalam gama gam uraga vyālimpa gandha dravaiḥ

original: MSS_6993-1 unmudrīkṛtaviśvavismayabharaistattanmahārghairguṇair durgādhe hṛdayāmbudhau tava bhaven naḥ sūktiga gā yadi /
analyzed: unmudrīkṛta viśva vismaya bharaiḥ tad tad mahārghaiḥ guṇaiḥ durgādhe hṛdaya ambudhau tava bhavet naḥ su ukti ga gāḥ yadi

original: MSS_6993-2 viśvaśvitramata ginīghanarasasyandinyamandadhvanir ga gāsāgarasaṃgamaḥ punarivāpūrvaḥ samunmīlati //
analyzed: ginī ghana rasa syandinī amanda dhvaniḥ gā sāgara saṃgamaḥ punar iva apūrvaḥ samunmīlati

original: MSS_6994-1 unmūlitālānavilābhanābhiś chinnaskhalacchṛ khalaromarājiḥ /
analyzed: unmūlita ālāna vilābha nābhiḥ chinna skhalat śṛ khala roma rājiḥ

original: MSS_6994-2 mattasya seyaṃ madanadvipasya prasvāpavaproccakucāstu vāstu //
analyzed: mattasya sā iyam madana dvipasya vā astu

original: MSS_6995-1 unmūlya sitakeśāṃstu mūle mule ca tatkṣipet /
analyzed: unmūlya sita keśān tu mūle mule ca tat kṣipet

original: MSS_6995-2 tataḥ keśāḥ prajāyante kṛṣṇāḥ kautukakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: tatas keśāḥ prajāyante kṛṣṇāḥ kautuka kāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_6995-3 yuktyā pūrvoktayā yuñjyān meṣaśṛ gīpayaḥ sudhīḥ //
analyzed: yuktyā pūrva uktayā yuñjyāt sudhīḥ

original: MSS_6996-1 unmūlyālānabhūmīruhamatitarasotkhaṇḍitāṇḍ ūvitānāny- ākarṣanneṣa pādairmadajalakaluṣaḥ kṣiptanakṣatramālaḥ /
analyzed: unmūlya ālāna bhūmīruham atitarasā utkhaṇḍita āṇḍ ākarṣan eṣa pādaiḥ mada jala kaluṣaḥ kṣipta nakṣatra mālaḥ

original: MSS_6996-2 śuṇḍādaṇḍābhighātairnabhasi vidalayan puṣkarāvartakādīn dhāvatyādhūtamūrdhā harimabhirabhasād devaputraḥ karīndraḥ //
analyzed: śuṇḍā daṇḍa abhighātaiḥ nabhasi vidalayan puṣkarāvartaka ādīn dhāvati ādhūta mūrdhā harim abhi rabhasāt devaputraḥ kari indraḥ

original: MSS_6997-1 unmṛṣṭaṃ kucasīmni patramakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā haṭhāli ganāt kopo māstu punarlikhāmyamumiti smere raghūṇāṃ vare /
analyzed: unmṛṣṭam kuca sīmni patram akaram dṛṣṭvā haṭha ali kopaḥ mā astu punar likhāmi amum iti smere raghūṇām vare

original: MSS_6997-2 kopeṇāruṇito'śrupātadalitaḥ premṇā ca vistārito datto maithilakanyayā diśatu naḥ kṣemaṃ kaṭākṣā kuraḥ //
analyzed: kopeṇa aruṇita uśru pāta dalitaḥ premṇā ca vistāritaḥ dattaḥ maithila kanyayā diśatu naḥ kṣemam kaṭākṣā kuraḥ

original: MSS_6998-1 unmṛṣṭapatrā lulitālakāntāḥ kaṇṭheṣu lagnā jaghanaṃ spṛśantaḥ /
analyzed: unmṛṣṭa patrāḥ lulita alaka antāḥ kaṇṭheṣu lagnāḥ jaghanam spṛśantaḥ

original: MSS_6998-2 kucasthalīṣvāhatimādadhānā gatā vadhūnāṃ priyatāṃ jalaughāḥ //
analyzed: kuca sthalīṣu āhatim ādadhānāḥ gatāḥ vadhūnām priya tām jala oghāḥ

original: MSS_6999-1 unmeṣaṃ yo mama na sahate jātivairī niśāyām indorindīvaradaladṛśā tasya saundaryadarpaḥ /
analyzed: unmeṣam yaḥ mama na sahate jāti vairī niśāyām indoḥ indīvara dala dṛśā tasya saundarya darpaḥ

original: MSS_6999-2 nītaḥ śāntiṃ prasabhamanayā vaktrakāntyeti harṣāl lagnā manye lalitatanu te pādayoḥ padmalakṣmīḥ //
analyzed: nītaḥ śāntim prasabham anayā vaktra kāntyā iti harṣāt lagnā manye lalita tanu te pādayoḥ padma lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_7000-1 upakarotyapakṛto hyuttamo'pyanyathādhamaḥ /
analyzed: upakaroti apakṛtaḥ hi uttamaḥ api anyathā adhamaḥ

original: MSS_7000-2 madhyamaḥ sāmyamanvicched aparaḥ svārthatatparaḥ //
analyzed: madhyamaḥ sāmyam anvicchet aparaḥ sva artha tatparaḥ

original: MSS_7001-1 upakartādhikārāḍhyaḥ svāparādhaṃ na manyate /
analyzed: upakartā adhikāra āḍhyaḥ sva aparādham na manyate

original: MSS_7001-2 upakāraṃ dhvajīkṛtya sarvameva vilumpati //
analyzed: upakāram dhvajīkṛtya sarvam eva vilumpati

original: MSS_7002-1 upakartuṃ priyaṃ vaktuṃ kartuṃ snehamanuttamam /
analyzed: upakartum priyam vaktum kartum sneham anuttamam

original: MSS_7002-2 sajjanānāṃ svabhāvo'yaṃ kenenduḥ śiśirīkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: sat janānām svabhāvaḥ yam kena induḥ śiśirīkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_7003-1 upakartuṃ yathā svalpaḥ samartho na tathā mahān /
analyzed: upakartum yathā su alpaḥ samarthaḥ na tathā mahān

original: MSS_7003-2 prāyaḥ kūpastṛṣāṃ hanti satataṃ na tu vāridhiḥ //
analyzed: prāyas kūpaḥ tṛṣām hanti satatam na tu vāridhiḥ

original: MSS_7004-1 upakartuḥ kṛtaghnasyāpy ubhayoriyatī bhidā /
analyzed: upakartuḥ kṛtaghnasya api ubhayoḥ iyatī bhidā

original: MSS_7004-2 sadyo hi vismaratyādyaḥ kṛtaṃ paścāt tu paścimaḥ //
analyzed: sadyas hi vismarati ādyaḥ kṛtam paścāt tu paścimaḥ

original: MSS_7005-1 upakartuḥ sthiraṃ dravyaṃ yatnas tatkālasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: upakartuḥ sthiram dravyam yatnaḥ tad kāla saṃbhavaḥ

original: MSS_7005-2 kimasti tālavṛntasya mandamārutasaṃgrahaḥ //
analyzed: kim asti tālavṛntasya manda māruta saṃgrahaḥ

original: MSS_7006-1 upakartumanupakartuḥ priyāṇi kartuṃ kṛtānyanusmartum /
analyzed: upakartum an upakartuḥ priyāṇi kartum kṛtāni anusmartum

original: MSS_7006-2 vinipatitāṃścoddhartuṃ kulānvitānāmucitametat //
analyzed: vinipatitān ca uddhartum kula anvitānām ucitam etat

original: MSS_7007-1 upakartumaprakāśaṃ kṣantuṃ nyūneṣvayācitaṃ dātum /
analyzed: upakartum aprakāśam kṣantum nyūneṣu a yācitam dātum

original: MSS_7007-2 abhisaṃdhātuṃ ca guṇaiḥ śateṣu kecid vijānanti //
analyzed: abhisaṃdhātum ca guṇaiḥ śateṣu kecid vijānanti

original: MSS_7008-1 upakartrāriṇā saṃdhir na mitreṇāpakāriṇā /
analyzed: upakartrā ariṇā saṃdhiḥ na mitreṇa apakāriṇā

original: MSS_7008-2 upakārāpakārau hi lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇametayoḥ //
analyzed: upakāra apakārau hi lakṣyam lakṣaṇam etayoḥ

original: MSS_7009-1 upakāraṃ suhṛdvarge yo'pakāraṃ ca śatruṣu /
analyzed: upakāram suhṛd varge yopakāram ca śatruṣu

original: MSS_7009-2 nṛmegho varṣati prājñas tasyecchanti sadonnatim //
analyzed: nṛ meghaḥ varṣati prājñaḥ tasya icchanti sadā unnatim

original: MSS_7010-1 upakāraṃ smarantastu kṛtajñatvavaśaṃvadāḥ /
analyzed: upakāram smarantaḥ tu kṛtajña tva vaśaṃvadāḥ

original: MSS_7010-2 padavīmupakart ṇāṃ yānti niścetanā api //
analyzed: padavīm upakart ṇām yānti niścetanāḥ api

original: MSS_7011-1 nirvāṇamanu nirvāti tapanaṃ tapanopalaḥ /
analyzed: nirvāṇam anu nirvāti tapanam tapana upalaḥ

original: MSS_7011-2 indumindumaṇiḥ kiṃ ca śuṣyantamanu śuṣyati //
analyzed: indum indumaṇiḥ kim ca śuṣyantam anu śuṣyati

original: MSS_7012-1 upakāraḥ paro dharmaḥ paro'rthaḥ karmanaipuṇam /
analyzed: upakāraḥ paraḥ dharmaḥ paraḥ arthaḥ karma naipuṇam

original: MSS_7012-2 pātre dānaṃ paraḥ kāmaḥ paro mokṣo vitṛṣṇatā //
analyzed: pātre dānam paraḥ kāmaḥ paraḥ mokṣaḥ vitṛṣṇa tā

original: MSS_7013-1 upakārakamāyaterbhṛśaṃ prasavaḥ karmaphalasya bhūriṇaḥ /
analyzed: upakārakam āyateḥ bhṛśam prasavaḥ karma phalasya bhūriṇaḥ

original: MSS_7013-2 anapāyi nibarhaṇaṃ dviṣāṃ na titikṣāsamamasti sādhanam //
analyzed: anapāyi nibarhaṇam dviṣām na titikṣā samam asti sādhanam

original: MSS_7014-1 upakāragṛhītena śatruṇā śatrumuddharet /
analyzed: upakāra gṛhītena śatruṇā śatrum uddharet

original: MSS_7014-2 pādalagnaṃ karasthena kaṇṭakeneva kaṇṭakam //
analyzed: pāda lagnam kara sthena kaṇṭakena iva kaṇṭakam

original: MSS_7015-1 upakāraparaḥ pravaraḥ pratyupakāraṃ karoti madhyasthaḥ /
analyzed: upakāra paraḥ pravaraḥ pratyupakāram karoti madhyasthaḥ

original: MSS_7015-2 nīcastadapi na kurute upakārvaśād bhavati śatruḥ saḥ //
analyzed: nīcaḥ tat api na kurute upakār vaśāt bhavati śatruḥ saḥ

original: MSS_7016-1 upakāraparaḥ svabhāvata satataṃ sarvajanasya sajjanaḥ /
analyzed: upakāra paraḥ svabhāvata satatam sarva janasya sat janaḥ

original: MSS_7016-2 asatāmaniśaṃ tathāpyaho guruhṛdrogakarī tadunnatiḥ //
analyzed: asatām aniśam tathā api aho guru hṛd roga karī tad unnatiḥ

original: MSS_7017-1 upakārapradhānaḥ syād apakārapare'pyarau /
analyzed: upakāra pradhānaḥ syāt apakāra pare pi arau

original: MSS_7017-2 saṃpadvipatsvekamanā hetāvīrṣyet phale na tu //
analyzed: saṃpad vipatsu ekamanāḥ hetau īrṣyet phale na tu

original: MSS_7018-1 upakāraphalaṃ mitram apakāro'rilakṣaṇam /
analyzed: upakāra phalam mitram apakāra ūri lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_7019-1 upakārameva tanute vipadgataḥ sadguṇo nitarām /
analyzed: upakāram eva tanute vipad gataḥ sat guṇaḥ nitarām

original: MSS_7019-2 mūrcchāṃ gato mṛto vā nidarśanaṃ pārado'tra rasaḥ //
analyzed: mūrcchām gataḥ mṛtaḥ vā nidarśanam rasaḥ

original: MSS_7020-1 upakāraśatenāpi gṛhyate kena durjanaḥ /
analyzed: upakāra śatena api gṛhyate kena durjanaḥ

original: MSS_7020-2 sādhuḥ saṃmānamātreṇa bhavatyevātmavikrayī //
analyzed: sādhuḥ saṃmāna mātreṇa bhavati eva ātma vikrayī

original: MSS_7021-1 upakāraśatenāpi dānaiścāpi suvistaraiḥ /
analyzed: upakāra śatena api dānaiḥ ca api su vistaraiḥ

original: MSS_7021-2 lālanāt prītipūrvācca na grāhyo bhaginīsutaḥ //
analyzed: lālanāt prīti pūrvāt ca na grāhyaḥ bhaginī sutaḥ

original: MSS_7022-1 upakāraścāpakāro yasya vrajati vismṛtim /
analyzed: upakāraḥ ca apakāraḥ yasya vrajati vismṛtim

original: MSS_7022-2 pāṣāṇahṛdayasyāsya jīvatītyabhidhā mudhā //
analyzed: pāṣāṇa hṛdayasya asya jīvati iti abhidhā mudhā

original: MSS_7023-1 upakārācca lokānāṃ nimittānmṛgapakṣiṇām /
analyzed: upakārāt ca lokānām nimittāt mṛga pakṣiṇām

original: MSS_7023-2 bhayāllobhācca mūrkhāṇāṃ maitrī syād darśanāt satām //
analyzed: bhayāt lobhāt ca mūrkhāṇām maitrī syāt darśanāt satām

original: MSS_7024-1 upakārādṛte'pyāśu mitraṃ śreyasi tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: upakārāt ṛte api āśu mitram śreyasi tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_7024-2 mitravān sādhayatyarthān duḥsādhyānapyanādarāt //
analyzed: mitravān sādhayati arthān duḥsādhyān api anādarāt

original: MSS_7025-1 upakārāya na jātaḥ sapadi sujātaḥ kva jātavaire'pi /
analyzed: upakārāya na jātaḥ sapadi su jātaḥ kva jāta vaira ipi

original: MSS_7025-2 grāsayati grasto'pi drohiṇamamṛtāni rohiṇīramaṇaḥ //
analyzed: grāsayati grastaḥ api drohiṇam amṛtāni rohiṇīramaṇaḥ

original: MSS_7026-1 upakārāya yā puṃsāṃ na parasya na cātmanaḥ /
analyzed: upakārāya yā puṃsām na parasya na ca ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_7026-2 patrasaṃcayasaṃbhāraiḥ kiṃ tayā bhāravidyayā //
analyzed: patra saṃcaya saṃbhāraiḥ kim tayā bhāra vidyayā

original: MSS_7027-1 upakāriṇamapi pūjyaṃ hanti mahāntaṃ khalo'trapo'vasare /
analyzed: upakāriṇam api pūjyam hanti mahāntam

original: MSS_7027-2 dhṛṣṭadyumno madhye- vīraṃ hatavān guruṃ śāntam //
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ madhye vīram hatavān gurum śāntam

original: MSS_7028-1 upakāriṇi vikṣīṇe śanaiḥ kedāravāriṇi /
analyzed: upakāriṇi vikṣīṇe śanais kedāra vāriṇi

original: MSS_7028-2 sānukrośatayā śālir abhūt pāṇḍuravā mukhaḥ //
analyzed: sa anukrośa tayā śāliḥ abhūt pāṇḍura vā mukhaḥ

original: MSS_7029-1 upakāriṇi viśrabdhe śuddhamatau yaḥ samācarati pāpam /
analyzed: upakāriṇi viśrabdhe śuddha matau yaḥ samācarati pāpam

original: MSS_7029-2 taṃ janamasatyasaṃdhaṃ bhagavati vasudhe kathaṃ vahasi //
analyzed: tam janam asatya saṃdham bhagavati vasudhe katham vahasi

original: MSS_7030-1 upakāriṇi vītamatsare vā sadayatvaṃ yadi tatra ko'tirekaḥ /
analyzed: upakāriṇi vīta matsare vā sa daya tvam yadi tatra kā ūtiḥ ekaḥ

original: MSS_7030-2 ahite sahasāparāddhalabdhe saghṛṇaṃ yasya manaḥ satāṃ sa dhuryaḥ //
analyzed: ahite sahasā aparāddha labdhe sa ghṛṇam yasya manaḥ satām sa dhuryaḥ

original: MSS_7031-1 upakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ sādhutve tasya ko guṇaḥ /
analyzed: upakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ sādhu tve tasya kaḥ guṇaḥ

original: MSS_7031-2 apakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ sa sādhuḥ sadbhirucyate //
analyzed: apakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ sa sādhuḥ sadbhiḥ ucyate

original: MSS_7032-1 upakāre kṛtajñatvam apakāre kṛtaghnatā /
analyzed: upakāre kṛtajña tvam apakāre kṛtaghna tā

original: MSS_7032-2 viṣayasya guṇāvetau kartuḥ syātāṃ viparyayau //
analyzed: viṣayasya guṇau etau kartuḥ syātām viparyayau

original: MSS_7033-1 upakāreṇa dūyante na sahante'nukampitām /
analyzed: upakāreṇa dūyante na

original: MSS_7033-2 āpatsvapi durārādhyā nityaduḥkhā manasvinaḥ //
analyzed: āpatsu api durārādhyāḥ nitya duḥkhāḥ manasvinaḥ

original: MSS_7034-1 upakāreṇa nīcānām apakāro hi jāyate /
analyzed: upakāreṇa nīcānām apakāraḥ hi jāyate

original: MSS_7034-2 payaḥpānaṃ bhujaṃgānāṃ kevalaṃ viṣavardhanam //
analyzed: payaḥ pānam bhujaṃgānām kevalam viṣa vardhanam

original: MSS_7035-1 upakāreṇa vīrastu pratikāreṇa yujyate /
analyzed: upakāreṇa vīraḥ tu pratikāreṇa yujyate

original: MSS_7035-2 akṛtajño'pratikṛto hanti sattvavatāṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: akṛtajña upratikṛtaḥ hanti sattvavatām manaḥ

original: MSS_7036-1 upakāryopakāritvaṃ dūre cet sā hi mitratā /
analyzed: upakārya upakāri tvam dūre ced sā hi mitra tā

original: MSS_7036-2 puṣpavantau kimāsannau paśya kairavapadmayoḥ //
analyzed: puṣpavantau kim āsannau paśya kairava padmayoḥ

original: MSS_7037-1 upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate sujanatā prathitā bhavatā param /

original: MSS_7037-2 vidadhadīdṛśameva sadā sakhe sukhitamāssva tataḥ śaradāṃ śatam //

original: MSS_7038-1 upakṛtamanena sutarām ityasatāmasti na kvacidapekṣā /
analyzed: upakṛtam anena sutarām iti asatām asti na kvacid apekṣā

original: MSS_7038-2 hotuḥ svahastamāśrita udvahato'gnir dahatyeva //
analyzed: hotuḥ sva hastam āśritaḥ udvahatā agniḥ dahati eva

original: MSS_7039-1 upakṛtavatāpyanārye nāśvasitavyaṃ kṛtipriyo'smīti /
analyzed: upakṛtavatā api anārye na āśvasitavyam kṛti priyaḥ asmi iti

original: MSS_7039-2 payasāpi siktamūlo bhavati hi madhuro na picumandaḥ //
analyzed: payasā api sikta mūlaḥ bhavati hi madhuraḥ na picumandaḥ

original: MSS_7040-1 upakṛtavatā śrīratnābhyāṃ hareḥ śaśilekhayā manasijaripoḥ pīyūṣeṇāpyaśeṣadivaukasām /
analyzed: upakṛtavatā śrī ratnābhyām hareḥ śaśi lekhayā manasija ripoḥ pīyūṣeṇa api aśeṣa divaukasām

original: MSS_7040-2 kathamitarathā tena stheyaṃ yaśobharamantharaṃ yadi na mathanāyāsaṃ dhīraḥ saheta payonidhiḥ //
analyzed: katham itarathā tena stheyam yaśaḥ bhara mantharam yadi na mathana āyāsam dhīraḥ saheta payonidhiḥ

original: MSS_7041-1 upakṛtireva khalānāṃ doṣasya garīyaso bhavati hetuḥ /

original: MSS_7041-2 anukūlācaraṇena hi kupyanti vyādhayo'tyartham //
analyzed: anukūla ācaraṇena hi kupyanti

original: MSS_7042-1 upakṛtisāhasikatayā kṣatimapi gaṇayanti no guṇinaḥ /

original: MSS_7042-2 janayanti hi prakāśaṃ dīpaśikhāḥ svā gadāhena //
analyzed: janayanti hi prakāśam dīpa śikhāḥ svāḥ gadāhena

original: MSS_7043-1 upakṛtya bhavanti dūrataḥ parataḥ pratyupakāraśa kayā /

original: MSS_7044-1 upakramaṃ vāñchitamāśu kuryād dūtopayānāt kriyamāṇasaṃdhiḥ /

original: MSS_7044-2 sa ced visaṃdhiḥ sa tu tatra caikaḥ kṛto bhavatyātmasamucchrayaśca //
analyzed: sa ced visaṃdhiḥ sa tu tatra ca ekaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati ātma samucchrayaḥ ca

original: MSS_7045-1 upagūḍhavelamalaghūrmibhujaiḥ saritāmacukṣubhadadhīśamapi /
analyzed: upagūḍha velam alaghu ūrmi bhujaiḥ saritām acukṣubhat adhīśam api

original: MSS_7045-2 rajanīkaraḥ kimiva citramado yadurāgiṇāṃ gaṇamana galaghum //
analyzed: rajanīkaraḥ kim iva citra madaḥ yadu rāgiṇām galaghum

original: MSS_7046-1 upagūhati davadahane tribhuvanadhanyāmaraṇyānīm /
analyzed: upagūhati dava dahane tribhuvana dhanyām araṇyānīm

original: MSS_7046-2 mūrtā ivāndhakārāḥ pratidiśamapayānti kāsarāvalayaḥ //

original: MSS_7047-1 upacaritāpyatimātraṃ paṇyavadhūḥ kṣīṇasaṃpadaḥ puṃsaḥ /
analyzed: upacaritā api atimātram paṇyavadhūḥ kṣīṇa saṃpadaḥ puṃsaḥ

original: MSS_7047-2 pātayati dṛśaṃ vrajataḥ spṛhayā paridhānamātre'pi //
analyzed: pātayati dṛśam vrajataḥ spṛhayā paridhāna mātre pi

original: MSS_7048-1 upacaritā hariṇadṛśaḥ sajjanagoṣṭhīṣu miśritā vācaḥ /
analyzed: upacaritāḥ hariṇa dṛśaḥ sat jana goṣṭhīṣu miśritāḥ vācaḥ

original: MSS_7048-2 caritaṃ klamanamadavanaṃ na vidheḥ kuṭilādapi trāsaḥ //
analyzed: caritam klama na mada vanam na vidheḥ kuṭilāt api trāsaḥ

original: MSS_7049-1 upacāraḥ kartavyo yāvadanutpannasauhṛdāḥ puruṣāḥ /
analyzed: upacāraḥ kartavyaḥ yāvat anutpanna sauhṛdāḥ puruṣāḥ

original: MSS_7049-2 utpannasauhṛdānām upacāraḥ kaitavaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: utpanna sauhṛdānām upacāraḥ kaitavam bhavati

original: MSS_7050-1 upacāravidhijño'pi nirdhanaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati /
analyzed: upacāra vidhi jñaḥ api nirdhanaḥ kim kariṣyati

original: MSS_7050-2 nira kuśa ivārūḍho mattadviradamūrdhani //
analyzed: kuśe iva ārūḍhaḥ matta dvirada mūrdhani

original: MSS_7051-1 upacārānunayāste kitavasyopekṣitāḥ sakhīvacasā /
analyzed: upacāra anunayāḥ te kitavasya upekṣitāḥ sakhī vacasā

original: MSS_7051-2 adhunā niṣṭhuramapi yadi sa vadati kalikaitavād yāmi //
analyzed: adhunā niṣṭhuram api yadi sa vadati kali kaitavāt yāmi

original: MSS_7052-1 upacitāvayavā śucibhiḥ kaṇair alikadambakayogamupeyuṣī /
analyzed: upacita avayavā śucibhiḥ kaṇaiḥ ali kadambaka yogam upeyuṣī

original: MSS_7052-2 sadṛśakāntiralakṣyata mañjarī tilakajālakajālakamauktikaiḥ //
analyzed: sadṛśa kāntiḥ alakṣyata mañjarī tilaka jālaka jālaka mauktikaiḥ

original: MSS_7053-1 upaciteṣu pareṣvasamarthatāṃ vrajati kālavaśād balavānapi /
analyzed: upaciteṣu pareṣu asamartha tām vrajati kāla vaśāt balavān api

original: MSS_7053-2 tapasi mandagabhastirabhīṣumān nahi mahāhimahānikaro'bhavat //
analyzed: tapasi manda gabhastiḥ abhīṣumān nahi mahā ahi mahā nikaraḥ bhavat

original: MSS_7054-1 upacchandyāpi dātavyaṃ baline śāntimicchatā /
analyzed: upacchandyā api dātavyam baline śāntim icchatā

original: MSS_7054-2 samūlameva gāndhārir aprayacchan gataḥ kṣayam //
analyzed: sa mūlam eva gāndhāriḥ aprayacchan gataḥ kṣayam

original: MSS_7055-1 upajapyānupajaped budhyetaiva ca tatkṛtam /
analyzed: upajapya an upajapet budhyeta eva ca tad kṛtam

original: MSS_7055-2 yukte ca daive yudhyeta jayaprepsurapetabhīḥ //
analyzed: yukte ca daive yudhyeta jaya prepsuḥ apeta bhīḥ

original: MSS_7056-1 upajāpaḥ kṛtastena tānākopavatastvayi /
analyzed: upajāpaḥ kṛtaḥ tena tāna ākopavataḥ tvayi

original: MSS_7056-2 āśu dīpayitālpo'pi sāgnīnedhānivānilaḥ //
analyzed: āśu dīpayitā alpaḥ api sa agnīnedhān iva anilaḥ

original: MSS_7057-1 upajāpaścirārodho'vaskandas tīvrapauruṣam /
analyzed: upajāpaḥ cira ārodhaḥ avaskandaḥ tīvra pauruṣam

original: MSS_7057-2 durgasya la ghanopāyāś catvāraḥ kathitā ime //
analyzed: durgasya ghana upāyāḥ catvāraḥ kathitāḥ ime

original: MSS_7058-1 upajāpasahān vila ghayan sa vidhātā nṛpatīn mahoddhataḥ /
analyzed: upajāpa sahān sa vidhātā nṛpatīn mahā uddhataḥ

original: MSS_7058-2 sahate na jano'pyadhaḥkriyāṃ kimu lokādhikadhāma rājakam //
analyzed: sahate na janaḥ api adhas kriyām kimu loka adhika dhāma rājakam

original: MSS_7059-1 upajāpahṛtasvāmisnehasīmni parāśrayam /
analyzed: upaja apahṛta svāmi sneha sīmni para āśrayam

original: MSS_7059-2 maule vāñchati medinyāḥ patyuḥ pāto na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: maule vāñchati medinyāḥ patyuḥ pātaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_7060-1 upajīvati sma satataṃ dadhataḥ parimugdhatāṃ vaṇigivoḍupateḥ /
analyzed: upajīvati sma satatam dadhataḥ parimugdha tām vaṇij iva uḍupateḥ

original: MSS_7060-2 ghanavīthivīthimavatīrṇavato nidhirambhasāmupacayāya kalāḥ //
analyzed: ghana vīthi vīthim avatīrṇavataḥ nidhiḥ ambhasām upacayāya kalāḥ

original: MSS_7061-1 upajīvyā hatā kanyā svārthe pākakriyā hatā /
analyzed: upajīvyā hatā kanyā sva arthe pāka kriyā hatā

original: MSS_7061-2 śūdrabhikṣāhato yāgaḥ kṛpaṇasya hataṃ dhanaṃ //
analyzed: śūdra bhikṣā hataḥ yāgaḥ kṛpaṇasya hatam dhanam

original: MSS_7062-1 upatāpyamānamalaghūṣṇimabhiḥ śvasitaiḥ sitetarasarojadṛśaḥ /
analyzed: upatāpyamānam alaghu uṣṇimabhiḥ śvasitaiḥ sitetara saroja dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_7062-2 dravatāṃ na netumadharaṃ kṣamate navanāgavallidalarāgarasaḥ //
analyzed: drava tām na netum adharam kṣamate nava nāga vallī dala rāga rasaḥ

original: MSS_7063-1 upadiśati lokavṛttaṃ vitarati vittaṃ vinodayati cittam /
analyzed: upadiśati loka vṛttam vitarati vittam vinodayati cittam

original: MSS_7063-2 uttambhayati mahattvaṃ vidyā hṛdyā surājaseveva //
analyzed: uttambhayati mahat tvam vidyā hṛdyā su rāja sevā iva

original: MSS_7064-1 upadeśaṃ viduḥ śuddhaṃ santas tamupadeśinaḥ /
analyzed: upadeśam viduḥ śuddham santaḥ tam upadeśinaḥ

original: MSS_7064-2 śyāmāyate na yuṣmāsu yaḥ kāñcanamivāgniṣu //
analyzed: śyāmāyate na yuṣmāsu yaḥ kāñcanam iva agniṣu

original: MSS_7065-1 upadeśapradāt ṇāṃ narāṇāṃ hitamicchatām /
analyzed: upadeśa pradāt nām narāṇām hitam icchatām

original: MSS_7065-2 parasminnihaloke ca vyasanaṃ nopapadyate //
analyzed: parasmin iha loke ca vyasanam na upapadyate

original: MSS_7066-1 upadeśo na dātavyo yādṛśe tādṛśe nare /
analyzed: upadeśaḥ na dātavyaḥ yādṛśe tādṛśe nare

original: MSS_7066-2 paśya vānaramūrkheṇa sugṛhī nirgṛhīkṛtā //
analyzed: paśya vānara mūrkheṇa sugṛhī nirgṛhīkṛtā

original: MSS_7067-1 upadeśo hi mūrkhāṇāṃ krodhāyaiva śamāya na /
analyzed: upadeśaḥ hi mūrkhāṇām krodhāya eva śamāya na

original: MSS_7067-2 payaḥpānaṃ bhuja gānāṃ viṣāyaivāmṛtāya na //
analyzed: payaḥ pānam bhuja gānām viṣāya eva amṛtāya na

original: MSS_7068-1 upadeśo hi mūrkhāṇāṃ prakopāya na śāntaye /
analyzed: upadeśaḥ hi mūrkhāṇām prakopāya na śāntaye

original: MSS_7068-2 payaḥpānaṃ bhuja gānāṃ kevalaṃ viṣavardhanaṃ //
analyzed: payaḥ pānam bhuja gānām kevalam viṣa vardhanam

original: MSS_7069-1 upadraṣṭānumantā ca bhartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: upadraṣṭā anumantā ca bhartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ

original: MSS_7069-2 paramātmeti cāpyukto dehe'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: paramātmā iti ca api uktaḥ dehe ismin puruṣaḥ paraḥ

original: MSS_7070-1 upadhāśodhitāḥ samyag īhamānāḥ phalodayam /
analyzed: upadhā śodhitāḥ samyak īhamānāḥ phala udayam

original: MSS_7070-2 te'sya sarvaṃ parīkṣeran sānurāgāḥ kṛtākṛtam //
analyzed: sarvam parīkṣeran sa anurāgāḥ kṛta akṛtam

original: MSS_7071-1 upetya dhīyate yasmād upadheti tataḥ smṛtā /
analyzed: upetya dhīyate yasmāt upadhā iti tatas smṛtā

original: MSS_7071-2 upāya upadhā jñeyā tayāmātyān parīkṣayet //
analyzed: upāyaḥ upadhā jñeyā tayā amātyān parīkṣayet

original: MSS_7072-2 upadhitrayaśuddhito'sya kiṃ kanakasyeva paraṃ parīkṣaṇam //
analyzed: upadhi traya śuddhitaḥ usya kim kanakasya iva param parīkṣaṇam

original: MSS_7073-1 upadhivasatipiṇḍān gṛhṇate no viruddhāṃs tanuvacanamanobhiḥ sarvathā ye munīndrāḥ /
analyzed: upadhi vasati piṇḍān gṛhṇate naḥ viruddhān tanu vacana manobhiḥ sarvathā ye muni indrāḥ

original: MSS_7073-2 vratasamitisametā dhvastamohaprapañcā dadatu mama vimuktiṃ te hatakrodhayodhāḥ //
analyzed: vrata samiti sametāḥ dhvasta moha prapañcāḥ dadatu mama vimuktim te hata krodha yodhāḥ

original: MSS_7074-1 upanatabhaye yo yo mārgo hitārthakaro bhavet sa sa nipuṇayā buddhyā sevyo mahān kṛpaṇo'pi vā /
analyzed: upanata bhaye yaḥ yaḥ mārgaḥ hita artha karaḥ bhavet sa sa nipuṇayā buddhyā sevyaḥ mahān kṛpaṇaḥ api vā

original: MSS_7074-2 karikaranibhau jyāghātā kau mahāstraviśāradau valayaracitau strīvad bāhū kṛtau na kirīṭinā //
analyzed: kari kara nibhau jyā ghātā kau mahā astra viśāradau valaya racitau strī vat bāhū kṛtau na kirīṭinā

original: MSS_7075-1 upanatamatipuṇyacayaiḥ saṃpūrṇaṃ rakṣitaṃ ca yatnena /
analyzed: upanatam ati puṇya cayaiḥ saṃpūrṇam rakṣitam ca yatnena

original: MSS_7075-2 saṃpadi vipadi trāṇaṃ bhavati nidhānaṃ ca mitraṃ ca //
analyzed: saṃpadi vipadi trāṇam bhavati nidhānam ca mitram ca

original: MSS_7076-1 upanadipuline mahāpalāśaḥ pavanasamucchaladekapattrapāṇiḥ /
analyzed: upa nadī puline mahā palāśaḥ pavana samucchalat eka pattra pāṇiḥ

original: MSS_7076-2 davadahanavinaṣṭajīvitānāṃ salilamivaiṣa dadāti pādapānām //
analyzed: dava dahana vinaṣṭa jīvitānām salilam iva eṣa dadāti pādapānām

original: MSS_7077-1 upanayati kapole lolakarṇapravāla- kṣaṇamukulaniveśāndolanavyāpṛtānām /
analyzed: upanayati kapole lola karṇa pravāla kṣaṇa mukula niveśa āndolana vyāpṛtānām

original: MSS_7077-2 parimalitaharidrān saṃprati dvāviḍīnāṃ navanakhapadatiktānātapaḥ svedabindūn //
analyzed: parimalita haridrān saṃprati dvā viḍīnām nava nakha pada tiktān ātapaḥ sveda bindūn

original: MSS_7078-1 upanayanavivāhāvutsavaikapradhānau kalivibhavata eṣāṃ kālabhedānabhijñāḥ /
analyzed: upanayana vivāhau utsava eka pradhānau kali vibhavataḥ eṣām kāla bheda anabhijñāḥ

original: MSS_7078-2 vijahati na kadācid vedapāṭhaikayogye vayasi ca yavanānīvācanābhyāsamete //
analyzed: vijahati na kadācid veda pāṭha eka yogye vayasi ca yavanānī vācana abhyāsa mete

original: MSS_7079-1 upanayati masiṃ pattraṃ cedaṃ likhāmi kimatra vā tvamiti vinayabhraṃśo yūyaṃ tviti praṇayakṣatiḥ /
analyzed: upanayati masim pattram ca idam likhāmi kim atra vā tvam iti vinaya bhraṃśaḥ yūyam tu iti praṇaya kṣatiḥ

original: MSS_7079-2 suhṛditi mṛṣā nāthetyūnaṃ nṛpeti taṭasthatā kathamiti tataḥ saṃdeṣṭavyo mayā yadunandanaḥ //
analyzed: suhṛd iti mṛṣā nātha iti ūnam nṛpa iti taṭastha tā katham iti tatas saṃdeṣṭavyaḥ mayā yadu nandanaḥ

original: MSS_7080-1 upaniṣadaḥ paripītā gītāpi na hanta matipathaṃ nītā /
analyzed: upaniṣadaḥ paripītāḥ gītā api na hanta mati patham nītā

original: MSS_7080-2 tadapi na hā vidhuvadanā mānasasadanād bahiryāti //
analyzed: tat api na hā vidhu vadanā mānasa sadanāt bahis yāti

original: MSS_7081-1 upanihitahalīṣāsārgaladvāramārāt paricakitapurandhrīsāritābhyarṇabhāṇḍam /
analyzed: upanihita halīṣā sa argala dvāram ārāt paricakita purandhrī sārita abhyarṇa bhāṇḍam

original: MSS_7081-2 pavanarayatiraścīrvāridhārāḥ pratīcchan viśati valitaśṛ gaḥ pāmarāgāramukṣā //
analyzed: pavana raya tiraścīḥ vāri dhārāḥ pratīcchan viśati gaḥ pāmara āgāra mukṣā

original: MSS_7082-1 upanītanītinaukaḥ saṃsāravikāravārivanyāsu /
analyzed: upanīta nīti naukaḥ saṃsāra vikāra vāri vanyāsu

original: MSS_7082-2 satpuruṣakarṇadhāras tārayati janān bahūnekaḥ //
analyzed: sat puruṣa karṇadhāraḥ tārayati janān bahūn ekaḥ

original: MSS_7083-1 upanīya kalamakuḍavaṃ kathayati sabhayaścikitsake halikaḥ /
analyzed: upanīya kalama kuḍavam kathayati sa bhayaḥ cikitsake halikaḥ

original: MSS_7083-2 śoṇaṃ somārdhanibhaṃ vadhūstane vyādhimupajātam //
analyzed: śoṇam soma ardha nibham vadhū stane vyādhim upajātam

original: MSS_7084-1 upanīya priyamasamaya- vidaṃ ca me dagdhamānamapanīya /
analyzed: upanīya priyam asamaya vidam ca me dagdha mānam apanīya

original: MSS_7084-2 narmopakrama eva kṣaṇade dūtīva calitāsi //
analyzed: narma upakramaḥ eva kṣaṇade dūtī iva calitā asi

original: MSS_7085-1 upanīya yannitambe bhujaṃgamuccairalambi vibudhaiḥ śrīḥ /
analyzed: upanīya yat nitambe bhujaṃgam uccais alambi vibudhaiḥ śrīḥ

original: MSS_7085-2 ekaḥ sa mandaragiriḥ sakhi garimāṇaṃ samudvahatu //
analyzed: ekaḥ sa mandara giriḥ sakhi garimāṇam samudvahatu

original: MSS_7086-1 upanetumunnatimateva divaṃ kucayoryugena tarasā kalitām /
analyzed: upanetum unnatimatā iva divam kucayoḥ yugena tarasā kalitām

original: MSS_7086-2 rabhasotthitāmupagataḥ sahasā parirabhya kaścana vadhūmarudhat //
analyzed: rabhasa utthitām upagataḥ sahasā parirabhya kaścana vadhūm arudhat

original: MSS_7087-1 upapattibhiramlānā nopadeśaiḥ kadarthitāḥ /
analyzed: upapattibhiḥ amlānāḥ na upadeśaiḥ kadarthitāḥ

original: MSS_7087-2 svasaṃvedanasaṃvedyasārāḥ sahṛdayoktayaḥ //
MSS_7088-1 upapannaṃ nanu śivaṃ saptasvaṅgeṣuyasya me /
analyzed: upapannam nanu śivam saptasu aṅgeṣu yasya me

original: MSS_7088-2 daivīnāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ ca pratihartā tvamāpadām //
analyzed: daivīnām mānuṣīṇām ca pratihartā tvam āpadām

original: MSS_7089-1 upaparisaraṃ godāvaryāḥ parityajatādhvagāḥ saraṇimaparo mārgas tāvad bhavadbhirihekṣyatām /
analyzed: upa parisaram godāvaryāḥ parityajata adhvagāḥ saraṇim aparaḥ mārgaḥ tāvat bhavadbhiḥ iha īkṣyatām

original: MSS_7089-2 iha hi vihito raktāśokaḥ kayāpi hatāśayā caraṇanalinanyāsodañcannavāṅkurakañcukaḥ //
analyzed: iha hi vihitaḥ rakta aśokaḥ kayā api hata āśayā caraṇa nalina nyāsa udañcat nava aṅkura kañcukaḥ

original: MSS_7090-1 upapradānaṃ sāntvaṃ vā bhedaṃ kāle ca vikramam /

original: MSS_7090-2 yogaṃ ca rakṣasām śreṣṭha tāvubhau ca nayānayau //
analyzed: yogam ca rakṣasām śreṣṭha tau ubhau ca naya anayau

original: MSS_7091-1 upaprākārāgraṃ prahiṇu nayane tarkaya manāg anākāśe ko'yaṃ galitahariṇaḥ śītakiraṇaḥ /
analyzed: upa prākāra agram prahiṇu nayane tarkaya manāk an ākāśe koyam galita hariṇaḥ śītakiraṇaḥ

original: MSS_7091-2 sudhābaddhagrāsairupavanacakorairanusṛtāṃ kirañ jyotsnāmacchāṃ navalavalapākapraṇayinīm //
analyzed: sudhā baddha grāsaiḥ upavana cakoraiḥ anusṛtām kiram jyotsnām acchām nava lavala pāka praṇayinīm

original: MSS_7092-1 upaplavo'sau kimu rājaputrī jyotsnādravo'sāvuta vajrapātaḥ /
analyzed: upaplavā usau kimu rāja putrī jyotsnā dravā usau uta vajrapātaḥ

original: MSS_7092-2 alaṃ tayā saiva hi jīvitaṃ me dhiṅ māmahaṃ vā caritārtha ekaḥ //
analyzed: alam tayā sā eva hi jīvitam me dhik mām aham vā caritārthaḥ ekaḥ

original: MSS_7093-1 upaplutaṃ pātumado madoddhatais tvameva viśvaṃbhara viśvamīśiṣe /
analyzed: upaplutam pātu madaḥ mada uddhataiḥ tvam eva viśvaṃbhara viśvam īśiṣe

original: MSS_7093-2 ṛte raveḥ kṣālayituṃ kṣameta kaḥ kṣapātamaskāṇḍamalīmasaṃ nabhaḥ //
analyzed: ṛte raveḥ kṣālayitum kṣameta kaḥ kṣapā tamas kāṇḍa malīmasam nabhaḥ

original: MSS_7094-1 upabarhamambujadṛśo nijaṃ bhujaṃ viracayya vaktramapi gaṇḍamaṇḍale /
analyzed: upabarham ambuja dṛśaḥ nijam bhujam viracayya vaktram api gaṇḍa maṇḍale

original: MSS_7094-2 nijasakthi sakthini nidhāya sādaraṃ svapiti stanārpitakarāmbujo yuvā //
analyzed: nija sakthi sakthini nidhāya sa ādaram svapiti stana arpita kara ambujaḥ yuvā

original: MSS_7095-1 upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā /
analyzed: upabhuktam yathā vāsaḥ srajaḥ vā mṛditāḥ yathā

original: MSS_7095-2 evaṃ rājyāt paribhraṣṭaḥ samartho'pi nirarthakaḥ //
analyzed: evam rājyāt paribhraṣṭaḥ samarthaḥ api nirarthakaḥ

original: MSS_7096-1 upabhuktakhadiravīṭaka- janitādhararāgabhaṅgabhayāt /
analyzed: upabhukta khadira vīṭaka janita adhara rāga bhaṅga bhayāt

original: MSS_7096-2 pitari mṛte'pi na veśyā roditi hā tāta tāteti //
analyzed: pitari mṛte api na veśyā roditi hā tāta tāta iti

original: MSS_7097-1 upabhuktāśeṣavṛṣaṃ dhāvantaṃ mṛgaśireśabhogāya /
analyzed: upabhukta aśeṣa vṛṣam dhāvantam mṛgaśira īśa bhogāya

original: MSS_7097-2 kaḥ khecarakesariṇaṃ paśyatu bhāsvantamantakapratimam //
analyzed: kaḥ khecara kesariṇam paśyatu bhāsvantam antaka pratimam

original: MSS_7098-1 upabhoktuṃ na jānāti kadāpi kṛpaṇo janaḥ /
analyzed: upabhoktum na jānāti kadāpi kṛpaṇaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_7098-2 ākaṇṭhajalamagno'pi kukkuro leḍhi jihvayā //
analyzed: ā kaṇṭha jala magnaḥ api kukkuraḥ leḍhi jihvayā

original: MSS_7099-1 upabhogakātarāṇāṃ puruṣāṇāmarthasaṃcayaparāṇām /
analyzed: upabhoga kātarāṇām puruṣāṇām artha saṃcaya parāṇām

original: MSS_7099-2 kanyāmaṇiriva sadane tiṣṭhatyarthaḥ parasyārthe //
analyzed: kanyā maṇiḥ iva sadane tiṣṭhati arthaḥ parasya arthe

original: MSS_7100-1 upabhogādṛte tasya nāśa eva na vidyate /
analyzed: upabhogāt ṛte tasya nāśaḥ eva na vidyate

original: MSS_7100-2 prāktanaṃ bandhanaṃ karma ko'nyathā kartumarhati //
analyzed: prāktanam bandhanam karma kaḥ nyathā kartum arhati

original: MSS_7101-1 upabhogāya ca dhanaṃ jīvitaṃ yena rakṣitam /
analyzed: upabhogāya ca dhanam jīvitam yena rakṣitam

original: MSS_7101-2 na rakṣitā tu bhūryena kiṃ tasya dhanajīvitaiḥ //

original: MSS_7102-1 upabhogena puṇyānāṃ prāktanānāṃ tathāṃhasām /
analyzed: upabhogena puṇyānām prāktanānām tathā aṃhasām

original: MSS_7102-2 kartavyamiti nityānām akāmakaraṇāt tathā //
analyzed: kartavyam iti nityānām a kāma karaṇāt tathā

original: MSS_7103-1 upabhogairapi tyaktaṃ nātmānamavasādayet /
analyzed: upabhogaiḥ api tyaktam na ātmānam avasādayet

original: MSS_7103-2 caṇḍālatve'pi mānuṣyaṃ sarvathā tāta durlabham //
analyzed: caṇḍāla tve pi mānuṣyam sarvathā tāta durlabham

original: MSS_7104-1 upamā kālidāsasya bhāraverarthagauravam /
analyzed: upamā kālidāsasya bhāraveḥ artha gauravam

original: MSS_7104-2 daṇḍinaḥ padalālityaṃ māghe santi trayo guṇāḥ //
analyzed: daṇḍinaḥ pada lālityam māghe santi trayaḥ guṇāḥ

original: MSS_7105-1 upamānamabhūd vilāsināṃ karaṇaṃ yat tava kāntimattayā /
analyzed: upamānam abhūt vilāsinām karaṇam yat tava kāntimat tayā

original: MSS_7105-2 tadidaṃ gatamīdṛśīm daśāṃ na vidīrye kaṭhināḥ khalu striyaḥ //
analyzed: tat idam gatam īdṛśīm daśām na vidīrye kaṭhināḥ khalu striyaḥ

original: MSS_7106-1 upayayau tanutāṃ madhukhaṇḍitā himakarodayapāṇḍumukhacchaviḥ /
analyzed: upayayau tanu tām madhu khaṇḍitā himakara udaya pāṇḍu mukha chaviḥ

original: MSS_7106-2 sadṛśamiṣṭasamāgamanirvṛtiṃ vanitayānitayā rajanīvadhūḥ //
analyzed: sadṛśam iṣṭa samāgama nirvṛtim vanitayā anitayā rajanīvadhūḥ

original: MSS_7107-1 upari kabarībandhagrantheratha grathitāṅgulī nijabhujalate tiryaktanvyā vitatya vivṛttayā /
analyzed: upari kabarī bandha grantheḥ atha grathita aṅgulī nija bhuja late tiryak tanvyā vitatya vivṛttayā

original: MSS_7107-2 vivṛtavilasadvāmāpāṅgastanārdhakapolayā kuvalayadalasraksaṃdigdhaśriyaḥ prahitā dṛśaḥ //
analyzed: vivṛta vilasat vāma apāṅga stana ardha kapolayā kuvalaya dala sraj saṃdigdha śriyaḥ prahitāḥ dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_7108-1 upari karavāladhārā- kārāḥ krūrā bhujaṅgamapuṅgavāt /
analyzed: upari karavāla dhārā kārāḥ krūrāḥ bhujaṅgama puṅgavāt

original: MSS_7108-2 antaḥ sākṣāddrākṣā- dīkṣāguravo jayanti ke'pi janāḥ //
analyzed: antar dīkṣā guravaḥ jayanti ke pi janāḥ

original: MSS_7109-1 uparigataṃ hi savarṇaṃ hṛtvā karato dadāsi rantuṃ me /
analyzed: upari gatam hi savarṇam hṛtvā karataḥ dadāsi rantum me

original: MSS_7109-2 dhanyaḥ sarojayugalaṃ tvaktvā stanayugamathāspṛśat kṛṣṇaḥ //
analyzed: dhanyaḥ saroja yugalam tvaktvā stana yugam atha aspṛśat kṛṣṇaḥ

original: MSS_7110-1 upari ghanaṃ ghanapaṭalaṃ tiryaggirayo'pi nartitamayūrāḥ /
analyzed: upari ghanam ghana paṭalam tiryaggirayaḥ api nartita mayūrāḥ

original: MSS_7110-2 kṣitirapi kandaladhavalā dṛṣṭiṃ pathikaḥ kva pātayatu //
analyzed: kṣitiḥ api kandala dhavalā dṛṣṭim pathikaḥ kva pātayatu

original: MSS_7111-1 upari ghanaṃ ghanaraṭitaṃ dūre dayitā kimetadāpatitam /
analyzed: upari ghanam ghana raṭitam dūre dayitā kim etat āpatitam

original: MSS_7111-2 himavati divyauṣadhayaḥ śīrṣe sarpaḥ samāviṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: himavati divyauṣadhayaḥ śīrṣe sarpaḥ samāviṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_7112-1 uparijatarujāni yājamānāṃ kuśalatayā parirambhalolupo'nyaḥ /
analyzed: upari jata rujāni kuśala tayā

original: MSS_7112-2 prathitapṛthupayodharāṃ gṛhāṇa svayamiti mugdhavadhūmudāsa dorbhyām //
analyzed: prathita pṛthu payodharām gṛhāṇa svayam iti mugdha vadhūm udāsa dorbhyām

original: MSS_7113-1 upari tamālataroḥ sakhi pariṇataśaradindumaṇḍalaḥ ko'pi /
analyzed: upari tamāla taroḥ sakhi pariṇata śarad indu maṇḍalaḥ kaḥ api

original: MSS_7113-2 tatra ca muralīkhuralī kulamaryādāmadho nayati //
analyzed: tatra ca muralī khuralī kula maryādām adhas nayati

original: MSS_7114-1 uparitalanipātiteṣṭako'yaṃ śirasi tanurvipulaśca madhyadeśe /
analyzed: upari tala nipātita iṣṭakā uyam śirasi tanuḥ vipulaḥ ca madhyadeśe

original: MSS_7114-2 asadṛśajanasaṃprayogabhīror hṛdayamiva sphuṭitaṃ mahāgṛhasya //
analyzed: a sadṛśa jana saṃprayoga bhīroḥ hṛdayam iva sphuṭitam mahā gṛhasya

original: MSS_7115-1 upari pariplavate mama bāleyaṃ gṛhiṇi haṃsamāleva /
analyzed: upari pariplavate mama bālā iyam gṛhiṇi haṃsa mālā iva

original: MSS_7115-2 sarasa iva nalinanālā tvamāśayaṃ prāpya vasasi punaḥ //
analyzed: sarasaḥ iva nalina nālā tvam āśayam prāpya vasasi punar

original: MSS_7116-1 upari pīnapayodharapātitā paṭakuṭīva manobhavabhūpateḥ /
analyzed: upari pīna payodhara pātitā paṭa kuṭī iva manobhava bhūpateḥ

original: MSS_7116-2 vijayinastripurārijigīṣayā tava virājati bhāmini kañcukī //
analyzed: vijayinaḥ tripurāri jigīṣayā tava virājati bhāmini kañcukī

original: MSS_7117-1 upari mihiraḥ krūraḥ krūrās tale'calabhūmayo vahati pavanaḥ pāṃśūtkarṣī kṛśaḥ saraso rasaḥ /
analyzed: upari mihiraḥ krūraḥ krūrāḥ talecala bhūmayaḥ vahati pavanaḥ pāṃśu utkarṣī kṛśaḥ sarasaḥ rasaḥ

original: MSS_7117-2 ahaha na jahatyete prāṇāṃstadaiva kimadhvagā yadi na bhavataḥ patracchatraṃ viśanti mahīruhaḥ //
analyzed: ahaha na jahati ete prāṇān tadā eva kim adhva gāḥ yadi na bhavataḥ patra chatram viśanti mahīruhaḥ

original: MSS_7118-1 upari vidhṛtaśāriprauḍhadhanviprasārād iha payasi nadīnāṃ gāhituṃ naiva śaktāḥ /
analyzed: upari vidhṛta śāri prauḍha dhanvi prasārāt iha payasi nadīnām gāhitum nā eva śaktāḥ

original: MSS_7118-2 taṭanikaṭanirūḍhāḥ prasthitau yasya caṇḍāḥ saralitakaradaṇḍāḥ kumbhino'mbhaḥ pibanti //
analyzed: taṭa nikaṭa nirūḍhāḥ prasthitau yasya caṇḍāḥ saralita kara daṇḍāḥ kumbhinā umbhaḥ pibanti

original: MSS_7119-1 upariṣṭhā yadā nārī ramate kāmukaṃ naram /
analyzed: upariṣṭhā yadā nārī ramate kāmukam naram

original: MSS_7119-2 viparītaṃ rataṃ jñeyaṃ sarvakāmijanapriyam //
analyzed: viparītam ratam jñeyam sarva kāmi jana priyam

original: MSS_7120-1 uparisthā bhaktirantar nirmūlā tārayet katham /
analyzed: upari sthā bhaktiḥ antar nirmūlā tārayet katham

original: MSS_7120-2 nahi bhārakṣamā dṛṣṭā vārāṃ sāndrāpi nīlikā //
analyzed: nahi bhāra kṣamā dṛṣṭā vārām sāndrā api nīlikā

original: MSS_7121-1 uparundhanti śvāsān munayo nāśnanti na pibanti /
analyzed: uparundhanti śvāsān munayaḥ na aśnanti na pibanti

original: MSS_7121-2 stūyante sujanaiḥ kiṃ kaṇṭhe kurvanti kanakapāśamime //
analyzed: stūyante su janaiḥ kim kaṇṭhe kurvanti kanaka pāśam ime

original: MSS_7122-1 uparyaṃśumataḥ siddhāś caranto yasya sānuṣu /
analyzed: upari aṃśumataḥ siddhāḥ carantaḥ yasya sānuṣu

original: MSS_7122-2 chatrāṇyātapasaṃtrāsād avācīnāni bibhrati //
analyzed: chatrāṇi ātapa saṃtrāsāt avācīnāni bibhrati

original: MSS_7123-1 uparyaṣṭau śatānyāhus tathā bhūyaśca saptatiḥ /
analyzed: upari aṣṭau śatāni āhuḥ tathā bhūyas ca saptatiḥ

original: MSS_7123-2 gajānāṃ tu parīmāṇam etadeva vinirdiśet //
analyzed: gajānām tu parīmāṇam etat eva vinirdiśet

original: MSS_7124-1 uparyupari lokasya sarvo gantuṃ samīhate /
analyzed: upari upari lokasya sarvaḥ gantum samīhate

original: MSS_7124-2 yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tad vartate tathā //
analyzed: yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tat vartate tathā

original: MSS_7125-1 upalakṣya varṇasaṃkara- mapagataguṇayogamujjhitasthairyam /
analyzed: upalakṣya varṇa saṃkaram apagata guṇa yogam ujjhita sthairyam

original: MSS_7125-2 pathikāḥ samudvijante kudeśamiva vīkṣya śakradhanuḥ //
analyzed: pathikāḥ samudvijante ku deśam iva vīkṣya śakradhanuḥ

original: MSS_7126-1 upalanikaṣaṃ suvarṇaṃ puruṣo vyavahāranikaṣa uddiṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: upala nikaṣam suvarṇam puruṣaḥ vyavahāra nikaṣaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_7126-2 dhūrnikaṣo govṛṣabhaḥ strīṇāṃ tu na vidyate nikaṣaḥ //
analyzed: dhūḥ nikaṣaḥ go vṛṣabhaḥ strīṇām tu na vidyate nikaṣaḥ

original: MSS_7127-1 upalaśakalametad bhedakaṃ gomayānāṃ vaṭubhirupahṛtānāṃ barhiṣāṃ stūpametat /
analyzed: upala śakalam etat bhedakam gomayānām vaṭubhiḥ upahṛtānām barhiṣām stūpam etat

original: MSS_7127-2 śaraṇamapi samidbhiḥ śuṣyamāṇābhirābhir vinamitapaṭalāntaṃ dṛśyate jīrṇakuḍyam //
analyzed: śaraṇam api samidbhiḥ śuṣyamāṇābhiḥ ābhiḥ vinamita paṭala antam dṛśyate jīrṇa kuḍyam

original: MSS_7128-1 upavanatarunṛtyādhyāpane labdhavarṇo viracitajalakeliḥ padminīkāminībhiḥ /
analyzed: upavana taru nṛtya adhyāpane labdha varṇaḥ viracita jala keliḥ padminī kāminībhiḥ

original: MSS_7128-2 priyasuhṛdasameṣorāyayau yogiyoga- sthitividalanadakṣo dakṣiṇo gandhavāhaḥ //
analyzed: priya suhṛda sameṣoḥ āyayau yogi yoga sthiti vidalana dakṣaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ gandhavāhaḥ

original: MSS_7129-1 upavananavamālikāprasūnaiḥ srajamapi yā parikhidyate sṛjantī /
analyzed: upavana navamālikā prasūnaiḥ srajam api yā parikhidyate sṛjantī

original: MSS_7129-2 parijanavanitocitāni karmāṇy aparicitāni kathaṃ vidhāsyasi tvam //
analyzed: parijana vanitā ucitāni karmāṇi a paricitāni katham vidhāsyasi tvam

original: MSS_7130-1 upavanapavanānupātadakṣair alibhiralābhi yadaṅganājanasya /
analyzed: upavana pavana anupāta dakṣaiḥ alibhiḥ alābhi yat aṅganā janasya

original: MSS_7130-2 parimalaviṣayas tadunnatānām anugamane khalu saṃpado'grataḥsthāḥ //
analyzed: parimala viṣayaḥ tad unnatānām anugamane khalu saṃpadā ugra taḥsthāḥ

original: MSS_7131-1 upavanamiva vārimadhyamagnaṃ vimalatayā pratibiṃbitaṃ dadhānā /
analyzed: upavanam iva vāri madhya magnam vimala tayā pratibiṃbitam dadhānā

original: MSS_7131-2 śaśikaranikareṇa pūriteva kvacidupaneyapayāḥ sukhāya vāpī //
analyzed: śaśi kara nikareṇa pūritā iva kvacid upaneya payāḥ sukhāya vāpī

original: MSS_7132-1 upavanasalilānāṃ bālapadmair bhramaraparabhṛtānāṃ kaṇṭhanādaiḥ /
analyzed: upavana salilānām bāla padmaiḥ bhramara parabhṛtānām kaṇṭha nādaiḥ

original: MSS_7132-2 samadagativilāsaiḥ kāminīnāṃ kathayati paṭuvṛttaṃ madhumāsaḥ //
analyzed: sa mada gati vilāsaiḥ kāminīnām kathayati paṭu vṛttam madhu māsaḥ

original: MSS_7133-1 upaviśati nṛpaniyuktaḥ kenacidanyena vā janenoktaḥ /
analyzed: upaviśati nṛpa niyuktaḥ kenacid anyena vā janena uktaḥ

original: MSS_7133-2 nijaveśajātisamucitam āsanamālokya sevate sumatiḥ //
analyzed: nija veśa jāti samucitam āsanam ālokya sevate sumatiḥ

original: MSS_7134-1 upaviṣṭaḥ sabhāmadhye yo na vakti sphuṭaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: upaviṣṭaḥ sabhā madhye yaḥ na vakti sphuṭam vacaḥ

original: MSS_7134-2 tasmād dūreṇa sa tyājyo na yo vā kīrtayed ṛtam //
analyzed: tasmāt dūreṇa sa tyājyaḥ na yaḥ vā kīrtayet ṛtam

original: MSS_7135-1 upavīṇayanti paramapsaraso nṛpamānasiṃha tava dānayaśaḥ /
analyzed: upavīṇayanti param apsarasaḥ nṛpa māna siṃha tava dāna yaśaḥ

original: MSS_7135-2 suraśākhimaulikusumaspṛhayā namanāya tasya yatamānatamāḥ //
analyzed: sura śākhi mauli kusuma spṛhayā namanāya tasya yatamāna tamāḥ

original: MSS_7136-1 upaśamaphalād vidyābījāt phalaṃ dhanamicchatāṃ bhavati viphalaḥ prārambho yattadatra kimadbhutam /
analyzed: upaśama phalāt vidyā bījāt phalam dhanam icchatām bhavati viphalaḥ prārambhaḥ yat tat atra kim adbhutam

original: MSS_7136-2 niyataviṣayāḥ sarve bhāvā na yānti hi vikriyāṃ janayitumalaṃ śālerbījaṃ na jātu yavāṅkuram //
analyzed: niyata viṣayāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ na yānti hi vikriyām janayitum alam śāleḥ bījam na jātu yava aṅkuram

original: MSS_7137-1 upaśamitameghanādaṃ prajvalitadaśānanaṃ ramitarāmam /
analyzed: upaśamita megha nādam prajvalita daśānanam ramita rāmam

original: MSS_7137-2 rāmāyaṇamiva subhagaṃ dīpadinaṃ haratu vo duritam //
analyzed: rāmāyaṇam iva subhagam dīpa dinam haratu vaḥ duritam

original: MSS_7138-1 upaśobhaiva sahāyāḥ siddhirvīrasya sāhase vasati /
analyzed: upaśobhā eva sahāyāḥ siddhiḥ vīrasya sāhase vasati

original: MSS_7138-2 dalayati kulāni kariṇāṃ kila hariṇaparigrahaḥ siṃhaḥ //
analyzed: dalayati kulāni kariṇām kila hariṇa parigrahaḥ siṃhaḥ

original: MSS_7139-1 upasaṃdhyamāsta tanu sānumataḥ śikhareṣu tatkṣaṇamaśītarucaḥ /
analyzed: upasaṃdhyam āsta tanu sānumataḥ śikhareṣu tad kṣaṇam aśītarucaḥ

original: MSS_7139-2 karajālamastasamaye'pi satām ucitaṃ khalūccatarameva padam //
analyzed: kara jāla masta samaye pi satām ucitam khalu uccataram eva padam

original: MSS_7140-1 upasargāḥ kriyāyoge pāṇineriti saṃmatam /
analyzed: upasargāḥ kriyā yoge pāṇineḥ iti saṃmatam

original: MSS_7140-2 niṣkriyo'pi tavārātiḥ sopasargaḥ sadā katham //
analyzed: niṣkriyā upi tava arātiḥ sa upasargaḥ sadā katham

original: MSS_7141-1 upasargāḥ pravartante dṛṣṭe'pyātmani yoginaḥ /
analyzed: upasargāḥ pravartante dṛṣṭe api ātmani yoginaḥ

original: MSS_7141-2 ye tāṃste saṃpravakṣyāmi samāsena nibodha me //
analyzed: ye tān te saṃpravakṣyāmi samāsena nibodha me

original: MSS_7142-1 upasarge'nyacakre ca durbhikṣe ca bhayāvahe /
analyzed: upasargenya cakre ca durbhikṣe ca bhaya āvahe

original: MSS_7142-2 asādhujanasaṃparke yaḥ palāyet sa jīvati //
analyzed: asādhu jana saṃparke yaḥ palāyet sa jīvati

original: MSS_7143-1 upasargairjitairebhir upasargās tataḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: upasargaiḥ jitaiḥ ebhiḥ upasargāḥ tatas punar

original: MSS_7143-2 yoginaḥ saṃpravartante sāttvarājasatāmasāḥ //
analyzed: yoginaḥ saṃpravartante sāttva rājasa tāmasāḥ

original: MSS_7144-1 upasthitaḥ prākṛtapuṇyapākāt puraḥsthito dakṣiṇapāṇinā svam /
analyzed: upasthitaḥ prākṛta puṇya pākāt puras sthitaḥ dakṣiṇa pāṇinā svam

original: MSS_7144-2 śiraḥ spṛśed dakṣiṇaceṣṭito vā yo maṇḍalo maṇḍalalābhado'sau //
analyzed: śiraḥ spṛśet dakṣiṇa ceṣṭitaḥ vā yaḥ maṇḍalaḥ maṇḍala lābha dosau

original: MSS_7145-1 upasthitasya kāmasya prativādo na vidyate /
analyzed: upasthitasya kāmasya prativādaḥ na vidyate

original: MSS_7145-2 api nirmuktadehasya kāmaraktasya kiṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: api nirmukta dehasya kāma raktasya kim punar

original: MSS_7146-1 upasthitāyāṃ vipadi ghorāyāṃ svīyarakṣaṇe /
analyzed: upasthitāyām vipadi ghorāyām svīya rakṣaṇe

original: MSS_7146-2 dhīmadbhiḥ puruṣairyuktaṃ vastraṃ tyaktvā palāyanam //
analyzed: dhīmadbhiḥ puruṣaiḥ yuktam vastram tyaktvā palāyanam

original: MSS_7147-1 upasthite prāṇahare kṛtānte kimāśu kāryaṃ sudhiyā prayatnāt /
analyzed: upasthite prāṇa hare kṛtānte kim āśu kāryam sudhiyā prayatnāt

original: MSS_7147-2 vākkāyacittaiḥ sukhadaṃ yamaghnaṃ murāripādāmbujameva cintyam //
analyzed: vāc kāya cittaiḥ sukha dam yama ghnam murāri pāda ambujam eva cintyam

original: MSS_7148-1 upasthite viplava eva puṃsāṃ samastabhāvaḥ parimīyate'ntaḥ /
analyzed: upasthite viplave eva puṃsām samasta bhāvaḥ parimīyate intar

original: MSS_7148-2 avāti vāyau nahi tūlarāśer gireśca kaścit pratibhāti bhedaḥ //
analyzed: avāti vāyau nahi tūla rāśeḥ gireḥ ca kaścid pratibhāti bhedaḥ

original: MSS_7149-1 upasthite vivāhe ca dāne yajñe tathā vibho /
analyzed: upasthite vivāhe ca dāne yajñe tathā vibho

original: MSS_7149-2 samācarati yo vighnaṃ sa mṛtvā jāyate kṛmiḥ //
analyzed: samācarati yaḥ vighnam sa mṛtvā jāyate kṛmiḥ

original: MSS_7150-1 upaharaṇaṃ vibhavānāṃ saṃharaṇaṃ sakaladuritajālasya /
analyzed: upaharaṇam vibhavānām saṃharaṇam sakala durita jālasya

original: MSS_7150-2 uddharaṇaṃ saṃsārāc caraṇaṃ vaḥ śreyase'stu viśvapateḥ //
analyzed: uddharaṇam saṃsārāt caraṇam vaḥ śreyaseḥ tu viśvapateḥ

original: MSS_7151-1 upahāsādikaṃ dūtyā nāyikāyāstataḥ param /
analyzed: upahāsa ādikam dūtyāḥ nāyikāyāḥ tatas param

original: MSS_7151-2 atha saṃbhogaśṛṅgāre parasparavilokanam //
analyzed: atha saṃbhoga śṛṅgāre paraspara vilokanam

original: MSS_7152-1 upahitaṃ śiśirāpagamaśriyā mukulajālamaśobhata kiṃśuke /
analyzed: upahitam śiśira apagama śriyā mukula jālam aśobhata kiṃśuke

original: MSS_7152-2 praṇayinīva nakhakṣatamaṇḍanaṃ pramadayā madayāpitalajjayā //
analyzed: praṇayinī iva nakha kṣata maṇḍanam pramadayā mada yāpita lajjayā

original: MSS_7153-1 upaṃśukrīḍito'mātyaḥ svayaṃ rājāyate yataḥ /
analyzed: upaṃśu krīḍita umātyaḥ svayam rājāyate yatas

original: MSS_7153-2 avajñā kriyate tena sadā paricayād dhruvam //
analyzed: avajñā kriyate tena sadā paricayāt dhruvam

original: MSS_7153-1 upākṛtāyā navayauvanena yāntyā galatsāñjanabāṣpapūram /
analyzed: upākṛtāyāḥ nava yauvanena yāntyāḥ galat sāñjana bāṣpa pūram

original: MSS_7153-2 bālyaśriyaḥ kiṃ padavī vireje romāvalī khañjanalocanāyāḥ //
analyzed: bālya śriyaḥ kim padavī vireje roma āvalī khañjana locanāyāḥ

original: MSS_7154-1 upādade tasya sahasraraśmis tvaṣṭrā navaṃ nirmitamātapatram /
analyzed: upādade tasya sahasraraśmiḥ tvaṣṭrā navam nirmita mātapatram

original: MSS_7154-2 sa taddukūlād avidūramaulir babhau patadgaṅga ivottamāṅge //
analyzed: sa tad dukūlāt avidūra mauliḥ babhau patat gaṅgaḥ iva uttamāṅge

original: MSS_7155-1 upādātā yāvanna bhavati bhavādṛgguṇavatām asatkalpāstāvat tribhuvanamahārhā api guṇāḥ /
analyzed: upādātā yāvat na bhavati bhavādṛś guṇavatām asat kalpāḥ tāvat tribhuvana mahārhāḥ api guṇāḥ

original: MSS_7155-2 api prāgdaityārerhṛdayavasateḥ kaustubhamaṇiḥ sa kiṃ nāsīdabdhau śrutirapi kimasya kvacidabhūt //
analyzed: api prāk daityāreḥ hṛdaya vasateḥ kaustubha maṇiḥ sa kim nā āsīt abdhau śrutiḥ api kim asya kvacid abhūt

original: MSS_7156-1 upādhibhiḥ satatasaṃgato'pi nahi svabhāvaṃ vijahāti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: upādhibhiḥ satata saṃgataḥ api nahi svabhāvam vijahāti bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_7156-2 ājanma yo majjati dugdhasindhau tathāpi kākaḥ kila kṛṣṇa eva //
analyzed: ājanma yaḥ majjati dugdha sindhau tathā api kākaḥ kila kṛṣṇaḥ eva

original: MSS_7157-1 upādhyāyaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca ye'bhidruhyanti manasā karmaṇā vā /
analyzed: upādhyāyam pitaram mātaram ca yebhidruhyanti manasā karmaṇā vā

original: MSS_7157-2 teṣāṃ pāpaṃ bhrūṇahatyāviśiṣṭaṃ tasmānnānyaḥ pāpakṛdasti loke //
analyzed: teṣām pāpam bhrūṇahatyā viśiṣṭam tasmāt na anyaḥ pāpa kṛt asti loke

original: MSS_7158-1 upādhyāyaśca vaidyaśca pratibhūrbhuktanāyikā /
analyzed: upādhyāyaḥ ca vaidyaḥ ca pratibhūḥ bhuktanāyikā

original: MSS_7158-2 sūtikā dūtikāścaiva siddhe kārye tṛṇopamāḥ //
analyzed: sūtikāḥ dūtikāḥ ca eva siddhe kārye tṛṇa upamāḥ

original: MSS_7159-1 upādhyāyān daśācārya ācāryāṇāṃ śataṃ pitā /
analyzed: upādhyāyān daśa ācāryaḥ ācāryāṇām śatam pitā

original: MSS_7159-2 sahasraṃ tu pit n mātā gauraveṇātiricyate //
analyzed: sahasram tu pit n mātā gauraveṇa atiricyate

original: MSS_7160-1 upādhvaṃ tat pānthāḥ punarapi saro mārgatilakaṃ yadāsādya svacchaṃ vilasatha vinītaklamabharāḥ /
analyzed: upādhvam tat pānthāḥ punar api saraḥ mārga tilakam yat āsādya svaccham vilasatha vinīta klama bharāḥ

original: MSS_7160-2 itastu kṣārābdherjaraṭhamakarakṣuṇṇapayaso nivṛttiḥ kalyāṇī na punaravatāraḥ kathamapi //
analyzed: itas tu kṣārābdheḥ jaraṭha makara kṣuṇṇa payasaḥ nivṛttiḥ kalyāṇī na punar avatāraḥ katham api

original: MSS_7161-1 upānahau ca yo dadyāt pātrabhūte dvijottame /
analyzed: upānahau ca yaḥ dadyāt pātra bhūte dvijottame

original: MSS_7161-2 so'pi lokānavāpnoti daivatairabhipūjitān //
analyzed: saḥ api lokān avāpnoti daivataiḥ abhipūjitān

original: MSS_7162-1 upānītaṃ dūrāt parimalamupāghrāya marutā samāyāsīdasmin madhuramadhulobhānmadhukaraḥ /
analyzed: upānītam dūrāt parimalam upāghrāya marutā samāyāsīt asmin madhura madhu lobhāt madhukaraḥ

original: MSS_7162-2 paro dūre lābhaḥ kupitaphaṇinaś candanataroḥ punarjīvan yāyād yadi tadiha lābho'yamatulaḥ //
analyzed: paras dūre lābhaḥ kupita phaṇinaḥ candana taroḥ punar jīvan yāyāt yadi tat iha lābhaḥ yam atulaḥ

original: MSS_7163-1 upāntapronmīladviṭapijaṭilāṃ kautukavatī kadācid gantāsi priyasakhi na śiprātaṭabhuvam /
analyzed: upānta pronmīlat viṭapi jaṭilām kautukavatī kadācid gantāsi priya sakhi na śiprā taṭa bhuvam

original: MSS_7163-2 yadasyāṃ muktāsragvihitasitabhogibhramatayā vayorūḍhaḥ kekī likhati nakhareṇa stanataṭam //
analyzed: yat asyām muktā sraj vihita sita bhogi bhrama tayā vayaḥ rūḍhaḥ kekī likhati nakhareṇa stana taṭam

original: MSS_7164-1 upāyaṃ cintayet prājño hyapāyamapi cintayet /
analyzed: upāyam cintayet prājñaḥ hi apāyam api cintayet

original: MSS_7164-2 paśyato bakamūrkhasya nakulairbhakṣitāḥ sutāḥ //
analyzed: paśyataḥ baka mūrkhasya nakulaiḥ bhakṣitāḥ sutāḥ

original: MSS_7165-1 upāyaṃ yaṃ puraskṛtya sevate sevakaḥ prabhum /
analyzed: upāyam yam puraskṛtya sevate sevakaḥ prabhum

original: MSS_7165-2 anantarajñas tatraiva yogyaṃ taṃ kila manyate //
analyzed: anantara jñaḥ tatra eva yogyam tam kila manyate

original: MSS_7166-1 upāyakuśalaṃ vaidyaṃ bhṛtyasaṃdūṣaṇe ratam /
analyzed: upāya kuśalam vaidyam bhṛtya saṃdūṣaṇe ratam

original: MSS_7166-2 śūramaiśvaryakāmaṃ ca yo na hanti sa vadhyate //
analyzed: śūram aiśvarya kāmam ca yaḥ na hanti sa vadhyate

original: MSS_7167-1 upāyajñaśca yogajñas tattvajñaḥ pratibhānavān /
analyzed: upāya jñaḥ ca yoga jñaḥ tattva jñaḥ pratibhānavān

original: MSS_7167-2 svadharmanirato nityaṃ parastrīṣu parāṅmukhaḥ /
analyzed: svadharma nirataḥ nityam para strīṣu parāṅmukhaḥ

original: MSS_7167-3 vaktohavāṃścitrakathaḥ syādakuṇṭhitavāk sadā //
analyzed: vakta ūhavān citra kathaḥ syāt akuṇṭhita vāc sadā

original: MSS_7168-1 upāyanīkṛtaṃ yat tu suhṛtsambandhibandhuṣu /
analyzed: upāyanīkṛtam yat tu suhṛd sambandhi bandhuṣu

original: MSS_7168-2 vivāhādiṣu cācāradattaṃ hrīdattameva tat //
analyzed: vivāha ādiṣu ca ācāra dattam hrī dattam eva tat

original: MSS_7169-1 upāyapūrvaṃ lipseta kālaṃ vīkṣya samutpatet /
analyzed: upāya pūrvam lipseta kālam vīkṣya samutpatet

original: MSS_7169-2 paścāttāpāya bhavati vikramaikarasajñatā //
MSS_7170-1 upāyamāsthitasyāpi naśyantyarthāḥ pramādyataḥ /
analyzed: upāyam āsthitasya api naśyanti arthāḥ pramādyataḥ

original: MSS_7170-2 hanti nopaśayastho'pi śayālurmṛgayurmṛgān //
analyzed: hanti na upaśaya sthaḥ upi śayāluḥ mṛgayuḥ mṛgān

original: MSS_7171-1 upāyānāṃ ca sarveṣām upāyaḥ paṇyasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: upāyānām ca sarveṣām upāyaḥ paṇya saṃbhavaḥ

original: MSS_7171-2 dhanārthaṃ śasyate hyekas tadanyaḥ saṃśayātmakaḥ //
analyzed: dhana artham śasyate hi ekaḥ tad anyaḥ saṃśaya ātmakaḥ

original: MSS_7172-1 upāyā yuktayo māyāḥ kālayāpanamucyate /
analyzed: upāyāḥ yuktayaḥ māyāḥ kāla yāpanam ucyate

original: MSS_7172-2 nirapāyo jayastūrṇam eka eva parākramaḥ //
analyzed: nirapāyaḥ jayaḥ tūrṇam ekaḥ eva parākramaḥ

original: MSS_7173-1 upāyena jayo yādṛg ripos tādṛṅ na hetibhiḥ /
analyzed: upāyena jayaḥ yādṛś ripoḥ tādṛś na hetibhiḥ

original: MSS_7173-2 upāyajño'lpakāyo'pi na śūraiḥ paribhūyate //
analyzed: upāya jña ulpa kāyaḥ api na śūraiḥ paribhūyate

original: MSS_7174-1 upāyena hi yacchakyaṃ na tacchakyaṃ parākramaiḥ /
analyzed: upāyena hi yat śakyam na tat śakyam parākramaiḥ

original: MSS_7174-2 kākī kanakasūtreṇa kṛṣṇasarpamaghātayat //
analyzed: kākī kanaka sūtreṇa kṛṣṇa sarpam aghātayat

original: MSS_7175-1 upāyena hi yacchakyaṃ na tacchakyaṃ parākramaiḥ /
analyzed: upāyena hi yat śakyam na tat śakyam parākramaiḥ

original: MSS_7175-2 śṛgālena hato hastī gacchatā paṅkavartmanā //
analyzed: śṛgālena hataḥ hastī gacchatā paṅka vartmanā

original: MSS_7176-1 upāyairapyaśakyāste jāne jetuṃ nareśvarāḥ /
analyzed: upāyaiḥ api aśakyāḥ te jāne jetum nareśvarāḥ

original: MSS_7176-2 upekṣitā bhaviṣyanti saṃkalpe'pyatha durjayāḥ //
analyzed: upekṣitāḥ bhaviṣyanti saṃkalpe pi atha durjayāḥ

original: MSS_7177-1 upāyairiva taiḥ kāle caturbhiḥ suprayojitaiḥ /
analyzed: upāyaiḥ iva taiḥ kāle caturbhiḥ su prayojitaiḥ

original: MSS_7177-2 mailugikṣoṇipālasya rājyaṃ jātaṃ sadonnatam //
analyzed: mailuk iti kṣoṇipālasya rājyam jātam sadā unnatam

original: MSS_7178-1 upārjitānāmarthānāṃ tyāga eva hi rakṣaṇam /
analyzed: upārjitānām arthānām tyāgaḥ eva hi rakṣaṇam

original: MSS_7178-2 taḍāgodarasaṃsthānāṃ parīvāha ivāmbhasām //
analyzed: taḍāga udara saṃsthānām parīvāhaḥ iva ambhasām

original: MSS_7179-1 upālabhyo nāyaṃ sakalabhuvanāścaryamahimā harernābhīpadmaḥ prabhavati hi sarvatra niyatiḥ /
analyzed: upālabhyaḥ na ayam sakala bhuvana āścarya mahimā hareḥ nābhī padmaḥ prabhavati hi sarvatra niyatiḥ

original: MSS_7179-2 yadatraiva brahmā pibati nijamāyurmadhu punar vilumpanti svedādhikamamṛtahṛdyaṃ madhulihaḥ //
analyzed: yat atrā eva brahmā pibati nijam āyuḥ madhu punar vilumpanti sveda adhikam amṛta hṛdyam madhulihaḥ

original: MSS_7180-1 upāsate yathā bālā mātaraṃ kṣudhayārditāḥ /
analyzed: upāsate yathā bālāḥ mātaram kṣudhayā arditāḥ

original: MSS_7180-2 śreyaskāmās tathā gaṅgām upāsantīha dehinaḥ //
analyzed: śreyaskāmāḥ tathā gaṅgām upāsanti iha dehinaḥ

original: MSS_7181-1 upāsyamānāviva śikṣituṃ tato mṛdutvamaprauḍhamṛṇālanālayā /
analyzed: upāsyamānau iva śikṣitum tatas mṛdu tvam aprauḍha mṛṇāla nālayā

original: MSS_7181-2 rarājatur māṅgalikena saṃgatau bhujau sudatyā valayena kambunaḥ //
analyzed: rarājatuḥ māṅgalikena saṃgatau bhujau sudatyā valayena kambunaḥ

original: MSS_7182-1 upekṣaṇīyaiva parasya vṛddhiḥ pranaṣṭanīterajitendriyasya /
analyzed: upekṣaṇīyā eva parasya vṛddhiḥ pranaṣṭa nīteḥ ajita indriyasya

original: MSS_7182-2 madādiyuktasya virāgahetuḥ samūlaghātaṃ vinihanti cānte //
analyzed: mada ādi yuktasya virāga hetuḥ sa mūlaghātam vinihanti ca ante

original: MSS_7183-1 upekṣitaḥ kṣīṇabalo'pi śatruḥ pramādadoṣāt puruṣairmadāndhaiḥ /
analyzed: upekṣitaḥ kṣīṇa balaḥ upi śatruḥ pramāda doṣāt puruṣaiḥ mada andhaiḥ

original: MSS_7183-2 sādhyo'pi bhūtvā prathamaṃ tato'sāv asādhyatāṃ vyādhiriva prayāti //
analyzed: sādhyaḥ api bhūtvā prathamam tatas asau asādhya tām vyādhiḥ iva prayāti

original: MSS_7184-1 upekṣitānāṃ mandānāṃ dhīrasattvairavajñayā /
analyzed: upekṣitānām mandānām dhīra sattvaiḥ avajñayā

original: MSS_7184-2 atrāsitānāṃ krodhāndhair bhavatyeṣā vikatthanā //
analyzed: atra asitānām krodha andhaiḥ bhavati eṣā vikatthanā

original: MSS_7185-1 upekṣeta pranaṣṭaṃ yat prāptaṃ yat tadupāharet /
analyzed: upekṣeta pranaṣṭam yat prāptam yat tat upāharet

original: MSS_7185-2 na bālaṃ na striyaṃ cātilālayet tāḍayen na ca /
analyzed: na bālam na striyam ca atilālayet tāḍayet na ca

original: MSS_7185-3 vidyābhyāse gṛhyakṛtye tāvubhau yojayet kramāt //
analyzed: vidyā abhyāse gṛhya kṛtye tau ubhau yojayet kramāt

original: MSS_7186-1 upekṣeta samarthaḥ san dharmasya paripanthinaḥ /
analyzed: upekṣeta samarthaḥ san dharmasya paripanthinaḥ

original: MSS_7186-2 sa eva sarvanāśāya hetubhūto na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eva sarva nāśāya hetu bhūtaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_7187-1 upekṣyapakṣe bhūpānāṃ mānaḥ svārthasya siddhaye /
analyzed: upekṣya pakṣe bhūpānām mānaḥ sva arthasya siddhaye

original: MSS_7187-2 sa tu prāṇānupekṣyāpi grāhyapakṣe manasvinām //
analyzed: sa tu prāṇān upekṣya api grāhya pakṣe manasvinām

original: MSS_7187A-1 upekṣya loṣṭakṣeptāraṃ loṣṭaṃ daśati maṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: upekṣya loṣṭa kṣeptāram loṣṭam daśati maṇḍalaḥ

original: MSS_7187A-2 siṃhas tu śaramapekṣya śarakṣeptāramīkṣate //
analyzed: siṃhaḥ tu śaram apekṣya śara kṣeptāram īkṣate

original: MSS_7188-1 upetaḥ kośadaṇḍābhyāṃ sāmātyaḥ saha mantribhiḥ /
analyzed: upetaḥ kośa daṇḍābhyām sa amātyaḥ saha mantribhiḥ

original: MSS_7188-2 durgasthaścintayet sādhu maṇḍalaṃ maṇḍalādhipaḥ //
analyzed: durga sthaḥ cintayet sādhu maṇḍalam maṇḍala adhipaḥ

original: MSS_7188A-1 upetya tāṃ dṛḍhaparirambhalālasaś cirādabhūḥ pramuṣitacārucandanaḥ /
analyzed: upetya tām dṛḍha parirambha lālasaḥ cirāt abhūḥ pramuṣita cāru candanaḥ

original: MSS_7188A-2 dhṛtāñjanaḥ sapadi tadakṣicumbanād ihaiva te priya viditā kṛtārthatā //
analyzed: dhṛta añjanaḥ sapadi tad akṣi cumbanāt iha eva te priya viditā kṛtārtha tā

original: MSS_7189-1 upaiti kṣārābdhiṃ sahati bahuvātavyatikaraṃ puro nānābhaṅgānanubhavati paśyaiṣa jaladaḥ /
analyzed: upaiti kṣāra abdhim sahati bahu vāta vyatikaram puras nānā bhaṅgān anubhavati paśya eṣa jaladaḥ

original: MSS_7189-2 kathaṃcillabdhāni pravitarati toyāni jagate guṇaṃ vā doṣaṃ vā gaṇayati na dānavyasanitā //
analyzed: kathaṃcid labdhāni pravitarati toyāni jagate guṇam vā doṣam vā gaṇayati na dāna vyasani tā

original: MSS_7190-1 upaiti sasyaṃ pariṇāmaramyatāṃ nadīranauddhatyamapaṅkatāṃ mahī /
analyzed: upaiti sasyam pariṇāma ramya tām nadīḥ an auddhatyam apaṅka tām mahī

original: MSS_7190-2 navairguṇaiḥ saṃprati saṃstavasthiraṃ tirohitaṃ prema ghanāgamaśriyaḥ //
analyzed: navaiḥ guṇaiḥ saṃprati saṃstava sthiram tirohitam prema ghanāgama śriyaḥ

original: MSS_7191-1 upoḍharāgāpyabalā madena sā madenasā manyurasena yojitā /
analyzed: upoḍha rāgā api abalā madena sā madenasā manyu rasena yojitā

original: MSS_7191-2 na yojitātmānamanaṅgatāpitāṃ gatāpi tāpāya mamādya neyate //
analyzed: na yojitā ātmānam anaṅga tāpi tām gatā api tāpāya mama adya nā iyate

original: MSS_7192-1 upoḍharāgeṇa vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśāmukham /
analyzed: upoḍha rāgeṇa vilola tārakam tathā gṛhītam śaśinā niśā mukham

original: MSS_7192-2 yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro'pi rāgād galitaṃ na lakṣitam //
analyzed: yathā samastam timira aṃśukam tayā purā upi rāgāt galitam na lakṣitam

original: MSS_7193-1 upodakī samāyāti tintiḍīmantriṇā saha /
analyzed: upodakī samāyāti tintiḍī mantriṇā saha

original: MSS_7193-2 palāyadhvaṃ palāyadhvaṃ re re śākaviḍambakāḥ //
analyzed: palāyadhvam palāyadhvam re re śāka viḍambakāḥ

original: MSS_7194-1 upoṣyaikādaśīḥ sarvās tathā kṛṣṇāścaturdaśīḥ /
analyzed: upoṣya ekādaśīḥ sarvāḥ tathā kṛṣṇāḥ caturdaśīḥ

original: MSS_7194-2 dhyātvā hariharaṃ devaṃ prāpnoti paramaṃ padam //
analyzed: dhyātvā hariharam devam prāpnoti paramam padam

original: MSS_7195-1 uptā kīrtilatā guṇaistava vibho siktā ca dānodakair merustambhamavāpya dikṣu vitatā prāptā nabhomaṇḍalam /
analyzed: uptā kīrti latā guṇaiḥ tava vibho siktā ca dāna udakaiḥ meru stambham avāpya dikṣu vitatā prāptā nabhaḥ maṇḍalam

original: MSS_7195-2 dhūpais tvatpratipakṣalakṣavanitāniḥśvāsajair dhūpitā ṛkṣaiḥ korakitendunā kusumitā śrīrāmacandra prabho //
analyzed: dhūpaiḥ tvad pratipakṣa lakṣa vanitā niḥśvāsa jaiḥ dhūpitā ṛkṣaiḥ korakita indunā kusumitā śrī rāmacandra prabho

original: MSS_7196-1 upyante viṣavallibījaviṣamāḥ kleṣāḥ priyākhyā narais tebhyaḥ snehamayā bhavanti nacirād vajrāgnigarbhāṅkurāḥ /
analyzed: upyante viṣa valli bīja viṣamāḥ kleṣāḥ priya ākhyāḥ naraiḥ tebhyaḥ sneha mayāḥ bhavanti nacirāt vajra agni garbha aṅkurāḥ

original: MSS_7196-2 yebhyo'mī śataśaḥ kukūlahutabhugdāhaṃ dahantaḥ śanair dehaṃ dīpraśikhāsahasraśikharā rohanti śokadrumāḥ //
analyzed: yebhyaḥ amī śataśas kukūla hutabhuj dāham dahantaḥ śanais deham dīpra śikhā sahasra śikharāḥ rohanti śoka drumāḥ

original: MSS_7197-1 upyamānaṃ muhuḥ kṣetraṃ svayaṃ nirvīryatāmiyāt /
analyzed: upyamānam muhur kṣetram svayam nirvīrya tām iyāt

original: MSS_7197-2 na kalpate punaḥ sūtyā uptaṃ bījaṃ ca naśyati //
analyzed: na kalpate punar sūtyai uptam bījam ca naśyati

original: MSS_7198-1 evaṃ kāmāśayaṃ cittaṃ kāmānāmatisevayā /
analyzed: evam kāma āśayam cittam kāmānām atisevayā

original: MSS_7198-2 virajyate yathā rājan nāgnivat kāmabindubhiḥ //
analyzed: virajyate yathā rājan na agni vat kāma bindubhiḥ

original: MSS_7199-1 ubhayameva vadanti manīṣiṇaḥ samayavarṣitayā kṛtakarmaṇām /
analyzed: ubhayam eva vadanti manīṣiṇaḥ samaya varṣitayā kṛta karmaṇām

original: MSS_7199-2 balaniṣūdanamarthapatiṃ ca taṃ śramanudaṃ manudaṇḍadharānvayam //
analyzed: bala niṣūdanam arthapatim ca tam śrama nudam manu daṇḍadhara anvayam

original: MSS_7200-1 ubhayī prakṛtiḥ kāme sajjediti munermatam /
analyzed: ubhayī prakṛtiḥ kāme sajjet iti muneḥ matam

original: MSS_7200-2 apavarge tṛtīyeti bhaṇataḥ pāṇinerapi //
analyzed: apavarge tṛtīyā iti bhaṇataḥ pāṇineḥ api

original: MSS_7201-1 ubhayorapi nistartuṃ śaktaḥ sādhus tathāpadam /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ api nistartum śaktaḥ sādhuḥ tathā padam

original: MSS_7201-2 śatroḥ svasya ca nistīrṇau gajagrāhau yathāpadam //
analyzed: śatroḥ svasya ca nistīrṇau gaja grāhau yathāpadam

original: MSS_7202-1 ubhayorna svabhogecchā parārthaṃ dhanasaṃcayam /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ na sva bhoga icchā para artham dhana saṃcayam

original: MSS_7202-2 kṛpaṇodārayoḥ paśya tathāpi mahadantaram //
analyzed: kṛpaṇa udārayoḥ paśya tathā api mahat antaram

original: MSS_7203-1 ubhayormelane prītir yadi syān melanaṃ tadā /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ melane prītiḥ yadi syāt melanam tadā

original: MSS_7203-2 ekena na hi hastena jāyate tālavādanam //
analyzed: ekena na hi hastena jāyate tālavādanam

original: MSS_7204-1 ubhābhyāṃ gatirekaiva garbhasthasya ṛṇasya ca /
analyzed: ubhābhyām gatiḥ ekā eva garbha sthasya ṛṇasya ca

original: MSS_7204-2 hasantī dhārayed garbhaṃ rudantī pratimuñcati //
analyzed: hasantī dhārayet garbham rudantī pratimuñcati

original: MSS_7205-1 ubhābhyāṃeva pakṣābhyāṃ yathā khe pakṣiṇāṃ gatiḥ /
analyzed: ubhābhyām eva pakṣābhyām yathā khe pakṣiṇām gatiḥ

original: MSS_7205-2 tathā daivena yuktaṃ tu pauruṣaṃ phalasādhakam //
analyzed: tathā daivena yuktam tu pauruṣam phala sādhakam

original: MSS_7206-1 ubhābhyāṃeva pakṣābhyāṃ yathā khe pakṣiṇaṃ gatiḥ /
analyzed: ubhābhyām eva pakṣābhyām yathā khe pakṣiṇam gatiḥ

original: MSS_7206-2 tathaiva jñānakarmabhyāṃ jāyate paramaṃ padam //
analyzed: tathā eva jñāna karmabhyām jāyate paramam padam

original: MSS_7207-1 ubhāveva calau yatra lakṣyaṃ cāpi dhanurdharaḥ /
analyzed: ubhau eva calau yatra lakṣyam ca api dhanurdharaḥ

original: MSS_7207-2 tad vijñeyaṃ dvayācalaṃ śrameṇaiva hi sādhyate //
analyzed: tat vijñeyam dvayācalam śrameṇa eva hi sādhyate

original: MSS_7208-1 ubhau yadi vyomni pṛthakpravāhāv ākāśagaṅgāpayasaḥ patetām /
analyzed: ubhau yadi vyomni pṛthak pravāhau ākāśagaṅgā payasaḥ patetām

original: MSS_7208-2 tenopamīyeta tamālanīlam āmuktamuktālatamasya vakṣaḥ //
analyzed: tena upamīyeta tamāla nīlam āmukta muktā latamasya vakṣaḥ

original: MSS_7209-1 ubhau rambhāstambhāvupari viparītau kamalayos tadūrdhvaṃ ratnāśmasthalamatha durūhaṃ kimapi tat /
analyzed: ubhau rambhā stambhau upari viparītau kamalayoḥ tad ūrdhvam ratna aśma sthalam atha durūham kim api tat

original: MSS_7209-2 tataḥ kumbhau paścād bisakisalaye kandalamatho tadanvindāvindīvaramadhukarāḥ kiṃ punaridam //
analyzed: tatas kumbhau paścāt bisa kisalaye kandalam atho tadanu indā vindīvara madhukarāḥ kim punar idam

original: MSS_7210-1 ubhau lokāvabhiprekṣya rājānamṛṣayaḥ svayam /
analyzed: ubhau lokau abhiprekṣya rājānam ṛṣayaḥ svayam

original: MSS_7210-2 asṛjan sumahad bhūtam ayaṃ dharmo bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: asṛjan su mahat bhūtam ayam dharmaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_7211-1 ubhau śvetau pakṣau carati gagane'vāritagatiḥ sadā mīnaṃ bhuṅkte vasati sakalaḥ sthāṇuśirasi /
analyzed: ubhau śvetau pakṣau carati gagane vārita gatiḥ sadā mīnam bhuṅkte vasati sakalaḥ sthāṇu śirasi

original: MSS_7211-2 bake cāndraḥ sarvo guṇasamudayaḥ kiṃcidadhiko guṇāḥ sthāne mānyā naravara na tu sthānarahitāḥ //
analyzed: bake cāndraḥ sarvaḥ guṇa samudayaḥ kiṃcid adhikaḥ guṇāḥ sthāne mānyāḥ nara vara na tu sthāna rahitāḥ

original: MSS_7212-1 umākomalahastābjasambhāvitalalāṭikam /
MSS_7212-2 hiraṇyakuṇḍalaṃ vande kumāraṃ puṣkarasrajam //
analyzed: hiraṇya kuṇḍalam vande kumāram puṣkara srajam

original: MSS_7213-1 umātanūjena gadādhareṇa pratyutsavaṃ sevitaśaṃkareṇa /
analyzed: umā tanūjena gadādhareṇa pratyutsavam sevita śaṃkareṇa

original: MSS_7213-2 gaurīśaputreṇa rasajñahetor viracyate kaścana kāvyabandhaḥ //
analyzed: gaurīśa putreṇa rasa jña hetoḥ viracyate kaścana kāvya bandhaḥ

original: MSS_7214-1 umā tilakatāle tu drutau laghugurū smṛtau /
MSS_7214-2 cārākhyastvaḍatālaḥ syād vidvadbhis tena gīyate //
analyzed: cāra ākhyaḥ tu aḍatālaḥ syāt vidvadbhiḥ tena gīyate

original: MSS_7215-1 umāmimāṃ samudvīkṣya śītadīdhitiśekharām /
analyzed: umām imām samudvīkṣya śītadīdhiti śekharām

original: MSS_7215-2 eṣā tu bhāratī bhānuṃ mattaṃ svīkṛtya nṛtyati //
analyzed: eṣā tu bhāratī bhānum mattam svīkṛtya nṛtyati

original: MSS_7216-1 umārūpeṇa yūyaṃ te saṃyamastimitaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: umā rūpeṇa yūyam te saṃyama stimitam manaḥ

original: MSS_7216-2 śaṃbhoryatadhvamākraṣṭum ayaskāntena lohavat //
analyzed: śaṃbhoḥ yatadhvam ākraṣṭum ayaskāntena loha vat

original: MSS_7217-1 ubhe eva kṣame voḍhum ubhayorbījamāhitam /
analyzed: ubhe eva kṣame voḍhum ubhayoḥ bījam āhitam

original: MSS_7217-2 sā vā śaṃbhos tadīyā vā mūrtirjalamayī mama //
analyzed: sā vā śaṃbhoḥ tadīyā vā mūrtiḥ jala mayī mama

original: MSS_7218-1 umā vadhūrbhavān dātā yācitāra ime vayam /
analyzed: umā vadhūḥ bhavān dātā yācitāraḥ ime vayam

original: MSS_7218-2 varaḥ śaṃbhuralaṃ hyeṣa tvatkulodbhūtaye vidhiḥ //
analyzed: varaḥ śaṃbhuḥ alam hi eṣa tvad kula udbhūtaye vidhiḥ

original: MSS_7219-1 umāvṛṣāṅkau śarajanmanā yathā yathā jayantena śacīpuraṃdarau /
analyzed: umā vṛṣāṅkau śara janmanā yathā yathā jayantena śacī puraṃdarau

original: MSS_7219-2 tathā nṛpaḥ sā ca sutena māgadhī nanandatus tatsadṛśena tatsamau //
analyzed: tathā nṛpaḥ sā ca sutena māgadhī nanandatuḥ tad sadṛśena tad samau

original: MSS_7220-1 uraḥ kṛtvāvedhyaṃ maṇiphalakagāḍhasthitakucaṃ bhujāvālambyaihītyamaravanitā vyomagṛhagāḥ /
analyzed: uraḥ kṛtvā āvedhyam maṇi phalaka gāḍha sthita kucam bhujau ālambya ehi iti amara vanitāḥ vyoma gṛha gāḥ

original: MSS_7220-2 apadvāreṇaiva tvaritapadamābhāṣya sahasā hataṃ hastālambairharati suralokaṃ raṇamukhāt //
analyzed: apadvāreṇa eva tvarita padam ābhāṣya sahasā hatam hasta ālambaiḥ harati sura lokam raṇa mukhāt

original: MSS_7221-1 uraḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ kaṭiścaiva mukhatulyaṃ samādiśet /
analyzed: uraḥ pṛṣṭham kaṭiḥ ca eva mukha tulyam samādiśet

original: MSS_7221-2 karṇau saptāṅgulau proktau tālukaṃ ca ṣaḍaṅgulam //
analyzed: karṇau sapta aṅgulau proktau tālukam ca ṣaṣ aṅgulam

original: MSS_7222-1 uraḥsthalaṃ ko'tra vinā payodharaṃ bibharti saṃbodhaya mārutāśanam /
analyzed: uraḥ sthalam kotra vinā payodharam bibharti saṃbodhaya mārutāśanam

original: MSS_7222-2 vadanti kaṃ pattanasaṃbhavaṃ janāḥ phalaṃ ca kiṃ gopabadhūkucopamabh //
analyzed: vadanti kam pattana saṃbhavam janāḥ phalam ca kim

original: MSS_7223-1 uragī śiśave bubhukṣave svām adiśat phūtkṛtimānanānilena /
analyzed: uragī śiśave bubhukṣave svām adiśat phūtkṛtim ānana anilena

original: MSS_7223-2 marudāgamavārtayāpi śūnye samaye jāgrati saṃpravṛddha eva //
analyzed: marut āgama vārtayā api śūnye samaye jāgrati saṃpravṛddhe eva

original: MSS_7224-1 urasi nipatitānāṃ srastadhammillakānāṃ mukulitanayanānāṃ kiṃcidunmīlitānām /
analyzed: urasi nipatitānām srasta dhammillakānām mukulita nayanānām kiṃcid unmīlitānām

original: MSS_7224-2 uparisuratakhedasvinnagaṇḍasthalīnām adharamadhu vadhūnāṃ bhāgyavantaḥ pibanti //
analyzed: upari surata kheda svinna gaṇḍa sthalīnām adhara madhu vadhūnām bhāgyavantaḥ pibanti

original: MSS_7225-1 urasi nihitas tāro hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane kalakalavatī kāñcī pādau raṇanmaṇinūpurau /
analyzed: urasi nihitaḥ tāraḥ hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane kalakalavatī kāñcī pādau raṇat maṇi nūpurau

original: MSS_7225-2 priyamabhisarasyevaṃ mugdhe tvamāhataḍiṇḍimā yadi kimadhikatrāsotkampā diśaḥ samudīkṣase //
analyzed: priyam abhisarasi evam mugdhe tvam āhata ḍiṇḍimā yadi kim adhika trāsa utkampāḥ diśaḥ samudīkṣase

original: MSS_7226-1 urasi phaṇipatiḥ śikhī lalāṭe śirasi vidhuḥ suravāhinī jaṭāyām /
analyzed: urasi phaṇipatiḥ śikhī lalāṭe śirasi vidhuḥ suravāhinī jaṭāyām

original: MSS_7226-2 priyasakhi kathayāmi kiṃ rahasyaṃ puramathanasya raho'pi saṃsadeva //
analyzed: priya sakhi kathayāmi kim rahasyam pura mathanasya rahaḥ api saṃsad eva

original: MSS_7227-1 urasi murabhidaḥ kā gāḍhamāliṅgitāste sarasijamakarandāmoditā nandane kā /
analyzed: urasi murabhidaḥ kā gāḍham āliṅgitāḥ te sarasija makaranda āmoditā nandane kā

original: MSS_7227-2 girisamalaghuvarṇairarṇavākhyātisaṃkhyair gurubhirapi kṛtā kā chandasāṃ vṛttirasti //
analyzed: giri sama laghu varṇaiḥ arṇava akhyāti saṃkhyaiḥ gurubhiḥ api kṛtā kā chandasām vṛttiḥ asti

original: MSS_7228-1 urastava payodharāṅkitamidaṃ kuto me kṣamā tato mayi vidhīyatāṃ vasu purā yadaṅgīkṛtam /
analyzed: uraḥ tava payodhara aṅkitam idam kutas me kṣamā tatas mayi vidhīyatām vasu purā yat aṅgīkṛtam

original: MSS_7228-2 iti pracalacetasaḥ priyatamasya vārastriyā kvaṇatkanakakaṅkaṇaṃ karatalāt samākṛṣyate //
analyzed: iti pracala cetasaḥ priyatamasya vārastriyā kvaṇat kanaka kaṅkaṇam kara talāt samākṛṣyate

original: MSS_7229-1 urasyasya bhraśyat kabarabharaniryat sumanasaḥ patanti svarbālāḥ smaraparavaśā dīnamanasaḥ /
analyzed: urasyasya bhraśyat kabara bhara niryat sumanasaḥ patanti svar bālāḥ smara paravaśāḥ dīna manasaḥ

original: MSS_7229-2 surāstaṃ gāyanti sphuritatanugaṅgādharamukhās tavāyaṃ dṛkpāto yadupari kṛpāto vilasati //
analyzed: surāḥ tam gāyanti sphurita tanu gaṅgādhara mukhāḥ tava ayam dṛkpātaḥ yad upari kṛpātaḥ vilasati

original: MSS_7230-1 uruguṃ dyuguruṃ yutsu cukuśustuṣṭuvuḥ puru /
analyzed: urugum dyugurum yutsu cukuśuḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ puru

original: MSS_7230-2 lulubhuḥ pupuṣurmutsu mumuhurnu muhurmuhuḥ //
analyzed: lulubhuḥ pupuṣuḥ mutsu mumuhuḥ nu muhur muhur

original: MSS_7231-1 urojavac cakramanojñarūpā keśāvalīva bhramarājitā vā /
analyzed: uroja vat cakra manojña rūpā keśa āvalī iva bhramara ājitā vā

original: MSS_7231-2 saṃgītavat satpuṭabhedahṛdyā vidyeta nābhīsarasī mṛgākṣyāḥ //
analyzed: saṃgīta vat sat puṭabheda hṛdyā vidyeta nābhī sarasī mṛgākṣyāḥ

original: MSS_7232-1 urojātāśca kīrāśca turuṣkāraṭṭajāśca ye /
analyzed: uraḥ jātāḥ ca kīrāḥ ca turuṣkāraṭṭa jāḥ ca ye

original: MSS_7232-2 ṭakkajāḥ saindhavā madhyāḥ sthalajātās tathā hayāḥ //
analyzed: ṭakka jāḥ saindhavāḥ madhyāḥ sthala jātāḥ tathā hayāḥ

original: MSS_7233-1 urobhāvotsedaṃ bhavadapi vilāsairabhinavair mṛgākṣyās tāruṇyaṃ tribhuvanamidaṃ vyākulayati /
analyzed: uraḥ bhāva utsedam bhavat api vilāsaiḥ abhinavaiḥ mṛga akṣyāḥ tāruṇyam tribhuvanam idam vyākulayati

original: MSS_7233-2 stanābhogasphītaṃ yadi kila bhavet kā khalu kathā bhavitrī kiṃ cānyad vijitamakhilaṃ puṣpadhanuṣā //
analyzed: stana ābhoga sphītam yadi kila bhavet kā khalu kathā bhavitrī kim ca anyat vijitam akhilam puṣpadhanuṣā

original: MSS_7234-1 urobhuvā kumbhayugena jṛmbhitaṃ navopahāreṇa vayaskṛtena kim /
analyzed: uraḥ bhuvā kumbha yugena jṛmbhitam nava upahāreṇa vayaskṛtena kim

original: MSS_7234-2 trapāsariddurgamapi pratīrya sā nalasya tanvī hṛdayaṃ viveśa yat //
analyzed: trapā sarit durgam api pratīrya sā nalasya tanvī hṛdayam viveśa yat

original: MSS_7235-1 urobhuvi na tuṅgimā na ca gatāgate caṅgimā na vā vacasi vakrimā taralimā na tādṛg bhruvoḥ /
analyzed: uraḥ bhuvi na tuṅgimā na ca gata āgate caṅgimā na vā vacasi vakrimā taralimā na tādṛś bhruvoḥ

original: MSS_7235-2 tathāpi hariṇīdṛśo vapuṣi kāpi kānticchaṭā paṭāvṛtamahāmaṇidyutirivāntarā lakṣyate //
analyzed: tathā api hariṇī dṛśaḥ vapuṣi kā api kānti chaṭā paṭa āvṛta mahā maṇi dyutiḥ iva antarā lakṣyate

original: MSS_7236-1 uro māsadvaye jāte tribhirmāsais tathodaram /
analyzed: uraḥ māsa dvaye jāte tribhiḥ māsaiḥ tathā udaram

original: MSS_7236-2 caturmāsairnitambaṃ ca hastapādāviva sthitaḥ //
analyzed: catur māsaiḥ nitambam ca hasta pādau iva sthitaḥ

original: MSS_7237-1 uroruhādudgamitaiḥ payobhir āpūrya kelyā nijamāsyagarbham /
analyzed: uroruhāt udgamitaiḥ payobhiḥ āpūrya kelyā nijam āsya garbham

original: MSS_7237-2 phūtkṛtya māturvadane hasantaṃ tanūbhavaṃ paśyati ko'pi dhanyaḥ //
analyzed: phūtkṛtya mātuḥ vadane hasantam tanūbhavam paśyati kaḥ api dhanyaḥ

original: MSS_7238-1 uroruhāmbhoruhadarśanāya vimuñcataḥ kañcukabandhanāni /
analyzed: uroruha ambhoruha darśanāya vimuñcataḥ kañcuka bandhanāni

original: MSS_7238-2 ānandanīrākulalocanasya priyasya jāto viphalaḥ prayāsaḥ //
analyzed: ānanda nīra ākula locanasya priyasya jātaḥ viphalaḥ prayāsaḥ

original: MSS_7239-1 uro viśālaṃ śastaṃ ca kakṣe dīrghonnate śubhe /
analyzed: uraḥ viśālam śastam ca kakṣe dīrgha unnate śubhe

original: MSS_7239-2 ūrū vṛttau samau bāhū gūḍhaṃ jānu praśasyate //
analyzed: ūrū vṛttau samau bāhū gūḍham jānu praśasyate

original: MSS_7240-1 urvaśī yadi rūpeṇa rambhā yadi tilottamā /
analyzed: urvaśī yadi rūpeṇa rambhā yadi tilottamā

original: MSS_7240-2 gopālī menakā caiva varjanīyāḥ parastriyaḥ //
analyzed: gopālī menakā ca eva varjanīyāḥ para striyaḥ

original: MSS_7241-1 urvīṃ gurvīṃ vahati satataṃ nṛtyato bhūtabhartur bhūtvā hāro bhavati śayanaṃ kiṃ ca viśvaṃbharasya /
analyzed: urvīm gurvīm vahati satatam nṛtyataḥ bhūtabhartuḥ bhūtvā hāraḥ bhavati śayanam kim ca viśvaṃbharasya

original: MSS_7241-2 etat karma trijagati paraṃ śeṣanāgaikaśakyaṃ bhekānanye vipulavapuṣo bhogino bhakṣayantu //
analyzed: etat karma trijagati param śeṣa nāga eka śakyam bhekān anye vipula vapuṣaḥ bhoginaḥ bhakṣayantu

original: MSS_7242-1 urvīṃ maurvīkiṇabhṛti bhavaddoṣṇi bibhratyaśeṣāṃ śāntaklāntiḥ kimapi kurute narmaṇā karma kūrmaḥ /
analyzed: urvīm maurvī kiṇa bhṛti bhavat doṣṇi bibhrati aśeṣām śānta klāntiḥ kim api kurute narmaṇā karma kūrmaḥ

original: MSS_7242-2 kṛtvā velāpulinalavalīpallavagrāsagoṣṭhīṃ diṅmātaṅgāḥ samamatha sarinnāthapāthaḥ pibanti //
analyzed: kṛtvā velā pulina lavalī pallava grāsa goṣṭhīm diś mātaṅgāḥ samam atha sarit nātha pāthaḥ pibanti

original: MSS_7243-1 urvīṅgurvītimurvīdhara laghaya śarairvairighairvīryagurvī svarvīthīrvītadarvīkaranikaramadairvīrakurvīti gurvīḥ /
analyzed: urvīm gurvītim urvīdhara laghaya śaraiḥ vairighaiḥ vīrya gurvī svar vīthīḥ vīta darvīkara nikara madaiḥ vīrakurvī iti gurvīḥ

original: MSS_7243-2 kharvī kurvīta ko'nyastvamiva ripucamūrvījitairvaijayantyāḥ kurvan durvīkṣyamojo nijamitaradhanurvāraṇairvītihotram //
analyzed: kharvī kurvīta kaḥ nyaḥ tvam iva ripu camūḥ vījitaiḥ vaijayantyāḥ kurvan durvīkṣyam ojaḥ nijam itara dhanuḥ vāraṇaiḥ vītihotram

original: MSS_7244-1 urvīpateśca sphaṭikāśmanaśca śīlojjhitastrīhṛdasya cāntaḥ /
analyzed: urvīpateḥ ca sphaṭikāśmanaḥ ca śīla ujjhita strī hṛdasya ca antar

original: MSS_7244-2 asaṃnidhānāt satatasthitīnām anyoparāgaḥ kurute praveśam //
analyzed: asaṃnidhānāt satata sthitīnām anya uparāgaḥ kurute praveśam

original: MSS_7245-1 urvīmuddāmasasyāṃ janayatu visṛjan vāsavo vṛṣṭimiṣṭām iṣṭais traiviṣṭapānāṃ vidadhatu vidhivat prīṇanaṃ vipramukhyāḥ /
analyzed: urvīm uddāma sasyām janayatu visṛjan vāsavaḥ vṛṣṭim iṣṭām iṣṭaiḥ traiviṣṭapānām vidadhatu vidhivat prīṇanam vipra mukhyāḥ

original: MSS_7245-2 ākalpāntaṃ ca bhūyāt sthirasamupacitā saṃgatiḥ sajjanānāṃ niḥśeṣaṃ yāntu śāntiṃ piśunajanagiro duḥsahā vajralepāḥ //
analyzed: ā kalpa antam ca bhūyāt sthira samupacitā saṃgatiḥ sat janānām niḥśeṣam yāntu śāntim piśuna jana giraḥ duḥsahāḥ vajra lepāḥ

original: MSS_7246-1 urvyasāvatra tarvālī marvante cārvavasthitiḥ /
analyzed: urvī asau atra tarvālī maru ante cāru avasthitiḥ

original: MSS_7246-2 nātrarju yujyate gantuṃ śiro namaya tanmanāk //
analyzed: na atra ṛju yujyate gantum śiraḥ namaya tat manāk

original: MSS_7247-1 urvyāṃ ko'pi mahīdharo laghutaro dorbhyāṃ dhṛto līlayā tena tvaṃ divi bhūtale ca satataṃ govardhano gīyase /
analyzed: urvyām kaḥ api mahīdharaḥ laghutaraḥ dorbhyām dhṛtaḥ līlayā tena tvam divi bhū tale ca satatam govardhanaḥ gīyase

original: MSS_7247-2 tvāṃ trailokyadharaṃ vahāmi kucayoragre na tad gaṇyate kiṃ vā keśava bhāṣaṇena bahunā puṇyairyaśo labhyate //
analyzed: tvām trailokya dharam vahāmi kucayoḥ agre na tat gaṇyate kim vā keśava bhāṣaṇena bahunā puṇyaiḥ yaśaḥ labhyate

original: MSS_7248-1 ulūkhalaṃ yathā madhye tailayantre dṛḍhaṃ sthitam /
analyzed: ulūkhalam yathā madhye taila yantre dṛḍham sthitam

original: MSS_7248-2 sarvādhāras tathā merur madhye bhūmaṇḍale sthitam //
analyzed: sarva ādhāraḥ tathā meruḥ madhye bhū maṇḍale sthitam

original: MSS_7249-1 ulbena saṃvṛtastasminn ārdraiśca bahirāvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ulbena saṃvṛtaḥ tasmin ārdraiḥ ca bahis āvṛtaḥ

original: MSS_7249-2 āste kṛtvā śiraḥ kukṣau bhugnapṛṣṭhaśirodharaḥ //
analyzed: āste kṛtvā śiraḥ kukṣau bhugna pṛṣṭha śirodharaḥ

original: MSS_7250-1 ullaṅghya jaṅghāmavalambamānā veṇī sphuratyāyatalocanāyāḥ /
analyzed: ullaṅghya jaṅghām avalambamānā veṇī sphurati āyata locanāyāḥ

original: MSS_7250-2 jitvā jagaccandanaśākhikāyāṃ nyastāsivallīva manobhavena //
analyzed: jitvā jagat candana śākhikāyām nyastā asi vallī iva manobhavena

original: MSS_7251-1 ullaṅghya saridaraṇya- grāmagirīn kāmakātarā yāntu /
analyzed: ullaṅghya sarit araṇya grāma girīn kāma kātarāḥ yāntu
