original: MSS_7251-2 abhisāriṇya ivāntas- tṛṣṇāṃ nigadanti na svayaṃ sudhiyaḥ //
analyzed: abhisāriṇyaḥ iva antar tṛṣṇām nigadanti na svayam sudhiyaḥ

original: MSS_7252-1 ullaṅghyāpi sakhīvacaḥ samucitāmutsṛjya lajjāmalaṃ hitvā bhītibharaṃ nirasya ca nijaṃ saubhāgyagarvaṃ manāk /
analyzed: ullaṅghya api sakhī vacaḥ samucitām utsṛjya lajjā malam hitvā bhīti bharam nirasya ca nijam saubhāgya garvam manāk

original: MSS_7252-2 ājñāṃ kevalameva manmathagurorādāya nūnaṃ mayā tvaṃ niḥśeṣavilāsivargagaṇanācūḍāmaṇiḥ saṃśritaḥ //
analyzed: ājñām kevalam eva manmatha guroḥ ādāya nūnam mayā tvam niḥśeṣa vilāsi varga gaṇanā cūḍāmaṇiḥ saṃśritaḥ

original: MSS_7253-1 ullasatsaurabhaiḥ puṣpair bibhranmālāṃ sugumphitām /
analyzed: ullasat saurabhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ bibhran mālām su gumphitām

original: MSS_7253-2 paryyantasthāyino'pyanyān āmodayati bhūpatiḥ //
analyzed: paryyanta sthāyinaḥ api anyān āmodayati bhūpatiḥ

original: MSS_7254-1 ullasitabhrūḥ kimati- krāntaṃ cintayasi nistaraṅgākṣi /
analyzed: ullasita bhrūḥ kim ati krāntam cintayasi nistaraṅga akṣi

original: MSS_7254-2 kṣudrāpacāravirasaḥ pākaḥ premṇo guḍasyeva //
analyzed: kṣudra apacāra virasaḥ pākaḥ premṇaḥ guḍasya iva

original: MSS_7255-1 ullasitabhrūdhanuṣā tavapṛthunā locanena rucirāṅgi /
analyzed: ullasita bhrū dhanuṣā tava pṛthunā locanena rucira aṅgi

original: MSS_7255-2 acalā api na mahāntaḥ ke cañcalabhāvamānītāḥ //
analyzed: acalāḥ api na mahāntaḥ ke cañcala bhāvam ānītāḥ

original: MSS_7256-1 ullasitalāñchano'yaṃ jyotsnāvarṣī sudhākaraḥ sphurati /
analyzed: ullasita lāñchanā uyam jyotsnā varṣī sudhākaraḥ sphurati

original: MSS_7256-2 āsaktakṛṣṇacaraṇaḥ śakaṭa iva prakaṭitakṣīraḥ //
analyzed: āsakta kṛṣṇa caraṇaḥ śakaṭaḥ iva prakaṭita kṣīraḥ

original: MSS_7257-1 ullasitaśītadīdhiti- kalopakaṇṭhe sphuranti tāraughāḥ /
analyzed: ullasita śītadīdhiti kalā upakaṇṭhe sphuranti tārā oghāḥ

original: MSS_7257-2 kusumāyudhavidhṛtadhanur- nirgatamakarandabindunibhāḥ //
analyzed: kusumāyudha vidhṛta dhanuḥ nirgata makaranda bindu nibhāḥ

original: MSS_7258-1 ullāpayantyā dayitasya dūtīṃ vadhvā vibhūṣāṃ ca niveśayantyāḥ /
analyzed: ullāpayantyāḥ dayitasya dūtīm vadhvāḥ vibhūṣām ca niveśayantyāḥ

original: MSS_7258-2 prasannatā kāpi mukhasya jajñe veṣaśriyā nu priyavārtayā nu //
analyzed: prasanna tā kā api mukhasya jajñe veṣa śriyā nu priya vārtayā nu

original: MSS_7259-1 ullāso'dharapallavasya tanute paryāptamasyāḥ smite vinyāso nayanāñcalasya gamayatyutsāhavat sāhasam /
analyzed: ullāsa udhara pallavasya tanute paryāptam asyāḥ smite vinyāsaḥ nayana añcalasya gamayati utsāha vat sāhasam

original: MSS_7259-2 ratyāgārapathāmukhīnagamakaṃ vaijātyakakṣāvadhiḥ paryaṅke padaropaṇaṃ punaraparyantā viparyastatā //
analyzed: rati āgāra pathāmukhīna gamakam vaijātya kakṣa avadhiḥ paryaṅke pada ropaṇam punar aparyantā viparyasta tā

original: MSS_7260-1 ullāso virutena maṅgalabaligrāsena viśvāsanaṃ saṃcāreṇa kṛto vilocanayuge bāṣpodgamāvagrahaḥ /
analyzed: ullāsaḥ virutena maṅgala bali grāsena viśvāsanam saṃcāreṇa kṛtaḥ vilocana yuge bāṣpa udgama avagrahaḥ

original: MSS_7260-2 yāto'stam ravireṣa saṃprati puraḥ svastyastu te gamyatām ete tvāmanuyāntu saṃprati mama prāṇāḥ priyānveṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: yātoḥ tam raviḥ eṣa saṃprati puras svasti astu te gamyatām ete tvām anuyāntu saṃprati mama prāṇāḥ priya anveṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_7261-1 ullāsya kālakaravālamahāmbuvāhaṃ devena yena jaraṭhorjitagarjitena /
analyzed: ullāsya kāla karavāla mahā ambuvāham devena yena jaraṭha ūrjita garjitena

original: MSS_7261-2 nirvāpitaḥ sakala eva raṇe ripūṇāṃ dhārā jalais trijagati jvalitaḥ pratāpaḥ //
analyzed: nirvāpitaḥ sakalaḥ eva raṇe ripūṇām dhārā jalaiḥ trijagati jvalitaḥ pratāpaḥ

original: MSS_7262-1 ullāsyatāṃ spṛṣṭanalāṅgamaṅgaṃ tāsāṃ nalacchāyapibāpi dṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: ullāsyatām spṛṣṭa nala aṅgam aṅgam tāsām nala chāya pibā api dṛṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_7262-2 aśmaiva ratyās tadanarti patyā chede'pyabodhaṃ yadaharṣi loma //
analyzed: aśmā eva ratyāḥ tat anarti patyā chede pi abodham yat aharṣi loma

original: MSS_7263-1 ullekhaṃ nijamīkṣate bhaṇitiṣu prauḍhiṃ parāṃ śikṣate saṃdhatte padasaṃpadaḥ paricayaṃ dhatte dhvaneradhvani /
analyzed: ullekham nijam īkṣate bhaṇitiṣu prauḍhim parām śikṣate saṃdhatte pada saṃpadaḥ paricayam dhatte dhvaneḥ adhvani

original: MSS_7263-2 vaicitryaṃ vitanoti vācakavidhau vācaspaterantike deva tvadguṇavarṇanāya kurute kiṃ kiṃ na vāgdevatā //
analyzed: vaicitryam vitanoti vācaka vidhau vācaspateḥ antike deva tvad guṇa varṇanāya kurute kim kim na vāgdevatā

original: MSS_7264-1 uvāca dhātryā prathamoditaṃ vaco yayau tadīyāmavalambya cāṅgulim /
analyzed: uvāca dhātryā prathama uditam vacaḥ yayau tadīyām avalambya ca aṅgulim

original: MSS_7264-2 abhūcca namraḥ praṇipātaśikṣayā piturmudaṃ tena tatāna so'rbhakaḥ //
analyzed: abhūt ca namraḥ praṇipāta śikṣayā pituḥ mudam tena tatāna saḥ ṛbhakaḥ

original: MSS_7265-1 uśanā veda yacchāstraṃ yacca veda bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: uśanāḥ veda yat śāstram yat ca veda bṛhaspatiḥ

original: MSS_7265-2 strībuddhyā na viśiṣyete tāḥ sma rakṣyāḥ kathaṃ naraiḥ //
analyzed: strī buddhyā na viśiṣyete tāḥ sma rakṣyāḥ katham naraiḥ

original: MSS_7266-1 uṣaḥkālaśca gargaśca śakunaṃ ca bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: uṣaḥkālaḥ ca gargaḥ ca śakunam ca bṛhaspatiḥ

original: MSS_7266-2 aṅgirāśca manotsāho vipravākyaṃ janārdanaḥ //
analyzed: aṅgirāḥ ca manaḥ utsāhaḥ vipra vākyam janārdanaḥ

original: MSS_7267-1 uṣaḥ śaśaṃsa gārgyastu śakunaṃ tu bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: uṣaḥ śaśaṃsa gārgyaḥ tu śakunam tu bṛhaspatiḥ

original: MSS_7267-2 manojayaṃ tu māṇḍavyo vipravākyaṃ janārdanaḥ //
analyzed: manaḥ jayam tu māṇḍavyaḥ vipra vākyam janārdanaḥ

original: MSS_7268-1 uṣasi gurusamakṣaṃ lajjamānā mṛgākṣī ratirutamanukartuṃ rājakīre pravṛtte /
analyzed: uṣasi guru samakṣam lajjamānā mṛga akṣī rati rutam anukartum rāja kīre pravṛtte

original: MSS_7268-2 tirayati śiśulīlānartanacchadmatāla- pracalavalayamālāsphālakolāhalena //
analyzed: tirayati śiśu līlā nartana chadma tāla pracala valaya mālā sphāla kolāhalena

original: MSS_7269-1 uṣasi gurusamīpe vāsasā sāvadhānā priyalikhitanakhāṅkaṃ gopayantī samantāt /
analyzed: uṣasi guru samīpe vāsasā sa avadhānā priya likhita nakha aṅkam gopayantī samantāt

original: MSS_7269-2 kimidamiti sakhībhiḥ sādaraṃ pṛcchyamānā hari hari hariṇākṣī hrīsamudre nimagnā //
analyzed: kim idam iti sakhībhiḥ sa ādaram pṛcchyamānā hari hari hariṇa akṣī hrī samudre nimagnā

original: MSS_7270-1 uṣasi nibiḍayantyāḥ kuṇḍalaṃ keliparyā- vilavigalitamantaḥ karṇapāli priyāyāḥ /
analyzed: uṣasi nibiḍayantyāḥ kuṇḍalam keli paryā vila vigalitam antar karṇa pāli priyāyāḥ

original: MSS_7270-2 sarasahasitatiryagbhaṅgurāpāṅgarītiḥ sukṛtibhiravalīḍhā locanābhyāṃ mukhaśrīḥ //
analyzed: sa rasa hasita tiryak bhaṅgura apāṅga rītiḥ su kṛtibhiḥ avalīḍhā locanābhyām mukha śrīḥ

original: MSS_7271-1 uṣasi parivartayantyā muktādāmopavītatāṃ nītam /
analyzed: uṣasi parivartayantyā muktā dāma upavīta tām nītam

original: MSS_7271-2 puruṣāyitavaidagdhyaṃ vrīḍāvati kairna kalitaṃ te //
analyzed: puruṣāyita vaidagdhyam vrīḍāvati kaiḥ na kalitam te

original: MSS_7272-1 uṣasi bhramarayuvānaḥ svapne dṛṣṭvā sarojasāmrājyam /
analyzed: uṣasi bhramara yuvānaḥ svapne dṛṣṭvā saroja sāmrājyam

original: MSS_7272-2 gatakalpakundatalpāḥ sarasīsalilāni jighranti //
analyzed: gata kalpa kunda talpāḥ sarasī salilāni jighranti

original: MSS_7273-1 uṣasi malayavāsī jālamārgapraviṣṭo vikacakamalareṇuṃ vyākiran mohacūrṇam /
analyzed: uṣasi malaya vāsī jāla mārga praviṣṭaḥ vikaca kamala reṇum vyākirat moha cūrṇam

original: MSS_7273-2 sapadi śamitadīpo vāyucoro vadhūnāṃ harati suratakhedasvedamuktāphalāni //
analyzed: sapadi śamita dīpaḥ vāyu coraḥ vadhūnām harati surata kheda sveda muktāphalāni

original: MSS_7274-1 uṣasyeva bhrāntaṃ hatajaṭharahetos tata itaḥ svayaṃ ca svaṃ bibhrad vicarati kuṭumbaṃ diśi diśi /
analyzed: uṣasi iva bhrāntam hata jaṭhara hetoḥ tatas itas svayam ca svam bibhrat vicarati kuṭumbam diśi diśi

original: MSS_7274-2 batāsmābhiḥ kākairiva kavalamātraikamuditair na cāyurdurgatyoravadhiriha labdhaḥ kathamapi //
analyzed: bata asmābhiḥ kākaiḥ iva kavala mātra eka muditaiḥ na ca āyuḥ durgatyoḥ avadhiḥ iha labdhaḥ katham api

original: MSS_7275-1 uṣāpatimukhāmbhoje narīnarti sarasvatī /
analyzed: uṣāpati mukha ambhoje narīnarti sarasvatī

original: MSS_7275-2 ṛturājakavereva gāyantī guṇagauravam //
analyzed: ṛturāja kaveḥ eva gāyantī guṇa gauravam

original: MSS_7276-1 uṣṭrāṇāṃ ca vivāheṣu gītaṃ gāyanti gardabhāḥ /
analyzed: uṣṭrāṇām ca vivāheṣu gītam gāyanti gardabhāḥ

original: MSS_7276-2 parasparaṃ praśaṃsanti aho rūpamaho aho dhvaniḥ //
analyzed: parasparam praśaṃsanti aho rūpam aho aho dhvaniḥ

original: MSS_7277-1 uṣṇaṃ jalaṃ kṣipet tatra mātrā nāstīha kasyacit /
analyzed: uṣṇam jalam kṣipet tatra mātrā na asti iha kasyacid

original: MSS_7277-2 pakṣaikaṃ sthāpite bhāṇḍe koṣṇasthāne manīṣiṇā /
analyzed: pakṣa ekam sthāpite bhāṇḍe koṣṇa sthāne manīṣiṇā

original: MSS_7277-3 kuṇapastu bhavedeva tarūṇāṃ puṣṭikārakaḥ //
analyzed: kuṇapaḥ tu bhavet eva tarūṇām puṣṭi kārakaḥ

original: MSS_7278-1 uṣṇakāle jalaṃ dadyāc śītakāle hutāśanam /
analyzed: uṣṇa kāle jalam dadyāt śīta kāle hutāśanam

original: MSS_7278-2 prāvṛṭkāle gṛhaṃ deyaṃ sarvakāle ca bhojanam //
analyzed: prāvṛṣ kāle gṛham deyam sarva kāle ca bhojanam

original: MSS_7279-1 uṣṇamannaṃ ghṛtaṃ madyaṃ taruṇī kṣīrabhojanam /
analyzed: uṣṇam annam ghṛtam madyam taruṇī kṣīra bhojanam

original: MSS_7279-2 vāpīkapavaṭacchāyā ṣaḍkaṃ tat balavardhanam //
MSS_7280-1 uṣṇāluḥ śiśire niṣīdati tarormūlālavāle śikhī nirbhidyopari karṇikāramukulānyālīyate ṣaṭpadaḥ /
analyzed: uṣṇāluḥ śiśire niṣīdati taroḥ mūla ālavāle śikhī nirbhidya upari karṇikāra mukulāni ālīyate ṣaṭpadaḥ

original: MSS_7280-2 taptaṃ vāri vihāya tīranalinīṃ kāraṇḍavaḥ sevate krīḍāveśmani caiṣa pañjaraśukaḥ klānto jalaṃ yācate //
analyzed: taptam vāri vihāya tīra nalinīm kāraṇḍavaḥ sevate krīḍā veśmani ca eṣa pañjara śukaḥ klāntaḥ jalam yācate

original: MSS_7281-1 uṣṇālu kvacidarkadhāmani manāṅ nidrālu śītānile hālānāṃ gṛhayālu cumbadasakṛllajjālu jāyāmukham /
analyzed: uṣṇālu kvacid arka dhāmani manāk nidrālu śīta anile hālānām gṛhayālu cumbat asakṛt lajjālu jāyā mukham

original: MSS_7281-2 nityaṃ niṣpatayālu tiryagavanīśayyāśayālu kṣaṇaṃ gītebhyaḥ spṛhayālu dhāma dhavalaṃ dīne dayālu śraye //
analyzed: nityam niṣpatayālu tiryak avanī śayyā śayālu kṣaṇam gītebhyaḥ spṛhayālu dhāma dhavalam dīne dayālu śraye

original: MSS_7282-1 uṣṇīṣavān yathā vastrais tribhirbhavati saṃvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: uṣṇīṣavān yathā vastraiḥ tribhiḥ bhavati saṃvṛtaḥ

original: MSS_7282-2 saṃvṛto'yaṃ tathā dehī sattvarājasatāmasaiḥ //
analyzed: saṃvṛta uyam tathā dehī sattva rājasa tāmasaiḥ

original: MSS_7283-1 uṣmāyamāṇastanamaṇḍalībhir vārāṅganābhiḥ sphuṭavibhramābhiḥ /
analyzed: uṣmāyamāṇa stana maṇḍalībhiḥ vāra aṅganābhiḥ sphuṭa vibhramābhiḥ

original: MSS_7283-2 āliṅgitā rātriṣu śaiśirīṣu te śerate yaiḥ praṇato śaśāṅkaḥ //
analyzed: āliṅgitāḥ rātriṣu śaiśirīṣu te śerate yaiḥ śaśāṅkaḥ

original: MSS_7284-1 ūcivānucitamakṣaramenaṃ pāśapāṇirapi pāṇimudasya /
analyzed: ūcivān ucitam akṣaram enam pāśa pāṇiḥ api pāṇim udasya

original: MSS_7284-2 kīrtireva bhavatāṃ priyadārā dānanīrajharamauktikahārā //
analyzed: kīrtiḥ eva bhavatām priya dārā dāna nīra jhara mauktika hārā

original: MSS_7284A-1 ūḍhā khaḍgalatā śyāmā tvayā mātaṅgadārikā /
analyzed: ūḍhā khaḍga latā śyāmā tvayā mātaṅga dārikā

original: MSS_7284A-2 ata eva bhavān manye dūraṃ parihṛtaḥ paraiḥ //
analyzed: atas eva bhavān manye dūram parihṛtaḥ paraiḥ

original: MSS_7285-1 ūḍhāpi dyutaraṅgiṇi trijagatīvandyena tenāpyaho maulau bālakuraṅgaketanakalālīlāvataṃsāṅkite /
analyzed: ūḍhā api dyu taraṅgiṇi trijagatī vandyena tena api aho maulau bāla kuraṅga ketana kalā līlā avataṃsa aṅkite

original: MSS_7285-2 tārakṣārakaraṃ karālamakaraṃ saśvabhramabhraṃkaṣaṃ mugdhe jāḍyanidhiṃ mudhā jalanidhiṃ yātāsi citrāḥ striyaḥ //
analyzed: tāra kṣāra karam karāla makaram sa śvabhrama bhraṃkaṣam mugdhe jāḍya nidhim mudhā jalanidhim yātāsi citrāḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_7286-1 ūḍhāmunātivāhaya pṛṣṭhe lagnāpi kālamacalāpi /
analyzed: ūḍhā amunā ativāhaya pṛṣṭhe lagnā api kālam acalā api

original: MSS_7286-2 sarvaṃsahe kaṭhora- tvacaḥ kimaṅkena kamaṭhasya //
analyzed: sarvaṃsahe kaṭhora tvacaḥ kim aṅkena kamaṭhasya

original: MSS_7287-1 ūḍhā yena mahādhurāḥ suviṣame mārge sadaikākinā soḍho yena kadācideva na nije goṣṭhe'nyaśauṇḍadhvaniḥ /
analyzed: ūḍhāḥ yena mahā dhurāḥ su viṣame mārge sadā ekākinā soḍhaḥ yena kadācid eva na nije

original: MSS_7287-2 āsīd yastu gavāṃ gaṇasya tilakas tasyaida saṃpratyaho dhik kaṣṭaṃ dhavalasya jātajaraso goḥ paṇyamudghoṣyate //
analyzed: āsīt yaḥ tu gavām gaṇasya tilakaḥ saṃprati aho dhik kaṣṭam dhavalasya jāta jarasaḥ goḥ paṇyam udghoṣyate

original: MSS_7288-1 ūdhaśchindyāddhi yo dhenvāḥ kṣīrārthī na labhet payaḥ /
analyzed: ūdhaḥ chindyāt hi yaḥ dhenvāḥ kṣīra arthī na labhet payaḥ

original: MSS_7288-2 evaṃ rāṣṭramayogena pīḍitaṃ na vivardhate //
analyzed: evam rāṣṭram ayogena pīḍitam na vivardhate

original: MSS_7289-1 ūnaṣoḍaśavarṣāyām aprāptaḥ pañcaviṃśatim /
analyzed: ūna ṣoḍaśa varṣāyām a prāptaḥ pañcaviṃśatim

original: MSS_7289-2 yadyādhatte pumān garbhaḥ kukṣisthaḥ sa vipadyate //
analyzed: yadi ādhatte pumān garbhaḥ kukṣi sthaḥ sa vipadyate

original: MSS_7290-1 ūne dadyād gurūneva yāvat sarvalaghurbhavet /
analyzed: ūne dadyāt gurūn eva yāvat sarva laghuḥ bhavet

original: MSS_7290-2 prastāro'yaṃ samākhyātaś chandovicitivedibhiḥ //
analyzed: prastāraḥ iyam samākhyātaḥ chandaḥ viciti vedibhiḥ

original: MSS_7291-1 ūnenāpi hi tucchena vairiṇāpi kathaṃcana /
analyzed: ūnena api hi tucchena vairiṇā api kathaṃcana

original: MSS_7291-2 maitrī buddhimatā kāryā āpadyapi nivartate //
analyzed: maitrī buddhimatā kāryā āpadi api nivartate

original: MSS_7292-1 ūrīkartuṃ tuhinakiraṇaprītidhārāmudārāṃ dūrīkartuṃ dinakarakarakleśabādhāmagādhām /
analyzed: ūrīkartum tuhinakiraṇa prīti dhārām udārām dūrīkartum dinakara kara kleśa bādhām agādhām

original: MSS_7292-2 yasyāḥ puṇye payasi viśati snātukāmā triyāmā prāyastasyāstimiratatibhiḥ śyāmalaṃ nīramasyāḥ //
analyzed: yasyāḥ puṇye payasi viśati snātu kāmā triyāmā prāyas tasyāḥ timira tatibhiḥ śyāmalam nīram asyāḥ

original: MSS_7293-1 ūruḥ kuraṅgadṛśaś cañcalacelāñcalo bhāti /
analyzed: ūruḥ kuraṅga dṛśaḥ cañcala cela añcalaḥ bhāti

original: MSS_7293-2 sapatākaḥ kanakamayo vijayastambhaḥ smarasyeva //
analyzed: sa patākaḥ kanaka mayaḥ vijaya stambhaḥ smarasi eva

original: MSS_7294-1 ūrudvandvamaninditaṃ prathayatā śroṇīṃ samātanvatā romālīṃ sṛjatā samāgamayatā nābhiṃ gabhīraśriyā /
analyzed: ūru dvandvam aninditam prathayatā śroṇīm samātanvatā romālīm sṛjatā samāgamayatā nābhim gabhīra śriyā

original: MSS_7294-2 madhyaṃ kṣāmayatā stanau ghanayatā kāntyā mukhaṃ limpatā tanvaṅgyā navayauvanena kimapi pratyaṅgamunmīlitam //
analyzed: madhyam kṣāmayatā stanau ghanayatā kāntyā mukham limpatā tanu aṅgyā nava yauvanena kim api pratyaṅgam unmīlitam

original: MSS_7295-1 ūrudvayaṃ kadalakandalayoḥ savaṃśaṃ śroṇiḥ śilāphalakasodarasanniveśā /
analyzed: ūru dvayam kadala kandalayoḥ sa vaṃśam śroṇiḥ śilā phalaka sa udara sanniveśā

original: MSS_7295-2 vakṣaḥ stanadvitayatāḍitakumbhaśobhaṃ sabrahmacāri śaśinaśca mukhaṃ mṛgākṣyāḥ //
analyzed: vakṣaḥ stana dvitaya tāḍita kumbha śobham sa brahmacāri śaśinaḥ ca mukham mṛga akṣyāḥ

original: MSS_7296-1 ūrudvayaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ kadalasya kāṇḍau madhyaṃ ca vediratulaṃ stanayugmamasyāḥ /
analyzed: ūru dvayam mṛga dṛśaḥ kadalasya kāṇḍau madhyam ca vediḥ atulam stana yugmam asyāḥ

original: MSS_7296-2 lāvaṇyavāriparipūritaśātakumbha- kumbhau manojanṛpaterabhiṣecanāya //
analyzed: lāvaṇya vāri paripūrita śātakumbha kumbhau manoja nṛpateḥ abhiṣecanāya

original: MSS_7297-1 ūruprakāṇḍadvitayena tanvyāḥ karaḥ parājīyata vāraṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: ūru prakāṇḍa dvitayena tanvyāḥ karaḥ parājīyata vāraṇīyaḥ

original: MSS_7297-2 yuktaṃ hriyā kuṇḍalanacchalena gopāyati svaṃ mukhapuṣkaraṃ saḥ //
analyzed: yuktam hriyā gopāyati svam mukha puṣkaram saḥ

original: MSS_7298-1 ūrumūlagatanetrayugasya preyaso rabhasavellitakeśī /
analyzed: ūru mūla gata netra yugasya preyasaḥ rabhasa vellita keśī

original: MSS_7298-2 cumbati sma ratikelividagdhā hāvahāri vadanaṃ dayitasya //
analyzed: cumbati sma rati keli vidagdhā hāva hāri vadanam dayitasya

original: MSS_7299-1 ūrumūlacapalekṣaṇamaghnan yairvataṃsakumumaiḥ priyametāḥ /
analyzed: ūru mūla capala īkṣaṇam aghnan yaiḥ vataṃsa kumumaiḥ priyam etāḥ

original: MSS_7299-2 cakrire sapadi tāni yathārthaṃ manmathasya kusumāyudhanāma //
analyzed: cakrire sapadi tāni yathārtham manmathasya kusumāyudha nāma

original: MSS_7300-1 ūrū rambhā dṛgapi kamalaṃ śevalaṃ keśapāśo vaktraṃ candro lapitamamṛtaṃ madhyadeśo mṛṇālam /
analyzed: ūruḥ rambhā   api kamalam śevalam keśapāśaḥ vaktram candraḥ lapitam amṛtam madhya deśaḥ mṛṇālam

original: MSS_7300-2 nābhiḥ kūpo valirapi saritpallavaḥ kiṃ ca pāṇir yasyāḥ sā ced urasi na kathaṃ hanta tāpasya śāntiḥ //
analyzed: nābhiḥ kūpaḥ valiḥ api sarit pallavaḥ kim ca pāṇiḥ yasyāḥ sā ced urasi na katham hanta tāpasya śāntiḥ

original: MSS_7301-1 ūrū rambhe bāhū late vidhātrā kucau punaḥ kamale /
analyzed: ūrū rambhe bāhū late vidhātrā kucau punar kamale

original: MSS_7301-2 yauvanamupavanamasyāṃ madanavilāsāya kiṃ racitam //
analyzed: yauvanam upavanam asyām madana vilāsāya kim racitam

original: MSS_7302-1 ūrau śirastava niveśya dayāvitīrṇa- saṃyānapallavasamīravinītakhedam /
analyzed: ūrau śiraḥ tava niveśya dayā vitīrṇa saṃyāna pallava samīra vinīta khedam

original: MSS_7302-2 atraiva janmani vibhoḥ paramopadeśam ākarṇayeyamapi kiṃ maṇikarṇikāyām //
analyzed: atrā eva janmani vibhoḥ parama upadeśam ākarṇayeyam api kim maṇikarṇikāyām

original: MSS_7303-1 ūrjitaṃ sajjanaṃ dṛṣṭvā dveṣṭi nīcaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: ūrjitam sat janam dṛṣṭvā dveṣṭi nīcaḥ punar punar

original: MSS_7303-2 kavalīkurute svasthaṃ vidhuṃ divi vidhuṃtudaḥ //
analyzed: kavalīkurute svastham vidhum divi vidhuṃtudaḥ

original: MSS_7304-1 ūrṇāṃ naiva dadāti naiva viṣayo vāhasya dohasya vā tṛptirnāsti mahodarasya bahubhirghāsaiḥ palāśairapi /
analyzed: ūrṇām nā eva dadāti nā eva viṣayaḥ vāhasya dohasya vā tṛptiḥ nā asti mahodarasya bahubhiḥ ghāsaiḥ palāśaiḥ api

original: MSS_7304-2 hā kaṣṭaṃ kathamasya pṛṣṭhaśikhare goṇī samāropyate ko gṛhṇāti kapardakairalamiti grāmyairgajo hasyate //
analyzed: hā kaṣṭam katham asya pṛṣṭha śikhare goṇī samāropyate kaḥ gṛhṇāti kapardakaiḥ alam iti grāmyaiḥ gajaḥ hasyate

original: MSS_7305-1 ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti yaṃ tyaktvā yaṃ gṛhītvā patantyadhaḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhvam gacchanti yam tyaktvā yam gṛhītvā patanti adhas

original: MSS_7305-2 tasya gauravamarthasya tāvataivānumīyatām //
analyzed: tasya gauravam arthasya tāvatā eva anumīyatām

original: MSS_7306-1 ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhvam gacchanti sattva sthāḥ madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ

original: MSS_7306-2 jaghanyaguṇavṛttasthā adho gacchanti tāmasāḥ //
analyzed: jaghanya guṇa vṛtta sthāḥ adhas gacchanti tāmasāḥ

original: MSS_7307-1 ūrdhvaṃ na kṣīravicchedāt payo dhenoravāpyate /
analyzed: ūrdhvam na kṣīra vicchedāt payaḥ dhenoḥ avāpyate

original: MSS_7307-2 evaṃ rāṣṭrādayogena pīḍitānnāpyate baliḥ //
analyzed: evam rāṣṭrāt ayogena pīḍitāt na āpyate baliḥ

original: MSS_7308-1 ūrdhvaṃ nīradavṛndamaindavamidaṃ bimbaṃ tvadho nirmitaṃ vyomnaḥ palvalacitritasya nihitau śailāvuparyunnatau /
analyzed: ūrdhvam nīrada vṛndam aindavam idam bimbam tu adhas nirmitam vyomnaḥ palvala citritasya nihitau śailau upari unnatau

original: MSS_7308-2 kiṃ cādhaḥ pulinoccayasya kadalīkāṇḍāvavāropitau tanmanye caturasya puṣpadhanuṣaḥ sargo'yamanyādṛśaḥ //
analyzed: kim ca adhas pulina uccayasya kadalī kāṇḍau avāropitau tat manye caturasya puṣpadhanuṣaḥ sargaḥ yam anyādṛśaḥ

original: MSS_7309-1 ūrdhvaṃ prāṇā hyutkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavira āyati /
analyzed: ūrdhvam prāṇāḥ hi utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavire āyati

original: MSS_7309-2 pratyutthānābhivādābhyāṃ punas tān pratipadyate //
analyzed: pratyutthāna abhivādābhyām punar tān pratipadyate

original: MSS_7310-1 ūrdhvaṃ yāti cāpamuṣṭir guṇamuṣṭiradho bhavet /
analyzed: ūrdhvam yāti cāpa muṣṭiḥ guṇa muṣṭiḥ adhas bhavet

original: MSS_7310-2 sa mukto mārgaṇo lakṣyād dūraṃ yāti na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: sa muktaḥ mārgaṇaḥ lakṣyāt dūram yāti na saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_7311-1 ūrdhvaṃvrīhitrayaṃ mānam aṅgulasya nigadyate /
MSS_7311-2 hasto'pi hi samākhyātaś caturviśadbhiraṅgulaiḥ //
analyzed: hastaḥ api hi samākhyātaḥ caturviśadbhiḥ aṅgulaiḥ

original: MSS_7312-1 ūrdhvaṃ śvasaṃstataḥ prāṇo yātyalabdhasthitis tanoḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhvam śvasan tatas prāṇaḥ yāti alabdha sthitiḥ tanoḥ

original: MSS_7312-2 taṃ yāntamanuyātyeva jīvaḥ kālapraṇoditaḥ //
analyzed: tam yāntam anuyāti eva jīvaḥ kāla praṇoditaḥ

original: MSS_7313-1 ūrdhvagaṃ kapilābhāsam aṅgaṃ yasmin pratīyate /
analyzed: ūrdhva gam kapila ābhāsam aṅgam yasmin pratīyate

original: MSS_7313-2 nakulāṅgaṃ tu taṃ vidyāt sparśas tasyāhināśanaḥ //
analyzed: nakulāṅgam tu tam vidyāt sparśaḥ tasya ahi nāśanaḥ

original: MSS_7314-1 ūrdhvabāhur viraumyeṣa na ca kaścic śrṇoti me /
analyzed: ūrdhva bāhuḥ viraumi eṣa na ca kaścid śrṇoti me

original: MSS_7314-2 dharmādarthaśca kāmaśca sa kimarthaṃ na sevyate //
analyzed: dharmāt arthaḥ ca kāmaḥ ca sa kimartham na sevyate

original: MSS_7315-1 ūrdhvavedhī bhavej jyeṣṭho nābhivedī ca madhyamaḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhva vedhī bhavet jyeṣṭhaḥ nābhi vedī ca madhyamaḥ

original: MSS_7315-2 yaḥ pādavedhī lakṣyasya sa kaniṣṭho mato mayā //
analyzed: yaḥ pāda vedhī lakṣyasya sa kaniṣṭhaḥ mataḥ mayā

original: MSS_7316-1 ūrdhvaśaktinipātena adhaḥśakternikuñcanāt /
analyzed: ūrdhva śakti nipātena adhas śakteḥ nikuñcanāt

original: MSS_7316-2 madhyaśaktiprabodhena jāyate paramaṃ sukham //
analyzed: madhya śakti prabodhena jāyate paramam sukham

original: MSS_7317-1 ūrdhvānanā bhāskarasaṃmukhīnāḥ śvāno ruvanto mahate bhayāya /
analyzed: ūrdhva ānanāḥ bhāskara saṃmukhīnāḥ śvānaḥ ruvantaḥ mahate bhayāya

original: MSS_7317-2 evaṃ hi saṃdhyāsamaye'nyadā tu nirvāsakāḥ syurnagarasya tasya //
analyzed: evam hi saṃdhyā samaye nyadā tu nirvāsakāḥ syuḥ nagarasya tasya

original: MSS_7318-1 ūrdhvārohe ya ālambahetur bhūbhṛc chinatti tam /
analyzed: ūrdhvārohe yaḥ ālamba hetuḥ bhūbhṛt chinatti tam

original: MSS_7318-2 kuṭhārikas taruskandham ivādhogamanonmukhaḥ //
analyzed: kuṭhārikaḥ taru skandham iva adhas gamana unmukhaḥ

original: MSS_7319-1 ūrdhvārdhe lakṣaṇaṃ yasya nādho'rdhe lakṣaṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: ūrdhva ardhe lakṣaṇam yasya na adhordhe lakṣaṇam bhavet

original: MSS_7319-2 taṃ khaḍgaṃ madhyamaṃ prāhuḥ pravīṇamatayo budhāḥ //
analyzed: tam khaḍgam madhyamam prāhuḥ pravīṇa matayaḥ budhāḥ

original: MSS_7320-1 ūrdhvīkṛtagrīvamaho mudhaiva kiṃ yācase cātakapota megham /
analyzed: ūrdhvīkṛta grīvam aho mudhā eva kim yācase cāta kapota megham

original: MSS_7320-2 atyūrjitaṃ garjitamātramasminn ambhodhare bindulavastu dūram //
analyzed: ati ūrjitam garjita mātram asmin ambhodhare bindula vaḥ tu dūram

original: MSS_7321-1 ūrdhvīkṛtāsyā ravidattadṛṣṭayaḥ sametya sarve suravidviṣaḥ puraḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhvīkṛta āsyāḥ ravidatta dṛṣṭayaḥ sametya sarve sura vidviṣaḥ puras

original: MSS_7321-2 śvānaḥ svareṇa śravaṇāntaśātinā mitho rudantaḥ karuṇena niryayuḥ //
analyzed: śvānaḥ svareṇa śravaṇa anta śātinā mithas rudantaḥ karuṇena niryayuḥ

original: MSS_7322-1 ūṣaraṃ karmasasyānāṃ kṣetraṃ vārāṇasī purī /
analyzed: ūṣaram karma sasyānām kṣetram vārāṇasī purī

original: MSS_7322-2 yatra saṃlabhyate mokṣaḥ samaṃ caṇḍālapaṇḍitaiḥ //
analyzed: yatra saṃlabhyate mokṣaḥ samam caṇḍāla paṇḍitaiḥ

original: MSS_7323-1 ūṣareṣu ca kṣetreṣu yathā bījaṃ hi niṣphalam /
analyzed: ūṣareṣu ca kṣetreṣu yathā bījam hi niṣphalam

original: MSS_7323-2 upakāro'pi nīcānāṃ kṛto bhavati tādṛśaḥ //
analyzed: upakāraḥ api nīcānām kṛtaḥ bhavati tādṛśaḥ

original: MSS_7324-1 ūṣareṣu vivareṣu cāmbhasāṃ vīcayo'pi bhavatā vinirmitāḥ /
analyzed: ūṣareṣu vivareṣu ca ambhasām vīcayaḥ api bhavatā vinirmitāḥ

original: MSS_7324-2 kṣetrasīmni nihitāstu bindavo vārivāha bhavato navo nayaḥ //
analyzed: kṣetra sīmni nihitāḥ tu bindavaḥ vārivāha bhavataḥ navaḥ nayaḥ

original: MSS_7325-1 ūṣare sariti śālmalīvane dāvapāvakacite'pi candane /
analyzed: ūṣare sariti śālmalī vane candane

original: MSS_7325-2 tulyamarpayati vāri vāride kīrtirastu guṇagauravairgatam //
analyzed: tulyam arpayati vāri vāride kīrtiḥ astu guṇa gauravaiḥ gatam

original: MSS_7326-1 ūṣmavyapetā rahitāśca vṛddhyā saṃyogahīnā laghavo'pi cāntaḥ /
analyzed: ūṣma vyapetāḥ rahitāḥ ca vṛddhyā saṃyoga hīnāḥ laghavaḥ api ca antar

original: MSS_7326-2 ślokasya varṇā iva vidviṣaste pādāntamāgamya gurūbhavanti //
analyzed: ślokasya varṇāḥ iva vidviṣaḥ te pāda antam āgamya gurūbhavanti

original: MSS_7327-1 ūṣmā yasyāṃ dhātryāṃ dhūmo vā tatra vāri narayugale /
analyzed: ūṣmā yasyām dhātryām dhūmaḥ vā tatra vāri nara yugale

original: MSS_7327-2 nirdeṣṭavyā ca śirā mahatā vāripravāheṇa //
analyzed: nirdeṣṭavyā ca sirā mahatā vāri pravāheṇa

original: MSS_7328-1 ūṣmā hi vittajo vṛddhiṃ tejo nayati dehinām /
analyzed: ūṣmā hi vitta jaḥ vṛddhim tejaḥ nayati dehinām

original: MSS_7328-2 kiṃ punas tasya saṃbhogas tyāgadharmasamanvitaḥ //
analyzed: kim punar tasya saṃbhogaḥ tyāga dharma samanvitaḥ

original: MSS_7329-1 ṛkṣasya kroḍasaṃdhiprahitamukhatayā maṇḍalībhūtamūrter ārāt suptasya vīra tvadarivarapuradvāri nīhārakāle /
analyzed: ṛkṣasya kroḍa saṃdhi prahita mukha tayā maṇḍalībhūta mūrteḥ ārāt suptasya vīra tvad ari vara pura dvāri nīhāra kāle

original: MSS_7329-2 prātarnidrāvinodakramajanitasukhonmīlitaṃ cakṣurekaṃ vyādhāḥ pālālabhasmasthitadahanakaṇākāramālokayanti //
analyzed: prātar nidrā vinoda krama janita sukha unmīlitam cakṣuḥ ekam vyādhāḥ pālāla bhasma sthita dahana kaṇā ākāram ālokayanti

original: MSS_7330-1 ṛkṣāṇāṃ bhūridhāmnāṃ śritamadhipatinā prasphuradbhīmatāraṃ sphāraṃ netrānalena prasabhaniyamitoccāpamīnadhvajena /
analyzed: ṛkṣāṇām bhūri dhāmnām śritam adhipatinā prasphurat bhīma tāram sphāram netra analena prasabha niyamita uccāpa mīna dhvajena

original: MSS_7330-2 rāmāyattaṃ purāreḥ kumudaśuci lasannīlasugrīvamaṅgaṃ plāvaṅgaṃ sainyamanyad daśavadanaśiracchedahetu śriyai vaḥ //
analyzed: rāma āyattam purāreḥ kumuda śuci lasat nīla sugrīvam aṅgam plāvaṅgam sainyam anyat daśa vadana śira cheda hetu śriyai vaḥ

original: MSS_7331-1 ṛkṣairvṛto haripade nivasan samīra- saṃtānaśaityajanakaḥ kumudapramodī /
analyzed: ṛkṣaiḥ vṛtaḥ hari pade nivasan samīra saṃtāna śaitya janakaḥ kumuda pramodī

original: MSS_7331-2 nighnan niśācaratamaḥ pṛthunīlalakṣmā tārāpatiḥ sphurati citramanaṅgado'yam //
analyzed: nighnan niśācaratamaḥ pṛthu nīla lakṣmā tārāpatiḥ sphurati citram anaṅga doyam

original: MSS_7332-1 ṛgyajuḥsāmanāmānas trayo vedās trayī smṛtā /
analyzed: ṛk yajuḥ sāma nāmānaḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ trayī smṛtā

original: MSS_7332-2 ubhau lokāvavāpnoti trayyāṃ tiṣṭhan yathāvidhi //
analyzed: ubhau lokau avāpnoti trayyām tiṣṭhan yathāvidhi

original: MSS_7333-1 ṛjutāṃ nayataḥ smarāmi te śaramutsaṅganiṣaṇṇadhanvanaḥ /
analyzed: ṛju tām nayataḥ smarāmi te śaram utsaṅga niṣaṇṇa dhanvanaḥ

original: MSS_7333-2 madhunā saha sasmitāṃ kathāṃ nayanopāntavilokitaṃ ca yat //
analyzed: madhunā saha sa smitām kathām nayana upānta vilokitam ca yat

original: MSS_7333A-1 ṛjutā dhanvaguṇayor astu vastusvarūpataḥ /
analyzed: ṛju tā dhanva guṇayoḥ astu vastu svarūpataḥ

original: MSS_7333A-2 kāryasiddhau praśasyeta vakrataiva tayoḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: kārya siddhau praśasyeta vakra tā eva tayoḥ punar

original: MSS_7334-1 ṛjutvaṃ ca parityajya kalāṃ darśayato'rcanā /
analyzed: ṛju tvam ca parityajya kalām darśayatā ūrcanā

original: MSS_7334-2 dvijarājo'nṛjutvena maheśenāpi mahyate //
analyzed: dvijarāja unṛju tvena maheśena api mahyate

original: MSS_7335-1 ṛjutvaṃ tyāgitā śauryaṃ sāmānyaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
analyzed: ṛju tvam tyāgi tā śauryam sāmānyam sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: MSS_7335-2 dākṣiṇyaṃ cānuriktaśca satyatā ca suhṛdguṇāḥ //
analyzed: dākṣiṇyam ca anuriktaḥ ca satya tā ca suhṛd guṇāḥ

original: MSS_7336-1 ṛjutvamaunaśrutipāragāmitā yadīyametat parameva hiṃsitum /
analyzed: ṛju tva mauna śruti pāra gāmi tā yadi iyam etat param eva hiṃsitum

original: MSS_7336-2 atīva viśvāsavidhāyi ceṣṭitaṃ bahurmahānasya sa dāmbhikaḥ śaraḥ //
analyzed: atīva viśvāsa vidhāyi ceṣṭitam bahuḥ mahān asya sa dāmbhikaḥ śaraḥ

original: MSS_7337-1 ṛjudṛśaḥ kathayanti purāvido madhubhidaṃ kila rāhuśiraśchidam /
analyzed: ṛju dṛśaḥ kathayanti   madhubhidam kila rāhu śiraḥ chidam

original: MSS_7337-2 virahimūrdhabhidaṃ nigadanti na kva nu śaśī yadi tajjaṭharānalaḥ //
analyzed: virahi mūrdha bhidam nigadanti na kva nu śaśī yadi tad jaṭhara analaḥ

original: MSS_7338-1 ṛjunayananipātaḥ kāmatantrābhighātas tanurapi taralākṣyāḥ kasya na syāt kaṭākṣaḥ /
analyzed: ṛju nayana nipātaḥ kāma tantra abhighātaḥ tanuḥ api tarala akṣyāḥ kasya na syāt kaṭākṣaḥ

original: MSS_7338-2 iti namitamukhenduṃ paśyati prāṇanāthaṃ janasadasi vidagdhā pakṣmaṇāmantareṇa //
analyzed: iti namita mukha indum paśyati prāṇanātham jana sadasi vidagdhā pakṣmaṇām antareṇa

original: MSS_7339-1 ṛjunā nidhehi caraṇau parihara sakhi nikhilanāgarācāram /
analyzed: ṛjunā nidhehi caraṇau parihara sakhi nikhila nāgara ācāram

original: MSS_7339-2 iha ḍākinīti pallī- patiḥ kaṭākṣe'pi daṇḍayati //
analyzed: iha ḍākini iti pallī patiḥ kaṭākṣe pi daṇḍayati

original: MSS_7340-1 ṛju paśyati yaḥ sarvaṃ cakṣuṣānupibanniva /
analyzed: ṛju paśyati yaḥ sarvam cakṣuṣā anupiban iva

original: MSS_7340-2 āsīnamapi tūṣṇīkam anurajyanti taṃ prajāḥ //
analyzed: āsīnam api tūṣṇīkam anurajyanti tam prajāḥ

original: MSS_7341-1 ṛjureṣa pakṣavāniti kāṇḍe prītiṃ khale ca mā kārṣīḥ /
analyzed: ṛjuḥ eṣa pakṣavān iti kāṇḍe prītim khale ca mā kārṣīḥ

original: MSS_7341-2 prāyeṇa tyaktaguṇaḥ phalena hṛdayaṃ vidārayati //
analyzed: prāyeṇa tyakta guṇaḥ phalena hṛdayam vidārayati

original: MSS_7342-1 ṛjvāyatāṃ ca viralāṃ ca natonnatāṃ ca saptarṣivaṃśakuṭilāṃ ca nivartaneṣu /
analyzed: ṛju āyatām ca viralām ca nata unnatām ca saptarṣi vaṃśa kuṭilām ca nivartaneṣu

original: MSS_7342-2 nirmucyamānabhujagodaranirmalasya sīmāmivāmbaratalasya vibhajyamānām //
analyzed: nirmucyamāna bhujaga udara nirmalasya sīmām iva ambara talasya vibhajyamānām

original: MSS_7343-1 ṛjvāyatāṃ hi mukhatoraṇalolamālāṃ bhraṣṭāṃ kṣitau tvamavagacchasi mūrkha sarpam /
analyzed: ṛju āyatām hi mukha toraṇa lola mālām bhraṣṭām kṣitau tvam avagacchasi mūrkha sarpam

original: MSS_7343-2 mandānilena niśi yā parivartamānā kiṃcit karoti bhujagasya viceṣṭitāni //
analyzed: manda anilena niśi yā parivartamānā kiṃcid karoti bhujagasya viceṣṭitāni

original: MSS_7344-1 ṛjvī dṛṣṭiranulbaṇaṃ vihasitaṃ mandaṃ parispanditaṃ dveṣo narmaṇi dūratīrthagamane yatno ratirliṅgiṣu /
analyzed: ṛjvī dṛṣṭiḥ anulbaṇam vihasitam mandam parispanditam dveṣaḥ narmaṇi dūra tīrtha gamane yatnaḥ ratiḥ liṅgiṣu

original: MSS_7344-2 yasyāstyaktasukhaspṛhaṃ kila vapuḥ pīnālpalambastanī sakṣīrā viṭaceṭakaikamahiṣī raṇḍā śivāyāstu vaḥ //
analyzed: yasyāḥ tyakta sukha spṛham kila vapuḥ pīna alpa lamba stanī sa kṣīrā viṭa ceṭaka eka mahiṣī raṇḍā śivāyāḥ astu vaḥ

original: MSS_7345-1 ṛjvī sthirā suvṛttā pāṇigrahaṇojjvalā suvaṃśotthā /
analyzed: ṛjvī sthirā su vṛttā pāṇigrahaṇa ujjvalā su vaṃśa utthā

original: MSS_7345-2 saṃdhārayati patantaṃ saṃprati gṛhaṇīva yaṣṭirmām //
analyzed: saṃdhārayati patantam saṃprati gṛhaṇī iva yaṣṭiḥ mām

original: MSS_7346-1 ṛṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tvadattaṃ ced bādhate'tra paratra ca /
analyzed: ṛṇam kṛtam tu adattam ced bādhate itra paratra ca

original: MSS_7346-2 na naśyed duṣkṛtaṃ tadvad bhuktiṃ vā niṣkṛtiṃ vinā //
analyzed: na naśyet duṣkṛtam tadvat bhuktim vā niṣkṛtim vinā

original: MSS_7347-1 ṛṇaṃ mitrānna kartavyaṃ na deyaṃ cāpi mitrake /
analyzed: ṛṇam mitrāt na kartavyam na deyam ca api mitrake

original: MSS_7347-2 prīticchedakarī jñeyā yasmād vai ṛṇakartarī //
analyzed: prīti cheda karī jñeyā yasmāt vai ṛṇa kartarī

original: MSS_7348-1 ṛṇaṃ yācñā ca vṛddhatvaṃ jāracoradaridratāḥ /
analyzed: ṛṇam yācñā ca vṛddha tvam jāra cora daridra tāḥ

original: MSS_7348-2 rogaśca bhuktaśeṣaścāpy aṣṭa kaṣṭāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: rogaḥ ca bhukta śeṣaḥ ca api aṣṭa kaṣṭāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: MSS_7349-1 ṛṇakartā pitā śatrur mātā ca vyabhicāriṇī /
analyzed: ṛṇa kartā pitā śatruḥ mātā ca vyabhicāriṇī

original: MSS_7349-2 bhāryā rūpavatī śatruḥ putraḥ śatrurapaṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: bhāryā rūpavatī śatruḥ putraḥ śatruḥ apaṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_7350-1 ṛṇatrayaṃ dvijātīnāṃ janmanaḥ prabhṛti sthitam /
analyzed: ṛṇa trayam dvijātīnām janmanaḥ prabhṛti sthitam

original: MSS_7350-2 ṛṇāntarabhṛtāṃ puṃsāṃ jīvanaṃ jīvanaṃ vinā //
analyzed: ṛṇa antara bhṛtām puṃsām jīvanam jīvanam vinā

original: MSS_7351-1 ṛṇatrayaṃ nirākāri nūtnaṃ cākāri yena no /
analyzed: ṛṇa trayam nirākāri nūtnam ca akāri yena no

original: MSS_7351-2 sa ekaḥ sukṛtī lokaḥ sarvatra sukhamedhate //
analyzed: saḥ ekaḥ sukṛtī lokaḥ sarvatra sukham edhate

original: MSS_7352-1 ṛṇatrayamapākartuṃ śāstrājñābhaṅgabhīḥ puraḥ /
analyzed: ṛṇa trayam apākartum śāstra ājñā bhaṅga bhīḥ puras

original: MSS_7352-2 caturtharṇanirākāre pratyakṣaṃ nṛpaterbhayam //
analyzed: caturtha ṛṇa nirākāre pratyakṣam nṛpateḥ bhayam

original: MSS_7353-1 ṛṇadātā ca daivajñaḥ śrotriyaḥ sujalā nadī /
analyzed: ṛṇa dātā ca daivajñaḥ śrotriyaḥ su jalā nadī

original: MSS_7353-2 yatra hyete na vidyante na tatra divasaṃ vaset //
analyzed: yatra hi ete na vidyante na tatra divasam vaset

original: MSS_7354-1 ṛṇadaiḥ svajanaiḥ putrair labdhakṣāmapratigrahaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṇa daiḥ sva janaiḥ putraiḥ labdha kṣāma pratigrahaḥ

original: MSS_7354-2 nityamāyāsyate yena kalidānena tena kim //
analyzed: nityam āyāsyate yena kali dānena tena kim

original: MSS_7355-1 ṛṇapāpasamuddhārād ṛṇoddhāro varaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṇa pāpa samuddhārāt ṛṇoddhāraḥ varaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_7355-2 paraloke dahet pāpam ṛṇāgniriha tatra ca //
analyzed: para loke dahet pāpam ṛṇa agniḥ iha tatra ca

original: MSS_7356-1 ṛṇapradātā vaidyastu śrotriyaḥ sajalā nadī /
analyzed: ṛṇa pradātā vaidyaḥ tu śrotriyaḥ sa jalā nadī

original: MSS_7356-2 rājā yatra na vidyante na kuryāt tatra saṃsthitim //
analyzed: rājā yatra na vidyante na kuryāt tatra saṃsthitim

original: MSS_7357-1 ṛṇamādyaṃ nirākṛtya nirākartumṛṇāntaram /
analyzed: ṛṇam ādyam nirākṛtya nirākartum ṛṇa antaram

original: MSS_7357-2 pratiṣṭhā rājate yasya gṛhasthāśrama eva saḥ //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā rājate yasya gṛhastha āśramaḥ eva saḥ

original: MSS_7358-1 ṛṇavac cirasaṃśodhyaṃ vacasā pratipāditam /
analyzed: ṛṇavat cira saṃśodhyam vacasā pratipāditam

original: MSS_7358-2 yan nityayācanadveṣaṃ yācyadānena tena kim //
analyzed: yat nitya yācana dveṣam yācya dānena tena kim

original: MSS_7359-1 ṛṇaśeṣaṃ rogaśeṣaṃ śatruśeṣaṃ na rakṣayet /
analyzed: ṛṇa śeṣam roga śeṣam śatru śeṣam na rakṣayet

original: MSS_7359-2 yācakādyaiḥ prārthitaḥ san na tīkṣṇaṃ cottaraṃ vadet /
analyzed: yācaka ādyaiḥ prārthitaḥ san na tīkṣṇam ca uttaram vadet

original: MSS_7359-3 tatkāryaṃ tu samarthaścet kuryād vā kārayīta ca //
analyzed: tat kāryam tu samarthaḥ ced kuryāt vā kārayīta ca

original: MSS_7360-1 ṛṇaśeṣo'gniśeṣaśca vyādhiśeṣas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: ṛṇa śeṣa ugni śeṣaḥ ca vyādhi śeṣaḥ tathā eva ca

original: MSS_7360-2 punaśca vardhate yasmāt tasmāccheṣaṃ ca kārayet //
analyzed: punar ca vardhate yasmāt tasmāt śeṣam ca kārayet

original: MSS_7361-1 ṛṇaśeṣo'gniśeṣaśca śatruśeṣas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: ṛṇa śeṣa ugni śeṣaḥ ca śatru śeṣaḥ tathā eva ca

original: MSS_7361-2 punaḥ punar vivardheta svalpo'pyanivāritaḥ //
analyzed: punar punar vivardheta su alpaḥ upi anivāritaḥ

original: MSS_7362-1 ṛṇasaṃbandhinaḥ sarve putradāraṃ paśustathā /
analyzed: ṛṇa saṃbandhinaḥ sarve putra dāram paśuḥ tathā

original: MSS_7362-2 ṛṇakṣaye kṣayaṃ yānti kā tatra paridevanā //
analyzed: ṛṇa kṣaye kṣayam yānti kā tatra paridevanā

original: MSS_7363-1 ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet /
analyzed: ṛṇāni trīṇi apākṛtya manaḥ mokṣe niveśayet

original: MSS_7363-2 anapākṛtya mokṣaṃ tu sevamāno vrajatyadhaḥ //
analyzed: an apākṛtya mokṣam tu sevamānaḥ vrajati adhas

original: MSS_7364-1 ṛṇānubandharūpeṇa paśupatnīsutālayāḥ /
analyzed: ṛṇa anubandha rūpeṇa paśu patnī suta ālayāḥ

original: MSS_7364-2 ṛṇakṣaye kṣayaṃ yānti kā tatra paridevanā //
analyzed: ṛṇa kṣaye kṣayam yānti kā tatra paridevanā

original: MSS_7365-1 ṛṇikaiḥ kalahairnityam acchinnagaṇanāgateḥ /
analyzed: ṛṇikaiḥ kalahaiḥ nityam acchinna gaṇanā gateḥ

original: MSS_7365-2 dānadviṣo'napatyasya mandāgneśca dhanena kim //
analyzed: dāna dviṣaḥ ūna apatyasya manda agneḥ ca dhanena kim

original: MSS_7366-1 ṛṇīkṛtā kiṃ hariṇībhirāsīd asyāḥ sakāśān nayanadvayaśrīḥ /
analyzed: ṛṇīkṛtā kim hariṇībhiḥ āsīt asyāḥ sakāśāt nayana dvaya śrīḥ

original: MSS_7366-2 bhūyoguṇeyaṃ sakalā balād yat tābhyo'nayālabhyata bibhyatībhyaḥ //
analyzed: bhūyas guṇā iyam sakalā balāt yat tābhyaḥ nayā ālabhyata bibhyatībhyaḥ

original: MSS_7367-1 ṛtumatyāṃ tu tiṣṭhantyāṃ svecchādānaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: ṛtumatyām tu tiṣṭhantyām sva icchā dānam vidhīyate

original: MSS_7367-2 tasmādudvāhayen nagnāṃ manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo'bravīt //
analyzed: tasmāt udvāhayet nagnām manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvaḥ bravīt

original: MSS_7368-1 ṛturmāsadvayenaiva ṣaṇmāsairayanaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: ṛtuḥ māsa dvayena eva ṣaṣ māsaiḥ ayanam smṛtam

original: MSS_7368-2 ayanadvitayaṃ varṣo devānāṃ vāsaro niśā //
analyzed: ayana dvitayam varṣaḥ devānām vāsaraḥ niśā

original: MSS_7369-1 ṛturvyatītaḥ parivartate punaḥ kṣayaṃ prayātaḥ punareti candramāḥ /
analyzed: ṛtuḥ vyatītaḥ parivartate punar kṣayam prayātaḥ punar eti candramāḥ

original: MSS_7369-2 gataṃ gataṃ naiva tu saṃnivartate jalaṃ nadīnāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ ca yauvanam //
analyzed: gatam gatam nā eva tu saṃnivartate jalam nadīnām ca nṛṇām ca yauvanam

original: MSS_7370-1 ṛtusnātāṃ tu yo bhāryāṃ naiva gacchati mūḍhadhīḥ /
analyzed: ṛtusnātām tu yaḥ bhāryām na eva gacchati mūḍha dhīḥ

original: MSS_7370-2 ghorāyāṃ bhrūṇahatyāyāṃ yujyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: ghorāyām bhrūṇahatyāyām yujyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_7371-1 ṛtusnātā piben nārī śvetakaṇṭārikājaṭām /
analyzed: ṛtusnātā pibet nārī śveta kaṇṭārikā jaṭām

original: MSS_7371-2 payasā putrasaṃbhūtis tasyāḥ saṃjāyate dhruvam //
analyzed: payasā putra saṃbhūtiḥ tasyāḥ saṃjāyate dhruvam

original: MSS_7372-1 ṛtena jīvedanṛtena jīven mitena jīvet pramitena jīvet /
analyzed: ṛtena jīvet anṛtena jīvet mitena jīvet pramitena jīvet

original: MSS_7372-2 satyānṛtābhyāmathavāpi jīvet śvavṛttimekāṃ parivarjayet tu //
analyzed: satya anṛtābhyām athavā api jīvet śvavṛttim ekām parivarjayet tu

original: MSS_7373-1 ṛte niyogāt sāmarthyam avaboddhuṃ na śakyate /
analyzed: ṛte niyogāt sāmarthyam avaboddhum na śakyate

original: MSS_7373-2 sahasā viniyogo hi doṣavān pratibhāti me //
analyzed: sahasā viniyogaḥ hi doṣavān pratibhāti me

original: MSS_7374-1 ṛte yadarthaṃ praṇayād rakṣyate yacca rakṣati /
analyzed: ṛte yad artham praṇayāt rakṣyate yat ca rakṣati

original: MSS_7374-2 pūrvopacitasaṃbandhaṃ tan mitraṃ nityamucyate //
analyzed: pūrva upacita saṃbandham tat mitram nityam ucyate

original: MSS_7375-1 ṛte senāpraṇetāraṃ pṛtanā sumahatyapi /
analyzed: ṛte senā praṇetāram pṛtanā su mahatī api

original: MSS_7375-2 dīryate yuddhamāsādya pipīlikapuṭaṃ yathā //
analyzed: dīryate yuddham āsādya pipīlika puṭam yathā

original: MSS_7376-1 ṛtvikpurohitācāryāḥ śiṣyāḥ saṃbandhibāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: ṛtvij purohita ācāryāḥ śiṣyāḥ saṃbandhi bāndhavāḥ

original: MSS_7376-2 sarve pūjyāśca mānyāśca śrutavṛttopasaṃhitāḥ //
analyzed: sarve pūjyāḥ ca mānyāḥ ca śruta vṛtta upasaṃhitāḥ

original: MSS_7377-1 ṛddhimān rākṣaso mūḍhaś citram nāsau yaduddhataḥ /
analyzed: ṛddhimān rākṣasaḥ mūḍhaḥ citram na asau yat uddhataḥ

original: MSS_7377-2 ko vā heturanāryāṇāṃ dharmye vartmani vartitum //
analyzed: kaḥ vā hetuḥ anāryāṇām dharmye vartmani vartitum

original: MSS_7378-2 ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam //
analyzed: ṛddhi yuktāḥ hi puruṣāḥ na sahante para stavam

original: MSS_7379-1 ṛṣabho'tra gīyata iti śrutvā svarapāragā vayaṃ prāptāḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣabhaḥ utra gīyate iti śrutvā svara pāragāḥ vayam prāptāḥ

original: MSS_7379-2 ko veda goṣṭhametad gośāntau vihitabahumānam //
analyzed: kaḥ veda goṣṭham etat go śāntau vihita bahu mānam

original: MSS_7380-1 ṛṣayaścaiva devāśca satyameva hi menire /
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ca eva devāḥ ca satyam eva hi menire

original: MSS_7380-2 satyavādī hi loke'smin paramaṃ gacchati kṣayam //
analyzed: satya vādī hi loke ismin paramam gacchati kṣayam

original: MSS_7381-1 ṛṣayo'pyugratapaso daivenābhiprapīḍitāḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ api ugra tapasaḥ daivena abhiprapīḍitāḥ

original: MSS_7381-2 utsṛjya niyamāṃs tīvrān bhraśyante kāmamanyubhiḥ //
analyzed: utsṛjya niyamān tīvrān bhraśyante kāma manyubhiḥ

original: MSS_7382-1 ṛṣayo manavo devā manuputrā mahaujasaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ manavaḥ devāḥ manu putrāḥ mahā ojasaḥ

original: MSS_7382-2 kalāḥ sarve harereva saprajāpatayas tathā //
analyzed: kalāḥ sarve hareḥ eva sa prajāpatayaḥ tathā

original: MSS_7383-1 ṛṣayo rākṣasīmāhur vācamunmattadṛptayoḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ rākṣasīm āhuḥ vācam unmatta dṛptayoḥ

original: MSS_7383-2 sā yoniḥ sarvavairāṇāṃ sā hi lokasya nirṛtiḥ //
analyzed: sā yoniḥ sarva vairāṇām sā hi lokasya nirṛtiḥ

original: MSS_7384-1 ṛṣirayamatithiśced viṣṭaraḥ pādyamarghyaṃ tadanu ca madhuparkaḥ kalpyatāṃ śrotriyāya /
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ ayam atithiḥ ced viṣṭaraḥ pādyam arghyam tadanu ca madhuparkaḥ kalpyatām śrotriyāya

original: MSS_7384-2 atha tu ripurakasmād dveṣṭi naḥ putrabhāṇḍaṃ tadiha nayavihīne kārmukasyādhikāraḥ //
analyzed: atha tu ripuḥ akasmāt dveṣṭi naḥ putra bhāṇḍam tat iha naya vihīne kārmukasya adhikāraḥ

original: MSS_7385-1 ṛṣisenā vinā vedam apriyā sahagāminī /
analyzed: ṛṣi senā vinā vedam apriyā sahagāminī

original: MSS_7385-2 devasenā vinā dāt n aviṣṇuḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ //
analyzed: deva senā vinā dāt n aviṣṇuḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: MSS_7386-1 ṛṣīṃśca devāṃśca mahāsurāṃśca traividyavṛddhāṃśca vane munīṃśca /
analyzed: ṛṣīn ca devān ca mahā asurān ca traividya vṛddhān ca vane munīn ca

original: MSS_7386-2 kānāpado nopanamanti loke parāvarajñāstu na saṃbhramanti //
analyzed: kānāpadaḥ nā upanamanti loke parāvara jñāḥ tu na saṃbhramanti

original: MSS_7387-1 ṛṣīṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca kulānāṃ ca mahātmanām /
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām ca nadīnām ca kulānām ca mahātmanām

original: MSS_7387-2 prabhavo nādhigantavyaḥ strīṇāṃ duścaritasya ca //
analyzed: prabhavaḥ na adhigantavyaḥ strīṇām duścaritasya ca

original: MSS_7388-1 ṛṣīṇāṃ paramaṃ guhyam idaṃ bharatasattama /
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām paramam guhyam idam bharata sattama

original: MSS_7388-2 tīrthābhigamanaṃ puṇyaṃ yajñairapi viśiṣyate //
analyzed: tīrtha abhigamanam puṇyam yajñaiḥ api viśiṣyate

original: MSS_7389-1 ṛṣerasyāśrame puṇye śāpasaṃtrastamānasaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ asya āśrame puṇye śāpa saṃtrasta mānasaḥ

original: MSS_7389-2 mudbodhato'pi prāyo'yaṃ mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyate //
analyzed: prāyas yam mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyate

original: MSS_7390-1 ekaṃ kāñcanabhūdharaṃ suvalayaṃ vāsaḥ sudhāvāridhiṃ tāraṃ tārakarājamaṇḍalamidaṃ saṃprāpya satkuṇḍalam /
analyzed: ekam kāñcana bhūdharam su valayam vāsaḥ sudhā vāridhim tāram tāraka rāja maṇḍalam idam saṃprāpya sat kuṇḍalam

original: MSS_7390-2 dūrasthāpi ca tena tena sadṛśaṃ tvāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ cāparaṃ strī mānagrahileva yācatitarāṃ śrīrāma kīrtistava //
analyzed: dūra sthā api ca tena tena sadṛśam tvām bhūṣaṇam ca aparam strī māna grahilā iva yācatitarām śrī rāma kīrtiḥ tava

original: MSS_7391-1 ekaṃ cakṣurviveko hi dvitīyaṃ satsamāgamaḥ /
analyzed: ekam cakṣuḥ vivekaḥ hi dvitīyam sat samāgamaḥ

original: MSS_7391-2 tau na sto yasya sa kṣipraṃ mohakūpe pated dhruvam //
analyzed: tau na staḥ yasya sa kṣipram moha kūpe patet dhruvam

original: MSS_7392-1 ekaṃ citramatīva dṛṣṭamiha yannālokitaṃ na śrutaṃ kiṃ kasmai kathayāmi kasya manasi syād vā mama pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: ekam citram atīva dṛṣṭam iha yat na ālokitam na śrutam kim kasmai kathayāmi kasya manasi syāt vā mama pratyayaḥ

original: MSS_7392-2 ekasmin kanakasya dāmni sarasīmailindamattadvipa- jyotsnācandracakoracakracamarīvālāś camatkurvate //
analyzed: ekasmin kanakasya dāmni sarasī mailinda matta dvipa jyotsnā candra cakora cakra camarī vālāḥ camatkurvate

original: MSS_7393-1 ekaṃ jīvanamūlaṃ cañcalamapi tāpayantamapi satatam /
analyzed: ekam jīvana mūlam cañcalam api tāpayantam api satatam

original: MSS_7393-2 antarvahati varākī sā tvāṃ nāseva niḥśvāsam //
analyzed: antar vahati varākī sā tvām nāsā iva niḥśvāsam

original: MSS_7394-1 ekaṃ dantacchadasya sphurati japavaśādardhamanyat prakopād ekaḥ pāṇiḥ praṇantuṃ śirasi kṛtapadaḥ kṣeptumanyas tameva /
analyzed: ekam dantacchadasya sphurati japa vaśāt ardham anyat prakopāt ekaḥ pāṇiḥ praṇantum śirasi kṛta padaḥ kṣeptum anyaḥ tam eva

original: MSS_7394-2 ekaṃ dhyānānnimīlatyaparamaviṣahaṃ vīkṣituṃ cakṣuritthaṃ tulyānicchāpi vāmā tanuravatu sa vo yasya saṃdhyāvasāne //
analyzed: ekam dhyānāt nimīlati aparam aviṣaham vīkṣitum cakṣuḥ ittham tulya anicchā api vāmā tanuḥ avatu sa vaḥ yasya saṃdhyā avasāne

original: MSS_7395-1 ekaṃ dṛṣṭvā śataṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā pañcaśatānyapi /
analyzed: ekam dṛṣṭvā śatam dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā pañca śatāni api

original: MSS_7395-2 atilobho na kartavyaś cakraṃ bhramati mastake //
analyzed: ati lobhaḥ na kartavyaḥ cakram bhramati mastake

original: MSS_7395A-1 ekaṃ dvijaṃ ca spṛhaṇīyavācaṃ mattadvirephaṃ ca madhuḥ pupoṣa /
analyzed: ekam dvijam ca spṛhaṇīya vācam matta dvirepham ca madhuḥ pupoṣa

original: MSS_7395A-2 sato guṇānapyasato'pi doṣān jātyā vihīno na vivektumīṣṭe //
analyzed: sataḥ guṇān api asataḥ api doṣān jātyā vihīnaḥ na vivektum īṣṭe

original: MSS_7396-1 ekaṃ dhāma śamīṣu līnamaparaṃ sūryopalajyotiṣāṃ vyājādadriṣu gūḍhamanyadudadhau saṃguptamaurvāyate /
analyzed: ekam dhāma śamīṣu līnam aparam sūrya upala jyotiṣām vyājāt adriṣu gūḍham anyat udadhau saṃgupta maurvāyate

original: MSS_7396-2 tvattejastapanāṃśumāṃsalasamuttāpena durgaṃ bhayād vārkṣaṃ pārvatamaudakaṃ yadi yayustejāṃsi kiṃ pārthivāḥ //
analyzed: tvad tejaḥ tapana aṃśu māṃsala samuttāpena durgam bhayāt vārkṣam pārvatam audakam yadi yayuḥ tejāṃsi kim pārthivāḥ

original: MSS_7397-1 ekaṃ dhyānanimīlanānmukulitaprāyaṃ dvitīyaṃ punaḥ pārvatyā vadanāmbujastanabhare śṛṅgārabhāvālasam /
analyzed: ekam dhyāna nimīlanāt mukulita prāyam dvitīyam punar pārvatyāḥ vadana ambuja stana bhare śṛṅgāra bhāva alasam

original: MSS_7397-2 anyad dūravikṛṣṭacāpamadanakrodhānaloddīpitaṃ śaṃbhorbhinnarasaṃ samādhisamaye netratrayaṃ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: anyat dūra vikṛṣṭa cāpa madana krodha anala uddīpitam śaṃbhoḥ bhinna rasam samādhi samaye netra trayam pātu vaḥ

original: MSS_7398-1 ekaṃ nāma jaḍātmakasya muṣitaṃ lāvaṇyamindos tayā netrābhyāmasitotpalasya ca ruciḥ prāyeṇa tanno mṛṣā /
analyzed: ekam nāma jaḍa ātmakasya muṣitam lāvaṇyam indoḥ tayā netrābhyām asita utpalasya ca ruciḥ prāyeṇa tat naḥ mṛṣā

original: MSS_7398-2 no jānāti hṛtāmasau padagatiṃ matto varākaḥ karī tanvaṅgyā vidato'pi yanmama hṛtaṃ cetas tadatyadbhutam //
analyzed: no jānāti hṛtām asau pada gatim mattaḥ varākaḥ karī tanvaṅgyā vidataḥ upi yat mama hṛtam cetaḥ tat ati adbhutam

original: MSS_7399-1 ekaṃ bhūmipatiḥ karoti sacivaṃ rājye pramāṇaṃ yadā taṃ mohāc śrayate madaḥ sa ca madālasyena nirvidyate /
analyzed: ekam bhūmipatiḥ karoti sacivam rājye pramāṇam yadā tam mohāt śrayate madaḥ sa ca mada ālasyena nirvidyate

original: MSS_7399-2 nirviṇṇasya padaṃ karoti hṛdaye tasya svatantraspṛhā svātantryaspṛhayā tataḥ sa nṛpateḥ prāṇānabhidruhyati //
analyzed: nirviṇṇasya padam karoti hṛdaye tasya svatantra spṛhā svātantrya spṛhayā tatas sa nṛpateḥ prāṇān abhidruhyati

original: MSS_7400-1 ekaṃ mahiṣaśiraḥsthitam aparaṃ sānandasuragaṇapraṇatam /
analyzed: ekam mahiṣa śiraḥ sthitam aparam sa ānanda sura gaṇa praṇatam

original: MSS_7400-2 giriduhituḥ padayugalaṃ śoṇitamaṇirāgarañjitaṃ jayati //
analyzed: giriduhituḥ pada yugalam śoṇitamaṇi rāga rañjitam jayati

original: MSS_7401-1 ekaṃ mitraṃ bhajate māsenenduḥ svayaṃ kṣayaṃ gacchan /
analyzed: ekam mitram bhajate māsena induḥ svayam kṣayam gacchan

original: MSS_7401-2 mitraśatāni bhajaṃstvaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ vṛddhimupayāsi //
analyzed: mitra śatāni bhajan tvam pratikṣaṇam vṛddhim upayāsi

original: MSS_7402-1 ekaṃ mitraṃ bhūpatirvā yatirvā ekā bhāryā sundarī vā darī vā /
analyzed: ekam mitram bhūpatiḥ vā yatiḥ vai ekā bhāryā sundarī vā darī vā

original: MSS_7402-2 ekaṃ śāstraṃ vedamadhyātmakaṃ vā eko devaḥ keśavo vā jino vā //
analyzed: ekam śāstram vedam adhyātmakam vā ekaḥ devaḥ keśavaḥ vā jinaḥ vā

original: MSS_7403-1 ekaṃ liṅgaṃ pramadā- hṛdayaṃ vidadhāti jarjaraṃ sahasā /
analyzed: ekam liṅgam pramadā hṛdayam vidadhāti jarjaram sahasā

original: MSS_7403-2 teṣāṃ ṣaṭkaṃ yeṣāṃ antargūḍhaṃ na te kathaṃ paśavaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām ṣaṭkam yeṣām antar gūḍham na te katham paśavaḥ

original: MSS_7404-1 ekaṃ vadati mano mama yāmi na yāmīti hṛdayamaparaṃ me /
analyzed: ekam vadati manaḥ mama yāmi na yāmi iti hṛdayam aparam me

original: MSS_7404-2 hṛdayadvayamucitaṃ tava sundari hṛtakāntacittāyāḥ //
analyzed: hṛdaya dvayam ucitam tava sundari hṛta kānta cittāyāḥ

original: MSS_7405-1 ekaṃ vastu dvidhā kartuṃ bahavaḥ santi dhanvinaḥ /
analyzed: ekam vastu dvidhā kartum bahavaḥ santi dhanvinaḥ

original: MSS_7405-2 dhanvī sa māra evaiko dvayoraikyaṃ karoti yaḥ //
analyzed: dhanvī sa māraḥ evā ekaḥ dvayoḥ aikyam karoti yaḥ

original: MSS_7406-1 ekaṃ vastu yadasti viśvajanatānandapramodātmakaṃ satyaṃ tattvamasīti vākyamakhilaṃ tvayyeva viśrāmyati /
analyzed: ekam vastu yat asti viśva janatā ānanda pramoda ātmakam satyam tat tvam asi iti vākyam akhilam tvayi eva viśrāmyati

original: MSS_7406-2 tvāmākarṇya na kiṃcidanyadavanīśṛṅgāra bho manyate tvayyāpte janakādikīrtijanake kiṃ jñānamīmāṃsayā //
analyzed: tvām ākarṇya na kiṃcid anyat avanī śṛṅgāra bho manyate tvayi āpte janaka ādi kīrti janake kim jñāna mīmāṃsayā

original: MSS_7407-1 ekaṃ vā kupitapriyāpraṇayinīṃ kṛtvā manonirvṛtiṃ tiṣṭhāmo nijacārupīvarakucakrīḍārasāsvādane /
analyzed: ekam vā kupita priya a praṇayinīm kṛtvā manaḥ nirvṛtim tiṣṭhāmaḥ nija cāru pīvara kuca krīḍā rasa āsvādane

original: MSS_7407-2 anyad vā surasindhusaikatataṭīdarbhāṣṭakasrastara- sthāne brahmapadaṃ samāhitadhiyo dhyāyanta evāsmahe //
analyzed: anyat vā sthāne brahma padam samāhita dhiyaḥ dhyāyantaḥ eva āsmahe

original: MSS_7408-1 ekaṃ viṣaraso hanti śastreṇaikaśca vadhyate /
analyzed: ekam viṣa rasaḥ hanti śastreṇa ekaḥ ca vadhyate

original: MSS_7408-2 sarāṣṭraṃ saprajaṃ hanti rājānaṃ mantravisravaḥ //
analyzed: sa rāṣṭram sa prajam hanti rājānam mantra visravaḥ

original: MSS_7409-1 ekaṃ vai sevate nityam anyaṃ cetasi rocate /
analyzed: ekam vai sevate nityam anyam cetasi rocate

original: MSS_7409-2 puruṣāṇāmalābhena nārī caiva pativratā //
analyzed: puruṣāṇām alābhena nārī ca eva pativratā

original: MSS_7410-1 ekaṃ saṃdigdhayostāvad bhāvi tatreṣṭajanmani /
analyzed: ekam saṃdigdhayoḥ tāvat bhāvi tatra iṣṭa janmani

original: MSS_7410-2 hetumāhuḥ svamantrādīn asaṅgānanyathā viṭāḥ //
analyzed: hetum āhuḥ sva mantra ādīn asaṅgān anyathā viṭāḥ

original: MSS_7411-1 ekaṃ sāgaratīranīranikarasphārāñjalikṣālitaiḥ puṣpairacyutapūjanaṃ nijakaravyāpārasaṃpāditaiḥ /
analyzed: ekam sāgara tīra nīra nikara sphāra añjali kṣālitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ acyuta pūjanam nija kara vyāpāra saṃpāditaiḥ

original: MSS_7411-2 no cen mañjulamālatīdalalasatkhaṭvārcite mandire kāntātuṅganitambabimbasuratakrīḍārasaiḥ sthīyate //
analyzed: no ced mañjula mālatī dala lasat khaṭvā arcite mandire kāntā tuṅga nitamba bimba surata krīḍā rasaiḥ sthīyate

original: MSS_7412-1 ekaṃ sute mṛgāriṇī bahūn sūte vṛkī sutān /
analyzed: ekam sute mṛgāriṇī bahūn sūte vṛkī sutān

original: MSS_7412-2 uttāraḥ pralayaṃ yānti nādyamānāḥ kathaṃcana //
analyzed: uttāraḥ pralayam yānti na adyamānāḥ kathaṃcana

original: MSS_7413-1 ekaṃ hanyān na vā hanyād iṣuḥ kṣipto dhanuṣmatā /
analyzed: ekam hanyāt na vā hanyāt iṣuḥ kṣiptaḥ dhanuṣmatā

original: MSS_7413-2 prājñena tu matiḥ kṣiptā hanyād garbhagatānapi //
analyzed: prājñena tu matiḥ kṣiptā hanyāt garbha gatān api

original: MSS_7414-1 ekaṃ hanyān na vā hanyād iṣurmukto dhanuṣmatā /
analyzed: ekam hanyāt na vā hanyāt iṣuḥ muktaḥ dhanuṣmatā

original: MSS_7414-2 buddhirbuddhimatotsṛṣṭā hanyād rāṣṭraṃ sarājakam //
analyzed: buddhiḥ buddhimatā utsṛṣṭā hanyāt rāṣṭram sa rājakam

original: MSS_7415-1 ekaṃ hanyān na vā hanyād iṣurmukto dhanuṣmatā /
analyzed: ekam hanyāt na vā hanyāt iṣuḥ muktaḥ dhanuṣmatā

original: MSS_7415-2 sarāṣṭraṃ saprajaṃ hanti rājānaṃ mantriniścayaḥ //
analyzed: sa rāṣṭram sa prajam hanti rājānam mantri niścayaḥ

original: MSS_7416-1 ekaṃ hi cakṣuramalaṃ sahajo viveko vidvadbhireva saha saṃvasatirdvitīyam /
analyzed: ekam hi cakṣuḥ amalam sahajaḥ vivekaḥ vidvadbhiḥ eva saha saṃvasatiḥ dvitīyam

original: MSS_7416-2 etad dvayaṃ bhuvi na yasya sa tattvato'ndhas tasyāpamārgacalane vada ko'parādhaḥ //
analyzed: etat dvayam bhuvi na yasya sa tattvatā undhaḥ tasya apamārga calane vada kā uparādhaḥ

original: MSS_7417-1 ekaḥ karṇamahīpatiḥ pratidinaṃ lakṣādhikā yācakāḥ kasmai kiṃ vitariṣyatīti manasā cintāṃ vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ karṇa mahīpatiḥ pratidinam lakṣa adhikāḥ yācakāḥ kasmai kim vitariṣyati iti manasā cintām vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ

original: MSS_7417-2 āste kiṃ pratiyācakaṃ surataruḥ pratyambujaṃ kiṃ raviś candraḥ kiṃ pratikairavaṃ pratilatāgulmaṃ kimambhodharaḥ //
analyzed: āste kim pratiyācakam surataruḥ prati ambujam kim raviḥ candraḥ kim prati kairavam prati latā gulmam kim ambhodharaḥ

original: MSS_7418-1 ekaḥ kāpuruṣo dīrṇo dārayen mahatīṃ camūm /
analyzed: ekaḥ kāpuruṣaḥ dīrṇaḥ dārayet mahatīm camūm

original: MSS_7418-2 taṃ dīrṇamanu dīryante yodhāḥ śūratamā api //
analyzed: tam dīrṇam anu dīryante yodhāḥ śūratamāḥ api

original: MSS_7419-1 ekaḥ ko'pi mahīdharo laghutaro dorbhyāṃ dhṛto līlayā tena tvaṃ divi bhūtale ca vidito govarddhanoddhārakaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ kaḥ api mahīdharaḥ laghutaraḥ dorbhyām dhṛtaḥ līlayā tena tvam divi bhū tale ca viditaḥ govarddhana uddhārakaḥ

original: MSS_7419-2 tvāṃ trailokyavahaṃ vahāmi kucayoragre sadā puṣpavat tat kiṃ keśava jalpitena bahunā puṇyairyaśo labhyate //
analyzed: tvām trailokya vaham vahāmi kucayoḥ agre sadā puṣpa vat tat kim keśava jalpitena bahunā puṇyaiḥ yaśaḥ labhyate

original: MSS_7420-1 ekaḥ kṣamāvataṃ doṣo dvitīyo nopalabhyate /
analyzed: ekaḥ doṣaḥ dvitīyaḥ nā upalabhyate

original: MSS_7420-2 yadenaṃ kṣamayā yuktam aśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ //
analyzed: yat enam kṣamayā yuktam aśaktam manyate janaḥ

original: MSS_7421-1 so'sya doṣo na mantavyaḥ kṣamā hi paramaṃ balam /
analyzed: saḥ usya doṣaḥ na mantavyaḥ kṣamā hi paramam balam

original: MSS_7421-2 kṣamā guṇo hyaśaktānāṃ śaktānāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ kṣamā //
analyzed: kṣamā guṇaḥ hi aśaktānām śaktānām bhūṣaṇam kṣamā

original: MSS_7422-1 ekaḥ khalo'pi yadi nāma bhavet sabhāyāṃ vyarthīkaroti viduṣāmakhilaṃ prayāsam /
analyzed: ekaḥ khalaḥ api yadi nāma bhavet sabhāyām vyarthīkaroti viduṣām akhilam prayāsam

original: MSS_7422-2 ekāpi pūrṇamudaraṃ madhuraiḥ padārthair āloḍya recayati hanta na makṣikā kim //
analyzed: ekā api pūrṇam udaram madhuraiḥ padārthaiḥ āloḍya recayati hanta na makṣikā kim

original: MSS_7423-1 ekaḥ pañcatvamāsādya jāyate punaraṣṭadhā /
analyzed: ekaḥ pañcatvam āsādya jāyate punar aṣṭadhā

original: MSS_7423-2 aho vāṇijyasaṃpattiḥ kāśīpuranivāsinām //
analyzed: aho vāṇijya saṃpattiḥ kāśīpura nivāsinām

original: MSS_7424-1 ekaḥ pathā na gantavyaṃ na suptiṃ bāhyamandire /
analyzed: ekaḥ pathā na gantavyam na suptim bāhya mandire

original: MSS_7424-2 janavākyaṃ na kartavyaṃ strīṇāmālocanaṃ vinā //
analyzed: jana vākyam na kartavyam strīṇām ālocanam vinā

original: MSS_7425-1 ekaḥ pāpāni kurute phalaṃ bhuṅkte mahājanaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ pāpāni kurute phalam bhuṅkte mahājanaḥ

original: MSS_7425-2 bhoktāro vipramucyante kartā doṣeṇa lipyate //
analyzed: bhoktāraḥ vipramucyante kartā doṣeṇa lipyate

original: MSS_7426-1 ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam /
analyzed: ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam

original: MSS_7426-2 majjatyeko hi niraya ekaḥ svarge mahīyate //
analyzed: majjati ekaḥ hi niraye ekaḥ svarge mahīyate

original: MSS_7427-1 ekaḥ putro varaṃ vidvān bahubhirnirguṇaistu kim /
analyzed: ekaḥ putraḥ varam vidvān bahubhiḥ nirguṇaiḥ tu kim

original: MSS_7427-2 ekastārayate vaṃśam anye saṃtāpakārakāḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ tārayate vaṃśam anye saṃtāpa kārakāḥ

original: MSS_7428-1 ekaḥ prajāyate jantur eka eva pralīyate /
analyzed: ekaḥ prajāyate jantuḥ ekaḥ eva pralīyate

original: MSS_7428-2 eko'nubhuṅkte sukṛtam eka eva ca duṣkṛtam //
analyzed: ekaḥ anubhuṅkte sukṛtam ekaḥ eva ca duṣkṛtam

original: MSS_7429-1 ekaḥ prayātyuparamaṃ draviṇaṃ tadīyaṃ hṛtvāparaḥ prasabhamudvahati pramodam /
analyzed: ekaḥ prayāti uparamam draviṇam tadīyam hṛtvā aparaḥ prasabham udvahati pramodam

original: MSS_7429-2 no vetti tat svanidhane parakośagāmi dhig vāsanāmasamamohakṛtāndhakārām //
analyzed: no vetti tat sva nidhane para kośa gāmi dhik vāsanām asama moha kṛta andhakārām

original: MSS_7430-1 ekaḥ śataṃ yodhayati prākārastho dhanurdharaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ śatam yodhayati prākāra sthaḥ dhanurdharaḥ

original: MSS_7430-2 śataṃ daśasahasrāṇi tasmād durgaṃ vidhīyate //
analyzed: śatam daśa sahasrāṇi tasmāt durgam vidhīyate

original: MSS_7431-1 ekaḥ śatrurna dvitīyo'sti śatrur ajñānatulyaḥ puruṣasya rājan /
analyzed: ekaḥ śatruḥ na dvitīyaḥ asti śatruḥ ajñāna tulyaḥ puruṣasya rājan

original: MSS_7431-2 yenāvṛtaḥ kurute saṃprayukto ghorāṇi karmāṇi sudāruṇāni //
analyzed: yena āvṛtaḥ kurute saṃprayuktaḥ ghorāṇi karmāṇi su dāruṇāni

original: MSS_7432-1 ekaḥ saṃgrāmariṅgatturagakhurarajorājibhirnaṣṭadṛṣṭir digyātrājaitramattadviradabharanamadbhūmibhagnas tathānyaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ saṃgrāma riṅgat turaga khura rajaḥ rājibhiḥ naṣṭa dṛṣṭiḥ digyātrā jaitra matta dvirada bhara namat bhūmi bhagnaḥ tathā anyaḥ

original: MSS_7432-2 vīrāḥ ke nāma tasmāt trijagati na yayuḥ kṣīṇatāṃ kāṇakubja- nyāyādetena muktāvabhayamabhajatāṃ vāsavo vāsukiśca //
analyzed: vīrāḥ ke nāma tasmāt trijagati na yayuḥ kṣīṇa tām kāṇa kubja nyāyāt etena muktau abhayam abhajatām vāsavaḥ vāsukiḥ ca

original: MSS_7433-1 ekaḥ saṃpannamaśnāti vaste vāsaśca śobhanam /
analyzed: ekaḥ saṃpannam aśnāti vaste vāsaḥ ca śobhanam

original: MSS_7433-2 yo'saṃvibhajya bhṛtyebhyaḥ ko nṛśaṃsataras tataḥ //
analyzed: bhṛtyebhyaḥ kaḥ nṛśaṃsataraḥ tatas

original: MSS_7434-1 ekaḥ saṃprati pākaśāsanapurīpīyūṣasattrī puraḥ pārakyaṃ tamasāmasau kumudinīcaitanyacintāmaṇiḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ saṃprati pākaśāsana purī pīyūṣa sattrī puras pārakyam tamasām asau kumudinīcaitanya cintāmaṇiḥ

original: MSS_7434-2 mānoccāṭanakārmaṇaṃ mṛgadṛśāṃ devo nabho'mbhonidhau paśyodañcati pañcabāṇavaṇijo yātrāvahitraṃ śaśī //
analyzed: māna uccāṭana kārmaṇam mṛga dṛśām devaḥ nabha umbhonidhau paśya udañcati pañcabāṇa vaṇijaḥ yātrā vahitram śaśī

original: MSS_7435-1 ekaḥ sa eva jīvati svahṛdayaśūnyo'pi sahṛdayo rāhuḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ saḥ eva jīvati sva hṛdaya śūnyaḥ api sahṛdayaḥ rāhuḥ

original: MSS_7435-2 yaḥ sakalalaghimakāraṇam udaraṃ na bibharti duṣpūram //
analyzed: yaḥ sakala laghima kāraṇam udaram na bibharti duṣpūram

original: MSS_7436-1 ekaḥ sa eva tejasvī saihikeyaḥ suradviṣām /
analyzed: ekaḥ saḥ eva tejasvī sa aihikeyaḥ suradviṣām

original: MSS_7436-2 śiromātrāvaśeṣeṇa jīyante yena śatravaḥ //
analyzed: śiraḥ mātra avaśeṣeṇa jīyante yena śatravaḥ

original: MSS_7437-1 ekaḥ sa eva paripālayatājjaganti gaurīgirīśacaritānukṛtiṃ dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ saḥ eva paripālayatāt jaganti gaurī girīśa carita anukṛtim dadhānaḥ

original: MSS_7437-2 ābhāti yo daśanaśūnyamukhaikadeśa- dehārdhahāritavadhūka ivaikadantaḥ //
analyzed: ābhāti yaḥ daśana śūnya mukha eka deśa deha ardha hārita vadhūkaḥ iva eka dantaḥ

original: MSS_7438-1 ekaḥ sakalajanānāṃ hṛdayeṣu kṛtāspado madaḥ śatruḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ sakala janānām hṛdayeṣu kṛta āspadaḥ madaḥ śatruḥ

original: MSS_7438-2 yenāviṣṭaśarīro na śṛṇoti na paśyati stabdhaḥ //
analyzed: yena āviṣṭa śarīraḥ na śṛṇoti na paśyati stabdhaḥ

original: MSS_7439-1 ekaḥ sakhā priyo bhūya upakārī guṇānvitaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ sakhā priyaḥ bhūyas upakārī guṇa anvitaḥ

original: MSS_7439-2 hantavyaḥ strīnimittena kaṣṭamāpatitaṃ mama //
analyzed: hantavyaḥ strī nimittena kaṣṭam āpatitam mama

original: MSS_7440-1 ekaḥ sa vyasanī pumānacaramairniḥśvāsavātaiḥ samaṃ hā me sā dayiteti yasya vadataḥ prāṇāḥ samaṃ nirgatāḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ sa vyasanī pumān acaramaiḥ niḥśvāsa vātaiḥ samam hā me sā dayitā iti yasya vadataḥ prāṇāḥ samam nirgatāḥ

original: MSS_7440-2 anye tu vyasanaṃ kṣipanti paśavaḥ kāntāviyogodbhavaiś cintāglāniviṣādadainyajanitairbāṣpairanāhāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: anye tu vyasanam kṣipanti paśavaḥ kāntā viyoga udbhavaiḥ cintā glāni viṣāda dainya janitaiḥ bāṣpaiḥ anāhāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_7441-1 ekaḥ sudhāṃśurna kathaṃcana syāt tṛptikṣamastvannayanadvayasya /
analyzed: ekaḥ sudhāṃśuḥ na kathaṃcana syāt tṛpti kṣamaḥ tvad nayana dvayasya

original: MSS_7441-2 tvallocanāsecanakastadastu nalāsyaśītadyutisadvitīyaḥ //
analyzed: tvad locana āsecanakaḥ tat astu nala āsya śītadyuti sa dvitīyaḥ

original: MSS_7442-1 ekaḥ stanastuṅgataraḥ parasya vārtāmiva praṣṭumagān mukhāgram /
analyzed: ekaḥ stanaḥ tuṅgataraḥ parasya vārtām iva praṣṭum agāt mukha agram

original: MSS_7442-2 yasyāḥ priyārdhasthitimudvahantyāḥ sā pātu vaḥ parvatarājaputrī //
analyzed: yasyāḥ priya ardha sthitim udvahantyāḥ sā pātu vaḥ parvatarāja putrī

original: MSS_7443-1 ekaḥ sthito'ntaḥ prāpto'nyaḥ parasyādyaiva durgrahaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ sthitaḥ antaḥ prāptaḥ anyaḥ parasya adya eva durgrahaḥ

original: MSS_7443-2 kiṃ karomīti jananīṃ pṛcchantīṣvaparāsu ca //
analyzed: kim karomi iti jananīm pṛcchantīṣu aparāsu ca

original: MSS_7444-1 ekaḥ svādu na bhuñjīta ekaścārthān na cintayet /
analyzed: ekaḥ svādu na bhuñjīta ekaḥ ca arthān na cintayet

original: MSS_7444-2 eko na gacchedadhvānaṃ naikaḥ supteṣu jāgṛyāt //
analyzed: ekaḥ na gacchet adhvānam na ekaḥ supteṣu jāgṛyāt

original: MSS_7445-1 eka eva khago mānī vane vasati cātakaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva khagaḥ mānī vane vasati cātakaḥ

original: MSS_7445-2 pipāsito vā mriyate yācate vā puraṃdaram //
analyzed: pipāsitaḥ vā mriyate yācate vā puraṃdaram

original: MSS_7446-1 eka eva khago mānī sukhaṃ jīvati cātakaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva khagaḥ mānī sukham jīvati cātakaḥ

original: MSS_7446-2 arthitvaṃ yāti śakrasya na nīcamupasarpati //
analyzed: arthi tvam yāti śakrasya na nīcam upasarpati

original: MSS_7447-1 eka eva cared dharmaṃ nāsti dharme sahāyatā /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva caret dharmam na asti dharme sahāya tā

original: MSS_7447-2 kevalaṃ vidhimāsādya sahāyaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati //
analyzed: kevalam vidhim āsādya sahāyaḥ kim kariṣyati

original: MSS_7448-1 eka eva dame doṣo dvitīyo nopapadyate /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva dame doṣaḥ dvitīyaḥ na upapadyate

original: MSS_7448-2 yadenaṃ kṣamayā yuktam aśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ //
analyzed: yat enam kṣamayā yuktam aśaktam manyate janaḥ

original: MSS_7449-1 etasya tu mahāprājña doṣasya sumahān guṇaḥ /
analyzed: etasya tu mahā prājña doṣasya su mahān guṇaḥ

original: MSS_7449-2 kṣamāyāṃ vipulā lokāḥ sulabhā hi sahiṣṇunā //
analyzed: kṣamāyām vipulāḥ lokāḥ sulabhāḥ hi sahiṣṇunā

original: MSS_7450-1 eka eva na bhuñjīyād yadicchec śubhamātmanaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva na bhuñjīyāt yat icchet śubham ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_7450-2 dvitribhirbandhubhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhojanaṃ kārayen naraḥ //
analyzed: dvi tribhiḥ bandhubhiḥ sārdham bhojanam kārayet naraḥ

original: MSS_7451-1 eka eva padārthastu tridhā bhavati vīkṣitaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva padārthaḥ tu tridhā bhavati vīkṣitaḥ

original: MSS_7451-2 kuṇapaṃ kaminī māṃsaṃ yogibhiḥ kāmibhiḥ śvabhiḥ //
analyzed: kuṇapam kaminī māṃsam yogibhiḥ kāmibhiḥ śvabhiḥ

original: MSS_7452-1 eka eva paro hyātmā sarveṣāmapi dehinām /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva paraḥ hi ātmā sarveṣām api dehinām

original: MSS_7452-2 nāneva gṛhyate mūḍhair yathā jyotiryathā nabhaḥ //
analyzed: nānā iva gṛhyate mūḍhaiḥ yathā jyotiḥ yathā nabhaḥ

original: MSS_7453-1 eka eva mahān doṣo bhavatāṃ vimale kule /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva mahān doṣaḥ bhavatām vimale kule

original: MSS_7453-2 lumpanti pūrvajāṃ kīrtiṃ jātā jātā guṇādhikāḥ //
analyzed: lumpanti pūrva jām kīrtim jātāḥ jātāḥ guṇa adhikāḥ

original: MSS_7454-1 eka eva laghuryatra āditālaḥ sa kathyate /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva laghuḥ yatra ādi tālaḥ sa kathyate

original: MSS_7454-2 vinode rāsakas tena śrot ṇāṃ ca sukhāvahaḥ //
analyzed: vinode rāsakaḥ tena ca sukha āvahaḥ

original: MSS_7455-1 eka eva suhṛd dharmo nidhane'pyanuyāti yaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva suhṛd dharmaḥ nidhane api anuyāti yaḥ

original: MSS_7455-2 śarīreṇa samaṃ nāśaṃ sarvamanyad hi gacchati //
analyzed: śarīreṇa samam nāśam sarvam anyat hi gacchati

original: MSS_7456-1 eka eva hitārthāya tejasvī pārthivo bhuvaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva hita arthāya tejasvī pārthivaḥ bhuvaḥ

original: MSS_7456-2 yugānta iva bhāsvanto bahavo'tra vipattaye //
analyzed: yugānte iva bhāsvantaḥ bahavaḥ utra vipattaye

original: MSS_7457-1 eka eva hi bhūtātmā bhūte bhūte vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva hi bhūtātmā bhūte bhūte vyavasthitaḥ

original: MSS_7457-2 ekadhā bahudhā caiva dṛśyate jalacandravat //
analyzed: ekadhā bahudhā ca eva dṛśyate jala candra vat

original: MSS_7458-1 eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānasaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śokaḥ bhavati mānasaḥ

original: MSS_7458-2 aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hyanyaḥ putra vidyate //
analyzed: aprajā asmi iti saṃtāpaḥ na hi anyaḥ putra vidyate

original: MSS_7459-1 eka evopahārastu saṃdhiretanmataṃ hi naḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ evā upahāraḥ tu saṃdhiḥ etat matam hi naḥ

original: MSS_7459-2 upahārasya bhedāstu sarve'nye maitravarjitāḥ //
analyzed: upahārasya bhedāḥ tu sarve nye maitra varjitāḥ

original: MSS_7460-1 ekakāryaniyoge'pi nānayos tulyaśīlatā /
analyzed: eka kārya niyoge api na anayoḥ tulya śīla tā

original: MSS_7460-2 vivāhe ca citāyāṃ ca yathā hutabhujordvayoḥ //
analyzed: vivāhe ca citāyām ca yathā hutabhujoḥ dvayoḥ

original: MSS_7461-1 ekakṣitibhṛdutpannāḥ sacchidrāḥ kaṇṭakolbaṇāḥ /
analyzed: eka kṣitibhṛt utpannāḥ sa chidrāḥ kaṇṭaka ulbaṇāḥ

original: MSS_7461-2 mithaḥ saṃgharṣaṇād vaṃśā dahyante sādhuśākhibhiḥ //
analyzed: mithas saṃgharṣaṇāt vaṃśāḥ dahyante sādhu śākhibhiḥ

original: MSS_7462-1 ekagarbhoṣitāḥ snigdhā mūrdhnā satkṛtya dhāritāḥ /
analyzed: eka garbha uṣitāḥ snigdhāḥ mūrdhnā satkṛtya dhāritāḥ

original: MSS_7462-2 keśā api virajyante jarayā kimutāṅganāḥ //
analyzed: keśāḥ api virajyante jarayā kim uta aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_7463-1 ekaguṇā bhavati tithiś caturguṇaṃ bhavati nakṣatram /
analyzed: ekaguṇā bhavati tithiḥ caturguṇam bhavati nakṣatram

original: MSS_7463-2 catuḥṣaṣṭiguṇaṃ lagnam eṣa jyotiṣatantrasiddhāntaḥ //
analyzed: catuḥṣaṣṭiguṇam lagnam eṣa jyotiṣatantra siddhāntaḥ

original: MSS_7464-1 ekacakro ratho yantā vikalo viṣamā hayāḥ /
analyzed: eka cakraḥ rathaḥ yantā vikalaḥ viṣamāḥ hayāḥ

original: MSS_7464-2 ākrāmatyeva tejasvī tathāpyarko nabhastalam //
analyzed: ākrāmati eva tejasvī tathā api arkaḥ nabhastalam

original: MSS_7465-1 ekacakṣurna kāko'yaṃ bilamicchanna pannagaḥ /
analyzed: eka cakṣuḥ na kākaḥ yam bilam icchan na pannagaḥ

original: MSS_7465-2 kṣīyate vardhate caiva na samudro na candramāḥ //
analyzed: kṣīyate vardhate ca eva na samudraḥ na candramāḥ

original: MSS_7466-1 ekacitto labhet siddhiṃ dvidhācitto vinaśyati /
analyzed: ekacittaḥ labhet siddhim dvidhā acittaḥ vinaśyati

original: MSS_7466-2 skandhāvāraṃ hi gacchantam iṣukāro na paśyati //
analyzed: skandhāvāram hi gacchantam iṣukāraḥ na paśyati

original: MSS_7467-1 ekacchattraṃ kṣititalamidaṃ bhuñjate yan narendrāḥ svargāsthāne muditamanaso yad ramante munīndrāḥ /
analyzed: eka chattram kṣiti talam idam bhuñjate yat narendrāḥ svarga āsthāne mudita manasaḥ yat ramante muni indrāḥ

original: MSS_7467-2 yan nirvāṇe nirupamasukhaṃ martyamukhyā labhante dānasyāyaṃ sphurati mahimā kevalasyāmalasya //
analyzed: yat nirvāṇe nirupama sukham martya mukhyāḥ labhante dānasya ayam sphurati mahimā kevalasya amalasya

original: MSS_7468-1 ekacchāgaṃ dvirāveyaṃ trigavaṃ pañcamāhiṣam /
analyzed: eka chāgam dvi rāveyam trigavam pañca māhiṣam

original: MSS_7468-2 ṣaḍaśvaṃ saptamātaṅgaṃ śakrasyāpi śriyaṃ haret //
analyzed: ṣaṣ aśvam sapta mātaṅgam śakrasya api śriyam haret

original: MSS_7469-1 ekataḥ kratavaḥ sarve samagravaradakṣiṇāḥ /
analyzed: ekatas kratavaḥ sarve samagra vara dakṣiṇāḥ

original: MSS_7469-2 ekato bhayabhītasya prāṇinaḥ prāṇarakṣaṇam //
analyzed: ekatas bhaya bhītasya prāṇinaḥ prāṇa rakṣaṇam

original: MSS_7470-1 ekataḥ praṇayapīḍanaṃ mudhā mānadhāraṇarasādaro'nyataḥ /
analyzed: ekatas praṇaya pīḍanam mudhā māna dhāraṇa rasa ādaraḥ nyatas

original: MSS_7470-2 rakṣatī dvayamidaṃ manasvinī nirvṛṇotu kathamatra janmani //
analyzed: rakṣatī dvayam idam manasvinī nirvṛṇotu katham atra janmani

original: MSS_7471-1 ekataḥ sakalā vidyā cāturyaṃ punarekataḥ /
analyzed: ekatas sakalā vidyā cāturyam punar ekatas

original: MSS_7471-2 cāturyeṇa vinākṛtya sakalā vikalā kalā //
analyzed: cāturyeṇa vinākṛtya sakalā vikalā kalā

original: MSS_7472-1 ekataḥ sarvapāpāni madyapānaṃ tathaikataḥ /
analyzed: ekatas sarva pāpāni madya pānam tathā ekatas

original: MSS_7472-2 ekataḥ sarvadānāni brahmacaryaṃ tathaikataḥ //
analyzed: ekatas sarva dānāni brahmacaryam tathā ekatas

original: MSS_7473-1 ekataścaturo vedāḥ sāṅgopāṅgāḥ savistarāḥ /
analyzed: ekatas caturaḥ vedāḥ sa aṅga upāṅgāḥ sa vistarāḥ

original: MSS_7473-2 svādhīnāste naraśreṣṭha satyamekaṃ kilaikataḥ //
analyzed: svādhīnāḥ te nara śreṣṭha satyam ekam kila ekatas

original: MSS_7474-1 ekataścaturo vedā brahmacaryaṃ tathaikataḥ /
analyzed: ekatas caturaḥ vedāḥ brahmacaryam tathā ekatas

original: MSS_7474-2 ekataḥ sarvapāpāni madyapānaṃ tathaikataḥ //
analyzed: ekatas sarva pāpāni madya pānam tathā ekatas

original: MSS_7475-1 ekataśca surasundarījanaḥ śrīḥ pratīcchati yuyutsumanyataḥ /
analyzed: ekatas ca surasundarī janaḥ śrīḥ pratīcchati yuyutsum anyatas

original: MSS_7475-2 pāpmanā saha palāyato'yaśaś caikataḥ kulakalaṅkakāraṇam //
analyzed: pāpmanā saha palāyataḥ yaśaḥ ca ekatas kula kalaṅka kāraṇam

original: MSS_7476-1 ekatāmiva gatasya vivekaḥ kasyacin na mahato'pyupalebhe /
analyzed: eka tām iva gatasya vivekaḥ kasyacid na mahataḥ api upalebhe

original: MSS_7476-2 bhāsvatā nidadhire bhuvanānām ātmanīva patitena viśeṣāḥ //
analyzed: bhāsvatā nidadhire bhuvanānām ātmani iva patitena viśeṣāḥ

original: MSS_7477-1 ekato divasān bālā gaṇayatyekato'ntakaḥ /
analyzed: ekatas divasān bālā gaṇayati ekatas antakaḥ

original: MSS_7477-2 na vidmaḥ prathamaṃ kasya yāsyāmo vayamantikam //
analyzed: na vidmaḥ prathamam kasya yāsyāmaḥ vayam antikam

original: MSS_7478-1 ekato'paritoṣaśced anyamanyaṃ mahībhujam /
analyzed: ekata upari toṣaḥ ced anyam anyam mahībhujam

original: MSS_7478-2 nidāghapānthavacchāyām anyāmanyāmupāśrayet //
analyzed: nidāgha pāntha vat chāyām anyām anyām upāśrayet

original: MSS_7478A-1 ekato'pi bhuvi bhūriśo'bhavan dīpakādahaha paśya dīpakāḥ /
analyzed: ekatas api bhuvi bhūriśaḥ bhavan dīpakāt ahaha paśya dīpakāḥ

original: MSS_7478A-2 andhakāranidhanāya bhānuman- muktadivyaviśikhādiveṣavaḥ //
analyzed: andhakāra nidhanāya bhānumat mukta divya viśikha ādi veṣavaḥ

original: MSS_7479-1 ekato'bhyuditamindumaṇḍalaṃ smeramāsyamasitabhruvo'nyataḥ /
analyzed: ekatas abhyuditam indu maṇḍalam smeram āsyam asita bhruvaḥ nyatas

original: MSS_7479-2 cañcukorakapuṭīṃ cakorikā cālayatyubhayato'pi dhāvati //
analyzed: cañcu koraka puṭīm cakorikā cālayati ubhayatas api dhāvati

original: MSS_7480-1 ekato mātṛvātsalyaṃ parato guṇakoṭayaḥ /
analyzed: ekatas mātṛ vātsalyam paratas guṇa koṭayaḥ

original: MSS_7480-2 anayoḥ samatāṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ brahmādayaḥ surāḥ //
analyzed: anayoḥ samatām vaktum na alam brahma ādayaḥ surāḥ

original: MSS_7481-1 ekato vā kulaṃ kṛtsnam ātmā vā kulavardhana /
analyzed: ekatas vā kulam kṛtsnam ātmā vā kula vardhana

original: MSS_7481-2 na samaṃ sarvameveti budhānāmeṣa niścayaḥ //
analyzed: na samam sarvam eva iti budhānām eṣa niścayaḥ

original: MSS_7482-1 ekatovyādhidurbhikṣapramukhā vipado'khilāḥ /
analyzed: ekatas vyādhi durbhikṣa pramukhāḥ vipadaḥ ukhilāḥ

original: MSS_7482-2 prajānāmekatastvekā lubdhatā vasudhāpateḥ //
analyzed: prajānām ekatas tu ekā lubdha tā vasudhā pateḥ

original: MSS_7483-1 ekatra kaulavratabhaṅgaśaṅkā vidagdhatābhaṅgabhayaṃ paratra /
analyzed: ekatra kaula vrata bhaṅga śaṅkā vidagdha tā bhaṅga bhayam paratra

original: MSS_7483-2 ityākulānāṃ kulakāminīnāṃ gatāgataireva gatā triyāmā //
analyzed: iti ākulānām kula kāminīnām gata āgataiḥ eva gatā triyāmā

original: MSS_7484-1 ekatra nāsya ratirityavadhūyamānaḥ kopādiva śvasanakampavighūrṇitāyāḥ /
analyzed: ekatra na asya ratiḥ iti avadhūyamānaḥ kopāt iva śvasana kampa vighūrṇitāyāḥ

original: MSS_7484-2 raktacchadaṃ madhusugandhi saroruhiṇyā bhṛṅgaś cucumba kamalānanamādareṇa //
analyzed: raktacchadam madhu sugandhi saroruhiṇyāḥ bhṛṅgaḥ cucumba kamala ānanam ādareṇa

original: MSS_7485-1 ekatra prapaṭhanti sāma ca yajuścānyatra vedāntaraṃ hiṃsrāścāpi mṛgāyitāśca parato yāgotthadhūmaḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: ekatra prapaṭhanti sāma ca yajuḥ ca anyatra veda antaram hiṃsrāḥ ca api mṛgāyitāḥ ca paratas yāga uttha dhūmaḥ śivaḥ

original: MSS_7485-2 ātithyādividhiḥ paratra vidhivat pādyādināpādyate nānāśāstravivecanaṃ ca vaṭubhiḥ saṃtanyate saṅgataiḥ //
analyzed: ātithya ādi vidhiḥ paratra vidhivat pādya ādinā āpādyate nānā śāstra vivecanam ca vaṭubhiḥ saṃtanyate

original: MSS_7486-1 ekatra prākṛtaiḥ sāmyam anyatra paratantratā /
analyzed: ekatra prākṛtaiḥ sāmyam anyatra paratantra tā

original: MSS_7486-2 śukasya paritoṣāya na vanaṃ na ca pattanam //
analyzed: śukasya paritoṣāya na vanam na ca pattanam

original: MSS_7487-1 ekatra madhuno bindau bhakṣate'saṃkhyadehinaḥ /
analyzed: ekatra madhunaḥ bindau bhakṣatesaṃkhya dehinaḥ

original: MSS_7487-2 yo hi na syāt kṛpā tasya tasmān madhu na bhakṣayet //
analyzed: yaḥ hi na syāt kṛpā tasya tasmāt madhu na bhakṣayet

original: MSS_7488-1 ekatra vāsādavasānabhājas tāmbūlalakṣmyā iva saṃsmarantī /
analyzed: ekatra vāsāt avasāna bhājaḥ tāmbūla lakṣmyāḥ iva saṃsmarantī

original: MSS_7488-2 vaktreṣu yadvairivilāsinīnāṃ hāsaprabhā tānavamāsasāda //
analyzed: vaktreṣu yat vairi vilāsinīnām hāsa prabhā tān avamāsasāda

original: MSS_7489-1 ekatra sārthe vrajatāṃ bahūnāṃ tulye'pi jāte śakune phalāni /
analyzed: ekatra sārthe vrajatām bahūnām tulye api jāte śakune phalāni

original: MSS_7489-2 nānāprakārāṇi bhavanti yena taṃ haṃsacāraṃ pravicārayāmaḥ //
analyzed: nānā prakārāṇi bhavanti yena tam haṃsa cāram pravicārayāmaḥ

original: MSS_7490-1 ekatra sphaṭikataṭāṃśubhinnanīrā nīlāśmadyutibhidurāmbhaso'paratra /
analyzed: ekatra sphaṭika taṭa aṃśu bhinna nīrā nīla aśma dyuti bhidura ambhasā uparatra

original: MSS_7490-2 kālindījalajanitaśriyaḥ śrayante vaidagdhīmiha saritaḥ surāpagāyāḥ //
analyzed: kālindī jala janita śriyaḥ śrayante vaidagdhīm iha saritaḥ surāpagāyāḥ

original: MSS_7491-1 ekatrādadate jalaṃ jaladharavyūhāḥ paratrāpyamī dīpyaddikkariṇaḥ paratra vaḍavāvaktrodgatā vahnayaḥ /
analyzed: ekatra ādadate jalam jaladhara vyūhāḥ paratra api amī dīpyat dikkariṇaḥ paratra vaḍavā vaktra udgatāḥ vahnayaḥ

original: MSS_7491-2 etāvat satatavyaye'pi sutarāmāścaryamambhonidhes tā eva sthitayaḥ sa eva mahimā saivāsya gambhīratā //
analyzed: etāvat satata vyaye pi sutarām āścaryam ambhonidheḥ tāḥ eva sthitayaḥ saḥ eva mahimā sā eva asya gambhīra tā

original: MSS_7492-1 ekatrāpi hate jantau pāpaṃ bhavati dāruṇam /
analyzed: ekatra api hate jantau pāpam bhavati dāruṇam

original: MSS_7492-2 na sūkṣmānekajantūnāṃ ghātino madhupasya kim //
analyzed: na sūkṣma aneka jantūnām ghātinaḥ madhupasya kim

original: MSS_7493-1 ekatrāsanasaṅgatiḥ parihṛtā pratyudgamād dūratas tāmbūlānayanacchalena rabhasāśleṣo'pi saṃvighnitaḥ /
analyzed: ekatra āsana saṅgatiḥ parihṛtā pratyudgamāt dūratas tāmbūla ānayana chalena rabhasa āśleṣaḥ api saṃvighnitaḥ

original: MSS_7493-2 ālāpo'pi na miśritaḥ parijanaṃ vyāpārayantyāntike kāntaṃ pratyupacārataścaturayā kopaḥ kṛtārthīkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: ālāpaḥ api na miśritaḥ parijanam vyāpārayantyā antike kāntam pratyupacārataḥ caturayā kopaḥ kṛtārthīkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_7494-1 ekatrāsanasaṅgate priyatame paścādupetyādarād ekasyā nayane pidhāya mahataḥ krīḍānubandhacchalāt /
analyzed: ekatra āsana saṅgate priyatame paścāt upetya ādarāt ekasyāḥ nayane pidhāya mahataḥ krīḍā anubandha chalāt

original: MSS_7494-2 tiryagvakritakandharaḥ sapulakasvedodgamānandinīm antarhāsalasatkapolaphalakāṃ dhūrto'parāṃ cumbati //
analyzed: tiryak vakrita kandharaḥ sa pulaka sveda udgama ānandinīm antarhāsa lasat kapola phalakām dhūrta uparām cumbati

original: MSS_7496-1 ekatvaṃ na rasaiḥ kayoḥ samajani strīpuṃsayoḥ prāvṛṣi prāptau yadrasanirbharāviha dharākāśau cirādekatām /
analyzed: eka tvam na rasaiḥ kayoḥ samajani strīpuṃsayoḥ prāvṛṣi prāptau yat rasa nirbharau iha dharā ākāśau cirāt eka tām

original: MSS_7496-2 yoṣitsaṅgamagūḍhasarvataruṇaḥ kālo'yamālokyate channaḥ kvāpi divā yuvāpi niśayā kroḍīkṛtaḥ krīḍati //
analyzed: yoṣit saṅgama gūḍha sarva taruṇaḥ kālaḥ yam ālokyate channaḥ kvāpi divā yuvā api niśayā kroḍīkṛtaḥ krīḍati

original: MSS_7497-1 ekadantaṃ trinayanaṃ jvālānalasamaprabham /
analyzed: eka dantam tri nayanam jvālā anala sama prabham

original: MSS_7497-2 gaṇādhyakṣaṃ gajamukhaṃ praṇamāmi vināyakam //
analyzed: gaṇādhyakṣam gajamukham praṇamāmi vināyakam

original: MSS_7498-1 ekadantadyutisitaḥ śaṃbhoḥ sūnuḥ śriye'stu vaḥ /
analyzed: eka danta dyuti sitaḥ śaṃbhoḥ sūnuḥ śriyeḥ tu vaḥ

original: MSS_7498-2 vidyākanda ivodbhinnanavāṅkuramanoharaḥ //
analyzed: vidyā kandaḥ iva udbhinna nava aṅkura manoharaḥ

original: MSS_7499-1 ekadā na vigṛhṇīyād bahūn rājābhighātinaḥ /
analyzed: ekadā na vigṛhṇīyāt bahūn rājā abhighātinaḥ

original: MSS_7499-2 sadarpo'pyuragaḥ kīṭair bahubhirnāśyate dhruvam //
analyzed: sa darpaḥ upi uragaḥ kīṭaiḥ bahubhiḥ nāśyate dhruvam

original: MSS_7500-1 ekadeśamupādhyāya ṛtvig yajñakṛducyate /
analyzed: eka deśam upādhyāyaḥ ṛtvij yajña kṛt ucyate

original: MSS_7500-2 ete mānyā yathāpūrvam ebhyo mātā garīyasī //
analyzed: ete mānyāḥ yathāpūrvam ebhyaḥ mātā garīyasī

original: MSS_7501-1 ekadvikaraṇe hetū mahāpātakapañcake /
analyzed: eka dvi karaṇe hetū mahāpātaka pañcake

original: MSS_7501-2 na tṛṇe manyate kopakāmau yaḥ pañca kārayan //
analyzed: na tṛṇe manyate kopa kāmau yaḥ pañca kārayan

original: MSS_7502-1 ekadvitrikalākrameṇa śaśinaṃ gṛhṇanvimuñcannayaṃ yac caṇḍadyutirātanoti bhagavānadyāpi cāndrāyaṇam /
analyzed: eka dvi tri kalā krameṇa śaśinam gṛhṇan vimuñcan ayam yat caṇḍa dyutiḥ ātanoti bhagavān adya api cāndrāyaṇam

original: MSS_7502-2 devaitad bhavadīyabhāsvarabhujastambhapratāpānala- spardhāyai kramabhuktalāñchanapaśornaitat punaḥ setsyati //
analyzed: deva etat bhavadīya bhāsvara bhuja stambha pratāpa anala spardhāyai krama bhukta lāñchana paśoḥ nā etat punar setsyati

original: MSS_7503-1 ekadviprabhṛtikrameṇa gaṇanāmeṣāmivāstaṃ yatāṃ kurvāṇā samakocayad daśaśatānyambhojasaṃvartikāḥ /
analyzed: eka dvi prabhṛti krameṇa gaṇanām eṣām iva astam yatām kurvāṇā samakocayat daśa śatāni ambhoja saṃvartikāḥ

original: MSS_7503-2 bhūyo'pi kramaśaḥ prasārayati tāḥ saṃpratyamūnudyataḥ saṃkhyātuṃ sakutūhaleva nalinī bhānoḥ sahasraṃ karān //
analyzed: bhūyas api kramaśas prasārayati tāḥ saṃprati amūn udyataḥ saṃkhyātum sa kutūhalā iva nalinī bhānoḥ sahasram karān

original: MSS_7504-1 ekadveṣu rasālaśākhiṣu manāgunmīlitaṃ kuḍmalaiḥ karṇākarṇikayā mithaḥ kathamamī ghūrṇanti viśve'dhvagāḥ /
analyzed: rasāla śākhiṣu manāk unmīlitam kuḍmalaiḥ karṇākarṇikayā mithas katham amī ghūrṇanti viśvedhvagāḥ

original: MSS_7504-2 dvitraiḥ kvāpi kila śrutāśrutamapi spaṣṭānyapuṣṭārutaṃ viṣvaṅmūrchati duḥsaho virahiṇīgeheṣu hāhāravaḥ //
analyzed: dvitraiḥ kvāpi kila śruta aśrutam api spaṣṭa anyapuṣṭa arutam viṣvak mūrchati duḥsahaḥ virahiṇī geheṣu hāhā ravaḥ

original: MSS_7505-1 ekadvaiḥ kimabhāvi sūribhiratha dvitrāṇi mitrāṇi kiṃ vyāpannāni gatāśca kiṃ tricaturā ghorā mahāvyādhayaḥ /
analyzed: eka dvaiḥ kim abhāvi sūribhiḥ atha dvitrāṇi mitrāṇi kim vyāpannāni gatāḥ ca kim tricaturāḥ ghorāḥ mahā vyādhayaḥ

original: MSS_7505-2 saptāṣṭairalamiṣṭametadapi naścetaḥ kṣaṇān pañcaṣān svātmanyeva ramasva tejasi gate kāle'thavā sarvataḥ //
analyzed: sapta aṣṭaiḥ alam iṣṭam etat api naḥ cetaḥ kṣaṇān pañcaṣān sva ātmani eva ramasva tejasi gate kāle thavā sarvatas

original: MSS_7506-1 ekadvairdivasairbhaviṣyati manāg dorantaraṃ danturaṃ dvitraireva dinaiśca locanapathaṃ romāvalī yāsyati /
