analyzed: eka dvaiḥ divasaiḥ bhaviṣyati manāk dos antaram danturam dvitraiḥ eva dinaiḥ ca locana patham roma āvalī yāsyati

original: MSS_7506-2 kiṃ cābhūdiva vāsaraistricaturaiścāñcalyamasyā dṛśos tajjetuṃ jagatīmanaṅga kimatīvāyāsamālaṃbase //
analyzed: kim ca abhūt iva vāsaraiḥ tricaturaiḥ cāñcalyam asyāḥ dṛśoḥ tat jetum jagatīm anaṅga kim atīva āyāsam ālaṃbase

original: MSS_7507-1 ekadvairmadhubindubhirmadhulihaḥ syādeva kukṣimbhariḥ kasmin vā kusume bhavanti sulabhā te'mī punaḥ pañcaṣāḥ /
analyzed: eka dvaiḥ madhu bindubhiḥ madhulihaḥ syāt eva kukṣimbhariḥ kasmin vā kusume bhavanti sulabhā temī punar pañcaṣāḥ

original: MSS_7507-2 kālaḥ ko'pi sa tādṛśaḥ pariṇato yenaikatṛṣṇākulo yadyat puṣpamupāgamat kṛpaṇavat tenāsya mā kuñcitam //
analyzed: kālaḥ kaḥ api sa tādṛśaḥ pariṇataḥ yena eka tṛṣṇā ākulaḥ yat yat puṣpam upāgamat kṛpaṇa vat tena asya mā kuñcitam

original: MSS_7508-1 ekadhāturdvikhaṇḍaḥ syād yatrodgrāhastataḥ param /
analyzed: eka dhātuḥ dvi khaṇḍaḥ syāt yatra udgrāhaḥ tatas param

original: MSS_7508-2 tṛtīyaṃ kiṃciduccaṃ syāt khaṇḍaṃ gamakaśobhanam //
analyzed: tṛtīyam kiṃcid uccam syāt khaṇḍam gamaka śobhanam

original: MSS_7509-1 ekanibhā yatra mahī tṛṇataruvalmīkagulmaparihīnā /
analyzed: eka nibhā yatra mahī tṛṇa taru valmīka gulma parihīnā

original: MSS_7509-2 tasyāṃ yatra vikāro bhavati dharitryāṃ jalaṃ tatra //
analyzed: tasyām yatra vikāraḥ bhavati dharitryām jalam tatra

original: MSS_7510-1 ekantu lokavedebhyaḥ sāramākṛṣya kathyate /
analyzed: ekam tu loka vedebhyaḥ sāram ākṛṣya kathyate

original: MSS_7510-2 prāṇātyaye'pi na tyājyo nyāyyo dharmaślathaḥ pathaḥ //
analyzed: prāṇa atyaye pi na tyājyaḥ nyāyyaḥ dharma ślathaḥ pathaḥ

original: MSS_7511-1 ekapaṅktyupaviṣṭānāṃ viprāṇāṃ sahabhojane /
analyzed: eka paṅkti upaviṣṭānām viprāṇām sahabhojane

original: MSS_7511-2 yadyeko'pi tyajedannaṃ sarvairucchiṣṭabhojanam //
analyzed: yadi ekaḥ api tyajet annam sarvaiḥ ucchiṣṭa bhojanam

original: MSS_7512-1 ekapatnīsamāsaktair bhavadbhiḥ saṃhatairmithaḥ /
analyzed: eka patnī samāsaktaiḥ bhavadbhiḥ saṃhataiḥ mithas

original: MSS_7512-2 sthātavyamaprasādena bhedamūlaṃ hi yoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: sthātavyam aprasādena bheda mūlam hi yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_7513-1 ekapuṃsā na gantavyaṃ kākasarpasya kāraṇāt /
analyzed: eka puṃsā na gantavyam kāka sarpasya kāraṇāt

original: MSS_7513-2 karkaṭasya prasādena brāhmaṇo jīvito yathā //
analyzed: karkaṭasya prasādena brāhmaṇaḥ jīvitaḥ yathā

original: MSS_7514-1 ekapucchaś catuṣpādaḥ kakudmān lambakambalaḥ /
analyzed: eka pucchaḥ catuṣpādaḥ kakudmān lamba kambalaḥ

original: MSS_7514-2 gorapatyaṃ balīvardo ghāsamatti sukhena saḥ //
analyzed: goḥ apatyam balīvardaḥ ghāsam atti sukhena saḥ

original: MSS_7515-1 ekapriyācaraṇapadmaparīṣṭijāta- kleśasya me hṛdayamuttaralīcakāra /
analyzed: eka priyā caraṇa padma parīṣṭi jāta kleśasya me hṛdayam uttaralīcakāra

original: MSS_7515-2 udbhinnanirbharamanobhavabhāvamugdha- nānāṅganāvadanacandramasāṃ didṛkṣā //
analyzed: udbhinna nirbhara manobhava bhāva mugdha nānā aṅganā vadana candramasām didṛkṣā

original: MSS_7516-1 ekabhave ripupannagaduḥkhaṃ janmaśateṣu manobhavaduḥkham /
analyzed: eka bhave ripu pannaga duḥkham janma śateṣu manobhava duḥkham

original: MSS_7516-2 cārudhiyeti vicintya mahāntaḥ kāmaripuṃ kṣaṇataḥ kṣapayanti //
analyzed: cāru dhiyā iti vicintya mahāntaḥ kāma ripum kṣaṇatas kṣapayanti

original: MSS_7516A-1 ekabhuktaṃ sadārogyaṃ dvibhuktaṃ balavarddhanam /
analyzed: eka bhuktam sadā ārogyam dvi bhuktam bala varddhanam

original: MSS_7516A-2 tribhuktervyādhipīḍā syāc caturbhuktermṛtirdhruvam //
analyzed: tri bhukteḥ vyādhi pīḍā syāt catur bhukteḥ mṛtiḥ dhruvam

original: MSS_7517-1 ekamapi kṣaṇaṃ labdhvā samyaktvaṃ yo vimuñcati /
analyzed: ekam api kṣaṇam labdhvā samyaktvam yaḥ vimuñcati

original: MSS_7517-2 saṃsārārṇavamuttīrya labhate so'pi nirvṛtim //
analyzed: saṃsāra arṇavam uttīrya labhate saḥ api nirvṛtim

original: MSS_7518-1 ekamapi satāṃ sukṛtaṃ vikasati tailaṃ yathā jale nyastam /
analyzed: ekam api satām su kṛtam vikasati tailam yathā jale nyastam

original: MSS_7518-2 asatāmupakāraśataṃ saṃkucati suśītale ghṛtavat //
analyzed: asatām upakāra śatam saṃkucati su śītale ghṛta vat

original: MSS_7519-1 ekamapyakṣaraṃ yastu guruḥ śiṣyaṃ prabodhayet /
analyzed: ekam api akṣaram yaḥ tu guruḥ śiṣyam prabodhayet

original: MSS_7519-2 pṛthivyāṃ nāsti tad dravyaṃ yad datvā so'nṛṇī bhavet //
analyzed: pṛthivyām na asti tat dravyam yat da tvā saḥ nṛṇī bhavet

original: MSS_7520-1 ekamapyatra yo binduṃ bhakṣayen madhuno naraḥ /
analyzed: ekam api atra yaḥ bindum bhakṣayet madhunaḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_7520-2 so'pi duḥkhavṛṣākīrṇe patate bhavasāgare //
analyzed: saḥ api duḥkha vṛṣa ākīrṇe patate bhava sāgare

original: MSS_7521-1 ekamasya paramekamudyamaṃ nistrapatvamaparasya vastunaḥ /
analyzed: ekam asya param ekam udyamam nistrapa tvam aparasya vastunaḥ

original: MSS_7521-2 nityamuṣṇamahasā nirasyate nityamandhatamasaṃ pradhāvati //
analyzed: nityam uṣṇa mahasā nirasyate nityam andha tamasam pradhāvati

original: MSS_7522-1 ekamātro laghuḥ prokto dvimātraśca guruḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: eka mātraḥ laghuḥ proktaḥ dvi mātraḥ ca guruḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_7522-2 plutas trimātrako jñeyo drutaḥ syādardhamātrakaḥ //
analyzed: plutaḥ tri mātrakaḥ jñeyaḥ drutaḥ syāt ardha mātrakaḥ

original: MSS_7523-1 ekamāśīviṣo hanti śastreṇaikaśca vadhyate /
analyzed: ekam āśīviṣaḥ hanti śastreṇa ekaḥ ca vadhyate

original: MSS_7523-2 hanti vipraḥ sarāṣṭrāṇi purāṇyapi hi kopitaḥ //
analyzed: hanti vipraḥ sarāṣṭrāṇi purāṇi api hi kopitaḥ

original: MSS_7524-1 ekamutkaṇṭhayā vyāptam anyad dayitayā hṛtam /
analyzed: ekam utkaṇṭhayā vyāptam anyat dayitayā hṛtam

original: MSS_7524-2 caitanyamaparaṃ dhatte kiyanti hṛdayāni me //
analyzed: caitanyam aparam dhatte kiyanti hṛdayāni me

original: MSS_7525-1 ekameva guṇaṃ prāpya namratāmagamad dhanuḥ /
analyzed: ekam eva guṇam prāpya namra tām agamat dhanuḥ

original: MSS_7525-2 tavāśeṣaguṇā rājñaḥ stabdhateti suvismayaḥ //
analyzed: tava aśeṣa guṇāḥ rājñaḥ stabdha tā iti su vismayaḥ

original: MSS_7526-1 ekameva tu śūdrasya prabhuḥ karma samādiśat /
analyzed: ekam eva tu śūdrasya prabhuḥ karma samādiśat

original: MSS_7526-2 eteṣāmeva varṇānāṃ śuśrūṣāmanasūyayā //
analyzed: eteṣām eva varṇānām śuśrūṣām anasūyayā

original: MSS_7527-1 ekameva dahatyagnir naraṃ durupasarpiṇam /
analyzed: ekam eva dahati agniḥ naram durupasarpiṇam

original: MSS_7527-2 kulaṃ dahati rājāgniḥ sapaśudravyasaṃcayam //
analyzed: kulam dahati rāja agniḥ sa paśu dravya saṃcayam

original: MSS_7528-1 ekameva puraskṛtya daśa jīvanti mānavāḥ /
analyzed: ekam eva puraskṛtya daśa jīvanti mānavāḥ

original: MSS_7528-2 vinā tena na śobhante yathā saṃkhyāṅkabindavaḥ //
analyzed: vinā tena na śobhante yathā saṃkhyā aṅka bindavaḥ

original: MSS_7529-1 ekameva baliṃ baddhvā jagāma harirunnatim /
analyzed: ekam eva balim baddhvā jagāma hariḥ unnatim

original: MSS_7529-2 asyāstribalibandhena saiva madhyasya namratā //
analyzed: asyāḥ tri bali bandhena sā eva madhyasya namra tā

original: MSS_7530-1 ekameva hi dāridryaṃ kliśnāti sakalaṃ jagat /
analyzed: ekam eva hi dāridryam kliśnāti sakalam jagat

original: MSS_7530-2 tamahaṃ śābdikaṃ vande yaścakāra napuṃsakam //
analyzed: tam aham śābdikam vande yaḥ cakāra napuṃsakam

original: MSS_7531-1 ekamevākṣi vāmākṣi rañjayāñjanalekhayā /
analyzed: ekam eva akṣi vāma akṣi rañjaya añjana lekhayā

original: MSS_7531-2 jāyatāmaindave bimbe khañjanāmbujasaṃgamaḥ //
analyzed: jāyatām aindave bimbe khañjana ambuja saṃgamaḥ

original: MSS_7532-1 ekamevādvitīyaṃ tad yad rājan nāvabudhyase /
analyzed: ekam eva advitīyam tat yat rājan na avabudhyase

original: MSS_7532-2 satyaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ pārāvārasya nauriva //
analyzed: satyam svargasya sopānam pārāvārasya nauḥ iva

original: MSS_7533-1 ekayā dve viniścitya trīṃścaturbhirvaśe kuru /
analyzed: ekayā dve viniścitya trīn caturbhiḥ vaśe kuru

original: MSS_7533-2 pañca jitvā viditvā ṣaṭ sapta hitvā sukhī bhava //
analyzed: pañca jitvā viditvā ṣaṭ sapta hitvā sukhī bhava

original: MSS_7534-1 ekayāpi kalayā viśuddhayā yo'pi ko'pi bhajate girīśatām /
analyzed: ekayā api kalayā viśuddhayā yaḥ api kaḥ api bhajate girīśa tām

original: MSS_7534-2 bhūyasīrapi kalāḥ kalaṅkitāḥ prāpya kaścidapacīyate śanaiḥ //
analyzed: bhūyasīḥ api kalāḥ kalaṅkitāḥ prāpya kaścid apacīyate śanais

original: MSS_7535-1 ekayaiva gurordṛṣṭyā dvābhyāṃ vāpi labheta yat /
analyzed: ekayā eva guroḥ dṛṣṭyā dvābhyām vā api labheta yat

original: MSS_7535-2 na tat tisṛbhiraṣṭābhiḥ sahasreṇāpi kasyacit //
analyzed: na tat tisṛbhiḥ aṣṭābhiḥ sahasreṇa api kasyacid

original: MSS_7536-1 ekarada dvaimātura nistriguṇa caturbhujo'pi pañcakara /
MSS_7536-2 jaya ṣaṇmukhanuta sapta- cchadagandhimadāṣṭatanutanaya //
analyzed: jaya ṣaṇmukha nuta sapta chada gandhi mada aṣṭa tanu tanaya

original: MSS_7537-1 ekavarṇaṃ yathā dugdhaṃ bahuvarṇāsu dhenuṣu /
analyzed: eka varṇam yathā dugdham bahu varṇāsu dhenuṣu

original: MSS_7537-2 tathā dharmasya vaicitrye tattvamekaṃ paraṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: tathā dharmasya vaicitrye tattvam ekam param punar

original: MSS_7538-1 ekavarṇamidaṃ pūrvaṃ viśvamāsīd yudhiṣṭhira /
analyzed: eka varṇam idam pūrvam viśvam āsīt yudhiṣṭhira

original: MSS_7538-2 karmakriyāvibhedena cāturvarṇyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam //
analyzed: karma kriyā vibhedena cāturvarṇyam pratiṣṭhitam

original: MSS_7539-1 ekavarṇo bhaved yastu lakṣaṇaikena saṃyutaḥ /
analyzed: eka varṇaḥ bhavet yaḥ tu lakṣaṇa ekena saṃyutaḥ

original: MSS_7539-2 sa khaḍgarājo nṛpater vijñeyaḥ śubhakārakaḥ //
analyzed: sa khaḍga rājaḥ nṛpateḥ vijñeyaḥ śubha kārakaḥ

original: MSS_7540-1 ekavāpījalaṃ paśya ikṣau madhuratāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: eka vāpī jalam paśya ikṣau madhura tām vrajet

original: MSS_7540-2 nimbe kaṭukatāṃ yāti pātrāpātrāya bhojanam //
MSS_7541-1 ekavāpībhavaṃ toyaṃ pātrāpātraviśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: eka vāpī bhavam toyam pātra apātra viśeṣataḥ

original: MSS_7541-2 āmre madhuratāmeti nimbe kaṭukatāmapi //
analyzed: āmre madhura tām eti nimbe kaṭuka tām api

original: MSS_7542-1 ekaviṃśatirādiṣṭāḥ narakāḥ śāstrapāragaiḥ /
analyzed: ekaviṃśatiḥ ādiṣṭāḥ narakāḥ śāstra pāragaiḥ

original: MSS_7542-2 garbhavāsasamīpe te kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm //
analyzed: garbha vāsa samīpe te kalām na arhanti ṣoḍaśīm

original: MSS_7543-1 ekaviṃśativarṇāṅghrir bhavec śṛṅgārake rase /
MSS_7543-2 kāmado'bhīṣṭadaḥ pusāṃ tāle turagalīlake //
analyzed: kāma daḥ abhīṣṭa daḥ pusām tāle turaga līlake

original: MSS_7544-1 ekaviṃśativāreṇa kukkuṭasyāsṛjokṣitam /
analyzed: ekaviṃśati vāreṇa kukkuṭasya asṛjā ukṣitam

original: MSS_7544-2 tatkṣaṇād dāḍimībījaṃ vardhate phalati dhruvam //
MSS_7545-1 ekaviṃśatisaṃjaptaṃ jalaṃ mantreṇa pāyayet /
analyzed: ekaviṃśati saṃjaptam jalam mantreṇa pāyayet

original: MSS_7545-2 yadā vāntis tadā mṛtyur na vāntirjīvati dhruvam //
analyzed: yadā vāntiḥ tadā mṛtyuḥ na vāntiḥ jīvati dhruvam

original: MSS_7546-1 ekavidyāpradhāno'pi bahujñānī bhaven naraḥ /
analyzed: eka vidyā pradhānaḥ api bahu jñānī bhavet naraḥ

original: MSS_7546-2 subhāṣitāni śikṣeta yāni śāstroddhṛtāni vai //
analyzed: subhāṣitāni śikṣeta yāni śāstra uddhṛtāni vai

original: MSS_7547-1 ekavṛkṣasamārūḍhā nānāvarṇā vihaṃgamāḥ /
analyzed: eka vṛkṣa samārūḍhāḥ nānā varṇāḥ vihaṃgamāḥ

original: MSS_7547-2 prātardaśa diśo yānti kā tatra paridevanā //
analyzed: prātar daśa diśaḥ yānti kā tatra paridevanā

original: MSS_7548-1 ekavṛkṣe yathā rātrau nānāpakṣisamāgamaḥ /
analyzed: eka vṛkṣe yathā rātrau nānā pakṣi samāgamaḥ

original: MSS_7548-2 prātardaśa diśo yānti tadvad bhūtasamāgamaḥ //
analyzed: prātar daśa diśaḥ yānti tadvat bhūta samāgamaḥ

original: MSS_7549-1 ekaveśāśrayāj jāter varṇasyāpi pragopanam /
analyzed: eka veśa āśrayāt jāteḥ varṇasya api pragopanam

original: MSS_7549-2 yathā hastipade'nyeṣāṃ līyante caraṇā api //
analyzed: yathā līyante caraṇāḥ api

original: MSS_7550-1 ekaśaktiprahāreṇa mriyate'śvo naro'pi hi /
analyzed: eka śakti prahāreṇa mriyate īśvaraḥ naraḥ api hi

original: MSS_7550-2 sahen mahāprahārāṇāṃ śataṃ yuddheṣu vāraṇaḥ //
analyzed: sahet mahā prahārāṇām śatam yuddheṣu vāraṇaḥ

original: MSS_7551-1 ekaśīlavayovidyājātivyasanavṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: eka śīla vayaḥ vidyā jāti vyasana vṛttayaḥ

original: MSS_7551-2 sāhacarye bhaven mitram ebhiryadi tu sārjavaiḥ //
analyzed: sāhacarye bhavet mitram ebhiḥ yadi tu sa ārjavaiḥ

original: MSS_7552-1 ekaścet pūrvapuruṣaḥ kule yaśca bahuśrutaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ ced pūrvapuruṣaḥ kule yaḥ ca bahu śrutaḥ

original: MSS_7552-2 aparaḥ pāpakṛnmūrkhaḥ kulaṃ kasyānuvartate //
analyzed: aparaḥ pāpa kṛt mūrkhaḥ kulam kasya anuvartate

original: MSS_7553-1 ekasārthaprayātānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tatra gāminām /
analyzed: eka sārtha prayātānām sarveṣām tatra gāminām

original: MSS_7553-2 yasya kālaḥ prayātyagre tatra kā paridevanā //
analyzed: yasya kālaḥ prayāti agre tatra kā paridevanā

original: MSS_7554-1 ekasukṛtena duṣkṛta- śatāni ye nāśayanti te sevyāḥ /
analyzed: eka sukṛtena duṣkṛta śatāni ye nāśayanti te sevyāḥ

original: MSS_7554-2 na tvekadoṣajanito yeṣāṃ kopaḥ kṛtaśataghnaḥ //
analyzed: na tu eka doṣa janitaḥ yeṣām kopaḥ kṛta śataghnaḥ

original: MSS_7555-1 ekastapo dviradhyāyī tribhirgītaṃ catuḥ patham /
analyzed: ekaḥ tapaḥ dvis adhyāyī tribhiḥ gītam catuḥ patham

original: MSS_7555-2 sapta pañca kṛṣīṇāṃ ca saṅgrāmo bahubhirjanaiḥ //
analyzed: sapta pañca kṛṣīṇām ca saṅgrāmaḥ bahubhiḥ janaiḥ

original: MSS_7557-1 ekastridhā hṛdi sadā vasasi sma citraṃ yo vidviṣāṃ ca viduṣāṃ ca mṛgīdṛśāṃ ca /
analyzed: ekaḥ tridhā hṛdi sadā vasasi sma citram yaḥ vidviṣām ca viduṣām ca mṛgī dṛśām ca

original: MSS_7557-2 tāpaṃ ca saṃmadarasaṃ ca ratiṃ ca tanvan śauryoṣmaṇā ca vinayena ca līlayā ca //
analyzed: tāpam ca saṃmada rasam ca ratim ca tanvan śaurya ūṣmaṇā ca vinayena ca līlayā ca

original: MSS_7557A-1 ekastredhā nayasunipuṇairyogibhiḥ sevakairvā nirbādhaṃ yaḥ sapadi vidito bhāti sarvasvarūpaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ tredhā naya su nipuṇaiḥ yogibhiḥ sevakaiḥ vā nirbādham yaḥ sapadi viditaḥ bhāti sarva svarūpaḥ

original: MSS_7557A-2 so'yaṃ nandavrajamupagataḥ sākamābhīravṛndair vṛndāraṇye viharati parānandabhūtirmukundaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam nanda vrajam upagataḥ sākam ābhīra vṛndaiḥ vṛndāraṇye viharati parānanda bhūtiḥ mukundaḥ

original: MSS_7558-1 ekastvaṃ gahane'smin kokila na kalaṃ kadācidapi kuryāḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ tvam gahane ismin kokila na kalam kadācid api kuryāḥ

original: MSS_7558-2 sājātyaśaṅkayāmī na tvāṃ nighnanti nirdayāḥ kākāḥ //
analyzed: sājātya śaṅkā yāmī na tvām nighnanti nirdayāḥ kākāḥ

original: MSS_7559-1 ekastvaṃ marubhūruhendra vitataiḥ śākhāśatairañcitaḥ puṣpyatpuṣpaphalānvitairamṛditair jīvyāḥ sahasraṃ samāḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ tvam maru bhūruha indra vitataiḥ śākhā śataiḥ añcitaḥ puṣpyat puṣpa phala anvitaiḥ amṛditaiḥ jīvyāḥ sahasram samāḥ

original: MSS_7559-2 aśrāntaṃ śramarugṇapānthajanatāsarvārthanirvāhaṇaṃ kastvāṃ sāttvikamantareṇa bhuvanaṃ nirmātu dharmāśayaḥ //
analyzed: a śrāntam śrama rugṇa pāntha janatā sarva artha nirvāhaṇam kaḥ tvām sāttvikam antareṇa bhuvanam nirmātu dharma āśayaḥ

original: MSS_7560-1 ekastvamāvahasi janmani saṃkṣaye ca bhoktuṃ svayaṃ svakṛtakarmaphalānubandham /
analyzed: ekaḥ tvam āvahasi janmani saṃkṣaye ca bhoktum svayam sva kṛta karma phala anubandham

original: MSS_7560-2 anyo na jātu sukhaduḥkhavidhau sahāyaḥ svājīvanāya militaṃ viṭapeṭakaṃ te //
analyzed: anyaḥ na jātu sukha duḥkha vidhau sahāyaḥ sva ājīvanāya militam viṭa peṭakam te

original: MSS_7561-1 ekasthaṃ jīviteśe tvayi sakalajagatsāramālokayāmaḥ śyāme cakṣustavāsmin vapuṣi niviśate nālpapuṇyasya puṃsaḥ /
analyzed: ekastham jīvita īśe tvayi sakala jagat sāram ālokayāmaḥ śyāme cakṣuḥ tava asmin vapuṣi niviśate na alpa puṇyasya puṃsaḥ

original: MSS_7561-2 kasyānyatrāmṛte'smin ratirativipulā dṛṣṭirevāmṛtaṃ te daityairityucyamāno munibhirapi hariḥ straiṇarūpo'vatād vaḥ //
analyzed: kasya anyatra amṛte asmin ratiḥ ati vipulā dṛṣṭiḥ eva amṛtam te daityaiḥ iti ucyamānaḥ munibhiḥ api hariḥ vaḥ

original: MSS_7562-1 ekasmād vṛkṣād yajñapātrāṇi rājan sruk ca droṇī voḍhanī pīḍanī ca /
analyzed: ekasmāt vṛkṣāt yajña pātrāṇi rājan sruc ca droṇī voḍhanī pīḍanī ca

original: MSS_7562-2 etad rājan bruvato me nibodha ekasmāt puruṣāj jāyate'sacca sacca //
analyzed: etat rājan bruvataḥ me nibodha ekasmāt puruṣāt jāyate sat ca sat ca

original: MSS_7563-1 ekasmiñ janirāvayoḥ samajani svacche sarovāriṇi bhrātaḥ kācidihaiva kānicidahānyatra vyatītāni nau /
analyzed: ekasmin janiḥ āvayoḥ samajani svacche sarovāriṇi bhrātar kācid iha eva kānicid ahāni atra vyatītāni nau

original: MSS_7563-2 labdhaṃ tāmarasa tvayā mṛgadṛśāṃ līlāvataṃsāspadaṃ śaivālaṃ viluṭhāmi pāmaravadhūpādāhate pāthasi //
analyzed: labdham tāmarasa tvayā mṛga dṛśām līlā avataṃsa āspadam śaivālam viluṭhāmi pāmara vadhū pāda hate pāthasi

original: MSS_7564-1 ekasmiñ śayane parāṅgukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyator anyonyasya hṛdi sthite'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam /
analyzed: ekasmin śayane parāṅgukha tayā vītottaram tāmyatoḥ anyonyasya hṛdi sthite pi anunaye saṃrakṣatoḥ gauravam

original: MSS_7564-2 dampatyoḥ śanakairapāṅgavalanān miśrībhavaccakṣuṣor bhagno mānakaliḥ sahāsarabhasavyāvṛttakaṇṭhagrahaḥ //
analyzed: dampatyoḥ śanakais apāṅga valanāt miśrībhavat cakṣuṣoḥ bhagnaḥ mānakaliḥ sa hāsa rabhasa vyāvṛtta kaṇṭha grahaḥ

original: MSS_7565-1 ekasmiñ śayane vipakṣaramaṇīnāmagrahe mugdhayā sadyaḥkopaparāṅmukhaglapitayā cāṭūni kurvannapi /
analyzed: ekasmin śayane vipakṣa ramaṇīnām agrahe mugdhayā sadyas kopa parāṅmukha glapitayā cāṭūni kurvan api

original: MSS_7565-2 āvegādavadhīritaḥ priyatamas tūṣṇīṃ sthitas tatkṣaṇaṃ mā bhūt supta ivetyamandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvīkṣitaḥ //
analyzed: āvegāt avadhīritaḥ priyatamaḥ tūṣṇīm sthitaḥ tad kṣaṇam mā bhūt suptaḥ iva iti amanda valita grīvam punar vīkṣitaḥ

original: MSS_7566-1 ekasmiñ śayane saroruhadṛśorvijñāya nidrāṃ tayor ekāṃ pallavitāvaguṇṭhanapaṭāmutkandharo dṛṣṭavān /
analyzed: ekasmin śayane saroruha dṛśoḥ vijñāya nidrām tayoḥ ekām pallavita avaguṇṭhana paṭām utkandharaḥ dṛṣṭavān

original: MSS_7566-2 anyasyāḥ savidhaṃ sametya nibhṛtavyālolahastāṅguli- vyāpārairvasanāñcalaṃ capalayan svāpacyutiṃ kliptavān //
analyzed: anyasyāḥ savidham sametya nibhṛta vyālola hasta aṅguli vyāpāraiḥ vasana añcalam capalayan svāpa cyutim kliptavān

original: MSS_7567-1 ekasmin divase mayā vicaratā prāptaḥ kathaṃcin maṇir mūlyaṃ yasya na vidyate bhavati cet pṛthvī samastā tataḥ /
analyzed: ekasmin divase mayā vicaratā prāptaḥ kathaṃcid maṇiḥ mūlyam yasya na vidyate bhavati ced pṛthvī samastā tatas

original: MSS_7567-2 so'yaṃ daivavaśādabhūdatitarāṃ kācopamaḥ sāmprataṃ kiṃ kurmaḥ kamupāsmahe kva sa suhṛd yasyaitadāvedyate //
analyzed: saḥ uyam daiva vaśāt abhūt atitarām kāca upamaḥ sāmpratam kim kurmaḥ kam upāsmahe kva sa suhṛd yasya etat āvedyate

original: MSS_7568-1 ekasminnapyatikrānte dine dharmavivarjite /
analyzed: ekasmin api atikrānte dine dharma vivarjite

original: MSS_7568-2 dasyubhirmuṣitasyeva hṛdayaṃ dahyate ciram //
analyzed: dasyubhiḥ muṣitasya iva hṛdayam dahyate ciram

original: MSS_7569-1 ekasmin nayane bhṛśaṃ tapati yaḥ kāle sa dāhakramo yenātanyata yatprakāśasamaye naiśaṃ padaṃ durlabham /
analyzed: ekasmin nayane bhṛśam tapati yaḥ kāle sa dāha kramaḥ yena atanyata yat prakāśa samaye naiśam padam durlabham

original: MSS_7569-2 savyomāvayavasya yasya viditā loke prakāśasthitiḥ śrīsūryaḥ kṣaṇasevito'pi hi mahādevaḥ sa nastrāyatām //
analyzed: sa vyoma avayavasya yasya viditā loke prakāśa sthitiḥ śrī sūryaḥ kṣaṇa sevitaḥ upi hi mahādevaḥ sa naḥ trāyatām

original: MSS_7570-1 ekasminneva jāyete kule klībamahārathau /
analyzed: ekasmin eva jāyete kule klība mahā rathau

original: MSS_7570-2 phalāphalavatī śākhe yathaikasmin vanaspatau //
analyzed: phala aphalavatī śākhe yathā ekasmin vanaspatau

original: MSS_7571-1 ekasmin malayācale bahuvidhaiḥ kiṃ tairakiṃcitkaraiḥ kākolūkakapotakokilakulaireko'pi pārśvasthitaḥ /
analyzed: ekasmin malaya acale bahuvidhaiḥ kim taiḥ akiṃcitkaraiḥ kāka ulūka kapota kokila kulaiḥ ekaḥ api pārśva sthitaḥ

original: MSS_7571-2 kekī kūjati cet tadā vighaṭitavyālāvalībandhanaḥ sevyaḥ syādiha sarvalokamanasāmānandanaś candanaḥ //
analyzed: kekī kūjati ced tadā vighaṭita vyāla āvalī bandhanaḥ sevyaḥ syāt iha sarva loka manasām ānandanaḥ candanaḥ

original: MSS_7572-1 ekasmin yatra nidhanaṃ prāpite duṣṭakāriṇi /
analyzed: ekasmin yatra nidhanam prāpite duṣṭa kāriṇi

original: MSS_7572-2 bahūnāṃ bhavati kṣemaṃ tasya puṇyaprado vadhaḥ //
analyzed: bahūnām bhavati kṣemam tasya puṇya pradaḥ vadhaḥ

original: MSS_7573-1 ekasmin vijite citte vijitaṃ sakalaṃ jagat /
analyzed: ekasmin vijite citte vijitam sakalam jagat

original: MSS_7573-2 ajite tu punastasmin na putro'pi vinirjitaḥ //
analyzed: ajite tu punar tasmin na putraḥ api vinirjitaḥ

original: MSS_7574-1 ekasmin vinipātite'pi śirasi krodhopaśāntiḥ kutaḥ kiṃtu svānunayāya mūrdhanidhanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na yatrāriṇā /
analyzed: ekasmin vinipātite api śirasi krodha upaśāntiḥ kutas kiṃtu sva anunayāya mūrdha nidhanam dṛṣṭam na yatra ariṇā

original: MSS_7574-2 tvatto mūrdhabahutvataḥ phalamidaṃ samyaṅ mayā labhyate chinnaṃ chinnamavekṣya rākṣasapate svaṃ durnayaṃ jñāsyasi //
analyzed: tvattaḥ mūrdha bahu tvataḥ phalam idam samyak mayā labhyate chinnam chinnam avekṣya rākṣasa pate svam durnayam jñāsyasi

original: MSS_7575-1 ekasmai pūrṇamanyasmai kṛśaṃ tulyaguṇodaye /
analyzed: ekasmai pūrṇam anyasmai kṛśam tulya guṇa udaye

original: MSS_7575-2 bhedād yadarpitaṃ rāgadveṣadānena tena kim //
analyzed: bhedāt yat arpitam rāga dveṣa dānena tena kim

original: MSS_7576-1 ekasya karma saṃvīkṣya karotyanyo'pi garhitam /
analyzed: ekasya karma saṃvīkṣya karoti anyaḥ api garhitam

original: MSS_7576-2 gatānugatiko loko na lokaḥ pāramārthikaḥ //
analyzed: gatānugatikaḥ lokaḥ na lokaḥ pāramārthikaḥ

original: MSS_7577-1 ekasya janmano'rthe mūḍhāḥ kurvanti yāni pāpāni /
analyzed: ekasya janmanā ṛthe mūḍhāḥ kurvanti yāni pāpāni

original: MSS_7577-2 janayanti tāni duḥkhaṃ teṣāṃ janmāntarasahasram //
analyzed: janayanti tāni duḥkham teṣām janmāntara sahasram

original: MSS_7578-1 ekasya tasya manye dhanyāmabhyunnatiṃ jaladharasya /
analyzed: ekasya tasya manye dhanyām abhyunnatim jaladharasya

original: MSS_7578-2 viśvaṃ saśailakānanam ānanamālokate yasya //
analyzed: viśvam sa śaila kānanam ānanam ālokate yasya

original: MSS_7579-1 ekasya duḥkhasya na yāvadantaṃ gacchāmyahaṃ pāramivārṇavasya /
analyzed: ekasya duḥkhasya na yāvat antam gacchāmi aham pāram iva arṇavasya

original: MSS_7579-2 tāvad dvitīyaṃ samupasthitaṃ me chidreṣvanarthā bahulībhavanti //
analyzed: tāvat dvitīyam samupasthitam me chidreṣu anarthāḥ bahulībhavanti

original: MSS_7580-1 ekasya viśvapāpena tāpe'nante nimajjataḥ /
analyzed: ekasya viśva pāpena tāpena ante nimajjataḥ

original: MSS_7580-2 kaḥ śrautasyātmano bhīro bhāraḥ syād duritena te //
analyzed: kaḥ śrautasya ātmanaḥ bhīro bhāraḥ syāt duritena te

original: MSS_7581-1 ekasya sṛṣṭiḥ parameśvarasya bhinnā caturdhā viniyogakāle /
analyzed: ekasya sṛṣṭiḥ parameśvarasya bhinnā caturdhā viniyoga kāle

original: MSS_7581-2 bhoge bhavānī samareṣu durgā kopeṣu kālī puruṣeṣu viṣṇuḥ //
analyzed: bhoge bhavānī samareṣu durgā kopeṣu kālī puruṣeṣu viṣṇuḥ

original: MSS_7582-1 ekasya hi prasādena kṛtsno lokaḥ prasīdati /
analyzed: ekasya hi prasādena kṛtsnaḥ lokaḥ prasīdati

original: MSS_7582-2 vyākulenākulaḥ sarvo bhavatīti viniścayaḥ //
analyzed: vyākulena ākulaḥ sarvaḥ bhavati iti viniścayaḥ

original: MSS_7583-1 ekasyāpi na yaḥ śakto manasaḥ sannibarhaṇe /
analyzed: ekasya api na yaḥ śaktaḥ manasaḥ sat nibarhaṇe

original: MSS_7583-2 mahīṃ sāgaraparyantāṃ kathaṃ nu sa vijeṣyate //
analyzed: mahīm sāgara paryantām katham nu sa vijeṣyate

original: MSS_7584-1 ekasyāpi manobhuvastadabalāpāṅgairjagannirjaye kāmaṃ nihnutasarvavismayarasavyaktiprakārā vayam /
analyzed: ekasya api manobhuvaḥ tad abala apāṅgaiḥ jagat nirjaye kāmam nihnuta sarva vismaya rasa vyakti prakārāḥ vayam

original: MSS_7584-2 yastvenaṃ sabalaṃ ca jetumabhitastatkampamātraṃ bhruvor nārebhe sugatastu tadguṇakathā stambhāya naḥ kevalam //
analyzed: yaḥ tu enam sa balam ca jetum abhitas tad kampa mātram bhruvoḥ nā ārebhe sugataḥ tu tad guṇa kathā stambhāya naḥ kevalam

original: MSS_7585-1 ekasyāpyatitherannaṃ yaḥ pradātuṃ na śaktimān /
analyzed: ekasya api atitheḥ annam yaḥ pradātum na śaktimān

original: MSS_7585-2 tasyānekaparikleśe gṛhe kiṃ vasataḥ phalam //
analyzed: tasya aneka parikleśe gṛhe kim vasataḥ phalam

original: MSS_7586-1 ekasyāyamudeti mūrdhani gireranyasya caiva kramād astaṃ yāti kalānidhistadubhayorastaḥ praśasto'calaḥ /
analyzed: ekasya ayam udeti mūrdhani gireḥ anyasya ca eva kramāt astam yāti kalā nidhiḥ tad ubhayoḥ astaḥ praśasta ucalaḥ

original: MSS_7586-2 ko nāmodayinaṃ karoti na śiromāṇikyamastaṃ punar yātaṃ yaḥ kurute bhavāniva sa duṣprāpo'yamuccaiḥśirāḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ nāma udayinam karoti na śiromāṇikyam astam punar yātam yaḥ kurute bhavān iva sa duṣprāpaḥ yam uccaiḥśirāḥ

original: MSS_7587-1 ekasyārthāya yo hanyād ātmano vā parasya vā /
analyzed: ekasya arthāya yaḥ hanyāt ātmanaḥ vā parasya vā

original: MSS_7587-2 bahūn vai prāṇino'thaikaṃ bhavet tasyeha pātakam //
analyzed: bahūn vai prāṇinaḥ utha ekam bhavet tasya iha pātakam

original: MSS_7588-1 sukhamedhanti bahavo yasmiṃstu nihate sati /
analyzed: sukham edhanti bahavaḥ yasmin tu nihate sati

original: MSS_7588-2 tasmin hate nāsti bhadre pātakaṃ nopapātakam //
analyzed: tasmin hate na asti bhadre pātakam na upapātakam

original: MSS_7589-1 ekasyāstapanakaraiḥ karālitāyā bibhrāṇaḥ sapadi sitoṣṇavāraṇatvam /
analyzed: ekasyāḥ tapana karaiḥ karālitāyāḥ bibhrāṇaḥ sapadi sita uṣṇa vāraṇa tvam

original: MSS_7589-2 sevāyai vadanasarojanirjitaśrīr āgatya priyamiva candramāś cakāra //
analyzed: sevāyai vadana saroja nirjita śrīḥ āgatya priyam iva candramāḥ cakāra

original: MSS_7590-1 ekasyaiva na paryāptam asti yad brahmakośajam /
analyzed: ekasya eva na paryāptam asti yat brahma kośa jam

original: MSS_7590-2 āśayā varddhitasyāsti tasyālpamapi pūrtikṛt //
analyzed: āśayā varddhitasya asti tasya alpam api pūrti kṛt

original: MSS_7591-1 ekāṃ kṛtvā tanumanupamāṃ candracūḍena sārdhaṃ yas tyakto'rdhaḥ satatavirahakleśabhāgī bhavānyā /
analyzed: ekām kṛtvā tanum anupamām candracūḍena sārdham yaḥ tyakta ūrdhaḥ satata viraha kleśa bhāgī bhavānyā

original: MSS_7591-2 tenāṅgānāṃ racitamucitaṃ saṃvibhaktena kartuṃ nūnaṃ dūnāṃ tanutanulatāṃ nirmame tāṃ viriñciḥ //
analyzed: tena aṅgānām racitam ucitam saṃvibhaktena kartum nūnam dūnām tanu tanu latām nirmame tām viriñciḥ

original: MSS_7592-1 ekākinā tapo dvābhyāṃ paṭhanaṃ gāyanaṃ tribhiḥ /
analyzed: ekākinā tapaḥ dvābhyām paṭhanam gāyanam tribhiḥ

original: MSS_7592-2 caturbhirgamanaṃ kṣetraṃ pañcabhirbahubhī raṇaḥ //
analyzed: caturbhiḥ gamanam kṣetram pañcabhiḥ bahubhiḥ raṇaḥ

original: MSS_7593-1 ekākinā na gantavyaṃ yadi kāryaśataṃ bhavet /
analyzed: ekākinā na gantavyam yadi kārya śatam bhavet

original: MSS_7593-2 ekakukkuṭamātreṇa brāhmaṇaḥ parirakṣitaḥ //
analyzed: eka kukkuṭa mātreṇa brāhmaṇaḥ parirakṣitaḥ

original: MSS_7594-1 ekākinā na gantavyaṃ yadi kāryaśatānyapi /
analyzed: ekākinā na gantavyam yadi kārya śatāni api

original: MSS_7594-2 karkaṭījantumātreṇa kālasarpo nipātitaḥ //
analyzed: karkaṭī jantu mātreṇa kālasarpaḥ nipātitaḥ

original: MSS_7595-1 ekākini vanavāsiny arājalakṣmaṇyanītiśāstrajñe /
analyzed: ekākini vana vāsini a rāja lakṣmaṇya nīti śāstra jñe

original: MSS_7595-2 sattvocchrite mṛgapatau rājeti giraḥ pariṇamanti //
analyzed: sattva ucchrite mṛgapatau rājā iti giraḥ pariṇamanti

original: MSS_7596-1 ekākinīṃ rahaḥ kṣībāṃ labdhvā durlabhayoṣitam /
analyzed: ekākinīm rahaḥ kṣībām labdhvā durlabha yoṣitam

original: MSS_7596-2 aprauḍho'nupabhujyānyadine dūtyārthayeta yaḥ //
analyzed: a prauḍhaḥ ūn upabhujya anya dine dūtyā arthayeta yaḥ

original: MSS_7597-1 vibhūtiṃ rabhasāvāptāṃ yaśca saṃtyajya tatkṣaṇam /
analyzed: vibhūtim rabhasa avāptām yaḥ ca saṃtyajya tad kṣaṇam

original: MSS_7597-2 nītyā kāmayate'nyedyuḥ śocyastābhyāṃ paro'sti kaḥ //
analyzed: nītyā kāmayate nyedyus śocyaḥ tābhyām paraḥ asti kaḥ

original: MSS_7598-1 ekākinī yadabalā taruṇī tathāham asmin gṛhe gṛhapatiśca gato videśam /
analyzed: ekākinī yat abalā taruṇī tathā aham asmin gṛhe gṛhapatiḥ ca gataḥ videśam

original: MSS_7598-2 kiṃ yācase tadiha vāsamiyaṃ varākī śvaśrūrmamāndhabadhirā nanu mūḍha pāntha //
analyzed: kim yācase tat iha vāsam iyam varākī śvaśrūḥ mama andha badhirā nanu mūḍha pāntha

original: MSS_7599-1 ekākinyā mama gṛhamidaṃ yāmiko māmako'ndhaḥ kā me nodetyahaha manasastaskareṇātra bhītiḥ /
analyzed: ekākinyāḥ mama gṛham idam yāmikaḥ māmakaḥ ndhaḥ kā me nā udeti ahaha manasaḥ taskareṇa atra bhītiḥ

original: MSS_7599-2 daivenaivaṃ yadi na sukhitaḥ syāḥ śrameṇa prasuptaḥ pāntha brūmaḥ kimiha sadṛśo naiṣa naiśo nivāsaḥ //
analyzed: daivena evam yadi na sukhitaḥ syāḥ śrameṇa prasuptaḥ pāntha brūmaḥ kim iha sadṛśaḥ nā eṣa naiśaḥ nivāsaḥ

original: MSS_7600-1 ekākī gṛhasaṃtyaktaḥ pāṇipātro digambaraḥ /
analyzed: ekākī gṛha saṃtyaktaḥ pāṇi pātraḥ digambaraḥ

original: MSS_7600-2 so'pi saṃbādhyate loke tṛṣṇayā paśya kautukam //
analyzed: saḥ api saṃbādhyate loke tṛṣṇayā paśya kautukam

original: MSS_7601-1 ekākī cintayen nityaṃ vivikte hitamātmanaḥ /
analyzed: ekākī cintayet nityam vivikte hitam ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_7601-2 ekākī cintayāno hi paraṃ śreyo'dhigacchati //
analyzed: ekākī cintayānaḥ hi param śreyaḥ adhigacchati

original: MSS_7602-1 ekākī niḥspṛhaḥ śāntaḥ pāṇipātro digambaraḥ /
analyzed: ekākī niḥspṛhaḥ śāntaḥ pāṇi pātraḥ digambaraḥ

original: MSS_7602-2 kadā śaṃbho bhaviṣyāmi karmanirmūlanakṣamaḥ //
analyzed: kadā śaṃbho bhaviṣyāmi karma nirmūlana kṣamaḥ

original: MSS_7603-1 ekākṣarapradātāraṃ yo guruṃ naiva manyate /
analyzed: eka akṣara pradātāram yaḥ gurum na eva manyate

original: MSS_7603-2 śvānayoniśataṃ gatvā cāṇḍāleṣvabhijāyate //
analyzed: śvāna yoni śatam gatvā cāṇḍāleṣu abhijāyate

original: MSS_7604-1 ekā gaṅgā prayāge malayaparisare candanaṃ mauktikālī kāntākaṇṭhe himāṃśurviyati sarasi śvetamabjaṃ tathāsyāḥ /
analyzed: ekā gaṅgā prayāge malaya parisare candanam mauktika ālī kāntā kaṇṭhe himāṃśuḥ viyati sarasi śvetam abjam tathā asyāḥ

original: MSS_7604-2 kālindī kālasarpā marakatataralo lāñchanaṃ bhṛṅgamālety evaṃ te yatra kīrtiḥ pariṇamati yutā yatra śatrorakīrtyā //
analyzed: kālindī kālasarpā marakata taralaḥ lāñchanam bhṛṅga mālā iti evam te yatra kīrtiḥ pariṇamati yutā yatra śatroḥ akīrtyā

original: MSS_7605-1 ekāgnikarma havanaṃ tretāyāṃ yacca hūyate /
analyzed: eka agni karma havanam tretāyām yat ca hūyate

original: MSS_7605-2 antarvedyāṃ ca yad dānam iṣṭaṃ tadabhidhīyate //
analyzed: antarvedyām ca yat dānam iṣṭam tat abhidhīyate

original: MSS_7606-1 ekāgraḥ syādavivṛto nityaṃ vivaradarśakaḥ /
analyzed: ekāgraḥ syāt avivṛtaḥ nityam vivara darśakaḥ

original: MSS_7606-2 rājan rājyaṃ sapatneṣu nityodvignaḥ samācaret //
analyzed: rājan rājyam sapatneṣu nitya udvignaḥ samācaret

original: MSS_7607-1 ekāgratātha saṃkalpaḥ snāyuvad varddhanakṣamau /
analyzed: ekāgra tā atha saṃkalpaḥ snāyu vat varddhana kṣamau

original: MSS_7607-2 nityābhyāsaprayogābhyām adhikādhikamṛdhyataḥ //
analyzed: nitya abhyāsa prayogābhyām adhika adhikam ṛdhyataḥ

original: MSS_7608-1 ekāṅghriṃ vinidhāya kāntacaraṇe tajjānudeśe paraṃ līlodañcitamadhyamā karayugeṇāvarjya tatkandharām /
analyzed: eka aṅghrim vinidhāya kānta caraṇe tad jānu deśe param līlā udañcita madhyamā kara yugeṇa āvarjya tad kandharām

original: MSS_7608-2 vakṣas tasya ghanonnatastanabhareṇāpīḍya gāḍhaṃ rasād āsyaṃ dhanyatamasya pūrṇapulakā candrānanā cumbati //
analyzed: vakṣaḥ tasya ghana unnata stana bhareṇa āpīḍya gāḍham rasāt āsyam dhanyatamasya pūrṇa pulakā candra ānanā cumbati

original: MSS_7609-1 ekātapatraṃ jagataḥ prabhutvaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ kāntamidaṃ vapuśca /
analyzed: eka atapatram jagataḥ prabhu tvam navam vayaḥ kāntam idam vapuḥ ca

original: MSS_7609-2 alpasya hetorbahu hātumicchan vicāramūḍhaḥ pratibhāsi me tvam //
analyzed: alpasya hetoḥ bahu hātum icchan vicāra mūḍhaḥ pratibhāsi me tvam

original: MSS_7610-1 ekādaśarudrāṇām ekā gaurītyanaucitīṃ matvā /
analyzed: ekādaśa rudrāṇām ekā gaurī iti anaucitīm matvā

original: MSS_7610-2 rāghava nṛpa tava yaśasā daśāpi gaurīkṛtā haritaḥ //
analyzed: rāghava nṛpa tava yaśasā daśā api gaurī kṛtāḥ haritaḥ

original: MSS_7611-1 ekādaśasthe govinde sarve'pyekādaśe sthitāḥ /
analyzed: ekādaśa sthe govinde sarve api ekādaśe sthitāḥ

original: MSS_7611-2 kiṃ kurvanti grahāḥ sarve śaniraṅgārako raviḥ //
analyzed: kim kurvanti grahāḥ sarve śaniḥ aṅgārakaḥ raviḥ

original: MSS_7612-1 ekādaśākṣarāt pādād ekaikākṣaravardhitaiḥ /
analyzed: ekādaśa akṣarāt pādāt ekaika akṣara vardhitaiḥ

original: MSS_7612-2 khaṇḍairdhruvāḥ ṣoḍaśa syuḥ ṣaḍviṃśatyakṣarāvadhi //
analyzed: khaṇḍaiḥ dhruvāḥ ṣoḍaśa syuḥ ṣaḍviṃśati akṣara avadhi

original: MSS_7613-1 ekānapāṅgairaparāṃs taraṅgair bhruvorvilāsairitaraṃ ca hāsaiḥ /
analyzed: ekān apāṅgaiḥ aparān taraṅgaiḥ bhruvoḥ vilāsaiḥ itaram ca hāsaiḥ

original: MSS_7613-2 vimohayantyanyamaho rahobhiḥ ko vā kalāṃ veda kalāvatīnām //
analyzed: vimohayanti anyam ahar rahobhiḥ kaḥ vā kalām veda kalāvatīnām

original: MSS_7614-1 ekāntamandiragataṃ madanopameyaṃ talpopaviṣṭamatulaṃ ratirūparamyā /
analyzed: ekānta mandira gatam madana upamā iyam talpa upaviṣṭam atulam rati rūpa ramyā

original: MSS_7614-2 bālā cakoranayanā nayanātithiṃ taṃ kṛtvā namadvadanapaṅkajamānanāma //
analyzed: bālā cakora nayanā nayana atithim tam kṛtvā namat vadana paṅkajam ānanāma

original: MSS_7615-1 ekāntaśāntamekaṃ manyante mānavā nivāsākhyam /
analyzed: ekānta śāntam ekam manyante mānavāḥ nivāsa ākhyam

original: MSS_7615-2 ugrasya ca śītasya ca nāśakaraṃ kāryayugmasya //
analyzed: ugrasya ca śītasya ca nāśa karam kārya yugmasya

original: MSS_7616-1 ekāntaśīlasya dṛḍhavratasya sarvendriyaprītinivartakasya /
analyzed: ekānta śīlasya dṛḍha vratasya sarva indriya prīti nivartakasya

original: MSS_7616-2 adhyātmayoge gatamānasasya mokṣo dhruvaṃ nityamahiṃsakasya //
analyzed: adhyātma yoge gata mānasasya mokṣaḥ dhruvam nityam ahiṃsakasya

original: MSS_7617-1 ekāntasundaravidhānajaḍaḥ kva vedhāḥ sarvāṅgakānticaturaṃ kva ca rūpamasyāḥ /
analyzed: ekānta sundara vidhāna jaḍaḥ kva vedhāḥ sarva aṅga kānti caturam kva ca rūpam asyāḥ

original: MSS_7617-2 manye maheśvarabhayānmakaradhvajena prāṇārthinā yuvatirūpamidaṃ gṛhītam //
analyzed: manye maheśvara bhayāt makaradhvajena prāṇa arthinā yuvati rūpam idam gṛhītam

original: MSS_7618-1 ekāntena hi sarveṣāṃ na śakyaṃ tāta rocitum /
analyzed: ekāntena hi sarveṣām na śakyam tāta rocitum

original: MSS_7618-2 mitrāmitramatho madhyaṃ sarvabhūteṣu bhārata //
analyzed: mitra amitram atho madhyam sarva bhūteṣu bhārata

original: MSS_7619-1 ekānte vanato gṛhaṃ śaśimukho'pyanyādṛśo dṛśyate kṣipraṃ sādhaya yātu putri sudine bhuktvānyamāvāsakam /
analyzed: ekānte vanataḥ gṛham śaśi mukhaḥ upi anyādṛśaḥ dṛśyate kṣipram sādhaya yātu putri sudine bhuktvā ani amāvāsakam

original: MSS_7619-2 śvaśrvā saṃbhramitā kileti bahuśaḥ saṃprerayantyā vadhūḥ pānthaṃ vīkṣya babhañja sasmitamukhī saivārdhasiddhaudanam //
analyzed: śvaśrvā saṃbhramitā kila iti bahuśas saṃprerayantyā vadhūḥ pāntham vīkṣya babhañja sa smita mukhī sā eva ardha siddhaudanam

original: MSS_7620-1 ekānte vijane deśe pavitre nirupadrave /
analyzed: ekānte vijane deśe pavitre nirupadrave

original: MSS_7620-2 kambalājinavastrāṇām uparyāsanamabhyaset //
analyzed: kambala ajina vastrāṇām upari āsanam abhyaset

original: MSS_7621-1 ekānte vijane ramye pavitre nirupadrave /
analyzed: ekānte vijane ramye pavitre nirupadrave

original: MSS_7621-2 sukhāsane samādhiḥ syād vastrājinakuśottare //
analyzed: sukha āsane samādhiḥ syāt vastra ajina kuśa uttare

original: MSS_7622-1 ekānte sukhamāsyatā paratare cetaḥ samādhīyatāṃ prāṇātmā susamīkṣyatāṃ jagadidaṃ tadvyāpitaṃ dṛśyatām /
analyzed: ekānte sukham āsyatā paratare cetaḥ samādhīyatām prāṇa ātmā su samīkṣyatām jagat idam tat vyāpitam dṛśyatām

original: MSS_7622-2 prākkarma pravilopyatāṃ citibalān nāpyuttare śliṣyatāṃ prārabdhaṃ tviha bhujyatāmatha parabrahmātmanāsthīyatām //
analyzed: prāk karma pravilopyatām citi balāt na api uttare śliṣyatām prārabdham tu iha bhujyatām atha para brahma ātmanā āsthīyatām

original: MSS_7623-1 ekāpavargasamaye jagato'pavargaḥ sarvāpavargasamaye punarastaśaṅkaḥ /
analyzed: eka apavarga samaye jagatā upavargaḥ sarva apavarga samaye punar asta śaṅkaḥ

original: MSS_7623-2 īdṛgvidhaṃ kamapi pakṣamihāvalambya sthātuṃ sukhaṃ kṣamamanena pathā pravṛttaiḥ //
analyzed: īdṛgvidham kam api pakṣam iha avalambya sthātum sukham kṣamam anena pathā pravṛttaiḥ

original: MSS_7624-1 ekāpi pañcaśāntā tārā vāñchāptaye śubhāsīnā /
analyzed: ekā api pañca śāntā tārā vāñchā āptaye śubha āsīnā

original: MSS_7624-2 lābha ubhābhyāmadhikas tisro rājyāya yātrāyām //
analyzed: lābhaḥ ubhābhyām adhikaḥ tisraḥ rājyāya yātrāyām

original: MSS_7625-1 ekā prasūyate mātā dvitīyā vāk prasūyate /
analyzed: ekā prasūyate mātā dvitīyā vāc prasūyate

original: MSS_7625-2 vāgjātamadhikaṃ procuḥ sodaryādapi bāndhavāt //
analyzed: vāc jātam adhikam procuḥ sodaryāt api bāndhavāt

original: MSS_7626-1 ekā bhāryā trayaḥ putrā dvau halau daśa dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: ekā bhāryā trayaḥ putrāḥ dvau halau daśa dhenavaḥ

original: MSS_7626-2 kalpakālāvasāne'pi na te yāsyanti vikriyām //
analyzed: kalpa kāla avasāne pi na te yāsyanti vikriyām

original: MSS_7627-1 ekā bhāryā trayaḥ putrā dvau halau daśa dhenavaḥ /
analyzed: ekā bhāryā trayaḥ putrāḥ dvau halau daśa dhenavaḥ

original: MSS_7627-2 grāmevāsaḥ purāsatraiḥ svargādapi manoharaḥ //
analyzed: grāmevāsaḥ purā satraiḥ svargāt api manoharaḥ

original: MSS_7628-1 ekā bhāryā prakṛtimukharā cañcalā ca dvitīyā putrastveko bhuvanavijayī manmatho durnivāraḥ /
analyzed: ekā bhāryā prakṛti mukharā cañcalā ca dvitīyā putraḥ tu ekaḥ bhuvana vijayī manmathaḥ durnivāraḥ

original: MSS_7628-2 śeṣaḥ śayyā śayanamudadhau vāhanaṃ pannagāriḥ smāraṃ smāraṃ svagṛhacaritaṃ dārubhūto murāriḥ //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ śayyā śayanam udadhau vāhanam pannaga ariḥ smāram smāram sva gṛha caritam dāru bhūtaḥ murāriḥ

original: MSS_7629-1 ekābhūt kusumāyudheṣudhiriva pravyaktapuṅkhāvalī jeturmaṅgalapālikeva pulakairanyā kapolasthalī /
analyzed: ekā abhūt kusumāyudha iṣudhiḥ iva pravyakta puṅkha āvalī jetuḥ maṅgala pālikā iva pulakaiḥ anyā kapola sthalī

original: MSS_7629-2 lolākṣīṃ kṣaṇamātrabhāvivirahakleśāsahāṃ paśyato drāgākarṇayataśca vīra bhavataḥ prauḍhāhavāḍambaram //
analyzed: lola akṣīm kṣaṇa mātra bhāvi viraha kleśa asahām paśyataḥ drāk ākarṇayataḥ ca vīra bhavataḥ prauḍha āhava āḍambaram

original: MSS_7630-1 ekā bhūrubhayoraikyam ubhayordalakāṇḍayoḥ /
analyzed: ekā bhūḥ ubhayoḥ aikyam ubhayoḥ dala kāṇḍayoḥ

original: MSS_7630-2 śāliśyāmākayorbhedaḥ phalena paricīyate //
analyzed: śāli śyāmākayoḥ bhedaḥ phalena paricīyate

original: MSS_7631-1 ekāmadhītya vidyāṃ bibheti bahuvidyapariṣadaṃ prāptaḥ /
analyzed: ekām adhītya vidyām bibheti bahu vidya pariṣadam prāptaḥ

original: MSS_7631-2 kvāsannaśastranikaraḥ kutraikaśaraḥ punaḥ puruṣaḥ //
analyzed: kva āsanna śastra nikaraḥ kutra eka śaraḥ punar puruṣaḥ

original: MSS_7632-1 ekāmiṣaprabhavameva sahodarāṇām ujjṛmbhate jagati vairamiti prasiddham /
analyzed: eka āmiṣa prabhavam eva sahodarāṇām ujjṛmbhate jagati vairam iti prasiddham

original: MSS_7632-2 pṛthvīnimittamabhavat kurupāṇḍavānāṃ tīvras tathā hi bhuvanakṣayakṛd virodhaḥ //
analyzed: pṛthvī nimittam abhavat kuru pāṇḍavānām tīvraḥ tathā hi bhuvana kṣaya kṛt virodhaḥ

original: MSS_7633-1 ekāmiṣābhilāṣo hi bījaṃ vairamahātaroḥ /
analyzed: eka āmiṣa abhilāṣaḥ hi bījam vaira mahā taroḥ

original: MSS_7633-2 tilottamābhilāṣo hi yathā sundopasundayoḥ //
analyzed: tilottamā abhilāṣaḥ hi yathā sunda upasundayoḥ

original: MSS_7634-1 ekāmbhodhīkṛtāyāṃ bhuvi jagadakhilaṃ nirjanīkṛtya khelan devaḥ kālīsahāyaḥ prasabhaviharaṇonmuktalīlāṭṭahāsaḥ /
analyzed: eka ambhodhīkṛtāyām bhuvi jagat akhilam nirjanīkṛtya khelan devaḥ kālī sahāyaḥ prasabha viharaṇa unmukta līlā aṭṭahāsaḥ

original: MSS_7634-2 sadyo daṃṣṭrāṃśubhinne tamasi nijavapurbimbamālokya kastvaṃ kastvaṃ brūhīti kopādabhidadhadabhayaṃ bhairavaśceṣṭatāṃ vaḥ //
analyzed: sadyas daṃṣṭra aṃśu bhinne tamasi nija vapuḥ bimbam ālokya kaḥ tvam kaḥ tvam brūhi iti kopāt abhidadhat abhayam bhairavaḥ ceṣṭatām vaḥ

original: MSS_7635-1 ekārimitrayoścet parasparaṃ bhūpayorbhedaḥ /
analyzed: eka ari mitrayoḥ ced parasparam bhūpayoḥ bhedaḥ

original: MSS_7635-2 tadupari pariṇatanītiḥ sukhamabhiyogaṃ karotu gatabhītiḥ //
analyzed: tad upari pariṇata nītiḥ sukham abhiyogam karotu gata bhītiḥ

original: MSS_7636-1 ekāraukārayuktā hariharijaharāḥ pañca bāṇāḥ smarasya khyātā lakṣyāṇyamīṣāṃ hṛdayakucadṛśo mūrdhni guhye krameṇa /
analyzed: ekāra aukāra yuktāḥ pañca bāṇāḥ smarasya khyātāḥ lakṣyāṇi amīṣām hṛdaya kuca dṛśaḥ mūrdhni guhye krameṇa

original: MSS_7636-2 marmasveteṣu bhūyo nijanayanadhanuḥpreritaistaiḥ patadbhiḥ syandante sundarīṇāṃ jvaladanalanibhairbindavaḥ kāmavārām //
analyzed: marmasu eteṣu bhūyas nija nayana dhanuḥ preritaiḥ taiḥ patadbhiḥ syandante sundarīṇām jvalat anala nibhaiḥ bindavaḥ kāma vārām

original: MSS_7637-1 ekārthāṃ samyaguddiśya yātrāṃ yatra hi gacchataḥ /
analyzed: eka arthām samyak uddiśya yātrām yatra hi gacchataḥ

original: MSS_7637-2 ya saṃhataprayāṇastu sandhiḥ saṃyoga ucyate //
analyzed: saṃhata prayāṇaḥ tu sandhiḥ saṃyogaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_7638-1 ekārthābhiniveśitvam arilakṣaṇamucyate /
analyzed: eka artha abhiniveśi tvam ari lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: MSS_7638-2 dāruṇas tu smṛtaḥ śatrur vijigīṣuguṇānvitaḥ //
analyzed: dāruṇaḥ tu smṛtaḥ śatruḥ vijigīṣu guṇa anvitaḥ

original: MSS_7639-1 ekāvalīkalitamauktikakaitavena kasyāścidunnatapayodharayugmasevām /
analyzed: eka āvalī kalita mauktika kaitavena kasyāścid unnata payodhara yugma sevām

original: MSS_7639-2 cakrurmanāṃsi yamināmatinirmalāni kaṃdarpamuktaśarapātakṛtāntarāṇi //
analyzed: cakruḥ manāṃsi yaminām ati nirmalāni kaṃdarpa mukta śara pāta kṛta āntarāṇi

original: MSS_7640-1 ekāvasthitirastu vaḥ puramurapradveṣiṇordevayoḥ prāleyāñjanaśailaśṛṅgasubhagacchāyāṅgayoḥ śreyase /
analyzed: ekā avasthitiḥ astu vaḥ pura mura pradveṣiṇoḥ devayoḥ prāleya añjana śaila śṛṅga subhaga chāyā aṅgayoḥ śreyase

original: MSS_7640-2 tārkṣyatrāsavihastapannagaphaṭā yasyāṃ jaṭāpālayo bālendudyutikośasuptajalajo yasyāṃ ca nābhīhradaḥ //
analyzed: tārkṣya trāsa vihasta pannaga phaṭāḥ yasyām jaṭāpālayaḥ bāla indu dyuti kośa supta jalajaḥ yasyām ca nābhī hradaḥ

original: MSS_7641-1 ekā vā dugdhikā tumbī śaṅkhapuṣpī jaṭā dhṛtā /
analyzed: ekā vā dugdhikā tumbī śaṅkhapuṣpī jaṭā dhṛtā

original: MSS_7641-2 kaṇṭhadantodbhavā bhūtavedanāharaṇakṣamā //
MSS_7642-1 ekāsanasthā jalavāyubhakṣā mumukṣavas tyaktaparigrahāśca /
analyzed: eka āsana sthāḥ jala vāyu bhakṣāḥ mumukṣavaḥ tyakta parigrahāḥ ca

original: MSS_7642-2 pṛcchanti te'pyambaracāricāraṃ daivajñamanye kimutārthacittāḥ //
analyzed: pṛcchanti te api ambara cāri cāram daivajñam anye kim uta artha cittāḥ

original: MSS_7643-1 ekāhaṃ japahīnastu sandhyāhīno dinatrayam /
analyzed: eka aham japa hīnaḥ tu sandhyā hīnaḥ dina trayam

original: MSS_7643-2 dvādaśāhamanagnistu śūdra eva na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: dvādaśa aham anagniḥ tu śūdraḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: MSS_7644-1 ekāhaniṣpannamahāprabandhaḥ śrīsiddharājapratipannabandhuḥ /
MSS_7644-2 śrīpālanāmā kavicakravarttī praśastimetāmakarot praśastām //
analyzed: śrīpāla nāmā kavi cakravarttī praśastim etām akarot praśastām

original: MSS_7645-1 ekāhamapi kaunteya bhūyiṣṭhamudakaṃ kuru /
analyzed: eka aham api kaunteya bhūyiṣṭham udakam kuru

original: MSS_7645-2 kulaṃ tārayate tāta sapta sapta ca sapta ca //
analyzed: kulam tārayate tāta sapta sapta ca sapta ca

original: MSS_7646-1 ekāhāreṇa saṃtuṣṭaḥ ṣaṭkarmanirataḥ sadā /
analyzed: ekāhāreṇa saṃtuṣṭaḥ ṣaṭkarma nirataḥ sadā

original: MSS_7646-2 ṛtukālābhigāmī ca sa vipro dvija ucyate //
analyzed: ṛtu kāla abhigāmī ca sa vipraḥ dvijaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_7647-1 ekikeva nijavṛndamadhyagāpy uccukūja sabhayaṃ sitacchadī /
analyzed: ekikā iva nija vṛnda madhya gā api uccukūja sa bhayam sitacchadī

original: MSS_7647-2 dantamūlamasakṛcca saṃśayād āmamarśa kariṇaḥ kareṇukā //
analyzed: danta mūlam asakṛt ca saṃśayāt āmamarśa kariṇaḥ kareṇukā

original: MSS_7648-1 ekīkṛtastvaci niṣikta ivāvapīḍya nirbhugnapīnakucakuḍmalayānayā me /
analyzed: ekīkṛtaḥ tvaci niṣiktaḥ iva avapīḍya nirbhugna pīna kuca kuḍmalayā anayā me

original: MSS_7648-2 karpūrahāraharicandanacandrakānta- niṣyandaśaivalamṛṇālahimādivargaḥ //
MSS_7649-1 ekīkṛtya kimoṣadhīpatirasairākāśabhāṇḍodare phullatpaṅkajinījanāmbujamukhadhmātaiḥ samantān muhuḥ /
analyzed: ekīkṛtya kim oṣadhīpati rasaiḥ ākāśa bhāṇḍa udare phullat paṅkajinī jana ambuja mukha dhmātaiḥ samantāt muhur

original: MSS_7649-2 kāṣṭhotthāruṇadīptivahnipaṭalairātāpya samyag bhṛśaṃ tārāpāradamāraṇaṃ vitanute vaidyo'navadyo raviḥ //
analyzed: kāṣṭha uttha aruṇa dīpti vahni paṭalaiḥ ātāpya samyak bhṛśam tārā pārada māraṇam vitanute vaidyaḥ navadyaḥ raviḥ

original: MSS_7650-1 ekībhāvaṃ gatayor jalapayasormitracetasoścaiva /
analyzed: ekībhāvam gatayoḥ jala payasoḥ mitra cetasoḥ ca eva

original: MSS_7650-2 vyatirekakṛtau śaktir haṃsānāṃ durjanānāṃ ca //
analyzed: vyatireka kṛtau śaktiḥ haṃsānām durjanānām ca

original: MSS_7651-1 ekībhūya sphuṭamiva kimapyācaradbhiḥ pralīnair ebhirbhūtaiḥ smara kati kṛtāḥ svānta te vipralambhāḥ /
analyzed: ekībhūya sphuṭam iva kim api ācaradbhiḥ pralīnaiḥ ebhiḥ bhūtaiḥ smara kati kṛtāḥ svānta te vipralambhāḥ

original: MSS_7651-2 tasmādeṣāṃ tyaja paricayaṃ cintaya svavyavasthām ābhāṣaste kimu na viditaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ paṇḍitaḥ syāt //
analyzed: tasmāt eṣām tyaja paricayam cintaya sva vyavasthām ābhāṣaḥ te kimu na viditaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ paṇḍitaḥ syāt

original: MSS_7652-1 eke kuṭīrakoṇe'pi na lakṣyante sthitāḥ kvacit /
analyzed: eke kuṭīra koṇe api na lakṣyante sthitāḥ kvacid

original: MSS_7652-2 anyeṣāṃ vibhavasyaitad brahmāṇḍamapi saṃkaṭam //
analyzed: anyeṣām vibhavasya etat brahmāṇḍam api saṃkaṭam

original: MSS_7653-1 eke kecit yatikaragatāḥ pātrasaṃjñāṃ labhante gāyantyanye sarasamadhuraṃ vīṇayā saṃprayuktāḥ /
analyzed: eke kecid yati kara gatāḥ pātra saṃjñām labhante gāyanti anye sarasa madhuram vīṇayā saṃprayuktāḥ

analyzed: eke teṣām sahagati vaśāt dustaram tārayanti kecid teṣām jvalita hṛdayāḥ raktam eva āpibanti

original: MSS_7655-1 eke'dya prātarapare paścādanye punaḥ pare /
analyzed: ekedya prātar apare paścāt anye punar pare

original: MSS_7655-2 sarve niḥsīmni saṃsāre yānti kaḥ kena śocyate //
analyzed: sarve niḥsīmni saṃsāre yānti kaḥ kena śocyate

original: MSS_7656-1 ekena kenacidanarghamaṇiprabheṇa kāvyaṃ camatkṛtipadena vinā suvarṇam /

original: MSS_7656-2 nirdoṣaleśamapi rohati kasya citte lāvaṇyahīnamiva yauvanamaṅganānām //
analyzed: nirdoṣa leśam api rohati kasya citte lāvaṇya hīnam iva yauvanam aṅganānām

original: MSS_7657-1 ekena kenāpi guṇena nīco'py uccaiḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate jagatsu /

analyzed: ekena culukena abdhiḥ nipītaḥ kumbhayoninā

analyzed: tasya udaya itas kāluṣyam tyajanti āpaḥ bhayāt iva

original: MSS_7659-1 ekena cūrṇakuntalam apareṇa kareṇa cibukamunnamayan /
analyzed: ekena cūrṇakuntalam apareṇa kareṇa cibukam unnamayan

original: MSS_7659-2 paśyāmi bāṣpadhauta- śruti nagaradvāri tadvadanam //
analyzed: paśyāmi nagara dvāri tad vadanam

original: MSS_7660-1 ekena cet parihṛto'si maheśvareṇa kiṃ khedamāvahasi ketaka nirguṇo'sau /
analyzed: ekena ced parihṛtaḥ asi maheśvareṇa kim khedam āvahasi ketaka nirguṇaḥ asau

analyzed: ekena tiṣṭhatā adhastāt anyena upari tiṣṭhatā

original: MSS_7661-2 dātṛyācakayorbhedaḥ karābhyāmeva sūcitaḥ //
analyzed: dātṛ yācakayoḥ bhedaḥ karābhyām eva sūcitaḥ

original: MSS_7662-1 ekena priyasākṣiṇā jitavatī vīṇāṃ vacobhirnijair gatyā mandira eva viśvagamanaṃ haṃsaṃ jigāyācirāt /

original: MSS_7664-2 jñātvādho dhanamasyāsti khananti niśi rāgiṇaḥ //

original: MSS_7665-1 ekena śuṣkavṛkṣeṇa dahyamānena vahninā /

original: MSS_7666-1 ekena saṃdhiḥ kalaho'pareṇa kāryo'bhito vā prasamīkṣya vṛddhim /
analyzed: ekena saṃdhiḥ kalaha upareṇa kāryaḥ ubhitas vā prasamīkṣya vṛddhim

original: MSS_7667-1 ekena smitapāṭalādhararuco jalpantyanalpākṣaraṃ vīkṣante'nyamitaḥ sphuṭatkumudinīphullollasallocanāḥ /

analyzed: dūra udāra caritra citra vibhavam dhyāyanti ca anyam dhiyā kena ittham paramārtha torthavat iva premā asti vāma bhruvām

original: MSS_7668-2 ekenāṃśena kāmārtha ekamaṃśaṃ vivardhayet //
analyzed: ekena aṃśena kāma arthaḥ ekam aṃśam vivardhayet

original: MSS_7669-1 ekenākṣṇā paritataruṣā vīkṣate vyomasaṃsthaṃ bhānorbimbaṃ sajalalulitenāpareṇātmakāntam /

original: MSS_7670-1 ekenāpāti lattā pativapuṣi pareṇāpi pītaḥ pitā te bhrātānyenāpi śaptastribhuvanatalato'nyena nirvāsitāsi /
analyzed: ekena apāti lattā pati vapuṣi pareṇa api pītaḥ pitā te bhrātā anyena api śaptaḥ tribhuvana talataḥ anyena nirvāsitā asi

original: MSS_7671-1 ekenāpāti lattā pativapuṣi pareṇāpi pīto'sti tāto bhrātā śaptaḥ pareṇa tribhuvanatalato'nyena niṣkāsitāsi /

original: MSS_7671-2 channaṃ gehaṃ pareṇā'kali ca tadapareṇāsti sāpatnyaśīlā tasmānnityaṃ dvijebhyo madhuripumahile tvaṃ viyuktāsi manye //

original: MSS_7672-1 ekenāpi guṇavatā jātiviśuddhena cārukṛtyena /

original: MSS_7672-2 svakulamalaṃkṛtamakhilaṃ mukuṭaṃ muktāphaleneva //
analyzed: sva kulam alaṃkṛtam akhilam mukuṭam muktāphalena iva

original: MSS_7673-2 kulaṃ puruṣasiṃhena candreṇeva prakāśyate //

original: MSS_7674-1 ekenāpi guṇenarddho labhate spṛhaṇīyatām /

original: MSS_7675-2 kalābhṛttyena ruciraś candro doṣākaro'pi san //
analyzed: kalā bhṛttyena ruciraḥ candraḥ san

original: MSS_7676-2 āho śuṣyati daivadṛṣṭivalanādambhobhirambhomucaḥ saṃbhūyāpi vidhātumasya rajasi staimityamapyakṣamāḥ //

original: MSS_7677-1 ekenāpi vinītena sutenoddhriyate kulam /

original: MSS_7677-2 gaṅgāvatāraṇāpāraprathaṃ paśya bhagīratham //
analyzed: gaṅgā avatāraṇā pāra pratham paśya bhagīratham

original: MSS_7678-1 ekenāpi sudhīreṇa sotsāhena raṇaṃ prati /

original: MSS_7678-2 sotsāhaṃ jāyate sainyaṃ bhagne bhaṅgamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: sa utsāham jāyate sainyam bhagne bhaṅgam avāpnuyāt

original: MSS_7679-1 ata eva hi vāñchanti bhūpā yodhān mahābalān /
analyzed: atas eva hi vāñchanti bhūpāḥ yodhān mahā balān

original: MSS_7679-2 śūrān dhīrān kṛtotsāhān varjayanti ca kātarān //
analyzed: śūrān dhīrān kṛta utsāhān varjayanti ca kātarān

original: MSS_7680-1 ekenāpi suputreṇa jāyamānena satkulam /

original: MSS_7680-2 śaśinā caiva gaganaṃ sarvadaivojjvalīkṛtam //

original: MSS_7681-1 ekenāpi suputreṇa vidyāyuktena sādhunā /
analyzed: ekena api su putreṇa vidyā yuktena sādhunā

original: MSS_7681-2 āhlāditaṃ kulaṃ sarvaṃ yathā candreṇa śarvarī //
analyzed: āhlāditam kulam sarvam yathā candreṇa śarvarī

original: MSS_7682-1 ekenāpi suputreṇa vidyāyuktena sādhunā /
analyzed: ekena api su putreṇa vidyā yuktena sādhunā

original: MSS_7682-2 kulamujjvalatāṃ yāti candreṇa gaganaṃ yathā //
analyzed: kulam ujjvala tām yāti candreṇa gaganam yathā

original: MSS_7683-1 ekenāpi suputreṇa siṃhī svapiti nirbhayam /
analyzed: ekena api su putreṇa siṃhī svapiti nirbhayam

original: MSS_7683-2 sahaiva daśabhiḥ putrair bhāraṃ vahati gardabhī //
analyzed: saha eva daśabhiḥ putraiḥ bhāram vahati gardabhī

original: MSS_7684-1 ekenāpi suvṛkṣeṇa puṣpitena sugandhinā /
analyzed: ekena api su vṛkṣeṇa puṣpitena su gandhinā

original: MSS_7684-2 vāsitaṃ tadvanaṃ sarvaṃ suputreṇa kulaṃ yathā //
analyzed: vāsitam tat vanam sarvam su putreṇa kulam yathā

original: MSS_7685-1 ekenāpi hi śūreṇa pādākrāntaṃ mahītalam /
analyzed: ekena api hi śūreṇa pāda ākrāntam mahī talam

original: MSS_7685-2 kriyate bhāskareṇeva sphārasphuritatejasā //
analyzed: kriyate bhāskareṇa iva sphāra sphurita tejasā

original: MSS_7686-1 ekenaiva cirāya kṛṣṇa bhavatā govardhano'yaṃ dhṛtaḥ śrānto'si kṣaṇamāssva sāṃpratamamī sarve vayaṃ dadhmahe /
analyzed: ekena eva cirāya kṛṣṇa bhavatā govardhanaḥ yam dhṛtaḥ śrāntaḥ asi kṣaṇam āssva sāṃpratam amī sarve vayam dadhmahe

original: MSS_7686-2 ityullāsitadoṣṇi gopanivahe kiṃcid bhujākuṇcana- nyañcacchailabharārdite viramati smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: iti ullāsita   gopa nivahe kiṃcid bhuja ākuṇcana nyañcat śaila bhara ardite viramati smeraḥ hariḥ pātu vaḥ

original: MSS_7687-1 ekenaiva hi kaścid guṇena jagati prasiddhimupayāti /
analyzed: ekena eva hi kaścid guṇena jagati prasiddhim upayāti

original: MSS_7687-2 ekena kareṇa gajaḥ karī na sūryaḥ sahasreṇa //
analyzed: ekena kareṇa gajaḥ karī na sūryaḥ sahasreṇa

original: MSS_7688-1 ekenoddhṛtya khaṅgaṃ hṛdi patitamiṣuṃ pāṇinaikena bhañjan bhrūbhedālaṃkṛtāsyaḥ sarabhasanayanaḥ spaṣṭadaṣṭādharoṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: ekena uddhṛtya khaṅgam hṛdi patitam iṣum pāṇinā ekena bhañjan bhrū bheda alaṃkṛta āsyaḥ sarabhasa nayanaḥ spaṣṭa daṣṭa adhara uṣṭhaḥ

original: MSS_7688-2 bhītaiḥ kravyādavṛndairanupahatatanuḥ kuñjarendropadhānaḥ śete yodhapradhāno yadi maraṇamidaṃ labhyate kiṃ jayena //
analyzed: bhītaiḥ kravyāda vṛndaiḥ anupahata tanuḥ kuñjara indra upadhānaḥ śete yodha pradhānaḥ yadi maraṇam idam labhyate kim jayena

original: MSS_7689-1 ekeyaṃ rasanā na śabdamabhajad bheje'nuvāraṃ parā netraṃ kiṃcidanūrusaṅgamabhavajjātorusaṅgaṃ param /
analyzed: ekā iyam rasanā na śabdam abhajat parā netram kiṃcid anūru saṅgam abhavat jāta ūrusaṅgam param

original: MSS_7689-2 rāgaḥ kaścana nirjagāma hṛdayāt tasthau tathaivāparo bāhye satpulako'ntare vipulako jāto'ṅkabhūsaṃbhramaḥ //
analyzed: rāgaḥ kaścana nirjagāma hṛdayāt tasthau tathā eva aparaḥ bāhye vipulakaḥ jāta uṅka bhū saṃbhramaḥ

original: MSS_7690-1 eke vārinidhau praveśamapare lokāntarālokanaṃ kecit pāvakayogitāṃ nijagaduḥ kṣīṇe'hni caṇḍārciṣaḥ /
analyzed: eke vārinidhau praveśam apare loka antara ālokanam kecid pāvaka yogi tām nijagaduḥ kṣīṇa ihni caṇḍa arciṣaḥ

original: MSS_7690-2 mithyā caitadasākṣikaṃ priyasakhi pratyakṣatīvrātapaṃ manye'haṃ punaradhvanīnaramaṇīceto'dhiśete raviḥ //
analyzed: mithyā ca etat asākṣikam priya sakhi pratyakṣa tīvra ātapam manye ham punar adhvanīna ramaṇī cetaḥ adhiśete raviḥ

original: MSS_7691-1 ekeṣāṃ vāci śukavad anyeṣāṃ hṛdi mūkavat /
analyzed: ekeṣām vāci śuka vat anyeṣām hṛdi mūka vat

original: MSS_7691-2 hṛdi vāci tathānyeṣāṃ valgu valganti sūktayaḥ //
analyzed: hṛdi vāci tathā anyeṣām valgu valganti su uktayaḥ

original: MSS_7692-1 eke satpuruṣāḥ parārthaghaṭakāḥ svārthaṃ parityajya ye sāmānyāstu parārthamudyamabhṛtaḥ svārthāvirodhena ye /
analyzed: eke sat puruṣāḥ para artha ghaṭakāḥ sva artham parityajya ye sāmānyāḥ tu para artham udyama bhṛtaḥ sva artha avirodhena ye

original: MSS_7692-2 te'mī mānuṣarākṣasāḥ parahitaṃ svārthāya nighnanti ye ye tu ghnanti nirarthakaṃ parahitaṃ te ke na jāmīmahe //
analyzed: temī mānuṣa rākṣasāḥ para hitam sva arthāya nighnanti ye ye tu ghnanti nirarthakam para hitam te ke na jāmīmahe

original: MSS_7693-1 ekaikamakṣaviṣayaṃ bhajatāmamīṣāṃ saṃpadyate yadi kṛtāntagṛhātithitvam /
analyzed: ekaikam akṣa viṣayam bhajatām amīṣām saṃpadyate yadi kṛtānta gṛha atithi tvam

original: MSS_7693-2 pañcākṣagocararatasya kimasti vācyam akṣārthamityamaladhīradhiyas tyajanti //
analyzed: pañcākṣa gocara ratasya kim asti vācyam akṣa artham iti amala dhīra dhiyaḥ tyajanti

original: MSS_7694-1 ekaikaśo'pi nighnanti viṣayā viṣasaṃnibhāḥ /
analyzed: ekaikaśas api nighnanti viṣayāḥ viṣa saṃnibhāḥ

original: MSS_7694-2 kṣemī tu sa kathaṃ nu syād yaḥ samaṃ pañca sevate //
analyzed: kṣemī tu sa katham nu syāt yaḥ samam pañca sevate

original: MSS_7695-1 ekaikaśo yuvajanaṃ vilaṅghamānākṣanikaramiva taralā /
analyzed: ekaikaśas yuva janam vilaṅghamānā akṣa nikaram iva taralā

original: MSS_7695-2 viśrāmyati subhaga tvām aṅgulirāsādya merumiva //
analyzed: viśrāmyati subhaga tvām aṅguliḥ āsādya merum iva

original: MSS_7696-1 ekaikaśo vinighnanti viṣayā viṣasaṃnibhāḥ /
analyzed: ekaikaśas vinighnanti viṣayāḥ viṣa saṃnibhāḥ

original: MSS_7696-2 kiṃ punaḥ pañca militāḥ na kathaṃ nāśayanti hi //
analyzed: kim punar pañca militāḥ na katham nāśayanti hi

original: MSS_7697-1 ekaikasya yadādāya puṣpasya madhu saṃcitam /
analyzed: ekaikasya yat ādāya puṣpasya madhu saṃcitam

original: MSS_7697-2 kiṃcin madhukarīvargais tadapyaśnanti nirghṛṇāḥ //
analyzed: kiṃcid madhukarī vargaiḥ tat api aśnanti nirghṛṇāḥ

original: MSS_7698-1 ekaikasya śarasyaiva catuṣpakṣāṇi yojayet /
analyzed: ekaikasya śarasya eva catuṣpakṣāṇi yojayet

original: MSS_7698-2 ṣaḍaṅgulapramāṇena pakṣacchedaṃ ca kārayet //
analyzed: ṣaṣ aṅgula pramāṇena pakṣacchedam ca kārayet

original: MSS_7699-1 ekaikasyopakārasya prāṇān dāsyāmi te kape /
analyzed: ekaikasya upakārasya prāṇān dāsyāmi te kape

original: MSS_7699-2 pratyahaṃ kriyamāṇasya śeṣasya ṛṇino vayam //
analyzed: pratyaham kriyamāṇasya śeṣasya ṛṇinaḥ vayam

original: MSS_7700-1 ekaikātiśayālavaḥ paraguṇajñānaikavaijñānikāḥ santyete dhanikāḥ kalāsu sakalāsvācāryacaryācaṇāḥ /
analyzed: ekaika atiśayālavaḥ para guṇa jñāna eka vaijñānikāḥ santi ete dhanikāḥ kalāsu sakalāsu ācārya caryā caṇāḥ

original: MSS_7700-2 apyete sumanogirāṃ niśamanād bibhyatyaho ślāghayā dhūte mūrdhani kuṇḍale kaṣaṇataḥ kṣīṇe bhavetāmiti //
analyzed: api ete sumanaḥ girām niśamanāt bibhyati aho ślāghayā dhūte mūrdhani kuṇḍale kaṣaṇataḥ kṣīṇe bhavetām iti

original: MSS_7701-1 ekaiko'saṃkhyajīvānāṃ ghātato madhunaḥ kaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ghātataḥ madhunaḥ kaṇaḥ

original: MSS_7701-2 niṣpadyate yatastena madhvaśnāti kathaṃ budhaḥ //
analyzed: niṣpadyate yatas tena madhu aśnāti katham budhaḥ

original: MSS_7702-1 ekaiva kavitā puṃsāṃ grāmāyāśvāya hastine /
analyzed: ekā eva kavi tā puṃsām grāmāya aśvāya hastine

original: MSS_7702-2 antato'nnāya vastrāya tāmbūlāya ca kalpate //
analyzed: vastrāya tāmbūlāya ca kalpate

original: MSS_7703-1 ekaiva kācin mahatāmavasthā sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇyathavā ca kanthā /
analyzed: ekā eva kācid mahatām avasthā sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi athavā ca kanthā

original: MSS_7703-2 karāgralagnābhinavā ca bālā gaṅgātaraṅgeṣvathavākṣamālā //
analyzed: kara agra lagnā abhinavā ca bālā gaṅgā taraṅgeṣu athavā akṣamālā

original: MSS_7704-1 ekaiva daṇḍanītis tu vidyetyauśanasāḥ sthitāḥ /
analyzed: ekā eva daṇḍanītiḥ tu vidyā iti auśanasāḥ sthitāḥ

original: MSS_7704-2 tasyāṃ hi sarvavidyānām ārambhāḥ saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ //
analyzed: tasyām hi sarva vidyānām ārambhāḥ saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: MSS_7705-1 ekaiva saṃgame bālā viyoge tanmayaṃ jagat /
analyzed: ekā eva saṃgame bālā viyoge tad mayam jagat

original: MSS_7705-2 kṛtopakāra evāyaṃ viyogaḥ kena nindyate //
analyzed: kṛta upakāraḥ eva ayam viyogaḥ kena nindyate

original: MSS_7706-1 ekaiva sāmṛtamayī sutarāmanarghyā kāpyastyasau himakarasya kalā yayaiva /
analyzed: ekā eva sa amṛta mayī sutarām anarghyā kā api asti asau himakarasya kalā yayā eva

original: MSS_7706-2 āropito guṇavidā parameśvareṇa cūḍāmaṇau na gaṇito'sya kalaṅkadoṣaḥ //
analyzed: āropitaḥ guṇa vidā parameśvareṇa cūḍāmaṇau na gaṇitaḥ asya kalaṅka doṣaḥ

original: MSS_7707-1 ekaiva sārthakā cintā dharmasyārthe vicintyate /
analyzed: ekā eva sārthakā cintā dharmasya arthe vicintyate

original: MSS_7707-2 dvitīyā sārthakā cintā yogināṃ dharmanandinī //
analyzed: dvitīyā sārthakā cintā yoginām dharma nandinī

original: MSS_7708-1 ekaiśvarye sthito'pi praṇatabahuphale yaḥ svayaṃ kṛttivāsāḥ kāntāsaṃmiśradeho'pyaviṣayamanasāṃ yaḥ parastād yatīnām /
analyzed: eka aiśvarye sthitaḥ api praṇata bahu phale yaḥ svayam kṛttivāsāḥ kāntā saṃmiśra dehaḥ upi a viṣaya manasām yaḥ parastāt yatīnām

original: MSS_7708-2 aṣṭābhiryasya kṛtsnaṃ jagadapi tanubhirbibhrato nābhimānaḥ sanmārgālokanāya vyapanayatu sa vas tāmasīṃ vṛttimīśaḥ //
analyzed: aṣṭābhiḥ yasya kṛtsnam jagat api tanubhiḥ bibhrataḥ na abhimānaḥ sat mārga ālokanāya vyapanayatu sa vaḥ tāmasīm vṛttim īśaḥ

original: MSS_7709-1 eko giriśaḥ svāmī gaṇatā tulyaiva vallabhatvaṃ ca /
analyzed: ekaḥ giriśaḥ svāmī gaṇa tā tulyā eva vallabha tvam ca

original: MSS_7709-2 kiṃ kurmaḥ karmagatau śuṣyati bhṛṅgī vināyakaḥ pīnaḥ //
analyzed: kim kurmaḥ karma gatau śuṣyati bhṛṅgī vināyakaḥ pīnaḥ

original: MSS_7710-1 eko gotre pumān proktaḥ prāktanaiḥ svakuṭumbabhṛt /
analyzed: ekaḥ gotre pumān proktaḥ prāktanaiḥ sva kuṭumba bhṛt

original: MSS_7710-2 eko'pyanekaḥ puruṣaḥ pareṣāṃ bharaṇakṣamaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ api anekaḥ puruṣaḥ pareṣām bharaṇa kṣamaḥ

original: MSS_7711-1 eko jayati sadvṛttaḥ kiṃ punardvau susaṃhatau /
analyzed: ekaḥ jayati sat vṛttaḥ kim punar dvau su saṃhatau

original: MSS_7711-2 kiṃ citraṃ yadi tanvaṅgyāḥ stanābhyāṃ nirjitaṃ jagat //
analyzed: kim citram yadi tanvaṅgyāḥ stanābhyām nirjitam jagat

original: MSS_7712-1 eko jīvo bahavo dehā ekaṃ tattvaṃ bahavo mohāḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ jīvaḥ bahavaḥ dehāḥ ekam tattvam bahavaḥ mohāḥ

original: MSS_7712-2 ekā vidyā bahupāṣaṇḍā vibudhaiḥ kriyate kimiti vitaṇḍā //
analyzed: ekā vidyā bahu pāṣaṇḍā vibudhaiḥ kriyate kim iti vitaṇḍā

original: MSS_7713-1 ekodarasamudbhūtā ekanakṣatrajātakāḥ /
analyzed: eka udara samudbhūtāḥ eka nakṣatra jātakāḥ

original: MSS_7713-2 na bhavanti samāḥ śīle yathā badarakaṇṭakāḥ //
analyzed: na bhavanti samāḥ śīle yathā badara kaṇṭakāḥ

original: MSS_7714-1 ekodarāḥ pṛthaggrīvā anyānyaphalabhakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: eka udarāḥ pṛthak grīvāḥ anya anya phala bhakṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_7714-2 asaṃhatā vinaśyanti bhāruṇḍā iva pakṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: a saṃhatāḥ vinaśyanti bhāruṇḍāḥ iva pakṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_7715-1 eko dāśarathiḥ kāmaṃ yātudhānāḥ sahasraśaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ dāśarathiḥ kāmam yātudhānāḥ sahasraśas

original: MSS_7715-2 te tu yāvanta evājau tāvāṃśca dadṛśe sa taiḥ //
analyzed: te tu yāvantaḥ eva ājau tāvān ca dadṛśe sa taiḥ

original: MSS_7716-1 eko devaḥ keśavo vā śivo vā ekaṃ mitraṃ bhūpatirvā yatirvā /
analyzed: ekaḥ devaḥ keśavaḥ vā śivaḥ vai ekam mitram bhūpatiḥ vā yatiḥ vā

original: MSS_7716-2 eko vāsaḥ pattane vā vane vā ekā bhāryā sundarī vā darī vā //
analyzed: ekaḥ vāsaḥ pattane vā vane vā ekā bhāryā sundarī vā darī vā

original: MSS_7717-1 eko dharmaḥ paraṃ śreyaḥ kṣamaikā śāntiruttamā /
analyzed: ekaḥ dharmaḥ param śreyaḥ kṣamā ekā śāntiḥ uttamā

original: MSS_7717-2 vidyaikā paramā dṛṣṭir ahiṃsaikā sukhāvahā //
analyzed: vidyā ekā paramā dṛṣṭiḥ ahiṃsā ekā sukha āvahā

original: MSS_7718-1 eko na ropito yāvad utpanno'yaṃ vraṇo'paraḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ na ropitaḥ yāvat utpannaḥ iyam vraṇa uparaḥ

original: MSS_7718-2 satyaḥ pravādo yacchidreṣv anarthā yānti bhūritām //
analyzed: satyaḥ pravādaḥ yat chidreṣu anarthāḥ yānti bhūri tām

original: MSS_7719-1 ekonā viṃśatiḥ strīṇāṃ snānārthaṃ sarayūṃ gatā /
analyzed: ekonā viṃśatiḥ strīṇām snāna artham sarayūm gatā

original: MSS_7719-2 viṃśatiḥ punarāyātā eko vyāghreṇa bhakṣitaḥ //
analyzed: viṃśatiḥ punar āyātāḥ ekaḥ vyāghreṇa bhakṣitaḥ

original: MSS_7720-1 ekonā viṃśatirnāryaḥ krīḍāṃ kartuṃ vane gatāḥ /
analyzed: ekonāḥ viṃśatiḥ nāryaḥ krīḍām kartum vane gatāḥ

original: MSS_7720-2 viṃśatirgṛhamāyātāḥ śeṣo vyāghreṇa bhakṣitaḥ //
analyzed: viṃśatiḥ gṛham āyātāḥ śeṣaḥ vyāghreṇa bhakṣitaḥ

original: MSS_7721-1 eko netā kṣatriyo vā dvijo vā caikā vidyānvīkṣikī vā trayī vā /
analyzed: ekaḥ netā kṣatriyaḥ vā dvijaḥ vā ca ekā vidyā ānvīkṣikī vā trayī vā

original: MSS_7721-2 ekā bhāryā vaṃśajā vā priyā vāpy ekaṃ mitraṃ bhūpatirvā yatirvā //
analyzed: ekā bhāryā vaṃśa jā vā priyā vā api ekam mitram bhūpatiḥ vā yatiḥ vā

original: MSS_7722-1 eko'nte dvisamastrilocana iti khyātaścaturbhiḥ stuto vedaiḥ pañcamukhaḥ ṣaḍānanapitā saptarṣibhirvanditaḥ /
analyzed: ekonte dvi samaḥ trilocanaḥ iti khyātaḥ caturbhiḥ stutaḥ vedaiḥ pañcamukhaḥ ṣaḍānana pitā saptarṣibhiḥ vanditaḥ

original: MSS_7722-2 aṣṭāṅgo navatulya āmaragaṇe vāso daśāśā dadhat svaścaikādaśa so'vatānna vijito yo dvādaśātmāṃśubhiḥ //
analyzed: aṣṭāṅgaḥ nava tulyaḥ vāsaḥ daśa āśāḥ dadhat svar ca ekādaśa vijitaḥ yaḥ dvādaśa ātma aṃśubhiḥ

original: MSS_7723-1 eko'pi kṛṣṇasya kṛtaḥ praṇāmo daśāśvamedhāvabhṛthena tulyaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ api kṛṣṇasya kṛtaḥ praṇāmaḥ daśa aśvamedha avabhṛthena tulyaḥ

original: MSS_7723-2 daśāśvamedhī punareti janma kṛṣṇapraṇāmī na punarbhavāya //
analyzed: daśa aśvamedhī punar eti janma kṛṣṇa praṇāmī na punarbhavāya

original: MSS_7724-1 eko'pi ko'pi sevyo yaḥ kṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇaṃ punarnavam /
analyzed: ekaḥ api kopi sevyaḥ yaḥ kṣīṇam kṣīṇam punarnavam

original: MSS_7724-2 anudvignaṃ karotyeva sūryaścandramasaṃ yathā //
analyzed: anudvignam karoti eva sūryaḥ candramasam yathā

original: MSS_7725-1 eko'pi guṇavān putro nirguṇena śatena kim /
analyzed: ekaḥ api guṇavān putraḥ nirguṇena śatena kim

original: MSS_7725-2 ekaścandras tamo hanti na ca tārāḥ sahasraśaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ candraḥ tamaḥ hanti na ca tārāḥ sahasraśas

original: MSS_7726-1 eko'pi guṇavān putro nirguṇaiḥ kiṃ śatairapi /
analyzed: ekaḥ api guṇavān putraḥ nirguṇaiḥ kim śataiḥ api

original: MSS_7726-2 ekaścandro jagannetraṃ nakṣatraiḥ kiṃ prayojanam //
analyzed: ekaḥ candraḥ jagannetram nakṣatraiḥ kim prayojanam

original: MSS_7727-1 eko'pi guṇavān putro mā nirguṇaśataṃ bhavet /
analyzed: ekaḥ api guṇavān putraḥ mā nirguṇa śatam bhavet

original: MSS_7727-2 ekaścandras tamo hanti na ca tārāḥ sahasraśaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ candraḥ tamaḥ hanti na ca tārāḥ sahasraśas

original: MSS_7728-1 eko'pi jīyate hanta kālidāso na kenacit /
analyzed: ekaḥ api jīyate hanta kālidāsaḥ na kenacid

original: MSS_7728-2 śṛṅgāre lalitodgāre kālidāsatrayī kimu //
analyzed: śṛṅgāre lalitā udgāre kālidāsa trayī kimu

original: MSS_7729-1 eko'pi traya iva bhāti kanduko'yaṃ kāntāyāḥ karatalarāgaraktaraktaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ api trayaḥ iva bhāti kandukaḥ uyam kāntāyāḥ kara tala rāga rakta raktaḥ

original: MSS_7729-2 bhūmau taccaraṇanakhāṃśugauragauraḥ svaḥsthaḥ san nayanamarīcinīlanīlaḥ //
analyzed: bhūmau tad caraṇa nakha aṃśu gaura gauraḥ svaḥsthaḥ san nayana marīci nīla nīlaḥ

original: MSS_7730-1 eko'pi yaḥ sakalakāryavidhau samarthaḥ sattvādhiko bhavatu kiṃ bahubhiḥ prasūtaiḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ api yaḥ sakala kārya vidhau samarthaḥ sattva adhikaḥ bhavatu kim bahubhiḥ prasūtaiḥ

original: MSS_7730-2 candraḥ prakāśayati diṅmukhamaṇḍalāni tārāgaṇaḥ samudito'pyasamartha eva //
analyzed: candraḥ prakāśayati diṅmukha maṇḍalāni tārā gaṇaḥ samuditaḥ upi asamarthaḥ eva

original: MSS_7731-1 eko'pi yatra nagare prasiddhaḥ syād dhanurgharaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ api yatra nagare prasiddhaḥ syāt dhanurgharaḥ

original: MSS_7731-2 tato yāntyarayo dūraṃ mṛgāḥ siṃhagṛhādiva //
analyzed: tatas yānti arayaḥ dūram mṛgāḥ siṃha gṛhāt iva

original: MSS_7732-1 eko'pi vāraṇapatirdviṣatāmanīkaṃ yuktaṃ nihanti madasattvaguṇopapannaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ api vāraṇa patiḥ dviṣatām anīkam yuktam nihanti mada sattva guṇa upapannaḥ

original: MSS_7732-2 nāgeṣu hi kṣitibhṛtāṃ vijayo nibaddhas tasmād gajādhikabalo nṛpatiḥ sadā syāt //
analyzed: nāgeṣu hi kṣitibhṛtām vijayaḥ nibaddhaḥ tasmāt gaja adhika balaḥ nṛpatiḥ sadā syāt

original: MSS_7733-1 eko'pi siṃhaḥ sāhasraṃ yūthaṃ mathnāti dantinām /
analyzed: ekaḥ upi siṃhaḥ sāhasram yūtham mathnāti dantinām

original: MSS_7733-2 tasmāt siṃhamivodāram ātmānaṃ vīkṣya saṃpatet //
analyzed: tasmāt siṃham iva udāram ātmānam vīkṣya saṃpatet

original: MSS_7734-1 eko'pyamātyo medhāvī śūro dakṣo vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: eka ūpī amātyaḥ medhāvī śūraḥ dakṣaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_7734-2 rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam //
analyzed: rājānam rājamātram vā prāpayet mahatīm śriyam

original: MSS_7735-1 eko baṭurdarbhakuśāgrapāṇir vane vanaiḥ siñcati bālacūtān /
analyzed: ekaḥ baṭuḥ darbha kuśa agra pāṇiḥ vane vanaiḥ siñcati bāla cūtān

original: MSS_7735-2 āmrāśca siktāḥ pitaraśca tṛptā ekā kriyā dvyarthakarī prasiddhā //
analyzed: āmrāḥ ca siktāḥ pitaraḥ ca tṛptāḥ ekā kriyā dvi artha karī prasiddhā

original: MSS_7736-1 eko bahūnāṃ mūrkhāṇāṃ madhye nipatito budhaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ bahūnām mūrkhāṇām madhye nipatitaḥ budhaḥ

original: MSS_7736-2 padmaḥ pāthastaraṅgāṇāṃ iva viplavate dhruvam //
analyzed: padmaḥ pāthaḥ taraṅgāṇām iva viplavate dhruvam

original: MSS_7737-1 eko bāṇaḥ sphurati valitālokanaṃ kāminīnāṃ kāmasyānyo malayapavanaḥ kāmināṃ marmabhedī /
analyzed: ekaḥ bāṇaḥ sphurati valita ālokanam kāminīnām kāmasya anyaḥ malaya pavanaḥ kāminām marma bhedī

original: MSS_7737-2 vīṇāveṇukvaṇitamaparaścūtapuṣpaṃ turīyaḥ sarvotkaṇṭhaprathamasacivaḥ pañcamaḥ pañcamo'pi //
analyzed: vīṇā veṇu kvaṇitam aparaḥ cūtapuṣpam turīyaḥ sarva utkaṇṭha prathama sacivaḥ pañcamaḥ pañcamaḥ api

original: MSS_7738-1 eko bhavān mama samaṃ daśa vā namanti jyāghoṣapūritaviyanti śarāsanāni /
analyzed: ekaḥ bhavān mama samam daśa vā namanti jyā ghoṣa pūrita viyanti śarāsanāni

original: MSS_7738-2 tallokapālasahitaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena cāpaṃ gṛhāṇa sadṛśaṃ kṣaṇamastu yuddham //
analyzed: tat lokapāla sahitaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena cāpam gṛhāṇa sadṛśam kṣaṇam astu yuddham

original: MSS_7739-1 eko bhāvaḥ sadā śasto yatīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām /
analyzed: ekaḥ bhāvaḥ sadā śastaḥ yatīnām bhāvitātmanām

original: MSS_7739-2 śrīlubdhānāṃ na lokānāṃ viśeṣeṇa mahībhujām //
analyzed: śrī lubdhānām na lokānām viśeṣeṇa mahībhujām

original: MSS_7740-1 eko'bhūt pulināt tatastu nalināccānyo'pi nākorabhūt prācyāste traya eva divyakavayo dīvyantu devyā girā /
analyzed: ekaḥ bhūt pulināt tatas tu nalināt ca anyaḥ api nākoḥ abhūt prācyāḥ te trayaḥ eva divya kavayaḥ dīvyantu devyāḥ girā

original: MSS_7740-2 arvāñco yadi gadyapadyaracanācāturyavāguddhatās tān sarvānatiśayya khelatitarāṃ śākallamallaḥ kaviḥ //
analyzed: arvāñcaḥ yadi gadya padya racanā cāturya vāc uddhatāḥ tān sarvān atiśayya khelatitarām śākalla mallaḥ kaviḥ

original: MSS_7741-1 eko'bhūnnalināt tataśca pulinād valmīkataścāparas te sarve kavayo bhavanti guravas tebhyo namaskurmahe /
analyzed: ekaḥ bhūt nalināt tatas ca pulināt valmīkataḥ ca aparaḥ te sarve kavayaḥ bhavanti guravaḥ tebhyaḥ namaskurmahe

original: MSS_7741-2 arvāñco yadi gadyapadyaracanaiś cetaś camatkurvate teṣāṃ mūrdhni dadāmi vāmacaraṇaṃ karṇāṭarājapriyā //
analyzed: arvāñcaḥ yadi gadya padya racanaiḥ cetaḥ camatkurvate teṣām mūrdhni dadāmi vāma caraṇam karṇāṭa rāja priyā

original: MSS_7742-1 eko bhekaḥ paramamuditaḥ prāpya goṣpādanīraṃ ko me ko me raṭati satataṃ sparddhayā vākyamuccaiḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ bhekaḥ parama muditaḥ prāpya goṣpāda nīram kaḥ me kaḥ me raṭati satatam sparddhayā vākyam uccais

original: MSS_7742-2 gaṅgādīnāṃ sakalasaritāṃ prāpya toyaṃ samudraḥ kiṃcid garvaṃ na vahati mahān prāyaśo bhūri ratnaiḥ //
analyzed: gaṅgā ādīnām sakala saritām prāpya toyam samudraḥ kiṃcid garvam na vahati mahān prāyaśas bhūri ratnaiḥ

original: MSS_7743-1 eko me śāśvatātmā sukhamasukhabhujo jñānadṛṣṭisvabhāvo nānyat kiṃcinnijaṃ me tanudhanakaraṇabhrātṛbhāryāsukhādi /
analyzed: ekaḥ me śāśvata ātmā sukham asukha bhujaḥ jñāna dṛṣṭi svabhāvaḥ na anyat kiṃcid nijam me tanu dhana karaṇa bhrātṛ bhāryā sukha ādi

original: MSS_7743-2 karmodbhūtaṃ samastaṃ capalamasukhadaṃ tatra moho mudhā me paryālocyeti jīva svahitamavitathaṃ muktimārgaṃ śraya tvam //
analyzed: karma udbhūtam samastam capalam asukha dam tatra mohaḥ mudhā me paryālocya iti jīva sva hitam avitatham mukti mārgam śraya tvam

original: MSS_7744-1 eko'mbudhirjagati jīvati yena tāni tāvanti hanta salilāni samuccitāni /
analyzed: ekaḥ umbudhiḥ jagati jīvati yena tāni tāvanti hanta salilāni samuccitāni

original: MSS_7744-2 yebhyaḥ kathaṃcidapi kiṃcidamī payodāḥ pītvā cirāya dharaṇīmapi tarpayanti //
analyzed: yebhyaḥ kathaṃcid api kiṃcid amī payodāḥ pītvā cirāya dharaṇīm api tarpayanti

original: MSS_7745-1 eko raviratitejā atiśūraḥ kesarī vane vāsī /
analyzed: ekaḥ raviḥ ati tejāḥ ati śūraḥ kesarī vane vāsī

original: MSS_7745-2 ativipulaṃ khaṃ śūnyaṃ hyatigambhīro'mbudhiḥ kṣāraḥ //
analyzed: ati vipulam kham śūnyam hi ati gambhīra umbudhiḥ kṣāraḥ

original: MSS_7746-1 eko rasaḥ karuṇa eva nimitta bhedād bhinnaḥ pṛthak pṛthagivāśrayate vivartān /
analyzed: ekaḥ rasaḥ karuṇaḥ eva nimitta bhedāt bhinnaḥ pṛthak pṛthak iva āśrayate vivartān

original: MSS_7746-2 āvartabudbudataraṅgamayān vikārān ambho yathā salilameva hi tat samastam //
analyzed: āvarta budbuda taraṅga mayān vikārān ambhaḥ yathā salilam eva hi tat samastam

original: MSS_7747-1 eko rāgiṣu rājate priyatamādehārdhahārī haro nīrāgeṣu jino vimuktalalanāsaṅgo na yasmāt paraḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ rāgiṣu rājate priyatamā deha ardha hārī haraḥ nīrāgeṣu jinaḥ vimukta lalanā saṅgaḥ na yasmāt paraḥ

original: MSS_7747-2 durvārasmarabāṇapannagaviṣavyāsaṅgamugdho janaḥ śeṣaḥ kāmaviḍambito hi viṣayān bhoktuṃ na moktuṃ kṣamaḥ //
analyzed: durvāra smara bāṇa pannaga viṣa vyāsaṅga mugdhaḥ janaḥ śeṣaḥ kāma viḍambitaḥ hi viṣayān bhoktum na moktum kṣamaḥ

original: MSS_7748-1 eko'rthaṃ vimṛśedeko dharme prakurute manaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ ūrtham vimṛśet ekaḥ dharme prakurute manaḥ

original: MSS_7748-2 ekaḥ kāryāṇi kurute tamāhur madhyamaṃ naram //
analyzed: ekaḥ kāryāṇi kurute tam āhuḥ madhyamam naram

original: MSS_7749-1 eko lalāṭe dvau mūrdhni dvau dvau pārśvopapārśvayoḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ lalāṭe dvau mūrdhni dvau dvau pārśva upapārśvayoḥ

original: MSS_7749-2 dvau ca vakṣasi vijñeyau prayāṇe caika eva tu //
analyzed: dvau ca vakṣasi vijñeyau prayāṇe ca ekaḥ eva tu

original: MSS_7750-1 eko lobho mahāgrāho lobhāt pāpaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: ekaḥ lobhaḥ mahā grāhaḥ lobhāt pāpam pravartate

original: MSS_7750-2 tataḥ pāpādadharmāptis tato duḥkhaṃ pravartate //
analyzed: tatas pāpāt adharma āptiḥ tatas duḥkham pravartate

original: MSS_7751-1 eko vittavataḥ sūnuḥ pitṛhīnaḥ suyauvane /
analyzed: ekaḥ vittavataḥ sūnuḥ pitṛ hīnaḥ su yauvane

original: MSS_7751-2 mugdhe bhūbhuji kāyasthaḥ kāmispardhī vaṇiksutaḥ //
analyzed: mugdhe bhūbhuji kāyasthaḥ kāmi spardhī vaṇij sutaḥ

original: MSS_7752-1 nityāturāmātyavaidyaprasiddhasya guroḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: nitya ātura amātya vaidya prasiddhasya guroḥ sutaḥ

original: MSS_7752-2 ... ... pracchannakāmo jaṭādharaḥ //
MSS_7753-1 napuṃsakapravādasya praśamārthī phalāśanaḥ /
analyzed: napuṃsaka pravādasya praśama arthī phala aśanaḥ

original: MSS_7753-2 matto dhūrtasahāyaśca rājasūnurniraṅkuśaḥ //
analyzed: mattaḥ dhūrta sahāyaḥ ca rāja sūnuḥ niraṅkuśaḥ

original: MSS_7754-1 grāmyo dhātṛdvijasutaḥ prāptalābhaśca gāyanaḥ /
analyzed: grāmyaḥ dhātṛ dvija sutaḥ prāpta lābhaḥ ca gāyanaḥ

original: MSS_7754-2 sadyaḥ sārthapatiḥ prāptaḥ śrīmān daivaparāyaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sadyas sārthapatiḥ prāptaḥ śrīmān daiva parāyaṇaḥ

original: MSS_7755-1 gatānugatiko mūrkhaḥ śāstronmādaśca paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: gatānugatikaḥ mūrkhaḥ śāstra unmādaḥ ca paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_7755-2 nityakṣībaśca veśyānāṃ jaṅgamāḥ kalpapādapāḥ //
analyzed: nitya kṣībaḥ ca veśyānām jaṅgamāḥ kalpapādapāḥ

original: MSS_7756-1 eko viśvasatāṃ harāmyapaghṛṇaḥ prāṇānahaṃ prāṇinām ityevaṃ paricintya mātmamanasi vyādhānutāpaṃ kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ viśvasatām harāmi apaghṛṇaḥ prāṇān aham prāṇinām iti evam paricintya mā ātma manasi vyādha anutāpam kṛthāḥ

original: MSS_7756-2 bhūpānāṃ bhavaneṣu kiṃ ca vimalakṣetreṣu gūḍhāśayāḥ sādhūnāmarayo vasanti kati na tvattulyakakṣā narāḥ //
analyzed: bhūpānām bhavaneṣu kim ca vimala kṣetreṣu gūḍha āśayāḥ sādhūnām arayaḥ vasanti kati na tvad tulya kakṣāḥ narāḥ

original: MSS_7757-1 eko vaiśyaśca dvau śūdrau brāhmaṇāstraya eva ca /
analyzed: ekaḥ vaiśyaḥ ca dvau śūdrau brāhmaṇāḥ trayaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_7757-2 vidyopajīvinaḥ pañca na gaccheyuḥ samaṃ svayam //
analyzed: vidyā upajīvinaḥ pañca na gaccheyuḥ samam svayam

original: MSS_7757A-1 eko vaiśyo dvau ca śūdrau kṣatriyāḥ sapta pañca vā /
analyzed: ekaḥ vaiśyaḥ dvau ca śūdrau kṣatriyāḥ sapta pañca vā

original: MSS_7757A-2 nava nāryo na gaccheyuḥ na gacched brāhmaṇatrayam //
analyzed: nava nāryaḥ na gaccheyuḥ na gacchet brāhmaṇa trayam

original: MSS_7758-1 eko'hamasahāyo'haṃ kṛśo'hamaparicchadaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ aham asahāyaḥ ūham kṛśaḥ aham aparicchadaḥ

original: MSS_7758-2 svapne'pyevaṃvidhā cintā mṛgendrasya na jāyate //
analyzed: svapne pi evaṃvidhā cintā mṛgendrasya na jāyate

original: MSS_7759-1 eko'hamasmīti ca manyase tvaṃ na hṛcchayaṃ vetsi muniṃ purāṇam /
analyzed: ekaḥ aham asmi iti ca manyase tvam na hṛcchayam vetsi munim purāṇam

original: MSS_7759-2 yo veditā karmaṇaḥ pāpakasya yasyāntike tvaṃ vṛjinaṃ karoṣi //
analyzed: yaḥ veditā karmaṇaḥ pāpakasya yasya antike tvam vṛjinam karoṣi

original: MSS_7760-1 eko'hamasmītyātmānaṃ yat tvaṃ kalyāṇa manyase /
analyzed: ekaḥ aham asmi iti ātmānam yat tvam kalyāṇa manyase

original: MSS_7760-2 nityaṃ sthitas te hṛdyeṣa puṇyapāpekṣitā muniḥ //
analyzed: nityam sthitaḥ te hṛdi eṣa puṇya pāpa īkṣitā muniḥ

original: MSS_7761-1 eko haraḥ priyādhara- guṇavedī diviṣado'pare mūḍhāḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ haraḥ priya adhara guṇa vedī diviṣada upare mūḍhāḥ

original: MSS_7761-2 viṣamamṛtaṃ vā samamiti yaḥ paśyan garalameva papau //
analyzed: viṣam amṛtam vā samam iti yaḥ paśyan garalam eva papau

original: MSS_7762-1 eko hi kurute pāpaṃ kālapāśavaśaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ hi kurute pāpam kāla pāśa vaśam gataḥ

original: MSS_7762-2 nīcenātmāpacāreṇa kulaṃ tena vinaśyati //
analyzed: nīcena ātma apacāreṇa kulam tena vinaśyati

original: MSS_7763-1 eko hi khañjanavaro nalinīdalastho dṛṣṭaḥ karoti caturaṅgabalādhipatyam /
analyzed: ekaḥ hi khañjana varaḥ nalinī dala sthaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ karoti caturaṅga bala ādhipatyam

original: MSS_7763-2 kiṃ me kariṣyati bhavadvadanāravinde jānāmi no nayanakhañjanayugmametat //
analyzed: kim me kariṣyati bhavat vadana aravinde jānāmi naḥ nayana khañjana yugmam etat

original: MSS_7764-1 eko hi doṣo guṇasaṃnipāte nimajjatītyetadayuktamuktam /
analyzed: ekaḥ hi doṣaḥ guṇa saṃnipāte nimajjati iti etat ayuktam uktam

original: MSS_7764-2 rūpādikān sarvaguṇān nihanti kiṃ maurkhyamekaṃ na śarīrabhājām //
analyzed: rūpa ādikān sarva guṇān nihanti kim maurkhyam ekam na śarīra bhājām

original: MSS_7765-1 eko hi doṣo guṇasaṃnipāte nimajjatīndoḥ kiraṇeṣvivāṅkaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ hi doṣaḥ guṇa saṃnipāte nimajjati indoḥ kiraṇeṣu iva aṅkaḥ

original: MSS_7765-2 kenāpi nūnaṃ kavinā ca dṛṣṭaṃ dāridryamekaṃ guṇarāśināśi //
analyzed: kena api nūnam kavinā ca dṛṣṭam dāridryam ekam guṇa rāśi nāśi

original: MSS_7766-1 eko hyamātyo medhāvī śūro dānto vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ hi amātyaḥ medhāvī śūraḥ dāntaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_7766-2 rājānaṃ rājaputraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam //
analyzed: rājānam rāja putram vā prāpayet mahatīm śriyam

original: MSS_7767-1 eṇaḥ krīḍati śūkaraśca khanati dvīpī ca garvāyate kroṣṭā krandati valgate ca śaśako vegād rururdhāvati /
analyzed: eṇaḥ krīḍati śūkaraḥ ca khanati dvīpī ca garvāyate kroṣṭā krandati valgate ca śaśakaḥ vegāt ruruḥ dhāvati

original: MSS_7767-2 niḥśaṅkaḥ karipotakastarulatāmunmoṭate līlayā haṃho siṃha vinā tvayādya vipine kīdṛgdaśā vartate //
analyzed: niḥśaṅkaḥ kari potakaḥ taru latām unmoṭate līlayā haṃho siṃha vinā tvayā adya vipine kīdṛś daśā vartate

original: MSS_7768-1 eṇaśreṇiḥ śaśakanikaraḥ śallakīnāṃ kadambaṃ kolavyūhaḥ spṛśati sukhitāṃ yatra tatrāpi kuñje /
analyzed: eṇa śreṇiḥ śaśaka nikaraḥ śallakīnām kadambam kola vyūhaḥ spṛśati sukhitām yatra tatra api kuñje

original: MSS_7768-2 ko nāmāsmin bata hatavane pādapastādṛguccair yasya cchāyāmayamadhivasatyuṣṇarugṇo gajendraḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ nāma asmin bata hata vane pādapaḥ tādṛś uccais yasya chāyām ayam adhivasati uṣṇa rugṇaḥ gaja indraḥ

original: MSS_7769-1 eṇākṣīspṛhayālutā na kathamapyāste vivekodayān nityaṃ pracyutiśaṅkayā kṣaṇamapi svarge na modāmahe /
analyzed: eṇa akṣī spṛhayālu tā na katham api āste viveka udayāt nityam pracyuti śaṅkayā kṣaṇam api svarge na modāmahe

original: MSS_7769-2 apyanyeṣu vināśivastuviṣayābhogeṣu tṛṣṇā na me svarṇadyāḥ puline paraṃ haripadadhyānaṃ samīhāmahe //
analyzed: api anyeṣu vināśi vastu viṣaya ābhogeṣu tṛṣṇā na me svarṇadyāḥ puline param hari pada dhyānam samīhāmahe

original: MSS_7770-1 eṇādyāḥ paśavaḥ kirātapariṣannaiṣā guṇagrāhiṇī saṃcāro'pi na nāgarasya viṣayocchinnaṃ munīnāṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: eṇa ādyāḥ paśavaḥ kirāta pariṣannā eṣā guṇa grāhiṇī saṃcāraḥ api na nāgarasya viṣaya ucchinnam munīnām manaḥ

original: MSS_7770-2 dhūmenaiva sugandhinā pratipadaṃ dikcakramāmodayan āmūlaṃ paridahyate'gurutaruḥ kasmai kimācakṣmahe //
analyzed: dhūmena eva sugandhinā pratipadam diś cakram āmodayan āmūlam paridahyate guru taruḥ kasmai kim ācakṣmahe

original: MSS_7771-1 eṇīgaṇeṣu gurugarvanimīlitākṣaḥ kiṃ kṛṣṇasāra khalu khelasi kānane'smin /
analyzed: eṇī gaṇeṣu guru garva nimīlita akṣaḥ kim kṛṣṇasāra khalu khelasi kānane smin

original: MSS_7771-2 sīmāmimāṃ kalaya bhinnakarīndrakumbha- muktāmayīṃ harivihāravasundharāyāḥ //
analyzed: sīmām imām kalaya bhinna karīndra kumbha muktā mayīm hari vihāra vasundharāyāḥ

original: MSS_7772-1 eṇīdṛśaḥ pāṇipuṭe niruddhā veṇī vireje śayanotthitāyāḥ /
analyzed: eṇī dṛśaḥ pāṇi puṭe niruddhā veṇī vireje śayana utthitāyāḥ

original: MSS_7772-2 sarojakośādiva niṣpatantī śreṇī ghanībhūya madhuvratānām //
