analyzed: saroja kośāt iva niṣpatantī śreṇī ghanībhūya madhu vratānām

original: MSS_7773-1 eṇīdṛśaḥ śravaṇasīmni yadānayanti tenaiva tasya mahimā navacampakasya /
analyzed: eṇī dṛśaḥ śravaṇa sīmni yadā ānayanti tena eva tasya mahimā nava campakasya

original: MSS_7773-2 tvaṃ tatra no viharase yadi bhṛṅga tena naitasya kiṃcidapi tat tu tavaiva hāniḥ //
analyzed: tvam tatra naḥ viharase yadi bhṛṅga tena nā etasya kiṃcid api tat tu tava eva hāniḥ

original: MSS_7774-1 eṇīdṛśo vijayate veṇī pṛṣṭhāvalambinī /
analyzed: vijayate

original: MSS_7774-2 kaśeva pañcabāṇasya yuvatarjanahetave //
analyzed: kaśā iva pañcabāṇasya yuva tarjana hetave

original: MSS_7775-1 eṇī yāti vilokya bālaśalabhān śaṣpāṅkurāditsayā chatrīkuḍmalakāni rakṣati cirādaṇḍabhramād kukkuṭī /
analyzed: eṇī yāti vilokya bāla śalabhān śaṣpa aṅkura āditsayā chatrī kuḍmalakāni rakṣati cirāt aṇḍa bhramāt kukkuṭī

original: MSS_7775-2 dhūtvā dhāvati kṛṣṇakīṭapaṭalaśreṇīṃ śikhaṇḍī śiro dūrādeva vanāntare viṣadharagrāsābhilāṣāturaḥ //
analyzed: dhūtvā dhāvati kṛṣṇa kīṭa paṭala śreṇīm śikhaṇḍī śiraḥ dūrāt eva vana antare viṣadhara grāsa abhilāṣa āturaḥ

original: MSS_7776-1 eṇīśābavilocanābhiralasaśroṇībharaprauḍhi bhir veṇībhūtarasakramābhirabhitaḥ śreṇīkṛtābhirvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: eṇī śāba vilocanābhiḥ alasa śroṇī bhara prauḍhi bhiḥ veṇī bhūta rasa kramābhiḥ abhitas śreṇīkṛtābhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: MSS_7776-2 pāṇī nāma vinodayan ratipatestūṇīśayaiḥ sāyakair vāṇīnāmapadaṃ paraṃ vrajajanakṣoṇīpatiḥ pātu naḥ //
analyzed: pāṇī nāma vinodayan ratipateḥ tūṇī śayaiḥ sāyakaiḥ vāṇī nāma padam param vraja jana kṣoṇī patiḥ pātu naḥ

original: MSS_7777-1 eṇo gajaḥ pataṅgaśca bhṛṅgo mīnas tu pañcamaḥ /
analyzed: eṇaḥ gajaḥ pataṅgaḥ ca bhṛṅgaḥ mīnaḥ tu pañcamaḥ

original: MSS_7777-2 śabdasparśarūpagandharasairete hatāḥ khalu //
analyzed: śabda sparśa rūpa gandha rasaiḥ ete hatāḥ khalu

original: MSS_7778-1 etacca tapaso mūlaṃ tapaso mūlameva ca /
analyzed: etat ca tapasaḥ mūlam tapasaḥ mūlam eva ca

original: MSS_7778-2 sarvadā kāmavijayaḥ saṃkalpavijayas tathā //
analyzed: sarvadā kāma vijayaḥ saṃkalpa vijayaḥ tathā

original: MSS_7779-1 etac caturguṇaṃ tailaṃ tasmāc cāpi caturguṇam /
analyzed: etat caturguṇam tailam tasmāt ca api caturguṇam

original: MSS_7779-2 kāṃjikaṃ prakṣiped dhīmāṃs tatas tailaṃ vipācayet //
analyzed: kāṃjikam prakṣipet dhīmān tatas tailam vipācayet

original: MSS_7780-1 etacchāntavicitracatvarapathaṃ viśrāntavaitālika- ślāghāślokamaguñjimañjumurajaṃ vidhvastagītadhvani /
analyzed: etat śānta vicitra catvara patham viśrānta vaitālika ślāghā ślokam aguñji mañju murajam vidhvasta gīta dhvani

original: MSS_7780-2 vyāvṛttādhyayanaṃ nivṛttasukavikrīḍāsamasyaṃ namad- vidvadvādapathaṃ kathaṃ puramidaṃ maunavrate vartate //
analyzed: vyāvṛtta adhyayanam nivṛtta su kavi krīḍā samasyam namat vidvas vāda patham katham puram idam mauna vrate vartate

original: MSS_7781-1 etacchāstrārthatattvaṃ tu mayākhyātaṃ tavānagha /
analyzed: etat śāstra artha tattvam tu mayā ākhyātam tava anagha

original: MSS_7781-2 aviśvāso narendrāṇām aparaṃ guhyamucyate //
analyzed: aviśvāsaḥ narendrāṇām aparam guhyam ucyate

original: MSS_7782-1 etaj jaḍājaḍavivecanametadeva kṣityāditattvapariśodhanakauśalaṃ ca /
analyzed: etat jaḍa a jaḍa vivecanam etat eva kṣiti ādi tattva pariśodhana kauśalam ca

original: MSS_7782-2 jñānaṃ ca śaivamidamāgamakoṭilabhyaṃ māturyadaṅghriyugale nihito mayātmā //
analyzed: jñānam ca śaivam idam āgama koṭi labhyam mātuḥ yat aṅghri yugale nihitaḥ mayā ātmā

original: MSS_7783-1 etatkarālakaravālanikṛttakaṇṭha- nāloccaladbahulaphenilabudbudaughaiḥ /
analyzed: etat karāla karavāla nikṛtta kaṇṭha nāla uccalat bahula phenila budbuda oghaiḥ

original: MSS_7783-2 sārdhaṃ ḍamaḍḍamaruḍāṃkṛtihūtabhūta- vargeṇa bhargagṛhiṇīṃ rudhirairdhinomi //
analyzed: sārdham vargeṇa bharga gṛhiṇīm rudhiraiḥ dhinomi

original: MSS_7784-1 etat kavīndramukhacandramasaḥ kadācit kāvyābhidhānamamṛtaṃ yadi nāgaliṣyat /
analyzed: etat kavi indra mukha candramasaḥ kadācid kāvya abhidhānam amṛtam yadi nā agaliṣyat

original: MSS_7784-2 saṃsāriṇāṃ vividhaduḥkhasahasrabhājāṃ cetovinodasadanaṃ kimihābhaviṣyat //
analyzed: saṃsāriṇām vividha duḥkha sahasra bhājām cetaḥ vinoda sadanam kim iha abhaviṣyat

original: MSS_7785-1 etat kāntamidaṃ kāntam ityāvasathatṛṣṇayā /
analyzed: etat kāntam idam kāntam iti āvasatha tṛṣṇayā

original: MSS_7785-2 tasyā bhramati sarvāṅgaṃ manye mūḍha iva smaraḥ //
analyzed: tasyāḥ bhramati sarva aṅgam manye mūḍhaḥ iva smaraḥ

original: MSS_7786-1 etat kāmaphalaṃ loke yad dvayorekacittatā /
analyzed: etat kāma phalam loke yat dvayoḥ eka citta tā

original: MSS_7786-2 anyacittakṛte kāme śavayoriva saṃgamaḥ //
analyzed: anya citta kṛte kāme śavayoḥ iva saṃgamaḥ

original: MSS_7787-1 etat kāryamamarāḥ saṃśrutaṃ me dhṛtiḥ śamaḥ satyadharmānuvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: etat kāryam amarāḥ saṃśrutam me dhṛtiḥ śamaḥ satya dharma anuvṛttiḥ

original: MSS_7787-2 granthiṃ vinīya hṛdayasya sarvaṃ priyāpriye cātmavaśaṃ nayīta //
analyzed: granthim vinīya hṛdayasya sarvam priya apriye ca ātma vaśam

original: MSS_7787A-1 etat kiṃ nanu karṇabhūṣaṇamayaṃ hāraḥ sukāñcī navā baddhā kācidiyaṃ tvayādya tilakaḥ ślāghyaḥ priye kalpitaḥ /
analyzed: etat kim nanu karṇabhūṣaṇam ayam hāraḥ su kāñcī navā baddhā kācid iyam tvayā adya tilakaḥ ślāghyaḥ priye kalpitaḥ

original: MSS_7787A-2 pratyaṅgaṃ spṛśateti tatkṣaṇabhavadromāñcamālāñcitā tanvī mānamupekṣayaiva śanakairdhūrtena saṃmocitā //
analyzed: pratyaṅgam spṛśata iti tad kṣaṇa bhavat romāñca mālā āñcitā tanvī mānam upekṣayā eva śanakais dhūrtena saṃmocitā

original: MSS_7788-1 etat kiṃ praṇayinyapi praṇayinī yan māninī jāyate manye mānavidhau bhaviṣyati sukhaṃ kiṃcid viśiṣṭaṃ rasāt /
analyzed: etat kim praṇayinī api praṇayinī yat māninī jāyate manye māna vidhau bhaviṣyati sukham kiṃcid viśiṣṭam rasāt

original: MSS_7788-2 vāñchā tasya sukhasya me'pi hṛdaye jāgarti nityaṃ paraṃ svapne'pyeṣa na me'parādhyati patiḥ kupyāmi tasmai katham //
analyzed: vāñchā tasya sukhasya me ipi hṛdaye jāgarti nityam param svapne pi eṣa na me parādhyati patiḥ kupyāmi tasmai katham

original: MSS_7789-1 etat kiṃ śrutasadṛśaṃ tvadvratayogyaṃ kulānurūpaṃ vā /
analyzed: etat kim śruta sadṛśam tvad vrata yogyam kula anurūpam vā

original: MSS_7789-2 kṛtavānasi yat sumate paribhūtaguṇodayaṃ karma //
analyzed: kṛtavān asi yat sumate paribhūta guṇa udayam karma

original: MSS_7790-1 etatkīrtivivartadhautanikhilatrailokyanirvāsitair viśrāntiḥ kalitā kathāsu jagatāṃ śyāmaiḥ samagrairapi /
analyzed: etad kīrti vivarta dhauta nikhila trailokya nirvāsitaiḥ viśrāntiḥ kalitā kathāsu jagatām śyāmaiḥ samagraiḥ api

original: MSS_7790-2 jajñe kīrtimayādaho bhayabharairasmādakīrteḥ punaḥ sā yannāsya kathāpathe'pi malinacchāyā babandha sthitim //
analyzed: jajñe kīrti mayāt aho bhaya bharaiḥ asmāt akīrteḥ punar sā yat nā asya kathāpathe pi malina chāyā babandha sthitim

original: MSS_7791-1 etatkucaspardhitayā dhaṭasya khyātasya śāstreṣu nidarśanatvam /
analyzed: etat kuca spardhi tayā dhaṭasya khyātasya śāstreṣu nidarśana tvam

original: MSS_7791-2 tasmācca śilpān maṇikādikārī prasiddhanāmājani kumbhakāraḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt ca śilpāt maṇika ādi kārī prasiddha nāmā ajani kumbhakāraḥ

original: MSS_7792-1 etat kṛtvā priyamanucitaprārthanāvartmano me sauhārdād vā vidhura iti vā mayyanukrośabuddhyā /
analyzed: etat kṛtvā priyam anucita prārthanā vartmanaḥ me sauhārdāt vā vidhure iti vā mayi anukrośa buddhyā

original: MSS_7792-2 iṣṭān deśān vicara jalada prāvṛṣā saṃbhṛtaśrīr mā bhūdevaṃ kṣaṇamapi ca te vidyutā viprayogaḥ //
analyzed: iṣṭān deśān vicara jalada prāvṛṣā saṃbhṛta śrīḥ mā bhūt evam kṣaṇam api ca te vidyutā viprayogaḥ

original: MSS_7793-1 etat kokakuṭumbinījanamanaḥśalyaṃ cakorāṅganā- cañcūkoṭikapāṭayorghaṭitayorudghāṭinī kuñcikā /
analyzed: etat koka kuṭumbinī jana manaḥśalyam cakora aṅganā cañcū koṭi kapāṭayoḥ ghaṭitayoḥ udghāṭinī kuñcikā

original: MSS_7793-2 dagdhasyāpi navāṅkuraḥ smaratarorārdrāgasāṃ preyasī- mānoddāmagajāṅkuśo vijayate mugdhaṃ sudhāṃśorvapuḥ //
analyzed: dagdhasya api nava aṅkuraḥ smara taroḥ ārdra āgasām preyasī māna uddāma gajāṅkuśaḥ vijayate mugdham sudhāṃśoḥ vapuḥ

original: MSS_7794-1 etat tad durjayaṃ loke putradāramayaṃ viṣam /
analyzed: etat tat durjayam loke putra dāra mayam viṣam

original: MSS_7794-2 jāyante ca mriyante ca yat pītvā mohitāḥ prajāḥ //
analyzed: jāyante ca mriyante ca yat pītvā mohitāḥ prajāḥ

original: MSS_7795-1 etat tad dhṛtarāṣṭravaktrasadṛśaṃ meghāndhakāraṃ nabho hṛṣṭo garjati cātidarpitabalo duryodhano vā śikhī /
analyzed: etat tat dhṛtarāṣṭra vaktra sadṛśam megha andhakāram nabhaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ garjati ca ati darpita balaḥ duryodhanaḥ vā śikhī

original: MSS_7795-2 akṣadyūtajito yudhiṣṭhira ivādhvānaṃ gataḥ kokilo haṃsāḥ saṃprati pāṇḍavā iva vanādajñātacaryāṃ gatāḥ //
analyzed: akṣa dyūta jitaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ iva adhvānam gataḥ kokilaḥ haṃsāḥ saṃprati pāṇḍavāḥ iva vanāt ajñāta caryām gatāḥ

original: MSS_7796-1 etat tadvaktramatra kva tadadharamadhu kvāyatāste kaṭākṣāḥ kvālāpāḥ komalāste kva sa madanadhanurbhaṅguro bhrūvilāsaḥ /
analyzed: etat tad vaktram atra kva tad adhara madhu kva āyatāḥ te kaṭākṣāḥ kva ālāpāḥ komalāḥ te kva sa madana dhanuḥ bhaṅguraḥ bhrū vilāsaḥ

original: MSS_7796-2 itthaṃ khaṭvāṅgakoṭau prakaṭitadaśanaṃ mañjuguñjatsamīram rāgāndhānāmivoccairupahasitamaho mohajālaṃ kapālam //
analyzed: ittham khaṭvāṅga koṭau prakaṭita daśanam mañju guñjat samīram rāga andhānām iva uccais upahasitam aho moha jālam kapālam

original: MSS_7797-1 etat tarkaya cakravākasudṛśāmāśvāsanādāyinaḥ prauḍhadhvāntapayodhimagnajagatīdattāvalambotsavāḥ /
analyzed: etat tarkaya cakravāka sudṛśām āśvāsana ādāyinaḥ prauḍha dhvānta payodhi magna jagatī datta avalamba utsavāḥ

original: MSS_7797-2 dīptāṃśorvikasanti diṅmṛgadṛśāṃ kāśmīrapaṅkodaka- vyātyukṣīcaturāḥ saroruhavanaśrīkelikārāḥ karāḥ //
analyzed: dīptāṃśoḥ vikasanti diś mṛga dṛśām kāśmīra paṅka udaka vyāti ukṣī caturāḥ saroruha vana śrī keli kārāḥ karāḥ

original: MSS_7798-1 etat tarkaya cakravākahṛdayāśvāsāya tārāgaṇa- grāsāya sphuradindumaṇḍalaparīhāsāya bhāsāṃ nidhiḥ /
analyzed: etat tarkaya cakravāka hṛdaya āśvāsāya tārā gaṇa grāsāya sphurat indu maṇḍala parīhāsāya bhāsām nidhiḥ

original: MSS_7798-2 dikkāntākucakumbhakuṅkumarajonyāsāya paṅkeruho- llāsāya sphuṭavairikairavavanatrāsāya vidyotate //
analyzed: diś kāntā kuca kumbha kuṅkuma rajaḥ nyāsāya paṅkeruhaḥ llāsāya sphuṭa vairi kairava vana trāsāya vidyotate

original: MSS_7799-1 etat tasya mukhāt kiyat kamalinīpatre kaṇaṃ vāriṇo yan muktāmaṇirityamaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvan yadasmādapi /
analyzed: etat tasya mukhāt kiyat kamalinī patre kaṇam vāriṇaḥ yat muktāmaṇiḥ iti amaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvan yat asmāt api

original: MSS_7799-2 aṅgulyagralaghukriyāpravilayinyādīyamāne śanais kutroḍḍīya gato mametyanudinaṃ nidrāti nāntaḥśucā //
analyzed: aṅguli agra laghu kriyā pravilayini ādīyamāne śanais kutra uḍḍīya gataḥ mama iti anudinam nidrāti na antar śucā

original: MSS_7800-1 etat tu māṃ dahati yad gṛhamasmadīyaṃ kṣīṇārthamityatithayaḥ parivarjayanti /
analyzed: etat tu mām dahati yat gṛham asmadīyam kṣīṇa artham iti atithayaḥ parivarjayanti

original: MSS_7800-2 saṃśuṣkasāndramadalekhamiva bhramantaḥ kālātyaye madhukarāḥ kariṇaḥ kapolam //
analyzed: saṃśuṣka sāndra mada lekham iva bhramantaḥ kāla atyaye madhukarāḥ kariṇaḥ kapolam

original: MSS_7801-1 etat te bhrūlatodbhāsi pāṭalādharapallavam /
analyzed: etat te bhrū latā udbhāsi pāṭalā adhara pallavam

original: MSS_7801-2 mukhaṃ nandanamudyānam ato'nyat kevalaṃ vanam //
analyzed: mukham nandanam udyānam atas nyat kevalam vanam

original: MSS_7802-1 etat te mukhamakṣatendulaḍahacchāyaṃ bhavallocanaṃ nīlendīvaranirviśeṣamadharaste bandhujīvāruṇaḥ /
analyzed: etat te mukham akṣata indu laḍaha chāyam bhavat locanam nīla indīvara nirviśeṣam adharaḥ te bandhujīva aruṇaḥ

original: MSS_7802-2 bhrūvallistava kāmakārmukalatā līlāsahādhyāyinī na dhyāyantu kathaṃ nu deva kathaya tvāmekameṇīdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: bhrū valliḥ tava kāma kārmuka latā līlā sahā adhyāyinī na dhyāyantu katham nu deva kathaya tvām eka meṇī dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_7803-1 etat payodharayugaṃ patitaṃ nirīkṣya khedaṃ vṛthā vahasi kiṃ kamalāyatākṣi /
analyzed: etat payodhara yugam patitam nirīkṣya khedam vṛthā vahasi kim kamala āyata akṣi

original: MSS_7803-2 stabdho vivekarahito janatāpakārī hyatyunnataḥ prapatatīti kimatra citram //
analyzed: stabdhaḥ viveka rahitaḥ janatā apakārī hi ati unnataḥ prapatati iti kim atra citram

original: MSS_7804-1 etat puraḥ sphurati padmadṛśāṃ sahasram akṣidvayaṃ kathaya kutra niveśayāmi /
analyzed: etat puras sphurati padma dṛśām sahasram akṣi dvayam kathaya kutra niveśayāmi

original: MSS_7804-2 ityākalayya nayanāmburuhe nimīlya romāñcitena vapuṣā sthitamacyutena //
analyzed: iti ākalayya nayana amburuhe nimīlya romāñcitena vapuṣā sthitam acyutena

original: MSS_7805-1 etat pūtanacakramakramakṛtagrāsārdhamuktairvṛkān utpuṣṇatparito nṛmāṃsavighasairādardaraṃ krandataḥ /
analyzed: etat pūtana cakra makra makṛta grāsa ardha muktaiḥ vṛkān utpuṣṇat paritas nṛ māṃsa vighasaiḥ ādardaram krandataḥ

original: MSS_7805-2 kharjūradrumadaghnajaṅghamasitatvaṅnaddhaviṣvaktata- snāyugranthighanāsthipañjarajaratkaṅkālamālokyate //
analyzed: kharjūra druma daghna jaṅgham asita tvac naddha viṣvaktata snāyu granthi ghana asthi pañjara jarat kaṅkālam ālokyate

original: MSS_7806-1 etat pracaṇḍi samudetyakalaṅkamūrti kalmāṣitāmbaratalaṃ grahacakravālam /
analyzed: etat pracaṇḍi samudetya kalaṅka mūrti kalmāṣita ambara talam graha cakravālam

original: MSS_7806-2 sūryendusaṃpuṭasamudgakavāṭakoṣa- viśleṣakīrṇanavaratnakalāpakānti //
MSS_7807-1 etat sarvaṃ parijñāya vṛkṣāropaṃ samārabhet /
analyzed: etat sarvam parijñāya vṛkṣa āropam samārabhet

original: MSS_7807-2 dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ drumebhyaḥ sādhanaṃ yataḥ //
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām drumebhyaḥ sādhanam yatas

original: MSS_7808-1 etat sarvaṃ śṛṇuta vacanaṃ saṃgrahādatra sakhyaḥ prāṇānāṃ naḥ phalamavikalaṃ nūnameṣā sakhī vaḥ /
analyzed: etat sarvam śṛṇuta vacanam saṃgrahāt atra sakhyaḥ prāṇānām naḥ phalam avikalam nūnam eṣā sakhī vaḥ

original: MSS_7808-2 viśleṣe'smin pracalati bhṛśaṃ dīpikeva pravāte satyāmasyāṃ vayamatamasaḥ sarvathā rakṣatainām //
analyzed: viśleṣe ismin pracalati bhṛśam dīpikā iva pravāte satyām asyām vayam atamasaḥ sarvathā rakṣata enām

original: MSS_7809-1 etat sarvamamātyādi rājā nayapuraḥsaraḥ /
analyzed: etat sarvam amātya ādi rājā naya puraḥsaraḥ

original: MSS_7809-2 nayatyunnatimudyukto vyasanī kṣayameva ca //
analyzed: nayati unnatim udyuktaḥ vyasanī kṣayam eva ca

original: MSS_7810-1 etadatra pathikaikajīvitaṃ paśya śuṣyatitarāṃ mahatsaraḥ /
analyzed: etat atra pathika eka jīvitam paśya śuṣyatitarām mahat saraḥ

original: MSS_7810-2 re mudhāmbudhara ruddhasadgatir vardhitā kimiti ghaṭṭavāhinī //
analyzed: re mudhā ambudhara ruddha sat gatiḥ vardhitā kim iti ghaṭṭa vāhinī

original: MSS_7811-1 etadanūpe vācyaṃ jāṅgalabhūmau ca pañcabhiḥ puruṣaiḥ /
analyzed: etat anūpe vācyam jāṅgala bhūmau ca pañcabhiḥ puruṣaiḥ

original: MSS_7811-2 etaireva nimittair marubhūmāvaṣṭabhiḥ kathayet //
analyzed: etaiḥ eva nimittaiḥ maru bhūmau aṣṭabhiḥ kathayet

original: MSS_7812-1 etadarthaṃ śrute buddhiṃ karoti dveṣadūṣitaḥ /
analyzed: etad artham śrute buddhim karoti dveṣa dūṣitaḥ

original: MSS_7812-2 yad vivādaiḥ kariṣyāmi mānamlāniṃ manīṣiṇām //
analyzed: yat vivādaiḥ kariṣyāmi māna mlānim manīṣiṇām

original: MSS_7813-1 etadarthaṃ hi kurvanti rājāno dhanasaṃcayam /
analyzed: etad artham hi kurvanti rājānaḥ dhana saṃcayam

original: MSS_7813-2 rakṣayitvā tu cātmānaṃ yaddhanaṃ tad dvijātaye //
analyzed: rakṣayitvā tu ca ātmānam yat dhanam tat dvijātaye

original: MSS_7814-1 etadarthaṃ hi rājyāni praśāsati nareśvarāḥ /
analyzed: etad artham hi rājyāni praśāsati nareśvarāḥ

original: MSS_7814-2 yadeṣāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu mano na pratihanyate //
analyzed: yat eṣām sarva kṛtyeṣu manaḥ na pratihanyate

original: MSS_7815-1 etadarthe kulīnānāṃ nṛpāḥ kurvanti saṃgraham /
analyzed: etad arthe kulīnānām nṛpāḥ kurvanti saṃgraham

original: MSS_7815-2 ādimadhyāvasāneṣu na te gacchanti vikriyām //
analyzed: ādi madhya avasāneṣu na te gacchanti vikriyām

original: MSS_7816-1 etaducchvasitapītamaindavaṃ soḍhumakṣamamiva prabhārasam /
analyzed: etat ucchvasita pīta maindavam soḍhum akṣamam iva prabhā rasam

original: MSS_7816-2 muktaṣaṭpadavirāvamañjasā bhidyate kumudamā nibandhanāt //
analyzed: mukta ṣaṭpada virāvam añjasā bhidyate kumudamāḥ nibandhanāt

original: MSS_7817-1 etadeva kulīnatvam etadeva guṇārjanam /
analyzed: etat eva kulīna tvam etat eva guṇa arjanam

original: MSS_7817-2 yat sadaiva satāṃ satsu vinayāvanataṃ śiraḥ //
analyzed: yat sadā eva satām satsu vinaya avanatam śiraḥ

original: MSS_7818-1 etadeva tu vijñeyaṃ svārthadharmavighātaje /
analyzed: etat eva tu vijñeyam sva artha dharma vighāta je

original: MSS_7818-2 viṣayadhvaṃsaje śatror viṣayapratipīḍanam //
analyzed: viṣaya dhvaṃsa je śatroḥ viṣaya pratipīḍanam

original: MSS_7819-1 etadeva paraṃ śauryaṃ yat paraprāṇarakṣaṇam /
analyzed: etat eva param śauryam yat para prāṇa rakṣaṇam

original: MSS_7819-2 nahi prāṇaharaḥ śūraḥ śūraḥ prāṇaprado'rthinām //
analyzed: nahi prāṇa haraḥ śūraḥ śūraḥ prāṇa prada ūrthinām

original: MSS_7819A-1 etadeva mama puṇyamagaṇyaṃ yat kṛśodari dṛśoratithis tvam /
analyzed: etat eva mama puṇyam agaṇyam yat kṛśa udari dṛśoḥ atithiḥ tvam

original: MSS_7819A-2 dūramastu madaghūrṇitatāraṃ śāradendumukhi vīkṣaṇamakṣṇoḥ //
analyzed: dūram astu mada ghūrṇita tāram śārada indu mukhi vīkṣaṇam akṣṇoḥ

original: MSS_7820-1 etadeva mahaccitraṃ prāktanasyeha karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: etat eva mahat citram prāktanasya iha karmaṇaḥ

original: MSS_7820-2 yadanātmavatāmāyur yaccānatimatāṃ śriyaḥ //
analyzed: yat anātmavatām āyuḥ yat ca anatimatām śriyaḥ

original: MSS_7821-1 etadeva hi pāṇḍityam iyameva bahujñatā /
analyzed: etat eva hi pāṇḍityam iyam eva bahu jña tā

original: MSS_7821-2 ayameva paro lābho yat svalpād bhūrirakṣaṇam //
analyzed: ayam eva paraḥ lābhaḥ yat su alpāt bhūri rakṣaṇam

original: MSS_7822-1 etadeva hi pāṇḍityaṃ eṣā caiva kulīnatā /
analyzed: etat eva hi pāṇḍityam eṣā ca eva kulīna tā

original: MSS_7822-2 eṣa eva paro dharma āyādūnataro vyayaḥ //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva paraḥ dharmaḥ āyāt ūnataraḥ vyayaḥ

original: MSS_7824-1 etadevāyuṣaḥ sāraṃ nisargakṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ /
analyzed: etat eva āyuṣaḥ sāram nisarga kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ

original: MSS_7824-2 snigdharmugdhairvidagdhaiśca yadayantritamāsyate //
analyzed: snigdhaiḥ mugdhaiḥ vidagdhaiḥ ca yat ayantritam āsyate

original: MSS_7824A-1 etadevārthasāmarthyaṃ pratyakṣeṇopalakṣyate /
analyzed: etat eva artha sāmarthyam pratyakṣeṇa upalakṣyate

original: MSS_7824A-2 putradārādisaṃbandhaḥ puṃsāṃ dhananibandhanaḥ //
analyzed: putra dāra ādi saṃbandhaḥ puṃsām dhana nibandhanaḥ

original: MSS_7825-1 etadevārthasāmarthyaṃ pratyakṣeṇopalakṣyate /
analyzed: etat eva artha sāmarthyam pratyakṣeṇa upalakṣyate

original: MSS_7825-2 yat skandhabandhe jīvadbhiḥ śavaḥ śibikayohyate //
analyzed: yat skandhabandhe jīvadbhiḥ śavaḥ śibikayā uhyate

original: MSS_7826-1 etadgandhagajas tṛṣāmbhasi bhṛśaṃ kaṇṭhāntamajjattanuḥ phenaiḥ pāṇḍuritaḥ svadikkarijayakrīḍāyaśaḥspardhibhiḥ /
analyzed: etad gandha gajaḥ tṛṣā ambhasi bhṛśam kaṇṭha anta majjat tanuḥ phenaiḥ pāṇḍuritaḥ sva dikkari jaya krīḍā yaśaḥ spardhibhiḥ

original: MSS_7826-2 dantadvandvajalānubimbanacaturdantaḥ karāmbhovami- vyājādabhramuvallabhena virahaṃ nirvāpayatyambudheḥ //
analyzed: danta dvandva jala anubimbana catur dantaḥ kara ambhaḥ vami vyājāt a bhramu vallabhena viraham nirvāpayati ambudheḥ

original: MSS_7827-1 etaddattāsighātasravadasṛgasuhṛdvaṃśasārdrendhanait ad- doruddāmapratāpajvaladanalamiladbhūmadhūmabhramāya /
analyzed: etad datta asi ghāta sravat asṛj asuhṛd vaṃśa sārdra indhanā et dos uddāma pratāpa jvalat anala milat bhūma dhūma bhramāya

original: MSS_7827-2 etaddigjaitrayātrāsamasamarabharaṃ paśyataḥ kasya nāsīd etannāsīravājivrajakhurajarajorājirājisthalīṣu //
analyzed: etat diś jaitra yātrā sama samara bharam paśyataḥ kasya nā āsīt etat nāsīra vāji vraja khuraja rajaḥ rāji rāji sthalīṣu

original: MSS_7828-1 etad dadhāti navayauvananartakasya kaśmīrajacchuritatālakayugmalakṣmīm /
analyzed: etat dadhāti nava yauvana nartakasya kaśmīra ja churita tālaka yugma lakṣmīm

original: MSS_7828-2 madhye samucchvasitavṛtti manāgupānte labdhātmasīma kucakuḍmalayugmamasyāḥ //
analyzed: madhye samucchvasita vṛtti manāk upānte labdha ātma sīma kuca kuḍmala yugmam asyāḥ

original: MSS_7829-1 etaddantibalairvilokya nikhilāmāliṅgitāṅgīṃ bhuvaṃ saṃgrāmāṅgaṇasīmni jaṅgamagiristomabhramādhāyibhiḥ /
analyzed: etat danti balaiḥ vilokya nikhilām āliṅgita aṅgīm bhuvam saṃgrāma aṅgaṇa sīmni jaṅgama giri stoma bhrama ādhāyibhiḥ

original: MSS_7829-2 pṛthvīndraḥ pṛthuretadugrasamaraprekṣopanamrāmara- śreṇīmadhyacaraḥ punaḥ kṣitidharakṣepāya dhatte dhiyam //
analyzed: pṛthvīndraḥ pṛthuḥ etad ugra samara prekṣā upanamra amara śreṇī madhya caraḥ punar kṣitidhara kṣepāya dhatte dhiyam

original: MSS_7830-1 etad deva yaśaskaraṃ narapateryat taskare nigraho dīrghaṃ jīva yathāparādhamadhuraṃ daṇḍaṃ jagatyāvahan /
analyzed: etat deva yaśaskaram narapateḥ yat taskare nigrahaḥ dīrgham jīva yathā aparādha madhuram daṇḍam jagatyā āvahan

original: MSS_7830-2 yenāyaṃ paripanthipārthivavadhūsindūracauras tvayā baddhaśca pratidaṇḍabhairavakarī kṣiptaśca kārāgṛhe //
analyzed: yena ayam paripanthi pārthiva vadhū sindūra cauraḥ tvayā baddhaḥ ca pratidaṇḍa bhairava karī kṣiptaḥ ca kārā gṛhe

original: MSS_7831-1 etad dhanañjayo vācyo nityodyukto vṛkodaraḥ /
analyzed: etat dhanañjayaḥ vācyaḥ nitya udyuktaḥ vṛkodaraḥ

original: MSS_7831-2 yadarthaṃ kṣatriyā sūte tasya kālo'yamāgataḥ //
analyzed: yad artham kṣatriyā sūte tasya kālaḥ yam āgataḥ

original: MSS_7832-1 etaddhi paramaṃ nāryāḥ kāryaṃ loke sanātanam /
analyzed: etat hi paramam nāryāḥ kāryam loke sanātanam

original: MSS_7832-2 prāṇānapi parityajya yad bhartṛhitamācaret //
analyzed: prāṇān api parityajya yat bhartṛ hitam ācaret

original: MSS_7833-1 etad babhrukacānukārikiraṇaṃ rājadruho'hnaḥ śiraś- chedābhaṃ viyataḥ pratīci nipatatyabdhau ravermaṇḍalam /
analyzed: etat babhru kaca anukāri kiraṇam rāja druhaḥ hnaḥ śiraḥ cheda ābham viyataḥ pratīci nipatati abdhau raveḥ maṇḍalam

original: MSS_7833-2 eṣāpi dyuramā priyānugamanaṃ proddāmakāṣṭhotthite saṃdhyāgnau vinidhāya tārakamiṣājjātāsthiśeṣasthitiḥ //
analyzed: eṣā api dyuramā priya anugamanam proddāma kāṣṭha utthite saṃdhyā agnau vinidhāya tāraka miṣāt jāta asthi śeṣa sthitiḥ

original: MSS_7834-1 etad buddhimaśeṣāṇāṃ sattvamātanya yogavit /
analyzed: etat buddhim aśeṣāṇām sattvam ātanya yoga vid

original: MSS_7834-2 parityajati samprāpya buddhisaukṣmyamanuttamam //
analyzed: parityajati samprāpya buddhi saukṣmyam anuttamam

original: MSS_7835-1 etadbhītārinārī giribilavigaladvāsarā niḥsarantī svakrīḍāhaṃsamohagrahilaśiśubhṛśaprārthi tonnidracandrā /
analyzed: etad bhīta ari nārī giri bila vigalat vāsarā niḥsarantī sva krīḍā haṃsa moha grahila śiśu bhṛśa prārthi tad unnidra candrā

original: MSS_7835-2 ākrandad bhūri yattannayanajalamilaccandrahaṃsānubimba- pratyāsattiprahṛṣyattanayavihasitairāśvasīn nyaśvasīcca //
analyzed: ākrandat bhūri yat tad nayanajala milat candra haṃsa anubimba pratyāsatti prahṛṣyat tanaya vihasitaiḥ āśvasīt nyaśvasīt ca

original: MSS_7836-1 etad bhīmaparākrameṇa racitaṃ saṃsārasāraṃ saraḥ pāthonāthakathāpahastanakalāvaicakṣaṇe dīkṣitam /
analyzed: etat bhīma parākrameṇa racitam saṃsāra sāram saraḥ pāthaḥ nātha kathā apahastana kalā vaicakṣaṇe dīkṣitam

original: MSS_7836-2 yanmāhātmyavilokanādbhutarasāddhūtāmbaraśrī śiraḥ- srastaṃ kuṇḍalamambubimbitaravivyājena vidyotate //
analyzed: yat māhātmya vilokana adbhuta rasāt hūta ambara śrī śiraḥ srastam kuṇḍalam ambu bimbita ravi vyājena vidyotate

original: MSS_7837-1 etadbhūṣaṇakauśalaṃ tava tanau paśyet tadā mādhavo rādhe tatsavidhe hi cetasicale ced dhairyamādhāsyati /
analyzed: etat bhūṣaṇa kauśalam tava tanau paśyet tadā mādhavaḥ rādhe tad savidhe hi cetasi cale ced dhairyam ādhāsyati

original: MSS_7837-2 itthaṃ jalpati śilpakāriṇi jane tasyāḥ smarantyā hariṃ sadyaḥ svedasarid vyalampadamalaṃ patrāvalīmaṇḍalam //
analyzed: ittham jalpati śilpa kāriṇi jane tasyāḥ smarantyāḥ harim sadyas sveda sarit vyalampat amalam patra āvalī maṇḍalam

original: MSS_7838-1 etadyaśaḥkṣīradhipūragāhi patatyagādhe vacanaṃ kavīnām /
analyzed: etat yaśaḥ kṣīra dhi pūra gāhi patati agādhe vacanam kavīnām

original: MSS_7838-2 etadguṇānāṃ gaṇanāṅkapātaḥ pratyarthikīrtīḥ khaṭikāḥ kṣiṇoti //
analyzed: etad guṇānām gaṇanā aṅka pātaḥ pratyarthi kīrtīḥ khaṭikāḥ kṣiṇoti

original: MSS_7839-1 etad rahasyaṃ paramam etacca paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: etat rahasyam paramam etat ca paramam padam

original: MSS_7839-2 eṣā gatirviraktānām eṣo'sau paramaḥ śivaḥ //
analyzed: eṣā gatiḥ viraktānām eṣā asau paramaḥ śivaḥ

original: MSS_7840-1 etad vidanto vidvāṃso brāhmaṇā brahmavādinaḥ /
analyzed: etat vidantaḥ vidvāṃsaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: MSS_7840-2 na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇanti pretya śreyo'bhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇanti pretya śreyaḥ bhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_7841-1 etad vidvān maduditaṃ jñānavijñānanaipuṇam /
analyzed: etat vidvān mad uditam jñāna vijñāna naipuṇam

original: MSS_7841-2 na nindati na ca stauti loke carati sūryavat //
analyzed: na nindati na ca stauti loke carati sūrya vat

original: MSS_7842-1 etad vidhānamātiṣṭhed arogaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ /
analyzed: etat vidhānam ātiṣṭhet arogaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: MSS_7842-2 asvasthaḥ sarvametat tu bhṛtyeṣu viniyojayet //
analyzed: asvasthaḥ sarvam etat tu bhṛtyeṣu viniyojayet

original: MSS_7843-1 etad vibhāti caramācalacūḍacumbi- hiṇḍīrapiṇḍaruciśītamarīcibimbam /
analyzed: etat vibhāti carama acala cūḍa cumbi hiṇḍīra piṇḍa ruci śīta marīci bimbam

original: MSS_7843-2 ujjvālitasya rajanīṃ madanānalasya dhūmaṃ dadhat prakaṭalāñchanakaitavena //
analyzed: ujjvālitasya rajanīm madana analasya dhūmam dadhat prakaṭa lāñchana kaitavena

original: MSS_7844-1 etad vyomavanīvarāhavalayaṃ viśvaikavīrasmara- skandhāvāramadāndhasindhurakulaṃ śyāmāvadhūkaiśikam /
analyzed: etat vyoma vanī varāha valayam viśva eka vīra smara skandhāvāra mada andha sindhura kulam śyāmā vadhū kaiśikam

original: MSS_7844-2 cakṣuṣyāñjanavastu ghūkasadasāṃ viśliṣṭacakrāhvaya- stomāntargatadhūmaketanamahādhūmyā tamas tāryate //
analyzed: cakṣuṣya añjana vastu ghūka sadasām viśliṣṭa cakra āhvaya stoma antargata dhūmaketana mahā dhūmyā tamaḥ tāryate

original: MSS_7845-1 etannarendravṛṣabha kṣapayā vrajantyā saṃropaṇārthamiva gopitamambujeṣu /
analyzed: etat narendra vṛṣabha kṣapayā vrajantyā saṃropaṇa artham iva gopitam ambujeṣu

original: MSS_7845-2 udghāṭayatyayamaśītakaraḥ karaughaiḥ padmākarāt timirabījamivālivṛndam //
analyzed: udghāṭayati ayam aśītakaraḥ kara oghaiḥ padma ākarāt timira bījam iva ali vṛndam

original: MSS_7846-1 etanmandavipakvatindukaphalaśyāmodarāpāṇḍara- prāntaṃ hanta pulindasundarakarasparśakṣamaṃ labhyate /
analyzed: etat manda vipakva tinduka phala śyāma udara āpāṇḍara prāntam hanta pulinda sundara kara sparśa kṣamam labhyate

original: MSS_7846-2 tat pallīpatiputri kuñjarakulaṃ kumbhābhayābhyarthanā- dīnaṃ tvāmanunāthate kucayugaṃ patrāvṛtaṃ mā kṛthāḥ //
analyzed: tat pallī pati putri kuñjara kulam kumbha abhaya abhyarthanā dīnam tvām anunāthate kuca yugam patra āvṛtam mā kṛthāḥ

original: MSS_7847-1 etanmayamiva jātaṃ nipatitamasyāṃ mano nūnam /
analyzed: etad mayam iva jātam nipatitam asyām manaḥ nūnam

original: MSS_7847-2 nāyātyapi yadupāyāt kathamapi kāyāt kuraṅganayanāyāḥ //
analyzed: na āyāti api yad upāyāt katham api kāyāt kuraṅganayanāyāḥ

original: MSS_7848-1 etanmānini mānasaṃ surasaro nirlūnahemāmbujaṃ pārvatyā priyapūjanārthamamuto gaṅgāsarinnirgatā /
analyzed: etat mānini mānasam surasaraḥ nirlūna hema ambujam pārvatyā priya pūjana artham amutas gaṅgāsarit nirgatā

original: MSS_7848-2 asmāc citraśikhaṇḍibhiśca parame parvaṇyupādīyate snānottīrṇavṛṣāṅkabhasmarajasāṃ saṅgāt pavitraṃ payaḥ //
analyzed: asmāt citra śikhaṇḍibhiḥ ca parame parvaṇi upādīyate snāna uttīrṇa vṛṣāṅka bhasma rajasām saṅgāt pavitram payaḥ

original: MSS_7849-1 etanmālavamaṇḍalaṃ vijayate saujanyaratnāṅkuraiḥ saṃpadvibhramadhāmabhiḥ kimaparaṃ śṛṅgārasārairjanaiḥ /
analyzed: etat mālava maṇḍalam vijayate saujanya ratna aṅkuraiḥ saṃpad vibhrama dhāmabhiḥ kim aparam śṛṅgāra sāraiḥ janaiḥ

original: MSS_7849-2 yatrāruhya vicitracitravalabhīrlīlāśilāsadmanāṃ nīyante jaladodayeṣu divasāḥ kāntāsakhaiḥ kāmibhiḥ //
analyzed: yatra āruhya vicitra citra valabhīḥ līlā śilā sadmanām nīyante jalada udayeṣu divasāḥ kāntā sakhaiḥ kāmibhiḥ

original: MSS_7850-1 etanmukhaṃ priyāyāḥ śaśinaṃ jitvā kapolayoḥ kāntyā /
analyzed: etat mukham priyāyāḥ śaśinam jitvā kapolayoḥ kāntyā

original: MSS_7850-2 tāpānuraktamadhunā kamalaṃ dhruvamīhate jetum //
analyzed: tāpa anuraktam adhunā kamalam dhruvam īhate jetum

original: MSS_7851-1 etallocanamutpalabhramavaśāt padmabhramādānanaṃ bhrāntyā bimbaphalasya cājani dadhadvāmādharo vedhasā /
analyzed: etat locanam utpala bhrama vaśāt padma bhramāt ānanam bhrāntyā bimba phalasya ca ajani dadhat vāma adharaḥ vedhasā

original: MSS_7851-2 tasyāḥ satyamanaṅgavibhramabhuvaḥ pratyaṅgamāsaṅginī bhrāntirviśvasṛjo'pi yatra kiyatī tatrāsmadādermatiḥ //
analyzed: tasyāḥ satyam anaṅga vibhrama bhuvaḥ pratyaṅgam āsaṅginī bhrāntiḥ viśvasṛjaḥ api yatra kiyatī tatra asmad ādeḥ matiḥ

original: MSS_7852-1 etasmāj jaladherjalasya kaṇikāḥ kāścid gṛhītvā tataḥ pāthodāḥ paripūrayanti jagatīṃ ruddhāmbarā vāribhiḥ /
analyzed: etasmāt jaladheḥ jalasya kaṇikāḥ kāścid gṛhītvā tatas pāthodāḥ paripūrayanti jagatīm ruddha ambarāḥ vāribhiḥ

original: MSS_7852-2 asmān mandarakūṭakoṭighaṭanābhītibhramattārakāṃ prāpyaikāṃ jalamānuṣīṃ tribhuvane śrīmānabhūdacyutaḥ //
analyzed: asmāt mandara kūṭa koṭi ghaṭana abhīti bhramat tārakām prāpya ekām jala mānuṣīm tribhuvane śrīmān abhūt acyutaḥ

original: MSS_7853-1 etasmāt kathamindrajālamaparaṃ strīgarbhavāso'sthiraṃ retaḥ ścyotati mastamastakapadāvirbhūtanānāṅkuram /
analyzed: etasmāt katham indrajālam aparam strī garbha vāsaḥ sthiram retaḥ ścyotati masta mastaka pada āvirbhūta nānā aṅkuram

original: MSS_7853-2 paryāyeṇa śiśutvayauvanajarāveṣairaśeṣairvṛtaṃ paśyatyatti śṛṇoti jighrati muhurnidrāti jāgarti ca //
analyzed: paryāyeṇa śiśu tva yauvana jarā veṣaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ vṛtam paśyati atti śṛṇoti jighrati muhur nidrāti jāgarti ca

original: MSS_7854-1 etasmāt paramānandāc śuddhacinmātrarūpiṇaḥ /
MSS_7854-2 jīvaḥ saṃjāyate pūrvaṃ tasmāc cittaṃ tato jagat //
analyzed: jīvaḥ saṃjāyate pūrvam tasmāt cittam tatas jagat

original: MSS_7855-1 etasmāt sarasaścirāya calitaṃ cakreṇa cetasvatā nīrakṣīraparīkṣakeṇa sudhiyā haṃsena hā nirgatam /
analyzed: etasmāt sarasaḥ cirāya calitam cakreṇa cetasvatā nīra kṣīra parīkṣakeṇa sudhiyā haṃsena hā nirgatam

original: MSS_7855-2 niryātaṃ nibhṛtaṃ kaladhvanikṛtā kāraṇḍavena kvacit sārdhaṃ kena karotu sārasayuvā saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ savyathaḥ //
analyzed: niryātam nibhṛtam kala dhvanikṛtā kāraṇḍavena kvacid sārdham kena karotu sārasa yuvā saṃbhāṣaṇam sa vyathaḥ

original: MSS_7856-1 etasmādamṛtaṃ suraiḥ śatamakhenoccaiḥśravāḥ sadguṇaḥ kṛṣṇenādbhutavikramaikavasatirlakṣmīḥ samāsāditā /
analyzed: etasmāt amṛtam suraiḥ śatamakhena uccaiḥśravāḥ sat guṇaḥ kṛṣṇena adbhuta vikrama eka vasatiḥ lakṣmīḥ samāsāditā

original: MSS_7856-2 ityādi pracurāḥ purātanakathāḥ sarvebhya eva śrutā asmābhistu na dṛṣṭamatra jaladhau miṣṭaṃ payo'pi kvacit //
analyzed: ityādi pracurāḥ purātana kathāḥ sarvebhyaḥ eva śrutāḥ asmābhiḥ tu na dṛṣṭam atra jaladhau miṣṭam payaḥ api kvacid

original: MSS_7857-1 etasmād viramendriyārthagahanādāyāsakādāśrayāc śreyomārgamaśeṣaduḥkhaśamanavyāpāradakṣaṃ kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: etasmāt virama indriya artha gahanāt āyāsakāt āśrayāt śreyaḥ mārgam aśeṣa duḥkha śamana vyāpāra dakṣam kṣaṇāt

original: MSS_7857-2 śāntaṃ bhāvamupaihi saṃtyaja nijāṃ kallolalolāṃ gatiṃ mā bhūyo bhaja bhaṅgurāṃ bhavaratiṃ cetaḥ prasīdādhunā //
analyzed: śāntam bhāvam upaihi saṃtyaja nijām kallola lolām gatim mā bhūyas bhaja bhaṅgurām bhava ratim cetaḥ prasīda adhunā

original: MSS_7858-1 etasmān māṃ kuśalinamabhijñānadānād viditvā mā kaulīnādasitanayane mayyaviśvāsinī bhūḥ /
analyzed: etasmāt mām kuśalinam abhijñāna dānāt viditvā mā kaulīnāt asita nayane mayi aviśvāsinī bhūḥ

original: MSS_7858-2 snehānāhuḥ kimapi virahe hrāsinas te hyabhogād iṣṭe vastunyupacitarasāḥ premarāśībhavanti //
analyzed: snehān āhuḥ kim api virahe hrāsinaḥ te hi abhogāt iṣṭe vastuni upacita rasāḥ prema rāśībhavanti

original: MSS_7859-1 etasmin kusume svabhāvamahati prāyo mahīyaḥ phalaṃ ramyaṃ svādu sugandhi śītalamalaṃ prāptavyamityāśayā /
analyzed: etasmin kusume svabhāva mahati prāyas mahīyaḥ phalam ramyam svādu sugandhi śītala malam prāptavyam iti āśayā

original: MSS_7859-2 śālmalyāḥ paripākakālakalanābodhena kīraḥ sthito yāvat tatpuṭasaṃdhinirgatapatattūlaṃ phalāt paśyati //
analyzed: śālmalyāḥ paripāka kāla kalanā bodhena kīraḥ sthitaḥ yāvat tad puṭa saṃdhi nirgata patat tūlam phalāt paśyati

original: MSS_7860-1 etasmin ghanacandanārdravapuṣo nidrākaṣāyekṣaṇā līlālolamṛdūllasadbhujalatāvyājṛmbhamāṇ ā muhuḥ /
analyzed: etasmin ghana candana ārdra vapuṣaḥ nidrā kaṣāya īkṣaṇā līlā lola mṛdu ullasat bhuja latā vyājṛmbhamān ā muhur

original: MSS_7860-2 nirgacchanti śanairahaḥpariṇatau mandā latāmandirāt svedāmbhaḥkaṇadanturastanataṭābhogāḥ kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: nirgacchanti śanais ahar pariṇatau mandāḥ latā mandirāt sveda ambhaḥ kaṇa dantura stana taṭa ābhogāḥ kuraṅgī dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_7861-1 etasmin ghanabaddhasampadi vanotsaṅge navāptoṣmabhiḥ svacchandaṃ gamitaḥ sukhena katibhiḥ kālo na dantāvalaiḥ /
analyzed: etasmin ghana baddha sampadi vana utsaṅge nava āpta ūṣmabhiḥ svacchandam gamitaḥ sukhena katibhiḥ kālaḥ na dantāvalaiḥ

original: MSS_7861-2 dhig jāto'si tadātra dagdhasamaye dantinyadā nodakaṃ no vṛkṣā na tṛṇāni kevalamayaṃ dāvānalaḥ krīḍati //
analyzed: dhik jātaḥ asi tadā atra dagdha samaye dantinī adā na udakam no vṛkṣāḥ na tṛṇāni kevalam ayam dāva analaḥ krīḍati

original: MSS_7862-1 etasmin dākṣiṇāśānilacalitalatālīnamattālimāl ā- pakṣakṣobhāvadhūtacyutabahalarajohlādihṛdye vasante /
analyzed: etasmin dākṣiṇa āśā anila calita latā līna matta ali māl ā pakṣa kṣobha avadhūta cyuta bahala rajaḥ hlādi hṛdye vasante

original: MSS_7862-2 premasvedārdrabāhuślathavalayaraṇatprauḍhasīmantinīnāṃ mandaḥ kaṇṭhagraho'pi glapayati hṛdayaṃ kiṃ punarviprayogaḥ //
analyzed: prema sveda ārdra bāhu ślatha valaya raṇat prauḍha sīmantinīnām mandaḥ kaṇṭhagrahaḥ api glapayati hṛdayam kim punar viprayogaḥ

original: MSS_7863-1 etasmin divasasya madhyasamaye vāto'pi caṇḍātapa- trāseneva na saṃcaratyahimagorbimbe lalāṭaṃtape /
analyzed: etasmin divasasya madhya samaye vātaḥ api caṇḍa ātapa trāsena iva na saṃcarati ahimagoḥ bimbe lalāṭaṃtape

original: MSS_7863-2 kiṃ cānyatparitaptadhūliluṭhanaploṣāsahatvādiva cchāyā dūragatāpi bhūruhatale vyāvartya saṃlīyate //
analyzed: kim ca anyat paritapta dhūli luṭhana ploṣa asaha tvāt iva chāyā dūra gatā api bhūruha tale vyāvartya saṃlīyate

original: MSS_7864-1 etasminnadhikapayaḥśriyaṃ vahantyaḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ pavanabhuvā javena nītāḥ /
analyzed: etasmin adhika payaḥ śriyam vahantyaḥ saṃkṣobham pavana bhuvā javena nītāḥ

original: MSS_7864-2 vālmīkerarahitarāmalakṣmaṇānāṃ sādharmyaṃ dadhati girāṃ mahāsarasyaḥ //
analyzed: vālmīkera rahita rāma lakṣmaṇānām sādharmyam dadhati girām mahā sarasyaḥ

original: MSS_7865-1 etasminnavadātakāntini kucadvandve kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ saṃkrāntapratibimbamaindavamidaṃ dvedhā vibhaktaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: etasmin avadāta kāntini kuca dvandve kuraṅgī dṛśaḥ saṃkrānta pratibimbam aindavam idam dvedhā vibhaktam vapuḥ

original: MSS_7865-2 ānandottaralasya puṣpadhanuṣas tatkālanṛtyotsava- prāptiprodyatakāṃsyatālayugalaprāyaṃ samālokyate //
analyzed: ānanda uttaralasya puṣpadhanuṣaḥ tad kāla nṛtya utsava prāpti prodyata kāṃsya tāla yugala prāyam samālokyate

original: MSS_7866-1 etasmin madakalamallikākṣapakṣa- vyādhūtasphuradurudaṇḍapuṇḍarīkāḥ /
analyzed: etasmin mada kala mallikākṣa pakṣa vyādhūta sphurat uru daṇḍa puṇḍarīkāḥ

original: MSS_7866-2 bāṣpāmbhaḥparipatanodgamāntarāle dṛśyantāmavirahitaśriyo vibhāgāḥ //
analyzed: bāṣpa ambhaḥ paripatana udgama antarāle dṛśyantām avirahita śriyaḥ vibhāgāḥ

original: MSS_7867-1 etasmin madajarjarairupacite kambūravāḍambaraiḥ staimityaṃ manaso diśatyanibhṛtaṃ dhārārave mūrcchati /
analyzed: etasmin mada jarjaraiḥ upacite kambū rava āḍambaraiḥ staimityam manasaḥ diśati anibhṛtam dhārā rave mūrcchati

original: MSS_7867-2 utsaṅge kakubho nidhāya rasitairambhomucāṃ ghorayan manye mudritacandrasūryanayanaṃ vyomāpi nidrāyate //
analyzed: utsaṅge kakubhaḥ nidhāya rasitaiḥ ambhomucām ghorayan manye mudrita candra sūrya nayanam vyomā api nidrāyate

original: MSS_7868-1 etasmin marumaṇḍale paricalatkallolakolāhala- krīḍatkaṅkamapaṅkamaṅkavilasanniḥśaṅkamatsy avrajam /
analyzed: etasmin maru maṇḍale paricalat kallola kolāhala krīḍat kaṅkama paṅkam aṅka vilasat niḥśaṅka matsī avrajam

original: MSS_7868-2 kenedaṃ vikasatkuśeśayakuṭīkoṇakvaṇatṣaṭpadaṃ śreṇiprīṇitapānthamujjvalajalaṃ cakre viśālaṃ saraḥ //
analyzed: kena idam vikasat kuśeśaya kuṭī koṇa kvaṇat ṣaṭpadam śreṇi prīṇita pāntham ujjvala jalam cakre viśālam saraḥ

original: MSS_7869-1 etasmin mṛgayāṃ gate'pi dhanuṣā bāṇe samāropite'py ākarṇāntagate'pi muṣṭivigate'pyenāṅgalagne'pi ca /
analyzed: etasmin mṛgayām gate ipi dhanuṣā bāṇe samāropite ipi ā karṇa anta gate ipi muṣṭi vigate ipi enā aṅga lagne ipi ca

original: MSS_7869-2 na trastaṃ na palāyitaṃ na calitaṃ notkaṇṭhitaṃ notplutaṃ mṛgyā yad vaśinaṃ karoti dayitaṃ kāmo'yamityāśayā //
analyzed: na trastam na palāyitam na calitam na utkaṇṭhitam na utplutam mṛgyā yat vaśinam karoti dayitam kāmaḥ yam iti āśayā

original: MSS_7870-1 etasmin vanamārgabhūparisare saundaryamudrāṅkitaḥ prodyadbhiḥ phalapatrapuṣpanivahaiś cūtaḥ sa ekaḥ param /
analyzed: etasmin vana mārga bhū parisare saundarya mudrā aṅkitaḥ prodyadbhiḥ phala patra puṣpa nivahaiḥ cūtaḥ saḥ ekaḥ param

original: MSS_7870-2 yaṃ vīkṣya smitavaktramudgatamahāsaṃtoṣamullāsita- sphārotkaṇṭhamakuṇṭhitakramamamī dhāvanti pānthavrajāḥ //
analyzed: yam vīkṣya smita vaktram udgata mahā saṃtoṣam ullāsita sphāra utkaṇṭham akuṇṭhita kramam amī dhāvanti pāntha vrajāḥ

original: MSS_7871-1 etasmin vijane vane'tanutarucchannāvakāśe sukhaṃ tiṣṭhāmīti tava dviṣāmadhipatiryāvad vidhatte matim /
analyzed: etasmin vijane vana tanu taru channa avakāśe sukham tiṣṭhāmi iti tava dviṣām adhipatiḥ yāvat vidhatte matim

original: MSS_7871-2 tāvat tatra nipātitaṃ bhuvi bhavannāmāṅkasellāhataṃ dṛṣṭvā kesariṇaḥ karaṅkamasamatrāso muhurmurcchati //
analyzed: tāvat tatra nipātitam bhuvi bhavat nāma aṅkasella āhatam dṛṣṭvā kesariṇaḥ karaṅkam asama trāsaḥ muhur murcchati

original: MSS_7872-1 etasmin vipine mayā balavatā nājñāpitāḥ ke mṛgāḥ kasmai vā na phalaṃ vikīrṇamucitaṃ roṣasya toṣasya ca /
analyzed: etasmin vipine mayā balavatā na ājñāpitāḥ ke mṛgāḥ kasmai vā na phalam vikīrṇam ucitam roṣasya toṣasya ca

original: MSS_7872-2 so'haṃ mūṣakamadya bandhanaguṇacchedārthamabhyarthaye nāsthāṃ so'pi karoti dagdhahṛdayaṃ dvedhā na kiṃ bhidyate //
analyzed: saḥ aham mūṣakam adya bandhana guṇa cheda artham abhyarthaye na āsthām saḥ api karoti dagdha hṛdayam dvedhā na kim bhidyate

original: MSS_7873-1 etasmin vipule plavaṃgamakule jāto guṇairagraṇīr ekaḥ kvāpi kapiḥ sa ko'pi marutāṃ vandyo marunnandanaḥ /
analyzed: etasmin vipule plavaṃgama kule jātaḥ guṇaiḥ agraṇīḥ ekaḥ kvāpi kapiḥ sa kopi marutām vandyaḥ marut nandanaḥ

original: MSS_7873-2 keliprāṅgaṇavāpikāvadabhavad yasyāmbhasāṃ bhartari drākkallolavikārakalpitajagatkampe'pi jhampārasaḥ //
analyzed: keli prāṅgaṇa vāpikā vat abhavat yasya ambhasām bhartari drāk kallola vikāra kalpita jagat kampe pi jhampā rasaḥ

original: MSS_7874-1 etasmin sarasi prasannapayasi prāṇatruṭattālunā kiṃkolāhalaḍambareṇa khalu re maṇḍūka mūkībhava /
analyzed: etasmin sarasi prasanna payasi prāṇa truṭat tālunā kiṃkolāhala ḍambareṇa khalu re maṇḍūka mūkībhava

original: MSS_7874-2 unmīlannayanāvalīdalacalallakṣmīraṇannūpura- vyāhāraprativādinaḥ pratidinaṃ preṣanti haṃsasvanāḥ //
analyzed: unmīlat nayana āvalī dala calat lakṣmī raṇat nūpura vyāhāra prativādinaḥ pratidinam preṣanti haṃsa svanāḥ

original: MSS_7875-1 etasmin sahasā vasantasamaye prāṇeśa deśāntaraṃ gantuṃ tvaṃ yatase tathāpi na bhayaṃ tāpāt prapadye'dhunā /
analyzed: etasmin sahasā vasanta samaye prāṇeśa deśa antaram gantum tvam yatase tathā api na bhayam tāpāt prapadya idhunā

original: MSS_7875-2 yasmāt kairavasārasaurabhamuṣā sākaṃ sarovāyunā cāndrī dikṣu vijṛmbhate rajaniṣu svacchā mayūkhacchaṭā //
analyzed: yasmāt kairava sāra saurabha muṣā sākam saraḥ vāyunā cāndrī dikṣu vijṛmbhate rajaniṣu su acchā mayūkha chaṭā

original: MSS_7876-1 etasmin sutanu latāgṛhe'tiramyaṃ mālatyāḥ kusumamanācitaṃ pareṇa /
analyzed: etasmin su tanu latā gṛha iti ramyam mālatyāḥ kusumam an ācitam pareṇa

original: MSS_7876-2 ityuktvā mṛdukarapallavaṃ gṛhītvā mugdhākṣīṃ rahasi nināya ko'pi dhūrtaḥ //
analyzed: iti uktvā mṛdu kara pallavam gṛhītvā mugdha akṣīm rahasi nināya kopi dhūrtaḥ

original: MSS_7877-1 etasya kalāmekām amṛtamayūkhasya pārvatīramaṇaḥ /
analyzed: etasya kalām ekām amṛta mayūkhasya pārvatīramaṇaḥ

original: MSS_7877-2 varṇāvalimiva vahati pratimāsaṃ ghaṭyamānasya //
analyzed: varṇa āvalim iva vahati pratimāsam ghaṭyamānasya

original: MSS_7878-1 etasya jāṅgulika nārpaya mantradarpād āsye nijāṅgulimayaṃ khalu ko'pi sarpaḥ /
analyzed: etasya jāṅgulika nā arpaya mantra darpāt āsye nija aṅgulim ayam khalu kaḥ api sarpaḥ

original: MSS_7878-2 atraiva yasya viṣameṇa viṣeṇa dagdhās te tvādṛśā nirasavaḥ patitāḥ sahasram //
analyzed: atrā eva yasya viṣameṇa viṣeṇa dagdhāḥ te tvādṛśāḥ nirasavaḥ patitāḥ sahasram

original: MSS_7879-1 etasya rahasi vakṣasi sarasijapattreṇa tāḍitasyāpi /
analyzed: etasya rahasi vakṣasi sarasija pattreṇa tāḍitasya api

original: MSS_7879-2 dayitasya vīkṣya hasitaṃ priyasakhi hasitaṃ mamāpyāsīt //
analyzed: dayitasya vīkṣya hasitam priya sakhi hasitam mama api āsīt

original: MSS_7880-1 etasya veśmani kalāvati hālikasya durddaivavaibhavavaśāt patitāsi tanvi /
analyzed: etasya veśmani kalāvati hālikasya durddaiva vaibhava vaśāt patitā asi tanvi

original: MSS_7880-2 tadvārikumbhavahanāya karīṣakṛtyai cāturyamarjaya vaśīkaraṇāya bhartuḥ //
analyzed: tad vāri kumbha vahanāya karīṣa kṛtyai cāturyam arjaya vaśīkaraṇāya bhartuḥ

original: MSS_7881-1 etasya sāvanibhujaḥ kularājadhānī kāśī bhavottaraṇadharmatariḥ smarāreḥ /
analyzed: etasya sa avani bhujaḥ kula rājadhānī kāśī bhava uttaraṇa dharma tariḥ smarāreḥ

original: MSS_7881-2 yāmāgatā duritapūritacetaso'pi pāpaṃ nirasya cirajaṃ virajībhavanti //
analyzed: yām āgatāḥ durita pūrita cetasaḥ api pāpam nirasya cira jam virajībhavanti

original: MSS_7882-1 etasyāṃ rativallabhakṣitipateḥ krīḍāsarasyāṃ śanaiḥ saṃśoṣaṃ nayatīha śaiśavavadhūs tāruṇyatigmadyutiḥ /
analyzed: etasyām rati vallabha kṣitipateḥ krīḍā sarasyām śanais saṃśoṣam nayati iha śaiśava vadhūḥ tāruṇya tigma dyutiḥ

original: MSS_7882-2 antaḥsthāpi yathā yathā kucataṭī dhatte'ntarāyadvayaṃ laulyaṃ hanti tathā tathāvidhajale dṛkpīnamīnāvaliḥ //
analyzed: antaḥsthā api yathā yathā kuca taṭī dhattā intarāya dvayam laulyam hanti tathā tathāvidha jale dṛś pīna mīna āvaliḥ

original: MSS_7883-1 etasyāḥ karikumbhasaṃnibhakucaprāgbhārapṛṣṭhe luṭhad- guñjāgarbhagajendramauktikasaraśreṇīmanohāriṇi /
analyzed: etasyāḥ kari kumbha saṃnibha kuca prāgbhāra pṛṣṭhe luṭhat guñjā garbha gajendra mauktika sara śreṇī manohāriṇi

original: MSS_7883-2 dūrādetya taraṅga eṣa patito vegād vilīnaḥ kathaṃ ko vānyo'pi vilīyate na sarasaḥ sīmantinīsaṃgame //
analyzed: dūrāt etya taraṅgaḥ eṣa patitaḥ vegāt vilīnaḥ katham kaḥ vā anyaḥ api vilīyate na sarasaḥ sīmantinī saṃgame

original: MSS_7884-1 etasyāḥ stanapadmakorakayugaṃ yasyānanendoḥ sita- jyotsnābhirna bhajatyado mṛgadṛśaḥ śaṅke vikāsaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: etasyāḥ stana padma koraka yugam yasya ānana indoḥ sita jyotsnābhiḥ na bhajati adaḥ mṛga dṛśaḥ śaṅke vikāsam punar

original: MSS_7884-2 tasmiṃl locanapaṅkajaṃ vikasitaṃ bhrūbhṛṅgasaṃsevitaṃ svānte saṃśayamātanoti sutarāmetan mamaivāsakṛt //
analyzed: tasmin locana paṅkajam vikasitam bhrū bhṛṅga saṃsevitam svānte saṃśayam ātanoti sutarām etat mama eva asakṛt

original: MSS_7885-1 etasyāḥ stanabhārabhaṅguramuraḥ kīrṇā nitambasthalī madhyaṃ majjati nābhigartapatitaṃ nābhyañcalaṃ cumbati /
analyzed: etasyāḥ stana bhāra bhaṅguram uraḥ kīrṇā nitamba sthalī madhyam majjati nābhi garta patitam nābhi añcalam cumbati

original: MSS_7885-2 dhairyaṃ dhehi manaḥkuraṅga purato romāvalī vāgurā etad bhrāntigatāgatavyasaninaḥ kiṃ vā vidheyaṃ vidhe //
analyzed: dhairyam dhehi manaḥ kuraṅga puratas roma āvalī vāgurā etat bhrānti gata āgata vyasaninaḥ kim vā vidheyam vidhe

original: MSS_7886-1 etasyā virahajvaraḥ karatalasparśaiḥ parīkṣyo na yaḥ snigdhenāpi janena dāhabhayataḥ prasthaṃpacaḥ pāthasām /
analyzed: etasyāḥ viraha jvaraḥ kara tala sparśaiḥ parīkṣyaḥ na yaḥ snigdhena api janena dāha bhayataḥ prasthaṃpacaḥ pāthasām

original: MSS_7886-2 niḥśaktīkṛtacandanauṣadhividhāvasmiṃś camatkāriṇo lājasphoṭamamī sphuṭanti maṇayo viśve'pi hārasrajām //
analyzed: niḥśaktīkṛta candana oṣadhi vidhau asmin camatkāriṇaḥ lāja sphoṭam amī sphuṭanti maṇayaḥ viśve api hāra srajām

original: MSS_7887-1 etasyonnatasarvakarmakṛtinas trailokyacūḍāmaṇeḥ śaṃbhubrahmapuraṃdaraprabhṛtayaḥ stutyai na śaktā yadi /
analyzed: etasya unnata sarva karma kṛtinaḥ trailokya cūḍāmaṇeḥ śaṃbhu brahma puraṃdara prabhṛtayaḥ stutyai na śaktāḥ yadi

original: MSS_7887-2 devaḥ pannaganāyako bhagavatī vāṇī svayaṃ cej jaḍā saindaryasya nirūpaṇe vada kathaṃ śakto bhaven mānavaḥ //
analyzed: devaḥ pannaga nāyakaḥ bhagavatī vāṇī svayam ced jaḍā saindaryasya nirūpaṇe vada katham śaktaḥ bhavet mānavaḥ

original: MSS_7888-1 etāṃ navāmbudharakāntimudīkṣya veṇīm eṇīdṛśo yadi vadanti vadantu nāma /
analyzed: etām nava ambudhara kāntim udīkṣya veṇīm eṇī dṛśaḥ yadi vadanti vadantu nāma

original: MSS_7888-2 brūmo vayaṃ mukhasudhāṃśusudhābhilāṣād abhyāgatāṃ bhujaginīṃ maṇimudvahantīm //
analyzed: brūmaḥ vayam mukha sudhā aṃśu sudhā abhilāṣāt abhyāgatām bhujaginīm maṇim udvahantīm

original: MSS_7889-1 etāṃ paśya puraḥsthalīmiha kila krīḍākirāto haraḥ kodaṇḍena kirīṭinā sarabhasaṃ cūḍāntare tāḍitaḥ /
analyzed: etām paśya puras sthalīm iha kila krīḍā kirātaḥ haraḥ kodaṇḍena kirīṭinā sarabhasam cūḍā antare tāḍitaḥ

original: MSS_7889-2 ityākarṇya kathādbhutaṃ himanidhāvadrau subhadrāpater mandaṃ mandamakāri yena nijayordordaṇḍayormaṇḍanam //
analyzed: iti ākarṇya kathā adbhutam himanidhau adrau subhadrā pateḥ mandam mandam akāri yena nijayoḥ dos daṇḍayoḥ maṇḍanam

original: MSS_7890-1 etāṃ vilokaya tanūdari tāmraparṇīm ambhonidhau vivṛtaśuktipuṭoddhṛtāni /
analyzed: etām vilokaya tanu udari tāmraparṇīm ambhonidhau vivṛta śukti puṭa uddhṛtāni

original: MSS_7890-2 yasyāḥ payāṃsi pariṇāhiṣu hāramūrtyā vāmabhruvāṃ pariṇamanti payodhareṣu //
analyzed: yasyāḥ payāṃsi pariṇāhiṣu hāra mūrtyāḥ vāma bhruvām pariṇamanti payodhareṣu

original: MSS_7891-1 etāṃś chinadmi yadi tanmama jīvitena śaṇḍhasya kiṃ nu yadi santvatha gopateḥ kim /
analyzed: etān chinadmi yadi tat mama jīvitena śaṇḍhasya kim nu yadi santu atha gopateḥ kim

original: MSS_7891-2 āse prasārya yadi tajjanatā hasanti bhārairguṇaiśca vṛṣaṇaiśca halā śramo me //
analyzed: āse prasārya yadi tat janatāḥ hasanti bhāraiḥ guṇaiḥ ca vṛṣaṇaiḥ ca halā śramaḥ me

original: MSS_7892-1 etāṃs te bhramaraughanīlakuṭilān badhnāmi kiṃ kuntalān kiṃ nyasyāmi madhūkapāṇḍumadhure gaṇḍe'tra patrāvalīm /
analyzed: etān te bhramara ogha nīla kuṭilān badhnāmi kim kuntalān kim nyasyāmi madhūka pāṇḍu madhure patra āvalīm

original: MSS_7892-2 kiṃ cāsmin vyapanīya bandhanamidaṃ paṅkeruhāṇāṃ dalat- koṣaśrīmuṣi sarvacittahariṇasyāropayāmi stane //
analyzed: kim ca asmin vyapanīya bandhanam idam paṅkeruhāṇām dalat koṣa śrī muṣi sarva citta hariṇasya āropayāmi stane

original: MSS_7893-1 etāḥ karotpīḍitavāridhārā darpāt sakhībhirvadaneṣu siktāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ kara utpīḍita vāri dhārāḥ darpāt sakhībhiḥ vadaneṣu siktāḥ

original: MSS_7893-2 vakretarāgrairalakais taruṇyaś cūrṇāruṇān vārilavān vamanti //
analyzed: vakretara agraiḥ alakaiḥ taruṇyaḥ cūrṇa aruṇān vāri lavān vamanti

original: MSS_7894-1 udbandhakeśaścyutapattralekho viśleṣimuktāphalapattraveṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: udbandha keśaḥ cyuta pattra lekhaḥ viśleṣi muktāphala pattra veṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_7894-2 manojña eva pramadāmukhānām ambhovihārākulito'pi veṣaḥ //
analyzed: manojñaḥ eva pramadā mukhānām ambhaḥ vihāra ākulitaḥ api veṣaḥ

original: MSS_7895-1 etāḥ kānapi maṇḍayanti puruṣān nānāvidhairbhūṣaṇair etāḥ kānapi vañcayanti ca janān mithyāvacobhiḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ kān api maṇḍayanti puruṣān nānāvidhaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ etāḥ kān api vañcayanti ca janān mithyā vacobhiḥ punar

original: MSS_7895-2 etā vai ramayanti kānapi varān bhāvairmanojotkaṭaiḥ svānta bhrānta karoṣi kiṃ bata mudhā nārīṣu hārdaṃ hi tat //
analyzed: etāḥ vai ramayanti kān api varān bhāvaiḥ manoja utkaṭaiḥ svānta bhrānta karoṣi kim bata mudhā nārīṣu hārdam hi tat

original: MSS_7896-1 etāḥ paṅkilakūlarūḍhanaladastambakvaṇatkambavaḥ krīḍatkarkaṭacakravālavidalajjambālatoyāvilāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ paṅkila kūla rūḍha nalada stamba kvaṇat kambavaḥ krīḍat karkaṭa cakravāla vidalat jambāla toya āvilāḥ

original: MSS_7896-2 hṛllekhaṃ janayantyanūpasaritāmuttuṇḍagaṇḍūpado- tkīrṇaklinnamṛdo nadasthapuṭitaprāntās taṭībhūmayaḥ //
analyzed: hṛllekham janayanti anūpa saritām uttuṇḍa gaṇḍūpadāḥ utkīrṇa klinna mṛdaḥ nada stha puṭita prāntāḥ taṭī bhūmayaḥ

original: MSS_7897-1 etāḥ praphullakamalotpalavaktranetrā gopāṅganāḥ kanakacampakapuṣpagaurāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ praphulla kamala utpala vaktra netrāḥ gopa aṅganāḥ kanaka campaka puṣpa gaurāḥ

original: MSS_7897-2 nānāvirāgavasanā madhurapralāpāḥ krīḍanti vanyakusumākulakeśahastāḥ //
analyzed: nānā virāga vasanāḥ madhura pralāpāḥ krīḍanti vanya kusuma ākula keśa hastāḥ

original: MSS_7898-1 etāḥ śārdūlahelādalitamṛgakulavyaktaraktābhiṣikta- kṣmāpīṭhāsvādalubdhasphuṭatarakalahasphāraph eraṇḍacaṇḍāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ kṣmā pīṭha āsvāda lubdha sphuṭatara kalaha sphāra ph eraṇḍa caṇḍāḥ

original: MSS_7898-2 vellannirmokavallīvalayanigaḍitānokahakroḍanīḍa- krīḍanniḥśūkaghūkavyatikaramukharā bhūmayo bhīṣayanti //
analyzed: vellat nirmoka vallī valaya nigaḍita anokaha kroḍa nīḍa krīḍat niḥśūka ghūka vyatikara mukharāḥ bhūmayaḥ bhīṣayanti

original: MSS_7899-1 etāḥ saṃprati garbhagauravabharād rājño'varodhāṅganāḥ kāntāreṣu palāyituṃ bata kathaṃ padbhyāṃ bhaveyuḥ kṣamāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ saṃprati garbha gaurava bharāt rājñaḥ uvarodha aṅganāḥ kāntāreṣu palāyitum bata katham padbhyām bhaveyuḥ kṣamāḥ

original: MSS_7899-2 itthaṃ cetasi saṃvibhāvya sadayaṃ vaikuṇṭhakaṇṭhīrava tvannādāvalibhiḥ sakhībhiriva kiṃ tadgarbhapātaḥ kṛtaḥ //
analyzed: ittham cetasi saṃvibhāvya sa dayam vaikuṇṭha kaṇṭhī rava tvad nāda āvalibhiḥ sakhībhiḥ iva kim tad garbhapātaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: MSS_7900-1 etāḥ satyavihīnā dhanalavalīnāḥ sukhakṣaṇādhīnāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ satya vihīnāḥ dhana lava līnāḥ sukha kṣaṇa adhīnāḥ

original: MSS_7900-2 veśyā viśanti hṛdayaṃ mukhamadhurā nirvicārāṇām //
analyzed: veśyāḥ viśanti hṛdayam mukha madhurāḥ nirvicārāṇām

original: MSS_7901-1 etāḥ sutanu mukhaṃ te sakhyaḥ paśyanti hemakūṭagatāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ su tanu mukham te sakhyaḥ paśyanti hemakūṭa gatāḥ

original: MSS_7901-2 pratyāgataprasādaṃ candramivopaplavān muktam //
analyzed: pratyāgata prasādam candram iva upaplavāt muktam

original: MSS_7902-1 etāḥsthānaparigraheṇa śivayoratyantakāntaśriyaḥ prāleyācalamekhalāvanabhuvaḥ puṣṇanti netrotsavam /
analyzed: etāḥ sthāna parigraheṇa śivayoḥ atyanta kānta śriyaḥ prāleya acala mekhalā vana bhuvaḥ puṣṇanti netra utsavam

original: MSS_7902-2 vyāvalgadbalavairivāraṇavarapratyagradantāhati- śvabhraprasravadabhrasindhusavanaprasnigdhadevadrumāḥ //
analyzed: vyāvalgat bala vairi vāraṇa vara pratyagra danta āhati śvabhra prasravat abhra sindhu savana prasnigdha devadrumāḥ

original: MSS_7903-1 etāḥ svārthaparā nāryaḥ kevalaṃ svasukhe ratāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ sva artha parāḥ nāryaḥ kevalam sva sukhe ratāḥ

original: MSS_7903-2 na tāsāṃ vallabho yasmāt svasuto'pi sukhaṃ vinā //
analyzed: na tāsām vallabhaḥ yasmāt sva sutaḥ api sukham vinā

original: MSS_7904-1 etā guruśroṇipayodharatvād ātmānamudvoḍhumaśaknuvatyaḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ guru śroṇi payodhara tvāt ātmānam udvoḍhum aśaknuvatyaḥ

original: MSS_7904-2 gāḍhāṅgadairbāhubhirapsu bālāḥ kleśottaraṃ rāgavaśāt plavante //
analyzed: gāḍha aṅgadaiḥ bāhubhiḥ apsu bālāḥ kleśa uttaram rāga vaśāt plavante

original: MSS_7905-1 etādṛśe kaliyuge'pi śateṣu kaścij jātādaro jagati yaḥ śrutimārga eva /
analyzed: etādṛśe kali yuge api śateṣu kaścid jāta ādaraḥ jagati yaḥ śruti mārge eva

original: MSS_7905-2 yat kiṃcidācaratu pātramasau stutīnāṃ ślāghyaṃ mitāpamapi kiṃ na marau saraścet //
analyzed: yat kiṃcid ācaratu pātram asau stutīnām ślāghyam mita apam api kim na marau saraḥ ced

original: MSS_7906-1 etāni kratupṛṣṭhavediviluṭhadviprāṇi vātapramī- cchannopāntatarūṇi paśya dadhate puṇyāśramāṇi śriyam /
analyzed: etāni kratu pṛṣṭhavedi viluṭhat viprāṇi vātapramī channa upānta tarūṇi paśya dadhate puṇya āśramāṇi śriyam

original: MSS_7906-2 yānyutkṣipya manaḥ parāñcati paraṃ nārāyaṇārādhana- śraddhāmoditamekadaiva dhanikadvāre ca dāreṣu ca //
analyzed: yāni utkṣipya manaḥ param nārāyaṇa ārādhana śraddhā moditam ekadā eva dhanika dvāre ca dāreṣu ca

original: MSS_7907-1 etāni tāni navayauvanagarhitāni miṣṭānnapānaśayanāsanalālitāni /
analyzed: etāni tāni nava yauvana garhitāni miṣṭa anna pāna śayana āsana lālitāni

original: MSS_7907-2 hārārdhahāramaṇimaṇḍitabhūṣaṇāni bhūmau patanti viluṭhanti kalevarāṇi //
analyzed: hāra ardha hāra maṇi maṇḍita bhūṣaṇāni bhūmau patanti viluṭhanti kalevarāṇi

original: MSS_7908-1 etāni tāni haranetraśikhiprabandha- dagdhasmaravraṇavināśarasāyanāni /
analyzed: etāni tāni hara netra śikhi prabandha dagdha smara vraṇa vināśa rasāyanāni

original: MSS_7908-2 keṣāṃ na vismayakarāṇi nitambinīnāṃ viśvapriyāṇi nayanārdhavilokitāni //
analyzed: keṣām na vismaya karāṇi nitambinīnām viśva priyāṇi nayana ardha vilokitāni

original: MSS_7909-1 etāni tānyāpatitāni kāle bhāgyakṣayān niṣphalamudyamāni /
analyzed: etāni tāni āpatitāni kāle bhāgya kṣayāt niṣphalam udyamāni

original: MSS_7909-2 turaṅgamasyeva raṇe nivṛtte nīrājanākautukamaṅgalāni //
analyzed: turaṅgamasya iva raṇe nivṛtte nīrājana a kautuka maṅgalāni

original: MSS_7910-1 etāni niḥsahatanorasamañjasāni śūnyaṃ manaḥ piśunayanti gatāgatāni /
analyzed: etāni niḥsaha tanoḥ asamañjasāni śūnyam manaḥ piśunayanti gata āgatāni

original: MSS_7910-2 ete ca tīrataravaḥ prathayanti tāpam ālambitojjhitapariglapitaiḥ pravālaiḥ //
analyzed: ete ca tīra taravaḥ prathayanti tāpam ālambita ujjhita pariglapitaiḥ pravālaiḥ

original: MSS_7911-1 etāni bāladhavala pravihāya kāmaṃ goṣṭhāṅgaṇe taralatarṇakaceṣṭitāni /
analyzed: etāni bāla dhavala pravihāya kāmam goṣṭha aṅgaṇe tarala tarṇaka ceṣṭitāni

original: MSS_7911-2 skandhaṃ nidhehi dhuri pūrvadhurīṇamukto netavyatāmupagato'sti tavaiṣa bhāraḥ //
analyzed: skandham nidhehi dhuri pūrva dhurīṇa muktaḥ netavya tām upagataḥ asti tava eṣa bhāraḥ

original: MSS_7912-1 etāni mama padyāni paṭhitvā yaḥ sabhāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: etāni mama padyāni paṭhitvā yaḥ sabhām gataḥ

original: MSS_7912-2 sa sadā pūjyate rājñā saddharmo nṛgaṇairiva //
analyzed: sa sadā pūjyate rājñā saddharmaḥ nṛ gaṇaiḥ iva

original: MSS_7913-1 etāni viṃśatipadāny ācariṣyati yo naraḥ /
analyzed: etāni viṃśati padāni ācariṣyati yaḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_7913-2 sa jeṣyati ripūn sarvān kalyāṇaśca bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: sa jeṣyati ripūn sarvān kalyāṇaḥ ca bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_7914-1 etā niṣiktarajatadravasaṃnikāśā dhārā javena patitā jaladodarebhyaḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ niṣikta rajata drava saṃnikāśāḥ dhārāḥ javena patitāḥ jalada udarebhyaḥ

original: MSS_7914-2 vidyut pradīpaśikhayā kṣaṇanaṣṭadṛṣṭāś chinnā ivāmbarapaṭasya daśāḥ patanti //
analyzed: vidyut pradīpa śikhayā kṣaṇa naṣṭa dṛṣṭāḥ chinnāḥ iva ambara paṭasya daśāḥ patanti

original: MSS_7915-1 etāni sarvadā tasya na jāyante tataḥ param /
analyzed: etāni sarvadā tasya na jāyante tatas param

original: MSS_7915-2 strīsaṅgaṃ varjayed yatnād binduṃ rakṣet prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: strī saṅgam varjayet yatnāt bindum rakṣet prayatnataḥ

original: MSS_7915-3 āyuḥkṣayo bindunāśād asāmarthyaṃ ca jāyate //
analyzed: āyuḥ kṣayaḥ bindu nāśāt asāmarthyam ca jāyate

original: MSS_7916-1 etān guṇāṃs tāta mahānubhāvān eko guṇaḥ saṃśrayate prasahya /
analyzed: etān guṇān tāta mahā anubhāvān ekaḥ guṇaḥ saṃśrayate prasahya

original: MSS_7916-2 rājā yadā satkurute manuṣyaṃ sarvān guṇāneṣa guṇo'tibhāti //
analyzed: rājā yadā satkurute manuṣyam sarvān guṇān eṣa

original: MSS_7917-1 etānyanigṛhītāni vyāpādayitumapyalam /
analyzed: etāni anigṛhītāni vyāpādayitum api alam

original: MSS_7917-2 avidheyā ivādāntā hayāḥ pathi kusārathim //
analyzed: avidheyāḥ iva adāntāḥ hayāḥ pathi kusārathim

original: MSS_7918-1 etānyavantīśvarapārijāta- jātāni tārāpatipāṇḍurāṇi /
analyzed: etāni avantīśvara pārijāta jātāni tārāpati pāṇḍurāṇi

original: MSS_7918-2 saṃpratyahaṃ paśyata digvadhūnāṃ yaśaḥprasūnānyavataṃsayāmi //
analyzed: saṃprati aham paśyata diś vadhūnām yaśaḥ prasūnāni avataṃsayāmi

original: MSS_7919-1 etānyahāni kila cātakaśāvakena nītāni kaṇṭhakuharasthitajīvitena /
analyzed: etāni ahāni kila cātaka śāvakena nītāni kaṇṭha kuhara sthita jīvitena

original: MSS_7919-2 tasyārthino jalada pūraya vāñchitāni mā bhūt tvadekaśaraṇasya bata pramādaḥ //
analyzed: tasya arthinaḥ jalada pūraya vāñchitāni mā bhūt tvad eka śaraṇasya bata pramādaḥ

original: MSS_7920-1 etānyeva tu bandhāya sapta sūkṣmāṇi sarvadā /
analyzed: etāni eva tu bandhāya sapta sūkṣmāṇi sarvadā

original: MSS_7920-2 bhūrādīnāṃ virāgo'tra saṃbhaved yastu muktaye //
analyzed: bhūḥ ādīnām virāgaḥ utra saṃbhavet yaḥ tu muktaye

original: MSS_7921-1 etā yāḥ prekṣase lakṣmīś chattracāmaracañcalāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ yāḥ prekṣase lakṣmīḥ chattra cāmara cañcalāḥ

original: MSS_7921-2 svapna eṣa mahābuddhe dināni trīṇi pañca ca //
analyzed: svapnaḥ eṣa mahābuddhe dināni trīṇi pañca ca

original: MSS_7922-1 etā rāvaṇajīmūtād bāṇadhārā viniḥsṛtāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ rāvaṇa jīmūtāt bāṇa dhārāḥ viniḥsṛtāḥ

original: MSS_7922-2 vibhānti rāmamāsādya vāridhārā vaṣaṃ yathā //
analyzed: vibhānti rāmam āsādya vāri dhārāḥ vaṣam yathā

original: MSS_7923-1 etāvacchakyamasmābhir vaktuṃ tvaṃ guṇavāniti /
analyzed: etāvat śakyam asmābhiḥ vaktum tvam guṇavān iti

original: MSS_7923-2 ratnākarasya ratnaughaparicchede tu ke vayam //
analyzed: ratnākarasya ratna ogha paricchede tu ke vayam

original: MSS_7924-1 etāvaj janmasāphalyaṃ dehināmiha dehiṣu /
analyzed: etāvat janma sāphalyam dehinām iha dehiṣu

original: MSS_7924-2 prāṇairarthairdhiyā vācā śreya evācaret sadā //
analyzed: prāṇaiḥ arthaiḥ dhiyā vācā śreyaḥ eva ācaret sadā

original: MSS_7925-1 etāvaj janmasāphalyaṃ yadanāyattavṛttitā /
analyzed: etāvat janma sāphalyam yat anāyatta vṛtti tā

original: MSS_7925-2 ye parādhīnatāṃ yātās te vai jīvanti ke mṛtāḥ //
analyzed: ye para adhīna tām yātāḥ te vai jīvanti ke mṛtāḥ

original: MSS_7926-1 etāvatā nanvanumeyaśobhi kāñcīguṇasthānamaninditāyāḥ /
analyzed: etāvatā nanu anumeya śobhi kāñcī guṇa sthānam aninditāyāḥ

original: MSS_7926-2 āropitaṃ yad giriśena paścād ananyanārīkamanīyamaṅkam //
analyzed: āropitam yat giriśena paścāt ananya nārī kamanīyam aṅkam

original: MSS_7927-1 etāvataiva kāryeṇa manyadhvaṃ no kṛtārthatām /
analyzed: etāvatā eva kāryeṇa manyadhvam no kṛtārtha tām

original: MSS_7927-2 kartavyānāṃ parā kāṣṭhā nedānīṃ vidyate khalu //
analyzed: kartavyānām parā kāṣṭhā na idānīm vidyate khalu

original: MSS_7928-1 etāvat sarasi saroruhasya kṛtyaṃ bhittvāmbhaḥ sapadi bahirvinirgataṃ yat /
analyzed: etāvat sarasi saroruhasya kṛtyam bhittvā ambhaḥ sapadi bahis vinirgatam yat

original: MSS_7928-2 saurabhyaṃ vikasanamindirānivāsas tat sarvaṃ dinakarakṛtyamāmananti //
analyzed: saurabhyam vikasanam indirā nivāsaḥ tat sarvam dinakara kṛtyam āmananti

original: MSS_7929-1 etāvadeva paryāptaṃ bhikṣorekāntaśāyinaḥ /
analyzed: etāvat eva paryāptam bhikṣoḥ ekānta śāyinaḥ

original: MSS_7929-2 na tasya mriyate kaścin mriyate so'sya kasyacit //
analyzed: na tasya mriyate kaścid mriyate saḥ usya kasyacid

original: MSS_7930-1 etāvadeva hi phalaṃ paryāptaṃ jñānasattvayuktasya /
analyzed: etāvat eva hi phalam paryāptam jñāna sattva yuktasya

original: MSS_7930-2 yadyāpatsu na muhyati nābhyudaye vismito bhavati //
analyzed: yadi āpatsu na muhyati na abhyudaye vismitaḥ bhavati

original: MSS_7931-1 etāvantaṃ samayamanayaḥ kesarotsaṅgaraṅgī hṛdbhṛṅgīnāṃ satatamaharas tvaṃ saraḥsaṃcareṣu /
analyzed: etāvantam samayam anayaḥ kesara utsaṅga raṅgī hṛd bhṛṅgīnām satatam aharaḥ tvam saraḥ saṃcareṣu

original: MSS_7931-2 daivādasmin madhupa nipatan kānane ketakīnām etāṃ dīnāmanubhava daśāṃ kīlitaḥ kaṇṭakeṣu //
analyzed: daivāt asmin madhupa nipatan kānane ketakīnām etām dīnām anubhava daśām kīlitaḥ kaṇṭakeṣu

original: MSS_7932-1 etāvānavyayo dharmaḥ puṇyaślokairupāsitaḥ /
analyzed: etāvān avyayaḥ dharmaḥ puṇyaślokaiḥ upāsitaḥ

original: MSS_7932-2 yo bhūtaśokaharṣābhyām ātmā śocati hṛṣyati //
analyzed: yaḥ bhūta śoka harṣābhyām ātmā śocati hṛṣyati

original: MSS_7933-1 etāvāneva puruṣaḥ kṛtaṃ yasmin na naśyati /
analyzed: etāvān eva puruṣaḥ kṛtam yasmin na naśyati

original: MSS_7933-2 yāvacca kuryādanyo'sya kuryād bahuguṇaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: yāvat ca kuryāt anyaḥ asya kuryāt bahu guṇam tatas

original: MSS_7934-1 etāvāneva puruṣo yajjāyātmā prajeti ha /
analyzed: etāvān eva puruṣaḥ yat jāyā ātmā prajā iti ha

original: MSS_7934-2 viprāḥ prāhus tathā caitad yo bhartā sā smṛtāṅganā //
analyzed: viprāḥ prāhuḥ tathā ca etat yaḥ bhartā sā smṛtā aṅganā

original: MSS_7935-1 etāvāneva puruṣo yadamarṣī yadakṣamī /
analyzed: etāvān eva puruṣaḥ yat amarṣī yat akṣamī

original: MSS_7935-2 kṣamavān niramarṣaśca naiva strī na punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: kṣamavān niramarṣaḥ ca na eva strī na punar punar

original: MSS_7936-1 etāś catuṣṭayakalā dvātriṃśat kramadhṛtāḥ samastā vā /
analyzed: etāḥ catuṣṭaya kalāḥ dvātriṃśat krama dhṛtāḥ samastāḥ vā

original: MSS_7936-2 saṃsāravañcakānāṃ vidyā vidyāvatāmeva //
analyzed: saṃsāra vañcakānām vidyā vidyāvatām eva

original: MSS_7937-1 etāś candrodaye'sminnaviralamuśalotkṣepadolāyamāna- snigdhaśyāmāgrapīnastanakalasanamatkaṇṭhanālāgraramyāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ snigdha śyāma agra pīna stana kalasa namat kaṇṭha nāla agra ramyāḥ

original: MSS_7937-2 udvelladbāhuvallīpracalitavalayaśreṇayaḥ pāmarāṇāṃ gehinyo dīrghagītidhvanijanitasukhās taṇḍulān kaṇḍayanti //
analyzed: udvellat bāhu vallī pracalita valaya śreṇayaḥ pāmarāṇām gehinyaḥ dīrgha gīti dhvani janita sukhāḥ taṇḍulān kaṇḍayanti

original: MSS_7938-1 etāś caladvalayasaṃhatimekhalottha- jhaṃkāranūpuraravāhṛtarājahaṃsyaḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ calat valaya saṃhati mekhalā uttha jhaṃkāra nūpura rava āhṛta rājahaṃsyaḥ

original: MSS_7938-2 kurvanti kasya na mano vivaśaṃ taruṇyo vitrastamugdhahariṇīsadṛśākṣipātaiḥ //
analyzed: kurvanti kasya na manaḥ vivaśam taruṇyaḥ vitrasta mugdha hariṇī sadṛśa akṣi pātaiḥ

original: MSS_7939-1 etāsu ketakilatāsu vikāsinīṣu saubhāgyamadbhutataraṃ bhavatī bibharti /
analyzed: etāsu ketaki latāsu vikāsinīṣu saubhāgyam adbhutataram bhavatī bibharti

original: MSS_7939-2 yatkaṇṭakairvyathitamātmavapurna jānaṃs tvāmeva sevitumupakramate dvirephaḥ //
analyzed: yat kaṇṭakaiḥ vyathitam ātma vapuḥ na jānan tvām eva sevitum upakramate dvirephaḥ

original: MSS_7940-1 etās tā divasāntabhāskaradṛśo dhāvanti paurāṅganāḥ skandhapraskhaladaṃśukāñcaladhṛtivyāsaṅgabaddhādarāḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ tāḥ divasa anta bhāskara dṛśaḥ dhāvanti paura aṅganāḥ skandha praskhalat aṃśuka añcala dhṛti vyāsaṅga baddha ādarāḥ

original: MSS_7940-2 prātaryātakṛṣīvalāgamabhiyā protplutya vartmacchido haṭṭakrītapadārthamūlyakalanavyagrāṅguligranthayaḥ //
analyzed: prātaryāta kṛṣīvala āgama bhiyā protplutya vartma chidaḥ haṭṭa krīta padārtha mūlya kalana vyagra aṅguli granthayaḥ

original: MSS_7941-1 etās tā malayopakaṇṭhasaritāmeṇākṣi rodhobhuvaś cāpābhyāsaniketanaṃ bhagavataḥ preyo manojanmanaḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ tāḥ malaya upakaṇṭha sarit āmeṇa akṣi rodhaḥ bhuvaḥ cāpa abhyāsa niketanam bhagavataḥ preyaḥ manaḥ janmanaḥ

original: MSS_7941-2 yāsu śyāmaniśāsu pītatamaso muktāmayīś candrikāḥ pīyante vivṛtordhvacañcu vicalatkaṇṭhaṃ cakorāṅganāḥ //
analyzed: yāsu śyāma niśāsu pīta tamasaḥ muktā mayīḥ candrikāḥ pīyante vivṛta ūrdhva cañcu vicalat kaṇṭham cakora aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_7942-1 etāstu nirghṛṇatvena nirdayatvena nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ tu nirghṛṇa tvena nirdaya tvena nityaśas

original: MSS_7942-2 viśeṣāj jāḍyakṛtyena dūṣayanti kulatrayam //
analyzed: viśeṣāt jāḍya kṛtyena dūṣayanti kula trayam

original: MSS_7943-1 etā hasanti ca rudanti ca kāryahetor viśvāsayanti ca paraṃ na ca viśvasanti /
analyzed: etāḥ hasanti ca rudanti ca kārya hetoḥ viśvāsayanti ca param na ca viśvasanti

original: MSS_7943-2 tasmān nareṇa kulaśīlasamanvitena nāryaḥ śmaśānaghaṭikā iva varjanīyāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt nareṇa kula śīla samanvitena nāryaḥ śmaśāna ghaṭikāḥ iva varjanīyāḥ

original: MSS_7944-1 ete karburitātapās tata itaḥ saṃjāyamānāmbuda- cchedaiḥ saṃprati ketakīdalamiladdarbhātitheyodayāḥ /
analyzed: ete karburita ātapāḥ tatas itas saṃjāyamāna ambuda chedaiḥ saṃprati ketakī dala milat darbha ātitheyī udayāḥ

original: MSS_7944-2 grāmāntodgataśālibījayavasāśleṣaprahṛṣyanmano- govāhāyatagītigarbhitadiśo ramyāḥ sakhe vāsarāḥ //
analyzed: grāma anta udgata śāli bīja yavasa āśleṣa prahṛṣyat manaḥ go vāha āyata gīti garbhita diśaḥ ramyāḥ sakhe vāsarāḥ

original: MSS_7945-1 ete kiṃ nanu satyameva taravaś cañcatprasūnotkarāḥ kiṃ vā kānanavāṭikeyamanaghāyasyāmamī kokilāḥ /
analyzed: ete kim nanu satyam eva taravaḥ cañcat prasūna utkarāḥ kim vā kānana vāṭikā iyam anagha āyasyām amī kokilāḥ

original: MSS_7945-2 citraṃ kutra tirohitā marudharā sā yatra me pattanaṃ nānānirjharavaibhavaṃ kuta idaṃ sadyaḥ samunmīlitam //
analyzed: citram kutra tirohitā maru dharā sā yatra me pattanam nānā nirjhara vaibhavam kutas idam sadyas samunmīlitam

original: MSS_7946-1 ete kūrcakacāḥ sakaṅkaṇaraṇatkarṇāṭasīmantinī- hastākarṣaṇalālitāḥ pratidinaṃ prāptāḥ parāmunnatim /
analyzed: ete kūrca kacāḥ hasta ākarṣaṇa lālitāḥ pratidinam prāptāḥ parām unnatim

original: MSS_7946-2 te'mī saṃprati pāpināpitakarabhrāmyatkṣuraprānana- kṣuṇṇāḥ kṣoṇitale patanti paritaḥ kḷptāparādhā iva //
analyzed: temī saṃprati pāpi nāpita kara bhrāmyat kṣura pra ānana kṣuṇṇāḥ kṣoṇi tale patanti paritas kḷpta aparādhāḥ iva

original: MSS_7947-1 ete ketakadhūlidhūsararucaḥ śītadyuteraṃśavaḥ prāptāḥ saṃprati paścimasya jaladhestīraṃ jarājarjarāḥ /
analyzed: ete ketaka dhūli dhūsara rucaḥ śītadyuteḥ aṃśavaḥ prāptāḥ saṃprati paścimasya jaladheḥ tīram jarā jarjarāḥ

original: MSS_7947-2 apyete vikasatsaroruhavanīdṛkpātasaṃbhāvitāḥ prācīrāgamudīrayanti taraṇes tāruṇyabhājaḥ karāḥ //
analyzed: api ete vikasat saroruha vanī dṛś pāta saṃbhāvitāḥ prācī rāgam udīrayanti taraṇeḥ tāruṇya bhājaḥ karāḥ

original: MSS_7948-1 ete ketakasūcisaurabhajuṣaḥ paurapragalbhāṅganā- vyālolālakavallarīvilulanavyājopabhuktānanāḥ /
analyzed: ete ketaka sūci saurabha juṣaḥ paura pragalbha aṅganāḥ vyālola alaka vallarī vilulana vyāja upabhukta ānanāḥ

original: MSS_7948-2 kiṃconnidrakadambakuḍmalakuṭīdhūlīluṭhatṣaṭpada- vyūhavyāhṛtihāriṇo virahiṇaḥ karṣanti varṣānilāḥ //
analyzed: kiṃca unnidra kadamba kuḍmala kuṭī dhūlī luṭhat ṣaṭpada vyūha vyāhṛti hāriṇaḥ virahiṇaḥ karṣanti varṣa anilāḥ

original: MSS_7949-1 ete'kṣṇorjanayanti kāmavirujaṃ sītāviyoge ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇo'pi lakṣmaṇa dṛḍhaṃ saṃtāpayantyeva mām /
analyzed: etāḥ īkṣṇoḥ janayanti kāma virujam sītā viyoge ghanāḥ vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ api lakṣmaṇa dṛḍham saṃtāpayanti eva mām

original: MSS_7949-2 itthaṃ vṛddhaparaṃparāpariṇatairyasmin vacobhirmunīn adyāpyunmanayanti kānanaśukāḥ so'yaṃ girirmālyavān //
analyzed: ittham vṛddha paraṃparā pariṇataiḥ yasmin vacobhiḥ munīn adyā api unmanayanti kānana śukāḥ saḥ yam giriḥ mālyavān

original: MSS_7950-1 ete candraśilāsamuccayamayāś candrātapaprasphurat- sarvāṅgīṇapayaḥpravṛttasarito jhātkurvate parvatāḥ /
analyzed: ete candra śilā samuccaya mayāḥ candra ātapa prasphurat sarvāṅgīṇa payaḥ pravṛtta saritaḥ jhāt kurvate parvatāḥ

original: MSS_7950-2 yeṣāmunmadajāgarūkaśikhini prasthe namerusthitāḥ śyāmā meghagabhīragadgadagiraḥ krandanti koyaṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: yeṣām unmada jāgarūka śikhini prasthe nameru sthitāḥ śyāmāḥ megha gabhīra gadgada giraḥ krandanti koyaṣṭayaḥ

original: MSS_7951-1 ete cāṃśakalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇastu bhagavān svayam /
analyzed: ete ca aṃśa kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tu bhagavān svayam

original: MSS_7951-2 indrārivyākulaṃ lokaṃ mṛḍayanti yuge yuge //
analyzed: indra ari vyākulam lokam mṛḍayanti yuge yuge

original: MSS_7952-1 ete cānye ca bahavaḥ prayogāḥ pāradārikāḥ /
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ prayogāḥ pāradārikāḥ

original: MSS_7952-2 deśe deśe pravartante rājabhiḥ saṃpravartitāḥ //
analyzed: deśe deśe pravartante rājabhiḥ saṃpravartitāḥ

original: MSS_7952-1 na tvevaitān prayuñjīta rājā lokahite rataḥ /
analyzed: na tu eva etān prayuñjīta rājā loka hite rataḥ

original: MSS_7952-2 nigṛhītāriṣaḍvargas tathā vijayate mahīm //
analyzed: nigṛhīta ari ṣaḍvargaḥ tathā vijayate mahīm

original: MSS_7954-1 ete cānye ca bahavo doṣāḥ prādurbhavantyuta /
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ doṣāḥ prādurbhavanti uta

original: MSS_7954-2 nṛpatau mārdavopete harṣule ca yudhiṣṭhira //
analyzed: nṛpatau mārdava upete harṣule ca yudhiṣṭhira

original: MSS_7955-1 ete cāpīndratulyāḥ kṣitipatitanayā bhīmasenārjunādyāḥ śūrāḥ satyapratijñā dinakararucayaḥ keśavenopagūḍhāḥ /
analyzed: ete ca api indra tulyāḥ kṣitipati tanayāḥ bhīmasena arjuna ādyāḥ śūrāḥ satya pratijñāḥ dinakara rucayaḥ keśavena upagūḍhāḥ

original: MSS_7955-2 te dṛṣṭā pātrahastā jagati kṛpaṇavad bhaikṣacaryānuyātāḥ kaḥ śakto bhālapaṭṭe vidhikaralikhitāṃ karmarekhāṃ pramārṣṭum //
analyzed: te dṛṣṭā pātra hastāḥ jagati kṛpaṇa vat bhaikṣa caryā anuyātāḥ kaḥ śaktaḥ bhāla paṭṭe vidhi kara likhitām karma rekhām pramārṣṭum

original: MSS_7956-1 ete cūtamahīruho'pyaviralairdhūmāyitāḥ ṣaṭpadair ete prajvalitāḥ sphuṭatkisalayodbhedairaśokadrumāḥ /
analyzed: ete cūta mahīruhaḥ upi aviralaiḥ dhūmāyitāḥ ṣaṭpadaiḥ ete prajvalitāḥ sphuṭat kisalaya udbhedaiḥ aśoka drumāḥ

original: MSS_7956-2 ete kiṃśukaśākhino'pi malinairaṅgāritāḥ kuḍmalaiḥ kaṣṭaṃ viśramayāmi kutra nayane sarvatra vāmo vidhiḥ //
analyzed: ete kiṃśuka śākhinaḥ api malinaiḥ aṅgāritāḥ kuḍmalaiḥ kaṣṭam viśramayāmi kutra nayane sarvatra vāmaḥ vidhiḥ

original: MSS_7957-1 ete jīrṇakulāyajālajaṭilāḥ pāṃsūtkarākarṣiṇaḥ śākhākampavihastaduḥsthavihagānākampayantas tarūn /
analyzed: ete jīrṇa kulāya jāla jaṭilāḥ pāṃsu utkara ākarṣiṇaḥ śākhā kampa vihasta duḥstha vihagān ākampayantaḥ tarūn

original: MSS_7957-2 helāndolitanartitojjhitahatavyāghaṭṭitonmūlita- protkṣiptabhramitaiḥ prapāpaṭalakaiḥ krīḍanti jhañjhānilāḥ //
analyzed: helā āndolita nartita ujjhita hata vyāghaṭṭita unmūlita protkṣipta bhramitaiḥ prapā paṭalakaiḥ krīḍanti jhañjhā anilāḥ

original: MSS_7958-1 ete te girikūṭasaṃghaṭaśilāsaṃghaṭṭaśīrṇāmbhasaḥ preṅkhaccāmaracārusīkarakaṇasmerā darīnirjharāḥ /
analyzed: ete te giri kūṭa saṃghaṭa śilā saṃghaṭṭa śīrṇa ambhasaḥ preṅkhat cāmara cāru sīkara kaṇa smerāḥ darī nirjharāḥ

original: MSS_7958-2 yatpāteṣu nikuñjakuñjaramukhabhraśyanmṛṇālāṅkura- grāsodgranthitaṭaṃ raṭanti paritaḥ kaṇṭhīravā bhairavam //
analyzed: yad pāteṣu nikuñja kuñjara mukha bhraśyat mṛṇāla aṅkura grāsa udgranthi taṭam raṭanti paritas kaṇṭhī ravāḥ bhairavam

original: MSS_7959-1 ete te divasā viyogiguravaḥ pūrollasatsindhavo vindhyaśyāmapayodanīlanabhaso nīpārjunāmodinaḥ /
analyzed: ete te divasāḥ viyogi guravaḥ pūra ullasat sindhavaḥ vindhya śyāma payoda nīla nabhasaḥ nīpa arjuna āmodinaḥ

original: MSS_7959-2 āsannaprasavālasāṃ sahacarīmālokya nīḍārthinīṃ cañcuprāntakiliñjasaṃcayaparaḥ kāko'pi yeṣvākulaḥ //
analyzed: āsanna prasava alasām sahacarīm ālokya nīḍa arthinīm cañcu prānta kiliñja saṃcaya paraḥ kākaḥ api yeṣu ākulaḥ

original: MSS_7960-1 ete te divasās ta eva taravas tāśca pragalbhastriyas tac caivāmravanaṃ sakokilarutaṃ seyaṃ sacandrā niśā /
analyzed: ete te divasāḥ te eva taravaḥ tāḥ ca pragalbha striyaḥ tat ca eva āmra vanam sa kokila rutam sā iyam sa candrā niśā

original: MSS_7960-2 vātaḥ so'pi ca dakṣiṇo dhṛtiharaḥ so'yaṃ vasantānilo hā tāruṇya vinā tvayādya sakalaṃ pālālabhārāyate //
analyzed: vātaḥ saḥ api ca dakṣiṇaḥ dhṛti haraḥ saḥ uyam vasanta anilaḥ hā tāruṇya vinā tvayā adya sakalam pālālabhārāyate

original: MSS_7961-1 ete te duratikramakramamiladdharmormimarmacchidaḥ kādambena rajobhareṇa kakubho rundhanti jañjhānilāḥ /
analyzed: ete te duratikrama krama milat dharma ūrmi marma chidaḥ kādambena rajaḥ bhareṇa kakubhaḥ rundhanti jañjha anilāḥ

original: MSS_7961-2 gāḍhārambhaniruddhanīradaghaṭāsaṃghaṭṭ anīlībhavad- vyomakroḍakaṭāhapātukapayoveṇīkaṇagrāhiṇaḥ //
analyzed: gāḍha ārambha niruddha nīrada ghaṭa a saṃghaṭṭ a nīlībhavat vyoma kroḍa kaṭāha pātuka payaḥ veṇī kaṇa grāhiṇaḥ

original: MSS_7962-1 ete te purato marusthalabhuvaḥ proccaṇḍadāvānala- jvālālīḍhakaṭhorasūrakiraṇapluṣṭacchadāḥ śākhinaḥ /
analyzed: ete te puratas maru sthala bhuvaḥ proccaṇḍa dāva anala jvālā līḍha kaṭhora sūrakiraṇa pluṣṭa chadāḥ śākhinaḥ

original: MSS_7962-2 tānetānavadhīrya khinnavapuṣo duḥśīlajhañjhānila- krīḍābhirna payoda gantumucitaṃ velābhiṣiktadrumān //
analyzed: tān etān avadhīrya khinna vapuṣaḥ duḥśīla jhañjhā anila krīḍābhiḥ na payoda gantum ucitam velā abhiṣikta drumān

original: MSS_7963-1 ete te malayādrikandarajuṣastacchākhiśākhāvalī- līlātāṇḍavasaṃpradānaguravaścetobhuvo bāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: ete te malaya adri kandara juṣaḥ tad śākhi śākhā āvalī līlā tāṇḍava saṃpradāna guravaḥ cetaḥ bhuvaḥ bāndhavāḥ

original: MSS_7963-2 cūtonmattamadhuvratapraṇayinīhuṅkārajhaṅkāriṇo hā kaṣṭaṃ prasaranti pānthayuvatījīvadruho vāyavaḥ //
analyzed: cūta unmatta madhu vrata praṇayinī huṅkāra jhaṅkāriṇaḥ hā kaṣṭam prasaranti pāntha yuvatī jīva druhaḥ vāyavaḥ

original: MSS_7964-1 ete tvadvadanānukārirucayo rākāsudhāṃśvādayo nītvā te smaraṇaṃ dahanti bata māmantaḥsphurantyās tava /
analyzed: ete tvad vadana anukāri rucayaḥ rākā sudhāṃśu ādayaḥ nītvā te smaraṇam dahanti bata mām antar sphurantyāḥ tava

original: MSS_7964-2 tvaṃ svāminyasi tajjahīhi jahi vā nedaṃ punaḥ sāṃprataṃ yatsvaspardhibhireva mardayasi māmetairjaghanyaiḥ priye //
analyzed: tvam svāminī asi tat jahīhi jahi vā nā idam punar sāṃpratam yat sva spardhibhiḥ eva mardayasi mām etaiḥ jaghanyaiḥ priye

original: MSS_7965-1 ete daridraśiśavas tanujīrṇakanthāṃ skandhe nidhāya malināṃ pulakākulāṅgāḥ /
analyzed: ete daridra śiśavaḥ tanu jīrṇa kanthām skandhe nidhāya malinām pulaka ākula aṅgāḥ

original: MSS_7965-2 sūryasphuratkarakarambitabhittideśa- lābhāya śītasamaye kalimācaranti //
analyzed: sūrya sphurat kara karambita bhitti deśa lābhāya śīta samaye kalim ācaranti

original: MSS_7966-1 etena baddhabalinā saṃkocamavāpya vṛddhadehena /
analyzed: etena baddha balinā saṃkocam avāpya vṛddha dehena

original: MSS_7966-2 yātaṃ hariṇeva mayā dvitrāṇi padāni kṛcchreṇa //
analyzed: yātam hariṇā iva mayā dvitrāṇi padāni kṛcchreṇa

original: MSS_7967-1 ete nartitamaulayo guṇagaṇaprastāvanābhirmaṇer jāyantāṃ vaṇijo vayaṃ tu kanaka tvatkīrtivaitālikāḥ /
analyzed: ete nartita maulayaḥ guṇa gaṇa prastāvanābhiḥ maṇeḥ jāyantām vaṇijaḥ vayam tu kanaka tvad kīrti vaitālikāḥ

original: MSS_7967-2 te cāmlānamukhena hanta bhavatā dāhacchidā vedanām aṅgīkṛtya narendraśekharasukhāsīnāḥ kriyante yataḥ //
analyzed: te ca a mlāna mukhena hanta bhavatā dāha chidā vedanām aṅgīkṛtya narendra śekhara sukha āsīnāḥ kriyante yatas

original: MSS_7968-1 ete nīvāravaprāḥ pṛthukusumasamitpārvataḥ kandaro'yaṃ devīyaṃ jahnuputrī sikatilaśayitaḥ śāntaniḥśaṅkaraṅkaḥ /
analyzed: ete nīvāra vaprāḥ pṛthu kusuma samidh pārvataḥ kandarā iyam devī iyam jahnu putrī sikatila śayitaḥ śānta niḥśaṅka raṅkaḥ

original: MSS_7968-2 kāntāre darbhadūrvācayaśucini vacaḥ smārtamāvartayanti brahmāṇo durvipākagrahagahanatayā yāminījāgarūkāḥ //
analyzed: kāntāre darbha dūrvā caya śucini vacaḥ smārtam āvartayanti brahmāṇaḥ durvipāka graha gahana tayā yāminī jāgarūkāḥ

original: MSS_7969-1 ete nūtanacūtakorakaghanagrāsātirekībhavat- kaṇṭhadhvānajuṣo haranti hṛdayaṃ madhyevanaṃ kokilāḥ /
analyzed: ete nūtana cūta koraka ghana grāsa ati rekībhavat kaṇṭha dhvāna juṣaḥ haranti hṛdayam madhye vanam kokilāḥ

original: MSS_7969-2 yeṣāmakṣinibhena bhānti bhagavadbhūteśanetrānala- jvālājālakarālitāsamaśarāṅgārasphuliṅ gā ime //
analyzed: yeṣām akṣi nibhena bhānti bhagavat bhūteśa netra anala jvālā jāla karālita asamaśara aṅgāra sphuliṅ gāḥ ime

original: MSS_7970-1 etenotkṛttakaṇṭhapratisubhaṭanaṭārabdhanāṭyādbhutānāṃ kaṣṭaṃ draṣṭaiva nābhūd bhuvi samarasamālokilokāspade'pi /
analyzed: etena utkṛtta kaṇṭha pratisu bhaṭa naṭa ārabdha nāṭya adbhutānām kaṣṭam draṣṭā eva na abhūt bhuvi samara samāloki loka āspade api

original: MSS_7970-2 aśvairasvairavegaiḥ kṛtakhurakhuralīmaṅkṣuvikṣudyamāna- kṣmāpṛṣṭhottiṣṭhadandhaṃkaraṇaraṇa dhurāreṇudhārāndhakārāt //
analyzed: aśvaiḥ asvaiḥ avegaiḥ kṛta khura khuralī maṅkṣu vikṣudyamāna kṣmā pṛṣṭha uttiṣṭhat andhaṃkara naraṇa dhurā reṇu dhārā andhakārāt

original: MSS_7971-1 ete pañcadaśānarthā hyarthamūlā matā nṛṇām /
analyzed: ete pañcadaśa anarthāḥ hi artha mūlāḥ matāḥ nṛṇām

original: MSS_7971-2 tasmādanarthamarthākhyaṃ śreyo'rthī dūratas tyajet //
analyzed: tasmāt anartham artha ākhyam śreyaḥ arthī dūratas tyajet

original: MSS_7972-1 bhidyante bhrātaro dārāḥ pitaraḥ suhṛdas tathā /
analyzed: bhidyante bhrātaraḥ dārāḥ pitaraḥ suhṛdaḥ tathā

original: MSS_7972-2 ekāsnigdhāḥ kākiṇinā sadyaḥ sarve'rayaḥ kṛtāḥ //
analyzed: eka asnigdhāḥ kākiṇinā sadyas sarva irayaḥ kṛtāḥ

original: MSS_7973-1 arthenālpīyasā hyete saṃrabdhā dīptamanyavaḥ /
analyzed: arthena alpīyasā hi ete saṃrabdhāḥ dīpta manyavaḥ

original: MSS_7973-2 tyajantyāśuspṛdho ghnanti sahasotsṛjya sauhṛdam //
analyzed: tyajanti āśu spṛdhaḥ ghnanti sahasā utsṛjya sauhṛdam

original: MSS_7974-1 ete pallipurandhrinirbharajalakrīḍāhṛtāmbhaḥkaṇa- kṣodakṣālitalagnapānthavanitāniḥśvāsatīvr ātapāḥ /
analyzed: ete ātapāḥ

original: MSS_7974-2 vānti svairavihārakuñjarakaracchidrodarāghūrṇana- prārabdhoccamṛdaṅganādamukharās tāpīnikuñjānilāḥ //
analyzed: vānti svaira vihāra kuñjara kara chidra udara āghūrṇana prārabdha ucca mṛdaṅga nāda mukharāḥ tāpī nikuñja anilāḥ

original: MSS_7975-1 ete pallīparivṛḍhavadhūprauḍhakandarpakeli- kliśyatpīnastanaparisarasvedasaṃpadvipakṣāḥ /
analyzed: ete pallī parivṛḍha vadhū prauḍha kandarpa keli kliśyat pīna stana parisara sveda saṃpad vipakṣāḥ

original: MSS_7975-2 vānti svairaṃ sarasi sarasi kroḍadaṃṣṭrāvimarda- truṭyadgundrāparimalaguṇagrāhiṇo gandhavāhāḥ //
analyzed: vānti svairam sarasi sarasi kroḍa daṃṣṭra vimarda truṭyat gundrā parimala guṇa grāhiṇaḥ gandhavāhāḥ

original: MSS_7976-1 ete pāṭīravāṭīnavaviṭapanaṭīlāsyaśik ṣātidakṣā dolākhelatpuraṃdhrīśramajalakaṇikājālapātiprat ānāḥ /
analyzed: ete

original: MSS_7976-2 saurabhyādāpatadbhirmadhukarapaṭalaiḥ pṛṣṭhato'nuprayātāḥ kāmāgneḥ sphāradhāyyāḥ pathikakulavadhūbaddhavairāḥ samīrāḥ //
analyzed: saurabhyāt āpatadbhiḥ madhukara paṭalaiḥ pṛṣṭhatas nuprayātāḥ kāma agneḥ sphāra dhāyyāḥ pathika kula vadhū baddha vairāḥ samīrāḥ

original: MSS_7977-1 ete puraḥ surabhikomalahomadhūma- lekhānipītanavapallavaśoṇimānaḥ /
analyzed: ete puras surabhi komala homa dhūma lekhā nipīta nava pallava śoṇimānaḥ

original: MSS_7977-2 puṇyāśramāḥ śrutisamohitasāmagīti- sākūtaniścalakuraṅgakulāḥ sphuranti //
analyzed: puṇya āśramāḥ sphuranti

original: MSS_7978-1 ete praśastataravo dantadhāvanakarmaṇi /
analyzed: ete praśasta taravaḥ dantadhāvana karmaṇi

original: MSS_7978-2 kaṇṭakikṣīravṛkṣotthadvādaśāṅgulam avraṇam //
MSS_7979-1 ete bahuvidhāḥ śokā vilāparudite tathā /
analyzed: ete bahuvidhāḥ śokāḥ vilāpa rudite tathā

original: MSS_7979-2 varjanīyā hi dhīreṇa sarvāvasthāsu dhīmatā //
analyzed: varjanīyāḥ hi dhīreṇa sarva avasthāsu dhīmatā

original: MSS_7980-1 ete mekalakanyakāpraṇayinaḥ pātālamūlaspṛśaḥ saṃtrāsaṃ janayanti vindhyabhidurā vārāṃ pravāhāḥ puraḥ /
analyzed: ete mekala kanyakā praṇayinaḥ pātāla mūla spṛśaḥ saṃtrāsam janayanti vindhya bhidurāḥ vārām pravāhāḥ puras

original: MSS_7980-2 līlonmūlitanartitapratihatavyāvartitaprerita- tyaktasvīkṛtanihnutapracalitaproddhūtatīradrumāḥ //
analyzed: līlā unmūlita nartita pratihata vyāvartita prerita tyakta svīkṛta nihnuta pracalita proddhūta tīra drumāḥ
