original: MSS_7981-1 ete lakṣmaṇa jānakīvirahiṇaṃ māṃ khedayantyambudā marmāṇīva ca ghaṭṭayantyalamamī krūrāḥ kadambānilāḥ /
analyzed: ete lakṣmaṇa jānakī virahiṇam mām khedayanti ambudāḥ marmāṇi iva ca ghaṭṭayanti alam amī krūrāḥ kadamba anilāḥ

original: MSS_7981-2 itthaṃ vyāhṛtapūrvajanmaviraho yo rādhayā vīkṣitaḥ serṣyaṃ śaṅkitayā sa vaḥ sukhayatu svapnāyamāno hariḥ //
analyzed: ittham vyāhṛta pūrva janma virahaḥ yaḥ rādhayā vīkṣitaḥ sa īrṣyam śaṅkitayā sa vaḥ sukhayatu svapnāyamānaḥ hariḥ

original: MSS_7982-1 ete vayaṃ tanudhanāḥ kṛpaṇeyamurvī dīnāḥ śataṃ mṛdu ca vistarayanti vācaḥ /
analyzed: ete vayam tanu dhanāḥ kṛpaṇā iyam urvī dīnāḥ śatam mṛdu ca vistarayanti vācaḥ

original: MSS_7982-2 tad bhrātaraḥ śakunipheravasārameyā ḍhaukadhvametadahaha sphuṭatu kṣaṇena //
analyzed: tat bhrātaraḥ śakuni pherava sārameyāḥ ḍhaukadhvam etat ahaha sphuṭatu kṣaṇena

original: MSS_7983-1 ete vayamamī dārāḥ kanyeyaṃ kulajīvitam /
analyzed: ete vayam amī dārāḥ kanyā iyam kula jīvitam

original: MSS_7983-2 brūta yenātra vaḥ kāryam anāsthā bāhyavastuṣu //
analyzed: brūta yena atra vaḥ kāryam anāsthā bāhya vastuṣu

original: MSS_7984-1 ete vaśyakaropāyā durjane niṣphalāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: ete vaśya kara upāyāḥ durjane niṣphalāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: MSS_7984-2 tatsaṃnidhiṃ tyajet prājñaḥ śaktas taṃ daṇḍato jayet /
analyzed: tad saṃnidhim tyajet prājñaḥ śaktaḥ tam daṇḍataḥ jayet

original: MSS_7984-3 chalabhūtais tu tadrūpair upāyairebhireva vā //
analyzed: chala bhūtaiḥ tu tad rūpaiḥ upāyaiḥ ebhiḥ eva vā

original: MSS_7985-1 ete vāmavilocanākucasakhaiḥ soḍhavyaśītārtayaḥ prāptāḥ paścimasaindhavasya marutaḥ premacchido vāsarāḥ /
analyzed: ete vāma vilocanā kuca sakhaiḥ soḍhavya śīta ārtayaḥ prāptāḥ paścima saindhavasya marutaḥ prema chidaḥ vāsarāḥ

original: MSS_7985-2 yatrāpāsya purāṇapaṅkajamayaṃ devaḥ saśṛṅgārabhūr ādatte navakundakuḍmalaśikhānirmāṇamanyad dhanuḥ //
analyzed: yatra apāsya purāṇa paṅkaja mayam devaḥ sa śṛṅgāra bhūḥ ādatte nava kunda kuḍmala śikhā nirmāṇam anyat dhanuḥ

original: MSS_7986-1 ete vārikaṇān kiranti puruṣān varṣanti nāmbhodharāḥ śailāḥ śādvalamudvamanti na vamantyete punarnāyakān /
analyzed: ete vāri kaṇān kiranti puruṣān varṣanti na ambhodharāḥ śailāḥ śādvalam udvamanti na vamanti ete punar nāyakān

original: MSS_7986-2 trailokye taravaḥ phalāni suvate naivārabhante janān dhātaḥ kātaramālapāmi kulaṭāhetos tvayā kiṃ kṛtam //
analyzed: trailokye taravaḥ phalāni suvate na eva ārabhante janān dhātar kātaram ālapāmi kulaṭā hetoḥ tvayā kim kṛtam

original: MSS_7987-1 ete vaiyākaraṇapaśavaḥ svīyamāyurvṛthaiva prājñaṃmanyāḥ śravaṇakaṭubhiḥ śabdajālaiḥ kṣipanti /
analyzed: ete vaiyākaraṇa paśavaḥ svīyam āyuḥ vṛthā eva prājñaṃmanyāḥ śravaṇa kaṭubhiḥ śabda jālaiḥ kṣipanti

original: MSS_7987-2 śaśvatkāntādharamadhuratāvarṇanaṃ kurvatāṃ nas tvāśīrvādairiha sahṛdayāḥ pratyahaṃ vardhayante //
analyzed: śaśvat kāntā adhara madhura tā varṇanam kurvatām naḥ tu āśīrvādaiḥ iha sahṛdayāḥ pratyaham vardhayante

original: MSS_7988-1 ete vyomani śoṣayanti hariṇatrāsāc ciraṃ cīvare saṃdhyākarmavidhau kamaṇḍalumime paśyanti riktaṃ bhṛtam /
analyzed: ete vyomani śoṣayanti hariṇa trāsāt ciram cīvare saṃdhyā karma vidhau kamaṇḍalum ime paśyanti riktam bhṛtam

original: MSS_7988-2 bhikṣante ca phalānyamī karapuṭīpātreṇa cānokahān eṣāmarghavidhau ca saṃnidhigatāḥ puṣpyantyakāṇḍe latāḥ //
analyzed: bhikṣante ca phalāni amī kara puṭī pātreṇa ca anokahān eṣām argha vidhau ca saṃnidhi gatāḥ puṣpī antya kāṇḍe latāḥ

original: MSS_7989-1 ete śāradakaumudīkulabhuvaḥ kṣīrodadheḥ sodarāḥ śeṣāheḥ suhṛdo vinidrakumudaśreṇīmahaḥsrāviṇaḥ /
analyzed: ete śārada kaumudī kula bhuvaḥ kṣīrodadheḥ sodarāḥ śeṣa aheḥ suhṛdaḥ vinidra kumuda śreṇī mahaḥ srāviṇaḥ

original: MSS_7989-2 śītāṃśoḥ sahapāṃśukhelanasakhāḥ svaḥsindhusaṃbandhinaḥ prāleyācalabandhavas tava guṇāḥ kairneha karṇārpitāḥ //
analyzed: śītāṃśoḥ saha pāṃśu khelana sakhāḥ svar sindhu saṃbandhinaḥ prāleya acala bandhavaḥ tava guṇāḥ kaiḥ nā iha karṇa arpitāḥ

original: MSS_7990-1 eteṣāṃ navacakrāṇām ekaikaṃ dhyāyato muneḥ /
analyzed: eteṣām nava cakrāṇām ekaikam dhyāyataḥ muneḥ

original: MSS_7990-2 siddhayo muktisahitāḥ karasthāḥ syurdine dine //
analyzed: siddhayaḥ mukti sahitāḥ kara sthāḥ syuḥ dine dine

original: MSS_7991-1 eteṣāmanukūlo dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭau śaṭhaśceti /
analyzed: eteṣām anukūlaḥ dakṣiṇa dhṛṣṭau śaṭhaḥ ca iti

original: MSS_7991-2 bhedacatuṣṭayameṣāṃ vadāmyudāharaṇamekaikam //
analyzed: bheda catuṣṭayam eṣām vadāmi udāharaṇam ekaikam

original: MSS_7992-1 eteṣu hā taruṇamārutadhūyamāna- dāvānalaiḥ kavaliteṣu mahīruheṣu /
analyzed: eteṣu hā taruṇa māruta dhūyamāna dāva analaiḥ kavaliteṣu mahīruheṣu

original: MSS_7992-2 ambho na cej jalada muñcasi mā vimuñca vajraṃ punaḥ kṣipasi nirdaya kasya hetoḥ //
analyzed: ambhaḥ na ced jalada muñcasi mā vimuñca vajram punar kṣipasi nirdaya kasya hetoḥ

original: MSS_7993-1 ete saṃtatabhṛjyamānacaṇakāmodapradhānā manaḥ karṣyantyūṣarasaṃniveśajaraṭhacchāyāḥ sthalīgrāmakāḥ /
analyzed: ete saṃtata bhṛjyamāna caṇaka āmoda pradhānāḥ manaḥ karṣyanti ūṣara saṃniveśa jaraṭha chāyāḥ sthalīgrāmakāḥ

original: MSS_7993-2 tāruṇyātiśayāgrapāmaravadhūsollāsahastagraha- bhrāmyatpīvarayantrakaghvanirasadgambhīragehodarāḥ //
analyzed: tāruṇya atiśaya agra pāmara vadhū sa ullāsa hasta graha bhrāmyat pīvara yantraka ghvani rasat gambhīra geha udarāḥ

original: MSS_7994-1 ete saṃprati vaimanasyamaniśaṃ niḥśaṅkamātanvate kāntārasthalapadminīparimalairānanditendindirāḥ /
analyzed: ete saṃprati vaimanasyam aniśam niḥśaṅkam ātanvate kāntāra sthala padminī parimalaiḥ ānandita indindirāḥ

original: MSS_7994-2 unmīlatsahakārakānanataṭīvācālapuṃskokila- dhvānākarṇanakāṃdiśīkapathikāvaskandino vāsarāḥ //
analyzed: unmīlat sahakāra kānana taṭī vācāla puṃskokila dhvāna ākarṇana kāṃdiśīka pathika avaskandinaḥ vāsarāḥ

original: MSS_7995-1 ete samullasadbhāso rājante kundakorakāḥ /
analyzed: ete samullasat bhāsaḥ rājante kunda korakāḥ

original: MSS_7995-2 śītabhītā latākundam āśritā iva tārakāḥ //
analyzed: śīta bhītāḥ latā kundam āśritāḥ iva tārakāḥ

original: MSS_7996-1 ete snigdhatamā iti mā mā kṣudreṣu kuruta viśvāsam /
analyzed: ete snigdhatamāḥ iti mā mā kṣudreṣu kuruta viśvāsam

original: MSS_7996-2 siddhārthānāmeṣāṃ sneho'pyaśrūṇi pātayati //
analyzed: siddhārthānām eṣām snehaḥ upi aśrūṇi pātayati

original: MSS_7997-1 ete hi kāmakalitāḥ parimalalīnālivalayahuṃkāraiḥ /
analyzed: ete hi kāma kalitāḥ parimala līna ali valaya huṃkāraiḥ

original: MSS_7997-2 sūcitadānāḥ kariṇo badhyante kṣipramabalābhiḥ //
analyzed: sūcita dānāḥ kariṇaḥ badhyante kṣipram abalābhiḥ

original: MSS_7998-1 ete hi guṇāḥ paṅkaja santo'pi na te prakāśamāyānti /
analyzed: ete hi guṇāḥ paṅkaja santaḥ api na te prakāśam āyānti

original: MSS_7998-2 yal lakṣmīvasates tava madhupairupabhujyate kośaḥ //
analyzed: yat lakṣmī vasateḥ tava madhupaiḥ upabhujyate kośaḥ

original: MSS_7999-1 ete hi jīvāś cidbhāvā bhave bhāvanayā hitāḥ /
analyzed: ete hi jīvāḥ cit bhāvāḥ bhave bhāvanayā hitāḥ

original: MSS_7999-2 brahmaṇaḥ kalitākārāḥ sahasrāyutakoṭiśaḥ //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ kalita ākārāḥ sahasra ayuta koṭiśas

original: MSS_8000-1 ete hi dehadāhād virahā iva duḥsahā bhiṣajaḥ /
analyzed: ete hi deha dāhāt virahāḥ iva duḥsahāḥ bhiṣajaḥ

original: MSS_8000-2 grīṣmadivasā ivogrā bahutṛṣṇāḥ śoṣayantyeva //
analyzed: grīṣma divasāḥ iva ugrāḥ bahu tṛṣṇāḥ śoṣayanti eva

original: MSS_8001-1 ete hi vidyudguṇabaddhakakṣā gajā ivānyonyamabhidravantaḥ /
analyzed: ete hi vidyut guṇa baddha kakṣāḥ gajāḥ iva anyonyam abhidravantaḥ

original: MSS_8001-2 śakrājñayā vāridharāḥ sadhārā gāṃ rūpyarajjveva samuddharanti //
analyzed: śakra ājñayā vāridharāḥ sa dhārāḥ gām rūpya rajjvā iva samuddharanti

original: MSS_8002-1 ete hi samupāsīnā vihagā jalacāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: ete hi samupāsīnāḥ vihagāḥ jalacāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_8002-2 nāvagāhanti salilam apragalbhā ivāhavabh //
analyzed: na avagāhanti salilam a pragalbhāḥ

original: MSS_8003-1 etaiḥ piṣṭatamālavarṇakanibhairāliptamambhodharaiḥ saṃsaktairupavījitaṃ surabhibhiḥ śītaiḥ pradoṣānilaiḥ /
analyzed: etaiḥ piṣṭa tamāla varṇaka nibhaiḥ āliptam ambhodharaiḥ saṃsaktaiḥ upavījitam surabhibhiḥ śītaiḥ pradoṣa anilaiḥ

original: MSS_8003-2 eṣāmbhodasamāgamapraṇayinī svacchandamabhyāgatā raktā kāntamivāmbaraṃ priyatamā vidyut samāliṅgati //
analyzed: eṣā ambhoda samāgama praṇayinī svacchandam abhyāgatā raktā kāntam iva ambaram priyatamā vidyut samāliṅgati

original: MSS_8004-1 etairārdratamālapatramalinairāpītasūryaṃ nabho valmīkāḥ śaratāḍitā iva gajāḥ sīdanti dhārāhatāḥ /
analyzed: etaiḥ ārdra tamāla patra malinaiḥ āpīta sūryam nabhaḥ valmīkāḥ śara tāḍitāḥ iva gajāḥ sīdanti dhārā hatāḥ

original: MSS_8004-2 vidyut kāñcanadīpikeva racitā prāsādasaṃcāriṇī jyotsnā durbalabhartṛkeva vanitā protsārya meghairhṛtā //
analyzed: vidyut kāñcana dīpikā iva racitā prāsāda saṃcāriṇī jyotsnā durbala bhartṛkā iva vanitā protsārya meghaiḥ hṛtā

original: MSS_8005-1 etaireva yadā gajendramalinairādhmātalambodarair garjadbhiḥ sataḍidbalākaśabalairmeghaiḥ saśalyaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: etaiḥ eva yadā gaja indra malinaiḥ ādhmāta lamba udaraiḥ garjadbhiḥ sa taḍit balāka śabalaiḥ meghaiḥ sa śalyam manaḥ

original: MSS_8005-2 tat kiṃ proṣitabhartṛvadhyapaṭaho hā hā hṛtāśo bakaḥ prāvṛṭ prāvṛḍiti bravīti śaṭhadhīḥ kṣāraṃ kṣate prakṣipan //
analyzed: tat kim proṣita bhartṛ vadhya paṭahaḥ hā hā hṛta āśaḥ bakaḥ prāvṛṣ prāvṛṣ iti bravīti śaṭha dhīḥ kṣāram kṣate prakṣipan

original: MSS_8006-1 etairjahnusutājalairayamunābhinnairalagnāñjanair nārīṇāṃ nayanairakardamalavāliptairmṛṇālāṅkuraiḥ /
analyzed: etaiḥ jahnusutā jalaiḥ ayamunā bhinnaiḥ alagna añjanaiḥ nārīṇām nayanaiḥ akardama lava āliptaiḥ mṛṇāla aṅkuraiḥ

original: MSS_8006-2 hārairasphuradindranīlataralaiḥ kundairalīnālibhir velladbhirbhuvanaṃ vibhūṣitamidaṃ śītadyuteraṃśubhiḥ //
analyzed: hāraiḥ asphurat indranīla taralaiḥ kundaiḥ alīna ālibhiḥ velladbhiḥ bhuvanam vibhūṣitam idam śītadyuteḥ aṃśubhiḥ

original: MSS_8007-1 etairjātaiḥ kimiha bahubhirbhogibhiḥ kiṃ tu manye mānyaḥ ko'pi prabhavati jagatyekaśeṣaḥ sa śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: etaiḥ jātaiḥ kim iha bahubhiḥ bhogibhiḥ kim tu manye mānyaḥ kaḥ api prabhavati jagati ekaśeṣaḥ sa śeṣaḥ

original: MSS_8007-2 yasmin gaurīpṛthukucataṭīkuṅkumasthāsakāṅke yena sthāṇorurasi rahito hāravallīvilāsaḥ //
analyzed: yasmin gaurī pṛthu kuca taṭī kuṅkuma sthāsaka aṅke yena sthāṇoḥ urasi rahitaḥ hāravallī vilāsaḥ

original: MSS_8008-1 etairdakṣiṇagandhavāhavalanaiḥ śrīkhaṇḍa kiṃ saurabhaṃ brūmas te parito madhuvratayuvā yenāyamānīyate /
analyzed: etaiḥ dakṣiṇa gandha vāha valanaiḥ śrīkhaṇḍa kim saurabham brūmaḥ te paritas madhuvrata yuvā yena ayam ānīyate

original: MSS_8008-2 mākandādapahṛtya paṅkajavanāduddhūya kundodarād udbhrāmyaddvipagaṇḍamaṇḍalatalādākṛṣya hṛṣyanmanāḥ //
analyzed: mākandāt apahṛtya paṅkaja vanāt uddhūya kunda udarāt udbhrāmyat dvipa gaṇḍa maṇḍala talāt ākṛṣya hṛṣyat manāḥ

original: MSS_8009-1 etairyadi susnigdhair valmīkaiḥ parivṛtās tatas toyam /
analyzed: etaiḥ yadi su snigdhaiḥ valmīkaiḥ parivṛtāḥ tatas toyam

original: MSS_8009-2 hastais tribhiruttarataś caturbhirardhena ca narasya //
analyzed: hastaiḥ tribhiḥ uttaratas caturbhiḥ ardhena ca narasya

original: MSS_8010-1 etairyadyad samādiṣṭaṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
analyzed: etaiḥ yat yat samādiṣṭam śubham vā yadi vā aśubham

original: MSS_8010-2 kartavyaṃ niyataṃ bhītair apramattairbubhūṣubhiḥ //
analyzed: kartavyam niyatam bhītaiḥ apramattaiḥ bubhūṣubhiḥ

original: MSS_8011-1 etau dvau daśakaṇṭhakaṇṭhakadalīkāntārakānticchida u vaidehīkucakumbhakuṅkumarajaḥsāndrāruṇāṅkāṅkitau /
analyzed: etau dvau daśa kaṇṭha kaṇṭha kadalī kāntāra kānti chidaḥ vaidehī kuca kumbha kuṅkuma rajaḥ sāndra aruṇa aṅka aṅkitau

original: MSS_8011-2 lokatrāṇavidhānasādhusavanaprārambhayūpau bhujau deyāstāmuruvikramau raghupateḥ śreyāṃsi bhūyāṃsi vaḥ //
analyzed: loka trāṇa vidhāna sādhu savana prārambha yūpau bhujau deyā āstām uru vikramau raghu pateḥ śreyāṃsi bhūyāṃsi vaḥ

original: MSS_8012-1 enaṃ vihāya tulasīvipinopakaṇṭhaṃ gopyaḥ paratra nayanāmbujamīlanāni /
analyzed: enam vihāya tulasī vipina upakaṇṭham gopyaḥ paratra nayana ambuja mīlanāni

original: MSS_8012-2 kurvantu kiṃtu tulasīdalanīlabhāsaṃ kā vā mukundamanuvindatu līnamasmin //
analyzed: kurvantu kiṃtu tulasī dala nīla bhāsam kā vā mukundam anuvindatu līnam asmin

original: MSS_8013-1 enasānena tiryak syād ityādiḥ kā vibhīṣikā /
analyzed: enasā anena tiryak syāt ityādiḥ kā vibhīṣikā

original: MSS_8013-2 rājilo'pi hi rājeva svaiḥ sukhī sukhahetubhiḥ //
analyzed: rāji lopi hi rājā iva svaiḥ sukhī sukha hetubhiḥ

original: MSS_8014-1 enāmamandamakarandavinidrabindu- saṃdohadohadapadaṃ nalinīṃ vimucya /
analyzed: enām amanda makaranda vinidra bindu saṃdoha dohada padam nalinīm vimucya

original: MSS_8014-2 he mugdha ṣaṭpada nirarthakarāgabhāji jātaṃ manas tava japākusume kimatra //
analyzed: he mugdha ṣaṭpada nirarthaka rāga bhāji jātam manaḥ tava japā kusume kim atra

original: MSS_8015-1 ebhirjitairjitaṃ sarvaṃ sarutena mahātmanā /
analyzed: ebhiḥ jitaiḥ jitam sarvam sa rutena mahātmanā

original: MSS_8015-2 smṛtvā vivarjayedetān ṣaḍdoṣāṃśca mahīpatiḥ //
analyzed: smṛtvā vivarjayet etān ṣaṭ doṣān ca mahīpatiḥ

original: MSS_8016-1 ebhirdinais tu śiṣyāya guruḥ śastrāṇi dāpayet /
analyzed: ebhiḥ dinaiḥ tu śiṣyāya guruḥ śastrāṇi dāpayet

original: MSS_8016-2 saṃtarpya dānahomābhyāṃ surān vedavidhānataḥ //
analyzed: saṃtarpya dāna homābhyām surān veda vidhānataḥ

original: MSS_8017-1 ebhirnāśitayogāstu sakalā devayonayaḥ /
analyzed: ebhiḥ nāśita yogāḥ tu sakalāḥ devayonayaḥ

original: MSS_8017-2 upasargairmahāghorair āvartante punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: upasargaiḥ mahā ghoraiḥ āvartante punar punar

original: MSS_8018-1 eraṇḍapattraśayanā janayantī svedamalaghujaghanataṭā /
analyzed: eraṇḍa pattra śayanā janayantī svedam alaghu jaghana taṭā

original: MSS_8018-2 dhūlipuṭīva milantī smarajvaraṃ harati halikavadhūḥ //
analyzed: dhūli puṭī iva milantī smara jvaram harati halika vadhūḥ

original: MSS_8019-1 eraṇḍabījapratimam aṅgaṃ yasmin pratīyate /
analyzed: eraṇḍa bīja pratimam aṅgam yasmin pratīyate

original: MSS_8019-2 mahiṣākhyaḥ sa vai khaḍgo nīlameghasamacchaviḥ //
analyzed: mahiṣa ākhyaḥ sa vai khaḍgaḥ nīla megha sama chaviḥ

original: MSS_8020-1 eraṇḍabhiṇḍārkanalaiḥ prabhūtairapi saṃbhṛtaiḥ /
analyzed: eraṇḍa bhiṇḍa arka nalaiḥ prabhūtaiḥ api saṃbhṛtaiḥ

original: MSS_8020-2 dārukṛtyaṃ yathā nāsti tathā nājñaiḥ prayojanam //
analyzed: dāru kṛtyam yathā nā asti tathā na ajñaiḥ prayojanam

original: MSS_8021-1 elākaraṇaḍhekībhir vartanyā ḍūmaḍena ca /
analyzed: elā karaṇa ḍhekībhiḥ vartanyā ḍūmaḍena ca

original: MSS_8021-2 lambharāsaikatālībhiḥ śuddhasūḍo'ṣṭabhiḥ smṛtaḥ //
MSS_8022-1 evaṃ kadācin narakaṃ svargaṃ yonyantarāṇyapi /
analyzed: evam kadācid narakam svargam yoni antarāṇi api

original: MSS_8022-2 prayānti jīvā mohena mohitā bhavasaṃkaṭe //
analyzed: prayānti jīvāḥ mohena mohitāḥ bhava saṃkaṭe

original: MSS_8023-1 evaṃ karaṇasāmarthyāt saṃyamyātmānamātmanā /
analyzed: evam karaṇa sāmarthyāt saṃyamya ātmānam ātmanā

original: MSS_8023-2 nayāpanayavid rājā kurvīta hitamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: naya apanaya vid rājā kurvīta hitam ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_8024-1 evaṃ kartuṃ va vaktuṃ ca yo jānāti chalapriyaḥ /
analyzed: evam kartum vaktum ca yaḥ jānāti chala priyaḥ

original: MSS_8024-2 sa karotu sa yātvevaṃ kartuṃ bhoktuṃ nijaṃ hitam //
analyzed: sa karotu sa yātu evam kartum bhoktum nijam hitam

original: MSS_8025-1 evaṃ kukarma sarvasya phalatyātmani sarvadā /
analyzed: evam kukarma sarvasya phalati ātmani sarvadā

original: MSS_8025-2 yo yad vapati bījaṃ hi labhate so'pi tatphalam //
analyzed: yaḥ yat vapati bījam hi labhate saḥ api tad phalam

original: MSS_8026-1 tasmāt paraviruddheṣu notsahante mahāśayāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt para viruddheṣu na utsahante mahā āśayāḥ

original: MSS_8026-2 etaduttamasattvānāṃ vidhisiddhaṃ hi sadvratam //
analyzed: etat uttama sattvānām vidhi siddham hi sat vratam

original: MSS_8027-1 evaṃ kuryāt samudayaṃ vṛddhiṃ cāyasya darśayet /
analyzed: evam kuryāt samudayam vṛddhim ca āyasya darśayet

original: MSS_8027-2 hrāsaṃ vyayasya ca prājñaḥ sādhayec ca viparyayam //
analyzed: hrāsam vyayasya ca prājñaḥ sādhayet ca viparyayam

original: MSS_8028-1 evaṃgatasya mama sāṃpratametadarham atredamaupayikamitthamidaṃ ca sādhyam /
analyzed: evaṃgatasya mama sāṃpratam etad arham atrā idam aupayikam ittham idam ca sādhyam

original: MSS_8028-2 asmin pramāṇamidamityapi boddhumamba śaktirna me bhuvanasākṣiṇi kiṃ karomi //
analyzed: asmin pramāṇam idam iti api boddhum amba śaktiḥ na me bhuvanasākṣiṇi kim karomi

original: MSS_8029-1 evaṃ ca bhāṣate lokaś candanaṃ kila śītalam /
analyzed: evam ca bhāṣate lokaḥ candanam kila śītalam

original: MSS_8029-2 putragātrasya saṃsparśaś candanādatiricyate //
analyzed: putra gātrasya saṃsparśaḥ candanāt atiricyate

original: MSS_8030-1 evaṃ cet sarasi svabhāvamahimā jāḍyaṃ kimetādṛśaṃ yasmādeva nisargataḥ saralatā kiṃ granthimattedṛśī /
analyzed: evam ced sarasi svabhāva mahimā jāḍyam kim etādṛśam yasmāt eva nisargataḥ sarala tā kim granthimat tā īdṛśī

original: MSS_8030-2 mūlaṃ cec śuci paṅkajaśrutiriyaṃ kasmād guṇā yadyamī kiṃ chidrāṇi sakhe mṛṇāla bhavatas tattvaṃ na manyāmahe //
analyzed: mūlam ced śuci paṅkaja śrutiḥ iyam kasmāt guṇāḥ yadi amī kim chidrāṇi sakhe mṛṇāla bhavataḥ tattvam na manyāmahe

original: MSS_8031-1 evaṃ ced vidhinā kṛto'syupakṛtau kasyāṃcidapyakṣamaḥ kāmaṃ mopakṛthās tatas tava maro vācyaṃ na dhīro bhava /
analyzed: evam ced vidhinā kṛtaḥ asi upakṛtau kasyāṃcid api akṣamaḥ kāmam mā upakṛthāḥ tatas tava maraḥ vācyam na dhīraḥ bhava

original: MSS_8031-2 kiṃ tvārān mṛgatṛṣṇayopajanayannambhomucāṃ vañcanāṃ premṇā karṣasi tarṣamūrchitadhiyo'pyanyānataḥ śocyase //
analyzed: kim tu ārāt mṛgatṛṣṇayā upajanayan ambhomucām vañcanām premṇā karṣasi tarṣa mūrchita dhiyā upi anyān atas śocyase

original: MSS_8032-1 evaṃ corānacorākhyān vaṇikkārukuśīlavān /
analyzed: evam corān a cora ākhyān vaṇij kāru kuśīlavān

original: MSS_8032-2 bhikṣukān kuhakāṃścānyān vārayed deśapīḍanāt //
analyzed: bhikṣukān kuhakān ca anyān vārayet deśa pīḍanāt

original: MSS_8033-1 evaṃ jaḍeṣu lokeṣu strīṣu mugdhāsu kā kathā /
analyzed: evam jaḍeṣu lokeṣu strīṣu mugdhāsu kā kathā

original: MSS_8033-2 buddhihīnaprasādena jīvāmaḥ kevalaṃ vayam //
analyzed: buddhi hīna prasādena jīvāmaḥ kevalam vayam

original: MSS_8033A-1 evaṃ jarā hanti ca nirviśeṣaṃ smṛtiṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca /
analyzed: evam jarā hanti ca nirviśeṣam smṛtim ca rūpam ca parākramam ca

original: MSS_8033A-2 na caiva saṃvegamupaiti lokaḥ pratyakṣato'pīdṛśamīkṣamāṇaḥ //
analyzed: na ca eva saṃvegam upaiti lokaḥ pratyakṣatas upi īdṛśam īkṣamāṇaḥ

original: MSS_8034-1 evaṃjñātvā narendreṇa bhṛtyāḥ kāryā vicakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: evam jñātvā narendreṇa bhṛtyāḥ kāryāḥ vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: MSS_8034-2 kulīnāḥ śauryasaṃpannāḥ śaktā bhaktāḥ kramāgatāḥ //
analyzed: kulīnāḥ śaurya saṃpannāḥ śaktāḥ bhaktāḥ krama āgatāḥ

original: MSS_8035-1 evaṃjñātvā mahābhāgāḥ puruṣeṇa vijānatā /
analyzed: evam jñātvā mahābhāgāḥ puruṣeṇa vijānatā

original: MSS_8035-2 divā tat karma kartavyaṃ yena rātrau sukhaṃ svapet //
analyzed: divā tat karma kartavyam yena rātrau sukham svapet

original: MSS_8036-1 evaṃ duravadhāryaiva gatiś cittasya yoṣitām /
analyzed: evam duravadhāryā eva gatiḥ cittasya yoṣitām

original: MSS_8036-2 savairasyāvicārasya nīcaikābhimukhasya ca //
analyzed: sa vairasya avicārasya nīca eka abhimukhasya ca

original: MSS_8037-1 evaṃ cātyaktaśīlānāṃ sasattvānāṃ jitakrudhām /
analyzed: evam ca a tyakta śīlānām sa sattvānām jita krudhām

original: MSS_8037-2 tuṣṭyaivācintitā eva svayamāyānti saṃpadaḥ //
analyzed: tuṣṭyā eva a cintitāḥ eva svayam āyānti saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_8038-1 evaṃ devopahāsyatvaṃ loke gacchantyabuddhayaḥ /
analyzed: evam deva upahāsya tvam loke gacchanti abuddhayaḥ

original: MSS_8038-2 labhante nārthasaṃsiddhiṃ pūjyante tu subuddhayaḥ //
analyzed: labhante na artha saṃsiddhim pūjyante tu su buddhayaḥ

original: MSS_8039-1 evaṃ dravyaṃ dvipavanaṃ setubandhamathākarān /
analyzed: evam dravyam dvipa vanam setu bandham atha ākarān

original: MSS_8039-2 rakṣet pūrvakṛtān rājā navāṃścābhipravartayet //
analyzed: rakṣet pūrva kṛtān rājā navān ca abhipravartayet

original: MSS_8040-1 evaṃ nareśa vanitāhṛdaye kadācit kūṭād ṛte vasati satyakathālavo'pi /
analyzed: evam nareśa vanitā hṛdaye kadācid kūṭāt ṛte vasati satya kathā lavaḥ api

original: MSS_8040-2 tat sārthasādhyagamanāsu sadaiva tāsu śūnyāṭavīṣviva rameta na bhūtikāmaḥ //
analyzed: tat sārtha sādhya gamanāsu sadā eva tāsu śūnya aṭavīṣu iva rameta na bhūti kāmaḥ

original: MSS_8041-1 evaṃ na śaknuvantīha yat tat kartumaśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: evam na śaknuvanti iha yat tat kartum aśeṣatas

original: MSS_8041-2 yathāśakti na tasyāṃśam api kurvantyabuddhayaḥ //
analyzed: yathāśakti na tasya aṃśam api kurvanti abuddhayaḥ

original: MSS_8042-1 evaṃ niścitamabhyeti śubhameva śubhātmanām /
analyzed: evam niścitam abhyeti śubham eva śubha ātmanām

original: MSS_8042-2 evaṃ cātikramo nāma kleśāya mahatāmapi //
analyzed: evam ca atikramaḥ nāma kleśāya mahatām api

original: MSS_8043-1 aviśvāsāspadaṃ caiva strīṇāṃ spṛśati nāśayam /
analyzed: aviśvāsa āspadam ca eva strīṇām spṛśati na āśayam

original: MSS_8043-2 prāṇadānopakāro'pi kiṃ tāsāmanyaducyate //
analyzed: prāṇa dāna upakāraḥ upi kim tāsām anyat ucyate

original: MSS_8044-1 evaṃ nisargacapalā lalanā viveka- vairāgyadāyibahuduścaritaprabandhāḥ /
analyzed: evam nisarga capalāḥ lalanāḥ viveka vairāgya dāyi bahu duścarita prabandhāḥ

original: MSS_8044-2 sādhvī tu kācidapi tāsu kulaṃ viśālaṃ yālaṃkarotyabhinavā khamivendulekhā //
analyzed: sādhvī tu kācid api tāsu kulam viśālam yā alaṃkaroti abhinavā kham iva indu lekhā

original: MSS_8045-1 evaṃ nihatya saṃgrāme duṣṭaśatruṃ madoddhatam /
analyzed: evam nihatya saṃgrāme duṣṭa śatrum mada uddhatam

original: MSS_8045-2 jayatūryaninādena harṣayan subhaṭān svakān //
analyzed: jaya tūrya ninādena harṣayan su bhaṭān svakān

original: MSS_8046-2 evaṃ nojjhati mūḍho'rthān yāvadarthaiḥ sa nojjhitaḥ //
analyzed: evam na ujjhati mūḍha ūrthān yāvat arthaiḥ sa na ujjhitaḥ

original: MSS_8047-2 evaṃ paśuśca mūrkaśca nirvivekamatī samau //
analyzed: evam paśuḥ ca mūrkaḥ ca nirviveka matī samau

original: MSS_8048-1 evaṃ putrāśca pautrāśca jñātayo bāndhavās tathā /
analyzed: evam putrāḥ ca pautrāḥ ca jñātayaḥ bāndhavāḥ tathā

original: MSS_8048-2 teṣu sneho na kartavyo viprayogo hi tairdhruvam //
analyzed: teṣu snehaḥ na kartavyaḥ viprayogaḥ hi taiḥ dhruvam

original: MSS_8049-1 evaṃ prajñaiva paramaṃ balaṃ na tu parākramaḥ /
analyzed: evam prajñā eva paramam balam na tu parākramaḥ

original: MSS_8049-2 yatprabhāveṇa nihataḥ śaśakenāpi kesarī //
analyzed: yad prabhāveṇa nihataḥ śaśakena api kesarī

original: MSS_8050-1 evaṃ prayatnaṃ kurvīta yānaśayyāsanāśane /
analyzed: evam prayatnam kurvīta yāna śayyā āsana aśane

original: MSS_8050-2 sthāne prasādhane caiva sarvālaṅkārakeṣu ca //
analyzed: sthāne prasādhane ca eva sarva alaṅkārakeṣu ca

original: MSS_8051-1 evaṃ phalati sarvasya vidhiḥ sattvānusārataḥ /
analyzed: evam phalati sarvasya vidhiḥ sattva anusārataḥ

original: MSS_8051-2 tat susattvo bhavet sattvahīnaṃ na vṛṇvate śriyaḥ //
analyzed: tat su sattvaḥ bhavet sattva hīnam na vṛṇvate śriyaḥ

original: MSS_8052-2 evaṃ bahu kṣapayati svalpasyārthe dhanāndhadhīḥ //
analyzed: evam bahu kṣapayati su alpasya arthe dhana andha dhīḥ

original: MSS_8053-1 evaṃ bahūnapi ripūn samarapravṛttān dveṣākulānagaṇitasvaparasvarūpān /
analyzed: evam bahūn api ripūn samara pravṛttān dveṣa ākulān agaṇita sva para svarūpān

original: MSS_8053-2 eko'pyananyasamapauruṣabhagnasāra- darpajvarāñ jayati saṃyugamūrdhni dhīraḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ upi ananya sama pauruṣa bhagna sāra darpa jvarām jayati saṃyuga mūrdhni dhīraḥ

original: MSS_8054-1 evaṃ buddheḥ paraṃ buddhvā saṃstabhyātmānamātmanā /
analyzed: evam buddheḥ param buddhvā saṃstabhya ātmānam ātmanā

original: MSS_8054-2 jahi śatruṃ mahābāho kāmarūpaṃ durāsadam //
analyzed: jahi śatrum mahā bāho kāma rūpam durāsadam

original: MSS_8055-1 evaṃ bruvanti loke'tra dhanināṃ purataḥsthitāḥ /
analyzed: evam bruvanti dhaninām puratas sthitāḥ

original: MSS_8055-2 kulīnā api pāpānāṃ dṛśyante dhanalipsayā /
analyzed: kulīnāḥ api pāpānām dṛśyante dhana lipsayā

original: MSS_8055-3 daridrasya manuṣyasya kṣitau rājyaṃ prakurvataḥ //
analyzed: daridrasya manuṣyasya kṣitau rājyam prakurvataḥ

original: MSS_8056-1 evaṃ bhavati loke'smin deva sarvasya sarvadā /
analyzed: evam bhavati loke ismin deva sarvasya sarvadā

original: MSS_8056-2 prākkarmopārjitaṃ jantoḥ sarvameva śubhāśubham //
analyzed: prāc karma upārjitam jantoḥ sarvam eva śubha aśubham

original: MSS_8057-1 evaṃ bhavanti veśyāḥ svārthaikaratā vyapetasadbhāvāḥ /
analyzed: evam bhavanti veśyāḥ sva artha eka ratāḥ vyapeta sadbhāvāḥ

original: MSS_8057-2 abhilaṣitaviṣayasiddheḥ kā hānis tadapi yuṣmākam //
analyzed: abhilaṣita viṣaya siddheḥ kā hāniḥ tat api yuṣmākam

original: MSS_8058-1 evaṃ manaḥ karmavaśaṃ prayuṅkte avidyayātmanyupadhīyamāne /
analyzed: evam manaḥ karma vaśam prayuṅkte avidyayā ātmani upadhīyamāne

original: MSS_8058-2 prītirna yāvanmayi vāsudeve na mucyate dehayogena tāvat //
analyzed: prītiḥ na yāvat mayi vāsudeve na mucyate deha yogena tāvat

original: MSS_8059-2 evaṃ mūḍhaprabhurvetti nigrahaṃ nāpyanugraham //
analyzed: evam mūḍha prabhuḥ vetti nigraham na api anugraham

original: MSS_8060-1 evaṃ mūḍhasya mūḍhatvaṃ svārthāndhasyāticitratā /
analyzed: evam mūḍhasya mūḍha tvam svārtha andhasya ati citra tā

original: MSS_8061-1 evaṃ mohaprabhavo rāgo na strīṣu kasya duḥkhāya /
analyzed: evam moha prabhavaḥ rāgaḥ na strīṣu kasya duḥkhāya

original: MSS_8061-2 tāsveva vivekabhṛtāṃ bhavati virāgas tu mokṣāya //
analyzed: tāsu eva viveka bhṛtām bhavati virāgaḥ tu mokṣāya

original: MSS_8062-1 evaṃ yathāha bhavatī mama sarvadoṣāḥ kaḥ svāminā kuvalayākṣi sahānubandhaḥ /
analyzed: evam yathā āha bhavatī mama sarva doṣāḥ kaḥ svāminā kuvalayākṣi saha anubandhaḥ

original: MSS_8062-2 eṣo'ñjalirviracitaḥ kuru nigrahaṃ me dāse'parādhavati ko'vasaraḥ kṣamāyāḥ //
analyzed: eṣa uñjaliḥ viracitaḥ kuru nigraham me dāsa iparādhavati kovasaraḥ kṣamāyāḥ

original: MSS_8063-1 evaṃ lepatrayaṃ kuryāt saptame saptame'hani /
analyzed: evam lepa trayam kuryāt saptame saptame ahani

original: MSS_8063-2 tato janmāvadhi kacāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ syurbhramaraprabhāḥ //
analyzed: tatas janma avadhi kacāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ syuḥ bhramara prabhāḥ

original: MSS_8064-1 evaṃ lokaṃ paraṃ vidyān naśvaraṃ karmanirmitam /
analyzed: evam lokam param vidyāt naśvaram karma nirmitam

original: MSS_8064-2 satulyātiśayadhvaṃsaṃ yathā maṇḍalavartinām //
analyzed: satulya atiśaya dhvaṃsam yathā maṇḍalavartinām

original: MSS_8065-1 evaṃ vaśīkṛtasvātmā nityaṃ smitamukho bhavet /
analyzed: evam vaśīkṛta sva ātmā nityam smita mukhaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_8065-2 tyajed bhrakuṭisaṃkocaṃ pūrvābhāṣī jagatsuhṛt //
analyzed: tyajet bhrakuṭi saṃkocam pūrvābhāṣī jagat suhṛd

original: MSS_8066-1 evaṃvādini devarṣau pārśve pituradhomukhī /
analyzed: evaṃvādini devarṣau pārśve pituḥ adhomukhī

original: MSS_8066-2 līlākamalapatrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī //
analyzed: līlā kamala patrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī

original: MSS_8067-1 evaṃ vicāraś cintā ca sāraṃ rājye'dhikaṃ nu kim /
analyzed: evam vicāraḥ cintā ca sāram rājya īdhikam nu kim

original: MSS_8068-1 evaṃvidhān gajāñ jātyān vanādānīya pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: evaṃvidhān gajām jātyān vanāt ānīya pārthivaḥ

original: MSS_8068-2 vinaye śiṣyavat kuryāt putravat paripālayet //
analyzed: vinaye śiṣya vat kuryāt putra vat paripālayet

original: MSS_8069-1 evaṃvidhe bhāvi na veti citte niveśya kāryaṃ bhaṣaṇaṃ vimuñcet /
analyzed: evaṃvidhe bhāvi na vā iti citte niveśya kāryam bhaṣaṇam vimuñcet

original: MSS_8069-2 saṃbhakṣya piṇḍaṃ sthiratāṃ gatasya ceṣṭādikaṃ tasya nirūpaṇīyam //
analyzed: saṃbhakṣya piṇḍam sthira tām gatasya ca iṣṭā ādikam tasya nirūpaṇīyam

original: MSS_8070-1 evaṃ vilokyāsya guṇānanekān samastapāpārinirāsadakṣān /
analyzed: evam vilokya asya guṇān anekān samasta pāpa ari nirāsa dakṣān

original: MSS_8070-2 viśuddhabodhā na kadācanāpi jñānasya pūjāṃ mahatīṃ tyajanti //
analyzed: viśuddha bodhāḥ na kadācana api jñānasya pūjām mahatīm tyajanti

original: MSS_8071-1 evaṃ viṣaprayogeṇa śatrūṇāṃ kṣudradhātakam /
analyzed: evam viṣa prayogeṇa śatrūṇām kṣudradhātakam

original: MSS_8071-2 kṣīṇena kriyate yat tu viṣadaṇḍaḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: kṣīṇena kriyate yat tu viṣadaṇḍaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: MSS_8072-1 evaṃ viṣahya vidhurasya vidherniyogam āpatsu rakṣitacaritradhanā hi sādhvyaḥ /
analyzed: evam viṣahya vidhurasya vidheḥ niyogam āpatsu rakṣita caritra dhanāḥ hi sādhvyaḥ

original: MSS_8072-2 guptāḥ svasattvavibhavena mahattamena kalyāṇamādadhati patyurathātmanaśca //
analyzed: guptāḥ sva sattva vibhavena mahattamena kalyāṇam ādadhati patyuḥ atha ātmanaḥ ca

original: MSS_8073-1 evaṃvṛttasya rājñas tu śiloñchenāpi jīvataḥ /
analyzed: evaṃvṛttasya rājñaḥ tu śila uñchena api jīvataḥ

original: MSS_8073-2 vistīryate yaśo loke tailabindurivāmbhasi //
analyzed: vistīryate yaśaḥ loke taila binduḥ iva ambhasi

original: MSS_8074-1 evaṃ vedhatrayaṃ kuryāc śaṅkhadundubhiniḥsvanaiḥ /
MSS_8074-2 tataḥ praṇamya gurave dhanurbāṇān nivedayet //
analyzed: tatas praṇamya gurave dhanuḥ bāṇān nivedayet

original: MSS_8075-1 evaṃ śramavidhiṃ kuryād yāvat siddhiḥ prajāyate /
analyzed: evam śrama vidhim kuryāt yāvat siddhiḥ prajāyate

original: MSS_8075-2 śrame siddhe ca varṣāsu naiva grāhyaṃ dhanuḥ kare //
analyzed: śrame siddhe ca varṣāsu nā eva grāhyam dhanuḥ kare

original: MSS_8076-1 evaṃ saṃcintya manasā pretya karmaphalodayam /
analyzed: evam saṃcintya manasā pretya karma phala udayam

original: MSS_8076-2 manovākkarmabhirnityaṃ śubhaṃ karma samācaret //
analyzed: manaḥ vāc karmabhiḥ nityam śubham karma samācaret

original: MSS_8077-1 evaṃ santyeva deveha bhartṛbhaktāḥ kulāṅganāḥ /
analyzed: evam santi eva deva iha bhartṛ bhaktāḥ kula aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_8077-2 na punaḥ sarvathā sarvā durvṛttā eva yoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: na punar sarvathā sarvāḥ durvṛttāḥ eva yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_8078-1 evaṃ sarvaṃ vidhāyedam itikartavyamātmanaḥ /
analyzed: evam sarvam vidhāya idam itikartavyam ātmanaḥ

original: MSS_8078-2 yuktaś caivāpramattaś ca parirakṣedimāḥ prajāḥ //
analyzed: yuktaḥ ca eva apramattaḥ ca parirakṣet imāḥ prajāḥ

original: MSS_8079-1 evaṃ sarvajagad vilokya kalitaṃ durvāravīryātmanā nistriṃśena samastasattvasamitipradhvaṃsinā mṛtyunā /
analyzed: evam sarva jagat vilokya kalitam durvāra vīrya ātmanā nistriṃśena samasta sattva samiti pradhvaṃsinā mṛtyunā

original: MSS_8079-2 sadratnatrayaśātamārgaṇagaṇaṃ gṛhṇanti tacchittaye santaḥ śāntadhiyo jineśvaratapaḥ sāmrājyalakṣmīśritāḥ //
analyzed: sat ratna traya śāta mārgaṇa gaṇam gṛhṇanti tad chittaye santaḥ śānta dhiyaḥ jineśvara tapaḥ sāmrājya lakṣmī śritāḥ

original: MSS_8080-1 evaṃ sarvajanānāṃ duḥkhakaraṃ jaṭharaśikhinamativiṣamam /
analyzed: evam sarva janānām duḥkha karam jaṭhara śikhinam ati viṣamam

original: MSS_8080-2 saṃtoṣajalairamalaiḥ śamayanti yatīśvarā ye te //
analyzed: saṃtoṣa jalaiḥ amalaiḥ śamayanti yati īśvarāḥ ye te

original: MSS_8081-1 evaṃ sarvamidaṃ kṛtvā yan mayāsāditaṃ śubham /
analyzed: evam sarvam idam kṛtvā yat mayā āsāditam śubham

original: MSS_8081-2 tena syāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhapraśāntikṛt //
analyzed: tena syām sarva sattvānām sarva duḥkha praśānti kṛt

original: MSS_8082-1 evaṃ sarvamidaṃ rājā saṃmantrya saha mantribhiḥ /
analyzed: evam sarvam idam rājā saṃmantrya saha mantribhiḥ

original: MSS_8082-2 vyāyamyāplutya madhyāhne bhoktumantaḥpuraṃ vrajet //
analyzed: vyāyamya āplutya madhyāhne bhoktum antaḥpuram vrajet

original: MSS_8083-1 evaṃ sarvātmanā kāryā rakṣā yogavidāniśam /
analyzed: evam sarva ātmanā kāryā rakṣā yoga vidā aniśam

original: MSS_8083-2 dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ śarīraṃ sādhanaṃ yataḥ //
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām śarīram sādhanam yatas

original: MSS_8084-1 evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhaktiravyabhicāriṇī /
analyzed: evam sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhaktiḥ avyabhicāriṇī

original: MSS_8084-2 kartavyā paṇḍitairjñātvā sarvabhūtamayaṃ harim //
analyzed: kartavyā paṇḍitaiḥ jñātvā sarva bhūta mayam harim

original: MSS_8085-1 evaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ deham avyaktaprabhavāpyayam /
analyzed: evam sādhāraṇam deham avyakta prabhava apyayam

original: MSS_8085-2 ko vidvānātmasātkṛtvā hanti jantūnṛte'sataḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ vidvān ātmasātkṛtvā hanti jantūn ṛte sataḥ

original: MSS_8086-1 evaṃ siddho bhaved yogī vañcayitvā vidhānataḥ /
analyzed: evam siddhaḥ bhavet yogī vañcayitvā vidhānataḥ

original: MSS_8086-2 kālaṃ kalitasaṃsāraṃ pauruṣeṇādbhutena hi //
analyzed: kālam kalita saṃsāram pauruṣeṇa adbhutena hi

original: MSS_8087-1 evaṃ sthāpaya subhru bāhulatikāmevaṃ kuru sthānakaṃ nātyuccairnama kuñcayāgracaraṇau māṃ paśya tāvat kṣaṇam /
analyzed: evam sthāpaya subhru bāhu latikām evam kuru sthānakam na ati uccais nama kuñcaya agra caraṇau mām paśya tāvat kṣaṇam

original: MSS_8087-2 evaṃ nartayataḥ svavaktramurajenāmbhodharadhvāninā śaṃbhorvaḥ paripāntu nartitalayacchedāhatās tālikāḥ //
analyzed: evam nartayataḥ sva vaktra murajena ambhodhara dhvāninā śaṃbhoḥ vaḥ paripāntu nartita laya cheda āhatāḥ tālikāḥ

original: MSS_8088-2 evaṃ svadoṣaḥ prakaṭo'py ajñairdeva na budhyate //
analyzed: evam sva doṣaḥ prakaṭaḥ api ajñaiḥ deva na budhyate

original: MSS_8089-1 evaṃ svabhāvaṃ jñātvāsāṃ prajāpatinisargajam /
analyzed: evam svabhāvam jñātvā āsām prajāpati nisarga jam

original: MSS_8089-2 paramaṃ yatnamātiṣṭhet puruṣo rakṣaṇaṃ prati //
analyzed: paramam yatnam ātiṣṭhet puruṣaḥ rakṣaṇam prati

original: MSS_8090-2 evaṃ hi kurute deva yoṣidīrṣyāniyantritā //
analyzed: evam hi kurute deva yoṣit īrṣyā niyantritā

original: MSS_8091-1 śikṣayatyanyapuruṣā'saṃgamīrṣyaiva hi striyaḥ /
analyzed: śikṣayati anya puruṣa asaṃgam īrṣyā eva hi striyaḥ

original: MSS_8091-2 tadīrṣyāmaprakāśyaiva rakṣyā nārī subuddhinā //
analyzed: tad īrṣyām aprakāśyā eva rakṣyā nārī su buddhinā

original: MSS_8092-1 rahasyaṃ ca na vaktavyaṃ vanitāsu yathā tathā /
analyzed: rahasyam ca na vaktavyam vanitāsu yathā tathā

original: MSS_8092-2 puruṣeṇecchatā kṣemam ... ... ... //
analyzed: puruṣeṇa icchatā kṣemam

original: MSS_8093-1 evamajñātahṛdayā mūrkhāḥ kṛtvā viparyayam /
analyzed: evam ajñāta hṛdayāḥ mūrkhāḥ kṛtvā viparyayam

original: MSS_8093-2 ghnanti svārthaṃ parārthaṃ ca tādṛg dadati co'ttaram //
analyzed: ghnanti sva artham para artham ca tādṛś dadati ca uttaram

original: MSS_8094-1 evamanekavidhaṃ vidadhāti yo jananārṇavapātanimittam /
analyzed: evam anekavidham vidadhāti yaḥ janana arṇava pāta nimittam

original: MSS_8094-2 ceṣṭitamaṅgajabāṇavibhinno neha sukhī na paratra sukhī saḥ //
analyzed: ceṣṭitam aṅgaja bāṇa vibhinnaḥ na iha sukhī na paratra sukhī saḥ

original: MSS_8095-1 evamanyāyyayā buddhyā kṛtaṃ karmāśubhāvaham /
analyzed: evam anyāyyayā buddhyā kṛtam karma aśubha āvaham

original: MSS_8095-2 tasmāt tan nyāyyayā kuryād bakenāheḥ kṛtaṃ yathā //
analyzed: tasmāt tat nyāyyayā kuryāt bakena aheḥ kṛtam yathā

original: MSS_8096-1 evamanyonyasaṃcāraṃ ṣaḍguṇyaṃ yo'nupaśyati /
analyzed: evam anyonya saṃcāram ṣaḍguṇyam yaḥ anupaśyati

original: MSS_8096-2 sa buddhinigalair baddhair iṣṭaṃ krīḍati pārthivaiḥ //
analyzed: sa buddhi nigalaiḥ baddhaiḥ iṣṭam krīḍati pārthivaiḥ

original: MSS_8097-1 evamapāstamatiḥ kramato'tra puṣpadhanurdharavegavidhūtaḥ /
analyzed: evam apāsta matiḥ kramataḥ utra puṣpadhanurdhara vega vidhūtaḥ

original: MSS_8097-2 kiṃ na jano labhate jananindyo duḥkhamasahyamanantamavācyam //
analyzed: kim na janaḥ labhate jana nindyaḥ duḥkham asahyam anantam avācyam

original: MSS_8098-1 evamabhyāhate loke kālenābhinipīḍite /
analyzed: evam abhyāhate loke kālena abhinipīḍite

original: MSS_8098-2 sumahad dhairyamālambya mano mokṣe niveśayet //
analyzed: su mahat dhairyam ālambya manaḥ mokṣe niveśayet

original: MSS_8099-1 evamalpaśruto mantrī kalyāṇābhijano'pyuta /
analyzed: evam alpa śrutaḥ mantrī kalyāṇa abhijanaḥ upi uta

original: MSS_8099-2 dharmārthakāmasaṃyuktaṃ nālaṃ mantraṃ parīkṣitum //
analyzed: dharma artha kāma saṃyuktam na alam mantram parīkṣitum

original: MSS_8100-1 evamācārato dṛṣṭvā dharmasya munayo gatim /
analyzed: evam ācārataḥ dṛṣṭvā dharmasya munayaḥ gatim

original: MSS_8100-2 sarvasya tapaso mūlam ācāraṃ jagṛhuḥ param //
analyzed: sarvasya tapasaḥ mūlam ācāram jagṛhuḥ param

original: MSS_8101-1 evamāptavacanāt sa pauruṣaṃ kākapakṣakadhare'pi rāghave /
analyzed: evam āpta vacanāt sa pauruṣam kākapakṣaka dhare pi rāghave

original: MSS_8101-2 śraddadhe tridaśagopamātrake dāhaśaktimiva kṛṣṇavartmani //
analyzed: śraddadhe tridaśa gopa mātrake dāha śaktim iva kṛṣṇavartmani

original: MSS_8102-1 evamāli nigṛhītasādhvasaṃ śaṃkaro rahasi sevyatāmiti /
analyzed: evam āli nigṛhīta sādhvasam śaṃkaraḥ rahasi sevyatām iti

original: MSS_8102-2 sā sakhībhirupadiṣṭamākulā nāsmarat pramukhavartini priye //
analyzed: sā sakhībhiḥ upadiṣṭam ākulā nā asmarat pramukha vartini priye

original: MSS_8103-1 evamāśramaviruddhavṛttinā saṃyamaḥ kimiti janmatas tvayā /
analyzed: evam āśrama viruddha vṛttinā saṃyamaḥ kim iti janmataḥ tvayā

original: MSS_8103-2 sattvasaṃśrayasukho'pi dūṣyate kṛṣṇasarpaśiśuneva candanaḥ //
analyzed: sattva saṃśraya sukhaḥ api dūṣyate kṛṣṇa sarpa śiśunā iva candanaḥ

original: MSS_8104-1 evamuttamajanmānas tiryañco'pyāpadi priye /
analyzed: evam uttamajanmānaḥ tiryañcaḥ upi āpadi priye

original: MSS_8104-2 prabhuṃ nojjhanti mitraṃ vā tārayanti tataḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: prabhum na ujjhanti mitram vā tārayanti tatas punar

original: MSS_8105-1 hīnajātyudbhavā ye tu teṣāṃ spṛśati nāśayam /
analyzed: hīna jāti udbhavāḥ ye tu teṣām spṛśati na āśayam

original: MSS_8105-2 kadācidapi sattvaṃ vā sneho vā cañcalātmanām //
analyzed: kadācid api sattvam vā snehaḥ vā cañcala ātmanām

original: MSS_8106-1 evamupacīyamānaṃ stokaṃ stokaṃ vicinvataḥ puṇyam /
analyzed: evam upacīyamānam stokam stokam vicinvataḥ puṇyam

original: MSS_8106-2 saṃpadyate viśālaṃ śrutimapyevaṃ tapo'pyevam //
analyzed: saṃpadyate viśālam śrutim api evam tapaḥ api evam

original: MSS_8107-1 evameva kriyāyuktā sarvasaubhāgyadāyinī /
analyzed: evam eva kriyā yuktā sarva saubhāgya dāyinī

original: MSS_8107-2 yasyaiṣā ca bhaved bhāryā devendro'sau na mānuṣaḥ //
analyzed: yasya eṣā ca bhavet bhāryā deva indrā usau na mānuṣaḥ

original: MSS_8108-1 evameva nahi jīvyate khalāt tatra kā nṛpativallabhe kathā /
analyzed: evam eva nahi jīvyate khalāt tatra kā nṛpati vallabhe kathā

original: MSS_8108-2 pūrvameva hi suduḥsaho'nalaḥ kiṃ punaḥ prabalavāyuneritaḥ //
analyzed: pūrvam eva hi su duḥsahaḥ unalaḥ kim punar prabala vāyunā īritaḥ

original: MSS_8109-1 evameva manuṣyeṣu teṣu pūrvāpakāriṣu /
analyzed: evam eva manuṣyeṣu teṣu pūrva apakāriṣu

original: MSS_8109-2 viśvāso nopagantavyo nadī gatajalā yathā //
analyzed: viśvāsaḥ nā upagantavyaḥ nadī gata jalā yathā

original: MSS_8110-1 evameva hi yo'śvatthaṃ ropayed vidhinā naraḥ /
analyzed: evam eva hi yā uśvattham ropayet vidhinā naraḥ

original: MSS_8110-2 yatra kutrāpi vā sthāne gacchet sa bhavanaṃ hareḥ //
analyzed: yatra kutra api vā sthāne gacchet sa bhavanam hareḥ

original: MSS_8111-1 eṣa eva manastāpaḥ paṅke magnasya dantinaḥ /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva manaḥ tāpaḥ paṅke magnasya dantinaḥ

original: MSS_8111-2 patate yat samuddhartuṃ jñātayo nibhṛtasmitāḥ //
analyzed: patate yat samuddhartum jñātayaḥ nibhṛta smitāḥ

original: MSS_8112-1 eṣa krīḍāntatāmyatkusumapuravadhūvaktrasaurabhyabandhur mugdhaṃ nidrājaḍānāṃ rasitamanusarodrāghayan sārasānām /
analyzed: eṣa krīḍā anta tāmyat kusuma pura vadhū vaktra saurabhya bandhuḥ mugdham nidrā jaḍānām rasitam anusara udrāghayan sārasānām

original: MSS_8112-2 āvātyaṅgānukūlaś calitavicakilaśreṇigandhānudhāvad- rolambodghuṣyamāṇasmarajayabirudāḍambaro mātariśvā //
analyzed: calita vicakila śreṇi gandha anudhāvat rolamba udghuṣyamāṇa smara jaya biruda āḍambaraḥ mātariśvā

original: MSS_8113-1 eṣa kṣubhnāti paṅkaṃ dalati kamalinīmatti gundrāprarohān ārān mustāsthalāni sthapuṭayati jalānyutkasetūni yāti /
analyzed: eṣa kṣubhnāti paṅkam dalati kamalinīm atti gundrā prarohān ārāt mustā sthalāni sthapuṭayati jalāni utka setūni yāti

original: MSS_8113-2 prāptaḥ prāptaḥ praviṣṭo vanagahanamayaṃ yāti yātīti sainyaiḥ paścādanviṣyamāṇaḥ praviśati viṣamān kānanāntān varāhaḥ //
analyzed: prāptaḥ prāptaḥ praviṣṭaḥ vana gahanam ayam yāti yāti iti sainyaiḥ paścāt anviṣyamāṇaḥ praviśati viṣamān kānana antān varāhaḥ

original: MSS_8114-1 eṣa gajo'drimastakatale kalabhaparivṛtaḥ krīḍati vṛkṣagulmagahane kusumabharanate /
analyzed: eṣa gaja udri mastaka tale kalabha parivṛtaḥ krīḍati vṛkṣa gulma gahane kusuma bhara nate

original: MSS_8114-2 megharavaṃ niśamya muditaḥ pavanajavasamaḥ sundari vaṃśapatrapatitaṃ punarapi kurute //
analyzed: megha ravam niśamya muditaḥ pavana java samaḥ sundari vaṃśa patra patitam punar api kurute

original: MSS_8115-1 eṣa cārumukhi yogatārayā yujyate taralabimbayā śaśī /
analyzed: eṣa cāru mukhi yogatārayā yujyate tarala bimbayā śaśī

original: MSS_8115-2 sādhvasādupagataprakampayā kanyayeva navadīkṣayā varaḥ //
analyzed: sādhvasāt upagata prakampayā kanyayā iva nava dīkṣayā varaḥ

original: MSS_8116-1 eṣa tūḍḍamaravīciḍambaraḥ kṣobhamātramagamat payonidhiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa tu uḍḍamara vīci ḍambaraḥ kṣobha mātram agamat payonidhiḥ

original: MSS_8116-2 vibhramais tadudayakramocitair ullalāsa lalanāsu manmathaḥ //
analyzed: vibhramaiḥ tad udaya krama ucitaiḥ ullalāsa lalanāsu manmathaḥ

original: MSS_8116A-1 eṣa durniyatidaṇḍacaṇḍima- prerito bata ravirgatacchaviḥ /
analyzed: eṣa durniyati daṇḍa caṇḍima preritaḥ bata raviḥ gata chaviḥ

original: MSS_8116A-2 sthāsyati svayamadhaḥpatan kiyat- kālamambaravilambibhiḥ karaiḥ //
analyzed: sthāsyati svayam adhas patan kiyat kālam ambara vilambibhiḥ karaiḥ

original: MSS_8117-1 eṣa dharmastu suśroṇi piturmātuśca vaśyatā /
analyzed: eṣa dharmaḥ tu suśroṇi pituḥ mātuḥ ca vaśya tā

original: MSS_8117-2 ataścājñāṃ vyatikramya nāhaṃ jīvitumutsahe //
analyzed: atas ca ājñām vyatikramya na aham jīvitum utsahe

original: MSS_8118-1 eṣa dharmo mayākhyāto nārīṇāṃ paramā gatiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa dharmaḥ mayā ākhyātaḥ nārīṇām paramā gatiḥ

original: MSS_8118-2 yā nārī kurute cānyat sā yāti narakaṃ dhruvam //
analyzed: yā nārī kurute ca anyat sā yāti narakam dhruvam

original: MSS_8119-1 eṣa bakaḥ sahasaiva vipannaḥ śāṭhyamaho kva nu tad gatamasya /
analyzed: eṣa bakaḥ sahasā eva vipannaḥ śāṭhyam aho kva nu tat gatam asya

original: MSS_8119-2 sādhu kṛtāntaka kaścidapi tvāṃ vañcayituṃ na kuto'pi samarthaḥ //
analyzed: sādhu kṛtāntaka kaścid api tvām vañcayitum na kutas api samarthaḥ

original: MSS_8120-1 eṣa brahmā saroje rajanikarakalāśekharaḥ śaṃkaro'yaṃ dorbhirdaityāntako'sau sadhanurasigadācakracihnaiś caturbhiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa brahmā saroje raja nikara kalā śekharaḥ śaṃkaraḥ yam dorbhiḥ daitya antakaḥ usau sa dhanuḥ asi gadā cakra cihnaiḥ caturbhiḥ

original: MSS_8120-2 eṣo'pyairāvatasthas tridaśapatiramī devi devās tathānye nṛtyanti vyomni caitāś calacaraṇaraṇannūpurā divyanāryaḥ //
analyzed: eṣaḥ upi airāvata sthaḥ tridaśa patiḥ amī devi devāḥ tathā anye nṛtyanti vyomni ca etāḥ cala caraṇa raṇat nūpurāḥ divya nāryaḥ

original: MSS_8121-1 eṣa bho nirmalajyotsno rāhuṇā grasyate śaśī /
analyzed: eṣa bho nirmala jyotsnaḥ rāhuṇā grasyate śaśī

original: MSS_8121-2 jalaṃ kūlāvapātena prasannaṃ kaluṣāyate //
analyzed: jalam kūla avapātena prasannam kaluṣāyate

original: MSS_8122-1 eṣa ravis tejasvī khadyoto'pyeṣa hanta tejasvī /
analyzed: eṣa raviḥ tejasvī khadyotaḥ upi eṣa hanta tejasvī

original: MSS_8122-2 eṣa rasālaḥ śākhī śākhī śākhoṭako'pyeṣaḥ //
analyzed: eṣa rasālaḥ śākhī śākhī śākhoṭakā upi eṣaḥ

original: MSS_8123-1 eṣa rājñāṃ paro dharmo hyārtānāmārtinigrahaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa rājñām paraḥ dharmaḥ hi ārtānām ārti nigrahaḥ

original: MSS_8124-1 eṣa vandhyāsuto yāti khapuṣpakṛtaśekharaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vandhyā sutaḥ yāti khapuṣpa kṛta śekharaḥ

original: MSS_8124-2 mṛgatṛṣṇāmbhasi snātaḥ śaśaśṛṅgadhanurdharaḥ //
MSS_8125-1 eṣa viśeṣaḥ spaṣṭo vahneśca tvatpratāpavahneśca /
analyzed: eṣa viśeṣaḥ spaṣṭaḥ vahneḥ ca tvad pratāpa vahneḥ ca

original: MSS_8125-2 aṅkurati tena dagdhaṃ dagdhasyānena nodbhavo bhūyaḥ //
analyzed: aṅkurati tena dagdham dagdhasya anena na udbhavaḥ bhūyas

original: MSS_8126-1 eṣa vṛkṣaśikhare kṛtāspado jātarūparasagauramaṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vṛkṣa śikhare kṛta āspadaḥ jātarūpa rasa gaura maṇḍalaḥ

original: MSS_8126-2 hīyamānamaharatyayātapaṃ pīvaroru pibatīva barhiṇaḥ //
analyzed: hīyamānam aharatyaya ātapam pīvara uru pibati iva barhiṇaḥ

original: MSS_8127-1 eṣa ṣaṭpadayuvā madāyataḥ kunda yāpayati yāminīs tvayi /
analyzed: eṣa ṣaṭpada yuvā mada āyataḥ kunda yāpayati yāminīḥ tvayi

original: MSS_8127-2 durvahā tadapi nāpacīyate padminīvirahavedanā hṛdi //
analyzed: durvahā tat api nā apacīyate padminī viraha vedanā hṛdi

original: MSS_8128-1 eṣa sāndratimire gaganānte vāriṇīva maline yamunāyāḥ /
analyzed: eṣa sāndra timire gagana ante vāriṇi iva maline yamunāyāḥ

original: MSS_8128-2 bhāti pakṣapuṭagopitacañcū rājahaṃsa iva śītamayūkhaḥ //
analyzed: bhāti pakṣa puṭa gopita cañcuḥ rājahaṃsaḥ iva śītamayūkhaḥ

original: MSS_8129-1 eṣa sūryāṃśusaṃtapto mṛgaḥ kutarumāśritaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa sūrya aṃśu saṃtaptaḥ mṛgaḥ ku tarum āśritaḥ

original: MSS_8129-2 sādhurbhāgyaparikṣīṇo nīcaṃ prāpyeva sīdati //
analyzed: sādhuḥ bhāgya parikṣīṇaḥ nīcam prāpya iva sīdati

original: MSS_8130-1 eṣa svabhāvo nārīṇām anubhūya purā sukham /
analyzed: eṣa svabhāvaḥ nārīṇām anubhūya purā sukham

original: MSS_8130-2 alpāmapyāpadaṃ prāpya duṣyanti prajahatyapi //
analyzed: alpām api āpadam prāpya duṣyanti prajahati api

original: MSS_8131-1 eṣa svargataraṅgiṇījalamiladdigdantidantadyutir bhraśyadrājatakumbhavibhramadharaḥ śītāṃśurabhyudyataḥ /
analyzed: eṣa svarga taraṅgiṇī jala milat digdanti danta dyutiḥ bhraśyat rājata kumbha vibhrama dharaḥ śītāṃśuḥ abhyudyataḥ

original: MSS_8131-2 haṃsīyatyamalāmbujīyati lasaḍḍiṇḍīrapiṇḍīyati sphārasphāṭikakuṇḍalīyati diśāmānandakandīyati //
analyzed: haṃsīyati amalāmbujīyati lasat ḍiṇḍīrapiṇḍīyati sphāra sphāṭika kuṇḍalīyati diśām ānandakandīyati

original: MSS_8132-1 eṣa hi prathamo dharmaḥ kṣatriyasyābhiṣecanam /
analyzed: eṣa hi prathamaḥ dharmaḥ kṣatriyasya abhiṣecanam

original: MSS_8132-2 yena śakyaṃ mahāprājña prajānāṃ paripālanam //
analyzed: yena śakyam mahā prājña prajānām paripālanam

original: MSS_8133-1 eṣāṃ gopavadhūvilāsasuhṛdāṃ rādhārahaḥsākṣiṇāṃ bhadraṃ bhadra kalindaśailatanayātīre latāśākhinām /
analyzed: eṣām gopa vadhū vilāsa suhṛdām rādhā rahaḥ sākṣiṇām bhadram bhadra kalinda śaila tanayā tīre latā śākhinām

original: MSS_8133-2 vicchinne smaratalpakalpanavidhicchedāya yoge'dhunā te jāne jaraṭhībhavanti vilasannīlatviṣaḥ pallavaiḥ //
analyzed: vicchinne smara talpa kalpana vidhi chedāya yoga idhunā te jāne jaraṭhībhavanti vilasat nīla tviṣaḥ pallavaiḥ

original: MSS_8134-1 eṣāṃ pallavamaṃśukāni kusumaṃ muktāḥ phalaṃ vidrumaṃ vaiḍūryaṃ dalamaṅkuro maratakaṃ haimaṃ ca śākhāśatam /
analyzed: eṣām pallavam aṃśukāni kusumam muktāḥ phalam vidrumam vaiḍūryam dalam aṅkuraḥ maratakam haimam ca śākhā śatam

original: MSS_8134-2 ete ke jagatīruho vanajuṣāpyajñātapūrvā mayā prāyaḥ sāramamī divo viṭapinaḥ kiṃ tairmamānyo bharaḥ //
analyzed: ete ke jagatīruhaḥ vana juṣā api ajñāta pūrvāḥ mayā prāyas sāram amī divaḥ viṭapinaḥ kim taiḥ mama anyaḥ bharaḥ

original: MSS_8135-1 eṣā kā jaghanasthalī sulalitā pronmattakāmādhikā bhrūbhaṅgaṃ kuṭilaṃ tvanaṅgadhanuṣaḥ prakhyaṃ prabhācandravat /
analyzed: eṣā kā jaghana sthalī su lalitā pronmatta kāma adhikā bhrū bhaṅgam kuṭilam tu anaṅga dhanuṣaḥ prakhyam prabhā candra vat

original: MSS_8135-2 rākācandrakapolapaṅkajamukhī kṣāmodarī sundarī veṇīdaṇḍamidaṃ vibhāti tulitaṃ velladbhujaṃ gacchati //
analyzed: rākā candra kapola paṅkaja mukhī kṣāma udarī sundarī veṇī daṇḍam idam vibhāti tulitam vellat bhujam gacchati

original: MSS_8136-1 eṣā kā navayauvanā śaśimukhī kāntā patho gacchati nidrāvyākulitā vighūrṇanayanā saṃpakvabimbādharā /
analyzed: eṣā kā nava yauvanā śaśi mukhī kāntā pathaḥ gacchati nidrā vyākulitā vighūrṇa nayanā saṃpakva bimba adharā

original: MSS_8136-2 keśairvyākulitā nakhairvidalitā dantaiśca khaṇḍīkṛtā kenedaṃ ratirākṣasena ramitā śārdūlavikrīḍitā //
analyzed: keśaiḥ vyākulitā nakhaiḥ vidalitā dantaiḥ ca khaṇḍīkṛtā kena idam rati rākṣasena ramitā śārdūla vikrīḍitā

original: MSS_8137-1 eṣā kāntā vrajati lalitaṃ vepamānā gulmacchannaṃ vanamurunagaiḥ saṃpraviddham /
analyzed: eṣā kāntā vrajati lalitam vepamānā gulma channam vanam uru nagaiḥ saṃpraviddham

original: MSS_8137-2 hā hā kaṣṭaṃ kimidamiti no vedmi mūḍho vyaktaṃ krodhaccharabhalalitaṃ kartukāmā //
analyzed: hā hā kaṣṭam kim idam iti no vedmi mūḍhaḥ vyaktam krodhat śarabha lalitam kartu kāmā

original: MSS_8138-1 eṣā kā paripūrṇacandravadanā gaurīmṛgā kṣobhinī līlāmattagajendrahaṃsagamanā - - . - - . - /
analyzed: eṣā kā paripūrṇa candra vadanā gaurī mṛgā kṣobhinī līlā matta gaja indra haṃsa gamanā

original: MSS_8138-2 niḥśvāsādharagandhaśītalamukhī vācā mṛdūllāsinī sa ślāghyaḥ puruṣas sa jīvati varo yasya priyā hīdṛśī //
analyzed: niḥśvāsa adhara gandha śītala mukhī vācā mṛdu ullāsinī sa ślāghyaḥ puruṣaḥ sa jīvati varaḥ yasya priyā hi īdṛśī

original: MSS_8139-1 eṣā kā prastutāṅgī pracalitanayanā haṃsalīlā vrajantī dvau hastau kuṅkumārdrau kanakaviracitā - . - - . - - /
analyzed: eṣā kā prastuta aṅgī pracalita nayanā haṃsa līlā vrajantī dvau hastau kuṅkuma ārdrau kanaka viracitā

original: MSS_8139-2 - ūṃgāṃgegatā sā bahukusumayutā baddhavīṇā hasantī tāmbūlaṃ vāmahaste madanavaśagatā gūhya śālāṃ praviṣṭā //
analyzed: sā bahu kusuma yutā baddha vīṇā hasantī tāmbūlam vāma haste madana vaśa gatā gūhya śālām praviṣṭā

original: MSS_8140-1 eṣā kā bhuktamuktā pracalitanayanā svedalagnāṅgavastrā pratyūṣe yāti bālā mṛga iva cakitā sarvataḥ śaṅkayantī /
analyzed: eṣā kā bhukta muktā pracalita nayanā sveda lagna aṅga vastrā pratyūṣe yāti bālā mṛgaḥ iva cakitā sarvatas śaṅkayantī

original: MSS_8140-2 kenedaṃ vaktrapadmaṃ sphuradadhararasaṃ ṣaṭpadenaiva pītaṃ svargaḥ kenādya bhukto haranayanahato manmathaḥ kasya tuṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: kena idam vaktra padmam sphurat adhara rasam ṣaṭpadena eva pītam svargaḥ kena adya bhuktaḥ hara nayana hataḥ manmathaḥ kasya tuṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_8141-1 eṣā kā ratihāvabhāvavilasaccandrānanaṃ bibhratī gātraṃ campakadāmagaurasadṛśaṃ pīnastanālambitā /
analyzed: eṣā kā rati hāva bhāva vilasat candra ānanam bibhratī gātram campaka dāma gaura sadṛśam pīna stana ālambitā

original: MSS_8141-2 padbhyāṃ saṃcarati pragalbhahariṇī saṃlīlayā svecchayā kiṃ caiṣā gaganāṅganā bhuvitale saṃpāditā brahmaṇā //
analyzed: padbhyām saṃcarati pragalbha hariṇī saṃlīlayā sva icchayā kim ca eṣā gagana aṅganā bhuvi tale saṃpāditā brahmaṇā

original: MSS_8142-1 eṣā kā stanapīnabhārakaṭhinā madhye daridrāvatī vibhrāntā hariṇī vilolanayanā saṃtrastayūthodgatā /
analyzed: eṣā kā stana pīna bhāra kaṭhinā madhye daridrāvatī vibhrāntā hariṇī vilola nayanā saṃtrasta yūtha udgatā

original: MSS_8142-2 aṃtaḥsvedagajendragaṇḍagalitā saṃlīlayā gacchati dṛṣṭvā rūpamidaṃ priyāṅgagahanaṃ vṛddho'pi kāmāyate //
analyzed: antar sveda gajendra gaṇḍa galitā saṃlīlayā gacchati dṛṣṭvā rūpam idam priya aṅga gahanam vṛddhaḥ api kāmāyate

original: MSS_8143-1 eṣā kusumaniṣaṇṇā tṛṣitāpi satī bhavantamanuraktā /
analyzed: eṣā kusuma niṣaṇṇā tṛṣitā api satī bhavantam anuraktā

original: MSS_8143-2 pratipālayati madhukarī na khalu madhu vinā tvayā pibati //
analyzed: pratipālayati madhukarī na khalu madhu vinā tvayā pibati

original: MSS_8144-1 eṣāgataiva nibirīsanitambabimba- bhāreṇa pakṣmaladṛśaḥ kriyate tu vighnaḥ /
analyzed: eṣā āgatā eva bhāreṇa pakṣmala dṛśaḥ kriyate tu vighnaḥ

original: MSS_8144-2 yāntyā itīva dayitāntikameṇadṛṣṭer agre jagāma gadituṃ laghucittavṛttiḥ //
analyzed: yāntyāḥ iti iva dayitā antikam eṇa dṛṣṭeḥ agre jagāma gaditum laghu cittavṛttiḥ

original: MSS_8145-1 eṣā jigīṣati pṛthustabakā latā tvāṃ paryāptapīnanibiḍastanabhārakhinnām /
analyzed: eṣā jigīṣati pṛthu stabakā latā tvām paryāpta pīna nibiḍa stana bhāra khinnām

original: MSS_8145-2 asyāḥ priye vicinumaḥ stabakāṃs tathānyāḥ kartuṃ yathā na hi kadāpi latāḥ smareyuḥ //
analyzed: asyāḥ priye vicinumaḥ stabakān tathā anyāḥ kartum yathā na hi kadāpi latāḥ smareyuḥ

original: MSS_8146-1 eṣā te hara kā sugātri katamā mūrdhni sthitā kiṃ jaṭā haṃsaḥ kiṃ bhajate jaṭāṃ nahi śaśī candro jalaṃ sevate /
analyzed: eṣā te hara kā sugātri katamā mūrdhni sthitā kim jaṭā haṃsaḥ kim bhajate jaṭām nahi śaśī candraḥ jalam sevate

original: MSS_8146-2 mugdhe bhūtiriyaṃ kuto'tra salilaṃ bhūtis taraṅgāyate itthaṃ yo vinigūhate tripathagāṃ pāyāt sa vaḥ śaṃkaraḥ //
analyzed: mugdhe bhūtiḥ iyam kutas utra salilam bhūtiḥ taraṅgāyate ittham yaḥ vinigūhate tripathagām pāyāt sa vaḥ śaṃkaraḥ

original: MSS_8147-1 eṣā doṣā yathārthā priyatama bhavato hanta jātā viyoge strīhatyāpātakīti prathitimupagate lāñchanīti trilokyām /
analyzed: eṣā doṣā yathārthā priyatama bhavataḥ hanta jātā viyoge strī hatyā pātakī iti prathitim upagate lāñchanī iti trilokyām

original: MSS_8147-2 naivaṃ bhūyo'parādhaṃ bata dayita kadāpyācariṣyāmi satyaṃ tvattyaktāṃ māṃ sutigmairmanasijaśamanaḥ sāyakairhantumutkaḥ //
analyzed: na evam bhūya uparādham bata dayita kadāpi ācariṣyāmi satyam tvad tyaktām mām su tigmaiḥ manasija śamanaḥ sāyakaiḥ hantum utkaḥ

original: MSS_8148-1 eṣā dharmapatākinī taṭasudhāsevāvasannākinī śuṣyatpātakinī bhagīrathatapaḥsāphalyahevākinī /
analyzed: eṣā dharma patākinī taṭa sudhā sevā avasannākinī śuṣyat pātakinī bhagīratha tapaḥ sāphalya hevākinī

original: MSS_8148-2 premārūḍhapinākinī girisutāsyākekarālokinī pāpāḍambaraḍākinī tribhuvanānandāya mandākinī //
analyzed: prema ārūḍha pinākinī girisutā āsyā kekara ālokinī pāpa āḍambara ḍākinī tribhuvana ānandāya mandākinī

original: MSS_8149-1 eṣā puṣkariṇī marāla malinaiś channā kuvīthījalair yasyāmajñatayā vidherakṛpayā ced vastumākāṅkṣase /
analyzed: eṣā puṣkariṇī marāla malinaiḥ channā ku vīthī jalaiḥ yasyām ajña tayā vidheḥ akṛpayā ced vastum ākāṅkṣase

original: MSS_8149-2 viśrambho bakamaṇḍaleṣu vinayo bhekeṣu saṃbandhitā rātryandheṣu vidhīyatāṃ kṛpaṇatā koyaṣṭikaśreṇiṣu //
analyzed: viśrambhaḥ baka maṇḍaleṣu vinayaḥ bhekeṣu saṃbandhi tā rātri andheṣu vidhīyatām kṛpaṇa tā koyaṣṭika śreṇiṣu

original: MSS_8150-1 eṣā pravāsaṃ kathamapyatītya yātā punaḥ saṃśayamanyathaiva /
analyzed: eṣā pravāsam katham api atītya yātā punar saṃśayam anyathā eva

original: MSS_8150-2 ko nāma pākābhimukhasya jantor dvārāṇi daivasya pidhātumīṣṭe //
analyzed: kaḥ nāma pāka abhimukhasya jantoḥ dvārāṇi daivasya pidhātum īṣṭe

original: MSS_8151-1 eṣā phullakadambanīpasurabhau kāle ghanodbhāsite kāntasyālayamāgatā samadanā hṛṣṭā jalārdrālakā /
analyzed: eṣā phulla kadamba nīpa surabhau kāle ghana udbhāsite kāntasya ālayam āgatā sa madanā hṛṣṭā jala ārdra alakā

original: MSS_8151-2 vidyudvāridagarjitaiḥ sacakitā tvaddarśanākāṅkṣiṇī pādau nūpuralagnakardamadharau prakṣālayantī sthitā //
analyzed: vidyut vārida garjitaiḥ sa cakitā tvad darśana ākāṅkṣiṇī pādau nūpura lagna kardama dharau prakṣālayantī sthitā

original: MSS_8152-1 eṣā bhaviṣyati vinidrasaroruhākṣī kāmasya kāpi dayitā tanujānujā vā /
analyzed: eṣā bhaviṣyati vinidra saroruha akṣī kāmasya kā api dayitā tanujā anujā vā

original: MSS_8152-2 yaḥ paśyati kṣaṇamimāṃ kathamanyathāsau kāmas tamastakaruṇas taruṇaṃ hinasti //
analyzed: yaḥ paśyati kṣaṇam imām katham anyathā asau kāmaḥ tamaḥ ta karuṇaḥ taruṇam hinasti

original: MSS_8153-1 eṣā mano me prasabhaṃ śarīrāt pituḥ padaṃ madhyamamutpatantī /
analyzed: eṣā manaḥ me prasabham śarīrāt pituḥ padam madhyamam utpatantī

original: MSS_8153-2 surāṅganā karṣati khaṇḍitāgrāt sūtraṃ mṛṇālādiva rājahaṃsī //
analyzed: sura aṅganā karṣati khaṇḍita agrāt sūtram mṛṇālāt iva rājahaṃsī

original: MSS_8154-1 eṣā raṅgapraveśena kalānāṃ caiva śikṣayā /
analyzed: eṣā raṅga praveśena kalānām ca eva śikṣayā

original: MSS_8154-2 svarāntareṇa dakṣā hi vyāhartuṃ tanna mucyatām //
analyzed: svara antareṇa dakṣāḥ hi vyāhartum tat na mucyatām

original: MSS_8155-1 eṣā latā yadi vilāsavatī kathaṃ syād vidyullatā yadi kathaṃ bhavitā dharaṇyām /
analyzed: eṣā latā yadi vilāsavatī katham syāt vidyut latā yadi katham bhavitā dharaṇyām

original: MSS_8155-2 vastuṃ manojanṛpaternagarī garīyo- vakṣojadurgaviṣamā kimakāri dhātrā //
analyzed: vastum manoja nṛpateḥ nagarī garīyaḥ vakṣoja durga viṣamā kim akāri dhātrā

original: MSS_8156-1 eṣā vrajantī lalitaṃ smayantī sakhījanaiḥ sārdhamatipragalbhā /
analyzed: eṣā vrajantī lalitam smayantī sakhī janaiḥ sārdham ati pragalbhā

original: MSS_8156-2 surīva nityaṃ suratāsukhāptā vibhāti bhūmīdharapāṭhakastrī //
analyzed: surī iva nityam surata asukha āptā vibhāti bhūmīdhara pāṭhaka strī

original: MSS_8157-1 eṣā sā vindhyamadhyasthalavipulaśilotsaṅgaraṅgattaraṅgā saṃbhogaśrāntatīrāśrayaśabaravadhūśarma dā narmadā ca /
analyzed: eṣā sā vindhya madhya sthala vipula śilā utsaṅga raṅgat taraṅgā saṃbhoga śrānta tīra āśraya śabara vadhū śarma dā narmadā ca

original: MSS_8157-2 yasyāḥ sāndradrumālīlalitatalamilatsundarīsaṃniruddhaiḥ siddhaiḥ sevyanta ete mṛgamṛditadalatkandalāḥ kūlakacchāḥ //
analyzed: yasyāḥ sāndra druma ālī lalita tala milat sundarī saṃniruddhaiḥ siddhaiḥ sevyante ete mṛga mṛdita dalat kandalāḥ kūla kacchāḥ

original: MSS_8158-1 eṣāsi vayaso darpāt kulaputrānusāriṇī /
analyzed: eṣā asi vayasaḥ darpāt kula putra anusāriṇī

original: MSS_8158-2 keśeṣu kusumāḍhyeṣu sevitavyeṣu karṣitā //
analyzed: keśeṣu kusuma āḍhyeṣu sevitavyeṣu karṣitā

original: MSS_8159-1 eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana /
analyzed: eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana

original: MSS_8159-2 samasthamanurajyante viṣamasthaṃ tyajanti ca //
analyzed: sama stham anurajyante viṣama stham tyajanti ca

original: MSS_8160-1 eṣā hi me raṇagatasya dṛḍhā pratijñā drakṣyanti yanna ripavo jaghanaṃ hayānām /
analyzed: eṣā hi me raṇa gatasya dṛḍhā pratijñā drakṣyanti yat na ripavaḥ jaghanam hayānām

original: MSS_8160-2 yuddheṣu bhāgyacapaleṣu na me pratijñā daivaṃ yadicchati jayaṃ ca parājayaṃ ca //
analyzed: yuddheṣu bhāgya capaleṣu na me pratijñā daivam yat icchati jayam ca parājayam ca

original: MSS_8161-1 eṣu sparśo varastrīṇāṃ svāntahārī munerapi /
analyzed: eṣu sparśaḥ vara strīṇām svānta hārī muneḥ api

original: MSS_8161-2 ato'pramattaḥ seveta viṣayāṃs tu yathocitān //
analyzed: seveta viṣayān tu yathocitān

original: MSS_8162-1 eṣaiva kācana vinidrasaroruhākṣī kāmasya kāpi dayitā tanujānujā vā /
analyzed: eṣā eva kācana vinidra saroruha akṣī kāmasya kā api dayitā tanujā anujā vā

original: MSS_8162-2 yaḥ paśyati kṣaṇamimāṃ kathamanyathāsau kāmas tamastakaruṇaṃ taruṇaṃ nihanti //
analyzed: yaḥ paśyati kṣaṇam imām katham anyathā asau kāmaḥ tamaḥ ta karuṇam taruṇam nihanti

original: MSS_8163-1 eṣaiva mahatī lajjā sadācārasya bhūpateḥ /
analyzed: eṣā eva mahatī lajjā sat ācārasya bhūpateḥ

original: MSS_8163-2 yadakālabhavo mṛtyus tasya saṃspṛśati prajāḥ //
analyzed: yad akāla bhavaḥ mṛtyuḥ tasya saṃspṛśati prajāḥ

original: MSS_8164-1 eṣaiva yoṣitāṃ dhanyā śīlaṃ ca labhate sukham /
analyzed: eṣā eva yoṣitām dhanyā śīlam ca labhate sukham

original: MSS_8164-2 divā pativratā bhūyo naktaṃ ca kulaṭā yataḥ //
analyzed: divā pativratā bhūyas naktam ca kulaṭā yatas

original: MSS_8165-1 eṣo'gnihotrīti bibharti gāstā vikrīya dugdhaṃ salilaṃ juhoti /
analyzed: eṣā ugnihotrī iti bibharti gāḥ tāḥ vikrīya dugdham salilam juhoti

original: MSS_8165-2 khyāto'sti lokeṣvṛtukālagāmī rajasvalāṃ yāti divāpi veśyām //
analyzed: khyātaḥ asti lokeṣu ṛtu kāla gāmī rajasvalām yāti divā api veśyām

original: MSS_8166-1 eṣojjaṭasya bhavato gṛhiṇī tvaparṇā sthāṇuḥ svayaṃ tava ca sūnurasau viśākhaḥ /
analyzed: eṣā ujjaṭasya bhavataḥ gṛhiṇī tu aparṇā sthāṇuḥ svayam tava ca sūnuḥ asau viśākhaḥ

original: MSS_8166-2 tvattaḥ phalaṃ ka iha vāñchati vāmadeva janmakṣayaḥ paramasau tava darśanena //
analyzed: tvattaḥ phalam kaḥ iha vāñchati vāmadeva janma kṣayaḥ param asau tava darśanena

original: MSS_8167-1 eṣottuṅgataraṅgalaṅghitataṭotsaṅgā pataṅgātmajā pūrṇeyaṃ tarirambubhirna hi hareḥ śaṅkā kalaṅkādapi /
analyzed: eṣā uttuṅga taraṅga laṅghita taṭa utsaṅgā pataṅga ātmajā pūrṇā iyam tariḥ ambubhiḥ na hi hareḥ śaṅkā kalaṅkāt api

original: MSS_8167-2 kāṭhinyaṃ bhaja nādya sundari vayaṃ rādhe prasādena te jīvāmaḥ sphuṭamātarīkuru giridroṇīvinodotsavam //
analyzed: kāṭhinyam bhaja na adya sundari vayam rādhe prasādena te jīvāmaḥ sphuṭa mātarīkuru giri droṇī vinoda utsavam

original: MSS_8168-1 eṣo'mbudaniḥsvanatulyaravaḥ kṣībaḥ skhalamānavilambagatiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa umbuda niḥsvana tulya ravaḥ kṣībaḥ skhalamāna vilamba gatiḥ

original: MSS_8168-2 śrutvā ghanagarjitamadritaṭe vṛkṣān prati moṭayati dviradaḥ //
analyzed: śrutvā ghana garjitam adri taṭe vṛkṣān prati moṭayati dviradaḥ

original: MSS_8169-1 eṣo'hamadritanayāmukhapadmajanmā prāptaḥ surāsuramanorathadūravartī /
analyzed: eṣaḥ aham adri tanayā mukha padma janmā prāptaḥ sura asura manoratha dūra vartī

original: MSS_8169-2 svapne'niruddhaghaṭanādhigatābhirūpa- lakṣmīphalāmasurarājasutāṃ vidhāya //
analyzed: lakṣmī phalām asurarāja sutām vidhāya

original: MSS_8170-1 eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ /
analyzed: eṣṭavyāḥ bahavaḥ putrāḥ guṇavantaḥ bahu śrutāḥ

original: MSS_8170-2 teṣāṃ vai samavetānām api kaścid gayāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: teṣām vai samavetānām api kaścid gayām vrajet

original: MSS_8171-1 eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko'pi gayāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: eṣṭavyāḥ bahavaḥ putrāḥ yadi ekaḥ api gayām vrajet

original: MSS_8171-2 yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet //
analyzed: yajeta vā aśvamedhena nīlam vā vṛṣam utsṛjet

original: MSS_8172-1 eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko'pi gayāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: eṣṭavyāḥ bahavaḥ putrāḥ yadi ekaḥ api gayām vrajet

original: MSS_8172-2 yatrāsau prathito lokeṣv akṣayyakaraṇo vaṭaḥ //
analyzed: yatra asau prathitaḥ lokeṣu akṣayya karaṇaḥ vaṭaḥ

original: MSS_8173-1 eṣyati mā punarayamiti gamane yadamaṅgalaṃ mayākāri /
analyzed: eṣyati mā punar ayam iti gamane yat amaṅgalam mayā akāri

original: MSS_8173-2 adhunā tadeva kāraṇam avasthitau dagdhagehapateḥ //
analyzed: adhunā tat eva kāraṇam avasthitau dagdha geha pateḥ

original: MSS_8174-1 eṣyanti yāvad gaṇanād digantān nṛpāḥ smarārtāḥ śaraṇe praveṣṭum /
analyzed: eṣyanti yāvat gaṇanāt diś antān nṛpāḥ smara ārtāḥ śaraṇe praveṣṭum

original: MSS_8174-2 ime padābje vidhināpi sṛṣṭās tāvatya ekāṅgulayo'tra lekhāḥ //
analyzed: ime pada abje vidhinā api sṛṣṭāḥ tāvatyaḥ eka aṅgulayaḥ atra lekhāḥ

original: MSS_8175-1 eṣyantyavaśyamadhunā hṛdayādhināthā mugdhā mudhā kuruta mā vividhaṃ vilāpam /
analyzed: eṣyanti avaśyam adhunā hṛdaya adhināthāḥ mugdhāḥ mudhā kuruta mā vividham vilāpam

original: MSS_8175-2 itthaṃ śaśaṃsuriva garjitakaitavena pāthodharāḥ pathikapaṅkajalocanābhyaḥ //
analyzed: ittham śaśaṃsuḥ iva garjita kaitavena pāthodharāḥ pathika paṅkaja locanābhyaḥ

original: MSS_8176-1 ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha vada maunaṃ samācara /
analyzed: ehi gaccha pata uttiṣṭha vada maunam samācara

original: MSS_8176-2 iti vitrastasāraṅganetrayā ko na vañcitaḥ //
analyzed: iti vitrasta sāraṅga netrayā kaḥ na vañcitaḥ

original: MSS_8177-1 ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha vada maunaṃ samācara /
analyzed: ehi gaccha pata uttiṣṭha vada maunam samācara

original: MSS_8177-2 evamāśāgrahagrastaiḥ krīḍanti dhanino'rthibhiḥ //
analyzed: evam āśā graha grastaiḥ krīḍanti dhaninā ūrthibhiḥ

original: MSS_8178-1 ehi tatra cinuvaḥ sukausumaṃ kau sumañjusumanastaruśriyām /
analyzed: ehi tatra cinuvaḥ su kausumam kau su mañju sumanaḥ taru śriyām

original: MSS_8178-2 ekikāmiti tatāna māninīm āninīya kapaṭād rahaḥ kṣaṇam //
analyzed: ekikām iti tatāna māninīm āninīya kapaṭāt rahaḥ kṣaṇam

original: MSS_8179-1 ehi viśvātmane vatse bhikṣā tvaṃ parikalpitā /
analyzed: ehi viśvātmane vatse bhikṣā tvam parikalpitā

original: MSS_8179-2 arthino munayaḥ prāptaṃ gṛhamedhiphalaṃ mayā //
analyzed: arthinaḥ munayaḥ prāptam gṛhamedhi phalam mayā

original: MSS_8180-1 ehi he ramaṇi paśya kautukaṃ dhūlidhūsaratanuṃ digambaram /
analyzed: ehi he ramaṇi paśya kautukam dhūli dhūsara tanum digambaram

original: MSS_8180-2 sāpi tadvadanapaṅkajaṃ papau bhrātaruktamapi kiṃ na bughyate //
analyzed: sā api tad vadana paṅkajam papau bhrātar uktam api kim na bughyate

original: MSS_8181-1 ehyāgaccha samāviśāsanamidaṃ kasmāc cirād dṛśyase kā vārtteti sudurbalo'si kuśalaṃ prīto'smi te darśanāt /
analyzed: ehi āgaccha samāviśa āsanam idam kasmāt cirāt dṛśyase kā vārttā iti su durbalaḥ asi kuśalam prītaḥ smi te darśanāt

original: MSS_8181-2 evaṃ ye samupāgatān praṇayinaḥ pratyālapantyādarāt teṣāṃ yuktamaśaṅkitena manasā harmyāṇi gantuṃ sadā //
analyzed: evam ye samupāgatān praṇayinaḥ pratyālapanti ādarāt teṣām yuktam aśaṅkitena manasā harmyāṇi gantum sadā

original: MSS_8182-1 ehyāliṅga tvarayati mano durbalā vāsaraśrīr āśliṣṭāsi kṣapaya rajanīmekikā cakravāki /
analyzed: ehi āliṅga tvarayati manaḥ durbalā vāsara śrīḥ āśliṣṭā asi kṣapaya rajanīm ekikā cakravāki

original: MSS_8182-2 nānyāsakto na khalu kupito nānurāgacyuto vā daivādhīnaḥ sapadi bhavatīmasvatantras tyajāmi //
analyzed: na anya āsaktaḥ na khalu kupitaḥ na anurāga cyutaḥ vā daiva adhīnaḥ sapadi bhavatīm asvatantraḥ tyajāmi

original: MSS_8183-1 ehyehi kva gatāsi maithili mṛgaḥ prāpto mayā kāñcanīm etasya tvacamuccarāmi kucayorvinyasya varṇāṃśukam /
analyzed: ehi ehi kva gatā asi maithili mṛgaḥ prāptaḥ mayā kāñcanīm etasya tvacam uccarāmi kucayoḥ vinyasya varṇa aṃśukam

original: MSS_8183-2 matsaubhāgyabubhutsayāpi vipineṣvekākinī mā sma bhūr vidviṣṭā mayi saṃcaranti sarale māyāvino rākṣasāḥ //
analyzed: mad saubhāgya bubhutsayā api vipineṣu ekākinī mā sma bhūḥ vidviṣṭāḥ mayi saṃcaranti sarale māyāvinaḥ rākṣasāḥ

original: MSS_8184-1 ehyehi vatsa raghunandana rāmabhadra cumbāmi mūrdhani cirāya pariṣvaje tvām /
analyzed: ehi ehi vatsa raghunandana rāma bhadra cumbāmi mūrdhani cirāya pariṣvaje tvām

original: MSS_8184-2 āropya vā hṛdi divāniśamudvahāmi vande'thavā caraṇapuṣkarakadvayaṃ te //
analyzed: āropya vā hṛdi divāniśam udvahāmi vandethavā caraṇa puṣkaraka dvayam te

original: MSS_8185-1 ehyehīti śikhaṇḍināṃ paṭutaraṃ kekābhirākranditaḥ proḍḍīyeva balākayā sarabhasaṃ sotkaṇṭhamāliṅgitaḥ /
analyzed: ehi ehi iti śikhaṇḍinām paṭutaram kekābhiḥ ākranditaḥ proḍḍīya iva balākayā sarabhasam sa utkaṇṭham āliṅgitaḥ

original: MSS_8185-2 haṃsairujjhitapaṅkajairatitarāṃ sodvegamudvīkṣitaḥ kurvannañjanamecakā iva diśo meghaḥ samuttiṣṭhati //
analyzed: haṃsaiḥ ujjhita paṅkajaiḥ atitarām sa udvegam udvīkṣitaḥ kurvan añjana mecakāḥ iva diśaḥ meghaḥ samuttiṣṭhati

original: MSS_8186-1 aikaguṇyamanīhāyām abhāvaḥ karmaṇāṃ phalam /
analyzed: aikaguṇyam anīhāyām abhāvaḥ karmaṇām phalam

original: MSS_8186-2 atha dvaiguṇyamīhāyāṃ phalaṃ bhavati vā na vā //
analyzed: atha dvaiguṇyam īhāyām phalam bhavati vā na vā

original: MSS_8187-1 aikamatyamupāgamya śāstradṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: aikamatyam upāgamya śāstra dṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā

original: MSS_8187-2 mantriṇo yatra niratās tamāhurmantramuttamam //
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ yatra niratāḥ tam āhuḥ mantram uttamam

original: MSS_8188-1 bahvyo'pi matayo gatvā mantriṇāmarthanirṇaye /
analyzed: bahvyaḥ api matayaḥ gatvā mantriṇām artha nirṇaye

original: MSS_8188-2 punaryatraikatāṃ prāptaḥ sa mantro madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: punar yatra eka tām prāptaḥ sa mantraḥ madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_8189-1 anyo'nyaṃ matimāsthāya yatra saṃpratibhāṣyate /
analyzed: anyonyam matim āsthāya yatra saṃpratibhāṣyate

original: MSS_8189-2 na caikamatye śreyo'sti mantraḥ so'dhama ucyate //
analyzed: na ca ekamatye śreyaḥ asti mantraḥ saḥ dhamaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_8190-1 aiṇaṃ carma palāśaveśma purato dṛṣṭvaiva kṛṣṇājinaṃ bhikṣārthī kṣudhitas tapovanadhiyā kiṃ dhārmika bhrāmyasi /
analyzed: aiṇam carma palāśa veśma puratas dṛṣṭvā eva kṛṣṇājinam bhikṣā arthī kṣudhitaḥ tapovana dhiyā kim dhārmika bhrāmyasi

original: MSS_8190-2 enāṃ bhillapurīmavaihi surabhīśṛṅgeṇa yatra sthitaiḥ pīyante vanavahnidagdhamahiṣīmāṃsopadaṃśaṃ surāḥ //
analyzed: enām bhillapurīm avaihi surabhī śṛṅgeṇa yatra sthitaiḥ pīyante vana vahni dagdha mahiṣī māṃsa upadaṃśam surāḥ

original: MSS_8191-1 aindavādarciṣaḥ kāmī śiśiraṃ havyavāhanam /
analyzed: aindavāt arciṣaḥ kāmī śiśiram havyavāhanam

original: MSS_8191-2 abalāvirahakleśavihvalo gaṇayatyayam //
analyzed: abalā viraha kleśa vihvalaḥ gaṇayati ayam

original: MSS_8192-1 aindavī vahati nāḍikā yadā svecchayā praviśati prabhañjanaḥ /
analyzed: aindavī vahati nāḍikā yadā sva icchayā praviśati prabhañjanaḥ

original: MSS_8192-2 potakī vrajati dakṣiṇā yadā syāt tadā sakalamīpsitaṃ phalam //
analyzed: potakī vrajati dakṣiṇā yadā syāt tadā sakalam īpsitam phalam

original: MSS_8193-1 aindraṃ dhanuḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa śarad dadhānārdranakhakṣatābham /
analyzed: aindram dhanuḥ pāṇḍu payodhareṇa śarad dadhānā ārdra nakha kṣata ābham

original: MSS_8193-2 prasādayantī sakalaṅkaminduṃ tāpaṃ raverapyadhikaṃ cakāra //
analyzed: prasādayantī sa kalaṅkam indum tāpam raveḥ api adhikam cakāra

original: MSS_8194-1 aindriḥ kila nakhais tasyā vidadāra stanau dvijaḥ /
analyzed: aindriḥ kila nakhaiḥ tasyāḥ vidadāra stanau dvijaḥ

original: MSS_8194-2 priyopabhogacihneṣu paurobhāgyamivācaran //
analyzed: priya upabhoga cihneṣu paurobhāgyam iva ācaran

original: MSS_8195-1 aindryāṃ digavalokita- sūryābhimukho gṛhe gṛhiṇaḥ /
analyzed: aindryām diś avalokita sūrya abhimukhaḥ gṛhe gṛhiṇaḥ

original: MSS_8195-2 rājabhayaṃ caurabhayaṃ vadhakalahaḥ paśubhayaṃ ca syāt //
analyzed: rāja bhayam caura bhayam vadha kalahaḥ paśu bhayam ca syāt

original: MSS_8196-1 airāvaṇanti kariṇaḥ phaṇino'pyaśeṣāḥ śeṣanti hanta vihagā api haṃsitāraḥ /
analyzed: kariṇaḥ phaṇinā upi aśeṣāḥ śeṣanti hanta vihagāḥ api haṃsitāraḥ

original: MSS_8196-2 nīlotpalāni kumudanti ca sarvaśailāḥ kailāsituṃ vyavasitā bhavato yaśobhiḥ //
analyzed: nīlotpalāni ca sarva śailāḥ kailāsitum vyavasitāḥ bhavataḥ yaśobhiḥ

original: MSS_8197-1 airāvaṇānanamadāmbukaṇāvapāta- saṃsaktatāmarasareṇupiśaṅgitāṅgaḥ /
analyzed: airāvaṇa ānana mada ambu kaṇā avapāta saṃsakta tāmarasa reṇu piśaṅgita aṅgaḥ

original: MSS_8197-2 caṇḍānilāhatatuṣāraviśīrṇapakṣaḥ kṣīṇaḥ kṣitau madhukaro vivaśo'tra śete //
analyzed: caṇḍa anila āhata tuṣāra viśīrṇa pakṣaḥ kṣīṇaḥ kṣitau madhukaraḥ vivaśaḥ utra śete

original: MSS_8198-1 airāvaṇe suravadhūparigīyamāna- yuṣmadyaśaḥśravaṇaniścalakarṇatāle /
analyzed: airāvaṇe sura vadhū parigīyamāna yuṣmad yaśaḥ śravaṇa niścala karṇa tāle

original: MSS_8198-2 nirvighnamāpibati bhṛṅgakulaṃ madāmbhaḥ kalyāṇamāvahati kasya na ceṣṭitaṃ te //
analyzed: nirvighnam āpibati bhṛṅga kulam mada ambhaḥ kalyāṇam āvahati kasya na ceṣṭitam te

original: MSS_8199-1 aiśānyāṃ patanaṃ duṣṭaṃ vidiśo'nyāśca śobhanāḥ /
analyzed: aiśānyām patanam duṣṭam vidiśā ūnyāḥ ca śobhanāḥ

original: MSS_8199-2 harṣapuṣṭikarāścaiva siddhidāḥ śastrakarmaṇi //
analyzed: harṣa puṣṭi karāḥ ca eva siddhi dāḥ śastrakarmaṇi

original: MSS_8200-1 aiśānyāṃ saṃprāptir ghṛtapūrṇānāṃ bhavedanaḍuhaśca /
analyzed: aiśānyām saṃprāptiḥ ghṛta pūrṇānām bhavet anaḍuhaḥ ca

original: MSS_8200-2 evaṃ phalaṃ gṛhapater gṛhapṛṣṭhasamāśrite bhavati //
analyzed: evam phalam gṛhapateḥ gṛha pṛṣṭha samāśrite bhavati

original: MSS_8201-1 aiśvaryaṃ nahuṣasya śaṃbhuviṣayaśraddhā daśāsyasya sā śauryaṃ śrīraghunāyakasya sahajaṃ gāmbhīryamambhonidheḥ /
analyzed: aiśvaryam nahuṣasya śaṃbhu viṣaya śraddhā daśa āsyasya sā śauryam śrīḥ aghunāyakasya sahajam gāmbhīryam ambhonidheḥ

original: MSS_8201-2 dātṛtvaṃ balikarṇayoriha jagatyekatra cet syāt tadā śrīvīrakṣitipālamaulinṛpateḥ sāmyaṃ kathaṃcid bhavet //
analyzed: dātṛ tvam bali karṇayoḥ iha jagati ekatra ced syāt tadā śrī vīra kṣitipāla mauli nṛpateḥ sāmyam kathaṃcid bhavet

original: MSS_8202-1 aiśvaryatimiraṃ cakṣuḥ paśyaccāpi na paśyati /
analyzed: aiśvarya timiram cakṣuḥ paśyat ca api na paśyati

original: MSS_8202-2 paścād vimalatāṃ yāti dāridryagulikāñjanaiḥ //
analyzed: paścāt vimala tām yāti dāridrya gulikā añjanaiḥ

original: MSS_8203-1 aiśvaryadhanaratnānāṃ pratyamitre'pi tiṣṭhatām /
analyzed: aiśvarya dhana ratnānām pratyamitre pi tiṣṭhatām

original: MSS_8203-2 dṛṣṭā hi punarāvṛttir jīvatāmiti naḥ śrutam //
analyzed: dṛṣṭā hi punarāvṛttiḥ jīvatām iti naḥ śrutam

original: MSS_8204-1 aiśvaryamattaḥ pāpiṣṭho madhupānamadādapi /
analyzed: aiśvarya mattaḥ pāpiṣṭhaḥ madhu pāna madāt api

original: MSS_8204-2 aiśvaryamadamattānāṃ gatirūrdhvā na vidyate //
analyzed: aiśvarya mada mattānām gatiḥ ūrdhvā na vidyate

original: MSS_8205-1 aiśvaryamadapāpiṣṭhā madāḥ pānamadādayaḥ /
analyzed: aiśvarya mada pāpiṣṭhāḥ madāḥ pāna mada ādayaḥ

original: MSS_8205-2 eśvaryamadamatto hi nāpatitvā vibudhyate //
analyzed: īśvarya mada mattaḥ hi vibudhyate

original: MSS_8206-1 aiśvaryamadamattāṃśca mattān madyamadena ca /
analyzed: aiśvarya mada mattān ca mattān madya madena ca

original: MSS_8206-2 apramattāḥ śaṭhāḥ śūrā vikrāntāḥ paryupāsate //
analyzed: apramattāḥ śaṭhāḥ śūrāḥ vikrāntāḥ paryupāsate

original: MSS_8207-1 aiśvaryamadamattānāṃ kṣudhitānāṃ ca kāminām /
analyzed: aiśvarya mada mattānām kṣudhitānām ca kāminām

original: MSS_8207-2 ahaṃkāravimūḍhānāṃ viveko naiva jāyate //
analyzed: ahaṃkāra vimūḍhānām vivekaḥ nā eva jāyate

original: MSS_8208-1 aiśvaryamadhruvaṃ prāpya dhruvadharme matiṃ kuru /
analyzed: aiśvaryam adhruvam prāpya dhruva dharme matim kuru

original: MSS_8208-2 kṣaṇādeva vināśinyaḥ sampado'pyātmanā saha //
analyzed: kṣaṇāt eva vināśinyaḥ sampadā upya ātmanā saha

original: MSS_8209-1 aiśvaryamalpametya prāyeṇa hi durjano bhavati mānī /
analyzed: aiśvaryam alpam etya prāyeṇa hi durjanaḥ bhavati mānī

original: MSS_8209-2 sumahatprāpyaiśvaryaṃ praśamaṃ pratipadyate sujanaḥ //
analyzed: su mahat prāpya aiśvaryam praśamam pratipadyate su janaḥ

original: MSS_8209A-1 aiśvaryamavyāhatamāvahantu herambapādāmbujapāṃsavo naḥ /
analyzed: aiśvaryam avyāhatam āvahantu heramba pāda ambuja pāṃsavaḥ naḥ

original: MSS_8209A-2 ye nirvahanti śrutisundarīṇāṃ sīmantasindūraparāgalakṣmīm //
analyzed: ye nirvahanti śruti sundarīṇām sīmanta sindūra parāga lakṣmīm

original: MSS_8210-1 aiśvaryamīrṣyā nairghṛṇyaṃ kṣībatvaṃ nirvivekatā /
analyzed: aiśvaryam īrṣyā nairghṛṇyam kṣība tvam nirviveka tā

original: MSS_8210-2 ekaikaṃ kiṃ na yat kuryāt pañcāṅgitve tu kā kathā //
analyzed: ekaikam kim na yat kuryāt pañcāṅgi tve tu kā kathā

original: MSS_8211-1 aiśvaryavanto'pi hi nirdhanās te vyarthaśramā jīvitamātrasārāḥ /
analyzed: aiśvaryavantaḥ api hi nirdhanāḥ te vyartha śramāḥ jīvita mātra sārāḥ

original: MSS_8211-2 kṛtā na lobhopahṛtātmabhiryaiḥ suhṛtsvayaṃgrāhavibhūṣaṇā śrīḥ //
analyzed: kṛtā na lobha upahṛta ātmabhiḥ yaiḥ suhṛd svayaṃgrāha vibhūṣaṇā śrīḥ

original: MSS_8212-1 aiśvaryasya parā kāṣṭhā yatra nityaṃ vibhāvyate /
analyzed: aiśvaryasya parā kāṣṭhā yatra nityam vibhāvyate

original: MSS_8212-2 dhanadaḥ sa na keṣāṃ syāt spṛhaṇīyaguṇodayaḥ //
analyzed: dhanadaḥ sa na keṣām syāt spṛhaṇīya guṇa udayaḥ

original: MSS_8213-1 aiśvaryasya vibhūṣaṇaṃ sujanatā śauryasya vāksaṃyamo jñānasyopaśamaḥ śamasya vinayo vittasya pātre vyayaḥ /
analyzed: aiśvaryasya vibhūṣaṇam su jana tā śauryasya vāc saṃyamaḥ jñānasya upaśamaḥ śamasya vinayaḥ vittasya pātre vyayaḥ

original: MSS_8213-2 akrodhas tapasaḥ kṣamā prabhaviturdharmasya nirvyājatā sarveṣāmapi sarvakāraṇamidaṃ śīlaṃ paraṃ bhūṣaṇam //
analyzed: akrodhaḥ tapasaḥ kṣamā prabhavituḥ dharmasya nirvyāja tā sarveṣām api sarva kāraṇam idam śīlam param bhūṣaṇam

original: MSS_8214-1 aiśvaryāt saha saṃbandhaṃ na kuryāc ca kadācana /
analyzed: aiśvaryāt saha saṃbandham na kuryāt ca kadācana

original: MSS_8214-2 gate ca gauravaṃ nāsti āgate ca dhanakṣayaḥ //
analyzed: gate ca gauravam na asti āgate ca dhana kṣayaḥ

original: MSS_8215-1 aiśvaryādanapetamīśvaramayaṃ loko'rthataḥ sevate taṃ gacchantyanu ye vipattiṣu punas te tatpratiṣṭhāśayā /
analyzed: aiśvaryāt an apetam īśvara mayam sevate tam gacchanti anu ye vipattiṣu punar te tad pratiṣṭhā āśayā

original: MSS_8215-2 bharturye pralaye'pi pūrvasukṛtāsaṅgena niḥsaṅgayā bhaktyā kāryadhuraṃ vahanti kṛtinas te durlabhāstvādṛśāḥ //
analyzed: bhartuḥ ye pralaye pi pūrva sukṛta āsaṅgena niḥsaṅgayā bhaktyā kārya dhuram vahanti kṛtinaḥ te durlabhāḥ tvādṛśāḥ

original: MSS_8216-1 aiśvarye'pi kṣamā yasya dāridrye'pi hitaiṣitā /
analyzed: aiśvarye api kṣamā yasya dāridrye api hita eṣitā

original: MSS_8216-2 āpattāvapi dhīratvaṃ dadhato martyatā katham //
analyzed: āpattau api dhīra tvam dadhataḥ martya tā katham

original: MSS_8217-1 aiśvarye vā suvistīrṇe vyasane vā sudāruṇe /
analyzed: aiśvarye vā su vistīrṇe vyasane vā su dāruṇe

original: MSS_8217-2 rajjveva puruṣaṃ baddhvā kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati //
analyzed: rajjvā iva puruṣam baddhvā kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati

original: MSS_8218-1 aihalaukikapāratryaṃ karma puṃbhirniṣevyate /
analyzed: aihalaukika pāratryam karma puṃbhiḥ niṣevyate

original: MSS_8218-2 karmāṇyapi tu kalyāṇi labhate kāmamāsthitaḥ //
analyzed: karmāṇi api tu kalyāṇi labhate kāmam āsthitaḥ

original: MSS_8219-1 aihalaukikamīhante māṃsaśoṇitavardhanam /
analyzed: aihalaukikam īhante māṃsa śoṇita vardhanam

original: MSS_8219-2 pāralaukikakāryeṣu prasuptābhṛśanāstikāḥ //
analyzed: pāralaukika kāryeṣu prasuptāḥ a bhṛśa nāstikāḥ

original: MSS_8220-1 aihikāmuṣmikān kāmāṃl lobhamohātmakāṃśca yān /
analyzed: aihika āmuṣmikān kāmān lobha moha ātmakān ca yān

original: MSS_8220-2 nirudhyās te sadā yogī prāptiḥ syāt sārvakāmikī //
analyzed: nirudhyāḥ te sadā yogī prāptiḥ syāt sārvakāmikī

original: MSS_8221-1 oṃkāraḥ puruṣaḥ pūrvaḥ vyāhṛtiḥ prakṛtiḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: oṃkāraḥ puruṣaḥ pūrvaḥ vyāhṛtiḥ prakṛtiḥ striyaḥ

original: MSS_8221-2 ubhayoḥ karasaṃyoge vastreṇācchādayen naraḥ //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ kara saṃyoge vastreṇa ācchādayet naraḥ

original: MSS_8222-1 oṃkāraśabdo viprāṇāṃ yasya rāṣṭre pravartate /
analyzed: oṃkāra śabdaḥ viprāṇām yasya rāṣṭre pravartate

original: MSS_8222-2 sa rājā hi bhaved yogī vyādhibhiśca na pīḍyate //
analyzed: sa rājā hi bhavet yogī vyādhibhiḥ ca na pīḍyate

original: MSS_8223-1 oṃkārāḥ kusumāyudhopaniṣadāṃ mantrānuvādaḥ smara- svādhyāyasya rateḥ punarbhavavidhau gandhābhirāmaśrutiḥ /
analyzed: oṃkārāḥ kusumāyudha upaniṣadām mantra anuvādaḥ smara svādhyāyasya rateḥ punarbhava vidhau gandha abhirāma śrutiḥ

original: MSS_8223-2 cittākarṣaṇasādhyasiddhirasatīnetrasya karṇajvaraḥ pānthānāṃ sahakārakānanasudhāsekaḥ pikānāṃ dhvaniḥ //
analyzed: citta ākarṣaṇa sādhya siddhiḥ asatī netrasya karṇa jvaraḥ pānthānām sahakāra kānana sudhā sekaḥ pikānām dhvaniḥ

original: MSS_8224-1 oṃkāre satpradīpe mṛgaya gṛhapatiṃ sūkṣmamekāntarasthaṃ saṃyamya dvāravāhaṃ pavanamavirataṃ nāyakaṃ cendriyāṇām /
analyzed: oṃkāre sat pradīpe mṛgaya gṛhapatim sūkṣmam eka antara stham saṃyamya dvāravāham pavanam aviratam nāyakam ca indriyāṇām

original: MSS_8224-2 vāgjālaṃ kasya hetorvitarasi hi girāṃ dṛśyate naiva kiṃcid dehasthaṃ paśya nāthaṃ bhramasi kimapare śāstramohāndhakāre //
analyzed: vāc jālam kasya hetoḥ vitarasi hi girām dṛśyate nā eva kiṃcid deha stham paśya nātham bhramasi kim apare śāstra moha andhakāre

original: MSS_8225-1 oṃkāro madanadvijasya gaganakroḍaikadaṃṣṭrāṅkuras tārāmauktikaśuktirandhatamasastamberamasyāṅkuśaḥ /
analyzed: oṃkāraḥ madana dvijasya gagana kroḍa eka daṃṣṭra aṅkuraḥ tārā mauktika śukti randhatamasa stamberamasya aṅkuśaḥ

original: MSS_8225-2 śṛṅgārārgalakuñcikā virahiṇīmānacchidā kartarī saṃdhyāvāravadhūnakhakṣatiriyaṃ cāndrī kalā rājate //
analyzed: śṛṅgāra argala kuñcikā virahiṇī māna chidā kartarī saṃdhyā vāra vadhū nakha kṣatiḥ iyam cāndrī kalā rājate

original: MSS_8226-1 oṃkāro yasya kandaḥ salilamupaniṣan nyāyajālaṃ mṛṇālaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ yasya kāṇḍaṃ prasarati parito yasya yāgaḥ parāgaḥ /
analyzed: oṃkāraḥ yasya kandaḥ salilam upaniṣad nyāya jālam mṛṇālam brahmāṇḍam yasya kāṇḍam prasarati paritas yasya yāgaḥ parāgaḥ

original: MSS_8226-2 bhṛṅgadhvānaḥ purāṇaṃ vijanasuradhunītīravāso'dhivāso yasyānando marandaḥ puraharacaraṇāmbhoruhaṃ tad bhajāmaḥ //
analyzed: bhṛṅga dhvānaḥ purāṇam vijana suradhunī tīra vāsaḥ adhivāsaḥ yasya ānandaḥ marandaḥ purahara caraṇa ambhoruham tat bhajāmaḥ

original: MSS_8227-1 oṃ namaḥ paramārthaikarūpāya paramātmane /
analyzed: om namaḥ paramārtha eka rūpāya paramātmane

original: MSS_8227-2 svecchāvabhāsitāsatyabhedabhinnāya śaṃbhave //
analyzed: sva icchā avabhāsita asatya bheda bhinnāya śaṃbhave

original: MSS_8228-1 oṃ hrauṃ śikhāsthāne śaṃkarāya namaḥ /
analyzed: om   śikhā sthāne śaṃkarāya namaḥ

original: MSS_8228-2 oṃ hrauṃ bāhvoḥ keśavāya namaḥ /
analyzed: om   bāhvoḥ keśavāya namaḥ
