original: MSS_8228-2 oṃ hrauṃ nābhimadhye brahmaṇe namaḥ /
analyzed: om   nābhi madhye brahmaṇe namaḥ

original: MSS_8228-3 oṃ hrauṃ jaṅghayorgaṇapataye namaḥ /
analyzed: om   jaṅghayoḥ gaṇapataye namaḥ

original: MSS_8229-1 oghavātāhṛtaṃ bījaṃ yasya kṣetre prarohati /
analyzed: ogha vāta āhṛtam bījam yasya kṣetre prarohati

original: MSS_8229-2 kṣetrikasyaiva tad bījaṃ na bījī labhate phalam //
analyzed: kṣetrikasya eva tat bījam na bījī labhate phalam

original: MSS_8230-1 ojasāpi khalu nūnamanūnaṃ nāsahāyamupayāti jayaśrīḥ /
analyzed: ojasā api khalu nūnam anūnam na asahāyam upayāti jaya śrīḥ

original: MSS_8230-2 yad vibhuḥ śaśimayūkhasakhaḥ sann ādade vijayi cāpamanaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: yat vibhuḥ śaśi mayūkha sakhaḥ san ādade vijayi cāpam anaṅgaḥ

original: MSS_8231-1 ojobhājāṃ yad raṇe saṃsthitānām ādat tīvraṃ sārdhamaṅgena nūnam /
analyzed: ojaḥ bhājām yat raṇe saṃsthitānām ādat tīvram sārdham aṅgena nūnam

original: MSS_8231-2 jvālāvyājādudvamantī tadantas- tejastāraṃ dīptajihvā vavāśe //
analyzed: jvālā vyājāt udvamantī tad antar tejaḥ tāram dīpta jihvā vavāśe

original: MSS_8232-1 omityetatparaṃ brahma śrutīnāṃ mukhamakṣaram /
analyzed: om iti etat param brahma śrutīnām mukham akṣaram

original: MSS_8232-2 prasīdatu satāṃ svānteṣv ekaṃ tripuruṣīmayam //
analyzed: prasīdatu satām svānteṣu ekam tripuruṣī mayam

original: MSS_8233-1 oṣāmāse matsarotpātavātā- śliṣyaddantakṣmāruhāṃ gharṣaṇotthaiḥ /
analyzed: oṣā māse matsara utpāta vātā śliṣyat danta kṣmāruhām gharṣaṇa utthaiḥ

original: MSS_8233-2 yaugāntairvā vahnibhirvāraṇānām uccairmūrdhavyomni nakṣatramālā //
analyzed: yaugāntaiḥ vā vahnibhiḥ vāraṇānām uccais mūrdha vyomni nakṣatra mālā

original: MSS_8234-1 oṣṭhapallavavidaṃśarucīnāṃ hṛdyatāmupayayau ramaṇānām /
analyzed: oṣṭha pallava vidaṃśa rucīnām hṛdya tām upayayau ramaṇānām

original: MSS_8234-2 phullalocanavinīlasarojair aṅganāsyacaṣakairmadhuvāraḥ //
analyzed: phulla locana vinīla sarojaiḥ aṅganā āsya caṣakaiḥ madhuvāraḥ

original: MSS_8235-1 oṣṭhāgraṃ sphuratīkṣaṇe vicalataḥ kūpodare matsyavad dhammillaḥ kusumāñcito vigalitaḥ prāpnoti bandhaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: oṣṭha agram sphurat īkṣaṇe vicalataḥ kūpa udare matsya vat dhammillaḥ kusuma āñcitaḥ vigalitaḥ prāpnoti bandham punar

original: MSS_8235-2 pracchannau vrajataḥ stanau prakaṭatāṃ śroṇītaṭaṃ dṛśyate nīvī ca skhalati sthitāpi sudṛḍhaṃ kāmeṅgitaṃ yoṣitām //
analyzed: pracchannau vrajataḥ stanau prakaṭatām śroṇī taṭam dṛśyate nīvī ca skhalati sthitā api su dṛḍham kāma iṅgitam yoṣitām

original: MSS_8236-1 saubhāgyarūpaparihāsaguṇānurāga- saṃkīrtanena dayitasya ca labdhasaukhyam /
analyzed: saubhāgya rūpa parihāsa guṇa anurāga saṃkīrtanena dayitasya ca labdha saukhyam

original: MSS_8236-2 saṃbandhimitramukhadarśanadattadūra- toṣaṃ parokṣamapi kāmaguṇeṅgitaṃ syāt //
analyzed: saṃbandhi mitra mukha darśana datta dūra toṣam parokṣam api kāma guṇa iṅgitam syāt

original: MSS_8237-1 oṣṭhe bimbaphalāśayālamalakeṣūtpākajambūdhiyā karṇālaṃkṛtibhāji dāḍimaphalabhrāntyā ca śoṇe maṇau /
analyzed: oṣṭhe bimba phala āśaya alam alakeṣu utpāka jambu dhiyā karṇa alaṃkṛti bhāji dāḍima phala bhrāntyā ca śoṇe maṇau

original: MSS_8237-2 niṣpattyā sakṛdutpalacchadadṛśāmāttaklamānāṃ marau rājan gūrjararājapañjaraśukaiḥ sadyastṛṣā mūrcchitam //
analyzed: niṣpattyā sakṛt utpalacchada dṛśām ātta klamānām marau rājan gūrjara rāja pañjara śukaiḥ sadyas tṛṣā mūrcchitam

original: MSS_8238-1 aucityaṃ stutyānāṃ guṇarāgaś candanādilepānām /
analyzed: aucityam stutyānām guṇa rāgaḥ candana ādi lepānām

original: MSS_8238-2 kanyā śokakarāṇāṃ buddhivihīno'nukampyānām //
analyzed: kanyā śoka karāṇām buddhi vihīnā anukampyānām

original: MSS_8239-1 aucityapracyutācāro yuktyā svārthaṃ na sādhayet /
analyzed: aucitya pracyuta ācāraḥ yuktyā sva artham na sādhayet

original: MSS_8239-2 vyājabālivadhenaiva rāmakīrtiḥ kalaṅkitā //
analyzed: vyāja bāli vadhena eva rāma kīrtiḥ kalaṅkitā

original: MSS_8240-1 aucityamekamekatra guṇānāṃ rāśirekataḥ /
analyzed: aucityam ekam ekatra guṇānām rāśiḥ ekatas

original: MSS_8240-2 viṣāyate guṇagrāma aucityaparivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: viṣāyate guṇa grāmaḥ aucitya parivarjitaḥ

original: MSS_8241-1 aujjhi priyāṅgairghṛṇayaiva rūkṣā na vāridurgāt tu varāṭakasya /
analyzed: priya aṅgaiḥ ghṛṇayā eva rūkṣā na vāri durgāt tu varāṭakasya

original: MSS_8241-2 na kaṇṭakairāvaraṇāc ca kāntir dhūlībhṛtā kāñcanaketakasya //
analyzed: na kaṇṭakaiḥ āvaraṇāt ca kāntiḥ dhūlī bhṛtā kāñcana ketakasya

original: MSS_8242-1 autsukyagarbhā bhramatīva dṛṣṭiḥ paryākulaṃ kvāpi manaḥ prayāti /
analyzed: autsukya garbhā bhramati iva dṛṣṭiḥ paryākulam kvāpi manaḥ prayāti

original: MSS_8242-2 viyujyamānasya guṇānvitena nirantarapremavatā janena //
analyzed: viyujyamānasya guṇa anvitena nirantara premavatā janena

original: MSS_8243-1 autsukyamātramavasādayati pratiṣṭhā kliśnāti labdhaparipālanavṛttireva /
analyzed: autsukya mātram avasādayati pratiṣṭhā kliśnāti labdha paripālana vṛttiḥ eva

original: MSS_8243-2 nātiśramāpanayanāya yathā śramāya rājyaṃ svahastadhṛtadaṇḍamivātapatram //
analyzed: na ati śrama apanayanāya yathā śramāya rājyam sva hasta dhṛta daṇḍam iva ātapatram

original: MSS_8244-1 autsukyahetuṃ vivṛṇoṣi na tvaṃ tattvāvabodhaikaraso na tarkaḥ /
analyzed: autsukya hetum vivṛṇoṣi na tvam tattva avabodha eka rasaḥ na tarkaḥ

original: MSS_8244-2 tathāpi rambhoru karomi lakṣyam ātmānameṣāṃ paridevitānām //
analyzed: tathā api rambhā ūru karomi lakṣyam ātmānam eṣām paridevitānām

original: MSS_8245-1 autsukyāt parimilatāṃ trapayā saṃkocamañcatāṃ ca muhuḥ /
analyzed: autsukyāt parimilatām trapayā saṃkocam añcatām ca muhur

original: MSS_8245-2 navasaṃgamayoryūnor nayanānāmutsavo jayati //
analyzed: nava saṃgamayoḥ yūnoḥ nayanānām utsavaḥ jayati

original: MSS_8246-1 autsukyena kṛtatvarā sahabhuvā vyāvartamānā hriyā tais tairbandhuvadhūjanasya vacanairnītābhimukhyaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: autsukyena kṛta tvarā saha bhuvā vyāvartamānā hriyā taiḥ taiḥ bandhu vadhū janasya vacanaiḥ nīta ābhimukhyam punar

original: MSS_8246-2 dṛṣṭvāgre varamāttasādhvasarasā gaurī nave saṅgame saṃrohatpulakā hareṇa hasatā śliṣṭā śivāyāstu vaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā agre varam ātta sādhvasa rasā gaurī nave saṅgame saṃrohat pulakā hareṇa hasatā śliṣṭā śivāyāḥ tu vaḥ

original: MSS_8247-1 audāryaṃ dākṣiṇyaṃ pāpajugupsā ca nirmalo bodhaḥ /
analyzed: audāryam dākṣiṇyam pāpa jugupsā ca nirmalaḥ bodhaḥ

original: MSS_8247-2 liṅgāni dharmasiddheḥ prāyeṇa janapriyatvaṃ ca //
analyzed: liṅgāni dharma siddheḥ prāyeṇa jana priya tvam ca

original: MSS_8248-1 audāryaṃ bhuvanatraye'pi viditaṃ saṃbhūtirambhonidher vāso nandanakānane parimalo gīrvāṇacetoharaḥ /
analyzed: audāryam bhuvanatraye api viditam saṃbhūtiḥ ambhonidheḥ vāsaḥ nandana kānane parimalaḥ gīrvāṇa cetaḥ haraḥ

original: MSS_8248-2 evaṃ dātṛgurorguṇāḥ surataroḥ sarve'pi lokottarāḥ syādarthipravarārthitārpaṇavidhāveko viveko yadi //
analyzed: evam dātṛ guroḥ guṇāḥ surataroḥ sarve api loka uttarāḥ syāt arthi pravara arthita arpaṇa vidhau ekaḥ vivekaḥ yadi

original: MSS_8249-1 audāryaṃ sadhane nayo guṇijane lajjā kulastrījane satkāvyaṃ vadane mado dviradane puṃskokilaḥ kānane /
analyzed: audāryam sa dhane nayaḥ guṇi jane lajjā kula strī jane satkāvyam vadane madaḥ dviradane puṃskokilaḥ kānane

original: MSS_8249-2 rolambaḥ kamale nakhāṅkaracanā kāntākapolasthale tanvī talpatale bhavānapi vibho bhūmaṇḍale maṇḍanam //
analyzed: rolambaḥ kamale nakha aṅka racanā kāntā kapola sthale tanvī talpa tale bhavān api vibho bhū maṇḍale maṇḍanam

original: MSS_8250-1 audāsīnyaṃ dayālūnām arthināṃ bhāgyahīnatā /
analyzed: audāsīnyam dayālūnām arthinām bhāgya hīna tā

original: MSS_8250-2 nahi svamukhavairūpyaṃ darpaṇasyāparādhataḥ //
analyzed: nahi sva mukha vairūpyam darpaṇasya aparādhataḥ

original: MSS_8251-1 audumbarāṇi puṣpāṇi śvetavarṇaṃ ca vāyasam /
analyzed: audumbarāṇi puṣpāṇi śveta varṇam ca vāyasam

original: MSS_8251-2 matsyapādaṃ jale paśyen na nārīhṛdayasthitam //
analyzed: matsya pādam jale paśyet na nārī hṛdaya sthitam

original: MSS_8252-1 aunnatyaṃ bhavataḥ sumeruśikharocchrāyopamāṃ gāhate vyāptis te girirājamūlamahimanyāyena nirṇīyate /
analyzed: aunnatyam bhavataḥ sumeru śikhara ucchrāya upamām gāhate vyāptiḥ te girirāja mūla mahima nyāyena nirṇīyate

original: MSS_8252-2 ekasyāpi na kiṃtu cātakaśiśoḥ pūrttyai payo vartate vandhyāpīnapayodharopamatayā buddho'si pāthodhara //
analyzed: ekasya api na kiṃtu cātaka śiśoḥ pūrttyai payaḥ vartate vandhyā pīna payodhara upama tayā buddhaḥ asi pāthodhara

original: MSS_8253-1 aurasaṃ maitrasaṃbaddhaṃ tathā vaṃśakramāgatam /
analyzed: aurasam maitra saṃbaddham tathā vaṃśa krama āgatam

original: MSS_8253-2 rakṣitaṃ vyasanebhyaśca mitraṃ jñeyaṃ caturvidham //
analyzed: rakṣitam vyasanebhyaḥ ca mitram jñeyam caturvidham

original: MSS_8254-1 aurasānapi putrān hi tyajantyahitakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: aurasān api putrān hi tyajanti ahita kāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_8254-2 samarthān saṃpragṛhṇanti janānapi narādhipāḥ //
analyzed: samarthān saṃpragṛhṇanti janān api narādhipāḥ

original: MSS_8255-1 aurasīṃ bhaginīṃ vāpi bhāryāṃ vāpyanujasya yaḥ /
analyzed: aurasīm bhaginīm vā api bhāryām vā api anujasya yaḥ

original: MSS_8255-2 pracareta naraḥ kāmāt tasya daṇḍo vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: pracareta naraḥ kāmāt tasya daṇḍaḥ vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_8256-1 aurvā ivātilubdhā bhavanti dhanalavaṇavāribahutṛṣṇāḥ /
analyzed: aurvāḥ iva ati lubdhāḥ bhavanti dhana lavaṇa vāri bahu tṛṣṇāḥ

original: MSS_8256-2 tṛṇalavamiva nijadehaṃ tyajanti leśaṃ na vittasya //
analyzed: tṛṇa lavam iva nija deham tyajanti leśam na vittasya

original: MSS_8257-1 auṣadhaṃ mūḍhavaidyānāṃ tyajantu jvarapīḍitāḥ /
analyzed: auṣadham mūḍha vaidyānām tyajantu jvara pīḍitāḥ

original: MSS_8257-2 parasaṃsargasaṃsaktaṃ kalatramiva sādhavaḥ //
analyzed: para saṃsarga saṃsaktam kalatram iva sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_8258-1 auṣadhānāṃ ca mantrāṇāṃ buddheścaiva mahātmanām /
analyzed: auṣadhānām ca mantrāṇām buddheḥ ca eva mahātmanām

original: MSS_8258-2 asādhyaṃ nāsti loke'tra kiṃcid brahmāṇḍamadhyagam //
analyzed: asādhyam nā asti kiṃcid brahmāṇḍa madhya gam

original: MSS_8259-1 auṣadhāni ca mantrāṇi nakṣatraṃ śakunaṃ grahāḥ /
analyzed: auṣadhāni ca mantrāṇi nakṣatram śakunam grahāḥ

original: MSS_8259-2 bhāgyakāle prasannāḥ syur abhāgye niṣphalāś ca te //
analyzed: bhāgya kāle prasannāḥ syuḥ abhāgye niṣphalāḥ ca te

original: MSS_8260-1 auṣadhānyagado vidyā daivī ca vividhā sthitiḥ /
analyzed: auṣadhāni agadaḥ vidyā daivī ca vividhā sthitiḥ

original: MSS_8260-2 tapasaiva prasidhyanti tapas teṣāṃ hi sādhanam //
analyzed: tapasā eva prasidhyanti tapaḥ teṣām hi sādhanam

original: MSS_8261-1 auṣadhāyāpi yo martyo madhvasyati vicetanaḥ /
analyzed: auṣadhāya api yaḥ martyaḥ madhu asyati vicetanaḥ

original: MSS_8261-2 kuyonau jāyate so'pi kiṃ punas tatra lolupaḥ //
analyzed: ku yonau jāyate saḥ api kim punar tatra lolupaḥ

original: MSS_8262-1 auṣasātapabhayādapalīnaṃ vāsaracchavivirāmapaṭīyaḥ /
analyzed: auṣasa ātapa bhayāt apalīnam vāsara chavi virāma paṭīyaḥ

original: MSS_8262-2 saṃnipatya śanakairatha nimnād andhakāramudavāpa samāni //
analyzed: saṃnipatya śanakais atha nimnāt andhakāram udavāpa samāni

original: MSS_8263-1 auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām /
analyzed: auṣṇyam tathā vikramam ca saumyam daṇḍam prasanna tām

original: MSS_8263-2 dhārayanti mahātmāno rājānaḥ prāyaśo bhuvi //
analyzed: dhārayanti mahātmānaḥ rājānaḥ prāyaśas bhuvi

original: MSS_8263-3 tasmāt sarvāsvavasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvāsu avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāḥ ca pārthivāḥ

original: MSS_8264-1 auṣmāyamāṇanavayauvanamugdhabhāvāḥ śṛṅgārasāgaramanojñataraṅgalekhāḥ /
analyzed: auṣmāyamāṇa nava yauvana mugdha bhāvāḥ śṛṅgāra sāgara manojña taraṅga lekhāḥ

original: MSS_8264-2 kandarpakelirasalabdhayaśaḥpatākāḥ paṇyāṅganāḥ puramimāmadhivāsayanti //
analyzed: kandarpa keli rasa labdha yaśaḥ patākāḥ paṇya aṅganāḥ puram imām adhivāsayanti

original: MSS_8265-1 kaṃcana vañcanacature prapañcaya tvaṃ murāntake mānam /
analyzed: kaṃcana vañcana cature prapañcaya tvam murāntake mānam

original: MSS_8265-2 bahuvallabhe hi puruṣe dākṣiṇyaṃ duḥkhamudvahati //
analyzed: bahu vallabhe hi puruṣe dākṣiṇyam duḥkham udvahati

original: MSS_8266-1 kaṃcit kālaṃ naya giriguhāgahvare re mudhaiva krīḍan hālāhalarasalasaddarpa mā sarpa / sarpa /
analyzed: kaṃcid kālam naya giri guhā gahvare re mudhā eva krīḍan hālāhala rasa lasat darpa mā sarpa sarpa

original: MSS_8266-2 mādyannudyatsajalajaladavyākule meghakāle yena prāpto vanaviharaṇotkaṇṭhayā nīlakaṇṭhaḥ //
analyzed: mādyan udyat sa jala jalada vyākule megha kāle yena prāptaḥ vana viharaṇa utkaṇṭhayā nīlakaṇṭhaḥ

original: MSS_8267-1 kaṃcit kṣaṇaṃ nanu sahasva vimuñca vāso jāgartyayaṃ parijano dhigapatrapo'si /
analyzed: kaṃcid kṣaṇam nanu sahasva vimuñca vāsaḥ jāgarti ayam parijanaḥ dhik apatrapā usi

original: MSS_8267-2 eṣo'ñjaliḥ śamaya dīpamiti priyāyā vāco ratādapi parāṃ mudamāvahanti //
analyzed: eṣa uñjaliḥ śamaya dīpam iti priyāyāḥ vācaḥ ratāt api parām mudam āvahanti

original: MSS_8268-1 kaṃcideva samayaṃ samāgataṃ tvāṃ na vismarati śaśvadambujam /
analyzed: kaṃcid eva samayam samāgatam tvām na vismarati śaśvat ambujam

original: MSS_8268-2 mānase vihara haṃsa mānase mā vimuñca punarasya sauhṛdam //
analyzed: mānase vihara haṃsa mānase mā vimuñca punar asya sauhṛdam

original: MSS_8269-1 kaṃjānanā kamjaparāgapuñja- guñjanmilindāvalikuntalaśrīḥ /
MSS_8269-2 vidvaddvijākrāntamukhāntarālā jyotirvidāryā taṭinīva bhāti //
analyzed: vidvat dvija ākrānta mukha antarālā jyotiḥ vidāryā taṭinī iva bhāti

original: MSS_8270-1 kaṃ na spṛśanti puruṣaṃ vyasanāni kāle ko vā nirantarasukhī ya ihāsti loke /
analyzed: kam na spṛśanti puruṣam vyasanāni kāle kaḥ vā nirantara sukhī yaḥ iha asti loke

original: MSS_8270-2 duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ ca pariṇāmavaśādupaiti nakṣatracakramiva khe parivartamānam //
analyzed: duḥkham sukham ca pariṇāma vaśāt upaiti nakṣatra cakram iva khe parivartamānam

original: MSS_8271-1 kaṃ pṛcchāmaḥ surāḥ svarge nivasāmo vayaṃ bhuvi /
analyzed: kam pṛcchāmaḥ surāḥ svarge nivasāmaḥ vayam bhuvi

original: MSS_8271-2 kiṃ vā kāvyarasaḥ svāduḥ kiṃ vā svādīyasī sudhā //
analyzed: kim vā kāvya rasaḥ svāduḥ kim vā svādīyasī sudhā

original: MSS_8272-1 kaṃ prati kathayitumīśe saṃprati ko vā pratītimāyātu /
analyzed: kam prati kathayitum īśe saṃprati kaḥ vā pratītim āyātu

original: MSS_8272-2 gopatitanayākuñje gopavadhūṭīviṭaṃ brahma //
analyzed: gopati tanayā kuñje gopa vadhūṭī viṭam brahma

original: MSS_8273-1 kaṃ yojayan manujo'rthaṃ labheta nipātayan naṣṭadṛśaṃ hi garte /
analyzed: kam yojayan manuja ūrtham labheta nipātayan naṣṭa dṛśam hi garte

original: MSS_8273-2 evaṃ narāṇāṃ viṣayaspṛhā ca nipātayan niraye tvandhakūpe //
analyzed: evam narāṇām viṣaya spṛhā ca nipātayan niraye tu andhakūpe

original: MSS_8274-1 kaṃ viśeṣamavalambya yoṣitaḥ preyase bhajasi varcase bhuvam /
analyzed: kam viśeṣam avalambya yoṣitaḥ preyase bhajasi varcase bhuvam

original: MSS_8274-2 tyāgaheturapi tulya eva te sāpi sāpi malamocanasthalī //
analyzed: tyāga hetuḥ api tulyaḥ eva te sā api sā api mala mocana sthalī

original: MSS_8275-1 kaṃ saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kā śītalavāhinī gaṅgā /
analyzed: kam saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kā śītala vāhinī gaṅgā

original: MSS_8275-2 ke dārapoṣaṇaratāḥ kaṃ balavantaṃ na bādhate śītam //
analyzed: ke dāra poṣaṇa ratāḥ kam balavantam na bādhate śītam

original: MSS_8276-1 kaṃsaṃ dhvaṃsayate muraṃ tirayate haṃsaṃ tathā hiṃsate bāṇaṃ kṣīṇayate bakaṃ laghayate pauṇḍraṃ tathā lumpate /
analyzed: kaṃsam dhvaṃsayate muram tirayate haṃsam tathā hiṃsate bāṇam kṣīṇayate bakam laghayate pauṇḍram tathā lumpate

original: MSS_8276-2 bhaumaṃ kṣāmayate balād balabhido darpaṃ parākurvate kliṣṭaṃ śiṣṭagaṇaṃ praṇamramavate kṛṣṇāya tubhyaṃ namaḥ //
analyzed: bhaumam kṣāmayate balāt balabhidaḥ darpam parākurvate kliṣṭam śiṣṭa gaṇam praṇamramavate kṛṣṇāya tubhyam namaḥ

original: MSS_8277-1 kaṃsārātervada gamanaṃ kena syāt kasmin dṛṣṭiṃ saṃlabhate svalpecchuḥ /
analyzed: kaṃsa arāteḥ vada gamanam kena syāt kasmin dṛṣṭim saṃlabhate su alpa icchuḥ

original: MSS_8277-2 kaṃ sarveṣāṃ śubhakaramūcurdhīrāḥ kiṃ kuryās tvaṃ sujana saśokaṃ lokam //
analyzed: kam sarveṣām śubha karam ūcuḥ dhīrāḥ kim kuryāḥ tvam su jana sa śokam lokam

original: MSS_8278-1 kaṃsāricaraṇodbhūtasindhukallolalālitam /
MSS_8278-2 manye haṃsa mano nīre kulyānāṃ ramate katham //
analyzed: manye haṃsa manaḥ nīre kulyānām ramate katham

original: MSS_8279-1 kaṃso rāvaṇo rāmaśca rājā duryodhanas tathā /
analyzed: kaṃsaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rāmaḥ ca rājā duryodhanaḥ tathā

original: MSS_8279-2 catvāro'pi mahāmūrkhāḥ pañcamaḥ śālivāhanaḥ //
analyzed: catvāraḥ api mahā mūrkhāḥ pañcamaḥ śālivāhanaḥ

original: MSS_8280-1 kaḥ kaṃ śakto rakṣituṃ mṛtyukāle rajjucchede ke ghaṭaṃ dhārayanti /
analyzed: kaḥ kam śaktaḥ rakṣitum mṛtyu kāle rajju chede ke ghaṭam dhārayanti

original: MSS_8280-2 evaṃ lokas tulyadharmo vanānāṃ kāle kāle chidyate ruhyate ca //
analyzed: evam lokaḥ tulya dharmaḥ vanānām kāle kāle chidyate ruhyate ca

original: MSS_8281-1 kaḥ kaḥ kutra na ghurghurāyitaghurīghoro ghuret sūkaraḥ kaḥ kaḥ kaṃ kamalākaraṃ vikamalaṃ kartuṃ karī nodyataḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ kaḥ kutra na ghurghurāyita ghurī ghoraḥ ghuret sūkaraḥ kaḥ kaḥ kamala ākaram vikamalam kartum karī na udyataḥ

original: MSS_8281-2 ke ke kāni vanānyaraṇyamahiṣā nonmūlayeyuryataḥ siṃhīsnehavilāsabaddhavasatiḥ pañcānano vartate //
analyzed: ke ke kāni vanāni araṇya mahiṣāḥ na unmūlayeyuḥ yatas siṃhī sneha vilāsa baddha vasatiḥ pañcānanaḥ vartate

original: MSS_8282-1 kaḥ kaṇṭakānāṃ prakaroti taikṣṇyaṃ vicitrabhāvaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇāṃ ca /
analyzed: kaḥ kaṇṭakānām prakaroti taikṣṇyam vicitra bhāvam mṛga pakṣiṇām ca

original: MSS_8282-2 mādhuryamikṣau kaṭutāṃ ca nimbe svabhāvataḥ sarvamidaṃ hi siddham //
analyzed: mādhuryam ikṣau kaṭu tām ca nimbe svabhāvataḥ sarvam idam hi siddham

original: MSS_8283-1 kaḥ karṇāripitā girīndratanayā kasya priyā kasya tuk ko jānāti pareṅgitaṃ viṣamaguḥ kutrodabhūt kāminām /
analyzed: kaḥ karṇāri pitā girīndra tanayā kasya priyā kasya tuc kaḥ jānāti para iṅgitam viṣam aguḥ kutra udabhūt kāminām

original: MSS_8283-2 bhāryā kasya videhajā tudati kā bhaume'hni nindyaśca kas tatpratyuttaramadhyamākṣarapadaṃ sarvārthasaṃpatkaram //
analyzed: bhāryā kasya videha jā tudati kā nindyaḥ ca kaḥ tad pratyuttara madhyama akṣara padam sarva artha saṃpad karam

original: MSS_8284-1 kaḥ kasya puruṣo bandhuḥ kimāpyaṃ kasya kenacit /
analyzed: kaḥ kasya puruṣaḥ bandhuḥ kim āpyam kasya kenacid

original: MSS_8284-2 yadeko jāyate jantur eka eva vinaśyati //
analyzed: yat ekaḥ jāyate jantuḥ ekaḥ eva vinaśyati

original: MSS_8285-1 tasmān mātā pitā ceti rāma sajjeta yo naraḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt mātā pitā ca iti rāma sajjeta yaḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_8285-2 unmatta iva sa jñeyo nāsti kaściddhi kasyacit //
analyzed: unmattaḥ iva sa jñeyaḥ na asti kaścid hi kasyacid

original: MSS_8286-1 kaḥ kāntāramagāt piturvacanataḥ saṃśliṣya kaṇṭhasthalīṃ kāmī kiṃ kurute ca gṛdhrahaṭhataśchinnaṃ prarūḍhaṃ ca kim /
analyzed: kaḥ kāntāram agāt pituḥ vacanataḥ saṃśliṣya kaṇṭha sthalīm kāmī kim kurute ca gṛdhra haṭhataḥ chinnam prarūḍham ca kim

original: MSS_8286-2 kā rakṣaḥ kulakālarātrirabhavac candrātapaṃ dveṣṭi ko rāmaścumbati rāvaṇasya vadanaṃ sītāviyogāturaḥ //
analyzed: kā rakṣaḥ kula kāla rātriḥ abhavat candra ātapam dveṣṭi kaḥ rāmaḥ cumbati rāvaṇasya vadanam sītā viyoga āturaḥ

original: MSS_8287-1 kaḥ kālaḥ kāni mitrāṇi ko deśaḥ kau vyayāgamau /
analyzed: kaḥ kālaḥ kāni mitrāṇi kaḥ deśaḥ kau vyaya āgamau

original: MSS_8287-2 kaścāhaṃ kā ca me śaktir iti cintyaṃ muhurmuhuḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ ca aham kā ca me śaktiḥ iti cintyam muhur muhur

original: MSS_8288-1 kaḥ kuryād bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ kaḥ samunmūlayed drumān /
analyzed: kaḥ kuryāt bhuvanam sarvam kaḥ samunmūlayet drumān

original: MSS_8288-2 kiṃ pratīke bhaven mukhyaṃ kaḥ paratraiti puṇyatām //
analyzed: kim pratīke bhavet mukhyam kaḥ paratra eti puṇya tām

original: MSS_8289-1 kaḥ kopaḥ kaḥ praṇayo naṭaviṭahatamastakāsu veśyāsu /
analyzed: kaḥ kopaḥ kaḥ praṇayaḥ naṭa viṭa hata mastakāsu veśyāsu

original: MSS_8289-2 rajakaśilātalasadṛśaṃ yāsāṃ jaghanaṃ ca vadanaṃ ca //
analyzed: rajaka śilā tala sadṛśam yāsām jaghanam ca vadanam ca

original: MSS_8290-1 kaḥ kau ke kaṃ kau kān hasati ca hasato hasanti hariṇākṣyā /
analyzed: kaḥ kau ke kam kau kān hasati ca hasataḥ hasanti hariṇa akṣyā

original: MSS_8290-2 adharaḥ pallavamaṅghrī haṃsau kundasya korakān dantāḥ //
analyzed: adharaḥ pallavam aṅghrī haṃsau kundasya korakān dantāḥ

original: MSS_8291-1 kaḥ khe gacchati kā ramyā kā japyā kiṃ vibhūṣaṇam /
analyzed: kaḥ khe gacchati kā ramyā kā japyā kim vibhūṣaṇam

original: MSS_8291-2 ko vandyaḥ kīdṛśī laṅkā vīramarkaṭakampitā //
analyzed: kaḥ vandyaḥ kīdṛśī laṅkā vīra markaṭa kampitā

original: MSS_8292-1 kaḥ khe carati kaḥ śabdaṃ coraṃ dṛṣṭvā karoti ca /
analyzed: kaḥ khe carati kaḥ śabdam coram dṛṣṭvā karoti ca

original: MSS_8292-2 kairavāṇāmariḥ ko vā kopānāmālayaśca kaḥ //
analyzed: kairavāṇām ariḥ kaḥ vā kopānām ālayaḥ ca kaḥ

original: MSS_8293-1 kaḥ khe bhāti,
analyzed: kaḥ khe bhāti

original: hato niśācarapatiḥ kenāmbudhau majjati kaḥ,
analyzed: hataḥ niśācara patiḥ kena ambudhau majjati kaḥ

original: kīdṛk taruṇīvilāsagamanaṃ,
analyzed: kīdṛś taruṇī vilāsa gamanam

original: ko nāma rājñāṃ priyaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ nāma rājñām priyaḥ

original: MSS_8293-2 patraṃ kiṃ nṛpateḥ,
analyzed: patram kim nṛpateḥ

original: kimapsu lalitaṃ,
analyzed: kim apsu lalitam

original: ko rāmarāmāharo matpraśnottaramadhyamākṣarapadaṃ yat tat tavāśīrvacaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ rāma rāma āharaḥ mad praśna uttara madhyama akṣara padam yat tat tava āśīrvacaḥ

original: MSS_8294-1 kaḥ paretanagarīpuraṃdaraḥ ko bhavedatha tadīyakiṃkaraḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ pareta nagarī puraṃdaraḥ kaḥ bhavet atha tadīya kiṃkaraḥ

original: MSS_8294-2 kṛṣṇanāma jagadekamaṅgalaṃ kaṇṭhapīṭhamurarīkaroti cet //
MSS_8295-1 kaḥ paśyati khuramahasaḥ saṃmukhamapi tejasāṃ sahasrasya /
analyzed: kaḥ paśyati khura mahasaḥ saṃmukham api tejasām sahasrasya

original: MSS_8295-2 kalitaṃ śaśabhṛddhāmno yo maṇḍalakhaṇḍanaṃ sahate //
analyzed: kalitam śaśabhṛt dhāmnaḥ yaḥ maṇḍala khaṇḍanam sahate

original: MSS_8296-1 kaḥ puṣpajātiṃ surabhiṃ vidhatte kaścandanaṃ vai śiśirīkaroti /
analyzed: kaḥ puṣpa jātim surabhim vidhatte kaḥ candanam vai śiśirīkaroti

original: MSS_8296-2 kaḥ prārthayed bhānumiha prakāśe sādhus tathā svena paropakārī //
analyzed: kaḥ prārthayet bhānum iha prakāśe sādhuḥ tathā svena para upakārī

original: MSS_8297-1 kaḥ pūjyaḥ sadvṛttaḥ kamadhamamācakṣate calitavṛttam /
analyzed: kaḥ pūjyaḥ sat vṛttaḥ kam adhamam ācakṣate calita vṛttam

original: MSS_8297-2 kena jitaṃ jagadetat satyatitikṣāvatā puṃsā //
analyzed: kena jitam jagat etat satya titikṣāvatā puṃsā

original: MSS_8298-1 kaḥ pūjyaḥ, sujanatvameti katamaḥ,
analyzed: kaḥ pūjyaḥ su jana tvam eti katamaḥ

original: kva sthīyate paṇḍitaiḥ śrīmatyā śivayā ca kena bhuvane yuddhaṃ kṛtaṃ dāruṇam /
analyzed: kva sthīyate paṇḍitaiḥ śrīmatyā śivayā ca kena bhuvane yuddham kṛtam dāruṇam

original: MSS_8298-2 kiṃ vāñchanti sadā janā,
analyzed: kim vāñchanti sadā janāḥ

original: yuvajanā dhyāyanti kiṃ mānase matpraśnottaramadhyamākṣarapadaṃ bhūyāt tavāśīrvacaḥ //
analyzed: yuva janāḥ dhyāyanti kim mānase mad praśna uttara madhyama akṣara padam bhūyāt tava āśīrvacaḥ

original: MSS_8298A-1 kaḥ paurave vasumatīṃ śāsati śāsitari durvinītānām /
analyzed: kaḥ paurave vasumatīm śāsati śāsitari durvinītānām

original: MSS_8298A-2 ayamācaratyavinayaṃ mugdhāsu tapasvikanyāsu //
analyzed: ayam ācarati avinayam mugdhāsu tapasvi kanyāsu

original: MSS_8299-1 kaḥ prasūte pūrovātaṃ kaḥ prerayati vāridam /
analyzed: kaḥ prasūte pūrovātam kaḥ prerayati vāridam

original: MSS_8299-2 prāpte tu śrāvaṇe māsi bhavatyekārṇavaṃ jagat //
analyzed: prāpte tu śrāvaṇe māsi bhavati ekārṇavam jagat

original: MSS_8300-1 kaḥ prājño vāñchati snehaṃ veśyāsu sikatāsu ca /
analyzed: kaḥ prājñaḥ vāñchati sneham veśyāsu sikatāsu ca

original: MSS_8300-2 vimucyate vā bhavatā vastudharmo'yamīdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: vimucyate vā bhavatā vastu dharmaḥ yam īdṛśaḥ

original: MSS_8301-1 kaḥ prārthito'pi dāsyati tṛṇatuṣaparimāṇamātramapyadhikam /
analyzed: kaḥ prārthitaḥ api dāsyati tṛṇa tuṣa parimāṇa mātram api adhikam

original: MSS_8301-2 antarlalāṭasaṃpuṭa- vikaṭākṣaramālikāṃ muktvā //
analyzed: antar lalāṭa saṃpuṭa vikaṭa akṣara mālikām muktvā

original: MSS_8302-1 kaḥ prārthyate madanavihvalayā yuvatyā bhāti kva puṇḍrakamupaiti kathaṃ batāyuḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ prārthyate madana vihvalayā yuvatyā bhāti kva puṇḍrakam upaiti katham bata āyuḥ

original: MSS_8302-2 kvānādaro bhavati,
analyzed: kva anādaraḥ bhavati

original: kena ca rājate'bjaṃ bāhyāsthi kiṃ phalamudāhara nālikeram //
analyzed: kena ca rājata ibjam bāhya asthi kim phalam udāhara nālikeram

original: MSS_8303-1 kaḥ śakraḥ katamaḥ sraṣṭā varākaḥ katamo yamaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ śakraḥ katamaḥ sraṣṭā varākaḥ katamaḥ yamaḥ

original: MSS_8303-2 satyavratānāṃ bhūpānāṃ kartuṃ śāsanalaṅghanam //
analyzed: satya vratānām bhūpānām kartum śāsana laṅghanam

original: MSS_8304-1 kaḥ śamaḥ kriyatāṃ prājñāḥ priyāprītau pariśramaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ śamaḥ kriyatām prājñāḥ priya aprītau pariśramaḥ

original: MSS_8304-2 bhasmībhūtasya bhūtasya punarāgamanaṃ kutaḥ //
analyzed: bhasmībhūtasya bhūtasya punarāgamanam kutas

original: MSS_8305-1 kaḥ śraddhāsyati bhūtārthaṃ sarvo māṃ tulayiṣyati /
analyzed: kaḥ śraddhāsyati bhūta artham sarvaḥ mām tulayiṣyati

original: MSS_8305-2 śaṅkanīyā hi loke'smin niṣpratāpā daridratā //
analyzed: śaṅkanīyā hi loke ismin niṣpratāpā daridra tā

original: MSS_8306-1 kaḥ ślāghanīyajanmā māghaniśīthe'pi yasya saubhāgyam /
analyzed: kaḥ ślāghanīya janmā yasya saubhāgyam

original: MSS_8306-2 prāleyāniladīrghaḥ kathayati kāñcīninādo'yam //
analyzed: prāleya anila dīrghaḥ kathayati kāñcī ninādaḥ yam

original: MSS_8307-1 kaḥ syādambudayācako,
analyzed: kaḥ syāt ambuda yācakaḥ

original: yuvatayaḥ kaṃ kāmayante patiṃ lajjā kena nivāryate,
analyzed: yuvatayaḥ kam kāmayante patim lajjā kena nivāryate

original: nikaṭake dāse kathaṃ yāvanī /
analyzed: nikaṭake dāse katham yāvanī

original: MSS_8307-2 bhāṣā darśayateti vastuṣu mahārāṣṭre kadā vā bhaved ādyāntākṣarayorhi loparacanācāturyataḥ pūryatām //
analyzed: bhāṣā darśayata iti vastuṣu mahā rāṣṭre kadā vā bhavet ādya anta akṣarayoḥ hi lopa racanā cāturyataḥ pūryatām

original: MSS_8308-1 kaḥ svabhāvagabhīrāṇāṃ lakṣayed bahirāpadam /
analyzed: kaḥ svabhāva gabhīrāṇām lakṣayet bahis āpadam

original: MSS_8308-2 bālāpatyena bhṛtyena yadi sā na prakāśyate //
analyzed: bāla apatyena bhṛtyena yadi sā na prakāśyate

original: MSS_8309-1 ka ātmā kaḥ paro vātra svīyaḥ pārakya eva vā /
analyzed: kaḥ ātmā kaḥ paraḥ vā atra svīyaḥ pārakyaḥ eva vā

original: MSS_8309-2 svaparābhiniveśena vinā jñānena dehinām //
analyzed: sva para abhiniveśena vinā jñānena dehinām

original: MSS_8310-1 ka āliptaḥ priyaḥ ko'syāḥ kaṃ dhyāyati kamīkṣate /
analyzed: kaḥ āliptaḥ priyaḥ kaḥ asyāḥ kam dhyāyati kam īkṣate

original: MSS_8310-2 iti cintā na yasyāsīt sa pūjyaḥ paṇyayoṣitām //
analyzed: iti cintā na yasya āsīt sa pūjyaḥ paṇyayoṣitām

original: MSS_8311-2 ka īpsitārthasthiraniścayaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ īpsita artha sthira niścayam manaḥ

original: MSS_8311-3 payaśca nimnābhimukhaṃ pratīpayet //
analyzed: payaḥ ca nimna abhimukham pratīpayet

original: MSS_8312-1 ka ekastvaṃ puṣpāyudha mama samādhivyayavidhau suparvāṇaḥ sarve yadi kusumaśastrās tadapi kim /
analyzed: kaḥ ekaḥ tvam puṣpāyudha mama samādhi vyaya vidhau su parvāṇaḥ sarve yadi kusuma śastrāḥ tat api kim

original: MSS_8312-2 itīvainān nūnaṃ ya iha sumanostratvamanayat sa vaḥ śāstā śastraṃ diśatu daśadiṅmāravijayī //
analyzed: iti iva enān nūnam yaḥ iha sumanāḥ astra tvam anayat sa vaḥ śāstā śastram diśatu daśa diś māra vijayī

original: MSS_8313-1 kakubhakarīrāveka- tra saṃyutau kakubhabilvau vā /
analyzed: kakubha karīrau eka saṃyutau kakubha bilvau vā

original: MSS_8313-2 hastatraye'mbu paścān narairbhavatyekaviṃśatyā //
analyzed: hasta traya imbu paścāt naraiḥ bhavati ekaviṃśatyā

original: MSS_8314-1 kakubhasya phalaṃ puṣpaṃ lākṣā śrīvāsaguggulū /
analyzed: kakubhasya phalam puṣpam lākṣā śrīvāsa guggulū

original: MSS_8314-2 śvetāparājitāmūlaṃ viḍaṅgānvitasarṣapāḥ //
MSS_8315-1 kakubhāṃ mukhāni sahasojjvalayan dadhadākulatvamadhikaṃ rataye /
analyzed: kakubhām mukhāni sahasā ujjvalayan dadhat ākula tvam adhikam rataye

original: MSS_8315-2 adidīpadinduraparo dahanaḥ kusumeṣumatrinayanaprabhavaḥ //
analyzed: adidīpat induḥ aparaḥ dahanaḥ kusumeṣumat trinayana prabhavaḥ

original: MSS_8316-1 kakubhi kakubhi dhvāntakṣubdhaṃ vitatya vidhāya ca śrutipuṭabhido garjāḥ śreyaḥ kṛtaṃ paramambudaiḥ /
analyzed: kakubhi kakubhi dhvānta kṣubdham vitatya vidhāya ca śruti puṭa bhidaḥ garjāḥ śreyaḥ kṛtam param ambudaiḥ

original: MSS_8316-2 kathamitarathā jātodvegaḥ samujjhitapalvalaḥ kanakakamalottaṃse haṃsaḥ sa nandati mānase //
analyzed: katham itarathā jāta udvegaḥ samujjhita palvalaḥ kanaka kamala uttaṃse haṃsaḥ sa nandati mānase

original: MSS_8317-1 kakubhi kakubhi bhrāntvā bhrāntvā vilokya vilokitaṃ malayajasamo dṛṣṭo'smābhirna ko'pi mahīruhaḥ /
analyzed: kakubhi kakubhi bhrāntvā bhrāntvā vilokya vilokitam malayaja samaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ smābhiḥ na kaḥ api mahīruhaḥ

original: MSS_8317-2 upacitaraso dāhe cchede śilātalagharṣaṇe- 'pyadhikamadhikaṃ yat saurabhyaṃ tanoti manoharam //
analyzed: upacita rasaḥ dāhe chede śilā tala gharṣaṇe pi adhikam adhikam yat saurabhyam tanoti manoharam

original: MSS_8318-1 kakṣe kiṃ mitapustakaṃ kimudakaṃ (kiṃ)
analyzed: kakṣe kim mita pustakam kim udakam kim

original: kāvyasārodakaṃ dīrghaṃ kiṃ yadi tāḍapatralikhitaṃ kiṃ cātra gauḍākṣaram /
analyzed: kāvya sāra udakam dīrgham kim yadi tāḍa patra likhitam kim ca atra gauḍa akṣaram

original: MSS_8318-2 gandhaḥ kiṃ yadi rāmarāvaṇakathāsaṃgrāmagandho mahat kiṃ vāraṃ bahu jalpase śṛṇu sakhe nāmnā purāṇo jhaṣaḥ //
analyzed: gandhaḥ kim yadi rāma rāvaṇa kathā saṃgrāma gandhaḥ mahat kim vāram bahu jalpase śṛṇu sakhe nāmnā purāṇaḥ jhaṣaḥ

original: MSS_8319-1 kaṅkagṛdhrasṛgāleṣu daṃśeṣu maśakeṣu ca /
analyzed: kaṅka gṛdhra sṛgāleṣu daṃśeṣu maśakeṣu ca

original: MSS_8319-2 pannageṣu ca jāyante narāḥ krodhaparāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: pannageṣu ca jāyante narāḥ krodha parāyaṇāḥ

original: MSS_8320-1 kaṅkahaṃsaśaśādānāṃ matsyādakrauñcakekinām /
analyzed: kaṅka haṃsa śaśādānām matsya āda krauñca kekinām

original: MSS_8320-2 gṛdhrāṇāṃ kukkuṭānāṃ ca pakṣā eteṣu śobhanāḥ //
analyzed: gṛdhrāṇām kukkuṭānām ca pakṣāḥ eteṣu śobhanāḥ

original: MSS_8321-1 kaṅkelireṣa kimacetana eva satyaṃ namnaḥ svayaṃ na kusumāni dadāti yas te /
analyzed: kaṅkeliḥ eṣa kim acetanaḥ eva satyam namnaḥ svayam na kusumāni dadāti yaḥ te

original: MSS_8321-2 dhūrto'thavā namati nāyamudastabāhu- vyaktonnatastanataṭāntadidṛkṣayeva //
analyzed: dhūrtaḥ athavā namati na ayam udasta bāhu vyakta unnata stana taṭa anta didṛkṣayā iva

original: MSS_8322-1 kacakucacubukāgre pāṇiṣu vyāpṛteṣu prathamajaladhiputrīsaṃgame'naṅgadhāmni /
analyzed: kaca kuca cubuka agre pāṇiṣu vyāpṛteṣu prathama jaladhi putrī saṃgamenaṅga dhāmni

original: MSS_8322-2 grathitanibiḍanīvībandhanirmocanārthaṃ caturadhikakarāśaḥ pātu vaścakrapāṇiḥ //
analyzed: grathita nibiḍa nīvī bandha nirmocana artham catur adhikaka rāśaḥ pātu vaḥ cakrapāṇiḥ

original: MSS_8323-1 kacagrahamanugrahaṃ daśanakhaṇḍanaṃ maṇḍanaṃ dṛgañjanamavañcanaṃ mukharasārpaṇaṃ tarpaṇam /
analyzed: kaca graham anugraham daśana khaṇḍanam maṇḍanam dṛś añjanam avañcanam mukha rasa arpaṇam tarpaṇam

original: MSS_8323-2 nakhārdanamatardanaṃ nibiḍapīḍanaṃ krīḍanaṃ karoti ratisaṅgame makaraketanaḥ kāminām //
analyzed: nakha ardanam atardanam nibiḍa pīḍanam krīḍanam karoti rati saṅgame makaraketanaḥ kāminām

original: MSS_8324-1 kacagrahasamullasatkamalakoṣapīḍājaḍa- dvirephakalakūjitānukṛtasītkṛtālaṃkṛtāḥ /
MSS_8324-2 jayanti suratotsavavyatikare kuraṅgīdṛśāṃ pramodamadanirbharapraṇayacumbino vibhramāḥ //
analyzed: jayanti surata utsava vyatikare kuraṅgī dṛśām pramoda mada nirbhara praṇaya cumbinaḥ vibhramāḥ

original: MSS_8325-1 kacagrahottānitamardhakuḍmalaṃ trapācalattārakamandalocanam /
analyzed: kaca graha uttānitam ardha kuḍmalam trapā calat tāraka manda locanam

original: MSS_8325-2 balādgṛhītādharavedanākulaṃ kadā pibeyaṃ nanu tat priyāmukham //
analyzed: balāt gṛhīta adhara vedanā ākulam kadā pibeyam nanu tat priyā mukham

original: MSS_8326-1 kacabhārāt kucabhāraḥ kucabhārād bhītimeti kacabhāraḥ /
analyzed: kaca bhārāt kuca bhāraḥ kuca bhārāt bhītim eti kaca bhāraḥ

original: MSS_8326-2 kacakucabhārāj jaghanaṃ ko'yaṃ candrānane camatkāraḥ //
analyzed: kaca kuca bhārāt jaghanam koyam candra ānane camatkāraḥ

original: MSS_8327-1 kacamūlabaddhapannaga- niśvāsaviṣāgnidhūmahatamadhyam /
analyzed: kaca mūla baddha pannaga niśvāsa viṣa agni dhūma hata madhyam

original: MSS_8327-2 aiśānamiva kapālaṃ sphuṭalakṣmā sphurati śaśibimbam //
analyzed: aiśānam iva kapālam sphuṭa lakṣmā sphurati śaśi bimbam

original: MSS_8328-1 kacā yūkāvāsā mukhamajinabaddhāsthinicayam kucau māṃsagranthī jaṭharamapi viṣṭhādidhaṭikā /
analyzed: kacāḥ yūkā vāsāḥ mukham ajina baddha asthi nicayam kucau māṃsa granthī jaṭharam api viṣṭhā ādi dhaṭikā

original: MSS_8328-2 malotsarge yantraṃ jaghanamabalāyāḥ kramayugaṃ tadādhārasthūṇe tadiha kimu rāgāya mahatām //
analyzed: mala utsarge yantram jaghanam abalāyāḥ krama yugam tad ādhāra sthūṇe tat iha kimu rāgāya mahatām

original: MSS_8328A-1 kacairardhacchinnaiḥ karanihitaraktaiḥ kucataṭair nakhotkṛttairgaṇḍairupalahatiśīrṇaiśca niṭilaiḥ /
analyzed: kacaiḥ ardha chinnaiḥ kara nihita raktaiḥ kuca taṭaiḥ nakha utkṛttaiḥ gaṇḍaiḥ upala hati śīrṇaiḥ ca niṭilaiḥ

original: MSS_8328A-2 vidīrṇairākrandād vikalagaditaiḥ kaṇṭhavivarair manastakṣṇotyantaḥpuraparijanānāṃ sthitiriyam //
analyzed: vidīrṇaiḥ ākrandāt vikala gaditaiḥ kaṇṭha vivaraiḥ manaḥ takṣṇoti antaḥpura parijanānām sthitiḥ iyam

original: MSS_8328B-1 kaccit kāntārabhājāṃ bhavati paribhavaḥ ko'pi śauvāpado vā pratyūhena kratūnāṃ na khalu makhabhujo bhuñjate vā havīṃṣi /
analyzed: kaccit kāntāra bhājām bhavati paribhavaḥ kaḥ api śauva āpadaḥ vā pratyūhena kratūnām na khalu makha bhujaḥ bhuñjate vā havīṃṣi

original: MSS_8328B-2 kartuṃ vā kaccidantarvasati vasumatīdakṣiṇaḥ saptatantur yatsaṃprāpto'si kiṃ vā raghukulatapasāmīdṛśo'yaṃ vivartaḥ //
analyzed: kartum vā kaccit antar vasati vasumatī dakṣiṇaḥ saptatantuḥ yat saṃprāptaḥ asi kim vā raghu kula tapasām īdṛśaḥ yam vivartaḥ

original: MSS_8329-1 kaccit paśavyaṃ nirujaṃ bhūryambutṛṇavīrudham /
analyzed: kaccit paśavyam nirujam bhūri ambu tṛṇa vīrudham

original: MSS_8329-2 vṛhadvanaṃ tadadhunā yatrāsse tvaṃ suhṛdvṛtaḥ //
analyzed: vṛhat vanam tat adhunā yatra āsse tvam suhṛd vṛtaḥ

original: MSS_8330-1 kaccit sahasrān mūrkhāṇām ekamicchasi paṇḍitam /
analyzed: kaccit sahasrāt mūrkhāṇām ekam icchasi paṇḍitam

original: MSS_8330-2 paṇḍito hyarthakṛcchreṣu kuryān niḥśreyasaṃ mahat //
analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ hi artha kṛcchreṣu kuryāt niḥśreyasam mahat

original: MSS_8331-1 kaccit saumya priyasahacarī vidyudāliṅgati tvām āvirbhūtapraṇayasumukhāścātakā vā bhajante /
analyzed: kaccit saumya priya sahacarī vidyut āliṅgati tvām āvirbhūta praṇaya su mukhāḥ cātakāḥ vā bhajante

original: MSS_8331-2 paurastyo vā sukhayati marutsādhusaṃvāhanābhir viṣvagbibhratsurapatidhanurlakṣma lakṣmīṃ tanoti //
analyzed: paurastyaḥ vā sukhayati marut sādhu saṃvāhanābhiḥ viṣvak bibhrat surapati dhanuḥ lakṣma lakṣmīm tanoti

original: MSS_8332-1 kaccit saumya vyavasitamidaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me pratyādeśānna khalu bhavato dhīratāṃ tarkayāmi /
analyzed: kaccit saumya vyavasitam idam bandhu kṛtyam tvayā me pratyādeśāt na khalu bhavataḥ dhīra tām tarkayāmi

original: MSS_8332-2 niḥśabdo'pi pradiśasi jalaṃ yācitaś cātakebhyaḥ pratyuktaṃ hi praṇayiṣu satāmīpsitārthakriyaiva //
analyzed: niḥśabdaḥ api pradiśasi jalam yācitaḥ cātakebhyaḥ pratyuktam hi praṇayiṣu satām īpsita artha kriyā eva

original: MSS_8333-1 kaccidarthena vā dharmam arthaṃ dharmeṇa vā punaḥ /
analyzed: kaccit arthena vā dharmam artham dharmeṇa vā punar

original: MSS_8333-2 ubhau vā prītilobhena kāmena na vibādhase //
analyzed: ubhau vā prīti lobhena kāmena na vibādhase

original: MSS_8334-1 kaccidarthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca jāyatāṃ vara /
analyzed: kaccit artham ca dharmam ca kāmam ca jāyatām vara

original: MSS_8334-2 vibhajya kāle kālajña sarvān bharata sevase //
analyzed: vibhajya kāle kāla jña sarvān bharata sevase

original: MSS_8335-1 kacchānvavāyajaladheramṛtāṃśuranyaḥ pratyarthivaṃśadahanaḥ sumanā guṇajñaḥ /
analyzed: kaccha anvavāya jaladheḥ amṛtāṃśuḥ anyaḥ pratyarthi vaṃśa dahanaḥ sumanāḥ guṇa jñaḥ

original: MSS_8335-2 vidyāpriyo nayaparo matimān vadānyaḥ mīvārabhūpatirudetu yaśo vitanvan //
analyzed: vidyā priyaḥ naya paraḥ matimān vadānyaḥ mīvāra bhūpatiḥ udetu yaśaḥ vitanvan

original: MSS_8336-1 kajjalatilakakalaṅkita- mukhacandre galitasalilakaṇakeśi /
analyzed: kajjala tilaka kalaṅkita mukha candre galita salila kaṇa keśi

original: MSS_8336-2 navavirahadahanatūlo jīvayitavyastvayā katamaḥ //
analyzed: nava viraha dahana tūlaḥ jīvayitavyaḥ tvayā katamaḥ

original: MSS_8337-1 kaja bhaja vikāsamabhitas tyaja saṃkocaṃ bhramatyayaṃ bhramaraḥ /
analyzed: kaja bhaja vikāsam abhitas tyaja saṃkocam bhramati ayam bhramaraḥ

original: MSS_8337-2 yadyapi na bhavati kāryaṃ tathāpi tuṣṭas tanotyayaṃ kīrtim //
analyzed: yadi api na bhavati kāryam tathā api tuṣṭaḥ tanoti ayam kīrtim

original: MSS_8338-1 kajjalahimakanakarucaḥ suparṇavṛṣahaṃsavāhanāḥ śaṃ vaḥ /
analyzed: kajjala hima kanaka rucaḥ suparṇa vṛṣa haṃsa vāhanāḥ śam vaḥ

original: MSS_8338-2 jalanidhigirikamalasthā hariharakamalāsanā dadatu //
analyzed: jalanidhi giri kamala sthāḥ hari hara kamala āsanāḥ dadatu

original: MSS_8339-1 kaṭakatvaṃ pṛthagghemnas taraṃgatvaṃ pṛthag jalāt /
analyzed: kaṭaka tvam pṛthak hemnaḥ taraṃga tvam pṛthak jalāt

original: MSS_8339-2 yathā na saṃbhavatyevaṃ na jagat pṛthagīśvarāt //
analyzed: yathā na saṃbhavati evam na jagat pṛthak īśvarāt

original: MSS_8340-1 kaṭakāni bhajanti cārubhir navamuktāphalabhūṣaṇairbhujaiḥ /
analyzed: kaṭakāni bhajanti cārubhiḥ nava muktāphala bhūṣaṇaiḥ bhujaiḥ

original: MSS_8340-2 niyataṃ dadhate ca citrakair aviyogaṃ pṛthugaṇḍaśailataḥ //
analyzed: niyatam dadhate ca citrakaiḥ aviyogam pṛthu gaṇḍaśailataḥ

original: MSS_8341-1 kaṭakinaḥ kaṭukarasān karīrakhadirādiviṭapatarugulmān /
analyzed: kaṭakinaḥ kaṭuka rasān karīra khadira ādi viṭa pataru gulmān

original: MSS_8341-2 upabhuñjānā karabhī daivādāpnoti madhuramadhujālam //
analyzed: upabhuñjānā karabhī daivāt āpnoti madhura madhu jālam

original: MSS_8342-1 kaṭākṣeṇāpīṣat kṣaṇamayi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tadānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: kaṭākṣeṇa api īṣat kṣaṇam ayi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tad ānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihita aśeṣa viṣayaḥ

original: MSS_8342-2 saromāñcodañcatkucakalaśanirbhinnavasanaḥ parīrambhārambhaḥ ka iva bhavitāmbhoruhadṛśaḥ //
analyzed: sa romāñca udañcat kuca kalaśa nirbhinna vasanaḥ parīrambha ārambhaḥ kaḥ iva bhavitā ambhoruha dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_8343-1 kaṭākṣairākṣiptaḥ priyasakhi rahaḥ kelibhavane vane puṣpavyājāt kucayugamidaṃ cāpi valitam /
analyzed: kaṭākṣaiḥ ākṣiptaḥ priya sakhi rahaḥ keli bhavane vane puṣpa vyājāt kuca yugam idam ca api valitam

original: MSS_8343-2 ratāsaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā harinamithunaṃ cālpahasitaṃ tathāpi preyān me na kimapi jānāti kimiti //
analyzed: rata āsaktam dṛṣṭvā ca alpa hasitam tathā api preyān me na kim api jānāti kim iti

original: MSS_8344-1 kaṭirmuṣṭigrāhyā dvipuruṣabhujagrāhyamudaraṃ stanau ghaṇṭālolau jaghanamiva gantuṃ vyavasitau /
analyzed: kaṭiḥ muṣṭi grāhyā dvi puruṣa bhuja grāhyam udaram stanau ghaṇṭā lolau jaghanam iva gantum vyavasitau

original: MSS_8344-2 smitaṃ bherīnādo mukhamapi ca patyurbhayakaraṃ tathāpyeṣā raṇḍā paribhavati saṃtāpayati ca //
analyzed: smitam bherī nādaḥ mukham api ca patyuḥ bhaya karam tathā api eṣā raṇḍā paribhavati saṃtāpayati ca

original: MSS_8345-1 kaṭirviṭaśatairghūṣṭā pānthapītojjhitaṃ mukham /
analyzed: kaṭiḥ viṭa śataiḥ ghūṣṭā pāntha pīta ujjhitam mukham

original: MSS_8345-2 stanau sahasramṛditau yasyāḥ kasyās tu sā nijā //
analyzed: stanau sahasra mṛditau yasyāḥ kasyāḥ tu sā nijā

original: MSS_8345A-1 kaṭisthakaravaiśākhasthānakasthanarākṛtim /
analyzed: kaṭi stha kara vaiśākha sthānaka stha nara ākṛtim

original: MSS_8345A-2 dravyaiḥ pūrṇaṃ smarellokaṃ sthityutpattivyayātmakaiḥ //
analyzed: dravyaiḥ pūrṇam smaret lokam sthiti utpatti vyaya ātmakaiḥ

original: MSS_8346-1 kaṭītaṭanikuñjeṣu saṃcaran vātakuñjaraḥ /
analyzed: kaṭī taṭa nikuñjeṣu saṃcaran vāta kuñjaraḥ

original: MSS_8346-2 eraṇḍatailasiṃhasya gandhamāghrāya dhāvati //
analyzed: eraṇḍa taila siṃhasya gandham āghrāya dhāvati

original: MSS_8347-1 kaṭu kvaṇanto maladāyakāḥ khalā- studantyalaṃ bandhanaśṛṅkhalā iva /
analyzed: kaṭu kvaṇantaḥ mala dāyakāḥ khalāḥ studanti alam bandhana śṛṅkhalāḥ iva

original: MSS_8347-2 manastu sādhudhvanibhiḥ pade pade haranti santo maṇinūpurā iva //
analyzed: manaḥ tu sādhu dhvanibhiḥ pade pade haranti santaḥ maṇi nūpurāḥ iva

original: MSS_8348-1 kaṭutiktakaṣāyarasaiḥ pavanaḥ pittaṃ kaṭūṣṇalavaṇāmlaiḥ /
MSS_8348-2 snigdhamadhurāmlalavaṇaiḥ śleṣmā kopaṃ prayāti taroḥ //
analyzed: snigdha madhura amla lavaṇaiḥ śleṣmā kopam prayāti taroḥ

original: MSS_8349-1 kaṭutīkṣṇoṣṇalavaṇakṣārāmlādib hirulbaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: kaṭu tīkṣṇa uṣṇa lavaṇa kṣāra amla ādibhiḥ ulbaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_8349-2 mātṛbhuktairupaspṛṣṭaḥ sarvāṅgotthitavedanaḥ //
analyzed: mātṛ bhuktaiḥ upaspṛṣṭaḥ sarva aṅga utthita vedanaḥ

original: MSS_8350-1 kaṭubhirapi kaṭhoracakravākot- karavirahajvaraśāntiśītavīyaiḥ /
analyzed: kaṭubhiḥ api

original: MSS_8350-2 timirahatamayaṃ mahobhirañjañ jayati jagannayanaughamuṣṇabhānuḥ //
analyzed: timira hata mayam mahobhiḥ añjam jayati jagat nayana ogham uṣṇabhānuḥ

original: MSS_8351-1 kaṭumadhurāṇyāmodaiḥ parṇairutkīrṇapatrabhaṅgāni /
analyzed: kaṭu madhurāṇi āmodaiḥ parṇaiḥ utkīrṇa patrabhaṅgāni

original: MSS_8351-2 damanakavanāni saṃprati kāṇḍairekāntapāṇḍūni //
analyzed: damanaka vanāni saṃprati kāṇḍaiḥ ekānta pāṇḍūni

original: MSS_8352-1 kaṭu raṭasi kimevaṃ karṇayoḥ kuñjarārer aviditanijabuddhe kiṃ na vijñātamasti /
analyzed: kaṭu raṭasi kim evam karṇayoḥ kuñjara areḥ a vidita nija buddhe kim na vijñātam asti

original: MSS_8352-2 śilatarakaradaṃṣṭrāṭaṅkanirbhinnakumbhaṃ maśaka galakarandhre hastiyūthaṃ mamajja //
analyzed: śilatara kara daṃṣṭrā ṭaṅka nirbhinna kumbham maśaka galaka randhre hasti yūtham mamajja

original: MSS_8353-1 kaṭuviśikhaśikhiprapañca pañcā- nana dhanadapriyamitra mitranetra /
analyzed: kaṭu viśikha śikhi prapañca pañcā nana dhanada priya mitra mitra netra

original: MSS_8353-2 dhṛtasakalavikalpa kalpaśeṣa- prakaṭamahānaṭa nāṭaya prasādam //
analyzed: dhṛta sakala vikalpa kalpa śeṣa prakaṭa mahā naṭa nāṭaya prasādam

original: MSS_8354-1 kaṭūnāmiha sārthatvāt kāmaṃ bhavati saṃgrahaḥ /
analyzed: kaṭūnām iha sārtha tvāt kāmam bhavati saṃgrahaḥ

original: MSS_8354-2 tathāpi vṛttirna tathā rasajñānumatikṣamā //
analyzed: tathā api vṛttiḥ na tathā rasa jña anumati kṣamā

original: MSS_8355-1 kaṭau na kalamekhalā na kucamaṇḍale mālikā dṛśorapi na cāñjanaṃ na punarasti rāgo'dhare /
analyzed: kaṭau na kala mekhalā na kuca maṇḍale mālikā dṛśoḥ api na ca añjanam na punar asti rāga udhare

original: MSS_8355-2 priyeṇa sahacāriṇā madanataskarasyoccakais tatas tvamasi luṇṭhitā nidhuvane vane śobhane //
analyzed: priyeṇa sahacāriṇā madana taskarasya uccakais tatas tvam asi luṇṭhitā nidhuvane vane śobhane

original: MSS_8355A-1 kaṭusvarastvaṃ pikabhūt tathāpi ślāghyo'si samyak pikaputrapālāt /
analyzed: kaṭu svaraḥ tvam tathā api ślāghyaḥ asi samyak pika putra pālāt

original: MSS_8355A-2 āhlādanāccandra ivāttalakṣmā kastūrikā gandhabhṛteva kṛṣṇā //
analyzed: āhlādanāt candraḥ iva ātta lakṣmā kastūrikā gandha bhṛtā iva kṛṣṇā

original: MSS_8356-1 kaṭvamlalavaṇātyuṣṇatīkṣṇarūkṣavid āhinaḥ /
MSS_8356-2 āhārā rājasasyeṣṭā duḥkhaśokāmayapradāḥ //
analyzed: āhārāḥ rājasasya iṣṭāḥ duḥkha śoka āmaya pradāḥ

original: MSS_8357-1 kaṭvervārau yathā pakve madhuraḥ san raso'pi na /
analyzed: kaṭu ervārau yathā pakve madhuraḥ san rasaḥ api na

original: MSS_8357-2 prāpyate hyātmani tathā nāpakvakaraṇe jñatā //
analyzed: prāpyate hi ātmani tathā na apakva karaṇe jña tā

original: MSS_8358-1 kaṭhinaṃ vā madhuraṃ vā prastutavacanaṃ manohāri /
analyzed: kaṭhinam vā madhuram vā prastuta vacanam manohāri

original: MSS_8358-2 vāme gardabhanādaś cittaprītyai prayāṇeṣu //
analyzed: vāme gardabha nādaḥ citta prītyai prayāṇeṣu

original: MSS_8359-1 kaṭhinaḥ kṛśamūlaśca durlabho dakṣiṇetaraḥ /
analyzed: kaṭhinaḥ kṛśamūlaḥ ca durlabhaḥ dakṣiṇetaraḥ

original: MSS_8359-2 kaścit kalyāṇagotro'pi manuṣyairnopajīvyate //
analyzed: kaścid kalyāṇa gotraḥ upi manuṣyaiḥ na upajīvyate

original: MSS_8360-1 kaṭhinakucau tava bāle taralasarojākṣi tāvakaṃ cakṣuḥ /
analyzed: kaṭhina kucau tava bāle tarala saroja akṣi tāvakam cakṣuḥ

original: MSS_8360-2 kuṭilasukeśi kacās te mithyā bhaṇitaṃ kṛśāṅgi tava madhyam //
analyzed: kuṭila su keśi kacāḥ te mithyā bhaṇitam kṛśa aṅgi tava madhyam

original: MSS_8361-1 kaṭhinataradāmaveṣṭana- lekhāsaṃdehadāyino yasya /
analyzed: kaṭhinatara dāma veṣṭana lekhā saṃdeha dāyinaḥ yasya

original: MSS_8361-2 rājanti valivibhaṅgāḥ sa pātu dāmodaro bhavataḥ //
analyzed: rājanti vali vibhaṅgāḥ sa pātu dāmodaraḥ bhavataḥ

original: MSS_8362-1 kaṭhinasyāpi hṛdayaṃ guṇavānārdrayed dṛśā /
analyzed: kaṭhinasya api hṛdayam guṇavān ārdrayet dṛśā

original: MSS_8362-2 candrakāntopalaṃ candraḥ svāṃśubhirdrāvayatyasau //
analyzed: candrakānta upalam candraḥ sva aṃśubhiḥ drāvayati asau

original: MSS_8363-1 kaṭhinahṛdaye muñca krodhaṃ sukhapratighātakaṃ likhati divasaṃ yātaṃ yātaṃ yamaḥ kila mānini /
analyzed: kaṭhina hṛdaye muñca krodham sukha pratighātakam likhati divasam yātam yātam yamaḥ kila mānini

original: MSS_8363-2 vayasi taruṇe naitad yuktaṃ cale ca samāgame bhavati kalaho yāvat tāvad varaṃ subhage ratam //
analyzed: vayasi taruṇe nā etat yuktam cale ca samāgame bhavati kalahaḥ yāvat tāvat varam subhage ratam

original: MSS_8364-1 kaṭhinahṛdaye muñca bhrāntiṃ vyalīkakathāśrayāṃ piśunavacanairduḥkhaṃ netuṃ na yuktamimaṃ janam /
analyzed: kaṭhina hṛdaye muñca bhrāntim vyalīka kathā āśrayām piśuna vacanaiḥ duḥkham netum na yuktam imam janam

original: MSS_8364-2 kimidamatha vā satyaṃ mugdhe tvayādya viniścitaṃ yadabhirucitaṃ tan me kṛtvā priye sukhamāsyatām //
analyzed: kim idam atha vā satyam mugdhe tvayā adya viniścitam yat abhirucitam tat me kṛtvā priye sukham āsyatām

original: MSS_8365-1 kaṭhināstīkṣṇavaktrāśca tīkṣṇodarkās tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kaṭhināḥ tīkṣṇa vaktrāḥ ca tīkṣṇa udarkāḥ tathā eva ca

original: MSS_8365-2 gaṇakaiḥ kiṃ nu lekhanyas tā vā kiṃ te vinirmitāḥ //
analyzed: gaṇakaiḥ kim nu lekhanyaḥ tāḥ vā kim te vinirmitāḥ

original: MSS_8366-1 kaṭhine durgame vāso guptaśaktiprakāśanam /
analyzed: kaṭhine durgame vāsaḥ gupta śakti prakāśanam

original: MSS_8366-2 raṇe putraḥ yathā śocyaḥ kalahaṃ veśyayā saha //
analyzed: raṇe putraḥ yathā śocyaḥ kalaham veśyayā saha

original: MSS_8367-1 kaṭhoranakharāhatadviradakumbhapīṭhasthalī- luṭhadrudhirarañjitollalitakesaraḥ kesarī /
analyzed: kaṭhora nakhara āhata dvirada kumbha pīṭha sthalī luṭhat rudhira rañjita ullalita kesaraḥ kesarī

original: MSS_8367-2 gabhīraravakātarāturatarāturavyāhṛtaiḥ patan hariṇakaiḥ samaṃ samarabhūmikāṃ lajjate //
analyzed: gabhīra rava kātara āturatara ātura vyāhṛtaiḥ patan hariṇakaiḥ samam samara bhūmikām lajjate

original: MSS_8368-1 kaṭhorapārāvatakaṇṭhamecakaṃ vapurvūṣaskandhasubandhurāṃsakam /
analyzed: kaṭhora pārāvata kaṇṭha mecakam vapuḥ vūṣa skandha subandhura aṃsakam

original: MSS_8368-2 prasannarsihastimitaṃ ca vīkṣitaṃ dhvaniśca maṅgalyamṛdaṅgamāṃsalaḥ //
analyzed: prasanna ṛsi hasti mitam ca vīkṣitam dhvaniḥ ca maṅgalya mṛdaṅga māṃsalaḥ

original: MSS_8369-1 kaṭhorāsthigranthivyatikararaṇatkāramukharaḥ kharasnāyucchedakṣaṇavihitavegavyupaśamaḥ /
analyzed: kaṭhora asthi granthi vyatikara raṇatkāra mukharaḥ khara snāyu cheda kṣaṇa vihita vega vyupaśamaḥ

original: MSS_8369-2 nirātaṅkaḥ paṅkeṣviva piśitapiṇḍeṣu vilasa- nnasirgātraṃ gātraṃ sapadi lavaśas te vikiratu //
analyzed: nirātaṅkaḥ paṅkeṣu iva piśita piṇḍeṣu vilasan nasiḥ gātram gātram sapadi lavaśas te vikiratu

original: MSS_8370-1 kaṇa iva purāṃ vahnerbhasmāvadhūlanasaṅgato jayati bahalālokasphārāvadhūtaniśodayaḥ /
analyzed: kaṇaḥ iva purām vahneḥ bhasma avadhūlana saṅgataḥ jayati bahala āloka sphāra avadhūta niśā udayaḥ

original: MSS_8370-2 smaraharajaṭābandhagranthirbhujaṅgaphaṇāmaṇi- stridaśataṭinīpūrānītaḥ sphuranniva tārakaḥ //
analyzed: smarahara jaṭā bandha granthiḥ bhujaṅga phaṇā maṇiḥ tridaśa taṭinī pūra ānītaḥ sphuran iva tārakaḥ

original: MSS_8371-1 kaṇācāmatuṣāṅgārān yatnena parirakṣasi /
analyzed: kaṇā ācāma tuṣa aṅgārān yatnena parirakṣasi

original: MSS_8371-2 mūṣakāpahṛtaṃ koṣe ratnarāśiṃ na paśyasi //
analyzed: mūṣaka apahṛtam koṣe ratna rāśim na paśyasi

original: MSS_8372-1 kaṇṭakasya tu bhagnasya dantasya calitasya ca /
analyzed: kaṇṭakasya tu bhagnasya dantasya calitasya ca

original: MSS_8372-2 amātyasya ca duṣṭasya mūlāduddharaṇaṃ sukham //
analyzed: amātyasya ca duṣṭasya mūlāt uddharaṇam sukham

original: MSS_8373-1 kaṇṭakān kūpamagniṃ ca varjayanti yathā narāḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭakān kūpam agnim ca varjayanti yathā narāḥ

original: MSS_8373-2 tathā nṛśaṃsakarmāṇaṃ varjayanti narā naram //
analyzed: tathā nṛśaṃsa karmāṇam varjayanti narāḥ naram

original: MSS_8374-1 kaṇṭakāvaraṇaṃ yādṛk phalitasya phalāptaye /
analyzed: kaṇṭaka āvaraṇam yādṛś phalitasya phala āptaye

original: MSS_8374-2 tādṛg durjanasaṅgo'pi sādhusaṅgāya bādhanam //
analyzed: tādṛś durjana saṅgaḥ upi sādhu saṅgāya bādhanam

original: MSS_8375-1 kaṇṭakitatanuśarīrā lajjāmukulāyamānanayaneyam /
analyzed: kaṇṭakita tanu śarīrā lajjā mukulāyamāna nayanā iyam

original: MSS_8375-2 tava kumudinīva vāñchati nṛcandra bālā karasparśam //
analyzed: tava kumudinī iva vāñchati nṛ candra bālā kara sparśam

original: MSS_8376-1 kaṇṭakenāpi ye spṛṣṭā yānti kāmapi vikriyām /
analyzed: kaṇṭakena api ye spṛṣṭāḥ yānti kām api vikriyām

original: MSS_8376-2 te'pi śastranikṛntasya paśormāṃsāni bhuñjate //
analyzed: te api śastra nikṛntasya paśoḥ māṃsāni bhuñjate

original: MSS_8377-1 kaṇṭakenāpi viddhasya mahatī vedanā bhavet /
analyzed: kaṇṭakena api viddhasya mahatī vedanā bhavet

original: MSS_8377-2 cakrabhīṣaṇakhaḍgādyair māryamāṇasya kiṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: cakra bhīṣaṇa khaḍga ādyaiḥ māryamāṇasya kim punar

original: MSS_8378-1 kaṇṭakairiva vidāritapādaḥ padminīparicitairaparādreḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭakaiḥ iva vidārita pādaḥ padminī paricitaiḥ apara adreḥ

original: MSS_8378-2 āruroha sarasīruhabandhuḥ skandhamambudhitaṭīgamanāya //
analyzed: āruroha sarasīruha bandhuḥ skandham ambudhi taṭī gamanāya

original: MSS_8378A-1 kaṇṭako dārukhaṇḍaṃ ca vitanoti galavyathām /
analyzed: kaṇṭakaḥ dāru khaṇḍam ca vitanoti gala vyathām

original: MSS_8378A-2 vyañjanāntarnipatitas tālu vidhyati vṛścikaḥ //
analyzed: vyañjana antar nipatitaḥ tālu vidhyati vṛścikaḥ

original: MSS_8379-1 kaṇṭakyakaṇṭakānāṃ vyatyāse'mbhastribhiḥ karaiḥ paścāt /
analyzed: kaṇṭakī akaṇṭakānām vyatyāsa imbhaḥ tribhiḥ karaiḥ paścāt

original: MSS_8379-2 khātvā puruṣatritayaṃ tribhāgayuktaṃ dhanaṃ vā syāt //
analyzed: khātvā puruṣa tritayam tri bhāga yuktam dhanam vā syāt

original: MSS_8380-1 kaṇṭārikāyā anyoktiḥ saṇānyoktirudāhṛtā /
MSS_8380-2 dhattūrapādapānyoktir avadheyā tṛṇoktayaḥ //
MSS_8381-1 kaṇṭhakoṇaviniviṣṭamīśa te kālakūṭamapi me mahāmṛtam /
analyzed: kaṇṭha koṇa viniviṣṭam īśa te kālakūṭam api me mahā amṛtam

original: MSS_8381-2 apyupāttamamṛtaṃ bhavadvapur- bhedavṛtti yadi me na rocate //
analyzed: api upāttam amṛtam bhavat vapuḥ bheda vṛtti yadi me na rocate

original: MSS_8382-1 kaṇṭhagatairapyasubhiḥ kasyātmā nopasarpate jātu /
analyzed: kaṇṭha gataiḥ api asubhiḥ kasya ātmā na upasarpate jātu

original: MSS_8382-2 mūrkhasya viṣādasya ca garvasya tathā kṛtaghnasya //
analyzed: mūrkhasya viṣādasya ca garvasya tathā kṛtaghnasya

original: MSS_8383-1 kaṇṭhagrahaṃ na vātyeva bhartuḥ kruddhāpi yatnataḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭha graham na vāti eva bhartuḥ kruddhā api yatnataḥ

original: MSS_8383-2 kaṅkaṇaśreṇikevāsau doṣamevāvalambate //
analyzed: kaṅkaṇa śreṇikā iva asau doṣam eva avalambate

original: MSS_8384-1 unmatteva pramatteva prahṛṣṭevātureva ca /
analyzed: unmattā iva pramattā iva prahṛṣṭā iva āturā iva ca

original: MSS_8384-2 na śakyopāsituṃ rāmā prauḍhaṃ yauvanamāśritā //
analyzed: na śakyā upāsitum rāmā prauḍham yauvanam āśritā

original: MSS_8385-1 sukhaduḥkhapradāyinyas tṛtīye yauvane sthitāḥ /
analyzed: sukha duḥkha pradāyinyaḥ tṛtīye yauvane sthitāḥ

original: MSS_8385-2 jāyante gahanā rāmāḥ saṃsārasyeva rītayaḥ //
analyzed: jāyante gahanāḥ rāmāḥ saṃsārasya iva rītayaḥ

original: MSS_8386-1 kaṇṭhagrahe śithilatāṃ gamite kathaṃcid yo manyate maraṇameva sukhābhyupāyam /
analyzed: kaṇṭha grahe śithila tām gamite kathaṃcid yaḥ manyate maraṇam eva sukha abhyupāyam

original: MSS_8386-2 gacchan sa eṣa na balād vidhṛto yuvābhyām ityujjhite bhujalate valayairivāsyāḥ //
analyzed: gacchan saḥ eṣa na balāt vidhṛtaḥ yuvābhyām iti ujjhite bhuja late valayaiḥ iva asyāḥ

original: MSS_8387-1 kaṇṭhacchāyamiṣeṇa kalparajanīmuttaṃsamandākinī- rūpeṇa pralayābdhimūrdhvanayanavyājena kalpānalam /
analyzed: kaṇṭha chāya miṣeṇa kalpa rajanīm uttaṃsa mandākinī rūpeṇa pralaya abdhim ūrdhva nayana vyājena kalpa analam

original: MSS_8387-2 bhūṣāpannagakelipānakapaṭādekonapañcāśa taṃ vātānapyupasaṃharannavatu vaḥ kalpāntaśāntau śivaḥ //
analyzed: bhūṣā pannaga keli pānaka paṭāt ekonapañcāśa tam vātān api upasaṃharan avatu vaḥ kalpānta śāntau śivaḥ

original: MSS_8388-1 kaṇṭhacchedaviśīryamāṇarudhiraprāgbhārabhagn adyuter yena smeramukhena homaśikhinaḥ saṃdhukṣaṇākāṅkṣiṇā /
analyzed: kaṇṭha cheda viśīryamāṇa rudhira prāgbhāra bhagn adyuteḥ yena smera mukhena homa śikhinaḥ saṃdhukṣaṇa ākāṅkṣiṇā

original: MSS_8388-2 bhrūbhaṅgaḥ śitikaṇṭhakaṇṭhaphaṇine phūtkārahetoḥ kṛtaḥ śauṭīryavratatuṣṭadhūrjaṭirasau kiṃ varṇyate rāvaṇaḥ //
analyzed: bhrū bhaṅgaḥ śitikaṇṭha kaṇṭha phaṇine phūtkāra hetoḥ kṛtaḥ śauṭīrya vrata tuṣṭa dhūrjaṭiḥ asau kim varṇyate rāvaṇaḥ

original: MSS_8389-1 kaṇṭhacchede suvarṇaṃ cet kṣuraṃ yadvaddhitaṃ na hi /
analyzed: kaṇṭha chede suvarṇam ced kṣuram yadvat hitam na hi

original: MSS_8389-2 bandhurapyapakārī cet sarvaistyājyas tathaiva saḥ //
analyzed: bandhuḥ api apakārī ced sarvaiḥ tyājyaḥ tathā eva saḥ

original: MSS_8390-1 kaṇṭhamākuñcya hṛdaye sthāpayed dṛḍhamicchayā /
analyzed: kaṇṭham ākuñcya hṛdaye sthāpayet dṛḍham icchayā

original: MSS_8390-2 jālaṃdharo bandha eṣa sudhāvyayanivāraṇaḥ //
analyzed: jālaṃdharaḥ bandhaḥ eṣa sudhā avyaya nivāraṇaḥ

original: MSS_8391-1 kaṇṭhaśriyaṃ kuvalayastabakābhirāma- dāmānukārivikaṭacchavikālakūṭām /
analyzed: kaṇṭha śriyam kuvalaya stabaka abhirāma dāma anukāri vikaṭa chavi kālakūṭām

original: MSS_8391-2 bibhrat sukhāni diśatādupahārapīta- dhūpotthadhūmamalināmiva dhūrjaṭirvaḥ //
analyzed: bibhrat sukhāni diśatāt upahāra pīta dhūpa uttha dhūma malinām iva dhūrjaṭiḥ vaḥ

original: MSS_8392-1 kaṇṭhaśleṣaṃ samāsādya tasyāḥ prabhraṣṭayānayā /
analyzed: kaṇṭha śleṣam samāsādya tasyāḥ prabhraṣṭayā anayā

original: MSS_8392-2 tulyāvasthā sakhīveyaṃ tanurāśvāsyate mama //
analyzed: tulya avasthā sakhī iva iyam tanuḥ āśvāsyate mama

original: MSS_8393-1 kaṇṭhasaktamṛdubāhubandhanaṃ nyastapādatalamagrapādayoḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭha sakta mṛdu bāhu bandhanam nyasta pāda talam agra pādayoḥ

original: MSS_8393-2 prārthayanta śayanotthitaṃ priyās taṃ niśātyayavisargacumbanam //
analyzed: prārthayanta śayana utthitam priyāḥ tam niśā atyaya visarga cumbanam

original: MSS_8394-1 kaṇṭhas tasyāḥ kuvalaydṛśaḥ kāñcanaḥ ko'pi kambur lāvaṇyāmbusmaranarapaterarghyamāviḥ karoti /
analyzed: kaṇṭhaḥ tasyāḥ kuvalay dṛśaḥ kāñcanaḥ kaḥ api kambuḥ lāvaṇya ambu smara narapateḥ arghyam āvis karoti

original: MSS_8394-2 tisro rekhāstribhuvanajayavyañjikās tatra tat kiṃ na syānmadhye trivaliracanā paunaruktyāya dhātuḥ //
analyzed: tisraḥ rekhāḥ tribhuvana jaya vyañjikāḥ tatra tat kim na syāt madhye trivali racanā paunaruktyāya dhātuḥ

original: MSS_8395-1 kaṇṭhasthā yā bhaved vidyā sā prakāśyā sadā budhaiḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭha sthā yā bhavet vidyā sā prakāśyā sadā budhaiḥ

original: MSS_8395-2 yā gurau pustake vidyā tayā mūḍhaḥ pratāryate //
analyzed: yā gurau pustake vidyā tayā mūḍhaḥ pratāryate

original: MSS_8396-1 kaṇṭhasya tasyāḥ stanabandhurasya muktākalāpasya ca nistalasya /
analyzed: kaṇṭhasya tasyāḥ stana bandhurasya muktā kalāpasya ca nistalasya

original: MSS_8396-2 anyonyaśobhājananād babhūva sādhāraṇo bhūṣaṇabhūṣyabhāvaḥ //
analyzed: anyonya śobhā jananāt babhūva sādhāraṇaḥ bhūṣaṇa bhūṣya bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_8397-1 kaṇṭhasya vidadhe kāntiṃ muktābharaṇatā yathā /
analyzed: kaṇṭhasya vidadhe kāntim muktā ābharaṇa tā yathā

original: MSS_8397-2 tasyāḥ svabhāvaramyasya muktābharaṇatā tathā //
analyzed: tasyāḥ svabhāva ramyasya muktā ābharaṇa tā tathā

original: MSS_8398-1 kaṇṭhādūrdhvaṃ viniryāti prāṇā yāñcākṣaraiḥ saha /
analyzed: kaṇṭhāt ūrdhvam viniryāti prāṇāḥ yān ca akṣaraiḥ saha

original: MSS_8398-2 dadāmītyakṣarairdātuḥ punaḥ śrotrād viśanti te //
analyzed: dadāmi iti akṣaraiḥ dātuḥ punar śrotrāt viśanti te

original: MSS_8399-1 kaṇṭhādraktaṃ pibati guṇināṃ madyamāṃsaṃ na bhuṅkte viṣṇudravyaṃ harati kurute dvādaśīṣūpavāsam /
analyzed: kaṇṭhāt raktam pibati guṇinām madya māṃsam na bhuṅkte viṣṇu dravyam harati kurute dvādaśīṣu upavāsam

original: MSS_8399-2 sāṃkhyaṃ śrutvāpaharati gavāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vṛttiṃ pāpo dambhaḥ kaliyugasakhaḥ kasya mitraṃ niyogī //
analyzed: sāṃkhyam śrutvā apaharati gavām brāhmaṇānām ca vṛttim pāpaḥ dambhaḥ kali yuga sakhaḥ kasya mitram niyogī

original: MSS_8400-1 kaṇṭhāntaḥ kvaṇitaṃ divākarakaraklāntyā rajoviplavais tannetrāñcalakuñcanaṃ śitakuśaprāntakṣataiḥ sītkṛtiḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭha antar kvaṇitam divākara kara klāntyā rajaḥ viplavaiḥ tad netra añcala kuñcanam śita kuśa prānta kṣataiḥ sītkṛtiḥ

original: MSS_8400-2 śvāsormiprabhavo vanecarabhiyā tvadvairivāmabhruvām evaṃ deva marostaṭe'pi suratakrīḍānurūpaḥ kramaḥ //
analyzed: śvāsa ūrmi prabhavaḥ vanecara bhiyā tvad vairi vāma bhruvām evam deva maroḥ taṭe pi surata krīḍā anurūpaḥ kramaḥ

original: MSS_8401-1 kaṇṭhālaṃkāraghaṇṭāghaṇaghaṇaraṇitādhmātarodaḥkaṭāhaḥ kaṇṭhekālādhirohocitaghanasubhagaṃ bhāvukasnindhapṛṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭha alaṃkāra ghaṇṭā ghaṇa ghaṇa raṇita ādhmāta rodaḥ kaṭāhaḥ kaṇṭhe kāla adhiroha ucita ghana subhagam bhāvuka snindha pṛṣṭhaḥ

original: MSS_8401-2 sākṣād dharmo vapuṣmān dhavalakakudanirdhūtakailāsakūṭaḥ kūṭastho vaḥ kakudmān nibiḍataratamaḥstomatṛṇyāṃ vitṛṇyāt //
analyzed: sākṣāt dharmaḥ vapuṣmān dhavala kakud a nirdhūta kailāsa kūṭaḥ kūṭa sthaḥ vaḥ kakudmān nibiḍatara tamaḥstoma tṛṇyām vitṛṇyāt

original: MSS_8402-1 kaṇṭhāliṅganamaṅgalaṃ ghanakucābhogopabhogotsavaṃ śroṇīsaṃgamasaubhagaṃ ca satataṃ matpreyasīnāṃ puraḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭha āliṅgana maṅgalam ghana kuca ābhoga upabhoga utsavam śroṇī saṃgama saubhagam ca satatam mad preyasīnām puras

original: MSS_8402-2 prāptuṃ ko'yamitīrṣyayeva yamunākūle balādyaḥ svayaṃ gopīnāmaharad dukūlanicayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa puṣṇātu naḥ //
analyzed: prāptum kaḥ yam iti īrṣyayā iva yamunā kūle balāt yaḥ svayam gopīnām aharat dukūla nicayam kṛṣṇaḥ sa puṣṇātu naḥ

original: MSS_8403-1 kaṇṭhāvasaktamṛdubāhulatās turaṅgād rājāvarodhanavadhūravatārayantaḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭha avasakta mṛdu bāhu latāḥ turaṅgāt rāja avarodhana vadhūḥ avatārayantaḥ

original: MSS_8403-2 āliṅganānyadhikṛtāḥ sphuṭamāpureva gaṇḍasthalīḥ śucitayā na cucumburāsām //
analyzed: āliṅganāni adhikṛtāḥ sphuṭam āpuḥ eva gaṇḍa sthalīḥ śuci tayā na cucumbuḥ āsām

original: MSS_8404-1 kaṇṭhāśleṣiṇamunnatastanabharaśroṇītaṭagrāhiṇaṃ saṃsaktoruyugaṃ gṛhītajaghanaprākāramapyantataḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭha āśleṣiṇam unnata stana bhara śroṇī taṭa grāhiṇam saṃsakta ūru yugam gṛhīta jaghana prākāram api antatas

original: MSS_8404-2 drāgeva ślathabandhaminduvadanā gāḍhāvamardāsahaṃ vijñāyātyajadāśu kāñcanapaṭaṃ vrīḍākulāpi kṣaṇam //
analyzed: drāk eva ślatha bandham indu vadanā gāḍha avamarda asaham vijñāya atyajat āśu kāñcana paṭam vrīḍā ākulā api kṣaṇam

original: MSS_8405-1 kaṇṭhe ka eṣa tava vallabha nūpuro'yaṃ tat pādabhūṣaṇamayaṃ valayas tadānīm /
analyzed: kaṇṭhe kaḥ eṣa tava vallabha nūpuraḥ iyam tat pāda bhūṣaṇam ayam valayaḥ tadānīm

original: MSS_8405-2 ityādivācyamavibhāvya vaco mṛgākṣyā jñāne'pi tadvihṛtamutsukatāṃ tanoti //
analyzed: ityādi vācyam a vibhāvya vacaḥ mṛga akṣyāḥ jñāne pi tat vihṛtam utsuka tām tanoti

original: MSS_8405A-1 kaṇṭhe kṛttāvaśeṣaṃ kanakamayamadhaḥ śṛṅkhalādāma karṣan krāntvā dvārāṇi helācalacaraṇaraṇatkiṅkaṇīcakravālaḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭhe kṛtta avaśeṣam kanaka mayam adhas śṛṅkhalā dāma karṣan krāntvā dvārāṇi helā acala caraṇa raṇat kiṅkaṇī cakravālaḥ

original: MSS_8405A-2 dattātaṅko'ṅganānāmanusṛtasaraṇiḥ saṃbhramādaśvapālaiḥ prabhraṣṭo'yaṃ plavaṅgaḥ praviśati nṛpatermandiraṃ mandurāyāḥ //
analyzed: datta ātaṅka uṅganānām anusṛta saraṇiḥ saṃbhramāt aśvapālaiḥ prabhraṣṭaḥ yam plavaṅgaḥ praviśati nṛpateḥ mandiram mandurāyāḥ

original: MSS_8406-1 kaṇṭhe gadgadatā svedo mukhe vaivarṇyavepathū /
analyzed: kaṇṭhe gadgada tā svedaḥ mukhe vaivarṇya vepathū

original: MSS_8406-2 mriyamāṇasya cihnāni yāni tānyeva yācataḥ //
analyzed: mriyamāṇasya cihnāni yāni tāni eva yācataḥ

original: MSS_8407-1 kaṇṭhe cintāmaṇirjñeyaś cintitārthapradaḥ sadā /
MSS_8407-2 āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhavaṃśe yaḥ sa sūryākhyaḥ śubhaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhavaṃśe yaḥ sa sūrya ākhyaḥ śubhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_8408-1 kaṇṭhe jīvitamānane tava guṇāḥ pāṇau kapolastanau saṃtāpastvayi mānasaṃ nayanayoracchinnadhāraṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭhe jīvitam ānane tava guṇāḥ pāṇau kapola stanau saṃtāpaḥ tvayi mānasam nayanayoḥ acchinna dhāram payaḥ

original: MSS_8408-2 sarvaṃ niṣkaruṇa tvadīyavirahe sālambanaṃ kiṃ punas tasyāḥ saṃprati jīvite bata sakhīvargo nirālambanaḥ //
analyzed: sarvam niṣkaruṇa tvadīya virahe sa ālambanam kim punar tasyāḥ saṃprati jīvite bata sakhī vargaḥ nirālambanaḥ

original: MSS_8409-1 kaṇṭhe madaḥ kodravajo hṛdi tāmbūlajo madaḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭhe madaḥ kodrava jaḥ hṛdi tāmbūla jaḥ madaḥ

original: MSS_8409-2 lakṣmīmadas tu sarvāṅge putradāramukheṣvapi //
analyzed: lakṣmī madaḥ tu sarva aṅge putra dāra mukheṣu api

original: MSS_8410-1 kaṇṭhe mauktikamālikāḥ stanataṭe kārpūramacchaṃ rajaḥ sāndraṃ candanamaṅgake valayitāḥ pāṇau mṛṇālīlatāḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭhe mauktika mālikāḥ stana taṭe kārpūram accham rajaḥ sāndram candanam aṅgake valayitāḥ pāṇau mṛṇālī latāḥ

original: MSS_8410-2 tanvī naktamiyaṃ cakāsti śucinī cīnāṃśuke bibhratī śītāṃśoradhidevateva galitā vyomāgramārohataḥ //
analyzed: tanvī naktam iyam cakāsti śucinī cīna aṃśuke bibhratī śītāṃśoḥ adhidevatā iva galitā vyoma agram ārohataḥ

original: MSS_8411-1 kaṇṭhe rajjuṃ baddhvā mṛtasya puṃsas tu rajjumādāya /
analyzed: kaṇṭhe rajjum baddhvā mṛtasya puṃsaḥ tu rajjum ādāya

original: MSS_8411-2 tasyāḥ khaṇḍaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ gaṇḍasrajaṃ harati //
analyzed: tasyāḥ khaṇḍam kaṇṭhe baddham gaṇḍa srajam harati

original: MSS_8412-1 kaṇṭhe vasantī caturā yadasyāḥ sarasvatī vādayate vipañcīm /
analyzed: kaṇṭhe vasantī caturā yat asyāḥ sarasvatī vādayate vipañcīm

original: MSS_8412-2 tadeva vāgbhūya mukhe mṛgākṣyāḥ śrotuḥ śrutau yāti sudhārasatvam //
analyzed: tat eva vāc bhūya mukhe mṛga akṣyāḥ śrotuḥ śrutau yāti sudhā rasa tvam

original: MSS_8413-1 kaṇṭhocito'pi huṃkṛti- mātranirastaḥ padāntike patitaḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭha ucitaḥ api huṃkṛti mātra nirastaḥ pada antike patitaḥ

original: MSS_8413-2 yasyāś candraśikhaḥ smara- bhallanibho jayati sā caṇḍī //
analyzed: yasyāḥ candra śikhaḥ smara bhalla nibhaḥ jayati sā caṇḍī

original: MSS_8414-1 kaṇḍūyate dakṣiṇapāṇinā cet sa sārameyo vadanaṃ tadānīm /
analyzed: kaṇḍūyate dakṣiṇa pāṇinā ced sa sārameyaḥ vadanam tadānīm

original: MSS_8414-2 bhaktaiḥ prabhūtaiḥ saha bhūmipālair bhojyāni bhakṣyāṇi ciraṃ bhavanti //
analyzed: bhaktaiḥ prabhūtaiḥ saha bhūmipālaiḥ bhojyāni bhakṣyāṇi ciram bhavanti

original: MSS_8415-1 kaṇḍūladvipagaṇḍapiṇḍakaṣaṇākamp ena sampātibhir dharmasraṃsitabandhanaiḥ svakusumairarcanti godāvarīm /
analyzed: ena sampātibhiḥ dharma sraṃsita bandhanaiḥ sva kusumaiḥ arcanti godāvarīm

original: MSS_8415-2 chāyāpaskiramāṇaviṣkiramukhavyākṛṣṭakīṭatvacaḥ kūjatklāntakapītakukkuṭakulāḥ kūle kulāyadrumāḥ //
analyzed: chāyā apaskiramāṇa viṣkira mukha vyākṛṣṭa kīṭa tvacaḥ kūjat klānta kapīta kukkuṭa kulāḥ kūle kulāya drumāḥ

original: MSS_8416-1 kaṇḍūyamānaḥ khalu dakṣiṇena hastena bhālaṃ bhaṣaṇo dadāti /
analyzed: kaṇḍūyamānaḥ khalu dakṣiṇena hastena bhālam bhaṣaṇaḥ dadāti

original: MSS_8416-2 prabhāvinamrīkṛtarājacakraṃ rājyābhiṣeke varapaṭṭabandham //
analyzed: prabhā vinamrīkṛta rāja cakram rājya abhiṣeke vara paṭṭabandham

original: MSS_8417-1 katarat purahara paruṣaṃ hālāhalakavalayācanāvacasoḥ /
analyzed: katarat pura hara paruṣam hālāhala kavala yācanā vacasoḥ

original: MSS_8417-2 ekaiva tava rasajñā tadubhayarasatāratamyajñā //
analyzed: ekā eva tava rasa jñā tad ubhaya rasa tāratamya jñā

original: MSS_8418-1 kati kati na punaścaranti hanti pratiśikharaṃ pratikānanaṃ kuraṅgāḥ /
analyzed: kati kati na punar caranti hanti prati śikharam prati kānanam kuraṅgāḥ

original: MSS_8418-2 tadapi janamanovinodahetur vilasati keṣvapi ko'pi nābhigandhaḥ //
analyzed: tat api jana manaḥ vinoda hetuḥ vilasati keṣu api kaḥ api nābhi gandhaḥ

original: MSS_8419-1 kati kati na madoddhatāścaranti pratiśikhari pratikānanaṃ kuraṅgāḥ /
analyzed: kati kati na mada uddhatāḥ caranti pratiśikhari prati kānanam kuraṅgāḥ

original: MSS_8419-2 kvacidapi punaruttamā mṛgās te madayati yan mada eva medinīśān //
analyzed: kvacid api punar uttamāḥ mṛgāḥ te madayati yat madaḥ eva medinī īśān

original: MSS_8420-1 kati kati na latāḥ kalitāḥ saṃcaratā cañcarīkarasikena /
analyzed: kati kati na latāḥ kalitāḥ saṃcaratā cañcarīka rasikena

original: MSS_8420-2 nalini bhavanmadhu madhuraṃ yat pītaṃ tat tadeva paripītam //
analyzed: nalini bhavat madhu madhuram yat pītam tat tat eva paripītam

original: MSS_8421-1 kati kati na vasante vallayaḥ śākhino vā surabhitasumanobhirbhūṣitāṅgā babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: kati kati na vasante vallayaḥ śākhinaḥ vā surabhita sumanobhiḥ bhūṣita aṅgāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: MSS_8421-2 tadapi yuvajanānāṃ prītaye kevalo'bhūd abhinavakalikālībhāraśālī rasālaḥ //
analyzed: tat api yuva janānām prītaye abhinava kali kālī bhāra śālī rasālaḥ

original: MSS_8422-1 katiciduddhatanirbharamatsarāḥ katicidātmavacaḥstutiśālinaḥ /
analyzed: katicid uddhata nirbhara matsarāḥ katicid ātma vacaḥ stuti śālinaḥ

original: MSS_8422-2 ahaha ke'pi nirakṣarakukṣayas tadiha saṃprati kaṃ prati me śramaḥ //
analyzed: ahaha ke api nirakṣara kukṣayaḥ tat iha saṃprati kam prati me śramaḥ

original: MSS_8422A-1 katicid divasāni kāṇḍaśeṣāḥ patitāśeṣapurāṇajīrṇaparṇāḥ /
analyzed: katicid divasāni kāṇḍa śeṣāḥ patita aśeṣa purāṇa jīrṇa parṇāḥ

original: MSS_8422A-2 taravastvaci garhitapravālāḥ samavāpyanta na nāmato vivektum //
analyzed: taravaḥ tvaci garhita pravālāḥ samavāpyanta na nāmataḥ vivektum

original: MSS_8423-1 katicid divasāni tayā gamitā- ni gṛhe tava saṅgamarocanayā /
analyzed: katicid divasāni tayā gamitā ni gṛhe tava saṅgama rocanayā

original: MSS_8423-2 katicid vipine nalinīśayane vacanena pikīmadamocanayā //
analyzed: katicid vipine nalinī śayane vacanena pikī mada mocanayā

original: MSS_8424-1 na vane'pi ratirbhavane'pi na yaṃ pratirūpavinirjjitarocanayā /
analyzed: na vane api ratiḥ bhavane api na yam pratirūpa vinirjjita rocanayā

original: MSS_8424-2 karuṇāvaruṇālaya kiṃ kriyatām aruṇāyatapaṅkajalocanayā //
analyzed: karuṇā varuṇālaya kim kriyatām aruṇa āyata paṅkaja locanayā

original: MSS_8425-1 kati te kabarībhāraḥ sumanaḥsaṅgāt priye'tinīlatvāt /
analyzed: kati te kabarībhāraḥ sumanaḥ saṅgāt priya iti nīla tvāt

original: MSS_8425-2 bhavati ca kalāpavattvān nijairasevyaḥ kathaṃ na syāt //
analyzed: bhavati ca kalāpavat tvāt nijaiḥ asevyaḥ katham na syāt

original: MSS_8426-1 kati na santi janā jagatītale tadapi tadvirahākulitaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: kati na santi janāḥ jagatī tale tat api tad viraha ākulitam manaḥ

original: MSS_8426-2 kati na santi niśākaratārakāḥ kamalinī malinī raviṇā vinā //
analyzed: kati na santi niśākara tārakāḥ kamalinī malinī raviṇā vinā

original: MSS_8427-1 kati na santi mahīṣu mahīruhaḥ surabhipuṣparasālaphalālayaḥ /
analyzed: kati na santi mahīṣu mahīruhaḥ surabhi puṣpa rasāla phala ālayaḥ

original: MSS_8427-2 surabhayanti na ke'pi ca bhūruhān iti yaśo'sti paraṃ tava candana //
analyzed: surabhayanti na kepi ca bhūruhān iti yaśaḥ asti param tava candana

original: MSS_8428-1 kati no viṣayā nibhālitāḥ kati vā bhūmibhujo na śīlitāḥ /
analyzed: kati naḥ viṣayāḥ nibhālitāḥ kati vā bhūmibhujaḥ na śīlitāḥ

original: MSS_8428-2 dharaṇīdhara tāvakān guṇān avadhāryājagaṇaṃ guruṃ laghum //
analyzed: dharaṇīdhara tāvakān guṇān avadhārya aja gaṇam gurum laghum

original: MSS_8429-1 katipayadivasasthāyini madakāriṇi yauvane durātmānaḥ /
analyzed: katipaya divasa sthāyini mada kāriṇi yauvane durātmānaḥ

original: MSS_8429-2 vidadhati tathāparādhaṃ janmaiva yathā vṛthā bhavati //
analyzed: vidadhati tathā aparādham janma eva yathā vṛthā bhavati

original: MSS_8430-1 kattipayadivasasthāyī pūro dūronnato'pi bhavitā te /
analyzed: kattipaya divasa sthāyī pūraḥ dūra unnataḥ api bhavitā te

original: MSS_8430-2 taṭini taṭadrumapātana- pātakamekaṃ cirasthāyi //
analyzed: taṭini taṭa druma pātana pātakam ekam cira sthāyi

original: MSS_8431-1 katipayadivasaiḥ kṣayaṃ prayāyāt kanakagiriḥ kṛtavāsarāvasānaḥ /
analyzed: katipaya divasaiḥ kṣayam prayāyāt kanakagiriḥ kṛta vāsara avasānaḥ

original: MSS_8431-2 iti mudamupayāti cakravākī vitaraṇaśālini vīrarudradeve //
analyzed: iti mudam upayāti cakravākī vitaraṇa śālini vīra rudra deve

original: MSS_8432-1 katipayanimeṣavartini janmajarāmaraṇavihvale jagati /
analyzed: katipaya nimeṣa vartini janma jarā maraṇa vihvale jagati

original: MSS_8432-2 kalpāntakoṭibandhuḥ sphurati kavīnāṃ yaśaḥprasaraḥ //
MSS_8433-1 katipayapurasvāmī kāyavyayairapi durgraho mitavitaritā mohenāho mayānusṛtaḥ purā /
analyzed: katipaya pura svāmī kāya vyayaiḥ api durgrahaḥ mita vitaritā mohena aho mayā anusṛtaḥ purā

original: MSS_8433-2 tribhuvanapatirbuddhyārādhyo'dhunā svapadapradaḥ punaradhigatas tat prācīno dunoti dinavyayaḥ //
analyzed: tribhuvana patiḥ buddhi ārādhyaḥ adhunā sva pada pradaḥ punar adhigataḥ tat prācīnaḥ dunoti dina vyayaḥ

original: MSS_8434-1 katipayasahakārapuṣparamyas tanutuhino'lpavinidrasinduvāraḥ /
analyzed: katipaya sahakāra puṣpa ramyaḥ tanu tuhina ulpa vinidra sinduvāraḥ

original: MSS_8434-2 surabhimukhahimāgamāntaśaṃsī samupayayau śiśiraḥ smaraikabandhuḥ //
analyzed: surabhi mukha hima āgama anta śaṃsī samupayayau śiśiraḥ smara eka bandhuḥ

original: MSS_8435-1 kati pallavitā na puṣpitā vā taravaḥ santi samantato vasante /
analyzed: kati pallavitāḥ na puṣpitāḥ vā taravaḥ santi samantataḥ vasante

original: MSS_8435-2 jagato vijaye tu puṣpaketoḥ sahakārī sahakāra eka eva //
analyzed: jagataḥ vijaye tu puṣpaketoḥ sahakārī sahakāraḥ ekaḥ eva

original: MSS_8436-1 katiṣu na kṛtā sevā ke vā na vāgvibhavaiḥ stutās tṛṇamapi guṇaprītaḥ prādānna ko'pi vipaścitām /
analyzed: katiṣu na kṛtā sevā ke vā na vāc vibhavaiḥ stutāḥ tṛṇam api guṇa prītaḥ prādāt na kaḥ api vipaścitām

original: MSS_8436-2 ayamiha paraṃ duḥkhajvālākalāpamakhaṇḍayat kanakapayasāṃ dhārādaṇḍairakāṇḍaghanāghanaḥ //
analyzed: ayam iha param duḥkha jvālā kalāpam akhaṇḍayat kanaka payasām dhārā daṇḍaiḥ akāṇḍa ghanāghanaḥ

original: MSS_8437-1 kati santi nonnatibhṛtas taravas tadapi tvameva gurukīrtivaraḥ /
analyzed: kati santi nā unnati bhṛtaḥ taravaḥ tat api tvam eva guru kīrti varaḥ

original: MSS_8437-2 nibiḍādaraṃ navamarandaharaḥ sahakāra kāraṇamiha bhramaraḥ //
analyzed: nibiḍa ādaram nava maranda haraḥ sahakāra kāraṇam iha bhramaraḥ

original: MSS_8438-1 kati santi latā vipine kusuma- stavakānamitāḥ khalu pallavitāḥ /
analyzed: kati santi latā vipine kusuma stavaka ānamitāḥ khalu pallavitāḥ

original: MSS_8438-2 praticampakacandananīpavanī- navapaṅkajinīmadhusaṃvalitāḥ //
MSS_8439-1 suciraṃ kusumeṣu paribhramatā na ca mālati kāpi tathā militā /
analyzed: su ciram kusumeṣu paribhramatā na ca mālati kā api tathā militā

original: MSS_8439-2 madhupena punarmadhupānavidhau hṛdaye na yathā bhavatī kalitā //
analyzed: madhupena punar madhu pāna vidhau hṛdaye na yathā bhavatī kalitā

original: MSS_8440-1 kati santi lavaṅgalatā lalitā navakorakitā dharaṇīsutale /
analyzed: kati santi lavaṅga latāḥ lalitāḥ nava korakitāḥ dharaṇī su tale

original: MSS_8440-2 kati bandhuragandhabhṛtas taravo guravo nivasanti girau malaye //
analyzed: kati bandhura gandha bhṛtaḥ taravaḥ guravaḥ nivasanti girau malaye

original: MSS_8441-1 katyakṣīṇi karoṭayaḥ kati kati dvīpidvipānāṃ tvacaḥ kākolāḥ kati pannagāḥ kati sudhādhāmnaśca khaṇḍāḥ kati /
analyzed: kati akṣīṇi karoṭayaḥ kati kati dvīpi dvipānām tvacaḥ kākolāḥ kati pannagāḥ kati sudhā dhāmnaḥ ca khaṇḍāḥ kati

original: MSS_8441-2 kiṃ ca tvaṃ ca kati trilokajanani tvadvāripūrodare majjajjantukadambakaṃ samudayatyekaikamādāya yat //
analyzed: kim ca tvam ca kati triloka janani tvad vāripūra udare majjat jantu kadambakam samudayati ekaikam ādāya yat

original: MSS_8442-1 katyaśvāḥ kati dhenavaḥ kati gajāḥ katyadbhutāḥ pādapāḥ sundaryaḥ kati susruvaḥ kati mahāratnānyanardhyāṇyapi /
analyzed: kati aśvāḥ kati dhenavaḥ kati gajāḥ kati adbhutāḥ pādapāḥ sundaryaḥ kati susruvaḥ kati mahā ratnāni anardhyāṇi api

original: MSS_8442-2 jātaikā kila kanyakā jalanidherdātuṃ prasaktā yadā sarvaṃ tad vyayitaṃ tadā pariṇatau nāmaikamuccheṣitam //
analyzed: jātā ekā kila kanyakā jalanidheḥ dātum prasaktā yadā sarvam tat vyayitam tadā pariṇatau nāma ekam uccheṣitam

original: MSS_8443-1 kathaṃcit kālidāsasya kālena bahunā mayā /
analyzed: kathaṃcid kālidāsasya kālena bahunā mayā

original: MSS_8443-2 avagāḍheva gambhīramasṛṇaudhā sarasvatī //
analyzed: avagāḍhā iva gambhīra masṛṇa odhā sarasvatī

original: MSS_8444-1 kathaṃcidahni hṛdaye kuśalairviniveśitā /
analyzed: kathaṃcid ahni hṛdaye kuśalaiḥ viniveśitā

original: MSS_8444-2 śikṣā gaurakhareṇeva rājñā vismāryate niśi //
analyzed: śikṣā gaura khareṇa iva rājñā vismāryate niśi

original: MSS_8445-1 kathaṃcin naidāghe divasa iva kope vigalite prasattau prāptāyāṃ tadanu ca niśāyāmiva śanaiḥ /
analyzed: kathaṃcid naidāghe divase iva kope vigalite prasattau prāptāyām tadanu ca niśāyām iva śanais

original: MSS_8445-2 smitajyotsnārambhakṣapitavirahadhvāntanivaho mukhendurmāninyāḥ sphurati kṛtapuṇyasya surate //
analyzed: smita jyotsnā ārambha kṣapita viraha dhvānta nivahaḥ mukha induḥ māninyāḥ sphurati kṛta puṇyasya surate

original: MSS_8446-1 kathaṃ te tyaktasadvṛttāḥ sukhaṃ rātriṣu śerate /
analyzed: katham te tyakta sat vṛttāḥ sukham rātriṣu śerate

original: MSS_8446-2 maraṇāntaritā yeṣāṃ narakeṣūpapattayaḥ //
analyzed: maraṇa antaritāḥ yeṣām narakeṣu upapattayaḥ

original: MSS_8447-1 kathaṃ tvadupalambhāśāvihatāviha tādṛśī /
analyzed: katham tvad upalambha āśā vihatau iha tādṛśī

original: MSS_8447-2 avasthā nālamāroḍhum aṅganāmaṅganāśinī //
analyzed: avasthā na alam āroḍhum aṅganām aṅga nāśinī

original: MSS_8447A-1 kathaṃ na ramate cittaṃ dharme'nekasukhaprade /
analyzed: katham na ramate cittam dharmena eka sukha prade

original: MSS_8447A-2 jīvānāṃ duḥkhabhīrūṇāṃ prāyo mithyādṛśo yataḥ //
analyzed: jīvānām duḥkha bhīrūṇām prāyas mithyādṛśaḥ yatas

original: MSS_8448-1 kathaṃ na lajjitastādṛk savitā tejasāṃ nidhiḥ /
analyzed: katham na lajjitaḥ tādṛś savitā tejasām nidhiḥ

original: MSS_8448-2 brahmāṇḍakhaṇḍikāṃ prāpya kurvan pādaprasārikām //
analyzed: brahmāṇḍa khaṇḍikām prāpya kurvan pāda prasārikām

original: MSS_8449-1 kathaṃ nāma na sevyante yatnataḥ parameśvarāḥ /
analyzed: katham nāma na sevyante yatnataḥ parameśvarāḥ

original: MSS_8449-2 acireṇaiva ye tuṣṭāḥ pūrayanti manorathān //
analyzed: acireṇa eva ye tuṣṭāḥ pūrayanti manorathān

original: MSS_8450-1 kathaṃ nu taṃ bandhurakomalāṅguliṃ karaṃ vihāyāsi nimagnamambhasi /
analyzed: katham nu tam bandhura komala aṅgulim karam vihāya asi nimagnam ambhasi

original: MSS_8450-2 acetanaṃ nāma guṇaṃ na lakṣayen mayaiva kasmādavadhīritā priyā //
analyzed: acetanam nāma guṇam na lakṣayet mayā eva kasmāt avadhīritā priyā

original: MSS_8451-1 kathaṃ nu putrāḥ pitaraṃ hanyuḥ kasyāṃcidāpadi /
analyzed: katham nu putrāḥ pitaram hanyuḥ kasyāṃcid āpadi

original: MSS_8451-2 bhrātā vā bhrātaraṃ hanyāt saumitre prāṇamātmānaḥ //
analyzed: bhrātā vā bhrātaram hanyāt saumitre prāṇam ātmānaḥ

original: MSS_8452-1 kathaṃ nyāyyamanuṣṭhānaṃ mādṛśaḥ pratiṣedhatu /
analyzed: katham nyāyyam anuṣṭhānam mādṛśaḥ pratiṣedhatu

original: MSS_8452-2 kathaṃ vābhyanujānātu sāhasaikarasāṃ kriyām //
analyzed: katham vā abhyanujānātu sāhasa eka rasām kriyām

original: MSS_8453-1 kathaṃ nvidaṃ kamalaviśālalocane gṛhaṃ ghanaiḥ pihitakare niśākare /
analyzed: katham nu idam kamala viśāla locane gṛham ghanaiḥ pihita kare niśākare

original: MSS_8453-2 acintayantyabhinavavarṣavidyutas tvamāgatā sutanu yathā prabhāvatī //
analyzed: a cintayantī abhinava varṣa vidyutaḥ tvam āgatā su tanu yathā prabhāvatī

original: MSS_8454-1 kathaṃ caiṣā tanvī prakṛtisukumārāṅgalatikā pragalbhavyāpāraṃ ratikalahakhedaṃ viṣahate /
analyzed: katham ca eṣā tanvī prakṛti sukumāra aṅga latikā pragalbha vyāpāram rati kalaha khedam viṣahate

original: MSS_8454-2 nalinyāstigmo'pi prabhavati sukhāyaiva savitā prakṛṣṭe premṇyevaṃ kimiva na sahante yuvatayaḥ //
analyzed: nalinyāḥ tigmaḥ upi prabhavati sukhāya eva savitā prakṛṣṭe premṇi evam kim iva na sahante yuvatayaḥ

original: MSS_8455-1 kathaṃ priyāyā anukampitāyāḥ saṅgaṃ rahasyaṃ rucirāṃśca mantrān /
analyzed: katham priyāyāḥ anukampitāyāḥ saṅgam rahasyam rucirān ca mantrān

original: MSS_8455-2 suhṛtsu ca snehasitaḥ śiśūnāṃ kalākṣarāṇāmanuraktacittaḥ //
analyzed: suhṛtsu ca sneha sitaḥ śiśūnām kalā akṣarāṇām anurakta cittaḥ

original: MSS_8456-1 putrān smaraṃstā duhit rhṛdasyā bhrāt n svas rvā pitarau ca dīnau /
analyzed: putrān smaraṃstā duhit rhṛdasyā bhrāt n svas rvā pitarau ca dīnau

original: MSS_8456-2 gṛhān manojñoruparicchadāṃśca vṛttīśca kulyāḥ paśubhṛtyavargān //
analyzed: gṛhān manojña ūru paricchadān ca vṛttīḥ ca kulyāḥ paśu bhṛtya vargān

original: MSS_8457-1 kathaṃ bhāryāmṛte dharmam arthaṃ vā puruṣaḥ prabho /
analyzed: katham bhāryām ṛte dharmam artham vā puruṣaḥ prabho

original: MSS_8457-2 prāpnoti kāmamatha vā tasyāṃ tritayamāhitam //
analyzed: prāpnoti kāmam atha vā tasyām tritayam āhitam

original: MSS_8458-1 tathaiva bhartāramṛte bhāryā dharmādisādhane /
analyzed: tathā eva bhartāram ṛte bhāryā dharma ādi sādhane

original: MSS_8458-2 na samarthā trivargo'yaṃ dāmpatyaṃ samupāśritaḥ //
analyzed: na samarthā trivargaḥ yaḥ dāmpatyam samupāśritaḥ

original: MSS_8459-1 kathaṃ mamorasi kṛtapakṣaniḥsvanaḥ śilīmukho'pahitaditi (?)
analyzed: katham mama urasi kṛta pakṣa niḥsvanaḥ

original: jalpati priye /
analyzed: jalpati priye

original: MSS_8459-2 nivṛtya kiṃ kimiti bruvāṇayānayā sasādhvasaṃ kupitamamoci kāntayā //
analyzed: nivṛtya kim kim iti bruvāṇayā anayā sa sādhvasam kupitam amoci kāntayā

original: MSS_8460-1 kathaṃ mugdhe kathaṃ vakre kāntāyās te vilocane /
analyzed: katham mugdhe katham vakre kāntāyāḥ te vilocane

original: MSS_8460-2 kathaṃ janānurāgāya kathaṃ janavipattaye //
analyzed: katham jana anurāgāya katham jana vipattaye

original: MSS_8461-1 kathaṃ yateta manujau bhinnaiva prakṛtiryataḥ /
analyzed: katham yateta manujau bhinnā eva prakṛtiḥ yatas

original: MSS_8461-2 ekasthānasamutpanna sudhākṣveḍabhidā smṛtā //
MSS_8462-1 kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet /
analyzed: katham rājā sthitaḥ dharme para dārān parāmṛśet

original: MSS_8462-2 rakṣaṇīyā viśeṣeṇa rājadārā mahābala //
analyzed: rakṣaṇīyāḥ viśeṣeṇa rāja dārāḥ mahā bala

original: MSS_8463-1 kathaṃ vilokeyamamuṃ yuvānaṃ kumudvatībandhumivojjihānam /
analyzed: katham vilokeyam amum yuvānam kumudvatī bandhum iva ujjihānam

original: MSS_8463-2 bhartuḥ svasā bhādracaturthikeva kalaṅkayatyardhavilokane'pi //
analyzed: bhartuḥ svasā bhādra caturthikā iva

original: MSS_8464-1 kathaṃ vīthīmasmānupadiśasi dharmapraṇayinīṃ prasīda svāṃ śiṣyāmatikhalamukhīṃ śādhi muralīm /
analyzed: katham vīthīm asmān upadiśasi dharma praṇayinīm prasīda svām śiṣyām ati khala mukhīm śādhi muralīm

original: MSS_8464-2 harantī maryādāṃ śiva śiva pare puṃsi hṛdayaṃ nayantī dhṛṣṭeyaṃ yaduvara yathā nāhvayati naḥ //
