analyzed: harantī maryādām śiva śiva pare puṃsi hṛdayam nayantī dhṛṣṭā iyam yadu vara yathā na āhvayati naḥ

original: MSS_8465-1 kathaṃ saṃbodhyate rājā sugrīvasya ca kā priyā /
analyzed: katham saṃbodhyate rājā sugrīvasya ca kā priyā

original: MSS_8465-2 nirdhanāḥ kiṃ ca vāñchanti kiṃ kurvanti manīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: nirdhanāḥ kim ca vāñchanti kim kurvanti manīṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_8466-1 kathaṃ sa dantarahitaḥ sūryaḥ sūribhirucyate /
analyzed: katham sa danta rahitaḥ sūryaḥ sūribhiḥ ucyate

original: MSS_8466-2 yo mīnarāśiṃ muktaiva meṣaṃ bhoktuṃ samudyataḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ mīna rāśim muktā eva meṣam bhoktum samudyataḥ

original: MSS_8467-1 kathanena vināpyāśāṃ pūrayanti hi sādhavaḥ /
analyzed: kathanena vinā api āśām pūrayanti hi sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_8467-2 pratigehaṃ bhāsate hi vivasvān kathanaṃ vinā //
analyzed: pratigeham bhāsate hi vivasvān kathanam vinā

original: MSS_8468-1 kathamagaṇitapūrvaṃ drakṣyate taṃ narendraḥ kathamapuruṣavākyaṃ śroṣyate siddhavākyaḥ /
analyzed: katham agaṇita pūrvam drakṣyate tam narendraḥ katham apuruṣa vākyam śroṣyate siddha vākyaḥ

original: MSS_8468-2 kathamaviṣayavanghyaṃ dhārayiṣyatyamarṣaṃ praṇipatati niruddhaḥ satkṛto dharṣito vā //
analyzed: katham aviṣaya vanghyam dhārayiṣyati amarṣam praṇipatati niruddhaḥ satkṛtaḥ dharṣitaḥ vā

original: MSS_8469-1 kathamadya kathaṃ ca śva iti jīvanacintayā /
analyzed: katham adya katham ca śvas iti jīvana cintayā

original: MSS_8469-2 yā kṛthā hā vṛthā dainyam āyurantaṃ prayacchati //
analyzed: yā hā vṛthā dainyam āyuḥ antam prayacchati

original: MSS_8470-1 kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prakalpitamaśrutam /
analyzed: katham api kṛta pratyāpattau priye skhalita uttare viraha kṛśayā kṛtvā vyājam prakalpitam aśrutam

original: MSS_8470-2 asahanasakhīśrotraprāptiṃ viśaṅkya sasaṃbhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā śūnye gehe samucchvasitaṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: asahana sakhī śrotra prāptim viśaṅkya sa saṃbhramam vivalita dṛśā śūnye gehe samucchvasitam punar

original: MSS_8471-1 kathamapi tava vṛndāraṇyamāhātmyavṛndaṃ na hi kathayitumuccairīśvaro'pyīśvaraḥ syāt /
analyzed: katham api tava vṛndāraṇya māhātmya vṛndam na hi kathayitum uccais īśvaraḥ api īśvaraḥ syāt

original: MSS_8471-2 api ca tṛṇaphalānāṃ yasya lubdho rasāya prabhuramṛtabhujāmapyāśrayad vatsabhāvam //
analyzed: api ca tṛṇa phalānām yasya lubdhaḥ rasāya prabhuḥ amṛta bhujām api āśrayat vatsa bhāvam

original: MSS_8472-1 kathamapi na niṣiddho duḥkhinā bhīruṇā vā drupadatanayapāṇis tena pitrā mamādya /
analyzed: katham api na niṣiddhaḥ duḥkhinā bhīruṇā vā drupada tanaya pāṇiḥ tena pitrā mama adya

original: MSS_8472-2 tava bhujabaladarpādhyāyamānasya vāmaḥ śirasi caraṇa eṣa nyasyate vārayainam //
analyzed: tava bhuja bala darpa ādhyāyamānasya vāmaḥ śirasi caraṇaḥ eṣa nyasyate vāraya enam

original: MSS_8473-1 kathamapi paricitamudrā bhujabhudrāsaṅgataṃ svapne /
analyzed: katham api paricita mudrāḥ bhuja bhudrā saṅga tam svapne

original: MSS_8473-2 uṣasi nimīlatanayanā śayanāntaḥ kāntamāmṛṣati //
analyzed: uṣasi nimīlata nayanā śayana antar kāntam āmṛṣati

original: MSS_8474-1 kathamapi sakhi krīḍākopād vrajeti mayodite kaṭhinahṛdayastyaktvā śayyāṃ balād gata eva saḥ /
analyzed: katham api sakhi krīḍā kopāt vraja iti mayā udite kaṭhina hṛdayaḥ tyaktvā śayyām balāt gataḥ eva saḥ

original: MSS_8474-2 iti sarabhasadhvastapremṇi vyapetaghṛṇe spṛhāṃ punarapi hatavrīḍaṃ cetaḥ karoti karomi kim //
analyzed: iti sa rabhasa dhvasta premṇi vyapeta ghṛṇe spṛhām punar api hatavrīḍam cetaḥ karoti karomi kim

original: MSS_8475-1 kathamapi hi bhavanti kṣetrasadbījayogāj jagadupakṛtihetornātmavṛttyai phalanti /
analyzed: katham api hi bhavanti kṣetra sat bīja yogāt jagat upakṛti hetoḥ na ātma vṛttyai phalanti

original: MSS_8475-2 dadhati phalasamṛddhyā dūramānamrabhāvaṃ nanu jagati suśūkāḥ sādhavaḥ śālayaśca //
analyzed: dadhati phala samṛddhyā dūram ānamra bhāvam nanu jagati su śūkāḥ sādhavaḥ śālayaḥ ca

original: MSS_8476-1 kathamapyadhigatarandhrair adhyuṣitā yadi guhākhubhiḥ kṣudraiḥ /
analyzed: katham api adhigata randhraiḥ adhyuṣitā yadi guhā ākhubhiḥ kṣudraiḥ

original: MSS_8476-2 iyataiva kiṃ mṛgādhipa nijavikramanirvidaṃ vahasi //
analyzed: iyatā eva kim mṛgādhipa nija vikrama nirvidam vahasi

original: MSS_8477-1 kathamarthaṃ niṣedhantu śrutayaḥ smṛtayo'pi vā /
analyzed: katham artham niṣedhantu śrutayaḥ smṛtayaḥ api vā

original: MSS_8477-2 yāsāmekaṃ padamapi na calatyarthato vinā //
analyzed: yāsām ekam padam api na calati arthataḥ vinā

original: MSS_8478-1 kathamavanipa darpo yanniśātāsidhārā- dalanagalitamūrdhnā vidviṣāṃ svīkṛtā śrīḥ /
analyzed: katham avanipa darpaḥ yat niśāta asi dhārā dalana galita mūrdhnā vidviṣām svīkṛtā śrīḥ

original: MSS_8478-2 nanu tava nihatārerapyasau kiṃ na nītā tridivamapagatāṅgairvallabhā kīrtirebhiḥ //
analyzed: nanu tava nihata areḥ api asau kim na nītā tridivam apagata aṅgaiḥ vallabhā kīrtiḥ ebhiḥ

original: MSS_8479-1 kathamasau na bhajatyaśarīratāṃ hatavivekapado hatamanmathaḥ /
analyzed: katham asau na bhajati aśarīra tām hata viveka padaḥ hata manmathaḥ

original: MSS_8479-2 praharataḥ kadalīdalakomale bhavati yasya dayā na vadhūjane //
analyzed: praharataḥ kadalī dala komale bhavati yasya dayā na vadhū jane

original: MSS_8480-1 kathamasau madano na namasyatāṃ sthitavivekapado makaradhvajaḥ /
analyzed: katham asau madanaḥ na namasyatām sthita viveka padaḥ makaradhvajaḥ

original: MSS_8480-2 mṛgadṛśaṃ kadalīlalitaṃ vapur yadabhi hanti śaraiḥ kusumodbhavaiḥ //
analyzed: mṛga dṛśam kadalī lalitam vapuḥ yat abhi hanti śaraiḥ kusuma udbhavaiḥ

original: MSS_8481-1 kathamiyati vanānte kaścideko na tādṛg varavanataruruccaiḥ puṣpavallīphalāḍhyaḥ /
analyzed: katham iyati vana ante kaścid ekaḥ na tādṛś vara vana taruḥ uccais puṣpa vallī phala āḍhyaḥ

original: MSS_8481-2 jagadasukhavidhāturdagdhadhāturniyogā- ddhavakhadirapalāśāḥ kevalaṃ vṛddhibhājaḥ //
analyzed: jagat asukha vidhātuḥ dagdha dhātuḥ niyogāḥ ddhava khadira palāśāḥ kevalam vṛddhi bhājaḥ

original: MSS_8482-1 kathamiva tava saṃmatirbhavitrī samamṛtubhirmunināvadhīritasya /
analyzed: katham iva tava saṃmatiḥ bhavitrī samam ṛtubhiḥ muninā avadhīritasya

original: MSS_8482-2 iti viracitamallikāvikāsaḥ smayata iva sma madhuṃ nidāghakālaḥ //
analyzed: iti viracita mallikā vikāsaḥ smayataḥ iva sma madhum nidāgha kālaḥ

original: MSS_8483-1 kathamiha manuṣyajanmā saṃpraviśati sadasi vibudhagamitāyām /
analyzed: katham iha manuṣya janmā saṃpraviśati sadasi vibudha gamitāyām

original: MSS_8483-2 yena na subhāṣitāmṛtam āhlādi nipītamā tṛpteḥ //
analyzed: yena na subhāṣita amṛtam āhlādi tṛpteḥ

original: MSS_8484-1 kathamutpadyate dharmaḥ kathaṃ dharmaḥ pravardhate /
analyzed: katham utpadyate dharmaḥ katham dharmaḥ pravardhate

original: MSS_8484-2 kathaṃ ca sthāpyate dharmaḥ kathaṃ dharmo vinaśyati //
analyzed: katham ca sthāpyate dharmaḥ katham dharmaḥ vinaśyati

original: MSS_8485-1 satyenotpadyate dharmo dayādānairvivardhate /
analyzed: satyena utpadyate dharmaḥ dayā dānaiḥ vivardhate

original: MSS_8485-2 kṣamayā sthāpyate dharmaḥ krodhalobhairvinaśyati //
analyzed: kṣamayā sthāpyate dharmaḥ krodha lobhaiḥ vinaśyati

original: MSS_8486-1 kathamupari kalāpinaḥ kalāpo vilasati tasya tale'ṣṭamīndukhaṇḍam /
analyzed: katham upari kalāpinaḥ kalāpaḥ vilasati tasya tala iṣṭam īndu khaṇḍam

original: MSS_8486-2 kuvalayayugalaṃ tato vilolaṃ tilakusumaṃ tadadhaḥ pravālamasmāt //
analyzed: kuvalaya yugalam tatas vilolam tila kusumam tad adhas pravālam asmāt

original: MSS_8487-1 kathametat kucadvandvaṃ patitaṃ tava sundari /
analyzed: katham etat kuca dvandvam patitam tava sundari

original: MSS_8487-2 paśyādhaḥ khanane mūḍha patanti girayo'pi ca //
analyzed: paśya adhas khanane mūḍha patanti girayaḥ api ca

original: MSS_8488-1 kathaya kathamivāśā jāyatāṃ jīvite me malayabhujagavāntā vānti vātāḥ kṛtāntāḥ /
analyzed: kathaya katham iva āśā jāyatām jīvite me malaya bhujaga vāntāḥ vānti vātāḥ kṛtāntāḥ

original: MSS_8488-2 ayamapi khalu guñjan mañju mākandamaulau culukayati madīyāṃ cetanāṃ cañcarīkaḥ //
analyzed: ayam api khalu guñjan mañju mākanda maulau culukayati madīyām cetanām cañcarīkaḥ

original: MSS_8488A-1 kathaya kathamurojadāmahetor yadupatireṣa cinoti campakāni /
analyzed: kathaya katham uroja dāma hetoḥ yadu patiḥ eṣa cinoti campakāni

original: MSS_8488A-2 bhavati karatale yadasya kampaḥ priyasakhi matsmṛtireva matsapatnī //
analyzed: bhavati kara tale yat asya kampaḥ priya sakhi mad smṛtiḥ eva mad sapatnī

original: MSS_8489-1 kathaya kimapi dṛṣṭaṃ sthānamasti śrutaṃ vā vrajati dinakaro'yaṃ yatra nāstaṃ kadācit /
analyzed: kathaya kim api dṛṣṭam sthānam asti śrutam vā vrajati dinakaraḥ yatra na astam kadācid

original: MSS_8489-2 iti vihagasamūhān nityamevāsti pṛcchan rajanivirahabhītaścakravākī varākaḥ //
analyzed: iti vihaga samūhāt nityam eva asti pṛcchan rajani viraha bhītaḥ cakravākī varākaḥ

original: MSS_8490-1 kathaya kimidaṃ jātyā khyātaṃ kimasya varāṭakaiḥ katibhirathavā labhyaṃ caitat prayojanamasya kim /
analyzed: kathaya kim idam jātyā khyātam kim asya varāṭakaiḥ katibhiḥ athavā labhyam ca etat prayojanam asya kim

original: MSS_8490-2 pratipadamiti grāmīṇānāṃ gaṇena laghūkṛtaṃ bata karatale ratnaṃ kṛtvā viṣīdati vāṇijaḥ //
analyzed: pratipadam iti grāmīṇānām gaṇena laghūkṛtam bata kara tale ratnam kṛtvā viṣīdati vāṇijaḥ

original: MSS_8491-1 kathayata iva netre karṇamūlaṃ prayāte sumukhi tava kucābhyāṃ vartya paśyāvanīṃ vā /
analyzed: kathayataḥ iva netre karṇa mūlam prayāte su mukhi tava kucābhyām vartya paśya avanīm vā

original: MSS_8491-2 skhalati yadi kathaṃcit te padāmbhojayugmaṃ tava tanutaramadhyaṃ bhajyate nau na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: skhalati yadi kathaṃcid te pada ambhoja yugmam tava tanutara madhyam bhajyate nau na doṣaḥ

original: MSS_8492-1 kathayata kathameṣā menayā vipradattā śiva śiva giriputro vṛddhakāpālikāya /
analyzed: kathayata katham eṣā menayā vipradattā śiva śiva giriputraḥ vṛddha kāpālikāya

original: MSS_8492-2 iti vadati puraṃdhrīmaṇḍale siddhileśa- vyayakṛtavaraveṣaḥ pātu vaḥ śrīmaheśaḥ //
analyzed: iti vadati puraṃdhrī maṇḍale siddhi leśa vyaya kṛta vara veṣaḥ pātu vaḥ śrī maheśaḥ

original: MSS_8493-1 kathaya nipuṇe kasmin dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ nu kiyacciraṃ kimabhilikhitaṃ kiṃ tenoktaṃ kadā sa ihaiṣyati /
analyzed: kathaya nipuṇe kasmin dṛṣṭaḥ katham nu kiyat ciram kim abhilikhitam kim tena uktam kadā saḥ iha eṣyati

original: MSS_8493-2 iti bahuvidhapremollāsaprakalpitavistarāḥ priyatamakathāḥ svalpe'pyarthe prayānti na naṣṭatām //
analyzed: iti bahuvidha prema ullāsa prakalpita vistarāḥ priyatama kathāḥ su alpe api arthe prayānti na naṣṭa tām

original: MSS_8494-1 kathayānimiṣo'smyahaṃ kathaṃ te vapurālokanamātra eva jātaḥ /
analyzed: kathaya animiṣaḥ asmi aham katham te vapuḥ ālokana mātraḥ eva jātaḥ

original: MSS_8494-2 adharāmṛtapāyināṃ bhavatyā suratāvāptirarālakeśi yuktā //
analyzed: adhara amṛta pāyinām bhavatyā surata avāptiḥ arāla keśi yuktā

original: MSS_8494A-1 kathābhirdeśānāṃ kathamapi ca kālena bahunā samāyāte kānte sakhi rajanirardhaṃ gatavatī /
analyzed: kathābhiḥ deśānām katham api ca kālena bahunā samāyāte kānte sakhi rajaniḥ ardham gatavatī

original: MSS_8494A-2 tato yāvallīlāpraṇayakupitāsmi prakupitā sapatnīva prācī digiyamabhavat tāvadaruṇā //
analyzed: tatas yāvat līlā praṇaya kupitā asmi prakupitā sapatnī iva prācī diś iyam abhavat tāvat aruṇā

original: MSS_8495-1 kathāsu ye labdharasāḥ kavīnāṃ ye nānurajyanti kathāntareṣu /
analyzed: kathāsu ye labdha rasāḥ kavīnām ye na anurajyanti kathā antareṣu

original: MSS_8495-2 na granthiparṇapraṇayāścaranti kastūrikāgandhamṛgās tṛṇeṣu //
analyzed: na granthi parṇa praṇayāḥ caranti kastūrikā gandhamṛgāḥ tṛṇeṣu

original: MSS_8495A-1 kathitāvadhijīvitāvadhir gaṇayantī divasānanukṣaṇam /
analyzed: kathita avadhi jīvita avadhiḥ gaṇayantī divasān anu kṣaṇam

original: MSS_8495A-2 dayitāśrubhareṇa jīvyate bata rekhā katicidvilumpatā //
analyzed: dayita aśru bhareṇa jīvyate bata rekhā katicid vilumpatā

original: MSS_8496-1 kadapatyaṃ varaṃ manye sadapatyācchucāṃ padāt /
analyzed: kadapatyam varam manye sat apatyāt śucām padāt

original: MSS_8496-2 nirvidyeta gṛhānmartyo yat kleśanivahā gṛhāḥ //
analyzed: nirvidyeta gṛhāt martyaḥ yat kleśa nivahāḥ gṛhāḥ

original: MSS_8497-1 kadambavṛkṣasāras tu vidyutpātanivāraṇaḥ /
MSS_8497-2 vidyutpātasya no bhītir devarāje'ti kīrtanāt //
analyzed: vidyut pātasya naḥ bhītiḥ devarāja iti kīrtanāt

original: MSS_8498-1 kadarthitasyāpi hi dhairyavṛtter na śakyate dhairyaguṇaḥ pramārṣṭum /
analyzed: kadarthitasya api hi dhairya vṛtteḥ na śakyate dhairya guṇaḥ pramārṣṭum

original: MSS_8498-2 adhomukhasyāpi kṛtasya vahner nādhaḥ śikhā yānti kadācideva //
analyzed: adhomukhasya api kṛtasya vahneḥ na adhas śikhāḥ yānti kadācid eva

original: MSS_8499-1 kadaryamākrośakamaśrutaṃ ca varākasambhūtamamānyamāninam /
analyzed: kadaryam ākrośakam aśrutam ca varāka sambhūtam amānya māninam

original: MSS_8499-2 niṣṭhūriṇaṃ kṛtavairaṃ kṛtaghnam etān bhṛśārto'pi na jātu yācet //
analyzed: niṣṭhūriṇam kṛta vairam kṛtaghnam etān bhṛśa ārtaḥ api na jātu yācet

original: MSS_8500-1 kadaryopārjitaṃ vittaṃ bhogyaṃ bhāgyavatāṃ bhavet /
analyzed: kadarya upārjitam vittam bhogyam bhāgyavatām bhavet

original: MSS_8500-2 dantā adanti kaṣṭena jihvā grasati līlayā //
analyzed: dantāḥ adanti kaṣṭena jihvā grasati līlayā

original: MSS_8501-1 kadalī kadalī karabhaḥ karabhaḥ karirājakaraḥ karirājakaraḥ /
MSS_8501-2 bhuvanatritaye'pi bibharti tulām idamūruyugaṃ na camūrudṛśaḥ //
analyzed: bhuvana tritaye api bibharti tulām idam ūru yugam na camūru dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_8502-1 kadalīkandavaddharmo na rohati bahirgataḥ /
analyzed: kadalī kanda vat dharmaḥ na rohati bahis gataḥ

original: MSS_8502-2 chāditastu phalaṃ cāru sūte panasamūlavat //
analyzed: chāditaḥ tu phalam cāru sūte panasa mūla vat

original: MSS_8503-1 kadalīkarabhasamānāṃ kalayati yo rūpakḷptim atirucirām /
analyzed: kadalīkara bhasamānām kalayati yaḥ rūpa kḷptim ati rucirām

original: MSS_8503-2 sopāyād dṛḍhayogaṃ gamitorasikopakaraṇaviṣayatayā //
analyzed: sa upāyāt dṛḍha yogam gamita urasika upakaraṇa viṣaya tayā

original: MSS_8504-1 kadalīprakāṇḍarucirorutarau jaghanasthalīparisare mahati /
analyzed: kadalī prakāṇḍa rucira uru tarau jaghana sthalī parisare mahati

original: MSS_8504-2 raśanākalāpakaguṇena vadhūr makaradhvajadviradamākalayat //
analyzed: raśanā kalāpaka guṇena vadhūḥ makaradhvaja dviradam ākalayat

original: MSS_8504A-1 kadalī bata jaṅghāyāḥ sādṛśyaṃ labhate katham /
analyzed: kadalī bata jaṅghāyāḥ sādṛśyam labhate katham

original: MSS_8504A-2 śaityaṃ hi sahajaṃ tatra tatra kālānurūpatā //
analyzed: śaityam hi sahajam tatra tatra kāla anurūpa tā

original: MSS_8505-1 kadalīvanamadhyastho vahnirmandaparākramaḥ /
analyzed: kadalī vana madhya sthaḥ vahniḥ manda parākramaḥ

original: MSS_8505-2 avivekijanasthāne guṇavān kiṃ kariṣyati //
analyzed: aviveki janasthāne guṇavān kim kariṣyati

original: MSS_8506-1 kadalīsāraniḥsāre mṛgatṛṣṇeva cañcale /
analyzed: kadalī sāra niḥsāre mṛgatṛṣṇā iva cañcale

original: MSS_8506-2 sthāvare jaṃgame sarve bhūtagrāme caturvidhe //
analyzed: sthāvare jaṃgame sarve bhūta grāme caturvidhe

original: MSS_8507-1 kadā kāntāgāre parimalamilatpuṣpaśayane śayānaḥ kāntāyāḥ kucayugamahaṃ vakṣasi vahan /
analyzed: kadā kāntāgāre parimala milat puṣpa śayane śayānaḥ kāntāyāḥ kuca yugam aham vakṣasi vahan

original: MSS_8507-2 aye kānte mugdhe kuṭilanayane candravadane prasīdetyāti krośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān //
analyzed: aye kānte mugdhe kuṭila nayane candra vadane prasīda itya ati krośan nimiṣam iva neṣyāmi divasān

original: MSS_8508-1 kadā kāryodyogaṃ sakalamapi saṃnyasya sahasā smaran nityaṃ śāntaṃ hṛdayavacanāgocaramahaḥ /
analyzed: kadā kārya udyogam sakalam api saṃnyasya sahasā smaran nityam śāntam hṛdaya vacana agocaram ahar

original: MSS_8508-2 vibho māyātīta prathama paramānandanibiḍa prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān //
analyzed: vibho māyā atīta prathama parama ānanda nibiḍa prasīda iti ākrośan nimiṣam iva neṣyāmi divasān

original: MSS_8509-1 kadā gaṇḍādañcanmadalulitasindūrasubhagaṃ namaskurvan padmāmalamadhuramūrtiṃ gaṇapatim /
analyzed: kadā gaṇḍāt añcat mada lulita sindūra subhagam namaskurvan padma amala madhura mūrtim gaṇapatim

original: MSS_8509-2 gajāsya śrīśambhoḥsuta sumukha lambodara vibho prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān //
analyzed: gaja asya śrī śambhoḥ suta sumukha lambodara vibho prasīda iti ākrośan nimiṣam iva neṣyāmi divasān

original: MSS_8510-1 kadācana mahākārye laghurevopayujyate /
analyzed: kadācana mahā kārye laghuḥ eva upayujyate

original: MSS_8510-2 kiṃ dūrīkṛtya dīrghādi dūrvāṃ kṣemāya nādṛtaḥ //
analyzed: kim dūrīkṛtya dīrgha ādi dūrvām kṣemāya na ādṛtaḥ

original: MSS_8511-1 kadācit kavacaṃ bhedyaṃ nārācena śareṇa vā /
analyzed: kadācid kavacam bhedyam nārācena śareṇa vā

original: MSS_8511-2 api varṣaśatāghāte brāhmaṇāśīrna bhidyate //
analyzed: api varṣa śata āghāte brāhmaṇa āśīḥ na bhidyate

original: MSS_8512-1 kadācit kaṣṭena draviṇamadhamārādhanavaśān mayā labdhaṃ stokaṃ nihitamavanau taskarabhayāt /
analyzed: kadācid kaṣṭena draviṇam adhama ārādhana vaśāt mayā labdham stokam nihitam avanau taskara bhayāt

original: MSS_8512-2 tato nitye kaścit kvacidapi tadākhurbilagṛhe- 'nayallabdho'pyarthona bhavati yadā karma viṣamam //
analyzed: tatas nitye kaścid kvacid api tad ākhuḥ bila gṛhe nayat labdhaḥ upi arthaḥ na bhavati yadā karma viṣamam

original: MSS_8513-1 kadācit kālindītaṭavipinasaṅgītakaravo mudābhīrīnārīvadanakamalāsvādamadhupaḥ /
analyzed: kadācid kālindī taṭa vipina saṅgīta karavaḥ mudā ābhīrī nārī vadana kamala āsvāda madhupaḥ

original: MSS_8513-2 ramāśambhubrahmāmarapatigaṇeśarcitapado jagannāthaḥ svāmī nayanapathagāmī bhavatu me //
analyzed: bhavatu

original: MSS_8514-1 kadācit pāñcālī vipinabhuvi bhīmena bahuśaḥ kṛśāṅgi śrāntāsi kṣaṇamiha niṣīdeti gaditā /
analyzed: kadācid pāñcālī vipina bhuvi bhīmena bahuśas kṛśa aṅgi śrāntā asi kṣaṇam iha niṣīda iti gaditā

original: MSS_8514-2 śanaiḥ śītacchāyaṃ taṭaviṭapinaṃ prāpya muditā puraḥ patyuḥ kāmācchvaśuramiyamāliṅgati satī //
analyzed: śanais śīta chāyam taṭa viṭapinam prāpya muditā puras patyuḥ kāmāt śvaśuram iyam āliṅgati satī

original: MSS_8515-1 kadācit sādhutāmeti puraḥ śiśurasanmatiḥ /
analyzed: kadācid sādhu tām eti puras śiśuḥ asat matiḥ

original: MSS_8515-2 prāk pāṇḍupatrāḥ kutrāpi coyante cārubhūruhāḥ //
analyzed: prāk pāṇḍu patrāḥ kutra api coyante cāru bhūruhāḥ

original: MSS_8516-1 kadācidapi saṃjātam akāryādiṣṭasādhanam /
analyzed: kadācid api saṃjātam akārya ādiṣṭa sādhanam

original: MSS_8516-2 yadaniṣṭaṃ tu satkāryān nākāryaprerakaṃ hi tat //
analyzed: yat aniṣṭam tu satkāryāt na akārya prerakam hi tat

original: MSS_8517-1 kadācidārohati saudhamunnataṃ kadācidāyāti dharātalaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: kadācid ārohati saudham unnatam kadācid āyāti dharā talam punar

original: MSS_8517-2 kadācidāsyaṃ viniveśya jālake priyaṃ navoḍhā tu salajjamīkṣate //
analyzed: kadācid āsyam viniveśya jālake priyam na voḍhā tu sa lajjam īkṣate

original: MSS_8518-1 kadā te sānandaṃ vitatanavadūrvāñcitataṭī- kuṭīre tīre vā savanamanu manvādikathitaiḥ /
analyzed: kadā te sa ānandam vitata nava dūrvā āñcita taṭī kuṭīre tīre vā sa vanam anu manu ādi kathitaiḥ

original: MSS_8518-2 kathābandhairandhaṅkaraṇakaraṇagrāmaniyamād yamādujjhan bhītiṃ bhagavati bhaveyaṃ pramuditaḥ //
analyzed: kathā bandhaiḥ andhaṅkaraṇa karaṇa grāma niyamāt yamāt ujjhan bhītim bhagavati bhaveyam pramuditaḥ

original: MSS_8519-1 kadā drakṣyāmi nandasya bālakaṃ nīpamālakam /
analyzed: kadā drakṣyāmi nandasya bālakam nīpa mālakam

original: MSS_8519-2 pālakaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ lasattilakabhālakam //
MSS_8520-1 kadādharadale bāle dantakesaraśobhite /
analyzed: kadā adhara dale bāle danta kesara śobhite

original: MSS_8520-2 bhavāmi tvanmukhāmbhoje rasiko madhupo yathā //
analyzed: bhavāmi tvad mukha ambhoje rasikaḥ madhupaḥ yathā

original: MSS_8521-1 kadā nu kanyāgamanapravādaṃ prakṣālayeyaṃ jagati prarūḍham /
analyzed: kadā nu kanyā gamana pravādam prakṣālayeyam jagati prarūḍham

original: MSS_8521-2 itīva bhāsvān parivṛddhatāpas tulāṃ viśuddhyarthamivāruroha //
analyzed: iti iva bhāsvān parivṛddha tāpaḥ tulām viśuddhi artham iva āruroha

original: MSS_8522-1 kadā nu cārubimboṣṭhaṃ tasyāḥ padmamivānanam /
analyzed: kadā nu cāru bimba uṣṭham tasyāḥ padmam iva ānanam

original: MSS_8522-2 īṣadunnamya pāsyāmi rasāyanamivāturaḥ //
analyzed: īṣat unnamya pāsyāmi rasāyanam iva āturaḥ

original: MSS_8523-1 kadā nau saṃgamo bhāvītyākīrṇe vaktumakṣamam /
analyzed: kadā nau saṃgamaḥ bhāvi iti ākīrṇe vaktum akṣamam

original: MSS_8523-2 avetya kāntamabalā līlāpadmaṃ nyamīlayat //
analyzed: avetya kāntam abalā līlā padmam nyamīlayat

original: MSS_8524-1 kadāpi nāśrayet prājño'karuṇaṃ miṣṭabhāṣiṇam /
analyzed: kadāpi na āśrayet miṣṭa bhāṣiṇam

original: MSS_8524-2 pracchannamasahiṣṇuṃ vā guḍamiśraṃ viṣaṃ yathā //
analyzed: pracchannam asahiṣṇum vā guḍa miśram viṣam yathā

original: MSS_8525-1 kadāpi nogradaṇḍaḥ syāt kaṭubhāṣaṇatatparaḥ /
analyzed: kadāpi na ugra daṇḍaḥ syāt kaṭu bhāṣaṇa tatparaḥ

original: MSS_8525-2 bhāryā putro'pyudvijate kaṭuvākyāt pradaṇḍataḥ //
analyzed: bhāryā putraḥ api udvijate kaṭu vākyāt pradaṇḍataḥ

original: MSS_8525-3 paśavo'pi vaśaṃ yānti dānaiśca mṛdubhāṣaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: paśavaḥ api vaśam yānti dānaiḥ ca mṛdu bhāṣaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_8525A-1 kadāpi veśyā na guṇārthinī syād rūpārthinī naiva hitārthinī ca /
analyzed: kadāpi veśyā na guṇa arthinī syāt rūpa arthinī nā eva hita arthinī ca

original: MSS_8525A-2 vidyārthinī nāpi na manyase ced vārtāṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ kayavannakasya //
analyzed: vidyā arthinī nā api na manyase ced vārtām śṛṇu tvam kayavannakasya

original: MSS_8526-1 kadā puṇyakṣetre karakalitarudrākṣavalayo dadhat svānte śānte'khilaśivapadaṃ śrīśivapadam /
analyzed: kadā puṇya kṣetre kara kalita rudra akṣa valayaḥ dadhat svānte śānta ikhila śiva padam śrī śiva padam

original: MSS_8526-2 maheśa śrīkaṇṭha smarahara hara tryambaka śiva prasīdetyākrośān nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān //
analyzed: maheśa śrīkaṇṭha smarahara hara tryambaka śiva prasīda iti ākrośāt nimiṣam iva neṣyāmi divasān

original: MSS_8527-1 kadā brahmeśānatridaśapatimukhyaiḥ suragaṇaiḥ stutaṃ viṣvaksenaṃ jitadanujasenaṃ hṛdi bhajan /
analyzed: kadā brahma īśāna tridaśa pati mukhyaiḥ sura gaṇaiḥ stutam viṣvaksenam jita danuja senam hṛdi bhajan

original: MSS_8527-2 aye viṣṇo jiṣṇo garuḍaratha viśvambhara hare prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān //
analyzed: aye viṣṇo jiṣṇo garuḍa ratha viśvambhara hare prasīda iti ākrośan nimiṣam iva neṣyāmi divasān

original: MSS_8528-1 kadā bhāgīrathyā bhavajaladhisaṃtārataraṇeḥ skhaladvīcīmālācapalatalavistāritamudaḥ /
analyzed: kadā bhāgīrathyāḥ bhava jaladhi saṃtāra taraṇeḥ skhalat vīcī mālā capala tala vistārita mudaḥ

original: MSS_8528-2 tamaḥsthāne kuñje kvacidapi niviśyāhṛtamanā bhaviṣyāmyekākī narakamathane dhyānarasikaḥ //
analyzed: tamaḥ sthāne kuñje kvacid api niviśya āhṛta manāḥ bhaviṣyāmi ekākī naraka mathane dhyāna rasikaḥ

original: MSS_8529-1 kadā bhikṣābhaktaiḥ karakalitagaṅgāmbutaralaiḥ śarīraṃ me sthāsyatyuparatasamastendriyasukham /
analyzed: kadā bhikṣā bhaktaiḥ kara kalita gaṅgā ambu taralaiḥ śarīram me sthāsyati uparata samasta indriya sukham

original: MSS_8529-2 kadā brahmābhyāsasthiratanutayāraṇyavihagāḥ patiṣyanti sthāṇubhramahatadhiyaḥ skandhaśirasi //
analyzed: kadā brahma abhyāsa sthira tanu tayā araṇya vihagāḥ patiṣyanti sthāṇu bhrama hata dhiyaḥ skandha śirasi

original: MSS_8530-1 kadā mukhaṃ varatanu kāraṇādṛte tavāgataṃ kṣaṇamayi kopapātratām /
analyzed: kadā mukham vara tanu kāraṇāt ṛte tava āgatam kṣaṇa mayi kopa pātra tām

original: MSS_8530-2 aparvaṇi grahakaluṣendumaṇḍalā vibhāvarī kathaya kathaṃ bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: aparvaṇi graha kaluṣa indu maṇḍalā vibhāvarī kathaya katham bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_8531-1 kadā vārāṇasyāmamarataṭinīrodhasi vasan vasānaḥ kaupīnaṃ śirasi nidadhāno'ñjalipuṭam /
analyzed: kadā vārāṇasyām amara taṭinī rodhasi vasan vasānaḥ kaupīnam śirasi nidadhānaḥ uñjali puṭam

original: MSS_8531-2 aye gaurīnātha tripurahara śambho trinayana prasīdeti krośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān //
analyzed: aye gaurīnātha tripura hara śambho trinayana prasīda iti krośan nimiṣam iva neṣyāmi divasān

original: MSS_8532-1 kadā vā sākete vimalasarayūtīrapuline carantaṃ śrīrāmaṃ janakatanayālakṣmaṇayutam /
analyzed: kadā vā sākete vimala sarayū tīra puline carantam śrī rāmam janakatanayā lakṣmaṇa yutam

original: MSS_8532-2 aye rāma svāmin janakatanayāvallabha vibho prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān //
analyzed: aye rāma svāmin janakatanayā vallabha vibho prasīda iti ākrośan nimiṣam iva neṣyāmi divasān

original: MSS_8533-1 kadā vṛndāraṇye navaghananibhaṃ nandatanayaṃ parītaṃ gopībhiḥ kṣaṇarucimanojñābhirabhitaḥ /
analyzed: kadā vṛndāraṇye nava ghana nibham nanda tanayam parītam gopībhiḥ kṣaṇa ruci manojñābhiḥ abhitas

original: MSS_8533-2 gamiṣyāmas toṣaṃ nayanaviṣayīkṛtya kṛtino vayaṃ premodrekaskhalitagatayo vepathubhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: gamiṣyāmaḥ toṣam nayana viṣayīkṛtya kṛtinaḥ vayam prema udreka skhalita gatayaḥ vepathu bhṛtaḥ

original: MSS_8534-1 kadā vṛndāraṇye mihiraduhituḥ saṅgamahite muhurbhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ caritalaharīṃ gokulapateḥ /
analyzed: kadā vṛndāraṇye mihira duhituḥ saṅga mahite muhur bhrāmam bhrāmam carita laharīm gokula pateḥ

original: MSS_8534-2 lapannuccairuccairnayanapayasāṃ veṇibhirahaṃ kariṣye sotkaṇṭho niviḍamavasekaṃ viṭapinām //
analyzed: lapan uccais uccais nayana payasām veṇibhiḥ aham kariṣye sa utkaṇṭhaḥ nibiḍam avasekam viṭapinām

original: MSS_8535-1 kadā vṛndāraṇye vimalayamunātīrapuline carantaṃ govindaṃ haladharasudāmādisahitam /
analyzed: kadā vṛndāraṇye vimala yamunā tīra puline carantam govindam haladhara sudāma ādi sahitam

original: MSS_8535-2 aye kṛṣṇa svāmin madhuramuralīvādana vibho prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān //
analyzed: aye kṛṣṇa svāmin madhura muralī vādana vibho prasīda iti ākrośan nimiṣam iva neṣyāmi divasān

original: MSS_8536-1 kadā śayāno maṇikarṇikāyāṃ karṇe japāmyakṣaramindumauleḥ /
analyzed: kadā śayānaḥ maṇi karṇikāyām karṇe japāmi akṣaram indumauleḥ

original: MSS_8536-2 avāpya mudrāṃ gatamohamudrāṃ nālokayiṣyāmi punaḥ prapañcam //
analyzed: avāpya mudrām gata moha mudrām na ālokayiṣyāmi punar prapañcam

original: MSS_8537-1 kadā śrīmatpaṅkeruhavanavikāśiprasṛmara- prathāpuñjaṃ tejaḥ kimapi kalayannaupaniṣadam /
analyzed: kadā śrīmat paṅkeruha vana vikāśi prasṛmara prathā puñjam tejaḥ kim api kalayan aupaniṣadam

original: MSS_8537-2 graheśa śrībhāno mihira taraṇe sūrya savitaḥ prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān //
analyzed: graha īśa śrībhāno mihira taraṇe sūrya savitar prasīda iti ākrośan nimiṣam iva neṣyāmi divasān

original: MSS_8538-1 kadā saṃsārajālāntar baddhaṃ triguṇarajjubhiḥ /
analyzed: kadā saṃsāra jāla antar baddham triguṇa rajjubhiḥ

original: MSS_8538-2 ātmānaṃ mocayiṣyāmi śivabhaktiśalākayā //
analyzed: ātmānam mocayiṣyāmi śiva bhakti śalākayā

original: MSS_8539-1 kadā samyag dhyāyannanupamacaritraṃ maṇigaṇa- sphuradbhūṣācitraṃ puraripukalatraṃ kimapi tat /
analyzed: kadā samyak dhyāyan anupama caritram maṇi gaṇa sphurat bhūṣā citram pura ripu kalatram kim api tat

original: MSS_8539-2 śive durge kātyāyani janani bhaktapraṇayini prasīdetyākrośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān //
analyzed: śive durge kātyāyani janani bhakta praṇayini prasīda iti ākrośan nimiṣam iva neṣyāmi divasān

original: MSS_8540-1 kadā hi mūrkho vacaneṣu bhītaḥ khalo na kutrāpi chaleṣvadakṣaḥ /
analyzed: kadā hi mūrkhaḥ vacaneṣu bhītaḥ khalaḥ na kutra api chaleṣu adakṣaḥ

original: MSS_8540-2 andhena kācid yuvatī hi dṛṣṭā kasyātra kāmeṣu bhavecca lajjā //
analyzed: andhena kācid yuvatī hi dṛṣṭā kasya atra kāmeṣu bhavet ca lajjā

original: MSS_8541-1 kadā hyahaṃ sameṣyāmi bharatena mahātmanā /
analyzed: kadā hi aham sameṣyāmi bharatena mahātmanā

original: MSS_8541-2 śatrughnena ca vīreṇa tvayā ca raghunandana //
analyzed: śatrughnena ca vīreṇa tvayā ca raghunandana

original: MSS_8542-1 kanakaṃ sugandhi tava tanvi vapur madhuro maṇiśca sakhi te'pyadharam /
analyzed: kanakam sugandhi tava tanvi vapuḥ madhuraḥ maṇiḥ ca sakhi te pi adharam

original: MSS_8542-2 nigaḍaṃ sukhasya karaṇaṃ bhavatīṃ sṛjato vidherniravadhirmahimā //
analyzed: nigaḍam sukhasya karaṇam bhavatīm sṛjataḥ vidheḥ niravadhiḥ mahimā

original: MSS_8543-1 kanakakamalakāntaiḥ sadya evāmbudhautaiḥ śravaṇataṭaniṣaktaiḥ pāṭalopāntanetraiḥ /
analyzed: kanaka kamala kāntaiḥ sadyas eva ambu dhautaiḥ śravaṇa taṭa niṣaktaiḥ pāṭala upānta netraiḥ

original: MSS_8543-2 uṣasi vadanabimbairaṃsasaṃsaktakeśaiḥ śriya iva gṛhamadhye saṃsthitā yoṣito'dya //
analyzed: uṣasi vadana bimbaiḥ aṃsa saṃsakta keśaiḥ śriyaḥ iva gṛha madhye saṃsthitāḥ yoṣitā udya

original: MSS_8544-1 kanakakamalakāntairānanaiḥ pāṇḍugaṇḍair uparinihitahāraiścandanārdraiḥ stanāntaiḥ /
analyzed: kanaka kamala kāntaiḥ ānanaiḥ pāṇḍu gaṇḍaiḥ uparinihita hāraiḥ candana ārdraiḥ stana antaiḥ

original: MSS_8544-2 madajanitavilāsairdūṣṭipātairmunīndrān stanabharanatanāryaḥ kāmayanti praśāntān //
analyzed: mada janita vilāsaiḥ dūṣṭipātaiḥ muni indrān stana bhara nata nāryaḥ kāmayanti praśāntān

original: MSS_8545-1 kanakakalaśaśreṇī yatra prabhākaracumbanair atikharakarāghātairmadhyandine śithilīkṛtā /
analyzed: kanaka kalaśa śreṇī yatra prabhākara cumbanaiḥ ati khara kara āghātaiḥ madhyandine śithilīkṛtā

original: MSS_8545-2 dravati bhajate dārḍhyaṃ siktā samīraṇakampita- dhvajapaṭasamānītasvargāpagājalabindubhiḥ //
analyzed: dravati bhajate dārḍhyam siktā samīraṇa kampita dhvaja paṭa samānīta svarga āpagā jala bindubhiḥ

original: MSS_8546-1 kanakakunḍalamaṇḍitabhāṣiṇe śakaripurviṣayān daśa vidviṣaḥ /
analyzed: kanaka kunḍala maṇḍita bhāṣiṇe śaka ripuḥ viṣayān daśa vidviṣaḥ

original: MSS_8546-2 magadhakekayakeralakośalān kariśataṃ ca madālasalocanam //
analyzed: magadha kekaya kerala kośalān kari śatam ca mada alasa locanam

original: MSS_8547-1 kanakakramukāyitaṃ purastād atha paṅgeruhakorakāyamāṇam /
analyzed: kanaka kramukāyitam purastāt atha paṅgeruha korakāyamāṇam

original: MSS_8547-2 kramaśaḥ kalaśāyamānamāste sudṛśo vakṣasi kasya bhāgadheyam //
analyzed: kramaśas kalaśāyamānam āste sudṛśaḥ vakṣasi kasya bhāgadheyam

original: MSS_8548-1 kanakacchatramambāyāḥ kurute kutukaṃ mahat /
analyzed: kanaka chatram ambāyāḥ kurute kutukam mahat

original: MSS_8548-2 viśadeva dṛśorantar yannirgacchati mūdhaini //
analyzed: viśad eva dṛśoḥ antar yat nirgacchati

original: MSS_8549-1 kanakadravakāntikāntayā militaṃ rāmamudīkṣya kāntayā /
analyzed: kanaka drava kānti kāntayā militam rāmam udīkṣya kāntayā

original: MSS_8549-2 capalāyutavāridabhramān nanṛte cātakapotakairvane //
analyzed: capala ayuta vārida bhramāt nanṛte cāta kapotakaiḥ vane

original: MSS_8549A-1 kanakadravagauramambaraṃ dadhatorudvitayena sundaram /
analyzed: kanaka drava gauram ambaram dadhataḥ uru dvitayena sundaram

original: MSS_8549A-2 udayanmaṇinūpuraprabhā- saraṇiśreṇijaṭālajānukam //
analyzed: udayat maṇi nūpura prabhā saraṇi śreṇi jaṭāla jānukam

original: MSS_8550-1 kanakanikaṣabhāsā sītayāliṅgitāṅgo navakuvalayadāmaśyāmavarṇābhirāmaḥ /
analyzed: kanaka nikaṣa bhāsā sītayā āliṅgita aṅgaḥ nava kuvalaya dāma śyāma varṇa abhirāmaḥ

original: MSS_8550-2 abhinava iva vidyunmaṇḍito medhakhaṇḍaḥ śamayatu mama tāpaṃ sarvato rāmacandraḥ //
analyzed: abhinavaḥ iva vidyut maṇḍitaḥ medha khaṇḍaḥ śamayatu mama tāpam sarvatas rāmacandraḥ

original: MSS_8551-1 kanakanikaṣasvacche rādhāpayodharamaṇḍale navajaladharaśyāmāmātmadyutiṃ pratibimbitām /
analyzed: kanaka nikaṣa su acche rādhā payodhara maṇḍale nava jaladhara śyāmām ātma dyutim pratibimbitām

original: MSS_8551-2 asitasicayaprāntabhrāntyā muhurmuhurutkṣipañ jayati janitavrīḍānamrapriyāhasito hariḥ //
analyzed: asita sicaya prānta bhrāntyā muhur muhur utkṣipam jayati janita vrīḍā ānamra priyā hasitaḥ hariḥ

original: MSS_8552-1 kanakabhaṅgapiśaṅgadalairdadhe sarajasāruṇakeśaracārubhiḥ /
analyzed: kanaka bhaṅga piśaṅga dalaiḥ dadhe sa rajasā aruṇa keśara cārubhiḥ

original: MSS_8552-2 priyavimānitamānavatīruṣāṃ nirasanairasanairavṛthārthatā //
analyzed: priya vimānita mānavatī ruṣām nirasanaiḥ asanaiḥ avṛthārtha tā

original: MSS_8553-1 kanakabhūṣaṇasaṃgrahaṇocito yadi maṇis trapuṇi pratibadhyate /
analyzed: kanaka bhūṣaṇa saṃgrahaṇa ucitaḥ yadi maṇiḥ trapuṇi pratibadhyate

original: MSS_8553-2 na sa virauti na cāpi na śobhate bhavati yojayiturvacanīyatā //
analyzed: na sa virauti na ca api na śobhate bhavati yojayituḥ vacanīya tā

original: MSS_8554-1 kanakamṛgamudasya svāṃ kuṭīṃ saṃpraviṣṭaḥ kvacidapi na vadhūṭīṃ nodadarśāṅganādau /
analyzed: kanakamṛgam udasya svām kuṭīm saṃpraviṣṭaḥ kvacid api na vadhūṭīm na udadarśa aṅganā ādau

original: MSS_8554-2 tadapi sa raghuvīraḥ parṇaśālāgṛhāntar na viśati hṛdayāśātantunāśātibhīruḥ //
analyzed: tat api sa raghu vīraḥ parṇa śālā gṛha antar na viśati hṛdaya āśā tantu nāśa ati bhīruḥ

original: MSS_8555-1 kanakarasamasṛṇavartita- hayagandhāmūlamiśraparyuṣitam /
MSS_8555-2 māhiṣamiha navanītaṃ gatabīje kanakaphalamadhye
analyzed: māhiṣam iha navanītam gata bīje kanaka phala madhye

original: MSS_8556-1 gomayagāḍhodvartita- pūrvaṃ paścādanena saṃliptam /
analyzed: gomaya gāḍha udvartita pūrvam paścāt anena saṃliptam

original: MSS_8556-2 bhavati hayaliṅgasadṛśaṃ liṅgaṃ kaṭhināṅganādayitam //
analyzed: bhavati haya liṅga sadṛśam liṅgam kaṭhina aṅganā dayitam

original: MSS_8557-1 kanakasya tu pañcāṅgaṃ karpūraṃ ketakīrajaḥ /
analyzed: tu

original: MSS_8557-2 ātmaśukreṇa saṃyuktaṃ vaśyakṛd bhakṣitaṃ striyāḥ //
analyzed: ātma śukreṇa saṃyuktam vaśya kṛt bhakṣitam striyāḥ

original: MSS_8558-1 kanakahariṇaṃ hatvā rāmo yayau nijamāśramaṃ janakatanayāṃ prāṇebhyo'pi priyāmavilokayan /
analyzed: kanaka hariṇam hatvā rāmaḥ yayau nijam āśramam janakatanayām prāṇebhyaḥ api priyām a vilokayan

original: MSS_8558-2 dṛḍhamupagatairbāṣpāpūrairnimīlitalocano na viśati kuṭīmāśātantupraṇāśabhayādasau //
analyzed: dṛḍham upagataiḥ bāṣpa āpūraiḥ nimīlita locanaḥ na viśati kuṭīm āśā tantu praṇāśa bhayāt asau

original: MSS_8559-1 kanakācalakānticauryabhājoḥ kucayoḥ kuṅkumapaṅkapūjanāni /
analyzed: kanaka acala kānti caurya bhājoḥ kucayoḥ kuṅkuma paṅka pūjanāni

original: MSS_8559-2 anibandhanameva bandhanaṃ te kṛśatābhāgini kiṃ nu madhyabhāge //
analyzed: a nibandhanam eva bandhanam te kṛśa tā bhāgini kim nu madhya bhāge

original: MSS_8560-1 kanakācalajitvarastanīnāṃ ramaṇīnāṃ khalu yatra sanniveśaḥ /
analyzed: kanakācala jitvara stanīnām ramaṇīnām khalu yatra sanniveśaḥ

original: MSS_8560-2 manasaḥ paramāṇutāṃ vadantaḥ kathamadyāpi na tārkikās trapante //
analyzed: manasaḥ paramāṇu tām vadantaḥ katham adya api na tārkikāḥ trapante

original: MSS_8561-1 kaniṣṭhāṅgulivat sthūlaṃ pūrvārdhakṛtakuñcitam /
analyzed: kaniṣṭhā aṅguli vat sthūlam pūrva ardha kṛta kuñcitam

original: MSS_8561-2 abhāve dantakāṣṭhasya pratiṣiddhadine'pi ca /
analyzed: abhāve dantakāṣṭhasya pratiṣiddha dine api ca

original: MSS_8561-3 apāṃ dvādaśagaṇḍūṣair mukhaśuddhirbhaviṣyati //
analyzed: apām dvādaśa gaṇḍūṣaiḥ mukha śuddhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_8562-1 kaniṣṭheṣu ca sarveṣu samatvenānuvartate /
analyzed: kaniṣṭheṣu ca sarveṣu sama tvena anuvartate

original: MSS_8562-2 samopabhogajīveṣu yathaiva tanayeṣu ca //
analyzed: sama upabhoga jīveṣu yathā eva tanayeṣu ca

original: MSS_8562A-1 kanīnikākāntibhirañjanaṃ dṛśoḥ smitatviṣā candanacarccanaṃ hṛdaḥ /
analyzed: kanīnikā kāntibhiḥ añjanam dṛśoḥ smita tviṣā candana carccanam hṛdaḥ

original: MSS_8562A-2 kaṭākṣabhābhirnavamutpalaṃ śrutes tadā vadhūnāmiti bhūṣaṇānyabhān //
analyzed: kaṭākṣa bhābhiḥ navam utpalam śruteḥ tadā vadhūnām iti bhūṣaṇāni abhān

original: MSS_8562B-1 kanīnikeva netrasya kusumasyeva saurabham /
analyzed: kanīnikā iva netrasya kusumasya iva saurabham

original: MSS_8562B-2 samyaktvamucyate sāraṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmakarmaṇām //
analyzed: samyaktvam ucyate sāram sarveṣām dharma karmaṇām

original: MSS_8563-1 kanthāṃ vahasi durbuddhe gardabhairapi durvahām /
analyzed: kanthām vahasi durbuddhe gardabhaiḥ api durvahām

original: MSS_8563-2 śikhāyajñopavītābhyāṃ bhāraḥ kaste bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: śikhā yajñopavītābhyām bhāraḥ kaḥ te bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_8563A-1 kandamūlāni ye mūḍhāḥ sūryadeve jarnādane /
analyzed: kanda mūlāni ye mūḍhāḥ sūryadeve jarnādane

original: MSS_8563A-2 bhakṣayanti narāḥ pārtha te vai naraka gāminaḥ //
analyzed: bhakṣayanti narāḥ pārtha te vai naraka gāminaḥ

original: MSS_8564-1 kandarpakaṇḍūlakaṭākṣabandīr indīvarākṣorabhilaṣyamāṇān /
analyzed: kandarpa kaṇḍūla kaṭākṣa bandīḥ indīvara akṣoḥ abhilaṣyamāṇān

original: MSS_8564-2 mandasmitādhāramukhāravindān vandāmahe vallavadhūrtapādān //
MSS_8565-1 kandarpakandali salīladṛśā lunīhi kopāṅkuraṃ caraṇayoḥ śaraṇātithiḥ syām /
analyzed: kandarpa kandali sa līla dṛśā lunīhi kopa aṅkuram caraṇayoḥ śaraṇa atithiḥ syām

original: MSS_8565-2 paśya prasīda caramācalacūlacumbi bimbaṃ vidhorlavalapāṇḍuramastameti //
analyzed: paśya prasīda carama acala cūla cumbi bimbam vidhoḥ lavala pāṇḍuram astam eti

original: MSS_8566-1 kandarpajvarasaṃjvarākulatanorāścaryamasyāściraṃ cetaścandanacandramaḥkamalinīcintāsu saṃtāmyati /
analyzed: kandarpa jvara saṃjvara ākula tanoḥ āścaryam asyāḥ ciram cetaḥ candana candramaḥ kamalinī cintāsu saṃtāmyati

original: MSS_8566-2 kiṃ tu klāntivaśena śītalataraṃ tvāmekameva kṣaṇaṃ dhyāyantī rahasi sthitā kathamapi kṣīṇā kṣaṇaṃ prāṇiti //
analyzed: kim tu klānti vaśena śītalataram tvām ekam eva kṣaṇam dhyāyantī rahasi sthitā katham api kṣīṇā kṣaṇam prāṇiti

original: MSS_8567-1 kandarpadarpakalitāṅgamanoharāṇāṃ premṇā svayaṃ suratamandiramāgatānām /
analyzed: kandarpa darpa kalita aṅga manoharāṇām premṇā svayam surata mandiram āgatānām

original: MSS_8567-2 aṅgāni komalatarāṇi manoramāṇāṃ dhanyā narāḥ sarabhasaṃ hi pariṣvajante //
analyzed: aṅgāni komalatarāṇi manoramāṇām dhanyāḥ narāḥ sarabhasam hi pariṣvajante

original: MSS_8568-1 kandarpadevasya vimānasṛṣṭiḥ prāsādamālā rasapārthivasya /
analyzed: kandarpa devasya vimāna sṛṣṭiḥ prāsāda mālā rasa pārthivasya

original: MSS_8568-2 caitrasya sarvartuviśeṣacihnaṃ dolāvilāsaḥ sudṛśāṃ rarāja //
analyzed: caitrasya sarva ṛtu viśeṣa cihnam dolā vilāsaḥ sudṛśām rarāja

original: MSS_8569-1 kandarpapratibhūniveśitavalīrekhāvalīśobhite līlodañcitabāhupāśayugalāpātaiśca bhoḥ kāmukāḥ /
analyzed: kandarpa pratibhū niveśita valī rekhā āvalī śobhite līlā udañcita bāhu pāśa yugala āpātaiḥ ca bhoḥ kāmukāḥ

original: MSS_8569-2 veśyānāṃ vipule nitambaphalake śāraiḥ kaṭākṣairito yadvaḥ krīḍitamatra dāsyati puro dāridryamevottaram //
analyzed: veśyānām vipule nitamba phalake śāraiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ itas yat vaḥ krīḍitam atra dāsyati puras dāridryam eva uttaram

original: MSS_8570-1 kandarpapratimallakāntivibhavaṃ kādambinībāndhavaṃ vṛndāraṇyavilāsinīvyasaninaṃ veṣeṇa bhūṣāmayam /
analyzed: kandarpa pratimalla kānti vibhavam kādambinī bāndhavam vṛndāraṇya vilāsinī vyasaninam veṣeṇa bhūṣā mayam

original: MSS_8570-2 mandasmeramukhāmbujaṃ madhurimavyāmṛṣṭabimbādharaṃ vande kandalitārdrayauvanavanaṃ kaiśorakaṃ śārṅgiṇaḥ //
analyzed: manda smera mukha ambujam madhurima vyāmṛṣṭa bimba adharam vande kandalita ārdra yauvana vanam kaiśorakam śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: MSS_8571-1 kandarpaśca ratiśca kuṅkumamṛdālepena mūṣādvayaṃ kurvāte rasasādhanāya vidhivat kastūrikāmudvayā /
analyzed: kandarpaḥ ca ratiḥ ca kuṅkuma mṛd ālepena mūṣā dvayam kurvāte rasa sādhanāya vidhivat

original: MSS_8571-2 antardarpakabāṇatāpitayuvapremoṣmabhūyastayā niryātā rasabindavo bahirito hārasya muktācchalāt //
analyzed: antar darpaka bāṇa tāpita yuva prema ūṣma bhūyastayā niryātāḥ rasa bindavaḥ bahis itas hārasya muktāt chalāt

original: MSS_8572-1 kandarpasya jagattrayīvijayinaḥ sāmrājyadīkṣāguruḥ kāntāmānaśiloñchavṛttirakhiladhvāntābhicā re kṛtī /
analyzed: kandarpasya jagat trayī vijayinaḥ sāmrājya dīkṣā guruḥ kāntā māna śilā uñcha vṛttiḥ akhila dhvānta abhicāḥ re kṛtī

original: MSS_8572-2 devastryambakamaulimaṇḍanasarittīrasthalītāpasaḥ śṛṅgārādhvaradīkṣito vijayate rājā dvijānāmayam //
analyzed: devaḥ tryambaka mauli maṇḍana sarit tīra sthalī tāpasaḥ śṛṅgāra adhvara dīkṣitaḥ vijayate rājā dvijānām ayam

original: MSS_8573-1 kandarpādapi sundarākṛtiriti prauḍhotsaladrāgayā vṛddhatvaṃ varayoṣito'nayaditi trāsākulasvāntayā /
analyzed: kandarpāt api sundara ākṛtiḥ iti prauḍha utsalat rāgayā vṛddha tvam vara yoṣitaḥ nayat iti trāsa ākula svāntayā

original: MSS_8573-2 mārasyāpi śarairabhedyahṛditi śraddhābharaprahvayā pāyād vaḥ sphuṭabāṣpakampapulakaṃ ratyā jino vanditaḥ //
analyzed: mārasya api śaraiḥ abhedya hṛt iti śraddhā bhara prahvayā pāyāt vaḥ sphuṭa bāṣpa kampa pulakam ratyā jinaḥ vanditaḥ

original: MSS_8574-1 kandarpādapi sundaro ravimahāḥ pratyarthisīmantinī- vaktrāmbhojasudhākaro'tivibhavo yuddheṣu pārthopamaḥ /
analyzed: kandarpāt api sundaraḥ ravi mahāḥ pratyarthi sīmantinī vaktra ambhoja sudhākara uti vibhavaḥ yuddheṣu pārtha upamaḥ

original: MSS_8574-2 rakṣākṛjjagataḥ svakīrtividito rāmo'stu yukto mudā dānīṃ śaṅkarasevako varaguṇo nītyuttamaḥ sarvadā //
analyzed: rakṣā kṛt jagataḥ sva kīrti viditaḥ yuktaḥ mudā dānīm śaṅkara sevakaḥ vara guṇaḥ nīti uttamaḥ sarvadā

original: MSS_8575-1 kandarpe nalakūvare kumudinīkānte'pyavajñāvatāṃ tvatsaundaryakathāsu tāsu marutāṃ vṛttāsu kautūhalāt /
analyzed: kandarpe nalakūvare kumudinī kānte ipi avajñāvatām tvad saundarya kathāsu tāsu marutām vṛttāsu kautūhalāt

original: MSS_8575-2 prāptā tānavamurvaśī ratiratiklāntā hatā rohiṇī jātā kiṃca kharasmarajvarabharā rambhāpi rambhātanuḥ //
analyzed: prāptā tānavam urvaśī ratiḥ ati klāntā hatā rohiṇī jātā kiṃca khara smara jvara bharā rambhā api rambhā tanuḥ

original: MSS_8576-1 kandarpaikakṛpāṇavallari vane kasmād akasyādiyaṃ he kālāgurubālamañjari hahā mohādiha prāruhaḥ /
analyzed: kandarpa eka kṛpāṇa vallari vane kasmāt akasyāt iyam he kālāguru bāla mañjari hahā mohāt iha prāruhaḥ

original: MSS_8576-2 sahyantāmupajātasaurabhapariṣvaṅgais tadaṅgairimāḥ kāntaiḥ kāntapuraṃdhrikuntalabharacchāyaiḥ kuṭhāracchidaḥ //
analyzed: sahyantām upajāta saurabha pariṣvaṅgaiḥ tad aṅgaiḥ imāḥ kāntaiḥ kānta puraṃdhri kuntala bhara chāyaiḥ kuṭhāra chidaḥ

original: MSS_8577-1 kandalayatyānandaṃ nindati mandānilenducandanakam /
MSS_8577-2 mandayati mandabhāvaṃ saṃdhatte saṃpado'pi satsaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: mandayati manda bhāvam saṃdhatte saṃpadā upi sat saṅgaḥ

original: MSS_8577A-1 kandalīṣu kuṭajeṣu mālatī- jālakeṣu navaketakīṣu ca /
analyzed: kandalīṣu kuṭajeṣu mālatī jālakeṣu nava ketakīṣu ca

original: MSS_8577A-2 kantharāsu madhunā sukekināṃ saṃvibhakta iva vāridodayaḥ //
analyzed: kantharāsu madhunā su kekinām saṃvibhaktaḥ iva vārida udayaḥ

original: MSS_8578-1 kandāgrāt protthitaḥ prāṇaḥ sadā vahati dehinām /
analyzed: kanda agrāt protthitaḥ prāṇaḥ sadā vahati dehinām

original: MSS_8578-2 hṛdgataṃ jīvamāśvāsya bahirgatvā nivartate //
analyzed: hṛdgatam jīvam āśvāsya bahis gatvā nivartate

original: MSS_8579-1 kanduko bhittiniḥkṣipta iva pratiphalan muhuḥ /
analyzed: kandukaḥ bhitti niḥkṣiptaḥ iva pratiphalan muhur

original: MSS_8579-2 āpatatyātmanaḥ prāyo doṣo'nyasya cikīrṣitaḥ //
analyzed: āpatati ātmanaḥ prāyas doṣaḥ nyasya cikīrṣitaḥ

original: MSS_8580-1 kande sundaratā dale saralatā varṇasya saṃpūrṇatā skandhe bandhuratā phale sarasatā kasyāparasyedṛśī /
analyzed: kande sundara tā dale sarala tā varṇasya saṃpūrṇa tā skandhe bandhura tā phale sarasa tā kasya aparasya īdṛśī

original: MSS_8580-2 dhanyastvaṃ sahakāra khinnapathikādhāra sthitaḥ satpathe dīrghāyurbhava sādhu sādhu vidhinā medhāvinā nirmitaḥ //
analyzed: dhanyaḥ tvam sahakāra khinna pathika ādhāra sthitaḥ sat pathe dīrgha āyuḥ bhava sādhu sādhu vidhinā medhāvinā nirmitaḥ

original: MSS_8581-1 kandaiḥ kandalitaṃ vanaiḥ kiśalitaṃ vallībhirujjṛmbhitaṃ vṛkṣaiḥ pallavitaṃ janaiḥ pramuditaṃ dhārādhare varṣati /
analyzed: kandaiḥ kandalitam vanaiḥ kiśalitam vallībhiḥ ujjṛmbhitam vṛkṣaiḥ pallavitam janaiḥ pramuditam dhārādhare varṣati

original: MSS_8581-2 bhrātaścātaka pātakaṃ kimapi te samyag na jānīmahe yenāsmin na patanti cañcupuṭake dvitrāḥ payobindavaḥ //
analyzed: bhrātar cātaka pātakam kim api te samyak na jānīmahe yena asmin na patanti cañcupuṭake dvitrāḥ payaḥ bindavaḥ

original: MSS_8582-1 kandharāṃ samapahāya kaṃ dharāṃ prāpya saṃyati jahāsa kasyacit /
analyzed: kandharām samapahāya kam dharām prāpya saṃyati jahāsa kasyacid

original: MSS_8582-2 māṃ kilānamayataḥ svapūrtaye durbharāt kimudarādviyogataḥ //
analyzed: mām kila ānamayataḥ sva pūrtaye durbharāt kim udarāt viyogataḥ

original: MSS_8583-1 kandharāvanatasyorvī gatasyādhomukhasya te /
analyzed: kandhara avanatasya urvī gatasya adhomukhasya te

original: MSS_8583-2 lajjā na nāma nirlajjā garvo na galitaḥ katham //
analyzed: lajjā na nāma nirlajjā garvaḥ na galitaḥ katham

original: MSS_8584-1 kanyāṃ kāmapyudūhya pravijahadudayadyauvanāmajña enāṃ dravyāśāpāśakṛṣṭo bhramati cirataraṃ hanta deśāntareṣu /
analyzed: kanyām kām api udūhya pravijahat udayadyauvanām ajñaḥ enām dravya āśā pāśa kṛṣṭaḥ bhramati cirataram hanta deśa antareṣu

original: MSS_8584-2 anyonyāśleṣavāñchāvigalitavayasorāttamālinyam atyor daṃpatyorvyākṛtaivaṃ hatavidhirubhayorlokayoḥ śokayogam //
analyzed: anyonya āśleṣa vāñchā vigalita vayasoḥ ātta mālinyam atyoḥ daṃpatyoḥ vyākṛtā evam hata vidhiḥ ubhayoḥ lokayoḥ śoka yogam

original: MSS_8584A-1 kanyāṃ chatraṃ phalaṃ pakvaṃ dīpamannaṃ mahādhvajam /
analyzed: kanyām chatram phalam pakvam dīpam annam mahā dhvajam

original: MSS_8584A-2 mantraṃ vā labhate yo hi tasya cintitasiddhayaḥ //
analyzed: mantram vā labhate yaḥ hi tasya cintita siddhayaḥ

original: MSS_8585-1 kanyāṃ bhuṅkte rajaḥkāle'gniḥ śaśī lomadarśane /
analyzed: kanyām bhuṅkte rajaḥ kāla agniḥ śaśī loma darśane

original: MSS_8585-2 stanodbhaveṣu gandharvās tat prāgeva pradīyate //
analyzed: stana udbhaveṣu gandharvāḥ tat prāk eva pradīyate

original: MSS_8586-1 kanyāṃ rūpavatīṃ dṛṣṭvā mohaṃ gacchen mahānapi /
analyzed: kanyām rūpavatīm dṛṣṭvā moham gacchet mahān api

original: MSS_8586-2 caṇḍālyāmapyarundhatyāṃ vasiṣṭho mohito'bhavat //
analyzed: caṇḍālyām api arundhatyām vasiṣṭhaḥ mohitaḥ bhavat

original: MSS_8587-1 kanyākartitasūtreṇa baddhāpāmārgamūlikā /
analyzed: kanyā kartita sūtreṇa baddha apāmārga mūlikā

original: MSS_8587-2 aihāhikajvaraṃ hanti śikhāyāmativegataḥ //
analyzed: aihāhika jvaram hanti śikhāyām ativegataḥ

original: MSS_8588-1 kanyā kācidihāpi karmaṇi paṇaḥ syādityasūyācalat- sītāpāṅgamayūkhamāṃsalamukhajyotsnāviluptīṃ divam /
analyzed: kanyā kācid iha api karmaṇi paṇaḥ syāt iti asūyā calat sītā apāṅga mayūkha māṃsala mukha jyotsnā viluptīm divam

original: MSS_8588-2 kurvāṇena raghūdvahena cakṛṣe nārāyaṇīyaṃ dhanuḥ saṃdhāyātha śaraśca bhārgavagaticchedādamoghīkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: kurvāṇena raghūdvahena cakṛṣe nārāyaṇīyam dhanuḥ saṃdhāya atha śaraḥ ca bhārgava gati chedāt amoghīkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_8589-1 kanyā kautukamātrakeṇa vidhavā saṃmardamātrārthinī veśyā vittalavecchayā svagṛhiṇī gatyantarāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: kanyā kautuka mātrakeṇa vidhavā saṃmarda mātra arthinī veśyā vitta lava icchayā sva gṛhiṇī gati antara asaṃbhavāt

original: MSS_8589-2 vāñchantītthamanekakāraṇavaśāt puṃbhiḥ striyaḥ saṃgamaṃ śuddhasnehanibandhanā paravadhūḥ puṇyaiḥ paraiḥ prāpyate //
analyzed: vāñchanti ittham aneka kāraṇa vaśāt puṃbhiḥ striyaḥ saṃgamam śuddha sneha nibandhanā para vadhūḥ puṇyaiḥ paraiḥ prāpyate

original: MSS_8590-1 kanyāgate savitari tiṣṭhanti pitaro gṛhe /
analyzed: kanyā gate savitari tiṣṭhanti pitaraḥ gṛhe

original: MSS_8590-2 śūnyaṃ pretapuraṃ tatra yāvad vṛścikadarśanam //
analyzed: śūnyam preta puram tatra yāvat vṛścika darśanam

original: MSS_8590A-1 kanyā-go-bhūmyalīkāni nyāsāpaharaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: kanyā go bhūmi alīkāni nyāsa apaharaṇam tathā

original: MSS_8590A-2 kūṭasākṣyaṃ ca pañceti sthūlāsatyāni saṃtyajet //
analyzed: kūṭasākṣyam ca pañca iti sthūla asatyāni saṃtyajet

original: MSS_8590B-1 kanyāgośaṅkhabherīdadhiphalakusumaṃ pāvako dīpyamāno nāgendro'śvo ratho vā nṛpatirabhimukhaḥ pūrṇakumbho dhvajo vā /
analyzed: kanyā go śaṅkha bherī dadhi phala kusumam pāvakaḥ dīpyamānaḥ nāga indra uśvaḥ rathaḥ vā nṛpatiḥ abhimukhaḥ pūrṇa kumbhaḥ dhvajaḥ vā

original: MSS_8590B-2 utkṣiptā naiva bhūmirkhalacarayugalaṃ siddhamannaṃ śatāyur veśyāstrī madyamāṃso hitamapi gaditaṃ maṅgalaṃ prasthitānām //
analyzed: utkṣiptā nā eva bhūmiḥ khala cara yugalam siddham annam śata āyuḥ veśyā strī madya māṃsaḥ hitam api gaditam maṅgalam prasthitānām

original: MSS_8591-1 kanyādātre tu hyadhanaṃ dasyave sadhanaṃ naram /
analyzed: kanyā dātre tu hi adhanam dasyave sa dhanam naram

original: MSS_8591-2 guptaṃ jighāṃsave naiva vijñātamapi darśayet //
analyzed: guptam jighāṃsave na eva vijñātam api darśayet

original: MSS_8592-1 kanyā niṣkāsitā śreṣṭhā vadhūḥ śreṣṭhā praveśitā /
analyzed: kanyā niṣkāsitā śreṣṭhā vadhūḥ śreṣṭhā praveśitā

original: MSS_8592-2 annaṃ saṃkalitaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dharmaḥ śreṣṭho dine dine //
analyzed: annam saṃkalitam śreṣṭham dharmaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ dine dine

original: MSS_8593-1 kanyāprasūtasya dhanuḥprasaṅgād aṅgādhikāsāditavikramasya /
analyzed: kanyā prasūtasya dhanuḥ prasaṅgāt aṅga adhika āsādita vikramasya

original: MSS_8593-2 dhanaṃjayādhīnaparākramasya himasya karṇasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: dhanaṃjaya adhīna parākramasya himasya karṇasya ca kaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: MSS_8594-1 kanyāyāḥ kila pūjayanti pitaro jāmāturāptaṃ janaṃ sambandhe viparītameva tadabhūdārādhanaṃ te mayi /
analyzed: kanyāyāḥ kila pūjayanti pitaraḥ jāmātuḥ āptam janam sambandhe viparītam eva tat abhūt ārādhanam te mayi

original: MSS_8594-2 tvaṃ kāmena tathāvidho'syapahṛtaḥ sambandhabījaṃ ca tad ghore'smin mama jīvalokanarake pāpasya dhiga jīvitam //
analyzed: tvam kāmena tathāvidhaḥ asi apahṛtaḥ sambandha bījam ca tat ghore ismin mama jīva loka narake pāpasya dhiga jīvitam

original: MSS_8595-1 kanyā varayate rūpaṃ mātā vittaṃ pitā śrutam /
analyzed: kanyā varayate rūpam mātā vittam pitā śrutam

original: MSS_8595-2 bāndhavāḥ kulamicchanti miṣṭānnamitare janāḥ //
analyzed: bāndhavāḥ kulam icchanti miṣṭānnam itare janāḥ

original: MSS_8595A-1 kanyāvikrayiṇaścaiva rasavikrayiṇastathā /
analyzed: kanyā vikrayiṇaḥ ca eva rasa vikrayiṇaḥ tathā

original: MSS_8595A-2 viṣavikrayiṇaścaiva narā nirayagāminaḥ //
analyzed: viṣa vikrayiṇaḥ ca eva narāḥ niraya gāminaḥ

original: MSS_8596-1 kanye samālokaya kānyakubjam akubjakīrtiṃ naranāthamenam /
analyzed: kanye samālokaya kānyakubjam akubja kīrtim naranātham enam

original: MSS_8596-2 kakubjaye yasya dharāparāgair bhavanti vārāṃnidhayaḥ sthalāni //
analyzed: kakubh jaye yasya dharā parāgaiḥ bhavanti vārāṃnidhayaḥ sthalāni

original: MSS_8597-1 kapaṭaṃ ca bahutaraṃ na jānāti hi kaścana /
analyzed: kapaṭam ca bahutaram na jānāti hi kaścana

original: MSS_8597-2 kauliko viṣṇurūpeṇa bhuñjati rājakanyakām //
analyzed: kaulikaḥ viṣṇu rūpeṇa bhuñjati rāja kanyakām

original: MSS_8598-1 kapaṭakalitanidraṃ mandamālokayantī priyamadharamadhūni svecchayā pātumaicchat /
analyzed: kapaṭa kalita nidram mandam ālokayantī priyam adhara madhūni sva icchayā pātum aicchat

original: MSS_8598-2 madanamadamanojñā lajjayākṛṣṭacittā mukulitamukhapadmā citrasaṃstheva tasthau //
analyzed: madana mada manojñā lajjayā ākṛṣṭa cittā mukulita mukha padmā citra saṃsthā iva tasthau

original: MSS_8599-1 kapaṭanaṭanakoṭerdhūrjaṭeḥ sannaṭasyod- bhaṭavikaṭajaṭābhistāḍitāḥ śailakūṭāt /
analyzed: kapaṭa naṭana koṭeḥ dhūrjaṭeḥ sannaṭasya ud bhaṭa vikaṭa jaṭābhiḥ tāḍitāḥ śailakūṭāt

original: MSS_8599-2 kharatarakaraghātairutthitā diksthitāste nabhasi niravalambaṃ dantinaḥ saṃcaranti //
analyzed: kharatara kara ghātaiḥ utthitāḥ diś sthitāḥ te nabhasi niravalambam dantinaḥ saṃcaranti

original: MSS_8600-1 kapaṭapaṭutā drohe cittaṃ satāṃ ca vimānane matirapanaye śāṭhyaṃ mitre suteṣvapi vañcanā /
analyzed: kapaṭa paṭu tā drohe cittam satām ca vimānane matiḥ apanaye śāṭhyam mitre suteṣu api vañcanā

original: MSS_8600-2 kṛtakamadhurā vāk pratyakṣaṃ parokṣavighātinī kaliyugamahārājasyaitāḥ svarājyavibhūtayaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtaka madhurā vāc pratyakṣam parokṣa vighātinī kali yuga mahā rājasya etāḥ sva rājya vibhūtayaḥ

original: MSS_8601-1 kapaṭavacanabhājā kenacid vārayoṣā sakalarasikagoṣṭhīvañcikā vañcitāsau /
analyzed: kapaṭa vacana bhājā kenacid vāra yoṣā sakala rasika goṣṭhī vañcikā vañcitā asau

original: MSS_8601-2 iti vihasati riṅgad bhṛṅgavikṣiptacakṣur vikacakusumakānticchadmanā kelikuñjaḥ //
analyzed: iti vihasati riṅgat bhṛṅga vikṣipta cakṣuḥ vikaca kusuma kānti chadmanā keli kuñjaḥ

original: MSS_8602-1 kapaṭaśatanadīṣṇairvairibhirvañcito'pi nikṛtikaraṇadakṣo'pyatra saṃsārabhīruḥ /
analyzed: kapaṭa śatanadī iṣṇaiḥ vairibhiḥ vañcitaḥ api nikṛti karaṇa dakṣaḥ api atra saṃsāra bhīruḥ

original: MSS_8602-2 tanuvacanamanobhirvakratāṃ yo na yāti gatamalamṛjumānaṃ tasya sādhorvadanti //
analyzed: tanu vacana manobhiḥ vakra tām yaḥ na yāti gata malam ṛju mānam tasya sādhoḥ vadanti

original: MSS_8603-1 kapaṭādapi ripuhananaṃ kuryāditi nītirauśanasī /
analyzed: kapaṭāt api ripu hananam kuryāt iti nītiḥ auśanasī

original: MSS_8603-2 hananamṛte ca gurumate bandhādi vidhīyate ripoḥ kapaṭaiḥ //
analyzed: hanana mṛte ca guru mate bandha ādi vidhīyate ripoḥ kapaṭaiḥ

original: MSS_8604-1 kapaṭena punarnaiva vyāpāro yadi yā kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kapaṭena punar nā eva vyāpāraḥ yadi kṛtaḥ

original: MSS_8604-2 punarna paripākārhā haṇḍikā kāṣṭhanirmitā //
analyzed: punar na paripāka arhā haṇḍikā kāṣṭha nirmitā

original: MSS_8605-1 kapardī bhūtisaṃpanno jagatīpatiradvayaḥ /
MSS_8605-2 dhigdaivamavyayaḥ so'pi bhṛṅgī śuṣyatyato bhṛśam //
analyzed: dhik daivam avyayaḥ saḥ api bhṛṅgī śuṣyati atas bhṛśam

original: MSS_8606-1 kapāṭamuddhāṭaya cārunetre kāmo'sti śatrurmama pṛṣṭhalagnaḥ /
analyzed: kapāṭam uddhāṭaya cāru netre kāmaḥ asti śatruḥ mama pṛṣṭha lagnaḥ

original: MSS_8606-2 āpūritaṃ tasya śaraiḥ śarīraṃ candrānane tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannaḥ //
analyzed: āpūritam tasya śaraiḥ śarīram candrānane tvām śaraṇam prapannaḥ

original: MSS_8607-1 kapāṭamuddhāṭaya lolalocane kandarpaśatrurmama pṛṣṭhalagnaḥ /
analyzed: kapāṭam uddhāṭaya lola locane kandarpa śatruḥ mama pṛṣṭha lagnaḥ

original: MSS_8607-2 ākṛṣya bāṇaṃ śithilīkaroti candrānane tvāṃ śaraṇāgato'smi //
analyzed: ākṛṣya bāṇam śithilīkaroti candrānane tvām śaraṇa āgataḥ asmi

original: MSS_8608-1 kapāṭavistīrṇamanoramoraḥ- sthalasthitiśrīlalanasya tasya /
analyzed: kapāṭa vistīrṇa manorama uraḥ sthala sthiti śrī lalanasya tasya

original: MSS_8608-2 ānanditāśeṣajanā babhūva sarvāṅgasaṅginyaparaiva lakṣmīḥ //
analyzed: ānandita aśeṣa janā babhūva sarva aṅga saṅginī aparā eva lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_8609-1 kapālaṃ vṛkṣamūlāni kucelasasahāyatā /
analyzed: kapālam vṛkṣa mūlāni ku cela sa sahāya tā

original: MSS_8609-2 samatā caiva sarvasminn etan muktasya lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: sama tā ca eva sarvasmin etat muktasya lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_8610-1 kapāla upahāraśca saṃtānaḥ saṃgatas tathā /
analyzed: kapālaḥ upahāraḥ ca saṃtānaḥ saṃgataḥ tathā

original: MSS_8610-2 upanyāsaḥ pratīkāraḥ saṃyogaḥ puruṣāntaraḥ //
analyzed: upanyāsaḥ pratīkāraḥ saṃyogaḥ puruṣa antaraḥ

original: MSS_8611-1 adṛṣṭanara ādiṣṭa ātmāmiṣa upagrahaḥ /
analyzed: adṛṣṭanaraḥ ādiṣṭaḥ ātma āmiṣaḥ upagrahaḥ

original: MSS_8611-2 parikrayas tathocchinnas tathā ca paradūṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: parikrayaḥ tathā ucchinnaḥ tathā ca paradūṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_8612-1 skandhopaneyaḥ saṃdhiśca ṣoḍaśaḥ parakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: skandhopaneyaḥ saṃdhiḥ ca ṣoḍaśaḥ para kīrtitaḥ

original: MSS_8612-2 iti ṣoḍaśakaṃ prāhuḥ saṃdhiṃ sandhivicakṣaṇāḥ //
analyzed: iti ṣoḍaśakam prāhuḥ saṃdhim sandhi vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: MSS_8613-1 kapālasaṃdhirvijñepaḥ kevalaṃ samasaṃdhikaḥ /
analyzed: kapāla saṃdhiḥ vijñepaḥ kevalam sama saṃdhikaḥ

original: MSS_8613-2 saṃpradānād bhavati ya upahāraḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: saṃpradānāt bhavati yaḥ upahāraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: MSS_8614-1 kapāle gambhīraḥ kuhariṇi jaṭāsaṃdhiṣu kṛśaḥ samuttālaścūḍābhujagaphaṇaratnavyatikare /
analyzed: kapāle gambhīraḥ kuhariṇi jaṭā saṃdhiṣu kṛśaḥ sa muttālaḥ cūḍā bhujaga phaṇa ratna vyatikare

original: MSS_8614-2 mṛdurlekhākoṇe rayavaśavilolasya śaśinaḥ punīyād dīrghaṃ vo haraśirasi gaṅgākalakalaḥ //
analyzed: mṛduḥ lekhā koṇe raya vaśa vilolasya śaśinaḥ punīyāt dīrgham vaḥ hara śirasi gaṅgā kalakalaḥ

original: MSS_8615-1 kapāle mārjāraḥ paya iti karān leḍhi śaśinaḥ tarucchidraprotān bisamiti karī saṃkalayati /
analyzed: kapāle mārjāraḥ payaḥ iti karān leḍhi śaśinaḥ taru chidra protān bisam iti karī saṃkalayati

original: MSS_8615-2 ratānte talpasthān harati vanitāpyaṃśukamiti prabhāmattaś candro jagadidamaho viplavayati //
analyzed: rata ante talpa sthān harati vanitā api aṃśukam iti prabhā mattaḥ candraḥ jagat idam ahar viplavayati

original: MSS_8616-1 kapāle yadvadāpaḥ syuḥ śvadṛtau vā yathā payaḥ /
analyzed: kapāle yadvat āpaḥ syuḥ śva dṛtau vā yathā payaḥ

original: MSS_8616-2 āśrayasthānadoṣeṇa vṛttahīne tathā śrutam //
analyzed: āśraya sthāna doṣeṇa vṛtta hīne tathā śrutam

original: MSS_8617-1 kapālairyo baddhaḥ kathamakhilaviśvaprabhurasāv anāryairasmābhiḥ paramiyamapūrvaiva racanā /
analyzed: kapālaiḥ yaḥ baddhaḥ katham akhila viśva prabhuḥ asau anāryaiḥ asmābhiḥ param iyam apūrvā eva racanā

original: MSS_8617-2 yadindoḥ pīyūṣadravamayamayūkhotkarakiraḥ kalaṅkoratnaṃ tu pratiphaṇamanarghaṃ viṣabhṛtām //
analyzed: yat indoḥ pīyūṣa drava maya mayūkha utkara kiraḥ kalaṅkoratnam tu pratiphaṇam anargham viṣabhṛtām

original: MSS_8618-1 kapikacchūmūlena ca nijacaraṇavilepanād bhavati /
analyzed: kapikacchū mūlena ca nija caraṇa vilepanāt bhavati

original: MSS_8618-2 bījastambhaḥ puṃso bahuśo dṛṣṭaḥ prayogo'yam //
analyzed: bīja stambhaḥ puṃsaḥ bahuśas dṛṣṭaḥ prayogaḥ yam

original: MSS_8619-1 kapikacchūmūlena ca madavihralachāgamūtrapiṣṭena /
analyzed: kapikacchū mūlena ca mada vihrala chāga mūtra piṣṭena

original: MSS_8619-2 milanaṃ stabdhīkaraṇaṃ mūlena durālabhāyāśca //
analyzed: milanam stabdhīkaraṇam mūlena durālabhāyāḥ ca

original: MSS_8620-1 kapikulanakhamukhakhaṇḍita- tarutalaphalabhojano varaṃ puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: kapi kula nakha mukha khaṇḍita taru tala phala bhojanaḥ varam puruṣaḥ

original: MSS_8620-2 na punardhanamadagarvita- mukhabhaṅgakadarthitā vṛttiḥ //
analyzed: na punar dhana mada garvita mukha bhaṅga kadarthitā vṛttiḥ

original: MSS_8621-1 kapirapi ca kāpiśāyana- madamatto vṛścikena saṃdaṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: kapiḥ api ca kāpiśāyana mada mattaḥ vṛścikena saṃdaṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_8621-2 api ca piśācagrastaḥ kiṃ brūmo vaikṛtaṃ tasya //
analyzed: api ca piśāca grastaḥ kim brūmaḥ vaikṛtam tasya

original: MSS_8622-1 kapilākṣīrapānena brāhmaṇīgamanena ca /
analyzed: kapilā kṣīra pānena brāhmaṇī gamanena ca

original: MSS_8622-2 vedākṣaravicāreṇa sa śūdro narakaṃ vrajet //
analyzed: veda akṣara vicāreṇa sa śūdraḥ narakam vrajet

original: MSS_8622A-1 kapilānāṃ sahasrāṇi yo viprebhyaḥ prayacchati /
analyzed: kapilānām sahasrāṇi yaḥ viprebhyaḥ prayacchati

original: MSS_8622A-2 ekasya jīvitaṃ dadyān na ca tulyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira //
analyzed: ekasya jīvitam dadyāt na ca tulyam yudhiṣṭhira

original: MSS_8623-1 kapīnāṃ vasayāśvānāṃ vahnidāhasamudbhavā /
analyzed: kapīnām vasayā aśvānām vahni dāha samudbhavā

original: MSS_8623-2 vyathā vināśamabhyeti tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā //
analyzed: vyathā vināśam abhyeti tamaḥ sūrya udaye yathā

original: MSS_8624-1 kapermadhyaṃ śiśurbaddhvā yathonnatapadaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: kapeḥ madhyam śiśuḥ baddhvā yathā unnata padam vrajet

original: MSS_8624-2 tadvadrakṣakamāśritya padamunnatamāśrayet //
analyzed: tadvat rakṣakam āśritya padam unnatam āśrayet

original: MSS_8625-1 kapolaṃ pakṣmabhyaḥ kalayati kapolāt kucataṭaṃ kucānmadhyaṃ madhyānnavamuditanābhīsarasijam /
analyzed: kapolam pakṣmabhyaḥ kalayati kapolāt kuca taṭam kucāt madhyam madhyāt nava mudita nābhī sarasijam

original: MSS_8625-2 na jānīmaḥ kiṃ nu kva nu kiyadanena vyavasitaṃ yadasyāḥ pratyaṅgaṃ nayanajalabindurviharati //
analyzed: na jānīmaḥ kim nu kva nu kiyat anena vyavasitam yat asyāḥ pratyaṅgam nayanajala binduḥ viharati

original: MSS_8626-1 kapolakaṇḍūḥ karibhir vinetuṃ vighaṭṭitānāṃ saraladrumāṇām /
analyzed: kapola kaṇḍūḥ karibhiḥ vinetum vighaṭṭitānām sarala drumāṇām

original: MSS_8626-2 yatra srutakṣīratayā prasūtaḥ sānūni gandhaḥ surabhīkaroti //
analyzed: yatra sruta kṣīra tayā prasūtaḥ sānūni gandhaḥ surabhīkaroti

original: MSS_8627-1 kapolapatrān makarāt saketur bhrūbhyāṃ jigīṣurdhanuṣāṃ jaganti /
analyzed: kapola patrāt makarāt sa ketuḥ bhrūbhyām jigīṣuḥ dhanuṣām jaganti

original: MSS_8627-2 ihāvalabhbyāsti ratiṃ manobhū rajyadvayasyo madhunādhareṇa //
analyzed: iha avalabhbyā asti ratim manobhūḥ rajyat vayasyaḥ madhunā adhareṇa

original: MSS_8628-1 kapolapālīṃ tava tanvi manye lāvaṇyadhanye diśamuttarākhyām /
analyzed: kapola pālīm tava tanvi manye lāvaṇya dhanye diśam uttara ākhyām

original: MSS_8628-2 vibhāti yasyāṃ lalitālakāyāṃ manoharā vai śravaṇasya lakṣmīḥ //
analyzed: vibhāti yasyām lalitā alakāyām manoharā vai śravaṇasya lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_8629-1 kapolaphalakāvasyāḥ kaṣṭaṃ bhūtvā tathāvidhau /
analyzed: kapola phalakau asyāḥ kaṣṭam bhūtvā tathāvidhau

original: MSS_8629-2 apaśyantāvivānyonyamīdṛkṣāṃ kṣamatāṃ gatau //
analyzed: a paśyantau iva anyonyam īdṛkṣām kṣamatām gatau

original: MSS_8630-1 kapolayorinduñjitoramuṣyāḥ prasarpatoreva mitho jayāya /
analyzed: kapolayoḥ induñjitoḥ amuṣyāḥ prasarpatoḥ eva mithas jayāya

original: MSS_8630-2 svayaṃ svayaṃbhūḥ kṛtarodhamantar vyadhatta nāsāmiha sāmyadaṇḍam //
analyzed: svayam svayaṃbhūḥ kṛta rodham antar vyadhatta nāsām iha sāmya daṇḍam

original: MSS_8631-1 kapolavyālolaśravaṇanavamākandakalikā- marandavyāmiśrāstava varatanu svedapṛṣataḥ /
analyzed: kapola vyālola śravaṇa nava mākanda kalikāḥ maranda vyāmiśrāḥ tava vara tanu sveda pṛṣataḥ

original: MSS_8631-2 rativyatyāsasya śramamapalapeyuryadi bhaved abhedopakrāntakvaṇitaraśanādāma jaghanam //
analyzed: rati vyatyāsasya śramam apalapeyuḥ yadi bhavet abheda upakrānta kvaṇita raśanā dāma jaghanam

original: MSS_8632-1 kapolāduḍḍīnairbhayavaśavilolairmadhukarair madāmbhaḥsaṃlobhādupari patituṃ baddhapaṭalaiḥ /
analyzed: kapolāt uḍḍīnaiḥ bhaya vaśa vilolaiḥ madhukaraiḥ mada ambhaḥ saṃlobhāt upari patitum baddha paṭalaiḥ

original: MSS_8632-2 caladbarhacchatraśriyamiva dadhāno'tirucirām avighnaṃ herambo bhavadaghavighātaṃ ghaṭayatu //
analyzed: calat barha chatra śriyam iva dadhānā uti rucirām avighnam herambaḥ bhavat agha vighātam ghaṭayatu

original: MSS_8632A-1 kapolāvunmīlatpulakanikurambau mayi manāṅ mṛśatyantaḥsmerastabakitamukhāmbhoruharucaḥ /
analyzed: kapolau unmīlat pulaka nikurambau mayi manāk mṛśati antar smera stabakita mukha ambhoruha rucaḥ

original: MSS_8632A-2 kathaṃkāraṃ śakyāḥ parigaditumindīvaradṛśo daladdrākṣāniryadrasabharasapakṣā bhaṇitayaḥ //
analyzed: kathaṃkāram śakyāḥ parigaditum indīvara dṛśaḥ dalat drākṣā niryat rasabha rasa pakṣāḥ bhaṇitayaḥ

original: MSS_8633-1 kapole jānakyāḥ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi smarasmeraṃ gaṇḍoḍḍamarapulakaṃ vaktrakamalam /
analyzed: kapole jānakyāḥ kari kalabha danta dyuti muṣi smara smeram gaṇḍa uḍḍamara pulakam vaktra kamalam

original: MSS_8633-2 muhuḥ paśyañ śṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭagranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ //
analyzed: muhur paśyam śṛṇvan rajanicara senā kalakalam jaṭā jūṭa granthim draḍhayati raghūṇām parivṛḍhaḥ

original: MSS_8634-1 kapole patrālīṃ pulakini vidhātuṃ vyavasitaḥ svayaṃ śrīrādhāyāḥ karakalitavartirmadhuripuḥ /
analyzed: kapole patra ālīm pulakini vidhātum vyavasitaḥ svayam śrī rādhāyāḥ kara kalita vartiḥ madhuripuḥ

original: MSS_8634-2 abhūd vaktrendau yan nihitanayanaḥ kampitabhujas tadetat sāmarthyaṃ tadabhinavarūpasya jayati //
analyzed: abhūt vaktra indau yat nihita nayanaḥ kampita bhujaḥ tat etat sāmarthyam tad abhinava rūpasya jayati

original: MSS_8635-1 kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo'dhararasaḥ /
analyzed: kapole patra ālī kara tala nirodhena mṛditā nipītaḥ niḥśvāsaiḥ ayam amṛta hṛd yodhara rasaḥ

original: MSS_8635-2 muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnas taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭaṃ priyo manyurjātas tava niranurodhe na tu vayam //
analyzed: muhur kaṇṭhe lagnaḥ taralayati bāṣpaḥ stana taṭam priyaḥ manyuḥ jātaḥ tava niranurodhe na tu vayam

original: MSS_8636-1 kapole pāṇḍutvaṃ kimapi jaladhārāṃ nayanayos tanau kārśyaṃ dainyaṃ vacasi hṛdi dāvānalaśikhām /
analyzed: kapole pāṇḍu tvam kim api jala dhārām nayanayoḥ tanau kārśyam dainyam vacasi hṛdi dāva anala śikhām

original: MSS_8636-2 avajñāṃ prāṇeṣu prakṛtiṣu viparyāsamadhunā kimanyad vairāgyaṃ sakalaviṣayeṣvākalayate //
analyzed: avajñām prāṇeṣu prakṛtiṣu viparyāsam adhunā kim anyat vairāgyam sakala viṣayeṣu ākalayate

original: MSS_8637-1 kapole'mbhojākṣyāḥ priyadaśanacihnaṃ priyadṛśoḥ sarojākṣī vaktracyutabhujagavallīrasalavam /
analyzed: kapola imbhoja akṣyāḥ priya daśana cihnam priya dṛśoḥ saroja akṣī vaktra cyuta bhujaga vallī rasa lavam

original: MSS_8637-2 sapatnī dṛṣṭvārādurutaraviniśvāsataralo- nnatorojadvandvaṃ rahasi śanakai roditi muhuḥ //
analyzed: sapatnī dṛṣṭvā ārāt urutara viniśvāsa taralaḥ unnata uroja dvandvam rahasi śanakais roditi muhur

original: MSS_8638-1 kapolau lolākṣyā madhumukulalīlāvijayinā- vurojau rejāte kanakakalaśābhogasubhagau /
analyzed: kapolau lola akṣyāḥ madhu mukula līlā vijayinā vurojau rejāte kanaka kalaśa ābhoga subhagau

original: MSS_8638-2 dṛśau vātotkhelattaralataranīlotpalarucau vaco no jānīmaḥ kimamṛtamayaṃ kiṃ viṣamayam //
analyzed: dṛśau vāta utkhelat taralatara nīlotpala rucau vacaḥ naḥ jānīmaḥ kim amṛta mayam kim viṣa mayam

original: MSS_8638A-1 kaphamūtramalaprāyaṃ nirjanturjagatītale /
analyzed: kapha mūtra mala prāyam nirjantuḥ jagatī tale

original: MSS_8638A-2 yatnādyadutsṛjetsādhuḥ sotsargasamitirbhavet //
analyzed: yatnāt yat utsṛjet sādhuḥ sa utsarga samitiḥ bhavet

original: MSS_8639-1 kabandhaḥ parighābhāso dṛśyate bhāskarāntike /
analyzed: kabandhaḥ parigha ābhāsaḥ dṛśyate bhāskara antike

original: MSS_8639-2 jagrāsa sūryaṃ svarbhānur aparvaṇi mahāgrahaḥ //
analyzed: jagrāsa sūryam svarbhānuḥ aparvaṇi mahā grahaḥ

original: MSS_8640-1 kamaṭhapṛṣṭhakaṭhoramidaṃ dhanur madhuramūrtirasau raghunandanaḥ /
analyzed: kamaṭha pṛṣṭha kaṭhoram idam dhanuḥ madhura mūrtiḥ asau raghunandanaḥ

original: MSS_8640-2 kathamadhijyamanena vidhīyatām ahaha tāta paṇas tava dāruṇaḥ //
analyzed: katham adhijyam anena vidhīyatām ahaha tāta paṇaḥ tava dāruṇaḥ

original: MSS_8641-1 kamaṇḍalūpamo'mātyas tanutyāgī bahugrahaḥ /
analyzed: kamaṇḍalu upama umātyaḥ tanutyāgī bahu grahaḥ

original: MSS_8641-2 nṛpate kiṅkṣaṇo mūrkho daridraḥ kiṃvarāṭakaḥ //
analyzed: nṛpate kiṅkṣaṇaḥ mūrkhaḥ daridraḥ kiṃvarāṭakaḥ

original: MSS_8642-1 kamanīyatānivāsaḥ karṇas tasyā vicitramaṇibhūṣaḥ /
analyzed: kamanīya tā nivāsaḥ karṇaḥ tasyāḥ vicitra maṇi bhūṣaḥ

original: MSS_8642-2 savidhaprasūtaratnaṃ śaṅkhanidhiṃ dūrataramakarot //
analyzed: savidha prasūta ratnam śaṅkhanidhim dūrataram akarot

original: MSS_8642A-1 kamanīyatārahārā candanaparihasitacārunīhārā /
analyzed: kamanīya tāra hārā candana parihasita cāru nīhārā

original: MSS_8642A-2 paricitapāṇḍyavihārā kamalamukhīyaṃ karāñcadupahārā //
analyzed: paricita pāṇḍya vihārā kamala mukhī iyam karāñcat upahārā

original: MSS_8643-1 kamanekatamādānaṃ suratanarajatucchalaṃ tadāsīnam /
analyzed: kam anekatama ādānam surata nara jatu chalam tadā āsīnam

original: MSS_8643-2 apyatimānaṃ khamate so'ganikānaṃ naraṃ jetum //
analyzed: api atimānam khamate naram jetum

original: MSS_8644-1 kamalaṃ kavalīkṛtaṃ na vā salilaṃ vā na salīlamāhutam /
analyzed: kamalam kavalīkṛtam na vā salilam vā na sa līlam āhutam

original: MSS_8644-2 kariṇā pariṇāmadāruṇo dadṛśe vindhyavane mṛgādhipaḥ //
analyzed: kariṇā pariṇāma dāruṇaḥ dadṛśe vindhya vane mṛga adhipaḥ

original: MSS_8645-1 kamalaṃ tava padakamale vimale mama dehi cañcarīkatvam /
analyzed: kamalam tava pada kamale vimale mama dehi cañcarīka tvam

original: MSS_8645-2 nānyat kimapi ca kāṅkṣe paścād gānaṃ kimasti bhikṣāyāḥ //
analyzed: na anyat kim api ca kāṅkṣe paścāt gānam kim asti bhikṣāyāḥ

original: MSS_8646-1 kamalaṃ bhavanaṃ rajo'ṅgarāgo madhu pānaṃ madhurāḥ priyāpralāpāḥ /
analyzed: kamalam bhavanam rajā uṅga rāgaḥ madhu pānam madhurāḥ priyā pralāpāḥ

original: MSS_8646-2 śayanaṃ mṛdu kesaropadhānaṃ bhramarasyāmbhasi kā na rājalīlā //
analyzed: śayanam mṛdu kesara upadhānam bhramarasya ambhasi kā na rāja līlā

original: MSS_8646A-1 kamaladṛśo'dhikapolaṃ daśanakṣatapaṅktirābhāti /
analyzed: kamala dṛśā udhi kapolam daśana kṣata paṅktiḥ ābhāti

original: MSS_8646A-2 yūno vaśayitumicchor japamālevātanoḥ pravālamayī //
analyzed: yūnaḥ vaśayitum icchoḥ japa mālā iva a tanoḥ pravāla mayī

original: MSS_8647-1 kamalanayana yuṣmadviprayogāturā sā sarasi sarasijāntaḥ snātukāmā mamajja /
analyzed: kamala nayana yuṣmad viprayoga āturā sā sarasi sarasija antar snātu kāmā mamajja

original: MSS_8647-2 drutataramanuyāyād yāvadūrdhvaṃ kṛśāṅgī hari hari hariṇākṣī paṅkamagnā babhūva //
analyzed: drutataram anuyāyāt yāvat ūrdhvam kṛśa aṅgī hari hari hariṇa akṣī paṅka magnā babhūva

original: MSS_8648-1 kamalanayanākarṇābhūṣe sphuranmaṇimañjule tribhuvanatale dṛṣṭvāmodaṃ prayāti na ko yuvā /
analyzed: kamala nayanā karṇa ābhūṣe sphurat maṇi mañjule tribhuvana tale dṛṣṭvā āmodam prayāti na kaḥ yuvā

original: MSS_8648-2 śamabhaṭaśiraśchettuṃ sajjīkṛte bata vedhasā na kimu kumate rajjūtkṣipte vibodhasi cakrake //
analyzed: śama bhaṭa śiraḥ chettum sajjīkṛte bata vedhasā na kimu kumate rajju utkṣipte vibodhasi cakrake

original: MSS_8649-1 kamalapallavavārikaṇopamaṃ kimiva pāsi sadā nidhanaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: kamala pallava vāri kaṇā upamam kim iva pāsi sadā nidhanam dhanam

original: MSS_8649-2 kalabhakarṇacalāñcalacañcalaṃ sthiratarāṇi yaśāṃsi na jīvitam //
analyzed: kalabhakarṇa cala añcala cañcalam sthiratarāṇi yaśāṃsi na jīvitam

original: MSS_8650-1 kamalabhūtanayā vadanāmbuje vasatu te kamalā karapallave /
analyzed: kamala bhū tanayā vadana ambuje vasatu te kamalā karapallave

original: MSS_8650-2 vapuṣi te ramatāṃ kamalāṅgajaḥ pratidinaṃ hṛdaye kamalāpatiḥ //
analyzed: vapuṣi te ramatām kamala aṅgajaḥ pratidinam hṛdaye kamalāpatiḥ

original: MSS_8651-1 kamalamadhunas tyaktvā pānaṃ vihāya navotpalaṃ prakṛtisubhagāṃ gandhoddāmāmapāsya ca mālatīm /
analyzed: kamala madhunaḥ tyaktvā pānam vihāya nava utpalam prakṛti subhagām gandha uddāmām apāsya ca mālatīm

original: MSS_8651-2 śaṭhamadhukarāḥ kliśyantīme kaṭāmbuṣu dantināṃ sulabhamapahāyai'vaṃ lokaḥ kaṭeṣu hi rajyate //
analyzed: śaṭha madhukarāḥ kliśyanti ime kaṭāmbuṣu dantinām sulabham apahāya evam lokaḥ kaṭeṣu hi rajyate

original: MSS_8652-1 kamalamanambhasi kamale ca kuvalaye tāni kanakalatikāyām /
analyzed: kamalam an ambhasi kamale ca kuvalaye tāni kanaka latikāyām

original: MSS_8652-2 sā ca sukumārasubhagety utpātaparamparā keyam //
analyzed: sā ca su kumāra subhagā iti utpāta paramparā kā iyam

original: MSS_8653-1 kamalamiva cāru vadanaṃ mṛṇālamiva komalaṃ bhujāyugalam /
analyzed: kamalam iva cāru vadanam mṛṇālam iva komalam bhujā yugalam

original: MSS_8653-2 alimāleva ca nīlā tavaiva madirekṣaṇe kabarī //
analyzed: ali mālā iva ca nīlā tava eva madirā īkṣaṇe kabarī

original: MSS_8654-1 kamalamukulamṛdvī phullarājīvagandhaḥ suratapayasi yasyāḥ saurabhaṃ divyamaṅge /
analyzed: kamala mukula mṛdvī phulla rājīva gandhaḥ surata payasi yasyāḥ saurabham divyam aṅge

original: MSS_8654-2 cakitamṛgadṛśābhe prāntarakte ca netre stanayugalamanarghyaṃ śrīphalaśrīviḍambi //
analyzed: cakita mṛga dṛśā ābhe prānta rakte ca netre stana yugalam anarghyam śrīphala śrī viḍambi

original: MSS_8655-1 tilakusumasamānāṃ bibhratī nāsikāṃ ca dvijagurusurapūjāṃ śraddadhānā sadaiva /
analyzed: tila kusuma samānām bibhratī nāsikām ca dvija guru sura pūjām śraddadhānā sadā eva

original: MSS_8655-2 kuvalayadalakāntiḥ kāpi cāmpeyagaurī vikacakamalakośākārakāmātapatrā //
analyzed: kuvalaya dala kāntiḥ kā api cāmpeya gaurī vikaca kamala kośa ākāraka āmātapatrā

original: MSS_8656-1 vrajati mṛdu salīlaṃ rājahaṃsīva tanvī trivalivalitamaghyā haṃsavāṇī suveṣā /
analyzed: vrajati mṛdu sa līlam rājahaṃsī iva tanvī trivali valita maghyā haṃsa vāṇī su veṣā

original: MSS_8656-2 mṛdu śuci laghu bhuṅkte māninī gāḍhalajjā dhavalakusumavāsovallabhā padminī syāt //
analyzed: mṛdu śuci laghu bhuṅkte māninī gāḍha lajjā dhavala kusuma vāsaḥ vallabhā padminī syāt

original: MSS_8657-1 kamalamukhi sarvatomukha- nivāraṇaṃ vidadhadeva bhūṣayati /
analyzed: kamala mukhi sarvatomukha nivāraṇam vidadhat eva bhūṣayati

original: MSS_8657-2 rodhoruddhasvarasās taraṅgiṇīs taralanayanāśca //
analyzed: rodhaḥ ruddha sva rasāḥ taraṅgiṇīḥ tarala nayanāḥ ca

original: MSS_8658-1 kamalavadanā pīnottuṅgaṃ ghaṭākṛti vibhratī stanayugamiyaṃ tanvī śyāmā viśāladṛgañcalā /
analyzed: kamala vadanā pīna uttuṅgam ghaṭa ākṛti vibhratī stana yugam iyam tanvī śyāmā viśāla dṛś añcalā

original: MSS_8658-2 viśadadaśanā madhyakṣāmā vṛtheti janāḥ śramaṃ vidadhati mudhā rāgāduccairanīdṛśavarṇane //
analyzed: viśada daśanā madhya kṣāmā vṛthā iti janāḥ śramam vidadhati mudhā rāgāt uccais anīdṛśa varṇane

original: MSS_8659-1 kamalavanacitāmbuḥ pāṭalāmodaramyaḥ sukhasalilaniṣekaḥ sevyacandrāṃśuhāraḥ /
MSS_8659-2 vrajatu tava nidāghaḥ kāminībhiḥ sameto niśi sulalitagīte harmyapṛṣṭhe sukhena //
analyzed: vrajatu tava nidāghaḥ kāminībhiḥ sametaḥ niśi su lalita gīte harmya pṛṣṭhe sukhena

original: MSS_8660-1 kamalaśaradhirambhāsaikatānukramāḍhyaṃ kanakakalaśabhārākrāntasaudāminīkam /
analyzed: kamala śaradhi rambhā saikata anukrama āḍhyam kanaka kalaśa bhāra ākrānta saudāminīkam

original: MSS_8660-2 kisalayitamṛṇālaṃ hāragarbhapravālaṃ kuvalayitaśaśāṅkaṃ kauśalaṃ sā vidhātuḥ //
analyzed: kisalayita mṛṇālam hāra garbha pravālam kuvalayita śaśāṅkam kauśalam sā vidhātuḥ

original: MSS_8661-1 kamalāḥ pākavinamrā mūlatalāghrātasurabhikahlārāḥ /
analyzed: kamalāḥ pāka vinamrāḥ mūla tala āghrāta surabhi kahlārāḥ

original: MSS_8661-2 pavanākampitaśirasaḥ prāyaḥ kurvanti parimalaślāghām //
analyzed: pavana ākampita śirasaḥ prāyas kurvanti parimala ślāghām

original: MSS_8661A-1 kamalākucakanakācala- jaladharamābhīrasundarīmadanam /
analyzed: kamalā kuca kanaka acala jaladharam ābhīra sundarī madanam

original: MSS_8661A-2 adhitataśeṣaphaṇāvali- kamalavanībhṛṅgamacyutaṃ vande //
analyzed: adhitata śeṣa phaṇa āvali kamala vanī bhṛṅgam acyutam vande

original: MSS_8662-1 kamalākṣi vilambyatāṃ kṣaṇaṃ kamanīye kacabhārabandhane /
analyzed: kamala akṣi vilambyatām kṣaṇam kamanīye kaca bhāra bandhane

original: MSS_8662-2 dṛḍhalagnamidaṃ dṛśoryugaṃ śanakairadya samuddharāmyaham //
analyzed: dṛḍha lagnam idam dṛśoḥ yugam śanakais adya samuddharāmi aham

original: MSS_8663-1 kamalācibukonnāyī kṛṣṇasya karaḥ karotu kalyāṇam /
analyzed: kamalā cibuka unnāyī kṛṣṇasya karaḥ karotu kalyāṇam

original: MSS_8663-2 mukura iva nīlavṛnto bhāti nitāntaṃ tadānanaṃ yena //
analyzed: mukuraḥ iva nīlavṛntaḥ bhāti nitāntam tad ānanam yena

original: MSS_8664-1 kamalāni pānamadhubhājanāni naḥ pidadhāti yaḥ sa vidhureṣa gocaraḥ /
analyzed: kamalāni pāna madhu bhājanāni naḥ pidadhāti yaḥ sa vidhuḥ eṣa gocaraḥ

original: MSS_8664-2 iti roṣaṇairiva madhuvratairdhutaṃ dadhatī mukhaṃ surabhicārumārutam //
analyzed: iti roṣaṇaiḥ iva madhu vrataiḥ dhutam dadhatī mukham surabhi cāru mārutam

original: MSS_8665-1 kamalābhyāṃ sudhāsindhuvadanekṣaṇayos tulām /
analyzed: kamalābhyām sudhā sindhu vadana īkṣaṇayoḥ tulām

original: MSS_8665-2 kalayantu pare kiṃ tu kveme paṅkeruhe kva te //
analyzed: kalayantu pare kim tu kva ime paṅkeruhe kva te

original: MSS_8666-1 kamalāsanakamalekṣaṇa- kamalārikirīṭakamalabhṛdvāhaiḥ /
MSS_8666-2 nutapadakamalā kamalā karadhṛtakamalā karotu me kuśalam //
analyzed: nuta pada kamalā kamalā kara dhṛta kamalā karotu me kuśalam

original: MSS_8667-1 kamalini malinīkaroṣi cetaḥ kimiti bakairavahelitānabhijñaiḥ /
analyzed: kamalini malinīkaroṣi cetaḥ kim iti bakaiḥ avahelita anabhijñaiḥ

original: MSS_8667-2 pariṇatamakarandamārmikāste jagati bhavantu cirāyuṣo milindāḥ //
analyzed: pariṇata makaranda mārmikāḥ te jagati bhavantu cira āyuṣaḥ milindāḥ

original: MSS_8668-1 kamalini vimale jale janis te taducitamācaraṇaṃ na saṃtanoṣi /
analyzed: kamalini vimale jale janiḥ te tad ucitam ācaraṇam na saṃtanoṣi

original: MSS_8668-2 malinamalikulaṃ yatastvamantaḥ śaśikiraṇān vimalān bahiṣkaroṣi //
analyzed: malinam ali kulam yatas tvam antar śaśi kiraṇān vimalān bahiṣkaroṣi

original: MSS_8669-1 kamalinīmalinī dayitaṃ vinā na sahate saha tena niṣevitām /
analyzed: kamalinī malinī dayitam vinā na sahate saha tena niṣevitām

original: MSS_8669-2 tamadhunā madhunā nihitaṃ hṛdi smarati sā ratisāramaharniśam //
analyzed: tam adhunā madhunā nihitam hṛdi smarati sā rati sāram aharniśam

original: MSS_8670-1 kamalinīvanakelikalārasī guṇavaśīkṛtakairaviṇīguṇaḥ /
MSS_8670-2 alirasau tava saurabhalobhataḥ patati ketakikaṇṭakasaṃkaṭe //
analyzed: aliḥ asau tava saurabha lobhataḥ patati ketakī kaṇṭaka saṃkaṭe

original: MSS_8671-1 kamaleḥ samakeśaṃ te kamalerṣyākaraṃ mukham /
analyzed: kamaleḥ sama keśam te kamala īrṣyā karam mukham

original: MSS_8671-2 kamalekhyaṃ karoṣi tvaṃ kamalevonmadiṣṇuṣu //
analyzed: kama lekhyam karoṣi tvam kamalā iva unmadiṣṇuṣu

original: MSS_8672-1 kamale kamalā śete haraḥ śete himālaye /
analyzed: kamale kamalā śete haraḥ śete himālaye

original: MSS_8672-2 kṣīrābdhau ca hariḥ śete manye matkuṇaśaṅkayā //
analyzed: kṣīrābdhau ca hariḥ śete manye matkuṇa śaṅkayā

original: MSS_8673-1 kamale kamale nityaṃ madhūni pibatas tava /
analyzed: kamale kamale nityam madhūni pibataḥ tava

original: MSS_8673-2 bhaviṣyanti na sandehaḥ kaṣṭaṃ doṣākarodaye //
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti na sandehaḥ kaṣṭam doṣa ākara udaye

original: MSS_8674-1 kamale kamalotpattiḥ śrūyate na ca dṛśyate /
analyzed: kamale kamala utpattiḥ śrūyate na ca dṛśyate

original: MSS_8674-2 bāle tava mukhāmbhoje dṛṣṭamindīvaradvayam //
analyzed: bāle tava mukha ambhoje dṛṣṭam indīvara dvayam

original: MSS_8675-1 kamale nidhāya kamalaṃ kalayantī kamalavāsinaṃ kamale /
analyzed: kamale nidhāya kamalam kalayantī kamala vāsinam kamale

original: MSS_8675-2 kamalayugādudbhūtaṃ kamalaṃ kamalena vārayati //
analyzed: kamala yugāt udbhūtam kamalam kamalena vārayati

original: MSS_8676-1 kamaleva matirmatiriva kamalā tanuriva vibhā vibheva tanuḥ /
analyzed: kamalā iva matiḥ matiḥ iva kamalā tanuḥ iva vibhā vibhā iva tanuḥ

original: MSS_8676-2 dharaṇīva dhṛtirdhūtiriva dharaṇī satataṃ vibhāti bata yasya //
analyzed: dharaṇī iva dhṛtiḥ dhūtiḥ iva dharaṇī satatam vibhāti bata yasya

original: MSS_8676A-1 kamalodarakomalapādatalaṃ gaṇanāparivarjitabāhubalam /
analyzed: kamala udara komala pāda talam gaṇanā parivarjita bāhu balam

original: MSS_8676A-2 praṇamāmi jagattrayabodhikaraṃ giranāravibhūṣaṇanemijinam //
analyzed: praṇamāmi jagattraya bodhi karam gira nāra vibhūṣaṇa nemi jinam

original: MSS_8677-1 kamiturabhisṛtvarīṇāṃ gaurāṅgīṇāmihendudhavalāsu /
analyzed: kamituḥ abhisṛtvarīṇām gaura aṅgīṇām iha indu dhavalāsu

original: MSS_8677-2 uḍḍayamānānāmiva rajaniṣu paramīkṣyate chāyā //
analyzed: uḍḍayamānānām iva rajaniṣu param īkṣyate chāyā

original: MSS_8677A-1 kampaḥ svedaḥ śramo mūrcchā bhramirglānirbalakṣayaḥ /
analyzed: kampaḥ svedaḥ śramaḥ mūrcchā bhramiḥ glāniḥ bala kṣayaḥ

original: MSS_8677A-2 rājayakṣmādirogāśca bhaveyurmaithunotthitāḥ //
analyzed: rājayakṣma ādi rogāḥ ca bhaveyuḥ maithuna utthitāḥ

original: MSS_8677B-1 kampakṣitīśamaniśaṃ kathayanti santaḥ saṅgītadugdhajaladheruditaṃ sudhāṃśum /
analyzed: kampa kṣitīśam aniśam kathayanti santaḥ saṅgīta dugdha jaladheḥ uditam sudhāṃśum

original: MSS_8677B-2 sāhityamānasasarovararājahaṃsaṃ saṅgrāmaraṅganaṭanasthitisūtradhāram //
analyzed: sāhitya mānasa sarovara rājahaṃsam saṅgrāma raṅga naṭana sthiti sūtradhāram

original: MSS_8678-1 kampate guṇamuṣṭis tu mārgaṇasya hi pṛṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: kampate guṇa muṣṭiḥ tu mārgaṇasya hi pṛṣṭhatas

original: MSS_8678-2 saṃmukhī syād dhanurmuṣṭis tadā vāme gatirbhavet //
analyzed: saṃmukhī syāt dhanuḥ muṣṭiḥ tadā vāme gatiḥ bhavet

original: MSS_8679-1 kampante kapayo bhṛśaṃ jaḍakṛśaṃ go'jāvikaṃ glāyati śvā cullīkuharodaraṃ kṣaṇamapi kṣipto'pi naivojjñati /
analyzed: kampante kapayaḥ bhṛśam jaḍa kṛśam go jāvikam glāyati śvā cullī kuhara udaram kṣaṇam api kṣiptaḥ api

original: MSS_8679-2 śītārtivyasanāturaḥ punarayaṃ dīno janaḥ kūrmavat svānyaṅgāni śarīra eva hi nije nihnotumākāṅkṣati //
analyzed: śīta ārti vyasana āturaḥ punar ayam dīnaḥ janaḥ kūrma vat svāni aṅgāni śarīre eva hi nije nihnotum ākāṅkṣati

original: MSS_8680-1 kampante girayaḥ puraṃdarabhiyā mainākamukhyāḥ punaḥ krandantyambudharāḥ sphuranti baḍavāvaktrodgatā vahnayaḥ /
