analyzed: kampante girayaḥ puraṃdara bhiyā maināka mukhyāḥ punar krandanti ambudharāḥ sphuranti baḍavā vaktra udgatāḥ vahnayaḥ

original: MSS_8680-2 bhoḥ kumbhodbhava mucyatāṃ jalanidhiḥ svastyastu te sāṃprataṃ nidrāluḥ ślathabāhuvallikamalāśleṣo hariḥ sīdati //
analyzed: bhoḥ kumbhodbhava mucyatām jalanidhiḥ svasti astu te sāṃpratam nidrāluḥ ślatha bāhu vallī kamala āśleṣaḥ hariḥ sīdati

original: MSS_8681-1 kampaprado'sau śiśirartucauro muṣṇāti vṛkṣān harate kimasmān /
analyzed: kampa pradosau śiśira ṛtu cauraḥ muṣṇāti vṛkṣān harate kim asmān

original: MSS_8681-2 itīva bhītvā paripāṇḍurāṇi jātāni śuṣkāṇi tṛṇāni bhūmau //
analyzed: iti iva bhītvā paripāṇḍurāṇi jātāni śuṣkāṇi tṛṇāni bhūmau

original: MSS_8682-1 kampitaṃ bhītamudghṛṣṭam avyaktamanunāsikam /
analyzed: kampitam bhītam udghṛṣṭam avyaktam anunāsikam

original: MSS_8682-2 kākasvaraṃ śiraḥsthaṃ ca tathā sthānavivarjitam //
analyzed: kāka svaram śiraḥ stham ca tathā sthāna vivarjitam

original: MSS_8683-1 kampitaḥ patasi pādakayugme netrakoṇanihato'pi bhayārtaḥ /
analyzed: kampitaḥ patasi pādaka yugme netra koṇa nihataḥ api bhaya ārtaḥ

original: MSS_8683-2 yudhyase kimiṣubhiḥ priya bhīruṃ bhāṣukāmiti hasaṃścalito'nyaḥ //
analyzed: yudhyase kim iṣubhiḥ priya bhīrum bhāṣukām iti hasan calitaḥ nyaḥ

original: MSS_8684-1 kampī ko'bhividhau kimavyayamiha kvāste dravatvaṃ punaḥ syād rūpaṃ prathamādvitīyavacane kiṃ veḥ khamadyāhvaya /
analyzed: kampī kobhi vidhau kim avyayam iha kva āste drava tvam punar syāt rūpam prathamā dvitīya vacane kim veḥ kham adya āhvaya

original: MSS_8684-2 ko dhāturgatigandhayordraviṇināṃ kiṃ yācate bhikṣukaḥ praśnānāṃ drutamuttarāṇi vada re bhayyā jalebī khavā //
analyzed: kaḥ dhātuḥ gati gandhayoḥ draviṇinām kim yācate bhikṣukaḥ praśnānām drutam uttarāṇi vada re bhayyā jalebī khavā

original: MSS_8685-1 kampoparuddhasarvāṅgair galatsvedodabindubhiḥ /
analyzed: kampa uparuddha sarva aṅgaiḥ galat sveda uda bindubhiḥ

original: MSS_8685-2 tvadārabdhairmahīnātha vairibhirvanitāyitam //
analyzed: tvad ārabdhaiḥ mahīnātha vairibhiḥ vanitāyitam

original: MSS_8686-1 kambāghātairvapuṣi nihatairucchalacchoṇitaughaiḥ kārāgārairnibiḍanigaḍairlaṅghanaṃ cumbanaṃ ca /
analyzed: kamba āghātaiḥ vapuṣi nihataiḥ ucchalat śoṇita oghaiḥ kārā āgāraiḥ nibiḍa nigaḍaiḥ laṅghanam cumbanam ca

original: MSS_8686-2 evaṃ jñātvā virama sumate mā kuru tvaṃ niyogaṃ karṇopānte malinavadanā lekhinī phūtkaroti //
analyzed: evam jñātvā virama sumate mā kuru tvam niyogam karṇa upānte malina vadanā lekhinī phūtkaroti

original: MSS_8687-1 kambukaṇṭhi caraṇaḥ śanaiścaro rāhureṣa tava keśakalāpaḥ /
analyzed: kambu kaṇṭhi caraṇaḥ śanaiścaraḥ rāhuḥ eṣa tava keśa kalāpaḥ

original: MSS_8687-2 na cyutaṃ tadapi yauvanametat sā payodharaguroranukampā //
analyzed: na cyutam tat api yauvanam etat sā payodhara guroḥ anukampā

original: MSS_8688-1 kayāpi krīḍatu brahmā divyāḥ strīrdīvyata svayam /
analyzed: kayā api krīḍatu brahmā divyāḥ strīḥ dīvyata svayam

original: MSS_8688-2 kalistu caratu brahma praita vātipriyāya vaḥ //
analyzed: kaliḥ tu caratu brahma praita vā atipriyāya vaḥ

original: MSS_8689-1 kayāsi kāmin suratāparādhāt pādānataḥ kopanayāvadhūtaḥ /
analyzed: kayā asi kāmin surata aparādhāt pāda ānataḥ kopanayā avadhūtaḥ

original: MSS_8689-2 tasyāḥ kariṣyāmi dṛḍhānutāpaṃ pravālaśayyāśaraṇaṃ śarīram //
analyzed: tasyāḥ kariṣyāmi dṛḍha anutāpam pravāla śayyā śaraṇam śarīram

original: MSS_8690-1 karaṃ gṛhītvā parimṛdya mandaṃ kaṭiṃ nipīḍyānuvimṛjya corum /
analyzed: karam gṛhītvā parimṛdya mandam kaṭim nipīḍya anuvimṛjya ca ūrum

original: MSS_8690-2 nīvīmapākṛtya vilakṣaṇāyāḥ śaṭho manojopaniṣat papāṭha //
analyzed: nīvīm apākṛtya vilakṣaṇāyāḥ śaṭhaḥ manoja upaniṣad papāṭha

original: MSS_8691-1 karaṃ prasārya sūryeṇa dakṣiṇāśāvalambinā /
analyzed: karam prasārya sūryeṇa dakṣiṇa āśā avalambinā

original: MSS_8691-2 na kevalamanenātmā divaso'pi laghūkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: na kevalam anena ātmā divasaḥ api laghūkṛtaḥ

original: MSS_8692-1 karakaṅkaṭakuṭyaṅkakhaṅgasaṃghaṭṭaṭāṅkṛtaiḥ /
analyzed: kara kaṅkaṭa kuṭī aṅka khaṅga saṃghaṭṭa ṭāṅkṛtaiḥ

original: MSS_8692-2 kālarātryā pranṛtyantyā raṇavīṇeva vādyate //
analyzed: kālarātryā pranṛtyantyā raṇa vīṇā iva vādyate

original: MSS_8693-1 karakajalapūtabhūtala- nihitapado vihitavikṛtahuṃkāraḥ /
analyzed: nihita padaḥ vihita vikṛta huṃkāraḥ

original: MSS_8693-2 api vitathamantragaṇanā- vyagrasamagrāṅgulīparvā //
analyzed: api vitatha mantra gaṇanā vyagra samagra aṅgulī parvā

original: MSS_8694-1 karakampitakhaṅgayaṣṭibhīme raṇasaṃnāhitarāmanāthavīre /
analyzed: kara kampita khaṅga yaṣṭi bhīme raṇa saṃnāhita rāma nātha vīre

original: MSS_8694-2 aribhūbhṛdamartyasundarīṇām acalan dakṣiṇavāmalocanāni //
analyzed: ari bhūbhṛt amartya sundarīṇām acalān dakṣiṇa vāma locanāni

original: MSS_8695-1 karakalitadāranarake śerata iha ye sajanti bhavasindhau /
analyzed: kara kalita dāra narake śerate iha ye sajanti bhava sindhau

original: MSS_8695-2 rasikās ta eva mānyā manyantāṃ dhanyamātmānam //
analyzed: rasikāḥ te eva mānyāḥ manyantām dhanyam ātmānam

original: MSS_8696-1 karakalitapināka nākanātha dbiṣadurumānasaśūla śūlapāṇe /
analyzed: kara kalita pināka nākanātha dbiṣat uru mānasa śūla śūlapāṇe

original: MSS_8696-2 bhava vṛṣabhavimāna mānaśauṇḍa trijagadakāraṇatāraka prasīda //
analyzed: bhava vṛṣabha vimāna māna śauṇḍa trijagat akāraṇa tāraka prasīda

original: MSS_8697-1 karakākṛtabhīkabhekaloka- pratipālyāḥ kimu sāgareṇa kulyāḥ /
analyzed: karaka ākṛta bhīka bheka loka pratipālyāḥ kimu sāgareṇa kulyāḥ

original: MSS_8697-2 valabhitkuliśaprahārabhīru- kṣitibhṛdrakṣaṇadakṣiṇena tulyāḥ //
analyzed: vala bhid kuliśa prahāra bhīru kṣitibhṛt rakṣaṇa dakṣiṇena tulyāḥ

original: MSS_8697A-1 karakiśalayacālyamānasūrpa- kramanamadunnamadakṣipakṣmapāli /
analyzed: kara kiśalaya cālyamāna sūrpa krama namat unnamat akṣi pakṣma pāli

original: MSS_8697A-2 karanihitakanīnikaṃ smitākṣyāḥ kṣaṇamapi notpavanaṃ jahāti cetaḥ //
analyzed: kara nihita kanīnikam smita akṣyāḥ kṣaṇam api nā utpavanam jahāti cetaḥ

original: MSS_8698-1 karakisalayaṃ dhūtvā dhūtvā vilambitamekhalā kṣipati sumanomālāśeṣaṃ pradīpaśikhāṃ prati /
analyzed: kara kisalayam dhūtvā dhūtvā vilambita mekhalā kṣipati sumanaḥ mālā śeṣam pradīpa śikhām prati

original: MSS_8698-2 sthagayati muhuḥ patyurnetre vihasya samākulā surataviratau ramyaṃ tanvī punaḥ punarīkṣyate //
analyzed: sthagayati muhur patyuḥ netre vihasya samākulā surata viratau ramyam tanvī punar punar īkṣyate

original: MSS_8698A-1 karakisalayamūlaṃ dhunvatīnāṃ sa dhanyaḥ śravaṇapathamanalpaṃ yasya puṃsaḥ praviṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: kara kisalaya mūlam dhunvatīnām sa dhanyaḥ śravaṇa patham analpam yasya puṃsaḥ praviṣṭāḥ

original: MSS_8698A-2 navarataparirambhe bālasīmantinīnāṃ ahaha na na na mā mā muñca muñceti vācaḥ //
analyzed: nava rata parirambhe bāla sīmantinīnām ahaha na na na mā mā muñca muñca iti vācaḥ

original: MSS_8699-1 karacaraṇakāñcihāra- prahāramavacintya balagṛhītakacaḥ /
analyzed: kara caraṇa kāñci hāra prahāram avacintya bala gṛhīta kacaḥ

original: MSS_8699-2 praṇayī cumbati dayitā- vadanaṃ sphuradadharamaruṇākṣam //
analyzed: praṇayī cumbati dayitā vadanam sphurat adharam aruṇa akṣam

original: MSS_8700-1 karacaraṇakṛtaṃ vā kāyajaṃ karmajaṃ vā śravaṇanayanajaṃ vā mānasaṃ vāparādham /
analyzed: kara caraṇa kṛtam vā kāya jam karma jam vā śravaṇa nayana jam vā mānasam vā aparādham

original: MSS_8700-2 vihitamavihitaṃ vā sarvametat kṣamasva jaya jaya karuṇābdhe śrīmahādeva śaṃbho //
analyzed: vihitam avihitam vā sarvam etat kṣamasva jaya jaya karuṇā abdhe śrī mahādeva śaṃbho

original: MSS_8701-1 karacaraṇanāsamādau karṇau gṛhṇāti raktatāṃ gamayan /
analyzed: kara caraṇa nāsam ādau karṇau gṛhṇāti rakta tām gamayan

original: MSS_8701-2 śītaṃ gurukṛtapīḍaṃ paścādaṅgāni kūrma iva //
analyzed: śītam guru kṛta pīḍam paścāt aṅgāni kūrmaḥ iva

original: MSS_8702-1 karacaraṇena praharati yathā yathāṅgeṣu kopataralākṣī /
analyzed: kara caraṇena praharati yathā yathā aṅgeṣu kopa tarala akṣī

original: MSS_8702-2 roṣayati paruṣavacanais tathā tathā preyasīṃ rasikaḥ //
analyzed: roṣayati paruṣa vacanaiḥ tathā tathā preyasīm rasikaḥ

original: MSS_8703-1 karaculukajalo mahodadhiś caraṇanibaddhamaho nijāṅgaṇam /
analyzed: kara culuka jalaḥ mahā udadhiḥ caraṇa nibaddha mahaḥ nija aṅgaṇam

original: MSS_8703-2 nijasadanasamaṃ rasātalaṃ bhavati nṛṇāṃ vyavasāyaśālinām //
analyzed: nija sadana samam rasātalam bhavati nṛṇām vyavasāya śālinām

original: MSS_8704-1 karajadaśanacihnaṃ naiśamaṅge'nyanārī- janitamiti saroṣāmīrṣyayā śaṅkamānām /
analyzed: karaja daśana cihnam naiśam aṅgenya nārī janitam iti sa roṣām īrṣyayā śaṅkamānām

original: MSS_8704-2 smarasi na khalu dattaṃ mattayaitattvayaiva striyamanunayatītthaṃ vrīḍamānāṃ vilāsī //
analyzed: smarasi na khalu dattam mattayā etat tvayā eva striyam anunayati ittham vrīḍamānām vilāsī

original: MSS_8705-1 karajapadavibhūṣitā yathā tvaṃ sudati daśanavikṣatādharā ca /
analyzed: karaja pada vibhūṣitā yathā tvam sudati daśana vikṣata adharā ca

original: MSS_8705-2 gatirapi caraṇāvalagnamandā tvamasi mṛgasamākṣi kāmadattā //
analyzed: gatiḥ api caraṇa avalagna mandā tvam asi mṛga sama akṣi kāma dattā

original: MSS_8706-1 karajālamapūrvaceṣṭitaṃ vas tadabhīṣṭapradamastu tigmabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: kara jālam apūrva ceṣṭitam vaḥ tat abhīṣṭa pradam astu tigmabhāsaḥ

original: MSS_8706-2 kriyate bhavabandhanād vimuktiḥ praṇatānāmupasevitena yena //
analyzed: kriyate bhava bandhanāt vimuktiḥ praṇatānām upasevitena yena

original: MSS_8707-1 karañjāragvadhāriṣṭasaptaparṇatvacākṛtaḥ /
MSS_8707-2 upacāraḥ krimiharo mūtramustaviḍaṅgavān //
MSS_8708-1 karaṭikaraṭe bhrasyaddānapravāhapipāsayā parisarasaradbhṛṅgaśreṇī karoti yadā ravam /
analyzed: karaṭi karaṭe bhrasyat dāna pravāha pipāsayā parisara sarat bhṛṅga śreṇī karoti yadā ravam

original: MSS_8708-2 vadati śirasaḥ kampairnāsmānnivāraya vāraṇa vitara vitarāmānaṃ dānaṃ calāḥ kila saṃpadaḥ //
analyzed: vadati śirasaḥ kampaiḥ na asmān nivāraya vāraṇa vitara vitarāmānam dānam calāḥ kila saṃpadaḥ

original: MSS_8709-1 karaṇabhagaṇadoṣaṃ vārasaṃkrāntidoṣaṃ kutithikulikadoṣaṃ yāmayāmārdhadoṣam /
analyzed: karaṇa bhagaṇa doṣam vāra saṃkrānti doṣam ku tithi kulika doṣam yāma yāma ardha doṣam

original: MSS_8709-2 kujaśaniravidoṣaṃ rāhuketvādidoṣaṃ harati sakaladoṣaṃ candramāḥ saṃmukhasthaḥ //
analyzed: kuja śaniḥ avi doṣam rāhu ketu ādi doṣam harati sakala doṣam candramāḥ saṃmukha sthaḥ

original: MSS_8710-1 karataralitabandhaṃ kañcukaṃ kurvatīnāṃ pratiphalitamidānīṃ daipamātāmramarciḥ /
analyzed: kara taralita bandham kañcukam kurvatīnām pratiphalitam idānīm daipam ātāmram arciḥ

original: MSS_8710-2 stanataṭapariṇāhe bhāminīnāṃ bhaviṣyan nakhapadalipilīlāsūtrapātaṃ karoti //
analyzed: stana taṭa pariṇāhe bhāminīnām bhaviṣyat nakha pada lipi līlā sūtra pātam karoti

original: MSS_8711-1 karatalayugapariṇaddhe kucakalaśe kuṅkumāruṇe tasyāḥ /
analyzed: kara tala yuga pariṇaddhe kuca kalaśe kuṅkuma aruṇe tasyāḥ

original: MSS_8711-2 sindūrite karipateḥ kumbhe nakṣatramāleva //
analyzed: sindūrite kari pateḥ kumbhe nakṣatra mālā iva

original: MSS_8712-1 karadīkaraṇaṃ rājñāṃ ripūṇāṃ parimardanam /
analyzed: karadīkaraṇam rājñām ripūṇām parimardanam

original: MSS_8712-2 bhūmerupārjanaṃ bhūyo rājavṛttaṃ tu cāṣṭadhā //
analyzed: bhūmeḥ upārjanam bhūyaḥ rāja vṛttam tu ca aṣṭadhā

original: MSS_8713-1 karanakharavidīrṇadhvāntakumbhīndrakumbhāt tuhinakaṇamiṣeṇa kṣiptamuktāprarohaḥ /
analyzed: kara nakhara vidīrṇa dhvānta kumbhi indra kumbhāt tuhina kaṇa miṣeṇa kṣipta muktā prarohaḥ

original: MSS_8713-2 ayamudayadharitrīdhārimūrdhāviruḍho nayanapathamupeto bhānumatkesarīndraḥ //
analyzed: ayam udaya dharitrī dhāri mūrdhā viruḍhaḥ nayana patham upetaḥ bhānumat kesari indraḥ

original: MSS_8714-1 karapadānanalocananāmabhiḥ śatadalaiḥ sutanorvirahajvare /
analyzed: kara pada ānana locana nāmabhiḥ śatadalaiḥ su tanoḥ viraha jvare

original: MSS_8714-2 ravimaho bahupītacaraṃ cirād aniśatāpamiṣādudasṛjyata //
analyzed: ravi mahaḥ bahu pīta caram cirāt aniśa tāpa miṣāt udasṛjyata

original: MSS_8715-1 karapātairdurālokais tīkṣṇaḥ saṃtāpayan prajāḥ /
analyzed: karapātaiḥ durālokaiḥ tīkṣṇaḥ saṃtāpayan prajāḥ

original: MSS_8715-2 bhānurna bhavatā tulyaḥ kṣaṇasaṃraktamaṇḍalaḥ //
analyzed: bhānuḥ na bhavatā tulyaḥ kṣaṇa saṃrakta maṇḍalaḥ

original: MSS_8716-1 karapraceyāmuttuṅgaprabhuśaktiṃ prathīyasīm /
analyzed: kara praceyām uttuṅga prabhu śaktim prathīyasīm

original: MSS_8716-2 prajñābalabṛhanmūlaḥ phalatyutsāhapādapaḥ //
analyzed: prajñā bala bṛhat mūlaḥ phalati utsāha pādapaḥ

original: MSS_8717-1 karabadarasadṛśamakhilaṃ bhuvanatalaṃ yatprasādataḥ kavayaḥ /
analyzed: kara badara sadṛśam akhilam bhuvana talam yad prasādataḥ kavayaḥ

original: MSS_8717-2 paśyanti sūkṣmamatayaḥ sā jayati sarasvatī devī //
analyzed: paśyanti sūkṣma matayaḥ sā jayati sarasvatī devī

original: MSS_8718-1 karabha kimidaṃ dīrghocchvāsaiḥ kṣiṇoṣi śarīrakaṃ virama śaṭha he kasyātyantaṃ sakhe sukhamāgatam /
analyzed: karabha kim idam dīrgha ucchvāsaiḥ kṣiṇoṣi śarīrakam virama śaṭha he kasya atyantam sakhe sukham āgatam

original: MSS_8718-2 cara kisalayaṃ svasthaḥ pīlorvimuñca madhuspṛhāṃ punarapi bhavān kalyāṇānāṃ bhaviṣyati bhājanam //
analyzed: cara kisalayam svasthaḥ pīloḥ vimuñca madhu spṛhām punar api bhavān kalyāṇānām bhaviṣyati bhājanam

original: MSS_8719-1 karabhadayite yattat pītaṃ sudurlabhamekadā madhu vanagataṃ tasyālābhe virauṣi kimutsukā /
analyzed: karabha dayite yat tat pītam su durlabham ekadā madhu vana gatam tasya alābhe virauṣi kim utsukā

original: MSS_8719-2 kuru paricitaiḥ pīloḥ patrairdhūtiṃ marugocarair jagati sakale kasyāvāptiḥ sukhasya nirantarā //
analyzed: kuru paricitaiḥ pīloḥ patraiḥ dhūtim maru gocaraiḥ jagati sakale kasya avāptiḥ sukhasya nirantarā

original: MSS_8720-1 karabhadayite yo'sau pīlus tvayā madhulubdhayā vyapagataghanacchāyas tyakto na sādaramīkṣitaḥ /
analyzed: karabha dayite yaḥ asau pīluḥ tvayā madhu lubdhayā vyapagata ghana chāyaḥ tyaktaḥ na sa ādaram īkṣitaḥ

original: MSS_8720-2 calakisalayaḥ so'pīdānīṃ prarūḍhanavāṅkuraḥ karabhadayitāvṛndairanyaiḥ sukhaṃ paribhujyate //
analyzed: cala kisalayaḥ saḥ upi idānīm prarūḍha nava aṅkuraḥ karabha dayitā vṛndaiḥ anyaiḥ sukham paribhujyate

original: MSS_8721-1 karabha yadi kadācit prabhraman daivayogān madhukarakulatastvaṃ prāpayethā madhūni /
analyzed: karabha yadi kadācid prabhraman daivayogāt madhukara kulataḥ tvam prāpayethāḥ madhūni

original: MSS_8721-2 virama virama tebhyaḥ santi śaṣpāṇyaraṇye prathamamukharasāste śoṣayantyeva paścāt //
analyzed: virama virama tebhyaḥ santi śaṣpāṇi araṇye prathama mukha rasāḥ te śoṣayanti eva paścāt

original: MSS_8722-1 karabha rabhasāt kroṣṭuṃ vāñchasyaho śravaṇajvaraṃ śaraṇamathavānṛjvī dīrghā tavaiva śirodharā /
analyzed: karabha rabhasāt kroṣṭum vāñchasi aho śravaṇa jvaram śaraṇam athavā anṛjvī dīrghā tava eva śirodharā

original: MSS_8722-2 bahugalabilāvṛttiśrāntoccaliṣyati vāṅ mukhāt kiyati samaye ko jānīte bhaviṣyati kasya kim //
analyzed: bahu gala bila āvṛtti śrāntā uccaliṣyati vāc mukhāt kiyati samaye kaḥ jānīte bhaviṣyati kasya kim

original: MSS_8723-1 karamudayamahīdharastanāgre galitatamaḥpaṭalāṃśuke niveśya /
analyzed: karam udaya mahīdhara stana agre galita tamaḥ paṭala aṃśuke niveśya

original: MSS_8723-2 vikasitakumudekṣaṇaṃ vicumba- tyayamamareśadiśo mukhaṃ sudhāṃśuḥ //
analyzed: vikasita kumuda īkṣaṇam vicumba ti ayam amara īśa diśaḥ mukham sudhāṃśuḥ

original: MSS_8724-1 karayugmapadmamukulāpavarjitaiḥ prativeśma lājakusumairavākiran /
analyzed: kara yugma padma mukula apavarjitaiḥ prativeśma lāja kusumaiḥ avākiran

original: MSS_8724-2 avadīrṇaśuktipuṭamuktamauktaka- prakarairiva priyarathāṅgamaṅganāḥ //
analyzed: avadīrṇa śukti puṭa mukta mauktaka prakaraiḥ iva priya rathāṅgam aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_8725-1 karayoḥ kalahāyamānayor ubhayoreva payodharopari /
analyzed: karayoḥ kalahāyamānayoḥ ubhayoḥ eva payodhara upari

original: MSS_8725-2 valayāvalayo balābalaṃ bahuvelaṃ patayālavo jaguḥ //
analyzed: valayāvalayaḥ balābalam bahu velam patayālavaḥ jaguḥ

original: MSS_8726-1 kararuddhanīvi dayitopagatau galitaṃ tvarāvirahitāsanayā /
analyzed: kara ruddha nīvi dayitā upagatau galitam tvarā virahita āsanayā

original: MSS_8726-2 kṣaṇadṛṣṭahāṭakaśilāsadṛśa- sphuradūrubhitti vasanaṃ vavase //
analyzed: kṣaṇa dṛṣṭa hāṭaka śilā sadṛśa sphurat ūru bhitti vasanam vavase

original: MSS_8727-1 kararuhaśikhānikhāta bhrāntvā viśrānta rajaniduravāpa /
analyzed: kararuha śikhā nikhāta bhrāntvā viśrānta rajani duravāpa

original: MSS_8727-2 raviriva yantrollikhitaḥ kṛśo'pi lokasya harasi dṛśam //
analyzed: raviḥ iva yantra ullikhitaḥ kṛśaḥ api lokasya harasi dṛśam

original: MSS_8728-1 karalālito'pi dahati jvalati vyajanena vījyamāno'pi /
analyzed: kara lālitaḥ api dahati jvalati vyajanena vījyamānaḥ api

original: MSS_8728-2 dahana ivānirvāṇaṃ na vimuñcatyuṣṇatāṃ piśunaḥ //
analyzed: dahanaḥ iva anirvāṇam na vimuñcati uṣṇa tām piśunaḥ

original: MSS_8729-1 karavāriruheṇa saṃdhunāne taravārri nṛpatau mukundadeve /
analyzed: kara vāriruheṇa saṃdhunāne nṛpatau mukundadeve

original: MSS_8729-2 racayantyamarāvatītaruṇyaḥ prathamaṃ kāñcanapārijātamālāḥ //
analyzed: racayanti amarāvatī taruṇyaḥ prathamam kāñcana pārijāta mālāḥ

original: MSS_8730-1 karavālakarālavāridhārā yamunā divyataraṅgiṇī ca kīrtiḥ /
analyzed: karavāla karāla vāri dhārā yamunā divya taraṅgiṇī ca kīrtiḥ

original: MSS_8730-2 tava kāmada tīrtharāja dūrād anubadhnāti sarasvatī kavīnām //
analyzed: tava kāma da tīrtha rāja dūrāt anubadhnāti sarasvatī kavīnām

original: MSS_8731-1 karaśīkaraśītalaṃ vitanvan vanabhūbhāgamudagradāvadagdham /
analyzed: kara śīkara śītalam vitanvan vana bhū bhāgam udagra dāva dagdham

original: MSS_8731-2 purato'ñcati cen na yūthanāthaḥ kalabhānāṃ sulabhas tadā na panthāḥ //
analyzed: puratas uñcati ced na yūtha nāthaḥ kalabhānām sulabhaḥ tadā na panthāḥ

original: MSS_8732-1 karasādo'mbaratyāgas tejohāniḥ sarāgatā /
MSS_8732-2 vāruṇīsaṅgajāvasthā bhānunāpyanubhūyate //
analyzed: vāruṇī saṅga ja avasthā bhānunā api anubhūyate

original: MSS_8732A-1 karasthamapyevamamī kṛṣīvalāḥ kṣipanti baujaṃ pṛthupaṅkasaṅkaṭe /
analyzed: kara stham api evam amī kṛṣīvalāḥ kṣipanti baujam pṛthu paṅka saṅkaṭe

original: MSS_8732A-2 vayasya kenāpi kathaṃ vilokitaḥ samasti nāstītyathavā phalodayaḥ //
analyzed: vayasya kena api katham vilokitaḥ samasti na asti iti athavā phala udayaḥ

original: MSS_8733-1 karasthamudakaṃ tyaktvā ghanasthamabhivāñchati /
analyzed: kara stham udakam tyaktvā ghana stham abhivāñchati

original: MSS_8733-2 siddhamannaṃ parityajya bhikṣāmaṭati durmatiḥ //
analyzed: siddham annam parityajya bhikṣām aṭati durmatiḥ

original: MSS_8734-1 karasparśārambhāt pulakitapṛthūrojakalaśo śramāmbho vāmārdhe vamati madanākūtisulabham /
analyzed: kara sparśa ārambhāt śrama ambhaḥ vāma ardhe vamati madana ākūti sulabham

original: MSS_8734-2 vibhorvāraṃ vāraṃ kṛtasamadhikoddhūlanavidhes tanau bhasmasnānaṃ kathamapi samāptaṃ vijayate //
analyzed: vibhoḥ vāram vāram kṛta samadhika uddhūlana vidheḥ tanau bhasma snānam katham api samāptam vijayate

original: MSS_8735-1 karāgrajāgracchatakoṭirarthī yayorimau tau tulayet kucau cet /
MSS_8735-2 sarvaṃ tadā śrīphalamunmadiṣṇu jātaṃ vaṭīmapyadhunā na labdhum //
analyzed: sarvam tadā śrīphalam unmadiṣṇu jātam vaṭīm api adhunā na labdhum

original: MSS_8736-1 karādgalitakhādyasya kā hāniḥ kariṇo bhavet /
analyzed: karāt galita khādyasya kā hāniḥ kariṇaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_8736-2 pipīlikā tu tenaiva bibharti svakuṭumbakam //
analyzed: pipīlikā tu tena eva bibharti sva kuṭumbakam

original: MSS_8737-1 karānītaṃ paṭānītaṃ striyānītaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kara ānītam paṭa ānītam striyā ānītam tathā eva ca

original: MSS_8737-2 eraṇḍapatrairānītaṃ devatānāṃ ca nārhati //
analyzed: eraṇḍa patraiḥ ānītam devatānām ca na arhati

original: MSS_8737A-1 karān tirodhāya tarūnnipīḍya śilā avaskandya mahīyaso'pi /
analyzed: karān tirodhāya tarūn nipīḍya śilāḥ avaskandya mahīyasaḥ api

original: MSS_8737A-2 ujjṛmbhitaḥ kālavaśāt tadanyas teṣāmadhastātpunareva jātaḥ //
analyzed: ujjṛmbhitaḥ kāla vaśāt tad anyaḥ teṣām adhastāt punar eva jātaḥ

original: MSS_8738-1 karāmbujasajatsamākṣavalayā tanus tava śubhe jitendusuṣamā /
analyzed: kara ambuja sajat sama akṣa valayā tanuḥ tava śubhe jita indu suṣamā

original: MSS_8738-2 chinattu duritacchaṭāṃ mama nadī taṭīmiva calajjaloddhatagatiḥ //
analyzed: chinattu durita chaṭām mama nadī taṭīm iva calat jala uddhata gatiḥ

original: MSS_8739-1 karāmbhoje kañjī madanamadabhañjī padajuṣāṃ manaḥpuñjārañjī madhuramaṇimañjīracaraṇaḥ /
analyzed: kara ambhoje kañjī madana mada bhañjī pada juṣām manaḥ puñja ārañjī madhura maṇi mañjīra caraṇaḥ

original: MSS_8739-2 kalākūtavyañjī vrajayuvatisañjī jalamucāṃ gabhīrābhāgañjī mama sa paramañjīvanadhanam //
analyzed: kalā ākūta vyañjī vraja yuvati sañjī jalamucām gabhīra ābhā gañjī mama sa paramañjīvana dhanam

original: MSS_8740-1 karāravindena padāravindaṃ mukhāravinde viniveśayantam /
analyzed: kara aravindena pada aravindam mukha aravinde viniveśayantam

original: MSS_8740-2 vaṭasya patrasya puṭe śayānaṃ bālaṃ mukundaṃ satataṃ smarāmi //
analyzed: vaṭasya patrasya puṭe śayānam bālam mukundam satatam smarāmi

original: MSS_8741-1 karālakālarupeṇa janatāduritāpahā /
analyzed: karāla kāla rupeṇa jana tā durita apahā

original: MSS_8741-2 tāraṇī tariṇī bhūyād amunā yamunāmbunā //
analyzed: tāraṇī tariṇī bhūyāt amunā yamunā ambunā

original: MSS_8742-1 karālavācālamukhāścamūkhanair dhvastāmbarā vīkṣya diśo rajasvalāḥ /
analyzed: karāla vācāla mukhāḥ camū khanaiḥ dhvasta ambarāḥ vīkṣya diśaḥ rajasvalāḥ

original: MSS_8742-2 tirobabhūve gahanairdineśvaro rajondhakāraiḥ varitaḥ kuto'pyasau //
analyzed: tirobabhūve gahanaiḥ dineśvaraḥ rajaḥ ndhakāraiḥ varitaḥ kutas api asau

original: MSS_8743-1 karālairvikaṭaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ puruṣairudyatāyudhaiḥ /
analyzed: karālaiḥ vikaṭaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ puruṣaiḥ udyata āyudhaiḥ

original: MSS_8743-2 pāṣāṇais tāḍitaḥ svapne sadyo mṛtyuṃ labhen naraḥ //
analyzed: pāṣāṇaiḥ tāḍitaḥ svapne sadyas mṛtyum labhet naraḥ

original: MSS_8744-1 karāviva śarīrasya netrayoriva pakṣmaṇī /
analyzed: karau iva śarīrasya netrayoḥ iva pakṣmaṇī

original: MSS_8744-2 avicārya priyaṃ kuryāt tan mitraṃ mitramucyate //
analyzed: a vicārya priyam kuryāt tat mitram mitram ucyate

original: MSS_8745-1 karā himāṃśorapi tāpayantīty etat priye cetasi naiva śaṅkyam /
analyzed: karāḥ himāṃśoḥ api tāpayanti iti etat priye cetasi nā eva śaṅkyam

original: MSS_8745-2 viyogataptaṃ hṛdayaṃ madīyaṃ tatra sthitāṃ tvāṃ samupaiti tāpaḥ //
analyzed: viyoga taptam hṛdayam madīyam tatra sthitām tvām samupaiti tāpaḥ

original: MSS_8746-1 karikapolamadoddhatabuddhito malinapaṅkajavṛndamihāśrayan /
analyzed: kari kapola mada uddhata buddhitaḥ malina paṅkaja vṛndam iha āśrayan

original: MSS_8746-2 kanakagauramamaṃ navacampakaṃ madhupa cañcala muñcasi kiṃ mudhā //
analyzed: kanakagauram amam nava campakam madhupa cañcala muñcasi kim mudhā

original: MSS_8747-1 karikalabha vimuñca lolatāṃ cara vinayavratamānatānanaḥ /
analyzed: kari kalabha vimuñca lola tām cara vinaya vrata mānata ānanaḥ

original: MSS_8747-2 mṛgapatinakhakoṭibhaṅguro gururupari kṣamate na te'ṅkuśaḥ //
analyzed: mṛgapati nakha koṭi bhaṅguraḥ guruḥ upari kṣamate na te iṅkuśaḥ

original: MSS_8748-1 karikavalitamṛṣṭaiḥ śākhiśākhāgrapatrair aruṇasaraṇayo'mī sarvato bhīṣayante /
analyzed: kari kavalita mṛṣṭaiḥ śākhi śākhā agra patraiḥ aruṇa saraṇayā umī sarvatas bhīṣayante

original: MSS_8748-2 calitaśabarasenādattagośṛṅgacaṇḍa- dhvanicakitavarāhavyākulā vindhyapādāḥ //
analyzed: calita śabara senā datta gośṛṅga caṇḍa dhvani cakita varāha vyākulāḥ vindhya pādāḥ

original: MSS_8748A-1 karikumbhatulāmurojayoḥ kriyamāṇāṃ kavibhirviśṛṅkhalaiḥ /
analyzed: kari kumbha tulām urojayoḥ kriyamāṇām kavibhiḥ viśṛṅkhalaiḥ

original: MSS_8748A-2 kathamāli śṛṇoṣi sādaraṃ viparītārthavido hi yoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: katham āli śṛṇoṣi sa ādaram viparīta artha vidaḥ hi yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_8749-1 karikṛṣṇāśvagandhā ca navanītaṃ ca māhiṣam /
analyzed: kari kṛṣṇā aśvagandhā ca navanītam ca māhiṣam

original: MSS_8749-2 eteṣāṃ mardanālliṅgavṛddhiḥ saṃjāyate parā //
analyzed: eteṣām mardanāt liṅga vṛddhiḥ saṃjāyate parā

original: MSS_8750-1 kariṇaśca hastikarṇair nirdeśyā vājino'śvakarṇena /
analyzed: kariṇaḥ ca hastikarṇaiḥ nirdeśyāḥ vājinā uśvakarṇena

original: MSS_8750-2 gāvaśca pāṭalābhiḥ kadalībhirajāvikaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: gāvaḥ ca pāṭalābhiḥ kadalībhiḥ ajāvikam bhavati

original: MSS_8751-1 karin mā garjoccairmūgapatirihāste'tinikaṭe na dṛṣṭastvaṃ daivādapasara sudūraṃ drutamitaḥ /
analyzed: karin mā garja uccais mūga patiḥ iha āsta iti nikaṭe na dṛṣṭaḥ tvam daivāt apasara su dūram drutam itas

original: MSS_8751-2 na kiṃ paśyasyagre kharanakharanirdāritakari- prakīrṇāsthiśreṇīdhavalitamimaṃ śailakaṭakam //
analyzed: na kim paśyasi agre khara nakhara nirdārita kari prakīrṇa asthi śreṇī dhavalitam imam śaila kaṭakam

original: MSS_8752-1 karimadaparimalavāhī vahati bahirgirisaritsamīra iti /
analyzed: kari mada parimala vāhī vahati bahis giri sarit samīraḥ iti

original: MSS_8752-2 mṛdugarbhāntarmāvaṃ na jahāti guhāgṛhasya harigṛhiṇī //
analyzed: mṛdu garbha antar māvam na jahāti guhā gṛhasya hari gṛhiṇī

original: MSS_8753-1 karivaramṛditavalīmukha- nalakairmūleṣu kīlitasya taroḥ /
analyzed: kari vara mṛdita valīmukha nalakaiḥ mūleṣu kīlitasya taroḥ

original: MSS_8753-2 saṃvatsaraṃ ca yāvat phalinasya phalāni jāyante //
analyzed: saṃvatsaram ca yāvat phalinasya phalāni jāyante

original: MSS_8754-1 kariṣyati kalānāthaḥ kutukī karamambare /
analyzed: kariṣyati kalānāthaḥ kutukī karam ambare

original: MSS_8754-2 iti nirvāpayāmāsa ravidīpaṃ niśāṅganā //
analyzed: iti nirvāpayāmāsa ravi dīpam niśā aṅganā

original: MSS_8755-1 kariṣyan na prabhāṣeta kṛtānyeva ca daśaiyet /
analyzed: kariṣyan na prabhāṣeta kṛtāni eva ca

original: MSS_8755-2 dharmakāmārthakāryāṇi tathā mantro na bhidyate //
analyzed: dharma kāma artha kāryāṇi tathā mantraḥ na bhidyate

original: MSS_8756-1 kariṣyate yatra suduścarāṇi prasattaye gotrabhidas tapāṃsi /
analyzed: kariṣyate yatra su duścarāṇi prasattaye gotrabhidaḥ tapāṃsi

original: MSS_8756-2 śiloccayaṃ cāruśiloccayaṃ tam eṣa kṣaṇānneṣyati guhyakas tvām //
analyzed: śiloccayam cāru śilā uccayam tam eṣa kṣaṇāt neṣyati guhyakaḥ tvām

original: MSS_8757-1 kariṣyāmi kariṣyāmi kariṣyāmīti cintayā /
analyzed: kariṣyāmi kariṣyāmi kariṣyāmi iti cintayā

original: MSS_8757-2 mariṣyāmi mariṣyāmi mariṣyāmīti vismṛtam //
analyzed: mariṣyāmi mariṣyāmi mariṣyāmi iti vismṛtam

original: MSS_8758-1 kariṣye'vaśyamityuktiḥ kariṣyannapi duṣyasi /
analyzed: kariṣye vaśyam iti uktiḥ kariṣyan api duṣyasi

original: MSS_8758-2 dṛṣṭādṛṣṭā hi nāyattāḥ kāryīyā hetavastava //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭāḥ hi na āyattāḥ kāryīyāḥ hetavaḥ tava

original: MSS_8758-1 karī barībharīti ced diśaṃ sarīsarīti kāṃ sthirīcarīkarīti cet na cañcarīkarītikām /
analyzed: karī ced diśam sarīsarīti kām sthirīcarīkarīti ced na cañcarīkarītikām

original: MSS_8758-2 darīdharīti ketakaṃ varīvarīti sārasaṃ jarījarīti mañjarī nirītirītirīdṛśī //
analyzed: darīdharī iti ketakam varīvarī iti sārasam jarījarī iti mañjarī nirīti rītiḥ īdṛśī

original: MSS_8759-1 karīṣamadhye nihitaṃ tat sarvaṃ pañcamāsakam /
analyzed: karīṣa madhye nihitam tat sarvam pañca māsakam

original: MSS_8759-2 dravībhūtaṃ tataḥ sarvam uddharet tena lepayet //
analyzed: dravībhūtam tatas sarvam uddharet tena lepayet

original: MSS_8760-1 karuṇamabhihitaṃ trapā nirastā tadabhimukhaṃ ca vimuktamaśru tābhiḥ /
analyzed: karuṇam abhihitam trapā nirastā tad abhimukham ca vimuktam aśru tābhiḥ

original: MSS_8760-2 prakupitamabhisāraṇe'nunetuṃ priyamiyatī hyabalājanasya bhūmiḥ /
analyzed: prakupitam abhisāra ṇenu netum priyam iyatī hi abalā janasya bhūmiḥ

original: MSS_8761-1 karuṇādravameva durjanaḥ sutarāṃ satpuruṣaṃ prabādhate /
analyzed: karuṇā dravam eva durjanaḥ sutarām sat puruṣam prabādhate

original: MSS_8761-2 mṛdukaṃ hi bhinatti kaṇṭakaḥ kaṭhine kuṇṭhaka eva jāyate //
analyzed: mṛdukam hi bhinatti kaṇṭakaḥ kaṭhine kuṇṭhakaḥ eva jāyate

original: MSS_8761A-1 kare kṛtvā tūlaṃ kucakalaśamūlaṃ vidadhatī sphuṭaṃ vāraṃ vāraṃ taralayati hāraṃ suvadanā /
analyzed: kare kṛtvā tūlam kuca kalaśa mūlam vidadhatī sphuṭam vāram vāram taralayati hāram su vadanā

original: MSS_8761A-2 samīcīnā mīnāyatanayananīlotpaladalā vitanvānā tantūn vikalayati jantūnavikalam //
analyzed: samīcīnā mīna āyata nayana nīlotpala dalā vitanvānā tantūn vikalayati jantūn avikalam

original: MSS_8762-1 kare ca dakṣiṇe vyādhiṃ hṛdi rājyādilābhadā /
analyzed: kare ca dakṣiṇe vyādhim hṛdi rājya ādi lābha dā

original: MSS_8762-2 pṛṣṭhe copadravaṃ hantyudare miṣṭānnabhojanam //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe ca upadravam hanti udare miṣṭānna bhojanam

original: MSS_8763-1 kareṇa kaṇḍūyati dakṣiṇena yakṣo yadā vāmakaraṃ tadānīm /
analyzed: kareṇa kaṇḍūyati dakṣiṇena yakṣaḥ yadā vāma karam tadānīm

original: MSS_8763-2 prabhūtamātaṅgaghaṭāsamṛddhaṃ brūte samantāt pṛthivīpatitvam //
analyzed: prabhūta mātaṅga ghaṭā samṛddham brūte samantāt pṛthivīpati tvam

original: MSS_8764-1 kareṇa kariṇā vīraḥ sugṛhīto'pi kopinā /
analyzed: kareṇa kariṇā vīraḥ su gṛhītaḥ api kopinā

original: MSS_8764-2 asināsūn jahārāśu tasyaiva svaymakṣataḥ //
analyzed: asinā asūn jahāra āśu tasya eva svaymakṣataḥ

original: MSS_8765-1 kareṇa te raṇeṣvantakareṇa dviṣatāṃ hatāḥ /
analyzed: kareṇa te raṇeṣu anta kareṇa dviṣatām hatāḥ

original: MSS_8765-2 kareṇavaḥ kṣaradraktā bhānti saṃdhyāghanā iva //
analyzed: kareṇavaḥ kṣarat raktāḥ bhānti saṃdhyā ghanāḥ iva

original: MSS_8766-1 kareṇa dānaṃ munirādadāno bhaktasya saṃketamiti bravīti /
analyzed: kareṇa dānam muniḥ ādadānaḥ bhaktasya saṃketam iti bravīti

original: MSS_8766-2 lokadvayecchāphalasaṃpradāne datto mayā dakṣiṇahasta eṣaḥ //
analyzed: loka dvaya icchā phala saṃpradāne dattaḥ mayā dakṣiṇa hastaḥ eṣaḥ

original: MSS_8767-1 kareṇa vāñcheva vidhuṃ vidhartuṃ yamitthamātthādariṇī tamartham /
analyzed: kareṇa vāñchā iva vidhum vidhartum yam ittham āttha ādariṇī tam artham

original: MSS_8767-2 pātuṃ śrutibhyāmapi nādhikurve varṇaṃ śrutervarṇa ivāntimaḥ kim //
analyzed: pātum śrutibhyām api na adhikurve varṇam śruteḥ varṇaḥ iva antimaḥ kim

original: MSS_8768-1 kareṇa vātāyanalambitena spṛṣṭas tvayā caṇḍi kutūhalinyā /
analyzed: kareṇa vātāyana lambitena spṛṣṭaḥ tvayā caṇḍi kutūhalinyā

original: MSS_8768-2 āmuñcatīvābharaṇaṃ dvitīyam udbhinnavidyudvalayo ghanas te //
analyzed: āmuñcati iva ābharaṇam dvitīyam udbhinna vidyut valayaḥ ghanaḥ te

original: MSS_8768A-1 kareṇa salilārdreṇa na gaṇḍau nāparaṃ karam /
analyzed: kareṇa salila ārdreṇa na gaṇḍau na aparam karam

original: MSS_8768A-2 nekṣaṇe ca spṛśet kiṃ tu spraṣṭavye jānunī śriye //
analyzed: nekṣaṇe ca spṛśet kim tu spraṣṭavye jānunī śriye

original: MSS_8769-1 kareṇurnāhūtā nijakavalabhāgapraṇayinī na cāmṛṣṭaḥ snehāt karakisalayenāpi kalabhaḥ /
analyzed: kareṇuḥ nā āhūtā nija kavala bhāga praṇayinī na ca āmṛṣṭaḥ snehāt karakisalayena api kalabhaḥ

original: MSS_8769-2 sa yenāsau darpāt pratigajajigīṣārabhasataḥ krudhā dhāvan magno hradapayasi kaṣṭaṃ karipatiḥ //
analyzed: sa yena asau darpāt pratigaja jigīṣā rabhasataḥ krudhā dhāvan magnaḥ hrada payasi kaṣṭam kari patiḥ

original: MSS_8769A-1 kare dānaṃ hṛdi dhyānaṃ mukhe maunaṃ gṛhe dhanam /
analyzed: kare dānam hṛdi dhyānam mukhe maunam gṛhe dhanam

original: MSS_8769A-2 tīrthe yānaṃ giri jñānaṃ maṇḍanaṃ mahatāmidam //
analyzed: tīrthe yānam giri jñānam maṇḍanam mahatām idam

original: MSS_8769B-1 kare vāme vāsastadaparakare hāralatikāṃ vahantyā bimboṣṭhe patidaśanadattavraṇapadam /
analyzed: kare vāme vāsaḥ tad apara kare hāra latikām vahantyāḥ bimba uṣṭhe pati daśana datta vraṇa padam

original: MSS_8769B-2 parimlānāṃ mālāṃ śirasi śaśikhaṇḍaṃ stanataṭe ratāntottiṣṭhantyā jagadapi na mūlyaṃ mṛgadaśaḥ //
analyzed: parimlānām mālām śirasi śaśi khaṇḍam stana taṭe rata anta uttiṣṭhantyā jagat api na mūlyam mṛga daśaḥ

original: MSS_8770-1 kare vidhṛtyeśvarayā girāṃ sā pānthā pathīndrasya kṛtā vihasya /
analyzed: kare vidhṛtya īśvarayā girām sā pānthā pathi indrasya kṛtā vihasya

original: MSS_8770-2 vāmeti nāmaiva babhāja sārdhaṃ purandhrisādhāraṇasaṃvibhāgam //
analyzed: vāmā iti nāma eva babhāja sārdham purandhri sādhāraṇa saṃvibhāgam

original: MSS_8771-1 kare vibhāti tanvaṅgyā raṇadvalayasaṃhatiḥ /
analyzed: kare vibhāti tanu aṅgyāḥ raṇat valaya saṃhatiḥ

original: MSS_8771-2 manaḥkuraṅgabandhāya pāśālīva manobhuvaḥ //
analyzed: manaḥ kuraṅga bandhāya pāśa āliḥ iva manobhuvaḥ

original: MSS_8772-1 kare veṇīmeṇīsadṛśanayanā snānaviratau dadhānā harmyāgre haranayanatejohutamapi /
analyzed: kare veṇī meṇī sadṛśa nayanā snāna viratau dadhānā harmya agre hara nayana tejaḥ hutam api

original: MSS_8772-2 iyaṃ mugdhā dugdhāmbudhibahalakallolasadṛśā dṛśā vāraṃ vāraṃ manasijataruṃ pallavayati //
analyzed: iyam mugdhā dugdha ambudhi bahala kallola sadṛśā dṛśā vāram vāram manasija tarum pallavayati

original: MSS_8773-1 kare ślāghyas tyāgaḥ śirasi gurupādapraṇamatā mukhe satyā vāṇī vijayi bhujayorvīryamatulam /
analyzed: kare ślāghyaḥ tyāgaḥ śirasi guru pāda praṇama tā mukhe satyā vāṇī vijayi bhujayoḥ vīryam atulam

original: MSS_8773-2 hṛdi svacchā vṛttiḥ śrutamadhigataṃ ca śravaṇayor vināpyaiśvaryeṇa prakṛtimahatāṃ maṇḍanamidam //
analyzed: hṛdi su acchā vṛttiḥ śrutam adhigatam ca śravaṇayoḥ vinā api aiśvaryeṇa prakṛti mahatām maṇḍanam idam

original: MSS_8773A-1 karairupāttān kamalotkarebhyo nijairvivasvān vikacodarebhyaḥ /
analyzed: karaiḥ upāttān kamala utkarebhyaḥ nijaiḥ vivasvān vikaca udarebhyaḥ

original: MSS_8773A-2 tasyā nicikṣepa mukhāravinde svedāpadeśānmakarandabindūn //
analyzed: tasyāḥ nicikṣepa mukha aravinde sveda apadeśāt makaranda bindūn

original: MSS_8774-1 karairvā pramitairgrāmair vatsare prabalaṃ ripum /
analyzed: karaiḥ vā pramitaiḥ grāmaiḥ vatsare prabalam ripum

original: MSS_8774-2 toṣayet taddhi dānaṃ syād yathāyogeṣu śatruṣu //
analyzed: toṣayet tat hi dānam syāt yathā yogeṣu śatruṣu

original: MSS_8775-1 karoti kālaḥ sakalaṃ saṃharet kāla eva hi /
analyzed: karoti kālaḥ sakalam saṃharet kālaḥ eva hi

original: MSS_8775-2 kālaḥ sthāpayate viśvaṃ kālādhīnamidaṃ jagat //
analyzed: kālaḥ sthāpayate viśvam kāla adhīnam idam jagat

original: MSS_8776-1 karo'titāmro rāmāṇāṃ tantrītāḍanavibhramam /
analyzed: karoti tāmraḥ rāmāṇām tantrī tāḍana vibhramam

original: MSS_8776-2 karoti serṣyaṃ kānte ca śravaṇotpalatāḍanam //
analyzed: karoti sa īrṣyam kānte ca śravaṇa utpala tāḍanam

original: MSS_8777-1 karoti doṣaṃ na tamatra kesarī na dandaśūko na karī na bhūmipaḥ /
analyzed: karoti doṣam na tam atra kesarī na dandaśūkaḥ na karī na bhūmipaḥ

original: MSS_8777-2 atīva ruṣṭo na ca śatruruddhato yamugramithyātvaripuḥ śarīriṇām //
analyzed: atīva ruṣṭaḥ na ca śatruḥ uddhataḥ yam ugra mithyātva ripuḥ śarīriṇām

original: MSS_8778-1 karoti nirmalādhāras tucchasyāpi mahārghatām /
analyzed: karoti nirmala ādhāraḥ tucchasya api mahārgha tām

original: MSS_8778-2 ambuno binduralpo'pi śuktau muktāphalaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: ambunaḥ binduḥ alpaḥ api śuktau muktāphalam bhavet

original: MSS_8779-1 karoti nīḍaṃ bhuvi ced varāhī samānyapatyāni vijāyate vā /
analyzed: karoti nīḍam bhuvi ced varāhī samāni apatyāni vijāyate vā

original: MSS_8779-2 samudbhavadbhānumayūkhavahnau jājvalyate tajjagatī samastā //
analyzed: samudbhavat bhānu mayūkha vahnau jājvalyate tat jagatī samastā

original: MSS_8780-1 karoti pāpaṃ yo'jñānān nātmano vetti ca kṣamam /
analyzed: karoti pāpam yaḥ jñānāt na ātmanaḥ vetti ca kṣamam

original: MSS_8780-2 pradveṣṭi sādhuvṛttāṃśca sa lokasyaiti vācyatām //
analyzed: pradveṣṭi sādhu vṛttān ca sa lokasya eti vācya tām

original: MSS_8780A-1 karoti puṣpairjinanāyakasya pūjaṃ trikālaṃ tanumān sadā yaḥ /
analyzed: karoti puṣpaiḥ jinanāyakasya pūjam tri kālam tanumān sadā yaḥ

original: MSS_8780A-2 tasyāmareśāvanināthacakra- varttyādilakṣmīrvaśagā bhaved drāk //
MSS_8781-1 karoti pūjyamāno'pi lokavyasanadīkṣitaḥ /
analyzed: karoti pūjyamānaḥ api loka vyasana dīkṣitaḥ

original: MSS_8781-2 darśane darśane trāsaṃ gṛhāhiriva durjanaḥ //
analyzed: darśane darśane trāsam gṛha ahiḥ iva durjanaḥ

original: MSS_8782-1 karoti māṃsaṃ balamindriyāṇāṃ tato'bhivṛddhiṃ madanasya tasmāt /
analyzed: karoti māṃsam balam indriyāṇām tatas abhivṛddhim madanasya tasmāt

original: MSS_8782-2 karotyayuktiṃ pravicintya buddhyā tyajanti māṃsaṃ trividhena santaḥ //
analyzed: karoti ayuktim pravicintya buddhyā tyajanti māṃsam trividhena santaḥ

original: MSS_8783-1 karoti yaḥ paradrohaṃ janasyānaparādhinaḥ /
analyzed: karoti yaḥ para droham janasya anaparādhinaḥ

original: MSS_8783-2 tasya rājñaḥ sthirāpi śrīḥ samūlaṃ nāśamṛcchati //
analyzed: tasya rājñaḥ sthirā api śrīḥ sa mūlam nāśam ṛcchati

original: MSS_8784-1 karoti yo'śeṣajanātiriktāṃ saṃbhāvanāmarthavatīṃ kriyābhiḥ /
analyzed: karoti yaḥ śeṣa jana atiriktām saṃbhāvanām arthavatīm kriyābhiḥ

original: MSS_8784-2 saṃsatsu jāte puruṣādhikāre na pūraṇī taṃ samupaiti saṃkhyā //
analyzed: saṃsatsu jāte puruṣa adhikāre na pūraṇī tam samupaiti saṃkhyā

original: MSS_8785-1 karoti lābhahīnena gauraveṇa kimāśritaḥ /
analyzed: karoti lābha hīnena gauraveṇa kim āśritaḥ

original: MSS_8785-2 kṣāmasyendorguṇaṃ dhatte kamīśvaraśirodhṛtiḥ //
analyzed: kṣāmasya indoḥ guṇam dhatte kam īśvara śiraḥ dhṛtiḥ

original: MSS_8785A-1 karoti viratiṃ dhanyo yaḥ sadā niśibhojanāt /
analyzed: karoti viratim dhanyaḥ yaḥ sadā niśi bhojanāt

original: MSS_8785A-2 so'rdhaṃ puruṣāyuṣasya syādavaśyamupoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: puruṣa āyuṣasya syāt avaśyam upoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_8786-1 karoti vairaṃ sphuṭamucyamānaḥ pratuṣyati śrotrasukhairapathyaiḥ /
analyzed: karoti vairam sphuṭam ucyamānaḥ pratuṣyati śrotra sukhaiḥ apathyaiḥ

original: MSS_8786-2 vivekaśūnyaḥ prabhurātmamānī mahānanarthaḥ suhṛdāṃ batāyam //
analyzed: viveka śūnyaḥ prabhuḥ ātma mānī mahān anarthaḥ suhṛdām bata ayam

original: MSS_8787-1 karoti śobhāmalake striyāḥ ko dṛśyā na kāntā vidhinā ca koktā /
analyzed: karoti śobhā āmalake striyāḥ kaḥ dṛśyā na kāntā vidhinā ca kā uktā

original: MSS_8787-2 aṅge tu kasmin dahanaḥ purāreḥ sindūrabindurvidhavālalāṭe //
analyzed: aṅge tu kasmin dahanaḥ purāreḥ sindūra binduḥ vidhavā lalāṭe

original: MSS_8788-1 karoti saṃsāraśarīrabhoga- virāgabhāvaṃ vidadhāti rāgam /
analyzed: karoti saṃsāra śarīra bhoga virāga bhāvam vidadhāti rāgam

original: MSS_8788-2 śīlavratadhyānatapaḥkṛpāsu jñānī vimokṣāya kṛtaprayāsaḥ //
analyzed: śīla vrata dhyāna tapaḥ kṛpāsu jñānī vimokṣāya kṛta prayāsaḥ

original: MSS_8789-2 karoti saphalaṃ jantoḥ karma yacca karoti saḥ //
analyzed: karoti saphalam jantoḥ karma yat ca karoti saḥ

original: MSS_8790-1 karoti sahakārasya kalikotkalikottaram /
analyzed: karoti sahakārasya kalikā utkalikā uttaram

original: MSS_8790-2 manmano manmano'pyeṣa mattakokilanisvanaḥ //
analyzed: manmanaḥ manmanaḥ pi eṣa matta kokila nisvanaḥ

original: MSS_8791-1 karoti suhṛdāṃ dainyam ahitānāṃ tathā mudam /
analyzed: karoti suhṛdām dainyam ahitānām tathā mudam

original: MSS_8791-2 akāle ca jarāṃ pitroḥ kusutaḥ kurute dhruvam //
analyzed: akāle ca jarām pitroḥ kusutaḥ kurute dhruvam

original: MSS_8792-1 karoti svamukhenaiva bahudhānyasya khaṇḍanam /
analyzed: karoti sva mukhena eva bahu dhānyasya khaṇḍanam

original: MSS_8792-2 namaḥ patanaśīlāya musalāya khalāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ patana śīlāya musalāya khalāya ca

original: MSS_8793-1 karoti huṃhuṃ śṛgiti dhvaniṃ yo neṣṭo na duṣṭaḥ sa yato ratārthī /
analyzed: karoti huṃhum śṛś iti dhvanim yaḥ na iṣṭaḥ na duṣṭaḥ sa yatas rata arthī

original: MSS_8793-2 calaścalaḥ syāt kalahāya śabdaḥ kikīti dīpto gururugluśāntaḥ //
analyzed: calaḥ calaḥ syāt kalahāya śabdaḥ dīptaḥ

original: MSS_8793A-1 karoti he daityasuta yāvanmātraṃ parigraham /
analyzed: karoti he daitya suta yāvat mātram parigraham

original: MSS_8793A-2 tāvanmātraṃ sa evāsya duḥkhaṃ cetasi yacchati //
analyzed: tāvat mātram saḥ eva asya duḥkham cetasi yacchati

original: MSS_8793B-1 karotu karaṭaḥ śabdaṃ sarvadā prāṅgaṇe vasan /
analyzed: karotu karaṭaḥ śabdam sarvadā prāṅgaṇe vasan

original: MSS_8793B-2 na śṛṇoti budhaḥ prītyā śṛṇoti pikabhāṣitam //
analyzed: na śṛṇoti budhaḥ prītyā śṛṇoti pika bhāṣitam

original: MSS_8794-1 karotu tādṛśīṃ prītiṃ yādṛśī nīrapaṅkayoḥ /
analyzed: karotu tādṛśīm prītim yādṛśī nīra paṅkayoḥ

original: MSS_8794-2 raviṇā śoṣite nīre paṅgadeho viśīryate //
analyzed: raviṇā śoṣite nīre paṅga dehaḥ viśīryate

original: MSS_8795-1 karotu nāma nītijño vyavasāyamitastataḥ /
analyzed: karotu nāma nīti jñaḥ vyavasāyam itas tatas

original: MSS_8795-2 phalaṃ punas tadeva syād yad vidhermanasi sthitam //
analyzed: phalam punar tat eva syāt yat vidheḥ manasi sthitam

original: MSS_8796-1 karomīśo'pi nākrāntiṃ paritāpena khedavān /
analyzed: karomi īśaḥ api nā ākrāntim paritāpena khedavān

original: MSS_8796-2 daridro'pi na vāñchāmi tena jīvāmyanāmayaḥ //
analyzed: daridraḥ api na vāñchāmi tena jīvāmi anāmayaḥ

original: MSS_8797-1 karomyahamidaṃ tadā kṛtamidaṃ kariṣyāmyadaḥ pumāniti sadā kriyākaraṇakāraṇavyāpṛtaḥ /
analyzed: karomi aham idam tadā kṛtam idam kariṣyāmi adaḥ pumān iti sadā kriyā karaṇa kāraṇa vyāpṛtaḥ

original: MSS_8797-2 vivekarahitāśayo vigatasarvadharmakṣamo na vetti gatamapyaho jagati kālamatyākulaḥ //
analyzed: viveka rahita āśayaḥ vigata sarva dharma kṣamaḥ na vetti gatam api aho jagati kālam atyākulaḥ

original: MSS_8798-1 karoṣi tāstvamutkhātamohasthāne sthirā matīḥ /
analyzed: karoṣi tāḥ tvam utkhāta moha sthāne sthirāḥ matīḥ

original: MSS_8798-2 padaṃ yatiḥ sutapasā labhate'taḥ saśuklima //
analyzed: padam yatiḥ su tapasā labhata itas sa śuklima

original: MSS_8798A-1 karoṣi yat pretyahitāya kiṃcit kadācidalpaṃ sukṛtaṃ kathaṃcit /
analyzed: karoṣi yat pretya hitāya kiṃcid kadācid alpam su kṛtam kathaṃcid

original: MSS_8798A-2 mā jīharastanmadamatsarādyair vinā ca tanmā narakātithirbhūḥ //
analyzed: mā jīharaḥ tad mada matsara ādyaiḥ vinā ca tat mā naraka atithiḥ bhūḥ

original: MSS_8799-1 karau dhunānā navapallavākṛtī payasyagādhe kila jātasaṃbhramā /
analyzed: karau dhunānā nava pallava ākṛtī payasi agādhe kila jāta saṃbhramā

original: MSS_8799-2 sakhīṣu nirvācyamadhārṣṭyadūṣitaṃ priyāṅgasaṃśleṣamavāpa māninī //
analyzed: sakhīṣu nirvācyam adhārṣṭya dūṣitam priya aṅga saṃśleṣam avāpa māninī

original: MSS_8800-1 karau dhunānā navapallavākṛtī vṛthā kṛthā mānini mā pariśramam /
analyzed: karau dhunānā nava pallava ākṛtī vṛthā kṛthāḥ mānini mā pariśramam

original: MSS_8800-2 upeyuṣī kalpalatābhiśaṅkayā kathaṃ nvitastrasyati ṣaṭpadāvaliḥ //
analyzed: upeyuṣī kalpalatā abhiśaṅkayā katham nu itas trasyati ṣaṭpada āvaliḥ

original: MSS_8801-1 karau śaradijāmbujakramavilāsaśikṣāgurū padau vibudhapādapaprathamapallavollaṅghinau /
analyzed: karau śaradija ambuja krama vilāsa śikṣā gurū padau vibudha pādapa prathama pallava ullaṅghinau

original: MSS_8801-2 dṛśau dalitadurmadatribhuvanopamānaśriyau vilokaya vilocanāmṛtamaho mahaḥ śaiśavam //
analyzed: dṛśau dalita durmada tribhuvana upamāna śriyau vilokaya vilocana amṛta mahaḥ mahaḥ śaiśavam

original: MSS_8802-1 karkandhūphalamuccinoti śabarī muktāphalākāṅkṣayā gṛdhrolūkakadambakasya purataḥ kāko'pi haṃsāyate /
analyzed: karkandhū phalam uccinoti śabarī muktāphala ākāṅkṣayā gṛdhra ulūka kadambakasya puratas kākaḥ api haṃsāyate

original: MSS_8802-2 kīrtyā te dhavalīṛkte tribhuvane kṣmāpāla lakṣmīḥ punaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vīkṣya balo'yamityupahitavrīḍaṃ śanairjalpati //
analyzed: kīrtyā te tribhuvane kṣmāpāla lakṣmīḥ punar kṛṣṇam vīkṣya śanais jalpati

original: MSS_8803-1 karkaśaṃ duḥsahavākyaṃ jalpanti vañcitāḥ paraiḥ /
analyzed: karkaśam duḥsaha vākyam jalpanti vañcitāḥ paraiḥ

original: MSS_8803-2 kurvanti dyūtakārasya karṇanāsādichedanam //
analyzed: kurvanti dyūtakārasya karṇa nāsā ādi chedanam

original: MSS_8804-1 karkaśatarkavicāra- vyagraḥ kiṃ vetti kāvyahṛdayāni /
analyzed: karkaśa tarka vicāra vyagraḥ kim vetti kāvya hṛdayāni

original: MSS_8804-2 grāmya iva kṛṣivilagnaś cañcalanayanāvacorahasyāni //
analyzed: grāmyaḥ iva kṛṣi vilagnaḥ cañcala nayana a vacaḥ rahasyāni

original: MSS_8805-1 karkaśena tu cāpena yaḥ kṛṣṭau hīnamuṣṭinā /
analyzed: karkaśena tu cāpena yaḥ kṛṣṭau hīna muṣṭinā

original: MSS_8805-2 matsyapucchā gatis tasya sāyakasya prakīrtitā //
analyzed: matsyapucchā gatiḥ tasya sāyakasya prakīrtitā

original: MSS_8806-1 karkoṭikārkayormūlaṃ cūrṇayitvā ca sarṣapān /
MSS_8806-2 sarpiṣā pāyayen mantrī sthāvarakṣveḍaśāntaye //
analyzed: sarpiṣā pāyayet mantrī sthāvara kṣveḍa śāntaye

original: MSS_8807-1 karṇaṃ cakṣurajīgaṇattava pitus tātaḥ pitā te punaḥ śaktyādhārakumāramapyajagaṇattaṃ kātaratvena saḥ /
analyzed: karṇam cakṣuḥ ajīgaṇat tava pituḥ tātaḥ pitā te punar śakti ādhāra kumāram api ajagaṇat tam kātara tvena saḥ

original: MSS_8807-2 devogānmahiṣīti paśyati jagattvevaṃ vivektuṃ punaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ prathayanti vastadapi ca prajñādhanāḥ sādhavaḥ //
analyzed: devaḥ gāt mahiṣī iti paśyati jagat tu evam vivektum punar prāgalbhyam prathayanti vaḥ tat api ca prajñā dhanāḥ sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_8808-1 karṇaḥ sarvaśirogatastribhuvane karṇena kiṃ na śrūtaṃ viśrāmyanti mṛgīdṛśāmapi dṛśaḥ karṇe na citraṃ kvacit /
analyzed: karṇaḥ sarva śiraḥ gataḥ tribhuvane karṇena kim na śrūtam viśrāmyanti mṛgī dṛśām api dṛśaḥ karṇe na citram kvacid

original: MSS_8808-2 āścaryaṃ punaretadeva yadayaṃ niśchidrasanmaṇḍalaḥ saptāmbhonidhimekhalāṃ vasumatīṃ dhatte jaganmaṇḍalaḥ //
analyzed: āścaryam punar etat eva yat ayam niśchidra sat maṇḍalaḥ sapta ambhonidhi mekhalām vasumatīm dhatte jagat maṇḍalaḥ

original: MSS_8809-1 karṇakalpitarasālamañjarī- piñjarīkṛtakapolamaṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: karṇa kalpita rasa alamañjarī piñjarīkṛta kapola maṇḍalaḥ

original: MSS_8809-2 niṣpatannayanavāridhārayā rādhayā madhuripurnirīkṣyate //
analyzed: niṣpatat nayana vāri dhārayā rādhayā madhuripuḥ nirīkṣyate

original: MSS_8810-1 karṇagateyamamoghā dṛṣṭis tava śaktirindradattā ca /
analyzed: karṇa gatā iyam amoghā dṛṣṭiḥ tava śaktiḥ indra dattā ca

original: MSS_8810-2 sā nāsāditavijayā kvacidapi nāpārthapatiteyam //
analyzed: sā na āsādita vijayā kvacid api na apārtha patitā iyam

original: MSS_8810A-1 karṇadvayāvanatakāñcanatālapatrā veṇyantalambimaṇimauktikahemagucchā /
MSS_8810A-2 kūrpāsakotkavacitastanabāhumūlā lāṭī nitambaparivṛttadaśāntanīvī //
analyzed: kūrpāsaka utkava cita stana bāhumūlā lāṭī nitamba parivṛtta daśānta nīvī

original: MSS_8811-1 karṇalaṅghiguṇotkarṣā vadānyā dhanvino yathā /
analyzed: karṇa laṅghi guṇa utkarṣāḥ vadānyāḥ dhanvinaḥ yathā

original: MSS_8811-2 niṣphalān na vimuñcanti mārgaṇān samitau sthitā //
analyzed: niṣphalān na vimuñcanti mārgaṇān samitau sthitā

original: MSS_8812-1 karṇaviṣeṇa ca bhagnaḥ kiṃ kiṃ na karoti bāliśo lokaḥ /
analyzed: karṇa viṣeṇa ca bhagnaḥ kim kim na karoti bāliśaḥ lokaḥ

original: MSS_8812-2 kṣapaṇakatāmapi dhatte pibati surāṃ narakapālena //
analyzed: kṣapaṇaka tām api dhatte pibati surām naraka pālena

original: MSS_8813-1 karṇas tvacaṃ śibirmāṃsaṃ jīvaṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ /
analyzed: karṇaḥ tvacam śibiḥ māṃsam jīvam jīmūtavāhanaḥ

original: MSS_8813-2 dadau dadhīcirasthīni nāstyadeyaṃ mahātmanām //
analyzed: dadau dadhīciḥ asthīni na asti adeyam mahātmanām

original: MSS_8813A-1 karṇasphuratkanakakuṇḍalakāntiramyam ādṛṣṭigocarakucadvayalobhanīyam /
analyzed: karṇa sphurat kanaka kuṇḍala kānti ramyam ādṛṣṭi gocara kuca dvaya lobhanīyam

original: MSS_8813A-2 kāleyabindukalikāyitakuṅkumāṅkaṃ karṇāṭayauvatamidaṃ kamanīyarūpam //
analyzed: kāleya bindu kalikāyita kuṅkuma aṅkam karṇāṭa yauvatam idam kamanīya rūpam

original: MSS_8814-1 karṇasya bhūṣaṇamidaṃ mamāyativirodhinaḥ /
analyzed: karṇasya bhūṣaṇam idam mama āyati virodhinaḥ

original: MSS_8814-2 iti karṇotpalaṃ prāyas tava dṛṣṭyā vilaṅghyate //
analyzed: iti karṇa utpalam prāyas tava dṛṣṭyā vilaṅghyate

original: MSS_8815-1 karṇākṣidantacchadabāhupāṇi- pādādinaḥ svākhilatulyajetuḥ /
analyzed: karṇa akṣi danta chada bāhu pāṇi pāda ādinaḥ sva akhila tulya jetuḥ

original: MSS_8815-2 udvegabhāgadvayatābhimānād ihaiva vedhā vyadhita dvitīyam //
analyzed: udvega bhāga dvaya tā abhimānāt iha eva vedhāḥ vyadhita dvitīyam

original: MSS_8816-1 karṇāgranthitakiṃtanurnataśirā bibhrajjarājarjara- sphiksaṃdhipraviveśitapravicalallāṅgūlanālaḥ kṣaṇam /
analyzed: karṇa āgranthita kiṃtanuḥ nata śirāḥ bibhrat jarā jarjaraḥ sphic saṃdhi praviveśita pravicalat lāṅgūla nālaḥ kṣaṇam

original: MSS_8816-2 ārād vīkṣya vipakṣamākramakṛtakrodhasphuratkandharaṃ śvā mallīkalikāvikāśidaśanaḥ kiṃcit kvaṇan gacchati //
analyzed: ārāt vīkṣya vipakṣam ākrama kṛta krodha sphurat kandharam śvā mallī kalikā vikāśi daśanaḥ kiṃcid kvaṇan gacchati

original: MSS_8817-1 karṇāgre pīḍite yeṣāṃ sindūrābhasya darśanam /
analyzed: karṇa agre pīḍite yeṣām sindūra ābhasya darśanam

original: MSS_8817-2 śoṇitasya bhavet kṣipraṃ te vāhyāścirajīvinaḥ //
analyzed: śoṇitasya bhavet kṣipram te vāhyāḥ cira jīvinaḥ

original: MSS_8818-1 karṇāṭaṃ dehi karṇādhikavidhivihitatyāga lāṭaṃ lalāṭa- prottuṅga drāviḍaṃ vā pracalabhujabalaprauḍhimāgāḍharāḍham /
analyzed: karṇāṭam dehi karṇa adhika vidhi vihita tyāga lāṭam lalāṭa prottuṅga drāviḍam vā pracala bhuja bala prauḍhima āgāḍha rāḍham

original: MSS_8818-2 prasphūrjadgurjaraṃ vā dalitaripuvadhūgarbha vaidarbhakaṃ vā gājī rājīvadṛṣṭe kuśaśatamathavā śāhajallāludīna //
analyzed: prasphūrjat gurjaram vā dalita ripu vadhū garbha vaidarbhakam vā rājīva dṛṣṭe kuśa śatam athavā

original: MSS_8819-1 karṇāṭīdaśanāṅkitaḥ śitamahārāṣṭrīkaṭākṣāhatataḥ prauḍhāndhrīstanapīḍitaḥ praṇayinībhrūbhaṅgavitrāsitaḥ /
analyzed: karṇāṭī daśana aṅkitaḥ śita mahārāṣṭrī kaṭākṣa āhatataḥ prauḍha andhrī stana pīḍitaḥ praṇayinī bhrū bhaṅga vitrāsitaḥ

original: MSS_8819-2 lāṭībāhuviveṣṭitaśca malayastrītarjanītarjitaḥ so'yaṃ saṃprati rājaśekharakavirvārāṇasīṃ vāñchati //
analyzed: lāṭī bāhu viveṣṭitaḥ ca malaya strī tarjanī tarjitaḥ saḥ yam saṃprati rājaśekhara kaviḥ vārāṇasīm vāñchati

original: MSS_8820-1 karṇābhyarṇavidīrṇasṛkkavikaṭavyādānadīptāgnibhir daṃṣṭrākoṭiviśaṅkaṭairita ito dhāvadbhirākīryate /
analyzed: karṇa abhyarṇa vidīrṇa sṛkka vikaṭa vyādāna dīpta agnibhiḥ daṃṣṭrā koṭi viśaṅkaṭaiḥ itas itas dhāvadbhiḥ ākīryate

original: MSS_8820-2 vidyutpuñjanikāśakeśanayanabhrūśmaśrujālairna bho lakṣyālakṣyaviśuṣkadīrghavapuṣāmulkāmu khānāṃ mukhaiḥ //
analyzed: vidyut puñja nikāśa keśa nayana bhrū śmaśru jālaiḥ na bho lakṣya alakṣya viśuṣka dīrgha vapuṣām ulkāmu khānām mukhaiḥ

original: MSS_8821-1 karṇābhyarṇāriśṛṅgakṣatirudhirarasāsvādanābaddhagardha- dhvāṅkṣacchāyāttabhītipratihatadhavalīvargasaṃ vardhanecchaḥ /
MSS_8821-2 śīlavyākruddhagopīlaguḍahatinamatpṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ kathaṃcit prātaḥ kedāranīraṃ kalamadalabhiyā kūṇitākṣo mahokṣaḥ //
analyzed: śīla vyākruddha gopī laguḍa hati namat pṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ kathaṃcid prātar kedāra nīram kalama dala bhiyā kūṇita akṣaḥ mahā ukṣaḥ

original: MSS_8822-1 karṇāmṛtaṃ sūkrisaṃ vimucya doṣe prayatnaḥ sumahān khalānām /
analyzed: karṇa amṛtam sūkrisam vimucya doṣe prayatnaḥ su mahān khalānām

original: MSS_8822-2 nirīkṣate kelivanaṃ praviśya kramelakaḥ kaṇṭakajālameva //
analyzed: nirīkṣate keli vanam praviśya kra melakaḥ kaṇṭaka jālam eva

original: MSS_8823-1 karṇāruntudamantareṇa raṇitaṃ gāhasva kāka svayam mākandaṃ makarandasundaramidaṃ tvāṃ kokilaṃ manmahe /
analyzed: karṇa aruntudam antareṇa raṇitam gāhasva kāka svayam mākandam makaranda sundaram idam tvām kokilam manmahe

original: MSS_8823-2 bhavyāni sthalasauṣṭhavena katicid vastūni kastūrikāṃ nepālakṣitipālabhālatilake paṅkaṃ na śaṅketa kaḥ //
analyzed: bhavyāni sthala sauṣṭhavena katicid vastūni kastūrikām nepāla kṣitipāla bhāla tilake paṅkam na śaṅketa kaḥ

original: MSS_8824-1 karṇāruntudameva kokilarutaṃ tasyāḥ śrute bhāṣite candre lokarucis tadānanaruceḥ prāgeva saṃdarśanāt /
analyzed: karṇa aruntudam eva kokila rutam tasyāḥ śrute bhāṣite candre loka ruciḥ tad ānana ruceḥ prāk eva saṃdarśanāt

original: MSS_8824-2 cakṣurmīlanameva tannayanayoragre mṛgīṇāṃ varaṃ haimo vallyapi tāvadeva lalitā yāvanna sā lakṣyate //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ mīlanam eva tat nayanayoḥ agre mṛgīṇām varam haimaḥ vallī api tāvat eva lalitā yāvat na sā lakṣyate

original: MSS_8825-1 karṇārpito lodhrakaṣāyarūkṣe gorocanākṣepanitāntagaure /
analyzed: karṇa arpitaḥ lodhra kaṣāya rūkṣe gorocanā kṣepa nitānta gaure

original: MSS_8825-2 tasyāḥ kapole parabhāgalābhād babandha cakṣūṃṣi yavaprarohaḥ //
analyzed: tasyāḥ kapole parabhāga lābhāt babandha cakṣūṃṣi yava prarohaḥ

original: MSS_8825A-1 karṇālaṅkaraṇaṃ kadā kṛtamiti sparśaḥ kapole kṛtaḥ kīdṛk kāntamaho nu kañcukamiti nyastaḥ karo vakṣasi /
analyzed: karṇa alaṅkaraṇam kadā kṛtam iti sparśaḥ kapole kṛtaḥ kīdṛś kānta mahaḥ nu kañcukam iti nyastaḥ karaḥ vakṣasi

original: MSS_8825A-2 rāgaḥ sāhajikaḥ kimeṣa vadane'pyasparśi bimbādharo mogdhyenaiva mṛgīdṛśi vyavasitaṃ nirvighnamāsīnmama //
analyzed: rāgaḥ sāhajikaḥ kim eṣa vadane ipi asparśi bimba adharaḥ mogdhi enā eva mṛgī dṛśi vyavasitam nirvighnam āsīt mama

original: MSS_8826-1 karṇāhativyatikaraṃ kariṇāmupekṣya dānaṃ vyavasyati madhruvrata eṣa tiktam /
analyzed: karṇa āhati vyatikaram kariṇām upekṣya dānam vyavasyati madhru vrataḥ eṣa tiktam

original: MSS_8826-2 smartavyatāmupagateṣu saroruheṣu dhig jīvitavyasanamasya malīmasasya //
analyzed: smartavya tām upagateṣu saroruheṣu dhik jīvita vyasanam asya malīmasasya

original: MSS_8827-1 karṇikādiṣviva svarṇam arṇavādiṣvivodakam /
analyzed: karṇikā ādiṣu iva svarṇam arṇava ādiṣu iva udakam

original: MSS_8827-2 bhediṣvabhedi yat tasmai parasmai mahase namaḥ //
analyzed: bhediṣu abhedi yat tasmai parasmai mahase namaḥ

original: MSS_8828-1 karṇikāralatāḥ phullakusumākulaṣaṭpadāḥ /
analyzed: karṇikāra latāḥ phulla kusuma ākula ṣaṭpadāḥ

original: MSS_8828-2 sakajjalaśikhā rejur dīpamālā ivojjvalāḥ //
analyzed: sa kajjala śikhāḥ rejuḥ dīpa mālāḥ iva ujjvalāḥ

original: MSS_8829-1 karṇikārasasauvīraguptāṃ trikaṭumādhavīm /
MSS_8829-2 yaṣṭīdhānyaguḍakṣīraṃ daṣṭo mattaśunā pibet //
analyzed: yaṣṭīdhānya guḍa kṣīram daṣṭaḥ matta śunā pibet

original: MSS_8830-1 karṇinālīkanārācā nirharanti śarīrataḥ /
analyzed: karṇi nālīka nārācāḥ nirharanti śarīrataḥ

original: MSS_8830-2 vākśalyas tu na nirhartuṃ śakyo hṛdiśayo hi saḥ //
analyzed: vāc śalyaḥ tu na nirhartum śakyaḥ hṛdiśayaḥ hi saḥ

original: MSS_8831-1 karṇe kāntāgamanavacanaśrāviṇi svarṇabhūṣāṃ tasyādarśinyakṛta nayane śyāmikāmañjanena /
analyzed: karṇe kāntā gamana vacana śrāviṇi svarṇa bhūṣām tasya ādarśini akṛta nayane śyāmikām añjanena

original: MSS_8831-2 sthāpyaḥ kutra priya iti parāmṛśya hārāvṛtāṅke hṛtparyaṅke pulakapaṭalītūlikāmāstṛṇoti //
analyzed: sthāpyaḥ kutra priyaḥ iti parāmṛśya hāra āvṛta aṅke hṛd paryaṅke pulaka paṭalī tūlikām āstṛṇoti

original: MSS_8832-1 karṇeṃ cāmaracārukambukalikā kaṇṭhe maṇīnāṃ gaṇaḥ sindūraprakaraḥ śiraḥparisare pārśvāntike kiṅkiṇī /
analyzed: cāmara cāru kambu kalikā kaṇṭhe maṇīnām gaṇaḥ sindūra prakaraḥ śiraḥ parisare pārśva antike kiṅkiṇī

original: MSS_8832-2 labdhaścen nṛpavāhanena kariṇā baddhena bhūṣāvidhis tat kiṃ bhūdharadhūlidhūsaratanurmānyo na vanyaḥ karī //
analyzed: labdhaḥ ced nṛpavāhanena kariṇā baddhena bhūṣā vidhiḥ tat kim bhūdhara dhūli dhūsara tanuḥ mānyaḥ na vanyaḥ karī

original: MSS_8833-1 karṇejapaḥ kuṭilamūrtirasavyapāṇir agresaras taditaras tava baddhamuṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: karṇejapaḥ kuṭila mūrtiḥ asavya pāṇiḥ agresaraḥ tad itaraḥ tava baddha muṣṭiḥ

original: MSS_8833-2 tanmārgaṇās tadapi lakṣamamī labhante dhānuṣka tat kimapi kauśalamadbhutaṃ te //
analyzed: tad mārgaṇāḥ tat api lakṣam amī labhante dhānuṣka tat kim api kauśalam adbhutam te

original: MSS_8834-1 karṇejapā api sadā kuṭilasvabhāvā duṣṭāśayā nirabhisaṃdhitavairibhūtāḥ /
analyzed: karṇejapāḥ api sadā kuṭila svabhāvāḥ duṣṭa āśayāḥ nirabhisaṃdhita vairi bhūtāḥ

original: MSS_8834-2 sohārdahṛṣṭahṛdayā mayi santu yeṣāṃ jihvāpaṭurvinimayeṣu guṇā guṇānām //
analyzed: sohārda hṛṣṭa hṛdayāḥ mayi santu yeṣām jihvā paṭuḥ vinimayeṣu guṇāḥ guṇānām

original: MSS_8835-1 karṇejapānāṃ vacanaprapañcān- mahātmanaḥ kvāpi na dūṣayanti /
analyzed: karṇejapānām vacana prapañcān mahātmanaḥ kvāpi na dūṣayanti

original: MSS_8835-2 bhujaṅgamānāṃ garalaprasaṅgān- nāpeyatāṃ yānti mahāsarāṃsi //
analyzed: bhujaṅgamānām garala prasaṅgāt na apeya tām yānti mahā sarāṃsi

original: MSS_8836-1 karṇe tat kathayanti dundubhiravai rāṣṭre yadudghoṣitaṃ tannamrāṅgatayā vadanti karuṇaṃ yasmāt trapāvān bhavet /
analyzed: karṇe tat kathayanti dundubhi ravaiḥ rāṣṭre yat udghoṣitam tat namra aṅga tayā vadanti karuṇam yasmāt trapāvān bhavet

original: MSS_8836-2 ślāghante tadudīryate yadariṇāpyugraṃ na marmāntakṛd ye kecin nanu śāṭhyamaugdhyanidhayas te bhūbhṛtāṃ rañjakāḥ //
analyzed: ślāghante tat udīryate yat ariṇā api ugram na marma anta kṛt ye kecid nanu śāṭhya maugdhya nidhayaḥ te bhūbhṛtām rañjakāḥ

original: MSS_8837-1 karṇe tāṭaṅkalakṣmīmurasi makarikāpatramūrau dukūlaṃ savye'rdhe dakṣiṇe ca dvirasanabhasitavyālakṛttīrdadhānaḥ /
analyzed: karṇe tāṭaṅka lakṣmīm urasi makarikā patram ūrau dukūlam savya īrdhe dakṣiṇe ca dvirasana bhasita vyāla kṛttīḥ dadhānaḥ

original: MSS_8837-2 kaṇṭhe niḥsīmaśīrṣasrajamatha vidadhadvīkṣitaḥ śailaputryā sabhrūvikṣepamantaḥsmitalalitamukho bhūtabhartāvatād vaḥ //
analyzed: kaṇṭhe niḥsīma śīrṣa srajam atha vidadhat vīkṣitaḥ śailaputryā sa bhrū vikṣepam antar smita lalita mukhaḥ bhūtabhartā avatāt vaḥ

original: MSS_8838-1 karṇe tāladalaṃ tanau malayajaṃ karpūravāsoṃ'śuke cūle gumphitaketakīdalabharaḥ kaṇṭhe navaikāvalī /
analyzed: karṇe tāla dalam tanau malayajam karpūra vāsaḥ aṃśuke cūle gumphita ketakī dala bharaḥ kaṇṭhe nava eka āvalī

original: MSS_8838-2 vāsaḥ śrīvanavāsasīmani vacaśrīḥ satkaveruktayo vaktre nāgarakhaṇḍamastu purataḥ premākulāḥ kuntalāḥ //
analyzed: vāsaḥ śrī vana vāsa sīmani vaca śrīḥ sat kaveḥ uktayaḥ vaktre nāgarakhaṇḍam astu puratas prema ākulāḥ kuntalāḥ

original: MSS_8839-1 karṇena ghātayitvā ghaṭotkacaṃ śakraśaktinirmokṣāt /
analyzed: karṇena ghātayitvā ghaṭotkacam śakra śakti nirmokṣāt

original: MSS_8839-2 jīvitamarakṣi pārthaiḥ svātmānaṃ sarvato rakṣet //
analyzed: jīvitam arakṣi pārthaiḥ sva ātmānam sarvatas rakṣet

original: MSS_8840-1 karṇena nirjito'smīti cintāṃ cintāmaṇe tyaja /
analyzed: karṇena nirjitaḥ asmi iti cintām cintāmaṇe tyaja

original: MSS_8840-2 jitā devadrumāḥ pañca na duḥkhaṃ pañcabhiḥ saha //
analyzed: jitāḥ deva drumāḥ pañca na duḥkham pañcabhiḥ saha

original: MSS_8841-1 karṇe baddhā ravau śvetaturaṃgaripumūlikā /
analyzed: karṇe baddhā ravau śveta turaṃga ripu mūlikā

original: MSS_8841-2 sarvajvaraharā śvetamandārasya ca mūlikā //
MSS_8842-1 karṇe yanna kṛtaṃ sakhījanavaco yannādṛtā bandhuvāk yat pāde nipatannapi priyatamaḥ karṇotpalenāhataḥ /
analyzed: karṇe yat na kṛtam sakhī jana vacaḥ yat na ādṛtā bandhu vāc yat pāde nipatan api priyatamaḥ karṇa utpalena āhataḥ

original: MSS_8842-2 tenendurdahanāyate malayajālepaḥ sphuliṅgāyate rātriḥ kalpaśatāyate bisalatāhāro'pi bhārāyate //
analyzed: tena induḥ dahanāyate malaya jālepaḥ sphuliṅgāyate rātriḥ kalpaśatāyate bisa latā āhāraḥ api bhārāyate

original: MSS_8843-1 karṇe'vataṃsayitumarpayituṃ śikhāsu māṣṭuṃ ratiśramajalaṃ caṣake nidhātum /
analyzed: karṇā iva ataṃsayitum arpayitum śikhāsu māṣṭum rati śrama jalam caṣake nidhātum

original: MSS_8843-2 kaṇṭhe guṇaṃ racayituṃ valayān rvidhātuṃ strīṇāṃ mano'tilulubhe śaśinaḥ kareṣu //
analyzed: kaṇṭhe guṇam racayitum valayān strīṇām manaḥ atilulubhe śaśinaḥ kareṣu

original: MSS_8844-1 karṇottaṃsaḥ śiśuśukavadhūpicchalīlaṃ śirīṣaṃ sāntaḥsūtrāḥ parimalamuco mallikānāṃ ca hārāḥ /
analyzed: karṇa uttaṃsaḥ śiśu śuka vadhū piccha līlam śirīṣam sa antaḥsūtrāḥ parimala mucaḥ mallikānām ca hārāḥ

original: MSS_8844-2 muktāgaurairvalayaracanākandalāgrairbisānāṃ grīṣmārambhe ramayati navaṃ maṇḍanaṃ kāminīnām //
analyzed: muktā gauraiḥ valaya racanā kandala agraiḥ bisānām grīṣma ārambhe ramayati navam maṇḍanam kāminīnām

original: MSS_8845-1 karṇottālitakuntalāntanipatattoyakṣaṇāsaṅginā hāreṇeva vṛtastanī pulakitā śītena sītkāriṇī /
analyzed: karṇa uttālita kuntala anta nipatat toya kṣaṇa āsaṅginā hāreṇa iva vṛta stanī pulakitā śītena sītkāriṇī

original: MSS_8845-2 nirdhautāñjanaśoṇakoṇanayanā snānāvasāne'ṅganā prasyandatkabarībharā na kurute kasya spṛhārdraṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: nirdhauta añjana śoṇa koṇa nayanā snāna avasāna iṅganā prasyandat kabarī bharā na kurute kasya spṛhā ārdram manaḥ

original: MSS_8845A-1 karṇotpalaṃ kaṭākṣāḥ kāntiste kanakakañcukaviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: karṇotpalam kaṭākṣāḥ kāntiḥ te kanaka kañcuka viśeṣaḥ

original: MSS_8845A-2 hasitāni sindhukanye hārāsstanaśailanirjhaṃravihārāḥ //
analyzed: hasitāni sindhu kanye hārāḥ stana śaila nirjhaṃra vihārāḥ

original: MSS_8846-1 karṇotpalānnayanamapi gaticyutātte tanmīlane mukhamayaṃ na jahāti bhṛṅgaḥ /
analyzed: karṇa utpalāt nayanam api gati cyutāt te tad mīlane mukham ayam na jahāti bhṛṅgaḥ

original: MSS_8846-2 yenaivamadya vinivārayasi pramatte tasmin kare'pi na kimambujasāmyadoṣaḥ //
analyzed: yena evam adya vinivārayasi pramatte tasmin kare pi na kim ambuja sāmya doṣaḥ

original: MSS_8847-1 karṇotpalenāpi mukhaṃ sanāthaṃ labheta netradyutinirjitena /
analyzed: karṇa utpalena api mukham sanātham labheta netra dyuti nirjitena

original: MSS_8847-2 yadyetadīyena tataḥ kṛtārthā svacakṣuṣī kiṃ kurute kuraṅgī //
analyzed: yadi etadīyena tatas kṛtārthā sva cakṣuṣī kim kurute kuraṅgī

original: MSS_8848-1 karṇotsaṅgavisarpiṇī nayanayoḥ kāntirvataṃsotpalaṃ lākṣāsaṃbhramanirvyapekṣamadharaṃ lāvaṇyamevāñcati /
analyzed: karṇa utsaṅga visarpiṇī nayanayoḥ kāntiḥ vataṃsa utpalam lākṣā saṃbhrama nirvyapekṣam adharam lāvaṇyam eva añcati

original: MSS_8848-2 hāro'syāḥ smitacandrikaiva kucayoraṅgaprabhā kañcukī tanvyāḥ kevalamaṅgabhāramadhunā manye paraṃ bhūṣaṇam //
analyzed: hāraḥ usyāḥ smita candrikā eva kucayoḥ aṅga prabhā kañcukī tanvyāḥ kevalam aṅga bhāram adhunā manye param bhūṣaṇam

original: MSS_8849-1 karṇau tāvat kuvalayadṛśāṃ locanāmbhoruhābhyām abhyākrāntau kanakaruciro bhāladeśo'pi neyaḥ /
analyzed: karṇau tāvat kuvalaya dṛśām locana ambhoruhābhyām abhyākrāntau kanaka ruciraḥ bhāla deśaḥ api neyaḥ

original: MSS_8849-2 ityāśaṅkākulitamanasā vedhasā kajjalaughaiḥ sīmārekhā vyaraci nibiḍabhrūlatākaitavena //
analyzed: iti āśaṅkā ākulita manasā vedhasā kajjala oghaiḥ sīmā rekhā vyaraci nibiḍa bhrū latā kaitavena

original: MSS_8850-1 karṇau sapatnyaḥ praviśālayeyur viśālayeyurna kadāpi netre /
analyzed: karṇau sapatnyaḥ viśālayeyuḥ na kadāpi netre

original: MSS_8850-2 vidyā sadabhyāsavaśena labhyā saujanyamabhyāsavaśādalabhyam //
analyzed: vidyā sat abhyāsa vaśena labhyā saujanyam abhyāsa vaśāt alabhyam

original: MSS_8850A-1 kartavyaṃ jinavandanaṃ vidhiparairharṣollasanmānasaiḥ saccāritravibhūṣitāḥ pratidinaṃ sevyāḥ sadā sādhavaḥ /
analyzed: kartavyam jina vandanam vidhi paraiḥ harṣa ullasat mānasaiḥ sat cāritra vibhūṣitāḥ pratidinam sevyāḥ sadā sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_8850A-2 śrotavyaṃ ca dine dine jinavaco mithyātvanirnāśanaṃ dānādau vratapālane ca satataṃ kāryā ratiḥ śrāvakaiḥ //
analyzed: śrotavyam ca dine dine jina vacaḥ mithyātva nirnāśanam dāna ādau vrata pālane ca satatam kāryā ratiḥ śrāvakaiḥ

original: MSS_8851-1 kartavyaṃ tveva karmeti manoreṣa viniścayaḥ /
analyzed: kartavyam tu eva karma iti manoḥ eṣa viniścayaḥ

original: MSS_8851-2 ekāntena hyanīho'yaṃ parābhavati pūruṣaḥ //
analyzed: ekāntena hi anīhā uyam parābhavati pūruṣaḥ

original: MSS_8852-1 kartavyaṃ na karoti bandhubhirapi snehātmabhirbodhitaḥ kāmitvādavamanyate hitamataṃ dhīro'pyabhīṣṭaṃ naraḥ /
analyzed: kartavyam na karoti bandhubhiḥ api sneha ātmabhiḥ bodhitaḥ kāmi tvāt avamanyate hita matam dhīraḥ api abhīṣṭam naraḥ

original: MSS_8852-2 niṣkāmasya na vikriyā tanubhṛto loke kvacid dṛśyate yattasmādidameva mūlamakhilānarthasya nirdhāritam //
analyzed: niṣkāmasya na vikriyā tanubhṛtaḥ loke kvacid dṛśyate yat tasmāt idam eva mūlam akhila anarthasya nirdhāritam

original: MSS_8853-1 kartavyaṃ bhūmipālena śaraṇāgatarakṣaṇam /
analyzed: kartavyam bhūmipālena śaraṇa āgata rakṣaṇam

original: MSS_8853-2 kapotarakṣaṇaṃ śyenāt kṛtvā kīrtiṃ śibirgataḥ //
analyzed: kapota rakṣaṇam śyenāt kṛtvā kīrtim śibiḥ gataḥ

original: MSS_8854-1 kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ sarvaiḥ samūhahitavādinām /
analyzed: kartavyam vacanam sarvaiḥ samūha hita vādinām

original: MSS_8855-1 kartavyaḥ pratidivasaṃ prasannacittaiḥ svalpo'pi vrataniyamopavāsadharmaḥ /
analyzed: kartavyaḥ pratidivasam prasanna cittaiḥ su alpaḥ api vrata niyama upavāsa dharmaḥ

original: MSS_8855-2 prāṇeṣu praharati nityameva mṛtyur bhūtānāṃ mahati kṛte'pi hi prayatne //
analyzed: prāṇeṣu praharati nityam eva mṛtyuḥ bhūtānām mahati kṛte api hi prayatne

original: MSS_8856-1 kartavyaḥ saṃcayo nityaṃ na tu kāryo'tisaṃcayaḥ /
analyzed: kartavyaḥ saṃcayaḥ nityam na tu kārya ūti saṃcayaḥ

original: MSS_8856-2 atisaṃcayaśīlo'yaṃ dhanuṣā jambuko hataḥ //
analyzed: ati saṃcaya śīlaḥ yam dhanuṣā jambukaḥ hataḥ

original: MSS_8857-1 kartavyameva kartavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi /
analyzed: kartavyam eva kartavyam prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ api

original: MSS_8857-2 akartavyaṃ na kartavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi //
analyzed: akartavyam na kartavyam prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ api

original: MSS_8858-1 kartavyā cārthasāre'pi kāvye śabdavicitratā /
analyzed: kartavyā ca artha sāre pi kāvye śabda vicitra tā

original: MSS_8858-2 vinā ghaṇṭāṭaṇatkāraṃ gajo gacchanna śobhate //
analyzed: vinā ghaṇṭā ṭaṇatkāram gajaḥ gacchan na śobhate

original: MSS_8859-1 kartavyāni ca mitrāṇi durbalāni balāni ca /
analyzed: kartavyāni ca mitrāṇi durbalāni balāni ca

original: MSS_8859-2 paśya kūrmapatirbaddho mūṣikeṇa vimocitaḥ //
analyzed: paśya kūrma patiḥ baddhaḥ mūṣikeṇa vimocitaḥ

original: MSS_8860-1 kartavyānyeva mitrāṇi sabalānyabalāni ca /
analyzed: kartavyāni eva mitrāṇi sa balāni abalāni ca

original: MSS_8860-2 hastiyūthaṃ vane baddhaṃ mūṣakairyad vimocitam //
analyzed: hasti yūtham vane baddham mūṣakaiḥ yat vimocitam

original: MSS_8861-1 kartavye sāhasaṃ nityam utkaṭaṃ hi vigarhitam /
analyzed: kartavye sāhasam nityam utkaṭam hi vigarhitam

original: MSS_8861-2 atisāhasadoṣeṇa bhīmaḥ sarpavaśaṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: ati sāhasa doṣeṇa bhīmaḥ sarpa vaśam gataḥ

original: MSS_8861A-1 kartavyo guṇasaṃgrahaḥ parihate deyaṃ nijaṃ mānasaṃ śrotavyaṃ vacanāmṛtaṃ jinavacaḥ kāryaṃ yathāsthānavat /
analyzed: kartavyaḥ guṇa saṃgrahaḥ parihate deyam nijam mānasam śrotavyam vacana amṛtam jina vacaḥ kāryam yathā sthāna vat

original: MSS_8861A-2 dātavyaṃ yatipuṅgaveṣu nijakaṃ nyāyaprakalpyaṃ dhanaṃ śraddheyaṃ satataṃ satāṃ sucaritaśreyaskaro'yaṃ vidhiḥ //
analyzed: dātavyam yati puṅgaveṣu nijakam nyāya prakalpyam dhanam śraddheyam satatam satām su carita śreyaskaraḥ yam vidhiḥ

original: MSS_8862-1 kartavyo'pyāśrayaḥ śreyān phalaṃ bhāgyānusārataḥ /
analyzed: kartavyā upi āśrayaḥ śreyān phalam bhāgya anusārataḥ

original: MSS_8862-2 nīlakaṇṭhasya kaṇṭhe'pi vāsukirvāyubhakṣakaḥ //
analyzed: nīlakaṇṭhasya kaṇṭhe pi vāsukiḥ vāyubhakṣakaḥ

original: MSS_8863-1 kartavyo bhrātṛṣu sneho vismartavyā guṇetarāḥ /
analyzed: kartavyaḥ bhrātṛṣu snehaḥ vismartavyāḥ guṇa itarāḥ

original: MSS_8863-2 saṃbandho bandhubhiḥ śreyān lokayorubhayorapi //
analyzed: saṃbandhaḥ bandhubhiḥ śreyān lokayoḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: MSS_8864-1 kartavyo hṛdi vartate yadi tarorasyopakāras tadā mā kālaṃ gamayāmbuvāha samaye siñcainamambhobharaiḥ /
analyzed: kartavyaḥ hṛdi vartate yadi taroḥ asya upakāraḥ tadā mā kālam gamaya ambuvāha samaye siñca enam ambhaḥ bharaiḥ

original: MSS_8864-2 śīrṇe puṣpaphale dale vigalite mūle gate śuṣkatāṃ kasmai kiṃ hitamācariṣyasi parītāpas tu te sthāsyati //
analyzed: śīrṇe puṣpa phale dale vigalite mūle gate śuṣka tām kasmai kim hitam ācariṣyasi parītāpaḥ tu te sthāsyati

original: MSS_8865-1 kartā kārayitā caiva preṣako hyanumodakaḥ /
analyzed: kartā kārayitā ca eva preṣakaḥ hi anumodakaḥ

original: MSS_8865-2 sakṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ caiva catvāraḥ samabhāginaḥ //
analyzed: sakṛtam duṣkṛtam ca eva catvāraḥ sama bhāginaḥ

original: MSS_8866-1 kartā kārayitā caiva yaścaivamanumanyate /
analyzed: kartā kārayitā ca eva yaḥ ca evam anumanyate

original: MSS_8866-2 śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ teṣāmapi samaṃ phalam /
analyzed: śubham vā yadi vā pāpam teṣām api samam phalam

original: MSS_8867-1 kartā dyūtacchalānāṃ jatumayaśaraṇoddīpanaḥ so'timānī kṛṣṇākeśottarīyavyapanayanamarut pāṇḍavā yasya dāsāḥ /
analyzed: kartā dyūta chalānām jatu maya śaraṇa uddīpanaḥ soti mānī kṛṣṇākeśa uttarīya vyapanayana marut pāṇḍavāḥ yasya dāsāḥ

original: MSS_8867-2 rājā duḥśāsanādergururanujaśatasyāṅgarājasya mitraṃ kvāste duryodhano'sau kathayata na ruṣā druṣṭumabhyāgatau svaḥ //
analyzed: rājā duḥśāsana ādeḥ guruḥ anuja śatasya aṅga rājasya mitram kva āste duryodhana usau kathayata na ruṣā druṣṭum abhyāgatau svaḥ

original: MSS_8868-1 kartuṃ trilocanādanyo na pārthavijayaṃ kṣamaḥ /
analyzed: kartum trilocanāt anyaḥ na pārtha vijayam kṣamaḥ

original: MSS_8868-2 tadarthaḥ śakyate draṣṭuṃ locanadvayibhiḥ katham //
analyzed: tad arthaḥ śakyate draṣṭum locana dvayibhiḥ katham

original: MSS_8869-1 kartumakartuṃ śaktaḥ sakalaṃ jagadetadanyathākartum /
analyzed: kartum a kartum śaktaḥ sakalam jagat etat anyathā kartum

original: MSS_8869-2 yastaṃ vihāya rāmaṃ kāmaṃ mā dhehi mānasānyasmin //
analyzed: yaḥ tam vihāya rāmam kāmam mā dhehi mānasāni asmin

original: MSS_8870-1 kartumiṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ vā kaḥ prabhurvidhinā vinā /
analyzed: kartum iṣṭam aniṣṭam vā kaḥ prabhuḥ vidhinā vinā

original: MSS_8870-2 kartāramanyamāropya lokas tuṣyati kupyati //
analyzed: kartāram anyam āropya lokaḥ tuṣyati kupyati

original: MSS_8871-1 kardamavadātmavaibhavam ullāsya ca mānavīṃ prajāṃ suciram /
analyzed: kardama vat ātma vaibhavam ullāsya ca mānavīm prajām su ciram

original: MSS_8871-2 tapanottāpapluṣṭaṃ svavapuḥ kṛtvā gataṃ sarasā //
analyzed: tapana uttāpa pluṣṭam sva vapuḥ kṛtvā gatam sarasā

original: MSS_8872-1 karpāsabījamajjānāṃ cūrṇaṃ tailena pācayet /
MSS_8872-2 tena saṃjāyate puṣpaṃ yuvatīnāṃ cirād gatam //
analyzed: tena saṃjāyate puṣpam yuvatīnām cirāt gatam

original: MSS_8872A-1 karpāsabhasmatakrāsthivarjaṃ sarvaṃ sitaṃ śubham /
MSS_8872A-2 govājigajadevarṣivarjaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tu ninditam //
analyzed: go vāji gaja deva ṛṣi varjam kṛṣṇam tu ninditam

original: MSS_8873-1 karpāsāsthipracayanicitā nirdhanaśrotriyāṇāṃ yeṣāṃ vātyāpravitatakuṭīprāṅgaṇāntā babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: karpāsa asthi pracaya nicitāḥ nirdhana śrotriyāṇām yeṣām vātyā pravitata kuṭī prāṅgaṇa antāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: MSS_8873-2 tatsaudhānāṃ parisarabhuvi tvatprasādādidānīṃ krīḍāyuddhacchidurayuvatīhāramuktāḥ patanti //
analyzed: tad saudhānām parisara bhuvi tvad prasādāt idānīm krīḍā yuddha chidura yuvatī hāra muktāḥ patanti

original: MSS_8874-1 karpūraṃ candanaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ tulasī sarjasaṃbhavam /
MSS_8874-2 mustaṃ śilārasaṃ caiva dhattūramagurus tathā //
analyzed: mustam śilā rasam ca eva dhattūram aguruḥ tathā

original: MSS_8875-1 śephālī śatapuṣpā ca sarṣapāstagaraṃ guḍaḥ /
analyzed: śephālī śatapuṣpā ca sarṣapāḥ tagaram guḍaḥ

original: MSS_8875-2 tathā rudrajaṭā sarvam etadekatra kārayet //
analyzed: tathā rudrajaṭā sarvam etat ekatra kārayet

original: MSS_1564-1 (anena yogarājena dhūpitāmbarabhūṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: anena yoga rājena dhūpita ambara bhūṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_1564-2 dhūpitāṅgastribhuvanaṃ manujaḥ kurute vaśam //)
analyzed: dhūpita aṅgaḥ tribhuvanam manujaḥ kurute vaśam

original: MSS_8876-1 karpūra iva dagdhopi śaktimān yo jane jane /
analyzed: karpūraḥ iva dagdhaḥ api śaktimān yaḥ jane jane

original: MSS_8876-2 namo'stvavāryavīryāya tasmai makaraketave //
analyzed: namaḥ astu avārya vīryāya tasmai makaraketave

original: MSS_8877-1 karpūragauraṃ karuṇāvatāraṃ saṃsārasāraṃ bhujagendrahāram /
MSS_8877-2 sadā vasantaṃ hṛdayāravinde bhavaṃ bhavānīsahitaṃ namāmi //
analyzed: sadā vasantam hṛdaya aravinde bhavam bhavānī sahitam namāmi

original: MSS_8878-1 karpūracandanarajo dhavalaṃ vahantīm āśyānacandanavilepanamaṅgamaṅgam /
analyzed: karpūra candana rajaḥ dhavalam vahantīm āśyāna candana vilepanam aṅgam aṅgam

original: MSS_8878-2 antargatasya dahatī mahataḥ smarāgner dagdhasya saṃkṣayavaśādiva bhasmaśeṣam //
analyzed: antargatasya dahatī mahataḥ smara agneḥ dagdhasya saṃkṣaya vaśāt iva bhasma śeṣam

original: MSS_8879-1 karpūradravaśīkarotkaramahānīhāramagnāmiva pratyagrāmṛtaphenapaṅkapaṭalīlepopadigdhāmiva /
analyzed: karpūra drava śīkara utkara mahā nīhāra magnām iva pratyagra amṛta phena paṅka paṭala lepa upadigdhām iva

original: MSS_8879-2 svacchaikasphaṭikāśmaveśmajaṭharakṣiptāmiva kṣmāmimāṃ kurvan pārvaṇaśarvarīpatirasāvuddāmamuddyotate //
analyzed: su accha eka sphaṭika aśma veśma jaṭhara kṣiptām iva kṣmām imām kurvan pārvaṇa śarvarīpatiḥ asau uddāmam uddyotate

original: MSS_8880-1 karpūradhūlidhavaladyutipūradhauta- diṅmaṇḍale śiśirarociṣi tasya yūnaḥ /
analyzed: karpūra dhūli dhavala dyuti pūra dhauta diś maṇḍale śiśira rociṣi tasya yūnaḥ

original: MSS_8880-2 līlāśiroṃ'śukaniveśaviśeṣakḷpti- vyaktastanonnatirabhūnnayanāvanau sā //
analyzed: līlā śiraḥ ṃśuka niveśa viśeṣa kḷpti vyakta stana unnatiḥ abhūt nayana avanau sā

original: MSS_8880A-1 karpūradhūlīracitālavālaḥ kastūrikākalpitadohadaśrīḥ /
MSS_8880A-2 himāmbupūrairabhiṣicyamānaḥ prāñcaṃ guṇaṃ muñcati kiṃ palāṇḍuḥ //
analyzed: hima ambupūraiḥ abhiṣicyamānaḥ prāñcam guṇam muñcati kim palāṇḍuḥ

original: MSS_8881-1 karpūradhūlīracitālavālaḥ kastūrikākuṅkumaliptadehaḥ /
MSS_8881-2 suvarṇakumbhaiḥ pariṣicyamāno nijaṃ guṇaṃ muñcati kiṃ palāṇḍuḥ //
analyzed: suvarṇa kumbhaiḥ pariṣicyamānaḥ nijam guṇam muñcati kim palāṇḍuḥ

original: MSS_8882-1 karpūrantaki ketakantaki śaradrākāśaśāṅkantaki śrīcandrantaki candanantaki sudhāsārācchapūrantaki /
MSS_8882-2 kailāsantaki dugdhasāgaralasatsvacchācchadundhantaki śrīśambhuntaki kīrtayas tava vibho darvīkarendrantaki //
analyzed: kailāsantaki dugdhasāgara lasat svaccha accha dundhantaki śrī śambhuntaki kīrtayaḥ tava vibho darvīkara indrantaki

original: MSS_8883-1 karpūranti sudhādravanti kamalāhāsanti haṃsanti ca prāleyanti himālayanti karakāsāranti hāranti ca /
analyzed: sudhādravanti kamalāhāsanti haṃsanti ca

original: MSS_8883-2 trailokyāṅganaraṅgalaṅghimagatiprāgalbhyasaṃbhāvit āḥ śītāṃśoḥ kiraṇacchaṭā iva jayantyetarhi tatkīrtayaḥ //
analyzed: āḥ śītāṃśoḥ kiraṇa chaṭāḥ iva jayanti etarhi tad kīrtayaḥ

original: MSS_8884-1 karpūrapūracchavivādavidyā- saṃvāvadūkadyutiśuktitāmre /
MSS_8884-2 indau nṛpadveṣi tamovitānaṃ sūryodaye roditi cakravākī //
analyzed: indau nṛpa dveṣi tamaḥ vitānam sūrya udaye roditi cakravākī

original: MSS_8885-1 karpūrapūratulanāṃ kalayanti kīrteḥ śrīrāmacandra tava yat kavayaḥ kathaṃ tat /
analyzed: karpūra pūra tulanām kalayanti kīrteḥ śrī rāmacandra tava yat kavayaḥ katham tat

original: MSS_8885-2 tvadvairiṇāmatitarāmapakīrtito'syāḥ syād dhūsaratvamiti tatra vayaṃ pratīmaḥ //
analyzed: tvad vairiṇām atitarām apakīrtitaḥ usyāḥ syāt dhūsara tvam iti tatra vayam pratīmaḥ

original: MSS_8886-1 karpūrapratipanthino himagirigrāvāgrasaṃgharṣiṇaḥ kṣīrāmbhonidhimadhyagarbhajayino gaṅgaughasarvaṃkaṣāḥ /
analyzed: karpūra pratipanthinaḥ himagiri grāva agra saṃgharṣiṇaḥ kṣīra ambhonidhi madhya garbha jayinaḥ gaṅgā ogha sarvaṃkaṣāḥ

original: MSS_8886-2 svacchandaṃ haricandanadyutitudaḥ kundendusaṃvādinas tasyāsannaravindakandarucayo'neke guṇāḥ kecana //
analyzed: svacchandam haricandana dyuti tudaḥ kunda indu saṃvādinaḥ tasya āsan aravinda kanda rucayaḥ na eke guṇāḥ kecana

original: MSS_8887-1 karpūrabhallātakaśaṅkhacūrṇaṃ kṣāro yavānāṃ samanaḥśilaśca /
analyzed: karpūra bhallātaka śaṅkha cūrṇam kṣāraḥ yavānām sa manaḥśilaḥ ca

original: MSS_8887-2 tailaṃ vipakvaṃ haritālamiśraṃ nirmūlalomāni karoti sadyaḥ //
analyzed: tailam vipakvam haritāla miśram nirmūla lomāni karoti sadyas

original: MSS_8888-1 karpūramiśrasehuṇḍadugdhalepena jāyate /
MSS_8888-2 śephaso mahatī vṛddhiḥ kaṭhinastrīsukhāvahā //
analyzed: śephasaḥ mahatī vṛddhiḥ kaṭhina strī sukha āvahā

original: MSS_8889-1 karpūramiśreṇa ca kaṇṭakārī- bījodbhavenaiva rasena liptam /
analyzed: karpūra miśreṇa ca kaṇṭakārī bīja udbhavena eva rasena liptam

original: MSS_8889-2 liṅgaṃ rate drāvakaraṃ vadhūnāṃ saṃjāyate'tyantasukhāvahaṃ ca //
analyzed: liṅgam rate drāva karam vadhūnām saṃjāyata ityanta sukha āvaham ca

original: MSS_8890-1 karpūra re parimalas tava marditasya śrīkhaṇḍa re parimalas tava gharṣitasya /
analyzed: karpūra re parimalaḥ tava marditasya śrīkhaṇḍa re parimalaḥ tava gharṣitasya

original: MSS_8890-2 re kākatuṇḍa tava vahnigatasya gandhaḥ kastūrikā svayamathādhitagandhadṛṣṭā //
analyzed: re kākatuṇḍa tava vahni gatasya gandhaḥ kastūrikā svayam atha ādhita gandha dṛṣṭā

original: MSS_8891-1 karpūravartiriva locanatāpahantrī phullāmbujasragiva kaṇṭhasukhaikahetuḥ /
analyzed: karpūra vartiḥ iva locana tāpa hantrī phulla ambuja sraj iva kaṇṭha sukha eka hetuḥ

original: MSS_8891-2 cetaścamatkṛtipadaṃ kaviteva ramyā namyā narībhiramarīva hi sā vireje //
analyzed: cetaḥ camatkṛti padam kavi tā iva ramyā namyā narībhiḥ amarī iva hi sā vireje

original: MSS_8892-1 karpūrādapi kairavādapi dalatkundādapi svarṇadī- kallolādapi ketakādapi lalatkāntādṛgantādapi /
analyzed: karpūrāt api kairavāt api dalat kundāt api svarṇadī kallolāt api ketakāt api lalat kāntā dṛś antāt api

original: MSS_8892-2 dūronmuktakalaṅkaśaṃkaraśiraḥśītāṃśukhaṇḍādapi śvetābhis tava kīrtibhirdhavalitā saptārṇavā medinī //
analyzed: dūra unmukta kalaṅka śaṃkara śiraḥ śītāṃśu khaṇḍāt api śvetābhiḥ tava kīrtibhiḥ dhavalitā sapta arṇavā medinī

original: MSS_8893-1 karpūrāmbuniṣekabhāji sarasairambhojinīnāṃ dalair āstīrṇe'pi vivartamānavapuṣoḥ srastasraji srastare /
analyzed: karpūra ambu niṣeka bhāji sarasaiḥ ambhojinīnām dalaiḥ āstīrṇe api vivartamāna vapuṣoḥ srasta sraji srastare

original: MSS_8893-2 mandonmeṣadṛśeḥ kimanyadabhavatsā kāpyavasthā tayor yasyāṃ candanacandracampakadalaśreṇyādi vahnīyate //
analyzed: manda unmeṣa dṛśeḥ kim anyat abhavat sā kā api avasthā tayoḥ yasyām candana candra campaka dala śreṇi ādi vahnīyate

original: MSS_8894-1 karpūrāyitasaikatāya śiśirakṣodāyamānātapa- vyūhāya vyajanānilāyitamahājhañjhāmarudraṃhase /
analyzed: karpūrāyita saikatāya śiśira kṣodāyamāna ātapa vyūhāya vyajana anilāyita mahā jhañjhā marut raṃhase

original: MSS_8894-2 asmai tanvi nidāghavāsaravayomadhyābhisārakramo- tsāhātyutsavasāhasāya mahate sauhārdamīhāmahe //
analyzed: asmai tanvi nidāgha vāsara vayaḥ madhya abhisāra krama u tsāha ati utsava sāhasāya mahate sauhārdam īhāmahe

original: MSS_8895-1 karpūrīyanti bhūmau sarasi sarabhasaṃ kairavīyanti gaṅgā- kallolīyanti nāke diśi diśi paritaḥ ketakīyanti kiṃ ca /
analyzed: karpūrīyanti bhūmau sarasi sarabhasam kairavīyanti gaṅgā kallolīyanti nāke diśi diśi paritas ketakīyanti kim ca

original: MSS_8895-2 haṃsīyantyantarikṣe kamaladaladṛśāṃ mauktikīyanti kaṇṭhe śuktīyanyamburāśau viśadavisaruco raśmayaḥ śītaraśmeḥ //
analyzed: haṃsīyanti antarikṣe kamala dala dṛśām mauktikīyanti kaṇṭhe śuktīyani amburāśau viśada visa rucaḥ raśmayaḥ śītaraśmeḥ

original: MSS_8896-1 karpūreṇa sthalaviracanā kuṅkumenālavālaṃ mādhvīkāni pratidinapayaḥ pañcabāṇaḥ kṛṣāṇaḥ /
analyzed: karpūreṇa sthala viracanā kuṅkumena ālavālam mādhvīkāni pratidina payaḥ pañcabāṇaḥ kṛṣāṇaḥ

original: MSS_8896-2 tatrotpannā yadi kila bhavet kāñcanī kāpi vallī sā cedasyāḥ kimapi labhate subhruvaḥ saukumāryam //
analyzed: tatra utpannā yadi kila bhavet kāñcanī kā api vallī sā ced asyāḥ kim api labhate subhruvaḥ saukumāryam

original: MSS_8897-1 karpūraiḥ kimapūri kiṃ malayajairālepi kiṃ pāradair akṣāli sphaṭikopalaiḥ kimaghaṭi dyāvāpṛthivyorvapuḥ /
analyzed: karpūraiḥ kim apūri kim malayajaiḥ ālepi kim pāradaiḥ akṣāli sphaṭika upalaiḥ kim aghaṭi dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ vapuḥ

original: MSS_8897-2 etat tarkaya kairavaklamahare śṛṅgāradīkṣāgurau dikkāntāmukure cakorasuhṛdi prauḍhe tuṣāratviṣi //
analyzed: etat tarkaya kairava klama hare śṛṅgāra dīkṣā gurau diś kāntā mukure cakora suhṛdi prauḍhe tuṣāra tviṣi

original: MSS_8898-1 karpūrairiva pāradairiva sudhāsyandairivāplāvite jāte hanta divāpi deva kakubhāṃ garbhe bhavatkīrtibhiḥ /
analyzed: karpūraiḥ iva pāradaiḥ iva sudhā syandaiḥ iva āplāvite jāte hanta divā api deva kakubhām garbhe bhavat kīrtibhiḥ

original: MSS_8898-2 dhṛtvāṅge kavacaṃ nibadhya śaradhiṃ kṛtvā puro mādhavaṃ kāmaḥ kairavabāndhavodayadhiyā dhunvan dhanurdhāvati //
analyzed: dhṛtvā aṅge kavacam nibadhya śaradhim kṛtvā puras mādhavam kāmaḥ kairava bāndhava udaya dhiyā dhunvan dhanuḥ dhāvati

original: MSS_8899-1 karma khalviha kartavyaṃ jātenāmitrakarśana /
analyzed: karma khalu iha kartavyam jātena amitra karśana

original: MSS_8899-2 akarmāṇo hi jīvanti sthāvarā netare janāḥ //
analyzed: a karmāṇaḥ hi jīvanti sthāvarāḥ na itare janāḥ
