original: MSS_8900-1 karma cātmahitaṃ kāryaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vā yadi vā mṛdu /
analyzed: karma ca ātma hitam kāryam tīkṣṇam vā yadi vā mṛdu

original: MSS_8900-2 grasyate'karmaśīlas tu sadānarthairakiṃcanaḥ //
analyzed: tu sadā anarthaiḥ akiṃcanaḥ

original: MSS_8901-1 karma caiva hi sarveṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ prayojakam /
analyzed: karma ca eva hi sarveṣām kāraṇānām prayojakam

original: MSS_8901-2 śreyaḥpāpīyasāṃ cātra phalaṃ bhavati karmaṇām //
analyzed: śreyaḥ pāpīyasām ca atra phalam bhavati karmaṇām

original: MSS_8902-1 karmajanyaśarīreṣu romāḥ śārīramānasāḥ /
analyzed: karma janya śarīreṣu romāḥ śārīra mānasāḥ

original: MSS_8902-2 śarā iva patantīha vimuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ //
analyzed: śarāḥ iva patanti iha vimuktāḥ dṛḍha dhanvibhiḥ

original: MSS_8903-1 karmajāḥ prabhavantyeva yathākālamupadravāḥ /
analyzed: karma jāḥ prabhavanti eva yathākālam upadravāḥ

original: MSS_8903-2 etattu kaṣṭaṃ yacchatruḥ kartāhamiti manyate //
analyzed: etat tu kaṣṭam yat śatruḥ kartāham iti manyate

original: MSS_8903A-1 karma jīvaṃ ca saṃśliṣṭaṃ parijñātātmaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: karma jīvam ca saṃśliṣṭam parijñāta ātma niścayaḥ

original: MSS_8903A-2 vibhinnīkurute sādhuḥ sāmāyikaśalākayā //
analyzed: vibhinnīkurute sādhuḥ sāmāyika śalākayā

original: MSS_8904-1 karmajñānaṃ ca mokṣāya karmaṇyartho'dhikāritā /
analyzed: karma jñānam ca mokṣāya karmaṇi artha udhikāri tā

original: MSS_8904-2 ato'rthenaiva kaivalyaṃ na kaivalyena labhyate //
analyzed: atorthena eva kaivalyam na kaivalyena labhyate

original: MSS_8905-1 karmaṇaḥ phalanirvṛttiṃ svayamaśnāti kārakaḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ phala nirvṛttim svayam aśnāti kārakaḥ

original: MSS_8905-2 pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate loke kṛtasyāpyakṛtasya ca //
analyzed: pratyakṣam dṛśyate loke kṛtasya api akṛtasya ca

original: MSS_8906-1 karmaṇaḥ saṃcayāt svarganarakau mokṣabandhane /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ saṃcayāt svarga narakau mokṣa bandhane

original: MSS_8906-2 karmaṇo jñāyate jantur bījādiva navāṅkuraḥ //
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ jñāyate jantuḥ bījāt iva nava aṅkuraḥ

original: MSS_8907-1 karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasyāhuḥ sāttvikaṃ nirmalaṃ phalam /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ su kṛtasya āhuḥ sāttvikam nirmalam phalam

original: MSS_8907-2 rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam //
analyzed: rajasaḥ tu phalam duḥkham ajñānam tamasaḥ phalam

original: MSS_8908-1 sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca /
analyzed: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānam rajasaḥ lobhaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_8908-2 pramādamohau tamaso bhavato'jñānameva ca //
analyzed: pramāda mohau tamasaḥ bhavataḥ jñānam eva ca

original: MSS_8909-1 karmaṇāṃ tu praśastānām anuṣṭhānaṃ sukhāvaham /
analyzed: karmaṇām tu praśastānām anuṣṭhānam sukha āvaham

original: MSS_8909-2 teṣāmevānanuṣṭhānaṃ paścāt tāpakaraṃ mahat //
analyzed: teṣām eva ananuṣṭhānam paścāt tāpa karam mahat

original: MSS_8910-1 karmaṇācaritaṃ pūrvaṃ sadbhirācaritaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: karmaṇā ācaritam pūrvam sadbhiḥ ācaritam ca yat

original: MSS_8910-2 tadevāsthāya modante dāntāḥ śamaparāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: tat eva āsthāya modante dāntāḥ śama parāyaṇāḥ

original: MSS_8911-1 karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇaiva vilīyate /
analyzed: karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇā eva vilīyate

original: MSS_8911-2 sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhayaṃ kṣemaṃ karmaṇaivābhipadyate //
analyzed: sukham duḥkham bhayam kṣemam karmaṇā eva abhipadyate

original: MSS_8912-1 asti cedīśvaraḥ kaścit phalarūpyanyakarmaṇām /
analyzed: asti ced īśvaraḥ kaścid phala rūpi anya karmaṇām

original: MSS_8912-2 kartāraṃ bhajate so'pi na hyakartuḥ prabhurhi saḥ //
analyzed: kartāram bhajate saḥ upi na hi akartuḥ prabhuḥ hi saḥ

original: MSS_8913-1 karmaṇā takṣakāreṇa manuṣyo yattu putrikā /
analyzed: karmaṇā takṣakāreṇa manuṣyaḥ yat tu putrikā

original: MSS_8913-2 vāsanārajjumākṛṣya savaṃkarmasu coditaḥ //
analyzed: vāsanā rajjum ākṛṣya savaṃkarmasu coditaḥ

original: MSS_8913A-1 karmaṇā badhyate jantur vidyayā tu pramucyate /
analyzed: karmaṇā badhyate jantuḥ vidyayā tu pramucyate

original: MSS_8913A-2 tasmāt karma na kurvanti yatayaḥ pāradarśinaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt karma na kurvanti yatayaḥ pāra darśinaḥ

original: MSS_8914-1 karmaṇā bādhyate buddhir buddhyā karma na bādhyate /
analyzed: karmaṇā bādhyate buddhiḥ buddhyā karma na bādhyate

original: MSS_8914-2 subuddhirapi yad rāmo haimaṃ hariṇamanvagāt //
analyzed: subuddhiḥ api yat rāmaḥ haimam hariṇam anvagāt

original: MSS_8915-1 karmaṇā manasā vācā yatnāddharmaṃ samācaret /
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā yatnāt dharmam samācaret

original: MSS_8915-2 asvargyaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ dharmyamapyācaren na tu //
analyzed: asvargyam loka vidviṣṭam dharmyam api ācaret na tu

original: MSS_8916-1 karmaṇā manasā vācā yadabhīkṣṇaṃ niṣevate /
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā yat abhīkṣṇam niṣevate

original: MSS_8916-2 tadevāpaharatyenaṃ tasmāt kalyāṇamācaret //
analyzed: tat eva apaharati enam tasmāt kalyāṇam ācaret

original: MSS_8916A-1 karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvabhūteṣu sarvadā /
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā sarva bhūteṣu sarvadā

original: MSS_8916A-2 akleśajananaṃ proktaṃ tvahiṃsā paramarṣibhiḥ //
analyzed: akleśa jananam proktam tu ahiṃsā parama ṛṣibhiḥ

original: MSS_8917-1 karmaṇāmiṣṭaduṣṭānāṃ jāyate phalasaṃkṣayaḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇām iṣṭa duṣṭānām jāyate phala saṃkṣayaḥ

original: MSS_8917-2 cetaso'rthakaṣāyatvād yatra sā ghvastirucyate //
analyzed: yatra sā ghvastiḥ ucyate

original: MSS_8917A-1 karmaṇā mohanīyena mohitaṃ sakalaṃ jagat /
analyzed: karmaṇā mohanīyena mohitam sakalam jagat

original: MSS_8917A-2 dhanyā mohaṃ samutsārya tapasyanti mahādhiyaḥ //
analyzed: dhanyāḥ moham samutsārya tapasyanti mahā dhiyaḥ

original: MSS_8918-1 karmaṇā yena teneha mṛdunā dāruṇena vā /
analyzed: karmaṇā yena tena iha mṛdunā dāruṇena vā

original: MSS_8918-2 uddhared dīnamātmānaṃ samartho dharmamācaret //
analyzed: uddharet dīnam ātmānam samarthaḥ dharmam ācaret

original: MSS_8919-1 karmaṇā rahitaṃ jñānaṃ paṅgunā sadṛśaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: karmaṇā rahitam jñānam paṅgunā sadṛśam bhavet

original: MSS_8919-2 na tena prāpyate kiṃcit na ca kiṃcit prasādhyate //
analyzed: na tena prāpyate kiṃcid na ca kiṃcid prasādhyate

original: MSS_8920-1 evaṃ jñānena hīnaṃ yat karmāndhena samaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: evam jñānena hīnam yat karma andhena samam smṛtam

original: MSS_8920-2 mārgo vā mārgalakṣyaṃ vā naiva tasya pratīyate //
analyzed: mārgaḥ vā mārga lakṣyam vā nā eva tasya pratīyate

original: MSS_8921-1 karmaṇā manasā vācā kartavyaṃ karma kurvataḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā kartavyam karma kurvataḥ

original: MSS_8921-2 tasmādeveṣṭasaṃsiddhiś caturasrā prajāyate //
analyzed: tasmāt eva iṣṭa saṃsiddhiḥ catur asrā prajāyate

original: MSS_8922-1 karmaṇaiva hi saṃsiddhim āsthitā janakādayaḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇā eva hi saṃsiddhim āsthitāḥ janaka ādayaḥ

original: MSS_8922-2 lokasaṃgrahamevāpi saṃpaśyan kartumarhasi //
analyzed: loka saṃgraham eva api saṃpaśyan kartum arhasi

original: MSS_8923-1 karmaṇo'pi pradhānatvaṃ kiṃ kurvanti śubhā grahāḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ api pradhāna tvam kim kurvanti śubhāḥ grahāḥ

original: MSS_8923-2 vasiṣṭhadattalagne'pi jānakī duḥkhabhāginī //
analyzed: vasiṣṭhadatta lagne api jānakī duḥkha bhāginī

original: MSS_8924-1 karmaṇo yasya yaḥ kālaḥ tatkālavyāpinī tithiḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ yasya yaḥ kālaḥ tad kāla vyāpinī tithiḥ

original: MSS_8924-2 tayā karmāṇi kurvīta hrāsavṛddhiṃ na kārayet //
analyzed: tayā karmāṇi kurvīta hrāsa vṛddhim na kārayet

original: MSS_8925-1 karmaṇo hi pradhānena buddhinā kiṃ prayojanam /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ hi pradhānena buddhinā kim prayojanam

original: MSS_8925-2 pāṣāṇasya kuto buddhis tato devo bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: pāṣāṇasya kutas buddhiḥ tatas devaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_8926-1 karmaṇo hyapi boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ hi api boddhavyam boddhavyam ca vikarmaṇaḥ

original: MSS_8926-2 akarmaṇaśca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ //
analyzed: akarmaṇaḥ ca boddhavyam gahanā karmaṇaḥ gatiḥ

original: MSS_8927-1 karmaṇyakarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇi akarma yaḥ paśyet akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ

original: MSS_8927-2 sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsnakarmakṛt //
analyzed: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsna karma kṛt

original: MSS_8928-1 karmaṇyakarmavidhireṣa yadācaranti karmāṇi tattadanubandhajihāsayeti /
analyzed: karmaṇi akarma vidhiḥ eṣa yat ācaranti karmāṇi tad tad anubandha jihāsayā iti

original: MSS_8928-2 satyaṃ tathāpyabhinavo bhavitā na bandhaḥ prācīnabandhaharaṇe ka ivābhyupāyaḥ //
analyzed: satyam tathā api abhinavaḥ bhavitā na bandhaḥ prācīna bandha haraṇe kaḥ iva abhyupāyaḥ

original: MSS_8929-1 karmaṇyakovidāḥ stabdhā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇi akovidāḥ stabdhāḥ mūrkhāḥ paṇḍita māninaḥ

original: MSS_8929-2 vadanti cāṭukān mūḍhā yayā mādhvyā girotsukāḥ //
analyzed: vadanti cāṭukān mūḍhāḥ yayā mādhvyā girā utsukāḥ

original: MSS_8930-1 karmaṇyevādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadācana /
analyzed: karmaṇi eva adhikāraḥ te mā phaleṣu kadācana

original: MSS_8930-2 mā karmaphalaheturbhūr mā te saṅgo'stvakarmaṇi //
analyzed: mā karma phala hetuḥ bhūḥ mā te saṅgoḥ tva karmaṇi

original: MSS_8931-1 karma tyajema yadi nūnamadhaḥ patema yadyācarema na kadāpi bhavaṃ tarema /
analyzed: karma tyajema yadi nūnam adhas patema yadi ācarema na kadāpi bhavam tarema

original: MSS_8931-2 karma tyajediti carediti ca pravṛttā bhāvena kena nigamā iti na pratīmaḥ //
analyzed: karma tyajet iti caret iti ca pravṛttāḥ bhāvena kena nigamāḥ iti na pratīmaḥ

original: MSS_8932-1 karmadāyādaval lokaḥ karmasaṃbandhalakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: karma dāyāda vat lokaḥ karma saṃbandha lakṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_8932-2 karmāṇi codayantīha yathānyonyaṃ tathā vayam //
analyzed: karmāṇi codayanti iha yathā anyonyam tathā vayam

original: MSS_8933-1 karmabrahmavicāraṇāṃ vijahato bhogāpavargapradāṃ ghoṣaṃ kaṃcana kaṇṭhaśoṣaphalakaṃ kurvantyamī tārkikāḥ /
analyzed: karma brahma vicāraṇām vijahataḥ bhoga apavarga pradām ghoṣam kaṃcana kaṇṭha śoṣa phalakam kurvanti amī tārkikāḥ

original: MSS_8933-2 pratyakṣaṃ na punāti nāpaharate pāpāni pīlucchaṭā vyaptirnāvati naiva pātyanumitirno pakṣatā rakṣati //
analyzed: pratyakṣam na punāti na apaharate pāpāni pīlucchaṭā vyaptiḥ na avati na eva pāti anumitiḥ na u pakṣatā rakṣati

original: MSS_8934-1 karmabhiḥ svairavāptasya janmanaḥ pitarau yathā /
analyzed: karmabhiḥ svaiḥ avāptasya janmanaḥ pitarau yathā

original: MSS_8934-2 rājñaṃ tathānye rājyasya pravṛttāveva kāraṇam //
analyzed: rājñam tathā anye rājyasya pravṛttau eva kāraṇam

original: MSS_8935-1 karmabhūmimimāṃ prāpya kartavyaṃ karma yacchubham /
analyzed: karma bhūmim imām prāpya kartavyam karma yat śubham

original: MSS_8935-2 agnirvāyuśca somaśca karmaṇāṃ phalabhāginaḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ vāyuḥ ca somaḥ ca karmaṇām phala bhāginaḥ

original: MSS_8936-1 karmabhūmiriyaṃ brahman phalabhūmirasau matā /
analyzed: karma bhūmiḥ iyam brahman phala bhūmiḥ asau matā

original: MSS_8936-2 iha yat kriyate karma tat paratropabhujyate //
analyzed: iha yat kriyate karma tat paratra upabhujyate

original: MSS_8937-1 karma lokaviruddhaṃ tu kurvāṇaṃ kṣaṇadācara /
analyzed: karma loka viruddham tu kurvāṇam kṣaṇadā cara

original: MSS_8937-2 tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭamivāgatam //
analyzed: tīkṣṇam sarva janaḥ hanti sarpam duṣṭam iva āgatam

original: MSS_8938-1 karma sarvottamaṃ kiṃ me karaṇīyaṃ bhavediti /
analyzed: karma sarva uttamam kim me karaṇīyam bhavet iti

original: MSS_8938-2 mānavaḥ prabhaved vettuṃ labdhvā sthairyaṃ śamaṃ tathā //
analyzed: mānavaḥ prabhavet vettum labdhvā sthairyam śamam tathā

original: MSS_8939-1 karmāṇi janmāntarasaṃcitāni mahānti vijñānamahāhutāśe /
analyzed: karmāṇi janma antara saṃcitāni mahānti vijñāna mahā hutāśe

original: MSS_8939-2 sarvāṇi dagdhāni bhavanti sadyo mahānalasyāsti kimārdrabhāvaḥ //
analyzed: sarvāṇi dagdhāni bhavanti sadyas mahā analasya asti kim ārdra bhāvaḥ

original: MSS_8940-1 karmāṇi badhnanti śubhāśubhāni kartātramaupādhikameva jīvam /
analyzed: karmāṇi badhnanti śubha aśubhāni kartātram aupādhikam eva jīvam

original: MSS_8940-2 paraṃ na tatsākṣiṇamastadoṣam ābhīramadyāt kimaje śayāne //
analyzed: param na tad sākṣiṇam asta doṣam ābhīram adyāt kim aje śayāne

original: MSS_8941-1 karmāṇi yāni loke duḥkhanimittāni lajjanīyāni /
analyzed: karmāṇi yāni loke duḥkha nimittāni lajjanīyāni

original: MSS_8941-2 sarvāṇi tāni kurute jaṭharanarendrasya vaśamito jantuḥ //
analyzed: sarvāṇi tāni kurute jaṭhara narendrasya vaśa mitaḥ jantuḥ

original: MSS_8941A-1 karmāṇi sarvāṇi ca mohanīye duḥkhāni sarvāṇi daridratāyām /
analyzed: karmāṇi sarvāṇi ca mohanīye duḥkhāni sarvāṇi daridra tāyām

original: MSS_8941A-2 pāpāni sarvāṇi ca cauryabhāve doṣā aśeṣā anṛte bhavanti //
analyzed: pāpāni sarvāṇi ca caurya bhāve doṣāḥ aśeṣāḥ anṛte bhavanti

original: MSS_8942-1 karmāṇyārabhamāṇānāṃ duḥkhahatyai sukhāya ca /
analyzed: karmāṇi ārabhamāṇānām duḥkha hatyai sukhāya ca

original: MSS_8942-2 paśyet pākaviparyāsaṃ mithunīcāriṇāṃ nṛṇām //
analyzed: paśyet pāka viparyāsam mithunīcāriṇām nṛṇām

original: MSS_8943-1 karmāniṣṭaṃ vidhatte bhavati paravaśo lajjate no janānāṃ dharmādharmau na vetti tyajati gurukulaṃ sevate nīcalokam /
analyzed: karma aniṣṭam vidhatte bhavati para vaśaḥ lajjate no janānām dharma adharmau na vetti tyajati guru kulam sevate nīca lokam

original: MSS_8943-2 bhūtvā prājñaḥ kulīnaḥ prathitapṛthuguṇo mānanīyo budho'pi grasto yenātra dehī nuda madanaripuṃ jīva taṃ buḥkhadakṣam //
analyzed: bhūtvā prājñaḥ kulīnaḥ prathita pṛthu guṇaḥ mānanīyaḥ budhaḥ api grastaḥ yena atra dehī nuda madana ripum jīva tam buḥkha dakṣam

original: MSS_8943A-1 karmānubhāvaduḥkhita evaṃ mohāndhakāragahanavati /
analyzed: karma anubhāva duḥkhitaḥ evam moha andhakāra gahanavati

original: MSS_8943A-2 andha iva durgamārge bhramati hi saṃsārakāntāre //
analyzed: andhaḥ iva durga mārge bhramati hi saṃsāra kāntāre

original: MSS_8944-1 karmānumeyāḥ sarvatra parokṣaguṇavṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: karma anumeyāḥ sarvatra parokṣa guṇa vṛttayaḥ

original: MSS_8944-2 tasmāt parokṣavṛttīnāṃ phalaiḥ karma vibhāvayet //
analyzed: tasmāt parokṣa vṛttīnām phalaiḥ karma vibhāvayet

original: MSS_8945-1 karmānyajanmani kṛtaṃ sadasacca daivaṃ tat kevalaṃ bhavati janmani satkulādye /
analyzed: karma anya janmani kṛtam sat asat ca daivam tat kevalam bhavati janmani sat kula ādye

original: MSS_8945-2 bālyāt paraṃ vinayasauṣṭhavapātratāpi puṃdaivajā kṛṣivadityata udyameta //
analyzed: bālyāt param vinaya sauṣṭhava pātra tā api pum daiva jā kṛṣi vat iti atas udyameta

original: MSS_8946-1 karmāparādhāt sattvānāṃ vināśe samupasthite /
analyzed: karma aparādhāt sattvānām vināśe samupasthite

original: MSS_8946-2 anayo nayarūpeṇa buddhimākramya tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: anayaḥ naya rūpeṇa buddhim ākramya tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_8947-1 karmāyattaṃ phalaṃ puṃsāṃ buddhiḥ karmānusāriṇī /
analyzed: karma āyattam phalam puṃsām buddhiḥ karma anusāriṇī

original: MSS_8947-2 tathāpi sudhiyā bhāvyaṃ suvicāryaiva kurvatā //
analyzed: tathā api sudhiyā bhāvyam su vicārya eva kurvatā

original: MSS_8948-1 karmāraṇyaṃ dahati śikhivanmātṛvatpāti duḥkhāt samyagrītiṃ vadati guruvat svāmivad yad bibharti /
analyzed: karma araṇyam dahati śikhi vat mātṛ vat pāti duḥkhāt samyak rītim vadati guru vat svāmi vat yat bibharti

original: MSS_8948-2 tattvātattvaprakaṭanapaṭuḥ spaṣṭamāpnoti pūtaṃ tat saṃjñānaṃ vigalitamalaṃ jñānadānena martyaḥ //
analyzed: tattva atattva prakaṭana paṭuḥ spaṣṭam āpnoti pūtam tat saṃjñānam vigalita malam jñāna dānena martyaḥ

original: MSS_8949-1 karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran /
analyzed: karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya yaḥ āste manasā smaran

original: MSS_8949-2 indriyārthān rvimūḍhātmā mithyācāraḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: indriya arthān mithyā ācāraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: MSS_8950-1 yas tv indriyāṇi manasā niyamyārabhate'rjuna /
analyzed: yaḥ tu indriyāṇi manasā niyamya ārabhate īrjuna

original: MSS_8950-2 karmendriyaiḥ karmayogam asaktaḥ sa viśiṣyate //
analyzed: karmendriyaiḥ karma yogam asaktaḥ sa viśiṣyate

original: MSS_8950A-1 karmendhanaṃ yadajñānāt saṃcitaṃ janmakānane /
analyzed: karma indhanam yat ajñānāt saṃcitam janma kānane

original: MSS_8950A-2 upavāsaśikhī sarvaṃ tadbhasmīkurute kṣaṇāt //
analyzed: upavāsa śikhī sarvam tat bhasmīkurute kṣaṇāt

original: MSS_8950B-1 karmendhanaṃ samāśritya dṛḍhā sadbhāvanāhutiḥ /
MSS_8950B-2 dharmadhyānāgninā kāryā dīkṣitenāgnikārikā //
analyzed: dharma dhyāna agninā kāryā dīkṣitena agni kārikā

original: MSS_8951-1 karmaiva kāraṇaṃ cātra sugatiṃ durgatiṃ prati /
analyzed: karma eva kāraṇam ca atra sugatim durgatim prati

original: MSS_8951-2 karmaiva prāktanamapi kṣaṇaṃ kiṃ ko'sti cākriyaḥ //
analyzed: karma eva prāktanam api kṣaṇam kim ca akriyaḥ

original: MSS_8952-1 karmoktinarmanirmāṇaiḥ prātaḥ prātaḥ pradhāvatām /
analyzed: karma ukti narma nirmāṇaiḥ prātar prātar pradhāvatām

original: MSS_8952-2 dhanaṃ dhanaṃ pralapatāṃ nidhanaṃ vismṛtaṃ nṛṇām //
analyzed: dhanam dhanam pralapatām nidhanam vismṛtam nṛṇām

original: MSS_8952A-1 karmodayād bhavagatir bhavagatimūlā śarīranirvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: karma udayāt bhava gatiḥ bhava gati mūlā śarīra nirvṛttiḥ

original: MSS_8952A-2 dehādindriyaviṣayā viṣayanimitte ca sukhaduḥkhe //
analyzed: dehāt indriya viṣayāḥ viṣaya nimitte ca sukha duḥkhe

original: MSS_8953-1 kāryasya niḥsaṃśayamātmahetoḥ sarūpatāṃ hetubhirabhyupetya /
analyzed: kāryasya niḥsaṃśayam ātma hetoḥ sarūpa tām hetubhiḥ abhyupetya

original: MSS_8953-2 duḥkhasya kāryaṃ sukhamāmanantaḥ svenaiva vākyena hatā varākāḥ //
analyzed: duḥkhasya kāryam sukham āmanantaḥ svena eva vākyena hatāḥ varākāḥ

original: MSS_8954-1 karṣaṇānveṣaṇe yātuḥ kṣutaṃ jaladavṛṣṭaye /
analyzed: karṣaṇa anveṣaṇe yātuḥ kṣutam jalada vṛṣṭaye

original: MSS_8954-2 hemādibhūṣaṇe navye vidhṛte bhūṣaṇāptaye //
analyzed: hema ādi bhūṣaṇe navye vidhṛte bhūṣaṇa āptaye

original: MSS_8955-1 karṣati vapati lunīte dīvyati sīvyati punāti vayate ca /
analyzed: karṣati vapati lunīte dīvyati sīvyati punāti vayate ca

original: MSS_8955-2 vidadhāti kiṃ na kṛtyaṃ jaṭharānalaśāntaye tanumān //
analyzed: vidadhāti kim na kṛtyam jaṭhara anala śāntaye tanumān

original: MSS_8956-1 karṣadbhiḥ sicayāñcalānatirasāt kurvadbhirāliṅganaṃ gṛhṇānaiḥ kacamālikhadbhiradharaṃ vidrāvayadbhiḥ kucau /
analyzed: karṣadbhiḥ sicayā añcalān ati rasāt kurvadbhiḥ āliṅganam gṛhṇānaiḥ kacam ālikhadbhiḥ adharam vidrāvayadbhiḥ kucau

original: MSS_8956-2 pratyakṣe'pi kaliṅgamaṇḍalapaterantaḥpurāṇāmaho dhikkaṣṭaṃ viṭapairviṭairiva vane kiṃ nāma nāceṣṭitam //
analyzed: pratyakṣe api kaliṅga maṇḍala pateḥ antaḥpurāṇām aho dhik kaṣṭam viṭapaiḥ viṭaiḥ iva vane kim nāma na āceṣṭitam

original: MSS_8957-1 kalaṃ kamuktaṃ tanumadhyanāmikā stanadvayī ca tvadṛte na hantyataḥ /
analyzed: kalam ka muktam tanu madhya nāmikā stana dvayī ca tvat ṛte na hanti atas

original: MSS_8957-2 na yāti bhūtaṃ gaṇane bhavanmukhe kalaṅkamuktaṃ tanumadhyanāmikā //
analyzed: na yāti bhūtam gaṇane bhavat mukhe kalaṅkam uktam tanu madhya nāmikā

original: MSS_8958-1 kalakaṇṭha gaṇāsvādye kāmasyāstre nijāṅkure /
MSS_8958-2 nimbavṛttibhirudgadīrṇe na cūtaḥ paritapyate //
analyzed: nimba vṛttibhiḥ udga dīrṇe na cūtaḥ paritapyate

original: MSS_8959-1 kalakalamaparā mudhā vidhāya kṣititilakān nayanāntamāsasāda /
analyzed: kalakalam aparā mudhā vidhāya kṣiti tilakān nayana antam āsasāda

original: MSS_8959-2 avatarati mṛgīdṛśāṃ tṛtīyaṃ manasijacakṣurupāyadarśaneṣu //
analyzed: avatarati mṛgī dṛśām tṛtīyam manasija cakṣuḥ upāya darśaneṣu

original: MSS_8960-1 kalakokilanādavivādabalad- bhramarāvalilolarasāladruma- /
MSS_8960-2 kramamālatikādikadambalasat- kusumāgamamodamanojaśaraiḥ //
MSS_8961-1 paripīḍitayā vidhusāndrakalā- kamalākaracampakasaṃgadadhat- /
analyzed: paripīḍitayā vidhu sāndra kalā kamala ākara campaka saṃga dadhat

original: MSS_8961-2 pavanairanucintitayā priya sā sakhi samprati kiṃ kriyate'balayā //
analyzed: pavanaiḥ anucintitayā priya sā sakhi samprati kim kriyate ibalayā

original: MSS_8962-1 kalakvaṇitagarbheṇa kaṇṭhenāghūrṇitekṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: kala kvaṇita garbheṇa kaṇṭhena āghūrṇita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: MSS_8962-2 pārāvataḥ paribhramya riraṃsuścumbati priyām //
analyzed: pārāvataḥ paribhramya riraṃsuḥ cumbati priyām

original: MSS_8963-1 kalakvāṇe vīṇe virama raṇitāt kokila sakhe sakhedo mābhūstvaṃ druhiṇavihitaste paribhavaḥ /
analyzed: kalakvāṇe vīṇe virama raṇitāt kokila sakhe sa khedaḥ mā abhūḥ tvam druhiṇa vihitaḥ te paribhavaḥ

original: MSS_8963-2 sudhe muñca spardhāmadharamadhusaṃsargasarasāḥ sphuṭantyetā vācaḥ kimapi kamanīyā mṛgadṛśaḥ //
analyzed: sudhe muñca spardhām adhara madhu saṃsarga sarasāḥ sphuṭanti etāḥ vācaḥ kim api kamanīyāḥ mṛga dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_8964-1 kalaṅkadāśo gaganāmburāśau prasārya candrātapatantujālam /
analyzed: gagana amburāśau prasārya candra ātapa tantu jālam

original: MSS_8964-2 lagnoḍumīnāṃllaghu saṃjighṛkṣuś candraplavasthaścaramāvdhimeti //
analyzed: lagna uḍumīnām laghu saṃjighṛkṣuḥ candra plava sthaḥ carama avdhim eti

original: MSS_8965-1 kalaṅkayanti sanmārgajuṣaḥ paribhavantyalam /
analyzed: kalaṅkayanti sat mārga juṣaḥ paribhavanti alam

original: MSS_8965-2 vātyā ivāticapalāḥ striyo bhūrirajovṛtāḥ //
analyzed: vātyāḥ iva ati capalāḥ striyaḥ bhūri rajaḥ vṛtāḥ

original: MSS_8966-1 tat tāsu na prasaktavyaṃ dhīrasattvaiḥ subuddhibhiḥ /
analyzed: tat tāsu na prasaktavyam dhīra sattvaiḥ su buddhibhiḥ

original: MSS_8966-2 śīlamabhyasanīyaṃ tu vītarāgapadāptaye //
analyzed: śīlam abhyasanīyam tu vīta rāga pada āptaye

original: MSS_8967-1 kalaṅkahīnaḥ kṣayadoṣaśūnyaḥ sadā nivṛttas tamaso bhayācca /
analyzed: kalaṅka hīnaḥ kṣaya doṣa śūnyaḥ sadā nivṛttaḥ tamasaḥ bhayāt ca

original: MSS_8967-2 batābhaviṣyad dvijanāyako'pi tadāpi manye na tavānanābham //
analyzed: bata abhaviṣyat dvija nāyakaḥ upi tadā api manye na tava ānana ābham

original: MSS_8968-1 kalaṅkinaḥ priye doṣākarasya ca jaḍasya ca /
analyzed: kalaṅkinaḥ priye doṣa ākarasya ca jaḍasya ca

original: MSS_8968-2 na jātu śaktirindos te mukhena pratigarjitum //
analyzed: na jātu śaktiḥ indoḥ te mukhena pratigarjitum

original: MSS_8969-1 kalaṅkini jale kvāpi sauraṃ pratiphalan mahaḥ /
analyzed: kalaṅkini jale kvāpi sauram pratiphalat mahaḥ

original: MSS_8969-2 tamo'pahatvaṃ tanute samṛddhiṃ ca dine dine //
analyzed: tamaḥ upaha tvam tanute samṛddhim ca dine dine

original: MSS_8970-1 kalaṅkī niḥśaṅkaṃ paritapatu śītadyutirasau bhujaṅgavyāsaṅgīvamatu garalaṃ candanarasaḥ /
analyzed: kalaṅkī niḥśaṅkam paritapatu śīta dyutiḥ asau bhujaṅga vyāsaṅgī vamatu garalam candana rasaḥ

original: MSS_8970-2 svayaṃ dagdho dāhaṃ vitaratu manobhūrapi bhṛśaṃ jagatprāṇa prāṇānapaharasi kiṃ te samucitam //
analyzed: svayam dagdhaḥ dāham vitaratu manobhūḥ api bhṛśam jagatprāṇa prāṇān apaharasi kim te samucitam

original: MSS_8970A-1 kalaṅkena yathā candraḥ kṣāreṇa lavaṇāmbudhiḥ /
analyzed: kalaṅkena yathā candraḥ kṣāreṇa lavaṇa ambudhiḥ

original: MSS_8970A-2 kalahena tathā bhāti jñānavānāpi mānavaḥ //
analyzed: kalahena tathā bhāti jñānavān āpi mānavaḥ

original: MSS_8971-1 kalatraṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā ramate yaḥ parastriyaḥ /
analyzed: kalatram pṛṣṭhatas kṛtvā ramate yaḥ para striyaḥ

original: MSS_8971-2 adharmaścāpadastasya sadyaḥ phalati nityaśaḥ //
analyzed: adharmaḥ ca āpadaḥ tasya sadyas phalati nityaśas

original: MSS_8972-1 kalatracintākucitasya puṃsaḥ śrutaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca guṇāśca sarve /
analyzed: kalatra cintā kucitasya puṃsaḥ śrutam ca śīlam ca guṇāḥ ca sarve

original: MSS_8972-2 apakvakumbhe nihitā ivāpaḥ prayānti dehena samaṃ vināśam //
analyzed: a pakva kumbhe nihitāḥ iva apaḥ prayānti dehena samam vināśam

original: MSS_8973-1 kalatranindāguruṇā kilaivam abhyāhataṃ kīrtiviparyayeṇa /
analyzed: kalatra nindā guruṇā kila evam abhyāhatam kīrti viparyayeṇa

original: MSS_8973-2 ayoghanenāya ivābhitaptaṃ vaidehibandhor hṛdayaṃ vidadre //
analyzed: ayaḥ ghanena ayaḥ iva abhitaptam vaidehi bandhoḥ hṛdayam vidadre

original: MSS_8974-1 kalatraputrādinimittataḥ kdacid vinindyarūpe vihite'pi karmaṇi /
analyzed: kalatra putra ādi nimittataḥ kdacid vinindya rūpe vihite api karmaṇi

original: MSS_8974-2 idaṃ kṛtaṃ karma vininditaṃ satāṃ mayeti bhavyaścakito vinindati //
analyzed: idam kṛtam karma vininditam satām mayā iti bhavyaḥ cakitaḥ vinindati

original: MSS_8975-1 kalatrabhāreṇa vilolanīvinā galaddukūlastanaśālinorasā /
analyzed: kalatra bhāreṇa vilola nīvinā galat dukūla stana śālinā urasā

original: MSS_8975-2 valivyapāyasphuṭaromarājinā nirāyatattvādudareṇa tāmyatā //
analyzed: vali vyapāya sphuṭa romarājinā nirāya tattvāt udareṇa tāmyatā

original: MSS_8976-1 vilambamānākulakeśapāśayā kayācidāviṣkṛtabāhumūlayā /
analyzed: vilambamāna ākula keśapāśayā kayācid āviṣkṛta bāhumūlayā

original: MSS_8976-2 taruprasūnānyapadiśya sādaraṃ manodhināthasya manaḥ samādade //
analyzed: taru prasūnāni apadiśya sa ādaram manodhināthasya manaḥ samādade

original: MSS_8977-1 kalatramātmā suhṛdo dhanāni vṛthā bhavantīha nimeṣamātrāt /
analyzed: kalatram ātmā suhṛdaḥ dhanāni vṛthā bhavanti iha nimeṣa mātrāt

original: MSS_8977-2 muhurmuhuś cākulitāni tāni tasmān na vidvānativigrahī syāt //
analyzed: muhur muhur ca ākulitāni tāni tasmāt na vidvān ativigrahī syāt

original: MSS_8977A-1 kalatraharaṇalkeśāt khinnānāmātmanastanau /
analyzed: khinnānām ātmanaḥ tanau

original: MSS_8977A-2 dhartumutsukatā naṣṭeḥ sudṛśāṃ sudhiyāmiva //
analyzed: dhartum utsuka tā naṣṭeḥ sudṛśām su dhiyām iva

original: MSS_8978-1 kalabha tavāntikamāgatam alimetaṃ mā kadāpyavajñāsīḥ /
analyzed: kalabha tava antikam āgatam alim etam mā kadāpi avajñāsīḥ

original: MSS_8978-2 api dānasundarāṇāṃ dvipadhuryāṇāmayaṃ śirodhāryaḥ //
analyzed: api dāna sundarāṇām dvipa dhuryāṇām ayam śirodhāryaḥ

original: MSS_8979-1 kalamākrāntaviśvasya maṣīkṛṣṇasya bhoginaḥ /
analyzed: kalama ākrānta viśvasya maṣī kṛṣṇasya bhoginaḥ

original: MSS_8979-2 āsannabandhanasyānte divirasya dhanena kim //
analyzed: āsanna bandhanasya ante divirasya dhanena kim

original: MSS_8980-1 kalamaṃ phalabhārātigurumūrdhatayā śanaiḥ /
analyzed: kalamam phala bhāra ati guru mūrdha tayā śanais

original: MSS_8980-2 vināmāntikodbhūtaṃ samāghrātumivotpalam //
analyzed: vināma antika udbhūtam samāghrātum iva utpalam

original: MSS_8980A-1 kalamadhuraraktakaṇṭhī śayane madirālasā samadanā ca /
analyzed: kala madhura rakta kaṇṭhī śayane madirā alasā sa madanā ca

original: MSS_8980A-2 vaktrāparavaktrābhyām upatiṣṭhatu vāramukhyā tvām //
analyzed: vaktra aparavaktrābhyām upatiṣṭhatu vāramukhyā tvām

original: MSS_8981-1 kalamāḥ pākavinamrā mūlatalāghrātasurabhikalhārāḥ /
analyzed: kalamāḥ pāka vinamrāḥ mūla tala āghrāta surabhi kalhārāḥ

original: MSS_8981-2 pavanākampitaśirasaḥ prāyaḥ kurvanti parimalaślāghām //
analyzed: pavana ākampita śirasaḥ prāyas kurvanti parimala ślāghām

original: MSS_8982-1 kalamāntanirgatamaṣī- binduvyājena sāñjanāśrukaṇā /
MSS_8982-2 kāyasthaluṇṭhyamānā roditi khinneva rājaśrīḥ //
analyzed: kāyastha luṇṭhyamānā roditi khinnā iva rāja śrīḥ

original: MSS_8983-1 kalaya kamalamasmirnnityudīrya sthitānāṃ pratiphalitamukheṣu nyastahastāravindāḥ /
analyzed: kalaya kamalam asmin iti udīrya sthitānām pratiphalita mukheṣu nyasta hasta aravindāḥ

original: MSS_8983-2 sphaṭikavipinamadhye māṇikapreyasīnāṃ nibhṛtahasitapātraṃ yatra yātā yuvānaḥ //
analyzed: sphaṭika vipina madhye māṇika preyasīnām nibhṛta hasita pātram yatra yātāḥ yuvānaḥ

original: MSS_8984-1 kalayati kamalopamānamakṣṇoḥ prathayati vāci sudhārasasya sāmyam /
analyzed: kalayati kamala upamānam akṣṇoḥ prathayati vāci sudhā rasasya sāmyam

original: MSS_8984-2 sakhi kathaya kimācarāmi kānte samajani tatra sahiṣṇutaiva doṣaḥ //
analyzed: sakhi kathaya kim ācarāmi kānte samajani tatra sahiṣṇu tā eva doṣaḥ

original: MSS_8985-1 kalayati kiṃ na sadā phalatāṃ bahuphalatāṃ ca sa vṛkṣaḥ /
analyzed: kalayati kim na sadā phala tām bahu phala tām ca sa vṛkṣaḥ

original: MSS_8985-2 yasya paropakṛtau kaścin na sapakṣo'pi vipakṣaḥ //
analyzed: yasya para upakṛtau kaścid na sapakṣaḥ api vipakṣaḥ

original: MSS_8986-1 kalayati kuvalayamālā- lalitaṃ kuṭilaḥ kaṭākṣavikṣepaḥ /
analyzed: kalayati kuvalaya mālā lalitam kuṭilaḥ kaṭākṣa vikṣepaḥ

original: MSS_8986-2 adharaḥ kisalayalīlā- mānanamasyāḥ kalānidhivilāsam //
analyzed: adharaḥ kisalaya līlā mānanam asyāḥ kalānidhi vilāsam

original: MSS_8987-1 kalayati mama cetastalpamaṅgārakalpaṃ jvalayati mama gātraṃ candanaṃ candrakaśca /
analyzed: kalayati mama cetaḥ talpam aṅgāra kalpam jvalayati mama gātram candanam candrakaḥ ca

original: MSS_8987-2 tirayati mama netre mohajanmāndhakāro vikṛtabahuvikāraṃ manmatho māṃ dunoti //
analyzed: tirayati mama netre moha janma andhakāraḥ vikṛta bahu vikāram manmathaḥ mām dunoti

original: MSS_8988-1 kalayatu haṃsavilāsagatiṃ sa bakaḥ sarasi varākaḥ /
analyzed: kalayatu haṃsa vilāsa gatim sa bakaḥ sarasi varākaḥ

original: MSS_8988-2 nīrakṣīravivekavidhau tasya kutaḥ paripākaḥ //
analyzed: nīra kṣīra viveka vidhau tasya kutas paripākaḥ

original: MSS_8989-1 kalaya valayaṃ dhammille'sminniveśaya mallikāṃ racaya sicayaṃ muktāhāraṃ vibhūṣaya satvaram /
analyzed: kalaya valayam dhammille smin niveśaya mallikām racaya sicayam muktā hāram vibhūṣaya sa tvaram

original: MSS_8989-2 mṛgamadamaṣīpatrālepaṃ kuruṣva kapolayoḥ sahacari samāyātaḥ prātaḥ sa te hṛdayapriyaḥ //
analyzed: mṛgamada maṣī patra ālepam kuruṣva kapolayoḥ sahacari samāyātaḥ prātar sa te hṛdaya priyaḥ

original: MSS_8990-1 kalayasi vayasya kasmāt tvaṃ ruciraṃ bhāratīśāstram /
analyzed: kalayasi vayasya kasmāt tvam ruciram bhāratīśāstram

original: MSS_8990-2 atro'ktipratyuktau kalaya mitho bhūriśastrapātaraṇam //
analyzed: atra ukti pratyuktau kalaya mithas bhūri śastra pā taraṇam

original: MSS_8991-1 kalayā tuṣārakiraṇasya puraḥ parimandabhinnatimiraughajaṭam /
analyzed: kalayā tuṣārakiraṇasya puras parimanda bhinna timira ogha jaṭam

original: MSS_8991-2 kṣaṇamabhyapadyata janairna mṛṣā gaganaṃ gaṇādhipatimūrtiriti //
analyzed: kṣaṇam abhyapadyata janaiḥ na mṛṣā gaganam gaṇādhipati mūrtiḥ iti

original: MSS_8992-1 kalayātra prakāśyaṃ cet kiṃcidvā divyajīvane /
analyzed: kalayā atra prakāśyam ced kiṃcid vā divya jīvane

original: MSS_8992-2 tasyāmapi prakāśā syād viśālā śāntirujjvalā //
analyzed: tasyām api prakāśā syāt viśālā śāntiḥ ujjvalā

original: MSS_8992A-1 kalaye kisalayamadharaṃ śaṅke paṅkeruhaṃ karadvandvam /
analyzed: kalaye kisalayam adharam śaṅke paṅkeruham kara dvandvam

original: MSS_8992A-2 manye manasijavetraṃ gātraṃ netraikamohanaṃ tanvyāḥ //
analyzed: manye manasija vetram gātram netra eka mohanam tanvyāḥ

original: MSS_8992B-1 kalaravakaṇṭhakarambita- kalaravakalakaṇṭhakūjite surate /
analyzed: kalarava kaṇṭha karambita kalarava kalakaṇṭha kūjite surate

original: MSS_8992B-2 tava manumīlitalocana- mānanamavalokituṃ priye kalaye //
analyzed: tava manu mīlita locana mānanam avalokitum priye kalaye

original: MSS_8993-1 kalaśe nijahetudaṇḍajaḥ kimu cakrabhramakāritāguṇaḥ /
analyzed: kalaśe nija hetu daṇḍa jaḥ kimu cakra bhrama kāri tā guṇaḥ

original: MSS_8993-2 sa taduccakucau bhavan prabhā- jharacakrabhramamātanoti yat //
analyzed: sa tad ucca kucau bhavan prabhā jhara cakra bhramam ātanoti yat

original: MSS_8994-1 kalahaḥ kadāpi māstviti kalitaśarīraikyayoḥ śivayoḥ /
analyzed: kalahaḥ kadāpi mā astu iti kalita śarīra aikyayoḥ śivayoḥ

original: MSS_8994-2 ahamasmyahamasmīti prāptaḥ kalaho mama trāṇe //
analyzed: aham asmi aham asmi iti prāptaḥ kalahaḥ mama trāṇe

original: MSS_8995-1 kalahakalabhavindhyaḥ kopagṛdhraśmaśānaṃ vyasanabhujagarandhraṃ dveṣadasyupradoṣaḥ /
analyzed: kalaha kalabha vindhyaḥ kopa gṛdhra śmaśānam vyasana bhujaga randhram dveṣa dasyu pradoṣaḥ

original: MSS_8995-2 sukṛtavanadavāgnirmārdavāmbhodavāyur nayanalinatuṣāro'tyarthamarthānurāgaḥ //
analyzed: su kṛta vana dava agniḥ mārdava ambhoda vāyuḥ naya nalina tuṣāra utyartham artha anurāgaḥ

original: MSS_8996-1 kalahakalayā yat saṃvṛtyai trapāvanatānanā pihitapulakodbhedaṃ subhrūścakarṣa na kañcukam /
analyzed: kalaha kalayā yat saṃvṛtyai trapā vanata ānanā pihita pulaka udbhedam subhrūḥ cakarṣa na kañcukam

original: MSS_8996-2 dayitamabhitastāmutkaṇṭhāṃ vivavruranantaraṃ jhaṭiti taṭiti truṭyanto'ntaḥ stanāṃśukasandhayaḥ //
analyzed: dayitam abhitas tām utkaṇṭhām vivavruḥ anantaram jhaṭiti taṭiti truṭyantaḥ antar stana aṃśuka sandhayaḥ

original: MSS_8997-1 kalahapriyātidīrghā kharvā vā śyāmapītaharitā vā /
analyzed: kalaha priyā ati dīrghā kharvā vā śyāma pīta haritā vā

original: MSS_8997-2 lamboṣṭhī laghunāsā laghuśithilastanavibhāgā ca //
analyzed: lamba uṣṭhī laghu nāsā laghu śithila stana vibhāgā ca

original: MSS_8998-1 kalahamātanute madirāvaśas tamiha yena nirasyati jīvitam /
analyzed: kalaham ātanute madirā vaśaḥ tam iha yena nirasyati jīvitam

original: MSS_8998-2 vṛṣamapāsyati saṃcinute malaṃ dhanamapaiti janaiḥ paribhūyate //
analyzed: vṛṣam apāsyati saṃcinute malam dhanam apaiti janaiḥ paribhūyate

original: MSS_8999-1 kalahāntaritāpralapanam ataḥ paraṃ nāyakasya śikṣā ca /
analyzed: kalaha antarita a pralapanam atas param nāyakasya śikṣā ca

original: MSS_8999-2 saṃbhogāviṣkaraṇaṃ kulaṭā saṃkīrṇamiti ca śṛṅgāraḥ //
analyzed: saṃbhoga āviṣkaraṇam kulaṭā saṃkīrṇam iti ca śṛṅgāraḥ

original: MSS_9000-1 kalahāntāni harmyāṇi kuvākyāntaṃ ca sauhṛdam /
analyzed: kalaha antāni harmyāṇi ku vākya antam ca sauhṛdam

original: MSS_9000-2 kurājāntāni rāṣṭrāṇi kukarmāntaṃ yaśo nṛṇām //
analyzed: ku rāja antāni rāṣṭrāṇi ku karma antam yaśaḥ nṛṇām

original: MSS_9001-1 kalahāyante mūḍhāḥ kaḥ pratibhūḥ śvaḥ prabhāta iti /
analyzed: kalahāyante mūḍhāḥ kaḥ pratibhūḥ śvas prabhāte iti

original: MSS_9001-2 tasyāmeva rajanyāṃ kaḥ pratibhūḥ svasya sattāyām //
analyzed: tasyām eva rajanyām kaḥ pratibhūḥ svasya sattāyām

original: MSS_9002-1 kalāṃ tāmaindavīṃ vande yayā yādaṣpatiḥ pitā /
analyzed: kalām tām aindavīm vande yayā yādaṣpatiḥ pitā

original: MSS_9002-2 āruhya haramūrdhānaṃ kṛtas trailokyamūrdhani //
analyzed: āruhya hara mūrdhānam kṛtaḥ trailokya mūrdhani

original: MSS_9003-1 kalāḥ sarve harereva saprajāpatays tathā /
analyzed: kalāḥ sarve hareḥ eva sa prajāpatayaḥ tathā

original: MSS_9003-2 ete tvaṃśakalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam //
analyzed: ete tu aṃśa kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tu bhagavān svayam

original: MSS_9003A-1 kalākalāpasampannā upakartuḥ parañmukhāḥ /
analyzed: kalā kalāpa sampannāḥ upakartuḥ parañmukhāḥ

original: MSS_9003A-2 na bhavanti mahātmānaḥ sarasaḥ śikhino yathā //
analyzed: na bhavanti mahātmānaḥ sarasaḥ śikhinaḥ yathā

original: MSS_9004-1 kalākāṣṭhāmuhūrtānāṃ kālasya vrajatāṃ javāt /
analyzed: kalā kāṣṭhā muhūrtānām kālasya vrajatām javāt

original: MSS_9004-2 na lakṣyate vibhāgena dīpasyevārciṣāṃ gatiḥ //
analyzed: na lakṣyate vibhāgena dīpasya iva arciṣām gatiḥ

original: MSS_9005-1 kalāttamāyālavakāntamūrtiḥ kalakvaṇadveṇuninādaramyaḥ /
MSS_9005-2 śrito hṛdi vyākulayaṃstrilokīṃ śriye'stu gopījanavallabho vaḥ //
analyzed: śritaḥ hṛdi vyākulayan trilokīm śriyeḥ tu gopī jana vallabhaḥ vaḥ

original: MSS_9006-1 kalādhāro vakraḥ sphuradadhararāgo navatanur galanmānāveśāstaruṇaramaṇīrnāgara iva /
analyzed: kalā dhāraḥ vakraḥ sphurat adhara rāgaḥ nava tanuḥ galat māna āveśāḥ taruṇa ramaṇīḥ nāgaraḥ iva

original: MSS_9006-2 ghanaśroṇībimbe nayanamukule cādharadale kapole grīvāyāṃ kucakalaśayoścumbati śaśī //
analyzed: ghana śroṇī bimbe nayana mukule ca adhara dale kapole grīvāyām kuca kalaśayoḥ cumbati śaśī

original: MSS_9007-1 kalādhināthādhigamād dvitīye kimadvitīyeti tanoṣi garvam /
analyzed: kalā adhinātha adhigamāt dvitīye kim advitīyā iti tanoṣi garvam

original: MSS_9007-2 ayi tvamasmadvacasi pratīyā ayaṃ tṛtīyāmupagantukāmaḥ //
analyzed: ayi tvam asmad vacasi pratīyāḥ ayam tṛtīyām upagantu kāmaḥ

original: MSS_9008-1 kalādhināthānayanāya sāyaṃ kumudvatīpreṣita eva bhṛṅgaḥ /
analyzed: kalādhinātha ānayanāya sāyam kumudvatī preṣitaḥ eva bhṛṅgaḥ

original: MSS_9008-2 kimindunāliṅgya sarāgamaṅke kṛtaḥ kalaṅkabhramamātanoti //
analyzed: kim indunā āliṅgya sa rāgam aṅke kṛtaḥ kalaṅka bhramam ātanoti

original: MSS_9009-1 kalānāṃ grahaṇādeva saubhāgyamupajāyate /
analyzed: kalānām grahaṇāt eva saubhāgyam upajāyate

original: MSS_9009-2 deśakālau tvapekṣyāsāṃ prayogaḥ saṃbhavenna vā //
analyzed: deśa kālau tu apekṣya āsām prayogaḥ saṃbhavet na vā

original: MSS_9010-1 kalānāthaḥ kāmaṃ bhajati bahudoṣāṅkitatanuṃ kumudvatyāstasminnapi bhavati kiṃ nāma na ruciḥ /
analyzed: kalānāthaḥ kāmam bhajati bahu doṣa aṅkita tanum kumudvatyāḥ tasmin api bhavati kim nāma na ruciḥ

original: MSS_9010-2 na padminyā modaḥ kimudayatyuṣṇamahasi priye prāyo doṣān na gaṇayati cittaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ //
analyzed: na padminyāḥ modaḥ kim udayati uṣṇa mahasi priye prāyas doṣān na gaṇayati cittam mṛga dṛśaḥ

original: MSS_9010A-1 kalānidhikarasparśāt prasannollāsitārakā /
MSS_9010A-2 bimraṇāmbaramānīlaṃ kāminī yāminīyate //
analyzed: bimraṇa ambaram ānīlam kāminī yāminīyate

original: MSS_9011-1 kalānidhirayaṃ raveḥ samupalabhya rūpaṃ svayaṃ dināntasamaye'spṛśat sapadi padminīṃ rāgavān /
analyzed: kalā nidhiḥ ayam raveḥ samupalabhya rūpam svayam dina anta samaye spṛśat sapadi padminīm rāgavān

original: MSS_9011-2 dhavānyakarasaṃgamānmukuliteti pūrvākṛtiṃ samīkṣya jahasuḥ priyā dhruvamabhūdataḥ pāṇḍuraḥ //
analyzed: dhavānya kara saṃgamāt mukulitā iti pūrva ākṛtim samīkṣya jahasuḥ priyāḥ dhruvam abhūt atas pāṇḍuraḥ

original: MSS_9012-1 kalāpināṃ cārutayopayānti vṛndāni lāpoḍhaghanāgamānām /
analyzed: kalāpinām cāru tayā upayānti vṛndāni lāpa ūḍha ghana āgamānām

original: MSS_9012-2 vṛndānilāpoḍhaghanāgamānāṃ kalāpināṃ cārutayo'payānti //
analyzed: vṛnda anila apoḍha ghana āgamānām kalāpinām cāru tayā upayānti

original: MSS_9013-1 kalābhirucchritā veśyā rūpaśīlaguṇānvitā /
analyzed: kalābhiḥ ucchritā veśyā rūpa śīla guṇa anvitā

original: MSS_9013-2 labhate gaṇikāśabdaṃ sthānaṃ ca janasaṃsadi //
analyzed: labhate gaṇikā śabdam sthānam ca jana saṃsadi

original: MSS_9014-1 kalāminduḥ karaṃ dātā dhārāṃ dhārādharo yadi /
analyzed: kalām induḥ karam dātā dhārām dhārādharaḥ yadi

original: MSS_9014-2 saṃkocayiṣyate tarhi jīviṣyati kathaṃ jagat //
analyzed: saṃkocayiṣyate tarhi jīviṣyati katham jagat

original: MSS_9015-1 kalāratnaṃ gītaṃ gaganatalaratnaṃ dinamaṇiḥ sabhāratnaṃ vidvān śravaṇapuṭaratnaṃ harikathā /
analyzed: kalā ratnam gītam gagana tala ratnam dinamaṇiḥ sabhā ratnam vidvān śravaṇa puṭa ratnam hari kathā

original: MSS_9015-2 niśāratnaṃ candraḥ śayanatalaratnaṃ śaśimukhī mahīratnaṃ śrīmāñjayati raghunātho nṛpavaraḥ //
analyzed: niśā ratnam candraḥ śayana tala ratnam śaśi mukhī mahī ratnam śrīmān jayati raghunāthaḥ nṛpa varaḥ

original: MSS_9016-1 kalāvataḥ saiva kalā yayādhaḥkriyate bhavaḥ /
analyzed: kalāvataḥ sā eva kalā yayā adhas kriyate bhavaḥ

original: MSS_9016-2 bahvībhiśca kalābhiḥ kiṃ yābhiraṅkaḥ pradarśyate //
analyzed: bahvībhiḥ ca kalābhiḥ kim yābhiḥ aṅkaḥ pradarśyate

original: MSS_9017-1 kalāvati kṣatatamasi prabhāvati sphuṭodaye jananayanābhinandini /
analyzed: kalāvati kṣata tamasi prabhāvati sphuṭa udaye jana nayana abhinandini

original: MSS_9017-2 dadurdūśaṃ śaśini ruṣābhisārikāḥ kvacid bhavatyatisubhago'pi durbhagaḥ //
analyzed: daduḥ dūśam śaśini ruṣā abhisārikāḥ kvacid bhavati ati subhagaḥ upi durbhagaḥ

original: MSS_9018-1 kalāvati calāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na kuryās tvaṃ muhurmuhuḥ /
analyzed: kalāvati calām dṛṣṭim na kuryāḥ tvam muhur muhur

original: MSS_9018-2 lagno'pi na tathā bāṇo bādhate cālito yathā //
analyzed: lagnaḥ api na tathā bāṇaḥ bādhate cālitaḥ yathā

original: MSS_9019-1 kalāsīmā kāvyaṃ sakalaguṇasīmā vitaraṇaṃ bhaye sīmā mṛtyuḥ sakalasukhasīmā suvadanā /
analyzed: kalā sīmā kāvyam sakala guṇa sīmā vitaraṇam bhaye sīmā mṛtyuḥ sakala sukha sīmā su vadanā

original: MSS_9019-2 tapaḥsīmā muktiḥ sakalakṛtisīmāśritabhṛtiḥ priye sīmāhlādaḥ śravaṇasukhasīmā harikathā //
MSS_9020-1 kalā sevātha dharmārthau tṛṣṇādāridryapaddhatī /
analyzed: kalā sevā atha dharma arthau tṛṣṇā dāridrya paddhatī

original: MSS_9020-2 santoṣakṣāntikaruṇā vairāgyaṃ tadanu stutiḥ //
analyzed: santoṣa kṣānti karuṇā vairāgyam tadanu stutiḥ

original: MSS_9021-1 kalāstāstāḥ samyagvahasi yadasi tvaṃ dvijapatir dyutis tādṛgnūtnā janirapi ca ratnākarakule /
analyzed: kalāḥ tāḥ tāḥ samyak vahasi yat asi tvam dvija patiḥ dyutiḥ tādṛś nūtnā janiḥ api ca ratnākara kule

original: MSS_9021-2 bahu brūmaḥ kiṃ vā puraharaśiromaṇḍanamasi tvadīyaṃ tat sarvaṃ śaśadhara kalaṅkād viphalitam //
analyzed: bahu brūmaḥ kim vā pura hara śiraḥ maṇḍanam asi tvadīyam tat sarvam śaśadhara kalaṅkāt viphalitam

original: MSS_9022-1 kalikaluṣasaṅkaṭākula- kuṭumbasaṃvalanakhedavikalasya
analyzed: kali kaluṣa saṅkaṭa ākula kuṭumba saṃvalana kheda vikalasya

original: MSS_9022-2 pratinidhiriva pravāsaḥ saṃsāravirāgasukhasamudrasya //
analyzed: pratinidhiḥ iva pravāsaḥ saṃsāra virāga sukha samudrasya

original: MSS_9023-1 kalikaluṣe manasi sve kathamiva jagadārjavaṃ labhate /
analyzed: kali kaluṣe manasi sve katham iva jagat ārjavam labhate

original: MSS_9023-2 cakṣurdoṣe jāgrati candradvitvaṃ kuto yātu //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ doṣe jāgrati candra dvi tvam kutas yātu

original: MSS_9024-1 kalikālamiyaṃ yāvad agastyasya munarepi /
analyzed: kali kālam iyam yāvat agastyasya

original: MSS_9024-2 mānasaṃ khaṇḍayatyatra śaśikhaṇḍānukāriṇī //
analyzed: mānasam khaṇḍayati atra śaśi khaṇḍa anukāriṇī

original: MSS_9025-1 kalitagarimā śroṇirmadhyaṃ vivṛddhavalitrayaṃ hṛdayamudayallajjaṃ majjaccirantanacāpalam /
analyzed: kalita garimā śroṇiḥ madhyam vivṛddha vali trayam hṛdayam udayat lajjam majjat cirantana cāpalam

original: MSS_9025-2 mukulitakucaṃ vakṣaścakṣurmanāgdhṛtavakrima kramaparigaladbālyaṃ tasyā vapus tanute śriyam //
analyzed: mukulita kucam vakṣaḥ cakṣuḥ manāk dhṛta vakrima krama parigalat bālyam tasyāḥ vapuḥ tanute śriyam

original: MSS_9026-1 kalitamambaramākalayan karair mṛditapaṅkajakośapayodharaḥ /
analyzed: kalitam ambaram ākalayan karaiḥ mṛdita paṅkaja kośa payodharaḥ

original: MSS_9026-2 vikasadutpalanetravilokitaḥ sakhi niśāṃ sarasīkurute vidhuḥ //
analyzed: vikasat utpala netra vilokitaḥ sakhi niśām sarasīkurute vidhuḥ

original: MSS_9027-1 kalito ruciraṃ na karma cet kriyate'naṅgakṛteḥ kutaḥ phalam /
analyzed: kalitaḥ ruciram na karma ced kriyate na aṅga kṛteḥ kutas phalam

original: MSS_9027-2 smarato hṛdi puṇḍarīkadṛg bhajate'sau saphalas tataḥ śramaḥ //
analyzed: smarataḥ hṛdi puṇḍarīkadṛś bhajate au sa phalaḥ tatas śramaḥ

original: MSS_9028-1 kalindagirinandinītaṭavanāntaraṃ bhāsayan sadā pathi gatāgataśramabharaṃ haran prāṇinām /
analyzed: kalinda giri nandinī taṭa vana antaram bhāsayan sadā pathi gata āgata śrama bharam haran prāṇinām

original: MSS_9028-2 latāvaliśatāvṛto madhurayā rucā saṃbhṛto mamāśu haratu śramānatitamāṃ tamāladrumaḥ //
analyzed: latā vali śata āvṛtaḥ madhurayā rucā saṃbhṛtaḥ mama āśu haratu śramān atitamām tamāla drumaḥ

original: MSS_9028A-1 kalindajānīrabhare'rdhamagnā bakāḥ prakāmaṃ kṛtabhūriśabdāḥ /
analyzed: kalinda jānīra bhareḥ dhamagnāḥ bakāḥ prakāmam kṛta bhūri śabdāḥ

original: MSS_9028A-2 dhvāntena vairād vinigīryaṃmāṇāḥ krośanti manye śaśinaḥ kiśorāḥ //
analyzed: dhvāntena vairāt vinigīryaṃmāṇāḥ krośanti manye śaśinaḥ kiśorāḥ

original: MSS_9029-1 kalibhūpe samāyāte dharmo'dharmāyate bhuvi /
analyzed: kali bhūpe samāyāte dharmaḥ dharmāyate bhuvi

original: MSS_9029-2 adharmaḥ sarvaṃtaḥ puṃsāṃ hanta dharmavadarthyate //
analyzed: adharmaḥ sarvaṃtar puṃsām hanta dharma vat arthyate

original: MSS_9030-1 kalimāyāntamutprekṣya vilīyante surā api /
analyzed: kalim āyāntam utprekṣya vilīyante surāḥ api

original: MSS_9030-2 tadāśritasya dharmādeḥ kā kathā jīvane punaḥ //
analyzed: tad āśritasya dharma ādeḥ kā kathā jīvane punar

original: MSS_9031-1 kalilaṃ caikarātreṇa pañcarātreṇa budbudam /
analyzed: kalilam ca eka rātreṇa pañca rātreṇa budbudam

original: MSS_9031-2 pakṣaikenāṇḍakaḥ so'tha māsapūrṇe śiro kuru //
analyzed: pakṣa ekena aṇḍakaḥ māsa pūrṇe śiraḥ kuru

original: MSS_9032-1 kalisāmrājyamāsādya na bhetavyaṃ bhavāntarāt /
analyzed: kali sāmrājyam āsādya na bhetavyam bhava antarāt

original: MSS_9032-2 dharmānuṣṭhānamūḍhāvāṃ bhītirekāvaśiṣyate //
analyzed: dharma anuṣṭhāna mūḍha āvām bhītiḥ ekā avaśiṣyate

original: MSS_9033-1 kaluṣaṃ kaṭukaṃ lavaṇaṃ virasaṃ salilaṃ yadi vāśubhagandhi bhavet /
analyzed: kaluṣam kaṭukam lavaṇam virasam salilam yadi vā aśubha gandhi bhavet

original: MSS_9033-2 tadanena bhavatyamalaṃ surasaṃ sasugandhi guṇairaparaiśca yutam //
analyzed: tat anena bhavati amalam su rasam sa sugandhi guṇaiḥ aparaiḥ ca yutam

original: MSS_9034-1 kaluṣaṃ ca tavāhiteṣvakasmāt sitapaṅkeruhasodaraśri cakṣuḥ /
analyzed: kaluṣam ca tava ahiteṣu akasmāt sita paṅkeruha sodara śri cakṣuḥ

original: MSS_9034-2 patitaṃ ca mahīpatīndra teṣāṃ vapuṣi prasphuṭamāpadāṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ //
analyzed: patitam ca mahīpati indra teṣām vapuṣi prasphuṭam āpadām kaṭākṣaiḥ

original: MSS_9035-1 kaluṣaṃ madhuraṃ cāmbhaḥ sarvaṃ sarvatra sāṃpratam /
analyzed: kaluṣam madhuram ca ambhaḥ sarvam sarvatra sāṃpratam

original: MSS_9035-2 anārjavajanasyeva kṛtakavyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ //
analyzed: anārjava janasya iva kṛtaka vyāhṛtam vacaḥ

original: MSS_9036-1 kalerante bhaviṣyanti nararūpeṇa rākṣasāḥ /
analyzed: kaleḥ ante bhaviṣyanti nara rūpeṇa rākṣasāḥ

original: MSS_9036-2 manuṣyān bhakṣayiṣyanti vittato na śarīrataḥ //
analyzed: manuṣyān bhakṣayiṣyanti vittataḥ na śarīrataḥ

original: MSS_9037-1 kalerdoṣanidhe rājann asti hyeko mahān guṇaḥ /
analyzed: kaleḥ doṣa nidheḥ rājan asti hi ekaḥ mahān guṇaḥ

original: MSS_9037-2 kīrtinādeva kṛṣṇasya muktabandhaḥ paraṃ vrajet //
MSS_9037A-1 kalau karāle na sukhaṃ labheta pakṣadvayādeva virodhakāle /
analyzed: kalau karāle na sukham labheta pakṣa dvayāt eva virodha kāle

original: MSS_9037A-2 madhyasthatā pratyuta nindyate'pi samantato hā sa kale prabhāvaḥ //
analyzed: madhyastha tā pratyuta nindyate pi samantataḥ hā sa kale prabhāvaḥ

original: MSS_9038-1 kalau kale khale mitre putre durvyasanānvite /
analyzed: kalau kale khale mitre putre durvyasana anvite

original: MSS_9038-2 taskareṣu pravṛddheṣu lubdhe rājñi dhanena kim //
analyzed: taskareṣu pravṛddheṣu lubdhe rājñi dhanena kim

original: MSS_9039-1 kalau gaṅgā kāśyāṃ tripuraharapuryāṃ bhagavatī praśastā devānāmapi bhavati sevyānudivasam /
analyzed: kalau gaṅgā kāśyām tripura hara puryām bhagavatī praśastā devānām api bhavati sevyā anudivasam

original: MSS_9039-2 iti vyāso brūte munijanadhurīṇo harikathā- sudhāpānasvastho galitabhavabandho'tulamatiḥ //
analyzed: iti vyāsaḥ brūte muni jana dhurīṇaḥ hari kathā sudhā pāna svasthaḥ galita bhava bandha utula matiḥ

original: MSS_9040-1 kalau jagapatpatiṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvasraṣṭāramīśvaram /
analyzed: kalau jagapat patim viṣṇum sarva sraṣṭāram īśvaram

original: MSS_9040-2 nārcayiṣyanti maitreya pākhaṇḍopahatā janāḥ //
analyzed: na arcayiṣyanti maitreya pākhaṇḍa upahatāḥ janāḥ

original: MSS_9041-1 kalau daśasahasreṣu haristyajati medinīm /
analyzed: kalau daśa sahasreṣu hariḥ tyajati medinīm

original: MSS_9041-2 tadardhaṃ jāhlavītoyaṃ tadardhaṃ grāmadevatāḥ //
analyzed: tad ardham jāhlavī toyam tad ardham grāma devatāḥ

original: MSS_9041A-1 kalau yuge kalmaṣamānasānām anyatra dharme khalu nādhikāraḥ /
analyzed: kalau yuge kalmaṣa mānasānām anyatra dharme khalu na adhikāraḥ

original: MSS_9041A-2 rāmeti varṇadvayamādareṇa sadā japanmuktimupeti jantuḥ //
analyzed: rāma iti varṇa dvayam ādareṇa sadā japan muktim upeti jantuḥ

original: MSS_9042-1 kalkī kalkaṃ haratu jagataḥ sphūrjadūjaisvitejā vedocchedasphuritaduritadhvaṃsane dhūmaketuḥ /
analyzed: kalkī kalkam haratu jagataḥ veda uccheda sphurita durita dhvaṃsane dhūmaketuḥ

original: MSS_9042-2 yenotkṣipya kṣaṇamasilatāṃ dhūmavat kalmaṣecchān mlecchān hatvā dalitakalinākāri satyāvatāraḥ //
analyzed: yena utkṣipya kṣaṇam asi latām dhūma vat kalmaṣa icchān mlecchān hatvā dalita kalinā akāri satyāvatāraḥ

original: MSS_9043-1 kalpakṣoṇiruho'yamityanudinaṃ bhūmīsurairbhāvyase kāmo'sāviti kāminībhirabhitaścitte ciraṃ cintyase /
analyzed: kalpa kṣoṇiḥ uhā uyam iti anudinam bhūmīsuraiḥ bhāvyase kāmā usau iti kāminībhiḥ abhitas citte ciram cintyase

original: MSS_9043-2 śrīnārāyaṇa eva kevalamiti premṇā śriyā dhyāyase tvaṃ kālo'yamiti pratikṣitidharaireko'pyanekātmabhṛt //
analyzed: śrī nārāyaṇaḥ eva kevalam iti premṇā śriyā dhyāyase tvam kālaḥ yam iti prati kṣitidharaiḥ ekaḥ api aneka ātma bhṛt

original: MSS_9044-1 kalpatarukāmadogdhrī- cintāmaṇidhanadaśaṅkhānām /
MSS_9044-2 racito rajobharapayas tejaḥścāsāntarāmbaraireṣaḥ //
analyzed: racitaḥ rajaḥ bhara payaḥ tejaḥ ca asa antara ambaraiḥ eṣaḥ

original: MSS_9045-1 kalpadrumaḥ kalpitameva sūte sā kāmadhuk kāmitameva dogdhi /
analyzed: kalpadrumaḥ kalpitam eva sūte sā kāmadhuk kāmitam eva dogdhi

original: MSS_9045-2 cintāmaṇiścintitameva datte satāṃ hi saṅgaḥ sakalaṃ prasūte //
analyzed: cintāmaṇiḥ cintitam eva datte satām hi saṅgaḥ sakalam prasūte

original: MSS_9046-1 kalpadrumān vigatavāñchajane sumerau ratnānyagādhasalile saritāmadhīśe /
analyzed: kalpadrumān vigata vāñcha jane sumerau ratnāni agādha salile saritām adhīśe

original: MSS_9046-2 dhātrā śriyaṃ nidadhatā prakhaleṣu nityam atyujjvalaḥ khalu ghaṭe nihitaḥ pradīpaḥ //
analyzed: dhātrā śriyam nidadhatā prakhaleṣu nityam ati ujjvalaḥ khalu ghaṭe nihitaḥ pradīpaḥ

original: MSS_9047-1 kalpadrumāśca santaśca nārhanti samaśīrṣikām /
analyzed: kalpadrumāḥ ca santaḥ ca na arhanti sama śīrṣikām

original: MSS_9047-2 arthināṃ prārthitāḥ pūrve phalantyanye svayaṃ yataḥ //
analyzed: arthinām prārthitāḥ pūrve phalanti anye svayam yatas

original: MSS_9048-1 kalpadrumaiḥ kiṃ kanakācalasthaiḥ paropakārapratilambhaduḥsthaiḥ /
analyzed: kalpadrumaiḥ kim kanakācala sthaiḥ para upakāra pratilambha duḥsthaiḥ

original: MSS_9048-2 varaṃ karīro marumārgavartī yaḥ pānthasārthaṃ kurute kṛtārtham //
analyzed: varam karīraḥ maru mārga vartī yaḥ pāntha sārtham kurute kṛtārtham

original: MSS_9049-1 kalpadrumo na jānāti na dadāti bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: kalpadrumaḥ na jānāti na dadāti bṛhaspatiḥ

original: MSS_9049-2 ayaṃ tu jagatījānir jānāti ca dadāti ca //
analyzed: ayam tu jagatī jāniḥ jānāti ca dadāti ca

original: MSS_9050-1 kalpadrumo'pi kāle na bhaved yadi phalapradaḥ /
analyzed: kalpadrumaḥ upi kāle na bhavet yadi phala pradaḥ

original: MSS_9050-2 ko viśeṣas tadā tasya vanyairanyamahīruhaiḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ viśeṣaḥ tadā tasya vanyaiḥ anya mahīruhaiḥ

original: MSS_9050A-1 kalpadrorapi kalpadrur mahato'pi maṇermaṇiḥ /
analyzed: kalpadroḥ api kalpadruḥ mahataḥ api maṇeḥ maṇiḥ

original: MSS_9050A-2 devānāmapi pūjyo'si kiyat te mama pūraṇam //
analyzed: devānām api pūjyaḥ asi kiyat te mama pūraṇam

original: MSS_9051-1 kalpayati yena vṛttiṃ sadasi ca sadbhiḥ praśasyate yena /
analyzed: kalpayati yena vṛttim sadasi ca sadbhiḥ praśasyate yena

original: MSS_9051-2 sa guṇas tena guṇavatā vivardhanīyaśca rakṣyaśca //
analyzed: sa guṇaḥ tena guṇavatā vivardhanīyaḥ ca rakṣyaḥ ca

original: MSS_9051A-1 kalpayedekaśaḥ pakṣa romaśmaśrukacānnakhān /
analyzed: kalpayet ekaśas roma śmaśru kacān nakhān

original: MSS_9051A-2 na cātmadaśanāgreṇa svapāṇibhyāṃ ca nottamaḥ //
analyzed: na ca ātma daśana agreṇa sva pāṇibhyām ca na uttamaḥ

original: MSS_9052-1 kalpavṛkṣaśikhareṣu saṃprati prasphuradbhiravikalpasundari /
analyzed: kalpavṛkṣa śikhareṣu saṃprati prasphuradbhiḥ avikalpa sundari

original: MSS_9052-2 hārayaṣṭigaṇanāmivāṃśubhiḥ kartumudyatakutūhalaḥ śaśī //
analyzed: hāra yaṣṭi gaṇanām iva aṃśubhiḥ kartum udyata kutūhalaḥ śaśī

original: MSS_9053-1 kalpasthāyi na jīvitam aiśvaryaṃ nāpyate ca yadabhimatam /
analyzed: kalpa sthāyi na jīvitam aiśvaryam na āpyate ca yat abhimatam

original: MSS_9053-2 lokas tathāpyakāryaṃ kurute kāryaṃ kimuddiśya //
analyzed: lokaḥ tathā api akāryam kurute kāryam kim uddiśya

original: MSS_9054-1 kalpāntakrūrakeliḥ kratukadanakaraḥ kundakarpūrakāntiḥ krīḍan kailāsakūṭe kalitakumudinīkāmukaḥ kāntakāyaḥ /
MSS_9054-2 kaṅkālakrīḍanotkaḥ kalitakalakalaḥ kālakālīkalatraḥ kālindīkālakaṇṭhaḥ kalayatu kuśalaṃ ko'pi kāpāliko naḥ //
analyzed: kaṅkāla krīḍana utkaḥ kalita kalakalaḥ kāla kālī kalatraḥ kālindī kāla kaṇṭhaḥ kalayatu kuśalam kopi kāpālikaḥ naḥ

original: MSS_9055-1 kalpāntapavanā vāntu yāntu caikatvamarṇavāḥ /
analyzed: kalpānta pavanāḥ vāntu yāntu ca eka tvam arṇavāḥ

original: MSS_9055-2 tapantu dvādaśādityā nāsti nirmanasaḥ kṣatiḥ //
analyzed: tapantu dvādaśa ādityāḥ na asti nirmanasaḥ kṣatiḥ

original: MSS_9056-1 kalpāntavāsasaṃkṣobhalaṅghitāśeśabhūbh ṛtaḥ
MSS_9056-2 sthairyaprasādamaryādās tā eva hi mahodadheḥ //
analyzed: sthairya prasāda maryādāḥ tāḥ eva hi mahā udadheḥ

original: MSS_9057-1 kalpānte krodhanasya tripuravijayinaḥ krīḍayā saṃcariṣṇoḥ kṛtvāpi prāṇijātairnijamukhakuharātithyamaprāptatṛpteḥ /
analyzed: kalpa ante krodhanasya tripura vijayinaḥ krīḍayā saṃcariṣṇoḥ kṛtvā api prāṇi jātaiḥ nija mukha kuhara ātithyam aprāpta tṛpteḥ

original: MSS_9057-2 digbhittīḥ prekṣya śūnyāḥ pralayajalanidhiprekṣitātmīyamūrti- grāsavyāsaktamoghaśramajanitaruṣaḥ pāntu vo garjitāni //
analyzed: diś bhittīḥ prekṣya śūnyāḥ pralaya jalanidhi prekṣita ātmīya mūrti grāsa vyāsakta mogha śrama janita ruṣaḥ pāntu vaḥ garjitāni

original: MSS_9058-1 kalpānte śamitatrivikramamahākaṅkālabaddhasphurac- cheṣasyūtanṛsiṃhapāṇinakharaprotādikolāmiṣaḥ /
MSS_9058-2 viśvaikārṇavatāviśeṣamuditau tau matsyakūrmāvubhau karṣan dhīvaratāṃ gato'syatu satāṃ mohaṃ mahābhairavaḥ //
analyzed: viśva eka arṇava tā viśeṣa muditau tau matsya kūrmau ubhau karṣan dhīvara tām gataḥ usyatu satām moham mahābhairavaḥ

original: MSS_9058A-1 kalpyate kimiti karmaṇacintā- svedameduramidaṃ nijacetaḥ /
analyzed: kalpyate kim iti sveda meduram idam nija cetaḥ

original: MSS_9058A-2 paśyatāṃ nayati pūrvabhavāttaṃ puṇyameva bhuvanāni kimanyat //
analyzed: paśyatām nayati pūrva bhavāt tam puṇyam eva bhuvanāni kim anyat

original: MSS_9059-1 kalyāṇaṃ kathayāmi kiṃ sahacari svaireṣu śaśvat purā yasyā nāma samīritaṃ muraripoḥ prāṇeśvarīti tvayā /
analyzed: kalyāṇam kathayāmi kim sahacari svaireṣu śaśvat purā yasyāḥ nāma samīritam muraripoḥ prāṇeśvarī iti tvayā

original: MSS_9059-2 sāhaṃ premabhidābhayāt priyatamaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi dūtaṃ prabhoḥ sandiṣṭāsmi na veti saṃśayavatī pṛcchāmi no kiṃcana //
analyzed: sā aham prema bhidā bhayāt priyatamam dṛṣṭvā api dūtam prabhoḥ sandiṣṭā asmi na vā iti saṃśayavatī pṛcchāmi no kiṃcana

original: MSS_9060-1 kalyāṇaṃ naḥ kimadhikamito jīvanārthaṃ yadasmāl lūtvā vṛkṣānahaha dahasi mrātaraṅgārakāra /
analyzed: kalyāṇam naḥ kim adhikam itas jīvana artham yat asmāt lūtvā vṛkṣān ahaha dahasi mrātar aṅgārakāra

original: MSS_9060-2 kiṃ tvetasminnaśanipiśunairātapairākulānām adhvanyānāmaśaraṇamaruprāntare ko'bhyupāyaḥ //
analyzed: kim tu etasmin aśani piśunaiḥ ātapaiḥ ākulānām adhvanyānām aśaraṇa maru prāntare

original: MSS_9061-1 kalyāṇaṃ parikalpyatāṃ pikakule rohantu vāñchāptayo haṃsānāmudayo'stu pūrṇaśaśinaḥ stādbhadramindīvare /
analyzed: kalyāṇam parikalpyatām pika kule rohantu vāñchā āptayaḥ haṃsānām udayoḥ tu pūrṇa śaśinaḥ stād bhadram indīvare

original: MSS_9061-2 ityudbāṣyavadhūgiraḥ pratipadaṃ saṃpūrayantyāntike kāntaḥ prasthitikalpitopakaraṇaḥ sakhyā bhṛśaṃ vāritaḥ //
analyzed: iti udbāṣya vadhū giraḥ pratipadam saṃpūrayantyā antike kāntaḥ prasthiti kalpita upakaraṇaḥ sakhyā bhṛśam vāritaḥ

original: MSS_9062-1 kalyāṇaṃ bhagavatkathākathanataḥ kāvyaṃ vidhātuḥ kaves tasyaivāṅkatayā kvacid racayataḥ śṛṅgāravīrādikam /
analyzed: kalyāṇam bhagavat kathā kathanataḥ kāvyam vidhātuḥ kaveḥ tasya eva aṅka tayā kvacid racayataḥ śṛṅgāra vīra ādikam

original: MSS_9062-2 ko doṣo bhavitā yadatra kavitāśīlaiḥ samāśrīyate panthā vyāsavasuṃdharāśrutibhavagranthādiṣu prekṣitaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ doṣaḥ bhavitā yat atra kavi tā śīlaiḥ samāśrīyate panthāḥ vyāsa vasuṃdharā śruti bhava grantha ādiṣu prekṣitaḥ

original: MSS_9063-1 kalyāṇaṃ bhavatāṃ yaśaḥ prasaratāṃ dharmaḥ sadā vardhatāṃ saṃpattiḥ prathatāṃ prajā praṇamatāṃ śatrukṣayo jāyatām /
analyzed: kalyāṇam bhavatām yaśaḥ prasaratām dharmaḥ sadā vardhatām saṃpattiḥ prathatām prajā praṇamatām śatru kṣayaḥ jāyatām

original: MSS_9063-2 vākyaṃ saṃvadatāṃ vapuḥ prabhavatāṃ lakṣmīpatiḥ prīyatām āyus te śaradāṃ śataṃ vijayatāṃ dānāya dīrghāyuṣe //
analyzed: vākyam saṃvadatām vapuḥ prabhavatām lakṣmīpatiḥ prīyatām āyuḥ te śaradām śatam vijayatām dānāya dīrgha āyuṣe

original: MSS_9064-1 kalyāṇaṃ bhavate'stu kokilakulākalpāya yena śruti- krūrakroṣṭurutārditaṃ kalaravairviśvaṃ samāśvāsitam /
analyzed: kalyāṇam bhavateḥ tu kokila kula ākalpāya yena śruti krūra kroṣṭu ruta arditam kalaravaiḥ viśvam samāśvāsitam

original: MSS_9064-2 atyantābhyasanābhyuditvarabṛhannādāvabodhollasa- cchabdabrahmarasānubhūtijanitānandaughaniṣyandibhiḥ //
MSS_9065-1 kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsurmiladaṭaniyugasthāsnugīrvāṇabhogi- straiṇavyatyastakalpadrumanavasumanonāgahārāvalīni /
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ kriyāsuḥ milat aṭani yuga sthāsnu gīrvāṇa bhogi straiṇa vyatyasta kalpadruma nava sumanaḥ nāga hāra āvalīni

original: MSS_9065-2 nālīkāśliṣṭalakṣmīkaratalakamalodvāntamādhvīkadhārā- timyatphālekṣaṇāni tripuraharadhanurjyālatākarṣaṇāni//
analyzed: nālīka āśliṣṭa lakṣmī kara tala kamala udvānta mādhvīka dhārā timyat phāla īkṣaṇāni tripura hara dhanuḥ jyā latā ākarṣaṇāni

original: MSS_9066-1 kalyāṇaṃ vo vidhattāṃ karaṭamadadhunīlolakallolamālā- kheladrolambakolāhalamukharitadikcakravālāntarālam /
analyzed: kalyāṇam vaḥ vidhattām karaṭa mada dhunī lola kallola mālā khelat rolamba kolāhala mukharita diś cakravāla antarālam

original: MSS_9066-2 pratnaṃ vetaṇḍaratnaṃ satataparicalatkarṇatālapraroha- dvātaṅkūrājihīrṣādaravivṛtaphaṇāśṛṅgabhūṣābhujaṃgam //
analyzed: pratnam vetaṇḍa ratnam satata paricalat karṇa tāla praroha dvār aṅkūra ājihīrṣā ādara vivṛta phaṇā śṛṅga bhūṣā bhujaṃgam

original: MSS_9067-1 kalyāṇado bhaved vīre dhruvakaścandraśekharaḥ /
analyzed: kalyāṇa daḥ bhavet vīre dhruvakaḥ candraśekharaḥ

original: MSS_9067-2 dvidigvarṇapadaṃ yatra tripuṭe ca vidhīyate //
analyzed: dvi diś varṇa padam yatra tri puṭe ca vidhīyate

original: MSS_9067-3 drutadvandvaṃ laghudvandvaṃ tāle tripuṭasaṃjñake //
analyzed: druta dvandvam laghu dvandvam tāle tripuṭa saṃjñake

original: MSS_9067A-1 kalyāṇapādapārāmaṃ śrutagaṅgāhimācalam /
analyzed: kalyāṇa pādapa ārāmam śruta gaṅgā himācalam

original: MSS_9067A-2 jñānāmbhojaraviṃ devaṃ vande śrījñānanandanam //
MSS_9068-1 kalyāṇabhāk sadā kārye sarvasaubhāgyavardhinī /
analyzed: sadā

original: MSS_9068-2 yā khalvetādṛśī bhāryā sā devī na tu mānuṣī //
analyzed: yā khalu etādṛśī bhāryā sā devī na tu mānuṣī

original: MSS_9068A-1 kalyāṇamāvahatu naḥ kuhanāvarāho yasyāsthisīmni nikhilaṃ pratiromakūpam /
analyzed: kalyāṇam āvahatu naḥ kuhanā varāhaḥ yasya asthi sīmni nikhilam pratiromakūpam

original: MSS_9068A-2 ābhāti sapraṇayamudvahato dharitrīṃ svedābhidhāna iva sāttvikahāvabhedaḥ //
analyzed: ābhāti sa praṇayam udvahataḥ dharitrīm sveda abhidhānaḥ iva sāttvika hāva bhedaḥ

original: MSS_9069-1 kalyāṇāmāvahatu vaḥ śivayoḥ śarīram ekaṃ yadīyamasitacchavikaṇṭhamūlam /
analyzed: kalyāṇām āvahatu vaḥ śivayoḥ śarīram ekam yadī iyam asita chavi kaṇṭha mūlam

original: MSS_9069-2 vāmetare'pi kurute sitabhāsi bhāge prārabdhaśailatanayāpariṇāmaśaṅkām //
analyzed: kurute sita bhāsi bhāge prārabdha śaila tanayā pariṇāma śaṅkām

original: MSS_9070-1 kalyāṇavāktvamiva kiṃ padamatra kāntaṃ sadbhūpates tvamiva kaḥ paritoṣakārī /
analyzed: kalyāṇa vāc tvam iva kim padam atra kāntam sat bhūpateḥ tvam iva kaḥ paritoṣa kārī

original: MSS_9070-2 kaḥ sarvadā vṛṣagatis tvamivātimātraṃ bhūtyāśritaḥ kathaya pālitasarvabhūtaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ sarvadā vṛṣa gatiḥ tvam iva atimātram bhūti āśritaḥ kathaya pālita sarva bhūtaḥ

original: MSS_9071-1 kalyāṇastu yathāśakti karoti saphalaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: kalyāṇaḥ tu yathāśakti karoti saphalam vacaḥ

original: MSS_9071-2 śaṭhaḥ pakṣau calayati dvāvapyarthopalipsayā //
analyzed: śaṭhaḥ pakṣau calayati dvau api artha upalipsayā

original: MSS_9072-1 kalyāṇahitavān bhūpo gurūṇāṃ doṣaguptakaḥ /
analyzed: kalyāṇa hitavān bhūpaḥ gurūṇām doṣa guptakaḥ

original: MSS_9072-2 samamatiḥ sukhe duḥkhe samare cāpalāyitaḥ //
analyzed: sama matiḥ sukhe duḥkhe samare ca apalāyitaḥ

original: MSS_9073-1 kulaśīleṣu sampanno nītidharmeṣu paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: kula śīleṣu sampannaḥ nīti dharmeṣu paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_9073-2 tathaiva pūjyate rājā caturasraḥ prakīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: tathā eva pūjyate rājā caturasraḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: MSS_9074-1 kalyāṇāṅgarucānuraktamanasā tvaṃ yena saṃprārthyate yasyārthe sumukhi tvayā punarasutyāge'pi saṃnahyate /
analyzed: kalyāṇa aṅga rucā anurakta manasā tvam yena saṃprārthyate yasya arthe su mukhi tvayā punar asu tyāge api saṃnahyate

original: MSS_9074-2 so'yaṃ sundari pañcabāṇaviśikhavyālīḍhadorantara- svairotpīḍitapīvarastanataṭas tvaddorlatāpañjare //
analyzed: sā uyam sundari pañcabāṇa viśikha vyālīḍha dos antara svaira utpīḍita pīvara stana taṭaḥ tvad dos latā pañjare

original: MSS_9075-1 kalyāṇānāṃ tvamasi mahasāṃ bhājanaṃ viśvasūrte dhuryāṃ lakṣmīmatha mayi bhṛśaṃ dhehi deva prasīda /
analyzed: kalyāṇānām tvam asi mahasām bhājanam viśvasūrte dhuryām lakṣmīm atha mayi bhṛśam dhehi deva prasīda

original: MSS_9075-2 yad yat pāpaṃ pratijahi jagannātha namnasya tan me bhadraṃ bhadraṃ vitara bhagavan bhūyase maṅgalāya //
analyzed: yat yat pāpam pratijahi jagannātha namnasya tat me bhadram bhadram vitara bhagavan bhūyase maṅgalāya

original: MSS_9076-1 kalyāṇānāṃ nidhānaṃ kalimalamathanaṃ pāvanaṃ pāvanānāṃ pātheyaṃ yan mumukṣoḥ sapadi parapadaprāptaye prasthitasya /
analyzed: kalyāṇānām nidhānam kali mala mathanam pāvanam pāvanānām pātheyam yat mumukṣoḥ sapadi para pada prāptaye prasthitasya

original: MSS_9076-2 viśrāmasthānamekaṃ kavivaravacasāṃ jīvanaṃ sajjanānāṃ bījaṃ dharmadrumasya prabhavatu bhavatāṃ bhūtaye rāmanāma //
analyzed: viśrāma sthānam ekam kavi vara vacasām jīvanam sat janānām bījam dharma drumasya prabhavatu bhavatām bhūtaye rāma nāma

original: MSS_9077-1 kalyāṇāni dadātu vo gaṇapatiryasmin nu tuṣṭe sati kṣodīyasyapi karmaṇi prabhavituṃ brahmāpi jihmāyate /
analyzed: kalyāṇāni dadātu vaḥ gaṇapatiḥ yasmin nu tuṣṭe sati kṣodīyasi api karmaṇi prabhavitum brahmā api jihmāyate

original: MSS_9077-2 jāte yaccaraṇapraṇāmasulabhe saubhāgyabhāgyodaye raṅkasyāṅkamanaṅkuśā niviśate devendralakṣmīrapi //
analyzed: jāte yat caraṇa praṇāma sulabhe saubhāgya bhāgya udaye raṅkasya aṅkam anaṅkuśā niviśate deva indra lakṣmīḥ api

original: MSS_9077-1 kalyāṇāyabhavantu khaṇḍaparaśoḥ koṭīravāṭīruhāṃ vallīnāṃ valayāni velladuragaśreṇīni śoṇatviṣām /
analyzed: kalyāṇāya bhavantu khaṇḍaparaśoḥ koṭīra vāṭīruhām vallīnām valayāni vellat uraga śreṇīni śoṇa tviṣām

original: MSS_9077-2 unmīlatkanakāravindakalikākiñjalkapuñjakṣarad- dhūlīdhūsarasiddhasindhulaharīsindūritendūni vaḥ //
analyzed: unmīlat kanaka aravinda kalikā kiñjalka puñja kṣarat dhūlī dhūsara siddha sindhu laharī sindūrita indūni vaḥ

original: MSS_9078-1 kalyāṇi candanarasaiḥ pariṣicya gātraṃ dvitrāṇyahāni kathamapyativāhayethāḥ /
analyzed: kalyāṇi candana rasaiḥ pariṣicya gātram dvitrāṇi ahāni katham api ativāhayethāḥ

original: MSS_9078-2 aṅke nidhāya bhavatīṃ parirabhya dorbhyāṃ neṣyāmi sūryakiraṇānapi śītalatvam //
analyzed: aṅke nidhāya bhavatīm parirabhya dorbhyām neṣyāmi sūrya kiraṇān api śītala tvam

original: MSS_9079-1 kalyāṇi pāṇipatitāni vinā vicāram etāni moktumucitāni na mauktikāni /
analyzed: kalyāṇi pāṇi patitāni vinā vicāram etāni moktum ucitāni na mauktikāni

original: MSS_9079-2 guñjeti saṃjanayate yadiha bhramante hastāravindanayanotpalayoḥ prabhaiva //
analyzed: guñjā iti saṃjanayate yat iha bhramante hasta aravinda nayana utpalayoḥ prabhā eva

original: MSS_9080-1 kalyāṇī bata gātheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me /
analyzed: kalyāṇī bata gāthā iyam laukikī pratibhāti me

original: MSS_9080-2 eti jīvantamānando naraṃ varṣaśatādapi //
analyzed: eti jīvantam ānandaḥ naram varṣa śatāt api

original: MSS_9081-1 kalyāṇollāsasīmā kalayatu kuśalaṃ kālameghābhirāmā kācit sāketadhāmā bhavagahanagatiklāntihāripraṇāmā /
analyzed: kalyāṇa ullāsa sīmā kalayatu kuśalam kāla megha abhirāmā kācid sāketa dhāmā bhava gahana gati klānti hāri praṇāmā

original: MSS_9081-2 saundaryahrīṇakāmā dhṛtajanakasutāsādarāpāṅgadhāmā dikṣu prakhyātabhūmā diviṣadabhinutā devatā rāmanāmā //
analyzed: saundarya hrīṇa kāmā dhṛta janakasutā sādara apāṅga dhāmā dikṣu prakhyāta bhūmā diviṣad abhinutā devatā rāma nāmā

original: MSS_9082-1 kalyotthānaparā nityaṃ guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratā /
analyzed: kalya utthāna parā nityam guru śuśrūṣaṇe ratā

original: MSS_9082-2 susaṃmṛṣṭagṛhā caiva gośakṛtkṛtalepanā //
analyzed: su saṃmṛṣṭa gṛhā ca eva go śakṛt kṛta lepanā

original: MSS_9083-1 kallolakṣiptapaṅkatripuraharaśiraḥsvaḥsravantīmṛṇālaṃ karpūrakṣodajālaṃ kusumaśaravadhūsīdhubhṛṅgāranālam /
analyzed: kallola kṣipta paṅka tripura hara śiraḥ svar sravantī mṛṇālam karpūra kṣoda jālam kusuma śara vadhū sīdhu bhṛṅga āranālam

original: MSS_9083-2 etad dugdhābdhibandhorgaganakamalinīpatrapānīyabindor antas toṣaṃ na keṣāṃ kisalayati jaganmaṇḍanaṃ khaṇḍamindoḥ //
analyzed: etat dugdha abdhi bandhoḥ gagana kamalinī patra pānīya bindoḥ antar toṣam na keṣām kisalayati jagat maṇḍanam khaṇḍam indoḥ

original: MSS_9083A-1 kallolacapalā lakṣmīḥ saṃgamāḥ svapnasannibhāḥ /
analyzed: kallola capalā lakṣmīḥ saṃgamāḥ svapna sannibhāḥ

original: MSS_9083A-2 vātyāvyatikarotkṣiptatūlatulyaṃ ca yauvanam //
analyzed: vātyā vyatikara utkṣipta tūla tulyam ca yauvanam

original: MSS_9084-1 kallolavellitadṛṣatparuṣaprahārai ratnānyamūni makarālaya māvamaṃsthāḥ /
analyzed: kallola vellita dṛṣad paruṣa prahāraiḥ ratnāni amūni makara ālaya mā avamaṃsthāḥ

original: MSS_9084-2 kiṃ kaustubhena vihito bhavato na nāma yācñāprasāritakaraḥ puruṣottamo'pi //
analyzed: kim kaustubhena vihitaḥ bhavataḥ na nāma yācñā prasārita karaḥ puruṣottamaḥ api

original: MSS_9085-1 kallolasaṃcaladagādhajalairalolaiḥ kallolinīparivṛḍhaiḥ kimapeyatoyaiḥ /
analyzed: kallola saṃcalat agādha jalaiḥ alolaiḥ kallolinī parivṛḍhaiḥ kim apeya toyaiḥ

original: MSS_9085-2 jīyāt sa jarjaratanurgirinirjharo'yaṃ yadvipruṣāpi tṛṣitā vitṛṣībhavanti //
analyzed: jīyāt sa jarjara tanuḥ giri nirjharaḥ yam yat vipruṣā api tṛṣitāḥ vitṛṣībhavanti

original: MSS_9086-1 kallolaiḥ sthagayan mukhāni kakubhāmabhraṃlihairambhasā kṣāreṇāpi divāniśaṃ jalanidhe garjan na viśrāmyasi /
analyzed: kallolaiḥ sthagayan mukhāni kakubhām abhraṃlihaiḥ ambhasā kṣāreṇa api divāniśam jalanidhe garjan na viśrāmyasi

original: MSS_9086-2 etatte yadi ghoranakranilayaṃ svādu vyadhāsyād vidhiḥ kiṃ kartāsi tadā na vedmi taralaiḥ svaireva duśceṣṭitaiḥ //
analyzed: etat te yadi ghora nakra nilayam svādu vyadhāsyāt vidhiḥ kim kartāsi tadā na vedmi taralaiḥ svaiḥ eva duśceṣṭitaiḥ

original: MSS_9087-1 kallolairvikiratvasau girivarān velāvilāsotthitaiḥ śabdairvā badhirīkarotu kakubho dhattāṃ ca vistīrṇatām /
analyzed: kallolaiḥ vikiratu asau giri varān velā vilāsa utthitaiḥ śabdaiḥ vā badhirīkarotu kakubhaḥ dhattām ca vistīrṇa tām

original: MSS_9087-2 pānthānāṃ ravitāpataptavapuṣāṃ tṛṣṇātirekacchidaḥ kiṃ sāmyaṃ pratanoḥ karotu saraso'pyabdhiḥ kṛtāḍambaraḥ //
analyzed: pānthānām ravi tāpa tapta vapuṣām tṛṣṇā atireka chidaḥ kim sāmyam pratanoḥ karotu sarasā upi abdhiḥ kṛta āḍambaraḥ

original: MSS_9088-1 kavayaḥ kavayantu tailabhuktāḥ sarasā eva parantu dākṣiṇātyāḥ /
analyzed: kavayaḥ kavayantu taila bhuktāḥ sa rasāḥ eva parantu dākṣiṇātyāḥ

original: MSS_9088-2 api locanacañcalā hariṇyo madirākṣyā na samāḥ kaṭākṣapātaiḥ //
analyzed: api locana cañcalāḥ hariṇyaḥ madirā akṣyāḥ na samāḥ kaṭākṣa pātaiḥ

original: MSS_9089-1 kavayaḥ kālidāsādyāḥ kavayo vayamapyamī /
analyzed: kavayaḥ kālidāsa ādyāḥ kavayaḥ vayam api amī

original: MSS_9089-2 parvate paramāṇau ca vastutvamubhayorapi /
analyzed: parvate paramāṇau ca vastu tvam ubhayoḥ api

original: MSS_9090-1 kavayaḥ kiṃ na paśyanti kiṃ na bhakṣanti vāyasāḥ /
analyzed: kavayaḥ kim na paśyanti kim na bhakṣanti vāyasāḥ

original: MSS_9090-2 pramadāḥ kiṃ na kurvanti kiṃ na jalpanti madyapāḥ //
analyzed: pramadāḥ kim na kurvanti kim na jalpanti madyapāḥ

original: MSS_9091-1 kavayaḥ kiṃ na paśyanti kiṃ na bhakṣanti vāyasāḥ /
analyzed: kavayaḥ kim na paśyanti kim na bhakṣanti vāyasāḥ

original: MSS_9091-2 madyapāḥ kiṃ na jalpanti kiṃ na kurvanti yoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: madyapāḥ kim na jalpanti kim na kurvanti yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_9092-1 kavayaḥ parituṣyanti netare kavisūktibhiḥ /
analyzed: kavayaḥ parituṣyanti na itare kavi su uktibhiḥ

original: MSS_9092-2 nahyakūpāravat kūpā vardhante vidhukāntibhiḥ //
analyzed: na hi akūpāra vat kūpāḥ vardhante vidhu kāntibhiḥ

original: MSS_9093-1 kavalayati na cetas tasya dāridryaduḥkhaṃ na ca piśunajanoktiḥ karṇakaṇḍūṃ karoti /
analyzed: kavalayati na cetaḥ tasya dāridrya duḥkham na ca piśuna jana uktiḥ karṇa kaṇḍūm karoti

original: MSS_9093-2 varakavikṛtagoṣṭhībandhagandhopabhoge ya iha madhu vamantīṃ kāvyacintāṃ karoti //
analyzed: vara kavi kṛta goṣṭhī bandha gandha upabhoge yaḥ iha madhu vamantīm kāvya cintām karoti

original: MSS_9094-1 kavayati paṇḍitarāje kavayantyanye'pi vidvāṃsaḥ /
analyzed: kavayati paṇḍita rāje kavayanti anye api vidvāṃsaḥ

original: MSS_9094-2 nṛtyati pinākapāṇau nṛtyantyanye'pi bhūtavetālāḥ //
analyzed: nṛtyati pinākapāṇau nṛtyanti anye api bhūta vetālāḥ

original: MSS_9095-1 kavayo vada kutra kīdṛśāḥ kaṭhinaṃ kiṃ viditaṃ samantataḥ /
analyzed: kavayaḥ vada kutra kīdṛśāḥ kaṭhinam kim viditam samantataḥ

original: MSS_9095-2 adhunā tava vairiyoṣitāṃ hṛdi tāpaḥ prabalo vihāya kāḥ //
analyzed: adhunā tava vairi yoṣitām hṛdi tāpaḥ prabalaḥ vihāya kāḥ

original: MSS_9095A-1 kavalayasi candradīdhitī- rnaviralamaśnāsi nūnamaṅgārān /
analyzed: kavalayasi candra dīdhitīḥ na viralam aśnāsi nūnam aṅgārān

original: MSS_9095A-2 adhikataramuṣṇamanayoḥ kimiha cakorāvadhārayasi //
analyzed: adhikataram uṣṇam anayoḥ kim iha cakora avadhārayasi

original: MSS_9096-1 kavalitamiha nālaṃ kandalaṃ ceha dṛṣṭam iha hi kumudakośe pītamambhaḥ suśītam /
analyzed: kavalitam iha nālam kandalam ca iha dṛṣṭam iha hi kumudakośe pītam ambhaḥ su śītam

original: MSS_9096-2 iti viraṭati rātrau paryaṭantī taṭānte sahacaraparimuktā cakravākī varākī //
analyzed: iti viraṭati rātrau paryaṭantī taṭa ante sahacara parimuktā cakravākī varākī

original: MSS_9097-1 kaviḥ karoti kāvyāni paṇḍito vetti tadrasam /
analyzed: kaviḥ karoti kāvyāni paṇḍitaḥ vetti tad rasam

original: MSS_9097-2 kāminīkucakāṭhinyaṃ patirjānāti no pitā //
analyzed: kāminī kuca kāṭhinyam patiḥ jānāti no pitā

original: MSS_9098-1 kaviḥ karoti kāvyāni svādu jānāti paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: kaviḥ karoti kāvyāni svādu jānāti paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_9098-2 sundaryā api lāvaṇyaṃ patirjānāti no pitā //
analyzed: sundaryāḥ api lāvaṇyam patiḥ jānāti no pitā

original: MSS_9099-1 kaviḥ karoti padyāni lālayatyuttamo janaḥ /
analyzed: kaviḥ karoti padyāni lālayati uttamaḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_9099-2 taruḥ prasūte puṣpāṇi marud vahati saurabham //
analyzed: taruḥ prasūte puṣpāṇi marut vahati saurabham

original: MSS_9100-1 kaviḥ pitā poṣayati pālako rasikaḥ patiḥ /
analyzed: kaviḥ pitā poṣayati pālakaḥ rasikaḥ patiḥ

original: MSS_9100-2 kavitāyuvaternūnaṃ sodarās tu vivekinaḥ //
analyzed: kavi tā yuvateḥ nūnam sodarāḥ tu vivekinaḥ

original: MSS_9101-1 kaviḥ sūyati kāvyāni hṛdā dadhati sajjanāḥ /
analyzed: kaviḥ sūyati kāvyāni hṛdā dadhati sat janāḥ

original: MSS_9101-2 sūte muktāḥ payorāśir vahanti taruṇīstanāḥ //
analyzed: sūte muktāḥ payaḥ rāśiḥ vahanti taruṇī stanāḥ

original: MSS_9102-1 kavitākalanena kiṃ nṛpāṇāṃ yadi kavayo na labhanti pūrṇakāmāḥ /
analyzed: kavi tā kalanena kim nṛpāṇām yadi kavayaḥ na labhanti pūrṇa kāmāḥ

original: MSS_9102-2 nayanena kimeṇalocanānāṃ yadi vakraṃ na vilokitā yuvānaḥ //
analyzed: nayanena kim eṇa locanānām yadi vakram na vilokitāḥ yuvānaḥ

original: MSS_9103-1 kavitākundavikāsana- kṛtine vijitajanatānidāghāya /
MSS_9103-2 dalitoddāmāghāya praṇatiṃ kalayāmi māghāya //
analyzed: dalita uddāma aghāya praṇatim kalayāmi māghāya

original: MSS_9104-1 kavitā vanitā kasya na modāya sacetasaḥ /
analyzed: kavitā vanitā kasya na modāya sacetasaḥ

original: MSS_9104-2 rasa eva sadā tasyā narīnartīva sarvataḥ //
analyzed: rasaḥ eva sadā tasyāḥ narīnarti iva sarvatas

original: MSS_9105-1 kavitvaṃ na śṛṇotyeva kṛpaṇaḥ kīrtivarjitaḥ /
analyzed: kavi tvam na śṛṇoti eva kṛpaṇaḥ kīrti varjitaḥ

original: MSS_9105-2 napuṃsakaḥ kiṃ kurute puraḥsthitamṛgīdṛśā //
analyzed: napuṃsakaḥ kim kurute puras sthita mṛgī dṛśā

original: MSS_9106-1 kavitvagānapriyavādasatyā- nyasyā vidhātā vyadhitādhikaṇṭham /
analyzed: kavi tva gāna priya vāda satyā nyasyā vidhātā vyadhita adhikaṇṭham

original: MSS_9106-2 rekhātrayanyāsamiṣādamīṣāṃ vāsāya so'yaṃ vibabhāja sīmāḥ //
analyzed: rekhā traya nyāsa miṣāt amīṣām vāsāya sā uyam vibabhāja sīmāḥ

original: MSS_9107-1 kavitvaprodgumphaśravaṇakṛtajhampavyatikaraṃ ciraṃ yeṣāṃ svāntaṃ samajani nitāntaṃ rasavaśam /
analyzed: kavi tva prodgumpha śravaṇa kṛta jhampa vyatikaram ciram yeṣām svāntam samajani nitāntam rasa vaśam

original: MSS_9107-2 amīṣāṃ pīyūṣāpacitasurayoṣādharapuṭo- llasanmādhurye vā samudayati kiṃ vā ratirapi //
analyzed: amīṣām pīyūṣa apacita sura yoṣā adhara puṭaḥ llasat mādhurye vā samudayati kim vā ratiḥ api

original: MSS_9108-1 kavitvamārogyamatīva medhā strīṇāṃ priyatvaṃ kanakasya lābhaḥ /
analyzed: kavi tvam ārogyam atīva medhā strīṇām priya tvam kanakasya lābhaḥ

original: MSS_9108-2 sarveṣu tathyaṃ svajaneṣu pūjā svargasthitānāṃ kila cihnametat //
analyzed: sarveṣu tathyam sva janeṣu pūjā svarga sthitānām kila cihnam etat

original: MSS_9108A-1 kavitvaśaktirhi divo'vatīrṇā bhūmau sudhāsāra ivāryapuṇyāt /
analyzed: kavi tva śaktiḥ hi divaḥ vatīrṇā bhūmau sudhā sāre iva ārya puṇyāt

original: MSS_9108A-2 punargrahītuṃ nijavastu devāḥ samāgatāstat kavayaḥ samutkāḥ //
analyzed: punar grahītum nija vastu devāḥ samāgatāḥ tat kavayaḥ samutkāḥ

original: MSS_9109-1 kavitve vāditvaṃ kanakakusume saurabhaguṇo dhanitve dātṛtvaṃ viṣamataruphale svādurasatā /
analyzed: kavi tve vādi tvam kanaka kusume saurabha guṇaḥ dhani tve dātṛ tvam viṣama taru phale svādu rasa tā

original: MSS_9109-2 kulīne saujanyaṃ mṛgamadarase rāgaracanā prabhutve vidvattvaṃ parabhṛtamukhe mānuṣavacaḥ //
analyzed: kulīne saujanyam mṛgamada rase rāga racanā prabhu tve vidvas tvam parabhṛta mukhe mānuṣa vacaḥ

original: MSS_9109A-1 kavibhāvakṛtaṃ cihnam anyatrāpi na duṣyati /
analyzed: kavi bhāva kṛtam cihnam anyatra api na duṣyati

original: MSS_9109A-2 mukhamiṣṭārthasaṃsiddhaṃ kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtātmanām //
analyzed: mukham iṣṭa artha saṃsiddham kim hi na syāt kṛtātmanām

original: MSS_9110-1 kavibhirnūpasevāsu citrālaṃkārahāriṇī /
analyzed: kavibhiḥ nūpa sevāsu citra alaṃkāra hāriṇī

original: MSS_9110-2 vāṇī veśyeva lobhena paropakaraṇīkṛtā //
analyzed: vāṇī veśyā iva lobhena para upakaraṇīkṛtā

original: MSS_9111-1 kavimatiriva bahulohā sughaṭitacakrā prabhātaveleva /
analyzed: kavi matiḥ iva bahu lohā su ghaṭita cakrā prabhāta velā iva

original: MSS_9111-2 haramūrtiriva hasantī bhāti vidhūmānalopetā //
analyzed: hara mūrtiḥ iva hasantī bhāti vidhūma anala upetā

original: MSS_9112-1 kaviranuharati cchāyāṃ padamekaṃ pādamekamardhaṃ vā /
analyzed: kaviḥ anuharati chāyām padam ekam pādam ekam ardham vā

original: MSS_9112-2 sakalaprabandhahartre sāhasakartre namas tasmai //
analyzed: sakala prabandha hartre sāhasa kartre namaḥ tasmai

original: MSS_9113-1 kaviramaraḥ kaviracalaḥ kavirabhinandaśca kālidāsaśca /
analyzed: kaviḥ amaraḥ kaviḥ acalaḥ kaviḥ abhinandaḥ ca kālidāsaḥ ca

original: MSS_9113-2 anye kavayaḥ kapayaś cāpalamātraṃ padaṃ dadhati //
analyzed: anye kavayaḥ kapayaḥ cāpala mātram padam dadhati

original: MSS_9114-1 kaviravimahotkarṣān harṣan prapañcaya pañcaṣān skhalasi rasane kiṃ vā sarvān pravaktumanīśvare /
analyzed: kavi ravi mahā utkarṣān harṣan prapañcaya pañcaṣān skhalasi rasane kim vā sarvān pravaktum anīśvare

original: MSS_9114-2 gaṇayati yadapyetān dhātā dināvalimālayā tadapi bhagavāneṣāmantaṃ kadāpi na vindati //
analyzed: gaṇayati yat api etān dhātā dina āvali mālayā tat api bhagavān eṣām antam kadāpi na vindati

original: MSS_9115-1 kavirahitāḥ kavilāpā jāyante kaṇṭhaśoṣaṇāyaiva /
analyzed: kavi rahitāḥ ka vilāpāḥ jāyante kaṇṭha śoṣaṇāya eva

original: MSS_9115-2 saṃmukhagataḥ kaviścet bhavati kulapitāpi kavikulapitaiva //
analyzed: saṃmukha gataḥ kaviḥ ced bhavati kula pitā api kavi kula pitā eva

original: MSS_9116-1 kavireva kavervetti kāvyakarmaṇi kauśalam /
analyzed: kaviḥ eva kaveḥ vetti kāvya karmaṇi kauśalam

original: MSS_9116-2 śeṣāhireva jānāti bhuvo bhārasya niścayam //
analyzed: śeṣa ahiḥ eva jānāti bhuvaḥ bhārasya niścayam

original: MSS_9116A-1 kavirbhāradvājo jagadavadhijāgrannijayaśā rasaśreṇīmarmavyavaharaṇahevākarasikaḥ /
MSS_9116A-2 yadīyānāṃ vācāṃ rasikahṛdayollāsanavidhā- vamandānandātmā pariṇayati sandarbhamahimā //
analyzed: yadīyānām vācām rasika hṛdaya ullāsana vidhā vamanda ānanda ātmā pariṇayati sandarbha mahimā

original: MSS_9117-1 kavivākyāmṛtatīrtha- snānaiḥ pūtā bhṛśaṃ yaśodehāḥ /
analyzed: snānaiḥ pūtāḥ bhṛśam yaśaḥ dehāḥ

original: MSS_9117-2 yeṣāṃ ta eva bhūpā jīvanti mṛtā vṛthaivānye //
analyzed: yeṣām te eva bhūpāḥ jīvanti mṛtāḥ vṛthā eva anye

original: MSS_9118-1 kavividyādurādharṣo yo rākṣasa ivāparaḥ /
analyzed: kavi vidyā durādharṣaḥ yaḥ rākṣasaḥ iva aparaḥ

original: MSS_9118-2 dakṣiṇastho labdhavarṇo vikhyātaḥ kavirākṣasaḥ //
analyzed: dakṣiṇa sthaḥ labdhavarṇaḥ vikhyātaḥ kavi rākṣasaḥ

original: MSS_9119-1 kaviṣu dadhatamutkarṣaṃ visphuradanavadyahṛdyavāgvarṣam /
analyzed: kaviṣu dadhatam utkarṣam visphurat anavadya hṛdya vāc varṣam

original: MSS_9119-2 iha khalu khalapradharṣaṃ śrīharṣaṃ naumi harṣasaṃgharṣam //
analyzed: iha khalu khala pradharṣam śrī harṣam naumi harṣa saṃgharṣam

original: MSS_9120-1 kavihṛdayeṣvanasūyā kastūrīkardameṣvamālinyam /
analyzed: kavi hṛdayeṣu anasūyā kastūrī kardameṣu amālinyam

original: MSS_9120-2 akṣāratā payodhā- vavanīpāleṣu pāṇḍityam //
analyzed: a kṣāra tā payodhā vavanīpāleṣu pāṇḍityam

original: MSS_9121-1 kavīnāṃ ca budhānāṃ ca vadānyānāṃ ca yo guruḥ /
analyzed: kavīnām ca budhānām ca vadānyānām ca yaḥ guruḥ

original: MSS_9121-2 nānāśāstracaṇaprajñaḥ śivanāthaḥ sa namyate //
analyzed: nānā śāstra caṇa prajñaḥ śiva nāthaḥ sa namyate

original: MSS_9122-1 kavīnāṃ mahatāṃ sūktair gūḍhārthāntarasūcibhiḥ /
analyzed: kavīnām mahatām sūktaiḥ gūḍha artha antara sūcibhiḥ

original: MSS_9122-2 vidhyamānaśrutermābhūd durjanasya kathaṃ vyathā //
analyzed: vidhyamāna śruteḥ mā abhūt durjanasya katham vyathā

original: MSS_9123-1 kavīnāṃ mānasaṃ naumi taranti pratibhāmbhasi /
analyzed: kavīnām mānasam naumi taranti pratibhā ambhasi

original: MSS_9123-2 yatra haṃsavayāṃsīva bhuvanāni caturdaśa //
analyzed: yatra haṃsa vayāṃsi iva bhuvanāni caturdaśa

original: MSS_9124-1 kavīnāṃ saṃtāpo bhramaṇamabhito durgatiriti trayāṇāṃpañcatvaṃ racayasi na tac citramadhikam /
analyzed: kavīnām saṃtāpaḥ bhramaṇam abhitas durgatiḥ iti trayāṇām pañcatvam racayasi na tat citram adhikam

original: MSS_9124-2 caturṇāṃ vedānāṃ vyaraci navatā vīra bhavatā dviṣatsenālīnābhayutamapi lakṣaṃ tvamakṛthāḥ //
analyzed: caturṇām vedānām vyaraci navatā vīra bhavatā dviṣat senā līna ābha yutam api lakṣam tvam akṛthāḥ

original: MSS_9125-1 kavīnāmagalad darpo nūnaṃ vāsavadattayā /
analyzed: kavīnām agalat darpaḥ nūnam vāsavadattayā

original: MSS_9125-2 śaktyeva pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ gatayā karṇagocaram //
analyzed: śaktyā iva pāṇḍu putrāṇām gatayā karṇa gocaram

original: MSS_9126-1 kavīnduṃ naumi vālmīkiṃ yasya rāmāyaṇīṃ kathām /
analyzed: kavi indum naumi vālmīkim yasya rāmāyaṇīm kathām

original: MSS_9126-2 candrikāmiva cinvanti cakorā iva sādhavaḥ //
analyzed: candrikām iva cinvanti cakorāḥ iva sādhavaḥ

original: MSS_9127-1 kavīndrāṇāmāsan prathamataramevāṅgaṇabhuvaś caladbhṛṅgāsaṅgākulakarimadāmodamadhurāḥ /
analyzed: kavi indrāṇām āsan prathamataram eva aṅgaṇa bhuvaḥ calat bhṛṅga āsaṅga ākula kari mada āmoda madhurāḥ

original: MSS_9127-2 amī paścāt teṣāmupari patitā rudranṛpateḥ kaṭākṣāḥ kṣīrodaprasaraduruvīcīsahacarāḥ //
analyzed: amī paścāt teṣām upari patitāḥ rudra nṛpateḥ kaṭākṣāḥ kṣīroda prasarat uru vīcī sahacarāḥ

original: MSS_9128-1 kavīśvarāṇāṃ vacasāṃ vinodair nandanti vidyānidhayo na cānye /
analyzed: kavi īśvarāṇām vacasām vinodaiḥ nandanti vidyā nidhayaḥ na ca anye

original: MSS_9128-2 candropalā eva karaiḥ sudhāṃśor dravanti nānyā dṛṣadaḥ kadācit //
analyzed: candra upalāḥ eva karaiḥ sudhāṃśoḥ dravanti na anyāḥ dṛṣadaḥ kadācid

original: MSS_9129-1 kaverabhiprāyamaśabdagocaraṃ sphurantamārdreṣu padeṣu kevalam /
analyzed: kaveḥ abhiprāyam aśabda gocaram sphurantam ārdreṣu padeṣu kevalam

original: MSS_9129-2 vadadbhiraṅgaiḥ kṛtaromavikriyair janasya tūṣṇīṃ bhavato'yamañjaliḥ //
analyzed: vadadbhiḥ aṅgaiḥ kṛta roma vikriyaiḥ janasya tūṣṇīm bhavataḥ yam añjaliḥ

original: MSS_9130-1 kaśābhiriva haimībhir vidyudbhirabhitāḍitam /
