analyzed: kaśābhiḥ iva haimībhiḥ vidyudbhiḥ abhitāḍitam

original: MSS_9130-2 antaḥstanitanirghoṣaṃ savedanamivāmbaram //
analyzed: antar stanita nirghoṣam sa vedanam iva ambaram

original: MSS_9131-1 kaśca pratyakṣamutsṛjya saṃśayasthamalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: kaḥ ca pratyakṣam utsṛjya saṃśaya stham alakṣaṇam

original: MSS_9131-2 āyatisthaṃ cared dharma kṣatrabandhuraniścitam //
analyzed: āyati stham caret dharma kṣatrabandhuḥ aniścitam

original: MSS_9132-1 kaścic chastrāpātamūḍho'pavoḍhur labdhvā bhūyaścetanāmāhavāya /
analyzed: kaścid śastra āpāta mūḍha upavoḍhuḥ labdhvā bhūyas cetanām āhavāya

original: MSS_9132-2 vyāvartiṣṭa krośataḥ sakhyuruccais tyaktaścātmā kā ca lokānuvṛttiḥ //
analyzed: vyāvartiṣṭa krośataḥ sakhyuḥ uccais tyaktaḥ ca ātmā kā ca loka anuvṛttiḥ

original: MSS_9133-1 kaścit karābhyāmupagūḍhanālam ālolapatrābhihatadvirepham /
analyzed: kaścid karābhyām upagūḍha nālam ālola patra abhihata dvirepham

original: MSS_9133-2 rajobhirantaḥpariveṣabandhi līlāravindaṃ bhramayāṃcakāra //
analyzed: rajobhiḥ antar pariveṣa bandhi līlā aravindam bhramayāṃcakāra

original: MSS_9134-1 kaścit kaṣṭaṃ kirati karakājālameko'timātraṃ garjatyeva kṣipati viṣayaṃ vaidyutaṃ vahnimanyaḥ /
analyzed: kaścid kaṣṭam kirati karakā jālam eka ūti mātram garjati eva kṣipati viṣayam vaidyutam vahnim anyaḥ

original: MSS_9134-2 sūte vātaṃ javanamaparastena jānīhi tāvat kiṃ vyādatse vihaga vadanaṃ tatra tatrāmbuvāhe //
analyzed: sūte vātam javanam aparaḥ tena jānīhi tāvat kim vyādatse vihaga vadanam tatra tatra ambuvāhe

original: MSS_9135-1 kaścit kasyacideva syāt suhṛd viśrambhabhājanam /
analyzed: kaścid kasyacid eva syāt suhṛd viśrambha bhājanam

original: MSS_9135-2 padmaṃ vikāsayatyarkaḥ saṃkocayati kairavam //
MSS_9136-1 kaścit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārāt pramattaḥ śāpenāstaṃgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ /
analyzed: kaścid kāntā viraha guruṇā sva adhikārāt pramattaḥ śāpena astaṃgamita mahimā varṣa bhogyeṇa bhartuḥ

original: MSS_9136-2 yakṣaścakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu //
analyzed: yakṣaḥ cakre janakatanayā snāna puṇya udakeṣu snigdha chāyā taruṣu vasatim rāmagiri āśrameṣu

original: MSS_9137-1 kaścit krandati kālakarkaśakarākṛṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ haṭhād utkṛṣṭaṃ tanayaṃ vilokya purataḥ putreti hā hā kvacit /
analyzed: kaścid krandati kāla karkaśa kara ākṛṣṭam vinaṣṭam haṭhāt utkṛṣṭam tanayam vilokya puratas putra iti hā hā kvacid

original: MSS_9137-2 kaścinnartakanartakīparivṛto nṛtyatyaho kutracic citraṃ saṃsṛtipaddhatiḥ prathayati prītiṃ ca kaṣṭaṃ ca naḥ //
analyzed: kaścid nartaka nartakī parivṛtaḥ nṛtyati aho kutracid citram saṃsṛti paddhatiḥ prathayati prītim ca kaṣṭam ca naḥ

original: MSS_9138-1 kaścit tarati kāṣṭhena sugambhīrāṃ mahānadīm /
analyzed: kaścid tarati kāṣṭhena su gambhīrām mahā nadīm

original: MSS_9138-2 sa tārayati tat kāṣṭhaṃ sa ca kāṣṭhena tāryate //
analyzed: sa tārayati tat kāṣṭham sa ca kāṣṭhena tāryate

original: MSS_9139-1 kaścit tāvat tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā śaṅkito'pi vā /
analyzed: kaścid tāvat tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā śaṅkitaḥ api vā

original: MSS_9139-2 kṣitau vā yadi vā svarge yasya mṛtyur na vidyate //
analyzed: kṣitau vā yadi vā svarge yasya mṛtyuḥ na vidyate

original: MSS_9140-1 kaścit paṇyastrīṇāṃ vibhavopacitānyapuruṣayojanayā /
analyzed: kaścid paṇya strīṇām vibhava upacita anya puruṣa yojanayā

original: MSS_9140-2 vidadhāti smārādhana- madhanatvamupāgataḥ kāmī //
analyzed: vidadhāti sma ārādhana madhana tvam upāgataḥ kāmī

original: MSS_9141-1 kaścit pānthas tṛṣārtaḥ pathi tapaṛtau gamyamāno'nyapānthaṃ papracchānandalīno vada pathika kuto jahnukanyāpravāhaḥ /
analyzed: kaścid pānthaḥ tṛṣā ārtaḥ pathi tapa ṛtau gamyamānaḥ nya pāntham papraccha ānanda līnaḥ vada pathika kutas jahnukanyā pravāhaḥ

original: MSS_9141-2 tenāsau śīghravācā pracalitamanasā vipravaryeṇa coce sūcyagre kūpaṣaṭkaṃ tadupari nagarī tatra gaṅgāpravāhaḥ //
analyzed: tena asau śīghra vācā pracalita manasā vipra varyeṇa coce sūci agre kūpa ṣaṭkam tad upari nagarī tatra gaṅgā pravāhaḥ

original: MSS_9142-1 kaścit pumān kṣipati māṃ prati rūkṣavākyaiḥ so'haṃ kṣamābharaṇametya mudaṃ prayāmi /
analyzed: kaścid pumān kṣipati mām prati rūkṣa vākyaiḥ saḥ aham kṣamā ābharaṇam etya mudam prayāmi

original: MSS_9142-2 śokaṃ vrajāmi punarevamayaṃ tapasvī cāritrataḥ skhalitavāniti mannimittam //
analyzed: śokam vrajāmi punar evam ayam tapasvī cāritrataḥ skhalitavān iti mad nimittam

original: MSS_9143-1 kaścidāmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃśca nipiñcati /
analyzed: kaścid āmravaṇam chittvā palāśān ca nipiñcati

original: MSS_9143-2 puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame //
analyzed: puṣpam dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phala āgame

original: MSS_9144-1 kaścidāśrayasaundaryād dhatte śobhāmasajjanaḥ /
analyzed: kaścid āśraya saundaryāt dhatte śobhām asat janaḥ

original: MSS_9144-2 pramadālocananyastaṃ malīmasamivāñjanam //
analyzed: pramadā locana nyastam malīmasam iva añjanam

original: MSS_9145-1 kaścid daivena saumitre yoddhumutsahate pumān /
analyzed: kaścid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān

original: MSS_9145-2 yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃcit karmaṇo'nyatra dṛśyate //
analyzed: yasya na grahaṇam kiṃcid karmaṇaḥ anyatra dṛśyate

original: MSS_9146-1 kaścid daivena saumitrai yoddhumutsahate saha /
analyzed: kaścid daivena saumitrai yoddhum utsahate saha

original: MSS_9146-2 yasyeha vigrahopāyo na kathaṃcana vidyate //
analyzed: yasya iha vigraha upāyaḥ na kathaṃcana vidyate

original: MSS_9147-1 kaścid dviṣatkhaḍgahṛtottamāṅgaḥ sadyo vimānaprabhutāmupetya /
analyzed: kaścid dviṣat khaḍga hṛta uttamāṅgaḥ sadyas vimāna prabhu tām upetya

original: MSS_9147-2 vāmāṅgasaṃsaktasurāṅganaḥ svaṃ nṛtyatkabandhaṃ samare dadarśa //
analyzed: vāma aṅga saṃsakta sura aṅganaḥ svam nṛtyat kabandham samare dadarśa

original: MSS_9148-1 kaścid yathābhāgamavasthite'pi svasaṃniveśād vyatilaṅghinīva /
analyzed: kaścid yathābhāgam avasthitā ipi sva saṃniveśāt vyatilaṅghinī iva

original: MSS_9148-2 vajrāṃśugarbāṅgulirandhramekaṃ vyāpārayāmāsa karaṃ kirīṭe //
analyzed: vajra aṃśu garba aṅguli randhram ekam vyāpārayāmāsa karam kirīṭe

original: MSS_9149-1 kaścid vācaṃ racayitumalaṃ śrotumevāparas tām kalyāṇī te matirubhayato vismayaṃ nas tanoti /
analyzed: kaścid vācam racayitum alam śrotum eva aparaḥ tām kalyāṇī te matiḥ ubhayatas vismayam naḥ tanoti

original: MSS_9149-2 na hyekasminnatiśayavatāṃ saṃnipāto guṇānām ekaḥ sūte kanakamupalas tatparīkṣākṣamo'nyaḥ //
analyzed: na hi ekasmin atiśayavatām saṃnipātaḥ guṇānām ekaḥ sūte kanakam upalaḥ tad parīkṣā kṣamaḥ anyaḥ

original: MSS_9150-1 kaścin navaṃ pallavamādadāti kaścit prasūnāni phalāni kaścit /
analyzed: kaścid navam pallavam ādadāti kaścid prasūnāni phalāni kaścid

original: MSS_9150-2 paraṃ karāle'sya nidāghakāle mūle na dātā salilasya kaścit //
analyzed: param nidāgha kāle mūle na dātā salilasya kaścid

original: MSS_9151-1 kaścin mālāsamaṃ mitraṃ kaścin mitraṃ tulāsamam /
analyzed: kaścid mālā samam mitram kaścid mitram tulā samam

original: MSS_9151-2 kaścin merusamaṃ mitraṃ kaścin mitraṃ mahīsamam //
analyzed: kaścid meru samam mitram kaścid mitram mahī samam

original: MSS_9152-1 kaścinmūrcchāmetya gāḍhaprahāraḥ siktaḥ śītaiḥ śīkarairvāraṇasya /
analyzed: kaścid mūrcchām etya gāḍha prahāraḥ siktaḥ śītaiḥ śīkaraiḥ vāraṇasya

original: MSS_9152-2 ucchaśvāsa prasthitā taṃ jighṛkṣur vyarthākūtā nākanārī mumūrccha //
analyzed: ucchaśvāsa prasthitā tam jighṛkṣuḥ vyartha ākūtā nākanārī mumūrccha

original: MSS_9153-1 kaś cumbati kulapuruṣo veśyādharapallavaṃ manojñamapi /
analyzed: kaḥ cumbati kula puruṣaḥ veśyā adhara pallavam manojñam api

original: MSS_9153-2 cārabhaṭacauraceṭaka- naṭaviṭaniṣṭhīvanaśarāvam //
analyzed: ca ārabhaṭa caura ceṭaka naṭa viṭa niṣṭhīvana śarāvam

original: MSS_9154-1 kaśmīrān gantukāmasya mīraśāhākhyabhūpateḥ /
analyzed: kaśmīrān gantu kāmasya mīraśāha ākhya bhūpateḥ

original: MSS_9154-2 śāhābuddīnabhūmīndraḥ prāhiṇoditi lekhakam //
analyzed: prāhiṇot iti lekhakam

original: MSS_9155-1 kimevamaviśaṅkitaḥ śiśukuraṅga lolakramaṃ parikramitumīhase virama naiva śūnyaṃ vanam /
analyzed: kim evam a viśaṅkitaḥ śiśu kuraṅga lola kramam parikramitum īhase virama nā eva śūnyam vanam

original: MSS_9155-2 sthito'tra gajayūthanāthamathanocchalacchoṇitac- chaṭāpaṭalabhāsurotkaṭasaṭābharaḥ kesarī //
analyzed: sthitā utra gaja yūtha nātha mathana ucchalat śoṇitat chaṭā paṭala bhāsura utkaṭa saṭā bharaḥ kesarī

original: MSS_9155A-1 kaṣāyakaluṣo jīvo rāgarañjitamānasaḥ /
MSS_9155A-2 caturgatibhavāmbhodhau bhinnanauriva sīdati //
analyzed: catur gati bhava ambhodhau bhinna nauḥ iva sīdati

original: MSS_9155B-1 kaṣāyapaśubhirduṣṭairdharmakāmārthanāśa kaiḥ /
analyzed: kaṣāya paśubhiḥ duṣṭaiḥ dharma kāma artha nāśa kaiḥ

original: MSS_9155B-2 śamamantrahatairyajñaṃ vidhehi vihitaṃ budhaiḥ //
analyzed: śama mantra hataiḥ yajñam vidhehi vihitam budhaiḥ

original: MSS_9156-1 kaṣāyamuktaṃ kathitaṃ caritraṃ kaṣāyavṛddhāvupaghātameti /
analyzed: kaṣāya muktam kathitam caritram kaṣāya vṛddhau upaghātam eti

original: MSS_9156-2 yadā kaṣāyaḥ śamameti puṃsas tadā caritraṃ punareti pūtam //
analyzed: yadā kaṣāyaḥ śamam eti puṃsaḥ tadā caritram punar eti pūtam

original: MSS_9156A-1 kaṣāyarāgavacanaṃ vītarāgo'dharastava /
analyzed: kaṣāya rāga vacanam vīta rāgaḥ udharaḥ tava

original: MSS_9156A-2 vihāraḥ kaṇṭhadeśaśca dūti pravrajitāsi kim //
analyzed: vihāraḥ kaṇṭha deśaḥ ca dūti pravrajitā asi kim

original: MSS_9156B-1 kaṣāyavijaye saukhyam indriyāṇāṃ ca nigrahe /
analyzed: kaṣāya vijaye saukhyam indriyāṇām ca nigrahe

original: MSS_9156B-2 jāyate paramotkṛṣṭam ātmano bhavabhedi yat //
analyzed: jāyate parama utkṛṣṭam ātmanaḥ bhava bhedi yat

original: MSS_9156C-1 kaṣāyaviṣayārtānāṃ dehināṃ nāsti nirvūtiḥ /
analyzed: kaṣāya viṣaya ārtānām dehinām na asti nirvūtiḥ

original: MSS_9156C-2 teṣāṃ ca virame saukhyaṃ jāyate paramādbhutam //
analyzed: teṣām ca virame saukhyam jāyate parama adbhutam

original: MSS_9156D-1 kaṣāyaviṣayāhāratyāgo yatra vidhīyate /
analyzed: kaṣāya viṣaya āhāra tyāgaḥ yatra vidhīyate

original: MSS_9156D-2 upavāsaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ śeṣaṃ laṅghanakaṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: upavāsaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ śeṣam laṅghanakam viduḥ

original: MSS_9157-1 kaṣāyasaṅgau sahate na vṛttaṃ samārdracakṣurna dinaṃ ca reṇum /
analyzed: kaṣāya saṅgau sahate na vṛttam samārdra cakṣuḥ na dinam ca reṇum

original: MSS_9157-2 kaṣāyasaṅgau vidhunanti tena cāritravanto munayaḥ sadāpi //
analyzed: kaṣāya saṅgau vidhunanti tena cāritravantaḥ munayaḥ sadā api

original: MSS_9157A-1 kaṣāyān śatruvat paśyed viṣayān viṣavat tathā /
analyzed: kaṣāyān śatru vat paśyet viṣayān viṣa vat tathā

original: MSS_9157A-2 mohaṃ ca paramaṃ vyādhim evamūcurvicakṣaṇāḥ //
analyzed: moham ca paramam vyādhim evam ūcuḥ vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: MSS_9157B-1 kaṣāyā viṣayā yogāḥ pramādāviratī tathā /
analyzed: kaṣāyāḥ viṣayāḥ yogāḥ pramāda aviratī tathā

original: MSS_9157B-2 mithyātvamārtaraudre cety aśubhaṃ prati hetavaḥ //
analyzed: mithyātvam ārta raudre ca iti aśubham prati hetavaḥ

original: MSS_9157C-1 kaṣāyāstannihantavyās tathā tatsahacāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: kaṣāyāḥ tad nihantavyāḥ tathā tad sahacāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_9157C-2 nokaṣāyāḥ śivaddhārā galībhūtā mumukṣubhiḥ //
analyzed: nokaṣāyāḥ śivat dhārāḥ galībhūtāḥ mumukṣubhiḥ

original: MSS_9158-1 kaṣāyairupavāsaiśca kṛtāmullāghatāṃ nṛṇām /
analyzed: kaṣāyaiḥ upavāsaiḥ ca kṛtām ullāgha tām nṛṇām

original: MSS_9158-2 nijauṣadhakṛtāṃ vaidyo nivedya harate dhanam //
analyzed: nija auṣadha kṛtām vaidyaḥ nivedya harate dhanam

original: MSS_9159-1 kaṣṭaṃ karmeti durmedhāḥ kartavyād vinivartate /
analyzed: kaṣṭam karma iti durmedhāḥ kartavyāt vinivartate

original: MSS_9159-2 na sāhasamanārabhya śreyaḥ samupalabhyate //
analyzed: na sāhasam an ārabhya śreyaḥ samupalabhyate

original: MSS_9160-1 kaṣṭaṃ khalu mūrkhatvaṃ kaṣṭaṃ khalu yauvane ca dāridryam /
analyzed: kaṣṭam khalu mūrkha tvam kaṣṭam khalu yauvane ca dāridryam

original: MSS_9160-2 kaṣṭādapi kaṣṭataraṃ paragṛhavāsaḥ pravāsaśca //
analyzed: kaṣṭāt api kaṣṭataram para gṛha vāsaḥ pravāsaḥ ca

original: MSS_9161-1 kaṣṭaṃ ca khalu mūrkhatvaṃ kaṣṭaṃ ca khalu yauvanam /
analyzed: kaṣṭam ca khalu mūrkha tvam kaṣṭam ca khalu yauvanam

original: MSS_9161-2 kaṣṭāt kaṣṭataraṃ caiva paragehanivāsanam //
analyzed: kaṣṭāt kaṣṭataram ca eva para geha nivāsanam

original: MSS_9162-1 kaṣṭaṃ jīvati gaṇako gaṇikā kathakaśca sevako vaidyaḥ /
analyzed: kaṣṭam jīvati gaṇakaḥ gaṇikā kathakaḥ ca sevakaḥ vaidyaḥ

original: MSS_9162-2 divase divase maraṇaṃ parajanamanarañjanī vṛttiḥ //
analyzed: divase divase maraṇam para jana mana rañjanī vṛttiḥ

original: MSS_9163-1 kaṣṭaṃ naiva paristhite samudiyāt kāryeṣu no jātucit saṃjāyeta na cāpi tadvyatikarād bāhyādakiṃcitkarāt /
analyzed: kaṣṭam nā eva paristhite samudiyāt kāryeṣu no jātucit saṃjāyeta na ca api tad vyatikarāt bāhyāt akiṃcitkarāt

original: MSS_9163-2 kasmāccit khalu bhāvato'ntarabhavāt tvasmākamutpadyate prāṇasyaiva viśeṣato'ntaraśayād bhāvāt samujjṛmbhate //
analyzed: kasmāccid khalu bhāvatas ntara bhavāt tu asmākam utpadyate prāṇasya eva viśeṣatas ntara śayāt bhāvāt samujjṛmbhate

original: MSS_9164-1 kaṣṭaṃ vane nivasato'tra sadā narasya no kevalaṃ nijatanuprabhavaṃ bhavec ca /
analyzed: kaṣṭam vane nivasataḥ utra sadā narasya no kevalam nija tanu prabhavam bhavet ca

original: MSS_9164-2 daivaṃ ca pitryamakhilaṃ na vibhāti kṛtyaṃ tasmād gṛhe nivasatātmahitaṃ pracintyam //
analyzed: daivam ca pitryam akhilam na vibhāti kṛtyam tasmāt gṛhe nivasata ātma hitam pracintyam

original: MSS_9165-1 kaṣṭaṃ sāhasakāriṇi tava nayanārdhena so'dhvani spṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: kaṣṭam sāhasa kāriṇi tava nayana ardhena sa udhvani spṛṣṭaḥ

original: MSS_9165-2 upavītādapi vidito na dvijadehas tapasvī te //
analyzed: upavītāt api viditaḥ na dvija dehaḥ tapasvī te

original: MSS_9166-1 kaṣṭaṃ hṛdi jvalati śokamayo mamāgnis te cakṣuṣī ca virahajvarajāgaruke /
analyzed: kaṣṭam hṛdi jvalati śoka mayaḥ mama agniḥ te cakṣuṣī ca viraha jvara jāgaruke

original: MSS_9166-2 etanmano bhramati viṣvagasūṃs tathāpi tvaṃ paśyatohara iva smara hartukāmaḥ //
analyzed: etat manaḥ bhramati tathā api tvam paśyatoharaḥ iva smara hartu kāmaḥ

original: MSS_9167-1 kaṣṭā vṛttiḥ parādhīnā kaṣṭo vāso nirāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: kaṣṭā vṛttiḥ para adhīnā kaṣṭaḥ vāsaḥ nirāśrayaḥ

original: MSS_9167-2 nirdhano vyavasāyaśca sarvakaṣṭā daridratā //
analyzed: nirdhanaḥ vyavasāyaḥ ca sarva kaṣṭā daridra tā

original: MSS_9168-1 kaṣṭā vedhavyathā kaṣṭo nityaṃ ca vahanaklamaḥ /
analyzed: kaṣṭā vedha vyathā kaṣṭaḥ nityam ca vahana klamaḥ

original: MSS_9168-2 śravaṇānāmalaṃkāraḥ kapolasya tu kuṇḍalam //
analyzed: śravaṇānām alaṃkāraḥ kapolasya tu kuṇḍalam

original: MSS_9169-1 kaṣṭe nopārjitaṃ vittaṃ helayā kvāpi nirgatam /
analyzed: kaṣṭe na upārjitam vittam helayā kvāpi nirgatam

original: MSS_9169-2 kiṃ karomi kva gacchāmi nirbhāgyo'haṃ bhuvastale //
analyzed: kim karomi kva gacchāmi nirbhāgyā uham bhuvaḥ tale

original: MSS_9170-1 kaṣṭo janaḥ kuladhanairanurañjanīyas tanno yaduktamaśivaṃ na hi tat kṣamaṃ te /
analyzed: kaṣṭaḥ janaḥ kula dhanaiḥ anurañjanīyaḥ tat naḥ yat uktam aśivam na hi tat kṣamam te

original: MSS_9170-2 naisargikī surabhiṇaḥ kusumasya siddhā mūrdhni sthitirna caraṇairavatāḍanāni //
analyzed: naisargikī surabhiṇaḥ kusumasya siddhā mūrdhni sthitiḥ na caraṇaiḥ avatāḍanāni

original: MSS_9170A-1 kaṣṭopārjitamatra vittamkhilaṃ dyūte mayā yojitaṃ vidyā kaṣṭataraṃ guroradhigatā vyāpāritā kustutau /
analyzed: kaṣṭa upārjitam atra vittam khilam dyūte mayā yojitam vidyā kaṣṭataram guroḥ adhigatā vyāpāritā kustutau

original: MSS_9170A-2 pāramparyasamāgatā ca vinayo vāmekṣaṇāyāṃ kṛtaḥ satpātre kimahaṃ karomi vivaśaḥ kāle'dya nedīyasi //
analyzed: pāramparya samāgatā ca vinayaḥ vāma īkṣaṇāyām kṛtaḥ sat pātre kim aham karomi vivaśaḥ kāledya nedīyasi

original: MSS_9171-1 kastasya jīvitārthaḥ sati vibhave kaśca tasya puruṣārthaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tasya jīvita arthaḥ sati vibhave kaḥ ca tasya puruṣa arthaḥ

original: MSS_9171-2 yo'rthinamabhimukhamāgatam anabhimukhaḥ san visarjayati //
analyzed: yorthinam abhimukham āgatam an abhimukhaḥ san visarjayati

original: MSS_9172-1 kastāṃ nindati lumpati kaḥ smaraphalakasya barṇakaṃ mugdhaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tām nindati lumpati kaḥ smara phalakasya mugdhaḥ

original: MSS_9172-2 ko bhavati ratnakaṇṭakam amṛte kasyārucirudeti //
analyzed: kaḥ bhavati ratna kaṇṭakam amṛte kasya aruciḥ udeti

original: MSS_9173-1 kastāvad balikarṇabhārgavamahādānapramāṇastavaḥ kaścāsau kurupāṇḍapāṇḍurayaśaḥ prastāvanāvistaraḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tāvat balikarṇa bhārgava mahā dāna pramāṇa stavaḥ kaḥ ca asau kuru pāṇḍa pāṇḍura yaśaḥ prastāvanā vistaraḥ

original: MSS_9173-2 yāvad varṣati vīrasiṃhatanayo vṛṣṭīrimāḥ kāñcanīr dhārāḥ prāvṛṣi tāvadañjanarucirdhārā na dhārādharaḥ //
analyzed: yāvat varṣati vīrasiṃha tanayaḥ vṛṣṭīḥ imāḥ kāñcanīḥ dhārāḥ prāvṛṣi tāvat añjana ruciḥ dhārāḥ na dhārādharaḥ

original: MSS_9174-1 kastūrikāṃ tṛṇabhujāmaṭavīmṛgāṇāṃ nikṣipya nābhiṣu cakāra ca tān vadhārhān /
analyzed: kastūrikām tṛṇabhujām aṭavī mṛgāṇām nikṣipya nābhiṣu cakāra ca tān vadha arhān

original: MSS_9174-2 mūḍho vidhiḥ sakaladurjanalolajihvā- mūle sma nikṣipati cet sakalopakāraḥ //
analyzed: mūḍhaḥ vidhiḥ sakala durjana lola jihvā mūle sma nikṣipati ced sakala upakāraḥ

original: MSS_9175-1 kastūrikāṃ hariṇa muñca vanopakaṇṭhaṃ mā saurabheṇa kakubhaḥ surabhīkuruṣva /
analyzed: kastūrikām hariṇa muñca vana upakaṇṭham mā saurabheṇa kakubhaḥ surabhīkuruṣva

original: MSS_9175-2 āstāṃ yaśo nanu kirātaśarābhighātāt trātāpi hanta bhavitā bhavato durāpaḥ //
analyzed: āstām yaśaḥ nanu kirāta śara abhighātāt trātā api hanta bhavitā bhavataḥ durāpaḥ

original: MSS_9176-1 kastūrikācandanakuṅkumāni saubhāgyacihnāni vilāsinīnām /
analyzed: kastūrikā candana kuṅkumāni saubhāgya cihnāni vilāsinīnām

original: MSS_9176-2 prayāgamṛtsnātilakakriyaiva saubhāgyacihnaṃ vidhavālalāṭe //
analyzed: prayāga mṛtsnā tilaka kriyā eva saubhāgya cihnam vidhavā lalāṭe

original: MSS_9177-1 kastūrikātilakamāli vidhāya sāyaṃ smerānanā sapadi śīlaya saudhamaulim /
analyzed: kastūrikā tilaka māli vidhāya sāyam smera ānanā sapadi śīlaya saudha maulim

original: MSS_9177-2 prauḍhiṃ bhajantu kumudāni mudāmudārām ullāsayantu parito harito mukhāni //
analyzed: prauḍhim bhajantu kumudāni mudām udārām ullāsayantu paritas haritaḥ mukhāni

original: MSS_9177A-1 kastūrikādikrayavikrayāṅgāṃ yadṛcchayā yadvipaṇiṃ gatānām /
analyzed: kastūrikā ādi kraya vikraya aṅgām yadṛcchayā yad vipaṇim gatānām

original: MSS_9177A-2 saurabhyamaṅgeṣu samagralagnam na hīyate pañcaṣamapyahāni //
analyzed: saurabhyam aṅgeṣu samagra lagnam na hīyate

original: MSS_9178-1 kastūrikāmṛgāṇām aṇḍād gandhaguṇamakhilamādāya /
analyzed: kastūrikā mṛgāṇām aṇḍāt gandha guṇam akhilam ādāya

original: MSS_9178-2 yadi punarahaṃ vidhiḥ syāṃ khalajihvāyāṃ niveśayiṣyāmi //
analyzed: yadi punar aham vidhiḥ syām khala jihvāyām niveśayiṣyāmi

original: MSS_9179-1 kastūrī jāyate kasmāt ko hanti kariṇāṃ śatam /
analyzed: kastūrī jāyate kasmāt kaḥ hanti kariṇām śatam

original: MSS_9179-2 kiṃ kuryāt kātaro yuddhe mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyanam //
analyzed: kim kuryāt kātaraḥ yuddhe mṛgāt siṃhaḥ palāyanam

original: MSS_9180-1 kastūrīti, kimaṅga,
analyzed: kastūrī iti kim aṅga

original: sāṃparimaladravyaṃ kimapyāmaraṃ peyā kiṃ,
analyzed: sāṃparimala dravyam kim api āmaram peyā kim

original: na hi,
analyzed: na hi

original: kīdṛśī,
analyzed: kīdṛśī

original: mṛgadṛśāṃ śṛṅgāralīlāspadam /
analyzed: mṛga dṛśām śṛṅgāra līlā āspadam

original: MSS_9180-2 dhāryā kutra,
analyzed: dhāryā kutra

original: kucasthalīṣu,
analyzed: kuca sthalīṣu

original: kucayoḥ sthaulyaṃ tato hīyate kliṣṭaḥ kliśyati pakvaṇaiśca bahuśaḥ kastūrikāvikrayī //
analyzed: kucayoḥ sthaulyam tatas hīyate kliṣṭaḥ kliśyati pakvaṇaiḥ ca bahuśas kastūrikā vikrayī

original: MSS_9181-1 kastūrītilakaṃ tasyā janayati śobhāṃ bhruvorantaḥ /
analyzed: kastūrī tilakam tasyāḥ janayati śobhām bhruvoḥ antar

original: MSS_9181-2 kodaṇḍamadhyalagnaṃ phalamiva pañceṣubāṇasya //
analyzed: kodaṇḍa madhya lagnam phalam iva pañca iṣu bāṇasya

original: MSS_9182-1 kastūrītilakaṃ bāle bhāle mā kuru mā kuru /
analyzed: kastūrī tilakam bāle bhāle mā kuru mā kuru

original: MSS_9182-2 adya sāmyaṃ bhajāmīti jṛmbhate śaśalāñchanaḥ //
analyzed: adya sāmyam bhajāmi iti jṛmbhate śaśalāñchanaḥ

original: MSS_9183-1 kastūrītilakaṃ bāle bhāle mā kuru mā kuru /
analyzed: kastūrī tilakam bāle bhāle mā kuru mā kuru

original: MSS_9183-2 kalaṅkaśaṅkayā rāhur grasiṣyati tavānanam //
analyzed: kalaṅka śaṅkayā rāhuḥ grasiṣyati tava ānanam

original: MSS_9184-1 kastūrītilakaṃ lalāṭaphalake vakṣaḥsthale kaustubhaṃ nāsāgre navamauktikaṃ karatale veṇuṃ kare kaṅkaṇam /
analyzed: kastūrī tilakam lalāṭa phalake vakṣaḥ sthale kaustubham nāsā agre nava mauktikam kara tale veṇum kare kaṅkaṇam

original: MSS_9184-2 sarvāṅge haricandanaṃ ca kalayan kaṇṭhe ca muktāvaliṃ gopastrīpariveṣṭato vijayate gopālacūḍāmaṇiḥ //
analyzed: sarva aṅge haricandanam ca kalayan kaṇṭhe ca muktā āvalim gopa strī pariveṣṭataḥ vijayate gopāla cūḍāmaṇiḥ

original: MSS_9185-1 kastūrītilakaṃ lalāṭaracitaṃ nāsāmaṇiṃ nistalaṃ vaktraṃ kuñcitakeśapāśamaniśaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ nisṛṣṭāṃ puraḥ /
analyzed: kastūrī tilakam lalāṭa racitam nāsāmaṇim nistalam vaktram kuñcita keśapāśam aniśam dṛṣṭim nisṛṣṭām puras

original: MSS_9185-2 puṃsāṃ mānasamatsyabandhanavidhau dhatse'tra vatse svayaṃ jambūvajjalabinduvajjalajavajjambālavajjālavat //
analyzed: puṃsām mānasa matsyabandhana vidhau dhatse itra vatse svayam

original: MSS_9186-1 kastūrītilakanti bhālaphalake devyā mukhāmbhoruhe rolambanti tamālabālamukulottaṃsanti mauliṃ prati /
analyzed: bhāla phalake devyāḥ mukha ambhoruhe rolambanti tamāla bāla mukula uttaṃsanti maulim prati

original: MSS_9186-2 yāḥ karṇe vikacotpalanti kucayoraṅke ca kālāguru- sthāsanti prathayantu tās tava śivaṃ śrīkaṇṭhakaṇṭhatviṣaḥ //
analyzed: yāḥ karṇe kucayoḥ aṅke ca kālāguru prathayantu tāḥ tava śivam śrīkaṇṭha kaṇṭha tviṣaḥ

original: MSS_9187-1 kastūrīyanti bhāle tadanu nayanayoḥ kajjalīyanti karṇa- prānte nīlotpalīyantyurasi marakatālaṃkṛtīyanti devyāḥ /
analyzed: kastūrīyanti bhāle tadanu nayanayoḥ kajjalīyanti karṇa prānte nīlotpalīyanti urasi marakatālaṃkṛtīyanti devyāḥ

original: MSS_9187-2 romālīyanti nābherupari harimaṇīmekhalīyanti madhye kalyāṇaṃ kuryurete trijagati purajitkaṇṭhabhāsāṃ vilāsāḥ //
analyzed: romālīyanti nābheḥ upari harimaṇīmekhalīyanti madhye kalyāṇam kuryuḥ ete trijagati purajit kaṇṭha bhāsām vilāsāḥ

original: MSS_9188-1 kastūrīvarapatrabhaṅganikaro bhraṣṭo na gaṇḍasthale no luptaṃ sakhi candanaṃ stanataṭe dhautaṃ na netrāñjanam /
analyzed: kastūrī vara patra bhaṅga nikaraḥ bhraṣṭaḥ na gaṇḍa sthale no luptam sakhi candanam stana taṭe dhautam na netra añjanam

original: MSS_9188-2 rāgo na skhalitas tavādharapuṭe tāmbūlasaṃvardhitaḥ kiṃ ruṣṭāsi gajendramattagamane kiṃ vā śiśus te patiḥ //
analyzed: rāgaḥ na skhalitaḥ tava adhara puṭe tāmbūla saṃvardhitaḥ kim ruṣṭā asi gaja indra matta gamane kim vā śiśuḥ te patiḥ

original: MSS_9189-1 kastūrī sitimānamāgatavatī śauklyaṃ gatāḥ kuntalā nīlaṃ colamabhūt sitaṃ dhavalimā jāto maṇīnāṃ gaṇe /
analyzed: kastūrī sitimānam āgatavatī śauklyam gatāḥ kuntalāḥ nīlam colam abhūt sitam dhavalimā jātaḥ maṇīnām gaṇe

original: MSS_9189-2 dhvāntaṃ śāntamabhūt samaṃ narapate tvatkīrticandrodaye trailokyeṅpyabhisārasāhasarasaḥ śāntaḥ kuraṅgīdṛśām //
analyzed: dhvāntam śāntam abhūt samam narapate tvad kīrti candra udaye trailokya iṅpī abhisāra sāhasa rasaḥ śāntaḥ kuraṅgī dṛśām

original: MSS_9189A-1 kastūryā tatkapoladvayabhuvi makarīnirmitau prastutāyāṃ nirmitsūnāṃ svavakṣasyatiparicayanāt tvatpraśastīrupāṃśu /
analyzed: kastūryā tad kapola dvaya bhuvi makarī nirmitau prastutāyām nirmitsūnām sva vakṣasi ati paricayanāt tvad praśastīḥ upāṃśu

analyzed: vīra śrī siṃha bhūpa tvad ahita kubhujām rājya lakṣmī sapatnī māna vyājena lajjām sapadi vidadhate sva avarodhe pragalbhāḥ

original: MSS_9212-2 svarbhānuṃ viṣamekṣaṇaṃ viṣadharaṃ kākaṃ varākī gṛhe candrānaṅgasamīrakokilabhayād vyagrā likhantī muhuḥ //
analyzed: svarbhānum viṣama īkṣaṇam viṣadharam kākam varākī gṛhe candra anaṅga samīra kokila bhayāt vyagrā likhantī muhur

original: MSS_9213-1 kasmāt tvaṃ hi vikhidyase katipayaireva priye vāsarair āyātā vayamehi dhehi purataḥ prāsthānikaṃ maṅgalam /
analyzed: kasmāt tvam hi vikhidyase katipayaiḥ eva priye vāsaraiḥ āyātāḥ vayam ehi dhehi puratas prāsthānikam maṅgalam

original: MSS_9213-2 evaṃ vādini vallabhe dayitayā niḥśvasya pāṇau kṛtī maṅgalyaḥ kalaśo vilocanapayodhārābhirāpūritaḥ //
analyzed: evam vādini vallabhe dayitayā niḥśvasya pāṇau kṛtī maṅgalyaḥ kalaśaḥ vilocana payaḥ dhārābhiḥ āpūritaḥ

original: MSS_9214-1 kasmāt pārvati niṣṭhurāsi,
analyzed: kasmāt pārvati niṣṭhurā asi

original: sahajaḥ śailodbhavānāmayaṃ niḥsnehāsi kathaṃ,
analyzed: sahajaḥ śailodbhavānām ayam niḥsnehā asi katham

original: na bhasmapuruṣaḥ snehaṃ vibharti kvacit /
analyzed: na bhasma puruṣaḥ sneham vibharti kvacid

original: MSS_9214-2 kopas te mayi niṣphalaḥ priyatame,
analyzed: kopaḥ te mayi niṣphalaḥ priyatame

original: sthāṇau phalaṃ kiṃ bhaved itthaṃ nirvacanīkṛto girijayā śaṃbhuściraṃ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: sthāṇau phalam kim bhavet ittham nirvacanīkṛtaḥ girijayā śaṃbhuḥ ciram pātu vaḥ

original: MSS_9215-1 kasmāt saṃlkiśyate vidvān vyarthayārthehayāsakṛt /
analyzed: kasmāt saṃlkiśyate vidvān

original: MSS_9215-2 kasyacin māyayā nūnaṃ loko'yaṃ suvimohitaḥ //
analyzed: kasyacid māyayā nūnam lokaḥ yam su vimohitaḥ

original: MSS_9216-1 kasmāt satyavatīsutena muninā noktaṃ bhaviṣyatkathā- madhye rūpamanādimadhyanidhanasyehaṃ harermānuṣam /
analyzed: kasmāt satyavatī sutena muninā nā uktam bhaviṣyat kathā madhye rūpam an ādi madhya nidhanasya iham hareḥ mānuṣam

original: MSS_9216-2 itthaṃ vyutthitaviśvakaṇṭakacamūnirmūlanavyāpṛtaṃ saṃgrāmāmbarasūryamambaracarāstvāṃ vīkṣya saṃśerate //
analyzed: ittham vyutthita viśva kaṇṭaka camū nirmūlana vyāpṛtam saṃgrāma ambara sūryam ambaracarāḥ tvām vīkṣya saṃśerate

original: MSS_9217-1 kasmādadya na bhūṣitaṃ vapuridaṃ sadbhūṣaṇaiḥ kāñcanaiḥ kasmādacchatarāṇi nādya vasanānyaṅgīkṛtāni tvayā /
analyzed: kasmāt adya na bhūṣitam vapuḥ idam sat bhūṣaṇaiḥ kāñcanaiḥ kasmāt acchatarāṇi na adya vasanāni aṅgīkṛtāni tvayā

original: MSS_9217-2 uktā seti mayā manojña vijane bālā viśālākṣa mā kṣipraṃ rodanamekameva vidadhe pratyuttaraṃ no dadau //
analyzed: uktā sā iti mayā manojña vijane bālā viśāla akṣa mā kṣipram rodanam ekam eva vidadhe pratyuttaram naḥ dadau

original: MSS_9218-1 kasmādidaṃ nayanamastamitāñjanaśri viśrāntapatraracanau ca kutaḥ kapolau /
analyzed: kasmāt idam nayanam astamita añjana śri viśrānta patra racanau ca kutas kapolau

original: MSS_9218-2 śṛṅgāravāriruhakānanarājahaṃsi kasmāt kṛśāsi virasāsi malīmasāsi //
analyzed: śṛṅgāra vāriruha kānana rājahaṃsi kasmāt kṛśā asi virasā asi malīmasā asi

original: MSS_9219-1 kasmādindurasau dhinoti jagatīṃ pīyūṣagarbhaiḥ karaiḥ kasmād vā jaladhārayaiva dharaṇiṃ dhārādharaḥ siñcati /
analyzed: kasmāt induḥ asau dhinoti jagatīm pīyūṣa garbhaiḥ karaiḥ kasmāt vā jala dhārayā eva dharaṇim dhārādharaḥ siñcati

original: MSS_9219-2 bhrāmaṃ bhrāmamayaṃ ca nandayati vā kasmāt trilokīṃ raviḥ sādhūnāṃ hi paropakārakaraṇe nopādhyapekṣaṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: bhrāmam bhrāma mayam ca nandayati vā kasmāt trilokīm raviḥ sādhūnām hi para upakāra karaṇe na upādhi apekṣam manaḥ

original: MSS_9220-1 kasmād dūti śvasiṣi nibhṛtaṃ,
analyzed: kasmāt dūti śvasiṣi nibhṛtam

original: satvarāvartanena bhraṣṭo rāgaḥ kimadharadale,
analyzed: satvara āvartanena bhraṣṭaḥ rāgaḥ kim adhara dale

original: prārthanābhistvadartham /
analyzed: prārthanābhiḥ tvad artham

original: MSS_9220-2 srastā ceyaṃ kimalakatatis,
analyzed: srastā ca iyam kimalaka tatiḥ

original: tatpadāluṇṭhanena vāsas tasya tvayi vada kathaṃ,
analyzed: tad pada āluṇṭhanena vāsaḥ tasya tvayi vada katham

original: pratyayārthaṃ tavaiva //
analyzed: pratyaya artham tava eva

original: MSS_9221-1 kasmād bhagnāḥ sumukhi valayā,
analyzed: kasmāt bhagnāḥ su mukhi valayā

original: mārgapātānniśāyāṃ kiṃ te vaktraṃ vigataracanaṃ,
analyzed: mārga pātāt niśāyām kim te vaktram vigata racanam

original: kṣālitaṃ dhūlipūrṇam /
analyzed: kṣālitam dhūli pūrṇam

original: MSS_9221-2 oṣṭhe rāgaḥ kimapi galita,
analyzed: oṣṭhe rāgaḥ kim api

original: stvadvyathocchvāsavātais tadvāsaḥ kiṃ,
analyzed: s tvad vyathā ucchvāsa vātaiḥ tad vāsaḥ kim

original: hṛtamiti mayā vastralobhāt kileti //
analyzed: hṛtam iti mayā vastra lobhāt kila iti

original: MSS_9222-1 kasmād bhayamiha maraṇād andhādapi ko viśiṣyate rāgī /
analyzed: kasmāt bhayam iha maraṇāt andhāt api kaḥ viśiṣyate rāgī

original: MSS_9222-2 kaḥ śūro yo lalanā- locanabāṇairna vivyathitaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ śūraḥ yaḥ lalanāḥ locana bāṇaiḥ na vivyathitaḥ

original: MSS_9223-1 kasmiñchete murāriḥ kva na khalu vasatirvāyasī ko niṣedhaḥ strīṇāṃ rāgas tu kasmin kva nu khalu sitimā śairisaṃbodhanaṃ kim /
analyzed: kasmin śete murāriḥ kva na khalu vasatiḥ vāyasī kaḥ niṣedhaḥ strīṇām rāgaḥ tu kasmin kva nu khalu sitimā śairi saṃbodhanam kim

original: MSS_9223-2 saṃbuddhiḥ kā'himāṃśorvidhiharavayasāṃ cāpi saṃbuddhayaḥ kā brūte lubdhaḥ kathaṃ vā kurukulahananaṃ kena tat keśavena //
analyzed: saṃbuddhiḥ kā himāṃśoḥ vidhi hara vayasām ca api saṃbuddhayaḥ kā brūte lubdhaḥ katham vā kuru kula hananam kena tat keśavena

original: MSS_9224-1 kasmān mlāyasi mālatīva mṛditetyālījane pṛcchati vyaktaṃ noditamārtayāpi virahe śālīnayā bālayā /
analyzed: kasmāt mlāyasi mālatī iva mṛditā iti ālī jane pṛcchati vyaktam na uditam ārtayā api virahe śālīnayā bālayā

original: MSS_9224-2 akṣṇorbāṣpacayaṃ nigṛhya kathamapyālokitaḥ kevalaṃ kiṃcitkuḍmalakoṭibhinnaśikharaścūtadrumaḥ prāṅgaṇe //
analyzed: akṣṇoḥ bāṣpa cayam nigṛhya katham api ālokitaḥ kevalam kiṃcid kuḍmala koṭi bhinna śikharaḥ cūta drumaḥ prāṅgaṇe

original: MSS_9225-1 kasmin karmaṇi sāmarthyam asya nottapatetarām /
analyzed: kasmin karmaṇi sāmarthyam asya na uttapatetarām

original: MSS_9225-2 ayaṃ sādhucaras tasmād añjalirbadhyatāmiha //
analyzed: ayam sādhu caraḥ tasmāt añjaliḥ badhyatām iha

original: MSS_9226-1 kasminnapi mate satye hatāḥ sarvamatatyajaḥ /
analyzed: kasmin api mate satye hatāḥ sarva mata tyajaḥ

original: MSS_9226-2 taddṛṣṭyā vyarthatāmātram anarthastu na dharmajaḥ //
analyzed: tad dṛṣṭyā vyartha tā mātram anarthaḥ tu na dharma jaḥ

original: MSS_9227-1 kasmin vasanti vada mīnagaṇā vikalpaṃ kiṃ vāpadaṃ vadati kiṃ kurute vivasvān /
analyzed: kasmin vasanti vada mīna gaṇāḥ vikalpam kim vā āpadam vadati kim kurute vivasvān

original: MSS_9227-2 vidyullatāvalayavān pathikāṅganānām udvejako bhavati kaḥ khalu vārivāhaḥ //
analyzed: vidyut latā valayavān pathika aṅganānām udvejakaḥ bhavati kaḥ khalu vārivāhaḥ

original: MSS_9228-1 kasmin svapiti kaṃsāriḥ kāvṛttiradhamā nṛṇām /
analyzed: kasmin svapiti kaṃsāriḥ kā āvṛttiḥ adhamā nṛṇām

original: MSS_9228-2 kiṃ brūte pitaraṃ bālaḥ kiṃ dṛṣṭvā ramate manaḥ //
analyzed: kim brūte pitaram bālaḥ kim dṛṣṭvā ramate manaḥ

original: MSS_9229-1 kasmai kiṃ kathanīyaṃ kasya manaḥpratyayo bhavati /
analyzed: kasmai kim kathanīyam kasya manaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati

original: MSS_9229-2 ramayati gopavadhūṭī kuñjakuṭīre paraṃ brahma //
analyzed: ramayati gopa vadhūṭī kuñja kuṭīre param brahma

original: MSS_9230-1 kasmaicit kapaṭāya kaiṭabharipūraḥpīṭhadīrghālayāṃ devi tvāmabhivādya kupyasi na cet tat kiṃcidācakṣmahe /
analyzed: kasmaicid kapaṭāya kaiṭabhari pūraḥ pīṭha dīrgha ālayām devi tvām abhivādya kupyasi na ced tat kiṃcid ācakṣmahe

original: MSS_9230-2 yat te mandiramambujanma kimidaṃ vidyāgṛhaṃ yac ca te nīcānnīcataropasarpaṇamapāmetat kimācāryakam //
analyzed: yat te mandiram ambujanma kim idam vidyā gṛham yat ca te nīcāt nīcatara upasarpaṇam apām etat kim ācāryakam

original: MSS_9230A-1 kasmaicit pratipādya vikramajitāṃ viprāya viśvaṃbharām abdhau vaibhavalabdhavāsarasikaḥ kṣemāya rāmo'stu vaḥ /
analyzed: kasmaicid pratipādya vikramajitām viprāya viśvaṃbharām abdhau vaibhava labdha vāsa rasikaḥ kṣemāya rāmaḥ astu vaḥ

original: MSS_9230A-2 ślāghante raṇasīmni yasya caritaṃ kālāgnikūlaṃkaṣa- jvālodgārikuṭhārakukṣinihitakṣmāpālacakrā n janān //
analyzed: ślāghante raṇa sīmni yasya caritam kālāgni kūlaṃkaṣa jvālā udgāri kuṭhāra kukṣi nihita kṣmāpāla cakrān janān

original: MSS_9231-1 kasmaicid dvijabandhave kiyadapi kṣīraṃ purā nāthate datto yena dayārasaikavapuṣā dugdhoda evārṇavaḥ /
analyzed: kasmaicid dvija bandhave kiyat api kṣīram purā nāthate dattaḥ yena dayā rasa eka vapuṣā dugdhodaḥ eva arṇavaḥ

original: MSS_9231-2 śrīśrīvallabhakalpapādapasudhācintāmaṇīb hiḥ samaṃ sa svāmī mama daivataṃ taditaro nāmnāpi nāmnāyate //
MSS_9232-1 kasmai namaḥ surairapi sutarāṃ kriyate dayāpradhānāya /
analyzed: kasmai namaḥ suraiḥ api sutarām kriyate dayā pradhānāya

original: MSS_9232-2 kasmādudvijitavyaṃ saṃsārāraṇyataḥ sudhiyā //
analyzed: kasmāt udvijitavyam saṃsāra araṇyataḥ su dhiyā

original: MSS_9233-1 kasmai yacchati sajjano bahudhanaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ kṣagat kena vā śambhorbhāni ca ko gale yuvatibhirveṇyāṃ ca kā dhāryate /
analyzed: kasmai yacchati sat janaḥ bahu dhanam sṛṣṭam kṣagat kena vā śambhoḥ bhāni ca kaḥ gale yuvatibhiḥ veṇyām ca kā dhāryate

original: MSS_9233-2 gaurīśaḥ kamatāḍayaccaraṇataḥ kā rakṣitā rākṣasair ārohādavarohataḥ kalayatāmekaṃ dvayoruttaram //
analyzed: gaurīśaḥ kam atāḍayat caraṇataḥ kā rakṣitā rākṣasaiḥ ārohāt avarohataḥ kalayatām ekam dvayoḥ uttaram

original: MSS_9234-1 kasmai hanta phalāya sajjana guṇagrāmārjane sajjasi svātmopaskaraṇāya cen mama vacaḥ pathyaṃ samākarṇaya /
analyzed: kasmai hanta phalāya sat jana guṇa grāma arjane sajjasi sva ātma upaskaraṇāya ced mama vacaḥ pathyam samākarṇaya

original: MSS_9234-2 ye bhāvā hṛdayaṃ haranti nitarāṃ śobhābharaiḥ saṃbhṛtās tairevāsya kaleḥ kalevarapuṣo dainaṃdinaṃ vartanam //
analyzed: ye bhāvāḥ hṛdayam haranti nitarām śobhā bharaiḥ saṃbhṛtāḥ taiḥ eva asya kaleḥ kalevara puṣaḥ vartanam

original: MSS_9235-1 kasya karānna skhalitā nīranidhikledapicchilā lakṣmīḥ /
analyzed: kasya karāt na skhalitā nīranidhi kleda picchilā lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_9235-2 bhṛgucaraṇadhūliparuṣe hṛdi paribaddhā hareḥ sthireyamabhūt //
analyzed: bhṛgu caraṇa dhūli paruṣe hṛdi paribaddhā hareḥ sthirā iyam abhūt

original: MSS_9236-1 kasyacij jāyate jantoḥ pādāghātas tavādhvani /
analyzed: kasyacid jāyate jantoḥ pādāghātaḥ tava adhvani

original: MSS_9236-2 padabhaṅgavyathā śambho jṛmbhate jambhavairiṇaḥ //
analyzed: pada bhaṅga vyathā śambho jṛmbhate jambha vairiṇaḥ

original: MSS_9237-1 kasyacit kimapi no haraṇīyaṃ marmavākyamapi noccaraṇīyam /
analyzed: kasyacid kim api naḥ haraṇīyam marma vākyam api nā uccaraṇīyam

original: MSS_9237-2 śrīpateḥ padayugaṃ smaraṇīyaṃ līlayā bhavajalaṃ taraṇīyam //
analyzed: śrīpateḥ pada yugam smaraṇīyam līlayā bhava jalam taraṇīyam

original: MSS_9238-1 kasyacit samadanaṃ madanīya- preyasīvadanapānaparasya /
analyzed: kasyacid sa madanam madanīya preyasī vadana pāna parasya

original: MSS_9238-2 svāditaḥ sakṛdivāsava eva pratyuta kṣaṇavidaṃśapade'bhūt //
analyzed: svāditaḥ sakṛt iva āsavaḥ eva pratyuta kṣaṇa vidaṃśa padebhūt

original: MSS_9239-1 kasyacinna hi durbuddheś chandato jāyate matiḥ /
analyzed: kasyacid na hi durbuddheḥ chandataḥ jāyate matiḥ

original: MSS_9239-2 yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ phalamaśnute //
analyzed: yādṛśam kurute karma tādṛśam phalam aśnute

original: MSS_9240-1 kasya tṛṣaṃ na kṣapayasi pibati na kastava payaḥ praviśyāntaḥ /
analyzed: kasya tṛṣam na kṣapayasi pibati na kaḥ tava payaḥ praviśya antar

original: MSS_9240-2 yadi sanmārgasarovara nakrī na kroḍamadhivasati //
analyzed: yadi sat mārga sarovara nakrī na kroḍam adhivasati

original: MSS_9241-1 kasya doṣaḥ kule nāsti vyādhinā ko na pīḍitaḥ /
analyzed: kasya doṣaḥ kule nā asti vyādhinā kaḥ na pīḍitaḥ

original: MSS_9241-2 vyasanaṃ kena na prāptaṃ kasya saukhyaṃ nirantaram //
analyzed: vyasanam kena na prāptam kasya saukhyam nirantaram

original: MSS_9242-1 kasya na dayitaṃ vittaṃ cittaṃ hriyate na kasya vittena /
analyzed: kasya na dayitam vittam cittam hriyate na kasya vittena

original: MSS_9242-2 kiṃ tu yaśodhanalubdhā vāñchanti na duṣkṛtairarthān //
analyzed: kim tu yaśaḥ dhana lubdhāḥ vāñchanti na duṣkṛtaiḥ arthān

original: MSS_9243-1 kasya na pratihataṃ bata cakṣur dhvāntasantatibhiraḍḍamarābhiḥ /
analyzed: kasya na pratihatam bata cakṣuḥ dhvānta santatibhiḥ aḍḍamarābhiḥ

original: MSS_9243-2 kevalaṃ manasijapratihatānāṃ nāvadhūtamabhisāravadhūnām //
analyzed: kevalam manasija pratihatānām na avadhūtam abhisāra vadhūnām

original: MSS_9244-1 kasya na vāhanayogyā mugdhadhiyas tucchasādhane lagnāḥ /
analyzed: kasya na vāhana yogyāḥ mugdha dhiyaḥ tuccha sādhane lagnāḥ

original: MSS_9244-2 prītatayā praśamarucaś capalāsu strīṣu ye'dāntāḥ //
analyzed: prīta tayā praśama rucaḥ capalāsu strīṣu

original: MSS_9245-1 kasya no kurute mugdhe pipāsākulitaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: kasya no kurute mugdhe pipāsā ākulitam manaḥ

original: MSS_9245-2 ayaṃ te vidrumacchāyo marumārga ivādharaḥ //
analyzed: ayam te vidruma chāyaḥ maru mārgaḥ iva adharaḥ

original: MSS_9246-1 kasya marau duradhigamaḥ kamale kaḥ kathaya viracitāvāsaḥ /
analyzed: kasya marau duradhigamaḥ kamale kaḥ kathaya viracita āvāsaḥ

original: MSS_9246-2 kaistuṣyati cāmuṇḍā ripavaste vada kuto bhraṣṭāḥ //
analyzed: kaiḥ tuṣyati cāmuṇḍāḥ ripavaḥ te vada kutas bhraṣṭāḥ

original: MSS_9247-1 kasya mātā kasya pitā kasya bandhurmahāmune /
analyzed: kasya mātā kasya pitā kasya bandhuḥ mahā mune

original: MSS_9247-2 vibhramaś ca smṛtibhraṃśāt tena muhyanti jantavaḥ //
analyzed: vibhramaḥ ca smṛti bhraṃśāt tena muhyanti jantavaḥ

original: MSS_9248-1 kasya mātā pitā kasya kasya bhāryā suto'pi vā /
analyzed: kasya mātā pitā kasya kasya bhāryā sutaḥ api vā

original: MSS_9248-2 jātau jātau hi jīvānāṃ bhaviṣyantyapare'pare //
analyzed: jātau jātau hi jīvānām bhaviṣyanti apare pare

original: MSS_9248A-1 kasya vaktavyatā nāsti sopāyaṃ ko na jīvati /
analyzed: kasya vaktavyatā nā asti sa upāyam kaḥ na jīvati

original: MSS_9248A-2 vyasanaṃ kena na prāptaṃ kasya saukhyaṃ nirantaram //
analyzed: vyasanam kena na prāptam kasya saukhyam nirantaram

original: MSS_9249-1 kasya vaśe prāṇigaṇaḥ satyapriyabhāṣiṇo vinītasya /
analyzed: kasya vaśe prāṇi gaṇaḥ satya priya bhāṣiṇaḥ vinītasya

original: MSS_9249-2 kva sthātavyaṃ nyāyye pathi dṛṣṭādṛṣṭalābhāya //
analyzed: kva sthātavyam nyāyye pathi dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa lābhāya

original: MSS_9249A-1 kasya syānna skhalitaṃ pūrṇāḥ sarve manorathāḥ kasya /
analyzed: kasya syāt na skhalitam pūrṇāḥ sarve manorathāḥ kasya

original: MSS_9249A-2 kasyeha sukhaṃ nityaṃ daivena na khaṇḍitaḥ ko vā //
analyzed: kasya iha sukham nityam daivena na khaṇḍitaḥ kaḥ vā

original: MSS_9250-1 kasya svargaśriyo vaśyāḥ kasya caindraṃ padaṃ bhuvi /
analyzed: kasya svarga śriyaḥ vaśyāḥ kasya ca aindram padam bhuvi

original: MSS_9250-2 kaṃ devā bahu manyante saṅgrāme maraṇādṛte //
analyzed: kam devāḥ bahu manyante saṅgrāme maraṇāt ṛte

original: MSS_9251-1 saṅgrāme maraṇaṃ puṇyaṃ gayāyāṃ maraṇe tathā /
analyzed: saṅgrāme maraṇam puṇyam gayāyām maraṇe tathā

original: MSS_9251-2 gaṅgāyāṃ maraṇe mokṣaḥ saṅgrāme maraṇaṃ sukham //
analyzed: gaṅgāyām maraṇe mokṣaḥ saṅgrāme maraṇam sukham

original: MSS_9252-1 yadi vastuṃ manaḥ puṃsāṃ svargastrībhiḥ samaṃ cirāt /
analyzed: yadi vastum manaḥ puṃsām svarga strībhiḥ samam cirāt

original: MSS_9252-2 aparāṃ sukhitāṃ kṛtvā saṅgrāme mriyatāṃ tadā //
analyzed: aparām sukhitām kṛtvā saṅgrāme mriyatām tadā

original: MSS_9253-1 kasyāṃcid vāci kaiścinnanu yadi vihitaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ durdurūḍhaiś chinnaṃ kiṃ nastadā syāt prathitaguṇavatāṃ kāvyakoṭīśvarāṇām /
analyzed: kasyāṃcid vāci kaiścid nanu yadi vihitam dūṣaṇam chinnam kim naḥ tadā syāt prathita guṇavatām kāvya koṭīśvarāṇām

original: MSS_9253-2 vāhāśced gandhavāhādhikavihitajavāḥ pañcaṣāścāndhakhaṃjāḥ kā hāniḥ śeraśāhakṣitipakulamaṇeraśvakoṭīśvarasya //
analyzed: vāhāḥ ced gandhavāha adhika vihita javāḥ pañcaṣāḥ ca andhakhaṃjāḥ kā hāniḥ śeraśāha kṣitipa kula maṇeḥ aśva koṭi īśvarasya

original: MSS_9254-1 kasyākhyāya vyatikaramimaṃ muktaduḥkho bhaveyaṃ ko jānīte nibhṛtamubhayorāvayoḥ snehasāram /
analyzed: kasya ākhyāya vyatikaram imam mukta duḥkhaḥ bhaveyam kaḥ jānīte nibhṛtam ubhayoḥ āvayoḥ sneha sāram

original: MSS_9254-2 jānātyekaṃ śaśadharamukhi prematattvaṃ mano me tvāmevaitacciramanugataṃ tat priye kiṃ karomi //
analyzed: jānāti ekam śaśadhara mukhi prema tattvam manaḥ me tvām eva etat ciram anugatam tat priye kim karomi

original: MSS_9255-2 kasyātyantaṃ sukhamupanataṃ duḥkhamekāntato vā /
analyzed: kasya atyantam sukham upanatam duḥkham ekāntataḥ vā

original: MSS_9255-3 nīcair gacchatyupari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa //
analyzed: nīcais gacchati upari ca daśā cakra nemi krameṇa

original: MSS_9256-1 kasyādeśāt kṣapayati tamaḥ saptasaptiḥ prajānāṃ chāyāhetoḥ pathi viṭapināmañjaliḥ kena baddhaḥ /
analyzed: kasya ādeśāt kṣapayati tamaḥ saptasaptiḥ prajānām chāyā hetoḥ pathi viṭapinām añjaliḥ kena baddhaḥ

original: MSS_9256-2 abhyarthyante navajalamucaḥ kena vā vṛṣṭihetor jātyaivaite parahitavidhī sādhavo baddhakāṅkṣāḥ //
analyzed: abhyarthyante nava jala mucaḥ kena vā vṛṣṭi hetoḥ jātyā eva ete para hita vidhī sādhavaḥ baddha kāṅkṣāḥ

original: MSS_9257-1 kasyā nāma kimatra nāsti viditaṃ yad vīkṣyamāṇo'pyayaṃ loko mūka ivāsti māṃ prati punaḥ sarvo janas tapyate /
analyzed: kasyāḥ nāma kim atra na asti viditam yat vīkṣyamāṇaḥ api ayam lokaḥ mūkaḥ iva asti mām prati punar sarvaḥ janaḥ tapyate

original: MSS_9257-2 śakyaṃ darśayituṃ na pūgaphalavat kṛtvā dvidhedaṃ vapur yat satyaṃ sakhi vīkṣitaḥ khalu mayā nūnaṃ caturthyāḥ śaśī //
analyzed: śakyam darśayitum na pūga phala vat kṛtvā dvidhā idam vapuḥ yat satyam sakhi vīkṣitaḥ khalu mayā nūnam caturthyāḥ śaśī

original: MSS_9258-1 kasyānityeṣvanityasya sneho bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: kasya anityeṣu anityasya snehaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: MSS_9258-2 yena janmasahasrāṇi draṣṭavyo na punaḥ priyaḥ //
analyzed: yena janma sahasrāṇi draṣṭavyaḥ na punar priyaḥ

original: MSS_9259-1 kasyānimeṣavitate nayane divauko- lokādṛte jagati te api vai gṛhītvā /
analyzed: kasya a nimeṣa vitate nayane divaukaḥ lokāt ṛte jagati te api vai gṛhītvā

original: MSS_9259-2 piṇḍe prasāritamukhena time kimetad dṛṣṭaṃ na bāliśa viśadbaḍiśaṃ tvayāntaḥ //
analyzed: piṇḍe prasārita mukhena time kim etat dṛṣṭam na bāliśa viśat baḍiśam tvayā antar

original: MSS_9260-1 kasyāpi ko'pi kurute na sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na daivamapahāya /
analyzed: kasya api kaḥ api kurute na sukham duḥkham na daivam apahāya

original: MSS_9260-2 vidadhāti vṛthā garvaṃ khalo'hamahitasya hanteti //
analyzed: vidadhāti vṛthā garvam kha loha mahitasya hantā iti

original: MSS_9261-1 kasyāpi ko'pyatiśayo'sti sa tena loke khyātiṃ prayāti na hi sarvavidas tu sarve /
analyzed: kasya api kaḥ pi atiśayaḥ usti sa tena loke khyātim prayāti na hi sarva vidaḥ tu sarve

original: MSS_9261-2 kiṃ ketakī phalati kiṃ panasaḥ supuṣpaḥ kiṃ nāgavallyapi ca puṣpaphalairupetā //
analyzed: kim ketakī phalati kim panasaḥ su puṣpaḥ kim nāgavallī api ca puṣpa phalaiḥ upetā

original: MSS_9261A-1 kasyāpi cāgrato naiva prakāśyaḥ svaguṇaḥ svayam /
analyzed: kasya api ca agratas nā eva prakāśyaḥ sva guṇaḥ svayam

original: MSS_9261A-2 atucchatvena tuccho'pi vācyaḥ paraguṇaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: a tuccha tvena tucchaḥ api vācyaḥ para guṇaḥ punar

original: MSS_9262-1 kasyāmodaṃ kamalaṃ vadanamidaṃ te priye na saṃtanuyāt /
analyzed: kasya āmodam kamalam vadanam idam te priye na saṃtanuyāt

original: MSS_9262-2 avalambya mitramekaṃ vikasati na yadanyathā jātu //
analyzed: avalambya mitram ekam vikasati na yat anyathā jātu

original: MSS_9263-1 kasyāścit subhaga iti śrutaściraṃ yas taṃ dṛṣṭvādhigataraternimīlitākṣyāḥ /
analyzed: kasyāścid subhagaḥ iti śrutaḥ ciram yaḥ tam dṛṣṭvā adhigata rateḥ nimīlita akṣyāḥ

original: MSS_9263-2 nispandaṃ vapuravalokya sauvidallāḥ santepurvidhuradhiyo niśāntavadhvāḥ //
analyzed: nispandam vapuḥ avalokya sauvidallāḥ santepuḥ vidhura dhiyaḥ niśānta vadhvāḥ

original: MSS_9264-1 kasyāścin mukhamanu dhautapatralekhaṃ vyātene salilabharāvalambinībhiḥ /
analyzed: kasyāścid mukham anu dhauta patra lekham vyātene salila bhara avalambinībhiḥ

original: MSS_9264-2 kiñjalkavyatikarapiñjarāntarābhiś citraśrīralamalakāgravallarībhiḥ //
analyzed: kiñjalka vyatikara piñjara antarābhiḥ citra śrī ralam alaka agra vallarībhiḥ

original: MSS_9265-1 kasyāsti nāśo manaso vitatyā kva sarvathā nāsti bhayaṃ vimuktau /
analyzed: kasya asti nāśaḥ manasaḥ vitatyā kva sarvathā nā asti bhayam vimuktau

original: MSS_9265-2 śalyaṃ paraṃ kiṃ nijamūrkhataiva ke ke hyupāsyā guravaśca santaḥ //
analyzed: śalyam param kim nija mūrkha tā eva ke ke hi upāsyāḥ guravaḥ ca santaḥ

original: MSS_9266-1 kasyedaṃ bhavanaṃ,
analyzed: kasya idam bhavanam

original: mamaiva,
analyzed: mama eva

original: bhavatī kā subhru,
analyzed: bhavatī kā subhru

original: lāṭāṅganā kerya,
analyzed: lāṭā aṅganā kerya

original: mugdhatarā sakhī mama,
analyzed: mugdhatarā sakhī mama

original: patirgehe'sti kiṃ, tena vā /
analyzed: patiḥ gehe asti kim tena vā

original: MSS_9266-2 itthaṃ pānthavaco dināntasamaye gūḍhārthamākarṇya vai mandāndolitakuṇḍalastabakayā tanvyāvadhūtaṃ śiraḥ //
analyzed: ittham pāntha vacaḥ dina anta samaye gūḍha artham ākarṇya vai manda āndolita kuṇḍala stabakayā tanvyā avadhūtam śiraḥ

original: MSS_9267-1 kasyemau pitarau manobhavavatā tāpena saṃyaujitāv anyonyaṃ tanayādikaṃ janayato bhūmyādibhūtātmabhiḥ /
analyzed: kasya imau pitarau manobhavavatā tāpena saṃyaujitau anyonyam tanaya ādikam janayataḥ bhūmi ādi bhūtātmabhiḥ

original: MSS_9267-2 itthaṃ duḥsthamatirmanobhavaratiryo manyate nāstikaḥ śāntis tasya kathaṃ bhaved dhanavato duṣkarmaṃdharmāśrayāt //
analyzed: ittham duḥstha matiḥ manobhava ratiḥ yaḥ manyate nāstikaḥ śāntiḥ tasya katham bhavet dhanavataḥ duṣkarmaṃdharmāśrayāt

original: MSS_9268-1 kasyeyaṃ taruṇi prapā,
analyzed: kasya iyam taruṇi prapā

original: pathika naḥ,
analyzed: pathika naḥ

original: kiṃ pīyate'syāṃ,
analyzed: kim

original: payo dhenūnāmatha māhiṣaṃ badhira re vāraḥ,
analyzed: payaḥ dhenūnām atha māhiṣam badhira re vāraḥ

original: kathaṃ maṅgalaḥ /
analyzed: katham maṅgalaḥ

original: MSS_9268-2 somo vātha śanaiścaro,
analyzed: somaḥ vā atha śanaiścaro

original: 'mṛtamidaṃ,
analyzed: mṛtam idam

original: tatte'dhare dṛśyate śrīmatpāntha vilāsasundara sakhe yad rocate tat piba //
analyzed: dṛśyate śrīmat pāntha vilāsa sundara sakhe yat rocate tat piba

original: MSS_9269-1 kasyodapatsyata rucirvirasāvasāne stokasthitāvanucitaprabhave bhave'smin /
analyzed: kasya udapatsyata ruciḥ virasa avasāne stoka sthitau anucita prabhave bhave asmin

original: MSS_9269-2 nārāyaṇasmṛtikathāmṛtapānagoṣṭhī cetovinodanamiyaṃ yadi nāma na syāt //
analyzed: nārāyaṇa smṛti kathā amṛta pāna goṣṭhī cetaḥ vinodanam iyam yadi nāma na syāt

original: MSS_9270-1 kasyopayogamātreṇa dhanena ramate bhanaḥ /
analyzed: kasya upayoga mātreṇa dhanena ramate

original: MSS_9270-2 padapramāṇamādhāram ārūḍhaḥ ko na kampate //
analyzed: pada pramāṇam ādhāram ārūḍhaḥ kaḥ na kampate

original: MSS_9271-1 kasrāghātaiḥ surabhirabhitaḥ satvaraṃ tāḍanīyo gāḍhāmreḍaṃ malayamarutaḥ śṛṅkhalādāma datta /
analyzed: kasrā ghātaiḥ surabhiḥ abhitas sa tvaram tāḍanīyaḥ gāḍha āmreḍam malaya marutaḥ śṛṅkhalā dāma datta

original: MSS_9271-2 kārāgāre kṣipata tarasā pañcamaṃ rāgarājaṃ candraṃ cūrṇīkuruta ca śilāpaṭṭake piṣṭapeṣam //
analyzed: kārā āgāre kṣipata tarasā pañcamam rāgarājam candram cūrṇīkuruta ca śilā paṭṭake piṣṭa peṣam

original: MSS_9272-1 kahlārasparśagarbhaiḥ śiśiraparigamāt kāntimadbhiḥ karāgraiś candreṇāliṅgitāyāstimiranivasane sraṃsamāne rajanyāḥ /
analyzed: kahlāra sparśa garbhaiḥ śiśira parigamāt kāntimadbhiḥ kara agraiḥ candreṇa āliṅgitāyāḥ timira nivasane sraṃsamāne rajanyāḥ

original: MSS_9272-2 anyonyālokinībhiḥ paricayajanitapremaniṣyandinībhir dūrārūḍhe pramode hasitamiva parispaṣṭamāśāvadhūbhiḥ //
analyzed: anyonya ālokinībhiḥ paricaya janita prema nisyandinībhiḥ dūra ārūḍhe pramode hasitam iva parispaṣṭam āśā vadhūbhiḥ

original: MSS_9273-1 kāṃcid dinārdhasamaye raviraśmitaptāṃ nīlāṃśukāñcalanilīnamukhendumbimbām /
analyzed: kāṃcid dina ardha samaye ravi raśmi taptām nīla aṃśuka añcala nilīna mukha indumbimbām

original: MSS_9273-2 tāṃ tādṛśīṃ samanuvīkṣya kavirjagāda rāhurdivā grasati parva vinā kilendum //
analyzed: tām tādṛśīm samanuvīkṣya kaviḥ jagāda rāhuḥ divā grasati parva vinā kila indum

original: MSS_9274-1 kāṃ tapasvī gato'vasthām iti smerāviva stanau /
analyzed: kām tapasvī gataḥ uvasthām iti smerau iva stanau

original: MSS_9274-2 vande gaurīghanāśleṣabhavabhūtisitānanau //
analyzed: vande gaurī ghana āśleṣa bhavabhūti sitānanau

original: MSS_9275-1 kāṃściccāṭuvacaḥśatairnijasutāpremātirekai ḥ parān anyān vakraravākramairdhanavataḥ prāpayya gehaṃ nijam /
analyzed: kāṃścid cāṭu vacaḥ śataiḥ nija sutā prema atirekaiḥ parān anyān vakra rava ākramaiḥ dhanavataḥ prāpayya geham nijam

original: MSS_9275-2 prāgdattagrahaṇapragalbhakitavavyājādavaṣṭabhya tān kuṭṭinyaḥ sphuṭamapragalbhacaritānetān nihantuṃ kṣamāḥ //
analyzed: prāc datta grahaṇa pragalbha kitava vyājāt avaṣṭabhya tān kuṭṭinyaḥ sphuṭam a pragalbha caritān etān nihantum kṣamāḥ

original: MSS_9276-1 kāṃścit kalpaśataṃ kṛtasthiticayān kāṃścid yugānāṃ śataṃ kāṃścid varṣaśataṃ tathā katipayān jantūn dinānāṃ śatam /
analyzed: kāṃścid kalpa śatam kṛta sthiti cayān kāṃścid yugānām śatam kāṃścid varṣa śatam tathā katipayān jantūn dinānām śatam

original: MSS_9276-2 tāṃstān karmabhirātmanaḥ pratidinaṃ saṃkṣīyamāṇāyuṣaḥ kālo'yaṃ kavalīkaroti sakalān bhrātaḥ kutaḥ kauśalam //
analyzed: tān tān karmabhiḥ ātmanaḥ pratidinam saṃkṣīyamāṇa āyuṣaḥ kālaḥ yam kavalīkaroti sakalān bhrātar kutas kauśalam

original: MSS_9277-1 kāṃścit tucchayati prapūrayati vā kāṃścinnayatyunnatiṃ kāṃścit pātavidhau karoti ca punaḥ kāṃścinnayatyākulān /
analyzed: kāṃścid tucchayati prapūrayati vā kāṃścid nayati unnatim kāṃścid pāta vidhau karoti ca punar kāṃścid nayati ākulān

original: MSS_9277-2 anyonyaṃ pratipakṣasaṃhatimimāṃ lokasthitiṃ bodhayann eṣa krīḍati kūpayantraghaṭikānyāyaprasakto vidhiḥ //
analyzed: anyonyam pratipakṣa saṃhatim imām loka sthitim bodhayan eṣa krīḍati kūpa yantra ghaṭikā nyāya prasaktaḥ vidhiḥ

original: MSS_9278-1 kāṃścidarthān naraḥ prājño laghumūlān mahāphalān /
analyzed: kāṃścid arthān naraḥ prājñaḥ laghu mūlān mahā phalān

original: MSS_9278-2 kṣipramārabhate kartuṃ na vighnayati tādṛśān //
analyzed: kṣipram ārabhate kartum na vighnayati tādṛśān

original: MSS_9279-1 kāṃsīkṛtāsīt khalu maṇḍalīndoḥ saṃsaktaraśmiprakarā smareṇa /
analyzed: kāṃsīkṛtā āsīt khalu maṇḍalīndoḥ saṃsakta raśmi prakarā smareṇa

original: MSS_9279-2 tulā ca nārācalatā nijaiva mithonurāgasya samīkṛtau vām //
analyzed: tulā ca nārāca latā nijā eva mithas nurāgasya samīkṛtau vām

original: MSS_9280-1 kāṃsyasvana ivābhāti yasmin khaḍgahate dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: kāṃsya svanaḥ iva ābhāti yasmin khaḍga hate dhvaniḥ

original: MSS_9280-2 khaṅgottamaṃ taṃ vadati giriśaḥ śubhavardhanam //
analyzed: khaṅga uttamam tam vadati giriśaḥ śubha vardhanam

original: MSS_9281-1 kāṃ harirabharat sūkararūpaḥ kāmarirahitāmicchati bhūpaḥ /
analyzed: kām hariḥ abharat sūkara rūpaḥ kāmari rahitām icchati bhūpaḥ

original: MSS_9281-2 kenākāri ca manmathajananaṃ kena virājati taruṇīvadanam //
analyzed: kena akāri ca manmatha jananam kena virājati taruṇī vadanam

original: MSS_9282-1 kākaḥ kāñcanapañjare vinihitaḥ padmākare kauśikaḥ śrāddhe śvā viniyojito hutavahe havyaḥ palāṇḍuḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kākaḥ kāñcana pañjare vinihitaḥ padma ākare kauśikaḥ śrāddhe śvā viniyojitaḥ hutavahe havyaḥ palāṇḍuḥ kṛtaḥ

original: MSS_9282-2 sarvaṃ tena kṛtaṃ kimatra bahunā madyaṃ mahāśāntaye yenājñānavatā mahīyasi pade nīcaḥ samāropitaḥ //
analyzed: sarvam tena kṛtam kim atra bahunā madyam mahāśāntaye yena ajñānavatā mahīyasi pade nīcaḥ samāropitaḥ

original: MSS_9283-1 kākaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pikaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ko bhedaḥ pikakākayoḥ /
analyzed: kākaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pikaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kaḥ bhedaḥ pika kākayoḥ

original: MSS_9283-2 vasantasamaye prāpte kākaḥ kākaḥ pikaḥ pikaḥ //
analyzed: vasanta samaye prāpte kākaḥ kākaḥ pikaḥ pikaḥ

original: MSS_9284-1 kākaḥ kokilamunnamayya kurute cūte phalāsvādanaṃ bhuṅkte rājaśukaṃ nivārya kuraraḥ krīḍāparo dāḍimam /
analyzed: kākaḥ kokilam unnamayya kurute cūte phala āsvādanam bhuṅkte rāja śukam nivārya kuraraḥ krīḍā paraḥ dāḍimam

original: MSS_9284-2 ghūko barhiṇamāsya śākhiśikhare śete sajāniḥ sukhaṃ hā jātaṃ viparītamadya vipine śyene parokṣaṃ gate //
analyzed: ghūkaḥ barhiṇam āsya śākhi śikhare śete sa jāniḥ sukham hā jātam viparītam adya vipine śyene parokṣam gate

original: MSS_9285-1 kākaḥ pakṣabalena bhūpatigṛhe grāsaṃ yadi prāptavān kiṃ vā tasya mahattvamasya laghutā pañcānanasyāgatā /
analyzed: kākaḥ pakṣa balena bhūpati gṛhe grāsam yadi prāptavān kim vā tasya mahat tvam asya laghu tā pañcānanasya āgatā

original: MSS_9285-2 yenākramya karīndragaṇḍayugalaṃ nirbhidya helālavāl labdhvā grāsavaraṃ varāṭakadhiyā muktāgaṇastyajyate //
analyzed: yena ākramya karīndra gaṇḍa yugalam nirbhidya helā lavāt labdhvā grāsa varam varāṭaka dhiyā muktā gaṇaḥ tyajyate

original: MSS_9286-1 kākaḥ pakṣiṣu cāṇḍālaḥ smṛtaḥ paśuṣu gardabhaḥ /
analyzed: kākaḥ pakṣiṣu cāṇḍālaḥ smṛtaḥ paśuṣu gardabhaḥ

original: MSS_9286-2 narāṇāṃ ko'pi cāṇḍālaḥ smṛtaḥ sarveṣu nindakaḥ //
analyzed: narāṇām kaḥ api cāṇḍālaḥ smṛtaḥ sarveṣu nindakaḥ

original: MSS_9287-1 kākaḥ padmavane dhṛtiṃ na labhate haṃsaśca kūpodake kroṣṭā siṃhaguhāntare suvipule nīcastu bhadrāsane /
analyzed: kākaḥ padma vane dhṛtim na labhate haṃsaḥ ca kūpa udake kroṣṭā siṃha guhā antare su vipule nīcaḥ tu bhadrāsane

original: MSS_9287-2 kustrī satpuruṣaṃ na jātu bhajate sā sevyate durjanaiḥ yā yasya prakṛtirvidhātṛvihitā sā tasya kiṃ vāryate //
analyzed: ku strī sat puruṣam na jātu bhajate sā sevyate durjanaiḥ yā yasya prakṛtiḥ vidhātṛ vihitā sā tasya kim vāryate

original: MSS_9288-1 kākaḥ śvāno'kulīnaśca biḍālaḥ sarpa eva ca /
analyzed: kākaḥ biḍālaḥ sarpaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_9288-2 akulīnā ca yā nārī tulyāste parikīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: akulīnā ca yā nārī tulyāḥ te parikīrtitāḥ

original: MSS_9289-1 kākaḥ svabhāvacapalaḥ pariśuddhavṛttir labdhvā baliṃ svajanamāhvayate parāṃśca /
analyzed: kākaḥ svabhāva capalaḥ pariśuddha vṛttiḥ labdhvā balim sva janam āhvayate parān ca

original: MSS_9289-2 carmāsthimāṃsavati hastikalevare'pi śvā dveṣṭi hanti ca parān kṛpaṇasvabhāvaḥ //
analyzed: carma asthi māṃsavati hasti kalevare pi śvā dveṣṭi hanti ca parān kṛpaṇa svabhāvaḥ

original: MSS_9290-1 kāka āhvayate kākān yācako na tu yācakān /
analyzed: kākaḥ āhvayate kākān yācakaḥ na tu yācakān

original: MSS_9290-2 kākayācakayormadhye varaṃ kāko na yācakaḥ //
analyzed: kāka yācakayoḥ madhye varam kākaḥ na yācakaḥ

original: MSS_9291-1 kākakurkuṭakāyasthāḥ sajātiparipoṣakāḥ /
analyzed: kāka kurkuṭa kāyasthāḥ sa jāti paripoṣakāḥ

original: MSS_9291-2 sajātiparihantāraḥ siṃhāḥ śvāno dvijā gajāḥ //
analyzed: sajāti parihantāraḥ siṃhāḥ śvānaḥ dvijāḥ gajāḥ

original: MSS_9292-1 kākacañcupuṭīkṛtya oṣṭhau proktānilaṃ pibet /
MSS_9292-2 oṃkāradhvaninākṛṣya pūrayed yāvadantaram //
analyzed: oṃkāra dhvaninā ākṛṣya pūrayet yāvat antaram

original: MSS_9293-1 kākajaṅghājaṭā nidrāṃ kurute mastake sthitā /
analyzed: kākajaṅghā jaṭā nidrām kurute mastake sthitā

original: MSS_9293-2 puṣyoddhṛtaṃ śunaḥ pittam apasmāraghnamañjanāt //
analyzed: puṣya uddhṛtam śunaḥ pittam apasmāra ghnam añjanāt

original: MSS_9294-1 kākajaṅghārasaḥ karṇe kṣipto bādhiryanāśanaḥ /
MSS_9294-2 hanti karṇe jaṭā baddhā tasyā netrāmayaṃ dhruvam //
analyzed: hanti karṇe jaṭā baddhā tasyāḥ netra āmayam dhruvam

original: MSS_9295-1 kākatālīyayogena yadanātmavati kṣaṇam /
analyzed: kākatālīya yogena yat anātmavati kṣaṇam

original: MSS_9295-2 karoti praṇayaṃ lakṣmīs tat tasyāḥ strītvacāpalam //
analyzed: karoti praṇayam lakṣmīḥ tat tasyāḥ strī tva cāpalam

original: MSS_9296-1 kākatālīyavat prāptaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi nidhimagrataḥ /
analyzed: kākatālīya vat prāptam dṛṣṭvā api nidhim agratas

original: MSS_9296-2 na svayaṃ daivamādatte puruṣārthamapekṣate //
analyzed: na svayam daivam ādatte puruṣa artham apekṣate

original: MSS_9297-1 kākatuṇḍoktiraparā mallikoktiranopamā (?) /
analyzed: kākatuṇḍa uktiḥ aparā mallikā uktiḥ anopamā

original: MSS_9297-2 pāṭaloktiśca padmoktiḥ padminyuktiḥ sphuṭāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: pāṭalā uktiḥ ca padmoktiḥ padminī uktiḥ sphuṭāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: MSS_9298-1 kāka tvaṃ phalanamravipinaṃ daivātsamāsādayan kiṃ karṇau badhirīkaroṣi paruṣaiḥ kreṃkārakolāhalaiḥ /
analyzed: kāka tvam phala namra vipinam daivāt samāsādayan kim karṇau badhirīkaroṣi paruṣaiḥ kreṃkāra kolāhalaiḥ

original: MSS_9298-2 maunaṃ cedavalambase ratabharaprakrāntapuṃskokila- bhrāntyāpi tvayi sañcaranti na kathaṃ mugdhākaṭākṣacchaṭāḥ //
analyzed: maunam ced avalambase rata bhara prakrānta puṃskokila bhrāntyā api tvayi sañcaranti na katham mugdhā kaṭākṣa chaṭāḥ

original: MSS_9299-1 kā kathā bāṇasaṃdhāne jyāśabdenaiva dūrataḥ /
analyzed: kā kathā bāṇa saṃdhāne jyā śabdena eva dūratas

original: MSS_9299-2 huṃkāreṇeva dhanuṣaḥ sa hi vighnān vyapohati //
analyzed: huṃkāreṇa iva dhanuṣaḥ sa hi vighnān vyapohati

original: MSS_9300-1 kākamāṃsaṃ tathocchiṣṭaṃ stokaṃ tadapi durbalam /
analyzed: kāka māṃsam tathā ucchiṣṭam stokam tat api durbalam

original: MSS_9300-2 bhakṣitenāpi kiṃ tena yena tṛptirna jāyate //
analyzed: bhakṣitena api kim tena yena tṛptiḥ na jāyate

original: MSS_9301-1 kākamācī tathā kuṣṭhaṃ gotakreṇa ca pācayet /
analyzed: kākamācī tathā kuṣṭham go takreṇa ca pācayet

original: MSS_9301-2 nāśayen maṇḍalikṣveḍam agado'yaṃ suniścitam //
analyzed: nāśayet maṇḍali kṣveḍam su niścitam

original: MSS_9302-1 kākamācīśiphā karṇe baddhā rātrijvarāpahā /
MSS_9302-2 pāṇisthaṃ vṛṣavṛndākaṃ dyūte vitanute jayam //
analyzed: pāṇi stham vṛṣa vṛndākam dyūte vitanute jayam

original: MSS_9303-1 kākavarākamarālamavaiṣi na jarjaritā'rjunatārya kutaḥ /
analyzed: kāka varāka marālam avaiṣi na jarjarita arjuna tārya kutas

original: MSS_9303-2 vikramavairivadhūjanalocana- kajjalavajjalamajjanataḥ //
analyzed: vikrama vairi vadhū jana locana kajjalavat jala majjanataḥ

original: MSS_9304-1 kākaśca drumakuṭṭaśca maṇḍūko nīlamakṣikaḥ /
analyzed: kākaḥ ca drumakuṭṭaḥ ca maṇḍūkaḥ nīlamakṣikaḥ

original: MSS_9304-2 laṭvayā saha pañcaite gajaṃ jaghnurupāyataḥ //
analyzed: laṭvayā saha pañca ete gajam jaghnuḥ upāyatas

original: MSS_9305-1 kākasya kati vā dantā meṣasyāṇḍe kiyat palam /
analyzed: kākasya kati vā dantāḥ meṣasya aṇḍe kiyat palam

original: MSS_9305-2 gardabhe kati romāṇi vyarthaiṣātu vicāraṇā //
analyzed: gardabhe kati romāṇi vyarthā eṣā atu vicāraṇā

original: MSS_9306-1 kākasya cañcuryadi hemayuktā māṇikyayuktau caraṇau ca tasya /
analyzed: kākasya cañcuḥ yadi hema yuktā māṇikya yuktau caraṇau ca tasya

original: MSS_9306-2 ekaikapakṣe gajarājamuktā tathāpi kāko na ca rājahaṃsaḥ //
analyzed: ekaika pakṣe gaja rāja muktā tathā api kākaḥ na ca rājahaṃsaḥ

original: MSS_9307-1 kākasya vṛṣṭihetor nīḍaṃ dikṣu praśasyate tisṛṣu /
analyzed: kākasya vṛṣṭi hetoḥ nīḍam dikṣu praśasyate tisṛṣu

original: MSS_9307-2 durbhikṣamaraṇahetur bhavati sayāmyeṣu koṇeṣu //
analyzed: durbhikṣa maraṇa hetuḥ bhavati sa yāmyeṣu koṇeṣu

original: MSS_9308-1 kākāḥ kiṃ kiṃ na kurvanti kroṅkāraṃ yatra tatra vā /
analyzed: kākāḥ kim kim na kurvanti kroṅkāram yatra tatra vā

original: MSS_9308-2 śuka eva paraṃ vakti nṛpahastopalālitaḥ //
analyzed: śukaḥ eva param vakti nṛpa hasta upalālitaḥ

original: MSS_9309-1 kākāḥ prabhupraṇihitaiḥ pikapaṭṭabaddher mākandabṛndamakarandarasaṃ labhantām /
analyzed: kākāḥ prabhu praṇihitaiḥ pika paṭṭa baddheḥ mākanda bṛnda makaranda rasam labhantām

original: MSS_9309-2 prāpte vasantasamaye kathamācaranti karṇāmṛtāni kalapañcamakūjitāni //
analyzed: prāpte vasanta samaye katham ācaranti karṇa amṛtāni kala pañcama kūjitāni

original: MSS_9310-1 kākānāṃ kokilānāṃ ca sīmābhedaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: kākānām kokilānām ca sīmā bhedaḥ katham bhavet

original: MSS_9310-2 yadi viśvasṛjā sākṣaṃ na kṛtā karṇaśaṣkulī //
analyzed: yadi viśvasṛjā sākṣam na kṛtā karṇa śaṣkulī

original: MSS_9311-1 kākānāṃ prītiyogaṃ cirasahavasatiṃ kokilāpekṣase cet tarhi tvaṃ tadvadeva śravaṇapuṭapaṭūn kutsitān kūja śabdān /
analyzed: kākānām prīti yogam cira sahavasatim kokila apekṣase ced tarhi tvam tadvat eva śravaṇa puṭa paṭūn kutsitān kūja śabdān

original: MSS_9311-2 abhyāsas tatra no cet tava galadamṛtā gīriyaṃ gupyatāṃ vā tāmākarṇya svajāterananuguṇaguṇaṃ tvāmamī santyajeyuḥ //
analyzed: abhyāsaḥ tatra no ced tava galat amṛtā gīḥ iyam gupyatām vā tām ākarṇya sva jāteḥ ananuguṇa guṇam tvām amī santyajeyuḥ

original: MSS_9312-1 kā kāntā kāliyārāteḥ punararthe kimavyayam /
analyzed: kā kāntā kāliya arāteḥ punar arthe kim avyayam

original: MSS_9312-2 kiṃ vandyaṃ sarvadevānāṃ phaleṣu kimu sundaram //
analyzed: kim vandyam sarva devānām phaleṣu kimu sundaram

original: MSS_9313-1 kā kā priyā priyatamaṃ parirabhya dorbhyām abhyāgate'pi mihire na jahāti nidrām /
analyzed: kā kā priyā priyatamam parirabhya dorbhyām abhyāgatā ipi mihire na jahāti nidrām

original: MSS_9313-2 jāgartu sajjayatu colamitīva kākāḥ kākālirāliriva gūḍhagiraścakāra //
analyzed: jāgartu sajjayatu colam iti iva kākāḥ kāka āliḥ āliḥ iva gūḍha giraḥ cakāra

original: MSS_9314-1 kā kābalā nidhuvanaśramapīḍitāṅgī nidrāṃ gatā dayitabāhulatānubaddhā /
analyzed: kā kābalā nidhuvana śrama pīḍita aṅgī nidrām gatā dayita bāhu latā anubaddhā

original: MSS_9314-2 sā sā tu yātu bhavanaṃ mihirodgamo'yaṃ samketavākyamiti kākacayā vadanti //
analyzed: sā sā tu yātu bhavanam mihira udgamaḥ yam samketa vākyam iti kākacayāḥ vadanti

original: MSS_9314A-1 kā kāmadhenuriha kaś cintāmaṇirapi ca kalpaśākhī kaḥ /
analyzed: kā kāmadhenuḥ iha kaḥ cintāmaṇiḥ api ca kalpaśākhī kaḥ

original: MSS_9314A-2 sarvāṇyamūni bhuvane paryāyavacāṃsi puṇyasya //
analyzed: sarvāṇi amūni bhuvane paryāya vacāṃsi puṇyasya

original: MSS_9315-1 kākā mūrdhni sukhaṃ vasanti śataśaḥ śākhāsu śākhāmṛgā ghūkāḥ koṭaragahvareṣu maśalairdaṃśaiśca sāndraṃ dalam /
analyzed: kākāḥ mūrdhni sukham vasanti śataśas śākhāsu śākhāmṛgāḥ ghūkāḥ koṭara gahvareṣu maśalaiḥ daṃśaiḥ ca sāndram dalam

original: MSS_9315-2 ādhāraḥ kiyatāmasi sthirataraṃ śuddhaṃ ca labdhaṃ yaśaḥ pānthā nopasaranti cet kṣatamitaḥ kiṃ vṛkṣarājasya te //
analyzed: ādhāraḥ kiyatām asi sthirataram śuddham ca labdham yaśaḥ pānthāḥ na upasaranti ced kṣatam itas kim vṛkṣarājasya te

original: MSS_9316-1 kā kālī kā madhurā kā śītalavāhinī gaṅgā /
analyzed: kā kālī kā madhurā kā śītala vāhinī gaṅgā

original: MSS_9316-2 kaṃ saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃ balavantaṃ na bādhate śītam //
analyzed: kam saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kam balavantam na bādhate śītam

original: MSS_9317-1 kākāllaulyaṃ yamāt krauryaṃ sthapaterdṛḍhaghātitām /
analyzed: kākāt laulyam yamāt krauryam sthapateḥ dṛḍha ghāti tām

original: MSS_9317-2 ekaikākṣaramādāya kāyasthaḥ kena nirmitaḥ //
analyzed: ekaika akṣaram ādāya kāyasthaḥ kena nirmitaḥ

original: MSS_9317A-1 kākā vṛkā ghukabakāśca bhekāḥ praṇamya yuṣmānidameva yāce /
analyzed: kākāḥ vṛkāḥ ghuka bakāḥ ca bhekāḥ praṇamya yuṣmān idam eva yāce

original: MSS_9317A-2 kolāhalaṃ mā kuruta kṣamadhvaṃ puṃskokilaḥ kūjati mañjurāvam //
analyzed: kolāhalam mā kuruta kṣamadhvam puṃskokilaḥ kūjati mañju rāvam

original: MSS_9318-1 kākinyāḥ patramūlaṃ sahacarasahitaṃ ketakīnāṃ ca kandaṃ chāyāśuṣkaṃ ca bhṛṅgaṃ triphalarasayutaṃ tailamadhye nidhāya /
analyzed: kākinyāḥ patra mūlam sahacara sahitam ketakīnām ca kandam chāyāśuṣkam ca bhṛṅgam triphalā rasa yutam taila madhye nidhāya

original: MSS_9318-2 lauhe pātre praṇītaṃ dharaṇitalagataṃ māsamātrasthitaṃ tat keśāḥ kāśaprakāśā alikulasadṛśāḥ sambhavantyasya lepāt //
analyzed: lauhe pātre praṇītam dharaṇi tala gatam māsa mātra sthitam tat keśāḥ kāśa prakāśāḥ ali kula sadṛśāḥ sambhavanti asya lepāt

original: MSS_9319-1 kākuṃ karoṣi gṛhakoṇakarīṣapuñja- gūḍhāṅga kiṃ nanu vṛthā kitava prayāhi /
analyzed: kākum karoṣi gṛha koṇa karīṣa puñja gūḍha aṅga kim nanu vṛthā kitava prayāhi

original: MSS_9319-2 kutrādya jīrṇataraṇibhramanātibhīta- gopāṅganāgaṇaviḍambanacāturī te //
analyzed: kutra adya jīrṇa taraṇi bhramana ati bhīta gopa aṅganā gaṇa viḍambana cāturī te

original: MSS_9320-1 kākutsthasya daśānano na kṛtavān dārāpahāraṃ yadi kvāmbhodhiḥ kva ca setubandhaghaṭanā kvottīrya laṅkājayaḥ /
analyzed: kākutsthasya daśānanaḥ na kṛtavān dāra apahāram yadi kva ambhodhiḥ kva ca setubandha ghaṭanā kva uttīrya laṅkā jayaḥ

original: MSS_9320-2 pārthasyāpi parābhavaṃ yadi ripurnādāt kva tādṛk tapo nīyante ripubhiḥ samunnatipadaṃ prāyaḥ paraṃ māninaḥ //
analyzed: pārthasya api parābhavam yadi ripuḥ nā adāt kva tādṛś tapaḥ nīyante ripubhiḥ samunnati padam prāyas param māninaḥ

original: MSS_9321-1 kākutsthasya pratāpāgnir dīptapiṅgairvalīmukhaiḥ /
analyzed: kākutsthasya pratāpa agniḥ dīpta piṅgaiḥ valīmukhaiḥ

original: MSS_9321-2 nirvāṇo rākṣasendrasya manye nīlairniśācaraiḥ //
analyzed: nirvāṇaḥ rākṣasa indrasya manye nīlaiḥ niśācaraiḥ

original: MSS_9322-1 kākutsthena śirāṃsi yāni śataśaśchinnāni māyānidheḥ paulastyasya vimānasīmani tathā bhrāntāni nākaukasām /
analyzed: kākutsthena śirāṃsi yāni śataśas chinnāni māyā nidheḥ paulastyasya vimāna sīmani tathā bhrāntāni nāka okasām

original: MSS_9322-2 tānyevāsya dhanuḥśramapraśamanaṃ kurvanti sītāpateḥ krīḍācāmaraḍambarānukṛtibhirlolāyamānai ḥ kacaiḥ //
analyzed: tāni eva asya dhanuḥ śrama praśamanam kurvanti sītāpateḥ krīḍā cāmara ḍambara anukṛtibhiḥ lolāyamānaiḥ kacaiḥ

original: MSS_9323-1 kā kṛtā viṣṇunā kīdṛg yoṣitāṃ kaḥ praśasyate /
analyzed: kā kṛtā viṣṇunā kīdṛś yoṣitām kaḥ praśasyate

original: MSS_9323-2 asevyaḥ kīdṛśaḥ svāmī ko nihantā niśātamaḥ //
analyzed: asevyaḥ kīdṛśaḥ svāmī kaḥ nihantā niśātamaḥ

original: MSS_9324-1 kāke karṇapuṭīkaṭhoraninade pīyūṣadhārārasa- syandodañcitacārupañcamarute sādhāraṇe mayyapi /
analyzed: kāke karṇa puṭī kaṭhora ninade pīyūṣa dhārā rasa syanda udañcita cāru pañca marute sādhāraṇe mayi api

original: MSS_9324-2 vanyāṃ vṛttimayaṃ vyadhāditi mudhā vatsa vyathāṃ mā kṛthāḥ kva kaivaṃ na kṛtaṃ janeṣu nikṛtaṃ durmedhasā vedhasā //
analyzed: vanyām vṛttim ayam vyadhāt iti mudhā vatsa vyathām mā kṛthāḥ kva kā evam na kṛtam janeṣu nikṛtam durmedhasā vedhasā

original: MSS_9325-1 kāke kārṣṇyamalaukikaṃ dhavalimā haṃse nisargasthito gāṃbhīrye mahadantaraṃ vacasi yo bhedaḥ sa kiṃ kathyate /
analyzed: kāke kārṣṇyam alaukikam dhavalimā haṃse nisarga sthitaḥ gāṃbhīrye mahat antaram vacasi yaḥ bhedaḥ sa kim kathyate

original: MSS_9325-2 etāvatsu viśeṣaṇeṣvapi sakhe yatredamālokyate ke kākāḥ khalu ke ca haṃsaśiśavo deśāya tasmai namaḥ //
analyzed: etāvatsu viśeṣaṇeṣu api sakhe yatra idam ālokyate ke kākāḥ khalu ke ca haṃsa śiśavaḥ deśāya tasmai namaḥ

original: MSS_9326-1 kāke śaucaṃ dyūtakāreṣu satyaṃ sarpe kṣāntiḥ strīṣu kāmopaśāntiḥ /
analyzed: kāke śaucam dyūtakāreṣu satyam sarpe kṣāntiḥ strīṣu kāma upaśāntiḥ

original: MSS_9326-2 klībe dhairyaṃ madyape tattvacintā rājā mitraṃ kena dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā //
analyzed: klībe dhairyam madyape tattva cintā rājā mitram kena dṛṣṭam śrutam vā

original: MSS_9327-1 kākaiḥ saha vivṛddhasya kokilasya kalā giraḥ /
analyzed: kākaiḥ saha vivṛddhasya kokilasya kalāḥ giraḥ

original: MSS_9327-2 khalasaṅge'pi naiṣṭhuryaṃ kalyāṇaprakṛteḥ kutaḥ //
analyzed: khala saṅge api naiṣṭhuryam kalyāṇa prakṛteḥ kutas

original: MSS_9327A-1 kākaiḥ sārddhaṃ vasan haṃsaḥ kṣobhate cāvasīdati /
analyzed: kākaiḥ sārddham vasan haṃsaḥ kṣobhate ca avasīdati

original: MSS_9327A-2 gataḥ komala evā'so jihmo duṣṭo na kākavat //
analyzed: gataḥ komalaḥ eva asaḥ jihmaḥ duṣṭaḥ na kāka vat

original: MSS_9328-1 kākairimāṃścitrabarhān mayūrān parājaiṣṭhāḥ pāṇḍavān dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ /
analyzed: kākaiḥ imān citra barhān mayūrān parājaiṣṭhāḥ pāṇḍavān dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ

original: MSS_9328-2 hitvā siṃhān kroṣṭukān gūhamānaḥ prāpte kāle śocitā tvaṃ narendra //
analyzed: hitvā siṃhān kroṣṭukān gūhamānaḥ prāpte kāle śocitā tvam narendra

original: MSS_9329-1 kākairniṣkuṣitaṃ śvabhiḥ kabalitaṃ vīcībhirāndolitaṃ srotobhiścalitaṃ taṭāntamalinaṃ gomāyubhirloḍitam /
analyzed: kākaiḥ niṣkuṣitam śvabhiḥ kabalitam vīcībhiḥ āndolitam srotobhiḥ calitam taṭa anta malinam gomāyubhiḥ loḍitam

original: MSS_9329-2 divyastrīkaracārucāmaramarutsaṃvījyamānaḥ kadā drakṣye'haṃ parameśvari tripathage bhāgīrathi svaṃ vapuḥ //
analyzed: divya strī kara cāru cāmara marut saṃvījyamānaḥ kadā drakṣye iham parameśvari tripathage bhāgīrathi svam vapuḥ

original: MSS_9330-1 kākodumbarikāyāṃ valmīko dṛśyate śirā tasmin /
analyzed: kākodumbarikāyām valmīkaḥ dṛśyate tasmin

original: MSS_9330-2 puruṣatraye sapāde paścimadiksthā na sā vahati //
analyzed: puruṣa traye sa pāde paścima diś sthā na sā vahati

original: MSS_9331-1 kākolaḥ kalakaṇṭhikā kuvalayaṃ kādambinī kardamaḥ kaṃsāriḥ kabarī kṛpāṇalatikā kastūrikā kajjalam /
MSS_9331-2 kālindī kaṣapaṭṭikā karighaṭā kāmārikaṇṭhasthalī yasyaite karadā bhavanti sakhi tadvande vinidraṃ tamaḥ //
analyzed: kālindī kaṣapaṭṭikā karighaṭā kāmāri kaṇṭha sthalī yasya ete kara dāḥ bhavanti sakhi tat vande vinidram tamaḥ

original: MSS_9332-1 kā khalena saha spardhā sajjanasyābhimāninaḥ /
analyzed: kā khalena saha spardhā sat janasya abhimāninaḥ

analyzed: bhāṣaṇam bhīṣaṇam sādhu dūṣaṇam yasya bhūṣaṇam

original: MSS_9333-1 kā gaṇanā viṣayavaśe puṃsi varāke varāṅganā spṛhayā /
analyzed: kā gaṇanā viṣaya vaśe puṃsi varāke vara aṅganā spṛhayā

original: MSS_9333-2 vyājena vīkṣamāṇā dhyānadhiyāṃ spṛśati sajjñānam //
analyzed: vyājena vīkṣamāṇā dhyāna dhiyām spṛśati sat jñānam

original: MSS_9334-1 kāṅkṣitenāpyalabdhena bhogārhe navayauvane /
analyzed: kāṅkṣitena api alabdhena bhoga arhe nava yauvane

original: MSS_9334-2 jarājīrṇaśarīrasya bhāreṇeva dhanena kim //
analyzed: jarā jīrṇa śarīrasya bhāreṇa iva dhanena kim

original: MSS_9335-1 kācaṃ maṇiṃ kāñcanamekasūtre mugdhā nibadhnanti kimatra citram /
analyzed: kācam maṇim kāñcanam eka sūtre mugdhāḥ nibadhnanti kim atra citram

original: MSS_9335-2 vicāravān paṇinirekasūtre śvānaṃ yuvānaṃ maghavānamāha //
analyzed: vicāravān paṇi nireka sūtre śvānam yuvānam maghavānam āha

original: MSS_9336-1 kācaḥ kāñcanasaṃsargād dhatte mārakatīṃ dyutim /
MSS_9336-2 aśmāpi yāti devatvaṃ mahadbhiḥ supratiṣṭhitaḥ //
analyzed: aśmā api yāti deva tvam mahadbhiḥ su pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: MSS_9337-1 kācaḥ kāñcanasaṃsargād dhatte mārakatīṃ dyutim /
MSS_9337-2 tathā satsaṃnidhānena mūrkho yāti pravīṇatām //
analyzed: tathā sat saṃnidhānena mūrkhaḥ yāti pravīṇa tām

original: MSS_9337A-1 kācakāmaladoṣeṇa paśyen netre viparyayam /
analyzed: kāca kāmalā doṣeṇa paśyet netre viparyayam

original: MSS_9337A-2 abhyākhyānaṃ vadejjihvā tatra rāgaka ucyate //
analyzed: abhyākhyānam vadet jihvā tatra rāgakaḥ ucyate

original: MSS_9338-1 kā cakre hariṇā,
analyzed: kā cakre hariṇā

analyzed: dhane kṛpaṇa dhīḥ kīdṛś

original: bhujaṃge'sti kiṃ,
analyzed: bhujaṃgeḥ ti kim

original: kīdṛk,
analyzed: kīdṛś

original: kumbhasamudbhavasya jaṭharaṃ,
analyzed: kumbha samudbhavasya jaṭharam

original: kīdṛgyiyāsurvadhūḥ /
analyzed: kīdṛś yiyāsuḥ vadhūḥ

original: MSS_9338-2 ślokaḥ kīdṛgabhīpsitaḥ sukṛtināṃ,
analyzed: ślokaḥ kīdṛś abhīpsitaḥ su kṛtinām

original: kīdṛṅnabho nirmalaṃ,
analyzed: kīdṛś nabhaḥ nirmalam

original: MSS_9339-1 kācāḥ kāñcanabhūṣitāḥ kati na vā puṣṇanti ratnaśriyaṃ maulau vā kati nodvahantyapadhiyastāneva ratnabhramāt /
analyzed: kācāḥ kāñcana bhūṣitāḥ kati na vā puṣṇanti ratna śriyam maulau vā kati nā udvahanti apadhiyaḥ tān eva ratna bhramāt

original: MSS_9339-2 akṣṇāṃ ye punarunmṛjanti timiraṃ yairnāma ratnākaraḥ sindhuste pṛthageva hanta maṇayasteṣvapyabhijñāḥ pṛthak //
analyzed: akṣṇām ye punar unmṛjanti timiram yaiḥ nāma ratna ākaraḥ sindhuḥ te pṛthak eva hanta maṇayaḥ teṣu api abhijñāḥ pṛthak

original: MSS_9340-1 kācit karābhyāṃ kusumāni nītvā dadhāra śaṃbhoḥ padayoḥ samīpe /
analyzed: kācid karābhyām kusumāni nītvā dadhāra śaṃbhoḥ padayoḥ samīpe

analyzed: vivakṣayā manmatha duṣpravṛtteḥ samutsṛjantī viśikhān iva agre

original: MSS_9341-1 kācit kīrṇā rajobhirdivamanuvidadhe bhinnavakrendulakṣmīr aśrīkāḥ kāścidantardiśa iva dadhire dāhamudbhrāntasattvāḥ /
analyzed: kācid kīrṇā rajobhiḥ divam anuvidadhe bhinna vakra indu lakṣmīḥ aśrīkāḥ kāścid antar diśaḥ iva dadhire dāham udbhrānta sattvāḥ

original: MSS_9341-2 mremurvātyā ivānyāḥ pratipadamaparā bhūmivat kampamāpuḥ prasthāne pārthivānāmaśivamiti purobhāvi nāryaḥ śaśaṃsuḥ //
analyzed: mremuḥ vātyāḥ iva anyāḥ pratipadam aparāḥ bhūmi vat kampam āpuḥ prasthāne pārthivānām aśivam iti purobhāvi nāryaḥ śaśaṃsuḥ

original: MSS_9342-1 kācit kṛtā kṛtiriti tvayi sārpiteti kāpi pramodakaṇikā mama nāntaraṅge /
analyzed: kācid kṛtā kṛtiḥ iti tvayi sā arpitā iti kā api pramoda kaṇikā mama na antaraṅge

original: MSS_9342-2 mauḍhyaṃ madīyamiha yadviditaṃ mamaiva kiṃ tvamba viśvasimi dīnaśaraṇyatāṃ te //
analyzed: mauḍhyam madīyam iha yat viditam mama eva kim tu amba viśvasimi dīna śaraṇya tām te

original: MSS_9343-1 kācit tṛṣārtā vanitā nidāghe gaṅgāṃ samabhyetya sudhāsavarṇām /

original: MSS_9343-2 ādāya tadvāri karadvayena vilokayantī na papau kimetat //
analyzed: ādāya tad vāri kara dvayena vilokayantī na papau kim etat

original: MSS_9343-5 (karakisalayakāntikāntyā śoṇitaśaṅkayeti /)
analyzed: kara kisalaya kānti kāntyā śoṇita śaṅkayā iti

original: MSS_9344-1 kācit padairaskhalitaiḥ sakhelaṃ vāntīṣu śuddhāntakareṇukāsu /

original: MSS_9344-2 rājāṅganānāmakarodavajñāṃ śroṇībhare ca stanagaurave ca //
analyzed: rāja aṅganānām akarot avajñām śroṇī bhare ca stana gaurave ca

original: MSS_9345-1 kācit purā virahiṇī parivṛddhihetor yasyai dideśa salilaṃ navamālikāyai /
analyzed: kācid purā virahiṇī parivṛddhi hetoḥ yasyai dideśa salilam navamālikāyai

original: MSS_9345-2 sā puṣpitaiva jalamaśruvaśād viyoge tasyai pradāya kathamapyanṛṇī babhūva //
analyzed: sā puṣpitā eva jalam aśru vaśāt viyoge tasyai pradāya katham api anṛṇī babhūva

original: MSS_9346-1 kācit svarṇalatā tadūrdhvamamalaścandras tadabhyantare padme tannikaṭaṃ tilasya kusumaṃ tatsannidhau pallave /

analyzed: hemnaḥ kiṃcid adhas tayoḥ ca kalaśau kāntau jagat mohanau svasti etat prakarotu vaḥ trijagatām kim brahma kṛṣṇa ādibhiḥ

original: MSS_9347-1 kācid balinā krāntā kācin na jahāti kāminaṃ ruciram /

original: MSS_9347-2 anyā pānakagoṣṭhyāṃ nayati dinaṃ prītakaiḥ sārdham //
analyzed: anyā pānaka goṣṭhyām nayati dinam prītakaiḥ sārdham

original: MSS_9348-1 kācid bālakavanmahītalagatā mūlacchidākāraṇaṃ dravyeṇārjanapuṣpitāpi viphalī kācic ca jātiprabhā /
analyzed: kācid bālaka vat mahī tala gatā mūla chidā kāraṇam dravyeṇa arjana puṣpitā api viphalī kācid ca jāti prabhā

original: MSS_9348-2 kācic chrīḥ kadalīva bhogasubhagā satpuṇyabījacyutā sarvāṅge subhagā rasālalatikāvat puṇyabījāṅkitā //
analyzed: kācid śrīḥ kadalī iva bhoga subhagā sat puṇya bīja cyutā sarva aṅge subhagā rasāla latikā vat puṇya bīja aṅkitā

original: MSS_9349-1 kācid bālā ramaṇavasatiṃ preṣayantī karaṇḍaṃ dāsīhastāt sabhayamalikhad vyālamasyopariṣṭāt /
analyzed: kācid bālā ramaṇa vasatim preṣayantī karaṇḍam dāsī hastāt sa bhayam alikhat vyālam asya upariṣṭāt

original: MSS_9349-2 gaurīkāntaṃ pavanatanayaṃ campakaṃ cātra bhāvaṃ pṛcchatyāryo nipuṇatilako mallināthaḥ kavīndraḥ //
analyzed: gaurīkāntam pavanatanayam campakam ca atra bhāvam pṛcchati āryaḥ nipuṇa tilakaḥ mallināthaḥ kavi indraḥ

original: MSS_9350-1 kācid vibhūṣayati darpaṇasaktahastā bālātapeṣu vanitā vadanāravindam /

original: MSS_9352-1 kācid vilolanayanā ramaṇe svakīye dūraṃ gate sati manobhavabāṇakhinnā /

original: MSS_9353-1 kācid vihṛtya kila kantukakeliraṅgād bhūreṇurūṣitatanurniragānmṛgākṣī /
analyzed: kācid vihṛtya kila kantuka keli raṅgāt bhū reṇu rūṣita tanuḥ niragāt mṛga akṣī

analyzed: utphulla paṅkaja vane su ciram caritvā kiñjalka reṇu paridhūsaritā iva lakṣmīḥ

original: MSS_9354-1 kā cintā mama jīvane yadi harirviśvaṃbharo gīyate no cedarbhakajīvanāya jananīstanyaṃ kathaṃ nirmame /

analyzed: iti ālocya muhur muhur yadupate lakṣmīpate kevalam tvad pāda ambuja sevanena satatam kālaḥ mayā nīyate

original: MSS_9355-1 kācinnitambārpitavāmahastā dorlekhayā kuñcitayā natāṅgī /
analyzed: kācid nitamba arpita vāma hastā dos lekhayā kuñcitayā nata aṅgī

original: MSS_9355-2 kṣamāpatau mārgaṇamokṣadakṣam akalpayaccāpamiva smarasya //
analyzed: kṣamāpatau mārgaṇa mokṣa dakṣam akalpayat cāpam iva smarasya

original: MSS_9356-1 kācinnideśājjaratījanānāṃ kulocitaṃ kiṃcidihālapantī /
analyzed: kācid nideśāt jaratī janānām kula ucitam kiṃcid iha ālapantī

original: MSS_9356-2 kuñjadrumālekhanamācarantī saṃjñāpitālībhirabhūt salajjā //
analyzed: kuñja druma ālekhanam ācarantī saṃjñāpita ālībhiḥ abhūt sa lajjā

original: MSS_9357-1 kācinnivāritabahirgamanā jananyā draṣṭuṃ haraṃ bhavanajālakamāsasāda /
analyzed: kācid nivārita bahis gamanā jananyā draṣṭum haram bhavana jālakam āsasāda

original: MSS_9357-2 tasyā vilocanamadṛśyata dāśayantra- yatroparuddhaśapharopamitaṃ kṣaṇena //
analyzed: tasyāḥ vilocanam adṛśyata yatra uparuddha śaphara upamitam kṣaṇena

original: MSS_9358-1 kācinmṛgākṣī priyaviprayoge gantuṃ niśāpāramapārayantī /
analyzed: kācid mṛga akṣī priya viprayoge gantum niśā pāram a pārayantī

original: MSS_9358-2 udgātumādāya kareṇa vīṇām eṇāṅkamālokya śanairahāsīt //
analyzed: udgātum ādāya kareṇa vīṇām eṇa aṅkam ālokya śanais ahāsīt

original: MSS_9359-1 kāce maṇirmaṇau kāco yeṣāṃ buddhiḥ pravartate /
analyzed: kāce maṇiḥ maṇau kācaḥ yeṣām buddhiḥ pravartate

analyzed: na teṣām saṃnidhau bhṛtyaḥ nāma mātraḥ upi tiṣṭhati

original: MSS_9360-1 kāco maṇirmaṇiḥ kāco yeṣāṃ te'nye hi dehinaḥ /
analyzed: kācaḥ maṇiḥ maṇiḥ kācaḥ yeṣām tena ye hi dehinaḥ

original: MSS_9360-2 santi te sudhiyo yeṣāṃ kācaḥ kāco maṇirmaṇiḥ //
analyzed: santi te sudhiyaḥ yeṣām kācaḥ kācaḥ maṇiḥ maṇiḥ

original: MSS_9360A-1 kāñcanāṅgi kamanīyakalāpau kañculīkavacitau likucau te /
analyzed: kāñcana aṅgi kamanīya kalāpau kañculī kavacitau likucau te

original: MSS_9360A-2 pāṇinā nanu vahāmi muhūrtaṃ dehi me'dharamaṇiṃ tava dāsyam //
analyzed: pāṇinā nanu vahāmi muhūrtam dehi medhara maṇim tava dāsyam

original: MSS_9361-1 kāñcikena samāloḍya bhakṣayet prātaranvaham /
analyzed: kāñcikena samāloḍya bhakṣayet prātar anvaham

original: MSS_9361-2 ṣaṇmāsayogato hanti palitaṃ valibhiḥ saha /
MSS_9361-3 dugdhānnabhojanāsaktaś ciraṃjīvī bhaven naraḥ //
MSS_9362-1 kāñcīṃ kāñcī na dhatte kalayati na dṛśā keralī kelitalpaṃ sindūraṃ dūra eva kṣipati karatalanyastamāndhrī purandhrī /
analyzed: kāñcīm kāñcī na dhatte kalayati na dṛśā keralī keli talpam sindūram dūre eva kṣipati kara tala nyasta māndhrī purandhrī

original: MSS_9362-2 saurāṣṭrī mārṣṭi bhūyaḥ sapadi nayanayo raktayo raktimānaṃ kārṇāṭī karṇikāyāṃ malinayati mano mānasiṃhaprayāṇe //
analyzed: saurāṣṭrī mārṣṭi bhūyas sapadi nayanayoḥ raktayoḥ raktimānam kārṇāṭī karṇikāyām malinayati manaḥ māna siṃhaprayāṇe

original: MSS_9362A-1 kāñcīkalakvaṇitakomalanābhikānti pārāvatadhvanitacitritakaṇṭhapālim /
analyzed: kāñcī kala kvaṇita komala nābhi kānti pārāvata dhvanita citrita kaṇṭha pālim

original: MSS_9362A-2 udbhrāntalocanacakoramanaṅgaraṅgam āśāsmahe kamapi vāravilāsavatyāḥ //
analyzed: udbhrānta locana cakoram anaṅga raṅgam āśāsmahe kam api vāravilāsavatyāḥ

original: MSS_9363-1 kāñcī kāṃcidiyaṃ cakāra jaghananyastā gatermandatāṃ gāḍhaṃ baddhamidaṃ ca kañcukamadāducchrūnatāṃ vakṣasaḥ /
analyzed: kāñcī kāṃcid iyam cakāra jaghana nyastā gateḥ manda tām gāḍham baddham idam ca kañcukam adāt ucchrūna tām vakṣasaḥ

original: MSS_9363-2 netraprāntamathākulaṃ kalayati śrotrāvataṃsadvayaṃ tatko'yaṃ bata matprasādhanavidhau sakhyaiṣamas tvatkramaḥ //
analyzed: netra prāntam atha ākulam kalayati śrotra avataṃsa dvayam tat koyam bata mad prasādhana vidhau sakhyā aiṣamaḥ tvad kramaḥ

original: MSS_9364-1 kāncīguṇagrathitakāñcanaceladṛśya- caṇḍātapāṃśukavibhāparabhāgaśobhi /
analyzed: kāncī guṇa grathita kāñcana cela dṛśya caṇḍa ātapa aṃśuka vibhā parabhāga śobhi

original: MSS_9364-2 paryaṅkamaṇḍalapariṣkaraṇaṃ purārer dhyāyāmi te nikhilamamba nitambabibhbam //
analyzed: paryaṅka maṇḍala pariṣkaraṇam purāreḥ dhyāyāmi te nikhilam amba nitamba bibhbam

original: MSS_9365-1 kāñcīguṇaiḥ kāñcanaratnacitrair no bhūṣayanti pramadā nitambam /
analyzed: kāñcī guṇaiḥ kāñcana ratna citraiḥ no bhūṣayanti pramadāḥ nitambam

original: MSS_9365-2 na nūpuraihaṃsarutaṃ bhajadbhiḥ pādāmbujānyambujakāntibhāñji //
analyzed: na nūpuraiḥ haṃsa rutam bhajadbhiḥ pāda ambujāni ambuja kānti bhāñji

original: MSS_9366-1 kāñcīguṇairviracitā jaghaneṣu lakṣmīr labdhā sthitiḥ stanataṭeṣu ca ratnahāraiḥ /
analyzed: kāñcī guṇaiḥ viracitā jaghaneṣu lakṣmīḥ labdhā sthitiḥ stana taṭeṣu ca ratna hāraiḥ
