original: MSS_9366-2 no bhūṣitā vayamitīva nitambinīnāṃ kārśya nirargalamadhāryata madhyabhāgaiḥ //
analyzed: naḥ bhūṣitāḥ vayam iti iva nitambinīnām kārśya nirargalam adhāryata madhya bhāgaiḥ

original: MSS_9367-1 kāñcīdāmakabandhanaṃ salalitā karṇotpalais tāḍanā helāliṅnavighnamāhitaruṣā maunena nirbhartsanam /
analyzed: kāñcī dāmaka bandhanam sa lalitā karṇa utpalaiḥ tāḍanā maunena nirbhartsanam

original: MSS_9367-2 kiṃ pūrvocitametadatra sahasā vismṛtya manyorbharān- mayyutkaṇṭhamanasyadarśanapathaṃ yātāsyaho kopane //
analyzed: kim pūrva ucitam etat atra sahasā vismṛtya manyoḥ bharāt mayi utkaṇṭha manasi adarśana patham yātā asi aho kopane

original: MSS_9368-1 kāñcīdāma dṛḍhaṃ vidhāya kavarīmābadhya gāḍhaṃ guṇair vakṣojādapasārya hāramasakṛd vyādhūya karṇotpalam /
analyzed: kāñcī dāma dṛḍham vidhāya kavarīm ābadhya gāḍham guṇaiḥ vakṣojāt apasārya hāram asakṛt vyādhūya karṇa utpalam

original: MSS_9368-2 dūrotsāritakaṅkaṇā vidhumukhī sotprāsahāsaṃ haṭhāt kaṇṭhe kasya karoti hanta dayitāśleṣāya dorbandhanam //
analyzed: dūra utsārita kaṅkaṇā vidhu mukhī sa utprāsa hāsam haṭhāt kaṇṭhe kasya karoti hanta dayita āśleṣāya dos bandhanam

original: MSS_9369-1 kāñcīdāma niveśayan vitanute vāsaḥ ślathaṃ subhruvo hāraṃ vakṣasi yojayan karatalaṃ dhatte kucāmbhoruhe /
analyzed: kāñcī dāma niveśayan vitanute vāsaḥ ślatham subhruvaḥ hāram vakṣasi yojayan kara talam dhatte kuca ambhoruhe

original: MSS_9369-2 jalpaṃścāṭuvaco'dharaṃ dhayati yat preyān kuto vismayaḥ pāṃsuṃ cakṣuṣi vikṣipan yadi dhanaṃ gṛhṇāsi pāṭaccaraḥ //
analyzed: jalpan cāṭu vacaḥ dharam dhayati yat preyān kutas vismayaḥ pāṃsum cakṣuṣi vikṣipan yadi dhanam gṛhṇāsi pāṭaccaraḥ

original: MSS_9369A-1 kāñcīsīmani kāpi kāñcanamayī niśreṇikā rājate tāmāsādya raṇotsavena mahatā kenāpi dhīra tvayā /
analyzed: kāñcī sīmani kā api kāñcana mayī niśreṇikā rājate tām āsādya raṇa utsavena mahatā kena api dhīra tvayā

original: MSS_9369A-2 sadyaḥ kaṇṭakaśālinā karayugenākramya śailadvayaṃ tasyopāntanivāsinaśca śaśinaḥ sphītā sudhā lapsyate //
analyzed: sadyas kaṇṭaka śālinā kara yugena ākramya śaila dvayam tasya upānta nivāsinaḥ ca śaśinaḥ sphītā sudhā lapsyate

original: MSS_9370-1 kāñcyā gāḍhatarāvabaddhavasanaprāntā kimarthaṃ punar mugdhākṣī svapitīti tatparijanaṃ svairaṃ priye pṛcchati /
analyzed: kāñcyā gāḍhatara avabaddha vasana prāntā kimartham punar mugdhākṣī svapiti iti tat parijanam svairam priye pṛcchati

original: MSS_9370-2 mātaḥ suptim apīha lumpati mamety āropitakrodhayā paryasya svapanacchalena śayane datto'vakāśas tayā //
analyzed: mātar suptim api iha lumpati mama iti āropita krodhayā paryasya svapana chalena śayane dattaḥ u vakāśaḥ tayā

original: MSS_9371-1 kāṭhinyaṃ kucayoḥ sraṣṭuṃ vāñchantyaḥ pādapadmayoḥ /
analyzed: kāṭhinyam kucayoḥ sraṣṭum vāñchantyaḥ pāda padmayoḥ

original: MSS_9371-2 nindanti ca vidhātāraṃ tvadghāṭīṣvariyoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: nindanti ca vidhātāram tvad ghāṭīṣu ari yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_9372-1 kāṭhinyaṃ kucakumbhayornayanayoścāñcalyametad dvayaṃ bho brahman bhavatā kathaṃ na padayorasmākamāsāditam /
analyzed: kāṭhinyam kuca kumbhayoḥ nayanayoḥ cāñcalyam etat dvayam bho brahman bhavatā katham na padayoḥ asmākam āsāditam

original: MSS_9372-2 itthaṃ śrīnarasiṃha te tribhuvanādhīśasya ghāṭībhiyā kāntāreṣu mithaḥ palāyanaparā jalpanti vairistriyaḥ //
analyzed: ittham śrī narasiṃha te tribhuvana adhīśasya ghāṭī bhiyā kāntāreṣu mithas palāyana parāḥ jalpanti vairi striyaḥ

original: MSS_9373-1 kāṭhinyaṃ giriṣu sadā mṛdutā salile dhruvā prabhā sūrye /
analyzed: kāṭhinyam giriṣu sadā mṛdu tā salile dhruvā prabhā sūrye

original: MSS_9373-2 vairamasajjanahṛdaye sajjanahṛdaye punaḥ kṣāntiḥ //
analyzed: vairam asat jana hṛdaye sat jana hṛdaye punar kṣāntiḥ

original: MSS_9374-1 kāṭhinyamaṅgairnikhilairnirastaṃ stanau kṛśāṅgyāḥ śaraṇaṃ jagāma /
analyzed: kāṭhinyam aṅgaiḥ nikhilaiḥ nirastam stanau kṛśa aṅgyāḥ śaraṇam jagāma

original: MSS_9374-2 adhaḥ patiṣyāva itīva bhītyā na śaknutastāvapi hātumetat //
analyzed: adhas patiṣyāvaḥ iti iva bhītyā na śaknutaḥ tau api hātum etat

original: MSS_9375-1 kāṇaḥ kubjo'tha khañjaḥ śrutibalavikalo vāmanaḥ paṅgurandhaḥ ṣaṇḍo'pi cchinnanāsaḥ parijanarahito durbhago rogadehī /
analyzed: kāṇaḥ kubjā utha khañjaḥ śruti bala vikalaḥ vāmanaḥ paṅgu randhaḥ ṣaṇḍaḥ api chinna nāsaḥ parijana rahitaḥ durbhagaḥ roga dehī

original: MSS_9375-2 duṣputro duṣkalatraḥ svajanaparijanairnindino hīnamānaḥ satyaṃ yajjāyate tat svakṛtamidamaho ceṣṭate jīvaloke //
analyzed: duṣputraḥ duṣkalatraḥ sva jana parijanaiḥ nindinaḥ hīna mānaḥ satyam yat jāyate tat sva kṛtam idam aho ceṣṭate jīva loke

original: MSS_9376-1 kāṇāḥ kamalapatrākṣāḥ kadaryāḥ kalpaśākhinaḥ /
analyzed: kāṇāḥ kamala patra akṣāḥ kadaryāḥ kalpa śākhinaḥ

original: MSS_9376-2 kātarā vikramādityāḥ kavidṛggocaraṃ gatāḥ //
analyzed: kātarāḥ vikramādityāḥ kavi dṛś gocaram gatāḥ

original: MSS_9377-1 kāṇāḥ kubjāśca ṣaṇḍāśca tathā vṛddhāśca paṅgavaḥ /
analyzed: kāṇāḥ kubjāḥ ca ṣaṇḍāḥ ca tathā vṛddhāḥ ca paṅgavaḥ

original: MSS_9377-2 ete cāntaḥpure nityaṃ niyoktavyāḥ kṣamābhṛtā //
analyzed: ete ca antaḥpure nityam niyoktavyāḥ kṣamābhṛtā

original: MSS_9378-1 kāṇāḥ khañjāśca kubjāśca atividdhāśca paṅgulāḥ /
analyzed: kāṇāḥ khañjāḥ ca kubjāḥ ca atividdhāḥ ca paṅgulāḥ

original: MSS_9378-2 eteṣvantaḥ purarakṣāyāṃ niyojyāḥ pārthivena tu //
analyzed: eteṣu antar pura rakṣāyām niyojyāḥ pārthivena tu

original: MSS_9378A-1 kāṇāśchaṭāśca raṃḍāśca tathā vṛddhāśca paṅgavaḥ /
analyzed: kāṇāḥ chaṭāḥ ca raṃḍāḥ ca tathā vṛddhāḥ ca paṅgavaḥ

original: MSS_9378A-2 ete cāntaḥpure nityaṃ niyoktavyāḥ kṣamābhṛtā //
analyzed: ete ca antaḥpure nityam niyoktavyāḥ kṣamābhṛtā

original: MSS_9378B-1 kāṇo nimagnaviṣamonnatadṛṣṭirekaḥ śakto virāgajanane jananāturāṇām /
analyzed: kāṇaḥ nimagna viṣama unnata dṛṣṭiḥ ekaḥ śaktaḥ virāga janane janana āturāṇām

original: MSS_9378B-2 yo naiva kasyacidupaiti manaḥpriyatvam ālekhyakarma likhito'pi kimu svarūpaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ nā eva kasyacid upaiti manaḥ priya tvam ālekhya karma likhitaḥ api kimu sva rūpaḥ

original: MSS_9379-1 kātaratākekarita- smaralajjāroṣamasṛṇamadhurākṣī /
analyzed: smara lajjā roṣa masṛṇa madhura akṣī

original: MSS_9379-2 yoktuṃ na moktumathavā valate'sāvarthalabdharatiḥ //
analyzed: yoktum na moktum athavā valate saḥ artha labdha ratiḥ

original: MSS_9380-1 kātaryaṃ kevalā nītiḥ śauryaṃ śvāpadaceṣṭitam /
analyzed: kātaryam kevalā nītiḥ śauryam śvāpada ceṣṭitam

original: MSS_9380-2 ataḥ siddhiṃ sametābhyām ubhābhyāmanviyeṣa saḥ //
analyzed: atas siddhim sametābhyām ubhābhyām anviyeṣa saḥ

original: MSS_9381-1 kātaryaṃ tu na kārmaṇaṃ na na paraṃ dambho na kiṃ yoṣitāṃ yaccittā tanucāpalaṃ madhuvidhudbeṣas tanutvaṃ tanoḥ /
analyzed: kātaryam tu na kārmaṇam na na param dambhaḥ na kim yoṣitām tanu cāpalam madhu vidhut beṣaḥ tanu tvam tanoḥ

original: MSS_9381-2 asmākaṃ sakhi paśya saṃprati tanū romāpi vakrāyate sadyaḥ proṣita nāthayābhinavayā pānthastriyo hāsitāḥ //
analyzed: asmākam sakhi paśya saṃprati tanūḥ romā api vakrāyate sadyas proṣita nāthayā abhinavayā pāntha striyaḥ hāsitāḥ

original: MSS_9382-1 kātaryaṃ durvinītatvaṃ kārpaṇyamavivekatā /
analyzed: kātaryam durvinīta tvam kārpaṇyam aviveka tā

original: MSS_9382-2 sarvaṃ mārjanti kavayaḥ śālīnāṃ muṣṭikiṃkarāḥ //
analyzed: sarvam mārjanti kavayaḥ śālīnām muṣṭi kiṃkarāḥ

original: MSS_9383-1 kā tava kāgtā kaste putraḥ saṃsāro'yamatīva vicitraḥ /
analyzed: kā tava kā agtā kaḥ te putraḥ saṃsāraḥ yam atīva vicitraḥ

original: MSS_9383-2 kasya tvaṃ vā kuta āyātas tat tvaṃ cintaya tadidaṃ bhrātaḥ //
analyzed: kasya tvam vā kutas āyātaḥ tat tvam cintaya tat idam bhrātar

original: MSS_9384-1 kā tārairmama garjitairuparatā dhārāmbubhiḥ kā hatā kā mohaṃ gamitā viyogavidhurā kā vā kadambānilaiḥ /
analyzed: kā tāraiḥ mama garjitaiḥ uparatā dhārā ambubhiḥ kā hatā kā moham gamitā viyoga vidhurā kā vā kadamba anilaiḥ

original: MSS_9384-2 nītā kā ca vilolatāṃ madakalaiḥ kekārabairbarhiṇām itthaṃ pānthagṛheṣu paśyati ghano vidyutpradīpairiva //
analyzed: nītā kā ca vilola tām mada kalaiḥ kekārabaiḥ barhiṇām ittham pāntha gṛheṣu paśyati ghanaḥ vidyut pradīpaiḥ iva

original: MSS_9385-1 kātyāyanīkusumakāmanayā kimarthaṃ kāntārakukṣikuharaṃ kutukād gatāsi /
analyzed: kātyāyanī kusuma kāmanayā kimartham kāntāra kukṣi kuharam kutukāt gatā asi

original: MSS_9385-2 paśya stanastabakayos tava kaṇṭakāṅkaṃ gopaḥ sukaṇṭhi bata paśyati jātakopaḥ //
analyzed: paśya stana stabakayoḥ tava kaṇṭaka aṅkam gopaḥ su kaṇṭhi bata paśyati jāta kopaḥ

original: MSS_9386-1 kātra śrīḥ śroṇibimbe sravadudarapurāvastikhadvāravācye lakṣmīḥ kā kāminīnāṃ kucakalaśayuge māṃsapiṇḍasvarūpe /
analyzed: kā atra śrīḥ śroṇi bimbe sravat udara pura avasti kha dvāra vācye lakṣmīḥ kā kāminīnām kuca kalaśa yuge māṃsa piṇḍa svarūpe

original: MSS_9386-2 kā kāntirnetrayugme jalakaluṣajuṣi śleṣmaraktādipūrṇe kā śobhāvartagarte nigadata yadaho mohinastāḥ stuvanti //
analyzed: kā kāntiḥ netra yugme jala kaluṣa juṣi śleṣma rakta ādi pūrṇe kā śobhā āvarta garte nigadata yat aho mohinaḥ tāḥ stuvanti

original: MSS_9386A-1 kā tvaṃ kāmini jāhnavī,
analyzed: kā tvam kāmini jāhnavī

original: kimiha te,
analyzed: kim iha te

original: bhartā haro nanvasāv ambhastvaṃ kila vetsi manmathakalāṃ,
analyzed: bhartā haraḥ nanu asau ambhaḥ tvam kila vetsi manmatha kalām

original: jānātyayaṃ te patiḥ /
analyzed: jānāti ayam te patiḥ

original: MSS_9386A-2 svāmin satyamidaṃ,
analyzed: svāmin satyam idam

original: nahi priyatame satyaḥ kutaḥ kāmināṃ ityevaṃ harajāhnavīgirisutāsaṃjalpitaṃ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: nahi priyatame satyaḥ kutas kāminām iti evam hara jāhnavī giri sutā saṃjalpitam pātu vaḥ

original: MSS_9387-1 kā tvaṃ, kuntalamallakīrtir,
analyzed: kā tvam kuntala malla kīrtiḥ

original: ahaha kvāsi sthitā,
analyzed: ahaha kva asi sthitā

original: na kvacit sakhyastāstava kutra kutra vada vāg lakṣmīs tathā kāntayaḥ /
analyzed: na kvacid sakhyaḥ tāḥ tava kutra kutra vada vāc lakṣmīḥ tathā kāntayaḥ

original: MSS_9387-2 vāg yātā caturānanasya vadanaṃ lakṣmīrmurāreruraḥ kāntirmaṇḍalamaindavaṃ mama punarnādyāpi viśrāmabhūḥ //
analyzed: vāc yātā caturānanasya vadanam lakṣmīḥ murāreḥ uraḥ kāntiḥ maṇḍalam aindavam mama punar na adya api viśrāma bhūḥ

original: MSS_9388-1 kā tvaṃ padmapalāśākṣi pītakauśeyavāsini /
analyzed: kā tvam padma palāśa akṣi pīta kauśeya vāsini

original: MSS_9388-2 drumasya śākhāmālambya tiṣṭhasi tvamanindate //
analyzed: drumasya śākhām ālambya tiṣṭhasi tvam anindate

original: MSS_9389-1 kā tvaṃ putri,
analyzed: kā tvam putri

original: narendra lubdhakavadhūr,
analyzed: narendra lubdhaka vadhūḥ

original: haste kimetat,
analyzed: haste kim etat

original: palaṃ kṣāmaṃ kiṃ,
analyzed: palam kṣāmam kim

original: sahajaṃ bravīmi nṛpate yadyādarācchrūyate /
analyzed: sahajam bravīmi nṛpate yadi ādarāt śrūyate

original: MSS_9389-2 gāyanti tvadaripriyāśrutaṭinītīreṣu siddhāṅganā gītāndhā na tṛṇaṃ caranti hariṇāstenāmiṣaṃ durbalam //
analyzed: gāyanti tvad ari priya aśru taṭinī tīreṣu siddha aṅganāḥ gīta andhāḥ na tṛṇam caranti hariṇāḥ tena āmiṣam durbalam

original: MSS_9390-1 kā tvaṃ, mādhavadūtikā,
analyzed: kā tvam mādhava dūtikā

original: vadasi kiṃ,
analyzed: vadasi kim

original: mānaṃ jahīhi priye dhūrtaḥ so'nyamanā,
analyzed: mānam jahīhi priye dhūrtaḥ saḥ unya manāḥ

original: manāgapi sakhi tvayyādaraṃ nojjhati /
analyzed: manāk api sakhi tvayi ādaram nā ujjhati

original: MSS_9390-2 ityanyonyakathārasaiḥ pramuditāṃ rādhāṃ sakhīveṣavān nītvā kuñjagṛhaṃ prakāśitatanuḥ smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: iti anyonya kathā rasaiḥ pramuditām rādhām sakhī veṣavān nītvā kuñja gṛham prakāśita tanuḥ smeraḥ hariḥ pātu vaḥ

original: MSS_9391-1 kā tvaṃ, mukti,
analyzed: kā tvam

original: rupāgatāsmi bhavatī kasmādakasmādiha śrīkṛṣṇasmaraṇena deva bhavato dāsīpadaṃ prāpitā /
analyzed: bhavatī kasmāt akasmāt iha śrī kṛṣṇa smaraṇena deva bhavataḥ dāsī padam prāpitā

original: MSS_9391-2 dūre tiṣṭha manāganāgasi kathaṃ kuryādanāryaṃ mayi tvadgandhānnijanāmacandanarasālepasya lopo bhavet //
analyzed: dūre tiṣṭha manāk anāgasi katham kuryāt anāryam mayi tvad gandhāt nija nāma candana rasa ālepasya lopaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_9392-1 kā tvaṃ śubhe kasya parigraho vā kiṃ vā madabhyāgamakāraṇaṃ te /
analyzed: kā tvam śubhe kasya parigrahaḥ vā kim vā mad abhyāgama kāraṇam te

original: MSS_9392-2 ācakṣva matvā vaśināṃ raghūṇāṃ manaḥ parastrīvimukhapravṛtti //
analyzed: ācakṣva matvā vaśinām raghūṇām manaḥ para strī vimukha pravṛtti

original: MSS_9393-1 kādambinī kambalikā kadamba- kedārakāntākucakuṭṭimaṃ ca /
analyzed: kādambinī kambalikā kadamba kedāra kāntā kuca kuṭṭimam ca

original: MSS_9393-2 kastūrikā ketakapuṣpagamdhaḥ kekāravaḥ prāvṛṣi harṣamūlam //
MSS_9394-1 kādambinī kimiyamāli kadambamūle kiṃ vā tamālatarureva kimandhakāraḥ /
analyzed: kādambinī kim iyam āli kadamba mūle kim vā tamāla taruḥ eva kim andhakāraḥ

original: MSS_9394-2 jānāsi naiva sakhi gopakulāṅganānāṃ kaulavratavratatibhaṅgakaraḥ karīndraḥ //
analyzed: jānāsi nā eva sakhi gopa kula aṅganānām kaula vrata vratati bhaṅga karaḥ kari indraḥ

original: MSS_9394A-1 kā dīyatāṃ tava raghūdvaha samyagāśīr niṣkaṇṭakāni vihitāni jaganti yena /
analyzed: kā dīyatām tava raghūdvaha samyak āśīḥ niṣkaṇṭakāni vihitāni jaganti yena

original: MSS_9394A-2 āśāsmahe nanu tathāpi saha svavīrair bhūkāśyapopamasutadvitayā vadhūḥ syāt //
analyzed: āśāsmahe nanu tathā api saha sva vīraiḥ bhū kāśyapa upama suta dvitayā vadhūḥ syāt

original: MSS_9395-1 kā durdaśā kupitanirdayacitragupta- vitrāsitasya jagato yadi devi na syāḥ /
analyzed: kā durdaśā kupita nirdaya citragupta vitrāsitasya jagataḥ yadi devi na syāḥ

original: MSS_9395-2 tvaṃ karmabandhanavimocanadharmarāja- lekhādhikārapariśodhanajātapatrī //
analyzed: tvam karma bandhana vimocana dharma rāja lekhā adhikāra pariśodhana jāta patrī

original: MSS_9396-1 kā dyauḥ, kiṃ balasadma,
analyzed: kā dyauḥ kim balasadma

original: kā vasumatī,
analyzed: kā vasumatī

original: syāt sarvametad yadi pratyakṣaṃ na bhavet kadācidapi kiṃ te sarvasandarśinaḥ /
analyzed: syāt sarvam etat yadi pratyakṣam na bhavet kadācid api kim te sarva sandarśinaḥ

original: MSS_9396-2 bhrāmyantaḥ pralapantu nāma viditaṃ maṇḍūka samyak tvayā muktvemaṃ paramaṃ kukūpamitarat kiṃ nāma saṃbhāvyate //
analyzed: bhrāmyantaḥ pralapantu nāma viditam maṇḍūka samyak tvayā muktvā imam paramam kukūpam itarat kim nāma saṃbhāvyate

original: MSS_9397-1 kānane sariduddeśe girīṇāmapi kandare /
analyzed: kānane sarit uddeśe girīṇām api kandare

original: MSS_9397-2 paśyantyantakasaṃkāśaṃ tvāmekaṃ ripavaḥ puraḥ //
analyzed: paśyanti antaka saṃkāśam tvām ekam ripavaḥ puras

original: MSS_9398-1 kā nāma buddhihīnasya vidheravidagdhatā /
analyzed: kā nāma buddhi hīnasya vidheḥ avidagdha tā

original: MSS_9398A-2 kūṣmāṇḍānāṃ na yaścakre tailamūrṇāṃ ca dantinām
analyzed: kūṣmāṇḍānām na yaḥ cakre tailam ūrṇām ca dantinām

original: MSS_9399-1 kāni sthānāni dagdhānyatiśayagahanāḥ santi ke vā pradeśāḥ kiṃ vā śeṣaṃ vanasya sthitamiti pavanāsaṅgavispaṣṭatejāḥ /
analyzed: kāni sthānāni dagdhāni atiśaya gahanāḥ santi ke vā pradeśāḥ kim vā śeṣam vanasya sthitam iti pavana āsaṅga vispaṣṭa tejāḥ

original: MSS_9399-2 caṇḍajvālāvalīḍhasphuṭitatarulatāgranthimuktāṭṭahāso dāvāgniḥ śuṣkavṛkṣe śikhariṇi gahane'dhiṣṭhitaḥ paśyatīva //
analyzed: caṇḍa jvālā avalīḍha sphuṭita taru latā granthi mukta aṭṭahāsaḥ dāva agniḥ śuṣka vṛkṣe śikhariṇi paśyati iva

original: MSS_9400-1 kānīnas tu pitāmahaḥ samabhavat pitrādayo golakās tatputrāśca yudhiṣṭhiraprabhṛtayaḥ kuṇḍā hyamī pāṇḍavāḥ /
analyzed: kānīnaḥ tu pitāmahaḥ samabhavat pitṛ ādayaḥ golakāḥ tad putrāḥ ca yudhiṣṭhira prabhṛtayaḥ kuṇḍāḥ hi amī pāṇḍavāḥ

original: MSS_9400-2 pañcānāṃ drupadātmajā sahacarī yuddhe hatā bāndhavā śrīkṛṣṇena kulaṃ kalaṅkanicitaṃ nītaṃ jagadvanditam //
analyzed: pañcānām drupada ātmajā sahacarī yuddhe hatā bāndhavā śrī kṛṣṇena kulam kalaṅka nicitam nītam jagat vanditam

original: MSS_9401-1 kānīnasya muneḥ svabāndhavavadhūvaidhavyavidhvaṃsino naptāraḥ khalu golakasya tanayāḥ kuṇḍāḥ svayaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ /
analyzed: kānīnasya muneḥ sva bāndhava vadhū vaidhavya vidhvaṃsinaḥ naptāraḥ khalu golakasya tanayāḥ kuṇḍāḥ svayam pāṇḍavāḥ

original: MSS_9401-2 te'mī pañca samānayoniratayas teṣāṃ guṇotkīrtanād akṣayyaṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavedavikalaṃ,
analyzed: pañca samāna yoni ratayaḥ teṣām guṇa utkīrtanāt akṣayyam sukṛtam bhavet avikalam

original: dharmasya sūkṣmā gatiḥ //
analyzed: dharmasya sūkṣmā gatiḥ

original: MSS_9401A-1 kāntaṃ kandarpapuṣpaṃ stanataṭaśaśinaṃ rāgavṛkṣapravālaṃ śayyāyuddhābhighātaṃ surataratharaṇaśrāntadhuryapratomad /
analyzed: kāntam kandarpa puṣpam stana taṭa śaśinam rāgavṛkṣa pravālam śayyā yuddha abhighātam surata ratha raṇa śrānta dhurya pratomat

original: MSS_9401A-2 unmeṣaṃ vimramāṇāṃ karajapadamayaṃ guhyasambhogacihnaṃ rāgākrāntā vahantāṃ jaghananipatitaṃ karkaśāḥ strīkiśoryaḥ //
analyzed: unmeṣam vimramāṇām karaja pada mayam guhya sambhoga cihnam rāga ākrāntāḥ vahantām jaghana nipatitam karkaśāḥ strī kiśoryaḥ

original: MSS_9402-1 kāntaṃ khalagirā kāvyaṃ labhate bhūyasīṃ rucam /
analyzed: kāntam khala girā kāvyam labhate bhūyasīm rucam

original: MSS_9402-2 spṛṣṭaṃ ca daṃṣṭtrayā hṛdyaṃ yathā hemavibhūṣaṇam //
analyzed: spṛṣṭam ca daṃṣṭtrayā hṛdyam yathā hema vibhūṣaṇam

original: MSS_9403-1 kāntaṃ nirīkṣya valayāṅkitakaṇṭhadeśaṃ muktāstayā parabhiyā paruṣā na vācaḥ /
analyzed: kāntam nirīkṣya valaya aṅkita kaṇṭha deśam muktāḥ tayā para bhiyā paruṣāḥ na vācaḥ

original: MSS_9403-2 dūtīmukhe mṛgadṛśā skhaladambupūrā dūrātparaṃ nidadhire nayanāntapātāḥ //
analyzed: dūtī mukhe mṛga dṛśā skhalat ambupūrāḥ dūrāt param nidadhire nayana anta pātāḥ

original: MSS_9403A-1 kāntaṃ rūpaṃ yauvanaṃ cārulīlaṃ dānaṃ dākṣipyaṃ vāk ca sāmopapannā /
analyzed: kāntam rūpam yauvanam cāru līlam dānam dākṣipyam vāc ca sāma upapannā

original: MSS_9403A-2 yaṃ prāpyaite sadguṇāḥ bhānti sarve loke kāminyaḥ kā na tasya prasādyāḥ //
analyzed: yam prāpya ete sat guṇāḥ bhānti sarve loke kāminyaḥ kā na tasya prasādyāḥ

original: MSS_9404-1 kāntaṃ vakti kapotikākulatayā nāthāntakālo'dhunā vyādho'dho dhṛtacāpasajjitaśaraḥ śvenaḥ paribhrāmati /
analyzed: kāntam vakti kapotikā ākula tayā vyādha udhaḥ dhṛta cāpa sajjita śaraḥ śvenaḥ paribhrāmati

original: MSS_9404-2 itthaṃ satyahinā sa daṣṭa iṣuṇā śyeno'pi tenāhatas tūrṇaṃ tau tu yamālayaṃ prati gatau daivī vicitrā gatiḥ //
analyzed: ittham satyahinā sa daṣṭaḥ iṣuṇā śyenaḥ upi tena āhataḥ tūrṇam tau tu yama ālayam prati gatau daivī vicitrā gatiḥ

original: MSS_9405-1 kāntaṃ vicintya sulabhetarasaṃprayogāṃ śrutvā vidarbhapatimānamitaṃ balaiśca /
analyzed: kāntam vicintya sulabha itara saṃprayogām śrutvā vidarbha pati mānam itam balaiḥ ca

original: MSS_9405-2 dhārābhirātapa ivābhihataṃ sarojaṃ duḥkhāyate ca hṛdayaṃ sukhamaśnute ca //
analyzed: dhārābhiḥ ātape iva abhihatam sarojam duḥkhāyate ca hṛdayam sukham aśnute ca

original: MSS_9406-1 kāntaṃ vinā nadītīraṃ madamālokya kekinī /
analyzed: kāntam vinā nadī tīram madam ālokya kekinī

original: MSS_9406-2 atra kriyāpadaṃ guptaṃ yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: atra kriyā padam guptam yaḥ jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_9407-1 kāntaṃ vīkṣya vipakṣapakṣmaladṛśaḥ pādāmbujālaktakair āliptānanamānatīkṛtamukhī citrārpitevābhavat /
analyzed: kāntam vīkṣya vipakṣa pakṣmala dṛśaḥ pāda ambuja alaktakaiḥ ālipta ānanam ānatīkṛta mukhī citra arpitā iva abhavat

original: MSS_9407-2 rūkṣaṃ noktavatī na vā kṛtavatī niḥśvāsakoṣṇe dṛśau prātarmaṅgalamaṅganā karatalādādarśamādarśayat //
analyzed: rūkṣam nā uktavatī na vā kṛtavatī niḥśvāsa koṣṇe dṛśau prātar maṅgalam aṅganā kara talāt ādarśam ādarśayat

original: MSS_9408-1 kāntaḥ kaṭākṣapātena bhrāmayannayanadvayam /
analyzed: kāntaḥ kaṭākṣa pātena bhrāmayan nayana dvayam

original: MSS_9408-2 sugandhimāruto tāta śṛṅgārarasasevitaḥ //
analyzed: tāta śṛṅgāra rasa sevitaḥ

original: MSS_9409-1 kāntaḥ karaṃ spṛśati jalpati cāṭuvācam ālokate mukhamapākurute dukūlam /
analyzed: kāntaḥ karam spṛśati jalpati cāṭu vācam ālokate mukham apākurute dukūlam

original: MSS_9409-2 ityeva kevalamanaṅga vilāsabhītā svapne'pi paśyati navoḍhasaroruhākṣī //
analyzed: iti eva kevalam anaṅga vilāsa bhītā svapne pi paśyati na voḍha saroruha akṣī

original: MSS_9410-1 kāntaḥ kucādekakareṇa veṇīm eṇīdṛśaḥ karṣati kautukena /
analyzed: kāntaḥ kucāt eka kareṇa veṇīm eṇī dṛśaḥ karṣati kautukena

original: MSS_9410-2 anyāṅganāsaṅgamaśuddhihetoḥ śyāmāṃ bhujaṅgīmiva hemakumbhāt //
analyzed: anya aṅganā saṅgam aśuddhi hetoḥ śyāmām bhujaṅgīm iva hema kumbhāt

original: MSS_9411-1 kāntaḥ kṛtāntacaritaḥ kuṭilā tadambā vajropamāni vacanāni ca durjanānām /
analyzed: kāntaḥ kṛtānta caritaḥ kuṭilā tad ambā vajra upamāni vacanāni ca durjanānām

original: MSS_9411-2 pratyaṅgamantaratanoḥ praharanti bāṇāḥ prāṇāḥ punaḥ sakhi bahirna khalu prayānti //
analyzed: prati aṅgam antara tanoḥ praharanti bāṇāḥ prāṇāḥ punar sakhi bahis na khalu prayānti

original: MSS_9412-1 kāntaḥ padena hata iti saralāmaparādhya kiṃ prasādayatha /
analyzed: kāntaḥ padena hataḥ iti saralām aparādhya kim prasādayatha

original: MSS_9412-2 so'pyevameva sulabhaḥ padaprahāraḥ prasādaḥ kim //
analyzed: saḥ upi evam eva sulabhaḥ pada prahāraḥ prasādaḥ kim

original: MSS_9413-1 kāntaḥ putri haṭhād gataścaraṇayorna tvaṃ nipatya sthitā baddho mekhalayānayā ratirahaḥ sakhyā na vā phūtkṛtam /
analyzed: kāntaḥ putri haṭhāt gataḥ caraṇayoḥ na tvam nipatya sthitā baddhaḥ mekhalayā anayā ratiḥ ahar sakhyā na vā phūtkṛtam

original: MSS_9413-2 kā lajjā muṣitāsi kiṃ prakaṭitairebhirvilakṣasmitair āḥ pāpe virahānalasya na śikhā jānāsi marmacchidaḥ //
analyzed: kā lajjā muṣitā asi kim prakaṭitaiḥ ebhiḥ vilakṣa smitaiḥ āḥ pāpe viraha analasya na śikhāḥ jānāsi marma chidaḥ

original: MSS_9414-1 kāntadūtya iva kuṅkumatāmrāḥ sāyamaṇḍalamabhitvarayantyaḥ /
analyzed: kānta dūtyaḥ iva kuṅkuma tāmrāḥ sāya maṇḍalam abhitvarayantyaḥ

original: MSS_9414-2 sādaraṃ dadṛśire vanitābhiḥ saudhajālapatitā ravibhāsaḥ //
analyzed: sa ādaram dadṛśire vanitābhiḥ saudha jāla patitāḥ ravi bhāsaḥ

original: MSS_9415-1 kāntaprakarṣaṃ daśanacchadena sandhyāghane baddhapadaṃ harantyāḥ /
analyzed: kānta prakarṣam daśanacchadena sandhyā ghane baddha padam harantyāḥ

original: MSS_9415-2 tasyā gṛhodyānasarogatasya hastasya evāmburuhasya rāgaḥ //
analyzed: tasyāḥ gṛha udyāna saraḥ gatasya hastasya eva amburuhasya rāgaḥ

original: MSS_9416-1 kāntarmūrdhni dadhatī vidhitsayā tanmaṇeḥ śravaṇapūramutpalam /
analyzed: kāntar mūrdhni dadhatī vidhitsayā tad maṇeḥ śravaṇa pūram utpalam

original: MSS_9416-2 rantumarcanamivācarat puraḥ sā svavallabhatano manobhuvaḥ //
analyzed: rantum arcanam iva acarat puras sā sva vallabha tano manobhuvaḥ

original: MSS_9417-1 kāntayā kāntasaṃyoge kimakāri navoḍhayā /
analyzed: kāntayā kānta saṃyoge kim akāri na voḍhayā

original: MSS_9417-2 atrāpi cottaraṃ vaktum avadhirbrahmaṇo vayaḥ //
analyzed: atrā api ca uttaram vaktum avadhiḥ brahmaṇaḥ vayaḥ

original: MSS_9418-1 kāntayānugataḥ ko'yaṃ pīnaskandho madoddhataḥ /
analyzed: kāntayā anugataḥ koyam pīna skandhaḥ mada uddhataḥ

original: MSS_9418-2 mṛgāṇāṃ pṛṣṭhato yāti śambaro rūḍhayauvanaḥ //
analyzed: mṛgāṇām pṛṣṭhatas yāti śambaraḥ rūḍha yauvanaḥ

original: MSS_9419-1 kāntayā sapadi ko'pyupagūḍhaḥ prauḍhapāṇirapanetumiyeṣa /
analyzed: kāntayā sapadi kopī upagūḍhaḥ prauḍha pāṇiḥ apanetum iyeṣa

original: MSS_9419-2 saṃhatastanatiraskṛtadṛṣṭir bhraṣṭameva na dukūlamapaśyat //
analyzed: saṃhata stana tiraskṛta dṛṣṭiḥ bhraṣṭam eva na dukūlam apaśyat

original: MSS_9420-1 kāntaveśma bahu saṃdiśatībhir yātameva rataye ramaṇībhiḥ /
analyzed: kānta veśma bahu saṃdiśatībhiḥ yātam eva rataye ramaṇībhiḥ

original: MSS_9420-2 manmathena pariluptamatīnāṃ prāyaśaḥ skhalitamapyupakāri //
analyzed: manmathena parilupta matīnām prāyaśas skhalitam api upakāri

original: MSS_9421-1 kāntasaṃgamaparājitamanyau vāruṇīrasanaśāntavivāde /
analyzed: kānta saṃgama parājita manyau vāruṇī rasana śānta vivāde

original: MSS_9421-2 māninījana upāhitasaṃdhau saṃdadhe dhanuṣi neṣumanaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: māninī jane upāhita saṃdhau saṃdadhe dhanuṣi na iṣum anaṅgaḥ

original: MSS_9422-1 kāntaste kamalābhirāmanayane kalpe hi deśāntaraṃ ganteti śrutamadya lokavacanāt tathyaṃ kimetad vacaḥ /
analyzed: kāntaḥ te kamala abhirāma nayane kalpe hi deśa antaram gantā iti śrutam adya loka vacanāt tathyam kim etat vacaḥ

original: MSS_9422-2 pṛṣṭā seti mayā dayādhananidhe provāca dīnānanā yat tad vaktumapi kṣamā na rasanā me jāyate sāmpratam //
analyzed: pṛṣṭā sā iti mayā dayā dhana nidhe provāca dīna ānanā yat tat vaktum api kṣamā na rasanā me jāyate sāmpratam

original: MSS_9423-1 kāntāṃ kāmapi kāmayatyanudinaṃ dhyānāpadeśādayaṃ yenāmuṃ munayo'pyanādinidhanaṃ dhyāyanti dhautaspṛhāḥ /
analyzed: kāntām kām api kāmayati anudinam dhyāna apadeśāt ayam yena amum munayaḥ api anādinidhanam dhyāyanti dhauta spṛhāḥ

original: MSS_9423-2 ityaṅkāt svakare hṛte girijayā pāde ca padmāsanād viśvaṃ pātu purandhrinaddhavapuṣaḥ śambhoḥ samādhivyayaḥ //
analyzed: iti aṅkāt sva kare hṛte girijayā pāde ca padmāsanāt viśvam pātu purandhri naddha vapuṣaḥ śambhoḥ samādhi vyayaḥ

original: MSS_9424-1 kāntāṃ kvāpi vilambinīṃ kalarutairāhūya bhūyas tato digbhāgānavalokya raṅgavasudhāmutsṛjya padbhyāṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: kāntām kvāpi vilambinīm kala rutaiḥ āhūya bhūyas tatas digbhāgān avalokya raṅga vasudhām utsṛjya padbhyām tatas

original: MSS_9424-2 eṣa sphāramṛdaṅganādamadhurairambhomucāmāravair barhaśreṇikṛtātapatraracano hṛṣṭaḥ śikhī nṛtyati //
analyzed: eṣa sphāra mṛdaṅga nāda madhuraiḥ ambhomucām āravaiḥ barha śreṇi kṛta ātapatra racanaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ śikhī nṛtyati

original: MSS_9425-1 kāntāṃ dṛṣṭvā caraṇayugalakṣālanāya pravṛttām asmin rāṣṭre śriyamiti vacaḥ pāpaṭhīti prayatnāt /
analyzed: kāntām dṛṣṭvā caraṇa yugala kṣālanāya pravṛttām asmin rāṣṭre śriyam iti vacaḥ pāpaṭhī iti prayatnāt

original: MSS_9425-2 devasya tveti ca punarasau vīṭikāyāḥ pradāne jāmātā te jaḍamatirayaṃ chāndasaḥ kiṃ karomi //
analyzed: devasya tvā iti ca punar asau vīṭikāyāḥ pradāne jāmātā te jaḍa matiḥ ayam chāndasaḥ kim karomi

original: MSS_9426-1 kāntāṃ hitvā virahavidhurārambhakhedālasāṅgīṃ māmullaṅghya vrajatu pathikaḥ ko'pi yadyasti śaktiḥ /
analyzed: kāntām hitvā viraha vidhura ārambha kheda alasa aṅgīm mām ullaṅghya vrajatu pathikaḥ kaḥ api yadi asti śaktiḥ

original: MSS_9426-2 ityāśokī jagati sakale vallarī corikeva prāptāramme kusumasamaye kāmadevena dattā //
analyzed: iti āśokī jagati sakale vallarī corikā iva prāpta āramme kusuma samaye kāmadevena dattā

original: MSS_9427-1 kāntāḥ kiṃ na śaśāṅkakāntidhavalāḥ saudhālayāḥ kasyacit kāñcīdāmavirājitorujaghanā sevyā na kiṃ kāminī /
analyzed: kāntāḥ kim na śaśāṅka kānti dhavalāḥ saudha ālayāḥ kasyacid kāñcī dāma virājita ūru jaghanā sevyā na kim kāminī

original: MSS_9427-2 kiṃ vā śrotrarasāyanaṃ sukhakaraṃ śravyaṃ na gītādikaṃ viśvaṃ kintu vilokya mārutacalaṃ santastapaḥ kurvate //
analyzed: kim vā śrotra rasāyanam sukha karam śravyam na gīta ādikam viśvam kintu vilokya māruta calam santaḥ tapaḥ kurvate

original: MSS_9427A-1 kāntākaṭākṣavapuṣe namaḥ kusumadhanvane /
analyzed: kāntā kaṭākṣa vapuṣe namaḥ kusumadhanvane

original: MSS_9427A-2 jāyate yena sacchāyo viraso'pi bhavadrumaḥ //
analyzed: jāyate yena sa chāyaḥ virasaḥ api bhava drumaḥ

original: MSS_9428-1 kāntākaṭākṣaviśikhā na khananti yasya cittaṃ na nirdahati kopakṛśānutāpaḥ /
analyzed: kāntā kaṭākṣa viśikhāḥ na khananti yasya cittam na nirdahati kopa kṛśa anutāpaḥ

original: MSS_9428-2 karṣanti bhūriviṣayāśca na lobhapāśā lokatrayaṃ jayati kṛtsnamidaṃ sa dhīraḥ //
analyzed: karṣanti bhūri viṣayāḥ ca na lobha pāśāḥ lokatrayam jayati kṛtsnam idam sa dhīraḥ

original: MSS_9429-1 kāntā karṣaṇalolakeralavadhūdhammillamallīrajaś- caurāścoḍanitambinīstanataṭe niṣpandatāmāgatāḥ /
analyzed: kāntā karṣaṇa lola kerala vadhū dhammilla mallī rajaḥ caurāḥ coḍa nitambinī stana taṭe niṣpanda tām āgatāḥ

original: MSS_9429-2 revāśīkaradhāriṇo'ndhramuralastrīmānamudrābhi do vātā vānti navīnakokilavaghūhūṃkāravācālitāḥ //
analyzed: revā śīkara dhāriṇā undhra murala strī māna mudrā abhi daḥ vātāḥ vānti navīna kokila vaghūhūṃkāra vācālitāḥ

original: MSS_9430-1 kāntākeliṃ kalayatu taruḥ ko'pi kaścit prabhūṇām atyānandaṃ janayatu phalaiḥ ko'pi lokān dhinotu /
analyzed: kāntā kelim kalayatu taruḥ kaḥ api kaścid prabhūṇām ati ānandam janayatu phalaiḥ kaḥ api lokān dhinotu

original: MSS_9430-2 dhanyaṃ manye malayajamaho yaḥ prabhūtopatāpaṃ saṃsārasya drutamapanayatyātmadehavyayena //
analyzed: dhanyam manye malayaja mahaḥ yaḥ prabhūta upatāpam saṃsārasya drutam apanayati ātma deha vyayena

original: MSS_9431-1 kāntākelimayopi bhūtakaruṇāśānto'pyasau saṃyamī krīḍārūḍhasamādhibhaṅgavikaṭabhrūbhaṅgabhīmānanaḥ /
analyzed: kāntā keli mayaḥ api bhūta karuṇā śāntaḥ api asau saṃyamī krīḍā ārūḍha samādhi bhaṅga vikaṭa bhrū bhaṅga bhīma ānanaḥ

original: MSS_9431-2 dṛṣṭvākṛṣṭaśarāsanaṃ yadakarot kruddhaḥ pinākī smaraṃ tvāmapyadya dṛśā tadeva kurute krodhādayaṃ kauśikaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ākṛṣṭa śarāsanam yat akarot kruddhaḥ pinākī smaram tvām api adya dṛśā tat eva kurute krodhāt ayam kauśikaḥ

original: MSS_9432-1 kāntā candrodayo vīṇāpañcamadhvanirityamī /
MSS_9432-2 ye nandayanti sukhitān duḥkhitān vyathayanti te //
analyzed: ye nandayanti sukhitān duḥkhitān vyathayanti te

original: MSS_9433-1 kāntājanaṃ suratakhedanimīlitākṣaṃ saṃvāhituṃ samupayāniva mandamandam /
analyzed: kāntā janam surata kheda nimīlita akṣam saṃvāhitum samupayān iva mandamandam

original: MSS_9433-2 harmyeṣu mālyamadirāparibhogagandhān āviścakāra rajanīparivṛttivāyuḥ //
analyzed: harmyeṣu mālya madirā paribhoga gandhān āviścakāra rajanī parivṛtti vāyuḥ

original: MSS_9434-1 kāntājanena rahasi prasabhaṃ gṛhīta- keśe rate smarasahāsavatoṣitena /
analyzed: kāntā janena rahasi prasabham gṛhīta keśe rate

original: MSS_9434-2 premṇā manassu rajanīṣvapi haimanīṣu ke śerate sma rasahāsavatoṣitena //
analyzed: premṇā manassu rajanīṣu api haimanīṣu ke śerate sma rasa hāsavatā uṣitena

original: MSS_9435-1 kāntā dadāti madanaṃ madanaḥ saṃtāpamasamamanupaśayam /
analyzed: kāntā dadāti madanam madanaḥ saṃtāpam asamam anupaśayam

original: MSS_9435-2 saṃtāpo maraṇamaho tathāpi śaraṇaṃ nṛṇāṃ saiva //
analyzed: saṃtāpaḥ maraṇam aho tathā api śaraṇam nṛṇām sā eva

original: MSS_9435A-1 kāntādharasudhāsvādādyūnaṃ yajjāyate sukham /
analyzed: kānta adhara sudhā āsvādāt yūnam yat jāyate sukham

original: MSS_9435A-2 binduḥ pārśve tadadhyātmaśāstrāsvādasukhodadheḥ //
analyzed: binduḥ pārśve tad adhyātma śāstra āsvāda sukha udadheḥ

original: MSS_9436-1 kāntādharāsavanipānamupāsya dhīmān pīyūṣapānakṛtaye na ruciṃ prayāti /
analyzed: kāntā adhara āsava nipānam upāsya dhīmān pīyūṣa pāna kṛtaye na rucim prayāti

original: MSS_9436-2 tatrāsti cenmadhurimā bata ko'pi satyaṃ kiṃ nāma tāta tṛṣiṭāḥ kṣudhitāḥ punaḥ syuḥ //
analyzed: tatra asti ced madhurimā bata kaḥ api satyam kim nāma tāta kṣudhitāḥ punar syuḥ

original: MSS_9437-1 kāntānavādhararasāmṛtatṛṣṇayeva bimbaṃ papāta śaśino madhubhājane yat /
analyzed: kāntā nava adhara rasa amṛta tṛṣṇayā iva bimbam papāta śaśinaḥ madhu bhājane yat

original: MSS_9437-2 niḥśeṣite madhuni lajjitacittavṛtti tat tanmukhābjajitakāntitayā vinaṣṭam //
analyzed: niḥśeṣite madhuni lajjita cittavṛtti tat tad mukha abja jita kānti tayā vinaṣṭam

original: MSS_9438-1 kāntānāṃ kuvalayamapyapāstamakṣṇoḥ śobhābhirna mukharucāhamekameva /
analyzed: kāntānām kuvalayam api apāstam akṣṇoḥ śobhābhiḥ na mukha rucā aham ekam eva

original: MSS_9438-2 saṃharṣādalivirutairitīva gāyaṃl lolormau payasi mahotpalaṃ nanarta //
analyzed: saṃharṣāt ali virutaiḥ iti iva gāyan lola ūrmau payasi mahā utpalam nanarta

original: MSS_9439-1 kāntānāṃ kṛtapulakaḥ stanāṅgarāge vaktreṣu cyutatilakeṣu mauktikāmbhaḥ /
analyzed: kāntānām kṛta pulakaḥ stana aṅgarāge vaktreṣu cyuta tilakeṣu mauktika ambhaḥ

original: MSS_9439-2 saṃpede śramasalilodgamo vibhūṣāṃ ramyāṇāṃ vikṛtirapi śriyaṃ tanoti //
analyzed: saṃpede śrama salila udgamaḥ vibhūṣām ramyāṇām vikṛtiḥ api śriyam tanoti

original: MSS_9440-1 kāntānāṃ vadanendukāntimadhunā dhatte sudhādīdhitiḥ khelatkhañjanapaṅktayo mṛgadṛśāṃ tanvanti netraśriyam /
analyzed: kāntānām vadana indu kāntim adhunā dhatte sudhā dīdhitiḥ khelat khañjana paṅktayaḥ mṛga dṛśām tanvanti netra śriyam

original: MSS_9440-2 padmāni śvasitasya saurabhamabhidruhyanti vāmabhruvām abhyasyanti ca rājahaṃsavanitāḥ pīnastanīnāṃ gatim //
analyzed: padmāni śvasitasya saurabham abhidruhyanti vāma bhruvām abhyasyanti ca rājahaṃsa vanitāḥ pīna stanīnām gatim

original: MSS_9441-1 kāntānurāgacaturo'si manoharo'si nātho'si kiṃ ca navayauvanabhūṣito'si /
analyzed: kānta anurāga caturaḥ asi manoharaḥ asi nāthaḥ usi kim ca nava yauvana bhūṣitaḥ asi

original: MSS_9441-2 itthaṃ nigadya sudṛśā vadane priyasya niśvasya bāṣpalulitā nihitā dṛgantāḥ //
analyzed: ittham nigadya su dṛśā vadane priyasya niśvasya bāṣpa lulitāḥ nihitāḥ dṛś antāḥ

original: MSS_9441A-1 kāntānetrārdhapātā vadanarucikarāḥ sasmitā bhrūvilāsāḥ sākārā vākyaleśāḥ sahatalaninadā dṛṣṭanaṣṭāśca hāsāḥ /
analyzed: kāntā netra ardha pātāḥ vadana ruci karāḥ sa smitāḥ bhrū vilāsāḥ sa ākārāḥ vākya leśāḥ saha tala ninadāḥ dṛṣṭa naṣṭāḥ ca hāsāḥ

original: MSS_9441A-2 nābhīkakṣastanānāṃ vivaraṇamasakṛtsparśanaṃ mekhalānāṃ śvāsāyāsāśca dīrghāṃ madanaśarahatāṃ kāminīṃ sūcayanti //
analyzed: nābhī kakṣa stanānām vivaraṇam asakṛt sparśanam mekhalānām śvāsa āyāsāḥ ca dīrghām madana śara hatām kāminīm sūcayanti

original: MSS_9441B-1 kāntānyardhanirīkṣitāni madhurā hāsopadaṃśāḥ kathāḥ pīnaśroṇiniruddhaśeṣamatulasparśaṃ tadardhāṃsanam /
analyzed: kāntāni ardha nirīkṣitāni madhurāḥ hāsa upadaṃśāḥ kathāḥ pīna śroṇi niruddha śeṣam atula sparśam tat ardha aṃsanam

original: MSS_9441B-2 snehavyaktikarān karavyatikarāṃstāṃstāṃśca ramyān guṇān veśyābhyaḥ praṇayādṛte'pi labhate jñātopacāro janaḥ //
analyzed: sneha vyakti karān kara vyatikarān tān tān ca ramyān guṇān veśyābhyaḥ praṇayāt ṛte pi labhate jñāta upacāraḥ janaḥ

original: MSS_9441C-1 kāntāprītiparānujo vinayavān hṛnnandano nandano bhāgyaṃ svarlalanopabhogyamamalā lakṣmīḥ sukhaṃ nistuṣam /
analyzed: kāntā prīti para anujaḥ vinayavān hṛd nandanaḥ nandanaḥ bhāgyam svar lalanā upabhogyam amalā lakṣmīḥ sukham nistuṣam

original: MSS_9441C-2 pūjā rājakule yaśo'tiviśadaṃ goṣṭhī samaṃ kovidair dāne'tivyasanaṃ ratirjinamate syāt kasyacit puṇyataḥ //
analyzed: pūjā rāja kule yaśaḥ uti viśadam goṣṭhī samam kovidaiḥ dāna iti vyasanam ratiḥ jina mate syāt kasyacid puṇyataḥ

original: MSS_9442-1 kāntāmukhaṃ suratakelivimardakheda- saṃjātagharmakaṇavicchuritaṃ ratānte /
analyzed: kāntā mukham surata keli vimarda kheda saṃjāta gharma kaṇa vicchuritam rata ante

original: MSS_9442-2 āpāṇḍuraṃ taralatāranimīlitākṣaṃ saṃsmṛtya he hṛdaya kiṃ śatadhā na yāsi //
analyzed: āpāṇḍuram tarala tāra nimīlita akṣam saṃsmṛtya he hṛdaya kim śatadhā na yāsi

original: MSS_9443-1 kāntāmukhadyutijuṣāmapi codgatānāṃ śobhāṃ parāṃ kuravakadrumamañjarīṇām /
analyzed: kāntā mukha dyuti juṣām api ca udgatānām śobhām parām kuravaka druma mañjarīṇām

original: MSS_9443-2 dṛṣṭvā priye sahṛdayasya bhavenna kasya kandarpabāṇapatanavyathitaṃ hi cetaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā priye sahṛdayasya bhavet na kasya kandarpa bāṇa patana vyathitam hi cetaḥ

original: MSS_9444-1 kāntāmukhāsvādaparāṅmukhā yat pānthāḥ śaśāṅkasya karairvimṛṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: kāntā mukha āsvāda parāṅmukhāḥ yat pānthāḥ śaśāṅkasya karaiḥ vimṛṣṭāḥ

original: MSS_9444-2 suduḥsahaṃ tāpamime prayānti manye tatau naiva sudhetaratra //
analyzed: su duḥsaham tāpam ime prayānti manye tatau nā eva sudhā itaratra

original: MSS_9445-1 kāntāyāḥ karajaiḥ kapolaphalake patrāvalī kalpitā kelidyūtapaṇīkṛto viharatā pītaḥ sa bimbādharaḥ /
analyzed: kāntāyāḥ karajaiḥ kapola phalake patra āvalī kalpitā keli dyūta paṇīkṛtaḥ viharatā pītaḥ sa bimba adharaḥ

original: MSS_9445-2 svedārdrīkṛtacandanastanataṭī sānandamāliṅgitā nirviṣṭā viṣayāḥ śivātmamahasi nyastaṃ manaḥ saṃprati //
analyzed: sveda ārdrīkṛta candana stana taṭī sa ānandam āliṅgitā nirviṣṭāḥ viṣayāḥ śiva ātma mahasi nyastam manaḥ saṃprati

original: MSS_9446-1 kāntāyā vikasadvilāsahasitasvacchāṃśavaścāmaraṃ saṃsaktāvabhiṣekahemakalaśau yaccandanāṅkau stanau /
analyzed: kāntāyāḥ vikasat vilāsa hasita su accha aṃśavaḥ cāmaram saṃsaktau abhiṣeka hema kalaśau yat candana aṅkau stanau

original: MSS_9446-2 yatkārtasvarakānti cāru jaghanaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ bhūbhujāṃ sāmrājyaṃ tadidaṃ jayājayamayaḥ śeṣastu cintāmayḥ //
analyzed: yat kārtasvara kānti cāru jaghanam siṃhāsanam bhūbhujām sāmrājyam tat idam jaya ajaya mayaḥ śeṣaḥ tu cintā mayaḥ

original: MSS_9447-1 kāntāraṃ na yathetaro jvalayituṃ dakṣo davāgniṃ vinā dāvāgniṃ na yathā paraḥ śamayituṃ śakto vināmbhodharam /
analyzed: kāntāram na yathā itaraḥ jvalayitum dakṣaḥ dava agnim vinā dāva agnim na yathā paraḥ śamayitum śaktaḥ vinā ambhodharam

original: MSS_9447-2 niṣṇātaḥ pavanaṃ vinā nirasituṃ nānyo yathāmbhodharaṃ karmaughaṃ sukṛtaṃ vinā kimaparaṃ hantuṃ samarthaṃ tathā //
analyzed: niṣṇātaḥ pavanam vinā nirasitum na anyaḥ yathā ambhodharam karma ogham su kṛtam vinā kim aparam hantum samartham tathā

original: MSS_9448-1 kāntāraṃ parito jvalatyatibale dāvānale daivato gomāyorgahanāṃ guhāṃ paripatan darpoddhuraḥ kesarī /
analyzed: kāntāram paritas jvalati ati bale dāva anale daivataḥ gomāyoḥ gahanām guhām paripatan darpa uddhuraḥ kesarī

original: MSS_9448-2 yadvyāpādayati sma taṃ na kṛpayā tenaiṣa tasmin vane siṃhānāmabhayaprado'hamadhunetyutpucchamuddhāvati //
analyzed: yat vyāpādayati sma tam na kṛpayā tena eṣa tasmin vane siṃhānām abhaya pradoham adhunā iti utpuccham uddhāvati

original: MSS_9449-1 kāntāraḥ samarākhyaśca vaikuṇṭho vāñchitas tathā /
analyzed: kāntāraḥ samara ākhyaḥ ca vaikuṇṭhaḥ vāñchitaḥ tathā

original: MSS_9449-2 viśālaśca tathā nandaḥ ṣoḍhāḥ niḥsāruko bhavet //
analyzed: viśālaḥ ca tathā nandaḥ ṣoḍhā niḥsārukaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_9450-1 kāntārapādapānāṃ yathā phalaṃ mānuṣairananubhogyam /
analyzed: kāntāra pādapānām yathā phalam mānuṣaiḥ an anubhogyam

original: MSS_9450-2 evamanāryeṣvarthāḥ manasā'pyāryairananubhogyāḥ //
analyzed: evam anāryeṣu arthāḥ manasā api āryaiḥ ananubhogyāḥ

original: MSS_9451-1 kāntārabhūmiruhamaulinivāsaśīlāḥ prāyaḥ palāyanaparā janavīkṣaṇena /
analyzed: kāntāra bhūmiruha mauli nivāsa śīlāḥ prāyas palāyana parāḥ jana vīkṣaṇena

original: MSS_9451-2 kūjanti te'pi hi śukāḥ khalu rāmanāma saṅgaḥ svabhāvaparivartavidhau nidānam //
analyzed: kūjanti te api hi śukāḥ khalu rāma nāma saṅgaḥ svabhāva parivarta vidhau nidānam

original: MSS_9452-1 kāntāravanadurgeṣu kṛcchrāsvāpatsu saṃbhrame /
analyzed: kāntāra vana durgeṣu kṛcchrāsu āpatsu saṃbhrame

original: MSS_9452-2 udyateṣu ca śastreṣu nāsti sattvavatāṃ bhayam //
analyzed: udyateṣu ca śastreṣu na asti sattvavatām bhayam

original: MSS_9453-1 kāntā ruciṃ munijanastaruṇo'viyogī kāmaśca ratnamaṇirujjvalakaṅkaṇena /
analyzed: kāntā rucim muni janaḥ taruṇaḥ viyogī kāmaḥ ca ratna maṇiḥ ujjvala kaṅkaṇena

original: MSS_9453-2 dhatte payodharayuge kucabhūṣaṇena hāre hare himakare makare kare ca //
analyzed: dhatte payodhara yuge kucabhūṣaṇena hāre hare himakare makare kare ca

original: MSS_9454-1 kāntāre ghanatimire bhujaṃgamebhyo no bhītā na ca gaṇitā mahāpagāpi /
analyzed: kāntāre ghana timire bhujaṃgamebhyaḥ no bhītā na ca gaṇitā mahā āpagā api

original: MSS_9454-2 kiṃ bāle vahasi bhayaṃ madaṅgasaṃgāt vikrīte kariṇi kimaṅkuśe vivādaḥ //
analyzed: kim bāle vahasi bhayam mad aṅga saṃgāt vikrīte kariṇi kim aṅkuśe vivādaḥ

original: MSS_9455-1 kāntāre jalavṛkṣavairiṇi muhustvadvairivāmabhruvo bālairākulalocanaiḥ pratipadaṃ ruddhakramāścaṅkrame /
analyzed: kāntāre jala vṛkṣa vairiṇi muhur tvad vairi vāma bhruvaḥ bālaiḥ ākula locanaiḥ pratipadam ruddha kramāḥ caṅkrame

original: MSS_9455-2 pṛthvīcaṇḍaruce paṭaccaradaśāsaṃghaṭṭadīptaprabhaṃ siñcantyañjalisañcitāśrubhiralaṃ yuṣmatpratāpānalam //
analyzed: pṛthvī caṇḍa ruce paṭaccara daśā saṃghaṭṭa dīpta prabham siñcanti añjali sañcita aśrubhiḥ alam yuṣmad pratāpa analam

original: MSS_9456-1 kāntāre daivagatyā kathamapi galitānyantarālokya bhakṣyāṇy uḍḍīyoḍḍīya bhūyas taruśikharaśikhāmeva tebhyaḥ śrayante /
analyzed: kāntāre daivagatyā katham api galitāni antar ālokya bhakṣyāṇi uḍḍīya uḍḍīya bhūyas taru śikhara śikhām eva tebhyaḥ śrayante

original: MSS_9456-2 itthaṃ tvadvairinārī giriṣu narapate jambulambīkadamba- bhrāntyā bharturbubhukṣoḥ kathayati purataśceṣṭitaṃ ṣaṭpadānām //
analyzed: ittham tvad vairi nārī giriṣu narapate jambu lambī kadamba bhrāntyā bhartuḥ bubhukṣoḥ kathayati puratas ceṣṭitam ṣaṭpadānām

original: MSS_9457-1 kāntāreṣu karāvalambiśiśavaḥ pādaiḥ sravallohitair arcantyaḥ padavīṃ vilocanajalairāvedayantyaḥ śucam /
analyzed: kāntāreṣu kara avalambi śiśavaḥ pādaiḥ sravat lohitaiḥ arcantyaḥ padavīm vilocana jalaiḥ āvedayantyaḥ śucam

original: MSS_9457-2 dṛṣṭāḥ pānthajanairvivṛtya sakṛpaṃ hāśabdagarbhairmukhair yantyahnā sakalena yojanaturīyāṃśaṃ tavāristriyaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ pāntha janaiḥ vivṛtya sa kṛpam hā śabda garbhaiḥ mukhaiḥ yanti ahnā sakalena yojana turīya aṃśam tava ari striyaḥ

original: MSS_9458-1 kāntāreṣu ca kānaneṣu ca sarittīreṣu ca kṣmābhṛtām utsaṅgeṣu ca pattaneṣu ca saridbhartustaṭānteṣu ca /
analyzed: kāntāreṣu ca kānaneṣu ca sarit tīreṣu ca kṣmābhṛtām utsaṅgeṣu ca pattaneṣu ca saridbhartuḥ taṭa anteṣu ca

original: MSS_9458-2 bhrāntāḥ ketakagarbhapallavarucaḥ śrāntā iva kṣmāpate kānte nandanakandalīparisare rohanti te kīrtayaḥ //
analyzed: bhrāntāḥ ketaka garbha pallava rucaḥ śrāntāḥ iva kṣmāpate kānte nandana kandalī parisare rohanti te kīrtayaḥ

original: MSS_9459-1 kāntāreṣvapi viśrāmo narasyādhvanikasya vai /
analyzed: kāntāreṣu api viśrāmaḥ narasya ādhvanikasya vai

original: MSS_9459-2 yaḥ sadāraḥ sa viśvāsyas tasmād dārāḥ parā gatiḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ sa dāraḥ sa viśvāsyaḥ tasmāt dārāḥ parā gatiḥ

original: MSS_9460-1 kāntāviyogaḥ svajanāpamānaṃ ṛṇasya śeṣaṃ kunṛpasya sevā /
analyzed: kāntā viyogaḥ sva jana apamānam ṛṇasya śeṣam ku nṛpasya sevā

original: MSS_9460-2 dāridryabhāvād vimukhaṃ ca mitraṃ vināgninā pañca dahanti kāyam //
analyzed: dāridrya bhāvāt vimukham ca mitram vinā agninā pañca dahanti kāyam

original: MSS_9461-1 kāntāśleṣaparāṅmukhaṃ yadi dahed doṣākaraḥ kaṃcana sthāne tarhi yataḥ sa hanta vidhinā hantuṃ vyadhāyīdṛśān /
analyzed: kānta āśleṣa parāṅmukham yadi dahet doṣākaraḥ kaṃcana sthāne tarhi yatas sa hanta vidhinā hantum vyadhāyi īdṛśān

original: MSS_9461-2 kaṣṭaṃ yatpunareṣa candanabhuvo labdhaprabhāvo'bhitaḥ svarṇadyādyavagāhako marudayaṃ dagdhaṃ pracaṇḍojvalam //
analyzed: kaṣṭam yat punar eṣa candana bhuvaḥ svarṇadī ādi avagāhakaḥ marut ayam dagdham pracaṇḍa ujvalam

original: MSS_9462-1 kāntāsuhṛdguṇakathāśravaṇotsukasya ramyā vinidranayanasya gatā mamāsau /
analyzed: kāntā suhṛd guṇa kathā śravaṇa utsukasya ramyā vinidra nayanasya gatā mama asau

original: MSS_9462-2 sarvendriyārthajanitāni hi sevyamānā dīrghā svavṛttiriva hanti sukhāni nidrā //
analyzed: sarva indriya artha janitāni hi sevyamānā dīrghā sva vṛttiḥ iva hanti sukhāni nidrā

original: MSS_9463-1 kāntiṃ kuṅkumakeśarānmadhuratāṃ drākṣārasasyāsavād vaidarbhīparipākapūtavacasaḥ kāvyāt kavermārdavam /
analyzed: kāntim kuṅkuma kesarāt madhura tām drākṣā rasasya āsavāt vaidarbhī paripāka pūta vacasaḥ kāvyāt kaveḥ mārdavam

original: MSS_9463-2 pārśvādeva jarātureṇa vidhinā taṃ taṃ gṛhītvā guṇaṃ sṛṣṭā hanta haranti kasya na manaḥ kaśmīravāmabhruvaḥ //
analyzed: pārśvāt eva jarā ātureṇa vidhinā tam tam gṛhītvā guṇam sṛṣṭāḥ hanta haranti kasya na manaḥ kaśmīra vāma bhruvaḥ

original: MSS_9464-1 kāntiṃ ketakakorakadyutisakhīṃ rākāmṛgāṅkasya yac cañcaccañcu culumpati pratidinaṃ premṇā cakorārbhakaḥ /
analyzed: kāntim ketaka koraka dyuti sakhīm rākā mṛgāṅkasya yat cañcat cañcu culumpati pratidinam premṇā cakora arbhakaḥ

original: MSS_9464-2 tan manye nayanāmṛtaṃ ratipatermṛtyuñjayenārthinā tenedaṃ ramaṇīkapolaphalake lāvaṇyamālokitam //
analyzed: tat manye nayana amṛtam ratipateḥ mṛtyuñjayena arthinā tena idam ramaṇī kapola phalake lāvaṇyam ālokitam

original: MSS_9465-1 kāntikallolavalitāṃ nayanāmṛtavāhinīm /
analyzed: kānti kallola valitām nayana amṛta vāhinīm

original: MSS_9465-2 bhajamānaṃ svayaṃ subhru kastvāṃ na bahu manyate //
analyzed: bhajamānam svayam subhru kaḥ tvām na bahu manyate

original: MSS_9465A-1 kāntiprakarṣaṃ daśanacchadena sandhyāghane baddhapadaṃ harantyāḥ /
analyzed: kānti prakarṣam daśanacchadena sandhyā ghane baddha padam harantyāḥ

original: MSS_9465A-2 tasyā gṛhodyānasarogatasya hastasya evāmburuhasya rāgaḥ //
analyzed: tasyāḥ gṛha udyāna saraḥ gatasya hastasya eva amburuhasya rāgaḥ

original: MSS_9466-1 kāntimayādativimalād avirataviśvopakāragatakālāt /
analyzed: kānti mayāt ati vimalāt avirata viśva upakāra gata kālāt

original: MSS_9466-2 sudaśān mahatotimahān prasarati dīpān pradīpa iva //
analyzed: su daśāt mahatā uti mahān prasarati dīpān pradīpaḥ iva

original: MSS_9467-1 kāntiryasya vinidranīlanalinacchāyāsakhī subhruvāṃ yatpaṅke'pi mudo'sti yasya surabhiḥ kāsāṃ raso'gocaraḥ /
analyzed: kāntiḥ yasya vinidra nīla nalina chāyā sakhī su bhruvām yat paṅke pi yasya surabhiḥ kāsām

original: MSS_9467-2 aṅgārārthitayā janeratijaḍairuḍḍāmaraiḥ pāmaraiḥ paśyaiṣa praguṇairguṇairapi gururdagdhaḥ sa kālāguruḥ //
analyzed: aṅgāra arthitayā janeḥ ati jaḍaiḥ uḍḍāmaraiḥ pāmaraiḥ paśya eṣa praguṇaiḥ guṇaiḥ api guruḥ dagdhaḥ sa kālāguruḥ

original: MSS_9468-1 kāntiryasya śaranniśākarakalālāvaṇyasaṃvādinī taṃ vikretumihāsi yāsi kimaho hāraṃ vihāraṃ śriyaḥ /
analyzed: kāntiḥ yasya śarad niśākara kalā lāvaṇya saṃvādinī tam vikretum iha asi yāsi kim aho hāram vihāram śriyaḥ

original: MSS_9468-2 etāṃ paśya puraḥ pulindanagarīṃ bhūpāḥ kuraṅgīdṛśāṃ yatraitā galakandale ca kucayoraṅke ca guñjāsrajaḥ //
analyzed: etām paśya puras pulinda nagarīm bhūpāḥ kuraṅgī dṛśām yatra etāḥ gala kandale ca kucayoḥ aṅke ca guñjā srajaḥ

original: MSS_9469-1 kāntirlocanavartiradbhutamayī mūrtirmahat saurabhaṃ niḥṣyando'tha sudhākarādapi sudhāsyandādapi hlādakaḥ /
analyzed: kāntiḥ locanavartiḥ adbhuta mayī mūrtiḥ mahat saurabham niḥṣyandaḥ utha sudhākarāt api sudhā syandāt api hlādakaḥ

original: MSS_9469-2 sarvo'yaṃ viralo jagatyapi guṇagrāmo'bhirāmo hahā paśyottaṃsabhujaṃgasaṃgamajuṣaḥ śrīkhaṇḍa te khaṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: viralaḥ jagatī api guṇa grāmaḥ abhirāmaḥ hahā paśya uttaṃsa bhujaṃga saṃgama juṣaḥ śrīkhaṇḍa te khaṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_9469A-1 kāntiścandramaso mṛgasya nayane bāhū mṛṇālasya te haṃsānāṃ gamanaṃ sarojavadane hemno ghaṭau te kucau /
analyzed: kāntiḥ candramasaḥ mṛgasya nayane bāhū mṛṇālasya te haṃsānām gamanam saroja vadane hemnaḥ ghaṭau te kucau

original: MSS_9469A-2 etatte parakīyavastu sakalaṃ namaikamātraṃ tava mānaṃ mā kuru mānini priyatame rūpābhimānaṃ prati //
analyzed: etat te parakīya vastu sakalam nama eka mātram tava mānam mā kuru mānini priyatame rūpa abhimānam prati

original: MSS_9470-1 kāntiśriyā nirjitapadmarāgaṃ manojñagandhaṃ dvayameva śastam /
analyzed: kānti śriyā nirjita padmarāgam manojña gandham dvayam eva śastam

original: MSS_9470-2 navaprabuddhaṃ jalajaṃ jaleṣu sthaleṣu tasyā vadanāravindam //
analyzed: nava prabuddham jala jam jaleṣu sthaleṣu tasyāḥ vadana aravindam

original: MSS_9470A-1 kāntiste kanakācalapratinidhiḥ kāntākucaspardhi te saubhāgyaṃ kṣitipāladarśanavidhau tvatpūrvakaṃ darśanam /
analyzed: kāntiḥ te kanakācala pratinidhiḥ kāntā kuca spardhi te saubhāgyam kṣitipāla darśana vidhau tvad pūrvakam darśanam

original: MSS_9470A-2 saurabhyaṃ sakalātiśāyi bhavato jambira kiṃ brūmahe karpūrapratikūlatā yadi na te tvayyeva sarve guṇāḥ //
analyzed: saurabhyam sakala atiśāyi bhavataḥ jambira kim brūmahe karpūra pratikūla tā yadi na te tvayi eva sarve guṇāḥ

original: MSS_9471-1 kāntiste yadi nirmalā yadi guṇā lakṣmīryadi sthāyinī mā gāḥ padma madaṃ tathāpi galitā hyete śaradvāsarāḥ /
analyzed: kāntiḥ te yadi nirmalā yadi guṇāḥ lakṣmīḥ yadi sthāyinī mā gāḥ padma madam tathā api galitāḥ hi ete śarad vāsarāḥ

original: MSS_9471-2 saṃsparśena tuṣāravāripṛṣatāmālūnamūrteḥ saro- madhye'traiva varāṭakena bhavataḥ stheyaṃ punaḥ kevalam //
analyzed: saṃsparśena tuṣāra vāri pṛṣata āmālūna mūrteḥ saraḥ madhye trā eva varāṭakena bhavataḥ stheyam punar kevalam

original: MSS_9472-1 kānte katyapi vāsarāṇi gamaya tvaṃ mīlayitvā dṛśau svasti svasti nimīlayāmi nayane yāvan na śūnyā diśaḥ /
analyzed: kānte kati api vāsarāṇi gamaya tvam mīlayitvā dṛśau svasti svasti nimīlayāmi nayane yāvat na śūnyāḥ diśaḥ

original: MSS_9472-2 āyātā vayam āgamiṣyati suhṛdvargasya bhāgyodayaiḥ sandeśo vada kas tavābhilaṣitas tīrtheṣu toyāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: āyātāḥ vayam āgamiṣyati suhṛd vargasya bhāgya udayaiḥ sandeśaḥ vada kaḥ tava abhilaṣitaḥ tīrtheṣu toya añjaliḥ

original: MSS_9473-1 kānte kathaṃcit kathitaprayāṇe kṣaṇaṃ vinamrā virahārditāṅgī /
analyzed: kānte kathaṃcid kathita prayāṇe kṣaṇam vinamrā viraha ardita aṅgī

original: MSS_9473-2 tatas tamālokya kadāgato'sīty āliṅgya mugdhā mudamāsasāda //
analyzed: tatas tam ālokya kadā āgatā asi iti āliṅgya mugdhā mudam āsasāda

original: MSS_9474-1 kānte kanakajambīraṃ kare kimapi kurvati /
analyzed: kānte kanaka jambīram kare kim api kurvati

original: MSS_9474-2 āgāralikhite bhānau bindumindumukhī dadau //
analyzed: āgāra likhite bhānau bindum indu mukhī dadau

original: MSS_9475-1 kānte kalitacolānte dīpe vairiṇi dīpyati /
analyzed: kānte kalita cola ante dīpe vairiṇi dīpyati

original: MSS_9475-2 āsīdasitapadmākṣyāḥ pakṣo nayanamudraṇam //
analyzed: āsīt asita padma akṣyāḥ pakṣaḥ nayana mudraṇam

original: MSS_9476-1 kānte kāñculikāvalokini kalāvatyā namantyā sthitaṃ tasmin komalakākubhāṣiṇi tayā spandī niruddho'dharaḥ /
analyzed: kānte kāñculika avalokini kalāvatyā namantyā sthitam tasmin komala kāku bhāṣiṇi tayā spandī niruddhaḥ udharaḥ

original: MSS_9476-2 utthāyātha karaspṛśi priyatame yūnornave saṃgame kāñcīkūjitakaitavena madano dyauḥśāntimabhyasyati //
analyzed: utthāya atha kara spṛśi priyatame yūnoḥ nave saṃgame kāñcī kūjita kaitavena madanaḥ dyauḥśāntim abhyasyati

original: MSS_9476A-1 kānte kathaya kathaṃ vā gacchasi pānīyaśālikāmekā /
analyzed: kānte kathaya katham vā gacchasi pānīya śālikām ekā

original: MSS_9476A-2 aṅgamanaṅgaṃ nitarām aṅkurayati paṅkajākṣi vayo'pi tava //
analyzed: aṅgam anaṅgam nitarām aṅkurayati paṅkaja akṣi vayopi tava

original: MSS_9477-1 kānte kiṃ kupitāsi,
analyzed: kānte kim kupitā asi

original: kaḥ parajane prāṇeśa kopo bhavet ko'yaṃ subhru para,
analyzed: kaḥ para jane prāṇa īśa kopaḥ bhavet kaḥ uyam subhru para

original: stvameva,
analyzed: stvam eva

original: dayite dāso'smi kiṃ te paraḥ /
analyzed: dayite dāsaḥ asmi kim te paraḥ

original: MSS_9477-2 ityuktvā praṇataḥ priyaḥ kṣititalādutthāpya sānandayā netrāmbhaḥkaṇikāṅkite stanataṭe tanvyā samāropitaḥ //
analyzed: iti uktvā praṇataḥ priyaḥ kṣiti talāt utthāpya sa ānandayā netra ambhaḥ kaṇikā aṅkite stana taṭe tanvyā samāropitaḥ

original: MSS_9478-1 kānte kuṭilamālokya karṇakaṇḍūyanena kim /
analyzed: kānte kuṭilam ālokya karṇa kaṇḍūyanena kim

original: MSS_9478-2 kāmaṃ kathaya kalyāṇi kiṅkaraḥ karavāṇi yat //
analyzed: kāmam kathaya kalyāṇi kiṅkaraḥ karavāṇi yat

original: MSS_9479-1 kānte gṛhāṇa tvamimāṃ svamālām akāraṇaṃ kiṃ kalahaṃ karoṣi /
analyzed: kānte gṛhāṇa tvam imām sva mālām akāraṇam kim kalaham karoṣi

original: MSS_9479-2 yatpūrvapādaṃ manuṣe'tra śuddhaṃ tat tathyamevāsti na cedidaṃ syāt //
analyzed: yat pūrva pādam śuddham tat tathyam eva asti na ced idam syāt

original: MSS_9480-1 kānte ghorakṛtāntavakrakuharāt tvaṃ puṇyapuñjena me muktā kṛnta tadarjanaśramabharaṃ pratyaṅgamāliṅgya mām /
analyzed: kānte ghora kṛtānta vakra kuharāt tvam puṇya puñjena me muktā kṛnta tad arjana śrama bharam prati aṅgam āliṅgya mām

original: MSS_9480-2 ityākarṇya nimīlitārdhanayanaṃ smeraṃ śanairānataṃ sollāsaṃ vadanāmbujaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ svairaṃ cucumba priyaḥ //
analyzed: iti ākarṇya nimīlita ardha nayanam smeram śanais ānatam sa ullāsam vadana ambujam mṛga dṛśaḥ svairam cucumba priyaḥ

original: MSS_9481-1 kānte jagmuṣi tāmracūḍaraṭitaṃ śrutvā prabuddhā javāt kiṃcid vāsavadiṅmukhaṃ pravikasad dṛṣṭvā gavākṣādhvanā /
analyzed: kānte jagmuṣi tāmracūḍa raṭitam śrutvā prabuddhā javāt kiṃcid vāsava diṅmukham pravikasat dṛṣṭvā gavākṣa adhvanā

original: MSS_9481-2 saṃtrāsena samīritā priyatamapremṇāvaruddhā śanair utthānopaniveśanāni kurute talpe muhuḥ pāṃsulā //
analyzed: saṃtrāsena samīritā priyatama premṇā avaruddhā śanais utthāna upaniveśanāni kurute talpe muhur pāṃsulā

original: MSS_9482-1 kānte tathā kathamapi prathitaṃ mṛgākṣyā cāturyamuddhatamanobhavayā rateṣu /
analyzed: kānte tathā katham api prathitam mṛga akṣyā cāturyam uddhata manobhavayā rateṣu

original: MSS_9482-2 tatkūjitānyanuvadadbhiranekavāraṃ śiṣyāyitaṃ gṛhakapotaśatairyathā syāt //
analyzed: tad kūjitāni anuvadadbhiḥ aneka vāram śiṣyāyitam gṛha kapota śataiḥ yathā syāt

original: MSS_9483-1 kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ tatkṣaṇāt tadvāsaḥ ślathamekhalāguṇadhṛtaṃ kiṃcinnitambe sthitam /
analyzed: kānte talpam upāgate vigalitā nīvī svayam tad kṣaṇāt tat vāsaḥ ślatha mekhalā guṇa dhṛtam kiṃcid nitambe sthitam

original: MSS_9483-2 etāvat sakhi vedmi kevalamahaṃ tasyāṅgasaṅge punaḥ ko'sau kāsmi rataṃ tu kiṃ kathamiti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ //
analyzed: etāvat sakhi vedmi kevalam aham tasya aṅgasaṅge punar kā asau kā asmi ratam tu kim katham iti su alpā api me na smṛtiḥ

original: MSS_9484-1 kāntetyutpalalocaneti vipulaśroṇībharetyunnamat- pīnottuṅgapayodhareti sumukhāmbhojeti subhrūriti /
analyzed: kāntā iti utpala locanā iti vipula śroṇī bharā iti unnamat pīna uttuṅga payodharā iti su mukha ambhojā iti subhrūḥ iti

original: MSS_9484-2 dṛṣṭvā mādyati modate'bhiramate prastauti vidvānapi pratyakṣāśuciputrikāṃ striyamaho mohasya duśceṣṭitam //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā mādyati modate bhiramate prastauti vidvān api pratyakṣa aśuci putrikām striyam aho mohasya duśceṣṭitam

original: MSS_9484A-1 kānte tvatkucacūcukau tadupari smerā ca hārāvalī tadvaktraṃ taruṇāṅgi bimbitamanucchāyālatāśyāmatām /
analyzed: kānte tvad kuca cūcukau tad upari smerā ca hāra āvalī tad vaktram taruṇa aṅgi bimbitam anu chāyā latā śyāma tām

original: MSS_9484A-2 tvaṃ sarvāṅgamanorame trijagatāṃ badhnāsi dṛṣṭyā mano jambūvajjalabinduvajjalajavajjambālavajjālavat //
analyzed: tvam sarva aṅga manorame trijagatām badhnāsi dṛṣṭyā manaḥ jambū vat jala bindu vat jalaja vat jambāla vat jālavat

original: MSS_9485-1 kānte tvannetrakāntaṃ puru kamalavanaṃ tvanmukhasyopameyaś candraḥ pratyakṣasiddhaḥ pikakulamapi ca tvatsvarasyānukāri /
analyzed: kānte tvad netra kāntam puru kamala vanam tvad mukhasya upameyaḥ candraḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ pika kulam api ca tvad svarasya anukāri

original: MSS_9485-2 rambhākāṇḍas tvadūrucchavirapi sulabhaḥ kambavaśca tvadīyāḥ kaṇṭhākārā śikhaṇḍās tava kacasadṛśāstat kathaṃ te'samatvam //
analyzed: rambhā kāṇḍaḥ tvad ūru chaviḥ api sulabhaḥ kambavaḥ ca tvadīyāḥ kaṇṭha ākārā śikhaṇḍāḥ tava kaca sadṛśāḥ tat katham te sama tvam

original: MSS_9486-1 kānte dhāvaya me pādāv iti bhartrā niveditā /
analyzed: kānte dhāvaya me pādau iti bhartrā niveditā

original: MSS_9486-2 na tayā dhāvitau pādau bharturājñā na laṅghitā //
analyzed: na tayā dhāvitau pādau bhartuḥ ājñā na laṅghitā

original: MSS_9487-1 kāntena prahito navaḥ priyasakhīvargeṇa baddhaspṛhaś cittenopahṛtaḥ smarāya na samutsraṣṭuṃ gataḥ pāṇinā /
analyzed: kāntena prahitaḥ navaḥ priya sakhī vargeṇa baddha spṛhaḥ cittena upahṛtaḥ smarāya na samutsraṣṭum gataḥ pāṇinā

original: MSS_9487-2 āmṛṣṭo muhurīkṣito muharabhighrāto muhurloṭhitaḥ pratyaṅgaṃ ca muhuḥ kṛto mṛgadṛśā kiṃ kiṃ na cūtāṅkuraḥ //
analyzed: āmṛṣṭaḥ muhur īkṣitaḥ muhar abhighrātaḥ muhur loṭhitaḥ pratyaṅgam ca muhur kṛtaḥ mṛga dṛśā kim kim na cūta aṅkuraḥ

original: MSS_9488-1 kānte nitāntaṃ dayitākucānta- colāñcalaṃ karṣati harṣamugdhe /
analyzed: kānte nitāntam dayitā kuca anta cola añcalam karṣati harṣa mugdhe

original: MSS_9488-2 babhāra bālā namitāsyahāsya- leśāpadeśādaparaṃ nicolam //
analyzed: babhāra bālā namita āsya hāsya leśa apadeśāt aparam nicolam

original: MSS_9489-1 kānte nitāntametair vacanai ruṣiteva lakṣyate bhavatī /
analyzed: kānte nitāntam etaiḥ vacanaiḥ ruṣitā iva lakṣyate bhavatī

original: MSS_9489-2 ka ivoṣyate na vacanair uktairāgāṃsyapahnotum //
analyzed: kaḥ iva uṣyate na vacanaiḥ uktaiḥ āgāṃsi apahnotum

original: MSS_9489A-1 kānte kṛtāgasi puraḥ parivartamāne sakhyaṃ sarojaśaśinoḥ sahasā babhūva /
analyzed: kānte kṛta āgasi puras parivartamāne sakhyam saroja śaśinoḥ sahasā babhūva

original: MSS_9489A-2 roṣākṣaraṃ sudṛśi vaktumapārayantyām indīvaradvayamavāpa tuṣāradhārām //
analyzed: roṣa akṣaram su dṛśi vaktum a pārayantyām indīvara dvayam avāpa tuṣāra dhārām

original: MSS_9489B-1 kānte paśyati sānurāgamabalā sācīkarotyānanaṃ tasmin kāmakalākalāpakuśale vyāvṛttavaktre kila /
analyzed: kānte paśyati sa anurāgam abalā sācīkaroti ānanam tasmin kāma kalā kalāpa kuśale vyāvṛtta vaktre kila

original: MSS_9489B-2 paśyantī muhurantaraṅgamadanā dolāyamānekṣaṇā lajjāmanmathamadhyagāpi nitarāṃ tasyābhavat prītaye //
analyzed: paśyantī muhur antaraṅga madanā dolāyamāna īkṣaṇā lajjā manmatha madhya gā api nitarām tasya abhavat prītaye

original: MSS_9490-1 kānte yāmi, kva,
analyzed: kānte yāmi kva

original: deśāntara,
analyzed: deśa antara

original: mapi śayanā,
analyzed: m api śayanā

original: nneti,
analyzed: nnā iti

original: kiṃ sadmano'pi kvaitāvanmātra,
analyzed: kim sadmanā upi kva etāvanmātra

original: māḥ kiṃ kathayasi nagarā,
analyzed: māḥ kim kathayasi nagarā

original: nna priye nirvṛto'pi /
analyzed: n priye nirvṛtaḥ api

original: MSS_9490-2 ityākarṇyoktavastukramaghanaghanahṛdvedanā veda nāhaṃ kāhaṃ kutrāsmi ko'yaṃ bata hatasamayo'pyasmi vā nāsmi veti //
analyzed: iti ākarṇya ukta vastu krama ghana ghana hṛd vedanā veda na aham kā aham kutra asmi kā uyam bata hata samayā upi asmi vā na asmi vā iti

original: MSS_9491-1 kānte vicitrasuratakramabaddharāge saṅketake'pi mṛgaśābadṛśā rasena /
analyzed: kānte vicitra surata krama baddha rāge saṅketakepi mṛga śāba dṛśā rasena

original: MSS_9491-2 tatkūjitaṃ kimapi yena tadīyatalpaṃ nālpaiḥ parītamanukūjitalāvakaughaiḥ //
analyzed: tat kūjitam kim api yena tadīya talpam na alpaiḥ parītam anukūjita lāvaka oghaiḥ

original: MSS_9492-1 kānte vilāsini kalāvati padmanetre nityaṃ tvayi priyatame ramate mano me /
analyzed: kānte vilāsini kalāvati padma netre nityam tvayi priyatame ramate manaḥ me

original: MSS_9492-2 itthaṃ bhavantamurubhāvanayā vadantaṃ śrīkṛṣṇa māṃ budhajanā api hā hasanti //
analyzed: ittham bhavantam uru bhāvanayā vadantam śrī kṛṣṇa mām budha janāḥ api hā hasanti

original: MSS_9493-1 kānte sāgasi kañcukaspṛśi tayā sācīkṛtagrīvayā muktāḥ kopakaṣāyamanmathaśaratkrūrāḥ kaṭākṣāṅkurāḥ /
analyzed: kānte sāgasi kañcuka spṛśi tayā sācīkṛta grīvayā muktāḥ kopa kaṣāya manmatha śarad krūrāḥ kaṭākṣa aṅkurāḥ

original: MSS_9493-2 sākūtaṃ darahāsakesaravacomādhvīkadhārālasā prītiḥ kalpalateva kācana mahādānīkṛtā subhruvā //
analyzed: sa ākūtam dara hāsa kesara vacaḥ mādhvīka dhārā alasā prītiḥ kalpalatā iva kācana mahā dānīkṛtā subhruvā

original: MSS_9493A-1 kānte sāgasi kācidantikagate nirbhartsya roṣāruṇair bhrūbhaṅgīkṛṭilairapāṅgavalanairālokamān ā muhuḥ /
analyzed: kānte sāgasi kācid antika gate nirbhartsya roṣa aruṇaiḥ bhrū bhaṅgī kṛṭilaiḥ apāṅga valanaiḥ ālokamān muhur

original: MSS_9493A-2 badhvā mekhalayā sapatnaramaṇīpādābjalākṣāṅkitaṃ līlānīlasaroruheṇa niṭilaṃ hanti sma roṣākulā //
analyzed: badhvā mekhalayā sapatna ramaṇī pāda abja lākṣā aṅkitam līlā nīla saroruheṇa niṭilam hanti sma roṣa ākulā

original: MSS_9494-1 kānte sāgasi yāpite priyasakhīveṣaṃ vidhāyāgate bhrāntyāliṅgya mayā rahasyamuditaṃ tatsaṃgamākāṅkṣayā /
analyzed: kānte sāgasi yāpite priya sakhī veṣam vidhāya āgate bhrāntyā āliṅgya mayā rahasyam uditam tad saṃgama ākāṅkṣayā

original: MSS_9494-2 mugdhe duṣkarametadityatitarāmuktvā sahāsaṃ balād āliṅgya cchalitāsmi tena kitavenādya pradoṣāgame //
analyzed: mugdhe duṣkaram etat iti atitarām uktvā sa hāsam balāt āliṅgya chalitā asmi tena kitavena adya pradoṣa āgame

original: MSS_9495-1 kānte snehanidhau samīyuṣi madhau jitvā śriyaṃ śaiśirīṃ viśleṣādiva tasya pāṇḍimabhṛtāmālīlatānāmiyam /
analyzed: kānte sneha nidhau samīyuṣi madhau jitvā śriyam śaiśirīm viśleṣāt iva tasya pāṇḍima bhṛtām ālī latānām iyam

original: MSS_9495-2 kartuṃ nūtanacitrapatraracanāṃ kiṃ kānanaśrīrimāṃ prācīnāṃ pavanāñcalena paritaḥ patrāvalīṃ lumpati //
analyzed: kartum nūtana citra patra racanām kim kānana śrīḥ imām prācīnām pavana añcalena paritas patra āvalīm lumpati

original: MSS_9496-1 kānte hanta sukomalā bata matā prāg vyarthameva bhramāt kiṃtu tvaṃ bhuvi niṣṭhurā nirupamā paśyasyapīmaṃ na mām /
analyzed: kānte hanta su komalā bata matā prāk vyartham eva bhramāt kiṃtu tvam bhuvi niṣṭhurā nirupamā paśyasi api imam na mām

original: MSS_9496-2 tasmād vakṣasi te payodharamiṣād dhātrā nikhāyārpitau śailendrāviti sāṃprataṃ na hi ciraṃ saukhyaṃ parakleśituḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt vakṣasi te payodhara miṣāt dhātrā nikhāya arpitau śaila indrau iti sāṃpratam na hi ciram saukhyam para kleśituḥ

original: MSS_9497-1 kānto narmaṇi naipuṇena viditastvaṃ śaiśavadveṣiṇī krīḍāśailaśiromaṇirgṛhamidaṃ ramyo vasantotsavaḥ /
analyzed: kāntaḥ narmaṇi naipuṇena viditaḥ tvam śaiśava dveṣiṇī krīḍā śaila śiromaṇiḥ gṛham idam ramyaḥ vasanta utsavaḥ

original: MSS_9497-2 sakhyaḥ kāmakathopacāracaturāḥ saṃbhogakāle'dhunā māno vā kalaho'thavā yadi kadā taccetaso nirvṛtiḥ //
analyzed: sakhyaḥ kāma kathā upacāra caturāḥ saṃbhoga kāla idhunā mānaḥ vā kalahaḥ thavā yadi kadā tad cetasaḥ nirvṛtiḥ

original: MSS_9498-1 kānto yāsyati dūradeśamiti me cintā paraṃ jāyate lokānandakaro hi candravadane vairāyate candramāḥ /
analyzed: kāntaḥ yāsyati dūra deśam iti me cintā param jāyate loka ānanda karaḥ hi candra vadane vairāyate candramāḥ

original: MSS_9498-2 kiṃ cāyaṃ vitanoti kokilakalālāpo vilāpodayaṃ prāṇāneva haranti hanta nitarāmārāmamandānilāḥ //
analyzed: kim ca ayam vitanoti kokila kala ālāpaḥ vilāpa udayam prāṇān eva haranti hanta nitarām ārāma manda anilāḥ

original: MSS_9499-1 kānto'si nityamadhuro'si rasākulo'si kiṃ cāsi pañcaśarakārmukamadvitīyam /
analyzed: kāntaḥ asi nitya madhuraḥ asi rasa ākulaḥ usi kim ca asi pañca śara kārmukam advitīyam

original: MSS_9499-2 ikṣo tavāsti sakalaṃ paramekamūnaṃ yat sevito bhajasi nīrasatāṃ krameṇa //
analyzed: ikṣo tava asti sakalam param ekam ūnam yat sevitaḥ bhajasi nīrasa tām krameṇa

original: MSS_9500-1 kāntyā kāñcanakāntayā parimalairbhāgyaikabhogyais tathā saundaryeṇa ca sādhunaiva kusumaṃ hā hanta na tvatsamam /
analyzed: kāntyā kāñcana kāntayā parimalaiḥ bhāgya eka bhogyaiḥ tathā saundaryeṇa ca sādhunā eva kusumam hā hanta na tvad samam

original: MSS_9500-2 akrodhaṃ śṛṇu kintu dūṣaṇamiva tvayyasti kiñcit punas tattvajñairyadacumbitaṃ tvamasi re cāmpeya puṣpandhayaiḥ //
analyzed: akrodham śṛṇu kintu dūṣaṇam iva tvayi asti kiñcid punar tattva jñaiḥ yat a cumbitam tvam asi re cāmpeya puṣpandhayaiḥ

original: MSS_9501-1 kāntyā daridratvamupaiti candraḥ kimasti tattvaṃ vikacotpaleṣu /
analyzed: kāntyā daridra tvam upaiti candraḥ kim asti tattvam vikaca utpaleṣu

original: MSS_9501-2 na vedyi viśvāsya kathaṃ mṛgākṣyā saundaryasṛṣṭirmuṣitā vidhātuḥ //
analyzed: na vedyi viśvāsya katham mṛga akṣyā saundarya sṛṣṭiḥ muṣitā vidhātuḥ

original: MSS_9502-1 kāntyā viluptāni vilocanānām āpāṭalānāmatirodanena /
analyzed: kāntyā viluptāni vilocanānām āpāṭalānām atirodanena

original: MSS_9502-2 sakuṅkumānīva punarbhaṃvanti yasyārinārīkucamaṇḍalāni //
analyzed: sa kuṅkumāni iva punar bhaṃvanti yasya ari nārī kuca maṇḍalāni

original: MSS_9503-1 kāntyā suvarṇavarayā parayā ca śuddhyā nityaṃ svikāḥ khalu śikhāḥ paritaḥ kṣipantīm /
analyzed: kāntyā suvarṇa varayā parayā ca śuddhyā nityam svikāḥ khalu śikhāḥ paritas kṣipantīm

original: MSS_9503-2 cetoharāmapi kṛśeśayalocane tvāṃ jānāmi kopakaluṣo dahano dadāha //
analyzed: cetaḥ harām api kṛśeśaya locane tvām jānāmi kopa kaluṣaḥ dahanaḥ dadāha

original: MSS_9504-1 kānyakubjā dvijāḥ sarve māgadhaṃ mādhuraṃ vinā /
analyzed: kānyakubjāḥ dvijāḥ sarve māgadham mādhuram vinā

original: MSS_9504-2 gauḍadrāviḍavikhyātāḥ kānyakubjāḥ mahodbhavāḥ //
analyzed: gauḍa drāviḍa vikhyātāḥ kānyakubjāḥ mahā udbhavāḥ

original: MSS_9505-1 kā pāṇḍupatnī gṛhabhūṣaṇaṃ kiṃ ko rāmaśatruḥ kimagastyajanma /
analyzed: kā pāṇḍu patnī gṛha bhūṣaṇam kim kaḥ rāmaśatruḥ kim agastya janma

original: MSS_9505-2 kaḥ sūryaputro viparītapṛcchā kuntīsuto rāvaṇakumbhakarṇāḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ sūryaputraḥ viparīta pṛcchā kuntī sutaḥ rāvaṇa kumbhakarṇāḥ

original: MSS_9506-1 kāpi kāntamidamāha mahelā sādhu sādhaya tathā yudhi kāryam /
analyzed: kā api kāntam idam āha mahā ilā sādhu sādhaya tathā yudhi kāryam

original: MSS_9506-2 vartate tava yathā ca jayaśrīr lokanāthalalanā ca sapatnī //
analyzed: vartate tava yathā ca jayaśrīḥ lokanātha lalanā ca sapatnī

original: MSS_9507-1 kāpi kuḍyalikhitāvadhirekhāḥ proṣitapriyatamā gaṇayantī /
analyzed: kā api kuḍya likhita avadhi rekhāḥ proṣita priyatamā gaṇayantī

original: MSS_9507-2 veśmani prabalavahniparīte sāsrayā bahiranīyata sakhyā //
analyzed: veśmani prabala vahni parīte sa asrayā bahis anīyata sakhyā

original: MSS_9508-1 kāpi mukhyapadavīmadhiropya svāṃ sakhīṃ svakaradhāritadīpā /
analyzed: kā api mukhya padavīm adhiropya svām sakhīm sva kara dhārita dīpā

original: MSS_9508-2 prāṇanātharatigehamayāsīd adbhuto ratipaterupadeśaḥ //
analyzed: prāṇanātha rati geham ayāsīt adbhutaḥ ratipateḥ upadeśaḥ

original: MSS_9509-1 kāpiśāyanasugandhi vighūrṇann unmado'dhiśayituṃ samaśeta /
analyzed: kāpiśāyana sugandhi vighūrṇan unmada udhi śayitum samaśeta

original: MSS_9509-2 phulladṛṣṭivadanaṃ pramadānām abjacāru caṣakaṃ ca śaḍaṅghriḥ //
analyzed: phulla dṛṣṭi vadanam pramadānām abja cāru caṣakam ca śaṭh aṅghriḥ

original: MSS_9510-1 kāpi śīghramavadhīritamānā mānino vicalitā priyadhāmni /
analyzed: kā api śīghram avadhīrita mānā māninaḥ vicalitā priya dhāmni

original: MSS_9510-2 āgatena marutāpi purastāl lāghavasya parihāramamaṃsta //
analyzed: āgatena marutā api purastāt lāghavasya parihāram amaṃsta

original: MSS_9511-1 kāpuruṣaḥ kukkuraśca bhojanaikaparāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: kāpuruṣaḥ kukkuraḥ ca bhojana eka parāyaṇaḥ

original: MSS_9511-2 lālitaḥ pārśvamāyāti vārito naiva gacchati //
analyzed: lālitaḥ pārśvam āyāti vāritaḥ na eva gacchati

original: MSS_9512-1 kāpyaṅghrī raṅgapatryāruṇayati ramaṇī bhūṣaṇairbhāti kācid gāyatyanyā parāpi pralasati laharīlakṣma vāso vasānā /
analyzed: kā api aṅghrī raṅga patryā aruṇayati ramaṇī bhūṣaṇaiḥ bhāti kācid gāyati anyā parā api pralasati laharī lakṣma vāsaḥ vasānā

original: MSS_9512-2 yatrānyā snehapūrān vitarati ca mudaṃ yāti dolābhiranyā sā śṛṅgāradvitīyā racayati na manaḥ kasya śṛṅgāramagnam //
analyzed: yatra anyā sneha pūrān vitarati ca mudam yāti dolābhiḥ anyā sā śṛṅgāra dvitīyā racayati na manaḥ kasya śṛṅgāra magnam

original: MSS_9513-1 kāpyanyā mukulādhikāramilitā lakṣmīraśokadrume mākandaḥ samayocitena vidhinā dhatte'bhijātaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: kā api anyā mukula adhikāra militā lakṣmīḥ aśoka drume mākandaḥ samaya ucitena vidhinā vapuḥ

original: MSS_9513-2 kiṃ cāṣāḍhagireranaṅgavijayaprastāvanāpaṇḍita ḥ svairaṃ sarpati bālacandanalatālīlāsakho mārutaḥ //
analyzed: kim ca āṣāḍha gireḥ anaṅga vijaya prastāvanā paṇḍitaḥ svairam sarpati bāla candana latā līlā sakhaḥ mārutaḥ

original: MSS_9514-1 kāpyabhikhyā tayorāsīd vrajato śuddhaveṣayoḥ /
analyzed: kā api abhikhyā tayoḥ āsīt vrajatoḥ śuddha veṣayoḥ

original: MSS_9514-2 himanirmuktayoryoge citrācandramasoriva //
analyzed: hima nirmuktayoḥ yoge citrā candramasoḥ iva

original: MSS_9515-1 kāpyāgataṃ vīkṣya manodhināthaṃ samutthitā sādaramāsanāya /
analyzed: kā api āgatam vīkṣya manodhinātham samutthitā sa ādaram āsanāya

original: MSS_9515-2 kareṇa śiñjadvalayena talpam āsphālayantī kalamājuhāva //
analyzed: kareṇa śiñjat valayena talpam āsphālayantī kalam ājuhāva

original: MSS_9516-1 kā prastutābhiṣekād āryaṃ pracyāvayed guṇajyeṣṭham /
analyzed: kā prastuta abhiṣekāt āryam pracyāvayet guṇa jyeṣṭham

original: MSS_9516-2 manye mamaiva puṇyaiḥ sevāvasaraḥ kṛto vidhinā //
analyzed: manye mama eva puṇyaiḥ sevā avasaraḥ kṛtaḥ vidhinā

original: MSS_9517-1 kā priyeṇa rahitā varāṅganā dhāmni kena tanayena nanditā /
analyzed: kā priyeṇa rahitā vara aṅganā dhāmni kena tanayena nanditā

original: MSS_9517-2 kīdṛśena puruṣeṇa pakṣiṇāṃ bandhanaṃ samabhilaṣyate sadā //
analyzed: kīdṛśena puruṣeṇa pakṣiṇām bandhanam samabhilaṣyate sadā

original: MSS_9518-1 kā prītiḥ saha mārjāraiḥ kā prītiravanīpatau /
analyzed: kā prītiḥ saha mārjāraiḥ kā prītiḥ avanīpatau

original: MSS_9518-2 gaṇikābhiśca kā prītiḥ kā prītirbhikṣukaiḥ saha //
analyzed: gaṇikābhiḥ ca kā prītiḥ kā prītiḥ bhikṣukaiḥ saha

original: MSS_9519-1 kābhirna tatrābhinavasmarājñā viśvāsanikṣepavaṇik kriye'ham /
analyzed: kābhiḥ na tatra abhinava smara ājñā viśvāsa nikṣepa vaṇij kriyā iham

original: MSS_9519-2 jihneti yannaiva kuto'pi tiryak kaścit tiraścastrapate na tena //
analyzed: jihnā iti yat nā eva kutopi tiryak kaścid na tena

original: MSS_9520-1 kā bhūṣā balināṃ,
analyzed: kā bhūṣā balinām

original: kṣamā,
analyzed: kṣamā

original: paribhavaḥ,
analyzed: paribhavaḥ

original: kopaḥ svakulyaiḥ kṛtaḥ kiṃ duḥkhaṃ,
analyzed: kopaḥ svakulyaiḥ kṛtaḥ kim duḥkham

original: parasaṃśrayo,
analyzed: para saṃśrayaḥ

original: jagati kaḥ ślāghyo,
analyzed: jagati kaḥ ślāghyaḥ

original: ya āśrīyate /
analyzed: yaḥ āśrīyate

original: MSS_9520-2 ko mṛtyu, rvyasanaṃ,
analyzed: kaḥ mṛtyuḥ vyasanam

original: śucaṃ jahati ke,
analyzed: śucam jahati ke

original: yairnirjitā śatravaḥ kairvijñātamidaṃ virāṭanagaracchannasthitaiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ //
analyzed: yaiḥ nirjitā śatravaḥ kaiḥ vijñātam idam virāṭa nagara channa sthitaiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ

original: MSS_9521-1 kāmaṃ karīṣāgnimadho nidhāyā- bhrameṇa tāpātiśayaṃ bhajadhvam /
analyzed: kāmam karīṣa agnim adhas nidhāya ā bhrameṇa tāpa atiśayam bhajadhvam

original: MSS_9521-2 yuṣmākamadyāvadhi nādhikāro dugdhātimugdhādharamādhurīṣu //
analyzed: yuṣmākam adya avadhi na adhikāraḥ dugdha ati mugdha adhara mādhurīṣu

original: MSS_9522-1 kāmaṃ karṇakaṭuḥ kṛto'timadhuraḥ kekāravaḥ kekināṃ meghāścāmṛtadhāriṇo'pi vihitāḥ prāyo viṣasyandinaḥ /
analyzed: kāmam karṇa kaṭuḥ kṛta ūti madhuraḥ kekā ravaḥ kekinām meghāḥ ca amṛta dhāriṇaḥ api vihitāḥ prāyas viṣa syandinaḥ

original: MSS_9522-2 unmīlannavakandalāvalirasau śayyāpi sarpāyate tat kiṃ yad viparītamatra na kṛtaṃ tasyā viyogena me //
analyzed: unmīlat nava kandala āvaliḥ asau śayyā api sarpāyate tat kim yat viparītam atra na kṛtam tasyāḥ viyogena me

original: MSS_9523-1 kāmaṃ kāmadughaṃ dhuṅkṣva mitrāya varuṇāya ca /
analyzed: kāmam kāmadugham dhuṅkṣva mitrāya varuṇāya ca

original: MSS_9523-2 vayaṃ dhīreṇa dānena sarvān kāmānaśīmahi //
analyzed: vayam dhīreṇa dānena sarvān kāmān aśīmahi

original: MSS_9524-1 kāmaṃ kāmayate na kelinalinīṃ nāmodate kaumudī- nisyandairna samīhate mṛgadṛśāmālāpalīlāmapi /
analyzed: kāmam kāmayate na keli nalinīm nā āmodate kaumudī nisyandaiḥ na samīhate mṛga dṛśām ālāpa līlām api

original: MSS_9524-2 sīdanneṣa niśāsu duḥsahatanurbhogābhilāṣālasair aṅgaistāmyati cetasi vrajavadhūmādhāya mugdho hariḥ //
analyzed: sīdan eṣa niśāsu duḥsaha tanuḥ bhoga abhilāṣa alasaiḥ aṅgaiḥ tāmyati cetasi vraja vadhūm ādhāya mugdhaḥ hariḥ

original: MSS_9525-1 kāmaṃ kāmayamānasya yadā kāmaḥ samṛddhyate /
analyzed: kāmam kāmayamānasya yadā kāmaḥ samṛddhyate

original: MSS_9525-2 athainamaparaḥ kāmas tṛṣṇā vidhyati bāṇavat //
analyzed: atha enam aparaḥ kāmaḥ tṛṣṇāḥ vidhyati bāṇa vat

original: MSS_9526-1 kāmaṃ kāmasamas tvamatra jagati khyāto'si yat sarvadā rūpeṇaiva mahīpate tava dhanuḥpāṇḍityamanyādṛśam /
analyzed: kāmam kāma samaḥ tvam atra jagati khyātaḥ asi yat sarvadā rūpeṇa eva mahīpate tava dhanuḥ pāṇḍityam anyādṛśam

original: MSS_9526-2 tvaṃ yasmin viśikhaṃ vimuñcasi tamevoddiśya muktatrapaṃ truṭyatkaṃcukamudgataspṛhamaho dhāvanti devāṅganāḥ //
analyzed: tvam yasmin viśikham vimuñcasi tam eva uddiśya mukta trapam truṭyat kaṃcukam udgata spṛham aho dhāvanti deva aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_9527-1 kāmaṃ kumīnasadṛśaṃ rājyamapi prājyakaṇṭakaṃ kuśalaḥ /
analyzed: kāmam ku mīna sadṛśam rājyam api prājya kaṇṭakam kuśalaḥ

original: MSS_9527-2 pākānvitamatisurasaṃ bhuṅkte bahudhāvadhānena //
analyzed: pāka anvitam ati su rasam bhuṅkte bahudhā avadhānena

original: MSS_9528-1 kāmaṃ kūle nadīnāmanugiri mahiṣīyūthanīḍopakaṇṭhe gāhante śaṣparājīrabhinavaśalabhagrāsalolā balākāḥ /
analyzed: kāmam kūle nadīnām anugiri mahiṣī yūtha nīḍa upakaṇṭhe gāhante śaṣpa rājīḥ abhinava śalabha grāsa lolāḥ balākāḥ

original: MSS_9528-2 antarvinyastavīruttṛṇamayapuruṣatrāsavighnaṃ kathaṃcit kāpotaṃ kodravāṇāṃ kavalayati kaṇān kṣetrakoṇaikadeśe //
analyzed: antar vinyasta vīrudh tṛṇa maya puruṣa trāsa vighnam kathaṃcid kāpotam kodravāṇām kavalayati kaṇān kṣetra koṇa eka deśe

original: MSS_9529-1 kāmaṃ kopakaṣāyitākṣiyugalaṃ kṛtvā karotphālanaiḥ kṣudrān vanyamṛgāt karīndra sahasā vidrāvaya tvaṃ mudā /
analyzed: kāmam kopa kaṣāyita akṣi yugalam kṛtvā kara utphālanaiḥ kṣudrān vanya mṛgāt kari indra sahasā vidrāvaya tvam mudā

original: MSS_9529-2 helākhaṇḍitakumbhikumbhavigaladraktāruṇāṅge harau jāte locanagocare yadi bhavān sthātā tadā manmahe //
analyzed: helā khaṇḍita kumbhi kumbha vigalat rakta aruṇa aṅge harau jāte locana gocare yadi bhavān sthātā tadā manmahe

original: MSS_9530-1 kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca dambhaṃ darpaṃ ca bhūmipaḥ /
analyzed: kāmam krodham ca lobham ca dambham darpam ca bhūmipaḥ

original: MSS_9530-2 samyagvijetuṃ yo veda sa mahīmabhijāyate //
analyzed: samyak vijetum yaḥ veda sa mahīm abhijāyate

original: MSS_9530A-1 kāmaṃ krodhaṃ bhayaṃ lobhaṃ dambhaṃ mohaṃ madaṃ tathā /
analyzed: kāmam krodham bhayam lobham dambham moham madam tathā

original: MSS_9530A-2 nidrāṃ matsaramālasyaṃ nāstikyaṃ ca parityaja //
analyzed: nidrām matsaram ālasyam nāstikyam ca parityaja

original: MSS_9531-1 kāmaṃ krodhaṃ lobhaṃ mohaṃ tyaktvātmānaṃ paśya hi ko'ham
analyzed: kāmam krodham lobham moham tyaktvā ātmānam paśya hi koham

original: MSS_9531-2 ātmajñānavihīnā mūḍhās te pacyante narake mūḍhāḥ //
analyzed: ātma jñāna vihīnāḥ mūḍhāḥ te pacyante narake mūḍhāḥ

original: MSS_9532-1 kāmaṃ guṇairmahāneṣa prakṛtyā punarāsuraḥ /
analyzed: kāmam guṇaiḥ mahān eṣa prakṛtyā punar āsuraḥ

original: MSS_9532-2 utkarṣāt sarvato vṛtteḥ sarvākāraṃ hi dṛpyati //
analyzed: utkarṣāt sarvatas vṛtteḥ sarva ākāram hi dṛpyati

original: MSS_9533-1 kāmaṃ janāḥ smayante kailāsavilāsavarṇanāvasare /
analyzed: kāmam janāḥ smayante kailāsa vilāsa varṇanā avasare

original: MSS_9533-2 sādhanakathanāvasare sācīkurvanti vaktrāṇi //
analyzed: sādhana kathana avasare sācīkurvanti vaktrāṇi

original: MSS_9534-1 kāmaṃ tu kṣapayed dehaṃ puṣpamūlaphalaiḥ śubhaiḥ /
analyzed: kāmam tu kṣapayet deham puṣpa mūla phalaiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: MSS_9534-2 na tu nāmāpi gṛhṇīyāt patyau prete parasya tu //
analyzed: na tu nāma api gṛhṇīyāt patyau prete parasya tu

original: MSS_9535-1 kāmaṃ dahantu maruto malayācalasya candro'pi pātayatu vā nitarāṃ sphuliṅgān /
analyzed: kāmam dahantu marutaḥ malaya acalasya candraḥ upi pātayatu vā nitarām sphuliṅgān

original: MSS_9535-2 dūre priyo vimalavaṃśamaṇiḥ patirme tatsāmprataṃ tvaritamānaya taṃ kathaṃcit //
analyzed: dūre priyaḥ vimala vaṃśa maṇiḥ patiḥ me tat sāmpratam tvaritam ānaya tam kathaṃcid

original: MSS_9536-1 kāmaṃ dīrghā bhaved yātrā kāmaṃ panthā mahān bhavet /
analyzed: kāmam dīrghā bhavet yātrā kāmam panthāḥ mahān bhavet

original: MSS_9536-2 so'pi prabhoḥ kṛpāmeva nityamāśrayate'ntataḥ //
analyzed: saḥ upi prabhoḥ kṛpām eva nityam āśrayaten tatas

original: MSS_9537-1 kāmaṃ dugdhe viprakarṣatyalakṣmīṃ kīrtiṃ sūte duṣkṛtaṃ yā hinasti /
analyzed: kāmam dugdhe viprakarṣati alakṣmīm kīrtim sūte duṣkṛtam yā hinasti

original: MSS_9537-2 tāṃ cāpyetāṃ mātaraṃ maṅgalānāṃ dhenuṃ dhīrāḥ sūnṛtāṃ vācamāhuḥ //
analyzed: tām ca api etām mātaram maṅgalānām dhenum dhīrāḥ sūnṛtām vācam āhuḥ

original: MSS_9538-1 kāmaṃ durviṣahajvaraṃ janayati vyāghūrṇayatpakṣiṇī gātrāṇyūrunitambagaṇḍahṛdayānyucchūnay atyulbaṇam /
analyzed: kāmam durviṣaha jvaram janayati vyāghūrṇayat pakṣiṇī gātrāṇi ūru nitamba gaṇḍa hṛdayāni ati ulbaṇam

original: MSS_9538-2 tāṃ tāṃ durvikṛtaṃ karoti suhṛdo gāḍhaṃ vyathante yayā vyādhiyauvanamātmanāśaniyataḥ ke te grahaṇyādayaḥ //
analyzed: tām tām durvikṛtam karoti suhṛdaḥ gāḍham vyathante yayā vyādhi yauvanam ātma nāśa niyataḥ ke te grahaṇī ādayaḥ

original: MSS_9539-1 kāmaṃ dṛṣṭā mayā sarvā vivastrā rāvaṇastriyaḥ /
analyzed: kāmam dṛṣṭāḥ mayā sarvāḥ vivastrāḥ rāvaṇa striyaḥ

original: MSS_9539-2 na tu me manasaḥ kiṃcid vaikṛtyamupapadyate //
analyzed: na tu me manasaḥ kiṃcid vaikṛtyam upapadyate

original: MSS_9540-1 mano hi hetuḥ sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravartane /
analyzed: manaḥ hi hetuḥ sarveṣām indriyāṇām pravartane

original: MSS_9540-2 śubhāśubhāsvavasthāsu tacca me suvyavasthitam //
analyzed: śubha aśubhāsu avasthāsu tat ca me su vyavasthitam

original: MSS_9541-1 kāmaṃ na paśyati didṛkṣata eva bhūmnā noktāpi jalpati vivakṣati cādareṇa /
analyzed: kāmam na paśyati didṛkṣate eva bhūmnā na uktā api jalpati vivakṣati ca ādareṇa

original: MSS_9541-2 lajjāsmaravyatikareṇa mano'dhināthe bālā rasāntaramidaṃ lalitaṃ bibharti //
analyzed: lajjā smara vyatikareṇa manodhināthe bālā rasa antaram idam lalitam bibharti

original: MSS_9542-1 kāmaṃ niṣkaruṇaṃ vetsi vetsi taṃ bahuvallabham /
analyzed: kāmam niṣkaruṇam vetsi vetsi tam bahu vallabham

original: MSS_9542-2 dūti cūtāṅkurakharā diśo vetsi na vetsi kim //
analyzed: dūti cūta aṅkura kharāḥ diśaḥ vetsi na vetsi kim

original: MSS_9543-1 kāmaṃ nṛpāḥ santu sahasraśo'nye rājanvatīmāhuranena bhūmim /
analyzed: kāmam nṛpāḥ santu sahasra śonye rājanvatīm āhuḥ anena bhūmim

original: MSS_9543-2 nakṣatratārāgrahasaṃkulāpi jyotiṣmatī cāndramasaiva rātriḥ //
analyzed: nakṣatra tārā graha saṃkulā api jyotiṣmatī cāndramasā eva rātriḥ

original: MSS_9543A-1 kāmaṃ paramiti jñātvā devo'pi hi purandaraḥ /
analyzed: kāmam param iti jñātvā devaḥ api hi purandaraḥ

original: MSS_9543A-2 gautamasya muneḥ patnīm ahalyāṃ cakame purā //
analyzed: gautamasya muneḥ patnīm ahalyām cakame purā

original: MSS_9544-1 kāmaṃ pratyādiṣṭāṃ smarāmi na parigrahaṃ munes tanayān /
analyzed: kāmam pratyādiṣṭām smarāmi na parigraham muneḥ tanayān

original: MSS_9544-2 balavat tu dūyamānaṃ pratyāyayatīva me hṛdayam //
analyzed: balavat tu dūyamānam pratyāyayati iva me hṛdayam

original: MSS_9545-1 kāmaṃ pradīpayati rūpamabhivyanakti saubhāgyamāvahati vaktrasugandhitāṃ ca /
analyzed: kāmam pradīpayati rūpam abhivyanakti saubhāgyam āvahati vaktra sugandhi tām ca

original: MSS_9545-2 ūrjaṃ karoti kaphajāśca nihanti rogāṃs tāmbūlamevamaparāṃśca guṇān karoti //
analyzed: ūrjam karoti kapha jāḥ ca nihanti rogān tāmbūlam evam aparān ca guṇān karoti

original: MSS_9546-1 yuktena cūrṇena karoti rāgaṃ rāgakṣayaṃ pūgaphalātiriktam /
analyzed: yuktena cūrṇena karoti rāgam rāga kṣayam pūga phala atiriktam

original: MSS_9546-2 cūrṇādhikaṃ vaktravigandhakāri patrādhikaṃ sādhu karoti gandham //
analyzed: cūrṇa adhikam vaktra vigandha kāri patra adhikam sādhu karoti gandham

original: MSS_9547-1 patrādhikam niśi hitaṃ saphalaṃ divā ca proktānyathākaraṇamasya viḍambanaiva /
analyzed: patra adhikam niśi hitam saphalam divā ca proktā anyathā karaṇam asya viḍambanā eva

original: MSS_9547-2 kakkolapūgalavalīphalapārijātair āmoditaṃ madamudā muditaṃ karoti //
analyzed: kakkola pūgala valī phala pārijātaiḥ āmoditam mada mudā muditam karoti

original: MSS_9548-1 kāmaṃ pradoṣatimireṇa na dṛśyase tvaṃ saudāminīva jaladodarasaṃdhilīnā /
analyzed: kāmam pradoṣa timireṇa na dṛśyase tvam saudāminī iva jalada udara saṃdhi līnā

original: MSS_9548-2 tvāṃ sūcayiṣyati tu mālyasamudbhavo'yaṃ gandhaśca bhīru mukharāṇi ca nūpurāṇi //
analyzed: tvām sūcayiṣyati tu mālya samudbhavaḥ yam gandhaḥ ca bhīru mukharāṇi ca nūpurāṇi

original: MSS_9549-1 kāmaṃ priyānapi prāṇān vimuñcanti manasvinaḥ /
analyzed: kāmam priyān api prāṇān vimuñcanti manasvinaḥ

original: MSS_9549-2 icchanti na tvamitrebhyo mahatīmapi satkriyām //
analyzed: icchanti na tu amitrebhyaḥ mahatīm api satkriyām

original: MSS_9550-1 kāmaṃ priyā na sulabhā manas tu tadbhāvadarśanāśvāsi /
analyzed: kāmam priyā na sulabhā manaḥ tu tad bhāva darśana āśvāsi

original: MSS_9550-2 akṛtārthe'pi manasije ratimubhayaprārthanā kurute //
analyzed: akṛtārthe api manasije ratim ubhaya prārthanā kurute

original: MSS_9551-1 kāmaṃ bhavantu madhulampaṭaṣaṭpadaugha- saṃghaṭṭadhundhumaghanadhvanayo'bjakhaṇḍāḥ /
analyzed: kāmam bhavantu madhu lampaṭa ṣaṭpada ogha saṃghaṭṭa dhundhuma ghana dhvanayaḥ ubja khaṇḍāḥ

original: MSS_9551-2 gāyatyatiśrutisukhaṃ vidhireva yatra bhṛṅgaḥ sa ko'pi dharaṇīdharanābhipadmaḥ //
