analyzed: gāyati ati śruti sukham vidhiḥ eva yatra bhṛṅgaḥ sa kaḥ api dharaṇīdhara nābhi padmaḥ

original: MSS_9552-1 kāmaṃ bhavantu sarito bhuvi supratiṣṭhāḥ svādūni santu salilāni ca śuktayaśca /
analyzed: kāmam bhavantu saritaḥ bhuvi su pratiṣṭhāḥ svādūni santu salilāni ca śuktayaḥ ca

original: MSS_9552-2 etāṃ vihāya varavarṇini tāmraparṇīṃ nānyatra sambhavati mauktikakāmadhenuḥ //
analyzed: etām vihāya varavarṇini tāmraparṇīm na anyatra sambhavati mauktika kāmadhenuḥ

original: MSS_9553-1 kāmaṃ mā kāmayadhvaṃ vṛṣamapi ca bhṛśaṃ mādriyadhvaṃ na vitte cittaṃ datta śrayadhvaṃ paramamṛtaphalā yā kalā tāmihaikām /
analyzed: kāmam mā kāmayadhvam vṛṣam api ca bhṛśam mā ādriyadhvam na vitte cittam datta śrayadhvam param amṛta phalā yā kalā tām iha ekām

original: MSS_9553-2 itthaṃ devaḥ smarārirvūṣamadharacarīkṛtya mūrtyaiva ditsan niḥsvo viśvopadeśānamṛtakarakalāśekharastrāyatāṃ vaḥ //
analyzed: ittham devaḥ smarāriḥ vūṣam adharacarīkṛtya mūrtyā eva ditsan niḥsvaḥ viśva upadeśān amṛta kara kalā śekharaḥ trāyatām vaḥ

original: MSS_9554-1 kāmaṃ likhatu saṃsthānaṃ kaścid rūpaṃ ca bhāsvataḥ /
analyzed: kāmam likhatu saṃsthānam kaścid rūpam ca bhāsvataḥ

original: MSS_9554-2 abhittivihatālambam ālokaṃ vilikhet katham //
analyzed: a bhitti vihata ālambam ālokam vilikhet katham

original: MSS_9555-1 kāmaṃ vaneṣu hariṇās tṛṇena jīvantyayatnasulabhena /
analyzed: kāmam vaneṣu hariṇāḥ tṛṇena jīvanti ayatna sulabhena

original: MSS_9555-2 vidadhati dhaniṣu na dainyaṃ te kila paśavo vayaṃ sudhiyaḥ //
analyzed: vidadhati dhaniṣu na dainyam te kila paśavaḥ vayam sudhiyaḥ

original: MSS_9556-1 kāmaṃ vapuḥ pulakitaṃ nayane dhṛtāsre vācaḥ sagadgadapadāḥ sakhi kampi vakṣaḥ /
analyzed: kāmam vapuḥ pulakitam nayane dhṛta asre vācaḥ sa gadgada padāḥ sakhi kampi vakṣaḥ

original: MSS_9556-2 jñātaṃ mukundamuralīravamādhurī te cetaḥ sudhāṃśuvadane taralīkaroti //
analyzed: jñātam mukunda muralī rava mādhurī te cetaḥ sudhāṃśu vadane taralīkaroti

original: MSS_9557-1 kāmaṃ vācaḥ katicidaphalāḥ santu loke kavīnāṃ santyevānyā madhuripukathāsaṃstavāt kāmadogdhryaḥ /
analyzed: kāmam vācaḥ katicid aphalāḥ santu loke kavīnām santi eva anyāḥ madhuripu kathā saṃstavāt kāma dogdhryaḥ

original: MSS_9557-2 vittaṃ kāmaṃ bhavatu viphalaṃ dattamaśrotriyebhyaḥ pātre dattairbhavati hi dhanairdhanyatā bhūridātuḥ //
analyzed: vittam kāmam bhavatu viphalam dattam aśrotriyebhyaḥ pātre dattaiḥ bhavati hi dhanaiḥ dhanya tā bhūri dātuḥ

original: MSS_9558-1 kāmaṃ viṣaṃ ca viṣayāśca nirīkṣyamāṇāḥ śreyo viṣaṃ na viṣayāḥ parisevyamānāḥ /
analyzed: kāmam viṣam ca viṣayāḥ ca nirīkṣyamāṇāḥ śreyaḥ viṣam na viṣayāḥ parisevyamānāḥ

original: MSS_9558-2 ekatra janmani viṣaṃ vinihanti pītaṃ janmāntareṣu viṣayāḥ paritāpayanti //
analyzed: ekatra janmani viṣam vinihanti pītam janmāntareṣu viṣayāḥ paritāpayanti

original: MSS_9559-1 kāmaṃ śivena śamitaṃ punarujjagāra dṛṣṭis taveti kimiyaṃ janani stutiste /
analyzed: kāmam śivena śamitam punar ujjagāra dṛṣṭiḥ tava iti kim iyam janani stutiḥ te

original: MSS_9559-2 līlāprasūtapuruṣārthacatuṣṭayāyās tasyāḥ paraṃ tu sa bhavatyavayuktyavādaḥ //
MSS_9560-1 kāmaṃ śīrṇapalāśapatraracitāṃ kanthāṃ vasāno vane kuryāmambubhirapyayācitasukhaiḥ prāṇānubandhasthitim /
analyzed: kāmam śīrṇa palāśa patra racitām kanthām vasānaḥ vane kuryām ambubhiḥ api a yācita sukhaiḥ prāṇa anubandha sthitim

original: MSS_9560-2 sāṅgaglāni savepitaṃ sacakitaṃ sāntarnidāghajvaraṃ vaktuṃ na tvahamutsahe sakṛpaṇaṃ dehīti dīnaṃ vacaḥ //
analyzed: sa aṅga glāni sa vepitam sa cakitam sa antar nidāgha jvaram vaktum na tu aham utsahe sa kṛpaṇam dehi iti dīnam vacaḥ

original: MSS_9561-1 kāmaṃ śunako nṛpati- prasādataḥ syād gajendramaulisthaḥ /
analyzed: kāmam śunakaḥ nṛpati prasādataḥ syāt gaja indra mauli sthaḥ

original: MSS_9561-2 bhavateva tena saha re nārdayituṃ śakyate jātu //
analyzed: bhavatā iva tena saha re na ardayitum śakyate jātu

original: MSS_9562-1 kāmaṃ śyāmatanus tathā malinayatyāvāsavastrādikaṃ lokaṃ rodayate bhanakti janatāgoṣṭhīṃ kṣaṇenāpi yaḥ /
analyzed: kāmam śyāma tanuḥ tathā malinayati āvāsa vastra ādikam lokam rodayate bhanakti janatā goṣṭhīm kṣaṇena api yaḥ

original: MSS_9562-2 mārge'pyaṅgulilagna eva bhavataḥ svābhāvinaḥ śreyase hā svāhāpriya dhūmamaṅgajamimaṃ sūtvā na kiṃ lajjitaḥ //
analyzed: mārge api aṅguli lagne eva bhavataḥ svābhāvinaḥ śreyase hā svāhā priya dhūmam aṅgajam imam sūtvā na kim lajjitaḥ

original: MSS_9563-1 kāmaṃ santu sahasraśaḥ katipaye sārasyadhaureyakāḥ kāmaṃ vā kamanīyatāparimalasvārājyabaddhavratāḥ /
analyzed: kāmam santu sahasraśas katipaye sārasya dhaureyakāḥ kāmam vā kamanīya tā parimala svārājya baddha vratāḥ

original: MSS_9563-2 naivaivaṃ vivadāmahe na ca vayaṃ deva priyaṃ brūmahe yatsatyaṃ ramaṇīyatāpariṇatistvayyeva pāraṃ gatā //
analyzed: na eva evam vivadāmahe na ca vayam deva priyam brūmahe yat satyam ramaṇīya tā pariṇatiḥ tvayi eva pāram gatā

original: MSS_9564-1 kāmaṃ sarvo'pyalaṃkāro rasamarthe niṣiñcati /
analyzed: kāmam sarvaḥ api alaṃkāraḥ rasam arthe niṣiñcati

original: MSS_9564-2 tathāpyagrāmyataivainaṃ bhāraṃ vahati bhūyasā //
analyzed: tathā api agrāmyatā eva enam bhāram vahati bhūyasā

original: MSS_9564A-1 kāmaṃ sudhākarakarāmṛtadivyarūpa- saudhāgrapīṭhavasatiḥ sukhamastu kākaḥ /
analyzed: kāmam sudhākara kara amṛta divya rūpa saudha agra pīṭha vasatiḥ sukham astu kākaḥ

original: MSS_9564A-2 śrīsundarīramaṇasaṅgamakaṇṭhalagna- pūryatsudhāmaṇitajit kimasau kapotaḥ //
analyzed: śrī sundarī ramaṇa saṅgama kaṇṭha lagna pūryat sudhā maṇita jit kim asau kapotaḥ

original: MSS_9565-1 kāmaṃ striyo niṣeveta pānaṃ vā sādhu mātrayā /
analyzed: kāmam striyaḥ niṣeveta pānam vā sādhu mātrayā

original: MSS_9565-2 na dyūtamṛgaye vidvān atyantavyasane hi te //
analyzed: na dyūta mṛgaye vidvān atyanta vyasane hi te

original: MSS_9566-1 kāmaṃ harirbhava vimūḍha bhavātha candraś candrārdhamauliratha vā hara eva bhūyāḥ /
analyzed: kāmam hariḥ bhava vimūḍha bhava atha candraḥ candra ardha mauliḥ atha vā haraḥ eva bhūyāḥ

original: MSS_9566-2 vidyāpraṇāśaparivardhitaghoradīpteḥ krodhānalasya mama nendhanatāṃ prayāsi //
analyzed: vidyā praṇāśa parivardhita ghora dīpteḥ krodha analasya mama nā indhana tām prayāsi

original: MSS_9567-1 kāmaḥ kamanīyatayā kimapi nikāmaṃ karoti saṃmoham /
analyzed: kāmaḥ kamanīya tayā kim api nikāmam karoti saṃmoham

original: MSS_9567-2 viṣamiva viṣamaṃ sahasā madhuratayā jīvanaṃ harati //
analyzed: viṣam iva viṣamam sahasā madhura tayā jīvanam harati

original: MSS_9568-1 kāmaḥ kāmaṃ kamalavadanānetraparyantavāsī dāsībhūtatribhuvanajanaḥ prītaye jāyatāṃ vaḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ kāmam kamala vadanā netra paryanta vāsī dāsī bhūta tribhuvana janaḥ prītaye jāyatām vaḥ

original: MSS_9568-2 dagdhasyāpi tripuraripuṇā sarvalokaspṛhārhā yasyādhikyaṃ ruciratitarāmañjanasyeva yātā //
analyzed: dagdhasya api tripura ripuṇā sarva loka spṛhā arhā yasya ādhikyam ruciḥ atitarām añjanasya iva yātā

original: MSS_9569-1 kāmaḥ kupyati candramā api balānmāṃ dagdhumabhyudyato vātā vāpi samāgatā yamadiśaḥ prāṇān niharntu tathā /
analyzed: kāmaḥ kupyati candramāḥ api balāt mām dagdhum abhyudyataḥ vātāḥ vā api samāgatāḥ yama diśaḥ prāṇān niharntu tathā

original: MSS_9569-2 raktākṣāstvarayanti tān parabhṛtāḥ svaiḥ kūjanairdūti tat preyāṃsaṃ tamupānayāśvitarathā trāṇaṃ na me kutracit //
analyzed: rakta akṣāḥ tvarayanti tān parabhṛtāḥ svaiḥ kūjanaiḥ dūti tat preyāṃsam tam upānaya aśvita rathā trāṇam na me kutracid

original: MSS_9569A-1 kāmaḥ krodhaśca lobhaśca dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ ca lobhaḥ ca dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ

original: MSS_9569A-2 jñātaratnamapāhāri tasmāj jāgrata jāgrata //
analyzed: jñāta ratnam apāhāri tasmāt jāgrata jāgrata

original: MSS_9570-1 kāmaḥ krodhaśca lobhaśca māno harṣo madas tathā /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ ca lobhaḥ ca mānaḥ harṣaḥ madaḥ tathā

original: MSS_9570-2 ete hi ṣaḍ vijetavyā nityaṃ svaṃ dehamāśritāḥ //
analyzed: ete hi ṣaṭ vijetavyāḥ nityam svam deham āśritāḥ

original: MSS_9571-1 kāmaḥ krodhaśca lobhaśca mado mānas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ ca lobhaḥ ca madaḥ mānaḥ tathā eva ca

original: MSS_9571-2 harṣaśca śatravo hyete nāśāya kumahībhṛtām //
analyzed: harṣaḥ ca śatravaḥ hi ete nāśāya ku mahībhṛtām

original: MSS_9571A-1 kāmaḥ krodhaśca lobhaśca moho harṣo madastathā /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ ca lobhaḥ ca mohaḥ harṣaḥ madaḥ tathā

original: MSS_9571A-2 ṣaḍvargamutsṛjedenaṃ yasmiṃstyakte sukhī nṛpaḥ //
analyzed: ṣaḍvargam utsṛjet enam yasmin tyakte sukhī nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_9571B-1 kāmaḥ krodhas tathā mohas trayo'pyete mahādviṣaḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ tathā mohaḥ trayaḥ upi ete mahā dviṣaḥ

original: MSS_9571B-2 ete na nirjitā yāvat tāvat saukhyaṃ kuto nṛṇām //
analyzed: ete na nirjitāḥ yāvat tāvat saukhyam kutas nṛṇām

original: MSS_9572-1 kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobho dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ tathā lobhaḥ dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ

original: MSS_9572-2 te muṣṇanti jagat sarvaṃ tasmājjāgrata jāgrata //
analyzed: te muṣṇanti jagat sarvam tasmāt jāgrata jāgrata

original: MSS_9572A-B-1 kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobho rāgo dveṣaśca matsaraḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ tathā lobhaḥ rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ ca matsaraḥ

original: MSS_9572A-B-2 mado māyā tathā mohaḥ kandarpo darpa eva ca //
analyzed: madaḥ māyā tathā mohaḥ kandarpaḥ darpaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_9572A-B-3 ete hi ripavo ghorā dharmasarvasvahāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: ete hi ripavaḥ ghorāḥ dharma sarvasva hāriṇaḥ

original: MSS_9572A-B-4 etairbambhramyate jīvaḥ saṃsāre bahuduḥkhade //
analyzed: etaiḥ bambhramyate jīvaḥ saṃsāre bahu duḥkha de

original: MSS_9573-1 kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobho harṣo māno madas tathā /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ tathā lobhaḥ harṣaḥ mānaḥ madaḥ tathā

original: MSS_9573-2 ṣaḍvargamutsṛjedenaṃ tasmiṃs tyakte sukhī nṛpaḥ //
analyzed: ṣaḍvargam utsṛjet enam tasmin tyakte sukhī nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_9574-1 kāmaḥ krodho mado māno lobho harṣas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ madaḥ mānaḥ lobhaḥ harṣaḥ tathā eva ca

original: MSS_9574-2 ete varjyāḥ prayatnena sādaraṃ pṛthivīkṣitā //
analyzed: ete varjyāḥ prayatnena sādaram pṛthivīkṣitā

original: MSS_9575-1 eteṣāṃ vijayaṃ kṛtvā kāryo bhṛtyajayas tataḥ /
analyzed: eteṣām vijayam kṛtvā kāryaḥ bhṛtya jayaḥ tatas

original: MSS_9575-2 kṛtvā bhṛtyajayaṃ rājā paurāñjanapadāñjayet //
analyzed: kṛtvā bhṛtya jayam rājā paurān janapadān jayet

original: MSS_9576-1 kāmaḥ sarvātmanā heyaḥ sa ceddhātuṃ na śakyate /
analyzed: kāmaḥ sarva ātmanā heyaḥ sa ced hātum na śakyate

original: MSS_9576-2 svabhāryāṃ prati kartavyaḥ saiva tasya hi bheṣajam //
analyzed: sva bhāryām prati kartavyaḥ sā eva tasya hi bheṣajam

original: MSS_9577-2 kāma evārthadharmābhyāṃ garīyāniti me matiḥ //
analyzed: kāmaḥ eva artha dharmābhyām garīyān iti me matiḥ

original: MSS_9578-1 kāma eṣa mahāśatrus tamekaṃ nirjayed dṛḍham /
analyzed: kāmaḥ eṣa mahā śatruḥ tam ekam nirjayet dṛḍham

original: MSS_9578-2 jitakāmā mahātmānas tairjitaṃ nikhilaṃ jagat //
analyzed: jita kāmāḥ mahātmānaḥ taiḥ jitam nikhilam jagat

original: MSS_9579-1 kāmakāro mahāprājña gurūṇāṃ sarvadānagha /
analyzed: kāmakāraḥ mahā prājña gurūṇām sarvadā anagha

original: MSS_9579-2 upapanneṣu dāreṣu putreṣu ca vidhīyate //
analyzed: upapanneṣu dāreṣu putreṣu ca vidhīyate

original: MSS_9580-1 kāmakārmukatayā kathayanti bhrūlatāṃ mama punarmatamanyat /
analyzed: kāma kārmuka tayā kathayanti bhrū latām mama punar matam anyat

original: MSS_9580-2 locanāmburuhayoruparisthaṃ bhṛṅgaśāvakatatidvayametat //
MSS_9581-1 kāmakrodhaṃ tathā lobhaṃ svādu śṛṅgārakautuke /
analyzed: kāma krodham tathā lobham svādu śṛṅgāra kautuke

original: MSS_9581-2 atinidrātiseve ca vidyārthī hyaṣṭa varjayet //
analyzed: atinidrā atiseve ca vidyā arthī hi aṣṭa varjayet

original: MSS_9582-1 kāmakrodhagrāhavatīṃ pañcendriyajalāṃ nadīm /
analyzed: kāma krodha grāhavatīm pañca indriya jalām nadīm

original: MSS_9582-2 kṛtvā dhṛtimayīṃ nāvaṃ janmadurgāṇi saṃtara //
analyzed: kṛtvā dhṛti mayīm nāvam janma durgāṇi saṃtara

original: MSS_9582A-1 kāmakrodhabhayādanyair lobhyamāno na lubhyati /
analyzed: kāma krodha bhayāt anyaiḥ lobhyamānaḥ na lubhyati

original: MSS_9582A-2 yayā śaktyā yutaḥ kārye mantraśaktistu sā smṛtā //
analyzed: yayā śaktyā yutaḥ kārye mantra śaktiḥ tu sā smṛtā

original: MSS_9583-1 kāmakrodhamadonmattāḥ strīṇāṃ ye vaśavartinaḥ /
analyzed: kāma krodha mada unmattāḥ strīṇām ye vaśa vartinaḥ

original: MSS_9583-2 na te jalena śudhyanti snānatīrthaśatairapi //
analyzed: na te jalena śudhyanti snāna tīrtha śataiḥ api

original: MSS_9584-1 kāmakrodhaviyuktānāṃ yatīnāṃ yatacetasām /
analyzed: kāma krodha viyuktānām yatīnām yata cetasām

original: MSS_9584-2 abhito brahmanirvāṇaṃ vataite viditātmanām //
analyzed: abhitas brahma nirvāṇam vata ete vidita ātmanām

original: MSS_9585-1 kāmakrodhas tathā moho lobho māno madas tathā /
analyzed: kāma krodhaḥ tathā mohaḥ lobhaḥ mānaḥ madaḥ tathā

original: MSS_9585-2 ṣaḍvargamutsṛjedenam asmiṃstyakte sukhī nṛpaḥ //
analyzed: ṣaḍvargam utsṛjet enam asmin tyakte sukhī nṛpaḥ

original: MSS_9586-1 kāmakrodhādayaḥ sarve matirakṣāṇyahaṃkṛtiḥ /
analyzed: kāma krodha ādayaḥ sarve matiḥ akṣāṇi ahaṃkṛtiḥ

original: MSS_9586-2 guṇā vividhakarmāṇi vilīyante manaḥkṣayāt //
analyzed: guṇāḥ vividha karmāṇi vilīyante manaḥ kṣayāt

original: MSS_9586A-1 kāmakrodhādibhistāpais tāpyamāno divāniśam /
analyzed: kāma krodha ādibhiḥ tāpaiḥ tāpyamānaḥ divāniśam

original: MSS_9586A-2 ātmā śarīrāntasthosau pacyate puṭapākavat //
analyzed: ātmā śarīra antasthaḥ usau pacyate puṭapāka vat

original: MSS_9587-1 kāmakrodhānṛtadrohalobhamohamadādayaḥ /
analyzed: kāma krodha anṛta droha lobha moha mada ādayaḥ

original: MSS_9587-2 namanti yatra rājendra tameva brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: namanti yatra rāja indra tam eva brāhmaṇam viduḥ

original: MSS_9588-1 kāmakrodhāvanādṛtya dharmamevānupālayet /
analyzed: kāma krodhau an ādṛtya dharmam eva anupālayet

original: MSS_9588-2 dharmaḥ śreyaskaratamo rājñāṃ bharatasattama //
analyzed: dharmaḥ śreyaskaratamaḥ rājñām bharata sattama

original: MSS_9588A-1 kāmakrodhāvanirjitya kimaraṇye kariṣyati /
analyzed: kāma krodhau a nirjitya kim araṇye kariṣyati

original: MSS_9588A-2 athavā nirjitāvetau kimaraṇye kariṣyati //
analyzed: athavā nirjitau etau kim araṇye kariṣyati

original: MSS_9589-1 kāmakrodhau tu saṃyamya yo'rthān dharmeṇa paśyati /
analyzed: kāma krodhau tu saṃyamya yaḥ ṛthān dharmeṇa paśyati

original: MSS_9589-2 prajāstamanuvartante samudramiva sindhavaḥ //
analyzed: prajāḥ tam anuvartante samudram iva sindhavaḥ

original: MSS_9590-1 kāmakrodhau dvayamapi padaṃ pratyanīkaṃ vaśitve hatvānaṅgaṃ kimiva hi ruṣā sādhitaṃ tryambakeṇa /
analyzed: kāma krodhau dvayam api padam pratyanīkam vaśi tve hatvā anaṅgam kim iva hi ruṣā sādhitam tryambakeṇa

original: MSS_9590-2 yas tu kṣāntyā śamayati śataṃ manmathādyānarātīn kalyāṇaṃ vo diśatu sa munigrāmaṇīrarkabandhuḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ tu kṣāntyā śamayati śatam manmatha ādyān arātīn kalyāṇam vaḥ diśatu sa muni grāmaṇīḥ arka bandhuḥ

original: MSS_9591-1 kāmakrodhau puraskṛtya yo'rthaṃ rājānutiṣṭhati /
analyzed: kāma krodhau puraskṛtya yaḥ ṛtham rājā anutiṣṭhati

original: MSS_9591-2 na sa dharmaṃ na cāpyarthaṃ parigṛhṇāti bāliśaḥ //
analyzed: na sa dharmam na ca api artham parigṛhṇāti bāliśaḥ

original: MSS_9592-1 kāmakrodhau madyatamau niyoktavyau yathocitam /
analyzed: kāma krodhau madyatamau niyoktavyau yathocitam

original: MSS_9592-2 kāmaḥ prajāpālane ca krodhaḥ śatrunibarhaṇe //
analyzed: kāmaḥ prajā pālane ca krodhaḥ śatru nibarhaṇe

original: MSS_9593-1 kāmakrodhau vinirjitya kimaraṇyaiḥ kariṣyati /
analyzed: kāma krodhau vinirjitya kim araṇyaiḥ kariṣyati

original: MSS_9593-2 annena dhāryaṃte dehaḥ kulaṃ śīlena dhāryate //
analyzed: annena dhāryaṃte dehaḥ kulam śīlena dhāryate

original: MSS_9594-1 kāmakrodhau hi puruṣam arthebhyo vyapakarṣataḥ /
analyzed: kāma krodhau hi puruṣam arthebhyaḥ vyapakarṣataḥ

original: MSS_9594-2 tau tu śatrū vinirjitya rājā vijayate mahīm //
analyzed: tau tu śatrū vinirjitya rājā vijayate mahīm

original: MSS_9595-1 kāmaghnād viṣamadṛśo bhūtyavaliptād bhujaṅgasaṅgaruceḥ /
analyzed: kāma ghnāt viṣama dṛśaḥ bhūti avaliptāt bhujaṅga saṅga ruceḥ

original: MSS_9595-2 ko bhṛṅgīva na śuṣyati vāñcha na phalamīśvarādaguṇāt //
analyzed: kaḥ bhṛṅgī iva na śuṣyati vāñcha na phalam īśvarāt aguṇāt

original: MSS_9596-1 kāmajaṃ mṛgayā dyūtaṃ striyaḥ pānaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kāma jam mṛgayā dyūtam striyaḥ pānam tathā eva ca

original: MSS_9596-2 vyasanaṃ vyasanārthajñaiś caturvidhamudāhṛtam //
analyzed: vyasanam vyasana artha jñaiḥ caturvidham udāhṛtam

original: MSS_9597-1 kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpāt kila jāyase /
analyzed: kāma jānāmi te mūlam saṃkalpāt kila jāyase

original: MSS_9597-2 na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi samūlo na bhaviṣyasi //
analyzed: na tvām saṃkalpayiṣyāmi sa mūlaḥ na bhaviṣyasi

original: MSS_9598-1 kāmajeṣu prasakto hi vyasaneṣu mahīpatiḥ /
analyzed: kāma jeṣu prasaktaḥ hi vyasaneṣu mahīpatiḥ

original: MSS_9598-2 viyujyate'rthadharmābhyāṃ krodhajeṣvātmanaiva tu //
analyzed: viyujyate īrtha dharmābhyām krodha jeṣu ātmanā eva tu

original: MSS_9598A-1 kāmatantreṣu nipuṇaḥ kruddhānunayakovidaḥ /
MSS_9598A-2 sphurite'nādare kiṃcid dayitāyā virajyati //
analyzed: sphuritena ādare kiṃcid dayitāyāḥ virajyati

original: MSS_9599-1 kāmato rūpadhāritvaṃ śastrāstrāśmāmbuvarṣaṇam /
analyzed: kāmatas rūpa dhāri tvam śastra astra aśma ambu varṣaṇam

original: MSS_9599-2 tamo'nilo'calo medhā iti māyā hyamānuṣī //
analyzed: tamaḥ nilocalaḥ medhāḥ iti māyā hi amānuṣī

original: MSS_9600-1 jaghāna kīcakaṃ bhīma āśritaḥ strīsarūpatām /
analyzed: jaghāna kīcakam bhīmaḥ āśritaḥ strī sarūpa tām

original: MSS_9600-2 ciraṃ pracchannarūpo'bhūd divyayā māyayā nalaḥ //
analyzed: ciram divyayā māyayā nalaḥ

original: MSS_9601-1 kāmadarpādiśīlānām avicāritakāriṇām /
analyzed: kāma darpa ādi śīlānām avicārita kāriṇām

original: MSS_9601-2 āyuṣā saha naśyanti sampado mūḍhacetasām //
analyzed: āyuṣā saha naśyanti sampadaḥ mūḍha cetasām

original: MSS_9602-1 kāmadhenuguṇā vidyā hyakāle phaladāyinī /
analyzed: kāmadhenu guṇā vidyā hi akāle phala dāyinī

original: MSS_9602-2 pravāse mātṛsadṛśī vidyā guptaṃ dhanaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: pravāse mātṛ sadṛśī vidyā guptam dhanam smṛtam

original: MSS_9602A-1 kāmadhenudharādīnāṃ dātāraḥ sulabhā bhuvi /
MSS_9602A-2 durlabhaḥ puruṣo loke sarvabhūtadayāparaḥ //
analyzed: durlabhaḥ puruṣaḥ loke sarva bhūta dayā paraḥ

original: MSS_9603-1 kāmanāmnā kirātena vitatā mūḍhacetasām /
analyzed: kāma nāmnā kirātena vitatā mūḍha cetasām

original: MSS_9603-2 nāryo naravihaṃgānām aṅgabandhanavāgurāḥ //
analyzed: nāryaḥ nara vihaṃgānām aṅga bandhana vāgurāḥ

original: MSS_9604-1 kāmapi dhatte sūkararūpī kāmapi rahitāmicchati bhūpaḥ /
analyzed: kām api dhatte sūkara rūpī kām api rahitām icchati bhūpaḥ

original: MSS_9604-2 kenākāri ca manmathajananaṃ kena virājati taruṇīvadanam //
analyzed: kena akāri ca manmatha jananam kena virājati taruṇī vadanam

original: MSS_9605-1 kāmapi śriyamāsādya yas tadvṛddhau na ceṣṭate /
analyzed: kām api śriyam āsādya yaḥ tad vṛddhau na ceṣṭate

original: MSS_9605-2 tasyāyatiṣu na śreyo bījabhojikuṭumbavat //
analyzed: tasya āyatiṣu na śreyaḥ bīja bhoji kuṭumba vat

original: MSS_9606-1 kāmaprasaktamātmānaṃ smṛtvā pāṇḍuṃ nipātitam /
analyzed: kāma prasaktam ātmānam smṛtvā pāṇḍum nipātitam

original: MSS_9606-2 nivartayet tathā krodhād anuhādaṃ hatātmajam //
analyzed: nivartayet tathā krodhāt anuhādam hata ātmajam

original: MSS_9607-1 kāmabandhanamevaikaṃ nānyadastīha bandhanam /
analyzed: kāma bandhanam eva ekam na anyat asti iha bandhanam

original: MSS_9607-2 kāmabandhanamukto hi brahmabhūyāya kalpate //
analyzed: kāma bandhana muktaḥ hi brahma bhūyāya kalpate

original: MSS_9608-1 kāmabāṇaprahāreṇa mūrcchitāni pade pade /
analyzed: kāma bāṇa prahāreṇa mūrcchitāni pade pade

original: MSS_9608-2 jīvanti yuvacetāṃsi yuvatīnāṃ smitāmṛtaiḥ //
analyzed: jīvanti yuva cetāṃsi yuvatīnām smita amṛtaiḥ

original: MSS_9609-1 kāmamastu jagat sarvaṃ kālasyāsya vaśaṃvadam /
analyzed: kāmam astu jagat sarvam kālasya asya vaśaṃvadam

original: MSS_9609-2 kālakālaprapannānāṃ kālaḥ kiṃ naḥ kariṣyati //
analyzed: kāla kāla prapannānām kālaḥ kim naḥ kariṣyati

original: MSS_9610-1 kāmamā maraṇāt tiṣṭhed gṛhe kanyartumatyapi /
analyzed: kāmamā maraṇāt tiṣṭhet gṛhe kanyā ṛtumatī api

original: MSS_9610-2 na caivaināṃ prayaccheta guṇahīnāya karhicit //
analyzed: na ca eva enām prayaccheta guṇa hīnāya karhicit

original: MSS_9611-1 kāmamāśritya duṣpūraṃ dambhamānamadānvitāḥ /
analyzed: kāmam āśritya duṣpūram dambha māna mada anvitāḥ

original: MSS_9611-2 mohād gṛhītvāsadgrāhān pravartante'śucivratāḥ //
analyzed: mohāt gṛhītvā asat grāhān pravartante aśuci vratāḥ

original: MSS_9612-1 kāmayante virajyante rañjayanti tyajanti ca /
analyzed: kāmayante virajyante rañjayanti tyajanti ca

original: MSS_9612-2 karṣayantyo'pi sarvārthāñ jñāyante naiva yoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: karṣayantyaḥ api sarva arthām jñāyante na eva yoṣitaḥ

original: MSS_9613-1 kāmayeta na hi kṣudram arthaṃ jātu mahāmanāḥ /
analyzed: kāmayeta na hi kṣudram artham jātu mahā manāḥ

original: MSS_9613-2 vardhayeta svamaudāryaṃ prabhāvaṃ ca yaśo bhuvi //
analyzed: vardhayeta svam audāryam prabhāvam ca yaśaḥ bhuvi

original: MSS_9614-1 kāmavarṣī ca parjanyo nityaṃ sasyavatī mahī /
analyzed: kāma varṣī ca parjanyaḥ nityam sasyavatī mahī

original: MSS_9614-2 gāvaśca ghaṭadohinyaḥ pādapāśca sadāphalāḥ //
analyzed: gāvaḥ ca ghaṭa dohinyaḥ pādapāḥ ca sadāphalāḥ

original: MSS_9615-1 kāmavṛttas tvayaṃ lokaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samupavartate /
analyzed: kāma vṛttaḥ tu ayam lokaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samupavartate

original: MSS_9615-2 yadvṛttāḥ santi rājānas tadvṛttāḥ santi hi prajāḥ //
analyzed: yad vṛttāḥ santi rājānaḥ tad vṛttāḥ santi hi prajāḥ

original: MSS_9616-1 kāmavyāghre kumatiphaṇini svāntadurvāranīḍe māyāsiṃhīviharaṇamahīlobhabhallūkabhīme /
analyzed: kāma vyāghre kumati phaṇini svānta durvāra nīḍe māyā siṃhī viharaṇa mahī lobha bhallūka bhīme

original: MSS_9616-2 janmāraṇye na bhavati ratiḥ sajjanānāṃ kadācit tattvajñānāṃ viṣayatuṣitākaṇṭakākīrṇapārśve //
analyzed: janma araṇye na bhavati ratiḥ sat janānām kadācid tattva jñānām viṣaya tuṣita akaṇṭaka ākīrṇa pārśve

original: MSS_9617-1 kāmavyādhaśarāhatirna gaṇitā saṃjīvanī tvaṃ smṛtā no dagdho virahānalena jhaṭiti tvatsaṃgamāśābhṛtaiḥ /
analyzed: kāma vyādha śara āhatiḥ na gaṇitā saṃjīvanī tvam smṛtā naḥ dagdhaḥ viraha analena jhaṭiti tvad saṃgama āśā bhṛtaiḥ

original: MSS_9617-2 nīto'yaṃ divaso vicitralikhitaiḥ samkalparūpairmayā kiṃ vānyad hṛdaye sthitāsi nanu me tatra svayaṃ sākṣiṇī //
analyzed: nītaḥ yam divasaḥ vicitra likhitaiḥ samkalpa rūpaiḥ mayā kim vā anyat hṛdaye sthitā asi nanu me tatra svayam sākṣiṇī

original: MSS_9618-1 kāmasaṅgaravidhau mṛgīdṛśaḥ prauḍhapeṣaṇadhare payodhare /
analyzed: kāma saṅgara vidhau mṛgī dṛśaḥ prauḍha peṣaṇa dhare payodhare

original: MSS_9618-2 svedarājirudiyāya sarvataḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiriva puṣpadhanvanaḥ //
analyzed: sveda rājiḥ udiyāya sarvatas puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ iva puṣpadhanvanaḥ

original: MSS_9618A-1 kāyas tapasviṣu jayatyadhikārakāmo viśvasya cittavibhurindriyavājyadhīśaḥ /
analyzed: kāyaḥ tapasviṣu jayati adhikāra kāmaḥ viśvasya citta vibhuḥ indriya vājī adhīśaḥ

original: MSS_9618A-2 bhūtāni bibhrati mahāntyapi yasya śiṣṭiṃ vyāvṛttamaulimaṇiraśmibhiruttamāṅgaiḥ //
analyzed: bhūtāni bibhrati mahānti api yasya śiṣṭim vyāvṛtta mauli maṇi raśmibhiḥ uttamāṅgaiḥ

original: MSS_9619-1 kāmastu tasya naivāsti pratyakṣeṇopalakṣyate /
analyzed: kāmaḥ tu tasya na eva asti pratyakṣeṇa upalakṣyate

original: MSS_9619-2 dampatyoḥ sahadharmeṇa trayīdharmamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: dampatyoḥ saha dharmeṇa trayī dharmam avāpnuyāt

original: MSS_9620-1 kāmas tu bāṇāvasaraṃ pratīkṣya pataṅgavad vahnimukhaṃ vivikṣuḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ tu bāṇa avasaram pratīkṣya pataṅga vat vahni mukham vivikṣuḥ

original: MSS_9620-2 umāsamakṣaṃ harabaddhalakṣyaḥ śarāsanajyāṃ muhurāmamarśa //
analyzed: umā samakṣam hara baddha lakṣyaḥ śarāsana jyām muhur āmamarśa

original: MSS_9621-1 kāmasya kaścic caturaḥ śarāṃśced vilaṅghayāmāsa kathaṃcidanyān /
analyzed: kāmasya kaścid caturaḥ śarān ced vilaṅghayāmāsa kathaṃcid anyān

original: MSS_9621-2 unmajjatā kokilakaṇṭhayantrāt na pañcamāstreṇa vaśīvabhūva //
analyzed: unmajjatā kokilakaṇṭha yantrāt na pañcama astreṇa vaśīvabhūva

original: MSS_9622-1 kāmasya jetukāmasya milanāya mahīpateḥ /
analyzed: kāmasya jetu kāmasya milanāya mahīpateḥ

original: MSS_9622-2 divo mīnaṃ tviṣāmīśo dvārīkartumivāyayau //
analyzed: divaḥ mīnam tviṣām īśaḥ dvārīkartum iva āyayau

original: MSS_9623-1 kāmasya veṣaśobhā peśalatā cārutā guṇotkarṣaḥ /
analyzed: kāmasya veṣa śobhā peśala tā cāru tā guṇa utkarṣaḥ

original: MSS_9623-2 nānāvidhāśca līlāś cittajñānaṃ ca kāntānām //
analyzed: nānāvidhāḥ ca līlāḥ citta jñānam ca kāntānām

original: MSS_9624-1 kāmasyāpi nidānamāhurapare māyāṃ mahāśāsanāṃ niścitkāṃ sakalaprapañcaracanācāturyalīlāvatīm /
analyzed: kāmasya api nidānam āhuḥ apare māyām mahā śāsanām niścitkām sakala prapañca racanā cāturya līlāvatīm

original: MSS_9624-2 yatsaṅgād bhagavānapi prabhavati pratyaṅmahāmohahā śrīraṅgo bhuvanodayāvanalayavyāpāracakre'kriyaḥ //
analyzed: yad saṅgāt bhagavān api prabhavati pratyak mahā moha hā śrīraṅgaḥ bhuvana udayau analaya vyāpāra cakrekriyaḥ

original: MSS_9625-1 kāmasvabhāvo yo yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum /
analyzed: kāma svabhāvaḥ yaḥ yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum

original: MSS_9625-2 na hi duṣṭātmanāmārya mā vasatyālaye ciram //
analyzed: na hi duṣṭa ātmanām ārya mā vasati ālaye ciram

original: MSS_9626-1 kāmāgniḥ parivardhito virahiṇīśvāsānilairnirbharaṃ tūrṇaṃ tena kṛśānunā kṛśatanurmugdhā na dagdhā katham /
analyzed: kāma agniḥ parivardhitaḥ virahiṇī śvāsa anilaiḥ nirbharam tūrṇam tena kṛśānunā kṛśa tanuḥ mugdhā na dagdhā katham

original: MSS_9626-2 bālā lolavilocanāmbujagalatsadvāridhārābharaiḥ siktā samprati tena jīvasi hare tāṃ tvaṃ samullāsaya //
analyzed: bālā lola vilocana ambuja galat sat vāri dhārā bharaiḥ siktā samprati tena jīvasi hare tām tvam samullāsaya

original: MSS_9627-1 kāmaturo nādhigacchen mahāpuruṣakāminīm /
analyzed: kāma turaḥ na adhigacchet mahāpuruṣa kāminīm

original: MSS_9627-2 sahasrayonideho'bhūd indro'halyāparigrahāt //
analyzed: indraḥ halyā parigrahāt

original: MSS_9628-1 kāmāt krodhād bhayādanyair lobhymāno na lumpati /
analyzed: kāmāt krodhāt bhayāt anyaiḥ lobhya mānaḥ na lumpati

original: MSS_9628-2 yayā śaktyā yutaḥ kārye mantraśaktistu sā smṛtā //
analyzed: yayā śaktyā yutaḥ kārye mantra śaktiḥ tu sā smṛtā

original: MSS_9629-1 kāmāt klāmyasi kā rītir nārīti narakābhidhā /
analyzed: kāmāt klāmyasi kā rītiḥ nārī iti naraka abhidhā

original: MSS_9629-2 malamajjāmayī māṃsasthagī kiṃ na vigīyate //
analyzed: mala majjā mayī māṃsasthagī kim na vigīyate

original: MSS_9630-1 kāmātmatā na praśastā na caivāstyakāmatā /
analyzed: kāma ātma tā na praśastā na ca eva asti akāma tā

original: MSS_9630-2 kāmyo hi vedādhigamaḥ karmayogaśca vaidikaḥ //
analyzed: kāmyaḥ hi veda adhigamaḥ karmayogaḥ ca vaidikaḥ

original: MSS_9631-1 kāmāditrikameva mūlamakhilakleśasya māyodbhavaṃ martyānāmiti devamaulivilasadbhrājiṣṇucūḍāmaṇiḥ /
analyzed: kāma ādi trikam eva mūlam akhila kleśasya māyā udbhavam martyānām iti deva mauli vilasat bhrājiṣṇu cūḍāmaṇiḥ

original: MSS_9631-2 śrīkṛṣṇo bhagavānavocadakhilaprāṇipriyo matprabhur yasmāt tat trikamudyatena manasā heyaṃ pumarthārthinā //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān avocat akhila prāṇi priyaḥ mad prabhuḥ yasmāt tat trikam udyatena manasā heyam pumartha arthinā

original: MSS_9632-1 kāmādhikaraṇagrāhyakulādibalaśālinaḥ /
analyzed: kāma adhikaraṇa grāhya kula ādi bala śālinaḥ

original: MSS_9632-2 ahīne'pi narendrasya śaktayaḥ siddhihetavaḥ //
analyzed: ahīne api narendrasya śaktayaḥ siddhi hetavaḥ

original: MSS_9633-1 kāmānāmapi dātāraṃ kartāraṃ mānasāntvayoḥ /
analyzed: kāmānām api dātāram kartāram māna sāntvayoḥ

original: MSS_9633-2 rakṣitāraṃ na mṛṣyanti bhartāraṃ paramaṃ striyaḥ //
analyzed: rakṣitāram na mṛṣyanti bhartāram paramam striyaḥ

original: MSS_9634-1 kāmānuśāsanaśate sutarāmadhītī so'yaṃ raho nakhapadairmahatu stanau te /
analyzed: kāma anuśāsana śate sutarām adhītī sā uyam rahaḥ nakha padaiḥ mahatu stanau te

original: MSS_9634-2 ruṣṭādrijācaraṇakuṅkumapaṅkarāga saṃkīrṇaśaṅkaraśaśāṅkakalāṅka kāraiḥ //
analyzed: ruṣṭa adrijā caraṇa kuṅkuma paṅka rāga saṃkīrṇa śaṅkara śaśāṅka kalā aṅka kāraiḥ

original: MSS_9365-1 kāmānusārī puruṣaḥ kāmānanu vinaśyati /
analyzed: kāma anusārī puruṣaḥ kāmān anu vinaśyati

original: MSS_9365-2 kāmān vyudasya dhunute yatkiñcit puruṣo rajaḥ //
analyzed: kāmān vyudasya dhunute yat kiñcid puruṣaḥ rajaḥ

original: MSS_9636-1 kāmān vyudasya dhunute yatkiṃcit puruṣo rajaḥ /
analyzed: kāmān vyudasya dhunute yat kiṃcid puruṣaḥ rajaḥ

original: MSS_9636-2 kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ duḥkham ahrīraratireva ca //
analyzed: kāma krodha udbhavam duḥkham ahrīḥ aratiḥ eva ca

original: MSS_9637-1 kāmābhibhūtaḥ krodhādvā yo mithyā pratipadyate /
analyzed: kāma abhibhūtaḥ krodhāt vā yaḥ mithyā pratipadyate

original: MSS_9637-2 sveṣu cānyeṣu vā tasya na sahāyā bhavantyuta //
analyzed: sveṣu ca anyeṣu vā tasya na sahāyāḥ bhavanti uta

original: MSS_9638-1 kāmā manuṣyaṃ prasajanta eva dharmasya ye vighnamūlaṃ narendra /
analyzed: kāmāḥ manuṣyam prasajante eva dharmasya ye vighna mūlam narendra

original: MSS_9638-2 pūrvaṃ narastān dhṛtimān vinighnan loke praśaṃsāṃ labhate'navadyām //
analyzed: pūrvam naraḥ tān dhṛtimān vinighnan loke praśaṃsām

original: MSS_9639-1 kāmāya spṛhayatyātmā saṃyato'pi manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: kāmāya spṛhayati ātmā saṃyataḥ api manīṣiṇaḥ

original: MSS_9639-2 vīthīniyamito'pyukṣā śaṣpamāsādya dhāvati //
analyzed: vīthī niyamitā upi ukṣā śaṣpam āsādya dhāvati

original: MSS_9640-1 kāmārtāṃ svayamāyātāṃ yo na bhuṅkte nitambinīm /
analyzed: kāma ārtām svayam āyātām yaḥ na bhuṅkte nitambinīm

original: MSS_9640-2 so'vaśyaṃ narakaṃ yāti tanniḥśvāsahato naraḥ //
analyzed: sā uvaśyam narakam yāti tad niḥśvāsa hataḥ naraḥ

original: MSS_9641-1 kāmārtāṃ svastriyaṃ dīnāṃ prārthayantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: kāma ārtām sva striyam dīnām prārthayantīm punar punar

original: MSS_9641-2 na bhajed bhajamānāṃ yaḥ sa vai cāṇḍāladarśanaḥ //
analyzed: na bhajet bhajamānām yaḥ sa vai cāṇḍāla darśanaḥ

original: MSS_9641A-1 kāmārtā gharmataptā vety aniścayakaraṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: kāma ārtā gharma taptā vā iti aniścaya karam vacaḥ

original: MSS_9641A-2 yuvānamākulīkartum iti dūtyāha narmaṇā //
analyzed: yuvānam ākulīkartum iti dūtī āha narmaṇā

original: MSS_9641B-1 kāmārthamajñaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ karoti prāpnoti duḥkhaṃ vadhabandhanādi /
analyzed: kāma artham ajñaḥ kṛpaṇam karoti prāpnoti duḥkham vadha bandhana ādi

original: MSS_9641B-2 kāmārthamāśākṛpaṇas tapasvī mṛrtyu śramaṃ cācchati jīvalokaḥ //
analyzed: kāma artha māśā kṛpaṇaḥ tapasvī śramam ca acchati jīva lokaḥ

original: MSS_9642-1 kāmārthau lipsamānastu dharmamevāditaścaret /
analyzed: kāma arthau lipsamānaḥ tu dharmam eva āditas caret

original: MSS_9642-2 na hi dharmādapaityarthaḥ kāmo vāpi kadācana //
analyzed: na hi dharmāt apaiti arthaḥ kāmaḥ vā api kadācana

original: MSS_9642A-1 kāmāllobhād bhayāt krodhāt sākṣivādāttathaiva ca /
analyzed: kāmāt lobhāt bhayāt krodhāt sākṣi vādāt tathā eva ca

original: MSS_9642A-2 mithyā vadati yatpāpaṃ tadasatyaṃ prakīrtitam //
analyzed: mithyā vadati yat pāpam tat asatyam prakīrtitam

original: MSS_9642B-1 kāmāveśaḥ kaitavasyopadeśaḥ māyākośo vañcanāsanniveśaḥ /
analyzed: kāma āveśaḥ kaitavasya upadeśaḥ māyā kośaḥ vañcanā sanniveśaḥ

original: MSS_9642B-2 nirdravyāṇāmaprasiddhapraveśo ramyakleśaḥ supraveśo'stu veśaḥ //
analyzed: nirdravyāṇām aprasiddha praveśaḥ ramya kleśaḥ su praveśoḥ tu veśaḥ

original: MSS_9643-1 kāmijanaparamabhogye kāmasukhe dhārayanti bībhatsam /
analyzed: kāmi jana parama bhogye kāma sukhe dhārayanti bībhatsam

original: MSS_9643-2 santaḥ śamasukharasikāḥ sudhāśanāḥ sūkarānna iva //
analyzed: santaḥ śama sukha rasikāḥ sudhā aśanāḥ sūkara anne iva

original: MSS_9644-1 kāminaḥ kṛtaratotsavakāla- kṣepamākṛlavadhūkarasaṅgi /
analyzed: kāminaḥ kṛta rata utsava kāla kṣepa mākṛla vadhū kara saṅgi

original: MSS_9644-2 mekhalāguṇavilagnamasūyāṃ dīrghasūtramakarot paridhānam //
analyzed: mekhalā guṇa vilagnam asūyām dīrghasūtram akarot paridhānam

original: MSS_9645-1 kāminaś caritairebhiḥ kurvanto niśi jāgaram /
analyzed: kāminaḥ caritaiḥ ebhiḥ kurvantaḥ niśi jāgaram

original: MSS_9645-2 kurvantyapriyamātmānaṃ kecinmūḍhāḥ priyā api //
analyzed: kurvanti apriyam ātmānam kecid mūḍhāḥ priyāḥ api

original: MSS_9645A-1 kāmināṃ kāminīnāṃ ca saṅgāt kāmī bhavet pumān /
analyzed: kāminām kāminīnām ca saṅgāt kāmī bhavet pumān

original: MSS_9645A-2 dehāntare tataḥ krodhī lobhī mohī ca jāyate //
analyzed: deha antare tatas krodhī lobhī mohī ca jāyate

original: MSS_9646-1 kāmināmasakalāni vibhugnaiḥ svedavārimṛdubhiḥ karajāgraiḥ /
analyzed: kāmi nāma sakalāni vibhugnaiḥ sveda vāri mṛdubhiḥ karaja agraiḥ

original: MSS_9646-2 akriyanta kaṭhineṣu kathaṃcit kāminīkucataṭeṣu padāni //
analyzed: akriyanta kaṭhineṣu kathaṃcid kāminī kuca taṭeṣu padāni

original: MSS_9647-1 kāminīṃ prathamayauvanānvitāṃ mandavalgumṛdupīḍitasvanām /
analyzed: kāminīm prathama yauvana anvitām manda valgu mṛdu pīḍita svanām

original: MSS_9647-2 utstanīṃ samavalambya yā ratiḥ sā na dhātṛbhavane'sti me matiḥ //
analyzed: utstanīm samavalambya yā ratiḥ sā na dhātṛ bhavanā isti me matiḥ

original: MSS_9648-1 kāminīkāyakāntāre kucaparvatadurgame /
analyzed: kāminī kāya kāntāre kuca parvata durgame

original: MSS_9648-2 mā saṃcara manaḥpāntha tatrāste smarataskaraḥ //
analyzed: mā saṃcara manaḥ pāntha tatra āste smara taskaraḥ

original: MSS_9648A-1 kāminījanavilocanapātā- nunmiṣatkaluṣān pratigṛhṇan /
analyzed: kāminī jana vilocana pātān pratigṛhṇan

original: MSS_9648A-2 mandamandamuditaḥ prayayau khaṃ bhītabhīta iva śītamayūkhaḥ //
analyzed: manda manda muditaḥ prayayau kham bhīta bhītaḥ iva śītamayūkhaḥ

original: MSS_9649-1 kāminīnayanakajjalapaṅkād utthito madanamattavarāhaḥ /
analyzed: kāminī nayana kajjala paṅkāt utthitaḥ madana matta varāhaḥ

original: MSS_9649-2 kāmimānasavanāntaracārī mūlamutkhanati mānalatāyāḥ //
analyzed: kāmi mānasa vana antara cārī mūlam utkhanati māna latāyāḥ

original: MSS_9650-1 kāminīvadananirjitakāntiḥ śobhituṃ na hi śaśāka śaśāṅkaḥ /
analyzed: kāminī vadana nirjita kāntiḥ śobhitum na hi śaśāka śaśāṅkaḥ

original: MSS_9650-2 lajjayeva vimalaṃ vapurāptuṃ śīdhupūrṇacaṣakeṣu mamajja //
analyzed: lajjayā iva vimalam vapuḥ āptum śīdhu pūrṇa caṣakeṣu mamajja

original: MSS_9651-1 kāminīvargasaṃsargair na kaḥ saṃkrāntapātakaḥ /
analyzed: kāminī varga saṃsargaiḥ na kaḥ saṃkrāntapātakaḥ

original: MSS_9651-2 nāśnāti snāti hā mohāt kāmakṣāmavrataṃ jagat //
analyzed: na aśnāti snāti hā mohāt kāma kṣāma vratam jagat

original: MSS_9652-1 kāminīsahacarasya kāminas tasya veśmasu mṛdaṅganādiṣu /
analyzed: kāminī sahacarasya kāminaḥ tasya veśmasu mṛd aṅganā ādiṣu

original: MSS_9652-2 ṛddhimantamadhikarddhiruttaraḥ pūrvamutsavamapohadutsavaḥ //
analyzed: ṛddhimantam adhika ṛddhiḥ uttaraḥ pūrvam utsavam apohat utsavaḥ

original: MSS_9653-1 kāmino hanta hemantaniśi śītajvarāturāḥ /
analyzed: kāminaḥ hanta hemanta niśi śītajvara āturāḥ

original: MSS_9653-2 jīvanti hariṇākṣīṇāṃ vakṣojāśleṣarakṣitāḥ //
analyzed: jīvanti hariṇa akṣīṇām vakṣoja āśleṣa rakṣitāḥ

original: MSS_9654-1 kāminyāḥ kucadurgaparvatabhuvi tvaṃ mā manaḥpānthaka saṃcāraṃ kuru romarājigahane tatrāsti nābhyāṃ guhā /
analyzed: kāminyāḥ kuca durga parvata bhuvi tvam mā manaḥ pānthaka saṃcāram kuru romarāji gahane tatra asti nābhyām guhā

original: MSS_9654-2 tallīno madhusūdanamya tanayas tenātra caureṇa bho nirvastrīkriyate divāpi hi naro rātrau tu kiṃ kathyate //
analyzed: tad līnaḥ madhusūdanamya tanayaḥ tena atra caureṇa bho nirvastrīkriyate divā api hi naraḥ rātrau tu kim kathyate

original: MSS_9655-1 kāminyāḥ kucayoḥ kāntiḥ pīnatvena puraskṛtā /
analyzed: kāminyāḥ kucayoḥ kāntiḥ pīna tvena puraskṛtā

original: MSS_9655-2 suvarṇācalaśṛṅgābhāṃ vinirjetuṃ samudyatā //
analyzed: suvarṇa acala śṛṅga ābhām vinirjetum samudyatā

original: MSS_9656-1 kāminyāḥ stanabhāramantharagaterlīlācalaccakṣuṣaḥ kandarpaikavilāsanityavasateḥ kīdṛk pumān vallabhaḥ /
analyzed: kāminyāḥ stana bhāra manthara gateḥ līlā calat cakṣuṣaḥ kandarpa eka vilāsa nitya vasateḥ kīdṛṅ pumān vallabhaḥ

original: MSS_9656-2 helākṛṣṭakṛpāṇapāritagajānīkāt kutas te'rayaḥ śvrāsāyāsaviśuṣkakaṇṭhakuharā niryānti jīvārthinaḥ //
analyzed: helā kṛṣṭa kṛpāṇa pārita gaja anīkāt kutas terayaḥ śvrāsa āyāsa viśuṣka kaṇṭha kuharāḥ niryānti jīva arthinaḥ

original: MSS_9657-1 kāminyo nīcagāminyas taṭinya iva niścitam /
analyzed: kāminyaḥ nīca gāminyaḥ taṭinyaḥ iva niścitam

original: MSS_9657-2 dārā rājño'pi yattārāḥ praṇayaṃ yānti gopateḥ //
analyzed: dārāḥ rājñaḥ api yat tārāḥ praṇayam yānti gopateḥ

original: MSS_9658-1 kāmī kāmavraṇaparigataḥ kāminīreva hitvā bhuṅkte paścādapagatabhayaṃ kāminīnāṃ sahasram /
analyzed: kāmī kāma vraṇa parigataḥ kāminīḥ eva hitvā bhuṅkte paścāt apagata bhayam kāminīnām sahasram

original: MSS_9658-2 itthaṃkāraṃ viṣayasukhabhogaikatānairnarairapy asmin dehe katipayadinānyeṣa bhogo vivarjyaḥ //
analyzed: itthaṃkāram viṣaya sukha bhoga ekatānaiḥ naraiḥ api asmin dehe katipaya dināni eṣa bhogaḥ vivarjyaḥ

original: MSS_9659-1 kāmukāḥ syuḥ kathā nīcāḥ sarvaḥ kasmin pramodate /
analyzed: kāmukāḥ syuḥ kathā nīcāḥ sarvaḥ kasmin pramodate

original: MSS_9659-2 arthinaḥ prāpya puṇyāhaṃ kariṣyadhve vasūni kim //
analyzed: arthinaḥ prāpya puṇya aham kariṣyadhve vasūni kim

original: MSS_9660-1 kāmuke nūtanāsaṅgagāḍhāliṅganakātare /
analyzed: kāmuke nūtana āsaṅga gāḍha āliṅgana kātare

original: MSS_9660-2 gaṇikā gehagaṇanāṃ karoti dhyānamāsthitā //
analyzed: gaṇikā geha gaṇanām karoti dhyānam āsthitā

original: MSS_9661-1 kāmuke bhramaraḥ proktaḥ kāminyāṃ cūtamañjarī /
MSS_9661-2 tathāhvānāṅkurāścāpi prākāro vāraṇe smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tathā āhvāna aṅkurāḥ ca api prākāraḥ vāraṇe smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_9662-1 kāmujjahāra harirambudhimadhyalagnāṃ kīdṛk śrutaṃ bhavati nirmalamāgamānām /
analyzed: kām ujjahāra hariḥ ambudhi madhya lagnām kīdṛś śrutam bhavati nirmalam āgamānām

original: MSS_9662-2 āmantrayasva vanamagniśikhāvalīḍhaṃ yac cāpi ko dahati ke madayanti bhṛṅgān //
analyzed: āmantrayasva vanam agni śikhā avalīḍham yat ca api kaḥ dahati ke madayanti bhṛṅgān

original: MSS_9663-1 kāmekapatnīvrataduḥkhaśīlāṃ lolaṃ manaś cārutayā praviṣṭām /
analyzed: kāma eka patnī vrata duḥkha śīlām lolam manaḥ cāru tayā praviṣṭām

original: MSS_9663-2 nitambinīmicchasi muktalajjāṃ kaṇṭhe svayaṃgrāhaniṣaktabāhum //
analyzed: nitambinīm icchasi mukta lajjām kaṇṭhe svayaṃgrāha niṣakta bāhum

original: MSS_9664-1 kā me gatiriti pṛcchati caramaśvāse'pi yaḥ svārtham /
analyzed: kā me gatiḥ iti pṛcchati carama śvāse pi yaḥ sva artham

original: MSS_9664-2 tasya janasyāpi kṛte pāpāḥ pāpāni kurvanti //
analyzed: tasya janasya api kṛte pāpāḥ pāpāni kurvanti

original: MSS_9665-1 kā meghādupayāti,
analyzed: kā meghāt upayāti

original: kṛṣṇadayitā kā vā,
analyzed: kṛṣṇa dayitā kā vā

original: sabhā kīdṛśī,
analyzed: sabhā kīdṛśī

original: kāṃ rakṣatyahihā,
analyzed: kām rakṣati ahi hā

original: śarad vikacayet kaṃ,
analyzed: śarad vikacayet kaṃ

original: dhairyahantrī ca kā /
analyzed: dhairya hantrī ca kā

original: MSS_9665-2 kaṃ dhatte gaṇanāyakaḥ karatale,
analyzed: kam dhatte gaṇanāyakaḥ kara tale

original: kā cañcalā kathyatām,
analyzed: kā cañcalā kathyatām

original: ārohādavarohataśca nipuṇairekaṃ dvayoruttaram //
analyzed: ārohāt avarohataḥ ca nipuṇaiḥ ekam dvayoḥ uttaram

original: MSS_9666-1 kāmena kāmaṃ prahitā javena prāvṛṭ cacāla trijagad vijetum /
analyzed: kāmena kāmam prahitā javena prāvṛṣ cacāla trijagat vijetum

original: MSS_9666-2 kiṃ candrabimbaṃ dadhi bhakṣayatnī saṃdhārayantī haritaḥ śubhāya //
analyzed: kim candra bimbam dadhi bhakṣayatnī saṃdhārayantī haritaḥ śubhāya

original: MSS_9667-1 kāmenākṛṣya cāpaṃ hatapaṭupaṭahaṃ valgubhirmāravīrair bhrūbhaṅgotkṣepajṛmbhāsmitalalitadṛśā divyanārījanena /
analyzed: kāmena ākṛṣya cāpam hata paṭu paṭaham valgubhiḥ māra vīraiḥ bhrū bhaṅga utkṣepa jṛmbhā asmita lalita dṛśā divya nārī janena

original: MSS_9667-2 siddhaiḥ prahvottamāṅgaiḥ pulakitavapuṣā vismayād vāsavena dhyāyanyo yogapīṭhādacalita iti vaḥ pātu dṛṣṭo munīdraḥ //
analyzed: siddhaiḥ prahva uttamāṅgaiḥ pulakita vapuṣā vismayāt vāsavena dhyāyan yaḥ yogapīṭhāt acalitaḥ iti vaḥ pātu dṛṣṭaḥ muni idraḥ

original: MSS_9668-1 kāmenāpi na bhettuṃ kimu hṛdayamapāri bālavanitānām /
analyzed: kāmena api na bhettum kimu hṛdayam apāri bāla vanitānām

original: MSS_9668-2 mūḍhaviśikhaprahāro- cchūnamivābhāti yadvakṣaḥ //
analyzed: mūḍha viśikha prahāraḥ ucchūnam iva ābhāti yat vakṣaḥ

original: MSS_9669-1 kāmeṣuṇā kāmaripormano'pi kallolitaṃ kā manujeṣu vārtā /
analyzed: kāma iṣuṇā kāma ripoḥ manaḥ api kallolitam kā manujeṣu vārtā

original: MSS_9669-2 āṣāḍhavāte calati dvipendre cūlīvato vāridhireva kāṣṭhā //
analyzed: āṣāḍha vāte calati dvipa indre cūlīvataḥ vāridhiḥ eva kāṣṭhā

original: MSS_9670-1 kāmais taistair hṛtajñānāḥ prapadyante'nyadevatāḥ /
analyzed: kāmaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ hṛta jñānāḥ

original: MSS_9670-2 taṃ taṃ niyamamāsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā //
analyzed: tam tam niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā

original: MSS_9671-1 kāmo'kṣamā dakṣiṇatānukampā hrīḥ sādhvasaṃ krauryamanāyaitā ca /
analyzed: kāma ukṣamā dakṣiṇa tā anukampā hrīḥ sādhvasam krauryam anāyaitā ca

original: MSS_9671-2 dambho'bhimāno'tha ca dhārmikatvaṃ dainyaṃ svayūthasyavimānanaṃ ca //
analyzed: ca dhārmika tvam dainyam sva yūthasya vimānanam ca

original: MSS_9672-1 droho bhayaṃ śaśvadupekṣaṇaṃ ca śītoṣṇavarṣāsvasahiṣṇutā ca /
analyzed: drohaḥ bhayam śaśvat upekṣaṇam ca śīta uṣṇa varṣāsu a sahiṣṇu tā ca

original: MSS_9672-2 etāni kāle samupāhitāni kurvantyavaśyaṃ khalu siddhivighnam //
analyzed: etāni kāle samupāhitāni kurvanti avaśyam khalu siddhi vighnam

original: MSS_9673-1 kāmottaptaṃ marakatamahāgrāvahāro gabhīre magnaṃ nābhīsarasi hṛdayaṃ jagrase'nekapaṃ me /
analyzed: kāma uttaptam marakata mahā agra avahāraḥ gabhīre magnam nābhī sarasi hṛdayam me

original: MSS_9673-2 lilāveśapracalitakaraḥ ko'pyahīnāriketus tadbhaṅgena pratividhimihaivānurūpaṃ vyatānīt //
analyzed: lilā āveśa pracalita karaḥ kopya hīna ari ketuḥ tad bhaṅgena pratividhim iha eva anurūpam vyatānīt

original: MSS_9674-1 kāmodvegagṛhītaṃ dhūrtairupahasyamānaśṛṅgāram /
analyzed: kāma udvega gṛhītam dhūrtaiḥ upahasyamāna śṛṅgāram

original: MSS_9674-2 dāridryahataṃ yauvanam abudhānāṃ kevalaṃ vipade //
analyzed: dāridrya hatam yauvanam abudhānām kevalam vipade

original: MSS_9675-1 kāmo nāsti napuṃsakasya kulaṭāvargasya nāsti trapā toyaṃ nāsti marīcakāsu satataṃ nāsti sthiratvaṃ striyaḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ nā asti napuṃsakasya kulaṭā vargasya nā asti trapā toyam nā asti marīcakāsu satatam nā asti sthira tvam striyaḥ

original: MSS_9675-2 dharmo nāsti ca nāsti kasya vibhavo nāsti pramattātmanaḥ snehānāṃ kaṇikāpi nāsti gaṇikālokasya ca prāyaśaḥ //
analyzed: dharmaḥ na asti ca nā asti kasya vibhavaḥ nā asti pramatta ātmanaḥ snehānām kaṇikā api nā asti gaṇikā lokasya ca prāyaśas

original: MSS_9676-1 kāmopabhogasāphalyaphalo rājñāṃ mahījayaḥ /
analyzed: kāma upabhoga sāphalya phalaḥ rājñām mahī jayaḥ

original: MSS_9676-2 ahaṅkāreṇa jīyante dviṣantaḥ kiṃ nayaśriyā //
analyzed: ahaṅkāreṇa jīyante dviṣantaḥ kim naya śriyā

original: MSS_9677-1 kāmo vāmadṛśāṃ nidhirnayajuṣāṃ kālānalo vidviṣāṃ svaḥśākhī viduṣāṃ gururguṇavatāṃ pārtho dhanurdhāriṇām /
analyzed: kāmaḥ vāma dṛśām nidhiḥ naya juṣām kāla analaḥ vidviṣām svaḥśākhī viduṣām guruḥ guṇavatām pārthaḥ dhanuḥ dhāriṇām

original: MSS_9677-2 līlāvāsagṛhaṃ kulākulajuṣāṃ karṇaḥ suvarṇārthināṃ śrīmān vīravaraḥ kṣitīśvaravaro varvarti sarvopari //
analyzed: līlā vāsagṛham kula ākula juṣām karṇaḥ suvarṇa arthinām śrīmān vīra varaḥ kṣitīśvara varaḥ sarva upari

original: MSS_9678-1 kāmbojāḥ kambujanmākaraśaraṇakṛtaḥ sahyakāntārakacchā- nvicchāyāḥ kacchavāhā vidadhati katame kāmarūpāḥ kurūpāḥ /
analyzed: kāmbojāḥ kambu janma ākara śaraṇa kṛtaḥ sahya kāntāra kacchāḥ nu icchāyāḥ kacchavāhāḥ vidadhati katame kāmarūpāḥ kurūpāḥ

original: MSS_9678-2 kurvāṇe tvayyakasmāt karakamalahṛtaṃ kārmukaṃ kūrmapṛṣṭho- tkṛṣṭaṃ karṇāntakṛṣṭaṃ narapakulamaṇe karṇamākarṇayanti //
analyzed: kurvāṇe tvayi akasmāt kara kamala hṛtam kārmukam kūrma pṛṣṭha utkṛṣṭam karṇa anta kṛṣṭam narapa kula maṇe karṇam ākarṇayanti

original: MSS_9679-1 kāmyāḥ kriyās tathā kāmān mānuṣānabhivāñchati /
analyzed: kāmyāḥ kriyāḥ tathā kāmān mānuṣān abhivāñchati

original: MSS_9679-2 striyo dānaphalaṃ vidyāṃ māyāṃ kupyaṃ dhanaṃ divam //
analyzed: striyaḥ dāna phalam vidyām māyām kupyam dhanam divam

original: MSS_9680-1 devatvamamareśatvaṃ rasāyanacayaḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: deva tvam amara īśa tvam rasāyana cayaḥ kriyāḥ

original: MSS_9680-2 marutprapatanaṃ yajñaṃ jalādyāveśanaṃ tathā //
analyzed: marutprapatanam yajñam jala ādi āveśanam tathā

original: MSS_9681-1 śrāddhānāṃ sarvadānānāṃ phalāni niyamāṃs tathā /
analyzed: śrāddhānām sarva dānānām phalāni niyamān tathā

original: MSS_9681-2 tathopavāsāt pūrttāc ca devatābhyarccanādapi //
analyzed: tathā upavāsāt pūrttāt ca devatā abhyarccanāt api

original: MSS_9682-1 tebhyas tebhyaśca karmabhya upasṛṣṭo'bhivāñchati /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ tebhyaḥ ca karmabhyaḥ upasṛṣṭaḥ abhivāñchati

original: MSS_9682-2 cittamitthaṃ varttamānaṃ yatnādyogī nivarttayet //
analyzed: cittam ittham varttamānam yatnāt yogī nivarttayet

original: MSS_9683-1 kāmyānāṃ katicit samāparimitasvargaikasaṃdāyināṃ sadyaḥ svāntanitāntamohanakṛtāṃ kartā janaḥ karmaṇām /
analyzed: kāmyānām katicid samā parimita svarga eka saṃdāyinām sadyas svānta nitānta mohana kṛtām kartā janaḥ karmaṇām

original: MSS_9683-2 ātmānandamananyavedyamaparicchinnaṃ na jānāti taṃ vikretā lavaṇasya vetti kimu tatkarpūramūlyaṃ param //
analyzed: ātma ānandam ananya vedyam aparicchinnam na jānāti tam vikretā lavaṇasya vetti kimu tat karpūra mūlyam param

original: MSS_9684-1 kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ /
analyzed: kāmyānām karmaṇām nyāsam saṃnyāsam kavayaḥ viduḥ

original: MSS_9684-2 sarvakarmaphalatyāgaṃ prāhus tyāgaṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ //
analyzed: sarva karma phala tyāgam prāhuḥ tyāgam vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: MSS_9685-1 kāyaṃ matvā naśvaraṃ cañcalābhaṃ cāyurbuddhvā bhaṅgurān sarvabhogān /
analyzed: kāyam matvā naśvaram cañcala ābham ca āyuḥ buddhvā bhaṅgurān sarva bhogān

original: MSS_9685-2 pāraṃ gantuṃ viśvasindhorvidagdhā yogābhyāse sādhubuddhiṃ vidadhvam //
analyzed: pāram gantum viśva sindhoḥ vidagdhāḥ yoga abhyāse sādhu buddhim vidadhvam

original: MSS_9686-1 kāyaḥ kaṇṭakadūṣito na ca ghanacchāyā kutaḥ pallavāḥ puṣpāṇi cyutasaurabhāṇi na dalaśreṇī manohāriṇī /
analyzed: kāyaḥ kaṇṭaka dūṣitaḥ na ca ghana chāyā kutas pallavāḥ puṣpāṇi cyuta saurabhāṇi na dala śreṇī manohāriṇī

original: MSS_9686-2 kiṃ brūmaḥ phalapākamasya yadupanyāse'pi lajjāmahe tad bhoḥ kena guṇena śālmalitaro jāto'si somadrumaḥ //
analyzed: kim brūmaḥ phala pākam asya yat upanyāse api lajjāmahe tat bhoḥ kena guṇena śālmali taraḥ jātaḥ asi somadrumaḥ

original: MSS_9687-1 kāyaḥ saṃnihitāpāyaḥ saṃpadaḥ padamāpadām /
analyzed: kāyaḥ saṃnihita apāyaḥ saṃpadaḥ padam āpadām

original: MSS_9687-2 samāgamāḥ sāpagamāḥ sarvamutpādi bhaṅguram //
analyzed: samāgamāḥ sa apagamāḥ sarvam utpādi bhaṅguram

original: MSS_9687A-1 kālaklamair yaś ca tapo'bhidhānaiḥ pravṛttimākāṅkṣati kāmahetoḥ /
analyzed: kāla klamaiḥ yaḥ ca tapaḥ abhidhānaiḥ pravṛttim ākāṅkṣati kāma hetoḥ

original: MSS_9687A-2 saṃsāradoṣānaparīkṣamāṇo duḥkhena so'nvicchati duḥkhameva //
analyzed: saṃsāra doṣān a parīkṣamāṇaḥ duḥkhena saḥ unvicchati duḥkham eva

original: MSS_9688-1 kāyakleśena mahatā puruṣaḥ prāpnuyāt phalam /
analyzed: kāya kleśena mahatā puruṣaḥ prāpnuyāt phalam

original: MSS_9688-2 tat sarvaṃ labhate nārī sukhena patipūjayā //
analyzed: tat sarvam labhate nārī sukhena pati pūjayā

original: MSS_9689-1 kāyacchinnāstu ṛṣikā marmaghnā guravas tathā /
analyzed: kāya chinnāḥ tu ṛṣikāḥ marma ghnāḥ guravaḥ tathā

original: MSS_9689-2 tīkṣṇāśchedasahā vāṅgā dṛḍhā śūrpārakodbhavāḥ //
analyzed: tīkṣṇāḥ cheda sahāḥ vā aṅgāḥ dṛḍhā śūrpāraka udbhavāḥ

original: MSS_9689A-1 kāyavāṅmanasāṃ duṣṭapraṇidhānamanādaraḥ /
analyzed: kāya vāc manasām duṣṭa praṇidhānam anādaraḥ

original: MSS_9689A-2 smṛtyanupasthāpanaṃ ca smṛtāḥ sāmāyikavrate //
analyzed: smṛti anupasthāpanam ca smṛtāḥ sāmāyika vrate

original: MSS_9690-1 kāyasthasya ca śalyasya kāyasthasya ca sā gatiḥ /
analyzed: kāyasthasya ca śalyasya kāyasthasya ca sā gatiḥ

original: MSS_9690-2 yābhyāmanupraviṣṭābhyāṃ dūṣyante sarvadhātavaḥ //
analyzed: yābhyām anupraviṣṭābhyām dūṣyante sarva dhātavaḥ

original: MSS_9691-1 kāyasthenodarasthena māturāmiṣaśaṅkayā /
analyzed: kāya sthena udara sthena mātuḥ āmiṣa śaṅkayā

original: MSS_9691-2 antrāṇi yanna bhuktāni tasya heturadantatā //
analyzed: antrāṇi yat na bhuktāni tasya hetuḥ adanta tā

original: MSS_9692-1 kāyasthairyaṃ karaṇapaṭutāṃ bandhusampattimarthaṃ cāturyaṃ vā kimiva hi balaṃ bibhrato nirbharāḥ smaḥ /
analyzed: kāya sthairyam karaṇa paṭu tām bandhu sampattim artham cāturyam vā kim iva hi balam bibhrataḥ nirbharāḥ smaḥ

original: MSS_9692-2 antyaḥ śvāsaḥ kimayamathavopāntya ityāmṛśanto vismṛtyeśaṃ nimiṣamapi kiṃ vartituṃ pārayāmaḥ //
analyzed: antyaḥ śvāsaḥ kim ayam athavā upāntyaḥ iti āmṛśantaḥ vismṛtya īśam nimiṣam api kim vartitum pārayāmaḥ

original: MSS_9693-1 kāyena kurute pāpaṃ manasā sampradhārya ca /
analyzed: kāyena kurute pāpam manasā sampradhārya ca

original: MSS_9693-2 anṛtaṃ jihvayā cāha trividhaṃ karma pātakam //
analyzed: anṛtam jihvayā ca āha trividham karma pātakam

original: MSS_9694-1 kāyena trividhaṃ caiva vācā caiva caturvidham /
analyzed: kāyena trividham ca eva vācā ca eva caturvidham

original: MSS_9694-2 manasā trividhaṃ nityaṃ daśādharmapathāṃs tyajet //
analyzed: manasā trividham nityam daśa adharma pathān tyajet

original: MSS_9695-1 kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalairindriyairapi /
analyzed: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalaiḥ indriyaiḥ api

original: MSS_9695-2 yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgaṃ tyaktvātmaśuddhaye //
analyzed: yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgam tyaktvā ātma śuddhaye

original: MSS_9695A-1 kāye sīdati kaṇṭharodhini kaphe kuṇṭhe ca vāṇīpathe jihmāyāṃ dṛśi jīvite jigamiṣau śvāse śanaiḥ śāmyati /
analyzed: kāye sīdati kaṇṭha rodhini kaphe kuṇṭhe ca vāṇīpathe jihmāyām dṛśi jīvite jigamiṣau śvāse śanais śāmyati

original: MSS_9695A-2 āgatya svayameva naḥ karuṇayā kātyāyanīvallabhaḥ karṇe varṇayatād bhavārṇavabhayāduttārakaṃ tārakam //
analyzed: āgatya svayam eva naḥ karuṇayā kātyāyanī vallabhaḥ karṇe varṇayatāt bhava arṇava bhayāt uttārakam tārakam

original: MSS_9696-1 kārañjīḥ kūjayanto nijajaṭhararavavyañjitā baujakośir utpākān kṛṣṇalānāṃ pṛthusuṣiragatāñ śimbikān pārayantaḥ /
analyzed: kārañjīḥ kūjayantaḥ nija jaṭhara rava vyañjitāḥ utpākān kṛṣṇalānām pṛthu suṣira gatām śimbikān pārayantaḥ

original: MSS_9696-2 jhillīkājhallarīṇāṃ badhiritabhuvanaṃ jhaṃkṛtaṃ khe kṣipantaḥ śiñjānāśvatthapatraprakarajhaṇajhaṇārāviṇo vānti vātāḥ //
analyzed: jhillīkā jhallarīṇām badhirita bhuvanam jhaṃkṛtam khe kṣipantaḥ śiñjāna aśvattha patra prakara jhaṇajhaṇā rāviṇaḥ vānti vātāḥ

original: MSS_9697-1 kāraṇākāraṇadhvastaṃ kāraṇākāraṇāgatam /
analyzed: kāraṇa akāraṇa dhvastam kāraṇa akāraṇa āgatam

original: MSS_9697-2 yo mitraṃ samupekṣeta sa mṛtyumupagūhati //
analyzed: yaḥ mitram samupekṣeta sa mṛtyum upagūhati

original: MSS_9697A-1 kāraṇāt priyatāmeti dveṣyo bhavati kāraṇāt /
analyzed: kāraṇāt priya tām eti dveṣyaḥ bhavati kāraṇāt

original: MSS_9697A-2 arthārthī jīvaloko'yaṃ na kaścit kasyacit priyaḥ //
analyzed: artha arthī jīva lokaḥ ayam na kaścid kasyacid priyaḥ

original: MSS_9698-1 kāraṇānmitratām eti kāraṇād yāti śatrutām /
analyzed: kāraṇāt mitra tām eti kāraṇāt yāti śatru tām

original: MSS_9698-2 tasmānmitratvam evātra yojyaṃ vairaṃ na dhīmatā //
analyzed: tasmāt mitra tvam eva atra yojyam vairam na dhīmatā

original: MSS_9699-1 kāraṇena vinā bhṛtye yastu kupyati pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇena vinā bhṛtye yaḥ tu kupyati pārthivaḥ

original: MSS_9699-2 sa gṛhṇāti viṣonmādaṃ kṛṣṇasarpapradaṃśitaḥ //
analyzed: sa gṛhṇāti viṣa unmādam kṛṣṇa sarpa pradaṃśitaḥ

original: MSS_9700-1 kāraṇenaiva jāyante mitrāṇi ripavas tathā /
analyzed: kāraṇena eva jāyante mitrāṇi ripavaḥ tathā

original: MSS_9700-2 ripavo yena jāyante kāraṇaṃ tat parityajet //
analyzed: ripavaḥ yena jāyante kāraṇam tat parityajet

original: MSS_9701-1 kāraṇaiḥ sadṛśaṃ kāryam iti mithyā prasiddhayaḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇaiḥ sadṛśam kāryam iti mithyā prasiddhayaḥ

original: MSS_9701-2 mānino bhavato jātaṃ yadamānaṃ yaśo bhuvi //
analyzed: māninaḥ bhavataḥ jātam yat amānam yaśaḥ bhuvi

original: MSS_9702-1 kāraṇotpannakopo'pi sāmprataṃ pramadājanaḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇa utpanna kopaḥ api sāmpratam pramadā janaḥ

original: MSS_9702-2 niśi śītāpadeśena gāḍhamāliṅgati priyam //
analyzed: niśi śīta apadeśena gāḍham āliṅgati priyam

original: MSS_9703-1 kāraṇḍavānanavighaṭṭitavīcimālāḥ kādambasārasacayākulatīradeśāḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇḍava ānana vighaṭṭita vīci mālāḥ kādamba sārasa caya ākula tīra deśāḥ

original: MSS_9703-2 kurvanti haṃsavirutaiḥ parito janasya prītiṃ saroruharajo'ruṇitās taṭinyaḥ //
analyzed: kurvanti haṃsa virutaiḥ paritas janasya prītim saroruha rajaḥ ruṇitāḥ taṭinyaḥ

original: MSS_9704-1 kāraya nāmba vilambaṃ muñca karaṃ me hariṃ yāmi /
analyzed: kāraya nāmba vilambam muñca karam me harim yāmi

original: MSS_9704-2 na sahe sthātuṃ yadasau garjati muralī pragalbhadūtīva //
analyzed: na sahe sthātum yat asau garjati muralī pragalbha dūtī iva

original: MSS_9705-1 kāraṇāt priyatāmeti dveṣyo bhavati kāraṇāt /
analyzed: kāraṇāt priya tām eti dveṣyaḥ bhavati kāraṇāt

original: MSS_9705-2 arthārthī jīvaloko'yaṃ na kaścit kasyacit priyaḥ //
analyzed: artha arthī jīva lokaḥ ayam na kaścid kasyacid priyaḥ

original: MSS_9706-1 kārāsaṃtānakūṭasya saṃsāravanavāgurā /
analyzed: kārā saṃtāna kūṭasya saṃsāra vana vāgurā

original: MSS_9706-2 svargamārgamahāgartā puṃsāṃ strī vedhasā kṛtā //
analyzed: svarga mārga mahā gartā puṃsām strī vedhasā kṛtā

original: MSS_9707-1 kāruṇyaṃ puṇyānāṃ kṛtajñatā puruṣacihnānām /
analyzed: kāruṇyam puṇyānām kṛtajña tā puruṣa cihnānām

original: MSS_9707-2 māyā mohamatīnāṃ kṛtaghnatā narakapātahetūnām //
analyzed: māyā moha matīnām kṛtaghna tā naraka pāta hetūnām

original: MSS_9708-1 kāruṇyaṃ saṃvibhāgaśca yathā bhṛtyeṣu lakṣyate /
analyzed: kāruṇyam saṃvibhāgaḥ ca yathā bhṛtyeṣu lakṣyate

original: MSS_9708-2 cittenānena te śaṅkyā trailokyasyāpi nāthatā //
analyzed: cittena anena te śaṅkyā trailokyasya api nātha tā

original: MSS_9709-1 kāruṇyapuṇyasatsadma kuru tvaṃ janabāndhava /
analyzed: kāruṇya puṇya sat sadma kuru tvam jana bāndhava

original: MSS_9709-2 mama śrīpārśvatīrtheśa suprasādaṃ sukhāspadam //
analyzed: mama śrī pārśvatīrtha īśa su prasādam sukha āspadam

original: MSS_9710-1 kāruṇyāmṛtakandalīsumanasaḥ prajñāvadhūmauktika- grīvālaṃkaraṇaśriyaḥ śamasaritpūrotsalacchīkarāḥ /
analyzed: kāruṇya amṛta kandalī sumanasaḥ prajñā avadhū mauktika grīvā alaṃkaraṇa śriyaḥ śama sarit pūra utsalat śīkarāḥ

original: MSS_9710-2 te maulau bhavatāṃ milantu jagatīrājyābhiṣekocita- sragbhedā abhayapradānacaraṇapreṅkhannakhāgrāṃśavaḥ //
analyzed: te maulau bhavatām milantu sraj bhedāḥ abhaya pradāna caraṇa preṅkhat nakha agra aṃśavaḥ

original: MSS_9711-1 kāruṇyāmṛtanīramāśritajanaśrīcātakānandadaṃ śārṅgākhaṇḍalacāpamambujabhavāgnīndrādibarhīṣṭadam /
MSS_9711-2 cārusmeramukhollasajjanakajāsaudāminīśobhitaṃ śrīrāmāmbudamāśraye'khilajagatsaṃsāratā pāpaham //
analyzed: cāru smera mukha ullasat janakajā saudāminī śobhitam śrī rāma ambudam āśraya ikhila jagat saṃsāra tā

original: MSS_9711A-1 kāruṇyena hatā vadhavyasanitā satyena durvācyatā santoṣeṇa parārthacauryapaṭutā śīlena rāgāndhatā /
analyzed: kāruṇyena hatā vadha vyasani tā satyena durvācya tā santoṣeṇa parārtha caurya paṭu tā śīlena rāga andha tā

original: MSS_9711A-2 nairgranthyena parigrahagrahilatā yaiyauvane'pi sphuṭaṃ pṛthvīyaṃ sakalāpi taiḥ sukṛtibhirmanye pavitrīkṛtā //
analyzed: nairgranthyena parigraha grahi latā yaiyauvane pi sphuṭam pṛthvī iyam sakalā api taiḥ su kṛtibhiḥ manye pavitrīkṛtā

original: MSS_9712-1 kāruṇyenātmano mānaṃ tṛṣṇāṃ ca paritoṣataḥ /
analyzed: kāruṇyena ātmanaḥ mānam tṛṣṇām ca paritoṣataḥ

original: MSS_9712-2 utthānena jayet tandrīṃ vitarkaṃ niścayājjayet //
analyzed: utthānena jayet tandrīm vitarkam niścayāt jayet

original: MSS_9713-1 kārkaśyaṃ stanayordṛśos taralatālīkaṃ mukhe ślāghyate kauṭilyaṃ kacasaṃcaye ca vacane māndyaṃ trike sthūlatā /
analyzed: kārkaśyam stanayoḥ dṛśoḥ tarala tā alīkam mukhe ślāghyate kauṭilyam kaca saṃcaye ca vacane māndyam trike sthūla tā

original: MSS_9713-2 bhīrutvaṃ hṛdaye sadaiva kathitaṃ māyāprayogaḥ priye yāsāṃ doṣagaṇo guṇo mṛgadṛśāṃ tāḥ syuḥ paśūnāṃ priyāḥ //
analyzed: bhīru tvam hṛdaye sadā eva kathitam māyā prayogaḥ priye yāsām doṣa gaṇaḥ guṇaḥ mṛga dṛśām tāḥ syuḥ paśūnām priyāḥ

original: MSS_9714-1 kārkaśyalaulyanaivarṇyaṃ hiṃsācāpalyamūrkhatāḥ /
analyzed: kārkaśya laulya naivarṇyam hiṃsā cāpalya mūrkha tāḥ

original: MSS_9714-2 krodhāvamānaduḥkhaṃ ca strīṇāṃ svābhāvikā guṇāḥ //
analyzed: krodha avamāna duḥkham ca strīṇām svābhāvikāḥ guṇāḥ

original: MSS_9715-1 kārṇāṭīkelivāṭīviṭapinavadalāndolanāścolabālā- cañcaccāmpeyamālānivilaparimalākarṣaṇotkarṣab hājaḥ /
MSS_9715-2 vātā dātāra ete malayajamadhurāmodapūraiḥ pramodān godāvīcīvinodārjitajaḍimaguṇānudvahanto vahanti //
analyzed: vātāḥ dātāraḥ ete malayaja madhura āmoda pūraiḥ pramodān goda avīcī vinoda arjita jaḍima guṇān udvahantaḥ vahanti

original: MSS_9716-1 kārṇāṭī svarṇakarṇābharaṇaparimilanmauktikeṣvambuleśair yasyāḥ saṃpṛktamātreṣvidamajani mahaccitramuccaṇḍameva /
analyzed: kārṇāṭī svarṇa karṇa ābharaṇa parimilat mauktikeṣu ambu leśaiḥ yasyāḥ saṃpṛkta mātreṣu idam ajani mahat citram uccaṇḍam eva

original: MSS_9716-2 saṅkīrṇe tāmraparṇījalalaharibharairarṇave śuktayo yat sārdhaṃ krīḍanti śacyā śamayatu vipado'hnāya sā jāhnavī naḥ //
analyzed: saṅkīrṇe tāmraparṇī jala lahari bharaiḥ arṇave śuktayaḥ yat sārdham krīḍanti śacyā śamayatu vipadā ūhnāya sā jāhnavī naḥ

original: MSS_9717-1 kārttike vātha caitre vā vijigīṣoḥ praśasyate /
analyzed: kārttike vā atha caitre vā vijigīṣoḥ praśasyate

original: MSS_9717-2 yānamutkṛṣṭavīryasya śatrudeśe na cānyadā //
analyzed: yānam utkṛṣṭa vīryasya śatru deśe na ca anyadā

original: MSS_9718-1 kārttikyāṃ kṛttikāyoge yaḥ kuryāt svāmidarśanam /
MSS_9718-2 saptajanma bhaved vipro dhanāḍhyo vedapāragaḥ //
analyzed: sapta janma bhavet vipraḥ dhana āḍhyaḥ vedapāragaḥ

original: MSS_9719-1 kārtsnyena nirvarṇayituṃ ca rūpam icchanti tatpūrvasamāgamānām /
analyzed: kārtsnyena nirvarṇayitum ca rūpam icchanti tad pūrva samāgamānām

original: MSS_9719-2 na ca priyeṣvāyatalocanānāṃ samagrapātīni vilocanāni //
analyzed: na ca priyeṣu āyata locanānām samagra pātīni vilocanāni

original: MSS_9720-1 kārpaṇyaṃ darpamānau ca bhayamudvega eva ca /
analyzed: kārpaṇyam darpa mānau ca bhayam udvegaḥ eva ca

original: MSS_9720-2 arthajāni viduḥ prājñā duḥkhānyetāni dehinām //
analyzed: artha jāni viduḥ prājñāḥ duḥkhāni etāni dehinām

original: MSS_9721-1 kārpaṇyavṛttiḥ svajaneṣu nindā kucelatā nīcajaneṣu bhaktiḥ /
analyzed: kārpaṇya vṛttiḥ sva janeṣu nindā kucela tā nīca janeṣu bhaktiḥ

original: MSS_9721-2 atīva roṣaḥ kaṭukā ca vāṇī narasya cihnaṃ narakāgatasya //
analyzed: atīva roṣaḥ kaṭukā ca vāṇī narasya cihnam naraka āgatasya

original: MSS_9722-1 kārpaṇyena yaśaḥ,
analyzed: kārpaṇyena yaśaḥ

original: krudhā guṇacayo,
analyzed: krudhā guṇa cayo

original: dambhena satyaṃ,
analyzed: dambhena satyam

original: kṣudhā maryādā,
analyzed: kṣudhā maryādā

original: vyasanairdhanaṃ ca,
analyzed: vyasanaiḥ dhanam ca

original: vipadā sthairyaṃ,
analyzed: vipadā sthairyam

original: pramādairdvijaḥ /
analyzed: pramādaiḥ dvijaḥ

original: MSS_9722-2 paiśunyena kulaṃ,
analyzed: paiśunyena kulam

original: madena vinayo,
analyzed: madena

original: duśceṣṭayā pauruṣaṃ dāridryeṇa janādaro,
analyzed: duśceṣṭayā pauruṣam dāridryeṇa janādaro

original: mamatayā cātmaprakāśo hataḥ //
analyzed: mamatayā ca ātma prakāśaḥ hataḥ

original: MSS_9723-1 kārpāsaṃ kaṭinirmuktaṃ kauśeyaṃ bhojanāvadhi /
analyzed: kārpāsam kaṭi nirmuktam kauśeyam bhojana avadhi

original: MSS_9723-2 ūrṇavastraṃ sadā śuddham ūrṇā vātena śudhyati //
analyzed: ūrṇa vastram sadā śuddham ūrṇā vātena śudhyati

original: MSS_9724-1 kārpāsakṛtakūrpāsaśatairapi na śāmyati /
analyzed: kārpāsa kṛta kūrpāsa śataiḥ api na śāmyati

original: MSS_9724-2 śītaṃ śātodarīpīnavakṣojāliṅganaṃ vinā //
MSS_9725-1 kārpāsakośojjvalakeśasaṃcayā payodharāliṅgitamanmathālayā /
analyzed: kārpāsa kośa ujjvala keśa saṃcayā payodhara āliṅgita manmatha ālayā

original: MSS_9725-2 gallau jaradgallakasaṃnibhāvubhau tathāpi raṇḍā surataṃ na muñcati //
analyzed: gallau jarat gallaka saṃnibhau ubhau tathā api raṇḍā suratam na muñcati

original: MSS_9726-1 kārpāsauṣadhakṛṣṇadhānyalavaṇaklībāsthitailaṃ vasā- paṅkāṅgāraguḍāhivarmaśakṛtakleśāya savyādhitāḥ /
analyzed: kārpāsa auṣadha kṛṣṇadhānya lavaṇa klība asthi tailam vasā paṅka aṅgāra guḍa ahi varma śakṛta kleśāya sa vyādhitāḥ

original: MSS_9726-2 vāntonmattajaṭīndhanāni ca tṛṇakṣutkṣāmatakrādayo muṇḍyabhyaktavimuktakeśapalitāḥ kāṣāyiṇaścāśubhāḥ //
analyzed: vānta unmatta jaṭīndhanāni ca tṛṇa kṣudh kṣāma takra ādayaḥ muṇḍī abhyakta vimukta keśa palitāḥ kāṣāyiṇaḥ ca aśubhāḥ

original: MSS_9726A-1 kāryaṃ ca kiṃ te paradoṣadṛṣṭyā kāryaṃ ca kiṃ te paracintayā ca /
analyzed: kāryam ca kim te para doṣa dṛṣṭyā kāryam ca kim te para cintayā ca

original: MSS_9726A-2 vṛṣā kathaṃ khidyasi bālabuddhe kuru svakāryaṃ tyaja sarvamanyān //
analyzed: vṛṣā katham khidyasi bāla buddhe kuru sva kāryam tyaja sarvam anyān

original: MSS_9727-1 kāryaṃ ca śāntadīptaṃ jātvā vidvān vicārayet sarvam /
analyzed: kāryam ca śānta dīptam jātvā vidvān vicārayet sarvam

original: MSS_9727-2 śānte śāntaṃ grāhyaṃ dīpte dīptaṃ ca gṛhṇīyāt //
analyzed: śānte śāntam grāhyam dīpte dīptam ca gṛhṇīyāt

original: MSS_9728-1 kāryaṃ cāvekṣya śaktiṃ ca deśakālau ca tattvataḥ /
analyzed: kāryam ca avekṣya śaktim ca deśa kālau ca tattvataḥ

original: MSS_9728-2 kurute dharmasiddhyarthaṃ viśvarūpaṃ punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: kurute dharma siddhi artham viśvarūpam punar punar

original: MSS_9729-1 kāryaṃ tatsādhakādīṃśca tadvyayaṃ suvirnirgamam /
analyzed: kāryam tad sādhaka ādīn ca tad vyayam suviḥ nirgamam

original: MSS_9729-2 vicintya kurute jñānī natnyathā laghvapi kvacit //
analyzed: vicintya kurute jñānī laghu api kvacid

original: MSS_9730-1 kāryaṃ yāvadivaṃ karomi vidhivat tāvat kariṣyāmyadas tat kṛtvā punaretadadya kṛtavānetat purā kāritam /
analyzed: kāryam yāvat iva karomi vidhivat tāvat kariṣyāmi adaḥ tat kṛtvā punar etat adya kṛtavān etat purā kāritam

original: MSS_9730-2 ityātmīyakuṭumbapoṣaṇaparaḥ prāṇī kriyāvyākulo mṛtyoreti karagrahaṃ hatamatiḥ saṃtyaktadharmakriyaḥ //
analyzed: iti ātmīya kuṭumba poṣaṇa paraḥ prāṇī kriyā vyākulaḥ mṛtyoḥ eti kara graham hatamatiḥ saṃtyakta dharma kriyaḥ

original: MSS_9731-1 kāryaṃ śaktāvapi prāṇes trāṇaṃ śaraṇamāgate /
analyzed: kāryam śaktau api trāṇam śaraṇam āgate

original: MSS_9731-2 nijatṛṣṭhānugaṃ dhātuṃ pradīpaḥ kiṃ na rakṣati //
analyzed: nija tṛṣṭha anugam dhātum pradīpaḥ kim na rakṣati

original: MSS_9731A-1 kāryaḥ kaścidvaro dūtaḥ sakulaścaturo'pi ca /
analyzed: kāryaḥ kaścid varaḥ dūtaḥ sa kulaḥ caturaḥ api ca

original: MSS_9731A-2 kulaśīlavihīnastu sirddhi nāśayati dhruvam //
analyzed: kula śīla vihīnaḥ tu nāśayati dhruvam

original: MSS_9732-1 kāryakāraṇakartṛtve hetuḥ prakṛtirucyate /
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa kartṛ tve hetuḥ prakṛtiḥ ucyate

original: MSS_9732-2 puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve heturucyate //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ sukha duḥkhānām bhoktṛ tve hetuḥ ucyate

original: MSS_9733-1 kāryakāle tu saṃprāpte nāvajñeyaṃ trayaṃ sadā /
analyzed: kārya kāle tu saṃprāpte na avajñeyam trayam sadā

original: MSS_9733-2 bījamauṣadhamāhāro yathā lābhas tathā krayaḥ //
analyzed: bījam auṣadham āhāraḥ yathā lābhaḥ tathā krayaḥ

original: MSS_9734-1 kāryakāle vipattau yo bhṛtyo hi yācate dhanam /
analyzed: kārya kāle vipattau yaḥ bhṛtyaḥ hi yācate dhanam

original: MSS_9734-2 sotsāraṇīyaḥ sapadi nītijñāvanipālakaiḥ //
MSS_9735-1 kāryakālocitā pāpair matibuddhirvihīyate /
analyzed: kārya kāla ucitā pāpaiḥ mati buddhiḥ vihīyate

original: MSS_9735-2 sānukūlā tu vaidaivāt puṃsaḥ sarvatra jāyate //
analyzed: sā anukūlā tu vaidaivāt puṃsaḥ sarvatra jāyate

original: MSS_9736-1 kāryagatervaicitryā- nnīco'pi kvacidalaṃ na jātu mahān /
analyzed: kārya gateḥ vaicitryāt nīcaḥ api kvacid alam na jātu mahān

original: MSS_9736-2 kāṃsyenaivādarśaḥ kriyate rājñāmapi na hemnā //
analyzed: kāṃsyena eva ādarśaḥ kriyate rājñām api na hemnā

original: MSS_9737-1 kāryajñaḥ praṣṭavyo na punarmānyo mama priyo veti /
analyzed: kārya jñaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ na punar mānyaḥ mama priyaḥ vā iti

original: MSS_9737-2 gururapyāsanasevyaḥ priyānitambaḥ kadā mantrī //
analyzed: guruḥ api āsana sevyaḥ priyā nitambaḥ kadā mantrī

original: MSS_9738-1 kāryate yacca kriyate saccāsacca kṛtaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: kāryate yat ca kriyate sat ca asat ca kṛtam tatas

original: MSS_9738-2 tatrāśvasīta satkṛtvā asatkṛtvā na viśvaset //
analyzed: tatra āśvasīta satkṛtvā a satkṛtvā na viśvaset

original: MSS_9739-1 kāryamālocitāpāyaṃ matimadbhirviceṣṭitam /
analyzed: kāryam ālocita apāyam matimadbhiḥ viceṣṭitam

original: MSS_9739-2 na kevalaṃ hi sampattau vipattāvapi śobhate //
analyzed: na kevalam hi sampattau vipattau api śobhate

original: MSS_9740-1 kāryamityeva yat karma niyataṃ kriyate'rjuna /
analyzed: kāryam iti eva yat karma niyatam kriyate ṛjuna

original: MSS_9740-2 saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sat tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ //
analyzed: saṅgam tyaktvā phalam ca eva sat tyāgaḥ sāttvikaḥ mataḥ

original: MSS_9741-1 kāryasya hi garīyastvān nīcānāmapi kālavit /
analyzed: kāryasya hi garīyaḥ tvāt nīcānām api kāla vid

original: MSS_9741-2 sato'pi doṣān pracchādya guṇānapyasato vadet //
analyzed: sataḥ api doṣān pracchādya guṇān api asataḥ vadet

original: MSS_9742-1 kāryasyāpekṣayā bhuktaṃ viṣamapyamṛtāyate /
analyzed: kāryasya apekṣayā bhuktam viṣam api amṛtāyate

original: MSS_9742-2 sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ yatra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: sarveṣām prāṇinām yatra na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: MSS_9743-1 kāryākāryamanāryair unmārganirargalairgalanmatibhiḥ /
analyzed: kārya akāryam anāryaiḥ unmārga nirargalaiḥ galat matibhiḥ

original: MSS_9743-2 nākarṇyate vikarṇair nayoktibhiryuktamuktamapi //
analyzed: na ākarṇyate vikarṇaiḥ naya uktibhiḥ yuktam uktam api

original: MSS_9744-1 kāryākārye kimapi satataṃ naiva kartṛtvamasti jīvanmuktasthitiravagato dagdhavastrāvabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: kārya akārye kim api satatam nā eva kartṛ tvam asti jīvanmukta sthitiḥ avagataḥ dagdha vastra avabhāsaḥ

original: MSS_9744-2 evaṃ dehe pravilayagate tiṣṭhamāno vimukto nistraiguṇye pathi vicarataḥ ko vidhiḥ ko niṣedhaḥ //
analyzed: evam dehe pravilaya gate tiṣṭhamānaḥ vimuktaḥ nistraiguṇye pathi vicarataḥ kaḥ vidhiḥ kaḥ niṣedhaḥ

original: MSS_9745-1 kāryākārye tulayati sarvas tṛpto na jātu tṛṣṇārtaḥ /
analyzed: kārya akārye tulayati sarvaḥ tṛptaḥ na jātu tṛṣṇā ārtaḥ

original: MSS_9745-2 svādu śuci vā ca toyaṃ marupathikaḥ ko vicārayati //
analyzed: svādu śuci vā ca toyam maru pathikaḥ kaḥ vicārayati

original: MSS_9746-1 kāryākāryeṣu kākolaḥ praśastaḥ syād yathā kila /
analyzed: kārya akāryeṣu kākolaḥ praśastaḥ syāt yathā kila

original: MSS_9746-2 na tathā vāyasā jñeyā grāhyāstu tadabhāvataḥ //
analyzed: na tathā vāyasāḥ jñeyāḥ grāhyāḥ tu tad abhāvataḥ

original: MSS_9747-1 kāryāṇāṃ karmaṇā pāraṃ yo gacchati sa buddhimān /
analyzed: kāryāṇām karmaṇā pāram yaḥ gacchati sa buddhimān

original: MSS_9748-1 kāryāṇāṃ gatayo bhujaṃgakuṭilāḥ strīṇāṃ manaścañcalaṃ naiśvaryaṃ sthitimattaraṃgacapalaṃ n ṇāṃ vayo dhāvati /
analyzed: kāryāṇām gatayaḥ bhujaṃga kuṭilāḥ strīṇām manaḥ cañcalam na aiśvaryam sthitimat taraṃga capalam vayaḥ dhāvati

original: MSS_9748-2 saṃkalpāḥ samadāṅganākṣitaralā mṛtyuḥ paraṃ niścito matyaivaṃ matisattamā vidadhatāṃ dharme matiṃ tattvataḥ //
analyzed: saṃkalpāḥ sa mada aṅganā akṣi taralāḥ mṛtyuḥ param niścitaḥ matyā evam mati sattamāḥ vidadhatām dharme matim tattvataḥ

original: MSS_9749-1 kāryāṇyarthopamardena svānurakto'pi sādhayan /
analyzed: kāryāṇi artha upamardena sva anuraktaḥ api sādhayan

original: MSS_9749-2 nopekṣyaḥ sacivo rājñā sa taṃ mathnātyupekṣitaḥ //
analyzed: na upekṣyaḥ sacivaḥ rājñā sa tam mathnāti upekṣitaḥ

original: MSS_9750-1 kāryāṇyuttamadaṇḍasāhasaphalānyāyāsasādhyāni ye prītyā saṃśamayanti nītikuśalāḥ sāmnai'va te mantriṇaḥ /
analyzed: kāryāṇi uttama daṇḍa sāhasa phalāni āyāsa sādhyāni ye prītyā saṃśamayanti nīti kuśalāḥ sāmnā eva te mantriṇaḥ

original: MSS_9750-2 niḥsārālpaphalāni ye tvavidhinā vāñchanti daṇḍodyamais teṣāṃ durnayaceṣṭitairnarapaterāropyate śrīs tulām //
analyzed: niḥsāra alpa phalāni ye tu avidhinā vāñchanti daṇḍa udyamaiḥ teṣām durnaya ceṣṭitaiḥ narapateḥ āropyate śrīḥ tulām

original: MSS_9751-1 kāryā na pratikūlatā na ca bahirgantavyamasmād gṛhāt kopaśca kṣaṇamātramāhitaruṣā kāryaḥ praṇāmāvadhiḥ /
analyzed: kāryā na pratikūla tā na ca bahis gantavyam asmāt gṛhāt kopaḥ ca kṣaṇa mātram āhita ruṣā kāryaḥ praṇāma avadhiḥ

original: MSS_9751-2 ityevaṃ pramadāvrataṃ yadi bhavān gṛhṇāti nātyantikaṃ tatrāhaṃ dayitībhavāmi śaṭha he kopānubandhena kim //
analyzed: iti evam pramadā vratam yadi bhavān gṛhṇāti na ātyantikam tatra aham dayitībhavāmi śaṭha he kopa anubandhena kim

original: MSS_9752-1 kāryāntaritotkaṇṭhaṃ dinaṃ mayā nītamanatikṛcchreṇa /
analyzed: kārya antarita utkaṇṭham dinam mayā nītam anatikṛcchreṇa

original: MSS_9752-2 avinodadīrghayāmā kathaṃ nu rātrirgamayitavyā //
analyzed: a vinoda dīrgha yāmā katham nu rātriḥ gamayitavyā

original: MSS_9753-1 kāryāntareṣvapyanugamyamānā śreyaḥpradā śāntadiśi pradiṣṭā /
analyzed: kārya antareṣu api anugamyamānā śreyaḥ pradā śānta diśi pradiṣṭā

original: MSS_9753-2 śivā pradīpte tu diśaḥpradeśe samāraṭantī mahate bhayāya //
analyzed: śivā pradīpte tu diśaḥ pradeśe samāraṭantī mahate bhayāya

original: MSS_9754-1 kāryāpekṣī janaḥ prāyaḥ prītimāviṣkarotyalam /
analyzed: kārya apekṣī janaḥ prāyas prītim āviṣkaroti alam

original: MSS_9754-2 lomārthī śauṇḍikaḥ śaṣpair meṣaṃ puṣṇāti peśalaiḥ //
analyzed: loma arthī śauṇḍikaḥ śaṣpaiḥ meṣam puṣṇāti peśalaiḥ

original: MSS_9755-1 kāryārambhaḥ phalollāsam ālokya prāyaśo janaiḥ /
analyzed: kārya ārambhaḥ phala ullāsam ālokya prāyaśas janaiḥ

original: MSS_9755-2 anānuguṇyagaṇanāṃ kurvāṇairna vigarhyate //
analyzed: anānuguṇya gaṇanām kurvāṇaiḥ na vigarhyate

original: MSS_9756-1 kāryārthinaḥ kṣīṇatarasya naiva niḥśeṣakāryaṃ kuṭilasya kuryāt /
analyzed: kārya arthinaḥ kṣīṇatarasya na eva niḥśeṣa kāryam kuṭilasya kuryāt

original: MSS_9756-2 doṣākaraḥ prāptavivṛddhadarpaḥ palāyate dūrataraṃ hi mitrāt //
analyzed: doṣa ākaraḥ prāpta vivṛddha darpaḥ palāyate dūrataram hi mitrāt

original: MSS_9757-1 kāryārthino dīrghamivādhvakhedaṃ vikrītadāsā iva karmabhāram /
analyzed: kārya arthinaḥ dīrgham iva adhva khedam vikrīta dāsāḥ iva karma bhāram

original: MSS_9757-2 kaṣṭaṃ kaṭudravyamivāmayārtāḥ svabhartṛgehaṃ vanitā sahante //
analyzed: kaṣṭam kaṭu dravyam iva āmaya ārtāḥ sva bhartṛ geham vanitā sahante

original: MSS_9758-1 kāryārthī bandhujanaḥ kāryairbahubhirbhavanti mitrāṇi /
analyzed: kārya arthī bandhu janaḥ kāryaiḥ bahubhiḥ bhavanti mitrāṇi

original: MSS_9758-2 dārāḥ sutāśca sulabhā dhanamekaṃ durlabhaṃ loke //
analyzed: dārāḥ sutāḥ ca sulabhāḥ dhanam ekam durlabham loke

original: MSS_9759-1 kāryārthī bhajate loke yāvat kāryaṃ na sidhyati /
analyzed: kārya arthī bhajate loke yāvat kāryam na sidhyati

original: MSS_9759-2 uttīrṇe ca pare pāre naukāyāḥ kiṃ prayojanam //
analyzed: uttīrṇe ca pare pāre naukāyāḥ kim prayojanam

original: MSS_9760-1 kāryārthī bhajate loko na priyaḥ pāramārthikaḥ /
analyzed: kārya arthī bhajate lokaḥ na priyaḥ pāramārthikaḥ

original: MSS_9760-2 vatsaḥ kṣīrakṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā parityajati mātaram //
analyzed: vatsaḥ kṣīra kṣayam dṛṣṭvā parityajati mātaram

original: MSS_9761-1 kāryārthī saṃgatiṃ yāti kṛtārthe nāsti saṃgatiḥ /
analyzed: kārya arthī saṃgatim yāti kṛtārthe na asti saṃgatiḥ

original: MSS_9761-2 tasmātsarvāṇi kāryāṇi sāvaśeṣāṇi kārayet //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi sa avaśeṣāṇi kārayet

original: MSS_9762-1 kāryāvetau hi kālena dharmo hi vijayāvahaḥ /
analyzed: kāryau etau hi kālena dharmaḥ hi vijaya āvahaḥ

original: MSS_9762-2 trayāṇāmapi lokānām ālokakaraṇo bhavet //
analyzed: trayāṇām api lokānām āloka karaṇaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_9763-1 kāryāsamarthe mahati na kuryāt parihāsakam /
analyzed: kārya asamarthe mahati na kuryāt parihāsakam

original: MSS_9763-2 lambodaraṃ natyaśaktam apreṣyo'bhūcchaśī hasan //
analyzed: lamba udaram nati aśaktam hasan

original: MSS_9764-1 kāryā saikatalīnahaṃsamithunā srotovahā mālinī pādās tāmabhito niṣaṇṇahariṇā gaurīguroḥ pāvanāḥ /
analyzed: kāryā saikata līna haṃsa mithunā srotaḥ vahā mālinī pādāḥ tām abhitas niṣaṇṇa hariṇāḥ gaurī guroḥ pāvanāḥ

original: MSS_9764-2 śākhālambitavalkalasya ca tarornirmātumicchāmyadhaḥ śṛṅge kṛṣṇamṛgasya vāmanayanaṃ kaṇḍūyamānāṃ mṛgīm //
analyzed: śākhā ālambita valkalasya ca taroḥ nirmātum icchāmi adhas śṛṅge kṛṣṇa mṛgasya vāma nayanam kaṇḍūyamānām mṛgīm

original: MSS_9765-1 kāryaṃ karmaṇi nirdiṣṭo yo bahūnyapi sādhayet /
analyzed: kāryam karmaṇi nirdiṣṭaḥ yaḥ bahūni api sādhayet

original: MSS_9765-2 pūrvakāryāvirodhena sa kāryaṃ kartumarhati //
analyzed: pūrva kārya avirodhena sa kāryam kartum arhati

original: MSS_9766-1 na hyekaḥ sādhako hetuḥ svalpasyāpīha karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: na hi ekaḥ sādhakaḥ hetuḥ su alpasya api iha karmaṇaḥ

original: MSS_9766-2 yo hyarthaṃ bahudhā veda sa samartho'rthasādhane //
analyzed: yaḥ hi artham bahudhā veda sa samarthaḥ ūrtha sādhane

original: MSS_9767-1 kāryeṇa loke nijadharmagarhaṇā vicāracarcācaraṇaistu yairbhuvi /
analyzed: kāryeṇa loke nija dharma garhaṇā vicāra carcā caraṇaiḥ tu yaiḥ bhuvi

original: MSS_9767-2 syāt tanna kāryaṃ suhitāvahaṃ bhavad apīha bhavyaṃ svavicāradṛṣṭitaḥ //
analyzed: syāt tat na kāryam su hita āvaham bhavat api iha bhavyam sva vicāra dṛṣṭitaḥ

original: MSS_9767A-1 kāryeṇāpi vilambanaṃ paragṛhe śvaśrūrna saṃmanyate śaṅkāmāracayanti yūni bhavanaṃ prāpte mitho yātaraḥ /
analyzed: kāryeṇa api vilambanam para gṛhe śvaśrūḥ na saṃmanyate śaṅkām āracayanti yūni bhavanam prāpte mithas

original: MSS_9767A-2 vīthīnirgamane'pi tarjayati ca kruddhā nanāndā punaḥ kaṣṭaṃ hanta mṛgīdṛśāṃ patigṛhaṃ prāyeṇa kārāgṛham //
analyzed: vīthī nirgamane pi tarjayati ca kruddhā nanāndā punar kaṣṭam hanta mṛgī dṛśām pati gṛham prāyeṇa kārā gṛham

original: MSS_9768-1 kārye tu duḥkhasādhye tu kāryo nātiśramo janaiḥ /
analyzed: kārye tu duḥkha sādhye tu kāryaḥ na atiśramaḥ janaiḥ

original: MSS_9768-2 kārye siddhe śramo na syād asiddhe śrama eva hi //
analyzed: kārye siddhe śramaḥ na syāt asiddhe śramaḥ eva hi

original: MSS_9769-1 kārye dāsī ratau veśyā bhojane jananīsamā /
analyzed: kārye dāsī ratau veśyā bhojane jananī samā

original: MSS_9769-2 vipattau buddhidātrī ca sā bhāryā sarvadurlabhā //
analyzed: vipattau buddhi dātrī ca sā bhāryā sarva durlabhā

original: MSS_9769A-1 kārye mahati yuñjāno hīyate'rthapatiḥ śriyā /
analyzed: kārye mahati yuñjānaḥ hīyate irthapatiḥ śriyā

original: MSS_9769A-2 strīpradhānāni rājyāni vidvadbhirvarjitāni ca /
analyzed: strī pradhānāni rājyāni vidvadbhiḥ varjitāni ca

original: MSS_9769A-3 mūrkhāmātyaprataptāni śuṣyanti jalabinduvat //
analyzed: mūrkha amātya prataptāni śuṣyanti jala bindu vat

original: MSS_9770-1 kāryeṣu mantrī karaṇeṣu dāsī bhojyeṣu mātā śayaneṣu rambhā /
analyzed: kāryeṣu mantrī karaṇeṣu dāsī bhojyeṣu mātā śayaneṣu rambhā

original: MSS_9770-2 dharme'nukūlā kṣamayā dharitrī bhāryā ca ṣāḍguṇyavatīha dhanyā //
analyzed: dharmenukūlā kṣamayā dharitrī bhāryā ca ṣāḍguṇyavatī iha dhanyā

original: MSS_9771-1 kāryeṣu mantrī karaṇeṣu dāsī sneheṣu mātā kṣamayā dharitrī /
analyzed: kāryeṣu mantrī karaṇeṣu dāsī sneheṣu mātā kṣamayā dharitrī

original: MSS_9771-2 dharmasya patnī śayane ca veśyā ṣaṭkarmabhiḥ strī kulamuddharanti //
analyzed: dharmasya patnī śayane ca veśyā ṣaṭkarmabhiḥ strī kulam uddharanti

original: MSS_9772-1 kārye satyapi jātu yāti na bahirnāpyanyamālokate sādhvīrapyanukurvatī gurujanaṃ śvaśrūṃ ca śuśrūṣate /
analyzed: kārye sati api jātu yāti na bahis na api anyam ālokate sādhvīḥ api anukurvatī guru janam śvaśrūm ca śuśrūṣate

original: MSS_9772-2 visrambhaṃ kurute ca patyuradhikaṃ prāpte niśīthe punar nidrāṇe sakale jane śaśimukhī niryāti rantuṃ viṭaiḥ //
analyzed: visrambham kurute ca patyuḥ adhikam prāpte niśīthe punar nidrāṇe sakale jane śaśi mukhī niryāti rantum viṭaiḥ

original: MSS_9773-1 kāryehānusaraṇato vāraṃvāraṃ paraṃ pumāṃsamanu /
analyzed: kārya iha anusaraṇataḥ vāram vāram param pumāṃsam anu

original: MSS_9773-2 yatamānasyānudinaṃ bhavati yataḥ premalakṣaṇaṃ bhajanam //
analyzed: yatamānasya anudinam bhavati yatas prema lakṣaṇam bhajanam

original: MSS_9774-1 kāryopakṣepamādau tanumapi racayaṃs tasya vistāramicchan bījānāṃ garbhitānāṃ phalamatigahanaṃ gūḍhamudbhedayaṃśca /
analyzed: kārya upakṣepam ādau tanum api racayan tasya vistāram icchan bījānām garbhitānām phalam ati gahanam gūḍham udbhedayan ca

original: MSS_9774-2 kurvan buddhyā vimarśaṃ prasṛtamapi punaḥ saṃharan kāryajātaṃ kartā vā nāṭakānāmiyamanubhavati kleśamasmadvidho vā //
analyzed: kurvan buddhyā vimarśam prasṛtam api punar saṃharan kārya jātam kartā vā nāṭakānām iyam anubhavati kleśam asmadvidhaḥ vā

original: MSS_9775-1 kārśyaṃ kṣutprabhavaṃ kadannamaśanaṃ śītoṣṇayoḥ pātratā pāruṣyaṃ ca śiroruheṣu śayanaṃ mahyāstale kevale /
analyzed: kārśyam kṣudh prabhavam kadannam aśanam śīta uṣṇayoḥ pātra tā pāruṣyam ca śiroruheṣu śayanam mahyāḥ tale kevale

original: MSS_9775-2 etānyeva gṛhe vahantyavanatiṃ yāntyunnatiṃ kānane doṣā eva guṇībhavanti munibhiryogye pade yojitāḥ //
analyzed: etāni eva gṛhe vahanti avanatim yānti unnatim kānane doṣāḥ eva guṇībhavanti munibhiḥ yogye pade yojitāḥ

original: MSS_9776-1 kārśyaṃ cet pratipatkalā himanidheḥ sthūlātha cet pāṇḍimā līlā eva mṛṇālikā yadi ghanā bāṣpāḥ kiyān vāridhiḥ /
analyzed: kārśyam ced pratipad kalā himanidheḥ sthūlā atha ced pāṇḍimā līlā eva mṛṇālikā yadi ghanāḥ bāṣpāḥ kiyān vāridhiḥ

original: MSS_9776-2 santāpo yadi śītalo hutavahas tasyāḥ kiyad varṇyate rāma tvatsmṛtimātrameva hṛdaye lāvaṇyaśeṣaṃ vapuḥ //
analyzed: santāpaḥ yadi śītalaḥ hutavahaḥ tasyāḥ kiyat varṇyate rāma tvad smṛti mātram eva hṛdaye lāvaṇya śeṣam vapuḥ

original: MSS_9777-1 kārśyajāgarasantāpān yaḥ karoti śruto'pyalam /
analyzed: kārśya jāgara santāpān yaḥ karoti śrutā upi alam

original: MSS_9777-2 tameva durlabhaṃ kāntaṃ cetaḥ kasmād didṛkṣate //
analyzed: tam eva durlabham kāntam cetaḥ kasmāt didṛkṣate

original: MSS_9778-1 kārṣakaḥ sarvabījāni samāloḍya pravāpayet /
analyzed: kārṣakaḥ sarva bījāni samāloḍya pravāpayet

original: MSS_9778-2 utpannabījasadbhāvaṃ tvaṅkureṇa vibhāvayet //
analyzed: utpanna bīja sadbhāvam tu aṅkureṇa vibhāvayet

original: MSS_9779-1 kālaṃ kapālamālāṅkam ekamandhakasūdanam /
analyzed: kālam kapāla mālā aṅkam ekam andhaka sūdanam

original: MSS_9779-2 vande varadamīśānaṃ śāsanaṃ puṣpadhanvanaḥ //
analyzed: vande vara dam īśānam śāsanam puṣpadhanvanaḥ

original: MSS_9780-1 kālaṃ niyamya karmāṇi hyācaren nānyathā kvacit /
analyzed: kālam niyamya karmāṇi hi ācaret na anyathā kvacid

original: MSS_9780-2 gavādiṣvātmavajjñānam ātmānaṃ cārthadharmayoḥ /
analyzed: gavādiṣu ātma vat jñānam ātmānam ca artha dharmayoḥ

original: MSS_9780-3 niyuñjītānnasaṃsiddhyai mātaraṃ śikṣaṇe gurum //
analyzed: niyuñjīta anna saṃsiddhyai mātaram śikṣaṇe gurum

original: MSS_9781-1 kālaṃ nirīkṣya kurute kāryaṃ tasyāśu sidhyati /
analyzed: kālam nirīkṣya kurute kāryam tasya āśu sidhyati

original: MSS_9781-2 grahaṃ vicārya krīḍāyāṃ dīvyato na parājayaḥ //
analyzed: graham vicārya krīḍāyām dīvyataḥ na parājayaḥ

original: MSS_9782-1 kālaṃ purā garalamambunidherudasthād adyendunāma dhavalaṃ viṣamabhyudeti /
analyzed: kālam purā garalam ambunidheḥ udasthāt adyā indu nāma dhavalam viṣam abhyudeti

original: MSS_9782-2 adyādidaṃ sa giriśo yadi hanta hanyāt kārṣṇyaṃ svakaṇṭhanihitaṃ sakhi madbhayaṃ ca //
analyzed: adyāt idam sa giriśaḥ yadi hanta hanyāt kārṣṇyam sva kaṇṭha nihitam sakhi mad bhayam ca

original: MSS_9783-1 kālaṃ muhūrtāṅgulimaṇḍalena dinatriyāmāñjalinā pibantam /
analyzed: kālam muhūrta aṅguli maṇḍalena dina tri yāma añjalinā pibantam
