original: MSS_9783-2 rūpaṃ vilokyaiva vapuśca keṣāṃ bhaṅgena nāṅgānyalasībhavanti //
analyzed: rūpam vilokya eva vapuḥ ca keṣām bhaṅgena nā aṅgāni alasībhavanti

original: MSS_9784-1 kālaḥ karoti kāryāṇi kāla eva nihanti ca /
analyzed: kālaḥ karoti kāryāṇi kālaḥ eva nihanti ca

original: MSS_9784-2 karomīti vihanmīti mūrkho muhyati kevalam //
analyzed: karomi iti vihanmi iti mūrkhaḥ muhyati kevalam

original: MSS_9785-1 kālaḥ kirātaḥ sphuṭapadmakasya vadhaṃ vyadhādyasya dinadbipasya /
analyzed: kālaḥ kirātaḥ sphuṭa padmakasya vadham vyadhāt yasya dina dbipasya

original: MSS_9785-2 tasyeva sandhyā rucirāsradhārā tārāśca kumbhasthalamauktikāni //
analyzed: tasya iva sandhyā rucira asra dhārā tārāḥ ca kumbha sthala mauktikāni

original: MSS_9786-1 kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ

original: MSS_9786-2 kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ //
analyzed: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālaḥ hi duratikramaḥ

original: MSS_9787-1 kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharati prajāḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharati prajāḥ

original: MSS_9787-2 nirdahantaṃ prajāḥ kālaṃ kālaḥ śamayate punaḥ //
analyzed: nirdahantam prajāḥ kālam kālaḥ śamayate punar

original: MSS_9788-1 kālaḥ saṃprati vartate kaliyugaṃ satyā narā durlabhāḥ deśāśca pralayaṃ gatāḥ karabharairlobhaṃ gatāḥ pārthivāḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ saṃprati vartate kali yugam satyāḥ narāḥ durlabhāḥ deśāḥ ca pralayam gatāḥ kara bharaiḥ lobham gatāḥ pārthivāḥ

original: MSS_9788-2 nānācauragaṇā muṣanti pṛthivīmāryo janaḥ kṣīyate putrasyāpi na viśvasanti pitaraḥ kaṣṭaṃ yuge vartate //
analyzed: nānā caura gaṇāḥ muṣanti pṛthivīm āryaḥ janaḥ kṣīyate putrasya api na viśvasanti pitaraḥ kaṣṭam yuge vartate

original: MSS_9789-1 kālaḥ sadāgatirapi sthāyīva pariceṣṭate /
analyzed: kālaḥ sadāgatiḥ api sthāyī iva pariceṣṭate

original: MSS_9789-2 caṇḍamārutavad viśvam adharottarayan kṣaṇāt //
analyzed: caṇḍa māruta vat viśvam adharottarayan kṣaṇāt

original: MSS_9790-1 kālaḥ samaviṣamakaraḥ paribhavasanmānakārakaḥ kālaḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ sama viṣama karaḥ paribhava sat māna kārakaḥ kālaḥ

original: MSS_9790-2 kālaḥ karoti puruṣaṃ dātāraṃ yācitāraṃ ca //
analyzed: kālaḥ karoti puruṣam dātāram yācitāram ca

original: MSS_9791-1 kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālaḥ hi duratikramaḥ

original: MSS_9791-2 kālaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu caratyavidhṛtaḥ samaḥ //
analyzed: kālaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu carati avidhṛtaḥ samaḥ

original: MSS_9792-1 kālaḥ sūkṣmagatirnityaṃ dvividhaśceha bhāvyate /
analyzed: kālaḥ sūkṣma gatiḥ nityam dvividhaḥ ca iha bhāvyate

original: MSS_9792-2 sthūlasaṃgrahacāreṇa sūkṣmācārāntareṇa ca //
analyzed: sthūla saṃgraha cāreṇa sūkṣma ācāra antareṇa ca

original: MSS_9793-1 kālaḥ mṛjati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ mṛjati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ

original: MSS_9793-2 sarve kālasya vaśagā na kālaḥ kasyacid vaśe //
analyzed: sarve kālasya vaśa gāḥ na kālaḥ kasyacid vaśe

original: MSS_9794-1 kāla evātra kālena nigrahānugrahau dadat /
analyzed: kāle eva atra kālena nigraha anugrahau dadat

original: MSS_9794-2 buddhimāviśya bhūtānāṃ dharmārtheṣu pravartate //
analyzed: buddhim āviśya bhūtānām dharma artheṣu pravartate

original: MSS_9795-1 kālakālagalakālakālamukhakālakāla/
kālakāla ghanakālakāla panakālakāla / /
analyzed: kālakāla ghanakālakāla panakālakāla

original: MSS_9795-2 kālakālasitakālakā lalanikālakāla- kālakālagatu kālakāla/
kalikālakāla/ //
analyzed: kali kāla kāla

original: MSS_9796-1 kālakūṭamadhunāpi nihantuṃ hanta no vahasi lāñchanabhaṅgyā /
analyzed: kālakūṭam adhunā api nihantum hanta naḥ vahasi lāñchana bhaṅgyā

original: MSS_9796-2 yadbhayādiva nigīrṇamapi tvām āśu muñcati sudhākara rāhuḥ //
analyzed: yad bhayāt iva nigīrṇam api tvām āśu muñcati sudhākara rāhuḥ

original: MSS_9797-1 kālakūṭamiha nindati loko yena śambhurajarāmara eva /
analyzed: kālakūṭam iha nindati lokaḥ yena śambhuḥ ajara amaraḥ eva

original: MSS_9797-2 antakaṃ virahiṇīśu sudhāṃśuṃ stautyamuṃ tu viralo hi vivekaḥ //
analyzed: antakam virahiṇī īśu sudhāṃśum stauti amum tu viralaḥ hi vivekaḥ

original: MSS_9798-1 kālakūṭādayo bhedā viṣasya nava santi ye /
analyzed: kālakūṭa ādayaḥ bhedāḥ viṣasya nava santi ye

original: MSS_9798-2 cikitsā kathyate teṣāṃ mantrapūrvamavistarāt //
analyzed: cikitsā kathyate teṣām mantra pūrvam avistarāt

original: MSS_9799-1 kālakramaṃ pratyakathaiva tāvat kṣaṇaṃ viyogo maraṇena tulyaḥ /
analyzed: kāla kramam pratyakathā eva tāvat kṣaṇam viyogaḥ maraṇena tulyaḥ

original: MSS_9799-2 priyāmukhodvīkṣaṇalālasānām akṣṇornimeṣo'pi hi vighnabhūtaḥ //
analyzed: priyā mukha udvīkṣaṇa lālasānām akṣṇoḥ nimeṣaḥ api hi vighna bhūtaḥ

original: MSS_9800-1 kālakramakamanīya- kroḍeyaṃ ketakīti kāśaṃsā /
analyzed: kāla krama kamanīya kroḍā iyam ketakī iti kā āśaṃsā

original: MSS_9800-2 vṛddhiryathā yathā syās tathā tathā kaṇṭakotkarṣaḥ //
analyzed: vṛddhiḥ yathā yathā syāḥ tathā tathā kaṇṭaka utkarṣaḥ

original: MSS_9801-1 kālakramatruṭitasaṃśrayabhūḥ svamūla- mātrāśrayī taṭataruḥ sarito'mbupūraiḥ /
analyzed: kāla krama truṭita saṃśraya bhūḥ sva mūla mātrā āśrayī taṭa taruḥ saritā umbupūraiḥ

original: MSS_9801-2 yaiḥ śaṅkyate nipatatīti vitīrṇamṛddhis taireva tasya hi bhavet sthitibhumidārḍhyam //
analyzed: yaiḥ śaṅkyate nipatati iti vitīrṇam ṛddhiḥ taiḥ eva tasya hi bhavet sthiti bhumi dārḍhyam

original: MSS_9802-1 kālakrameṇa pariṇāmavaśādanavyā bhāvā bhavanti khalu pūrvamatīva tucchāḥ /
analyzed: kāla krameṇa pariṇāma vaśāt anavyāḥ bhāvāḥ bhavanti khalu pūrvam atīva tucchāḥ

original: MSS_9802-2 muktāmaṇirjaladatoyakaṇo'pyaṇīyān sampadyate ca cirakīcakarandhramadhye //
analyzed: muktāmaṇiḥ jalada toya kaṇaḥ upi aṇīyān sampadyate ca cira kīcaka randhra madhye

original: MSS_9803-1 kālakṣepo na kartavya āyuryāti dine dine /
analyzed: kālakṣepaḥ na kartavyaḥ āyuḥ yāti dine dine

original: MSS_9803-2 nirīkṣate yamo rājā dharmasya vividhāṃ gatim //
analyzed: nirīkṣate yamaḥ rājā dharmasya vividhām gatim

original: MSS_9804-1 kā lakṣmīḥ padamunnataṃ,
analyzed: kā lakṣmīḥ padam unnatam

original: kimu padaṃ yad gauravaṃ svāminaḥ kiṃ tad gaurava,
analyzed: kimu padam yat gauravam svāminaḥ kim tat gaurava

original: mantarāyarahitāpūrvaiva gurvī sthitiḥ /
analyzed: gurvī sthitiḥ

original: MSS_9804-2 kā cāsau sthiti,
analyzed: kā ca asau

original: rātmabhūṣaṇaparavyāpārasambhāvanā kasyaitat sakalaṃ samasti,
analyzed: rātma bhūṣaṇa para vyāpāra sambhāvanā kasya etat sakalam samasti

original: śaśinaḥ śrīkaṇṭhacuḍāmaṇeḥ //
analyzed: śaśinaḥ śrīkaṇṭha cuḍāmaṇeḥ

original: MSS_9805-1 kālañjarapatiścakre bhīmaṭaḥ pañcanāṭakīm /
analyzed: kālañjara patiḥ cakre bhīmaṭaḥ pañcanāṭakīm

original: MSS_9805-2 prāpa prabandharājatvaṃ teṣu svapnadaśānanam //
analyzed: prāpa prabandha rāja tvam teṣu svapna daśānanam

original: MSS_9805A-1 kālatraye'pi yat kiṃcid ātmapratyayavarjitam /
analyzed: kāla traye api yat kiṃcid ātma pratyaya varjitam

original: MSS_9805A-2 evametaditi spaṣṭaṃ na vācyaṃ catureṇa tat //
analyzed: evam etat iti spaṣṭam na vācyam catureṇa tat

original: MSS_9806-1 kālatrayopapannāni janmakarmāṇi me nṛpa /
analyzed: kāla traya upapannāni janma karmāṇi me nṛpa

original: MSS_9806-2 anukramanto naivāntaṃ gacchanti paramarṣayaḥ //
analyzed: anukramantaḥ na eva antam gacchanti parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: MSS_9807-1 kālaprāptaṃ mahāratnaṃ yo na gṛhṇātyabuddhimān /
analyzed: kāla prāptam mahā ratnam yaḥ na gṛhṇāti abuddhimān

original: MSS_9807-2 anyahastagataṃ dṛṣṭvā paścāt sa paritapyate //
analyzed: anya hasta gatam dṛṣṭvā paścāt sa paritapyate

original: MSS_9808-1 kālaprāptamupādadyānnārthaṃ rājā prasūcayet /
analyzed: kāla prāptam upādadyāt na artham rājā prasūcayet

original: MSS_9808-2 ahanyahani sanduhyānmahīṃ gāmiva buddhimān //
analyzed: ahani ahani sanduhyāt mahīm gām iva buddhimān

original: MSS_9809-1 kālayāpanamāśānāṃ vardhanaṃ phalakhaṇḍanam /
analyzed: kāla yāpanam āśānām vardhanam phala khaṇḍanam

original: MSS_9809-2 virakteśvaracihnāni jānīyānmatimān naraḥ //
analyzed: virakta īśvara cihnāni jānīyāt matimān naraḥ

original: MSS_9810-1 kālarātrikarāleyaṃ strīti kiṃ vicikitsase /
analyzed: kālarātri karālā iyam strī iti kim vicikitsase

original: MSS_9810-2 tajjagattritayaṃ trātuṃ tāta tāḍaya tāṭakām //
analyzed: tat jagat tritayam trātum tāta tāḍaya tāṭakām

original: MSS_9811-1 kālarātrirmahārātrir moharātriśca dāruṇā /
analyzed: kālarātriḥ mahārātriḥ moharātriḥ ca dāruṇā

original: MSS_9811-2 tvaṃ śrīs tvamīśvarī tvaṃ hrīs tvaṃ buddhirbodhalakṣaṇā //
analyzed: tvam śrīḥ tvam īśvarī tvam hrīḥ tvam buddhiḥ bodha lakṣaṇā

original: MSS_9812-1 kālavarṣī ca parjanyo dharmacārī ca pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: kāla varṣī ca parjanyaḥ dharma cārī ca pārthivaḥ

original: MSS_9812-2 sampad yadaiṣā bhavati sā bibharti sukhaṃ prajāḥ //
analyzed: sampad yadā eṣā bhavati sā bibharti sukham prajāḥ

original: MSS_9813-1 kālavidbhirvinirṇītaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ yasya rāghava /
analyzed: kāla vidbhiḥ vinirṇītam pāṇḍityam yasya rāghava

original: MSS_9813-2 anadhyārpita evāsau tajjñaśced daivamuttamam //
analyzed: an adhyārpitaḥ eva asau tad jñaḥ ced daivam uttamam

original: MSS_9814-1 kālavidbhivirnirṇītā yasyāticirajīvitā /
analyzed: kāla vid bhiviḥ nirṇītā yasya ati cira jīvitā

original: MSS_9814-2 sa cej jīvati saṃcchinnaśirāstad daivamuttamam //
analyzed: sa ced jīvati saṃcchinna śirāḥ tat daivam uttamam

original: MSS_9815-1 kālavyālahataṃ vīkṣya patantaṃ bhānumambarāt /
analyzed: kāla vyāla hatam vīkṣya patantam bhānum ambarāt

original: MSS_9815-2 oṣadhīśaṃ samādāya dhāvatīva pitṛprasūḥ //
analyzed: oṣadhīśam samādāya dhāvatī iva pitṛ prasūḥ

original: MSS_9816-1 kālavicchrotriyo rājā nadī sādhuśca pañcamaḥ /
analyzed: kāla vid śrotriyaḥ rājā nadī sādhuḥ ca pañcamaḥ

original: MSS_9816-2 ete yatra na vidyante tatra vāsaṃ na kārayet //
analyzed: ete yatra na vidyante tatra vāsam na kārayet

original: MSS_9817-1 kālaścālayati prāyaḥ paṇḍitān pāmarānapi /
analyzed: kālaḥ cālayati prāyas paṇḍitān pāmarān api

original: MSS_9817-2 taṃ cec cikīrṣasi vaśe titikṣaiva mahauṣadham //
analyzed: tam ced cikīrṣasi vaśe titikṣa eva mahauṣadham

original: MSS_9818-1 kālaścet karuṇāparaḥ kaliyugaṃ yadyadya dharmapriyaṃ nistriṃśo yadi peśalo viṣadharaḥ santoṣadāyī yadi /
analyzed: kālaḥ ced karuṇā paraḥ kali yugam yat yadya dharma priyam nistriṃśaḥ yadi peśalaḥ viṣadharaḥ santoṣa dāyī yadi

original: MSS_9818-2 agniścedatiśītalaṃ khalajanaḥ sarvopakārī sa ced āyuṣyaṃ yadi vā bhaviṣyati viṣaṃ veśyāpi tad rāgiṇī //
analyzed: agniḥ ced ati śītalam khala janaḥ sarva upakārī sa ced āyuṣyam yadi vā bhaviṣyati viṣam veśyā api tat rāgiṇī

original: MSS_9819-1 kālasya kāraṇaṃ rājā sadasatkarmaṇastvataḥ /
analyzed: kālasya kāraṇam rājā sat asat karmaṇaḥ tu atas

original: MSS_9819-2 sukāryodyatadaṇḍābhyāṃ svadharme sthāpayet prajāḥ //
analyzed: su kārya udyata daṇḍābhyām svadharme sthāpayet prajāḥ

original: MSS_9820-2 kālasya sumahadbīryaṃ sarvabhūteṣu lakṣmaṇa //
analyzed: kālasya su mahat bīryam sarva bhūteṣu lakṣmaṇa

original: MSS_9821-1 kālasyaiva vaśo sarvaṃ durgaṃ durgataraṃ ca yat /
analyzed: kālasya eva sarvam durgam durgataram ca yat

original: MSS_9821-2 kāle kruddhe kathaṃ kālāt trāṇaṃ no'dya bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: kāle kruddhe katham kālāt trāṇam na udya bhaviṣyati

original: MSS_9821A-1 kālāgarūdgārasugandhigandha- dhūpādhivāsāśrayabhūgṛheṣu /
analyzed: kāla agaru udgāra sugandhi gandha dhūpa adhivāsa āśraya bhūgṛheṣu

original: MSS_9821A-2 na tatra surmāghasamīraṇebhyaḥ śyāmākucoṣmāśrayiṇaḥ pumāṃsaḥ //
analyzed: na tatra suḥ māgha samīraṇebhyaḥ śyāmā kuca ūṣma āśrayiṇaḥ pumāṃsaḥ

original: MSS_9822-1 kālāgurupracuracandanacarcitāṅgyaḥ puṣpāvataṃsasurabhīkṛtakeśapāśāḥ /
analyzed: kālāguru pracura candana carcita aṅgyaḥ puṣpa avataṃsa surabhīkṛta keśapāśāḥ

original: MSS_9822-2 śrutvā dhvaniṃ jalamucāṃ tvaritaṃ pradoṣe śayyāgṛhaṃ gurugṛhāt praviśanti nāryaḥ //
analyzed: śrutvā dhvanim jalamucām tvaritam pradoṣe śayyā gṛham guru gṛhāt praviśanti nāryaḥ

original: MSS_9823-1 kālāgurau surabhitātiśaye'pi saṅgād ārabhyate surabhitāparapādape'pi /
analyzed: kālāgurau surabhi tā atiśaye api saṅgāt ārabhyate surabhi tā apara pādape pi

original: MSS_9823-2 pāṭīrapāṭavamidaṃ tava saṅgivātais tādātmyameti kataro na taroḥ samūhaḥ //
analyzed: pāṭīra pāṭavam idam tava saṅgi vātaiḥ tādātmyam eti kataraḥ na taroḥ samūhaḥ

original: MSS_9824-1 kālāgnirudra ādhāre śaktiḥ kuṇḍalinī tathā /
analyzed: kālāgni rudra ādhāre śaktiḥ kuṇḍalinī tathā

original: MSS_9824-2 ānandākhyā svadhiṣṭhāne śaktyā kāmākhyayā saha //
analyzed: ānanda ākhyā svadhiṣṭhāne śaktyā kāma ākhyayā saha

original: MSS_9825-1 kālātikramaṇaṃ kuruṣva taḍitāṃ visphūrjitaistrāsaya sphārairbhīṣaya garjitairatitarāṃ kārṣṇyaṃ mukhe darśaya /
analyzed: kāla atikramaṇam kuruṣva taḍitām visphūrjitaiḥ trāsaya sphāraiḥ bhīṣaya garjitaiḥ atitarām kārṣṇyam mukhe darśaya

original: MSS_9825-2 yasyānanyagateḥ payoda manaso jiṃjñāsayā cātaka- syādhehi tvamihākhilaṃ tadapi na tvattaḥ paraṃ yācate //
analyzed: yasya ananyagateḥ payoda manasaḥ jiṃjñāsayā cātaka sya ādhehi tvam iha akhilam tat api na tvattaḥ param yācate

original: MSS_9826-1 kālātikramaṇaṃ vṛtter yo na kurvīta bhūpatiḥ /
analyzed: kāla atikramaṇam vṛtteḥ yaḥ na kurvīta bhūpatiḥ

original: MSS_9826-2 kadācit taṃ na muñcanti bhartsitā api sevakāḥ //
analyzed: kadācid tam na muñcanti bhartsitāḥ api sevakāḥ

original: MSS_9827-1 kālātikramaṇe hyeva bhaktavetanayorbhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: kāla atikramaṇe hi eva bhakta vetanayoḥ bhṛtāḥ

original: MSS_9827-2 bhartuḥ kupyanti duṣyanti so'narthaḥ sumahān smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: bhartuḥ kupyanti duṣyanti saḥ unarthaḥ su mahān smṛtaḥ

original: MSS_9828-1 kālātipātaḥ kāryāṇāṃ dharmārthaparipīḍanam /
analyzed: kāla atipātaḥ kāryāṇām dharma artha paripīḍanam

original: MSS_9828-2 nityābhyantaravartitvāt sādhuprakṛtikopanam //
analyzed: nitya ābhyantara varti tvāt sādhu prakṛti kopanam

original: MSS_9829-1 rahasyabhedas tat pakṣād akāryeṣu pravartanam /
analyzed: rahasya bhedaḥ tat pakṣāt akāryeṣu pravartanam

original: MSS_9829-2 īrṣyāmarṣas tathā krodho nirodhaḥ sāhasāni ca //
analyzed: īrṣyā amarṣaḥ tathā krodhaḥ nirodhaḥ sāhasāni ca

original: MSS_9830-1 ityādi ca strīvyasane yac ca pūrvaṃ prakīrtitam /
analyzed: ityādi ca strī vyasane yat ca pūrvam prakīrtitam

original: MSS_9830-2 tasmāt strīvyasanaṃ rājā rājyakāmaḥ parityajet //
analyzed: tasmāt strī vyasanam rājā rājya kāmaḥ parityajet

original: MSS_9831-1 kālāt prarohati viśvaṃ punaḥ kālaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: kālāt prarohati viśvam punar kālaḥ pravartate

original: MSS_9831-2 sthūlasūkṣmagatiḥ kālo vividhaṃ tasya cocyate //
analyzed: sthūla sūkṣma gatiḥ kālaḥ vividham tasya ca ucyate

original: MSS_9832-1 kālāt pravartate bījaṃ kālād garbhaṃ pramuñcati /
analyzed: kālāt pravartate bījam kālāt garbham pramuñcati

original: MSS_9832-2 kālo janayate putraṃ punaḥ kālo'pi saṃharet //
analyzed: kālaḥ janayate putram punar kālaḥ api saṃharet

original: MSS_9833-1 kālād prarohate bījaṃ phalaṃ kālāt pravartate /
analyzed: kālāt prarohate bījam phalam kālāt pravartate

original: MSS_9833-2 kālo hi vartayet sṛṣṭiṃ punaḥ kālo hi saṃharet //
analyzed: kālaḥ hi vartayet sṛṣṭim punar kālaḥ hi saṃharet

original: MSS_9834-1 kālānapāsya viṣuvāyanasaṃkramādīn astaṃgate himakare ca divākare ca /
analyzed: kālān apāsya viṣuva ayana saṃkrama ādīn astaṃgate himakare ca divākare ca

original: MSS_9834-2 amba smareyamapi te caraṇāravindam ānandalakṣaṇamapāstasamastabhedam //
analyzed: amba smareyam api te caraṇa aravindam ānanda lakṣaṇam apāsta samasta bhedam

original: MSS_9835-1 kālānukūlyaṃ vispaṣṭaṃ rāghavasyārjunasya ca /
analyzed: kāla ānukūlyam vispaṣṭam rāghavasya arjunasya ca

original: MSS_9835-2 anukūle yadā daive kriyālpā suphalā bhavet //
analyzed: anukūle yadā daive kriyā alpā su phalā bhavet

original: MSS_9836-1 kālāntare hmanarthāya gṛdhro gehopari sthitaḥ /
analyzed: kāla antare hm anarthāya gṛdhraḥ geha upari sthitaḥ

original: MSS_9836-2 khalo gṛhasamīpasthaḥ sadyo'narthāya dehinām //
analyzed: khalaḥ gṛha samīpa sthaḥ sadyas narthāya dehinām

original: MSS_9837-1 kālañjarāḥ bhārasahās teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: kālañjarāḥ bhāra sahāḥ teṣām vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam

original: MSS_9837-2 śatārdhamaṅgulānāṃ tu śreṣṭhaṃ khaḍgaṃ prakīrtitam //
analyzed: śatārdham aṅgulānām tu śreṣṭham khaḍgam prakīrtitam

original: MSS_9838-1 kālidāsa kalāvāsa dāsavac cālito yadi /
analyzed: kālidāsa kalā vāsa dāsa vat cālitaḥ yadi

original: MSS_9838-2 rājamārge vrajannatra pareṣāṃ tatra kā trapā //
analyzed: rājamārge vrajan atra pareṣām tatra kā trapā

original: MSS_9839-1 kālidāsakavitā navaṃ vayo māhiṣaṃ dadhi saśarkaraṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: kālidāsa kavi tā navam vayaḥ māhiṣam dadhi sa śarkaram payaḥ

original: MSS_9839-2 eṇamāṃsamabalā ca komalā sambhavantu mama janmajanmani //
analyzed: eṇa māṃsam abalā ca komalā sambhavantu mama janma janmani

original: MSS_9840-1 kālidāsakavervāṇī kadācin madgirā saha /
analyzed: kālidāsa kaveḥ vāṇī kadācid mad girā saha

original: MSS_9840-2 kalayatyarthasāmyaṃ ced bhītā bhītā pade pade //
analyzed: kalayati artha sāmyam ced bhītā bhītā pade pade

original: MSS_9841-1 kālindi, brūhi kumbhodbhava,
analyzed: kālindi brūhi kumbhodbhava

original: jaladhirahaṃ nāma gṛhṇāsi kasmāc chatrorme,
analyzed: jaladhiḥ aham nāma gṛhṇāsi kasmāt śatroḥ me

original: narmadāhaṃ tvamapi vadasi me nāma kasmāt sapatnyāḥ /
analyzed: narmadā aham tvam api vadasi me nāma kasmāt sapatnyāḥ

original: MSS_9841-2 mālinyaṃ tarhi kasmādanubhavasi,
analyzed: mālinyam tarhi kasmāt anubhavasi

original: milatkajjalairmālavīnāṃ netrāmbhobhiḥ,
analyzed: milat kajjalaiḥ mālavīnām netra ambhobhiḥ

original: kimāsāṃ samajani,
analyzed: kim āsām samajani

original: kupitaḥ kuntalakṣoṇipālaḥ //
analyzed: kupitaḥ kuntala kṣoṇi pālaḥ

original: MSS_9842-1 kālindīṃ vīkṣya yātāṃ sulalitavadano mātaraṃ gehagopīḥ kāryāsaktāḥ samantādanugatanayano gorasāgāramantaḥ /
analyzed: kālindīm vīkṣya yātām su lalita vadanaḥ mātaram geha gopīḥ kārya āsaktāḥ samantāt anugata nayanaḥ gorasāgāram antar

original: MSS_9842-2 gatvā bhāṇḍāni bhittvā madhumadhu śanakairgorasaṃ bhakṣamāṇaḥ śīghrapratyāptanandākalitasitamukho nandasūnuḥ śivāya //
analyzed: gatvā bhāṇḍāni bhittvā madhu madhu śanakais gorasam bhakṣamāṇaḥ śīghra pratyāpta nandā kalita sita mukhaḥ nanda sūnuḥ śivāya

original: MSS_9843-1 kālindīkalakūlakānanakṛtakrīḍākalāpollasa d- gogopālakabālakaiḥ pratidiśaṃ sānandamāviṣṭitam /
analyzed: kālindī kalakūla kānana kṛta krīḍā kalāpa ullasat go gopālaka bālakaiḥ pratidiśam sa ānandam āviṣṭitam

original: MSS_9843-2 vaṃśīnādavaśīkṛtavrajavadhūsvāntaṃ sadāhnādakaṃ sadbhaktyā samupāsmahe vayamaghadhvaṃsaikadhīraṃ mahaḥ //
analyzed: vaṃśī nāda vaśīkṛta vraja vadhū svāntam sat āhnādakam sat bhaktyā samupāsmahe vayam agha dhvaṃsa eka dhīram mahaḥ

original: MSS_9844-1 kālindīkeśapāśaḥ parilasati mahīnāyikāyās tanūjā jahnīḥ satpuṇyasaṃgho guṇa iha salilaṃ yacca sārasvasaṃ tu /
analyzed: kālindī keśapāśaḥ parilasati mahīnāyikāyāḥ tanūjā jahnīḥ sat puṇya saṃghaḥ guṇaḥ iha salilam yat ca sārasvasam tu

original: MSS_9844-2 veṇī tveṣā viśeṣādamaravaralasatsnehayuktā viyuktā bandhenetyatra citraṃ vilasati nitarāṃ yattamovarṇahīnā //
analyzed: veṇī tu eṣā viśeṣāt amara vara lasat sneha yuktā viyuktā bandhena iti atra citram vilasati nitarām yat tamaḥ varṇa hīnā

original: MSS_9845-1 kālindīcāruvīcīnicaya iti mudā gāhitā naicikībhir bālā kādambinīti pramuditahṛdayaṃ vīkṣitā nīlakaṇṭhaiḥ /
analyzed: kālindī cāru vīcī nicayaḥ iti mudā gāhitā naicikībhiḥ bālā kādambinī iti pramudita hṛdayam vīkṣitā nīlakaṇṭhaiḥ

original: MSS_9845-2 uttaṃsārthaṃ tamālastabaka iti hṛtā mugdhagopāṅganābhiḥ śreyo naḥ kalpayantāṃ madhumathanatanusvacchakāntipravāhāḥ //
analyzed: uttaṃsa artham tamāla stabakaḥ iti hṛtāḥ mugdha gopa aṅganābhiḥ śreyaḥ naḥ kalpayantām madhu mathana tanu svaccha kānti pravāhāḥ

original: MSS_9846-1 kālindījalakuñjavañjulavanacchāyāniṣaṇṇātmano rādhābaddhanavānurāgarasikasyotkaṇṭhitaṃ gāyataḥ /
analyzed: kālindī jala kuñja vañjula vana chāyā niṣaṇṇa ātmanaḥ rādhā baddha nava anurāga rasikasya utkaṇṭhitam gāyataḥ

original: MSS_9846-2 tatpāyādapariskhalajjalaruhāpīḍaṃ kalaspṛṅnata- grīvottānitakarṇatarṇakakulairākarṇyamānaṃ hareḥ //
analyzed: tat pāyāt a pariskhalat jalaruha āpīḍam kala spṛś nata grīvā uttānita karṇa tarṇaka kulaiḥ ākarṇyamānam hareḥ

original: MSS_9847-1 kālindījalakelilolataruṇīrāvītacīnāṃśu kā nirgatyāṅgajalāni sāritavatīrālokya sarvā diśaḥ /
analyzed: kālindī jala keli lola taruṇīḥ āvīta cīna aṃśu kā nirgatya aṅga jalāni sāritavatīḥ ālokya sarvāḥ diśaḥ

original: MSS_9847-2 tīropāntamilannikuñjabhavane gūḍhaṃ cirāt paśyataḥ śaureḥ saṃbhramayannimā vijayate sākūtaveṇudhvaniḥ //
analyzed: tīra upānta milat nikuñja bhavane gūḍham cirāt paśyataḥ śaureḥ saṃbhramayan imāḥ vijayate sa ākūta veṇu dhvaniḥ

original: MSS_9847A-1 kālindītaṭabhedi hāstinapurīdausthyādibhiḥ khyāpita- sthemā yasya jayatyakhaṇḍajagadānandaikakando bhūjaḥ /
analyzed: kālindī taṭa bhedi hāstinapurī dausthya ādibhiḥ khyāpita sthemā yasya jayati akhaṇḍa jagat ānanda eka kandaḥ bhūjaḥ

original: MSS_9847A-2 muṣṭyā niṣṭhurayaiṣa muṣṭikaśironiṣṭyūtaraktakchaṭāc- chadmodvāntaruṣā bhinattu bhavatāṃ bhadretaraṃ lāṅgalam //
analyzed: muṣṭyā niṣṭhurayā eṣa muṣṭika śiraḥ niṣṭyūta rakta chaṭāt chadma udvānta ruṣā bhinattu bhavatām bhadretaram lāṅgalam

original: MSS_9848-1 kālindīnarmadāmbhaḥsrutamadasalilotsaṅginau puṣpavantau vibhrāṇaḥ kumbhayugmaṃ gaganatalatataḥ svardhunīpūraśuṇḍaḥ /
MSS_9848-2 ghaṇṭālaḥ sādhuvādairanabhimatayaśo deva mṛdnan mṛṇālaṃ kīrtistomābhrakumbhī jagadudarasaraḥsaṃbhramī bambhramīti //
analyzed: ghaṇṭālaḥ sādhuvādaiḥ anabhimata yaśaḥ deva mṛdnan mṛṇālam kīrti stoma abhra kumbhī jagat udara saraḥ saṃbhramī bambhramīti

original: MSS_9849-1 kālindīpulināntavañjulalatākuñje kutaścit kramāt suptasyaiva mithaḥ kathājuṣi śanaiḥ samvāhikāmaṇḍale /
analyzed: kālindī pulina anta vañjula latā kuñje kutaścid kramāt suptasya eva mithas kathā juṣi śanais samvāhikā maṇḍale

original: MSS_9849-2 vaidehīṃ daśakandharo'paharatītyākarṇya kaṃsadviṣo huṃ huṃ vatsa dhanurdhanurdhanuriti vyagrā giraḥ pāntu vaḥ //
analyzed: vaidehīm daśa kandharā upaharati iti ākarṇya kaṃsa dviṣaḥ hum hum vatsa dhanuḥ dhanuḥ dhanuḥ iti vyagrāḥ giraḥ pāntu vaḥ

original: MSS_9850-1 kālindīpuline mayā,
analyzed: kālindī puline mayā

original: na na mayā śailopaśalye,
analyzed: na na mayā śaila upaśalye

original: na na nyagrodhasya tale mayā,
analyzed: na na nyagrodhasya tale mayā

original: na na mayā rādhāpituḥ prāṅgaṇe /
analyzed: na na mayā rādhā pituḥ prāṅgaṇe

original: MSS_9850-2 dṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇa itīritasya sabhayaṃ gopairyaśodāpater vismerasya puro hasan nijagṛhānniryan hariḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti īritasya sa bhayam gopaiḥ yaśodā pateḥ vismerasya puras hasan nija gṛhāt niryan hariḥ pātu vaḥ

original: MSS_9851-1 kālindīpulinodareṣu musalī yāvad gataḥ krīḍituṃ tāvat karburikāpayaḥ piba hare vārdhiṣyate te śikhā /
analyzed: kālindī pulina udareṣu musalī yāvat gataḥ krīḍitum tāvat karburikā payaḥ piba hare vā ardhiṣyate te śikhā

original: MSS_9851-2 itthaṃ bālatayā pratāraṇaparā śrutvā yaśodāgiraḥ pāyādvaḥ svaśikhāṃ spṛśan pramuditaḥ kṣīre'rdhapīte hariḥ //
analyzed: ittham bāla tayā pratāraṇa parā śrutvā yaśodā giraḥ pāyāt vaḥ sva śikhām spṛśan pramuditaḥ hariḥ

original: MSS_9852-1 kālindīmanukūlakomalarayāmindīvaraśyāmalāḥ śailopāntabhuvaḥ kadambakusumairāmodinaḥ kandarān /
analyzed: kālindīm anukūla komala rayām indīvara śyāmalāḥ śaila upānta bhuvaḥ kadamba kusumaiḥ āmodinaḥ kandarān

original: MSS_9852-2 rādhāṃ ca prathamābhisāramadhurāṃ jātānutāpaḥ smaran astu dvāravatīpatistribhuvanāmodāya dāmodaraḥ //
analyzed: rādhām ca prathama abhisāra madhurām jāta anutāpaḥ smaran astu dvāravatī patiḥ tribhuvana āmodāya dāmodaraḥ

original: MSS_9853-1 kālindīyaṃ dviradadaliṃtāmbhojinīreṇuramyā yasyāḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śiśirapayasastīrakedāracārī /
analyzed: kālindī iyam yasyāḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śiśira payasaḥ tīra kedāra cārī

original: MSS_9853-2 gāyantīnāṃ kimapi madhuraṃ bālagopālikānāṃ līlālolaḥ kamalakalikāḥ karṇapūrīcakāra //
analyzed: gāyantīnām kim api madhuram bāla gopālikānām līlā lolaḥ kamala kalikāḥ karṇapūrīcakāra

original: MSS_9854-1 kālindīyati kajjalīyati kalānāthāṅkamālīyati vyālīyatyahimaṇḍalīyati muhuḥ śrīkaṇṭhakaṇṭhīyati /
analyzed: kālindīyati kajjalīyati kalānātha aṅkamālīyati vyālīyati ahimaṇḍalīyati muhur śrīkaṇṭhakaṇṭhīyati

original: MSS_9854-2 śaivālīyati kokilīyati mahānīlābhrajālīyati bhrahmāṇḍe ripuduryaśastava nṛpālaṃkāracūḍāmaṇe //
analyzed: śaivālīyati kokilīyati mahā nīla abhra jālīyati bhrahmāṇḍe ripu duryaśaḥ tava nṛpa alaṃkāra cūḍāmaṇe

original: MSS_9855-1 kālindīrāśirūrdhvaṃ nanu madhupakulaṃ mālatīpuñjagaṃ vā sandohaṃ vaiṇanābherjayati śaśimukhīkeśajālaṃ manojñam /
analyzed: kālindī rāśiḥ ūrdhvam nanu madhupa kulam mālatī puñjagam vā sandoham vaiṇa nābheḥ jayati śaśi mukhī keśa jālam manojñam

original: MSS_9855-2 bhrāntiṃ prāpnoṣi kiṃ tvaṃ bata garaladharābhoga eṣa pracaṇḍo lokaṃ pratyakṣabhūtaṃ grasati bata balād yanna bhūyaḥsukhitvam //
analyzed: bhrāntim prāpnoṣi kim tvam bata garaladhara ābhogaḥ eṣa pracaṇḍaḥ lokam pratyakṣa bhūtam grasati bata balāt yat na bhūyaḥ sukhi tvam

original: MSS_9856-1 kālindīvīcipuñjaiḥ kuvalayavipinairindranīlacchaṭābhiḥ śaivālaiḥ kajjalaughairalitimirabharairbālajīmūtajālaiḥ /
analyzed: kālindī vīci puñjaiḥ kuvalaya vipinaiḥ indranīla chaṭābhiḥ śaivālaiḥ kajjala oghaiḥ ali timira bharaiḥ bāla jīmūta jālaiḥ

original: MSS_9856-2 kastūrīkokilānāṃ tatibhiriva sahācākacikyaprapañcais trailokyaṃ pūrayantī śamayatu vipadaḥ śāṃbhavī kaṇṭhanālā //
analyzed: kastūrī kokilānām tatibhiḥ iva saha ācākacikya prapañcaiḥ trailokyam pūrayantī śamayatu vipadaḥ śāṃbhavī kaṇṭha nālā

original: MSS_9857-1 kālindyāḥ pulinaṃ pradoṣamaruto ramyāḥ śaśāṅkāṃśavaḥ santāpaṃ na harantu nāma nitarāṃ kurvanti kasmāt punaḥ /
analyzed: kālindyāḥ pulinam pradoṣa marutaḥ ramyāḥ śaśāṅka aṃśavaḥ santāpam na harantu nāma nitarām kurvanti kasmāt punar

original: MSS_9857-2 sandaṣṭaṃ vrajayoṣitāmiha hareḥ saṃśṛṇvato'ntaḥpure niḥśvāsā prasṛtā cayanti ramaṇīsaubhāgyagarvacchidaḥ //
analyzed: sandaṣṭam vraja yoṣitām iha hareḥ saṃśṛṇvataḥ ntaḥpure niḥśvāsā prasṛtā cayanti ramaṇī saubhāgya garva chidaḥ

original: MSS_9858-1 kālindyāḥ pulinendranīlaśakalaśyāmāmbhaso'ntarjale magnasyāñjanapuñjamecakanibhasyāheḥ kuto'nveṣaṇam /
analyzed: kālindyāḥ pulina indranīla śakala śyāma ambhasaḥ untar jale magnasya añjana puñja mecaka nibhasya aheḥ kutas nveṣaṇam

original: MSS_9858-2 tārābhāḥ phaṇacakravālamaṇayo na syur yadi dyotino yairevonnatimāpnuvanti guṇinas taireva yāntyāpadam //
analyzed: tāra ābhāḥ phaṇa cakravāla maṇayaḥ na syuḥ yadi dyotinaḥ yaiḥ evā unnatim āpnuvanti guṇinaḥ taiḥ evā yānti āpadam

original: MSS_9859-1 kālindyāḥ pulineṣu kelikupitāmutsṛjya rāse rasaṃ gacchantīmanugacchato'śrukaluṣāṃ kaṃsadviṣo rādhikām /
analyzed: kālindyāḥ pulineṣu keli kupitām utsṛjya rāse rasam gacchantīm anugacchatā uśru kaluṣām kaṃsa dviṣaḥ rādhikām

original: MSS_9859-2 tatpādapratimāniveśitapadasyodbhūtaromodgater akṣuṇṇo'nunayaḥ prasannadayitādṛpṭasya puṣṇātu vaḥ //
analyzed: tad pāda pratimā niveśita padasya udbhūta roma udgateḥ a kṣuṇṇa ununayaḥ prasanna dayitā dṛpṭasya puṣṇātu vaḥ

original: MSS_9859A-1 kālī kalakalarūpā mahiṣāsuravināśinī vīrā /
analyzed: kālī kalakala rūpā mahiṣa asura vināśinī vīrā

original: MSS_9859A-2 śumbhādānaniśumbhā- svādanatoṣāvatu tvāṃ n pate //
analyzed: śumbha ādāna niśumbhā svādana toṣā avatu tvām n pate

original: MSS_9860-1 kālīkelīkalāpakramakalitakalākautukī kundakāntiḥ kalpānte kālakalpaḥ kratukadanakathākandalīkūṭakandaḥ /
MSS_9860-2 kākolakrūrakaṇṭhaḥ kalitakalakalatklāntakandarpakāntā- kāruṇyākrāntakāntaḥ kalayatu kuśalaṃ kiṅkarāṇāṃ kapardī //
analyzed: kākola krūra kaṇṭhaḥ kalita kala kalat klānta kandarpa kāntā kāruṇya ākrānta kāntaḥ kalayatu kuśalam kiṅkarāṇām kapardī

original: MSS_9861-1 kālīnāgagrahavyagre śrīkṛṣṇe yamunātaṭe /
MSS_9861-2 jhaṃpayādhomukhe jāte viparītaṃ jagattrayam //
analyzed: jhaṃpayā adhomukhe jāte viparītam jagattrayam

original: MSS_9862-1 kālīyakakṣodavilepanaśriyaṃ diśad diśāmullasadaṃśumaddyuti /
analyzed: kālīyaka kṣoda vilepana śriyam diśat diśām ullasat aṃśumat dyuti

original: MSS_9862-2 khātaṃ khurairmudgabhujāṃ vipaprathe gireradhaḥ kāñcanabhūmijaṃ rajaḥ //
analyzed: khātam khuraiḥ mudga bhujām vipaprathe gireḥ adhas kāñcana bhūmi jam rajaḥ

original: MSS_9863-1 kālīyaiḥ kucakāñcanācalacamatkāraḥ kimutsāryate kīdṛk kuṅkamakesaratviṣi mukhe kastūrikālepanam /
analyzed: kālīyaiḥ kuca kāñcana acala camatkāraḥ kim utsāryate kīdṛś kuṅkama kesara tviṣi mukhe kastūrikā lepanam

original: MSS_9863-2 sphīte'smit jaghane sarojavadane kiṃ nīlacolārpaṇaṃ kasmai sāhasini tvamicchasi vidhervinyāsamanyādṛśam //
analyzed: sphīte smit jaghane saroja vadane kim nīla cola arpaṇam kasmai sāhasini tvam icchasi vidheḥ vinyāsam anyādṛśam

original: MSS_9864-1 kāluṣyaṃ janayañjaḍasya racayan dharmadrumonsūlanaṃ kliśyannītikṛpākṣamākamalinīṃ lobhāmbudhiṃ vadhaiyan /
analyzed: kāluṣyam janayan jaḍasya racayan dharma druma unsūlanam kliśyat nīti kṛpā kṣamā kamalinīm lobha ambudhim

original: MSS_9864-2 maryādātaṭamudrujañchubhamanohaṃsapravāsaṃ diśan kiṃ na kleśakaraḥ parigrahanadīpūraḥ pravṛddhiṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: maryādā taṭam udrujan śubha manaḥ haṃsa pravāsam diśan kim na kleśa karaḥ parigraha nadīpūraḥ pravṛddhim gataḥ

original: MSS_9865-1 kāluṣyaṃ payasāṃ vilokya śanakairuḍḍīya haṃsā gatā dhārājarjarakesarāsphuṭarucaḥ padmā nimagnā jale /
analyzed: kāluṣyam payasām vilokya śanakais uḍḍīya haṃsāḥ gatāḥ dhārā jarjara kesara āsphuṭa rucaḥ padmāḥ nimagnāḥ jale

original: MSS_9865-2 sā sarvartusukhāvatārapadavī channā tṛṇairnūtanaiḥ kaṣṭaṃ tādṛgapi svabhāvavimalaṃ vṛddhyaiva naṣṭaṃ saraḥ //
analyzed: sā sarva ṛtu sukha avatāra padavī channā tṛṇaiḥ nūtanaiḥ kaṣṭam tādṛś api svabhāva vimalam vṛddhyā eva naṣṭam saraḥ

original: MSS_9866-1 kāluṣyamudvīkṣya vidhuṃ kalaṅkinaṃ budhā yadāhurmama saṅgataṃ na tat /
analyzed: kāluṣyam udvīkṣya vidhum kalaṅkinam budhāḥ yat āhuḥ mama na tat

original: MSS_9866-2 jāne nijāṅke dayitāsya vartate niśīthinīnāthakalaṅkitā nahi //
analyzed: jāne nija aṅke dayitā asya vartate niśīthinī nātha kalaṅki tā nahi

original: MSS_9867-1 kāle kāle na kimupanataṃ bhuñjate bhojyajātaṃ gṛhṇantyambho na kimatha na kiṃ saṃviśanti kṣapāsu /
analyzed: kāle kāle na kim upanatam bhuñjate bhojya jātam gṛhṇanti ambhaḥ na kim atha na kim saṃviśanti kṣapāsu

original: MSS_9867-2 puṣṇanti svān na kimu pṛthukān strīṣu kiṃ no ramante kṛtyākṛtyavyapagatadhiyāṃ kastiraścāṃ ca bhedaḥ //
analyzed: puṣṇanti svān na kimu pṛthukān strīṣu kim naḥ ramante kṛtyā akṛtya vyapagata dhiyām kaḥ tiraścām ca bhedaḥ

original: MSS_9868-1 kāle kāle virecyaṃ syāt pātraṃ pūrayituṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: kāle kāle virecyam syāt pātram pūrayitum punar

original: MSS_9868-2 sajjīkurmo yadāvāptuṃ gurvīṃ grahaṇaśīlatām /
analyzed: sajjīkurmaḥ yadā avāptum gurvīm grahaṇa śīla tām

original: MSS_9868-3 svātmano'ntas tadasmābhī riktataivānubhūyate //
analyzed: sva ātmanaḥ ntar tat asmābhiḥ rikta tā eva anubhūyate

original: MSS_9868A-1 kāle kathaṃcic caratāṃ dhavānāṃ kāntyā svayā kardamite'ntarikṣe /
analyzed: kāle kathaṃcid caratām dhavānām kāntyā svayā kardamita intarikṣe

original: MSS_9868A-2 ambhodharāḥ śrāntijuṣāmabhūvan ālambadaṇḍā iva vāridhārāḥ //
analyzed: ambhodharāḥ śrānti juṣām abhūvan ālamba daṇḍāḥ iva vāri dhārāḥ

original: MSS_9869-1 kāle khalvāgatā devyaḥ putre mohamupāgate /
analyzed: kāle khalu āgatāḥ devyaḥ putre moham upāgate

original: MSS_9869-2 hastasparśo hi māt ṇām ajalasya jalāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: hasta sparśaḥ hi māt a jalasya jala añjaliḥ

original: MSS_9869A-1 kāle taroranupakāri phalaṃ phalitvā lajjāvaśāducita eva vināśayogaḥ /
analyzed: kāle taroḥ anupakāri phalam phali tvā lajjā vaśāt ucitaḥ eva vināśa yogaḥ

original: MSS_9869A-2 etat tu citramupakṛtya phalaiḥ parebhyaḥ prāṇān nijān jhaṭiti yat kadalī jahāti //
analyzed: etat tu citram upakṛtya phalaiḥ parebhyaḥ prāṇān nijān jhaṭiti yat kadalī jahāti

original: MSS_9870-1 kāle'dātā pitā vācyo vācyaścānupayan patiḥ /
analyzed: kāledātā pitā vācyaḥ vācyaḥ ca an upayan patiḥ

original: MSS_9870-2 mṛte bhartari putras tu vācyo māturarakṣitā //
analyzed: mṛte bhartari putraḥ tu vācyaḥ mātuḥ arakṣitā

original: MSS_9871-1 kāle deśe yathāyuktaṃ naraḥ kurvannupaiti kām /
analyzed: kāle deśe yathā yuktam naraḥ kurvan upaiti kām

original: MSS_9871-2 bhuktavantāvalapsyetāṃ kimannamakariṣyatām //
analyzed: bhuktavantau alapsyetām kim annam akariṣyatām

original: MSS_9872-1 kāle dharmārthakāmān yaḥ saṃmantrya sacivaiḥ saha /
analyzed: kāle dharma artha kāmān yaḥ saṃmantrya sacivaiḥ saha

original: MSS_9872-2 niṣevetātmavāṃlloke na sa vyasanamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: niṣeveta ātmavān loke na sa vyasanam āpnuyāt

original: MSS_9873-1 kālena kṛṣṇāśca sitāśca rātryaḥ kālena candraḥ paripūrṇabimbaḥ /
analyzed: kālena kṛṣṇāḥ ca sitāḥ ca rātryaḥ kālena candraḥ paripūrṇa bimbaḥ

original: MSS_9873-2 nākālataḥ puṣpaphalaṃ nagānāṃ nākālavegāḥ sarito vahanti //
analyzed: na akālataḥ puṣpa phalam nagānām na akāla vegāḥ saritaḥ vahanti

original: MSS_9874-1 kālena kṣitivārivahnipavanavyomādiyuktaṃ jagad brahmādyāśca surāḥ prayānti vilayaṃ vidmo vivārāditi /
analyzed: kālena kṣiti vāri vahni pavana vyoma ādi yuktam jagat brahma ādyāḥ ca surāḥ prayānti vilayam vidmaḥ vivārāt iti

original: MSS_9874-2 paśyāmo'pi vinaśyate'navarataṃ lokānanekān mudhā māyāmohamayīṃ bhavapraṇayinīṃ nāsthāṃ jahīmo vayam //
analyzed: paśyāmaḥ api lokān anekān mudhā māyā moha mayīm bhava praṇayinīm na āsthām jahīmaḥ vayam

original: MSS_9875-1 kālena yāti krimitāṃ mahendro mahendrabhāvaṃ krimirapyupaiti /
analyzed: kālena yāti krimi tām mahā indraḥ mahā indra bhāvam krimiḥ api upaiti

original: MSS_9875-2 ayaṃ prathīyānayamapratiṣṭha ityeṣa niṣṭhānucito'bhimānaḥ //
analyzed: ayam prathīyān ayam apratiṣṭhaḥ iti eṣa niṣṭhā anucita ubhimānaḥ

original: MSS_9876-1 kālena ripuṇā saṃdhiḥ kāle mitreṇa vigrahaḥ /
analyzed: kālena ripuṇā saṃdhiḥ kāle mitreṇa vigrahaḥ

original: MSS_9876-2 kāryakāraṇamāśritya kālaṃ kṣipati paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: kārya kāraṇam āśritya kālam kṣipati paṇḍitaḥ

original: MSS_9877-1 kālena śīghrāḥ pravivānti vātāḥ kālena vṛṣṭirjaladānupaiti /
analyzed: kālena śīghrāḥ vātāḥ kālena vṛṣṭiḥ jaladān upaiti

original: MSS_9877-2 kālena padmotpalavajjalaṃ ca kālena puṣpanti nagā vaneṣu //
analyzed: kālena padma utpalavat jalam ca kālena nagāḥ vaneṣu

original: MSS_9878-1 kāle nīlabalāhake sataḍiti prītiprade barhiṇā āścaryaṃ kathayāmi vaḥ śṛṇuta bho yad vṛttamasmin gṛhe /
analyzed: kāle nīla balāhake sa taḍiti prīti prade barhiṇā āścaryam kathayāmi vaḥ śṛṇuta bho yat vṛttam asmin gṛhe

original: MSS_9878-2 saubhāgyavyayaśaṅkayaikaśayane kāntāpriyābhyāmaho mānibhyāṃ bata rātrimeva sakalāṃ cīrṇaṃ pravāsivratam //
analyzed: saubhāgya vyaya śaṅkayā eka śayane kāntā priyābhyām aho mānibhyām bata rātrim eva sakalām cīrṇam pravāsi vratam

original: MSS_9879-1 kāle'nnasya kṣudhamavahito ditsamāno vidhṛtya no bhoktavyaṃ prathamamatitheryaḥ sadā tiṣṭhatīti /
analyzed: kālennasya kṣudham avahitaḥ ditsamānaḥ vidhṛtya naḥ bhoktavyam prathamam atitheḥ yaḥ sadā tiṣṭhati iti

original: MSS_9879-2 tasyāprāptāvapi gatamalaṃ puṇyarāśiṃ śrayantaṃ taṃ dātāraṃ jinapatimate mukhyamāhurjinedrāḥ //
analyzed: tasya aprāptau api gata malam puṇya rāśim śrayantam tam dātāram jinapati mate mukhyam āhuḥ jinedrāḥ

original: MSS_9880-1 kāle mahatyanavadhāvapatan kadāpi kvāpyantime januṣi ko'pi gatiṃ labheta /
analyzed: kāle mahati anavadhau apatan kadāpi kvāpi antime januṣi kaḥ api gatim labheta

original: MSS_9880-2 itthaṃ samarthanavidhiḥ paramāgamānāṃ paryāyasūktividhayā nayanaṃ nañarthe //
analyzed: ittham samarthana vidhiḥ parama āgamānām paryāya sūkti vidhayā nayanam nañ arthe

original: MSS_9881-1 kāle mṛduryo bhavati kāle bhavati dāruṇaḥ /
analyzed: kāle mṛduḥ yaḥ bhavati kāle bhavati dāruṇaḥ

original: MSS_9881-2 rājā lokadvayāpekṣī tasya lokadvayaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: rājā loka dvaya apekṣī tasya loka dvayam bhavet

original: MSS_9882-1 kāle mṛduryo bhavati kāle bhavati dāruṇaḥ /
analyzed: kāle mṛduḥ yaḥ bhavati kāle bhavati dāruṇaḥ

original: MSS_9882-2 sa vai sukhamavāpnoti loke'muṣminnihaiva ca //
analyzed: sa vai sukham avāpnoti loke imuṣmin iha eva ca

original: MSS_9883-1 kāle mṛduryo bhavati kāle bhavati dāruṇaḥ /
analyzed: kāle mṛduḥ yaḥ bhavati kāle bhavati dāruṇaḥ

original: MSS_9883-2 sa sādhayati kṛtyāni śatrūṃścaivādhitiṣṭhati //
analyzed: sa sādhayati kṛtyāni śatrūn ca eva adhitiṣṭhati

original: MSS_9884-1 kāle bhṛduśca tīkṣṇaśca nṛpaḥ syād yadi sūryavat /
analyzed: kāle bhṛduḥ ca tīkṣṇaḥ ca nṛpaḥ syāt yadi sūrya vat

original: MSS_9884-2 udayaḥ kriyate tasya maṇḍalenānurāgiṇā //
analyzed: udayaḥ kriyate tasya maṇḍalena anurāgiṇā

original: MSS_9885-1 kāle yathāvadhigata- narapatikopādyaśeṣavṛttāntaḥ /
analyzed: kāle yathā avadhigata narapati kopa ādi aśeṣa vṛttāntaḥ

original: MSS_9885-2 nṛpabhavane natamūrtiḥ saṃyatavastraḥ śanaiḥ praviśet //
analyzed: nṛpa bhavane nata mūrtiḥ saṃyata vastraḥ śanais praviśet

original: MSS_9886-1 kāle vāpyathavākāle saṃdhyāvandanatatparaḥ /
analyzed: kāle vā api athavā akāle saṃdhyā vandana tatparaḥ

original: MSS_9886-2 avidyo vā savidyo vā brāhmaṇo māmakī tanuḥ //
analyzed: avidyaḥ vā sa vidyaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ māmakī tanuḥ

original: MSS_9887-1 kāle vāridharāṇām apatitayā naiva śakyate sthātum /
analyzed: kāle vāridharāṇām a pati tayā na eva śakyate sthātum

original: MSS_9887-2 utkaṇṭhitāsi tarale na hi na hi sakhi picchilaḥ panthāḥ //
analyzed: utkaṇṭhitā asi tarale na hi na hi sakhi picchilaḥ panthāḥ

original: MSS_9888-1 kāle vidyutprabhājāle śikhitāṇḍavamaṇḍite /
analyzed: kāle vidyut prabhā jāle śikhi tāṇḍava maṇḍite

original: MSS_9888-2 kāntaḥ sarvajanābhīṣṭo bālenduḥ khe na labhyate //
analyzed: kāntaḥ sarva jana abhīṣṭaḥ bāla induḥ khe na labhyate

original: MSS_9889-1 kāle saṃtatavarṣiṇo jalamucaḥ sasyaiḥ samṛddhā dharā bhūpālā nijadharmapālanaparā viprāstrayīnirbharāḥ /
analyzed: kāle saṃtata varṣiṇaḥ jala mucaḥ sasyaiḥ samṛddhāḥ dharāḥ bhūpālāḥ nija dharma pālana parāḥ viprāḥ trayī nirbharāḥ

original: MSS_9889-2 svādukṣīranatodhasaḥ pratidinaṃ gāvo nirastāpadaḥ santaḥ śāntiparā bhavantu kṛtinaḥ saujanyabhājo janāḥ //
analyzed: svādu kṣīra nata udhasaḥ pratidinam gāvaḥ nirasta āpadaḥ santaḥ śānti parāḥ bhavantu kṛtinaḥ saujanya bhājaḥ janāḥ

original: MSS_9890-1 kāle sahiṣṇurgirivad asahiṣṇuśca vahnivat /
analyzed: kāle sahiṣṇuḥ giri vat a sahiṣṇuḥ ca vahni vat

original: MSS_9890-2 skandhenāpi vahecchatrūn priyāṇi samudāharan //
analyzed: skandhena api vahet śatrūn priyāṇi samudāharan

original: MSS_9891-1 kāle hitaṃ mitaṃ brūyād avisaṃvādi peśalam /
analyzed: kāle hitam mitam brūyāt avisaṃvādi peśalam

original: MSS_9891-2 pūrvābhibhāṣī sumukhaḥ suśīlaḥ karuṇo mṛduḥ //
analyzed: pūrva abhibhāṣī su mukhaḥ su śīlaḥ karuṇaḥ mṛduḥ

original: MSS_9892-1 kāle hitamitāhāravihārī vidhasāśanaḥ /
analyzed: kāle hita mita āhāra vihārī vidhasā aśanaḥ

original: MSS_9892-2 adīnātmā ca susvapnaḥ śuciḥ syāt sarvadā naraḥ //
analyzed: adīna ātmā ca susvapnaḥ śuciḥ syāt sarvadā naraḥ

original: MSS_9893-1 kā lokamātā kimu dehamukhyaṃ rate kimādau kurute manuṣyaḥ /
analyzed: kā loka mātā kimu deha mukhyam rate kim ādau kurute manuṣyaḥ

original: MSS_9893-2 ko daityahantā vada vai krameṇa gaurīmukhaṃ cumbati vāsudevaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ daitya hantā vada vai krameṇa gaurī mukham cumbati vāsudevaḥ

original: MSS_9894-1 kālo deśaḥ kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ kāryamāgamaḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ deśaḥ kriyā kartā karaṇam kāryam āgamaḥ

original: MSS_9894-2 dravyaṃ phalamiti brahman navadhokto'jayā hariḥ //
analyzed: dravyam phalam iti brahman navadhā uktā jayā hariḥ

original: MSS_9895-1 kālo daivaṃ karma jīvaḥ svabhāvo dravyaṃ kṣetraṃ prāṇa ātmā vikāraḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ daivam karma jīvaḥ svabhāvaḥ dravyam kṣetram prāṇaḥ ātmā vikāraḥ

original: MSS_9895-2 tatsaṃghāto bījarohapravāhas tvanmāyaiṣā tanniṣedhaṃ prapadye //
analyzed: tad saṃghātaḥ bīja roha pravāhaḥ tvad māyā eṣā tad niṣedham prapadye

original: MSS_9896-1 kālopabhoginaḥ sarve nityamānanditā narāḥ /
analyzed: kāla upabhoginaḥ sarve nityam ānanditāḥ narāḥ

original: MSS_9896-2 sarve satyaratā nityaṃ sarve dharmaparāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: sarve satya ratāḥ nityam sarve dharma parāyaṇāḥ

original: MSS_9896A-1 kālopalabdhaṃ kalahaṃsanāda- mākarṇya karṇāmṛtamantarikṣe /
analyzed: kāla upalabdham kalahaṃsa nādam ākarṇya karṇa amṛtam antarikṣe

original: MSS_9896A-2 salīlamuddhāṭitavāripūrā sarojinī sādaramujjagāma //
analyzed: sa līlam uddhāṭita vāri pūrā sarojinī sa ādaram ujjagāma

original: MSS_9897-1 kālo'bhyupaiti sakṛdeva naraṃ kathaṃcit prāpnoti taṃ na sa punaḥ khalu kālakāṅkṣī /
analyzed: kālaḥ abhyupaiti sakṛt eva naram kathaṃcid prāpnoti tam na sa punar khalu kāla kāṅkṣī

original: MSS_9897-2 kālena gocaragatānanapekṣya bhakṣyān mandakramo'pyajagaraḥ samupaiti siddhim //
analyzed: kālena gocara gatān an apekṣya bhakṣyān manda kramaḥ upi ajagaraḥ samupaiti siddhim

original: MSS_9898-1 kālo madhuḥ kupita eṣa ca puṣpadhanvā dhīrā vahanti ratikhedaharāḥ samīrāḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ madhuḥ kupitaḥ eṣa ca puṣpadhanvā dhīrāḥ vahanti rati kheda harāḥ samīrāḥ

original: MSS_9898-2 kelīvanīyamapi vañjulakuñjamañjur dūre patiḥ kathaya kiṃ karaṇīyamadya //
analyzed: kelīvanīyam api vañjula kuñja mañjuḥ dūre patiḥ kathaya kim karaṇīyam adya

original: MSS_9899-1 kālo'yaṃ bhūtamaśakaghuṃdhumānāṃ prapātinām /
analyzed: kālaḥ yam bhūta maśaka ghuṃdhumānām prapātinām

original: MSS_9899-2 brahmāṇḍodumbarotthānāṃ bṛhatpādapatāṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: brahmāṇḍa udumbara utthānām bṛhat pādapa tām gataḥ

original: MSS_9900-1 kālo yāti galatyāyuḥ kṣīyante ca manorathāḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ yāti galati āyuḥ kṣīyante ca manorathāḥ

original: MSS_9900-2 sukṛtaṃ ca kṛtaṃ kiṃcit satāṃ saṃsmaraṇocitam //
analyzed: sukṛtam ca kṛtam kiṃcid satām saṃsmaraṇa ucitam

original: MSS_9901-1 kālo vā kāraṇaṃ rājño rājā vā kālakāraṇam /
analyzed: kālaḥ vā kāraṇam rājñaḥ rājā vā kāla kāraṇam

original: MSS_9901-2 iti te saṃśayo mā bhūd rājā kālasya kāraṇam //
analyzed: iti te saṃśayaḥ mā bhūt rājā kālasya kāraṇam

original: MSS_9902-1 kālo vikurute bhāvān sarvāṃlloke śubhāśubhān /
analyzed: kālaḥ vikurute bhāvān sarvān loke śubha aśubhān

original: MSS_9902-2 kālaḥ saṃkṣipate sarvāḥ prajā visṛjate punaḥ //
analyzed: kālaḥ saṃkṣipate sarvāḥ prajāḥ visṛjate punar

original: MSS_9903-1 kālo hetuṃ vikurute svārthas tamanuvartate /
analyzed: kālaḥ hetum vikurute sva arthaḥ tam anuvartate

original: MSS_9903-2 svārthaṃ prājño'bhijānāti prājñaṃ loko'nuvartate //
analyzed: sva artham prājñaḥ abhijānāti prājñam lokaḥ nuvartate

original: MSS_9904-1 kā vidyā kavitāṃ vinārthini jane tyāgaṃ vinā śrīśca kā ko dharmaśca kṛpāṃ vinā narapatiḥ ko nāma nītiṃ vinā /
analyzed: kā vidyā kavi tām vinā arthini jane tyāgam vinā śrīḥ ca kā kaḥ dharmaḥ ca kṛpām vinā narapatiḥ kaḥ nāma nītim vinā

original: MSS_9904-2 kaḥ sūnurvinayaṃ vinā kulavadhūḥ kā svāmibhaktiṃ vinā bhogyaṃ kiṃ ramaṇīṃ vinā kṣititale kiṃ janma kīrtiṃ vinā //
analyzed: kaḥ sūnuḥ vinayam vinā kula vadhūḥ kā svāmi bhaktim vinā bhogyam kim ramaṇīm vinā kṣiti tale kim janma kīrtim vinā

original: MSS_9905-1 kā viṣamā daivagatiḥ kiṃ laṣṭaṃ yajjano guṇagrāhī /
analyzed: kā viṣamā daiva gatiḥ kim laṣṭam yat janaḥ guṇa grāhī

original: MSS_9905-2 kiṃ saukhyaṃ sukalatraṃ kiṃ durgrāhyaṃ khalo lokaḥ //
analyzed: kim saukhyam su kalatram kim durgrāhyam khalaḥ lokaḥ

original: MSS_9906-1 kāverīṃ tāṃ samāsādya vihṛtāmapsarogaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: kāverīm tām samāsādya vihṛtām apsaraḥ gaṇaiḥ

original: MSS_9906-2 tatra snātvā naro rājan gosahasraphalaṃ labhet //
analyzed: tatra snātvā naraḥ rājan go sahasra phalam labhet

original: MSS_9907-1 kāverī kabarīva bhāmini bhuvo devyāḥ puro dṛśyatāṃ pūgairnāgalatāśritairupadiśatyāśleṣavidyām iva /
analyzed: kāverī kavarī iva bhāmini bhuvaḥ devyāḥ puras dṛśyatām pūgaiḥ nāga latā āśritaiḥ upadiśati āśleṣa vidyām iva

original: MSS_9907-2 karṇāṭījanamajjaneṣu jaghanairyasyāḥ payaḥ plāvitaṃ pītvā nābhiguhābhirāttarucibhiḥ prācīṃ diśaṃ nīyate //
analyzed: karṇāṭī jana majjaneṣu jaghanaiḥ yasyāḥ payaḥ plāvitam pītvā nābhi guhābhiḥ ātta rucibhiḥ prācīm diśam nīyate

original: MSS_9908-1 kāverītīrakarpūraparāgāmodasodarāḥ /
MSS_9908-2 ratisvedalavānete purandhrīṇāṃ samīraṇāḥ //
analyzed: rati sveda lavān ete purandhrīṇām samīraṇāḥ

original: MSS_9909-1 kāverītīrabhūmīruhabhujagavadhūbhuktamuktāvaśiṣṭaḥ karṇāṭīcīnapīnastanavasanadaśāndolanāspa ndamandaḥ /
analyzed: kāverī tīra bhūmīruha bhujaga vadhū bhukta muktā avaśiṣṭaḥ karṇa āṭī cīna pīna stana vasana daśā āndolana āspa nda mandaḥ

original: MSS_9909-2 lolallāṭīlalāṭālakatilakalatālāsyalīlāvil olaḥ kaṣṭaṃ bho dākṣiṇātya pracalati pavanaḥ pāntha kāntākṛtāntaḥ //
analyzed: lolat lāṭī lalāṭa alaka tilaka latā lāsya līlā vid olaḥ kaṣṭam bho dākṣiṇātya pracalati pavanaḥ pāntha kāntā kṛta antaḥ

original: MSS_9909A-1 kāverīramyarājīvavilasadgandhabandhunā /
MSS_9909A-2 madhumāsasamīreṇa vardhate kutra kasya kā //
analyzed: madhu māsa samīreṇa vardhate kutra kasya kā

original: MSS_9910-1 kāverīvārivellallahariparikarakrīḍanakrāntaśītāḥ sphītaśrīkhaṇḍaṣaṇḍabhramaṇabharabhava dbhūrisaurabhyagarbhāḥ /
analyzed: kāverī vāri vellat lahari parikara krīḍana krānta śītāḥ sphīta śrīkhaṇḍa ṣaṇḍa bhramaṇa bhara bhavat bhūri saurabhya garbhāḥ

original: MSS_9910-2 colastrīlolacelāñcalacalanakalākrāntakāntāstanānt ā vānti preyoviyogāturatararamaṇīvairiṇo'mī samīrāḥ //
analyzed: ā vānti preyaḥ viyoga āturatara ramaṇī vairiṇaḥ umī samīrāḥ

original: MSS_9910A-1 kāverīhṛdayābhirāmapuline puṇye jaganmaṅgale candrāmbhojavatītaṭe parisare dhātrā samārādhite /
analyzed: kāverī hṛdaya abhirāma puline puṇye jagat maṅgale candra ambhojavatī taṭe parisare dhātrā samārādhite

original: MSS_9910A-2 śrīraṅge bhujagendrabhogaśayane lakṣmīmahīsevite śete yaḥ puruṣottamaḥ sa bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ pātu naḥ //
analyzed: śrīraṅge bhujaga indra bhoga śayane lakṣmī mahī sevite śete yaḥ puruṣottamaḥ sa bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ pātu naḥ

original: MSS_9910B-1 kā veśyā ko virodho'yaṃ kā praśastiśca saṅgare /
analyzed: kā veśyā kaḥ virodhaḥ yam kā praśastiḥ ca saṅgare

original: MSS_9910B-2 vṛthā prāṇajihīrṣūṇāṃ mūrkhānāmīdṛśī matiḥ //
analyzed: vṛthā prāṇa jihīrṣūṇām mūrkhānām īdṛśī matiḥ

original: MSS_9911-1 kāvyaṃ karoti sukaviḥ sahṛdaya eva vyanakti tattattvam /
analyzed: kāvyam karoti su kaviḥ sahṛdayaḥ eva vyanakti tat tattvam

original: MSS_9911-2 ratnaṃ khaniḥ prasūte racayati śilpī tu tatsuṣamān //
analyzed: ratnam khaniḥ prasūte racayati śilpī tu tad suṣamān

original: MSS_9911A-1 kāvyaṃ karotu parijalpatu saṃskṛtaṃ vā sarvāḥ kalāḥ samadhigacchatu vācyamānāḥ /
analyzed: kāvyam karotu parijalpatu saṃskṛtam vā sarvāḥ kalāḥ samadhigacchatu vācyamānāḥ

original: MSS_9911A-2 lokasthitiṃ yadi na vetti yathānurūpāṃ sarvasya mūrkhanikarasya sa cakravartī //
analyzed: loka sthitim yadi na vetti yathā anurūpām sarvasya mūrkha nikarasya sa cakravartī

original: MSS_9912-1 kāvyaṃ karomi na hi cārutaraṃ karomi yatnāt karomi yadi cārutaraṃ karomi /
analyzed: kāvyam karomi na hi cārutaram karomi yatnāt karomi yadi cārutaram karomi

original: MSS_9912-2 bhūpālamaulimaṇimaṇḍitapādapīṭha he sāhasāṅka kavayāmi vayāmi yāmi //
analyzed: bhūpāla mauli maṇi maṇḍita pāda pīṭha he sāhasa aṅka kavayāmi vayāmi yāmi

original: MSS_9913-1 kāvyaṃ karoṣi kimu te suhṛdo na santi ye tvāmudīrṇapavanaṃ vinivārayanti /
analyzed: kāvyam karoṣi kimu te suhṛdaḥ na santi ye tvām udīrṇa pavanam vinivārayanti

original: MSS_9913-2 gavyaṃ ghṛtaṃ piba nivātagṛhaṃ praviśya vātādhikā hi puruṣāḥ kavayo bhavanti //
analyzed: gavyam ghṛtam piba nivāta gṛham praviśya vāta adhikāḥ hi puruṣāḥ kavayaḥ bhavanti

original: MSS_9914-1 kāvyaṃ cārvapi rasika- prītikaraṃ bhavati naikarasabaddham /
analyzed: kāvyam cāru api rasika prīti karam bhavati na eka rasa baddham

original: MSS_9914-2 suratamanāhitakalahaṃ hariṇadṛśo nābhinandayati //
analyzed: suratam an āhita kalaham hariṇa dṛśaḥ na abhinandayati

original: MSS_9914A-1 kāvyaṃ cet sarasaṃ kimarthamamṛtaṃ vaktraṃ kuraṅgīdṛśāṃ cet kandarpavipāṇḍugaṇḍaphalakaṃ rākāśaśāṅkena kim /
analyzed: kāvyam ced sarasam kimartham amṛtam vaktram kuraṅgī dṛśām ced kandarpa vipāṇḍu gaṇḍa phalakam rākā śaśāṅkena kim

original: MSS_9914A-2 svātantryaṃ yadi jīvitāvadhi mudhā svarbhūrbhuvo vaibhavaṃ vaidarbhī yadi baddhayauvanabharā prītyā saratyāpi kim //
analyzed: svātantryam yadi jīvita avadhi mudhā svar bhūḥ bhuvaḥ vaibhavam vaidarbhī yadi baddha yauvana bharā prītyā sarati āpi kim

original: MSS_9915-1 kāvyaṃ yadīyaṃ gṛhamambaraṃ vā suvarṇacitrojjvalamāvibhāti /
analyzed: kāvyam yadi iyam gṛham ambaram vā suvarṇa citra ujjvalam āvibhāti

original: MSS_9915-2 sa nandano nandati kundanasya śrīkṛṣṇarāmaḥ kavirāptakāmaḥ //
analyzed: sa nandanaḥ nandati kundanasya śrī kṛṣṇarāmaḥ kaviḥ āpta kāmaḥ

original: MSS_9916-1 kāvyaṃ yadyapi rasikaṃ prītikaraṃ bhavati naikarasabaddham /
analyzed: kāvyam yadi api rasikam prīti karam bhavati na eka rasa baddham

original: MSS_9916-2 suratamanāhitakalahaṃ hariṇadṛśo nābhinandayati //
analyzed: suratam an āhita kalaham hariṇa dṛśaḥ na abhinandayati

original: MSS_9917-1 kāvyaṃ yaśase'rthakṛte vyavahāravide śivetarakṣataye /
analyzed: kāvyam yaśasā īrtha kṛte vyavahāra vide śiva itara kṣataye

original: MSS_9917-2 sadyaḥ paranirvṛtaye kāntāsammitatayopadeśayuje //
analyzed: sadyas para nirvṛtaye kāntā sammita tayā upadeśa yuje

original: MSS_9918-1 kāvyaṃ sudhā rasajñānāṃ kāmināṃ kāminī sudhā /
analyzed: kāvyam sudhā rasa jñānām kāminām kāminī sudhā

original: MSS_9918-2 dhanaṃ sudhā salobhānāṃ śāntiḥ sanyasināṃ sudhā //
analyzed: dhanam sudhā sa lobhānām śāntiḥ sanī asinām sudhā

original: MSS_9919-1 kāvyaprapañcacuñcū racayati kāvyaṃ na sāravid bhavati /
analyzed: kāvya prapañca cuñcū racayati kāvyam na sāra vid bhavati

original: MSS_9919-2 taravaḥ phalāni suvate vindati sāraṃ pataṅgasamudāyaḥ //
analyzed: taravaḥ phalāni suvate vindati sāram pataṅga samudāyaḥ

original: MSS_9920-1 kāvyamayyo giro yāvac caranti viśadā bhuvi /
analyzed: kāvya mayyaḥ giraḥ yāvat caranti viśadāḥ bhuvi

original: MSS_9920-2 tāvat sārasvataṃ sthānaṃ kavirāsādya modate //
analyzed: tāvat sārasvatam sthānam kaviḥ āsādya modate

original: MSS_9921-1 kāvyaśāstravinodena kālo gacchati dhīmatām /
analyzed: kāvya śāstra vinodena kālaḥ gacchati dhīmatām

original: MSS_9921-2 vyasanena tu mūrkhāṇāṃ nidrayā kalahena vā //
analyzed: vyasanena tu mūrkhāṇām nidrayā kalahena vā

original: MSS_9922-1 kāvyasyākṣaramaitrī- bhājo na ca karkaśā na ca grāmyāḥ /
analyzed: kāvyasya akṣara maitrī bhājaḥ na ca karkaśāḥ na ca grāmyāḥ

original: MSS_9922-2 śabdā api puruṣā api sādhava evārthabodhāya //
analyzed: śabdāḥ api puruṣāḥ api sādhavaḥ eva artha bodhāya

original: MSS_9923-1 kāvyasyāmraphalasyāpi komalasyetarasya ca /
analyzed: kāvyasya āmra phalasya api komalasya itarasya ca

original: MSS_9923-2 bandhacchāyāviśeṣeṇa raso'pyanyādṛśo bhavet //
analyzed: bandha chāyā viśeṣeṇa rasaḥ api anyādṛśaḥ bhavet

original: MSS_9924-1 kā'vyākulitā mādyati kāñcanamudrāṃ manoramāmāhuḥ /
analyzed: kāvya ākulitā mādyati kāñcana mudrām manoramām āhuḥ

original: MSS_9924-2 iha kālikāvataṃsita- candrakalā kāmitā yogyā //
analyzed: iha candra kalā kāmitā yogyā

original: MSS_9925-1 kāvyātmanā manasi paryaṇaman purā me pīyūṣasārasarasās tava ye vilāsāḥ /
analyzed: kāvya ātmanā manasi paryaṇaman purā me pīyūṣa sārasa rasāḥ tava ye vilāsāḥ

original: MSS_9925-2 tānantareṇa ramaṇī ramaṇīyaśīle cetoharā sukavitā bhavitā kathaṃ naḥ //
analyzed: tā anantareṇa ramaṇī ramaṇīya śīle cetaḥ harā su kavi tā bhavitā katham naḥ

original: MSS_9926-1 kāvyāmṛtaṃ durjanarāhunītaṃ prāpyaṃ bhaven no sumanojanasya /
analyzed: kāvya amṛtam durjana rāhu nītam prāpyam bhavet no su manaḥ janasya

original: MSS_9926-2 saccakramavyājavirājamāna- taikṣṇyaprakarṣaṃ yadi nāma na syāt //
analyzed: taikṣṇya prakarṣam yadi nāma na syāt

original: MSS_9926A-1 kāvye gāndharve nṛttaśāstre vidhijñaṃ dakṣaṃ dātāraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ dākṣiṇātyam /
analyzed: kāvye gāndharve nṛtta śāstre vidhi jñam dakṣam dātāram dakṣiṇam dākṣiṇātyam

original: MSS_9926A-2 veśyā kā necchet svāminaṃ koṅkaṇānāṃ syāccedasya strīṣvārjavāt saṃnipātaḥ //
analyzed: veśyā kā nā icchet svāminam koṅkaṇānām syāt ced asya strīṣu ārjavāt saṃnipātaḥ

original: MSS_9927-1 kāvyena mūrkhadhaninaṃ praṇayena nīcaṃ veśyāṃ śrutena śaṭhaśātravamārjavena /
analyzed: kāvyena mūrkha dhaninam praṇayena nīcam veśyām śrutena śaṭha śātrava mārjavena

original: MSS_9927-2 icchanti ye jagati rañjayituṃ vimūḍhās teṣāmaraṇyaruditena samaḥ prayāsaḥ //
analyzed: icchanti ye jagati rañjayitum vimūḍhāḥ teṣām araṇyaruditena samaḥ prayāsaḥ

original: MSS_9928-1 kāvye bhāvyaṃ guṇais tatra durjanā dūṣayanti yat /
analyzed: kāvye bhāvyam guṇaiḥ tatra durjanāḥ dūṣayanti yat

original: MSS_9928-2 na durgatagṛhe saṃdhir dīyate jātu dasyubhiḥ //
analyzed: na durgata gṛhe saṃdhiḥ dīyate jātu dasyubhiḥ

original: MSS_9929-1 kāvye bhavyatame'pi vijñanivahairāsvādyamāne muhur doṣānveṣaṇameva matsarajuṣāṃ naisargiko durgrahaḥ /
analyzed: kāvye bhavyatame api vijña nivahaiḥ āsvādyamāne muhur doṣa anveṣaṇam eva matsara juṣām naisargikaḥ durgrahaḥ

original: MSS_9929-2 kāsāre'pi vikāsipaṅkajacaye khelanmarāle punaḥ krauñcaścañcupuṭena kuñcitavapuḥ śambūkamanveṣate //
analyzed: kāsāre api vikāsi paṅkaja caye khelat marāle punar krauñcaḥ cañcu puṭena kuñcita vapuḥ śambūkam anveṣate

original: MSS_9930-1 kāvye śubhe viracite khalu no khalebhyaḥ kaścid guṇo bhavati yadyapi sampratīha /
analyzed: kāvye śubhe viracite khalu no khalebhyaḥ kaścid guṇaḥ bhavati yadi api samprati iha

original: MSS_9930-2 kuryāṃ tathāpi sujanārthamidaṃ yataḥ kiṃ yūkābhayena paridhānavimokṣaṇaṃ syāt //
analyzed: kuryām tathā api su jana artham idam yatas kim yūkā bhayena paridhāna vimokṣaṇam syāt

original: MSS_9931-1 kāvyeṣu nāṭakaṃ ramyaṃ tatrāpi ca śakuntalā /
analyzed: kāvyeṣu nāṭakam ramyam tatra api ca śakuntalā

original: MSS_9931-2 tatrāpi ca caturtho'ṅkas tatra ślokacatuṣṭayam //
analyzed: tatra api ca caturthaḥ ūṅkaḥ tatra śloka catuṣṭayam

original: MSS_9932-1 kāvyaikapātravilasadguṇadoṣadugdha- pāthaḥsamūhapṛthaguddharaṇe vidagdhāḥ /
analyzed: kāvya eka pātra vilasat guṇa doṣa dugdha pāthaḥ samūha pṛthak uddharaṇe vidagdhāḥ

original: MSS_9932-2 jānanti kartumabhiyuktatayā vibhāgaṃ candrāvadātamatayaḥ kavirājahaṃsāḥ //
analyzed: jānanti kartum abhiyukta tayā vibhāgam candra avadāta matayaḥ kavi rājahaṃsāḥ

original: MSS_9933-1 kāvyairupahatā vedāḥ putrā jāmātṛbhirhatāḥ /
analyzed: kāvyaiḥ upahatāḥ vedāḥ putrāḥ jāmātṛbhiḥ hatāḥ

original: MSS_9933-2 aśvairupahatā gāvaḥ paṇyastrībhiḥ kulāṅganāḥ //
analyzed: aśvaiḥ upahatāḥ gāvaḥ paṇya strībhiḥ kula aṅganāḥ

original: MSS_9934-1 kā śambhukāntā kimu candrakāntaṃ kāntāmukhaṃ kiṃ kurute bhujaṃgaḥ /
analyzed: kā śambhu kāntā kimu candrakāntam kāntā mukham kim kurute bhujaṃgaḥ

original: MSS_9934-2 kaḥ śrīpatiḥ kā viṣamā samasyā gaurīmukhaṃ cumbati vāsudevaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ śrīpatiḥ kā viṣamā samasyā gaurī mukham cumbati vāsudevaḥ

original: MSS_9935-1 kāśāṃśukā vikacapadmamanojñavaktrā sonmādahaṃsaravanūpuranādaramyā /
analyzed: kāśa aṃśukā vikaca padma manojña vaktrā sa unmāda haṃsa rava nūpura nāda ramyā

original: MSS_9935-2 āpakvaśālirucirā tanugātrayaṣṭiḥ prātpā śaran navavadhūriva rūparamyā //
analyzed: āpakva śāli rucirā tanu gātrayaṣṭiḥ śarad nava vadhūḥ iva rūpa ramyā

original: MSS_9936-1 kāśāḥ kāśā ivābhānti sarāṃsīva sarāṃsi ca /
analyzed: kāśāḥ kāśāḥ iva ābhānti sarāṃsi iva sarāṃsi ca

original: MSS_9936-2 cetāṃsyācikṣipuryūnāṃ nimnagā iva nimnagāḥ //
analyzed: cetāṃsi ācikṣipuḥ yūnām nimna gāḥ iva nimnagāḥ

original: MSS_9937-1 kāśāḥ kṣīranikāśā dadhiśaravarṇāni saptaparṇāni /
analyzed: kāśāḥ kṣīra nikāśāḥ dadhi śara varṇāni sapta parṇāni

original: MSS_9937-2 navanītanibhaścandraḥ śaradi ca takraprabhā jyotsnā //
analyzed: navanīta nibhaḥ candraḥ śaradi ca takra prabhā jyotsnā

original: MSS_9938-1 kāśīyaṃ samalaṃkṛtā nirupamasvargāpagāsaṃbhava- sthūlottārataraṅgabinduvilasanmuktāphalaśreṇibhiḥ /
analyzed: kāśīyam samalaṃkṛtā nirupama svarga āpagā saṃbhava sthūla uttāra taraṅga bindu vilasat muktāphala śreṇibhiḥ

original: MSS_9938-2 cañcaccañcalacañcarīkanikaraśyāmāmbarā rājate kāsārasthavinidrapadmanayanā viśveśvarapreyasī //
analyzed: cañcat cañcala cañcarīka nikara śyāma ambarā rājate kāsāra stha vinidra padma nayanā viśveśvara preyasī

original: MSS_9939-1 kā śṛṅgārakathā kutūhalakathā gītādividyākayā madyatkumbhikathā turaṅgamakathā kodaṇḍadīkṣākathā /
analyzed: kā śṛṅgāra kathā kutūhala kathā gīta ādi vidyā kayā madyat kumbhi kathā turaṅgama kathā kodaṇḍa dīkṣā kathā

original: MSS_9939-2 ekaivāsti mithaḥ palāyanakathā tvadbhītarakṣaḥpater deva śrīraghunātha tasya nagare svapne'pi nānyā kathā //
analyzed: ekā evā asti mithas palāyana kathā tvad bhīta rakṣaḥ pateḥ deva śrī raghunātha tasya nagare svapne pi nā anyā kathā

original: MSS_9940-1 kāśairmahī śiśiradīdhitinā rajanyo haṃsairjalāni saritāṃ kumudaiḥ sarāṃsi /
analyzed: kāśaiḥ mahī śiśiradīdhitinā rajanyaḥ haṃsaiḥ jalāni saritām kumudaiḥ sarāṃsi

original: MSS_9940-2 saptacchadaiḥ kusumabhāranatairvanāntāḥ śuklīkṛtānyupavanāni ca mālatībhiḥ //
analyzed: saptacchadaiḥ kusuma bhāra nataiḥ vanāntāḥ śuklīkṛtāni upavanāni ca mālatībhiḥ

original: MSS_9941-1 kā śailaputrī kimu netraramyaṃ śukārbhakaḥ kiṃ kurute phalāni /
analyzed: kā śailaputrī kimu netra ramyam śuka arbhakaḥ kim kurute phalāni

original: MSS_9941-2 mokṣasya dātā smaraṇena ko vā gaurīmukhaṃ cumbati vāsudevaḥ //
analyzed: mokṣasya dātā smaraṇena kaḥ vā gaurī mukham cumbati vāsudevaḥ

original: MSS_9942-1 kāśmaryāḥ kṛtamālamudgatadalaṃ koyaṣṭikaṣṭīkate tīrāśmantakaśimbicumbitamukhā dhāvantyapaḥ pūrṇikāḥ /
analyzed: kāśmaryāḥ kṛtamālam udgata dalam tīra aśmantaka śimbi cumbita mukhāḥ dhāvanti apaḥ pūrṇikāḥ

original: MSS_9942-2 dātyūhaistiniśasya koṭaravati skandhe nilīya sthitaṃ vīrunnīḍakapotakūjitamanukrandantyadhaḥ kukkuṭāḥ //
analyzed: dātyūhaiḥ tiniśasya koṭaravati skandhe nilīya sthitam vīrudh nīḍa kapota kūjitam anukrandanti adhas kukkuṭāḥ

original: MSS_9942A-1 kāśmīrakardamakaṣāyakapolapālī kahlāradāmakalikākamanīyacūlī /
MSS_9942A-2 kācid vihāraviśikhāmupayāti colī pālīlasatkaratalāmalakastanālī //
analyzed: kācid vihāra viśikhām upayāti colī pālī lasat kara tala āmalaka stana ālī

original: MSS_9943-1 kāśmīragauravapuṣāmabhisārikāṇām ābaddharekhamabhito rucimañjarībhiḥ /
analyzed: kāśmīra gaura vapuṣām abhisārikāṇām ābaddha rekham abhitas ruci mañjarībhiḥ

original: MSS_9943-2 etat tamāladalanīlatamaṃ tamisraṃ tatpremahemanikaṣopalatāṃ tanoti //
analyzed: etat tamāla dala nīlatamam tamisram tad prema hema nikaṣa upala tām tanoti

original: MSS_9944-1 kāśmīradravagauri hanta kimayaṃ bhūyo'ṅgarāge grahaḥ ko vā nīlasaroruhākṣi nitarāṃ netrāñjane saṃbhramaḥ /
analyzed: kāśmīra drava gauri hanta kim ayam bhūya uṅgarāge grahaḥ kaḥ vā nīla saroruha akṣi nitarām netra añjane saṃbhramaḥ

original: MSS_9944-2 raktāśokadalopameyacaraṇe kiṃ lākṣayā dattayā no rāgāntaramīhate nijarucā vibhrājamāno maṇiḥ //
analyzed: rakta aśoka dala upameya caraṇe kim lākṣayā dattayā no rāga antaram īhate nija rucā vibhrājamānaḥ maṇiḥ

original: MSS_9944A-1 kāśmīradhūlīkalikāvirājad- bālendurekhātilakābhirāmā /
MSS_9944A-2 kṛkāṭikākīlitakeśapāśā sā vaiṣṇavī sārasapatranetrā //
analyzed: kṛkāṭikā kīlita keśapāśā sā vaiṣṇavī sārasa patra netrā

original: MSS_9945-1 kāśmīrapaṅkakhacitastanapṛṣṭhatāmra- paṭṭāvakīrṇadayitārdranakhākṣarālī /
MSS_9945-2 eṇīdṛśaḥ kusumacāpanarendradatta- tāruṇyaśāsanamiva prakaṭīkaroti //
analyzed: eṇī dṛśaḥ kusuma cāpa narendra datta tāruṇya śāsanam iva prakaṭīkaroti

original: MSS_9946-1 kāśmīrīgātralekhāsu lolallāvaṇyavīciṣu /
MSS_9946-2 drāvayitveva vinyastaṃ svarṇaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṇakam //
analyzed: drāvayitvā iva vinyastam svarṇam ṣoḍaśa varṇakam

original: MSS_9947-1 kāśmīreṇa dihānamambaratalaṃ vāmabhruvāmānana- dvairājyaṃ vidadhānamindudṛṣadāṃ bhindānamambhaḥśirāḥ /
analyzed: kāśmīreṇa dihānam ambara talam vāma bhruvām ānana dvairājyam vidadhānam indu dṛṣadām bhindānam ambhaḥśirāḥ

original: MSS_9947-2 pratyudyatpuruhūtapattanavadhūdattārghadūrvāṅkura- kṣīvotsaṅgakuraṅgamaindavamidaṃ tadvimbamujjṛmbhate //
analyzed: pratyudyat puruhūta pattana vadhū datta argha dūrvā aṅkura kṣīva utsaṅga kuraṅgam aindavam idam tad vimbam ujjṛmbhate

original: MSS_9948-1 kāśyāṃ tiṣṭha sakhe suparvanivahairnityaṃ nutāyāṃ bhaja śrīkaṇṭhaṃ nijabhaktarakṣaṇavidhau dakṣaṃ dayāvāridhim /
analyzed: kāśyām tiṣṭha sakhe su parva nivahaiḥ nityam nutāyām bhaja śrīkaṇṭham nija bhakta rakṣaṇa vidhau dakṣam dayā vāridhim

original: MSS_9948-2 gāṅge vāriṇi pāpahāriṇi kuru snānaṃ smara śrīpatiṃ tvaṃ kaṣṭena vinaiva mokṣapadavīṃ prāṇātyaye prāpsyasi //
analyzed: gāṅge vāriṇi pāpa hāriṇi kuru snānam smara śrīpatim tvam kaṣṭena vinā eva mokṣa padavīm prāṇātyaye prāpsyasi

original: MSS_9949-1 kāśyāṃ tu maraṇānmuktir jananāt kamalālaye /
analyzed: kāśyām tu maraṇāt muktiḥ jananāt kamalālaye

original: MSS_9949-2 darśanādabhrasarasaḥ smaraṇādaruṇācale //
analyzed: darśanāt abhra sarasaḥ smaraṇāt aruṇa acale

original: MSS_9950-1 kāśyāṃ nipātaya vapuḥ śvapacālaye vā svargaṃ naya tvamapavargamadhogatiṃ vā /
analyzed: kāśyām nipātaya vapuḥ śvapaca ālaye vā svargam naya tvam apavargam adhogatim vā

original: MSS_9950-2 adyaiva vā kuru dayāṃ punarāyatau vā kaḥ saṃbhramo mama,
analyzed: adyā eva vā kuru dayām punar āyatau vā kaḥ saṃbhramaḥ mama

original: dhane dhaninaḥ pramāṇam //
analyzed: dhane dhaninaḥ pramāṇam

original: MSS_9951-1 kāśyāmākṛtimīśiturna labhate hṛdyāhitātattvadhīr yasya śrīriva sā''bhavat priyatamā yā sarvadārādhikā /
analyzed: kāśyām ākṛtim īśituḥ na labhate hṛdi āhita a tattva dhīḥ yasya śrīḥ iva sā abhavat priyatamā yā sarva dāra adhikā

original: MSS_9951-2 śaśvat tadratacetasas tava purāpuṇyānyagaṇyāni yad brahmādvaitasukhe'pi tadbhajanato mandādaraṃ te manaḥ //
analyzed: śaśvat tad rata cetasaḥ tava purā apuṇyāni agaṇyāni yat brahma advaita sukha ipi tad bhajanataḥ manda ādaram te manaḥ

original: MSS_9952-1 kā ślāghyā guṇināṃ,
analyzed: kā ślāghyā guṇinām

original: kṣamā,
analyzed: kṣamā

original: paribhavaḥ ko,
analyzed: paribhavaḥ kaḥ

original: yaḥ svakulyaiḥ kṛtaḥ kiṃ duḥkhaṃ,
analyzed: yaḥ sva kulyaiḥ kṛtaḥ kim duḥkham

original: parasaṃśrayo,
analyzed: para saṃśrayaḥ

original: jagati kaḥ ślāghyo,
analyzed: jagati kaḥ ślāghyaḥ

original: ya āśrīyate /
analyzed: yaḥ āśrīyate

original: MSS_9952-2 ko mṛtyurvyasanaṃ,
analyzed: kaḥ mṛtyuḥ vyasanam

original: śucaṃ jahati ke,
analyzed: śucam jahati ke

original: yairnirjitāḥ śatravaḥ kairvijñātamidaṃ,
analyzed: yaiḥ nirjitāḥ śatravaḥ kaiḥ vijñātam idam

original: virāṭanagare channasthitaiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ //
analyzed: virāṭa nagare channa sthitaiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ

original: MSS_9953-1 kāṣāyānna ca bhojanādiniyamānno vā vane vāsato vyākhyānādatha vā munivratabharāccittodbhavaḥ kṣīyate /
analyzed: kāṣāyāt na ca bhojana ādi niyamāt no vā vane vāsataḥ vyākhyānāt atha vā muni vrata bharāt citta udbhavaḥ kṣīyate

original: MSS_9953-2 kiṃ tu sphītakalindaśailatanayātīreṣu vikrīḍato govindasya padāravindabhajanārambhasya leśādapi //
analyzed: kim tu sphīta kalinda śaila tanayā tīreṣu vikrīḍataḥ govindasya pada aravinda bhajana ārambhasya leśāt api

original: MSS_9954-1 kāṣṭhaṃ kalpataruḥ sumeruracalaścintāmaṇiḥ prastaraḥ sūryastīvrakaraḥ śaśī ca vikalaḥ kṣāro hi vārāṃ nidhiḥ /
analyzed: kāṣṭham kalpataruḥ sumeruḥ acalaḥ cintāmaṇiḥ prastaraḥ sūryaḥ tīvrakaraḥ śaśī ca vikalaḥ kṣāraḥ hi vārām nidhiḥ

original: MSS_9954-2 kāmo naṣṭatanurbalirditisuto nandī paśuḥ kāmago naitāṃste tulayāmi bho raghupate kasyopamā dīyate //
analyzed: kāmaḥ naṣṭa tanuḥ baliḥ ditisutaḥ nandī paśuḥ kāma gaḥ nā etān te tulayāmi bho raghu pate kasya upamā dīyate

original: MSS_9955-1 kāṣṭhaṃ vahnyujjhitamapi bhavec chītaśāntyai kapīnāṃ lomno śuddhyai salilamanalaścāgniśaucaiṇakānām /
analyzed: kāṣṭham vahni ujjhitam api bhavet śīta śāntyai kapīnām lomnaḥ śuddhyai salilam analaḥ ca agni śauca eṇakānām

original: MSS_9955-2 jantorbhāvā vidadhati yathābhāvinaḥ kāryasiddhiṃ tattvaṃ teṣāṃ kvacana sahajaṃ vastuto nāsti kiṃcit //
analyzed: jantoḥ bhāvāḥ vidadhati yathā abhāvinaḥ kārya siddhim tattvam teṣām kvacana sahajam vastutas nā asti kiṃcid

original: MSS_9956-1 kāṣṭhaṃ śirasi saṃsthāpya tathā kāṣṭhena tāḍayet /
analyzed: kāṣṭham śirasi saṃsthāpya tathā kāṣṭhena tāḍayet

original: MSS_9956-2 luptasmṛteḥ smṛtiḥ sadyo yoginas tena jāyate //
analyzed: lupta smṛteḥ smṛtiḥ sadyas yoginaḥ tena jāyate

original: MSS_9957-1 kāṣṭhagolayugaṃ kṣiptaṃ dūramūrdhvapuraḥsthitaiḥ /
analyzed: kāṣṭha gola yugam kṣiptam dūram ūrdhva puras sthitaiḥ

original: MSS_9957-2 aprāptadhāraṃ pṛṣṭhena gacchet pucchamukhena hi //
analyzed: a prāpta dhāram pṛṣṭhena gacchet puccha mukhena hi

original: MSS_9958-1 kāṣṭhapāṣāṇadhātūnāṃ kṛtvā bhāvena sevanam /
analyzed: kāṣṭha pāṣāṇa dhātūnām kṛtvā bhāvena sevanam

original: MSS_9958-2 śraddhayā ca tathā siddhis tasya viṣṇuprasādataḥ //
analyzed: śraddhayā ca tathā siddhiḥ tasya viṣṇu prasādataḥ

original: MSS_9958A-1 kāṣṭhamaṅgāratāṃ yāti bhasmatāṃ gomayādikam /
analyzed: kāṣṭham aṅgāra tām yāti bhasma tām gomaya ādikam

original: MSS_9958A-2 vahnau kīrṇaṃ suvarṇaṃ tu suvarṇotkarṣatāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: vahnau kīrṇam suvarṇam tu suvarṇa utkarṣa tām vrajet

original: MSS_9959-1 kāṣṭhāgniṃ nirharec caiva tathā kūpāṃśca khātayet /
analyzed: kāṣṭha agnim nirharet ca eva tathā kūpān ca khātayet

original: MSS_9959-2 saṃśodhayet tathā kupān kṛtān pūrvaṃ payo'rthibhiḥ //
analyzed: saṃśodhayet tathā kupān kṛtān pūrvam payorthibhiḥ

original: MSS_9960-1 kāṣṭhādagnirjāyate mathyamānād bhūmistoyaṃ khanyamānā dadāti /
analyzed: kāṣṭhāt agniḥ jāyate mathyamānāt bhūmiḥ toyam khanyamānā dadāti

original: MSS_9960-2 sotsāhānāṃ nāstyasādhyaṃ narāṇāṃ mārgārabdhāḥ sarvayatnāḥ phalanti //
analyzed: sa utsāhānām na asti asādhyam narāṇām mārga ārabdhāḥ sarva yatnāḥ phalanti

original: MSS_9960A-1 kāṣṭhādyathāgnirutpannaḥ svāśrayaṃ dahati kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: kāṣṭhāt yathā agniḥ utpannaḥ sva āśrayam dahati kṣaṇāt

original: MSS_9960A-2 krodhāgnirdehajastadvat tameva dahati dhruvam //
analyzed: krodha agniḥ deha jaḥ tadvat tam eva dahati dhruvam

original: MSS_9961-1 kāṣṭhānuṣaṅgāt parivardhamāne jāgratpratāpajvalane tvadīye /
analyzed: kāṣṭhā anuṣaṅgāt parivardhamāne jāgrat pratāpa jvalane tvadīye

original: MSS_9961-2 śrīkārtavīryaṃ prasabhaṃ patanti pratyarthipṛthvīpatayaḥ pataṅgāḥ //
analyzed: śrī kārtavīryam prasabham patanti pratyarthi pṛthvīpatayaḥ pataṅgāḥ

original: MSS_9962-1 kāṣṭhe'śvakeśaṃ saṃyamya tatra baddhvā varāṭikām /
analyzed: saṃyamya tatra baddhvā varāṭikām

original: MSS_9962-2 hastena bhrāmyamāṇāṃ ca yo hanti sa dhanurdharaḥ //
analyzed: hastena bhrāmyamāṇām ca yaḥ hanti sa dhanurdharaḥ

original: MSS_9963-1 kā saṃbuddhiḥ subhaṭa bhavato brūhi pṛcchāmi samyak prātaḥ kīdṛg bhavati vipinaṃ saṃprabuddhairvihaṃgaiḥ /
analyzed: kā saṃbuddhiḥ su bhaṭa bhavataḥ brūhi pṛcchāmi samyak prātar kīdṛś bhavati vipinam saṃprabuddhaiḥ vihaṃgaiḥ

original: MSS_9963-2 lokaḥ kasmin prathayati mudaṃ,
analyzed: lokaḥ kasmin prathayati mudam

original: kā tvadīyā ca jaitrī prāyo loke sthitamiha sukhaṃ jantunā kīdṛśena //
analyzed: kā tvadīyā ca jaitrī prāyas loke sthitam iha sukham jantunā kīdṛśena

original: MSS_9964-1 kā saṃsṛtiḥ kimapacāranibandhaneyaṃ kīdṛgvidhasya tava kiṃ kṣatametayeti /
analyzed: kā saṃsṛtiḥ kim apacāra nibandhanā iyam kīdṛgvidhasya tava kim kṣatam etayā iti

original: MSS_9964-2 praśne tu nāsmi kuśalaḥ prativaktumeva khedastu me janani ko'pyayamevamāste //
analyzed: praśne tu nā asmi kuśalaḥ prativaktum eva khedaḥ tu me janani kopī ayam evam āste

original: MSS_9964A-1 kāsaśvāsajvarājīrṇaśokatṛṣṇāsya pākayuk /
analyzed: kāsa śvāsa jvara ajīrṇa śoka tṛṣṇā āsya pāka yuj

original: MSS_9964A-2 na ca kuryācchironetrahṛtkarṇāmayavānapi //
analyzed: na ca kuryāt śiraḥ netra hṛd karṇa āmayavān api

original: MSS_9965-1 kāsāṃcid dhavalaściraṃ nivasatāṃ vitteparāsāṃ punar nīlo vā kapilo'thavā varavṛṣo rakto'thavā mecakaḥ /
analyzed: kāsāṃcid dhavalaḥ ciram nivasatām vitte parāsām punar nīlaḥ vā kapilaḥ athavā vara vṛṣaḥ raktaḥ athavā mecakaḥ

original: MSS_9965-2 grāmīṇairavadhīrito'pi śithilaskandho'pyanūrdhvaśravāḥ svānte me paratantratundilatanurjāgartyayaṃ karburaḥ //
analyzed: grāmīṇaiḥ avadhīritaḥ api śithila skandhaḥ api anūrdhva śravāḥ svānte me paratantra tundila tanuḥ jāgarti ayam karburaḥ

original: MSS_9966-2 kāsāṃ hi nāpadāṃ hetur atilobhāndhabuddhitā //
analyzed: kāsām hi nā āpadām hetuḥ ati lobha andha buddhi tā

original: MSS_9967-1 kāsāraśoṣiṇi navodayamānamugdha- sadvartikānivahadāhini dāruṇe'pi /
analyzed: kāsāra śoṣiṇi sat vartikā nivaha dāhini dāruṇe pi

original: MSS_9967-2 madhyandinoṣṇakiraṇe pratipannasakhya- smeraṃ sukhaṃ jayati citracaritramabjam //
analyzed: madhyandina uṣṇakiraṇe pratipanna sakhya smeram sukham jayati citra caritram abjam

original: MSS_9968-1 kāsāre padminī'yaṃ mukulayugamanatyantaraṃ yatra hṛdyam yasmin sadyaḥsamudyadgrahapatikarajavyāpṛtiḥ ślāghanīyā /
analyzed: kāsāre padminī iyam mukula yugam anatyantaram yatra hṛdyam yasmin sadyas samudyat grahapati karaja vyāpṛtiḥ ślāghanīyā

original: MSS_9968-2 tasmādetad viśeṣasmṛtikalitamiha prekṣya sākṣādupekṣyaṃ varyaṃ śauryaṃcanādau na gamaya samayaṃ tvaṃ vrajastrīhitajñaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt etat viśeṣa smṛti kalitam iha prekṣya sākṣāt upekṣyam varyam śauryam cana ādau na gamaya samayam tvam vraja strī hita jñaḥ

original: MSS_9969-1 kāsāre'pi payaḥ pibanti pathikā na kvāpi vāri tvayi kṣāratvādudadheḥ samudra iti te nāmaitadevocitam /
analyzed: kāsāre pi payaḥ pibanti pathikāḥ na kvāpi vāri tvayi kṣāra tvāt udadheḥ samudraḥ iti te nāma etat eva ucitam

original: MSS_9969-2 na tvetāni nirarthakāni bhavato nāmānyanarthāntarāṇy ambhodhirjaladhiḥ payonidhirudadhirvārāṃnidhirvāridhiḥ //
analyzed: na tu etāni nirarthakāni bhavataḥ nāmāni anartha antarāṇi ambhodhiḥ jaladhiḥ payonidhiḥ udadhiḥ vārāṃnidhiḥ vāridhiḥ

original: MSS_9970-1 kāsāre madamattavāraṇagaṇairākumbhamagnaṃ payaḥ pītaṃ yatprabhavoruvīcivalanairvyāptaṃ samastaṃ jagat /
analyzed: kāsāre mada matta vāraṇa gaṇaiḥ ākumbham agnam payaḥ pītam yat prabhava ūru vīci valanaiḥ vyāptam samastam jagat

original: MSS_9970-2 tasminneva raveḥ pracaṇḍakiraṇaśreṇīnipītāmbhasi prāptāḥ pānthanakhaṃpacāḥ pratipadaṃ madhyasthalībhūmayaḥ //
analyzed: tasmin eva raveḥ pracaṇḍa kiraṇa śreṇī nipīta ambhasi prāptāḥ pānthana khaṃpacāḥ pratipadam madhya sthalī bhūmayaḥ

original: MSS_9971-1 kāsāreṣu saritsu sindhuṣu tathā nīceṣu nīragrahaṃ dhik tatrāpi śironatiḥ kimaparaṃ heyaṃ bhaven māninām /
analyzed: kāsāreṣu saritsu sindhuṣu tathā nīceṣu nīra graham dhik tatra api śiraḥ natiḥ kim aparam heyam bhavet māninām

original: MSS_9971-2 ityālocya vimucya cātakayuvā teṣu spṛhāmādarād udgrīvas tava vārivāha kurute dhārādharālokanam //
analyzed: iti ālocya vimucya cātaka yuvā teṣu spṛhām ādarāt udgrīvaḥ tava vārivāha kurute dhārādhara ālokanam

original: MSS_9971A-1 kāsāryavarya kalitāmburuhāvataṃsa muktāsamānajalabindutaraṅgaraṅga /
analyzed: kāsārya varya kalita amburuha avataṃsa muktā samāna jala bindu taraṅga raṅga

original: MSS_9971A-2 kiṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ tava bakairbahubhiḥ kurārvair haṃsairvinā kalaravairnaradevapūjyaiḥ //
analyzed: kim bhūṣaṇam tava bakaiḥ bahubhiḥ kurārvaiḥ haṃsaiḥ vinā kalaravaiḥ naradeva pūjyaiḥ

original: MSS_9972-1 kāsi tvaṃ vada cauryakāriṇi kutaḥ,
analyzed: kā asi tvam vada caurya kāriṇi kutas

original: kastvaṃ,
analyzed: kaḥ tvam

original: puroyāmikaḥ kiṃ brūṣe,
analyzed: puroyāmikaḥ kim brūṣe

original: muṣitau suvarṇakalaśau bhūpasya, kena, tvayā /
analyzed: muṣitau suvarṇa kalaśau bhūpasya kena tvayā

original: MSS_9972-2 kutra staḥ, prakaṭau tavāñcalataṭe,
analyzed: kutra staḥ prakaṭau tava añcala taṭe

original: kutreti,
analyzed: kutra iti

original: taptaśyatām ityukte dhṛtavallavīkucayugastvaṃ pātu pītāmbaraḥ //
analyzed: iti ukte dhṛta vallavī kuca yugaḥ tvam pātu pīta ambaraḥ

original: MSS_9973-1 kāsī vivarjayec cauryaṃ nidrāluś carmaṃcaurikām /
analyzed: kāsī vivarjayet cauryam nidrāluḥ carmaṃcaurikām

original: MSS_9973-2 jihvālaulyaṃ ca rogāḍhyo jīvituṃ yo'tra vāñchati //
analyzed: jihvā laulyam ca roga āḍhyaḥ jīvitum vāñchati

original: MSS_9974-1 kāse śvāse tathā śoṣe mandāgnau viṣamajvare /
analyzed: kāse śvāse tathā śoṣe manda agnau viṣamajvare

original: MSS_9974-2 pramehe mūtrakṛcchre ca sevayenmadhupippalīm //
analyzed: pramehe mūtrakṛcchre ca sevayet madhu pippalīm

original: MSS_9975-1 kā strī na praṇayivaśā kā vilasitayo manobhavavihīnāḥ /
analyzed: kā strī na praṇayi vaśā kāḥ vilasitayaḥ manobhava vihīnāḥ

original: MSS_9975-2 ko dharmo nirupaśamaḥ kiṃ saukhyaṃ vallabhena rahitānām //
analyzed: kaḥ dharmaḥ nirupaśamaḥ kim saukhyam vallabhena rahitānām

original: MSS_9976-1 kāsvid avaguṇṭhanavatī nātiparisphuṭaśarīralāvaṇyā /
analyzed: kāsvid avaguṇṭhanavatī na ati parisphuṭa śarīra lāvaṇyā

original: MSS_9976-2 madhye tapodhanānāṃ kisalayamiva pāṇḍupatrāṇām //
analyzed: madhye tapodhanānām kisalayam iva pāṇḍu patrāṇām

original: MSS_9977-1 kāhamasmi guhā vakti praśne'muṣmin kimuttaram /
analyzed: kā aham asmi guhā vakti praśna amuṣmin kim uttaram

original: MSS_9977-2 kathamuktaṃ na jānāsi kadarthayasi yat sakhe //
analyzed: katham uktam na jānāsi kadarthayasi yat sakhe

original: MSS_9978-1 kāharniśamanucintyā samsārāsāratā na tu pramadā /
analyzed: kā aharniśam anucintyā samsāra asāra tā na tu pramadā

original: MSS_9978-2 kā preyasī vidheyā karuṇā dākṣiṇyamatha maitrī //
analyzed: kā preyasī vidheyā karuṇā dākṣiṇyam atha maitrī

original: MSS_9979-1 kā hi tulāmadhirohati bhujagalatāyāḥ pratāninīṣvanyā /
analyzed: kā hi tulām adhirohati bhujaga latāyāḥ pratāninīṣu anyā

original: MSS_9979-2 yā khaṇḍitāpi radanair janayati vadane vicakṣaṇāṃ suṣamām //
analyzed: yā khaṇḍitā api radanaiḥ janayati vadane vicakṣaṇām suṣamām
